hˈapo mwˈanzo mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuu dunˈia ˌilikˈuwa haˈina ˈumbo, tˈena ˌilikˈuwa tˈupu. ɡˈiza lˌilikˈuwa ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa vilˈindi vja mˈaɟi, nˌaje rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌametulˈia ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, iwˈepo nˈuru, nˈajo nˈuru ˌikawˈepo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona ja kˌuwa nˈuru ni ɲɟˈema, ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakatˌeŋɡanˈiʃa nˈuru na ɡˈiza.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaiˈita nˈuru mtʃˈana, na ɡˈiza ˌakaliˈita usˈiku. ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja kwˈanza.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, iwˈepo nafˈasi kˈati ja mˈaɟi iɡˈawe mˈaɟi na mˈaɟi.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa nafˈasi, ˌakatˌeŋɡanˈiʃa mˈaɟi jalˈijo tʃˈini ja hˈijo nafˈasi na mˈaɟi jalˈijo ɟˈuu jˈake. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaiˈita hˈijo nafˈasi ˈaŋɡa. ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja pˈili.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, mˈaɟi jˌalijˈopo tʃˈini ja ˈaŋɡa na jˌakusaɲˈike mahˈali pamˈoɟa, pawˈepo na ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaiˈita ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu ˈarði, nˈalo lˈile kˌusaɲˈiko la mˈaɟi ˌakaliˈita bahˈari. mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona kˌuwa ni vjˈema.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, ˈarði na itˈoe mimˈea: mˈitʃe ˌitoˈajo mbˈeɡu, mˈiti ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌitoˈajo matˈunda jˌeɲe mbˈeɡu ndˈani jˈake, kˈila m̩mˈea kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˌake mbˌalimbˈali. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
ˈarði ˌikatʃipˈua mimˈea: mimˈea ˌitoˈajo mbˈeɡu kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake, na mˈiti ˌitoˈajo matˈunda jˌeɲe mbˈeɡu kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake. mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona ja kˌuwa hˈili ni ɟˈema.|0
ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja tˈatu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, iwˈepo miˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe nafˈasi ja ˈaŋɡa ˌili ˌiteŋɡanˈiʃe usˈiku na mtʃˈana, nˈajo ˈiwe alˈama ja kˌutambulˈiʃa maɟˈira mbˌalimbˈali, sˈiku na miˈaka.|0
nˈajo ˈiwe miˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe nafˈasi ja ˈaŋɡa ja kutˈia nˈuru ɟˌuːja dunˈia. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa miˈaŋɡa miwˈili mikˈubwa: mwˈaŋɡa mkˈubwa ˌutawˈale mtʃˈana, na mwˈaŋɡa mdˈoɡo ˌutawˈale usˈiku. pˈia mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa ɲˈota.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaiwˈeka katˌika nafˈasi ja ˈaŋɡa ˌiaŋɡˈaze dunˈia.|0
ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, kuwˈepo na viˈumbe hˈai tˈele kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi, nˌao ndˈeɡe warˈuke ɟˌuːja dunˈia katˌika nafˈasi ja ˈaŋɡa.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈumba viˈumbe wakˈubwa wa bˌaharˈini na kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌiendˈatʃo maɟˈini kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake, na kˈila ndˈeɡe mwˌeɲe mabˈawa kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina jˈake. mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona kˌuwa hˈili ni ɟˈema.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakavˌibarˈiki, ˌakasˈema, zaˈeni mwˌoŋɡezˈeke, mkˌajaɟˈaze mˈaɟi ja bahˈari, nˌao ndˈeɡe wˌaoŋɡezˈeke katˌika dunˈia.|0
ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja tˈano.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, ˈarði na itˈoe viˈumbe hˈai kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake: waɲˈama wa kufˈuɡwa, viˈumbe vˌitambaˈavjo arðˈini na waɲˈama pˈori, kˈila mɲˈama kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina jˈake. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa waɲˈama pˈori kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake, waɲˈama wa kufˈuɡwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake, na viˈumbe vjˈote vˌitambaˈavjo ɟˌuːja ˈarði kˌuliŋɡˈana na aˈina zˈake. mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona kˌuwa hˈili ni ɟˈema.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, tufˈaɲe ˈm̩tu kwa mfˈano wˈetu, kwa sˈura jˈetu, wˌakatawˈale ɟˌuːja samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, ɟˌuːja mifˈuɡo, ɟˌuːja dunˈia jˈote, na ɟˌuːja viˈumbe wˈote wˌatambaˈao ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamuˈumba ˈm̩tu kwa mfˈano wˌake mweɲˈewe, kwa mfˈano wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalimuˈumba; mwˌanaˈume na mwanˈamke ˌaliwaˈumba.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌabarˈiki na ˌakawˌaambˈia, zaˈeni na mkˌaoŋɡezˈeke, mkˌaiɟˈaze tˈena dunˈia na kˌuitiˈiʃa. mkˌatawˈale samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini, ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, na kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌiendˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, nˌimewˈapa kˈila ˈm̩tʃe ˌutoˈao mbˈeɡu ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia jˈote, na kˈila ˈm̩ti wˌeɲe matˈunda jˌeɲe mbˈeɡu ndˈani jˈake. vˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃˈenu.|0
nˌao waɲˈama wˈote wa dunˈia, ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani, na viˈumbe vjˈote vˌiendˈavjo ɟˌuːja ˈarði: jaˈani kˈila kiˈumbe tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi ja uhˈai, nˌinawˈapa kˈila ˈm̩tʃe wa kiɟˈani kˌuwa tʃakˈula. ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona vjˈote ˌalivjoˈumba, na tazˈama, ˌilikˈuwa vizˈuri sˈana. ikˈawa ɟiˈoni, ikˈawa ˌasubˈuhi, sˈiku ja sˈita.|0
kwa hˈijo mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia zˌikakˌamilˈika, pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌamilˈiʃa kˈazi ˌalijokˈuwa ˌakiifˈaɲa, hˈivjo sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌakapumzˈika kutˈoka kˈazi zˌake zˈote.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˌibarˈiki sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌakaifˈaɲa tˌakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ˌalipumzˈika kutˈoka kˈazi zˈote za kuˈumba ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaelˈezo ja mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia wakˈati zˌilipoˈumbwa. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌoziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
hˌapakuwˈepo na ˈm̩tʃe wa ʃambˈani ˌuliokˈuwa ˌumeɟˌitokˈeza arðˈini, wˈala hˌapakuwˈepo na m̩mˈea wa ʃˈamba ˌuliokˈuwa ˌumeˈota, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟaɲeʃˈea mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, na hˌapakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu wa kˌuilˈima ˈarði.|0
lakˈini umˈande ˌulitokˈeza kutˈoka arðˈini na kuɲˈeʃa ˈuso wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalimuˈumba ˈm̩tu kutˈoka mavˈumbi ja ˈarði, ˌakampˌulizˈia pˈumzi ja uhˈai puˈani mwˈake, nˌaje ˈm̩tu akˈawa kiˈumbe hˈai.|0
bˌasi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌameotˈeʃa bustˈani upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, katˌika edˈeni, hˌuko ˌakamwˈeka hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌemuˈumba.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa aˈina zˈote za mˈiti ziˈote kutˈoka arðˈini, mˈiti jˌeɲe kˌupendˈeza mˈatʃo na mizˈuri kwa tʃakˈula. kˌatikˈati ja bustˈani ˌulikuwˈepo ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima na ˈm̩ti wa kuɟˈua mˈema na mabˈaja.|0
ˈm̩to wa kˌuɲeʃˈea bustˈani ˌulitˌirirˈika tˌoka edˈeni, kˌuanzˈia hˈapa ˌukaɡˌawaɲˈika kˌuwa mˈito mˈinne.|0
ˈm̩to wa kwˈanza ˌuliˈitwa piʃˈoni, nˌao hˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja havˈila ambˈako kˈuna ðahˈabu.|0
ðahˈabu ja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ni nzˈuri, bedˈola na vˈito ʃohˈamu pˈia hˌupatikˈana hˌuko..|0
ɟˈina la ˈm̩to wa pˈili ni ɡihˈoni, ambˈao hˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja kˈuʃi.|0
ɟˈina la ˈm̩to wa tˈatu ni tiɡrˈisi, ˌunaopˈita mˌaʃarˈiki ja aʃˈuru. ˈm̩to wa ˈn̩ne ni frˈati.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamtʃukˈua hˈujo ˈm̩tu, ˌakamwˈeka kwˈeɲe bustˈani ja edˈeni ˌailˈime na kˌuitˈunza.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwaɡˈiza hˈujo ˈm̩tu, ˌakamwambˈia, ˈuko hˈuru kˈula matˈunda ja ˈm̩ti wowˈote katˌika bustˈani.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe usˈile matˈunda ja ˈm̩ti wa kuɟˈua mˈema na mabˈaja, kwa maˈana sˈiku ˌutakˌapokˈula matˈunda jˈake, hakˈika ˌutakˈufa.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, si vjˈema hˈuju ˈm̩tu ˈawe pˈeke jˈake. nˌitamfaɲˈia msˌaidˈizi wa kumfˈaa.|0
bˌasi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefaɲˈiza kutˈoka ˈarði waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini na ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani. ˌakawalˈeta kwa hˈuju ˈm̩tu aˈone ˌatawˌaitˈaɟe, nˈalo ɟˈina lolˈote ˌalilˌokiˈita kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai, likˈawa ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
hˈivjo adˈamu ˌakawˈapa maɟˈina waɲˈama wˈote wa kufˈuɡwa, ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, na waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini. lakˈini kwa adˈamu hˌakupˌatikˈana msˌaidˈizi wa kumfˈaa.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamfˈaɲa adˈamu kulˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito, nˌaje ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamelˈala ˌakatʃukˈua mˈoɟa ja mbˈavu zˈake, ˌakapˌafunˈika mahˈali pˈale kwa ɲˈama.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamfˈaɲa mwanˈamke kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈule ubˈavu ˌaliˌoutʃukˈua kutˈoka kwa hˈujo mwˌanaˈume, ˌakamlˈeta hˈujo mwanˈamke kwa hˈujo mwˌanaˈume.|0
hˈujo mwˌanaˈume ˌakasˈema, hˈuju sˈasa ni mfˈupa wa mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu na ɲˈama ja ɲˈama jˈaŋɡu, ˌataˈitwa mwanˈamke, kwa kˌuwa ˌalitolˈewa katˌika mwˌanaˈume.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌii mwˌanaˈume ˌatamwˈatʃa bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake na kˌuambatˈana na mkˈewe, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa mwˈili mmˈoɟa.|0
adˈamu na mkˈewe wˈote wawˈili wˌalikˈuwa ˈutʃi, wˈala hˌawakuˈona aˈibu.|0
bˌasi ɲˈoka ˌalikˈuwa mwerˈevu kulˈiko waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwafˈaɲa. ɲˈoka ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈamke, ˈati kwˈeli mˈuŋɡu ˌalisˈema, kˈamwe msˈile matˈunda ja ˈm̩ti wowˈote wa bˌustanˈini.|0
mwanˈamke ˌakamɟˈibu ɲˈoka, tˌunawˈeza kˈula matˈunda ja mˈiti ˌilijˈoko bˌustanˈini.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌalisˈema, kˈamwe msˈile tˈunda la ˈm̩ti ulˈio kˌatikˈati ja bustˈani, wˈala kˌuuɡˈusa, la sˈivjo mtakˈufa..|0
lakˈini ɲˈoka ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈamke, hakˈika hˌamtakˈufa.|0
kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌanaɟˈua ja kˌuwa wakˈati mtˌakapojˈala, mˈatʃo jˈenu jˌatafˌumbulˈiwa, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa kˌama mˈuŋɡu, mkiɟˈua mˈema na mabˈaja.|0
mwanˈamke ˌalipoˈona ja kˌuwa tˈunda la ˈm̩ti hˈuo lˌilikˈuwa zˈuri kwa tʃakˈula na la kˌupendˈeza mˈatʃo, tˈena lˌinatˌamanˈika kwa kˌuɟipatˈia hekˈima, bˌasi ˌakatʃˈuma katˌika matˈunda jˈake, akˈala, pˈia akˈampa mumˈewe, ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, nˌaje akˈala.|0
ndˈipo mˈatʃo jˈao wˈote wawˈili jˌakafˌumbulˈiwa, wˌakaɟiˈona kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa ˈutʃi; hˈivjo wˌakaʃˈona maɟˈani ja mtˈini, wˌakaɟˌifunˈika.|0
ndˈipo jˈule mwˌanaˈume na mkˈewe, wˌalipˌosikˈia saˈuti ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitembˈea bˌustanˈini ɟiˈoni, wˌakaɟifˈitʃa kutˈoka mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu kˌatikˈati ja mˈiti ja bustˈani.|0
lakˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwˈita adˈamu, ˈuko wˈapi.|0
nˌaje ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌilikˌusikˈia katˌika bustˈani nˌikaoɡˈopa kwa sabˈabu nˌilikˈuwa ˈutʃi, hˈivjo nˌikaɟifˈitʃa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌalijˌekuambˈia ja kˌuwa ˌulikˈuwa ˈutʃi? ɟˈe, ˌumekˈula matˈunda ja ˈm̩ti nˌiliˌokuamˈuru usˈile.|0
adˈamu ˌakasˈema, hˈuju mwanˈamke ˌulijenˈipa ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˌami ˌalinˈipa sehˈemu ja tˈunda kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈuo ˈm̩ti, nˌami nikˈala.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamˌuulˈiza mwanˈamke, ni nˈini hˈili ambˈalo ˌumelifˈaɲa? mwanˈamke ˌakaɟˈibu, ɲˈoka ˌalinˌidaŋɡˈaɲa, nˌami nikˈala.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia ɲˈoka, kwa kˌuwa ˌumefˈaɲa hˈili, ˌumelˌaanˈiwa kulˈiko waɲˈama wˈote wa kufˈuɡwa na wa porˈini! ˌutatambˈaa kwa tˈumbo lˈako na kˈula mavˈumbi sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
nˌami nˌitawˈeka ˌuadˈui kˈati jˈako na hˈujo mwanˈamke, na kˈati ja uzˈao wˈako na wˈake, jˌeje ˌatakupˈonda kˈitʃwa, nˌawe ˌutamuˈuma kˌisiɡˈino.|0
kwa mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, nˌitakˌuzidiʃˈia sˈana utˈuŋɡu wakˈati wa kuzˈaa kwˈako; kwa utˈuŋɡu ˌutazˈaa watˈoto. tamˈaa jˈako ˌitakˈuwa kwa mumˈeo nˌaje ˌatakˌutawˈala.|0
kwa adˈamu ˌakasˈema, kwa sabˈabu ˌumemsˌikilˈiza ˈm̩ke wˈako na ukˈala kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti nˌiliˌokuamˈuru, msˈile tˈunda lˈake, ˈarði ˌimelˌaanˈiwa kwa sabˈabu jˈako, kwa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu ˌutakˈula tʃakˈula kˌitokˈatʃo hˈumo sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
ˌitazˈaa miˈiba na mˌibarˈuti kwa aɟˈili jˈako, nˌawe ˌutakˈula mimˈea ja ʃambˈani.|0
kwa ɟˈaʃo la ˈuso wˈako ˌutakˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈako hˌadi ˌutakˌaporˈudi arðˈini, kwa kˌuwa ˌulitwalˈiwa kutˈoka hˈumo, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe u mavˈumbi na mˌavumbˈini wˌewe ˌutarˈudi.|0
adˈamu ˌakamwˈita mkˈewe ˈeva, kwa kˌuwa ˌatakˈuwa mˈama wa wˈote walˈio hˈai.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌateŋɡˌenezˈea adˈamu na mkˈewe mavˈazi ja ŋɡˈozi, ˌakawavˈika.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, sˈasa ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌamekˈuwa kˌama mmˈoɟa wˈetu, kwa kuɟˈua mˈema na mabˈaja. ʃˈarti ˌasirˌuhusˈiwe kˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake na kutʃˈuma pˈia kutˈoka ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima akˈala, nˌaje ˌakaˈiʃi milˈele.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌakamfˌukuzˈia mbˈali kutˈoka bustˈani ja edˈeni, ˌakalˈime ˈarði ambˈamo ˌalitolˈewa.|0
baˌada ja kˌumfukuzˈia mbˈali adˈamu, mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˈeka mˌakerˈubi mˌaʃarˈiki ja bustˈani ja edˈeni, pamˈoɟa na upˈaŋɡa wa mˈoto ˌukimulˈika hˈuku na hˌuko kulˈinda ɲɟˈia ja kˌuuendˈea ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima.|0
adˈamu ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na mkˈewe ˈeva, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakamzˈaa kaˈini. ˈeva ˌakasˈema, kwa msaˈada wa bwˈana nˌimemzˈaa mwˌanaˈume.|0
bˌaadˈaje ˌakamzˈaa abˈeli ndˈuɡu jˈake. bˌasi abˈeli akˈawa mfuɡˈaɟi, na kaˈini akˈawa mkulˈima.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda kaˈini ˌakalˈeta baˈaði ja mazˈao ja ʃˈamba kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana.|0
lakˈini abˈeli ˌakalˈeta fˈuŋɡu nˈono kutˈoka baˈaði ja wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mifˈuɡo jˈake. bwˈana ˌakamkubˈali abˈeli pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˈake.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌakumkubˈali kaˈini pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˈake. kwa hˈijo kaˈini ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana, ˈuso wˌake ukˈawa na huzˈuni.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia kaˈini, kwa nˈini ˌumekˌasirˈika? kwa nˈini ˈuso wˈako ˈuna huzˈuni.|0
ˌukifˈaɲa lilˈilo sˈawa, ɟˈe, hˌutakˌubalˈika? lakˈini ˌusipofˈaɲa lilˈilo sˈawa, ðˈambi ˌinakˌuvizˈia mlaŋɡˈoni mwˈako, ˌinakˌutamˈani wˈewe, lakˈini ˌinakupˈasa ˌuiʃˈinde.|0
bˌasi kaˈini ˌakamwambˈia ndˈuɡu jˌake abˈeli, twˈende ʃambˈani. wˌalipokˈuwa ʃambˈani, kaˈini ˌakamʃˌambulˈia abˈeli ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌakamuˈua.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamˌuulˈiza kaˈini, ndˈuɡu jˈako abˈeli jˈuko wˈapi? ˌakamɟˈibu, siɟˈui, ɟˈe, mˌimi ni mlˈinzi wa ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ˌumefˈaɲa nˈini? sˌikilˈiza! dˈamu ja ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌinanˌililˈia mˌimi kutˈoka arðˈini.|0
sˈasa ˌumelˌaanˈiwa na ˌumehamˈiʃwa kutˈoka ˈarði, ambˈajo ˌimefuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kˌupokˈea dˈamu ja ndˈuɡu jˈako kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
ˌutakˌapoilˈima ˈarði, hˌaitakˈupa tˈena mazˈao jˈake. ˌutakˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa dˌuniˈani asˈije na ˌutulˈivu.|0
kaˈini ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, aðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ni zaˈidi ja nˌiwezˈavjo kˌustahimˈili.|0
lˈeo ˌunanˌifukˈuza kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi, nˌami nˌitafˈitʃwa mbˈali na uwˈepo wˈako. nˌitakˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa ˌasijˌetulˈia dˌuniˈani na jejˈote ˌanionˈaje ˌataniˈua.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, la sˈivjo, ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatamuˈua kaˈini ˌatalipˈizwa kisˈasi mˈara sˈaba zaˈidi. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwekˈea kaˈini alˈama ˌili ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌaŋɡemwˈona ˌasimuˈue.|0
kwa hˈijo kaˈini ˌakaondˈoka mbˈele za bwˈana ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja nˈodi, ˌilijˈoko mˌaʃarˈiki ja edˈeni.|0
kaˈini ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na mkˈewe, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba na ˌakamzˈaa enˈoki. wakˈati hˈuo kaˈini ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakauˈita enˈoki ɟˈina la mtˈoto wˈake.|0
enˈoki ˌakamzˈaa irˈadi, irˈadi ˌakamzˈaa mˌehujaˈeli, mˌehujaˈeli ˌakamzˈaa mˌeθuʃaˈeli, na mˌeθuʃaˈeli ˌakamzˈaa lamˈeki.|0
lamˈeki ˌaliˈoa wˌanawˈake wawˈili, mmˈoɟa ˌaliˈitwa ˈada, na mwiŋɡˈine sˈila.|0
ˈada ˌakamzˈaa jabˈali ambˈaje ni bˈaba wa wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika mahˈema na kufˈuɡa waɲˈama.|0
kˈaka jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jubˈali, ˌalijekˈuwa bˈaba wa wˈote wˌapiɡˈao zˈeze na filˈimbi.|0
pˈia sˈila ˌalikˈuwa na mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌalijeˈitwa tubˈali kaˈini ambˈaje ˌalifˈua vifˈaa vja aˈina mbˌalimbˈali vja ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma. naˈama ˌalikˈuwa dˈada wa tubˈali kaˈini.|0
lamˈeki ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌake zˈake, ˈada na sˈila nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi; wˌake wa lamˈeki sˌikiˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu. nˌimemuˈua ˈm̩tu kwa kˌuniɟerˈuhi, kiɟˈana mdˈoɡo kwa kˌuniumˈiza.|0
kˌama kaˈini ˌatalipˈizwa kisˈasi mˈara sˈaba, bˌasi lamˈeki ˌitakˈuwa mˈara sabˈini na sˈaba.|0
adˈamu ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wˌake tˈena, ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, ˌakamwˈita sˈeθi, ˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiɟalˈia mwˈana mwiŋɡˈine badˈala ja abˈeli, kwa kˌuwa kaˈini ˌalimuˈua.|0
nˌaje sˈeθi ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, ˌakamwˈita enˈoʃi. wakˈati hˈuo wˈatu wˌakaˈanza kˌuliitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
hˌii ni orˈoða ˌilijˌoandˈikwa ja vizˈazi vja adˈamu. wakˈati mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌomuˈumba adˈamu, ˌalimfˈaɲa kwa sˈura ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌaliwaˈumba mwˌanaˈume na mwanˈamke, ˌakawˌabarˈiki. wˌalipokwˈiʃa kuˈumbwa, ˌakawaˈita mwˌanadˈamu.|0
adˈamu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, ˌalikˈuwa na mwˈana ˌalijekˈuwa na sˈura jˈake, mwˌeɲe kˌufanˈana nˈaje. ˌakamwˈita sˈeθi.|0
baˌada ja sˈeθi kˌuzalˈiwa, adˈamu ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈane, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
adˈamu ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisanˌa θeleθˈini, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
sˈeθi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟana tˈano, ˌakamzˈaa enˈoʃi.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa enˈoʃi, sˈeθi ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈanena sˈaba, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
sˈeθi ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisa kˈuminambˈili, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
enˈoʃi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka tisˈini, ˌakamzˈaa kenˈani.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa kenˈani, enˈoʃi ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈane kˈuminatˈano, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
enˈoʃi ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisana tˈano, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
kenˈani ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka sabˈini, ˌakamzˈaa mˌahalalˈeli.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa mˌahalalˈeli, kenˈani ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈanenˌa arˌobaˈini, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
kenˈani ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisana kˈumi, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
mˌahalalˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka sitˈini na mitˈano, ˌakamzˈaa jarˈedi.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa jarˈedi, mˌahalalˈeli ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈanenˌa θeleθˈini, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
mˌahalalˈeli ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌianˈane tisˈininatˈano, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
jarˈedi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa sitˈininambˈili, ˌakamzˈaa enˈoki.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa enˈoki, jarˈedi ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌianˈane, nˌaje akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
jarˈedi ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisa sitˈininambˈili, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
enˈoki ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka sitˈini na mitˈano, ˌakamzˈaa mˌeθusˈela.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa mˌeθusˈela, enˈoki ˌalitembˈea na mˈuŋɡu miˈaka mˌiatˈatu, na akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
enˈoki ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈatu sitˈininatˈano.|0
enˈoki ˌakatembˈea na mˈuŋɡu, kˈiʃa ˌakatowˈeka, kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌalimtʃukˈua.|0
mˌeθusˈela ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa θˌemanˈininasˈaba, ˌakamzˈaa lamˈeki.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa lamˈeki, mˌeθusˈela ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiasˈaba θˌemanˈininambˈili, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
mˌeθusˈela ˌaliˈiʃi ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisa sitˈininatˈisa, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
lamˈeki ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa θˌemanˈininambˈili, ˌalimzˈaa mwˈana.|0
ˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake nˈoa, ˌakasˈema, jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetˌufarˈiɟi katˌika kˈazi na mˌaumˈivu makˈali ja mikˈono jˈetu jˌalijˌosababˈiʃwa na ˈarði ˌilijˌolaanˈiwa na bwˈana.|0
baˌada ja nˈoa kˌuzalˈiwa, lamˈeki ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiatˈano tisˈininatˈano, akˈawa na watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
baˌada ja nˈoa kuˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiatˈano, ˌaliwazˈaa ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi.|0
wˈatu wˌalipoˈanza kˌuoŋɡezˈeka idˈadi katˌika ˈuso wa dunˈia na watˈoto wa kˈike wˌakazalˈiwa kwˈao.|0
wˈana wa mˈuŋɡu wˌakawaˈona kˌuwa hˈao bˈinti za wˌanadˈamu wˌalikˈuwa wazˈuri wa sˈura, wˌakaˈoa jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wˌalijˌemtʃaɡˈua.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakasˈema, rˈoho jˈaŋɡu hˌaitˌaʃindˈana na mwˌanadˈamu milˈele, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ni wa kˈufa, sˈiku zˌake zˌitakˈuwa miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini.|0
wˌanefˈili wˌalikuwˈako dˌuniˈani sˈiku hˈizo, na bˌaadˈaje, hˈao wˈana wa mˈuŋɡu wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia kwa bˈinti za wˌanadˈamu na kuzˈaa nˈao. wˌanefˈili wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa na wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟulikˈana wa zamˈani hˈizo.|0
bwˈana ˌakaˈona ɟˈinsi uˈovu wa mwˌanadˈamu ˌulivjokˈuwa mkˈubwa dˌuniˈani, na ja kˌuwa kˈila mwˌelekˈeo wa mawˈazo ja mˈojo wˌake wakˈati wˈote ˌulikˈuwa m̩bˈaja tˈu.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˌikitˈika kwˌamba ˌalimuˈumba mwˌanadˈamu dˌuniˈani, mˈojo wa mˈuŋɡu ˌukaɟˈaa mˌasikitˈiko.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakasˈema, nˌitamfˌutilˈia mbˈali mwˌanadˈamu nˌilijˌemuˈumba kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa dunˈia, wˌanadˈamu na waɲˈama, pamˈoɟa na viˈumbe vˌitambaˈavjo na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani. kwa maˈana nˌasikitˈika kˌuwaˈumba.|0
lakˈini nˈoa ˌakapˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja nˈoa. nˈoa ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa hˈaki, na mkˌamilˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa wakˈati wˈake, tˈena ˌalitembˈea na mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˈoa ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana watˈatu: ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈona ɟˈinsi dunˈia ˌilivjˌoharibˈika, kwa maˈana wˈatu wˈote dˌuniˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌameharˈibu ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia nˈoa, nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu wˈote, kwa kˌuwa dunˈia ˌimeɟˈaa ˌukatˈili kwa sabˈabu jˈao. hakˈika mˌimi nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu pamˈoɟa na dunˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo ɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈee safˈina kˈubwa kwa m̩bˈao za mvˈiɲɟe, tˌeŋɡenˈeza vjˈumba ndˈani jˌake na ˌuipˈake lˈami ndˈani na ɲɟˈe.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjoˌiteŋɡenˈeza: safˈina ˈiwe na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈatu, upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa hamsˈini na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini.|0
ˌiteŋɡˌenezˈee pˈaa na ˌumalizˈie safˈina kwa kuˈatʃa nafˈasi ja ðirˈaa mˈoɟa ɟˈuu. wˈeka mlˈaŋɡo ˌubavˈuni ˌm̩wa safˈina, na ˌuifˈaɲe ja ɣorˈofa ja tʃˈini, ja kˈati na ja ɟˈuu.|0
nˌitalˈeta ɣarˈika ja mˈaɟi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌili kˌuaŋɡamˈiza uhˈai wˈote tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu, kˈila kiˈumbe tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi ja uhˈai ndˈani jˈake. kˈila kˈitu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi kˌitaˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
lakˈini mˌimi nˌitawˈeka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na wˈewe, nˌawe ˌutaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja safˈina, wˌewe pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke wˈako, wanˈao na wˌake zˈao.|0
ˌutaiŋɡˈiza ndˈani ja safˈina kˈila aˈina ja kiˈumbe hˈai wawˈili wawˈili, wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, ˌili kˌuwahifˈaði hˈai pamˈoɟa na wˈewe.|0
wawˈili wa kˈila aˈina ja ndˈeɡe, wa kˈila aˈina ja mɲˈama na wa kˈila aˈina ja kˌitambaˈatʃo arðˈini wˌatakˈuɟa kwˈako ˌili wˌahifaðˈiwe hˈai.|0
ˌutatʃukˈua kˈila aˈina ja tʃakˈula kˌitakˌatʃolˈiwa, na ˌukiwˈeke akˈiba kˌama tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili jˈako na jˈao.|0
nˈoa ˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu kˌama vˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia nˈoa, iŋɡˈia katˌika safˈina wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈako jˈote, kwa sabˈabu katˌika kizˈazi hˈiki nˌimeˈona ja kˌuwa wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
ˌutʃukˈue waɲˈama sˈaba walˈio sˈafi wa kˈila aˈina, wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, na waɲˈama wawˈili wawˈili wa kˈila aˈina walˈio naɟˈisi wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
pˈia ˌutʃukˈue ndˈeɡe sˈaba walˈio sˈafi wa kˈila aˈina, wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, ˌili kˌuhifˈaði aˈina zˈao mbˌalimbˈali katˌika dunˈia jˈote.|0
nˈoa ˌakafˈaɲa jˈote kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru.|0
nˈoa ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka mˌiasˈita ɣarˈika ˌilipokˈuɟa ɟˌuːja dunˈia.|0
nˈoa na mkˈewe na wanˈawe na wˌake zˈao wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika safˈina ˌili wˌaepˈuke ˈile ɣarˈika.|0
ɟˈozi ja waɲˈama walˈio sˈafi na walˈio naɟˈisi, ndˈeɡe na viˈumbe vˌitambaˈavjo.|0
wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, wˌalikˈuɟa kwa nˈoa wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika safˈina kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru nˈoa.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku sˈaba, mˈaɟi ja ɣarˈika jakˈaɟa ɟˌuːja dunˈia.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na sˈaba ja mwˈezi wa pˈili mwˈaka wa mˌiasˈita wa kuˈiʃi kwˈake nˈoa, sˈiku hˈijo ndˈipo tʃemtʃˈemi zˈote hˌata zilˈizo tʃˈini sˈana ja ˈarði zˌilibˌubuɟˈika kwa ŋɡˈuvu, na malˈaŋɡo ja mˌafurˈiko ja mbiŋɡˈuni jˌakafˌuŋɡulˈiwa.|0
sˈiku hˈijo nˈoa, na mkˈewe, na wanˈawe ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˈao wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈile safˈina.|0
nˌao wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na kˈila mɲˈama wa mwitˈuni kˌufuatˈana na aˈina jˈake, waɲˈama wˈote wˌafuɡwˈao kˌufuatˈana na aˈina zˈao, kˈila kiˈumbe kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði kwa aˈina jˈake, na kˈila ndˈeɡe kˌufuatˈana na aˈina jˈake, nˈaam kˈila kiˈumbe tʃˌeɲe mabˈawa.|0
viˈumbe vjˈote vjˌeɲe pˈumzi ja uhˈai ndˈani jˌake vikˈaɟa kwa nˈoa viwˈili viwˈili, vˌikaiŋɡˈia katˌika safˈina.|0
waɲˈama wˌaliˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika safˈina wˌalikˈuwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, wa kˈila kiˈumbe tʃˌeɲe uhˈai kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru nˈoa, ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamfuŋɡˈia ndˈani.|0
kwa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini mˌafurˈiko jˌaliˌendelˈea kuɟˈaa dˌuniˈani na mˈaɟi jˌalivjozˈidi kˌuoŋɡezˈeka, jˌaliinˈua safˈina ɟˈuu sˈana kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakaɟˈaa na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka sˈana ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, na safˈina ˌikaelˈea ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mˈaɟi.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakazˈidi kuɟˈaa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, jˌakaˌifunˈika milˈima jˈote mirˈefu tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu jˈote.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakaˌendelˈea kuɟˈaa jˌakaˌifunˈika milˈima kwa kˈina tʃa zaˈidi ja ðirˈaa kˈumi na tˈano.|0
kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi kˌikaˌaŋɡamˈia: ndˈeɡe, waɲˈama wa kufˈuɡwa, waɲˈama pˈori, viˈumbe vjˈote ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi na wˌanadˈamu wˈote.|0
kˈila kiˈumbe ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi ja uhˈai kikˈafa.|0
kˈila kˈitu tʃˌeɲe uhˈai ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi kˌilifˌutilˈiwa mbˈali, wˈatu, waɲˈama, viˈumbe vˌitambaˈavjo na ndˈeɡe wˌarukˈao aŋɡˈani wˌakafˌutilˈiwa mbˈali tˌoka dˌuniˈani. wˌaliobˈaki ni nˈoa pˈeke jˌake na wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje ndˈani ja safˈina.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakaˌifunˈika dunˈia kwa sˈiku mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamkumbˈuka nˈoa na waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini na wa kufˈuɡwa wˌaliokˈuwa nˌaje ndˈani ja safˈina, ˌakatˈuma upˈepo ˌukavˈuma katˌika dunˈia, nˈajo mˈaɟi jˌakaondˈoka.|0
zˈile tʃemtʃˈemi zilˈizo tʃˈini sˈana ja ˈarði pamˈoɟa na malˈaŋɡo ja mˌafurˈiko ja mbiŋɡˈuni jakˈawa jˌamefˈuŋɡwa nˈajo mvˈua ikˈawa ˌimekˈoma kuɲˈeʃa kutˈoka aŋɡˈani.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakaˌendelˈea kˌupuŋɡˈua tˌaratˈibu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. kunˈako mwˈiʃo wa sˈiku ja mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini, mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa jˌamepuŋɡˈua.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na sˈaba ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, safˈina ˌikatˈua katˌika milˈima ja ˌararˈati.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakaˌendelˈea kˌupuŋɡˈua hˌadi mwˈezi wa kˈumi, na sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi, vilˈele vja milˈima vˌikaˌonekˈana.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku ˌarobaˈini nˈoa ˌakafuŋɡˈua dirˈiʃa ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamelifˈaɲa katˌika safˈina.|0
na ˌakamtˈoa kuŋɡˈuru, akˈawa ˌakirˈuka kwˈenda na kurˈudi mpˈaka mˈaɟi jˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌukaˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamtˈoa hˈua ˌili aˈone kˌama mˈaɟi jˌameondˈoka ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈarði.|0
lakˈini hˈua hˌakupˈata mahˈali pa kutˈua kwa kˌuwa mˈaɟi jˌalienˈea ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia jˈote, kwa hˈijo ˌakarˈudi kwa nˈoa ndˈani ja safˈina. nˈoa ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono ˌakamtʃukˈua jˈule hˈua ˌakamrudˈiʃa ndˈani ja safˈina.|0
nˈoa ˌakaŋɡoɟˈea sˈiku sˈaba zaˈidi kˈiʃa ˌakamtˈoa tˈena hˈua kutˈoka safˈina.|0
wakˈati hˈua ˌalipˌoreɟˈea kwa nˈoa ɟiˈoni, ˌalikˈuwa ˌametʃukˈua katˌika mdˈomo wˌake ɟˈani bˈitʃi la mzˌeitˈuni, lˌililotʃˈumwa wakˈati ˈule ˈule! ndˈipo nˈoa ˌakaɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˈaɟi jˌameondˈoka ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
ˌakaŋɡoɟˈea sˈiku sˈaba zaˈidi na ˌakamtˈuma tˈena hˈua, lakˈini wakˈati hˈuu hˈua hˌakurˈudi tˈena kwa nˈoa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza ja mwˈaka mˌiasˈitana mˈoɟa, wa kuˈiʃi kwˈake nˈoa, mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa jˌamekaˈuka dˌuniˈani. kˈiʃa nˈoa ˌakafuŋɡˈua mlˈaŋɡo wa safˈina ˌakaˈona ja kˌuwa ˈuso wa ˈarði ˌulikˈuwa ˌumekaˈuka.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba ja mwˈezi wa pˈili dunˈia ˌilikˈuwa ˌimekaˈuka kabˈisa.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia nˈoa.|0
tˌoka ndˈani ja safˈina, wˌewe na m̩kˈeo na wanˈao na wˌake zˈao.|0
utˈoe ɲɟˈe kˈila aˈina ja kiˈumbe hˈai alˈije pamˈoɟa nˈawe: ndˈeɡe, waɲˈama na viˈumbe vjˈote vˌitambaˈavjo ɟˌuːja ˈarði, ˌili wˌakazˈae, na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka na kˌuiɟˈaza tˈena dunˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo nˈoa ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe pamˈoɟa na mkˈewe, wanˈawe na wˌake zˈao.|0
waɲˈama wˈote na viˈumbe vjˈote vˌitambaˈavjo ɟˌuːja ˈarði na ndˈeɡe wˈote, kˈila kˈitu kˌiendˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, aˈina mˈoɟa baˌada ja ɲiŋɡˈine vˌikatˈoka katˌika safˈina, kˈila aˈina ja kiˈumbe, kimˈoɟa baˌada ja kiŋɡˈine.|0
bwˈana ˌakasikˈia harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌupendˈeza, nˌaje ˌakasˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, kˈamwe sˌitaˌilaˈani tˈena ˈarði kwa sabˈabu ja mwˌanadˈamu, hˌata iŋɡˈawa kˈila mwˌelekˈeo wa mˈojo wˌake ni m̩bˈaja ʃˈu uɟˈana. kˈamwe sˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza tˈena viˈumbe hˈai vjˈote kˌama nˌilivjofˈaɲa.|0
kwa mˈuda dunˈia ˌidumˈupo, wakˈati wa kupˈanda na wa kuvˈuna, wakˈati wa barˈidi na wa ɟˈoto, wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi na wa masˈika, usˈiku na mtʃˈana kˈamwe hˌavitakˈoma.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakambarˈiki nˈoa na wanˈawe, ˌakiwˌaambˈia, zaˈeni mkˌaoŋɡezˈeke kwa idˈadi na mkˌaiɟˈaze tˈena dunˈia.|0
waɲˈama wˈote wa dˌuniˈani, ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani, kˈila kiˈumbe kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði, na samˈaki wˈote wa bˌaharˈini wˌamekˌabiðˈiwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌao wˌatawˌaoɡˈopa na kˌuwahˈofu.|0
kˈila kˈitu tʃˌeɲe uhˈai kˌiendˈatʃo kˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃˈenu. kˌama vˈile nˌilivjowˈapa mimˈea mbˌalimbˈali, sˈasa nawˈapa kˈila kˈitu.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe msˈile ɲˈama ambˈajo bˈado ˈina dˈamu ja uhˈai wˈake, kwa maˈana dˈamu ni uhˈai.|0
hakˈika dˈamu ja uhˈai wˈenu nˌitaidˈai. nˌitaidˈai kutˈoka kwa kˈila mɲˈama. kutˈoka kwa kˈila mwˌanadˈamu pˈia nˌitaidˈai kwa aɟˈili ja uhˈai wa ˈm̩tu mwenzˈake.|0
jejˈote ˌamwaɡˈaje dˈamu ja mwˌanadˈamu, dˈamu jˌake ˌitamwˈaɡwa na mwˌanadˈamu, kwa kˌuwa katˌika mfˈano wa mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu ˌalimuˈumba mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kuhˈusu nˈiɲi, zaˈeni mwˌoŋɡezˈeke kwa wˈiŋɡi, mzˈidi katˌika dunˈia na kˌuiɟˈaza.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia nˈoa na wanˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
sˈasa mˌimi nˌinawˈeka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˈaɲi, pamˈoɟa na uzˈao wˈenu baˌada jˈenu.|0
pˈia na kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌilitʃokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi: ndˈeɡe, waɲˈama wa kufˈuɡwa na waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini, wˈale wˈote wˌaliotˈoka katˌika safˈina pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai dˌuniˈani.|0
nˌinawˈeka aɡˈano nˈaɲi: kˈamwe uhˈai hˌautafˈutwa tˈena kwa ɣarˈika, kˈamwe hˌaitˌakuwˈepo tˈena ɣarˈika ja kˌuaŋɡamˈiza dunˈia.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, hˌii ni iʃˈara ja aɡˈano nˌinalofˈaɲa kˈati jˈaŋɡu na nˈiɲi na kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kilˈitʃo pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, aɡˈano kwa vizˈazi vjˈote viɟˈavjo.|0
nˌimewˈeka upˈinde wˈaŋɡu wa mvˈua mˌawiŋɡˈuni, nˌao ˌutakˈuwa iʃˈara ja aɡˈano nˌifaɲˈalo kˈati jˈaŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
wakˈati wowˈote nˌinapotˈanda mawˈiŋɡu ɟˌuːja dunˈia na upˈinde wa mvˈua ˌukiɟˌitokˈeza mˌawiŋɡˈuni.|0
nˌitakumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu kˈati jˈaŋɡu na nˈiɲi na viˈumbe vjˈote vilˈivjo hˈai vja kˈila aˈina. kˈamwe mˈaɟi hˌajatakˈuwa tˈena ɣarˈika ja kˌuaŋɡamˈiza uhˈai wˈote.|0
wakˈati wowˈote upˈinde wa mvˈua ˌunapˌotokˈea mˌawiŋɡˈuni, nˌitauˈona na kˌukumbˈuka aɡˈano la milˈele kˈati ja mˈuŋɡu na viˈumbe vjˈote vilˈivjo hˈai vja kˈila aˈina dˌuniˈani.|0
hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia nˈoa, hˌii n̩dˈijo iʃˈara ja aɡˈano ambˈalo nˌimelifˈaɲa kˈati jˈaŋɡu na viˈumbe vjˈote vilˈivjo hˈai dˌuniˈani.|0
wˈana wa nˈoa wˌaliotˈoka ndˈani ja safˈina nˈi: ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi. hˈamu n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa kˌanaˈani..|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana watˈatu wa nˈoa, kˌutokˈana nˌao wˈatu wˌalienˈea katˌika dunˈia.|0
nˈoa akˈawa mkulˈima, akˈawa ˈm̩tu wa kwˈanza kupˈanda mˌizabˈibu.|0
ˌalipokˈuɲua hˈuo mvˈiɲo wˌake ˌakalˈewa na ˌakalˈala ˈutʃi kwˈeɲe hˈema lˈake.|0
hˈamu, bˈaba wa kˌanaˈani, ˌakauˈona ˈutʃi wa bˈaba jˌake na kˌuwaelˈeza ndˈuɡu zˌake wawˈili wˌaliokˈuwa ɲɟˈe.|0
lakˈini ʃˈemu na jafˈeθi wˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡˈuo wˌakaitˈanda mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao wˈote wawˈili, kˈiʃa wˌakaˈenda kˌiɲumeɲˈume, wˌakaˌufunˈika ˈutʃi wa bˈaba jˈao. ɲˈuso zˈao zˌiliˌelekˈea upˈande mwiŋɡˈine ˌili wˌasiuˈone ˈutʃi wa bˈaba jˈao.|0
nˈoa ˌalipˌolevˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mvˈiɲo wˌake na kuɟˈua lˈile ambˈalo mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo kulˈiko wˈote ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamemtendˈea.|0
ˌakasˈema, ˌalaanˈiwe kˌanaˈani! ˌatakˈuwa mtˈumwa wa tʃˈini sˈana kulˈiko watˈumwa wˈote kwa ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
pˈia ˌakasˈema, ˌabarikˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ʃˈemu! kˌanaˈani na ˈawe mtˈumwa wa ʃˈemu.|0
mˈuŋɡu na ˌapanˈue mipˈaka ja jafˈeθi; jafˈeθi na aˈiʃi katˌika mahˈema ja ʃˈemu, na kˌanaˈani na ˈawe mtˈumwa wˈake.|0
baˌada ja ɣarˈika nˈoa ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiatˈatunˌa hamsˈini.|0
nˈoa ˌalikˈuwa na ɟˈumla ja miˈaka mˌiatˈisanˌa hamsˈini, ndˈipo akˈafa.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wazˈao wa nˈoa: ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi, ambˈao wˌalizˈaa wˈana baˌada ja ɣarˈika.|0
wˈana wa jafˈeθi wˌalikˈuwa: ɡomˈeri, maɡˈoɡu, madˈai, javˈani, tubˈali, meʃˈeki na tirˈasi.|0
wˈana wa ɡomˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: ˌaʃkenˈazi, rifˈaθi na toɡˈarma.|0
wˈana wa javˈani wˌalikˈuwa: elˈiʃa, tarʃˈiʃi, kitˈimu na rˌodanˈimu.|0
kˌutokˈana na hˈawa mˌataˈifa ja pwˈani jˌalienˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈao, kwa kˈoo zˈao katˌika mˌataˈifa jˈao, kˈila mˈoɟa kwa lˈuɣa jˈake..|0
wˈana wa hˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: kˈuʃi, mˌisraˈimu, pˈutu na kˌanaˈani.|0
wˈana wa kˈuʃi wˌalikˈuwa: sˈeba, havˈila, sˈabta, raˈama na sabtˈeka. wˈana wa raˈama wˌalikˈuwa: ʃˈeba na dedˈani.|0
kˈuʃi ˌakamzˈaa nimrˈodi, ambˈaje ˌalikˈua akˈawa ˈm̩tu ʃuɟˈaa dˌuniˈani.|0
ˌalikˈuwa mwindˈaɟi hodˈari mbˈele za bwˈana. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˈatu husˈema, kˌama nimrˈodi, hodˈari wa kuwˈinda mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
vitˈuo vjˈake vja kwˈanza katˌika ufˈalme wˌake vˌilikˈuwa babˈeli, erˈeki, akˈadi na kˈalne katˌika ʃinˈari.|0
kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ˌalikwˈenda aʃˈuru, ambˈako ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa ninˈawi, rˌehoboθˈiri, kˈala.|0
na resˈeni, ilˈijo kˈati ja ninˈawi na kˈala; hˈuo n̩dˈio ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa.|0
mˌisraˈimu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa: walˈudi, wˌaanˈami, wˌalehˈabi, wˌanaftˈuhi.|0
kˌanaˈani ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa: sidˈoni mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, hˈeθi.|0
wˌajebˈusi, wˌaamˈori, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi.|0
wahˈivi, wˌaarˈiki, wasˈini.|0
wˌaarvˈadi, wˌasemˈari na wˌahamˈaθi. bˌaadˈaje kˈoo za wˌakanaˈani zˌilitˌawaɲˈika.|0
na mipˈaka ja kˌanaˈani ˌilienˈea kutˈoka sidˈoni kˌuelekˈea ɡerˈari hˌadi ɡˈaza, kˈiʃa kˌuelekˈea sodˈoma, ɡomˈora, ˈadma na sˌeboˈimu, hˌadi kˌufikˈia lˈaʃa.|0
hˈawa ni wˈana wa hˈamu kwa kˈoo zˈao na lˈuɣa zˈao, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈao na mˌataˈifa jˈao.|0
ʃˈemu ambˈaje ni ndˈuɡu mkˈubwa wa jafˈeθi, kwˈake kˌulizalˈiwa wˈana pˈia. ʃˈemu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa wˈana wˈote wa ebˈeri.|0
wˈana wa ʃˈemu wˌalikˈuwa: elˈamu, aʃˈuru, ˌarfaksˈadi, lˈudi na arˈamu.|0
wˈana wa arˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: ˈusi, hˈuli, ɡeθˈeri na meʃˈeki.|0
ˌarfaksˈadi ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ʃˈela, nˌaje ʃˈela ˌakamzˈaa ebˈeri.|0
ebˈeri ˌakapˈata wˈana wawˈili: mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌaliˈitwa pelˈeɡi, kwa kˌuwa wakˈati wˌake ndˈipo dunˈia ˌiliɡˌawaɲˈika; nduɡˈuje ˌaliˈitwa joktˈani.|0
joktˈani ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa: ˌalmodˈadi, ʃelˈefu, hˌasarmawˈeθi, jˈera.|0
hˌadorˈamu, uzˈali, dˈikla.|0
obˈali, ˌabimaˈeli, ʃˈeba.|0
ofˈiri, havˈila na jobˈabu. hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa joktˈani.|0
ˈn̩tʃi wˌalijoˈiʃi ˌilienˈea tˌoka mˈeʃa kˌuelekˈea sefˈari kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ˌilijˈoko mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
hˈao n̩dˈio wˈana wa ʃˈemu kwa kˈoo zˈao na lˈuɣa zˈao, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈao na mˌataˈifa jˈao.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo kˈoo za wˈana wa nˈoa, kˌufuatˈana na vizˈazi vjˈao, katˌika mˌataˈifa jˈao. kˌutokˈana na hˈawa mˌataˈifa jˌalienˈea dˌuniˈani kˈote baˌada ja ɣarˈika.|0
wakˈati hˈuo dunˈia jˈote ˌilikˈuwa na lˈuɣa mˈoɟa na msˈemo mmˈoɟa.|0
wˈatu wˌalipˌoelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ʃinˈari nˌao wˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
wˌakasˌemezˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, ɲɟoˈoni, tˌufjatˈue mˌatofˈali na tˌujatʃˈome vizˈuri kwa mˈoto. wˌalitumˈia mˌatofˈali badˈala ja mˈawe, na lˈami kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuʃikˌamaniʃˈia hˈajo mˌatofˈali.|0
ndˈipo wˌakasˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, tˌuɟiɟeŋɡˈee ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe mnˈara ambˈao ˌutafˈika hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌili tˌuɟipatˈie ɟˈina tusˈiɟe tˌukatˌawaɲˈika usˈoni pa dunˈia jˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ikˈiwa kˌama taˈifa mˈoɟa wˌanaˌozuŋɡˈumza lˈuɣa mˈoɟa wˌameˈanza kufˈaɲa hˈili, bˌasi hakˈuna lolˈote wˌatakˌalopˈaŋɡa kufˈaɲa ambˈalo hˌalitˌawezekˈana kwˈao.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, tuʃˈuke tˌuvurˈuɡe lˈuɣa jˈao ˌili wˌasiˌelewˈane wˌao kwa wˈao.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakawˌatawˈaɲa kutˈoka mahˈali pˈale kwˈenda katˌika dunˈia jˈote, nˌao wˌakaˈatʃa kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
n̩dˈijo maˈana pˌakaˈitwa babˈeli, kwa sabˈabu hˈapo ndˈipo bwˈana ˌalipˌoivurˈuɡa lˈuɣa ja dunˈia nzˈima. kutˈoka hˈapo bwˈana ˌakawˌatawˈaɲa katˌika ˈuso wa dunˈia jˈote.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja ʃˈemu. miˈaka miwˈili baˌada ja ɣarˈika, ʃˈemu ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa, ˌakamzˈaa ˌarfaksˈadi.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈaa ˌarfaksˈadi, ʃˈemu ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiatˈano, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
wakˈati ˌarfaksˈadi ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mitˈano, ˌakamzˈaa ʃˈela.|0
baˌada ja ˌarfaksˈadi kumzˈaa ʃˈela, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiaˈn̩nena tˈatu, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
ʃˈela ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini, ˌakamzˈaa ebˈeri.|0
ʃˈela baˌada ja kumzˈaa ebˈeri, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiaˈn̩nena tˈatu, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
ebˈeri ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mˈinne, ˌakamzˈaa pelˈeɡi.|0
baˌada ja ebˈeri kumzˈaa pelˈeɡi, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa θeleθˈini, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
pelˈeɡi ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini, ˌakamzˈaa rˈeu.|0
baˌada ja pelˈeɡi kumzˈaa rˈeu, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiambˈilina tˈisa, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
rˈeu ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na miwˈili, ˌakamzˈaa serˈuɡi.|0
baˌada ja rˈeu kumzˈaa serˈuɡi, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiambˈilina sˈaba, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
serˈuɡi ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini, ˌakamzˈaa nahˈori.|0
baˌada ja serˈuɡi kumzˈaa nahˈori, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiambˈili, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
baˌada ja nahˈori kumzˈaa tˈera, ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa kˈuminatˈisa, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto weŋɡˈine wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
tˈera ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka sabˈini, ˌakamzˈaa abrˈamu, nahˈori na harˈani.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wazˈao wa tˈera. tˈera ˌaliwazˈaa abrˈamu, nahˈori na harˈani. harˈani ˌakamzˈaa lˈoti.|0
tˈera ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado hˈai, harˈani akˈafa hˌuko ˈuru ja wˌakaldˈajo, ˈn̩tʃi ˌalimˌozalˈiwa.|0
abrˈamu na nahˈori wˌaliˈoa. ˈm̩ke wa abrˈamu ˌaliˈitwa sarˈai, na ˈm̩ke wa nahˈori ˌaliˈitwa mˈilka; mˈilka na ˈiska wˌalikˈuwa watˈoto wa harˈani.|0
sarˈai ˌalikˈuwa tˈasa, hakˈuwa na watˈoto.|0
tˈera ˌakamtʃukˈua abrˈamu mwanˈawe, lˈoti mwˈana wa harˈani mwanˈawe, na sarˈai mkwˈewe, ˈm̩ke wa abrˈamu mwanˈawe, wˌakatˈoka kwa pamˈoɟa katˌika ˈuru ja wˌakaldˈajo kwˈenda ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani. lakˈini wˌalipofˈika harˈani, wˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
bwˈana akˈawa ˌamemwambˈia abrˈamu, ondˈoka kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, uˈatʃe ɟamˈii jˈako na ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako, uˈende hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi nˌitakˌajokˌuoɲˈeʃa.|0
mˌimi nˌitakufˈaɲa taˈifa kˈubwa na nˌitakˌubarˈiki, nˌitalikˈuza ɟˈina lˈako, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa barˈaka.|0
nˌitawˌabarˈiki wˈale wˌanaˌokubarˈiki, na jejˈote ˌakulˌaanˈije nˌitamlaˈani; na kˌupitˈia kwˈako mˌataˈifa jˈote dˌuniˈani jˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
hˈivjo abrˈamu ˌakaondˈoka kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia; nˌaje lˈoti ˌakaondˈoka pamˈoɟa nˈaje. wakˈati abrˈamu ˌalipoˈitwa ˌaondˈoke harˈani, ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka sabˈini na mitˈano.|0
abrˈamu ˌakamtʃukˈua sarˈai mkˈewe pamˈoɟa na lˈoti mwˈana wa ndˈuɡu jˈake, mˈali zˈote wˌalizokˈuwa nˈazo pamˈoɟa na wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewapˈata hˌuko harˈani, wˌakasafˈiri mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wˌakafˈika hˌuko.|0
abrˈamu ˌakasafˈiri katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˌakafˈika hˌuko ʃekˈemu, mahˈali pˈeɲe ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni ˌuliˈoko mˈore. wakˈati hˈuo wˌakanaˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea abrˈamu, ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitawˈapa uzˈao wˈako ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. hˈivjo hˈapa ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea mˌaðabˈahu bwˈana ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemtokˈea.|0
kutˈoka hˌuko abrˈamu ˌakasafˈiri kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe vilˈima mˌaʃarˈiki ja beθˈeli, nˌaje ˌakapˈiɡa hˈema hˌuko, beθˈeli ikˈiwa upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi na ˈai upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. hˌuko ˌalimɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu na ˌakalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa abrˈamu ˌakasafˈiri kˌuelekˈea upˈande wa neɡˈebu.|0
bˌasi kˌulikuwˈako na ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, nˌaje abrˈamu ˌakaʃˈuka kwˈenda mˈisri kukˈaa hˌuko kwa mˈuda, kwa maˈana ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa karˈibu kˌuiŋɡˈia mˈisri, ˌakamwambˈia sarˈai mkˈewe, nˌinaɟˈua ja kwˌamba wˌewe ni mwanˈamke mzˈuri wa sˈura.|0
wakˈati wamˈisri wˌatakˌapokuˈona, wˌatasˈema, hˈuju ni ˈm̩ke wˈake. ndˈipo wˌataniˈua, lakˈini wˌewe wˌatakuˈatʃa hˈai.|0
sˈema wˌewe ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, ˌili nˌitendˈewe mˈema kwa aɟˈili jˈako, na maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌatahˌifaðˈiwa kwa sabˈabu jˈako.|0
abrˈamu ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia mˈisri, wamˈisri wˌakamwˈona sarˈai kˌuwa ni mwanˈamke mzˈuri sˈana wa sˈura.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwaðˈibu farˈao na ɲˈumba jˌake kwa marˈaði ja kufˈiʃa kwa sabˈabu ja kˌumtʃukˈua sarˈai, ˈm̩ke wa abrˈamu.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakamwˈita abrˈamu, ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌumenˌifaɲˈia nˈini? kwa nˈini hˌukunˌiambˈia ni ˈm̩ke wˈako.|0
kwa nˈini ˌulisˈema, jˌeje ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, hˌata nˌikamtʃukˈua kˌuwa ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu? sˈasa bˈasi, ˈm̩ke wˈako hˈuju hˈapa. mtʃukˈue uˈende zˈako.|0
kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakawˈapa wˈatu wˌake ˈamri kuhˈusu abrˈamu, wˌakamsˌindikˈiza pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke wˌake na kˈila ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo.|0
hˈivjo abrˈamu ˌakakwˈea kutˈoka mˈisri kwˈenda neɡˈebu, jˌeje na mkˈewe na kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo, pˈia lˈoti ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wakˈati hˈuo abrˈamu ˌalikˈuwa taɟˈiri sˈana wa mifˈuɡo, fˈeða na ðahˈabu.|0
kutˈoka neɡˈebu, ˌakapˈita mahˈali hˌadi mahˈali, hˌadi ˌakafˈika beθˈeli, mahˈali hˈapo ambˈapo mwanzˈoni ˌalipˈiɡa hˈema lˈake kˈati ja beθˈeli na ˈai.|0
hˈapo ambˈapo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ja kwˈanza. hˌuko abrˈamu ˌakalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
bˌasi lˈoti, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌanafˌuatˈana na abrˈamu, ˌalikˈuwa pˈia na makˈundi ja mbˈuzi, kondˈoo, ŋɡˈombe na mahˈema.|0
lakˈini ˈn̩tʃi hˌaikˌuwatˈoʃa kukˈaa pamˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈiŋɡi wa mˈali zˈao.|0
ˌukazˈuka uɡˈomvi kˈati ja watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo wa abrˈamu na wˈale wa lˈoti. wakˈati hˈuo, wˌakanaˈani na wˌaperˈizi n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
hˈivjo abrˈamu ˌakamwambˈia lˈoti, pasˈiwe na uɡˈomvi wowˈote kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˈewe, wˈala kˈati ja wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu na wˈako, kwa kˌuwa sˌisi ni ndˈuɡu.|0
ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote haˈiko mbˈele jˈako? tˌuteŋɡˈane. kˌama ˌukiˌelekˈea kuʃˈoto, nˌitakwˈenda kulˈia; kˌama ˌukiˌelekˈea kulˈia, mˌimi nˌitakwˈenda kuʃˈoto.|0
lˈoti ˌakatazˈama ˌakaˈona lˈile bˈonde lˈote la jordˈani kˌuwa lˌilikˈuwa na mˈaɟi tˈele, kˌama bustˈani ja bwˈana, kˌama ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kˌuelekˈea soˈari. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa kˈabla bwˈana hˌaɟaharˈibu sodˈoma na ɡomˈora..|0
hˈivjo lˈoti ˌakaɟˌitʃaɡulˈia bˈonde lˈote la jordˈani, ˌakaˌelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. wˈatu hˈao wawˈili wˌakateŋɡˈana.|0
abrˈamu ˌakaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wakˈati lˈoti ˌaliˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiɟi ja lˈile bˈonde na kupˈiɡa mahˈema jˌake karˈibu na sodˈoma.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wa sodˈoma wˌalikˈuwa waˈovu, wˌakifˈaɲa sˈana ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana.|0
baˌada ja lˈoti kˌuondˈoka bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia abrˈamu, ukˈiwa hˈapo ulˈipo, inˈua mˈatʃo jˈako ˌutazˈame kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini, mˌaʃarˈiki na mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌunajˌoiˈona nˌitakˈupa wˌewe na uzˈao wˈako hˌata milˈele.|0
nˌitaufˈaɲa uzˈao wˈako ˈuwe mwˈiŋɡi kˌama mavˈumbi ja ˈn̩tʃi, hˈivjo kˌama kˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌuhesˈabu mavˈumbi, bˌasi uzˈao wˈako ˌutahˌesabˈika.|0
ondˈoka, tembˈea katˌika marˈefu na mapˈana ja ˈn̩tʃi, kwa maˈana nˌinakˈupa wˈewe.|0
bˌasi abrˈamu ˌakaondˈoa mahˈema jˈake, ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi karˈibu na mˌialˈoni ja mˈamre hˌuko hebrˈoni, hˌuko ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ˌamrafˈeli mfˈalme wa ʃinˈari, ˌariˈoko mfˈalme wa ˌelasˈari, kˌedorlaˈoma mfˈalme wa elˈamu, na tidˈali mfˈalme wa ɡoˈimu.|0
kwa pamˈoɟa wˌalikwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja bˈera mfˈalme wa sodˈoma, bˈirʃa mfˈalme wa ɡomˈora, ʃinˈabu mfˈalme wa ˈadma, ʃˌemebˈeri mfˈalme wa sˌeboˈimu, na mfˈalme wa bˈela jaˈani soˈari.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌaliotˈaɟua mwiʃˈoni wˌaliˌuŋɡanˈiʃa maɟˈeʃi jˈao kutˈoka bˈonde la sidˈimu jaˈani bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi.|0
wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌawalˈiwa na mfˈalme kˌedorlaˈoma kwa miˈaka kˈumi na miwˈili, lakˈini mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈatu wˌaliˈasi.|0
mnˈamo mwˈaka wa kˈumi na ˈn̩ne, mfˈalme kˌedorlaˈoma na wafˈalme wˌaliˌoɟiˈuŋɡa nˌaje wˌalikwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana na kˌuwaʃˈinda wˌarefˈai katˌika aʃtˈaroθ kˌanaˈimu, wazˈuzi katˌika hˈamu, waˈemi katˌika ʃˈawe kˌiriˌaθaˈimu.|0
na wahˈori katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kilˈima tʃa seˈiri, hˌadi ˈel parˈani karˈibu na ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakarˈudi wˌakaˈenda ˈen misfˈati jaˈani kadˈeʃi, wˌakaʃˈinda ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja wˌaamalˈeki, pamˈoɟa na wˌaamˈori wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi hasˈason tamˈari.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme wa sodˈoma, mfˈalme wa ɡomˈora, mfˈalme wa ˈadma, mfˈalme wa sˌeboˈimu, na mfˈalme wa bˈela jaˈani soˈari wˌakatˈoka kupˈaŋɡa maɟˈeʃi jˈao kwˈeɲe bˈonde la sidˈimu.|0
ðˈidi ja kˌedorlaˈoma, mfˈalme wa elˈamu, tidˈali mfˈalme wa ɡoˈimu, ˌamrafˈeli mfˈalme wa ʃinˈari, na ˌariˈoko mfˈalme wa ˌelasˈari, jaˈani wafˈalme wˈanne ðˈidi ja wafˈalme watˈano.|0
bˌasi bˈonde la sidˈimu lˌilikˈuwa lˌimeɟˈaa maʃˈimo ja lˈami, nˌao wafˈalme wa sodˈoma na wa ɡomˈora wˌalipˌokimbˈia, baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌalitˌumbukˈia hˌuko na weŋɡˈine wˌakakˌimbilˈia vˌilimˈani.|0
wˈale wafˈalme wˈanne wˌakatˈeka mˈali jˈote ja sodˈoma na ɡomˈora pamˈoɟa na vjakˈula vjˈao vjˈote, kˈiʃa wˌakaˈenda zˈao.|0
pˈia wˌalimtˈeka lˈoti mwˈana wa ndˈuɡu jˌake abrˈamu pamˈoɟa na mˈali zˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈiʃi sodˈoma.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametorˈoka akˈaɟa kˈumpa abrˈamu mwˌebranˈia tˌaarˈifa. wakˈati hˈuu abrˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi karˈibu na mˌialˈoni ja mˈamre mwamˈori, ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈuɡu jˌake eʃkˈoli na anˈeri, ambˈao wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌameuŋɡˈana na abrˈamu.|0
wakˈati wa usˈiku abrˈamu ˌaliwaɡˈawa wˈatu wˌake katˌika vikˈosi ˌili ˌawaʃˌambulˈie, na ˌakawˌafuˌatilˈia, ˌakawˌafukˈuza hˌadi hˈoba, kˌaskazˈini ja damˈeski.|0
ˌakarudˈiʃa mˈali zˈote, na ˌakamrudˈiʃa lˈoti ɟamˈaa jˌake na mˈali zˈake, pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake na wˈatu weŋɡˈine.|0
abrˈamu ˌaliporˈudi baˌada ja kumʃˈinda mfˈalme kˌedorlaˈoma na wˈale wafˈalme wˌaliˌoɟiˈuŋɡa nˈaje, mfˈalme wa sodˈoma ˌakatˈoka kwˈenda kumlˈaki katˌika bˈonde la ʃˈawe jaˈani bˈonde la mfˈalme.|0
ndˈipo mˌelkizedˈeki mfˈalme wa salˈemu ˌalipolˈeta mkˈate na divˈai. ˌalikˈuwa kuhˈani wa mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
nˌaje ˌakambarˈiki abrˈamu, ˌakisˈema, ˌabarikˈiwe abrˈamu na mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌabarikˈiwe mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, ambˈaje ˌamewawˈeka adˈui zˈako mkonˈoni mwˈako. ndˈipo abrˈamu akˈampa mˌelkizedˈeki sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja kˈila kˈitu.|0
mfˈalme wa sodˈoma ˌakamwambˈia abrˈamu, nˈipe hˈao wˈatu na hˈizo mˈali ˌutʃukˈue wˌewe mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini abrˈamu ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme wa sodˈoma, nˌimeinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia, na nˌimeˈapa.|0
kwˌamba sˌitapokˈea kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo tʃˈako, hˌata kˌama ni ˈuzi ˌau ɡidˈamu ja kiˈatu, ˌili kˈamwe usˈiɟe ˌukasˈema, nˌimemtˌaɟirˈiʃa abrˈamu..|0
sˌitapokˈea tʃotʃˈote, ˈila kˈile tu wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌalitʃokˈula na sehˈemu ambˈajo ni fˈuŋɡu la wˈatu wˌaliokwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈami, ambˈao ni anˈeri, eʃkˈoli na mˈamre. wˌao na wapˈewe fˈuŋɡu lˈao.|0
baˌada ja ɟˈambo hˈili, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia abrˈamu katˌika maˈono: ˌusioɡˈope, abrˈamu. mˌimi ni ŋɡˈao jˈako, na θawˈabu jˈako kˈubwa sˈana.|0
lakˈini abrˈamu ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌutanˈipa nˈini na mˌimi sˈina hˌata mtˈoto na ˌatakˌajerˈiθi ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ni hˈuju ˌeliezˈeri mdamˈeski.|0
abrˈamu ˌakasˈema, hˌukunˈipa watˈoto, hˈivjo mtumˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu n̩dˈije ˌatakˈuwa mrˈiθi wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilipomɟˈia: ˈm̩tu hˈuju hˌatakˈuwa mrˈiθi wˈako, bˌali mwˈana ˌatakˌajetˈoka katˌika viˈuno vjˈako mweɲˈewe n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajekˈuwa mrˈiθi wˈako.|0
ˌakamtˈoa ɲɟˈe na kusˈema, tazˈama ɟˈuu kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌuhesˈabu ɲˈota, kˌama hakˈika ˌutawˈeza kˌuzihesˈabu. ndˈipo ˌakamwambˈia, hˈivjo ndˈivjo uzˈao wˈako ˌutakˌavjokˈuwa.|0
abrˈamu ˌakamwamˈini bwˈana, nˌaje kwˈake hˈili lˌikahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa hˈaki.|0
pˈia ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌilijˌekutˈoa tˌoka ˈuru ja wˌakaldˈajo nikˈupe ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌuimilˈiki.|0
lakˈini abrˈamu ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitawezˈaɟe kuɟˈua kwˌamba nˌitapˈata kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiletˈee mtˈamba wa ŋɡˈombe, mbˈuzi na kondˈoo dˈume, kˈila mmˈoɟa wa miˈaka mitˈatu, pamˈoɟa na hˈua na kˈinda la ɲɟˈiwa.|0
abrˈamu ˌakamletˈea hˈivi vjˈote, ˌakampasˈua kˈila mɲˈama vipˈande viwˈili, ˌakavipˈaŋɡa kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌuelekˈea mwenzˈake, lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo ndˈeɡe, hˌakuwˌapasˈua vipˈande viwˈili.|0
kˈiʃa ndˈeɡe walˈao ɲˈama wˌakatˈua ɟˌuːja mizˈoɡa, lakˈini abrˈamu ˌakawˌafukˈuza.|0
wakˈati ɟˈua lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinatˈua, abrˈamu ˌakaʃˈikwa na ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito, ɡˈiza nˈene na la kutˈiʃa likˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, uɟˈue hakˈika kwˌamba wazˈao wˈako wˌatakˈuwa waɡˈeni kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo si jˈao, nˌao wˌatafˈaɲua watˈumwa na kutˈeswa kwa miˈaka mˈia ˈn̩ne.|0
lakˈini nˌitalˌiaðˈibu taˈifa lˈile wˌatakˌalolˌitumikˈia kˌama watˈumwa, na bˌaadˈaje wˌatatˈoka hˌuko na mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
wˈewe, hˌata hˈivjo ˌutakwˈenda kwa bˈaba zˈako kwa amˈani na kuzˈikwa katˌika uzˈee mwˈema.|0
katˌika kizˈazi tʃa ˈn̩ne wazˈao wˈako wˌatarˈudi hˈapa, kwa maˈana ðˈambi ja wˌaamˈori bˈado hˌaiɟˌafikˈia kipˈimo kˌilitʃoɟˈaa.|0
wakˈati ɟˈua lˌilipokˈuwa lˌimezˈama na ɡˈiza lˌimeiŋɡˈia, tanˈuru la mˈoʃi na mwˈali wa mˈoto ˌunaowˈaka vˌikatokˈea na kupˈita kˈati ja vˈile vipˈande vja ɲˈama.|0
sˈiku hˈijo bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano na abrˈamu, na kˌumwambˈia, nˌitawˈapa wazˈao wˈako ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, kˌuanzˈia kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri hˌadi ˈm̩to ˈule mkˈubwa, frˈati.|0
jaˈani ˈn̩tʃi ja wakˈeni, wˌakenˈizi, wˌakadmˈoni.|0
wahˈiti, wˌaperˈizi, wˌarefˈai.|0
wˌaamˈori, wˌakanaˈani, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi na wˌajebˈusi.|0
bˌasi sarˈai, mkˈewe abrˈamu, ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟamzalˈia watˈoto. lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa na mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike mmˈisri ɟˈina lˈake haɡˈari.|0
hˈivjo sarˈai ˌakamwambˈia abrˈamu, bwˈana ˌamenˌizuilˈia kupˈata watˈoto. nˈenda, ˌukakutˈane kimwˈili na mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wa kˈike, huˈenda nˌitawˈeza kupˈata watˈoto kˌupitˈia kwˈake. abrˈamu ˌakakˌubaliˈana na lˈile sarˈai ˌalilosˈema.|0
hˈivjo baˌada ja abrˈamu kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani miˈaka kˈumi, sarˈai ˌakamtʃukˈua mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike wa kimˈisri, haɡˈari na kˈumpa mumˈewe ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na haɡˈari, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba. haɡˈari ˌalipoɟˈua kˌuwa ˈana mˈimba, ˌaliˈanza kˌumðarˈau sarˈai.|0
ndˈipo sarˈai ˌakamwambˈia abrˈamu, ˌunawˌaɟibˈika na mˌaɲaɲˈaso nˌinajˌojapˈata. nˌilimwˈeka mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, sˈasa kwa vˈile ˌanaɟˈua kwˌamba ˈana mˈimba, ˌananˌiðarˈau mˈimi. bwˈana na ˌaamˈue kˈati jˈako na mˈimi.|0
abrˈamu ˌakamwambˈia, mtumˈiʃi wˈako jˈuko mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. mtendˈee lolˈote ˌunalˌofikˈiri ni bˈora zaˈidi. ndˈipo sarˈai ˌakamtˈesa haɡˈari, hˈivjo ˌakamtorˈoka.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamkˈuta haɡˈari karˈibu na tʃemtʃˈemi hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani; ˌilikˈuwa tʃemtʃˈemi ˈile ˌilijokˈuwa kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ˌiendˈajo ʃˈuri.|0
mˌalaˈika ˌakamwambˈia, haɡˈari, mtumˈiʃi wa sarˈai, ˌumetokˈea wˈapi, na ˌunakwˈenda wˈapi? ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌinamkimbˈia bˈibi jˈaŋɡu sarˈai.|0
ndˈipo mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, rˈudi kwa bˈibi jˈako ˌukaɟiʃˈuʃe tʃˈini jˈake.|0
mˌalaˈika ˌakaˌendelˈea ˌakasˈema, nˌitazidˈiʃa wazˈao wˈako, hˈivi kwˌamba wˌatakˈuwa wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no wˌasiˌohesabˈika.|0
pˈia mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia: wˌewe sˈasa ˈuna mˈimba nˌawe ˌutamzˈaa mwˈana. ˌutamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake ˌiʃmaˈeli, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamesikˈia ɟˌuːja huzˈuni jˈako.|0
ˌatakˈuwa pˌundamwˈitu kˌatikˈati ja wˌanadˈamu, mkˈono wˌake ˌutakˈuwa ðˈidi ja kˈila ˈm̩tu na mkˈono wa kˈila ˈm̩tu ðˈidi jˈake, nˌaje ˌataˈiʃi kwa ˌuhasˈama na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote.|0
haɡˈari akˈampa bwˈana ˌalijˌezuŋɡˈumza nˌaje ɟˈina hˈili: wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu ˌunionˈaje mˈimi, kwa maˈana ˌalisˈema, sˈasa nˌimemwˈona jˌeje ˌanajˌeniˈona mˈimi.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu kisˈima kˈile kˌikaˈitwa bˈeer lahˈai rˈoi, ambˈatʃo bˈado kˈipo hˌuko hˌata lˈeo kˈati ja kadˈeʃi na berˈedi.|0
hˈivjo haɡˈari ˌakamzalˈia abrˈamu mwˈana, nˌaje abrˈamu ˌakamwˈita hˈujo mwˈana haɡˈari ˌalijˌemzalˈia, ˌiʃmaˈeli.|0
abrˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌemanˈini na sˈita wakˈati haɡˈari ˌalipˌomzalˈia ˌiʃmaˈeli.|0
abrˈamu ˌalipokˈuwa na miˈaka tisˈini na tˈisa, bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi; enˈenda mbˈele zˈaŋɡu na uˈiʃi kwa uɲˈofu.|0
nˌami nˌitafˈaɲa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˈewe, nˌami nˌitakˌuzidˈiʃa sˈana sˈana.|0
abrˈamu ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia.|0
kwa upˈande wˈaŋɡu, hˈili ndˈilo aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na wˈewe: wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa bˈaba wa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi.|0
ɟˈina lˈako hˌutaˈitwa tˈena abrˈamu, bˌali ɟˈina lˈako lˌitakˈuwa ˌabrahˈamu, kwa maˈana nˌimekufˈaɲa wˌewe bˈaba wa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi.|0
nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe na uzˈao mwˈiŋɡi sˈana, kwˈako jˌatatˈoka mˌataˈifa nˌao wafˈalme wˌatatˈoka kwˈako.|0
nˌitalˌiθibitˈiʃa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu kˌama aɡˈano la milˈele kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˌewe na wazˈao wˈako baˌada jˈako na vizˈazi viɟˈavjo nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈako na mˈuŋɡu wa wazˈao wˈako.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja kˌanaˈani, ˌunakoˈiʃi sˈasa kˌama mɡˈeni, nˌitakˈupa kˌuwa mˈilki jˈako milˈele, na uzˈao wˈako, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu, kwa upˈande wˈako, lazˈima uʃˈike aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu, wˌewe na wazˈao wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
hˈili ni aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na wˌewe pamˈoɟa na wazˈao wˈako baˌada jˈako, aɡˈano mtˌakalˌoliʃˈika: kˈila mwˌanaˈume mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌatatˌahirˈiwa.|0
mtˌafaɲˈiwa tohˈara na hˌii ˌitakˈuwa ni alˈama ja aɡˈano kˈati jˈaŋɡu na nˈiɲi.|0
kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, kˈila mwˌanaˈume mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu mwˌeɲe sˈiku nˈane ni lazˈima ˌatahirˈiwe, pamˈoɟa na wˌatakˌaozalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈako ˌau wˌaliˌonunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða kutˈoka kwa mɡˈeni, wˈale ambˈao sˈio watˈoto wˈako.|0
ˈawe ˌamezalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈako ˌau ˌamenˌunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða jˈako, ni lazˈima wˌatahirˈiwe. aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu katˌika mwˈili wˈako lˌitakˈuwa ni aɡˈano la milˈele.|0
kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa, ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈata tohˈara ja mwilˈini, ˌatatˈeŋɡwa na wˈatu wˈake, ˌamelivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
pˈia bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu, kwa upˈande wa sarˈai m̩kˈeo, hˌutamwˈita tˈena sarˈai bˌali ɟˈina lˈake lˌitakˈuwa sˈara.|0
nˌitambarˈiki na hakˈika nˌitakˌupatˈia mwˈana kwˈake. nˌitambarˈiki na kwˌamba ˌatakˈuwa mˈama wa mˌataˈifa, wafˈalme wa mˌataˈifa wˌatatˈoka kwˈake.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, ˌakatʃˈeka na kusˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu wa miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa awˈeza kuzˈaa mwˈana? ɟˈe, sˈara ˌatazˈaa mtˈoto katˌika ˈumri wa miˈaka tisˈini.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, laˈiti ˌiʃmaˈeli nˌaje ˌaŋɡeʃirˈiki barˈaka jˈako.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, lakˈini m̩kˈeo sˈara ˌatakˌuzalˈia wˌewe mwˈana, nˌawe ˌutamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake isˈaki. nˌitalˌiθibitˈiʃa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˌaje kˌama aɡˈano la milˈele kwa aɟˈili jˌake na wazˈao wˌake baˌada jˈake.|0
kwa upˈande wa ˌiʃmaˈeli, nˌimekˌusikˈia: hakˈika nˌitambarˈiki, nˌitamfˈaɲa ˈawe na uzˈao mwˈiŋɡi na nˌitaoŋɡˈeza sˈana idˈadi jˈake. ˌatakˈuwa bˈaba wa wˌatawˈala kˈumi na wawˈili, nˌami nˌitamfˈaɲa ˈawe taˈifa kˈubwa.|0
lakˈini aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˌitalˌiθibitˈiʃa kwa isˈaki, ambˈaje sˈara ˌatakˌuzalˈia mwˈaka uɟˈao maɟˈira kˌama hˈaja.|0
wakˈati ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu ˌakaondˈoka kwa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamtʃukˈua ˌiʃmaˈeli mwanˈawe na wˈote wˌaliˌozalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈake pamˈoɟa na wˌaliˌonunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða zˈake, kˈila mwˌanaˈume wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake, ˌakawˌatahˈiri, kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka tisˈini na tˈisa ˌalipˌotahirˈiwa.|0
nˌaje ˌiʃmaˈeli mwanˈawe ˌalitˌahirˈiwa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na mitˈatu.|0
ˌabrahˈamu na ˌiʃmaˈeli mwanˈawe wˌalitˌahirˈiwa sˈiku ˈile ˈile.|0
kˈila mwˌanaˈume ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa ˌabrahˈamu, pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˌozalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈake ˌau ˌalijˌenunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða kutˈoka kwa mɡˈeni, ˌalitˌahirˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea ˌabrahˈamu karˈibu na mˌialˈoni ja mˈamre wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema lˈake wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo ˌakaˈona wˈatu watˈatu wˌamesimˈama karˈibu nˈaje. ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌalihˌarakˈiʃa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema lˈake kˌuwalˈaki na kˌuwasˌuɟudˈia hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌakasˈema, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈenu, ˈee bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˌusimpˈite mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
ˈatʃa jalˈetwe mˈaɟi kidˈoɡo, kˈiʃa nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˈawe miɡˈuu jˈenu na mpumzˈike tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti hˈuu.|0
nˌiruhusˈuni nˌiwapatˈie tʃakˈula kidˈoɡo ˈm̩le, ˌili mpˈate ŋɡˈuvu mwˌendelˈee na safˈari jˈenu, kwa kˌuwa mmekˈuɟa kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈenu. nˌao wˌakamɟˈibu, vˈema sˈana, fˈaɲa kˌama ˌunavjosˈema.|0
hˈivjo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakahˌarakˈiʃa ˌakaiŋɡˈia hemˈani kwa sˈara, ˌakamwambˈia, tʃukˈua vipˈimo vitˈatu vja ˈuŋɡa laˈini harˈaka, ukˈande na uˈoke mikˈate.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabrahˈamu ˌakakimbˈia kwˈenda kwˈeɲe kˈundi, ˌakatʃaɡˈua ndˈama mzˈuri, laˈini na akˈampa mtumˈiʃi, ambˈaje ˌalihˌarakˈiʃa kˌumtajarˈiʃa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakalˈeta ɟibˈini, mazˈiwa na ɲˈama ja jˈule ndˈama ˌilijˌoandalˈiwa, ˌakaviwˈeka mbˈele ja waɡˈeni. wˌalipokˈuwa wakˈila, ˌalisimˈama karˈibu nˌao tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti.|0
wˌakamˌuulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi sˈara m̩kˈeo? ˌakasˈema, jˈuko hˌuko, ndˈani ja hˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, hakˈika nˌitakˌurudˈia tˈena maɟˈira kˌama hˈaja mwakˈani na sˈara m̩kˈeo ˌatakˈuwa ˈana mwˈana. sˈara ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiwˌasikilˈiza kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema, lˌililokˈuwa ɲˈuma jˈake.|0
ˌabrahˈamu na sˈara wˌalikˈuwa wazˈee tˈena wˌaliˌosoɡˈea miˈaka, nˌaje sˈara ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈoma katˌika destˈuri ja wˌanawˈake.|0
hˈivjo sˈara ˌakatʃˈeka kˌimojomˈojo ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiwˈaza, baˌada ja mˌimi kˌuwa mkˈoŋɡwe hˈivi na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamezeˈeka, ɟˈe, nˌitawˈeza kˌufurahˈia ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu, kwa nˈini sˈara ˌametʃˈeka na kusˈema, kwˈeli nˌitazˈaa mtˈoto nˌami sˈasa ni m̩zˈee?.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna ɟˈambo lolˈote ɡˈumu lˌisilˌowezekˈana kwa bwˈana? nˌitakˌurudˈia mwakˈani maɟˈira kˌama hˈaja, nˌaje sˈara ˌatakˈuwa na mwˈana.|0
sˈara ˌakaoɡˈopa kwa kˌuwa ˌalidaŋɡˈaɲa na kusˈema, mˌimi sˌikutʃˈeka. lakˈini bwˈana ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, ˌulitʃˈeka.|0
wakˈati wˈatu hˈao wˌalipˌosimˈama ˌili wˌaondˈoke, wˌaliˌelekˈeza ɲˈuso zˈao sodˈoma, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakawatˈoa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo ˌili ˌawasˌindikˈize.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, nimfˈitʃe ˌabrahˈamu ɟˈambo nˌinalˌokusudˈia kufˈaɲa.|0
hakˈika ˌabrahˈamu ˌatakˈuwa taˈifa kˈubwa na lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, kˌupitˈia kwˈake mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia jˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
kwa maˈana nˌimemtʃaɡˈua jˈeje, ˌili ˌawaoŋɡˈoze watˈoto wˌake na ɟamˈaa jˌake kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa wˌaadilˈifu na kutˈenda hˈaki, ˌili bwˈana ˌatimˈize ahˈadi jˌake kwa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakasˈema, kilˈio ðˈidi ja sodˈoma na ɡomˈora ni kikˈubwa sˈana na ðˈambi jˈao ˌinasˌikitˈiʃa sˈana.|0
kwˌamba nˌitaʃˈuka niˈone kˌama wˌalijˌojatˈenda ni mabˈaja kiˈasi tʃa kilˈio kˌilitʃˌonifikˈia. kˌama sˈivjo, nˌitaɟˈua.|0
bˌasi wˈale wˈatu wˌakaɡeˈuka wˌakaˈenda kˌuelekˈea sodˈoma, lakˈini ˌabrahˈamu ˌakabˈaki ˌamesimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamsˌoɡelˈea ˌakasˈema: ɟˈe, ˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌeɲe hˈaki na waˈovu.|0
ɟˈe, ikˈiwa wˌatakuwˈepo wˈatu wˌeɲe hˈaki hamsˈini katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo, hˈivi kwˈeli ˌutaˌuaŋɡamˈiza na wˈala hˌutauˈatʃa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao wˈatu hamsˈini wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌaliˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
hˌilo na lˈiwe mbˈali nˈawe, kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˈilo, kˌuwaˈua wˌeɲe hˈaki pamˈoɟa na waˈovu, kˌuwatendˈea wˌeɲe hˈaki sˌawasˈawa na waˈovu. ˈiwe mbˈali nˈawe! ɟˈe, mwamˈuzi wa dunˈia jˈote hˌatafˈaɲa lilˈilo sˈawa.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, kˌama nˌikipˈata wˈatu hamsˈini wˌeɲe hˈaki katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa sodˈoma, nˌitaˌusamˈehe hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi wˈote kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema tˈena: sˈasa kwa kˌuwa nˌimekˈuwa na ˌuɟasˈiri wa kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na bwˈana, iŋɡˈawa mˌimi si kˈitu bˌali ni mavˈumbi na maɟˈivu.|0
ɟˈe, kˌama hesˈabu ja wˌeɲe hˈaki ˌimepuŋɡˈua watˈano katˌika hamsˈini, ˌutaˌuaŋɡamˈiza hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi wˈote kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao watˈano wˌaliˌopuŋɡˈua? bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, kˌama nˌikiwakˈuta hˌuko wˈatu ˌarobaˈini na watˈano, sˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine, ɟˈe, kˌama hˌuko wˌatapˌatikˈana wˈatu ˌarobaˈini tˈu? ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao ˌarobaˈini, sˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
ndˈipo ˌakasˈema, bwˈana na ˌasikˌasirˈike, lakˈini nˌiruhˈusu nˌizuŋɡˈumze. ɟˈe, kˌama hˌuko wˌatakuwˈepo θˌelaθˈini tˈu? ˌakaɟˈibu, sˌitapˌaaŋɡamˈiza ikˈiwa nˌitawakˈuta hˌuko wˈatu θˌelaθˈini.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema, sˈasa kwa kˌuwa nˌimekˈuwa na ˌuɟasˈiri sˈana kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na bwˈana, ɟˈe, kˌama wˌakipˌatikˈana hˌuko wˈatu ˌiʃirˈini tˈu? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao ˌiʃirˈini, sˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema, bwˈana na ˌasikˌasirˈike, lakˈini nˌiruhˈusu nˌizuŋɡˈumze tˈena mˈara mˈoɟa tˈu. ˌitakuwˈaɟe kˌama wˌatapˌatikˈana hˌuko wˈatu kˈumi tˈu? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao kˈumi, sˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
bwˈana ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na ˌabrahˈamu, ˌakaondˈoka, nˌaje ˌabrahˈamu ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
mˌalaˈika wˈale wawˈili wˌakafˈika sodˈoma wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni, nˌaje lˈoti ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. wakˈati ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌaliondˈoka kwˈenda kˌuwalˈaki na kˌuwasˌuɟudˈia hˌadi tʃˈini.|0
ˌakasˈema, bwˈana zˈaŋɡu, tˌafaðˈali kˌaribˈuni kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈenu. mnawˈeza kunˈawa miɡˈuu na kulˈala hˈapa kˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema mwˌendelˈee na safˈari jˈenu. wˌakamɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa, tˌutalˈala hˈapa ɲɟˈe ˌuwaɲɟˈani.|0
lakˈini ˌakasˌisitˈiza kwa ŋɡˈuvu kwˌamba wˌaiŋɡˈie pamˈoɟa nˌaje ɲumbˈani kwˈake. ˌakawˌaandalˈia tʃakˈula, mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, nˌao wakˈala.|0
kˈabla hˌawaɟaˈenda kulˈala, wˈatu wˈote kutˈoka kˈila sehˈemu ja ˈm̩ɟi wa sodˈoma, viɟˈana kwa wazˈee, wˌaliˌizuŋɡˈuka ɲˈumba.|0
wˌakamwˈita lˈoti wˌakisˈema, wˈako wˈapi wˈale wˈatu ambˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kwˈako ɟiˈoni hˌii? watˈoe ɲɟˈe kwˈetu ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuwalawˈiti.|0
lˈoti ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌuonˈana nˈao, ˌakaufˈuŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo ɲˈuma jˈake.|0
ˌakasˈema, la hˈaʃa, rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu. msifˈaɲe ɟˈambo hˈili ˈovu.|0
tazˈama, ninˈao bˈinti wawˈili ambˈao kˈamwe hˌawaɟˌakutˈana kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume. ˈatʃa nˌiwatˈoe ɲɟˈe kwˈenu, nˌaɲi mnawˈeza kˌuwafaɲˈia lolˈote mnˌalotˈaka. lakˈini msˌiwafaɲˈie tʃotʃˈote wˈatu hˈawa, kwa sabˈabu wˈako kwˈeɲe ulˈinzi tʃˈini ja dˈari lˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, tˌuondokˈee mbˈali. wˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, hˈuju ˈm̩tu ˌalikˈuɟa hˈapa kˌama mɡˈeni na sˈasa ˌanatˈaka kˌuwa mwamˈuzi wˈetu! tˌutakutˈenda vibˈaja kulˈiko wˈao. wˌaliˌendelˈea kˌumlazimˈiʃa lˈoti na kusˈoŋɡa mbˈele ˌili kuvˈuɲɟa mlˈaŋɡo.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa ndˈani wˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌakamvˈuta lˈoti ndˈani ja ɲˈumba na kufˈuŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakawapˈiɡa kwa upˈofu wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa mlaŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈile ɲˈumba, viɟˈana kwa wazˈee, hˈivjo hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuupˈata mlˈaŋɡo.|0
wˈale wˈatu wawˈili wˌakamwambˈia lˈoti, ˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote hˈapa, wˈakwe zˈako, wˈana ˌau bˈinti, ˌama jejˈote mwiŋɡˈine alˈije wˈako katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu? wˌaondˈoe hˈapa.|0
kwa sabˈabu tˌunapˌaaŋɡamˈiza mahˈali hˈapa. kilˈio kwa bwˈana ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa hˈapa ni kikˈubwa kiˈasi kwˌamba ˌametutˈuma kˌupaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kwa hˈijo lˈoti ˌalitˈoka ˌili kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na wˈakwe zˈake, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewapˈosa bˈinti zˈake. ˌakawˌaambˈia, faɲˈeni harˈaka kˌuondˈoka mahˈali hˈapa, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ju karˈibu kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu! lakˈini wˈakwe zˌake wˌalifikˈiri kwˌamba ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitanˈia.|0
kunˈako mˌapambazˈuko, mˌalaˈika wˌakamhimˈiza lˈoti, wˌakamwambˈia, fˈaɲa harˈaka! mtʃukˈue ˈm̩ke wˈako na bˈinti zˈako wawˈili wˌaliˈoko hˈapa, la sˈivjo ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa wakˈati ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˌapoˌaðibˈiwa.|0
ˌalipˌositasˈita, wˈale wˈatu wˌakamʃˈika mkˈono wˌake na mikˈono ja ˈm̩ke wˌake na bˈinti zˌake wawˈili na kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza salˈama ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa na hurˈuma kwˈao.|0
mˈara wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌuwatˈoa ɲɟˈe, mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakawˌaambˈia, mkimbˈie kwa ˌusalˈama wˈenu! msˌitazˈame ɲˈuma, wˈala msˌisimˈame popˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare! kˌimbiliˈeni mˌilimˈani, ˌama sˈivjo mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
lakˈini lˈoti ˌakawaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa, bwˈana zˈaŋɡu, tˌafaðalˈini.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈenu ˌamepˈata kibˈali mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu, nˌaɲi mmˌeoɲˈeʃa wˈema mkˈubwa kwˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu. lakˈini siwˈezi kˌukimbilˈia mˌilimˈani, ɟˈaŋɡa hˈili lˌitanikˈumba, nˌami nˌitakˈufa.|0
tazˈama, hˈapa kˈuna ˈm̩ɟi karˈibu wa kˌukimbilˈia, nˌao ni mdˈoɡo. nˌiruhusˈuni nˌikimbilˈie hˈumo, ni mdˈoɡo sˈana, ˌama sˈivjo? ndˈipo maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌatasˌalimˈika.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, vˈema sˈana, nˌitalˌikubˈali hˈili ˈombi pˈia, sˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌoutˈaɟa.|0
lakˈini ˌukimbilˈie hˌuko harˈaka, kwa sabˈabu sˌitawˈeza kufˈaɲa lolˈote mpˈaka ufˈike hˌuko. n̩dˈijo maˈana ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo ˌukaˈitwa soˈari. .|0
wakˈati lˈoti ˌalipofˈika soˈari, ɟˈua lˌilikˈuwa lˌimetʃomˈoza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˈivjo ˌakaˌiteketˈeza mˈiɟi ˈile na enˈeo lˈote la tˌambarˈare, pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi, hˌata pˈia mimˈea jˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaˈamka na kurˈudi mahˈali pˈale ˌalipˌosimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ˌakatazˈama upˈande wa sodˈoma na ɡomˈora, kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja tˌambarˈare, ˌakaˈona mˈoʃi mzˈito ˌukipˈanda kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi, kˌama mˈoʃi ˌutokˈao kwˈeɲe tanˈuru.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌoiˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi ja tˌambarˈare ˌalimkumbˈuka ˌabrahˈamu, ˌakamtˈoa lˈoti kutˈoka kwˈeɲe lˈile ɟˈaŋɡa lˌililˌoharˈibu mˈiɟi ˈile ambˈamo lˈoti ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi.|0
lˈoti na bˈinti zˌake wawˈili wˌaliondˈoka soˈari na kufˈaɲa makˈao jˈao kˈule mˌilimˈani, kwa maˈana ˌalioɡˈopa kukˈaa soˈari. jˌeje na bˈinti zˌake wawˈili wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika pˈaŋɡo.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa bˈinti mkˈubwa ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mdˈoɡo, bˈaba jˈetu ni m̩zˈee na hakˈuna mwˌanaˈume mahˈali hˈapa ˌatakˌajekutˈana na sˌisi kimwˈili, kˌama ilˈivjo destˈuri ja mahˈali pˈote dˌuniˈani.|0
tˌumɲuˈeʃe bˈaba jˈetu mvˈiɲo kˈiʃa tˌukutˈane nˌaje kimwˈili ˌili tˌuhifˈaði uzˈao wˈetu kˌupitˈia bˈaba jˈetu.|0
usˈiku ˈule wˌalimɲuˈeʃa bˈaba jˈao mvˈiɲo, ˌalipolˈewa bˈinti jˌake mkˈubwa ˌakaiŋɡˈia na kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. bˈaba jˈao hˌakuɟˈua wakˈati bˈinti jˌake ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia kulˈala nˌaje wˈala ˌalipotˈoka.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata bˈinti mkˈubwa ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mdˈoɡo, usˈiku ˌuliopˈita mˌimi nˌilikutˈana kimwˈili na bˈaba jˈaŋɡu. tˌumɲuˈeʃe divˈai tˈena, usˈiku hˈuu nˌawe ˌukutˈane nˌaje kimwˈili ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuhifˈaði uzˈao wˈetu kˌupitˈia bˈaba jˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamɲuˈeʃa bˈaba jˈao mvˈiɲo tˈena usˈiku ˈule, nˌaje bˈinti jˌake mdˈoɡo ˌakaiŋɡˈia, ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine bˈaba jˈao hˌakuɟˈua bˈinti jˌake ˌalipolˈala nˌaje wˈala ˌalipˌoondˈoka.|0
hˈivjo bˈinti wawˈili wa lˈoti wˌakapˈata mˈimba kwa bˈaba jˈao.|0
bˈinti mkˈubwa ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, ˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake moˈabu; n̩dˈio bˈaba wa wˌamoˈabu hˌata lˈeo.|0
bˈinti mdˈoɡo nˌaje pˈia ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, nˌaje ˌakamwˈita benˈami; n̩dˈije bˈaba wa wˌaamˈoni hˌata lˈeo.|0
bˌasi ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaˌendelˈea mbˈele kutˈoka hˌuko hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja neɡˈebu na ˌakaˈiʃi kˈati ja kadˈeʃi na ʃˈuri. kwa mˈuda mfˈupi ˌalikˈaa ɡerˈari kˌama mɡˈeni.|0
hˌuko ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema kuhˈusu sˈara mkˈewe, hˈuju ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa ˌabimelˈeki mfˈalme wa ɡerˈari ˌakatˈuma sˈara alˈetwe, nˌaje ˌakamtʃukˈua.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈia ˌabimelˈeki katˌika ndˈoto wakˈati wa usˈiku na kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe ni kˌama ˈm̩fu kwa sabˈabu ja hˈuju mwanˈamke ˌulijˌemtʃukˈua; jˌeje ni ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu.|0
wakˈati hˈuo ˌabimelˈeki ˌalikˈuwa bˈado hˌaɟamsˌoɡelˈea, kwa hˈijo ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌutalˌiharˈibu taˈifa lisˈilo na hatˈia.|0
hˌakusˈema kwˈaŋɡu, hˈuju ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje sˈara pˈia hˌakusˈema, hˈuju ni kˈaka jˈaŋɡu? nˌimefˈaɲa hˈaja kwa ðamˈiri ɲɟˈema na mikˈono sˈafi.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia katˌika ndˈoto, n̩dˈijo, naɟˈua ja kwˌamba ˌumefˈaɲa hˈaja kwa ðamˈiri sˈafi, kwa hˈijo nˌimekˌuzuˈia ˌusinitˈende ðˈambi. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu sˌikukuˈatʃa umɡˈuse.|0
sˈasa ˌumrudˈiʃe hˈujo ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu, kwa maˈana ni nabˈii, nˌaje ˌatakˌuombˈea nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi. lakˈini kˌama hˌutamrudˈiʃa, uɟˈue kwa hakˈika kˌuwa wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako wˈote mtakˈufa.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema ˌabimelˈeki ˌakawaˈita mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote, na baˌada ja kˌuwaambˈia jˈote jˌalijˌotokˈea, wˌalioɡˈopa sˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamwˈita ˌabrahˈamu na kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe ˌumetˌufaɲˈia nˈini? nˌimekˌukosˈea nˈini hˌata ˌukalˈeta hatˈia kˈubwa nˈamna hˌii ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu na ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu? ˌumenˌifaɲˈia mˈambo ambˈajo hˌajakupˈasa kˌufaɲˈika.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamˌuulˈiza ˌabrahˈamu, ˌulikˈuwa na kusˈudi ɡˈani kufˈaɲa hˈivi.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌiliwˈaza kwˌamba, hakˈika hakˈuna hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu mahˈali hˈapa, nˌao wˌataniˈua kwa sabˈabu ja ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu..|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, ni kwˈeli kwˌamba jˌeje ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, bˈinti wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu iŋɡˈawa si mtˈoto wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu; bˌasi akˈawa ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu.|0
wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipˌonifˈaɲa nˌisafˈiri mbˈali na ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌilimwambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjooɲˈeʃa pˈendo lˈako kwˈaŋɡu: kˈila mahˈali tˌutakˌapokwˈenda, kuhˈusu mˌimi sˈema, hˈuju ni kˈaka jˈaŋɡu. .|0
kˈiʃa ˌabimelˈeki ˌakatwˈaa kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe, na watˈumwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike akˈampa ˌabrahˈamu, ˌakamrudˈiʃa sˈara kwa mumˈewe.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakasˈema, ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu ˈiko mbˈele jˈako, ˈiʃi popˈote ˌunapotˈaka.|0
ˌakamwambˈia sˈara, ninˈampa kˈaka jˈako ʃekˈeli ˈelfu mˈoɟa za fˈeða. hˌii ni kˌufidˈia kˈosa lˌililˌofaɲˈika ðˈidi jˈako mbˈele ja wˈote walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈawe; hˈaki jˈako ˌimeθˌibitˈiʃwa kabˈisa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwˈomba mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakampˈoɲa ˌabimelˈeki, ˈm̩ke wˈake, na watˈumwa wˌake wa kˈike kwˌamba wawˈeze kupˈata watˈoto tˈena.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejafˈuŋɡa matˈumbo ja wˈote katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌabimelˈeki kwa sabˈabu ja sˈara, ˈm̩ke wa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
wakˈati hˈuu bwˈana ˌakamrehˈemu sˈara kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamtendˈea sˈara kˈile ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌameahˈidi.|0
sˈara ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakamzalˈia ˌabrahˈamu mwˈana katˌika uzˈee wˈake, maɟˈira jˈale ja mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌomwahˈidi.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwˈita isˈaki jˈule mwˈana ambˈaje sˈara ˌalimzalˈia.|0
isˈaki ˌalipokˈuwa na ˈumri wa sˈiku nˈane, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamtahˈiri, kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa wakˈati isˈaki mwanˈawe ˌalipˌozalˈiwa.|0
sˈara ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiletˈea kitʃˈeko, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajesikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili ˌatatʃˈeka pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, nˈani ˌaŋɡemwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu kˌuwa sˈara ˌaŋɡeɲoɲˈeʃa watˈoto? tˈena nˌimemzalˈia mwˈana katˌika uzˈee wˈake.|0
lakˈini sˈara ˌaliˈona kˌuwa mwˈana ambˈaje haɡˈari, mmˈisri, ˌalijˌemzalˈia ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaðihˈaki.|0
ɟˈambo hˈili lˌilimhˌuzunˈiʃa sˈana ˌabrahˈamu kwa sabˈabu lˌilimhˈusu mwanˈawe.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusihˌuzunˈike hˈivjo kwa sabˈabu ja kiɟˈana na mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa kˈike. sˌikilˈiza lolˈote sˈara ˌanalˌokuambˈia, kwa sabˈabu uzˈao wˈako ˌutahˌesabˈiwa kˌupitˈia kwˈake isˈaki.|0
nˌitamfˈaɲa hˈuju mwˈana wa mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa kˈike kˌuwa taˈifa pˈia, kwa sabˈabu nˌaje ni uzˈao wˈako.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakatʃukˈua tʃakˈula na kirˈiba tʃa mˈaɟi, akˈampa haɡˈari. ˌakaviwˈeka mˌabeɡˈani ˌm̩wa haɡˈari, ˌakamwondˈoa pamˈoɟa na kiɟˈana. haɡˈari ˌakaʃˈika ɲɟˈia, ˌakatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
mˈaɟi jˌalipokwˈiʃa kwˈeɲe kirˈiba, ˌakamwˈatʃa kiɟˈana tʃˈini ja mˌoɟawˈapo ja vitʃˈaka.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaɟˌiendˈea zˌake ˌakakˈeti karˈibu, umbˈali wa kutˈupa mʃˈale, ˌakawˈaza, siwˈezi kˌumwaŋɡalˈia kiɟˈana akˈifa. ikˈawa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti pˈale karˈibu, ˌakaˈanza kulˈia kwa huzˈuni.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamsikˈia kiɟˈana ˌakilˈia, mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwˈita haɡˈari kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌumwambˈia, kˈuna nˈini haɡˈari? ˌusioɡˈope, mˈuŋɡu ˌamesikˈia kiɟˈana ˌanalˈia akˈiwa ˌamelˈala pˈale.|0
mwinˈue kiɟˈana na umʃˈike mkˈono, kwa maˈana nˌitamfˈaɲa kˌuwa taˈifa kˈubwa.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamfumbˈua haɡˈari mˈatʃo jˌake nˌaje ˌakaˈona kisˈima tʃa mˈaɟi. hˈivjo ˌakaˈenda ˌakaɟˈaza kirˈiba mˈaɟi na kˈumpa kiɟˈana ˈaɲue.|0
mˈuŋɡu akˈawa pamˈoɟa na hˈuju kiɟˈana ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˌendelˈea kukˈua. ˌaliˈiʃi ɟaŋɡwˈani na akˈawa mpˈiɡa upˈinde.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la parˈani, mˈama jˌake ˌakampatˈia ˈm̩ke kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
wakˈati hˈuo ˌabimelˈeki na fikˈoli m̩kˈuu wa maɟˈeʃi jˌake wˌakamwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˌawe katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌunatʃofˈaɲa.|0
sˈasa nˌiapˈie hˈapa mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu kwˌamba hˌutanitˈenda hˈila mˈimi, watˈoto wˈaŋɡu wˈala wazˈao wˈaŋɡu. nˌitendˈee mˌimi na ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌunaˈiʃi kˌama mɡˈeni wˈema ˈule ˈule ambˈao nˌimekˌutendˈea.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema, nˌinaˈapa hˈivjo.|0
ndˈipo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakalˌalamˈika kwa ˌabimelˈeki kuhˈusu kisˈima tʃa mˈaɟi ambˈatʃo wˌatumˈiʃi wa ˌabimelˈeki wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˌiɲaŋɡˈaɲa.|0
lakˈini ˌabimelˈeki ˌakasˈema, siɟˈui ni nˈani ambˈaje ˌamefˈaɲa hˈili. hˌukunˌiambˈia, lˈeo tu ndˈipo nˌinasikˈia habˈari zˈake.|0
hˈivjo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakalˈeta kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe, akˈampa ˌabimelˈeki, nˌao wˈatu hˈawa wawˈili wˌakafˈaɲa mˌapatˈano.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakatˈeŋɡa kondˈoo wa kˈike sˈaba kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈundi.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamˌuulˈiza ˌabrahˈamu, ni nˈini maˈana ja hˈawa kondˈoo wa kˈike sˈaba ˌuliˌowatˈeŋɡa pˈeke jˈao.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌupokˈee hˈawa kondˈoo wa kˈike sˈaba kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kˌama ˌuʃahˈidi kˌuwa nˌilitʃˈimba kisˈima hˈiki.|0
hˈivjo mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa bˈeer ʃˈeba, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wawˈili wˌaliˌapiˈana hˈapo.|0
baˌada ja mˌapatˈano kˌufaɲˈika hˌuko bˈeer ʃˈeba, ˌabimelˈeki na fikˈoli m̩kˈuu wa maɟˈeʃi jˌake wˌakarˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakapˈanda ˈm̩ti wa mkwˈaɟu hˌuko bˈeer ʃˈeba, na hˈapo ˌakalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa milˈele.|0
nˌaje ˌabrahˈamu ˌakakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
bˌaadˈaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟarˈibu ˌabrahˈamu. ˌakamwambˈia, ˌabrahˈamu! ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, ˌumtʃukˈue mwanˈao, mwˈana wˈako wa pekˈee, isˈaki ˌumpendˈaje, uˈende katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja morˈia. m̩tˈoe hˌuko kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mlˈima mmˌoɟawˈapo nˌitakˌaokˌuambˈia.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata, ˌakamtˌajarˈiʃa pˈunda wˈake. ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wawˈili pamˈoɟa na isˈaki mwanˈawe. baˌada ja kutʃˈaɲɟa kˈuni za kutˈoʃa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈijo sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, ˌakaondˈoka kˌuelekˈea mahˈali mˈuŋɡu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu ˌabrahˈamu ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo, ˌakapaˈona mahˈali pˈale kwa mbˈali.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, kaˈeni hˈapa pamˈoɟa na pˈunda, wakˈati mˌimi na kiɟˈana tˌunakwˈenda kˈule. tˌutakwˈenda kˌuabˈudu na kˈiʃa tˌutawˌarudˈia.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakatʃukˈua kˈuni kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, ˌakamtwˈika isˈaki mwanˈawe, jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakatʃukˈua mˈoto na kˈisu. wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˈenda pamˈoɟa.|0
isˈaki ˌakanˈena ˌakamwambˈia ˌabrahˈamu bˈaba jˈake, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaitˈika, mˌimi hˈapa, mwanˈaŋɡu. isˈaki ˌakasˈema, mˈoto na kˈuni zˈipo, ɟˈe, jˈuko wˈapi mwˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, mwanˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈewe ˌataɟˌipatˈia mwˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja hˈijo sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa. nˌao hˈawa wawˈili wˌakaˌendelˈea mbˈele pamˈoɟa.|0
wˌalipofˈika mahˈali pˈale ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameambˈiwa na mˈuŋɡu, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu hˈapo, ˌakaziwˈeka kˈuni ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌakamfˈuŋɡa isˈaki mwanˈawe na ˌakamlˈaza kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu, ɟˌuːja zˈile kˈuni.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake na ˌakatʃukˈua kˈisu ˌili amtʃˈiɲɟe mwanˈawe.|0
lakˈini mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwˈita kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌakamwambˈia, ˌabrahˈamu! ˌabrahˈamu! ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusimðˈuru kiɟˈana, wˈala ˌusimtendˈee ɟˈambo lolˈote. sˈasa nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba unˈamtʃa mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu hˌukunˌizuilˈia mwanˈao, mwˈana wˈako wa pekˈee.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo jˈake, ˌakaˈona kondˈoo dˈume ˌamenˈaswa pˈembe zˌake ɲˈuma jˌake katˌika kitʃˈaka. ˌakaˈenda ˌakamtʃukˈua hˈujo kondˈoo dˈume, ˌakamtˈoa ˈawe sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa badˈala ja mwanˈawe.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale jehˈova jˈire. mpˈaka sˈiku ja lˈeo ˌinasˌemekˈana, katˌika mlˈima wa bwˈana ˌitapˌatikˈana.|0
bˌasi mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwˈita ˌabrahˈamu kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni mˈara ja pˈili.|0
ˌakasˈema, nˌinaˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, kwˌamba kwa sabˈabu ˌumefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili na hˌukunˌizuilˈia mwanˈao, mwˈana wˈako wa pekˈee.|0
hakˈika nˌitakˌubarˈiki, na nˌitaˌuzidˈiʃa uzˈao wˈako kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani na kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌuliˈoko pwˈani. wazˈao wˈako wˌatamilˈiki mˈiɟi ja adˈui zˈao.|0
na kˌupitˈia uzˈao wˈako mˌataˈifa jˈote dˌuniˈani jˌatabˌarikˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu ˌumenitˈii.|0
ndˈipo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakawˌarudˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, wˌakaondˈoka wˌakaˈenda wˈote pamˈoɟa mpˈaka bˈeer ʃˈeba. ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakaambˈiwa, mˈilka pˈia ˌamepˈata watˈoto, ˌamemzalˈia ndˈuɡu jˈako nahˈori wˈana.|0
ˈusi mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, bˈuzi nduɡˈuje, kˌemuˈeli bˈaba wa arˈamu.|0
kesˈedi, hˈazo, pildˈaʃi, jidlˈafu na bˌeθuˈeli.|0
bˌeθuˈeli ˌakamzˈaa rebˈeka. mˈilka ˌalimzalˈia nahˈori nduɡˈuje ˌabrahˈamu hˈao wˈana wanˈane.|0
surˈia wˌake nahˈori ˌalijeˈitwa reˈuma pˈia ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana: tˈeba, ɡahˈamu, tahˈaʃi na maˈaka.|0
sˈara ˌaliˈiʃi akˈawa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˈia na ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba.|0
sˈara akˈafa hˌuko kirˈiaθ ˈarba jaˈani hebrˈoni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwˌombolezˈea na kˌumlilˈia sˈara.|0
ndˈipo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakainˈuka kutˈoka pˈale pˈeɲe maˈiti ja ˈm̩ke wˈake. ˌakazuŋɡˈumza na wahˈiti, ˌakasˈema.|0
mˌimi ni mpitˈaɟi na mɡˈeni mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu. nˌiuziˈeni sehˈemu ja ˈarði jˈenu ˌili niwˈeze kumzˈika maˈiti wˈaŋɡu.|0
wahˈiti wˌakamɟˈibu ˌabrahˈamu.|0
bwˈana, tˌusikilˈize. wˌewe ni mtawˈala m̩kˈuu sˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu. zˈika maˈiti wˈako katˌika kabˈuri ˌunalˌolipˈenda kˈati ja mˌakabˈuri jˈetu. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu wa kwˈetu ˌatakˌajekˌuzuˈia kabˈuri lˈake ˌili kuzˈika maˈiti wˈako.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakainˈuka na ˌakasuɟˈudu mbˈele ja weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi, jaˈani wahˈiti.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, kˌama mnˌaniruhˈusu kumzˈika maˈiti wˈaŋɡu, bˌasi nˌisikˌilizˈeni mkamsˈihi efrˈoni mwˈana wa sohˈari kwa niˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌili ˌaniuzˈie pˈaŋɡo la makpˈela, lilˈilo mˈali jˈake, nˈalo lˈiko mwˈiʃo wa ʃˈamba lˈake. mwˌambiˈeni ˌaniuzˈie kwa bˈei kamˈili ˌatakˌajosˈema ˌili lˈiwe mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pa kˌuzikˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
efrˈoni mhˈiti ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake, ˌakamɟˈibu ˌabrahˈamu mbˈele ja wahˈiti wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈepo katˌika lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi.|0
la hˈaʃa, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌisikilˈize, nakˈupa ʃˈamba, pˈia nakˈupa pˈaŋɡo lˌililˈomo ndˈani jˈake. nakˈupa mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. uzˈike maˈiti wˈako.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasuɟˈudu tˈena, mbˈele ja weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌakamwambˈia efrˈoni wˈale wˈatu wakˈiwa wˌanasikˈia, tˌafaðˈali nˌisikilˈize. nˌitakulˈipa fˈeða za hˌilo ʃˈamba. kubˈali kˌuzipokˈea ˌili niwˈeze kumzˈika maˈiti wˈaŋɡu.|0
efrˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu ˌabrahˈamu.|0
nˌisikilˈize, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, θamˈani ja ˈarði hˈijo ni ʃekˈeli mˌiaˈn̩ne za fˈeða, lakˈini hˈijo ni nˈini kˈati jˈako na mˈimi? mzˈike maˈiti wˈako.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakakubˈali maʃˈarti ja efrˈoni, ˌakampimˈia ˈile fˈeða ˌalijotˈaɟa mˌasikiˈoni ˌm̩wa wahˈiti: ʃekˈeli mˌiaˈn̩ne za fˈeða kˌuliŋɡˈana na viwˈaŋɡo vja uzˈito vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌikitumˈika wakˈati hˈuo na wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara.|0
hˈivjo ʃˈamba la efrˈoni hˌuko makpˈela karˈibu na mˈamre, jaˈani ʃˈamba pamˈoɟa na pˈaŋɡo lˌililˌokuwˈamo, nˈajo mˈiti jˈote ˌilijˌokuwˈamo ndˈani ja mipˈaka ja ʃˈamba hˈilo, vˌilikˌabiðˈiwa.|0
kwa ˌabrahˈamu kˌuwa mˈali jˌake mbˈele ja wahˈiti wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamzˈika sˈara mkˈewe kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo ndˈani ja ʃˈamba la makpˈela karˈibu na mˈamre hˌuko hebrˈoni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
hˈivjo wahˈiti wˌakamkabˈiði ˌabrahˈamu ʃˈamba pamˈoɟa na pˈaŋɡo lˌililokˈuwa hˈumo kˌuwa mahˈali pa kˌuzikˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee mwˌeɲe miˈaka mˈiŋɡi, nˌaje bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamembarˈiki katˌika kˈila ɲɟˈia.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake m̩kˈuu wa vˈitu vjˈote katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake, jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa vˈitu vjˈote ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo, wˈeka mkˈono wˈako tʃˈini ja pˈaɟa lˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinatˈaka uˈape kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa mbˈiŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wa ˈn̩tʃi, kwˌamba hˌutamtwalˈia mwanˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke kutˈoka bˈinti za wˌakanaˈani, ambˈao nˌinaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
bˌali ˌutakwˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu na ɟamˈaa zˈaŋɡu ˌumpatˈie isˈaki mwanˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke.|0
jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, kˌama hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌatakatˈaa kˈuɟa nˌami katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii? ɟˈe, nˌimpelˈeke mwanˈao katˌika hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijotˈoka.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakasˈema, hˌakikˈiʃa kwˌamba hˌutamrudˈiʃa mwanˈaŋɡu hˌuko.|0
bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa mbˈiŋɡu, ˌalijˌenitˈoa ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌozalˈiwa na ˌalijesˈema nˌami na ˌakanˌiahˈidi kwa kiˈapo, ˌakisˈema, nˌitawˈapa watˈoto wˈako ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, ˌatatˈuma mˌalaˈika wˌake ˌakutˌaŋɡulˈie ˌili ˌumpatˈie mwanˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke kutˈoka hˌuko.|0
kˌama hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌasipˌokubˈali kˌufuatˈana nˈawe, bˌasi ˌutafˌuŋɡulˈiwa kutˈoka kiˈapo nˌilitʃˌokuapˈiʃa. ˈila ˌusimrudˈiʃe mwanˈaŋɡu hˌuko.|0
bˌasi jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakawˈeka mkˈono wˌake tʃˈini ja pˈaɟa la bwˈana wˌake ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwapˈia kuhˈusu ʃaˈuri hˈili.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mtumˈiʃi ˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡamˈia kˈumi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ŋɡamˈia za bwˈana wˈake, ˌakaondˈoka, akˈiwa ˌametʃukˈua aˈina zˈote za vˈitu vizˈuri kutˈoka kwa bwˈana wˈake. ˌakaˌelekˈea arˈamu nˌaharaˈimu na kuʃˈika ɲɟˈia kwˈenda ˈm̩ɟi wa nahˈori.|0
ˌakawˌapiɡˈiʃa ŋɡamˈia maɡˈoti karˈibu na kisˈima tʃa mˈaɟi ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, ˌilikˈuwa ˌinaˌelekˈea ɟiˈoni, wakˈati ambˈapo wˌanawˈake wˌanakˈuɟa kutˈeka mˈaɟi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaˈomba, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu, nˌipatˈie uʃˈindi lˈeo, ˌuoɲˈeʃe hurˈuma kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu.|0
tazˈama, nˌimesimˈama karˈibu na kisˈima hˈiki tʃa mˈaɟi, nˌao bˈinti za wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wˌanakˈuɟa kutˈeka mˈaɟi.|0
bˌasi na ˈiwe hˈivi, nˌitakˌapomwambˈia bˈinti mmˌoɟawˈapo, tˌafaðˈali tˈua mtˈuŋɡi wˈako nipˈate kˈuɲua mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌakisˈema, kˈuɲua, nˌitawˌaɲuˈeʃa na ŋɡamˈia wˈako pˈia. bˌasi na ˈawe n̩dˈije ˌulijˌemtʃaɡˈua kwa aɟˈili ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako isˈaki. kwa hˈili nˌitaɟˈua ˌumemhˌurumˈia bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
