ikˈawa kˈabla hˌaɟamalˈiza kuˈomba, rebˈeka ˌakatokˈea akˈiwa na mtˈuŋɡi beɡˈani mwˈake. ˌalikˈuwa bˈinti wa bˌeθuˈeli. bˌeθuˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa mˈilka ˌalijekˈuwa ˈm̩ke wa nahˈori ndˈuɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
hˈuju msitʃˈana ˌalikˈuwa mzˈuri sˈana wa sˈura, bikˈira, ambˈaje hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamekutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. ˌaliterˈemka kˌisimˈani, ˌakaɟˈaza mtˈuŋɡi wˌake ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu.|0
ndˈipo jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kˌukutˈana nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali nˈipe mˈaɟi kidˈoɡo katˌika mtˈuŋɡi wˈako.|0
jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakasˈema, kˈuɲua, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. ˌakaʃˈuʃa kwa harˈaka mtˈuŋɡi mkonˈoni mwˈake na akˈampa, akˈaɲua.|0
baˌada ja kˈumpa jˈule mtumˈiʃi jˈale mˈaɟi, ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitatˈeka mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡamˈia zˈako pˈia mpˈaka wˈote wˌatoʃˈeke.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kˌumimˈina mˈaɟi kwˈeɲe birˈika ja kˌuɲueʃˈea waɲˈama, ˌakakimbˈia kˌisimˈani kutˈeka mˈaɟi meŋɡˈine na ˌakatˈeka ja kˌuwatˈoʃa ŋɡamˈia wˌake wˈote.|0
pasˈipo kusˈema nˈeno, jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakamtazˈama kwa makˈini aˈone kˌama bwˈana ˌameˌifanikˈiʃa safˈari jˈake, ˌau la.|0
ikˈawa ŋɡamˈia wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˈuɲua wˈote, jˈule mtumˈiʃi akˈampa hˈujo msitʃˈana pˈete ja puˈani ja ðahˈabu jˌeɲe uzˈito wa bˈeka mˈoɟa na baŋɡˈili mbˈili za ðahˈabu zˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli kˈumi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ni bˈinti wa nˈani? tˌafaðˈali ˌuniambˈie, ɟˈe, kˈuna nafˈasi katˌika ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako tˌutakˌapowˈeza kulˈala.|0
jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi ni bˈinti wa bˌeθuˈeli, mwˈana wa mˈilka ˌalijˌemzalˈia nahˈori.|0
ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, kwˈetu kˈuna maɟˈani mˈeŋɡi na malˈiʃo, tˈena kˈuna nafˈasi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu kulˈala.|0
jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakasuɟˈudu na kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
ˌakisˈema, ˌatukˈuzwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu, ambˈaje hˌakuondˈoa wˈema na ˌuaminˈifu wˌake kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. mˌimi nˈami, bwˈana ˌamenˌioŋɡˈoza sˌafarˈini ˌakanˌifikˈiʃa ɲumbˈani kwa ɟamˈaa za bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakakimbˈia ˌakawˌaelˈeza wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa mˈama jˌake kuhˈusu mˈambo hˈaja.|0
rebˈeka ˌalikˈuwa na kˈaka ˌalijeˈitwa labˈani, hˈujo ˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kˌukutˈana na jˈule mtumˈiʃi kˈule kˌisimˈani.|0
mˈara ˌalipˌoiˈona ˈile pˈete puˈani, na baŋɡˈili mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa dˈada jˌake na kˌusikˈia jˈale manˈeno rebˈeka ˌalijˌoambˈiwa na hˈujo mtumˈiʃi, ˌalimwendˈea hˈujo mtumˈiʃi, ˌakamkˈuta ˌamesimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡamˈia wˌake pˈale karˈibu na kisˈima.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, karˈibu ɲumbˈani wˌewe ˌulijˌebarikˈiwa na bwˈana, kwa nˈini ˌunasimˈama hˌuko ɲɟˈe? mˌimi nˌimekˌuandalˈia ɲˈumba na mahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡamˈia.|0
hˈivjo jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani, mizˈiɡo ˌikaˌondolˈewa ɟˌuːja ŋɡamˈia. maɟˈani na malˈiʃo jˌakalˈetwa kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡamˈia na mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili jˌake na wˈatu wˌake ˌili kunˈawa miɡˈuu.|0
ndˈipo tʃakˈula kˌikaˌandalˈiwa kwa aɟˈili jˈake, lakˈini ˌakasˈema, sˌitakˈula mpˈaka nˈiwe nˌimewˌaambˈia jˈale nilˈijo nˈajo ja kusˈema. labˈani ˌakasˈema, bˌasi tˌuambˈie.|0
hˈivjo ˌakasˈema, mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
bwˈana ˌamembarˈiki sˈana bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˌamekˈuwa taɟˈiri. amˈempa kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe, fˈeða na ðahˈabu, wˌatumˈiʃi wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, ŋɡamˈia na pˈunda.|0
sˈara mkˈewe bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamemzalˈia mwˈana katˌika uzˈee wˈake, nˌaje amˈempa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo.|0
nˌaje bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamenˌiapˈiʃa na ˌakasˈema, kˈamwe ˌusimtwalˈie mwanˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke katˌika bˈinti za wˌakanaˈani, ambˈao nˌinaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
ˈila uˈende mpˈaka kwa ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na ukˈoo wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, ˌukamtwalˈie mwanˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke hˌuko..|0
kˈiʃa nˌikamˌuulˈiza bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ɟˈe, kˌama hˈujo mwanˈamke hˌatakubˈali kurˈudi nˈami?.|0
ˌakaniɟˈibu, bwˈana ambˈaje nˌimetembˈea mbˈele zˈake, ˌatatˈuma mˌalaˈika wˌake pamˈoɟa nˈawe, na kˌuifˌanikˈiʃa safˈari jˈako, ˌili uwˈeze kupˈata ˈm̩ke kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈaŋɡu katˌika ukˈoo wˈaŋɡu na kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa, ˌutakˌapokwˈenda kwˈeɲe ukˈoo wˈaŋɡu, ˌutakˈuwa ˌumefˌuŋɡulˈiwa kutˈoka kiˈapo tʃˈaŋɡu hˌata kˌama wˌakikatˈaa kukˈupa hˈujo bˈinti, ˌutakˈuwa ˌumefˌuŋɡulˈiwa kutˈoka kiˈapo tʃˈaŋɡu..|0
nˌilipokˈuɟa kˌisimˈani lˈeo nˌilisˈema, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu, ˌikikˌupendˈeza, naˈomba ˌuifˌanikˈiʃe safˈari nˌilijˌoiɟˈia.|0
tazˈama, nˌinasimˈama kˈando ja kisˈima hˈiki, kˌama mwˌanamwˈali akˈiɟa kutˈeka mˈaɟi nˌami nˌikimwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali nˌiruhˈusu nˈiɲue mˈaɟi kidˈoɡo kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mtˈuŋɡi wˈako.|0
nˌaje kˌama ˌakinˌiambˈia, kˈuɲua, nˌami nˌitatˈeka mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡamˈia wˈako pˈia, bˌasi hˈujo ˈawe n̩dˈije ˈm̩ke ambˈaje bwˈana ˌamemtʃˌaɡulˈia mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu..|0
kˈabla sˌiɟamalˈiza kuˈomba mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, rebˈeka ˌakatokˈea, ˌamebˈeba mtˈuŋɡi beɡˈani mwˈake. ˌakaʃˈuka kˌisimˈani ˌakatˈeka mˈaɟi, nˌami nˌikamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali nˈipe mˈaɟi nˈiɲue..|0
ˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kuʃˈuʃa mtˈuŋɡi wˌake beɡˈani na kusˈema, kˈuɲua na nˌitawˌaɲuˈeʃa ŋɡamˈia wˈako pˈia, bˌasi nikˈaɲua, ˌakawˌaɲuˈeʃa na ŋɡamˈia pˈia.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ni bˈinti wa nˈani? ˌakasˈema, mˌimi ni bˈinti wa bˌeθuˈeli, mwˈana wa nahˈori, mˈilka ˌalijˌemzalˈia. ndˈipo nˌilipotˈia pˈete puˈani mwˈake na baŋɡˈili mˌikonˈoni mwˈake.|0
nˌikasuɟˈudu na nˌikamwabˈudu bwˈana. nˌikamtukˈuza bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu, ˌalijˌenioŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia sahˈihi ˌili nˌimtwalˈie mwˈana na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˈm̩ke katˌika ɟamˈaa zˈake.|0
ikˈiwa mtˌaoɲˈeʃa wˈema na ˌuaminˈifu kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mnˌiambˈie, la sˈivjo, mnˌiambˈie, ˌili niwˈeze kuɟˈua ɲɟˈia ja kˌuɡeukˈia.|0
labˈani na bˌeθuˈeli wˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈambo hˈili lˌimetˈoka kwa bwˈana, hˌatuwˈezi kˌukuambˈia ɟˈambo lolˈote bˈaja ˌau ɟˈema.|0
rebˈeka jˈuko hˈapa, mtʃukˈue na uˈende, ˈawe ˈm̩ke wa mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈako, sˌawasˈawa na bwˈana ˌalivjˌooŋɡˈoza.|0
ikˈawa hˈujo mtumˈiʃi wa ˌabrahˈamu ˌalipˌosikˈia wˌalijosˈema, ˌalisuɟˈudu mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mtumˈiʃi ˌakatˈoa vˈitu vˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu na kwa fˈeða pamˈoɟa na mavˈazi, akˈampa rebˈeka, pˈia ˌakawˈapa zawˈadi za θamˈani kˈubwa nduɡˈuje na mamˈaje.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeje na wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wakˈala, wakˈaɲua na kulˈala pˌalepˈale. wˌalipoˈamka ˌasubˈuhi, jˈule mtumˈiʃi, ˌakasˈema, nipˈeni ruhˈusa nirˈudi kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini ndˈuɡu jˌake rebˈeka pamˈoɟa na mˈama jˌake wˌakaɟˈibu, ˈatʃa bˈinti akˈae kwˈetu sˈiku kˈumi ˌau zaˈidi, ndˈipo mwondˈoke.|0
lakˈini jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakawˌaambˈia, msˌinitʃˌelewˈeʃe, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamefˌanikˈiʃa safˈari jˈaŋɡu, nipˈeni ruhˈusa nirˈudi kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo wˌakasˈema, ˈatʃa tumwˈite hˈujo bˈinti tˌumuulˈize, tˌusikˈie ˌatakˌavjosˈema.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamwˈita rebˈeka na kˌumuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌutakwˈenda na ˈm̩tu hˈuju? ˌakasˈema, nˌitakwˈenda.|0
hˈivjo wˌakamwˈaɡa ndˈuɡu jˈao rebˈeka ˌaondˈoke, pamˈoɟa na mɟakˈazi wˈake, mtumˈiʃi wa ˌabrahˈamu na wˈatu wˈake.|0
wˌakambarˈiki rebˈeka, wˌakamwambˈia, ndˈuɡu jˈetu, ˈuwe wˌewe kˈumi ˈelfu, mˈara ˈelfu ɲˈiŋɡi, nˌao wazˈao wˈako wˌamilˈiki malˈaŋɡo ja adˈui zˈao.|0
rebˈeka na vˌiɟakˈazi wˌake wˌakaɟˌiandˈaa, wˌakapˈanda ŋɡamˈia zˈao wˌakafˌuatˈana na jˈule ˈm̩tu. hˈivjo jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakamtʃukˈua rebˈeka ˌakaondˈoka.|0
bˌasi isˈaki ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈoka bˈeer lahˈai rˈoi, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi ˈn̩tʃi ja neɡˈebu.|0
isˈaki ˌakatˈoka kwˈenda ʃambˈani kˌutafakˈari wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni, ˌalipˌoinˈua mˈatʃo jˈake, ˌakaˈona ŋɡamˈia wˌanakˈuɟa.|0
rebˈeka pˈia ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo ˌakamwˈona isˈaki. ˌakaʃˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ŋɡamˈia wˈake.|0
na ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈule mtumˈiʃi, ni nˈani ˈm̩tu jˈule alˈije kˈule ʃambˈani ˌanajekˈuɟa kˌutulˈaki? jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakaɟˈibu, hˈuju n̩dˈije bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. hˈivjo rebˈeka ˌakatʃukˈua ʃˈela jˌake ˌakaɟˌifunˈika.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule mtumˈiʃi ˌakamwelˈeza isˈaki mˈambo jˈote ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
ndˈipo isˈaki ˌakamwiŋɡˈiza rebˈeka katˌika hˈema la sˈara mˈama jˈake, isˈaki ˌakamtʃukˈua rebˈeka, hˈivjo akˈawa ˈm̩ke wˈake. isˈaki ˌakampˈenda, ˌakafˌariɟˈika baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa mˈama jˈake.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌaliˈoa ˈm̩ke mwiŋɡˈine, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ˌaliˈitwa ketˈura.|0
hˈuju ˌalimzalˈia zimrˈani, jokʃˈani, medˈani, mˌidiˈani, iʃbˈaki na ʃˈua.|0
jokʃˈani ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ʃˈeba na dedˈani, wazˈao wa dedˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌaaʃˈuri, wˌaletˈuʃi na wˌaleˈumi.|0
wˈana wa mˌidiˈani wˌalikˈuwa ˈefa, efˈeri, hanˈoki, abˈida na eldˈaa. hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa uzˈao wa ketˈura.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamwatʃˈia isˈaki kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo.|0
lakˈini ˌabrahˈamu ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado hˈai, ˌakawˈapa watˈoto wa mˌasurˈia wˌake zawˈadi, kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaondˈoa waˈende kuˈiʃi pˈande za mˌaʃarˈiki mbˈali na mwanˈawe isˈaki.|0
kwa ɟˈumla, ˌabrahˈamu ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa sabˈininatˈano.|0
watˈoto wˌake isˈaki na ˌiʃmaˈeli wˌakamzˈika katˌika pˈaŋɡo la makpˈela karˈibu na mˈamre, katˌika ʃˈamba lˌililokˈuwa la efrˈoni mwˈana wa sohˈari mhˈiti.|0
ʃˈamba ambˈalo ˌabrahˈamu ˌalilˌinunˈua kwa wahˈiti. hˈapo ndˈipo ˌabrahˈamu ˌalipozˈikwa pamˈoɟa na mkˈewe sˈara.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu ˌakambarˈiki mwanˈawe isˈaki, ambˈaje bˌaadˈaje ˌaliˈiʃi karˈibu na bˈeer lahˈai rˈoi.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja ˌiʃmaˈeli mtˈoto wa ˌabrahˈamu, ambˈaje mɟakˈazi wˌake sˈara, haɡˈari mmˈisri, ˌalimzalˈia ˌabrahˈamu.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈana wa ˌiʃmaˈeli, jˌalijˌooroðˈeʃwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na ɟˈinsi wˌalivjˌozalˈiwa: mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ˌiʃmaˈeli ni nˌebajˈoθi, ˌakafˌuatˈia kedˈari, ˌadbeˈeli, mibsˈamu.|0
mˈiʃma, dˈuma, mˈasa.|0
hadˈadi, tˈema, jetˈuri, nafˈiʃi na kedˈema.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa ˌiʃmaˈeli na hˈaja ni maɟˈina ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakabˈila kˈumi na mawˈili kˌuliŋɡˈana na makˈao jˈao na kˈambi zˈao.|0
kwa ɟˈumla ˌiʃmaˈeli ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa θˌeleθˈininasˈaba. ˌakapumˈua pˈumzi ja mwˈiʃo, akˈafa, nˌaje ˌakakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake.|0
wazˈao wa ˌiʃmaˈeli wˌaliˈiʃi kˌuanzˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja havˈila hˌadi ʃˈuri, karˈibu na mpˈaka wa mˈisri, ˌunapˌoelekˈea aʃˈuru. hˈao wˌaliˈiʃi kwa ˌuhasˈama na ndˈuɡu zˈao wˈote.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja isˈaki mwˈana wa ˌabrahˈamu. ˌabrahˈamu ˌakamzˈaa isˈaki.|0
isˈaki ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini ˌalipomwˈoa rebˈeka bˈinti bˌeθuˈeli mwarˈamu kutˈoka pˈadan arˈamu, nduɡˈuje labˈani mwarˈamu.|0
isˈaki ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩ke wˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa tˈasa. bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu maˈombi jˌake na rebˈeka mkˈewe ˌakapˈata mˈimba.|0
watˈoto wˌakaʃindˈana tumbˈoni mwˈake, ˌakasˈema, kwa nˈini hˈaja jˌanatokˈea kwˈaŋɡu? kwa hˈijo ˌakaˈenda kˌumuulˈiza bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌataˈifa mawˈili jˈamo tumbˈoni mwˈako, na mˌataˈifa hˈajo mawˈili kutˈoka ndˈani jˈako wˌatatˌeŋɡanˈiʃwa. mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi kulˈiko mwiŋɡˈine, na jˈule mkˈubwa ˌatamtˌumikˈia jˈule mdˈoɡo.|0
wakˈati wˌake wa kˌuɟifuŋɡˈua ˌulipˌotimˈia, wˌalikuwˈepo mapˈatʃa wa kiˈume tumbˈoni mwˈake.|0
wa kwˈanza kˌuzalˈiwa ˌalikˈuwa mwekˈundu, mwˈili wˌake wˈote ˌulikˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa vˈazi lˈeɲe ɲuˈele; wˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake esˈau.|0
bˌaadˈaje, ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌakatˈoka, mkˈono wˌake ukˈiwa ˌumemʃˈika esˈau kˌisiɡˈino; ˌakaˈitwa ɟˈina lˈake jakˈobo. isˈaki ˌalikˈuwa mwˌeɲe miˈaka sitˈini rebˈeka ˌalipˌowazˈaa.|0
watˈoto wˌakakˈua, nˌaje esˈau ˌakakˈuwa mwindˈaɟi hodˈari, ˈm̩tu wa mbuɡˈani, wakˈati jakˈobo ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mtulˈivu, mwˌeɲe kukˈaa ɲumbˈani.|0
isˈaki, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌanapˌendelˈea zaˈidi ɲˈama za porˈini, ˌalimpˈenda esˈau, bˌali rebˈeka ˌalimpˈenda jakˈobo.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa jakˈobo ˌalipˈika mtʃˈuzi wa dˈeŋɡu, esˈau ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka porˈini akˈiwa na ɲɟˈaa kˈali.|0
esˈau ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, harˈaka, nˈipe hˈuo mtʃˈuzi mwekˈundu! nˈina ɲɟˈaa kˈali sˈana! hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu pˈia ˌaliˈitwa edˈomu..|0
jakˈobo ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌiuzˈie kwˈanza hˈaki jˈako ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
esˈau ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, mˌimi nˈiko karˈibu ja kˈufa, ˌitanifˈaa nˈini hˈaki ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiapˈie kwˈanza. hˈivjo esˈau ˌakamwapˈia, ˌakamˌuuzˈia jakˈobo hˈaki jˌake ja kˌuzalˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo akˈampa esˈau mkˈate na ˈule mtʃˈuzi wa dˈeŋɡu. akˈala na kˈuɲua, kˈiʃa ˌakainˈuka ˌakaˈenda zˈake. kwa hˈijo esˈau ˌaliðarˈau hˈaki jˌake ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
bˌasi ɲɟˈaa kˈubwa ikˈawa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, kulˈiko ˈile ɲɟˈaa ˌilijˌotaŋɡulˈia ˌilijˌotokˈea wakˈati wa ˌabrahˈamu. isˈaki ˌakamwendˈea ˌabimelˈeki mfˈalme wa wˌafilˈisti hˌuko ɡerˈari.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea isˈaki, ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusiˈende mˈisri, bˌali ukˈae katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌitakˌajokˌuambˈia.|0
kˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kwa kitˈambo, mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˌewe na nˌitakˌubarˈiki. kwa maˈana nˌitakˈupa wˌewe na uzˈao wˈako ˈn̩tʃi hˈizi zˈote na nˌitatimˈiza kiˈapo nˌilitʃˌomwapˈia ˌabrahˈamu bˈaba jˈako.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa wazˈao wˈako kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani, nˌami nˌitawˈapa ˈn̩tʃi hˈizi zˈote na kˌutokˈana na uzˈao wˈako mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌabrahˈamu ˌalinitˈii mˌimi ˌakatˈunza kanˈuni zˈaŋɡu na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu, ˈamri zˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo isˈaki ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko ɡerˈari.|0
wˈatu wa mahˈali pˈale wˌalipˌomuulˈiza habˈari za ˈm̩ke wˈake, ˌakasˈema, hˈuju ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌalioɡˈopa kusˈema, hˈuju ni ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu. ˌalifikˈiri, wˈatu wa mahˈali pˈale wˌatawˈeza kˌumuˈua kwa sabˈabu ja rebˈeka, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa mzˈuri wa sˈura.|0
wakˈati isˈaki ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈaa hˌuko sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi, ˌabimelˈeki mfˈalme wa wˌafilˈisti ˌakatʃˌuŋɡulˈia dˌiriʃˈani, ˌakaˈona ɟˈinsi isˈaki ˌalivjˌomkumbatˈia rebˈeka ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamwˈita isˈaki ˌakamwambˈia, hakˈika hˈuju ni ˈm̩ke wˈako! mbˈona ˌulinˌiambˈia, hˈuju ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu?  isˈaki ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu nˌilifikˈiri nˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌuuˈawa kwa sabˈabu jˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamɟˈibu, ni nˈini hˈiki ˌulitʃˌotufaɲˈia? ˌiŋɡewˌezekˈana ˈm̩tu jejˈote akˈawa ˌamekutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wˈako, nˌawe ˌuŋɡelˈeta hatˈia ɟˈuu jˈetu.|0
hˈivjo ˌabimelˈeki ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kwa wˈatu wˈote, ˌakisˈema, jejˈote ˌatakˌajemɲaɲˈasa ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌau mkˈewe hakˈika ˌatauˈawa.|0
isˈaki ˌakapˈanda mazˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, kwa mwˈaka hˈuo hˈuo, ˌakavˈuna mˈara mˈia, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalimbarˈiki.|0
isˈaki akˈawa taɟˈiri, mˈali zˌake zˌikaˌendelˈea kˌuoŋɡezˈeka mpˈaka akˈawa taɟˈiri sˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo visˈima vjˈote vˌilivjotʃˈimbwa na wˌatumˈiʃi wakˈati wa ˌabrahˈamu bˈaba jˈake, wˌafilˈisti wˌakavˌifukˈia, wˌakaviɟˈaza udˈoŋɡo.|0
ndˈipo ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamwambˈia isˈaki, ondˈoka kwˈetu, kwa maˈana ˌumetuzˈidi ŋɡˈuvu sˈana.|0
bˌasi isˈaki ˌakatˈoka hˌuko ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa kˈambi katˌika bˈonde la ɡerˈari, ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
ndˈipo isˈaki ˌakavˌitʃimbˈua tˈena vˈile visˈima vja mˈaɟi ambˈavjo vˌilitʃˈimbwa sˈiku zˈile za ˌabrahˈamu bˈaba jˈake, ambˈavjo wˌafilˈisti wˌalivˌifukˈia baˌada ja kˈufa ˌabrahˈamu, ˌakavˈipa maɟˈina jˈale jˈale ambˈajo bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈipa.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa isˈaki wˌakatʃˈimba katˌika lˈile bˈonde wˌakaɡundˈua hˌuko kisˈima tʃˌeɲe mˈaɟi sˈafi.|0
lakˈini wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa ɡerˈari wˌakaɡombˈana na wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa isˈaki wˌakisˈema, mˈaɟi hˈaja ni jˈetu! ndˈipo ˌakakiˈita kˈile kisˈima esˈeki, kwa sabˈabu wˌaliɡombˈana nˈaje.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatʃˈimba kisˈima kiŋɡˈine, lakˈini hˌata hˈitʃo pˈia wˌakakˌiɡombanˈia, ˌakakiˈita sˈitna.|0
ˌakaondˈoka hˌuko, ˌakatʃˈimba kisˈima kiŋɡˈine, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌekiɡˌombanˈia. ˌakakiˈita rˌehobˈoθi, ˌakisˈema, sˈasa bwˈana ˌametˌufaɲˈia nafˈasi, nˌasi tˌutastˈawi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kutˈoka pˈale ˌakaˈenda bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
usˈiku ˈule bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea, ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu bˈaba jˈako. ˌusioɡˈope, kwa maˈana mˌimi nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌitakˌubarˈiki na kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja wazˈao wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja ˌabrahˈamu mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu.|0
isˈaki ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu hˌuko, ˌakalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana. ˌakapˈiɡa hˈema lˈake hˌuko, nˌao wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakatʃˈimba kisˈima.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, ˌabimelˈeki ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemɟˈia kutˈoka ɡerˈari, ˌakifˌuatˈana na ˌahuzˈaθi mʃaˈuri wˈake, pamˈoɟa na fikˈoli ɟˌemadˈari wa maɟˈeʃi jˈake.|0
isˈaki ˌakawˌaulˈiza, mbˈona mmekˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu na nˈiɲi mlˌinitʃukˈia na kˌunifukˈuza.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, tˌuliˈona wˈazi kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe, kwa hˈijo tˌukasˈema, ˌinabˈidi kˈuwe na kiˈapo tʃa mˌapatˈano kˈati jˈetu, kˈati jˈetu na wˈewe. na tufˈaɲe mkatˈaba pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
kwˌamba hˌutatuðˈuru, kˌama ɟˈinsi nˌasi hˌatukˌuwaɲaɲˈasa bˌali tˌuliwˌatendˈea mˈema wakˈati wˈote na kˌuwaondˈoa kwˈetu kwa amˈani. tˈena sˈasa ˌumebˌarikˈiwa na bwˈana..|0
bˌasi isˈaki ˌakawˌaandalˈia karˈamu, nˌao wakˈala na kˈuɲua.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, wˌakaˌapizˈana wˌao kwa wˈao. kˈiʃa isˈaki ˌakawˌaruhˈusu waˈende zˈao, wˌakamwˈatʃa isˈaki kwa amˈani.|0
sˈiku hˈijo wˌatumˈiʃi wa isˈaki wakˈaɟa wakˈampa habˈari kuhˈusu kisˈima wˌalitʃokˈuwa wˌamekitʃˈimba, wˌakamwambˈia, tˌumepˈata mˈaɟi.|0
nˌaje ˌakakiˈita ʃˈiba, mpˈaka lˈeo ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo ˌunaˈitwa bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
esˈau ˌalipokˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, ˌakamwˈoa judˈiθi bˈinti beˈeri mhˈiti, kˈiʃa ˌakamwˈoa bˌasemˈaθi bˈinti elˈoni mhˈiti.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈanzo tʃa huzˈuni ja isˈaki na rebˈeka.|0
isˈaki ˌalipokˈuwa m̩zˈee na mˈatʃo jˌake jˌalipokˈuwa jˌamekˈosa ŋɡˈuvu ˌasiwˈeze kuˈona tˈena, ˌakamwˈita esˈau mwanˈawe mkˈubwa, ˌakamwambˈia, mwanˈaŋɡu. ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
isˈaki ˌakasˈema, mˌimi sˈasa ni m̩zˈee na siɟˈui sˈiku ja kˈifo tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, tʃukˈua silˈaha zˈako, pˈodo na upˈinde, uˈende ɲikˈani, ˌukawˈinde ɲˈama pˈori kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuniˌandalˈie aˈina ja tʃakˈula kitˈamu nˌikipendˈatʃo ˌuniletˈee nˈile, ˌili niwˈeze kˌukubarˈiki kˈabla siɟˈafa.|0
bˌasi rebˈeka ˌalikˈuwa ˌakisˌikilˈiza isˈaki ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza na mwanˈawe esˈau. esˈau ˌalipˌoondˈoka kwˈenda ɲikˈani kuwˈinda ɲˈama pˈori na kulˈeta.|0
rebˈeka ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo mwanˈawe, tazˈama, nˌimemsikˈia bˈaba jˈako ˌakimwambˈia ndˈuɡu jˈako esˈau.|0
nˌiletˈee mawˈindo, kˈiʃa ˌukanˌiandalˈie tʃakˈula kitˈamu nˈile, ˌili niwˈeze kˌukubarˈiki mbˈele za bwˈana kˈabla siɟˈafa..|0
sˈasa, mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌisikilˈize kwa makˈini na ufˈaɲe jˈale nˌinajˌokuambˈia.|0
nˈenda sˈasa katˌika kˈundi ˌukanˌiletˈee wˌanambˈuzi wawˈili wazˈuri, ˌili nˌiandalˈie tʃakˈula kitˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba jˈako, kˌama vˈile ˌanavjopˈenda.|0
kˈiʃa ˌumpelekˈee bˈaba jˈako ˈale, ˌili apˈate kˌukubarˈiki kˈabla haɟˈafa.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia rebˈeka mˈama jˈake, lakˈini ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu esˈau ˈana ɲuˈele mwilˈini, mˌimi nˈina ŋɡˈozi ɲorˈoro.|0
ˌitakuwˈaɟe kˌama bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌakiniɡˈusa? ˌitaˌonekˈana kwˈake kˌama nˌilijˌemfaɲˈia uɟˈaɲɟa na kulˈeta laˈana ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu badˈala ja barˈaka.|0
mˈama jˌake ˌakamwambˈia, mwanˈaŋɡu, laˈana na ˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu. fˈaɲa tu nˌinalˌokuambˈia, nˈenda ˌukanˌiletˈee hˈao wˌanambˈuzi.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌalikwˈenda ˌakawalˈeta, akˈampa mˈama jˈake, ˌakaandˈaa tʃakˈula kitˈamu, kˌama vˈile ˌalivjopˈenda bˈaba jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa rebˈeka ˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡˈuo nzˈuri za esˈau mwanˈawe wa kwˈanza, ˌalizokˈuwa nˈazo ɲumbˈani, ˌakamvˈika jakˈobo mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo.|0
pˈia ˌakamfunˈika mˌikonˈoni na sehˈemu laˈini ja ʃˈiŋɡo kwa ŋɡˈozi za mbˈuzi.|0
hˌatimˈaje akˈampa jakˈobo hˈitʃo tʃakˈula kitˈamu pamˈoɟa na mkˈate ˌaliˌouˈoka.|0
ˌakamwendˈea bˈaba jˌake ˌakasˈema, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu. ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈaam, mwanˈaŋɡu, wˌewe ni nˈani.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, mˌimi ni esˈau mzalˈiwa wˈako wa kwˈanza. nˌimefˈaɲa kˌama ˌulivjˌoniambˈia. tˌafaðˈali ukˈeti, ˈule sehˈemu ja mawˈindo jˈaŋɡu ˌili uwˈeze kˌunibarˈiki.|0
isˈaki ˌakamˌuulˈiza mwanˈawe. ˌumepatˈaɟe harˈaka nˈamna hˌii, mwanˈaŋɡu? ˌakaɟˈibu, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamenˌifanikˈiʃa.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaki ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, mwanˈaŋɡu tˌafaðˈali soɡˈea karˈibu nˌami ˌili nˌikupapˈase, niˈone kˌama hakˈika ndˈiwe esˈau mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌau la.|0
jakˈobo ˌakasoɡˈea karˈibu na bˈaba jˌake isˈaki, ambˈaje ˌalimpapˈasa na kusˈema, saˈuti ni ja jakˈobo, bˌali mikˈono ni ja esˈau.|0
hˌakumtambˈua, kwa sabˈabu mikˈono jˌake ˌilikˈuwa na ɲuˈele kˌama ja ndˈuɡu jˌake esˈau, kwa hˈijo ˌakambarˈiki.|0
ˌakamˌuulˈiza, hˈivi kwˈeli wˌewe ni mwanˈaŋɡu esˈau? ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi n̩dˈije.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌiletˈee sehˈemu ja mawˈindo jˈako nˈile, ˌili nipˈate kˌukubarˈiki. jakˈobo ˌakamletˈea nˌaje akˈala, ˌakamletˈea na divˈai akˈaɲua.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaki bˈaba jˌake ˌakamwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo hˈapa, mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌunibˈusu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakamwendˈea ˌakambˈusu. isˈaki ˌalipˌosikˈia harˈufu ja ŋɡˈuo zˈake, ˌakambarˈiki, ˌakasˈema, ˈaha, harˈufu ja mwanˈaŋɡu ni kˌama harˈufu ja ʃˈamba ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamelˌibarˈiki.|0
mˈuŋɡu na akˈupe umˈande kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌutaɟˈiri wa dˌuniˈani: wˈiŋɡi wa nafˈaka na divˈai ˈm̩pja.|0
mˌataˈifa na jˌakutˌumikˈie na mˌataˈifa jˌakusˌuɟudˈie. ˈuwe bwˈana ɟˌuːja ndˈuɡu zˈako, na wˈana wa mˈama jˈako wˌakusˌuɟudˈie. wˌalaanˈiwe wˈale wˌakulˌaanˈio, nˌao wˈale wˌakubˌarikˈio wˌabarikˈiwe.|0
baˌada ja isˈaki kˌumalˈiza kˌumbarˈiki na baˌada tu ja jakˈobo kˌuondˈoka kwa bˈaba jˈake, ndˈuɡu jˌake esˈau ˌakaiŋɡˈia kutˈoka mˌawindˈoni.|0
nˌaje pˈia ˌakaandˈaa tʃakˈula kitˈamu ˌakamletˈea bˈaba jˈake. kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kˈeti ˈule sehˈemu ja mawˈindo jˈaŋɡu, ˌili upˈate kˌunibarˈiki.|0
isˈaki bˈaba jˌake ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ni nˈani? ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mwanˈao, mzalˈiwa wˈako wa kwˈanza, esˈau.|0
isˈaki ˌakatˌetemˈeka kwa ŋɡˈuvu sˈana, ˌakasˈema, ˌalikˈuwa nˈani bˈasi, ambˈaje ˌaliwˈinda mawˈindo ˌakanˌiletˈea? nˌilikˈula kˈabla tu huɟˈaɟa na nˌikambarˈiki, nˌaje hakˈika ˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
esˈau ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno hˈaja ja bˈaba jˈake, ˌakalˈia saˈuti kˈubwa na ja utʃˈuŋɡu, na kˌumwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, nˌibarˈiki mˈimi, mˌimi pˈia, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini ˌakasˈema, ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌamekˈuɟa kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na ˌakatʃukˈua barˈaka jˈako.|0
esˈau ˌakasˈema, si n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ˌanaˈitwa jakˈobo? ˌamenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa mˈara hˈizi mbˈili: ˌalitʃukˈua hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ja kˌuzalˈiwa na sˈasa ˌametʃukˈua barˈaka jˈaŋɡu! kˈiʃa ˌakaulˈiza, hˌukubakˈiza hˌata barˈaka mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
isˈaki ˌakamɟˈibu esˈau, nˌimemfˈaɲa jˌeje kˌuwa bwˈana ɟˈuu jˈako, pˈia nˌimewafˈaɲa ndˈuɡu zˈako wˈote kˌuwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, nˌimemtˌeɡemˈeza kwa nafˈaka na divˈai ˈm̩pja. sˈasa nˌitawˈeza kˌukufaɲˈia nˈini, mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
esˈau ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, ɟˈe, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˈuna barˈaka mˈoɟa tˈu? ˌunibarˈiki mˌimi pˈia, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! kˈiʃa esˈau ˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa.|0
bˈaba jˌake isˈaki ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌakamwambˈia, makˈao jˈako jˌatakˈuwa mbˈali na ˌutaɟˈiri wa dunˈia, mbˈali na umˈande wa mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu.|0
ˌutaˈiʃi kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌawe ˌutamtˌumikˈia ndˈuɡu jˈako, lakˈini wakˈati ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumeɟˌikombˈoa, ˌutatˈupa nˈira jˌake kutˈoka ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako.|0
esˈau akˈawa na kiɲˈoŋɡo ðˈidi ja jakˈobo kwa aɟˈili ja barˈaka ambˈazo bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamembarˈiki. ˌakasˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, sˈiku za kˌuombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu zˌimekˌaribˈia, ndˈipo nˌitamuˈua ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu jakˈobo.|0
rebˈeka ˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌuambˈiwa jˈale ˌalijˌojasˈema esˈau mwanˈawe mkˈubwa, ˌalimwˈita jakˈobo mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo, ˌakamwambˈia, ndˈuɡu jˈako esˈau ˌanaɟˌifarˈiɟi kwa wˈazo la kˌukuˈua.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, mwanˈaŋɡu, fˈaɲa nˌisemˈalo: kˌimbilˈia harˈaka kwa labˈani ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu kˈule harˈani.|0
ukˈae nˌaje kwa mˈuda mpˈaka ɣaðˈabu ja ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌitulˈie.|0
wakˈati ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌatakˌapokˈuwa hˈana hasˈira nˌawe tˈena na ˌamesahˈau ˌulijˌomtendˈea, nˌitakˌupelekˈea uɟˈumbe urˈudi. kwa nˈini nˌiwapotˈeze wˈote wawˈili kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa rebˈeka ˌakamwambˈia isˈaki, nˌimetʃukˈia kuˈiʃi kwa sabˈabu ja hˈawa wˌanawˈake wa kihˈiti. ikˈiwa jakˈobo ˌataˈoa ˈm̩ke mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanawˈake wa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, wˌanawˈake wa kihˈiti kˌama hˈawa, sˌitakˈuwa na faˈida kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi.|0
bˌasi isˈaki ˌakamwˈita jakˈobo, ˌakambarˈiki na ˌakamwamˈuru, ˌakisˈema, ˌusiˈoe mwanˈamke wa kˌikanaˈani.|0
nˈenda mˈara mˈoɟa mpˈaka pˈadan arˈamu, kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja bˌeθuˈeli bˈaba wa mˈama jˈako. ˌutʃukˈue ˈm̩ke kˈati ja bˈinti za labˈani ambˈaje ni ndˈuɡu wa mˈama jˈako.|0
mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi na ˌakubarˈiki ˈuwe na uzˈao ˌuoŋɡezˈeke idˈadi jˈako upˈate kˌuwa ɟamˈii kˈubwa ja wˈatu.|0
na akˈupe wˌewe na uzˈao wˈako barˈaka ˌalijopˈewa ˌabrahˈamu, upˈate kˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajoˈiʃi sˈasa kˌama mɡˈeni, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu alˈimpa ˌabrahˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaki ˌakamuˈaɡa jakˈobo, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda pˈadan arˈamu, kwa labˈani mwˈana wa bˌeθuˈeli mwarˈamu, ndˈuɡu wa rebˈeka, ˌalijekˈuwa mˈama wa jakˈobo na esˈau.|0
sˈasa esˈau ˌakaɟˈua kˌuwa isˈaki ˌamembarˈiki jakˈobo na kumtˈuma kwˈenda pˈadan arˈamu ˌili ˌatʃukˈue ˈm̩ke hˌuko na kwˌamba ˌalipˌombarˈiki ˌalimwamˈuru ˌakisˈema, ˌusiˈoe ˈm̩ke katˌika bˈinti za wˌakanaˈani.|0
tˈena kwˌamba jakˈobo ˌamewatˈii bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake nˌaje ˌamekwˈenda pˈadan arˈamu.|0
esˈau ˌakatambˈua ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo bˈaba jˌake isˈaki ˌanavjˌowatʃukˈia bˈinti za wˌakanaˈani.|0
ndˈipo esˈau ˌakaˈenda kwa ˌiʃmaˈeli, ˌakamwˈoa mˌahalˈati, ndˈuɡu wa nˌebajˈoθi na bˈinti wa ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa ˌabrahˈamu, kˌuoŋɡezˈea wˈale wˌake weŋɡˈine ˌaliokˈuwa nˈao.|0
jakˈobo ˌakatˈoka bˈeer ʃˈeba kwˈenda harˈani.|0
ˌalipofˈika mahˈali fulˈani, ˌakalˈala hˈapo kwa sabˈabu ɟˈua lˌilikˈuwa lˌimetˈua. ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈiwe mˈoɟa la mahˈali pˈale, ˌakaliwˈeka tʃˈini ja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa ˌakalˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi.|0
ˌakaˈota ndˈoto ambˈajo ˌaliˈona ŋɡˈazi ˌimesˌimamˈiʃwa ɟˌuːja ˈarði, ˈn̩tʃa jˌake ikˈiwa ˌimefˈika mbiŋɡˈuni na mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu wakˈawa wˌakipˈanda na kuʃˈuka ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɟˈuu jˌake ˌalisimˈama bwˈana, ˌakasˈema, mˌimi ni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako ˌabrahˈamu na mˈuŋɡu wa isˈaki. ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌumelˈala ɟˈuu jˈake, nˌitakˈupa wˌewe na uzˈao wˈako.|0
uzˈao wˈako ˌutakˈuwa kˌama mavˈumbi ja ˈn̩tʃi, nˌawe ˌutaenˈea upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi na mˌaʃarˈiki, kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini. kˌupitˈia wˌewe na uzˈao wˈako mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dˌuniˈani jˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˌawe nˌami nˌitakulˈinda kˈila ˌuendˈako na nˌitakˌurudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. sˌitakuˈatʃa mpˈaka nˌitakˌapofˈaɲa hˈajo nˌilijˌokuahˈidi.|0
jakˈobo ˌalipoˈamka kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡizˈini, ˌakawˈaza, hakˈika bwˈana jˈuko mahˈali hˈapa, wˈala mˌimi sˌikuɟˈua.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaoɡˈopa, ˌakasˈema, mahˈali hˈapa pˌanatˈiʃa kˌama nˈini! bˌila ʃˈaka hˈapa ndˈipo ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu ilˈipo, hˈili ni lˈaŋɡo la mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˌake na mapˈema, jakˈobo ˌakalˌitʃukˈua lˈile ɟˈiwe ˌalilˌoliwˈeka tʃˈini ja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, ˌakalˌisimamˈiʃa kˌama ŋɡˈuzo na kˌumimˈina mafˈuta ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
mahˈali pˈale ˌakapaˈita beθˈeli, iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩ɟi ˈule hˈapo kwˈanza ˌuliˈitwa lˈuzu.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakawˈeka naðˈiri, ˌakisˈema, kˌama mˈuŋɡu akˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˌami na kˌunilˈinda katˌika safˈari nˌiendˈajo, ˌakinˈipa tʃakˈula nˈile na ŋɡˈuo nivˈae.|0
na nirˈudi salˈama ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, hˈapo ndˈipo bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈalo ɟˈiwe hˈili nˌililˌolisˌimamˈiʃa kˌama ŋɡˈuzo lˌitakˈuwa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu na katˌika jˈote ˌutakˌajonˈipa nˌitakˌutolˈea wˌewe sehˈemu ja kˈumi.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakaˌendelˈea na safˈari jˌake na ˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi za mˌataˈifa ja mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
hˌuko ˌakaˈona kisˈima katˌika ʃˈamba, pamˈoɟa na makˈundi matˈatu ja kondˈoo jˌamelˈala karˈibu na kisˈima hˈitʃo kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌanakˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌisimˈani hˈitʃo. ɟˈiwe lˌililokˈuwa mdomˈoni ˌm̩wa kisˈima lˌilikˈuwa kˈubwa.|0
wakˈati kondˈoo wˌanapokˈuwa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˈapo, wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi hˌuviŋɡirˈiʃa ɟˈiwe hˌilo kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa kisˈima na kˌuɲuˈeʃa kondˈoo. kˈiʃa hˌulirudˈiʃa ɟˈiwe mahˈali pˈake ɟˌuːja mdˈomo wa kisˈima.|0
jakˈobo ˌaliwˌaulˈiza wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi mmetˈoka wˈapi? wˌakamɟˈibu, tˌumetˈoka harˈani.|0
ˌaliwˌaambˈia, ɟˈe, mnamɟˈua labˈani, mɟukˈuu wa nahˈori? wˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, tˌunamfahˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, jˌeje ni mzˈima? wˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, ni mzˈima, na hˈapa juˈaɟa rahˈeli bˈinti jˌake akˈiwa na kondˈoo.|0
ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, ɟˈua bˈado lˈiko ɟˈuu, si wakˈati wa kˌukusˈaɲa mifˈuɡo. ɲueʃˈeni kondˈoo na mwˌarudˈiʃe mˌaliʃˈoni.|0
wˌaliɟˈibu, hˌaiwˌezekˈani, mpˈaka kondˈoo wˈote wˌakusaɲˈike na ɟˈiwe lˈiwe lˌimevˌiŋɡirˈiʃwa kutˈoka mdˈomo wa kisˈima. ndˈipo tˌutaɲuˈeʃa kondˈoo.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈao, rahˈeli akˈaɟa pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo wa bˈaba jˈake, kwa maˈana ˌalikˈuwa mtʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo.|0
jakˈobo ˌalipomwˈona rahˈeli bˈinti labˈani, ndˈuɡu wa mˈama jˈake, pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo wa labˈani, ˌalikwˈenda na kˌulivˌiŋɡirˈiʃa ɟˈiwe kutˈoka mdomˈoni ˌm̩wa kisˈima na kˌuwaɲuˈeʃa kondˈoo wa mɟˈomba wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakambˈusu rahˈeli na ˌakaˈanza kulˈia kwa saˈuti.|0
jakˈobo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia rahˈeli kˌuwa jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈake, na kwˌamba ni mwˈana wa rebˈeka. bˌasi rahˈeli ˌalikimbˈia na kˌumwelˈeza bˈaba jˈake.|0
mˈara labˈani ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari kuhˈusu jakˈobo, mwˈana wa ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌalihˌarakˈiʃa kwˈenda kumlˈaki. ˌakamkˌumbatˈia na kumbˈusu, halˈafu ˌakamlˈeta ɲumbˈani kwˈake, kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia mˈambo jˈote.|0
labˈani ˌakamwambˈia, kwa vˈile wˌewe ni ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ˌunifaɲˈie kˈazi bˌila uɟˈira? nˌiambˈie uɟˈira wˈako ˌutakˈuwa nˈini.|0
labˈani ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti wawˈili, bˈinti mkˈubwa ˌaliˈitwa lˈea na bˈinti mdˈoɡo ˌaliˈitwa rahˈeli.|0
lˈea ˌalikˈuwa na mˈatʃo ðaˈifu, lakˈini rahˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumbo la kˌupendˈeza na mzˈuri wa sˈura.|0
jakˈobo ˌakampˈenda rahˈeli, ˌakamwambˈia labˈani, nˌitakˌutumikˈia kwa miˈaka sˈaba kwa aɟˈili ja kumpˈata rahˈeli bˈinti jˈako mdˈoɡo.|0
labˈani ˌakasˈema, ni bˈora zaˈidi nikˈupe rahˈeli kulˈiko kˈumpa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote. kˈaa pamˈoɟa na mˌimi hˈapa.|0
kwa hˈijo jakˈobo ˌakatumˈika miˈaka sˈaba ˌili kumpˈata rahˈeli, lakˈini ˌiliˌonekˈana kwˈake kˌama sˈiku tʃˈatʃe tu kwa sabˈabu ja upˈendo wˌake kwa rahˈeli.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia labˈani, nˈipe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu. mˈuda wˈaŋɡu ˌumekˌamilˈika, nˌami natˈaka nˌikutˈane nˌaje kimwˈili.|0
bˌasi labˈani ˌakaalˈika wˈatu wˈote wa mahˈali pˈale na ˌakafˈaɲa karˈamu.|0
lakˈini ˌilipofˈika ɟiˈoni, ˌakamtʃukˈua lˈea bˈinti jˌake akˈampa jakˈobo, nˌaje jakˈobo ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili.|0
nˌaje labˈani ˌakamtˈoa zˈilpa, mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike, kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wa lˈea, bˈinti jˈake.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi, jakˈobo ˌakaɡundˈua kˌuwa ˌamepˈewa lˈea! bˌasi jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia labˈani, ni ɟˈambo ɡˈani hˈili ˌulilˌonitendˈea? nˌilikˌutumikˈia kwa aɟˈili ja rahˈeli, sˈivjo? kwa nˈini ˌumenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa.|0
labˈani ˌakaɟˈibu, si destˈuri jˈetu kumwˈoza bˈinti mdˈoɡo kˈabla ja kumwˈoza bˈinti mkˈubwa.|0
malˈiza ɟˈuma la arˈusi ja bˈinti hˈuju, kˈiʃa pˈia nˌitakˈupa hˈuju bˈinti mdˈoɡo, kwa kˌutumˈika miˈaka miŋɡˈine sˈaba.|0
nˌaje jakˈobo ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. ˌakamalˈiza ɟˈuma na lˈea, kˈiʃa labˈani akˈampa rahˈeli bˈinti jˌake kˌuwa ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
labˈani ˌakamtˈoa bˈilha mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike kwa rahˈeli ˌili kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
pˈia jakˈobo ˌakakutˈana na rahˈeli kimwˈili, nˌaje ˌakampˈenda rahˈeli zaˈidi kulˈiko lˈea. jakˈobo ˌakamtˌumikˈia labˈani kwa miˈaka miŋɡˈine sˈaba.|0
bwˈana ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba lˈea hapˈendwi, akˈampa watˈoto, lakˈini rahˈeli ˌalikˈuwa tˈasa.|0
lˈea ˌakapˈata mˈimba ˌakazˈaa mwˈana. ˌakamwˈita rˌeubˈeni, kwa maˈana ˌalisˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌameˈona huzˈuni jˈaŋɡu. hakˈika mˈume wˈaŋɡu sˈasa ˌatanipˈenda.|0
ˌakapˈata tˈena mˈimba, nˌaje ˌalipozˈaa mwˈana, ˌakasˈema, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalisikˈia kwˌamba sipˈendwi, ˌamenˈipa tˈena hˈuju mwˈana. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita sˌimeˈoni.|0
ˌakapˈata tˈena mˈimba, nˌaje ˌalipozˈaa mwˈana, ˌakasˈema, sˈasa ˌafaðˈali mˈume wˈaŋɡu ˌataˌambatˈana na mˈimi, kwa sabˈabu nˌimemzalˈia wˈana watˈatu. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita lˈawi.|0
ˌakapˈata tˈena mˈimba, nˌaje ˌalipozˈaa mwˈana, ˌakasˈema, wakˈati hˈuu nˌitamsˈifu bwˈana. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita jˈuda. kˈiʃa ˌakaˈatʃa kuzˈaa watˈoto.|0
rahˈeli ˌalipoˈona hˌamzalˈii jakˈobo watˈoto, ˌakamwonˈea ndˈuɡu jˌake wˈivu. hˈivjo ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, nˈipe watˈoto, la sˈivjo nˌitakˈufa.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamkˌasirikˈia, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, mˌimi ni badˈala ja mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje ˌamekˌuzuˈia ˌusizˈae watˈoto.|0
ndˈipo rahˈeli ˌakamwambˈia, hˈapa jˈupo bˈilha, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wa kˈike. kutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili ˌili awˈeze kˌunizalˈia watˈoto na kwa kˌupitˈia jˌeje mˌimi pˈia niwˈeze kˌuwa na uzˈao.|0
hˈivjo rahˈeli akˈampa jakˈobo bˈilha ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake. jakˈobo ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili.|0
ndˈipo rahˈeli ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˈipa hˈaki jˈaŋɡu, ˌamesˌikilˈiza maˈombi jˈaŋɡu na kunˈipa mwˈana. kwa sabˈabu hˈijo ˌakamwˈita dˈani.|0
bˈilha mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike wa rahˈeli ˌakapˈata mˈimba tˈena, ˌakamzalˈia jakˈobo mwˈana wa pˈili.|0
ndˈipo rahˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˌilikˈuwa na mˌaʃindˈano makˈubwa na ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌimeʃˈinda. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita naftˈali.|0
lˈea ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ˌamekˈoma kuzˈaa watˈoto, ˌalimtʃukˈua mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike zˈilpa, nˌaje akˈampa jakˈobo ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
mtumˈiʃi wa lˈea jaˈani zˈilpa, ˌakamzalˈia jakˈobo mwˈana.|0
ndˈipo lˈea ˌakasˈema, hˌii ni bahˈati nzˈuri ˈaɟe! kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita ɡˈadi.|0
mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike wa lˈea ˌakamzalˈia jakˈobo mwˈana wa pˈili.|0
ndˈipo lˈea ˌaliposˈema, ɟˈinsi ɡˈani nilˈivjo na furˈaha! wˌanawˈake wˌataniˈita furˈaha. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita aʃˈeri.|0
wakˈati wa kuvˈuna ŋɡˈano, rˌeubˈeni ˌakaˈenda ʃambˈani ˌakakˈuta tuŋɡˈuɟa, ambˈazo ˌalizilˈeta kwa lˈea mˈama jˈake. rahˈeli ˌakamwambˈia lˈea, tˌafaðˈali nˌakuˈomba unˈipe baˈaði ja tuŋɡˈuɟa za mwanˈao.|0
lakˈini lˈea ˌakamwambˈia, hˌaikˌukutˈoʃa kumtwˈaa mˈume wˈaŋɡu? ɟˈe, ˌutatʃukˈua na tuŋɡˈuɟa za mwanˈaŋɡu pˈia? rahˈeli ˌakasˈema, vˈema sˈana! jakˈobo ˌatakutˈana nˌawe kimwˈili lˈeo usˈiku, kwa malˈipo ja tuŋɡˈuɟa za mwanˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo jakˈobo ˌalipokˈuɟa kutˈoka ʃambˈani ɟiˈoni ˈile, lˈea ˌakaˈenda kumlˈaki, ˌakamwambˈia, lazˈima ˌukutˈane nˌami kimwˈili. nˌimekˌukodˈiʃa kwa tuŋɡˈuɟa za mwanˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili usˈiku ˈule.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamsˌikilˈiza lˈea, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba ˌakamzalˈia jakˈobo mwˈana wa tˈano.|0
ndˈipo lˈea ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌizawadˈia kwa kˈumpa mˈume wˈaŋɡu mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wa kˈike. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita ˌisakˈari.|0
lˈea ˌakapˈata mˈimba tˈena ˌakamzalˈia jakˈobo mwˈana wa sˈita.|0
ndˈipo lˈea ˌaliposˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌizawadˈia kwa zawˈadi ja θamˈani sˈana. wakˈati hˈuu mˈume wˈaŋɡu ˌatanˌiheʃˈimu kwa sabˈabu nˌimemzalˈia wˈana sˈita. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita zˌabulˈoni.|0
bˌaadˈaje ˌakamzˈaa mtˈoto wa kˈike ˌakamwˈita dˈina.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamkumbˈuka rahˈeli, ˌakasikˈia maˈombi jˌake na ˌakafuŋɡˈua tˈumbo lˈake.|0
ˌakapˈata mˈimba na ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana na kusˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiondolˈea aˈibu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakamwˈita josˈefu na kusˈema, bwˈana na anˈipe mwˈana mwiŋɡˈine.|0
baˌada ja rahˈeli kumzˈaa josˈefu, jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia labˈani, nˈipe ruhˈusa nirˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈipe wˌake zˈaŋɡu na watˈoto, ambˈao nˌimetumˈika kˌuwapˈata, nˌami niˈende zˈaŋɡu. ˌunaɟˈua ni kˈazi kiˈasi ɡˈani ambˈajo nˌimekˌufaɲˈia.|0
lakˈini labˈani ˌakamwambˈia, ikˈiwa nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, tˌafaðˈali ukˈae. nˌimeɡundˈua kwa ɲɟˈia ja ˌuaɡˈuzi kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamenˌibarˈiki kwa sabˈabu jˈako.|0
ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kˌumwambˈia, tˈaɟa uɟˈira wˈako nˌami nˌitakulˈipa.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia, ˌunaɟˈua ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo nˌimekˌutumikˈia na ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo waɲˈama wˈako wˌalivjolˈiʃwa vizˈuri tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wˈaŋɡu.|0
kidˈoɡo ˌulitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo kˈabla siɟˈaɟa kˌimeˌoŋɡezˈeka sˈana, nˌaje bwˈana ˌamekˌubarˈiki popˈote nˌilipokˈuwa. lakˈini sˈasa, ni lˈini nˌitaʃˌuɣulikˈia mˈambo ja ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
labˈani ˌakamˌuulˈiza, nikˈupe nˈini? jakˈobo ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌusinˈipe tʃotʃˈote lakˈini kˌama ˌutanˌifaɲˈia ɟˈambo hˈili mˈoɟa, nˌitaˌendelˈea kutʃˈuŋɡa na kˌujaˌaŋɡalˈia makˈundi jˈako.|0
nˌiruhˈusu nipˈite katˌika makˈundi jˈako jˈote lˈeo nˌiondˈoe hˈumo kˈila kondˈoo mwˌeɲe mˌabakabˈaka ˌau mˌadoadˈoa, kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo mweˈusi na kˈila mbˈuzi mwˌeɲe mˌadoadˈoa ˌau mˌabakabˈaka. hˈawa wˌatakˈuwa uɟˈira wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu ˌutanˌiʃuhudˈia sˈiku ziɟˈazo, kˈila ˌutakˌapotʃuŋɡˈuza uɟˈira ambˈao ˌumenilˈipa mˈimi. mbˈuzi jejˈote wˈaŋɡu ambˈaje hˈana mˌabakabˈaka wˈala mˌadoadˈoa, ˌau mwˌanakondˈoo ambˈaje si mweˈusi, ˌatahˌesabˈika ˌameˈibwa.|0
labˈani ˌakasˈema, nˌinakubˈali na ˈiwe kˌama ˌulivjosˈema.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile jakˈobo ˌakawˌaondˈoa bebˈeru wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na mistˈari ˌau mˌadoadˈoa na mbˈuzi wˌake wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na mistˈari ˌau mˌadoadˈoa wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na alˈama ɲeˈupe ɟˈuu jˈao na wˌanakondˈoo weˈusi wˈote, ˌakawawˈeka tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa wanˈawe.|0
kˈiʃa labˈani ˌakamwˈatʃa jakˈobo kwa mwˈendo wa safˈari ja sˈiku tˈatu kˈati jˌake na jakˈobo, wakˈati jakˈobo ˌakiˌendelˈea kutʃˈuŋɡa lˈile kˈundi la labˈani lˌililobˈaki.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, jakˈobo, ˌakatʃukˈua fˈito mbˈitʃi zˌilizokˈatwa wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo za mˈiti ja mlˈubna, mlˈozi na mwˌaramˈoni ˌakazˌibambˈua ˌili mistˈari mjeˈupe ˌionekˈane katˌika fˈito hˈizo.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˈeka fˈito ˌalizˌozibambˈua kwˈeɲe mˌabirˈika jˈote ja kˌuɲueʃˈea mifˈuɡo, ˌili zˈiwe mbˈele ja makˈundi wˌalipokˈuɟa kˈuɲua mˈaɟi. waɲˈama wˌalipokˈuɟa kˈuɲua mˈaɟi, hˈali wakˈiwa wˌanahitˈaɟi mbˈeɡu.|0
wˌakapˈandwa hˈizo fˈito zikˈiwa mbˈele jˈao. waɲˈama wˌaliopˈata mˈimba mbˈele ja hˈizo fˈito wˌalizˈaa waɲˈama wˌeɲe mistˈari, mˌadoadˈoa na mˌabakabˈaka.|0
jakˈobo ˌakawatˈeŋɡa wadˈoɡo wa kˈundi pˈeke jˈao, lakˈini ˌakazˌielekˈeza ɲˈuso za hˈao wˌaliobˈaki kwˈeɲe wˈale wˌeɲe mistˈari na weˈusi wˌaliokˈuwa mˈali ja labˈani. hˈivjo ˌakatˈeŋɡa makˈundi jˌake mweɲˈewe, na wˈala hˌakuwˌatʃaŋɡˈaɲa na waɲˈama wa labˈani.|0
kˈila mˈara waɲˈama wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌalipˌohitˈaɟi mbˈeɡu, jakˈobo ˌaliwˈeka zˈile fˈito kwˈeɲe mˌabirˈika mbˈele ja hˈao waɲˈama, ˌili wapˈandwe karˈibu na hˈizo fˈito.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa waɲˈama wˌalikˈuwa wˌaðaˈifu hˌakuziwˈeka hˈizo fˈito. hˈivjo waɲˈama wˌaðaˈifu wakˈawa wa labˈani, na waɲˈama wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wakˈawa wa jakˈobo.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii jakˈobo ˌakastˈawi sˈana, tˈena akˈawa na makˈundi makˈubwa, wˌatumˈiʃi wa kˈike na wa kiˈume na ŋɡamˈia na pˈunda.|0
jakˈobo ˌakawˌasikˈia wˈana wa labˈani wˌakisˈema, jakˈobo ˌametʃukˈua kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa tʃa bˈaba jˈetu nˌaje ˌamepˈata ˌutaɟˈiri hˈuu wˈote kˌutokˈana na vˈile vˌilivjokˈuwa mˈali ja bˈaba jˈetu.|0
jakˈobo ˌakatambˈua kwˌamba mˈojo wa labˈani kwˈake hˌaukˈuwa kˌama ˌulivjokˈuwa mwˈanzo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, rˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˈaba zˈako na kwa wˈatu wˈako, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
hˈivjo jakˈobo ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa rahˈeli na lˈea wˈaɟe mˌatʃuŋɡˈani jˌalikokˈuwa makˈundi jˈake.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, naˈona mˈojo wa bˈaba jˈenu kwˈaŋɡu sˈivjo kˌama ˌulivjokˈuwa mwanzˈoni, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌamekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
mnaɟˈua kwˌamba nˌimemtˌumikˈia bˈaba jˈenu kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo bˈaba jˈenu ˌamenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa kwa kˌubadilˈiʃa uɟˈira wˈaŋɡu mˈara kˈumi. hˌata hˈivjo, mˈuŋɡu hˌakumruhˈusu kˌuniðˈuru.|0
kˌama ˌalisˈema, wˌeɲe mˌadoadˈoa wˌatakˈuwa uɟˈira wˈako, bˌasi makˈundi jˈote jˌalizˈaa wˌeɲe mˌadoadˈoa, kˌama ˌalisˈema, wˌeɲe mistˈari wˌatakˈuwa uɟˈira wˈako, bˌasi makˈundi jˈote jˌalizˈaa wˌeɲe mistˈari.|0
hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌametʃukˈua mifˈuɡo ja bˈaba jˈenu na ˌamenˈipa mˈimi.|0
wakˈati fulˈani maɟˈira ja kˌuzaliˈana nˌiliˈota ndˈoto ambˈajo nˌiliinˈua mˈatʃo na kuˈona kwˌamba wˈale mˌabebˈeru wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakipˈanda kˈundi wˌalikˈuwa wa mistˈari, mˌadoadˈoa na mˌabakabˈaka.|0
mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakanˌiambˈia katˌika ndˈoto, jakˈobo. nˌikamɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa..|0
ˌakasˈema, inˈua mˈatʃo jˈako uˈone wˈale mˌabebˈeru wˈote wˌanaopˈanda kˈundi wˈana mistˈari, mˌadoadˈoa ˌau mˌabakabˈaka, kwa maˈana nˌimeˈona jˈale jˈote ambˈajo labˈani ˌamekˈuwa ˌakikˌutendˈea.|0
mˌimi n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wa beθˈeli, ˌulikˌomiminˈia ˈile ŋɡˈuzo mafˈuta na pˈale mahˈali ˌulipˌoniwekˈea naðˈiri. sˈasa ondˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii mˈara mˈoɟa urˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijˌozalˈiwa..|0
ndˈipo rahˈeli na lˈea wˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe bˈado tu tunˈalo fˈuŋɡu lolˈote katˌika urˈiθi wa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈetu.|0
ɟˈe, jˌeje hˌatuhesˈabu sˌisi kˌama waɡˈeni? sˈio kwˌamba ˌametuˈuza tˈu, bˌali ˌametumˈia hˌata na vˈile vˌilivjolˈipwa kwa aɟˈili jˈetu.|0
hakˈika ˌutaɟˈiri wˈote ambˈao mˈuŋɡu ˌameˌutʃukˈua kutˈoka kwa bˈaba jˈetu ni mˈali jˈetu na watˈoto wˈetu. hˈivjo fˈaɲa lolˈote lˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalilˌokuambˈia.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo ˌakawˌapandˈiʃa watˈoto wˌake na wˌake zˌake ɟˌuːja ŋɡamˈia.|0
nˌaje ˌakawaswˈaɡa waɲˈama wˈote mbˈele jˌake pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vjˈote ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌametʃˈuma hˌuko pˈadan arˈamu kwˈenda kwa bˈaba jˌake isˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
labˈani ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda kukˈata kondˈoo wˌake maɲˈoja, rahˈeli ˌaliˈiba miˈuŋɡu ja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈake.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, jakˈobo ˌalimdaŋɡˈaɲa labˈani mwarˈamu kwa kˌutokˌumwambˈia kwˌamba ˌanakimbˈia.|0
hˈivjo ˌakakimbˈia pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vjˈote ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo na kuvˈuka ˈm̩to frˈati ˌakaˌelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima katˌika ɡˌileˈadi.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu labˈani ˌakaambˈiwa kwˌamba jakˈobo ˌamekimbˈia.|0
ˌakiwˌatʃukˈua ɟamˈaa zˈake, ˌakamfˌuatˈia jakˈobo kwa sˈiku sˈaba na kumkˈuta kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima katˌika ɡˌileˈadi.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈia labˈani mwarˈamu katˌika ndˈoto usˈiku na kˌumwambˈia, ɟˌihaðˈari ˌusisˈeme nˈeno lolˈote kwa jakˈobo, lˈiwe zˈuri ˌau bˈaja.|0
jakˈobo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈiɡa hˈema lˈake katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima katˌika ɡˌileˈadi wakˈati labˈani ˌalipomkˈuta, labˈani na ɟamˈaa jˌake wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko pˈia.|0
ndˈipo labˈani ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, ˌumefˈaɲa nˈini? ˌumenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa na ˌumewˌatʃukˈua bˈinti zˈaŋɡu kˌama matˈeka katˌika vˈita.|0
kwa nˈini ˌulikimbˈia kwa sˈiri na kˌunidaŋɡˈaɲa? kwa nˈini hˌukunˌiambˈia ˌili nˌikuˈaɡe kwa furˈaha na ɲˈimbo za matˈari na vinˈubi.|0
hˌata hˌukunˌiruhˈusu nˌiwabˈusu wˌaɟukˈuu zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwaˈaɡa bˈinti zˈaŋɡu. ˌumefˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌipumbˈavu.|0
nˈina uwˈezo wa kˌukuðˈuru, lakˈini usˈiku ˌuliopˈita mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako ˌalisˈema nˈami, ˌakanˌiambˈia, ɟˌihaðˈari, ˌusisˈeme nˈeno lolˈote kwa jakˈobo lˈiwe zˈuri ˌau bˈaja..|0
sˈasa ˌumeondˈoka kwa sabˈabu ˌumetamˈani kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈako. lakˈini kwa nˈini ˌumeˈiba miˈuŋɡu jˈaŋɡu.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamɟˈibu labˈani, nˌilioɡˈopa, kwa sabˈabu nˌilifikˈiri ˌuŋɡewˈeza kˌuniɲaŋɡˈaɲa bˈinti zˈako kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌukimkˈuta jejˈote alˈije na miˈuŋɡu jˈako, hˌataˈiʃi. mbˈele ja ɟamˈaa jˈetu, ˌaŋɡalˈia mweɲˈewe uˈone kˌama kˈuna tʃotʃˈote tʃˈako hˈapa nilˈitʃo nˈatʃo, kˌama kˈipo, kˌitʃukˈue. bˌasi jakˈobo hˌakuɟˈua kwˌamba rahˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈiba hˈijo miˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo labˈani ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hˈema la jakˈobo na ndˈani ja hˈema la lˈea na ndˈani ja hˈema la wˌatumˈiʃi wawˈili wa kˈike, lakˈini hˌakukˈuta tʃotʃˈote. bˌaadˈaje ˌalipotˈoka katˌika hˈema la lˈea, ˌakaiŋɡˈia hˈema la rahˈeli.|0
bˌasi rahˈeli n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa ˌametʃukˈua ˈile miˈuŋɡu ja ɲumbˈani kwˈao na kˌuiwˈeka katˌika mˌatandˈiko ja ŋɡamˈia na kˌukalˈia. labˈani ˌakatafˈuta kˈila mahˈali kwˈeɲe hˈema lakˈini hˌakupˈata tʃotʃˈote.|0
rahˈeli ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, ˌusikˌasirˈike, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuwa siwˈezi kˌusimˈama ˌukiwˈepo, nˈiko katˌika hˈeði. labˈani ˌakatafˈuta lakˈini hˌakuwˈeza kˌuipˈata miˈuŋɡu ja ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
jakˈobo ˌakakˌasirˈika na kˌumʃutˈumu labˈani, ˌakisˈema, ˌuhalˈifu wˈaŋɡu ni nˈini? ˌakamˌuulˈiza labˈani, ni ðˈambi ɡˈani nˌilijofˈaɲa hˌata ˌunaniwˈinda.|0
sˈasa kwa kˌuwa ˌumepekˈua vˈitu vjˈaŋɡu vjˈote ˌumepˈata nˈini kilˈitʃo tʃa ɲumbˈani mwˈako? kiwˈeke hˈapa mbˈele ja ɟamˈaa jˈako na jˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌaamˈue kˈati jˈetu sˌisi wawˈili.|0
mpˈaka sˈasa nˌimekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini. kondˈoo wˈako na mbˈuzi wˈako hˌawaɟˌaharˈibu mˈimba, wˈala siɟˈala kondˈoo dˈume kutˈoka makˈundi jˈako.|0
sˌikukˌuletˈea mfˈuɡo ˌalijˌerarulˈiwa na waɲˈama pˈori, nˌilibˈeba hasˈara mˌimi mweɲˈewe. tˈena ˌulinidˈai malˈipo kwa tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃoˈibwa mtʃˈana ˌau usˈiku.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilijokˈuwa hˈali jˈaŋɡu: nˌiliumˈia kwa ɟˈoto la mtʃˈana na barˈidi usˈiku, pˈia ˌusiŋɡˈizi ˌulinˈipa.|0
ˌilikˈuwa hˈivi kwa miˈaka ˈile ˌiʃirˈini nˌilijokˈuwa ɲumbˈani kwˈako. nˌilikˌutumikˈia miˈaka ˈile kˈumi na mˈinne kwa aɟˈili ja bˈinti zˈako wawˈili, miˈaka sˈita kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi jˈako, nˌawe ˌulibˌadilˈiʃa uɟˈira wˈaŋɡu mˈara kˈumi.|0
kˌama mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu na hˈofu ja isˈaki, hakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami, hakˈika ˌuŋɡenˌifukˈuza mikˈono mitˈupu. lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌameˈona taˈabu jˈaŋɡu na kˈazi ŋɡˈumu ja mikˈono jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje usˈiku ˌuliopˈita ˌamekˌukemˈea.|0
labˈani ˌakamɟˈibu jakˈobo, wˌanawˈake hˈawa ni bˈinti zˈaŋɡu, watˈoto hˈawa ni watˈoto wˈaŋɡu na makˈundi hˈaja ni makˈundi jˈaŋɡu. vjˈote ˌunavjˌoviˈona ni vjˈaŋɡu. lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo nˌinawˈeza kufˈaɲa nˈini kuhˈusu hˈawa bˈinti zˈaŋɡu, ˌau kuhˈusu watˈoto wˌaliˌowazˈaa.|0
ɲɟˈoo sˈasa na tufˈaɲe aɡˈano, wˌewe na mˈimi, na lˈiwe kˌama ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈetu.|0
hˈivjo jakˈobo ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈiwe, ˌakalˌisimamˈiʃa kˌama ŋɡˈuzo.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia ɟamˈaa jˈake, kˌusaɲˈeni mˈawe. hˈivjo wˌakatʃukˈua mˈawe na kˌujakusˈaɲa jakˈawa lˈundo, wakˈala tʃakˈula hˈapo karˈibu na hˌilo lˈundo.|0
labˈani ˌakaliˈita jˈeɡar sˌahadˈuθa na jakˈobo ˌakaliˈita ɡˌaleˈedi.|0
labˈani ˌakasˈema, lˈundo hˈili ni ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈako na mˌimi lˈeo. n̩dˈijo maˈana lˌikaˈitwa ɡˌaleˈedi.|0
pˈia lˌiliˈitwa mˈispa, kwa sabˈabu ˌalisˈema, bwˈana na awˈeke ulˈinzi kˈati jˈako na mˌimi wakˈati kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa mbˈali na mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kˌama ˌukiwatˈenda mabˈaja bˈinti zˈaŋɡu ˌau ˌukiˈoa wˌake weŋɡˈine zaˈidi ja bˈinti zˈaŋɡu, hˌata iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa alˈije pamˈoɟa nˈasi, kumbˈuka kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ni ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈako na mˈimi.|0
pˈia labˈani ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, hˈili ndˈilo lˈundo, na hˌii n̩dˈijo ŋɡˈuzo nˌilijˌoisˌimamˈiʃa kˈati jˈako na mˈimi.|0
lˈundo hˈili ni ʃahˈidi na ŋɡˈuzo hˌii ni ʃahˈidi, kwˌamba sˌitavˈuka lˈundo hˈili kˈuɟa upˈande wˈako kˌukuðˈuru, nˌawe kwˌamba hˌutavˈuka lˈundo hˈili na ŋɡˈuzo hˌii kˈuɟa upˈande wˈaŋɡu kˌuniðˈuru.|0
mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu na mˈuŋɡu wa nahˈori, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, ˌaamˈue kˈati jˈetu. hˈivjo jakˈobo ˌakaˈapa kwa ɟˈina la hˈofu ja bˈaba jˌake isˈaki.|0
jakˈobo ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ɟˌuːja kilˈima na ˌakawˌaalˈika ɟamˈaa zˌake kˈula tʃakˈula. baˌada ja kˈula, wˌakalˈala hˌuko.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, labˈani ˌakawabˈusu wˌaɟukˈuu zˈake, bˈinti zˌake na kˌuwabarˈiki. kˈiʃa ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani.|0
jakˈobo pˈia ˌakaondˈoka ˌakaˈenda zˈake, nˌao mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu wˌakakutˈana nˈaje.|0
jakˈobo ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌakasˈema, hˌii ni kˈambi ja mˈuŋɡu! kwa hˈijo ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale mˌahanaˈimu.|0
jakˈobo ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌumtaŋɡulˈia kwa esˈau ndˈuɡu jˌake hˌuko seˈiri, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja edˈomu.|0
ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza ˌakisˈema: hˈili ndˈilo mtˌakalˌomwambˈia bwˈana wˈaŋɡu esˈau: mtumˈiʃi wˈako jakˈobo ˌanasˈema, nˌimekˈuwa nˌikiˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na labˈani na nˌimekuwˈako hˌuko mpˈaka sˈasa.|0
ninˈao ŋɡˈombe na pˈunda, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, wˌatumˈiʃi wa kiˈume na wa kˈike. sˈasa nˌinatˈuma uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˌili nipˈate kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako..|0
waɟˈumbe wˌaliporˈudi kwa jakˈobo, wˌakamwambˈia, tˌulikwˈenda kˌuonˈana na ndˈuɡu jˈako esˈau, nˌaje sˈasa ˌanakˈuɟa kˌukulˈaki ˌakifˌuatˈana na wˌanaˈume mˌiaˈn̩ne.|0
kwa hˈofu kˈuu na huzˈuni, jakˈobo ˌakaɡawˈaɲa wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa nˌao katˌika makˈundi mawˈili, pˈia ˌakaɡawˈaɲa makˈundi ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, na vˌilevˈile ŋɡˈombe na ŋɡamˈia.|0
jakˈobo ˌalifikˈiri, kˌama esˈau akˈiɟa na kˌuʃambulˈia kˈundi mˈoɟa, kˈundi lˌililobˈaki lˌitawˈeza lˌikanˌusurˈika.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo ˌakaˈomba, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu isˈaki, ˈee bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌulinˌiambˈia, rˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako na ɟamˈaa jˈako, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa ustˈawi,.|0
mˌimi sˌistahˈili faðˈili na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako wˈote ˌuliˌonitendˈea mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako. nˌilikˈuwa na fˈimbo tu mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu nˌilipovˈuka ˈm̩to hˈuu wa jordˈani, lakˈini sˈasa ninˈajo makˈundi mawˈili.|0
nˌakuˈomba, ˌuniokˈoe na mkˈono wa ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu esˈau, kwa maˈana nˌinaoɡˈopa kˌuwa ˌatakˈuɟa kˌuniʃˌambulˈia, pˈia mˈama pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈao.|0
lakˈini ˌumeʃasˈema, hakˈika nˌitakufˈaɲa ustˈawi na kˌuufˈaɲa uzˈao wˈako kˌuwa mwˈiŋɡi kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa bˌaharˈini ambˈao hˌauwˈezi kˌuhesabˈika!.|0
ˌakalˈala pˈale usˈiku ˈule, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa vˈitu ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo, ˌakatʃaɡˈua zawˈadi kwa aɟˈili ja esˈau ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
mbˈuzi waˈume ˌiʃirˈini na mbˈuzi wˌake mˌiambˈili, kondˈoo dˈume ˌiʃirˈini na kondˈoo wˌake mˌiambˈili.|0
ŋɡamˈia wˌake θˌelaθˈini pamˈoɟa na ndˈama zˈao, ŋɡˈombe wˌake ˌarobaˈini na mˌafahˈali kˈumi, pˈunda wˌake ˌiʃirˈini na pˈunda waˈume kˈumi.|0
ˌakaviwˈeka tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, kˈila kˈundi pˈeke jˌake na kˌuwaambˈia, nˌitaŋɡˌuliˈeni na kuˈatʃa nafˈasi kˈati ja makˈundi.|0
ˌakamwaɡˈiza jˈule ˌalijˌetaŋɡulˈia kˌuwa, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu esˈau ˌatakˌapokutˈana nˌawe na kˌukuulˈiza, wˌewe ni wa nˈani? ˌunakwˈenda wˈapi? waɲˈama hˈawa wˈote mbˈele jˈako ni mˈali ja nˈani?.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌaposˈema, ni mˈali ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako jakˈobo. ni zawˈadi ambˈazo zˌimetˈumwa kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu esˈau, nˌaje ˌanakˈuɟa ɲˈuma jˈetu..|0
ˌakamwaɡˈiza pˈia jˈule mtumˈiʃi wa kˈundi la pˈili, la tˈatu na jˈale meŋɡˈine jˈote jˌalijˌofuˈata ˌakiwˌaambˈia, mtˌamwambˈia esˈau manˈeno hˈajo hˈajo mtˌakapˌokutˈana nˈaje.|0
hˌakikiʃˈeni mmesˈema, mtumˈiʃi wˈako jakˈobo ˌanakˈuɟa ɲˈuma jˈetu.  kwa kˌuwa ˌalifikˈiri, nˌitawˈeza kˌumtulˈiza kwa zawˈadi hˈizi nˌinazˌotaŋɡulˈiza, hˌatimˈaje, nˌitakˌapomwˈona, huˈenda ˌatanˌikubˈali.|0
kwa hˈijo zawˈadi za jakˈobo zˌilitˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈake, lakˈini jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌalilˈala kambˈini usˈiku ˈule.|0
usˈiku ˈule jakˈobo ˌakaˈamka ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˌake zˌake wawˈili, wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wawˈili wa kˈike na wanˈawe kˈumi na mmˈoɟa na ˌakavˈuka kivˈuko tʃa jabˈoki.|0
baˌada ja kˌuwavˈuʃa ŋɡˈambo ja kiɟˈito, ˌalivˈuʃa pˈia mˈali zˌake zˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo jakˈobo ˌakaˈatʃwa pˈeke jˌake na ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakaʃikˈana nˌaje mwelˈeka mpˈaka mˌapambazˈuko.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa hawˈezi kumʃˈinda, ˌaliɡˈusa kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃa ɲˈoŋɡa ja jakˈobo kwa hˈijo ɲˈoŋɡa jˌake ˌikateɡˈuka wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiʃikˈana mwelˈeka na jˈule ˈm̩tu.|0
ndˈipo jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakasˈema, niˈatʃe niˈende, kwa kˌuwa ni mˌapambazˈuko. lakˈini jakˈobo ˌakaɟˈibu, sˌitakuˈatʃa uˈende ˌusipˌonibarˈiki.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈina lˈako nˈani? ˌakaɟˈibu, jakˈobo.|0
ndˈipo jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakasˈema, ɟˈina lˈako hˌalitakˈuwa tˈena jakˈobo, bˌali ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu ˌumeʃindˈana na mˈuŋɡu na wˈatu pˈia, nˌawe ˌumeʃˈinda.|0
jakˈobo ˌakasˈema, tˌafaðˈali nˌiambˈie ɟˈina lˈako. lakˈini ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa nˈini kˌuniulˈiza ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu? ndˈipo ˌakambarˈiki hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo jakˈobo ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale pˌeniˈeli, ˌakasˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu nˌimemwˈona mˈuŋɡu ˈuso kwa ˈuso na bˈado maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌameokˈoka.|0
ɟˈua lˌilikˈuwa lˌinatʃomˈoza jakˈobo ˌalipˌoondˈoka pˌenuˈeli, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitʃˌetʃemˈea kwa sabˈabu ja ɲˈoŋɡa jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo mpˈaka lˈeo wˌaisraˈeli hawˈali mʃˈipa ˌuliˌouŋɡˈana na kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃa ɲˈoŋɡa, kwa sabˈabu kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃa ɲˈoŋɡa ja jakˈobo kˌilitˌeɡulˈiwa karˈibu na mʃˈipa hˈuo.|0
jakˈobo ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo ˌakamwˈona esˈau akˈiɟa na wˈatu wˌake mˌiaˈn̩ne, kwa hˈijo ˌakawˌaɡawˈaɲa watˈoto kˈati ja lˈea, rahˈeli na wˈale wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wawˈili wa kˈike.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˈale wˌatumˈiʃi wa kˈike na watˈoto wˌao mbˈele, lˈea na watˈoto wˌake wˌakafuˈata, rahˈeli na josˈefu wakˈaɟa ɲˈuma.|0
jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele na kˌusuɟˈudu mˈara sˈaba ˌalipˌomkaribˈia ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
lakˈini esˈau ˌakamkˌimbilˈia jakˈobo kumlˈaki na kˌumkumbatˈia, ˌakamwˌaŋɡukˈia ʃiŋɡˈoni na kumbˈusu. nˌao wˌakalˈia.|0
esˈau ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo ˌakawaˈona wˈale wˌanawˈake na watˈoto. ˌakaulˈiza, hˈawa ˌuliˌofuatˈana nˌao ni nˈani? jakˈobo ˌakamɟˈibu, ni watˈoto ambˈao mˈuŋɡu amˈempa mtumˈiʃi wˈako kwa neˈema.|0
kˈiʃa wˈale wˌatumˈiʃi wa kˈike na watˈoto wˌao wˌakakˌaribˈia na kˌusuɟˈudu.|0
kˈiʃa lˈea na watˈoto wˌake wakˈaɟa na kˌusuɟˈudu. mwˈiʃo wa wˈote wakˈaɟa josˈefu na rahˈeli, nˌao pˈia wˌakasuɟˈudu.|0
esˈau ˌakaulˈiza, ˈuna maˈana ɡˈani kuhˈusu makˈundi hˈajo jˈote nˌilijˌokutˈana nˈajo? ˌakasˈema, ni ˌili kupˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini esˈau ˌakamwambˈia, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu, tajˈari nˈina wˈiŋɡi wa mˈali. ulˈivjo nˈavjo vˈiwe vjˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
jakˈobo ˌakasˈema, la hˈaʃa! tˌafaðˈali, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, ˌupokˈee zawˈadi hˌii kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu. kwa maˈana kˌuuˈona ˈuso wˈako, ni kˌama kˌuuˈona ˈuso wa mˈuŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˌipokˈea kwa tˌakabˈali kˈubwa.|0
tˌafaðˈali ˌukubˈali zawˈadi ˌilijolˈetwa kwˈako, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌineemˈeʃa na ninˈavjo vjˈote nˌinavjˌohitˈaɟi. kwa sabˈabu jakˈobo ˌalisˌisitˈiza, esˈau ˌakapokˈea.|0
ndˈipo esˈau ˌakasˈema, na tˌuendelˈee na safˈari, nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
lakˈini jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌunaɟˈua kwˌamba watˈoto ni watʃˈaŋɡa na kwˌamba ni lazˈima nitˈunze hˈawa kondˈoo wˌake na ŋɡˈombe wˌanaˌoɲoɲˈeʃa. wˌakipelˈekwa kwa harˈaka hˌata kˌama ni kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa tˈu, waɲˈama wˈote wˌatakˈufa.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌumtaŋɡulˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako, wakˈati mˌimi nikˈiɟa pˌolepˈole kwa mwˈendo wa makˈundi jalˈijo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu na mwˈendo wa watˈoto, mpˈaka nifˈike kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌuko seˈiri.|0
esˈau ˌakamwambˈia, bˌasi na nˌiwaˈatʃe baˈaði ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa nˈawe. jakˈobo ˌakaulˈiza, lakˈini kwa nˈini ufˈaɲe hˈivjo, niˈatʃe tu nipˈate kibˈali matʃˈoni pa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo sˈiku hˈijo esˈau ˌakaʃˈika ɲɟˈia ˌakarˈudi seˈiri.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, jakˈobo ˌakaˈenda sukˈoθi, mahˈali ˌalipˌoɟiɟeŋɡˈea makˈazi kwa aɟˈili jˌake na mabˈanda kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈuɡo jˈake. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu sehˈemu ˈile ˌinaˈitwa sukˈoθi.|0
baˌada ja jakˈobo kutˈoka pˈadan arˈamu, ˌalifˈika salˈama katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃekˈemu hˌuko kˌanaˈani na kuwˈeka kˈambi jˌake karˈibu na ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌakanunˈua kiwˈaɲɟa kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa hamˈori, bˈaba wa ʃekˈemu, kwa bˈei ja vipˈande mˈia vja fˈeða, ambˈapo ˌalipˈiɡa hˈema lˈake.|0
pˈale ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu na kˌupaˈita ˈel elˈohe ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi dˈina, bˈinti wa jakˈobo ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na lˈea, ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌuwatˌembelˈea wˌanawˈake wa ˈn̩tʃi ˈile.|0
ikˈawa ʃekˈemu mwˈana wa hamˈori mhˈivi, mtawˈala wa enˈeo lˈile ˌalipomwˈona, ˌakamtʃukˈua na kˌumnaɟˈisi.|0
mˈojo wˌake ˌukavˈutwa sˈana kwa dˈina bˈinti jakˈobo, ˌakampˈenda hˈuju msitʃˈana na ˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa kˌumbembelˈeza.|0
ʃekˈemu ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˌake hamˈori, nˌipatˈie msitʃˈana hˈuju ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu.|0
jakˈobo ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba bˈinti jˌake dˈina ˌamenˌaɟisˈiwa, wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃambˈani wˌakitʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo jˈake, kwa hˈijo ˌakalˌiɲamazˈia ɟˈambo hˌilo mpˈaka wˌaliporˈudi ɲumbˈani.|0
kˈiʃa hamˈori bˈaba jˌake ʃekˈemu ˌakaˈenda kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na jakˈobo.|0
bˌasi wˈana wa jakˈobo wˌalikˈuwa wˌamerˈudi kutˈoka mˌaʃambˈani mˈara tu wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌilitʃˌotokˈea. wˌalikˈuwa wˌameɟˈawa na huzˈuni na ɣaðˈabu, kwa sabˈabu ʃekˈemu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa ɟˈambo la aˈibu katˌika ˌisraˈeli kwa kˌukutˈana kimwˈili na bˈinti wa jakˈobo, kˈitu ambˈatʃo hˌakiŋɡepˈasa kˌufaɲˈika.|0
lakˈini hamˈori ˌakawˌaambˈia, mˈojo wa mwanˈaŋɡu ʃekˈemu ˌumeˌelekˈea kwa bˈinti jˈenu. tˌafaðˈali mpˈeni ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
ˌoanˈeni na sˈisi, tupˈeni bˈinti zˈenu, nˌaɲi mtʃukˈue bˈinti zˈetu.|0
mwawˈeza kuˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈetu, ˈn̩tʃi ni wˈazi kwˈenu. iʃˈini ndˈani jˈake, faɲˈeni bˌiaʃˈara hˈumu na mɟˌipatˈie mˈali.|0
kˈiʃa ʃekˈemu ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˌake dˈina pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈake, na nipˈate kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈenu, nˌami nˌitawˈapa tʃotʃˈote mtˌakatʃosˈema.|0
nˌiambiˈeni kiˈasi tʃa mahˈari na zawˈadi nˌitakˌajoilˈeta, hˌata ˈiwe kˈubwa kiˈasi ɡˈani, nˌami nˌitawalˈipa tʃotʃˈote mtˌakatʃodˈai. nipˈeni tu hˈuju msitʃˈana ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ndˈuɡu jˈao dˈina ˌalikˈuwa ˌamenˌaɟisˈiwa, wˈana wa jakˈobo wˌakaɟˈibu kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu wˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza na ʃekˈemu pamˈoɟa na bˈaba jˌake hamˈori.|0
wˌakawˌaambˈia, hˌatuwˈezi kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili, hˌatuwˈezi kumtˈoa dˈada jˈetu kwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌakutˌahirˈiwa. hˈijo ˌitakˈuwa aˈibu kwˈetu.|0
tˌutakˌuruhˈusu kwa ʃˈarti mˈoɟa tˈu, kwˌamba mtakˈuwa kˌama sˌisi kwa kˌuwatahˈiri wˌanaˈume wˈenu wˈote.|0
kˈiʃa tˌutawˈapa bˈinti zˈetu na sˌisi tˌutawˌatʃukˈua bˈinti zˈenu. tˌutaˈiʃi kwˈenu na tˌutakˈuwa wˈatu wamˈoɟa nˈaɲi.|0
lakˈini mkˌikatˈaa kˌutahirˈiwa, tˌutamtʃukˈua ndˈuɡu jˈetu na kˌuondˈoka.|0
pˌendekˈezo lˈao likˈawa ɟˈema kwa hamˈori na ʃekˈemu mwanˈawe.|0
kiɟˈana mdˈoɡo, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamehˌeʃimˈiwa kˈati ja wˈote wˌalioˈiʃi ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈake, hˌakupotˈeza mˈuda kufˈaɲa wˌalijˌojasˈema, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamependˈezwa sˈana na bˈinti jakˈobo.|0
kwa hˈijo hamˈori na ʃekˈemu mwanˈawe wˌalikwˈenda kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na wenzˈao wa mɟˈini.|0
wˌakasˈema, hˈawa wˈatu ni mˌarafˈiki kwˈetu, tˌuwaruhˈusu waˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu na kufˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara ndˈani jˈake, ˈn̩tʃi ˈina nafˈasi tˈele kwa aɟˈili jˈao. tˌunawˈeza kuˈoa bˈinti zˈao. nˌao wˌanawˈeza kuˈoa bˈinti zˈetu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu hˈao wˌatakˈuwa tajˈari kˌukubˈali kuˈiʃi nˌasi kˌama wˈatu wamˈoɟa nˌao kwa ʃˈarti kwˌamba wˌanaˈume wˈetu wˌatahirˈiwe, kˌama wˈao.|0
ɟˈe, si mifˈuɡo jˈao, mˈali zˈao na waɲˈama wˌao weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌatakˈuwa wˈetu? bˌasi na tuwˈape kibˈali, nˌao wˌataˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliotˈoka ɲɟˈe ja lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi wˌalikˌubaliˈana na hamˈori na ʃekˈemu mwanˈawe na kˈila mwˌanaˈume katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ˈule ˌakatˌahirˈiwa.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku tˈatu, wakˈati wˈote wakˈiwa waŋɡˈali katˌika mˌaumˈivu, wˈana wawˈili wa jakˈobo, jaˈani sˌimeˈoni na lˈawi, ndˈuɡu zˌake dˈina, wˌakatʃukˈua pˈaŋɡa zˈao na kˌuvamˈia ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao hˌaukˌutazamˈia vˈita, wˌakaˈua kˈila mwˌanaˈume.|0
wˌakawaˈua hamˈori na ʃekˈemu mwanˈawe kwa upˈaŋɡa kˈiʃa wˌakamtʃukˈua dˈina kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ʃekˈemu na kˌuondˈoka.|0
wˈana wa jakˈobo wˌalipˈita ɟˌuːja maˈiti katˌika kutˈeka ɲˈara ˈm̩ɟi ˈule ambˈamo dˈada jˈao ˌalikˈuwa ˌamenˌaɟisˈiwa.|0
wˌakatʃukˈua kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, ŋɡˈombe, pˈunda na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa tʃˈao ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi ˈule na mˌaʃambˈani.|0
wˌalitʃukˈua ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao wˈote pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˈao, wˌakatʃukˈua ɲˈara kˈila kˈitu ndˈani ja ɲˈumba zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakawˌaambˈia sˌimeˈoni na lˈawi, mmelˈeta taˈabu kwˈaŋɡu kwa kˌunifˈaɲa ninˈuke kˌama uvˈundo kwa wˌakanaˈani na wˌaperˈizi, wˈatu wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. sˌisi ni watʃˈatʃe, kˌama wˌakiˌuŋɡanˈiʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na kˌuniʃˌambulˈia, mˌimi na ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu tˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
lakˈini wˌakamɟˈibu, ɟˈe, ˌilikˈuwa vjˈema kˌumtendˈea dˈada jˈetu kˌama kahˈaba.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia jakˈobo, pˈanda uˈende beθˈeli ˌukakˈae hˌuko na ˌukamɟeŋɡˈee mˈuŋɡu mˌaðabˈahu hˌuko, jˌeje ˌalijˌekutokˈea ˌulipokˈuwa ˌunamkimbˈia esˈau ndˈuɡu jˈako.|0
hˈivjo jakˈobo ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa nˈaje, ˌiondoˈeni miˈuŋɡu ja kiɡˈeni ˈile ˌilijˈoko kˌatikˈati jˈenu, ɟˌitakasˈeni na mkˌabadilˈiʃe ŋɡˈuo zˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa ɲɟoˈoni, twˈende beθˈeli, mahˈali nˌitakˌapomɟeŋɡˈea mˈuŋɡu mˌaðabˈahu, ˌalijˌeniɟˈibu katˌika sˈiku ja ʃˈida jˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje ˌamekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌami popˈote nˌilipokwˈenda.|0
kwa hˈijo wakˈampa jakˈobo miˈuŋɡu jˈote ja kiɡˈeni wˌalijokˈuwa nˈajo, pamˈoɟa na pˈete zˌilizokˈuwa mˌasikiˈoni m̩wˈao. jakˈobo ˌakavizˈika tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni hˌuko ʃekˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaondˈoka, na hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu ˌikawapˈata mˈiɟi jˈote ˌilijˌowazuŋɡˈuka. kwa hˈijo hakˈuna ˌalijˌewafˌuatˈia wˈana wa jakˈobo.|0
jakˈobo na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakafˈika lˈuzu n̩dˈio beθˈeli, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
hˌuko ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu na ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale ˈel beθˈeli, kwa sabˈabu mahˈali pˈale ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌoɟifunˈua kwˈake ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakimkimbˈia ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
wakˈati hˈuu debˈora, mlˈezi wa rebˈeka, akˈafa na ˌakazˈikwa tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni ˌuliˈoko tʃˈini ja beθˈeli. kwa hˈijo pˌakaˈitwa ˈalon bakˈuθi.|0
baˌada ja jakˈobo kurˈudi kutˈoka pˈadan arˈamu, mˈuŋɡu ˌalimtokˈea tˈena na kˌumbarˈiki.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈina lˈako ni jakˈobo, lakˈini hˌutaˈitwa tˈena jakˈobo, ɟˈina lˈako ˌutakˈuwa ˌisraˈeli. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi, ˌukazˈae na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka. taˈifa na ɟamˈii ja mˌataˈifa ˌitatˈoka kwˈako, nˌao wafˈalme wˌatatˈoka vˌiunˈoni mwˈako.|0
ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa ˌabrahˈamu na isˈaki nakˈupa wˌewe pˈia, nˌami nˌitawˈapa wazˈao wˈako baˌada jˈako.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu kutˈoka kwˈake mahˈali pˈale ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
jakˈobo ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa ŋɡˈuzo ja ɟˈiwe mahˈali pˈale mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza nˈaje, ˌakamimˈina sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi ɟˈuu jˈake, pˈia ˌakamimˈina mafˈuta ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
jakˈobo ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza nˌaje beθˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaondˈoka beθˈeli. wˌalipokˈuwa umbˈali fulˈani kˈabla ja kufˈika efrˈaθi, rahˈeli ˌakaˈanza kˌusikˈia utʃˈuŋɡu na ˌalipˈata ʃˈida kˈuu.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa katˌika ʃˈida hˌii katˌika kˌuɟifuŋɡˈua, mkˈuŋɡa ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusioɡˈope, kwa sabˈabu ˌumempˈata mwˈana mwiŋɡˈine.|0
hˈapo ˌalipˌopumˈua pˈumzi jˌake ja mwˈiʃo, kwa maˈana ˌalikˈuwa akˈifa, ˌakamwˈita mwanˈawe benˈoni. lakˈini babˈaje ˌakamwˈita bˌeɲamˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo rahˈeli akˈafa, ˌakazˈikwa kˈando ja ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo efrˈaθi n̩dˈio bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
ɟˌuːja kabˈuri lˈake, jakˈobo ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa ŋɡˈuzo, ambˈajo mpˈaka lˈeo ˌinatˌambulˈiʃa kabˈuri la rahˈeli.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakaˌendelˈea tˈena na safˈari jˌake na kupˈiɡa hˈema mbˈele mnˈara wa edˈeri.|0
wakˈati ˌisraˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile, rˌeubˈeni mwanˈawe ˌalikutˈana kimwˈili na surˈia wa bˈaba jˌake ˌaitwˈaje bˈilha, nˌaje ˌisraˈeli ˌakasikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili. jakˈobo ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana kˈumi na wawˈili.|0
wˈana wa lˈea wˌalikˈuwa: rˌeubˈeni mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa jakˈobo, sˌimeˈoni, lˈawi, jˈuda, ˌisakˈari na zˌabulˈoni.|0
wˈana wa rahˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: josˈefu na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
wˈana wˌaliˌozalˈiwa na bˈilha mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike wa rahˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: dˈani na naftˈali.|0
wˈana wˌaliˌozalˈiwa na zˈilpa mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike wa lˈea wˌalikˈuwa: ɡˈadi na aʃˈeri. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa jakˈobo, wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwˈake akˈiwa pˈadan arˈamu.|0
jakˈobo ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˌake isˈaki hˌuko mˈamre, karˈibu na kirˈiaθ ˈarba jaˈani hebrˈoni, ambˈapo wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈiʃi ˌabrahˈamu na isˈaki.|0
isˈaki ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θemanˈini.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja esˈau jaˈani edˈomu.|0
esˈau ˌakaˈoa wˌake kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanawˈake wa kˌanaˈani: ˈada bˈinti wa elˈoni mhˈiti, ˌoholibˈama bˈinti wa ˈana, mɟukˈuu wa kˈike wa sˌibeˈoni mhˈivi.|0
pˈia ˌakaˈoa bˌasemˈaθi bˈinti wa ˌiʃmaˈeli, dˈada jˌake nˌebajˈoθi.|0
ˈada ˌakamzalˈia esˈau ˌelifˈazi, bˌasemˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa rˌeuˈeli.|0
ˌoholibˈama ˌakamzˈaa jeˈuʃi, jalˈamu na kˈora. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana wa esˈau wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwˈake hˌuko kˌanaˈani.|0
esˈau ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˌake zˈake, watˈoto wˌake wa kiˈume na wa kˈike na wˈote wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake, mifˈuɡo jˌake pamˈoɟa na waɲˈama wˌake weŋɡˈine wˈote na mˈali jˌake jˈote ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameipˈata akˈiwa kˌanaˈani, ˌakahamˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ilˈijo mbˈali na jakˈobo ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
mˈali zˈao zˌilikˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌaikˈuwa rahˈisi wˌao kuˈiʃi pamˈoɟa, ˈn̩tʃi wˌalijokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi ˌisiŋɡˌewatˈoʃa wˈote kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo esˈau ambˈaje ni edˈomu ˌaliˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kilˈima hˌuko seˈiri.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wazˈao wa esˈau, bˈaba wa wˌaedˈomu, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kilˈima tʃa seˈiri.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈana wa esˈau: ˌelifˈazi, mwˈana wa esˈau ambˈaje mkˈewe ˈada ˌalimzalˈia; na rˌeuˈeli, mwˈana wa esˈau ambˈaje mkˈewe bˌasemˈaθi ˌalimzalˈia.|0
wˈana wa ˌelifˈazi nˈi: temˈani, omˈari, sˈefo, ɡatˈamu na kenˈazi.|0
ˌelifˈazi mwˈana wa esˈau ˌalikˈuwa pˈia na surˈia ˌalijeˈitwa tˈimna, ambˈaje ˌalimzalˈia ˌamalˈeki. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaɟukˈuu wa ˈada ˈm̩ke wa esˈau.|0
wˈana wa rˌeuˈeli nˈi: nahˈaθi, zˈera, ʃˈama na mˈiza. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaɟukˈuu wa bˌasemˈaθi mkˈewe esˈau.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wa esˈau: wakˈuu wa wˈana wa ˌelifˈazi, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa esˈau nˈi: temˈani, omˈari, sˈefo, kenˈazi.|0
kˈora, ɡatˈamu na ˌamalˈeki. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu wˌaliotˈoka kwa ˌelifˈazi hˌuko edˈomu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaɟukˈuu wa kiˈume wa ˈada.|0
wakˈuu wa wˈana wa rˌeuˈeli, mwˈana wa esˈau nˈi: nahˈaθi, zˈera, ʃˈama na mˈiza. hˈawa n̩dˈio wakˈuu wˌaliotˈoka kwa rˌeuˈeli hˌuko edˈomu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaɟukˈuu wa kiˈume wa bˌasemˈaθi mkˈewe esˈau.|0
wakˈuu wa wˈana wa esˈau ambˈao mkˈewe ˌoholibˈama ˌalimzalˈia nˈi: jeˈuʃi, jalˈamu na kˈora. hˈawa n̩dˈio wakˈuu wˌaliotˈoka kwa ˈm̩ke wa esˈau, ˌoholibˈama bˈinti ˈana.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa esˈau n̩dˈije edˈomu, na hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu wˈao.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa seˈiri, mhˈori, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile: lotˈani, ʃobˈali, sˌibeˈoni, ˈana.|0
diʃˈoni, esˈeri na diʃˈani. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana wa seˈiri hˌuko edˈomu wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu kwa wahˈori.|0
wˈana wa lotˈani wˌalikˈuwa: hˈori na homˈamu. tˈimna ˌalikˈuwa dˈada jˌake lotˈani.|0
wˈana wa ʃobˈali wˌalikˈuwa: alvˈani, mˌanahˈaθi, ebˈali, ʃˈefo na onˈamu.|0
wˈana wa sˌibeˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: aˈija na ˈana. hˈuju ˈana n̩dˈije ˌaliɡundˈua tʃemtʃˈemi ja mˈaɟi mˈoto ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitʃˈuŋɡa pˈunda za sˌibeˈoni bˈaba jˈake.|0
watˈoto wa ˈana wˌalikˈuwa: diʃˈoni na ˌoholibˈama bˈinti wa ˈana.|0
wˈana wa diʃˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: hemdˈani, eʃbˈani, iθrˈani na kerˈani.|0
wˈana wa esˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: bilhˈani, zˌaavˈani na akˈani.|0
wˈana wa diʃˈani wˌalikˈuwa: ˈusi na arˈani.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu wa wahˈori: lotˈani, ʃobˈali, sˌibeˈoni, ˈana.|0
diʃˈoni, esˈeri na diʃˈani. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa wakˈuu wa wahˈori, kˌufuatˈana na makˈundi jˈao, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja seˈiri.|0
wˌafuatˈao ni wafˈalme wˌaliˌotawˈala edˈomu kˈabla ja mfˈalme jejˈote wa ˌisraˈeli kˌutawˈala.|0
bˈela mwˈana wa beˈori ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa edˈomu. ˈm̩ɟi wˌake ˌuliˈitwa dinhˈaba.|0
jobˈabu ˌalipˌofarˈiki, huʃˈamu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌatemˈani akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
huʃˈamu ˌalipˌofarˈiki, hadˈadi mwˈana wa bedˈadi, ˌalijeʃˈinda mˌidiˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake. ˈm̩ɟi wˌake ˌuliˈitwa avˈiθi.|0
hadˈadi ˌalipˌofarˈiki, sˈamla kutˈoka masrˈeka akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wakˈuu wˌaliˌotokˈana na esˈau, kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˈoo zˈao na ˈn̩tʃi zˈao: tˈimna, ˈalva, jeθˈeθi.|0
ˌoholibˈama, ˈela, pinˈoni.|0
kenˈazi, temˈani, mibsˈari.|0
mˌaɡdiˈeli na irˈamu. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa wakˈuu wa edˈomu, kˌufuatˈana na makˈazi jˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌalijˌoimilˈiki. hˈuju n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa esˈau, bˈaba wa wˌaedˈomu.|0
jakˈobo ˌakaˈiʃi kˌanaˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈiʃi.|0
zˌifuatˈazo ni habˈari za jakˈobo. josˈefu, kiɟˈana wa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈaba, ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitʃˈuŋɡa makˈundi ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˌake wa mˈama weŋɡˈine, jaˈani wˈana wa bˈilha na wˈana wa zˈilpa wˌake za bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje akˈawa ˌakimletˈea bˈaba jˌake tˌaarˈifa m̩bˈaja kuhˈusu hˈao ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
bˈasi, ˌisraˈeli ˌakampˈenda josˈefu kulˈiko jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈaka zˈake, kwˈani ni mwanˈawe wa ˌuzeˈeni, ˌakamʃonˈea ɟˈoho lˌililorˈembwa vizˈuri sˈana.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌalipoˈona kwˌamba bˈaba jˈao ˌanampˈenda josˈefu kulˈiko jejˈote mwiŋɡˈine mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, wˌalimtʃukˈia na hˌawakusˈema nˌaje nˈeno lolˈote ɟˈema.|0
josˈefu ˌakaˈota ndˈoto, nˌaje ˌalipˌowaelˈeza ndˈuɡu zˈake, wˌakamtʃukˈia zaˈidi.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, sˌikilizˈeni ndˈoto nˌilijoˈota.|0
tˌulikˈuwa tˌukifˈuŋɡa miɡˈanda ja nafˈaka ʃambˈani, ɣafˈula mɡˈanda wˈaŋɡu ˌukasimˈama wˈima, wakˈati miɡˈanda jˈenu ˌikiˌuzuŋɡˈuka na kˌuuˌinamˈia.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ˌunakˌusudˈia kˌututawˈala? hˈivi kwˈeli wˌewe ˌutatˌutawˈala sˈisi? wˌakaoŋɡˈeza kˌumtʃukˈia zaˈidi kwa sabˈabu ja ndˈoto jˌake pamˈoɟa na jˈale ˌalijˌowaambˈia.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaˈota ndˈoto ɲiŋɡˈine, ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˌake ˌakisˈema, sˌikilizˈeni, nˌimeˈota ndˈoto ɲiŋɡˈine, wakˈati hˈuu ɟˈua, mwˈezi na ɲˈota kˈumi na mˈoɟa zˌilikˈuwa zˌinanˌisuɟudˈia.|0
ˌalipˌomwambˈia bˈaba jˌake pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈake, bˈaba jˌake ˌakamkemˈea ˌakisˈema, ni ndˈoto ɡˈani hˌii ˌulijoˈota? hˈivi kwˈeli mˈama jˈako na mˌimi na ndˈuɡu zˈako tˌutakˈuɟa kˌukusˌuɟudˈia wˌewe hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakamwonˈea wˈivu, lakˈini bˈaba jˌake ˌakaliwˈeka ɟˈambo hˌilo mojˈoni.|0
bˈasi, ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda kutʃˈuŋɡa makˈundi ja bˈaba jˈao karˈibu na ʃekˈemu.|0
nˌaje ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, kˌama ˌuɟuˈavjo, ndˈuɡu zˈako wˌanatʃˈuŋɡa makˈundi hˌuko karˈibu na ʃekˈemu. ɲɟˈoo, nˌitakutˈuma kwˈao. josˈefu ˌakaɟˈibu, vˈema sˈana, nˈiko tajˈari.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda uˈone kˌama mˈambo jˈote ni salˈama kwa ndˈuɡu zˈako na makˈundi, kˈiʃa ˌuniletˈee habˈari. ndˈipo ˌakamtˈuma josˈefu kutˈoka bˈonde la hebrˈoni. josˈefu ˌalipofˈika ʃekˈemu.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakamkˈuta ˌakizˌuŋɡukˌazuŋɡˈuka mˌaʃambˈani na ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌunatafˈuta nˈini.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌinawˌatafˈuta ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu. ˌunawˈeza kˌuniambˈia wˌanatʃˈuŋɡa wˈapi makˈundi jˈao.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakaɟˈibu, wˌamehˈama hˈapa. nˌilisikˈia wˌakisˈema, twˈende doθˈani.  kwa hˈijo josˈefu ˌakawˌafuˌatilˈia ndˈuɡu zˌake na kˌuwakˈuta karˈibu na doθˈani.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌalipomwˈona akˈiwa mbˈali, kˈabla hˌaɟawˌafikˈia, wˌakapˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri bˈaja la kˌumuˈua.|0
wˌakaˌambiˈana, jˈule mwˈota ndˈoto ˌanakˈuɟa.|0
ɲɟoˈoni sˈasa, tˌumuˈue na kumtˈupa katˌika ʃˈimo mˌoɟawˈapo na tusˈeme kwˌamba mɲˈama mkˈali ˌamemrarˈua. kˈiʃa tˌutaˈona mˌatokˈeo ja ndˈoto zˈake.|0
rˌeubˈeni ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakaɟarˈibu kˌumwokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao ˌakasˈema, tˌusiutˈoe uhˈai wˈake.|0
tˌusimwˈaɡe dˈamu jojˈote. mtupˈeni katˌika ʃˈimo lˌililˈoko hˈapa ɟaŋɡwˈani, lakˈini msimɡˈuse. rˌeubˈeni ˌalisˈema hˈivjo ˌili ˌamwokˈoe kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, kˈiʃa ˌamrudˈiʃe ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo josˈefu ˌalipˌowafikˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, wˌalimvˈua lˈile ɟˈoho lˈake, lˈile ɟˈoho lˌililorˈembwa vizˈuri ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakamtʃukˈua wˌakamtˈupa katˌika ʃˈimo. wakˈati hˈuo ʃˈimo lˌilikˈuwa tˈupu, hˌalikˈuwa na mˈaɟi ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˌalipokˈaa ˌili wˈale tʃakˈula tʃˈao, wˌakainˈua mˈatʃo wˌakaˈona msafˈara wa wˌaiʃmaˈeli ukˈiɟa kutˈoka ɡˌileˈadi. ŋɡamˈia wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌamepakˈizwa mizˈiɡo ja vˌikolˈezo, uvˈumba na mˌanemˈane, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa ɲɟiˈani kˌuvipelˈeka mˈisri.|0
jˈuda ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, tˌutafaˈidi nˈini ikˈiwa tˌutamuˈua ndˈuɡu jˈetu na kˌuifˈitʃa dˈamu jˈake.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, tˌumuˈuze kwa hˈawa wˌaiʃmaˈeli. tˌusimɡˈuse, kwa kˌuwa hˌata hˈivjo jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈetu, ɲˈama jˈetu na dˈamu jˈetu weɲˈewe. ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakakubˈali.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈale wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˌamidiˈani wˌalipofˈika pˈale, ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakamtˈoa josˈefu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe lˈile ʃˈimo, na kˌumuˈuza kwa ʃekˈeli ˌiʃirˈini za fˈeða kwa wˈale wˌaiʃmaˈeli, ambˈao wˌalimpelˈeka mˈisri.|0
rˌeubˈeni ˌaliporˈudi kˌutazˈama kwˈeɲe lˈile ʃˈimo na kuˈona kwˌamba josˈefu hajˈupo, ˌalirarˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈake.|0
ˌakawˌarudˈia ndˈuɡu zˌake na kusˈema, kiɟˈana hajˈuko ˈm̩le! nˌielekˈee wˈapi sˈasa.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakalˌitʃukˈua lˈile ɟˈoho la josˈefu, wˌakatʃˈiɲɟa mbˈuzi na kˌulitʃˈovja katˌika dˈamu.|0
wˌakalˌitʃukˈua lˈile ɟˈoho lˌililorˈembwa vizˈuri na kˌulipelˈeka kwa bˈaba jˈao na kusˈema, tˌumelˌiokˈota hˈili ɟˈoho. ˌutʃuŋɡˈuze uˈone kˌama ni la mwanˈao.|0
bˈaba jˈao ˌakalˌitambˈua ˌakasˈema, hˈili ni ɟˈoho la mwanˈaŋɡu! mɲˈama mkˈali ˌamemrarˈua. hakˈika josˈefu ˌamerˌarulˈiwa vipˈande vipˈande.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈake, ˌakavˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na kˌumwombˌolezˈea mwanˈawe kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
wanˈawe wˈote na bˈinti zˌake wakˈaɟa kˌumfarˈiɟi, lakˈini hˌakukubˈali kˌufariɟˈiwa. ˌakasˈema, hapˈana, nˌitamwˌombolezˈea mwanˈaŋɡu mpˈaka nˌimfikˈie kˌaburˈini. kwa hˈijo bˈaba jˌake ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌumlilˈia.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, wˌamidiˈani wˌakamuˈuza josˈefu hˌuko mˈisri kwa potˈifa, mmˌoɟawˈapo wa mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao, ˌalijekˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa ulˈinzi.|0
wakˈati ˈule, jˈuda ˌakawaˈatʃa ndˈuɡu zˈake, ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi na hˈira mwˌadulˈami.|0
hˌuko jˈuda ˌakakutˈana na bˈinti wa kˌikanaˈani ˌaitwˈaje ʃˈua, ˌakamwˈoa na ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili.|0
ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, ambˈaje ˌalimwˈita ˈeri.|0
ˌakapˈata mˈimba tˈena, ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana na kumwˈita onˈani.|0
ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana mwiŋɡˈine tˈena, ˌakamwˈita ʃˈela. hˈuju ˌalimzalˈia mahˈali pˌaitwˈapo kezˈibu.|0
jˈuda ˌakampatˈia ˈeri, mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, ˈm̩ke ˌaitwˈaje tamˈari.|0
lakˈini ˈeri, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa jˈuda, ˌalikˈuwa mwˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakamuˈua.|0
kˈiʃa jˈuda ˌakamwambˈia onˈani, kutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa ndˈuɡu jˈako, na ˌutimˈize waɟˈibu wˈako kwˈake kˌama ˈm̩ke wa ndˈuɡu jˈako, ˌili ˌumpatˈie ndˈuɡu jˈako uzˈao.|0
lakˈini onˈani ˌaliɟˈua kwˌamba uzˈao hˌauŋɡekˈuwa wˈake, kwa hˈijo kˈila ˌalipˌokutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌalimwˈaɡa tʃˈini mbˈeɡu za kiˈume ˌili ˌasimpatˈie ndˈuɡu jˌake uzˈao.|0
ˌalitʃofˈaɲa kˌilikˈuwa kiˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, hˈivjo, pˈia bwˈana ˌakamuˈua onˈani.|0
kˈiʃa jˈuda ˌakamwambˈia tamˈari mkwˈewe, ˈiʃi kˌama mɟˈane ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈako mpˈaka mwanˈaŋɡu ʃˈela ˌatakˌapokˈua. kwa maˈana ˌalifikˈiri, ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˈufa pˈia kˌama ndˈuɡu zˈake. kwa hˈijo tamˈari ˌalikwˈenda kuˈiʃi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda mrˈefu ˈm̩ke wa jˈuda bˈinti wa ʃˈua ˌakafarˈiki. baˌada ja msˈiba, jˈuda ˌalikwˈenda tˈimna, kwa wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakikˈata kondˈoo wˌake maɲˈoja, nˌaje ˌalifˌuatˈana na rafˈiki jˌake hˈira mwˌadulˈami.|0
tamˈari ˌalipˌoambˈiwa, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˈako jˈuko ɲɟiˈani kwˈenda tˈimna kukˈata kondˈoo wˌake maɲˈoja.|0
ˌalivˈua mavˈazi jˌake ja uɟˈane, ˌakaɟˌifunˈika kwa ʃˈela ˌili ˌasifˌahamˈike, ˌakakˈeti kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa ˌenaˈimu, ambˈao ˈupo ɲɟiˈani kˌuelekˈea tˈimna. ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa sabˈabu ˌaliˈona kwˌamba, iŋɡˈawa ʃˈela ˌamekˈua, lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟakˌabiðˈiwa kwˈake kˌuwa mkˈewe.|0
jˈuda ˌalipomwˈona ˌalifikˈiri ni kahˈaba, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefunˈika ˈuso wˈake.|0
pasˈipo kˌutambˈua kwˌamba ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩kwe wˈake, ˌakamwendˈea kˈando ja ɲɟˈia na kˌumwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo sˈasa, nˌikutˈane na wˌewe kimwˈili. jˈule mkwˈewe ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌutanˈipa nˈini nˌikikutˈana nˌawe kimwˈili.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitakˌutumˈia mwˌanambˈuzi kutˈoka kˈundi lˈaŋɡu. ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌutanˈipa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌama amˈana mpˈaka ˌutakˌapompelˈeka.|0
ˌakamˌuulˈiza, nikˈupe amˈana ɡˈani? ˌakamɟˈibu, pˈete jˈako na kˈamba jˌake pamˈoɟa na fˈimbo ilˈijo mkonˈoni mwˈako. kwa hˈijo akˈampa vˈitu hˈivjo kˈiʃa ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba jˈake.|0
tamˈari ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakavˈua ʃˈela jˌake ˌakavˈaa tˈena ŋɡˈuo zˌake za uɟˈane.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, jˈuda ˌakamtˈuma rafˈiki jˌake mwˌadulˈami ˌapelˈeke jˈule mwˌanambˈuzi ˌili ˌarudiʃˈiwe amˈana jˌake kutˈoka kwa jˈule mwanˈamke, lakˈini jˈule rafˈiki jˌake hˌakumkˈuta jˈule mwanˈamke.|0
kˈiʃa jˈuda ˌakasˈema, mwˈatʃe ˌavitʃukˈue vˈitu hˈivjo, ˌama sˈivjo tˌutakˈuwa kˌitʃekˈeʃo. hˌata hˈivjo, nˌilimpˌelekˈea mwˌanambˈuzi, lakˈini hˌukumkˈuta.|0
baˌada ja miˈezi mitˈatu jˈuda ˌakaambˈiwa, tamˈari m̩kwˈeo ˈana hatˈia ja kˌuwa kahˈaba, na mˌatokˈeo jˌake ˈana mˈimba. jˈuda ˌakasˈema, mtoˈeni ɲɟˈe na atʃˈomwe mˈoto hˌadi ˈafe.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitolˈewa ɲɟˈe, ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake kusˈema, nˈina mˈimba ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe vˈitu hˈivi. ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, ˌaŋɡalˈia kˌama ˌutatambˈua kwˌamba pˈete hˌii na kˈamba jˌake pamˈoɟa na fˈimbo hˌii ni vja nˈani.|0
jˈuda ˌakavˌitambˈua na kusˈema, jˌeje ˈana hˈaki kulˈiko mˈimi, kwa kˌuwa sˌikumkabˈiði kwa mwanˈaŋɡu ʃˈela ˌili ˈawe mkˈewe. ʃˈu hˈapo hˌakukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili tˈena.|0
wakˈati ˌulipofˈika wa kˌuɟifuŋɡˈua, kukˈawa na wˈana mapˈatʃa tumbˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiɟˌifuŋɡˈua, mmˈoɟa ˌakatˈoa mkˈono wˌake ɲɟˈe, kwa hˈijo mkˈuŋɡa ˌakatʃukˈua ˈuzi mwekˈundu na kˌuufˈuŋɡa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa jˈule mtˈoto, ˌakasˈema, hˈuju ˌametˈoka kwˈanza.|0
lakˈini ˌalipˌourudˈiʃa mkˈono wˌake ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌakaˈanza kutˈoka, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌulivjotˈoka kwa ŋɡˈuvu! ˌakaˈitwa perˈesi.|0
kˈiʃa ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌalijekˈuwa na ˈuzi mwekˈundu mkonˈoni, ˌakatˈoka, nˌaje ˌakaˈitwa zˈera.|0
wakˈati hˈuu josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa ˌametʃˌukulˈiwa mpˈaka mˈisri. mmˈisri ˌalijeˈitwa potˈifa ˌalijekˈuwa mmˌoɟawˈapo wa mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao, m̩kˈuu wa ulˈinzi, ˌakamnunˈua josˈefu kutˈoka kwa wˌaiʃmaˈeli wˌaliomlˈeta mˈisri.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na josˈefu, nˌaje ˌakastˈawi, josˈefu ˌakaˈiʃi ɲumbˈani kwa bwˈana wˌake mmˈisri.|0
potˈifa ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na josˈefu na kwˌamba bwˈana ˌalimfˌanikˈiʃa kwa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃˌokifˈaɲa.|0
josˈefu ˌalipˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pa potˈifa, ˌakamfˈaɲa mhudˈumu wˈake. potˈifa ˌakamwˈeka kˌuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɲˈumba jˈake, nˌaje ˌakamkabˈiði kˌuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo.|0
kwa hˈijo potˈifa ˌakamwatʃˈia josˈefu ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo, josˈefu ˌalipokˈuwa katˌika ˌuoŋɡˈozi, potˈifa hakˈuwa na sabˈabu ja kˌuɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa tʃakˈula ˌalitʃokˈula. josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa mwˌeɲe ˈumbo zˈuri na sˈura ja kˌuvutˈia.|0
baˌada ja kitˈambo ˈm̩ke wa potˈifa ˌakamtamˈani josˈefu, ˌakamwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo, ˌukutˈane nˌami kimwˈili.|0
lakˈini josˈefu ˌakakatˈaa. ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mwanˈamke, mˌimi nikˈiwa katˌika ˌuoŋɡˈozi, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌahusˈiki na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote katˌika ɲˈumba hˌii, kˈila kˈitu alˈitʃo nˈatʃo ˌamenˌikabˈiði.|0
hˈapa ɲumbˈani hakˈuna alˈije m̩kˈuu kulˈiko mˈimi. bwˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌakunˌizuilˈia kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa wˈewe, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni ˈm̩ke wˈake. nˌitawezˈaɟe bˌasi kufˈaɲa uˈovu hˈuu na kutˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa jˈule mwanˈamke ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌumʃawˈiʃi josˈefu sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, josˈefu ˌalikatˈaa kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili wˈala kukˈaa karˈibu nˈaje.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa josˈefu ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba kufˈaɲa kˈazi zˈake, wˈala hˌapakuwˈepo na mfˌaɲakˈazi jejˈote ndˈani ja ɲˈumba.|0
ˈm̩ke wa potˈifa ˌakaʃˈika vˈazi josˈefu ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa, ˌakamwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo tˌukutˈane kimwˈili! lakˈini josˈefu ˌakaˈatʃa vˈazi lˈake mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈujo mwanˈamke, ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba ˌakikimbˈia.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba josˈefu ˌamemwatʃˈia vˈazi lˈake mkonˈoni na kˌukimbilˈia ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba.|0
ˌakawaˈita wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wa ɲumbˈani, ˌakawˌaambˈia, tˌazamˈeni! hˈuju mwˌebranˈia ˌamelˈetwa hˈapa kˌutuðihˈaki! ˌaliiŋɡˈia hˈapa ndˈani ˌili ˌakutˈane nˌami kimwˈili, lakˈini nˌikapˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
ˌalipˌosikˈia kelˈele za kuˈomba msaˈada, ˌakaˈatʃa vˈazi lˈake kˈando jˈaŋɡu ˌakakˌimbilˈia ɲɟˈe.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakaliwˈeka lˈile vˈazi karˈibu nˌaje mpˈaka potˈifa ˌaliporˈudi ɲumbˈani.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamwelˈeza kˈisa hˈiki, ˌakisˈema: jˈule mtˈumwa wa kˌiebranˈia ˌulijˌetuletˈea ˌaliniɟˈia ˌili kˌuniðihˈaki.|0
lakˈini mˈara nˌilipopˈiɡa kelˈele kuˈomba msaˈada, ˌakaliˈatʃa vˈazi lˈake kˈando jˈaŋɡu ˌakakimbˈia ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba.|0
potˈifa ˌalipˌosikˈia kˈisa hˈiki mkˈewe ˌalitʃˌomwelˈeza, ˌakisˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˈumwa wˈako ˌalivjˌonitˈenda. hasˈira ja potˈifa ˌikawˈaka.|0
potˈifa ˌakamtʃukˈua josˈefu na kumwˈeka ɡˌerezˈani, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌahalˈifu wa mfˈalme wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˈuŋɡwa. lakˈini wakˈati josˈefu ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko ɡˌerezˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌakamhˌurumˈia na kˈumpa kibˈali mbˈele ja msˌimamˈizi wa ɡerˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo msˌimamˈizi wa ɡerˈeza ˌakamwˈeka josˈefu ˈawe m̩kˈuu wa wafˈuŋɡwa pamˈoɟa na kˌusimamˈia jˈote ambˈajo jˌalitendˈeka ˈm̩le ɡˌerezˈani.|0
msˌimamˈizi wa ɡerˈeza hˌakuɟˌiʃuɣulˈiʃa tˈena na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃokˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa josˈefu, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na josˈefu ˌakimfˌanikˈiʃa kwa kˈila ˌalitʃofˈaɲa.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, mɲueʃˈaɟi na mwokˈaɟi wa mfˈalme wa mˈisri, wˌakamkosˈea bwˈana wˈao, mfˈalme wa mˈisri.|0
farˈao ˌakawˌakasˌirikˈia hˈawa mˌaafˈisa wˌake wawˈili, mɲueʃˈaɟi m̩kˈuu na mwokˈaɟi m̩kˈuu.|0
ˌakawawˈeka tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi katˌika ɲˈumba ja m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi tʃa ulˈinzi katˌika ɡerˈeza lˈile lˈile ˌalimofˈuŋɡwa josˈefu.|0
m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi tʃa ulˈinzi ˌakawˌakabˈiði kwa josˈefu, nˌaje ˌakawˌahudumˈia. wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamekˈaa tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi kwa mˈuda.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wa hˈao wawˈili wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewˈekwa ɡˌerezˈani, jaˈani mɲueʃˈaɟi na mwokˈaɟi wa mfˈalme wa mˈisri, wˌaliˈota ndˈoto usˈiku mmˈoɟa, na kˈila ndˈoto ˌilikˈuwa na maˈana jˌake tˌofaˈuti.|0
josˈefu ˌalipˌowaɟˈia ˌasubˈuhi jˈake, ˌakawaˈona kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa na huzˈuni.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaulˈiza mˌaafˈisa hˈao wa farˈao wˌaliokˈuwa tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi pamˈoɟa nˌaje ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bwˈana wˈake, ˌakasˈema, mbˈona ɲˈuso zˈenu zˌimeɟˈaa huzˈuni lˈeo.|0
