wˌakamɟˈibu, sˌisi sˈote tˌuliˈota ndˈoto, lakˈini hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌuzifasˈiri. ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɟˈe, kˌufasˈiri ndˈoto si kˈazi ja mˈuŋɡu? nˌiambiˈeni ndˈoto zˈenu.|0
bˌasi m̩kˈuu wa wˌaɲueʃˈaɟi ˌakamwelˈeza josˈefu ndˈoto jˈake. ˌakamwambˈia, katˌika ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu nˌiliˈona mzabˈibu mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌao mzabˈibu ˌulikˈuwa na matˈawi matˈatu. mˈara tu ˌulipoˈanza kˌutʃipˈua, maˈua jˌalitʃanˈua na viʃˈada vjˈake vikˈawa zabˈibu zˌilizoˈiva.|0
kikˈombe tʃa farˈao kˌilikˈuwa mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌikazitwˈaa zabˈibu, nˌikazˌikamˈua katˌika kikˈombe tʃa farˈao, na nˌikawˈeka kikˈombe mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia, hˌii n̩dˈijo maˈana jˈake: matˈawi matˈatu ni sˈiku tˈatu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizi tˈatu, farˈao ˌatakutˈoa ɡˌerezˈani na kˌukuwˈeka tˈena kwˈeɲe nafˈasi jˈako, nˌawe ˌutawˈeka kikˈombe tʃa farˈao mˌikonˈoni mwˈake, kˌama vˈile ˌulivjokˈuwa ˌunafˈaɲa ˌulipokˈuwa mɲueʃˈaɟi wˈake.|0
lakˈini wakˈati mˈambo jˌatakˌapokuwˈia mazˈuri, ˌunikumbˈuke, ˌunifaɲˈie wˈema, usˈeme mˈema ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu kwa farˈao ˌili nˌiondˈoke hˈuku ɡˌerezˈani.|0
kwa maˈana nˌilitʃˌukulˈiwa kwa ŋɡˈuvu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaebranˈia, na hˌata hˈapa nilˈipo sˌikufˈaɲa lolˈote lˌinalˌostahˈili niwˈekwe ɡˌerezˈani.|0
jˈule mwokˈaɟi m̩kˈuu ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa josˈefu ˌamefasˈiri ikˈiwa na maˈana nzˈuri, ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, mˌimi pˈia nˌiliˈota ndˈoto: kitʃwˈani mwˈaŋɡu kˌulikuwˈepo vikˈapu vitˈatu vja mikˈate.|0
katˌika kikˈapu tʃa ɟˈuu kˌulikˈuwa na aˈina zˈote za vjakˈula vˌilivjoˈokwa kwa aɟˈili ja farˈao, lakˈini ndˈeɡe wˌalikˈuwa wˌakivˈila kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kikˈapu nˌilitʃokˈuwa nˌimebˈeba kitʃwˈani.|0
josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia, hˌii n̩dˈijo maˈana jˈake: vikˈapu vitˈatu ni sˈiku tˈatu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizi tˈatu, farˈao ˌatakˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈako na kˌukutundˈika ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ti. nˌao ndˈeɡe wˌatakˈula ɲˈama ja mwˈili wˈako.|0
mnˈamo sˈiku ja tˈatu, ˌilikˈuwa kˌumbukˈumbu ja kˌuzalˈiwa kwa farˈao, nˌaje ˌakawˌaandalˈia mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote karˈamu. ˌakawatˈoa ɡˌerezˈani mɲueʃˈaɟi m̩kˈuu na mwokˈaɟi m̩kˈuu, ˌakawawˈeka mbˈele ja mˌaafˈisa wˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamrudˈiʃa mɲueʃˈaɟi m̩kˈuu kwˈeɲe nafˈasi jˈake, ˌili awˈeke kikˈombe mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa farˈao tˈena.|0
lakˈini ˌakamwaŋɡˈika jˈule mwokˈaɟi m̩kˈuu, sˌawasˈawa na ɟˈinsi josˈefu ˌalivjˌowaambˈia katˌika tafsˈiri jˈake.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, mɲueʃˈaɟi m̩kˈuu hˌakumkumbˈuka josˈefu, bˌali ˌalimsahˈau.|0
baˌada ja miˈaka miwˈili kamˈili kupˈita, farˈao ˌaliˈota ndˈoto: tazˈama ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja ˈm̩to naˈili.|0
wakˈati ŋɡˈombe sˈaba, wazˈuri na wanˈono, wˌalitokˈea mtˈoni wˌakaɟilˈiʃa kwˈeɲe matˈete.|0
baˌada jˈao ŋɡˈombe weŋɡˈine sˈaba, wabˈaja na wˌaliokˈonda, wˌakatokˈea mtˈoni naˈili wˌakasimˈama kˈando ja wˈale wanˈono ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈm̩to.|0
wˈale ŋɡˈombe wabˈaja na wˌaliokˈonda wˌakawˈala wˈale sˈaba wazˈuri na wanˈono. kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakaˈamka.|0
farˈao ˌakaiŋɡˈia ˌusiŋɡizˈini tˈena ˌakaˈota ndˈoto ja pˈili: ˌakaˈona masˈuke sˈaba ja nafˈaka, jˌeɲe ˈafja na mazˈuri, jˌanakˈua katˌika bˈua mˈoɟa.|0
bˌaadˈaje, masˈuke meŋɡˈine sˈaba jˌakatʃipˈua, jakˈiwa membˈamba jˌalijˌoɲaˈuʃwa na upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
masˈuke jˈale membˈamba jˌakamˈeza jˈale masˈuke sˈaba jˌeɲe ˈafja na jˌalijoɟˈaa. bˌasi farˈao ˌakaˈamka kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡizˈini, kˈumbe ˌilikˈuwa ndˈoto.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˈake, ˌalifˌaðaˈika ˌakilˈini, hˈivjo ˌakawaˈita wˌaaɡˈuzi wˈote pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌeɲe busˈara wa mˈisri. wˌalipokˈuɟa, farˈao ˌakawˌaelˈeza ndˈoto zˈake, lakˈini hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijewˈeza kˌumfasirˈia.|0
ndˈipo mɲueʃˈaɟi m̩kˈuu ˌalipˌomwambˈia farˈao, lˈeo nˌimekumbˈuʃwa kuhˈusu kˈosa lˈaŋɡu.|0
wakˈati fulˈani farˈao ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, ˌakanifˈuŋɡa mˌimi na mwokˈaɟi m̩kˈuu katˌika ɲˈumba ja m̩kˈuu wa ulˈinzi.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌaliˈota ndˈoto katˌika usˈiku mmˈoɟa na kˈila ndˈoto ˌilikˈuwa na maˈana jˌake tˌofaˈuti.|0
bˌasi kiɟˈana wa kˌiebranˈia ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌasi hˌuko, ˌalikˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wa m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi tʃa ulˈinzi. tˌulimwelˈeza ndˈoto zˈetu, nˌaje ˌakatˌufasirˈia, ˌakitˈupa kˈila ˈm̩tu tafsˈiri ja ndˈoto jˈake.|0
nˈajo mˈambo jakˈawa sˈawa kabˈisa na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌotufˌasirˈia ndˈoto zˈetu: mˌimi nˌilirudˈiʃwa kazˈini mwˈaŋɡu na hˈujo ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌakaaŋɡˈikwa.|0
bˈasi, farˈao ˌakatˈuma josˈefu aˈitwe, nˌaje ˌakatolˈewa kˌifuŋɡˈoni harˈaka. baˌada ja kuɲˈoa na kˌubadilˈiʃa ŋɡˈuo zˌake ˌakaˈenda mbˈele ja farˈao.|0
farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, nˌimeˈota ndˈoto, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajewˈeza kˌuifasˈiri. lakˈini nˌimesikˈia ˌikisˈemwa kwa habˈari jˈako kwˌamba ˌunapˌoelˈezwa ndˈoto wawˈeza kˌuifasˈiri.|0
josˈefu ˌakamɟˈibu farˈao, siwˈezi kˌuifasˈiri, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu atˈampa farˈao ɟˈibu ˌanalˌolihitˈaɟi.|0
kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, katˌika ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu nˌilikˈuwa nˌimesimˈama ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈm̩to naˈili.|0
nˌikawaˈona ŋɡˈombe sˈaba, wazˈuri na wanˈono, wˌakiɟˌitokˈeza kutˈoka mtˈoni wakˈaɟa kˌuɟilˈiʃa kwˈeɲe matˈete.|0
baˌada ja hˈao, ŋɡˈombe weŋɡˈine sˈaba wˌaðaˈifu wˌakatokˈea, wabˈaja sˈana na wˌaliokˈonda. kˈamwe sˌikuwˈahi kuˈona ŋɡˈombe wabˈaja ɟˈinsi hˈijo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
hˈao ŋɡˈombe wˌaliokˈonda na wabˈaja sˈana wˌakawˈala wˈale ŋɡˈombe sˈaba wˌalionˈona wˌaliˌoɟitokˈeza kwˈanza.|0
lakˈini hˌata baˌada ja kuwˈala, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌaŋɡewˈeza kusˈema kwˌamba wˌamekˈula, bˈado wˌaliˌonekˈana wabˈaja kˌama mwanzˈoni. kˈiʃa nˌikaˈamka kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡizˈini.|0
pˈia katˌika ndˈoto zˈaŋɡu nˌiliˈona masˈuke sˈaba ja nafˈaka, jˌameɟˈaa na mazˈuri, jˌanakˈua katˌika bˈua mˈoɟa.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo masˈuke meŋɡˈine sˈaba jˌakatʃipˈua, jˌalijˌoɲaˈuka, membˈamba na jˌamekaˈuʃwa na upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
jˈale masˈuke membˈamba ja nafˈaka jˌakajamˈeza jˈale masˈuke sˈaba mazˈuri jˌalijoɟˈaa nafˈaka. nˌimewˌaelˈeza wˌaaɡˈuzi, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijewˈeza kˌunifˌasirˈia.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia farˈao, ndˈoto za farˈao ni ndˈoto ˈijo hˈijo mˈoɟa. mˈuŋɡu ˌamemfˌunulˈia farˈao ɟˈambo ˌanalˌokusudˈia kufˈaɲa kˌaribˈuni.|0
ŋɡˈombe sˈaba wazˈuri ni miˈaka sˈaba, nˈajo masˈuke sˈaba mazˈuri jˌalijoɟˈaa nafˈaka ni miˈaka sˈaba, ni ndˈoto ˈijo hˈijo mˈoɟa.|0
ŋɡˈombe sˈaba wˌaliokˈonda na wabˈaja wˈale wˌaliˌoɟitokˈeza bˌaadˈaje ni miˈaka sˈaba, vˈivjo hˈivjo masˈuke sˈaba ja ŋɡˈano jˌalijˌoðoofˈika na kˌukaˈuʃwa na upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki, ni miˈaka sˈaba ja ɲɟˈaa.|0
ni kˌama vˈile nˌilivjˌomwambˈia farˈao: mˈuŋɡu ˌamemwoɲˈeʃa farˈao ɟˈambo ˌanalˌokusudˈia kufˈaɲa kˌaribˈuni.|0
miˈaka sˈaba ja neˈema ˌinakˈuɟa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
lakˈini ˌitafuˈata miˈaka sˈaba ja ɲɟˈaa. ndˈipo neˈema jˈote ja mˈisri ˌitasˌahaulˈika na ɲɟˈaa ˌitaikˈumba ˈn̩tʃi.|0
neˈema ˌilijokˈuwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌaitˌakumbˈukwa, kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈaa ˌitakˌajofuˈata ˌitakˈuwa kˈali ˈm̩no.|0
sabˈabu ja ndˈoto kumɟˈia farˈao kwa nˈamna mbˈili ni kwˌamba ɟˈambo hˌilo mˈuŋɡu ˌameʃˌaamˈua kwa hakˈika, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌatalifˈaɲa kˌaribˈuni.|0
bˌasi sˈasa farˈao na ˌatafˈute ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe akˈili na hekˈima ˌili amwˈeke kˌuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
wˌakusˈaɲe tʃakˈula tʃˈote katˌika miˈaka hˌii sˈaba ja neˈema ˌinajokˈuɟa na kˌuhifˈaði nafˈaka tʃˈini ja mamlˈaka ja farˈao, ˈiwe akˈiba ja tʃakˈula katˌika mˈiɟi.|0
tʃakˈula hˈiki kˌitakˈuwa akˈiba ja tˌahaðˈari kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili kˌitumˈike katˌika ˈile miˈaka sˈaba ja ɲɟˈaa ˌitakˌajokˈuɟa mˈisri, ˌili ˈn̩tʃi ˌisihˌaribˈiwe na ɲɟˈaa.|0
mpˈaŋɡo hˈuu ˌuliˌonekˈana mzˈuri kwa farˈao na kwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote.|0
hˈivjo farˈao ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe tˌunawˈeza kumpˈata jejˈote kˌama ˈm̩tu hˈuju, ambˈaje rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu jˈumo ndˈani jˈake.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, mˌaadˈamu mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˌufunulˈia jˈote hˈaja, hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote mwˌeɲe akˈili na hekˈima kˌama wˈewe.|0
wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba lˈaŋɡu la kifˈalme, na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˈote wˌatatˈii ˈamri zˈako. ni kuhˈusu kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tu nˌitakˈuwa m̩kˈuu kulˈiko wˈewe.|0
kwa hˈijo farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, sˈasa nˌakuwˈeka ˈuwe msˌimamˈizi wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakaivˈua pˈete jˌake ja muhˈuri kutˈoka kˌidolˈeni mwˈake na kˌuivalˈiʃa katˌika kidˈole tʃa josˈefu. ˌakamvˈika maɟˈoho mazˈuri ja kitˈani sˈafi na mkˈufu wa ðahˈabu ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌakampandˈiʃa katˌika ɡˈari lˈake la farˈasi kˌama msˌaidˈizi wˈake, wˈatu wˌakatˌaŋɡulˈia wˌakiʃˌaŋɡilˈia, wˌakisˈema, fˌuŋɡuˈeni ɲɟˈia! ndˈivjo farˈao ˌalivjomwˈeka josˈefu kˌuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, mˌimi ni farˈao, lakˈini pasˈipo nˈeno lˈako, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ruhˈusa kˌuinˈua mkˈono ˌau m̩ɡˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
farˈao ˌakamwˈita josˈefu safˈenaθ panˈea, pˈia akˈampa ˌasenˈaθi bˈinti pˌotifˈera, kuhˈani wa ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈoni, kˌuwa ˈm̩ke wˈake. ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakaˌitembelˈea ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wa farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri. nˌaje josˈefu ˌakatˈoka mbˈele ja farˈao ˌakasafˈiri katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
katˌika ˈile miˈaka sˈaba ja neˈema ˈn̩tʃi ˌilizˈaa mazˈao kwa wˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
josˈefu ˌakakusˈaɲa tʃakˈula tʃˈote kˌilitʃˌozalˈiʃwa katˌika ˈile miˈaka sˈaba ja neˈema n̩tʃˈini mˈisri, ˌakakˌihifˈaði katˌika ɣˈala za mˈiɟi. katˌika kˈila ˈm̩ɟi kˌulihˌifaðˈiwa tʃakˈula kˌilitʃˌozalˈiʃwa katˌika maʃˈamba jˌalijˌouzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo.|0
josˈefu ˌalihifˈaði nafˈaka ɲˈiŋɡi, mfˈano wa mtʃˈaŋɡa wa bahˈari, ˌilikˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no kiˈasi kwˌamba wˌaliʃˈindwa kuwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu kwa sabˈabu akˈiba ˌilizˈidi sˈana kupˈita kipˈimo.|0
kˈabla ja miˈaka ja ɲɟˈaa kuˈanza, ˌasenˈaθi bˈinti pˌotifˈera, kuhˈani wa ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈoni, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemzalˈia josˈefu wˈana wawˈili wa kiˈume.|0
josˈefu ˌakamwˈita mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza manˈase, ˌakisˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌamenifˈaɲa nˌisahˈau taˈabu zˈaŋɡu zˈote pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
mwˈana wa pˈili ˌakamwˈita ˌefraˈimu, ˌakisˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌistawˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja matˈeso jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈile miˈaka sˈaba ja neˈema hˌuko mˈisri ˌikaˈiʃa.|0
nˈajo miˈaka ˈile sˈaba ja ɲɟˈaa ˌikaˈanza, sˌawasˈawa na ˌalivjosˈema josˈefu. kˌulikˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote, bˌali katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri kˌulikˈuwa na tʃakˈula.|0
wakˈati ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri ˌilipopˈatwa na ɲɟˈaa, wˈatu wˌakamlilˈia farˈao ˌili awˈape tʃakˈula. ndˈipo farˈao ˌalipˌowaaɡˈiza wamˈisri wˈote, ˌakisˈema, nendˈeni kwa josˈefu, nˌaɲi mfˈaɲe ˌanatʃˌowaambˈia.|0
wakˈati ɲɟˈaa ˌilipokˈuwa ˌimeenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, josˈefu ˌakafuŋɡˈua ɣˈala za vjakˈula na kˌuwauzˈia wamˈisri nafˈaka, kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali ˈm̩no katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
pˈia ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote zˌilikˈuɟa mˈisri kˌununˈua nafˈaka kutˈoka kwa josˈefu, kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali ˈm̩no dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
wakˈati jakˈobo ˌalipˌofahˈamu kˌuwa kˈuna nafˈaka hˌuko mˈisri, ˌakawˌaambˈia wanˈawe, mbˈona mnakˈaa tu hˈapa mnˌatazamˈana.|0
ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwaambˈia, nˌimesikˈia kˌuwa hˌuko mˈisri kˈuna nafˈaka. tˌelemkˈeni hˌuko mkˌanunˈue tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili jˈetu, ˌili tuwˈeze kuˈiʃi wˈala tusˈife.|0
ndˈipo wˈale ndˈuɡu kˈumi wa josˈefu, wˌakaterˈemka hˌuko mˈisri kˌununˈua nafˈaka.|0
lakˈini jakˈobo hˌakumtˈuma bˌeɲamˈini, ndˈuɡu jˌake josˈefu, pamˈoɟa na weŋɡˈine, kwa sabˈabu ˌalioɡˈopa asˈiɟe ˌakapˈatwa na maðˈara.|0
hˈivjo wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliokwˈenda mˈisri kˌununˈua nafˈaka, kwˈani ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani pˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuo josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa mtawˈala wa ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije ˌaliwˌauzˈia wˈatu wˈote nafˈaka. kwa hˈijo wakˈati ndˈuɡu zˌake josˈefu wˌalipofˈika, wˌakamsˌuɟudˈia hˌadi ɲˈuso zˈao zˌikaɡˈusa ˈarði.|0
mˈara josˈefu ˌalipˌowaˈona ndˈuɡu zˈake, ˌakawˌatambˈua, lakˈini ˌakaɟifˈaɲa mɡˈeni na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌao kwa ukˈali, ˌakiwˌaulˈiza, nˈiɲi mnatˈoka wˈapi? wˌakamɟˈibu, tˌumetˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani kˈuɟa kˌununˈua tʃakˈula.|0
iŋɡˈawa josˈefu ˌaliwˌatambˈua ndˈuɡu zˈake, wˌao hˌawakˌumtambˈua.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌalipˌokumbˈuka ndˈoto zˌake kˌuwahˈusu wˈao, ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi ni wˌapelelˈezi! mmekˈuɟa kˌuaŋɡalˈia mahˈali ambˈapo ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu haˈina ulˈinzi.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, sˈivjo bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌamekˈuɟa kˌununˈua tʃakˈula.|0
sˌisi sˈote ni wˈana wa bˈaba mmˈoɟa. wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako ni wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu, wˈala sˈio wˌapelelˈezi.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, la hˈaʃa! mmekˈuɟa kˌuaŋɡalˈia mahˈali ambˈapo ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu haˈina ulˈinzi.|0
lakˈini wˌakamɟˈibu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌalikˈuwa kˈumi na wawˈili, wˈana wa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌanaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani. sˈasa mdˈoɡo wˈetu wa mwˈiʃo jˈupo na bˈaba jˈetu na mwiŋɡˈine ˌalikˈufa.|0
josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, ni sˈawa kabˈisa kˌama nˌilivjˌowaambˈia: nˈiɲi ni wˌapelelˈezi.|0
na hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjˌoɟaribˈiwa: hakˈika kˌama farˈao ˌaiʃˈivjo, hˌamtaondˈoka mahˈali hˈapa mpˈaka ndˈuɡu jˈenu mdˈoɡo ˈaɟe hˈapa.|0
tumˈeni mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌakamlˈete hˈujo ndˈuɡu jˈenu, weŋɡˈine mtawˈekwa ɡˌerezˈani, ˌili manˈeno jˈenu jˌaɟaribˈiwe kuˈona kˌama mnasˈema kwˈeli. la sˈivjo, hakˈika kˌama farˈao ˌaiʃˈivjo nˈiɲi ni wˌapelelˈezi.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˈote tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi kwa sˈiku tˈatu.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, faɲˈeni hˈili nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi, kwa maˈana nˌamwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ikˈiwa nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu, mmˈoɟa wa ndˈuɡu zˈenu na abˈaki kˌifuŋɡˈoni, nˌaɲi weŋɡˈine pˌelekˈeni nafˈaka kwa ɟamˈaa jˈenu wˌanaˌotesˈeka kwa ɲɟˈaa.|0
lakˈini ni lazˈima mnˌiletˈee ndˈuɡu jˈenu mdˈoɡo hˈapa, ˌili manˈeno jˈenu jˌaθibitˈike na kwˌamba msˈife. wˌakakubˈali kufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
wˌakaˌambiˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, hakˈika tˌunaˌaðibˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja ndˈuɡu jˈetu. tˌuliˈona ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌohuzunˈika ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanatusˈihi kupˈoɲa maˈiʃa jˈake, lakˈini hˌatukˌumsikilˈiza, hˈijo n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ðˈiki hˌii ˌimetupˈata.|0
rˌeubˈeni ˌakawaɟˈibu, sˌikuwˌaambiˈeni msitˈende ðˈambi ðˈidi ja kiɟˈana? lakˈini hˌamkunˌisikilˈiza! sˈasa ni lazˈima tˌuaðibˈiwe kwa aɟˈili ja dˈamu jˈake.|0
hˌawakuɟˈua kˌuwa josˈefu ˌaŋɡewˌaelˈewa, kwa sabˈabu ˌalitumˈia mkˌalimˈani.|0
josˈefu ˌakaɟitˈeŋɡa nˌao ˌakaˈanza kulˈia, kˈiʃa ˌakawˌarudˈia na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌao tˈena. ˌakatˈaka sˌimeˈoni ˌakamˈatwe na kufˈuŋɡwa mbˈele jˈao.|0
josˈefu ˌakatˈoa ˈamri ja kuɟˈaza mˌaɡunˈia jˈao nafˈaka na kuwˈeka fˈeða ja kˈila mmˈoɟa ndˈani ja ɡunˈia lˈake, kˈiʃa wapˈewe mˌahitˈaɟi ja ɲɟiˈani. baˌada ja kˌufaɲˈiwa hˈajo jˈote.|0
wˌakapakˈiza nafˈaka ɟˌuːja pˈunda zˈao, wˌakaondˈoka.|0
wˌalipofˈika mahˈali pa kulˈala hˌuko ɲɟiˈani mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakafuŋɡˈua ɡunˈia lˈake ˌili amlˈiʃe pˈunda wˈake, ˌakakˈuta fˈeða jˌake kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa ɡunˈia lˈake.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, fˈeða jˈaŋɡu ˌimerudˈiʃwa. ˈiko ndˈani ja ɡunˈia lˈaŋɡu. miˈojo jˈao ˌikazimˈia, na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakamɡˌeukˈia mwenzˈake wˌakitˌetemˈeka, wˌakaˌulizˈana, ni nˈini hˈiki mˈuŋɡu ˌalitʃˌotufaɲˈia.|0
wˌalipofˈika kwa jakˈobo bˈaba jˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wˌakamwelˈeza mˈambo jˈote jˌalijˌowapˈata. wˌakasˈema.|0
hˈujo ˈm̩tu ambˈaje n̩dˈije bwˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˌalisˈema nˌasi kwa ukˈali, ˌakatˌutendˈea kˈana kwˌamba sˌisi tˌulikˈuwa tˌunaˌipelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
lakˈini tˌulimwambˈia, sˌisi ni wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu, sˈio wˌapelelˈezi.|0
tˌulizalˈiwa ndˈuɡu kˈumi na wawˈili, wˈana wa bˈaba mmˈoɟa. mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈufa, na mdˈoɡo wˈetu wa mwˈiʃo jˈupo na bˈaba jˈetu hˌuko kˌanaˈani..|0
ndˈipo hˈujo ˈm̩tu alˈije bwˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˌalipˌotuambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo nˌitafahˈamu kˌuwa nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu: mwatʃˈeni mmˈoɟa wa ndˈuɡu zˈenu pamˈoɟa nˌami hˈapa, kˈiʃa nendˈeni mpelˈeke tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja ɟamˈaa jˈenu ˌinajˌotesˈeka kwa ɲɟˈaa.|0
lakˈini mletˈeni hˈujo ndˈuɡu jˈenu mdˈoɡo kwˈaŋɡu, ndˈipo nˌitaɟˈua kˌuwa nˈiɲi sˈio wˌapelelˈezi, ˈila ni wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu. kˈiʃa nˌitamrudˈiʃa ndˈuɡu jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtawˈeza kufˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii..|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanamimˈina nafˈaka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌaɡunˈia jˈao, ndˈani ja ɡunˈia la kˈila ˈm̩tu kˌulikˈuwa na mfˈuko wa fˈeða! wakˈati wˌao na bˈaba jˈao wˌalipoˈona mifˈuko ja fˈeða, wˌakaoɡˈopa.|0
jakˈobo bˈaba jˈao ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi mmˌenipokˈoɲa watˈoto wˈaŋɡu. josˈefu hajˈupo na sˌimeˈoni hajˈupo tˈena na sˈasa mnatˈaka kˌumtʃukˈua bˌeɲamˈini. kˈila kˈitu ni kiɲˈume nˈami.|0
ndˈipo rˌeubˈeni ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, wawˈeza kˌuwaˈua wanˈaŋɡu wˈote wawˈili, ikˈiwa sˌitamrudˈiʃa bˌeɲamˈini kwˈako. mkabˈiði bˌeɲamˈini katˌika ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitamrudˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini jakˈobo ˌakasˈema, mwanˈaŋɡu hˌataʃˈuka hˌuko pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi; ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌamekˈufa nˌaje n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌalijebˈaki. ikˈiwa ˌatapˈatwa na maðˈara katˌika safˈari mnˌajoˌiendˈea, mtaʃˈuʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu tʃˌeɲe mvˈi kˌaburˈini kwa mˌasikitˈiko.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa bˈado ni kˈali ˈm̩no katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˈivjo wakˈati wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemalˈiza kˈula nafˈaka jˈote wˌalijˌoilˈeta kutˈoka mˈisri, jakˈobo bˈaba jˈao ˌakawˌaambˈia, rudˈini mˈisri mkˌatunˌunulˈie tʃakˈula kiŋɡˈine zaˈidi.|0
lakˈini jˈuda ˌakamwambˈia, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalituˈoɲa kwa msˌisitˈizo, hˌamtauˈona ˈuso wˈaŋɡu tˈena mpˈaka ˈm̩ɟe na ndˈuɡu jˈenu..|0
kˌama ˌutakubˈali ndˈuɡu jˈetu aˈende pamˈoɟa nˈasi, tˌutakwˈenda kˌuwanˌunulˈia tʃakˈula.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa hˌutamruhˈusu aˈende, hˌatutakwˈenda, kwa sabˈabu ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalitˌuambˈia, hˌamtauˈona ˈuso wˈaŋɡu tˈena mpˈaka ˈm̩ɟe pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu jˈenu..|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakaulˈiza, kwa nˈini mkˌaniletˈea taˈabu hˌii kwa kˌumwambˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu mlikˈuwa na ndˈuɡu mwiŋɡˈine.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalituhˈoɟi kwa undˈani sˈana habˈari zˈetu na za ɟamˈaa jˈetu. ˌalitˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, bˈaba jˈenu bˈado juŋɡˈali hˈai? ɟˈe m̩nˈaje ndˈuɡu mwiŋɡˈine? sˌisi tˌulimɟˈibu maswˈali jˌake tˈu. tˌuŋɡewezˈaɟe kuɟˈua kwˌamba ˌaŋɡesˈema, mletˈeni mdˈoɡo wˈenu hˈapa.|0
ndˈipo jˈuda ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˌake ˌisraˈeli, mtˈume kiɟˈana pamˈoɟa nˈami, nˌasi tˌutaondˈoka mˈara, ˌili sˌisi na wˌewe pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈetu tuwˈeze kuˈiʃi, wˈala tusˈife.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakˌuhakˌikiʃˈia ˌusalˈama wˈake, mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitawˌaɟibˈika kˌumrudˈiʃa. ikˈiwa sˌitamrudˈiʃa kwˈako na kumwˈeka mbˈele jˈako, nˌitakˈuwa mwˌeɲe lawˈama mbˈele jˈako maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈote.|0
hakˈika, kˌama hˌatukˌutʃelˈewa kˌuondˈoka, tˌuŋɡekˈuwa tˌumekwˈenda na kurˈudi mˈara mbˈili.|0
bˌasi bˈaba jˈao ˌisraˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia, kˌama ni lazˈima ˈiwe hˈivjo, bˌasi faɲˈeni hˈivi: wekˈeni baˈaði ja mazˈao bˈora ja ˈn̩tʃi katˌika mifˈuko jˈenu na mpˌelekeˈeni jˈule ˈm̩tu kˌama zawˈadi, zˈeri kidˈoɡo, asˈali kidˈoɡo, vˌikolˈezo, mˌanemˈane, kˈuŋɡu na lˈozi.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni fˈeða mˈara mbˈili, kwa kˌuwa mtˌazirudˈiʃa zˈile fˈeða zˌilizowˈekwa mˌidomˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌaɡunˈia jˈenu. lˈabda zˌiliwˈekwa kwa makˈosa.|0
mtʃˌukuˈeni ndˈuɡu jˈenu pˈia mrˈudi kwa hˈujo ˈm̩tu mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
nˌaje mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi ˌawaɟˌaliˈeni rehˈema mbˈele ja hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌili apˈate kˌumwatʃˈia jˈule ndˈuɡu jˈenu na bˌeɲamˈini mwˈeze kurˈudi pamˈoɟa. kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi kˌama nˌikufˈiwa nˌimefˈiwa.|0
bˌasi hˈao wˈatu wˌakazˌitʃukˈua zˈile zawˈadi na zˈile fˈeða mˈara mbˈili pamˈoɟa na bˌeɲamˈini. wˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kwˈenda mˈisri na wˌalipofˈika wˌakaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kwa josˈefu.|0
josˈefu ˌalipomwˈona bˌeɲamˈini pamˈoɟa nˈao, ˌakamwambˈia msˌimamˈizi wa ɲˈumba jˈake, wˌatʃukˈue wˈatu hˈawa ɲumbˈani kwˈaŋɡu, mtʃˈiɲɟe mɲˈama na kˌuandalˈia tʃakˈula kwa kˌuwa wˌatakˈula tʃakˈula tʃa mtʃˈana pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
jˈule msˌimamˈizi ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama josˈefu ˌalivjˌomwambˈia na ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈale wˈatu ɲumbˈani kwa josˈefu.|0
bˌasi wˈatu hˈao wˌakaoɡˈopa wˌalipˌopelˈekwa ɲumbˈani kwa josˈefu. wˌakafikˈiri, tˌumelˈetwa hˈapa kwa aɟˈili ja zˈile fˈeða zˌilizˌorudˈiʃwa katˌika mˌaɡunˈia jˈetu mˈara ˈile ja kwˈanza. ˌanatˈaka kˌutuʃˌambulˈia na kˌutuʃˈinda, ˌatutʃukˈue sˌisi kˌama watˈumwa, na atwˈae hˈawa pˈunda zˈetu.|0
hˈivjo wˌakamwendˈea msˌimamˈizi wa ɲˈumba wa josˈefu na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɲumbˈani.|0
wˌakasˈema, tˌafaðˈali bwˈana, tˌulikˈuɟa hˈapa mˈara ja kwˈanza kˌununˈua tʃakˈula.|0
lakˈini mahˈali pˈale tˌulipotˈua wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni tˌulifuŋɡˈua mˌaɡunˈia jˈetu, na kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌakakˈuta fˈeða zˈake, kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa ɡunˈia lˈake kiˈasi kˈile kˈile tˌulitʃolˈeta. kwa hˈijo tˌumezˌirudˈiʃa.|0
pˈia tˌumelˈeta fˈeða ɲiŋɡˈine kwa aɟˈili ja kˌununulˈia tʃakˈula. hˌatuɟˈui ni nˈani ˌaliziwˈeka fˈeða hˈizo katˌika mˌaɡunˈia jˈetu.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, vˈema, msˌioɡˈope. mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈenu, ˌamewˈapa nˈiɲi hazˈina katˌika mˌaɡunˈia jˈenu; mˌimi nˌilipokˈea fˈeða jˈenu. ndˈipo ˌakawˌaletˈea sˌimeˈoni.|0
msˌimamˈizi ˌakawˌapelˈeka wˈale wˈatu katˌika ɲˈumba ja josˈefu, ˌakawˈapa mˈaɟi ja kunˈawa miɡˈuu na kuwˈapa pˈunda wˌao maɟˈani.|0
wˌakaandˈaa zawˈadi zˈao ˌili wˈampe josˈefu wakˈati ˌatakˌapofˈika ˌaðuhˈuri, kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesikˈia kwˌamba wˌatakˈula tʃakˈula hˌuko.|0
josˈefu ˌalipokˈuɟa ɲumbˈani, wˌalimkabˈiði zˈile zawˈadi wˌalizokˈuwa nˈazo, ambˈazo wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezilˈeta ˈm̩le ɲumbˈani, nˌao wˌakamsˌuɟudˈia hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌakawˌaulˈiza kuhˈusu hˈali jˈao, kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia, jˈule bˈaba jˈenu m̩zˈee mlˌijenˌiambˈia habˈari zˈake, ju hˈali ɡˈani? ɟˈe, bˈado ju hˈai.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, mtumˈiʃi wˈako bˈaba jˈetu bˈado ˌanaˈiʃi na ni mzˈima. kˈiʃa wˌakainˈama tʃˈini kˈumpa heʃˈima.|0
ˌalipˌotazˈama na kumwˈona bˌeɲamˈini ndˈuɡu jˈake, mwˈana wa mˈama jˌake hˈasa, ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˈuju n̩dˈije ndˈuɡu jˈenu wa mwˈiʃo, ambˈaje mlˌinielˈeza habˈari zˈake? ndˈipo ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu na ˌakufaðˈili, mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
akˈiwa ˌameɡˈuswa sˈana kwa kumwˈona ndˈuɡu jˈake, josˈefu ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa harˈaka na kˌutafˈuta mahˈali pa kˌulilˈia. ˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃˈake tʃa pekˈee na kˌulilˈia hˈumo.|0
baˌada ja kunˈawa ˈuso wˈake, ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe na hˈuku ˌakiɟˌizuˈia ˌakasˈema, pˌakuˈeni tʃakˈula.|0
wˌakampˌakulˈia josˈefu pˈeke jˈake, ndˈuɡu zˌake pˈeke jˈao na wamˈisri wˌaliokˈula pamˈoɟa nˌaje pˈeke jˈao, kwa sabˈabu wamˈisri wˌasiŋɡewˈeza kˈula pamˈoɟa na wˌaebranˈia, kwa maˈana ˌilikˈuwa ni tʃukˈizo kwa wamˈisri.|0
wˈatu hˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈeti mbˈele jˌake kwa mfˌuatˈano wa ˈumri wˈao, kˌuanzˈia mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza hˌadi mzalˈiwa wa mwˈiʃo, wˌakatˌazamˈana wˌao kwa wˌao kwa mʃaŋɡˈao.|0
wakˈati wˌalipˌelekˈewa sehˈemu ja tʃakˈula kutˈoka mezˈani ˌm̩wa josˈefu, sehˈemu ja bˌeɲamˈini ˌilikˈuwa mˈara tˈano zaˈidi ja sehˈemu ja wˈale weŋɡˈine. kwa hˈijo wakˈaɲua na kˌufurˈahi pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
kˈiʃa josˈefu akˈampa jˈule msˌimamˈizi wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja: ɟˈaza mˌaɡunˈia ja wˈatu hˈawa kiˈasi tʃa tʃakˈula ambˈatʃo wˌanawˈeza kˌutʃukˈua, na uwˈeke fˈeða ja kˈila ˈm̩tu kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa ɡunˈia lˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˈeka kikˈombe tʃˈaŋɡu kˈile tʃa fˈeða kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa ɡunˈia la jˈule mdˈoɡo wa wˈote pamˈoɟa na fˈeða zˌake ambˈazo ˌaŋɡenˌunulˈia nafˈaka jˈake. nˌaje ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama josˈefu ˌalivjosˈema.|0
kˌulipˌopambazˈuka, hˈao wˈatu wˌakarˌuhusˈiwa kˌuondˈoka pamˈoɟa na pˈunda zˈao.|0
kˈabla hˌawaɟafˈika mbˈali kutˈoka mɟˈini, josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, wˌafuˌatilˈie wˈale wˈatu mˈara mˈoɟa, ˌutakˌapowakˈuta, wˌaambˈie, kwa nˈini mmˌelipˈiza wˈema kwa ubˈaja.|0
ɟˈe, kikˈombe hˈiki sˈitʃo ˌanatʃˌoɲuˈea bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na pˈia hˌukitumˈia kwa kˌutabˈiri mˈambo jaɟˈajo? hˈili ni ɟˈambo ˈovu mlˌilolitˈenda..|0
ˌalipˌowafikˈia, ˌakarudˈia manˈeno hˈaja kwˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi, kwa nˈini bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌanasˈema manˈeno kˌama hˈaja? lˈiwe mbˈali na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wasˈiɟe wˌakafˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˈilo.|0
hˌata hˈivjo tˌulikˌurudiʃˈia zˈile fˈeða kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani ambˈazo tˌulizikˈuta kwˈeɲe midˈomo ja mˌaɡunˈia jˈetu. hˈivjo kwa nˈini tuˈibe fˈeða ˌau ðahˈabu kutˈoka ɲumbˈani kwa bwˈana wˈako.|0
ikˈiwa jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatapˌatikˈana nˈatʃo, ˌauˈawe, na sˌisi weŋɡˈine tˌutakˈuwa watˈumwa wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, vˈema sˈana; na ˈiwe kˌama msemˈavjo. jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈutwa nˈatʃo ˌatakˈuwa mtˈumwa wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini nˈiɲi weŋɡˈine mtakˈuwa hˈamna lawˈama.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kuʃˈuʃa ɡunˈia lˈake tʃˈini na kˌulifuŋɡˈua.|0
ndˈipo msˌimamˈizi ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌutafˈuta, ˌakianzˈia kwa mkˈubwa wa wˈote na ˌakaiʃˈia kwa mdˈoɡo wa wˈote. bˌasi kikˈombe kˌikapˌatikˈana katˌika ɡunˈia la bˌeɲamˈini.|0
kwa ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao. ndˈipo wˈote wˌakapakˈiza mizˈiɡo jˈao ɟˌuːja pˈunda zˈao na kurˈudi mɟˈini.|0
josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa bˈado jˈuko ɲumbˈani mwˈake wakˈati jˈuda na kˈaka zˌake wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia, wˈote wˌakaɟitˈupa tʃˈini mbˈele jˈake.|0
josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, ni ɟˈambo ɡˈani hˈili mlˌilolifˈaɲa? hamɟˈui kˌuwa ˈm̩tu kˌama mˌimi ˌanawˈeza kˌufahˈamu mˈambo kwa ɲɟˈia ja kˌutabˈiri.|0
jˈuda ˌakaɟˈibu, tˌutawˈeza kusˈema nˈini kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu? tˌutawˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈini? tˌutawezˈaɟe kˌuθibitˈiʃa kwˌamba hatˈuna hatˈia? mˈuŋɡu ˌamefunˈua hatˈia ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako. sˈasa sˌisi tu watˈumwa wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, sˌisi weɲˈewe pamˈoɟa na jˈule ˌalijˌepatikˈana na kikˈombe.|0
lakˈini josˈefu ˌalisˈema, lˈiwe mbˈali nˌami kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili! ˈm̩tu jˈule tu ˌalijekˈutwa na kikˈombe n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajekˈuwa mtˈumwa wˈaŋɡu. nˈiɲi weŋɡˈine, rudˈini kwa bˈaba jˈenu kwa amˈani.|0
ndˈipo jˈuda ˌakamwendˈea na kˌumwambˈia: tˌafaðˈali bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mruhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako asˈeme nˈeno kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. ˌusimkˌasirikˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako, iŋɡˈawa wˌewe ni sˈawa na farˈao mweɲˈewe.|0
bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌaliwˌaulˈiza wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, m̩nˈaje bˈaba ˌau ndˈuɡu?.|0
nˌasi tˌukakuɟˈibu, tunˈaje bˈaba jˈetu ambˈaje ni m̩zˈee; pˈia jˈupo mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo ˌalijˌezalˈiwa katˌika uzˈee wˈake. ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌamekˈufa, na hˈuju mdˈoɡo n̩dˈije mwˈana pekˈee kwa mˈama jˌake ˌalijebˈaki, nˌaje bˈaba jˌake ˌanampˈenda..|0
ndˈipo ˌulipˌowaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, mletˈeni kwˈaŋɡu ˌili niwˈeze kumwˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe..|0
nˌasi tˌukamwambˈia bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kiɟˈana hawˈezi kumwˈatʃa bˈaba jˈake; ˌakimwˈatʃa, bˈaba jˌake ˌatakˈufa..|0
lakˈini ˌukawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, ndˈuɡu jˈenu mdˈoɡo ˌasipoʃˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, hˌamtauˈona ˈuso wˈaŋɡu tˈena..|0
tˌuliporˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa mtˈumwa wˈako bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, tˌulimwambˈia lˈile bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
ndˈipo bˈaba jˈetu ˌaliposˈema, rudˈini mˈisri mkˌanunˈue tʃakˈula kiŋɡˈine..|0
lakˈini tˌukamwambˈia, hˌatuwˈezi kuʃˈuka mˈisri mpˈaka ndˈuɡu jˈetu mdˈoɡo ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˌasi ndˈipo tˌutakˌapokwˈenda. hˌatutawˈeza kˌuuˈona ˈuso wa jˈule ˈm̩tu mpˈaka ndˈuɡu jˈetu mdˈoɡo ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈasi..|0
mtˈumwa wˈako bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalitˌuambˈia, mnaɟˈua ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu ˌalinˌizalˈia wˈana wawˈili.|0
mmˌoɟawˈapo ˌalipotˈea, nˌami nˌikasˈema, hakˈika ˌamerˌarulˈiwa vipˈande vipˈande. nˌami sˌiɟamwˈona ʃˈu wakˈati hˈuo.|0
ikˈiwa mtˌaniˌondolˈea hˈuju tˈena na ˌakapˈatwa na maðˈara, mtaʃˈuʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu tʃˌeɲe mvˈi kˌaburˈini nikˈiwa mwˌeɲe huzˈuni..|0
hˈivjo sˈasa, kˌama kiɟˈana hˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌasi nˌitakˌaporˈudi kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, na kˌama bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje maˈiʃa jˌake jˌamefˌuŋɡamanˈiʃwa na uhˈai wa kiɟˈana hˈuju.|0
ˌakiˈona kiɟˈana hajˈupo nˈasi, ˌatakˈufa. wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌataʃˈuʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˌeɲe mvˈi tʃa bˈaba jˈetu kˌaburˈini kwa huzˈuni.|0
mtˈumwa wˈako ˌalimhˌakikiʃˈia bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌusalˈama wa kiɟˈana. nˌikamwambˈia, kˌama sˌikumrudˈiʃa kwˈako nˌitakˈuwa mwˌeɲe lawˈama mbˈele jˈako, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈote!.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, tˌafaðˈali mruhˈusu mtumˈiʃi abˈaki hˈapa kˌama mtˈumwa wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu badˈala ja kiɟˈana, nˌaje kiɟˈana ˌumruhˈusu arˈudi na ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
nˌinawezˈaɟe kurˈudi kwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kˌama kiɟˈana hˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami? la hˈaʃa! ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌikaˈone huzˈuni ˈile ˌitakˌajompˈata bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈapo josˈefu hˌakuwˈeza kˌuɟizuˈia zaˈidi mbˈele ja wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesimˈama karˈibu nˈaje, ˌakapˈaza saˈuti, ˌakasˈema, mwˌondoˈeni kˈila ˈm̩tu mbˈele jˈaŋɡu! kwa hˈijo hˌapakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu jejˈote pamˈoɟa na josˈefu ˌalipˌoɟitˌambulˈiʃa kwa ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
nˌaje ˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa kiˈasi kwˌamba wamˈisri wˌalimsikˈia, hˌata wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa farˈao wˌakapˈata hˈizo habˈari.|0
josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, mˌimi ni josˈefu! ɟˈe, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu aŋɡˈali hˈai bˈado? lakˈini ndˈuɡu zˌake hˌawakuwˈeza kumɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu wˌalipˈatwa na hˈofu kˈuu mbˈele jˈake.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, sˌoɡeˈeni karˈibu nˈami. wˌalipˌosoɡˈea, ˌakasˈema, mˌimi ni ndˈuɡu jˈenu josˈefu, jˈule ambˈaje mlˌimuˈuza mˈisri.|0
sˈasa, msˌihuzunˈike wˈala msˌiɟitʃukˈie weɲˈewe kwa kˌuniˈuza hˈuku, kwa sabˈabu ˌilikˈuwa ni ˌili kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa ja wˈatu n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌalinitˈuma nˌiwatˌaŋɡulˈie nˈiɲi.|0
kwa miˈaka miwˈili sˈasa ˌimekuwˈepo ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, pˈia kwa miˈaka mitˈano iɟˈajo hˌapatˌakuwˈepo kulˈima wˈala kuvˈuna.|0
kwa hˈijo bˈasi, si nˈiɲi mlˌionilˈeta hˈuku, bˌali ni mˈuŋɡu. ˌalinifˈaɲa kˌuwa bˈaba kwa farˈao, bwˈana wa wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake wˈote, na mtawˈala wa mˈisri jˈote.|0
sˈasa rudˈini harˈaka kwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mwˌambiˈeni, hˈili ndˈilo mwanˈao josˈefu ˌasemˈalo: mˈuŋɡu ˌamenifˈaɲa mˌimi kˌuwa bwˈana wa mˈisri jˈote. ʃˈuka ˈuɟe kwˈaŋɡu, wˈala ˌusikawˈie.|0
nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni na kˌuwa karˈibu nˈami, wˈewe, watˈoto wˈako na wˌaɟukˈuu wˈako, makˈundi jˈako ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe, pamˈoɟa na vjˈote ulˈivjo nˈavjo.|0
nˌitawatˈunza hˌuko, kwa sabˈabu bˈado ˈiko miˈaka miŋɡˈine mitˈano ˌinajokˈuɟa ja ɲɟˈaa. la sˈivjo, wˌewe na ɲˈumba jˈako na wˈote ulˈio nˌao mtakˈuwa fukˈara..|0
mnawˈeza kˌuɟionˈea weɲˈewe, hˌata ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu bˌeɲamˈini, kwˌamba hakˈika ni mˌimi nˌinajˌezuŋɡˈumza nˈaɲi.|0
mwˌambiˈeni bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja heʃˈima jˈote nˌilijopˈewa hˈuku mˈisri, na kuhˈusu kˈila kˈitu mlˌitʃokiˈona. mletˈeni bˈaba jˈaŋɡu hˈuku harˈaka.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamkˌumbatˈia bˌeɲamˈini ndˈuɡu jˌake na kulˈia, nˌaje bˌeɲamˈini ˌakamkˌumbatˈia ˌakilˈia.|0
pˈia ˌakawabˈusu ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote, hˈuku ˌakilˈia. baˌada ja hˈajo ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
habˈari zˌilipofˈika kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la farˈao kwˌamba ndˈuɡu zˌake josˈefu wˌamefˈika, farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote wˌakafurˈahi.|0
farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, wˌaambˈie ndˈuɡu zˈako, faɲˈeni hˈivi: pˌakiˈeni waɲˈama wˈenu mrˈudi mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
mkamlˈete bˈaba jˈenu na ɟamˈaa zˈenu kwˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˈapa sehˈemu nzˈuri sˈana ja ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri nˌaɲi mtˌafurahˈia unˈono wa ˈn̩tʃi..|0
mnˌaaɡˈizwa pˈia kˌuwaambˈia, faɲˈeni hˈivi: tʃˌukuˈeni maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa kutˈoka mˈisri, kwa aɟˈili ja watˈoto wˈenu na wˌake zˈenu, mkˌamtʃukˈue bˈaba jˈenu ˈm̩ɟe.|0
msiɟˈali kˈamwe kuhˈusu mˈali zˈenu, kwa sabˈabu mˈema jˈote ja mˈisri jˌatakˈuwa jˈenu..|0
hˈivjo wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. josˈefu ˌakawˈapa maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa, kˌama farˈao ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza, pˈia ˌakawˈapa mˌahitˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja safˈari jˈao.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa mavˈazi mˈapja, lakˈini bˌeɲamˈini akˈampa ʃekˈeli mˌiatˈatu za fˈeða, na ɟˈozi tˈano za ŋɡˈuo.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vˈitu ˌalivjotˈuma kwa bˈaba jˈake: pˈunda kˈumi wˌaliˌotʃukˈua vˈitu vizˈuri vja mˈisri, pˈunda wˌake kˈumi wˌaliobˈeba nafˈaka, mikˈate na mˌahitˈaɟi meŋɡˈine ja safˈari.|0
ˌakaaɡˈana na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiondˈoka, ˌakawˌaambˈia, msˌiɡombˈane ɲɟiˈani.|0
bˌasi wˌakatˈoka mˈisri na kufˈika kwa bˈaba jˈao jakˈobo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
wˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈao, josˈefu aŋɡˈali hˈai! ukwˈeli ni kwˌamba jˌeje n̩dˈije mtawˈala wa mˈisri jˈote. jakˈobo ˌakapˈiɡwa na bˌumbuˈazi; hˌakuwˌasadˈiki.|0
lakˈini wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌumwelˈeza kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia, na ˌalipoˈona maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa josˈefu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamempˌelekˈea ja kˌumtʃukˈua aˈende mˈisri, rˈoho ja bˈaba jˈao jakˈobo ˌikahuˈiʃwa.|0
ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˌimesadˈiki! mwanˈaŋɡu josˈefu bˈado ju hˈai. nˌitakwˈenda nˌikamwˈone kˈabla siɟˈafa.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli ˌakaondˈoka na vjˈote vˌilivjokˈuwa mˈali jˈake, nˌaje ˌalipofˈika bˈeer ʃˈeba, ˌakamtolˈea ðabˈihu mˈuŋɡu wa isˈaki bˈaba jˈake.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakanˈena na ˌisraˈeli katˌika maˈono usˈiku na kusˈema, jakˈobo! jakˈobo! ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako, ˌusioɡˈope kuʃˈuka mˈisri, kwa maˈana hˌuko nˌitakufˈaɲa taˈifa kˈubwa.|0
nˌitaʃˈuka mˈisri pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌami hakˈika nˌitakˌurudˈiʃa tˈena kˌanaˈani. mikˈono ja josˈefu mweɲˈewe n̩dˈijo ˌitakˌajofˈuŋɡa mˈatʃo jˈako.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo ˌakaondˈoka bˈeer ʃˈeba nˌao wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakamtʃukˈua bˈaba jˈao jakˈobo na watˈoto wˌao na wˌake zˈao katˌika maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa jˈale farˈao ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamempˌelekˈea kˌumsafirˈiʃa.|0
wˌakatʃukˈua pˈia mifˈuɡo jˈao na mˈali wˌalizokˈuwa wˌamezipˈata kˌanaˈani, jakˈobo na uzˈao wˌake wˈote wˌakaʃˈuka mˈisri.|0
ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wanˈawe na bˈinti zˈake, wˌaɟukˈuu wˌake wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, jaˈani uzˈao wˌake wˈote mpˈaka mˈisri.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli jakˈobo na wazˈao wˈake, wˌaliokwˈenda mˈisri: rˌeubˈeni mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa jakˈobo.|0
wˈana wa rˌeubˈeni nˈi: hanˈoki, pˈalu, hesrˈoni na kˈarmi.|0
wˈana wa sˌimeˈoni nˈi: jˌemuˈeli, jamˈini, ohˈadi, jakˈini, sohˈari na ʃaˈuli mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mkˌanaˈani.|0
wˈana wa lˈawi nˈi: ɡerʃˈoni, kohˈaθi na merˈari.|0
wˈana wa jˈuda nˈi: ˈeri, onˈani, ʃˈela, perˈesi na zˈera lakˈini ˈeri na onˈani wˌalifarˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani. wˈana wa perˈesi nˈi: hesrˈoni na hamˈuli.|0
wˈana wa ˌisakˈari nˈi: tˈola, pˈuva, jaʃˈubu na ʃimrˈoni.|0
wˈana wa zˌabulˈoni nˈi: serˈedi, elˈoni na jˌaleˈeli.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana wa lˈea ˌaliˌomzalˈia jakˈobo hˌuko pˈadan arˈamu pamˈoɟa na bˈinti jˌake dˈina. ɟˈumla ja wanˈawe na bˈinti zˌake wˌalikˈuwa θˌelaθˈini na watˈatu.|0
wˈana wa ɡˈadi nˈi: sefˈoni, hˈaɡi, ʃˈuni, esbˈoni, ˈeri, arˈodi na arˈeli.|0
wˈana wa aʃˈeri nˈi: ˈimna, ˈiʃva, ˈiʃvi na berˈia. dˈada jˈao ˌalikˈuwa sˈera. wˈana wa berˈia nˈi: hebˈeri na mˌalkiˈeli.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio watˈoto zˈilpa ˌaliˌomzalˈia jakˈobo, ambˈao labˈani alˈimpa bˈinti jˌake lˈea; ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa kˈumi na sˈita.|0
wˈana wa rahˈeli ˈm̩ke wa jakˈobo nˈi: josˈefu na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
hˌuko mˈisri, ˌasenˈaθi bˈinti wa pˌotifˈera, ˌalijekˈuwa kuhˈani wa ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈoni, ˌalimzalˈia josˈefu wˈana wawˈili, manˈase na ˌefraˈimu.|0
wˈana wa bˌeɲamˈini nˈi: bˈela, bekˈeri, aʃbˈeli, ɡˈera, nˌaamˈani, ˈehi, rˈoʃi, mupˈimu, hupˈimu na ˈardi.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana wa rahˈeli ˌaliˌomzalˈia jakˈobo; ɟˈumla jˈao ni kˈumi na wˈanne.|0
mwˈana wa dˈani nˈi: huʃˈimu.|0
wˈana wa naftˈali nˈi: jˌaseˈeli, ɡˈuni, jesˈeri na ʃilˈemu.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa bˈilha ˌaliˌomzalˈia jakˈobo, ambˈaje labˈani ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa rahˈeli bˈinti jˈake; ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa sˈaba.|0
wˈote wˌaliokwˈenda mˈisri pamˈoɟa na jakˈobo, wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wˌake hˈasa pasˈipo kˌuhesˈabu wˈakwe zˈake, wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu sitˈini na sˈita.|0
pamˈoɟa na wˈana wawˈili wˌaliˌozalˈiwa na josˈefu hˌuko mˈisri, ɟˈumla jˈote ja ɟamˈaa ja jakˈobo, wˌaliokwˈenda mˈisri, wˌalikˈuwa sabˈini.|0
bˌasi jakˈobo ˌakamtˌaŋɡulˈiza jˈuda aˈende kwa josˈefu ˌili ˌamwelekˈeze ɲɟˈia ja ɡoʃˈeni. wˌalipofˈika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni.|0
ɡˈari kˈubwa zˈuri la josˈefu lˌiliˌandalˈiwa, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda ɡoʃˈeni kumlˈaki bˈaba jˌake ˌisraˈeli. mˈara josˈefu ˌalipofˈika mbˈele jˈake, ˌalimkˌumbatˈia bˈaba jˈake, ˌakalˈia kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, sˈasa nˈiko tajˈari kˈufa, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeɟˌionˈea mweɲˈewe kwˌamba bˈado ˈuko hˈai.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈake, nˌitapˈanda kwa farˈao na kˌumwambˈia, ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wˌamekˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈatu hˈao ni watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo, hutʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo, wˌamekˈuɟa na makˈundi ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu walˈitʃo nˈatʃo..|0
farˈao ˌatakˌapowaˈita na kˌuwaˌulizˈeni, kˈazi jˈenu ni nˈini?.|0
mɟibˈuni, watˈumwa wˈako wˌamekˈuwa watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈetu mpˈaka sˈasa, kˌama bˈaba zˈetu wˌalivjofˈaɲa. ndˈipo mtˌakapˌoruhusˈiwa kukˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni, kwa kˌuwa watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo wˈote ni tʃukˈizo kwa wamˈisri.|0
josˈefu ˌakaˈenda na kˌumwambˈia farˈao, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu wˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani wakˈiwa na makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe, pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu walˈitʃo nˈatʃo, nˌao sˈasa wˈapo hˌuko ɡoʃˈeni.|0
ˌakatʃaɡˈua ndˈuɡu zˌake watˈano na kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa kwa farˈao.|0
farˈao ˌakawˌaulˈiza hˈao ndˈuɡu zˈake, kˈazi jˈenu ni nˈini? wˌakamɟˈibu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako ni watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo, kˌama vˈile bˈaba zˈetu wˌalivjokˈuwa.|0
pˈia wˌakamwambˈia farˈao, tˌumekˈuɟa kukˈaa hˈuku kwa mˈuda mfˈupi, kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈaa ni kˈali hˌuko kˌanaˈani, na mifˈuɡo ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako haˈina malˈiʃo. kwa hˈijo sˈasa, tˌafaðˈali ˌuruhˈusu wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wakˈae hˌuko ɡoʃˈeni.|0
farˈao ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, bˈaba jˈako na ndˈuɡu zˈako wˌamekˈuɟa kwˈako.|0
nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri ˈipo mbˈele jˈako, ˌuwakalˈiʃe bˈaba jˈako na ndˈuɡu zˈako katˌika sehˈemu ilˈijo bˈora kupˈita zˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. na waˈiʃi ɡoʃˈeni. kˌama ˌunamfahˈamu jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao mwˌeɲe uwˈezo maˈalum, wawˈeke wˈawe wˌasimamˈizi wa mifˈuɡo jˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakamlˈeta jakˈobo bˈaba jˌake na kˌumtambulˈiʃa mbˈele ja farˈao. baˌada ja jakˈobo kˌumbarˈiki farˈao.|0
farˈao ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe ˈuna ˈumri ɡˈani.|0
nˌaje jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia farˈao, sˈiku za miˈaka ja kˌusafˈiri kwˈaŋɡu ni miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini. miˈaka jˈaŋɡu ˌimekˈuwa mitʃˈatʃe na ja taˈabu, wˈala hˌaikˌufikˈia miˈaka ja kˌusafˈiri ja bˈaba zˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa jakˈobo ˌakambarˈiki farˈao, nˌaje ˌakaondˈoka mbˈele ja ˈuso wˈake.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌakalˈiʃa bˈaba jˌake na ndˈuɡu zˌake katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na kuwˈapa mˈilki katˌika sehˈemu bˈora sˈana ja ˈn̩tʃi, wilˈaja ja rˌamesˈesi, kˌama farˈao ˌalivjˌoelekˈeza.|0
pˈia josˈefu akˈampa bˈaba jˈake, na ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈote wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˌake vjakˈula, kwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na hesˈabu ja watˈoto wˈao.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hˌapakuwˈepo tʃakˈula katˌika sehˈemu jˈote kwa kˌuwa ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali sˈana; mˈisri na kˌanaˈani zˈote zˌikahˌaribˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja ɲɟˈaa.|0
josˈefu ˌakakusˈaɲa fˈeða zˈote zˌilizˌopatikˈana kutˈoka maˈuzo ja nafˈaka hˌuko mˈisri na kˌanaˈani, ˌakazilˈeta kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la farˈao.|0
fˈeða za wˈatu wa mˈisri na kˌanaˈani zˌilipokwˈiʃa, wamˈisri wˈote wˌakamɟˈia josˈefu na kˌumwambˈia, tˌupatˈie tʃakˈula. kwa nˈini tˈufe mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako? fˈeða zˈetu zˌimekwˈiʃa.|0
josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, bˌasi letˈeni mifˈuɡo jˈenu, nˌitawˌauzˈia tʃakˈula kwa kˌubadilˈiʃa na mifˈuɡo jˈenu, kwa kˌuwa fˈeða zˈenu zˌimekwˈiʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakalˈeta mifˈuɡo jˈao kwa josˈefu, nˌaje ˌakawˈapa tʃakˈula kwa kˌubadˌiliʃˈana na farˈasi zˈao, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi zˈao, ŋɡˈombe na pˈunda zˈao. katˌika mwˈaka hˈuo wˈote josˈefu ˌakawˈapa tʃakˈula kwa kˌubadˌiliʃˈana na mifˈuɡo jˈao jˈote.|0
mwˈaka ˈule ˌulipokwˈiʃa, wˌakamɟˈia mwˈaka ˌuliˌofuˈata na kˌumwambˈia, hˌatuwˈezi kufˈitʃa ukwˈeli mbˈele za bwˈana wˈetu kwˌamba, kwa kˌuwa fˈeða zˈetu zˌimekwˈiʃa na waɲˈama wˈetu ni mˈali jˈako, sˈasa hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌosalˈia kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana wˈetu ˌisipokˈuwa miˈili jˈetu na ˈarði jˈetu.|0
kwa nˈini tˌuaŋɡamˈie mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako, sˌisi pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu? ˌutununˈue sˌisi pamˈoɟa na ˈarði jˈetu ˌili kˌubadˌiliʃˈana kwa tʃakˈula. nˌasi pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu tˌutakˈuwa watˈumwa wa farˈao. tˈupe sˌisi mbˈeɡu ˌili tuwˈeze kuˈiʃi wˈala tusˈife, ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu isˈiɟe ikˈawa ukˈiwa.|0
kwa hˈijo josˈefu ˌakamnˌunulˈia farˈao ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri. wamˈisri, mmˈoɟa baˌada ja mwiŋɡˈine, wˌaliˈuza maʃˈamba jˈao, kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali sˈana kwˈao. ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa mˈali ja farˈao.|0
nˌaje josˈefu ˌakawafˈaɲa wˈatu wˌatumˈike kˌama watˈumwa, kˌuanzˈia upˈande mmˈoɟa wa mˈisri hˌadi upˈande mwiŋɡˈine.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hˌakununˈua ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌakuhˈani, kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌanapˈata mɡˈawo wˌao wa kˌawaˈida kutˈoka kwa farˈao, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa na tʃakˈula tʃa kˌuwatˈoʃa kˌutokˈana na mɡˈawo wˌaliopˈewa na farˈao. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu hˌawakuˈuza ˈarði jˈao.|0
josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, kwa vˈile nˌimewˌanunˈua nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu lˈeo kˌuwa mˈali ja farˈao, hˈapa kˈuna mbˈeɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu ˌili mwˈeze kˌuziotˈeʃa.|0
lakˈini wakˈati mazˈao jˌatakˌapokˈuwa tajˈari, mpˈeni farˈao sehˈemu ja tˈano. sehˈemu hˈizo ˈn̩ne zˌitakˌazobˈaki mtˌaziwˈeka kˌama mbˈeɡu kwa aɟˈili ja maʃˈamba na kwa aɟˈili ja tʃakˈula tʃˈenu weɲˈewe na tʃa wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈenu na watˈoto wˈenu.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, ˌumeokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈetu. bˌasi na tupˈate kibˈali mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja bwˈana wˈetu; tˌutakˈuwa watˈumwa wa farˈao.|0
bˌasi josˈefu ˌakaiwˈeka ˈiwe ʃerˈia kuhˈusu ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ambˈajo ˌinatumˈika mpˈaka lˈeo, kwˌamba, sehˈemu ja tˈano ja mazˈao ni mˈali ja farˈao. ni ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌakuhˈani tu ambˈajo hˌaikˈuwa ja farˈao.|0
bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈiʃi mˈisri katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni. wˌakapˈata mˈali hˌuko wˌakastˈawi na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka kwa wˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
jakˈobo ˌakaˈiʃi mˈisri miˈaka kˈumi na sˈaba, nˈajo miˈaka ja maˈiʃa jˌake ˌilikˈuwa mˌiamˈoɟa ˌarobaˈininasˈaba.|0
wakˈati ˌulipˌokaribˈia wa ˌisraˈeli kˈufa, ˌakamwˈita mwanˈawe josˈefu na kˌumwambˈia, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈake, wˈeka mkˈono wˈako tʃˈini ja pˈaɟa lˈaŋɡu na ˌuniahˈidi kˌuwa ˌutanˌifaɲˈia faðˈili na ˌuaminˈifu. ˌusinizˈike mˈisri.|0
lakˈini nˌitakˌapopumzˈika na bˈaba zˈaŋɡu, ˌunitʃukˈue kutˈoka mˈisri, ˌukanizˈike wˌalipozˈikwa. josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitafˈaɲa kˌama ˌunavjosˈema.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda josˈefu ˌakaambˈiwa kwˌamba, bˈaba jˈako ni mɡˈoɲɟua. kwa hˈijo ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wanˈawe wawˈili manˈase na ˌefraˈimu, pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
jakˈobo ˌalipˌoambˈiwa, mwanˈao josˈefu ˌamekuɟˈia kˌukuˈona, ˌisraˈeli ˌakakusˈaɲa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, ˌakakˈeti kˌitandˈani.|0
jakˈobo ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi ˌalinˌitokˈea hˌuko lˈuzu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, hˌuko ˌakanˌibarˈiki.|0
nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˌitakufˈaɲa ustˈawi na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka hesˈabu jˈako, nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌuwa ɟamˈii ja mˌataˈifa, nˌami nˌitakˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌuimilˈiki milˈele wˌewe na wazˈao wˈako baˌada jˈako..|0
sˈasa bˈasi, wanˈao wawˈili wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwˈako hˈuku mˈisri kˈabla siɟˈaɟa hˈapa kwˈako wˌatahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa ni wˈaŋɡu; ˌefraˈimu na manˈase wˌatakˈuwa wˈaŋɡu, kˌama vˈile rˌeubˈeni na sˌimeˈoni walˈivjo wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini watˈoto ˌutakˌaowazˈaa baˌada jˈao wˌatakˈuwa wˈako. katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌatakˌajoirˈiθi, wˌatatˌambulˈiwa kwa ɟˈina la ndˈuɡu zˈao.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinarˈudi kutˈoka padˈani, katˌika huzˈuni jˈaŋɡu rahˈeli ˌalifarˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani tˌulipokˈuwa tuŋɡˈali tˌukisafˈiri, tukˈiwa karˈibu kufˈika efrˈaθi. kwa hˈijo nˌilimzˈika hˌuko, kˈando ja ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo efrˈaθi jaˈani bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
wakˈati ˌisraˈeli ˌalipˌowaˈona wˈana wa josˈefu, ˌakaulˈiza, hˈawa ni nˈani.|0
josˈefu ˌakamɟˈibu bˈaba jˈake, hˈawa ni wˈana ambˈao mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˈipa nikˈiwa hˈuku. ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli ˌakasˈema, walˈete kwˈaŋɡu ˌili nˌiwabarˈiki.|0
bˌasi mˈatʃo ja ˌisraˈeli jˌalikˈuwa hˌajaˈoni vizˈuri kwa sabˈabu ja uzˈee, nˌaje ˌaliˈona kwa ʃˈida. kwa hˈijo josˈefu ˌakawalˈeta wanˈawe karˈibu na bˈaba jˈake, ˌisraˈeli ˌakawabˈusu na ˌakawˌakumbatˈia.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, kˈamwe sˌikutˌazamˈia kˌuuˈona ˈuso wˈako tˈena, lakˈini sˈasa mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiruhˈusu kˌuwaˈona watˈoto wˈako pˈia.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaondˈoa wanˈawe mˌaɡotˈini ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli nˌaje ˌakasuɟˈudu hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
josˈefu ˌakatʃukˈua wˈale wˈana wawˈili, ˌefraˈimu kwˈeɲe mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˌakimwˌelekˈeza kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa kuʃˈoto wa ˌisraˈeli, na manˈase katˌika mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto ˌakimwˌelekˈeza kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa kuˈume wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakawalˈeta karˈibu na bˈabu jˈao.|0
lakˈini ˌisraˈeli ˌakaˌupelˈeka mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume, ˌakauwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌefraˈimu, iŋɡˈawa ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije mdˈoɡo, na mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto ˌakaˌukatˈiʃa, ˌakauwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa manˈase, iŋɡˈawa manˈase ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
ndˈipo ˌakambarˈiki josˈefu ˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje bˈaba zˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu na isˈaki wˌalimtˈii, mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje ˌamekˈuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈote mpˈaka lˈeo hˌii.|0
mˌalaˈika ambˈaje ˌalinˌiokˈoa kutˈoka maðˈara jˈote, jˌeje na ˌawabarˈiki viɟˈana hˈawa. na waˈitwe kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu na kwa maɟˈina ja bˈaba zˈaŋɡu ˌabrahˈamu na isˈaki, wˌao na wˌaoŋɡezˈeke kwa wˈiŋɡi katˌika dunˈia.|0
josˈefu ˌalipoˈona bˈaba jˌake ˌakiwˈeka mkˈono wa kuˈume ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌefraˈimu, hˌakupendˈezwa, kwa hˈijo ˌakaˌutʃukˈua mkˈono wa bˈaba jˌake kutˈoka kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌefraˈimu na kˌuuwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa manˈase.|0
josˈefu ˌakamwambˈia, hapˈana, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, hˈuju n̩dˈije mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza; uwˈeke mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
lakˈini bˈaba jˌake ˌakakatˈaa, ˌakasˈema, nˌinaɟˈua, mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌinaɟˈua. jˌeje pˈia ˌatakˈuwa taˈifa, nˌaje pˈia ˌatakˈuwa m̩kˈuu. hˌata hˈivjo, ndˈuɡu jˌake mdˈoɡo ˌatakˈuwa m̩kˈuu kulˈiko jˈeje, nˌao wazˈao wˌake wˌatakˈuwa kˈundi la mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌakawˌabarikˈia sˈiku ˈile na kusˈema, kwa ɟˈina lˈenu ˌisraˈeli wˌatatˈamka barˈaka hˌii: mˈuŋɡu na ˌawafˈaɲe kˌama ˌefraˈimu na manˈase.  kwa hˈijo ˌakamtˌaŋɡulˈiza ˌefraˈimu mbˈele ja manˈase.|0
ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia josˈefu, mˌimi nˌinakˌaribˈia kˈufa, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, na ˌatawˌarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˈaba zˈenu.|0
kwˈako wˈewe, kˌama alˈije ɟˌuːja ndˈuɡu zˈako, nˌinakˈupa sehˈemu mˈoɟa zaˈidi ja ndˈuɡu zˈako, lˈile enˈeo nˌililotˈeka kwa wˌaamˈori kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu na upˈinde wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo jakˈobo ˌakawaˈita wanˈawe na kusˈema: kˌusaɲikˈeni kˌunizuŋɡˈuka ˌili niwˈeze kˌuwaambˈia lˈile lˌitakˌalowˌatokˈea sˈiku ziɟˈazo.|0
kˌusaɲikˈeni na msˌikilˈize, ˈeɲi wˈana wa jakˈobo, msˌikilizˈeni bˈaba jˈenu ˌisraˈeli.|0
rˌeubˈeni, wˌewe ni mzalˈiwa wˈaŋɡu wa kwˈanza, ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu, tˈunda la kwˈanza la ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu, ˌumepˈita kwa heʃˈima, ˌumepˈita kwa uwˈezo.|0
ˌusijˌezuˈiwa kˌama mˈaɟi, bˌasi hˌutakˈuwa m̩kˈuu tˈena, kwa kˌuwa ˌulipˈanda kwˈeɲe kitˈanda tʃa bˈaba jˈako, kwˈeɲe kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu na kˌukinaɟˈisi.|0
sˌimeˈoni na lˈawi ni wˈana ndˈuɡu: pˈaŋɡa zˈao ni silˈaha za ɟeˈuri.|0
mˌimi na nˌisiiŋɡˈie katˌika barˈaza lˈao, nˌami nˌisiˌuŋɡanˈike katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko lˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˌamewaˈua wˈatu katˌika hasˈira jˈao, wˌalikˈata miʃˈipa ja miɡˈuu ja mˌafahˈali kˌama wˌalivjopˈenda.|0
hasˈira jˈao na ˌilaanˈiwe, kwa kˌuwa ni kˈali ˈm̩no, nˈajo ɣaðˈabu jˈao ni ja ˌukatˈili! nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa katˌika jakˈobo na kˌuwasambˈaza katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˈuda, ndˈuɡu zˈako wˌatakusˈifu; mkˈono wˈako ˌutakˈuwa ʃiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈako; wˈana wa bˈaba jˈako wˌatakˌusuɟudˈia.|0
ˈee jˈuda, wˌewe ni mwˈana sˈimba; ˌunarˈudi tˌoka mˌawindˈoni, mwanˈaŋɡu. kˌama sˈimba hˌuɲemelˈea na kulˈala tʃˈini, kˌama sˈimba ɟˈike: nˈani ˌaθubutˈuje kumwˈamʃa.|0
fˈimbo ja ufˈalme hˌaitˌaondˈoka kwa jˈuda, wˈala fˈimbo ja mtawˈala kˈati ja miɡˈuu jˈake, hˌadi ˈaɟe jˌeje ambˈaje mˈilki ni jˈake, ambˈaje utˈii wa mˌataˈifa ni wˈake.|0
ˌatamfˈuŋɡa pˈunda wˌake katˌika mzabˈibu, nˌaje mwˌanapˈunda wˌake kwˈeɲe tˈawi lilˈilo bˈora zaˈidi; ˌatafˈua mavˈazi jˌake katˌika divˈai, maɟˈoho jˌake katˌika dˈamu ja mˌizabˈibu.|0
mˈatʃo jˌake jˌatakˈuwa mekˈundu kwa divˈai, mˈeno jˌake jˌatakˈuwa meˈupe kwa mazˈiwa.|0
zˌabulˈoni ˌataˈiʃi pwˈani ja bahˈari na kˌuwa bandˈari za kˌueɡˈeʃa mˈeli; mpˈaka wˌake ˌutapanˈuka kˌuelekˈea sidˈoni.|0
ˌisakˈari ni pˈunda mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ambˈaje ˌamelˈala kˈati ja mizˈiɡo jˈake.|0
ˌaonˈapo palˈivjo pazˈuri mahˈali pˈake pa kˌupumzˈika na ɟˈinsi ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ˌinavjˌopendˈeza, ˌataˌinamˈiʃa bˈeɡa lˈake kwˈeɲe mzˈiɡo na kˌuɟitolˈea kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi ŋɡˈumu.|0
dˈani ˌatahukˈumu wˈatu wˌake kwa hˈaki kˌama mmˈoɟa wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
dˈani ˌatakˈuwa ɲˈoka kˈando ja bˌarabˈara, ɲˈoka mwˌeɲe sˈumu kˈando ja ɲɟˈia, jˈule ˌaumˈaje vˌisiɡˈino vja farˈasi ˌili jˈule ˌampandˈaje ˌaaŋɡˈuke tʃˈali.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌautafˈuta wokˈovu wˈako.|0
ɡˈadi ˌataʃˌambulˈiwa ɣafˈula na kˈundi la wˌaʃambˌuliˈaɟi, lakˈini jˌeje ˌatawˌaɡeukˈia na kˌuwaʃˈinda kabˈisa.|0
tʃakˈula tʃa aʃˈeri kˌitakˈuwa kinˈono, nˌaje ˌatatˈoa tʃakˈula kitˈamu kˌimfaˈatʃo mfˈalme.|0
naftˈali ni kulˈuŋɡu ɟˈike ˌalijˌeatʃˈiwa hˈuru ˌazaˈaje watˈoto wazˈuri.|0
josˈefu ni mzabˈibu ˌuzaˈao, mzabˈibu ˌuzaˈao ulˈio kˈando ja tʃemtʃˈemi, ambˈao matˈawi jˌake hutˈanda ˌukutˈani.|0
kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wapˈiɡa mʃˈale wˌalimʃˌambulˈia, wˌakampˈiɡa mʃˈale kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
lakˈini upˈinde wˌake ˌulibˈaki imˈara, mikˈono jˌake ˌikatˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu, na mkˈono wa mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa jakˈobo, kwa sabˈabu ja mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, mwˈamba wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako, ˌanajˌekusˌaidˈia, kwa sabˈabu ja mweɲˈezi, jˌeje ˌanajˌekubarˈiki kwa barˈaka za mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu, barˈaka za kilˈindi kˌilitʃˈoko tʃˈini, barˈaka za mˌatitˈini na za tˈumbo la uzˈazi.|0
barˈaka za bˈaba jˈako ni kˈubwa kulˈiko barˈaka za milˈima ja kˈale, ɲˈiŋɡi kulˈiko vilˈima vja kˈale. barˈaka hˈizo zˈote na zikˈae ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa josˈefu, ɟˌuːja pˈaɟi la jˈule m̩kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
bˌeɲamˈini ni ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu mlˈafi mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa kˈuu; ˌasubˈuhi hˌurarˈua mawˈindo jˈake, ɟiˈoni huɡˈawa ɲˈara.|0
hˈaja jˈote n̩dˈijo mˌakabˈila kˈumi na mawˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, na hˈivi ndˈivjo bˈaba jˈao ˌalivjˌowaambˈia ˌalipˌowabarˈiki, akˈimpa kˈila mmˈoɟa barˈaka ˌinajomfˈaa.|0
ndˈipo ˌalipowˈapa mˌaelekˈezo hˈaja: mˌimi nˈiko karˈibu kˌukusˈaɲua kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. mnizˈike pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo katˌika ʃˈamba la efrˈoni, mhˈiti.|0
pˈaŋɡo lˌililˈoko katˌika ʃˈamba la makpˈela, karˈibu na mˈamre hˌuko kˌanaˈani, ambˈalo ˌabrahˈamu ˌalinunˈua kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pa kˌuzikˈia kutˈoka kwa efrˈoni, mhˈiti, pamˈoɟa na ʃˈamba.|0
hˌuko ndˈiko ˌabrahˈamu na sˈara mkˈewe wˌalikozˈikwa, hˌuko ˌakazˈikwa isˈaki na rebˈeka mkˈewe, na hˌuko nˌilimzˈika lˈea.|0
ʃˈamba hˌilo na pˈaŋɡo lˌililˈoko ndˈani jˌake lˌilinˌunulˈiwa kutˈoka kwa wahˈiti.|0
baˌada ja jakˈobo kˌumalˈiza kutˈoa mˌaelekˈezo hˈajo kwa wanˈawe, ˌakarudˈiʃa miɡˈuu jˌake kˌitandˈani, ˌakapumˈua pˈumzi ja mwˈiʃo, na ˌakakusˈaɲua kwa wˈatu wˈake.|0
bˌasi josˈefu ˌakamwˌaŋɡukˈia bˈaba jˈake, ˌakalilˈia ɟˈuu jˌake na ˌakambˈusu.|0
sˈiku za kˌumwombˌolezˈea zˌilipokwˈiʃa, josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaʃaˈuri wa farˈao, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈenu semˈeni na farˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu. mwˌambiˈeni.|0
bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalinˌiapˈiʃa na kˌuniambˈia, mˌimi nˈiko karˈibu kˈufa; ˌunizˈike katˌika kabˈuri lˈile nˌililotʃˈimba kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani. sˈasa nˌakuˈomba ˌuniruhˈusu niˈende kumzˈika bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitarˈudi..|0
farˈao ˌakasˈema, pˈanda, uˈende kumzˈika bˈaba jˈako, kˌama ˌalivjˌokuapˈiza kufˈaɲa.|0
hˈivjo josˈefu ˌakapˈanda kwˈenda kumzˈika bˈaba jˈake. mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa farˈao wˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wa barˈaza lˈake na wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wˈote wa mˈisri.|0
hˈawa ni mbˈali na wˈatu wˈote wa ɲumbˈani kwa josˈefu, na ndˈuɡu zˈake, na wˈale wˈote wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈake. ni watˈoto wˈao, makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe tu wˌaliˌobakˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni.|0
maɡˈari makˈubwa na wapˈanda farˈasi pˈia wˌalipˈanda pamˈoɟa nˈaje. likˈawa kˈundi kˈubwa sˈana.|0
wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka ja atˈadi, karˈibu na jordˈani, wˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti na kwa utʃˈuŋɡu; josˈefu ˌakapumzˈika hˌuko kwa sˈiku sˈaba kˌumwombˌolezˈea bˈaba jˈake.|0
wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi hˌuko wˌalipoˈona mˌaombolˈezo jˌalijˌofaɲˈika katˌika sakˈafu ˈile ja kˌupurˈia ja atˈadi, wˌakasˈema, wamˈisri wˌanafˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo makˈubwa. kwa hˈijo mahˈali pˈale karˈibu na jordˈani pˌakaˈitwa ˈabel mˌizraˈimu.|0
hˈivjo wˈana wa jakˈobo wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bˈaba jˈao ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza.|0
wˌakamtʃukˈua mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wˌakamzˈika kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo katˌika ʃˈamba la makpˈela, karˈibu na mˈamre, ambˈalo ˌabrahˈamu ˌalilˌinunˈua kutˈoka kwa efrˈoni, mhˈiti, pamˈoɟa na ʃˈamba lˈiwe mahˈali pa kˌuzikˈia.|0
baˌada ja josˈefu kumzˈika bˈaba jˈake, ˌakarˈudi mˈisri pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda nˌaje kumzˈika bˈaba jˈake.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake josˈefu wˌalipoˈona kwˌamba bˈaba jˈao ˌamekˈufa, wˌakasˈema, ˌitakuwˈaɟe kˌama josˈefu ˌatawˈeka kiɲˈoŋɡo ðˈidi jˈetu na kˌutulˈipa mabˈaja jˈote tˌulijˌomtendˈea.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakampˌelekˈea josˈefu uɟˈumbe, wˌakasˈema, kˈabla bˈaba jˈako haɟˈafa ˌaliˈatʃa mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja.|0
hˈili ndˈilo mtˌakalˌomwambˈia josˈefu: nˌinakuˈomba ˌuwasamˈehe ndˈuɡu zˈako ðˈambi na mabˈaja kwa vˈile wˌalivjˌokutˈenda vibˈaja. sˈasa tˌafaðˈali samˈehe ðˈambi za wˌatumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako. uɟˈumbe hˈuu ˌulipˌomfikˈia, josˈefu ˌakalˈia.|0
ndˈipo ndˈuɡu zˌake wakˈaɟa na kˌuɟitˈupa tʃˈini mbˈele jˈake. wˌakasˈema, sˌisi ni watˈumwa wˈako.|0
lakˈini josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia, msˌioɡˈope. ɟˈe, mˌimi ni badˈala ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
mlˌikusudˈia kˌuniðˈuru, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˌusudˈia mˈema, ˌili lˌitimˈie hˈili lˌinalˌofaɲˈika sˈasa, kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa ja wˈatu wˈeŋɡi.|0
hˈivjo bˈasi, msˌioɡˈope. mˌimi nˌitawatˈunza nˈiɲi ɲˈote pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈenu. ˌakawˌahakˌikiʃˈia na kusˈema nˌao kwa wˈema.|0
josˈefu ˌakakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, jˌeje pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja bˈaba jˈake. ˌakaˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟana kˈumi.|0
nˌaje ˌakaˈona kizˈazi tʃa tˈatu tʃa watˈoto wa ˌefraˈimu. pˈia ˌakaˈona watˈoto wa makˈiri mwˈana wa manˈase, wˌakawˈekwa mˌaɡotˈini ˌm̩wa josˈefu wˌalipˌozalˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo josˈefu ˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈake, mˌimi nˌinakˌaribˈia kˈufa. lakˈini kwa hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌatawˌasaidˈia na kˌuwatʃˌukuˈeni kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na kˌuwapelˈeka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌomwahˈidi kwa kiˈapo ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
nˌaje josˈefu ˌakawˌaapˈiʃa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwaambˈia, hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌatawˌasaidˈia, nˌaɲi ni lazˈima mhˌakikˈiʃe mmˌepandˈiʃa mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mahˈali hˈapa.|0
kwa hˈijo josˈefu akˈafa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟana kˈumi. baˌada ja kumtˈia dˈawa ˌili ˌasiˈoze, ˌakawˈekwa kwˈeɲe ɟenˈeza hˌuko mˈisri.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli ambˈao wˌalikwˈenda mˈisri na jakˈobo, kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
rˌeubˈeni, sˌimeˈoni, lˈawi na jˈuda.|0
ˌisakˈari, zˌabulˈoni na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
dˈani na naftˈali, ɡˈadi na aʃˈeri.|0
wazˈao wˈote wa jakˈobo wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu sabˈini; josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa tajˈari jˈuko mˈisri.|0
bˌasi josˈefu na kˈaka zˌake wˈote na kizˈazi kˈile tʃˈote wˌalikˈufa.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezaˈana na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka sˈana, idˈadi jˈao ikˈawa kˈubwa ˈm̩no, kwa hˈijo wˌakaiɟˈaza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˈm̩pja ambˈaje hˌakufahˈamu habˈari za josˈefu ˌakatawˈala mˈisri.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈake, tˌazamˈeni, wˌaisraˈeli wˌamekˈuwa wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no kwa idˈadi kˌutulˈiko sˈisi.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, ni lazˈima tˌuwaʃˌuɣulikˈie kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu, la sˈivjo wˌatazˈidi kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi zaˈidi, na ikˈiwa pˌatatokˈea vˈita, wˌataɟiˈuŋɡa na adˈui zˈetu kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈetu na kˌuondˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii.|0
bˌasi wamˈisri wˌakawˈeka wˌasimamˈizi wa kˌuwasˌimamˈia na kˌuwatˈesa wˌaisraˈeli kwa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu, nˌao wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi ja piθˈomu na rˌamesˈesi ja kuwˈeka akˈiba ja farˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌalivjozˈidi kutˈeswa ndˈivjo wˌalivjozˈidi kˌuoŋɡezˈeka na kˌuenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; wamˈisri wˌakawˌaoɡˈopa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakawˌatumikˈiʃa kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
wˌakafˈaɲa maˈiʃa ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌuwa matʃˈuŋɡu kwa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu ja kˌuteŋɡenˈeza lˈami na kˌufjatˈua mˌatofˈali, na kˈazi zˈote za mˌaʃambˈani; katˌika kˈazi zˈao zˈote ŋɡˈumu, wamˈisri wˌaliwˌatumˈia wˌaisraˈeli kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakawˌaambˈia wakˈuŋɡa wa kimˈisri wˌaliˌowazalˈiʃa wˌanawˈake wa kˌiebranˈia, ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao ni ʃˈifra na pˈua.|0
lakˈini hˈao wakˈuŋɡa walˈimtʃa mˈuŋɡu na hˌawakufˈaɲa kˈile mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌalitʃˌowaambˈia kufˈaɲa, bˌali wˌakawaˈatʃa watˈoto wa kiˈume waˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakawaˈita hˈao wakˈuŋɡa, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini mmefˈaɲa hˈivi? mbˈona mmeˈatʃa watˈoto wa kiˈume waˈiʃi.|0
wakˈuŋɡa wˌakamɟˈibu farˈao, wˌanawˈake wa kˌiebranˈia ni tˌofaˈuti na wˌanawˈake wa kimˈisri; wˌao wˈana ŋɡˈuvu, nˌao hˌuɟifuŋɡˈua watˈoto kˈabla wakˈuŋɡa hˌawaɟafˈika.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌatendˈea mˈema wakˈuŋɡa hˈao. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˌoŋɡezˈeka na kˌuendelˈea kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi zaˈidi.|0
kwa vˈile hˈao wakˈuŋɡa walˈimtʃa mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌaɟalˈia kˌuwa na ɟamˈaa zˈao weɲˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakatˈoa aɡˈizo hˈili kwa wˈatu wˌake wˈote: kˈila mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌatakˌajezalˈiwa kwa wˌaebranˈia lazˈima atˈupwe katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili, bˌali kˈila mtˈoto wa kˈike aˈatʃwe aˈiʃi.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wa ɲˈumba ja lˈawi ˌakaˈoa mwanˈamke mlˈawi.|0
nˌaje mwanˈamke hˈujo ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakazˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume. ˌalipoˈona mtˈoto hˈujo ni mzˈuri, ˌakamfˈitʃa kwa miˈezi mitˈatu.|0
lakˈini ˌalipoˈona hawˈezi kumfˈitʃa zaˈidi, ˌakamtˌeŋɡenezˈea kˌisafˈina tʃa mafˈuɲɟo, ˌakakipˈaka lˈami. kˈiʃa ˌakamwˈeka hˈujo mtˈoto ndˈani jˈake, ˌakakifˈitʃa kˌatikˈati ja matˈete kˈando ja ukˈiŋɡo wa ˈm̩to naˈili.|0
dˈada ja hˈujo mtˈoto ˌakasimˈama mbˈali ˌili kuˈona kˌitakˌatʃompˈata mtˈoto.|0
ndˈipo bˈinti farˈao ˌakaterˈemka mtˈoni naˈili kuˈoɡa, nˌao wˌahudˈumu wˌake wakˈawa wˌanatembˈea ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈm̩to. bˈinti mfˈalme ˌakaˈona kˌisafˈina kˌatikˈati ja maɲˈasi, ˌakamtˈuma mmˈoɟa wa watˈumwa wˌake wa kˈike kˌukitʃukˈua.|0
ˌalifuŋɡˈua kˌisafˈina ˌakaˈona mtˈoto ndˈani jˈake. mtˈoto ˌalikˈuwa ˌakilˈia, ˌakamhˌurumˈia. ˌakasˈema, hˈuju ni mmˈoɟa wa watˈoto wa kˌiebranˈia.|0
ndˈipo dˈada wa hˈujo mtˈoto ˌakamˌuulˈiza bˈinti farˈao, ɟˈe, niˈende nˌikakˌutafutˈie mmˈoɟa wa wˌanawˈake wa kˌiebranˈia ˌakulelˈee hˈuju mtˈoto.|0
bˈinti farˈao ˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, nˈenda. jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakaˈenda ˌakamlˈeta mˈama wa mtˈoto.|0
bˈinti farˈao ˌakamwambˈia, mtʃukˈue hˈuju mtˈoto ˌunisˌaidˈie kumlˈea, nˌami nˌitakulˈipa. bˌasi jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamtʃukˈua mtˈoto na kumlˈea.|0
mtˈoto ˌalipokˈua, ˌakampelˈeka kwa bˈinti farˈao, nˌaje akˈawa mwanˈawe. ˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake mˈose ˌakisˈema, nˌilimtˈoa kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa, baˌada ja mˈose kukˈua, ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda wˌalikokˈuwa wˈatu wˈake, na ˌakatʃuŋɡˈuza ɟˈinsi wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu. ˌakamwˈona mmˈisri ˌakimpˈiɡa mwˌebranˈia, mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
mˈose ˌakatazˈama hˈuku na hˌuko ˌasiˈone ˈm̩tu jejˈote, ˌakamuˈua jˈule mmˈisri, ˌakamfˈitʃa mtʃaŋɡˈani.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌakatˈoka, ˌakaˈona wˌaebranˈia wawˈili wˌakipiɡˈana. ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈule ˌalijekˈosa, mbˈona ˌunampˈiɡa mwˌebranˈia mwenzˈako.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakamɟˈibu, ni nˈani ˌalijˌekufˈaɲa mtawˈala na mwamˈuzi ɟˈuu jˈetu? ɟˈe, ˌunatˈaka kˌuniˈua kˌama ˌulivjˌomuˈua jˈule mmˈisri? ndˈipo mˈose ˌakaoɡˈopa na kuwˈaza, ɟˈambo lˈile nˌililofˈaɲa lazˈima lˌimefˌahamˈika.|0
farˈao ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌaliɟarˈibu kˌumuˈua mˈose, lakˈini mˈose ˌakamkimbˈia farˈao na kwˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌidiˈani, ˌakakˈeti kˈando ja kisˈima.|0
kuhˈani wa mˌidiˈani ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti sˈaba, nˌao wakˈaɟa kˌisimˈani ˌili kutʃˈota mˈaɟi na kuɟˈaza hˈori kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuɲueʃˈea mifˈuɡo ja bˈaba jˈao.|0
baˈaði ja wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wakˈaɟa wˌakawˌafukˈuza hˈao wˌasitʃˈana. ndˈipo mˈose ˌakainˈuka, ˌakawˌasaidˈia na kˌuɲuˈeʃa mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
hˈao wˌasitʃˈana wˌaliporˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa rˌeuˈeli bˈaba jˈao, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ˌimekuwˈaɟe lˈeo mmerˈudi mapˈema hˈivjo.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, mmˈisri mmˈoɟa ˌalitˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi. pˈia ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌalitˌutʃotˈea mˈaɟi na kˌuɲuˈeʃa mifˈuɡo.|0
ˌakawˌaulˈiza bˈinti zˈake, jˈuko wˈapi? mbˈona mmemwˈatʃa? mkˌaribiʃˈeni ˈale tʃakˈula.|0
mˈose ˌakakubˈali kukˈaa kwa hˈujo ˈm̩tu, ambˈaje alˈimpa mˈose bˈinti jˌake ˌalijeˈitwa sipˈora amwˈoe.|0
sipˈora ˌalizˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume, nˌaje mˈose ˌakamwˈita ɡerʃˈomu, ˌakisˈema, nˌimekˈuwa mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kiɡˈeni.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda mrˈefu, mfˈalme wa mˈisri akˈafa. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakalˈia kwa huzˈuni katˌika utˈumwa wˈao, wˌalilˈia na kilˈio tʃˈao tʃa kutˈaka msaˈada kwa aɟˈili ja utˈumwa kˌikamfikˈia mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao tʃa huzˈuni, ˌakakumbˈuka aɡˈano ˌalilofˈaɲa na ˌabrahˈamu pamˈoɟa na isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌaaŋɡalˈia wˌaisraˈeli na kˌuwahˌurumˈia.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌanatʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo ja jˈeθro mkwˈewe, kuhˈani wa mˌidiˈani. mˈose ˌakapelˈeka mifˈuɡo mbˈali ɲˈuma ja ɟˈaŋɡwa, nˌaje ˌakafˈika horˈebu, mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˌuko mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea mˈose katˌika mwˈali wa mˈoto kutˈoka kˌitʃakˈani. mˈose ˌakaˈona kwˌamba iŋɡˈawa kˈile kitʃˈaka kˌilikˈuwa kˌinawˈaka mˈoto, kˌilikˈuwa hˌakitˌeketˈei.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakawˈaza, nˌitaɡeˈuka sˈasa niˈone kˈitu hˈiki tʃa aɟˈabu, nˌami niˈone ni kwa nˈini kitʃˈaka hˈiki hˌakitˌeketˈei.|0
bwˈana ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ˌameɡeˈuka ˌili aˈone, mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwˈita kutˈoka ndˈani ja kˈile kitʃˈaka, mˈose! mˈose! nˌaje mˈose ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusikˌaribˈie zaˈidi. vˈua viˈatu vjˈako, kwa maˈana mahˈali ˌunapˌosimˈama ni pˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ni mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu wa isˈaki, na mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo. mˈose ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈajo, ˌakafunˈika ˈuso wˌake kwa sabˈabu ˌalioɡˈopa kˌumtazˈama mˈuŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, hakˈika nˌimeˈona matˈeso ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu katˌika mˈisri. nˌimesikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao kwa sabˈabu ja wˌasimamˈizi wˈao, nˌami naɡˈuswa na matˈeso jˈao.|0
bˌasi nˌimeʃˈuka nˌiwaokˈoe kutˈoka mkˈono wa wamˈisri, nˌiwatˈoe na kˌuwapandˈiʃa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, nˌiwapelˈeke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri na kˈubwa, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi.|0
sˈasa kilˈio tʃa wˌaisraˈeli kˌimenˌifikˈia, nˌami nˌimeˈona ɟˈinsi wamˈisri wˌanavjˌowatˈesa.|0
bˈasi, sˈasa nˈenda. nˌinakutˈuma kwa farˈao ˌili kˌuwatˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, mˌimi ni nˈani hˌata niˈende kwa farˈao kˌuwatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli n̩tʃˈini mˈisri.|0
nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe. hˌii ˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara kwˈako kwˌamba ni mˌimi nˌimekutˈuma: hˈapo ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumewatˈoa wˈatu mˈisri, mtˌamwabˈudu mˈuŋɡu katˌika mlˈima hˈuu.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, ikˈiwa nˌitawˌaendˈea wˌaisraˈeli na kˌuwaambˈia, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu, nˌao wˌakinˌiulˈiza, ɟˈina lˈake ni nˈani? nˌitawˌaambˈia nˈini.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mˌimi nˈiko ambˈaje nˈiko. hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjowˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli: mˌimi nˈiko ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu..|0
vˌilevˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu wa isˈaki, na mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu. hˈili ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu milˈele, ɟˈina ambˈalo mtˌanikumbˈuka kwˈalo kutˈoka kizˈazi hˌadi kizˈazi.|0
nˈenda, ˌukawˌakusˈaɲe wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌuwaambˈie, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo, ˌalinˌitokˈea ˌakanˌiambˈia: nˌimewˌatazˈama, nˌami nˌimeˈona mlˌijofaɲˈiwa katˌika mˈisri.|0
nˌami nˌimeahˈidi kˌuwapandˈiʃa kutˈoka matˈeso jˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, nˌiwapelˈeke ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali..|0
wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌusikilˈiza. kˈiʃa wˌewe na wazˈee mtakwˈenda kwa mfˈalme wa mˈisri na kˌumwambˈia, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia ˌametˌutokˈea. tˌuruhˈusu twˈende safˈari ja sˈiku tˈatu hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani kutˈoa ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu..|0
lakˈini nˌafahˈamu kwˌamba mfˈalme wa mˈisri hˌatawˌaruhˈusu kwˈenda, mpˈaka mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌumlazimˈiʃe.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwapˈiɡa wamˈisri kwa mˌaaɟˈabu jˈote nˌitakˌajofˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. baˌada ja hˈajo, ˌatawˌaruhˈusu mwondˈoke.|0
nˌami nˌitawˈapa hˈawa wˈatu ˌupendelˈeo mbˈele ja wamˈisri, kwa hˈijo mtˌakapˌoondˈoka n̩tʃˈini hˌamtaondˈoka mikˈono mitˈupu.|0
kˈila mwanˈamke mwˌisraˈeli ˌatamwˈomba ɟirˈani jˌake mmˈisri na mwanˈamke jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi ɲumbˈani kwˈake ˈampe vjˈombo vja fˈeða, ðahˈabu na ŋɡˈuo, ambˈavjo mtˌawavˈika wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu. hˈivjo mtˌawatˈeka ɲˈara wamˈisri.|0
mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌitakuwˈaɟe kˌama hˌawatˌaniamˈini ˌau kˌunisˌikilˈiza, wasˈeme, bwˈana hˌakukˌutokˈea.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, ni nˈini hˈitʃo kilˈitʃo mkonˈoni mwˈako? ˌakaɟˈibu, fˈimbo.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, itˈupe tʃˈini. mˈose ˌakaitˈupa tʃˈini hˈijo fˈimbo nˈajo ikˈawa ɲˈoka, nˌaje ˌakaˌikimbˈia.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako ˌumkamˈate mkiˈani. bˌasi mˈose ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono ˌakamkamˈata jˈule ɲˈoka, nˌaje ˌakabˌadilˈika tˈena kˌuwa fˈimbo mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌatakˌavjoamˈini kˌuwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, mˈuŋɡu wa isˈaki, na mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo, ˌamekˌutokˈea wˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, wˈeka mkˈono wˈako ndˈani ja ɟˈoho lˈako. bˌasi mˈose ˌakawˈeka mkˈono wˌake ndˈani ja ɟˈoho lˈake, nˌaje ˌalipˌoutˈoa, ˌulikˈuwa na ukˈoma, mweˈupe kˌama θelˈuɟi.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, sˈasa ˌurudˈiʃe tˈena hˈuo mkˈono ndˈani ja ɟˈoho lˈako. bˌasi mˈose ˌakaˌurudˈiʃa mkˈono wˌake ndˈani ja ɟˈoho lˈake na ˌalipˌoutˈoa, ˌulikˈuwa mzˈima, kˌama sehˈemu ziŋɡˈine za mwˈili wˈake.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, kˌama hˌawatˌakuamˈini wˈewe, ˌau kˌutoɟˈali iʃˈara ja kwˈanza, wˌataamˈini iʃˈara ja pˈili.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌawatˌaamˈini iʃˈara hˈizi mbˈili ˌau hˌawatˌawasˌikilˈiza nˈiɲi, tʃukˈua kiˈasi tʃa mˈaɟi kutˈoka ˈm̩to naˈili ˌujamimˈine ɟˌuːja ˈarði kˈavu. mˈaɟi mtˌakajotˈoa mtˈoni jˌatakˈuwa dˈamu ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, ˈee bwˈana, kˈamwe sˌiɟapˈata kˌuwa msemˈaɟi kwa ˌufasˈaha wakˈati ˌuliopˈita wˈala ʃˈu ˌulipoˈanza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na mtumˈiʃi wˈako. ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ni mzˈito kˌuzuŋɡˈumza.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, ni nˈani ˌalijˈempa mwˌanadˈamu kˈiɲua? ni nˈani ˌalijemfˈaɲa ˈm̩tu kˌuwa kizˈiwi ˌau bˈubu? ni nˈani ˌanajˈempa ˈm̩tu kuˈona ˌau upˈofu? ɟˈe, si mˈimi, bwˈana.|0
sˈasa nˈenda, nˌitakˌusaidˈia kusˈema, nˌami nˌitakˌufundˈiʃa ɟˈambo la kusˈema.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana, tˌafaðˈali mtˈume ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine kufˈaɲa kˈazi hˈijo.|0
ndˈipo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja mˈose, ˌakamwambˈia, vˈipi kuhˈusu ndˈuɡu jˈako, arˈoni mlˈawi? nˌinaɟˈua jˌeje ˌanawˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza vizˈuri. nˌaje jˈuko tajˈari ɲɟiˈani kˌukulˈaki, na mˈojo wˌake ˌutafurˈahi wakˈati ˌatakˌapokuˈona.|0
ˌutazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje na kuwˈeka manˈeno kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake. nˌitawˌasaidˈia nˈiɲi wawˈili kusˈema, nˌami nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa ɟˈambo la kufˈaɲa.|0
arˈoni ˌataoŋɡˈea na wˈatu badˈala jˈako na ˌitakˈuwa kwˌamba jˌeje ˌamekˈuwa kˈiɲua tʃˈako nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa kˌama mˈuŋɡu kwˈake.|0
lakˈini tʃukˈua fˈimbo hˌii mkonˈoni mwˈako ˌili uwˈeze kˌuitumˈia kufˈaɲa iʃˈara hˈizo za aɟˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakarˈudi kwa jˈeθro mkwˈewe ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiruhˈusu nirˈudi kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mˈisri kuˈona kˌama jˈuko hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ambˈaje bˈado ˌanaˈiʃi. jˈeθro ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda, nˌami nˌakutakˈia mˈema.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose hˌuko mˌidiˈani, rˈudi mˈisri kwa maˈana wˈatu wˈote wˌaliotˈaka kˌukuˈua wˌamekˈufa.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌakamtʃukˈua mkˈewe na wanˈawe, ˌakawˌapandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja pˈunda na kuˈanza safˈari kurˈudi mˈisri. nˌaje ˌakaˌitʃukˈua ˈile fˈimbo ja mˈuŋɡu mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ˌutakˌaporˈudi mˈisri, hˌakikˈiʃa kwˌamba ˌutafˈaɲa mbˈele ja farˈao mˌaaɟˈabu jˈote nˌilijokˈupa uwˈezo wa kˌujafˈaɲa. lakˈini nˌitafˈaɲa mˈojo wˌake kˌuwa mɡˈumu ˌili kwˌamba ˌasiwˌaruhˈusu wˈatu waˈende.|0
kˈiʃa mwambˈie farˈao, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌisraˈeli ni mwanˈaŋɡu mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
nˌami nˌilikˌuambˈia, ruhˈusu mwanˈaŋɡu ˌaondˈoke, ˌili awˈeze kˌuniabˈudu mˈimi. lakˈini ˌukakatˈaa kˌumruhˈusu kwˈenda, bˌasi nˌitaˈua mwˈana wˈako mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza..|0
mˈose ˌalipokˈuwa mahˈali pa kulˈala waɡˈeni akˈiwa ɲɟiˈani kurˈudi mˈisri, bwˈana ˌakakutˈana nˈaje, ˌakatˈaka kˌumuˈua.|0
lakˈini sipˈora ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈiwe ɡˈumu, ˌakakˈata ɡˈovi la mwanˈawe na kuɡˈusa nˈalo miɡˈuu ja mˈose. sipˈora ˌakasˈema, hakˈika wˌewe ni bwˈana arˈusi wa dˈamu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
sipˈora ˌalipomwˈita mˈose, bwˈana arˈusi wa dˈamu, ˌalikˈuwa ˌanamˌaanˈiʃa ˈile tohˈara. baˌada ja hˈajo bwˈana ˌakamwˈatʃa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, nˈenda ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌukamlˈaki mˈose. bˌasi ˌakakutˈana na mˈose kwˈeɲe mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌakambˈusu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃomtˈuma kusˈema, vˌilevˈile habˈari za iʃˈara na mˌaaɟˈabu ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamemwamˈuru kufˈaɲa.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wazˈee wˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
nˌaje arˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose. pˈia ˌakafˈaɲa iʃˈara mbˈele ja wˈatu.|0
nˌao wˌakaamˈini. nˌao wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa bwˈana ˌanaɟˌiʃuɣulˈiʃa nˈao, na kwˌamba ˌameˈona matˈeso jˈao, wˌalisuɟˈudu na kˌuabˈudu.|0
bˌaadˈaje mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaˈenda kwa farˈao, wˌakamwambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: wˌaruhˈusu wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili wawˈeze kˌunifaɲˈia sˌikukˈuu hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani..|0
farˈao ˌakasˈema, hˈujo bwˈana ni nˈani, hˌata nimtˈii na kˌuruhˈusu ˌisraˈeli uˈende? simɟˈui hˈujo bwˈana wˈala sˌitawˌaruhˈusu ˌisraˈeli waˈende.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia ˌamekutˈana nˈasi. sˈasa tˌuruhˈusu tˈuwe na safˈari ja sˈiku tˈatu ja ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌili tˌukamtolˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ðabˈihu, la sˈivjo awˈeza kˌutupˈiɡa sˌisi kwa taˈuni ˌau kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakasˈema, mbˈona nˈiɲi mˈose na arˈoni mnˌawatʃukˈua wˈatu waˈatʃe kˈazi zˈao? rudˈini kwˈeɲe kˈazi zˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa farˈao ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, sˈasa wˈatu hˈawa ni wˈeŋɡi, nˌaɲi mnˌawazuˈia kufˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo farˈao ˌakatˈoa ˈamri hˌii kwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa watˈumwa na wˌasimamˈizi wa wˈatu ˌakawˌaambˈia.|0
ʃˈu sˈasa msiwˈape hˈawa wˈatu ɲˈasi za kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌatofˈali. wˌao wˌakusˈaɲe ɲˈasi zˈao weɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini wˌatakˈeni kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌatofˈali kiˈasi kˈile kˈile tʃa mwˈanzo, kiwˈaŋɡo kˌisipuŋɡˈuzwe. wˌao ni wavˈivu, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌanalˈia, wˌakisˈema, tˌuruhusˈiwe twˈende kˌumtolˈea mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ðabˈihu..|0
faɲˈeni kˈazi kˌuwa ŋɡˈumu zaˈidi kwa wˈatu hˈao ˌili kwˌamba wˌakazˈane na kˈazi na kuˈatʃa kˌusikilˈiza uˈoŋɡo.|0
bˌasi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa watˈumwa na wˌasimamˈizi wˌakaˈenda kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu, hˈivi ndˈivjo farˈao ˌasemˈavjo: sˌitawˈapa tˈena ɲˈasi.|0
nendˈeni mkˌatafˈute ɲˈasi weɲˈewe popˈote mnˌapowˈeza kˌuzipˈata, lakˈini kˈazi jˈenu hˌaitˌapuŋɡˈuzwa hˌata kidˈoɡo..|0
bˌasi wˈatu wˌakatˌawaɲˈika kˈote n̩tʃˈini mˈisri kˌukusˈaɲa mabˈua ja kˌutumˈia badˈala ja ɲˈasi.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa watˈumwa wˌakasˌisitˈiza, wˌakisˈema, tˌimizˈeni kˈazi mnˌajotakˈiwa kwa kˈila sˈiku, kˌama wakˈati ˈule mlˌipokˈuwa mkipˈewa ɲˈasi.|0
wˌasimamˈizi wa kˌiisraˈeli wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa watˈumwa wa farˈao wˌalipˈiɡwa na kˌuulˈizwa, kwa nˈini hˌamkutimˈiza kiwˈaŋɡo tʃˈenu tʃa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌatofˈali ɟˈana na lˈeo, kˌama mwanzˈoni.|0
ndˈipo wˌasimamˈizi wa kˌiisraˈeli wˌakaˈenda kˌumlilˈia farˈao, wˌakisˈema: mbˈona ˌumewˌatendˈea wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako hˈivi.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako hˌawapˈewi ɲˈasi, hˌata hˈivjo tˌumeambˈiwa, tˌeŋɡenezˈeni mˌatofˈali! wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌanapˈiɡwa, lakˈini kˈosa ni la wˈatu wˈako weɲˈewe.|0
farˈao ˌakasˈema, nˈiɲi ni wavˈivu n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mnasˈema, tˌuruhˈusu twˈende tˌukamtolˈee bwˈana ðabˈihu..|0
sˈasa nendˈeni kazˈini. hˌamtapˈewa ɲˈasi zozˈote, nˌaɲi ni lazˈima mtˌeŋɡenˈeze mˌatofˈali.|0
wˌasimamˈizi wa kˌiisraˈeli wˌalitambˈua kˌuwa wˈako tˌaabˈani wˌalipˌoambˈiwa, hˌamtakˈiwi kˌupuŋɡˈuza idˈadi ja mˌatofˈali mlˌiotakˈiwa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza kˈila sˈiku.|0
wˌalipˌoondˈoka kwa farˈao, wˌakawakˈuta mˈose na arˈoni wˌakiŋɡoɟˈea kˌukutˈana nˈao.|0
wˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni, bwˈana na ˌawaˌaŋɡalˈie ˌawahukˈumu nˈiɲi! mmˌetufˈaɲa tunˈuke kwa farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, nˌaɲi mmewˈeka upˈaŋɡa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao ˌili kˌutuˈua sˈisi.|0
mˈose ˌakarˈudi kwa bwˈana na kˌumwambˈia, ˈee bwˈana, mbˈona ˌumewˌaletˈea wˈatu hˈawa taˈabu? kwa nˈini bˌasi ˌukanitˈuma mˈimi.|0
ʃˈu nˌilipˌomwendˈea farˈao kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa ɟˈina lˈako, ˌamewˌaletˈea taˈabu wˈatu hˈawa, nˌawe kˈamwe hˌuɟawˌakombˈoa wˈatu wˈako.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, sˈasa ˌutaˈona kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃomfaɲˈia farˈao: kwa sabˈabu ja mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌatawˌaatʃˈia wˈatu waˈende; kwa sabˈabu ja mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌatawˌafukˈuza wˌaondˈoke n̩tʃˈini mwˈake.|0
pˈia mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˌilimtokˈea ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo kˌama mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi, iŋɡˈawa sˌikuwˌaɟulˈiʃa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, jehˈova, mˌimi mweɲˈewe sˌikuɟˌitambulˈiʃa kwˈao.|0
pˈia nˌiliwˈeka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˌao kuwˈapa ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, ambˈako wˌaliˈiʃi kˌama waɡˈeni.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˌimesikˈia kilˈio tʃa huzˈuni tʃa wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao wamˈisri wˌamewatˈia ˌutumwˈani, nˌami nˌimelˌikumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo, wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌami nˌitawatˈoa mtˈoke katˌika kˈoŋɡwa la wamˈisri. nˌitawawˈeka hˈuru mtˈoke kˌuwa watˈumwa wˈao, nˌami nˌitawˌakombˈoa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa pamˈoɟa na matˈendo makˈuu ja hukˈumu.|0
nˌitawatwˈaa ˈm̩we wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. ndˈipo mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌilijˌewatˈoa tʃˈini ja kˈoŋɡwa la wamˈisri.|0
nˌami nˌitawalˈeta mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijoˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kˈumpa ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo. nˌitawˈapa ˈiwe mˈilki jˈenu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaarˈifu wˌaisraˈeli ɟˈambo hˈili, lakˈini hˌawakˌumsikilˈiza kwa sabˈabu ja mˌaumˈivu makˈuu ja mojˈoni na utˈumwa wa kˌikatˈili.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
nˈenda, mwambˈie farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌawaatʃˈie wˌaisraˈeli wˌaondˈoke n̩tʃˈini mwˈake.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, ikˈiwa wˌaisraˈeli hˌawatˌanisˌikilˈiza, kwa nˈini jˌeje farˈao ˌanisˌikilˈize mˈimi, ambˈaje hˌuzuŋɡˈumza kwa kˌiɡuɡumˈizi.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakanˈena na mˈose na arˈoni kuhˈusu wˌaisraˈeli na farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri, nˌaje ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˌawatˈoe wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa zˈao: wˈana wa rˌeubˈeni mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa hanˈoki, pˈalu, hesrˈoni na kˈarmi. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio kˈoo za rˌeubˈeni.|0
wˈana wa sˌimeˈoni wˌalikˈuwa jˌemuˈeli, jamˈini, ohˈadi, jakˈini, sohˈari na ʃaˈuli mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mkˌanaˈani. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio kˈoo za sˌimeˈoni.|0
wˈana wa ɡerʃˈoni kwa kˈoo, wˌalikˈuwa lˈibni na ʃimˈei.|0
wˈana wa kohˈaθi wˌalikˈuwa amrˈamu, iʃˈari, hebrˈoni na ˌuziˈeli. kohˈaθi ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa θˌeleθˈininatˈatu.|0
wˈana wa merˈari wˌalikˈuwa mˈahli na mˈuʃi. hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za lˈawi kˌufuatˈana na orˈoða zˈao.|0
wˈana wa iʃˈari wˌalikˈuwa kˈora, nefˈeɡi na zˈikri.|0
wˈana wa ˌuziˈeli wˌalikˈuwa mˌiʃaˈeli, ˌelisafˈani na sˈiθri.|0
arˈoni ˌakamwˈoa ˌeliʃˈeba bˈinti wa ˌaminadˈabu ndˈuɡu jˌake naʃˈoni, nˌaje ˌakamzalˈia nadˈabu, abˈihu, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari.|0
wˈana wa kˈora wˌalikˈuwa asˈiri, ˌelikˈana na ˌabiasˈafu. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio kˈoo za kˈora.|0
ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa arˈoni ˌakamwˈoa mmˈoɟa wa bˈinti za pˌutiˈeli, nˌaje ˌakamzalˈia fˌinehˈasi. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za walˈawi, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa arˈoni na mˈose wˈale wˈale ambˈao bwˈana ˌaliwˌaambˈia, wˌatoˈeni wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa vikˈosi vjˈao.|0
n̩dˈio hˈao hˈao wˌaliˌozuŋɡˈumza na farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri kuhˈusu kˌuwatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli mˈisri. ˌilikˈuwa ni hˈujo mˈose na hˈujo arˈoni.|0
bwˈana ˌaliponˈena na mˈose hˌuko mˈisri.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana. mwambˈie farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri kˈila kˈitu nˌikuˌambiˈatʃo.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi hˌuzuŋɡˈumza kwa kˌiɡuɡumˈizi, farˈao ˌatanˌisikilˈiza mˈimi.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, tazˈama, nˌimekufˈaɲa kˌuwa kˌama mˈuŋɡu kwa farˈao, nˌaje arˈoni, hˈujo ndˈuɡu jˈako, ˌatakˈuwa nabˈii wˈako.|0
ˌutasˈema kˈila kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃokˌuaɡˈiza, nˌaje arˈoni ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌatamwambˈia farˈao ˌawaatʃˈie wˌaisraˈeli watˈoke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
lakˈini nˌitaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao kˌuwa mɡˈumu. iŋɡˈawa nˌitazidˈiʃa iʃˈara na mˌaaɟˈabu katˌika mˈisri.|0
hˌatawˌasikilˈiza. kˈiʃa nˌitaˌupelˈeka mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja mˈisri, na kwa matˈendo makˈuu ja hukˈumu nˌitavitˈoa vikˈundi vjˈaŋɡu, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaisraˈeli.|0
nˌao wamˈisri wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌitakˌapoˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja mˈisri na kˌuwatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli watˈoke hˈumo.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakafˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza.|0
mˈose ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌemanˈini na arˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌemanˈini na mitˈatu wˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza na farˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
farˈao ˌatakˌapowˌaambˈia, faɲˈeni mˌuuɟˈiza, bˌasi mwambˈie arˈoni, tʃukˈua fˈimbo jˈako na ˌuitˈupe tʃˈini mbˈele ja farˈao, nˈajo fˈimbo ˌitakˈuwa ɲˈoka.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaˈenda kwa farˈao wˌakafˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza. arˈoni ˌakaitˈupa ˈile fˈimbo jˌake tʃˈini mbˈele ja farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, nˈajo ikˈawa ɲˈoka.|0
farˈao nˌaje ˌakawaˈita wˈatu wˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa na watʃˈawi na waɡˈaŋɡa wa kimˈisri, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa sˈiri ja uɡˈaŋɡa wˈao.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalitˈupa fˈimbo jˌake tʃˈini, nˈajo ikˈawa ɲˈoka. lakˈini fˈimbo ja arˈoni ˌikazimˈeza zˈile fˈimbo zˈao.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mˈojo wa farˈao ukˈawa mɡˈumu, nˌaje hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza mˈose na arˈoni, sˌawasˈawa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mˈojo wa farˈao ni mɡˈumu, ˌanakatˈaa kˌuwaatʃˈia wˈatu kˌuondˈoka.|0
nˈenda kwa farˈao ˌasubˈuhi wakˈati ˌanapokwˈenda mtˈoni. ŋɡˈoɟa ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa naˈili ˌili ˌuonˈane nˈaje, na ˌutʃukˈue mkonˈoni mwˈako fˈimbo ˈile ˌilijˌobadilˈiʃwa kˌuwa ɲˈoka.|0
kˈiʃa ˌumwambˈie, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia, ˌamenitˈuma nˌikuambˈie: wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili wapˈate kˌuniabˈudu ɟaŋɡwˈani. lakˈini hˌadi sˈasa hˌuɟasˌikilˈiza.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: kwa hˈili ˌutaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana: fˈimbo ilˈijo mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu nˌitapˈiɡa nˈajo mˈaɟi ja naˈili nˈajo jˌatabˌadilˈika kˌuwa dˈamu.|0
samˈaki wˌaliˈomo katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili wˌatakˈufa, nˌao ˈm̩to ˌutanˈuka vibˈaja, wamˈisri hˌawatawˈeza kˈuɲua hˈajo mˈaɟi jˈake..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mwambˈie arˈoni, tʃukˈua ˈile fˈimbo jˈako ˌuɲoˈoʃe mkˈono wˈako ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi ja mˈisri, ɟˌuːja tʃemtʃˈemi na mˌiferˈeɟi, ɟˌuːja madˈimbwi na mabwˈawa jˈote, nˈavjo vˌitabˌadilˈika kˌuwa dˈamu. dˈamu ˌitakˈuwa kˈila mahˈali katˌika mˈisri, hˌata kwˈeɲe vjˈombo vja mˈiti na vja mˈawe.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza. ˌakainˈua fˈimbo jˌake matʃˈoni pa farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kˌujapˈiɡa mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to naˈili, na mˈaɟi jˈote jˌakabˌadilˈika kˌuwa dˈamu.|0
samˈaki katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili wakˈafa, nˌao ˈm̩to ˌukanˈuka vibˈaja sˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba wamˈisri hˌawakuwˈeza kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˈake. dˈamu ˌilikˈuwa kˈila mahˈali katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
lakˈini waɡˈaŋɡa wa mˈisri kwa kˌutumˈia sˈiri ja uɡˈaŋɡa wˌao wˌakafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo, nˌao mˈojo wa farˈao ukˈawa mɡˈumu, hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza mˈose na arˈoni, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
badˈala jˈake, farˈao ˌakaɡeˈuka, ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme, wˈala hˌakulitˈia hˈili mojˈoni.|0
nˌao wamˈisri wˈote wˌakatʃˈimba kˌandokˈando ja ˈm̩to naˈili kupˈata mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakuwˈeza kˈuɲua mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to.|0
zˌilipˈita sˈiku sˈaba baˌada ja bwˈana kˌujapˈiɡa mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to naˈili.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˈenda kwa farˈao ˌukamwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili wapˈate kˌuniabˈudu.|0
kˌama ˌukikatˈaa kˌuwaruhˈusu kˌuondˈoka, bˌasi nˌitaipˈiɡa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˈote kwa kˌuwaletˈea vjˈura.|0
ˈm̩to naˈili ˌutafurˈika vjˈura. wˌatakˈuɟa kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba lˈako la kifˈalme na katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈako tʃa kulˈala na kˌitandˈani mwˈako, katˌika ɲˈumba za mˌaafˈisa wˈako na kwa wˈatu wˈako, vjˈura hˈao wˌataiŋɡˈia katˌika mˈeko jˈenu na kwˈeɲe vjˈombo vja kˌukandˈia ˈuŋɡa.|0
vjˈura wˌatapˈanda ɟˈuu jˈako, ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈako na mˌaafˈisa wˈako wˈote..|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mwambˈie arˈoni, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako ukˈiwa na ˈile fˈimbo jˈako ɟˌuːja viɟˈito, mˌiferˈeɟi na madˈimbwi, fˈaɲa vjˈura wˈaɟe ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri..|0
ndˈipo arˈoni ˌakaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi ja mˈisri, nˌao vjˈura wˌakatokˈea na kˌuifunˈika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
lakˈini waɡˈaŋɡa wˌakafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa sˈiri ja uɡˈaŋɡa wˈao, nˌao pˈia wˌakafˈaɲa vjˈura kˈuɟa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakamwˈita mˈose na arˈoni na kusˈema, mwombˈeni bwˈana ˌawaondˈoe vjˈura kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu na kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitawˌaatʃˈia wˈatu wˈenu waˈende kˌumtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu.|0
