mˈose ˌakamwambˈia farˈao, nˌinakˈupa heʃˈima ja kˌuamˈua ni wakˈati ɡˈani wa kˌukuombˈea wˈewe, mˌaafˈisa wˈako na wˈatu wˈako ˌili kwˌamba vjˈura watˈoke kwˈenu na kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba zˈenu. ˌisipokˈuwa wˈale walˈio katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili.|0
farˈao ˌakasˈema, kˈeʃo. mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌitakˈuwa kˌama ˌunavjosˈema, ˌili upˈate kuɟˈua kwˌamba hakˈuna jejˈote kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
vjˈura wˌataondˈoka kwˈako na katˌika ɲˈumba zˈako, kwa mˌaafˈisa wˈako na kwa wˈatu wˈako, ˈila wˌatabakˈia katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili tˈu.|0
baˌada ja mˈose na arˈoni kˌuondˈoka kwa farˈao, mˈose ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana kuhˈusu vjˈura ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewalˈeta kwa farˈao.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa lˈile mˈose ˌalilomwˈomba. vjˈura wˌakafˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba, vˌiwaɲɟˈani na mˌaʃambˈani.|0
wˌakajˌakusˈaɲa malˈundo, ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima ˌikanˈuka.|0
lakˈini farˈao ˌalipoˈona pˌametokˈea nafˈuu, ˌakaˌuʃupˈaza mˈojo wˌake na hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza mˈose na arˈoni, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mwambˈie arˈoni, ɲoˈoʃa fˈimbo jˈako ˌujapˈiɡe mavˈumbi ja ˈarði, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri mavˈumbi jˌatakˈuwa vˌirobˈoto.|0
wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo, arˈoni ˌalipˌoɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe fˈimbo na kˌujapˈiɡa mavˈumbi ja ˈn̩tʃi, vˌirobˈoto wˌakawaɟˈia wˈatu na waɲˈama. mavˈumbi jˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri jakˈawa vˌirobˈoto.|0
lakˈini waɡˈaŋɡa wˌalipˌoɟarˈibu kˌuteŋɡenˈeza vˌirobˈoto kwa sˈiri ja uɡˈaŋɡa wˈao, hˌawakuwˈeza. nˌao vˌirobˈoto wˌalikˈuwa ɟˌuːja wˈatu na waɲˈama.|0
waɡˈaŋɡa wˈale wˌakamwambˈia farˈao, hˈiki ni kidˈole tʃa mˈuŋɡu. lakˈini mˈojo wa farˈao ukˈawa mɡˈumu nˌaje hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjosˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ˈamka mapˈema ˌasubˈuhi na ˌusimˈame mbˈele ja farˈao wakˈati ˌanapokwˈenda mtˈoni nˌawe ˌumwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili wapˈate kˌuniabˈudu.|0
kˌama hˌutawˌaatʃˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaondˈoke nˌitakˌupelekˈea makˈundi ja maˈinzi ɟˈuu jˈako, kwa mˌaafˈisa wˈako, kwa wˈatu wˈako na kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba zˈenu. ɲˈumba za wamˈisri zˌitaɟˈazwa maˈinzi, hˌata na ˈarði jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
lakˈini sˈiku ˈile nˌitafˈaɲa kˈitu tˌofaˈuti katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni, ambˈapo wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanaˈiʃi, hˌapatˌakuwˈepo na makˈundi ja maˈinzi, ˌili mpˈate kuɟˈua kwˌamba mˈimi, bwˈana, nˈiko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii.|0
nˌitawˈeka tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na wˈatu wˈenu. iʃˈara hˌii ja aɟˈabu ˌitatokˈea kˈeʃo..|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. makˈundi makˈubwa ja maˈinzi jˌalimˌiminˈika katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la farˈao na katˌika ɲˈumba za mˌaafˈisa wˈake, pˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri ˌikahˌaribˈiwa na maˈinzi.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakamwˈita mˈose na arˈoni na kˌuwaambˈia, nendˈeni mkˌamtolˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ðabˈihu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakamwambˈia, hˌilo hˌalitakˈuwa sˈawa. ðabˈihu tˌutakˌazomtolˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu zˌitakˈuwa tʃukˈizo kwa wamˈisri. kˌama tˌukitˈoa ðabˈihu ambˈazo ni tʃukˈizo mbˈele jˈao, ɟˈe, hˌawatˌatupˈiɡa mˈawe.|0
ni lazˈima twˈende mwˈendo wa sˈiku tˈatu mpˈaka tufˈike ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌili tˌumtolˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ðabˈihu, kˌama ˌalivjˌotuaɡˈiza.|0
farˈao ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitawˌaruhˈusu mwˈende kˌumtolˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ðabˈihu hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, lakˈini hˈamna ruhˈusa kwˈenda mbˈali sˈana. sˈasa mnˌiombˈee.|0
mˈose ˌakaɟˈibu, mˈara tu nˌitakˌapoondˈoka, nˌitamwˈomba bwˈana na kˈeʃo maˈinzi jˌataondˈoka kwa farˈao, kwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kwa wˈatu wˈake. hˌakikˈiʃa tu kwˌamba farˈao hˌatatˈenda kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu tˈena kwa kˌutokˌuwaatʃˈia wˈatu waˈende kˌumtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakamwˈatʃa farˈao na kumwˈomba bwˈana.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa lˈile mˈose ˌalilomwˈomba. maˈinzi jˌakaondˈoka kwa farˈao, kwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kwa wˈatu wˈake, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata ˈinzi ˌalijˌebakˈia.|0
lakˈini wakˈati hˈuu pˈia farˈao ˌakaˌuʃupˈaza mˈojo wˈake, wˈala hˌakuwˌaruhˈusu wˌaisraˈeli wˌaondˈoke.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˈenda kwa farˈao ˌukamwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia ˌasemˈalo: wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende ˌili wapˈate kˌuniabˈudu.|0
kˌama ˌukikatˈaa kˌuwaatʃˈia waˈende, nˌawe ˌukiˌendelˈea kˌuwaʃˌikilˈia.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌutalˈeta pˈiɡo bˈaja kwa mifˈuɡo jˈako, ɟˌuːja farˈasi wˈako, pˈunda, ŋɡamˈia, ŋɡˈombe wˈako, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌatawˈeka tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja mifˈuɡo ja ˌisraˈeli na ˈile ja mˈisri, kwˌamba hakˈuna mɲˈama wa mwˌisraˈeli ˌatakˌajekˈufa..|0
bwˈana ˌakawˈeka wakˈati na kusˈema, kˈeʃo bwˈana ˌatalitˈenda hˈili katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata bwˈana ˌakalitˈenda: mifˈuɡo jˈote ja wamˈisri ikˈafa, lakˈini hakˈuna hˌata mɲˈama mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalijekˈufa.|0
farˈao ˌakatˈuma wˈatu kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza, nˌao wˌakakˈuta kˌuwa hakˈuna hˌata mɲˈama mmˈoɟa wa wˌaisraˈeli ˌalijekˈufa. lakˈini mˈojo wa farˈao hˌaukˌukubˈali kˌuwaatʃˈia wˈatu waˈende.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni, tʃˌukuˈeni maɟˈivu ja tanˈuru, nˌaje mˈose ˌajarˈuʃe aŋɡˈani mbˈele ja farˈao.|0
jˌatakˈuwa vˈumbi ɟepˈesi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri, pˈia jˌatatokˈea maɟˈipu jˌeɲe kufˈura ɟˌuːja wˈatu na waɲˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
bˌasi wˌakatʃukˈua maɟˈivu kwˈeɲe tanˈuru na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja farˈao. mˈose ˌakajarˈuʃa hewˈani, nˈajo maɟˈipu jˌeɲe kufˈura jˌakatokˈea mˌiilˈini ˌm̩wa wˈatu na waɲˈama.|0
waɡˈaŋɡa hˌawakuwˈeza kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja mˈose kwa sabˈabu ja maɟˈipu jˈale jˌalijokˈuwa mˌiilˈini m̩wˈao na ɟˌuːja miˈili ja wamˈisri wˈote.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao kˌuwa mɡˈumu, nˌaje hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza mˈose na arˈoni, sˌawasˈawa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ˈamka mapˈema ˌasubˈuhi, ˌusimˈame mbˈele ja farˈao, ˌumwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia: wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili kwˌamba wawˈeze kˌuniabˈudu.|0
ˌau wakˈati hˈuu nˌitalˈeta mapˈiɡo jˈaŋɡu jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ðˈidi jˈako, mˌaafˈisa wˈako na wˈatu wˈako, ˌili upˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine kˌama mˌimi katˌika dunˈia jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa mpˈaka sˈasa nˌiŋɡelikˈuwa nˌimeɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu na kˌukupˈiɡa wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako kwa pˈiɡo ambˈalo lˌiŋɡekˌufutilˈia mbˈali ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
lakˈini nˌimekˌuinˈua wˌewe kwa kusˈudi hˈili hˈasa, ˌili nipˈate kˌukuoɲˈeʃa uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu, na ˌili ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lipˈate kˌutaŋɡˈazwa dˌuniˈani jˈote.|0
bˈado ˌunaˌendelˈea kˌuɟiinˈua ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˈala hutˈaki kˌuwaatʃˈia waˈende.|0
kwa hˈijo, kˈeʃo wakˈati kˌama hˈuu nˌitalˈeta mvˈua m̩bˈaja sˈana ja mˈawe ambˈajo hˌaiɟapˈata kuɲˈeʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ʃˈu sˈiku ˌilipoˈumbwa mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
sˈasa tˈoa ˈamri ˌurudˈiʃe waɲˈama wˈote watˈoke mˌaliʃˈoni na tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo kˈipo mˌaʃambˈani wˈaɟe mpˈaka mahˈali pa ˌusalˈama, kwa sabˈabu mvˈua ja mˈawe ˌitaɲˈeʃa ɟˌuːja kˈila ˈm̩tu na kˈila mɲˈama ambˈaje hˌaɟalˈetwa ndˈani ambˈao bˈado wˈako ɲɟˈe mˌaʃambˈani, nˌao wˌatakˈufa..|0
wˈale mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao ambˈao wˌalilˌioɡˈopa nˈeno la bwˈana wˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kˌuwalˈeta watˈumwa wˌao na mifˈuɡo jˈao ndˈani.|0
lakˈini wˈale wˌaliˌopuˈuza nˈeno la bwˈana wˌakawaˈatʃa watˈumwa wˌao na mifˈuɡo jˈao ʃambˈani.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako kˌuelekˈea aŋɡˈani ˌili kwˌamba mvˈua ja mˈawe iɲˈeʃe ɟˌuːja mˈisri jˈote, ɟˌuːja wˈatu, waɲˈama na ɟˌuːja kˈila kˈitu kˌiotˈatʃo katˌika maʃˈamba ja mˈisri.|0
mvˈua ja mˈawe ˌikaɲˈeʃa na rˈadi ˌikamulˈika pˈote. ikˈawa ðorˈuba ja kutˈiʃa ambˈajo hˌaiɟˌakuwˈako katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ʃˈu ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˈiwe taˈifa.|0
mvˈua ja mˈawe ˌikaharˈibu kˈila kˈitu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kˌilitʃokˈuwa katˌika maʃˈamba, wˈatu na waɲˈama, ˌikaharˈibu kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃoˈota mˌaʃambˈani na kuvˈuɲɟa kˈila ˈm̩ti.|0
mahˈali pekˈee ambˈapo mvˈua ja mˈawe hˌaikuɲˈeʃa ni ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡoʃˈeni, ambˈako wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakawaˈita mˈose na arˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, wakˈati hˈuu nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi. bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, mˌimi na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni wˌakosˈaɟi.|0
mwombˈeni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa tˌumepˈata ŋɡurˈumo na mvˈua za mˈawe za kˌututˈoʃa. nˌitawˌaatʃˈia mwondˈoke; hˌamtahitˈaɟi kuŋɡˈoɟa zaˈidi.|0
mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌitakˌapokˈuwa nˌimetˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, nˌitaɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu kumwˈomba bwˈana. ŋɡurˈumo zˌitakˈoma na hˌapatˌakuwˈepo mvˈua ja mˈawe tˈena, ˌili upˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa, ˈn̩tʃi ni mˈali ja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini nˌinaɟˈua kˌuwa wˌewe na mˌaafˈisa wˈako bˈado hˌammwoɡˈopi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
kitˈani na ʃajˈiri vˌilihˌaribˈiwa, kwa kˌuwa ʃajˈiri ˌilikˈuwa na masˈuke, na kitˈani ˌilikˈuwa katˌika kutˈoa maˈua.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ŋɡˈano na ɟamˈii ɲiŋɡˈine ja ŋɡˈano hˌazikˌuharibˈiwa kwa sabˈabu zˌilikˈuwa hˌaziɟˌakomˈaa bˈado..|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakaondˈoka kwa farˈao ˌakaˈenda ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi. mˈose ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˌake kˌuelekˈea kwa bwˈana, ŋɡurˈumo na mvˈua ja mˈawe vˌikakˈoma, mvˈua hˌaikˌuendelˈea tˈena kuɲˈeʃa n̩tʃˈini.|0
farˈao ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba mvˈua ja mˈawe na ŋɡurˈumo zˌimekˈoma, ˌakafˈaɲa ðˈambi tˈena. jˌeje na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌakafˈaɲa miˈojo jˈao kˌuwa miɡˈumu.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈojo wa farˈao ukˈawa mɡˈumu, wˈala hˌakuwˌaatʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli waˈende, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema kˌupitˈia mˈose.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˈenda kwa farˈao, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeufˈaɲa mˈojo wˌake kˌuwa mɡˈumu na miˈojo ja mˌaafˈisa wˌake ˌili kwˌamba nipˈate kutˈenda iʃˈara hˈizi zˈaŋɡu za aɟˈabu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˌili upˈate kˌuwaelˈeza watˈoto wˈako na wˌaɟukˈuu wˈako ɟˈinsi nˌilivjˌowatendˈea wamˈisri kwa ukˈali na ɟˈinsi nˌilivjofˈaɲa iʃˈara zˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, nˌaɲi mpˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaˈenda kwa farˈao na kˌumwambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaebranˈia, ˌasemˈalo: ˌutaˌendelˈea hˌata lˈini kˌukatˈaa kˌuɲeɲekˈea mbˈele jˈaŋɡu? wˌaatʃˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu waˈende, ˌili wapˈate kˌuniabˈudu.|0
kˌama ˌukikatˈaa kˌuwaatʃˈia waˈende, kˈeʃo nˌitalˈeta nzˈiɡe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako.|0
nˌao wˌatafunˈika ˈuso wa ˈarði hˌata ˌusiˌonekˈane. wˌatatafˈuna mabˈaki matʃˈatʃe jˌalijˌobakˈizwa baˌada ja ˈile mvˈua ja mˈawe, jaˈani pamˈoɟa na kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌunaoˈota katˌika maʃˈamba jˈenu.|0
nzˈiɡe hˈao wˌataɟˈaza ɲˈumba zˈako, za mˌaafˈisa wˈako wˈote na za wamˈisri wˈote. ɟˈambo ambˈalo bˈaba zˈenu wˈala bˈabu zˈenu hˌawaɟapˈata kuˈona ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile wˌalipoˈanza kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii mpˈaka lˈeo hˌii.  ndˈipo mˈose ˌakaɡeˈuka na kumwˈatʃa farˈao.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao wˌakamwambˈia, mpˈaka lˈini hˈuju ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈuwa tˈanzi kwˈetu? wˌaatʃˈie hˈao wˈatu waˈende zˈao, ˌili wapˈate kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao. ɟˈe, bˈado hˌutambˈui kˌuwa mˈisri ˌimeˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakalˈetwa kwa farˈao. farˈao ˌakawˌaambˈia, nendˈeni, mkˌamwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. lakˈini ni nˈani hˈasa wˌatakˌaokwˈenda.|0
mˈose ˌakaɟˈibu, tˌutakwˈenda na viɟˈana wˈetu na wazˈee, pamˈoɟa na wˈana wˈetu na bˈinti zˈetu, pˈia pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo zˈetu, ŋɡˈombe, mbˈuzi, farˈasi na pˈunda kwa sabˈabu tˌutaˌaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu kwa bwˈana.|0
farˈao ˌakasˈema, bwˈana ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, kˌama nˌikiwˌaruhˈusu mwondˈoke pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake wˈenu na watˈoto wˈenu! ni wˈazi kwˌamba ˈm̩na mˌakusˈudi mabˈaja.|0
la hˈaʃa! wˌanaˈume pˈeke jˈao na waˈende, wˌakamwabˈudu bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa hˌilo ndˈilo mmekˈuwa mkiˈomba. kwa hˈijo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaˌondolˈewa mbˈele ja farˈao.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako ɟˌuːja mˈisri ˌili kˈundi la nzˈiɡe liwˈeze kˌuiŋɡˈia ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi na kˌutafˈuna kˈila kˈitu kˌiotˈatʃo katˌika maʃˈamba na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃosˈazwa na ˈile mvˈua ja mˈawe.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakaɲoˈoʃa fˈimbo jˌake ɟˌuːja mˈisri, bwˈana ˌakaulˈeta upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌukavˈuma katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote mtʃˈana wˈote na usˈiku kˈutʃa, kˌufikˈia ˌasubˈuhi upˈepo ukˈawa ˌumelˈeta nzˈiɡe.|0
wˌakaˌivamˈia mˈisri jˈote na kukˈaa kˈila enˈeo la ˈn̩tʃi kwa wˈiŋɡi. kˈamwe hˌapaɟapˈata kuwˈepo pˈiɡo la nzˈiɡe kˌama hˈilo, wˈala hˌalitˌakuwˈepo tˈena.|0
wˌakafunˈika ˈarði jˈote mpˈaka ˈarði ikˈawa ɲeˈusi. wˌakatafˈuna kˈile tʃˈote kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌimebakˈizwa na ˈile mvˈua ja mˈawe, kˈila kˈitu kˌiotˈatʃo mˌaʃambˈani pamˈoɟa na matˈunda kwˈeɲe mˈiti. hakˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa kiɟˈani kˌilitʃˌosalˈia katˌika mˈiti ˌau m̩mˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
farˈao ˌakawaˈita mˈose na arˈoni kwa harˈaka na kˌuwaambˈia, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na ðˈidi jˈenu pˈia.|0
sˈasa ˌunisamˈehe ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu mˈara mˈoɟa tˈena na umwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌaondˈoe pˈiɡo hˈili bˈaja kwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakaondˈoka kwa farˈao ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakaˌuɡeˈuza upˈepo ˌukavˈuma kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi, wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi, ambˈao ˌuliwˌaondˈoa wˈale nzˈiɡe na kˌuwapelˈeka kwˈeɲe bahˈari ja ʃˈamu. hakˈuna nzˈiɡe hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijebˈaki popˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao kˌuwa mɡˈumu, wˈala hˌakuwˌaatʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˌaondˈoke.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako kˌuelekˈea aŋɡˈani ˌili ɡˈiza litˈande katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ɡˈiza ambˈalo wˈatu wˌanawˈeza kˌulipapˈasa na kˌulihˈisi.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake kˌuelekˈea aŋɡˈani, na ɡˈiza nˈene lˌikafunˈika pˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijewˈeza kumwˈona mwenzˈake, wˈala kˌuondˈoka mahˈali ˌalipokˈuwa kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu. lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa na mwˈaŋɡa katˌika mˌaenˈeo jˈao wˌalijokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo farˈao ˌakamwˈita mˈose na kusˈema, nendˈeni, mkˌamwabˈudu bwˈana. hˌata wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˈenu mwawˈeza kwˈenda nˌao pˈia, lakˈini kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe wˈenu wˌaatʃˈeni.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakasˈema, hˈuna bˈudi kˌuturuhˈusu tˈuwe na ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa za kutˈoa mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
sˌisi ni lazˈima tˌuondˈoke na mifˈuɡo jˈetu pˈia, wˈala hakˈuna ukwˈato ˌutakˌaoˈatʃwa ɲˈuma. ˌinatupˈasa kˌutumˈia baˈaði ja hˈijo mifˈuɡo katˌika kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa kˌuwa mpˈaka tˌutakˌapofˈika hˌuko hˌatutakˈuwa tˌumefahˈamu ni nˈini tˌutakˌatʃotumˈia katˌika kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao kˌuwa mɡˈumu, hakˈuwa rˈaði kˌuwaatʃˈia wˌaondˈoke.|0
farˈao ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ondˈoka mbˈele jˈaŋɡu! hˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa hˌutakˈuɟa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu tˈena! sˈiku ˈile ˌutakˌapouˈona ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌutakˈufa.|0
mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, ˈiwe kˌama ˌulivjosˈema! kˈamwe sˌitauˈona ˈuso wˈako tˈena.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose, nˌitalˈeta pˈiɡo mˈoɟa zaˈidi kwa farˈao na katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. baˌada ja hˈilo, ˌatawaˈatʃa mwondˈoke hˈapa na ˌatakˌapofˈaɲa hˈivjo, ˌatawˌafukˈuza mtˈoke kabˈisa.|0
wˌaambˈie wˈatu wˈote waˈume kwa wˌake wˌawaˈombe mˌaɟirˈani zˈao vˈitu vja fˈeða na vja ðahˈabu.|0
bwˈana ˌakawafˈaɲa wamˈisri wˈawe na mˈojo wa ˌukarˈimu kwa wˌaisraˈeli, nˌaje mˈose mweɲˈewe ˌakahˌeʃimˈiwa sˈana na mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao na wˈatu wˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri..|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakasˈema, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: panˈapo usˈiku wa manˈane mˌimi nˌitapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
kˈila mwˌanaˈume kˌifuŋɡˈua mˈimba katˌika mˈisri ˌatakˈufa, kˌuanzˈia mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa farˈao, ˌaketˈije pˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme, hˌadi mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa mtˈumwa wa kˈike, ˌanajesˈaɡa nafˈaka kwa ɟˈiwe, pamˈoɟa na kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mifˈuɡo.|0
pˌatakuwˈepo kilˈio kikˈubwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri, kilˈio kibˈaja ambˈatʃo hˌakiɟˌakuwˈepo wˈala kˈamwe hˌakitˌakuwˈepo tˈena.|0
lakˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli hakˈuna hˌata ˈm̩bwa ˌatakˌajembwekˈea mwˌanadˈamu wˈala mɲˈama jejˈote. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana huwˈeka tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja mˈisri na ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˌaafˈisa hˈawa wˈako wˈote wˌataniɟˈia, wˌakisuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, wˌakisˈema, ondˈoka, wˌewe pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako wˈote wˌanaˌokufuˈata! baˌada ja hˈaja nˌitaondˈoka. kˈiʃa mˈose, hˈuku akˈiwa ˌamewˈaka hasˈira, ˌakamwˈatʃa farˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose, farˈao ˌatakatˈaa kˌukusˌikilˈiza, ˌili mˌaaɟˈabu jˈaŋɡu japˈate kˌuoŋɡezˈeka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakafˈaɲa mˌaaɟˈabu hˈaja jˈote mbˈele ja farˈao, lakˈini bwˈana ˌakaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao kˌuwa mɡˈumu, wˈala hˌakuwˌaatʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˌaondˈoke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
mwˈezi hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa mwˈanzo wa miˈezi kwˈenu, jaˈani mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wa mwˈaka wˈenu.|0
ˌiambˈie ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli kwˌamba katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi hˈuu, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatatwˈaa mwˌanakondˈoo mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja fˌamilˈia jˈake, mmˈoɟa kwa kˈila ɲˈumba.|0
ikˈiwa ɲˈumba jojˈote ˈina wˈatu watʃˈatʃe wˌasiowˈeza kˌumalˈiza hˈujo mwˌanakondˈoo mzˈima, ɲˈumba hˈijo ˌitabˈidi ˌiʃirˌikiˈane na ɲˈumba ja ɟirˈani wa karˈibu, baˌada ja kˌuziŋɡatˈia idˈadi ja wˈatu wˌaliˈomo. mtˌaaŋɡalˈia ni kiˈasi ɡˈani tʃa ɲˈama kˌitahˌitaɟˈika kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌahitˈaɟi ja kˈila ˈm̩tu.|0
waɲˈama mtˌakaˌowatʃaɡˈua, lazˈima wˈawe wa kiˈume wa ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa wˌasiokˈuwa na dosˈari, mwawˈeza kˌuwatʃukˈua kˈati ja kondˈoo ˌau mbˈuzi.|0
tunzˈeni waɲˈama hˈao mpˈaka sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi, ambˈapo lazˈima wˈatu wa ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli watʃˈiɲɟe waɲˈama hˈao wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni.|0
ndˈipo wˌatakˌapotʃukˈua baˈaði ja hˈijo dˈamu na kˌuipˈaka kwˈeɲe vˌiziŋɡˈiti vja ɟˈuu na miˈimo ja milˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba ambˈamo wˌatakˈula wˌanakondˈoo hˈao.|0
usˈiku hˈuo hˈuo wˌatakˈula ɲˈama ˌilijoˈokwa kwˈeɲe mˈoto, pamˈoɟa na mbˈoɡa tʃˈuŋɡu za maɟˈani na mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
msˈile ɲˈama mbˈitʃi wˈala ˌilijotʃˈemʃwa, lakˈini ˈiwe ˌimeˈokwa kwˈeɲe mˈoto, kˈitʃwa, miɡˈuu na ɲˈama zˌake za ndˈani.|0
msˌibakˈize ɲˈama jojˈote mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi; nˈazo kˌama zˌitabakˈia mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi, lazˈima mzˌiteketˈeze kwa mˈoto.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjokˈula: mtˌaɟifˈuŋɡa mikˈanda vˌiunˈoni, mtakˈuwa mmevˈaa viˈatu vjˈenu mˌiɡuˈuni na kuʃˈika fˈimbo zˈenu mkonˈoni mwˈenu. ˈm̩le kwa harˈaka; hˌii ni pasˈaka ja bwˈana.|0
usˈiku hˈuo hˈuo nˌitapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja mˈisri na kˌumuˈua kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, wa wˌanadˈamu na wa waɲˈama, nˌami nˌitaˌihukˈumu miˈuŋɡu jˈote ja mˈisri. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
dˈamu ˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara kwa aɟˈili jˈenu ja kˌuoɲˈeʃa ɲˈumba ambˈazo mtˌakuwˈamo; nˌami nˌitakˌapoiˈona dˈamu, nˌitapˈita ɟˈuu jˈenu. hakˈuna pˈiɡo la ˌuharibˈifu lˌitakˌalowaɡˈusa nˈiɲi nˌitakˌapoipˈiɡa mˈisri.|0
sˈiku hˌii ˌitakˈuwa kˌumbukˈumbu kwˈenu, mtˌaiˌaðimˈiʃa kˌuwa sˌikukˈuu kwa bwˈana, katˌika vizˈazi vjˈenu vjˈote: mtˌaiʃˈika kˌuwa ˈamri ja kudˈumu.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu. katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza mtˌaondˈoa tʃˈatʃu jˈote ndˈani ja ɲˈumba zˈenu, kwa maˈana jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈula tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ja kwˈanza hˌadi ja sˈaba lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na kˌusaɲˈiko ɟiŋɡˈine katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba. katˌika sˈiku hˈizo msifˈaɲe kˈazi kˈamwe ˌisipokˈuwa kˌutajarˈiʃa tʃakˈula tʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa; hˌilo ndˈilo tu mtˌakalofˈaɲa.|0
mtˌaaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, kwa sabˈabu hˈijo n̩dˈijo sˈiku ˈile nˌilijˌovitˈoa vikˈosi vjˈenu kutˈoka mˈisri. mtˌaiˌaðimˈiʃa sˈiku hˌii kwa vizˈazi vjˈenu vjˈote kˌuwa ˈamri ja kudˈumu.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, kˌuanzˈia ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne hˌadi ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na mˈoɟa.|0
kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba ˌisiˌonekˈane tʃˈatʃu jojˈote katˌika ɲˈumba zˈenu. jejˈote alˈaje tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu ndˈani jˈake, lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali kutˈoka ɟˌumuˈija ja ˌisraˈeli, akˈiwa ni mɡˈeni ˌau mzˈawa.|0
msˈile tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu. popˈote mˌuiʃˈipo, ni lazˈima ˈm̩le mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakawaˈita wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwaambˈia, nendˈeni mˈara mˈoɟa mkˌatʃaɡˈue waɲˈama kwa aɟˈili ja ɟamˈaa zˈenu, mkatʃˈiɲɟe mwˌanakondˈoo wa pasˈaka.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni kitˈawi tʃa hisˈopo, kˌitʃovjˈeni kwˈeɲe dˈamu ˌilijˈopo kwˈeɲe sinˈia na kˌuipˈaka baˈaði ja hˈijo dˈamu kwˈeɲe vˌiziŋɡˈiti na kwˈeɲe miˈimo jˈote miwˈili ja milˈaŋɡo. ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasitˈoke ɲɟˈe ja mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba jˌake mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
bwˈana ˌapitˈapo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote kˌuwapˈiɡa wamˈisri, ˌataiˈona dˈamu ɟˌuːja vˌiziŋɡˈiti na kwˈeɲe miˈimo ja milˈaŋɡo, nˌaje ˌatapˈita ɟˈuu, wˈala hˌatamruhˈusu mwˌaŋɡamˈizi kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ɲˈumba zˈenu na kˌuwapˈiɡa nˈiɲi.|0
ʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˈawe kanˈuni ja kudˈumu kwˈenu na kwa aɟˈili ja wazˈao wˈenu.|0
mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi bwˈana ˌatakˌajowˈapa kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, ʃikˈeni destˈuri hˌii.|0
watˈoto wˈenu wˌatakˌapowˌaulˈiza, sˌikukˈuu hˌii ˈina maˈana ɡˈani kwˈenu?.|0
bˌasi wˌaambiˈeni, hˌii ni ðabˈihu ja pasˈaka kwa bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌalipˈita ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba za wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na hˌakuðˈuru ɲˈumba zˈetu ˌalipˌowapˈiɡa wamˈisri.  ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipˌosuɟˈudu na kˌuabˈudu.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose na arˈoni.|0
ˌilipofˈika usˈiku wa manˈane, bwˈana ˌakawapˈiɡa wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wˈote katˌika mˈisri, kˌuanzˈia mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa farˈao, mrˈiθi wa kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme, hˌadi mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mfˈuŋɡwa, ˌalijekˈuwa ɡˌerezˈani, na wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mifˈuɡo jˈote pˈia.|0
farˈao, na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote, na wamˈisri wˈote wˌakaˈamka usˈiku, na kˌulikˈuwa na kilˈio kikˈubwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kwa kˌuwa hˌaikuwˈepo ɲˈumba ambˈajo hakˈufa ˈm̩tu.|0
wakˈati hˈuo farˈao ˌakawaˈita mˈose na arˈoni na kˌuwaambˈia, ˌondokˈeni! tokˈeni kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli! nendˈeni mkˌamwabˈudu bwˈana kˌama mlˌivjoˈomba.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni makˈundi jˈenu ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈombe, kˌama mlˌivjosˈema, nˌaɲi mwˈende zˈenu. nˌaɲi pˈia mnˌibarˈiki.|0
wamˈisri wˌakawˌahimˈiza wˌaisraˈeli wˌaondˈoke kwa harˈaka na kuˈatʃa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao. kwa kˌuwa wˌalisˈema, la sˈivjo, tˌutakˈufa wˈote.|0
hˈivjo wˈatu wˌakatʃukˈua dˈoŋɡe lˈao la ˈuŋɡa kˈabla ja kutˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, wˌakawˈeka ndˈani ja mˌabakˈuli ja kˌukandˈia, wˌakajˌaviriŋɡˈiʃa katˌika vˌitambˈaa na kˌujabˈeba mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌowaˌelekˈeza, nˌao wˌakawaˈomba wamˈisri wˌawapatˈie vˈitu vja fˈeða, ðahˈabu na ŋɡˈuo.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewafˈaɲa wamˈisri kˌuwa wˌakarˈimu kwa hˈawa wˈatu, wˌakawˌapatˈia wˌaisraˈeli vˈile wˌalivjotˈaka kwˈao; kwa hˈijo wˌakawatˈeka ɲˈara wamˈisri.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasafˈiri kutˈoka rˌamesˈesi mpˈaka sukˈoθi. wˌalikuwˈepo wˌanaˈume wˌapatˈao mˌiasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaendˈao kwa miɡˈuu bˌila kˌuhesˈabu wˌanawˈake na watˈoto.|0
wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈeŋɡi wˌakafˌuatˈana nˈao, pamˈoɟa na makˈundi makˈubwa ja mifˈuɡo wˌakiwˈemo kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe.|0
wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌaandˈazi jˌasijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kwa ˈule ˈuŋɡa ˌuliokˈandwa wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameutˈoa mˈisri, dˈoŋɡe hˌilo la ˈuŋɡa hˌalikˈuwa lˌimetˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌondolˈewa mˈisri kwa harˈaka nˌao hˌawakˈuwa na mˈuda wa kˌuandˈaa tʃakˈula tʃˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈiʃi mˈisri kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa θeleθˈini.|0
ˌilikˈuwa ni sˈiku ja mwˈiʃo ja hˈijo miˈaka mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa θeleθˈini, vikˈosi vjˈote vja bwˈana vˌilipokˈuwa vˌimeondˈoka mˈisri.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌaliutˈeŋɡa usˈiku ˈule ˌili kˌuwatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, katˌika usˈiku hˈuu wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌanapˈaswa kˌuaðimˈiʃa kwa kukˈeʃa ˌili kˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana katˌika vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni, hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kwa aɟˈili ja pasˈaka: mɡˈeni hˌatarˌuhusˈiwa kˈula pasˈaka.|0
mtˈumwa jejˈote ambˈaje mmˌemnunˈua awˈeza kuˈila kˌama mmˌemtahˈiri.|0
lakˈini kˌibarˈua jejˈote ˌau msafˈiri hˌaruhusˈiwi kˈula.|0
ʃˈarti ilˈiwe ndˈani ja ɲˈumba; msˌitʃukˈue ɲˈama jojˈote ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba hˈijo. msˌiuvˈuɲɟe mfˈupa wowˈote.|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ni lazˈima wˌaiˌaðimˈiʃe pasˈaka hˈijo.|0
mɡˈeni ˌaiʃˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ambˈaje ˌanatˈaka kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka ja bwˈana ni lazˈima wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliˈomo ɲumbˈani mwˈake wˈawe wˌametˌahirˈiwa, ndˈipo awˈeze kˌuʃirˈiki kˌama mzˈawa. mwˌanaˈume jejˈote ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa hˌaruhusˈiwi kuˈila.|0
ʃerˈia ˈijo hˈijo ˌitamuhˈusu mzˈawa na mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalifˈaɲa kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose na arˈoni.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile bwˈana ˌakawatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa vikˈosi vjˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
nˌiwekeˈeni wˈakfu kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume. kˈila mtˈoto wa kwˈanza alˈije kˌifuŋɡˈua tˈumbo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu, akˈiwa wa mwˌanadˈamu ˌau wa mɲˈama.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, ˌikumbukˈeni sˈiku hˌii, sˈiku ambˈajo mlitˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌaliwatˈoa hˈumo kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu. msˈile tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
lˈeo, katˌika mwˈezi wa abˈibu, mnatˈoka.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˌapokulˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈako kukˈupa, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˌutaˌiaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu hˌii katˌika mwˈezi hˈuu.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba ˌutakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu na katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌutamfaɲˈia bwˈana sˌikukˈuu.|0
kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba ˌutakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, pˌasiˌonekˈane kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo na tʃˈatʃu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako, wˈala tʃˈatʃu jojˈote ˌisiˌonekˈane popˈote ndˈani ja mipˈaka jˈako.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˌutamwambˈia mwanˈao, nafˈaɲa hˈivi kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈambo ambˈalo bwˈana ˌalinˌitendˈea nˌilipotˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri..|0
ˌaðimˈiʃo hˈili, lˌitakˈuwa kˌama alˈama kwˈeɲe mkˈono wˈako na ˌukumbˈuʃo katˌika pˈaɟi lˈako la ˈuso, kwˌamba ʃerˈia ja bwˈana ˌinapˈaswa ˈiwe kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ni lazˈima ˌuiʃˈike ˈamri hˌii kwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa mwˈaka baˌada ja mwˈaka.|0
baˌada ja bwˈana kˌukuiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani na kukˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, kˌama ˌalivjˌokuahˈidi kwa kiˈapo na kwa bˈaba zˈako.|0
ˌinakupˈasa kˌumtolˈea bwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kˈila tˈumbo. wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa mifˈuɡo jˈako ni mˈali ja bwˈana.|0
kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa pˈunda ˌutamkombˈoa kwa mwˌanakondˈoo, lakˈini kˌama hˌukumkombˈoa, ˌutamvˈuɲɟa ʃˈiŋɡo jˈake. kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza mwˌanaˈume mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈana wˈenu ˌutamkombˈoa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, mwanˈao ˌakikˌuulˈiza, hˌii ˈina maˈana ɡˈani? mwambˈie, kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu bwˈana ˌalitutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
farˈao ˌalipˌokatˈaa kwa ˌukaˈidi kˌuturuhˈusu kˌuondˈoka, bwˈana ˌaliˈua kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa wamˈisri, mwˌanadˈamu na wa mɲˈama. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌinatˈoa ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume, wa kˈila tˈumbo na kˌumkombˈoa kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa wˈana wˈaŋɡu..|0
ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitakˈuwa kˌama iʃˈara kwˈeɲe mkˈono wˈako na kˌama alˈama kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi la ˈuso wˈako, kwˌamba bwˈana ˌalikutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
farˈao ˌalipˌowaatʃˈia wˈatu waˈende, mˈuŋɡu hˌakuwˌaoŋɡˈoza kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ˌipitiˈajo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti, iŋɡˈawa ɲɟˈia hˈijo ˌilikˈuwa fˈupi zaˈidi. kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalisˈema, wˌakikˌabiliˈana na vˈita, wˌanawˈeza kˌubadˈili mawˈazo jˈao na kurˈudi mˈisri.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu kˌupitˈia ɲɟˈia ja kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kˌupitˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani, kˌuelekˈea bahˈari ja ʃˈamu. wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˈanda kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri wakˈiwa wˌameɟˌiandˈaa kwa vˈita.|0
mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua mifˈupa ja josˈefu kwa sabˈabu josˈefu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaapˈiʃa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia, hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˈuɟa kˌuwasˌaidˈia, nˌaɲi ni lazˈima mwˌiitʃukˈue mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu mwˈende nˈajo kutˈoka mahˈali hˈapa.|0
baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌuondˈoka sukˈoθi wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko eθˈamu pembˈeni ˌm̩wa ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
wakˈati wa mtʃˈana bwˈana ˌaliwˌataŋɡulˈia kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈao, na wakˈati wa usˈiku ˌaliwˌataŋɡulˈia kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto kˌuwaˌaŋɡazˈia, ˌili wawˈeze kˌusafˈiri mtʃˈana ˌau usˈiku.|0
ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu wakˈati wa mtʃˈana ˌau ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto wakˈati wa usˈiku hˌaikˌuondˈoka mahˈali pˈake mbˈele ja wˈatu.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli wˌaɡeˈuke ɲˈuma na wapˈiɡe kˈambi karˈibu na pˈi hˌahirˈoθi, kˈati ja miɡdˈoli na bahˈari. wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja bahˈari, mkabˈala na bˈaal sefˈoni.|0
farˈao ˌatafikˈiri kwˌamba, hˈao wˌaisraˈeli wˌanatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kwa kˌutʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈiwa, nˈalo ɟˈaŋɡwa lˌimewˌafuŋɡˈia..|0
nˌami nˌitaufˈaɲa mˈojo wa farˈao mɡˈumu, nˌaje ˌatawˌafuˌatilˈia. lakˈini nˌitaɟˌipatˈia ˌutukˈufu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kˌupitˈia farˈao na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, nˌao wamˈisri wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana. kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa wˌaisraˈeli wˌamekimbˈia, farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌakabadˈili nˈia zˈao kuhˈusu wˌaisraˈeli, wˌakasˈema, tˌumefˈaɲa nˈini? tˌumewˌaatʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli waˈende zˈao na tˌumeukˈosa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaˌandalˈiwa ɡˈari lˈake la vˈita, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakaufˈaɲa mɡˈumu mˈojo wa farˈao, mfˈalme wa mˈisri, kwa hˈijo ˌakawˌafuatˈia wˌaisraˈeli, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiondˈoka mˈisri kwa ˌuɟasˈiri.|0
nˌao wamˈisri, jaˈani farˈasi wˈote wa farˈao na maɡˈari ja vˈita, wapˈanda farˈasi na vikˈosi vja askˈari, wˌakawˌafuatˈia wˌaisraˈeli, wˌakawakˈuta karˈibu na pˈi hˌahirˈoθi, mkabˈala na bˈaal sefˈoni wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja bahˈari.|0
farˈao ˌalipˌokaribˈia, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakainˈua mˈatʃo jˈao, wˌakawaˈona wamˈisri wakˈiɟa ɲˈuma jˈao. wˌakaʃˈikwa na hˈofu, wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana.|0
wˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɟˈe, ni kwˌamba hˌajakuwˈako mˌakabˈuri hˌuko mˈisri hˌata ˌumetulˈeta tˈufe hˈuku ɟaŋɡwˈani? ˌumetˌufaɲˈia nˈini kˌututˈoa mˈisri.|0
hˌatukˌukuambˈia tˌulipokˈuwa hˌuko mˈisri, tuˈatʃe tˌuwatˌumikˈie wamˈisri? ˌiŋɡekˈuwa vjˈema zaˈidi kwˈetu kˌuwatˌumikˈia wamˈisri kulˈiko kˈufa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
mˈose ˌakawaɟˈibu wˌaisraˈeli, msˌioɡˈope. sˌimamˈeni imˈara, nˌaɲi mtˌauˈona wokˈovu bwˈana ˌatakˌaowˌapatˈia lˈeo. hˈao wamˈisri mnˌaowaˈona lˈeo kˈamwe hˌamtawaˈona tˈena.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌapiɡanˈia nˈiɲi, nˌaɲi mnˌatakˈiwa kˌutulˈia tˈu.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, kwa nˈini wˌewe ˌunanˌililˈia? wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli wˌaendelˈee mbˈele.|0
inˈua fˈimbo jˈako na ˌuɲoˈoʃe mkˈono wˈako ɟˌuːja bahˈari ˌili kˌujaɡˈawa mˈaɟi, hˈivjo kwˌamba wˌaisraˈeli wapˈate kupˈita mahˈali pakˈavu bˌaharˈini.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa miˈojo ja wamˈisri kˌuwa miɡˈumu kusˈudi wˌaiŋɡˈie bˌaharˈini wˌakiwˌafuatˈia. nˌami nˌitaɟˌipatˈia ˌutukˈufu kˌupitˈia farˈao pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, kˌupitˈia maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi wˈake.|0
nˌao wamˈisri wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌitakˌapoɟˌipatˈia ˌutukˈufu kˌupitˈia farˈao, maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi wˈake.|0
ndˈipo mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakisafˈiri mbˈele ja ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli, ˌakaondˈoka ˌakakˈaa ɲˈuma jˈao. pˈia ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu ˌikaondˈoka hˈapo mbˈele jˈao na kˌusimˈama ɲˈuma.|0
ˌikakˈaa kˈati ja maɟˈeʃi ja mˈisri na ˌisraˈeli. usˈiku kˈutʃa wˈiŋɡu lˌikalˈeta ɡˈiza upˈande mmˈoɟa na nˈuru kwa upˈande mwiŋɡˈine, kwa hˈijo hakˈuna ˌalijˌemkaribˈia mwenzˈake usˈiku kˈutʃa.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja bahˈari, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakajˌasukˈuma mˈaɟi ja bahˈari ɲˈuma kwa upˈepo mkˈali wa mˌaʃarˈiki usˈiku ˈule wˈote na kˌupafˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu. mˈaɟi jˌakaɡˌawaɲˈika.|0
nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈita bˌaharˈini mahˈali pakˈavu, mˈaɟi jakˈiwa ukˈuta upˈande wˌao wa kuˈume na upˈande wˌao wa kuʃˈoto.|0
wamˈisri wˌakawˌafuatˈia ndˈani ja bahˈari, pamˈoɟa na farˈasi wˈote wa farˈao, maɡˈari ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi.|0
kˌaribˈia mˌapambazˈuko, bwˈana ˌakalˌiaŋɡalˈia ɟˈeʃi la wamˈisri kutˈoka ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto na ja wˈiŋɡu, ˌakalˌifaðaˈiʃa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakajˌaondˈoa mˌaɡurudˈumu ja maɡˈari jˈao, kwa hˈivjo wˌakajˌaendˈeʃa kwa ʃˈida. nˌao wamˈisri wˌakasˈema, tˌuatʃˈane na wˌaisraˈeli! bwˈana ˌanawˌapiɡanˈia ðˈidi ja mˈisri.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako ɟˌuːja bahˈari ˌili mˈaɟi jˌarudiˈane jˌawafunˈike wamˈisri, maɡˈari jˈao ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi wˈao.|0
mˈose ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja bahˈari, wakˈati wa mˌapambazˈuko bahˈari ˌikarˌudiˈana na kˌuwa kˌama kˌawaˈida. wamˈisri wˌakaɟarˈibu kˌujakimbˈia mˈaɟi, lakˈini bwˈana ˌakawˌasukumˈia ndˈani ja bahˈari.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakarˌudiˈana na kˌujafunˈika maɡˈari ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la farˈao lˌililokˈuwa lˌimewˌafuˈata wˌaisraˈeli ndˈani ja bahˈari. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌalijˌenusurˈika.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈita bˌaharˈini mahˈali pakˈavu, ˌukiwˈepo ukˈuta wa mˈaɟi upˈande wˌao wa kuˈume na upˈande wˌao wa kuʃˈoto.|0
sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌakawˌaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wamˈisri, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawaˈona wamˈisri wˌamelˈala ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari wakˈiwa wˌamekˈufa.|0
bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipoˈona uwˈezo mkˈubwa bwˈana ˌaliˌoðihirˈiʃa ðˈidi ja wamˈisri, wˈatu wˌakamwoɡˈopa bwˈana na wˌakawˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao kwˈake na kwa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamwimbˈia bwˈana wˈimbo hˈuu: nˌitamwimbˈia bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ˌametukˈuzwa sˈana. farˈasi na mpˈanda farˈasi ˌamewatˈosa bˌaharˈini.|0
bwˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu na wˈimbo wˈaŋɡu; ˌamekˈuwa wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu. jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitamsˈifu, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitamtukˈuza.|0
bwˈana ni ʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita; bwˈana ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
maɡˈari ja vˈita ja farˈao na ɟˈeʃi lˈake ˌamewatˈosa bˌaharˈini. mˌaafˈisa wa farˈao walˈio bˈora sˈana wˌamezamˈiʃwa katˌika bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
mˈaɟi jˌeɲe kˈina jˌamewˌafunˈika, wˌamezˈama mpˈaka vˌilindˈini kˌama ɟˈiwe.|0
mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, ˈee bwˈana ˌulitukˈuka kwa uwˈeza. mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, ˈee bwˈana, ˌukampˈonda adˈui.|0
katˌika ukˈuu wa ˌutukˈufu wˈako, ˌukawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini wˈale wˌaliˌokupˈiŋɡa. ˌuliatʃˈia hasˈira jˈako kˈali, ˌikawˌateketˈeza kˌama kˈapi.|0
kwa pˈumzi ja pˈua zˈako mˈaɟi jˌaliɟˌilundˈika. mawˈimbi ja mˈaɟi jˌakasimˈama imˈara kˌama ukˈuta, vilˈindi vˌikaɡˌandamˈana ndˈani ja mˈojo wa bahˈari.|0
adˈui ˌaliɟivˈuna, nˌitawˌafuatˈia, nˌitawapˈata. nˌitaɡawˈaɲa ɲˈara; nˌitaɟˌiʃibˈiʃa kwa wˈao. nˌitafˈuta upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu na mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza..|0
lakˈini ˌulipulˈiza kwa pˈumzi jˈako, bahˈari ˌikawˌafunˈika. wˌakazˈama kˌama risˈasi kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu.|0
ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa miˈuŋɡu alˈije kˌama wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana? ni nˈani kˌama wˈewe: ˌulijˌetukˈuka katˌika ˌutakatˈifu, ˌutiʃˈaje katˌika ˌutukˈufu, ˌukitˈenda mˌaaɟˈabu.|0
ˌuliˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume na ˈn̩tʃi ˌikawamˈeza.|0
katˌika upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma ˌutawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu ˌuliˌowakombˈoa. katˌika ŋɡˈuvu zˈako ˌutawˌaoŋɡˈoza mpˈaka makˈao jˈako mˌatakatˈifu.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌatasikˈia na kˌutetemˈeka, utʃˈuŋɡu ˌutawˌakamˈata wˈatu wa ˌufilˈisti.|0
wakˈuu wa edˈomu wˌataoɡˈopa, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa moˈabu wˌatatˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu, wˈatu wa kˌanaˈani wˌatajejˈuka.|0
vitˈiʃo na hˈofu vˌitawˌaaŋɡukˈia. kwa ŋɡˈuvu ja mkˈono wˈako wˌatatulˈia kˌama ɟˈiwe, mpˈaka wˈatu wˈako waˈiʃe kupˈita, ˈee bwˈana, mpˈaka wˈatu ˌuliˌowanunˈua wapˈite.|0
ˌutawˌaiŋɡˈiza na kˌuwapˌandikˈiza ɟˌuːja mlˈima wa urˈiθi wˈako: hˈapo mahˈali, ˈee bwˈana, ˌulipˌopafˈaɲa kˌuwa makˈao jˈako, mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, ˈee bwˈana, ˌulipˌopaɟˈeŋɡa kwa mikˈono jˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌatatawˈala milˈele na milˈele.|0
farˈasi wa farˈao, maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi wˌake wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia bˌaharˈini, bwˈana ˌalijˌarudˈiʃa mˈaɟi ja bahˈari jˌakawˌafunˈika, lakˈini wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipˈita bˌaharˈini mahˈali pakˈavu.|0
kˈiʃa mˌiriˈamu jˈule nabˈii ˈm̩ke, ndˈuɡu jˌake arˈoni, ˌakatʃukˈua matˈari mkonˈoni mwˈake na wˌanawˈake wˈote wˌakamfuˈata na matˈari jˈao wˌakitʃˈeza.|0
mˌiriˈamu ˌakawˌaimbˈia: mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana, kwa maˈana ˌametukˈuka sˈana. farˈasi na mpˈanda farˈasi ˌamewatˈosa bˌaharˈini.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka bahˈari ja ʃˈamu na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la ʃˈuri. kwa sˈiku tˈatu wˌalisafˈiri ɟaŋɡwˈani bˌila kupˈata mˈaɟi.|0
wˌalipofˈika mˈara, hˌawakuwˈeza kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˌake kwa sabˈabu jˌalikˈuwa matʃˈuŋɡu. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mahˈali hˈapo pˌanaˈitwa mˈara .|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˌakamnˌuŋɡunikˈia mˈose, wˌakisˈema, tˈuɲue nˈini.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwoɲˈeʃa kipˈande tʃa ˈm̩ti. ˌakakitˈupa ndˈani ja mˈaɟi, nˈajo mˈaɟi jakˈawa matˈamu. hˌuko bwˈana ˌakawˈapa ˈamri na ʃerˈia na hˌuko ˌakawˌaɟarˈibu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, kˌama mkˌisikilˈiza kwa bidˈii saˈuti ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌujafˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈake, kˌama mkˌijatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˌake zˈote, sˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈenu uɡˈoɲɟua wowˈote nˌiliˌowaletˈea wamˈisri, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌiwapoɲˈaje.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakafˈika elˈimu, mahˈali pˌalipokˈuwa na tʃemtʃˈemi kˈumi na mbˈili, na mˈiti sabˈini ja mitˈende, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko karˈibu na mˈaɟi.|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli ˌikaondˈoka elˈimu, wˌakafˈika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, lˌililokˈuwa kˈati ja elˈimu na sinˈai, sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa pˈili baˌada ja kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani hˈijo ɟˌumuˈija jˈote wˌakawˌanuŋɡˌunikˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌaambˈia, laˈiti tˌuŋɡelikˈufa kwa mkˈono wa bwˈana hˌuko mˈisri! hˌuko tˌulikˈeti tˌukizuŋɡˈuka mˌasufurˈia ja ɲˈama na tukˈala vjakˈula tˌulivjˌovitˈaka, lakˈini nˈiɲi mmˌetulˈeta hˈuku ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌili mpˈate kuˈua mkutˈano hˈuu wˈote kwa ɲɟˈaa.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˌitaɲˈeʃa mikˈate kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni kwa aɟˈili jˈenu. wˈatu wˌatatˈoka kˈila sˈiku na kˌukusˈaɲa kˌitakˌatʃowatˈoʃa kwa sˈiku ˈile, kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii, nˌitawˌaɟarˈibu niˈone kˌama wˌatafuˈata mˌaelekˈezo jˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈiku ja sˈita wˌatatˌajarˈiʃa kˈile wˌaletˈatʃo ndˈani, nˈatʃo kˌitakˈuwa mˈara mbˈili kulˈiko ja kˈile wˌalitʃˌokusˈaɲa kˈila sˈiku.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, ɟiˈoni mtaɟˈua kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌaliwatˈoa mˈisri.|0
kˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi mtˌauˈona ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ˌamesikˈia mˌanuŋɡunˈiko jˈenu ðˈidi jˈake. sˌisi ni nˈani hˌata mtˌunuŋɡˌunikˈie.|0
pˈia mˈose ˌakasˈema, mtaɟˈua kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa bwˈana wakˈati ˌatakˌapowˈapa ɲˈama ˈm̩le ˌifikˈapo ɟiˈoni na mikˈate jˈote mtˌakajˌohitˈaɟi ˌasubˈuhi kwa sabˈabu ˌamesikˈia mˌanuŋɡunˈiko jˈenu ðˈidi jˈake. sˌisi ni nˈani? hˌamnuŋɡunˈiki ðˈidi jˈetu, bˌali ðˈidi ja bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, ˌiambˈie ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli kwˌamba, ˈm̩ɟe mbˈele zˌake bwˈana, kwa maˈana ˌamesikˈia mˌanuŋɡunˈiko jˈenu..|0
arˈoni ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli, wˌakatazˈama kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani, na hˌuko wˌakaˈona ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukitokˈeza katˌika wˈiŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
nˌimesikˈia mˌanuŋɡunˈiko ja wˌaisraˈeli. wˌaambˈie, ɟiˈoni mtakˈula ɲˈama, na ˌasubˈuhi mtaʃˈiba mikˈate. ndˈipo mtaɟˈua ja kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
ɟiˈoni ˈile kwˈare wakˈaɟa wˌakaˌifunˈika kˈambi na ˌasubˈuhi kˌulikˈuwa na tabˈaka la umˈande kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kˈambi.|0
wakˈati umˈande ˌulipˌoondˈoka, vipˈande vidˈoɡo vidˈoɡo kˌama θelˈuɟi vˌiliˌonekˈana ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipoˈona, wˌakaˌambiˈana, hˈiki ni nˈini? kwa kˌuwa hˌawakuɟˈua kˌilikˈuwa kˈitu ɡˈani. mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˈuu n̩dˈio mkˈate ambˈao bwˈana ˌamewˈapa ˈm̩le.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌalivjˌoamˈuru: kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakusˈaɲe kiˈasi ˌanatʃˌohitˈaɟi. tʃˌukuˈeni pˈiʃi mˈoɟa kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu m̩lˈije nˌaje katˌika hˈema jˈenu..|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama wˌalivjˌoambˈiwa, baˈaði jˈao wˌakakusˈaɲa zaˈidi, weŋɡˈine puŋɡˈufu.|0
nˌao wˌalipopˈima katˌika pˈiʃi, jˈule ˌalijˌekusˈaɲa zaˈidi hakˈuwa na ziˈada, wˈala ˌalijˌekusˈaɲa kidˈoɡo hˌakupˌuŋɡukˈiwa. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikusˈaɲa kiˈasi ˌalitʃˌohitˈaɟi.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasibakˈize tʃotʃˈote mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, weŋɡˈine hˌawakˌuziŋɡatˈia ˌalijosˈema mˈose, wˌakahifˈaði kiˈasi fulˈani mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi, lakˈini kˈile ˌalitʃˌohifˈaði kˌikaɟˈaa mabˈuu na kuˈanza kunˈuka. kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˌakasˌirikˈia.|0
kˈila ˌasubˈuhi, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikusˈaɲa kiˈasi ˌalitʃˌohitˈaɟi na ɟˈua lˌilipokˈuwa kˈali, ˌilijejˈuka.|0
sˈiku ja sˈita, wˌakakusˈaɲa mˈara mbˈili, kiˈasi tʃa pˈiʃi mbˈili kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu, nˌao vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˌumuˈija wakˈaɟa kˌumwarˈifu mˈose.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza bwˈana: kˈeʃo ˌitakˈuwa sˈiku ja mˌapumzˈiko, sabˈato tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana. kwa hˈijo okˈeni kˈile mnˌatʃotˈaka kuˈoka na mtʃˈemʃe kˈile mnˌatʃotˈaka kutʃˈemʃa. hˌifaðˈini tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃobˈaki na mkiwˈeke mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi..|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakavˌihifˈaði mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi, kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza, na hˌavikunˈuka wˈala kˌuwa na mabˈuu.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, kulˈeni lˈeo, kwa sabˈabu lˈeo ni sabˈato kwa bwˈana. hˌamtapˈata tʃotʃˈote ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi lˈeo.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈita mtˌakusˈaɲa, lakˈini sˈiku ja sˈaba, jaˈani sabˈato, hˌakutˌakuwˈepo tʃotʃˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌakatˈoka kwˈenda kˌukusˈaɲa sˈiku ja sˈaba, lakˈini hˌawakupˈata tʃotʃˈote.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɟˈe, mtaˈatʃa kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo na mˌaelekˈezo jˈaŋɡu mpˈaka lˈini.|0
fˌahamˈuni kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewˈapa nˈiɲi sabˈato, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu katˌika sˈiku ja sˈita ˌamewˈapa mikˈate ja sˈiku mbˈili. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌinampˈasa kukˈaa pˈale alˈipo katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba. hˌata mmˈoɟa hˌaruhusˈiwi kutˈoka.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˌakapumzˈika sˈiku ja sˈaba.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˈita ˈile mikˈate mˈana ˌilikˈuwa mjeˈupe kˌama mbˈeɡu za mtˈama na lˈaða jˌake ˌilikˈuwa kˌama mkˈate mwembˈamba ˌuliˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa asˈali.|0
mˈose ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza bwˈana: tʃˌukuˈeni pˈiʃi ja mˈana na kˌuhifˈaði kwa aɟˈili ja vizˈazi viɟˈavjo ˌili viˈone mikˈate nˌilijowˈapa ˈm̩le ɟaŋɡwˈani nˌilipˌowatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri..|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, tʃukˈua ɡˌudulˈia na uwˈeke pˈiʃi mˈoɟa ja mˈana ndˈani jˈake. kˈiʃa uwˈeke mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili kˌihifaðˈiwe kwa aɟˈili ja vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose, hˌatimˈaje arˈoni ˌalikˈuɟa kˌuihifˈaði ndˈani ja sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wakˈala mˈana kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, mpˈaka wˌalipofˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijˌokalˈiwa na wˈatu; wˌalikˈula mˈana hˌadi wˌalipofˈika mpakˈani ˌm̩wa kˌanaˈani.|0
pˈiʃi mˈoɟa ni sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja kipˈimo tʃa ˈefa. .|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ˌikaondˈoka kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, ˌikisafˈiri kutˈoka sehˈemu mˈoɟa hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza. wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko rˌefidˈimu, lakˈini hˌapakˈuwa na mˈaɟi ja wˈatu kˈuɲua.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakaɡombˈana na mˈose wˌakisˈema, tˈupe mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua. mˈose ˌakaɟˈibu, mbˈona mnˌaɡombˈana nˈami? kwa nˈini mnˌamɟarˈibu bwˈana.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌalikˈuwa na kˈiu hˌuko, wˌakanˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi ja mˈose, wˌakisˈema, kwa nˈini ˌulitutˈoa kˈule mˈisri, ˌukatulˈeta hˈapa ˌutuˈue kwa kˈiu sˈisi, watˈoto wˈetu na mifˈuɡo jˈetu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana, ˌakasˈema, nˌiwafaɲˈie nˈini wˈatu hˈawa? sˈasa wˌanakˌaribˈia kˌunipˈiɡa kwa mˈawe.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu mˈose, pˈita mbˈele ja wˈatu. wˌatʃukˈue pamˈoɟa nˌawe baˈaði ja wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌitʃukˈue mkonˈoni mwˈako ˈile fˈimbo ˌulijopˈiɡa nˈajo ˈm̩to naˈili, nˌawe uˈende.|0
hˌuko nˌitasimˈama mbˈele jˈako karˈibu na mwˈamba wa horˈebu. ˌuupˈiɡe mwˈamba na mˈaɟi jˌatatˈoka ndˈani jˌake kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu kˈuɲua. kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakafˈaɲa hˈaja mbˈele ja wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌaje ˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale mˈasa, na merˈiba kwa sabˈabu wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliɡombˈana na kˌumɟarˈibu bwˈana wˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˌasi ˌau la.|0
wˌaamalˈeki wakˈaɟa na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko rˌefidˈimu.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, tʃaɡˈua baˈaði ja wˈatu wˈetu na uˈende kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamalˈeki. kˈeʃo nˌitasimˈama ɟˌuːja kilˈima nikˈiwa na fˈimbo ja mˈuŋɡu mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakapiɡˈana na wˌaamalˈeki kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza, nˌao mˈose, arˈoni na hˈuri wˌakapˈanda ɟˌuːja kilˈima.|0
ikˈawa wakˈati wˈote mˈose ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameɲaɲˈua mikˈono jˈake, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiʃˈinda, lakˈini kˈila ˌalipoʃˈuʃa mikˈono jˌake wˌaamalˈeki wˌaliʃˈinda.|0
mikˈono ja mˈose ˌilipotʃˈoka, wˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈiwe na kˈumpa ˌalikalˈie. arˈoni na hˈuri wˌakaˌiʃikilˈia ɟˈuu mikˈono ja mˈose, mmˈoɟa upˈande hˈuu na mwiŋɡˈine upˈande hˈuu. wˌakaˌiteɡemˈeza mikˈono jˌake ˌikabˈaki θabˈiti mpˈaka ɟˈua lˌilipozˈama.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakaliʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi la wˌaamalˈeki kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, andˈika mˈambo hˈaja katˌika kitˈabu ˌili jˌakumbˈukwe, na ˌuhakikˈiʃe kwˌamba joʃˈua ˌamesikˈia, kwa sabˈabu nˌitafˈuta kabˈisa kˌumbukˈumbu la ˌamalˈeki tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
mˈose ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu na kˌuiˈita jehˈova nˈisi.|0
mˈose ˌakasˈema, kwa maˈana mikˈono ˌiliˌinulˈiwa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa bwˈana. bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa na vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌaamalˈeki kutˈoka kizˈazi hˌata kizˈazi.|0
bˌasi jˈeθro, kuhˈani wa mˌidiˈani, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose, akˈawa ˌamesikˈia kˈila kˈitu mˈuŋɡu ˌalitʃˌomfaɲˈia mˈose na wˈatu wˌake wa ˌisraˈeli, pˈia ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌowatˈoa ˌisraˈeli mˈisri.|0
baˌada ja mˈose kˌumrudˈiʃa mkˈewe sipˈora, jˈeθro bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake ˌalimpokˈea.|0
pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe wawˈili. ɟˈina la mmˈoɟa ˌaliˈitwa ɡerʃˈomu, kwa kˌuwa mˈose ˌalisˈema, nˌimekˈuwa mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kiɡˈeni.|0
mwiŋɡˈine ˌaliˈitwa ˌeliezˈeri, kwa kˌuwa ˌalisˈema, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu, ˌakanˌiokˈoa kutˈoka upˈaŋɡa wa farˈao.|0
jˈeθro, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose, pamˈoɟa na wˈana wawˈili wa mˈose na mkˈewe, wˌakamɟˈia mˈose hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, mahˈali ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
jˈeθro ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈuma uɟˈumbe kwˈake mˈose, kusˈema, mˌimi jˈeθro bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˈako nˌinakˈuɟa kwˈako pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke wˈako na wanˈao wawˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakatˈoka kumlˈaki bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˈake, ˌakainˈama na kumbˈusu. wˌakasˌalimiˈana, kˈiʃa wˌakaiŋɡˈia hemˈani.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake kuhˈusu kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌomfaɲˈia farˈao na wamˈisri kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, na pˈia kuhˈusu ʃˈida zˈote wˌalizˌokutˈana nˈazo ɲɟiˈani na ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaokˈoa.|0
jˈeθro ˌakafˌurahˈiʃwa sˈana kˌusikˈia ɟˌuːja mˈambo jˈote mazˈuri bwˈana ˌalijˌowatendˈea wˌaisraˈeli kˌuwaokˈoa kutˈoka mkˈono wa wamˈisri.|0
jˈeθro ˌakasˈema, sˈifa na zˈiwe kwa bwˈana, ˌalijˌekuokˈoa wˌewe kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wamˈisri na farˈao, na ˌalijˌewaokˈoa wˈatu kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wamˈisri.|0
sˈasa naɟˈua ja kˌuwa bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine jˈote, kwa kˌuwa ˌamewˌatendˈea hˈivi wˈale wˌaliˌowatˈenda ˌisraˈeli kwa ˌuɟeˈuri.|0
kˈiʃa jˈeθro, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose, ˌakalˈeta sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu ɲiŋɡˈine kwa mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje arˈoni pamˈoɟa na wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wakˈaɟa kˈula tʃakˈula pamˈoɟa na bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata, mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua nafˈasi jˌake kˌama hakˈimu wa wˈatu, nˌao wˌakasimˈama kˌumzuŋɡˈuka kˌuanzˈia ˌasubˈuhi hˌadi ɟiˈoni.|0
bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake ˌalipoˈona jˈote mˈose ˌanajˌowafaɲˈia wˈatu, ˌakasˈema, ni nˈini hˈiki ˌunatʃˌowafaɲˈia wˈatu? kwa nˈini wˌewe ˌunakˈuwa mwamˈuzi wa wˈatu hˈawa pˈeke jˈako, wakˈati wˈatu hˈawa wˌamesimˈama wˌakikˌuzuŋɡˈuka ʃˈu ˌasubˈuhi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌananiɟˈia kutˈaka mapˈenzi ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈila wakˈiwa na ʃaˈuri hulˈetwa kwˈaŋɡu, nˌami hˌuamˈua kˈati ja ˈm̩tu na mwenzˈake na kˌuwaɟulˈiʃa ɟˌuːja ˈamri na ʃerˈia za mˈuŋɡu.|0
bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌunatʃofˈaɲa sˈio kizˈuri.|0
wˌewe pamˈoɟa na wˈatu hˈawa wˌanaˌokuɟˈia mtˌaɟitʃˈoʃa bˈure. kˈazi ni nzˈito sˈana kwˈako, huwˈezi kˌuibˈeba mweɲˈewe.|0
sˈasa nˌisikilˈize mˈimi, nˌitakˈupa ʃaˈuri, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈawe. japˈasa wˌewe ˈuwe mwˌakilˈiʃi wa wˈatu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu na ulˈete mˌaʃaˈuri jˈao kwˈake.|0
ˌuwafundˈiʃe ˈamri na ʃerˈia, tˈena ˌuwaoɲˈeʃe nˈamna ja kuˈiʃi na kˈazi zˌinazˌowapˈasa wˌao kufˈaɲa.|0
lakˈini ˌutʃaɡˈue wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈote, wˈatu wˌanaˌomwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu, wˈatu wˌaaminˈifu wˌanaˌotʃukˈia mˈali ja ðulˈuma, ˌuwateˈuwe wˈawe mˌaafˈisa ɟˌuːja maˈelfu, mamˈia, hamsˈini na makˈumi.|0
wawˈeke wˈawe wˌaamˈuzi wa wˈatu kwa wakˈati wˈote, lakˈini wˌaambˈie wˌakuletˈee kˈila ʃaˈuri lilˈilo ɡˈumu; jˈale jalˈijo rahˈisi wˌajaamˈue wˌao weɲˈewe. hˌii ˌitafˈaɲa mzˈiɡo wˈako kˌuwa mwepˈesi, kwa sabˈabu wˌataʃˌirikiˈana nˈawe.|0
kˌama ˌukifˈaɲa hˈivi, na ikˈiwa mˈuŋɡu ˌameaɡˈiza hˈivjo, ˌutawˈeza kuʃˈinda utʃˈovu, nˌao wˈatu hˈawa wˈote wˌatarˈudi ɲumbˈani wˌameriðˈika.|0
mˈose ˌakamsˌikilˈiza bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake na kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃosˈema.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌatʃaɡˈua wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli jˈote, ˌakawafˈaɲa kˌuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu, mˌaafˈisa ɟˌuːja maˈelfu, mamˈia, hamsˈini na makˈumi.|0
wˌakatumˈika kˌama wˌaamˈuzi wa wˈatu kwa wakˈati wˈote. mˌaʃaˈuri maɡˈumu wˌakajalˈeta kwa mˈose, lakˈini jˈale jalˈijo rahˈisi wˌakajˌaamˈua weɲˈewe.|0
mnˈamo mwˈezi wa tˈatu baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌuondˈoka mˈisri, sˈiku kˌama ˈijo hˈijo, wˌakafˈika katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
baˌada ja kˌuondˈoka rˌefidˈimu, wˌaliiŋɡˈia katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai na ˌisraˈeli wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi pˈale ɟaŋɡwˈani mbˈele ja mlˈima.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakakwˈea kwˈenda kwa mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwˈita kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈule mlˈima ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjosˈema na ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo na ˌutakˌatʃowˌaambˈia wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mmeˈona nˌililofˈaɲa hˌuko mˈisri, ɟˈinsi nˌilivjˌowabˈeba kwˈeɲe mbˈawa za tˈai na kˌuwalˈeta kwˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈasa kˌama mkˌinitˈii kˌikamilˈifu na kutˈunza aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu, bˌasi nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa mˈali jˈaŋɡu ja θamˈani kˈubwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote. ˌiɟapokˈuwa dunˈia jˈote ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu ufˈalme wa mˌakuhˈani na taˈifa tˌakatˈifu. hˈaja n̩dˈijo manˈeno ˌutakˌajosˈema kwa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakarˈudi, ˌakawaˈita wazˈee wa wˈatu na kˌuwaambˈia manˈeno jˈote ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwamˈuru ˌajasˈeme.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌakaɟˈibu kwa pamˈoɟa, tˌutafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌokisˈema. nˌaje mˈose ˌakarudˈiʃa maɟˈibu jˈao kwa bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˌitakuɟˈia katˌika wˈiŋɡu zˈito, ˌili wˈatu wˌanisikˈie nˌikinˈena nˌawe na kˈila mˈara wawˈeke tˌumaˈini lˈao kwˈako. kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana jˈale ambˈajo wˈatu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesˈema.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, nˈenda kwa wˈatu ˌukawawˈeke wˈakfu lˈeo na kˈeʃo. wˌaambˈie wafˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈao.|0
na wˈawe tajˈari sˈiku ja tˈatu, kwa sabˈabu sˈiku hˈijo, bwˈana ˌataʃˈuka ɟˌuːja mlˈima sinˈai matʃˈoni pa wˈatu wˈote.|0
wˈeka mipˈaka kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mlˈima kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, ˌuwaambˈie, ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu, msˈiɟe mkapˈanda mlimˈani ˌau kˌuuɡˈusa. jejˈote ˌatakˌajeuɡˈusa mlˈima hakˈika ˌatauˈawa.|0
hakˈika ˌatapˈiɡwa mˈawe ˌau kupˈiɡwa miʃˈale; mkˈono wa ˈm̩tu hˌautamɡˈusa. akˈiwa mwˌanadˈamu ˌau mɲˈama, hˌatarˌuhusˈiwa kuˈiʃi. ˈila tu wakˈati bˌaraɡˈumu ˌitakˌapopˈiɡwa kwa mfˌululˈizo, ndˈipo wˈatu wˈote wˌatakˌapopˈanda mlimˈani.|0
baˌada ja mˈose kuʃˈuka kutˈoka mlimˈani ˌakawˌaendˈea wˈatu na kˌuwawˈeka wˈakfu, wˌakafˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, ɟˌitajˌariʃˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja sˈiku ja tˈatu. mwˌanaˈume jejˈote ˌasimkˌaribˈie mwanˈamke.|0
ˌasubˈuhi ja sˈiku ja tˈatu kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡurˈumo na rˈadi pamˈoɟa na wˈiŋɡu nˈene ɟˌuːja mlˈima na m̩lˈio mkˈubwa sˈana wa tˌarumbˈeta. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa kambˈini ˌakatˌetemˈeka.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu kutˈoka kambˈini kˌukutˈana na mˈuŋɡu, nˌao wˌakasimˈama tʃˈini ja mlˈima.|0
mlˈima sinˈai ˌulikˈuwa ˌumefunˈikwa na mˈoʃi, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌaliʃˈuka ɟˈuu jˌake katˌika mˈoto. mˈoʃi wa mˈoto hˈuo ˌulipˈanda ɟˈuu kˌama mˈoʃi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tanˈuru kˈubwa na mlˈima wˈote ˌukatˌetemˈeka kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
nˈajo saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta ikˈawa kˈubwa zaˈidi na zaˈidi. kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakazuŋɡˈumza na saˈuti ja bwˈana ˌikamɟˈibu.|0
bwˈana ˌakaʃˈuka ɟˌuːja mlˈima sinˈai na ˌakamwˈita mˈose apˈande ɟˈuu mlimˈani. kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ʃˈuka ˌukawaˈoɲe wˈatu ˌili wˌasiɟˌipeɲˈeze kˌutafˈuta kumwˈona bwˈana na wˈeŋɡi wˌao wakˈafa.|0
hˌata mˌakuhˈani, wˌatakˌaomkˌaribˈia bwˈana ni lazˈima wˌaɟiwˈeke wˈakfu, la sˈivjo bwˈana ˌatawˌaaðˈibu.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, wˈatu hˌawawˈezi kupˈanda mlˈima sinˈai kwa sabˈabu wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌulituˈoɲa ˌukisˈema, wekˈeni mipˈaka kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka mlˈima na kˌuutˈeŋɡa kˌama pˌatakatˈifu..|0
bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, ʃˈuka ˌukamlˈete arˈoni pamˈoɟa nˈawe. lakˈini mˌakuhˈani pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wasˈiɟe wˌakalˌazimˈiʃa kˈuɟa kwa bwˈana, nisˈiɟe nˌikawˌaaðˈibu.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌakaʃˈuka kwa wˈatu na kˌuwaambˈia lˈile ˌalilˌoambˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema manˈeno hˈaja jˈote.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, nˌilijˌekutˈoa mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
usˈiwe na miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi.|0
ˌusiɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈee sanˈamu katˌika ˈumbo la kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌau dˌuniˈani tʃˈini, ˌau ndˈani ja mˈaɟi.|0
ˌusivˌisuɟudˈie wˈala kˌuviabˈudu; kwa kˌuwa mˈimi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe wˈivu, nˌinajˌewaaðˈibu watˈoto kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao hˌadi kizˈazi tʃa tˈatu na tʃa ˈn̩ne tʃa wˌanitʃˌukiˈao.|0
ˌusilitˈaɟe bˈure ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hˌataˈatʃa kˌumhesabˈia hatˈia jˌeje ˌalitaɟˈaje ɟˈina lˈake bˈure.|0
ˌikumbˈuke sˈiku ja sabˈato, ˌuitakˈase.|0
lakˈini sˈiku ja sˈaba ni sabˈato kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako. sˈiku hˈijo hˌutafˈaɲa kˈazi jojˈote, wˈewe, wˈala mwanˈao ˌau bˈinti jˈako, wˈala mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike, wˈala waɲˈama wˈako, wˈala mɡˈeni alˈije ndˈani ja malˈaŋɡo jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa kwa sˈiku sˈita, bwˈana ˌaliˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi, bahˈari na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo, lakˈini ˌakapumzˈika sˈiku ja sˈaba. kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakaˌibarˈiki sˈiku ja sabˈato na kˌuifˈaɲa tˌakatˈifu.|0
wˌaheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈako na mˈama jˈako, ˌili upˈate kuˈiʃi sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌanajokˈupa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˌusiˈue.|0
ˌusizˈini.|0
ˌusiˈibe.|0
ˌusimʃˌuhudˈie ɟirˈani jˈako uˈoŋɡo.|0
ˌusiˌitamˈani ɲˈumba ja ɟirˈani jˈako. ˌusimtamˈani ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈako, wˈala mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike, wˈala ŋɡˈombe wˌake ˌau pˈunda wˈake, wˈala tʃotʃˈote kˈile alˈitʃo nˈatʃo ɟirˈani jˈako.|0
wˈatu wˌalipoˈona ŋɡurˈumo na rˈadi, na kˌusikˈia m̩lˈio wa tˌarumbˈeta, na kˌuuˈona mlˈima katˌika mˈoʃi, wˌalitˌetemˈeka kwa wˈoɡa. wˌakasimˈama mbˈali.|0
na wˌakamwambˈia mˈose, sˈema nˌasi wˌewe mweɲˈewe, nˌasi tˌutakˌusikilˈiza. lakˈini ˌusimwˈatʃe mˈuŋɡu asˈeme nˈasi, la sˈivjo tˌutakˈufa.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, msˌioɡˈope! mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˈuɟa kˌuwaɟarˈibu, ˌili kwˌamba hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu ˌiwakalˈie, msitˈende ðˈambi.|0
wˈatu wˌakabˈaki mbˈali, wakˈati mˈose ˌalipˌolisˌoɡelˈea lˈile ɡˈiza nˈene mahˈali pˈale mˈuŋɡu ˌalipokˈuwa.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli hˈivi: mmˌeɟionˈea weɲˈewe kwˌamba nˌimesˈema nˌaɲi kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
msˌiɟifˌaɲizˈie miˈuŋɡu jojˈote na kˌuilˌiŋɡanˈiʃa nˈami, msˌiɟitˌeŋɡenezˈee miˈuŋɡu ja fˈeða wˈala miˈuŋɡu ja ðahˈabu.|0
ˌutanˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌaðabˈahu ja udˈoŋɡo, na ɟˈuu jˌake utˈoe sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto na sadˈaka za amˈani, kondˈoo zˈako, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe zˈako. popˈote nˌitakˌapofˈaɲa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌiheʃimˈiwe, nˌitakˈuɟa kwˈenu na kˌuwabarˈiki.|0
ikˈiwa ˌunanˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌaðabˈahu ja mˈawe, ˌusiiɟˈeŋɡe kwa mˈawe ja kutʃˈoŋɡa, maˈana mkˌitumˈia tʃˈombo tʃa kˌutʃoŋɡˈea mtˌaitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
msˌitumˈie ŋɡˈazi kˌupandˈia kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu, ˈutʃi wˈako usˈiɟe ˌukaðˌihirˈika kwa tʃˈini..|0
hˈizi ndˈizo ʃerˈia ˌutakˌazowˈeka mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kˌama ˌukimnunˈua mtˈumwa wa kˌiebranˈia, ˌatakˌutumikˈia kwa miˈaka sˈita. lakˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba, ˌatakˈuwa hˈuru nˌaje ˌatakwˈenda zˌake pasˈipo kulˈipa tʃotʃˈote.|0
kˌama akˈiɟa pˈeke jˈake, ˌatakwˈenda hˈuru pˈeke jˈake, lakˈini kˌama akˈiɟa na ˈm̩ke, ˌataondˈoka pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
kˌama bwˈana wˌake ˌalimpatˈia ˈm̩ke nˌaje ˌakamzalˈia wˈana ˌau bˈinti, mwanˈamke pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˌake wˌatakˈuwa mˈali ja bwˈana wˌake na hˈujo mwˌanaˈume ˌataondˈoka pˈeke jˈake.|0
lakˈini kˌama mtumˈiʃi ˌakisˈema, nˌinampˈenda bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na watˈoto na sitˈaki kˌuwa hˈuru,.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana wˌake ˌatakˌapolˌazimˈika kˌumpelˈeka mbˈele ja wˌaamˈuzi. kˈiʃa ˌatampelˈeka kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo ˌau kˌiziŋɡˈiti na kˌutobˈoa sikˈio lˈake kwa ʃazˈia. nˌaje ˌatamtˌumikˈia bwˈana wˌake maˈiʃa jˌake jˈote.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimuˈuza bˈinti jˌake kˌuwa mtˈumwa, hˌataˈatʃwa hˈuru kˌama watˈumwa wa kiˈume wˌaatʃiwˈavjo.|0
kˌama hˌakumpendˈeza bwˈana wˌake ˌalijˌemtʃaɡˈua, hˈujo bwˈana ˌatamwˈatʃa ˌakombolˈewe. hˌatakˈuwa na hˈaki ja kˌumuˈuza kwa waɡˈeni, kwa sabˈabu hˈujo bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa ˌamekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
kˌama ˌakimtʃaɡˈua ˌaolˈewe na mwanˈawe, ni lazˈima ˈampe hˈaki za kˌuwa bˈinti jˈake.|0
ikˈiwa hˈujo mwˈana ˌalijeˈozwa mtˈumwa mwanˈamke ˌataˈoa mwanˈamke mwiŋɡˈine, ni lazˈima ˌaendelˈee kˌumtoʃelˈeza hˈujo ˈm̩ke wa kwˈanza kwa tʃakˈula, mavˈazi na hˈaki zˈote za n̩dˈoa.|0
iwˈapo hˌatamtˌoʃelˈeza kwa mˈambo hˈajo matˈatu, hˈujo ˈm̩ke wa kwˈanza ˌataondˈoka na kˌuwa hˈuru bˌila malˈipo jojˈote ja fˈeða.|0
jejˈote ˌampiɡˈaje ˈm̩tu na kˌumuˈua ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe hakˈika.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama hˌakumuˈua kwa mˌakusˈudi, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakaruhˈusu ˌitendˈeke, bˌasi ˌatakˌimbilˈia mahˈali nˌitakˌapomtʃˌaɡulˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakipˈaŋɡa na kˌumuˈua mwiŋɡˈine kwa mˌakusˈudi, mwondˈoe katˌika mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu na kˌumuˈua.|0
jejˈote ˌamʃambˌuliˈaje bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˌake ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
jejˈote ˌamtekˈaje ɲˈara mwiŋɡˈine ˌakamuˈuza ˌau ˌakamwˈeka kwˈake, ˌakikamˈatwa ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajemlaˈani bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˌake ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
kˌama wˈatu wˌakiɡombˈana na mmˈoɟa ˌakimpˈiɡa mwiŋɡˈine kwa ɟˈiwe ˌau kwa ŋɡˈumi jˌake na hakˈufa bˌali ˌakauɡˈua na kulˈala kˌitandˈani.|0
jˈule ˌalijempˈiɡa ŋɡˈumi hˌatahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa na hatˈia kˌama mwenzˈake ˌataˈamka na kˌuɟikoŋɡˈoɟa kwa fˈimbo jˈake, lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, ni lazˈima amlˈipe fidˈia ja mˈuda wˌake ˌaliˌopotˈeza na ˌawaɟibˈike mpˈaka apˈone kabˈisa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimpˈiɡa mtˈumwa wˌake wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike kwa fˈimbo na mtˈumwa hˈujo akˈafa pˈapo hˈapo, ni lazˈima ˌaaðibˈiwe.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mtˈumwa ˌataˈamka baˌada ja sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌau mbˈili, hˌataˌaðibˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu jˈule mtˈumwa ni mˈali jˈake.|0
ikˈiwa wˈatu wawˈili wˌanapiɡˈana na wˌakamˌuumˈiza mwanˈamke mɟamzˈito, nˌaje ˌakazˈaa kˈabla ja wakˈati lakˈini hakˈuna mˌaɟerˈaha makˈubwa, mhalˈifu ˌatatˈozwa mˈali kiˈasi tʃa madˈai ja mˈume wa jˈule mwanˈamke, na ɟˈinsi mˌahakˈama ˌitakˌavjoamˈua.|0
lakˈini kukˈiwa na ɟerˈaha kˈubwa, ni lazˈima ulˈipe uhˈai kwa uhˈai.|0
ɟˈitʃo kwa ɟˈitʃo, ɟˈino kwa ɟˈino, mkˈono kwa mkˈono, m̩ɡˈuu kwa m̩ɡˈuu.|0
kutʃˈomwa mˈoto kwa kutʃˈomwa mˈoto, ɟerˈaha kwa ɟerˈaha, mtʃubˈuko kwa mtʃubˈuko.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatampˈiɡa mtˈumwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke kwˈeɲe ɟˈitʃo na kˌuliharˈibu, ni lazˈima amwˈatʃe hˈuru jˈule mtˈumwa kˌama fidˈia ja hˌilo ɟˈitʃo.|0
kˌama ˌakimvˈuɲɟa ɟˈino mtˈumwa wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike, ni lazˈima amwˈatʃe hˈuru hˈujo mtˈumwa kwa kˌufidˈia hˌilo ɟˈino.|0
kˌama fahˈali ˌakimuˈua mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke kwa kumpˈiɡa kwa pˈembe, fahˈali hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe kwa kupˈiɡwa mˈawe, na ɲˈama jˌake hˌaitalˈiwa. lakˈini mwˌeɲe fahˈali hˈujo hˌatawˌaɟibˈika.|0
lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, ikˈiwa hˈujo fahˈali ˌamekˈuwa na tabˈia ja kupˈiɡa kwa pˈembe, na mweɲˈewe ˌameˈoɲua na hˌakutˈaka kˌumfuŋɡˈia nˌaje ˌakamuˈua mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke, hˈujo fahˈali ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe kwa mˈawe na mwˌeɲe fahˈali pˈia ˌauˈawe.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa malˈipo jˌatatakˈiwa kwˈake, bˌasi ˌanawˈeza kulˈipa kˌinatʃˌodaˈiwa ˌili kˌuukombˈoa uhˈai wˈake.|0
ʃerˈia hˌii pˈia ˌitatumˈika ikˈiwa fahˈali ˌatampˈiɡa kwa pˈembe mwˈana ˌau bˈinti.|0
ikˈiwa fahˈali ˌatampˈiɡa mtˈumwa wa kˈike ˌau wa kiˈume, mwˌeɲe fahˈali ˌatalˈipa ʃekˈeli θˌelaθˈini za fˈeða kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe mtˈumwa, na fahˈali ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe kwa mˈawe.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakiˈatʃa ʃˈimo wˈazi, ˌama ˌakatʃˈimba ʃˈimo kˈiʃa ˌasilˌifukˈie, na ŋɡˈombe ˌau pˈunda ˌakatˌumbukˈia ndˈani jˈake.|0
mwˌeɲe ʃˈimo ni lazˈima alˈipe hasˈara ˌilijˌotokˈea; ni lazˈima amlˈipe mwˌeɲe mɲˈama. mɲˈama ˌalijekˈufa ˌatakˈuwa wˈake.|0
kˌama fahˈali wa ˈm̩tu fulˈani ˌatamˌuumˈiza fahˈali wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine na akˈafa, wˌatamuˈuza jˈule alˈije hˈai na wˌaɡawˈane sˈawa fˈeða pamˈoɟa na mɲˈama ˌalijekˈufa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama ˌikifˌahamˈika kwˌamba fahˈali hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa na tabˈia ja kupˈiɡa kwa pˈembe na mweɲˈewe hˌakumfˈuŋɡa, ni lazˈima mwˌeɲe fahˈali alˈipe mɲˈama kwa mɲˈama, na mɲˈama ˌalijekˈufa ˌatakˈuwa wˈake.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakiˈiba maksˈai ˌau kondˈoo na kumtʃˈiɲɟa ˌau kˌumuˈuza, ni lazˈima alˈipe ŋɡˈombe watˈano badˈala ja maksˈai mmˈoɟa na kondˈoo wˈanne badˈala ja kondˈoo mmˈoɟa.|0
kˌama mwˈizi ˌakiʃˈikwa ˌanavˈuɲɟa ɲˈumba ˌakapˈiɡwa hˌata akˈafa, ˌalijˌemuˈua hˈana hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
lakˈini ɟˈambo hˌilo lˌikitokˈea wakˈati ɟˈua lˌimetʃomˈoza, hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈuwa na hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu. mwˈizi hˈujo ʃˈarti alˈipe, lakˈini kˌama hˈana kˈitu, lazˈima aˈuzwe ˌili alˈipe kwa aɟˈili ja wˈizi wˈake.|0
kˌama mɲˈama ˌalijeˈibwa ˌakikˈutwa hˈai mˌikonˈoni mwˈake, ikˈiwa ni maksˈai ˌau pˈunda ˌau kondˈoo, lazˈima alˈipe mˈara mbˈili.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakitʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo jˌake katˌika ʃˈamba ˌau ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu, na ˌakawˌaatʃˈia wˌaɟilˈiʃe katˌika ʃˈamba la ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, ni lazˈima alˈipe vˈitu bˈora kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba lˈake mweɲˈewe ˌau kutˈoka ʃˈamba lˈake la mˌizabˈibu.|0
kˌama mˈoto ˌukiwˈaka na kˌuenˈea kwˈeɲe vitʃˈaka vja miˈiba na kˌuteketˈeza miɡˈanda ja nafˈaka ˌau nafˈaka ambˈajo hˌaiɟavˈunwa, ˌau kˌuteketˈeza ʃˈamba lˈote, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijewˈaʃa mˈoto lazˈima alˈipe.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu akˈimpa ɟirˈani jˌake fˈeða ˌau mˈali ɲiŋɡˈine ˌamtunzˈie, na kˌama vˌikiˈibwa kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja hˈujo ɟirˈani, kˌama mwˈizi ˌataʃˈikwa, lazˈima alˈipe mˈara mbˈili.|0
lakˈini mwˈizi ˌasipˌopatikˈana, mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba ˌatafˈika mbˈele ja wˌaamˈuzi ˌili kˌuθibitˈiʃa kˌuwa hˌakutʃukˈua mˈali ja mwenzˈake.|0
pˌakiwˈepo ɟˈambo lolˈote la mˈali isˈijo halˈali, ikˈiwa ni maksˈai, pˈunda, kondˈoo, mavˈazi, ˌama mˈali jojˈote ˌilijˌopotˈea ambˈajo fulˈani ˌatasˈema, hˌii ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu, pˈande zˈote mbˈili wˌatalˈeta mˌaʃaˈuri jˈao mbˈele ja wˌaamˈuzi. jˈule ambˈaje wˌaamˈuzi wˌatamwˈona kˌuwa na hatˈia ˌatamlˈipa ɟirˈani jˌake mˈara mbˈili.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu akˈimpa ɟirˈani jˌake pˈunda, ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo ˌau mɲˈama mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌamtunzˈie, akˈifa ˌau ˌakiɟˌeruhˈiwa ˌau ˌakitʃˌukulˈiwa wakˈati hˌaonekˈani na ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
ɟˈambo hˈili kˈati jˈao wawˈili lˌitaˌamulˈiwa kwa kuˈapa kiˈapo mbˈele za bwˈana, kwˌamba hˈujo ɟirˈani hˌakuhusˈika na wˈizi wa mˈali ja ɟirˈani jˈake. mwˌeɲe mˈali ˌitampˈasa ˌakubˈali ɟˈambo hˈili, na hakˈuna malˈipo jˌatakˌajohˌitaɟˈika.|0
lakˈini kˌama mɲˈama ˌaliˈibwa kwa ɟirˈani, ˌitampˈasa amlˈipe mwˌeɲe mɲˈama.|0
kˌama ˌamerˌarulˈiwa na mɲˈama pˈori, ˌatalˈeta mabˈaki ja mɲˈama kˌama ˌuʃahˈidi, nˌaje hˌatadaˈiwa kulˈipa mɲˈama ˌalijˌerarulˈiwa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimwazˈima mɲˈama kutˈoka kwa ɟirˈani jˈake, na kˌama ˌakiumˈia ˌau akˈafa na mwˌeɲe mɲˈama hajˈupo, lazˈima amlˈipe hˈujo mɲˈama.|0
lakˈini mwˌeɲe mɲˈama akˈiwa ˌaŋɡalˈipo na mɲˈama wˈake, mwˌazimˈaɟi hˌatalˌazimˈika kumlˈipa. kˌama mɲˈama ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekodˈiʃwa, fˈeða ˌilijolˈipwa kwa kˌukodˈiʃa ˌinatˈoʃa kwa kˌufidˈia hasˈara.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimʃawˈiʃi bikˈira ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈoswa na ˌakilˈala nˈaje, lazˈima alˈipe mahˈari, kˈiʃa ˌatamwˈoa msitʃˈana hˈujo.|0
bˈaba wa msitʃˈana ˌakikatˈaa kˌatakˈata kˈumpa hˈujo ˈm̩tu hˈujo msitʃˈana wˈake, bˈado ni lazˈima hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌatalˈipa mahˈari kˌama ˌinavjˌostahˈili malˈipo ja ˌubikˈira.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu mwanˈamke mtʃˈawi aˈiʃi.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌazinˈije na mɲˈama lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
ˈm̩tu awˈaje jˈote ˌanajˌemtolˈea mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ðabˈihu ˌisipokˈuwa bwˈana, lazˈima ˌaaŋɡamˈizwe.|0
ˌusimtendˈee mɡˈeni vibˈaja ˌau kˌumwonˈea, kwa kˌuwa nˌaɲi mlikˈuwa waɡˈeni hˌuko mˈisri.|0
ˌusimðulˈumu mɟˈane wˈala jatˈima.|0
kˌama ˌukifˈaɲa hˈivjo nˌao wˌakinˌililˈia, hakˈika nˌitasikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao.|0
hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌitawˈaka, nˌami nˌitawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˌake zˈenu wˌatakˈuwa waɟˈane na watˈoto wˈenu wˌatakˈuwa jatˈima.|0
kˌama ˌukimkopˈeʃa mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu fˈeða ambˈaje ni mhitˈaɟi, usˈiwe kˌama ˈm̩tu mkopˈeʃa fˈeða; ˌusimtˈoze rˈiba.|0
kˌama ˌukitʃukˈua vˈazi la ɟirˈani kˌama rehˈani, ˌulirudˈiʃe kwˈake kˈabla ɟˈua kuzˈama.|0
kwa kˌuwa vˈazi lˈake ndˈilo pekˈee alˈilo nˈalo la kˌumfunˈika mwˈili wˈake. ni nˈini kiŋɡˈine ˌataɟˌifunˈika nˈatʃo? ˌatakˌaponˌililˈia, nˌitasikˈia, kwa kˌuwa nˈina hurˈuma.|0
ˌusimkufˈuru mˈuŋɡu ˌau kˌumlaˈani mtawˈala wa wˈatu wˈako.|0
ˌusiˈatʃe kutˈoa sadˈaka kutˈoka ɣˈala lˈako ˌau mapˈipa jˈako. lazˈima unˈipe mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa wˈana wˈako.|0
ufˈaɲe vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa ŋɡˈombe wˈako na kwa kondˈoo wˈako. waˈatʃe wakˈae na mˈama zˈao kwa sˈiku sˈaba, lakˈini sˈiku ja nˈane unˈipe.|0
nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatakatˈifu. kwa hˈijo msˈile ɲˈama ja mɲˈama ˌalijˌerarulˈiwa na waɲˈama pˈori; mtˌupiˈeni ˈm̩bwa.|0
ˌusienˈeze habˈari za uˈoŋɡo. ˌusimsˌaidˈie ˈm̩tu mwˈovu kwa kˌuwa ʃahˈidi mwˌeɲe nˈia ja kuðˈuru weŋɡˈine.|0
ˌusifuˈate umˈati wa wˈatu katˌika kutˈenda mabˈaja. ˌunapotˈoa ˌuʃahˈidi kwˈeɲe maʃtˈaka, ˌusipotˈoʃe hˈaki ˌukiɟˌumuˈika na umˈati wa wˈatu.|0
nˌawe ˌusimpˌendelˈee ˈm̩tu maskˈini katˌika maʃtˈaka jˈake.|0
kˌama ˌukikutˈana na maksˈai ˌau pˈunda wa adˈui jˈako ˌanapotˈea, hˌakikˈiʃa ˌumemrudˈiʃa kwˈake.|0
ˌukiˈona pˈunda wa ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌekutʃukˈia ˌameaŋɡˈuka na mzˈiɡo wˈake, ˌusimwˈatʃe hˈapo ˌalipˌoaŋɡukˈia; hˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa ˌumemsˌaidˈia.|0
ˌusiwaɲˈime hˈaki wˈatu wˈako walˈio maskˈini katˌika maʃtˈaka jˈao.|0
ˌuɟiepˈuʃe na maʃtˈaka ja uˈoŋɡo, wˈala ˌusimuˈue ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia ˌau ˈm̩tu mwˌaminˈifu, kwa maˈana sˌitamhˌesabˈia hˈana hatˈia jˌeje alˈije na hatˈia.|0
ˌusipokˈee rˈuʃwa, kwa kˌuwa rˈuʃwa hˌupofˈuʃa wˈale wˌaonˈao, na kupˈinda manˈeno ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
ˌusimwonˈee mɡˈeni; nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mnaɟˈua ɟˈinsi mɡˈeni ˌanavjˌoɟisikˈia, kwa sabˈabu mlikˈuwa waɡˈeni mˈisri.|0
kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka sˈita mtapˈanda maʃˈamba jˈenu na kuvˈuna mazˈao.|0
lakˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba ˌusiilˈime ˈarði wˈala kˌuitumˈia, ˌili wˈatu walˈio maskˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu wawˈeze kupˈata tʃakˈula kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈajo maʃˈamba, nˌao waɲˈama pˈori wapˈate tʃakˈula kwa jˈale mabˈaki wˌatakˌajobakˈiza. ˌutafˈaɲa hˈivjo katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu na la mˌizeitˈuni.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈita fˈaɲa kˈazi zˈako, lakˈini sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌusifˈaɲe kˈazi, ˌili maksˈai wˈako na pˈunda wˈako wapˈate kˌupumzˈika, nˌaje mtˈumwa ˌalijˌezalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈako, pamˈoɟa na mɡˈeni, wapˈate kˌustarˈehe.|0
ˌuziŋɡatˈie kutˈenda kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃˌokuambˈia. ˌusiˈombe kwa maɟˈina ja miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, wˈala ˌusijˌaruhˈusu kˌusikˈika kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako.|0
mˈara tˈatu kwa mwˈaka ˌutanˌifaɲˈia sˌikukˈuu.|0
ˌutaˌaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu; kwa sˈiku sˈaba ˌutakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kˌama nˌilivjˌokuaɡˈiza. fˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili kwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa katˌika mwˈezi wa abˈibu, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa ˈn̩ne, kwa sabˈabu katˌika mwˈezi hˈuo ˌulitˈoka mˈisri. ˈm̩tu jejˈote asˈiɟe mbˈele jˈaŋɡu mikˈono mitˈupu.|0
ˌutaˌaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja mavˈuno kwa mˌalimbˈuko ja mazˈao jˈako ˌulijopˈanda katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako. ˌutaˌaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja kˌukusˈaɲa mavˈuno mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mwˈaka, ˌunapˌokusˈaɲa mavˈuno jˈako tˌoka ʃambˈani.|0
mˈara tˈatu kwa mwˈaka wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌatakˈuɟa mbˈele za bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
msitˈoe dˈamu ja ðabˈihu kwˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo na tʃˈatʃu. mafˈuta ja mɲˈama wa sadˈaka ja sˌikukˈuu jˈaŋɡu jˌasibakˈizwe mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
tazˈama, nˌinamtˈuma mˌalaˈika ˌakutˌaŋɡulˈie mbˈele jˈako ˌakulˈinde ɲɟiˈani na kˌukulˈeta mpˈaka mahˈali nˌilipˌoandˈaa.|0
mtamtˈii na kˌusikilˈiza kˈile ˌanatʃˌokisˈema. ˌusiˈasi ðˈidi jˈake; hˌatakˌusamˈehe uˈasi wˈako, kwa maˈana ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˈimo ndˈani jˈake.|0
kˌama ˌukitˈii kwˈeli kwˈeli kˈile ˌasemˈatʃo na kufˈaɲa jˈote nˌisemˈajo, nˌitakˈuwa adˈui wa adˈui zˈako, na nˌitawapˈiŋɡa wˈale wˌakupiŋɡˈao.|0
mˌalaˈika wˈaŋɡu ˌatatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈako na kˌukulˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori, wahˈiti, wˌaperˈizi, wˌakanaˈani, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, nˌami nˌitawˌafutilˈia mbˈali.|0
ˌusiˌisuɟudˈie miˈuŋɡu jˈao, ˌau kˌuiabˈudu, wˈala kˌufuˈata destˈuri jˈao. ˌutajˌabomˈoa kabˈisa na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟa mˈawe jˈao ja ibˈada vipˈande vipˈande.|0
ˌutamwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, na barˈaka zˌake zˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vjakˈula vjˈako na mˈaɟi jˈako. nˌami nˌitaondˈoa marˈaði mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako.|0
na hakˈuna ˌatakˌajeharˈibu mˈimba wˈala ˌatakˌajekˈuwa tˈasa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. nˌami nˌitakˈupa maˈiʃa mˌakamilˈifu.|0
nˌitapelˈeka utˈiʃo wˈaŋɡu mbˈele jˈako na kˌufaðaˈiʃa kˈila taˈifa ˌutakˌalolˌifikˈia. nˌitafˈaɲa adˈui zˈako wˈote wakˈupe kisˈoɡo na kˌukimbˈia.|0
nˌitatˌaŋɡulˈiza maɲˈiɡu mbˈele jˈako kˌuwafukˈuza wahˈivi, wˌakanaˈani na wahˈiti wˌaondˈoke ɲɟiˈani mwˈako.|0
lakˈini sˌitawˌafukˈuza kwa mˈara mˈoɟa, kwa sabˈabu ˈn̩tʃi ˌitabˈaki ukˈiwa na waɲˈama pˈori wˌatakˈuwa wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no kwˈako.|0
nˌitawˌafukˈuza kidˈoɡo kidˈoɡo mbˈele jˈako, mpˈaka ˈuwe ˌumeˌoŋɡezˈeka kiˈasi tʃa kutˈoʃa kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitawˈeka mipˈaka ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kˌuanzˈia bahˈari ja ʃˈamu hˌadi bahˈari ja wˌafilˈisti, na kˌuanzˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani hˌadi ˈm̩to frˈati. nˌitawatˈia wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈizo mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, nˌawe ˌutawˌafukˈuza watˈoke mbˈele jˈako.|0
ˌusifˈaɲe aɡˈano lolˈote nˌao wˈala na miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
ˌusiwaˈatʃe waˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, la sˈivjo wˌatakˌusababˈiʃa utˈende ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ibˈada ja miˈuŋɡu jˈao hakˈika ˌitakˈuwa mtˈeɡo kwˈako.|0
kˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ɲɟoˈoni hˈuku ɟˈuu kwa bwˈana, wˌewe na arˈoni, nadˈabu na abˈihu, pamˈoɟa na wazˈee sabˈini wa ˌisraˈeli. mnˌiabˈudu kwa mbˈali.|0
lakˈini mˈose pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajemkˌaribˈia bwˈana; weŋɡˈine wasˈiɟe karˈibu. nˌao wˈatu wasˈiɟe wˌakapˈanda pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
mˈose ˌalipokwˈenda na kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu manˈeno jˈote na ʃerˈia zˈote za bwˈana, wˌakaˌitikˈia kwa saˈuti mˈoɟa, kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃosˈema bwˈana tˌutakifˈaɲa.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakaandˈika kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamesˈema. ˌakaˈamka kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema na kuɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu tʃˈini ja mlˈima na kˌusimamˈiʃa ŋɡˈuzo kˈumi na mbˈili za mˈawe kˌuwakilˈiʃa mˌakabˈila kˈumi na mawˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawatˈuma viɟˈana wˌanaˈume wa kˌiisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu za mˌafahˈali watʃˈaŋɡa kˌuwa sadˈaka za amˈani kwa bwˈana.|0
mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua nˈusu ja dˈamu ja wˈale waɲˈama na kˌuiwˈeka kwˈeɲe mˌabakˈuli na nˈusu ɲiŋɡˈine ˌakaˌiɲuɲˈiza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatʃukˈua kˈile kitˈabu tʃa aɡˈano na kˌuwasomˈea wˈatu. nˌao wˌakaɟˈibu, tˌutafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃosˈema bwˈana, nˌasi tˌutatˈii.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua ˈile dˈamu, ˌakawˌaɲuɲizˈia wˈale wˈatu, ˌakasˈema, hˌii ni dˈamu ja aɡˈano ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamelifˈaɲa nˌaɲi kˌufuatˈana na manˈeno hˈaja jˈote.|0
mˈose na arˈoni, nadˈabu na abˈihu, pamˈoɟa na wazˈee sabˈini wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakapˈanda mlimˈani.|0
nˌao wˌakamwˈona mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˌake kˌulikˈuwa na kˈitu kˌama sakˈafu ja mˈawe ja jakˈuti samˈawi, ilˈijo sˈafi kˌama ˈaŋɡa aŋɡˈavu.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌakuinˈua mkˈono wˌake ðˈidi ja hˈawa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌaisraˈeli; wˌalimwˈona mˈuŋɡu, nˌao wakˈala na kˈuɲua.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, pˈanda ˈuɟe kwˈaŋɡu hˈuku mlimˈani na ukˈae hˈapa, nˌami nˌitakˈupa vibˈao vja mˈawe, vjˌeɲe ʃerˈia na ˈamri ambˈazo nˌimezˌiandˈika zˈiwe mwoŋɡˈozo wˈao.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌakaondˈoka na joʃˈua mtumˈiʃi wˈake, nˌaje mˈose ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, tˌuŋɡoɟˈeni hˈapa mpˈaka tˌutakˌapowˌarudˈia. arˈoni na hˈuri wˈako pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, na kˈila alˈije na nˈeno awˈeza kˌuwaendˈea wˈao.|0
mˈose ˌalipopˈanda ɟˈuu mlimˈani, wˈiŋɡu lˌiliˌufunˈika hˈuo mlˈima.|0
nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukatˈua ɟˌuːja mlˈima sinˈai. kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈita wˈiŋɡu lˌilifunˈika mlˈima, na sˈiku ja sˈaba bwˈana ˌakamwˈita mˈose kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja lˈile wˈiŋɡu.|0
kwa wˌaisraˈeli ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌuliˌonekˈana kˌama mˈoto ˌutekˌetezˈao ɟˌuːja mlˈima.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja lˈile wˈiŋɡu ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakipˈanda mlimˈani. nˌaje ˌakakˈaa hˌuko mlimˈani kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini, usˈiku na mtʃˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli wˌaniletˈee sadˈaka. ˌutapokˈea sadˈaka kwa niˈaba jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake wapˈenda kutˈoa.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo sadˈaka ˌutakˌazozˌipokˈea kutˈoka kwˈao: ðahˈabu, fˈeða na ʃˈaba.|0
ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, za zˌambarˈau, za rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu, pamˈoɟa na kitˈani sˈafi; sˈiŋɡa za mbˈuzi.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza hˈema hˈili na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote sˌawasˈawa na kˌielelˈezo nˌitakˌatʃokˌuoɲˈeʃa.|0
nˌao wˌatatˌeŋɡenˈeza sandˈuku la m̩bˈao za mʃˈita, lˈeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mbˈili na nˈusu, upˈana wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu, na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu.|0
ˌutalˌifunˈika hˌilo sandˈuku kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi ndˈani na ɲɟˈe, na kˌulifaɲˈia ukˈiŋɡo wa ðahˈabu ɟˈuu jˌake kˌulizuŋɡˈuka.|0
kˈiʃa ˌutatˌeŋɡenˈeza mipˈiko ja ˈm̩ti wa mʃˈita na kˌuzifunˈika kwa ðahˈabu.|0
hˈijo mipˈiko ˌitabakˈia daˈima katˌika hˈizo pˈete za hˌilo sandˈuku; hˌaitˌaondolˈewa.|0
kˈiʃa wˈeka ndˈani ja hˌilo sandˈuku ˈule ˌuʃuhˈuda nˌitakˌaokˈupa.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza kˌifunˈiko tʃa ˌupatanˈiʃo tʃa ðahˈabu sˈafi, tʃˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mbˈili na nˈusu, na upˈana wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza kerˈubi mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa, na kerˈubi mwiŋɡˈine kwˈeɲe mwˈiʃo mwiŋɡˈine; wˌateŋɡenˈeze mˌakerˈubi hˈao wˈawe kˈitu kimˈoɟa na hˈitʃo kˌifunˈiko katˌika miˈiʃo hˈijo miwˈili.|0
mˌakerˈubi hˈao wˌatakˈuwa wˌametandˈaza mabˈawa kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu, jˌakitˈia kivˈuli hˈitʃo kˌifunˈiko. mˌakerˈubi hˈao wˌataˌelekeˈana, wˌakitazˈama hˈitʃo kˌifunˈiko.|0
wˈeka hˈuo ˌuʃuhˈuda nˌitakˌaokˈupa ndˈani ja hˌilo sandˈuku la aɡˈano, na uwˈeke hˈitʃo kˌifunˈiko ɟˌuːja hˌilo sandˈuku.|0
hˈapo ɟˌuːja hˈitʃo kˌifunˈiko, kˈati ja hˈao mˌakerˈubi wawˈili wˌaliˈoko ɟˌuːja hˌilo sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda, hˈapo ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokutˈana nˌawe na kukˈupa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza mˈeza ja m̩bˈao za mʃˈita jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mbˈili, upˈana wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa, na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu.|0
kˈiʃa tˌeŋɡenˈeza upˈapi wˌeɲe upˈana wa ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne, na ˌufaɲˈie ˈule upˈapi ukˈiŋɡo wa ðahˈabu kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈete ˈn̩ne za ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja mˈeza hˈijo, na ˌuzifuŋɡˈie kwˈeɲe pˈembe ˈn̩ne, pˈale pˈeɲe miɡˈuu jˌake mˈinne.|0
pˈete hˈizo zˌitakˈuwa karˈibu na ukˈiŋɡo ˈule ˌili kˌuiʃˌikilˈia ˈile mipˈiko ˌitakˌajotumˈika kˌuibebˈea hˈijo mˈeza.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza sahˈani zˌake na mˌasinˈia jˌake kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi, pamˈoɟa na bˌilaˈuri na bakˈuli zˌake kwa aɟˈili ja kˌumiminˈia sadˈaka.|0
matˈawi sˈita jˌatatokˈeza kˌuanzˈia ˈule ufˈito wa kˌatikˈati wa kinˈara tʃa tˈaa: matˈawi matˈatu upˈande mmˈoɟa na matˈatu upˈande mwiŋɡˈine.|0
tˈovu mˈoɟa lˌitakˈuwa tʃˈini ja ɟˈozi ja kwˈanza ja matˈawi jˌalijˌotokˈeza kwˈeɲe kinˈara tʃa tˈaa, tˈovu la pˈili tʃˈini ja ɟˈozi ja pˈili, nˈalo tˈovu la tˈatu tʃˈini ja ɟˈozi ja tˈatu, jaˈani matˈawi sˈita kwa ɟˈumla.|0
matˈovu na matˈawi jˈote jˌatakˈuwa kˈitu kimˈoɟa na kˈile kinˈara tʃa tˈaa, jˌakifulˈiwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
kˈiʃa tˌeŋɡenˈeza tˈaa zˌake sˈaba na ˌuziwˈeke ɟˌuːja kinˈara hˈitʃo ˌili zˌiaŋɡˈaze mbˈele jˈake.|0
ˌutatumˈia talˈanta mˈoɟa ja ðahˈabu sˈafi kˌuteŋɡenˈeza hˈitʃo kinˈara na vifˈaa vjˈake vjˈote.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza maskˈani kwa mˌapazˈia kˈumi ja kitˈani ˌilijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri na ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, za zˌambarˈau, na za rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu, nˌaje fˈundi stˈadi ˌatatarˈizi mˌakerˈubi kwˈeɲe mˌapazˈia hˈajo.|0
kuhˈusu kˈile kipˈande tʃa ziˈada tʃa pazˈia la hˈema, nˈusu ja hˌilo pazˈia lˌililobˈaki lˌitanˌiŋɡinˈizwa upˈande wa ɲˈuma wa hˈema.|0
mˌapazˈia ja hˈema jˌatakˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa zaˈidi pˈande zˈote, sehˈemu ˌitakˌajobˈaki ˌitanˌiŋɡinˈia pˈande zˈote za hˈema ˌili kˌuifunˈika.|0
kˈila mhimˈili ˈuwe na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na upˈana wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu.|0
kˈiʃa tˌeŋɡenˈeza vitˈako ˌarobaˈini vja fˈeða vja kuwˈeka tʃˈini ja hˈijo mˌihimˈili, vitˈako viwˈili kwa kˈila mhimˈili, kimˈoɟa tʃˈini ja kˈila ulˈimi.|0
na vitˈako ˌarobaˈini vja fˈeða, viwˈili tʃˈini ja kˈila mhimˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌitakuwˈepo mˌihimˈili minˈane, na vitˈako kˈumi na sˈita vja fˈeða, viwˈili tʃˈini ja kˈila mhimˈili.|0
sˌimamˈiʃa hˈema sˌawasˈawa na mfˈano ˌuliˌooɲˈeʃwa kˈule mlimˈani.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza pazˈia la ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, za zˌambarˈau, na za rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu na kitˈani sˈafi ˌilijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri, nˌaje fˈundi stˈadi ˌatirˈizi mˌakerˈubi kwˈeɲe hˌilo pazˈia.|0
lˌitundˈike kwa kulˈabu za ðahˈabu kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuzo ˈn̩ne za ˈm̩ti wa mʃˈita ambˈazo zˌimefunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu, zikˈiwa zˌimesˌimamˈiʃwa kwˈeɲe vitˈako vˈinne vja fˈeða.|0
nˌiŋɡinˈiza pazˈia hˌilo kwˈeɲe vifˈuŋɡo, kˈiʃa wˈeka sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda ɲˈuma ja pazˈia. pazˈia lˌitatˌeŋɡanˈiʃa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kutˈoka pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
wˈeka kˌifunˈiko tʃa kˈiti tʃa rehˈema ɟˌuːja sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda ndˈani ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
wˈeka mˈeza ɲɟˈe ja pazˈia upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini wa hˈema, kˈiʃa wˈeka kinˈara tʃa tˈaa upˈande wa kusˈini wa hˈema.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema, tˌeŋɡenˈeza pazˈia la ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, za zˌambarˈau, na za rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu na kitˈani sˈafi ˌilijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri, kˈazi ja mtarˈizi.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza kulˈabu za ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja hˌilo pazˈia, na ŋɡˈuzo tˈano za mʃˈita zˌilizˌofunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu. kˈiʃa mimˈina vitˈako vitˈano vja ʃˈaba kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ja m̩bˈao za ˈm̩ti wa mʃˈita, kˈimo tʃˈake kˈiwe ðirˈaa tˈatu; ˌitakˈuwa mrˈaba, urˈefu wˌake ðirˈaa tˈano, na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa tˈano.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza upˈembe kwˈeɲe kˈila pˈembe ja hˈizo pˈembe ˈn̩ne, ˌili zˈile pˈembe na mˌaðabˈahu zˈiwe zˌimeuŋɡˈana, na ˌufunˈike mˌaðabˈahu kwa ʃˈaba.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote kwa ʃˈaba: vjˈuŋɡu vjˈake vja kˌuondolˈea maɟˈivu, mˌasepˈetu, mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, ˈuma za ɲˈama, na vjˈombo vja kˌutʃukulˈia mˈoto.|0
wˈeka wˈavu hˈuo tʃˈini ja ukˈiŋɡo wa mˌaðabˈahu ˌili ˌufikˈie nˈusu ja kˈimo tʃa mˌaðabˈahu.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza mipˈiko ja ˈm̩ti wa mʃˈita kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaðabˈahu, na ˌuifunˈike kwa ʃˈaba.|0
hˈijo mipˈiko ˌitaiŋɡˈizwa kwˈeɲe zˈile pˈete ˌili ˈiwe pˈande mbˈili za mˌaðabˈahu ˌinapobˈebwa.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌaðabˈahu jˈawe na uvˈuŋɡu ndˈani jˌake ˌukitumˈia m̩bˈao. ˌutaˌiteŋɡenˈeza sˌawasˈawa na vˈile ˌulivjˌooɲˈeʃwa mlimˈani.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza ˈua kwa aɟˈili ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. upˈande wa kusˈini ˌutakˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa, na ˌutakˈuwa na mˌapazˈia ja kitˈani ˌilijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri.|0
upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi wa ˈua ˌutakˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini, nˌao ˌutakˈuwa na mˌapazˈia, na ŋɡˈuzo kˈumi na vitˈako vjˈake kˈumi.|0
mˌapazˈia jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na tˈano jˌatakˈuwa upˈande mmˈoɟa wa ˌiŋɡilˈio, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈuzo tˈatu na vitˈako vitˈatu.|0
kˌutakuwˈepo tˈena na mˌapazˈia ja ðirˈaa kˈumi na tˈano kwa upˈande mwiŋɡˈine wa ˌiŋɡilˈio, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈuzo tˈatu na vitˈako vitˈatu.|0
kuhˈusu ˌiŋɡilˈio la ˈua, wˈeka pazˈia lˈeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini la ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, za zˌambarˈau, na za rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu pamˈoɟa na kitˈani ˌilijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri, kˈazi ja mtarˈizi. pazˈia hˌilo lˌitaʃˌikilˈiwa na ŋɡˈuzo ˈn̩ne na vitˈako vˈinne.|0
ŋɡˈuzo zˈote zˌinazˌozuŋɡˈuka ˈua zˌitakˈuwa na tˈepe na kulˈabu za fˈeða, na vitˈako vja ʃˈaba.|0
ˈua wa kˌukutanˈia ˌutakˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini, ukˈiwa na mˌapazˈia ja kitˈani jˌalijˌosokˈotwa vizˈuri jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano kwˈenda ɟˈuu na vitˈako vja ʃˈaba.|0
vjˈombo viŋɡˈine vjˈote vˌinavjˌotumˈika katˌika maskˈani kwa ʃuɣˈuli jojˈote, pamˈoɟa na viɡˈiŋɡi vjˈote na hˌata vˈile vja ˈua, vˌitakˈuwa vja ʃˈaba.|0
ˌutawˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli wˌakuletˈee mafˈuta sˈafi ja zˌeitˈuni jˌalijˌokamulˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja mwˈaŋɡa ˌili zˈile tˈaa ziwˈake mfˌululˈizo.|0
