bˌasi hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kuhˈusu sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, sadˈaka ja hatˈia, sadˈaka ja kuwˈekwa wˈakfu, na sadˈaka ja amˈani.|0
ambˈajo bwˈana alˈimpa mˈose ɟˌuːja mlˈima sinˈai sˈiku ˈile ˌalipˌowaaɡˈiza wˌaisraˈeli walˈete sadˈaka zˈao kwa bwˈana, katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaletˈee arˈoni na wanˈawe mavˈazi jˈao, mafˈuta ja upˈako, fahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili na kikˈapu tʃˌeɲe mikˈate ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa bˌila tʃˈatʃu.|0
kˈiʃa kusˈaɲa mkutˈano wˈote kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
mˈose ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza, na mkutˈano ˌukakˌusaɲˈika kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
mˈose ˌakalˌiambˈia kˌusaɲˈiko, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌameaɡˈiza lˌifaɲˈike.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamlˈeta arˈoni na wanˈawe mbˈele, ˌakawaˈoʃa kwa mˈaɟi.|0
ˌakamvˈika arˈoni kˈoti, ˌakamfˈuŋɡa mʃˈipi, ˌakamvˈika ɟˈoho na kˌumvalˈiʃa kˌisibˈau. pˈia ˌakafˈuŋɡa kˌisibˈau ɟˈuu jˌake na kˌukifˈuŋɡa kˌiunˈoni mwˈake kwa mʃˈipi wˌake ˌuliˌosokˈotwa kwa ustˈadi.|0
ˌakawˈeka kifˈuko tʃa kˌifuˈani ɟˈuu jˈake, na kuwˈeka urˈimu na θumˈimu kwˈeɲe hˈitʃo kifˈuko.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamvˈika arˈoni kilˈemba kitʃwˈani pˈake, ˌakawˈeka lˈile bˈamba la ðahˈabu, jaˈani ˈile tˈaɟi tˌakatˈifu, upˈande wa mbˈele wa kilˈemba, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua mafˈuta ja upˈako na kˌuipˈaka maskˈani na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌokuwˈamo ndˈani jˈake, kˈiʃa ˌakaviwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
ˌakaɲuɲˈiza baˈaði ja mafˈuta ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu mˈara sˈaba, ˌakaipˈaka mˌaðabˈahu mafˈuta na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote pamˈoɟa na sinˈia na kinˈara tʃˈake, ˌili kˌuviwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
ˌakamimˈina sehˈemu ja hˈajo mafˈuta ja upˈako kitʃwˈani ˌm̩wa arˈoni, ˌakamtˈia mafˈuta ˌili kumwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawalˈeta wˈana wa arˈoni mbˈele, ˌakawavˈika makˈoti, ˌakawafˈuŋɡa miʃˈipi na kˌuwavˈika vilˈemba, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamtˈoa fahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, nˌao arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
mˈose ˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa jˈule fahˈali na ˌakatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja hˈijo dˈamu, kˈiʃa kwa kidˈole tʃˈake ˌakaitˈia kwˈeɲe pˈembe zˈote za mˌaðabˈahu ˌili kˌutakˈasa mˌaðabˈahu. ˌakaimwˈaɡa dˈamu ˌilijobˈaki tʃˈini ja mˌaðabˈahu. kwa hˈijo ˌakajawˈeka wˈakfu ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
pˈia mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua mafˈuta jˈote jˌanajˌozuŋɡˈuka sehˈemu za ndˈani, mafˈuta jˌanajˌofunˈika ˈini, fˈiɡo zˈote mbˈili pamˈoɟa na mafˈuta jˈake, ˌakajˌateketˈeza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
lakˈini fahˈali, ikˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈozi jˌake na ɲˈama jˌake na sehˈemu zˌake za ndˈani na matˈumbo, ˌakaˌiteketˈeza ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamlˈeta kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, nˌaje arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa jˈule kondˈoo dˈume na kˌuɲuɲˈiza dˈamu jˌake pˈande zˈote za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
mˈose ˌakamkˈata jˈule kondˈoo dˈume vipˈande vipˈande na kˌukitˌeketˈeza kˈitʃwa, vˈile vipˈande na jˈale mafˈuta.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamsafˈiʃa sehˈemu za ndˈani na miɡˈuu kwa mˈaɟi, na kˌumteketˈeza jˈule kondˈoo dˈume mzˈima ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌupendˈeza, sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakalˈeta kondˈoo dˈume mwiŋɡˈine, n̩dˈije kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuwawˈeka wˈakfu, nˌaje arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
mˈose ˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa jˈule kondˈoo dˈume, ˌakaˌitʃukˈua sehˈemu ja dˈamu jˌake na kˌuipˈaka ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃa ja sikˈio la kuˈume la arˈoni, na ɟˌuːja kidˈole ɡˈumba tʃa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume na ɟˌuːja kidˈole kikˈubwa tʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
pˈia mˈose ˌakawalˈeta hˈao wˈana wa arˈoni mbˈele, ˌakaipˈaka sehˈemu ja hˈijo dˈamu kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃa za mˌasikˈio jˈao ja kuˈume, ɟˌuːja vidˈole ɡˈumba vja mikˈono jˈao ja kuˈume, na ɟˌuːja vidˈole vikˈubwa vja miɡˈuu jˈao ja kuˈume. kˈiʃa ˌakaɲuɲˈiza dˈamu pˈande zˈote za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua mafˈuta ja mɲˈama, mafˈuta ja m̩kˈia, mafˈuta jˈote jˌanajˌozuŋɡˈuka sehˈemu za ndˈani, mafˈuta jˌanajˌofunˈika ˈini, fˈiɡo zˈote mbˈili pamˈoɟa na mafˈuta jˈake, na pˈaɟa la kulˈia.|0
kˈiʃa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kikˈapu tʃa mikˈate ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa bˌila tʃˈatʃu, kˌilitʃokˈuwa mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌakatʃukˈua andˈazi mˈoɟa, na ɟiŋɡˈine lˌililˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mafˈuta, na mkˈate mwembˈamba; ˌakaviwˈeka hˈivi vjˈote ɟˌuːja mafˈuŋɡu ja mafˈuta ja mɲˈama, na ɟˌuːja lˈile pˈaɟa la kulˈia.|0
ˌakaviwˈeka hˈivi vjˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa arˈoni na wanˈawe, na kˌuviinˈua mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakavˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao na kˌuvitˌeketˈeza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kuwˈekwa wˈakfu, harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌupendˈeza, sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatʃukˈua kidˈari, kilˈitʃo fˈuŋɡu la mˈose la kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja kuwˈekwa wˈakfu, na kˌukiinˈua mbˈele za bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja mafˈuta ja upˈako, na sehˈemu ja dˈamu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu, na kˌuviɲuɲˈiza ɟˌuːja arˈoni na mavˈazi jˈake, na ɟˌuːja wanˈawe na mavˈazi jˈao. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈeka arˈoni na mavˈazi jˌake wˈakfu, pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe na mavˈazi jˈao.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni na wanˈawe, pˈika hˈijo ɲˈama kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, na uˈile hˈapo pamˈoɟa na mkˈate kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kikˈapu tʃa sadˈaka ja kuwˈeka wˈakfu, kˌama nˌilivjˌoaɡˈiza, nˌikisˈema, arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌataˈila..|0
kˈiʃa tˌeketˈeza ɲˈama na mikˈate ˌilijobˈaki.|0
msitˈoke kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba, mpˈaka sˈiku zˈenu za kuwˈekwa wˈakfu zˈiwe zˌimetimˈia, kwa kˌuwa mˈuda wˈenu wa kuwˈekwa wˈakfu ˌutakˈuwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
lˈile lˌililˌofaɲˈika lˈeo lˌiliaɡˈizwa na bwˈana ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
lazˈima m̩kˈae kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia usˈiku na mtʃˈana kwa sˈiku sˈaba, na kufˈaɲa lˈile bwˈana ˌanalˌolitˈaka, ˌili kwˌamba msˈife; kwa kˌuwa hˌilo ndˈilo nˌililˌoamrˈiwa.|0
kwa hˈijo arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌoamˈuru kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja nˈane, mˈose ˌakawaˈita arˈoni na wanˈawe, na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, tʃukˈua ndˈama dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka jˈako ja ðˈambi, na kondˈoo dˈume kwa sadˈaka jˈako ja kˌuteketˈezwa, wˈote wawˈili wasˈiwe na dosˈari, nˌao ˌuwalˈete mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: tʃˌukuˈeni mbˈuzi dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na ndˈama na mwˌanakondˈoo, wˈote wawˈili wˈawe wa ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, na wasˈio na dosˈari, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
na pˈia maksˈai na kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja amˈani, ˌili kutˈoa ðabˈihu mbˈele za bwˈana, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌilijˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta. kwa kˌuwa lˈeo bwˈana ˌatawˌatokˈea..|0
wˌakavilˈeta vˈile vˈitu mˈose ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, nˈalo kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikakˌaribˈia na kˌusimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakasˈema, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌowaaɡˈiza mlifˈaɲe, ˌili ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana upˈate kˌuonekˈana kwˈenu.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, ɲɟˈoo mˌaðabahˈuni ˌili utˈoe ðabˈihu jˈako ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na sadˈaka jˈako ja kˌuteketˈezwa, ufˈaɲe ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈako mweɲˈewe na kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu. kˈiʃa utˈoe sadˈaka ja ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
hˈivjo arˈoni akˈaɟa mˌaðabahˈuni na kumtʃˈiɲɟa jˈule ndˈama kˌuwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
wanˈawe wˌakamletˈea dˈamu, nˌaje ˌakatʃˈovja kidˈole tʃˈake katˌika hˈijo dˈamu, ˌakaitˈia kwˈeɲe pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu, nˈajo dˈamu ˌilijobˈaki ˌakaimwˈaɡa tʃˈini ja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ˌakatˌeketˈeza mafˈuta, fˈiɡo na mafˈuta jˌanajˌofunˈika ˈini kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈijo sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
ˌakatˌeketˈeza ɲˈama na ŋɡˈozi ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi.|0
kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌakatʃˈiɲɟa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa. wanˈawe wˌakamletˈea dˈamu, nˌaje ˌakaˌiɲuɲˈiza pˈande zˈote za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
wˌakamletˈea sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kipˈande kwa kipˈande, pamˈoɟa na kˈitʃwa, nˌaje ˌakavˌiteketˈeza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
ˌakasafˈiʃa sehˈemu za ndˈani na miɡˈuu, ˌakavˌiteketˈeza ɟˌuːja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌakalˈeta sadˈaka ˈile ˌilijokˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu. ˌakatʃukˈua jˈule mbˈuzi wa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, ˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa na kumtˈoa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa kwa ˈile ja kwˈanza.|0
arˈoni ˌakalˈeta sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na kˌuitˈoa kˌama ˌilivjˌoelekˈezwa.|0
pˈia ˌakalˈeta sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, ˌakatʃukˈua kˈonzi mˈoɟa na kˌuitˌeketˈeza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja ˌasubˈuhi.|0
ˌakatʃˈiɲɟa maksˈai na kondˈoo dˈume kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu. wanˈawe arˈoni wakˈampa ˈile dˈamu, nˌaje ˌakaˌiɲuɲˈiza kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu pˈande zˈote.|0
lakˈini sehˈemu zˈile za mafˈuta ja jˈule maksˈai na kondˈoo dˈume, jaˈani mafˈuta ja m̩kˈia, mafˈuta jˌalijˌofunˈika tˈumbo, ja fˈiɡo na jˌalijˌofunˈika ˈini.|0
hˈivi vjˈote wˌakaviwˈeka ɟˌuːja vidˈari, kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌakajˌateketˈeza hˈajo mafˈuta ja waɲˈama ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
arˈoni ˌakavˌiinˈua vˈile vidˈari na pˈaɟa la kulˈia mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili vˈiwe sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa, kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌakainˈua mikˈono jˌake kˌuwaˌelekˈea wˈatu na kˌuwabarˈiki. nˌaje baˌada ja kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, na sadˈaka ja amˈani, ˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. wˌalipotˈoka ɲɟˈe, wˌakawˌabarˈiki wˈatu. nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukawˌatokˈea wˈatu wˈote.|0
mˈoto ukˈaɟa kutˈoka uwˈepo wa bwˈana, ˌukairˈamba ˈile sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu ja mafˈuta jˌalijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu. wˈatu wˈote wˌalipoˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha na kˌusuɟˈudu.|0
nadˈabu na abˈihu, wˈana wa arˈoni, wˌakatʃukˈua vjetˈezo vjˈao, wˌakawˈeka mˈoto ndˈani jˌake na kˌuoŋɡˈeza uvˈumba; kˈiʃa wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana mˈoto usˈio halˈali, kiɲˈume na aɡˈizo la mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo mˈoto ukˈaɟa kutˈoka kwa uwˈepo wa bwˈana na kˌuwarˈamba, nˌao wakˈafa mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, hˈili ndˈilo ˌalilonˈena bwˈana wakˈati ˌaliposˈema:  mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌatakˌaonˌikaribˈia nˌitaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu; matʃˈoni pa wˈatu wˈote nˌitahˌeʃimˈiwa.  arˈoni ˌakaɲamˈaza.|0
hˈivjo wakˈaɟa na kˌuwaondˈoa, wakˈiwa bˈado wˌamevalˈia makˈoti jˈao ja ibˈada, wˌakawˌapelˈeka ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi, kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌoamˈuru.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari, msˌifunˈue vˈitʃwa vjˈenu wˈala msˌirarˈue mavˈazi jˈenu, la sˈivjo mtakˈufa na bwˈana ˌataˌikasˌirikˈia ɟˌumuˈija nzˈima. lakˈini ndˈuɡu zˈenu, ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, wˌanawˈeza kˌuwaˌombolezˈea wˈale ambˈao bwˈana ˌamewˌaaŋɡamˈiza kwa mˈoto.|0
msitˈoke ɲɟˈe ja ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, la sˈivjo mtakˈufa, kwa sabˈabu mafˈuta ja bwˈana ja upˈako jˈako ɟˈuu jˈenu. hˈivjo wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama vˈile mˈose ˌalivjosˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni.|0
wˌewe na wanˈao msˈiɲue mvˈiɲo wˈala kˌiɲuˈaɟi kiŋɡˈine kˌilitʃˌotʃatʃˈuka wakˈati mwˌiŋɡiˈapo katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, la sˈivjo mtakˈufa. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
ni lazˈima mtˌeŋɡanˈiʃe kilˈitʃo kˌitakatˈifu na kˈile kilˈitʃo tʃa kˌawaˈida, kˈati ja jalˈijo naɟˈisi na jalˈijo sˈafi.|0
na lazˈima mwˌafundˈiʃe wˌaisraˈeli ˈamri zˈote ambˈazo bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa kˌupitˈia mˈose.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe wˌaliˌosalˈia, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari, tʃˌukuˈeni sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌilijobˈaki kutˈoka sadˈaka zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto, muˈile hˈapo kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu ikˈiwa ˌimeˌandalˈiwa bˌila tʃˈatʃu, kwa sabˈabu ni tˌakatˈifu sˈana.|0
mtaˈila katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwa sabˈabu ni fˈuŋɡu lˈenu na fˈuŋɡu la wˈana wˈenu la sadˈaka zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto, kwa maˈana hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌoamrˈiwa.|0
lakˈini wˌewe na wanˈao na bˈinti zˈako mwawˈeza kˈula kidˈari kˈile kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa na pˈaɟa lˈile lˌililˌotolˈewa. mtavˈila mahˈali sˈafi pa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada; mmepˈewa wˌewe na watˈoto wˈako kˌuwa fˈuŋɡu lˈenu la sadˈaka za amˈani za wˌaisraˈeli.|0
pˈaɟa lˈile lˌililˌotolˈewa na kidˈari kˈile kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa lazˈima vilˈetwe pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu za mafˈuta ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, ˌili kˌuinulˈiwa mbˈele za bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa fˈuŋɡu lˈako la kˌawaˈida na wanˈao, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌoulˈiza kuhˈusu mbˈuzi ˌatolewˈaje kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na kukˈuta kwˌamba ˌametˌeketˈezwa, ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari, wˈana wa arˈoni wˌaliobˈaki, ˌakawˌaulˈiza.|0
kwa nˈini hamkˈula sadˈaka ja ðˈambi katˌika enˈeo la mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu? ni tˌakatˈifu sˈana. mlipˈewa nˈiɲi ˌili kˌuondˈoa hatˈia ja ɟˌumuˈija kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuwafaɲˈia ˌupatanˈiʃo mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa dˈamu jˌake hˌaikulˈetwa ndˈani ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, mŋɡˈemla mbˈuzi hˈujo katˌika sehˈemu ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kˌama nˌilivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
arˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu mˈose, lˈeo wanˈaŋɡu wˌametˈoa sadˈaka zˈao za ðˈambi na sadˈaka zˈao za kˌuteketˈezwa mbˈele za bwˈana, lakˈini mˈambo kˌama hˈaja jˌamenˌitokˈea mˈimi. ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌaŋɡependˈezwa kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimekˈula sadˈaka ja ðˈambi lˈeo.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈaja, ˌakariðˈika.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
wˌaambiˈeni wˌaisraˈeli: kˈati ja waɲˈama wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, hˈawa n̩dˈio mtˌakaowˈala.|0
mwawˈeza kˈula mɲˈama jejˈote mwˌeɲe kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika sehˈemu mbˈili na ambˈaje hˌutʃeˈua.|0
kˈuna waɲˈama weŋɡˈine ambˈao hˌutʃeˈua tu ˌau wˌeɲe kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika tˈu, lakˈini hˈao kˈamwe msiwˈale. ŋɡamˈia iŋɡˈawa hˌutʃeˈua hˈana kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika; kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada hˈijo ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
pelˈele iŋɡˈawa hˌutʃeˈua hˈana kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika; hˈujo ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
nˌaje ŋɡurˈuwe iŋɡˈawa anˈazo kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika sehˈemu mbˈili, hˌatʃeˈui; hˈujo ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
kˈamwe msˈile ɲˈama jˈao wˈala kuɡˈusa mizˈoɡa jˈao; wˌao ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
kuhˈusu viˈumbe wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi ndˈani ja mˈaɟi ja bahˈari na viɟˈito, mtakˈula wˈale wˈote wˌeɲe mapˈezi na maɡˈamba.|0
lakˈini viˈumbe wˈote ndˈani ja bahˈari ˌau viɟˈito wasˈio na mapˈezi na maɡˈamba, wakˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa makˈundi ˌau viˈumbe wˈote ndˈani ja mˈaɟi, hˈao ni mˌatʃukˈizo kwˈenu.|0
nˌao wˌatakˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo kwˈenu. msˈile ɲˈama jˈao, nˈajo mizˈoɡa jˈao ˌitakˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃoˈiʃi ndˈani ja mˈaɟi ambˈatʃo hakˈina mapˈezi na maɡˈamba kˌitakˈuwa tʃukˈizo kwˈenu.|0
wˌafuatˈao n̩dˈio ndˈeɡe wˌatakˌaokˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo kwˈenu, hˈivjo msiwˈale kwa sabˈabu ni tʃukˈizo: tˈai, fˌurukˈombe, kipˈuŋɡu.|0
mwˈewe mwekˈundu, aˈina zˈote za mwˈewe mweˈusi.|0
aˈina zˈote za kuŋɡˈuru.|0
mbˈuni, kˌirukaɲɟˈia, dˌudumˈizi, kipˈaŋɡa, ʃˈakwe, aˈina zˈote za kipˈaŋɡa.|0
bˈundi, mnˈandi, bˈundi mkˈubwa.|0
mˈumbi, mwˈari, ndˈeri.|0
wadˈudu wˈote wˌarukˈao ambˈao hˌutembˈea kwa miɡˈuu mˈinne wˌatakˈuwa tʃukˈizo kwˈenu.|0
lakˈini wˈako viˈumbe wˌeɲe mabˈawa ambˈao hˌutembˈea kwa miɡˈuu mˈinne mtˌakaowˈala: wˈale wˌeɲe vifˈundo katˌika miɡˈuu jˈao ja kˌurukarˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈawa, mtakˈula nzˈiɡe wa aˈina zˈote, senˈene, parˈare ˌau pˈanzi.|0
lakˈini viˈumbe weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌeɲe mabˈawa na wˌeɲe miɡˈuu mˈinne ni mˌatʃukˈizo kwˈenu.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajebˈeba mizˈoɡa ja viˈumbe hˈawa ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈila mɲˈama mwˌeɲe ukwˈato ˌuliˌoatʃˈana lakˈini hˌaukˌuɡawaɲˈika kabˈisa, ˌau jˈule ˌasijˌetʃeˈua, hˈujo ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu; jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje mzˈoɡa wowˈote wa hˈao ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa waɲˈama wˈote wˌatembeˈao kwa miɡˈuu mˈinne, wˈale wˌatembeˈao kwa vitˈaŋɡa vjˈao ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu; jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje mizˈoɡa jˈao ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajebˈeba mizˈoɡa jˈao ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. waɲˈama hˈawa ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
kuhˈusu waɲˈama wˌatambaˈao ɟˌuːja ˈarði, hˈawa ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu: kitʃˈetʃe, pˈaɲa, aˈina jojˈote ja miɟˈusi mikˈubwa.|0
ɡˌuruɡˈuru, kˈeŋɡe, miɟˈusi ja ˌukutˈani, ɡˌoromˈoe na kiɲˈoŋɡa.|0
hˈao wˈote wˌatambaˈao ɟˌuːja ˈarði ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu. jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje mizˈoɡa jˈao ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌatakˈufa na kˌuaŋɡukˈia ɟˌuːja kˈitu fulˈani, tʃˈombo hˈitʃo, hˌata kikˈiwa tʃa mˌatumˈizi ɡˈani, kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, kˈiwe kˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa ˈm̩ti, ŋɡˈuo, ŋɡˈozi ˌau ɡunˈia. kiwˈeke ndˈani ja mˈaɟi; kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni, kˈiʃa kˌitakˈuwa sˈafi tˈena.|0
ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wa waɲˈama ˌalijekˈufa ˌataˌaŋɡukˈia ndˈani ja tʃˈuŋɡu, kˈila kˌilitʃˈomo katˌika tʃˈuŋɡu hˈitʃo kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, nˌawe ni lazˈima uvˈuɲɟe tʃˈuŋɡu hˈitʃo.|0
tʃakˈula tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo tʃawˈeza kulˈiwa lakˈini kikˈawa kˌimeiŋɡˈia mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu hˈitʃo ni naɟˈisi, na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa mˌaɟimˈaɟi ambˈatʃo tʃawˈeza kˌuɲuˈeka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu hˈitʃo ni naɟˈisi.|0
tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo mzˈoɡa wa mmˌoɟawˈapo ˌutaˌaŋɡukˈia kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi. ɟˈiko ˌau tʃˈuŋɡu tʃa kˌupikˈia ni lazˈima kivˈuɲɟue. ni naɟˈisi, nˌawe ni lazˈima ˌuvihesˈabu kˌuwa naɟˈisi.|0
lakˈini tʃemtʃˈemi ˌau kisˈima, mahˈali pa kutʃˈota mˈaɟi, pˌatakˈuwa sˈafi, lakˈini jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈusa mˈoɟa ja mizˈoɡa hˌii ni naɟˈisi.|0
kˌama mzˈoɡa ˌukiaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja mbˈeɡu zozˈote ambˈazo ni za kupˈanda, zˌinabˈaki sˈafi.|0
lakˈini kˌama mbˈeɡu ˌimetˈiwa mˈaɟi na mzˈoɡa ˌukaaŋɡˈuka ɟˈuu jˈake, hˈijo mbˈeɡu ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu.|0
kˌama mɲˈama ambˈaje mnˌaruhusˈiwa kˈumla akˈifa, jejˈote ˌatakˌajeuɡˈusa mzˈoɡa wˌake ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈula sehˈemu ja mzˈoɡa hˈuo ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. jejˈote ˌatakˌajebˈeba mzˈoɡa hˈuo ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈila kiˈumbe kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði ni tʃukˈizo; kˌisilˈiwe.|0
msˈile kiˈumbe tʃotʃˈote kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði, kˈiwe kˌitambaˈatʃo kwa tˈumbo lˈake, ˌau kˌitambaˈatʃo kwa miɡˈuu mˈinne ˌau kwa miɡˈuu mˈiŋɡi; ni tʃukˈizo.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu; ɟˌitakasˈeni ˈm̩we wˌatakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ni mtˌakatˈifu. msˌiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi weɲˈewe kwa kiˈumbe tʃotʃˈote kˈile kˌiendˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌilijˌewapandˈiʃa mtˈoke mˈisri ˌili nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. kwa hˈijo kuwˈeni wˌatakatˈifu kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ni mtˌakatˈifu.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kuhˈusu waɲˈama, ndˈeɡe, kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌiendˈatʃo ndˈani ja mˈaɟi, na kˈila kiˈumbe kˌiendˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
ni lazˈima mpˌambanˈue kˈati ja kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi na kilˈitʃo sˈafi, kˈati ja viˈumbe hˈai vˌinavjowˈeza kulˈiwa na vˈile vˌisivjowˈeza kulˈiwa..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: mwanˈamke ambˈaje ˌatapˈata mˈimba na kuzˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada kwa sˈiku sˈaba, kˌama ˌanavjokˈuwa naɟˈisi wakˈati wa sˈiku zˌake za hˈeði.|0
mvulˈana ˌatatˌahirˈiwa sˈiku ja nˈane.|0
kˈiʃa ni lazˈima hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌasubˈiri kwa sˈiku θˌelaθˈini na tˈatu, ndˈipo ˌatakˈaswe kutˈoka dˈamu kwˈake. hˌatarˌuhusˈiwa kuɡˈusa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo kˌitakatˈifu ˌau kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, mpˈaka sˈiku za kˌutakˈaswa kwˈake zˌimetimˈia.|0
kˌama ˌakimzˈaa mtˈoto wa kˈike, mwanˈamke hˈujo ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa maɟˈuma mawˈili, kˌama wakˈati wˌake wa hˈeði. kˈiʃa ˌatasubˈiri kwa sˈiku sitˈini na sˈita, ndˈipo ˌatatakˈaswa kutˈoka dˈamu kwˈake.|0
sˈiku zˌake za ˌutakˈaso kwa aɟˈili ja mwˈana ˌau bˈinti zˌitakˌapotimˈia, mwanˈamke hˈujo ˌatamletˈea kuhˈani kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia mwˌanakondˈoo mwˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, na kˈinda la ɲɟˈiwa ˌau hˈua kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
ˌatavitˈoa mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈake, na kˈiʃa ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi kwa destˈuri ja ibˈada kˌutokˈana na kutˈokwa dˈamu kwˈake.  hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈamke ˌatakˌajezˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike.|0
kˌama hˈujo mwanˈamke hˈana uwˈezo wa kumpˈata mwˌanakondˈoo, ˌatalˈeta hˈua wawˈili ˌau makˈinda mawˈili ja ɲɟˈiwa, mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na mwiŋɡˈine kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii, kuhˈani ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi..|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
iwˈapo ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˈuwa na uvˈimbe ˌau upˈele ˌau alˈama ɲeˈupe ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˌake ambˈajo jawˈeza kˌuwa uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, ni lazˈima alˈetwe kwa arˈoni kuhˈani ˌama kwa wanˈawe, kuhˈani mmˌoɟawˈapo.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃuŋɡˈuza hˈitʃo kidˈonda kˌilitʃˈopo ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˈake, na kˌama ɲuˈele za mahˈali palˈipo na kidˈonda zˌimebˌadilˈika kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, na ikˈiwa kidˈonda kˌimeiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ŋɡˈozi, bˌasi ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, jaˈani ukˈoma. kuhˈani ˌatakˌapomtʃuŋɡˈuza, ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza ˈm̩tu hˈujo kˌuwa ni naɟˈisi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada.|0
kˌama alˈama ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˌake ni ɲeˈupe, lakˈini hˌaiˌonekˈani kˌuwa ˌimeiŋɡˈia ndˈani zaˈidi ja ŋɡˈozi, na ɲuˈele kwˈeɲe alˈama hˈijo hˌaziɟˌaɡeˈuka kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, kuhˈani ˌatamtˈeŋɡa ˈm̩tu hˈujo mahˈali pa pekˈee kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba, kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama hˌakuˈona bˌadilˈiko kwˈeɲe kˈile kidˈonda na hˌakiɟˌaenˈea ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi, ˌatamtˈeŋɡa kwa sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza tˈena, na kˌama kidˈonda kˌimepuŋɡˈua na hˌakiɟˌaenˈea ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza ˈm̩tu hˈujo kˌuwa ni sˈafi, ni upˈele tˈu. ni lazˈima ˈm̩tu hˈujo afˈue mavˈazi jˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˈule upˈele ˌutaenˈea ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˌake baˌada ja jˌeje kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa kwa kuhˈani na kˌutaŋɡˈazwa kˌuwa sˈafi, ni lazˈima aˈende tˈena kwa kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama upˈele ˌumeenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi, ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi, kwˈani ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, jaˈani ukˈoma.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˈana uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, ni lazˈima alˈetwe kwa kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza na kˌama kˈuna uvˈimbe mweˈupe ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi ambˈao ˌumefˈaɲa ɲuˈele kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, na kˌama kˈuna ɲˈama mbˈitʃi ndˈani ja uvˈimbe.|0
ni uɡˈoɲɟua sˈuɡu wa ŋɡˈozi, na kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi. hˌatamtˈeŋɡa tˈena kwa sabˈabu ni naɟˈisi tajˈari.|0
ikˈiwa uɡˈoɲɟua ˌutakˈuwa ˌumeenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi jˌake jˈote kwa kadˈiri kuhˈani ˌatakˌavjowˈeza kuˈona, kwˌamba ˌumeenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi jˈote ja hˈujo mɡˈoɲɟua kutˈoka kitʃwˈani mpˈaka wˈajo.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama uɡˈoɲɟua ˌumeenˈea mwˈili mzˈima, ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza hˈujo ˈm̩tu kˌuwa sˈafi. kwa kˌuwa mwˈili wˈote ˌumekˈuwa mweˈupe, jˌeje ni sˈafi.|0
lakˈini ˌitokeˈapo ɲˈama mbˈitʃi kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi jˈake, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
kuhˈani ˌatakˌapoiˈona hˈijo ɲˈama mbˈitʃi, ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza ˈm̩tu hˈujo kˌuwa naɟˈisi. hˈijo ɲˈama mbˈitʃi ni naɟˈisi, ˈana uɡˈoɲɟua wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
hˈijo ɲˈama mbˈitʃi ˌikiɡeˈuka na kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, ni lazˈima ˌamwendˈee kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama vidˈonda vˌimekˈuwa vjeˈupe, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza mɡˈoɲɟua hˈujo kˌuwa sˈafi; kˈiʃa ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˈana ɟˈipu ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˌake nˈalo lˌikapˈona.|0
nˈapo mahˈali pˌalipokˈuwa na ɟˈipu pˌakatokˈea uvˈimbe mweˈupe, ˌau alˈama jˌeɲe wekˈundu na weˈupe, ni lazˈima ˌakaɟˌioɲˈeʃe kwa kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatapˌatʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama uvˈimbe ˌumezˈama ndˈani ja ŋɡˈozi, na ɲuˈele zˌimeɡeˈuka kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza ˈm̩tu hˈujo kˌuwa naɟˈisi. ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza ˌuliˌoɟitokˈeza pˈale ɟˈipu lˌilipokˈuwa.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa wakˈati kuhˈani ˌanapˌopatʃuŋɡˈuza pakˈawa hapˈana ɲuˈele ɲeˈupe ndˈani jˈake, wˈala hakˈuna ʃˈimo bˌali pˌamepuŋɡˈua, bˌasi kuhˈani ˌatamtˈeŋɡa ˈm̩tu hˈujo kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
kˌama ˌunaenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi; ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˈile alˈama hˌaiɟˌabadilˈika wˈala kˌuenˈea, ni kˈovu tu kˌutokˈana na ɟˈipu, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌameuŋɡˈua kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi jˈake, pˌakatokˈea alˈama jˌeɲe wekˈundu na weˈupe, ˌau alˈama ɲeˈupe ˌikaˌonekˈana pˈeɲe ɲˈama mbˈitʃi pˈale pˌalipˌouŋɡˈua.|0
kuhˈani ˌataˌitʃuŋɡˈuza ˈile alˈama, na kˌama ɲuˈele zˌilizˈoko ɟˈuu jˌake zˌimeɡeˈuka kˌuwa ɲeˈupe, nˈapo pˌametokˈea ʃˈimo, bˌasi hˈuo ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza ambˈao ˌumetokˈea ɟˌuːja ɟerˈaha la mˈoto. kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi; ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
lakˈini kˌama kuhˈani ˌakitʃuŋɡˈuza na kuˈona kwˌamba hakˈuna ɲuˈele ɲeˈupe kwˈeɲe alˈama ˈile, wˈala hakˈuna ʃˈimo nˈapo pˌameˈanza kˌupuŋɡˈua, bˌasi kuhˈani ˌatamtˈeŋɡa kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza tˈena, na kˌama ˌunaenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi; ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
lakˈini, kˌama alˈama ˈile hˌaikˌubadilˈika na wˈala hˌaiɟˌaenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi, nˈapo pˌamepuŋɡˈua, ni uvˈimbe kˌutokˈana na ɟerˈaha la mˈoto, na kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi; ni kˈovu tu kˌutokˈana na kˌuuŋɡˈua.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˈana kidˈonda ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa ˌau ɟˌuːja kidˈevu.|0
kuhˈani ˌatakˌitʃuŋɡˈuza kˈile kidˈonda, na kˌama ˌataˈona kˌuwa kˌimeiŋɡˈia ndˈani, na ɲuˈele zˌilizˈoko ɟˈuu jˌake ni ɲɟˈano na ɲembˈamba, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza ˈm̩tu hˈujo kˌuwa naɟˈisi, kwˈani ni upˈele; ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza wa kˈitʃwa ˌau kidˈevu.|0
lakˈini kˌama kuhˈani ˌakitʃuŋɡˈuza aˈina hˌii ja kidˈonda, kˌionekˈane kˌuwa hakˈina ʃˈimo na hakˈuna ɲuˈele ɲeˈusi ɟˈuu jˈake, bˌasi ˌatamtˈeŋɡa ˈm̩tu hˈujo kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba kuhˈani ˌatatʃuŋɡˈuza kidˈonda kˈile, na kˌama upˈele hˌauɟˌaenˈea, na hakˈuna ɲuˈele za maɲɟˈano ɟˈuu jˈake, wˈala hakˈuna ʃˈimo lolˈote.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌaɲolˈewe, ˌisipokˈuwa mahˈali palˈipo na uɡˈoɲɟua, nˌaje kuhˈani ˌatamtˈeŋɡa kwa sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba kuhˈani ˌatatʃuŋɡˈuza tˈena ˈule upˈele; ikˈiwa hˌauɟˌaenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi na hakˈuna ʃˈimo mahˈali pˈale, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi. lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa upˈele ˌutaenˈea ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi baˌada ja kˌutaŋɡˈazwa kˌuwa sˈafi.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama upˈele ˌumeenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi, kuhˈani hˈana hˈaɟa ja kˌutazˈama kˌama kˈuna ɲuˈele za maɲɟˈano, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni naɟˈisi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, katˌika ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi wˌake ˌakiˈona hˌapaɟˌabadilˈika, na ɲuˈele ɲeˈusi zˌimeˈota ɟˈuu jˈake, upˈele ˌumepˈona. jˌeje si naɟˈisi, kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˈana alˈama ɲeˈupe ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi jˈake.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama alˈama hˈizo zˈina weˈupe ˌuliˌofifˈia, ni vipˈele visˈivjo na maðˈara vˌilivjˌoɟitokˈeza kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi; ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni sˈafi.|0
wakˈati mwˌanaˈume hˈana ɲuˈele nˌaje ˈana upˈaa, jˌeje ni sˈafi.|0
ikˈiwa hˈana ɲuˈele kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈozi ja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, na ˈana upˈaa ʃˈu kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi, ni sˈafi.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈana kidˈonda tʃˌeɲe wekˈundu na weˈupe kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃˈake tʃˌeɲe upˈaa, ˌau kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi la ˈuso, ni uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza ˌunaˌoɟitokˈeza kitʃwˈani ˌau kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi lˈake la ˈuso.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama kidˈonda kˌilitʃovˈimba ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ˌau kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi la ˈuso ni tʃekˈundu ˌau tʃeˈupe kˌama uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni mɡˈoɲɟua, na ni naɟˈisi. kuhˈani ˌatamtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa naɟˈisi kwa sabˈabu ja kidˈonda kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
kwa mˈuda wˈote ˌatakˌaokˈuwa na uɡˈoɲɟua hˈuo wa kˌuambukˈiza ˌatabˈaki kˌuwa naɟˈisi. ni lazˈima aˈiʃi pˈeke jˈake; ni lazˈima aˈiʃi ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi.|0
kˌama vˈazi lolˈote lˈina mˌaambukˈizo ja upˈele: likˈiwa ni vˈazi la sˈufu ˌau kitˈani.|0
lolˈote lˌililofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa likˈiwa la kitˈani ˌau la sˈufu, ŋɡˈozi jojˈote ˌau tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ŋɡˈozi.|0
tˈena kˌama mˌaambukˈizo kwˈeɲe vˈazi, ˌau ŋɡˈozi, ˌau lˌililofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa, ˌau kifˈaa tʃotʃˈote tʃa ŋɡˈozi, ni rˈaŋɡi ja kiɟˈani ˌau ɲekˈundu, hˈuo ni upˈele ˌunaˌoenˈea na ni lazˈima kuhˈani ˌaoɲˈeʃwe.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃuŋɡˈuza upˈele hˈuo na kˌukitˈeŋɡa kifˈaa hˈitʃo kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌatakˌitʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama upˈele ˌumeenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuo, ˌau kifˈaa kˌilitʃofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa, ˌau ŋɡˈozi, kwa vjovjˈote vˈile ˌitumikˈavjo, ni upˈele ˌuaŋɡˌamizˈao, kifˈaa hˈitʃo ni naɟˈisi.|0
ni lazˈima ˌaitʃˈome hˈijo ŋɡˈuo, ikˈiwa ni ja sˈufu ˌama kitˈani ˌilijofˈumwa ˌama kˌusokˈotwa, ˌama tʃˈombo tʃotʃˈote tʃa ŋɡˈozi tʃˌeɲe mˌaambukˈizo, kwa kˌuwa ni upˈele ˌunaˌoaŋɡamˈiza; tʃˈombo tʃˈote ni lazˈima kitʃˈomwe mˈoto.|0
lakˈini wakˈati kuhˈani ˌatakˌapokˌitʃuŋɡˈuza na kuˈona kˌuwa ˈule upˈele hˌauɟˌaenˈea kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuo ˌilijofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa, ˌau vifˈaa vja ŋɡˈozi.|0
ˌataaɡˈiza kwˌamba kifˈaa tʃˌeɲe mˌaambukˈizo kˌisafˈiʃwe. kˈiʃa ˌatakitˈeŋɡa kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
baˌada ja kifˈaa tʃˌeɲe mˌaambukˈizo kˌusafˈiʃwa, kuhˈani ˌatakˌitʃuŋɡˈuza, na kˌama upˈele hˌauɟˌaoɲˈeʃa bˌadilˈiko lolˈote, hˌata kˌama hˌauɟˌaenˈea, ni naɟˈisi. kitʃˈome kwa mˈoto, ˈiwe upˈele ˌumeenˈea upˈande mmˈoɟa ˌau mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kˌama kuhˈani ˌataˈona kˌuwa ˈile alˈama ˌimefifˈia baˌada ja kuˈoʃwa, bˌasi ˌatararˈua sehˈemu ilˈijo ˌambukˈizwa ja ŋɡˈuo ˌau ŋɡˈozi ˌau kifˈaa kˌilitʃofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌikiɟˌitokˈeza tˈena kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuo ˌau kˈitu kˌilitʃofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa, ˌama kifˈaa tʃa ŋɡˈozi, kwˌamba ˈule upˈele ˌunaenˈea, tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe upˈele ni lazˈima kitʃˈomwe kwa mˈoto.|0
ŋɡˈuo, ˌau kˈitu kˌilitʃofˈumwa ˌau kˌusokˈotwa, ˌau kifˈaa tʃotʃˈote tʃa ŋɡˈozi ambˈatʃo kˌimesafˈiʃwa na kˌuondolˈewa upˈele, ni lazˈima kiˈoʃwe tˈena, nˈatʃo kˌitakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
hˈaja ni maʃˈarti kuhˈusu mˌaambukˈizo ja upˈele kwˈeɲe mavˈazi ja sˈufu ˌau kitˈani, jˌalijofˈumwa ˌama kˌusokˈotwa, ˌama kifˈaa tʃotʃˈote tʃa ŋɡˈozi, kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuvitaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi ˌau naɟˈisi.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti jˌamhusˈujo ˈm̩tu mɡˈoɲɟua wakˈati wa kˌufaɲˈiwa ibˈada ja ˌutakˈaso wakˈati ˌaletwˈapo kwa kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatakwˈenda kˌumtʃuŋɡˈuza ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi. kˌama ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatakˈuwa ˌamepˈona uɡˈoɲɟua wˌake wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza.|0
kuhˈani ˌataaɡˈiza vˈitu vˌifuatˈavjo vilˈetwe kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajetakˈaswa: ndˈeɡe wawˈili sˈafi walˈio hˈai, ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, kitˈani ɲekˈundu, na hisˈopo.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌataaɡˈiza kwˌamba mmˈoɟa wa ndˈeɡe wˈale atʃˈiɲɟue kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu tʃˌeɲe mˈaɟi sˈafi.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatamtʃukˈua ndˈeɡe alˈije hˈai na kˌumtumbukˈiza pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, kitˈani ɲekˈundu na hisˈopo ndˈani ja dˈamu ja jˈule ndˈeɡe ˌalijˌetʃiɲɟˈiwa kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi sˈafi.|0
ˌatamɲˌuɲizˈia jˈule mwˌeɲe uɡˈoɲɟua wa kˌuambukˈiza mˈaɟi hˈajo mˈara sˈaba, na kˌumtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi. kˈiʃa ˌatamwatʃˈia jˈule ndˈeɡe alˈije hˈai aˈende zˌake kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba.|0
hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajetakˈaswa ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, aɲˈoe ɲuˈele zˌake zˈote, na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi; ndˈipo ˌatakˌapokˈuwa sˈafi kwa destˈuri ja ibˈada. baˌada ja hˈili ˌanawˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia kambˈini, lakˈini ni lazˈima akˈae ɲɟˈe ja hˈema lˈake kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba ni lazˈima aɲˈoe ɲuˈele zˌake zˈote; jaˈani aɲˈoe ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa, ndˈevu zˈake, kˈope zˌake na ɲuˈele ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote. ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
sˈiku ja nˈane, ni lazˈima alˈete kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili na kondˈoo ɟˈike mmˈoɟa, wˈote wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa na wasˈio na dosˈari, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu tˈatu za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, na lˈoɡi mˈoɟa ja mafˈuta.|0
kuhˈani ˌatakˌajemtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa sˈafi ˌatahitˈaɟi kˌumkabˈiði mɡˈoɲɟua ˌalijepˈona pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˌake zˈote mbˈele za bwˈana katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatamtʃukˈua mmˈoɟa wa wˈale kondˈoo dˈume na kumtˈoa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja hatˈia, pamˈoɟa na ˈile lˈoɡi mˈoɟa ja mafˈuta; ˌatavˌiinˈua mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa.|0
ˌatamtʃˈiɲɟa hˈujo kondˈoo katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ambˈapo sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na ˈile ja kˌuteketˈezwa hˌutʃiɲɟˈiwa. kˌama ilˈivjo sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, sadˈaka ja hatˈia ni ja kuhˈani; nˈajo ni tˌakatˈifu sˈana.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja dˈamu ja sadˈaka ja hatˈia na kˌuitˈia kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃa ja sikˈio la kuˈume la jˈule ˌatakˌajetakˈaswa, kwˈeɲe kidˈole ɡˈumba tʃa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume, na kidˈole kikˈubwa tʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja ˈile lˈoɡi ja mafˈuta, ˌajamimˈine kwˈeɲe kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃa mkˈono wˌake mweɲˈewe wa kuʃˈoto.|0
kuhˈani ˌatajapˈaka mafˈuta jˌalijobˈaki kwˈeɲe kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃˈake ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa, na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja jˈule ˌatakˌajetakˈaswa kutˈoka ˌunaɟˈisi wˈake. baˌada ja hˈajo, kuhˈani ˌatatʃˈiɲɟa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
na kˌuitˈoa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌili kˌumfaɲˈia ˌupatanˈiʃo, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama ni maskˈini na hawˈezi kupˈata vˈitu hˈivi, lazˈima ˌatʃukˈue mwˌanakondˈoo mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja hatˈia ipˈate kˌuinulˈiwa ˌili kˌumfaɲˈia ˌupatanˈiʃo, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na lˈoɡi mˈoɟa ja mafˈuta kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
na hˈua wawˈili ˌau makˈinda mawˈili ja ɲɟˈiwa, kˈile ˌatakˌatʃowˈeza kupˈata, mmˈoɟa kwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na mwiŋɡˈine kwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja nˈane, lazˈima ˌavilˈete vˈitu hˈivjo kwa kuhˈani, kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutakˈaswa kwˈake kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamtʃukˈua mwˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja hatˈia, pamˈoɟa na ˈile lˈoɡi ja mafˈuta ja kˌuinulˈiwa mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa.|0
ˌatamtʃˈiɲɟa hˈujo mwˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja hatˈia. pˈia ˌataˌitʃukˈua sehˈemu ja dˈamu jˌake na kˌuipˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃa ja sikˈio la kuˈume la jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa, na ˌaipˈake pˈia kwˈeɲe kidˈole ɡˈumba tʃa mkˈono wa kuˈume wa hˈujo ˈm̩tu, na kidˈole kikˈubwa tʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamˌiminˈia sehˈemu ja mafˈuta kwˈeɲe kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃˈake tʃa mkˈono wa kuʃˈoto.|0
na kwa kidˈole tʃˈake tʃa ʃahˈada tʃa mkˈono wa kuˈume, ˌatamɲˌuɲizˈia jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa jˈale mafˈuta jalˈijo kwˈeɲe kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃˈake mˈara sˈaba mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ˌatampˈaka mafˈuta jˌalijobˈaki kwˈeɲe kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃˈake katˌika sehˈemu zˈote, kˌama ˌalivjompˈaka dˈamu ja sadˈaka ja hatˈia: jaˈani, kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃa ja sikˈio la kuˈume la jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa, kwˈeɲe kidˈole ɡˈumba tʃa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume, na kidˈole kikˈubwa tʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
kuhˈani ˌatajapˈaka mafˈuta jˌalijobˈaki katˌika kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃˈake kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa, na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu wˈale hˈua ˌama jˈale makˈinda ja ɲɟˈiwa ambˈajo ˈm̩tu ˌatawˈeza kˌuwapˈata.|0
mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na mwiŋɡˈine kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii kuhˈani ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja jˈule ˌanajˌetakˈaswa.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌeɲe uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, na ambˈaje hˈana uwˈezo wa kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌawaˈida kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutakˈaswa kwˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani ambˈajo nˌinawˈapa kˌuwa mˈilki jˈenu, nˌami nˌikawˈeka upˈele ˌueneˈao kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile.|0
ni lazˈima mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba hˈijo ˌakamwambˈie kuhˈani, nˌimeˈona kˈitu fulˈani kˌinatʃˌofanˈana na upˈele kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu..|0
kuhˈani ˌataaɡˈiza vˈitu vjˈote vˌitolˈewe ndˈani ja ɲˈumba, kˈabla hˌaɟaˈenda kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza kˌama ˈina uɡˈoɲɟua hˈuo, ˌili kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ndˈani ja ɲˈumba kˌisitaŋɡˈazwe kˌuwa naɟˈisi. baˌada ja hˈili, kuhˈani ˌataiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌuikaɡˈua hˈijo ɲˈumba.|0
ˌatatʃuŋɡˈuza upˈele hˈuo katˌika kˈuta za ɲˈumba hˈijo, nˈazo kˌama zˈina rˈaŋɡi ja kiɟˈani kibˈitʃi ˌau wekˈundu, na kˈuna mˌiboɲˈeo ndˈani ja ukˈuta.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatˈoka na kufˈuŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba hˈijo kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba, kuhˈani ˌatarˈudi kˌuikaɡˈua ɲˈumba. kˌama upˈele ˌumeenˈea ɟˌuːja kˈuta.|0
ˌataaɡˈiza kwˌamba mˈawe jˈote jˌalijˌoambukˈizwa jˌaondolˈewe na kutˈupwa katˌika enˈeo lilˈilo naɟˈisi ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈuta zˈote za ndˈani ja ɲˈumba hˈijo ni lazˈima zˌikwaŋɡulˈiwe, na kifˈusi tʃˈake kitˈupwe mahˈali naɟˈisi ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatatʃukˈua mˈawe meŋɡˈine na kuɟˈeŋɡa pˌalipˌobomolˈewa kwa udˈoŋɡo ˈm̩pja wa mfiɲˈanzi, na kˌuipˈiɡa ɲˈumba hˈijo lˈipu ˈm̩pja.|0
ikˈiwa upˈele hˈuo ˌutatokˈea tˈena ndˈani ja ˈile ɲˈumba baˌada ja mˈawe kˌuondolˈewa na ɲˈumba kˌukwaŋɡulˈiwa na kuwˈekwa lˈipu ˈm̩pja.|0
kuhˈani ˌatakwˈenda kˌuikaɡˈua, na kˌama upˈele ˌumeenˈea ndˈani ja ɲˈumba, bˌasi ni upˈele ˌuharibˈuo; ɲˈumba hˈijo ni naɟˈisi.|0
ni lazˈima ˌibomolˈewe: mˈawe jˈake, m̩bˈao na lˈipu jˈake, vjˈote vˌikatˈupwe ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi mahˈali palˈipo naɟˈisi.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeiŋɡˈia katˌika ɲˈumba hˈijo ikˈiwa ˌimefˈuŋɡwa, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajelˈala ˌau kˈula ndˈani ja ɲˈumba hˈijo ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa kuhˈani ˌatakˈuɟa kˌuikaɡˈua na kukˈuta kˌuwa upˈele hˌauɟˌaenˈea tˈena baˌada ja ɲˈumba kupˈiɡwa lˈipu, ˌataˌitaŋɡˈaza ɲˈumba ˈile kˌuwa sˈafi, kwa sabˈabu upˈele ˌumekwˈiʃa.|0
ˌili kˌuitakˈasa ɲˈumba hˈijo, mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba ˌatalˈeta ndˈeɡe wawˈili, ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, kitˈani ɲekˈundu na hisˈopo.|0
ˌatamtʃˈiɲɟa mmˈoɟa wa wˈale ndˈeɡe kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu tʃˌeɲe mˈaɟi sˈafi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatatʃukˈua ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, hisˈopo, kitˈani ɲekˈundu na ndˈeɡe alˈije hˈai, na kˌuvitˌumbukˈiza ndˈani ja dˈamu ja ndˈeɡe ˌalijetʃˈiɲɟua pamˈoɟa na mˈaɟi sˈafi, na kˌuiɲˌuɲizˈia ɲˈumba ˈile mˈara sˈaba.|0
ˌataˌitakˈasa ɲˈumba kwa dˈamu ja jˈule ndˈeɡe, mˈaɟi sˈafi, ndˈeɡe alˈije hˈai, ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, hisˈopo na kitˈani ɲekˈundu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatamwatʃˈia jˈule ndˈeɡe alˈije hˈai hˈuru mˌaʃambˈani ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ˈile, nˈajo ˌitakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kuhˈusu aˈina jojˈote ja uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi wa kˌuambukˈiza, mwˈaʃo wowˈote.|0
upˈele ndˈani ja ŋɡˈuo ˌau ndˈani ja ɲˈumba.|0
kwa uvˈimbe, vipˈele ˌau kipˈaku kˌiŋɡaˈatʃo.|0
kˌupambanˈua wakˈati kˈitu fulˈani ni sˈafi ˌau naɟˈisi. hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti kuhˈusu maɡˈoɲɟua ja ŋɡˈozi ja kˌuambukˈiza na upˈele.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
semˈeni na wˌaisraˈeli mwˌaambˈie: wakˈati ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanapotˈokwa na usˈaha mwilˈini, usˈaha hˈuo ni naɟˈisi.|0
ˈiwe ˌunaˌendelˈea kˌutirirˈika kutˈoka mwilˈini mwˈake ˌau ˌumezˈiba, ˌutamfˈaɲa kˌuwa naɟˈisi. hˈivi ndˈivjo usˈaha wˌake ˌutakˌavjomletˈea ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
kitˈanda tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃolalˈia ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kutˈokwa na usˈaha kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, na tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokalˈia kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈusa kitˈanda tʃˈake ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃˌokalˈia mwˌeɲe kutˈokwa na usˈaha, ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajemɡˈusa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kutˈokwa na usˈaha, ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kutˈokwa na usˈaha ˌatamtemˈea mˈate ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ni sˈafi, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈila tandˈiko ambˈalo ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatalˌikalˈia wakˈati wa kupˈanda mɲˈama lˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
na jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈusa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamekalˈia ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. jejˈote ˌatakˌajeinˈua vˈitu hˈivjo ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈuswa na ˈm̩tu ˌanajetˈokwa na usˈaha bˌila kunˈawa mikˈono jˌake kwa mˈaɟi, ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
tʃˈuŋɡu tʃa udˈoŋɡo kˌitakˌatʃoɡˈuswa na ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima kivˈuɲɟue, na kifˈaa tʃotʃˈote tʃa m̩bˈao kˌitaˈoʃwa kwa mˈaɟi.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌapotˌakasˈika kutˈoka usˈaha wˈake, ˌanapˈaswa kˌuhesˈabu sˈiku sˈaba kwa ˌutakˈaso wˈake. ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi sˈafi, nˌaje ˌatatˌakasˈika.|0
sˈiku ja nˈane, ˌatatʃukˈua hˈua wawˈili ˌau makˈinda mawˈili ja ɲɟˈiwa, ˈaɟe mbˈele za bwˈana kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, na kˈumpa kuhˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatavitˈoa ðabˈihu, mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na hˈujo mwiŋɡˈine kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja hˈujo ˈm̩tu kwa sabˈabu ja kutˈokwa usˈaha kwˈake.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌakitˈokwa na ʃahˈawa, ni lazˈima aˈoɡe mwˈili mzˈima kwa mˈaɟi, na ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatalˈala na mwanˈamke, na kukˈawa na kutˈoka kwa ʃahˈawa, ni lazˈima wˈote waˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ikˈiwa mwanˈamke ˌatatˈokwa na dˈamu ja kˌawaˈida ja mwˈezi, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sˈiku sˈaba, na jejˈote ˌatakˌajemɡˈusa ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃolalˈia wakˈati wˌake wa hˈeði kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, na tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokˌikalˈia kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈusa kitˈanda tʃˈake ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɡˈusa tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokalˈia ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈiwe ni kitˈanda ˌama tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamekˌikalˈia, ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakiɡˈusa, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌatalˈala nˌaje na ˈile dˈamu ja mwˈezi ˌikamɡˈusa, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sˈiku sˈaba; kitˈanda tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokˌilalˈia hˈujo mwˌanaˈume kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
ikˈiwa mwanˈamke ˌatatˈokwa na dˈamu kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi zaˈidi ja sˈiku zˌake za mwˈezi, ˌau ˌamekˈuwa na dˈamu ˌinajˌoendelˈea zaˈidi ja kipˈindi tʃˈake, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa kipˈindi tʃˈote tʃa ʃˈida hˈijo, kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa katˌika sˈiku za hˈeði jˈake.|0
kitˈanda tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokˌilalˈia hˈujo mwanˈamke wakˈati ˌanaˌendelˈea kutˈokwa na dˈamu kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, kˌama kˌilivjokˈuwa kitˈanda tʃˈake wakˈati wa sˈiku zˌake za hˈeði, na tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌatʃokalˈia kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, kˌama wakˈati wˌake wa hˈeði.|0
jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje vˈitu hˈivjo ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi; ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na kuˈoɡa kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
wakˈati ˌatakˌapotˌakasˈika kutˈoka hˈeði jˈake, ni lazˈima ˌahesˈabu sˈiku sˈaba, na baˌada ja hˈapo ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada.|0
sˈiku ja nˈane ni lazˈima ˌatʃukˈue hˈua wawˈili ˌau makˈinda mawˈili ja ɲɟˈiwa, na kˌumletˈea kuhˈani kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu, mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na hˈujo mwiŋɡˈine kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii, ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mbˈele za bwˈana kwa sabˈabu ja ˌunaɟˈisi wa kutˈokwa dˈamu kwˈake.|0
ni lazˈima ˌuwatˈeŋɡe wˌaisraˈeli kˌutokˈana na vˈitu ambˈavjo vˌinawafˈaɲa naɟˈisi, ˌili wasˈife katˌika ˌunaɟˈisi wˌao kwa kˌunaɟˈisi makˈao jˈaŋɡu, ambˈajo jˈapo kˌatikˈati jˈao..|0
hˈaja ni maʃˈarti kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kutˈokwa na usˈaha, kwa aɟˈili ja jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈokwa na ʃahˈawa.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈamke katˌika sˈiku zˌake za hˈeði, kwa aɟˈili ja mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˌatokwˈaje na usˈaha, na kwa aɟˈili ja mwˌanaˈume ˌalalˈaje na mwanˈamke ambˈaje ni naɟˈisi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema na mˈose baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa wˈale wˈana wawˈili wa arˈoni wˌaliokˈufa wˌalipˌokaribˈia mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose: mwambˈie ndˈuɡu jˈako arˈoni asˈiɟe wakˈati wowˈote ˌatakˈavjo jˌeje ndˈani ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, ɲˈuma ja pazˈia pˈale mbˈele ja kˈiti tʃa rehˈema kˈile kˌilitʃˈoko ɟˌuːja sandˈuku la aɡˈano, la sˈivjo ˌatakˈufa, kwa sabˈabu hˈuwa nˌinatokˈea ndˈani ja wˈiŋɡu ɟˌuːja kˈile kˈiti tʃa rehˈema.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo arˈoni ˌatakˌavjoiŋɡˈia katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu: ˌatatʃukˈua fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
ˌatavˈaa kˈoti tˌakatˈifu la kitˈani, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈuo za ndˈani za kitˈani; ˌatafˈuŋɡa mʃˈipi wa kitˈani kˌiunˈoni, na kuvˈaa kilˈemba tʃa kitˈani. hˈaja ni mavˈazi mˌatakatˈifu, kwa hˈijo ni lazˈima aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi kˈabla ja kˌujavˈaa mavˈazi hˈajo.|0
ˌatatʃukˈua mbˈuzi dˈume wawˈili kutˈoka kwa ɟˌumuˈija ja ˌisraˈeli kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na kondˈoo dˈume kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
arˈoni ˌatamtˈoa hˈujo fahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka jˌake ja ðˈambi ˌili afˈaɲe ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe na ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatawˌatʃukˈua wˈale mbˈuzi dˈume wawˈili na kˌuwalˈeta mbˈele za bwˈana kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
arˈoni ˌatamlˈeta jˈule mbˈuzi ambˈaje kˈura ja bwˈana ˌimemwˌaŋɡukˈia na kumtˈoa ðabˈihu kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
arˈoni ˌatamlˈeta jˈule fahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe, ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake na ɲˈumba jˈake, nˌaje ˌatamtʃˈiɲɟa hˈujo fahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌatatʃukˈua tʃetˈezo kˌilitʃoɟˈaa makˈaa jˌanajowˈaka kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni mbˈele za bwˈana, na kˈonzi mbˈili za uvˈumba laˈini ˌuliosˈaɡwa vizˈuri wˌeɲe harˈufu, na kˌuvipelˈeka ɲˈuma ja pazˈia.|0
ˌatawˈeka uvˈumba ɟˌuːja mˈoto mbˈele za bwˈana, na mˈoʃi wa uvˈumba ˌutafunˈika kˈile kˈiti tʃa rehˈema kilˈitʃo ɟˌuːja ˌuʃuhˈuda, ˌili asˈife.|0
ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja dˈamu ja fahˈali, na kwa kidˈole tʃˈake ˌataɲuɲˈiza sehˈemu ja mbˈele ja kˈiti tʃa rehˈema; kˈiʃa ˌataɲuɲˈiza sehˈemu ja hˈijo dˈamu kwa kidˈole tʃˈake mˈara sˈaba mbˈele ja kˈiti tʃa rehˈema.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatamtʃˈiɲɟa mbˈuzi wa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, na kˌuitʃukˈua dˈamu jˌake ɲˈuma ja pazˈia, na ˌaifaɲˈie kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa kwa dˈamu ja fahˈali: ˌataɲuɲˈiza ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa rehˈema na mbˈele jˈake.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu kwa sabˈabu ja ˌunaɟˈisi na uˈasi wa wˌaisraˈeli, kwa ðˈambi zˈao zozˈote. ˌatafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa aɟˈili ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, ambˈalo lˈiko mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao kˌatikˈati ja ˌunaɟˈisi wˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote hˌaruhusˈiwi kˌuwa ndˈani ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, kˌuanzˈia wakˈati arˈoni ˌanapˌoiŋɡˈia kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, hˌadi ˌatakˌapotˈoka ɲɟˈe, baˌada ja kˌuɟifaɲˈia ˌupatanˈiʃo jˌeje mweɲˈewe na ɲˈumba jˈake, pamˈoɟa na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa ˌatatˈoka ˈaɟe kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu jalˈijo mbˈele za bwˈana na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈake. ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja dˈamu ja fahˈali na sehˈemu ja dˈamu ja mbˈuzi, na kˌuiwˈeka kwˈeɲe pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
ˌataɲuɲˈiza baˈaði ja hˈijo dˈamu ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu kwa kidˈole tʃˈake mˈara sˈaba, ˌili kˌuitakˈasa na kˌuiwˈeka wˈakfu kˌutokˈana na ˌunaɟˈisi wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
arˈoni ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamemalˈiza kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na mˌaðabˈahu, ˌatamlˈeta mbˈele jˈule mbˈuzi alˈije hˈai.|0
arˈoni ˌatawˈeka mikˈono jˌake miwˈili ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa mbˈuzi alˈije hˈai na kˌuuŋɡˈama ɟˈuu jˌake uˈovu wˈote na uˈasi wa wˌaisraˈeli, jaˈani ðˈambi zˈao zˈote, ˌili kˌuziwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa hˈujo mbˈuzi. ˌatamwatʃˈia hˈujo mbˈuzi ˌakimbilˈie ɟaŋɡwˈani kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa ˈm̩tu ˌalijepˈewa waɟˈibu hˈuo.|0
jˈule mbˈuzi ˌatatʃukˈua ɟˈuu jˌake ðˈambi zˈao zˈote mpˈaka mahˈali pasˈipo na wˈatu; nˌaje jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌatamwatʃˈia ˌakimbilˈie ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌataˈenda ndˈani ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na kuvˈua jˈale mavˈazi ja kitˈani ˌalijˌojavˈaa kˈabla ja kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, nˌaje ˌatajaˈatʃa pˈale.|0
ˌataˈoɡa kwa mˈaɟi katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na kuvˈaa mavˈazi jˌake ja kˌawaˈida. kˈiʃa ˌatatˈoka na kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa aɟˈili jˌake na sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe, na kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu.|0
pˈia ˌatatʃˈoma mafˈuta ja mɲˈama wa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
jˈule fahˈali na mbˈuzi wˌaliˌotolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za ðˈambi, ambˈao dˈamu jˈao ˌilikˈuwa ˌimelˈetwa pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo, ni lazˈima wˌatolˈewe ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi. ŋɡˈozi zˈao, ɲˈama, na matˈumbo pamˈoɟa na mˈavi vˌitatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajevitʃˈoma ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi; bˌaadˈaje ˌatawˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia kambˈini.|0
hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu: katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba ni lazˈima mfˈuŋɡe, wˈala msifˈaɲe kˈazi jojˈote, ˈiwe mzˈawa ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
ni sabˈato ja mˌapumzˈiko, na lazˈima mfˈuŋɡe; ni aɡˈizo la kudˈumu.|0
kuhˈani ambˈaje ˌametˈiwa mafˈuta na kuwˈekwa wˈakfu ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa bˈaba jˌake kˌama kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo. ˌatavˈaa mavˈazi mˌatakatˈifu ja kitˈani.|0
na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na mˌaðabˈahu, na pˈia kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani, pamˈoɟa na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˈatu.|0
hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu: ˌupatanˈiʃo ˌutafˈaɲua mˈara mˈoɟa tu kwa mwˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈote za wˌaisraˈeli. ndˈivjo ˌilivjˌofaɲˈika, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na arˈoni na wanˈawe, pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, ˌuwaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌoaɡˈiza.|0
mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈoa ðabˈihu ja maksˈai, mwˌanakondˈoo ˌau mbˈuzi ndˈani ja kˈambi ˌau ɲɟˈe jˈake.|0
badˈala ja kˌuilˈeta kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia ˌili kˌuilˈeta kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana mbˈele ja maskˈani ja bwˈana, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa na hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu; ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
hˌii ni ˌili wˌaisraˈeli wˌamletˈee bwˈana ðabˈihu wˌanazˌozifˈaɲa sˈasa mahˈali pa wˈazi mˌaʃambˈani. ni lazˈima wˌazilˈete kwa mˌakuhˈani, jaˈani kwa bwˈana, katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, na kutˈoa ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka za amˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌataɲuɲˈiza dˈamu kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, na kˌujatˌeketˈeza mafˈuta ja hˈijo ðabˈihu kˌuwa harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌumpendˈeza bwˈana.|0
hˌawatatˈoa kˈamwe ðabˈihu zˈao kwa sanˈamu za mbˈuzi ambˈazo wˌamekˈuwa wˌakiɟˌifaɲˈia nˈazo ˌukahˈaba. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwˈao na kwa aɟˈili ja vizˈazi viɟˈavjo..|0
wˌaambˈie: mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌatakˌajetˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau ðabˈihu.|0
bˌila kˌuilˈeta kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia ˌili kutˈoa ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ambˈaje ˌatakˈuɲua dˈamu jojˈote, nˌitakˈuwa kiɲˈume tʃa ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatakˌajekˈuɲua dˈamu na kˌumkatilˈia mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa uhˈai wa kiˈumbe ˈuko ndˈani ja dˈamu, nˌami nˌimewˈapa hˈijo dˈamu ˌili mfaɲˈie ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu weɲˈewe ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu; dˈamu n̩dˈijo ˌifaɲˈajo ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja maˈiʃa ja ˈm̩tu.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌinawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kˈuɲua dˈamu, wˈala mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu hˌaruhusˈiwi kˈuɲua dˈamu.|0
mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ambˈaje ˌatamwˈinda mɲˈama ˌau ndˈeɡe ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kulˈiwa ni lazˈima ˌaimwˈaɡe dˈamu na kˌuifunˈika kwa udˈoŋɡo.|0
kwa sabˈabu uhˈai wa kˈila kiˈumbe ni katˌika dˈamu jˈake. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌimewˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, kˈamwe msˈiɲue dˈamu ja kiˈumbe tʃotʃˈote, kwa sabˈabu uhˈai wa kˈila kiˈumbe ni katˌika dˈamu jˈake; jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈuɲua dˈamu ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote, ˈawe mzˈawa ˌau mɡˈeni, ambˈaje ˌatakˈula mzˈoɡa wa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌama kˌilitʃˌouˈawa na waɲˈama mwˈitu ni lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na aˈoɡe kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada mpˈaka ɟiˈoni, kˈiʃa ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌakufˈua ŋɡˈuo zˌake na kuˈoɡa, ˌatakˈuwa na hatˈia kwa kˈosa hˈilo..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
msifˈaɲe kˌama wˌafaɲˈavjo hˌuko mˈisri, mahˈali mlˌipokˈuwa mnaˈiʃi, wˈala msifˈaɲe kˌama wˌanavjofˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, mahˈali nˌinapˌowapelˈeka. msˌifuˈate matˈendo jˈao.|0
zˌiʃikˈeni ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌezitˈii ˌataˈiʃi kwa hˈizo. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu awˈaje jˈote ˌatakˌajemsˌoɡelˈea ndˈuɡu wa karˈibu ˌili kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌusimvuɲɟˈie heʃˈima bˈaba jˈako kwa kˌukutˈana kimwˈili na mˈama jˈako. jˌeje ni mˈama jˈako; usˈiwe na mˌahusiˈano kˌama hˈajo nˈaje.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa bˈaba jˈako; hˈijo ˌitamvuɲɟˈia heʃˈima bˈaba jˈako.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na dˈada jˈako, wˈala bˈinti wa bˈaba jˈako, ˌau bˈinti wa mˈama jˈako, ˈawe ˌamezalˈiwa katˌika ɲˈumba hˈijo ˌau mahˈali peŋɡˈine.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na bˈinti wa mwanˈao ˌama bˈinti wa bˈinti jˈako; ˌutaɟˌivuɲɟˈia heʃˈima.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na bˈinti wa ˈm̩ke wa bˈaba jˈako, ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na bˈaba jˈako; hˈujo ni dˈada jˈako.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na dˈada wa bˈaba jˈako; ni ndˈuɡu wa karˈibu wa bˈaba jˈako.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na dˈada wa mˈama jˈako, kwa sabˈabu ni ndˈuɡu wa mˈama jˈako wa karˈibu.|0
ˌusimvuɲɟˈie heʃˈima ndˈuɡu wa bˈaba jˈako, kwa kˌukutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wˈake; jˌeje ni ʃaŋɡˈazi jˈako.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na ˈm̩kwe wˈako, jˌeje ni ˈm̩ke wa mwanˈao; usˈiwe na mˌahusiˈano kˌama hˈajo nˈaje.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa kˈaka jˈako; ˌutamvuɲɟˈia heʃˈima kˈaka jˈako.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na mwanˈamke kˈiʃa na bˈinti jˈake. ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na bˈinti wa mwanˈawe ˌau bˈinti wa bˈinti jˈake; hˈao ni ndˈuɡu zˌake wa karˈibu. hˈuo ni uˈovu.|0
ˌusimtʃukˈue dˈada wa ˈm̩ke wˈako kˌuwa ˈm̩ke mwˈenza, na kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili wakˈati bˈado ˈm̩ke wˈako ˌanaˈiʃi.|0
ˌusimsˌoɡelˈee mwanˈamke ˌili kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili wakˈati wa ˌunaɟˈisi wa sˈiku zˌake za mwˈezi.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈako na kˌuɟitˈia nˌaje ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakutanˈaje na mwanˈamke; hˌilo ni tʃukˈizo.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na mɲˈama na kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwˈake. mwanˈamke ˌasiɟˌipelˈeke kwa mɲˈama ˌili kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili; hˈuo ni ˌupotˈovu.|0
msˌiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi kwa ɲɟˈia jojˈote katˌika hˈizi, kwa sabˈabu hˈivi ndˈivjo mˌataˈifa nˌitakˌajojˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu jˌalivjˌoɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
hˌata ˈn̩tʃi ˌilitˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi, hˈivjo nˌikaˌiaðˈibu kwa ðˈambi zˈake, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌikawˌatapˈika wakˈazi wˈake.|0
lakˈini ni lazˈima ˌuzitˈunze ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu. mzˈawa na waɡˈeni wˌaiʃˈio mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kˈamwe wˌasifˈaɲe mˈambo jojˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo hˈaja.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote jˌalifˈaɲua na wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kˈabla jˈenu, na ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa naɟˈisi.|0
kˌama mkˌiinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi, ˌitawˌatapˈika kˌama ˌilivjˌowatapˈika mˌataˈifa jˌalijˌowatˌaŋɡulˈia.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajefˈaɲa mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˌatʃukˈizo hˈaja, wˈatu hˈao ni lazˈima wˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈao.|0
ʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu, wˈala msˌifuˈate destˈuri za mˌatʃukˈizo jojˈote jˌalijofˈaɲua kˈabla hˌamɟafˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, na kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwa hˈajo. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ni lazˈima ˌamheʃˈimu mˈama jˌake na bˈaba jˈake, na pˈia ni lazˈima kˌuziʃˈika sabˈato zˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
msˌiabˈudu sanˈamu, wˈala msˌiɟitˌeŋɡenezˈee miˈuŋɡu ja ʃˈaba. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
mnˌapotˈoa ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa bwˈana, toˈeni kwa nˈamna ambˈajo ˌitakˌubalˈiwa kwa niˈaba jˈenu.|0
sadˈaka hˈijo ˌitalˈiwa sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo mnˌajoitˈoa, ˌau kˈeʃo jˈake; tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃobˈaki hˌadi sˈiku ja tˈatu lazˈima kˌiteketˈezwe kwa mˈoto.|0
kˌama sehˈemu jojˈote ja sadˈaka hˈijo ˌitalˈiwa sˈiku ja tˈatu, ˌitakˈuwa si sˈafi, nˈajo hˌaitˌakubalˈiwa.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈula ˌatawˌaɟibˈiʃwa, kwa sabˈabu ˌamenaɟˈisi kˈitu kilˈitʃo kˌitakatˈifu kwa bwˈana; ˈm̩tu hˈujo lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
wakˈati ˌuvunˈapo mavˈuno ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, ˌusivˈune hˌadi kwˈeɲe mipˈaka ja ʃˈamba lˈako, wˈala ˌusikusˈaɲe mabˈaki ja mavˈuno jˈako.|0
ˌusirˈudi mˈara ja pˈili katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu, wˈala ˌusiokˈote zabˈibu zˌilizˌoaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini. ziˈatʃe kwa aɟˈili ja maskˈini na mɡˈeni. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˌusiˈibe.  ˌusisˈeme uˈoŋɡo.  msˌidaŋɡaɲˈane.|0
ˌusiˈape kwa uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, na hˈivjo kˌulinaɟˈisi ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈako. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌusimðulˈumu wˈala kˌumwibˈia ɟirˈani jˈako.  ˌusiʃˌikilˈie mʃahˈara wa kˌibarˈua usˈiku kˈutʃa hˌadi ˌasubˈuhi.|0
ˌusimlaˈani kizˈiwi, wˈala ˌusiwˈeke kikwˈazo mbˈele ja kipˈofu, lakˈini ˈumtʃe mˈuŋɡu wˈako. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌusipotˈoʃe hˈaki; ˌusioɲˈeʃe kˌumpendelˈea maskˈini, wˈala ˌupendelˈeo kwa mwˌeɲe tʃˈeo, bˌali mwˌamulˈie ɟirˈani jˈako kwa hˈaki.|0
ˌusienˈeze ˌutʃotʃˈezi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈako.  ˌusifˈaɲe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˈile kˌinatʃˌohatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa ja ɟirˈani jˈako. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌusimtʃukˈie ndˈuɡu jˈako mojˈoni mwˈako. kˌaripˈia ɟirˈani jˈako kwa uwˈazi ˌili ˌusiʃirˈiki hatˈia jˈake.|0
ˌusiɟˌilipizˈie kisˈasi wˈala kˌuwa na kiɲˈoŋɡo ðˈidi ja mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa jˈako, lakˈini mpˈende ɟirˈani jˈako kˌama ˌunavjˌoɟipˈenda wˌewe mweɲˈewe. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
mtˌaziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.  ˌusiwaˈatʃe waɲˈama wˈako wa kufˈuɡwa wˌakazaˈana na weŋɡˈine wa aˈina tˌofaˈuti.  ˌusipˈande mbˈeɡu za aˈina mbˈili katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako.  ˌusivˈae ŋɡˈuo ˌilijofˈumwa kwa ɲˈuzi za aˈina mbˈili tˌofaˈuti.|0
kˌama mwˌanaˈume ˌanakutˈana kimwˈili na mwanˈamke ambˈaje ni msitʃˈana mtˈumwa ˌalijepˈoswa na mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine, lakˈini ambˈaje hˌaɟakˌombolˈewa wˈala hˌaɟapˈewa uhˈuru, lazˈima iwˈepo aðˈabu ˌinajofˈaa. hˌata hˈivjo hˌawatˌauˈawa, kwa sabˈabu msitʃˈana ˌalikˈuwa bˈado hˌaɟaˈatʃwa hˈuru.|0
lakˈini hˈujo ˈm̩tu lazˈima alˈete kondˈoo dˈume kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja hatˈia kwa bwˈana.|0
kˌupitˈia kwa hˈujo kondˈoo dˈume wa sadˈaka ja hatˈia, kuhˈani ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi ˌalijotˈenda, nˌaje ˌatasˌamehˈewa ðˈambi jˈake.|0
mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi na kupˈanda aˈina jojˈote ja ˈm̩ti wa matˈunda, hˌesabˈuni matˈunda jˌake kˌama jˌalijˌokatˈazwa. kwa miˈaka mitˈatu mtˌajahesˈabu kwˌamba jˌamekatˈazwa; hˌajarˌuhusˈiwi kulˈiwa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne matˈunda jˈote ja ˈm̩ti hˈuo jˌatakˈuwa mˌatakatˈifu, sadˈaka ja sˈifa kwa bwˈana.|0
bˌali katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈano mnawˈeza kˈula matˈunda ja ˈm̩ti hˈuo. kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii mavˈuno jˈenu jˌataˌoŋɡezˈewa. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
msˈile ɲˈama jojˈote jˌeɲe dˈamu ndˈani jˈake.  msifˈaɲe ˌuaɡˈuzi wˈala utʃˈawi.|0
msitʃˈaɲɟe tʃˈale miˈili jˈenu kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩fu, wˈala msˌiɟitʃˈore alˈama ɟˌuːja miˈili jˈenu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌusimðˌalilˈiʃe bˈinti jˈako kwa kumfˈaɲa kahˈaba, la sˈivjo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitaɡˌeukˈia ˌukahˈaba na kuɟˈaa uˈovu.|0
ʃˈika sabˈato zˈaŋɡu na kˌuheʃˈimu mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
msiˈende kwa wˌaaɡˈuzi, wˈala msˌitafˈute wapˈuŋɡa pˈepo, kwa maˈana wˌatawˌanaɟˈisi. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
uwˈapo mbˈele ja m̩zˈee, simˈama ˌili kˌuoɲˈeʃa heʃˈima kwa wazˈee, nˌawe ˈumtʃe mˈuŋɡu wˈako. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
wakˈati mɡˈeni ˌanaˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˌawe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, ˌusimɲaɲˈase.|0
mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˌawe ni lazˈima ˌumtendˈee kˌama mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. mpˈende kˌama ˌunavjˌoɟipˈenda mweɲˈewe, kwa maˈana ˌulikˈuwa mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˌusitumˈie vipˈimo vja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu ˌunapopˈima urˈefu, kupˈima uzˈito, wˈala kupˈima wˈiŋɡi.|0
tumˈia mizˈani halˈali, mˈawe ja kˌupimˈia uzˈito halˈali, ˈefa halˈali, na hˈini halˈali. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ambˈaje ˌalikutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
ʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zˈote na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu zˈote, nˌawe ˌuzifuˈate. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli: mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi katˌika ˌisraˈeli ambˈaje ˌatamtˈoa jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa watˈoto wˌake kˌuwa sadˈaka kwa mˈuŋɡu molˈeki, ˈm̩tu hˈujo lazˈima ˌauˈawe. wˈatu wa ɟˌumuˈija hˈijo wˌatampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe.|0
mˌimi nˌitaˌuelekˈeza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu hˈujo, nˌami nˌitamkˌatilˈia mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake. kwa maˈana kwa kumtˈoa mmˈoɟa wa watˈoto wˌake kwa mˈuŋɡu molˈeki, ˌamenaɟˈisi mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu na kˌulinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu.|0
ikˈiwa wˈatu wa ɟˌumuˈija wˌatafˈumba mˈatʃo wakˈati ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌanapomtˈoa mmˈoɟa wa watˈoto wˌake kwa mˈuŋɡu molˈeki, nˌao wˌakaˈatʃa kˌumuˈua.|0
mˌimi nˌitaˌuelekˈeza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu hˈujo pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈake, nˌami nˌitawˌakatilˈia mbˈali jˌeje na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliofˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba na molˈeki.|0
ɟˌitakasˈeni bˈasi, nˌaɲi kuwˈeni wˌatakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
ʃikˈeni ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuzifuˈata. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌiwafaɲˈaje nˈiɲi wˌatakatˈifu.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatamlaˈani bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˈake, lazˈima ˌauˈawe. ˌamemlaˈani bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˈake, nˈajo dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatazˈini na ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, jaˈani ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake, wazˈinzi hˈao wawˈili lazˈima wˌauˈawe.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌatakutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa bˈaba jˈake, hˌakumheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈake. mwˌanaˈume hˈujo na mwanˈamke hˈujo wˈote wˌauˈawe; dˈamu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatakutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa mwanˈawe, lazˈima wˈote wawˈili wˌauˈawe. wˌalitʃˌokifˈaɲa ni ˌupotˈovu; dˈamu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe.|0
kˌama mwˌanaˈume ˌakikutˈana kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume mwenzˈake kˌama vˈile mwˌanaˈume ˌafaɲˈavjo na mwanˈamke, wˌanaˈume hˈao wawˈili wˌamefˈaɲa lilˈilo tʃukˈizo sˈana. lazˈima wˌauˈawe; nˈajo dˈamu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌataˈoa bˈinti pamˈoɟa na mˈama jˈake, hˈuo ni uˈovu. wˈote watˈatu ni lazˈima watʃˈomwe mˈoto, ˌili kwˌamba pˌasiwˈepo na uˈovu kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
kˌama mwˌanaˈume ˌakikutˈana kimwˈili na mɲˈama, ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe, na pˈia ni lazˈima mɲˈama hˈujo ˌauˈawe.|0
kˌama mwanˈamke ˌatamsˌoɡelˈea mɲˈama kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili, mˌuuˈeni mwanˈamke hˈujo pamˈoɟa na mɲˈama pˈia. lazˈima wˌauˈawe; dˈamu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌanamwˈoa dˈada jˈake, bˈinti ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˈake, nˌao wˌakakutˈana kimwˈili, ni aˈibu. lazˈima wˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali matʃˈoni pa wˈatu wˈao. hˈujo mwˌanaˈume ˌamemwˌaibˈiʃa dˈada jˈake, hˈivjo ˌatawˌaɟibˈika kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu hˈuo.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌatalˈala na mwanˈamke alˈije katˌika hˈeði jˌake na kˌukutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili, ˌamefunˈua mtˌirirˈiko wa hˈeði jˈake, nˌaje hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌameɟˌifunˈua ˈutʃi wˈake. wˈote wawˈili lazˈima wˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈao.|0
ˌusikutˈane kimwˈili na dˈada wa mˈama jˈako wˈala wa bˈaba jˈako, kwa maˈana hˌilo lˌitamwˌaibˈiʃa ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu; nˈiɲi wawˈili mtˌawaɟibˈika kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu hˈuo.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌataˈoa ˈm̩ke wa ndˈuɡu jˈake, hˈili ni tˈendo tʃˈafu; ˌamemwˌaibˈiʃa ndˈuɡu jˈake. nˌao hˌawatazˈaa mtˈoto.|0
kˈamwe msiˈiʃi kwa kˌufuˈata destˈuri za mˌataˈifa nˌitakˌajojˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu. kwa sabˈabu wˌalifˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, nˌami nˌikatʃukˈizwa sˈana nˈao.|0
lakˈini nˌiliwˌaambˈia nˈiɲi, mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao; nˌitawˈapa nˈiɲi kˌuwa urˈiθi, ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌotirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈaje ˌamewatˈeŋɡa kutˈoka mˌataˈifa.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˈiɲi lazˈima mwˈeze kˌutofˌautˈiʃa kˈati ja waɲˈama walˈio sˈafi na wasˈio sˈafi, pˈia kˈati ja ndˈeɡe wasˈio sˈafi na walˈio sˈafi. msˌiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi kˌutokˈana na mɲˈama jejˈote, ˌau ndˈeɡe, wˈala kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði, vˈile ambˈavjo nˌimevitˈeŋɡa kˌuwa naɟˈisi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
mtakˈuwa wˌatakatˈifu kwˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu mˈimi, bwˈana, ni mtˌakatˈifu, nˌami nˌimewatˈeŋɡa kutˈoka mˌataˈifa kˌuwa wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ambˈaje ni mtʃˈawi, mwaɡˈuzi ˌau mwˌeɲe kupˈuŋɡa pˈepo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu lazˈima ˌauˈawe. mtˌawapˈiɡa kwa mˈawe; nˈajo dˈamu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe..|0
ˌisipokˈuwa ɟamˈaa wˌake wa karˈibu, kˌama vˈile mˈama jˌake ˌau bˈaba jˈake, mwanˈawe ˌau bˈinti jˈake, ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
ˌau dˈada jˌake ˌasijˌeolˈewa ambˈaje ˌanamtˌeɡemˈea kwa kˌuwa hˈana mˈume, kwa aɟˈili ja hˈao awˈeza kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
kˈamwe ˌasiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi mweɲˈewe kˌutokˈana na wˈale wˈatu ambˈao ˌanahˌusiˈana nˌao kwa kˌuoˈana, na hˈivjo kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
kˈamwe mˌakuhˈani wˌasiɲˈoe ɲuˈele za vˈitʃwa vjˈao wˈala wˌasiɲˈoe pembˈeni ˌm̩wa ndˈevu zˈao, ˌau kuwˈeka tʃˈale kwˈeɲe miˈili jˈao.|0
lazˈima wˈawe wˌatakatˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, na kˈamwe wˌasilˌinaɟˈisi ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈao. kwa sabˈabu n̩dˈio wˌanaotˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kwa bwˈana, tʃakˈula tʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, hˈivjo lazˈima wˈawe wˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˈamwe wˌasiˈoe wˌanawˈake wˌaliˌoɟinaɟˈisi kwa ˌukahˈaba, ˌau wˌaliopˈewa talˈaka na waˈume wˈao, kwa sabˈabu mˌakuhˈani ni wˌatakatˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
wˌaonˈeni kˌuwa wˌatakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu n̩dˈio wˌanaotˈoa tʃakˈula tʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. kˌumbukˈeni kˌuwa ni wˌatakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu mˌimi bwˈana ni mtˌakatˈifu, mˌimi nˌiwafaɲˈaje nˈiɲi kˌuwa wˌatakatˈifu.|0
ikˈiwa bˈinti wa kuhˈani ˌanaɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwa kufˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba, ˌanamwˌaibˈiʃa bˈaba jˈake; lazˈima atʃˈomwe kwa mˈoto.|0
kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, jˈule mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˌake ambˈaje ˌamekwˈiʃa kutˈiwa mafˈuta kwa kˌumiminˈiwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, na ambˈaje ˌamewˈekwa wˈakfu kuvˈaa mavˈazi ja ˌukuhˈani, kˈamwe ˌasiˈatʃe ɲuˈele zˌake bˌila kˌufunˈikwa, wˈala ˌasirarˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake.|0
wˈala ˌasiondˈoke mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌau kˌupanaɟˈisi, kwa sabˈabu ˌamewˈekwa wˈakfu kwa mafˈuta ja mˈuŋɡu wˈake. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kˈamwe ˌasimwˈoe mɟˈane, ˌau mwanˈamke ˌalijepˈewa talˈaka, wˈala mwanˈamke ˌalijˌeɟinaɟˈisi kwa ˌukahˈaba, bˌali ˌatamwˈoa tu bikˈira kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
na hˈivjo hˌatawatˈia ˌunaɟˈisi watˈoto wˌake mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌimfaɲˈaje mtˌakatˈifu..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
mwambˈie arˈoni: kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, hakˈuna m̩zˈao wˈako mwˌeɲe dosˈari ˌatakˌajekˌaribˈia kutˈoa tʃakˈula tʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe dosˈari jojˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌukaribˈia: hakˈuna ˈm̩tu alˈije kipˈofu ˌau kiwˈete, ˌau ˌalijˌeharibˈika ˈuso ˌau asˈije na viˈuŋɡo kamˈili.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe m̩ɡˈuu ˌau mkˈono ˌuliˌolemˈaa.|0
ˌau mwˌeɲe kˌibiˈoŋɡo ˌau ˌalijˌedumˈaa, ˌau alˈije na tatˈizo la mˈatʃo, ˌau alˈije na uvˈimbe wˌeɲe usˈaha ˌau maɟˈipu, ˌau ˌalijˌehasˈiwa.|0
hakˈuna m̩zˈao wa kuhˈani arˈoni mwˌeɲe kilˈema tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌajekˌaribˈia kutˈoa sadˈaka kwa bwˈana ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. kˌama ˈana kilˈema, kˈamwe ˌasikˌaribˈie kutˈoa tʃakˈula tʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
ˌanawˈeza kˈula tʃakˈula kˌitakatˈifu sˈana tʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈake, pˈia hˌata tʃakˈula kˌitakatˈifu.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu ja kilˈema tʃˈake, kˈamwe ˌasikˌaribˈie karˈibu na pazˈia wˈala kˌukaribˈia mˌaðabˈahu, asˈiɟe ˌakanaɟˈisi mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌiwafaɲˈaje wˌatakatˈifu..|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni ɟˈambo hˈili na wanˈawe, pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
mwambˈie arˈoni na wanˈawe kˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu wˌaisraˈeli wˌanazˌoziwˈeka wˈakfu kwˈaŋɡu, ˌili wˌasilˌinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
wˌaambˈie: katˌika vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, ikˈiwa jejˈote wa wazˈao wˈako ni naɟˈisi kwa tˌaratˈibu za kˌiibˈada, nˌaje ˌakakˌaribˈia sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu zˈile wˌaisraˈeli wˌanazowˈeka wˈakfu kwa bwˈana, ˈm̩tu hˈujo lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na ˈuso wˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ikˈiwa m̩zˈao wa arˈoni ˈana uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi ˌunaˌoambukˈiza ˌau ˌanatˈokwa na usˈaha mwilˈini, hawˈezi kˈula sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu mpˈaka ˌatakasˈike. pˈia ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi ikˈiwa ˌataɡˈusa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi kwa kuɡˈusa maˈiti ˌau ˈm̩tu ˌalijetˈokwa na ʃahˈawa.|0
ˌau ikˈiwa ˌataɡˈusa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌitambaˈatʃo kˌimfaɲˈatʃo ˈm̩tu naɟˈisi, ˌau ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kumtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi, hˌata ˌunaɟˈisi ˈuwe ɡˈani.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajeɡˈusa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa aˈina hˈijo ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. kˈamwe hˌatakˈula sadˈaka jojˈote tˌakatˈifu mpˈaka jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˈawe ˌameˈoɡa kwa mˈaɟi.|0
wakˈati ɟˈua lˌinapotˈua, ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi, na bˌaadˈaje ˌanawˈeza kˈula sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu, kwa kˌuwa ni vjakˈula vjˈake.|0
kˈamwe asˈile ɲˈama ja mzˈoɡa wˈala ˌilijˌorarulˈiwa na waɲˈama pˈori, nˌaje ˌakatˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi kwa hˈilo. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
mˌakuhˈani lazˈima waʃˈike mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu ˌili wasˈiwe na hatˈia, wakˈafa kwa kˌujaðarˈau. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌinajˌewafˈaɲa wˌatakatˈifu.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote asˈije wa ɟamˈaa ja kuhˈani ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kˈula sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu, hˌata mɡˈeni wa kuhˈani ˌau mfˌaɲakˈazi wˌake hˌaruhusˈiwi kuˈila.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa kuhˈani ˌamenunˈua mtˈumwa kwa fˈeða, ˌau mtˈumwa ˌamezalˈiwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja kuhˈani hˈujo, mtˈumwa hˈujo awˈeza kˈula tʃakˈula tʃa hˈujo kuhˈani.|0
ikˈiwa bˈinti wa kuhˈani ˌameolˈewa na ˈm̩tu asˈije kuhˈani, bˈinti hˈujo hˌaruhusˈiwi kˈula tʃotʃˈote tʃa mˌatolˈeo mˌatakatˈifu.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa bˈinti wa kuhˈani ˌamekˈuwa mɟˈane ˌau ˌamepˈewa talˈaka, nˌaje hˈana watˈoto, na ˌakarˈudi kuˈiʃi na ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˌake kˌama wakˈati wa ˌusitʃˈana wˈake, bˈinti hˈujo ˌanawˈeza kˈula tʃakˈula tʃa bˈaba jˈake. hˌata hˈivjo, ˈm̩tu ˌasijˌeruhusˈiwa hawˈezi kˈula tʃotʃˈote katˌika tʃakˈula hˈiki.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌamekˈula sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu kwa makˈosa, lazˈima atˈoe malˈipo ja sadˈaka hˈijo kwa kuhˈani na kˌuoŋɡˈeza sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani ja sadˈaka hˈijo.|0
kˈamwe mˌakuhˈani wˌasiˌinaɟˈisi sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu ambˈajo wˌaisraˈeli wˌameitˈoa kwa bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwaruhˈusu kuzˈila sadˈaka hˈizo tˌakatˈifu, na hˈivjo kˌuwaletˈea hatˈia ja kˌudaˈiwa malˌipo. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌiwafaɲˈaje wˌatakatˈifu..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na arˈoni na wanˈawe, na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote ˌuwaambˈie: ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wˈenu, alˈije mwˌisraˈeli ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌatatˈoa mˌatolˈeo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kwa bwˈana, ˈiwe kˌutimˈiza naðˈiri ˌau kˌuwa sadˈaka ja hiˈari.|0
lazˈima m̩tˈoe mɲˈama dˈume asˈije na dosˈari, akˈiwa ŋɡˈombe, mbˈuzi ˌau kondˈoo, ˌili awˈeze kˌukubalˈika kwa niˈaba jˈako.|0
kˈamwe ˌusitˈoe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe dosˈari kwa sabˈabu hˌakitˌakubalˈiwa kwa niˈaba jˈako.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaletˈapo sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa bwˈana kutˈoka kˈundi la ŋɡˈombe ˌau mbˈuzi ˌili kˌutimˈiza naðˈiri maˈalum ˌau sadˈaka ja hiˈari, lazˈima sadˈaka hˈijo isˈiwe na dosˈari ˌau wˈaa ˌili ˌikubalˈike.|0
kˈamwe ˌusimtolˈee bwˈana mɲˈama alˈije kipˈofu, ˌalijˌeɟeruhˈiwa wˈala alˈije kilˈema, ˌau tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo na uvˈimbe, ˌau tʃˌeɲe upˈele ˌau vidˈonda vˌinavjotˈoka usˈaha. kˈamwe tʃotʃˈote tʃa aˈina hˌii kˌisiwˈekwe ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu kˌuwa sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
kˈamwe ˌusimtolˈee bwˈana mɲˈama ambˈaje mapˈumbu jˌake jˌameɟˌeruhˈiwa, ˌau kˌuhasˈiwa, ˌau kˌurarulˈiwa ˌau kukˈatwa. kˈamwe ˌusifˈaɲe hˈivi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
na kˈamwe ˌusikubˈali waɲˈama wa aˈina hˌii kutˈoka mkˈono wa mɡˈeni ˌili kˌuwatˈoa waɲˈama hˈao kˌuwa tʃakˈula kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈako. waɲˈama hˈao hˌawatˌakubalˈiwa kwa niˈaba jˈako, kwa sabˈabu wˈana vilˈema, nˌao wˈana dosˈari..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wakˈati ndˈama, mwˌanakondˈoo ˌau mwˌanambˈuzi ˌazaliwˈapo, ˌatabˈaki na mˈama jˌake kwa sˈiku sˈaba. kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ja nˈane na kˌuendelˈea ˌanawˈeza kˌukubalˈiwa kˌuwa sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
ˌusimtʃˈiɲɟe ŋɡˈombe na ndˈama wˈake, ˌau kondˈoo na kitˈoto tʃˈake sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
ˌunapˌomtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu ja ʃukrˈani, itˈoe kwa nˈamna ambˈajo ˌitakˌubalˈika kwa niˈaba jˈako.|0
ni lazˈima ilˈiwe sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo, pasˈipo kˌubakˈiza tʃotʃˈote mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu na kˌujafuˈata. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
msˌilinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu. lazˈima nˌikubalˈike kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa wˌaisraˈeli. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana nˌinajˌewafˈaɲa wˌatakatˈifu.|0
na nˌilijˌewatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie: hˈizi ndˈizo sˌikukˈuu zˈaŋɡu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa za bwˈana, ambˈazo mtˌazitaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa mˌakusaɲˈiko mˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˈuna sˈiku sˈita mnˌazowˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈazi, lakˈini sˈiku ja sˈaba ni sabˈato ja kˌupumzˈika, sˈiku ja kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu. hˌamtafˈaɲa kˈazi jojˈote. popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi, ni sabˈato kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈizi ni sˌikukˈuu za bwˈana zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, mˌakusaɲˈiko mˌatakatˈifu mtˌakajˌojataŋɡˈaza kwa ɲakˈati zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa.|0
pasˈaka ja bwˈana huˈanza ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi hˈuo wa kwˈanza, sˌikukˈuu ja bwˈana ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu huˈanza; kwa sˈiku sˈaba, mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza, mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba mtˌamletˈea bwˈana sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. kwˈeɲe sˈiku hˈijo ja sˈaba mtafˈaɲa kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌitakˌajowˈapa na kuvˈuna mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, letˈeni kwa kuhˈani mɡˈanda wa nafˈaka ja kwˈanza mtˌakajovˈuna.|0
nˌaje ˌataˌuinˈua hˈuo mɡˈanda mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili ˌukubalˈiwe kwa niˈaba jˈenu; kuhˈani ˌataupˈuŋɡa sˈiku ˌinajˌofuˈata sabˈato.|0
sˈiku hˈijo mtˌakapˌoinˈua hˈuo mɡˈanda, lazˈima m̩tˈoe kwa bwˈana ðabˈihu ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto ja mwˌanakondˈoo wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa asˈije na dosˈari.|0
kˈamwe msˈile mkˈate wowˈote, ˌau nafˈaka ˌilijˌokaˈaŋɡwa ˌau nafˈaka ˈm̩pja, mpˈaka sˈiku ˈile mtˌakajˌomletˈea mˈuŋɡu wˈenu sadˈaka hˌii. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi.|0
ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile ˌilijˌofuˈata sabˈato, sˈiku mlˌijotˈoa sadˈaka ja mɡˈanda wa kˌuinulˈiwa, hˌesabˈuni maɟˈuma sˈaba kamˈili.|0
kutˈoka popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi, mtalˈeta mikˈate miwˈili ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini, sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa, ˌulioˈokwa kwa tʃˈatʃu, kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa ja mˌalimbˈuko kwa bwˈana.|0
toˈeni pamˈoɟa na hˈijo mikˈate wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba, kˈila mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa asˈije na dosˈari, na fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa, na kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili. wˌatakˈuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa mˈoto jˌeɲe harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌumpendˈeza bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa toˈeni ðabˈihu ja mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na wˌanakondˈoo wawˈili, kˈila mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja amˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatawˌainˈua hˈao wˌanakondˈoo wawˈili mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na mkˈate wa mˌalimbˈuko. ni sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja kuhˈani.|0
sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo mtˌataŋɡˈaza kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi.|0
mnˌapovˈuna mavˈuno ja ˈarði jˈenu, msivˈune hˌadi mpakˈani ˌm̩wa ʃˈamba lˈenu, ˌau kˌukusˈaɲa masˈazo ja mavˈuno jˈenu. hˈajo ˌutajaˈatʃa kwa aɟˈili ja maskˈini na mɡˈeni. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu zozˈote za kˌawaˈida, lakˈini toˈeni sadˈaka kwa bwˈana ˌilijˌoteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi hˈuu wa sˈaba ni sˈiku ja ˌupatanˈiʃo. mtafˈaɲa kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, mfˈuŋɡe, nˌaɲi m̩tˈoe sadˈaka kwa bwˈana ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
msifˈaɲe kˈazi sˈiku hˈijo, kwa sabˈabu ni sˈiku ja ˌupatanˈiʃo, ambˈapo ˌupatanˈiʃo ˌunafaɲˈika kwa aɟˈili jˈenu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje hˌatafˈuŋɡa sˈiku hˈijo ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajefˈaɲa kˈazi sˈiku hˈijo nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
hˌamtafˈaɲa kˈazi kˈamwe. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi.|0
ni sabˈato ja mˌapumzˈiko kwˈenu nˈiɲi, na lazˈima mfˈuŋɡe. ʃˈu ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja tˈisa ja mwˈezi hˌadi ɟiˈoni ˌinajˌofuˈata, mtˌaiʃˈika sabˈato jˈenu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, sˌikukˈuu ja bwˈana ja vibˈanda ˌitaˈanza, nˈajo ˌitaˌaðimˈiʃwa kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ja kwˈanza ni kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba toˈeni sadˈaka kwa bwˈana za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja nˈane faɲˈeni kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na m̩tˈoe sadˈaka kwa bwˈana ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. ni kˌusaɲˈiko la mwˈiʃo, msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida.|0
hˈizi ni sˌikukˈuu za bwˈana zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, ambˈazo mtˌazitaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa mˌakusaɲˈiko mˌatakatˈifu kwa kulˈeta sadˈaka kwa bwˈana za kˌuteketˈeza kwa mˈoto: sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka, ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi zˌitahˌitaɟˈika kˈila sˈiku.|0
sadˈaka hˈizi ni ɲoŋɡˈeza ja zˈile mnˌazozitˈoa katˌika sabˈato za bwˈana, na pˈia ni ɲoŋɡˈeza ja mˌatolˈeo jˈenu ja tʃotʃˈote mlˌitʃowˈeka naðˈiri, na sadˈaka zˈenu zˈote za hiˈari mnˌazozitˈoa kwa bwˈana..|0
bˌasi kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, baˌada ja kuvˈuna mazˈao jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi, mtˌaaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu kwa bwˈana kwa sˈiku sˈaba; sˈiku ja kwˈanza ni mˌapumzˈiko, pˈia sˈiku ja nˈane ni mˌapumzˈiko.|0
sˈiku ja kwˈanza mtˌatʃukˈua matˈunda mazˈuri ja mˈiti, matˈawi ja mitˈende, matˈawi jˌeɲe maɟˈani mˈeŋɡi, na matˈawi ja mirˈebi, nˌaɲi mtˌaʃaŋɡilˈia mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
mtˌaaðimˈiʃa sˈiku hˌii kˌuwa sˌikukˈuu kwa bwˈana kwa sˈiku sˈaba kˈila mwˈaka. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo; ˌiaðˌimiʃˈeni mwˈezi wa sˈaba.|0
mtaˈiʃi katˌika vibˈanda kwa sˈiku sˈaba: wazˈawa wˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli wˌataˈiʃi katˌika vibˈanda.|0
ˌili wazˈao wˈenu waɟˈue kˌuwa nˌiliwafˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli waˈiʃi kwˈeɲe vibˈanda nˌilipˌowatˈoa mˈisri. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˌataŋɡazˈia wˌaisraˈeli sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa na bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
ɲɟˈe ja pazˈia la ˌuʃuhˈuda ndˈani ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, arˈoni ˌataziwˈaʃa tˈaa mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuanzˈia ɟiˈoni hˌadi ˌasubˈuhi bˌila kuzˈima. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
tˈaa zilˈizo ɟˌuːja kinˈara tʃa ðahˈabu sˈafi mbˈele za bwˈana lazˈima zˌihudumˈiwe daˈima.|0
tʃukˈua ˈuŋɡa laˈini, uˈoke mikˈate kˈumi na miwˈili, ˌukitumˈia sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa kwa kˈila mkˈate.|0
iwˈeke katˌika mistˈari miwˈili, kˈila mstˈari mikˈate sˈita, ˌuiwˈeke mbˈele za bwˈana ɟˌuːja mˈeza ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
kˈando ja kˈila mstˈari, wˈeka uvˈumba sˈafi kˌama sehˈemu ja kˌumbukˈumbu ˌili kˌuwakilˈiʃa mikˈate kˌuwa sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
mikˈate hˌii ˌitawˈekwa mbˈele za bwˈana kˈila wakˈati, sabˈato baˌada ja sabˈato, kwa niˈaba ja wˌaisraˈeli, kˌuwa aɡˈano la kudˈumu.|0
hˌii ni mˈali ja arˈoni na wanˈawe, wˌatakˌaoˈila katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, kwa sabˈabu ni sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu sˈana ja fˈuŋɡu lˈao la kˌawaˈida la sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
