hˈuju mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mwˌisraˈeli ˌakalˌikufˈuru ɟˈina la bwˈana kwa kˌulaˈani; kwa hˈijo wˌakamlˈeta kwa mˈose. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa ʃˌelomˈiθi bˈinti wa dˈibri, wa kabˈila la dˈani..|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
mtʃukˈue hˈujo ˌalijˌekufˈuru ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi. wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌomsikˈia ˌakikufˈuru wˌatawˈeka mikˈono ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, kˈiʃa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌitampˈiɡa mˈawe.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatamlaˈani mˈuŋɡu wˈake, ˌatakˈuwa na hatˈia kwa uˈovu wˈake.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajekufˈuru ɟˈina la bwˈana ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe. kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌitampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe. ˈiwe ni mɡˈeni ˌau mzˈawa, ˌatakˌapolˌikufˈuru ɟˈina la bwˈana, ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatamuˈua ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌauˈaje mɲˈama wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine lazˈima ˌafidˈie, uhˈai kwa uhˈai.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatamɟerˈuhi ɟirˈani jˈake, tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃomtˈenda nˌaje ˌatatendˈewa.|0
iwˈapo ˌamemvˈuɲɟa mfˈupa ˌatavˈuɲɟua mfˈupa, ɟˈitʃo kwa ɟˈitʃo, ɟˈino kwa ɟˈino. kˌama ˌalivjˌomɟerˈuhi mwenzˈake, vˈivjo hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌatakˌavjoɟˌeruhˈiwa.|0
jejˈote ˌauˈaje mɲˈama wa ˈm̩tu lazˈima alˈipe fidˈia, lakˈini jejˈote ˌauˈaje ˈm̩tu, lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
mtakˈuwa na ʃerˈia ˈijo hˈijo kwa mɡˈeni na kwa mzˈawa. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakasˈema na wˌaisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakamtʃukˈua jˈule ˌalijˌekufˈuru ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi na kumpˈiɡa mˈawe. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose katˌika mlˈima sinˈai.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa nˈiɲi, ˈn̩tʃi jeɲˈewe ni lazˈima iʃˈike sabˈato kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana.|0
kwa miˈaka sˈita mtapˈanda mazˈao katˌika maʃˈamba jˈenu, nˌaɲi kwa miˈaka sˈita mtˌaikˈata mˌizabˈibu jˈenu matˈawi na kuvˈuna mazˈao jˈake.|0
lakˈini mwˈaka wa sˈaba ˈn̩tʃi lazˈima ˈiwe na sabˈato ja mˌapumzˈiko, sabˈato kwa bwˈana. msipˈande mbˈeɡu katˌika maʃˈamba jˈenu, wˈala msikˈate mˌizabˈibu jˈenu matˈawi.|0
msivˈune na kuwˈeka akˈiba kˌinatʃoˈota tʃeɲˈewe, wˈala kuvˈuna na kˌusindˈika zabˈibu ambˈajo hˌamkuhˌudumˈia maʃˈamba jˈake. ˈn̩tʃi lazˈima ˈiwe na mwˈaka wa mˌapumzˈiko.|0
tʃotʃˈote ˈn̩tʃi ˌitoˈatʃo katˌika mwˈaka wa sabˈato kˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃˈenu weɲˈewe, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, mfˌaɲakˈazi ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa, na mkˈazi wa mˈuda ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
vˌilevˈile malˈiʃo ja mifˈuɡo jˈenu na waɲˈama pˈori katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu. tʃotʃˈote ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˌatʃozalˈiʃa kˌinawˈeza kulˈiwa.|0
hesˈabu sabˈato sˈaba za miˈaka, jaˈani miˈaka sˈaba mˈara sˈaba, ˌili sabˈato sˈaba za miˈaka ˌutakˈuwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na tˈisa.|0
ndˈipo tˌarumbˈeta ˌitapˈiɡwa kˈila mahˈali katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba. katˌika sˈiku ja ˌupatanˈiʃo, pˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˈote.|0
mwˈaka wa hamsˈini mtˌauwˈeka wˈakfu na kˌutaŋɡˈaza uhˈuru katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kwa wakˈazi wˌake wˈote. ˌitakˈuwa ni jubˈile kwˈenu; kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌataˌirudˈia mˈali ja ɟamˈaa jˈake, na kˈila mmˈoɟa kurˈudi kwˈeɲe ukˈoo wˈake.|0
mwˈaka wa hamsˈini ˌutakˈuwa jubˈile kwˈenu, msipˈande wˈala msivˈune kˈile kˌiotˈatʃo tʃeɲˈewe, ˌau kuvˈuna zabˈibu zˌisizˌohudumˈiwa.|0
kwa kˌuwa ni jubˈile, nˈajo ˌitakˈuwa tˌakatˈifu kwˈenu; mtakˈula tu kˈile kˌilitʃotˈoka mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa mˌaʃambˈani.|0
ikˈiwa ˌutaˈuza ˈarði kwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, ˌau ˌukinunˈua ˈarði kutˈoka kwˈake, mmˈoɟa ˌasimpˈuɲɟe mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ˌutanunˈua ˈarði kwa mzˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kwa misˈiŋɡi ja hesˈabu ja miˈaka baˌada ja jubˈile. nˌaje ˌataiˈuza kwˈako kwa misˈiŋɡi ja hesˈabu ja miˈaka ˌilijobˈaki kwa kuvˈuna mavˈuno.|0
miˈaka ˌinapokˈuwa mˈiŋɡi, ˌutaoŋɡˈeza bˈei, nˈajo miˈaka ikˈiwa mitʃˈatʃe, ˌutapuŋɡˈuza bˈei, kwa sabˈabu kˈile ˌanatʃˌokuuzˈia kwa hakˈika ni hesˈabu ja mazˈao.|0
mmˈoɟa ˌasimpˈuɲɟe mwiŋɡˈine, bˌali utˈamtʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈako. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
fˌuatˈeni ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi salˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi ˌitazˈaa matˈunda jˈake, nˌaɲi mtakˈula na kuʃˈiba na kuˈiʃi hˈumo kwa salˈama.|0
mwawˈeza kˌuulˈiza, tˌutakˈula nˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba ikˈiwa hˌatutapˈanda wˈala kuvˈuna mazˈao jˈetu.|0
nˌitawˌapelˌekeˈeni barˈaka ja pekˈee katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈita, kwˌamba ˈn̩tʃi ˌitazalˈiʃa mazˈao ja kutˈoʃa kwa miˈaka mitˈatu.|0
kˈamwe ˈarði ˌisiˈuzwe kwa mkatˈaba wa kudˈumu, kwa sabˈabu ˈn̩tʃi ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu, nˌaɲi ni waɡˈeni na wˌapaŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote mtˌakajoʃˈika kˌuwa mˈilki jˈenu, ni lazˈima m̩tˈoe ˌukombˈozi wa ˈarði.|0
ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌamekˈuwa maskˈini na ˌakaˈuza baˈaði ja mˈali jˈake, ndˈuɡu jˌake wa karˈibu ˌatakˈuɟa na kˌukombˈoa kˈile ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌalitʃˌokiˈuza.|0
iwˈapo ˈm̩tu hˈujo hˈana ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa mˈali hˈijo kwa aɟˈili jˈake, lakˈini jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakafˌanikˈiwa na kupˈata mˈali ˌitoʃˈajo kˌuikombˈoa.|0
ˌataamˈua tˈena θamˈani jˌake kwa miˈaka ʃˈu ˌalipˌoiˈuza, na kˌurudˈiʃa kiˈasi kˌilitʃobˈaki tʃa θamˈani kwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemˌuuzˈia mˈali hˈijo, nˌaje ˌatawˈeza kˌuirudˈia mˈali jˈake.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌatapˈata ɲɟˈia ja kumlˈipa mnunˈuzi, ˈile mˈali ˌalijoˈuza ˌitabˈaki kˌumilikˈiwa na mnunˈuzi mpˈaka mwˈaka wa jubˈile. mˈali hˈijo ˌitarudˈiʃwa mwˈaka wa jubˈile, nˌaje ˌatawˈeza kˌuirudˈia mˈali jˈake.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌataˈuza ɲˈumba ilˈijo ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌozuŋɡˈukwa kwa ukˈuta, jˌeje anˈajo hˈaki ja kˌuikombˈoa mwˈaka mzˈima baˌada ja maˈuzo ja hˈijo ɲˈumba. wakˈati hˈuo ˌanawˈeza kˌuikombˈoa.|0
ikˈiwa hˌaikˌukombolˈewa kˈabla ja mwˈaka mmˈoɟa kamˈili kupˈita, ɲˈumba ilˈijo ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌozuŋɡˈukwa kwa ukˈuta ˌitakˈuwa mˈali ja kudˈumu ja mnunˈuzi na wazˈao wˈake. hˌaitˌarudˈiʃwa mwˈaka wa jubˈile.|0
lakˈini ɲˈumba zilˈizo vˌiɟiɟˈini bˌila ja kˌuwa na kˈuta zˌilizˌozizuŋɡˈuka zˌitahˌesabˈiwa kˌama maʃˈamba. zˌinawˈeza kˌukombolˈewa, nˈazo zˌirudˈiʃwe katˌika mwˈaka wa jubˈile.|0
walˈawi sˈiku zˈote wˈana hˈaki ja kˌukombˈoa ɲˈumba zˈao katˌika mˈiɟi ja walˈawi wˌanajˌoimilˈiki.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈali ja mlˈawi ˌinawˈeza kˌukombolˈewa, jaˈani ɲˈumba ˌilijoˈuzwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wowˈote wˌanaˌouʃˌikilˈia ˌitarudˈiʃwa mwˈaka wa jubˈile, kwa sabˈabu ɲˈumba zilˈizo katˌika mˈiɟi ja walˈawi ni mˈali jˈao mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini ˈn̩tʃi ja malˈiʃo ilˈijo mˈali ja mˈiɟi jˈao kˈamwe ˌisiˈuzwe, ni mˈilki jˈao ja kudˈumu.|0
ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌamekˈuwa maskˈini, nˌaje ˌakaʃˈindwa kˌuɟitˌeɡemˈeza mweɲˈewe kˌatikˈati jˈako, msˌaidˈie kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo ˌuŋɡelˌimsaidˈia mɡˈeni ˌau kˌama mkˈazi wa mˈuda, ˌili awˈeze kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈako.|0
ˌusitʃukˈue rˈiba wˈala faˈida jojˈote kutˈoka kwˈake, bˌali ˌutamwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌili mzˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako awˈeze kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈako.|0
ˌusimkopˈeʃe fˈeða ˌili alˈipe na rˈiba, wˈala ˌusimˌuuzˈie tʃakˈula kwa faˈida.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, nˌilijˌekulˈeta kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri nikˈupe ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, nˌami nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌamekˈuwa maskˈini kˌatikˈati jˈako, nˌaje ˌakaɟiˈuza kwˈako, ˌusimfˈaɲe ˌatumˈike kˌama mtˈumwa.|0
ˌatatendˈewa kˌama mfˌaɲakˈazi ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa, ˌau kˌama mkˈazi wa mˈuda kˌatikˈati jˈako, nˌaje ˌatatumˈika mpˈaka mwˈaka wa jubˈile.|0
ndˈipo jˌeje na watˈoto wˌake wˌataatʃˈiwa, nˌaje ˌatarˈudi kwa wˈatu wa ukˈoo wˈake, na kwˈeɲe mˈali ja bˈaba zˈake.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌaisraˈeli ni wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌiliˌowalˈeta kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kˈamwe wˌasiˈuzwe kˌama watˈumwa.|0
ˌusiwˌatawˈale kwa ˌukatˈili, lakˈini utˈamtʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
watˈumwa wˈako wa kiˈume na wa kˈike wˌatatˈoka katˌika mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌokuzuŋɡˈuka; kutˈoka kwˈao wawˈeza kˌununˈua watˈumwa.|0
pˈia wawˈeza kˌununˈua baˈaði ja wakˈazi wa mˈuda wˌanaoˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈako, na ɟamˈaa ja kˈoo zˈao wˌaliˌozalˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa mˈali jˈako.|0
hˈao wawˈeza kˌuwariθˈiʃa watˈoto wˈako kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈao, na wˌanawˈeza kˌuwafˈaɲa watˈumwa maˈiʃa jˈao jˈote, lakˈini ˌusiwˌatawˈale ndˈuɡu zˈako wˌaisraˈeli kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
ikˈiwa mɡˈeni ˌau mkˈazi wa mˈuda kˌatikˈati jˈako ˌatakˈuwa taɟˈiri, na mmˈoɟa wa wazˈawa wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako akˈawa maskˈini, nˌaje ˌakaɟiˈuza kwa jˈule mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈako, ˌau kwa mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa wa kˈoo za waɡˈeni.|0
anˈajo hˈaki ja kˌukombolˈewa baˌada ja kˌuɟiˈuza. mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa zˌake awˈeza kˌumkombˈoa.|0
mɟˈomba wˈake, ˌau binˈamu jˈake, ˌau jejˈote alˈije ndˈuɡu wa dˈamu katˌika ukˈoo wˌake awˈeza kˌumkombˈoa. ˌau ikˈiwa ˌatafˌanikˈiwa, ˌanawˈeza kˌuɟikombˈoa mweɲˈewe.|0
jˌeje na hˈujo ˌalijˌemnunˈua wˌatahesˈabu mˈuda kˌuanzˈia mwˈaka ˌaliˌoɟiˈuza hˌadi mwˈaka wa jubˈile. mahˈali pa kˌuanzˈia bˈei ja kˌuatʃˈiwa kwˈake ˌitakˌadirˈiwa kwa uɟˈira ˌunaolˈipwa mfˌaɲakˈazi ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa kwa idˈadi ja hˈijo miˈaka.|0
ikˈiwa ˌimebˈaki miˈaka mˈiŋɡi, ni lazˈima ˌatalipˈia ˌukombˈozi wˌake fˈuŋɡu kˈubwa la bˈei ˌilijolˈipwa kˌumnunˈua jˈeje.|0
ikˈiwa miˈaka ˌilijobˈaki ni mitʃˈatʃe kˌufikˈia mwˈaka wa jubˈile, ˌatafˈaɲa hesˈabu jˈake, nˌaje ˌatalˈipa malˈipo jˌanajˌostahˈili kwa aɟˈili ja ˌukombˈozi wˈake.|0
ˌatatendˈewa kˌama ˈm̩tu wa kˌuaɟirˈiwa mwˈaka hˌadi mwˈaka; lazˈima uˈone kwˌamba jˈule ˌalijˌemnunˈua hˌamtawˈali kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
hˌata ikˈiwa hˌakukˌombolˈewa kwa ɲɟˈia mˌoɟawˈapo ja hˈizi, jˌeje na watˈoto wˌake wˌataatʃˈiwa katˌika mwˈaka wa jubˈile.|0
kwa maˈana wˌaisraˈeli ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu kˌama wˌatumˈiʃi. wˌao ni wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, nˌiliˌowatˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
msˌiɟitˌeŋɡenezˈee sanˈamu ˌau kˌusimamˈiʃa kiɲˈaɡo tʃa kutʃˈoŋɡa, ˌau mnˈara, wˈala ɟˈiwe la kˌuabudˈia, na pˈia msˌiɟiwekˈee ɟˈiwe lˌililotʃˈoŋɡwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu na kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈake. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
zˌiʃikˈeni sabˈato zˈaŋɡu na kˌuheʃˈimu mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ikˈiwa mtˌafuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitawˌaɲeʃˈea mvˈua katˌika maɟˈira jˈake, nˈajo ˈarði ˌitatˈoa mazˈao jˈake, na mˈiti ja mˌaʃambˈani ˌitazˈaa matˈunda jˈake.|0
kupˈura nafˈaka kwˈenu kˌutaˌendelˈea mpˈaka wakˈati wa kuvˈuna zabˈibu. pˈia kuvˈuna zabˈibu kˌutaˌendelˈea mpˈaka wakˈati wa kupˈanda mbˈeɡu, nˌaɲi mtakˈula na kuʃˈiba, na mtaˈiʃi salˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu.|0
nˌitawˈapa amˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, mpˈate kulˈala pasˈipo kutˈiwa hˈofu na jejˈote. nˌitawˌaondˈoa waɲˈama wakˈali watˈoke kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao upˈaŋɡa hˌautapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu.|0
mtˌawafukˈuza adˈui zˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa mbˈele jˈenu.|0
wˈatu wˈenu watˈano wˌatafukˈuza adˈui mˈia, wˈatu wˈenu mˈia wˌatafukˈuza adˈui ˈelfu kˈumi, nˌao adˈui zˈenu wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa mbˈele jˈenu.|0
nˌitawˌaaŋɡalˈia kwa ˌupendelˈeo na kˌuwafˈaɲa m̩zˈae na kˌuzidˈiʃa idˈadi jˈenu, nˌami nˌitaliʃˈika aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na nˈiɲi.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa makˈao jˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, nˌami sˌitawˌatʃukˈia.|0
nˌitatembˈea kˌatikˈati jˈenu nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌilijˌewatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri ˌili msˌiendelˈee kˌuwa watˈumwa wa wamˈisri, nˌikavˈuɲɟa kˈoŋɡwa lˈenu, na kˌuwawezˈeʃa kˌutembˈea mkˈiwa mmˌeinˈua vˈitʃwa vjˈenu ɟˈuu.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌamtanˌisikilˈiza na kˌutimˈiza mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˈote.|0
nˌaɲi kˌama mtˌazikatˈaa ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuzitʃukˈia ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, tˈena mkiʃˈindwa kˌutimˈiza ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na hˈivjo mkavˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakˌapowˌafaɲˈia hˈili: nˌitawˌaletˈea ɟˈuu jˈenu hˈofu ja ɣafˈula, maɡˈoɲɟua ja kufˈiʃa, na hˈoma ˌitakˌajopofˈuʃa mˈatʃo jˈenu na kˌuwaˌondolˈea uhˈai wˈenu. mtapˈanda mbˈeɡu bˌila mˌafanikˈio, kwa sabˈabu adˈui zˈenu wˌataˈila.|0
nˌitaˌuelekˈeza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu ˌili mʃˈindwe na adˈui zˈenu; wˈale wˌanaˌowatʃukˈia wˌatawˌatawˈala, nˌaɲi mtˌakimbˈia iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌewafukˈuza.|0
kˌama baˌada ja hˈaja jˈote hˌamtanˌisikilˈiza, nˌitawˌaaðˈibu mˈara sˈaba zaˈidi kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu.|0
nˌitakivˈuɲɟa kibˈuri tʃˈenu tʃa ˌukaˈidi na kˌuifˈaɲa ˈaŋɡa ilˈijo ɟˈuu jˈenu ˈiwe kˌama tʃˈuma, na ˈarði jˈenu kˌama ʃˈaba.|0
ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu zˌitatumˈika bˌila ja mˌafanikˈio, kwa sabˈabu ˈarði jˈenu hˌaitˌawazalˈia mazˈao jˈake, wˈala mˈiti ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu hˌaitazˈaa matˈunda jˈake.|0
kˌama mtˌaendelˈea kˌuwa na ˌuadˈui nˈami, na kˌukatˈaa kˌunisˌikilˈiza, nˌitawˌazidiʃˈia matˈeso jˈenu mˈara sˈaba zaˈidi, kˌama ðˈambi zˈenu zˌinavjˌostahˈili.|0
nˌitawatˈuma waɲˈama mwˈitu ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌao wˌatawˌaibiˈeni watˈoto wˈenu, wˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza ŋɡˈombe wˈenu, na kˌuifˈaɲa idˈadi jˈenu kˌuwa ndˈoɡo, hˈivi kwˌamba bˌarabˈara zˈenu zˌitakˈuwa hazˈina wˈatu.|0
ikˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˈambo hˈaja hˌamtakubˈali maˈoɲo jˈaŋɡu lakˈini mkˌaendelˈea kuwˈeka ˌuadˈui nˈami.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitawˈeka ˌuadˈui nˈaɲi, na kˌuwatˈesa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu mˈara sˈaba zaˈidi.|0
nˌitawˌaletˈea upˈaŋɡa ɟˈuu jˈenu ˌili kˌuwapˌatilˈiza kwa kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu. mtˌakapˌokimbilˈia miɟˈini mwˈenu, nˌitatˈuma taˈuni kˌatikˈati jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈenu.|0
nˌitakˌapowˌaondolˈea ˌupatˌikanˈaɟi wa mkˈate wˈenu, wˌanawˈake kˈumi wˌataˈoka mkˈate wˈenu katˌika tanˈuru mˈoɟa, nˌao wˌatauɡˈawa mkˈate kidˈoɡo kwa kupˈima. mtakˈula, lakˈini hˌamtaʃˈiba.|0
kˌama hˌata baˌada ja hˈaja bˈado hˌamtanˌisikilˈiza lakˈini mkˌaendelˈea kuwˈeka ˌuadˈui nˈami.|0
ndˈipo katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu nˌitawˈeka ˌuadˈui nˈaɲi, nˌami mweɲˈewe nˌitawˌaaðˈibu mˈara sˈaba kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu.|0
mtakˈula ɲˈama ja wˈana wˈenu na ɲˈama ja bˈinti zˈenu.|0
nˌitapˌaharˈibu mahˈali pˈenu pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, nˌibomˈoe mˌaðabˈahu zˈenu za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba, na kˌuzilundˈika maˈiti zˈenu ɟˌuːja sanˈamu zˈenu zisˈizo na uhˈai, nˌami nˌitawˌatʃukˈia nˈiɲi sˈana.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa mˈiɟi jˈenu kˌuwa maɡˈofu, na kˌuharˈibu mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈenu pa kˌuabudˈia, nˌami sˌitapendˈezwa na harˈufu nzˈuri ja sadˈaka zˈenu.|0
nˌitaˌiharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili adˈui zˈenu wˌatakˌaokˈuɟa kuˈiʃi hˈumo wˌaʃaŋɡˈae.|0
nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa nˈiɲi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, na kˌuufˈuta upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwafˌuatˈia. ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌitahˌaribˈiwa, nˈajo mˈiɟi jˈenu ˌitakˈuwa maɡˈofu.|0
ndˈipo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitafˌurahˈia sabˈato zˌake mˈuda wˈote ˈule ˌitakˌapokˈuwa ukˈiwa, nˌaɲi mkˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈenu. ndˈipo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitapumzˈika na kˌufurahˈia sabˈato zˈake.|0
wakˈati wˈote ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˌapobˈaki ukˈiwa, ˌitapumzˈika na kˌufurahˈia sabˈato zˌake ambˈazo hˌaikˌuzipˈata mlˌipokˈuwa mnaˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
kwa habˈari ja wenzˈenu wˈale wˌatakˌaobˈaki, nˌitaifˈaɲa miˈojo jˈao kˌuwa na hˈofu kˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za adˈui zˈao, kiˈasi kwˌamba saˈuti ja ɟˈani lˌinalˌopeperˈuʃwa na upˈepo ˌitawafˈaɲa wˌakimbˈie. wˌatakimbˈia kˈana kwˌamba wˌanakimbˈia upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌataaŋɡˈuka, iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna ˌanajˌewafukˈuza.|0
wˌataɟikwˈaa mmˈoɟa ɟˌuːja mwiŋɡˈine kˌama wˌakimbiˈao upˈaŋɡa, hˌata iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna ˌanajˌewafˌuatˈia. hˈivjo hˌamtawˈeza kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja adˈui zˈenu.|0
mtˌaaŋɡamˈia kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa; ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈenu ˌitawˈala.|0
wˈale wˈenu wˌatakˌaobˈaki wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za adˈui zˈao kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈao; pˈia kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌama wˌatatˈubu ðˈambi zˈao na ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao, ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu wˌao ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na ˌuadˈui wˌao kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ambˈao ˌulinifˈaɲa nˈiwe na ˌuadˈui nˌao hˌata nˌikawˌapelˈeka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈao, wakˈati miˈojo jˈao ˌisijˌotahirˈiwa ˌitaɲˌeɲekˈea na kutˈubu ðˈambi jˈao.|0
nˌami nˌitakumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na jakˈobo, na aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na isˈaki, na aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na ˌabrahˈamu, nˌami nˌitaˌikumbˈuka ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌataiˈatʃa ˈn̩tʃi ukˈiwa, nˈajo ˌitafˌurahˈia sabˈato zˌake wakˈati ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa bˌila wˈao. wˌataˌaðibˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌalizˌikatˈaa ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu na kˌuzitʃukˈia ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini pamˈoɟa na hˈili, wakˈati wˌatakˈuwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈao, sˌitawˌakatˈaa wˈala kˌuwatʃukˈia kiˈasi tʃa kˌuwaharˈibu kabˈisa na kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˈao. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
lakˈini kwa aɟˈili jˈao nˌitalˌikumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na bˈaba zˈao, ambˈao nˌiliwatˈoa mˈisri mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa ˌili nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈao. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
hˈizi ndˈizo ˈamri, ʃerˈia na pˈia maʃˈarti ambˈazo bwˈana ˌalifˈaɲa kˈati jˌake mweɲˈewe na wˌaisraˈeli katˌika mlˈima sinˈai kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatawˈeka naðˈiri maˈalum ˌili kuwˈeka wˈatu wˈakfu kwa bwˈana, kwa kutˈoa kiˈasi tʃa θamˈani ˌinajˌoliŋɡˈana.|0
ikˈiwa ni mwanˈamke, wˈeka θamˈani jˌake kwa ʃekˈeli θˌelaθˈini.|0
kˌama ni ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈati ja mitˈano na ˌiʃirˈini, wˈeka θamˈani ja mwˌanaˈume kˌuwa ʃekˈeli ˌiʃirˈini, na mwanˈamke ʃekˈeli kˈumi.|0
kˌama ni ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe miˈaka sitˈini na zaˈidi, wˈeka θamˈani ja mwˌanaˈume kˌuwa ʃekˈeli kˈumi na tˈano, na mwanˈamke ʃekˈeli kˈumi.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanajewˈeka naðˈiri ni maskˈini ˈm̩no kuwˈeza kulˈipa kiˈasi kˌilitʃowˈekwa, ˌatampelˈeka hˈujo ˈm̩tu kwa kuhˈani, ambˈaje ˌatawˈeka θamˈani jˌake kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈile mwˈeka naðˈiri ˌanatʃowˈeza kulˈipa.|0
kˌama kˈile ˈm̩tu ˌalitʃˌokiwekˈea naðˈiri ni mɲˈama ˌanajˌekubalˈika kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana, mɲˈama wa nˈamna hˈijo ˌalijˌetolˈewa kwa bwˈana ˌanakˈuwa mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ˈm̩tu hˌaruhusˈiwi kˌumbadilˈiʃa ˌau kutˈoa mɲˈama mzˈuri kwa m̩bˈaja, ˌau mɲˈama m̩bˈaja kwa mzˈuri. kˌama ˌatatˈoa mɲˈama badˈala ja mwiŋɡˈine, waɲˈama wˈote wawˈili, jaˈani jˈule ˌalijˌetolˈewa na jˈule ˌalijˌebadilˈiwa, ni wˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˌama ˌalitʃˌokiwekˈea naðˈiri ni mɲˈama alˈije naɟˈisi kˌiibˈada, jaˈani jˈule asˈije kˌubalˈika kˌuwa sadˈaka kwa bwˈana, hˈujo mɲˈama lazˈima alˈetwe kwa kuhˈani.|0
ambˈaje ˌataamˈua ubˈora wa mɲˈama hˈujo, kˌama ni mzˈuri ˌau m̩bˈaja. θamˈani jojˈote ˌatakˌajowˈeka kuhˈani, hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa.|0
kˌama mwˌeɲe mɲˈama ˌatapˈenda kˌumkombˈoa mɲˈama hˈujo, lazˈima ˌaoŋɡˈeze sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani jˈake.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌatawˈeka ɲˈumba jˌake wˈakfu kˌama kˈitu kˌitakatˈifu kwa bwˈana, kuhˈani ˌataamˈua ubˈora wa ɲˈumba hˈijo, kˌama ni nzˈuri ˌau m̩bˈaja. θamˈani jojˈote kuhˈani ˌatakˌajowˈeka, bˌasi hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijewˈeka ɲˈumba jˌake wˈakfu ˌataˌikombˈoa, lazˈima ˌaoŋɡˈeze sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani jˈake, nˈajo ɲˈumba ˌitakˈuwa jˌake tˈena.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeka sehˈemu ja ˈarði ja ɟamˈaa jˌake wˈakfu kwa bwˈana, θamˈani jˌake ˌitawˈekwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na kiˈasi tʃa mbˈeɡu ˌinajˌohitaɟˈiwa kupˈandwa katˌika ˈarði hˈijo, jaˈani homˈeri mˈoɟa ja mbˈeɡu za ʃajˈiri kwa ʃekˈeli hamsˈini za fˈeða.|0
kˌama ˌakiwˈeka ʃˈamba lˈake wˈakfu katˌika mwˈaka wa jubˈile, ˈile θamˈani ˌilijokwˈiʃa wˈekwa ˌitakˈuwa ˈijo hˈijo.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌakiwˈeka ʃˈamba lˈake wˈakfu baˌada ja jubˈile, kuhˈani ˌatawˈeka θamˈani kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ja miˈaka ˌilijobˈaki kˌufikˈia mwˈaka wa jubˈile ˌunaˌofuˈata, na θamˈani jˌake ˌilijˌoamulˈiwa ˌitapuŋɡˈuzwa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanajewˈeka wˈakfu ʃˈamba ˌanatˈaka kˌulikombˈoa, lazˈima ˌaoŋɡˈeze sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani jˈake, nˈalo ʃˈamba lˌitakˈuwa lˈake tˈena.|0
kˌama peŋɡˈine hˌalikombˈoi ʃˈamba hˈilo, ˌau kˌama ˌameliˈuza kwa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, kˈamwe hˌaliwˈezi kˌukombolˈewa.|0
ʃˈamba hˌilo lˌitakˌapoatʃˈiwa mwˈaka wa jubˈile, lˌitakˈuwa tˌakatˈifu, kˌama ʃˈamba lˌililˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana, nˈalo lˌitakˈuwa mˈali ja mˌakuhˈani.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌamewˈeka wˈakfu kwa bwˈana ʃˈamba ˌalilˌonunˈua, ambˈalo si sehˈemu ja ˈarði ja ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
kuhˈani ˌataamˈua θamˈani jˌake hˌadi mwˈaka wa jubˈile, nˌaje hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌatalˌazimˈika kulˈipa θamˈani jˌake sˈiku hˈijo kˌama kˈitu kˌitakatˈifu kwa bwˈana.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa jubˈile, ʃˈamba lˌitarudˈiʃwa kwa ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje lˌilinˌunulˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈake, jˈule ambˈaje ˈarði ˌilikˈuwa mˈali jˈake.|0
kˈila θamˈani lazˈima iwˈekwe kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, ɡˈera ˌiʃirˈini kwa ʃekˈeli.|0
lakˈini hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˈeka wˈakfu mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mɲˈama, kwa kˌuwa mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza tajˈari ni mˈali ja bwˈana; ˈawe ŋɡˈombe ˌau kondˈoo, ni wa bwˈana.|0
kˌama ni mmˈoɟa wa waɲˈama walˈio naɟˈisi, awˈeza kˌumnunˈua kwa bˈei ˌilijowˈekwa, ˌakioŋɡˈeza sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani jˈake. kˌama hˌatamkombˈoa, mɲˈama hˈujo ˌataˈuzwa kwa bˈei ˌilijowˈekwa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakikombˈoa tʃotʃˈote tʃa zˈaka jˈake, lazˈima ˌaoŋɡˈeze sehˈemu ja tˈano ja θamˈani jˈake.|0
zˈaka jˈote ja kˈundi la ŋɡˈombe ˌau la kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, kˈila mɲˈama wa kˈumi ˌapitˈaje tʃˈini ja fˈimbo ja jˈule ˌawatʃuŋɡˈaje, ˌatakˈuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana.|0
jˈule mɲˈama wa kˈumi hˌatatʃˌaɡulˈiwa kwa kiɡˈezo tʃa uzˈuri ˌau ubˈaja, nˌaje hˌaruhusˈiwi kˌubadilˈiwa. ikˈiwa ˌatabˌadilˈiwa, bˌasi mɲˈama jˈule wa kwˈanza na hˈujo ˌalijˌebadilˈiwa wˈote wˌatahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa wˌatakatˈifu, na hˌaiwˌezekˈani kˌuwakombˈoa..|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaaɡˈizo bwˈana ˌalijˈompa mˈose ɟˌuːja mlˈima sinˈai kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌalisˈema na mˈose katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai, katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa pˈili, katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. ˌakamwambˈia.|0
hesˈabu wˈatu wa ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli kwa kˌufuˈata kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao, ˌukiˌoroðˈeʃa kˈila mwˌanaˈume kwa ɟˈina lˈake, mmˈoɟa mmˈoɟa.|0
wˌewe na arˈoni mtˌawahesˈabu kwa mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈao wˌanaˈume wˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli wˌeɲe miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na kˌuendelˈea ambˈao wˌanawˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi.|0
mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila, kˈila alˈije kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa jˈake, ˌatawˌasaidˈia.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˌanaˈume wˌatakˌaowˌasaidˈia: kutˈoka rˌeubˈeni, ni ˌelisˈuri mwˈana wa ʃˌedeˈuri.|0
kutˈoka sˌimeˈoni, ni ʃˌelumiˈeli mwˈana wa sˌuriʃadˈai.|0
kutˈoka jˈuda, ni naʃˈoni mwˈana wa ˌaminadˈabu.|0
kutˈoka ˌisakˈari, ni nˌeθanˈeli mwˈana wa suˈari.|0
kutˈoka zˌabulˈoni, ni ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa helˈoni.|0
kutˈoka wˈana wa josˈefu: kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu, ni ˌeliʃˈama mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi; kutˈoka manˈase, ni ɡˌamaliˈeli mwˈana wa pˌedasˈuri.|0
kutˈoka bˌeɲamˈini, ni ˌabidˈani mwˈana wa ɡˌideˈoni.|0
kutˈoka dˈani, ni ˌahiezˈeri mwˈana wa ˌamiʃadˈai.|0
kutˈoka aʃˈeri, ni pˌaɡiˈeli mwˈana wa okrˈani.|0
kutˈoka ɡˈadi, ni ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa dˌeuˈeli.|0
kutˈoka naftˈali, ni ahˈira mwˈana wa enˈani.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈume wˌaliˌoteulˈiwa kutˈoka ɟˌumuˈija, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakabˈila ja bˈaba zˈao. wˌalikˈuwa wakˈuu wa kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˌanaˈume hˈao wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamepˈewa maɟˈina jˈao.|0
wˌakaˈita ɟˌumuˈija jˈote pamˈoɟa katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa pˈili. wˈatu wˌakaoɲˈeʃa nasˈaba zˈao kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao, nˌao wˌanaˈume wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, mmˈoɟa mmˈoɟa.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose. hˈivjo ˌaliwˌahesˈabu katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa rˌeubˈeni, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa ˌisraˈeli: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, mmˈoɟa mmˈoɟa, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa sˌimeˈoni: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌalihˌesabˈiwa na kˌuoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, mmˈoɟa mmˈoɟa, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa ɡˈadi: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa jˈuda: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa ˌisakˈari: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa zˌabulˈoni: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wˈana wa josˈefu: kutˈoka wazˈao wa ˌefraˈimu: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
idˈadi kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu ˌarobaˈini,mˌiatˈano.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa manˈase: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa bˌeɲamˈini: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa dˈani: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa aʃˈeri: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa naftˈali: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌaliˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina, kˌufuatˈana na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈume wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa na mˈose, arˈoni na vˌioŋɡˈozi kˈumi na wawˈili wa ˌisraˈeli, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakiwˌakilˈiʃa ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌufuatˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ɟamˈaa ja kabˈila la lˈawi hˌawakˌuhesabˈiwa pamˈoɟa na weŋɡˈine.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose.|0
kˈamwe ˌusihesˈabu kabˈila la lˈawi wˈala kˌuwawˈeka pamˈoɟa katˌika hesˈabu ja wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine.|0
badˈala jˈake, wawˈeke walˈawi kˌuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa maskˈani ja ˌuʃuhˈuda, ɟˌuːja samˈani zˌake na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani jˈake. wˌao wˌatabˈeba maskˈani na samˈani zˌake zˈote; wˌataitˈunza na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kˌuizuŋɡˈuka.|0
wakˈati wowˈote maskˈani ˌinapˌohamˈiʃwa, walˈawi wˌataˌifuŋɡˈua, na wakˈati wowˈote maskˈani ˌinapˌotakˈiwa kˌusimamˈiʃwa, walˈawi wˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi hˈijo. ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwiŋɡˈine ambˈaje ˌatasoɡˈea karˈibu nˈajo ˌatauˈawa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌatapˈiɡa mahˈema jˈao kwa makˈundi makˈundi, kˈila mwˌanaˈume katˌika kˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe tʃˈini ja bendˈera jˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, walˈawi wˌatapˈiɡa mahˈema jˈao kˌuzuŋɡˈuka maskˈani ja ˌuʃuhˈuda ˌili ɣaðˈabu ˌisiipˈate ɟˌumuˈija ja wˌaisraˈeli. walˈawi wˌatawˌaɟibˈika kwa ˌutunzˈaɟi wa maskˈani ja ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalifˈaɲa jˈote hˈaja sˌawasˈawa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌaliwˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi zˈao kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa umbˈali fulˈani kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈema, kˈila mwˌanaˈume tʃˈini ja alˈama jˌake pamˈoɟa na bendˈera ja ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
kwa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuelekˈea mawˈio ja ɟˈua, kˈambi ja makˈundi ja jˈuda wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa jˈuda ni naʃˈoni mwˈana wa ˌaminadˈabu.|0
kabˈila la ˌisakˈari wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na jˈuda. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ˌisakˈari ni nˌeθanˈeli mwˈana wa suˈari.|0
kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni lˌitafuˈata. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa zˌabulˈoni ni ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa helˈoni.|0
kwa upˈande wa kusˈini kˌutakˈuwa kˈambi ja makˈundi ja rˌeubˈeni tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa rˌeubˈeni ni ˌelisˈuri mwˈana wa ʃˌedeˈuri.|0
kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na rˌeubˈeni. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa sˌimeˈoni ni ʃˌelumiˈeli mwˈana wa sˌuriʃadˈai.|0
kabˈila la ɡˈadi lˌitafuˈata. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ɡˈadi ni ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa dˌeuˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na kˈambi ja walˈawi vˌitakˈuwa kˌatikˈati ja kˈambi zˈote. wˌao wˌatasafˈiri kwa ˌutaratˈibu ˈule ˈule kˌama wˌalivjopˈiɡa kˈambi, kˈila mmˈoɟa mahˈali pˈake mweɲˈewe tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈake.|0
upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi kˌutakuwˈepo na kˈambi ja makˈundi ja ˌefraˈimu tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu ni ˌeliʃˈama mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi.|0
kabˈila la manˈase lˌitafuˈata baˌada ja ˌefraˈimu. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa manˈase ni ɡˌamaliˈeli mwˈana wa pˌedasˈuri.|0
kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini lˌitafuˈata baˌada ja manˈase. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini ni ˌabidˈani mwˈana wa ɡˌideˈoni.|0
upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini kˌutakˈuwa na makˈundi ja kˈambi ja dˈani, tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa dˈani ni ˌahiezˈeri mwˈana wa ˌamiʃadˈai.|0
kabˈila la aʃˈeri wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na dˈani. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa aʃˈeri ni pˌaɡiˈeli mwˈana wa okrˈani.|0
kabˈila la naftˈali lˌitafuˈata. kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa naftˈali ni ahˈira mwˈana wa enˈani.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, walˈawi hˌawakˌuhesabˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌomwamˈuru mˈose. hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌalivjopˈiɡa kˈambi tʃˈini ja alˈama zˈao, pˈia hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌoondˈoka, kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa na ukˈoo wˌake na ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
hˌii ni hesˈabu ja ɟamˈaa ja arˈoni na mˈose kwa wakˈati ambˈao bwˈana ˌalizuŋɡˈumza na mˈose katˌika mlˈima sinˈai.|0
maɟˈina ja wˈana wa arˈoni jˌalikˈuwa: nadˈabu mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza na abˈihu, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari.|0
hˈajo jˌalikˈuwa maɟˈina ja wˈana wa arˈoni, mˌakuhˈani wapˈakwa mafˈuta, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesimˈikwa kˌuhudˈumu kˌama mˌakuhˈani.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nadˈabu na abˈihu wˌalikˈufa mbˈele za bwˈana wˌalipotˈoa sadˈaka kwa mˈoto ˌusiˌoruhusˈiwa mbˈele zˌake katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai. hˌawakˈuwa na wˈana; kwa hˈijo ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari wˌalihudˈumu pˈeke jˈao kˌama mˌakuhˈani wakˈati wˈote wa maˈiʃa ja arˈoni bˈaba jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
walˈete wˈatu wa kabˈila la lˈawi mbˈele ja arˈoni kuhˈani ˌili wˌamsaidˈie.|0
wˌatafˈaɲa hudˈuma kwa aɟˈili jˌake na kwa ɟˌumuˈija jˈote katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa kufˈaɲa kˈazi za maskˈani.|0
wˌatatˈunza samˈani zˈote za hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, wˌakitimˈiza waɟˈibu wa kˌuhudumˈia wˌaisraˈeli kwa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ja maskˈani.|0
wˌakabˈiði walˈawi kwa arˈoni na wanˈawe; hˈao n̩dˈio wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao wˌanakˌabiðˈiwa kwˈake kabˈisa.|0
wawˈeke arˈoni na wanˈawe kˌuhudˈumu kˌama mˌakuhˈani; ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌatakˌajesoɡˈea mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
nˌimewatwˈaa walˈawi kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli badˈala ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa kˈila mwanˈamke wa mwˌisraˈeli. walˈawi ni wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza ni wˈaŋɡu. nˌilipˌowaˈua wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza hˌuko mˈisri, nˌilimtˈeŋɡa kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza katˌika ˌisraˈeli ˈawe wˈaŋɡu, akˈiwa mwˌanadˈamu ˌau mɲˈama. wˌatakˈuwa wˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
wˌahesˈabu walˈawi kwa ɟamˈaa zˈao na kˈoo zˈao. mhesˈabu kˈila mwˌanaˈume mwˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa ˌau zaˈidi.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˌahesˈabu, kˌama ˌalivjˌoamrˈiwa na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa maɟˈina ja wˈana wa lˈawi: ɡerʃˈoni, kohˈaθi na merˈari.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo jˌalijokˈuwa maɟˈina ja kˈoo za wˌaɡerʃˈoni: lˈibni na ʃimˈei.|0
kˈoo za wˌamerˈari zˌilikˈuwa nˈi: mˈahli na mˈuʃi. hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za walˈawi, kˌufuatˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na kˈoo za walˈibni na wˌaʃimˈei kwa ɡerʃˈoni; hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za wˌaɡerʃˈoni.|0
idˈadi ja waˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na mwˈezi mmˈoɟa ˌau zaˈidi wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa wˌalikˈuwa sˈaba,mˌiatˈano.|0
ukˈoo wa wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌalitakˈiwa kuwˈeka kˈambi zˈao upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, ɲˈuma ja maskˈani.|0
kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za wˌaɡerʃˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa laˈeli.|0
katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌalikˈuwa na waɟˈibu wa kutˈunza maskˈani na hˈema, vˌifunˈiko vjˈake, pazˈia katˌika mlˈaŋɡo wa kˌuiŋɡilˈia ndˈani ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kwa kohˈaθi kˌulikuwˈepo kˈoo za wˌaamrˈamu, wˌaiʃˈari, wˌahebrˈoni na wˌauziˈeli; hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi.|0
hesˈabu ja waˈume wˈote wˌeɲe mwˈezi mmˈoɟa ˌau zaˈidi ˌilikˈuwa wˈatu nˈane,mˌiasˈita. wˌakohˈaθi wˌaliwˌaɟibˈika kutˈunza mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi zˌilitakˈiwa kuwˈeka kˈambi zˈao upˈande wa kusˈini wa maskˈani.|0
kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi ˌalikˈuwa ˌelisafˈani mwˈana wa ˌuziˈeli.|0
wˌaliwˌaɟibˈika kutˈunza sandˈuku la aɡˈano, mˈeza, kinˈara tʃa tˈaa, mˌaðabˈahu, na vˈile vjˈombo vja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu vˌinavjˌotumˈika kˌuhudˈumu, pazˈia, na kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌohusˈika na mˌatumˈizi jˈake.|0
kˌioŋɡˈozi m̩kˈuu wa walˈawi ˌalikˈuwa ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani, arˈoni. ˌaliwˈekwa ɟˌuːja wˈale wˌaliˌowaɟibˈika kutˈunza mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
kwa merˈari kˌulikˈuwa na kˈoo za wamˈahli na wamˈuʃi; hˈizi zˌilikˈuwa kˈoo za merˈari.|0
hesˈabu ja waˈume wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa ˌau zaˈidi wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa wˌalikˈuwa sˈita,mˌiambˈili.|0
kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za kˈoo za wˌamerˈari ˌalikˈuwa sˌuriˈeli mwˈana wa ˌabihaˈili; hˈawa wˌalitakˈiwa kuwˈeka kˈambi zˈao upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa maskˈani.|0
wˌamerˈari wˌaliwˈekwa kutˈunza miˈimo ja maskˈani, mˌatarˈuma jˈake, ŋɡˈuzo, vitˈako na vifˈaa vjˈake vjˈote na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌohusˈika na mˌatumˈizi jˈake.|0
na pˈia ŋɡˈuzo za ˈua ˌunaˌozuŋɡˈuka pamˈoɟa na vitˈako vjˈake, viɡˈiŋɡi vja hˈema na kˈamba zˈake.|0
mˈose, na arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌalitakˈiwa kuwˈeka kˈambi zˈao mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa maskˈani, kˌuelekˈea mawˈio ja ɟˈua, mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. wˌao wˌalihusˈika na ˌutunzˈaɟi wa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwa niˈaba ja wˌaisraˈeli. ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌalijˌepasˌoɡelˈea mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ˌaŋɡeuˈawa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, wˌahesˈabu wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli wˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa ˌau zaˈidi na ˌuoroðˈeʃe maɟˈina jˈao.|0
nˌitwalˈie walˈawi badˈala ja wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa wˌaisraˈeli, nˈajo mifˈuɡo ja walˈawi badˈala ja wˌazalˈiwa wa mifˈuɡo ja wˌaisraˈeli. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakawˌahesˈabu wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
watwˈae walˈawi badˈala ja wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli, nˈajo mifˈuɡo ja walˈawi badˈala ja mifˈuɡo jˈao. walˈawi wˌatakˈuwa wˈaŋɡu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˌili kˌukombˈoa wazˈao wa kwˈanza mˌiambˈili sabˈininatˈatu wa wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao wˌamezˈidi hesˈabu ja walˈawi.|0
kusˈaɲa ʃekˈeli tˈano kwa kˈila mmˈoɟa, kˌufuatˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, ambˈajo ˈina uzˈito wa ɡˈera ˌiʃirˈini.|0
ˈm̩pe arˈoni na wanˈawe hˈizo fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja ˌukombˈozi wa idˈadi ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliozˈidi.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakakusˈaɲa fˈeða za ˌukombˈozi kutˈoka kwa wˈale ambˈao hesˈabu jˈao ˌilizˈidi wˈale wˌaliˌokombolˈewa na walˈawi.|0
mˈose akˈampa arˈoni na wanˈawe ˈile fˈeða ja ˌukombˈozi, kˌama ˌalivjˌoamrˈiwa na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
wˌahesˈabu wˌakohˈaθi walˈio sehˈemu ja walˈawi kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˌahesˈabu wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini wˌanaokˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika kˈazi ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo kˈazi ja wˌakohˈaθi katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia: wˌatatˈunza vˈitu vilˈivjo vˌitakatˈifu sˈana.|0
wakˈati kˈambi ˌinapˌohamˈiʃwa, arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌataiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kuʃˈuʃa lˈile pazˈia la kˌuzuilˈia na kˌufunˈika nˈalo sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatafunˈika ɟˈuu jˌake na ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo, na kˌutandˈaza ɟˈuu jˌake kˌitambˈaa tʃa rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu ˌilijˌokolˈea na kˌuiŋɡˈiza mipˈiko mahˈali pˈake.|0
ɟˌuːja mˈeza ja mikˈate ja woɲˈeʃo wˌatatandˈaza kˌitambˈaa tʃa bulˈuu na wawˈeke sahˈani ɟˈuu jˈake, mˌasinˈia, bakˈuli na mˌaɡudulˈia kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi; mkˈate ˈule ambˈao ˈupo hˈapa daˈima ˌutabˈaki ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɟˌuːja hˈivjo vˈitu wˌatatandˈaza kˌitambˈaa tʃekˈundu na kˌufunˈika kwa ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo na kuwˈeka mipˈiko jˌake mahˈali pˈake.|0
wˌatatʃukˈua kˌitambˈaa tʃa bulˈuu na kˌufunˈika kinˈara tʃa tˈaa kilˈitʃo kwa aɟˈili ja nˈuru, pamˈoɟa na tˈaa zˈake, mikˈasi jˈake, sinˈia zˈake, mˌaɡudulˈia jˌake jˈote jˌalijˌotumˈika kˌuwekˈea mafˈuta.|0
ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja ðahˈabu wˌatatandˈaza kˌitambˈaa tʃa bulˈuu na kˌukifunˈika kwa ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo na kuwˈeka mipˈiko jˌake mahˈali pˈake.|0
wˌatavˌitʃukˈua vjˈombo vjˈote vˌinavjˌotumˈika kˌuhudumˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, wˌatavˌisokotˈea kwˈeɲe kˌitambˈaa tʃa bulˈuu na kˌufunˈika kwa ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo, na kˌuviwˈeka ɟˌuːja mˈiti ja kˌutʃukulˈia.|0
wˌataondˈoa maɟˈivu kutˈoka mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba na kˌutandˈaza kˌitambˈaa tʃa zˌambarˈau ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatawˈeka vjˈombo vjˈote ɟˈuu jˌake vˌinavjˌotumˈika kwa kˌuhudumˈia mˌaðabahˈuni pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vja kˌutolˈea mˈoto, ɲˈuma, miˈiko na mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia. ɟˈuu jˌake wˌatatandˈaza ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo ja kˌufunˈika, na kuwˈeka mipˈiko mahˈali pˈake.|0
baˌada ja arˈoni na wanˈawe kˌumalˈiza kˈazi ja kˌufunˈika samˈani tˌakatˈifu na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote, wˈatu wˌatakˌapokˈuwa tajˈari kuŋɡˈoa kˈambi, wˌakohˈaθi wˌatakˈuɟa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ja kubˈeba. lakˈini wasˈiɟe wˌakaɡˈusa vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu la sˈivjo wˌatakˈufa. wˌakohˈaθi n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaobˈeba vˈile vˈitu vˌilivjˈomo katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa arˈoni, kuhˈani, n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajesˌimamˈia mafˈuta kwa aɟˈili ja tˈaa, uvˈumba wˌeɲe harˈufu nzˈuri, sadˈaka za kˈila sˈiku za nafˈaka na mafˈuta ja upˈako. n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa maskˈani jˈote ja bwˈana na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani mwˈake pamˈoɟa na samˈani tˌakatˈifu na vjˈombo vjˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba kˈoo za kabˈila la wˌakohˈaθi hˌawatˈeŋɡwi kutˈoka walˈawi.|0
ˌili wapˈate kuˈiʃi wˈala wasˈife wˌanapˌokaribˈia vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu sˈana, ˌuwafaɲˈie hˈivi: arˈoni na wanˈawe wˌatakwˈenda mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na kˌumɡawˈia kˈila ˈm̩tu kˈazi jˈake, na kwˌamba ni nˈini ˌatakˌatʃotʃukˈua.|0
lakˈini wˌakohˈaθi hˌawarˌuhusˈiwi kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ˌili kˌuaŋɡalˈia vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu, hˌata kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, la sˈivjo wˌatakˈufa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌahesˈabu pˈia wˌaɡerʃˈoni kwa ɟamˈaa zˈao na kˈoo zˈao.|0
wˌahesˈabu wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini ambˈao hˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo hudˈuma ja kˈoo za wˌaɡerʃˈoni wakˈati wˌanapofˈaɲa kˈazi na kubˈeba mizˈiɡo.|0
wˌatabˈeba mˌapazˈia ja maskˈani. hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, kˌifunˈiko tʃˈake na kˌifunˈiko tʃa ɲɟˈe tʃa ŋɡˈozi za pombˈoo, mˌapazˈia ja mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
mˌapazˈia ja ˈua ˌunaˌozuŋɡˈuka maskˈani na mˌaðabˈahu, pazˈia la mˌaiŋɡilˈio, kˈamba na vifˈaa vjˈote vˌinavjˌotumˈika katˌika hudˈuma jˈake. wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌatafˈaɲa jˈote jˌatakiwˈajo kˌufaɲˈika na vˈitu hˈivi.|0
ˌutumˈiʃi wˌao wˈote ukˈiwa ni kˌutʃukˈua ˌau wa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ɲiŋɡˈine, ˌutafaɲˈika tʃˈini ja mˌaelekˈezo ja arˈoni na wanˈawe. mtˌawapaŋɡˈia kˌama waɟˈibu wˌao jˈote wˌatakˌajojafˈaɲa.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo hudˈuma ja kˈoo za wˌaɡerʃˈoni katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. waɟˈibu wˌao ˌutakˈuwa tʃˈini ja mˌaelekˈezo ja ˌiθamˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani arˈoni.|0
wˌahesˈabu wˌamerˈari kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˌahesˈabu wˌanaˈume wˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini ambˈao wˌatakˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio waɟˈibu wˌao wˌanapofˈaɲa hudˈuma katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia: kubˈeba miˈimo ja maskˈani, mˌatarˈuma jˈake, ŋɡˈuzo na vitˈako.|0
ŋɡˈuzo za ˈua ˌunaˌozuŋɡˈuka pamˈoɟa na vitˈako vjˈake, viɡˈiŋɡi vja hˈema, kˈamba, vifˈaa vjˈake vjˈote na kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌohusiˈana na mˌatumˈizi jˈake. kˈila ˈm̩tu mpaŋɡˈie vˈitu maˈalum vja kubˈeba.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌutumˈiʃi wa kˈoo za merˈari kˌama wˌatakˌavjofˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, tʃˈini ja mˌaelekˈezo ja ˌiθamˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani, arˈoni.|0
mˈose, arˈoni na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˌumuˈija wˌakawˌahesˈabu wˌakohˈaθi kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini ambˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ɟˈumla ja wˈote wˈale wa kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi ambˈao wˌalitumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. mˈose na arˈoni wˌaliwˌahesˈabu kˌufuatˈana na ˈamri ja bwˈana kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini ambˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ɟˈumla ja wˈale wa kˈoo za ɡerʃˈoni ambˈao wˌalitumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. mˈose na arˈoni wˌaliwˌahesˈabu kˌufuatˈana na ˈamri ja bwˈana.|0
wˌamerˈari wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi miˈaka hamsˈini ambˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kˌutumˈika katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa kwa kˈoo zˈao, wˌalikˈuwa tˈatu,mˌiambˈili.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ɟˈumla ja wˈale wa kˈoo za wˌamerˈari. mˈose na arˈoni wˌaliwˌahesˈabu kˌufuatˈia ˈamri ja bwˈana kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
hˈivjo mˈose, arˈoni na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliwˌahesˈabu walˈawi wˈote kwa kˈoo zˈao na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri kˌuanzˈia miˈaka θˌelaθˈini hˌadi hamsˈini wˌaliokˈuɟa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ja kˌuhudˈumu na kubˈeba hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana kˌupitˈia mˈose, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaliɡawˈiwa kˈazi jˌake na kˌuambˈiwa kˈitu tʃa kubˈeba. hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌohesabˈiwa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli kumtˈoa ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˈana uɡˈoɲɟua wa ŋɡˈozi ˌuambˌukizˈao, ˌau ˌanajetˈokwa na mˌaɟimˈaɟi ja aˈina jojˈote, ˌau ambˈaje ni naɟˈisi kwa ˌutaratˈibu wa ibˈada kwa sabˈabu ja maˈiti.|0
hˌii ˌitakˈuwa ni kwa wˈote, jaˈani, wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake; wˌatoˈeni ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi ˌili wasˈiɟe wˌakanaɟˈisi kˈambi jˈao, ambˈamo nˌinaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli, wakˈati mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˌakimkosˈea mwenzˈake kwa ɲɟˈia jojˈote, na kwa hˈivjo akˈawa si mwˌaminˈifu kwa bwˈana, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˈana hatˈia.|0
na ni lazˈima atˈubu ðˈambi ˌalijˌoifˈaɲa. ni lazˈima atˈoe malˈipo kamˈili kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa lˈake, ˌaoŋɡˈeze sehˈemu ja tˈano ɟˌuːja malˈipo hˈajo na kutˈoa jˈote kwa ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌemkosˈea.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu hˈujo hˈana ɟamˈaa ja karˈibu ambˈaje malˈipo jˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲua kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa, malˈipo jˌatakˈuwa mˈali ja bwˈana, nˈajo ni lazˈima apˈewe kuhˈani, pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume ambˈaje ˌanatumˈika kˌufaɲˈia ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
mˌatolˈeo jˈote mˌatakatˈifu ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌanajolˈeta kwa kuhˈani jˌatakˈuwa jˈake.|0
kˈila kˈitu tʃa ˈm̩tu kˌilitʃowˈekwa wˈakfu ni tʃˈake mweɲˈewe, lakˈini kˈile ˌatoˈatʃo kwa kuhˈani kˌitakˈuwa tʃa kuhˈani..|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
nˈena na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: ikˈiwa ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu ˌamepotˈoka na si mwˌaminˈifu kwa mumˈewe.|0
kwa kˌukutˈana kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine, tˈendo hˈili lˌikafitʃˈika kwa mumˈewe na ˌunaɟˈisi wˌake ˌusiɡˌundulˈike kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˌuʃahˈidi ðˈidi jˈake, nˌaje hˌakukamˈatwa katˌika tˈendo hˈilo.|0
nˈazo hisˈia za wˈivu zˌikamɟˈia mumˈewe na kumʃˈuku mkˈewe, nˌaje ˈm̩ke jˈule ni naɟˈisi, ˌau mumˈewe ˈana wˈivu na ˌakamʃˈuku iŋɡˈawa si naɟˈisi.|0
bˌasi ˌatampelˈeka mkˈewe kwa kuhˈani. hˈujo mˈume ˌitampˈasa ˌapelˈeke pˈia sadˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa wa ʃajˈiri kiˈasi tʃa sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa kwa niˈaba ja mkˈewe. hˈujo mwˌanaˈume kˈamwe ˌasimimˈine mafˈuta ɟˌuːja hˈuo ˈuŋɡa wˈala ˌasiwˈeke uvˈumba ɟˈuu jˈake, kwa sabˈabu ni sadˈaka ja nafˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈivu, sadˈaka ja ˌukumbˈuʃo ˌili kˌukumbuʃˈia uˈovu.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamlˈeta hˈujo mwanˈamke na kˌumsimamˈiʃa mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja mˈaɟi mˌatakatˈifu ndˈani ja ɡˌudulˈia la udˈoŋɡo na kˌutʃaŋɡˈaɲa na baˈaði ja vˈumbi kutˈoka sakˈafu ja maskˈani.|0
baˌada ja kuhˈani kˌumsimamˈiʃa hˈujo mwanˈamke mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌatazˌifuŋɡˈua ɲuˈele za hˈujo mwanˈamke na kuwˈeka sadˈaka ja ˌukumbˈuʃo mˌikonˈoni mwˈake, ˈile sadˈaka ja nafˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈivu, hˈuku kuhˈani mweɲˈewe ˌakiʃˌikilˈia jˈale mˈaɟi matʃˈuŋɡu jˌaletˈajo laˈana.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatamwapˈiza hˈujo mwanˈamke, ˌakimwambˈia, ikˈiwa hakˈuna mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine ˌalijˌekutˈana kimwˈili nˈawe, wˈala hˌuɟapotˈoka na kˌuwa naɟˈisi wakˈati ukˈiwa ˌumeolˈewa na mumˈeo, mˈaɟi hˈaja matʃˈuŋɡu jˌaletˈajo laˈana na jˌasikuðˈuru.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˌumepotˈoka wakˈati ukˈiwa ˌumeolˈewa na mˈume wˈako na ˌumeɟˌinaɟˈisi mweɲˈewe kwa kˌukutˈana kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine ˌasijekˈuwa mumˈeo.|0
hˈapa kuhˈani ˌatamwˈeka hˈujo mwanˈamke tʃˈini ja laˈana ja kiˈapo ˌakisˈema: bwˈana na ˌawafˈaɲe wˈatu wˈako wˌakulaˈani na kˌukukatˈaa, wakˈati bwˈana ˌatakˌapolifˈaɲa pˈaɟa lˈako kˌupoˈoza na tˈumbo lˈako kuvˈimba.|0
mˈaɟi hˈaja jˌaletˈajo laˈana na jˌaiŋɡˈie ndˈani ja mwˈili wˈako ˌili tˈumbo lˈako livˈimbe na pˈaɟa lˈako lˌipoˈoze.  kˈiʃa mwanˈamke ˌatasˈema, ˈamen. ˈiwe hˈivjo.|0
kuhˈani ˌataandˈika laˈana hˈizi kwˈeɲe kitˈabu, kˈiʃa ˌatazˌioʃˈea laˈana hˈizo kwˈeɲe jˈale mˈaɟi matʃˈuŋɡu.|0
kuhˈani ˌatamɲuˈeʃa jˈule mwanˈamke jˈale mˈaɟi matʃˈuŋɡu jˌaletˈajo laˈana, nˈajo mˈaɟi hˈaja jˌatamwiŋɡˈia na kˌumsabˌabiʃˈia mˌaumˈivu makˈali.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃukˈua sadˈaka ja nafˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈivu kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈujo mwanˈamke, nˌaje ˌataipˈuŋɡa mbˈele za bwˈana na kˌuilˈeta mˌaðabahˈuni.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatatʃˈota sadˈaka ja nafˈaka mkˈono ˌulioɟˈaa kˌama sehˈemu ja kˌumbukˈumbu na kˌuitˌeketˈeza ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu, baˌada ja hˈajo, ˌatamtˈaka hˈujo mwanˈamke ˈaɲue jˈale mˈaɟi.|0
kˌama ˌameɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi na kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa mumˈewe, wakˈati ˌanapˌotakˈiwa ˈaɲue mˈaɟi jˈale jˌaletˈajo laˈana, jˌatamwiŋɡˈia na kˌusababˈiʃa mˌaumˈivu makˈali; tˈumbo lˈake lˌitavˈimba na pˈaɟa lˈake lˌitapoˈoza, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa ˌamelˌaanˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ikˈiwa hˈujo mwanˈamke hˌakuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi, nˌaje ni sˈafi, ˌatasafˈiʃwa hatˈia na ˌatawˈeza kuzˈaa watˈoto.|0
bˈasi, hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia ja wˈivu mwanˈamke ˌanapˌopotˈoka na kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi akˈiwa ˌameolˈewa na mumˈewe.|0
ˌau hisˈia za wˈivu zˌinapomɟˈia mwˌanaˈume kwa sabˈabu ja kumʃˈuku mkˈewe. kuhˈani ˌatamfˈaɲa hˈujo mwanˈamke kˌusimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana na ˌatatumˈia ʃerˈia hˌii jˈote kwa hˈujo mwanˈamke.|0
mˈume ˌatakˈuwa hˈana hatˈia ja kˈosa lolˈote, bˌali mwanˈamke ˌatajˌatʃukˈua mˌatokˈeo ja ðˈambi jˈake..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie: ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˌanatˈaka kuwˈeka naðˈiri maˈalum, naðˈiri ja kutˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana kˌama mnaðˈiri.|0
ni lazˈima ˌaɟitˈeŋɡe na mvˈiɲo na kˌiɲuˈaɟi kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu, na kˈamwe asˈiɲue sˈiki ˌitokanˈajo na mvˈiɲo ˌau ˌitokanˈajo na kˌiɲuˈaɟi kiŋɡˈine tʃˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu. kˈamwe asˈiɲue mˈaɟi ja zabˈibu wˈala kˈula zabˈibu mbˈitʃi ˌau kˈavu.|0
kwa mˈuda wˈote ˌatakˌaokˈuwa mnaðˈiri, kˈamwe hˌatakˈula tʃotʃˈote kˌitokanˈatʃo na mzabˈibu, sˈio mbˈeɡu wˈala maɡˈanda.|0
kwa mˈuda wˈote wa naðˈiri jˌake ja kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, wˈembe hˌautapˈita kitʃwˈani mwˈake. ni lazˈima ˈawe mtˌakatˈifu mpˈaka kipˈindi tʃa kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwˈake kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana kiˈiʃe; ni lazˈima aˈatʃe ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake zˌirefˈuke.|0
kwa kipˈindi tʃotʃˈote tʃa kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana hˌatakˌaribˈia maˈiti.|0
hˌata kˌama bˈaba jˌake mweɲˈewe ˌau mˈama ˌau kˈaka ˌau dˈada akˈifa, hˌataɟˌinaɟˈisi mweɲˈewe kwa tˌaratˈibu za ibˈada kwa aɟˈili jˈao, kwa sabˈabu iʃˈara ja kˌuɟiwˈeka wˈakfu kwˈake kwa mˈuŋɡu ˈipo katˌika kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
kwa kipˈindi tʃˈote tʃa kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwˈake jˌeje ni wˈakfu kwa bwˈana.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote akˈifa ɣafˈula karˈibu nˈaje, ˌatakˈuwa ˌametˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi ɲuˈele zˌake ˌalizˌoziwˈeka wˈakfu, hˈivjo ni lazˈima aɲˈoe ɲuˈele zˌake sˈiku ja ˌutakˈaso wˈake, jaˈani sˈiku ja sˈaba.|0
kˈiʃa sˈiku ja nˈane ni lazˈima alˈete hˈua wawˈili ˌau makˈinda mawˈili ja ɲɟˈiwa kwa kuhˈani katˌika mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatˈoa mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, na mwiŋɡˈine kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˌake kwa sabˈabu ˌametˈenda ðˈambi kwa kuwˈepo mbˈele ja maˈiti. sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo ˌatakiwˈeka wˈakfu kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
ni lazˈima ˌaɟitˈoe kabˈisa kwa bwˈana kwa kipˈindi tʃa kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwˈake, na ni lazˈima atˈoe mwˌanakondˈoo wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja hatˈia. sˈiku zˌilizopˈita hˌazitˌahesabˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ˌaliɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi katˌika sˈiku zˌake za kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa.|0
bˌasi hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia kwa aɟˈili ja mnaðˈiri baˌada ja kipˈindi tʃˈake tʃa kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kupˈita. ˌatalˈetwa kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˈapo ˌatatˈoa sadˈaka zˌake kwa bwˈana: jaˈani, mwˌanakondˈoo wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa asˈije na wˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, kondˈoo ˈm̩ke wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa asˈije na wˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kondˈoo dˈume asˈije na wˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja amˈani.|0
pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˌake za nafˈaka na za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, na kikˈapu tʃa mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, jaˈani mˌaandˈazi jˌalijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta, na mikˈate mjembˈamba ˌilijopˈakwa mafˈuta.|0
kuhˈani ˌatavilˈeta vˈitu hˈivjo mbˈele za bwˈana na kufˈaɲa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
ˌatalˈeta pˈia kikˈapu tʃa mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, na ˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu kondˈoo dˈume kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa bwˈana, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
kˈiʃa kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, mnaðˈiri ni lazˈima aɲˈoe ɲuˈele zˌake ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameziwˈeka wˈakfu. ˌatazˌitʃukˈua hˈizo ɲuˈele na kˌuziwˈeka ndˈani ja mˈoto ulˈio tʃˈini ja ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja amˈani.|0
baˌada ja mnaðˈiri kuɲˈoa hˈizo ɲuˈele zˌake za kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwˈake, kuhˈani atˈampa mˌikonˈoni mwˈake bˈeɡa la kondˈoo dˈume lˌililotʃˈemʃwa, na pˈia andˈazi na mkˈate mwembˈamba kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kikˈapu, vjˈote vikˈiwa vˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa bˌila kuwˈekwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌatavˌiinˈua mbˈele za bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinˈua; ni vˌitakatˈifu na ni mˈali ja kuhˈani, pamˈoɟa na kˈile kidˈari kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa na lˈile pˈaɟa lˌililˌotolˈewa. baˌada ja hˈajo, mnaðˈiri ˌanawˈeza kˈuɲua divˈai.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia ja mnaðˈiri ambˈaje ˌanawˈeka naðˈiri kwa mˌatolˈeo jˌake kwa bwˈana kˌufuatˈana na kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa kwˈake, zaˈidi ja tʃotʃˈote kˈile ˌanatʃowˈeza kupˈata. ni lazˈima ˌatimˈize naðˈiri ˌalijˌoiwˈeka kˌufuatˈana na ʃerˈia ja mnaðˈiri..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
mwambˈie arˈoni na wanˈawe, hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjˌowabarˈiki wˌaisraˈeli. wˌaambiˈeni.|0
bwˈana ˌakubarˈiki na kˌukulˈinda.|0
bwˈana ˌakuˌaŋɡazˈie nˈuru ja ˈuso wˌake na kˌukufaðˈili.|0
bwˈana ˌakuɡˌeuzˈie ˈuso wˌake na kukˈupa amˈani. .|0
hˈivjo wˌataliwˈeka ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja wˌaisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitawˌabarˈiki.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuisˌimamˈiʃa maskˈani, ˌaliitˈia mafˈuta na kˌuiwˈeka wˈakfu pamˈoɟa na samˈani zˌake zˈote. pˈia ˌalitˈia mˌaðabˈahu mafˈuta na kˌuiwˈeka wˈakfu, pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote.|0
ndˈipo vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli, wˈale wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila wˌasimamˈizi wa wˈale wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa, wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka.|0
wˌalizilˈeta kˌama mˌatolˈeo jˈao mbˈele za bwˈana: maɡˈari sˈita ja kˌukokˈotwa jˌalijˌofunˈikwa, pamˈoɟa na maksˈai kˈumi na wawˈili; jaˈani maksˈai mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kwa kˈila kˌioŋɡˈozi, na ɡˈari mˈoɟa la kˌukokˈotwa kutˈoka kwa kˈila vˌioŋɡˈozi wawˈili. hˈaja wˌalijalˈeta mbˈele ja maskˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
vˌikubˈali vˈitu hˈivi kutˈoka kwˈao, ˌili viwˈeze kˌutumˈika katˌika kˈazi kwˈeɲe hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. wˌapatˈie walˈawi kˌama kˈazi ja kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌitakˌavjohitˈaɟi.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakatʃukˈua jˈale maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa pamˈoɟa na maksˈai, na kuwˈapa walˈawi.|0
ˌaliwˈapa wˌaɡerʃˈoni maɡˈari mawˈili ja kˌukokˈotwa na maksˈai wˈanne, kˌama wˌalivjˌohitˈaɟi kwa kˈazi jˈao.|0
na pˈia ˌaliwˈapa wˌamerˈari maɡˈari mˈanne ja kˌukokˈotwa na maksˈai wanˈane, kˌama kˈazi jˈao ˌilivjˌohitˈaɟi. wˈote wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja mˌaelekˈezo ja ˌiθamˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani, arˈoni.|0
lakˈini mˈose hˌakuwˈapa wˌakohˈaθi tʃotʃˈote kˈati ja hˈivjo, kwa sabˈabu wˌalitakˈiwa kubˈeba vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao, vˈile wˌalikˈuwa wˌanawˌaɟibˈika.|0
wakˈati mˌaðabˈahu jˌalitˈiwa mafˈuta, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌalilˈeta sadˈaka zˈao kwa aɟˈili ja kˈule kuwˈekwa wˈakfu kwˈake na kˌuziwˈeka mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia mˈose, kˈila sˈiku kˌioŋɡˈozi mmˈoɟa ˌatalˈeta sadˈaka jˌake ˌili kuwˈekwa wˈakfu mˌaðabˈahu.|0
jˈule ambˈaje ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˌake sˈiku ja kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa naʃˈoni, mwˈana wa ˌaminadˈabu, wa kabˈila la jˈuda.|0
sadˈaka jˌake ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja naʃˈoni mwˈana wa ˌaminadˈabu.|0
sˈiku ja pˈili jˌake nˌeθanˈeli mwˈana wa suˈari, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la ˌisakˈari, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
sinˈia mˈoɟa la ðahˈabu lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli kˈumi, likˈiwa lˌimeɟˈazwa uvˈumba.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja nˌeθanˈeli mwˈana wa suˈari.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa helˈoni, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
sinˈia mˈoɟa la ðahˈabu lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli kˈumi, likˈiwa lˌimeɟˈazwa uvˈumba.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa helˈoni.|0
sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne ˌelisˈuri mwˈana wa ʃˌedeˈuri, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌelisˈuri mwˈana wa ʃˌedeˈuri.|0
sˈiku ja tˈano ʃˌelumiˈeli mwˈana wa sˌuriʃadˈai, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa sˌimeˈoni, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
sinˈia mˈoɟa la ðahˈabu lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli kˈumi, likˈiwa lˌimeɟˈazwa uvˈumba.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ʃˌelumiˈeli mwˈana wa sˌuriʃadˈai.|0
sˈiku ja sˈita ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa dˌeuˈeli, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ɡˈadi, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa dˌeuˈeli.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌeliʃˈama mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌeliʃˈama mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi.|0
sˈiku ja nˈane ɡˌamaliˈeli mwˈana wa pˌedasˈuri, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa manˈase, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ɡˌamaliˈeli mwˈana wa pˌedasˈuri.|0
sˈiku ja tˈisa ˌabidˈani mwˈana wa ɡˌideˈoni, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌabidˈani mwˈana wa ɡˌideˈoni.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi ˌahiezˈeri mwˈana wa ˌamiʃadˈai, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa dˈani, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ˌahiezˈeri mwˈana wa ˌamiʃadˈai.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi na mˈoɟa pˌaɡiˈeli mwˈana wa okrˈani, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa aʃˈeri, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja pˌaɡiˈeli mwˈana wa okrˈani.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi na mbˈili ahˈira mwˈana wa enˈani, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa naftˈali, ˌalilˈeta sadˈaka jˈake.|0
sadˈaka ˌalijolˈeta ˌilikˈuwa sahˈani mˈoɟa ja fˈeða jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na bakˈuli mˈoɟa la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˈeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini, vjˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, vikˈiwa vˌimeɟˈazwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta kˌama sadˈaka ja nafˈaka.|0
fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈuzi dˈume mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
maksˈai wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume watˈano, mbˈuzi dˈume watˈano na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume watˈano wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, ˌili vˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kˌama sadˈaka ja amˈani. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja ahˈira mwˈana wa enˈani.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka za vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli mˌaðabˈahu jˌalipowˈekwa wˈakfu, wakˈati jˌalitˈiwa mafˈuta: sahˈani kˈumi na mbˈili za fˈeða, bakˈuli kˈumi na mbˈili za fˈeða za kˌuɲuɲizˈia, na mˌasinˈia kˈumi na mawˈili ja ðahˈabu.|0
kˈila sahˈani ja fˈeða ˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini, na kˈila bakˈuli la fˈeða la kˌuɲuɲizˈia lˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli sabˈini. mˌasinˈia jˈote kˈumi na mawˈili jˌalikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mbˈili,mˌiaˈn̩ne kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
sahˈani kˈumi na mbˈili za ðahˈabu zˌilizoɟˈazwa uvˈumba zˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli kˈumi kˈila mˈoɟa, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu. kwa ɟˈumla, sahˈani za ðahˈabu zˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini.|0
ɟˈumla ja waɲˈama wˌaliˌotolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa wˌalikˈuwa fahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili watʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume kˈumi na wawˈili na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume kˈumi na wawˈili wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka. mbˈuzi waˈume kˈumi na wawˈili wˌalitolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za ðˈambi.|0
ɟˈumla ja waɲˈama kwa aɟˈili ja ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja amˈani wˌalikˈuwa maksˈai ˌiʃirˈini na wˈanne, kondˈoo dˈume sitˈini, mbˈuzi dˈume wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa sitˈini na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa sitˈini. hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka zˌilizolˈetwa kwa aɟˈili ja kuwˈekwa wˈakfu kwa mˌaðabˈahu baˌada ja kutˈiwa mafˈuta.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na bwˈana, ˌalisikˈia saˈuti ˌikisˈema nˌaje kutˈoka kˈati ja wˈale mˌakerˈubi wawˈili wˌaliokˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈile kˈiti tʃa rehˈema, ɟˌuːja sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda. mˈose ˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na arˈoni ˌumwambˈie, wakˈati ˌutakˌapoziwˈeka zˈile tˈaa sˈaba, zˌinatakˈiwa kˌuaŋɡˈaza enˈeo lilˈilo mbˈele ja kinˈara tʃa tˈaa..|0
arˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo; ˌakaziwˈeka zˈile tˈaa ˌili zˌielekˈee mbˈele kwˈeɲe kinˈara tʃa tˈaa, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo kinˈara tʃa tˈaa kˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa: kˌilitˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa, kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe kitˈako tʃˈake hˌadi kwˈeɲe maˈua jˈake. kinˈara tʃa tˈaa kˌilitˌeŋɡenˈezwa sˌawasˈawa kabˈisa na kˌielelˈezo ambˈatʃo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwoɲˈeʃa mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
watwˈae walˈawi kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine na ˌuwatakˈase kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada.|0
ˌili kˌuwatakˈasa fˈaɲa hˈivi: ɲˌuɲizˈia mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso ɟˈuu jˈao; kˈiʃa ˌuwaambˈie waɲˈoe ɲuˈele kwˈeɲe mwˈili mzˈima, wafˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈao na hˈivjo wˌaɟitakˈase weɲˈewe.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌamtʃukˈue fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; kˈiʃa ˌutamtʃukˈua fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa wa pˈili kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
walˈete walˈawi mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na ˌukusˈaɲe ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ˌutawalˈeta walˈawi mbˈele za bwˈana, na wˌaisraˈeli wˌatawˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja walˈawi.|0
arˈoni ˌatawawˈeka walˈawi mbˈele za bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinˈua kutˈoka kwa wˌaisraˈeli, ˌili kwˌamba wˈawe tajˈari kˌuifˈaɲa kˈazi ja bwˈana.|0
baˌada ja walˈawi kuwˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja hˈao mˌafahˈali wawˈili, tumˈia mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa bwˈana, na mwiŋɡˈine kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja walˈawi.|0
wˌaambˈie hˈao walˈawi wˌasimˈame mbˈele ja arˈoni na wanˈawe, kˈiʃa wˌawatˈoe kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa kwa bwˈana.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌutakˈuwa ˌumewatˈeŋɡa walˈawi kutˈoka kwa wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine, nˌao walˈawi wˌatakˈuwa wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumekwˈiʃa kˌuwatakˈasa walˈawi na kˌuwatˈoa kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa, wˌatakˈuɟa kufˈaɲa kˈazi jˈao katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
wˌao n̩dˈio wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao wˌatatolˈewa kabˈisa kwˈaŋɡu. nˌimewatwˈaa kˌama mˈali jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe badˈala ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume kutˈoka kwa kˈila mwanˈamke wa kˌiisraˈeli.|0
kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume katˌika ˌisraˈeli, ˈawe wa mwˌanadˈamu ˌau mɲˈama, ni wˈaŋɡu. wakˈati nˌilipˌowaˈua wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza hˌuko mˈisri, nˌiliwatˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
nˌami nˌimewatwˈaa walˈawi badˈala ja wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈati ja wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, nimˈempa arˈoni na wanˈawe walˈawi kˌama zawˈadi ˌili wafˈaɲe kˈazi katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa niˈaba ja wˌaisraˈeli, na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈao ˌili pˌasiwˈepo na pˈiɡo lolˈote lˌitakˌalowapˈata wˌaisraˈeli wakˈati wˌatakˌapokˌaribˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
mˈose, arˈoni na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌafaɲˈia walˈawi kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
walˈawi wˌakaɟˌitakˈasa weɲˈewe na wˌakafˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao. kˈiʃa arˈoni ˌakawˌasoɡˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuinulˈiwa, na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈao ˌili kˌuwatakˈasa.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, walˈawi wˌalikˈuɟa kufˈaɲa kˈazi jˈao katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa arˈoni na wanˈawe. wˌaliwˌafaɲˈia walˈawi kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
hˈili lˌinawahˈusu walˈawi: wˌanaˈume wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌau zaˈidi wˌatakˈuɟa kˌuʃirˈiki katˌika kˈazi kwˈeɲe hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
lakˈini wˌatakˌapofˈika ˈumri wa miˈaka hamsˈini, ni lazˈima waˈatʃe kˈazi zˈao za kˌawaˈida wˈala wˌasiˌendelˈee.|0
wˌanawˈeza kˌuwasˌaidˈia ndˈuɡu zˈao kufˈaɲa waɟˈibu wˌao katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, lakˈini wˌao weɲˈewe kˈamwe hˌawatafˈaɲa hˈijo kˈazi. bˈasi, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjoɡˈawa waɟˈibu kwa walˈawi.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema na mˈose katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wa mwˈaka wa pˈili baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri. ˌakasˈema.|0
wˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli wˌaaðimˈiʃe pasˈaka katˌika wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa.|0
ˌaðimiʃˈeni wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa, jaˈani wakˈati wa kuzˈama ɟˈua sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi hˈuu, kˌufuatˈana na destˈuri zˌake zˈote na maʃˈarti jˈake.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˌaiˌaðimˈiʃe pasˈaka.|0
nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai wakˈati wa kuzˈama ɟˈua sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
lakˈini baˈaði jˈao hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka sˈiku ˈile kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa tˌaratˈibu za kˌiibˈada kwa aɟˈili ja kuɡˈusa maˈiti. kwa hˈijo wˌakamwendˈea mˈose na arˈoni sˈiku ˈile ˈile.|0
wˌakamwambˈia mˈose, tˌumekˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sabˈabu tˌumeɡˈusa maˈiti, lakˈini kwa nˈini tˌuzuilˈiwe kˌumtolˈea bwˈana sadˈaka jˌake pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine katˌika wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa.|0
mˈose ˌakawaɟˈibu, ŋɡoɟˈeni mpˈaka nˌitafˈute kˈile bwˈana ˌanatʃˌoaɡˈiza kˌuwahˈusu nˈiɲi.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli: wakˈati mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌau wazˈao wˈenu wˌanapokˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sabˈabu ja maˈiti ˌau wakˈiwa sˌafarˈini, hˌata hˈivjo wˌanawˈeza kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka ja bwˈana.|0
wˌataˌiaðimˈiʃa wakˈati wa kuzˈama ɟˈua sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa pˈili. watˈamla mwˌanakondˈoo, pamˈoɟa na mkˈate ˌusiotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, na mbˈoɡa tʃˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌasibakˈize tʃotʃˈote hˌadi ˌasubˈuhi wˈala wˌasivˈuɲɟe mifˈupa ja mwˌanakondˈoo. wakˈati wˌanapˌoaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka, hawˈana bˈudi kˌufuˈata maʃˈarti jˈote.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu ni sˈafi kwa tˌaratˈibu za kˌiibˈada nˌaje hajˈuko sˌafarˈini, ˌasipˌoaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka, ˈm̩tu hˈujo hˈana bˈudi kˌukatilˈiwa mbˈali na wˈatu wˌake kwa sabˈabu hˌakutˈoa sadˈaka ja bwˈana kwa wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa. ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatawˌaɟibˈika kubˈeba mˌatokˈeo ja ðˈambi jˈake.|0
mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ambˈaje ˌanatˈaka kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka ja bwˈana, lazˈima afˈaɲe hˈivjo kwa kˌufuˈata destˈuri na maʃˈarti. lazˈima maʃˈarti jˈawe sˌawasˈawa kwa mɡˈeni na mzˈawa..|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ambˈajo maskˈani, hˈema la ˌuʃuhˈuda, ˌilipˌosimamˈiʃwa, wˈiŋɡu lˌiliˌifunˈika. kˌuanzˈia ɟiˈoni mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi wˈiŋɡu lˌililokˈuwa ɟˌuːja maskˈani lˌiliˌonekˈana kˌama mˈoto.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo lˌilivjˌoendelˈea kˌuwa; wˈiŋɡu lˌiliˌifunˈika wakˈati wa mtʃˈana, na usˈiku lˌiliˌonekˈana kˌama mˈoto.|0
wakˈati wowˈote wˈiŋɡu lˌilipˌoinˈuka kutˈoka ɟˌuːja hˈema, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliondˈoka; mahˈali popˈote wˈiŋɡu lˌilipˌosimˈama, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi.|0
kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliondˈoka, na kwa ˈamri jˌake wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi. kwa mˈuda wˈote wˈiŋɡu lˌilipˌosimˈama ɟˌuːja maskˈani, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalibˈaki wˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi.|0
wakˈati wˈiŋɡu lˌilipobˈaki ɟˌuːja maskˈani kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalitˈii ˈamri ja bwˈana nˌao hˌawakˌuondˈoka.|0
wakˈati mwiŋɡˈine wˈiŋɡu lˌilikˈuwa ɟˌuːja maskˈani kwa sˈiku tʃˈatʃe tˈu; kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana wˌaŋɡelipˈiɡa kˈambi na kˈiʃa kwa ˈamri jˌake wˌaŋɡelˌiondˈoka.|0
wakˈati mwiŋɡˈine wˈiŋɡu lˌilikuwˈepo kˌuanzˈia ɟiˈoni mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi tˈu, na lˌilipˌoinˈuka ˌasubˈuhi, nˌao wˌaliondˈoka. ikˈiwa ni mtʃˈana ˌau usˈiku, wakˈati wowˈote wˈiŋɡu lˌilipˌoinˈuka, wˌaliondˈoka.|0
ikˈiwa wˈiŋɡu lˌilikˈaa ɟˌuːja maskˈani kwa sˈiku mbˈili ˌau mwˈezi ˌau mwˈaka, wˌaisraˈeli wˌaŋɡebˈaki wˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi na hˌawakˌuondˈoka; lakˈini lˌilipˌoinˈuka, wˌaŋɡeondˈoka.|0
kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi, na kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana wˌaliondˈoka. wˌalitˈii ˈamri ja bwˈana, kˌufuatˈana na aɡˈizo lˈake kˌupitˈia mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
tˌeŋɡenˈeza tˌarumbˈeta mbˈili za fˈeða ja kufˈua, ˌuzitumˈie kwa kuˈita ɟˌumuˈija pamˈoɟa na wakˈati wa kuvˈuɲɟa makˈambi ˌili kˌuondˈoka.|0
tˌarumbˈeta zˈote mbˈili zˌikipˈiɡwa, ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ˌitakˌusaɲˈika mbˈele jˈako katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kˌama tˌarumbˈeta mˈoɟa tu ˌikipˈiɡwa, vˌioŋɡˈozi, jaˈani wakˈuu wa kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli, n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaokˌusaɲˈika mbˈele jˈako.|0
wakˈati m̩lˈio wa kˌuɟulˈiʃa hatˈari ˌukipˈiɡwa, mˌakabˈila jalˈijo na makˈambi upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki jˌataondˈoka.|0
ˌukisikˈika m̩lˈio wa pˈili wa ɟˈinsi hˈijo, wˌaliˈoko kwˈeɲe makˈambi ja kusˈini wˌataondˈoka. m̩lˈio hˈuo wa kˌuɟulˈiʃa hatˈari ˌutakˈuwa iʃˈara ja kˌuondˈoka.|0
ˌili kˌukusˈaɲa kˌusaɲˈiko, pˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta zˈote, lakˈini sˈijo kwa m̩lˈio wa kˌuɟulˈiʃa hatˈari.|0
wˈana wa arˈoni, mˌakuhˈani, n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaopˈiɡa hˈizo tˌarumbˈeta. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu na kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapˌopiɡˈana vˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu weɲˈewe ðˈidi ja adˈui ˌanajˌewaonˈea, pˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta kwa m̩lˈio wa kˌuɟulˈiʃa hatˈari. ndˈipo ˌutakumbˈukwa na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌuokolˈewa kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈenu.|0
pˈia ɲakˈati za furˈaha jˈenu, jaˈani sˌikukˈuu zˈenu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa na sˌikukˈuu za mwˈezi mwandˈamo, mtapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta ɟˌuːja sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka zˈenu za amˈani, nˈazo zˌitakˈuwa ˌukumbˈuʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini ja mwˈezi wa pˈili wa mwˈaka wa pˈili, wˈiŋɡu lˌiliinˈuka kutˈoka ɟˌuːja maskˈani ja ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaondˈoka kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai wˌakasafˈiri kutˈoka sehˈemu mˈoɟa hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine mpˈaka wˈiŋɡu lˌilipotˈua katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la parˈani.|0
vikˈosi vja kˈambi ja jˈuda vˌilitˌaŋɡulˈia kwˈanza tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. naʃˈoni mwˈana wa ˌaminadˈabu ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
nˌeθanˈeli mwˈana wa suˈari ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la ˌisakˈari.|0
nˌaje ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa helˈoni ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni.|0
ndˈipo maskˈani ˌilipoʃˈuʃwa, nˌao wˈana wa ɡerʃˈoni na wˈana wa merˈari ambˈao wˌaliibˈeba wˌakaondˈoka.|0
vikˈosi vja kˈambi ja rˌeubˈeni vˌilifuˈata, tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. ˌelisˈuri mwˈana wa ʃˌedeˈuri ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
ʃˌelumiˈeli mwˈana wa sˌuriʃadˈai ˌalioŋɡˈoza kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni.|0
nˌaje ˌeliasˈafu mwˈana wa dˌeuˈeli ˌalioŋɡˈoza kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la ɡˈadi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakohˈaθi wˌakaondˈoka, wˌakitʃukˈua vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu. maskˈani ˌilikˈuwa ˌisimamˈiʃwe kˈabla wˌao hˌawaɟafˈika.|0
vikˈosi vja kˈambi ja ˌefraˈimu vˌilifuˈata, tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. ˌeliʃˈama mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
ɡˌamaliˈeli mwˈana wa pˌedasˈuri ˌalioŋɡˈoza kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la manˈase.|0
nˌaje ˌabidˈani mwˈana wa ɡˌideˈoni ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini.|0
mwiʃˈowe, kˌama kikˈosi tʃa ɲˈuma tʃa ulˈinzi wa vikˈosi vjˈote, vikˈosi vja kˈambi ja dˈani vˌiliondˈoka tʃˈini ja alˈama jˈao. ˌahiezˈeri mwˈana wa ˌamiʃadˈai ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
pˌaɡiˈeli mwˈana wa okrˈani ˌalioŋɡˈoza kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la aʃˈeri.|0
nˌaje ahˈira mwˈana wa enˈani ˌalioŋɡˈoza kikˈosi tʃa kabˈila la naftˈali.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌakamwambˈia hobˈabu mwˈana wa rˌeuˈeli, mmˌidiˈani, mkwˈewe mˈose, tˌunaondˈoka kwˈenda mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana ˌamesˈema nˌitawˈapa nˈiɲi mahˈali hˈapo. twˈende pamˈoɟa nˌasi tˌutakˌutendˈea mˈema, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌameahˈidi mˈambo mˈema kwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, hapˈana, sˌitakwˈenda; nˌitarˈudi kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakasˈema, tˌafaðˈali ˌusituˈatʃe. wˌewe ˌunaɟˈua mahˈali ambˈapo jˌatupˈasa kupˈiɡa kˈambi ɟaŋɡwˈani, nˌawe ˌunawˈeza kˌuwa mˈatʃo jˈetu.|0
ikˈiwa ˌutafˌuatˈana nˈasi, tˌutaʃˌirikiˈana nˌawe mˈema jojˈote tˌutakˌajopˈewa na bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo wˌaliondˈoka kutˈoka mlˈima wa bwˈana, nˌao wˌakasafˈiri kwa sˈiku tˈatu. sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana lˌiliwˌataŋɡulˈia kwa zˈile sˈiku tˈatu ˌili kˌuwatˌafutˈia mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika.|0
wˈiŋɡu la bwˈana lˌilikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈao wakˈati wa mtʃˈana wˌalipˌoondˈoka kambˈini.|0
wakˈati wowˈote sandˈuku lˌilipˌoondˈoka, mˈose ˌalisˈema, ˈee bwˈana, inˈuka! watˈesi wˈako na wˌatawaɲˈike; adˈui zˈako na wˌakimbˈie mbˈele zˈako.|0
wakˈati wowˈote sandˈuku lˌilipˌosimˈama, ˌalisˈema, ˈee bwˈana, rˈudi, kwa maˈelfu ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌasiˌohesabˈika.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wˌakalˌalamˈika kwa habˈari ja taˈabu zˈao mˌasikiˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, nˌaje ˌalipˌowasikˈia, hasˈira jˌake ˌikawˈaka. ndˈipo mˈoto kutˈoka kwa bwˈana ˌukawˈaka mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao na kˌuteketˈeza baˈaði ja viˈuŋɡa vja kˈambi.|0
wˈatu wˌalipˌomlilˈia mˈose, ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, nˌao mˈoto ˌukazimˈika.|0
hˈivjo mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa tabˈera, kwa sabˈabu mˈoto kutˈoka kwa bwˈana ˌuliwˈaka mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
tˌunakumbˈuka wˈale samˈaki tˌuliokˈula hˌuko mˈisri bˌila ɣarˈama, pˈia jˈale matˈaŋɡo, mˌatikˌitimˈaɟi, mbˈoɡa, vˌituŋɡˈuu, na vˌituŋɡˈuu saˈumu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa tˌumepotˈeza hˈamu ja tʃakˈula; hˌatuˈoni kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa hˌii mˈana.|0
mˈana ˌilifanˈana kˌama mbˈeɡu za ɡˌiliɡilˈani, nˈajo ˌilikˈuwa na rˈaŋɡi ja maɲɟˈano ˌilijˌopaˈuka.|0
hˈao wˈatu wˌalikwˈenda kˌukusˈaɲa, kˈiʃa wˌaliisˈaɡa kwa mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia ja mkˈono ˌau kˌuitwˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe vˈinu. wˌaliipˈika vjuŋɡˈuni ˌau kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌaandˈazi. lˈaða jˌake ˌilikˈuwa kˌama kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni.|0
umˈande ˌulipˌoaŋɡˈuka kambˈini wakˈati wa usˈiku, pˈia mˈana ˌiliaŋɡˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
mˈose ˌakasikˈia wˈatu wa kˈila ɟamˈaa wˌakilˈia, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema lˈake. bwˈana ˌakakˌasirˈika ˈm̩no, nˌaje mˈose ˌakafˌaðaˈika.|0
ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, kwa nˈini ˌumelˈeta taˈabu hˌii ɟˌuːja mtumˈiʃi wˈako? nˌimekˌufaɲˈia nˈini tʃa kˌukutʃukˈiza hˌata ˌukawˈeka mzˈiɡo hˈuu wa wˈatu hˈawa wˈote ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, wˈatu hˈawa wˈote mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijˌewatuŋɡˈiʃa mˈimba? ɟˈe, ni mˌimi nˌilijˌewazˈaa? kwa nˈini ˌunanˌiambˈia nˌiwatʃukˈue mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, kˌama vˈile mlˈezi ˌabebˈavjo mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa, hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijˌowaahˈidi bˈaba zˈao.|0
nˌitapˈata wˈapi ɲˈama kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈote hˈawa? wˌanaˌendelˈea kˌunililˈia wˌakisˈema, tˈupe ɲˈama tˈule!.|0
mˌimi siwˈezi kˌuwabˈeba wˈatu hˈawa wˈote pˈeke jˈaŋɡu, mzˈiɡo ni mzˈito sˈana kwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌunavjˌonitendˈea, ˌuniˈue sˈasa hˈivi, jaˈani kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, wˈala ˌusiniˈatʃe niˈone mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose: nˌiletˈee wazˈee sabˈini wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌunaˌowafahˈamu kˌama vˌioŋɡˈozi na mˌaafˈisa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu. walˈete katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, ˌili wawˈeze kˌusimˈama hˌuko pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
nˌami nˌitaʃˈuka na kusˈema nˌawe hˌuko. nˌami nˌitatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja rˈoho ilˈijo ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌuiwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈao. wˌatakˌusaidˈia kubˈeba mzˈiɡo wa wˈatu hˈao ˌili usˈiɟe ˌukaubˈeba pˈeke jˈako.|0
wˌaambˈie hˈao wˈatu: ɟˌiwekˈeni wˈakfu weɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja kˈeʃo, wakˈati mtˌakapokˈula ɲˈama. bwˈana ˌaliwˌasikˈia mlˌipolˈia, mkisˈema, laˈiti tˌuŋɡekˈuwa na ɲˈama tˈule! tˌulikˈuwa na hˈali nzˈuri zaˈidi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri! sˈasa bwˈana ˌatawˈapa ɲˈama, nˌaɲi mtaˈila.|0
hˌamtaˈila kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa tˈu, ˌau sˈiku mbˈili, ˌau tˈano, kˈumi ˌau sˈiku ˌiʃirˈini.|0
bˌali kwa mwˈezi mzˈima mpˈaka ˌiwatokˈee puˈani, nˌaɲi mtˌaitʃukˈia kabˈisa, kwa kˌuwa mmˌemkatˈaa bwˈana, ambˈaje jˈupo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, nˌaɲi mmelˈia mbˈele zˈake, mkisˈema, hˈivi kwa nˈini tˌulitˈoka mˈisri? .|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌalisˈema, mˌimi nˈiko hˈapa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu mˌiasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌanaˌotembˈea kwa miɡˈuu, nˌawe ˌumesˈema, nˌitawˈapa ɲˈama ja kˈula kwa mwˈezi mzˈima!.|0
ɟˈe, wˌaŋɡewˈeza kupˈata ɲˈama ja kˌuwatˈoʃa hˌata kˌama makˈundi ja kondˈoo na ja ŋɡˈombe jˌaŋɡetʃˈiɲɟua kwa aɟˈili jˈao? ɟˈe, wˌaŋɡetoʃˈeka hˌata kˌama samˈaki wˈote wa bˌaharˈini wˌaŋɡevulˈiwa kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
