bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu mˈose, ɟˈe, mkˈono wa bwˈana ni mfˈupi sˈana? sˈasa ˌutaˈona kˌama ɟˈambo nˌililˌolisˈema lˌitatimˈizwa kwa aɟˈili jˈako ˌau la.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakatˈoka na kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu lˈile ambˈalo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema. ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wazˈee wˌao sabˈini, ˌakawˌasimamˈiʃa kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakaʃˈuka katˌika wˈiŋɡu na kunˈena na mˈose, nˌaje ˌakatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja rˈoho ˌilijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja mˈose na kˌuiwˈeka ɟˌuːja wˈale wazˈee sabˈini. rˈoho ˌalipoʃˈuka ɟˈuu jˈao, wˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii, lakˈini hˌawakufˈaɲa hˈivjo tˈena.|0
lakˈini, wˈatu wawˈili, ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao ni eldˈadi na medˈadi, wˌalibˈaki kambˈini. wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌoroðˈeʃwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wazˈee sabˈini, lakˈini hˌawakutˈoka kwˈenda kwˈeɲe hˈema. lakˈini rˈoho pˈia ˌaliʃˈuka ɟˈuu jˈao, nˌao wˌakatabˈiri hˌuko kambˈini.|0
mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa kiɟˈana ˌalikimbˈia na kˌumwambˈia mˈose, eldˈadi na medˈadi wˌanatˈoa ˌunabˈii kambˈini.|0
joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa msˌaidˈizi wa mˈose ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈake, ˌakaɟˈibu ˌakasˈema, mˈose bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, wˌaɲamazˈiʃe.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, ˌunaˈona wˈivu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu? nˌiŋɡetamˈani wˈatu wˈote wa bwˈana wˌaŋɡekˈuwa mˌanabˈii na kwˌamba bwˈana ˌaŋɡewˈeka rˈoho jˌake ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na wˈale wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakarˈudi kambˈini.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukatokˈea upˈepo kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, nˌao ˌukawˌaletˈea kwˈare kutˈoka bˌaharˈini. ˌukawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa kwˈeɲe enˈeo lˈote lˌinalˌozuŋɡˈuka kˈambi na kuɟˈaa arðˈini kˈimo tʃa mˈita mˈoɟa hˈivi kutˈoka arðˈini kwˈeɲe enˈeo la umbˈali wa mwˈendo wa sˈiku mˈoɟa kˈila upˈande.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa na usˈiku kˈutʃa pamˈoɟa na sˈiku nzˈima ˌilijˌofuˈata wˈatu wˌalitˈoka kwˈenda kˌuokˈota kwˈare. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌekusˈaɲa tʃˈini ja homˈeri kˈumi. kˈiʃa wˌakazˌianˈika kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kˈambi jˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo mahˈali hˈapo pˌakaˈitwa kˈibroθ hˌataˈava, kwa sabˈabu hˌuko ndˈiko wˌalipˌowazˈika wˈatu ambˈao wˌalitamˈani sˈana tʃakˈula kiŋɡˈine.|0
kutˈoka kˈibroθ hˌataˈava wˈatu wˌakasafˈiri mpˈaka hˌaserˈoθi na kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
mˌiriˈamu na arˈoni wˌaliˈanza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza ðˈidi ja mˈose kwa sabˈabu ja ˈm̩ke wˌake mkˈuʃi, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈoa mkˈuʃi.|0
wˌaliulˈiza, ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌamesˈema kˌupitˈia mˈose pˈeke jˈake? ɟˈe, hˌaɟasˈema kˌutupitˈia sˌisi pˈia? nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasikˈia hˈili.|0
bˌasi mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mɲˌeɲekˈevu sˈana, mɲˌeɲekˈevu kulˈiko ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote katˌika ˈuso wa dunˈia..|0
ɣafˈula bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia mˈose, arˈoni na mˌiriˈamu, ɲɟoˈoni katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, nˈiɲi ɲˈote watˈatu. kwa hˈijo wˈote watˈatu wˌakaˈenda.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakaʃˈuka katˌika ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu, ˌakasimˈama kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema, ˌakawaˈita arˈoni na mˌiriˈamu. wakˈati wˈote wawˈili wˌalipˌosoɡˈea mbˈele.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, sˌikilizˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu: ˌakiwˈapo nabˈii wa bwˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, nˌitaɟˌifunˈua kwˈake kwa maˈono, nˌitanˈena nˌaje katˌika ndˈoto.|0
lakˈini sˈivjo kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˈose; jˌeje ni mwˌaminˈifu katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu jˈote.|0
kwˈake nˌitanˈena nˌaje ˈuso kwa ˈuso, wˌaziwˈazi wˈala si kwa mafˈumbo; jˌeje ˌataˈona ˈumbo la bwˈana. kwa nˈini bˌasi nˈiɲi hˌamkuoɡˈopa kˌuzuŋɡˈumza kiɲˈume tʃa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˈose.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi jˈao, ˌakawaˈatʃa.|0
wakˈati hˌilo wˈiŋɡu lˌiliinˈuka kutˈoka ɟˌuːja hˈema, mˌiriˈamu akˈawa tajˈari ˈana ukˈoma, mweˈupe kˌama θelˈuɟi. arˈoni ˌakamɡˌeukˈia, ˌakaˈona ˈana ukˈoma.|0
ˌusimwˈatʃe ˈawe kˌama mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌalijˌezalˈiwa akˈiwa ˈm̩fu, ambˈaje nˈusu ja mwˈili wˌake ˌimehˌaribˈika hˈapo ˌatokˈapo katˌika tˈumbo la mˈama jˈake.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana ˌakisˈema, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌakuˈomba umpˈoɲe.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu mˈose, ɟˈe, kˌama bˈaba jˌake ˌaŋɡemtemˈea usˈoni, ˌasiŋɡeˈona aˈibu kwa sˈiku sˈaba? mfuŋɡˈie ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi kwa sˈiku sˈaba; baˌada ja hˈapo ˌanawˈeza kˌurudˈiʃwa kambˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌiriˈamu ˌakafuŋɡˈiwa ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi kwa sˈiku sˈaba, nˌao wˈatu hˌawakˌuendelˈea na safˈari mpˈaka ˌalipˌorudˈiʃwa kambˈini.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, wˈatu wˌaliondˈoka hˌaserˈoθi, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la parˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
watˈume baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌakaˌipelelˈeze ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, ambˈajo nˌinawˈapa wˌaisraˈeli. kutˈoka kwa kˈila kabˈila la bˈaba zˈao, tˈuma mmˈoɟa wa vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
hˈivjo kwa aɡˈizo la bwˈana mˈose ˌakawatˈuma kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la parˈani. wˈote wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina jˈao: kutˈoka kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, ʃamˈua mwˈana wa zakˈuri.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni, ʃafˈati mwˈana wa hˈori.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la jˈuda, kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌisakˈari, iɡˈali mwˈana wa josˈefu.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu, hoʃˈea mwˈana wa nˈuni.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini, pˈalti mwˈana wa rˈafu.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni, ɡˌadiˈeli mwˈana wa sˈodi.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la manˈase kabˈila la josˈefu, ɡˈadi mwˈana wa sˈusi.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la dˈani, ˌamiˈeli mwˈana wa ɡemˈali.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la aʃˈeri, seθˈuri mwˈana wa mˌikaˈeli.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la naftˈali, nˈabi mwˈana wa wˈofsi.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ɡˈadi, ɡˌeuˈeli mwˈana wa mˈaki.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈatu ambˈao mˈose ˌaliwatˈuma kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi. mˈose akˈampa hoʃˈea mwˈana wa nˈuni ɟˈina joʃˈua..|0
mˈose ˌalipˌowatˈuma wˌakaˌipelelˈeze kˌanaˈani, ˌalisˈema, pandˈeni kˌupitˈia neɡˈebu, mwˈende mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima.|0
mwˈone ˈn̩tʃi ni ja nˈamna ɡˈani, na kˌama wˈatu wˌaiʃˈio hˈumo wˈana ŋɡˈuvu ˌau ni wˌaðaˈifu, iwˈapo ni watʃˈatʃe ˌau wˈeŋɡi.|0
wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja nˈamna ɡˈani? ɟˈe, ni nzˈuri ˌau m̩bˈaja? wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja nˈamna ɡˈani? ɟˈe, haˈina kˈuta ˌau ŋɡˈome.|0
ˈarði ˈiko ˈaɟe? ˈina rutˈuba ˌau la? ɟˈe, kˈuna mˈiti ndˈani jˌake ˌau la? ɟˌitahidˈini kadˈiri mwezˈavjo kulˈeta baˈaði ja matˈunda ja ˈn̩tʃi. ˌulikˈuwa msˈimu wa kuˈiva zabˈibu za kwˈanza..|0
hˈivjo wˌakapˈanda na kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini hˌadi rehˈobu, kˌuelekˈea lˈebo hamˈaθi.|0
wˌakapˈanda kˌupitˈia neɡˈebu hˌadi wˌakafˈika hebrˈoni, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌahimˈani, ʃeʃˈai na talmˈai, wazˈao wa anˈaki, wˌaliˈiʃi. hebrˈoni ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeɟˈeŋɡwa miˈaka sˈaba kˈabla ja ˈm̩ɟi wa soˈani ˌuliˈoko mˈisri..|0
wˌalipofˈika katˌika bˈonde la eʃkˈoli, wˌalivˈuɲɟa tˈawi lˌililokˈuwa na kiʃˈada kimˈoɟa tʃa zabˈibu. wawˈili wˌao wˌakalˌitʃukˈua lˈile tˈawi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti, pamˈoɟa na kˌomamˈaŋɡa na tˈini.|0
enˈeo lˈile lˌikaˈitwa bˈonde la eʃkˈoli kwa sabˈabu ja kˈile kiʃˈada tʃa zabˈibu ambˈatʃo wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikikˈata hˌuko.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini wˌakarˈudi kutˈoka kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˌakarˈudi kwa mˈose, arˈoni na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko kadˈeʃi kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la parˈani. hˈapo ndˈipo wˌalipotˈoa habˈari kwˈao na kwa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote na kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa matˈunda ja hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wakˈampa mˈose tˌaarˈifa hˌii: tˌuliiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijˌotutˈuma, nˈajo ˌinatˌirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali! hˈili hˈapa tˈunda lˈake.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi hˌuko ni wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, na mˈiɟi jˈao ˈina ŋɡˈome na ni mikˈubwa sˈana. hˌuko tˌuliˈona hˌata wazˈao wa anˈaki.|0
wˌaamalˈeki wˌanaˈiʃi neɡˈebu; wahˈiti, wˌajebˈusi na wˌaamˈori wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima; nˌao wˌakanaˈani wˌanaˈiʃi karˈibu na bahˈari na kˈando ja jordˈani.|0
kˈiʃa kalˈebu ˌakawˌaɲamazˈiʃa wˈatu mbˈele ja mˈose na kusˈema, ˌimetupˈasa kupˈanda na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi, kwa maˈana hakˈika tˌunawˈeza kufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamepˈanda pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakasˈema, hˌatuwˈezi kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˈale wˈatu; wˈana ŋɡˈuvu kˌutulˈiko sˈisi.|0
wˌakaenˈeza tˌaarˈifa m̩bˈaja mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli kuhˈusu ˈn̩tʃi wˌalijˌoipˌelelˈeza. wˌakasˈema, ˈn̩tʃi tˌulijˌoipˌelelˈeza hˈula wˈatu wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake. wˈatu wˈote tˌuliˌowaˈona hˌuko ni maɟˈitu.|0
tˌuliwaˈona wˌanefˈili hˌuko wazˈao wa anˈaki wˌanatokˈana na wˌanefˈili. tˌuliɟiˈona kˌama pˈanzi matʃˈoni pˈetu weɲˈewe, nˌao ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌotuˈona.|0
usˈiku ˈule wˈatu wˈote wa ɟˌumuˈija wˌalipˈaza saˈuti zˈao na kulˈia kwa saˈuti kˈuu.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakanˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi ja mˈose na arˈoni, nˈalo kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote wˌakawˌaambˈia, laˈiti tˌuŋɡekˈuwa tˌumefˈia hˈumo ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri! ˌau hˈumu kwˈeɲe hˈili ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌanatulˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌili tˈufe kwa upˈaŋɡa? wˌake zˈetu na watˈoto wˈetu wˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa kˌama ɲˈara. ɟˈe, ˌisiŋɡekˈuwa bˈora kwˈetu kurˈudi mˈisri.|0
wˌakasˌemezˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, ˌinatupˈasa kˌumtʃaɡˈua kˌioŋɡˈozi na kurˈudi mˈisri.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la kˌiisraˈeli lˌililˌokusaɲˈika hˈapo.|0
joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni na kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune, wˌaliokˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈale wˌaliokwˈenda kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi, wˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao.|0
wˌakasˈema na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la kˌiisraˈeli, wˌakawˌaambˈia, ˈn̩tʃi tˌulijopˈita kˌatikˈati jˌake na kˌuipˌelelˈeza ni nzˈuri sˈana sˈana.|0
ikˈiwa bwˈana ˌanapendˈezwa nˈasi, ˌatatˌuoŋɡˈoza kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, nˌaje ˌatatˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
ˈila tu msimwˈasi bwˈana. wˈala msˌiwaoɡˈope wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, kwa sabˈabu tˌutawamˈeza. ulˈinzi wˌao ˌumeondˈoka, lakˈini bwˈana jˈupo pamˈoɟa nˈasi. msˌiwaoɡˈope.|0
lakˈini kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikazuŋɡˈumza ɟˌuːja kˌuwapˈiɡa kwa mˈawe. ndˈipo ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukaˌonekˈana katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, wˈatu hˈawa wˌatanˌiðarˈau mpˈaka lˈini? wˌataˌendelˈea kˌukatˈaa kˌuniamˈini mˌimi mpˈaka lˈini, iŋɡˈawa nˌimetˈenda iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
nˌitawapˈiɡa kwa taˈuni na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, lakˈini nˌitakufˈaɲa wˌewe kˌuwa taˈifa kˈubwa lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko wˈao.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, ndˈipo wamˈisri wˌatasikˈia ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili! kwa uwˈeza wˈako ˌuliwˌapandˈiʃa wˈatu hˈawa kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
nˌao wˌatawˌaambˈia weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ɟˈambo hˈili. wˌao tajˈari wˌameʃˌasikˈia kwˌamba wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˈupo pamˈoɟa na wˈatu hˈawa, na kˌuwa wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumeˌonekˈana ˈuso kwa ˈuso, nˈalo wˈiŋɡu lˈako hukˈaa ɟˈuu jˈao. tˈena wˌewe ˌunawˌataŋɡulˈia kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu mtʃˈana na kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto usˈiku.|0
ikˈiwa ˌutawaˈua wˈatu hˈawa wˈote mˈara mˈoɟa, mˌataˈifa ambˈajo jˌamesikˈia tˌaarˈifa hˌii kˌukuhˈusu wˌewe wˌatasˈema.|0
bwˈana ˌaliʃˈindwa kˌuwaiŋɡˈiza wˈatu hˈawa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌowaahˈidi kwa kiˈapo; hˈivjo ˌakawaˈua ɟaŋɡwˈani..|0
bˌasi sˈasa ŋɡˈuvu za bwˈana na zˌionekˈane, sˌawasˈawa na vˈile ˌulivjosˈema.|0
bwˈana si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira, ni mwˈiŋɡi wa upˈendo na mwˌeɲe kˌusamˈehe ðˈambi na uˈasi. lakˈini haˈatʃi kˌumwaðˈibu mwˌeɲe hatˈia, hˌuaðˈibu watˈoto kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi ja bˈaba zˈao hˌata kizˈazi tʃa tˈatu na tʃa ˈn̩ne..|0
kwa kadˈiri ja upˈendo wˈako m̩kˈuu, ˌusamˈehe ðˈambi ja wˈatu hˈawa, kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌowasamˈehe ʃˈu wakˈati wˌalitˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka sˈasa.|0
bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimewˌasamˈehe kˌama ˌulivjoˈomba.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kwa hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, na kwa hakˈika kˌama ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌuiɟazˈavjo dunˈia jˈote.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu hˈawa ambˈao wˌaliuˈona ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu na iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza nˌilijotˈenda hˌuko mˈisri na hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, lakˈini ambˈaje hˌakunitˈii na ˌakanˌiɟarˈibu mˈara hˈizi kˈumi.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌatakˌajeˈona ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowaahˈidi bˈaba zˈao kwa kiˈapo. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌamenˌiðarˈau ˌatakˌajeiˈona.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu kalˈebu ˈana rˈoho ja tˌofaˈuti na ˌananˌifuˈata kwa mˈojo wˈote, nˌitamwiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌoiendˈea, nˌao wazˈao wˌake wˌatairˈiθi.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌaamalˈeki na wˌakanaˈani wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika mabˈonde, kˈeʃo ɡˌeukˈeni mwˌelekˈee ɟaŋɡwˈani kwa kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
ɟˌumuˈija hˌii ˈovu ˌitanˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu hˌadi lˈini? nˌimesikˈia mˌalalamˈiko ja hˈawa wˌaisraˈeli wˌanaˌonuŋɡunˈika.|0
hˈivjo wˌaambˈie, hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitawˌafaɲˈia vˈitu vˌilevˈile nˌilivjˌosikˈia mkisˈema.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu mwˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈaje ˌalihˌesabˈiwa na ˌamenˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, miˈili jˈenu ˌitaaŋɡˈuka katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatakˌajeiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijoˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kˌuwa makˈao jˈenu, ˌisipokˈuwa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune, na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni.|0
lakˈini watˈoto wˈenu ambˈao mlisˈema wˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa kˌama matˈeka, nˌitawˌaiŋɡˈiza hˈumo ˌili wˌaifˌurahˈie ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˈiɲi mmˌeikatˈaa.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi, miˈili jˈenu ˌitaaŋɡˈuka katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili.|0
watˈoto wˈenu wˌatakˈuwa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa mifˈuɡo hˈapa kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, wˌakitesˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwˈenu, hˌadi mwˈili wa ˈm̩tu wˈenu wa mwˈiʃo ulˈale katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili.|0
kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, mwˈaka mmˈoɟa kwa kˈila sˈiku katˌika zˈile sˈiku ˌarobaˈini mlˌizoˌipelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi, mtˌatesˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu, na kuɟˈua ɟˈinsi ilˈivjo vibˈaja kˌunifˈaɲa mˌimi kˌuwa adˈui jˈenu..|0
mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema, na hakˈika nˌitafˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja kwa ɟˌumuˈija hˌii jˈote ˈovu, ambˈajo ˌimefˌuŋɡamˈana pamˈoɟa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu. wˌatakutˈana na mwˈiʃo wˌao katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili; hˈapa ndˈipo wˌatafˈia.|0
hˈivjo wˈatu wˈale ambˈao mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewatˈuma kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi, wˌaliorˈudi na kˌuifˈaɲa ɟˌumuˈija nzˈima kˌunuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi ja mˈose kwa kˌuenˈeza tˌaarˈifa m̩bˈaja kuhˈusu hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌohusˈika kˌuenˈeza tˌaarˈifa m̩bˈaja kuhˈusu hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi wˌalipˈiɡwa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa taˈuni mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌaliokwˈenda kˌuipˌelelˈeza hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi, ni joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, na kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune pˈeke jˈao wˌaliˌosalˈia.|0
mˈose ˌalipotˈoa tˌaarˈifa hˌii kwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, wˌaliˌombolˈeza kwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
mapˈema ˌasubˈuhi sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata wˌalipˈanda ɟˈuu kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima virˈefu, wˌakasˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi. tˌutakwˈea mpˈaka mahˈali bwˈana ˌalipˌotuahˈidi.|0
lakˈini mˈose ˌakasˈema, kwa nˈini hamtˈii ˈamri ja bwˈana? ɟˈambo hˈili hˌalitˌafanikˈiwa.|0
msipˈande ɟˈuu, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hajˈupo pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi. mtaʃˈindwa na adˈui zˈenu.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌaamalˈeki na wˌakanaˈani wˌatapambˈana nˌaɲi hˌuko. kwa sabˈabu mmemwˈatʃa bwˈana, hˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, nˈiɲi mtˌaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kwa kibˈuri tʃˈao wˌalipˈanda ɟˈuu kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima virˈefu, ˌiɟapokˈuwa mˈose hˌakutˈoka kambˈini wˈala sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo wˌaamalˈeki na wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima wˌakaterˈemka na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia, wˌakawapˈiɡa ɲɟˈia jˈote hˌadi hˈorma.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: baˌada ja nˈiɲi kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa kˌama ɲumbˈani.|0
nˌaɲi mkitˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, kutˈoka makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe ˌau kondˈoo, kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana, ikˈiwa ni sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau ðabˈihu, kwa aɟˈili ja naðˈiri maˈalum ˌama sadˈaka ja hiˈari ˌau sadˈaka ja sˌikukˈuu zˈenu.|0
ndˈipo jˌeje ˌaletˈaje sadˈaka jˌake ˌataiwˈeka mbˈele za bwˈana sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na rˈobo ja hˈini ja mafˈuta.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau ðabˈihu, andˈaa rˈobo ja hˈini ja divˈai kwa sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume andˈaa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ja sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja hˈini ja mafˈuta.|0
na θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja hˈini ja divˈai kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi. vitˈoe kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
ˌunapˌoandˈaa fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau ðabˈihu, kwa aɟˈili ja naðˈiri maˈalum ˌau sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa bwˈana.|0
lˈeta pamˈoɟa na hˈujo fahˈali sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini sehˈemu tˈatu za kˈumi za ˈefa ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na nˈusu ja hˈini ja mafˈuta.|0
pˈia ˌutalˈeta nˈusu ja hˈini ja divˈai kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi. ˌitakˈuwa sadˈaka ˌilijˌoteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
kˈila fahˈali ˌau kondˈoo dˈume, kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo ˌau mbˈuzi mtʃˈaŋɡa, ˌatatˌajarˈiʃwa kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii.|0
faɲˈeni hˈivi kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila mmˈoɟa, kwa kadˈiri ja wˈiŋɡi wa mtˌakavjˌoandˈaa.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ni mzˈawa ni lazˈima afˈaɲe vˈitu hˈivi kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii hˈapo ˌaletˈapo sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, wakˈati wowˈote mɡˈeni ˌau ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌaletˈapo sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˌuwa harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌumpendˈeza bwˈana, ni lazˈima afˈaɲe sˌawasˈawa kabˈisa na ɟˈinsi mnˌavjofˈaɲa nˈiɲi.|0
ɟˌumuˈija ˌitakˈuwa na ʃerˈia hˈizo hˈizo kwˈenu na kwa mɡˈeni ˌaiʃˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu; hˌii ni ˈamri ja kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo. nˈiɲi na mɡˈeni mtakˈuwa sˈawa mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ʃerˈia hˈizo hˈizo na maʃˈarti hˈajo hˈajo hˈajo, jˌatawahˈusu nˈiɲi na mɡˈeni ˌaiʃˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajˌowapelˈeka.|0
nˌaɲi mkˈala tʃakˈula tʃa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, toˈeni sehˈemu ja tʃakˈula hˈitʃo kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana.|0
toˈeni andˈazi kutˈoka kwa mˌalimbˈuko ja tʃakˈula tʃˈenu kˌitokˈatʃo katˌika ˈarði, na mkitˈoe kˌama sadˈaka kutˈoka sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka.|0
kwa vizˈazi vjˈote viɟˈavjo hˈamna bˈudi kutˈoa sadˈaka hˌii kwa bwˈana kutˈoka kwa mˌalimbˈuko ja ˈuŋɡa wˈenu.|0
bˌasi kˌama pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia ˌumeʃˈindwa kuʃˈika mˌoɟawˈapo katˌika ˈamri hˈizi ambˈazo bwˈana alˈimpa mˈose.|0
ˈamri jojˈote ja bwˈana kwˈenu kˌupitˈia mˈose, ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌalipowˈapa na ˌinaˌendelˈea hˌadi vizˈazi vjˈote viɟˈavjo.|0
kuhˈani ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli, nˌao wˌatasˌamehˈewa, kwa kˌuwa hˌaikˈuwa mˌakusˈudi nˌao wˌamemletˈea bwˈana sadˈaka ˌilijˌoteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto na sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa lˈao.|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na waɡˈeni wˌaiʃˈio mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wˌatasˌamehˈewa, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈote wˌalihusˈika katˌika kˈosa lˈile lˌisilˌokusudˈiwa.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa pˈeke jˌake ˌakitˈenda ðˈambi pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia, ni lazˈima alˈete mbˈuzi ˈm̩ke wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
kuhˈani ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja jˈule ˌalijekˈosa kwa kufˈaɲa ðˈambi pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia, ˌupatanˈiʃo ˌutakˌapofˈaɲua kwa aɟˈili jˈake, ˌatasˌamehˈewa.|0
lakˈini jejˈote ambˈaje ˌamefˈaɲa ðˈambi kwa ðarˈau ˈawe mzˈawa ˌau mɡˈeni, ˌanamkufˈuru bwˈana, nˌaje ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na wˈatu wˈake.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌamelˌiðarˈau nˈeno la bwˈana na kuvˈuɲɟa ˈamri zˈake, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali; hatˈia jˌake ˌinabˈaki ɟˈuu jˈake..|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipokˈuwa ɟaŋɡwˈani, ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈutwa ˌakikusˈaɲa kˈuni sˈiku ja sabˈato.|0
wˈale wˌaliomkˈuta ˌakikusˈaɲa kˈuni wˌakamlˈeta kwa mˈose, arˈoni na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
nˌao wˌakamwˈeka kˌifuŋɡˈoni, kwa sabˈabu hˌaikˌufahamˈika kwa wˈazi kwˌamba ˌafaɲˈiwe nˈini.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, hˈujo ˈm̩tu ni lazˈima ˈafe. kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lazˈima limpˈiɡe mˈawe ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi.|0
hˈivjo kˌusaɲˈiko lˌikamtˈoa ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi na kumpˈiɡa mˈawe hˌadi akˈafa, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: kwa vizˈazi vjˈote viɟˈavjo ɟˌifaɲiˈeni vifˈundo katˌika pˈindo za mavˈazi jˈenu vikˈiwa na ˈuzi wa bulˈuu kwˈeɲe kˈila kifˈundo.|0
mtakˈuwa mkˌivitazˈama vifˈundo hˈivjo ˌili mpˈate kˌukumbˈuka ˈamri zˈote za bwˈana, ˌili mpˈate kˌuzitˈii msˈiɟe mkˌaɟitˈia uzˈinzi weɲˈewe kwa kˌuzifuˈata tamˈaa za miˈojo jˈenu na za mˈatʃo jˈenu.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakumbˈuka kˌuzitˈii ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zˈote nˌaɲi mtawˈekwa wˈakfu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌilijˌewatˈoa mˈisri nˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
kˈora mwˈana wa iʃˈari, mwˈana wa kohˈaθi, mwˈana wa lˈawi, pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja wˌareubˈeni, jaˈani daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu, wˈana wa ˌeliˈabu, na ˈoni mwˈana wa pelˈeθi, wˌakatʃukˈua baˈaði ja wˈatu.|0
wˌakainˈuka ðˈidi ja mˈose. pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌalikuwˈepo wˌanaˈume wa kˌiisraˈeli mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini, wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟulikˈana, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˌumuˈija wˌaliokˈuwa wˌametˌeulˈiwa kˌuwa wakˈuu wa kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
wakˈaɟa kˌama kikˈundi kˌuwapˈiŋɡa mˈose na arˈoni, wˌakawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi mmˌeɟitukˈuza sˈana! kˌusaɲˈiko hˈili lˈote ni tˌakatˈifu, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈao, nˌaje bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈao. kwa nˈini bˌasi mmˌeɟitukˈuza weɲˈewe ɟˌuːja kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia kˈora na wˌafuˈasi wˌake wˈote: ˌasubˈuhi bwˈana ˌataoɲˈeʃa ni nˈani alˈije wˌake na ni nˈani alˈije mtˌakatˈifu, tˈena ˌatamtˈaka ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˈaɟe kwˈake. ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje ˌatamtʃaɡˈua ˌatamfˈaɲa kˈuɟa karˈibu nˈaje.|0
wˌewe kˈora na wˌafuˈasi wˈako wˈote mtafˈaɲa hˈivi: tʃˌukuˈeni vjetˈezo.|0
kˈeʃo wekˈeni mˈoto na uvˈumba kwˈeɲe hˈivjo vjetˈezo mbˈele za bwˈana. ˈm̩tu ambˈaje bwˈana ˌatamtʃaɡˈua ˌatakˈuwa n̩dˈije mtˌakatˈifu. nˈiɲi walˈawi mmˌeɟitukˈuza sˈana.|0
pˈia mˈose ˌakamwambˈia kˈora, ˈeɲi walˈawi! sˈasa nˌisikˌilizˈeni.|0
hˌaiwatˈoʃi nˈiɲi kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌamewˌateˈua nˈiɲi kutˈoka kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la kˌiisraˈeli, na kˌuwalˈeta karˈibu nˌaje mpˈate kufˈaɲa kˈazi kwˈeɲe maskˈani ja bwˈana, na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko ˌili kˌuwahˌudumˈia.|0
ˌamekulˈeta wˌewe na ndˈuɡu zˈako walˈawi ˈm̩we karˈibu nˈaje, lakˈini sˈasa ˌunaɟarˈibu kupˈata na ˌukuhˈani pˈia.|0
wˌewe na wˌafuˈasi wˈako wˈote mmˌekusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa kiɲˈume tʃa bwˈana. arˈoni ni nˈani kwˌamba nˈiɲi mnˌuŋɡunˈike ðˈidi jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawaˈita daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu, wˈana wa ˌeliˈabu. lakˈini wˌao wˌakasˈema, sˌisi hatˈuɟi.|0
hˌaitˈoʃi tu kwˌamba wˌewe ˌumetulˈeta kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali ˌili kˌutuˈua sˌisi ɟaŋɡwˈani? nˌawe sˈasa pˈia ˌunatˈaka kˌuwa m̩kˈuu ɟˈuu jˈetu.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, hˌuɟatˌuiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌotirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali, wˈala hˌuɟatˈupa urˈiθi wa maʃˈamba na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu. ɟˈe, ˌutajaŋɡˈoa mˈatʃo ja wˈatu hˈawa? hapˈana, sˌisi hatˈuɟi.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana na kˌumwambˈia bwˈana, ˌusiˌikubˈali sadˈaka jˈao. mˌimi sˌikutʃukˈua tʃotʃˈote, hˌata pˈunda kutˈoka kwˈao, wˈala sˌiɟamkosˈea hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈao.|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia kˈora, wˌewe na wˌafuˈasi wˈako wˈote kˈeʃo mtˌatokˈea mbˈele za bwˈana: jaˈani wˌewe na hˈao wenzˈako, pamˈoɟa na arˈoni.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatatʃukˈua tʃetˈezo tʃˈake na kuwˈeka uvˈumba ndˈani jˈake, vjetˈezo mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini kwa ɟˈumla, na kˌukilˈeta mbˈele za bwˈana. wˌewe na arˈoni mtalˈeta vjetˈezo vjˈenu pˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakatʃukˈua tʃetˈezo tʃˈake, ˌakawˈeka mˈoto na uvˈumba ndˈani jˈake, na kˌusimˈama pamˈoɟa na mˈose na arˈoni kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kˈora ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekusˈaɲa wˌafuˈasi wˌake wˈote kˌuwapˈiŋɡa mˈose na arˈoni kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukatokˈea kwa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
ɟˌiteŋɡˈeni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko hˈili ˌili nipˈate kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
lakˈini mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌufudifˈudi na kulˈia kwa saˈuti, wˌakasˈema, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wa rˈoho za wˌanadˈamu wˈote, ˌutakˈuwa na hasˈira na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote wakˈati ni ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa tu ˌametˈenda ðˈambi.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
lˌiambˈie kˌusaɲˈiko, ˌondokˈeni hˈapo karˈibu na mahˈema ja kˈora, daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu..|0
mˈose ˌakainˈuka na kˌuwaendˈea daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu, nˌao wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakafˌuatˈana nˈaje.|0
mˈose ˌakaliˈoɲa kˌusaɲˈiko, sˌoɡeˈeni ɲˈuma mbˈali na mahˈema ja hˈawa wˈatu waˈovu! msiɡˈuse kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo mˈali jˈao, la sˈivjo mtˌafaɡilˈiwa mbˈali kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈao zˈote.|0
hˈivjo wˌakaondˈoka karˈibu na mahˈema ja kˈora, daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu. daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˈoka ɲɟˈe, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˈao, watˈoto wˌao na wˈale wˌaɲoɲˈao kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa mahˈema jˈao.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjoɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma kufˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja, na kwˌamba hˌalikˈuwa wˈazo lˈaŋɡu.|0
ikˈiwa wˈatu hˈawa wˌatakˈufa kˈifo tʃa kˌawaˈida na kupˈatwa na jˈale ja kˌawaˈida jˌanajˌowapˈata wˌanadˈamu, bˌasi bwˈana hˌakunitˈuma mˈimi.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa bwˈana ˌatalˈeta ɟˈambo ɟˈipja kabˈisa, ˈarði ˌikifunˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kˌuwamˈeza wˈao, pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo mˈali jˈao, nˌao waʃˈuke tʃˈini kˌaburˈini wakˈiwa hˈai, ndˈipo mtˌafahˈamu kˌuwa wˈatu hˈawa wˌamemðarˈau bwˈana.|0
mˈara mˈose ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈema hˈaja jˈote, ˈarði ˌilijokˈuwa tʃˈini jˈao ˌikapasˈuka.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌikafunˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kˌuwamˈeza wˈao, pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa zˈao, na wˈatu wˈote wa kˈora na mˈali zˈao zˈote.|0
wˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini kˌaburˈini wakˈiwa hˈai, pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu wˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo; ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaɟˌifunˈika ɟˈuu jˈao, nˌao wˌakaˌaŋɡamˈia wˌakatowˈeka kutˈoka kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
kutˈoka kilˈio tʃˈao, wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliˌowazuŋɡˈuka wˌalikimbˈia, wˌakipˈaza saˈuti, ˈn̩tʃi ˌinatumˈeza na sˌisi pˈia.|0
mˈoto ukˈaɟa kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, ˌukawˌateketˈeza wˈale wˈatu mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakifukˈiza uvˈumba.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
mwambˈie ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani arˈoni, atˈoe vjetˈezo kwˈeɲe mabˈaki ja mˈoto na kˌutawˈaɲa makˈaa mbˈali kiˈasi, kwa maˈana vjetˈezo ni vˌitakatˈifu.|0
vjetˈezo vja wˈatu wˌaliofˈaɲa ðˈambi ˌilijˌowaɣarˈimu maˈiʃa jˈao. fˈua vjetˈezo hˈivjo kˌuwa bˈamba ˌili kˌufunˈika mˌaðabˈahu, kwa maˈana vˌimelˈetwa mbˈele za bwˈana na vˌimekˈuwa vˌitakatˈifu. nˈavjo vˈiwe iʃˈara kwa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari ˌakavˌikusˈaɲa vˈile vjetˈezo vja ʃˈaba vˌilivjolˈetwa na wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌametˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, nˌaje ˌakavifˈua kˌufunˈika mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwelekˈeza kˌupitˈia mˈose. hˈili lˌilikˈuwa kˌuwakumbˈuʃa wˌaisraˈeli kwˌamba hakˈuna ˈm̩tu hˌata mmˈoɟa, ˌisipokˈuwa m̩zˈao wa arˈoni, ˌawezˈaje kˈuɟa kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba mbˈele za bwˈana, la sˈivjo, ˌaŋɡekˈuwa kˌama kˈora na wˌafuˈasi wˈake.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli wˌakanˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi ja mˈose na arˈoni, wˌakisˈema, mmˌewaˈua wˈatu wa bwˈana.|0
lakˈini wakˈati kˌusaɲˈiko lˌilipˌokusaɲˈika kˌupiŋɡˈana na mˈose na arˈoni, nˈalo lˌikaɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, ɣafˈula wˈiŋɡu lˌikafunˈika hˈema, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukatokˈea.|0
ndˈipo mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaˈenda mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
ɟitˈeŋɡe mbˈali na kˌusaɲˈiko hˈili ˌili niwˈeze kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈara mˈoɟa. wˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini kˌifudifˈudi.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, tʃukˈua tʃetˈezo tʃˈako na uwˈeke uvˈumba ndˈani jˈake, pamˈoɟa na mˈoto kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni, nˌawe uˈende harˈaka kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈao. ɣaðˈabu ˌimekˈuɟa kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, na taˈuni ˌimeˈanza.|0
hˈivjo arˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama mˈose ˌalivjosˈema, ˌakakˌimbilˈia kˌatikˈati ja kˌusaɲˈiko. taˈuni ˌilikˈuwa tajˈari ˌimeˈanza mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu, lakˈini arˈoni ˌakafukˈiza uvˈumba na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
arˈoni ˌakasimˈama kˈati ja wˌaliokˈuwa hˈai na wˌaliokˈufa, nˈajo taˈuni ˌikakˈoma.|0
lakˈini wˌalikˈufa wˈatu kˈuminaˈn̩ne,mˌiasˈaba kˌutokˈana na taˈuni hˈijo, lˈitʃa ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈufa kwa sabˈabu ja kˈora.|0
ndˈipo arˈoni ˌakamrudˈia mˈose kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, kwa maˈana taˈuni ˌilikˈuwa ˌimekˈoma.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli, na ˌuɟipatˈie fˈimbo kˈumi na mbˈili kutˈoka kwˈao, mˈoɟa kutˈoka kwa kˈila mmˈoɟa wa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila za bˈaba zˈao. andˈika ɟˈina la kˈila ˈm̩tu kwˈeɲe fˈimbo jˈake.|0
kwˈeɲe fˈimbo ja lˈawi andˈika ɟˈina la arˈoni, kwa maˈana ni lazˈima iwˈepo fˈimbo mˈoɟa kwa kˈila kˌioŋɡˈozi kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kabˈila la bˈaba zˈao.|0
ziwˈeke hˈizo fˈimbo ndˈani ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia mbˈele ja sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda, mahˈali nˌikutanˈapo nˈawe.|0
fˈimbo ja ˈm̩tu nˌitakˌajemtʃaɡˈua ˌitatʃipˈuka, nˌami mweɲˈewe nˌitajˌakomˈeʃa hˈaja mˌanuŋɡunˈiko ja mˈara kwa mˈara ja wˌaisraˈeli ðˈidi jˈako.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakasˈema na wˌaisraˈeli, nˌao vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌao wakˈampa fˈimbo kˈumi na mbˈili, fˈimbo mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kabˈila la bˈaba zˈao, nˈajo fˈimbo ja arˈoni ikˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈizo.|0
mˈose ˌakaziwˈeka hˈizo fˈimbo mbˈele za bwˈana ndˈani ja hˈema la ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata mˈose ˌaliiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la ˌuʃuhˈuda ˌakaˈona ˈile fˈimbo ja arˈoni ambˈajo ˌiliwˌakilˈiʃa ɟamˈaa ja lˈawi hˌaikˈuwa tu ˌimetʃipˈuka, bˌali pˈia ˌilikˈuwa ˌimetˈoa mˌatʃipukˈizi, kˌutʃanˈua maˈua na kuzˈaa malˈozi.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakalˈeta zˈile fˈimbo zˈote kwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote kutˈoka mbˈele za bwˈana. wˌakazˌiaŋɡalˈia, na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakaˌitʃukˈua fˈimbo jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, rudˈiʃa fˈimbo ja arˈoni mbˈele ja sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda, ˌili ˌihifaðˈiwe kˌama alˈama kwa waˈasi. hˈili lˌitakomˈeʃa mˌanuŋɡunˈiko jˈao ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, ˌili kwˌamba wasˈife.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamwambˈia mˈose, tˌutakˈufa! tˌumepotˈea, sˈote tˌumepotˈea.|0
jejˈote ˌakarˌibiˈaje maskˈani ja bwˈana ˌatakˈufa. ɟˈe, sˌisi sˈote tˌutakˈufa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, wˈewe, wanˈao na ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈako mtˌawaɟibˈika kwa makˈosa ðˈidi ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, na wˌewe na wanˈao pˈeke jˈenu n̩dˈio mtˌakaˌowaɟibˈika kwa makˈosa ðˈidi ja ˌukuhˈani.|0
walˈete walˈawi wenzˈako kutˈoka kabˈila la bˈaba zˈako ˌili wˌauŋɡˈane nˌaɲi na kˌuwasˌaidˈia wakˈati wˌewe na wanˈao mnˌapohudˈumu mbˈele ja hˈema la ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
wˌatawˌaɟibˈika kwˈenu na wˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi zˈote za hˈema, lakˈini kˈamwe wˌasisˌoɡelˈee vifˈaa vja pˌatakatˈifu ˌau mˌaðabˈahu, la sˈivjo wˌao na nˈiɲi mtakˈufa.|0
wˌataɟiˈuŋɡa nˌaɲi na wˌatawˌaɟibˈika kwa ˌutunzˈaɟi wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, jaˈani kˈazi zˈote kwˈeɲe hˈema, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌusoɡˈea karˈibu hˈapo mlˈipo.|0
mtˌawaɟibˈika katˌika ˌutunzˈaɟi wa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na mˌaðabˈahu, ˌili kwˌamba ɣaðˈabu ˌisiwˌaaŋɡukˈie wˌaisraˈeli tˈena.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌimewˌatʃaɡˈua walˈawi wenzˈenu kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli kˌama zawˈadi kwˈenu, wˌaliowˈekwa wˈakfu kwa bwˈana ˌili kufˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
lakˈini ni wˌewe tu na wanˈao mtˌakaowˈeza kˌutumˈika kˌama mˌakuhˈani kˌuhusiˈana na kˈila kˈitu kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu na ndˈani ja pazˈia. nˌinawˈapa ˌutumˈiʃi wa ˌukuhˈani kˌama zawˈadi. ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˌaribˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌimekuwˈeka kˌuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa sadˈaka zˈote zˌitakˌazotolˈewa kwˈaŋɡu; mˌatolˈeo jˈote mˌatakatˈifu wˌaisraˈeli wˌanajonˈipa nˌinakˈupa wˌewe na wanˈao kˌama sehˈemu jˈenu na fˈuŋɡu lˈenu la kˌawaˈida.|0
mtˌatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja jˈale mˌatolˈeo mˌatakatˈifu sˈana ambˈajo hˌajatˌeketˈezwi kwa mˈoto. kutˈoka kwa mˌatolˈeo jˈote wˌanajˌoniletˈea kˌama sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu sˈana, zˈiwe za nafˈaka, ˌau za ðˈambi, ˌau za makˈosa, sehˈemu ˈile ˌitakˈuwa jˈako na wanˈao.|0
mtaˈila kˌama kˈitu kilˈitʃo kˌitakatˈifu sˈana; kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌataˈila. ni lazˈima mtˌaiheʃˈimu kˌama tˌakatˈifu.|0
hˈiki pˈia ni tʃˈako: tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃotˈeŋɡwa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌatolˈeo jˈote ja sadˈaka za kˌuinulˈiwa za wˌaisraˈeli. nˌinakˈupa wˌewe hˈaja, wˈana na bˈinti zˈako kˌama sehˈemu jˈenu ja kˌawaˈida. kˈila mmˈoɟa wa ɲˈumba jˈako ambˈaje ni sˈafi kwa tˌaratˈibu za ibˈada ˌanawˈeza kujˈala.|0
nˌinawˈapa mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni jalˈijo bˈora kulˈiko jˈote, na divˈai ˈm̩pja ilˈijo bˈora kulˈiko zˈote na nafˈaka wˌanazˈompa bwˈana kˌama mˌalimbˈuko katˌika mavˈuno jˈao.|0
mˌalimbˈuko jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo wˌanamletˈea bwˈana jˌatakˈuwa jˈenu. kˈila mmˈoɟa ɲumbˈani kwˈako ambˈaje ni sˈafi kwa tˌaratˈibu za ibˈada ˌanawˈeza kˈula.|0
kˈila kˈitu katˌika ˌisraˈeli ambˈatʃo kˌimetolˈewa kwa bwˈana ni tʃˈenu.|0
kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mwˌanadˈamu na wa mɲˈama, ambˈaje ˌametolˈewa kwa bwˈana ni wˈenu. lakˈini ni lazˈima mtˌamkombˈoa kˈila mwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza na kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa waɲˈama wasˈio sˈafi.|0
wˌatakˌapokˈuwa na ˈumri wa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa, ni lazˈima mtˌawakombˈoa kwa bˈei ja ˌukombˈozi ˌilijowˈekwa, kwa ʃekˈeli tˈano za fˈeða, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃekˈeli ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ɡˈera ˌiʃirˈini.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe ˌusimkombˈoe mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa maksˈai, kondˈoo ˌau mbˈuzi; hˈawa ni wˌatakatˈifu. ɲˌuɲizˈia dˈamu jˈao ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu na utʃˈome mafˈuta jˈao kˌama sadˈaka ˌitolewˈajo kwa mˈoto, harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
ɲˈama zˈao zˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃˈenu, kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa kidˈari tʃa kˌuinulˈiwa na pˈaɟa la m̩ɡˈuu wa kulˈia.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃotˈeŋɡwa kutˈoka sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu ambˈazo wˌaisraˈeli wˌanamtolˈea bwˈana, nˌinakˈupa wˈewe, wanˈao na bˈinti zˈako kˌama fˈuŋɡu lˈenu la kˌawaˈida. ni aɡˈano la milˈele la tʃˈumvi mbˈele za bwˈana kwˈako na watˈoto wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia arˈoni, hˌutakˈuwa na urˈiθi wowˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, wˈala hˌutakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao; mˌimi ni fˈuŋɡu lˈako na urˈiθi wˈako mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
nˌinawˈapa walˈawi zˈaka jˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌama urˈiθi wˌao kˌuwa kˌama malˈipo kwa kˈazi wˌanajˌoifˈaɲa wakˈati wˌanapˌohudˈumu katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kˌuanzˈia sˈasa, kˈamwe wˌaisraˈeli wˌasisˌoɡelˈee karˈibu na hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, la sˈivjo wˌatabˈeba mˌatokˈeo ja ðˈambi zˈao, nˌao wˌatakˈufa.|0
ni walˈawi wˌatakˌaofˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na kubˈeba waɟˈibu wa makˈosa ðˈidi jˈake. hˈili ni aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo. hˌawatˌapokˈea urˈiθi wowˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
badˈala jˈake, nˌinawˈapa walˈawi zˈaka zˈote zˌinazˌotolˈewa na wˌaisraˈeli kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈao. hˈijo n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌimesˈema hˈivi kuhˈusu wˈao: hˌawatakˈuwa na urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na walˈawi na ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapˌopokˈea zˈaka kutˈoka kwa wˌaisraˈeli ambˈajo nˌinawˈapa kˌama urˈiθi wˈenu kutˈoka kwˈao, ni lazˈima m̩tˈoe sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja hˈijo zˈaka kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana, ˈiwe zˈaka ja hˈijo zˈaka.|0
sadˈaka jˈenu ˌitahˌesabˈiwa kwˈenu kˌama nafˈaka kutˈoka sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, ˌau divˈai kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamulˈia zabˈibu.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii, nˈiɲi pˈia mtatˈoa sadˈaka kwa bwˈana kutˈoka zˈaka zˈote mtˌakazˌopokˈea kutˈoka kwa wˌaisraˈeli. kutˈoka kwˈeɲe zˈaka hˈizi, ni lazˈima m̩tˈoe sehˈemu ja bwˈana kwa arˈoni, kuhˈani.|0
ni lazˈima m̩tˈoe kˌama sehˈemu ja bwˈana ilˈijo nzˈuri sˈana tˈena ˈile sehˈemu ilˈijo tˌakatˈifu sˈana kulˈiko zˈote ja kˈile kˈitu mlˌitʃopˈewa..|0
wˌaambˈie walˈawi: mtˌakapotˈoa sehˈemu zilˈizo bˈora sˈana, ˌitahˌesabˈiwa kwˈenu kˌama mazˈao ja sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka, ˌau ja ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamulˈia zabˈibu.|0
nˈiɲi na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈenu mnawˈeza kˈula sehˈemu ˌilijobˈaki mahˈali popˈote, kwˈani n̩dˈio uɟˈira wˈenu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi jˈenu katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kwa kutˈoa sehˈemu zˌake zilˈizo bˈora sˈana, hˌamtakˈuwa na hatˈia katˌika ɟˈambo hˈili; ndˈipo hˌamtatˈia ˌunaɟˈisi sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu za wˌaisraˈeli, nˌaɲi hˌamtakˈufa..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ʃerˈia ambˈajo bwˈana ˌameaɡˈiza ˌitakˈavjo: wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli wˌakuletˈee mtˈamba mwekˈundu asˈije na dosˈari wˈala wˈaa, na ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈata kufˈuŋɡwa nˈira.|0
mpˈeni kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari hˈujo mtˈamba; nˌaje ˌatatolˈewa ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi na kutʃˈiɲɟua mbˈele jˌake hˈujo kuhˈani.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari ˌatatʃukˈua baˈaði ja dˈamu jˌake kwˈeɲe kidˈole tʃˈake na kˌuiɲuɲˈiza mˈara sˈaba kˌuelekˈea upˈande wa mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
wakˈati aŋɡˈali ˌakitazˈama, mtˈamba hˈujo ˌatatˌeketˈezwa: ŋɡˈozi jˈake, ɲˈama jˈake, dˈamu na sehˈemu zˌake za ndˈani.|0
kuhˈani ˌatatʃukˈua kˈuni za ˈm̩ti wa mwerˈezi, hisˈopo na sˈufu ɲekˈundu, na kˌuvitˈupa kwˈeɲe hˈujo mtˈamba ˌanajˌeuŋɡˈua.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, kuhˈani lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, na aˈoɡe mwˈili wˌake kwa mˈaɟi. kˈiʃa ˌanawˈeza kurˈudi kambˈini, lakˈini ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa kˌawaˈida ja ibˈada mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌamtʃomˈaje hˈujo mtˈamba lazˈima nˌaje pˈia afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na kuˈoɡa kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje pˈia ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ni sˈafi ˌatakusˈaɲa maɟˈivu ja mtˈamba hˈujo na kˌujawˈeka mahˈali ambˈapo ni sˈafi ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi kwa tˌaratˈibu za kˌiibˈada. jˌatahˌifaðˈiwa na ɟˌumuˈija ja kˌiisraˈeli kwa mˌatumˈizi katˌika mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso; ni kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutakˈasa kutˈoka ðambˈini.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌakusaɲˈaje maɟˈivu ja hˈujo mtˈamba ni lazˈima pˈia afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, kˌaðalˈika nˌaje pˈia ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi hˌadi ɟiˈoni. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa wˌaisraˈeli na kwa waɡˈeni wˌanaoˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje maˈiti ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
ni lazˈima ˌaɟitakˈase mweɲˈewe kwa mˈaɟi katˌika sˈiku ja tˈatu na sˈiku ja sˈaba, ndˈipo ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi. lakˈini kˌama hˌataɟˌitakˈasa mweɲˈewe katˌika sˈiku ja tˈatu na ja sˈaba, hˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje maˈiti ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote na kuʃˈindwa kˌuɟitakˈasa mweɲˈewe hˌunaɟˈisi maskˈani ja bwˈana. ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na ˌisraˈeli. kwa sabˈabu hˌaɟaɲˌuɲizˈiwa mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso, jˌeje ni naɟˈisi; ˌunaɟˈisi wˌake ˌunabˈaki ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia ˌitumikˈajo wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌamekˈufa ndˈani ja hˈema: jejˈote ˌaiŋɡiˈaje ndˈani ja hˈema hˌilo na jejˈote alˈije ndˈani jˌake wˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
nˈatʃo kˈila tʃˈombo kisˈitʃo na kˌifunˈiko ɟˈuu jˌake kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˈeko ɲɟˈe mahˈali pa wˈazi ˌaɡusˈaje ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌau ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa kwa kˈifo tʃa kˌawaˈida, ˌau ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje mfˈupa wa ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa ˌau kabˈuri, ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
kwa ˈm̩tu alˈije naɟˈisi, wˈeka maɟˈivu ja sadˈaka ja ˌutakˈaso wa ðˈambi ndˈani ja tʃˈombo, ˌumimˈine mˈaɟi sˈafi ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu alˈije sˈafi kwa kˌawaˈida za kˌiibˈada ˌatatʃukˈua hisˈopo, atʃˈovje ndˈani ja mˈaɟi, na kˌuɲuɲizˈia hˈema na vifˈaa vjˈote pamˈoɟa na wˈatu ambˈao wˌalikuwˈamo. pˈia ni lazˈima ˌamɲuɲizˈie ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌameɡˈusa mfˈupa wa ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa, ˌau kabˈuri, ˌau ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌameuˈawa, ˌau ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌamekˈufa kˈifo tʃa kˌawaˈida.|0
ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ni sˈafi n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajemɲˌuɲizˈia jejˈote ambˈaje ni naɟˈisi sˈiku ja tˈatu na sˈiku ja sˈaba, na katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba ˌatamtakˈasa ˈm̩tu hˈujo. ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌametakˈaswa lazˈima afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˌake na kuˈoɡa kwa mˈaɟi, na ɟiˈoni ˈile ˌatakˈuwa sˈafi.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ni naɟˈisi hˌakuɟˌitakˈasa mweɲˈewe, ni lazˈima ˌakatilˈiwe mbˈali na ɟˌumuˈija, kwa sabˈabu ˌameˌinaɟˈisi maskˈani ja bwˈana. mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso hˌajaɟˌaɲuɲˈizwa ɟˈuu jˈake, nˌaje ni naɟˈisi.|0
hˌii ni ʃerˈia ja kudˈumu kwˈao. ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌanaɲuɲˈiza jˈale mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso lazˈima pˈia afˈue ŋɡˈuo zˈake, na jejˈote ambˈaje huɡˈusa mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso ˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌanatʃoɡˈusa ˈm̩tu alˈije naɟˈisi kˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi, na jejˈote ˌakiɡusˈaje hˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli ˌilifˈika kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, nˌao wˌakakˈaa kadˈeʃi. mˌiriˈamu akˈafa hˌuko na kuzˈikwa.|0
mahˈali hˈapo hˌapakˈuwa na mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˌumuˈija hˈijo, nˌao wˌakakˌusaɲˈika ˌili kumpˈiŋɡa mˈose na arˈoni.|0
wˈatu wˌakaɡombˈana na mˈose, na kusˈema, laˈiti tˌuŋɡelikˈufa wakˈati ndˈuɡu zˈetu wˌalipˌoaŋɡˈuka na kˈufa mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kwa nˈini mmˌeilˈeta ɟˌumuˈija ja bwˈana kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili, ˌili tˈufe hˈumu, sˌisi na mifˈuɡo jˈetu.|0
kwa nˈini mmˌetupandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka mahˈali hˈapa pa kutˈiʃa? hˈapa hakˈuna nafˈaka wˈala tˈini, zabˈibu ˌau mˌakomamˈaŋɡa. wˈala hˈapa hakˈuna mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakaondˈoka pˈale kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na kˌuaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukawˌatokˈea.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
tʃukˈua ˈile fˈimbo, na wˌewe na ndˈuɡu jˈako arˈoni mkusˈaɲe kˌusaɲˈiko pamˈoɟa. nˈena na ˈule mwˈamba mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao, nˌao ˌutatˈoa mˈaɟi jˈake. ˌutatˈoa mˈaɟi kutˈoka hˈuo mwˈamba kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˌumuˈija ˌili wˌao na mifˈuɡo jˈao wawˈeze kˈuɲua.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakaˌitʃukˈua hˈijo fˈimbo kutˈoka pˈale ˌilipokˈuwa mbˈele za bwˈana kˌama ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌakakusˈaɲa kˌusaɲˈiko pamˈoɟa mbˈele ja hˈuo mwˈamba, nˌaje mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi waˈasi. ɟˈe, ni lazˈima tˌuwatˌoleˈeni mˈaɟi kutˈoka mwˈamba hˈuu.|0
ndˈipo mˈose ˌakainˈua mkˈono wˌake na kˌuupˈiɡa mwˈamba mˈara mbˈili kwa fˈimbo jˈake. mˈaɟi jˌakabˌubuɟˈika, nˈajo ɟˌumuˈija na mifˈuɡo jˈao wakˈaɲua.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkunˌiamˈini mˌimi kiˈasi tʃa kˌuniheʃˈimu kˌama mtˌakatˈifu matʃˈoni pa wˌaisraˈeli, hˌamtaˌiiŋɡˈiza ɟˌumuˈija hˌii katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa.|0
hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa mˈaɟi ja merˈiba, mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliɡombˈana na bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakaɟˌioɲˈeʃa mweɲˈewe hˌuko kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
mˈose ˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe kutˈoka kadˈeʃi kwˈenda kwa mfˈalme wa edˈomu, ˌakisˈema: hˈili ndˈilo ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌisraˈeli ˌasemˈalo: wˌewe ˌunafahˈamu ɟˌuːja taˈabu zˈote ambˈazo zˌimetupˈata.|0
bˈaba zˈetu wˌaliʃˈuka mˈisri, nˌasi tˌumeˈiʃi hˌuko miˈaka mˈiŋɡi. wamˈisri wˌalitutˈesa sˌisi na bˈaba zˈetu.|0
lakˈini tˌulipˌomlilˈia bwˈana, ˌalisikˈia kilˈio tʃˈetu na ˌakamtˈuma mˌalaˈika ˌakatutˈoa mˈisri. sˈasa tˈupo hˈapa kadˈeʃi, ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio mpakˈani ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako.|0
tˌafaðˈali tˌuruhˈusu tupˈite katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. hˌatutapˈita katˌika ʃˈamba lolˈote, wˈala ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu, ˌau kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kisˈima tʃotʃˈote. tˌutasafˈiri kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia kˈuu ja mfˈalme, na hˌatutˌaɡeˈuka kulˈia wˈala kuʃˈoto mpˈaka tˈuwe tˌumeʃapˈita ˈn̩tʃi jˈako.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme wa edˈomu ˌakaɟˈibu: hˌamtapˈita hˈapa; kˌama mkˌiɟarˈibu kupˈita, tˌutatˈoka na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɟˈibu: sˌisi tˌutafuˈata ɲɟˈia kˈuu; tˈena ikˈiwa sˌisi ˌau mifˈuɡo jˈetu tˌutakˈuɲua tˈone la mˈaɟi jˈenu, tˌutalˌilipˈia. sˌisi tˌunatˈaka tu kupˈita kwa miɡˈuu, wˈala si kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote.|0
wˈatu wa edˈomu wˌakaɟˈibu tˈena: hamwˈezi kupˈita hˈapa. ndˈipo wˈatu wa edˈomu wˌakatˈoka ðˈidi ja wˌaisraˈeli, ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌaedˈomu wˌaliwˌakatalˈia wˌaisraˈeli kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, ˌisraˈeli wˌakaɡeˈuka, wˌakawaˈatʃa.|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli ˌikaondˈoka kutˈoka kadˈeʃi, wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe mlˈima hˈori.|0
kwˈeɲe mlˈima hˈori, karˈibu na mpˈaka wa edˈomu, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na arˈoni.|0
arˈoni ˌatakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake. hˌataiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa wˌaisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu nˈiɲi wawˈili mliˈasi ðˈidi ja aɡˈizo lˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi ja merˈiba.|0
watwˈae arˈoni na ˌeleazˈari mwanˈawe, na ˌuwapandˈiʃe ɟˈuu katˌika mlˈima wa hˈori.|0
mvˈue arˈoni mavˈazi jˈake, na umvˈike ˌeleazˈari mwanˈawe, kwa maˈana arˈoni ˌatakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake; ˌatakˈufa hˌuko.|0
mˈose ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza: wˌakapˈanda mlˈima hˈori mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli.|0
mˈose ˌakamvˈua arˈoni mavˈazi jˌake na kumvˈika mwanˈawe ˌeleazˈari mavˈazi hˈajo. nˌaje arˈoni ˌakafˈia pˈale ɟˌuːja mlˈima. kˈiʃa mˈose na ˌeleazˈari wˌakaterˈemka kutˈoka mlimˈani.|0
ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ˌilipˌofahˈamu kwˌamba arˈoni ˌamekˈufa, ɟamˈaa jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli wˌakamwˌombolˈeza kwa sˈiku θˌelaθˈini.|0
mfˈalme wa kˌikanaˈani wa arˈadi ˌalijeˈiʃi hˌuko neɡˈebu ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌanakˈuɟa kwa ɲɟˈia ja ˌaθarˈimu, ˌaliwˌaʃambulˈia wˌaisraˈeli na kˌuwatˈeka baˈaði jˈao.|0
ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli ˌakawˈeka naðˈiri hˌii kwa bwˈana: ikˈiwa ˌutawatˈia wˈatu hˈawa mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu, tˌutaˌiaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa mˈiɟi jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˌikilˈiza ˈombi la wˌaisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakawˈapa uʃˈindi ɟˌuːja wˌakanaˈani. wˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa na mˈiɟi jˈao; hˈivjo mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa hˈorma.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasafˈiri kutˈoka mlˈima hˈori kˌupitˈia ɲɟˈia ˌinajˌoelekˈea bahˈari ja ʃˈamu, kˌuizuŋɡˈuka edˈomu. lakˈini wˈatu wˌakakˈosa ˌuvumilˈivu ɲɟiˈani.|0
wˌakamnˌuŋɡunikˈia mˈuŋɡu na mˈose, wˌakisˈema, kwa nˈini ˌumetˌupandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri ˌili tˈufe ɟaŋɡwˈani? hakˈuna mkˈate! hakˈuna mˈaɟi! nˌasi tˌunatʃukˈia sˈana tʃakˈula hˈiki dˈuni.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakapelˈeka ɲˈoka wˌeɲe sˈumu kˌatikˈati jˈao; wˌakawaˈuma wˈatu, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˈeŋɡi wakˈafa.|0
wˈatu wˌakamɟˈia mˈose na kusˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi wakˈati tˌuliponˈena ðˈidi ja bwˈana na ðˈidi jˈako. mwˈombe bwˈana ˌili ˌatuˌondolˈee hˈawa ɲˈoka. hˈivjo mˈose ˌakawˌaombˈea hˈao wˈatu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, tˌeŋɡenˈeza ɲˈoka wa ʃˈaba na umwˈeke ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ti; jejˈote ˌalijeˈumwa na ɲˈoka ˌanawˈeza kˌumtazˈama na ˌakaˈiʃi tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ɲˈoka wa ʃˈaba na kumwˈeka ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ti. kˈiʃa wakˈati ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaliˈumwa na ɲˈoka, nˌaje ˌakamtazˈama jˈule ɲˈoka wa ʃˈaba, ˌaliˈiʃi.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌendelˈea na safˈari jˈao na wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko obˈoθi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaondˈoka obˈoθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ˈije ˌabarˈimu, katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa lˌinalˌotazamˈana na moˈabu kˌuelekˈea mawˈio ja ɟˈua.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo wˌaliˌendelˈea mbˈele wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi kwˈeɲe bˈonde la zerˈedi.|0
wˌakasafˈiri kutˈoka hˈapo na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja ˈm̩to arnˈoni, ambˈao ˈuko katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa lˌililˌoenˈea hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori. arnˈoni ni mpˈaka wa moˈabu, kˈati ja moˈabu na wˌaamˈori.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu kitˈabu tʃa vˈita vja bwˈana kˌinasˈema: …ˈm̩ɟi wa wahˈebu n̩tʃˈini seˈifa na mabˈonde ja arnˈoni.|0
na mˌiterˈemko ja mabˈonde ˌinajofˈika hˌadi ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈari na hˌuelekˈea mpakˈani ˌm̩wa moˈabu.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo wˌaliˌendelˈea mbˈele hˌadi kisˈima tʃa beˈeri; kwˈeɲe kisˈima ambˈatʃo bwˈana ˌalimwambˈia mˈose, wˌakusˈaɲe wˈatu pamˈoɟa, nˌami nˌitawˈapa mˈaɟi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaˈimba wˈimbo hˈuu: bˌubuɟˈika, ˈee kisˈima! ˈimba kuhˈusu mˈaɟi.|0
kuhˈusu kisˈima ambˈatʃo kˌilitʃˈimbwa na wakˈuu, ambˈatʃo wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wˌalikˌifukˈua, wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wakˈiwa na fˈimbo za ˌutawˈala na bakˈora. kˈiʃa wˌakatˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani kwˈenda matˈana.|0
kutˈoka matˈana wˌakafˈika nˌahaliˈeli, kutˈoka nˌahaliˈeli wˌakafˈika bamˈoθi.|0
na kutˈoka bamˈoθi wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe bˈonde lˌililˈoko moˈabu, mahˈali ambˈapo kilˈele tʃa pˈisɡa kˌinatˌazamˈana na ɲˈika.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌumwambˈia sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori.|0
ˌuturuhˈusu tupˈite katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. hˌatutˌaɡeˈuka kˈando kwˈenda katˌika maʃˈamba ˌau maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, ˌama kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kisˈima tʃotʃˈote. tˌutasafˈiri kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia kˈuu ja mfˈalme hˌata tˌutakˌapokˈuwa tˌumekwˈiʃa kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako.|0
lakˈini sihˈoni hˌakumruhˈusu ˌisraˈeli apˈite katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. ˌalilˌikutanˈiʃa ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, wˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli. ˌalipofˈika hˌuko jahˈazi, ˌakapiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ˌisraˈeli ˌalimʃˈinda kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌuitˈeka ˈarði jˌake kutˈoka arnˈoni mpˈaka jabˈoki, lakˈini ni hˌadi kˌufikˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈoni tˈu, kwa sabˈabu mipˈaka jˌake ˌilikˈuwa ˌimezuŋɡˈuʃwa ukˈuta.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌakaitˈeka mˈiɟi jˈote ja wˌaamˈori na kˌuikalˈia, pamˈoɟa na heʃbˈoni na makˈazi jˈote jˌanajˌoizuŋɡˈuka.|0
heʃbˈoni ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi wa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepiɡˈana ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌalijˌetaŋɡulˈia na akˈawa ˌametʃukˈua ˈarði jˌake jˈote mpˈaka arnˈoni.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu watˈuŋɡa mˌaʃaˈiri husˈema: ɲɟˈoo heʃbˈoni na uɟˈeŋɡwe tˈena; ˈm̩ɟi wa sihˈoni na ufˈaɲue ˈupja.|0
mˈoto ˌuliwˈaka kutˈoka heʃbˈoni, mwˈali wa mˈoto kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa sihˈoni. ˌulitˌeketˈeza ˈari ja moˈabu, raˈija wa mahˈali pa arnˈoni pˌalipˌoinˈuka.|0
ˈole wˈako, ˈee moˈabu! ˌumehˌaribˈiwa, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa kemˈoʃi! ˌamewatˈoa wanˈawe kˌuwa wˌakimbˈizi, na bˈinti zˌake kˌama matˈeka kwa mfˈalme sihˈoni wa wˌaamˈori.|0
lakˈini tˌumewaʃˈinda; heʃbˈoni ˌumehˌaribˈiwa hˌadi dibˈoni. tˌumebomˈoa hˌadi kˌufikˈia nˈofa, ˌuliˌoenˈea hˌadi medˈeba.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌisraˈeli ˌakaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori.|0
baˌada ja mˈose kutˈuma wˌapelelˈezi kwˈenda ˈm̩ɟi wa jazˈeri, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalitˈeka viˈuŋɡa vja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo na kˌuwafukˈuza wˌaamˈori wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaɡeˈuka na kwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌinajˌoelekˈea baʃˈani, nˌaje ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wˌakatˈoka kˌupiɡˈana nˌao hˌuko edrˈei.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ˌusimwoɡˈope ˈoɡu, kwa sabˈabu nˌimeʃˌamkabˈiði mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote na ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. mtendˈee kˌama ˌulivjˌomtendˈea sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala hˌuko heʃbˈoni.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamuˈua, pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, bˌila ja kumwˈatʃa hˌata ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa hˈai. nˌao wˌakaˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasafˈiri katˌika tˌambarˈare za moˈabu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko.|0
moˈabu ˌalioɡˈopa, kwa kˌuwa wˌalikuwˈepo wˈatu wˈeŋɡi sˈana. hakˈika, moˈabu ˌaliɟˈawa na hˈofu kˈubwa kwa sabˈabu ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wˌamoˈabu wˌakawˌaambˈia wazˈee wa mˌidiˈani, umˈati hˈuu wa wˈatu ˌunakwˈenda kurˈamba kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌotuzuŋɡˈuka, kˌama maksˈai ˌarambˈavjo maɟˈani ja ʃambˈani. kwa hˈijo balˈaki mwˈana wa sipˈori, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa moˈabu wakˈati hˈuo.|0
ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwˈenda kumwˈita bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa hˌuko peθˈori, karˈibu na ˈm̩to frˈati, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ja kˌuzalˈiwa. balˈaki ˌakasˈema: taˈifa lˌimekˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈisri, nˌao wˌamefunˈika ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wˌametˈua karˈibu nˈami.|0
sˈasa ˈuɟe kˌuwalaˈani wˈatu hˈawa, kwa kˌuwa wˈana ŋɡˈuvu sˈana kˌunilˈiko. kˈiʃa huˈenda nˌikawˈeza kˌuwaʃˈinda na kˌuwatˈoa ɲɟˈe ja ˈn̩tʃi. kwa kˌuwa nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba, wˈale ˌunaˌowabarˈiki wˌanabˌarikˈiwa na wˈale ˌunaˌowalaˈani wˌanalˌaanˈiwa.|0
wazˈee wa moˈabu na wa mˌidiˈani wˌakaondˈoka, wakˈiwa wˌametʃukˈua ˈada ja ˌuaɡˈuzi. wˌalipokwˈenda kwa bˌalaˈamu, wˌakamwelˈeza kˈile balˈaki ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakawˌaambˈia, mlˈale hˈapa usˈiku hˈuu, nˌami nˌitawˌaletˈea ɟˈibu lˈile bwˈana ˌatakˌalonˈipa. kwa hˈijo wakˈuu wa moˈabu wˌakakˈaa nˈaje.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈia bˌalaˈamu na kˌumuulˈiza, wˈatu ɡˈani hˈawa walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, balˈaki mwˈana wa sipˈori, mfˈalme wa moˈabu, ˌalinˌipelekˈea uɟˈumbe hˈuu.|0
taˈifa ambˈalo lˌimekˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈisri lˌimefunˈika ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi. sˈasa ˈuɟe ˌunilˌaanˈie hˈao wˈatu. kˈiʃa huˈenda nˌitawˈeza kˌupiɡˈana nˌao na kˌuwafukˈuza..|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ˌusiˈende pamˈoɟa nˈao. hupˈaswi kˌulaˈani wˈatu hˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˌamebˌarikˈiwa.|0
ˌasubˈuhi ˌilijˌofuˈata bˌalaˈamu ˌakaˈamka, ˌakawˌaambˈia wakˈuu wa balˈaki, rudˈini katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamenˌikatˈaza nˌisiˈende pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi.|0
kwa hˈijo wakˈuu wa moˈabu wˌakarˈudi kwa balˈaki na kˌumwambˈia, bˌalaˈamu ˌamekatˈaa kˈuɟa pamˈoɟa nˈasi.|0
kˈiʃa balˈaki ˌakatˈuma wakˈuu weŋɡˈine, wˈeŋɡi zaˈidi na wˌanaˌoheʃimˈiwa zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈale wa kwˈanza.|0
wˌakafˈika kwa bˌalaˈamu na kˌumwambˈia: balˈaki mwˈana wa sipˈori ˌamesˈema hˈivi: ˌusiruhˈusu kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌikuzuˈie kˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu nˌitakulˈipa vizˈuri sˈana na kufˈaɲa lolˈote ˌusemˈalo. ɲɟˈoo ˌunilˌaanˈie wˈatu hˈawa.|0
lakˈini bˌalaˈamu ˌakawaɟˈibu, hˌata kˌama balˈaki ˌaŋɡenˈipa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme likˈiwa lˌimeɟˈazwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu, sˌiŋɡewˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kikˈubwa ˌau kidˈoɡo ˌili kutˈenda kˈitu ɲɟˈe ja aɡˈizo la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
mlˈale hˈapa usˈiku hˈuu kˌama wˈale weŋɡˈine wˌalivjofˈaɲa, nˌami nˌitatafˈuta ni nˈini kiŋɡˈine bwˈana ˌatakˌatʃonˌiambˈia.|0
usˈiku ˈule bwˈana ˌakamɟˈia bˌalaˈamu na kˌumwambˈia, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu hˈawa wˌamekˈuɟa kˌukuˈita wˈewe, nˈenda nˈao, lakˈini ufˈaɲe tu lˈile nˌitakˌalokˌuambˈia.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi, ˌakatandˈika pˈunda wˌake ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wa moˈabu.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˌasirˈika sˈana ˌalipokwˈenda, nˌaje mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakasimˈama bˌarabarˈani kumpˈiŋɡa. bˌalaˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈanda pˈunda wˈake, na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wawˈili wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wakˈati pˈunda ˌalipomwˈona mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama bˌarabarˈani akˈiwa na upˈaŋɡa ˌuliofˈutwa mkonˈoni mwˈake, pˈunda ˌakaɡˌeukˈia upˈande kˌuelekˈea ʃambˈani. bˌalaˈamu ˌakampˈiɡa ˌili ˌamrudˈiʃe bˌarabarˈani.|0
ndˈipo mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakasimˈama katˌika ɲɟˈia ɲembˈamba ilˈijo kˈati ja maʃˈamba mawˈili ja mˌizabˈibu, jakˈiwa na kˈuta pˈande zˈote mbˈili.|0
pˈunda ˌalipomwˈona mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, ˌaliɟˌisukumˈiza karˈibu na ukˈuta, na kˌuɡandamˈiza m̩ɡˈuu wa bˌalaˈamu ˌukutˈani. ndˈipo bˌalaˈamu ˌakampˈiɡa tˈena pˈunda.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakaˌendelˈea mbˈele na kˌusimˈama mahˈali pembˈamba ambˈapo hˌapakuwˈepo nafˈasi ja kˌuɡeˈuka, upˈande wa kulˈia wˈala wa kuʃˈoto.|0
pˈunda ˌalipomwˈona mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, ˌalilˈala tʃˈini bˌalaˈamu aŋɡˈali ˌamempˈanda, nˌaje bˌalaˈamu ˌakakˌasirˈika na kumpˈiɡa kwa fˈimbo jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakakˌifuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃa pˈunda, ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, nˌimekˌutendˈea nˈini kˌinatʃˌokufˈaɲa ˌunipˈiɡe mˈara hˈizi tˈatu.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakamɟˈibu pˈunda, ˌumenifˈaɲa mɟˈiŋɡa! kˌama nˌiŋɡelikˈuwa na upˈaŋɡa mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡelˌikuˈua sˈasa hˈivi.|0
pˈunda ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ɟˈe, mˌimi si pˈunda wˈako mweɲˈewe, ambˈaje ˌumenipˈanda sˈiku zˈote, hˌadi lˈeo? ɟˈe, nˌimekˈuwa na tabˈia ja kufˈaɲa hˈivi kwˈako? ˌakaɟˈibu, hapˈana.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamˌuulˈiza bˌalaˈamu, kwa nˈini ˌumempˈiɡa pˈunda wˈako mˈara tˈatu hˈizi? nˌimekˈuɟa kˌukuzuˈia kwa sabˈabu ɲɟˈia jˈako ˌimepotˈoka mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
pˈunda ˌaliniˈona na kˌunikwˈepa mˈara hˈizi tˈatu. kˌama pˈunda hˌaŋɡenikwˈepa, hakˈika nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimeʃˌakuˈua sˈasa, lakˈini nˌiŋɡemwˈatʃa pˈunda hˈai.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakamwambˈia mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi. sˌikutambˈua kˌuwa ˌumesimˈama bˌarabarˈani kˌunizuˈia. bˌasi kˌama hˌaikˌupendˈezi, nˌitarˈudi.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, uˈende na wˈatu hˈao, lakˈini usˈeme tu lˈile nˌikuˌambiˈalo. kwa hˈijo bˌalaˈamu ˌakaˈenda na wˈale wakˈuu wa balˈaki.|0
balˈaki ˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa bˌalaˈamu ˌanakˈuɟa, ˌakatˈoka kumlˈaki katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa moˈabu, katˌika mpˈaka wa arnˈoni, ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
balˈaki ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ɟˈe, sˌikukˌupelekˈea ɟˈumbe za harˈaka? kwa nˈini hukˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu? hˈivi kwˈeli mˌimi siwˈezi kˌukulˈipa.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, vˈema, sˈasa nˌimekˈuɟa kwˈako. lakˈini kwˈani nˈina uwˈezo wa kusˈema tu tʃotʃˈote? ni lazˈima nisˈeme tu kˈile ambˈatʃo mˈuŋɡu ˌatawˈeka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌalikwˈenda na balˈaki mpˈaka kirˈiaθ husˈoθi.|0
balˈaki ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ja ŋɡˈombe na kondˈoo; baˈaði jˌake akˈampa bˌalaˈamu na wakˈuu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
ˌasubˈuhi ˌilijˌofuˈata balˈaki ˌakamtʃukˈua bˌalaˈamu mpˈaka bˈamoθ baˈali, na kutˈoka hˌuko bˌalaˈamu ˌakawaˈona baˈaði ja wˈatu.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakasˈema, nˌiɟeŋɡˈee hˈapa mˌaðabˈahu sˈaba, mnˌitajˌariʃˈie mˌafahˈali sˈaba na kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba.|0
balˈaki ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bˌalaˈamu ˌalivjosˈema; hˈao wawˈili kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakatˈoa fahˈali mmˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa ɟˌuːja kˈila mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌakamwambˈia balˈaki, kˈaa hˈapa kˈando ja sadˈaka jˈako wakˈati mˌimi nˌinakwˈenda kˈando. huˈenda bwˈana ˌatakˈuɟa kˌukutˈana nˈami. lolˈote ˌatakˌalonˌifunulˈia, nˌitakˌuambˈia. bˌasi ˌakaˈenda hˌata mahˈali peˈupe pˌalipˌoinˈuka.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakakutˈana nˈaje, kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌakasˈema, nˌimekwˈiʃa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌaðabˈahu sˈaba, na ɟˌuːja kˈila mˌaðabˈahu nˌimetˈoa sadˈaka ja fahˈali mmˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˈeka uɟˈumbe katˌika kˈiɲua tʃa bˌalaˈamu na kusˈema, rˈudi kwa balˈaki ˈumpe uɟˈumbe hˈuu.|0
bˌasi bˌalaˈamu ˌakarˈudi kwa balˈaki, ˌakamkˈuta ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja sadˈaka jˌake akˈiwa na wakˈuu wˈote wa moˈabu.|0
ndˈipo bˌalaˈamu ˌakasˈema uɟˈumbe wˈake: balˈaki ˌamenilˈeta kutˈoka arˈamu, mfˈalme wa moˈabu kutˈoka milˈima ja mˌaʃarˈiki. ˌakasˈema, ɲɟˈoo, ˌunilˌaanˈie jakˈobo; ɲɟˈoo ˌuniʃˌutumˈie ˌisraˈeli..|0
nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuwalaˈani, hˈao ambˈao mˈuŋɡu hˌaɟawˌalaˈani? nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuwaʃutˈumu hˈao ambˈao bwˈana hˌakuwˌaʃutˈumu.|0
kutˈoka vilˈele vja miˈamba nˌinawaˈona, kutˈoka mahˈali pˌalipˌoinˈuka nˌinawˌatazˈama. nˌinaliˈona taˈifa ambˈalo wˌanaˈiʃi pˈeke jˈao, nˌao hˌawahˌesabˈiwi kˌama mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˌataˈifa.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuhesˈabu mavˈumbi ja jakˈobo, ˌau kˌuhesˈabu rˈobo ja ˌisraˈeli? mˌimi na nˈife kˈifo tʃa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki, na mwˈiʃo wˈaŋɡu na ˈuwe kˌama wˈao.|0
balˈaki ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ni nˈini ˌulitʃˌonitendˈea? nˌimekulˈeta ˌulaˈani adˈui zˈaŋɡu, lakˈini wˌewe badˈala jˌake ˌumewˌabarˈiki.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, hˌainipˈasi kusˈema kˈile bwˈana ˌanatʃowˈeka katˌika kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo balˈaki ˌakamwambˈia, twˈende pamˈoɟa mahˈali peŋɡˈine ambˈapo ˌunawˈeza kˌuwaˈona; ˌutawaˈona baˈaði tu wˈala si wˈote. nˌawe kutˈoka hˌuko, ˌunilˌaanˈie hˈao.|0
bˌasi ˌakampelˈeka kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba la sofˈimu, ɟˌuːja kilˈele tʃa mlˈima pˈisɡa. pˈale ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu sˈaba na kutˈoa sadˈaka ja fahˈali na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa ɟˌuːja kˈila mˌaðabˈahu.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakamwambˈia balˈaki, kˈaa hˈapa kˈando ja sadˈaka jˈako wakˈati nˌinapokwˈenda kˌuonˈana na mˈuŋɡu kˈule.|0
bwˈana ˌakakutˈana na bˌalaˈamu, ˌakawˈeka uɟˈumbe katˌika kˈiɲua tʃˈake ˌakasˈema, rˈudi kwa balˈaki ˈumpe uɟˈumbe hˈuu.|0
bˌasi bˌalaˈamu ˌakarˈudi kwa balˈaki, ˌakamkˈuta ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja sadˈaka jˈake, akˈiwa na wakˈuu wa moˈabu. balˈaki ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌamesˈema nˈini.|0
ndˈipo bˌalaˈamu ˌakasˈema uɟˈumbe wˈake: balˈaki, inˈuka na ˌusikilˈize, nˌisikˈie mˈimi, wˌewe mwˈana wa sipˈori.|0
mˈuŋɡu si ˈm̩tu, hˌata asˈeme uˈoŋɡo, wˈala jˌeje si mwˌanadˈamu, hˌata aɟˈute. ɟˈe, ˌanasˈema, kˈiʃa ˌasitˈende? ɟˈe, ˌanaahˈidi, ˌasitimˈize.|0
nˌimepokˈea aɡˈizo kˌubarˈiki; ˌamebarˈiki, nˌami siwˈezi kˌubadilˈiʃa.|0
hˌaiɟˌaonekˈana bahˈati m̩bˈaja katˌika jakˈobo, wˈala taˈabu katˌika ˌisraˈeli. bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˌao ju pamˈoɟa nˈao, nˈajo saˈuti kˈuu ja mfˈalme ˈimo kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwatˈoa kutˈoka mˈisri; wˌao wˈana ŋɡˈuvu za ɲˈati.|0
taˈifa lˌainˈuka kˌama sˈimba ɟˈike; lˌinaɟˌiinˈua kˌama sˈimba ambˈaje hˌatulˈii mpˈaka ˌamalˈize kˌurarˈua mawˈindo jˌake na kˈuɲua dˈamu ja mawˈindo jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa balˈaki ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ˌusiwˌalaˈani kabˈisa, wˈala ˌusiwˌabarˈiki kabˈisa.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, sˌikukˌuambˈia ni lazˈima nifˈaɲe lolˈote ˌanalosˈema bwˈana.|0
bˌasi balˈaki ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, ɲɟˈoo, nˌikupelˈeke mahˈali peŋɡˈine. huˈenda ˌitampendˈeza mˈuŋɡu kˌukuruhˈusu ˌunilˌaanˈie hˈao wˈatu kutˈoka mahˈali hˈapo.|0
balˈaki ˌakamtʃukˈua bˌalaˈamu ɟˌuːja mlˈima peˈori, ˌunaˌotazamˈana na ɲˈika.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakasˈema, nˌiɟeŋɡˈee hˈapa mˌaðabˈahu sˈaba, ˌuandˈae mˌafahˈali sˈaba na kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
balˈaki ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bˌalaˈamu ˌalivjosˈema, kˈiʃa ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka ja fahˈali mmˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa ɟˌuːja kˈila mˌaðabˈahu.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌalipˌotazˈama ɲɟˈe na kuˈona ˌisraˈeli ˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi kabˈila kwa kabˈila, rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu akˈawa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
nˌaje ˌakatˈoa uɟˈumbe wˈake: uɟˈumbe wa bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori, uɟˈumbe wˌake jˌeje ambˈaje ɟˈitʃo lˈake lˌinaˈona vizˈuri.|0
uɟˈumbe wˌake jˌeje ambˈaje hˌusikˈia manˈeno ja mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje huˈona maˈono kutˈoka kwa mweɲˈezi, ambˈaje hˌuaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, na ambˈaje mˈatʃo jˌake jˌamefuŋɡˈuka.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi jalˈivjo mazˈuri mahˈema jˈako, ˈee jakˈobo, maskˈani jˈako, ˈee ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌama mabˈonde, jˌanaenˈea, kˌama bustˈani kˈando ja ˈm̩to, kˌama mˈiti ja ˈudi ˌilijopˈandwa na bwˈana, kˌama mˌierˈezi kˈando ja mˈaɟi.|0
mˈaɟi jˌatatˌirirˈika kutˈoka n̩dˈoo zˈake; mbˈeɡu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa na mˈaɟi tˈele. mfˈalme wˌake ˌatakˈuwa m̩kˈuu kulˈiko mfˈalme aɡˈaɡi; ufˈalme wˌake ˌutatukˈuka.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌalimlˈeta kutˈoka mˈisri; jˌeje ˈana ŋɡˈuvu kˌama ɲˈati. ˌanajˌararˈua mˌataˈifa jalˈijo adˈui zˈake, na kuvˈuɲɟa mifˈupa jˈao vipˈande vipˈande; hˌuwatʃˈoma kwa miʃˈale jˈake.|0
hˌuɟikuɲˈata na kˌuvizˈia kˌama sˈimba, kˌama sˈimba ɟˈike; nˈani ˌanajˌeθubˈutu kumwˈamʃa? ˌabarikˈiwe kˈila ˌakubˌarikˈije, na ˌalaanˈiwe kˈila ˌakulˌaanˈije.|0
ndˈipo hasˈira ja balˈaki ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja bˌalaˈamu. ˌakapˈiɡa mikˈono jˌake pamˈoɟa, ˌakamwambˈia bˌalaˈamu, nˌilikuˈita ˈuɟe kˌuwalaˈani adˈui zˈaŋɡu, lakˈini ˌumewˌabarˈiki mˈara hˈizi tˈatu.|0
sˈasa ondˈoka upˈesi uˈende ɲumbˈani! mˌimi nˌilisˈema nˌitakˌuzawadˈia vizˈuri sˈana, lakˈini bwˈana ˌamekˌuzuˈia ˌusizˌawadˈiwe.|0
bˌalaˈamu ˌakamwambˈia balˈaki, ɟˈe, hˌukumbˈuki ɟˈinsi nˌilivjˌowaambˈia waɟˈumbe ˌuliˌowatˈuma kwˈaŋɡu? nˌiliwˌaambˈia hˈivi.|0
hˌata ikˈiwa balˈaki ˌaŋɡenˈipa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme likˈiwa lˌimeɟˈazwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu, nˌisiŋɡewˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kwa matˈakwa jˈaŋɡu, kikˈiwa kizˈuri ˌau kibˈaja, kwˈenda kiɲˈume na aɡˈizo la bwˈana, nˌami ˌimenipˈasa kusˈema tu kˈile bwˈana ˌatakˌatʃosˈema.|0
sˈasa nˌinarˈudi kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. lakˈini ɲɟˈoo, nˌikuˈoɲe kuhˈusu kˈile wˈatu hˈawa wˌatakˌatʃowatˈenda wˈatu wˈako sˈiku ziɟˈazo.|0
kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌakatˈoa uɟˈumbe wˈake: uɟˈumbe wa bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori, uɟˈumbe wˌake jˌeje ambˈaje ɟˈitʃo lˈake lˌinaˈona vizˈuri.|0
uɟˈumbe wˌake jˌeje ambˈaje hˌusikˈia manˈeno ja mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje ˈana mˌaarˈifa kutˈoka kwa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, huˈona maˈono kutˈoka mweɲˈezi, ambˈaje hˌuaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi na ambˈaje mˈatʃo jˌake jˌamefuŋɡˈuka.|0
namwˈona jˈeje, lakˈini si sˈasa; nˌamtazˈama jˈeje, lakˈini si karˈibu. ɲˈota ˌitatˈoka kwa jakˈobo, fˈimbo ja ufˈalme ˌitainˈuka kutˈoka kwa ˌisraˈeli. ˌatawapˈonda wˌamoˈabu vipˈaɟi vja ɲˈuso na mafˈuvu jˈote ja wˈana wa ʃˈeθi.|0
edˈomu ˌitamˌilikˈiwa, seˈiri, adˈui wˈake, ˌitamˌilikˈiwa, lakˈini ˌisraˈeli ˌatakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mtawˈala ˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka kwa jakˈobo na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌaliˌonusurˈika katˌika ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌakawaˈona wˈatu wa ˌamalˈeki, na kutˈoa uɟˈumbe wˈake: ˌamalˈeki ˌilikˈuwa ja kwˈanza mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, lakˈini mwˈiʃo wˌake ˌitaˌaŋɡamˈizwa milˈele.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawaˈona wakˈeni, ˌakatˈoa uɟˈumbe wˈake: makˈao jˈenu ni salˈama, kiˈota tʃˈenu kˈiko kwˈeɲe mwˈamba.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˈiɲi wakˈeni mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa aʃˈuru ˌatakˌapowˌatʃukˈua matˈeka.|0
ndˈipo ˌakatˈoa uɟˈumbe wˈake: lˈo, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajewˈeza kuˈiʃi wakˈati mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˌapofˈaɲa hˈili.|0
mˈeli zˌitakˈuɟa kutˈoka pwˈani za kitˈimu, zˌitaˌitiˈiʃa aʃˈuru na ebˈeri, lakˈini nˌao pˈia wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
kˈiʃa bˌalaˈamu ˌakainˈuka na kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake, nˌaje balˈaki ˌakaʃˈika ɲɟˈia jˈake.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakikˈaa ʃitˈimu, wˌanaˈume wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˈanza kuzˈini na wˌanawˈake wa kˌimoˈabu.|0
ambˈao wˌaliwˌaalˈika kˌuʃirˈiki katˌika kutˈoa kafˈara kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈao. wˈatu wakˈala na kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele ja miˈuŋɡu hˌii.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌisraˈeli ˌakauŋɡˈana katˌika kˌumwabˈudu baˈali wa peˈori. hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, ˌuwatʃukˈue vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa wˈatu hˈawa, ˌuwaˈue na ˌuwawˈeke hˌaðarˈani mtʃˈana peˈupe mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌili hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana iwˈeze kˌuondˈoka kwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu lazˈima ˌawaˈue wˈale wˌanaˈume wˈenu, wˌaliˌoʃirˈiki katˌika kˌumwabˈudu baˈali wa peˈori.|0
ndˈipo mwˌanaˈume wa kˌiisraˈeli ˌakamlˈeta mwanˈamke wa kˌimidiˈani katˌika ɟamˈaa jˌake pˌalepˈale mbˈele ja mˈose na mkutˈano wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakilˈia kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari, mwˈana wa kuhˈani arˈoni, ˌalipoˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko, ˌakatʃukˈua mkˈuki mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌakamfuˈata jˈule mwˌisraˈeli ndˈani ja hˈema. ˌakawatʃˈoma mkˈuki wˈote wawˈili kwa pamˈoɟa, ˌukapˈeɲa kwˈeɲe mwˈili wa jˈule mwˌisraˈeli na mwˈili wa jˈule mwanˈamke. ndˈipo taˈuni ˌilijˌokuwˈepo ðˈidi ja wˌaisraˈeli ˌikakˈoma.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari, mwˈana wa kuhˈani arˈoni, ˌameɡeˈuza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu mbˈali na wˌaisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa na wˈivu kˌama nilˈio nˌao kwa heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, hˌata kwˌamba kwa wˈivu wˈaŋɡu sˌikuwˌaaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kwa hˈijo mwambˈie fˌinehˈasi nˌinafˈaɲa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu la amˈani nˈaje.|0
jˌeje pamˈoɟa na wazˈao wˌake wˌatakˈuwa na aɡˈano la ˌukuhˈani milˈele, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa na wˈivu kwa aɟˈili ja heʃˈima ja mˈuŋɡu wˈake, na ˌakafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ɟˈina la mwˌisraˈeli ambˈaje ˌaliuˈawa pamˈoɟa na mwanˈamke wa kˌimidiˈani ni zˈimri mwˈana wa sˈalu, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja sˌimeˈoni.|0
ɟˈina la mwanˈamke wa kˌimidiˈani ˌalijˌeuˈawa ni kˈozbi bˈinti wa sˈuri, ˌalijekˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa kabˈila la ɟamˈaa ja wˌamidiˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌatendeˈeni wˌamidiˈani kˌama adˈui na ˌm̩waˈue.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌao wˌaliwˌatendˈea kˌama adˈui wakˈati wˌaliwˌadaŋɡˈaɲa katˌika tukˈio la peˈori na dˈada jˈao kˈozbi, bˈinti wa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˌimidiˈani, mwanˈamke ambˈaje ˌaliuˈawa wakˈati taˈuni ˌilikˈuɟa kˌama mˌatokˈeo ja tukˈio la peˈori.|0
baˌada ja hˈijo taˈuni, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose na ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa kuhˈani arˈoni.|0
hesˈabu ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja kˌiisraˈeli kwa ɟamˈaa zˈao, wˈale wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na zaˈidi, ambˈao wˌanawˈeza kˌutumˈika katˌika ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wˌakazuŋɡˈumza na wˈatu kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare ja moˈabu, ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani kˌutokˈea jerˈiko, wˌakasˈema.|0
hˌesabˈuni wˌanaˈume wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na zaˈidi, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliotˈoka mˈisri.|0
wazˈao wa rˌeubˈeni, mwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ˌisraˈeli, wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa hanˈoki, ukˈoo wa wˌahanˈoki; kutˈoka kwa pˈalu, ukˈoo wa wapˈalu.|0
kutˈoka kwa hesrˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌahesrˈoni; kutˈoka kwa kˈarmi, ukˈoo wa wakˈarmi.|0
mwˈana wa pˈalu ˌalikˈuwa ˌeliˈabu.|0
nˌao wˈana wa ˌeliˈabu wˌalikˈuwa nˌemuˈeli, daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu. hˈawa wawˈili daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˌumuˈija ambˈao wˌalimwˈasi mˈose na arˈoni, na wˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafuˈasi wa kˈora wakˈati wˌalimwˈasi bwˈana.|0
ˈarði ˌilifunˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kˌuwamˈeza pamˈoɟa na kˈora, ambˈaje wˌafuˈasi wˌake wˌalikˈufa wakˈati mˈoto ˌulipˌowatˌeketˈeza wˌanaˈume mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini. nˌao wˌalikˈuwa kˌama alˈama ja ˈoɲo.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, hˈao ukˈoo wa kˈora hˌawakˈufa.|0
wazˈao wa ɡˈadi kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa sifˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌasifˈoni; kutˈoka kwa hˈaɡi, ukˈoo wa wahˈaɡi; kutˈoka kwa ʃˈuni, ukˈoo wa waʃˈuni.|0
kutˈoka kwa ˈozni, ukˈoo wa waˈozni; kutˈoka kwa ˈeri, ukˈoo wa waˈeri.|0
kutˈoka kwa arˈodi, ukˈoo wa wˌaarˈodi; kutˈoka kwa arˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌaarˈeli.|0
ˈeri na onˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa jˈuda, lakˈini wˌalifˈia hˌuko kˌanaˈani.|0
wazˈao wa jˈuda kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa ʃˈela, ukˈoo wa waʃˈela; kutˈoka kwa perˈesi, ukˈoo wa wˌaperˈesi; kutˈoka kwa zˈera, ukˈoo wa wazˈera.|0
wazˈao wa perˈesi wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa hesrˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌahesrˈoni; kutˈoka kwa hamˈuli, ukˈoo wa wˌahamˈuli.|0
wazˈao wa ˌisakˈari kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa tˈola, ukˈoo wa watˈola; kutˈoka kwa pˈuva, ukˈoo wa wapˈuva.|0
kutˈoka kwa jaʃˈubu, ukˈoo wa wˌajaʃˈubu; kutˈoka kwa ʃimrˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃimrˈoni.|0
wazˈao wa zˌabulˈoni kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa serˈedi, ukˈoo wa wˌaserˈedi; kutˈoka kwa elˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌaelˈoni; kutˈoka kwa jˌaleˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌajaleˈeli.|0
wazˈao wa josˈefu kwa kˈoo zˈao kutˈoka kwa manˈase na kwa ˌefraˈimu wˌalikˈuwa.|0
wazˈao wa manˈase: kutˈoka kwa makˈiri, ukˈoo wa wˌamakˈiri makˈiri ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ɡˌileˈadi; kutˈoka kwa ɡˌileˈadi, ukˈoo wa wˌaɡileˈadi.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa ɡˌileˈadi: kutˈoka kwa ˌiezˈeri, ukˈoo wa wˌaiezˈeri; kutˈoka kwa helˈeki, ukˈoo wa wˌahelˈeki.|0
kutˈoka kwa ˌasiriˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌaasˌiriˈeli; kutˈoka kwa ʃekˈemu, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃekˈemu.|0
kutˈoka kwa ʃemˈida, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃemˈida; kutˈoka kwa hefˈeri, ukˈoo wa wˌahefˈeri.|0
sˌelofehˈadi mwˈana wa hefˈeri hˌakuzˈaa wˈana, bˌali ˌalikˈuwa na watˈoto wa kˈike tˈu, ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao jˌalikˈuwa mˈahla, nˈoa, hˈoɡla, mˈilka na tˈirsa..|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa ˌefraˈimu kwa kˈoo zˈao: kutˈoka kwa ʃuθˈela, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃuθˈela; kutˈoka kwa bekˈeri, ukˈoo wa wˌabekˈeri; kutˈoka kwa tahˈani, ukˈoo wa wˌatahˈani.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa ʃuθˈela: kutˈoka kwa erˈani, ukˈoo wa wˌaerˈani.|0
wazˈao wa bˌeɲamˈini kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa bˈela, ukˈoo wa wabˈela; kutˈoka kwa aʃbˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌaaʃbˈeli; kutˈoka kwa ˌahirˈamu, ukˈoo wa wˌaahirˈamu.|0
kutˈoka kwa ʃufˈamu, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃufˈamu; kutˈoka kwa hufˈamu, ukˈoo wa wˌahufˈamu.|0
wazˈao wa bˈela kutˈoka kwa ˈardi na nˌaamˈani wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa ˈardi, ukˈoo wa waˈardi; kutˈoka kwa nˌaamˈani, ukˈoo wa wˌanaamˈani.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa dˈani kwa kˈoo zˈao: kutˈoka kwa ʃuhˈamu, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃuhˈamu. hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za dˈani.|0
wazˈao wa aʃˈeri kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa ˈimna, ukˈoo wa waˈimna; kutˈoka kwa ˈiʃvi, ukˈoo wa waˈiʃvi; kutˈoka kwa berˈia, ukˈoo wa wˌaberˈia.|0
kutˈoka kwa wazˈao wa berˈia: kutˈoka kwa hebˈeri, ukˈoo wa wˌahebˈeri; kutˈoka kwa mˌalkiˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌamalkiˈeli.|0
aʃˈeri ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti ˌalijeˈitwa sˈera..|0
wazˈao wa naftˈali kwa kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa: kutˈoka kwa jˌaseˈeli, ukˈoo wa wˌajaseˈeli; kutˈoka kwa ɡˈuni, ukˈoo wa waɡˈuni.|0
kutˈoka kwa jesˈeri, ukˈoo wa wˌajesˈeri; kutˈoka kwa ʃilˈemu, ukˈoo wa wˌaʃilˈemu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌataɡawˈiwa ˈn̩tʃi kˌama urˈiθi kwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na hesˈabu ja maɟˈina.|0
kˈundi kˈubwa zaˈidi lˈipe urˈiθi mkˈubwa zaˈidi, na kˈundi dˈoɡo zaˈidi lipˈewe urˈiθi mdˈoɡo zaˈidi; kˈila kˈundi lˌitapokˈea urˈiθi wˌake kˌuliŋɡˈana na hesˈabu ja wˈale wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa.|0
hˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi ˌinaɡawˈaɲua kwa kˈura. kˈile kˌitakˌatʃoriθˈiwa na kˈila kikˈundi kˌitakˈuwa kwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na maɟˈina ja kabˈila la bˈabu jˈao.|0
kˈila urˈiθi ˌutaɡawˈaɲua kwa kˈura mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa makˈundi makˈubwa na madˈoɡo.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa walˈawi ambˈao wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kwa kˈoo zˈao: kutˈoka kwa ɡerʃˈoni, ukˈoo wa wˌaɡerʃˈoni; kutˈoka kwa kohˈaθi, ukˈoo wa wˌakohˈaθi; kutˈoka kwa merˈari, ukˈoo wa wˌamerˈari.|0
hˈizi pˈia zˌilikˈuwa kˈoo za walˈawi: ukˈoo wa walˈibni; ukˈoo wa wˌahebrˈoni; ukˈoo wa wamˈahli; ukˈoo wa wamˈuʃi; ukˈoo wa wˈana wa kˈora. kohˈaθi ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba ˌalijemzˈaa amrˈamu.|0
ɟˈina la ˈm̩ke wa amrˈamu ni jˌokebˈedi, nˌaje pˈia ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈao wa lˈawi, ambˈaje ˌalizalˈiwa kwa walˈawi n̩tʃˈini mˈisri. ˌalimzalˈia amrˈamu: arˈoni, mˈose na dˈada jˈao mˌiriˈamu.|0
arˈoni ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake nadˈabu na abˈihu, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari.|0
lakˈini nadˈabu na abˈihu wˌalikˈufa wakˈati wˌalitˈoa sadˈaka mbˈele za bwˈana kwa mˈoto ˌusiˌoruhusˈiwa..|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote wa walˈawi wa ˈumri wa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa na zaˈidi wˌalikˈuwa ˌiʃirˈininatˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. wˌao hˌawakˌuhesabˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine kwa sabˈabu hˌawakˌupokˈea urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa na mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wakˈati wˌaliwˌahesˈabu wˌaisraˈeli kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare ja moˈabu, kˈando ja jordˈani ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌalijekˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa na mˈose na kuhˈani arˈoni wakˈati wˌaliwˌahesˈabu wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia hˈao wˌaisraˈeli hakˈika wˌaŋɡekˈufa hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, wˈala hakˈuna mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌalijeˈatʃwa, ˌisipokˈuwa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni.|0
bˈinti za sˌelofehˈadi mwˈana wa hefˈeri, mwˈana wa ɡˌileˈadi, mwˈana wa makˈiri, mwˈana wa manˈase, wˌalikˈuwa wa kˈoo za manˈase mwˈana wa josˈefu. maɟˈina ja hˈao bˈinti jˌalikˈuwa mˈahla, nˈoa, hˈoɡla, mˈilka na tˈirsa. wˌalikˌaribˈia.|0
ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja mˈose, kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, vˌioŋɡˈozi na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote, wˌakasˈema.|0
bˈaba jˈetu ˌalikˈufa ɟaŋɡwˈani. hakˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafuˈasi wa kˈora, ambˈao wˌalifˌuŋɡamˈana pamˈoɟa ðˈidi ja bwˈana, lakˈini ˌalikˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe na hˌakuˈatʃa wˈana.|0
kwa nˈini ɟˈina la bˈaba jˈetu lˌifutˈike kutˈoka ukˈoo wˌake kwa sabˈabu hakˈuwa na mwˈana? tˌupatˈie mˈilki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu za bˈaba jˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakalilˈeta ʃaˈuri lˈao mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
wˌanatʃosˈema bˈinti za sˌelofehˈadi ni sˈawa. ni lazˈima kwa hakˈika uwˈape mˈilki kˌama urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu za bˈaba jˈao, na kˌubadˈili urˈiθi wa bˈaba jˈao ˈuwe wˈao.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaisraˈeli, ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈufa nˌaje hˌakuˈatʃa mwˈana, utˈampa bˈinti jˌake urˈiθi wˈake.|0
ikˈiwa hˈana bˈinti, wˈape ndˈuɡu zˌake wa kiˈume urˈiθi wˈake.|0
ikˈiwa hˈana ndˈuɡu wa kiˈume tˈoa urˈiθi wˌake kwa ndˈuɡu za bˈaba jˈake.|0
ikˈiwa bˈaba jˌake hakˈuwa na ndˈuɡu wa kiˈume, tˈoa urˈiθi wˌake kwa ndˈuɡu wa karˈibu katˌika ukˈoo wˈake, ˌili ˌaumilˈiki. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa dˈai la ʃerˈia kwa wˌaisraˈeli, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose..|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, pˈanda ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈuu katˌika kilˈele tʃa ˌabarˈimu ˌuiˈone ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˌimewˈapa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja kˌuiˈona, wˌewe pˈia ˌutakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako kˌama ndˈuɡu jˈako arˈoni ˌalivjˌokusˈaɲua.|0
kwa kˌuwa ɟˌumuˈija ˌilipoˈasi ˈamri jˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, wakˈati ɟˌumuˈija ˌilipˌoɡombˈana nˈami, ɲˈote wawˈili mliˈatʃa kˌuitˈii ˈamri jˈaŋɡu ja kˌuniheʃˈimu kˌama mtˌakatˈifu mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao. hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa mˈaɟi ja merˈiba hˌuko kadˈeʃi, katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini..|0
mˈose ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana.|0
bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa rˈoho zˈote za wˌanadˈamu, na ˌamteˈue ˈm̩tu ɟˌuːja ɟˌumuˈija hˌii.|0
ˌili atˈoke na kˌuiŋɡˈia mbˈele jˈao, ˌatakˌajewˌaoŋɡˈoza katˌika kutˈoka kwˈao na kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈao, ˌili wˈatu wa bwˈana wasˈiwe kˌama kondˈoo wasˈio na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, mtʃukˈue joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, ˈm̩tu ambˈaje rˈoho jˈuko ndˈani jˈake, uwˈeke mkˈono ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
msˌimamˈiʃe mbˈele ja kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari pamˈoɟa na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote, ˈumpe mˌaaɡˈizo mbˈele jˈao.|0
ˈm̩pe sehˈemu ja mamlˈaka jˈako ˌili ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli ipˈate kumtˈii.|0
ˌatasimˈama mbˈele ja kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, ambˈaje ˌatapokˈea mˌaamˈuzi kwa aɟˈili jˈake, kwa kˌuulˈiza mbˈele za bwˈana kwa ˈile urˈimu. kwa ˈamri jˈake, jˌeje na ɟˌumuˈija jˈote ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌatatˈoka, na kwa ˈamri jˈake, wˌataiŋɡˈia.|0
mˈose ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza. ˌakamtwˈaa joʃˈua na kˌumsimamˈiʃa mbˈele ja kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˌake ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa joʃˈua na kˈumpa mˌaaɡˈizo, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoelekˈeza kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˈape wˌaisraˈeli aɡˈizo hˈili na ˌuwaambˈie: hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba mnˌaniletˈea mˌimi kwa wakˈati ˌuliowˈekwa tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌupendˈeza..|0
wˌaambˈie: hˌii ni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto mnˌajomtolˈea bwˈana: wˌanakondˈoo wawˈili wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa wasˈio na dosˈari, kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˈila sˈiku.|0
andˈaa mwˌanakondˈoo mmˈoɟa ˌasubˈuhi na mwiŋɡˈine ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatolˈewe pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na rˈobo ja hˈini ja mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni.|0
hˌii ni sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌilijˌoanzˈiʃwa katˌika mlˈima sinˈai kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌupendˈeza, sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto.|0
sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi ˌitakˌajotolˈewa pamˈoɟa na kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo ni rˈobo ja hˈini ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi kˌilitʃˌotʃatʃˈuka. mimˈina sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi kwa bwˈana mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
andˈaa jˈule mwˌanakondˈoo wa pˈili ɟiˈoni, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi kˌama ˌulivjofˈaɲa kwa ˈile sadˈaka ɲiŋɡˈine ja ˌasubˈuhi. hˌii ni sadˈaka ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌumpendˈeza bwˈana.|0
sˈiku ja sabˈato, ˌutatˈoa sadˈaka ja wˌanakondˈoo wawˈili wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa wˌasiokˈuwa na dosˈari pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka jˌeɲe uzˈito wa sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta.|0
hˌii ni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌitakˌajotolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila sabˈato, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja kˈila mwˈezi, mtˌamletˈea bwˈana sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja fahˈali wawˈili watʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wˌasiokˈuwa na dosˈari.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila fahˈali, kˌutakˈuwa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini sehˈemu tˈatu za kˈumi za ˈefa, ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta, pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo, sadˈaka ja nafˈaka jˌeɲe uzˈito wa sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta. hˌii ni kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, harˈufu nzˈuri, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌilijˌotolˈewa kwa mˈoto kwa bwˈana.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila fahˈali kˌutakˈuwa na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi nˈusu ja hˈini ja divˈai; pamˈoɟa na kˈila kondˈoo dˈume, θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja hˈini, na pamˈoɟa na kˈila mwˌanakondˈoo rˈobo hˈini. hˌii ni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja kˈila mwˈezi ˌitakˌajotolˈewa kˈila mwandˈamo wa mwˈezi kwa mwˈaka.|0
zaˈidi ja sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi, mbˈuzi mmˈoɟa dˈume ˌatatolˈewa kwa bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, ˌitafaɲˈika pasˈaka ja bwˈana.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi hˈuo ˌitakˈuwa sˌikukˈuu; kwa sˈiku sˈaba mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, msifˈaɲe kˈazi za kˌawaˈida.|0
letˈeni mbˈele za bwˈana sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja mˌafahˈali wawˈili watʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume sˈaba wˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila fahˈali, andˈaa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka sehˈemu tˈatu za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume, andˈaa sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa.|0
pˈia m̩tˈoe bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi ambˈaje ˌatafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
andˈaa hˈizi lˈitʃa ja zˈile sadˈaka za kˌawaˈida za kˌuteketˈezwa za kˈila ˌasubˈuhi.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii andˈaa tʃakˈula tʃa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˈila sˈiku, kwa sˈiku sˈaba kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌimpendezˈajo bwˈana. hˌii ˌitaˌandalˈiwa lˈitʃa ja ˈile sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja kˈila sˈiku pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba ˈm̩we na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu na msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida.|0
sˈiku ja mˌalimbˈuko, mnˌapomletˈea bwˈana sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˈm̩pja wakˈati wa sˌikukˈuu ja maɟˈuma, ˈm̩we na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu na msifˈaɲe kˈazi zˈenu za kˌawaˈida.|0
mlˈete sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja mˌafahˈali wawˈili watʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, na pˈia wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba wˌeɲe ˈumri wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ja kˌumpendˈeza bwˈana.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈila fahˈali ˌitatolˈewa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini sehˈemu tˈatu za kˈumi za ˈefa ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume, andˈaa sehˈemu mbˈili za kˈumi za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini.|0
na sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini kwa kˈila mmˈoɟa wa wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kwa kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
andˈaa hˈizi sadˈaka pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˌake za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuwa ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka za kˌawaˈida za kˌuteketˈezwa, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka. hˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa waɲˈama hˈao hawˈana dosˈari.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu na msifˈaɲe kˈazi ja kˌawaˈida. ni sˈiku kwa aɟˈili jˈenu ja kupˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta.|0
mtˌatajarˈiʃa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌimpendezˈajo bwˈana ja fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, na wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari.|0
