pamˈoɟa na fahˈali, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka ja nafˈaka sehˈemu ja kˈumi tˈatu za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; kwa kondˈoo dˈume, andˈaa ˈuŋɡa sehˈemu ja kˈumi mbˈili za ˈefa.|0
na pamˈoɟa na wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaandalˈiwe na sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
hˈivi ni ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kˈila mwˈezi na kˈila sˈiku pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˌake za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi kˌama ˌilivjˌoainˈiʃwa. ni sadˈaka zˌinazˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana kwa mˈoto, harˈufu ˌinajˌopendˈeza.|0
kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi hˈuu wa sˈaba mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu. mtˌaɟikˈana weɲˈewe na msifˈaɲe kˈazi.|0
toˈeni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja fahˈali mmˈoɟa mtʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, na wˌanakondˈoo sˈaba wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari, kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
pamˈoɟa na fahˈali, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka ja nafˈaka sehˈemu ja kˈumi tˈatu za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume, sehˈemu ja kˈumi mbˈili za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, katˌika ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja ˌupatanˈiʃo, na sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka, na sadˈaka zˌake za vˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu, na hˌamtafˈaɲa kˈazi za kˌawaˈida. ˌaðimiʃˈeni sˌikukˈuu kwa bwˈana kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
toˈeni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa mˌafahˈali watʃˈaŋɡa kˈumi na watˈatu, kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili, na wˌanakondˈoo kˈumi na wˈanne wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari, kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈao mˌafahˈali kˈumi na watˈatu, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaandalˈiwe na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka sehˈemu ja kˈumi tˈatu za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mafˈuta; kwa kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaandalˈiwe sehˈemu ja kˈumi mbˈili za ˈefa za ˈuŋɡa laˈini.|0
na kwa wˌanakondˈoo kˈumi na wˈanne, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaandalˈiwe sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa laˈini.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kwa ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa, na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja vˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja pˈili ˌandaˈeni mˌafahˈali watʃˈaŋɡa kˈumi na wawˈili, kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili, na wˌanakondˈoo kˈumi na wˈanne wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume, na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
wˈeka bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, kwa ɲoŋɡˈeza ja kˌawaˈida ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˈao za vˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume, na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume, na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja tˈano ˌandaˈeni mˌafahˈali tˈisa, kondˈoo dˈume wawˈili na wˌanakondˈoo kˈumi na wˈanne wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi katˌika ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume, na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
pamˈoɟa na mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume, na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja nˈane mtakˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko, na msifˈaɲe kˈazi ja kˌawaˈida.|0
toˈeni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kˌama harˈufu nzˈuri ˌinajˌompendˈeza bwˈana, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja fahˈali mmˈoɟa, kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume sˈaba wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈio na dosˈari.|0
pamˈoɟa na fahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume na wˌanakondˈoo, ˌandaˈeni sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka, na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ˌilijˌoainˈiʃwa.|0
oŋɡˈeza bebˈeru mmˈoɟa kˌama sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, katˌika ɲoŋɡˈeza ja sadˈaka ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuteketˈezwa, na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
zaˈidi ja kˈile ˌunatʃowˈeka naðˈiri na sadˈaka zˈenu za hiˈari, ˌandaˈeni hˈizi kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu zˈenu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa: sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka, sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˈenu za amˈani..|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli jˈale jˈote bwˈana ˌalimwaɡˈiza.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌanalˌoaɡˈiza.|0
mwˌanaˈume ˌawekˈapo naðˈiri kwa bwˈana, ˌau ˌanapoˈapa kˌuɟifˈuŋɡa kwa ahˈadi, kˈamwe ˌasitaŋɡˈue nˈeno lˈake, bˌali ni lazˈima afˈaɲe kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃosˈema.|0
wakˈati mwˌanamwˈali ˌanajeˈiʃi bˈado ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˌake ˌatakˌapowˈeka naðˈiri kwa bwˈana, ˌama ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa mweɲˈewe kwa ahˈadi.|0
na bˈaba jˌake ˌakasikˈia kuhˈusu naðˈiri ˌau ahˈadi jˌake lakˈini ˌasimwambˈie lolˈote, ndˈipo naðˈiri zˌake zˈote na kˈila ahˈadi ˌalijˌoiwˈeka na kˌuɟifˈuŋɡa kwˈajo ˌitaθˌibitˈika.|0
lakˈini kˌama bˈaba jˌake ˌakimkatˈaza wakˈati ˌanapˌoisikˈia, hakˈuna naðˈiri wˈala ahˈadi jˌake jojˈote ˌalijˌoɟifˈuŋɡa kwˈajo ˌitakˌajosimˈama; bwˈana ˌatamwˈeka hˈuru hˈujo mwˌanamwˈali kwa sabˈabu bˈaba jˌake ˌamemkatˈaza.|0
ikˈiwa ˌataolˈewa baˌada ja kuwˈeka naðˈiri ˌau baˌada ja midˈomo jˌake kutˈamka ahˈadi fulˈani bˌila kˌufikˈiri akˈawa ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa hˈivjo.|0
na mˈume wˌake ˌakasikˈia habˈari hˈijo ˌasimwambˈie nˈeno lolˈote, ndˈipo naðˈiri zˌake ˌama ahˈadi zˌake ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa nˈazo zˌitaθˌibitˈika.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mˈume wˌake ˌatamkatˈaza ˌatakˌaposikˈia kuhˈusu hˈilo, ˌatakˈuwa ˌametaŋɡˈua naðˈiri ambˈazo zˌilikˈuwa zˌimemfˈuŋɡa mkˈewe, ˌama ahˈadi ˌalijotˈamka pasˈipo kˌufikˈiri ambˈajo ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa kwˈajo, nˌaje bwˈana ˌatamwˈeka hˈuru jˈule mwanˈamke.|0
naðˈiri jojˈote ˌama patˈano ambˈalo lˌimefˈaɲua na mɟˈane ˌama mwanˈamke ˌalijeˈatʃwa vˌitakˈuwa vˌimemfˈuŋɡa.|0
ikˈiwa mwanˈamke ˌanajeˈiʃi na mumˈewe ˌatawˈeka naðˈiri ˌama kˌuɟifˈuŋɡa mweɲˈewe kwa ahˈadi tʃˈini ja kiˈapo.|0
na mumˈewe ˌakasikˈia kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili lakˈini ˌasimwambˈie lolˈote wˈala hˌakumkatˈaza, ndˈipo viˈapo vjˈake vjˈote ˌau ahˈadi zˌinazomfˈuŋɡa zˌitakˌapoθˌibitˈika.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mumˈewe ˌatabˌatilˈiʃa naðˈiri hˈizo baˌada ja kˌuzisikˈia, bˌasi hakˈuna naðˈiri ˌau ahˈadi zozˈote ˌalizˌoziwˈeka kwa midˈomo jˌake zˌitakˌazoθˌibitˈika. mumˈewe ˌatakˈuwa ˌamezˌibatilˈiʃa, na bwˈana ˌatamwˈeka hˈuru jˈule mwanˈamke.|0
mumˈewe ˌanawˈeza kˌuθibitˈiʃa ˌau kˌutaŋɡˈua naðˈiri jojˈote ˌanajowˈeka, ˌau ahˈadi jojˈote ˌalijowˈeka kwa kuˈapa ˌili kˌuɟikˈana mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mumˈewe hasˈemi lolˈote kwˈake kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˌilo sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, bˌasi mumˈewe ˌatakˈuwa ˌameθˌibitˈiʃa naðˈiri zˈote, na ahˈadi zˈote zˌinazomfˈuŋɡa mkˈewe. ˌanavˌiθibitˈiʃa kwa kˌutokusˈema lolˈote kwa mkˈewe ˌanapˌojasikˈia hˈajo.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ikˈiwa mumˈewe ˌatavˌibatilˈiʃa baˌada ja kˌusikˈia hˈajo, bˌasi ˌatawˌaɟibˈika kwa hatˈia ja mkˈewe.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maʃˈarti ambˈajo bwˈana alˈimpa mˈose kuhˈusu mˌahusiˈano kˈati ja ˈm̩tu na mkˈewe, na kˈati ja bˈaba na bˈinti jˌake ambˈaje bˈado ˌanaˈiʃi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
ˌuwalipˈize kisˈasi wˌamidiˈani kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli. halˈafu baˌada ja hˈajo, ˌutakˈufa.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, wˌaandaˈeni baˈaði ja wˌanaˈume wˈenu waˈende vitˈani kˌupiɡˈana na wˌamidiˈani ˌili wˌawalipˈize kisˈasi tʃa bwˈana.|0
pelˈeka wˌanaˈume mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri vitˈani kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila la ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaliˌandalˈiwa wˌanaˈume kˈuminambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa vˈita, wˌanaˈume mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila, wˌalitolˈewa kutˈoka kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˈose ˌaliwatˈuma vitˈani, wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila, pamˈoɟa na fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, ambˈaje ˌalitʃukˈua vjˈombo vja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na tˌarumbˈeta za kˌuaʃirˈia.|0
wˌalipiɡˈana ðˈidi ja wˌamidiˈani, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose, nˌao wˌaliˈua kˈila mwˌanaˈume.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌaliˌouˈawa wˌalikuwˈepo wafˈalme watˈano wa mˌidiˈani, nˌao ni ˈevi, rekˈemu, sˈuri, hˈuri na rˈeba. vˌilevˈile wˌalimuˈua bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwatˈeka wˌanawˈake wa kˌimidiˈani pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˌao na wˌalitʃukˈua makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo na mˈali zˈao kˌama ɲˈara.|0
wˌalitʃˈoma mˈoto mˈiɟi jˈote ambˈajo wˌamidiˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi, pamˈoɟa na kˈambi zˈao zˈote.|0
wˌalitʃukˈua ɲˈara zˈote na matˈeka, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu na waɲˈama.|0
nˌao wˌaliwalˈeta wafˈuŋɡwa matˈeka na ɲˈara kwa mˈose na kwa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˌusaɲˈika kwˈeɲe kˈambi zˈao katˌika tˌambarˈare za ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, kˈando ja jordˈani ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko.|0
mˈose, kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa ɟˌumuˈija wˌakatˈoka kˌuwalˈaki ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi.|0
mˈose ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi, jaˈani hˈao wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa maˈelfu na wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa mamˈia, ambˈao wˌalirˈudi kutˈoka vitˈani.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, mmˌewaˈatʃa wˌanawˈake wˈote hˈai.|0
wˌanawˈake hˈao n̩dˈio wˌaliˌofuˈata ˌuʃaˈuri wa bˌalaˈamu, nˌao n̩dˈio wˌaliˌowasˌababˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli wamwˈasi bwˈana kwa kˈile kˌilitʃˌotokˈea kˈule peˈori, na kwa hˈijo pˈiɡo lˌiliwapˈata wˈatu wa bwˈana.|0
sˈasa waˈue wˌavulˈana wˈote. pˈia muˈue kˈila mwanˈamke ambˈaje ˌalikwˈiʃa fˈaɲa tˈendo la n̩dˈoa.|0
lakˈini mwatʃˈeni hˈai kwa aɟˈili jˈenu kˈila msitʃˈana ambˈaje kˈamwe hˌaɟawˈahi kuzˈini na mwˌanaˈume.|0
nˈiɲi ɲˈote ambˈao ˌm̩meˈua ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌau kumɡˈusa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌameuˈawa, lazˈima m̩kˈae ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba. katˌika sˈiku ja tˈatu na ja sˈaba lazˈima mɟˌitakˈase weɲˈewe pamˈoɟa na wafˈuŋɡwa wˈenu.|0
tˌakasˈeni kˈila vˈazi pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ŋɡˈozi, kwa sˈiŋɡa za mbˈuzi ˌau kwa ˈm̩ti.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari ˌaliwˌaambˈia askˈari wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda vitˈani, hˈaja n̩dˈijo matˈakwa ja ʃerˈia ambˈajo bwˈana alˈimpa mˈose.|0
ðahˈabu, fˈeða, ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma, bˈati, risˈasi.|0
na kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo kˌinawˈeza kˌuhimˈili mˈoto lazˈima mkˌipitˈiʃe kwˈeɲe mˈoto, kˈiʃa kˌitakˈuwa sˈafi. lakˈini ni lazˈima pˈia kˌitakˈaswe kwa mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso. kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌisitʃowˈeza kˌuhimˈili mˈoto lazˈima kˌipitˈiʃwe kwˈeɲe jˈale mˈaɟi ja ˌutakˈaso.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba fuˈeni ŋɡˈuo zˈenu, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa sˈafi. kˈiʃa mtawˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia kambˈini.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌewe na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari pamˈoɟa na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja ɟˌumuˈija mtˌahesˈabu wˈatu wˈote na waɲˈama ambˈao wˌalitˈekwa.|0
ɡˌawaɲˈeni hˈizo ɲˈara kˈati ja askˈari ambˈao wˌaliʃirˈiki katˌika vˈita na kwa ɟˌumuˈija.|0
kutˈoka fˈuŋɡu la wˈale wˌaliokwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana vitˈani, tˈeŋɡa kˌama uʃˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana kˈitu kimˈoɟa kˈati ja kˈila mˈia tˈano, ikˈiwa ni wˌanadˈamu, ŋɡˈombe, pˈunda, kondˈoo ˌau mbˈuzi.|0
tʃukˈua uʃˈuru hˈuu kutˈoka fˈuŋɡu lˈao, ˈumpe kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari kˌama sehˈemu ja bwˈana.|0
kutˈoka fˈuŋɡu la wˌaisraˈeli, tʃukˈua kˈitu kimˈoɟa kˈati ja kˈila hamsˈini, ikˈiwa ni wˌanadˈamu, ŋɡˈombe, pˈunda, kondˈoo, mbˈuzi ˌau waɲˈama weŋɡˈine. hˈivjo uwˈape walˈawi, ambˈao wˌanawˌaɟibˈika kutˈunza maskˈani ja bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
ambˈajo uʃˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ˌilikˈuwa kondˈoo mˌiasˈita sabˈininatˈano.|0
wˈatu kˈuminasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao uʃˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa wˈatu θˌeleθˈininambˈili.|0
mˈose alˈimpa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari uʃˈuru kˌama sehˈemu ja bwˈana, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
ˈile nˈusu ˌilijokˈuwa ja wˌaisraˈeli, ambˈajo mˈose ˌaliitˈeŋɡa kutˈoka kwa ˈile ja wˈatu wˌaliokwˈenda vitˈani.|0
ŋɡˈombe θˌeleθˈininasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
pˈunda θˌeleθˈini,mˌiatˈano.|0
kutˈoka hˈijo nˈusu ˌilijokˈuwa ja wˌaisraˈeli, mˈose ˌalitʃaɡˈua mˈoɟa kˈati ja kˈila hamsˈini ja wˌanadˈamu na waɲˈama, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza, nˌaje ˌaliwˈapa walˈawi, ambˈao wˌaliwˌaɟibˈika kutˈunza maskˈani ja bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mˌaafˈisa wˌaliokˈuwa ɟˌuːja vikˈosi vja ɟˈeʃi, wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa maˈelfu na wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa mamˈia, wˌalimwendˈea mˈose.|0
na kˌumwambˈia, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌamehesˈabu askˈari walˈio tʃˈini ja ˈamri jˈetu na hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌekosekˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo tˌumelˈeta kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana vjˈombo vja ðahˈabu kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌalivjopˈata, jaˈani vikˈuku, baŋɡˈili, pˈete za muhˈuri, vipˈuli na mikˈufu, ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈetu mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wˌakapokˈea kutˈoka kwˈao ðahˈabu, jaˈani vjˈombo vjˈote vˌilivjˌonakʃˈiwa.|0
ðahˈabu jˈote kutˈoka kwa wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa maˈelfu na wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa mamˈia ambˈavjo mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wˌalimletˈea bwˈana kˌama zawˈadi ˌilikˈuwa ʃekˈeli kˈuminasˈita,mˌiasˈabanˌa hamsˈini.|0
kˈila askˈari ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟˌitʃukulˈia ɲˈara zˌake binˈafsi.|0
mˈose na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari wˌalipokˈea ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwa wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa maˈelfu na wakˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi wa mamˈia, wˌakazilˈeta katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia kˌama ˌukumbˈuʃo kwa wˌaisraˈeli mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
kabˈila la wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi, wˌaliokˈuwa na makˈundi makˈubwa ja ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, wˌaliˈona kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi ja jazˈeri na ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi ni nzˈuri kwa mifˈuɡo.|0
hˈivjo wˌalimɟˈia mˈose, na kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˌumuˈija, na kˌuwaambˈia.|0
ˌatarˈoθi, dibˈoni, jazˈeri, nˈimra, heʃbˈoni, ˌeleˈale, sebˈamu, nˈebo na beˈoni.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌameiʃˈinda mbˈele ja wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌinafˈaa kwa mifˈuɡo, nˌao wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˈana mifˈuɡo.|0
kˌama tˌumepˈata kibˈali mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako, ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na ipˈewe wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako kˌama mˈilki jˈetu. ˌusitufˈaɲe tuvˈuke jordˈani.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia waɡˈadi na wˌareubˈeni, ɟˈe, wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu wˌatakwˈenda vitˈani wakˈati nˈiɲi mmekˈeti hˈapa.|0
kwa nˈini mmˌewakatˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli tamˈaa wˌasivˈuke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌamewˈapa.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo bˈaba zˈenu wˌalivjofˈaɲa wakˈati nˌilipˌowatˈuma kutˈoka kˈadeʃ barnˈea kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
baˌada ja kufˈika kwˈeɲe bˈonde la eʃkˈoli na kˌuitazˈama ˈn̩tʃi, wˌaliwˌakatˈiʃa tamˈaa wˌaisraˈeli wˌasiiŋɡˈie katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa.|0
sˈiku ˈile hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌiliwˈaka nˌaje ˌakaˈapa kiˈapo hˈiki.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˌunifuˈata kwa mˈojo wˈote, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌeɲe miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ambˈaje ˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈisri ˌatakˌajeˈona ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌoahˈidi kwa kiˈapo kwa ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌisipokˈuwa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune, mkenˈizi, na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, kwa sabˈabu wˌalimfuˈata bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˈote..|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌiliwˈaka ðˈidi ja wˌaisraˈeli na ˌakawafˈaɲa wˌataŋɡetˈaŋɡe katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, mpˈaka kizˈazi tʃˈote tʃa wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa maˈovu mbˈele jˌake kˌimeˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
nˌaɲi ˈm̩ko hˈapa, uzˈao wa wˌeɲe ðˈambi, mkˌisimamˈia mahˈali pa bˈaba zˈenu na mkimfˈaɲa bwˈana kˌuwakˌasirikˈia wˌaisraˈeli hˌata zaˈidi.|0
kˌama mkˌiɡeˈuka na mkiˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata, ˌatawaˈatʃa tˈena wˈatu hˈawa wˈote ɟaŋɡwˈani, na mtakˈuwa sabˈabu ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˌakamɟˈia mˈose na kˌumwambˈia, tˌuŋɡalitˈaka kuɟˈeŋɡa mazˈizi hˈapa kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈuɡo jˈetu na mˈiɟi kwa aɟˈili ja wˌanawˈake wˈetu na watˈoto.|0
lakˈini sˌisi tˈuko tajˈari kˌutʃukˈua silˈaha zˈetu na kˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli mpˈaka tˌutakˌapowalˈeta mahˈali pˈao. wakˈati hˈuo wˌanawˈake wˈetu na watˈoto wˌataˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, kwa aɟˈili ja ulˈinzi ðˈidi ja weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌatutarˈudi ɲumbˈani mwˈetu mpˈaka kˈila mwˌisraˈeli ˌapokˈee urˈiθi wˈake.|0
hˌatutˌapokˈea urˈiθi wowˈote pamˈoɟa nˌao ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani, kwa sabˈabu urˈiθi wˈetu ˌumekˈuɟa kwˈetu upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, kˌama mtafˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili, kˌama mtˌaɟivˈika silˈaha mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
na kˌama nˈiɲi ɲˈote mtakwˈenda mmˌeɟivˈika silˈaha ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani mbˈele za bwˈana mpˈaka ˈawe ˌamewˌafukˈuza adˈui zˌake mbˈele zˈake.|0
hˌadi wakˈati ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˌapokˈuwa ˌimeʃˈindwa mbˈele za bwˈana, ndˈipo mtawˈeza kurˈudi na kˌuwa hˈuru kutˈoka maʃˈarti jˈenu kwa bwˈana na ˌisraˈeli. nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌitakˈuwa mˈilki jˈenu mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
lakˈini mkiʃˈindwa kufˈaɲa hˈili, mtakˈuwa mnatˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana; nˌaɲi kuwˈeni na hakˈika kˌuwa ðˈambi jˈenu ˌitawapˈata.|0
ɟeŋɡˈeni mˈiɟi kwa aɟˈili ja wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˈenu, na mazˈizi kwa aɟˈili ja mbˈuzi na kondˈoo zˈenu, lakˈini faɲˈeni jˈale mlˌijoahˈidi.|0
waɡˈadi na wˌareubˈeni wˌakamwambˈia mˈose, sˌisi wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako tˌutafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana wˈetu ˌanavjˌotuaɡˈiza.|0
watˈoto na wˌake zˈetu, makˈundi ja mbˈuzi na kondˈoo, na makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe zˈetu, wˌatabˈaki hˈapa katˌika mˈiɟi ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
lakˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu, kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌalijevˈaa silˈaha za vˈita, wˌatavˈuka ŋɡˈambo kˌupiɡˈana mbˈele za bwˈana, sˈawa kˌama bwˈana wˈetu ˌanavjosˈema.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kuhˈusu wˌao kwa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za mˌakabˈila ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaambˈia, ikˈiwa waɡˈadi na wˌareubˈeni, kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌalijevˈaa silˈaha za vˈita, ˌatavˈuka jordˈani pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi mbˈele za bwˈana, bˌasi wakˈati mtˌakapˌoiʃˈinda ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijˈoko mbˈele jˈenu, wapˈeni ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi kˌama mˈilki jˈao.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌawatavˈuka pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa silˈaha za vˈita, lazˈima wˌakubˈali kˌupokˈea mˈilki jˈao pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
waɡˈadi na wˌareubˈeni wˌakaɟˈibu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌatafˈaɲa lˈile bwˈana ˌalilosˈema.|0
tˌutavˈuka mbˈele za bwˈana kˌuiŋɡˈia kˌanaˈani tukˈiwa tˌumevˈaa silˈaha za vˈita, lakˈini mˈali tˌutakˌajoirˈiθi ˌitakˈuwa ŋɡˈambo hˌii ja jordˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˈapa waɡˈadi, wˌareubˈeni, na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase mwˈana wa josˈefu ufˈalme wa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, na ufˈalme wa ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈake, na ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌowazuŋɡˈuka.|0
waɡˈadi wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa dibˈoni, ˌatarˈoθi, ˌaroˈeri.|0
ˈatroθ ʃofˈani, jazˈeri, joɡbˈeha.|0
bˈeθ nˈimra na bˈeθ harˈani kˌama mˈiɟi ˌilijˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa ŋɡˈome, tˈena wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mazˈizi kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi jˈao ja mbˈuzi na kondˈoo.|0
nˌao wˌareubˈeni wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja mˈiɟi ja heʃbˈoni, ˌeleˈale na kˌiriˌaθaˈimu.|0
pˈia nˈebo na bˈaal meˈoni maɟˈina ja hˈijo mˈiɟi jˌalibˌadilˈiʃwa na sˈibma. mˈiɟi wˌalijˌoiɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja wˌaliˈipa maɟˈina.|0
wazˈao wa makˈiri mwˈana wa manˈase wˌalikwˈenda ɡˌileˈadi, wˌakaitˈeka ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuwafukˈuza wˌaamˈori wˌaliokˈuwa hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakawˈapa wˌamakˈiri, wazˈao wa manˈase, ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi, nˌao wˌakakˈaa hˌuko.|0
jaˈiri, m̩zˈao wa manˈase, ˌakatˈeka makˈao jˈao, ˌakajaˈita hˈawoθ jaˈiri.|0
nˌaje nˈoba ˌakatˈeka kenˈaθi na makˈao jˌalijˌoizuŋɡˈuka, ˌakajaˈita nˈoba kwa ɟˈina lˈake.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vitˈuo katˌika safˈari ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipotˈoka mˈisri kwa vikˈosi tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wa mˈose na arˈoni.|0
kwa aɡˈizo la bwˈana, mˈose ˌaliwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu ja vitˈuo katˌika safˈari jˈao. hˈivi ndˈivjo vitˈuo katˌika safˈari jˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalisafˈiri kutˈoka rˌamesˈesi katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata pasˈaka. wˌalitembˈea kwa ˌuɟasˈiri wˈazi mbˈele ja wamˈisri wˈote.|0
wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakizˈika wˌazalˈiwa wˌao wa kwˈanza wˈote, ambˈao bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaˈua kˌatikˈati jˈao, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈeta hukˈumu ɟˌuːja miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliondˈoka rˌamesˈesi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko sukˈoθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka sukˈoθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko eθˈamu, pembˈeni ˌm̩wa ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
wˌakaondˈoka eθˈamu, wˌakaɡeˈuka wˌakarˈudi pˈi hˌahirˈoθi, hˌadi mˌaʃarˈiki ja bˈaal sefˈoni, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi jˈao karˈibu na miɡdˈoli.|0
wˌakaondˈoka pˈi hˌahirˈoθi wˌakapˈita kˌatikˈati ja bahˈari mpˈaka ɟaŋɡwˈani, na baˌada ja kˌusafˈiri kwa sˈiku tˈatu katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la eθˈamu, wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mˈara.|0
wˌakaondˈoka mˈara wˌakaˈenda elˈimu, mahˈali ambˈapo pˌalikˈuwa na tʃemtʃˈemi kˈumi na mbˈili na mitˈende sabˈini, hˌuko wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka elˈimu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kˈando ja bahˈari ja ʃˈamu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini.|0
wˌakaondˈoka katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko dˈofka.|0
wˌakaondˈoka dˈofka, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko alˈuʃi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka alˈuʃi, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi rˌefidˈimu, mahˈali ambˈapo hˌapakˈuwa na mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu kˈuɲua.|0
wˌakaondˈoka rˌefidˈimu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai.|0
wˌakaondˈoka katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sinˈai na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko kˈibroθ hˌataˈava.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kˈibroθ hˌataˈava na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko hˌaserˈoθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka hˌaserˈoθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko rˈiθma.|0
wˌakaondˈoka rˈiθma na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko rˈimon perˈesi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka rˈimon perˈesi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko lˈibna.|0
wˌakaondˈoka lˈibna na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko rˈisa.|0
wˌakaondˈoka rˈisa na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko kˌehelˈaθa.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kˌehelˈaθa na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kwˈeɲe mlˈima ʃefˈeri.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe mlˈima ʃefˈeri na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko harˈada.|0
wˌakaondˈoka harˈada na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mˌakelˈoθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka mˌakelˈoθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko tahˈaθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka tahˈaθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko tˈera.|0
wˌakaondˈoka tˈera na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mˈiθka.|0
wˌakaondˈoka mˈiθka na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko haʃmˈona.|0
wˌakaondˈoka haʃmˈona na kupˈiɡa kˈambi mˌoserˈoθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka mˌoserˈoθi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko bˈene jakˈani.|0
wˌakaondˈoka bˈene jakˈani na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko hˈor hˌaɡidɡˈadi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka hˈor hˌaɡidɡˈadi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko jotbˈaθa.|0
wˌakaondˈoka jotbˈaθa na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko abrˈona.|0
wˌakaondˈoka abrˈona na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko esˈion ɡebˈeri.|0
wˌakaondˈoka esˈion ɡebˈeri na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko kadˈeʃi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kadˈeʃi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kwˈeɲe mlˈima hˈori, mpakˈani ˌm̩wa edˈomu.|0
kwa ˈamri ja bwˈana, kuhˈani arˈoni ˌalipˈanda mlˈima hˈori, mahˈali ˌalipofˈia katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa tˈano, mwˈaka wa ˌarobaˈini baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
arˈoni ˌalikˈufa ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈori akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininatˈatu.|0
mfˈalme mkˌanaˈani wa arˈadi, ambˈaje ˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko neɡˈebu ja kˌanaˈani, ˌakasikˈia kwˌamba wˌaisraˈeli wˌanakˈuɟa.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe mlˈima hˈori na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko salmˈona.|0
wˌakaondˈoka salmˈona, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko punˈoni.|0
wˌakaondˈoka punˈoni, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko obˈoθi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka obˈoθi, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ˈije ˌabarˈimu, mˌipakˈani ˌm̩wa moˈabu.|0
wˌakaondˈoka ˈije ˌabarˈimu, wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko dˈibon ɡˈadi.|0
wˌakaondˈoka dˈibon ɡˈadi na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ˈalmon dˌiblaθaˈimu.|0
wˌakaondˈoka ˈalmon dˌiblaθaˈimu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika milˈima ja ˌabarˈimu, karˈibu na nˈebo.|0
wˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe milˈima ja ˌabarˈimu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare ja moˈabu, kˈando ja jordˈani ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko.|0
hˌuko kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare za moˈabu wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi kˌandokˈando ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, kˌuanzˈia bˈeθ jˌeʃimˈoθi mpˈaka ˈabel ʃitˈimu.|0
katˌika tˌambarˈare za moˈabu kˈando ja jordˈani kˌuvukˈia jerˈiko, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapovˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia kˌanaˈani.|0
wˌafukuzˈeni wakˈazi wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi ilˈijo mbˈele jˈenu. hˌaribˈuni sanˈamu zˈao zˈote za kutʃˈoŋɡwa, na sanˈamu zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa kˌujejˈuʃa tʃˈuma, na kˌupabomˈoa mahˈali pˈao pa ibˈada.|0
mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo na kukˈaa hˌuko, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewapˈeni nˈiɲi kˌuimilˈiki.|0
mtˌaiɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo kwa kupˈiɡa kˈura, kˌufuatˈana na kˈoo zˈenu. kwa kˈundi kˈubwa zaˈidi tˈoa urˈiθi mkˈubwa zaˈidi, na kwa kˈundi dˈoɡo zaˈidi urˈiθi mdˈoɡo zaˈidi. tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃˌowaˌaŋɡukˈia kwa kˈura kˌitakˈuwa tʃˈao. mtˌaiɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌufuatˈana na mˌakabˈila ja bˈabu zˈenu.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌamkuwˌafukˈuza weɲˈeɟi wˌakaˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, wˈale mtˌakaˌowaruhˈusu wabˈaki wˌatakˈuwa kˌama sindˈano kwˈeɲe mˈatʃo jˈenu na miˈiba kwˈenu kˈila upˈande. wˌatawˌasumbˈua katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mtˌakajoˈiʃi.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitawatˈenda nˈiɲi kˈile ambˈatʃo nˌimepˈaŋɡa kˌuwatˈenda wˈao..|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
wˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌitaɡawˈaɲua kwˈenu kˌama urˈiθi ˌitakˈuwa na mipˈaka ˌifuatˈajo.|0
upˈande wˈenu wa kusˈini ˌutaɟˌumuˈiʃa sehˈemu ja ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini kˌufuˈata mpˈaka wa edˈomu. upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki mpˈaka wˈenu wa kusˈini ˌutaanzˈia mwˈiʃo wa bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi.|0
katˈiza kusˈini ˌm̩wa pˈito la ˌakrabˈimu, ˌendelˈea mpˈaka sˈini na kwˈenda kusˈini ja kˈadeʃ barnˈea. kˈiʃa mpˈaka hˈuo ˌutaˈenda hˌadi hˈasar adˈari hˌadi azmˈoni.|0
mpˈaka wˈenu wa mˌaɣarˈibi ˌutakˈuwa bahˈari ja kˈati. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa mpˈaka wˈenu upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
kwa mpˈaka wˈenu wa kˌaskazˈini, wekˈeni alˈama kˌuanzˈia bahˈari ja kˈati hˌadi mlˈima hˈori.|0
na kutˈoka mlˈima hˈori hˌadi pˈito la hamˈaθi. kˈiʃa mpˈaka ˌutaˈenda hˌadi sedˈadi.|0
kˌuendelˈea hˌadi zifrˈoni, na kˌuiʃˈia hˈasar enˈani. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa mpˈaka wˈenu upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
kwa mpˈaka wˈenu wa mˌaʃarˈiki, wekˈeni alˈama kˌuanzˈia hˈasar enˈani hˌadi ʃefˈamu.|0
mpˈaka ˌutaˌelekˈea kusˈini kˌuanzˈia ʃefˈamu hˌadi rˈibla upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wa aˈini, na kˌuendelˈea kwˈeɲe mˌiterˈemko mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa bahˈari ja kˌinerˈeθi.|0
kˈiʃa mpˈaka ˌutaʃˈuka kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩to jordˈani na kˌuiʃˈia katˌika bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi.  hˌii ˌitakˈuwa ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, ikˈiwa na mipˈaka jˌake kˈila upˈande..|0
mˈose ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli: ɡˌawaɲˈeni ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kwa kˈura kˌama urˈiθi. bwˈana ˌameaɡˈiza kwˌamba ˌitolˈewe kwa jˈale mˌakabˈila tˈisa na nˈusu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ɟamˈaa ja kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, kabˈila la ɡˈadi, na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌamekwˌiʃapokˈea urˈiθi wˈao.|0
hˈaja mˌakabˈila mawˈili na nˈusu wˌamekwˌiʃapokˈea urˈiθi wˌao upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wa jordˈani ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko, kˌuelekˈea mawˈio ja ɟˈua.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈatu ambˈao wˌatakˌusaidˈia kˌuɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌama urˈiθi: ˌeleazˈari kuhˈani na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni.|0
tˈena ˌuteˈue kˌioŋɡˈozi mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila kˌusaidˈia kˌuiɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina jˈao: kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune, kutˈoka kabˈila la jˈuda.|0
ʃˌemuˈeli mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi, kutˈoka kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni.|0
ˌelidˈadi mwˈana wa kislˈoni, kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini.|0
bˈuki mwˈana wa jˈoɡli, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la dˈani.|0
hˌaniˈeli mwˈana wa efˈodi, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la manˈase mwˈana wa josˈefu.|0
kˌemuˈeli mwˈana wa ʃiftˈani, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu mwˈana wa josˈefu.|0
ˌelisafˈani mwˈana wa parnˈaki, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni.|0
pˌaltiˈeli mwˈana wa azˈani, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌisakˈari.|0
ˌahihˈudi mwˈana wa ʃelˈomi, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la aʃˈeri.|0
pˌedahˈeli mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi, kˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka kabˈila la naftˈali.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu ambˈao bwˈana ˌaliamˈuru wˌaɡawˈaɲe urˈiθi kwa wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare ja moˈabu, kˈando ja ˈm̩to jordˈani kˌuvukˈia jerˈiko.|0
wˌaaɡˈize wˌaisraˈeli kuwˈapa walˈawi mˈiɟi ja kuˈiʃi kutˈoka urˈiθi ambˈao wˌaisraˈeli wˌataˌumilˈiki. wˈape mˌaenˈeo ja malˈiʃo kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hˈijo mˈiɟi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatakˈuwa na mˈiɟi ja kuˈiʃi na mˌaenˈeo ja malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡˈombe zˈao, mbˈuzi, kondˈoo na mifˈuɡo jˈao miŋɡˈine jˈote.|0
mˌaenˈeo ja malˈiʃo kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mˈiɟi hˈijo ambˈajo mtawˈapa walˈawi jˌataenˈea mˈita mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa hamsˈini kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ukˈuta wa mˈiɟi.|0
ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, pˈima mˈita mˌiatˈisa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, upˈande wa kusˈini mˈita mˌiatˈisa, upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi mˈita mˌiatˈisa, na upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini mˈita mˌiatˈisa, na ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˈuwa kˌatikˈati. enˈeo hˈili lˌitakˈuwa lˈao kwa aɟˈili ja malˈiʃo.|0
mˈiɟi sˈita mtˌakajowˈapa walˈawi ˌitakˈuwa ja mˌakimbilˈio, ambˈajo ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌemuˈua mwenzˈake awˈeza kˌukimbilˈia hˈumo. zaˈidi ja hˈijo, wapˈeni mˈiɟi miŋɡˈine ˌarobaˈini na miwˈili.|0
kwa ɟˈumla ˌinawapˈasa kuwˈapa walˈawi mˈiɟi ˌarobaˈini na minˈane, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo ja malˈiʃo jˈao.|0
mˈiɟi ambˈajo mtawˈapa walˈawi kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo wˌaisraˈeli wˌanamilˈiki ˌitatolˈewa kwa ˌuwiˈano wa urˈiθi wa kˈila kabˈila. tʃukˈua mˈiɟi mˈiŋɡi kutˈoka lˈile kabˈila lˈeɲe mˈiɟi mˈiŋɡi, lakˈini ˌutʃukˈue mˈiɟi mitʃˈatʃe kutˈoka kwa kabˈila lˈile lˈeɲe mˈiɟi mitʃˈatʃe.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
sˈema na wˌaisraˈeli, ˌuwaambˈie: mtˌakapovˈuka jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia kˌanaˈani.|0
tʃˌaɡuˈeni baˈaði ja mˈiɟi ˈiwe mˈiɟi jˈenu ja mˌakimbilˈio, ambˈajo ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌameˈua mwenzˈake bˌila kˌukusudˈia awˈeza kˌukimbilˈia hˈumo.|0
ˌitakˈuwa mahˈali pa kˌukimbilˈia kutˈoka mlipˈiza kisˈasi, ˌili kwˌamba ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeʃtakˈiwa kwa mˌauˈaɟi asˈife kˈabla ja kˌuɟitetˈea mbˈele ja mkutˈano.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii sˈita mtˌakajˌoitˈoa ˌitakˈuwa mˈiɟi jˈenu ja mˌakimbilˈio.|0
mtatˈoa mˈiɟi mitˈatu ŋɡˈambo hˌii ja jordˈani na mˈiɟi miŋɡˈine mitˈatu upˈande wa kˌanaˈani kˌama mˈiɟi ja mˌakimbilˈio.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii sˈita ˌitakˈuwa mahˈali pa mˌakimbilˈio kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli, waɡˈeni na wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˌanaoˈiʃi kˌatikˈati jˈenu, ˌili kwˌamba ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌameˈua ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia awˈeze kˌukimbilˈia hˈumo.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimpˈiɡa mwenzˈake kwa tʃˈuma nˌaje ˈm̩tu hˈujo akˈafa, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni mˌuuˈaɟi; mˌuuˈaɟi ʃˈarti ˌatauˈawa.|0
ˌau kˌama ˈm̩tu anˈalo ɟˈiwe mkonˈoni mwˈake ambˈalo lawˈeza kuˈua, nˌaje ˌakampˈiɡa mwenzˈake akˈafa, jˌeje ni mˌuuˈaɟi; mˌuuˈaɟi hˈujo ʃˈarti ˌatauˈawa.|0
ˌau kˌama ˈm̩tu ˈana tʃˈombo tʃa ˈm̩ti mkonˈoni mwˈake ambˈatʃo tʃawˈeza kuˈua, nˌaje ˌakampˈiɡa mwenzˈake akˈafa, jˌeje ni mˌuuˈaɟi; mˌuuˈaɟi hˈujo ʃˈarti ˌatauˈawa.|0
mlipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu ˌatamuˈua mˌuuˈaɟi; wakˈati ˌakikutˈana nˈaje, ˌatamuˈua.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˈana tʃˈuki ja sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi na mwenzˈake ˌakamsukˈuma ˌau ˌakamtupˈia kˈitu kwa kˌukusudˈia nˌaje akˈafa.|0
ˌau ikˈiwa katˌika ˌuadˈui ˌakampˈiɡa ŋɡˈumi nˌaje akˈafa, ˈm̩tu jˈule ʃˈarti ˌatauˈawa; jˌeje ni mˌuuˈaɟi. mlipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu ˌatamuˈua mˌuuˈaɟi ˌatakˌapokutˈana nˈaje.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimsukˈuma mwenzˈiwe ɣafˈula pasˈipo tʃˈuki, ˌau kˌumtupˈia kˈitu pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia.|0
ˌau, pasˈipo kumwˈona, ˌakimwˌaŋɡuʃˈia ɟˈiwe ambˈalo lawˈeza kˌumuˈua nˌaje akˈafa, bˌasi kwa kˌuwa hakˈuwa adˈui jˌake nˌaje hˌakukˌusudˈia kˌumuumˈiza.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lazˈima lˌiamˈue kˈati jˌake na mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu kˌufuatˈana na ʃerˈia hˈizi.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko ni lazˈima limlˈinde jˈule ˌanajˌeʃtakˈiwa kuˈua kutˈoka kwa mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu, na kˌumrudˈiʃa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio ˌalikokˈuwa ˌamekˌimbilˈia. lazˈima akˈae hˈumo mpˈaka ˌatakˌapokˈufa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈakwa mafˈuta mˌatakatˈifu.|0
lakˈini kˌama mʃtakˈiwa ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja mipˈaka ja ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio ambˈao ˌamekˌimbilˈia.|0
na mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu ˌakamkˈuta ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu ˌanawˈeza kˌumuˈua mʃtakˈiwa hˈujo bˌila kˌuwa na hatˈia ja kuˈua.|0
mʃtakˈiwa lazˈima akˈae katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wa mˌakimbilˈio mpˈaka ˌatakˌapokˈufa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu; ˌatarˈudi tu kwˈeɲe mˈali jˌake baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo kanˈuni za ʃerˈia zˌitakˌazohˌitaɟˈiwa kwˈenu na katˌika vizˈazi vjˈenu viɟˈavjo, popˈote mtˌakapoˈiʃi.|0
jejˈote ˌanajeˈua ˈm̩tu ˌatauˈawa kˌama mˌuuˈaɟi ikˈiwa tu kˈuna ˌuʃuhˈuda wa mˌaʃahˈidi. lakˈini hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeuˈawa kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa ʃahˈidi mmˈoɟa tˈu.|0
ˌusikubˈali fidˈia jojˈote ja kˌuokˈoa uhˈai wa mˌuuˈaɟi ambˈaje ˌanastahˈili kˈufa. ˈm̩tu hˈujo hakˈika lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
ˌusikubˈali fidˈia ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌamekˌimbilˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio na kˌumruhˈusu kurˈudi kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kˈabla ja kˈifo tʃa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu.|0
msˌiinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˈiʃi. ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu hˌunaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi, na ˌupatanˈiʃo hˌauwˌezekˈani kˌufaɲˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo dˈamu ˌimemwˈaɡwa, ˌisipokˈuwa tu kwa dˈamu ja jˈule ˌalijˌeimwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
msˌiinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˈiʃi, ambˈajo nˌami nˌinakˈaa, kwa kˌuwa mˈimi, bwˈana, nˌinakˈaa kˌatikˈati ja wˌaisraˈeli..|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja ukˈoo wa ɡˌileˈadi mwˈana wa makˈiri, mwˈana wa manˈase, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌametˈoka katˌika kˈoo za wazˈao wa josˈefu, wˌalikˈuɟa na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza mbˈele ja mˈose na vˌioŋɡˈozi, wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wˌakasˈema, bwˈana ˌalipˌomwamˈuru bwˈana wˈaŋɡu kuwˈapa wˌaisraˈeli ˈn̩tʃi kˌama urˈiθi kwa kˈura, ˌalikˌuamˈuru kutˈoa urˈiθi wa ndˈuɡu jˈetu sˌelofehˈadi kwa bˈinti zˈake.|0
sˈasa ikˈiwa wˌataolˈewa na wˈatu wa mˌakabˈila meŋɡˈine ja kˌiisraˈeli, ˌitakˈuwa kwˌamba urˈiθi wˌao ˌutaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka urˈiθi wa mabˈabu zˈetu na kˌuoŋɡˈezwa katˌika urˈiθi wa kabˈila ambˈalo dˈada hˈao wˌameolˈewa. kwa hˈijo sehˈemu ja urˈiθi tˌulijˌoɡawˈiwa ˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈetu.|0
wakˈati mwˈaka wa jubˈile kwa wˌaisraˈeli ˌutafˈika, urˈiθi wˌao ˌutaoŋɡˈezwa kwa lˈile kabˈila ambˈalo wˌameolˈewa, na mˈali jˈao ˌitaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka urˈiθi wa kabˈila la mabˈabu zˈetu.|0
ndˈipo kwa aɡˈizo la bwˈana mˈose ˌakatˈoa ˈamri ˌifuatˈajo kwa wˌaisraˈeli: kˈile wazˈao wa kabˈila la josˈefu wˌanatʃosˈema ni kwˈeli.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌanavjˌoamˈuru kwa bˈinti za sˌelofehˈadi: wˌanawˈeza kˌuolˈewa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote wˌampendˈaje, mrˈadi tu wˌaolˈewe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈoo za kabˈila za bˈaba jˈao.|0
hakˈuna urˈiθi katˌika ˌisraˈeli ˌutakˌaohamˈiʃwa kutˈoka kabˈila mˈoɟa kwˈenda kabˈila ɟiŋɡˈine, kwa kˌuwa kˈila mwˌisraˈeli ˌatatˈunza ˈarði ja kabˈila lˈake ˌalijˌoirˈiθi kutˈoka kwa bˈaba zˈake.|0
kˈila bˈinti ˌatakˌajerˈiθi ˈarði katˌika kabˈila lolˈote la ˌisraˈeli ni lazˈima ˌaolˈewe na ˈm̩tu kutˈoka kabˈila na ukˈoo wa bˈaba jˈake, ˌili kˈila mwˌisraˈeli ˌamilˈiki urˈiθi wa bˈaba zˈake.|0
hakˈuna urˈiθi ˌuwezˈao kˌuhamˈiʃwa kutˈoka kabˈila mˈoɟa kwˈenda kabˈila ɟiŋɡˈine, kwa kˌuwa kˈila kabˈila la ˌisraˈeli lˌitatˈunza ˈn̩tʃi lˌinajorˈiθi.|0
kwa hˈijo bˈinti za sˌelofehˈadi wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mˈose.|0
bˈinti za sˌelofehˈadi, ambˈao ni mˈahla, tˈirsa, hˈoɡla, mˈilka na nˈoa, wˌakaolˈewa na waˈume, wˈana wa ndˈuɡu za bˈaba jˈao.|0
wˌaliolˈewa ndˈani ja kˈoo za wazˈao wa manˈase mwˈana wa josˈefu, na urˈiθi wˌao ˌukabˈaki katˌika ukˈoo na kabˈila la bˈaba jˈao.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaaɡˈizo na maʃˈarti ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa wˌaisraˈeli kˌupitˈia mˈose katˌika tˌambarˈare za moˈabu, karˈibu na jordˈani ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko.|0
hˈaja ni manˈeno mˈose ˌalijˌojasˈema kwa ˌisraˈeli jˈote ɟaŋɡwˈani mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, ambˈajo ˈiko arˈaba, ˌinajˌokabˌiliˈana na sˈufu, kˈati ja parˈani na tofˈeli, labˈani, hˌaserˈoθi na dˌizahˈabu.|0
ni mwˈendo wa sˈiku kˈumi na mˈoɟa kutˈoka horˈebu kwa ɲɟˈia ja mlˈima seˈiri mpˈaka kˈadeʃ barnˈea..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌarobaˈini, sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, mˈose ˌaliwˌataŋɡazˈia wˌaisraˈeli jˈale jˈote bwˈana ˌalijˌomwamˈuru kˌuwahˈusu.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa baˌada ja kumʃˈinda sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala heʃbˈoni, na pˈia hˌuko edrˈei ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemʃˈinda ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala hˌuko ˌaʃtarˈoθi.|0
hˌuko mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, mˈose ˌaliˈanza kˌuiˌelezˈea ʃerˈia hˌii, ˌakisˈema.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalisˈema nˌasi hˌuko horˈebu, mmekˈaa vja kutˈoʃa katˌika mlˈima hˈuu.|0
vuɲɟˈeni kˈambi, msˈoŋɡe mbˈele kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja wˌaamˈori; nendˈeni kwa wˈatu wˈote ambˈao ni mˌaɟirˈani wa arˈaba, katˌika milˈima, upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi tʃˈini ja vilˈima, katˌika neɡˈebu na kˌandokˈando ja pwˈani, mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani hˌadi lˌebanˈoni, na kufˈika ˈm̩to mkˈubwa frˈati.|0
tazˈama, nˌimewˈapa nˈiɲi ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. ˌiŋɡiˈeni mkˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliˈapa kˌuwa ˌaŋɡaliwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo, pamˈoɟa na vizˈazi vjˈao baˌada jˈao.|0
wakˈati ˈule nˌiliwˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi mmekˈuwa mzˈiɡo mzˈito sˈana kwˈaŋɡu kˌuwatʃukˈua pˈeke jˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌameoŋɡˈeza hesˈabu jˈenu, hˈivi kwˌamba lˈeo nˈiɲi ni wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani.|0
nˌaje bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu na ˌawaoŋɡˈeze mˈara ˈelfu na kˌuwabarˈiki kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi.|0
lakˈini mˌimi nˌitawezˈaɟe kubˈeba mˌatatˈizo jˈenu, na mizˈiɡo jˈenu, na maɡˈomvi jˈenu pˈeke jˈaŋɡu.|0
tʃˌaɡuˈeni baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima, wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu na wˌanaˌoheʃimˈika kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila lˈenu, nˌami nˌitawawˈeka ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
mlˌiniɟˈibu, ʃaˈuri ˌulilˌolitˈoa ni zˈuri.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliwˌatʃukˈua wˌanaˈume vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakabˈila jˈenu, wˌeɲe hekˈima na wˌanaˌoheʃimˈika, nˌami nˌikawˌateˈua wˈawe na mamlˈaka ɟˈuu jˈenu kˌama mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu, wa mamˈia, wa hamsˈini, na wa makˈumi, na kˌama mˌaafˈisa wa mˌakabˈila.|0
nˌami wakˈati ˈule nˌikawˌaaɡˈiza wˌaamˈuzi wˈenu: sˌikilizˈeni maɡˈomvi kˈati ja ndˈuɡu zˈenu na mwamˈue kwa hˈaki, hˌata kˌama ʃaˈuri ni kˈati ja ndˈuɡu wa kˌiisraˈeli, ˌau kˈati ja mmˈoɟa wa ndˈuɡu wa kˌiisraˈeli na mɡˈeni.|0
msˌioɲˈeʃe ˌupendelˈeo katˌika mˌaamˈuzi; wˌasikˌilizˈeni wˈote sˌawasˈawa, wadˈoɡo kwa wakˈubwa. msˌimwoɡˈope ˈm̩tu jejˈote, kwa kˌuwa hukˈumu ni ja mˈuŋɡu. mnˌiletˈee mˌimi ʃaˈuri lolˈote lilˈilo ɡˈumu sˈana kwˈenu, nˌami nˌitalˌisikilˈiza.|0
nˌami wakˈati ˈule nˌiliwˌaambˈia kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo mŋɡefˈaɲa.|0
kˈiʃa, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalivjˌotuamˈuru, tˌuliondˈoka kutˈoka horˈebu na kwˈenda kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja wˌaamˈori, kˌupitˈia ɟˈaŋɡwa lˈile kˈubwa lˈote la kutˈiʃa, lˈile mlˌiloliˈona, nˌasi tˌukafˈika kˈadeʃ barnˈea.|0
kˈiʃa nˌiliwˌaambˈia, mmefˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja wˌaamˈori, ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌanatˈupa.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa ˈn̩tʃi. pandˈeni mkˌaimilˈiki kˌama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌalivjˌowaambˈia. msˌioɡˈope, wˈala msikˈate tamˈaa.|0
ndˈipo nˈiɲi ɲˈote mkˌaniɟˈia na kusˈema, tˌupelˈeke wˈatu wˌatutˌaŋɡulˈie kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi kwa aɟˈili jˈetu, na kˌutuletˈea tˌaarˈifa kuhˈusu ɲɟˈia tˌutakˌajopˈita, na mˈiɟi tˌutakˌajoˌiendˈea.|0
wˈazo hˌilo lˌiliˌonekˈana zˈuri kwˈaŋɡu; kwa hˈijo nˌiliwˌatʃaɡˈua wˈatu wˈenu kˈumi na wawˈili, mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila.|0
wˌaliondˈoka na kukwˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, wˌakafˈika katˌika bˈonde la eʃkˈoli na kˌuipˌelelˈeza.|0
wˌakatʃukˈua baˈaði ja matˈunda ja ˈn̩tʃi, wˌakatˌuletˈea na kˌutuarˈifu, ni ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌanatˈupa.|0
lakˈini hamkˈuwa tajˈari kukwˈea, mkaˈasi ðˈidi ja ˈamri ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
mkˌanuŋɡunˈika ndˈani ja mahˈema jˈenu na kusˈema, bwˈana ˌanatˌutʃukˈia, kwa hˈijo ˌalitutˈoa mˈisri ˌili kˌututˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaamˈori kˌutuˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
twˈende wˈapi? ndˈuɡu zˈetu wˌametufˈaɲa kˈufa mˈojo. wˌanasˈema, wˈatu wa hˌuko wˈana ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na ni warˈefu kulˈiko sˌisi tulˈivjo; mˈiɟi ni mikˈubwa, jˌeɲe kˈuta zˌilizofˈika ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, tˌumewaˈona wˌaanˈaki hˌuko..|0
ndˈipo nˌikawˌaambˈia, msihˈofu, wˈala msˌiwaoɡˈope.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanajˌewatˌaŋɡulˈia, ˌatawˌapiɡanˈia, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu hˌuko mˈisri, mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu hˈasa.|0
na pˈia hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani. hˌuko mliˈona ɟˈinsi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌowatʃukˈua, kˌama bˈaba ˌamtʃukuˈavjo mwanˈawe, katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈote mlˌijoˌiendˈea mpˈaka mkafˈika mahˈali hˈapa.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈili, hˌamkumtˌeɡemˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
ambˈaje ˌaliwˌataŋɡulˈia katˌika safˈari jˈenu, kwa mˈoto usˈiku na kwa wˈiŋɡu mtʃˈana, kˌuwatˌafutˈia mahˈali pˈenu pa kupˈiɡa kˈambi na kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa ɲɟˈia mtˌakajˌoiendˈea.|0
wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipˌosikˈia lˈile mlˌilosˈema, ˌalikˌasirˈika, ˌakaˈapa, ˌakasˈema.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu wa kizˈazi hˈiki kiˈovu ˌatakˌajeˈona ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri nˌilijoˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
ˌisipokˈuwa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune. jˌeje ˌataiˈona, nˌami nitˈampa jˌeje na wazˈao wˌake ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌoikaɲˈaɡa kwa miɡˈuu, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimfuˈata bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
kwa sabˈabu jˈenu bwˈana pˈia ˌalinˌikasˌirikˈia mˈimi, ˌakasˈema, hˌutaiŋɡˈia hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi pˈia.|0
lakˈini msˌaidˈizi wˈako, joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, ˌataiŋɡˈia. m̩tˈie mˈojo, kwa sabˈabu ˌatawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˌaisraˈeli kˌuirˈiθi hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˈale watˈoto ambˈao mlˌiwasˈema wˌaŋɡelˌitʃukulˈiwa matˈeka, jaˈani watˈoto wˈenu ambˈao bˈado hˌawaɟˈui ɟˈema na bˈaja, wˌataiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. nˌitawˈapa hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wˌataˌimilˈiki.|0
bˌali nˈiɲi ɡˌeukˈeni, mwondˈoke kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani kwa kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ja bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
ndˈipo mkˌaniɟˈibu, tˌumemtˈenda bwˈana ðˈambi. tˌutakwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalivjˌotuamˈuru. hˈivjo kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌakatʃukˈua silˈaha zˈake, hˈuku mkˌifikˈiri kˌuwa ni rahˈisi kukwˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌalinˌiambˈia, wˌaambˈie, msipˈande kˌupiɡˈana, kwa sabˈabu sˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi. mtaʃˈindwa na adˈui zˈenu..|0
hˈivjo nˌiliwˌaambˈia, lakˈini hˌamkutˈaka kˌusikˈia. mliˈasi ðˈidi ja ˈamri ja bwˈana, na katˌika kibˈuri tʃˈenu mliˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima.|0
wˌaamˈori ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika vilˈima hˈivjo wˌaliinˈuka ðˈidi jˈenu, wˌakawˌafukˈuza kˌama kˈundi la ɲˈuki wˌakiwapˈiɡa ɲɟˈia jˈote ja seˈiri mpˈaka hˈorma.|0
mlirˈudi na kulˈia mbˈele za bwˈana, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌakusˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈenu, wˈala hˌakuwaɟˈali.|0
kˈiʃa tˌukaɡeˈuka ɲˈuma na kˌusafˈiri kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani kwa ɲɟˈia ˌinajˌoelekˈea bahˈari ja ʃˈamu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoniˌelekˈeza. kwa mˈuda mrˈefu tˌulitembˈea kˌuzuŋɡˈuka vilˈima katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja seˈiri.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia.|0
ˌumetembˈea kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hˌii ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima kwa mˈuda wa kutˈoʃa; sˈasa ɡˌeukˈia kˌaskazˈini.|0
wˈape wˈatu mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja: ˈm̩ko karˈibu kupˈita kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi ja ndˈuɡu zˈako ambˈao ni wazˈao wa esˈau, ambˈao wˌanaˈiʃi seˈiri. wˌatawˌaoɡˈopa, lakˈini ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu.|0
msˌiwatʃokˈoze kwa vˈita kwa maˈana sˌitawˈapa nˈiɲi sehˈemu jojˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, hˌata sehˈemu ja kutˈoʃa kuwˈeka wˈajo wˈenu ɟˈuu jˈake. nimˈempa esˈau ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja seˈiri kˌama jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
mtˌawalˈipa fˈeða kwa tʃakˈula mtˌakatʃokˈula na mˈaɟi mtˌakajokˈuɲua..|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˌabarˈiki kwa kˈazi jˈote ja mikˈono jˈenu. ˌamewalˈinda katˌika safˈari jˈenu kˌatikˈati ja ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili kˈubwa. kwa miˈaka hˌii ˌarobaˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, na hˌamkupˌuŋɡukˈiwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
bˌasi tˌulipˈita kwa ndˈuɡu zˈetu wazˈao wa esˈau ambˈao wˌanaˈiʃi seˈiri. tˌuliɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia ja arˈaba ambˈajo ˌinatokˈea elˈaθi na esˈion ɡebˈeri, tˌukasafˈiri kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ja ɟˈaŋɡwa la moˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌusiwˌasumbˈue wˌamoˈabu kwa vˈita, kwa kˌuwa sˌitawˈapa sehˈemu jojˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈao. nˌimetˈoa ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈari kwa wazˈao wa lˈoti kˌama mˈilki jˈao.|0
waˈemi wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi hˌuko hˈapo zamˈani, wˈatu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na wˈeŋɡi, warˈefu kˌama wˌaanˈaki.|0
kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌaanˈaki, hˈao pˈia wˌalikˈuwa kˌama wˌarefˈai, lakˈini wˌamoˈabu wˌaliwaˈita waˈemi.|0
wahˈori wˌaliˈiʃi seˈiri, lakˈini wazˈao wa esˈau wˌaliwˌafukˈuza. wˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza wahˈori na kukˈaa mahˈali pˈao, kˌama wˌaisraˈeli wˌalivjofˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa kˌama mˈilki jˈao..|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, sˈasa ˌondokˈeni mvˈuke bˈonde la zerˈedi. hˈivjo tˌukavˈuka bˈonde.|0
miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na minˈane ˌilipˈita ʃˈu wakˈati tˌulipˌoondˈoka kˈadeʃ barnˈea mpˈaka tˌulipovˈuka bˈonde la zerˈedi. kwa wakˈati hˈuo kˈile kizˈazi tʃˈote tʃa wˌanaˈume kˌuanzˈia wˈale wˌawezˈao kwˈenda vitˈani kˌilikˈuwa kˌimekˈufa, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaapˈia.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌuliwˌakabˈili hˌadi ˌalipˌowaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈote hˌuko kambˈini.|0
ikˈawa baˌada ja ˈm̩tu wa mwˈiʃo kˌuanzˈia wˈale wˌawezˈao kwˈenda vitˈani kˈufa.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia.|0
lˈeo ˌutapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu hˌuko ˈari.|0
ˌutakˌapokˈuɟa kwa wˌaamˈoni, msˌiwasumbˈue wˈala kˌuwatʃokˈoza kwa vˈita, kwa kˌuwa sˌitawˈapa ˈarði jojˈote ilˈijo ja wˌaamˈoni kˌuwa mˈilki jˈenu. nˌimeitˈoa kˌama mˈilki ja wazˈao wa lˈoti.|0
hˈijo pˈia ˌiliðanˈiwa kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌarefˈai wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi hˌuko, lakˈini wˌaamˈoni wˌaliwaˈita wˌazamzˈumi.|0
wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na wˈeŋɡi, warˈefu kˌama wˌaanˈaki. bwˈana ˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka mbˈele ja wˌaamˈoni, ambˈao wˌaliwˌafukˈuza na kukˈaa mahˈali pˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa wazˈao wa esˈau, ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi seˈiri, wakˈati ˌalipˌowaˌaŋɡamˈiza wahˈori watˈoke mbˈele jˈao. wˌaliwˌafukˈuza na wˌao wˌakaˈiʃi mahˈali pˈao mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
nˌao waˈavi ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika viɟˈiɟi mpˈaka ɡˈaza, wˌakaftˈori wˌaliokˈuɟa kutˈoka kaftˈori wˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza na kukˈaa mahˈali pˈao..|0
ondˈoka sˈasa na uvˈuke bˈonde la arnˈoni. tazˈama, nˌimemwˈeka mˌikonˈoni mwˈako sihˈoni mwamˈori, mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni na ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. ˈanza kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo na ˌumwiŋɡˈize katˌika vˈita.|0
sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo nˌitaˈanza kˌuwatˈia hˈofu na wˈoɡa mˌataˈifa jˈote tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu wˌawaoɡˈope nˈiɲi. wˌatakˌaposikˈia tˌaarˈifa zˈenu, wˌatatˌetemˈeka na kˌufaðaˈika kwa sabˈabu jˈenu.|0
kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la kˌedemˈoθi nˌilitˈuma waɟˈumbe wˌeɲe manˈeno ja amˈani kwa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni kusˈema.|0
tˌuruhˈusu tupˈite katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. tˌutapˈita katˌika bˌarabˈara kˈuu, hˌatutˌaɡeˈuka kuˈume wˈala kuʃˈoto.|0
tˌuuzˈie tʃakˈula tˈule na mˈaɟi tˈuɲue kwa θamˈani jˌake katˌika fˈeða. tˌuruhˈusu tu tupˈite kwa miɡˈuu.|0
kˌama wazˈao wa esˈau ambˈao wˌanaˈiʃi seˈiri na wˌamoˈabu ambˈao wˌanaˈiʃi ˈari wˌalivjˌotufaɲˈia, mpˈaka tuvˈuke jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌanatˌupatˈia.|0
lakˈini sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni ˌalikatˈaa kˌuturuhˈusu kupˈita. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalikˈuwa ˌameifˈaɲa rˈoho jˌake kˌuwa ŋɡˈumu na mˈojo wˌake kˌuwa mkaˈidi ˌili amwˈeke kwˈeɲe mikˈono jˈenu, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa sˈasa.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, tazˈama, nˌimeˈanza kuwˈapa mfˈalme sihˈoni na ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kwˈako. sˈasa anzˈeni kˌuiʃˈinda na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
wakˈati sihˈoni pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wˌalipokˈuɟa kˌukutˈana nˌasi katˌika vˈita hˌuko jahˈazi.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalimwˈeka mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu, nˌasi tˌukamwˌaŋɡamˈiza pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote.|0
kwa wakˈati ˈule tˌulitˈeka mˈiɟi jˌake jˈote na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa: wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto. hˌatukumwˈatʃa jejˈote.|0
lakˈini mifˈuɡo na ɲˈara tˌulizˌozitˈeka kutˈoka ˈile mˈiɟi tˌuliɟˌitʃukulˈia weɲˈewe.|0
kutˈoka ˌaroˈeri kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa bˈonde la arnˈoni, kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio ndˈani ja bˈonde, hˌata mpˈaka ɡˌileˈadi, hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩ɟi hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌuliokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kˌutuʃˈinda. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalitˈupa jˈote.|0
lakˈini kˌuliŋɡˈana na ˈamri ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, hˌamkuɟˌiiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jojˈote ja wˌaamˈoni, wˈala katˌika sehˈemu jojˈote ilˈijo kˌandokˈando ja ˈm̩to jabˈoki, wˈala katˌika mˈiɟi ˌilijˈoko katˌika vilˈima.|0
kˈiʃa tˌukaɡeˈuka tˌukakwˈea kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌoelekˈea baʃˈani, ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani ˌakaondˈoka na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote kˌupiɡˈana na sˌisi hˌuko edrˈei.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌusimwoɡˈope kwa kˌuwa nˌimekwˈiʃa mkabˈiði mˌikonˈoni mwˈako pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote na ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. ˌumfaɲˈie sˌawasˈawa na ˌulivjˌomfaɲˈia sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala hˌuko heʃbˈoni.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu pˈia ˌakamwˈeka ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu. tˌuliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈote, hˌakubakˈia hˌata mmˈoɟa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo tˌulitˈeka mˈiɟi jˌake jˈote. hakˈuna ˈm̩ɟi hˌata mmˈoɟa kˈati ja ˈile sitˈini ambˈao hˌatukˌuutˈeka, jaˈani enˈeo lˈote la arɡˈobu, ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˈoɡu katˌika baʃˈani.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote hˌii ˌiliɟeŋɡˈewa ŋɡˈome zˌeɲe kˈuta ndˈefu zˌeɲe malˈaŋɡo na mˌakomˈeo, pˈia kˌulikuwˈako na viɟˈiɟi vˈiŋɡi ambˈavjo hˌavikˌuɟeŋɡˈewa kˈuta.|0
tˌuliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, kˌama tˌulivjˌomfaɲˈia sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni, tˌukiˌaŋɡamˈiza kˈila ˈm̩ɟi, jaˈani wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto.|0
lakˈini waɲˈama wˈote wa kufˈuɡa pamˈoɟa na ɲˈara kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈao tˌulitʃukˈua vikˈawa vjˈetu.|0
hˈivjo kwa wakˈati hˈuo tˌukatʃukˈua kutˈoka kwa wafˈalme hˈawa wawˈili wa wˌaamˈori ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, kutˈoka bˈonde la arnˈoni mpˈaka kufˈika kwˈeɲe mlˈima hermˈoni.|0
wˌasidˈoni hˌuuˈita mlˈima hˈuo sˌiriˈoni, nˌao wˌaamˈori hˌuuˈita senˈiri..|0
tˌulitˈeka mˈiɟi jˈote kwˈeɲe uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu, ɡˌileˈadi jˈote, baʃˈani jˈote mpˈaka kufˈika salˈeka na edrˈei, mˈiɟi ja ˌutawˈala wa ˈoɡu hˌuko baʃˈani.|0
mfˈalme ˈoɡu wa baʃˈani n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌalijˌesalˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mabˈaki ja wˌarefˈai. kitˈanda tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa tʃa tʃˈuma tʃˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈisa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne. mpˈaka sˈasa kˌinawˈeza kˌuonekˈana katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌaamˈoni wa rˈaba..|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌulijˌoitˈeka wakˈati ˈule, nˌiliwˈapa kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni na ɡˈadi enˈeo lˌililˈoko kˌaskazˈini la ˌaroˈeri kˈando ja bˈonde la arnˈoni, na nˈusu ja enˈeo la milˈima ja ɡˌileˈadi, pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase nˌiliwˈapa sehˈemu ja ɡˌileˈadi ˌilijobˈaki pamˈoɟa na baʃˈani jˈote, ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa ˌutawˈala wa ˈoɡu. enˈeo lˈote la arɡˈobu katˌika baʃˈani lˌilikˈuwa lˌinaɟˌulikˈana kˌama ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌarefˈai.|0
jaˈiri, m̩zˈao wa kabˈila la manˈase, ˌalitʃukˈua enˈeo lˈote la ˈn̩tʃi ja arɡˈobu hˌadi kˌufikˈia mpˈaka wa wˌaɡeʃˈuri na wˌamaˈaka, ˌukaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈake; kwa hˈijo mpˈaka lˈeo hˌii baʃˈani ˌinaˈitwa hˈawoθ jaˈiri..|0
nikˈampa makˈiri ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
lakˈini nˌiliwˈapa wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi enˈeo kˌuanzˈia ɡˌileˈadi hˌadi bˈonde la arnˈoni kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde ˌulikˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka, kˌuelekˈea mpˈaka ˈm̩to jabˈoki, ambˈao n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa wˌaamˈoni.|0
kwa upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi mpˈaka wˌao ˌulikˈuwa jordˈani katˌika arˈaba, tˌoka zˈiwa ɡˌalilˈaja hˌadi bahˈari ja arˈaba jaˈani bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi, kwˈeɲe mˌiterˈemko ja pˈisɡa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌilikˌuamˈuru: bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamekˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌuimilˈiki. lakˈini ni lazˈima wˌanaˈume wˈenu wˈote wˌeɲe uwˈezo, wakˈiwa wˌameɟˌiandˈaa tajˈari kwa vˈita, wavˈuke ŋɡˈambo wˌakiwˌataŋɡulˈia ndˈuɡu zˈako wˌaisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini wˌake zˈenu, watˈoto wˈenu na mifˈuɡo jˈenu kwˈani naɟˈua m̩nˈajo mifˈuɡo mˈiŋɡi wˌanawˈeza kukˈaa katˌika mˈiɟi nˌilijowˈapa.|0
mpˈaka hˈapo bwˈana ˌatakˌapowˈapa ndˈuɡu zˈenu kˌupumzˈika kˌama ˌalivjowˈapa nˈiɲi, wˌao pˈia wˌamilˈiki ˈile ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa, ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani. baˌada ja hˈapo, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanawˈeza kurˈudi kwˈeɲe mˈilki nˌilijowˈapa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌilimwamˈuru joʃˈua, ˌumeɟˌionˈea kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe jˈale jˈote ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˌafaɲˈia wafˈalme hˈawa wawˈili. bwˈana ˌatazˌifaɲˈia fˈalme zˈote hˌuko mnˌakokwˈenda vˈivjo hˈivjo.|0
msˌiwaoɡˈope, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatapiɡˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌilimsˈihi bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌumemwoɲˈeʃa mtumˈiʃi wˈako ukˈuu wˈako na mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe uwˈeza. kwa kˌuwa ni mˈuŋɡu jˈupi alˈije mbiŋɡˈuni ˌau dˌuniˈani ˌanajewˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈazi na matˈendo makˈuu kˌama ˌufaɲˈajo wˈewe.|0
ˈatʃa niˈende nˌikaiˈone hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani, ˈile ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ja vilˈima na lˌebanˈoni.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu jˈenu bwˈana ˌalinˌikasˌirikˈia na hˌakutˈaka kˌunisˌikilˈiza. bwˈana ˌalinˌiambˈia, hˌilo latˈoʃa; ˌusisˈeme nˌami ɟˈambo hˈili tˈena.|0
kwˈea ɟˌuːja kilˈele tʃa pˈisɡa ˌuaŋɡalˈie mˌaɣarˈibi, kˌaskazˈini, kusˈini na mˌaʃarˈiki. ˌiaŋɡalˈie hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi kwa mˈatʃo jˈako, kwa vˈile wˌewe hˌutavˈuka jordˈani.|0
lakˈini mwaɡˈize joʃˈua, m̩tˈie mˈojo na umtˈie ŋɡˈuvu, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ˌatawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu hˈawa hˌadi ŋɡˈambo na kˌuwariθˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi ˌutakˌajoiˈona.|0
kwa hˈijo tˌulikˈaa kwˈeɲe bˈonde karˈibu na bˈeθ peˈori.|0
sikˈia sˈasa, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ˈamri na ʃerˈia nˌitakˌazokˌufundˈiʃa wˈewe. zˌifuˈate ˌili upˈate kuˈiʃi na ˌuiŋɡˈie kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈako ˌanawˈapa.|0
ˌusioŋɡˈeze wˈala ˌusipuŋɡˈuze tʃotʃˈote nˌinatʃˌowaamˈuru nˈiɲi, ˈila mjaʃˈike mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ambˈajo nawˈapa.|0
mliˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe kˈile bwˈana ˌalitʃˌokifˈaɲa kˈule bˈaal peˈori. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌemfuˈata baˈali wa peˈori.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi ɲˈote mlˌioʃˌikamˈana na bwˈana kwa ˌuθabˈiti, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˈm̩ko hˈai mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
tazˈama, nˌimewˌafundˈiʃa ˈamri na ʃerˈia kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌalivjˌoniamˈuru mˈimi, ˌili mzˌifuˈate katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˌiiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki.|0
zˌiʃikˈeni kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu, kwa kˌuwa hˌii ˌitaoɲˈeʃa hekˈima na ˌufahˈamu wˈenu kwa mˌataˈifa, ambˈajo jˌatasikˈia kuhˈusu ˈamri zˈote hˈizi, nˌao wˌatasˈema, hakˈika taˈifa hˈili kˈubwa ni wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima na ˌufahˈamu.|0
ni taˈifa ɡˈani ɟiŋɡˈine lilˈilo kˈubwa kiˈasi tʃa kˌuwa na miˈuŋɡu jˈao ilˈijo karˈibu nˌao kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu alˈivjo karˈibu nˌasi wakˈati wowˈote tˌunapomwˈomba.|0
nˈalo ni taˈifa ɡˈani ɟiŋɡˈine lilˈilo kˈubwa hˈivi lˈeɲe kˌuwa na ˈamri na ʃerˈia za hˈaki kˌama hˈizi nˌinazowˈeka mbˈele jˈenu lˈeo.|0
ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu, na makˈini ˌili msˈiɟe mkˌasahˈau mˈambo ambˈajo mlˌijaˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu, wˈala kˌujaˈatʃa jˌaondˈoke mojˈoni mwˈenu sˈiku zˈote za uhˈai wˈenu. mwˌafundˈiʃe hˈajo watˈoto wˈenu na watˈoto wˌao baˌada jˈao.|0
kumbˈuka sˈiku ˌulijˌosimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kˈule horˈebu, wakˈati ˌalipˌoniambˈia, wˌakutanˈiʃe wˈatu mbˈele jˈaŋɡu wˌasikˈie manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ˌili kwˌamba wawˈeze kˌuɟifˈunza kˌuniheʃˈimu kwa mˈuda wˈote wˌatakˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wawˈeze kˌuwafundˈiʃa watˈoto wˌao manˈeno hˈajo.|0
mlˌisoɡˈea karˈibu na mkˌasimˈama tʃˈini ja mlˈima wakˈati ˌulipowˈaka mˈoto mpˈaka mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu, pamˈoɟa na mawˈiŋɡu meˈusi na ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza nˌaɲi kutˈoka mˈoto. mkˌasikˈia saˈuti ja manˈeno lakˈini hˌamkuˈona ˈumbo, kˌulikˈuwa na saˈuti tˈu.|0
ˌaliwˌataŋɡazˈia aɡˈano lˈake na ˈamri kˈumi, ambˈazo ˌaliwˌaamˈuru mzˌifuˈate, kˈiʃa ˌakazˌiandˈika ɟˌuːja vibˈao viwˈili vja mˈawe.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌalinˌielekˈeza wakˈati hˈuo kˌuwafundˈiʃa nˈiɲi ʃerˈia na ˈamri ambˈazo mnapˈaswa kˌuzifuˈata katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo mnavˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki.|0
hˌamkuˈona ˈumbo la aˈina jojˈote sˈiku ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalizuŋɡˈumza nˌaɲi kˈule horˈebu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto. kwa hˈijo mɟˌihaðˈari kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu sˈana.|0
ˌili msˈiɟe mkˌaɟitʃafˈua na kˌuɟitˌeŋɡenezˈea sanˈamu ˌau kiɲˈaɡo tʃˌeɲe ˈumbo lolˈote kˌama la mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke.|0
ˌau kˌama mɲˈama alˈije ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌau ndˈeɡe jejˈote ˌarukˈaje aŋɡˈani.|0
ˌau kˌama kiˈumbe kˌitambaˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈarði ˌau samˈaki jejˈote alˈije ndˈani ja mˈaɟi.|0
na ˌutazamˈapo ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani na ˌukaliˈona ɟˈua, mwˈezi na ɲˈota na vjˈote vˌinavjˌoipˈamba mbˈiŋɡu, usˈiɟe ˌukaʃˌawiʃˈiwa kˌuviˌinamˈia na kˌuviabˈudu vˈile ambˈavjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌoɡawˈia mˌataˈifa jˈote tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kwˈenu nˈiɲi, bwˈana ˌamewatˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tanˈuru ja kˌujejuʃˈia tʃˈuma, katˌika mˈisri kˌuwa wˈatu wa urˈiθi wˌake kˌama mlˈivjo sˈasa.|0
bwˈana ˌalinˌikasˌirikˈia kwa sabˈabu jˈenu na ˌakaˈapa kwˌamba sˌitavˈuka jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanajowˈapa kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈenu.|0
nˌitakˈufa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii; sˌitavˈuka jordˈani, lakˈini nˈiɲi ni karˈibu mvˈuke mkˌaimilˈiki ˈile ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri.|0
ɟˌihaðarˈini msˌilisahˈau aɡˈano la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu lˈile ˌalilofˈaɲa nˈaɲi; msˌiɟitˌeŋɡenezˈee sanˈamu katˌika ˈumbo la kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˌakatˈaza.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ni mˈoto ulˈao, mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe wˈivu.|0
baˌada ja kˌuwa na watˈoto na wˌaɟukˈuu na kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi, tˈena kˌama mkˌiɟitʃafˈua na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu ja aˈina jojˈote, mkifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kumfˈaɲa ˈawe na hasˈira.|0
nˌinaziˈita mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi kˌama mˌaʃahˈidi ðˈidi jˈenu sˈiku hˌii kwˌamba mtˌaaŋɡamˈia mˈara mˈoɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo mnavˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki. hˌamtaˈiʃi kˈule kwa mˈuda mrˈefu bˌali kwa hakˈika mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, na ni watʃˈatʃe wˈenu tu wˌatakˌaosalˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa hˈajo ambˈajo bwˈana ˌatawˌafukuzˈia.|0
hˌuko mtˌaabˈudu miˈuŋɡu ja mˈiti na mˈawe ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa na wˈatu, ambˈajo hˌaiwˈezi kuˈona ˌau kˌusikˈia wˈala kˈula ˌau kunˈusa.|0
lakˈini kˌama mtˌamtafˈuta bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mtampˈata; kˌama mtˌamtafˈuta kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈote.|0
wakˈati mnˌapokˈuwa katˌika ðˈiki, nˈajo mˈambo hˈaja jˈote jˌamewˌatokˈea sˈiku hˈizo, ndˈipo mtˌamrudˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kumtˈii.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe hurˈuma, hˌatawaˈatʃa ˌau kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈala kˌusahˈau aɡˈano ˌalilofˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈenu, ˌalilˌowaθˌibitiʃˈia kwa kiˈapo.|0
sˈasa ulˈiza kuhˈusu sˈiku za zamˈani, zamˈani kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈako, ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌomuˈumba ˈm̩tu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, ulˈiza kutˈoka mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa wa mbˈiŋɡu mpˈaka mwˈiʃo mwiŋɡˈine wa mbˈiŋɡu. ɟˈe, kˌumepˈata kˌutokˈea ɟˈambo ɟiŋɡˈine lilˈilo kˈubwa kˌama hˈili, ˌau kˈuna ɟˈambo ɟiŋɡˈine kˌama hˌilo lˌimepˈata kˌusikˈiwa.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna wˈatu weŋɡˈine wowˈote wˌaliˌosikˈia saˈuti ja mˈuŋɡu ˌikizuŋɡˈumza kwˈeɲe mˈoto, kˌama mlˌivjosikˈia, nˌao wˌakaˈiʃi.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna mˈuŋɡu jejˈote ˌamepˈata kˌuɟarˈibu mweɲˈewe kˌutʃukˈua taˈifa mˈoɟa kutˈoka taˈifa liŋɡˈine, kwa mapˈiɡo, kwa iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu, kwa vˈita, kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa ˌau kwa matˈendo makˈuu ja kutˈiʃa, kˌama jˈale ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijofˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu hˌuko mˈisri mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu.|0
mlˌioɲˈeʃwa mˈambo hˈaja ˌili mpˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu; hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine ˈila jˈeje.|0
kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌamewˌasikizˈiʃa saˈuti jˌake ˌili kˌuwaˌadilˈiʃa. hˈapa dˌuniˈani ˌaliwˌaoɲˈeʃa mˈoto wˌake mkˈubwa, nˌaɲi mlˌisikˈia manˈeno jˌake kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈule mˈoto.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwapˈenda bˈaba zˈenu na ˌalitʃaɡˈua wazˈao wˌao baˌada jˈao, ˌaliwatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa uwˈepo wˌake na kwa uwˈezo wˌake m̩kˈuu.|0
ˌaliwˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu mˌataˈifa makˈubwa na jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko nˈiɲi na kˌuwalˈeta nˈiɲi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao na ˌakawˈapa nˈiɲi kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈenu, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
kˌubalˈini na mwˈeke mojˈoni lˈeo kˌuwa bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu na dˌuniˈani tʃˈini. hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine.|0
mʃˈike ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake nˌinajowˈapa lˈeo, ˌili mpˈate kˌufanikˈiwa nˈiɲi na watˈoto wˈenu baˌada jˈenu, na mpˈate kuˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌawapˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu sˈiku zˈote.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakatˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi mitˈatu mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani.|0
ambˈajo ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌemuˈua ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌukimbilˈia ikˈiwa ˌamemuˈua ɟirˈani jˌake bˌila kˌukusudˈia na bˌila kˌuwa na tʃˈuki nˌaje sˈiku zˌilizopˈita. ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌukimbilˈia katˌika mmˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi hˌii na kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mˈiɟi hˈijo ˌilikˈuwa: bezˈeri katˌika tˌambarˈare ja ɟˈaŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˌareubˈeni; ramˈoθi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi kwa aɟˈili ja waɡˈadi; nˌao ˈm̩ɟi wa ɡolˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja baʃˈani kwa aɟˈili ja wˌamanˈase.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia mˈose ˌalijowˈeka mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
nˌao wˌalikˈuwa katˌika bˈonde karˈibu na bˈeθ peˈori mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala heʃbˈoni, nˌaje ˌaliʃˈindwa na mˈose na wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipokˈuɟa tˌoka mˈisri.|0
wˌaliˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˌake na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, wafˈalme wawˈili wˌaamˈori wˌaliˌotawˈala mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani.|0
ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌilienˈea kutˈoka ˌaroˈeri ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa bˈonde la arnˈoni mpˈaka mlˈima siˈoni jaˈani hermˈoni.|0
pamˈoɟa na enˈeo lˈote la arˈaba mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, na kˌuenˈea mpˈaka bahˈari ja arˈaba kwˈeɲe mˌiterˈemko ja pˈisɡa.|0
mˈose ˌakawaˈita ˌisraˈeli wˈote, ˌakawˌaambˈia: ˈee ˌisraˈeli, sˌikilizˈeni ˈamri na ʃerˈia nˌinazˌowatˌaŋɡazˈia lˈeo. ɟˌifunzˈeni, na ˈm̩we na hakˈika kˌuzifuˈata.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano nˌasi katˌika mlˈima wa horˈebu.|0
si kwˌamba bwˈana ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano na bˈaba zˈetu, bˌali ˌalifˈaɲa nˈasi, nˌasi sˈote ambˈao tˈuko hˈai hˈapa lˈeo.|0
bwˈana ˌalisˈema nˌaɲi ˈuso kwa ˈuso kutˈoka mˈoto ɟˌuːja mlˈima.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌilisimˈama kˈati ja bwˈana na nˈiɲi kˌuwatˌaŋɡazˈia nˈeno la bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu mlˌioɡˈopa ˈule mˈoto, nˌaɲi hˌamkupˈanda mlimˈani. nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌalisˈema.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, nˌilijˌekutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
usˈiwe na miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi.|0
ˌusiɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈee sanˈamu katˌika ˈumbo la kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni ˌau dˌuniˈani tʃˈini ˌau ndˈani ja mˈaɟi.|0
ˌusivˌisuɟudˈie wˈala kˌuviabˈudu; kwa kˌuwa mˈimi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe wˈivu, nˌinajˌewaaðˈibu watˈoto kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao hˌadi kizˈazi tʃa tˈatu na tʃa ˈn̩ne tʃa wˌanitʃˌukiˈao.|0
lakˈini nˌinaoɲˈeʃa upˈendo kwa maˈelfu ja vizˈazi vja wˈale wˌanipendˈao na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusilitˈaɟe bˈure ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hˌataˈatʃa kˌumhesabˈia hatˈia jˌeje ˌalitaɟˈaje ɟˈina lˈake bˈure.|0
ˌaðimˈiʃa sˈiku ja sabˈato na kˌuiwˈeka tˌakatˈifu, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalivjˌokuaɡˈiza.|0
lakˈini sˈiku ja sˈaba ni sabˈato kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako. sˈiku hˈijo hˌutafˈaɲa kˈazi jojˈote, wˈewe, wˈala mwanˈao ˌau bˈinti jˈako, wˈala mtumˈiʃi wa kiˈume ˌau mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike, wˈala ŋɡˈombe wˈako, pˈunda wˈako ˌau mɲˈama wˈako jejˈote, wˈala mɡˈeni ˌalijˈeko mˌalaŋɡˈoni mwˈako, ˌili kwˌamba mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa kiˈume na wa kˈike wapˈate kˌupumzˈika kˌama wˈewe.|0
kumbˈuka mlikˈuwa watˈumwa hˌuko mˈisri, na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwatˈoa hˌuko kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa. kwa hˈijo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamekˌuaɡˈiza kˌuiˌaðimˈiʃa sˈiku ja sabˈato.|0
wˌaheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈako na mˈama jˈako, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalivjˌokuaɡˈiza, ˌili sˈiku zˈako zipˈate kˌuwa ɲˈiŋɡi na kˌufanikˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanajokˈupa.|0
ˌusiˈue.|0
ˌusizˈini.|0
ˌusiˈibe.|0
ˌusimʃˌuhudˈie ɟirˈani jˈako uˈoŋɡo.|0
ˌusitamˈani ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈako. ˌusitamˈani ɲˈumba ja ɟirˈani jˈako ˌau ʃˈamba lˈake, mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kiˈume ˌau wa kˈike, ŋɡˈombe ˌau pˈunda wˈake, wˈala kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa ɟirˈani jˈako.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo ˈamri ˌalizˌozitaŋɡˈaza bwˈana kwa saˈuti kˈubwa kwa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈenu lˈote hˌuko mlimˈani kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto, wˈiŋɡu na ɡˈiza nˈene, wˈala hˌakuoŋɡˈeza tʃotʃˈote zaˈidi. kˈiʃa ˌakazˌiandˈika ɟˌuːja vibˈao viwˈili vja mˈawe, nˌaje ˌakanˈipa mˈimi.|0
mlˌiposikˈia saˈuti kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɡˈiza, mlˈima ˌulipokˈuwa ˌukiwˈaka mˈoto, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈenu wˈote wa mˌakabˈila jˈenu na wazˈee wˈenu wˌaliniɟˈia mˈimi.|0
nˌaɲi mkasˈema, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌametˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu na ˈenzi jˈake, nˌasi tˌumesikˈia saˈuti jˌake kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto. lˈeo tˌumeˈona kwˌamba mwˌanadˈamu ˌanawˈeza kuˈiʃi hˌata kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, kwa nˈini tˈufe? mˈoto hˈuu mkˈubwa ˌutatˌuteketˈeza sˌisi na tˌutakˈufa kˌama tˌukiˌendelˈea kˌusikˈia saˈuti ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu zaˈidi.|0
ni ˈm̩tu jˈupi mwˌeɲe mwˈili ambˈaje ˌamewˈahi kˌuisikˈia saˈuti ja mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai ˌakizuŋɡˈumza kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto, kˌama sˌisi tˌulivjˌoisikˈia, nˌaje ˌakaˈiʃi.|0
soɡˈea karˈibu ˌusikˈie jˈale jˈote ˌasemˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. kˈiʃa ˌutuambˈie tʃotʃˈote kˈile ambˈatʃo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌanakˌuambˈia. tˌutasˌikilˈiza na kutˈii.|0
bwˈana ˌaliwˌasikˈia wakˈati mlˌipozuŋɡˈumza nˈami, na bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˌimesikˈia kˈile hˈawa wˈatu wˌalitʃˌokuambˈia. kˈila kˈitu wˌalitʃˌokisˈema ni kizˈuri.|0
laˈiti kˌama miˈojo jˈao ˌiŋɡekˈuwa na mwˌelekˈeo wa kˌunioɡˈopa na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zˈote daˈima, ˌili kwˌamba wˌafanikˈiwe wˌao pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˌao milˈele.|0
nˈenda ˌuwaambˈie warˈudi kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌewe bˈaki hˈapa pamˈoɟa nˌami ˌili niwˈeze kukˈupa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈote, ˈamri na ʃerˈia ambˈazo ˌutawˌafundˈiʃa wˌazifuˈate katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajokwˈenda kuwˈapa wˌaimilˈiki.|0
hˈivjo kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌujafˈaɲa jˈale bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijˌowaaɡˈiza; msˌiɡeˈuke upˈande wa kuˈume wˈala wa kuʃˈoto.|0
fˌuatˈeni jˈale jˈote ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwˌaaɡˈiza, ˌili mpˈate kuˈiʃi, kustˈawi na kˌuzioŋɡˈeza sˈiku zˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mtˌakajˌoimilˈiki.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaaɡˈizo, ˈamri na ʃerˈia ambˈazo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalinˌiaɡˈiza nˌiwafundˈiʃe nˈiɲi ˌili mpˈate kˌujaʃˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˈiɲi mnavˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ˌili kwˌamba nˈiɲi, watˈoto wˈenu na watˈoto wˌao baˌada jˈao wˈamtʃe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu sˈiku zˈote kwa kuʃˈika ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake jˈote nˌinajowˈapa, ˌili mwˈeze kˌujafˌurahˈia maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
sikˈia, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, nˌawe ˈuwe mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii ˌili upˈate kˌufanikˈiwa na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka sˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, kˌama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi nˈiɲi.|0
sikˈia, ˈee ˌisraˈeli: bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, bwˈana ni mmˈoɟa.|0
mpˈende bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote, na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote, na kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako zˈote.|0
ˈamri hˈizi nˌinazokˈupa lˈeo zˌitakˈuwa katˌika mˈojo wˈako.|0
wˌafundˈiʃe watˈoto wˈako kwa bidˈii. nˈena kuhˈusu ˈamri hˈizi ˌuketˈipo ɲumbˈani na wakˈati ˌutembeˈapo ɲɟiˈani, ˌulalˈapo na ˌuamkˈapo.|0
zifˈuŋɡe kˌama alˈama ɟˌuːja mkˈono wˈako, na ˌuzifˈuŋɡe ɟˌuːja pˈaɟi la ˈuso wˈako.|0
zˌiandˈike kwˈeɲe miˈimo ja milˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba jˈako na ɟˌuːja malˈaŋɡo jˈako.|0
wakˈati bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapokulˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈako, ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo, kukˈupa wˈewe, ˈn̩tʃi kˈubwa, ˈina mˈiɟi ˌinajˌopendˈeza ambˈajo hˌukuiɟˈeŋɡa.|0
ɲˈumba zˌilizoɟˈaa vˈitu vizˈuri vja aˈina ɲˈiŋɡi ambˈavjo hˌukuviɟˈaza, visˈima ambˈavjo hˌukutʃˈimba, na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na mˌizeitˈuni ambˈajo hˌukupˈanda wˈewe, bˈasi, ˌutakˌapokˈula na kuʃˈiba.|0
ɟˌihaðˈari usˈiɟe ˌukamwˈatʃa bwˈana, ˌalijˌekutˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
utˈamtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, na ˌumtumikˈie jˌeje pˈeke jˌake na kuˈapa kwa ɟˈina lˈake.|0
ˌusifuˈate miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌokuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ambˈaje jˈuko kˌatikˈati jˈako, ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe wˈivu na hasˈira jˌake ˌitawˈaka ðˈidi jˈako, nˌaje ˌatakˌuaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌusimɟarˈibu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kˌama ˌulivjofˈaɲa hˌuko mˈasa.|0
ˌutajaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa bidˈii, na maʃˈarti na ˈamri ˌalizokˈupa.|0
fˈaɲa lilˈilo hˈaki na ɟˈema mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌili upˈate kˌufanikˈiwa, uwˈeze kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliahˈidi kwa kiˈapo kwa bˈaba zˈako.|0
kˌuwafukˈuza kwa ŋɡˈuvu adˈui zˈako mbˈele jˈako kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjosˈema.|0
sˈiku ziɟˈazo, mtˈoto wˈako ˌatakˌapokˌuulˈiza, ni nˈini maˈana ja maʃˈarti hˈaja, ˈamri na ʃerˈia hˈizi ambˈazo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalikˌuaɡˈiza wˈewe.|0
mwambˈie: tˌulikˈuwa watˈumwa wa farˈao hˌuko mˈisri, lakˈini bwˈana ˌalitutˈoa sˌisi kutˈoka mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
bwˈana ˌakapelˈeka mbˈele jˈetu iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu makˈubwa na ja kutˈiʃa ˈm̩no ɟˌuːja mˈisri na farˈao pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba jˌake jˈote.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakatutˈoa hˌuko, ˌakatulˈeta na kutˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ambˈajo ˌaliwˌaahˈidi bˈaba zˈetu kwa kiˈapo.|0
bwˈana ˌakatˌuaɡˈiza tutˈii ˈamri hˈizi zˈote na kˈumtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌili tupˈate kustˈawi na kˌuendelˈea kˌuwa hˈai kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
kˌama tˌukizitˈii kwa bidˈii ˈamri hˈizi zˈote mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kˌama ˌalivjˌotuamˈuru sˈisi, hˈijo ˌitakˈuwa hˈaki jˈetu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌakuletˈapo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajˌoiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki, na ˌawafˌukuzˈapo mbˈele jˈako mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, jaˈani wahˈiti, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi, wˌaamˈori, wˌakanaˈani, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, mˌataˈifa sˈaba makˈubwa tˈena jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko wˈewe.|0
pˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapowatˈia mkonˈoni mwˈako na ˌukawaʃˈinda, bˌasi ni lazˈima ˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈize wˈote kabˈisa. ˌusifˈaɲe aɡˈano nˈao, wˈala ˌusiwˌahurumˈie.|0
ˌusioˈane nˈao. ˌusimtˈoe bˈinti jˈako kˌuolˈewa na mwanˈawe, ˌau kˌumtʃukˈua bˈinti jˌake ˌaolˈewe na mwanˈao.|0
kwa maˈana wˌatamɡeˈuza mwanˈao aˈatʃe kˌunifuˈata, ˌili ˌaitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, nˈajo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌitawˈaka ðˈidi jˈako, nˌaje ˌatakˌuaŋɡamˈiza ɣafˈula.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌutakˌalowˌafaɲˈia: vˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu jˈao, vˈuɲɟa mˈawe jˈao ja kˌuabudˈia, kˌatakˈata ŋɡˈuzo zˈao za aʃˈera na kutʃˈoma sanˈamu zˈao kwa mˈoto.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni taˈifa tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamekˌutʃaɡˈua wˌewe kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia kˌuwa wˈatu wˈake, hazˈina jˌake ja θamˈani.|0
bwˈana hˌakuwˈeka upˈendo wˌake ɟˈuu jˈenu na kˌuwatʃaɡˈua kwa sabˈabu mlikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no kulˈiko wˈatu weŋɡˈine, kwa maˈana nˈiɲi n̩dˈio mlˌiokˈuwa watʃˈatʃe sˈana kulˈiko mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
lakˈini ni kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌaliwapˈenda nˈiɲi na kutˈunza kiˈapo ˌalitʃˌowaapˈia bˈabu zˈenu kwˌamba ˌatawatˈoa nˈiɲi kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na kˌuwakombˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa, kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri.|0
bˌasi uɟˈue kwˌamba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu; ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌaminˈifu, ˌanajetˈunza aɡˈano la upˈendo kwa maˈelfu ja vizˈazi vja wˈale wˌanaompˈenda na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈake.|0
lakˈini kwa wˈale wˌanaˌomtʃukˈia ˌatawˌalipˈiza kwˈeɲe ɲˈuso zˈao kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi; hˌatatʃelˈewa kˌuwalipˈiza kwˈeɲe ɲˈuso zˈao wˈale wˌamtʃukiˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo, kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌufuˈata mˌaaɡˈizo, ˈamri na ʃerˈia nˌinazowˈapa lˈeo.|0
kˌama mkˌiziŋɡatˈia ʃerˈia hˈizi na kˌuzifuˈata kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu, bˌasi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatatˈunza aɡˈano lˈake la upˈendo nˈaɲi, kˌama ˌalivjˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈenu.|0
ˌatawapˈenda nˈiɲi na kˌuwabarˈiki na kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi jˈenu. ˌatabarˈiki uzˈao wa tˈumbo lˈenu, mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta, ndˈama za ŋɡˈombe wa makˈundi jˈenu, na kondˈoo za makˈundi jˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ˌalijoˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
mtˌabarikˈiwa kulˈiko mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote, hakˈuna wˌanaˈume wˈala wˌanawˈake kwˈenu wˌatakˌaokˈosa watˈoto, wˈala mifˈuɡo jˈenu hˌaitakˈuwa tˈasa.|0
bwˈana ˌatawakˈiŋɡa na kˈila uɡˈoɲɟua. mˈuŋɡu hˌatatˈia ɟˈuu jˈenu uɡˈoɲɟua wowˈote m̩bˈaja mlˌioˌufahˈamu hˌuko mˈisri, lakˈini ˌatatˈia uɡˈoɲɟua ɟˌuːja wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌokutʃukˈia.|0
ni lazˈima mwˌaŋɡamˈize wˈatu wˈote ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. msˌiwatazˈame kwa kˌuwahˌurumˈia na msˌiitˌumikˈie miˈuŋɡu jˈao, kwa kˌuwa ˌitakˈuwa mtˈeɡo kwˈenu.|0
mnawˈeza kˌuɟiulˈiza weɲˈewe mˌataˈifa hˈaja ni jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko sˈisi. tˌutawezˈaɟe kˌuwafukˈuza.|0
lakˈini msˌiwaoɡˈope. kˌumbukˈeni vjˈema ɟˈinsi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjofˈaɲa kwa farˈao na kwa wˈote hˌuko mˈisri.|0
mliˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe mˌaɟarˈibu makˈubwa, iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu, mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa, ambˈao kwa hˈuo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwatˈoa mtˈoke mˈisri. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌafaɲˈia hˈivjo wˈatu wˈote ambˈao mnˌawaoɡˈopa sˈasa.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatatˈuma maɲˈiɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao hˌadi jˈale mabˈaki wˌatakˌaoɟifˈitʃa wˌaaŋɡamˈie.|0
msˌiiŋɡˈiwe na hˈofu kwa sabˈabu jˈao, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈaje jˈupo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ni m̩kˈuu nˌaje ni mˈuŋɡu wa kutˈiʃa.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa hˈajo mbˈele jˈenu kidˈoɡo kidˈoɡo. hˌamtarˌuhusˈiwa kˌuwaondˈoa wˈote kwa mˈara mˈoɟa, la sˈivjo waɲˈama mwˈitu wˌataˌoŋɡezˈeka na kˌuwa karˈibu nˈaɲi.|0
lakˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawatˈia wˈatu hˈao mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, ˌakiwatˈia katˌika kˌutʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈiwa kukˈubwa mpˈaka wˈawe wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
ˌatawatˈia wafˈalme wˌao mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌajafˈuta maɟˈina jˈao tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌusimˈama ðˈidi jˈenu bˌali mtˌawaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
viɲˈaɡo vja miˈuŋɡu jˈao mtˌavitʃˈoma mˈoto. msˌitamˈani fˈeða wˈala ðahˈabu ilˈijo ɟˈuu jˈao, wˈala msˌizitʃukˈue kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, la sˈivjo mtakˈuwa mmetˈekwa nˈavjo. kwa kˌuwa ni tʃukˈizo kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
msilˈete vˈitu vja mˌatʃukˈizo katˌika ɲˈumba zˈenu kwˈani nˈiɲi, mtatˈeŋɡwa kˌama vˈitu hˈivjo kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo. ˌukitʃukˈie kabˈisa kˈitu hˈitʃo kwa kˌuwa kˌimetˈeŋɡwa kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo.|0
ˈuwe mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kˌufuˈata kˈila aɡˈizo nˌinalokˈupa wˌewe lˈeo, ˌili mwˈeze kuˈiʃi, kˌuoŋɡezˈeka na mwˈeze kˌuiŋɡˈia mkˌamilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliahˈidi kwa kiˈapo kwa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌowaoŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈote katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa kwa miˈaka hˌii ˌarobaˈini, kˌukuɲˌeɲekˈeza na kˌukuɟarˈibu ˌili aɟˈue lˌililˈoko mojˈoni mwˈako, kwˌamba ˌutajaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake ˌau la.|0
ˌalikuðˈili na kˌukufˈaɲa uˈone ɲɟˈaa kˈiʃa ˌakulˈiʃe kwa mˈana, ambˈajo wˌewe wˈala bˈaba zˈako hˌamkuiɟˈua, ˌawafundˈiʃe kˌuwa mwˌanadˈamu hˌataˈiʃi kwa mkˈate tu bˌali kwa kˈila nˈeno lˌitokˈalo katˌika kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana.|0
ŋɡˈuo zˈenu hˌazikˌutʃakˈaa wˈala miɡˈuu jˈenu hˌaikuvˈimba kwa miˈaka hˌii ˌarobaˈini.|0
m̩ɟˈue bˌasi ndˈani ja miˈojo jˈenu kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanavjˌomwadibˈiʃa mwanˈawe, ndˈivjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatawˌaadibˈiʃa nˈiɲi.|0
ʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mtembˈee katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake na kˌumheʃˈimu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri, ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe viɟˈito na mabwˈawa ja mˈaɟi, jˌeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi zˌinazˌotirirˈika mˌabondˈeni na katˌika vilˈima.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈano na ʃajˈiri, mˌizabˈibu na mitˈini, mˌikomamˈaŋɡa, mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni na asˈali.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo tʃakˈula hˌakitˌapuŋɡˈua na hˌamtakˈosa tʃotʃˈote; ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo miˈamba jˌake ni tʃˈuma na mnawˈeza kutʃˈimba ʃˈaba kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vilˈima.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapokwˈiʃa kˈula na kuʃˈiba, msifˈuni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ˌalijowˈapa.|0
ɟˌihaðarˈini msˌimsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mkaʃˈindwa kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake, ʃerˈia na ˈamri zˌake ambˈazo nˌinawˈapa lˈeo.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia wakˈati mtˌakapokˈuwa mmekˈula na kuʃˈiba, mkaɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba nzˈuri na kukˈaa hˈumo.|0
na wakˈati makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe na mbˈuzi na kondˈoo jˌatakˌapoˌoŋɡezˈeka na fˈeða na ðahˈabu jˈenu ˌitakˌapoˌoŋɡezˈeka na vjˈote mlˈivjo nˈavjo vˌitakˌapozidˈiʃwa.|0
bˌasi miˈojo jˈenu isˈiwe na kibˈuri mkˌamsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijˌewatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
ˌaliwˌaoŋɡˈoza kˌupitˈia ɟˈaŋɡwa lˈile kˈubwa na la kutˈiʃa, ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ja kˈiu isˈijo na mˈaɟi, jˌeɲe ɲˈoka wa sˈumu na ŋɡˈe. ˌaliwˌatolˈea mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mwˈamba mɡˈumu.|0
ˌaliwˈapa mˈana ja kˈula ɟaŋɡwˈani, kˈitu ambˈatʃo bˈaba zˈenu hˌawakˌukiɟˈua, ˌili kˌuwaɲˌeɲekˈeʃa na kˌuwaɟarˈibu nˈiɲi ˌili mwiʃˈoni apˈate kˌuwatendˈea mˈema.|0
mnawˈeza kusˈema, uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈuvu za mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ndˈizo zˌilizˌonipatˈia ˌutaɟˈiri hˈuu.|0
lakˈini kˌumbukˈeni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, n̩dˈije ambˈaje huwˈapa uwˈezo wa kupˈata ˌutaɟˈiri, na hˈivjo kˌuliθˌibitˈiʃa aɡˈano lˈake, ambˈalo ˌaliwˌaapˈia bˈaba zˈenu, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
ikˈiwa mtˌamsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mkˌaifuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, mkˌaiabˈudu na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia, nˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈenu lˈeo kwˌamba hakˈika mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
kˌama mˌataˈifa bwˈana ˌalijˌojaˌaŋɡamˈiza mbˈele jˈenu, ndˈivjo nˈiɲi mtˌakavjˌoaŋɡamˈizwa kwa kˌutokumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
sˌikilˈiza, ˈee ˌisraˈeli. sˈasa mnˌakaribˈia kuvˈuka jordˈani mwiŋɡˈie na kˌuwafukˈuza mˌataˈifa makˈubwa na jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi mikˈubwa jˌeɲe kˈuta zˌilizofˈika ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani.|0
wˈatu ni wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na warˈefu, ni wˈana wa wˌaanˈaki! mnˌafahˈamu habˈari zˈao na mmˌesikˈia ˌinavjˌosemekˈana: ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama ðˈidi ja wˌaanˈaki.|0
kuwˈeni na hakˈika lˈeo kwˌamba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetˌaŋɡulˈia kuvˈuka mbˈele jˈenu kˌama mˈoto ˌutekˌetezˈao. ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza; ˌatawˌatiˈiʃa mbˈele jˈenu. nˌaɲi mtˌawafukˈuza na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈara mˈoɟa, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
baˌada ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌuwafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu, msisˈeme mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu, bwˈana ˌametulˈeta hˈapa kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kwa sabˈabu ja hˈaki jˈetu. la, ni kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wa mˌataˈifa hˈaja n̩dˈijo bwˈana ˌanawˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu.|0
si kwa sabˈabu ja hˈaki jˈenu wˈala ˌuadilˈifu wˈenu kwˌamba mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao; lakˈini kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wa mˌataˈifa hˈaja, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu, ˌili kˌutimˈiza lˈile ˌalilˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈenu ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
bˌasi m̩ɟˈue, si kwa sabˈabu ja hˈaki jˈenu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii nzˈuri kˌuimilˈiki, kwa kˌuwa nˈiɲi ni taˈifa lˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu.|0
kˌumbukˈeni hˈili, kˈamwe msˌisahˈau ɟˈinsi mlˌivjomkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa hasˈira hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani. ʃˈu sˈiku mlˌipotˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka mlˌipofˈika hˈapa, mmekˈuwa waˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana.|0
kˈule horˈebu mliˈamʃa ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana, kwa hˈijo ˌalikˌasirˈika vja kutˈoʃa hˌata ˌakatˈaka kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
nˌilipopˈanda mlimˈani kˌupokˈea m̩bˈao za mˈawe, m̩bˈao za aɡˈano lˈile bwˈana ˌalilofˈaɲa nˈaɲi, nˌilikˈaa mlimˈani sˈiku ˌarobaˈini usˈiku na mtʃˈana, sikˈula mkˈate wˈala sikˈuɲua mˈaɟi.|0
bwˈana ˌalinˈipa m̩bˈao mbˈili za mˈawe zˌilizˌoandˈikwa kwa kidˈole tʃa mˈuŋɡu. ɟˌuːja m̩bˈao hˈizo kˌulikuwˈepo ˈamri zˈote ambˈazo bwˈana ˌaliwˌataŋɡazˈia kˈule mlimˈani kwa ɲɟˈia ja mˈoto, sˈiku ja kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ʃˈuka tʃˈini mˈara mˈoɟa, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈako ambˈao ˌumewatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri wˌamepotˈoka. wˌameɡˌeukˈia mbˈali harˈaka kutˈoka lˈile nˌililˌowaaɡˈiza, wˌameɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea sanˈamu ja kusˈubu.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˌimewaˈona wˈatu hˈawa nˌao ni wˈatu wˌeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu sˈana.|0
niˈatʃe, ˌili nipˈate kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza na kufˈuta ɟˈina lˈao kutˈoka tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu. nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌuwa taˈifa lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliɡeˈuka na kˌuterˈemka kutˈoka mlimˈani kwˈani mlˈima ˌulikˈuwa ˌukiwˈaka mˈoto. pˈia vibˈao vˈile viwˈili vja aɡˈano vˌilikˈuwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilipˌotazˈama, nˌiliˈona kˌuwa mmefˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu; mmˌeɟifaɲˈia sanˈamu ja kusˈubu katˌika ˈumbo la ndˈama. mmˌeɡeˈuka upˈesi kutˈoka ɲɟˈia ˈile bwˈana ˌalijˌowaaɡˈiza.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌilitʃukˈua vibˈao vˈile viwˈili nˌikavitˈupa na kˌuvipasˈua vipˈande vipˈande mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu.|0
ndˈipo tˈena nˌikasuɟˈudu mbˈele za bwˈana kwa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini usˈiku na mtʃˈana. sikˈula mkˈate wˈala sikˈuɲua mˈaɟi, kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi jˈote mlˌijoifˈaɲa, mkifˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo ˈovu mbˈele za bwˈana na kˌumkasirˈiʃa.|0
nˌilioɡˈopa hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia vja kutˈoʃa na kutˈaka kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza. lakˈini bwˈana ˌalinˌisikilˈiza tˈena.|0
bˌali jˌeje ˌalimkˌasirikˈia arˈoni kiˈasi tʃa kutˈaka kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza, nˌami wakˈati hˈuo nˌilimwombˈea arˈoni pˈia.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikatʃukˈua ˈile sanˈamu ja ndˈama mlˌijoˌiteŋɡenˈeza na kˌuitʃˈoma kwˈeɲe mˈoto. nˌikaipˈonda na kˌuisˈaɡa ikˈawa ˈuŋɡa laˈini kˌama vˈumbi, nˌikatˈupa lˈile vˈumbi kwˈeɲe kiɟˈito kˌilitʃˌotirirˈika tˌoka mlimˈani.|0
pˈia mlˌimkasirˈiʃa bwˈana hˌuko tabˈera, mˈasa na kˈibroθ hˌataˈava.|0
vˌilevˈile wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipˌowatˈuma kutˈoka kˈadeʃ barnˈea, ˌalisˈema, kweˈeni, mkˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˌimewˈapa. lakˈini mliˈasi ðˈidi ja aɡˈizo la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. hˌamkumtˌeɡemˈea wˈala kumtˈii.|0
mmekˈuwa waˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana ʃˈu nˌilipˌowaɟˈua nˈiɲi.|0
nˌilimwˈomba bwˈana na kusˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌusiˌaŋɡamˈize wˈatu wˈako, urˈiθi wˈako mweɲˈewe ˈule ˌuliˌoukombˈoa kwa uwˈeza wˈako m̩kˈuu na kˌuwatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
wˌakumbˈuke wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo. ˌusiˌaŋɡalˈie ˌukaˈidi wa wˈatu hˈawa, uˈovu wˌao wˈala ðˈambi jˈao.|0
wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ˌulijˌotutˈoa sˌisi wasˈiɟe wˌakasˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu bwˈana hˌakuwˈeza kˌuwatʃukˈua mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamewˌaahidˈia, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwˌatʃukˈia, ˌakawalˈeta ˌili ˈaɟe kˌuwaˈua ɟaŋɡwˈani..|0
