bˌali wˌao ni wˈatu wˈako, urˈiθi wˈako ˈule ˌuliˌoutˈoa mˈisri kwa uwˈeza wˈako m̩kˈuu na kwa mkˈono wˈako ˌuliˌoɲoˈoka.|0
wakˈati ˈule bwˈana ˌalinˌiambˈia, tʃˈoŋɡa vibˈao viwˈili vja mˈawe kˌama vˈile vja kwˈanza ˈuɟe kwˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu mlimˈani. pˈia ˌuteŋɡenˈeze sandˈuku la m̩bˈao.|0
nˌitaandˈika ɟˌuːja vibˈao manˈeno jˌalijokˈuwa katˌika vˈile vibˈao vja kwˈanza, ambˈavjo ˌulivivˈuɲɟa. kˈiʃa ˌutaviwˈeka ndˈani ja sandˈuku.|0
hˈivjo nˌikatˌeŋɡenˈeza sandˈuku kwa ˈm̩ti wa mʃˈita, nˌikatʃˈoŋɡa pˈia vibˈao vja mˈawe kˌama vˈile vja kwˈanza, kˈiʃa nˌikakwˈea mlimˈani nikˈiwa na vibˈao viwˈili mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌakaandˈika ɟˌuːja hˈivi vibˈao kˈile ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamekˌiandˈika kˈabla, ˈamri kˈumi ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamewˌataŋɡazˈia ɟˈuu mlimˈani, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto sˈiku ˈile ja kˌusaɲˈiko. bwˈana ˌakanˌikabˈiði.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaʃˈuka kutˈoka mlimˈani na kuwˈeka vibˈao ndˈani ja sandˈuku nˌililokˈuwa nˌimelˌiteŋɡenˈeza, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoniaɡˈiza, nˈavjo vˈiko hˌuko sˈasa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalisafˈiri kutˈoka visˈima vja jˌaakˈani hˌadi mosˈera. hˌuko arˈoni ˌalifarˈiki na kuzˈikwa, nˌaje ˌeleazˈari mwanˈawe ˌakatʃukˈua nafˈasi jˌake kˌama kuhˈani.|0
kutˈoka pˈale, wˌalisafˈiri hˌadi ɡudɡˈoda wˌakaˌendelˈea mpˈaka jotbˈaθa, ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi.|0
wakˈati hˈuo bwˈana ˌaliteˈua kabˈila la lˈawi kˌulibˈeba sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana, kˌusimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili kutˈoa hudˈuma, na kˌutaŋɡˈaza barˈaka kwa ɟˈina lˈake, kˌama wˌanavjofˈaɲa mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
hˈijo n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ja walˈawi kˌutokˈuwa na sehˈemu wˈala urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈao; bwˈana n̩dˈije urˈiθi wˈao, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao ˌalivjˌowaambˈia..|0
bˌasi nˌilikˈaa mlimˈani kwa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini usˈiku na mtʃˈana, kˌama nˌilivjofˈaɲa mˈara ja kwˈanza, pˈia bwˈana ˌalinˌisikilˈiza hˌata wakˈati hˈuu. hˌaikˈuwa nˈia jˌake kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˈenda, ˌukawˌaoŋɡˈoze wˈatu katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈao ˌili kwˌamba wawˈeze kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ˈile nˌilijˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈao kuwˈapa.|0
na sˈasa, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanatˈaka nˈini kwˈako ˈila kˈumtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, kwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, kumpˈenda na kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote.|0
na kˌujaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana na ˈamri zˌake nˌinazokˈupa lˈeo kwa mˌafanikˈio jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
mbˈiŋɡu, hˌata mbˈiŋɡu za ɟˈuu sˈana, dunˈia na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani jˈake, ni mˈali ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa na ʃaˈuku na bˈaba zˈako, ˌakawapˈenda na ˌakawˌatʃaɡˈua nˈiɲi, wazˈao wˈao, kulˈiko mˌataˈifa jˈote, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
kwa hˈijo tˌahirˈini miˈojo jˈenu, na msˈiwe na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu tˈena.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ni mˈuŋɡu wa miˈuŋɡu na bwˈana wa mabwˈana, mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu, mwˌeɲe uwˈeza na wa kutˈiʃa, ambˈaje hˈana ˌupendelˈeo na hˌapokˈei rˈuʃwa.|0
hˌuwapˌiɡanˈia jatˈima na waɟˈane, humpˈenda mɡˈeni, akˈimpa tʃakˈula na mavˈazi.|0
nˌaɲi wˌapendˈeni waɡˈeni, kwa kˌuwa nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mlikˈuwa waɡˈeni hˌuko mˈisri.|0
ˈm̩tʃe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˌumtumikˈie jˈeje. ʃˌikamˈana nˌaje kwa ˌuθabˈiti na kuˈapa kwa ɟˈina lˈake.|0
jˌeje ni sˈifa jˈako; jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ambˈaje ˌalikˌutendˈea jˈale mˌaaɟˈabu makˈubwa na ja kutˈiʃa ˌulijˌojaˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
bˈaba zˈako wˌalioʃˈuka kwˈenda mˈisri ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa sabˈini, na sˈasa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamekufˈaɲa wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani.|0
mpˈende bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na kuʃˈika maʃˈarti jˈake, ˈamri zˈake, ʃerˈia zˌake na mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake sˈiku zˈote.|0
kumbˈuka hˈivi lˈeo kwˌamba sˈio watˈoto wˈako wˌalioˈona na kuɟˈua aðˈabu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako: ˌutukˈufu wˈake, mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, mkˈono wˌake ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa.|0
iʃˈara ˌalizˌozifˈaɲa na mˈambo ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa kˌatikˈati ja mˈisri, kwa farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri na kwa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jˈote.|0
lˈile ˌalilˌolifaɲˈia ɟˈeʃi la wamˈisri, farˈasi na maɡˈari jˈake, ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌowafˌurikˈiʃa na mˈaɟi ja bahˈari ja ʃˈamu wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiwˌafuˌatilˈia nˈiɲi, na ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaletˈea ˌaŋɡamˈizo la kudˈumu ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
sˈio watˈoto wˈenu wˌaliˌojaˈona jˈale mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌowafaɲˈia hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani mpˈaka mkafˈika mahˈali hˈapa.|0
wˈala lˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalilˌowafaɲˈia daθˈani na ˌabirˈamu, wˈana wa ˌeliˈabu wa kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, wakˈati ˈarði ˌilipˌofuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake kˌatikˈati ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote, ˌikawamˈeza pamˈoɟa na walˈio ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao, hˈema zˈao na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa hˈai ambˈatʃo kˌilikˈuwa mˈali jˈao.|0
bˌali ˌilikˈuwa ni mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe ambˈajo jˌalijaˈona mˈambo hˈaja jˈote makˈuu bwˈana ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
kwa hˈijo fˌuatˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo jˈote nˌinajowˈapa lˈeo, ˌili mpˈate kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu za kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuitˈeka ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo mnavˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ˌili mpˈate kuˈiʃi sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu na wazˈao wˈao, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali.|0
ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˌiiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki hˌaifanˈani na ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri mlˌikotˈoka ambˈako mlipˈanda mbˈeɡu jˈenu na kˌuiɲuˈeʃa, kˌama bustˈani ja mbˈoɡa.|0
lakˈini ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajovˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki ni ˈn̩tʃi ja milˈima na mabˈonde ˌiɲuˈajo mvˈua kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ni ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanaitˈunza; mˈatʃo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu jˌanaˌitazˈama daˈima kutˈoka mwˈanzo wa mwˈaka hˌadi mwˈiʃo wa mwˈaka.|0
hˈivjo kˌama mkˌijatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu nˌinajowˈapa lˈeo kwa ˌuaminˈifu, jaˈani kwa kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, na kˌumtumikˈia kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈenu jˈote.|0
ndˈipo ˌatawˌaɲueʃˈea mvˈua katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu kwa maɟˈira jˈake, mvˈua ja masˈika na ja vˈuli, ˌili mpˈate kuvˈuna nafˈaka zˈenu, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta.|0
nˌitawˈapa maɟˈani kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡˈombe wˈenu, nˌaɲi mtakˈula na kuʃˈiba.|0
ɟˌihaðarˈini, la sˈivjo mtˌaʃawiʃˈika kˌuɡeˈuka na kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia.|0
ndˈipo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌitawˈaka ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌaje ˌatafˈuŋɡa mbˈiŋɡu ˌili mvˈua ˌisiɲˈeʃe nˈajo ˈarði hˌaitatˈoa mazˈao, nˌaɲi mtˌaaŋɡamˈia mˈara katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ambˈajo bwˈana ˌanawˈapa.|0
jˌawekˈeni hˈaja manˈeno jˈaŋɡu katˌika miˈojo jˈenu na akˈili zˈenu, jˌafuŋɡˈeni kˌama alˈama ɟˌuːja mikˈono jˈenu na kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi za ɲˈuso zˈenu.|0
wˌafundiʃˈeni watˈoto wˈenu, jˌazuŋɡumzˈeni wakˈati mketˈipo ɲumbˈani na wakˈati mtˌembeˈapo ɲɟiˈani, wakˈati mlalˈapo na wakˈati mwamkˈapo.|0
jˌaandikˈeni ɟˌuːja miˈimo ja ɲˈumba zˈenu na ɟˌuːja malˈaŋɡo jˈenu.|0
ˌili kwˌamba sˈiku zˈenu na sˈiku za watˈoto wˈenu zipˈate kˌuwa ɲˈiŋɡi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile bwˈana ˌalijoˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu, kˌama zilˈivjo ɲˈiŋɡi sˈiku za mbˈiŋɡu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˌama mkiʃˈika kwa makˈini mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˈote nˌinajowˈapa kˌujafuˈata, ja kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote na kˌuʃikamˈana nˌaje kwa ˌuθabˈiti.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌatawˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˈote mbˈele jˈako, nˌawe ˌutawˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa jalˈijo makˈubwa na jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌukulˈiko wˈewe.|0
kˈila mahˈali mtˌakapowˈeka m̩ɡˈuu wˈenu pˌatakˈuwa pˈenu: ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌitaenˈea kutˈoka ɟˈaŋɡwa la lˌebanˈoni, na kutˈoka ˈm̩to wa frˈati hˌadi bahˈari ja mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
hˌapatakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌusimˈama ðˈidi jˈenu. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, ˌatawˈeka ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote utˈiʃo na hˈofu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu popˈote mwendˈako.|0
tazˈama, lˈeo nˌinawˈeka mbˈele jˈenu barˈaka na laˈana.|0
barˈaka kˌama mtatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈajo nˌinawˈapa lˈeo.|0
laˈana kˌama hˌamtatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kuˈatʃa ɲɟˈia ambˈajo nˌinawˌaamˈuru lˈeo kwa kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, ambˈajo hˌamkuiɟˈua.|0
wakˈati bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamewalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˌiiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki, mtˌataŋɡˈaza barˈaka kutˈoka mlˈima ɡˌerizˈimu, na kˌutaŋɡˈaza laˈana kutˈoka mlˈima ebˈali.|0
kˌama mnˌavjofahˈamu, milˈima hˌii ˈipo ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani, mˌaɣarˈibi ja bˌarabˈara, kˌuelekˈea matʃwˈeo ja ɟˈua, karˈibu na mˈiti mikˈubwa ja mˈore, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˈale wˌakanaˈani wˌanaoˈiʃi arˈaba, ɟirˈani na ɡilɡˈali.|0
karˈibu mvˈuke ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa. wakˈati mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌeitʃukˈua na mnaˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba mnatˈii ˈamri na ʃerˈia zˈote nˌinazˌoziwˈeka mbˈele jˈenu lˈeo.|0
hˈizi ndˈizo ˈamri na ʃerˈia ambˈazo ni lazˈima ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌuzifuˈata katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌamewˈapa kˌumilˈiki, kwa mˈuda wˈote mtˌakaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌaribˈuni kabˈisa kˈila mahˈali pˈao pa kˌuabudˈia kwˈeɲe milˈima mirˈefu, vilˈima na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti mkˈubwa ambˈamo mˌataˈifa hˈaja mnˌajokwˈenda kˌutʃukˈua ˈarði jˈao hˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
bˌomoˈeni mˌaðabˈahu zˈao, vuɲɟˈeni jˈale mˈawe wˌanajˌoabˈudu, tʃomˈeni mˈoto ŋɡˈuzo zˈao za aʃˈera; kˌatiliˈeni mbˈali sanˈamu za miˈuŋɡu jˈao na mfˈute maɟˈina jˈao mahˈali hˈapo.|0
kˈamwe msˌimwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌama wˌanavjˌoabˈudu wˈao.|0
bˌali mtˌatafˈuta mahˈali bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua katˌika mˌakabˈila jˈenu jˈote ˌili ˌaliwˈeke ɟˈina lˈake hˌuko kˌuwa makˈao jˈake. mahˈali hˈapo ndˈipo ˌiwapasˈapo kwˈenda.|0
hˈapo ndˈipo mtˌakapolˈeta sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu, zˈaka zˈenu na tʃaŋɡˈizo zˈenu, kˈile ˌulitʃowˈeka naðˈiri kutˈoa, sadˈaka zˈenu za hiˈari na mˌalimbˈuko ja makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe pamˈoɟa na mbˈuzi na kondˈoo.|0
hˈapo, katˌika uwˈepo wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa zˈenu, mtakˈula na kˌufurahˈia kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo mmeɡˈusa kwa mikˈono jˈenu, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˌabarˈiki.|0
msifˈaɲe kˌama tˌunavjofˈaɲa hˈapa lˈeo, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌanavjopˈenda mweɲˈewe.|0
kwa kˌuwa bˈado hˌamɟafikˈia mahˈali pa mˌapumzˈiko na urˈiθi ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa.|0
lakˈini mtavˈuka jordˈani na kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanajowˈapa kˌama urˈiθi, nˌaje ˌatawˈapa pumzˈiko kˌutokˈana na adˈui zˈenu wˈote wˌanaˌowazuŋɡˈuka ˌili nˈiɲi mpˈate kuˈiʃi kwa salˈama.|0
kˈiʃa kuhˈusu mahˈali bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuwa mahˈali pa makˈao ja ɟˈina lˈake, hˈapo ndˈipo ˌinapˌowapˈasa kulˈeta kˈila kˈitu nˌinatʃˌowaamˈuru: sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu, zˈaka zˈenu na tʃaŋɡˈizo, pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vjˈote vjˌeɲe θamˈani ambˈavjo mmewˈeka naðˈiri kˌumtolˈea bwˈana.|0
hˈapo fˌurahˈini mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˈiɲi, wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, pamˈoɟa na walˈawi kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈenu ambˈao hawˈana mɡˈawo wˈala urˈiθi wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu, msitˈoe ðabˈihu zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa mahˈali popˈote mnˌapopapˈenda.|0
mtˌazitˈoa tu mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo bwˈana ˌatatʃaɡˈua katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˌakabˈila jˈenu, nˌaɲi hˈapo zˌiŋɡatiˈeni kˈila ɟˈambo nˌinalˌowaamˈuru.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mnawˈeza kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa waɲˈama wˈenu katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu jojˈote ˈile na kˈula ɲˈama ɲˈiŋɡi mpendˈavjo kˌama vˈile mmemtʃˈiɲɟa pˈaa ˌau kulˈuŋɡu, kˌuliŋɡˈana na barˈaka mtˌakazˌoɟalˈiwa na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. wˈatu walˈio naɟˈisi ˌau walˈio sˈafi wˌanawˈeza kˈula.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe usˈiɲue dˈamu; imwˈaɡe ɟˌuːja ˈarði kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
hˌamruhusˈiwi kˈula katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu zˈaka jˈenu ja nafˈaka, ja divˈai ˈm̩pja na ja mafˈuta, ˌau mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe na makˈundi jˈenu ja mbˈuzi na kondˈoo, wˈala tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo mmewˈeka naðˈiri kˌukitˈoa, ˌau sadˈaka zˈako za hiˈari, wˈala mˌatolˈeo maˈalum.|0
badˈala jˈake, mtakˈula vˈitu hˈivjo katˌika uwˈepo wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua: wˈewe, wˈana wˈako na bˈinti zˈako, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, na walˈawi kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈenu. mnˌatakˈiwa mfurˈahi mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa kˈula kˈitu mtˌakatʃowˈeka mikˈono jˈenu.|0
ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu msˌiwapuˈuze walˈawi kwa mˈuda wˈote mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌameoŋɡˈeza ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi, nˌaɲi mkˌitamˈani ɲˈama na mkisˈema, nˌiŋɡepˈenda ɲˈama, hˈapo ˌunawˈeza kˈula ɲˈiŋɡi ˌupendˈavjo.|0
kˌama mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua kuwˈeka ɟˈina lˈake ni mbˈali sˈana kutˈoka kwˈenu, ˌunawˈeza kutʃˈiɲɟa waɲˈama kutˈoka makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe, ja mbˈuzi na ja kondˈoo ambˈajo bwˈana ˌamewˈapa, kˌama nˌilivjˌokuamˈuru, na mkˈiwa katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu weɲˈewe mnawˈeza kˈula ɲˈiŋɡi mtakˈavjo.|0
ˈm̩le kˌama vˈile mŋɡekˈula pˈaa na kulˈuŋɡu. wˈote walˈio naɟˈisi kˌiibˈada na walˈio sˈafi mwawˈeza kˈula.|0
lakˈini hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba hamkˈuɲua dˈamu, kwa sabˈabu dˈamu ni uhˈai, kˈamwe msˈile uhˈai pamˈoɟa na ɲˈama.|0
hˌamruhusˈiwi kˈamwe kˈuɲua dˈamu; ˌimwaɡˈeni ɟˌuːja ˈarði kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
msˈiɲue dˈamu, ˌili mwˈeze kˌufanikˈiwa nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈenu baˌada jˈenu, kwa sabˈabu mtakˈuwa mkifˈaɲa lilˈilo hˈaki matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
lakˈini vˌitʃukuˈeni vˈitu vjˈenu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu pamˈoɟa na vˈile mlˌivjowˈeka naðˈiri, mwˈende mahˈali pˈale bwˈana ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua.|0
letˈeni sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, vjˈote ɲˈama na dˈamu. dˈamu ja ðabˈihu zˈenu lazˈima ˌimimˈinwe kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, lakˈini ɲˈama mnawˈeza kˈula.|0
ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii maʃˈarti hˈaja jˈote nˌinajowˈapa, ˌili kwˌamba sˈiku zˈote mwˈeze kˌufanikˈiwa, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈenu baˌada jˈenu, kwa sabˈabu mtakˈuwa mkifˈaɲa lilˈilo ɟˈema na sahˈihi mbˈele za mˈatʃo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatajˌakatilˈia mbˈali mbˈele jˈenu mˌataˈifa ambˈajo pˈunde kidˈoɡo mtˌajavamˈia na kˌujaondˈoa. lakˈini mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌejafukˈuza na kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
na baˌada ja kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa mbˈele jˈenu, ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu msˌiɟiiŋɡˈize katˌika tˈanzi kwa kˌuulˈiza habˈari za miˈuŋɡu jˈao, mkisˈema, ɟˈe, mˌataˈifa hˈaja hˌutumˌikiˈaɟe miˈuŋɡu jˈao? nˌasi tˌutafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo.|0
kˈamwe msˌimwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa ɲɟˈia wˌanajˌoabˈudu miˈuŋɡu jˈao, kwa sabˈabu katˌika kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu jˈao, wˌanafˈaɲa aˈina zˈote za mˌatʃukˈizo ˌanajˌojatʃukˈia bwˈana. hˌata hˌuwatˌeketˈeza wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao kwa mˈoto kˌama kafˈara kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
ˌaŋɡaliˈeni kwˌamba mnafˈaɲa jˈote nˌilijˌowaamˈuru; msˌioŋɡˈeze kˈitu wˈala msˌipuŋɡˈuze kˈitu.|0
kˌama nabˈii, ˌau jˈule ˌanajˌetabˈiri kwa ɲɟˈia ja ndˈoto, ˌakiɟˌitokˈeza mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu na ˌakawˌataŋɡazˈia iʃˈara ja mˌiuɟˈiza na aɟˈabu.|0
ikˈiwa iʃˈara ˌau aɟˈabu ja ˌalijˌozuŋɡˈumza ˌikatokˈea, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, na tˌufuˈate miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo hˌamɟaˌifahˈamu na tˌuiabˈudu.|0
kˈamwe msˌijasˌikilˈize manˈeno ja nabˈii wˈala mwˈota ndˈoto hˈujo. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˌaɟarˈibu kˌuaŋɡalˈia kˌama mnampˈenda kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈenu jˈote.|0
ni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ambˈaje mnapˈaswa kˌumfuˈata tˈena ni jˌeje mnapˈaswa kˌumheʃˈimu. ʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake na kumtˈii, mtˌumikiˈeni na kˌuʃikamˈana nˈaje.|0
hˈujo nabˈii ˌau mwˈota ndˈoto lazˈima ˌauˈawe, kwa sabˈabu ˌamehubˈiri uˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈaje ˌaliwatˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na kˌuwakombˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa; ˌameɟarˈibu kˌuwaɡeˈuza kutˈoka ɲɟˈia ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwˌaaɡˈiza mfuˈate. ni lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
kˌama ndˈuɡu jˈako hˈasa, ˌau mwanˈao ˌau bˈinti jˈako, ˌau ˈm̩ke ˌumpendˈaje, ˌau rafˈiki jˈako wa karˈibu sˈana ˌakikˌuʃawˈiʃi kwa sˈiri, ˌakisˈema, na twˈende tˌukaabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo nˈiɲi wˈala bˈaba zˈenu hˌamkuˌifahˈamu.|0
miˈuŋɡu ja wˈatu wˌanaˌowazuŋɡˈuka, ikˈiwa karˈibu ˌau mbˈali, kutˈoka mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa wa ˈn̩tʃi mpˈaka mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ˌusikubˈali wˈala ˌusimsˌikilˈize. ˌusimhˌurumˈie! ˌusimwˈatʃe wˈala ˌusimkˈiŋɡe.|0
hakˈika ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe. ni lazˈima mkˈono wˈako ˈuwe wa kwˈanza katˌika kˌumuˈua kˈiʃa mikˈono ja wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
mpiɡˈeni kwa mˈawe mpˈaka ˈafe, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliɟarˈibu kˌuwaɡeˈuza mtˈoke kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ambˈaje ˌaliwatˈoa mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌatasikˈia na kˌuoɡˈopa, wˈala hakˈuna mmˈoɟa mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌatakˌajefˈaɲa uˈovu tˈena.|0
kˌama mkˌisikˈia ˌikisˈemwa kwˌamba mˈoɟa ja mˈiɟi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa m̩kˈae ndˈani jˈake.|0
kˈuna wˌanaˈume waˈovu wˌameinˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu na wˌamewˌapotˈoʃa wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi, wˌakisˈema, twendˈeni tˌukaabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo hˌamkuˌifahˈamu.|0
ndˈipo ˌitakubˈidi kˌuulˈiza, kupˈima na kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza kwa makˈini. kˌama ni kwˈeli, tˈena ˌikihˌakikˈiʃwa kwˌamba ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitʃukizˈalo lˌimefaɲˈika mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
kwa hakˈika ni lazˈima ˌm̩waˈue kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈale wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ˈule. ˌuharibˈuni kabˈisa, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake na mifˈuɡo jˈake.|0
kˌusaɲˈeni ɲˈara zˈote za ˈm̩ɟi katˌika uwˈaɲɟa wa wˈazi na kˌuutʃˈoma ˈm̩ɟi kabˈisa pamˈoɟa na ɲˈara zˌake zˈote kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. ˌutabˈaki kˌuwa maɡˈofu milˈele na hˌautaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena.|0
hakˈuna kimˈoɟa kˈati ja vˈitu vˌilivjˌolaanˈiwa kˌitakˌatʃokˈutwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, ˌili bwˈana ˌaɡeˈuze hasˈira jˌake kˈali. ˌatawˌahurumˈia na kˌuwa na rehˈema kwˈenu pˈia kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi jˈenu, kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi bˈaba zˈenu.|0
kwa sabˈabu mnamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mkˌiziʃˈika ˈamri zˌake zˈote zˈile nˌinazowˈapa lˈeo na kufˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
nˈiɲi ni watˈoto wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. msˌiɟitʃˈaɲɟe ˌama kˌuɟiɲˈoa upˈara kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi la ˈuso kwa aɟˈili ja ˌalijekˈufa.|0
kwa maˈana nˈiɲi ni taˈifa tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. bwˈana ˌamewˌatʃaɡˈua nˈiɲi kˌuwa taˈifa la kˌipekˈee kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia, ˈm̩we tˈunu jˈake.|0
msˈile kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo ni mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio waɲˈama mtˌakaokˈula: ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo, mbˈuzi.|0
kulˈuŋɡu, pˈaa, koŋɡˈoni, pˈaa mweˈupe, mbˌuzimwˈitu, pˈofu na kondˈoo wa mlimˈani.|0
mnawˈeza kˈumla mɲˈama jejˈote mwˌeɲe kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika mˈara mbˈili, pˈia jˈule ˌanajˌetʃeˈua.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌotʃeˈua ˌau wˈale walˈio na kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika kˈamwe msˈile ŋɡamˈia, suŋɡˈura na pelˈele. iwˈapo wˌanatʃeˈua, lakˈini hawˈana kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika; ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu kwa tˌaratˈibu za kˌiibˈada.|0
ŋɡurˈuwe pˈia ni naɟˈisi; iŋɡˈawa ˈana kwˈato zˌilizˌoɡawaɲˈika, hˌatʃeˈui. msˈile ɲˈama jˌake wˈala kuɡˈusa mzˈoɡa wˈake.|0
katˌika viˈumbe hˈai vjˈote vˌiiʃˈivjo kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi, mnawˈeza kˈula jejˈote alˈije na mapˈezi na maɡˈamba.|0
lakˈini tʃotʃˈote kisˈitʃo na mapˈezi na maɡˈamba msˈile; kwˈenu ni naɟˈisi.|0
mnawˈeza kˈula ndˈeɡe jejˈote alˈije sˈafi.|0
lakˈini wˌafuatˈao msiwˈale: tˈai, fˌurukˈombe, kipˈuŋɡu.|0
keŋɡˈewa mwekˈundu, keŋɡˈewa mweˈusi, mwˈewe wa aˈina jojˈote.|0
kuŋɡˈuru wa aˈina jojˈote.|0
mbˈuni, kˌirukaɲɟˈia, dˌudumˈizi, kipˈaŋɡa wa aˈina jojˈote.|0
mwˈari, ndˈeri, mnˈandi.|0
wadˈudu wˈote wˌarukˈao kwa makˈundi ni naɟˈisi kwˈenu, msiwˈale.|0
lakˈini viˈumbe vjˈote vjˌeɲe mabˈawa vilˈivjo sˈafi mwawˈeza kˈula.|0
msˈile kˈitu tʃotʃˈote mtˌakatʃokˈuta kˌimekˈufa. mnawˈeza kˈumpa mɡˈeni jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi jˈenu, nˌaje ˌanawˈeza kˈula ˌau mnawˈeza kˌumuuzˈia ˈm̩tu wa ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine. lakˈini nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˌatakatˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. msˌitokˈose mwˌanambˈuzi katˌika mazˈiwa ja mˈama jˈake.|0
hˌakikiʃˈeni mmetˈeŋɡa sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja mazˈao jˈote ja maʃˈamba jˈenu kˈila mwˈaka.|0
mtakˈula zˈaka za nafˈaka jˈenu, divˈai ˈm̩pja, mafˈuta na wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe na ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu pˈale mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua kˌama maskˈani kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake, ˌili kwˌamba mpˈate kˌuɟifˈunza kˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu daˈima.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mahˈali pˈale ni mbˈali sˈana nˌaɲi mmˌebarikˈiwa na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na hamwˈezi kubˈeba zˈaka jˈenu kwa sabˈabu mahˈali pˈale bwˈana ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuliwˈeka ɟˈina lˈake ni mbˈali sˈana.|0
bˌasi bˌadiliʃˈeni zˈaka jˈenu kˌuwa fˈeða, mkˌaitʃukˈue hˈijo fˈeða mwˈende nˈajo mahˈali bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua.|0
tˌumiˈeni hˈijo fˈeða kˌununˈua tʃotʃˈote ˌukitakˈatʃo: ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo, divˈai ˌau kˌiɲuˈaɟi tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu ˌau tʃotʃˈote mnˌatʃotˈaka. kˈiʃa nˈiɲi na wa ɲumbˈani mwˈenu mtaˈila mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌufurˈahi.|0
msiˈatʃe kˌuwaɟˈali walˈawi wˌaiʃˈio katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu, kwa kˌuwa hˈao hawˈana ʃˈamba wˈala urˈiθi wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈila mwˈaka wa tˈatu, letˈeni zˈaka zˈote za mazˈao ja miˈaka ˈile na ˌujahifˈaði kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈenu.|0
ˌili walˈawi ambˈao hawˈana maʃˈamba wˈala urˈiθi wˌao weɲˈewe na waɡˈeni, jatˈima na waɟˈane wˌanaoˈiʃi kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈenu wapˈate kˈuɟa kˈula na kuʃˈiba, ˌili bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu apˈate kˌuwabarˈiki nˈiɲi katˌika kˈazi zˈote za mikˈono jˈenu.|0
kˈila mwˈiʃo wa miˈaka sˈaba ni lazˈima mfˈute madˈeni.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjofaɲˈika: kˈila mkˌopeʃˈaɟi ˌatafˈuta mkˈopo ˌaliˌomkopˈeʃa mwˌisraˈeli mwenzˈake. hˌatamtˈaka mwˌisraˈeli mwenzˈake ˌau ndˈuɡu jˌake amlˈipe hˌilo dˈeni, kwa sabˈabu wakˈati wa bwˈana wa kufˈuta madˈeni ˌumetaŋɡˈazwa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hˌapatˌakuwˈepo maskˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, kwa kˌuwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanajowˈapa kˌuimilˈiki kˌama urˈiθi wˈenu, ˌatawˌabarˈiki sˈana.|0
ikˈiwa tˌutamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌikamilˈifu na kˌuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌujafuˈata mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˈote nˌinajowˈapa lˈeo.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌabarˈiki kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, nˌaɲi mtˌawakopˈeʃa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi lakˈini hˌamtakˈopa kwa jejˈote. mtˌatawˈala mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi lakˈini hakˈuna taˈifa lˌitakˌalowˌatawˈala nˈiɲi.|0
ikˈiwa kˈuna ˈm̩tu maskˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈenu, katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wowˈote wa hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa, msˈiwe na mˈojo mɡˈumu wˈala ˌusimfumbˈie mkˈono ndˈuɡu jˈako alˈije maskˈini.|0
ˌafaðˈali fuŋɡˈua mikˈono jˈako na ˌumkopˈeʃe kwa hiˈari tʃotʃˈote ˌanatʃˌohitˈaɟi.|0
ɟˌihaðˈari ˌusiɟˌiwekˈee wˈazo hˈili ˈovu: mwˈaka wa sˈaba, mwˈaka wa kufˈuta madˈeni ˌumekˌaribˈia, usˈiɟe ˌukaoɲˈeʃa nˈia m̩bˈaja kwa ndˈuɡu jˈako mhitˈaɟi na ˌukaˈatʃa kˈumpa tʃotʃˈote. ˌanawˈeza kˌumlalˌamikˈia bwˈana ðˈidi jˈako nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa ˌumepˌatikˈana na hatˈia ja ðˈambi.|0
ˈm̩pe kwa ˌukarˈimu na ufˈaɲe hˈivjo bˌila kiɲˈoŋɡo mojˈoni, ndˈipo kwa sabˈabu ja hˈili bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌubarˈiki katˌika kˈazi zˈako zˈote na kwa kˈila kˈitu ˌutakˌatʃokˌiwekˈea mkˈono wˈako.|0
sˈiku zˈote wˌatakuwˈepo wˈatu maskˈini katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. kwa hˈijo nˌinawˌaamˈuru ˈm̩we na mikˈono ˌilijˌokuɲɟulˈiwa kˌuwaˌelekˈea ndˈuɡu zˈenu, kˌuwaˌelekˈea maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu.|0
kˌama mwˌebranˈia mwenzˈako, mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke, ˌakiɟiˈuza kwˈako na kˌukutˌumikˈia miˈaka sˈita, katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba ni lazˈima umwˈatʃe aˈende zˌake akˈiwa hˈuru.|0
nˌawe wakˈati ˌutakˌapomwatʃˈia ˌusimwˈatʃe aˈende mikˈono mitˈupu.|0
ˈm̩pe kwa uhˈuru kutˈoka zˈizi lˈako la kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, kutˈoka sakˈafu jˈako ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka na kutˈoka mˌaʃinikˈizo jˈako ja kˌukamulˈia divˈai. ˈm̩pe kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalivjˌokubarˈiki.|0
kˌumbukˈeni kˌuwa nˈiɲi mlikˈuwa watˈumwa hˌuko mˈisri nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌaliwˌakombˈoa. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌimewˈapa aɡˈizo hˈili lˈeo.|0
lakˈini mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌakikˌuambˈia, sitˈaki kˌukuˈatʃa, kwa sabˈabu ˌanakupˈenda wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈako nˌaje ˌanariðˈika nˈawe.|0
ndˈipo ˌutatʃukˈua tʃˈuma kidˈoɡo ˌutobˈoe sikˈio lˈake mpˈaka hˈitʃo tʃˈuma kˌiiŋɡˈie kwˈeɲe ubˈao wa mlˈaŋɡo, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa maˈiʃa. ufˈaɲe vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike.|0
ˌusifikˈiri kˌuwa kˈuna uɡˈumu kumwˈatʃa mtumˈiʃi wˈako hˈuru, kwa sabˈabu ˌutumˈiʃi wˌake kwˈako kwa miˈaka hˌii sˈita ˌumekˈuwa wa θamˈani mˈara mbˈili ja uɟˈira wa mtumˈiʃi wa kˌuaɟirˈiwa. nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌubarikˈia kwa kˈila kˈitu ˌutakˌatʃofˈaɲa.|0
wekˈeni wˈakfu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˈila mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume wa makˈundi jˈenu ja ŋɡˈombe na ja mbˈuzi na kondˈoo. maksˈai walˈio wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza msˌiwafaɲˈize kˈazi, wˈala msiɲˈoe maɲˈoja ja wˌazalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa kondˈoo.|0
kˈila mwˈaka nˈiɲi na ɟamˈaa zˈenu mtapˈaswa kuwˈala mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu pˈale mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua.|0
kˌama mɲˈama ˈana dosˈari, akˈiwa ni kilˈema ˌau kipˈofu ˌau kˌama ˈana kilˈema kibˈaja, kˈamwe ˌusimtˈoe ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
ˌitawapˈasa kˈumla nˈiɲi weɲˈewe katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu. wˈote wasˈio sˈafi na walˈio sˈafi kwa destˈuri za kˌiibˈada mwawˈeza kˈula kˌama vˈile mnˌavjokˈula pˈaa ˌau kulˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe msˈiɲue dˈamu; ˌimwaɡˈeni arðˈini kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
ʃikˈeni mwˈezi wa abˈibu, na kˌuiˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kwa sabˈabu katˌika mwˈezi wa abˈibu, mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwatˈoa mˈisri usˈiku.|0
mtatˈoa ðabˈihu ja pasˈaka ja mɲˈama kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kutˈoka kˈundi lˈenu la mbˈuzi na kondˈoo ˌau la ŋɡˈombe, mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo bwˈana ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua kˌama makˈao kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake.|0
msˈile ɲˈama hˈijo pamˈoɟa na mikˈate ˌilijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, lakˈini kwa sˈiku sˈaba mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, mikˈate ja kˌuɟitˈesa, kwa sabˈabu mlˌiondˈoka mˈisri kwa harˈaka, ˌili kwˌamba sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈenu mpˈate kˌukumbˈuka wakˈati wˈenu wa kˌuondˈoka mˈisri.|0
tʃˈatʃu ˌisiˌonekˈane katˌika mˈali zˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu jˈote kwa sˈiku sˈaba. ɲˈama jojˈote ja ðabˈihu mtˌakajotˈoa ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja kwˈanza ˌisibakˈizwe mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
kˈamwe msitˈoe ðabˈihu ja pasˈaka katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wowˈote ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa.|0
ˌisipokˈuwa mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua kˌama makˈao kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake. hˈapo ndˈipo lazˈima m̩tˈoe ðabˈihu ja pasˈaka ɟiˈoni, ɟˈua lˌitakˌapotˈua, ˈiwe kˌumbukˈumbu jˈenu ja kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
okˈeni na ˈm̩le mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua, kˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi mrˈudi kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈenu.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈita mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu na sˈiku ja sˈaba faɲˈeni kˌusaɲˈiko kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na msifˈaɲe kˈazi.|0
mhesˈabu maɟˈuma sˈaba ʃˈu wakˈati mnˌapoˈanza kˌutʃukˈua mˈundu kuvˈuna nafˈaka.|0
ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua kˌama makˈao ja ɟˈina lˈake, nˈiɲi, wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, walˈawi walˈio katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu, na waɡˈeni, jatˈima na waɟˈane wˌaiʃˈio mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
kˌumbukˈeni kwˌamba mlikˈuwa watˈumwa kˈule mˈisri na mfuˈate ˈamri hˈizi kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu.|0
ˌaðimiʃˈeni sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda kwa sˈiku sˈaba baˌada ja kˌukusˈaɲa mazˈao jˈenu ja nafˈaka na kˌukamˈua zabˈibu.|0
mfˌurahˈie sˌikukˈuu jˈenu, nˈiɲi, wˈana wˈenu, bˈinti zˈenu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, walˈawi, waɡˈeni, jatˈima na waɟˈane ambˈao wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba mtˌaiˌaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu katˌika mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua bwˈana. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌabarˈiki katˌika mavˈuno jˈenu na katˌika kˈazi zˈote za mikˈono jˈenu na furˈaha jˈenu ˌitakˌamilˈika.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈenu wˈote lazˈima wˌaɟitokˈeze mˈara tˈatu kwa mwˈaka mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua: kwa aɟˈili ja sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, sˌikukˈuu ja maɟˈuma, na sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeɟˌitokˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana mikˈono mitˈupu.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ni lazˈima alˈete zawˈadi kˌuliŋɡˈana na ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌowabarˈiki.|0
wˌateˈue wˌaamˈuzi na mˌaafˈisa kwa kˈila kabˈila lˈenu katˌika kˈila ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa, nˌao wˌatawˌaamˈua wˈatu kwa usˈawa.|0
msˌipotˈoʃe hˈaki wˈala msifˈaɲe ˌupendelˈeo. msˌikubˈali rˈuʃwa kwa sabˈabu rˈuʃwa hˌupofˈuʃa mˈatʃo ja wˌeɲe busˈara na kˌuɡeˈuza manˈeno ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
mfuˈate hˈaki na hˈaki pˈeke jˈake, ˌili mwˈeze kuˈiʃi na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa.|0
msˌisimamˈiʃe ŋɡˈuzo jojˈote ja aʃˈera kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu mlˌijomɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
wˈala msˌisimamˈiʃe ɟˈiwe la kˌuabˈudu, kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanavˌitʃukˈia vˈitu hˈivi.|0
msˌimtolˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ðabˈihu ja maksˈai ˌau kondˈoo ambˈaje ˈana dosˈari jojˈote ˌau hˌitilˈafu ndˈani jˈake, kwa kˌuwa hˌilo lˌitakˈuwa tʃukˈizo kwˈake.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˌanajeˈiʃi kˈati ja mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi ˌakupˈajo bwˈana, ˌanakˈutwa ˌanafˈaɲa uˈovu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kwa kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈake.|0
nˌaje ˌamekwˈenda kiɲˈume na aɡˈizo lˈaŋɡu kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia, kˌama vˈile ɟˈua, mwˈezi ˌau ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani.|0
hˈili likˈiwa lˌimelˈetwa mbˈele jˈenu, ni lazˈima kˌulitʃuŋɡˈuza kˌikamilˈifu. ikˈiwa ni kwˈeli na kˌuwa lˌimehˌakikˈiʃwa kwˌamba hˈili ni tʃukˈizo lˌililˌofaɲˈika katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
mtʃˌukuˈeni hˈujo mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ambˈaje ˌamelifˈaɲa tˈendo hˈili ˈovu kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi wˈenu na kumpˈiɡa mˈawe ˈm̩tu hˈujo mpˈaka ˈafe.|0
kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa mˌaʃahˈidi wawˈili ˌau watˈatu ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatauˈawa, bˌali hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeuˈawa kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa ʃahˈidi mmˈoɟa tˈu.|0
ni lazˈima kwˈanza mikˈono ja mˌaʃahˈidi ˌitaŋɡulˈie kˌumuˈua hˈujo ˈm̩tu, kˈiʃa mikˈono ja wˈatu wˈote. ni lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
kˌama mˌaʃaˈuri jˌanalˈetwa katˌika mˌahakˈama zˈenu ambˈajo ni maɡˈumu zaˈidi kwˈenu kˌujaamˈua, ikˈiwa ni ˌumwaɡˈaɟi wa dˈamu, madˈai ˌau mˌaʃambulˈio, jˌapelekˈeni mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua.|0
nendˈeni kwa mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi, na kwa mwamˈuzi ambˈaje ˌatakˈuwa kazˈini wakˈati hˈuo. ˌulizˈeni kwˈao nˌao wˌatawˈapa mˌaamˈuzi.|0
ni lazˈima mtˈende sˌawasˈawa na mˌaamˈuzi wˌatakˌajowˈapa mahˈali bwˈana ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua. kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu wˌatakˌatʃowˌaoŋɡˈoza kufˈaɲa.|0
faɲˈeni sˌawasˈawa na ʃerˈia wˌanajˌowafundˈiʃa na mˌaamˈuzi wˌanajowˈapa. msˌiɡeˈuke mkˈono wa kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto kuˈatʃa kufˈaɲa jˈale wˌanajˌowaambˈia.|0
mwˌanaˈume ˌatakˌajeoɲˈeʃa ðarˈau kwa mwamˈuzi ˌau kwa kuhˈani ambˈaje ˌamewˈekwa kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu lazˈima ˌauˈawe. lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌatasikˈia na kˌuoɡˈopa, nˌao hˌawatakˈuwa wˌeɲe kˌuðarˈau tˈena.|0
wakˈati ˌutakˌapoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌanajowˈapa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌuimilˈiki na kukˈaa hˈumo, nˌaɲi mkasˈema, na tumwˈeke mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈetu kˌama mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌotuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
kuwˈeni na ˌuhakˈika wa kumwˈeka mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈenu ambˈaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatamtʃaɡˈua. ni lazˈima atˈoke mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈenu weɲˈewe. msimwˈeke mɡˈeni ɟˈuu jˈenu ambˈaje si ndˈuɡu wa kˌiisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˈamwe mfˈalme ˌasiɟˌipatˈie hesˈabu kˈubwa ja farˈasi kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe, ˌau kˌuwafˈaɲa wˈatu warˈudi mˈisri ˌili kupˈata farˈasi zaˈidi, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamekˌuambˈia, hˌamtaˌirudˈia ɲɟˈia ˈile tˈena.|0
kˈamwe ˌasiˈoe wˌake wˈeŋɡi, la sˈivjo mˈojo wˌake ˌutapotˈoka. kˈamwe ˌasiɟˌilimbˌikizˈie kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa fˈeða na ðahˈabu.|0
ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamekalˈia kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme wˈake, ˌaɟiˌandikˈie kwˈeɲe kitˈabu nakˈala ja ʃerˈia kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe kutˈoka zˈile ʃerˈia za mˌakuhˈani ambˈao ni walˈawi.|0
ˌatakˈuwa na nakˈala hˈijo, nˌaje ˌataisˈoma sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˌake ˌili kwˌamba ˌaɟifˈunze kˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake na kˌufuˈata kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii na ˈamri hˈizi.|0
nˌaje ˌasiɟˌifikirˈie kˌuwa ni bˈora kulˈiko ndˈuɡu zˌake na kˌuipotˈoʃa ʃerˈia. ndˈipo jˌeje na wazˈao wˌake wˌatatawˈala katˌika ufˈalme wˌake kwa mˈuda mrˈefu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˌakuhˈani ambˈao ni walˈawi, jaˈani kabˈila lˈote la lˈawi, hˌawatakˈuwa na mɡˈawo wˈala urˈiθi pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli. wˌataˈiʃi kwa sadˈaka zˌitolewˈazo kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, kwa maˈana hˈuo n̩dˈio urˈiθi wˈao.|0
hˌawatakˈuwa na urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈao; bwˈana n̩dˈije urˈiθi wˈao, kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu la mˌakuhˈani kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˌatakˌaotˈoa ðabˈihu ja fahˈali ˌau kondˈoo: m̩ɡˈuu wa mbˈele, matˈaja na matˈumbo.|0
mtawˈapa mˌalimbˈuko ja nafˈaka zˈenu, divˈai ˈm̩pja, mafˈuta na sˈufu ja kwˈanza kutˈoka maɲˈoja ja kondˈoo zˈenu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˌatʃaɡˈua pamˈoɟa na wazˈao wˌao kutˈoka mˌakabˈila jˈenu kˌusimˈama na kˌuhudˈumu katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana sˈiku zˈote.|0
ikˈiwa mlˈawi ˌatahˈama kutˈoka mmˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi jˈenu popˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli ambˈapo ˌanaˈiʃi, akˈaɟa kwa mˈojo wˈote mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua.|0
ˌanawˈeza ˌakahudˈumu katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake kˌama walˈawi wenzˈake wˈote wˌanaˌohudˈumu hˈapo mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ˌataʃirˈiki sˈawa katˌika mafˈao jˈao, hˌata kˌama ˌamepokˈea fˈeða kutˈoka maˈuzo ja mˈali ja ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa, msˌiɟifˈunze kuˈiɡa ɲɟˈia za mˌatʃukˈizo za mˌataˈifa ja hˌuko.|0
ˌasiˌonekˈane ˈm̩tu jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌampitiʃˈaje mwanˈawe ˌau bˈinti jˌake katˌika mˈoto, ˌatakˌajefˈaɲa ˌuaɡˈuzi, ulˈozi, ˌanajˌetabˈiri ɲakˈati, ˌanajˌeɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃa na utʃˈawi.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌafaɲˈaje mˈambo hˈaja ni tʃukˈizo kwa bwˈana, tˈena ni kwa sabˈabu ja matˈendo hˈaja ja kˌutʃukˈiza wˌajafaɲˈajo n̩dˈijo maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatajˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa hˈajo mbˈele jˈenu.|0
kˈamwe msˌilaumˈiwe mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
mˌataˈifa mtˌakajˌowafukˈuza hˌusikilˈiza wˈale wˌafaɲˈao ulˈozi na ˌuaɡˈuzi. lakˈini kwˈenu nˈiɲi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu hˌaɟawˌaruhˈusu kufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌainulˈia nabˈii kˌama mˌimi kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈenu weɲˈewe. msˌikilizˈeni jˈeje.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈivi ndˈivjo mlˌivjomwˈomba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˈule horˈebu sˈiku ˈile ja kˌusaɲˈiko, wakˈati mlˌiposˈema, na tˌusiˌisikˈie saˈuti ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, wˈala kˌuuˈona mˈoto hˈuu mkˈubwa tˈena, ˌama sˈivjo tˌutakˈufa.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia: wˌanatʃosˈema ni vjˈema.|0
nˌitawˌainulˈia nabˈii kˌama wˌewe kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈao; nˌitawˈeka manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake, nˌaje ˌatawˌaambˈia kˈila kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃomwamˈuru.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote hˌatasˌikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ambˈajo hˈujo nabˈii ˌatajasˈema kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitamwˌaɟibˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini nabˈii ambˈaje ˌataθubˈutu kusˈema kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo sˌikumwamˈuru ˌakisˈeme, ˌau nabˈii ambˈaje husˈema kwa ɟˈina la miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe.|0
mnawˈeza kˌuulizˈana weɲˈewe, tˌutawezˈaɟe kuɟˈua wakˈati uɟˈumbe hˌaukusˈemwa na bwˈana.|0
ikˈiwa kˈile nabˈii ˌanatʃˌotaŋɡˈaza kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana hˌakikˌutokˈea ˌau kˌutimˈia, hˈuo ni uɟˈumbe ambˈao bwˈana hˌakusˈema. nabˈii hˈujo ˌamesˈema kwa ˌuɟuˈaɟi. msˌimwoɡˈope hˈujo.|0
wakˈati bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamewˌaaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa ambˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌanawˈapa nˈiɲi, wakˈati mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌewafukˈuza na kuˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao na ɲˈumba zˈao.|0
ndˈipo mtˈeŋɡe mˈiɟi mitˈatu ˌilijˈopo kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ɟeŋɡˈeni bˌarabˈara katˌika mˈiɟi hˈijo na kˌuiɡˈawa mˈara tˈatu, ˈn̩tʃi ˌanajowˈapa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌama urˈiθi, ˌili kwˌamba jejˈote ˌamuuˈaje ˈm̩tu awˈeze kˌukimbilˈia hˈumo.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo kanˈuni kuhˈusu ˈm̩tu ˌamuuˈaje mwiŋɡˈine na kˌukimbilˈia hˈumo kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake, jaˈani, jˌeje ˌamuuˈaje ɟirˈani jˌake bˌila kˌukusudˈia, wˈala hˌakumtʃukˈia kˈabla ja hˈapo.|0
kwa mfˈano, ˈm̩tu awˈeza kwˈenda msitˈuni na ɟirˈani jˌake kukˈata mˈiti, nˌaje ˌanapˌozuŋɡˈuʃa ʃˈoka kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa ˈm̩ti, ʃˈoka lˌinawˈeza kˌutʃomˈoka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mpˈini na kumpˈiɡa ɟirˈani jˌake na kˌumuˈua. jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeza kˌukimbilˈia katˌika mmˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi hˌii na kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
kˌama sˈivjo, mlipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu ˌanawˈeza kˌumfuˌatilˈia kwa hasˈira kˈali, nˌaje ˌakamkamˈata na kˌumuˈua kˌama umbˈali ni mrˈefu sˈana hˌata iŋɡˈawa hˌastahˈili kˈifo, kwa sabˈabu ˌamemuˈua ɟirˈani jˌake bˌila kˌukusudˈia.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌimewˌaaɡˈiza nˈiɲi kutˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi mitˈatu ja mˌakimbilˈio kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌakipanˈua ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi kwa kiˈapo kwa bˈaba zˈenu na kuwˈapa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌalijˌowaahˈidi.|0
kwa sabˈabu mmˌefuˈata kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu ʃerˈia zˈote nˌinazˌowaamˈuru lˈeo, kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌuenˈenda sˈiku zˈote katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, ndˈipo mtˈeŋɡe mˈiɟi miŋɡˈine, mitˈatu zaˈidi.|0
faɲˈeni hˈivi ˌili dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia ˌisimwˈaɡwe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌama urˈiθi wˈenu, ˌili kwˌamba msˈiɟe mkˈawa na hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanamtʃukˈia ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌakamvizˈia, ˌakamʃˌambulˈia na kˌumuˈua, kˈiʃa ˌakakˌimbilˈia katˌika mmˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi hˌii.|0
wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˌatatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwˈake, kumlˈeta kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi ˈule na kˌumkabˈiði mlipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu kˌumuˈua.|0
msˌimwonˈee hurˈuma. lazˈima mwondˈoe katˌika ˌisraˈeli hatˈia ja ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia ˌili kwˌamba mpˈate kˌufanikˈiwa.|0
ˌusisoɡˈeze ɟˈiwe la mpˈaka wa ɟirˈani jˈako ambˈao ˌuliwˈekwa na wˈale wˌaliˌokutˌaŋɡulˈia katˌika urˈiθi ˌupokeˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanajowˈapa kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ʃahˈidi mmˈoɟa hatˈoʃi kumtˈia hˌatiˈani ˈm̩tu kwa ˌuhalˈifu ˌau kˈosa lolˈote ambˈalo ˌanawˈeza kˌuwa ˌamelitˈenda. lazˈima ʃaˈuri lolˈote lˌiθibitˈiʃwe kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa mˌaʃahˈidi wawˈili ˌau watˈatu.|0
kˌama ʃahˈidi mwˌeɲe nˈia ja kumðˈuru mwiŋɡˈine ˌakisimˈama kumʃtˈaki ˈm̩tu kwa ˌuhalˈifu.|0
wˈatu wawˈili wˌanaˌohusˈika katˌika mˌabiʃˈano lazˈima wˌasimˈame mbˈele za bwˈana na mbˈele ja mˌakuhˈani na wˌaamˈuzi ambˈao wˈako kazˈini wakˈati hˈuo.|0
wˌaamˈuzi lazˈima wafˈaɲe ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi kwa makˈini na ʃahˈidi ˌakiˌonekˈana kˌuwa ni mwˈoŋɡo, ˌakitˈoa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa uˈoŋɡo ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
bˌasi mtˈende kˌama ˌalivjotˈaka kˌumtendˈea ndˈuɡu jˈake. ni lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
wˈatu wˌatakˌaosalˈia wˌatasikˈia hˈili na kˌuoɡˈopa, uˈovu kˌama hˈuo kˈamwe hˌautˌatendˈeka tˈena mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
msˌioɲˈeʃe hurˈuma, uhˈai kwa uhˈai, ɟˈitʃo kwa ɟˈitʃo, ɟˈino kwa ɟˈino, mkˈono kwa mkˈono, m̩ɡˈuu kwa m̩ɡˈuu.|0
mtˌakapokwˈenda vitˈani kˌupiɡˈana na adˈui zˈenu na mkaˈona farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa kulˈiko lˈenu, msˌiwaoɡˈope, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijˌewatˈoa kutˈoka mˈisri, ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapˌokaribˈia kwˈenda vitˈani, kuhˈani ˌatakˈuɟa mbˈele na kˌuhutubˈia ɟˈeʃi.|0
ˌatasˈema: sikˈia, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, lˈeo ˌunakwˈenda vitˈani kˌupiɡˈana na adˈui zˈako. usˈife mˈojo wˈala ˌusioɡˈope, ˌusitˈiʃwe wˈala ˌusitˈiwe hˈofu mbˈele jˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu n̩dˈije huˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi kˌuwapˌiɡanˈia ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈenu na kˌuwapatˈia uʃˈindi.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌatalˌiambˈia ɟˈeʃi: ɟˈe, kˈuna jejˈote ˌalijeɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ˈm̩pja ambˈajo hˌaiɟawˈekwa wˈakfu? jˌeje na arˈudi ɲumbˈani, ˌama sˈivjo ˌanawˈeza kˈufa vitˈani na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌakaiwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna jejˈote ˌalijepˈanda ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu na hˌaɟaˈanza kˌulifˌurahˈia? jˌeje na arˈudi ɲumbˈani, ˌau sˈivjo ˌanawˈeza kˈufa vitˈani na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌakalˌifurahˈia.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna jejˈote ˌalijepˈosa mwanˈamke na hˌaɟamwˈoa? jˌeje na arˈudi ɲumbˈani, ˌama sˈivjo ˌanawˈeza kˈufa vitˈani na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌakamwˈoa.|0
kˈiʃa mˌaafˈisa wˌataoŋɡˈeza hˈaja, ɟˈe, kˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeoɡˈopa ˌama kˈufa mˈojo? jˌeje na arˈudi ɲumbˈani ˌili ndˈuɡu zˌake nˌao wasˈiɟe wakˈafa mˈojo pˈia.|0
wakˈati mˌaafˈisa wˌatakˌapomalˈiza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na ɟˈeʃi, wˌatawˌateˈua wakˈuu wa vikˈosi.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapokwˈenda kˌuʃambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi, wapˈeni wˈatu wˌake maʃˈarti ja amˈani.|0
wˌakikubˈali na kˌuwafˌuŋɡulˈia malˈaŋɡo jˈao, wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌatawˌatumikˈia kwa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu na wˌatawˌatumikˈia.|0
ikˈiwa wˌatakatˈaa kufˈaɲa mˌapatˈano ja amˈani na wˌakiwˌaiŋɡˈiza katˌika vˈita, bˌasi mtˌauzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo kwa vˈita.|0
wakˈati bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˌapouwˈeka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo mkonˈoni mwˈenu, wˌauˈeni kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
kwa upˈande wa wˌanawˈake, watˈoto, mifˈuɡo na kˈila kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote ndˈani ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, mnawˈeza kˌuvitʃukˈua kˌama ɲˈara kwa aɟˈili jˈenu. nˌaɲi mnawˈeza kˌuzitumˈia hˈizo ɲˈara ambˈazo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈenu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjofˈaɲa kwa mˈiɟi jˈote ambˈajo ˈiko mbˈali nˈaɲi, ambˈajo hˌaimˌilikˈiwi na mˌataˈifa ja karˈibu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, katˌika mˈiɟi ja mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌama urˈiθi, msiˈatʃe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote hˈai kˌinatʃˌopumˈua.|0
wˌaaŋɡˌamizˈeni kabˈisa wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌakanaˈani, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌowaamˈuru.|0
la sˈivjo, wˌatawˌafundˈiʃa kˌufuˈata mˈambo jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo wˌanajofˈaɲa wˌakiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu jˈao, nˌaɲi mtatˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapˌouzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi kwa vˈita kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, mkˌipiɡˈana ðˈidi jˌake ˌili kˌuutˈeka, msˌiharˈibu mˈiti jˌake kwa kˌuikˈata kwa ʃˈoka, kwa sabˈabu mtawˈeza kˈula matˈunda jˈake. hˈivjo msˌiikˈate. ɟˈe, mˈiti hˈijo ja mˌaʃambˈani ni wˈatu, hˌata mˌuiziŋɡˈire.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mnawˈeza kˌuikˈata mˈiti ambˈajo sˈio mˈiti ja matˈunda na kˌuitumˈia kuɟˈeŋɡa ŋɡˈome, mpˈaka ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio katˌika vˈita na nˈiɲi ˌutakˌapoaŋɡˈuka.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakikˈutwa ˌameuˈawa, nˌaje ˌamelˈala kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌuimilˈiki, wˈala hˌaiɟˌulikˈani ni nˈani ˌalijˌemuˈua.|0
wazˈee wˈenu na wˌaamˈuzi wˌatatˈoka na kupˈima umbˈali kutˈoka maˈiti ˌalipolˈala mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi ja ɟirˈani.|0
kˈiʃa wazˈee wa ˈule ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio karˈibu zaˈidi na jˈule maˈiti wˌatamtʃukˈua mtˈamba ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈata kˌufaɲˈiʃwa kˈazi na ambˈaje hˌaɟafˈuŋɡwa nˈira.|0
na kˌumpelˈeka kwˈeɲe bˈonde ambˈalo hˌaliɟapˈata kulˈimwa ˌau kupˈandwa mazˈao na ambˈapo kˈuna tʃemtʃˈemi ˌitirˌirikˈajo. hˌuko kwˈeɲe hˌilo bˈonde, wazˈee wˌatamvˈuɲɟa jˈule mtˈamba ʃˈiŋɡo.|0
mˌakuhˈani, hˈao wˈana wa lˈawi, wˌatasoɡˈea mbˈele, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˌamewˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuhudˈumu na kutˈoa barˈaka katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana, na kˌuamˈua mˌaʃaˈuri jˈote ja mˌabiʃˈano na mˌaʃambulˈio.|0
ndˈipo wazˈee wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio karˈibu zaˈidi na hˈujo maˈiti wˌatanˈawa mikˈono jˈao ɟˌuːja hˈujo mtˈamba ambˈaje ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake ˌimevˈuɲɟua hˌuko kwˈeɲe bˈonde.|0
nˌao wˌatataŋɡˈaza: mikˈono jˈetu hˌaikumwˈaɡa dˈamu hˌii, wˈala mˈatʃo jˈetu hˌajakuˈona lˌikifaɲˈika.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌukubˈali ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, ambˈao ˌumewˌakombˈoa, wˈala ˌusiwˌahesabˈie wˈatu wˈako hatˈia ja dˈamu ja ˈm̩tu ˌasijekˈuwa na hatˈia. nˈajo dˈamu ˌilijˌomwaɡˈika ˌitakˈuwa ˌimefaɲˈiwa ˌupatanˈiʃo.|0
hˈivjo mtakˈuwa mmˌeɟitakˈasa weɲˈewe kutˈoka hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu ˌisijokˈuwa na hatˈia, kwa kˌuwa mmefˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo sˈawa mbˈele za mˈatʃo ja bwˈana.|0
mkiˈenda vitˈani kˌupiɡˈana na adˈui zˈenu nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌakawatˈia adˈui mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌaɲi mkˌatʃukˈua matˈeka.|0
kˌama ˌukiˈona mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa matˈeka mwanˈamke mzˈuri wa sˈura nˌawe wavˈutwa nˈaje, wawˈeza kumwˈoa akˈawa ˈm̩ke wˈako.|0
mlˈete ɲumbˈani mwˈako, aɲˈoe ɲuˈele na kukˈata kˈutʃa zˈake.|0
avˈue ŋɡˈuo ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ˌalipotˈekwa. baˌada ja kuˈiʃi ɲumbˈani mwˈako na kˌumwombˌolezˈea bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake kwa mwˈezi mzˈima, ndˈipo ˌutakˌapowˈeza kˌumwendˈea na kˌuwa mˈume wˌake nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa ˈm̩ke wˈako.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌutaˌendelˈea kˌupendˈezwa nˈaje, mwˈatʃe aˈende popˈote ˌanapotˈaka. kˈamwe huwˈezi kˌumuˈuza ˌau kˌumtendˈea kˌama mtˈumwa, kwa sabˈabu ˌutakˈuwa ˌumemvuɲɟˈia heʃˈima.|0
kˌama mwˌanaˈume ˈana wˌake wawˈili, nˌaje ˌanampˈenda mmˈoɟa na mwiŋɡˈine hampˈendi na wˈote wawˈili wˌamemzalˈia wˈana wa kiˈume, lakˈini mwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ni wa jˈule ˈm̩ke ˌasijempˈenda.|0
wakˈati ˌanapotˈoa wosˈia wa mˈali jˌake kwa wanˈawe, kˈamwe ˌasitˈoe hˈaki za mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza kwa mwˈana wa ˈm̩ke ˌampendˈaje kwa ˌupendelˈeo, badˈala ja mzalˈiwa hˈasa wa kwˈanza, ambˈaje ni mwˈana wa ˈm̩ke ambˈaje hampˈendi.|0
ni lazˈima ˌamkubˈali mwˈana wa ˈm̩ke ˌasijempˈenda kˌama mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza kwa kˈumpa sehˈemu ja vˈile vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo mˌaradˈufu. mwˈana hˈujo ni iʃˈara ja kwˈanza ja ŋɡˈuvu za bˈaba jˈake. hˈaki ja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ni jˌake jˈeje.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˈana mwˈana mkaˈidi na mwˈasi ambˈaje hamtˈii bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake, na hˌasikˈii wazˈazi wˌanapomrˈudi.|0
bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake wˌatamlˈeta kwa wazˈee kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi wˈake.|0
wˌatawˌaambˈia wazˈee, hˈuju mwanˈetu ni mkaˈidi na mwˈasi. hˌatutˈii sˈisi, jˌeje ni mpotˈovu na mlˈevi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌanaˈume wˈote wa mɟˈini mwˈake wˌatampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe mpˈaka ˈafe. ndˈivjo ˌimewapˈasa kˌuondˈoa maˈovu kˈati jˈenu. ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌitasikˈia hˈili na kˌuoɡˈopa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˈana hatˈia ja kˈosa lˌinalompˈasa kˌuuˈawa nˌaje ˌakauˈawa, mwˈili wˌake ˌutaaŋɡˈikwa mtˈini.|0
kˈamwe msˌiuˈatʃe mwˈili wˌake mtˈini usˈiku kˈutʃa. hˌakikiʃˈeni mnˌauzˈika mwˈili wˌake sˈiku ˈile ˈile, kwa sabˈabu kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeaŋɡˈikwa mtˈini jˈupo tʃˈini ja laˈana ja mˈuŋɡu. msˌiinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌama urˈiθi wˈenu.|0
kˌama ˌukimwˈona ŋɡˈombe ˌau kondˈoo wa ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌanapotˈea, ˌusipuˈuze, bˌali ˌuhakikˈiʃe ˌunamrudˈiʃa kwa mweɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa hˈujo ndˈuɡu haˈiʃi karˈibu nˌawe ˌau kˌama hˌufahˈamu jˌeje ni nˈani, mtʃukˈue ɲumbˈani kwˈako hˈujo mɲˈama umwˈeke mpˈaka mweɲˈewe ˈaɟe kˌumtafˈuta. ndˈipo ˌumrudiʃˈie.|0
fˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo ˌukimkˈuta pˈunda wa nduɡˈujo ˌau ɟˈoho lˈake ˌau tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃˌopotˈeza. ˌusipuˈuze ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
kˌama ˌukimwˈona pˈunda wa nduɡˈujo ˌau ŋɡˈombe wˌake ˌameaŋɡˈuka bˌarabarˈani, ˌusipuˈuze ɟˈambo hˈilo. msˌaidˈie ˌasimˈame kwa miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
hˌaimpˈasi mwanˈamke kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kiˈume wˈala mwˌanaˈume kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kˈike, kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanatʃukˈia jejˈote ambˈaje hufˈaɲa hˈivi.|0
kˌama ˌukikˈuta kiˈota tʃa ndˈeɡe kˈando ja bˌarabˈara, ˈiwe ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ti ˌau tʃˈini, nˌaje ndˈeɡe ˌamelˈala ɟˌuːja makˈinda ˌau majˈai, ˌusimtʃukˈue hˈujo ndˈeɡe pamˈoɟa na makˈinda jˈake.|0
wawˈeza kˌutʃukˈua makˈinda, lakˈini ˈuwe na hakˈika ja kumwˈatʃa hˈujo ndˈeɡe, ˌili upˈate kˌufanikˈiwa na uwˈeze kuˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
wakˈati ˌunapoɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ˈm̩pja, fˈaɲa ukˈuta wa kˌuzuˈia kˌandokˈando ja dˈari ˌili ˌusiɟˌiletˈee hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba jˈako ikˈiwa jejˈote ˌataaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka hˈumo.|0
ˌusipˈande aˈina mbˈili za mbˈeɡu katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu; ikˈiwa ˌutafˈaɲa hˈivjo, si mazˈao ˌutakˌajopˈanda tu jˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi, bˌali nˈajo matˈunda ja ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu pˈia.|0
ˌusilˈime kwa maksˈai ˌalijefˈuŋɡwa nˈira pamˈoɟa na pˈunda.|0
ˌusivˈae ŋɡˈuo za sˈufu na kitˈani zˌilizofˈumwa pamˈoɟa.|0
fˈaɲa viʃˈada kwˈeɲe pˈembe ˈn̩ne za ɟˈoho ˌunalovˈaa.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatamwˈoa ˈm̩ke na, baˌada ja kufˈaɲa nˌaje tˈendo la n̩dˈoa, ˌakamtʃukˈia.|0
ˌakimsˌiŋɡizˈia na kumwˈita ɟˈina bˈaja, ˌakisˈema, nˌilimwˈoa mwanˈamke hˈuju, lakˈini nˌilipˌomkaribˈia sˌikupˈata ˌuθibitˈiʃo wa ˌubikˈira wˈake.|0
ndˈipo bˈaba na mˈama wa msitʃˈana wˌatalˈeta ˌuθibitˈiʃo kwˌamba ˌalikˈuwa bikˈira kwa wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo.|0
bˈaba wa msitʃˈana ˌatawˌaambˈia wazˈee, nˌilimwˈoza bˈinti jˈaŋɡu kwa hˈuju mwˌanaˈume, lakˈini hampˈendi.|0
sˈasa ˌamemsˌiŋɡizˈia na kusˈema, sˌikumkˈuta hˈuju bˈinti akˈiwa bikˈira. lakˈini hˈapa kˈuna ˌuθibitˈiʃo wa ˌubikˈira wa bˈinti jˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa wazˈazi wˌake wˌataoɲˈeʃa ŋɡˈuo zˌake kwa wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
nˌao wazˈee wˌatamtʃukˈua hˈujo mwˌanaˈume na kˌumwaðˈibu.|0
wˌatamtˈoza ʃekˈeli mˈia mˈoɟa za fˈeða na kupˈewa wazˈazi wa msitʃˈana, kwa sabˈabu mwˌanaˈume hˈuju amˈempa bikˈira wa kˌiisraˈeli ɟˈina bˈaja. ˌataˌendelˈea kˌuwa ˈm̩ke wˈake; kˈamwe hawˈezi kˈumpa talˈaka sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama ʃtˈaka ni la kwˈeli na hakˈuna ˌuθibitˈiʃo ɟˌuːja ˌubikˈira wa hˈujo msitʃˈana ˌuliowˈeza kˌupatikˈana.|0
hˈujo msitʃˈana ˌatalˈetwa kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈake, na hˈapo wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˌatampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe hˌadi ˈafe. ˌamefˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa aˈibu katˌika ˌisraˈeli kwa kufˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba akˈiwa ɲumbˈani kwa babˈaje. lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌatakˈutwa ˌakizˈini na ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, wˈote wawˈili, mwˌanaˈume na mwanˈamke ˌalijezˈini nˈaje, lazˈima wˌauˈawe. lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
ikˈiwa mwˌanaˈume ˌatakutˈana na bikˈira mɟˈini ambˈaje ˌamepˈoswa na ˈm̩tu ˌakazˈini nˈaje.|0
ˌutawˌatʃukˈua wˈote wawˈili kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuwapˈiɡa kwa mˈawe mpˈaka wˈafe; jˈule msitʃˈana kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa mɟˈini na hˌakupˈiɡa kelˈele kuˈomba msaˈada, na jˈule mwˌanaˈume kwa sabˈabu ˌamemtˈenda ɟeˈuri ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine. lazˈima mwondˈoe uˈovu kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˌitatokˈea mwˌanaˈume ˌakakutˈana na msitʃˈana ˌalijepˈoswa hˌuko mˌaʃambˈani, ˌakambˈaka, mwˌanaˈume ˌalijefˈaɲa hˈivi pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeuˈawa.|0
ˌusimtendˈee msitʃˈana jˈule ɟˈambo lolˈote; hˌaɟafˈaɲa ðˈambi ˌinajˌostahˈili kˈifo. ʃaˈuri hˈili ni kˌama lˈile la jejˈote ambˈaje ˌanamʃˌambulˈia na kˌumuˈua kwa mˌakusˈudi ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana mwˌanaˈume hˈujo ˌalimkˈuta msitʃˈana hˌuko mˌaʃambˈani, na iŋɡˈawa msitʃˈana ˌalijepˈoswa ˌalipˈiɡa kelˈele, hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu wa kˌumwokˈoa.|0
ikˈiwa ˌitatokˈea mwˌanaˈume ˌakutˈane na bikˈira ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈoswa na kumbˈaka nˌao wˌakakˈutwa.|0
mwˌanaˈume ˌatamlˈipa bˈaba wa msitʃˈana ʃekˈeli hamsˈini za fˈeða. ni lazˈima amwˈoe hˈujo msitʃˈana, kwa maˈana ˌamemfaɲˈia ɟeˈuri. kˈamwe hawˈezi kˈumpa talˈaka sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mwˌanaˈume ˌasimwˈoe ˈm̩ke wa bˈaba jˈake; kˈamwe ˌasiðˌalilˈiʃe kitˈanda tʃa bˈaba jˈake.|0
ˌasiiŋɡˈie ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌehasˈiwa kwa kupˈondwa makˈende ˌau kwa kukˈatwa uˈume wˌake katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌamezalˈiwa kwˈeɲe n̩dˈoa isˈijo halˈali ˌau wazˈao wˌake wˌasiiŋɡˈie kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana, hˌata mpˈaka kizˈazi tʃa kˈumi.|0
hˌapatakˈuwa na mwamˈoni ˌau mmoˈabu ˌau jejˈote wa wazˈao wˌao ˌatakˌajerˌuhusˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana, hˌata mpˈaka kizˈazi tʃa kˈumi.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˈuɟa kˌuwalˈaki wakˈiwa na mkˈate na mˈaɟi mlˌipokˈuwa ɲɟiˈani mlˌipotˈoka mˈisri, tˈena wˌalimwaɟˈiri bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori kutˈoka peθˈori ˌilijˈoko arˈamu nˌaharaˈimu ˌili kˌuwalaˈani nˈiɲi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu hˌakumsˌikilˈiza bˌalaˈamu bˌali ˌaliɡeˈuza laˈana kˌuwa barˈaka kwˈenu kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawapˈenda.|0
msˌitafˈute mˌapatˈano ja ˌurafˈiki nˌao maˈiʃa jˈenu jˈote.|0
ˌusimtʃukˈie mwedˈomu, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈako. ˌusimtʃukˈie mmˈisri, kwa sabˈabu ˌuliˈiʃi kˌama mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
kizˈazi tʃa tˈatu tʃa watˈoto wˌatakˌaozalˈiwa nˌao wˌanawˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana.|0
ˌunapokˈuwa ˌumepˈiɡa kˈambi ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈako, ɟitˈeŋɡe na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kisˈitʃo sˈafi.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌametʃafˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja kutˈokwa na ʃahˈawa usˈiku, ˌinampˈasa atˈoke ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi na kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
lakˈini ɟiˈoni ˌikikˌaribˈia ˌataˈoɡa, na baˌada ja ɟˈua kuzˈama ˌataiŋɡˈia tˈena kambˈini.|0
teŋɡˈeni mahˈali ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi ambˈapo mnawˈeza kwˈenda kˌuɟisˌaidˈia.|0
kˌama sehˈemu ja vifˈaa vjˈenu kuwˈeni na kˈitu tʃa kˌulimˈia, nˌaɲi mnˌapoɟˌisaidˈia, tʃˈimba ʃˈimo na kˈiʃa funˈika kˈile kˌikutokˈatʃo.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu hˌutembˈea katˌika kˈambi jˈenu ˌili kˌuwalˈinda na kˌuwawˈeka adˈui zˈenu mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. kˈambi jˈenu ni lazˈima ˈiwe tˌakatˈifu, ˌili ˌasiˈone kˈitu tʃotʃˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kilˈitʃo kitʃˈafu ˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuwaˈatʃa.|0
ikˈiwa mtˈumwa ˌamekˌimbilˈia kwˈako, ˌusimrudˈiʃe kwa bwˈana wˈake.|0
mwˈatʃe aˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu mahˈali popˈote ˌanapˌopapˈenda na katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wowˈote ˌanaˌotʃaɡˈua. ˌusimwonˈee.|0
kˈamwe ˌusilˈete mapˈato ja ˌukahˈaba ikˈiwa ni ja mwanˈamke ˌau ni ja mwˌanaˈume katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja naðˈiri jojˈote, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanatʃukˈizwa na jˈote mawˈili.|0
ˌusimtˈoze ndˈuɡu jˈako rˈiba, ˈiwe ni fˈeða ˌama tʃakˈula ˌama kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo wawˈeza kupˈata rˈiba ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌunawˈeza kumtˈoza mɡˈeni rˈiba, lakˈini sˈijo nduɡˈujo mwˌisraˈeli, ˌili kwˌamba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌakubarˈiki katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌunatʃowˈeka mkˈono katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajˌoiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki.|0
ˌukiwˈeka naðˈiri kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌusitʃelˈewe kˌuitimˈiza, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakudˈai, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa na hatˈia ja ðˈambi.|0
lakˈini ˌukiɟˌizuˈia kuwˈeka naðˈiri, hˌutakˈuwa na hatˈia.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃotˈamkwa kwa midˈomo jˈako ni lazˈima ˌuhakikˈiʃe ˌumekifˈaɲa, kwa sabˈabu ˌuliwˈeka naðˈiri jˈako kwa hiˈari mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌama ˌukiiŋɡˈia katˌika ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la ɟirˈani jˈako, ˌunawˈeza kˈula zabˈibu kadˈiri ˌutakˈavjo, lakˈini ˌusiwˈeke tʃotʃˈote kwˈeɲe kikˈapu tʃˈako.|0
kˌama ˌukiiŋɡˈia katˌika ʃˈamba la nafˈaka la ɟirˈani jˈako, ˌunawˈeza kˌukwaɲˈua kwa mikˈono jˈako, lakˈini ˌusikˈate kwa mˈundu nafˈaka ˌilijˌosimˈama.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatamwˈoa ˈm̩ke na ˌakamtʃukˈia kwa sabˈabu ja kukˈosa adˈabu, nˌaje ˌakamwˌandikˈia hˈati ja talˈaka, akˈampa na kˌumfukˈuza kutˈoka ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
ikˈiwa baˌada ja kˌuondˈoka ɲumbˈani kwˈake ˌatakˈuwa ˈm̩ke wa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ikˈiwa mˈume wˌake wa pˈili ˌatatʃukˈizwa nˌaje ˌakamwˌandikˈia hˈati ja talˈaka, akˈampa na kˌumfukˈuza kutˈoka ɲumbˈani kwˈake, ˌau kˌama akˈifa.|0
bˌasi jˈule mˈume wˌake wa kwˈanza, ambˈaje alˈimpa talˈaka, hˌaruhusˈiwi kumwˈoa tˈena baˌada ja mwanˈamke hˈujo kˌuwa naɟˈisi. hˈajo jˌatakˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. ˌusilˈete ðˈambi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanakˈupa kˌama urˈiθi.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌameˈoa kˌaribˈuni, kˈamwe ˌasipelˈekwe vitˈani ˌau kupˈewa waɟˈibu mwiŋɡˈine wowˈote. kwa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈuwa hˈuru kubˈaki ɲumbˈani ˌili ˌamfurahˈiʃe ˈm̩ke ˌalijemwˈoa.|0
ˌusitˈoe ɟˈozi ja mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia, hˌata ikˈiwa lˈile la ɟˈuu, kuwˈeka rehˈani kwa aɟˈili ja dˈeni, kwa sabˈabu ˌitakˈuwa ni kuwˈeka uhˈai wa ˈm̩tu kˌama ðamˈana.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakikamˈatwa ˌakiˈiba jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˌake wa wˌaisraˈeli na kumtˈenda kˌama mtˈumwa ˌau ˌakimuˈuza, mwˈizi hˈujo ni lazˈima ˌauˈawe. nˌawe ˌutaondˈoa uˈovu kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
pˌakitokˈea maɡˈoɲɟua ja ŋɡˈozi ja kˌuambukˈiza, ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu sˈana kufˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa na mˌaaɡˈizo ja mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi. ni lazˈima mfuˈate kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu jˈale nˌilijˌowaamˈuru.|0
kˌumbukˈeni kˈile bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalitʃˌomfaɲˈia mˌiriˈamu ɲɟiˈani baˌada ja nˈiɲi kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
ˌunapˌomkopˈeʃa ɟirˈani jˈako tʃotʃˈote, ˌusiiŋɡˈie ɲumbˈani kwˈake kutwˈaa kˈile ˌanatʃˌokitˈoa kˌama rehˈani.|0
ukˈae ɲɟˈe na umwˈatʃe hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌulijˌemkopˈeʃa ˌakuletˈee hˈijo rehˈani.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni maskˈini, ˌusiˈende kulˈala ukˈiwa na hˈijo rehˈani jˌake katˌika mˈilki jˈako.|0
rudˈiʃa vˈazi lˈake kˈabla ja matʃwˈeo ja ɟˈua ˌili apˈate kˌulilalˈia. kˈiʃa ˌatakˌuʃukˈuru na kˌitaˌonekˈana kˌama kitˈendo tʃa hˈaki mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˌusimwonˈee ˈm̩tu maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi ambˈaje ˌumemwaɟˈiri, akˈiwa ni nduɡˈujo mwˌisraˈeli ˌau mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi jˈenu.|0
mlˈipe uɟˈira wˌake kˈila sˈiku kˈabla ja ɟˈua kutˈua, kwa sabˈabu jˌeje ni maskˈini na ˌanaˌuteɡemˈea uɟˈira hˈuo. la sˈivjo, ˌanawˈeza kˌumlilˈia bwˈana ðˈidi jˈako, nˌawe ˌukapˈata hatˈia ja ðˈambi.|0
bˈaba wˌasiuˈawe kwa aɟˈili ja watˈoto wˈao, wˈala watˈoto wˌasiuˈawe kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba zˈao; kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌusipotˈoʃe hukˈumu ja mɡˈeni ˌau jatˈima, ˌau kˌutʃukˈua vˈazi la mɟˈane kˌama rehˈani.|0
kˌumbukˈeni kwˌamba mlikˈuwa watˈumwa hˌuko mˈisri, nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌakawˌakombˈoa kutˈoka hˌuko. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌinawˌaamˈuru kutˈenda hˈili.|0
ˌunapovˈuna ʃˈamba lˈako na ˌukasahˈau mɡˈanda, ˌusirˈudi kˌuutʃukˈua. ˈatʃa kwa aɟˈili ja mɡˈeni, jatˈima na mɟˈane, ˌili bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako awˈeze kˌukubarˈiki wˌewe katˌika kˈazi zˈote za mikˈono jˈako.|0
ˌunapovˈuna zˌeitˈuni kutˈoka mˈiti jˈako, ˌusirudˈie matˈawi mˈara ja pˈili. ˈatʃa kˌilitʃobˈaki kwa aɟˈili ja mɡˈeni, jatˈima na mɟˈane.|0
ˌunapotʃˈuma zabˈibu katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu ˌusirudˈie tˈena. ˈatʃa zˌinazobˈaki kwa aɟˈili ja mɡˈeni, jatˈima na mɟˈane.|0
kumbˈuka kwˌamba mlikˈuwa watˈumwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌinawˌaamˈuru kufˈaɲa hˈili.|0
wˈatu wˌanapokˈuwa na uɡˈomvi, wˌapelˈeke mˌahakamˈani na wˌaamˈuzi wˌataamˈua ʃaˈuri hˈilo; wˌatawˌaatʃˈia wasˈio na kˈosa na kˌuwahukˈumu wˌeɲe hatˈia.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hatˈia ˌanastahˈili kutʃˈapwa, mwamˈuzi ˌatamwamˈuru alˈale tʃˈini ˌili atʃˈapwe mbˈele jˌake idˈadi ja vibˈoko kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈosa lˈake.|0
lakˈini kˈamwe ˌasitʃˈapwe zaˈidi ja vibˈoko ˌarobaˈini. ikˈiwa ˌatatʃˈapwa zaˈidi ja vibˈoko ˌarobaˈini, nduɡˈujo ˌataðˌalilˈika matʃˈoni pˈako.|0
ˌusimfˈuŋɡe maksˈai kˈiɲua ˌanapopˈura nafˈaka.|0
ikˈiwa ndˈuɡu wˌanaˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na mmˈoɟa wˌao akˈafa bˌila kuˈatʃa mwˈana, kˈamwe mɟˈane wˌake ˌasiolˈewe ɲɟˈe ja ɟamˈaa hˈijo. ndˈuɡu wa mumˈewe ˌatamtʃukˈua, amwˈoe na kˌutimˈiza waɟˈibu wa ʃemˈeɟi kwˈake.|0
mwˈana wa kwˈanza ˌatakˌajemzˈaa ˌatapˈewa ɟˈina la ndˈuɡu ˌalijekˈufa ˌili ɟˈina lˈake lˌisifutˈike katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ikˈiwa ndˈuɡu hˈujo wa mˈume hatˈaki kuˈoa hˈujo ˈm̩ke wa nduɡˈuje, mɟˈane ˌatawˌaendˈea wazˈee kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi na kusˈema, ndˈuɡu wa mˈume wˈaŋɡu ˌanakatˈaa kˌuendelˈeza ɟˈina la nduɡˈuje katˌika ˌisraˈeli. hatˈaki kˌutimˈiza waɟˈibu wa ʃemˈeɟi kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˌatamwˈita na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈaje. kˌama ˌataʃˌikilˈia kˌukatˈaa ˌakisˈema, sitˈaki kumwˈoa.|0
mɟˈane wa nduɡˈuje ˌatamwendˈea mbˈele ja wazˈee, ˌatamvˈua kiˈatu kimˈoɟa na kˌumtemˈea mˈate usˈoni, na kusˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ambˈavjo hufˈaɲua kwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌatakatˈaa kˌuendelˈeza ɟamˈaa ja ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
ɟamˈaa ja ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌitafˌahamˈika katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌama ɟamˈaa ja ˌalijˌevulˈiwa kiˈatu.|0
ikˈiwa wˈatu wawˈili wˌanapiɡˈana na ˈm̩ke wa mmˈoɟa wˌao akˈaɟa kˌumwokˈoa mumˈewe na jˈule ˌanajˌemʃambulˈia, nˌaje ˈm̩ke hˈujo ˌakifˈika na kˌumkamˈata sehˈemu za sˈiri.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌutamkˈata mkˈono wˈake. ˌusimhˌurumˈie.|0
usˈiwe na mˈawe ja kˌupimˈia ja aˈina mbˈili katˌika mkˈoba wˈako, mˈoɟa zˈito na ɟiŋɡˈine ɟepˈesi.|0
usˈiwe na vipˈimo viwˈili tˌofaˈuti katˌika ɲˈumba jˈako, kimˈoɟa kikˈubwa, kiŋɡˈine kidˈoɡo.|0
ni lazˈima ˈuwe na uzˈito na vipˈimo sahˈihi na vja hˈaki, ˌili upˈate kuˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌanajokˈupa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako hˌumtʃukˈia jejˈote ambˈaje hufˈaɲa mˈambo kˌama hˈaja, jejˈote ˌanajetˈenda kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
kumbˈuka kˈile wˌaamalˈeki wˌalitʃˌowatendˈea mlˌipokˈuwa ɲɟiˈani mkitˈoka mˈisri.|0
wakˈati mlˌipokˈuwa mmetʃˈoka na kˌuiʃˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu kwa safˈari jˈenu, wˌakawapˈiɡa wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuɟa ɲˈuma. wˌaamalˈeki hˌawakˌumwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapokˈupa pumzˈiko mbˈali na adˈui zˈako wˈote wˌanaˌokuzuŋɡˈuka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌakupˈajo kˌuimilˈiki kˌuwa urˈiθi, ˌutafˌutilˈia mbˈali kˌumbukˈumbu lˈote la wˌaamalˈeki tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu. ˌusisahˈau.|0
mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌeiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa kˌama urˈiθi na mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌeimilˈiki na kukˈaa ndˈani jˈake.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni baˈaði ja mavˈuno ja kwˈanza ja jˈale jˈote mtˌakajˌozalˈiʃa kutˈoka udˈoŋɡo wa ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa na mwˈeke kwˈeɲe kˈapu. kˈiʃa uˈende mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatapˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuwa makˈao kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake.|0
na ˌumwambˈie kuhˈani ˌatakˌajekuwˈepo kwa wakˈati hˈuo, nˌinataŋɡˈaza lˈeo kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwˌamba nˌimekˈuɟa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˌaapˈia bˈaba zˈetu kwˌamba ˌatatˈupa.|0
kuhˈani ˌatapokˈea lˈile kˈapu mˌikonˈoni mwˈako na kˌuliwˈeka tʃˈini mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
kˈiʃa ˌutataŋɡˈaza mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako: bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa mwarˈamu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa, ˌakaˈenda mˈisri pamˈoɟa na wˈatu watʃˈatʃe, ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko hˌadi akˈawa taˈifa kˈubwa, lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na wˈatu wˈeŋɡi.|0
lakˈini wamˈisri wˌalitˌuonˈea na kˌututˌaabˈiʃa, wˌakitˌufaɲˈiʃa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu.|0
kˈiʃa tˌulimlilˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈetu, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasikˈia saˈuti jˈetu na ˌakaˈona huzˈuni jˈetu, taˈabu jˈetu na matˈeso jˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakatutˈoa ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa, pamˈoɟa na utˈiʃo m̩kˈuu, iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu.|0
ˌakatulˈeta mahˈali hˈapa ˌakatˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌotirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali.|0
nˌami sˈasa nˌinalˈeta mˌalimbˈuko ja ˈarði ambˈajo wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenˈipa. wˈeka kˈapu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele zˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌewe pamˈoɟa na walˈawi na waɡˈeni wˈote wˌaliˈoko mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu mtˌafurˈahi katˌika vˈitu vjˈote vizˈuri ambˈavjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa pamˈoɟa na wa ɲumbˈani mwˈenu.|0
wakˈati ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumeʃatˈoa zˈaka zˈote za mazˈao jˈako katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu, ambˈao ni mwˈaka wa zˈaka, utˈampa mlˈawi, mɡˈeni, jatˈima na mɟˈane, ˌili wawˈeze kˈula katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu na kuʃˈiba.|0
kˈiʃa ˌumwambˈie bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako: nˌimeondˈoa katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ˈile sehˈemu ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu na nimˈempa mlˈawi, mɡˈeni, jatˈima na mɟˈane, kˌuliŋɡˈana na jˈote ˌulijˌoamˈuru. sˌiɟazˌihalˈifu ˈamri zˈako wˈala kˌusahˈau hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo.|0
siɟˈala sehˈemu ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa nˌikiˌombolˈeza, wˈala sˌiɟaondˈoa mˌoɟawˈapo wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa naɟˈisi, wˈala sˌiɟatˈoa sehˈemu jˌake jojˈote kwa wˈafu. nˌimemtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu; nˌimefˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌulitʃˌoniamˈuru.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, maskˈani jˈako mˌatakatˈifu, ˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijotˈupa kˌama ˌulivjˌoahˈidi kwa kiˈapo kwa bˈaba zˈetu, ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌotirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanakˌuaɡˈiza lˈeo kˌufuˈata ˈamri hˈizi na ʃerˈia; ziʃˈike kwa bidˈii kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote.|0
ˌumetaŋɡˈaza lˈeo kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wˈako na kwˌamba ˌutafuˈata ɲɟˈia zˈake, kwˌamba ˌutajaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake, ˈamri zˌake na ʃerˈia zˌake nˌawe ˌutamtˈii.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌametaŋɡˈaza lˈeo kwˌamba nˈiɲi ni taˈifa lˈake, hazˈina jˌake ja θamˈani kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, ˌili kwˌamba mpˈate kˌujaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake jˈote.|0
ˌametaŋɡˈaza kwˌamba ˌatawawˈeka ɟˈuu kulˈiko mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa katˌika sˈifa, kˌuwa fahˈari na heʃˈima, na kwˌamba mtakˈuwa taˈifa tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi.|0
mˈose na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu: jˌaʃikˈeni mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˈote nˌinajˌowaaɡˈiza lˈeo.|0
mtˌakapokˈuwa mmevˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌawapˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, msˌimamˈiʃe mˈawe makˈubwa na mkˌajatˈie lˈipu.|0
ˌandikˈeni ɟˈuu jˌake manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii wakˈati mtˌakapokˈuwa mmevˈuka na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌawapˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, kˌama vˈile bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
mtˌakapokˈuwa mmevˈuka jordˈani, sˌimamiʃˈeni mˈawe hˈaja ɟˌuːja mlˈima ebˈali, kˌama nˌinavjˌowaaɡˈiza lˈeo, mkˌajatˈie lˈipu.|0
hˌuko mɟˌeŋɡeˈeni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mˌaðabˈahu, mˌaðabˈahu ja mˈawe. msˌitumˈie kifˈaa tʃotʃˈote tʃa tʃˈuma ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɟeŋɡˈeni mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa mˈawe ja ʃambˈani, na m̩tˈoe sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˈuu jˌake kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
toˈeni sadˈaka za amˈani ɟˈuu jˈake, mkizˈila na kˌufurahˈia mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose na mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi, wˌakawˌaambˈia ˌisraˈeli wˈote, ɲamˈaza ˈee ˌisraˈeli, sˌikilˈiza! sˈasa ˌumekˈuwa taˈifa la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
m̩tˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, na kˌufuˈata ˈamri zˌake na mˌaaɡˈizo nˌinajokˈupa lˈeo.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile mˈose ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu.|0
mtˌakapovˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani, mˌakabˈila hˈaja jˌatasimˈama ɟˌuːja mlˈima ɡˌerizˈimu kˌubarˈiki wˈatu: sˌimeˈoni, lˈawi, jˈuda, ˌisakˈari, josˈefu na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
mˌakabˈila hˈaja jˌatasimˈama ɟˌuːja mlˈima ebˈali kwa kutˈamka laˈana: rˌeubˈeni, ɡˈadi, aʃˈeri, zˌabulˈoni, dˈani na naftˈali.|0
nˌao walˈawi wˌatawˌasomˈea wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli kwa saˈuti kˈubwa.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌafaɲˈaje sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa ˌau mwˌeɲe kusˈubu sanˈamu, kˈitu ambˈatʃo ni tʃukˈizo kwa bwˈana, kˈazi ja mikˈono ja fˈundi stˈadi, na kˌuisˌimamˈiʃa kwa sˈiri. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌamðaraˈuje bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌasoɡezˈaje ɟˈiwe la mpˈaka wa ɟirˈani jˈake. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌampotoʃˈaje kipˈofu ɲɟiˈani. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌapotoʃˈaje hˈaki ja mɡˈeni, jatˈima ˌau mɟˈane. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌakutanˈaje kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa bˈaba jˈake, kwa maˈana ˌanaðarˈau malˈazi ja bˈaba jˈake. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌakutanˈaje kimwˈili na mɲˈama jejˈote. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌakutanˈaje kimwˈili na dˈada jˈake, bˈinti wa bˈaba jˌake ˌau bˈinti wa mˈama jˈake. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌakutanˈaje kimwˈili na mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈake. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌamuuˈaje ɟirˈani jˌake kwa sˈiri. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu ˌapokeˈaje rˈuʃwa ˌili kˌumuˈua ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌatasˈema, ˈamen.|0
kˌama ˌukimtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa bidˈii na kˌufuˈata ˈamri zˌake zˈote nˌinazokˈupa lˈeo kwa bidˈii, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakuwˈeka ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa jˈote katˌika dunˈia.|0
barˈaka hˈizi zˈote zˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌukupˈata, kˌama ˌukimtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˌutabˌarikˈiwa mɟˈini na ˌutabˌarikˈiwa mˌaʃambˈani.|0
ˌutabˌarikˈiwa uzˈao wa tˈumbo lˈako, na mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako na waɲˈama wˈako watʃˈaŋɡa wa kufˈuɡwa, jaˈani ndˈama wa makˈundi jˈako ja ŋɡˈombe, na wˌanakondˈoo wa makˈundi jˈako.|0
kˈapu lˈako na vjˈombo vjˈako vja kˌukandˈia vˌitabˌarikˈiwa.|0
ˌutabˌarikˈiwa ˌuiŋɡiˈapo na ˌutabˌarikˈiwa ˌutokˈapo.|0
bwˈana ˌatasˌababˈiʃa adˈui wˌainukˈao ðˈidi jˈako kuʃˈindwa mbˈele jˈako. wˌatakuɟˈia kwa ɲɟˈia mˈoɟa lakˈini wˌatakimbˈia mbˈele jˈako kwa ɲɟˈia sˈaba.|0
bwˈana ˌataaɡˈiza barˈaka ɟˌuːja ɣˈala zˈako na ɟˌuːja kˈila kˈitu ˌutakˌatʃoɡˈusa kwa mkˈono wˈako. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌubarˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌanajokˈupa.|0
bwˈana ˌatakufˈaɲa kˌuwa taˈifa lˈake tˌakatˈifu, kˌama ˌalivjˌokuahˈidi kwa kiˈapo, kˌama ˌukiʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na kwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia wˌataˈona kˌuwa ˌunaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, nˌao wˌatakˌuoɡˈopa.|0
bwˈana ˌatafuŋɡˈua mbˈiŋɡu, ɣˈala zˌake za barˈaka, kukˈupa mvˈua kwa maɟˈira jˌake na kˌubarˈiki kˈazi zˈako zˈote za mikˈono jˈako. ˌutakopˈeʃa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi lakˈini hˌutakˈopa kwa jejˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌatakufˈaɲa kˈitʃwa, wˈala si m̩kˈia. kˌama ˌutazˌiŋɡatˈia mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako nˌinajokˈupa sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo na kˌujafuˈata kwa bidˈii, daˈima ˌutakˈuwa ɟˈuu, kˈamwe hˌutakˈuwa tʃˈini.|0
ˌusihalˈifu ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zozˈote nˌinazokˈupa lˈeo, kwa kwˈenda kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto, kwa kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuitˌumikˈia.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama hˌutamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na kˌuziʃˈika kwa bidˈii ˈamri zˌake zˈote na mˌaaɡˈizo nˌinajokˈupa lˈeo, laˈana hˈizi zˈote zˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌukupˈata.|0
ˌutalˌaanˈiwa mɟˈini na ˌutalˌaanˈiwa mˌaʃambˈani.|0
kˈapu lˈako na tʃˈombo tʃˈako tʃa kˌukandˈia kˌitalˌaanˈiwa.|0
uzˈao wa tˈumbo lˈako ˌutalˌaanˈiwa, mazˈao ja ˈarði jˈako, ndˈama wa makˈundi jˈako ja ŋɡˈombe na wˌanakondˈoo wa makˈundi jˈako.|0
ˌutalˌaanˈiwa ˌuiŋɡiˈapo na ˌutokˈapo.|0
bwˈana ˌatalˈeta laˈana ɟˈuu jˈako, faðˈaa na kˌukaripˈiwa katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌunatʃˌokiɡˈusa kwa mkˈono wˈako, mpˈaka ˈuwe ˌumehˌaribˈiwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa ɣafˈula kwa aɟˈili ja maˈovu ˌulijˌojafˈaɲa kwa kumwˈatʃa jˈeje.|0
bwˈana ˌatakupˈiɡa kwa maɡˈoɲɟua mpˈaka ˌakuˌaŋɡamˈize kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajˌoiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki.|0
bwˈana ˌatakupˈiɡa kwa maɡˈoɲɟua ja kˌuðoofˈiʃa, kwa hˈoma na kuwˈaʃwa, hˈari na kwa ukˈame, kˈutu na kˌuwa na utʃˈuŋɡu ambˈavjo vˌitakupˈiɡa mpˈaka ˌuaŋɡamˈie.|0
ˈaŋɡa ɟˈuu jˈako ˌitakˈuwa ʃˈaba, na ˈarði tʃˈini jˈako ˌitakˈuwa tʃˈuma.|0
bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa mvˈua ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kˌuwa mavˈumbi na mtʃˈaŋɡa; vˌitakuɟˈia kutˈoka aŋɡˈani mpˈaka ˌuaŋɡamˈie.|0
bwˈana ˌatakufˈaɲa uʃˈindwe mbˈele ja adˈui zˈako. ˌutawaɟˈia kwa ɲɟˈia mˈoɟa lakˈini ˌutawˌakimbˈia mbˈele jˈao kwa ɲɟˈia sˈaba, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza kwa fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia.|0
mizˈoɡa jˈenu ˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi, wˈala hˌapatˌakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌuwafukˈuza.|0
bwˈana ˌatakupˈiɡa kwa maɟˈipu ja mˈisri na kwa vidˈonda vˌitokˈavjo usˈaha na kuwˈaʃwa, ambˈako huwˈezi kupˈoɲua.|0
bwˈana ˌatakupˈiɡa kwa wazˈimu, upˈofu na kˌutʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈiwa kwa akˈili.|0
wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri ˌutapˌapasˌapapˈasa hˈuku na hˌuko kˌama ˈm̩tu kipˈofu katˌika ɡˈiza. hˌutafˌanikˈiwa katˌika lolˈote ˌufaɲˈalo; sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku ˌutaonˈewa na kˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲua, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˌuokˈoa.|0
ˌutapˈosa ˈm̩ke, lakˈini ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌatakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. ˌutaɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba, lakˈini hˌutaˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake. ˌutapˈanda ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu, lakˈini hˌutakˈula matˈunda jˈake.|0
ŋɡˈombe wˈako ˌatatʃˈiɲɟua mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako lakˈini hˌutakˈula ɲˈama jˈake. pˈunda wˈako ˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa kwa ŋɡˈuvu kutˈoka kwˈako wˈala hˌatarudˈiʃwa. kondˈoo wˈako wˌatapˈewa adˈui zˈako, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
wanˈao na bˈinti zˈako wˌatatolˈewa kwa mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine, nˌawe ˌutajatʃˈoʃa mˈatʃo jˈako ˌukiwˌatazamˈia sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, hˌutakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kˌuinˈua mkˈono.|0
taˈifa ˌusilˌoliɟˈua wˌatakˈula mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako na taˈabu ja kˈazi jˈako, hˌutakˈuwa na tʃotʃˈote, bˌali kˌuonˈewa kˌikatˈili sˈiku zˈako zˈote.|0
vˈitu ˌutakˌavjoviˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako vˌitakufˈaɲa wazˈimu.|0
bwˈana ˌatajapˈiɡa maɡˈoti jˈako na miɡˈuu jˈako kwa maɟˈipu jˌeɲe mˌaumˈivu makˈali jˌasijˌopoɲˈeka, jˌakienˈea kutˈoka ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈako hˌadi ˌutosˈini.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˌupelˈeka wˌewe na mfˈalme ˌulijemwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈako uˈende kwˈeɲe taˈifa ambˈalo hˌukuliɟˈua wˌewe wˈala bˈaba zˈako. hˌuko ˌutaabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, miˈuŋɡu ja mˈiti na mˈawe.|0
ˌutakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza, tˈena kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na kˌuðihakˈiwa kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote hˌuko bwˈana ˌatakˌakokˌupelˈeka.|0
ˌutapˈanda mbˈeɡu ɲˈiŋɡi katˌika ʃˈamba lakˈini ˌutavˈuna hˈaba, kwa sabˈabu nzˈiɡe wˌatazˈila.|0
ˌutapˈanda maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na kˌujapˌalilˈia, lakˈini hˌutakˈuɲua divˈai jˌake wˈala hˌutakusˈaɲa zabˈibu, kwa sabˈabu wadˈudu wˌatazˈila.|0
ˌutakˈuwa na mˌizeitˈuni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˈote, lakˈini hˌutatumˈia hˈajo mafˈuta jˈake, kwa sabˈabu zˌeitˈuni zˌitapˌukutˈika.|0
ˌutakˈuwa na wˈana na bˈinti lakˈini hˌawatakˈuwa nˈawe, kwa sabˈabu wˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka.|0
makˈundi ja nzˈiɡe jˌatavamˈia mˈiti jˈako jˈote na mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako.|0
mɡˈeni ˌanajeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako ˌatainˈuka ɟˈuu zaˈidi na zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈewe, lakˈini wˌewe ˌutaʃˈuka tʃˈini zaˈidi na zaˈidi.|0
jˌeje ˌatakˌukopˈeʃa, lakˈini wˌewe hˌutamkopˈeʃa. jˌeje ˌatakˈuwa kˈitʃwa, lakˈini wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa m̩kˈia.|0
zˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara na aɟˈabu kwˈako na kwa wazˈao wˈako milˈele.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌukumtˌumikˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa furˈaha na kwa mˈojo wakˈati wa kˌufanikˈiwa kwˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo katˌika ɲɟˈaa na kˈiu, katˌika ˈutʃi na ˌumaskˈini wa kutˈiʃa, ˌutawˌatumikˈia adˈui ambˈao bwˈana ˌatawatˈuma ðˈidi jˈako. jˌeje ˌatawˈeka nˈira ja tʃˈuma ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako hˌadi ˌamekwˈiʃa kˌukuˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
bwˈana ˌatalˈeta taˈifa ðˈidi jˈako kutˈoka mbˈali, kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, kˌama tˈai ˌaʃukiˈavjo mawˈindo tʃˈini, taˈifa ambˈalo hˌutaiɟˈua lˈuɣa jˈake.|0
taˈifa lˈeɲe ˈuso mkˈali lˌisiloɟˈali wazˈee wˈala kˌuwahˌurumˈia viɟˈana.|0
wˌatakˈula wadˈoɡo wa mifˈuɡo jˈako na mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako mpˈaka ˌumeˌaŋɡamˈia. hˌawatˌakuatʃˈia nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja ˌau mafˈuta, wˈala ndˈama wowˈote wa kˈundi lˈako ˌau wˌanakondˈoo wa kˈundi lˈako mpˈaka ˌumekˈuwa maɡˈofu.|0
nˌao wˌataˌiziŋɡˈira mˈiɟi jˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako mpˈaka kˈuta ndˈefu za ŋɡˈome ambˈazo ˌunazˌiteɡemˈea zˌimeaŋɡˈuka. wˌataziŋɡˈira mˈiɟi jˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanakˈupa.|0
ˌutakˈula uzˈao wa tˈumbo lˈako, ɲˈama ja wˈana wˈako na bˈinti zˈako ambˈao bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamekˈupa, kwa sabˈabu ja matˈeso jˈale adˈui zˈako wˌatakˌajokˌuletˈea wakˈati wa kˌukuziŋɡˈira.|0
hˌata jˈule ˈm̩tu mˌuuŋɡwˈana sˈana na makˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako hˌatakˈuwa na hurˈuma kwa ndˈuɡu jˌake mweɲˈewe ˌau kwa ˈm̩ke ˌampendˈaje ˌau watˈoto wˌake wˌaliˌosalˈia.|0
nˌaje hatˈampa hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ɲˈama ja watˈoto wˌake ambˈao ˌanawˈala. kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna kˈitu kiŋɡˈine kˌilitʃˌosalˈia kwˈake katˌika mˌaziŋɡˈirwa makˈali ambˈajo adˈui jˈako wˌatakˌuletˈea kwa mˈiɟi jˈako jˈote.|0
mwanˈamke ambˈaje ni mˌuuŋɡwˈana sˈana na makˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako, jaˈani ambˈaje ni makˈini sˈana na mˌuuŋɡwˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba ˌasiŋɡˌeθubˈutu kuɡˈusa ˈarði kwa wˈajo wa m̩ɡˈuu wˈake, jˌeje ˌatakˈuwa m̩tʃˈojo kwa mˈume ˌampendˈaje na mwanˈawe mweɲˈewe ˌau bˈinti jˈake.|0
kondˈoo wa ɲˈuma kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tˈumbo lˈake na watˈoto ˌanaˌowazˈaa. kwa kˌuwa ˌanakˌusudˈia kuwˈala kwa sˈiri wakˈati wa kˌuziŋɡˈirwa na katˌika taˈabu zˈile ambˈazo adˈui jˈako ˌatazilˈeta ɟˈuu jˈako na mˈiɟi jˈako.|0
kˌama hˌutafuˈata kwa bidˈii manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii, ambˈajo jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki na kˌama hˌutalˈitʃa hˈili ɟˈina la fahˈari na la kutˈiʃa, jaˈani la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌatalˈeta mapˈiɡo ja kutˈiʃa ɟˈuu jˈako na kwa wazˈao wˈako, maˈafa makˈali na ja kudˈumu, maɡˈoɲɟua mazˈito na ja kudˈumu.|0
ˌatakˌuletˈea ɟˈuu jˈako maɡˈoɲɟua jˈote ja mˈisri jˈale ˌulijˌojaoɡˈopa, nˈajo jˌataˌambatˈana nˈawe.|0
pˈia bwˈana ˌatakˌuletˈea kˈila aˈina ja uɡˈoɲɟua na maˈafa ambˈajo hˌajakˌuandˈikwa hˈumu katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa ʃerˈia, mpˈaka ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
nˈiɲi ambˈao mlikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani mtaˈatʃwa watʃˈatʃe tˈu, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
kˌama ˌilivjˌompendˈeza bwˈana kˌuwafˈaɲa nˈiɲi mstˈawi na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka kwa idˈadi, ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjompendˈeza kˌuwaharˈibu na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza nˈiɲi. mtˌaŋɡolˈewa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˌiiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌatawˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote, kutˈoka mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa wa dunˈia hˌadi mwiŋɡˈine. hˌuko mtˌaabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, miˈuŋɡu ja mˈiti na ja mˈawe, ambˈajo nˈiɲi wˈala bˈaba zˈenu hˌamkuiɟˈua.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa hˈajo hˌamtapˈata rˈaha wˈala mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈiʃa wˈajo wa m̩ɡˈuu wˈenu. hˌuko bwˈana ˌatawˈapa mˌahaŋɡaˈiko ja mawˈazo, mˈatʃo jˌalijotʃˈoka kwa kˌuŋɡoɟˈea na mˈojo ˌuliokˈata tamˈaa.|0
ˌutaˈiʃi katˌika mˌahaŋɡaˈiko sˈiku zˈote, ukˈiwa ˌumeɟˈaa hˈofu usˈiku na mtʃˈana, wˈala hˌutakˈuwa kˈamwe na ˌuhakˈika wa maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
wakˈati wa ˌasubˈuhi ˌutasˈema hˈivi, laˈiti ˌiŋɡekˈuwa ɟiˈoni! ɟiˈoni ˌutasˈema, laˈiti ˌiŋɡekˈuwa ˌasubˈuhi, kwa sabˈabu ja hˈofu ˈile ˌitakˌajoɟˈaza mˈojo wˈako na vˈitu vˈile mˈatʃo jˈako jˌatakˌavjoviˈona.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌarudˈiʃa tˈena mˈisri kwa mˈeli, safˈari nˌilijosˈema kˈamwe hˌamŋɡeˈenda tˈena. hˌuko mtˌaɟiˈuza nˈiɲi weɲˈewe kwa adˈui zˈenu kˌama watˈumwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, lakˈini hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˌanunˈua.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo manˈeno ja aɡˈano bwˈana ˌalijˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose kufˈaɲa na wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko moˈabu, kˌuwa ɲoŋɡˈeza ja aɡˈano ˌalilofˈaɲa nˌao hˌuko horˈebu.|0
mˈose ˌakawaˈita wˌaisraˈeli wˈote ˌakawˌaambˈia: mˈatʃo jˈenu jˌameˈona jˈale jˈote bwˈana ˌalijofˈaɲa kwa mfˈalme farˈao hˌuko mˈisri, kwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote na kwa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jˈote.|0
kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe mliˈona jˈale mˌaɟarˈibu makˈubwa, iʃˈara zˈile za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu makˈubwa.|0
lakˈini mpˈaka lˈeo bwˈana hˌaɟawˈapa akˈili ja kˌuelˈewa ˌau mˈatʃo jˌanajoˈona ˌau mˌasikˈio jˌanajˌosikˈia.|0
kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini nˌilijˌowaoŋɡˈoza ɟaŋɡwˈani, ŋɡˈuo zˈenu hˌazikˌutʃakˈaa, wˈala viˈatu mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈenu.|0
hamkˈula mkˈate na hamkˈuɲua divˈai wˈala kilˈeo tʃotʃˈote. nˌilifˈaɲa hˈivi ˌili mpˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
tˌuliˌitʃukˈua ˈn̩tʃi jˈao na kuwˈapa wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase kˌama urˈiθi wˈao.|0
fˌuatˈeni kwa bidˈii maʃˈarti ja aɡˈano hˈili, ˌili kwˌamba mwˈeze kustˈawi katˌika kˈila kˈitu mnˌatʃofˈaɲa.|0
nˈiɲi ɲˈote lˈeo mnˌasimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu; mkˈiwa vˌioŋɡˈozi na wakˈuu wˈenu, wazˈee na mˌaafˈisa wˈenu, na wˌanaˈume weŋɡˈine wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈenu, wˌake zˈenu na pˈia waɡˈeni wˌaiʃˈio katˌika kˈambi zˈenu wˌanaˌowapˌasulˈia kˈuni na kˌuwatʃotˈea mˈaɟi.|0
mnˌasimˈama hˈapa ˌili kufˈaɲa aɡˈano na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, aɡˈano ambˈalo mˈuŋɡu ˌanalifˈaɲa nˌaɲi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo na kˌulitˈia muhˈuri kwa kiˈapo.|0
kˌuwaθˌibitˈiʃa nˈiɲi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo kˌama taˈifa lˈake, ˌili awˈeze kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi na kˌama ˌalivjˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈenu ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
nˌinafˈaɲa aɡˈano hˈili pamˈoɟa na kiˈapo tʃˈake, sˈio na nˈiɲi tˈu.|0
mnˌaosimˈama hˈapa na sˌisi lˈeo mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, bˌali pˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈale ambˈao hawˈapo hˈapa lˈeo.|0
nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mnaɟˈua ɟˈinsi tˌulivjoˈiʃi n̩tʃˈini mˈisri na ɟˈinsi tˌulivjopˈita kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi mpˈaka tˌukafˈika hˈapa.|0
mliˈona mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vja kˌutʃukˈiza na sanˈamu za mˈiti na mˈawe, za fˈeða na ðahˈabu.|0
hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba hakˈuna mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke, ukˈoo ˌau kabˈila mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu lˈeo ambˈalo mˈojo wˌake ˌutamwˈatʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwˈenda kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa hˈajo. hˌakikiʃˈeni hakˈuna mzˈizi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌunaotˈoa sˈumu tʃˈuŋɡu ja nˈamna hˌii.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu wa nˈamna hˌii ˌasikiˈapo manˈeno ja kiˈapo hˈiki, hˌuɟibarˈiki mweɲˈewe na kˈiʃa hˌufikˈiri, nˌitakˈuwa salˈama, hˌata kˌama nˌikiˌendelˈea kˌuifuˈata ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. hˈili lˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijˌoɲeʃˈewa sˌawasˈawa na ˈn̩tʃi kˈame.|0
bwˈana kˈamwe hˌatakˈuwa rˈaði kˌumsamˈehe, ɣaðˈabu na wˈivu wa mˈuŋɡu vˌitawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu hˈujo. laˈana zˈote zˌilizˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki zˌitamwˌaŋɡukˈia na bwˈana ˌatafˈuta ɟˈina lˈake tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌatamtwˈaa pˈeke jˌake kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo, kˌuliŋɡˈana na laˈana zˈote za aɡˈano zˌilizˌoandˈikwa kwˈeɲe kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa ʃerˈia.|0
watˈoto wˈako wˌatakˌaofuˈata baˌada jˈako katˌika vizˈazi vja bˌaadˈaje na waɡˈeni ambˈao wˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi za mbˈali, wˌataˈona maˈafa, jˌalijˌoipˈata ˈn̩tʃi na maɡˈoɲɟua ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalijalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌitakˈuwa ɟˈaa lˌinalˌouŋɡˈua la tʃˈumvi na kˌiberˈiti: hˌakutakˈuwa kˌilitʃopˈandwa, hˌakutakˈuwa kˌinatʃˌotʃipˈua, wˈala hˌakutakˈuwa mimˈea ˌinajoˈota ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mˌaaŋɡamˈizo ja sodˈoma na ɡomˈora, ˈadma na sˌeboˈimu, ambˈazo bwˈana ˌaliˌaŋɡamˈiza kwa hasˈira kˈali.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌataulˈiza: kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa hˈivi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi hˌii? kwa nˈini hasˈira hˌii kˈali ˌikawˈaka.|0
na ɟˈibu lˌitakˈuwa: ni kwa sabˈabu wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˈatʃa aɡˈano la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, aɡˈano ˌalilofˈaɲa nˌao wakˈati ˌalipˌowatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
wˌaliˈenda zˈao na kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia, miˈuŋɡu wˌasiˌoiɟˈua, miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu hˌakuwˈapa.|0
kwa hˈijo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌakalˈeta ɟˈuu jˌake laˈana zˈote zˌilizˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki.|0
katˌika hasˈira kˈali na katˌika ɣaðˈabu kˈuu bwˈana ˌaliwaŋɡˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈao na kˌuwasˌukumˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine, kˌama ilˈivjo sˈasa.|0
mˈambo ja sˈiri ni ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, bˌali jˌalijˌofunulˈiwa ni jˈetu na watˈoto wˈetu milˈele, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌujafˈaɲa manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii.|0
wakˈati barˈaka hˈizi zˈote pamˈoɟa na laˈana nˌilizˌoziwˈeka mbˈele jˈako zˌitakˌapokuɟˈia, nˌawe ˌukazˌitafakˈari mojˈoni popˈote bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapokˌutawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
hˈapo wˌewe na watˈoto wˈako mtˌakapˌomrudˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, na kumtˈii kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈila kˈitu nˌinatʃˌokuamˈuru lˈeo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapokˌurudˈiʃa kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani na kˌukuhˌurumˈia, nˌaje ˌatakˌukusˈaɲa tˈena kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote kˈule ˌalikˌutawˈaɲa.|0
