hˌata kˌama ˌumefˌukuzˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali kiˈasi ɡˈani tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu, kutˈoka hˌuko bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌukusˈaɲa na kˌukurudˈiʃa.|0
jˌeje bwˈana ˌatakˌurudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijokˈuwa mˈali ja bˈaba zˈako, nˌawe ˌutaˌimilˈiki. nˌaje ˌatakufˈaɲa ˌufanikˈiwe sˈana na kˌukuzidˈiʃa kwa idˈadi kulˈiko bˈaba zˈako.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌataˌitahˈiri miˈojo jˈenu na miˈojo ja wazˈao wˈenu ˌili mwˈeze kumpˈenda kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote ˌukaˈiʃi.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatawˈeka laˈana hˈizi zˈote ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈako ambˈao wˌanakˌutʃukˈia na kˌukutˈesa.|0
ˌutamtˈii tˈena bwˈana na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˌake zˈote nˌinazokˈupa lˈeo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌapokˌufanikˈiʃa sˈana katˌika kˈazi zˈote za mikˈono jˈako na katˌika uzˈao wa tˈumbo lˈako, wadˈoɡo wa mifˈuɡo jˈako na mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. bwˈana ˌatakˌufurahˈia tˈena na kˌukufˌanikˈiʃa, kˌama ˌalivjˌowafˌurahˈia bˈaba zˈako.|0
kˌama ˌukimtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˌake na mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake ambˈajo jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa ʃerˈia, na kˌumɡeukˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈako jˈote.|0
nˌinatʃˌokuaɡˈiza lˈeo sˈio kiɡˈumu sˈana kwˈako ˌau ˌusitʃˌokiwˈeza.|0
hakˈiko ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌili ˌuulˈize, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajepˈanda mbiŋɡˈuni kˌukilˈeta na kˌututˌaŋɡazˈia ˌili tuwˈeze kutˈii.|0
wˈala hakˈiko ŋɡˈambo ja bahˈari, ˌili ˌuulˈize, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajevˈuka bahˈari kwˈenda kˌukitʃukˈua na kˌututˌaŋɡazˈia ˌili tupˈate kutˈii.|0
la hˈaʃa! lˈile nˈeno lˈiko karˈibu sˈana nˈawe; lˈiko kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako na ndˈani ja mˈojo wˈako ˌili uwˈeze kˌulitˈii.|0
tazˈama, nawˈeka mbˈele jˈako lˈeo uzˈima na mˌafanikˈio, maˈuti na mˌaaŋɡamˈizo.|0
nˌinakˌuamˈuru lˈeo kwˌamba umpˈende bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌutembˈee katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, na kutˈunza mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake, ˈamri na ʃerˈia zˈake; ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoˈiʃi na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka, nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌubarˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajˌoiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki.|0
lakˈini kˌama mˈojo wˈako ˌukiɡˌeukˈia mbˈali ukˈawa hˈuna utˈii, kˌama ˌumevˈutwa kˌuisˌuɟudˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuiabˈudu.|0
nˌakutˌaŋɡazˈia lˈeo hˌii kwˌamba hakˈika ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa. hˌutaˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌunajovˈuka jordˈani kˌuiiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki.|0
lˈeo nˌinaziˈita mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi kˌama mˌaʃahˈidi ðˈidi jˈako kwˌamba nˌimewˈeka mbˈele jˈako uzˈima na maˈuti, barˈaka na laˈana. bˌasi sˈasa tʃˌaɡuˈeni uzˈima, ˌili wˌewe na watˈoto wˈako mpˈate kuˈiʃi.|0
na ˌili upˈate kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌuisˌikilˈize saˈuti jˌake na kˌuambatˈana nˈaje. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana n̩dˈije uzˈima wˈako, na ˌatakˈupa wˈiŋɡi wa sˈiku ˌili upˈate kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌalijoˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈako ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakaˈenda ˌakasˈema manˈeno hˈaja kwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote.|0
sˈasa nˈina miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa na ˌiʃirˈini nˌami siwˈezi tˈena kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza. bwˈana ˌamenˌiambˈia, hˌutavˈuka jordˈani..|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌatavˈuka mbˈele jˈenu. ˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa hˈaja mbˈele jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao. pˈia joʃˈua ˌatavˈuka mbˈele jˈenu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjosˈema.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌatawˌafaɲˈia wˈatu hˈao kˈile ˌalitʃˌowafaɲˈia sihˈoni na ˈoɡu, wafˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈao ˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌakabˈiði kwˈenu, nˌaɲi lazˈima mwˌatendˈee jˈale jˈote nˌilijˌowaamˈuru.|0
kuwˈeni imˈara na mˈojo wa ˌuʃuɟˈaa. msˌioɡˈope wˈala msˌifaðaˈike kwa sabˈabu jˈao, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi; kˈamwe hˌatawaˈatʃa wˈala hˌatawatˈupa nˈiɲi.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakamwˈita joʃˈua na ˌakamwambˈia mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote, ˈuwe imˈara na mˈojo wa ˌuʃuɟˈaa, kwa kˌuwa ni lazˈima uˈende na wˈatu hˈawa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile bwˈana ˌalijˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈao kuwˈapa, nˌawe ni lazˈima ˌuwaɡawˈie kˌama urˈiθi wˈao.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌatakˌutaŋɡulˈia nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe; kˈamwe hˌatakuˈatʃa wˈala hˌatakutˈupa. ˌusioɡˈope, wˈala ˌusifˌaðaˈike.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈose ˌakaandˈika ʃerˈia hˌii na kuwˈapa mˌakuhˈani, wˈana wa lˈawi, wˌaliˌotʃukˈua sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana na wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakawˌaamˈuru, ˌakasˈema: mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈila miˈaka sˈaba, katˌika mwˈaka wa kufˈuta madˈeni, wakˈati wa sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌanapokˈuɟa mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mahˈali ˌatakˌapopˌatʃaɡˈua, ˌutasˈoma ʃerˈia hˌii mbˈele jˈao mˌasikiˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
kusˈaɲa wˈatu wˈote, wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake, watˈoto na waɡˈeni wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu, ˌili wawˈeze kˌusikˈia na kˌuɟifˈunza kˈumtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌufuˈata kwa bidˈii manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii.|0
watˈoto wˈao, ambˈao hˌawaiɟˈui ʃerˈia hˌii, lazˈima wˌaisikˈie na kˌuɟifˈunza kˈumtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa mˈuda mtˌakaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajovˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose, sˈasa sˈiku ja kˈifo tʃˈako ˌimekˌaribˈia. mwˈite joʃˈua, mkˌaɟihˌuðurˈiʃe katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, mahˈali nˌitakapˈompa mˌaaɡˈizo ja kˈazi. kwa hˈijo mˈose na joʃˈua wakˈaɟa na kˌuɟihˌuðurˈiʃa kwˈeɲe hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakatokˈea katˌika hˈema katˌika ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu, nˈalo wˈiŋɡu lˌikasimˈama ɟˌuːja ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose: ˌunakwˈenda kˌupumzˈika na bˈaba zˈako, nˌao wˈatu hˈawa hˈivi kˌaribˈuni wˌatazˈini na miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni ja ˈn̩tʃi wˌanajˌoiŋɡˈia. wˌataniˈatʃa na kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano nˌililofˈaɲa nˈao.|0
sˈiku hˈijo nˌitawˌakasˌirikˈia na kˌuwaˈatʃa; nˌitawafˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa. maˈafa mˈeŋɡi na ʃˈida ɲˈiŋɡi zˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈao, nˌao sˈiku hˈijo wˌataulˈiza, ɟˈe, maˈafa hˈaja hˌajakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈetu kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu wˈetu hajˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈasi?.|0
nˌami hakˈika nˌitaufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu sˈiku hˈijo kwa sabˈabu ja maˈovu jˈao jˈote kwa kˌuɡeukˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
sˈasa ˌuɟiˌandikˈie wˈimbo hˈuu, ˌuwafundˈiʃe wˌaisraˈeli na ˌuwaamˈuru wˌauˈimbe, ˌili upˈate kˌuwa ˌuʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao.|0
nˌitakˌapokwˈiʃa kˌuwaiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowaahˈidi bˈaba zˈao kwa kiˈapo, nˌao wˌatakˌapokˈula wˌakaʃˈiba na kˌufanikˈiwa, wˌataɡˌeukˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuiabˈudu, wˌakinˌikatˈaa mˌimi na kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
maˈafa na ʃˈida zˌitakˌapokˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈao, wˈimbo hˈuu ˌutaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈao, kwa sabˈabu hˌautˌasahˌaulˈiwa na wazˈao wˈao. nˌinaɟˈua lˈile wˌanalˌoandˈaa kufˈaɲa, hˌata kˈabla sˌiɟawˌaiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowaahˈidi kwa kiˈapo.|0
hˈivjo mˈose ˌakaandˈika wˈimbo hˈuu sˈiku ˈile na ˌakawˌafundˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana akˈampa joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni aɡˈizo hˈili: ˈuwe hodˈari na ʃuɟˈaa, kwa kˌuwa ˌutawalˈeta wˌaisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowaahˈidi kwa kiˈapo, nˌami mweɲˈewe nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
baˌada ja mˈose kˌumalˈiza kˌuandˈika kwˈeɲe kitˈabu manˈeno ja ʃerˈia hˌii kutˈoka mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa ʃerˈia mkˌakiwˈeke kˈando ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. hˈapo ndˈipo kˌitakˌapokˈaa kˌama ʃahˈidi ðˈidi jˈenu.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌinaɟˈua ɟˈinsi mlˈivjo waˈasi na mlˈivjo na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu. kˌama mmekˈuwa mkiˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana nikˈiwa bˈado nˈiko hˈai na nikˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, mtaˈasi mˈara ŋɡˈapi baˌada ja kˈufa kwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌusaɲˈeni mbˈele jˈaŋɡu wazˈee wˈote wa mˌakabˈila jˈenu na mˌaafˈisa wˈenu wˈote, ˌili nipˈate kusˈema manˈeno hˈaja mˌasikiˈoni m̩wˈao na kˌuziˈita mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi ˌili kˌuʃuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌinaɟˈua baˌada ja kˈifo tʃˈaŋɡu hakˈika mtakˈuwa waˈovu kabˈisa na kˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia nˌilijˌowaamˈuru nˈiɲi. katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, maˈafa jˌatawapˈata kwa sabˈabu mtafˈaɲa maˈovu mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja bwˈana, na kˌutʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˌake kwa jˈale mikˈono jˈenu ˌitakˌajokˈuwa ˌimefˈaɲa.|0
mˈose ˌakajasˈoma manˈeno ja wˈimbo hˈuu kutˈoka mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo katˌika mˌasikˈio ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu, nˌami nˌitasˈema; sikˈia, ˈee ˈn̩tʃi, manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu na jaɲˈeʃe kˌama mvˈua, na manˈeno jˈaŋɡu na jaʃˈuke kˌama umˈande, kˌama maɲˈuɲu ɟˌuːja maɟˈani mabˈitʃi, kˌama mvˈua tˈele ɟˌuːja mimˈea mjorˈoro.|0
nˌitalˌitaŋɡˈaza ɟˈina la bwˈana. nˈaam, sifˈuni ukˈuu wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
jˌeje ni mwˈamba, kˈazi zˌake ni kˌamilˈifu, ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote ni hˈaki. mˈuŋɡu mwˌaminˈifu ambˈaje hˌakosˈei, jˌeje ni mɲˈofu na mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
wˌamefˈaɲa mˈambo ja ˌupotˈovu mbˈele zˈake; kwa aˈibu jˈao, wˌao si watˈoto wˌake tˈena, lakˈini ni kizˈazi kilˈitʃo kiˈovu na kˌilitʃˌopotˈoka.|0
ɟˈe, hˌii n̩dˈijo ɲɟˈia ja kumlˈipa bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˈatu waɟˈiŋɡa na wasˈio na busˈara? ɟˈe, jˌeje sˈije bˈaba jˈenu, muˈumba wˈenu, ˌalijˌewafˈaɲa nˈiɲi na kˌuwaˈumba.|0
kumbˈuka sˈiku za kˈale; tˌafakˈari vizˈazi vja zamˈani vˌilivjopˈita. ulˈiza bˈaba jˈako, nˌaje ˌatakˌuambˈia, wazˈee wˈako, nˌao wˌatakˌuelˈeza.|0
alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌalipowˈapa mˌataˈifa urˈiθi wˈao, ˌalipˌoɡawˈaɲa wˌanadˈamu wˈote, ˌaliwˈeka mipˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja mˌataˈifa sˌawasˈawa na hesˈabu ja wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa kˌuwa fˈuŋɡu la bwˈana ni wˈatu wˈake, jakˈobo kˈura jˌake ja urˈiθi.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɟˈaŋɡwa ˌalimkˈuta, katˌika ɲˈika tˈupu ˌivumˈajo upˈepo. ˌalimhifˈaði na kumtˈunza; ˌakamlˈinda kˌama mbˈoni ja ɟˈitʃo lˈake.|0
kˌama tˈai ˌavuruɡˈaje kiˈota tʃˈake, na kˌurukarˈuka ɟˌuːja makˈinda jˈake, ambˈaje hutˈanda mabˈawa jˌake kˌuwadˈaka, na hˌuwatʃukˈua kwˈeɲe mabˈawa jˈake.|0
bwˈana pˈeke jˌake ˌalimwoŋɡˈoza; hˌakuwˈepo mˈuŋɡu mɡˈeni pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
ˌakamfˈaɲa apˈande sehˈemu zˌilizˌoinˈuka za ˈn̩tʃi, ˌakamlˈiʃa kwa mavˈuno ja maʃˈamba. ˌakamlˈea kwa asˈali tˌoka mwambˈani, na kwa mafˈuta kutˈoka mwˈamba mɡˈumu.|0
kwa ɟibˈini na mazˈiwa kutˈoka makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe na kutˈoka makˈundi ja mbˈuzi, kwa mafˈuta ja wˌanakondˈoo na mbˈuzi, kwa kondˈoo dˈume wazˈuri wa baʃˈani, na kwa ŋɡˈano nzˈuri. ukˈaɲua dˈamu ja zabˈibu ˌinajotˈoa pˈovu.|0
jˌeʃurˈuni ˌalinenˈepa na kupˈiɡa tˈeke; ˌalikˈuwa na tʃakˈula tˈele, akˈawa mzˈito na ˌakapendˈeza sˈana. ˌakamwˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌemuˈumba, na kˌumkatˈaa mwˈamba mwokˈozi wˈake.|0
wˌakamfˈaɲa mˈuŋɡu kˌuwa na wˈivu kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈao miɡˈeni, na kˌumkasirˈiʃa kwa sanˈamu zˈao za mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
wˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu kwa pˈepo, ambˈao si mˈuŋɡu: miˈuŋɡu wˌasijˌoiɟˈua, miˈuŋɡu ˌilijˌoɟitokˈeza sˈiku za kˌaribˈuni, miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo bˈaba zˈenu hˌawakˌuioɡˈopa.|0
mkamwˈatʃa mwˈamba, ˌalijˌewazˈaa nˈiɲi; mkˌamsahˈau mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌewazˈaa.|0
bwˈana ˌakaˈona hˈili, ˌakawˌakatˈaa, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˌasirˈiʃwa na wanˈawe na bˈinti zˈake.|0
ˌakasˈema, nˌitawafˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu, nˌami niˈone mwˈiʃo wˌao ˌutakˈuwa nˈini, kwa kˌuwa wˌao ni kizˈazi kˌilitʃˌopotˈoka, watˈoto ambˈao si wˌaaminˈifu.|0
wˌamenifˈaɲa nˈiwe na wˈivu kwa kˈile ambˈatʃo si mˈuŋɡu, na kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa kwa sanˈamu zˈao zˌisizokˈuwa na θamˈani. nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌawaonˈee wˈivu wˈale ambˈao si taˈifa. nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌakasirˈiʃwe na taˈifa lˈile lisˈilo na ˌufahˈamu.|0
kwa maˈana mˈoto ˌumewˈaʃwa kwa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, ˈule ˌuwakˈao hˌadi kwˈeɲe vˈina vja maˈuti. ˌutatˌeketˈeza dunˈia pamˈoɟa na mazˈao jˈake, na kuwˈaʃa mˈoto katˌika misˈiŋɡi ja milˈima.|0
nˌitalundˈika maɟˈaŋɡa ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌutumˈia miʃˈale jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao.|0
nˌitatˈuma ɲɟˈaa kˈali ðˈidi jˈao marˈaði mabˈaja, jˌatekˌetezˈajo na taˈuni ja kufˈiʃa; nˌitawˌapelekˈea mˈeno makˈali ja waɲˈama mwˈitu, na sˈumu ja ɲˈoka wˈale wˌatambaˈao mˌavumbˈini.|0
bˌarabarˈani upˈaŋɡa ˌutawˌakosˈeʃa watˈoto; ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao hˈofu ˌitatawˈala. viɟˈana wˌao wa kiˈume na wa kˈike wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia, pˈia watˈoto watʃˈaŋɡa na wazˈee wˌeɲe mvˈi.|0
nˌilisˈema nˌiŋɡewˌatawˈaɲa na kufˈuta kˌumbukˈumbu lˈao katˌika mwˌanadˈamu.|0
lakˈini nˌilihofˈia ðihˈaka za adˈui, adˈui asˈiɟe ˌakaʃˈindwa kˌuelˈewa, na kusˈema, mikˈono jˈetu ˌimeʃˈinda; bwˈana hˌakufˈaɲa jˈote hˈaja..|0
wˌao ni taˈifa lisˈilo na akˈili, hakˈuna busˈara ndˈani jˈao.|0
laˈiti wˌaŋɡekˈuwa na hekˈima wˌaŋɡefahˈamu hˈili, na kˌutambˈua mwˈiʃo wˌao ˌutakˈuwa ˈaɟe.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌaŋɡewezˈaɟe kˌufukˈuza ˈelfu mˈoɟa, ˌau wawˈili kˌufukˈuza ˈelfu kˈumi, kˌama si kwˌamba mwˈamba wˌao ˌamewaˈuza, kˌama si kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamewaˈatʃa.|0
kwa kˌuwa mwˈamba wˌao si kˌama mwˈamba wˈetu, sˌawasˈawa na vˈile adˈui zˈetu wˌanavjokˈiri.|0
mzabˈibu wˌao ˌunatˈoka kwˈeɲe mzabˈibu wa sodˈoma, na kutˈoka kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba ja ɡomˈora. zabˈibu zˌake zˌimeɟˈaa sˈumu, na viʃˈada vjˈake vˌimeɟˈaa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
mvˈiɲo wˌao ni sˈumu ja ɲˈoka, sˈumu jˌeɲe kufˈiʃa ja swˈila.|0
ɟˈe, hˈili sˌikuliwˈeka akˈiba na kˌulifuŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vjˈaŋɡu vja hazˈina.|0
ni ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi; nˌitalipˈiza. wakˈati ˌutakˌapowadˈia, m̩ɡˈuu wˌao ˌutatelˈeza; sˈiku jˈao ja maˈafa ni karˈibu, na mˌaaŋɡamˈizo jˈao jˌanawaɟˈia harˈaka.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌahukˈumu wˈatu wˈake, na kˌuwahˌurumˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ˌatakˌapoˈona ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˌimekwˈiʃa wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijebˈaki, mtˈumwa ˌau alˈije hˈuru.|0
ˌatasˈema: sˈasa ˈiko wˈapi miˈuŋɡu jˈao, mwˈamba wˌaliˌoukˌimbilˈia.|0
miˈuŋɡu wˈale wˌaliokˈula mafˈuta ja ðabˈihu zˈao na kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo wa sadˈaka zˈao za vˌiɲuˈaɟi? wˌainˈuke bˈasi, wˌawasˌaidˈie! wˌawapˈeni bˌasi ulˈinzi.|0
tazˈama bˈasi, mˌimi mweɲˈewe, mˌimi n̩dˈije! hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi. mˌimi nˌinaˈua na mˌimi nˌinafufˈua, mˌimi nˌimeɟerˈuhi na mˌimi nˌitapˈoɲa, wˈala hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinainˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni na kusˈema: hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo milˈele.|0
wakˈati nˌinapˌounˈoa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu ˌunaˌometamˈeta na mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌunapˌouʃˈika ˌili kutˈoa hukˈumu, nˌitalipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwalipˈiza wˈale wˌanaˌonitʃukˈia.|0
nˌitailˈevja miʃˈale jˈaŋɡu kwa dˈamu, wakˈati upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu ˌukitafˈuna ɲˈama: dˈamu ja wˌaliotʃˈiɲɟua pamˈoɟa na matˈeka, vˈitʃwa vja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa adˈui.|0
fˌurahˈini, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌataˌilipˈiza dˈamu ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, ˌatalipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˌake na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi na wˈatu wˈake.|0
mˈose na joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni wakˈaɟa, wˌakanˈena manˈeno jˈote ja wˈimbo wˈatu wakˈiwa wˌanasikˈia.|0
mˈose ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌujasˈoma manˈeno hˈaja jˈote kwa ˌisraˈeli wˈote.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, jˌawekˈeni mojˈoni manˈeno jˈote ambˈajo nˌimewˌataŋɡazˈia kwa makˈini sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo, ˌili kwˌamba mpˈate kˌuwaaɡˈiza watˈoto wˈenu wˌajatˈii kwa bidˈii manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia hˌii.|0
sˈijo manˈeno matˈupu tu kwˈenu, bˌali ni uzˈima wˈenu. kwa hˈajo mtaˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajovˈuka jordˈani kˌuimilˈiki.|0
sˈiku hˈijo hˈijo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia mˈose.|0
kwˈea katˌika mˌapaŋɡˈano ja mlˈima ˌabarˈimu hˌadi kilˈima tʃa nˈebo kˌilitʃˈoko moˈabu, ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko, na ˌuitazˈame kˌanaˈani, ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa wˌaisraˈeli kˌama mˈilki jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ˌutafˈia kwˈeɲe mlˈima hˈuo ˌunaokwˈea na kˌukusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako, kˌama ndˈuɡu jˈako arˈoni ˌalivjofˈia ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈori nˌaje ˌakakˌusaɲˈika kwa wˈatu wˈake.|0
hˌii ni kwa sabˈabu nˈiɲi wawˈili mlivˈuɲɟa ˌuaminˈifu nˌami mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi ja merˈiba kadˈeʃi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la sˈini, na kwa sabˈabu hˌamkuˌuinˈua ˌutakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo, ˌutaiˈona tu ˈn̩tʃi kwa mbˈali; wˌewe hˌutaiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi nˌinajowˈapa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo barˈaka mˈose ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalijotˈamka kwa wˌaisraˈeli kˈabla ja kˈifo tʃˈake.|0
ˌalisˈema: bwˈana ˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka mlˈima sinˈai, ˌakatʃomˈoza kˌama ɟˈua ɟˈuu jˈao kutˈoka mlˈima seˈiri, ˌakaaŋɡˈaza kutˈoka mlˈima parˈani. ˌalikˈuɟa pamˈoɟa na wˌatakatˈifu makˈumi ˈelfu kutˈoka kusˈini, kutˈoka mˌaterˈemko ja mlˈima wˈake.|0
hakˈika ni wˌewe ambˈaje hˌuwapˈenda wˈatu, wˌatakatˈifu wˈako wˈote wˈamo mkonˈoni mwˈako. mˌiɡuˈuni pˈako wˈote wˌanasuɟˈudu na kutˈoka kwˈako wˌanapokˈea mˌafundˈiʃo.|0
ʃerˈia ˈile mˈose ˌalijotˈupa sˈisi, tulˈio mˈilki ja kˌusaɲˈiko la jakˈobo.|0
ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja jˌeʃurˈuni wakˈati vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wˌalipˌokusaɲˈika, pamˈoɟa na mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
rˌeubˈeni na aˈiʃi, asˈife, wˈala wˈatu wˌake wasˈiwe watʃˈatʃe.|0
ˌakasˈema hˈili kuhˈusu jˈuda: ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia kilˈio tʃa jˈuda, mlˈete kwa wˈatu wˈake. kwa mikˈono jˌake mweɲˈewe hˌuɟitetˈea. nˈaam, ˈuwe msaˈada wˌake ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈake.|0
hˌumfundˈiʃa jakˈobo mˌausˈia jˈako na ˌisraˈeli ʃerˈia jˈako. hˌufukˈiza uvˈumba mbˈele zˈako na sadˈaka nzˈima za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, barˈiki ustˈadi wˌake wˈote, nˌawe ˌupendˈezwe na kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈake. vipˈiɡe viˈuno vja wˈale wˌainukˈao ðˈidi jˈake; wapˈiɡe adˈui zˌake hˌata wˌasiinˈuke tˈena.|0
kuhˈusu bˌeɲamˈini ˌakasˈema: mwˈatʃe mpˈenzi wa bwˈana ˌapumzˈike salˈama kwˈake, kwa maˈana humkˈiŋɡa mtʃˈana kˈutwa, na jˈule bwˈana ˌampendˈaje hˌupumzˈika kˈati ja mabˈeɡa jˈake.|0
kuhˈusu josˈefu ˌakasˈema: bwˈana na ˌaibarˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kwa umˈande wa θamˈani kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu, na vilˈindi vja mˈaɟi vˌilivjˌotulˈia tʃˈini.|0
pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vilˈivjo bˈora sˈana vˌiletwˈavjo na ɟˈua, na vˈitu vizˈuri sˈana vˌinavjowˈeza kˌutolˈewa na mwˈezi.|0
pamˈoɟa na zawˈadi bˈora sˈana za milˈima ja zamˈani na kwa wˈiŋɡi wa barˈaka za vilˈima vja milˈele.|0
pamˈoɟa na barˈaka nzˈuri ˈm̩no za ˈarði na ˌukamilˈifu wˈake, na ˌupendelˈeo wˌake jˌeje ˌalijeˈiʃi kwˈeɲe kitʃˈaka kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌinawˈaka mˈoto. hˈivi vjˈote na vikˈae ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa josˈefu, ɟˌuːja pˈaɟi la ˈuso la alˈije m̩kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
katˌika fahˈari jˌeje ni kˌama fahˈali mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza; pˈembe zˌake ni pˈembe za ɲˈati, na kwa pˈembe hˈizo ˌatapˈiɡa mˌataˈifa, hˌata jalˈijo miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. hˈivjo ndˈivjo jalˈivjo makˈumi ˈelfu ja ˌefraˈimu; hˈivjo ndˈivjo jalˈivjo maˈelfu ja manˈase.|0
kuhˈusu zˌabulˈoni ˌakasˈema: ʃˌaŋɡilˈia, zˌabulˈoni, wakˈati wa kutˈoka ɲɟˈe, nˌawe ˌisakˈari, katˌika mahˈema jˈako.|0
wˌatawaˈita mˌataˈifa kwˈeɲe mlˈima, na hˌuko mtatˈoa ðabˈihu za hˈaki; wˌataɟˌifurahˈiʃa kwa wˈiŋɡi ˌulioɟˈaza bahˈari, kwa hazˈina zˌilizofˈitʃwa mtʃaŋɡˈani.|0
kuhˈusu ɡˈadi ˌakasˈema: ˌatabˌarikˈiwa jˌeje ˌaoŋɡezˈaje mˈilki ja ɡˈadi! ɡˈadi huˈiʃi hˌuko kˌama sˈimba, ˌakirarˈua kwˈeɲe mkˈono ˌau kˈitʃwa.|0
ˌaliɟˌitʃaɡulˈia ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri kulˈiko zˈote kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe; fˈuŋɡu la kˌioŋɡˈozi lˌilikˈuwa lˌimehˌifaðˈiwa kwa aɟˈili jˈake. vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wˌalipˌokusaɲˈika, ˌalitimˈiza hˈaki ja mapˈenzi ja bwˈana, na hukˈumu zˌake kuhˈusu ˌisraˈeli.|0
kuhˈusu dˈani ˌakasˈema: dˈani ni mwˈana sˈimba, ˌakirˈuka kutˈoka baʃˈani.|0
kuhˈusu naftˈali ˌakasˈema: naftˈali ˌameɟˈaa tˈele ˌupendelˈeo wa bwˈana, nˌaje ˌameɟˈaa barˈaka jˈake; ˌatarˈiθi mˌaɣarˈibi na kusˈini.|0
kuhˈusu aʃˈeri ˌakasˈema: ˌalijˌebarikˈiwa zaˈidi sˈana katˌika wˈana ni aʃˈeri; jˌeje na apˈate ˌupendelˈeo kwa ndˈuɡu zˈake, jˌeje na anˈawe miɡˈuu jˌake kwˈeɲe mafˈuta.|0
mˌakomˈeo ja malˈaŋɡo jˈako jˈawe tʃˈuma na ʃˈaba, nˈazo ŋɡˈuvu zˈako zˌitakˈuwa sˈawa na sˈiku zˈako.|0
hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine kˌama mˈuŋɡu wa jˌeʃurˈuni, ambˈaje hupˈanda ɟˌuːja mbˈiŋɡu ˌili ˌakusˌaidˈie, na ɟˌuːja mawˈiŋɡu katˌika ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
mˈuŋɡu wa milˈele ni kˌimbilˈio lˈako, na tʃˈini kˈuna mikˈono ja milˈele. ˌatamfukˈuza adˈui jˈako mbˈele jˈako, ˌakisˈema, mwˌaŋɡamˈize jˈeje!.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli ˌataˈiʃi salˈama pˈeke jˈake. m̩zˈao wa jakˈobo ni salˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja nafˈaka na divˈai ˈm̩pja, mahˈali ambˈapo mbˈiŋɡu hˌudondˈoʃa umˈande.|0
ˈee ˌisraˈeli, wˌewe ˌumebˌarikˈiwa! ni nˈani kˌama wˈewe, taˈifa lˌililˌookolˈewa na bwˈana? jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao jˈako na msaˈada wˈako, na upˈaŋɡa wˈako ˌuliˌotukˈuka. adˈui zˈako wˌatatˌetemˈeka mbˈele jˈako, nˌawe ˌutapˌakaɲˈaɡa mahˈali pˈao pa ɟˈuu.|0
kˈiʃa mˈose ˌakaupˈanda mlˈima nˈebo kutˈoka tˌambarˈare za moˈabu mpˈaka kilˈele tʃa pˈisɡa, ŋɡˈambo ja jerˈiko. hˌuko bwˈana ˌakamwoɲˈeʃa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote: kutˈoka ɡˌileˈadi mpˈaka dˈani.|0
naftˈali jˈote, ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌefraˈimu na manˈase, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja jˈuda mpˈaka bahˈari ja mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
neɡˈebu na ˈn̩tʃi jˈote kˌuanzˈia bˈonde la jerˈiko, ˈm̩ɟi wa mitˈende, hˌadi soˈari.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, hˌii n̩dˈijo ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌomwahˈidi ˌabrahˈamu na isˈaki na jakˈobo kwa kiˈapo nˌiliposˈema, nˌitawˈapa wazˈao wˈako. nˌimekˌuruhˈusu ˌuiˈone kwa mˈatʃo jˈako, lakˈini hˌutavˈuka kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
nˌaje mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana akˈafa hˌuko moˈabu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamzˈika hˌuko moˈabu, katˌika bˈonde mkabˈala na bˈeθ peˈori, lakˈini hakˈuna ˌaɟuˈaje kabˈuri lˈake lilˈipo mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
mˈose ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa na ˌiʃirˈini ˌalipˌofarˈiki; hˌata hˈivjo ŋɡˈuvu ja mˈatʃo jˌake hˌaikˌufifˈia wˈala mwˈili wˌake hˌaukˌuðoofˈika.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja mˈose kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare za moˈabu kwa sˈiku θˌelaθˈini, mpˈaka wakˈati wa kulˈia na kˌuombolˈeza ˌulipopˈita.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni ˌaliɟˈazwa rˈoho ja hekˈima kwa sabˈabu mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈeka mikˈono jˌake ɟˈuu jˈake. kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamsˌikilˈiza na wˌakafˈaɲa jˈale ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
ʃˈu wakˈati hˈuo, katˌika ˌisraˈeli hˌaɟainˈuka nabˈii mwiŋɡˈine kˌama mˈose, ambˈaje bwˈana ˌalimɟˈua ˈuso kwa ˈuso.|0
ˌalijetˈenda iʃˈara zˈote zˈile za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalimtˈuma kˌujatˈenda hˌuko mˈisri, jaˈani kwa farˈao na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote na ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijewˈahi kˌuoɲˈeʃa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi ˌama kutˈenda matˈendo ja kutˈiʃa ambˈajo mˈose ˌaliwˈahi kˌujafˈaɲa mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, msˌaidˈizi wa mˈose.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˈose ˌamekˈufa. sˈasa bˈasi, wˌewe pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote hˈawa, ɟˌiandaˈeni kuvˈuka hˈuu ˈm̩to jordˈani kˌuiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo karˈibu nˌitawˈapa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈila mahˈali ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈenu zˌitakˌapokaɲˈaɡa nˌimewˈapa, kˌama vˈile nˌilivjˌomwahˈidi mˈose.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌitaenˈea kˌuanzˈia ɟˈaŋɡwa hˈili hˌadi lˌebanˈoni, tˈena kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩to mkˈubwa wa frˈati, jaˈani ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja wahˈiti, hˌadi bahˈari ˈile kˈubwa ˌilijˈoko upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌuʃindˈana na wˌewe sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈako. kˌama vˈile nˌilivjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na mˈose, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˈewe, sˌitakuˈatʃa wˈala sˌitakˌupuŋɡukˈia.|0
ˈuwe hodˈari na ʃuɟˈaa, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌutakˌajewˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu hˈawa kˌuirˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈao kuwˈapa.|0
ˈuwe hodˈari na ˈuwe na ˌuʃuɟˈaa mwˈiŋɡi. ˈuwe na bidˈii kutˈii ʃerˈia jˈote ˌalijokˈupa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌusiiˈatʃe kwa kˌuɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto, ˌili upˈate kˌufanikˈiwa popˈote ˌuendˈako.|0
ˌusiˈatʃe kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa ʃerˈia kˌiondˈoke kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako; jˌatafakˈari manˈeno jˌake usˈiku na mtʃˈana, ˌili upˈate kˌuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu sˌawasˈawa na jˈote jˌalijˌoandˈikwa ndˈani jˈake. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapofˌanikˈiwa na kˈiʃa ˌutastˈawi.|0
ɟˈe, si mˌimi nˌilijˌekuamˈuru? ˈuwe hodˈari na ʃuɟˈaa. ˌusihˈofu wˈala ˌusivuɲɟˈike mˈojo, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe kokˈote ˌuendˈako.|0
pˌitiˈeni katˌika kˈambi jˈote mkˌawaambˈie wˈatu, wekˈeni tajˈari mˌahitˈaɟi jˈenu. sˈiku tˈatu kˌuanzˈia sˈasa mtavˈuka hˌii jordˈani ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa ˈiwe jˈenu weɲˈewe..|0
lakˈini kwa wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase, joʃˈua ˌakasˈema.|0
kˌumbukˈeni aɡˈizo lˈile mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalilowˈapa: bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˈapa nˈiɲi rˈaha, nˌaje ˌamewˈapa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii..|0
wˌake zˈenu, watˈoto wˈenu na mifˈuɡo jˈenu wˌatakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile mˈose ˌalijowˈapa mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, lakˈini mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈenu wˈote, wakˈiwa wˌamevˈikwa silˈaha kˌikamilˈifu lazˈima wavˈuke mbˈele ja ndˈuɡu zˈenu. ˌimewapˈasa kˌuwasˌaidˈia ndˈuɡu zˈenu hˌadi.|0
bwˈana awˈape nˌao rˈaha, kˌama ˌalivjokwˈiʃa kufˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu hˌadi wˌao pˈia wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌamemilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ˈile bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanajowˈapa. baˌada ja hˈilo, mwawˈeza kurˈudi na kˌukalˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu weɲˈewe, ambˈajo mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani kˌuelekˈea lˌinakˌotʃomˈoza ɟˈua.|0
ndˈipo wˌakamɟˈibu joʃˈua, tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo ˌumetˌuaɡˈiza tˌutafˈaɲa na popˈote ˌutakˌapotutˈuma tˌutakwˈenda.|0
kˌama vˈile tˌulivjomtˈii mˈose kˌikamilˈifu, ndˈivjo tˌutakˌavjokutˈii wˈewe. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˌawe tu kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na mˈose.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˈasi nˈeno lˈako na kuˈatʃa kˌujatˈii manˈeno jˈako, ˌau tʃotʃˈote ˌutakˌatʃowˌaamˈuru, ˌatauˈawa. ˈuwe imˈara na hodˈari tˈu.|0
kˈiʃa joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni kwa sˈiri ˌakawatˈuma wˌapelelˈezi wawˈili kutˈoka ʃitˈimu, ˌakawˌaambˈia, nendˈeni mkˌaikaɡˈue hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi, hˈasa jerˈiko. kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈenda na kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja kahˈaba mmˈoɟa ɟˈina lˈake rahˈabu na kukˈaa hˈumo.|0
mfˈalme wa jerˈiko ˌakaambˈiwa, tazˈama! baˈaði ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌamekˈuɟa hˈuku usˈiku hˈuu kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme wa jerˈiko ˌakatˈuma hˈuu uɟˈumbe kwa rahˈabu: watˈoe wˈale wˈatu wˌaliˌokuɟˈia na kˌuiŋɡˈia ɲumbˈani mwˈako, kwa sabˈabu wˌamekˈuɟa kˌuipˌelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
lakˈini hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua hˈao wˈatu wawˈili na kˌuwafˈitʃa. ˌakasˈema, nˈaam, wˈatu hˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu, lakˈini sˌikuɟˈua wˌalikotˈoka.|0
kˌulipˌoiŋɡˈia ɡˈiza, wakˈati wa kufˈuŋɡa lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi, wˈatu hˈao wˌaliondˈoka. siɟˈui ɲɟˈia wˌalijˌoiendˈea. wˌafuˌatiliˈeni harˈaka. huˈenda mkˌawapˈata.|0
lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌapandˈiʃa darˈini ˌakawˌafunˈika kwa mabˈua ja kitˈani ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamejˌatandˈika darˈini..|0
bˌasi hˈao wˈatu wˌakaondˈoka kˌuwafˌuatilˈia hˈao wˌapelelˈezi katˌika ɲɟˈia ˈile ˌinajˌoelekˈea vivˈuko vja jordˈani, mˈara tu wˌafuˌatiliˈaɟi wˌalipotˈoka ɲɟˈe, lˈaŋɡo lˌikafˈuŋɡwa.|0
kˈabla wˈale wˌapelelˈezi hˌawaɟalˈala, rahˈabu ˌakawˌaendˈea hˌuko ɟˈuu darˈini.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˌinaɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewˈapa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na hˈofu kˈuu ˌimetˌuaŋɡukˈia kwa sabˈabu jˈenu, kiˈasi kwˌamba wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii wˌanajejˈuka kwa hˈofu kwa sabˈabu jˈenu.|0
tˌumesikˈia ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌokaˈuʃa mˈaɟi ja bahˈari ja ʃˈamu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu mlˌipotˈoka mˈisri, pˈia lˈile mlˌilowˌatendˈea sihˈoni na ˈoɡu, wafˈalme wawˈili wa wˌaamˈori mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani, ambˈao mlˌiwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa.|0
tˌulipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja hˈili, miˈojo jˈetu ˌilijejˈuka na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈosa ˌuɟasˈiri kwa sabˈabu jˈenu, kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ni mˈuŋɡu ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni na dˌuniˈani tʃˈini.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, tˌafaðˈali nˌiapiˈeni kwa bwˈana, kwˌamba mtˌaitendˈea hisˈani ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi nˌimewˌatendˈea hisˈani. nipˈeni iʃˈara ja ˌuaminˈifu.|0
kwˌamba mtˌajahifˈaði maˈiʃa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mˈama jˈaŋɡu, ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈote walˈio wa kwˈao na kwˌamba mtˌatuokˈoa na kˈifo.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌakamhˌakikiʃˈia rahˈabu, uhˈai wˈetu kwa uhˈai wˈenu! ikˈiwa hˌutatˈoa habˈari ja nˈini tˌunatʃofˈaɲa, wakˈati bwˈana ˌatakˌapotˈupa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, tˌutawˌatendˈea kwa hisˈani na kwa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaterˈemʃa dˌiriʃˈani kwa kˈamba, kwa kˌuwa ɲˈumba jˌake ˌalijokˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi ˌilikˈuwa sehˈemu ja ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia, nendˈeni vˌilimˈani ˌili wˈale wˌafuˌatiliˈaɟi wˌasiwapˈate. ɟˌifitʃˈeni hˌuko kwa sˈiku tˈatu mpˈaka wˌatakˌaporˈudi, hˌatimˈaje mwˈende zˈenu.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌakamwambˈia, hˈiki kiˈapo ˌulitʃˌotuapˈiʃa hˌakitˌatufˈuŋɡa.|0
ˌisipokˈuwa, hˈapo tˌutakˌapoiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, ˌutakˈuwa ˌumefˈuŋɡa hˌii kˈamba ɲekˈundu dˌiriʃˈani pˈale ˌulipˌotutˌeremʃˈia na kˌama ˌutakˈuwa ˌumewalˈeta bˈaba jˈako na mˈama jˈako, ndˈuɡu zˈako na ɟamˈaa jˈako jˈote ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈako.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba jˈako ˌakaˈenda mtaˈani, dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe, hˌatutˌawaɟibˈika. lakˈini jˈule ambˈaje ˌatakˈuwa ndˈani pamˈoɟa nˈawe, kˌama mkˈono wa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ukˈiwa ɟˈuu jˌake dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈetu.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˌutatˈoa habˈari ja ʃuɣˈuli jˈetu tˌunajofˈaɲa, tˌutakˈuwa tˌumefˌuŋɡulˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kiˈapo hˈiki ˌulitʃˌotufˈaɲa tuˈape.|0
nˌaje ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimekubˈali. na ˈiwe kˌama mnˌavjosˈema. kwa hˈijo ˌakaaɡˈana nˈao, nˌao wˌakaondˈoka. jˌeje ˌakaifˈuŋɡa ˈile kˈamba ɲekˈundu dˌiriʃˈani.|0
wˌalipˌoondˈoka, wˌakaˌelekˈea vˌilimˈani na kukˈaa hˌuko sˈiku tˈatu, hˌadi wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiwˌafuˌatilˈia wakˈawa wˌamewˌatafˈuta ɲɟˈia nzˈima na kurˈudi pasˈipo kˌuwapˈata.|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˈatu wawˈili wˌakaˈanza kurˈudi. wˌakaʃˈuka kutˈoka kˈule vˌilimˈani, wˌakavˈuka ˈm̩to na kˈuɟa kwa joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, na kˌumwelˈeza kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌowapˈata.|0
wˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, hakˈika bwˈana ˌametˈupa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu; wˈatu wˈote wˌanajejˈuka kwa hˈofu kwa sabˈabu jˈetu.|0
joʃˈua na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakaondˈoka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema kutˈoka ʃitˈimu, wˌakaˈenda mpˈaka ˈm̩to jordˈani, ambˈako wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi kˈabla ja kuvˈuka.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku tˈatu mˌaafˈisa wˌakapˈita katˌika kˈambi jˈote.|0
wˌakitˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo kwa wˈatu, wˌakiwˌaambˈia: mtˌakapoˈona sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, lˌikitʃˌukulˈiwa na walˈawi ambˈao n̩dˈio mˌakuhˈani, mtˌaondˈoka hˈapo mlˈipo na kˌulifuˈata.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakapˌotambˈua ɲɟˈia mtˌakajˌoiendˈea, kwa kˌuwa hˌamɟawˈahi kˌuipˈita kˈabla. lakˈini msˌisoɡˈee karˈibu, bˌali kˈuwe na umbˈali wa ðirˈaa mbˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kˈati jˈenu na sandˈuku.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia hˈao wˈatu, ɟˌitakasˈeni, kwa kˌuwa kˈeʃo bwˈana ˌatatˈenda mˈambo ja kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌakuhˈani, lˌiinuˈeni sandˈuku la aɡˈano mkˌataŋɡulˈie mbˈele ja wˈatu. hˈivjo wˌakalˌiinˈua na kˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈao.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, lˈeo nˌitaˈanza kˌukutukˈuza matʃˈoni pa ˌisraˈeli jˈote, ˌili wapˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˌawe kˌama nˌilivjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na mˈose.|0
ˌuwaambˈie mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌotʃukˈua sandˈuku la aɡˈano, mnˌapofˈika kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa mˈaɟi ja jordˈani, nendˈeni mkˌasimˈame ndˈani ja ˈm̩to..|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, ɲɟoˈoni hˈapa msˌikilˈize manˈeno ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo mtˌakavjoɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai jˈupo kˌatikˈati jˈenu, na kwˌamba kwa hakˈika ˌatawˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu hˈao wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wahˈivi, wˌaperˈizi, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi, wˌaamˈori na wˌajebˈusi.|0
tˌazamˈeni, sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote lˌitaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩to jordˈani likˈiwa lˌimewˌataŋɡulˈia.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, tʃˌaɡuˈeni wˈatu kˈumi na wawˈili kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli, ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila.|0
mˈara tu ɲˈajo za mˌakuhˈani wˌalitʃˌukuˈalo sandˈuku la bwˈana, bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote, zˌitakˌapokaɲˈaɡa ndˈani ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, mˈaɟi hˈajo jˌatirˌirikˈajo kutˈoka ɟˈuu jˌatatindˈika na kˌusimˈama kˌama tʃuɡˈuu.|0
bˈasi, wˈatu wˌalipovˈuɲɟa kˈambi ˌili kuvˈuka jordˈani, mˌakuhˈani wakˈiwa wˌamebˈeba sandˈuku la aɡˈano wˌaliwˌataŋɡulˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa wakˈati wa mavˈuno, nˌao ˈm̩to jordˈani ˌulikˈuwa ˌumefurˈika hˌadi kwˈeɲe kˈiŋɡo zˈake. ˌilikˈuwa kˌawaˈida ja jordˈani kˌufurˈika ɲakˈati zˈote za mavˈuno. mˈara tu mˌakuhˈani wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamebˈeba sandˈuku la aɡˈano wˌalipofˈika mtˈoni na ɲˈajo zˈao kuzˈama ndˈani ja jˈale mˈaɟi.|0
wˈale mˌakuhˈani wˌaliobˈeba sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana, wˌakasimˈama imˈara mahˈali pakˈavu kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wakˈiwa wˌanapˈita hˌadi taˈifa lˈote lˌikaˈiʃa kuvˈuka mahˈali pakˈavu.|0
wakˈati taˈifa lˈote lˌilipokwˈiʃa kuvˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua.|0
tʃaɡˈua wˈatu kˈumi na wawˈili mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu, kˈila kabˈila ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa.|0
nˌawe ˌuwaambˈie wˌatʃukˈue mˈawe kˈumi na mawˈili kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, pˌalepˈale mˌakuhˈani wˌalipˌosimˈama, wˌajatʃukˈue na kˌujawˈeka mahˈali mtˌakapokˈaa usˈiku hˈuu wa lˈeo.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua ˌakawaˈita wˈatu kˈumi na wawˈili ambˈao ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃaɡˈua kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli, ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila kabˈila.|0
nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, mtˌaŋɡulˈie mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mwˈende kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani. kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatainˈua ɟˈiwe beɡˈani mwˈake, kˌufuatˈana na hesˈabu ja mˌakabˈila ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kˌuwa kˌama iʃˈara kˌatikˈati jˈenu. sˈiku ziɟˈazo, wakˈati watˈoto wˈenu wˌatakˌapowˌaulˈiza, ni nˈini maˈana ja mˈawe hˈaja?.|0
wˌaambiˈeni kwˌamba mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to jordˈani jˌalijokˈuwa jˌakitˌirirˈika jˌalitindˈika mbˈele ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana. wakˈati lˌilipovˈuka jordˈani, mˈaɟi ja jordˈani jˌalitindˈika. mˈawe hˈaja jˌatakˈuwa kˌumbukˈumbu kwa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli milˈele.|0
hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama joʃˈua ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza. wˌakatʃukˈua mˈawe kˈumi na mawˈili kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, kˌuliŋɡˈana na hesˈabu ja kabˈila za wˌaisraˈeli kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwambˈia joʃˈua, nˌao wˌakajabˈeba hˌadi kambˈini m̩wˈao, mahˈali wˌalipˌojatˈua tʃˈini.|0
joʃˈua ˌakajˌasimamˈiʃa jˈale mˈawe kˈumi na mawˈili ambˈajo jˌalikˈuwa kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani, mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo miɡˈuu ja mˌakuhˈani wˌaliobˈeba sandˈuku la aɡˈano ˌilipˌosimˈama. nˈajo jˈako hˌuko mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌaliobˈeba lˈile sandˈuku wˌalibakˈia wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama kˌatikˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani mpˈaka kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌomwamˈuru joʃˈua kˌilipokˈuwa kˌimefˈaɲua na wˈatu, sˌawasˈawa na vˈile mˈose ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwamˈuru joʃˈua. wˈatu wˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kuvˈuka.|0
na mˈara tu wˈatu wˈote wˌalipokwˈiʃa kuvˈuka, sandˈuku la bwˈana na mˌakuhˈani wˌakavˈuka wˈatu wakˈiwa wˌanatazˈama.|0
wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌakavˈuka mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli, wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa silˈaha, kˌama mˈose ˌalivjˌowaamˈuru.|0
kiˈasi tʃa wˈatu ˌarobaˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaliˌoɟiandˈaa kwa vˈita wˌalivˈuka mbˈele za bwˈana hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare za jerˈiko kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌakamtukˈuza joʃˈua mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote, nˌao wˌakamheʃˈimu sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake, kˌama vˈile wˌalivjˌomheʃˈimu mˈose.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua.|0
wˌaamˈuru hˈao mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌolibˈeba sandˈuku la ˌuʃuhˈuda, wapˈande kutˈoka ndˈani ja ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakawˌaamˈuru hˈao mˌakuhˈani ˌakisˈema, pandˈeni kutˈoka ndˈani ja ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌakapˈanda kutˈoka ndˈani ja ˈm̩to jordˈani wˌakilibˈeba hˌilo sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana. mˈara tu wˌalipˌoiwˈeka miɡˈuu jˈao pˈeɲe kˈiŋɡo, ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩to, mˈaɟi ja jordˈani jˌakarˈudi kˌufurˈika kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa kˈabla.|0
sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wˈatu wˌalipˈanda kutˈoka jordˈani na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ɡilɡˈali, kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa mˌaʃarˈiki ja jerˈiko.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, wazˈao wˈenu wˌatakˌapowˌaulˈiza bˈaba zˈao sˈiku ziɟˈazo wˌakisˈema, mˈawe hˈaja maˈana jˌake ni nˈini?.|0
bˌasi wˌaambiˈeni, ˌisraˈeli ˌilivukˈia mahˈali pakˈavu katˌika ˈm̩to jordˈani..|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalikaˈuʃa mˈaɟi ja jordˈani mbˈele jˈenu, hˌadi mlˌipomalˈiza kuvˈuka. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalifˈaɲa hˈaja kwa ˈm̩to jordˈani sˌawasˈawa na kˈile ˌalitʃˌoifaɲˈia bahˈari ja ʃˈamu wakˈati ˌalipˌoikaˈuʃa mbˈele jˈetu hˌadi tˌulipˌomalˈiza kuvˈuka.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa hˈivi ˌili kwˌamba mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia japˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa mkˈono wa bwˈana ni wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, na ˌili kwˌamba kˈila wakˈati mpˈate kˈumtʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
bˌasi wafˈalme wˈote wa wˌaamˈori mˌaɣarˈibi ja jordˈani na wafˈalme wˈote wa kˌanaˈani wˌaliokˈuwa kwˈeɲe pwˈani wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌoukaˈuʃa ˈm̩to jordˈani mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli hˌata tˌulipokwˈiʃa kuvˈuka, miˈojo jˈao ˌikajejˈuka kwa hˈofu, wˈala hˌawakˈuwa na ˌuɟasˈiri kˌuwakabˈili wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati hˈuo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, tˌeŋɡenˈeza vˈisu vja mˈawe maɡˈumu sˈana na ˌuwatahˈiri wˌaisraˈeli tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza vˈisu vja mˈawe maɡˈumu sˈana na kˌutahˈiri wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko ɡibˈeaθ hˌaaralˈoθi.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ja joʃˈua kufˈaɲa hˈivjo: wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliotˈoka mˈisri, wˈote wˌeɲe ˈumri wa kwˈenda vitˈani, wˌalikˈufa ɟaŋɡwˈani wakˈiwa ɲɟiˈani baˌada ja kˌuondˈoka mˈisri.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌaliotˈoka mˈisri wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌahirˈiwa, lakˈini wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌozalˈiwa ɟaŋɡwˈani wakˈiwa sˌafarˈini tˌoka mˈisri wˌalikˈuwa hˌawaɟˌatahirˈiwa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalitembˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani miˈaka ˌarobaˈini mpˈaka wˌanaˈume wˈote wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa na ˈumri wa kwˈenda vitˈani wakˈati wˌaliondˈoka mˈisri wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˈufa, kwa kˌuwa hˌawakumtˈii bwˈana. kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaapˈia kˌuwa wˌasiŋɡewˈeza kuˈona ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaahˈidi bˈaba zˈao katˌika kuˈapa kˌutupatˈia, ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌotirirˈika mazˈiwa na asˈali.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakawˌainˈua wˈana wˌao baˌada jˈao na hˈawa n̩dˈio hˈao ambˈao joʃˈua ˌaliwˌatahˈiri. wˌalikˈuwa hˌawaɟˌatahirˈiwa bˈado kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa sˌafarˈini.|0
baˌada ja taˈifa lˈote kˌutahirˈiwa, wˌaliˌendelˈea kukˈaa kambˈini mpˈaka wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamepˈona.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, lˈeo nˌimeˌiondˈoa aˈibu ja wamˈisri kutˈoka kwˈenu. bˌasi mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa ɡilɡˈali hˌadi lˈeo.|0
ɟiˈoni ja sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi, wakˈiwa kambˈini hˌuko ɡilɡˈali katˌika tˌambarˈare za jerˈiko, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata pasˈaka, katˌika sˈiku ˈile ˈile, wakˈala mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi, mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu na nafˈaka za kˌukaˈaŋɡa.|0
mˈana ˌilikˈoma sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kˈula tʃakˈula kˌilitʃotˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; hˌapakˈuwa na mˈana tˈena kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli, ˈila mwˈaka hˈuo wˌalikˈula mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
bˌasi wakˈati joʃˈua ˌalipokˈuwa karˈibu na jerˈiko, ˌakainˈua mˈatʃo, ˌakaˈona ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌesimˈama mbˈele jˈake, akˈiwa na upˈaŋɡa mkonˈoni ˌuliofˈutwa kwˈeɲe ˈala. joʃˈua ˌakamwendˈea na kˌumuulˈiza, ɟˈe, wˌewe ˈuko upˈande wˈetu ˌau upˈande wa adˈui zˈetu.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, la, sˈiko upˈande wowˈote, lakˈini mˌimi nˌimekˈuɟa nikˈiwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la bwˈana. joʃˈua ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi hˌadi tʃˈini, ˌakasuɟˈudu, ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, bwˈana, ˈuna uɟˈumbe ɡˈani kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, vˈua viˈatu vjˈako, kwa maˈana mahˈali hˈapa ˌunapˌosimˈama ni pˌatakatˈifu. nˌaje joʃˈua ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
bˌasi malˈaŋɡo ja jerˈiko jˌalifˈuŋɡwa kwa ˌuθabˈiti kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijetˈoka ˌau kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, tazˈama, nˌimeitˈia jerˈiko mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wˌake na wˈatu wˌake wa vˈita.|0
zuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi mˈara mˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌeɲe silˈaha. fˈaɲa hˈivi kwa sˈiku sˈita.|0
ˈuwe na mˌakuhˈani sˈaba wˌakibˈeba mˌabaraɡˈumu ja pˈembe za kondˈoo dˈume mbˈele ja sandˈuku. sˈiku ja sˈaba, mzuŋɡˈuke ˈm̩ɟi mˈara sˈaba, nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌakipˈiɡa bˌaraɡˈumu hˈizo.|0
ˌutakˌapowˌasikˈia wˌamepalˈiza saˈuti kˈubwa ja bˌaraɡˈumu, wˈatu wˈote wapˈiɡe kelˈele kwa saˈuti kˈuu, kˈiʃa ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌutaaŋɡˈuka na wˈatu wˌatapˈanda, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakiˌendelˈea mbˈele.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni ˌakaˈita mˌakuhˈani na kˌuwaambˈia, tʃˌukuˈeni sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana na mˌakuhˈani sˈaba wˌatʃukˈue bˌaraɡˈumu za pˈembe za kondˈoo dˈume mbˈele jˈake.|0
nˌaje ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu, soŋɡˈeni mbˈele! mkˌauzuŋɡˈuke ˈm̩ɟi, na walˈinzi wˌeɲe silˈaha wˌataŋɡulˈie mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana.|0
baˌada ja joʃˈua kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na wˈatu, wˈale mˌakuhˈani sˈaba wˌeɲe kˌuzibˈeba zˈile bˌaraɡˈumu sˈaba mbˈele za bwˈana, wˌakatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele, wˌakipˈiɡa bˌaraɡˈumu zˈao na sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana lˌikawˌafuˈata.|0
walˈinzi wˌaliokˈuwa na silˈaha wˌakaˈenda mbˈele ja hˈao mˌakuhˈani wˌaliopˈiɡa hˈizo bˌaraɡˈumu na hˈao walˈinzi wa ɲˈuma wˌakafuˈata sandˈuku. wakˈati wˈote hˈuu bˌaraɡˈumu zˌilikˈuwa zˌikipˈiɡwa.|0
bˌali joʃˈua ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu, msipˈiɡe kelˈele ja vˈita, msipˈaze saˈuti zˈenu, wˈala kusˈema nˈeno lolˈote mpˈaka sˈiku ˈile nˌitakˌajowˌaambˈia mpˈiɡe kelˈele. ndˈipo mtapˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
bˌasi ˌakalˌipelˈeka sandˈuku la bwˈana kˌuzuŋɡˈuʃwa hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, lˌikizuŋɡˈuʃwa mˈara mˈoɟa. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌakarˈudi kambˈini kulˈala.|0
joʃˈua ˌakaˈamka mapˈema ˌasubˈuhi ˌilijˌofuˈata nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌakalˌitʃukˈua sandˈuku la bwˈana.|0
sˈiku ja pˈili wˌakaˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi mˈara mˈoɟa na kurˈudi kambˈini. wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivi kwa sˈiku sˈita.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba, wˌakaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema wˌakaˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa, ˌisipokˈuwa sˈiku ˈile wˌaliˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi mˈara sˈaba.|0
wˌalipˌouzuŋɡˈuka mˈara ja sˈaba, mˌakuhˈani wˌalipopˈiɡa bˌaraɡˈumu kwa saˈuti kˈubwa, joʃˈua ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˈatu ˌakisˈema, piɡˈeni kelˈele! kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamewˈapa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˌake ˌutawˈekwa wˈakfu kwa bwˈana. ˈila rahˈabu tˈu, jˈule kahˈaba na wˈote ambˈao wˈako pamˈoɟa nˌaje ɲumbˈani mwˈake n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaosˌalimˈiʃwa, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwafˈitʃa wˈale wˌapelelˈezi tˌuliˌowatˈuma.|0
lakˈini mɟˌiepˈuʃe na vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu, msˈiɟe mkˌatʃukˈua tʃotʃˈote katˌika hˈivjo, msˈiɟe mkˌaɟiletˈea mˌaaŋɡamˈizi katˌika maskˈani ja ˌisraˈeli na kˌuiletˈea taˈabu.|0
fˈeða jˈote na ðahˈabu, vjˈombo vja ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma ni vˌitakatˈifu kwa bwˈana, lazˈima vilˈetwe katˌika hazˈina jˈake.|0
wˌakauwˈeka ˈm̩ɟi wˈakfu kwa bwˈana, na kˈila tʃˌeɲe uhˈai ndˈani jˌake wˌalikˌiaŋɡamˈiza kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˌanaˈume kwa wˌanawˈake, viɟˈana kwa wazˈee, ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo na pˈunda.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale wˈatu wawˈili wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˌipelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi, nendˈeni ɲumbˈani kwa jˈule kahˈaba, mletˈeni pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˈomo ɲumbˈani mwˈake, kˌuliŋɡˈana na kiˈapo tʃˈenu kwˈake.|0
bˌasi wˈale viɟˈana wˌaliofˈaɲa ˌupelelˈezi wˌakaˈenda kumlˈeta rahˈabu, bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake, na ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje. wˌakalˈeta ɟamˈaa jˌake jˈote na kˌuwawˈeka mahˈali ɲɟˈe ja kˈambi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakautʃˈoma ˈm̩ɟi wˈote na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌokuwˈamo ndˈani jˈake. lakˈini fˈeða, ðahˈabu, vjˈombo vja ʃˈaba na vja tʃˈuma wˌakaviwˈeka katˌika hazˈina ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini joʃˈua ˌakamhifˈaði rahˈabu jˈule kahˈaba, ɟamˈaa jˌake jˈote na wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wa kwˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwafˈitʃa wˈatu wˌaliotˈumwa na joʃˈua kˌuipˌelelˈeza jerˈiko, nˌaje ˌanaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli hˌata lˈeo.|0
wakˈati ˈule joʃˈua ˌakatˈamka kiˈapo hˈiki ˌakasˈema, ˌalijˌelaanˈiwa mbˈele za bwˈana ni ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeinˈuka kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa tˈena ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wa jerˈiko: kwa ɣarˈama ja mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume ˌataiwˈeka misˈiŋɡi jˈake; kwa ɣarˈama ja mtˈoto wˌake wa mwˈiʃo ˌatajawˈeka malˈaŋɡo jˈake.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na joʃˈua, na sˈifa zˌake zˌikaenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kuhˈusu vˈile vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu; akˈani mwˈana wa kˈarmi, mwˈana wa zˈabdi, mwˈana wa zˈera, wa kabˈila la jˈuda, ˌalivˌitʃukˈua baˈaði ja hˈivjo vˈitu. hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua ˌakatˈuma wˈatu kutˈoka jerˈiko waˈende ˈai, karˈibu na bˈeθ avˈeni mˌaʃarˈiki ja beθˈeli, ˌakawˌaambˈia, pandˈeni mkˌaipˌelelˈeze ˈn̩tʃi. bˌasi wˈale wˈatu wˌakapˈanda wˌakaˌipelelˈeza ˈai.|0
wˌaliporˈudi kwa joʃˈua, wˌakasˈema, si lazˈima wˈatu wˈote waˈende kˌupiɡˈana na ˈai. watˈume wˈatu ˈelfu mbˈili ˌau tˈatu wˌakautˈeke hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi. ˌusiwatʃˈoʃe wˈatu wˈote, kwa sabˈabu hˌuko kˈuna wˈatu watʃˈatʃe tˈu.|0
bˌasi wˌakapˈanda kˌama wˈatu ˈelfu tˈatu tˈu, lakˈini wˌakaʃˌambulˈiwa na wˈatu wa ˈai.|0
ambˈao wˌaliwaˈua wˈatu kˌama θˌelaθˈini na sˈita mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. wˌakawˌafukˈuza wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi hˌadi ʃˌebarˈimu, nˌao wˌakawaˈuwa hˌuko kwˈeɲe mˌaterˈemko. kˌutokˈana na hˈili miˈojo ja wˈatu ˌikajejˈuka ikˈawa kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakajˌararˈua mavˈazi jˈake, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana, na ˌakabakˈia hˈapo mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo wˌakatˈia mavˈumbi vitʃwˈani m̩wˈao.|0
joʃˈua ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, kwa nˈini ˌumewavˈuʃa wˈatu hˈawa ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani ˌili kˌututˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaamˈori wˌatuˌaŋɡamˈize? laˈiti tˌuŋɡelˌiriðˈika kukˈaa ŋɡˈambo ˈile ɲiŋɡˈine ja jordˈani.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nisˈeme nˈini sˈasa, ikˈiwa sˈasa ˌisraˈeli ˌameʃˌafukˈuzwa na adˈui zˈake.|0
wˌakanaˈani na wˈatu weŋɡˈine wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌatasikˈia habˈari hˌii, nˌao wˌatatˌuzuŋɡˈuka na kˌutufˌutilˈia ɟˈina lˈetu dˌuniˈani. ˌutafˈaɲa nˈini bˌasi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako mweɲˈewe lilˈilo kˈuu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, simˈama! ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini hˈapo tʃˈini kˌifudifˈudi.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌametˈenda ðˈambi. wˌamekiˈuka aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˌililˌowaamˈuru kˌuliʃˈika. wˌametʃukˈua baˈaði ja vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu, wˌameˈiba, wˌamesˈema uˈoŋɡo, wˌameviwˈeka pamˈoɟa na mˈali zˈao.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌaisraˈeli hˌawawˈezi kˌusimˈama ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈao. wˌanawˈapa visˈoɡo na kˌukimbˈia kwa kˌuwa wˌanastahˈili mˌaaŋɡamˈizi. sˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi tˈena mpˈaka mwˌaŋɡamˈize kˈila kˈitu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kˌilitʃotˈeŋɡwa kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi.|0
nˈenda, ˌukawˌatakˈase wˈatu. wˌaambˈie, ɟˌitakasˈeni mɟˌiandˈae kwa kˈeʃo; kwa sabˈabu hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: kˈitu kˌilitʃowˈekwa wˈakfu kˈipo kˌatikˈati jˈenu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli. hamwˈezi kˌusimˈama ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈenu mpˈaka mtˌakapˌokiondˈoa.|0
jˈule ˌatakˌajekˈutwa na vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu, ˌatatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo. kwa kˌuwa ˌamelivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano la bwˈana na kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa aˈibu katˌika ˌisraˈeli!.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema joʃˈua ˌakawˌaamˈuru ˌisraˈeli kˈuɟa mbˈele kabˈila kwa kabˈila; na jˈuda ˌakatwalˈiwa.|0
kˈoo za jˈuda zikˈaɟa mbˈele, nˌaje ˌakawatwˈaa wazˈera. ˌakaamˈuru ukˈoo wa wazˈera kˈuɟa mbˈele ɟamˈaa kwa ɟamˈaa, nˈajo ɟamˈaa ja zˈabdi ˌikatwalˈiwa.|0
joʃˈua ˌakaamˈuru wˈatu wa ɟamˈaa ja zˈabdi kˈuɟa mbˈele ˈm̩tu kwa ˈm̩tu, nˌaje akˈani mwˈana wa kˈarmi, mwˈana wa zˈabdi, mwˈana wa zˈera, wa kabˈila la jˈuda, ˌakatwalˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakamwambˈia akˈani, mwanˈaŋɡu, mtukˈuze bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌawe ukˈiri kwˈake. nˌiambˈie ni nˈini ˌulitʃotˈenda; ˌusinifˈitʃe.|0
nˌilipoˈona katˌika ɲˈara ɟˈoho zˈuri la kutˈoka babˈeli, ʃekˈeli mˈia mbˈili za fˈeða, na kabˈari ja ðahˈabu ja uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli hamsˈini, nˌikavˌitamˈani na nˌikavˌitʃukˈua. tazˈama, vˌimefˈitʃwa arðˈini ndˈani ja hˈema lˈaŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na hˈijo fˈeða tʃˈini jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe, nˌao wˌakapˈiɡa m̩bˈio mpˈaka hemˈani, tazˈama, vˈile vˈitu vˌilikˈuwa vˌimefˈitʃwa hemˈani mwˈake, pamˈoɟa na ˈile fˈeða tʃˈini jˈake.|0
wˌakavˌitʃukˈua vˈile vˈitu tˌoka ˈm̩le hemˈani, wˌakamletˈea joʃˈua pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, na wˌakavˌitandˈaza mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua, pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote, wˌakamtʃukˈua akˈani mwˈana wa zˈera, pamˈoɟa na ˈile fˈeða, lˈile ɟˈoho, ˈile kabˈari ja ðahˈabu, wanˈawe na bˈinti zˈake, ŋɡˈombe, pˈunda na kondˈoo wˈake, hˈema jˌake pamˈoɟa na vˈitu vjˈote ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo, wˌakavilˈeta katˌika bˈonde la akˈori.|0
joʃˈua ˌakasˈema, kwa nˈini ˌumelˈeta taˈabu hˌii ɟˈuu jˈetu? bwˈana ˌatalˈeta taˈabu ɟˈuu jˈako lˈeo hˌii. ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌikampˈiɡa akˈani kwa mˈawe, na baˌada ja kˌuwapˈiɡa ɟamˈaa jˌake jˈote kwa mˈawe, wˌakawˌateketˈeza kwa mˈoto.|0
wˌakakusˈaɲa lˈundo la mˈawe ɟˌuːja akˈani, ambˈalo lˈipo mpˈaka lˈeo. nˌaje bwˈana ˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka hasˈira jˌake kˈali. kwa hˈijo mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa bˈonde la akˈori ʃˈu sˈiku hˈijo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, ˌusioɡˈope, wˈala ˌusivuɲɟˈike mˈojo. tʃukˈua ɟˈeʃi lˈote la vˈita uˈende pamˈoɟa nˈalo kˌuiʃˌambulˈia ˈai. kwa kˌuwa nˌimeʃamwˈeka mˌikonˈoni mwˈako mfˈalme wa ˈai, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake, ˈm̩ɟi wˌake na ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
ˌutafˈaɲa ˈai na mfˈalme wˌake kˌama ˌulivjofˈaɲa kwa ˈm̩ɟi wa jerˈiko na mfˈalme wˈake, ˌisipokˈuwa mnawˈeza kˌutʃukˈua matˈeka wˌake na mifˈuɡo wˈake, kwa aɟˈili jˈenu. wˈeka wˌaviziˈaɟi upˈande wa ɲˈuma ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua na ɟˈeʃi lˈote wˌakainˈuka kˌuʃambulˈia ˈai. ˌakatʃaɡˈua wˈatu mˌaʃuɟˈaa ˈelfu θˌelaθˈini walˈio bˈora mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˈake, ˌakawˌapelˈeka wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
ˌakiwˌaaɡˈiza: sˌikilizˈeni kwa makˈini. mtˌavizˈia ɲˈuma ja ˈm̩ɟi. msiˈende mbˈali sˈana na ˈm̩ɟi. wˈote kuwˈeni mˈatʃo.|0
mˌimi na wˈatu walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈami, tˌutaˌukabˈili ˈm̩ɟi, kˈiʃa ˌitakˈuwa hˈapo wˈatu wˌatakˌapotˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌupiɡˈana nˈasi, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa hˈapo kwˈanza, sˌisi tˌutawˌakimbˈia.|0
wˌatatˌufuˌatilˈia mpˈaka tˌutakˌapokˈuwa tˌumewavˈuta mbˈali na ˈm̩ɟi kwa kˌuwa wˌatasˈema, wˌanatˌukimbˈia, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa hˈapo awˈali. hˈivjo tˌutakˌapowˌakimbˈia.|0
nˈiɲi ˌinawapˈasa mwinˈuke mtˈoke hˌuko mˌafitʃˈoni na kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatautˈia mkonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
mtˌakapokˈuwa mmˌeutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi, ˌutekˌetezˈeni kwa mˈoto. faɲˈeni kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoamˈuru. ˌaŋɡaliˈeni, nˌimewˌaaɡˈiza.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawatˈuma wˈatu, nˌao wˌakaˈenda mahˈali pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa, wakˈawa wˌanavizˈia kˈati ja beθˈeli na ˈai, kˌuelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi wa ˈai, lakˈini joʃˈua ˌakalˈala mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu usˈiku hˈuo.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa vˈita wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌalipˈanda, wˌakakˌaribˈia na kufˈika mbˈele ja ˈm̩ɟi. wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa ˈai, pakˈiwa na bˈonde kˈati jˈao na hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
joʃˈua ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua wˈatu wˌapatˈao ˈelfu tˈano, ˌakawawˈeka katˌika ˌuavˈizi kˈati ja beθˈeli na ˈai, upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
wˌakawawˈeka askˈari katˌika mˌaenˈeo jˈao: wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa kambˈini wakˈawa kˌaskazˈini ja ˈm̩ɟi na wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakivizˈia wakˈawa upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi. usˈiku hˈuo joʃˈua ˌakaˈenda katˌika lˈile bˈonde.|0
mfˈalme wa ˈai ˌalipoˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, jˌeje pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakatˈoka kwa harˈaka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ˌili kˌukutˈana na ˌisraˈeli katˌika vˈita mahˈali fulˈani pˌanapˌotazamˈana na arˈaba. lakˈini hˌakuɟˈua kwˌamba kˌulikˈuwa kˌumewˈekwa wˌaviziˈaɟi ðˈidi jˌake ɲˈuma ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
joʃˈua na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakaruhˈusu kˌurudˈiʃwa ɲˈuma mbˈele jˈao, na kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa ˈai wˌakaˈitwa ˌili kˌuwafˌuatˈia, nˌao wˌakavˈutwa kˌumfuatˈia joʃˈua mbˈali na ˈm̩ɟi.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌebakˈia ˈai wˈala beθˈeli ambˈaje hˌakufˌuatˈia ˌisraˈeli. wˌakauˈatʃa ˈm̩ɟi wˈazi na kˌuwafˌuatˈia ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, inˈua hˈuo mkˈuki ulˈio mkonˈoni mwˈako kˌuuˌelekˈeza ˈai, kwa kˌuwa nˌitautˈia hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi mkonˈoni mwˈako. hˈivjo joʃˈua ˌakaˌuelekˈeza mkˈuki wˌake ˈai.|0
mˈara tu ˌalipofˈaɲa hˈivi, wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaviziˈoni wˌakaondˈoka upˈesi kutˈoka mahˈali pˈao na kˌukimbilˈia mbˈele. wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi, wˌakautˈeka na kˌuutˈia mˈoto kwa harˈaka.|0
wˈatu wa ˈai wˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia ɲˈuma, wˌakauˈona mˈoʃi wa hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi ˌukiˌelekˈea aŋɡˈani lakˈini hˌawakˈuwa na nafˈasi ja kˌutorˈoka kwa upˈande wowˈote, kwa kˌuwa wˈale wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanawˌakimbˈia kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌameɡeˈuka ɲˈuma kˌuwakabˈili wˌakimbizˈaɟi wˈao.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalipoˈona kwˌamba wˌaviziˈaɟi wˌameʃˌautˈeka ˈm̩ɟi na mˈoʃi ˌulikˈuwa ˌunapˈaa ɟˈuu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi, wˌakawˌaɡeukˈia wˈatu wa ˈai na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia.|0
lakˈini wˌakamtʃukˈua mfˈalme wa ˈai akˈiwa hˈai na kumlˈeta kwa joʃˈua.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌilipˌomalˈiza kˌuwaˈua wˌanaˈume wˈote wa ˈai katˌika maʃˈamba na ɟaŋɡwˈani wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamewˌafukuzˈia, na baˌada ja kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao kˌuuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakarˈudi ˈai na kˌuwaˈua wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamebakˈia mɟˈini.|0
wˈatu kˈumi na mbˈili ˈelfu, waˈume kwa wˈake, wˌaliˌaŋɡamˈia sˈiku ˈile, jaˈani wˈatu wˈote wa ˈai.|0
kwa maˈana joʃˈua hˌakuˌurudˈiʃa ˈule mkˈono wˌake ˌuliokˈuwa ˌumeˌuinˈua mkˈuki hˌadi ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈote wˌalioˈiʃi ˈai.|0
lakˈini ˌisraˈeli wˌakaɟˌitʃukulˈia mifˈuɡo na ɲˈara za ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwaɡˈiza joʃˈua.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakautʃˈoma mˈoto ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈai na kˌuufˈaɲa kˌuwa lˈundo la maɡˈofu la kudˈumu, mahˈali pa ukˈiwa hˌadi lˈeo.|0
ˌakamwaŋɡˈika mfˈalme wa ˈai kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti na kumwˈatʃa hˈapo mpˈaka ɟiˈoni. wakˈati wa ɟˈua kutˈua, joʃˈua ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˌautˈoe mwˈili wˌake kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti na kˌuutˈupa kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. kˈiʃa wˌakalundˈika mˈawe makˈubwa mˈeŋɡi ɟˈuu jˈake, ambˈajo jˌamesalˈia mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
kˌama mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaamˈuru wˌaisraˈeli. ˌakaiɟˈeŋɡa sˌawasˈawa na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈose: mˌaðabˈahu ja mˈawe jˌasijotʃˈoŋɡwa, ambˈajo ɟˈuu jˌake hakˈuna tʃˈombo tʃa tʃˈuma kˌilitʃˌotumˈika. hˈapo ɟˈuu jˌake wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na kutˈoa sadˈaka za amˈani.|0
pˈale, mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli joʃˈua ˌakanakˈili ɟˌuːja hˈajo mˈawe ʃerˈia ja mˈose, ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameˌiandˈika.|0
ˌisraˈeli jˈote, waɡˈeni na wazˈawa sˌawasˈawa, wakˈiwa na wazˈee wˈao, mˌaafˈisa na wˌaamˈuzi, wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama pˈande zˈote mbˈili za sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana, wˌakiwˌaelekˈea wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamelˌitʃukˈua, jaˈani mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi. nˈusu ja wˈatu ˌilisimˈama mbˈele ja mlˈima ɡˌerizˈimu na nˈusu hˈijo iŋɡˈine ˌikasimˈama mbˈele ja mlˈima ebˈali, kˌama vˈile mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru hˈapo mwˈanzo ˌalipotˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo ja kˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌatimˈaje, joʃˈua ˌakasˈoma manˈeno jˈote ja ʃerˈia, jaˈani barˈaka na laˈana, kˌama vˈile ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia.|0
hakˈuna nˈeno lolˈote katˌika jˈale jˈote ambˈajo mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌameamˈuru ambˈalo joʃˈua hˌakulˌisomˈea kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli, ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake na watˈoto, na waɡˈeni wˌalioˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
bˌasi ikˈawa wafˈalme wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaɣarˈibi ˌm̩wa jordˈani wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja hˈaja jˈote, wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi ˌm̩wa vilˈima na katˌika pwˈani jˈote ja hˈijo bahˈari kˈuu, hˌadi kˌufikˈia lˌebanˈoni wafˈalme wa wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌakanaˈani, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi.|0
wˌakaɟiˈuŋɡa pamˈoɟa ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja joʃˈua na ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˈatu wa ɡˌibeˈoni wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja hˈajo jˈote joʃˈua ˌalijˌowatendˈea wˈatu wa jerˈiko na ˈai.|0
nˌao wˌakaamˈua kufˈaɲa hˈila: wˌakaɟifˈaɲa kˌama waɟˈumbe wakˈiwa na pˈunda wˌaliˌobebˈeʃwa mizˈiɡo wakˈiwa na mˌaɡunˈia jˌalijˌotʃakˈaa na virˈiba vja mvˈiɲo vˌikuukˈuu vjˌeɲe ɲˈufa zˌilizozˈibwa.|0
ndˈipo wˌakamwendˈea joʃˈua kambˈini hˌuko ɡilɡˈali wˌakamwambˈia jˌeje pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, tˌumetˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali, faɲˈeni mkatˈaba nˈasi.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakawˌaambˈia hˈao wahˈivi, lakˈini huˈenda mnakˈaa karˈibu nˈasi, twˌawezˈaɟe bˌasi kufˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˈaɲi.|0
wˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, sˌisi ni wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako. joʃˈua ˌakawˌaulˈiza, nˈiɲi ni nˈani, nˌaɲi mnatˈoka wˈapi.|0
nˌao wˌakamɟˈibu: wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌametˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali sˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ˌumaarˈufu wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. kwa kˌuwa tˌumesikˈia tˌaarˈifa zˈake: hˈajo jˈote ˌalijofˈaɲa hˌuko mˈisri.|0
pˈia jˈale jˈote ˌalijˌowatendˈea wafˈalme wawˈili wa wˌaamˈori mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani; hˈujo sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni na ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, ˌalijˌetawˈala hˌuko ˌaʃtarˈoθi.|0
bˌasi wazˈee wˈetu na wˈale wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu wˌalitˌuambˈia, tʃˌukuˈeni tʃakˈula tʃa safˈari; nendˈeni mkˌakutˈane na wˈatu hˈao na kˌuwaambˈia, sˌisi tu wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu, faɲˈeni mˌapatˈano nˈasi. .|0
mkˈate hˈuu wˈetu ˌulikˈuwa wa mˈoto tˌulipˌoufˈuŋɡa sˈiku tˌulipoˈanza safˈari kˈuɟa kwˈenu, lakˈini sˈasa ˌaŋɡalˈia ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌokaˈuka na kuˈota ukˈuŋɡu.|0
virˈiba hˈivi vja mvˈiɲo vˌilikˈuwa vˈipja tˌulipˌoviɟˈaza, lakˈini ˈona ɟˈinsi vilˈivjo na ɲˈufa. ŋɡˈuo zˈetu na viˈatu vˌimetʃakˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja safˈari ndˈefu.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakafˈaɲa mˌapatˈano ja amˈani pamˈoɟa nˌao kˌuwaˈatʃa waˈiʃi, nˌao vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˌusaɲˈiko wˌakaθˌibitˈiʃa kwa kiˈapo.|0
ndˈipo wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakasafˈiri na sˈiku ja tˈatu wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈao ja ɡˌibeˈoni, kefˈira, bˌeerˈoθi na kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli hˌawakˌuwaʃˌambulˈia kwa kˌuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˌusaɲˈiko wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewˌaapˈia kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikanˌuŋɡunˈika ðˈidi ja hˈao vˌioŋɡˈozi.|0
lakˈini vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wˌakawaɟˈibu, tˌumeʃˌawaapˈia kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa hˈijo hˌatuwˈezi kˌuwaɡˈusa sˈasa.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo tˌutakˌavjowˌafaɲˈia: tˌutawaˈatʃa waˈiʃi, ˌili ɣaðˈabu isˈiɟe ɟˈuu jˈetu kwa kuvˈuɲɟa kiˈapo tˌulitʃˌowaapˈia.|0
wˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, wˌaatʃˈeni waˈiʃi, lakˈini wˈawe wˌapasˈua kˈuni na watʃˈota mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟamˈii jˈote. hˈivjo ahˈadi wˌalijowˈeka vˌioŋɡˈozi kwˈao ikˈawa hˈivjo.|0
kˈiʃa joʃˈua ˌakawaˈita wˌaɡibeˈoni na kˌuwaambˈia, kwa nˈini mmˌetudaŋɡˈaɲa kwa kˌutuambˈia, tˌunaˈiʃi mbˈali nˈaɲi, wakˈati ambˈapo nˈiɲi mnaˈiʃi karˈibu nˈasi.|0
sˈasa ˈm̩ko tʃˈini ja laˈana: daˈima mtakˈuwa wˌapasˈua kˈuni na watʃˈota mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu joʃˈua, watˈumwa wˈako wˌaliambˈiwa wˌaziwˈazi ɟˈinsi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌomwamˈuru mtumˈiʃi wˌake mˈose kuwˈapa nˈiɲi ˈn̩tʃi hˌii jˈote na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wakˈazi wˌake wˈote tˌoka mbˈele zˈenu. kwa hˈijo tˌulioɡˈopa ˈm̩no kwa aɟˈili ja uhˈai wˈetu kwa sabˈabu jˈenu, n̩dˈijo maˈana tˌukafˈaɲa nˈeno hˈili.|0
sˈasa tˈupo mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. tˌufaɲiˈeni lolˈote mnˌaloˈona kˌuwa ɟˈema na hˈaki kwˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakawˌaokˈoa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli, nˌao hˌawakˌuuˈawa.|0
sˈiku hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakawafˈaɲa wˌaɡibeˈoni wˌapasˈua kˈuni na watʃˈota mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟamˈii na kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo bwˈana ˌaŋɡepˌatʃaɡˈua. hˈivjo ndˈivjo walˈivjo hˌadi hˈivi lˈeo.|0
baˌada ja hˈaja adˈoni sedˈeki mfˈalme wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌalisikˈia kˌuwa joʃˈua ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈeka ˈm̩ɟi wa ˈai na kˌuuˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, tˈena ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈua mfˈalme wˈake, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa hˌuko jerˈiko na mfˈalme wˈake, tˈena ja kˌuwa wˈatu wa ɡˌibeˈoni wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa mˌapatˈano ja amˈani na wˌaisraˈeli, na wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi karˈibu jˈao.|0
jˌeje na wˈatu wˌake wˌakatˌaharˈuki ˈm̩no kwa kˌuwa ɡˌibeˈoni ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa kˌama mmˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi ja kifˈalme; ˌulikˈuwa mkˈubwa kulˈiko ˈai, nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita.|0
hˈivjo adˈoni sedˈeki mfˈalme wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌakaˈomba msaˈada kwa hohˈamu mfˈalme wa hebrˈoni, pirˈamu mfˈalme wa jarmˈuθi, jafˈia mfˈalme wa lakˈiʃi, na debˈiri mfˈalme wa eɡlˈoni.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɲɟoˈoni mnˌisaidˈie kˌuipˈiɡa ɡˌibeˈoni, kwa sabˈabu ˌimefˈaɲa mˌapatˈano ja amˈani na joʃˈua na wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo hˈao wafˈalme watˈano wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈao ni wafˈalme wa jˌerusalˈemu, hebrˈoni, jarmˈuθi, lakˈiʃi na eɡlˈoni, wˌakaˌuŋɡanˈiʃa maɟˈeʃi jˈao. wˌakapˈanda na vikˈosi vjˈao vjˈote, nˌao wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja ɡˌibeˈoni na kˌuiʃˌambulˈia.|0
nˌao wˌaɡibeˈoni wˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa joʃˈua kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja ɡilɡˈali na kˌumwambˈia, ˌusiwˌatelekˈeze wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako. pˈanda harˈaka ˈuɟe kwˈetu kˌutuokˈoa! tˌusaidˈie, kwa sabˈabu wafˈalme wˈote wa wˌaamˈori wˌakaˈao kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima wˌameˌuŋɡanˈiʃa maɟˈeʃi jˈao pamˈoɟa ðˈidi jˈetu.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua ˌakaondˈoka ɡilɡˈali pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, wˌakiwˈepo wˈatu wˈote mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope wˈatu hˈao, nˌimewatˈia mkonˈoni mwˈako. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌuʃindˈana nˈawe.|0
baˌada ja joʃˈua kˌutembˈea usˈiku kˈutʃa kutˈoka ɡilɡˈali, ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia ɣafˈula.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌafaðaˈiʃa mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakawaʃˈinda kwa uʃˈindi m̩kˈuu hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni. ˌisraˈeli wˌakawˌafukˈuza kˌuelekˈea ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo bˈeθ horˈoni wˌakiwaˈua mpˈaka kˌufikˈia ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo azˈeka na makˈeda.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakikimbˈia mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara ˌiteremkˈajo kutˈoka bˈeθ horˈoni hˌadi azˈeka, bwˈana ˌakawˌavumiʃˈia mˈawe makˈubwa ja mvˈua kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, na wˈeŋɡi wˌao wˌakauˈawa na hˈajo mˈawe kulˈiko wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
hˌaiɟˌakuwˈepo sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine kˌama hˈijo kˈabla ˌau baˌada, sˈiku ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalimsˌikilˈiza mwˌanadˈamu. hakˈika bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiwˌapiɡanˈia ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakarˈudi kambˈini hˌuko ɡilɡˈali pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
bˌasi wˈale wafˈalme watˈano wakˈawa wˌamekimbˈia kˌuɟifˈitʃa kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo hˌuko makˈeda.|0
joʃˈua ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa wafˈalme hˈao watˈano wˌamekˈutwa wakˈiwa wˌameɟifˈitʃa ndˈani ja pˈaŋɡo hˌuko makˈeda.|0
ˌakasˈema, vˌiŋɡiriʃˈeni mˈawe makˈubwa kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa hˌilo pˈaŋɡo, tˈena wekˈeni walˈinzi wa kˌulilˈinda.|0
lakˈini msˌiwaˈatʃe! wˌafuˌatiˈeni adˈui zˈenu, wˌaʃambˌuliˈeni kutˈoka ɲˈuma, wˈala msˌiwaˈatʃe wafˈike kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈao, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewatˈia mkonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
hˈivjo joʃˈua pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa karˈibu wˈote, lakˈini watʃˈatʃe wˌaliˌosalˈia wˌalifˈika kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈao jˌeɲe mabˈoma.|0
bˌasi ɟˈeʃi lˈote lˌikarˈudi salˈama kwa joʃˈua hˌuko kambˈini makˈeda, na hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijetˈoa nˈeno kiɲˈume tʃa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakasˈema, hˈaja fˌuŋɡuˈeni mdˈomo wa pˈaŋɡo, mnˌiletˈee hˈao wafˈalme watˈano.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia, msˌioɡˈope, wˈala msˌivuɲɟˈike mˈojo. kuwˈeni hodˈari na wˌeɲe ˌuʃuɟˈaa. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌatakˌalowˌatendˈea adˈui zˈenu wˈote mnˌaokwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˈao.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawapˈiɡa na kˌuwaˈua wˈale wafˈalme na kˌuwatundˈika ɟˌuːja mˈiti mitˈano, nˌao wˌakaˈatʃwa wˌakinˌiŋɡinˈia ɟˌuːja ˈile mˈiti hˌadi ɟiˈoni.|0
wakˈati wa kuzˈama ɟˈua joʃˈua ˌakaamˈuru, nˌao wˌakawaʃˈuʃa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈile mˈiti na kˌuwatˈupa kwˈeɲe lˈile pˈaŋɡo ambˈalo wˌalikˈuwa wˌameɟifˈitʃa. kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa lˈile pˈaŋɡo wˌakawˈeka mˈawe makˈubwa, ambˈajo jˈapo hˌadi lˈeo.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakaondˈoka makˈeda akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote mpˈaka ˈm̩ɟi wa lˈibna na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia.|0
bwˈana pˈia ˌakautˈia hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi wa lˈibna pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wˌake mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli. joʃˈua ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈiza ˈule ˈm̩ɟi na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa. hˌakubakˈiza hˌuko ˈm̩tu jejˈote. ˌakamfaɲˈia mfˈalme wa lˈibna kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemfaɲˈia mfˈalme wa jerˈiko.|0
kˈiʃa joʃˈua ˌakaondˈoka lˈibna kwˈenda lakˈiʃi akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote; wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˌake na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌakautˈia lakˈiʃi mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli, joʃˈua ˌakautˈeka sˈiku ja pˈili. joʃˈua ˌakaˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi na kˈila kˌilitʃokˈuwa ndˈani jˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa, kˌama tu vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameˌufaɲˈia ˈm̩ɟi wa lˈibna.|0
wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo, horˈamu mfˈalme wa ɡezˈeri ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈanda ˌili kˌusaidˈia lakˈiʃi, lakˈini joʃˈua ˌakamʃˈinda pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake, hˌadi hˌapakˌubakˈia ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakaondˈoka lakˈiʃi kwˈenda eɡlˈoni akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote; wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˌake na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia.|0
wˌakautˈeka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo sˈiku ˈile ˈile, wˌakaupˈiɡa kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˈake, kˌama vˈile wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌameˌufaɲˈia lakˈiʃi.|0
kˈiʃa joʃˈua ˌakapˈanda kutˈoka eɡlˈoni kwˈenda hebrˈoni akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia.|0
wˌakautˈeka ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuupˈiɡa kwa upˈaŋɡa, pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wˈake, viɟˈiɟi vjˈake na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˈake. hˌawakˌubakˈiza ˈm̩tu jejˈote. kˌama vˈile hˌuko eɡlˈoni, wˌaliˌuaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa pamˈoɟa na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˈake.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia debˈiri.|0
wˌakautˈeka ˈm̩ɟi, mfˈalme wˌake na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, na kˌuupˈiɡa kwa upˈaŋɡa. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˌake wˌakamwˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa. hˌawakˌubakˈiza ˈm̩tu jejˈote. wˌakaˌufaɲˈia debˈiri na mfˈalme wˌake kˌama vˈile wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌameˌifaɲˈia mˈiɟi ja lˈibna na hebrˈoni na wafˈalme wˈao.|0
hˈivjo joʃˈua ˌakaliʃˈinda enˈeo hˌilo lˈote, ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, na neɡˈebu, na sehˈemu ja mˌaɣarˈibi tʃˈini ja vilˈima, mˌaterˈemko ja milˈima, pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme wˌake wˈote. hˌakubakˈiza ˈm̩tu jejˈote. ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa kˈila kˈitu tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi, kˌama vˈile bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawaʃˈinda kˌuanzˈia kˈadeʃ barnˈea hˌadi ɡˈaza na kutˈoka enˈeo lˈote la ɡoʃˈeni hˌadi ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
wafˈalme hˈawa wˈote pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi zˈao joʃˈua ˌaliwaʃˈinda kwa wakˈati mmˈoɟa, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌaliwˌapiɡanˈia ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakarˈudi pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli jˈote kwˈeɲe kˈambi hˌuko ɡilɡˈali.|0
ikˈawa jabˈini mfˈalme wa hazˈori ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari za mˈambo hˈaja, ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa jobˈabu mfˈalme wa madˈoni, na kwa mfˈalme wa ʃimrˈoni, na kwa mfˈalme wa ˌakiʃˈafu.|0
na pˈia kwa wafˈalme wa upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa mˌilimˈani, katˌika arˈaba upˈande wa kusˈini ˌm̩wa kˌinerˈeθi, kwˈeɲe ʃefˈela, upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi na katˌika mˌiinˈuko ja nˈafoθ dˈori upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
kwa wˌakanaˈani upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na mˌaɣarˈibi; kwa wˌaamˈori, wahˈiti, wˌaperˈizi na wˌajebˈusi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima; na kwa wahˈivi tʃˈini ja hermˈoni katˌika enˈeo ja mˈispa.|0
wakˈaɟa na vikˈosi vjˈao vjˈote na hesˈabu kˈubwa ja farˈasi na maɡˈari ja kuvˈutwa na farˈasi, ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, kˌama wˈiŋɡi wa mtʃˈaŋɡa ulˈio pwˈani ja bahˈari.|0
wafˈalme hˈawa wˈote wˌakaˌuŋɡanˈiʃa maɟˈeʃi jˈao na kupˈiɡa kˈambi pamˈoɟa kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi ja merˈomu, ˌili kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope, kwa sabˈabu kˈeʃo sˈaa kˌama hˌii nˌitawatˈia wˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli, wakˈiwa wˌameuˈawa. ˌutakˈata miʃˈipa ja ɲˈuma ja miɡˈuu ja farˈasi wˌao na kˌujatʃˈoma mˈoto maɡˈari jˈao ja vˈita.|0
hˈivjo joʃˈua pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wakˈaɟa ðˈidi jˈao ɣafˈula kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi ja merˈomu kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli. wˌakawaʃˈinda na kˌuwafukˈuza hˌadi sidˈoni kˈuu na kˌuwafikˈiʃa misrˈefoθ maˈimu, hˌadi bˈonde la mˈispa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, hˌadi pakˈawa hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijebˈaki.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌatendˈea kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoamˈuru. ˌakakˈata miʃˈipa ja ɲˈuma ja miɡˈuu ja farˈasi wˌao na kutʃˈoma mˈoto maɡˈari jˈao ja vˈita.|0
wakˈati hˈuo joʃˈua ˌakarˈudi na kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi wa hazˈori na kˌumuˈua mfˈalme wˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa. hazˈori ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi m̩kˈuu wa fˈalme hˈizo zˈote..|0
kˈila ˌalijekˈuwa ndˈani jˌake wˌakamuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa. wˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, wˈala hˌawakusˈaza tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi na ˌakautʃˈoma hazˈori kweɲˈewe kwa mˈoto.|0
joʃˈua ˌakaitˈeka hˌii mˈiɟi jˈote ja kifˈalme pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme wˌake na kˌuwapˈiɡa kwa upˈaŋɡa. ˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa wˈote, ɟˈinsi mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza.|0
lakˈini ˌisraˈeli hˌawakˌuitʃˈoma mˈoto hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi ˌilijoɟˈeŋɡwa katˌika vilˈima vjˈao vidˈoɡo ˌisipokˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi wa hazˈori ambˈao joʃˈua ˌaliutʃˈoma mˈoto.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɟˌitʃukulˈia ɲˈara zˈote na mifˈuɡo jˈote ja mˈiɟi hˌii, bˌali wˌaliwaˈua wˈatu wˈote kwa upˈaŋɡa hˌadi wˌalipˌowaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, pasˈipo kˌumbakˈiza jejˈote mwˌeɲe pˈumzi.|0
joʃˈua ˌakaitˈeka ˈn̩tʃi hˌii jˈote: ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, neɡˈebu jˈote, enˈeo jˈote ja ɡoʃˈeni, ʃefˈela ja upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, arˈaba na milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na ʃefˈela zˈao.|0
kˌuanzˈia mlˈima halˈaki ambˈao ˌumeinˈuka kˌuelekˈea seˈiri hˌadi bˈaal ɡˈadi katˌika bˈonde la lˌebanˈoni tʃˈini ja mlˈima hermˈoni. ˌakawatˈeka wafˈalme wˌake wˈote, ˌakawapˈiɡa na kˌuwaˈua.|0
joʃˈua ˌakapiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja wafˈalme hˈawa wˈote kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana mweɲˈewe n̩dˈije ˌaliifˈaɲa miˈojo jˈao ˈiwe miɡˈumu, ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli ˌili apˈate kˌuwafˌutilˈia mbˈali pasˈipo hurˈuma, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
wakˈati hˈuo joʃˈua ˌakaˈenda kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌaanˈaki kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima: kˌuanzˈia hebrˈoni, debˈiri na anˈabu, na kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja vilˈima ja jˈuda na kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja vilˈima ja ˌisraˈeli. joʃˈua ˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈao.|0
hˌawakubˈaki wˌaanˈaki wowˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, ˈila tu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈaza, ɡˈaθi na aʃdˈodi.|0
hˈivjo joʃˈua ˌakaitˈeka ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo jˈote kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwaɡˈiza mˈose, nˌaje joʃˈua ˌakawˈapa ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈao, kˌuliŋɡˈana na wˌalivjˌoɡawaɲˈika katˌika kabˈila zˈao. ndˈipo ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa na amˈani bˌila vˈita.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wafˈalme wa ˈn̩tʃi ambˈao wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwaʃˈinda na kˌuitwˈaa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani, kˌuanzˈia bˈonde la arnˈoni mpˈaka mlˈima hermˈoni, pamˈoɟa na enˈeo lˈote la upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ja arˈaba.|0
sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala hˌuko heʃbˈoni. ˌalitawˈala kˌuanzˈia ˌaroˈeri kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa bˈonde la arnˈoni, kˌuanzˈia kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde, hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩to jabˈoki, ambˈao ni mpˈaka wa wˌaamˈoni. hˌii ˌiliɟumlˈiʃa nˈusu ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
pˈia ˌalitawˈala arˈaba ja mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuanzˈia bahˈari ja kˌinerˈeθi hˌadi bahˈari ja arˈaba jaˈani bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi , hˌadi bˈeθ jˌeʃimˈoθi, kˈiʃa kˌuelekˈea kusˈini tʃˈini ja mˌaterˈemko ja pˈisɡa.|0
nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, ˌalijekˈuwa mmˈoɟa wa mabˈaki ja wˌarefˈai, ˌalijˌetawˈala ˌaʃtarˈoθi na edrˈei.|0
nˌaje ˌalitawˈala katˌika mlˈima hermˈoni, salˈeka, baʃˈani jˈote hˌadi mpˈaka wa wˈatu wa ɡeʃˈuri, na wˈatu wa maˈaka na nˈusu ja ɡˌileˈadi, hˌadi kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni.|0
mˈose, mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana, na wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawaʃˈinda. nˌaje mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌakawˈapa wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase ˈn̩tʃi ja hˈao wafˈalme ˌili ˈiwe mˈilki jˈao.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wafˈalme wa ˈn̩tʃi ambˈao joʃˈua na wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwaʃˈinda upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi ˌm̩wa jordˈani, kˌuanzˈia bˈaal ɡˈadi katˌika bˈonde la lˌebanˈoni hˌadi kˌufikˈia mlˈima halˈaki, ˌunaˌoinˈuka ˌukiˌelekˈea seˈiri. joʃˈua ˌalitˈoa ˈn̩tʃi zˈao kwa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli ˈiwe urˈiθi wˌao sˌawasˈawa na mɡˌawaɲˈiko wa mˌakabˈila jˈao.|0
mfˈalme wa jerˈiko mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ˈai karˈibu na beθˈeli mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa jˌerusalˈemu mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa hebrˈoni mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa jarmˈuθi mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa lakˈiʃi mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa eɡlˈoni mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ɡezˈeri mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa debˈiri mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ɡedˈeri mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa hˈorma mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa arˈadi mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa lˈibna mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ˌadulˈamu mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa makˈeda mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa beθˈeli mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa tapˈua mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa hefˈeri mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa afˈeki mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa lˌaʃarˈoni mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa madˈoni mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa hazˈori mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa ʃˈimron merˈoni mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ˌakiʃˈafu mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa tˌaanˈaki mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa meɡˈido mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa kedˈeʃi mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa jˌokneˈamu katˌika karmˈeli mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa dˈori katˌika nˈafoθ dˈori mmˈoɟa mfˈalme wa ɡoˈimu katˌika ɡilɡˈali mmˈoɟa.|0
mfˈalme wa tˈirsa mmˈoɟa wafˈalme ɟˈumla jˈao ˌilikˈuwa θˌelaθˈini na mmˈoɟa.|0
joʃˈua ˌalipokˈuwa m̩zˈee na ˈumri wˌake ukˈiwa ˌumesoɡˈea sˈana, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ni m̩zˈee sˈana, na bˈado kˌumesalˈia sehˈemu kˈubwa sˈana za ˈn̩tʃi ambˈazo ni za kˌutwalˈiwa.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, lˌiɡawˈaɲe enˈeo hˈili kwa jˈale mˌakabˈila tˈisa na ˈile nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase kˌuwa urˈiθi.|0
ˈile nˈusu ɲiŋɡˈine ja manˈase, wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi, wˌaliʃˌapokˈea urˈiθi mˈose ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewˈapa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani, sˌawasˈawa na mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaɡawˈia.|0
enˈeo lˈao lˌilienˈea tˌoka ˌaroˈeri, ˌilijˈoko ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa bˈonde la arnˈoni kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde, lˌikiɟumlˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi ja uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu wˈote wa medˈeba mpˈaka dibˈoni.|0
nˈajo mˈiɟi jˈote ja sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ˌalijˌetawˈala heʃbˈoni, hˌadi mpakˈani ˌm̩wa wˌaamˈoni.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza wˈatu wa ɡeʃˈuri na wa maˈaka, kwa hˈijo wˌanaˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli mpˈaka lˈeo hˌii.|0
lakˈini kwa kabˈila la lˈawi, mˈose hˌakupeˈana urˈiθi, kwa kˌuwa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa urˈiθi wˈao, kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaenˈeo ambˈajo mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
enˈeo la ˌaroˈeri lilˈilo ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa bˈonde la arnˈoni, na kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde, pˈia uwˈanda wˈote wa ɟˈuu kupˈita medˈeba.|0
jahˈasa, kˌedemˈoθi, mˌefaˈaθi.|0
kˌiriˌaθaˈimu, sˈibma, sˈereθ ʃahˈari ɟˌuːja kilˈima kilˈitʃo katˌika bˈonde.|0
bˈeθ peˈori, mˌaterˈemko ja pˈisɡa na bˈeθ jˌeʃimˈoθi.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote ja uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu na enˈeo lˈote la ˌutawˈala wa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ˌalijˌetawˈala katˌika heʃbˈoni. mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemʃˈinda sihˈoni, pˈia wˌatawˈala wakˈuu wa wˌamidiˈani, ambˈao ni ˈevi, rekˈemu, sˈuri, hˈuri na rˈeba, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameuŋɡˈana na sihˈoni, ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile.|0
pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa katˌika vˈita, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori ˌalijekˈuwa mtʃˈawi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaenˈeo ambˈajo mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa kabˈila la ɡˈadi, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
na kˌuanzˈia heʃbˈoni mpˈaka rˈamaθ mˈispa na bˌetonˈimu, na kutˈoka mˌahanaˈimu hˌadi enˈeo la debˈiri.|0
na katˌika bˈonde, bˈeθ harˈamu, bˈeθ nˈimra, sukˈoθi na safˈoni na sehˈemu ˌilijobˈaki ja enˈeo la ˌutawˈala wa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa ˈm̩to jordˈani, enˈeo ˌinajˌoiʃˈia kwˈeɲe bahˈari ja kˌinerˈeθi .|0
mˈiɟi hˌii na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake ˌilikˈuwa urˈiθi wa kabˈila la ɡˈadi ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaenˈeo ambˈajo mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa hˈijo nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase, jaˈani kwa nˈusu ja ɟamˈaa ja uzˈao wa manˈase, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
nˈusu ja ɡˌileˈadi, na ˌaʃtarˈoθi na edrˈei mˈiɟi ja kifˈalme ja ˈoɡu katˌika baʃˈani. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja wazˈao wa makˈiri mwˈana wa manˈase, kwa aɟˈili ja nˈusu ja wˈana wa makˈiri, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio urˈiθi ˌaliˌoupeˈana mˈose wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa katˌika tˌambarˈare za moˈabu, ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jerˈiko.|0
lakˈini kwa kabˈila la walˈawi, mˈose hˌakuwˈapa urˈiθi; bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli n̩dˈije urˈiθi wˈao, kˌama ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
bˌasi hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaenˈeo wˌaisraˈeli wˌalijˌopokˈea kˌama urˈiθi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, ambˈajo kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈoo za kabˈila za ˌisraˈeli wˌaliwˌaɡawˈia.|0
urˈiθi wˌao ˌuliɡawˈaɲua kwa kˈura kwa jˈale mˌakabˈila tˈisa na nˈusu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoamˈuru mˈose.|0
mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa jˈale mˌakabˈila mawˈili na nˈusu urˈiθi wˌao upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani, lakˈini walˈawi hˌawakupˈewa urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao weŋɡˈine.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈana wa josˈefu wˌalikˈuwa mˌakabˈila mawˈili; manˈase na ˌefraˈimu. walˈawi hˌawakupˈata mɡˈawo wa ˈarði, bˌali wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi tu kwa aɟˈili ja kuˈiʃi, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo ja malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɡawˈana ˈile ˈn̩tʃi, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza mˈose.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakamwendˈea joʃˈua hˌuko ɡilɡˈali, nˌaje kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune jˈule mkenˈizi, ˌakamwambˈia, ˌunaɟˈua ɟˈambo ambˈalo bwˈana ˌalimwambˈia mˈose ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu hˌuko kˈadeʃ barnˈea kˌukuhˈusu wˌewe na mˈimi.|0
nˌilikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, wakˈati mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana, ˌalipˌonitˈuma kutˈoka kˈadeʃ barnˈea kˌuipˌelelˈeza hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi. nˌami nˌikamletˈea tˌaarˈifa kˌama kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˌilivjˌosadˈiki mojˈoni.|0
lakˈini ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu tˌuliopˈanda nˌao wˌaliifˈaɲa miˈojo ja wˈatu ˌijejˈuke kwa hˈofu. bˌali mˈimi, nˌilimfuˈata bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
hˈivjo katˌika sˈiku ˈile, mˈose ˌakanˌiapˈia, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌumeˌikaɲˈaɡa kwa miɡˈuu jˈako ˌitakˈuwa urˈiθi wˈako na wa watˈoto wˈako milˈele, kwa sabˈabu ˌumemfuˈata bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu kwa mˈojo wˈote..|0
sˈasa bˈasi, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, ˌameniwˈeka hˈai kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na mitˈano ʃˈu wakˈati ˌalipˌomwambˈia mˈose ɟˈambo hˈili, wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wakˈiwa wˌanazuŋɡˈuka ɟaŋɡwˈani. hˈivjo mˌimi hˈapa lˈeo, nˈina ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌemanˈini na mitˈano.|0
bˈado ninˈazo ŋɡˈuvu kˌama sˈiku ˈile mˈose ˌalipˌonitˈuma. bˈado ninˈazo ŋɡˈuvu za kwˈenda vitˈani sˈasa kˌama vˈile nˌilivjokˈuwa wakˈati ˈule.|0
bˌasi nˈipe ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ja vilˈima, ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalinˌiahˈidi sˈiku ˈile. wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌulisikˈia wakˈati ˈule kwˌamba wˌaanˈaki wˌalikuwˈako hˌuko na mˈiɟi jˈao ˌilikˈuwa mikˈubwa na jˌeɲe mabˈoma, lakˈini, kwa msaˈada wa bwˈana, nˌitawˌafukˈuza watˈoke hˌuko kˌama vˈile ˌalivjonˈena.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakambarˈiki kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune, na akˈampa hebrˈoni kˌama urˈiθi wˈake.|0
hˈivjo hebrˈoni ˌimekˈuwa mˈali ja kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune mkenˈizi ʃˈu wakˈati ˈule, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimwandˈama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
hebrˈoni ˌuliˈitwa kirˈiaθ ˈarba hˈapo mwˈanzo, kˌutokˈana na hˈujo ˈarba ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu m̩kˈuu kupˈita wˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaanˈaki. kˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa na amˈani bˌila vˈita.|0
mpˈaka wˌao wa kusˈini ˌulianzˈia kwˈeɲe ɣˈuba ˌilijˈoko kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃa ja kusˈini ˌm̩wa bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi.|0
ˌukakatˈiza kusˈini ˌm̩wa ˌakrabˈimu, ˌukaˌendelˈea hˌadi sˈini ˌukaˈenda hˌadi kusˈini ˌm̩wa kˈadeʃ barnˈea. tˈena ˌukapitˈia hesrˈoni ˌukapˈanda hˌadi adˈari na ˌukapˈinda hˌadi kˈarka.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukaˌendelˈea mpˈaka azmˈoni na kˌuuŋɡanˈika na kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri, na kˌuiʃˈia bˌaharˈini. hˈuu n̩dˈio mpˈaka wˌao wa upˈande wa kusˈini.|0
ˌukapˈanda hˌadi bˈeθ hˈoɡla, na kˌuendelˈea kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa bˈeθ arˈaba hˌadi kwˈeɲe ɟˈiwe la bohˈani mwˈana wa rˌeubˈeni.|0
kˈiʃa mpˈaka ˌulipˈanda hˌadi debˈiri kutˈoka bˈonde la akˈori na kˌuɡeˈuka kˌaskazˈini hˌadi ɡilɡˈali ˌinajˌotazamˈana na mˌaterˈemko ja ˌadumˈimu, kusˈini ˌm̩wa bˈonde. ˌukaˌendelˈea sambˈamba hˌadi mˈaɟi ja ˈen ʃemˈeʃi na kˌutokˈeza hˌuko ˈen roɡˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukapˈanda kwa kˌufuˈata bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu sambˈamba na mterˈemko wa kusˈini wa ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa wa wˌajebˈusi jaˈani jˌerusalˈemu. kutˈoka hˈapo ˌukapˈanda ɟˌuːja kilˈima mˌaɣarˈibi ja bˈonde la hinˈomu mwˈiʃo wa ˈn̩tʃa ja kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
kutˈoka ɟˌuːja kilˈima mpˈaka ˈule ˌukaˌendelˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi ja mˈaɟi ja neftˈoa, ˌukatokˈea kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi ja mlˈima efrˈoni na kˌuterˈemka kˌuelekˈea baˈala jaˈani kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukapˈinda upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi kutˈoka baˈala hˌadi mlˈima seˈiri, ˌukafˌuatˈia sambˈamba mterˈemko wa kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa mlˈima jˌearˈimu jaˈani kˌesalˈoni, ˌukaˌendelˈea tʃˈini hˌadi bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi na kˌukatˈiza hˌadi tˈimna.|0
ˌukaˌelekˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe mterˈemko wa kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa ekrˈoni, ˌukaɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea ʃˌikerˈoni, ˌukapˈita hˌadi mlˈima baˈala na kufˈika jˌabineˈeli. mpˈaka ˈule ˌukaiʃˈia bˌaharˈini.|0
mpˈaka wa mˌaɣarˈibi ni pwˈani ja bahˈari kˈuu. hˌii n̩dˈijo mipˈaka ja wˈatu wa jˈuda kwa kˈoo zˈao.|0
kwa kˌufuˈata mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana kwˈake, joʃˈua alˈimpa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune sehˈemu katˌika jˈuda: kirˈiaθ ˈarba, jaˈani hebrˈoni ˈarba ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa zamˈani wa anˈaki.|0
kutˈoka hebrˈoni kalˈebu ˌalifukˈuza hˈao wˈana watˈatu wa anˈaki, nˌao ni ʃeʃˈai, ˌahimˈani na talmˈai, wazˈao wa anˈaki.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo ˌakaondˈoka kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi debˈiri ɟˈina la debˈiri hˈapo kwˈanza ˌuliˈitwa kirˈiaθ sefˈeri.|0
kalˈebu ˌakasˈema, nˌitamwˈoza bˈinti jˈaŋɡu ˈaksa kwa ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌupiɡˈana na kutˈeka kirˈiaθ sefˈeri.|0
bˌasi ˌoθniˈeli mwˈana wa kenˈazi, ndˈuɡu jˌake kalˈebu, ˌakautˈeka; hˈivjo kalˈebu ˌakamtˈoa ˈaksa bˈinti jˌake ˌaolˈewe nˈaje.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, naˈomba ˌunifaɲˈie ɟˈambo mˈoɟa la hisˈani. kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˈipa ˈarði hˌuko neɡˈebu, nˈipe pˈia tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi. bˌasi kalˈebu akˈampa tʃemtʃˈemi za ɟˈuu na za tʃˈini.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio urˈiθi wa kabˈila la jˈuda, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
mˈiɟi ja kusˈini kabˈisa ja kabˈila la jˈuda katˌika neɡˈebu kˌuelekˈea mpˈaka wa edˈomu ˌilikˈuwa: kˌabseˈeli, edˈeri, jaɡˈuri.|0
kˈina, dimˈona, adˈada.|0
kedˈeʃi, hazˈori, iθnˈani.|0
zˈifu, telˈemu, bˌealˈoθi.|0
hˈazor hadˈata, kerˈioθ hezrˈoni jaˈani hazˈori.|0
amˈamu, ʃˈema, molˈada.|0
hˈasar ɡˈada, heʃmˈoni, bˈeθ pelˈeti.|0
hˈasar ʃuˈali, bˈeer ʃˈeba, bˌizioθˈia.|0
baˈala, ijˈimu, esˈemu.|0
ˌeltolˈadi, kesˈili, hˈorma.|0
siklˈaɡi, madmˈana, sansˈana.|0
lˌebaˈoθi, ʃilhˈimu, aˈini na rimˈoni; hˈijo jˈote ni mˈiɟi ˌiʃirˈini na tˈisa, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
zanˈoa, ˈen ɡanˈimu, tapˈua, enˈamu.|0
jarmˈuθi, ˌadulˈamu, sˈoko, azˈeka.|0
ʃˌaaraˈimu, ˌadiθaˈimu na ɡedˈera ˌau ɡˌederˌoθaˈimu; jˈote ni mˈiɟi kˈumi na mˈinne, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
senˈani, hadˈaʃa, mˈiɡdal ɡˈadi.|0
dˌileˈani, mˈispa, jˌokθeˈeli.|0
lakˈiʃi, boskˈaθi, eɡlˈoni.|0
