kabˈoni, lamˈasi, kitlˈiʃi.|0
ɡˌederˈoθi, bˈeθ daɡˈoni, naˈama na makˈeda; jˈote ni mˈiɟi kˈumi na sˈita pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
lˈibna, eθˈeri, aʃˈani.|0
jˈifta, ˈaʃna, nesˈibu.|0
keˈila, akzˈibu na marˈeʃa; jˈote ni mˈiɟi tˈisa pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
ekrˈoni, pamˈoɟa na viˈuŋɡa vjˈake na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
aʃdˈodi, mˈiɟi jˌake na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake na ɡˈaza viˈuŋɡa vjˈake na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, hˌadi kˌufikˈia kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri na pwˈani ja bahˈari kˈuu.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima: ʃamˈiri, jatˈiri, sˈoko.|0
dˈana, kirˈiaθ sˈana jaˈani debˈiri.|0
anˈabu, ˌeʃtemˈoa, anˈimu.|0
ɡoʃˈeni, holˈoni na ɡˈilo; mˈiɟi kˈumi na mmˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
arˈabu, dˈuma, aʃˈani.|0
janˈimu, bˈeθ tapˈua, afˈeka.|0
hˈumta, kirˈiaθ ˈarba jaˈani hebrˈoni, na siˈori; mˈiɟi tˈisa pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
maˈoni, karmˈeli, zˈifu, jˈuta.|0
jˌezreˈeli, jˌokdeˈamu, zanˈoa.|0
kaˈini, ɡibˈea na tˈimna; mˈiɟi kˈumi pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
halhˈuli, bˈeθ sˈuri, ɡedˈori.|0
mˌaarˈaθi, bˈeθ anˈoθi na ˌeltekˈoni; mˈiɟi sˈita pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
kirˈiaθ baˈali jaˈani kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu na rˈaba; mˈiɟi miwˈili pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani: bˈeθ arˈaba, midˈini, sekˈaka.|0
nibʃˈani, ˈm̩ɟi wa tʃˈumvi, na ˈen ɡˈedi; mˈiɟi sˈita pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
jˈuda hˌakuwˈeza kˌuwafukˈuza wˌajebˈusi, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu; hˌadi lˈeo wˌajebˈusi huˈiʃi hˌuko pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˈuda.|0
mɡawˈaɲo wa josˈefu ˌulianzˈia jordˈani ja jerˈiko, mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa mˈiɟi ja jerˈiko na kutˈoka hˈapo ˌulipˈanda kˌupitˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja beθˈeli.|0
ˌukaˌendelˈea kutˈoka beθˈeli n̩dˈijo lˈuzu, ˌukavˈuka kˌuiŋɡˈia enˈeo la wˌaarˈiki hˌuko ˌatarˈoθi.|0
kwa hˈijo manˈase na ˌefraˈimu, wazˈao wa josˈefu, wˌalipokˈea urˈiθi wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo lˌilikˈuwa enˈeo la ˌefraˈimu, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo: mpˈaka wa urˈiθi wˌao ˌulianzˈia atˈaroθ adˈari upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi bˈeθ horˈoni ja ɟˈuu.|0
na kˌuendelˈea mpˈaka bˌaharˈini. kutˈoka mikmˈeta upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌulipˈinda kˌuelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi taˈanaθ ʃˈilo, ˌukiupˈita hˌadi janˈoa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kˈiʃa ˌuliterˈemka kutˈoka janˈoa hˌadi ˌatarˈoθi na naˈara, ˌukaɡˈusa jerˈiko na kˌutokˈea katˌika ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
kutˈoka tapˈua mpˈaka ˌulikwˈenda mˌaɣarˈibi hˌadi bˈonde la kˈana na kˌuiʃˈia bˌaharˈini. hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa n̩dˈio urˈiθi wa kabˈila la wˌaefraˈimu, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
pˈia ˌuliɟˌumuˈiʃa mˈiɟi jˈote na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake ambˈavjo vˌilitˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaefraˈimu ndˈani ja urˈiθi wa kabˈila la manˈase.|0
hˌawakˌuwatˈoa wˌakanaˈani wˌaiʃˈio ɡezˈeri; mpˈaka lˈeo wˌakanaˈani wˌanaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu lakˈini wˌanatakˈiwa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu za kˌulazimˈiʃwa.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mɡˈawo wa kabˈila la manˈase kˌama mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa josˈefu, jaˈani kwa aɟˈili ja makˈiri, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa manˈase. makˈiri ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa wˌaɡileˈadi, ambˈao wˌalipokˈea ɡˌileˈadi na baʃˈani kwa sabˈabu wˌamakˈiri wˌalikˈuwa askˈari wakˈuu.|0
kwa hˈijo mɡˈawo hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa manˈase wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamebˈaki, ambˈao ni kˈoo za ˌabiezˈeri, helˈeki, ˌasiriˈeli, ʃekˈemu, hefˈeri na ʃemˈida. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌanaˈume wˈale weŋɡˈine wa uzˈao wa manˈase mwˈana wa josˈefu kwa kˈoo zˈao.|0
bˌasi sˌelofehˈadi mwˈana wa hefˈeri, mwˈana wa ɡˌileˈadi, mwˈana wa makˈiri, mwˈana wa manˈase hakˈuwa na wˈana waˈume ˈila mabˈinti tˈu, ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao jˌalikˈuwa mˈahla, nˈoa, hˈoɡla, mˈilka na tˈirsa.|0
wˌakamwendˈea kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, na vˌioŋɡˈozi, wˌakasˈema: bwˈana ˌalimwaɡˈiza mˈose ˌatupatˈie urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈetu. kwa hˈijo joʃˈua ˌakawˈapa urˈiθi pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu wa bˈaba jˈao, kˌufuatˈana na aɡˈizo la bwˈana.|0
fˈuŋɡu la manˈase lˌilikˈuwa na sehˈemu kˈumi za ˈn̩tʃi, lˈitʃa ja ɡˌileˈadi na baʃˈani mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani.|0
enˈeo la manˈase lˌilienˈea kˌuanzˈia aʃˈeri hˌadi mikmˈeta mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa ʃekˈemu. mpˈaka ˈule ˌuliˌelekˈea upˈande wa kusˈini kutˈoka pˈale kˌuɟumuˈiʃa wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi ˈen tapˈua.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ja tapˈua ˌilikˈuwa mˈali ja manˈase, lakˈini tapˈua jeɲˈewe ilˈijo mpakˈani ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi ja manˈase ˌilikˈuwa ja wˌaefraˈimu..|0
kˈiʃa mpˈaka ˈule ˌuliˌendelˈea kˌuelekˈea kusˈini hˌadi bˈonde la kˈana. kˌulikuwˈepo mˈiɟi ja ˌefraˈimu ˌilijokˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiɟi ja manˈase, lakˈini mpˈaka wa manˈase ˌulikˈuwa upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini wa lˈile bˈonde na kˌuiʃˈia kwˈeɲe bahˈari.|0
lakˈini wˌamanˈase hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuimilˈiki mˈiɟi hˌii, kwa kˌuwa wˌakanaˈani wˌalikazˈana kuˈiʃi katˌika mˌaenˈeo hˈajo.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalivjˌoendelˈea kupˈata ŋɡˈuvu wˌaliwˌatumikˈiʃa wˌakanaˈani na kˌuwatˈia katˌika kˈazi za kˌulazimˈiʃwa, lakˈini hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza kabˈisa.|0
wˈatu wa josˈefu wˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, kwa nˈini ˌumetˈupa sˌisi mɡˈawo mmˈoɟa tu na sehˈemu mˈoɟa tu kˌuwa urˈiθi? sˌisi tu wˈatu wˈeŋɡi sˈana, na bwˈana ˌametˌubarˈiki kwa wˈiŋɡi.|0
joʃˈua ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama nˈiɲi ni wˈeŋɡi sˈana, na kˌama ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu ni ndˈoɡo sˈana kwˈenu, pandˈeni msitˈuni mkafjˈeke enˈeo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu weɲˈewe hˌuko kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaperˈizi na wˌarefˈai.|0
wˈatu wa josˈefu wˌakaɟˈibu, hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima hˌaitutˈoʃi, nˌao wˌakanaˈani wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika tˌambarˈare wanˈajo maɡˈari ja vˈita ja tʃˈuma, wˈote wa bˈeθ ʃˈani na mˈiɟi jˈake, na wˈale walˈio katˌika bˈonde la jˌezreˈeli.|0
lakˈini joʃˈua ˌakanˈena na ɲˈumba ja josˈefu, jaˈani ˌefraˈimu na manˈase: nˈiɲi ni wˈeŋɡi sˈana na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu sˈana. hˌamtakˈuwa na mɡˈawo mmˈoɟa tˈu.|0
bˌali pˈia ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ja kilˈima jˌeɲe msˈitu. ˌifjekˈeni, nˈajo mipˈaka jˌake ˌitakˈuwa jˈenu umbˈali mtˌakaowˈeza kufˈika. iŋɡˈawa wˌakanaˈani wˈana maɡˈari ja tʃˈuma, nˌao wˈana ŋɡˈuvu, mwawˈeza kˌuwafukˈuza hˈumo.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la wˌaisraˈeli lˌikakˌusaɲˈika hˌuko ʃˈilo na kˌusimamˈiʃa hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa tʃˈini ja ˌutawˈala wˈao.|0
lakˈini pˌalikˈuwa bˈado mˌakabˈila sˈaba ja ˌisraˈeli ambˈajo jˌalikˈuwa hˌajaɟˌapokˈea urˈiθi wˈao.|0
hˈivjo joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, ɟˈe, mtˌasubˈiri hˌata lˈini ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia kˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌamewˈapa.|0
baˌada ja kˌuandˈika mˌaelˈezo ja hˈizo sehˈemu sˈaba za ˈn̩tʃi, jˌaletˈeni kwˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitawˌapiɡˈia kˈura kwa kˈura mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, walˈawi hˌawatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, kwa maˈana hudˈuma ja ˌukuhˈani kwa bwˈana n̩dˈio urˈiθi wˈao. nˌao ɡˈadi, rˌeubˈeni na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌameʃapˈata urˈiθi wˌao upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani, ambˈako mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa.|0
wˈatu hˈao wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanaondˈoka kwˈenda kˌuandˈika vizˈuri kuhˈusu hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi, joʃˈua ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza, nendˈeni mkˌakaɡˈue hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi na mwandˈike mˌaelˈezo kˌuihˈusu. kˈiʃa mrˈudi kwˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitawˌapiɡˈia kˈura hˈapa ʃˈilo mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo hˈao wˈatu wˌalipˌoondˈoka na kupˈita katˌika ˈile ˈn̩tʃi. wˌakaandˈika mˌaelˈezo jˌake kwˈeɲe kitˈabu, ˈm̩ɟi kwa ˈm̩ɟi, katˌika sehˈemu sˈaba na kˌurudˈiʃa tˌaarˈifa kwa joʃˈua hˌuko kambˈini ʃˈilo.|0
kˈura ˌiliˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo. enˈeo lˈao wˌalilˌoɡawˈiwa lˌilikˈuwa kˈati ja kabˈila la jˈuda na la josˈefu.|0
upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini mpˈaka wˌao ˌulianzˈia pˈale jordˈani, kˌupitˈia kˌaskazˈini ja mterˈemko wa jerˈiko na kˌuendelˈea mˌaɣarˈibi kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, ˌukitokˈea kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la bˈeθ avˈeni.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo ˌulikatˈiza kwˈeɲe mterˈemko wa kusˈini ˌm̩wa lˈuzu jaˈani beθˈeli na kuʃˈuka hˌadi atˈaroθ adˈari katˌika kilˈima kusˈini ˌm̩wa bˈeθ horˈoni ja tʃˈini.|0
kutˈoka kilˈima kˌinatʃˌotazamˈana na bˈeθ horˈoni upˈande wa kusˈini mpˈaka ˈule ˌukazuŋɡˈuka kusˈini kˌufuatˈia upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, na ˌukatˌokezˈea kirˈiaθ baˈali jaˈani kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu, ˈm̩ɟi wa wˈatu wa jˈuda. hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌuliokˈuwa upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
upˈande wa kusˈini mpˈaka ˌulianzˈia kwˈeɲe viˈuŋɡa vja kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu kwa upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, nˌao ˌukatokˈeza kwˈeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi ja mˈaɟi ja neftˈoa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukapˈinda kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini, ˌukaˈenda hˌadi ˈen ʃemˈeʃi na kˌuendelˈea mpˈaka ɡˌelilˈoθi, ˌinajˌotazamˈana na ɲɟˈia ja ˌadumˈimu, ˌukaterˈemka hˌadi kwˈeɲe ɟˈiwe la bohˈani mwˈana wa rˌeubˈeni.|0
ˌukaˌendelˈea upˈande wa mterˈemko wa kˌaskazˈini wa bˈeθ arˈaba ˌukaterˈemka hˌadi arˈaba.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukaˈenda mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mterˈemko wa kˌaskazˈini wa bˈeθ hˈoɡla na kˌuɟitokˈeza kwˈeɲe ɣˈuba ja kˌaskazˈini ja bahˈari ja tʃˈumvi, kwˈeɲe mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja jordˈani upˈande wa kusˈini. hˈuo ˌulikˈuwa mpˈaka wa kusˈini.|0
nˈajo jordˈani ikˈawa n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo mipˈaka ˌilijˌooɲˈeʃa urˈiθi wa kˈoo za bˌeɲamˈini pˈande zˈote.|0
bˈeθ arˈaba, sˌemaraˈimu, beθˈeli.|0
avˈimu, pˈara na ˈofra.|0
kˈefar amˈoni, ˈofni, na ɡˈeba; mˈiɟi kˈumi na miwˈili pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
ɡˌibeˈoni, rˈama na bˌeerˈoθi.|0
mˈispa, kefˈira, mˈoza.|0
rekˈemu, ˌirpeˈeli, tarˈala.|0
zˈela, elˈefu, ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌajebˈusi jaˈani jˌerusalˈemu, ɡibˈea na kˌiriˈaθi; mˈiɟi kˈumi na mˈinne pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake. hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌuliokˈuwa urˈiθi wa bˌeɲamˈini kwa aɟˈili ja kˈoo zˈake.|0
kˈura ja pˈili ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo. urˈiθi wˌao ˌulikˈuwa ndˈani ja enˈeo la jˈuda.|0
ˌuliɟˌumuˈiʃa: bˈeer ʃˈeba ˌau ʃˈeba, molˈada.|0
hˈasar ʃuˈali, bˈala, esˈemu.|0
ˌeltolˈadi, beθˈuli, hˈorma.|0
siklˈaɡi, bˈeθ mˌarkabˈoθi, hˈasar sˈusa.|0
bˈeθ lˌebaˈoθi na ʃˌaruhˈeni; hˌii ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi kˈumi na mitˈatu pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
pˈia aˈini, rimˈoni, eθˈeri, na aʃˈani; hˌii ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi mˈinne na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈote vˌinavjˌoizuŋɡˈuka mˈiɟi hˌii mpˈaka baˈalaθ beˈeri ambˈajo n̩dˈijo rˈama ilˈijo katˌika neɡˈebu. hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa ni urˈiθi wa kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
urˈiθi wa wˌasimeˈoni ˌulitolˈewa kutˈoka fˈuŋɡu la jˈuda, kwa kˌuwa fˈuŋɡu la jˈuda lˌilikˈuwa kˈubwa kulˈiko wˌalivjˌohitˈaɟi. hˈivjo kabˈila la sˌimeˈoni lˌilipˈewa urˈiθi wˌao ndˈani ja enˈeo la jˈuda.|0
kˈura ja tˈatu ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo: mpˈaka wa urˈiθi wˌao ˌuliˌendelˈea hˌadi sarˈidi.|0
kˌuelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi ˌukafˈika marˈala, ˌukaɡˈusa dˌabeʃˈeθi, na kˌuendelˈea mpˈaka kwˈeɲe bˈonde karˈibu na jˌokneˈamu.|0
ˌukaɡeˈuka mˌaʃarˈiki, kˌuanzˈia sarˈidi kˌuelekˈea mawˈio ja ɟˈua hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja kisˈiloθ tabˈori, na kwˈenda hˌadi dˌaberˈaθi, kupˈanda jafˈia.|0
kˈiʃa ˌukaˌendelˈea mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi ɡˈaθ hefˈeri na kufˈika ˈeθ kasˈini, ˌukatokˈea rimˈoni na kˌuɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea nˈea.|0
hˌuko mpˈaka ˌukazˌuŋɡukˈia upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini hˌadi hˌanaθˈoni na kˌuiʃˈia katˌika bˈonde la ˈifta ˈeli.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈio urˈiθi wa zˌabulˈoni, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
kˈura ja ˈn̩ne ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˌisakˈari, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
enˈeo lˈao lˌiliɟˌumuˈiʃa: jˌezreˈeli, kˌesulˈoθi, ʃunˈemu.|0
hˌafaraˈimu, ʃiˈoni, ˌanaharˈaθi.|0
rabˈiθi, kˌiʃiˈoni, ebˈesi.|0
remˈeθi, ˈen ɡanˈimu, ˈen hˈada na bˈeθ pasˈesi.|0
mpˈaka ˈule ˌukaɡˈusa tabˈori, ʃˌahasˈuma na bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, na ˌukaiʃˈia kwˈeɲe jordˈani. ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi kˈumi na sˈita, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake ˌilikˈuwa urˈiθi wa kabˈila la ˌisakˈari, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
kˈura ja tˈano ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la aʃˈeri, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
enˈeo lˈao lˌiliɟˌumuˈiʃa: helkˈaθi, hˈali, betˈeni, ˌakiʃˈafu.|0
ˌalamelˈeki, amˈadi na miʃˈali. upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi mpˈaka ˌuliɡˈusa karmˈeli na ʃˈihor libnˈaθi.|0
tˈena ˌukaɡeˈuka mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuelekˈea bˈeθ daɡˈoni, ˌukaɡˈusa zˌabulˈoni na bˈonde la ˈifta ˈeli, ˌukaˈenda upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini hˌadi bˈeθ emˈeki na nejˈeli, ˌukipitˈia kˈabul upˈande wa kuʃˈoto.|0
ˌukaˌendelˈea hˌadi abdˈoni, rehˈobu, hamˈoni na kˈana, na kufˈika sidˈoni kˈuu.|0
mpˈaka hˈuo ˌukaɡˌeukˈia ɲˈuma kˌuelekˈea rˈama na kwˈenda hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome wa tˈiro, ˌukaɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea hˈosa na kˌutokˈeza bˌaharˈini katˌika enˈeo la akzˈibu.|0
ˈuma, afˈeki na rehˈobu. ˌilikuwˈepo mˈiɟi ˌiʃirˈini na miwˈili, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈio urˈiθi wa kabˈila la aʃˈeri, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
kˈura ja sˈita ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la naftˈali, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
mpˈaka wˌao ˌuliˌendelˈea kutˈoka helˈefi na kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti mkˈubwa ulˈio katˌika sˌaananˈimu, ˌukipitˈia adˈami nekˈebu na jˌabineˈeli hˌadi lakˈumu, na kˌuiʃˈia katˌika ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
mpˈaka ˌukaˌendelˈea mˌaɣarˈibi kˌupitˈia ˈaznoθ tabˈori na kˌutokˈea hukˈoki. ˌukaɡˈusa zˌabulˈoni upˈande wa kusˈini, aʃˈeri upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, na jordˈani upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome ˌilikˈuwa sidˈimu, sˈeri, hamˈaθi, rakˈaθi, kˌinerˈeθi.|0
adˈama, rˈama, hazˈori.|0
kedˈeʃi, edrˈei, na ˈen hasˈori.|0
irˈoni, mˈiɡdal ˈeli, horˈemu, bˈeθ anˈaθi na bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi. kˌulikˈuwa na mˈiɟi kˈumi na tˈisa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
mˈiɟi hˈijo pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake n̩dˈio ˌilijokˈuwa urˈiθi wa kabˈila la naftˈali, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
kˈura ja sˈaba ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kabˈila la dˈani, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
enˈeo la urˈiθi wˌao lˌiliɟˌumuˈiʃa: sˈora, ˌeʃtaˈoli, ˈiri ʃemˈeʃi.|0
ʃˌaalabˈini, ˌaijalˈoni, ˈiθla.|0
elˈoni, tˈimna, ekrˈoni.|0
eltˈeke, ɡˌibeθˈoni, bˌaalˈaθi.|0
jehˈudi, bˈene berˈaki, ɡˈaθ rimˈoni.|0
mˈe jarkˈoni na rakˈoni, pamˈoɟa na enˈeo lˌinalˌotazamˈana na jˈafa.|0
lakˈini wadˈani wˌalipˈata ʃˈida kˌulimilˈiki enˈeo lˈao; kwa hˈijo wˌalipˈanda kˌuiʃˌambulˈia leʃˈemu, wˌakaitwˈaa, wˌakawaˈua wˈatu wˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌuukalˈia. wˌalikˈaa leʃˈemu na kˌuuˈita dˈani kˌufuatˈana na ɟˈina la bˈaba jˈao..|0
mˈiɟi hˌii na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake n̩dˈio ˌilijokˈuwa urˈiθi wa kabˈila la dˈani, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo.|0
wˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi katˌika miɡˈawo kˌuliŋɡˈana na sehˈemu zˈao zˌilizˌowaˌaŋɡukˈia, wˌaisraˈeli wakˈampa joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni urˈiθi kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru. walˈimpa ˈm̩ɟi ˌaliˌoutˈaka, ambˈao ni tˈimnaθ sˈera ulˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu. nˌaje ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakakˈaa hˌuko.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua.|0
ˌili ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajemuˈua ˈm̩tu kwa bahˈati m̩bˈaja na pasˈipo kˌukusudˈia awˈeze kˌukimbilˈia hˌuko na kˌuɟiepˈuʃa na mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu.|0
ˌanapˌokimbilˈia mˌoɟawˈapo ja hˌii mˈiɟi mikˈubwa ˌatasimˈama kwˈeɲe mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi m̩kˈuu na kˌuelˈeza wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi kuhˈusu ʃaˈuri lˈake. kˈiʃa wˌatampokˈea katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˌao na kˈumpa mahˈali pa kuˈiʃi nˈao.|0
kˌama mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu ˌakimfˌuatilˈia, wˌasimkabˈiði jˈule mʃtakˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimuˈua ɟirˈani jˌake bˌila kˌukusudˈia, na bˌila kˌuwa na nˈia ja kuðˈuru.|0
hˈuju ˌalijeˈua ˌatakˈaa kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa hˈuo mpˈaka ˈawe ˌamesimˈama kˌukabˈili maʃtˈaka jˌake mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko na mpˈaka kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌehudˈumu kwa wakˈati hˈuo ˌatakˌapokˈufa. ndˈipo ˌatakˌapowˈeza kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ˌaliˌukimbˈia.|0
bˌasi wˌakatˈeŋɡa kedˈeʃi katˌika ɡˌalilˈaja kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja naftˈali, ʃekˈemu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, na kirˈiaθ ˈarba jaˈani hebrˈoni kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja jˈuda.|0
katˌika upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani ja jerˈiko wˌakatˈeŋɡa bezˈeri katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa katˌika uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu katˌika kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, ramˈoθi katˌika ɡˌileˈadi katˌika kabˈila la ɡˈadi, na ɡolˈani hˌuko baʃˈani katˌika kabˈila la manˈase.|0
mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni jejˈote ˌaiʃˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌalijˌemuˈua ˈm̩tu kwa bahˈati m̩bˈaja, ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌukimbilˈia katˌika mˈiɟi mikˈubwa hˈijo ˌilijotˈeŋɡwa na ˌasiuˈawe na mlipˈiza kisˈasi wa dˈamu kˈabla hˌaɟasimˈama kˌukabˈili maʃtˈaka mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
bˌasi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja walˈawi, wˌakamwendˈea kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ɲiŋɡˈine za mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌuko ʃˈilo katˌika kˌanaˈani na kˌuwaambˈia, bwˈana ˌaliamˈuru kˌupitˈia mˈose kˌuwa mtˈupe mˈiɟi ja kuˈiʃi jˌeɲe sehˈemu za malˈiʃo kwa mifˈuɡo jˈetu.|0
hˈivjo kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoamˈuru, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˈapa walˈawi mˈiɟi ˌifuatˈajo pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo kutˈoka urˈiθi wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
kˈura ja kwˈanza ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia wˌakohˈaθi, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo. walˈawi wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa kuhˈani arˈoni wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi na mitˈatu kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja jˈuda, sˌimeˈoni na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
wazˈao weŋɡˈine wˌaliobˈaki wa wˌakohˈaθi wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi kutˈoka kˈoo za mˌakabˈila ja ˌefraˈimu, dˈani na nˈusu ja manˈase.|0
wazˈao wa ɡerʃˈoni wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi na mitˈatu kutˈoka kˈoo za mˌakabˈila ja ˌisakˈari, aʃˈeri, naftˈali na nˈusu ja manˈase hˌuko baʃˈani.|0
wazˈao wa merˈari, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo, wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi na miwˈili kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja rˌeubˈeni, ɡˈadi na zˌabulˈoni.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˈapa walˈawi mˈiɟi hˌii pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose.|0
kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja jˈuda na sˌimeˈoni wˌaliɡˈawa mˈiɟi ˌifuatˈajo kwa maɟˈina.|0
mˈiɟi hˌii wˌalipˈewa wazˈao wa arˈoni ambˈao wˌalitokˈana na kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi wa walˈawi, kwa sabˈabu kˈura ja kwˈanza ˌiliwˌaaŋɡukˈia.|0
wˌaliwˈapa kirˈiaθ ˈarba jaˈani hebrˈoni, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo zˌilizˌoizuŋɡˈuka, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja jˈuda. ˈarba ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa anˈaki..|0
lakˈini maʃˈamba na viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌozuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa wˌalikˈuwa wamˈempa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune kˌuwa mˈilki jˈake.|0
jatˈiri, ˌeʃtemˈoa.|0
holˈoni, debˈiri.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini wˌakawˈapa ɡˌibeˈoni, ɡˈeba.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote wˌalijopˈewa mˌakuhˈani, wazˈao wa arˈoni, ˌilikˈuwa kˈumi na mitˈatu, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo.|0
kˈoo ɲiŋɡˈine za wˌakohˈaθi, ambˈao pˈia ni walˈawi, wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu.|0
pˈia kutˈoka kabˈila la dˈani wˌakapokˈea eltˈeke, ɡˌibeθˈoni.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote hˌii kˈumi pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo ˌilipˈewa kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi zˌilizobˈaki.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌisakˈari wˌalipˈewa, kˌiʃiˈoni, dˌaberˈaθi.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la aʃˈeri wˌalipˈewa, miʃˈali, abdˈoni.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote ja kˈoo za wˌaɡerʃˈoni ˌilikˈuwa kˈumi na mitˈatu, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni wˌalipˈewa bezˈeri, jahˈasa.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ɡˈadi wˌalipˈewa, ramˈoθi katˌika ɡˌileˈadi ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio kwa aɟˈili ja jejˈote ˌanajˌeʃtakˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˌauˈaɟi, mˌahanaˈimu.|0
mˈiɟi jˈote ja walˈawi katˌika enˈeo lˌililoʃˈikwa na wˌaisraˈeli lˌilikˈuwa ˌarobaˈini na minˈane, pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu zˌake za malˈiʃo.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wa mˈiɟi hˌii ˌulikˈuwa na sehˈemu ja malˈiʃo kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka; ndˈivjo ˌilivjokˈuwa kwa mˈiɟi hˌii jˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakawˈapa ˌisraˈeli ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈao, nˌao wˌakaˌimilˈiki na kukˈaa hˈumo.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˈapa pumzˈiko kˈila upˈande, kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaapˈia bˈaba zˈao, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa adˈui zˈao ˌalijewˈeza kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈao, bwˈana ˌakawatˈia adˈui zˈao wˈote mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo ja ahˈadi nzˈuri ja bwˈana kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ambˈajo hˌaikˌutimˈia; kˈila mˈoɟa ˌilitimˈia.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawaˈita wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase.|0
nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, mmˌeʃafˈaɲa jˈale jˈote mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalijˌowaamˈuru, nˌaɲi mmˌenitˈii kwa kˈila ɟˈambo nˌililˌowaamˈuru.|0
kwa mˈuda mrˈefu sˈasa, hˌadi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo, hˌamkuwaˈatʃa ndˈuɡu zˈenu, bˌali nˈiɲi mmˌetimˈiza ˈile kˈazi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijowˈapa.|0
sˈasa kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa ndˈuɡu zˈenu pumzˈiko kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, rudˈini ɲumbˈani mwˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu sˈana kuʃˈika ˈamri na ʃerˈia zˈile mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalizowˈapa: jaˈani kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote, kutˈii ˈamri zˈake, kˌuʃikamˈana nˌaje kwa ˌuθabˈiti na kˌumtumikˈia kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote na rˈoho jˈenu jˈote.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawˌabarˈiki na kˌuwaˈaɡa waˈende zˈao, nˌao wˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao.|0
ˌakisˈema, rudˈini ɲumbˈani mwˈenu na ˌutaɟˈiri wˈenu mwˈiŋɡi, jaˈani makˈundi makˈubwa ja mifˈuɡo, mkˈiwa na fˈeða, ðahˈabu, ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma, pˈia wˈiŋɡi wa ŋɡˈuo, nˌaɲi mkˌaɡawˈane na ndˈuɡu zˈenu hˈizo ɲˈara zˌilizotˈoka kwa adˈui zˈenu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na hˈijo nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌakawaˈatʃa wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko ʃˈilo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani ˌili kurˈudi ɡˌileˈadi, ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe wˌalijˌoipˈata sˌawasˈawa na aɡˈizo la bwˈana kˌupitˈia mˈose.|0
wˌalipofˈika ɡˌelilˈoθi karˈibu na jordˈani, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ja fahˈari kˈubwa hˌuko kˈando ja jordˈani.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˌusaɲˈika hˌuko ʃˈilo ˌili wˌakapiɡˈane vˈita ðˈidi jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine wˌakamtˈuma fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi, kwa wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na hˈijo nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase.|0
wˌakatˈuma pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˈatu kˈumi ambˈao ni vˌioŋɡˈozi, mmˈoɟa kwa kˈila kabˈila la ˌisraˈeli, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika mɡˌawaɲˈiko wa ɟamˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌalipofˈika ɡˌileˈadi, kwa wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase, wˌakawˌaambˈia.|0
ɟˈe, sˈasa n̩dˈijo mnamwˈatʃa bwˈana?  kˌama mkimwˈasi bwˈana lˈeo, kˈeʃo ˌatalˌikasˌirikˈia kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌama ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajomilˈiki ˌimenˌaɟisˈika, vukˈeni ˈm̩ɟe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bwˈana, mahˈali maskˈani ja bwˈana ilˈipo, nˌaɲi mkˌaɟitwalˈie sehˈemu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu, lakˈini msˈiɟe mkaˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana wˈala ðˈidi jˈetu sˌisi kwa kˌuɟiɟeŋɡˈea mˌaðabˈahu, zaˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wakˈati akˈani mwˈana wa zˈera ˌalipokˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu, ɟˈe, ɣaðˈabu hˌaikˌulipˈata kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli? hakˈuwa jˌeje pˈeke jˌake ˌalijekˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˈake..|0
ndˈipo wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌalipˌowaɟˈibu vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli, wˌakisˈema.|0
kˌama tˌumeɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea mˌaðabˈahu jˈetu weɲˈewe ˌili kumwˈatʃa bwˈana na kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka, ˌau kutˈoa sadˈaka za amˈani ɟˈuu jˈake, bwˈana mweɲˈewe na ˌatupˌatilˈize lˈeo.|0
sˈivjo! tˌulifˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa hˈofu kwˌamba sˈiku ziɟˈazo wazˈao wˈenu wˌanawˈeza wˌakawˌaambˈia wazˈao wˈetu, ˈm̩na ˌuhusiˈano ɡˈani na bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌameifˈaɲa jordˈani kˌuwa mpˈaka kˈati jˈetu na nˈiɲi, nˈiɲi wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi! hˈamna fˈuŋɡu kwa bwˈana. kwa hˈijo wazˈao wˈenu wˌanawˈeza wˌakawˌasababˈiʃa wazˈao wˈetu wˌakaˈatʃa kˈumtʃa bwˈana.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu tˌulisˈema, tˌuɟiwˈeke tajˈari na tuɟˈeŋɡe mˌaðabˈahu, lakˈini si kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau ðabˈihu..|0
badˈala jˈake, ˌitakˈuwa ni ˌuʃahˈidi kˈati jˈetu na nˈiɲi na vizˈazi viɟˈavjo, kwˌamba tˌutamwabˈudu bwˈana katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈake pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˈetu za kˌuteketˈezwa, ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za amˈani. ndˈipo katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, wazˈao wˈenu hˌawatawˈeza kˌuwaambˈia wazˈao wˈetu, nˈiɲi hˈamna fˈuŋɡu katˌika bwˈana..|0
nˌasi tˌulisˈema, ikˈiwa wakˈati wowˈote wˌatatˌuambˈia hˈilo, ˌau kˌuwaambˈia uzˈao wˈetu, tˌutawaɟˈibu hˈivi: ˌaŋɡaliˈeni nakˈala hˌii ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana, ambˈajo bˈaba zˈetu wˌaliiɟˈeŋɡa, si kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu, bˌali kˌama ˌuʃahˈidi kˈati jˈetu na nˈiɲi..|0
hˈili ɟˈambo la kumwˈasi bwˈana na kumwˈatʃa sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo kwa kuɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka na ðabˈihu, zaˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ilˈijo mbˈele ja maskˈani jˌake na lˈiwe mbˈali nˈasi.|0
wakˈati kuhˈani fˌinehˈasi na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˌusaɲˈiko na wakˈuu wa kˈoo za ˌisraˈeli, wˌalipˌosikˈia hˈajo wˌalijosˈema wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na manˈase, wˌakariðˈika.|0
nˌaje fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari, ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na manˈase, lˈeo tˌunaɟˈua kwˌamba bwˈana jˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈasi, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa bwˈana katˌika ɟˈambo hˈili. sˈasa mmˌewaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli na mkˈono wa bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo fˌinehˈasi, mwˈana wa kuhˈani ˌeleazˈari na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌakarˈudi kˌanaˈani kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌukutˈana kwˈao na wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi hˌuko ɡˌileˈadi nˌao wˌakatˈoa tˌaarˈifa kwa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wˌalifurˈahi kˌusikˈia tˌaarˈifa hˈijo, na wˌakamhimˈidi mˈuŋɡu. wˈala hˌawakˌuzuŋɡˈumza tˈena habˈari za kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi jˈao ˌili kˌuharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi wˌaliˈiʃi.|0
nˌao wˌareubˈeni na waɡˈadi wˌakajaˈita jˈale mˌaðabˈahu ˈedi, jaˈani ʃahˈidi: kwa kˌuwa ˌitakˈuwa ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈetu na nˈiɲi kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda mrˈefu kupˈita, nˌaje bwˈana akˈawa ˌamewˈapa ˌisraˈeli pumzˈiko mbˈele ja adˈui zˈao wˈote wˌaliˌowazuŋɡˈuka, joʃˈua, wakˈati hˈuo akˈiwa m̩zˈee na ˈumri ukˈiwa ˌumeˌendelˈea sˈana.|0
ˌakawaˈita ˌisraˈeli wˈote, wazˈee wˈao, vˌioŋɡˈozi, wˌaamˈuzi na mˌaafˈisa joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia: mˌimi ni m̩zˈee na ˈumri wˈaŋɡu ˌumeˌendelˈea sˈana.|0
nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mmeˈona kˈila kˈitu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˌalitʃˌowatendˈea mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˈote kwa aɟˈili jˈenu. ˌilikˈuwa ni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalijˌewapˌiɡanˈia.|0
kˌumbukˈeni ɟˈinsi nˌilivjˌowaɡawˈia kˌama urˈiθi kwa mˌakabˈila jˈenu jˈote ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌataˈifa jˌalijobˈaki, jaˈani mˌataˈifa nˌilijˌowaʃˈinda, kˈati ja ˈm̩to jordˈani na bahˈari kˈuu upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mweɲˈewe ˌatawˌaondˈoa watˈoke mbˈele jˈenu. ˌatawˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌamilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, kˌama vˈile bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalivjˌowaahˈidi.|0
kuwˈeni hodˈari sˈana, kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii jˈote jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈose, pasˈipo kˌuɡeˈuka upˈande wa kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto.|0
msˌiʃirˌikiˈane na mˌataˈifa jˌalijˌobakˈia kˌatikˈati jˈenu, wˈala msiˈombe kwa maɟˈina ja miˈuŋɡu jˈao ˌau kuˈapa kwˈajo. msˌiitˌumikˈie wˈala kˌuisˌuɟudˈia.|0
bˌali mtˌaʃikamˈana kwa ˌuθabˈiti na bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo mmefˈaɲa mpˈaka sˈasa.|0
bwˈana ˌamewˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu mˌataˈifa makˈubwa na jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, mpˈaka sˈiku ja lˈeo hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijewˈeza kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈenu.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌanafukˈuza wˈatu ˈelfu, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌanawˌapiɡanˈia, kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi.|0
kwa hˈijo kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu sˈana kumpˈenda bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa mtˌaɡeˈuka na kˌuʃikamˈana na mabˈaki ja mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˌalijˌosalˈia kˌatikˈati jˈenu na kˌama mtˌaoˈana na kˌuʃirˌikiˈana nˈao.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩we na hakˈika kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu hˌatawˌafukˈuza tˈena mˌataˈifa hˈajo mbˈele jˈenu. badˈala jˈake, wˌatakˈuwa tˈanzi na mitˈeɡo kwˈenu, mˌiɟelˈedi mˌiɡoŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, na miˈiba matʃˈoni mwˈenu, mpˈaka mwˌaŋɡamˈie kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi hˌii nzˈuri, ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌamewˈapa.|0
sˈasa mˌimi nˌinakˌaribˈia kwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia ja wˈatu wˈote wa dunˈia. mnaɟˈua kwa miˈojo jˈenu na rˈoho zˈenu kwˌamba hakˈuna ahˈadi zozˈote ɲɟˈema bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalizˌowaˌahidˈia, ambˈazo hˌazikˌutimˈia. kˈila ahˈadi ˌimetimˈizwa, hakˈuna hˌata mˈoɟa ambˈajo hˌaikˌutimˈia.|0
kˌama mkˌilivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈalo ˌaliwˌaamˈuru nˈiɲi, mkaˈenda na kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia, hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌitawˈaka ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌaaŋɡamˈia kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri ˌalijowˈapa nˈiɲi.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakaˈita pamˈoɟa mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli hˌuko ʃekˈemu. ˌakawaˈita wazˈee, vˌioŋɡˈozi, wˌaamˈuzi na mˌaafˈisa wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wakˈaɟa mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: hˈapo zamˈani bˈaba zˈenu, pamˈoɟa na tˈera bˈaba jˌake ˌabrahˈamu na nahˈori, wˌaliˈiʃi ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to nˌao wˌaliˌiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
lakˈini nˌilimwondˈoa bˈaba jˈenu ˌabrahˈamu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to, nˌami nˌikamwoŋɡˈoza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja kˌanaˈani, nikˈampa wazˈao wˈeŋɡi. nikˈampa isˈaki.|0
nˌaje isˈaki nikˈampa jakˈobo na esˈau. esˈau nikˈampa ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja seˈiri, lakˈini jakˈobo pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe wˌakaʃˈuka mˈisri.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikawatˈuma mˈose na arˈoni, nˌami nˌikawapˈiɡa wamˈisri kwa kˈile nˌilitʃˌokitˈenda hˌuko, tˈena nˌikawatˈoa nˈiɲi hˌuko.|0
nˌilipˌowatˈoa bˈaba zˈenu mˈisri, mlifˈika kwˈeɲe bahˈari, nˌao wamˈisri wˌakawˌafuatˈia bˈaba zˈenu kwa maɡˈari na wapˈanda farˈasi mpˈaka kwˈeɲe bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
lakˈini wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana wˌakitˈaka msaˈada, nˌaje ˌakawˈeka ɡˈiza kˈati jˈenu na wamˈisri, ˌakailˈeta bahˈari ɟˈuu jˈao ˌikawˌafunˈika. nˈiɲi mliˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe kˈile nˌilitʃˌowatendˈea wamˈisri. kˈiʃa mliˈiʃi ɟaŋɡwˈani kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
nˌikawalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani. wˌakapiɡˈana nˈaɲi, lakˈini nˌikawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. nˌikawˌaaŋɡamˈiza mbˈele jˈenu nˌaɲi mkˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
wakˈati balˈaki mwˈana wa sipˈori, mfˈalme wa moˈabu, ˌalipˌoɟiandˈaa kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌalimwˈita bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori apˈate kˌuwalaˈani.|0
lakˈini sˌikumkubˈali bˌalaˈamu, kwa hˈijo ˌaliwˌabarˈiki tˈena na tˈena, nˌami nˌiliwˌaokˈoa tˌoka mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ndˈipo mlˌipovˈuka jordˈani mkafˈika jerˈiko. raˈija wa jerˈiko wˌakapiɡˈana nˈaɲi, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi, lakˈini nˌiliwatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
nˌikatˈuma maɲˈiɡu mbˈele jˈenu, ambˈao pˈia wˌaliwˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈenu, hˈao wafˈalme wawˈili wa wˌaamˈori. sˈijo upˈaŋɡa ˌau upˈinde wˈenu weɲˈewe vˌilivjˌowapatˈia uʃˈindi.|0
sˈasa bˌasi mtʃˈeni bwˈana na kˌumtumikˈia kwa ˌuaminˈifu wˈote. ˌitupˈeni mbˈali miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo bˈaba zˈenu wˌaliˌiabˈudu hˌuko ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati na hˌuko mˈisri, nˌaɲi mtˌumikiˈeni bwˈana.|0
lakˈini msˌipoˈona vjˈema kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana, tʃˌaɡuˈeni hˈivi lˈeo mtˌakajˌemtumikˈia, kˌama ni miˈuŋɡu ˈile ambˈajo bˈaba zˈenu wˌaliˌitumikˈia ŋɡˈambo frˈati, ˌau miˈuŋɡu ja wˌaamˈori, ambˈao mnakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao. lakˈini mˌimi na ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu, tˌutamtˌumikˈia bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo hˈao wˈatu wˌakaɟˈibu, hˈili ɟˈambo lˈiwe mbˈali nˌasi la kˌumsahˈau bwˈana na kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu mweɲˈewe n̩dˈije ˌalitutˈoa sˌisi na bˈaba zˈetu ˌakatˌupandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ja utˈumwa, na kutˈenda zˈile iʃˈara kˈubwa mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈetu. n̩dˈije ˌalijˌetulˈinda katˌika safˈari jˈetu jˈote na kˌutokˈana na mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo tˌulipˈita kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakajˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈetu mˌataˈifa jˈote pamˈoɟa na wˌaamˈori, wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. hˈivjo sˌisi nˌasi tˌutamtˌumikˈia bwˈana kwa kˌuwa jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, hamwˈezi kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana. jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu, ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe wˈivu. hˌatasamˈehe uˈasi wˈenu na ðˈambi zˈenu.|0
ikˈiwa mkimwˈatʃa bwˈana na kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni, ˌataɡeˈuka na kˌuwalˌeteˈeni maˈafa na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, baˌada ja kˌuwa mwˈema kwˈenu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, sˈivjo! sˌisi tˌutamtˌumikˈia bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi mmekˈuwa mˌaʃahˈidi ɟˈuu jˈenu weɲˈewe kˌuwa mmˌetʃaɡˈua kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana. nˌao wˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, tu mˌaʃahˈidi.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia, sˈasa bˈasi, ˌitupˈeni mbˈali hˈijo miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni ilˈijo kˌatikˈati jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌoleˈeni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, miˈojo jˈenu.|0
nˌao wˈatu wˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, tˌutamtˌumikˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na kumtˈii jˈeje.|0
sˈiku ˈile joʃˈua ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu na hˈapo ʃekˈemu ndˈipo ˌalipˌowaˌandikˈia ˈamri na ʃerˈia.|0
nˌaje joʃˈua ˌakajˌaandˈika mˈambo hˈaja katˌika kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu. ndˈipo ˌakalitwˈaa ɟˈiwe kˈubwa, ˌakalˌisimamˈiʃa hˌuko tʃˈini ja mwalˈoni, karˈibu na mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa bwˈana.|0
joʃˈua ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, ˌaŋɡaliˈeni! ɟˈiwe hˈili lˌitakˈuwa ʃahˈidi ɟˈuu jˈetu. lˌimesikˈia manˈeno jˈote bwˈana ˌalijˌotuambˈia. lˌitakˈuwa ʃahˈidi ɟˈuu jˈenu kˌama mtakˈuwa waˈoŋɡo kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
bˌasi joʃˈua ˌakawatˈuma wˈatu kˈila mmˈoɟa aˈende katˌika urˈiθi wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja, joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana akˈafa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa na kˈumi.|0
nˌao wˌakamzˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja urˈiθi wˈake, hˌuko tˈimnaθ sˈera katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, kˌaskazˈini ja mlˈima wa ɡaˈaʃi.|0
nˈajo ˈile mifˈupa ja josˈefu, ambˈajo wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌipandˈiʃa kutˈoka hˌuko mˈisri, wˌakaizˈika hˌuko ʃekˈemu kwˈeɲe enˈeo, ambˈalo jakˈobo ˌalilˌinunˈua kwa wˈana wa hamˈori bˈaba jˌake ʃekˈemu, kwa vipˈande mˈia vja fˈeða. enˈeo hˈili likˈawa ni urˈiθi wa uzˈao wa josˈefu.|0
nˌaje ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa arˈoni ˌakafarˈiki ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko ɡibˈea, mlˈima ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamepˈewa mtˈoto wˌake fˌinehˈasi, kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa joʃˈua, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajetˌaŋɡulˈia kupˈanda mbˈele jˈetu kwa aɟˈili ja kˌupiɡˈana na wˌakanaˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, jˈuda n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetˌaŋɡulˈia; nˌimewˈapa hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakawˌaambˈia wˌasimeˈoni ndˈuɡu zˈao, pandˈeni pamˈoɟa nˌasi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌulijopˈewa, ˌili tupˈate kˌupiɡˈana na wˌakanaˈani. sˌisi pˈia tˌutakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi katˌika sehˈemu jˈenu mlˌijopˈewa. bˌasi wˌasimeˈoni wˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
jˈuda ˌalipˌoʃambulˈia, bwˈana ˌakawatˈia wˌakanaˈani na wˌaperˈizi mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, nˌao wˌakawaˈua wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri hˌuko bezˈeki.|0
hˌuko ndˈiko wˌalipomkˈuta hˈujo adˈoni bezˈeki, nˌao wˌakapiɡˈana nˌaje na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌakanaˈani na wˌaperˈizi wˌakimbˈie.|0
adˈoni bezˈeki pˈia ˌalikimbˈia, nˌao wˌakamfuˈata na kˌumkamˈata, wˌakamkˈata vidˈole vjˈake ɡˈumba vja mikˈono na vja miɡˈuu.|0
ndˈipo adˈoni bezˈeki ˌakasˈema, nˌimewˌatendˈea wafˈalme sabˈini kˌama nˌilivjˌotendˈewa na kˌuwalˈiʃa makˈombo ja tʃakˈula tʃˈini ja mˈeza jˈaŋɡu. sˈasa mˈuŋɡu ˌamenilˈipa hˈaja, kˌama jˈale nˌilijˌowatendˈea. wˌakamlˈeta jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje akˈafa hˌuko.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakaʃˌambulˈia pˈia jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuitˈeka. wˌakaupˈiɡa ˈm̩ɟi kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌuutʃˈoma kwa mˈoto.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakaterˈemka kˌupiɡˈana na wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, jaˈani, neɡˈebu na ˈn̩tʃi tʃˈini ja vilˈima vja mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
jˈuda wˌakakˌabiliˈana na wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi hebrˈoni ambˈajo hˈapo kwˈanza ˌiliˈitwa kirˈiaθ ˈarba na kˌuwaʃˈinda ʃeʃˈai, ˌahimˈani na talmˈai.|0
kutˈoka hˌuko wˌakasˈoŋɡa mbˈele kˌukabˌiliˈana na wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi debˈiri ambˈao hˈapo kwˈanza ˌuliˈitwa kirˈiaθ sefˈeri..|0
kalˈebu ˌakasˈema, nˌitamwˈoza bˈinti jˈaŋɡu ˈaksa kwa ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌupiɡˈana na kutˈeka kirˈiaθ sefˈeri.|0
bˌasi ˌoθniˈeli mwˈana wa kenˈazi, ndˈuɡu mdˈoɡo wa hˈujo kalˈebu, ˌakawaʃˈinda, kwa hˈijo kalˈebu ˌakamtˈoa bˈinti jˌake ˈaksa ˌakaolˈewa nˈaje.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa ˈaksa ˌalipokˈuɟa kwa ˌoθniˈeli, ˌalimsˈihi ˌoθniˈeli amwˈombe bˈaba jˈake, kalˈebu, ʃˈamba. ˈaksa ˌalipoʃˈuka kutˈoka ɟˌuːja pˈunda wˈake, kalˈebu ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, watˈaka nˌikufaɲˈie nˈini.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, naˈomba ˌunifaɲˈie ɟˈambo mˈoɟa la hisˈani. kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˈipa ˈarði hˌuko neɡˈebu, nˈipe pˈia tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi. ndˈipo kalˈebu akˈampa tʃemtʃˈemi za ɟˈuu na za tʃˈini.|0
wazˈao wa jˈule mkˈeni, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wa mˈose, wˌakapˈanda pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˈuda kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa mitˈende, wˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa ɟˈaŋɡwa ja jˈuda hˌuko neɡˈebu karˈibu na ˈm̩ɟi wa arˈadi.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakaˈenda na wˌasimeˈoni ndˈuɡu zˈao kˌuʃambulˈia wˌakanaˈani wˌaiʃˈio sefˈaθi, nˌao wˌakaˌuaŋɡamˈiza hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi kabˈisa. kwa hˈijo hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi ˌukaˈitwa hˈorma.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakatwˈaa pˈia ɡˈaza, ˌaʃkelˈoni na ekrˈoni, kˈila ˈm̩ɟi na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake vˌinavjˌouzuŋɡˈuka.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˈuda. wˌakaˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuwafukˈuza wˈatu wˌaliokˈaa katˌika hˈijo tˌambarˈare, kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa na maɡˈari ja tʃˈuma.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈose ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, kalˈebu ˌalipˈewa hebrˈoni, nˌaje ˌakawˌafukˈuza wˈana watˈatu wa anˈaki.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˌabeɲamˈini wˌaliʃˈindwa kˌuwafukˈuza wˌajebˈusi, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu; hˈivjo hˌadi lˈeo wˌajebˈusi huˈiʃi hˈumo pamˈoɟa na wˌabeɲamˈini.|0
bˌasi ɲˈumba ja josˈefu wˌakaʃˌambulˈia beθˈeli, nˌaje bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
wˌalipotˈuma wˈatu kwˈenda kˌupelelˈeza beθˈeli ambˈao hˈapo kwˈanza ˌuliˈitwa lˈuzu.|0
wˈale wˌapelelˈezi wˌakaˈona ˈm̩tu ˌanatˈoka mɟˈini, nˌao wˌakamwambˈia, tˌuoɲˈeʃe ɟˈinsi ja kˌuiŋɡˈia mɟˈini nˌasi tˌutakˌutendˈea wˈema.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌaoɲˈeʃa, nˌao wˌakaupˈiɡa ˈm̩ɟi kwa upˈaŋɡa lakˈini wˌakamhifˈaði hˈai jˈule ˈm̩tu na ɟamˈaa jˌake jˈote.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakaˈenda hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja wahˈiti, ambˈapo ˌaliuɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuuˈita lˈuzu, ambˈao n̩dˈio ɟˈina lˈake hˌadi lˈeo.|0
lakˈini manˈase hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza wˈatu wa bˈeθ ʃˈani na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ˌau wˈatu wa tˌaanˈaki na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ˌau wˈatu wa dˈori na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ˌau wˈatu wa ˌibleˈamu na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ˌau wˈatu wa meɡˈido na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, lakˈini wˌakanaˈani wˌaliazˈimu kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile.|0
ˌisraˈeli wˌalipopˈata ŋɡˈuvu, wˌakawatˈia wˌakanaˈani katˌika kˈazi ja kˌulazimˈiʃwa, lakˈini kˈamwe hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza watˈoke kabˈisa.|0
wˈala ˌefraˈimu hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza kabˈisa wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi ɡezˈeri, bˌali wˌakanaˈani wˌaliˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi hˈumo mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
vˈivjo hˈivjo zˌabulˈoni hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza wˌakanaˈani wˌalioˈiʃi hˌuko kitrˈoni, wˈala wˌalioˈiʃi nˌahalˈoli, ambˈao wˌalibˈaki mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao; bˌali wˌaliwatˈia katˌika kˈazi ja kˌulazimˈiʃwa.|0
wˈala aʃˈeri hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi hˌuko ˈako, sidˈoni, alˈabu, akzˈibu, hˈelba, afˈeki wˈala rehˈobu.|0
na kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈambo hˈili wˌaaʃˈeri wˌakaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakanaˈani, weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˈala naftˈali hˌawakˌuwafukˈuza wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi wˈala wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi bˈeθ anˈaθi; lakˈini naftˈali nˌao pˈia wˌakaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakanaˈani, weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi na bˈeθ anˈaθi wakˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌao katˌika kˈazi ja kˌulazimˈiʃwa.|0
wˌaamˈori wˌakawˌazuilˈia wadˈani kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, kwa maˈana hˌawakˌuwaˈatʃa waʃˈuke kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe sehˈemu tˌambarˈare.|0
wˌaamˈori pˈia wˌakaˌendelˈea kukˈaa katˌika mlˈima herˈesi, katˌika ˌaijalˈoni na ʃˌaalbˈimu, lakˈini mkˈono wa ɲˈumba ja josˈefu ˌukawˌalemˈea, nˌao wˌakaʃˈindwa hˌata wˌakalˌazimˈika kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika kˈazi ja kˌulazimˈiʃwa.|0
mpˈaka wa wˌaamˈori ˌulikˈuwa kˌuanzˈia ɡˈeŋɡe la ˌakrabˈimu, kˌuendelˈea hˌadi sˈela na kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakakwˈea kutˈoka ɡilɡˈali hˌadi bokˈimu, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, nˌiliwˌapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌuwaiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijoˈapa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu. nˌikasˈema, kˈamwe sˌitalivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˈaɲi.|0
nˌaɲi msifˈaɲe aɡˈano na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, bˌali mtˌazibomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu jˈao. lakˈini nˈiɲi hˌamkunitˈii mˈimi. kwa nˈini mmefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
sˈasa bˌasi nˌinawˌaambˈia kˌuwa sˌitawˌafukˈuza watˈoke kˌatikˈati jˈenu ˈila wˌatakˈuwa miˈiba kwˈenu, nˌao miˈuŋɡu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa tˈanzi kwˈenu.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈema mˈambo hˈaja kwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, wˈatu wˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈuu.|0
wˌakapaˈita mahˈali pˈale bokˈimu. nˌao wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana sadˈaka.|0
baˌada ja joʃˈua kuwˈapa wˈatu ruhˈusa waˈende zˈao, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe urˈiθi wˌao weɲˈewe ˌili kˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
wˈatu wˌakamtˌumikˈia bwˈana sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa ja joʃˈua, na za hˈao wazˈee wˌalioˈiʃi baˌada ja joʃˈua kˈufa, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˈona mˈambo makˈuu ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈenda kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni, mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana, akˈafa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟana kˈumi.|0
wˌakamzˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja urˈiθi wˈake, hˌuko tˈimnaθ herˈesi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, kˌaskazˈini ja mlˈima ɡaˈaʃi.|0
baˌada ja kizˈazi kˈile tʃˈote kˌukusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈao, kˌikainˈuka kizˈazi kiŋɡˈine baˌada jˈao ambˈatʃo hˌakikumɟˈua bwˈana, wˈala matˈendo jˈale ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˈenda kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na kˌuwatˌumikˈia mˌabaˈali.|0
wˌakamwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamewatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. wˌakaˌifuˈata na kˌuiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu mbˌalimbˈali ja mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka. wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌalimwˈatʃa na kˌutumikˈia baˈali na mˌaaʃtorˈeθi.|0
hˈivjo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌavamˈizi wˌaliˌowatˈeka ɲˈara. ˌakawaˈuza katˌika mikˈono ja adˈui zˈao pˈande zˈote, hˈivjo hˌawakuwˈeza tˈena kˌuwazuˈia adˈui zˈao.|0
popˈote ˌisraˈeli wˌalipotˈoka kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana, mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa kiɲˈume nˌao ˌili kˌuwaʃˈinda, kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaapˈia. nˌao wakˈawa katˌika taˈabu kˈubwa.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakawˌainˈua wˌaamˈuzi, ambˈao wˌaliwˌaokˈoa katˌika mikˈono ja hˈao wˈatu wˌaliˌowaʃˌambulˈia.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌuwasˌikilˈiza hˌata wˌaamˈuzi wˈao, bˌali wˌalifˈaɲa ˌuaʃerˈati kwa kˌuifuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuiabˈudu. wˌaliɡeˈuka mˈara na kˌuiˈatʃa ɲɟˈia ambˈajo bˈaba zˈao wˌaliˌiendˈea, jaˈani, ɲɟˈia ja kutˈii ˈamri za bwˈana.|0
kˈila mˈara bwˈana ˌalipˌowaˌinulˈia mwamˈuzi, bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na hˈujo mwamˈuzi, nˌaje ˌaliwˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao kwa kipˈindi tʃˈote ˌalitʃoˈiʃi jˈule mwamˈuzi. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌaliwˌahurumˈia kwa sabˈabu ja kilˈio tʃˈao tʃa huzˈuni kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiwatˈesa na kˌuwatˌaabˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini kˈila mˈara mwamˈuzi ˌalipˌofarˈiki, wˈatu wˌalirudˈia katˌika hˈali m̩bˈaja ja uˈovu zaˈidi kulˈiko bˈaba zˈao, wˌakiˌifuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine kˌuitˌumikˈia na kˌuiabˈudu. wˌalikatˈaa kuˈatʃa matˈendo jˈao maˈovu na ɲɟˈia zˈao za ˌukaˈidi.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakawˌakasˌirikˈia sˈana ˌisraˈeli na kusˈema, kwa kˌuwa taˈifa hˈili lˌimevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈile nˌililofˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈao na hˌawakˌunisˌikilˈiza.|0
mˌimi nˌami sˌitafukˈuza taˈifa lolˈote ambˈalo joʃˈua ˌaliliˈatʃa ˌalipˌofarˈiki.|0
nˌitajˌatumˈia ˌili nipˈate kˌuwapˈima ˌisraˈeli na kuˈona kˌama wˌataiʃˈika ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana na kˌuenˈenda katˌika hˈijo kˌama ɲɟˈia bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejaˈatʃa hˈajo mˌataˈifa jabˈaki; hˌakujˌaondˈoa mˈara mˈoɟa kwa kˌujatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa joʃˈua.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌataˈifa bwˈana ˌalijˌojaˈatʃa ˌili kˌuwaɟarˈibu wˌaisraˈeli wˈote ambˈao hˌawakuɟˈua vˈita vjovjˈote vja kˌanaˈani.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa hˈivi ˌili tu kˌuwafundˈiʃa wazˈao wa wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao hˌawakˈuwa wˌameɟˈua vˈita hˈapo awˈali.|0
wafˈalme watˈano wa wˌafilˈisti, wˌakanaˈani wˈote, wˌasidˈoni, wahˈivi wˌaiʃˈio katˌika milˈima ja lˌebanˈoni kˌuanzˈia mlˈima wa bˈaal hermˈoni hˌadi lˈebo hamˈaθi.|0
wˌaliˈatʃwa ˌili kˌuwaɟarˈibu wˌaisraˈeli kuˈona kˌama wˌaŋɡetˈii ˈamri za bwˈana, ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamewˈapa bˈaba zˈao kwa mkˈono wa mˈose.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi.|0
wˌakawaˈoa bˈinti zˈao, nˌao wˌakawatˈoa bˈinti zˈao wˌaolˈewe na wˈana wa hˈajo mˌataˈifa, na kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, wˌakamsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao na kˌutumikˈia mˌabaˈali na mˌaaʃˈera.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli, hˈivjo ˌakawaˈuza na kˌuwatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈuʃan rˌiʃaθaˈimu mfˈalme wa arˈamu nˌaharaˈimu ambˈaje ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini jˌake wˌakimtˌumikˈia kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka minˈane.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˈake, hˈivjo akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakaˈenda vitˈani. bwˈana ˌakamtˈia kˈuʃan rˌiʃaθaˈimu mfˈalme wa arˈamu mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌoθniˈeli, nˌaje ˌakamʃˈinda.|0
hˈivjo ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa na amˈani kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, mpˈaka ˌoθniˈeli mwˈana wa kenˈazi ˌalipˌofarˈiki.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu mbˈele za bwˈana tˈena, kwa kˌuwa wˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu hˈajo bwˈana ˌakamtˈia ŋɡˈuvu eɡlˈoni mfˈalme wa moˈabu ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
eɡlˈoni ˌakawatˈaka wˌaamˈoni na wˌaamalˈeki wˌauŋɡˈane nˈaje, akˈaɟa kˌuiʃˌambulˈia ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakatwˈaa ˈm̩ɟi wa mitˈende.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wakˈawa tʃˈini ja eɡlˈoni mfˈalme wa moˈabu kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka kˈumi na minˈane.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamlilˈia tˈena bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakawˈapa mwokˈozi: ehˈudi, ˈm̩tu wa ʃˈoto, mwˈana wa ɡˈera, mbˌeɲamˈini. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakatˈuma kwa eɡlˈoni mfˈalme wa moˈabu uʃˈuru kwa mkˈono wa ehˈudi.|0
bˌasi ehˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza upˈaŋɡa wˌeɲe ˌukatˈao kuwˈili, urˈefu wˌake ni kˌama ðirˈaa mˈoɟa, ˌakaufˈuŋɡa upˈaŋɡa hˈuo ndˈani ja ŋɡˈuo jˌake kwˈeɲe pˈaɟa lˈake la mkˈono wa kuˈume.|0
ˌakamkabˈiði uʃˈuru eɡlˈoni mfˈalme wa moˈabu, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mnˈene sˈana.|0
baˌada ja ehˈudi kˌumkabˈiði ˈule uʃˈuru, wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameubˈeba hˈuo uʃˈuru ˌaliwˌaruhˈusu waˈende zˈao.|0
jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakafˌuatˈana nˌao hˌadi kwˈeɲe sanˈamu ja kutʃˈora kwˈeɲe mˈawe karˈibu na ɡilɡˈali, ndˈipo jˌeje ˌakarˈudi, ˌakafˈika kwa eɡlˈoni na kusˈema, ˈee mfˈalme, ninˈao uɟˈumbe wa sˈiri kwa aɟˈili jˈako. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, ɲˌamazˈeni kˈimja! nˌao wˈale wˌaliˌomhudumˈia wˈote wˌakamwˈatʃa, wˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe.|0
ndˈipo ehˈudi ˌakamsˌoɡelˈea ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti pˈeke jˌake kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ɟˈuu tʃa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme la maɟˈira ja kˌiaŋɡˈazi, na kusˈema, ninˈao uɟˈumbe kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈako. mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanainˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake.|0
ehˈudi ˌakaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto na kˌuufˈuta ˈule upˈaŋɡa ˌaliokˈuwa ˌameufˈuŋɡa kwˈeɲe pˈaɟa lˈake la kulˈia, ˌakamdˈuŋɡa mfˈalme eɡlˈoni tumbˈoni mwˈake.|0
hˌata mpˈini nˌao ˌukazˈama tumbˈoni pamˈoɟa na upˈaŋɡa weɲˈewe, nˌao upˈaŋɡa ˌukatokˈea mɡoŋɡˈoni mwˈake. ehˈudi hˌakuˌutʃomˈoa hˈuo upˈaŋɡa, nˈajo mafˈuta jˌakaʃˌikamˈana ɟˌuːja upˈaŋɡa.|0
ehˈudi ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe bˌarazˈani; ˌakamfuŋɡˈia milˈaŋɡo ja tʃˈumba tʃa ɟˈuu na kˌuifˈuŋɡa kwa fuŋɡˈuo.|0
baˌada ja kˌuondˈoka, wˌatumˈiʃi wakˈaɟa na kukˈuta milˈaŋɡo ja tʃˈumba tʃa ɟˈuu ˌimefˈuŋɡwa kwa fuŋɡˈuo. wˌakasˈema, bˌila ʃˈaka ˌameɟˌipumzˈiʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani tʃa ɲˈumba jˌake ja maɟˈira ja kˌiaŋɡˈazi.|0
wˌakaŋɡˈoɟa hˌata wakˈawa na faðˈaa, bˌasi wakˈati hˌakufuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo ja tʃˈumba, wˌakatʃukˈua fuŋɡˈuo na kˌuifuŋɡˈua. tazˈama wˌakaˈona bwˈana wˌao ˌamelˈala sˌakafˈuni, ˌamekˈufa.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa waŋɡˈali wˌanaŋɡˈoɟa, ehˈudi ˌakatorˈoka, ˌakapˈita hˈapo kwˈeɲe sanˈamu ja kutʃˈora kwˈeɲe mˈawe na kˌukimbilˈia seˈira.|0
ˌalipofˈika hˌuko, ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaterˈemka pamˈoɟa nˌaje kutˈoka vˌilimˈani, jˌeje akˈiwa ˌanawˌaoŋɡˈoza.|0
ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza, nˌifuatˈeni, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewatˈia moˈabu, adˈui zˈenu, mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. kwa hˈijo wˌakaterˈemka wˌakamfuˈata, wˌakaviʃˈika vivˈuko vja jordˈani kˌuelekˈea moˈabu, wˈala hˌawakuˈatʃa ˈm̩tu jejˈote kuvˈuka.|0
wakˈati hˈuo wˌakawaˈua wˌamoˈabu wˈatu waˈume wˌapatˈao kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na mˌaʃuɟˈaa; hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌetorˈoka.|0
sˈiku ˈile moˈabu wˌakaʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa na amˈani kwa miˈaka θˌemanˈini.|0
baˌada ja ehˈudi akˈaɟa ʃamɡˈari mwˈana wa anˈaθi, ˌalijˌewapˈiɡa wˌafilˈisti mˌiasˈita kwa fˈimbo ˌilijˌotʃoŋɡˈoka ja kˌuoŋɡozˈea ŋɡˈombe. nˌaje pˈia ˌakawˌaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja ehˈudi kˈufa, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa tˈena maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa jabˈini, mfˈalme wa kˌanaˈani, ˌalijˌetawˈala hˌuko hazˈori. ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi lˈake ˌalikˈuwa sisˈera, ˌalijeˈiʃi hˌuko hˌaroʃˈeθi hˌaɡojˈimu.|0
kwa kˌuwa sisˈera ˌalikˈuwa na maɡˈari ja tʃˈuma jˌapatˈajo mˌiatˈisa, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewatˈesa wˌaisraˈeli kwa ˌukatˈili kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana wˌakaˈomba msaˈada.|0
debˈora, nabˈii mwanˈamke, mkˈewe lˌapidˈoθi, n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaamˈua ˌisraˈeli wakˈati ˈule.|0
debˈora ˌalikˈuwa ˌakikˈeti tʃˈini ja mtˈende wa debˈora ˌuliokˈuwa kˈati ja rˈama na beθˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wakˈaɟa kwˈake ˌili ˌawaamˈue.|0
ˌakatˈuma wamwˈite barˈaka mwˈana wa ˌabinoˈamu kutˈoka kedˈeʃi hˌuko naftˈali na kˌumwambˈia, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌanakˌuaɡˈiza: nˈenda, tʃukˈua wˌanaˈume kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri tˌoka naftˈali na zˌabulˈoni, mwˈende mlˈima tabˈori.|0
nˌitamʃawˈiʃi sisˈera, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la jabˈini, pamˈoɟa na maɡˈari jˌake na ɟˈeʃi lˈake, hˌadi ˈm̩to kiʃˈoni na kumtˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈako..|0
barˈaka ˌakamwambˈia, ˌukiˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌami nˌitakwˈenda, lakˈini ˌusipokwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈami, sˌitakwˈenda.|0
debˈora ˌakamwambˈia, hakˈika nˌitakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈawe, lakˈini ɲɟˈia ˌunajˌoiendˈea hˌaitakˈupa heʃˈima wˈewe, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌatamtˈia sisˈera mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwanˈamke. hˈivjo debˈora ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na barˈaka mpˈaka kedˈeʃi.|0
mahˈali ambˈapo barˈaka ˌaliwaˈita zˌabulˈoni na naftˈali. wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌakamfuˈata barˈaka, na debˈora pˈia ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
bˌasi hebˈeri, mkˈeni, ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟitˈeŋɡa na wakˈeni weŋɡˈine, jaˈani, wazˈao wa hobˈabu, mkwˈewe mˈose, nˌaje ˌakapˈiɡa hˈema lˈake karˈibu na ˈule ˈm̩ti mkˈubwa wa mwalˈoni ˌuliˈoko sˌaananˈimu, karˈibu na kedˈeʃi.|0
sisˈera ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa barˈaka mwˈana wa ˌabinoˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈanda mlˈima tabˈori.|0
sisˈera ˌakakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa maɡˈari jˌake jˈote mˌiasˈita ja tʃˈuma na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kˌuanzˈia hˌaroʃˈeθi hˌaɡojˈimu mpˈaka ˈm̩to wa kiʃˈoni.|0
ndˈipo debˈora ˌakamwambˈia barˈaka, nˈenda! hˌii n̩dˈijo sˈiku ambˈajo bwˈana ˌamemtˈia sisˈera mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakukˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈako? hˈivjo barˈaka ˌakaʃˈuka kutˈoka mlˈima tabˈori, ˌakifuˈatwa na wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
bwˈana ˌakamfˌaðaˈiʃa sisˈera na maɡˈari jˌake jˈote, pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote kwa upˈaŋɡa mbˈele ja barˈaka, nˌaje sisˈera ˌakaliˈatʃa ɡˈari lˈake na kˌukimbˈia kwa miɡˈuu.|0
lakˈini barˈaka ˌakafuˈata maɡˈari pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi mpˈaka hˌaroʃˈeθi hˌaɡojˈimu. ɟˈeʃi lˈote la sisˈera lˌikaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌesalˈia.|0
sisˈera, hˌata hˈivjo, ˌakakimbˈia kwa miɡˈuu mpˈaka kwˈeɲe hˈema la jaˈeli, mkˈewe hebˈeri, mkˈeni, kwa sabˈabu pˌalikˈuwa na ˌuhusiˈano wa kˌirafˈiki kˈati ja jabˈini mfˈalme wa hazˈori na ukˈoo wa hebˈeri, mkˈeni.|0
jaˈeli ˌakaˈenda kumlˈaki sisˈera na kˌumwambˈia, karˈibu, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, karˈibu iŋɡˈia ndˈani kabˈisa. ˌusioɡˈope. bˌasi sisˈera ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hˈema ja jaˈeli, nˌaje ˌakamfunˈika kwa blaŋkˈeti nˈene.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, nˈina kˈiu, tˌafaðˈali nˈipe mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua. ndˈipo ˌakafuŋɡˈua kirˈiba tʃa mazˈiwa na kˈumpa akˈaɲua, kˈiʃa ˌakamfunˈika.|0
nˌaje sisˈera ˌakamwambˈia, simˈama mlaŋɡˈoni pa hˈema na ˈm̩tu jejˈote akˈiɟa na kˌukuulˈiza, ɟˈe, kˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote hˈapa? sˈema, hapˈana..|0
ndˈipo jaˈeli, mkˈewe hebˈeri, ˌakatwˈaa kiɡˈiŋɡi tʃa hˈema, ˌakatʃukˈua ɲˈundo mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌakamwendˈea pˌolepˈole, akˈiwa ˌamelˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi, akˈiwa ˌametʃˈoka. ˌakakˌiɡoŋɡomˈea kˈile kiɡˈiŋɡi kwˈeɲe pˈaɟi la ˈuso wˈake, kˌikapˈeɲa hˌata kˌuiŋɡˈia arðˈini, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
barˈaka ˌakakˌaribˈia ˌakimfˌuatˈia sisˈera, jaˈeli ˌakatˈoka kumlˈaki. ˌakamwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo, nˌitakˌuoɲˈeʃa ˈm̩tu ˌunajˌemtafˈuta. hˈivjo wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hˈema wakˈiwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na tazˈama sisˈera ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala hˈumo, akˈiwa ˌamekˈufa, na hˈitʃo kiɡˈiŋɡi tʃa hˈema kikˈiwa kˌimeɡˌoŋɡomˈewa kˌupitˈia pˈaɟi la ˈuso wˈake.|0
bˌasi sˈiku ˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌakamʃˈinda jabˈini, mfˈalme wa kˌanaˈani, mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌao mkˈono wa wˌaisraˈeli ˌukaˌendelˈea kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na zaˈidi ðˈidi ja jabˈini, mfˈalme wa kˌanaˈani, mpˈaka wˌakamwˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
ndˈipo debˈora na barˈaka mwˈana wa ˌabinoˈamu wˌakaˈimba wˈimbo hˈuu.|0
wakˈuu katˌika ˌisraˈeli wˌanapˌooŋɡˈoza, wakˈati wˈatu wˌanapˌoɟitˈoa kwa hiˈari jˈao weɲˈewe: mhˌimidˈini bwˈana.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈili, ˈeɲi wafˈalme! sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi wˌatawˈala! nˌitamwimbˈia bwˈana, nˌitaˈimba; kwa wˈimbo nˌitamhimˈidi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌulipotˈoka katˌika seˈiri, ˌulipopˈita katˌika maʃˈamba ja edˈomu, ˈn̩tʃi ˌilitˌetemˈeka, mbˈiŋɡu nˈazo zˌikamwˈaɡa, nˈaam, mawˈiŋɡu jˌakamwˈaɡa mˈaɟi.|0
milˈima ˌilitˌetemˈeka mbˈele za bwˈana, hˌata ˈule wa sinˈai, mbˈele za bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika sˈiku za ʃamɡˈari mwˈana wa anˈaθi, katˌika sˈiku za jaˈeli, bˌarabˈara kˈuu hˌazikˈuwa na wˈatu; wˌasafˈiri wˌalipˈita ɲɟˈia za kˈando.|0
mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌalikˈoma katˌika ˌisraˈeli, wˌalikˈoma mpˈaka mˈimi, debˈora, nˌilipˌoinˈuka, nˌilipˌoinˈuka kˌama mˈama katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌalipˌotʃaɡˈua miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni, vˈita vˌilikˈuɟa katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi, hˌapakˌuonekˈana ŋɡˈao wˈala mkˈuki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌaʃuɟˈaa ˌarobaˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu u pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌanaˌoɟitˈoa weɲˈewe kwa hiˈari jˈao mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu. mhˌimidˈini bwˈana.|0
nˌaɲi mpandˈao pˈunda weˈupe, mkikˈeti ɟˌuːja mˌatandˈiko ja θamˈani, nˌaɲi mtˌembeˈao bˌarabarˈani, fˌikirˈini.|0
ɟˌuːja saˈuti za wˌaimbˈaɟi mahˈali pa kˌuɲueʃˈea mˈaɟi. wˌanasˌimulˈia matˈendo ja hˈaki ja bwˈana, matˈendo ja hˈaki ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌake katˌika ˌisraˈeli. ndˈipo wˈatu wa bwˈana wˌalipˌoterˈemka mˌalaŋɡˈoni pa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˈamka, ˈamka! debˈora! ˈamka, ˈamka, uˈimbe! ˈee barˈaka! inˈuka, tʃukˈua matˈeka wˈako ˌuliˌowatˈeka, ˈee mwˈana wa ˌabinoˈamu..|0
ndˈipo mabˈaki ja wˈatu wˌakaʃˈuka ðˈidi ja wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, wˈatu wa bwˈana, wˌakaʃˈuka ðˈidi ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu wakˈaɟa wˈatu, ambˈao tʃimbˈuko lˈao ni ˌamalˈeki; bˌeɲamˈini akˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌaliˌokufuˈata. kutˈoka makˈiri wˌakaʃˈuka vˌioŋɡˈozi, na kutˈoka zˌabulˈoni wˈale wˌaʃikˈao fˈimbo ja ɟˌemadˈari.|0
wakˈuu wa ˌisakˈari wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na debˈora; nˈaam, ˌisakˈari ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na barˈaka, wakˈiɟa ɲˈuma jˌake kwa m̩bˈio wˌakiˌelekˈea bondˈeni. katˌika ɟamˈaa za rˌeubˈeni, pˌalikˈuwa na kˌuɟihˈoɟi kukˈubwa mojˈoni.|0
kwa nˈini ˌulikˈaa kˌatikˈati ja mazˈizi ja kondˈoo kˌusikilˈiza saˈuti ja filˈimbi zˌinazoˈita makˈundi? kwa ɟamˈaa za rˌeubˈeni, pˌalikˈuwa na kˌuɟihˈoɟi kukˈubwa mojˈoni.|0
ɡˌileˈadi ˌalikˈaa ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani. nˌaje dˈani, kwa nˈini ˌalikˈaa kwˈeɲe mˌerikˈebu sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi? aʃˈeri ˌalikˈaa kwa ˌutulˈivu ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari, ˌakikˈaa kwˈeɲe ɣˈuba zˌake ndˈoɡo.|0
wˈatu wa zˌabulˈoni wˌalihˌatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈao, vˌilevˈile nˌao wˈatu wa naftˈali.|0
wafˈalme wˌalikˈuɟa na kufˈaɲa vˈita; wafˈalme wa kˌanaˈani wˌalipiɡˈana hˌuko tˌaanˈaki karˈibu na mˈaɟi ja meɡˈido, lakˈini hˌawakˌutʃukˈua fˈeða wˈala ɲˈara.|0
kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ɲˈota zˌilipiɡˈana, ɲˈota kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˌake zˌilipiɡˈana na sisˈera.|0
ˈm̩to wa kiʃˈoni ˌuliwasˈomba, ˈule ˈm̩to wa zamˈani, ˈm̩to wa kiʃˈoni. sˈoŋɡa mbˈele, ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, kwa ˌuɟasˈiri.|0
ndˈipo kwˈato za farˈasi zˌikafˈaɲa mʃˈindo: farˈasi wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu huˈenda m̩bˈio kwa kˌurukarˈuka.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, merˈozi ˌalaanˈiwe. wˌalaanˈiwe wˈatu wˌake kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˈuɟa kˌumsaidˈia bwˈana, kˌumsaidˈia bwˈana ðˈidi ja hˈao wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu..|0
jaˈeli ˌabarikˈiwe kulˈiko wˌanawˈake wˈote, mkˈewe hebˈeri, mkˈeni, ˌabarikˈiwe kulˈiko wˌanawˈake wˈote wˌaiʃˈio kwˈeɲe mahˈema.|0
ˌaliˈomba mˈaɟi, nˌaje akˈampa mazˈiwa; kwˈeɲe bakˈuli la heʃˈima ˌakamletˈea mazˈiwa mɡˈando.|0
wˌanawˈake wˌeɲe busˈara kulˈiko weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌakamɟˈibu; nˈaam, husˈema mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
ɟˈe, hˌawapˈati na kˌuɡawˈaɲa ɲˈara: msitʃˈana mmˈoɟa ˌau wawˈili kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu, mavˈazi ja rˈaŋɡi mbˌalimbˈali kwa sisˈera kˌuwa ɲˈara, mavˈazi ja rˈaŋɡi mbˌalimbˈali jˌalijˌotarizˈiwa, mavˈazi jˌalijˌotarizˈiwa vizˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja ʃˈiŋɡo jˈaŋɡu: jˈote hˈaja jakˈiwa ɲˈara?.|0
adˈui zˈako wˈote na wˌaaŋɡamˈie, ˈee bwˈana! bˌali wˈote wˌakupendˈao na wˈawe kˌama ɟˈua lˌitʃomozˈavjo kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake. hˈivjo ˈn̩tʃi ikˈawa na amˈani kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa tˈena jalˈijo maˈovu mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌaje kwa miˈaka sˈaba bwˈana ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌamidiˈani.|0
mkˈono wa mˌidiˈani ukˈawa na ŋɡˈuvu ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli na kwa aɟˈili ja wˌamidiˈani, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea mahˈali pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa mˌilimˈani, kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo na ŋɡˈome.|0
kˈila wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipopˈanda mazˈao mˌaʃambˈani, wˌamidiˈani, wˌaamalˈeki na mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine ja mˌaʃarˈiki wˌalivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika maʃˈamba jˈao na kˌuharˈibu mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote hˌadi kˌufikˈia ɡˈaza, wˈala hˌawakuˈatʃa kiˈumbe tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo hˈai kwa wˌaisraˈeli, ˈiwe kondˈoo ˌau ŋɡˈombe ˌau pˈunda.|0
wˌalipˈanda na mifˈuɡo jˈao na mahˈema jˈao, mfˈano wa makˈundi ja nzˈiɡe. ˌilikˈuwa hˌaiwˌezekˈani kˌuwahesˈabu wˈatu na ŋɡamˈia zˈao; wˌakavamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ˌili kˌuiharˈibu.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲua kˌuwa maskˈini sˈana na wˌamidiˈani, hˌata ˌisraˈeli wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana kuˈomba msaˈada.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˌomlilˈia bwˈana kwa sabˈabu ja wˌamidiˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌapelekˈea nabˈii, ambˈaje ˌaliwˌaambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˌiliwˌapandˈiʃa mtˈoke mˈisri, tˌoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa.|0
nˌikawˌaɲakˈua kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wamˈisri na kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa watˈesi wˈenu wˈote. nˌikawˌafukˈuza watˈoke mbˈele jˈenu nˌami nˌikawˈapa nˈiɲi ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
nˌikawˌaambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu; msˌiiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu ja wˌaamˈori, ambˈajo mnakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao! lakˈini nˈiɲi hˌamkuitˈii saˈuti jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ˌakakˈeti tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni hˌuko ˈofra, ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa mˈali ja joˈaʃi, mwˌabiezˈeri, ambˈako ɡˌideˈoni mwanˈawe ˌalikˈuwa ˌakipepˈeta ŋɡˈano pˈeɲe ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamulˈia zabˈibu, ˌili kˌuifˈitʃa wˌamidiˈani wˌasiiˈone.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌalipˌomtokˈea ɡˌideˈoni, ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe, ˈewe ʃuɟˈaa mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈee bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kˌama bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈasi, mbˈona mˈambo hˈaja jˈote jˌametˌutokˈea? jˈako wˈapi bˌasi jˈale matˈendo jˌake makˈuu bˈaba zˈetu wˌalijˌotusˌimulˈia ɟˈuu jˌake wˌaliposˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakutˌupandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri? lakˈini sˈasa bwˈana ˌametuˈatʃa na kˌututˈia katˌika mkˈono wa mˌidiˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɡˌeukˈia na kusˈema enˈenda kwa uwˈezo wˈako hˈuu, ˌukawˌaokˈoe ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌamidiˈani. ɟˈe, si mˌimi nˌinajˌekutˈuma wˈewe.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaulˈiza, ˈee bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuwaokˈoa ˌisraˈeli? ukˈoo wˈaŋɡu n̩dˈio ðaˈifu kulˈiko zˈote katˌika manˈase, nˌami n̩dˈije mdˈoɡo wa wˈote katˌika ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌawe ˌutawapˈiɡa wˌamidiˈani kˈana kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa ni ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama bˌasi nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, nˈipe iʃˈara kˌuoɲˈeʃa kwˈeli kwˌamba ni wˌewe ˌunajesˈema nˈami.|0
tˌafaðˈali nˌinakuˈomba ˌusiondˈoke hˈapa mpˈaka nˌitakˌaporˈudi na kˌukuletˈea sadˈaka jˈaŋɡu na kˌuiwˈeka mbˈele jˈako. nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, nˌitaŋɡˈoɟa mpˈaka ˌutakˌaporˈudi.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˌake na kˌuandˈaa mwˌanambˈuzi pamˈoɟa na kuˈoka mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kˌutokˈana na ˈefa mˈoɟa ja ˈuŋɡa. ˌakawˈeka ɲˈama kwˈeɲe kikˈapu na mtʃˈuzi kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu, ˌakamletˈea hˈujo mˌalaˈika hˈapo ɲɟˈe tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni na kˈumpa.|0
mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, itwˈae ɲˈama na mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, ˌuviwˈeke ɟˌuːja mwˈamba hˈuu na ˌumimˈine hˈuo mtʃˈuzi ɟˈuu jˈake. ɡˌideˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakaˌiɲoˈoʃa fˈimbo ˌilijokˈuwa mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˈn̩tʃa jˌake ˌikaɡˈusa ˈile ɲˈama na ˈile mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, nˌao mˈoto ˌukatˈoka kwˈeɲe mwˈamba ˌukatˌeketˈeza ˈile ɲˈama na ˈile mikˈate. mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakatowˈeka kutˈoka matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌalipˌotambˈua kˌuwa ni mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, ˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele kwa mʃaŋɡˈao, ˌakasˈema, ˈole wˈaŋɡu, bwˈana mweɲˈezi! kwa kˌuwa nˌimemwˈona mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˈuso kwa ˈuso.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, amˈani ˈiwe kwˈako! ˌusioɡˈope. hˌutakˈufa.|0
hˈivjo ɡˌideˈoni ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu mahˈali pˈale na kˌupaˈita, jehˈova ʃˈalom. mpˈaka lˈeo ˌiŋɡalˈipo ˌimesimˈama hˌuko ˈofra ja wˌaabˌiezˈeri.|0
usˈiku ˈule ˈule bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, mtʃukˈue ŋɡˈombe dˈume wa bˈaba jˈako, jaˈani, jˈule wa pˈili mwˌeɲe miˈaka sˈaba, na ˌubomˈoe mˌaðabˈahu ja baˈali alˈijo nˈajo bˈaba jˈako, na ˌukaikˈate aʃˈera ilˈijo karˈibu nˈajo.|0
kˈiʃa mɟeŋɡˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, mˌaðabˈahu halˈisi, kwa tˌaratˈibu zˈake, ɟˌuːja hˈuu mwˈamba. kwa kˌutumˈia kˈuni za hˈijo ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera ˌulijˌoikˌatakˈata, m̩tˈoe sadˈaka hˈujo dˈume wa pˈili kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
bˌasi ɡˌideˈoni ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake kˈumi na kufˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwambˈia. lakˈini kwa kˌuwa ˌaliwˌaoɡˈopa ɟamˈaa jˌake na wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakafˈaɲa hˈaja usˈiku badˈala ja mtʃˈana.|0
wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌalipoˈamka ˌasubˈuhi, tazˈama mˌaðabˈahu ja baˈali ˌimebˌomolˈewa na ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera ˌilijokˈuwa karˈibu nˈajo ˌimekˌatwakˈatwa na jˈule ŋɡˈombe wa pˈili ˌametolˈewa sadˈaka ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˌalijoɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja.|0
wˌakaˌulizˈana, ni nˈani ˌalijetˈenda mˈambo hˈaja? wˌalipˌotʃuŋɡˈuza kwa makˈini, wˌakaambˈiwa, ni ɡˌideˈoni mwˈana wa joˈaʃi, n̩dˈije ˌalitˈenda hˈivi.|0
wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakamwambˈia joˈaʃi, mlˈete mwanˈao hˈapa. ni lazˈima ˈafe, kwa sabˈabu ˌamebomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu ja baˈali na kˌukatakˈata ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera ˌilijokˈuwa karˈibu nˈajo.|0
lakˈini joˈaʃi ˌakaˌuambˈia ˈule umˈati ˌuliokˈuwa ˌumezuŋɡˈuka ukˈiwa kiɲˈume nˈaje, ɟˈe, nˈiɲi mtˌamtetˈea baˈali? mnˌaɟarˈibu kˌumwokˈoa? jejˈote mwˌeɲe kˌumpiɡanˈia ˌatauˈawa kˌufikˈia kˈeʃo ˌasubˈuhi! kˌama baˈali ni mˈuŋɡu kwˈeli, ˌanawˈeza kˌuɟitetˈea mweɲˈewe wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌanapˌobomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu jˈake.|0
bˌasi sˈiku ˈile wˌakamwˈita ɡˌideˈoni jˈerub baˈali, jaˈani, baˈali na ˌaʃindˈane nˈaje, kwa sabˈabu ˌalibomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu jˈake.|0
bˌasi wˌamidiˈani wˈote, wˌaamalˈeki na mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine ja mˌaʃarˈiki wˌakaˌuŋɡanˈiʃa maɟˈeʃi jˈao, wˌakavˈuka ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani na kupˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika bˈonde la jˌezreˈeli.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈia ɡˌideˈoni, ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, ˌakiwaˈita wˌaabˌiezˈeri ˌili wˌamfuˈate.|0
ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe waˈende katˌika manˈase jˈote, ˌakiwatˈaka wˌatʃukˈue silˈaha na pˈia katˌika aʃˈeri, zˌabulˈoni na naftˈali, nˌao wˌakakwˈea ˌili kˌukutˈana nˈao.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, kˌama ˌutawˌaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli kwa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌulivjˌoahˈidi.|0
tazˈama, nˌitawˈeka ŋɡˈozi ja kondˈoo kwˈeɲe kiwˈaɲɟa tʃa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka, na kˌama ˌutakuwˈepo umˈande ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈozi tˈu, nˈajo ˈarði jˈote ikˈiwa kˈavu, ndˈipo nˌitakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa ˌutaokˈoa ˌisraˈeli kwa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌulivjosˈema.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌilivjˌotokˈea. ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema kˈeʃo jˈake, ˌakaˌikamˈua ˈile ŋɡˈozi, umˈande ˌukatˈoka, mˈaɟi ja kuɟˈaa bakˈuli.|0
kˈiʃa ɡˌideˈoni ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, ˌusinˌikasˌirikˈie. nˌinaˈomba nifˈaɲe ˈombi mˈoɟa liŋɡˈine. nˌiruhˈusu nifˈaɲe ɟˌaribˈio ɟiŋɡˈine mˈoɟa kwa ŋɡˈozi hˌii. wakˈati hˈuu ˌuifˈaɲe ŋɡˈozi hˌii kˈavu na ˈarði jˈote ˌifunˈikwe na umˈande.|0
usˈiku ˈule mˈuŋɡu ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. ŋɡˈozi ˈile ˌilikˈuwa kˈavu, nˈajo ˈarði jˈote ˌikafunˈikwa na umˈande.|0
ndˈipo jˈerub baˈali jaˈani ɡˌideˈoni na lˈile ɟˈeʃi lˌililokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˌakaondˈoka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema na kupˈiɡa kˈambi kˈando ja tʃemtʃˈemi ja harˈodi. kˈambi ja wˌamidiˈani ˌilikˈuwa kˌaskazˈini jˈao katˌika bˈonde karˈibu na kilˈima tʃa mˈore.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, ɟˈeʃi lilˈilo pamˈoɟa nˌawe ni kˈubwa sˈana kwa mˌimi kˌuwatˈia wˌamidiˈani mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. ˌili kwˌamba ˌisraˈeli asˈiɟe ˌakaɟisˈifu ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌakisˈema, mkˈono wˈaŋɡu n̩dˈio ˌuliˌoniokˈoa.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈasa taŋɡˈaza ɟˈeʃi lˈote likˈiwa lˌinasikˈia, kwˌamba: jejˈote ˌanajˌeoɡˈopa na kˌutetemˈeka, jˌeje na arˈudi ɲumbˈani, ˌaondˈoke katˌika mlˈima ɡˌileˈadi.  hˈivjo wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌalirˈudi, wˌakabˈaki kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, idˈadi ja ɟˈeʃi bˈado ni kˈubwa. wˌapelˈeke tʃˈini katˌika mˈaɟi nˌami nˌitawˌaɟarˈibu hˌuko kwa aɟˈili jˈako. kˌama nˌikikˌuambˈia, hˈuju ˌatakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈawe, jˌeje ˌatakwˈenda; lakˈini kˌama nˌikisˈema, hˈuju hˌatakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈawe, jˌeje hˌatakwˈenda.|0
hˈivjo ɡˌideˈoni ˌakalilˈeta lˈile ɟˈeʃi tʃˈini kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, watˈeŋɡe upˈande mmˈoɟa wˈale wˈote wˌaɲuˈao mˈaɟi kwa ulˈimi, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩bwa ˌaɲuˈavjo, wˈale wˈote wˌapiɡˈao maɡˈoti ˌili kˈuɲua wˌakipelˈeka mikˈono jˈao vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao, wawˈeke upˈande mwiŋɡˈine.|0
idˈadi ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuɲua kwa kurˈamba rˈamba wˌalikˈuwa mˌiatˈatu, lakˈini weŋɡˈine wˈote katˌika ɟˈeʃi wˌalipˈiɡa maɡˈoti ˌili kˈuɲua.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, kwa hˈao wˈatu mˌiatˈatu wˌaliorˈamba mˈaɟi nˌitawˌaokˈoa nˈiɲi, nˌami nˌitawatˈia wˌamidiˈani mkonˈoni mwˈako. waˈatʃe hˈao wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote warˈudi kˈila mmˈoɟa ɲumbˈani mwˈake.|0
hˈivjo ɡˌideˈoni ˌakawaˈatʃa wˈale wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine kˈila mmˈoɟa aˈende kwˈeɲe hˈema jˈake. ˌakabakˈia na wˈale mˌiatˈatu, ambˈao wˌalitʃukˈua vjakˈula na tˌarumbˈeta za wˈale wenzˈao. bˌasi kˈambi ja wˌamidiˈani ˌilikˈuwa tʃˈini jˌake bondˈeni.|0
usˈiku ˈule ˈule bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, ondˈoka, uʃˈuke kambˈini, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeitˈia mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌunaoɡˈopa kˌuʃambulˈia, ʃˈuka kambˈini pamˈoɟa na mtumˈiʃi wˈako pˈura.|0
nˌawe sˌikilˈiza wˌanajosˈema. hˌatimˈaje, ˌutatˈiwa mˈojo kˌuʃambulˈia kˈambi. bˌasi jˌeje na pˈura mtumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakaʃˈuka na kˌufikˈia walˈinzi wa mbˈele wˌeɲe silˈaha wˌaliokˈuwa ˈm̩le kambˈini.|0
wˌamidiˈani, wˌaamalˈeki na mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote ja mˌaʃarˈiki wˌalikˈaa bondˈeni, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa mfˈano wa nzˈiɡe kwa wˈiŋɡi wˈao. ŋɡamˈia zˈao hˌazikˌuhesabˈika, wˈiŋɡi wˌao ˌulikˈuwa kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌalifˈika wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo kukˈiwa na ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanamwelˈeza mwenzˈake ndˈoto jˈake, ˌakisˈema, nˌiliˈota ndˈoto: tazˈama mkˈate wa ʃajˈiri ˌuliˌoviriŋɡˈana ˌuliaŋɡˈuka katˌika kˈambi mˈoɟa ja wˌamidiˈani, ˌukaipˈiɡa na ˌikaaŋɡˈuka nˌao ˌukaˌipindˈua ɟˈuu tʃˈini na hˈema ˌikapˌoromˈoka tʃˈini.|0
rafˈiki jˌake ˌakamɟˈibu, habˈari hˌii si kˈitu kiŋɡˈine zaˈidi ja upˈaŋɡa wa ɡˌideˈoni mwˈana wa joˈaʃi, mwˌisraˈeli. mˈuŋɡu ˌamewatˈia wˌamidiˈani na ɟˈeʃi lˈote mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌalipˌoisikˈia hˈijo ndˈoto na tafsˈiri jˈake, ˌakamwabˈudu mˈuŋɡu. ˌakarˈudi kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja ˌisraˈeli na kusˈema, ˌinukˈeni! bwˈana ˌamelitˈia ɟˈeʃi la wˌamidiˈani mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
ˌakawaɡˈawa wˈale wˈatu mˌiatˈatu katˌika makˈundi matˈatu, ˌakawˌakabˈiði tˌarumbˈeta mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao wˈote na mitˈuŋɡi ˌisijokˈuwa na mˈaɟi jˌeɲe miˈeŋɡe ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˌitazamˈeni, faɲˈeni kˌama nˌitakˌavjofˈaɲa, nˌitakˌapofˈika mwˈiʃo wa kˈambi mfˈaɲe kˌama nˌitakˌavjofˈaɲa.|0
wakˈati mˌimi na wˈale walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌami wˈote, tˌutakˌapopˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta zˈetu, nˈiɲi nˌaɲi piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta pˈande zˈote za kˈambi na mpˈiɡe kelˈele, msˈeme, upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana na wa ɡˌideˈoni..|0
ɡˌideˈoni na wˈale wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟa wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakafˈika mwˈiʃo wa kˈambi usˈiku mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa zˈamu ja kˈati, mˈara tu wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamebadˈili zˈamu. wˌakapˈiɡa zˈile tˌarumbˈeta zˈao na kuvˈuɲɟa ˈile mitˈuŋɡi ˌilijokˈuwa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
jˈale makˈundi matˈatu jˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na kuvˈuɲɟa mitˈuŋɡi. wˌakaʃˈika miˈeŋɡe kwa mikˈono jˈao ja kuʃˈoto na katˌika mikˈono jˈao ja kuˈume tˌarumbˈeta ˌili kˌuzipˈiɡa, wˌakapˈaza saˈuti zˈao, upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana na wa ɡˌideˈoni.|0
wˌakasimˈama kˈila ˈm̩tu mahˈali pˈake kˌuizuŋɡˈuka kˈambi pˈande zˈote, wˌamidiˈani wˈote wˌakakimbˈia, hˈuku wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
wˌalipˌozipˈiɡa zˈile tˌarumbˈeta mˌiatˈatu, bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa wˈatu katˌika kˈambi jˈote kˌuɡeˌuziˈana upˈaŋɡa kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈiwe. ɟˈeʃi lˌikakimbˈia mpˈaka bˈeθ ʃˈita kˌuelekˈea serˈera hˌadi mpakˈani ˌm̩wa ˈabel mehˈola karˈibu na tabˈaθi.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˈitwa kutˈoka naftˈali, aʃˈeri na manˈase, wˌakawˌafuatˈia wˌamidiˈani.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu ˌakisˈema, tˌeremkˈeni ðˈidi ja wˌamidiˈani na mkˌazuˈie vivˈuko vja mˈaɟi mbˈele jˈao hˌadi bˈeθ bˈara na pˈia jordˈani. hˈivjo wˈatu wˈote wa ˌefraˈimu wˌakakˌutanˈika pamˈoɟa na kˌuziŋɡˈira ˈm̩to wa jordˈani hˌadi bˈeθ bˈara.|0
wˌakawˌakamˈata wakˈuu wawˈili wa mˌidiˈani, orˈebu na zeˈebu. wˌakamˌuulˈia orˈebu pˈale pˈeɲe mwˈamba wa orˈebu, na zeˈebu wˌakamˌuulˈia pˈeɲe ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamulˈia divˈai la zeˈebu. wˌakawˌafuatˈia wˌamidiˈani na kulˈeta vˈitʃwa vja orˈebu na zeˈebu kwa ɡˌideˈoni, hˌuko ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani.|0
bˌasi wˌaefraˈimu wˌakamˌuulˈiza ɡˌideˈoni, mbˈona mmˌetutˈenda hˈivi? kwa nˈini hˌukutuˈita ˌulipokwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana na wˌamidiˈani? wˌakawˌalaˈumu kwa ukˈali sˈana.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakawaɟˈibu, nˌilitʃofˈaɲa mˌimi ni nˈini kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃa na kˈile nˈiɲi mlˌitʃofˈaɲa? ɟˈe, kˌuokˈoa masˈazo ja zabˈibu za ˌefraˈimu si bˈora kulˈiko mavˈuno kamˈili ja zabˈibu ja ˌabiezˈeri.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌamewatˈia orˈebu na zeˈebu, hˈao vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌamidiˈani, mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. ɟˈe, mˌimi nˌiliwˈeza kufˈaɲa nˈini kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃa na mlˌitʃofˈaɲa nˈiɲi? ˌaliposˈema hˈili, hasˈira jˈao ðˈidi jˌake ˌikatulˈia.|0
ɡˌideˈoni akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈatu mˌiatˈatu wˌaliˌofuatˈana nˈaje, wakˈiwa wˌametʃˈoka na wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa lakˈini bˈado wˌakiwˌafuatˈia, wˌakafˈika jordˈani na kˌuuvˈuka.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wa sukˈoθi, tˌafaðˈali lˌipatiˈeni ɟˈeʃi lˈaŋɡu mikˈate, kwa maˈana wˌametʃˈoka, nˌami niŋɡˈali nˌinawˌafuatˈia zˈeba na salmˈuna, wafˈalme wa mˌidiˈani.|0
lakˈini mˌaafˈisa wa sukˈoθi wˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, mikˈono ja zˈeba na salmˈuna tajˈari m̩nˈajo sˈasa ˌili tuwˈeze kˌulipatˈia ɟˈeʃi lˈako mikˈate.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa aɟˈili ja hˌilo tˈu, bwˈana ˌatakˌapowatˈia zˈeba na salmˈuna mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌitaitʃˈana ɲˈama ja miˈili jˈenu kwˈeɲe miˈiba ja ɲikˈani na kwˈeɲe mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo ˌalikwˈea mpˈaka pˌeniˈeli na kutˈoa ˈombi lˈile lˈile, lakˈini nˌao wˈatu wa pˌeniˈeli wˌakamɟˈibu kˌama wˈatu wa sukˈoθi wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamemɟˈibu.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wa pˌeniˈeli, nˌitakˌaporˈudi baˌada ja kuʃˈinda, nˌitaˌubomˈoa mnˈara hˈuu.|0
bˌasi ɡˌideˈoni ˌakakwˈea kwa ɲɟˈia ja wˌasafˈiri mˌaʃarˈiki ja nˈoba na joɡbˈeha na kˌuliʃˌambulˈia ɟˈeʃi ambˈalo hˌalikuʃˈuku lolˈote.|0
zˈeba na salmˈuna, hˈao wafˈalme wawˈili wa mˌidiˈani, wˌakakimbˈia lakˈini jˌeje ɡˌideˈoni ˌakawˌafuˈata na kˌuwakamˈata, ˌakaliʃˈinda hˌilo ɟˈeʃi lˈao lˈote.|0
ɡˌideˈoni mwˈana wa joˈaʃi ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka vitˈani kwa kˌupitˈia mwinˈuko wa herˈesi.|0
ˌakamkamˈata kiɟˈana mmˈoɟa wa sukˈoθi na kˌumuulˈiza maswˈali, nˌaje jˈule kiɟˈana ˌakamwˌandikˈia maɟˈina ja mˌaafˈisa sabˈini wa sukˈoθi, ambˈao ni vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ndˈipo ɡˌideˈoni akˈaɟa na kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu wa sukˈoθi, tazˈama, hˈapa wˈapo zˈeba na salmˈuna mlˌionˌisimˈaŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈao mkisˈema, ɟˈe, mikˈono ja zˈeba na salmˈuna tajˈari m̩nˈajo sˈasa ˌili tuwˈeze kˌulipatˈia ɟˈeʃi lˈako mikˈate?.|0
ˌakawˌatʃukˈua hˈao vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuwafundˈiʃa wˈatu wa sukˈoθi sˈomo kwa kˌuwaaðˈibu kwa miˈiba na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma ja ɲikˈani.|0
pˈia ˌakaˌubomˈoa mnˈara wa pˌeniˈeli na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaulˈiza zˈeba na salmˈuna, ni wˈatu wa aˈina ɡˈani mlˌiowaˈua hˌuko tabˈori? wˌakaɟˈibu, ni wˈatu kˌama wˈewe, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao akˈiwa na nafˈasi ja uˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, hˈao wˌalikˈuwa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, wˈana wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu hˈasa. hakˈika kˌama ˌaiʃˈivjo bwˈana, kˌama mŋɡekˈuwa mmˌewaˈatʃa hˈai, mˌimi nˌisiŋɡˌewaˈua nˈiɲi.|0
ˌakamɡˌeukˈia jeθˈeri, mwanˈawe mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, ˌakasˈema, waˈue hˈawa! lakˈini jeθˈeri hˌakuufˈuta upˈaŋɡa wˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌalioɡˈopa, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa bˈado kiɟˈana mdˈoɡo tˈu.|0
zˈeba na salmˈuna wˌakasˈema, ɲɟˈoo ufˈaɲe hˈivjo wˌewe mweɲˈewe. alˈivjo ˈm̩tu, ndˈivjo zilˈivjo ŋɡˈuvu zˈake.  hˈivjo ɡˌideˈoni ˌakatˈoka mbˈele na kˌuwaˈua, nˌaje ˌakajˌaondˈoa mapˈambo kwˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo za ŋɡamˈia zˈao.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamwambˈia ɡˌideˈoni, ˌututawˈale, wˈewe, wanˈao na wˈana wa wˈana wˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumetˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌamidiˈani.|0
lakˈini ɡˌideˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, mˌimi sˌitatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈenu, wˈala wanˈaŋɡu hˌawatˌatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈenu. bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetawˈala ɟˈuu jˈenu nˈiɲi.|0
nˌaje ˌakasˈema, ninˈalo ˈombi mˈoɟa, kwˌamba kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanipatˈie kipˈuli kutˈoka kwˈeɲe fˈuŋɡu lˈake la ɲˈara. ˌilikˈuwa destˈuri ja wˌaiʃmaˈeli kuvˈaa vipˈuli vja ðahˈabu..|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, tˌutafurˈahi kˌuvitˈoa. hˈivjo wˌakatˈanda vˈazi tʃˈini na kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌakatupˈia ɟˈuu jˌake pˈete kutˈoka kwˈeɲe fˈuŋɡu lˈake la ɲˈara.|0
uzˈito wa pˈete za ðahˈabu ˌalizoˈomba zˌilifikˈia ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,mˌiasˈaba, bˌila kˌuhesˈabu mapˈambo meŋɡˈine, pˈete za mˌasikˈio na mavˈazi ja zˌambarˈau jˌalijˌovalˈiwa na wafˈalme wa mˌidiˈani, ˌau mikˈufu ˌilijokˈuwa kwˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo za ŋɡamˈia zˈao.|0
ɡˌideˈoni ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza kˌisibˈau kwa kˌutumˈia ˈile ðahˈabu, ambˈatʃo ˌalikiwˈeka katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈake, jaˈani, ˈofra. wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakafˈaɲa ˌuaʃerˈati kwa kˌukiabˈudu hˌuko, nˈatʃo kikˈawa mtˈeɡo kwa ɡˌideˈoni na ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
hˈivjo mˌidiˈani ˌikaʃˈindwa mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli nˈajo hˌaikˌuinˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈake tˈena. wakˈati wa sˈiku za uhˈai wa ɡˌideˈoni, ˈn̩tʃi ˌikafˌurahˈia amˈani miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
jˈerub baˈali mwˈana wa joˈaʃi ˌakarˈudi kwˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sabˈini wa kwˈake mweɲˈewe, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa na wˌake wˈeŋɡi.|0
surˈia wˈake, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko ʃekˈemu, pˈia ˌalimzalˈia mwˈana, ambˈaje ˌalimwˈita ˌabimelˈeki.|0
ɡˌideˈoni mwˈana wa joˈaʃi akˈafa akˈiwa na ˈumri mzˈuri wa uzˈee, na ˌakazˈikwa katˌika kabˈuri la joˈaʃi bˈaba jˌake hˌuko ˈofra ja wˌaabˌiezˈeri.|0
mˈara tu ˌalipˌofarˈiki ɡˌideˈoni, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakarudˈia hˈali ja uˈovu na kufˈaɲa ˌuaʃerˈati kwa kˌuabˈudu mˌabaˈali. wˌakamsˌimamˈiʃa bˈaal berˈiθi kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu wˌao na.|0
wˈala hˌawakˌumkumbˈuka bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, ˌalijˌewaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao wˈote kutˈoka kˈila upˈande.|0
pˈia wˌakaʃˈindwa kˌuitendˈea mˈema ɟamˈaa ja jˈerub baˈali jaˈani ɡˌideˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja mˈambo jˈote mˈema ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌabimelˈeki mwˈana wa jˈerub baˈali ˌakaˈenda kwa ndˈuɡu ja mˈama jˌake hˌuko ʃekˈemu na kˌuwaambˈia jˌeje na ukˈoo wˈote wa mˈama jˈake.|0
wˌaulizˈeni wˈatu wˈote wa ʃekˈemu, lˈipi lilˈilo bˈora kwˈenu: kˌutawalˈiwa na wˈana wˈote sabˈini wa jˈerub baˈali, ˌau ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa pˈeke jˈake? kˌumbukˈeni kwˌamba, mˌimi ni mfˈupa wˈenu ɲˈama jˈenu hˈasa.|0
ndˈuɡu za mˈama jˌake wˌalipˌowaelˈeza wˈatu wˈote wa ʃekˈemu, wˌakaˌelekˈea kˌumkubˈali ˌabimelˈeki, kwa kˌuwa wˌalisˈema, jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈetu.|0
wakˈampa ʃekˈeli sabˈini za fˈeða kutˈoka hekˈalu la bˈaal berˈiθi, nˌaje ˌabimelˈeki ˌakaˌitumˈia kˌuaɟˈiri wˈatu ˈovjo wˌasioɟˈali, wakˈawa n̩dˈio wˌafuˈasi wˈake.|0
ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˌake hˌuko ˈofra, na ɟˌuːja ɟˈiwe mˈoɟa wˌakawaˈua ndˈuɡu zˌake sabˈini, ambˈao ni wˈana wa jˈerub baˈali. lakˈini joθˈamu, mwˈana mdˈoɡo wa wˈote wa jˈerub baˈali, ˌakaokˈoka kwa kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˈote wa ʃekˈemu na bˈeθ mˈilo wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti mkˈubwa wa mwalˈoni pˈeɲe ŋɡˈuzo ˌilijˈoko ʃekˈemu wˌakamvˈika ˌabimelˈeki tˈaɟi kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
joθˈamu ˌalipˌoambˈiwa hˈajo, ˌakapˈanda ɟˌuːja kilˈele tʃa mlˈima ɡˌerizˈimu, ˌakawˌapazˈia saˈuti jˌake ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˌisikˌilizˈeni ˈeɲi wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu, ˌili mˈuŋɡu nˌaje apˈate kˌuwasˌikilˈiza nˈiɲi.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa mˈiti ˌilitˈoka ˌili kwˈenda kˌuɟitˌawazˈia mfˈalme. ˌikaˌuambˈia mzˌeitˈuni, wˌewe ˈuwe mfˈalme wˈetu..|0
lakˈini mzˌeitˈuni ˌukaiɟˈibu, ɟˈe, niˈatʃe kutˈoa mafˈuta jˈaŋɡu ambˈajo kwˈake miˈuŋɡu na wˌanadˈamu hˌuheʃimˈiwa, ˌili nikˈawe ɟˌuːja mˈiti?.|0
kˈiʃa mˈiti ˌikaˌuambˈia mtˈini, ɲɟˈoo na ˈuwe mfˈalme wˈetu!.|0
lakˈini mtˈini ˌukaiɟˈibu, ɟˈe, niˈatʃe kutˈoa matˈunda jˈaŋɡu mazˈuri na matˈamu, ˌili niˈende nikˈawe ɟˌuːja mˈiti?.|0
ndˈipo mˈiti ˌikaˌuambˈia mzabˈibu, ɲɟˈoo na ˈuwe mfˈalme wˈetu..|0
lakˈini mzabˈibu ˌukaiɟˈibu, ɟˈe, niˈatʃe kutˈoa divˈai jˈaŋɡu ˌinajˌofurahˈiʃa miˈuŋɡu na wˌanadˈamu ˌili nikˈawe ɟˌuːja mˈiti?.|0
mwiʃˈoni mˈiti jˈote ˌikaˌuambˈia ˈm̩ti wa miˈiba, ɲɟˈoo na ˈuwe mfˈalme wˈetu..|0
nˌao ˈm̩ti wa miˈiba ˌukaiɟˈibu, kˌama kwˈeli mnatˈaka nˈiwe mfˈalme wˈenu, bˌasi ɲɟoˈoni mpˈate kˌupumzˈika tʃˈini ja kivˈuli tʃˈaŋɡu. lakˈini kˌama sˈivjo, mˈoto na utˈoke kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti wa miˈiba ˌukatˌeketˈeze mˌierˈezi ja lˌebanˈoni!.|0
bˌasi ikˈiwa mmetˈenda kwa ˌuaminˈifu na heʃˈima kumfˈaɲa ˌabimelˈeki kˌuwa mfˈalme, na kˌama mmˌetendˈea vjˈema jˈerub baˈali na ɟamˈaa jˌake kˌama ˌilivjˌostahˈili.|0
kwa kˌuwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwˌapiɡanˈia nˈiɲi na kˌuhatarˈiʃa nˈafsi jˌake na kˌuwaokˈoa nˈiɲi kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌamidiˈani.|0
lakˈini lˈeo mmeˈasi ðˈidi ja ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, na kˌuwaˈua wanˈawe sabˈini ɟˌuːja ɟˈiwe mˈoɟa, nˌaɲi mkamfˈaɲa ˌabimelˈeki mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mtˈumwa kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ʃekˈemu, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈenu.|0
nˌaɲi kˌama bˌasi mmˌemtendˈea jˈerub baˈali na ɟamˈaa jˌake kwa heʃˈima na ˌuaminˈifu, bˌasi ˌabimelˈeki na ˈawe furˈaha jˈenu, nˌaɲi ˈm̩we furˈaha jˌake pˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌama sˈivjo, mˈoto na utˈoke kwa ˌabimelˈeki na ˌuwatˌeketˈeze, nˈiɲi wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu na bˈeθ mˈilo, nˌao mˈoto utˈoke kwˈenu, wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu na bˈeθ mˈilo ˌumteketˈeze ˌabimelˈeki.|0
ndˈipo joθˈamu ˌakakimbˈia, ˌakatorˈoka ˌakaˈenda beˈeri, ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimwoɡˈopa ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌabimelˈeki.|0
baˌada ja ˌabimelˈeki kˌutawˈala ˌisraˈeli kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka mitˈatu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakaruhˈusu rˈoho m̩bˈaja kˈati ja ˌabimelˈeki na wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu, nˌao wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu wˌakamtendˈea ˌabimelˈeki kwa hˈila.|0
hˈili lˌilitokˈea ˌili ˈule ˌukatˈili wˌaliˌotendˈewa hˈao wˈana sabˈini wa jˈerub baˈali ˌupatilˈizwe, na dˈamu jˈao ˈiwe ɟˌuːja ˌabimelˈeki ndˈuɡu jˈao ˌalijˌewaˈua, na pˈia ˈiwe ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu, ambˈao wˌalimsˌaidˈia kuˈua ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
hˈivjo, kˌutokˈana na ˌuadˈui ɟˈuu jˌake wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu wˌakawˈeka wˈatu wa kˌumvizˈia katˌika vilˈele vja milˈima. wˌakawˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲa wˈatu wˈote wˌaliopˈita karˈibu nˈao, nˈajo hˈaja jˌakaˌarifˈiwa kwa ˌabimelˈeki.|0
bˌasi ɡaˈali mwˈana wa ebˈedi ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌakaiŋɡˈia ʃekˈemu, nˌao wˈatu wa hˌuko wˌakamtˌumainˈia jˈeje.|0
wˌakaˈenda mˌaʃambˈani m̩wˈao kuvˈuna zabˈibu na kˌuzisindˈika hˈizo zabˈibu, wˌakafˈaɲa sˌikukˈuu katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈao. wakˈati wakˈila na kˈuɲua, wˌakamlaˈani ˌabimelˈeki.|0
ɡaˈali mwˈana wa ebˈedi ˌakasˈema, ˌabimelˈeki ni nˈani, na ʃekˈemu ni nˈani, hˌata tˌumtumikˈie? ɟˈe, jˌeje si mwˈana wa jˈerub baˈali? nˌaje zebˈuli si n̩dˈije msˌaidˈizi wˈake? bˌasi wˌatumˌikiˈeni wˈatu wa hamˈori, babˈaje ʃekˈemu. kwa nˈini tˌumtumikˈie ˌabimelˈeki.|0
laˈiti wˈatu hˈawa wˌaŋɡekˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˈamri jˈaŋɡu! bˌasi mˌimi nˌiŋɡemwondˈoa hˈujo ˌabimelˈeki. nˌiŋɡemwambˈia ˌabimelˈeki, ondˈoa ɟˈeʃi lˈako lˈote..|0
zebˈuli ˌalijekˈuwa mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌalipˌosikˈia ˌalijosˈema ɡaˈali mwˈana wa ebˈedi, ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana.|0
ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe uˈende kwa ˌabimelˈeki kwa sˈiri na kusˈema, ɡaˈali mwˈana wa ebˈedi na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌamekˈuɟa ʃekˈemu, na wˌanaˌutʃotʃˈea ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kiɲˈume tʃˈako.|0
sˈasa, bˈasi, usˈiku hˈuu wˌewe ˌuondˈoke na wˈatu wˈako ˌili ˈm̩ɟe kˌuwavizˈia mˌaʃambˈani.|0
kˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi wakˈati wa kˌutʃomˈoza ɟˈua, ˈamka mapˈema na ˌuɟipˈaŋɡe ðˈidi ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi. wakˈati jˌeje na ɟˈeʃi lilˈilo pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌatakˌapotˈoka kˌukabˌiliˈana nˈaɲi, mwawˈeza kˌuwatendˈea kwa kadˈiri mnˌavjowˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌabimelˈeki pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wˌakaondˈoka usˈiku na kˌuɟifˈitʃa karˈibu na ʃekˈemu wakˈiwa vikˈosi vˈinne.|0
bˌasi ɡaˈali mwˈana wa ebˈedi ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈoka ɲɟˈe akˈawa ˌamesimˈama katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la ˈm̩ɟi wakˈati ˈule ˈule ambˈao ˌabimelˈeki na wˈatu wˌake wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanatˈoka sehˈemu zˈao za mafˈitʃo.|0
ɡaˈali ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌakamwambˈia zebˈuli, tazˈama, wˈatu wˌanaʃˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vilˈele vja milˈima! zebˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, wˌewe ˌunaˈona vivˈuli vja milˈima kˈana kwˌamba ni wˈatu.|0
lakˈini ɡaˈali ˌakasˈema tˈena, tazˈama, wˈatu wˌanaʃˈuka kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi na kikˈosi kimˈoɟa kˌinakˈuɟa kutˈoka tˈabur ezˈeri na kikˈosi kiŋɡˈine kutˈoka upˈande wa ˈelon mˌeonenˈimu.|0
