ndˈipo zebˈuli ˌakamwambˈia, kˈuko wˈapi kˌuɟivˈuna kwˈako sˈasa, wˌewe ˌulijesˈema, hˈujo ˌabimelˈeki ni nˈani hˌata tˌumtumikˈie? hˈawa si wˈale wˈatu ˌuliˌowaðarˈau? tˌoka ɲɟˈe sˈasa ˌukapiɡˈane nˈao.|0
bˌasi ɡaˈali ˌakatˈoka ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu kˌupiɡˈana na ˌabimelˈeki.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakamfukˈuza, wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌakaɟˌeruhˈiwa katˌika kˌukimbˈia hˌuko, ɲɟˈia nzˈima hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌakakˈaa arˈuma, nˌaje zebˈuli ˌakawˌafukˈuza ɡaˈali na ndˈuɡu zˌake watˈoke ʃekˈemu.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu wˌakatˈoka wˌakaˈenda mˌaʃambˈani, ˌabimelˈeki ˌakaambˈiwa ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈatu wˈake, ˌakawˌaɡawˈaɲa katˌika vikˈosi vitˈatu na kˌuwawˈeka wˌaviziˈao hˌuko mˌaʃambˈani. ˌalipˌowaˈona wˈatu wˌanatˈoka kwˈenda ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakainˈuka ðˈidi jˈao na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia.|0
ˌabimelˈeki pamˈoɟa na vˈile vikˈosi wˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kwˈenda mbˈele kwˈeɲe nafˈasi, mahˈali pa ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. vˈile vikˈosi viwˈili vˌikawawˈahi wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaʃambˈani na kˌuwaˈua.|0
sˈiku hˈijo nzˈima ˌabimelˈeki ˌakazidˈiʃa mˌaʃambulˈizi jˌake ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi hˌadi akˈawa ˌameutˈeka na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wa hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi. kˈiʃa ˌakaˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi na kˌusambˈaza tʃˈumvi ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa kˌusikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili wˈatu wˈote katˌika mnˈara wa ʃekˈemu, wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome ja hekˈalu la ˈel berˈiθi.|0
ˌabimelˈeki ˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˌuko.|0
jˌeje na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌakakwˈea kwˈeɲe mlˈima salmˈoni. ˌabimelˈeki ˌakatʃukˈua ʃˈoka, ˌakakˈata baˈaði ja matˈawi, ambˈajo ˌalijˌatʃukˈua mˌabeɡˈani. ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje kˌuwa, faɲˈeni kˈile mlˌitʃoˈona mˌimi nˌikifˈaɲa.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wˈote wˌakakˈata matˈawi na kˌumfuˈata ˌabimelˈeki. wˌakajˌakusˈaɲa hˈajo matˈawi ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈome na kˌuitˈia mˈoto ˌili kˌuwatʃˈoma wˈale wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa ndˈani jˈake. hˈivjo wˈatu wˈote katˌika mnˈara wa ʃekˈemu, kˌaribˈia wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri waˈume kwa wˈake, pˈia wakˈafa.|0
bˌaadˈaje ˌabimelˈeki ˌakaˈenda θebˈesi na kˌuuziŋɡˈira kwa ɟˈeʃi na kˌuutˈeka.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ndˈani ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi kˌulikˈuwa na mnˈara imˈara, ambˈako wˈatu wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake, wˈatu wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi, wˌalikˌimbilˈia ndˈani jˈake. wˌakaɟˌifuŋɡˈia ndˈani jˌake na kupˈanda ɟˌuːja pˈaa la mnˈara.|0
ˌabimelˈeki akˈaɟa kwˈeɲe ˈule mnˈara na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia, lakˈini ˌalipˌokaribˈia kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la mnˈara ˌili kˌuutʃˈoma kwa mˈoto.|0
mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa ˌakaaŋɡˈuʃa sehˈemu ja ɟˌuːja ɟˈiwe la kˌusaɡˈia ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌabimelˈeki, lˌikapasˈua fˈuvu la kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
ˌakamwˈita kwa harˈaka kiɟˈana jˈule ˌalijˌetʃukˈua silˈaha zˈake, na kˌumwambˈia, tʃukˈua upˈaŋɡa wˈako na ˌuniˈue, wˈatu wasˈiɟe wˌakasˈema kwˌamba, mwanˈamke ˌamemuˈua.  bˌasi jˈule kiɟˈana ˌakamtʃˈoma upˈaŋɡa, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ˌabimelˈeki ˌamekˈufa, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌolipˈiza uˈovu ˈule ambˈao ˌabimelˈeki ˌalikˈuwa ˌameutˈenda kwa bˈaba jˌake kwa kˌuwaˈua ndˈuɡu zˌake sabˈini.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌapatilˈiza wˈatu wa ʃekˈemu uˈovu wˌao ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao, na ɟˈuu jˈao ikˈaɟa laˈana ja joθˈamu mwˈana wa jˈerub baˈali.|0
baˌada ja ˌabimelˈeki, tˈola mwˈana wa pˈua mwˈana wa dˈodo, ˈm̩tu wa ˌisakˈari, ˌalijeˈiʃi hˌuko ʃamˈiri, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, ˌakainˈuka kˌuokˈoa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌakaamˈua ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈatu. ndˈipo akˈafa, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko ʃamˈiri.|0
baˌada jˌake ˌakafˌuatˈiwa na jaˈiri, mɡˌileˈadi, ambˈaje ˌaliamˈua ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na miwˈili.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana θˌelaθˈini wˌaliopˈanda pˈunda θˌelaθˈini. nˌao wˌalikˈuwa na mˈiɟi θˌelaθˈini ˌilijˈoko ɡˌileˈadi, ˌinajoˈitwa hˈawoθ jaˈiri mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
jaˈiri akˈafa, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko kamˈoni.|0
wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakatˈenda tˈena maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. wˌakaabˈudu mˌabaˈali na mˌaaʃtorˈeθi, miˈuŋɡu ja arˈamu, miˈuŋɡu ja sidˈoni, miˈuŋɡu ja moˈabu, miˈuŋɡu ja wˌaamˈoni na miˈuŋɡu ja wˌafilˈisti. kwa kˌuwa wˌaisraˈeli wˌalimwˈatʃa bwˈana wˈala hˌawakˌuendelˈea kˌumtumikˈia.|0
hˈivjo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti na wˌaamˈoni.|0
ambˈao wˌaliwˌaonˈea na kˌuwatˈesa mwˈaka ˈule. kwa miˈaka kˈumi na minˈane wˌakawatˈesa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ja ˈm̩to jordˈani katˌika ɡˌileˈadi, ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori.|0
wˌaamˈoni nˌao wˌakavˈuka jordˈani ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na jˈuda, bˌeɲamˈini na ɲˈumba ja ˌefraˈimu, nˈajo ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ikˈawa katˌika taˈabu kˈubwa.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana wˌakasˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako, kumwˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na kˌutumikˈia mˌabaˈali.|0
bwˈana ˌakawˌaambˈia, wakˈati wamˈisri, wˌaamˈori, wˌaamˈoni, wˌafilˈisti.|0
wˌasidˈoni, wˌaamalˈeki na wˌamaˈoni wˌalipˌowaonˈea na nˈiɲi mkˌanililˈia na kuˈomba msaˈada, ɟˈe, sˌikuwˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi mmˌeniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌutumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, kwa hˈijo sˌitawˌaokˈoa tˈena.|0
nendˈeni mkˌaililˈie ˈile miˈuŋɡu mlˌioˌitʃaɡˈua. hˈijo miˈuŋɡu na ˌiwaokˈoe mnˌapokˈuwa katˌika taˈabu.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli wˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi. ˌututendˈee lˈile ˌunaloˈona kˌuwa ɟˈema kwˈako, lakˈini twˌakusˈihi ˌutuokˈoe sˈasa.|0
nˌao wˌakaˌiondˈoa hˈijo miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni kˌatikˈati jˈao nˌao wˌakamtˌumikˈia bwˈana. nˌaje ˌakahˌuzunˈika kwa sabˈabu ja taˈabu ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo wˌaamˈoni wˌakaˈitwa vitˈani na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ɡˌileˈadi, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakakˌusaɲˈika na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mˈispa.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wa ɡˌileˈadi wˌakaˌambiˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, jejˈote jˈule ˌatakˌajeanzˈiʃa mˌaʃambulˈizi ðˈidi ja wˌaamˈoni ˌatakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈote wˌakaˈao ɡˌileˈadi.|0
bˌasi jˈefta mɡˌileˈadi ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu ʃuɟˈaa. bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ɡˌileˈadi, nˌaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa kahˈaba.|0
ˈm̩ke wa ɡˌileˈadi ˌakamzalˈia wˈana weŋɡˈine, nˌao watˈoto hˈao wˌalipokˈua, wˌakamfukˈuza jˈefta na kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe huwˈezi kupˈata urˈiθi katˌika ɟamˈii jˈetu, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ni mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mwiŋɡˈine.|0
bˌasi jˈefta ˌakawˌakimbˈia ndˈuɡu zˌake ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja tˈobu, mahˈali ambˈako wˈatu waˈasi wˌaliɟiˈuŋɡa nˌaje na kˌumfuˈata.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda wˌaamˈoni wˌakafˈaɲa vˈita na ˌisraˈeli.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɡˌileˈadi wˌakaˈenda kˌumtʃukˈua jˈefta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja tˈobu.|0
wˌakamwambˈia jˈefta, ˈuwe ɟˌemadˈari wˈetu, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni.|0
jˈefta ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɟˈe, hˌamkunˌitʃukˈia mˌimi na kˌunifukˈuza katˌika ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu? kwa nˈini mnˌaniɟˈia sˈasa, wakˈati ˈm̩na mˌatatˈizo.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɡˌileˈadi wˌakamwambˈia jˈefta, lakˈini sˈasa tˌumeɡeˈuka kˌukuˌelekˈea wˈewe, ˌili uˈende pamˈoɟa nˌasi kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈetu ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈote wa ɡˌileˈadi.|0
jˈefta ˌakawˌaambˈia, ikˈiwa mtˌanirudˈiʃa kwˈetu kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakanˌisaidˈia kˌuwaʃˈinda, ɟˈe, ni kwˈeli nˌitakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈenu.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɡˌileˈadi wˌakamɟˈibu jˈefta, bwˈana n̩dˈije ʃahˈidi jˈetu. kwa hakˈika tˌutafˈaɲa kˌama ˌusemˈavjo.|0
bˌasi jˈefta ˌakaˈenda na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɡˌileˈadi, nˌao wˈatu wˌakamfˈaɲa kˌioŋɡˈozi na ɟˌemadˈari wˈao. nˌaje ˌakarudˈia manˈeno jˌake jˈote mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko mˈispa.|0
ndˈipo jˈefta ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni ˌakisˈema, ˈuna nˈini ɟˈuu jˈetu, hˌata ˌumekˈuɟa kˌuʃambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu.|0
mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni ˌakawaɟˈibu waɟˈumbe wˈale wa jˈefta, wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipopˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri, wˌaliˌitʃukˈua ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu kˌuanzˈia arnˈoni mpˈaka jabˈoki, hˌadi kˌufikˈia jordˈani. sˈasa rudˈiʃa kwa amˈani.|0
jˈefta ˌakarudˈiʃa waɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni.|0
kusˈema: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo jˈefta, ˌisraˈeli hˌawakˌutʃukˈua ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu wˈala ja wˌaamˈoni.|0
lakˈini wˌalipopˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri, ˌisraˈeli wˌalipitˈia katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa hˌadi bahˈari ja ʃˈamu na wˌakafˈika kadˈeʃi.|0
ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli wˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa edˈomu, wˌakisˈema, tˈupe ruhˈusa kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, lakˈini mfˈalme wa edˈomu hˌakutˌusikˈia. wˌakapelˈeka pˈia waɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa moˈabu, nˌaje ˌakakatˈaa. kwa hˈijo ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˈaa hˌuko kadˈeʃi.|0
bˌaadˈaje wˌakasafˈiri kˌupitˈia ɟˈaŋɡwa, wˌakiambˈaa na ˈn̩tʃi za edˈomu na moˈabu, wˌakapitˈia upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wa ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu na kupˈiɡa kˈambi upˈande mwiŋɡˈine wa arnˈoni. hˌawakˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, kwa kˌuwa arnˈoni ˌilikˈuwa mpˈaka wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli wˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, ˌalijˌetawˈala heʃbˈoni, na kˌumwambˈia, tˈupe ruhˈusa kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌili kˌufikˈia mahˈali pˈetu..|0
hˌata hˈivjo, sihˈoni hˌakuwˌaamˈini wˌaisraˈeli kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. ˌakaandˈaa ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko jahˈasa, nˌao wˌakapiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakamtˈia sihˈoni na wˈatu wˌake wˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakawaʃˈinda. ˌisraˈeli wˌakaitwˈaa ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja wˌaamˈori, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
wˌakiitˈeka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote kˌuanzˈia arnˈoni mpˈaka jabˈoki, na kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani mpˈaka jordˈani.|0
bˌasi kwa kˌuwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌamewˌafukˈuza wˌaamˈori watˈoke mbˈele ja wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli, wˌewe unˈajo hˈaki ɡˈani ja kˌuitˌamalˈaki.|0
ɟˈe, hˌaikupˈasi kˌutʃukˈua kˈile ambˈatʃo mˈuŋɡu wˈako kemˈoʃi ˌamekˈupa? vˈivjo hˈivjo, tʃotʃˈote kˈile bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalitʃotˈupa sˈisi, tˌutakˌimilˈiki.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ni bˈora kulˈiko balˈaki mwˈana wa sipˈori, mfˈalme wa moˈabu? ɟˈe, jˌeje ˌaliʃˌaɡombˈana na ˌisraˈeli ˌau kˌupiɡˈana nˌao wakˈati wowˈote.|0
kwa maˈana kwa miˈaka mˌiatˈatu ˌisraˈeli wˌameˈiʃi heʃbˈoni na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ˌaroˈeri na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, na katˌika mˈiɟi jˈote ilˈijo kˈando ja arnˈoni. kwa nˈini wˌewe hˌaukˌujatʃukˈua wakˈati hˈuo.|0
mˌimi sˌiɟakˌukosˈea ɟˈambo lolˈote, bˌali wˌewe n̩dˈije ˌunajˌenikosˈea kwa kufˈaɲa vˈita nˈami. bˌasi bwˈana, alˈije mwamˈuzi, lˈeo na ˌaamˈue uɡˈomvi kˈati ja wˌaisraˈeli na wˌaamˈoni.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni, hˌakujaɟˈali manˈeno ja uɟˈumbe wa jˈefta.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja jˈefta. ˌakapˈita kˌatikˈati ja ɡˌileˈadi na manˈase, pˈia ˌakapˈita katˌika mˈispa ja ɡˌileˈadi, na kˌutokˈea hˌuko ˌakasˈoŋɡa mbˈele kˌuʃambulˈia wˌaamˈoni.|0
nˌaje jˈefta ˌakawˈeka naðˈiri mbˈele za bwˈana ˌakisˈema, ikˈiwa ˌutawatˈia wˌaamˈoni mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˈile kˌitakˌatʃotˈoka katˌika mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu tʃa kwˈanza ˌili kˌunilˈaki nˌirudˈipo kwa amˈani katˌika kˌuwaʃˈinda wˌaamˈoni, kˌitakˈuwa ni tʃa bwˈana na nˌitakitˈoa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
ndˈipo jˈefta ˌakavˈuka kˌupiɡˈana na hˈao wˌaamˈoni, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakawatˈia mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌakawapˈiɡa kwa uʃˈindi mkˈubwa kˌuanzˈia ˌaroˈeri mpˈaka karˈibu na minˈiθi na kˌuendelˈea mpˈaka ˈabel kˌeramˈimu, mˈiɟi jˈote ˌilijopˈiɡwa ni ˌiʃirˈini. bˌasi ˌisraˈeli wˌakawaʃˈinda wˌaamˈoni.|0
jˈefta ˌaliporˈudi ɲumbˈani mˈispa, tazˈama, bˈinti jˌake ˌakatˈoka ˌili kumlˈaki kwa matˈari na kutʃˈeza. ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije mtˈoto pekˈee, hakˈuwa na mwˈana wˈala bˈinti mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ˌalipomwˈona ˌakararˈua mavˈazi jˌake ˌakalˈia, ˈee! bˈinti jˈaŋɡu! ˌumenifˈaɲa nˈiwe na huzˈuni na kˌuɲoŋɡoɲˈea sˈana, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewˈeka naðˈiri kwa bwˈana, ambˈajo siwˈezi kˌuivˈuɲɟa.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, ˌumetˈoa nˈeno lˈako kwa bwˈana. nˌitendˈee mˌimi kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌoahˈidi, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamekˈupa uʃˈindi ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈako wˌaamˈoni.|0
nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, naˈomba nˌifaɲˈiwe ɟˈambo hˈili. nipˈewe miˈezi miwˈili ˌili kˌuzuŋɡˈuka vˌilimˈani nˌikaˌulilˈie ˌubikˈira wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi na wenzˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈaba jˌake ˌakamwambˈia, wawˈeza kwˈenda. nˌaje ˌakamwˈatʃa aˈende kwa miˈezi miwˈili. hˈivjo ˌakaondˈoka pamˈoɟa na wˌasitʃˈana wenzˈake, nˌaje ˌakaˌulilˈia ˌubikˈira wˌake hˌuko vˌilimˈani kwa sabˈabu ˌasiŋɡˌeolˈewa kˈamwe.|0
baˌada ja hˈijo miˈezi miwˈili, ˌalireɟˈea kwa bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje bˈaba jˌake ˌakamtendˈea kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌametˈoa naðˈiri jˈake. nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa bikˈira. nˈajo ikˈawa destˈuri katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwˌamba kˈila mwˈaka bˈinti wa ˌisraˈeli huˈenda kwa sˈiku ˈn̩ne ˌili kˌumkumbˈuka hˈujo bˈinti wa jˈefta, mɡˌileˈadi.|0
wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu wˌakaˈita maɟˈeʃi jˈao, wˌakavˈuka kwˈenda zafˈoni, wˌakamwambˈia jˈefta, kwa nˈini mmekwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni bˌila kˌutuˈita ˌili twˈende pamˈoɟa nˈawe? bˌasi tˌutaitʃˈoma mˈoto ɲˈumba jˈako, pamˈoɟa nˌawe ukˈiwa ndˈani jˈake.|0
jˈefta ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu tˌulikˈuwa na uɡˈomvi mkˈubwa na wˌaamˈoni, hˌata iŋɡˈawa nˌiliwaˈita hˌamkunˌiokˈoa katˌika mkˈono wˈao.|0
nˌilipoˈona kˌuwa hˌamkunˈipa msaˈada nˌikaˌuhatarˈiʃa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu na nˌikavˈuka kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni. nˌaje bwˈana ˌakanˌipatˈia uʃˈindi ðˈidi jˈao. sˈasa kwa nˈini mnˌaniɟˈia lˈeo ˌili kˌupiɡˈana nˈami.|0
ndˈipo jˈefta ˌakakusˈaɲa wˈatu wa ɡˌileˈadi pamˈoɟa na kˌupiɡˈana na ˌefraˈimu. wˌaɡileˈadi wˌakawaʃˈinda ˌefraˈimu, kwa kˌuwa wˌaefraˈimu wˌalisˈema, nˈiɲi wˌaɡileˈadi ni watˈoro mlˌiotorˈoka tˌoka ˌefraˈimu na manˈase.|0
wˌaɡileˈadi wˌakavitˈeka vivˈuko vja jordˈani ðˈidi ja hˈao wˌaefraˈimu, kˈiʃa ˌilikˈuwa jejˈote jˈule ˌalijˌenusurˈika katˌika ˌefraˈimu ˌaliposˈema, niˈatʃe nivˈuke, hˈao wˈatu wa ɡˌileˈadi wˌalimˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe wˌewe ni mwˌefraˈimu? kˌama ˌaliɟˈibu hapˈana.|0
wˌalimwambˈia, sˈawa, sˈema ʃˌibolˈeθi.  iwˈapo ˌalitˈamka, sˌibolˈeθi, kwa sabˈabu hˌakuwˈeza kutˈamka hˌilo nˈeno sˌawasˈawa, wˌalimkamˈata na kˌumuˈua hˈapo kwˈeɲe vivˈuko vja jordˈani. wˌaefraˈimu ˌarobaˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaliuˈawa wakˈati hˈuo.|0
jˈefta akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa wˌaisraˈeli kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka sˈita. bˌasi jˈefta akˈafa, ˌakazˈikwa katˌika mmˌoɟawˈapo wa mˈiɟi ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
baˌada jˈake, ibzˈani wa bˌeθlehˈemu akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana θˌelaθˈini na bˈinti θˌelaθˈini. ˌakawaˈoza bˈinti zˌake kwa wˈatu weŋɡˈine ɲɟˈe ja ukˈoo wˈake, na kˌuwatwalˈia wanˈawe wˌanawˈake θˌelaθˈini tˌoka ɲɟˈe ja ukˈoo wˈake. ibzˈani akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka sˈaba.|0
ibzˈani akˈafa, ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
baˌada jˌake elˈoni, mzˌabulˈoni, akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakawˌaamˈua kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka kˈumi.|0
kˈiʃa elˈoni akˈafa, ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˌaijalˈoni, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja zˌabulˈoni.|0
baˌada jˈake, abdˈoni mwˈana wa hilˈeli, mpˌiraθˈoni, akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌaje ˌakazˈaa wˈana ˌarobaˈini na wˈana wa wanˈawe θˌelaθˈini wˌaliopˈanda pˈunda sabˈini. akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka minˈane.|0
ndˈipo abdˈoni mwˈana wa hilˈeli, mpˌiraθˈoni, akˈafa, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko pˌiraθˈoni katˌika ˌefraˈimu, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja wˌaamalˈeki.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu tˈena mbˈele za bwˈana. hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
bˌasi pˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wa sˈora, ˌalijeˈitwa manˈoa, wa kabˈila la wadˈani, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩ke ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa tˈasa na hakˈuwa na mtˈoto.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea hˈujo mwanˈamke na kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe ni tˈasa na hˈuna mtˈoto, lakˈini ˌutatʃukˈua mˈimba na ˌutamzˈaa mtˈoto mwˌanaˈume.|0
lakˈini ˌuɟihaðˈari sˈana usˈiɲue mvˈiɲo wˈala kilˈeo kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote, wˈala usˈile kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌutatʃukˈua mˈimba na ˌutamzˈaa mtˈoto mwˌanaˈume. wˈembe ˌusipˈite kitʃwˈani pˈake, kwa kˌuwa hˈujo mwˈana ˌatakˈuwa mnaðˈiri wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌalijewˈekwa wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja mˈuŋɡu ʃˈu tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈake, nˌaje ˌataˈanza kˌuwaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakamwendˈea mumˈewe na kˌumwelˈeza kˌuwa, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌaliniɟˈia. kˈule kˌuonekˈana kwˈake kˌulikˈuwa kˌama kwa mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu, wa kutˈiʃa sˈana. sˌikumˌuulˈiza ˌalikotˈoka wˈala hˌakunˌiambˈia ɟˈina lˈake.|0
lakˈini ˌalinˌiambˈia, ˌutatʃukˈua mˈimba na ˌutazˈaa mtˈoto mwˌanaˈume. bˌasi sˈasa, usˈiɲue mvˈiɲo wˈala kilˈeo kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote wˈala usˈile kˈitu kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi, kwa kˌuwa hˈujo mtˈoto ˌatakˈuwa mnaðˈiri wa mˈuŋɡu ʃˈu tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˌake mpˈaka kˈufa kwˈake..|0
ndˈipo manˈoa ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, ˌakasˈema: ˈee bwˈana, nˌakusˈihi, hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌulijemtˈuma kwˈetu ˈaɟe tˈena ˌili ˌatufundˈiʃe ɟˈinsi ja kumlˈea hˈujo mwˈana ˌatakˌajezalˈiwa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamsikˈia manˈoa, nˌaje mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈia tˈena hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌalipokˈuwa ʃambˈani, lakˈini mumˈewe manˈoa hˌakuwˈepo.|0
bˌasi jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakaˈenda harˈaka na kˌumwambˈia mumˈewe, tazˈama ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijˌenitokˈea sˈiku ˈile jˈupo hˈapa.|0
manˈoa ˌakainˈuka ˌakaˌandamˈana na mkˈewe. ˌalipˌomfikˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, wˌewe n̩dˈije jˈule ˌulijesˈema na ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu? ˌakasˈema, mˌimi n̩dˈije.|0
bˌasi manˈoa ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wakˈati manˈeno jˈako jˌatakˌapotimˈia, maʃˈarti ja maˈiʃa ja mtˈoto hˈuju jˌatakˈuwa nˈini na kˈazi jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ni nˈini.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, ˈm̩ke wˈako hˈana bˈudi kufˈaɲa jˈale jˈote nˌilijˌomwambˈia.|0
kˈamwe asˈile kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃotˈoka katˌika mzabˈibu, wˈala asˈiɲue mvˈiɲo wa aˈina jojˈote wˈala kilˈeo tʃotʃˈote wˈala asˈile kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi. hˈana bˈudi kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃˌomwaɡˈiza.|0
manˈoa ˌakamɟˈibu jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, twˌakuˈomba ˌusubˈiri kwˈanza ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuandˈaa mwˌanambˈuzi kwa aɟˈili jˈako.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, hˌata kˌama ˌutanˌizuˈia, sˌitakˈula tʃotʃˈote kwˈako. lakˈini ˌukitˈaka kˌuandˈaa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, mtolˈee bwˈana hˈijo sadˈaka. kwa kˌuwa manˈoa hˌakuɟˈua kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana..|0
ndˈipo manˈoa ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, ɟˈina lˈako ni nˈani, ˌili kwˌamba tuwˈeze kukˈupa heʃˈima hˈapo hˈajo ˌulijonˈena jˌatakˌapotimˈia.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa nˈini ˌunaulˈiza ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu? ni ɟˈina la aɟˈabu.|0
ndˈipo manˈoa ˌakamtʃukˈua mwˌanambˈuzi, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa, nˌaje ˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu hˈapo ɟˌuːja mwˈamba. nˌaje jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakafˈaɲa ɟˈambo la aɟˈabu wakˈati manˈoa na mkˈewe wakˈiwa wˌanaˌaŋɡalˈia.|0
mwˈali wa mˈoto kutˈoka hˈapo mˌaðabahˈuni ˌulipowˈaka kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni, mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakapˈaa ndˈani ja hˈuo mwˈali. manˈoa na mkˈewe, kwa kuˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini kˌifudifˈudi.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana hˌakumtokˈea tˈena manˈoa na mkˈewe. ndˈipo manˈoa ˌakatambˈua kˌuwa hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana.|0
manˈoa ˌakamwambˈia mkˈewe, hakˈika tˌutakˈufa, kwa kˌuwa tˌumemwˈona mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini mkˈewe ˌakamwambˈia, ikˈiwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌusudˈia kˌutuˈua, ˌasiŋɡˌelipokˈea sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka ja ˈuŋɡa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu, wˈala ˌasiŋɡˌelitˌuoɲˈeʃa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote wˈala kˌututˌaŋɡazˈia mˈambo kˌama hˈaja wakˈati hˈuu.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakazˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake samsˈoni. kiɟˈana ˌakakˈua, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakambarˈiki.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌakaˈanza kˌumsukˈuma wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko mahˈane dˈani, kˈati ja sˈora na ˌeʃtaˈoli.|0
samsˈoni ˌakatˌeremkˈia tˈimna, ˌakamwˈona mwanˈamke wa kˌifilˈisti.|0
ˌalipopˈanda kutˈoka hˌuko, ˌakawˌaambˈia bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake, nˌimemwˈona mwanˈamke wa kˌifilˈisti hˌuko tˈimna; bˌasi mnˈipe ˌili ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake wˌakamɟˈibu, ɟˈe, hakˈuna mwanˈamke mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟamˈaa jˈako ˌau mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈako, hˌata ˌulazimˈike kwˈenda kˌuɟitwalˈia mwanˈamke kutˈoka kwa hˈawa wˌafilˈisti wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa? lakˈini samsˈoni ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, nˌipatiˈeni hˈujo kwa maˈana n̩dˈije ˌalinˌipendˈeza.|0
bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake hˌawakuɟˈua kˌuwa ɟˈambo hˈili lˌimetˈoka kwa bwˈana, kwˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitafˈuta sabˈabu ja kˌukabˌiliˈana na wˌafilˈisti; kwa kˌuwa wakˈati hˈuo wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiwˌatawˈala wˌaisraˈeli..|0
samsˈoni ˌakatˌeremkˈia tˈimna pamˈoɟa na bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake. wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu hˌuko tˈimna, ɣafˈula mwˈana sˈimba ˌakamɟˈia ˌakimŋɡˌurumˈia.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌaje ˌakampasˈua jˈule sˈimba kwa mikˈono jˌake bˌila silˈaha jojˈote kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu ˌampasuˈavjo mwˌanambˈuzi, wˈala hˌakumwambˈia bˈaba jˌake wˈala mˈama jˌake ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa.|0
bˌasi ˌakaterˈemka na kˌuoŋɡˈea na jˈule mwanˈamke, nˌaje ˌakampendˈeza samsˈoni.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda ˌaliporˈudi ˌili ˌakamwˈoe, ˌakatazˈama kˈando ˌili kˌuutazˈama mzˈoɡa wa jˈule sˈimba, na tazˈama, kˌulikˈuwa na kˈundi la ɲˈuki ndˈani ja ˈule mzˈoɡa wa sˈimba na kˌulikˈuwa na asˈali.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua asˈali mkonˈoni mwˈake ˌakaˌendelˈea hˈuku akˈila. ˌalipˌowafikˈia bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˈake, ˌakawˈapa ˈile asˈali nˌao wakˈala. lakˈini hˌakuwˌaambˈia kˌuwa ˌalitwˈaa asˈali kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mzˈoɡa wa sˈimba.|0
bˌasi bˈaba jˌake ˌakaterˈemka kumwˈona hˈujo mwanˈamke. samsˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa karˈamu hˌuko, kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa destˈuri ja viɟˈana.|0
wˈatu wˌalipomwˈona, wˌakalˈeta viɟˈana wenzˈake θˌelaθˈini ˌili kˌuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
samsˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, niwˈape kˌitendawˈili, mkiwˈeza kunˈipa ɟˈibu katˌika mˈuda wa sˈiku hˈizi sˈaba za karˈamu, nˌitawˈapa mavˈazi θˌelaθˈini ja kitˈani na mavˈazi meŋɡˈine mivˈao θˌelaθˈini.|0
lakˈini msˌipowˈeza kˌufumbˈua, ndˈipo nˈiɲi mtanˈipa mavˈazi θˌelaθˈini ja kitˈani na mavˈazi meŋɡˈine mivˈao θˌelaθˈini. wˌakamwambˈia, tˌuambˈie hˈitʃo kˌitendawˈili, hˈebu na tˌukisikˈie.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, ndˈani ja mlˈaɟi, kˌulitˈoka kˈitu tʃa kulˈiwa, ndˈani ja mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, kˌulitˈoka kˈitu kitˈamu. kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu hˌawakuwˈeza kutˈoa ɟˈibu.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba, wˌakamwambˈia mkˈewe samsˈoni, mbˌembelˈeze mumˈeo ˌili ˌatuelˈeze hˈitʃo kˌitendawˈili, la sˈivjo tˌutakutʃˈoma mˈoto wˌewe na wa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako. ɟˈe, mmˌetualˈika ˌili mpˈate kˌutuɲaŋɡˈaɲa kˈile tulˈitʃo nˈatʃo.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩ke wa samsˈoni ˌakalˈia mbˈele jˌake na kˌumwambˈia, ˌunanˌitʃukˈia! hˌunipˈendi kabˈisa. ˌumewˌateɡˈea wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kˌitendawˈili, lakˈini mˌimi hˌuɟanˌiambˈia ɟˈibu. samsˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, wˈala sˌiɟamwelˈeza bˈaba jˈaŋɡu wˈala mˈama jˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini nˌikufˌumbulˈie.|0
mkˈewe ˌakalˈia kwa mˈuda wa zˈile sˈiku zˈote sˈaba za karˈamu. hˈivjo sˈiku ˈile ja sˈaba samsˈoni ˌakamwelˈeza, kwa kˌuwa ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌumsisitˈiza sˈana. nˌaje ˌakawˌaelˈeza wˈatu wˌake kˈile kˌitendawˈili.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba kˈabla ja ɟˈua kutˈua, wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakamwambˈia samsˈoni, ni nˈini kitˈamu kˌama asˈali? ni nˈini tʃˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌama sˈimba? samsˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, kˌama hˌamkulˈima na mtˈamba wˈaŋɡu, hˌamŋɡewˈeza kˌufumbˈua kˌitendawˈili tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈia samsˈoni kwa ŋɡˈuvu. ˌakaterˈemka mpˈaka ˌaʃkelˈoni, ˌakawaˈua wˈatu waˈume θˌelaθˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakatwˈaa mˈali zˈao na ŋɡˈuo zˈao, ˌakawˈapa wˈatu wˈale wˌaliˌofumbˈua kˈile kˌitendawˈili. akˈiwa na hasˈira, ˌakakwˈea kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
lakˈini hˈujo ˈm̩ke wa samsˈoni ˌakakˌabiðˈiwa kwa rafˈiki jˌake samsˈoni ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa rafˈiki jˌake msˌaidˈizi sˈiku ja arˈusi.|0
baˌada ja kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, wakˈati wa mavˈuno ja ŋɡˈano, samsˈoni ˌakatʃukˈua mwˌanambˈuzi, kwˈenda kumzˈuru mkˈewe. ˌakasˈema, natˈaka kˌuiŋɡˈia tʃumbˈani kwa ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu. lakˈini bˈaba jˌake hˈujo mwanˈamke hˌakumruhˈusu kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
hˈujo bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake ˌakamwambˈia, nˌilikˈuwa na hakˈika kwˌamba ˌulimkatˈaa, hˈivjo mˌimi nikˈampa rafˈiki jˈako. ɟˈe, mdˈoɡo wˌake wa kˈike si mzˈuri zaˈidi kulˈiko jˈeje? mtʃukˈue hˈujo badˈala jˈake.|0
samsˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, wakˈati hˈuu, nˌitakˌapowaðˈuru wˌafilˈisti, sˌitakˈuwa na lawˈama.|0
hˈivjo samsˈoni ˌakatˈoka ˌakawˌakamˈata mbwˈeha mˌiatˈatu na kˌuwafˈuŋɡa wawˈili wawˈili kwa mikˈia jˈao kˈila mmˈoɟa kwa mwiŋɡˈine. kˈiʃa ˌakafuŋɡˈia mwˈeŋɡe wa mˈoto, kwˈeɲe mikˈia ja kˈila ɟˈozi mˈoɟa ja mbwˈeha ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameifˈuŋɡa.|0
ˌakawˈaʃa ˈile miˈeŋɡe na kˌuwaatʃˈia wˈale mbwˈeha katˌika maʃˈamba ja wˌafilˈisti ja nafˈaka zˌilizˌosimamˈiʃwa katˌika matˈita. ˌakatˌeketˈeza matˈita ja nafˈaka zˌilizˌosimˈama, pamˈoɟa na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na viˈuŋɡa vja mˌizeitˈuni.|0
ndˈipo wˌafilˈisti wˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌalijetˈenda ɟˈambo hˈili? wˌakaambˈiwa, ni samsˈoni, jˈule mkwˈewe mtˈimna, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimtʃukˈua mkˈewe akˈampa mwenzˈake. hˈivjo wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈanda wˌakamtˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto jˌeje hˈujo mwanˈamke pamˈoɟa na bˈaba jˈake.|0
samsˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, kwa kˌuwa mmetˈenda hˈivjo, hakˈika sˌitatulˈia mpˈaka nˈiwe nˌimelipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia kwa ukˈali kwa mapˈiɡo makˈuu na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wˈeŋɡi sˈana. kˈiʃa ˌakaterˈemka na kukˈaa katˌika ˈufa kwˈeɲe mwˈamba wa etˈamu.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈanda na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko jˈuda na kˌuenˈea hˌuko lˈehi.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakawˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini mmekˈuɟa kˌupiɡˈana nˈasi? wˌakawaɟˈibu, tˌumekˈuɟa ˌili kˌumkamˈata samsˈoni na kumtˈenda kˌama ˌalivjˌotutendˈea.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri tˌoka jˈuda wˌalipˌoterˈemka na kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ˈufa wa mwˈamba hˌuko etˈamu, na kˌumwambˈia samsˈoni, ɟˈe, hˌuɟatambˈua kˌuwa wˌafilˈisti wˌanatˌutawˈala? ni nˈini hˈiki ˌulitʃˌotutendˈea? ˌakawaɟˈibu, mˌimi nˌimewˌatendˈea tu kˈile wˌalitʃˌonitendˈea.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, tˌumekˈuɟa kˌukufˈuŋɡa na kˌukutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti. samsˈoni ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˌiapiˈeni kˌuwa hˌamtaniˈua nˈiɲi weɲˈewe.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, sˌisi hˌatutˌakuˈua, bˌali tˌutakufˈuŋɡa tu na kˌukutˈia mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. bˌasi wˌakamfˈuŋɡa kwa kˈamba mbˈili ˈm̩pja. wˌakamtʃukˈua tˌoka hˌuko kwˈeɲe ˈufa katˌika mwˈamba.|0
ˌalipˌokaribˈia lˈehi, wˌafilˈisti wˌakamɟˈia wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele. rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈia ɟˈuu jˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu. kˈamba zˌilizomfˈuŋɡa mikˈono jˌake zikˈawa kˌama kitˈani ˌilijotʃˈomwa kwa mˈoto, na vifˈuŋɡo vjˈake vˌikaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini tˌoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌakaˈona mfˈupa ˈm̩pja wa tˈaja la pˈunda, ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono, ˌakaˌutʃukˈua na kuˈua nˌao wˌafilˈisti wˌapatˈao mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ndˈipo samsˈoni ˌakasˈema, kwa tˈaja la pˈunda malˈundo ɟˌuːja malˈundo. kwa tˈaja la pˈunda nˌimeˈua wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈema, ˌakautˈupa ˈule mfˈupa wa tˈaja; na mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa rˈamaθ lˈehi.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesikˈia kˈiu sˈana, ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana ˌakisˈema, umˈempa mtumˈiʃi wˈako uʃˈindi hˈuu m̩kˈuu. ɟˈe, sˈasa nˈife kwa kˈiu na kˌuaŋɡukˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈawa wˈatu wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa.|0
bwˈana ˌakafunˈua ʃˈimo hˌuko lˈehi, pˌakatˈoka mˈaɟi. samsˈoni ˌalipojˈaɲua, ŋɡˈuvu zˌikamrudˈia na kˌuhuˈika. hˈivjo tʃemtʃˈemi ˈile ˌikaˈitwa ˈen hakˈore, nˈajo ˈiko mpˈaka lˈeo hˌuko lˈehi.|0
samsˈoni akˈawa mwamˈuzi wa wˌaisraˈeli katˌika sˈiku za wˌafilˈisti kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa samsˈoni ˌaliˈenda ɡˈaza, ˌakamwˈona mwanˈamke kahˈaba, nˌaje ˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈake.|0
wˈatu wa ɡˈaza wˌakaambˈiwa, samsˈoni ˌamekˈuɟa hˈuku! hˈivjo wˌakapˌaziŋɡˈira mahˈali pˈale nˌao wˌakamvizˈia usˈiku kˈutʃa, pˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. wˌakaɲamˈaza kˈimja usˈiku kˈutʃa, wˌakisˈema, tˌumvizˈie hˌadi mˌapambazˈuko, ndˈipo tˌutamuˈua.|0
samsˈoni ˌakalˈala mpˈaka usˈiku wa manˈane. ˌakaondˈoka kˌatikˈati ja usˈiku, ˌakaʃˈika milˈaŋɡo ja lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi pamˈoɟa na miˈimo jˌake miwˈili, ˌakaiŋɡˈoa, mˌakomˈeo jˌake na vjˈote. ˌakaviwˈeka mˌabeɡˈani mwˈake na kˌuvipelˈeka mpˈaka kwˈeɲe kilˈele tʃa mlˈima ˈule ˌunaˌokabˈili hebrˈoni.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo ˌakampˈenda mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa katˌika bˈonde la sorˈeki ˌalijeˈitwa delˈila.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakamwendˈea jˈule mwanˈamke na kˌumwambˈia, ˌumbembelˈeze ˌili upˈate kuɟˈua sˈiri za ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zilˈizo ɲˈiŋɡi na ɟˈinsi tˌutakˌavjowˈeza kumʃˈinda ˌili tuwˈeze kumfˈuŋɡa na kˌumtiˈiʃa. nˌasi kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu tˌutakˈupa ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða.|0
hˈivjo delˈila ˌakamwambˈia samsˈoni, naˈomba nˌiambˈie sˈiri ja hˈizi ŋɡˈuvu zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi na ɟˈinsi ˌutakˌavjowˈeza kufˈuŋɡwa ˌili kˌukutiˈiʃa.|0
samsˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu, kˌama wˌakinifˈuŋɡa kwa kˈamba sˈaba za upˈinde ambˈazo hˌaziɟˌakaˈuka bˈado, hˈapo ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokˈuwa ðaˈifu kˌama ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakamletˈea jˈule mwanˈamke kˈamba sˈaba za upˈinde ambˈazo hˌaziɟˌakaˈuka bˈado, ˌakamfˈuŋɡa nˈazo samsˈoni.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wakˈiwa wˌanamvizˈia katˌika tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani, jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamwambˈia, samsˈoni, wˌafilˈisti wˌanakuɟˈia! lakˈini jˌeje ˌakazikˈata zˈile kˈamba za upˈinde, kˌama vˈile ˈuzi wa pˈamba ˌunapoɡˈuswa na mˈoto. hˈivjo sˈiri ja ŋɡˈuvu zˌake hˌaikˌuɟulikˈana.|0
ndˈipo delˈila ˌakamwambˈia samsˈoni, ˌumenˌifaɲˈia mzˈaha na kˌuniambˈia uˈoŋɡo. tˌafaðˈali nˌiambˈie wawˈeza kufˈuŋɡwa kwa kˈitu ɡˈani.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, wˌakinifˈuŋɡa kwa ˌuθabˈiti kwa kˈamba ˈm̩pja ambˈazo hˌaziɟˌatumˈika, bˌasi nˌitakˈuwa ðaˈifu kˌama ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote.|0
hˈivjo delˈila ˌakatʃukˈua kˈamba ˈm̩pja na kumfˈuŋɡa nˈazo. kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, samsˈoni, wˌafilˈisti wˌanakuɟˈia! wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanamvizˈia wˌalikˈuwa katˌika tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani. lakˈini ˌakazikˈata zˈile kˈamba zˌilizokˈuwa zˌimefˈuŋɡa mikˈono jˌake kˌama ˌakatˈavjo ˈuzi.|0
ndˈipo delˈila ˌakamwambˈia samsˈoni, mpˈaka sˈasa, ˌumenˌifaɲˈia mzˈaha na kˌuniambˈia uˈoŋɡo. nˌielˈeze ni ɟˈinsi ɡˈani ˌutakˌavjowˈeza kufˈuŋɡwa. samsˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, kˌama ˌukivisˈuka hˈivi viʃˈuŋɡi sˈaba vja ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu katˌika mtˈande wa ŋɡˈuo na kukˈaza kwa msumˈari, ndˈipo nˌitakˈuwa ðaˈifu kˌama ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote. hˈivjo samsˈoni ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamelˈala, delˈila ˌakatʃukˈua vˈile viʃˈuŋɡi sˈaba vja ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake na kˌuvifˈuŋɡa kwˈeɲe mtˈande wa ŋɡˈuo.|0
na kˌuvikˈaza kwa msumˈari. kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, samsˈoni, wˌafilˈisti wˌanakuɟˈia! lakˈini ˌakaˈamka kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡizˈini na kˌuuŋɡˈoa ˈule msumˈari na ˈule mtˈande.|0
ndˈipo delˈila ˌakamwambˈia, wˌawezˈaɟe kusˈema, nˌakupˈenda, wakˈati mˈojo wˈako haˈupo pamˈoɟa nˈami? ˌumenˌifaɲˈia mzˈaha mˈara hˈizi tˈatu na hˌuɟanˌiambˈia sˈiri ja hˈizi ŋɡˈuvu zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
hˌatimˈaje, baˌada ja kˌuwa ˌanamsumbˈua kwa manˈeno sˈiku kwa sˈiku na kˌumuˈuði, rˈoho jˌake ˌikatˌaabˈika hˌata kˈufa.|0
hˈivjo ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mwanˈamke sˈiri jˌake jˈote, ˌakamwambˈia, wˈembe hˌauɟapˈita kˈamwe kitʃwˈani mwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni mnaðˈiri wa mˈuŋɡu ʃˈu tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu. kˌama ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu zˌikiɲolˈewa, ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌitanitˈoka, na nˌitakˈuwa ðaˈifu kˌama ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote.|0
delˈila ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ˌamemwelˈeza sˈiri jˌake jˈote, ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌafilˈisti na kusˈema, ɲɟoˈoni tˈena mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine, maˈana ˌamenˌielˈeza sˈiri jˌake jˈote. bˌasi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌafilˈisti wakˈaɟa kwa delˈila, wakˈiwa na fˈeða mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
delˈila ˌakamfˈaɲa alˈale ˌusiŋɡˈizi mˌaɡotˈini pˈake, ˌakamwˈita ˈm̩tu ˌakamɲˈoa vˈile viʃˈuŋɡi sˈaba vja ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake. ˌakaˈanza kˌumsumbˈua ˌili aˈamke nˈazo ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˌikamtˈoka.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamwˈita, samsˈoni, hˈao wˌafilˈisti wˌanakuɟˈia! ˌakaˈamka tˌoka ˌusiŋɡizˈini ˌakasˈema, nˌitatˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌama hˈapo awˈali, nˌitawˌakuŋɡutˈia mbˈali na kˌuwa hˈuru. lakˈini hˌakuɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamemwˈatʃa.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌakamkamˈata, wˌakamŋɡˈoa mˈatʃo jˈake, wˌakamtʃukˈua wˌakamterˈemʃa mpˈaka ɡˈaza. wakˈiwa wˌamemfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba, wˌakamwˈeka ˌili asˈaɡe ŋɡˈano hˌuko ɡˌerezˈani.|0
wakˈati hˈuo ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake zˌikaˈanza kukˈua tˈena baˌada ja kˌuɲolˈewa.|0
bˌasi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa ˌili kutˈoa kafˈara kwa mˈuŋɡu wˌao daɡˈoni na kufˈaɲa karˈamu, wˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌamemtˈia adˈui jˈetu samsˈoni mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu.|0
wˈatu wˌalipomwˈona samsˈoni wˌakamsˈifu mˈuŋɡu wˈao, wˌakisˈema: sˈasa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌamemtˈia adˈui jˈetu mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu, jˈule ˌalijˌeharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wˈeŋɡi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu.|0
miˈojo jˈao ˌilipokˈuwa ˌimefˌurahˈiʃwa wˌakasˈema, mletˈeni samsˈoni ˈaɟe atʃˈeze ˌili tˌufurˈahi. bˌasi wˌakamlˈeta samsˈoni kutˈoka ˈm̩le ɡˌerezˈani nˌaje ˌakatʃˈeza mbˈele jˈao. wˌakamwˈeka kˈati ja ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili.|0
samsˈoni ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi ˌalijeʃˈika mkˈono wˈake, niwˈeke mahˈali ambˈapo nˌinawˈeza kˌuziɡˈusa ŋɡˈuzo ambˈazo zˌinatˌeɡemˈeza ɟˈeŋɡo ˌili nipˈate kˌuziˌeɡemˈea.|0
bˌasi lˈile ɟˈeŋɡo lˌilikˈuwa na wˈiŋɡi wa wˈatu waˈume kwa wˈake; vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa wˌafilˈisti wˌalikuwˈamo hˈumo, na kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja ɟˈuu wˌalikuwˈepo wˈatu tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri waˈume kwa wˈake, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimtazˈama samsˈoni wakˈati ˌanatʃˈeza.|0
ndˈipo samsˈoni ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌunikumbˈuke. ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌakusˈihi ˌukanitˈie ŋɡˈuvu mˈara hˌii mˈoɟa tˈena, ˌili kwa tˈendo hˈili nipˈate kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja wˌafilˈisti kwa aɟˈili ja mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu mawˈili.|0
ndˈipo samsˈoni ˌakazˌikaribˈia zˈile ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili za kˌatikˈati ambˈazo lˈile ɟˈeŋɡo lˌilikˈuwa lˌinazˌiteɡemˈea. ˌakaziʃˈika mˈoɟa kwa mkˈono wa kuˈume na ɲiŋɡˈine mkˈono wa kuʃˈoto.|0
samsˈoni ˌakasˈema, nˈife pamˈoɟa na wˌafilˈisti! ndˈipo ˌakazˌisukˈuma zˈile ŋɡˈuzo kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˈote, lˈile ɟˈeŋɡo lˌikaaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja vˌioŋɡˈozi na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈamo ˈm̩le ndˈani jˈake. hˈivjo ˌakawaˈua wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wakˈati wa kˈufa kwˈake kulˈiko sˈiku za uhˈai wˈake.|0
bˌasi ndˈuɡu zˌake na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja bˈaba jˌake wˌakaterˈemka kwˈenda kˌumtʃukˈua. wˌakampandˈiʃa na kumzˈika kˈati ja sˈora na ˌeʃtaˈoli kwˈeɲe kabˈuri la manˈoa bˈaba jˈake. nˌaje samsˈoni ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini.|0
pˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩tu ˌalijeˈitwa mˈika ambˈaje ˌaliˈiʃi katˌika vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mˈama jˈake, zˈile ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða zˌilizˌotʃukulˈiwa kwˈako, ambˈazo nˌilisikˈia ˌukizˌinenˈea manˈeno ja laˈana, hˈizi hˈapa; mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijˌezitʃukˈua, lakˈini sˈasa nˌinakˌurudiʃˈia. ndˈipo mˈama jˌake ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana na ˌakubarˈiki, mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌalipˌozirudˈiʃa zˈile ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða kwa mˈama jˈake, mˈama jˌake ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi nˌimeiwˈeka fˈeða hˌii wˈakfu kwa bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈaŋɡu kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea kiɲˈaɡo tʃa kutʃˈoŋɡa na sanˈamu ja kusˈubu. mˌimi nˌitakˌurudiʃˈia wˈewe.|0
hˈivjo ˌakamrˌudiʃˈia mˈama jˌake ˈile fˈeða, nˌaje mˈama jˌake ˌakatʃukˈua ʃekˈeli mˈia mbˈili za hˈijo fˈeða na kˈumpa m̩fˈua fˈeða, ambˈaje ˌaliˌifaɲˈiza kiɲˈaɡo na sanˈamu. nˈavjo vˌikawˈekwa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja mˈika.|0
bˌasi mˈika ˌalikˈuwa na mahˈali pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza nˌaivˈera, pamˈoɟa na viɲˈaɡo, na kumwˈeka mmˈoɟa wa wanˈawe kˌuwa kuhˈani wˈake.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo ˌisraˈeli hˌawakˈuwa na mfˈalme, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama ˌalivjoˈona vjˈema matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
bˌasi pˌalikˈuwa na kiɟˈana mmˈoɟa wa bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda. jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa mlˈawi ˌalijeˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kabˈila la jˈuda.|0
hˈuju kiɟˈana ˌakatˈoka katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo wa bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda na kˌutafˈuta mahˈali peŋɡˈine ambˈapo ˌaŋɡewˈeza kuˈiʃi. ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakisafˈiri, ˌakafˈika ɲumbˈani kwa mˈika katˌika vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu.|0
mˈika ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mlˈawi kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda, nˌinatafˈuta mahˈali pa kuˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo mˈika ˌakamwambˈia, ˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˈami, ˈuwe bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na kuhˈani wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈupa ʃekˈeli kˈumi za fˈeða, ŋɡˈuo na tʃakˈula.|0
hˈivjo jˈule mlˈawi ˌakakubˈali kuˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˈaje, nˌaje hˈujo kiɟˈana akˈawa kwˈake kˌama mmˈoɟa wa wanˈawe.|0
hˈivjo mˈika ˌakamwˈeka wˈakfu hˈujo kiɟˈana mlˈawi, nˌaje hˈujo akˈawa kuhˈani wˌake na kuˈiʃi ɲumbˈani mwˈake.|0
ndˈipo mˈika ˌakasˈema, sˈasa naɟˈua bwˈana ˌatanˌitendˈea mˈema, kwa kˌuwa mlˈawi hˈuju ˌamekˈuwa kuhˈani wˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa hawˈana mfˈalme. katˌika sˈiku hˈizo kabˈila la wadˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌanatafˈuta mahˈali pˈao weɲˈewe pa kuˈiʃi, kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa hˌawaɟafˈika kwˈeɲe urˈiθi wˌao mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo wadˈani wˌakatˈuma mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈano kutˈoka sˈora na ˌeʃtaˈoli ˌili kˌupelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuitʃuŋɡˈuza. hˈawa wˈatu wˌaliwˌakilˈiʃa kˈoo zˈao zˈote. wˌaliwˌaambˈia, nendˈeni mkˌaitʃuŋɡˈuze hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi. wˈatu hˈao wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, nˌao wˌakafˈika ɲˈumba ja mˈika, ambˈako wˌalilˈala usˈiku hˈuo.|0
wˌalipofˈika karˈibu na ɲˈumba ja mˈika, wˌaliˌitambˈua saˈuti ja jˈule kiɟˈana mlˈawi; hˈivjo wˌakaiŋɡˈia hˈumo na kˌumuulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌalijˌekulˈeta hˈapa? ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini mahˈali hˈapa? kwa nˈini ˈuko hˈapa.|0
ˌakawˌaelˈeza jˈale mˈika ˌalijˌomtendˈea, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, ˌamenˌiaɟˈiri nˌami ni kuhˈani wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali tˌuulizˈie kwa mˈuŋɡu kˌama safˈari jˈetu ˌitafˌanikˈiwa.|0
jˈule kuhˈani ˌakawaɟˈibu, ˌenendˈeni kwa amˈani. safˈari jˈenu ˈina kibˈali tʃa bwˈana.|0
bˌasi hˈao wˈatu watˈano wˌakaondˈoka na kufˈika laˈiʃi, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌaliwakˈuta wˈatu wˌanaˈiʃi salˈama, kˌama wˌasidˈoni, kwa ˌutulˈivu na bˌila maʃˈaka. ˈn̩tʃi jˈao hˌaikˌupuŋɡukˈiwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, hˈivjo wakˈawa taɟˈiri. pˈia wˌalikˈaa mbˈali sˈana na wˌasidˈoni, wˈala hˌawakˌuʃuɣulˈika na ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
wˌaliporˈudi kwa ndˈuɡu zˈao hˌuko sˈora na ˌeʃtaˈoli, ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌakawˌaulˈiza, mlˌionˈaɟe mˈambo hˌuko.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, twendˈeni, tˌukapiɡˈane nˈao! tˌumeˈona kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi ni nzˈuri sˈana. ɟˈe, hˌamtafˈaɲa tʃotʃˈote? msisˈite kupˈanda ˌili kˌuimilˈiki.|0
mtˌakapokwˈenda hˌuko mtakˈuta wˈatu wˌaliˌotulˈia walˈio salˈama, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ni kˈubwa na mˈuŋɡu ˌameitˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˈajo ni ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo hˌaikˌupuŋɡukˈiwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo dˌuniˈani.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu mˌiasˈita tˌoka ukˈoo wa wadˈani, wˌaliˌoɟifˈuŋɡa silˈaha za vˈita, wˌakaondˈoka sˈora na ˌeʃtaˈoli.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakisafˈiri wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu katˌika jˈuda. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu sehˈemu ja mˌaɣarˈibi ja kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu ˌinaˈitwa mahˈane dˈani mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
kutˈoka hˈapo wˌakaˌendelˈea mbˈele mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu na kufˈika katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈika.|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˈatu watˈano wˌaliˌopelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi ja laˈiʃi wˌakawˌaambˈia ndˈuɡu zˈao, ɟˈe, mwaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌoɟawˈapo ja ɲˈumba hˈizi kˈuna nˌaivˈera, sanˈamu ndˈoɡo za ɲumbˈani, sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa na sanˈamu ja kusˈubu? sˈasa bˌasi fˌikirˈini mtˌakalofˈaɲa.|0
bˌasi wˌakaiŋɡˈia hˈumo na kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja jˈule kiɟˈana mlˈawi katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈika na kˌumsalˈimu.|0
wˈale wadˈani mˌiasˈita, wˌaliovˈaa silˈaha za vˈita, wˌakasimˈama pˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo.|0
wˈale wˈatu watˈano wˌaliokwˈenda kˌupelelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌutʃukˈua ˈile sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa, ˈile nˌaivˈera, na zˈile sanˈamu ɲiŋɡˈine ndˈoɡo za ɲumbˈani pamˈoɟa na ˈile sanˈamu ja kusˈubu, wakˈati jˈule kuhˈani akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama pˈale pˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈatu mˌiasˈita wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameɟifˈuŋɡa silˈaha za vˈita.|0
hˈao wˈatu wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈika na kˌutʃukˈua ˈile sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa, ˈile nˌaivˈera, na zˈile sanˈamu ɲiŋɡˈine ndˈoɡo za ɲumbˈani, pamˈoɟa na ˈile sanˈamu ja kusˈubu, jˈule kuhˈani ˌakawˌaulˈiza, mnafˈaɲa nˈini.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, ɲamˈaza kˈimja! wˈeka mkˈono wˈako ɟˌuːja kˈiɲua tʃˈako na ˌufuatˈane nˈasi, ˈuwe bˈaba jˈetu na kuhˈani wˈetu. si ni ˌafaðˈali ˌutumikˈie kabˈila na ukˈoo katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌama kuhˈani kulˈiko kˌumtumikˈia ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake.|0
jˈule kuhˈani ˌakafurˈahi. ˌakatʃukˈua ˈile nˌaivˈera, zˈile sanˈamu ɲiŋɡˈine ndˈoɡo za ɲumbˈani, na sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈatu.|0
ndˈipo wˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuondˈoka wˌakiwˌataŋɡulˈiza mbˈele watˈoto wˌao wadˈoɡo, waɲˈama wˌao wa kufˈuɡwa na mˈali zˈao.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamesafˈiri umbˈali kidˈoɡo tˌoka ɲumbˈani kwa mˈika, wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi karˈibu na mˈika wˌakaˈitwa wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa, nˌao wˌakawˌafikˈia wadˈani.|0
wˌalipˌofuˌatilˈia wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele wadˈani wˌakawˌaɡeukˈia na kˌumwambˈia mˈika, ˈuna nˈini wˌewe hˌata ukˈaɟa na kˈundi la wˈatu nˈamna hˌii ˌili kˌupiɡˈana.|0
ˌakawaɟˈibu, mmˌetʃukˈua miˈuŋɡu jˈote nˌilijˌoitˌeŋɡenˈeza, mkˌatʃukˈua na kuhˈani wˈaŋɡu, nˌaɲi mkˌaondˈoka. nˌimebˈaki na nˈini kiŋɡˈine? mnˌawezˈaɟe kˌuniulˈiza, ˈuna nˈini wˈewe?.|0
wadˈani wˌakamɟˈibu, ˌusibiʃˈane na sˈisi, la sˈivjo wˈatu wˌeɲe hasˈira kˈali wˌatakˌuʃambulˈia, nˌawe na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈako mtˌapotˈeza maˈiʃa.|0
bˌasi wadˈani wˌakaˈenda zˈao, nˌaje mˈika ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa wˈana ŋɡˈuvu kumlˈiko jˈeje, ˌakaɡeˈuka na kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatʃukˈua vˈile mˈika ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza, na kuhˈani wˈake, wˌakaˌendelˈea hˌadi laˈiʃi, ðˈidi ja wˈatu walˈio na amˈani, wˌasiokˈuwa na wˌasiwˈasi. wˌakawˌaʃambulˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌuutˌeketˈeza ˈm̩ɟi wˌao kwa mˈoto.|0
hˌapakˈuwa na jejˈote wa kˌuwaokˈoa, kwa kˌuwa kˌulikˈuwa mbˈali sˈana na sidˈoni na hˌawakˈuwa na ˌuʃirˌikiˈano na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote. ˈm̩ɟi ˌulikˈuwa kwˈeɲe bˈonde karˈibu na bˈeθ rehˈobu. wadˈani wˌakauɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi na kuˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
wˌakauˈita ˈule ˈm̩ɟi dˈani kwa kˌufuˈata ɟˈina la bˈaba jˈao ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na ˌisraˈeli, iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo ˌulikˈuwa ˌukiˈitwa laˈiʃi hˈapo kwˈanza.|0
kˈiʃa wadˈani wˌakaɟˌisimˌamiʃˈia sanˈamu ˈile ja kutʃˈoŋɡa, nˌaje jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ɡerʃˈomu, mwˈana wa mˈose pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani wa kabˈila la wadˈani mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˌilipotˈekwa.|0
wˌakaˌisimamˈiʃa na kˌuiabˈudu hˈijo sanˈamu ja kutʃˈoŋɡa ja mˈika ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameˌiteŋɡenˈeza, wakˈati wˈote ˈule ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu ˌilipokˈuwa hˌuko ʃˈilo.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo ˌisraˈeli hˌawakˈuwa na mfˈalme. bˌasi mlˈawi mmˈoɟa ˌalijeˈiʃi sehˈemu za mbˈali katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, ˌakamtʃukˈua surˈia mmˈoɟa kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda.|0
lakˈini surˈia wˌake ˌakafˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba ðˈidi jˈake, nˌaje ˌakamwˈatʃa ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˌake hˌuko bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda. baˌada ja kukˈaa hˌuko kwa mˈuda wa miˈezi mˈinne.|0
mˈume wˌake ˌakaˈenda kumsˈihi ˌili arˈudi. ˌalikwˈenda na mtumˈiʃi wˌake na pˈunda wawˈili. jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamkˌaribˈiʃa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈake, bˈaba jˌake ˌalipomwˈona ˌakamkˌaribˈiʃa kwa furˈaha.|0
bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˈake, jaˈani, bˈaba jˌake jˈule msitʃˈana, ˌakamzuˈia ˌili akˈae, hˈivjo ˌakakˈaa na hˈujo bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake kwa sˈiku tˈatu, wakˈila, wakˈiɲua na kulˈala hˌuko.|0
sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne wˌakaˈamka mapˈema nˌaje ˌakaɟˌiandˈaa kˌuondˈoka, lakˈini bˈaba wa jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakamwambˈia mkwˈewe, ˌuɟibˌurudˈiʃe kwa kˈula kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, ndˈipo uwˈeze kwˈenda.|0
bˌasi wˌakakˈeti wˈote wawˈili ˌili kˈula na kˈuɲua pamˈoɟa. bˌaadˈaje bˈaba wa msitʃˈana ˌakamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali ˌubakˈie usˈiku hˈuu upˈate kˌuɟifˌurahˈiʃa nˈafsi jˈako.|0
bˌasi jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipotˈaka kˌuondˈoka bˈaba wa jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakamsˈihi, bˌasi ˌakabˈaki usˈiku ˈule.|0
ˌasubˈuhi ja sˈiku ja tˈano, ˌalipoˈamka ˌili ˌaondˈoke, bˈaba wa jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˌiburudˈiʃe nˈafsi jˈako. ŋɡˈoɟa mpˈaka mtʃˈana! kwa hˈijo wˈote wawˈili wakˈala tʃakˈula pamˈoɟa.|0
bˌasi wakˈati jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌoinˈuka aˈende zˈake, pamˈoɟa na surˈia wˌake na mtumˈiʃi wˈake, bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˈake, jaˈani, bˈaba wa jˈule msitʃˈana ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama sˈasa ɟiˈoni ˌinakˌaribˈia. ulˈale hˈapa usˈiku ˌunakˌaribˈia. ukˈae, ˌukaɟˌifurahˈiʃe nˈafsi jˈako. kˈeʃo ˌunawˈeza kuˈamka mapˈema ˌasubˈuhi na uˈende ɲumbˈani kwˈako.|0
lakˈini ˌakakatˈaa kulˈala tˈena, ˌakaondˈoka na kwˈenda mpˈaka jebˈusi n̩dˈio jˌerusalˈemu, akˈiwa na pˈunda wˌake wawˈili wˌaliˌotandikˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na surˈia wˈake.|0
ˌalipˌokaribˈia jebˈusi na usˈiku ukˈiwa ˌumekˌaribˈia, mtumˈiʃi ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana wˈake, hˈaja sˈasa nˌatuiŋɡˈie katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wa wˌajebˈusi tulˈale hˈumo.|0
lakˈini bwˈana wˌake ˌakamɟˈibu, hapˈana. hˌatutˌaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wa kiɡˈeni, ambˈao wˈatu wˌake si wˌaisraˈeli. tˌutaˌendelˈea mpˈaka tufˈike ɡibˈea.|0
ˌakasˈema, hˈaja, tˌuɟitahˈidi tufˈike ɡibˈea ˌau rˈama, nˌasi tˌutalˈala katˌika ˈm̩ɟi mmˌoɟawˈapo.|0
hˈivjo wˌakaˌendelˈea na safˈari, ɟˈua lˌikatʃwˈea wˌalipˌokaribˈia ɡibˈea ambˈao ni ˈm̩ɟi wa bˌeɲamˈini.|0
wˌakaɡeˈuka ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia na kulˈala ɡibˈea. wˌakaiŋɡˈia hˈumo, wˌakakˈeti kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa ˈm̩ɟi, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌewakˌaribˈiʃa kwˈake ˌili wapˈate kulˈala.|0
ɟiˈoni ˈile ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa m̩zˈee tˌoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko ɡibˈea wˈatu wa sehˈemu ˈile wˌalikˈuwa wˌabeɲamˈini, ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈazi za ʃˈamba.|0
ˌalipˌotazˈama na kˌuwaˈona hˈao wˌasafˈiri katˌika uwˈaɲɟa wa ˈm̩ɟi, jˈule m̩zˈee ˌakawˌaulˈiza, nˈiɲi mnakwˈenda wˈapi? nˌaɲi mmetˈoka wˈapi.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, tˌumepˈita kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda, tˌunaˌelekˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu, ambˈako ndˈiko nˌinakoˈiʃi. nˌilikwˈenda bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda na sˈasa nˌinakwˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌenikˌaribˈiʃa katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
tunˈazo ɲˈasi na tʃakˈula tʃa pˈunda wˈetu na mkˈate na divˈai kwa aɟˈili jˈetu sˌisi wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, jaˈani mˈimi, mtumˈiʃi wˈako mwanˈamke, pamˈoɟa na hˈuju kiɟˈana tˌulijˌefuatˈana nˈaje. hˌatuhitˈaɟi kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
jˈule m̩zˈee ˌakawˌaambˈia, amˈani ˈiwe kwˈenu! kˌaribˈuni ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˈapa mˌahitˈaɟi jˈenu jˈote, msilˈale katˌika uwˈaɲɟa hˈuu wa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
hˈivjo ˌakamwiŋɡˈiza ɲumbˈani mwˈake na kˌuwalˈiʃa pˈunda wˈake. baˌada ja kunˈawa miɡˈuu jˈao, wakˈala na kˈuɲua.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiɟˌiburudˈiʃa, wˈatu waˈovu wa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo, wˌakaˌiziŋɡˈira ˈile ɲˈumba. wˌakaɡˈoŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo na kusˈema na jˈule m̩zˈee mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba, m̩tˈoe ɲɟˈe jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeiŋɡˈia kwˈako, tupˈate kˌumlawˈiti.|0
jˈule mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe na kˌuwaambˈia, hapˈana, ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu msˈiwe waˈovu nˈamna hˌii, nˌinawasˈihi. kwa kˌuwa hˈuju ˈm̩tu ni mɡˈeni wˈaŋɡu msifˈaɲe ɟˈambo hˈili la aˈibu.|0
tˌazamˈeni, hˈapa jˈupo bˈinti jˈaŋɡu ambˈaje ni bikˈira na surˈia wa hˈuju ˈm̩tu. nˌitawˌatoleˈeni hˈawa sˈasa, mkˌawatwˈae kwa ŋɡˈuvu na kˌuwafaɲˈia lolˈote mtakˈalo. lakˈini kwa ˈm̩tu hˈuju msˌimfaɲˈie ɟˈambo ˈovu hˈivjo.|0
lakˈini wˈale wˈatu hˌawakˌumsikˈia. hˈivjo jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakamtˈoa jˈule surˈia wˌake ɲɟˈe kwa wˈale wˈatu, nˌao wˌakambˈaka na kˌumnaɟˈisi usˈiku ˈule kˈutʃa mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi. kˌulipoˈanza kˌupambazˈuka wˌakamwatʃˈia aˈende.|0
ˌalfaɟˈiri jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakarˈudi kwˈeɲe ˈile ɲˈumba bwˈana wˌake ˌalikokˈuwa, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini mlaŋɡˈoni, ˌakalˈala pˈale hˌata kˌulipˌopambazˈuka.|0
bwˈana wˌake ˌalipoˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na kˌufuŋɡˈua mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba na kutˈoka ɲɟˈe ˌili kˌuendelˈea na safˈari jˈake, tazˈama, jˈule surˈia wˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌameaŋɡˈuka pˈale pˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɲˈumba na mikˈono jˌake ikˈiwa pˈeɲe kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa tʃˈini.|0
ˌakamwambˈia jˈule surˈia, inˈuka, twˈende. lakˈini hˌakuɟˈibu. jˈule bwˈana ˌakamwinˈua ˌakampandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja pˈunda wˈake, wˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda ɲumbˈani.|0
ˌalipofˈika ɲumbˈani, ˌakatʃukˈua kˈisu na kˌumkatakˈata jˈule surˈia kiˈuŋɡo kwa kiˈuŋɡo, sehˈemu kˈumi na mbˈili, na kˌuvipelˈeka hˈivjo vipˈande katˌika sehˈemu zˈote za ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijeˈona ˌakasˈema, ɟˈambo la nˈamna hˌii hˌaliɟˌaonekˈana wˈala kˌutendˈeka, ʃˈu ˌisraˈeli wˌalipopˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri. fˌikirˈini ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili! tˌafakarˈini ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili! tˌuambiˈeni tufˈaɲe nˈini.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˈote kˌuanzˈia dˈani hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba na wa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi wˌakatˈoka kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wˌakakˌusaɲˈika mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko mˈispa.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa kabˈila za ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˈaa kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˈatu wa mˈuŋɡu, askˈari mˌiaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaendˈao kwa miɡˈuu wˌeɲe pˈaŋɡa.|0
wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakasikˈia kˌuwa wˌaisraˈeli wˌamepˈanda kwˈenda mˈispa. ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasˈema, tˌuelezˈeni ɟˈinsi ɟˈambo hˈili ˈovu lˌilivjˌotendˈeka.|0
hˈivjo jˈule mlˈawi, mˈume wa jˈule mwanˈamke ˌalijˌeuˈawa, ˌakasˈema, mˌimi na surˈia wˈaŋɡu tˌulifˈika ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini ˌili tulˈale hˌuko.|0
wakˈati wa usˈiku wˈatu wa ɡibˈea wˌakaniɟˈia na kˌuiziŋɡˈira ɲˈumba, wˌakitˈaka kˌuniˈua. wˌakambˈaka surˈia wˈaŋɡu mpˈaka akˈafa.|0
ndˈipo nˌikamtʃukˈua surˈia wˈaŋɡu, nˌikamkˌatakˈata vipˈande vipˈande na kˌuvipelˈeka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja urˈiθi wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa wˌametˈenda ˌuaʃerˈati mkˈubwa na ɟˈambo la aˈibu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˈasa, nˈiɲi wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, semˈeni na m̩tˈoe ˌuamˈuzi wˈenu.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌakainˈuka wˌakasˈema, kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌatakˌajekwˈenda ɲumbˈani. wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌatakˌajerˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
sˈasa hˈili ndˈilo tˌutakˌaloˌitendˈea ɡibˈea: tˌutaˌikabˈili ɟˈinsi kˈura ˌitakˌavjotˌuoŋɡˈoza.|0
tˌutatˈoa wˈatu kˈumi katˌika kˈila mˌiamˈoɟa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kabˈila zˈote za ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟa katˌika wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, ˌili waˈende wˌakalˈete mˌahitˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈeʃi. bˌasi wakˈati ɟˈeʃi lˌitakˌapofˈika ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini, wˌatawˌatendˈea jˈale wˌanajˌostahˈili, kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu hˈuu wa aˈibu wˌaliotˈenda katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo wˌanaˈume wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˌutanˈika pamˈoɟa na kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ðˈidi ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli jˌakatˈuma wˈatu kwˈenda katˌika kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini lˈote na kˌuwaambˈia, ni uˈovu ɡˈani hˈuu wa kutˈiʃa ˌuliˌotendˈeka kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
bˌasi wˌatoˈeni hˈao wˈatu waˈovu kabˈisa wˌaliˈoko ɡibˈea, ˌili tupˈate kˌuwaˈua na kˌuondˈoa uˈovu katˌika ˌisraˈeli. lakˈini wˌabeɲamˈini hˌawakˌuwasikˈia ndˈuɡu zˈao, wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wˌakatˈoka katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao, wˌakakˌutanˈika ɡibˈea ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaisraˈeli.|0
sˈiku ˈile wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakakusˈaɲa wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈao, wˌaliˌoɟifˈuŋɡa pˈaŋɡa, mbˈali na hˈao mˌiasˈaba wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌaliokˈaa ɡibˈea.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao askˈari wˈote kˌulikˈuwa na wˈatu mˌiasˈaba bˈora wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa wˌatumiˈao mkˈono wa kuʃˈoto, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌaliwˈeza kutˈupa ɟˈiwe kwa kombˈeo na kulˈeŋɡa ˌuɲuˈele mmˈoɟa bˌila kukˈosa.|0
nˌao wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, mbˈali na hˈao wa bˌeɲamˈini, wˌakakusˈaɲa wˈatu waˈume mˌiaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, wˌeɲe kˌutumˈia pˈaŋɡa, wˈote hˈao wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈanda beθˈeli na kˌumuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu, ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu ˌatakˌajetˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈetu ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na wˌabeɲamˈini? bwˈana ˌakawaɟˈibu, jˈuda n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetˌaŋɡulˈia.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˌake wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈamka na kupˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na ɡibˈea.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakatˈoka kˌupiɡˈana na wˌabeɲamˈini, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɟiwˈeka kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao katˌika vˈita ðˈidi jˈao hˌuko ɡibˈea.|0
lakˈini wˌaisraˈeli wˌakatiˈana mˈojo kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake, nˌao wˌakaɟiwˈeka kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao katˌika vˈile vˈita mˈara ja pˈili mahˈali pˈale wˌalipokˈuwa wˌameɟiwˈeka mˈara ja kwˈanza.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈanda mbˈele za bwˈana na kulˈia mbˈele zˌake mpˈaka ɟiˈoni, nˌao wˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana wˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, tupˈande tˈena kˌupiɡˈana vˈita na wˌabeɲamˈini, ndˈuɡu zˈetu? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, pandˈeni mkˌapiɡˈane nˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌakaribˈia wˌabeɲamˈini sˈiku ja pˈili.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, wˌabeɲamˈini wˌalipotˈoka ɡibˈea ˌili kˌupiɡˈana nˈao, wˌakawaˈua wˈatu wˌaisraˈeli kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, wˈote wakˈiwa wˌameɟifˈuŋɡa pˈaŋɡa.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli, wˈatu wˈote, wˌakapˈanda beθˈeli, hˌuko wˌakakˈaa mbˈele za bwˈana wˌakilˈia. wˌakafˈuŋɡa sˈiku ˈile mpˈaka ɟiˈoni na kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka ja amˈani kwa bwˈana.|0
nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaulˈiza kwa bwˈana. katˌika sˈiku hˈizo sandˈuku la aɡˈano la mˈuŋɡu lˌilikˈuwa hˌuko.|0
na fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari, mwˈana wa arˈoni, ˌalikˈuwa ˌanahudˈumu mbˈele za hˌilo sandˈuku. wˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, tupˈande kwˈenda vitˈani kˌupiɡˈana tˈena na wˌabeɲamˈini ndˈuɡu zˈetu, ˌau la? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, nendˈeni, kwa kˌuwa kˈeʃo nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˈeka wˌaviziˈao kˌuizuŋɡˈuka ɡibˈea.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈanda kˌupiɡˈana na wˌabeɲamˈini katˌika sˈiku ja tˈatu na kˌuɟiwˈeka kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao ðˈidi ja ɡibˈea kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa hˈapo kwˈanza.|0
wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakatˈoka ˌili kˌukabˌiliˈana nˈao, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawavˈuta wˌabeɲamˈini watˈoke katˌika ˈm̩ɟi. wˌakaˈanza kˌupiɡˈana na kuˈua wˈatu wˌapatˈao θˌelaθˈini wa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa ɲakˈati ɲiŋɡˈine, katˌika ɲɟˈia kˈuu, mˈoɟa ˌiendˈajo beθˈeli na ɲiŋɡˈine ɡibˈea.|0
wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakafikˈiri, wˌanapˈiɡwa mbˈele jˈetu kˌama hˈapo kwˈanza. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasˈema, sˌisi na turˈudi ɲˈuma ˌili tˌuwavˈute wˌauˈatʃe ˈm̩ɟi waˈende kˌuelekˈea bˌarabarˈani.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe sehˈemu zˈao na kˌuɟipˈaŋɡa hˌuko bˈaal tamˈari, nˌao wˈale wˌaviziˈaɟi wa wˌaisraˈeli, wˌakatˈoka hˈapo wˌalipokˈuwa kwˈeɲe uwˈanda wa mˌaɣarˈibi ja ɡibˈea.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri bˈora wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa katˌika ˌisraˈeli wˈote, wakˈaɟa kˌuiʃˌambulˈia ɡibˈea. vˈita vˌilikˈuwa vikˈali sˈana, hˌata wˌabeɲamˈini hˌawakˌutambˈua kˌuwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌalikˈuwa karˈibu nˌao kwa kiˈasi hˈitʃo.|0
hˈivjo wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakaˈona kˌuwa wˌamepˈiɡwa. bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌameondˈoka mbˈele ja wˌabeɲamˈini, kwa sabˈabu wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwˌateɡemˈea hˈao wˌaviziˈaɟi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewawˈeka ðˈidi ja ɡibˈea.|0
wˈale wˌaviziˈaɟi wˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kˌuiŋɡˈia ɡibˈea, wˌakasambˈaa na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌamepatˈana na hˈao wˌaviziˈaɟi kˌuwa wˌaŋɡefˈaɲa lipˈande wˈiŋɡu kˈubwa la mˈoʃi kutˈoka hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa wˌaisraˈeli wˌaŋɡeɡeˈuka kˌupiɡˈana. wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈanza kˌuwapˈiɡa na kuˈua wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌapatˈao θˌelaθˈini, hˈivjo wˌakafikˈiri, hakˈika tˌutawapˈiɡa, kˌama tˌulivjˌowaʃˈinda katˌika vˈita hˈapo kwˈanza.|0
lakˈini wakˈati lˈile wˈiŋɡu la mˈoʃi lˌilipoˈanza kupˈanda kutˈoka ˈule ˈm̩ɟi, wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakaɡeˈuka na kuˈona mˈoʃi wa ˈm̩ɟi mzˈima ˌunapˈaa ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakawˌaɡeukˈia, nˌao wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakatˈiwa hˈofu, kwa kˌuwa wˌalitambˈua kwˌamba maˈafa jˌamewaɟˈia.|0
bˌasi wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌuelekˈea ɲikˈani, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kukwˈepa vˈile vˈita. nˌao wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliotˈoka katˌika ˈile mˈiɟi wˌakawaˈua hˌuko.|0
wˌakawˌaziŋɡˈira wˌabeɲamˈini pˈande zˈote, wˌakawˌafuatˈia na kˌuwapˈata hˈapo wˌalipˌopumzˈika katˌika viˈuŋɡa vja ɡibˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
wˌakaaŋɡˈuka wˌabeɲamˈini kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao wˈote ni mˌaʃuɟˈaa.|0
wˌalipˌoɡeˈuka na kˌukimbˈia kˌuelekˈea ɲikˈani hˌata kˌufikˈia mwˈamba wa rimˈoni, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawaˈua wˈatu tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wakˈiwa ɲɟiˈani. wˌakawˌafuˈata kwa kˈasi mpˈaka ɡidˈomu hˌuko wˌakawaˈua wˈatu weŋɡˈine mbˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
lakˈini wˈatu mˌiasˈita wˌakakimbˈia kˌuelekˈea ɲikˈani katˌika mwˈamba wa rimˈoni, na kukˈaa hˌuko mˈuda wa miˈezi mˈinne.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakarˈudi na kuˈua wˈatu wˈote wa bˌeɲamˈini, pamˈoɟa na waɲˈama na kˈila wˌalitʃˌokikˈuta. pˈia kˈila ˈm̩ɟi wˌaliˌouˈona wˌaliutʃˈoma mˈoto.|0
wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈapa kwa kiˈapo kˈule mˈispa: hapˈana ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajemwˈoza bˈinti jˌake kwa wˌabeɲamˈini.|0
wˈatu wˌakaˈenda beθˈeli, wˌakakˈeti mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu mpˈaka ɟiˈoni, wˌakapˈaza saˈuti zˈao, wˌakalˈia sˈana.|0
wˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa nˈini ɟˈambo hˈili lˌimewapˈata wˌaisraˈeli? kwa nˈini kabˈila mˈoɟa la ˌisraˈeli lˌimekˌosekˈana.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema wˈatu wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu na kulˈeta sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani.|0
ndˈipo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasˈema, ni kabˈila lˈipi la ˌisraˈeli ambˈalo hˌalikufˈika katˌika mkutˈano kˌumkaribˈia bwˈana? kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewˈeka kiˈapo kikˈuu kˌuwa jejˈote ˌasijefˈika mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko mˈispa, kwa hakˈika ˌaŋɡeuˈawa.|0
bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaɣaˈiri kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌabeɲamˈini, wˌakasˈema, lˈeo kabˈila mˈoɟa lˌimekˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˈasa tˌutawezˈaɟe kuwˈapa mabˈinti zˈetu wˈawe wˌake zˈao kwa hˈao wˌaliobˈaki mˌaadˈamu tˌumeˈapa kwa bwˈana kˌuwa hˌatutawˈapa bˈinti zˈetu kˌuwa wˌake zˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˌakasˈema, ni kabˈila lˈipi la ˌisraˈeli ambˈalo hˌalikufˈika mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko mˈispa? wˌakaɡundˈua kˌuwa hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijetˈoka jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi ˌalijefˈika kambˈini kwa aɟˈili ja kˌusaɲˈiko la mkutˈano.|0
wˌalipˌohesˈabu wˌaliˈona hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi ˌalijˌekuwˈepo.|0
ndˈipo mkutˈano wˌakatˈuma askˈari kˈuminambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na wˌakawˌaamˈuru kwˈenda jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi na kˌuwaˈua wˈale wˈote wˌaiʃˈio hˌuko, wˌalikuwˈepo wˌake na watˈoto.|0
wˌakasˈema, hˌilo ndˈilo mtˌakalofˈaɲa. uˈeni kˈila ˈm̩tu mˈume na ˈm̩ke ambˈaje si bikˈira.|0
wˌakakˈuta kˈati ja wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi wˌanawˈali mˈia ˈn̩ne ambˈao hˌawaɟˌakutˈana kimwˈili na mwˌanaˈume, nˌao wˌakawˌatʃukˈua kwˈeɲe kˈambi hˌuko ʃˈilo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani.|0
ndˈipo mkutˈano ˌukatˈuma uɟˈumbe wa amˈani kwa wˌabeɲamˈini hˌuko katˌika mwˈamba wa rimˈoni.|0
bˌasi wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao, wˌakapˈewa wˈale wˌanawˈali wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi wˌaliˌowapˈoɲa. lakˈini hˌawakˌuwatˈoʃa wˌanaˈume wˈote.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakasˌikitˈika kwa aɟˈili ja wˌabeɲamˈini, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewˈeka ˈufa katˌika mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˌusaɲˈiko wˌakasˈema, kwa kˌuwa wˌanawˈake wa wˌabeɲamˈini wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa, tˌufaɲˈeɟe ˌili kˌuwapatˈia wˌake wˈale wˌanaˈume wˌaliˌosalˈia.|0
wˈale wˌaliopˈona wa wˌabeɲamˈini ni lazˈima tuwˈape wˈake, ˌili wˈawe na warˈiθi, ˌili kabˈila lolˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli lˌisifutˈike.|0
hˌatuwˈezi kuwˈapa bˈinti zˈetu kˌuwa wˈake, kwa kˌuwa sˌisi wˌaisraˈeli tˌumeˈapa kiˈapo hˈiki: ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu jejˈote ampˈaje mbˌeɲamˈini ˈm̩ke..|0
ndˈipo wˌaliposˈema, tazˈama ˈiko sˌikukˈuu ja kˈila mwˈaka ja bwˈana katˌika ʃˈilo, kˌaskazˈini ja beθˈeli na mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa ˈile bˌarabˈara ˌitokˈajo beθˈeli kwˈenda ʃekˈemu, upˈande wa kusˈini wa lebˈona.|0
hˈivjo wˌakawˌaelekˈeza wˌabeɲamˈini wˌakisˈema, nendˈeni mkˌaɟifˈitʃe kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu.|0
nˌaɲi mwˌaŋɡalˈie. wˌasitʃˈana wa ʃˈilo wˌatakˌapoɟiˈuŋɡa kwˈeɲe kutʃˈeza, nˈiɲi tokˈeni kwˈeɲe hˈajo maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakamˈate mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa tˌoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌasitʃˈana wa ʃˈilo na mwˈende nˌao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini.|0
bˈaba zˈao ˌau ndˈuɡu zˈao waˈume wˌatakˌapotˌulalˌamikˈia, tˌutawˌaambˈia, kuwˈeni wˌakarˈimu kwˈetu, nˌaɲi mtˌuruhˈusu tˈuwe nˌao kwa kˌuwa hˌatukuwˈeza kˈumpa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˈm̩ke tˌulipˌopiɡˈana. lakˈini nˈiɲi pˈia hˈamna hatˈia, kwa kˌuwa hˌamkuwˈapa wˌao bˈinti zˈenu kˌuwa wˈake..|0
bˌasi hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌabeɲamˈini wˌalivjofˈaɲa. wakˈati wˌasitʃˈana wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakitʃˈeza, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakamkamˈata msitʃˈana mmˈoɟa ˌakamtʃukˈua ˌakaˈenda nˌaje ˌili ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake. kˈiʃa wˌakarˈudi katˌika urˈiθi wˌao na kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja mˈiɟi na kuˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
wakˈati hˈuo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaondˈoka sehˈemu ˈile na kwˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈao, kwˈeɲe mˌakabˈila jˈao na kwa ɟamˈaa zˈao, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe urˈiθi wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo kˌulikˈuwa hakˈuna mfˈalme katˌika ˌisraˈeli; kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalifˈaɲa kˈile ˌalitʃoˈona ni sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
wakˈati wˌaamˈuzi wˌalipˌotawˈala ˌisraˈeli, kˌulikˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda, pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke wˌake na wanˈawe wawˈili, ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌaliˈitwa ˌelimelˈeki, mkˈewe ˌaliˈitwa naˈomi, na hˈao wanˈawe wawˈili wˌaliˈitwa malˈoni na kˌiliˈoni. wˌalikˈuwa wˌaefrˈaθi kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda. wˌakaˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, wˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
ˌelimelˈeki mumˈewe naˈomi akˈafa, hˈivjo naˈomi ˌakabˈaki na wanˈawe wawˈili.|0
nˌao wˌakaˈoa wˌanawˈake wˌamoˈabu, ɟˈina la mmˈoɟa ˌaliˈitwa ˈorpa, na wa pˈili ˌaliˈitwa rˈuθu. baˌada ja kˌama miˈaka kˈumi.|0
malˈoni na kˌiliˈoni pˈia wakˈafa. bˌasi naˈomi ˌakabˈaki hˈana mˈume wˈala wanˈawe wawˈili.|0
ˌalipˌosikˈia akˈiwa hˌuko moˈabu kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamewˌasaidˈia wˈatu wˌake kwa kuwˈapa tʃakˈula, naˈomi na wakwˈeze wˌakaɟˌiandˈaa kurˈudi ɲumbˈani.|0
jˌeje na wakwˈeze wawˈili wˌakaondˈoka pˈale wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi na kuʃˈika ɲɟˈia kurˈudi ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda.|0
ndˈipo naˈomi ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale wˈakwe zˌake wawˈili, rudˈini, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ɲumbˈani kwa mˈama jˈake. bwˈana na ˌawatendˈee faðˈili kˌama mlˌivjowˌatendˈea hˈao wˌaliˌofarˈiki, na pˈia mˈimi.|0
bwˈana na ˌamɟalˈie kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu maˈiʃa mˈema ɲumbˈani kwa mˈume mwiŋɡˈine. kˈiʃa ˌakawabˈusu, nˌao wˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, tˌutarˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˌewe ɲumbˈani kwa wˈatu wˈako.|0
lakˈini naˈomi ˌakasˈema, rudˈini ɲumbˈani, bˈinti zˈaŋɡu. kwa nˈini mnˌifuˈate? ɟˈe, mˌimi nˌitawˈeza tˈena kˌuwa na wˈana weŋɡˈine ambˈao wˌatawˈeza kˌuwaˈoa nˈiɲi.|0
rudˈini ɲumbˈani, bˈinti zˈaŋɡu; mˌimi ni m̩zˈee kiˈasi kwˌamba siwˈezi kumpˈata mˈume mwiŋɡˈine. hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡefˌikirˈia kˌuwa bˈado kˈuna tˌumaˈini kwˈaŋɡu, hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na mˈume usˈiku hˈuu na kˌuwazˈaa wˈana.|0
ɟˈe, mŋɡˌesubˈiri mpˈaka wakˈue? mŋɡˌebakˈia bˌila kˌuolˈewa mkˌiwasubˈiri? la, hˈaʃa, bˈinti zˈaŋɡu. nˌimepˈata utʃˈuŋɡu kulˈiko nˈiɲi, kwa sabˈabu mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌumekˈuwa kiɲˈume nˈami.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakalˈia tˈena kwa saˈuti. ˈorpa ˌakambˈusu mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈake, ˌakaˈenda zˈake, lakˈini rˈuθu ˌakaˌambatˈana nˈaje.|0
naˈomi ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama, mwenzˈako ˌanareɟˈea kwa wˈatu wˌake na kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈake. rˈudi pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
lakˈini rˈuθu ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌusinisˈihi nˌikuˈatʃe ˌau niˈatʃe kˌukufuˈata. ˌutakˌakokwˈenda nˌami nˌitakwˈenda, na wˌewe ˌutakˌapoˈiʃi nˌitaˈiʃi. wˈatu wˈako wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, na mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
pˈale ˌutakˌapofˈia nˌami nˌitafˈia hˈapo, na pˈapo hˈapo nˌitazˈikwa. bwˈana na ˌaniaðˈibu vikˈali, kˌama kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote kˌitanitˈeŋɡa nˌawe ˌisipokˈuwa kˈifo.|0
naˈomi ˌalipˌotambˈua kwˌamba rˈuθu ˌamenuˈia kˌufuatˈana nˈaje, hˌakuˌendelˈea kumsˈihi tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈao wˌanawˈake wawˈili wˌakaondˈoka, wˌakafˈika bˌeθlehˈemu. wˌalipofˈika bˌeθlehˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi mzˈima ˌulitˌaharˈuki, wˌanawˈake wˌakaʃaŋɡˈaa, wˌakasˈema, hˈuju awˈeza kˌuwa ni naˈomi.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, msˌiniˈite tˈena naˈomi, nˌiitˈeni mˈara, kwa sabˈabu mweɲˈezi ˌamenˌitendˈea mˈambo matʃˈuŋɡu sˈana.|0
mˌimi nˌiliondˈoka hˈali nˌimeɟˈaa, lakˈini bwˈana ˌamenˌirudˈiʃa mtˈupu. kwa nˈini kˌuniˈita naˈomi? bwˈana ˌamenˌitendˈea mˈambo matʃˈuŋɡu; mweɲˈezi ˌamenˌiletˈea msˈiba.|0
kwa hˈijo naˈomi ˌalirˈudi pamˈoɟa na rˈuθu mmoˈabu ˈm̩kwe wˈake, nˌao wˌakafˈika bˌeθlehˈemu mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa kuvˈuna ʃajˈiri.|0
rˈuθu, mmoˈabu, ˌakamwambˈia naˈomi, nˌitakwˈenda mˌaʃambˈani nˌikaokˈote mabˈaki ja nafˈaka ɲˈuma ja jˈule nˌitakˌajepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈake. naˈomi ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi ˌakaˈenda, ˌakaokˈota mabˈaki ja nafˈaka mˌaʃambˈani ɲˈuma ja wˌavunˈaɟi. ˌikatokˈea kwˌamba ˌaliɟikˈuta ˌanafˈaɲa kˈazi kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba lˌililokˈuwa mˈali ja boˈazi, ambˈaje ˌalitˈoka kwˈeɲe ukˈoo wa ˌelimelˈeki.|0
pˈapo hˈapo boˈazi ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu, ˌakawˌasalˈimu wˌavunˈaɟi, ˌakasˈema, bwˈana ˈawe nˈaɲi! nˌao wˌakamɟˈibu, bwˈana ˌakubarˈiki.|0
boˈazi ˌakamˌuulˈiza msˌimamˈizi wa wˌavunˈaɟi, ɟˈe, jˈule mwˌanamwˈali ni wa nˈani.|0
msˌimamˈizi ˌakamɟˈibu, ni jˈule mmoˈabu ˌalijerˈudi kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu pamˈoɟa na naˈomi.|0
jˌeje ˌaliˈomba, tˌafaðˈali nˌiruhˈusu nˌiokˈote na kˌukusˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa miɡˈanda ɲˈuma ja wˌavunˈaɟi. nˌaje ˌameʃˈinda ʃambˈani ʃˈu ˌasubˈuhi pasˈipo kˌupumzˈika, ˌisipokˈuwa kwa mˈuda mfˈupi kˌivulˈini.|0
kˈiʃa boˈazi ˌakamwambˈia rˈuθu, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, nˌisikilˈize. ˌusiˈende kˌuokˈota mabˈaki ja mavˈuno katˌika ʃˈamba liŋɡˈine, na ˌusiondˈoke hˈapa. kˈaa hˈapa na hˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wa kˈike.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia ʃˈamba wˌanaˈume wˌanamovˈuna, ˌufuˈate ɲˈuma jˈao. nˌimewˌaamˈuru wˌanaˈume hˈawa wˌasikuɡˈuse. wakˈati wowˈote ˌukiˈona kˈiu, nˈenda kwˈeɲe mitˈuŋɡi ukˈaɲue mˈaɟi wˌalijˌojatˈeka wˌanaˈume hˈawa.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili, ˌakasuɟˈudu mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈinsi ɡˈani nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, hˌata ˌukaniɟˈali mˌimi mɡˈeni.|0
boˈazi ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌimeambˈiwa jˈote ˌulijˌomtendˈea mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈako ʃˈu mˈume wˈako ˌalipˌofarˈiki, na ɟˈinsi ˌulivjomwˈatʃa bˈaba jˈako na mˈama jˈako na ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌulimˌozalˈiwa, ukˈaɟa kuˈiʃi na wˈatu ambˈao hˌukuwˌafahˈamu awˈali.|0
bwˈana na ˌakulˈipe kwa jˈale ˌulijˌojatˈenda. ˌubarikˈiwe kwa wˈiŋɡi na bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje ˌumekˌimbilˈia mˌabawˈani mwˈake.|0
kˈiʃa rˈuθu ˌakasˈema, naˈomba nˌiendelˈee kupˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. kwa maˈana ˌumenˌifarˈiɟi na ˌumezuŋɡˈumza kwa ˌukarˈimu na mɟakˈazi wˈako, hˌata iŋɡˈawa mˌimi si bˈora kˌama mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wa kˈike.|0
wakˈati wa tʃakˈula, boˈazi ˌakamwambˈia rˈuθu, kˌaribˈia hˈapa. kˈula mkˈate na utʃˈovje ndˈani ja sˈiki. ˌalipokˈeti pamˈoɟa na wˌavunˈaɟi, akˈampa nafˈaka zˌilizoˈokwa. akˈala kiˈasi ˌalitʃotˈaka na kusˈaza.|0
ˌalipˌoinˈuka ˌili kˌuokˈota mabˈaki ja nafˈaka, boˈazi ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu wˈake, hˌata kˌama ˌatakusˈaɲa kˈati ja miɡˈanda, msˌimzuˈie.|0
badˈala jˈake, toˈeni masˈuke katˌika miɡˈanda, mwˌatʃiˈeni ˌajaokˈote, na msˌimkemˈee.|0
bˌasi rˈuθu ˌakaokˈota masˈazo ʃambˈani hˌata ɟiˈoni. ˌakatwˈaŋɡa ˈile ʃajˈiri ˌalijˌokusˈaɲa, ˌikaɟˈaa ˈefa mˈoɟa.|0
ˌakaibˈeba na kˌuelekˈea mɟˈini, nˌaje mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˌake ˌakaˈona ɟˈinsi ˌalivjowˈeza kˌuokˈota nafˈaka ɲˈiŋɡi. pˈia rˈuθu ˌakatʃukˈua kˈile ˌalitʃˌobakˈiza baˌada ja kˈula na kuʃˈiba, akˈampa.|0
bˌasi mkwˈewe ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌumeokˈota wˈapi lˈeo? ˌumefˈaɲa kˈazi wˈapi? ˌabarikˈiwe ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijˌekuɟˈali. ndˈipo rˈuθu ˌakamwambˈia mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˌake ɟˌuːja jˈule ambˈaje jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefaɲˈia kˈazi katˌika ʃˈamba lˈake. ˌakasˈema, jˈule ˈm̩tu nˌilijˌefaɲˈia kˈazi kwˈake lˈeo, ˌanaˈitwa boˈazi.|0
nˌaje naˈomi ˌakamwambˈia mkwˈewe, bwˈana ˌambarˈiki! hˌakuˈatʃa kˌuoɲˈeʃa faðˈili zˌake kwa walˈio hˈai na kwa wˌaliokˈufa. pˈia ˌakamwambˈia, hˈujo ˈm̩tu ni mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa jˈetu wa karˈibu ˌanajˌestahˈili kˌutukombˈoa.|0
kˈiʃa rˈuθu, mmoˈabu, ˌakasˈema, hˌata ˌalinˌiambˈia, kˈaa pamˈoɟa na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mpˈaka wˌatakˌapomalˈiza kuvˈuna nafˈaka jˈaŋɡu jˈote..|0
kˈiʃa naˈomi ˌakamwambˈia rˈuθu mkwˈewe, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ˌitakˈuwa vjˈema wˌewe ˌufuatˈane na wˌasitʃˈana wˈake, kwa sabˈabu katˌika ʃˈamba la ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine wˌanawˈeza kˌukuðˈuru.|0
kwa hˈivjo rˈuθu ˌakafˌuatˈana na wˌatumˈiʃi wa kˈike wa boˈazi, ˌakaokˈota mpˈaka mwˈiʃo wa mavˈuno ja ʃajˈiri na ja ŋɡˈano. nˌaje ˌaliˈiʃi na mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa naˈomi ˌakamwambˈia mkwˈewe, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ɟˈe, nˌisiŋɡˌelikˌutafutˈia pumzˈiko ambˈako ˌutatunzˈika vjˈema.|0
ɟˈe, boˈazi, ambˈaje ˌumekˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌasitʃˈana, si ɟamˈaa jˈetu wa karˈibu? usˈiku wa lˈeo ˌatakˈuwa ˌanapepˈeta ŋɡˈano kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia.|0
bˌasi ˈoɡa na ˌukaɟipˈake marˈaʃi, ˌuɟivalˈie ŋɡˈuo zˈako nzˈuri. kˈiʃa uˈende kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, lakˈini ˌaŋɡalˈia ˌasiɟˈue kwˌamba ˈupo pˈale mpˈaka ˌatakˌapomalˈiza kˈula na kˈuɲua.|0
ˌatakˌapokwˈenda kulˈala, ˌaŋɡalˈia mahˈali ˌatakˌapolˈala. kˈiʃa uˈende ˌufunˈue miɡˈuu jˈake, ulˈale. nˌaje ˌatakˌuambˈia ˌutakˌalofˈaɲa.|0
rˈuθu ˌakaɟˈibu, lolˈote ˌusemˈalo nˌitatˈenda.|0
bˌasi ˌakaʃˈuka mpˈaka kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, ˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˌake ˌalitʃˌomwambˈia kufˈaɲa.|0
usˈiku wa manˈane, kˈitu kˌilimʃtˈua boˈazi, ˌakaɟˌiɡeˈuza, ˌakaɡundˈua jˈupo mwanˈamke ˌamelˈala mˌiɡuˈuni pˈake.|0
ˌakaulˈiza, wˌewe ni nˈani? ˌakaɟˈibu, ni mˌimi rˈuθu, mɟakˈazi wˈako. ˌuitˈande ŋɡˈuo jˈako ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ndˈiwe ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌutukombˈoa.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ˌubarikˈiwe na bwˈana. wˈema hˈuu wa sˈasa ni m̩kˈuu kuʃˈinda hˌata ˈule ˌuliˌooɲˈeʃa mwanzˈoni. hˌukuwˌakimbilˈia viɟˈana, wakˈiwa mˌataɟˈiri ˌau maskˈini.|0
sˈasa, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ˌusioɡˈope. nˌitakˌufaɲˈia jˈote ˌulijoˈomba. kwa maˈana ˈm̩ɟi wˈote wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanakuɟˈua ja kwˌamba wˌewe ni mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe tabˈia nzˈuri.|0
iŋɡˈawa ni kwˈeli kwˌamba mˌimi n̩dˈije ɟamˈaa alˈije karˈibu, bˈado kˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine wa ɟamˈaa alˈije karˈibu zaˈidi wa kˌukombˈoa kulˈiko mˈimi.|0
wˌewe kˈaa hˈapa usˈiku hˈuu, kˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi kˌama ˌakikubˈali kˌukombˈoa, vjˈema na ˌakombˈoe. la sˈivjo kˌama hajˈuko tajˈari, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo nˌitafˈaɲa hˈivjo. lˈala hˈapa mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
hˈivjo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakalˈala mˌiɡuˈuni pˈake mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi, ˌakaondˈoka mapˈema pasˈipo ˈm̩tu kuwˈeza kˌumtambˈua mwenzˈake, maˈana boˈazi ˌalisˈema, ˌisiɟˌulikˈane kabˈisa ja kˌuwa mwanˈamke ˌalifˈika kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia.|0
pˈia ˌakamwambˈia, lˈeta ʃˈela jˈako ˌulijˌoivˈaa, ˌuitandˈaze. nˌaje ˌalipˌoitandˈaza, ˌakamimˈina vipˈimo sˈita vja ʃajˈiri, ˌakamtwˈika. kˈiʃa rˈuθu ˌakarˈudi zˌake mɟˈini.|0
bˌasi rˈuθu ˌalipofˈika kwa mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˌake naˈomi, ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ˌilikuwˈaɟe hˌuko? ndˈipo ˌakamwˌelezˈea kˈila kˈitu boˈazi ˌalitʃˌomfaɲˈia.|0
ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, ˌamenˈipa ʃajˈiri vipˈimo sˈita ˌakisˈema, ˌusiˈende kwa mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈako mikˈono mitˈupu..|0
kˈiʃa naˈomi ˌakasˈema, subˈiri bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, mpˈaka ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba hˈili ɟˈambo lˌimekwendˈaɟe. kwa sabˈabu ˈm̩tu hˈuju hˌatatulˈia mpˈaka ˌakamilˈiʃe ɟˈambo hˈili lˈeo.|0
boˈazi ˌakakwˈea mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakakˈeti pˈale. jˈule ˈm̩tu wa ɟamˈaa ˌalijekˈuwa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa, ambˈaje boˈazi ˌalimtˈaɟa, akˈaɟa. boˈazi ˌakasˈema, ɲɟˈoo hˈapa, rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu. karˈibu ukˈeti. nˌaje ˌakakˌaribˈia, ˌakakˈeti.|0
boˈazi ˌakatwˈaa wˈatu kˈumi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakawˌaambˈia, ketˈini hˈapa. nˌao wˌakakˈeti.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia jˈule ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa, naˈomi, ˌalijerˈudi hˈapa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu, ˌanaˈuza sehˈemu ja ˈarði ˌilijokˈuwa mˈali ja ndˈuɡu jˈetu ˌelimelˈeki.|0
nˌami nˌiliwˈaza nˌikuɟulˈiʃe wˌewe na kˌukuambˈia ˌuinunˈue mbˈele ja hˈawa wˌaliˈopo hˈapa, na mbˈele ja wazˈee wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. kˌama wˌewe ˌutaˌikombˈoa, hˈaja fˈaɲa hˈivjo. lakˈini kˌama hˌutaˌikombˈoa, ˌuniambˈie, ˌili niɟˈue. kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine mwˌeɲe hˈaki ja kˌuikombˈoa ˈila wˌewe na baˌada jˈako ni mˈimi. nˌaje ˌakasˈema, nˌitaˌikombˈoa mˈimi.|0
ndˈipo boˈazi ˌakasˈema sˈiku ˌutakˌaponunˈua hˈijo ˈarði kutˈoka kwa naˈomi na rˈuθu, mmoˈabu, ˌitakubˈidi kˌumtʃukˈua pˈia hˈujo mɟˈane, ˌili kˌudumˈiʃa ɟˈina la mˌarehˈemu pamˈoɟa na mˈali jˈake.|0
ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, jˈule ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa ˌakasˈema, bˌasi mˌimi sˌitawˈeza kˌuikombˈoa, kwa sabˈabu ˌinaˌonekˈana nˌitaˌuhatarˈiʃa urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu. wˌewe ˌikombˈoe mweɲˈewe. mˌimi sˌitawˈeza.|0
bˌasi katˌika sˈiku za kˈale hˌuko ˌisraˈeli, ˌili kˌukamilˈiʃa tˈendo la kˌukombˈoa na kˌukabˌiðiˈana mˈali, mmˈoɟa huvˈua kiˈatu tʃˈake na kˌumpatˈia mwiŋɡˈine. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa ni ɲɟˈia ja kˌuhalalˈiʃa mˌabadˌiliʃˈano katˌika ˌisraˈeli..|0
bˌasi jˈule ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa ˌakamwambˈia boˈazi, wˌewe ˌinunˈue mweɲˈewe. nˌaje hˈujo ɟamˈaa ˌakavˈua kiˈatu tʃˈake.|0
kˈiʃa boˈazi ˌakawˌataŋɡazˈia wazˈee na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈepo, lˈeo nˈiɲi ni mˌaʃahˈidi kwˌamba mˌimi nˌimenunˈua kutˈoka kwa naˈomi jˈote jˌalijokˈuwa mˈali ja ˌelimelˈeki, kˌiliˈoni na malˈoni.|0
nˌimemtʃukˈua pˈia rˈuθu, mmoˈabu, mɟˈane wa malˈoni, ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu, ˌili kˌuendelˈeza ɟˈina la mˌarehˈemu pamˈoɟa na mˈali zˈake, ˌili ɟˈina lˈake mˌarehˈemu lˌisitowˈeke mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟamˈaa jˈake, wˈala katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za ˈm̩ɟi wˈake. lˈeo hˈivi nˈiɲi ni mˌaʃahˈidi.|0
kˈiʃa wazˈee pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa laŋɡˈoni wˌakasˈema, sˌisi ni mˌaʃahˈidi. bwˈana na amfˈaɲe mwanˈamke hˈuju ˌaiŋɡiˈaje ɲumbˈani mwˈako kˌuwa kˌama rahˈeli na kˌama lˈea, wˈale wˌanawˈake wawˈili ambˈao pamˈoɟa wˌaliiɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. nˌawe ˌufanikˈiwe katˌika efrˈaθi na ˈuwe mˌaʃuhˈuri katˌika bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
kˌupitˈia kwa watˈoto ambˈao bwˈana ˌatakˈupa kˌutokˈana na hˈuju mwˌanamwˈali, ɟamˈaa jˈako na ˌifanˈane na ja perˈesi, ambˈaje tamˈari ˌalimzalˈia jˈuda.|0
bˌasi boˈazi ˌakamwˈoa rˈuθu, nˌaje akˈawa ˈm̩ke wˈake. ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia kwˈake, bwˈana ˌakamɟalˈia rˈuθu, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakamzˈaa mtˈoto wa kiˈume.|0
wˌanawˈake wˌakamwambˈia naˈomi: ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, ˌasijˌekuˈatʃa bˌila kˌuwa na ɟamˈaa wa karˈibu wa kˌukombˈoa. na ˈawe mˌaʃuhˈuri katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
ˌatakˌureɟeʃˈea uhˈai wˈako na kˌukuˌaŋɡalˈia katˌika sˈiku za uzˈee wˈako. kwa maˈana m̩kwˈeo ambˈaje ˌanakupˈenda, na ambˈaje kwˈako ni bˈora zaˈidi ja watˈoto wa kiˈume sˈaba, n̩dˈije ˌalimzˈaa.|0
bˌasi naˈomi ˌakamtʃukˈua jˈule mtˈoto, ˌakampakˈata na akˈawa mlˈezi wˈake.|0
wˌanawˈake wˌaliokˈuwa ɟirˈani zˌake wˌakasˈema, naˈomi ˈana mtˈoto wa kiˈume. wˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake obˈedi. jˌeje n̩dˈije bˈaba jˌake jˈese, alˈije bˈaba jˌake daˈudi.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vizˈazi vja perˈesi: perˈesi ˌalimzˈaa hesrˈoni.|0
hesrˈoni ˌakamzˈaa rˈamu, rˈamu ˌakamzˈaa ˌaminadˈabu.|0
ˌaminadˈabu ˌakamzˈaa naʃˈoni, naʃˈoni ˌakamzˈaa salmˈoni.|0
salmˈoni ˌakamzˈaa boˈazi, boˈazi ˌakamzˈaa obˈedi.|0
obˈedi ˌakamzˈaa jˈese, na jˈese ˌakamzˈaa daˈudi.|0
kˌulikuwˈepo na ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka rˈama, msˈufi kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ˌaliˈitwa ˌelikˈana mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, mwˈana wa elˈihu mwˈana wa tˈohu, mwˈana wa sˈufu, mwˌefraˈimu.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na wˌake wawˈili, mmˈoɟa ˌaliˈitwa hˈana na mwiŋɡˈine penˈina. penˈina ˌalikˈuwa na watˈoto, lakˈini hˈana hakˈuwa na mtˈoto.|0
kˈila mwˈaka ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌalikwˈea kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wˌake ˌili kˌuabˈudu na kutˈoa ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote hˌuko ʃˈilo, ambˈapo hˈofni na fˌinehˈasi, wˈana wawˈili wa ˈeli, wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana.|0
kˈila mˈara ˌilipofˈika sˈiku ja ˌelikˈana kutˈoa ðabˈihu, ˌaliwˈapa mafˈuŋɡu penˈina mkˈewe na wanˈawe wˈote pamˈoɟa na bˈinti zˈake.|0
lakˈini alˈimpa hˈana fˈuŋɡu mˌaradˈufu kwa sabˈabu ˌalimpˈenda, iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemfˈuŋɡa tˈumbo.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemfˈuŋɡa tˈumbo, ˈm̩ke mwenzˈake ˌalikˈuwa ˌanamtʃokˈoza ˌili kˌumuˈuði.|0
hˈili lˌiliˌendelˈea mwˈaka baˌada ja mwˈaka. kˈila mˈara hˈana ˌalipokwˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, ˈm̩ke mwenzˈake ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimkˌasirˈiʃa mpˈaka ˌanalˈia na kuʃˈindwa kˈula.|0
ˌelikˈana mumˈewe akˈawa ˌanamwambˈia, hˈana, kwa nˈini ˌunalˈia? kwa nˈini hˈuli? kwa nˈini kˌuvuɲɟˈika mˈojo? ɟˈe, mˌimi si bˈora zaˈidi kwˈako kulˈiko watˈoto kˈumi.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamemalˈiza kˈula na kˈuɲua hˌuko ʃˈilo, hˈana ˌalisimˈama. wakˈati hˈuo kuhˈani ˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti pembˈeni ˌm̩wa mwˈimo wa mlˈaŋɡo wa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wa rohˈoni hˈana ˌalilˈia sˈana na ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana.|0
nˌaje ˌakawˈeka naðˈiri, ˌakisˈema, ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, laˈiti ˌuŋɡeˌaŋɡalˈia huzˈuni kˈuu ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako na kˌunikumbˈuka mˈimi, wˈala ˌusimsahˈau mtumˈiʃi wˈako nˌawe ukˈampa mwˈana, bˌasi hˈujo mwˈana nˌitamtˈoa kwa bwˈana kwa sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake, wˈala wˈembe hˌautapˈita kitʃwˈani mwˈake.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanaˌendelˈea kumwˈomba bwˈana, ˈeli ˌalitʃuŋɡˈuza kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
hˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈomba mojˈoni mwˈake, midˈomo jˌake ikˈiwa ˌinatʃˌezatʃˈeza lakˈini saˈuti hˌaikˌusikˈika. ˈeli ˌakafikˈiri ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈewa.|0
nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia, ˌutaˌendelˈea kulˈewa mpˈaka lˈini? ˌatʃilˈia mbˈali mvˈiɲo wˈako.|0
hˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, si hˈivjo bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi ni mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe huzˈuni kˈubwa. mˌimi siɟˈaɲua mvˈiɲo wˈala kilˈeo, nˌilikˈuwa nˌinaˌumimˈina mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana.|0
ˌusimðanˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako kˌuwa mwanˈamke mwˈovu; nˌimekˈuwa nˌikiˈomba hˈapa katˌika wˈiŋɡi wa utʃˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu na huzˈuni.|0
ˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈenda kwa amˈani, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na ˌakuɟalˈie kˈile ˌulitʃomwˈomba.|0
hˈana ˌakasˈema, mtumˈiʃi wˈako na apˈate kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako. kˈiʃa ˌakaondˈoka zˌake na kˈula tʃakˈula, wˈala ˈuso wˌake hˌaukˈuwa na huzˈuni tˈena.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema wˌaliˈamka wˌakaabˈudu mbˈele za bwˈana na kˈiʃa wˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈao hˌuko rˈama. ˌelikˈana ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na mkˈewe hˈana, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamkumbˈuka.|0
hˈivjo wakˈati ˌulipˌotimˈia, hˈana ˌakapˈata mˈimba na ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana. hˈana ˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake samwˈeli, ˌakasˈema, kwa kˌuwa nˌilimwˈomba kwa bwˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌelikˈana ˌalipˈanda pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˌake jˈote kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja mwˈaka kwa bwˈana na kˌutimˈiza naðˈiri jˈake.|0
hˈana hakwˈenda. ˌalimwambˈia mˈume wˈake, baˌada ja mtˈoto kˌuatʃˈiʃwa kuɲˈoɲa, nˌitamtʃukˈua na kˌumpelˈeka mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌaje ˌataˈiʃi hˌuko wakˈati wˈote.|0
ˌelikˈana mumˈewe ˌakamwambˈia, fˈaɲa lˈile ˌunaloˈona ni bˈora zaˈidi kwˈako. ukˈae hˈapa mpˈaka ˌutakˌapomwatʃˈiʃa kuɲˈoɲa, bwˈana na ˌakuɟalˈie kˌutimˈiza naðˈiri jˈako. hˈivjo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakakˈaa ɲumbˈani na kˌumɲoɲˈeʃa mwanˈawe mpˈaka ˌalipˌomwatʃˈiʃa kuɲˈoɲa.|0
baˌada ja mtˈoto kˌuatʃˈiʃwa kuɲˈoɲa, hˈana ˌakamtʃukˈua hˈujo mtˈoto, akˈiwa mdˈoɡo hˈivjo hˈivjo, pamˈoɟa na fahˈali wa miˈaka mitˈatu, ˈefa ja ˈuŋɡa na kirˈiba tʃa divˈai, nˌaje ˌakamlˈeta mtˈoto kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja bwˈana hˌuko ʃˈilo.|0
wˌalipokwˈiʃa kumtʃˈiɲɟa jˈule fahˈali, wˌakamlˈeta mtˈoto kwa ˈeli.|0
nˌaje hˈana ˌakamwambˈia ˈeli, hakˈika kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi n̩dˈije jˈule mˈama ambˈaje ˌalisimˈama hˈapa karˈibu nˌawe ˌakiˈomba kwa bwˈana.|0
nˌiliˈomba mtˈoto hˈuju, nˌaje bwˈana ˌamenˌiɟalˈia kˈile nˌilitʃomwˈomba.|0
hˈivjo sˈasa nˌinamtˈoa kwa bwˈana. kwa maˈana maˈiʃa jˌake jˈote ˌatakˈuwa ˌametolˈewa kwa bwˈana. nˌaje ˌakamwabˈudu bwˈana hˌuko.|0
kˈiʃa hˈana ˌakaˈomba na kusˈema: mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˌamʃaŋɡilˈia bwˈana, katˌika bwˈana pˈembe jˈaŋɡu ˌimeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu. kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu tʃˌaɟisˈifu ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌaufˌurahˈia wokˈovu wˈako.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote alˈije mtˌakatˈifu kˌama bwˈana, hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine zaˈidi jˈako; hakˈuna mwˈamba kˌama mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
msˌiendelˈee kusˈema kwa kibˈuri hˈivjo wˈala msiˈatʃe vˈiɲua vjˈenu kunˈena kwa kibˈuri, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu ˌaɟuˈaje, na kwa jˌeje matˈendo hupˈimwa.|0
pˈinde za mˌaʃuɟˈaa zˌimevuɲɟˈika, lakˈini wˈale wˌanaˌoɟikwˈaa wˌamevˈikwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa na tʃakˈula tˈele wˌameɟˌikodˈiʃa weɲˈewe ˌili kupˈata tʃakˈula, lakˈini wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa hawˈana ɲɟˈaa tˈena. mwanˈamke jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa tˈasa ˌamezˈaa watˈoto sˈaba, lakˈini jˈule ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˈeŋɡi ˌameðˌoofˈika.|0
bwˈana huˈua na hulˈeta uhˈai, huʃˈuʃa tʃˈini mpˈaka kˌaburˈini na hˌufufˈua.|0
bwˈana humfˈaɲa ˈm̩tu maskˈini nˌaje hˌutaɟirˈiʃa, huʃˈuʃa na hukwˈeza.|0
hˌumwinˈua maskˈini kutˈoka mˌavumbˈini na hˌumwinˈua mhitˈaɟi kutˈoka lˈundo la maɟˈivu; hˌuwaketˈiʃa pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu na kˌuwafˈaɲa warˈiθi kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa heʃˈima. kwa kˌuwa misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia ni ja bwˈana; ɟˈuu jˌake ˌameuwˈeka ˌulimwˈeŋɡu.|0
jˌeje ˌatailˈinda miɡˈuu ja wˌatakatˈifu wˈake, lakˈini waˈovu wˌataɲˌamazˈiʃwa kwˈeɲe ɡˈiza. si kwa ŋɡˈuvu ˈm̩tu huʃˈinda.|0
wˈale wˌampiŋɡˈao bwˈana wˌatahˌaribˈiwa kabˈisa. ˌatapˈiɡa rˈadi ðˈidi jˈao kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni; bwˈana ˌataˌihukˈumu miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. atˈampa ŋɡˈuvu mfˈalme wˈake, na kˌuitukˈuza pˈembe ja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌelikˈana ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani rˈama, lakˈini mtˈoto ˌakahudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana tʃˈini ja kuhˈani ˈeli.|0
wˈana wa ˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wabˈaja kabˈisa, hˌawakˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana.|0
bˌasi ˌilikˈuwa destˈuri ja mˌakuhˈani pamˈoɟa na wˈatu kwˌamba kˈila mˈara jejˈote ˌanapotˈoa ðabˈihu na hˈuku ɲˈama ikˈiwa ˌinatʃˈemʃwa, mtumˈiʃi wa kuhˈani ˌaŋɡalikˈuɟa na ˈuma wˌeɲe mˈeno matˈatu mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌaŋɡeˌutumbukˈiza hˈuo ˈuma kwˈeɲe sˌufurˈia ˌau birˈika ˌau sˌufurˈia kˈubwa ˌau tʃˈuŋɡu, nˌaje kuhˈani ˌaŋɡalˌiɟitʃˌukulˈia mweɲˈewe tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo ˈuma ˌuŋɡekilˈeta. hˈivi ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌowatendˈea wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliokˈuɟa ʃˈilo.|0
lakˈini hˌata kˈabla mafˈuta ja mɲˈama hˌajaɟatʃˈomwa, mtumˈiʃi wa kuhˈani ˌaŋɡalikˈuɟa na kusˈema kwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu, ˈm̩pe kuhˈani ɲˈama ˌakaˈoke, kwˈani hˌatapokˈea ɲˈama ˌilijotʃˈemʃwa kutˈoka kwˈako, ˈila ilˈijo mbˈitʃi tˈu.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimwambˈia, mafˈuta ja mɲˈama na jatʃˈomwe kwˈanza, ndˈipo ˌutʃukˈue tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃotˈaka, mtumˈiʃi ˌaŋɡaliɟˈibu, hapˈana, nˈipe sˈasa, kˌama huwˈezi nˌitaˌitʃukˈua kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˌii ðˈambi ja hˈawa viɟˈana ˌilikˈuwa kˈubwa sˈana matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa wˌaliˌitendˈea ðabˈihu ja bwˈana kwa ðarˈau.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌakihudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana, kiɟˈana ˌakivˈaa kˌisibˈau tʃa kitˈani.|0
kˈila mwˈaka mˈama jˌake ˌalimʃonˈea ɟˈoho dˈoɡo na kˌumtʃukulˈia wakˈati ˌalipokwˈea pamˈoɟa na mumˈewe kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja mwˈaka.|0
ˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiwˌabarˈiki ˌelikˈana na mkˈewe, ˌakisˈema, bwˈana na akˈupe watˈoto kwa mwanˈamke hˈuju ˌili kˌutʃukˈua nafˈasi ja jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemwˈomba na ˌakamtˈoa kwa bwˈana. kˈiʃa wakˈawa wˌanakwˈenda ɲumbˈani.|0
