bwˈana akˈawa mwˌeɲe neˈema kwa hˈana, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba ˌakazˈaa wˈana watˈatu na bˈinti wawˈili. wakˈati hˈuo, kiɟˈana samwˈeli ˌakaˌendelˈea kukˈua mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
bˌasi ˈeli, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee sˈana, ˌalisikˈia kuhˈusu kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiwˌafaɲˈia ˌisraˈeli wˈote na ɟˈinsi wˌalivjˌokutˈana kimwˈili na wˌanawˈake wˌaliˌohudˈumu kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌaambˈia, kwa nˈini mmefˈaɲa mˈambo kˌama hˈaja? nˌimesikˈia kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˈote ɟˌuːja hˈaja matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu.|0
sˈivjo, wanˈaŋɡu, hˌii si habˈari nzˈuri ambˈajo nˌinasikˈia ˌikienˈea mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa bwˈana.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakifˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu mwenzˈake, ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine awˈeza kˌumwombˈea kwa mˈuŋɡu, lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimfaɲˈia mˈuŋɡu ðˈambi, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajemwombˈea? hˌata hˈivjo wanˈawe hˌawakˌusikˈia maˈoɲo ja bˈaba jˈao, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalitˈaka kˌuwaˈua.|0
nˌaje kiɟˈana samwˈeli ˌakaˌendelˈea kukˈua katˌika kˈimo, ˌakimpendˈeza bwˈana na wˌanadˈamu.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa kwa ˈeli na kˌumwambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: ɟˈe, sˌikuɟˌifunˈua wˌaziwˈazi kwa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako wakˈati wˌalikˈuwa hˌuko mˈisri tʃˈini ja farˈao.|0
nˌilimtʃaɡˈua bˈaba jˈako kˈati ja mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa kuhˈani wˈaŋɡu, kukwˈea kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu, kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba na kuvˈaa kˌisibˈau mbˈele jˈaŋɡu. pˈia nˌiliwˈapa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako sadˈaka zˈote zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa mˈoto na wˌaisraˈeli.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunaðarˈau ðabˈihu zˈaŋɡu na sadˈaka zˈile nˌilizˌoziamˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja makˈao jˈaŋɡu? kwa nˈini ˌunawˌaheʃˈimu wanˈao kulˈiko mˌimi kwa kˌuɟinˌenepˈeʃa weɲˈewe kwa kˈula sehˈemu zilˈizo bˈora za kˈila sadˈaka zˌinazˌotolˈewa na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli?.|0
kwa hˈijo, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli asˈema: nˌiliahˈidi kˌuwa ɲˈumba jˈako na ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako wˌaŋɡehudˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu milˈele. lakˈini sˈasa bwˈana ˌanasˈema: ɟˈambo hˈili na lˈiwe mbˈali nˈami! wˈale wˌanaˌoniheʃˈimu nˌitawˌaheʃˈimu, wˈale wˌanaˌoniðarˈau mˌimi wˌataðˌaraulˈiwa.|0
wakˈati ˌunakˈuɟa nˌitakˌapozˌipuŋɡˈuza ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu na ŋɡˈuvu ja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈenu, ˌili pˌasiwˈepo ˈm̩tu katˌika mbˈari jˈenu ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi kˌuuˈona uzˈee.|0
nˌaɲi mtaˈona huzˈuni katˌika makˈao jˈaŋɡu. iŋɡˈawa ˌisraˈeli wˌatafaɲˈiwa mˈema, katˌika mbˈari jˈenu kˈamwe hˌapatˌakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˌadi kˌuwa m̩zˈee.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ambˈaje sˌitamkˌatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni pˈaŋɡu ˌatabakˈizwa tu kˌupofˈuʃa mˈatʃo jˈenu kwa matʃˈozi na kˌuihˌuzunˈiʃa miˈojo jˈenu, nˌao wazˈao wˈenu wˈote wˌatakˈufa wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌamefikˈia ˈumri wa kustˈawi.|0
kˈile kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea kwa wanˈao wawˈili, hˈofni na fˌinehˈasi, kˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara kwˈako. wˈote wawˈili wˌatakˈufa katˌika sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitaɟˌiinulˈia kuhˈani mwˌaminˈifu, ambˈaje ˌatafˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa na kˈile kˌilitʃˈoko mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu na ˌakilˈini mwˈaŋɡu. nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba jˌake kˌuwa imˈara, nˌaje ˌatahudˈumu mbˈele ja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
kˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijeˈatʃwa katˌika mbˈari jˈenu ˌatakˈuɟa na kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele jˌake kwa aɟˈili ja kipˈande tʃa fˈeða na ɡˈanda la mkˈate ˌakisˈema, nˌiteˈue katˌika baˈaði ja ofˈisi ja ˌukuhˈani ˌili niwˈeze kupˈata tʃakˈula. .|0
kiɟˈana samwˈeli ˌalihudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana tʃˈini ja ˈeli. katˌika sˈiku zˈile nˈeno la mˈuŋɡu lˌilikˈuwa adˈimu, hˌapakuwˈepo na maˈono mˈeŋɡi.|0
usˈiku mmˈoɟa ˈeli, ambˈaje mˈatʃo jˌake jˌalikˈuwa jˌamefifˈia sˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba ˌaliˈona kwa ʃˈida sˈana, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala mahˈali pˈake pa kˌawaˈida.|0
tˈaa ja mˈuŋɡu bˈado ˌilikˈuwa hˌaiɟˌazimˈika, na samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, ambˈapo sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌilikuwˈako.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwˈita samwˈeli. samwˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
nˌaje ˌakakimbˈia kwa ˈeli na kˌumwambˈia, mˌimi hˈapa, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeniˈita. lakˈini ˈeli ˌakasˈema, sˌikukuˈita; rˈudi ˌukalˈale. hˈivjo ˌakaˈenda kulˈala.|0
bwˈana ˌakaˈita tˈena, samwˈeli! nˌaje samwˈeli ˌakaˈamka, kwˈenda kwa ˈeli na kusˈema, mˌimi hˈapa, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeniˈita. ˈeli ˌakasˈema, mwanˈaŋɡu, sˌikukuˈita, rˈudi ˌukalˈale.|0
wakˈati hˈuu samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa bˈado hˌaɟamɟˈua bwˈana. nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilikˈuwa bˈado hˌaliɟˌafunulˈiwa kwˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwˈita samwˈeli mˈara ja tˈatu, nˌaje samwˈeli ˌakaˈamka kwˈenda kwa ˈeli na kusˈema, mˌimi hˈapa, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeniˈita. ndˈipo ˈeli ˌakatambˈua kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimwˈita kiɟˈana.|0
hˈivjo ˈeli ˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, nˈenda ˌukalˈale, na kˌama ˌakikuˈita, sˈema, nˈena bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanasˌikilˈiza.  hˈivjo samwˈeli ˌakaˈenda na kulˈala mahˈali pˈake.|0
bwˈana akˈaɟa ˌakasimˈama hˈapo, ˌakiˈita kˌama mˈara zˈile ɲiŋɡˈine, samwˈeli! samwˈeli! kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˈena bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanasˌikilˈiza.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli: tazˈama, nˈipo karˈibu kufˈaɲa kˈitu katˌika ˌisraˈeli ambˈatʃo kˌitafˈaɲa mˌasikˈio ja kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajesikˈia jawˈaʃe.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌitatimˈiza ðˈidi ja ˈeli kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃonˈena ðˈidi ja ɟamˈaa jˈake, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo mpˈaka mwˈiʃo.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌilimwambˈia kwˌamba nˌiŋɡehukˈumu ɟamˈaa jˌake milˈele kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ˌalijˌoiɟˈua, wanˈawe kˌumkufˈuru mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakaʃˈindwa kˌuwazuˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌikaˈapa kuhˈusu ɲˈumba ja ˈeli, hatˈia ja ɲˈumba ja ˈeli kˈamwe hˌaitawˈeza kˌufidˈiwa kwa ðabˈihu ˌau sadˈaka..|0
samwˈeli ˌakalˈala mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi, kˈiʃa ˌakafuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana. ˌalioɡˈopa kˌumwambˈia ˈeli jˈale maˈono.|0
lakˈini ˈeli ˌakamwˈita na kˌumwambˈia, samwˈeli mwanˈaŋɡu. samwˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi hˈapa.|0
ˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ni nˈini ˌalitʃˌokuambˈia? ˌusinifˈitʃe. bwˈana na ˌaʃuɣulˈike nˈawe, tˈena kwa ukˈali, kˌama ˌutanifˈitʃa tʃotʃˈote ˌalitʃˌokuambˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia kˈila kˈitu, bˌila kumfˈitʃa tʃotʃˈote. ndˈipo ˈeli ˌakasˈema, jˌeje ni bwˈana; na afˈaɲe lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na samwˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakikˈua, na hˌakuˈatʃa hˌata mˈoɟa ja manˈeno jˌake lˌiaŋɡˈuke tʃˈini.|0
nˌao ˌisraˈeli wˈote kˌuanzˈia dˈani hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba wˌakatambˈua kˌuwa samwˈeli ˌameθˌibitˈiʃwa kˌuwa nabˈii wa bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌutokˈea hˌuko ʃˈilo, na hˌuko kˌuɟiðˌihirˈiʃa kwa samwˈeli kwa ɲɟˈia ja nˈeno lˈake.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈaŋɡa sˈafu za maɟˈeʃi jˈao kˌupambˈana na ˌisraˈeli, wakˈati vˈita vˌilipˌoenˈea, ˌisraˈeli wˌakaʃˈindwa na wˌafilˈisti, ambˈao wˌaliwaˈua askˈari wa ˌisraˈeli wˌapatˈao ˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa vˈita.|0
askˈari wˌaliporˈudi kambˈini, wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakawˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌameruhˈusu lˈeo tuʃˈindwe mbˈele ja wˌafilˈisti? tˌuletˈeni sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kutˈoka ʃˈilo, ˌili lipˈate kwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈasi, na kˌutuokˈoa kutˈoka mikˈono ja adˈui zˈetu.|0
hˈivjo wˌakawatˈuma wˈatu hˌuko ʃˈilo, nˌao wˌakalˌitʃukˈua sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌalijekˈaa kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˈati ja mˌakerˈubi. nˌao wˈale wˈana wawˈili wa ˈeli, hˈofni na fˌinehˈasi, wˌalikuwˈako hˌuko pamˈoɟa na sandˈuku la aɡˈano la mˈuŋɡu.|0
wakˈati sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana lˌilikˈuɟa kambˈini, wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele kwa saˈuti kˈuu hˌata ˈarði ˌikatˌikisˈika.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌalipˌosikˈia mˌakelˈele wˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈini mˌakelˈele hˈaja jˈote katˌika kˈambi ja wˌaebranˈia? wˌalipˌofahˈamu kˌuwa sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌimekˈuɟa kambˈini.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakaoɡˈopa, wˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˈuɟa kambˈini, ˈole wˈetu. hˌaliɟˌatokˈea ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili ʃˈu hˈapo.|0
ˈole wˈetu! ni nˈani ˌatakˌajetˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa miˈuŋɡu hˌii jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu? ni miˈuŋɡu ˈile ˌilijˌowapˈiɡa wamˈisri kwa mapˈiɡo ja aˈina zˈote hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
tuwˈeni hodˈari, ˈeɲi wˌafilˈisti! tuwˈeni wˌanaˈume, la sˈivjo mtakˈuwa watˈumwa wa wˌaebranˈia, kˌama wˌao wˌalivjokˈuwa kwˈenu. kuwˈeni wˌanaˈume, mpiɡˈane.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌakapiɡˈana, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaʃˈindwa na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakakˌimbilˈia hemˈani mwˈake. mˌauˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa makˈubwa sˈana, ˌisraˈeli wˌakapotˈeza askˈari θˌeleθˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaendˈao kwa miɡˈuu.|0
sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌikatˈekwa, na hˈao wˈana wawˈili wa ˈeli, hˈofni na fˌinehˈasi, wˌakauˈawa.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wa kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini ˌakakimbˈia kutˈoka kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa vˈita na kwˈenda ʃˈilo, ŋɡˈuo zˌake zikˈiwa zˌimerarˈuka na akˈiwa na mavˈumbi kitʃwˈani mwˈake.|0
ˌalipofˈika, ˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈake kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ˌakiˌaŋɡalˈia, kwa sabˈabu mˈojo wˌake ˌulikˈuwa na hˈofu kwa aɟˈili ja sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu. ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia mɟˈini na kˌuelˈeza kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌimetokˈea, ˈm̩ɟi wˈote ˌukalˈia.|0
ˈeli ˌakasikˈia kelˈele za kilˈio, nˌaje ˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈini maˈana ja mˌakelˈele hˈaja? jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka kwˈenda kwa ˈeli.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka tisˈini na minˈane nˈajo mˈatʃo jˌake jˌalikˈuwa jˌamepofˈuka na hˌakuwˈeza kuˈona.|0
ˌakamwambˈia ˈeli, mˌimi nˌimetˈoka vitˈani sˈasa hˈivi, nˌimekimbˈia kutˈoka hˌuko lˈeo hˌii. ˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, mwanˈaŋɡu, ni nˈini kˌimetokˈea hˌuko.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijelˈeta habˈari ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌisraˈeli ˌamekimbˈia mbˈele ja wˌafilˈisti, nˈalo ɟˈeʃi lˌimepˈata hasˈara kˈubwa. pˈia wˈana wˈako wawˈili, hˈofni na fˌinehˈasi, wˌamekˈufa, na sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌimetˈekwa.|0
mˈara ˌalipotˈaɟa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu, ˈeli ˌaliaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake kwa ɲˈuma kˈando ja lˈaŋɡo. ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake ˌikavuɲɟˈika nˌaje akˈafa, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee tˈena mzˈito. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaoŋɡˈoza ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
mkwˈewe, ˈm̩ke wa fˌinehˈasi, ˌalikˈuwa mɟamzˈito na karˈibu wakˈati wa kˌuɟifuŋɡˈua. ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari kwˌamba sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌimetˈekwa na ja kˌuwa bˈaba ˈm̩kwe wˌake na mumˈewe wˌamekˈufa, ˌakapˈata utˈuŋɡu nˌaje ˌakaɟˌifuŋɡˈua lakˈini ˌakazidˈiwa na utˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa akˈifa, wˌanawˈake wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanamhˌudumˈia wˌakamwambˈia, ˌusikˈate tamˈaa, ˌumemzˈaa mwˈana. lakˈini hˌakuɟˈibu wˈala kuwˈeka mˌaanˈani.|0
ˌalimwˈita jˈule mtˈoto ˌikabˈodi, ˌakisˈema, ˌutukˈufu ˌumeondˈoka katˌika ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu ja kutˈekwa kwa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu na vˈifo vja bˈaba ˈm̩kwe na mumˈewe.|0
ˌakasˈema, ˌutukˈufu ˌumeondˈoka katˌika ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌimetˈekwa.|0
baˌada ja wˌafilˈisti kutˈeka sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu, wˌalilˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka ˌebenezˈeri mpˈaka aʃdˈodi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakalˌiiŋɡˈiza lˈile sandˈuku ndˈani ja hekˈalu la daɡˈoni na kˌuliwˈeka kˈando ja hˈujo daɡˈoni.|0
wˈatu wa aʃdˈodi wˌalipoˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema kˈeʃo jˈake, kˈumbe, wˌakamkˈuta daɡˈoni ˌameaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana! wˌakamwinˈua daɡˈoni na kˌumrudˈiʃa mahˈali pˈake.|0
lakˈini ˌasubˈuhi ˌilijˌofuˈata, wˌalipoˈamka kˈumbe, wˌalimkˈuta hˈujo daɡˈoni ˌameaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana! kˈitʃwa tʃˈake na mikˈono vˌilikˈuwa vˌimevˈuɲɟua nˈavjo vˌimelˈala kˌiziŋɡitˈini, ni kˌiwiliwˈili tʃˈake tu kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌimebˈaki.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mpˈaka lˈeo mˌakuhˈani wa daɡˈoni wˈala weŋɡˈine wˌaiŋɡiˈao katˌika hekˈalu la daɡˈoni hˌuko aʃdˈodi hˌawakaɲˈaɡi kˌiziŋɡˈiti.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa mzˈito ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa aʃdˈodi na viɟˈiɟi ɟirˈani, ˌakalˈeta ˌuharibˈifu ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌuwatˈesa kwa maɟˈipu.|0
wˈatu wa aʃdˈodi wˌalipoˈona kˈile kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌikitokˈea, wˌakasˈema, sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kˈamwe lˌisikˈae hˈapa pamˈoɟa na sˈisi, kwa sabˈabu mkˈono wˌake ni mzˈito ɟˈuu jˈetu na ɟˌuːja daɡˈoni mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
bˌasi wˌakawaˈita wˌatawˈala wˈote wa wˌafilˈisti pamˈoɟa na kˌuwaulˈiza, tˌutafˈaɲa nˈini na hˈili sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli? wˌakaɟˈibu, sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na liˈende ɡˈaθi. bˌasi wˌakalˌihamˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini baˌada ja kˌulihamˈiʃa, mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ðˈidi ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi wa ɡˈaθi, ˌakiuwˈeka katˌika faðˈaa kˈuu. mˈuŋɡu ˌakawatˈesa wˈatu wa hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, viɟˈana kwa wazˈee, kwa kˌuwaletˈea maɟˈipu.|0
bˌasi wˌakapelˈeka sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu ekrˈoni. wakˈati sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinaiŋɡˈia ekrˈoni, wˈatu wa ekrˈoni wˌalilˈia wˌakisˈema wˌamelilˈeta sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kwˈetu ˌili kˌutuˈua sˌisi na wˈatu wˈetu.|0
bˌasi wˌakawaˈita wˌatawˈala wˈote wa wˌafilˈisti pamˈoɟa na kusˈema, lˌiondoˈeni sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na lˌirudˈiʃwe mahˈali pˈake, la sˈivjo lˌitatuˈua sˌisi na wˈatu wˈetu. kwa kˌuwa kˈifo kˌilikˈuwa kˌimeuɟˈaza ˈm̩ɟi hˈofu; kwˈani mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa mzˈito sˈana ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
wˈale ambˈao hˌawakˈufa wˌalipˈatwa na maɟˈipu, na kilˈio tʃa ˈm̩ɟi kˌilikwˈenda ɟˈuu hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌaliwaˈita mˌakuhˈani wa daɡˈoni na wˌaaɡˈuzi, na kˌuwaambˈia, tˌutafˈaɲa nˈini na hˈili sandˈuku la bwˈana? tˌuambiˈeni ɟˈinsi tˌutakˌavjolˌirudˈiʃa mahˈali pˈake.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama mtˌalirudˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, msˌilirudˈiʃe mikˈono mitˈupu bˌali kwa vjovjˈote mpˌelekeˈeni sadˈaka ja hatˈia. kˈiʃa mtapˈoɲua, nˌaɲi mtˌafahˈamu kwa nˈini mkˈono wˌake hˌauɟˌaondolˈewa kwˈenu.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakawˌaulˈiza, ni sadˈaka ɡˈani ja hatˈia tˌutakˌajompˌelekˈea? wˌakaɟˈibu, maɟˈipu matˈano ja ðahˈabu na pˈaɲa wa ðahˈabu watˈano, kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ja wˌatawˈala wa wˌafilˈisti, kwa sabˈabu taˈuni ˈijo hˈijo ˌimewaˈua nˈiɲi na wˌatawˈala wˈenu.|0
tˌeŋɡenezˈeni mifˈano ja maɟˈipu na ja pˈaɲa wˈale wˌanaˌoharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, nˌaɲi mhˌeʃimˈuni mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. lˈabda ˌataondˈoa mkˈono wˌake kutˈoka kwˈenu na kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈenu na ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu.|0
kwa nˈini nˈiɲi mnafˈaɲa miˈojo jˈenu miɡˈumu kˌama wamˈisri na farˈao wˌalivjofˈaɲa? ɟˈe, ˌalipˌowatendˈea kwa ukˈali, hˌawakˌuwaatʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈenda zˈao.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, wekˈeni ɡˈari ɟˈipja la kˌukokˈotwa pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈombe wawˈili ambˈao wˌamezˈaa lakˈini ambˈao kˈamwe hˌawaɟafˈuŋɡwa nˈira. fˌuŋɡiˈeni hˈao ŋɡˈombe hˌilo ɡˈari, lakˈini ˌondoˈeni ndˈama wˌao na mwawˈeke zizˈini.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni hˌilo sandˈuku la bwˈana na mliwˈeke ɟˌuːja ɡˈari la kˌukokˈotwa, na ndˈani ja kˈaʃa kˈando jˌake wekˈeni hˈivjo vˈitu vja ðahˈabu mnˌavjompˌelekˈea bwˈana kˌama sadˈaka ja hatˈia. lˌipelekˈeni.|0
lakˈini lˌiaŋɡˌaliˈeni kwa makˈini. iwˈapo lˌitakwˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake leɲˈewe, kˌuelekˈea bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, bˌasi tˌutaɟˈua kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌalilˈeta hˈaja maˈafa makˈubwa ɟˈuu jˈetu. lakˈini kˌama hˌalikwˈenda, bˌasi tˌutaɟˈua kwˌamba hˌaukˈuwa mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌuliˌotupˈiɡa na kwˌamba ˌilijˌotokˈea kwˈetu ni aɟˈali.|0
bˌasi wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. wˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡˈombe wawˈili wa aˈina hˈijo, wˌakawˌafuŋɡˈia hˌilo ɡˈari la kˌukokˈotwa, nˌao ndˈama wˌao wˌakawˈekwa zizˈini.|0
wˌakaliwˈeka sandˈuku la bwˈana ɟˌuːja hˌilo ɡˈari la kˌukokˈotwa pamˈoɟa na lˈile kˈaʃa lˈeɲe ˈile mifˈano ja pˈaɲa wa ðahˈabu na ja maɟˈipu ja ðahˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa hˈao ŋɡˈombe wˌakaˈenda mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa kˌuelekˈea bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, wˌakiʃˈuka bˌila kˌuɡeˈuka kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto, hˈuku wˌakilˈia ɲɟˈia jˈote. wˌatawˈala wa wˌafilˈisti wˌaliwˌafuˈata hˈao ŋɡˈombe hˌadi mpakˈani ˌm̩wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi.|0
wakˈati hˈuu wˈatu wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi wˌalikˈuwa wˌakivˈuna ŋɡˈano jˈao hˌuko bondˈeni, wˌalipˌoinˈua mˈatʃo jˈao na kuˈona lˈile sandˈuku, wˌakafurˈahi kˌuliˈona.|0
lˈile ɡˈari la kˌukokˈotwa lˌilikˈuɟa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba la joʃˈua wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, nˈalo lˌikasimˈama kˈando ja mwˈamba mkˈubwa. wˈatu wˌakapasˈua m̩bˈao za lˈile ɡˈari la kˌukokˈotwa na kutˈoa ðabˈihu wˈale ŋɡˈombe kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana.|0
walˈawi wˌaliliʃˈuʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana, pamˈoɟa na lˈile kˈaʃa lˌililokˈuwa na vˈile vˈitu vja ðahˈabu na kˌuviwˈeka ɟˌuːja ˈule mwˈamba mkˈubwa. sˈiku ˈile wˈatu wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana.|0
wˈale wˌatawˈala watˈano wa wˌafilˈisti wˌaliˈona hˈaja jˈote, nˌao wˌakarˈudi sˈiku ˈile ˈile mpˈaka ekrˈoni.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo jˈale maɟˈipu ja ðahˈabu wˌafilˈisti wˌalijotˈuma kˌama sadˈaka ja hatˈia kwa bwˈana, mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja aʃdˈodi, mˈoɟa kwa ɡˈaza, mˈoɟa kwa ˌaʃkelˈoni, mˈoɟa kwa ɡˈaθi, na mˈoɟa kwa ekrˈoni.|0
nˈajo hesˈabu ja wˈale pˈaɲa wa ðahˈabu ˌilikˈuwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na idˈadi ja mˈiɟi ja wˌafilˈisti ja wˌatawˈala watˈano wa wˌafilˈisti: mˈiɟi jˈao ˌilijˌozuŋɡˈukwa na mabˈoma, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vja mˈiɟi hˈijo. ˈule mwˈamba mkˈubwa, ambˈao ɟˈuu jˌake wˌaliliwˈeka lˈile sandˈuku la bwˈana, ni ˌuʃahˈidi hˌadi lˈeo katˌika ʃˈamba la joʃˈua wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwapˈiɡa baˈaði ja wˈatu wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, ˌakiwaˈua wˈatu sabˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao kwa sabˈabu wˌalitʃˌuŋɡulˈia ndˈani ja sandˈuku la bwˈana. wˈatu wˌakaˌombolˈeza kwa sabˈabu ja pˈiɡo zˈito kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
nˌao wˈatu wa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi wˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana, hˈuju mˈuŋɡu alˈije mtˌakatˈifu? sandˈuku lˌitapˈanda kwˈenda kwa nˈani kutˈoka hˈapa.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa wˈatu wa kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu, wˌakisˈema, wˌafilˈisti wˌamerudˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana. ʃukˈeni na mlˌipandˈiʃe hˌuko kwˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wa kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu wakˈaɟa na kˌulitʃukˈua sandˈuku la bwˈana. wˌakalˌipelˈeka katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌabinadˈabu ɟˈuu kˌilimˈani na kumwˈeka ˌeleazˈari mwanˈawe wˈakfu kˌulitʃˈuŋɡa sandˈuku la bwˈana.|0
sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌilibakˈia hˌuko kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, jaˈani ɟˈumla ja miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini, nˌao wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˌombolˈeza na kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana.|0
nˌaje samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, ikˈiwa mtˌamrudˈia bwˈana kwa miˈojo jˈenu jˈote, bˌasi ˌiatʃˈeni miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni na mˌaaʃtorˈeθi na kˌuɟitˈoa weɲˈewe kwa bwˈana na kˌumtumikˈia jˌeje pˈeke jˈake, nˌaje ˌatawˌaokˈoa nˈiɲi na mkˈono wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˈeka mbˈali mˌabaˈali jˈao na mˌaaʃtorˈeθi, nˌao wˌakamtˌumikˈia bwˈana pˈeke jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, wˌakusaɲˈeni ˌisraˈeli wˈote hˌuko mˈispa, nˌami nˌitawˌaombˈea nˈiɲi kwa bwˈana.|0
wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌukutanˈika hˌuko mˈispa, wˌalitʃˈota mˈaɟi na kˌujamimˈina mbˈele za bwˈana. sˈiku hˈijo wˌalifˈuŋɡa na wˌakauŋɡˈama, wˌakisˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana. nˌaje samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli hˌuko mˈispa.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba ˌisraˈeli wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˌuko mˈispa, wˌatawˈala wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈanda ˌili kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia. wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari hˈijo, wˌalioɡˈopa kwa sabˈabu ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
wˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, ˌusiˈatʃe kˌumlilˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa aɟˈili jˈetu, ˌili apˈate kˌutuokˈoa na mikˈono ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakamtʃukˈua mwˌanakondˈoo ˌaɲoɲˈaje na kumtˈoa mzˈima kˌama sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana. ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana kwa niˈaba ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanatˈoa hˈijo ðabˈihu ja kˌuteketˈezwa, wˌafilˈisti wˌakasoɡˈea karˈibu ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita na ˌisraˈeli. lakˈini sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌaliŋɡurˈuma kwa ŋɡurˈumo kˈubwa ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌafaðaˈike na kˌutetemˈeka hˈivi kwˌamba wˌalikimbˈizwa mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakatˈoka m̩bˈio hˌuko mˈispa na kˌuwafˌuatˈia wˌafilˈisti, wˌakiwatʃˈiɲɟa ɲɟiˈani hˌadi mahˈali tʃˈini ja bˈeθ kˈari.|0
ndˈipo samwˈeli ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈiwe na kˌulisˌimamˈiʃa kˈati ja mˈispa na ʃˈeni. ˌakaliˈita ˌebenezˈeri, ˌakisˈema, hˌata sˈasa bwˈana ˌametˌusaidˈia.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌakaʃˈindwa na hˌawakˌuvamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli tˈena. katˌika maˈiʃa jˈote ja samwˈeli, mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
mˈiɟi kˌuanzˈia ekrˈoni hˌadi ɡˈaθi, ˈile ambˈajo wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌameitˈeka kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli, ˌilirudˈiʃwa kwˈake, nˌaje ˌisraˈeli ˌakazˌikombˈoa ˈn̩tʃi ɟirˈani mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti. kˌukawˈepo amˈani kˈati ja ˌisraˈeli na wˌaamˈori.|0
samwˈeli ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌama mwamˈuzi ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mwˈaka hˌadi mwˈaka ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kutˈoka beθˈeli mpˈaka ɡilɡˈali na mˈispa, ˌakiamˈua ˌisraˈeli katˌika sehˈemu hˈizo zˈote.|0
lakˈini kˈila mˈara ˌalirˈudi rˈama, kˌulikokˈuwa ɲumbˈani kwˈake, hˌuko pˈia ˌaliwˌaamˈua ˌisraˈeli. nˌaje hˌuko ˌalimɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa m̩zˈee, ˌakawˈeka wanˈawe kˌuwa wˌaamˈuzi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa joˈeli, na la wa pˈili lˌilikˈuwa abˈija, nˌao wˌakatumˈika hˌuko bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
lakˈini wanˈawe hˌawakˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake. wˌaliziˈatʃa wˌakaɡˌeukˈia faˈida za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu nˌao wˌakapokˈea rˈuʃwa na kˌupotˈoʃa hˈaki.|0
bˌasi wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa na kumɟˈia samwˈeli hˌuko rˈama.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa m̩zˈee, nˌao wanˈao hˌawaenˈendi katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako, sˈasa tˌuteulˈie mfˈalme wa kˌutuoŋɡˈoza, kˌama ilˈivjo kwa mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote.|0
lakˈini wˌao wˌaliposˈema, tˈupe mfˈalme wa kˌutuoŋɡˈoza, hˈili lˌilimtʃukˈiza samwˈeli, hˈivjo ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia: sˌikilˈiza jˈale jˈote wˈatu wˌanakˌuambˈia. si wˌewe ambˈaje wˌamekˌukatˈaa, bˌali wˌamenˌikatˈaa mˌimi kˌuwa mfˈalme wˈao.|0
kˌama vˈile wˌalivjofˈaɲa ʃˈu sˈiku nˌilipˌowapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo; wˌakiniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌutumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, ndˈivjo wˌanavjˌokufaɲˈia wˈewe.|0
sˈasa wˌasikilˈize, lakˈini waˈoɲe kwa makˈini na ˌuwafˌahamˈiʃe jˈale wˌatakˌajotendˈewa na mfˈalme ˌatakˌajewˌatawˈala.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈomba wapˈewe mfˈalme manˈeno jˈote ja bwˈana.|0
ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌatakˌavjowˌatendˈea mfˈalme ˌatakˌajewˌatawˈala. ˌatawˌatʃukˈua wˈana wˈenu na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌatumˈike kwa maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na farˈasi, nˌao wˌatakimbˈia mbˈele ja maɡˈari jˈake.|0
baˈaði jˈao ˌatawawˈeka kˌuwa mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi wa hamsˈini, weŋɡˈine kulˈima maʃˈamba jˌake na kuvˈuna mavˈuno jˈake, pˈia na weŋɡˈine kˌuteŋɡenˈeza silˈaha za vˈita na vifˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja maɡˈari jˈake.|0
ˌatawˌatʃukˈua bˈinti zˈenu kˌuwa wˌateŋɡenˈeza mˌanukˈato, wapˈiʃi na wˌaokˈaɟi.|0
ˌatajˌatʃukˈua maʃˈamba jˈenu jalˈijo mazˈuri, maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na maʃˈamba jˈenu ja mˌizeitˈuni na kuwˈapa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ˌataˌitʃukˈua sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja nafˈaka jˈenu na ja zabˈibu zˈenu na kuwˈapa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ˌatawˌatʃukˈua wˌatumˈiʃi wˈenu wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, na ŋɡˈombe wˈenu walˈio wazˈuri sˈana na pˈunda kwa mˌatumˈizi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌatatʃukˈua sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja makˈundi jˈenu ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, na nˈiɲi weɲˈewe mtakˈuwa watˈumwa wˈake.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˌitakˌapowadˈia, mtalˈia kwa kutˈaka msaˈada kˌutokˈana na mfˈalme mlˌijemtʃaɡˈua, nˌaje bwˈana hˌatawaɟˈibu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌakakatˈaa kˌumsikilˈiza samwˈeli wˌakasˈema, hapˈana! tˌunatˈaka mfˈalme wa kˌututawˈala.|0
kˈiʃa tˌutakˈuwa kˌama mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote, tukˈiwa na mfˈalme wa kˌutuoŋɡˈoza na kwˈenda mbˈele jˈetu na kˌutupˌiɡanˈia vˈita vjˈetu.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipˌosikˈia jˈote wˈatu wˌalijosˈema, ˌakarudˈia kˌujasˈema mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, wˌasikilˈize na uwˈape mfˈalme. kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, kˈila mmˈoɟa arˈudi mɟˈini kwˈake.|0
kˌulikuwˈako mbˌeɲamˈini mmˈoɟa, ˈm̩tu mˌaarˈufu, ambˈaje ˌaliˈitwa kˈiʃi mwˈana wa ˌabiˈeli, mwˈana wa serˈori, mwˈana wa bˌekorˈaθi, mwˈana wa afˈia wa bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na mwˈana ˌalijeˈitwa saˈuli, kiɟˈana ˌanajˌevutˈia sˈana, hˌakuwˈepo ˌalijˌeliŋɡˈana nˌaje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli, ˌalikˈuwa mrˈefu kulˈiko weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
bˌasi pˈunda wa kˈiʃi bˈaba jˌake saˈuli wˌalipotˈea, nˌaje kˈiʃi ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈawe saˈuli, mtʃukˈue mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi mwˈende pamˈoɟa nˌaje kˌuwatafˈuta pˈunda.|0
hˈivjo ˌakapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu na katˌika enˈeo la ʃalˈiʃa, lakˈini hˌawakˌuwapˈata. wˌakaˌendelˈea katˌika sehˈemu ja ʃˌaalˈimu, lakˈini pˈunda hˌawakuwˈepo hˌuko. kˈiʃa wˌakapˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini, lakˈini hˌawakˌuwapˈata.|0
wˌalipofˈika sehˈemu ja sˈufu, saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ɲɟˈoo, sˌisi na turˈudi, ˌau bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌataˈatʃa kˌufikirˈia ɟˌuːja pˈunda na kuˈanza kˌufaðaˈika kˌutuhˈusu sˈisi.|0
lakˈini mtumˈiʃi ˌakaɟˈibu, tazˈama, katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu jˈupo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌanajˌeheʃimˈiwa sˈana na kˈila kˈitu ˌasemˈatʃo hˌutokˈea kwˈeli. sˈasa na twˈende hˌuko. huˈenda ˌatatˌuambˈia twˈende ɲɟˈia ˈipi.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, kˌama tˌukiˈenda, tutˈampa nˈini hˈujo ˈm̩tu? tʃakˈula kˌimekwˈiʃa kwˈeɲe mifˈuko jˈetu. hatˈuna zawˈadi ja kˌumpelekˈea hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. ɟˈe tˈuna nˈini.|0
mtumˈiʃi ˌakamɟˈibu saˈuli tˈena, ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, nˈina fˈeða rˈobo ʃekˈeli. hˈijo nitˈampa hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌili awˈeze kˌutuambˈia twˈende kwa ɲɟˈia ˈipi.|0
zamˈani katˌika ˌisraˈeli, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalikwˈenda kˌuulˈiza nˈeno kwa mˈuŋɡu, ˌaŋɡalisˈema, ɲɟˈoo na twˈende kwa mwonˈaɟi, kwa sabˈabu nabˈii wa sˈasa ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈitwa mwonˈaɟi..|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, vjˈema, ɲɟˈoo na twˈende. bˌasi wˌakaˈenda mɟˈini ˌalipˌokuwˈepo hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakipˈanda mlˈima kwˈenda mɟˈini, wˌakakutˈana na baˈaði ja wˌasitʃˈana wˌanakˈuɟa kutʃˈota mˈaɟi, nˌao wˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, mwonˈaɟi jˈuko.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, jˈuko, ju mbˈele jˈenu ˌamewˌataŋɡulˈia, sˈasa faɲˈeni harˈaka, n̩dˈijo tu ˌamekˈuɟa mɟˈini kwˈetu lˈeo, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˈana ðabˈihu hˌuko mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
mˈara tu mwˌiŋɡiˈapo mɟˈini, mtamkˈuta kˈabla hˌaɟapˈanda kwˈenda mahˈali pa ɟˈuu kˈula. wˈatu hˌawataˈanza kˈula mpˈaka ˌatakˌapofˈika kwa sabˈabu ni lazˈima kwˈanza jˌeje ˌabarˈiki ðabˈihu, ndˈipo wˈale wˌaliˌoalˈikwa wˌatakˌapokˈula. pandˈeni sˈasa, mtamkˈuta kwa wakˈati hˈuu.|0
wˌakapˈanda mɟˈini, nˌao wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiiŋɡˈia mɟˈini, tazˈama, samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa akˈiɟa kˌuelekˈea wˌalikokwˈenda mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
bˌasi sˈiku mˈoɟa kˈabla saˈuli haɟˈaɟa, bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemfˌunulˈia samwˈeli ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
kˈeʃo wakˈati kˌama hˈuu nˌitakˌupelekˈea ˈm̩tu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini. umtˈie mafˈuta ˈawe kˌioŋɡˈozi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajewˌakombˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na mkˈono wa wˌafilˈisti. nˌimewˌaaŋɡalˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa kilˈio tʃˈao kˌimenˌifikˈia.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipomwˈona saˈuli, bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, hˈuju n̩dˈije ˈm̩tu nˌilijˌekuambˈia habˈari zˈake, kwˌamba jˌeje ˌatawˌatawˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
saˈuli ˌakamkˌaribˈia samwˈeli laŋɡˈoni na kˌumuulˈiza, tˌafaðˈali, ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌuniambˈia mahˈali ɲˈumba ja mwonˈaɟi ilˈipo.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu saˈuli, mˌimi n̩dˈije mwonˈaɟi, pˈanda ˌutaŋɡulˈie mbˈele jˈaŋɡu mpˈaka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu, kwa kˌuwa lˈeo ˌitakupˈasa kˈula pamˈoɟa nˌami na ˌasubˈuhi nˌitakˌuruhˈusu uˈende na nˌitakˌuambˈia jˈale jˈote jalˈijo mojˈoni mwˈako.|0
kuhˈusu wˈale pˈunda ˌuliˌowapotˈeza sˈiku tˈatu zˌilizopˈita, ˌusifˌaðaˈike kwa habˈari jˈao; wˌamepˌatikˈana. ni kwa nˈani ambˈaje ʃaˈuku jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ˌimeˌelekˈea, kˌama si kwˈako na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja bˈaba jˈako.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, mˌimi si mbˌeɲamˈini, kutˈoka kabˈila dˈoɡo kulˈiko jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌao ukˈoo wˈaŋɡu si n̩dˈio mdˈoɡo kulˈiko kˈoo zˈote za kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini? kwa nˈini ˌuniambˈie ɟˈambo la nˈamna hˈijo.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakamlˈeta saˈuli na mtumˈiʃi wˌake ndˈani ˌukumbˈini na kˌuwaketˈiʃa mahˈali pa heʃˈima zaˈidi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamealˈikwa; ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa kˌama wˈatu θˌelaθˈini.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia mpˈiʃi, lˈeta ˈile sehˈemu ja ɲˈama nˌilijokˈupa, ˈile nˌilijˌokuambˈia iwˈeke kˈando.|0
hˈivjo mpˈiʃi ˌakatʃukˈua m̩ɡˈuu pamˈoɟa na kˈile kˌilitʃokˈuwa ɟˈuu jˌake ˌakaiwˈeka mbˈele ja saˈuli. samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, hˈiki ndˈitʃo ambˈatʃo kˌimewˈekwa kwa aɟˈili jˈako. ˈule, kwa sabˈabu kˌilitˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili jˈako kwa tukˈio hˈili, ʃˈu nˌiliposˈema, nˌimewˌaalˈika waɡˈeni.  nˌaje saˈuli akˈala pamˈoɟa na samwˈeli sˈiku ˈile.|0
baˌada ja kuʃˈuka kutˈoka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu na kufˈika mɟˈini, samwˈeli ˌalizuŋɡˈumza na saˈuli ɟˌuːja dˈari ja ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
wˌalipoˈamka mapˈema ˌalfaɟˈiri, samwˈeli ˌakamwˈita saˈuli darˈini, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˌiandˈae, nˌami nˌitakuˈaɡa uˈende zˈako. saˈuli ˌalipokˈuwa tajˈari jˌeje na samwˈeli wˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe pamˈoɟa.|0
hˌata wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiterˈemka kˌuelekˈea mwˈiʃo wa ˈm̩ɟi, samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, mwambˈie mtumˈiʃi ˌataŋɡulˈie mbˈele jˈetu. nˌaje mtumˈiʃi ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. lakˈini subˈiri hˈapa kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, ˌili nipˈate kukˈupa uɟˈumbe kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo samwˈeli ˌakatʃukˈua tʃˈupa ndˈoɡo ja mafˈuta na kˌujamimˈina ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa saˈuli, ˌakambˈusu, ˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakukutˈia mafˈuta ˈuwe kˌioŋɡˈozi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌutakˌapoondˈoka kwˈaŋɡu lˈeo, ˌutakutˈana na wˈatu wawˈili karˈibu na kabˈuri la rahˈeli, hˌuko sˈelsa kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa bˌeɲamˈini. wˌatakˌuambˈia, pˈunda wˈale ˌuliotˈoka kwˈenda kˌuwatafˈuta, wˌamekwˈiʃa kˌupatikˈana. sˈasa bˈaba jˈako ˌameˈatʃa kˌufikˈiri kuhˈusu pˈunda na sˈasa ˈana hˈofu kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe. ˌanaulˈiza, nˌitafaɲˈaɟe kuhˈusu mwanˈaŋɡu? .|0
kˈiʃa ˌutakwˈenda mbˈele kutˈoka hˈapa mpˈaka ˌuufikˈie mwalˈoni wa tabˈori. wˈatu watˈatu wˌanaopˈanda kwa mˈuŋɡu hˌuko beθˈeli wˌatakutˈana nˌawe hˈapo. mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈuwa ˌametʃukˈua wˌanambˈuzi watˈatu, mwiŋɡˈine mikˈate mitˈatu, na mwiŋɡˈine kirˈiba tʃa divˈai.|0
wˌatakˌusalˈimu na kukˈupa mikˈate miwˈili, ambˈajo ˌutaˌipokˈea kutˈoka kwˈao.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo ˌutakwˈenda ɡibˈea ja mˈuŋɡu, ambˈapo hˈapo kˈuna kˈambi ja wˌafilˈisti. ˌunapˌokaribˈia ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakutˈana na kˈundi la mˌanabˈii wˌakiterˈemka kutˈoka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu wakˈiwa na vinˈubi, matˈari, filˈimbi na zˈeze vˌikipˈiɡwa mbˈele jˈao, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˌakitˈoa ˌunabˈii.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌatakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈako kwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌawe ˌutatˈoa ˌunabˈii pamˈoɟa nˈao; nˌawe ˌutaɡeˈuzwa kˌuwa ˈm̩tu wa tˌofaˈuti.|0
mˈara iʃˈara hˈizi zˌitakˌapotimˈizwa, fˈaɲa lolˈote mkˈono wˈako ˌupasˈao kufˈaɲa, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
tˌaŋɡulˈia kuʃˈuka mbˈele jˈaŋɡu mpˈaka ɡilɡˈali. hakˈika nˌami nˌitaterˈemka nˌikuɟˈie ˌili kutˈoa ðabˈihu za sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu za amˈani, lakˈini lazˈima uŋɡˈoɟe kwa sˈiku sˈaba hˌata nˌitakˌapokuɟˈia na kˌukuambˈia lˌikupasˈalo kufˈaɲa.|0
ikˈawa saˈuli ˌalipˌoɡeˈuka kumwˈatʃa samwˈeli, mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌubadilˈiʃa mˈojo wa saˈuli, na iʃˈara hˈizi zˈote zˌikatimˈizwa sˈiku ˈile.|0
wˌalipofˈika ɡibˈea, ˌakakutˈana na kˈundi la mˌanabˈii. rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌaje ˌakaɟiˈuŋɡa nˌao katˌika kutˈoa ˌunabˈii kwˈao.|0
ikˈawa wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌomfahˈamu hˈapo mwˈanzo wˌalipomwˈona ˌakitˈoa ˌunabˈii pamˈoɟa na mˌanabˈii, wˌakaˌulizˈana, ni nˈini hˈiki kˌilitʃˌomtokˈea mwˈana wa kˈiʃi? ɟˈe, saˈuli nˌaje pˈia jˈumo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌanabˈii.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, nˌaje bˈaba jˈao ni nˈani? bˌasi ikˈawa miθˈali, kusˈema, ɟˈe, saˈuli pˈia jˈumo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌanabˈii.|0
baˌada ja saˈuli kˌumalˈiza kutˈoa ˌunabˈii, ˌalikwˈenda mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
bˌasi babˈaje mdˈoɡo ˌakamˌuulˈiza saˈuli na mtumˈiʃi wˈake, ɟˈe, mlikˈuwa wˈapi? ˌakaɟˈibu, tˌulikˈuwa tˌukiwˌatafˈuta pˈunda. lakˈini tˌulipoˈona hˌawapˌatikˈani, tˌulikwˈenda kwa samwˈeli.|0
babˈaje mdˈoɡo saˈuli ˌakasˈema, nˌiambˈie samwˈeli ˌamekˌuambˈia nˈini.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌalitˌuhakˌikiʃˈia kwˌamba pˈunda wˌamepˌatikˈana. lakˈini hˌakumwambˈia babˈaje mdˈoɡo kˈila kˈitu samwˈeli ˌalitʃˌomwambˈia kuhˈusu ufˈalme.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawaˈita wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli kˈuɟa kwa bwˈana hˌuko mˈispa.|0
nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌiliwatˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri, nˌami nˌiliwˌaokˈoa tˌoka ŋɡˈuvu za mˈisri na fˈalme zˈote zˌilizˌowaonˈea..|0
lakˈini sˈasa mmˌemkatˈaa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈaje ˌanawˌaokˈoa tˌoka katˌika maˈafa jˈenu jˈote na taˈabu zˈenu zˈote. nˌaɲi mmesˈema, hapˈana, tˌuteulˈie mfˈalme ˌatutawˈale. sˈasa bˈasi, ɟˌihuðˌuriʃˈeni weɲˈewe mbˈele za bwˈana kwa kabˈila zˈenu na kwa kˈoo zˈenu.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipˌojasoɡˈeza mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini lˌikatʃˌaɡulˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakalˌisoɡˈeza mbˈele kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo, nˌao ukˈoo wa mˈatri ˌukatʃˌaɡulˈiwa. mwiʃˈoni saˈuli mwˈana wa kˈiʃi ˌakatʃˌaɡulˈiwa. lakˈini wˌalipˌomtafˈuta, hˌakuˌonekˈana.|0
wˌakazˈidi kˌuulˈiza kwa bwˈana, ɟˈe, hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌamekwˈiʃa kufˈika hˈapa? nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, ˌameɟifˈitʃa kˌatikˈati ja mizˈiɡo.|0
wˌakakimbˈia na kumlˈeta kutˈoka hˌuko, nˌaje ˌalipˌosimˈama kˌatikˈati ja wˈatu, ˌalikˈuwa mrˈefu kulˈiko wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, ɟˈe, mnamwˈona ˈm̩tu ambˈaje bwˈana ˌamemtʃaɡˈua? hajˈupo alˈije kˌama jˌeje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈote. ndˈipo wˈatu wˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele, wˌakasˈema, mfˈalme na aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawˌaelˈeza wˈatu mˌadarˈaka ja ufˈalme. ˌakajˌaandˈika kwˈeɲe kitˈabu na kuwˈeka mbˈele za bwˈana. kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakawˌaruhˈusu wˈatu, kˈila mmˈoɟa aˈende ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
saˈuli pˈia ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈake hˌuko ɡibˈea, ˌakisˌindikˈizwa na wˈatu hodˈari ambˈao mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɡˈusa miˈojo jˈao.|0
lakˈini baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌakorˈofi wˌalisˈema, hˈuju ˈm̩tu ˌatawezˈaɟe kˌutuokˈoa? wˌakamðarˈau na wˈala hˌawakˌumletˈea zawˈadi. lakˈini saˈuli ˌakaɲamˈaza kˈimja.|0
nahˈaʃi jˈule mwamˈoni, ˌakakwˈea kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi ˈm̩ɟi wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi. wˈatu wˈote wa jabˈeʃi wˌakamwambˈia, fˈaɲa mkatˈaba na sˈisi, na tˌutakˈuwa tʃˈini jˈako.|0
lakˈini nahˈaʃi jˈule mwamˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌitafˈaɲa mkatˈaba na nˈiɲi tu kwa ʃˈarti kwˌamba nˌitaŋɡˈoa ɟˈitʃo la kulˈia la kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu, na hˈivjo kulˈeta aˈibu ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jabˈeʃi wˌakamwambˈia, tˈupe sˈiku sˈaba ˌili tuwˈeze kutˈuma waɟˈumbe katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote, kˌama hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajekˈuɟa kˌutuokˈoa, tˌutaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwˈako.|0
waɟˈumbe wˌalipofˈika ɡibˈea ja saˈuli na kutˈoa tˌaarˈifa ɟˌuːja maʃˈarti hˈaja kwa wˈatu, wˈote wˌalilˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌanarˈudi kutˈoka mˌaʃambˈani, akˈiwa ɲˈuma ja maksˈai wˈake, nˌaje ˌakaulˈiza, wˈatu wˈana nˈini? mbˈona wˌanalˈia? ndˈipo wˌakamwelˈeza ɟˈinsi wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamesˈema.|0
saˈuli ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno jˈao, rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌaje ˌakawˈaka hasˈira.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈozi ja maksˈai na kˌuwakˈata vipˈande vipˈande, nˌaje kˌuvitˈuma hˈivjo vipˈande kˌupitˈia waɟˈumbe katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote, wˌakitaŋɡˈaza, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjofaɲˈika kwa maksˈai wa kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje hˌatamfuˈata saˈuli na samwˈeli. kˈiʃa hˈofu ja bwˈana ˌikawˌaaŋɡukˈia wˈatu, nˌao wˌakatˈoka kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa.|0
saˈuli ˌalipˌowakusˈaɲa hˌuko bezˈeki, wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa mˌiatˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na wˈatu wa jˈuda θˌeleθˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
wˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale waɟˈumbe wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa, wˌaambiˈeni wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi, kˈeʃo kˈabla ɟˈua hˌaliɟˈawa kˈali, mtˌaokolˈewa.  waɟˈumbe wˌalipokwˈenda na kutˈoa tˌaarˈifa hˌii kwa wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi, wˌakafurˈahi.|0
wˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaamˈoni, kˈeʃo tˌutaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwˈenu, nˌaɲi mtawˈeza kˌututendˈea tʃotʃˈote mnˌatʃoˈona tʃˈema kwˈenu.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake saˈuli ˌalitˌeŋɡanˈiʃa wˈatu wˌake katˌika vikˈosi vitˈatu; wakˈati wa zˈamu ja mwˈiʃo ja usˈiku wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika kˈambi ja wˌaamˈoni na kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa mpˈaka mtʃˈana. wˈale wˌaliˌonusurˈika wˌakasambˈaa, kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌawakˌusalˈia wˈatu wawˈili pamˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, ni nˈani jˈule ˌalijˌeulˈiza, ɟˈe, saˈuli ˌatatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈetu? tˌuletˈee hˈawa wˈatu, nˌasi tˌutawaˈua.|0
lakˈini saˈuli ˌakasˈema, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajeuˈawa lˈeo, kwa kˌuwa sˈiku hˌii bwˈana ˌameokˈoa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, ɲɟoˈoni, twendˈeni ɡilɡˈali na hˌuko tˌuθibitˈiʃe ufˈalme.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˈote wˌakaˈenda ɡilɡˈali na kˌumθibitˈiʃa saˈuli kˌuwa mfˈalme mbˈele za bwˈana. hˌuko wˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu za sadˈaka za amˈani mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌaje saˈuli na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakafˈaɲa karˈamu kˈubwa.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia ˌisraˈeli wˈote, nˌimesˌikilˈiza kˈila kˈitu mlˌitʃonˌiambˈia nˌami nˌimewˌawekˈea mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
sˈasa m̩nˈaje mfˈalme kˌama kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈenu. lakˈini kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu mˌimi ni m̩zˈee na nˈina mvˈi, nˌao wanˈaŋɡu wˈapo hˈapa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi. nˌimekˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈenu ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu mpˈaka sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo.|0
mˌimi nˌinasimˈama hˈapa. ʃˌuhudiˈeni ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu mbˈele za bwˈana na mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake. nˌimetʃukˈua maksˈai wa nˈani? nˌimetʃukˈua pˈunda wa nˈani? ni nˈani nˌimepˈata kˌumdaŋɡˈaɲa? ni nˈani nˌimepˈata kˌumwonˈea? ni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa nˈani nˌimepokˈea rˈuʃwa ˌili kˌunifˈaɲa nifˈumbe mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu? kˌama nˌimefˈaɲa tʃotʃˈote katˌika hˈivi, mˌimi nˌitawˌarudiʃˈia.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, hˌuɟatˌudaŋɡˈaɲa wˈala kˌutuonˈea. hˌuɟapokˈea tʃotʃˈote kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa ˈm̩tu awˈaje jˈote.|0
samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia, bwˈana ni ʃahˈidi ɟˈuu jˈenu, pˈia mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˌake ni ʃahˈidi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo, kwˌamba hˌamkukˈuta tʃotʃˈote mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu. wˌakasˈema, jˌeje ni ʃahˈidi.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌalimtʃaɡˈua mˈose na arˈoni, na kˌuwalˈeta bˈaba zˈenu ˌakiwˌapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, sˌimamˈeni hˈapa, kwa sabˈabu nˌitakˌabiliˈana nˌaɲi kwa ˌuʃahˈidi mbˈele za bwˈana wa matˈendo jˈote ja hˈaki jˌalijofˈaɲua na bwˈana kwˈenu na kwa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
baˌada ja jakˈobo kˌuiŋɡˈia mˈisri, wˌalimlilˈia bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja msaˈada, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakawatˈuma mˈose na arˈoni, ambˈao wˌaliwatˈoa bˈaba zˈenu kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌuwakalˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa.|0
lakˈini wˌakamsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌakawaˈuza katˌika mkˈono wa sisˈera, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la hazˈori na katˌika mikˈono ja wˌafilˈisti na mfˈalme wa moˈabu, ambˈaje ˌalipiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈao.|0
wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana na kusˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi; tˌumemwˈatʃa bwˈana na kˌutumikˈia mˌabaˈali na mˌaaʃtorˈeθi. lakˈini sˈasa tˌuokˈoe kutˈoka mikˈono ja adˈui zˈetu, nˌasi tˌutakˌutumikˈia..|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakawatˈuma jˈerub baˈali, barˈaka, jˈefta na samwˈeli, nˌaje ˌakawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈenu kˈila upˈande, ˌili nˈiɲi mpˈate kukˈaa salˈama.|0
lakˈini mlˌipomwˈona jˈule nahˈaʃi mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni ˌanakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˈenu, mlˌiniambˈia, hapˈana, tˌunatˈaka mfˈalme ˌatutawˈale, hˌata iŋɡˈawa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wˈenu.|0
sˈasa hˈuju hˈapa n̩dˈije mfˈalme mlˌijemtʃaɡˈua, jˈule mlˌijeˈomba; tˌazamˈeni, bwˈana ˌamemwˈeka mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
kˌama mkˈimtʃa bwˈana na kˌumtumikˈia na kumtˈii nˌaɲi msˌipoˈasi ðˈidi ja ˈamri zˈake, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme ˌanajˌetawˈala ɟˈuu jˈenu mkˌimfuˈata bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, mˈambo jˌatakˈuwa mˈema kwˈenu.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌamkumtˈii bwˈana, nˌaɲi kˌama mkiˈasi ðˈidi ja ˈamri zˈake, mkˈono wˌake ˌutakˈuwa ðˈidi jˈenu, kˌama ˌulivjokˈuwa ðˈidi ja bˈaba zˈenu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, sˌimamˈeni kˈimja mkaˈone ɟˈambo hˈili kˈubwa ambˈalo bwˈana ˌanakwˈenda kˌulifˈaɲa mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu.|0
ɟˈe, sˈasa si mavˈuno ja ŋɡˈano? nˌitamwˈomba bwˈana ˌili alˈete ŋɡurˈumo na mvˈua. nˌaɲi mtˌatambˈua ɟˈambo hˈili lilˈivjo bˈaja mlˌilolifˈaɲa mbˈele za mˈatʃo ja bwˈana mlˌipoˈomba mfˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, na sˈiku ˈile ˈile bwˈana ˌakatˈuma ŋɡurˈumo na mvˈua. hˈivjo wˈatu wˈote wˌakamwoɡˈopa sˈana bwˈana na samwˈeli.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, mwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌili tusˈiɟe tukˈafa, kwa kˌuwa tˌumeoŋɡˈeza uˈovu ɟˌuːja ðˈambi zˈetu ɲiŋɡˈine kwa kuˈomba mfˈalme.|0
samwˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, msˌioɡˈope, mmefˈaɲa uˈovu hˈuu wˈote; hˌata hˈivjo msimwˈatʃe bwˈana, bˌali mtˌumikiˈeni bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote.|0
msˌiɡeukˈie sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa. hˌaziwˈezi kˌuwatendˈea ɟˈema, wˈala hˌaziwˈezi kˌuwaokˈoa kwa sabˈabu hazˈina maˈana.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake kˈuu bwˈana hˌatawˌakatˈaa wˈatu wˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌilimpendˈeza bwˈana kˌuwafˈaɲa kˌuwa wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu, ˈiwe mbˈali nˌami kutˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana kwa kuʃˈindwa kˌuwaombˈea. mˌimi nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia ilˈijo ɲɟˈema na ja kˌuɲoˈoka.|0
lakˈini hˌakikiʃˈeni mnˈamtʃa bwˈana na kˌumtumikˈia kwa ˌuaminˈifu kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote; tˌafakarˈini mˈambo makˈubwa ˌalijˌojatˈenda kwa aɟˈili jˈenu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mkˌiendelˈea kufˈaɲa uˈovu, nˈiɲi na mfˈalme wˈenu mtˌafutilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini, ˌalipokˈuwa mfˈalme, ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na miwˈili.|0
saˈuli ˌalitʃaɡˈua wˈatu tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli; mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˈatu mbˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje hˌuko mikmˈaʃi na katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja beθˈeli, nˌao wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na jˌonaθˈani hˌuko ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini. wˈatu wˌaliˌosalˈia ˌaliwˌarudˈiʃa ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakaʃˌambulˈia ŋɡˈome ja wˌafilˈisti hˌuko ɡˈeba, nˌao wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈata habˈari hˈizo. kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakaamˈuru tˌarumbˈeta ipˈiɡwe ˈn̩tʃi jˈote na kusˈema, wˌaebranˈia na wˌasikˈie.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakasikˈia habˈari kwˌamba: saˈuli ˌameʃˌambulˈia ŋɡˈome ja wˌafilˈisti, nˌao sˈasa ˌisraˈeli wˌamekˈuwa harˈufu m̩bˈaja kwa wˌafilˈisti. bˌasi wˈatu wˌaliˈitwa kˌuuŋɡˈana na saˈuli hˌuko ɡilɡˈali.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakakˌusaɲˈika ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli, wakˈiwa na maɡˈari ja vˈita tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, wˌaendˈeʃa maɡˈari ja vˈita sˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na askˈari wa miɡˈuu wˈeŋɡi kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari. wˌalipˈanda na kupˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mikmˈaʃi, mˌaʃarˈiki ja bˈeθ avˈeni.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa hˈali jˈao ni ja hatˈari na kˌuwa ɟˈeʃi lˈao lˌimesˈoŋɡwa sˈana, wˌakaɟifˈitʃa katˌika mapˈaŋɡo na katˌika vitʃˈaka, kˌatikˈati ja miˈamba, kwˈeɲe maʃˈimo na kwˈeɲe mˌahandˈaki.|0
hˌata baˈaði ja wˌaebranˈia wˌakavˈuka jordˈani mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈadi na ɡˌileˈadi. saˈuli ˌakabˈaki hˌuko ɡilɡˈali, nˈavjo vikˈosi vjˈote vˌilivjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje vˌilikˈuwa vˌikitˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu.|0
ˌakaŋɡˈoɟa kwa sˈiku sˈaba, mˈuda ˌuliowˈekwa na samwˈeli; lakˈini samwˈeli hakˈuɟa ɡilɡˈali, nˌao wˈatu wa saˈuli wˌakaˈanza kˌutawaɲˈika.|0
bˌasi ˌakasˈema, nˌileteˈeni hˈapa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani. nˌaje saˈuli ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mˈara ˌalipˌomalˈiza kutˈoa hˈijo sadˈaka, samwˈeli ˌakatokˈea, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda kumlˈaki.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌumefˈaɲa nˈini? saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌilipoˈona kwˌamba wˈatu wˌanatˌawaɲˈika, na kwˌamba hukˈuɟa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa na kwˌamba wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌakikˌusaɲˈika hˌuko mikmˈaʃi.|0
nˌikawˈaza, sˈasa wˌafilˈisti wˌataterˈemka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu hˌuko ɡilɡˈali nˌami sˌiɟaˈomba kibˈali kwa bwˈana. hˈivjo nˌikalˌazimˈika kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, ˌumetˈenda kwa ˌupumbˈavu. hˌukujaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalijokˈupa. kˌama ˌuŋɡelitˈii, ˌaŋɡeˌudumˈiʃa ufˈalme wˈako ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli kwa wakˈati wˈote.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ufˈalme wˈako hˌautadˈumu; bwˈana ˌamemtafˈuta ˈm̩tu ˌaupˌendezˈaje mˈojo wˈake, na ˌamemtʃaɡˈua ˈawe kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wˈake, kwa sabˈabu hˌukujatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakaondˈoka ɡilɡˈali, ˌakapˈanda ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakawˌahesˈabu wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa nˈao. ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu mˌiasˈita.|0
saˈuli, mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani na wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi hˌuko ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini, wakˈati wˌafilˈisti wakˈiwa wˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko mikmˈaʃi.|0
makˈundi ja wˌavamiˈaɟi wˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka kˈambi ja wˌafilˈisti katˌika vikˈosi vitˈatu. kikˈosi kimˈoɟa kˌiliˌelekˈea ˈofra karˈibu na ʃuˈali.|0
kikˈosi kiŋɡˈine kˌiliˌelekˈea bˈeθ horˈoni, nˈatʃo kikˈosi tʃa tˈatu kˌiliˌelekˈea kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja mpakˈani ˌielˌekeˈajo bˈonde la sˌeboˈimu lˌinalˌotazamˈana na ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
hˌapakˈuwa na mhˈunzi ambˈaje ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌupatikˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesˈema, wˌaebranˈia wasˈiɟe wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈaŋɡa ˌau mikˈuki.|0
hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˈote hˌuterˈemka kwa wˌafilˈisti ˌili kunˈoa maɟˈembe ja plˈau, maɟˈembe ja mkˈono, maʃˈoka na miˈundu.|0
bˈei ˌilikˈuwa fˈeða θelˈuθi mbˈili za ʃekˈeli kunˈoa maɟˈembe ja plˈau na maɟˈembe ja mkˈono, na θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja ʃekˈeli kwa ɲˈuma, maʃˈoka na mˌitʃokˈoo.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈiku ja vˈita hakˈuna askˈari jejˈote ˌalijekˈuwa kambˈini na saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa na upˈaŋɡa wˈala mkˈuki mkonˈoni mwˈake; saˈuli tu na mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa nˈavjo.|0
bˌasi kikˈosi tʃa wˌafilˈisti kˌilikˈuwa kˌimetˈoka kˌuelekˈea ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo mikmˈaʃi.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia kiɟˈana mbˈeba silˈaha wˈake, ˌakasˈema, ɲɟˈoo, tˌuwavukˈie wˌafilˈisti kwˈeɲe dorˈia upˈande ˈule mwiŋɡˈine. lakˈini hˌakumwambˈia bˈaba jˈake.|0
saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌakikˈaa kwˈeɲe viˈuŋɡa vja ɡibˈea tʃˈini ja mkˌomamˈaŋɡa hˌuko miɡrˈoni. ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu kˌama mˌiasˈita.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌalikuwˈepo ahˈija, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa kˌisibˈau. ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa ˌikabˈodi, nduɡˈuje ˌahitˈubu mwˈana wa fˌinehˈasi, mwˈana wa ˈeli, kuhˈani wa bwˈana hˌuko ʃˈilo. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijekˈuwa na habˈari kwˌamba jˌonaθˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌameondˈoka.|0
kˈila upˈande wa ɲɟˈia ambˈajo jˌonaθˈani ˌalikˌusudˈia kupˈita ˌili kuvˈuka kˌufikˈia dorˈia ja wˌafilˈisti kˌulikuwˈepo na ɟabˈali; mˈoɟa lˌilikˈuwa lˌinaˈitwa bosˈesi, na ɟiŋɡˈine sˈene.|0
ɟabˈali mˈoɟa lˌilisimˈama kˌaskazˈini kˌuelekˈea mikmˈaʃi na ɟiŋɡˈine upˈande wa kusˈini kˌuelekˈea ɡˈeba.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia kiɟˈana wˌake mbˈeba silˈaha, ɲɟˈoo, tˌuvukˈie dorˈia ja wˈale ɟamˈaa wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa. huˈenda bwˈana ˌatatˈenda kwa aɟˈili jˈetu. hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃowˈeza kˌumzuˈia bwˈana kˌuokˈoa, kwˌamba ni kwa wˈiŋɡi ˌau kwa utʃˈatʃe.|0
mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake ˌakamwambˈia, fˈaɲa jˈale jˈote ulˈijo nˈajo katˌika mˈojo wˈako. sˈoŋɡa mbˈele; mˈojo wˈaŋɡu na rˈoho jˈaŋɡu vˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakasˈema, bˌasi ɲɟˈoo; tˌutavˈuka kˌuwaˌelekˈea hˈao wˈatu na kuˈatʃa wˌatuˈone.|0
kˌama wˌakitˌuambˈia, sˌubirˈini hˈapo mpˈaka tˈuɟe kwˈenu, tˌutakˈaa pˈale tulˈipo na hˌatutakwˈea kwˈao.|0
lakˈini kˌama wˌatasˈema, pandˈeni ˈm̩ɟe kwˈetu, tˌutakwˈea, kwa sabˈabu hˈijo ˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara jˈetu kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamewatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu.|0
bˌasi wˈote wawˈili wˌakaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kwa dorˈia ja wˌafilˈisti. wˌafilˈisti wˌakasˈema, tazˈama! wˌaebranˈia wˌanatambˈaa tˌoka mˌaʃimˈoni wˌalimokˈuwa wˌameɟifˈitʃa.|0
wˈatu wa kwˈeɲe dorˈia wˌakawˌapiɡˈia kelˈele jˌonaθˈani na mbˈeba silˈaha wˈake, wˌakisˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, pandˈeni kwˈetu nˌasi tˌutawˌakomˈeʃa. bˌasi jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia mbˈeba silˈaha wˈake, pˈanda ɲˈuma jˈaŋɡu; bwˈana ˌamewatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakapˈanda ɟˈuu, ˌakitumˈia mikˈono jˌake na miɡˈuu, pamˈoɟa na mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake pˈapo hˈapo ɲˈuma jˈake. wˌafilˈisti wˌakaaŋɡˈuka mbˈele ja jˌonaθˈani, nˌaje mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake ˌakamfuˈata ˌakiwaˈua ɲˈuma jˈake.|0
katˌika hˌilo ʃˌambulˈio la kwˈanza, jˌonaθˈani na mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake wˌaliˈua kˌama wˈatu ˌiʃirˈini kwˈeɲe enˈeo kˌama la nˈusu ˈeka.|0
kˈiʃa faðˈaa ˌikawapˈata ɟˈeʃi lˈote, wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa kambˈini na ʃambˈani, wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika dorˈia na makˈundi ja wˌaʃambˌuliˈaɟi, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌilitˌetemˈeka. ˌilikˈuwa ni hˈofu ja ɣafˈula ˌilijotˈumwa na mˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌapelelˈezi wa saˈuli hˌuko ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini wˌakaˈona ɟˈeʃi lˌikitˌokomˈea pˈande zˈote.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kˌaɡuˈeni ɟˈeʃi mkaˈone ni nˈani ˌameondˈoka kˌatikˈati jˈetu. wˌalipˌokaɡˈua, akˈawa ni jˌonaθˈani na mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake ambˈao hˌawakuwˈepo.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia ahˈija, lˈeta sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu. wakˈati hˈuo lˌilikˈuwa kwa wˌaisraˈeli..|0
wakˈati saˈuli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakisˈema na kuhˈani, mˌakelˈele katˌika kˈambi ja wˌafilˈisti jˌakaˌoŋɡezˈeka zaˈidi na zaˈidi. hˈivjo saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia kuhˈani, rudˈiʃa mkˈono wˈako.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌakakˌusaɲˈika na kwˈenda vitˈani. wˌakawakˈuta wˌafilˈisti wakˈiwa wˌametʃˌaŋɡaɲikˈiwa kabˈisa, wˌakitiˈana pˈaŋɡa kˈila mmˈoɟa na wenzˈake.|0
wˈale wˌaebranˈia ambˈao wˌaliʃakˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˌafilˈisti, na wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamepˈanda pamˈoɟa nˌao katˌika kˈambi zˈao, wˌakaˈenda upˈande wa wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameɟifˈitʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja milˈima ja ˌefraˈimu wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa wˌafilˈisti wˌamekimbˈia, wˌakaɟiˈuŋɡa vitˈani na kˌuwafuˈata kwa bidˈii.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakawˌaokˈoa wˌaisraˈeli sˈiku ˈile, nˈavjo vˈita vˌilienˈea hˌadi kupˈita bˈeθ avˈeni.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa katˌika ðˈiki sˈiku ˈile, kwa sabˈabu saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewafˈuŋɡa wˈatu kwa kiˈapo, ˌakisˈema, ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌatakˈula tʃakˈula kˈabla ja ɟiˈoni, kˈabla sˌiɟalipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu! kwa hˈijo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote katˌika ɟˈeʃi ˌalijeˈoɲɟa tʃakˈula.|0
ɟˈeʃi lˈote lˌiliiŋɡˈia mwitˈuni, na hˌuko kˌulikuwˈepo na asˈali arðˈini.|0
wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia mwitˈuni, wˌakaˈona asˈali ˌikitˌirirˈika, hˌata hˈivjo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijetˈia mkˈono wˌake kˌiɲuˈani, kwa sabˈabu wˌalioɡˈopa kiˈapo.|0
lakˈini jˌonaθˈani ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟasikˈia kˌuwa bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewafˈuŋɡa wˈatu kwa kiˈapo, hˈivjo ˌakaˌiɲoˈoʃa ˈn̩tʃa ja fˈimbo ˌilijokˈuwa mkonˈoni mwˈake na kˌuitʃˈovja katˌika sˈeɡa la asˈali. ˌakainˈua mkˈono wˌake na kˌuutˈia kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake, nˈajo mˈatʃo jˌake jakˈawa mˌaaŋɡˈavu.|0
kˈiʃa mmˈoɟa wa askˈari wˌake ˌakamwambˈia, bˈaba jˈako ˌalilifˈuŋɡa ɟˈeʃi kwa kiˈapo kikˈali, ˌakisˈema, ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu jejˈote alˈaje tʃakˈula lˈeo! n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˈatu wˌanaleɡˈea.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakasˈema, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌameˌitaabˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi. ˈona ɟˈinsi nˌilivjopˈata ŋɡˈuvu ˈm̩pja nˌilipoˈoɲɟa asˈali hˌii kidˈoɡo.|0
ˌiŋɡekˈuwa bˈora zaˈidi mˈara ŋɡˈapi kˌama wˈatu wˌaŋɡalikˈula lˈeo baˈaði ja ɲˈara wˌalizotˈeka kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈao. ɟˈe, mˌauˈaɟi ja wˌafilˈisti jˌasiŋɡekˈuwa makˈubwa zaˈidi.|0
sˈiku ˈile baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌuwaˈua wˌafilˈisti kutˈoka mikmˈaʃi mpˈaka ˌaijalˈoni, wˌalikˈuwa wˌametʃˈoka.|0
wˈatu wˌakarukˈia zˈile ɲˈara, wˌakitʃukˈua kondˈoo, ŋɡˈombe na ndˈama, wˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa hˈapo ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi na kuwˈala, pamˈoɟa na dˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, tazˈama, wˈatu wˌanatˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana kwa kˈula ɲˈama jˌeɲe dˈamu. ˌakasˈema, mmevˈuɲɟa ˌuaminˈifu. lˌiviŋɡˌiriʃˈeni ɟˈiwe kˈubwa hˈapa mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakasˈema, nendˈeni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu, mwˌaambˈie, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌaniletˈee ŋɡˈombe wˌake na kondˈoo, mwˌatʃiɲɟˈie hˈapa na ˈm̩le. msitˈende ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana kwa kˈula ɲˈama ikˈiwa na dˈamu ndˈani jˈake.  hˈivjo kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakalˈeta ŋɡˈombe wˌake ɟiˈoni ˈile na kumtʃˈiɲɟa hˈapo.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu, na n̩dˈijo ˌilivjokˈuwa mˈara jˌake ja kwˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu.|0
saˈuli ˌakasˈema, tˌuterˈemke tˌufuatˈie wˌafilˈisti usˈiku na kˌuwatˈeka ɲˈara mpˈaka mˌapambazˈuko, nˌasi tˌusiˈatʃe hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao hˈai. wˌakaɟˈibu, fˈaɲa lolˈote lˈile ˌuonˈalo ɟˈema zaˈidi kwˈako. lakˈini kuhˈani ˌakasˈema, tˌuulˈize kwa mˈuŋɡu mahˈali hˈapa.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakamˌuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu, ˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, nˌiterˈemke kˌuwafˌuatˈia wˌafilˈisti? ɟˈe, ˌutawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌisraˈeli? lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌakumɟˈibu sˈiku ˈile.|0
kwa hˈijo saˈuli ˌakasˈema, ɲɟoˈoni hˈapa, nˈiɲi ɲˈote ambˈao ni vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˈeʃi, na tˌutafˈute ni ðˈambi ɡˈani ˌimefˈaɲua lˈeo.|0
kwa hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiˌokoˈaje ˌisraˈeli ˌaiʃˈivjo, hˌata kˌama ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja mwˈana wˈaŋɡu jˌonaθˈani, ni lazˈima ˈafe. lakˈini hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijesˈema nˈeno.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, nˈiɲi sˌimamˈeni hˌuko; mˌimi na mwanˈaŋɡu jˌonaθˈani tˌutasimˈama hˈapa. wˈatu wˌakaɟˈibu, fˈaɲa lˈile ˌunaloˈona ɟˈema zaˈidi kwˈako.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakisˈema, nˈipe ɟˈibu lilˈilo sˈawa. jˌonaθˈani na saˈuli wˌakatolˈewa kwa kˈura, nˌao wˈatu wakˈawa salˈama.|0
saˈuli ˌakasˈema, piɡˈeni kˈura kˈati jˈaŋɡu na mwanˈaŋɡu jˌonaθˈani. kˈura ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jˌonaθˈani.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia jˌonaθˈani, nˌiambˈie ni nˈini ˌulitʃˌokifˈaɲa. hˈivjo jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiliˈoɲɟa tu asˈali kidˈoɡo kwa ˈn̩tʃa ja fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu. ɟˈe, sˈasa ni lazˈima nˈife.|0
saˈuli ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu na ˌaniʃˌuɣulikˈie kwa ukˈali zaˈidi kˌama wˌewe jˌonaθˈani hˌutakˈufa.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, ɟˈe, jˌonaθˈani ˌatakˈufa, jˌeje ambˈaje ˌamelˈeta wokˈovu hˈuu mkˈubwa ˌisraˈeli? hˈaʃa! hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, hakˈuna hˌata ˌuɲuˈele wa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ˌutakˌaoaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈarði, kwa kˌuwa ˌalifˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili lˈeo kwa msaˈada wa mˈuŋɡu. bˌasi wˈatu wˌakamwokˈoa jˌonaθˈani, wˈala hˌakuuˈawa.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakaˈatʃa kˌuwafuˈata wˌafilˈisti, nˌao wˌakaɟˌiondˈoa na kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
baˌada ja saˈuli kˌuɟitwalˈia ˌutawˈala katˌika ˌisraˈeli, ˌalipiɡˈana ðˈidi ja adˈui zˌake kˈila upˈande: moˈabu, wˌaamˈoni, edˈomu, wafˈalme wa sˈoba, na wˌafilˈisti. popˈote ˌalipˌoɡeukˈia, ˌaliwaʃˈinda.|0
ˌakapiɡˈana kˌiʃuɟˈaa na kˌuwaʃˈinda wˌaamalˈeki, ˌakiˌikombˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mikˈono ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewatˈeka ɲˈara.|0
wˈana wa saˈuli wˌalikˈuwa jˌonaθˈani, ˈiʃvi na mˈalki ʃˈua. ɟˈina la bˈinti jˌake mkˈubwa lˌilikˈuwa merˈabu, nˌaje mdˈoɡo ˌaliˈitwa mikˈali.|0
ɟˈina la mkˈewe saˈuli ˌaliˈitwa ˌahinoˈamu bˈinti wa ˌahimaˈasi. ɟˈina la ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la saˈuli ˌaliˈitwa abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, nˌaje nˈeri ˌalikˈuwa babˈaje mdˈoɡo saˈuli.|0
babˈaje saˈuli jaˈani, kˈiʃi na nˈeri bˈaba jˌake abnˈeri wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa ˌabiˈeli.|0
sˈiku zˈote za ˌutawˈala wa saˈuli zˌilikˈuwa za vˈita vikˈali ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti, na wakˈati wowˈote saˈuli ˌalimwˈona ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌau ʃuɟˈaa, ˌalimtʃukˈua kwa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, mˌimi n̩dˈije ambˈaje bwˈana ˌalinitˈuma nˌikutˈie mafˈuta ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli, bˌasi sˈasa sˌikilˈiza uɟˈumbe kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: nˌitawˌaaðˈibu wˌaamalˈeki kwa kˈile wˌalitʃˌowatendˈea ˌisraˈeli wˌalipˌowavizˈia wakˈati wˌalipˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
bˌasi sˈasa nˈenda ˌukawˌaʃambulˈie wˌaamalˈeki na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo mˈali jˈao. ˌusiwˌahurumˈie; waˈue wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake, watˈoto na wˌaɲoɲˈao, ŋɡˈombe na kondˈoo, ŋɡamˈia na pˈunda..|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakawaˈita wˈatu na kˌuwapˈaŋɡa hˌuko tˌelaˈimu, askˈari wa miɡˈuu mˌiambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri pamˈoɟa na wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka jˈuda.|0
saˈuli ˌakaˈenda katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ˌamalˈeki na kˌuwavizˈia bondˈeni.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia wakˈeni, ˌondokˈeni, wˌaatʃˈeni wˌaamalˈeki ˌili nisˈiɟe nˌikawˌaaŋɡamˈiza nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa nˈao, kwa kˌuwa nˈiɲi mlˌiwatendˈea mˈema wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wakˈati wˌalipˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri. bˌasi wakˈeni wˌakaondˈoka, wˌakawaˈatʃa wˌaamalˈeki.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia wˌaamalˈeki tˌoka havˈila mpˈaka ʃˈuri, hˌadi mˌaʃarˈiki ja mˈisri.|0
ˌakamtʃukˈua aɡˈaɡi, mfˈalme wa wˌaamalˈeki akˈiwa hˈai, nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˈote ˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
lakˈini saˈuli na hˌilo ɟˈeʃi wˌakamhifˈaði hˈai aɡˈaɡi na kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe walˈio wazˈuri, mˌafahˈali na wˌanakondˈoo wˌalionˈona kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa kizˈuri. hˈivi vˈitu hˌawakˈuwa rˈaði kˌuviˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, bˌali kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoðarˌaulˈiwa na kilˈitʃo ðaˈifu wˌakakˌiaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia samwˈeli kusˈema.|0
nˌinasˌikitˈika kwˌamba nˌimemfˈaɲa saˈuli kˌuwa mfˈalme, kwa sabˈabu ˌameˈatʃa kˌunifuˈata mˌimi na hˌakutimˈiza mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu. samwˈeli ˌakafˌaðaˈika, nˌaje ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana usˈiku ˈule wˈote.|0
ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema samwˈeli ˌakaˈamka kwˈenda kˌukutˈana na saˈuli, lakˈini ˌakaambˈiwa, saˈuli ˌamekwˈenda karmˈeli. hˌuko ˌamesˌimamˈiʃa mnˈara kwa heʃˈima jˌake mweɲˈewe nˌaje ˌameˌendelˈea na kˌuteremkˈia ɡilɡˈali.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipˌomfikˈia, saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana ˌakubarˈiki! nˌimetimˈiza jˈale bwˈana ˌalinˌiaɡˈiza.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˈini bˌasi hˈuu m̩lˈio wa kondˈoo mˌasikiˈoni mwˈaŋɡu? hˈuu m̩lˈio wa ŋɡˈombe nˌinaˌousikˈia ni kˈitu ɡˈani.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, askˈari wˌamewalˈeta kutˈoka kwa wˌaamalˈeki, wˌaliwaˈatʃa wˈale kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe wazˈuri ˌili kˌuwatˈoa ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, lakˈini tˌuliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, ŋɡˈoɟa! nˌami nˌitakˌuambˈia lˈile bwˈana ˌalilˌoniambˈia usˈiku hˈuu. saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌiambˈie.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia, iŋɡˈawa zamˈani ˌuliɟiˈona mdˈoɡo matʃˈoni pˈako mweɲˈewe, ɟˈe, hukˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila za ˌisraˈeli? bwˈana ˌalikutˈia mafˈuta kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌaje ˌakakutˈuma kwa kˈazi maˈalum, ˌakisˈema, nˈenda ˌukaˌaŋɡamˈize kabˈisa wˈale wˈatu waˈovu, wˈale wˌaamalˈeki, ˌupiɡˈane nˌao vˈita mpˈaka ˌutakˌapowˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa..|0
kwa nˈini hˌukumtˈii bwˈana? kwa nˈini ˌulivamˈia ɲˈara na kufˈaɲa uˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
saˈuli ˌakasˈema, lakˈini nˌilimtˈii bwˈana. nˌilikˌamilˈiʃa ˈile kˈazi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalinitˈuma. nˌiliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌaamalˈeki kabˈisa na kumlˈeta aɡˈaɡi mfˈalme wˈao.|0
askˈari wˌalitʃukˈua kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲˈara, zˈile ambˈazo ni nzˈuri sˈana zˌimewˈekwa wˈakfu kwa mˈuŋɡu, ˌili zˌitolˈewe ðabˈihu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako hˌuko ɡilɡˈali.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu: ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌanafˌurahˈia sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu kˌama vˈile kˌuitˈii saˈuti ja bwˈana? kutˈii ni bˈora zaˈidi kulˈiko ðabˈihu, nˈako kˌusikˈia ni bˈora kulˈiko mafˈuta ja kondˈoo dˈume.|0
kwa maˈana kuˈasi ni kˌama ðˈambi ja ˌuaɡˈuzi, nˌao ˌukaˈidi ni kˌama uˈovu wa kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu. kwa sabˈabu ˌumelˌikatˈaa nˈeno la bwˈana, nˌaje ˌamekˌukatˈaa wˌewe kˌuendelˈea kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi. nˌimevˈuɲɟa ˈamri ja bwˈana na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako. nˌiliwˌaoɡˈopa wˈatu na kwa hˈijo nˌikafˈaɲa wˌalivjotˈaka.|0
sˈasa nˌinakusˈihi ˌusamˈehe ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu, nˌawe urˈudi pamˈoɟa nˈami, ˌili nipˈate kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia, sˌitarˈudi pamˈoɟa nˈawe. ˌumelˌikatˈaa nˈeno la bwˈana, nˌaje bwˈana ˌamekˌukatˈaa wˈewe, ˌusiˌendelˈee kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
samwˈeli ˌalipˌoɡeˈuka ˌili ˌaondˈoke, saˈuli ˌakaŋɡˌaŋɡanˈia pˈindo la ɟˈoho lˈake, nˈalo lˌikararˈuka.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana ˌameˌurarˈua ufˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka kwˈako lˈeo, nˌaje ˌameutˈia kwa mmˈoɟa wa mˌaɟirˈani zˈako, alˈije bˈora kulˈiko wˈewe.|0
jˌeje alˈije ˌutukˈufu wa ˌisraˈeli hasˈemi uˈoŋɡo wˈala hˈana kˌiɡeuɡˈeu; kwa kˌuwa jˌeje si mwˌanadˈamu, hˌata ˌabadˈili nˈia jˈake.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi. lakˈini tˌafaðˈali nˌiheʃˈimu mbˈele ja wazˈee wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli; rˈudi pamˈoɟa nˈami, ˌili nipˈate kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
hˈivjo samwˈeli ˌakarˈudi pamˈoɟa na saˈuli, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakamwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˌiletˈee aɡˈaɡi mfˈalme wa wˌaamalˈeki. aɡˈaɡi akˈaɟa kwˈake kwa ˌuɟasˈiri, ˌakifikˈiri, hakˈika utʃˈuŋɡu wa maˈuti ˌumepˈita.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, kˌama upˈaŋɡa wˈako ˌulivjofˈaɲa wˌanawˈake kufˈiwa na watˈoto wˈao, ndˈivjo mˈama jˈako ˌatakˌavjokˈuwa hˈana mtˈoto mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanawˈake. nˌaje samwˈeli ˌakamuˈua aɡˈaɡi mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko ɡilɡˈali.|0
kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakaˈenda rˈama, lakˈini saˈuli ˌakapˈanda ɲumbˈani kwˈake hˌuko ɡibˈea ja saˈuli.|0
hˌadi sˈiku samwˈeli ˌalipˌofarˈiki hakwˈenda kumwˈona saˈuli tˈena, iŋɡˈawa samwˈeli ˌalimwˌombolezˈea. nˌaje bwˈana ˌalihˌuzunˈika kwˌamba ˌalimfˈaɲa saˈuli kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, ˌutamlilˈia saˈuli mpˈaka lˈini, mˌaadˈamu nˌimemkatˈaa ˌasiˌendelˈee kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli? ɟˈaza pˈembe jˈako mafˈuta, uʃˈike ɲɟˈia uˈende; nˌinakutˈuma kwa jˈese hˌuko bˌeθlehˈemu. nˌimemtʃaɡˈua mmˈoɟa wa wanˈawe kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, nˌitakwendˈaɟe? saˈuli ˌatasikˈia ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili na ˌataniˈua. bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, tʃukˈua mtˈamba wa ŋɡˈombe na usˈeme, nˌimekˈuɟa kˌumtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu..|0
mwalˈike jˈese ˈaɟe kwˈeɲe ðabˈihu, nˌami nˌitakˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutakˌalofˈaɲa. ˌutamtˈia mafˈuta kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu jˈule nˌitakˌajekˌuoɲˈeʃa.|0
samwˈeli ˌakafˈaɲa kˈile bwˈana ˌalitʃosˈema. ˌalipofˈika bˌeθlehˈemu, wazˈee wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakatˌetemˈeka wˌalipomlˈaki. wˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌumekˈuɟa kwa amˈani.|0
samwˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, kwa amˈani; nˌimekˈuɟa kˌumtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu. ɟˌiwekˈeni wˈakfu na ˈm̩ɟe kwˈeɲe ðabˈihu pamˈoɟa nˈami. ndˈipo ˌakamwˈeka jˈese wˈakfu pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe na kˌuwaalˈika kwˈeɲe ðabˈihu.|0
wˌalipofˈika, samwˈeli ˌakamwˈona ˌeliˈabu, nˌaje ˌakafikˈiri, hakˈika mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana ˌanasimˈama hˈapa mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia samwˈeli, ˌusitazˈame sˈura jˌake wˈala kˈimo tʃˈake, kwa kˌuwa nˌimemkatˈaa. bwˈana hˌatazˈami katˌika vˈile vˈitu mwˌanadˈamu ˌavitˌazamˈavjo. mwˌanadˈamu hˌutazˈama katˌika sˈura ja ɲɟˈe, lakˈini bwˈana hˌutazˈama mojˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa jˈese ˌakamwˈita ˌabinadˈabu na kˌumpitˈiʃa mbˈele ja samwˈeli. lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, hˌata hˈuju bwˈana hˌakumtʃaɡˈua.|0
kˈiʃa jˈese ˌakampitˈiʃa ʃˈama, lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, wˈala hˈuju bwˈana hˌakumtʃaɡˈua.|0
jˈese ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sˈaba ˌaliˌowapitˈiʃa mbˈele ja samwˈeli, lakˈini samwˈeli ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana hˌaɟawˌatʃaɡˈua hˈawa.|0
hˈivjo ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈese, ɟˈe, hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana pekˈee ulˈio nˈao? jˈese ˌakaɟˈibu, bˈado jˈuko mdˈoɡo kulˈiko wˈote, lakˈini ˌanatʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo. samwˈeli ˌakasˈema, tˈuma aˈitwe; hˌatutakˈeti mpˈaka afˈike.|0
bˌasi ˌakatˈuma aˈitwe nˌaje ˌakalˈetwa. ˌalikˈuwa mwekˈundu, mwˌeɲe sˈura nzˈuri na ˈumbo la kˌupendˈeza. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakasˈema, inˈuka na umtˈie mafˈuta, hˈuju n̩dˈije.|0
bˌasi samwˈeli ˌakatʃukˈua ˈile pˈembe ja mafˈuta na kumtˈia mafˈuta mbˈele ja ndˈuɡu zˈake, kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ˈile na kˌuendelˈea rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja daˈudi kwa ŋɡˈuvu. kˈiʃa samwˈeli ˌakaˈenda zˌake rˈama.|0
bˌasi rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌameondˈoka kwa saˈuli, nˈajo rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌikaatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na bwˈana ˌili imtˈese.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa saˈuli wˌakamwambˈia, ˌaŋɡalˈia, rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌimeatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na bwˈana nˈajo ˌinakutˈesa.|0
bˌasi bwˈana wˈetu na ˌaamˈuru wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌaliˈoko hˈapa kˌutafˈuta ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌanawˈeza kupˈiɡa kinˈubi. ˌatakipˈiɡa kinˈubi wakˈati rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌilijˌoatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na mˈuŋɡu ˌikuɟiˈapo, nˌawe ˌutaɟˌisikˈia vizˈuri.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, mtˌafutˈeni ˈm̩tu ˌapiɡˈaje kinˈubi vizˈuri mkamlˈete kwˈaŋɡu.|0
mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimemwˈona mwˈana wa jˈese mbˌeθlehˈemu ambˈaje ˌanaɟˈua kupˈiɡa kinˈubi. jˌeje ni ˈm̩tu hodˈari na ʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita. ni mwˌeɲe busˈara katˌika kunˈena, ˈm̩tu mzˈuri wa ˈumbo. bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa jˈese na kˌumwambˈia, nˌitumˈie mwanˈao daˈudi, ambˈaje ˌanatʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo.|0
kwa hˈijo jˈese ˌakamtʃukˈua pˈunda ˌalijˌepakˈizwa mikˈate, kirˈiba tʃa divˈai na mwˌanambˈuzi, na kˌuvipelˈeka vˈitu hˈivjo kwa saˈuli pamˈoɟa na daˈudi mwanˈawe.|0
daˈudi ˌakafˈika kwa saˈuli na kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe kˈazi jˈake. saˈuli ˌakampˈenda sˈana, nˌaje daˈudi akˈawa mmˈoɟa wa wabˈeba silˈaha wˈake.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa jˈese, ˌakisˈema, mruhˈusu daˈudi abˈaki katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌinapendˈezwa nˈaje.|0
kˈila mˈara rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌilijˌoatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na mˈuŋɡu ˌilipomɟˈia saˈuli, daˈudi ˌalitʃukˈua kinˈubi tʃˈake na kupˈiɡa. ndˈipo saˈuli ˌaŋɡetulˈizwa na kˌuɟisikˈia vizˈuri, nˈajo ˈile rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌiŋɡemwˈatʃa.|0
wakˈati hˈuu wˌafilˈisti wˌakakusˈaɲa maɟˈeʃi jˈao kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita, nˌao wˌakakˌusaɲˈika hˌuko sˈoko katˌika jˈuda. wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ˈefes damˈimu, kˈati ja sˈoko na azˈeka.|0
saˈuli na wˌaisraˈeli wˌakakˌusaɲˈika na kupˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika bˈonde la ˈela na kupˈaŋɡa ɟˈeʃi ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita na wˌafilˈisti.|0
wˌafilˈisti wakˈawa katˌika kilˈima kimˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli katˌika kilˈima kiŋɡˈine, hˌilo bˈonde likˈiwa kˈati jˈao.|0
ʃuɟˈaa ˌalijeˈitwa ɡˌoliˈaθi, ˌalijetˈoka ɡˈaθi, ˌakaɟˌitokˈeza kutˈoka kˈambi ja wˌafilˈisti. ˌalikˈuwa na urˈefu ðirˈaa sˈita na ʃibˈiri mˈoɟa.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na tʃapˈeo ja ʃˈaba kitʃwˈani mwˈake, na ˌalivˈaa dirˈii ja ʃˈaba kˌifuˈani mwˈake jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli ˈelfu tˈano.|0
mpˈini wa hˈuo mkˈuki ˌulikˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mfumˈaɟi, na ˈn̩tʃa ja tʃˈuma jˌake ˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˈia sˈita. mbˈeba ŋɡˈao wˌake ˌalitˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈake.|0
ɡˌoliˈaθi ˌalisimˈama na kˌuwapiɡˈia kelˈele maɟˈeʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌakisˈema, kwa nˈini mmetˈoka kupˈaŋɡa vˈita? ɟˈe, mˌimi si mfilˈisti, na nˈiɲi ni wˌatumˈiʃi wa saˈuli? tʃˌaɡuˈeni ˈm̩tu na ˌaniʃukˈie mˈimi.|0
kˌama ˌanawˈeza kˌupiɡˈana nˌami na kˌuniˈua, tˌutakˈuwa tʃˈini jˈenu; lakˈini kˌama nˌikimʃˈinda na kˌumuˈua, nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa tʃˈini jˈetu na mtˌatutˌumikˈia.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule mfilˈisti ˌakasˈema, sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo nˌajatukˈana maɟˈeʃi ja ˌisraˈeli! nipˈeni ˈm̩tu tˌupiɡˈane.|0
kwa kˌusikˈia manˈeno ja wˌafilˈisti, saˈuli na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakafˌaðaˈika na kˌuoɡˈopa.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa mwefrˈaθi ɟˈina lˈake jˈese ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu ja jˈuda. jˈese ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wanˈane, nˌaje wakˈati wa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee tˈena wa ˈumri mkˈubwa.|0
wˈana wakˈubwa watˈatu wa jˈese wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na saˈuli vitˈani: mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa ˌeliˈabu, wa pˈili ˌabinadˈabu, na wa tˈatu ʃˈama.|0
daˈudi n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa mdˈoɡo wa wˈote. hˈao wakˈubwa watˈatu wˌakamfuˈata saˈuli.|0
lakˈini daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈenda kwa saˈuli na kurˈudi ˌili kutʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo wa bˈaba jˌake hˌuko bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
kwa sˈiku ˌarobaˈini hˈujo mfilˈisti ˌalikˈuwa akˈiɟa mbˈele kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi na ɟiˈoni na kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo jˈese ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈawe daˈudi, tʃukˈua hˌii ˈefa ja bˈisi na hˌii mikˈate kˈumi kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈuɡu zˈako ˌuwapˌelekˈee upˈesi kambˈini m̩wˈao.|0
tʃukˈua pamˈoɟa na hˈizi ɟibˈini kˈumi kwa ɟˌemadˈari wa kikˈosi tʃˈao. uɟˈue hˈali ja ndˈuɡu zˈako na ˌuniletˈee tˌaarˈifa za ˌuhakˈika kutˈoka kwˈao.|0
wˌao wˈako pamˈoɟa na saˈuli na wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli hˌuko kwˈeɲe bˈonde la ˈela, wˌakipiɡˈana na wˌafilˈisti.|0
ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakaliˈatʃa kˈundi la kondˈoo pamˈoɟa na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, ˌakapakˈia vˈitu vˈile na kˌuondˈoka, kˌama vˈile jˈese ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwaɡˈiza. ˌakafˈika kambˈini wakˈati ɟˈeʃi lˌilikˈuwa lˌikitˈoka kwˈenda kwˈeɲe sehˈemu jˌake ja kˌupiɡanˈia, hˈuku wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele za vˈita.|0
ˌisraˈeli na wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌakipˈaŋɡa sˈafu zˈao wˌakitˌazamˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakaˈatʃa vˈile vˈitu vjˈake kwa mtˈunza vifˈaa, ˌakakˌimbilˈia katˌika sˈafu za vˈita na kˌuwasalˈimu ndˈuɡu zˈake.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakisˈema nˈao, ɡˌoliˈaθi, jˈule mfilˈisti ʃuɟˈaa kutˈoka ɡˈaθi, ˌakaɟˌitokˈeza mbˈele ja sˈafu zˌake na kupˈiɡa ˈile kelˈele jˌake ja kˌawaˈida ja mˌatukˈano, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakajˌasikˈia.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipomwˈona jˈule ˈm̩tu, wˈote wˌakamkimbˈia kwa wˈoɡa m̩kˈuu.|0
bˌasi wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, mnaˈona ɟˈinsi ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌanavjˌoendelˈea kˌuɟitokˈeza. hˌuɟitokˈeza ˌili kˌutukˈana ˌisraˈeli. mfˈalme ˌatatˈoa ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi kwa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajemuˈua. pˈia ˌatamwˈoza bˈinti jˌake na ˌatasamˈehe ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˌake kulˈipa kˈodi katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌakaulˈiza wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesimˈama karˈibu nˈaje, ɟˈe, ˌatafaɲˈiwa nˈini ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajemuˈua hˈuju mfilˈisti na kˌuondˈoa aˈibu hˌii katˌika ˌisraˈeli? ni nˈani hˈuju mfilˈisti ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa hˌata ˌatukˈane maɟˈeʃi ja mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai.|0
wˌakarudˈia jˈale jˌalijokˈuwa jˌamesˈemwa na kˌumwambˈia kˌuwa, hˈili ndˈilo ˌatakˌalotendˈewa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌatakˌajemuˈua.|0
ˌeliˈabu nduɡˈuje mkˈubwa daˈudi ˌalipˌomsikˈia ˌakizuŋɡˈumza na wˈatu hasˈira ˌikawˈaka ɟˈuu jˌake ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌumeterˈemka kˈuɟa hˈapa? nˌao wˈale kondˈoo watʃˈatʃe kˈule ɲikˈani ˌumewaˈatʃa na nˈani? nˌinaɟˈua ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo na kibˈuri na ɟˈinsi mˈojo wˈako ulˈivjo mwˈovu; ˌumekˈuɟa hˈapa kˌutazˈama vˈita tˈu.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, sˈasa nˌimefˈaɲa nˈini? ɟˈe, siwˈezi hˌata kˌuoŋɡˈea.|0
daˈudi ˌakamɡˌeukˈia ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine na kˌumuulˈiza ɟˈambo lˈilo hˈilo, nˌao wˈatu wˌakamɟˈibu vˌilevˈile kˌama mwˈanzo.|0
lˈile daˈudi ˌalilosˈema lˌikasikˈiwa na kˌuelˈezwa kwa saˈuli, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakatˈuma aˈitwe.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, ˈm̩tu jejˈote asˈife mˈojo kwa habˈari ja hˈuju mfilˈisti; mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatakwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˈaje.|0
saˈuli ˌakamɟˈibu daˈudi, wˌewe hˌutawˈeza kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja hˈuju mfilˈisti; wˌewe ni kiɟˈana tˈu, nˌaje ˌamekˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa vˈita ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈake.|0
lakˈini daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamekˈuwa ˌakitʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo wa bˈaba jˈake. wakˈati sˈimba ˌau dˈubu ˌalikˈuɟa na kˌutʃukˈua kondˈoo kutˈoka kˈundi.|0
nˌilifˌuatˈia, nˌikampˈiɡa na nˌikampokˈoɲa kondˈoo kwˈeɲe kˈiɲua tʃˈake. ˌalipˌoniɡˌeukˈia, nˌilimkamˈata ɲuˈele zˈake, nˌikampˈiɡa na kˌumuˈua.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌameʃaˈua sˈimba na dˈubu pˈia; hˈuju mfilˈisti ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa ˌatakˈuwa kˌama mmˈoɟa wa hˈao, kwa sabˈabu ˌamejˌatukˈana maɟˈeʃi ja mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai.|0
bwˈana ambˈaje ˌalinˌiokˈoa tˌoka katˌika makˈutʃa ja sˈimba na makˈutʃa ja dˈubu ˌatanˌiokˈoa kutˈoka mikˈono ja hˈuju mfilˈisti. saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, nˈenda, nˌaje bwˈana na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakamvˈika daˈudi silˈaha zˌake mweɲˈewe za vˈita. ˌakamvˈika dirˈii na tʃapˈeo ja ʃˈaba kitʃwˈani mwˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakaɟifˈuŋɡa upˈaŋɡa ɟˌuːja hˈajo mavˈazi na kˌuɟarˈibu kˌutembˈea kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa hˈana ˌuzoˈefu nˈavjo. daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, siwˈezi kwˈenda nikˈiwa nˌimevˈaa hˈivi, kwa sabˈabu sˈina ˌuzoˈefu nˈavjo. hˈivjo ˌakavivˈua.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatʃukˈua fˈimbo jˌake mkonˈoni, ˌakatʃaɡˈua mˈawe laˈini matˈano kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kiɟˈito, ˌakajawˈeka kwˈeɲe kifˈuko ndˈani ja mfˈuko wˌake wa kˌitʃuŋɡˈaɟi, akˈiwa na kombˈeo jˌake mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌakamkˌaribˈia jˈule mfilˈisti.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, jˈule mfilˈisti, akˈiwa na mbˈeba ŋɡˈao wˌake mbˈele jˈake, ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuɟoŋɡˈea karˈibu na daˈudi.|0
mfilˈisti ˌakamwˌaŋɡalˈia daˈudi kˈote na kumwˈona kˌuwa ni kiɟˈana tˈu, mwekˈundu na mzˈuri wa kˌupendˈeza, nˌaje ˌakamðarˈau.|0
ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, ɟˈe, mˌimi ni ˈm̩bwa, hˌata ˌunaniɟˈia na fˈimbo? jˈule mfilˈisti ˌakamlaˈani daˈudi kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mfilˈisti. wˌewe ˌunaniɟˈia na upˈaŋɡa, mkˈuki na fˈumo, lakˈini mˌimi nˌinakuɟˈia kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa maɟˈeʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje wˌewe ˌumemtukˈana.|0
sˈiku hˌii lˈeo bwˈana ˌatakutˈia mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakupˈiɡa na kˌukukˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈako. lˈeo nˌitawˈapa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi mizˈoɡa ja ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti, nˈajo dunˈia jˈote ˌitaɟˈua kˌuwa jˈuko mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌokusaɲˈika hˈapa wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa bwˈana hˌaokˈoi kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈala kwa mkˈuki; kwa kˌuwa vˈita ni vja bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatawatˈia wˈote mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu.|0
jˈule mfilˈisti ˌalipˌosoɡˈea karˈibu ˌili kˌumʃambulˈia, daˈudi ˌakaˈenda m̩bˈio kˌuelekˈea sˈafu ja vˈita kˌukutˈana nˈaje.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamʃˈinda hˈujo mfilˈisti kwa kombˈeo na ɟˈiwe; bˌila kˌuwa na upˈaŋɡa mˌikonˈoni mwˈake ˌakampˈiɡa hˈujo mfilˈisti na kˌumuˈua.|0
daˈudi ˌakakimbˈia na kˌusimˈama ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌakauʃˈika upˈaŋɡa wa hˈujo mfilˈisti na kˌuuvˈuta tˌoka kwˈeɲe ˈala jˈake. baˌada ja kˌumuˈua, ˌakakˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kwa ˈule upˈaŋɡa. wˌafilˈisti wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ʃuɟˈaa wˌao ˌamekˈufa, wˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌukimbˈia.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda wˌakainˈuka kwˈenda mbˈele wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele na kˌufuatˈia wˌafilˈisti mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɡˈaθi kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ekrˈoni. maˈiti zˈao zˌilitˌawaɲˈika kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ja ʃˌaaraˈimu hˌadi ɡˈaθi na ekrˈoni.|0
daˈudi ˌakatʃukˈua kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈule mfilˈisti na kˌukilˈeta jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje ˌakawˈeka silˈaha za hˈujo mfilˈisti katˌika hˈema lˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
saˈuli ˌalipomwˈona daˈudi ˌanakwˈenda kˌukabˌiliˈana na hˈujo mfilˈisti, ˌalimwambˈia abnˈeri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, abnˈeri, jˈule kiɟˈana ni mwˈana wa nˈani? abnˈeri ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo, ˈee mfˈalme, mˌimi sˌifahˈamu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, ulˈiza hˈuju kiɟˈana ni mwˈana wa nˈani.|0
mˈara daˈudi ˌaliporˈudi kutˈoka kˌumuˈua hˈujo mfilˈisti, abnˈeri ˌakamtʃukˈua na kumlˈeta mbˈele ja saˈuli. daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa bˈado ˌanakˌiʃikilˈia kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈule mfilˈisti.|0
saˈuli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kiɟˈana, wˌewe ni mwˈana wa nˈani? daˈudi ˌakasˈema, mˌimi ni mwˈana wa mtumˈiʃi wˈako jˈese wa bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
baˌada ja daˈudi kˌumalˈiza kˌuoŋɡˈea na saˈuli, rˈoho ja jˌonaθˈani ˌikaˌambatˈana na rˈoho ja daˈudi, nˌaje ˌakampˈenda kˌama nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ˈile saˈuli ˌakamtʃukˈua daˈudi nˌaje hˌakumruhˈusu kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano na daˈudi kwa sabˈabu ˌalimpˈenda kˌama nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakavˈua ɟˈoho ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa na kˈumpa daˈudi, pamˈoɟa na kˈoti lˈake, silˈaha zˈake, hˌata pamˈoɟa na upˈaŋɡa wˈake, upˈinde wˌake na mʃˈipi wˈake.|0
lolˈote saˈuli ˌalilomtˈuma daˈudi kufˈaɲa, ˌalitˈenda kwa hekˈima, hˌata saˈuli akˈampa tʃˈeo tʃa ɟˈuu katˌika ɟˈeʃi. ɟˈambo hˈili lˌikawˌapendˈeza wˈatu wˈote, hˌata mˌaafˈisa wa saˈuli pˈia.|0
wˈatu wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanarˈudi ɲumbˈani baˌada ja daˈudi kˌumuˈua jˈule mfilˈisti, wˌanawˈake wakˈaɟa kutˈoka pˈande zˈote za mˈiɟi ja ˌisraˈeli kumlˈaki mfˈalme saˈuli kwa kuˈimba na kutʃˈeza, kwa ɲˈimbo za furˈaha na kwa matˈari na zˈeze.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanatʃˈeza, wˌakaˈimba: saˈuli ˌamewaˈua ˈelfu zˈake, nˌaje daˈudi makˈumi ˈelfu jˈake.|0
saˈuli ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana; sehˈemu hˌii ja kˌurudˈia rudˈia ja wˈimbo hˈuu ˌilimkˌasirˈiʃa sˈana. ˌakafikˈiri kˌuwa, wamˈempa daˈudi makˈumi ˈelfu, lakˈini mˌimi wˌamenˈipa ˈelfu tˈu. apˈate nˈini zaˈidi ˌisipokˈuwa ufˈalme.|0
kˌuanzˈia wakˈati ˈule na kˌuendelˈea saˈuli akˈawa na ɟˈitʃo la wˈivu ɟˌuːja daˈudi.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌilijˌoatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na mˈuŋɡu ikˈaɟa kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɟˌuːja saˈuli. ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitabˈiri ɲumbˈani mwˈake, wakˈati daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌakipˈiɡa kinˈubi, kˌama ˌalivjˌozoˈea. saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa na mkˈuki mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˌakautˈupa kwa ŋɡˈuvu, ˌakiɟˌiambˈia mweɲˈewe, nˌitamtʃˈoma kwa mkˈuki abˈaki hˈapo ˌukutˈani. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakamkwˈepa mˈara mbˈili.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwoɡˈopa daˈudi, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na daˈudi, lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈatʃa jˈeje.|0
kwa hˈijo saˈuli ˌakamwondˈoa daˈudi mbˈele jˌake na kˈumpa kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu ˈelfu mˈoɟa, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakatˈoka na kˌuiŋɡˈia ˌakioŋɡˈoza vikˈosi katˌika vˈita.|0
katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃofˈaɲa, daˈudi ˌalipˈata mˌafanikˈio makˈubwa, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
saˈuli ˌalipoˈona ɟˈinsi ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakifˌanikˈiwa, ˌakamwoɡˈopa.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, hˈuju hˈapa bˈinti jˈaŋɡu mkˈubwa merˈabu. nˌitakˈupa umwˈoe, endˈapo tu ˌutanˌitumikˈia kwa ˌuʃuɟˈaa na kˌupiɡˈana vˈita vja bwˈana. kwa maˈana saˈuli ˌalisˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, sˌitainˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈake. ˈatʃa mkˈono wa wˌafilˈisti ˈuwe ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
lakˈini daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, mˌimi ni nˈani, nˈajo ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu ni nˈini ˌau ukˈoo wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli, kwˌamba mˌimi nˈiwe mkwˈewe mfˈalme.|0
bˌasi ˌulipofˈika wakˈati wa daˈudi kupˈewa merˈabu, bˈinti saˈuli, hˈujo bˈinti ˌaliˈozwa kwa ˌadriˈeli, mmˌeholˈaθi.|0
bˌasi mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli ˌalimpˈenda daˈudi, nˌao wˌalipˌomwambˈia saˈuli ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili, lˌikampendˈeza.|0
saˈuli ˌakawˈaza, nitˈampa daˈudi bˈinti jˈaŋɡu, ˌili apˈate kˌuwa mtˈeɡo kwˈake, ˌili kwˌamba mkˈono wa wˌafilˈisti upˈate kˌuwa ɟˈuu jˈake. hˈivjo saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, sˈasa unˈajo nafˈasi ja pˈili ja kˌuwa ˈm̩kwe wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, ˌakisˈema, zˌuŋɡumzˈeni na daˈudi kwa sˈiri na kˌumwambˈia, tazˈama, mfˈalme ˌamependˈezwa nˈawe, nˌao wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote wˌanakupˈenda. bˌasi na ˈuwe mkwˈewe mfˈalme..|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa saˈuli wˌakarudˈia hˈajo manˈeno kwa daˈudi. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, mnˌafikˈiri ni ɟˈambo dˈoɡo kˌuwa mkwˈewe mfˈalme? mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu maskˈini tˈu, na nˌisijˌeɟulikˈana sˈana.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa saˈuli wˌalipˌomwelˈeza jˈale daˈudi ˌalijˌojasˈema.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, mwˌambiˈeni daˈudi, mfˈalme hatˈaki zawˈadi ɲiŋɡˈine kˌuwa mahˈari ˌisipokˈuwa maɡˈovi mˌiamˈoɟa ja wˌafilˈisti, ˌili kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈake.  mawˈazo ja saˈuli jˌalikˈuwa daˈudi ˌakaaŋɡˈuke mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˌalipˌomwambˈia daˈudi mˈambo hˈaja, ˌikampendˈeza kˌuwa mkwˈewe mfˈalme. bˌasi kˈabla sˈiku ˌilijopˈaŋɡwa hˌaiɟafˈika.|0
daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalitˈoka na kˌuwaˈua wˌafilˈisti mˈia mbˈili. ˌakajalˈeta maɡˈovi jˈao na kˌupelˈeka hesˈabu kˌamilˈifu kwa mfˈalme, ˌili kwˌamba apˈate kˌuwa mkwˈewe mfˈalme. ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakamwˈoza daˈudi mikˈali bˈinti jˈake.|0
saˈuli ˌalipˌotambˈua kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na daˈudi na kwˌamba mikˈali bˈinti jˌake ˌanampˈenda daˈudi.|0
saˈuli ˌakazˈidi kˌumwoɡˈopa daˈudi, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakabˈaki kˌuwa adˈui jˌake sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti wˌaliˌendelˈea kˌupiɡˈana vˈita na kadˈiri wˌalivjˌoendelˈea kˌupiɡˈana, daˈudi ˌakazˈidi kutˈenda kwa hekˈima kulˈiko mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wa saˈuli, nˈalo ɟˈina lˈake lˌikaɟˌulikˈana sˈana.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote wˌamuˈue daˈudi. lakˈini jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌalimpˈenda sˈana daˈudi.|0
nˌitatˈoka na kukˈaa na bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ʃambˈani mahˈali ulˈiko. nˌitazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje ɟˈuu jˈako, nˌami nˌitakˌuelˈeza nˌitakˌatʃoɡundˈua.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakanˈena mˈema ɟˌuːja daˈudi kwa saˈuli bˈaba jˌake na kˌumwambˈia, mfˈalme ˌasitˈende mabˈaja kwa mtumˈiʃi wˌake daˈudi; hˌaɟakˌukosˈea, ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa jˌamekˈuwa ja faˈida sˈana kwˈako.|0
ˌalihˌatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˌake ˌalipˌomuˈua jˈule mfilˈisti. bwˈana ˌakaɟˌipatˈia uʃˈindi mkˈubwa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote, nˌawe ˌuliuˈona na ˌukafurˈahi. kwa nˈini bˌasi utˈende mabˈaja kwa ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia kˌama daˈudi kwa kˌumuˈua bˌila sabˈabu.|0
saˈuli ˌakamsˌikilˈiza jˌonaθˈani na kuˈapa hˈivi: hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, daˈudi hˌatauˈawa.|0
bˌasi jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwˈita daˈudi na kˌumwelˈeza mˌazuŋɡˈumzo jˈote. ˌakamlˈeta kwa saˈuli, nˌaje daˈudi akˈawa pamˈoɟa na saˈuli kˌama kwˈanza.|0
vˈita vˌilitokˈea tˈena, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakatˈoka na kˌupiɡˈana na wˌafilˈisti. ˌakawapˈiɡa kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi hˌata wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele jˈake.|0
lakˈini rˈoho m̩bˈaja ˌilijˌoatʃˈiwa nafˈasi na bwˈana ikˈaɟa ɟˌuːja saˈuli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti katˌika ɲˈumba jˌake akˈiwa na mkˈuki mkonˈoni mwˈake. daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanampiɡˈia kinˈubi.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟarˈibu kˌumtʃomˈea daˈudi ˌukutˈani kwa hˈuo mkˈuki wˈake, lakˈini daˈudi ˌakauhˈepa hˈuo mkˈuki wa saˈuli ˌukakˈita ˌukutˈani. usˈiku ˈule ˈule daˈudi ˌakakimbˈia na kˌuokˈoka.|0
saˈuli ˌakatˈuma wˈatu ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa daˈudi wˌailˈinde hˈijo ɲˈumba na kˌumuˈua ˌasubˈuhi. lakˈini mikˈali, mkˈewe daˈudi, ˌakamwˈoɲa ˌakisˈema, kˌama hˌukukimbˈia kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈako usˈiku hˈuu, kˈeʃo jˌake ˌutauˈawa.|0
bˌasi mikˈali ˌakamterˈemʃa daˈudi kˌupitˈia dˌiriʃˈani, nˌaje ˌakakimbˈia na kˌuokˈoka.|0
kˈiʃa mikˈali ˌakatʃukˈua kiɲˈaɡo, ˌakakilˈaza kˌitandˈani, ˌakakˌifunˈika kwa vˈazi na kˌukiwekˈea sˈiŋɡa za mbˈuzi kitʃwˈani.|0
saˈuli ˌalipotˈuma wˈatu kˌumkamˈata daˈudi, mikˈali ˌakasˈema, jˌeje ni mɡˈoɲɟua.|0
kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakatˈuma wˈatu tˈena kumwˈona daˈudi nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, mletˈeni kwˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja kitˈanda tʃˈake ˌili nipˈate kˌumuˈua.|0
lakˈini wˈale wˈatu wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia, kˈumbe ni kiɲˈaɡo tu kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌitandˈani na kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa kˌulikuwˈepo na sˈiŋɡa za mbˈuzi.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mikˈali, kwa nˈini ˌumenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa mˌimi hˈivi na kumwˈatʃa adˈui jˈaŋɡu aˈende zˌake ˌili apˈate kˌuokˈoka? mikˈali ˌakamwambˈia, jˌeje ˌalinˌiambˈia, niˈatʃe niˈende zˈaŋɡu. kwa nˈini nˌikuˈue?.|0
daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekimbˈia na kˌuokˈoka, ˌalimwendˈea samwˈeli hˌuko rˈama na kˌumwambˈia jˈale jˈote saˈuli ˌalimfaɲˈia. ndˈipo daˈudi na samwˈeli wˌakaˈenda najˈoθi kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
habˈari zˌikamfikˈia saˈuli kusˈema: daˈudi jˈuko najˈoθi hˌuko rˈama.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakatˈuma wˈatu kˌumkamˈata daˈudi, lakˈini wˌalipoˈona kˈundi la mˌanabˈii wˌakitˈoa ˌunabˈii, wakˈiwa pamˈoɟa na samwˈeli akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama hˈapo kˌama kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao, rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa saˈuli, nˌao pˈia wˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii.|0
saˈuli ˌakaelˈezwa ɟˌuːja hˈilo, nˌaje ˌakapelˈeka wˈatu weŋɡˈine zaˈidi, nˌao wˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii pˈia. saˈuli ˌakatˈuma wˈatu mˈara ja tˈatu, nˌao pˈia wˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii.|0
