mwiʃˈowe, jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda rˈama na kwˈenda hˌadi kwˈeɲe kˈile kisˈima kikˈubwa kˌilitʃˈoko hˌuko sˈeku. nˌaje ˌakaulˈiza, wˈako wˈapi samwˈeli na daˈudi? wˌakasˈema, wˈako najˈoθi hˌuko rˈama.|0
hˈivjo saˈuli ˌakaˈenda najˈoθi hˌuko rˈama. lakˈini rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˌake hˌata jˈeje, akˈawa ˌanatembˈea hˈuku ˌanatˈoa ˌunabˈii hˌadi ˌakafˈika najˈoθi.|0
ˌakavˈua maɟˈoho jˌake na pˈia ˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii mbˈele ja samwˈeli. ˌakalˈala hˈali hˈijo ˈule mtʃˈana kˈutwa na usˈiku kˈutʃa. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˈatu husˈema, ɟˈe, saˈuli pˈia jˈumo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌanabˈii.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakakimbˈia kutˈoka najˈoθi hˌuko rˈama ˌakamwendˈea jˌonaθˈani na kˌumuulˈiza, kwˈani nˌimefˈaɲa nˈini? kˈosa lˈaŋɡu ni nˈini? nˌimemkosˈea bˈaba jˈako kwa ɟˈinsi ɡˈani, hˌata kwˌamba ˌanaɟarˈibu kˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa! hˌutakˈufa! tazˈama, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu hafˈaɲi kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, kikˈubwa ˌau kidˈoɡo, bˌila kˌuniambˈia mˈimi. kwa nˈini ˌanifˈitʃe hˈili? sˈivjo ilˈivjo.|0
lakˈini daˈudi ˌakaˈapa na kusˈema, bˈaba jˈako ˌanaɟˈua kabˈisa kwˌamba nˌimepˈata kibˈali mbˈele jˈako, nˌaje ˌamesˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, jˌonaθˈani ʃˈarti ˌasiliɟˈue hˈili, la sˈivjo ˌatahˌuzunˈika. lakˈini kwˈeli kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo, kˈuna hatˈua mˈoɟa tu kˈati jˈaŋɡu na maˈuti.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃotˈaka nifˈaɲe, nˌitakˌufaɲˈia.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, ˌaŋɡalˈia, kˈeʃo ni sˌikukˈuu ja mwˈezi mwandˈamo, nˌami ˌinanipˈasa kˈula tʃakˈula pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme; lakˈini niˈatʃe niˈende kˌuɟifˈitʃa ʃambˈani mpˈaka kˈeʃo kˈutwa.|0
kˌama bˈaba jˈako ˌakiˈona ja kˌuwa sˈipo, mwambˈie, daˈudi ˌaliniˈomba sˈana ruhˈusa kuwˈahi bˌeθlehˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wa ɲumbˈani, kwa sabˈabu ðabˈihu ja mwˈaka ˌinafˈaɲua hˌuko kwa aɟˈili ja ukˈoo wˌake wˈote..|0
kˌama ˌakisˈema, ni vjˈema sˈana, bˌasi mtumˈiʃi wˈako ju salˈama. lakˈini kˌama ˌakikˌasirˈika, ˌunawˈeza kˌuwa na hakˈika kwˌamba ˌanakˌusudˈia kˌuniðˈuru.|0
lakˈini kwa habˈari jˈako wˈewe, mtˈende wˈema mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kwa sabˈabu mmˌeiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe aɡˈano pamˈoɟa nˌaje mbˈele za bwˈana. kˌama nˈina hatˈia, bˌasi niˈue wˌewe mweɲˈewe! kwa nˈini ˌunikabˈiði kwa bˈaba jˈako.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakasˈema, la hˈaʃa! kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na kˌidokˈezo kidˈoɡo kwˌamba bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌamekˌusudˈia kˌukuðˈuru wˈewe, ɟˈe, nˌisiŋɡˌekuambˈia.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, nˈani ˌatakˌajenˌiambˈia kˌama bˈaba jˈako ˌatakuɟˈibu kwa ukˈali.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo, twˈende ʃambˈani. bˌasi wˌakaˈenda hˌuko pamˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, nˌinakˌuahˈidi kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, hakˈika nˌitamtʃuŋɡˈuza bˈaba jˈaŋɡu wakˈati kˌama hˈuu kˈeʃo kˈutwa! kˌama ˌamewˈeka ˌutaratˈibu wa kufˈaa kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe, ɟˈe, sˌitakˌutumˈia uɟˈumbe na kˌukufˌahamˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌamenuˈia kˌukuðˈuru, bwˈana na ˌaniʃˌuɣulikˈie kwa ukˈali, iwˈapo sˌitakˌufahamˈiʃa na kˌukuˈaɡa uˈende salˈama. bwˈana na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˌawe kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˌitendˈee wˈema ˌusiokˈoma kˌama ˈule wa bwˈana sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, ˌili nisˈiɟe nˌikauˈawa.|0
wˈala ˌusiˌuondˈoe wˈema wˈako kwa ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu, hˌata kˌama ni wakˈati ˈule bwˈana ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamekˌatilˈia mbˈali kˈila adˈui wa daˈudi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
bˌasi jˌonaθˈani ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano na ɲˈumba ja daˈudi, ˌakisˈema: bwˈana na ˌawaˌaŋɡamˈize adˈui za daˈudi.|0
nˌaje jˌonaθˈani ˌakamtˈaka daˈudi ˌaθibitˈiʃe tˈena kiˈapo tʃˈake tʃa kumpˈenda, kwa sabˈabu jˌonaθˈani ˌalimpˈenda daˈudi kˌama nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, kˈeʃo ni sˌikukˈuu ja mwˈezi mwandˈamo. ˌitaɟˌulikˈana kwˌamba haˈupo kwa kˌuwa kˈiti tʃˈako kˌitakˈuwa hakˈina ˈm̩tu.|0
kˈeʃo kˈutwa, ˌinapˌokaribˈia ɟiˈoni, nˈenda mahˈali pˈale ˌulipˌoɟifˈitʃa wakˈati tatˈizo hˈili lˌilipoˈanza na ˌusubˈiri karˈibu na ɟˈiwe la ezˈeli.|0
nˌitapˈiɡa miʃˈale mitˈatu kˈando jˈake, kˌama kwˌamba nˌilikwˈenda kulˈeŋɡa ʃabˈaha.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitamtˈuma mvulˈana na kˌumwambˈia, nˈenda ˌukaˌitafˈute miʃˈale. kˌama nˌikimwambˈia, tazˈama miʃˈale ˈiko upˈande hˈuu wˈako! ˌuilˈete hˈapa, bˌasi ˈuɟe, kwa sabˈabu hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, wˌewe ni salˈama, hakˈuna hatˈari.|0
lakˈini kˌama nˌikimwambˈia hˈujo mvulˈana, ˌaŋɡalˈia, miʃˈale ˈiko mbˈele jˈako, bˌasi ˌinakupˈasa ˌuondˈoke, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamekˌuruhˈusu uˈende zˈako.|0
kuhˈusu jˈale tˌulijˌozuŋɡˈumza wˌewe na mˈimi: kumbˈuka, bwˈana n̩dˈije ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈako wˌewe na mˌimi milˈele.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakaɟifˈitʃa ʃambˈani, na sˌikukˈuu ja mwˈezi mwandˈamo ˌilipˌowadˈia, mfˈalme ˌakakˈeti ˌili ˈale.|0
ˌakakˈeti mahˈali pˈake pa kˌawaˈida karˈibu na ukˈuta, kˌuelˌekeˈana na jˌonaθˈani, nˌaje abnˈeri ˌakakˈeti karˈibu na mfˈalme saˈuli, lakˈini kˈiti tʃa daˈudi kˌilikˈuwa wˈazi.|0
saˈuli hˌakusˈema tʃotʃˈote sˈiku ˈile kwa kˌuwa ˌalifikˈiri, kˈuna kˈitu tʃa lazˈima kˌimetokˈea kwa daˈudi ambˈatʃo kˌimemfˈaɲa naɟˈisi ˌasihˌuðurˈie kˌaramˈuni, hakˈika jˌeje ju naɟˈisi.|0
lakˈini sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata, sˈiku ja pˈili ja mwˈezi, kˈiti tʃa daˈudi kˌilikˈuwa wˈazi tˈena. kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani, kwa nˈini mwˈana wa jˈese haɟˈaɟa tʃˌakulˈani ɟˈana wˈala lˈeo.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamɟˈibu, daˈudi ˌalinisˈihi sˈana nˈimpe ruhˈusa aˈende bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
ˌalisˈema, nˌiruhˈusu niˈende, kwa sabˈabu ɟamˈaa jˈetu wˈana ðabˈihu mɟˈini, na ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu ˌamenˌiaɡˈiza niwˈepo hˌuko. kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali mbˈele jˈako, nˌiruhˈusu niˈende kuˈona ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu. hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu hakˈuɟa mezˈani pa mfˈalme.|0
hasˈira ja saˈuli ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja jˌonaθˈani na kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe mwˈana wa mwanˈamke mkaˈidi na mwˈasi! ɟˈe, siɟˈui kˌuwa ˌumekˈuwa upˈande wa mwˈana wa jˈese kwa aˈibu jˈako mweɲˈewe na kwa aˈibu ja mˈama jˈako ˌalijˌekuzˈaa.|0
mˌaadˈamu mwˈana wa jˈese aŋɡˈali ˌanaˈiʃi katˌika dunˈia hˌii wˌewe wˈala ufˈalme wˈako hˌautˌasimˈama. sˈasa tˈuma aˈitwe umlˈete kwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ni lazˈima ˈafe.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamˌuulˈiza bˈaba jˈake, kwa nˈini ˌauˈawe? kwˈani ˌamefˈaɲa nˈini.|0
lakˈini saˈuli ˌakamtupˈia jˌonaθˈani mkˈuki wˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu ˌili ˌamuˈue. hˈapo ndˈipo jˌonaθˈani ˌalipˌotambˈua kwˌamba bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˌusudˈia kˌumuˈua daˈudi.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakainˈuka kutˈoka mezˈani kwa hasˈira kˈali. sˈiku ˈile ja pˈili ja mwˈezi hakˈula tʃakˈula, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamehˌuzunˈiʃwa na vitˈendo vja aˈibu ambˈavjo bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌanamtendˈea daˈudi.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi jˌonaθˈani ˌalikwˈenda ʃambˈani kˌukutˈana na daˈudi. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˌuatˈana na mvulˈana mdˈoɡo.|0
nˌaje jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mvulˈana, kimbˈia ˌukatafˈute miʃˈale nˌitakˌajorˈuʃa. mvulˈana ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakikimbˈia, ˌakarˈuʃa miʃˈale mbˈele jˈake.|0
jˈule mvulˈana ˌalipofˈika mahˈali pˈale ambˈapo mʃˈale wa jˌonaθˈani ˌulipokˈuwa ˌumeaŋɡˈuka, jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwˈita, ɟˈe, mʃˈale haˈuko mbˈele jˈako.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakampiɡˈia kelˈele, hˌarakˈiʃa, nˈenda harˈaka! ˌusisimˈame! mvulˈana ˌakaokˈota mʃˈale na kurˈudi kwa bwˈana wˈake.|0
mvulˈana hˌakuɟˈua tʃotʃˈote ɟˌuːja hˈajo jˈote; jˌonaθˈani na daˈudi tu n̩dˈio wˌalioɟˈua..|0
bˌasi jˌonaθˈani akˈampa jˈule mvulˈana silˈaha zˌake na kˌumwambˈia, nˈenda, zˌirudˈiʃe mɟˈini.|0
baˌada ja mvulˈana kwˈenda, daˈudi ˌakainˈuka kutˈoka upˈande wa kusˈini wa lˈile ɟˈiwe, nˌaje ˌakasuɟˈudu ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi mˈara tˈatu mbˈele ja jˌonaθˈani. kˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakambˈusu mwenzˈake, wˌakalˈia pamˈoɟa. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakalˈia zaˈidi.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, nˈenda kwa amˈani, kwa kˌuwa tˌumeˌapiˈana kiˈapo tʃa ˌurafˈiki kˈati jˈetu kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, tˌukisˈema, bwˈana n̩dˈije ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈako na mˈimi, na kˈati ja wazˈao wˈako na wazˈao wˈaŋɡu milˈele.  kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka, nˌaje jˌonaθˈani ˌakarˈudi mɟˈini.|0
daˈudi ˌakaˈenda nˈobu, kwa ˌahimelˈeki kuhˈani. ˌahimelˈeki ˌakatˌetemˈeka ˌalipˌokutˈana nˈaje, ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˈuko pˈeke jˈako? kwa nˈini hˌukufˌuatˈana na ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
daˈudi ˌakamɟˈibu ˌahimelˈeki kuhˈani, ˌakisˈema, mfˈalme ˌamenˌiaɡˈiza ʃuɣˈuli fulˈani na kˌuniambˈia, ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasiɟˈue tʃotʃˈote kuhˈusu kˈazi jˈako wˈala mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako! kuhˈusu wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌimewˌaambˈia tˌukutˈane mahˈali fulˈani.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, ˈuna nˈini mkonˈoni? nˌipatˈie mikˈate mitˈano ˌau tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃowˈeza kupˈata.|0
lakˈini kuhˈani ˌakamɟˈibu daˈudi, sˈina mkˈate wowˈote wa kˌawaˈida kwa sˈasa. hˌata hˈivjo, ˈipo hˈapa mikˈate ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu, iwˈapo wˈatu wˌameɟitˈeŋɡa na wˌanawˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika tˌumeɟitˈeŋɡa na wˌanawˈake kwa sˈiku hˈizi tʃˈatʃe kˌama kˌawaˈida ja nˌinapotˈoka kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ʃuɣˈuli. nˈavjo vjˈombo vja wˈale viɟˈana hˈuwa ni vˌitakatˈifu hˌata kwˈeɲe safˈari ja kˌawaˈida, si zaˈidi sˈana lˈeo vjˈombo vjˈao vˌitakˈuwa ni vˌitakatˈifu.|0
hˈivjo kuhˈani akˈampa ˈile mikˈate ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu, kwa kˌuwa hˌapakuwˈepo mikˈate miŋɡˈine ˌisipokˈuwa hˈijo ja woɲˈeʃo ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeˌondolˈewa hˈapo mbˈele za bwˈana na kˌubadilˈiʃwa na miŋɡˈine jˌeɲe mˈoto sˈiku ˈile ˌilipˌoondolˈewa.|0
bˌasi sˈiku hˈijo pˌalikuwˈepo na mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa saˈuli, ˌalijˌezuilˈiwa mbˈele za bwˈana; ˌalikˈuwa doˈeɡi mwedˈomu, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa watʃˈuŋɡa waɲˈama wa saˈuli.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza ˌahimelˈeki, ɟˈe, unˈao mkˈuki ˌau upˈaŋɡa hˈapa? sˌikulˈeta upˈaŋɡa wˈala silˈaha ɲiŋɡˈine jojˈote, kwa sabˈabu ʃuɣˈuli ja mfˈalme ˌilikˈuwa ja harˈaka.|0
kuhˈani ˌakaɟˈibu, upˈaŋɡa wa ɡˌoliˈaθi mfilˈisti, ambˈaje ˌulimuˈua katˌika bˈonde la ˈela, ˈupo hˈapa, ˌumefuŋɡˈiwa katˌika kˌitambˈaa ɲˈuma ja kˌisibˈau. kˌama ˌunaˌuhitˈaɟi, ˌutʃukˈue, hakˈuna upˈaŋɡa mwiŋɡˈine hˈapa ˈila hˈuo tˈu. daˈudi ˌakasˈema, hakˈuna upˈaŋɡa mwiŋɡˈine kˌama hˈuo. nˌipatˈie hˈuo.|0
sˈiku ˈile daˈudi ˌakamkimbˈia saˈuli na kwˈenda kwa akˈiʃi mfˈalme wa ɡˈaθi.|0
lakˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wa akˈiʃi wˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, hˈuju si n̩dˈije daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˈn̩tʃi? ɟˈe, hˈuju si n̩dˈije jˈule ambˈaje wˌanaˈimba katˌika ŋɡˈoma zˈao wˌakisˈema:  saˈuli ˌamewaˈua ˈelfu zˈake, nˌaje daˈudi makˈumi ˈelfu jˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakajawˈeka manˈeno hˈaja mojˈoni nˌaje ˌakamwoɡˈopa sˈana akˈiʃi mfˈalme wa ɡˈaθi.|0
bˌasi ˌakaɟifˈaɲa mwˌendawazˈimu mbˈele jˈao; nˌaje ˌalipokˈuwa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, ˌalitˈenda kˌama kitʃˈaa, ˌakikwarˈuza kwa kutˈia alˈama ɟˌuːja milˈaŋɡo ja lˈaŋɡo na kˌuatʃˈia ˌudelˈele kˌutirirˈika kwˈeɲe ndˈevu zˈake.|0
akˈiʃi ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, tˌazamˈeni ˈm̩tu hˈuju! ˈana wazˈimu! kwa nˈini mnamlˈeta kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, mˌimi nˌimepˌuŋɡukˈiwa na wˈenda wazˈimu kiˈasi kwˌamba mmˌeniletˈea ˈm̩tu hˈujo hˈapa ˌaendelˈee kufˈaɲa hˈivi mbˈele jˈaŋɡu? ɟˈe, ˌilikˈuwa ni lazˈima ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˈaɟe ɲumbˈani kwˈaŋɡu.|0
daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka ɡˈaθi na kˌukimbilˈia kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo la ˌadulˈamu. ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈatu wa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˌake wˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari hˈijo, wˌakamwendˈea hˌuko.|0
wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika ðˈiki ˌau wˌaliokˈuwa na madˈeni ˌau wˈale ambˈao hˌawakˌuriðˈika wˌakamkˌusaɲikˈia daˈudi, nˌaje akˈawa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao. wˈatu wˌapatˈao mˌiaˈn̩ne wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
kutˈoka hˌuko daˈudi ˌakaˈenda mˈispa hˌuko moˈabu na kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme wa moˈabu, naˈomba ˌuwaruhˈusu bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mˈama jˈaŋɡu wˈaɟe kukˈaa nˌawe mpˈaka niɟˈue nˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˌatʃonˌifaɲˈia.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawaˈatʃa wazˈazi wˌake wakˈae na mfˈalme wa moˈabu, nˌao wˌakakˈaa nˌaje mˈuda wˈote ambˈao daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ŋɡomˈeni.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii ɡˈadi ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, ˌusikˈae ŋɡomˈeni. nˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda. hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka na kwˈenda katˌika msˈitu wa herˈeθi.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakasikˈia kwˌamba daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌameˌonekˈana. saˈuli akˈiwa na mkˈuki mkonˈoni, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mkwˈaɟu kwˈeɲe kilˈima hˌuko ɡibˈea, mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama kˌumzuŋɡˈuka.|0
saˈuli ˌakawˌaambˈia, sˌikilizˈeni ˈeɲi wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini! ɟˈe, mwˈana wa jˈese ˌatawˈapa nˈiɲi ɲˈote maʃˈamba na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu? ɟˈe, ˌatawafˈaɲa nˈiɲi ɲˈote mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia.|0
ɟˈe, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˈiɲi mkapˈaŋɡa hˈila m̩bˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu? hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ambˈaje ˌamenˌiambˈia ni lˈini mwanˈaŋɡu ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano na mwˈana wa jˈese. hapˈana hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanajˌeɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃa nˌami wˈala ˌanajˌeniambˈia kwˌamba mwanˈaŋɡu ˌametʃotʃˈea mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu kˌunivizˈia, kˌama ˌafaɲˈavjo lˈeo.|0
lakˈini doˈeɡi mwedˈomu, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌakisimˈama na mˌaafˈisa wa saˈuli, ˌakasˈema, nˌilimwˈona mwˈana wa jˈese akˈiɟa kwa ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu hˌuko nˈobu.|0
ˌahimelˈeki ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈake; pˈia akˈampa vjakˈula na ˈule upˈaŋɡa wa ɡˌoliˈaθi mfilˈisti.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˈuma wˈatu wamwˈite kuhˈani ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu, na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja bˈaba jˈake, wˌaliokˈuwa mˌakuhˈani hˌuko nˈobu, nˌao wˈote wakˈaɟa kwa mfˈalme.|0
saˈuli ˌakasˈema, sˌikilˈiza sˈasa, mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu. ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈaam, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia, kwa nˈini ˌumepˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, wˌewe na mwˈana wa jˈese, ukˈampa vjakˈula na upˈaŋɡa, tˈena hˌukumˌuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈake, na kwa sabˈabu hˈijo ˌameˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na kˌunivizˈia, kˌama ˌafaɲˈavjo lˈeo.|0
ˌahimelˈeki ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˈote alˈije mwˌaminˈifu kˌama daˈudi, mkwˈewe mfˈalme, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wˈako na ˌanajˌeheʃimˈika sˈana katˌika wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈako.|0
ɟˈe, sˈiku hˈijo ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ja kwˈanza kumwˈomba mˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈake? la hˈaʃa! mfˈalme na ˌusiwˌaʃutˈumu wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˈala jejˈote wa ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈake, kwa kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako hˌafahˈamu lolˈote kabˈisa kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili lˈote.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, ˌahimelˈeki, hakˈika ˌutakˈufa, wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈote ja bˈaba jˈako.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakawˌaamˈuru walˈinzi wˌake wˌaliokˈuwa kˈando jˈake: ɡˌeukˈeni na kˌuwaˈua mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu nˌao pˈia wˌameɟiˈuŋɡa na daˈudi. wˌaliɟˈua kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌanakimbˈia, wˈala hˌawakˌuniambˈia. lakˈini mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme hˌawakˈuwa rˈaði kˌuinˈua mkˈono kˌuwaˈua mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakamwaɡˈiza doˈeɡi, wˌewe ɡeˈuka ˌukawaˈue mˌakuhˈani. hˈivjo bˌasi doˈeɡi mwedˈomu, ˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuwaˈua. sˈiku ˈile ˌaliwaˈua wˈatu θˌemanˈini na watˈano wˌavaˈao vˌisibˈau vja kitˈani.|0
pˈia ˌakaupˈiɡa nˈobu kwa upˈaŋɡa, ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakuhˈani, wˌakiwˈemo wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake, watˈoto wadˈoɡo na wˈale wˌaɲoɲˈao, ŋɡˈombe wˈake, pˈunda na kondˈoo.|0
lakˈini ˌabiaθˈari, mwˈana wa ˌahimelˈeki, mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu, ˌakatorˈoka, ˌakakimbˈia na kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na daˈudi.|0
ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi kˌuwa saˈuli ˌamewaˈua mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiaθˈari: sˈiku ˈile, wakˈati doˈeɡi mwedˈomu ˌalipokˈuwa pˈale, nˌiliɟˈua ˌatahˌakikˈiʃa ˌamemwambˈia saˈuli. mˌimi nˌinawˌaɟibˈika kwa vˈifo vja ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈako jˈote.|0
kˈaa pamˈoɟa nˈami; ˌusioɡˈope. ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeutafˈuta uhˈai wˈako ˌanaˌutafˈuta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu pˈia. ukˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˌami ˌutakˈuwa salˈama.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa, tazˈama, wˌafilˈisti wˌanapiɡˈana ðˈidi ja keˈila nˌao wˌanapokˈoɲa nafˈaka katˌika sakˈafu za kˌupurˈia.|0
ˌakaulˈiza kwa bwˈana, ˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, niˈende na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia hˈawa wˌafilˈisti? bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈenda, wˌaʃambulˈie wˌafilˈisti na ˌuuokˈoe keˈila.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌakamwambˈia, hˈapa jˈuda kweɲˈewe tˌunaoɡˈopa. si zaˈidi sˈana, kˌama tˌukiˈenda keˈila ðˈidi ja maɟˈeʃi ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
daˈudi ˌakaulˈiza kwa bwˈana tˈena, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu ˌakamwambˈia, ʃˈuka uˈende keˈila, kwa kˌuwa nˌitawatˈia wˌafilˈisti mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
bˌasi daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˈenda keˈila, wˌakapiɡˈana na wˌafilˈisti na kutwˈaa waɲˈama wˌao wa kutˈoʃa. daˈudi ˌakawatˈia hasˈara kˈubwa wˌafilˈisti na kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wa keˈila.|0
bˌasi ˌabiaθˈari mwˈana wa ˌahimelˈeki ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈeta kˌisibˈau ˌalipˌokimbilˈia kwa daˈudi hˌuko keˈila..|0
saˈuli ˌakaambˈiwa kwˌamba daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda keˈila, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamemtˈia mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa daˈudi ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa mweɲˈewe kwa kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe malˈaŋɡo na mˌakomˈeo.|0
nˌaje saˈuli ˌakajaˈita maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˈote jaˈende vitˈani, kˌuiʃukˈia keˈila ˌili kˌumziŋɡˈira daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake kwa ɟˈeʃi.|0
daˈudi ˌalipoɟˈua kˌuwa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˈana hˈila ðˈidi jˈake, ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiaθˈari kuhˈani, lˈeta kˈile kˌisibˈau.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamesikˈia kwa hakˈika kwˌamba saˈuli ˌanapˈaŋɡa kˈuɟa keˈila na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, wˈatu wa keˈila wˌatanˌisalimˈiʃa kwˈake? ɟˈe, saˈuli ˌataterˈemka, kˌama mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalivjˌosikˈia? ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, mwambˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako. nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, ˌataʃˈuka.|0
daˈudi ˌakaulˈiza tˈena, ɟˈe wˈatu wa keˈila wˌatanˌisalimˈiʃa mˌimi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kwa saˈuli? nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, wˌatafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
bˌasi daˈudi na wˈatu wˈake, wˌapatˈao mˌiasˈita, wˌakaondˈoka keˈila wakˈawa wˌanakwˈenda sehˈemu mˈoɟa hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine. saˈuli ˌalipˌoambˈiwa daˈudi ˌametorˈoka kutˈoka keˈila, hakwˈenda hˌuko.|0
daˈudi ˌakakˈaa katˌika ŋɡˈome za ɟaŋɡwˈani na katˌika vilˈima vja ɟˈaŋɡwa la zˈifu. sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku saˈuli ˌaliˌendelˈea kumsˈaka, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌakumtˈia daˈudi mˌikonˈoni mwˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko horˈeʃi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la zˈifu, ˌakaɟˈua kˌuwa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈuɟa ˌili ˌamuˈue.|0
nˌaje jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌakamwendˈea daˈudi hˌuko horˈeʃi na kumtˈia mˈojo kˌusimˈama imˈara katˌika imˈani jˌake kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusioɡˈope, daˈudi; bˈaba jˈaŋɡu saˈuli hˌatakutˈia mkonˈoni mwˈake. ˌutakˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa wa pˈili wˈako. hˌata bˈaba jˈaŋɡu saˈuli ˌanaɟˈua hˈili.|0
wˈote wawˈili wˌakawˈeka aɡˈano mbˈele za bwˈana. kˈiʃa jˌonaθˈani ˌakaˈenda zˌake ɲumbˈani, lakˈini daˈudi ˌakabˈaki horˈeʃi.|0
bˌasi wazˈifu wˌakakwˈea kwa saˈuli hˌuko ɡibˈea na kusˈema, ɟˈe, daˈudi hˌaɟifˈitʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu katˌika ŋɡˈome hˌuko horˈeʃi, katˌika kilˈima tʃa hakˈila, kusˈini ˌm̩wa jˌeʃimˈoni.|0
sˈasa, ˈee mfˈalme, ˌuterˈemke wakˈati wowˈote ˌunapoˈona vjˈema kufˈaɲa hˈivjo, sˌisi tˌutawˌaɟibˈika kˌumkabˈiði kwa mfˈalme.|0
saˈuli ˌakaɟˈibu, bwˈana ˌawabarˈiki kwa kˌunifˌikirˈia.|0
nendˈeni mkafˈaɲe mˌaandalˈizi zaˈidi. mkaɟˈue mahˈali ambˈapo daˈudi huˈenda mˈara kwa mˈara na nˈani ˌamepˈata kumwˈona hˌuko. wˌananˌiambˈia jˌeje ni mwerˈevu sˈana.|0
ɟuˈeni kˈila mahˈali ˌanapˌoɟifˈitʃa mrˈudi na kunˈipa tˌaarˈifa kamˈili. kˈiʃa nˌitakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi; kˌama ˌatakˈuwa katˌika enˈeo hˈilo, nˌitamsˈaka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈoo zˈote za jˈuda.|0
bˌasi wˌakaondˈoka na kwˈenda mpˈaka zˈifu wˌakimtˌaŋɡulˈia saˈuli. nˌaje daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalikˈuwa katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la maˈoni, katˌika arˈaba kusˈini ˌm̩wa jˌeʃimˈoni.|0
saˈuli na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˈanza msˈako, nˌaje daˈudi ˌalipˌoelˈezwa hˈili, ˌakaterˈemka mpˈaka mwambˈani na kukˈaa katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la maˈoni. saˈuli ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, ˌakaˈenda katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la maˈoni ˌakimfuˈata daˈudi.|0
saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈenda upˈande mmˈoɟa wa mlˈima, nˌaje daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalikˈuwa upˈande mwiŋɡˈine wa mlˈima, wˌakihˌarakˈiʃa kˌumkimbˈia saˈuli. wakˈati saˈuli na maɟˈeʃi jˌake wˌalipˌokaribˈia kˌumkamˈata daˈudi na wˈatu wˈake.|0
mɟˈumbe ˌalikˈuɟa kwa saˈuli, ˌakisˈema, ɲɟˈoo harˈaka! wˌafilˈisti wˌanaˌiʃambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakarˈudi ˌakaˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata daˈudi na kwˈenda kˌukabˌiliˈana na wˌafilˈisti. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌanaiˈita sehˈemu hˌii sˈela hˌamalekˈoθi.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌakakwˈea kutˈoka hˌuko na kuˈiʃi katˌika ŋɡˈome za ˈen ɡˈedi.|0
baˌada ja saˈuli kurˈudi kˌuwafˌuatˈia wˌafilˈisti, ˌakaambˈiwa kwˌamba, daˈudi jˈuko katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la ˈen ɡˈedi.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakatʃukˈua wˈatu hodˈari tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli jˈote kwˈenda kumsˈaka daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake karˈibu na mˌaɟabˈali ja mbˈuzi mwˈitu.|0
akˈaɟa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mazˈizi ja kondˈoo kˈando ja ɲɟˈia, hˈapo pˌalikˈuwa na pˈaŋɡo, na saˈuli ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani kˌuɟipumzˈiʃa. daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˈamo ˈm̩le paŋɡˈoni kwa ndˈani zaˈidi.|0
wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌakasˈema, hˌii n̩dˈijo sˈiku ˌalijonˈena bwˈana ˌakikˌuambˈia, nˌitamtˈia adˈui jˈako mˌikonˈoni mwˈako ˌili wˌewe ˌumtendˈee ˌutakˈavjo.  bˌasi daˈudi ˌakaɲˌemelˈea bˌila kˌuonekˈana na kukˈata upˈindo wa ɟˈoho la saˈuli.|0
baˌada ja hˈilo, ðamˈiri ja daˈudi ˌikatˌaabˈika kwa kukˈata upˈindo wa ɟˈoho la saˈuli.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈake, bwˈana na ˌapiʃˈie mbˈali nisˈiɟe nˌikafˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˌilo kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ambˈaje ni mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana, ˌau kˌuinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈake; kwˈani jˌeje ni mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana.|0
kwa manˈeno hˈaja daˈudi ˌakawaˈoɲa wˈatu wˌake na hˌakuwˌaruhˈusu wˌamʃambulˈie saˈuli. nˌaje saˈuli ˌakaondˈoka paŋɡˈoni na kwˈenda zˈake.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi nˌaje ˌakatˈoka paŋɡˈoni na kumwˈita saˈuli ˌakisˈema, mfˈalme, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu! saˈuli ˌalipˌotazˈama ɲˈuma, daˈudi ˌakainˈama na kˌusuɟˈudu ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌakamwambˈia saˈuli, kwa nˈini ˌunasˌikilˈiza wakˈati wˈatu wˌanapˌokuambˈia, daˈudi ˌamenuˈia kˌukuðˈuru.|0
lˈeo ˌumeˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌokutˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu hˌuko paŋɡˈoni. wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˌalisˌisitˈiza nˌikuˈue, lakˈini nˌilikuˈatʃa, nˌikisˈema, sˌitainˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu jˌeje ni mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana..|0
tazˈama, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, ˈona kipˈande hˈiki tʃa ɟˈoho lˈako mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu! nˌilikˈata upˈindo wa ɟˈoho lˈako lakˈini sˌikukuˈua. bˌasi uɟˈue na kˌutambˈua kˌuwa sˈina hatˈia ja kutˈenda mabˈaja wˈala ja kuˈasi. wˌewe sˌiɟakˌukosˈea, lakˈini wˌewe ˌunaniwˈinda mˌimi ˌili kˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana na ˌahukˈumu kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˈewe. nˌaje bwˈana ˌalipˈize mabˈaja ˌunajˌonitendˈea, lakˈini mkˈono wˈaŋɡu hˌautˌakuɡˈusa.|0
kˌama msˈemo wa kˈale ˌusemˈavjo, kutˈoka kwa watˈenda maˈovu hutˈoka matˈendo maˈovu, kwa hˈijo mkˈono wˈaŋɡu hˌautˌakuɡˈusa wˈewe.|0
ɟˈe, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌametˈoka ðˈidi ja nˈani? ni nˈani ˌunajˌemfuatˈia? ɟˈe, ni ˈm̩bwa ˈm̩fu? ni kˌirobˈoto.|0
bwˈana na ˈawe mwamˈuzi wˈetu, jˌeje na ˌaamˈue kˈati jˈetu. jˌeje na ˌanitetˈee ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu; ˌanihˌesabˈie hˈaki kwa kˌuniokˈoa mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈema hˈaja, saˈuli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˈijo ni saˈuti jˈako, daˈudi mwanˈaŋɡu? ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈuu, ˌakisˈema.|0
wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki kulˈiko mˈimi; ˌumenˌitendˈea mˈema, lakˈini mˌimi nˌimekˌutendˈea mabˈaja.|0
sˈasa ˌumenˌiambˈia ɟˌuːja mˈema ˌulijˌonitendˈea. bwˈana ˌalinitˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, lakˈini wˌewe hˌukuniˈua.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu ˌampatˈapo adˈui jˈake, humwˈatʃa aˈende zˌake bˌila kumðˈuru? bwˈana na ˌakulˈipe mˈema kwa ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌonitˈenda lˈeo.|0
nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba hakˈika ˌutakˈuwa mfˈalme na ja kwˌamba ufˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌutakˈuwa imˈara mˌikonˈoni mwˈako.|0
sˈasa nˌiapˈie kwa bwˈana kwˌamba hˌutakˌatilˈia mbˈali uzˈao wˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌulifˈuta ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamwapˈia saˈuli. kˈiʃa saˈuli ˌakarˈudi zˌake ɲumbˈani, lakˈini daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakapˈanda kwˈenda ŋɡomˈeni.|0
bˌasi samwˈeli akˈafa, nˌao ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakakˌusaɲˈika na kˌumwombˌolezˈea; wˌakamzˈika ɲumbˈani kwˈake hˌuko rˈama. kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakaterˈemka kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la maˈoni.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa hˌuko maˈoni, ˌalijekˈuwa na makˈao hˌuko karmˈeli, ˌalikˈuwa taɟˈiri sˈana. ˌalikˈuwa na mbˈuzi ˈelfu mˈoɟa na kondˈoo ˈelfu tˈatu, ˌaliokˈuwa ˌakiwakˈata maɲˈoja hˌuko karmˈeli.|0
ɟˈina la ˈm̩tu hˈujo lˌilikˈuwa nabˈali, nˌaje mkˈewe ˌaliˈitwa ˌabiɡaˈili. ˌalikˈuwa mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe busˈara na mzˈuri wa sˈura, lakˈini mumˈewe, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa wa ukˈoo wa kalˈebu, ˌalikˈuwa mwˌeɲe hasˈira na m̩tʃˈojo katˌika ˌutendˈaɟi wˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, ˌakasikˈia kˌuwa nabˈali ˌalikˈuwa ˌanakˈata kondˈoo maɲˈoja.|0
bˌasi ˌakatˈuma viɟˈana kˈumi na kˌuwaambˈia, pandˈeni kwa nabˈali hˌuko karmˈeli, mkˌamsalimˈie kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
mwˌambiˈeni: amˈani ˈiwe kwˈako! amˈani ˈiwe kwˈako pamˈoɟa na wa ɲumbˈani mwˈako! pˈia amˈani ˈiwe pamˈoɟa na vjˈote ulˈivjo nˈavjo.|0
nˌasikˈia kˌuwa hˈuu ni wakˈati wa kukˈata kondˈoo maɲˈoja. watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo wˈako wˌalipokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈasi, hˌatukˌuwatendˈea mabˈaja na wakˈati wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa hˌuko karmˈeli hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote tʃˈao kˌilipotˈea.|0
wˌaulˈize wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako nˌao wˌatakˌuambˈia. kwa hˈijo ˌuwatendˈee wˈema viɟˈana wˈaŋɡu, kwˈani tˌumekˈuɟa wakˈati wa furˈaha. tˌafaðˈali wˈape wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako na mwanˈao daˈudi tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃokˈuɟa mkonˈoni mwˈako kwa aɟˈili jˈao..|0
wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌalipofˈika wakˈampa nabˈali uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa ɟˈina la daˈudi. kˈiʃa wˌakaŋɡoɟˈea.|0
nabˈali ˌakawaɟˈibu wˌatumˈiʃi wa daˈudi, hˈuju daˈudi ni nˈani? hˈuju mwˈana wa jˈese ni nˈani? wˌatumˈiʃi wˈeŋɡi wˌanakimbˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana zˈao sˈiku hˈizi.|0
kwa nˈini nˌitʃukˈue mkˈate wˈaŋɡu, mˈaɟi jˈaŋɡu na ɲˈama nˌilijotʃˈiɲɟa kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈata maɲˈoja wˈaŋɡu, na kuwˈapa wˈatu ambˈao hakˈuna ˌanajeɟˈua wˌanakotˈoka.|0
wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌakaɡeˈuka na kurˈudi. wˌalipofˈika, wˌakaarˈifu kˈila nˈeno.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈake, ɟˌifuŋɡˈeni pˈaŋɡa zˈenu! bˌasi wˌakaɟifˈuŋɡa pˈaŋɡa zˈao, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakaɟifˈuŋɡa upˈaŋɡa wˈake. wˈatu kˌama mˈia ˈn̩ne hˈivi wˌakapˈanda pamˈoɟa na daˈudi, na wˈatu mˈia mbˈili wˌakabˈaki na vifˈaa.|0
mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiɡaˈili, mkˈewe nabˈali: daˈudi ˌalitˈuma waɟˈumbe kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani kˈumpa bwˈana wˈetu salˈamu zˈake, lakˈini ˌakawˌavurˌumiʃˈia mˌatukˈano.|0
hˌata hˈivjo wˈatu hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈema sˈana kwˈetu. hˌawakˌututendˈea mabˈaja, na wakˈati wˈote tˌulipokˈuwa ɲɟˈe hˌuko mˌaʃambˈani karˈibu nˈao, hˌatukˌupotˈewa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
usˈiku na mtʃˈana wˌalikˈuwa ukˈuta wˌakitˌuzuŋɡˈuka wakˈati wˈote tˌulipokˈuwa tˌukitʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo zˈetu karˈibu nˈao.|0
sˈasa fikˈiri ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili na uˈone ˌunawˈeza kufˈaɲa nˈini, kwa sabˈabu maˈafa jˌanakˌaribˈia ɟˌuːja bwˈana wˈetu na ɲˈumba jˌake jˈote. jˌeje ni ˈm̩tu mwˈovu kiˈasi kwˌamba hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌawezˈaje kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
ˌabiɡaˈili ˌakafˈaɲa harˈaka, ˌakatʃukˈua mikˈate mˈia mbˈili, virˈiba viwˈili vja divˈai, kondˈoo watˈano wˌaliotʃˈiɲɟua vipˈimo vitˈano vja bˈisi, viʃˈada mˈia mˈoɟa vja zabˈibu kˈavu, mikˈate mˈia mbˈili ja tˈini, ˌakavˌipakˈia ɟˌuːja pˈunda.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, tˌaŋɡuliˈeni; mˌimi nˌitakˈuɟa ɲˈuma jˈenu. lakˈini hˌakumwambˈia nabˈali mumˈewe.|0
ikˈawa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamepˈanda pˈunda wˌake kwˈeɲe bˈonde la mlˈima, tazˈama, daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wakˈawa wˌanaterˈemka kˌumwelekˈea, nˌaje ˌakakutˈana nˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, ˌilikˈuwa ni kˈazi bˈure kutʃˈuŋɡa kwˈaŋɡu kˈote mˈali za hˈuju ˈm̩tu hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani hˈivi kwˌamba hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote tʃˈake kˌilitʃˌopotˈea. jˌeje ˌamenilˈipa bˈaja kwa aɟˈili ja wˈema.|0
bwˈana na ˌamʃuɣˌulikˈie daˈudi, tˈena kwa ukˈali, ikˈiwa kˈeʃo ˌasubˈuhi nˌitambˌakizˈia mwˌanaˈume hˌata mmˈoɟa alˈije hˈai mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
ˌabiɡaˈili ˌalipomwˈona daˈudi, ˌakaʃˈuka harˈaka kwˈeɲe pˈunda wˈake, ˌakainˈama kˌifudifˈudi ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi mbˈele ja daˈudi.|0
ˌakamwˌaŋɡukˈia mˌiɡuˈuni pˈake na kusˈema: bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kˈosa hˈili na lˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. tˌafaðˈali mruhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako asˈeme nˈawe. sikˈia kˈile mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatakˌatʃosˈema.|0
bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na ˌasimɟˈali hˈujo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu nabˈali. jˌeje ˌanafanˈana na ɟˈina lˈake; ɟˈina lˈake ni mpumbˈavu, nˌao ˌupumbˈavu huˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaje. lakˈini kwˈaŋɡu mˈimi, mtumˈiʃi wˈako, sˌikuwaˈona hˈao wˈatu wˌaliotˈumwa na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi sˈasa, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamekˌuzuˈia, wˌewe bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kˌutokumwˈaɡa dˈamu na kˌutolipˈiza kisˈasi kwa mikˈono jˈako mweɲˈewe, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo, mˌaadˈui zˈako na wˈote wˌanaˌokusudˈia kumðˈuru bwˈana wˈaŋɡu wˈawe kˌama nabˈali.|0
nˈajo zawˈadi hˌii ambˈajo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamemletˈea bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, wapˈewe wˈatu wˌanaˌofuatˈana nˈawe.|0
tˌafaðˈali samˈehe kˈosa la mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana kwa hakˈika ˌataifˈaɲa imˈara ɲˈumba ja ufˈalme kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌanapiɡˈana vˈita vja bwˈana.|0
hˌata iŋɡˈawa jˈuko ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌekufˌuatˈia kˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wˈako, ˌusiruhˈusu bˈaja lolˈote kˌuonekˈana kwˈako sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈako, uhˈai wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌutafˈuŋɡwa salˈama kwˈeɲe furˈuʃi la walˈio hˈai na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako. lakˈini uhˈai wa adˈui zˈako ˌatavˌurumˈiʃwa kˌama vˈile ɟˈiwe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kombˈeo.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌameʃˌamtendˈea bwˈana wˈaŋɡu kˈila kˈitu tʃˈema ˌalitʃˌoahˈidi kumhˈusu jˌeje na kumwˈeka kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌatakˈuwa na ðamˈiri ˌinajˌolemˈewa na mzˈiɡo kwa kumwˈaɡa dˈamu kusˈiko na sabˈabu, ˌau kˌuɟilˌipizˈia kisˈasi jˌeje mweɲˈewe. bwˈana ˌatakˌapomletˈea bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mˌafanikˈio, ˌumkumbˈuke mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiɡaˈili, ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalijˌekutˈuma kˌunilˈaki lˈeo.|0
ˌubarikˈiwe kwa ˌuamˈuzi wˈako mzˈuri na kwa kˌunizuˈia nˌisimwˈaɡe dˈamu lˈeo na kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi kwa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu.|0
la sˈivjo, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌaiʃˈivjo, ambˈaje ˌamenˌizuˈia nˌisiwaðˈuru, kˌama ˌusiŋɡekˈuɟa harˈaka kˌunilˈaki, hakˈuna hˌata mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa wa nabˈali ˌaŋɡeˈatʃwa hˈai kˌufikˈia mˌapambazˈuko.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakapokˈea kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake kˈile ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamemletˈea, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, nˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈako kwa amˈani; nˌimesikˈia manˈeno jˈako na kˌukuɟalˈia ˈombi lˈako.|0
ˌabiɡaˈili ˌalipokwˈenda kwa nabˈali, ˌalikˈuwa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˌake ˌakifˈaɲa karˈamu kˌama ˈile ja mfˈalme. nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˈana furˈaha ɲˈiŋɡi, akˈiwa ˌamelˈewa sˈana. kwa hˈijo ˌabiɡaˈili hˌakumwambˈia mumˈewe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi jˈake.|0
bˌasi ˌasubˈuhi, nabˈali ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamelevˈuka, mkˈewe ˌakamwambˈia mˈambo jˈote, nˌao mˈojo wˌake ˌukazimˈia, akˈawa kˌama ɟˈiwe.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku kˈumi, bwˈana ˌakampˈiɡa nabˈali, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba nabˈali ˌamekˈufa, ˌakasˈema, ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌamenˌitetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja nabˈali kwa kˌuwa ˌalinˌitendˈea kwa ðarˈau. ˌamemzuˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake ˌasitˈende mabˈaja na bwˈana ˌameulˈeta ubˈaja wa nabˈali ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe. kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa ˌabiɡaˈili kumwˈomba ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈake.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa daˈudi wˌakaˈenda mpˈaka karmˈeli na kˌumwambˈia ˌabiɡaˈili, wˌakisˈema, daˈudi ˌametutˈuma kwˈako kˌukutʃukˈua ˈuwe mkˈewe.|0
ˌakainˈama tʃˈini ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka arðˈini, ˌakasˈema, mɟakˈazi wˈako jˈuko hˈapa, tajˈari kˌuwatˌumikˈia na kˌuwanawˈiʃa miɡˈuu wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌabiɡaˈili ˌakainˈuka kwa harˈaka, ˌakapˈanda pˈunda wˈake, ˌakihˌudumˈiwa na wˌaɟakˈazi wˌake watˈano, ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa na waɟˈumbe wa daˈudi, nˌaje akˈawa mkˈewe.|0
pˈia daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli, wˈote wawˈili wakˈawa wˌake zˈake.|0
lakˈini saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoza mikˈali bˈinti jˈake, ˌalijekˈuwa mkˈewe daˈudi, kwa pˈalti mwˈana wa laˈiʃi, kutˈoka ɡalˈimu.|0
hˈao wazˈifu wˌakamwendˈea saˈuli hˌuko ɡibˈea na kusˈema, ɟˈe, daˈudi hˌakuɟifˈitʃa katˌika kilˈima tʃa hakˈila, kˌinatʃˌotazamˈana na jˌeʃimˈoni.|0
hˈivjo saˈuli ˌakaʃˈuka kwˈenda katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la zˈifu, akˈiwa na wˈatu wˌake tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa, kumsˈaka daˈudi hˌuko.|0
saˈuli ˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi jˌake kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ɟˌuːja kilˈima tʃa hakˈila kˌinatʃˌotazamˈana na jˌeʃimˈoni, lakˈini daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani. ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa saˈuli ˌamemfuˈata hˌuko.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈuma wˌapelelˈezi na ˌakapˈata habˈari kwa hakˈika kwˌamba saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewasˈili.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakaˈenda hˌadi mahˈali saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi. ˌakaˈona mahˈali saˈuli na abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamelˈala. saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala ndˈani ja kˈambi, ɟˈeʃi likˈiwa lˌimemzuŋɡˈuka.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza ˌahimelˈeki mhˈiti, na ˌabiʃˈai mwˈana wa serˈuja, nduɡˈuje joˈabu, ˌakisˈema, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeʃˈuka pamˈoɟa nˌami kambˈini kwa saˈuli? ˌabiʃˈai ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌitakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi na ˌabiʃˈai wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe ɟˈeʃi wakˈati wa usˈiku, tazˈama saˈuli, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala ndˈani ja kˈambi na mkˈuki wˌake ˌumekˈitwa arðˈini karˈibu na kˈitʃwa tʃˈake. abnˈeri na askˈari wˌalikˈuwa wˌamelˈala kˌumzuŋɡˈuka saˈuli.|0
ˌabiʃˈai ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, lˈeo mˈuŋɡu ˌamemtˈia adˈui jˈako mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. sˈasa nˌiruhˈusu nimtʃˈome mpˈaka arðˈini kwa pˈiɡo mˈoɟa la mkˈuki wˈaŋɡu; sˌitamtʃˈoma mˈara mbˈili.|0
lakˈini daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiʃˈai, ˌusimwˌaŋɡamˈize! ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kutˈia mkˈono ɟˌuːja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana na asˈiwe na hatˈia.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌatampˈiɡa; ˌau wakˈati wˌake ˌutafˈika, nˌaje ˌatakˈufa, ˌau ˌatakwˈenda vitˈani na kˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu na ˌapiʃˈie mbˈali nisˈiɟe nˌikainˈua mkˈono ɟˌuːja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana. sˈasa tʃukˈua hˈuo mkˈuki na hˌilo ɡˌudulˈia la mˈaɟi vilˈivjo karˈibu na kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, tˌuondˈoke.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakatʃukˈua hˈuo mkˈuki na hˌilo ɡˌudulˈia la mˈaɟi vˌilivjokˈuwa karˈibu na kˈitʃwa tʃa saˈuli, nˌao wˌakaondˈoka. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijeˈona ˌau kˌufahˈamu habˈari hˌii, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijeˈamka ˌusiŋɡizˈini. wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamelˈala, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewatˈia kwˈeɲe ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakavˈuka upˈande mwiŋɡˈine na kˌusimˈama ɟˌuːja kilˈima mahˈali pˌalipokˈuwa na nafˈasi pˈana kˈati jˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌakalˌipiɡˈia kelˈele ɟˈeʃi na abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, ˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, abnˈeri, hˌutaniɟˈibu? abnˈeri ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈani wˌewe ˌumwitˈaje mfˈalme.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, wˌewe si ni ˈm̩tu ʃuɟˈaa? ni nˈani alˈije kˌama wˌewe katˌika ˌisraˈeli? kwa nˈini bˌasi hˌukumlˈinda mfˈalme bwˈana wˈako? ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuɟa kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza mfˈalme, bwˈana wˈako.|0
ˌulitʃˌokifˈaɲa si kizˈuri. kwa hakˈika kˌama ˌaiʃˈivjo bwˈana, wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako mnˌastahˈili kˈufa, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkumlˈinda bwˈana wˈenu, mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana. tˌazamˈeni hˈapo mlˈipo. ˈuko wˈapi mkˈuki wa mfˈalme na ɡˌudulˈia la mˈaɟi ambˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa karˈibu na kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
saˈuli ˌakatambˈua saˈuti ja daˈudi, na kusˈema, ɟˈe, hˈijo ni saˈuti jˈako, daˈudi mwanˈaŋɡu? daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈaam, hˈijo n̩dˈijo, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
pˈia ˌakaoŋɡˈeza, kwa nˈini bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌanamfˌuatˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake? nˌimefˈaɲa nˈini, nˈalo kˈosa lˈaŋɡu ni lˈipi nˌililˌolifˈaɲa nˈiwe na hatˈia.|0
sˈasa mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na ˌasikilˈize manˈeno ja mtumˈiʃi wˈake. kˌama bwˈana ˌamekˌutʃotʃˈea ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, bˌasi jˌeje na ˌaipokˈee sadˈaka jˈaŋɡu. lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama ni wˌanadˈamu wˌaliofˈaɲa hˈivjo, wˌalaanˈiwe mbˈele za bwˈana! wˌao sˈasa wˌamenˌifukˈuza kutˈoka sehˈemu jˈaŋɡu katˌika urˈiθi wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu wˌakisˈema, nˈenda ˌukatˌumikˈie miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine..|0
bˌasi ˌusiˈatʃe dˈamu jˈaŋɡu ˌimwaɡˈike kwˈeɲe ˈarði mbˈali na ˈuso wa bwˈana. mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌametˈoka kˌutafˈuta kˌirobˈoto, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu ˌawindˈavjo kwˈare katˌika milˈima.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakasˈema, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi. rˈudi, daˈudi mwanˈaŋɡu. kwa kˌuwa ˌulijˌahesˈabu maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa ja θamˈani lˈeo, sˌitaɟarˈibu kˌukuðˈuru tˈena. hakˈika nˌimetˈenda kˌama mpumbˈavu na nˌimekˈosa sˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, mkˈuki wa mfˈalme ˈuko hˈapa. mmˈoɟa wa viɟˈana wˈako na avˈuke kˌuutʃukˈua.|0
bwˈana humlˈipa kˈila ˈm̩tu kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaki jˌake na ˌuaminˈifu wˈake. bwˈana ˌalikutˈia katˌika mikˈono jˈaŋɡu lˈeo, lakˈini sˌikuinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana.|0
kwa hakˈika kˌama vˈile maˈiʃa jˈako jˌalivjokˈuwa ja θamˈani kwˈaŋɡu lˈeo, vˈivjo hˈivjo maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu na jˈawe na θamˈani kwa bwˈana na kˌuniokˈoa kutˈoka taˈabu zˈote.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, mwanˈaŋɡu daˈudi na ˌubarikˈiwe; ˌutafˈaɲa mˈambo makˈubwa na hakˈika ˌutaʃˈinda. bˌasi daˈudi ˌakaˈenda zˈake, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja sˈiku hˈizi nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa mkˈono wa saˈuli. ɟˈambo lilˈilo bˈora ni kˌutorokˈea kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti. hˈivjo saˈuli ˌatakˈata tamˈaa ja kˌunisˈaka popˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa nˌimepoɲˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakaondˈoka na hˈao wˈatu mˈia sˈita wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje na kwˈenda kwa akˈiʃi mwˈana wa maˈoki mfˈalme wa ɡˈaθi.|0
daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakakˈaa hˌuko ɡˈaθi pamˈoɟa na akˈiʃi. kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈake, nˌaje daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wakˈeze wawˈili: jaˈani ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli, na ˌabiɡaˈili wa karmˈeli, mɟˈane wa nabˈali.|0
saˈuli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameambˈiwa kwˌamba daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌimbilˈia ɡˈaθi, hˌakuˌendelˈea kumsˈaka tˈena.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia akˈiʃi, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, unˈipe sehˈemu katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nikˈae hˌuko. kwa nˈini mtˈumwa wˈako akˈae pamˈoɟa nˌawe katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wa kifˈalme.|0
hˈivjo sˈiku hˈijo akˈiʃi akˈampa daˈudi ˈm̩ɟi wa siklˈaɡi, nˌao siklˈaɡi ˌumekˈuwa mˈali ja wafˈalme wa jˈuda ʃˈu wakˈati hˈuo.|0
daˈudi ˌakaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti mˈuda wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa na miˈezi mˈinne.|0
bˌasi daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakapˈanda na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌaɡeʃˈuri, wˌaɡirˈizi na wˌaamalˈeki. ʃˈu zamˈani hˈaja mˌataˈifa jˌalikˈuwa jˌameˈiʃi kwˈeɲe enˈeo lˌililotˈanda kˌuanzˈia telˈemu katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌiteremkˈajo ʃˈuri hˌadi kˌufikˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri..|0
kˈila mˈara daˈudi ˌalipˌoʃambulˈia enˈeo, hˌakubakˈiza hˈai mwˌanaˈume wˈala mwanˈamke, lakˈini ˌalitʃukˈua kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe, pˈunda na ŋɡamˈia, na ŋɡˈuo. kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi kwa akˈiʃi.|0
akˈiʃi ˌalipˌomuulˈiza, ɟˈe lˈeo ˌumeʃˌambulˈia wˈapi? daˈudi humɟˈibu, ðˈidi ja neɡˈebu ja jˈuda, ˌau wakˈati mwiŋɡˈine husˈema, ðˈidi ja neɡˈebu ja jˌerameˈeli, ˌau ðˈidi ja neɡˈebu ja wakˈeni.|0
daˈudi hˌakumwˈatʃa hˈai mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke ˌili apˈate kulˈetwa ɡˈaθi, kwa maˈana daˈudi ˌaliwˈaza, wˌanawˈeza kˌuɟulˈiʃa habˈari zˈetu na kusˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌalivjofˈaɲa daˈudi.  hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilikˈuwa destˈuri jˌake wakˈati wˈote ˌaliˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
akˈiʃi ˌakamsadˈiki daˈudi na kuwˈaza mojˈoni mwˈake, ˌakasˈema, daˈudi ˌamekˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza kabˈisa kwa wˈatu wˈake, wˌaisraˈeli, hˈivi kwˌamba ˌatakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu milˈele.|0
sˈiku zˈile wˌafilˈisti wˌakakusˈaɲa maɟˈeʃi jˈao ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli. akˈiʃi ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, lazˈima uɟˈue kˌuwa wˌewe pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako mtˌafuatˈana nˌami kwˈenda vitˈani.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, ndˈipo wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌutakˌapoɟˌionˈea ɟˈambo ambˈalo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲa. akˈiʃi ˌakamɟˈibu daˈudi, vjˈema sˈana, mˌimi nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe mlˈinzi wˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
wakˈati hˈuo samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈufa, nˌao ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwˌombolezˈea na kumzˈika kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˌake mweɲˈewe hˌuko rˈama. saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌafukˈuza wˌaaɡˈuzi na watʃˈawi.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakakˌusaɲˈika na kupˈiɡa kˈambi jˈao hˌuko ʃunˈemu, nˌaje saˈuli ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote na kupˈiɡa kˈambi jˈao hˌuko ɡilbˈoa.|0
saˈuli ˌalipoˈona ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti, ˌakaoɡˈopa; mˈojo wˌake ˌukaɟˈawa na hˈofu kˈuu.|0
ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakaulˈiza ˌuʃaˈuri kwa bwˈana, lakˈini bwˈana hˌakumɟˈibu kwa ndˈoto, wˈala kwa urˈimu, wˈala kwa ɲɟˈia ja mˌanabˈii.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, nˌitafˌutiˈeni mwanˈamke mwaɡˈuzi ˌili nˌimwendˈee, nipˈate kˌuulˈiza kwˈake. wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakamwambˈia, jˈuko mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa hˌuko endˈori.|0
hˈivjo saˈuli ˌakaɟˌiɡeˈuza kwa kuvˈaa mavˈazi meŋɡˈine, nˌaje usˈiku akˈiwa ˌamefˌuatˈana na wˈatu wawˈili wˌakaˈenda kwa hˈujo mwanˈamke. ˌakamwambˈia, nˌibaʃirˈie kwa ˌuaɡˈuzi, ˌunipˌandiʃˈie jˈule nˌitakˌajekˌutaɟˈia.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ˌunaɟˈua lˈile ˌalilofˈaɲa mfˈalme saˈuli. ˌamewˌakatilˈia mbˈali wˌaaɡˈuzi, wapˈiɡa rˈamli wˈote na watʃˈawi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. mbˈona ˌumenˌiteɡˈea maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu ˌili wapˈate kˌuniˈua.|0
saˈuli ˌakamwapˈia hˈujo mwanˈamke kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, ˌakasˈema, kwa hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, hˌutaˌaðibˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
ndˈipo jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe ˌunatˈaka nˌikupˌandiʃˈie nˈani? saˈuli ˌakasˈema, nˌipandiʃˈie samwˈeli.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌalipomwˈona samwˈeli, ˌalipˈiɡa jˈowe kwa saˈuti kˈuu, nˌaje ˌakamˌuulˈiza saˈuli, mbˈona ˌumenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa? wˌewe ndˈiwe saˈuli.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusioɡˈope. ˌunaˈona nˈini? jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, naˈona mˈuŋɡu ˌunapˈanda kutˈoka arðˈini.|0
saˈuli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ni mfˈano wa nˈini? jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, ni mwˌanaˈume m̩zˈee ˌamevˈaa ɟˈoho ˌanajepˈanda. ndˈipo saˈuli ˌakatambˈua kwˌamba ni samwˈeli. saˈuli ˌakasuɟˈudu kˌifudifˈudi, ˈuso wˌake hˌadi arðˈini.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza saˈuli, kwa nˈini ˌunanˌitaabˈiʃa kwa kˌunipandˈiʃa ɟˈuu? saˈuli ˌakasˈema, mˌimi nˌinasumbˈuka sˈana, kwa maˈana wˌafilˈisti wˌanapiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌameniˈatʃa. hˌaniɟˈibu tˈena wˈala kwa ɲɟˈia ja mˌanabˈii wˈala kwa ndˈoto. kwa hˈijo nˌimekuˈita wˌewe ˌili ˌuniɟulˈiʃe la kufˈaɲa.|0
samwˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌuniulˈize mˈimi, mˌaadˈamu bwˈana ˌamekuˈatʃa na kˌuwa adˈui jˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌametˈenda lˈile ˌalilˌotaŋɡulˈia kusˈema kˌupitˈia kwˈaŋɡu. bwˈana ˌameˌurarˈua ufˈalme kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, nˌaje amˈempa mmˈoɟa wa ɟirˈani zˈako, jaˈani daˈudi.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌewe hˌukumtˈii bwˈana, wˈala hˌukumtˌimizˈia ɣaðˈabu jˌake kˈali ɟˌuːja wˌaamalˈeki, bwˈana ˌamekˌutendˈea mˈambo hˈaja lˈeo.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, bwˈana ˌatawatˈia ˌisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na wˌewe mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti, na kˈeʃo wˌewe na wanˈao mtakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami. bwˈana pˈia ˌatalitˈia ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
pˈapo hˈapo saˈuli ˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini, ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa, akˈiwa ˌameɟˈawa na hˈofu kwa aɟˈili ja manˈeno ja samwˈeli. ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˌikamwiʃˈia kwa maˈana ˌalikˈuwa haɟˈala tʃotʃˈote mtʃˈana ˈule wˈote na usˈiku.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌalipˌomwendˈea saˈuli na kumwˈona ˌamepˈatwa na hˈofu, ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama, mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako mwanˈamke nˌimekutˈii. nˌimewˈeka maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu hˌatarˈini kwa kufˈaɲa kˈile ˌulitʃˌoniaɡˈiza nifˈaɲe.|0
sˈasa tˌafaðˈali ˌisikilˈize saˈuti ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌuniruhˈusu nˌikupatˈie tʃakˈula kidˈoɡo ˈule ˌili ˈuwe na ŋɡˈuvu za kˌureɟˈea ˌulikotˈoka.|0
ˌakakatˈaa, ˌakisˈema, mˌimi sitˈaki kˈula. lakˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakauŋɡˈana na jˈule mwanˈamke wˌakamsˈihi ˈale, nˌaje ˌakakubˈali. bˌasi ˌakainˈuka hˈapo tʃˈini, ˌakakˈeti ɟˌuːja kitˈanda.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌalikˈuwa na ndˈama ˌalijenˈona hˈapo ɲumbˈani, ˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa mˈara mˈoɟa. ˌakatʃukˈua ˈuŋɡa, ˌakaukˈanda, ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mkˈate usˈio tʃˈatʃu.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamwˌandalˈia mˈeza saˈuli pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake, nˌao wakˈala. usˈiku ˈule ˈule wˌakainˈuka na kwˈenda zˈao.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakakusˈaɲa maɟˈeʃi jˈao jˈote hˌuko afˈeki, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na tʃemtʃˈemi ˌilijˈoko jˌezreˈeli.|0
wˌatawˈala wa wˌafilˈisti wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakipˈita pamˈoɟa na vikˈosi vjˈao vja mamˈia na vja maˈelfu, daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˌakitembˈea hˌuko ɲˈuma pamˈoɟa na akˈiʃi.|0
mˌaɟemadˈari wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakaulˈiza, vˈipi kuhˈusu hˈawa wˌaebranˈia? akˈiʃi ˌakaɟˈibu, hˈuju si daˈudi, ˌalijekˈuwa afˈisa wa saˈuli mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli? ˌameʃakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌami kwa zaˈidi ja mwˈaka, nˌaje ʃˈu ˌalipomwˈatʃa saˈuli hˌadi sˈasa, sˌikuˈona kˈosa lolˈote kwˈake.|0
lakˈini mˌaɟemadˈari wa wˌafilˈisti wˌakamkˌasirikˈia na kusˈema, mrudˈiʃe ˈm̩tu hˈuju, apˈate kurˈudi mahˈali pˈale ˌulipˌompaŋɡˈia. hˌaimpˈasi kˌufuatˈana pamˈoɟa nˌasi vitˈani, asˈiɟe ˌakaɡeˈuka, akˈawa kiɲˈume tʃˈetu vitˈani. ni kwa ɲɟˈia ˈipi bˈora zaˈidi ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuɟipatˈia tˈena kibˈali kwa bwˈana wˈake, ˌisipokˈuwa kwa vˈitʃwa vja wˈatu wˈetu weɲˈewe.|0
ɟˈe, hˈuju si n̩dˈije daˈudi wˌalioˈimba kumhˈusu katˌika ŋɡˈoma zˈao, wˌakisˈema:  saˈuli ˌamewaˈua ˈelfu zˈake, nˌaje daˈudi makˈumi ˈelfu jˈake.|0
bˌasi akˈiʃi ˌakamwˈita daˈudi na kˌumwambˈia, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa ˈm̩tu mwˌaminˈifu, nˌami nˌiŋɡepˈenda ˌutumˈike pamˈoɟa nˌami katˌika ɟˈeʃi. ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile ˌulijofˈika kwˈaŋɡu hˌadi sˈasa, sˌiɟaˈona kˈosa lolˈote kwˈako, lakˈini hˈao wˌatawˈala hˌawakˌukubˈali.|0
rˈudi na uˈende kwa amˈani; ˌusifˈaɲe tʃotʃˈote tʃa kˌuwakˌasirˈiʃa wˌatawˈala wa kˌifilˈisti.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza akˈiʃi, lakˈini mˌimi nˌimefˈaɲa nˈini? ɟˈe, ˌumeˈona nˈini kibˈaja ɟˌuːja mtumˈiʃi wˈako ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile nˌilijokˈuɟa kwˈako hˌadi lˈeo? kwa nˈini nˌisirˈudi na kˌupiɡˈana na adˈui za bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
akˈiʃi ˌakamɟˈibu daˈudi, mˌimi nˌinaɟˈua ja kˌuwa wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa wa kˌupendˈeza matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu kˌama vˈile mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu. lakˈini hˈao mˌaɟemadˈari wa wˌafilˈisti wˌamesˈema, hˈuju hˌaimpˈasi kwˈenda vitˈani pamˈoɟa nˈasi..|0
sˈasa ˈamka mapˈema, pamˈoɟa na wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana wˈako wˌaliˌofuatˈana nˈawe, nˌaɲi ˌondokˈeni ˌasubˈuhi mˈara kˌutakˌapopˌambazˈuka.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, wˌakaˈenda zˈao kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti, nˌao wˌafilˈisti wˌakapˈanda kwˈenda jˌezreˈeli.|0
daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakafˈika siklˈaɡi sˈiku ja tˈatu. bˌasi wˌaamalˈeki wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevamˈia neɡˈebu na siklˈaɡi. wakˈawa wˌameʃˌambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi wa siklˈaɡi na kˌuutˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto.|0
nˌao wakˈawa wˌamewˌatʃukˈua matˈeka wˌanawˈake pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈamo hˈumo, viɟˈana na wazˈee. hˌawakuˈua jejˈote, bˌali wˌaliwˌatʃukˈua wˌakaˈenda zˈao.|0
daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalipofˈika siklˈaɡi, wˌakakˈuta ˈm̩ɟi ˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa mˈoto na wˌake zˈao pamˈoɟa na wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao wˌametʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakapˈiɡa jˈowe mpˈaka wˌakaiʃˈiwa na ŋɡˈuvu za kulˈia.|0
wˌake wawˈili wa daˈudi wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˈekwa: jaˈani ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli, na ˌabiɡaˈili, mɟˈane wa nabˈali wa karmˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌalihˌuzunˈika sˈana kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌalikˈuwa wˌakisˌemezˈana ɟˌuːja kumpˈiɡa kwa mˈawe. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na utʃˈuŋɡu rohˈoni kwa sabˈabu ja wanˈawe na bˈinti zˈake. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakaɟitˈia ŋɡˈuvu katˌika bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari mwˈana wa ˌahimelˈeki, nˌiletˈee kˌisibˈau. ˌabiaθˈari ˌakamletˈea.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, ɟˈe, nˌifuatˈie kˈundi hˈili la wˌavamˈizi? ɟˈe, nˌitawapˈata? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, wˌafuatˈie. hakˈika ˌutawapˈata na ˌutafˌanikˈiwa kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake mˌiasˈita wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe bˈonde la besˈori, mahˈali ambˈapo weŋɡˈine wˌaliˈatʃwa ɲˈuma.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈatu mˌiambˈili wˌalikˈuwa wˌametʃˈoka sˈana kuwˈeza kuvˈuka hˌilo bˈonde. lakˈini daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu mˌiaˈn̩ne wˌakaˌendelˈea kˌufuatˈia.|0
wˌakamkˈuta mmˈisri katˌika ʃˈamba fulˈani, nˌao wˌakamlˈeta kwa daˈudi. wakˈampa hˈujo mmˈisri mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua na tʃakˈula.|0
kipˈande tʃa andˈazi la tˈini na andˈazi la zabˈibu zˌilizˌokaˈuʃwa. akˈala nˌaje ˌakapˈata ŋɡˈuvu, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuwa ˌamekˈula tʃakˈula tʃotʃˈote wˈala kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kwa sˈiku tˈatu usˈiku na mtʃˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ni wa nˈani, na ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mmˈisri, mtˈumwa wa mwˌamalˈeki. bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌalinˌitelekˈeza nˌilipˌouɡˈua sˈiku tˈatu zˌilizopˈita.|0
tˌulivamˈia neɡˈebu ja wˌakerˈeθi, na ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda, na neɡˈebu ja kalˈebu. nˌasi tˌulitʃˈoma mˈoto siklˈaɡi.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌunawˈeza kˌunioŋɡˈoza kˌufikˈia kˈundi hˈili la ˌuvamˈizi? ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌiapˈie mbˈele ja mˈuŋɡu kwˌamba hˌutaniˈua wˈala kˌunikabˈiði mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˌupelˈeka hˌadi walˈiko.|0
ˌakamwoŋɡˈoza daˈudi mpˈaka mahˈali wˌalipokˈuwa, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌawaɲˈika enˈeo lˈote, wakˈila, wakˈiɲua na wˌakifˈaɲa karˈamu kwa sabˈabu ja ɲˈara ɲˈiŋɡi wˌalizˌotʃukˈua kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti na kutˈoka jˈuda.|0
daˈudi ˌakapiɡˈana nˌao kˌuanzˈia matʃwˈeo ja ɟˈua hˌadi kˈeʃo jˌake ɟiˈoni, na hakˈuna jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌalijˌetorˈoka, ˌisipokˈuwa viɟˈana wˌanaˈume mˌiaˈn̩ne wˌaliopˈanda ŋɡamˈia na kˌutorˈoka.|0
daˈudi ˌakarudˈiʃa kˈila kˈitu wˌaamalˈeki wˌalikˈuwa wˌametʃukˈua, pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˌake wawˈili.|0
hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌopotˈea: kiɟˈana ˌau m̩zˈee, mvulˈana ˌau msitʃˈana, ɲˈara ˌau kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote wˌalitʃokˈuwa wˌametʃukˈua. daˈudi ˌakarudˈiʃa kˈila kˈitu.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua makˈundi jˈote ja kondˈoo, mbˈuzi na ŋɡˈombe, nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˌakawaswˈaɡa waɲˈama hˈao mbˈele ja waɲˈama weŋɡˈine wa kufˈuɡwa, wˌakisˈema, hˈizi ni ɲˈara za daˈudi.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakafˈika kwa wˈale wˈatu mˌiambˈili wˌaliokˈuwa wˌametʃˈoka sˈana kˌumfuˈata na ambˈao wˌaliˈatʃwa ɲˈuma kwˈeɲe bˈonde la besˈori. wˌakatˈoka kwˈenda kumlˈaki daˈudi na wˈale wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa nˈao. daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalipˌowakˌaribˈia, ˌakawˌasalˈimu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈote waˈovu na wˌakorˈofi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafuˈasi wa daˈudi wˌakasˈema, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈasi, hˌatutˌaɡawˈana nˌao ɲˈara tˌulizˌorudˈiʃa. lakˈini, kˈila ˈm̩tu awˈeza kˌutʃukˈua mkˈewe na watˈoto wˌake na kˌuondˈoka.|0
daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa, ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, kˈamwe hamwˈezi kufˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa kˈile ambˈatʃo bwˈana ˌametˌupatˈia. jˌeje ˌametulˈinda na kuwˈeka mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu maɟˈeʃi jˈale jˌalijokˈuɟa kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈetu.|0
ni nˈani ˌatasˌikilˈiza jˈale mnˌajosˈema? fˈuŋɡu la ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈaa na vjˈombo lˌitakˈuwa sˈawa na la jˈule ˌalijekwˈenda vitˈani. wˈote wˌataʃirˈiki sˈawa.|0
daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa hˈili lˈiwe ˈamri na aɡˈizo kwa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka sˈiku ˈile hˌata lˈeo.|0
daˈudi ˌalipofˈika siklˈaɡi, ˌakatˈuma baˈaði ja ɲˈara kwa wazˈee wa jˈuda, wˌaliokˈuwa rafˈiki zˈake, ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, hˈapa kˈuna zawˈadi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu kutˈoka ɲˈara za adˈui za bwˈana.|0
ˌakazitˈuma kwa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa beθˈeli, rˈamoθ neɡˈebu na jatˈiri.|0
kwa wˈale wˌaliˈoko ˌaroˈeri, sifmˈoθi, ˌeʃtemˈoa.|0
na rakˈali; kwa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika mˈiɟi ja wˌajerˌameˈeli na ja wakˈeni.|0
na kwa wˈale wˌaliˈoko hˈorma, bˈori aʃˈani, aθˈaki.|0
na kwa wakˈazi wa hebrˈoni; na kwa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa mahˈali peŋɡˈine pˈote ambˈako daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌalitˌembelˈea.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakawˌafuatˈia kwa bidˈii saˈuli na wanˈawe, wˌakawaˈua jˌonaθˈani, ˌabinadˈabu na mˈalki ʃˈua.|0
mˌapiɡˈano jakˈawa makˈali sˈana kˌumzuŋɡˈuka saˈuli, nˌao wapˈiɡa upˈinde wˌakampˈata na kˌumɟerˈuhi vibˈaja.|0
mtʃukˈua silˈaha wˌake ˌalipoˈona saˈuli ˌamekˈufa, nˌaje pˈia ˌakaˌaŋɡukˈia upˈaŋɡa wˌake akˈafa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
bˌasi saˈuli, wanˈawe watˈatu, mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wakˈafa pamˈoɟa sˈiku ˈile ˈile.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa kˌandokˈando ja bˈonde na wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ɟˈeʃi la wˌaisraˈeli lˌimekimbˈia na kwˌamba saˈuli na wanˈawe wˌamekˈufa, wˌakaˈatʃa mˈiɟi jˈao na kˌukimbˈia. nˌao wˌafilˈisti wakˈaɟa na kukˈaa hˈumo.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake wˌafilˈisti wˌalipokˈuɟa kˌuwavˈua maˈiti silˈaha, wˌalimkˈuta saˈuli na wanˈawe watˈatu wˌameaŋɡˈuka katˌika mlˈima ɡilbˈoa.|0
wˌakawˈeka silˈaha zˌake katˌika hekˈalu la mˌaaʃtorˈeθi, na kˌukifˈuŋɡa kˌiwiliwˈili tʃˈake katˌika ukˈuta wa bˈeθ ʃˈani.|0
wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi wˌalipˌosikˈia jˈale wˌafilˈisti wˌalitʃˌomfaɲˈia saˈuli.|0
mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌao wˈote wˌakaˈenda usˈiku hˌadi bˈeθ ʃˈani. wˌakaˌutʃukˈua mwˈili wa saˈuli na miˈili ja wanˈawe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ukˈuta wa bˈeθ ʃˈani na kurˈudi hˌadi jabˈeʃi, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌaliˌiteketˈeza kwa mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatʃukˈua mifˈupa jˈao na kˌuizˈika tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti wa mkwˈaɟu hˌuko jabˈeʃi, nˌao wˌakafˈuŋɡa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa saˈuli, daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamerˈudi kutˈoka kˌuwaʃˈinda wˌaamalˈeki, daˈudi ˌalikˈaa sˈiku mbˈili hˌuko siklˈaɡi.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu akˈaɟa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuo zˌilizˌorarˈuka na mavˈumbi kitʃwˈani mwˈake kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja saˈuli. ˌalipomɟˈia daˈudi, ˌakaɟitˈupa tʃˈini ˌili kˈumpa heʃˈima.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌimetorˈoka kutˈoka kˈambi ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ni nˈini kˌilitʃˌotokˈea? nˌiambˈie. ˌakasˈema, wˈatu wˌalikimbˈia kutˈoka vitˈani. wˈeŋɡi wˌao wˌaliaŋɡˈuka na kˈufa. nˌaje saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani mwanˈawe wˌamekˈufa.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia hˈujo kiɟˈana ˌalijˌemletˈea tˌaarˈifa, ɟˈe, ˌumefˌahamˈuɟe kwˌamba saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani mwanˈawe wˌamekˈufa.|0
jˈule kiɟˈana ˌakasˈema, nˌiliɟipˈata hˌuko mlˈima ɡilbˈoa, nˌaje saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa hˌuko ˌakiˌeɡemˈea mkˈuki wˈake, na maɡˈari ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi wa upˈande wa adˈui wakˈawa wˌamemkˌaribˈia sˈana.|0
ˌalipˌoɡeˈuka na kˌuniˈona, ˌakaniˈita, nˌami nˌikasˈema, ɟˈe, nifˈaɲe nˈini?.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, wˌewe ni nˈani? nˌikamɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mwˌamalˈeki..|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˌikaribˈie mˌimi na ˌuniˈue! nˈiko katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈali ja kˈifo, lakˈini bˈado niŋɡˈali hˈai..|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikamkˌaribˈia nˌikamuˈua, kwa sabˈabu nˌiliɟˈua kwˌamba baˌada ja kˌuaŋɡˈuka hˌaŋɡewˈeza kupˈona. nˌami nˌikatʃukˈua lˈile tˈaɟi lˌililokˈuwa kitʃwˈani mwˈake na utˈepe ˌuliokˈuwa mkonˈoni mwˈake nˌami nˌimevilˈeta hˈapa kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakaziʃˈika ŋɡˈuo zˈao na kˌuzirarˈua.|0
wˌakaˌombolˈeza, wˌakalˈia pˈia na kufˈuŋɡa mpˈaka ɟiˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani mwanˈawe, kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈeʃi la bwˈana na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia jˈule kiɟˈana ˌalijˌemletˈea tˌaarˈifa, wˌewe ni mweɲˈeɟi wa wˈapi? ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mwˈana wa mɡˈeni, mwˌamalˈeki.|0
daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini hˌukuoɡˈopa kˌuinˈua mkˈono wˈako ˌili kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwˈita mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu wˌake na kˌumwambˈia, nˈenda ˌukamuˈue! kwa hˈijo ˌakampˈiɡa, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
kwa maˈana daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia, dˈamu jˈako ˈiwe ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈako mweɲˈewe. kˈiɲua tʃˈako mweɲˈewe kˌimeʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈako ˌuliposˈema, nˌilimuˈua mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana..|0
daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo hˈaja kuhˈusu saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani mwanˈawe.|0
nˌaje ˌakaaɡˈiza kwˌamba wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌafundˈiʃwe ˌombolˈezo hˈili la upˈinde ambˈalo lˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa jaʃˈari.|0
walˈio fahˈari jˈako, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, wˌameuˈawa ɟˌuːja mahˈali pˈako pˌalipˌoinˈuka. ɟˈinsi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌalivjˌoaŋɡˈuka.|0
msˌilisˌimulˈie hˈili katˌika ɡˈaθi, msˌilitaŋɡˈaze hˈili katˌika bˌarabˈara za ˌaʃkelˈoni, bˈinti za wˌafilˈisti wasˈiɟe wˌakafˌurahˈia, bˈinti za hˈao wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa wasˈiɟe wˌakaʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
ˈeɲi milˈima ja ɡilbˈoa, msipˈate umˈande wˈala mvˈua, wˈala maʃˈamba jˌazaˈajo sadˈaka ja nafˈaka. kwa maˈana hˌuko ndˈiko ŋɡˈao ja mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌilipˌonaɟisˈiwa, ŋɡˈao ja saˈuli hˌaitapˈakwa tˈena mafˈuta.|0
kˌutokˈana na dˈamu ja wˌaliˌouˈawa, kˌutokˈana na miˈili ja wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, ˈule upˈinde wa jˌonaθˈani hˌaukˌuɡeˈuka ɲˈuma. upˈaŋɡa wa saˈuli hˌaukurˈudi bˈure.|0
saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani, mˌaiʃˈani wˌalipˈendwa na kˌuneemˈeka, na katˌika kˈifo hˌawakˌuteŋɡˈana. wˌalikˈuwa wepˈesi kulˈiko tˈai, wˌalikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko sˈimba.|0
ˈeɲi bˈinti za ˌisraˈeli, liˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja saˈuli, ambˈaje ˌaliwavˈika ŋɡˈuo ɲekˈundu na mˌaridˈadi, ambˈaje ˌalirˈemba mavˈazi jˈenu kwa mapˈambo ja ðahˈabu.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌalivjˌoaŋɡˈuka vitˈani! jˌonaθˈani ˌameuˈawa mahˈali pˈako pˌalipˌoinˈuka.|0
nˌahuzunˈika kwa aɟˈili jˈako, jˌonaθˈani ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu, kwˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa mpˈendwa sˈana. upˈendo wˈako kwˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa wa aɟˈabu, wa aɟˈabu zaˈidi kulˈiko ˈule wa wˌanawˈake.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌalivjˌoaŋɡˈuka! silˈaha za vˈita zˌimeˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
ikˈawa baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja, daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, ɟˈe, nipˈande kwˈenda katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈiɟi ja jˈuda? bwˈana ˌakasˈema, pˈanda. daˈudi ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, niˈende wˈapi? bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈenda hebrˈoni.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakakwˈea kwˈenda hˌuko pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˌake wawˈili, ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli na ˌabiɡaˈili, mɟˈane wa nabˈali wa karmˈeli.|0
pˈia daˈudi ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kˈila mmˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa jˈake, nˌao wˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko hebrˈoni na mˈiɟi jˈake.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa jˈuda wakˈaɟa hebrˈoni, hˌuko wˌakamtˈia daˈudi mafˈuta ˈawe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda. daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa ni wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi wˌaliomzˈika saˈuli.|0
ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi kˌuwaambˈia, bwˈana ˌawabarˈiki kwa kˌuoɲˈeʃa wˈema hˈuu kwa kumzˈika saˈuli bwˈana wˈenu.|0
sˈasa bwˈana na ˌawaoɲˈeʃe wˈema na ˌuaminˈifu, nˌami pˈia nˌitawˌaoɲˈeʃa wˈema ˈule ˈule kwa kˌuwa mmefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, kuwˈeni hodˈari na mˌaʃuɟˈaa, kwa maˈana bwˈana wˈenu saˈuli ˌamekˈufa, nˈajo ɲˈumba ja jˈuda ˌimenitˈia mafˈuta nˈiwe mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
wakˈati hˈuo abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la saˈuli, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtʃukˈua ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli na kumlˈeta hˌadi mˌahanaˈimu.|0
ˌakamwˈeka ˈawe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi, wˌaaʃˈeri, jˌezreˈeli, ˌefraˈimu, bˌeɲamˈini na ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala miˈaka miwˈili. hˌata hˈivjo, ɲˈumba ja jˈuda ˌikamfuˈata daˈudi.|0
mˈuda ambˈao daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda hˌuko hebrˈoni ˌilikˈuwa miˈaka sˈaba na miˈezi sˈita.|0
abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli, wˌakatˈoka mˌahanaˈimu kwˈenda ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja na wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌakatˈoka na kˌukutˈana nˌao kwˈeɲe bwˈawa la ɡˌibeˈoni. kikˈundi kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈeti upˈande mmˈoɟa wa bwˈawa, na kikˈundi kiŋɡˈine upˈande wa pˈili.|0
ndˈipo abnˈeri ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, tˌuwawˈeke baˈaði ja viɟˈana wˌasimˈame na wˌapiɡˈane ˈana kwa ˈana mbˈele jˈetu. joˈabu ˌakasˈema, sˈawa, na wafˈaɲe hˈivjo.|0
kwa hˈijo viɟˈana wˌakasimˈama, wˌakahˌesabˈiwa: wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini na wa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli kˈumi na wawˈili, na upˈande wa daˈudi kˈumi na wawˈili.|0
kˈiʃa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakakˌamatˈana na mpinzˈani wˌake kitʃwˈani na kˌutʃomˈana kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini pamˈoɟa. kwa hˈijo mahˈali pˈale katˌika ɡˌibeˈoni pˌakaˈitwa hˈelkaθ hˌasurˈimu.|0
sˈiku hˈijo vˈita vˌilikˈuwa vikˈali sˈana, nˌaje abnˈeri na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaʃˈindwa na wˈatu wa daˈudi.|0
wˈana watˈatu wa serˈuja wˌalikuwˈako hˌuko: nˌao ni joˈabu, ˌabiʃˈai na ˌasahˈeli. bˌasi hˈujo ˌasahˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na m̩bˈio kˌama pˈaa.|0
ˌasahˈeli ˌakamfukˈuza abnˈeri, pasˈipo kˌuɡeˈuka kulˈia wˈala kuʃˈoto wakˈati ˌakimfuˈata.|0
abnˈeri ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia ɲˈuma na kˌumuulˈiza, ni wˈewe, ˌasahˈeli? ˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo.|0
ndˈipo abnˈeri ˌakamwambˈia, ɡeˈuka upˈande wa kulˈia ˌau kuʃˈoto. mtʃukˈue mmˈoɟa wa viɟˈana wa kiˈume na umvˈue silˈaha zˈake. lakˈini ˌasahˈeli hˌakuˈatʃa kˌumfukˈuza.|0
abnˈeri ˌakamwˈoɲa tˈena ˌasahˈeli ˌakimwambˈia, ˈatʃa kˌunifukˈuza! kwa nˈini nˌikuˈue? ɟˈe, nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌumtazˈama ndˈuɡu jˈako joˈabu usˈoni.|0
lakˈini ˌasahˈeli ˌalikatˈaa kuˈatʃa kˌumfuatˈia, kwa hˈijo abnˈeri ˌakamtʃˈoma ˌasahˈeli tumbˈoni kwa ˈn̩tʃa bˈutu ja mkˈuki wˈake, mkˈuki ˌukamtobˈoa ˌukatokˈea mɡoŋɡˈoni mwˈake. ˌakaaŋɡˈuka na kˈufa pˈapo hˈapo. ikˈawa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalisimˈama ˌalipofˈika mahˈali pˈale ˌasahˈeli ˌalipˌoaŋɡˈuka na kˈufa.|0
lakˈini joˈabu na ˌabiʃˈai wˌalimfuˈata abnˈeri, na ɟˈua lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinatˈua, wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe kilˈima tʃa ˌama, karˈibu na ɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ja kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe ɲˈika ja ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini wˌakakˌusaɲˈika tˈena ɲˈuma ja abnˈeri. wˌakaˈunda kikˈosi na kˌuɟiˌimarˈiʃa ɟˌuːja kilˈima.|0
abnˈeri ˌakamwˈita joˈabu, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, ni lazˈima upˈaŋɡa ˌuendelˈee kˌuaŋɡamˈiza milˈele? hˌutambˈui kwˌamba ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitaiʃˈia katˌika utʃˈuŋɡu? ˌutaˈatʃa kˌuwaaɡˈiza wˈatu wˈako waˈatʃe kˌuwafˌuatilˈia ndˈuɡu zˈao hˌata lˈini.|0
joˈabu ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika kˌama ˌaiʃˈivjo mˈuŋɡu, kˌama hˌukusˈema, hˈawa wˈatu wˌaŋɡeˌendelˈea kˌuwafˌuatˈia ndˈuɡu zˈao mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
bˌasi joˈabu ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakasimˈama, hˌawakˌuwafuˈata ˌisraˈeli tˈena, wˈala hˌawakˌuwapˈiɡa tˈena.|0
usˈiku ˈule wˈote abnˈeri na wˈatu wˌake wˌakatembˈea kˌupitˈia arˈaba. wˌakavˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani, wˌakaˌendelˈea wˌakipitˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja biθrˈoni wˌakafˈika mˌahanaˈimu.|0
bˌasi joˈabu ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka kˌumfuatˈia abnˈeri, na kˌuwakusˈaɲa wˈatu wˌake wˈote. pamˈoɟa na ˌasahˈeli, wˈatu kˈumi na tˈisa wa daˈudi wˌalikˈuwa wˌamepotˈea.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewaˈua wˈatu wa kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini mˌiatˈatunˌa sitˈini wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa na abnˈeri.|0
wˌakamtʃukˈua ˌasahˈeli, wˌakamzˈika katˌika kabˈuri la bˈaba jˌake hˌuko bˌeθlehˈemu. kˈiʃa joˈabu na wˈatu wˌake wˌakatembˈea usˈiku kˈutʃa na kufˈika hˌuko hebrˈoni wakˈati wa mˌapambazˈuko.|0
vˈita kˈati ja ɲˈumba ja saˈuli na ɲˈumba ja daˈudi vˌilidˈumu kwa mˈuda mrˈefu. daˈudi ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwa imˈara zaˈidi na zaˈidi, wakˈati ɲˈumba ja saˈuli ˌiliˌendelˈea kˌuðoofˈika zaˈidi na zaˈidi.|0
wˈana wˌalizalˈiwa kwa daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni: mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa amnˈoni mwˈana wa ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli.|0
mzalˈiwa wˌake wa pˈili ˌalikˈuwa dˌaniˈeli mwˈana wa ˌabiɡaˈili, mɟˈane wa nabˈali wa karmˈeli; wa tˈatu, ˌabsalˈomu mwˈana wa maˈaka, bˈinti talmˈai mfˈalme wa ɡeʃˈuri.|0
wa ˈn̩ne, ˌadonˈija mwˈana wa haɡˈiθi; wa tˈano, ʃˌefatˈia mwˈana wa ˌabitˈali.|0
wa sˈita, ˌiθreˈamu mwˈana wa ˈeɡla, mkˈewe daˈudi. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwa daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni.|0
wakˈati wa vˈita kˈati ja ɲˈumba ja saˈuli na ɲˈumba ja daˈudi, abnˈeri ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaɟˌiimarˈiʃa katˌika nafˈasi jˌake kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja saˈuli.|0
bˌasi saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈuwa na surˈia, ɟˈina lˈake rˈispa bˈinti wa aˈija. nˌaje ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi ˌakamwambˈia abnˈeri, kwa nˈini ˌumekutˈana kimwˈili na surˈia wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
abnˈeri ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana kwa sabˈabu ja kˈile ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi ˌalitʃosˈema, nˌaje ˌakamɟˈibu, ɟˈe, mˌimi ni kˈitʃwa tʃa ˈm̩bwa, kwa upˈande wa jˈuda? sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo mˌimi ni mtiˈifu kwa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako saˈuli, kwa ɟamˈaa jˌake na rafˈiki zˈake. sˌiɟakˌukabˈiði kwa daˈudi, lakˈini bˈado ˌunanˌilaˈumu kwa kˈosa la kˌuhusˈika na hˈuju mwanˈamke.|0
mˈuŋɡu na ˌamʃuɣˌulikˈie abnˈeri, tˈena kwa ukˈali, ikˈiwa sˌitafˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi kˈile bwˈana ˌalitʃˌomwahˈidi kwa kiˈapo.|0
na kˌuuhamˈiʃa ufˈalme kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja saˈuli na kˌuimarˈiʃa kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa daˈudi ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda kˌuanzˈia dˈani mpˈaka bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi hˌakuθubˈutu kusˈema nˈeno ɟiŋɡˈine kwa abnˈeri, kwa sabˈabu ˌalimwoɡˈopa abnˈeri.|0
ndˈipo abnˈeri ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa niˈaba jˌake kwa daˈudi, kˌumwambˈia, ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ni ja nˈani? fˈaɲa mˌapatˈano na mˈimi, nˌami nˌitakˌusaidˈia kˌuiwˈeka ˌisraˈeli jˈote ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, vjˈema, nˌitafˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˈawe. lakˈini nˌahitˈaɟi ɟˈambo mˈoɟa kwˈako: usˈiɟe mbˈele jˈaŋɡu mpˈaka ˌumemlˈeta mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli wakˈati ˌutakˌapokˈuɟa kˌuniˈona.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakapelˈeka waɟˈumbe kwa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli, kudˈai, nˈipe mikˈali ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje nˌilimpˈosa mweɲˈewe kwa mahˈari ja maɡˈovi mˌiamˈoɟa ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
kwa hˈijo ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kwˌamba mikˈali ˌatʃukulˈiwe kutˈoka kwa pˌaltiˈeli mumˈewe, mwˈana wa laˈiʃi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mumˈewe ˌalikwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌakilˈia ɲˈuma ja mkˈewe ɲɟˈia jˈote hˌadi bˌahurˈimu. ndˈipo abnˈeri ˌakamwambˈia pˌaltiˈeli, rˈudi ɲumbˈani! kwa hˈijo ˌakarˈudi.|0
abnˈeri ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri pamˈoɟa na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakasˈema, mˈuda mrˈefu mmetˈaka kumfˈaɲa daˈudi mfˈalme wˈenu.|0
sˈasa faɲˈeni hˈivjo! kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌalimwahˈidi daˈudi ˌakisˈema, kwa kˌupitˈia daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌitawˌaokˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti na kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈako wˈote..|0
pˈia abnˈeri mweɲˈewe ˌakazuŋɡˈumza na kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini. kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda mpˈaka hebrˈoni kˌumwambˈia daˈudi kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba jˈote ja bˌeɲamˈini wˌalitʃotˈaka kufˈaɲa.|0
wakˈati abnˈeri ˌalijekˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈini pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌalipokˈuɟa kwa daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni, daˈudi ˌakamwˌandalˈia karˈamu pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake.|0
ndˈipo abnˈeri ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, niˈatʃe niˈende mˈara mˈoɟa nˌikakusˈaɲe ˌisraˈeli jˈote kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˌili wawˈeze kufˈaɲa mˌapatˈano na wˈewe, ˌili kwˌamba uwˈeze kˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja jˈote jˈale ambˈajo mˈojo wˈako ˌunaonˈea ʃaˈuku. bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamuˈaɡa abnˈeri, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda kwa amˈani.|0
wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo, wˈatu wa daˈudi na joˈabu wˌalirˈudi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌuʃambulˈia, nˌao wˌakarˈudi na ɲˈara ɲˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no. lakˈini abnˈeri hakˈuwa tˈena pamˈoɟa na daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni, kwa sabˈabu daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemruhˈusu aˈende zˈake, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda kwa amˈani.|0
joˈabu na askˈari wˈote ˌaliokˈuwa nˌao wˌalipˌowasˈili, ˌaliambˈiwa kwˌamba abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈuɟa kwa mfˈalme na kwˌamba mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemruhˈusu aˈende zˈake, na kwˌamba ˌalikwˈiʃa ondˈoka kwa amˈani.|0
bˌasi joˈabu ˌalikwˈenda kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia, ni nˈini hˈiki ˌulitʃofˈaɲa? tazˈama, abnˈeri ˌalikˈuɟa kwˈako. kwa nˈini ˌukamwˈatʃa aˈende? sˈasa ˌamekwˈenda.|0
waɟˈua abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri ˌalikˈuɟa kˌukudaŋɡˈaɲa na kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza ɲˈendo zˈako na kupˈata kˈila kˈitu ˌunatʃˌokifˈaɲa.|0
ndˈipo joˈabu ˌakamwˈatʃa daˈudi na kutˈuma waɟˈumbe wˌamfuˈate abnˈeri, nˌao wˌakamrudˈiʃa kutˈoka kisˈima tʃa sˈira. lakˈini daˈudi hˌakufahˈamu ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
bˌasi abnˈeri ˌaliporˈudi hebrˈoni, joˈabu ˌakamtʃukˈua kˈando ndˈani ja lˈaŋɡo, kˌama vˈile kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje fˌaraɣˈani. ˌili kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi dˈamu ja nduɡˈuje ˌasahˈeli, joˈabu ˌakamtʃˈoma mkˈuki tumbˈoni pˌalepˈale, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
bˌaadˈaje, daˈudi ˌalipˌosikˈia kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakasˈema, mˌimi na ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu kˈamwe hatˈuna hatˈia mbˈele za bwˈana kuhˈusu dˈamu ja abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri.|0
dˈamu jˌake na ˈiwe ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa joˈabu na ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba jˈote ja bˈaba jˈake! kˈamwe ˌasikˌosekˈane jejˈote katˌika ɲˈumba ja joˈabu mwˌeɲe kidˈonda tʃˌeɲe usˈaha, ˌau ukˈoma ˌau mwˌeɲe kˌueɡemˈea fˈimbo ˌau ˌaaŋɡukˈaje kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌau kˌupuŋɡukˈiwa na tʃakˈula.|0
joˈabu na ˌabiʃˈai ndˈuɡu jˌake wˌalimuˈua abnˈeri kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemuˈua ˌasahˈeli ndˈuɡu jˈao katˌika vˈita hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni..|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu na wˈatu wˈote ˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao, rˌaruˈeni ŋɡˈuo zˈenu na mvˈae ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia na mtembˈee mkˌiombolˈeza mbˈele ja abnˈeri. mfˈalme daˈudi mweɲˈewe ˌakatembˈea ɲˈuma ja ɟenˈeza.|0
wˌakamzˈika abnˈeri hˌuko hebrˈoni, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti kwˈeɲe kabˈuri la abnˈeri. pˈia wˈatu wˈote wˌakalˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaˈimba ˌombolˈezo hˈili kwa aɟˈili ja abnˈeri: ɟˈe, ˌilipˈasa abnˈeri ˈafe kˌama afˈavjo mpumbˈavu.|0
mikˈono jˈako hˌaikufˈuŋɡwa, miɡˈuu jˈako hˌaikufˈuŋɡwa pˈiŋɡu. ˌuliaŋɡˈuka kˌama jˌeje ˌaaŋɡukˈaje mbˈele ja wˈatu waˈovu. nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakamlilˈia tˈena.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wakˈaɟa kumsˈihi daˈudi ˈale tʃotʃˈote kˌulipokˈuwa kuŋɡˈali bˈado mtʃˈana; lakˈini daˈudi ˌakaˈapa, ˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu na ˌaniʃˌuɣulikˈie, tˈena kwa ukˈali, kˌama nˌikiˈoɲɟa mkˈate ˌau kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote kˈabla ja ɟˈua kutˈua.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌakaˈona hˌilo nˌao ˌikawˌapendˈeza; nˈaam, kˈila kˈitu mfˈalme ˌalitʃofˈaɲa kˌiliwˌapendˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈiku ˈile wˈatu wˈote na ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌakaɟˈua kwˌamba mfˈalme hˌakuʃirˈiki katˌika mˌauˈaɟi ja abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈake, ɟˈe, hˌamfahˈamu kwˌamba m̩kˈuu na ˈm̩tu mˌaʃuhˈuri ˌameaŋɡˈuka katˌika ˌisraˈeli lˈeo.|0
nˌami lˈeo iŋɡˈawa ni mfˈalme mpˈakwa mafˈuta, mˌimi ni ðaˈifu, nˌao hˈawa wˈana wa serˈuja wˌananizˈidi ŋɡˈuvu. bwˈana na ˌamlipˈize mtˈenda maˈovu sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˌake maˈovu.|0
ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba abnˈeri ˌamekˈufa hˌuko hebrˈoni, ˌakakˈosa ˌuɟasˈiri, nˈajo ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌakatˈiwa hˈofu kˈuu.|0
bˌasi mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa na wˈatu wawˈili wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa vikˈundi vja ˌuvamˈizi. mmˈoɟa ˌaliˈitwa baˈana na mwiŋɡˈine rekˈabu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa rimˈoni, mbˌeerˈoθi, kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini. bˌeerˈoθi ˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa sehˈemu ja bˌeɲamˈini.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wa bˌeerˈoθi wˌalikˌimbilˈia hˌuko ɡˌitaˈimu na wˌameˈiʃi hˌuko kˌama waɡˈeni mpˈaka sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo.|0
jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa na mwˈana ˌalijekˈuwa mlemˈavu miɡˈuu jˈote miwˈili. ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka mitˈano wakˈati habˈari kuhˈusu saˈuli na jˌonaθˈani zˌilipofˈika kutˈoka jˌezreˈeli. jˈaja wˌake ˌakambˈeba ˌili kˌukimbˈia, lakˈini jˈaja ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanahˌarakˈiʃa kˌuondˈoka, mtˈoto ˌaliaŋɡˈuka akˈawa kiwˈete. ɟˈina lˈake ˌaliˈitwa mˌefiboʃˈeθi..|0
bˌasi rekˈabu na baˈana, wˈana wa rimˈoni mbˌeerˈoθi wˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi, nˌao wˌalifˈika hˌuko wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa kwˈeɲe mˌapumzˈiko jˌake ja mtʃˈana.|0
wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani kˈana kwˌamba wˌanatʃukˈua ŋɡˈano, wˌakamtʃˈoma ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mkˈuki wa tumbˈoni. ndˈipo rekˈabu na baˈana nduɡˈuje wˌakatorˈoka.|0
wˌalikˈuwa wˌameiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamelˈala kˌitandˈani tʃumbˈani kwˈake. baˌada ja kumtʃˈoma mkˈuki na kˌumuˈua, wˌalikˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈake. wakˈiwa wˌamekˌitʃukˈua, wˌalitembˈea usˈiku kˈutʃa kwa ɲɟˈia ja arˈaba.|0
wˌakamletˈea daˈudi kˈitʃwa tʃa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi hˌuko hebrˈoni, wˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, hˈiki hˈapa kˈitʃwa tʃa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli, adˈui jˈako, ˌalijˌeɟarˈibu kˌuondˈoa uhˈai wˈako. sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo bwˈana ˌamemlipˈia kisˈasi mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja saˈuli na m̩zˈao wˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakawaɟˈibu rekˈabu na baˈana nduɡˈuje, wˈana wa rimˈoni, mbˌeerˈoθi, ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ambˈaje ˌamenˌiokˈoa kutˈoka taˈabu zˈote.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌoniambˈia, saˈuli ˌamekˈufa, ˌakaðˈani ˌananˌiletˈea habˈari ɲɟˈema, nˌilimkamˈata, nˌikamuˈua hˌuko siklˈaɡi. hˈijo n̩dˈijo zawˈadi nˌilijˈompa kwa aɟˈili ja tˌaarˈifa jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi zaˈidi wakˈati wˈatu waˈovu wˌamemuˈua ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia akˈiwa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˌake mweɲˈewe na kwˈeɲe kitˈanda tʃˈake mweɲˈewe? ɟˈe, sˈasa nˌisidˈai dˈamu jˌake mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu na kˌuwaondˈoa dˌuniˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˈatu wˈake, wˌakawaˈua. wˌakakˈata mikˈono jˈao na miɡˈuu, na kˌutundˈika vˌiwiliwˈili vjˈao kˈando ja dˈimbwi hˌuko hebrˈoni. lakˈini wˌakakˌitʃukˈua kˈitʃwa tʃa ˈiʃ boʃˈeθi na kˌukizˈika katˌika kabˈuri la abnˈeri hˌuko hebrˈoni.|0
mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli jˌakamɟˈia daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni na kˌumwambˈia, sˌisi tu ɲˈama jˈako na dˈamu jˈako hˈasa.|0
wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakamwendˈea mfˈalme daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni, mfˈalme ˌakafˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˌao hˌuko hebrˈoni mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌao wˌakamtˈia daˈudi mafˈuta kˌuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka θˌelaθˈini ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
hˌuko hebrˈoni ˌalitawˈala jˈuda kwa miˈaka sˈaba na miˈezi sˈita, na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu ˌalitawˈala ˌisraˈeli jˈote na jˈuda kwa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mitˈatu.|0
mfˈalme na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˈenda jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌajebˈusi wˌalioˈiʃi hˈumo. wˌajebˈusi wˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, wˌewe hˌutaiŋɡˈia hˈumu, kwˈani hˌata vipˈofu na viwˈete wˌanawˈeza kˌukufukˈuza. wˌaliðˈani, daˈudi hawˈezi kˌuiŋɡˈia hˈumu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, daˈudi ˌakaitˈeka ŋɡˈome ja sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
sˈiku ˈile, daˈudi ˌakasˈema, jejˈote ambˈaje ˌatawaʃˈinda wˌajebˈusi, ˌatatumˈia hˈuo mferˈeɟi kˌuwafikˈia hˈao viwˈete na vipˈofu ambˈao ni adˈui za daˈudi. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌanasˈema,  vipˈofu na viwˈete hˌawatˌaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la ufˈalme.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa makˈao ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome na kˌuiˈita ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa enˈeo lˌinalˌozuŋɡˈuka kˌuanzˈia mˈilo kˌuelekˈea ndˈani.|0
daˈudi ˌakazˈidi kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na zaˈidi, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
bˌasi hirˈamu mfˈalme wa tˈiro ˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa daˈudi, wakˈiwa na maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi, mˌaseremˈala na waˈaʃi, nˌao wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌakafahˈamu kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamemwˌimarˈiʃa kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli na ˌameinˈua ufˈalme wˌake kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu wˈake.|0
baˌada ja daˈudi kˌuondˈoka hebrˈoni, ˌakaɟˌitwalˈia mˌasurˈia zaˈidi na wˌake hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, nˌao wˈana na bˈinti wˈeŋɡi wˌalizalˈiwa kwˈake.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja watˈoto wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwˈake hˌuko: ʃamˈua, ʃobˈabu, naθˈani, sˌolomˈoni.|0
ˌibihˈari, ˌeliʃˈua, nefˈeɡi, jafˈia.|0
ˌeliʃˈama, ˌeliˈada na ˌelifelˈeti.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa daˈudi ˌametˈiwa mafˈuta kˌuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, wˌakapˈanda na ɟˈeʃi lˈao lˈote kwˈenda kumsˈaka, lakˈini daˈudi ˌakapˈata habˈari hˈizo, nˌaje ˌakaterˈemka kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa na kˌusambˈaa kwˈeɲe bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, ɟˈe, niˈende kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌafilˈisti? ɟˈe, ˌutawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu? bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈenda, kwa maˈana hakˈika nˌitawatˈia wˌafilˈisti mˌikonˈoni mwˈako.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakaˈenda mpˈaka bˈaal pˌerasˈimu, na hˌuko ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌafilˈisti. ˌakasˈema, kˌama mˌafurˈiko jˌafurikˈavjo, bwˈana ˌamewˌafurikˈia adˈui zˈaŋɡu mbˈele jˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo mahˈali hˈapo pˌakaˈitwa bˈaal pˌerasˈimu.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌalikwˈea kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine na kˌusambˈaa katˌika bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌusipˈande mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa, bˌali wˌazuŋɡukˈie kwa ɲˈuma na ˌuwaʃˌambulˈie mbˈele ja mˈiti ja mˌiforosˈadi.|0
mˈara ˌutakˌaposikˈia saˈuti ja kˌutembˈea kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vilˈele vja mˈiti ja mˌiforosˈadi, nˈenda harˈaka, kwa sabˈabu hˈijo ˌitamˌaanˈiʃa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌametˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈako kupˈiɡa ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwaɡˈiza, nˌaje ˌakawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa wˌafilˈisti ɲɟˈia jˈote kˌuanzˈia ɡˈeba hˌadi ɡezˈeri.|0
jˌeje na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌakatˈoka baˈala ja jˈuda kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka hˌuko, lˌinaloˈitwa kwa ɟˈina, nˈaam, ɟˈina la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ambˈaje ˌanakˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˈati ja mˌakerˈubi wˌaliˈoko ɟˌuːja hˌilo sandˈuku.|0
wˌakawˈeka hˌilo sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu ɟˌuːja ɡˈari ɟˈipja la kˌukokˈotwa na kˌulilˈeta kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ˌabinadˈabu, ˌilijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja kilˈima. ˈuza na ahˈio, wˈana wa ˌabinadˈabu, wˌalikˈuwa wˌakioŋɡˈoza hˌilo ɡˈari ɟˈipja la kˌukokˈotwa.|0
likˈiwa na sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈake, nˌaje ahˈio ˌalikˈuwa ˌanatembˈea akˈiwa mbˈele jˈake.|0
daˈudi na ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌanatʃˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˈote, kwa ɲˈimbo, vinˈubi, zˈeze, matˈari, kajˈamba na mˌatoˈazi.|0
wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka wa nakˈoni, ˈuza ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono na kˌuliʃˈika sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kwa sabˈabu maksˈai wˌaliɟikwˈaa.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˈuza kwa sabˈabu ja kitˈendo tʃˈake tʃa kukˈosa heʃˈima, kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu ˌakampˈiɡa ˌakafˈia pˈapo hˈapo kˈando ja sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakakˌasirˈika kwa sabˈabu ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ˌilifurˈika ðˈidi ja ˈuza, hˈivjo hˌadi lˈeo mahˈali hˈapo pˌanaˈitwa pˈeres ˈuza.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwoɡˈopa bwˈana sˈiku ˈile, ˌakasˈema, ni ɟˈinsi ɡˈani sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌitakˌavjowˈeza kˌuniɟˈia.|0
hakˈuwa rˈaði kˌulitʃukˈua sandˈuku la bwˈana kwˈake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. badˈala jˌake ˌakalˌipelˈeka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja ˈobed edˈomu, mɡˈiti.|0
sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌikabˈaki katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˈobed edˈomu, mɡˈiti, kwa miˈezi mitˈatu, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakambarˈiki pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba jˌake jˈote.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaambˈiwa, bwˈana ˌameˌibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja ˈobed edˈomu pamˈoɟa na kˈila alˈitʃo nˈatʃo, kwa sabˈabu ja sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu. bˌasi daˈudi ˌakaterˈemka na kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ˈobed edˈomu hˌadi ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamebˈeba sandˈuku la bwˈana wˌalipokˈuwa wˌametembˈea hatˈua sˈita, daˈudi ˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu fahˈali na ndˈama ˌalijˌenonˈeʃwa.|0
daˈudi, akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa kˌisibˈau tʃa kitˈani, ˌalitʃˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˈote.|0
wakˈati jˌeje na ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalipˌopandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe na saˈuti za tˌarumbˈeta.|0
ikˈawa sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli ˌakatʃˌuŋɡulˈia dˌiriʃˈani. nˌaje ˌalipomwˈona mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakirˌukarˈuka na kutʃˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌakamðarˈau mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
wˌakalˈeta sandˈuku la bwˈana na kˌuliwˈeka mahˈali pˈake ndˈani ja hˈema ambˈalo daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˌisimamˈiʃa kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
baˌada ja kˌumalˈiza kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani, daˈudi ˌakawˌabarˈiki wˈatu katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatˈoa mkˈate, andˈazi la tˈende na andˈazi la zabˈibu kˈavu kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu katˌika mkutˈano wˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli, wˌanaˈume kwa wˌanawˈake. nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌaliporˈudi ˌili kˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake, mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kumlˈaki, ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama ɟˈinsi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalivjˌoɟibˌainˈiʃa mweɲˈewe lˈeo kwa kuvˈua mavˈazi jˌake matʃˈoni pa vˌiɟakˈazi wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo ˈm̩tu asˈije na adˈabu ˌaŋɡelifˈaɲa.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia mikˈali, nˌilifˈaɲa hˈivjo mbˈele za bwˈana ambˈaje ˌalinˌitʃaɡˈua mˌimi badˈala ja bˈaba jˈako ˌau mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote kutˈoka ɲˈumba jˌake wakˈati ˌalipˌoniwˈeka nˈiwe mtawˈala ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu wa bwˈana. kwa hˈijo nˌitatʃˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
nˌitakˈuwa asˈije na heʃˈima zaˈidi kulˈiko sˈasa, nˌami nˌitaɟiʃˈuʃa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. lakˈini kwa hˈawa vˌiɟakˈazi ˌuliosˈema habˈari zˈao nˌitahˌeʃimˈiwa.|0
nˌaje mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli hakˈuwa na watˈoto mpˈaka sˈiku ja kˈufa kwˈake.|0
ˌakamwambˈia nabˈii naθˈani, mˌimi hˈapa, nˌinaˈiʃi katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mˌierˈezi, wakˈati sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌimebˈaki katˌika hˈema.|0
naθˈani ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, lolˈote ulˈilo nˈalo mojˈoni, ˌendelˈea ˌukalifˈaɲe, kwa maˈana bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
usˈiku ˈule nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia naθˈani, kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ɟˈe, ˈewe ndˈiwe wa kˌuniɟeŋɡˈea mˌimi ɲˈumba ˌili nikˈae ndˈani jˈake.|0
sˌiɟakˈaa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ʃˈu sˈiku nˌilijˌowalˈeta wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri hˌadi lˈeo. nˌimekˈuwa nˌikitembˈea kutˈoka mahˈali pamˈoɟa hˌadi mahˈali peŋɡˈine ndˈani ja hˈema kˌama makˈao jˈaŋɡu.|0
popˈote nˌilipˌotembˈea pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, ɟˈe, nˌimewˈahi kˌumwambˈia kˌioŋɡˈozi wˌao jejˈote nˌilijˌemwamˈuru kˌuwatʃˈuŋɡa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, kwa nˈini hˌuɟanˌiɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba ja mˌierˈezi? .|0
sˈasa bˈasi, mwambˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˌilikutˈoa wˌewe kutˈoka mˌatʃuŋɡˈani na kutˈoka kˌuandˈama kˈundi la kondˈoo na mbˈuzi ˌili kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌimekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe popˈote ˌulipokwˈenda, nˌami nˌimekˌuondolˈea mbˈali adˈui zˈako wˈote mbˈele jˈako. bˌasi nˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈina lˈako kˌuwa kˈuu kˌama maɟˈina ja wˈatu walˈio wakˈuu sˈana dˌuniˈani.|0
nˌami nˌitawˌapatˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli mahˈali nˌiwapˈande hˈumo ˌili kwˌamba wˈawe na ɲumbˈani kwˈao weɲˈewe wˌasisˌumbulˈiwe tˈena. wˈatu waˈovu hˌawatˌawaonˈea tˈena, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa mwanzˈoni.|0
na kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa ʃˈu mwˈanzo wakˈati nˌilipˌowawˈeka vˌioŋɡˈozi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli. pˈia nˌitawˈapa rˈaha mbˈele ja adˈui zˈenu wˈote.  bwˈana ˌakuambˈia kwˌamba bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌatakˌuɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba.|0
sˈiku zˈako zˌitakˌapokwˈiʃa nˌawe ulˈale pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈako, nˌitainˈua m̩zˈao wˈako ˌaiŋɡˈie mahˈali pˈako, ambˈaje ˌatatˈoka vˌiunˈoni mwˈako, nˌami nˌitaˌuimarˈiʃa ufˈalme wˈake.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitaˌimarˈiʃa kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ufˈalme wˌake milˈele.|0
nˌitakˈuwa bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa mwanˈaŋɡu. ˌatakˌapokosˈea nˌitamwaðˈibu kwa fˈimbo ja wˌanadˈamu, kwa aðˈabu ja kupˈiɡwa na wˌanadˈamu.|0
lakˈini upˈendo wˈaŋɡu kˈamwe hˌautˌaondolˈewa kwˈake, kˌama nˌilivjˌouondˈoa kwa saˈuli, nˌilijˌemwondˈoa atˈoke mbˈele jˈako.|0
ɲˈumba jˈako na ufˈalme wˈako ˌutadˈumu milˈele mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌitafˈaɲua imˈara milˈele..|0
naθˈani ˌakamwarˈifu daˈudi manˈeno jˈote ja maˈono hˈaja.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani, ˌakakˈeti mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌakasˈema: ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, mˌimi ni nˈani, na ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu ni nˈini, hˌata ˌumenilˈeta mpˈaka hˈapa nilˈipo.|0
