nˈaam, kˈana kwˌamba hˈili hˌalitˈoʃi matʃˈoni pˈako, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, wˌewe ˌumenˈena pˈia kuhˈusu sˈiku ziɟˈazo za ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako. ɟˈe, hˌii n̩dˈijo ɲɟˈia jˈako ja kˌawaˈida ja kˌuʃuɣulˈika na mwˌanadˈamu, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
ɟˈe, daˈudi awˈeza kˌukuambˈia nˈini zaˈidi? kwa maˈana ˌunamɟˈua mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja nˈeno lˈako na kwa mapˈenzi jˈako, ˌumefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili kˈubwa na kˌulifˈaɲa lˌiɟulikˈane na lˌifahamˈike kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo m̩kˈuu, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi! hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine kˌama wˈewe, wˈala hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu ˈila wˈewe, kˌama vˈile tˌulivjˌosikˈia kwa mˌasikˈio jˈetu weɲˈewe.|0
nˌaje ni nˈani alˈije kˌama wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, taˈifa pekˈee dˌuniˈani ambˈalo mˈuŋɡu ˌalitˈoka kwˈenda kˌulikombˈoa kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe, na kˌuɟifaɲˈia ɟˈina mweɲˈewe, kwa kufˈaɲa mˌaaɟˈabu makˈubwa na ja kutˈiʃa kwa kˌuwafukˈuza mˌataˈifa na miˈuŋɡu jˈao mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈako, ambˈao ˌuliwˌakombˈoa kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
ˌumeˌimarˈiʃa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli hˈasa kˌama wˈatu wˈako mweɲˈewe milˈele, nˈawe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumekˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
bˌasi sˈasa, bwˈana, ˌukaˌitimˈize ahˈadi ˌulijosˈema kuhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ɲˈumba jˌake milˈele. fˈaɲa kˌama ˌulivjˌoahˈidi.|0
ˌili kwˌamba ɟˈina lˈako lˌitukˈuke milˈele. ndˈipo wˈatu wˌatasˈema, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ni mˈuŋɡu ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli! nˈajo ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi ˌitakˈuwa imˈara mbˈele zˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌumelˌifunˈua hˈili kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌukisˈema, nˌitakˌuɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba. hˈivjo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamepˈata ˌuɟasˈiri kˌukuletˈea dˈua hˌii.|0
ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu! manˈeno jˈako n̩dˈijo kwˈeli, nˌawe ˌumemwahˈidi mtumˈiʃi wˈako mˈambo hˈaja mazˈuri.|0
sˈasa naˈomba ˈuwe rˈaði kˌuibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌili idˈumu mbˈele zˈako milˈele, kwa maˈana wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌumesˈema, na kwa barˈaka zˈako ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌitaˌendelˈea kˌubarikˈiwa milˈele.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, daˈudi ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌafilˈisti na kˌuwatiˈiʃa, nˌaje ˌakautwˈaa mˈeθeɡ ˈamma kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
pˈia daˈudi ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌamoˈabu. ˌakawafˈaɲa walˈale tʃˈini kwa mstˈari ˌakawapˈima kwa urˈefu wa kˈamba. kˈila ˌalipopˈima urˈefu wa hˈijo kˈamba mˈara mbˈili hˌilo kˈundi wˌaliuˈawa na ˌalipopˈima mˈara ja tˈatu ˌaliwaˈatʃa hˈai. kwa hˈijo wˌamoˈabu wakˈawa tʃˈini ja daˈudi nˌao wˌakamletˈea kˈodi.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, daˈudi ˌakapiɡˈana na hˌadadezˈeri mwˈana wa rehˈobu, mfˈalme wa sˈoba, ˌalipokwˈenda kˌurudˈiʃa tˈena ˌutawˈala wˌake kwˈeɲe enˈeo la ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈeka maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, askˈari wapˈanda farˈasi sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na askˈari ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatembeˈao kwa miɡˈuu. daˈudi ˌakawakˈata wˈale farˈasi wˈote wˌakokotˈao maɡˈari miʃˈipa ja miɡˈuu, ˌisipokˈuwa farˈasi mˌiamˈoɟa hˌakuwakˈata.|0
wˌaarˈamu wa damˈeski wˌalipokˈuɟa kˌumsaidˈia hˌadadezˈeri mfˈalme wa sˈoba, daˈudi ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia na kˌuwaˈua ˌiʃirˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˈeka askˈari walˈinzi katˌika ufˈalme wa wˌaarˈamu hˌuko damˈeski, nˌao wˌaarˈamu wakˈawa watˈumwa wˌake na kumlˈipa uʃˈuru. bwˈana akˈampa daˈudi uʃˈindi kˈote ˌalipokwˈenda.|0
daˈudi ˌakazitwˈaa ŋɡˈao za ðahˈabu zˌilizokˈuwa za mˌaafˈisa wa hˌadadezˈeri na kˌuzilˈeta jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja bˈeta na bˌeroθˈai, ˌilijokˈuwa mˈiɟi ja hˌadadezˈeri, mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakatwˈaa ʃˈaba ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
tˈou, mfˈalme wa hamˈaθi, ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba daˈudi ˌameliʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi lˈote la hˌadadezˈeri.|0
ˌakamtˈuma mwanˈawe jorˈamu kwa mfˈalme daˈudi kˌumsalˈimu na kˌumpoŋɡˈeza kwa uʃˈindi wˌake katˌika vˈita ðˈidi ja hˌadadezˈeri, kwa kˌuwa hˌadadezˈeri ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepiɡˈana vˈita na tˈou. jorˈamu ˌakamletˈea daˈudi vjˈombo vja fˈeða, ðahˈabu na ʃˈaba.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaviwˈeka vifˈaa hˈivi wˈakfu kwa bwˈana, kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa kwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamejaʃˈinda.|0
jaˈani edˈomu, moˈabu, wˌaamˈoni, wˌafilˈisti na wˌaamalˈeki. pˈia ˌakawˈeka wˈakfu ɲˈara ˌalizotˈeka kutˈoka kwa hˌadadezˈeri mwˈana wa rehˈobu, mfˈalme wa sˈoba.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌakapˈata sˈifa baˌada ja kurˈudi kutˈoka kˌuwaˈua wˌaedˈomu kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika bˈonde la tʃˈumvi.|0
ˌakawˈeka kˈambi za askˈari walˈinzi katˌika edˈomu jˈote, nˌao wˌaedˈomu wakˈawa tʃˈini ja daˈudi. bwˈana ˌalimpatˈia daˈudi uʃˈindi kˈila ˌalipokwˈenda.|0
daˈudi ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli jˈote, ˌakitˈenda lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa kwa wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi; jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa ˌahilˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
sadˈoki mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu na ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌabiaθˈari wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani; serˈaja ˌalikˈuwa mwandˈiʃi.|0
benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi; nˌao wˈana wa daˈudi wˌalikˈuwa wˌaʃaˈuri wa mfˈalme.|0
daˈudi ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu hˌata mmˈoɟa wa ɲˈumba ja saˈuli ˌalijebˈaki ambˈaje nawˈeza kˌumtendˈea wˈema kwa aɟˈili ja jˌonaθˈani.|0
bˌasi pˌalikuwˈepo mtumˈiʃi wa ɲˈumba ja saˈuli ˌalijeˈitwa sˈiba. wˌakamwˈita ˈaɟe mbˈele ja daˈudi, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ndˈiwe sˈiba? ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈaam, mˌimi n̩dˈije mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hakˈuna jejˈote ambˈaje ˌamebˈaki wa ɲˈumba ja saˈuli nˌinajewˈeza kˌumwoɲˈeʃa wˈema wa mˈuŋɡu? sˈiba ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, bˈado jˈupo mwˈana wa jˌonaθˈani, jˌeje ni kiwˈete miɡˈuu jˈote.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi? sˈiba ˌakaɟˈibu, jˈuko ɲumbˈani kwa makˈiri mwˈana wa ˌamiˈeli hˌuko lˈo debˈari.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakamtˈaka alˈetwe kutˈoka lˈo debˈari, kutˈoka ɲumbˈani kwa makˈiri mwˈana wa ˌamiˈeli.|0
mˌefiboʃˈeθi mwˈana wa jˌonaθˈani, mwˈana wa saˈuli, ˌalipofˈika kwa daˈudi, ˌakainˈama kˈumpa mfˈalme heʃˈima. daˈudi ˌakamwˈita, mˌefiboʃˈeθi! mˌefiboʃˈeθi ˌakaɟˈibu, ndˈimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusioɡˈope, kwa maˈana hakˈika nˌitakˌutendˈea wˈema kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba jˈako jˌonaθˈani. nˌitakˌurudiʃˈia ˈarði jˈote ˌilijokˈuwa mˈali ja saˈuli bˈaba jˈako, nˌawe daˈima ˌutakˈula tʃakˈula mezˈani pˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌefiboʃˈeθi ˌakasuɟˈudu ˌakasˈema, mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako ni nˈini hˌata ˌuaŋɡalˈie ˈm̩bwa ˈm̩fu kˌama mˈimi.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakamwˈita sˈiba mtumˈiʃi wa saˈuli na kˌumwambˈia, nimˈempa mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈako kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa mˈali ja saˈuli na ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
wˈewe, wanˈao na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako mtˌamlimˈia maʃˈamba mˌefiboʃˈeθi na kˌumletˈea mavˈuno, ˌili kwˌamba mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈako apˈate mˌahitˈaɟi jˈake. nˌaje mˌefiboʃˈeθi mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈako ˌatakˈula tʃakˈula mezˈani pˈaŋɡu daˈima. sˈiba ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana kˈumi na watˈano, na wˌatumˈiʃi ˌiʃirˈini..|0
ndˈipo sˈiba ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatafˈaɲa tʃotʃˈote bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌatakˌatʃoaɡˈiza mtumˈiʃi wˌake kufˈaɲa. bˌasi mˌefiboʃˈeθi akˈala tʃakˈula mezˈani pa daˈudi kˌama mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
mˌefiboʃˈeθi ˌalikˈuwa na mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo ˌalijeˈitwa mˈika, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wa ɲˈumba ja sˈiba wˌalikˈuwa wˌatumˈiʃi wa mˌefiboʃˈeθi.|0
nˌaje mˌefiboʃˈeθi ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, kwa sabˈabu daˈima ˌalikˈula mezˈani pa mfˈalme, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa kiwˈete miɡˈuu jˈote.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni akˈafa, nˌaje hanˈuni mwanˈawe ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˈaza, nˌitamtendˈea wˈema hanˈuni mwˈana wa nahˈaʃi, kˌama vˈile bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjˌonitendˈea mˌimi wˈema. hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌuoɲˈeʃa wˈema wˌake kwa hanˈuni kuhˈusu bˈaba jˈake. wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌalipofˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈoni.|0
wakˈuu wa wˌaamˈoni wˌakamwambˈia hanˈuni bwˈana wˈao, ˌunaðˈani daˈudi ˌanamheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈako kwa kˌukutumˈia wˈatu ˌili kˌuoɲˈeʃa mˌasikitˈiko? ɟˈe, daˈudi hˌakuwatˈuma wˈatu hˈawa kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza na kˌuupˌelelˈeza ˈm̩ɟi ˌili kˌuupindˈua.|0
bˌasi hanˈuni ˌakawˌakamˈata wˈatu wa daˈudi, ˌakawaɲˈoa kˈila mmˈoɟa ndˈevu zˌake nˈusu, ˌakakˈata mavˈazi jˈao ɲˈuma kˌatikˈati kwˈeɲe matˈako, ˌakawaˈatʃa waˈende zˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe ˌili kwˈenda kˌuwalˈaki, kwa maˈana wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevuɲɟˈiwa heʃˈima sˈana. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, kaˈeni hˌuko jerˈiko mpˈaka ndˈevu zˈenu ziˈote ndˈipo ˈm̩ɟe.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌalipˌotambˈua kˌuwa wˌamekˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo kwa daˈudi, wˌakaaɟˈiri askˈari wa miɡˈuu ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaarˈamu kutˈoka bˈeθ rehˈobu na sˈoba, pˈia mfˈalme wa maˈaka pamˈoɟa na wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, na vˌilevˈile wˈatu kˈuminambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka tˈobu.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakamtˈuma joˈabu na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la wˌapiɡanˈaɟi.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌakatˈoka wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa wakˈiwa tajˈari kwa vˈita laŋɡˈoni la ˈm̩ɟi wˈao, wakˈati wˌaarˈamu wa sˈoba, wa rehˈobu, wˈatu wa tˈobu na maˈaka wˌalikˈuwa pˈeke jˈao kwˈeɲe enˈeo la wˈazi.|0
joˈabu ˌakaˈona kˌuwa mbˈele jˌake na ɲˈuma jˌake kˌumepˈaŋɡwa vˈita; kwa hˈijo ˌakatʃaɡˈua baˈaði ja vikˈosi vilˈivjo bˈora sˈana katˌika ˌisraˈeli ˌakavipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌaarˈamu.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˌaliobˈaki tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wa ˌabiʃˈai nduɡˈuje na kˌuwapˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌaamˈoni.|0
joˈabu ˌakasˈema, kˌama wˌaarˈamu wˌatanizˈidi ŋɡˈuvu, bˌasi ˌitawabˈidi ˈm̩ɟe kˌunisˌaidˈia. lakˈini kˌama wˌaamˈoni wˌatawazˈidi ŋɡˈuvu, bˌasi nˌitakˈuɟa kˌuwasˌaidˈia.|0
ˈuwe hodˈari na tˌupiɡˈane kwa ˌuɟasˈiri kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈetu na mˈiɟi ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
bˌasi joˈabu na vikˈosi vjˈake wˌakasˈoŋɡa mbˈele kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaarˈamu, nˌao wˌaarˈamu wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele jˈake.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌalipoˈona wˌaarˈamu wˌanakimbˈia, nˌao wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele ja ˌabiʃˈai na kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi. bˌasi joˈabu ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaamˈoni na kufˈika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
baˌada ja wˌaarˈamu kuˈona wˌameʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, wˌakaɟˌikusˈaɲa tˈena.|0
hˌadadezˈeri ˌakaaɡˈiza wˌaarˈamu wˌaliolˈetwa kutˈoka ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati, wˌakaˈenda helˈamu pamˈoɟa na ʃobˈaki ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la hˌadadezˈeri ˌakiwˌaoŋɡˈoza.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa hˈaja, ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli wˈote, wˌakavˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani, wˌakaˈenda helˈamu. wˌaarˈamu wˌakapˈaŋɡa vikˈosi vjˈao vja askˈari kˌukabˌiliˈana na kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja daˈudi.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanamtˌumikˈia hˌadadezˈeri wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa wˌameʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, wˌakafˈaɲa amˈani na wˌaisraˈeli na wakˈawa tʃˈini jˈao. hˈivjo wˌaarˈamu wˌakaoɡˈopa kˌuwasˌaidˈia wˌaamˈoni tˈena.|0
katˌika mwˈanzo wa mwˈaka ˈm̩pja, wakˈati wafˈalme wˌatokˈapo kwˈenda vitˈani, daˈudi ˌakamtˈuma joˈabu pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa mfˈalme na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la ˌisraˈeli. wˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌaamˈoni na kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi ˈm̩ɟi wa rˈaba. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakabˈaki jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ikˈawa sˈiku mˈoɟa wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni daˈudi ˌaliinˈuka kˌitandˈani mwˈake na kˌutembˌeatembˈea ɟˌuːja pˈaa la ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme. kˌutokˈea kˈule kwˈeɲe pˈaa, ˌakamwˈona mwanˈamke ˌakiˈoɡa. mwanˈamke hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa mzˈuri sˈana wa sˈura.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌakatˈuma ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kˌuulˈiza habˈari za hˈujo mwanˈamke. hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, ɟˈe, hˈuju si baθʃˈeba bˈinti ˌeliˈamu, nˌaje ni ˈm̩ke wa urˈia, mhˈiti.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kumlˈeta. hˈujo mwanˈamke akˈaɟa kwa daˈudi, daˈudi ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. hˈujo mwanˈamke ndˈipo tu ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟˌitakˈasa kutˈoka sˈiku zˌake za hˈeði. kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakapˈata mˈimba ˌakampˌelekˈea daˈudi uɟˈumbe, kusˈema, mˌimi ni mɟamzˈito.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe kwa joˈabu, ˌunipˌelekˈee urˈia, mhˈiti. nˌaje joˈabu ˌakamtˈuma urˈia kwa daˈudi.|0
urˈia ˌalipofˈika, daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza habˈari za joˈabu, hˈali za askˈari na vˈita kwˌamba ˌinaˌendeleˈaɟe.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia urˈia, terˈemka ɲumbˈani kwˈako ˌukanˈawe miɡˈuu jˈako. bˌasi urˈia ˌakaondˈoka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, tˈena zawˈadi zˌikamfuˈata kutˈoka kwa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini urˈia ˌakalˈala kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɟˈumba la kifˈalme pamˈoɟa na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa bwˈana wˈake, na hˌakuterˈemka kwˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kwˌamba, urˈia hakwˈenda ɲumbˈani, daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, si n̩dˈijo tu ˌumefˈika kutˈoka safˈari ja mbˈali? kwa nˈini hukwˈenda ɲumbˈani.|0
urˈia ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu, na ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda wˌanakˈaa kwˈeɲe mahˈema, nˌaje bwˈana wˈaŋɡu joˈabu na wˈatu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu wˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi mahˈali pa wˈazi. nˌiŋɡewezˈaɟe kwˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈaŋɡu ˌili nˈile, nˈiɲue na kˌukutˈana na ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu? hakˈika kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo sˌitafˈaɲa ɟˈambo la nˈamna hˈijo.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, kˈaa hˈapa sˈiku mˈoɟa zaˈidi, nˌami kˈeʃo nˌitakutˈuma urˈudi. kwa hˈijo urˈia ˌakakˈaa jˌerusalˈemu sˈiku ˈile na sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata.|0
kwa ˌukaribˈiʃo wa daˈudi, urˈia akˈala na kˈuɲua pamˈoɟa nˈaje, daˈudi ˌakamlˈevja. lakˈini ɟiˈoni urˈia ˌalitˈoka kwˈenda kulˈala ɟˌuːja mkˈeka wˌake mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana wˈake, hakwˈenda ɲumbˈani.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˌake daˈudi ˌakamwˌandikˈia joˈabu barˈua, ˌakamtˈuma urˈia kˌuipelˈeka.|0
ndˈani ja barˈua ˌaliandˈika, mwˈeke urˈia mstˈari wa mbˈele mahˈali ambˈapo mˌapiɡˈano ni makˈali sˈana. kˈiʃa wˌewe ˌuondˈoke ˌili urˈia ˌaaŋɡˈuʃwe tʃˈini na kˌuuˈawa.|0
hˈivjo joˈabu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameˌuziŋɡˈira ˈm̩ɟi kwa ɟˈeʃi, ˌakamwˈeka urˈia mahˈali ambˈapo ˌaliɟˈua kˌuwa ulˈinzi wa adˈui ˌulikˈuwa imˈara sˈana.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wa mɟˈini wˌalipotˈoka kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja joˈabu, baˈaði ja wˈatu katˌika ɟˈeʃi la daˈudi wˌakauˈawa, zaˈidi ja hˈajo, urˈia, mhˈiti, akˈafa.|0
joˈabu ˌakampˌelekˈea daˈudi mˌaelˈezo jˈote ja vˈita.|0
ˌakamwaɡˈiza mɟˈumbe hˈivi, ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumemalˈiza kˈumpa mfˈalme mˌaelˈezo ja vˈita.|0
hasˈira ja mfˈalme jawˈeza kuwˈaka, nˌaje awˈeza kˌukuulˈiza, kwa nˈini mlˌisoɡˈea karˈibu hˈivjo na ˈm̩ɟi kˌupiɡˈana? hˌamkuɟˈua kˌuwa wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuwapˈiɡa miʃˈale kutˈoka ˌukutˈani.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌemuˈua ˌabimelˈeki mwˈana wa jˈerub bˈeʃeθ? ɟˈe, mwanˈamke hˌakutˈupa ɟˈuu jˌake ɟˈiwe la ɟˈuu la kˌusaɡˈia kutˈoka ˌukutˈani, kwa hˈijo akˈafa hˌuko θebˈesi? kwa nˈini mlˌisoɡˈea hˈivjo karˈibu ja ukˈuta? ikˈiwa ˌatakˌuulˈiza hˈivi, ndˈipo ˌumwambˈie, pˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako urˈia, mhˈiti, ˌamekˈufa..|0
mɟˈumbe ˌakaondˈoka. ˌalipˌowasˈili ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌametˈumwa na joˈabu kusˈema.|0
mɟˈumbe ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, wˈatu wˌalituzˈidi ŋɡˈuvu wˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi ðˈidi jˈetu kwˈeɲe enˈeo la wˈazi, lakˈini tˌuliwˌarudˈiʃa ɲˈuma mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ndˈipo wapˈiɡa upˈinde wˌalitˈupa miʃˈale kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako kutˈoka ˌukutˈani, na baˈaði ja wˈatu wa mfˈalme wakˈafa. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, urˈia, mhˈiti, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamekˈufa.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia mɟˈumbe, ˌukamwambˈie joˈabu hˈivi, ɟˈambo hˈili lˌisikutˈie wˌasiwˈasi, upˈaŋɡa hˈula hˈuju sˈawa na ulˈavjo mwiŋɡˈine. zidˈiʃa mˌaʃambulˈizi ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi na ˌuaŋɡamˈize. mwambˈie joˈabu hˈivi ˌili kumtˈia mˈojo.|0
ˈm̩ke wa urˈia ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mumˈewe ˌamekˈufa, ˌakamwˌombolezˈea.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda wa mˌaombolˈezo kwˈiʃa, daˈudi ˌakamtˈaka alˈetwe ɲumbˈani kwˈake, nˌaje akˈawa mkˈewe, na ˌakamzalˈia mwˈana. lakˈini ɟˈambo ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa daˈudi lˌilimtʃukˈiza bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtˈuma naθˈani kwa daˈudi. ˌalipofˈika kwˈake ˌakamwambˈia, katˌika ˈm̩ɟi mmˈoɟa kˌulikuwˈepo na wˈatu wawˈili, mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa taɟˈiri na mwiŋɡˈine ˌalikˈuwa maskˈini.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu taɟˈiri ˌalikˈuwa na idˈadi kˈubwa sˈana ja kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe.|0
lakˈini jˈule maskˈini hakˈuwa na tʃotʃˈote ˈila kondˈoo ɟˈike mdˈoɡo ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemnunˈua. ˌakamtˈunza kondˈoo hˈujo, ˌakakulˈia kwˈake pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈake. kondˈoo hˈujo ˌaliʃirˈiki tʃakˈula tʃa bwˈana wˌake na kˌuɲuˈea kikˈombe tʃˈake hˌata pˈia hˈujo kondˈoo ˌalilˈala mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana wˈake. kwˈake ˌalikˈuwa kˌama bˈinti jˈake.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa jˈule taɟˈiri ˌakafikˈiwa na mɡˈeni, lakˈini hˈujo taɟˈiri ˌakaˈatʃa kˌutʃukˈua mmˈoɟa wa kondˈoo ˌau ŋɡˈombe wˌake mweɲˈewe ˌamwandalˈie mɡˈeni. badˈala jˌake ˌakatʃukˈua jˈule kondˈoo ɟˈike mdˈoɡo ˌalijekˈuwa mˈali ja jˈule maskˈini na kˌumwandalˈia jˈule mɡˈeni wˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˈakwa na hasˈira ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu hˈujo taɟˈiri na kˌumwambˈia naθˈani, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌalijefˈaɲa hˈivjo ˌanastahˈili kˈufa.|0
lazˈima alˈipe mˈara ˈn̩ne zaˈidi, kwa aɟˈili ja kondˈoo hˈujo, kwa sabˈabu ˌamefˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˌilo na hakˈuwa na hurˈuma.|0
ndˈipo naθˈani ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, wˌewe ndˈiwe hˈujo ˈm̩tu! hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌilikupˈaka mafˈuta ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, nˌilikˌuokˈoa kˌutokˈana na mkˈono wa saˈuli.|0
nˌilikˈupa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana wˈako na wˌake za bwˈana wˈako mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. nˌikakˈupa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda. kˌama hˈaja jˈote jˌalikˈuwa madˈoɡo sˈana, nˌiŋɡekˈupa hˌata zaˈidi.|0
kwa nˈini ˌulilˌiðarˈau nˈeno la bwˈana kwa kufˈaɲa lilˈilo ˈovu matʃˈoni pˈake? ˌulimuˈua urˈia, mhˈiti kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌumtʃukˈua ˈm̩ke wˌake ˈawe m̩kˈeo. ˌulimuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa wa wˌaamˈoni.|0
bˌasi kwa hˈijo, upˈaŋɡa hˌautˌaondˈoka ɲumbˈani mwˈako kˈamwe kwa sabˈabu ˌulinˌiðarˈau mˌimi na kˌumtʃukˈua ˈm̩ke wa urˈia, mhˈiti kˌuwa m̩kˈeo..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kutˈoka kwa ɲˈumba jˈako mweɲˈewe nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈako. mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe nˌitatwˈaa wˌake zˈako na kˈumpa jˌeje alˈije wa karˈibu nˈawe, nˌaje ˌatakutˈana kimwˈili na wˌake zˈako mtʃˈana mwaŋɡˈavu.|0
ˌulifˈaɲa kwa sˈiri, lakˈini nˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili wakˈati wa mtʃˈana mwaŋɡˈavu mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote..|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamɟˈibu naθˈani, nˌimefˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana. naθˈani ˌakamɟˈibu, bwˈana ˌamekˌuondolˈea ðˈambi jˈako. hˌutakˈufa.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu kwa kufˈaɲa hˈili ˌumefˈaɲa adˈui za bwˈana kˌuoɲˈeʃa ðarˈau kabˈisa, mwˈana ˌatakˌajezalˈiwa kwˈako ˌatakˈufa.|0
baˌada ja naθˈani kurˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake, bwˈana ˌakampˈiɡa jˈule mtˈoto ambˈaje ˈm̩ke wa urˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemzalˈia daˈudi, ˌakauɡˈua.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwˈomba mˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja mtˈoto. ˌakafˈuŋɡa na ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˌake akˈawa sˈiku zˈote ˌanalˈala sˌakafˈuni usˈiku kˈutʃa.|0
wazˈee wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake wˌakamwendˈea wˌakasimˈama karˈibu nˌaje ˌili kumwˈamʃa kutˈoka pˈale sˌakafˈuni, lakˈini ˌakakatˈaa, wˈala hakˈula tʃotʃˈote pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
kunˈako sˈiku ja sˈaba jˈule mtˈoto akˈafa. wˌatumˈiʃi wa daˈudi wˌakaoɡˈopa kˌumwambˈia kˌuwa mtˈoto ˌamekˈufa, kwa maˈana wˌalifikˈiri, wakˈati mtˈoto ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali hˈai, tˌulizuŋɡˈumza na daˈudi lakˈini hˌakutˌusikilˈiza. tˌutawezˈaɟe kˌumwambˈia kwˌamba mtˈoto ˌamekˈufa? ˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuɟiðˈuru.|0
daˈudi ˌakaˈona kˌuwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌananˌoŋɡonezˈana weɲˈewe, nˌaje ˌakatambˈua kˌuwa mtˈoto ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈufa. ˌakaulˈiza ɟˈe, ni kwˌamba hˈujo mtˈoto ˌamekˈufa? wˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, mtˈoto ˌamekˈufa.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakainˈuka kutˈoka pˈale sˌakafˈuni. baˌada ja kuˈoɡa, ˌakaɟipˈaka mafˈuta na kˌubadilˈiʃa ŋɡˈuo zˌake kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, ˌakaabˈudu. baˌada ja hˈapo ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈake kwa kutˈaka kwˈake, wˌakamwˌandalˈia tʃakˈula, nˌaje akˈala.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌunafˈaɲa hˈivi? mtˈoto ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali hˈai, ˌulifˈuŋɡa na kulˈia; lakˈini sˈasa mtˈoto ˌamekˈufa, ˌumeinˈuka na kˈula.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, wakˈati mtˈoto ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado juŋɡˈali hˈai, nˌilifˈuŋɡa na kulˈia. nˌilifikˈiri, nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje? bwˈana awˈeza kˌunirehˈemu ˌili kumwˈatʃa mtˈoto aˈiʃi..|0
lakˈini sˈasa kwa kˌuwa ˌamekˈufa, kwa nˈini nifˈuŋɡe? ɟˈe, nawˈeza kˌumrudˈiʃa tˈena? mˌimi nˌitakwˈenda kwˈake, lakˈini jˌeje hˌatanˌirudˈia mˈimi.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamfarˈiɟi baθʃˈeba mkˈewe, ˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈake ˌakakutˈana nˌaje kimwˈili. ˌakazˈaa mwˈana, wˌakamwˈita ɟˈina lˈake sˌolomˈoni. bwˈana ˌalimpˈenda sˌolomˈoni.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalimpˈenda, ˌakatˈuma nˈeno kwa daˈudi kwa kˈiɲua tʃa nabˈii naθˈani kˌuwa mtˈoto aˈitwe jˌedidˈia kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈuo joˈabu ˌakapiɡˈana ðˈidi ja rˈaba ɟamˈii ja wˌaamˈoni na kutˈeka ŋɡˈome la kifˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa joˈabu ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa daˈudi, kusˈema, nˌimepiɡˈana ðˈidi ja rˈaba, nˌami nˌimetwˈaa tʃˈanzo tʃˈake tʃa mˈaɟi.|0
sˈasa kusˈaɲa vikˈosi vˌilivjobˈaki na ˌukaˌuziŋɡˈire ˈm̩ɟi kwa ɟˈeʃi na kˌuutˈeka. la sˈivjo, nˌitautˈeka mˈimi, nˌao ˌutaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakakusˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi lˈote ˌakaˈenda rˈaba, ˌakaˌuʃambulˈia na kˌuutˈeka.|0
ˌakawatˈoa wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa hˈumo, ˌakawawˈeka wafˈaɲe kˈazi kwa mˌisumˈeno, sulˈulu za tʃˈuma na maʃˈoka, nˌaje ˌakawawˈeka kwˈeɲe kˈazi ja kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌatofˈali. ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivi kwa mˈiɟi jˈote ja wˌaamˈoni. kˈiʃa daˈudi na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ikˈawa baˌada ja hˈajo, amnˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi ˌakampˈenda tamˈari, ˈumbu lˈake ˌabsalˈomu mwˈana wa daˈudi, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa mzˈuri wa sˈura.|0
amnˈoni ˌakasumbˈuka sˈana kuhˈusu tamˈari hˌata ˌakauɡˈua, kwa kˌuwa tamˈari ˌalikˈuwa bikˈira, na ˌiliˌonekˈana kwˌamba hˌaiwˌezekˈani amnˈoni kˌumfaɲˈia ɟˈambo lolˈote.|0
bˌasi amnˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na rafˈiki ɟˈina lˈake jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa ʃimˈea, nduɡˈuje daˈudi. jˌonadˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa hˈila ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
ˌakamˌuulˈiza amnˈoni, wˌewe ni mtˈoto wa mfˈalme; kwa nˈini sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku ˌunaˌonekˈana kukˈonda? hˌutanˌiambˈia? amnˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, nˌinampˈenda tamˈari, dˈada jˌake ˌabsalˈomu ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌonadˈabu ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda ˌukalˈale kˌitandˈani na ˌuɟifˈaɲe kˌuwa mɡˈoɲɟua. bˈaba jˈako ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa kˌukuˈona mwambˈie, nˌiŋɡepˈenda tamˈari dˈada jˈaŋɡu ˈaɟe kˌunipatˈia tʃotʃˈote ˌili nˈile. tˌafaðˈali mruhˈusu ˈaɟe na kˌuniˌandalˈia tʃakˈula mbˈele jˈaŋɡu niŋɡˈali nˌinamwˈona, ˌili nipˈate kˈula kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake..|0
kwa hˈijo amnˈoni ˌakalˈala kˌitandˈani kˌuɟifˈaɲa mɡˈoɲɟua. mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuɟa kumwˈona, amnˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiŋɡepˈenda dˈada jˈaŋɡu tamˈari ˈaɟe na kˌuniˌandalˈia mikˈate maˈalum mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, ˌili nipˈate kˈula tˌoka mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakampˌelekˈea tamˈari uɟˈumbe hˌuko kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, kusˈema: nˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja ndˈuɡu jˈako amnˈoni ˌukamwˌandalˈie tʃakˈula.|0
kwa hˈijo tamˈari ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa nduɡˈuje amnˈoni, ndˈuɡu ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala. tamˈari ˌakatʃukˈua ˈuŋɡa ˌuliotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu ˌakaukˈanda, ˌakaˌiandˈaa mikˈate mbˈele jˌake na kˌuiˈoka.|0
tamˈari ˌakaondˈoa mikˈate kwˈeɲe kˌikaˈaŋɡo ˌili ˌampatˈie amnˈoni, lakˈini ˌakakatˈaa kˈula. amnˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, m̩tˈoe ɲɟˈe kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijˈeko hˈapa. kwa hˈijo kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakaondˈoka.|0
ndˈipo amnˈoni ˌakamwambˈia tamˈari, lˈeta mkˈate hˈapa ndˈani ja tʃˈumba tʃˈaŋɡu ˌili nipˈate kˈula kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako. bˌasi tamˈari ˌakatʃukˈua mikˈate ˌalijˌoiandˈaa na kˌumletˈea amnˈoni ndˈuɡu jˌake ndˈani ja tʃˈumba tʃˈake.|0
lakˈini ˌalipˌompelekˈea ˌili ˈale, ˌakamkamˈata kwa ŋɡˈuvu na kˌumwambˈia, ɲɟˈoo ulˈale nˈami, dˈada jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusifˈaɲe hˈivjo, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu! ˌusinitˈende ɟeˈuri! ɟˈambo la nˈamna hˌii hˌalistahˈili kˌufaɲˈika katˌika ˌisraˈeli! ˌusitˈende ɟˈambo hˈili ˈovu.|0
kwa upˈande wˈaŋɡu ɟˈe, ˌitakuwˈaɟe? nˌitaˌipelˈeka wˈapi aˈibu jˈaŋɡu? pˈia kwa upˈande wˈako, ˌitakuwˈaɟe? ˌutakˈuwa kˌama mmˈoɟa wa wˌapumbˈavu waˈovu katˌika ˌisraˈeli. tˌafaðˈali zuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme; hˌatakˌukatalˈia wˌewe kˌuniˈoa.|0
lakˈini amnˈoni ˌakakatˈaa kˌumsikilˈiza, na kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko tamˈari, ˌakamtˈenda ɟeˈuri.|0
kˈiʃa amnˈoni ˌakamtʃukˈia tamˈari, kwa mˌatʃukˈio makˈuu sˈana. kwa kwˈeli, amnˈoni ˌalimtʃukˈia kulˈiko ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamempˈenda. amnˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, inˈuka na utˈoke ɲɟˈe.|0
tamˈari ˌakamwambˈia, hapˈana! kˌunifukˈuza ˌitakˈuwa vibˈaja zaˈidi kulˈiko jˈale ˌulijˌonitendˈea. lakˈini amnˈoni ˌakakatˈaa kˌumsikilˈiza.|0
ˌakamwˈita mtumˈiʃi wˌake mahsˈusi na kˌumwambˈia, m̩tˈoe hˈuju mwanˈamke hˈapa na ufˈuŋɡe mlˈaŋɡo ɲˈuma jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo, mtumˈiʃi wˌake ˌakamtˈoa ɲɟˈe na kufˈuŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo ɲˈuma jˈake. tamˈari ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ɟˈoho lˌililopˈambwa vizˈuri, kwa maˈana lˌilikˈuwa aˈina ja mavˈazi jˌalijˌovalˈiwa na bˈinti za mfˈalme wˌaliokˈuwa mˌabikˈira.|0
tamˈari ˌakaɟitˈia maɟˈivu kitʃwˈani mwˈake na kˌurarˈua lˈile ɟˈoho ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa. ˌakawˈeka mkˈono wˌake kitʃwˈani, ˌakaˈenda zˌake ˌakilˈia kwa saˈuti.|0
ˌabsalˈomu nduɡˈuje ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˈujo amnˈoni ndˈuɡu jˈako, ˌamekutˈana nˌawe kimwˈili? sˈasa ɲamˈaza ˈumbu lˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈako. ˌusilitˈie ɟˈambo hˈili mojˈoni. nˌaje tamˈari ˌakaˈiʃi ɲumbˈani kwa ˌabsalˈomu nduɡˈuje, akˈiwa mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe huzˈuni.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌalipˌosikˈia mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, ˌakakˌasirˈika sˈana.|0
ˌabsalˈomu hˌakusˈema nˈeno lolˈote na amnˈoni, likˈiwa zˈuri ˌau bˈaja, kwa kˌuwa ˌalimtʃukˈia amnˈoni kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtˈia aˈibu tamˈari, dˈada jˈake.|0
miˈaka miwˈili bˌaadˈaje, wakˈati wakˈata maɲˈoja ja kondˈoo wa ˌabsalˈomu wˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko bˈaal hasˈori karˈibu na mpˈaka wa ˌefraˈimu, ˌalialˈika wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme kˈuɟa hˌuko.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaˈenda kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ninˈao wakˈata maɲˈoja ja kondˈoo wˌaliokˈuɟa. tˌafaðˈali, ɟˈe, mfˈalme na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌanawˈeza kˌuuŋɡˈana nˈami.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa, mwanˈaŋɡu si lazˈima sˌisi sˈote tˈuɟe, tˌutakˈuwa tu mzˈiɡo kwˈako. iŋɡˈawa ˌabsalˈomu ˌalimsˈihi sˈana, mfˈalme ˌalikatˈaa kwˈenda, lakˈini ˌalimbarˈiki.|0
bˌasi ˌabsalˈomu ˌakasˈema, kˌama hˌutakˈuɟa, tˌafaðˈali mruhˈusu ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu amnˈoni twˈende pamˈoɟa nˈaje. mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini aˈende pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
lakˈini ˌabsalˈomu ˌalimsˈihi, kwa hˈijo mfˈalme ˌakamtˈuma amnˈoni pamˈoɟa na wˈana weŋɡˈine wa mfˈalme wˌaliobˈaki.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌaliaɡˈiza wˈatu wˈake, sˌikilizˈeni! wakˈati amnˈoni ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamekˈuɲua mvˈiɲo na kulˈewa sˈana nˌami nˌikiwˌaambˈia, mpiɡˈeni amnˈoni, bˌasi mˌuuˈeni. msˌioɡˈope. ɟˈe, si mˌimi nˌilijewˈapa ˈamri hˌii? kuwˈeni hodˈari na wˌeɲe ˌuʃuɟˈaa.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wa ˌabsalˈomu wˌakamtendˈea amnˈoni kˌama vˈile ˌabsalˈomu ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza. ndˈipo wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme wˌakainˈuka, wˌakapˈanda ɲˈumbu zˈao, wˌakakimbˈia.|0
wakˈati wakˈiwa ɲɟiˈani, tˌaarˈifa ˌilimɟˈia daˈudi, kusˈema: ˌabsalˈomu ˌamewaˈua wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌesalˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasimˈama, ˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈake, ˌakalˈala tʃˈini arðˈini; nˌao wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote wˌakasimˈama kˈando jˌake na ŋɡˈuo zˈao zikˈiwa zˌimerˌarulˈiwa.|0
lakˈini jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa ʃimˈea, nduɡˈuje daˈudi, ˌakasˈema, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌasifikˈiri kwˌamba wˌamewaˈua wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme; ni amnˈoni pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌalikˈufa. hˈili lˌimekˈuwa kusˈudi la mˈojo wa ˌabsalˈomu ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile amnˈoni ˌalipˌomtendˈea ɟeˈuri tamˈari, dˈada jˈake.|0
mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌasisˌumbulˈiwe na tˌaarˈifa kwˌamba wˌamewaˈua wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme. ni amnˈoni pˈeke jˌake ˌalijekˈufa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, ˌabsalˈomu akˈawa ˌamekimbˈia. bˌasi mlˈinzi ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia, nˌaje ˌakaˈona wˈatu wˈeŋɡi bˌarabarˈani mˌaɣarˈibi jˈake, wˌakiʃˈuka kutˈoka upˈande wa kilˈima. mlˈinzi ˌakaˈenda ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, naˈona wˈatu wˌakitokˈea upˈande wa hˌoronaˈimu, hˌuko upˈande wa kˌilimˈani.|0
jˌonadˈabu ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, tazˈama, wˈana wa mfˈalme wˈako hˈapa; ˌimekˈuwa kˌama vˈile mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalivjosˈema.|0
mˈara ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈema, wˈana wa mfˈalme wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani wˌakiˌombolˈeza kwa mˌakelˈele. pˈia mfˈalme na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote wˌakalˈia sˈana kwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakakimbˈia na kwˈenda kwa talmˈai mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi, mfˈalme wa ɡeʃˈuri. lakˈini mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈawe kˈila sˈiku.|0
baˌada ja ˌabsalˈomu kˌukimbˈia na kwˈenda ɡeʃˈuri, ˌakakˈaa hˌuko miˈaka mitˈatu.|0
rˈoho ja mfˈalme daˈudi ˌikatamˈani kˌumwendˈea ˌabsalˈomu, kwa maˈana mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˌariɟˈika kuhˈusu kˈifo tʃa amnˈoni.|0
joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌakafahˈamu kˌuwa mˈojo wa mfˈalme ˌulikˈuwa na ʃaˈuku ja kumwˈona ˌabsalˈomu.|0
kwa hˈijo joˈabu ˌakamtˈuma ˈm̩tu fulˈani kwˈenda tekˈoa na kumlˈeta mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe hekˈima kutˈoka hˌuko. ˌakamwambˈia hˈujo mwanˈamke, ɟifˈaɲe ˈuko katˌika mˌaombolˈezo. vˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kˌuombolˈeza, nˌawe ˌusitumˈie mafˈuta jojˈote ja uzˈuri, ɟifˈaɲe kˌama mwanˈamke ambˈaje ˌamekˈuwa na huzˈuni kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi kwa aɟˈili ja kufˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa nˈenda kwa mfˈalme ˌukazuŋɡˈumze manˈeno hˈaja. nˌaje joˈabu ˌakawˈeka manˈeno kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa jˈule mwanˈamke.|0
hˈujo hˈujo mwanˈamke kutˈoka tekˈoa ˌalipofˈika kwa mfˈalme, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi kˈumpa mfˈalme heʃˈima, ˌakasˈema, ˈee mfˈalme, nˌisaidˈie.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˈuna ʃˈida ɡˈani? ˌakamwambˈia, mˌimi ni mɟˈane hˈasa, mˈume wˈaŋɡu ˌamekˈufa.|0
mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako nˌilikˈuwa na wˈana wawˈili. wˌakapiɡˈana wˌao kwa wˌao hˌuko ʃambˈani wˈala hˌuko hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kˌuwaamˈua. mmˈoɟa ˌakampˈiɡa mwenzˈake na kˌumuˈua.|0
sˈasa ukˈoo wˈote ˌumeinˈuka ðˈidi ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako, wˌakisˈema, ˌutukabˈiði hˈujo ˌalijˌemuˈua ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˌili tˌumuˈue kwa aɟˈili ja uhˈai wa ndˈuɡu jˌake ambˈaje ˌalimuˈua, nˌasi hˈapo tˌutakˈuwa tˌumekˌatilˈia mbˈali na mrˈiθi pˈia. wˌakifˈaɲa hˈivjo, wˌatakˈuwa wˌamezˈima tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu lˌililobˈaki, mˈume wˈaŋɡu hˌataatʃˈiwa ɟˈina wˈala m̩zˈao katˌika ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia hˈujo mwanˈamke, nˈenda ɲumbˈani, nˌami nˌitatˈoa aɡˈizo kwa aɟˈili jˈako.|0
lakˈini hˈujo mwanˈamke kutˈoka tekˈoa ˌakamwambˈia, mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, lawˈama na ˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu na ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje mfˈalme na kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi na asˈiwe na hatˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌusemˈeʃa lolˈote, mlˈete kwˈaŋɡu, nˌaje hˌatakˌusumbˈua tˈena.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, bˌasi mfˈalme na amwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌili kˌuzuˈia mlipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu kˌuoŋɡˈeza ɟˌuːja ˌuharibˈifu, ˌili kwˌamba mwanˈaŋɡu asˈiɟe ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈizwa. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama ˌaiʃˈivjo bwˈana, hakˈuna ˌuɲuˈele mmˈoɟa wa kˈitʃwa tʃa mwanˈao ˌutakˌaoaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, mruhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako asˈeme nˈeno kwa mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu. mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, sˈema.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, mbˈona bˌasi wˌewe ˌumewˈaza ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, mfˈalme ˌasemˈapo hˈili, hˌaɟitˈii hˌatiˈani mweɲˈewe, kwa maˈana mfˈalme hˌaɟamrudˈiʃa mwanˈawe ˌalijˌefukuzˈiwa mbˈali.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈaɟi jˌalijˌomwaɡˈika arðˈini, jˌasivjowˈeza kˌuzolˈeka tˈena, hˈivjo sˌisi kˈufa ni lazˈima. lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌaondˈoi uhˈai, badˈala jˈake, jˌeje hufˈaɲa ɲɟˈia ˌili kwˌamba ˌalijˌefukˈuzwa ˌasibˈaki akˈiwa ˌamefˌarikˈiʃwa nˈaje.|0
nˌami sˈasa nˌimekˈuɟa kusˈema hˈili kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌamenˌioɡopˈeʃa. mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalifikˈiri, nˌitanˈena na mfˈalme, lˈabda mfˈalme ˌatamfaɲˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake kˈile ˌanatʃoˈomba.|0
lˈabda mfˈalme ˌatakubˈali kˌumwokˈoa mtumˈiʃi wˌake kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeɟarˈibu kˌunikˌatilˈia mbˈali, mˌimi na mwanˈaŋɡu, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe urˈiθi mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌotupatˈia..|0
bˌasi sˈasa mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanasˈema, nˈeno la bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme na lˌinipatˈie pumzˈiko, kwa maˈana bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ni kˌama mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu katˌika kˌutambˈua ɟˈema na bˈaja. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈawe..|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia hˈujo mwanˈamke, ˌusinifˈitʃe ɟˈibu kuhˈusu hˌilo nˌitakˌalokˌuulˈiza. hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na asˈeme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, mkˈono wa joˈabu haˈupo pamˈoɟa nˌawe katˌika ɟˈambo hˌilo lˈote? hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika kˌama ˌuiʃˈivjo, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajewˈeza kˌuɡeˈuka kulˈia wˈala kuʃˈoto kˌutokˈana na tʃotʃˈote ˌanatʃosˈema bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme. nˈaam, ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako joˈabu n̩dˈije ˌalinˌifundˈiʃa kufˈaɲa hˈivi, nˌaje n̩dˈije ˌaliwˈeka manˈeno hˈaja jˈote kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈako joˈabu ˌamefˈaɲa hˈivi ˌili kˌubadˈili hˈali ˌilijˈopo. bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˈana hekˈima kˌama ˈile ja mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu, hˌufahˈamu kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌotokˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, vjˈema sˈana, nˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili. nˈenda, ˌukamlˈete kiɟˈana ˌabsalˈomu.|0
joˈabu ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mpˈaka arðˈini kˈumpa mfˈalme heʃˈima, nˌaje ˌakambarˈiki mfˈalme. joˈabu ˌakasˈema, lˈeo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanaɟˈua kˌuwa ˌamepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈako, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, kwa sabˈabu mfˈalme ˌamemɟalˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake ˈombi lˈake.|0
ndˈipo joˈabu ˌakaˈenda hˌadi ɡeʃˈuri ˌakamrudˈiʃa ˌabsalˈomu jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, lazˈima ˌabsalˈomu aˈende kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba jˌake mweɲˈewe; kˈamwe ˌasiuˈone ˈuso wˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba jˌake na hˌakuuˈona ˈuso wa mfˈalme.|0
katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌesifˈiwa kwa uzˈuri wa sˈura kˌama ˌabsalˈomu. kˌuanzˈia utˈosi wa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake hˌadi wˈajo wa m̩ɡˈuu wˌake hˌapakˈuwa na kasˈoro.|0
kˈila mˈara ˌalipoɲˈoa ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiɲˈoa mˈara kwa mˈara zˌilipokˈuwa zˌinamwˈia nzˈito, ˌalizipˈima uzˈito wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ʃekˈeli mˈia mbˈili kwa kipˈimo tʃa kifˈalme.|0
wˌalizalˈiwa wˈana watˈatu na bˈinti mmˈoɟa kwa ˌabsalˈomu. ɟˈina la bˈinti jˌake ˌaliˈitwa tamˈari, nˌaje akˈawa mwanˈamke mzˈuri wa sˈura.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaˈiʃi miˈaka miwˈili hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu pasˈipo kˌuuˈona ˈuso wa mfˈalme.|0
bˌasi ˌabsalˈomu ˌakamwˈita joˈabu kwa kusˈudi la kumtˈuma kwa mfˈalme, lakˈini joˈabu ˌakakatˈaa kˈuɟa kwa ˌabsalˈomu. ndˈipo ˌakamwˈita tˈena mˈara ja pˈili, lakˈini pˈia ˌakakatˈaa kˈuɟa.|0
ndˈipo ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, tazˈama, ʃˈamba la joˈabu lˈiko ɟirˈani na lˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˈana ʃajˈiri hˈumo. nendˈeni mkˌalitˈie mˈoto. kˈiʃa wˌatumˈiʃi wa ˌabsalˈomu wˌakalitˈia mˈoto ʃˈamba hˈilo.|0
bˌasi joˈabu ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa ˌabsalˈomu, ˌakamwambˈia, kwa nˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌametˈia mˈoto ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, tazˈama, nˌilikˌutumˈia uɟˈumbe na kusˈema, ɲɟˈoo ˌili niwˈeze kˌukutˈuma kwa mfˈalme kˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini nˌimekˈuɟa kutˈoka ɡeʃˈuri? ˌiŋɡekˈuwa bˈora zaˈidi kwˈaŋɡu kˌama nˌiŋɡebˈaki hˌuko!  sˈasa bˈasi, natˈaka kˌuuˈona ˈuso wa mfˈalme, na ikˈiwa nˈina hatˈia ja ɟˈambo lolˈote, bˌasi na ˌaniˈue.|0
bˌasi joˈabu ˌakaˈenda kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia ɟˈambo hˈili. kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakamwˈita ˌabsalˈomu, nˌaje ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ˌakasuɟˈudu ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka arðˈini mbˈele ja mfˈalme. nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakambˈusu ˌabsalˈomu.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaɟˌipatˈia maɡˈari ja vˈita na farˈasi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu hamsˈini wa kupˈiɡa m̩bˈio mbˈele jˈake.|0
akˈawa ˌanaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema na kˌusimˈama kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ˌinajˌoelekˈea kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. wakˈati wowˈote ˌalipokˈuɟa ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌeɲe maʃtˈaka jˌanajˌohitˈaɟi kulˈetwa mbˈele ja mfˈalme kwa mˌaamˈuzi, ˌabsalˈomu nˌaje ˌaŋɡemwˈita na kˌumuulˈiza, wˌewe ˌunatˈoka ˈm̩ɟi ˈupi? nˌaje ˌaŋɡeɟˈibu, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanatˈoka katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabsalˈomu ˌaŋɡemwambˈia, tazˈama, mˌalalamˈiko jˈako ni ja hˈaki na sˌawasˈawa, lakˈini hakˈuna mwˌakilˈiʃi wa mfˈalme wa kˌukusˌikilˈiza.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌalioŋɡˈeza, laˈiti tu nˌiŋɡetˌeulˈiwa kˌuwa mwamˈuzi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. ndˈipo kˈila mmˈoɟa mwˌeɲe maʃtˈaka ˌau ʃaˈuri ˌaŋɡekˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌiŋɡeˈona kwˌamba ˌanapˈata hˈaki.|0
pˈia, wakˈati ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalipˌomkaribˈia ˌili kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈake, ˌabsalˈomu ˌaliɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake na kumʃˈika pˈia kumbˈusu.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaˌendelˈea na tabˈia hˌii mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliomɟˈia mfˈalme kumwˈomba awˈape hˈaki; kwa hˈijo ˌabsalˈomu ˌakaˈiba miˈojo ja wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mnˈamo mwˈiʃo wa mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne, ˌabsalˈomu ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, naˈomba unˈipe ruhˈusa niˈende hebrˈoni nˌikatimˈize naðˈiri nˌilijˌomwekˈea bwˈana.|0
wakˈati mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko ɡeʃˈuri katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja arˈamu, nˌiliwˈeka naðˈiri hˌii, ikˈiwa bwˈana ˌatanˌirudˈiʃa jˌerusalˈemu, nˌitamwabˈudu bwˈana hˌuko hebrˈoni..|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, enˈenda kwa amˈani. hˈivjo ˌakaˈenda hebrˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa ˌabsalˈomu ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa sˈiri katˌika mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, kusˈema, mˈara mtˌakapˌosikˈia saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta bˌasi semˈeni, ˌabsalˈomu ni mfˈalme hˌuko hebrˈoni..|0
wˈatu mˈia mbˈili kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na ˌabsalˈomu. wˌalikˈuwa wˌamealˈikwa kˌama waɡˈeni nˌao wˌalikwˈenda kwa nˈia ɲɟˈema, pasˈipo kuɟˈua lolˈote.|0
wakˈati ˌabsalˈomu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanatˈoa ðabˈihu, pˈia ˌakatˈuma aˈitwe ˌahiθofˈeli, mɡilˈoni, mʃaˈuri wa daˈudi, ˈaɟe kutˈoka ɡˈilo, ambˈao n̩dˈio ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wa ɲumbˈani. kwa hˈijo mpˈaŋɡo wa hˈila ˌukapˈata ŋɡˈuvu, na idˈadi ja wˌaliˌofuatˈana na ˌabsalˈomu ˌikaˌoŋɡezˈeka.|0
mɟˈumbe akˈaɟa na kˌumwambˈia daˈudi, miˈojo ja wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌinaˌambatˈana na ˌabsalˈomu.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, ɲɟoˈoni! ni lazˈima tˌukimbˈie, la sˈivjo hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌatakˌajeokˈoka kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌabsalˈomu. ni lazˈima tˌuondˈoke kwa harˈaka, la sˈivjo ˌatakˈuɟa m̩bˈio na kˌutupˈata, ˌatatˌuaŋɡamˈiza na kˌuupˈiɡa ˈm̩ɟi kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wˌakamɟˈibu, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako tu tajˈari kufˈaɲa lolˈote mfˈalme bwˈana wˈetu ˌanalˌotʃaɡˈua.|0
mfˈalme ˌakatˈoka, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake wˌakimfuˈata; lakˈini ˌakawaˈatʃa mˌasurˈia kˈumi ˌili kˌuaŋɡalˈia ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme ˌakaondˈoka, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌakimfuˈata, wˌakatˈua mahˈali mbˈali kiˈasi.|0
wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌakatembˈea, wˌakampˈita wakˈiwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi wˈote; pˈia waɡˈiti wˈote mˈia sˈita wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamefˌuatˈana nˌaje kutˈoka ɡˈaθi wˌakapˈita mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia itˈai, mɡˈiti, kwa nˈini ˌufuatˈane na sˈisi? rˈudi ˌukakˈae pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme ˌabsalˈomu. wˌewe ni mɡˈeni, mkimbˈizi kutˈoka n̩tʃˈini mwˈako.|0
ˌulikˈuɟa ɟˈana tˈu. nˌami lˈeo nˌikufˈaɲe ˌutaŋɡetˈaŋɡe pamˈoɟa nˈasi, wakˈati siɟˈui nˌiendˈako? rˈudi, nˌawe ˌukawˌatʃukˈue wˈatu wa kwˈenu. wˈema na ˌuaminˈifu na vˈiwe pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
lakˈini itˈai ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na kˌama mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌaiʃˈivjo, popˈote mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌatakˌapokˈuwa, ikˈiwa ni kuˈiʃi ˌau kˈufa, hˈapo ndˈipo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatakˌapokˈuwa.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia itˈai, sˈoŋɡa mbˈele, ˌendelˈea. kwa hˈijo itˈai, mɡˈiti, ˌakaˌendelˈea pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake wˈote, pˈia ɟamˈaa zˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi wˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti wakˈati wˈatu wˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakipˈita. mfˈalme nˌaje ˌakavˈuka bˈonde la kidrˈoni, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakaˌelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
sadˈoki pˈia ˌalikuwˈako, kˌaðalˈika walˈawi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌalikˈuwa wˌametʃukˈua sandˈuku la aɡˈano la mˈuŋɡu. wˌakawˈeka tʃˈini sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˌabiaθˈari ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu mpˈaka wˈatu wˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌameondˈoka mɟˈini.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia sadˈoki, rudˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu mɟˈini. ikˈiwa nˌitapˈata kibˈali mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌatanˌirudˈiʃa, nˌami nˌitaliˈona sandˈuku hˈili tˈena pamˈoɟa na maskˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini kˌama jˌeje ˌatasˈema, mˌimi sˌipendˈezwi nˈawe, bˌasi mˌimi nˈiko tajˈari; jˌeje na ˌanifˈaɲe tʃotʃˈote ˌaonˈatʃo tʃˈema kwˈake.|0
pˈia mfˈalme ˌalimwambˈia kuhˈani sadˈoki, ɟˈe, wˌewe si mwonˈaɟi? rˈudi mɟˈini kwa amˈani pamˈoɟa na mwanˈao ˌahimaˈasi na jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ˌabiaθˈari. wˌewe na ˌabiaθˈari wˌatʃukuˈeni wˈana wˈenu wawˈili.|0
nˌitasubˈiri kwˈeɲe vivˈuko katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa mpˈaka nˈeno lˌitakˌapotˈoka kwˈenu kˌuniarˈifu.|0
kwa hˈijo sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari wˌakarudˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu na kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
bˌali daˈudi ˌakaˌendelˈea, ˌakapˈanda mlˈima wa mˌizeitˈuni, ˌakaˈenda hˈuku ˌanalˈia, akˈiwa ˌamefunˈika kˈitʃwa tʃˈake na bˌila viˈatu mˌiɡuˈuni. wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje nˌao wˌakafunˈika vˈitʃwa vjˈao, wakˈawa wˌanapˈanda mlˈima hˈuku wˌanalˈia.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌameambˈiwa, ˌahiθofˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaʃirˈiki wa ʃaˈuri bˈaja la ˌabsalˈomu. ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakaˈomba, ˌakisˈema, ˈee bwˈana, ɡeˈuza ʃaˈuri la ˌahiθofˈeli kˌuwa uɟˈiŋɡa.|0
daˈudi ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe kilˈele tʃa mlˈima, mahˈali ambˈapo wˈatu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezoˈea kˌumwabˈudu mˈuŋɡu, huʃˈai, mwarˈiki, ˌalikuwˈako hˌuko kumlˈaki, ɟˈoho lˈake likˈiwa lˌimerarˈuka na mavˈumbi kitʃwˈani mwˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, kˌama ˌukiˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈami, ˌutakˈuwa mzˈiɡo kwˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa ˌutarˈudi mɟˈini na kˌumwambˈia ˌabsalˈomu, nˌitakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˈee mfˈalme; nˌilikˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wa bˈaba jˈako wakˈati ˌuliopˈita, lakˈini sˈasa nˌitakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako, bˌasi ˌutawˈeza kˌunisˌaidˈia kwa kupˈiŋɡa ʃaˈuri la ˌahiθofˈeli.|0
ɟˈe, mˌakuhˈani sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari hˌawatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe? wˌaambˈie lolˈote ˌutakˌalosikˈia katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
wˈana wˌao wawˈili, ˌahimaˈasi mwˈana wa sadˈoki na jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ˌabiaθˈari, wˈako pamˈoɟa nˌao hˌuko. watˈume kwˈaŋɡu na lolˈote ˌutakˌalosikˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo huʃˈai, rafˈiki wa daˈudi, ˌakafˈika jˌerusalˈemu wakˈati ˌabsalˈomu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanaiŋɡˈia mɟˈini.|0
daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda umbˈali mfˈupi kupˈita kilˈele tʃa mlˈima, ˌakamkˈuta hˌuko sˈiba, msˌimamˈizi wa ʃuɣˈuli za mˌefiboʃˈeθi, ˌakiŋɡoɟˈea kumlˈaki daˈudi. ˌalikˈuwa na pˈunda wawˈili wakˈiwa wˌametandˈikwa na kˌupakˈiwa mikˈate mˈia mbˈili, mˌaandˈazi mˈia ja zabˈibu kˈavu, mˌaandˈazi mˈia ja tˈini na kirˈiba tʃa divˈai.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza sˈiba, kwa nˈini ˌumelˈeta vˈitu hˈivi? sˈiba ˌakamɟˈibu, pˈunda ni kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ɲˈumba ja mfˈalme kupˈanda, mikˈate na matˈunda ni kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu kˈula, nˈajo divˈai ni kwa kˌuwabˌurudˈiʃa wˌatakˌaotʃˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi mwˈana wa bwˈana wˈako? sˈiba ˌakamwambˈia, ˌanakawˈia jˌerusalˈemu, kwa sabˈabu ˌanafikˈiri, lˈeo ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitanˌirudiʃˈia ˌutawˈala wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu..|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia sˈiba, jˈote jˌalijokˈuwa mˈali ja mˌefiboʃˈeθi sˈasa ni mˈali jˈako. sˈiba ˌakasˈema, nˌasuɟˈudu kwa ˌuɲeɲekˈevu. naˈomba nipˈate kibˈali mbˈele jˈako, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanakˌaribˈia bˌahurˈimu, ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka ukˈoo hˈuo hˈuo kˌama ɟamˈaa ja saˈuli, ˌakatˈoka hˈumo, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni ʃimˈei mwˈana wa ɡˈera; akˈawa ˌanalaˈani ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitˈoka.|0
ˌakamtupˈia daˈudi na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa mfˈalme mˈawe, iŋɡˈawa vikˈosi vjˈote na walˈinzi maˈalum wˌalikˈuwa kulˈia na kuʃˈoto ˌm̩wa daˈudi.|0
ʃimˈei ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakilaˈani, ˌakasˈema, tˌoka hˈapa, tˌoka hˈapa, wˌewe ˈm̩tu wa dˈamu, wˌewe ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja kabˈisa.|0
bwˈana ˌamekˌulipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja dˈamu jˈote ˌulijomwˈaɡa ja wˈatu wa ɲˈumba ja saˈuli, ambˈaje nafˈasi jˌake ˌumeˌimilˈiki wˈewe. bwˈana ˌamekabˈiði ufˈalme mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwanˈao ˌabsalˈomu. mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌamekupˈata kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ni ˈm̩tu wa dˈamu.|0
ndˈipo ˌabiʃˈai mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, kwa nˈini hˈuju ˈm̩bwa ˈm̩fu ˌamlaˈani bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme? nˌiruhˈusu nivˈuke nˌikatilˈie mbˈali kˈitʃwa tʃˈake.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, ˈm̩na nˈini nˈami, ˈeɲi wˈana wa serˈuja? ikˈiwa ˌanalaˈani kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamemwambˈia, mlaˈani daˈudi, nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌunafˈaɲa hˈivi?.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiʃˈai na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote, mwanˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ambˈaje ˌametˈoka vˌiunˈoni mwˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, ˌanaɟarˈibu kˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu. ɟˈe, si zaˈidi sˈana kwa hˈuju mbˌeɲamˈini! mwatʃˈeni, ˈatʃa ˌalaˈani, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamemwambˈia afˈaɲe hˈivjo.|0
ˌinawˌezekˈana kwˌamba bwˈana ˌataˈona ðˈiki jˈaŋɡu na kˌunilˈipa mˈema kwa aɟˈili ja laˈana nˌinajˌopokˈea lˈeo.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˌendelˈea na safˈari jˈao bˌarabarˈani, hˈuku ʃimˈei akˈiwa ˌanatembˈea pˌembezˈoni ˌm̩wa kilˈima sambˈamba na daˈudi, hˈuku ˌakimlaˈani na kˌumtupˈia daˈudi mˈawe na kˌumruʃˈia mavˈumbi.|0
mfˈalme na wˈatu wˈote ˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe kitˈuo tʃˈao wakˈiwa wˌametʃˈoka. mfˈalme ˌakaɟˌiburudˈiʃa hˈapo.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, ˌabsalˈomu pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakafˈika jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje ˌahiθofˈeli ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
ndˈipo huʃˈai, mwarˈiki, rafˈiki wa daˈudi, ˌakamwendˈea ˌabsalˈomu na kˌumwambˈia, mfˈalme aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu! mfˈalme aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakamˌuulˈiza huʃˈai, ɟˈe, hˈuu n̩dˈio upˈendo ˌunaˌomwoɲˈeʃa rafˈiki jˈako? kwa nˈini hˌukufˌuatˈana na rafˈiki jˈako.|0
huʃˈai ˌakamwambˈia ˌabsalˈomu, la hˈaʃa, jˌeje ˌalijˌetʃaɡulˈiwa na bwˈana, ˌalijˌetʃaɡulˈiwa na wˈatu hˈawa, ˌatakˌajetʃˌaɡulˈiwa tˈena na wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli, hˈuju n̩dˈije nˌitakˌajekˈuwa wˈake, nˌami nˌitabakˈia pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˌimtumikˈie nˈani? ɟˈe, nˌisimtˌumikˈie mwˈana? kˌama vˈile nˌilivjˌomtumikˈia bˈaba jˈako, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokˌutumikˈia wˈewe.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌakamwambˈia ˌahiθofˈeli, tˈupe ʃaˈuri lˈako. tufˈaɲe nˈini.|0
ˌahiθofˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu, kutˈana kimwˈili na mˌasurˈia wa bˈaba jˈako ˌaliˌowaˈatʃa kutˈunza ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. ndˈipo ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌitakˌaposikˈia kwˌamba ˌumeɟifˈaɲa tʃukˈizo kwa bˈaba jˈako, nˈajo mikˈono ja kˈila mmˈoɟa alˈije pamˈoɟa nˌawe ˌitatˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakasimˈika hˈema kwa aɟˈili ja ˌabsalˈomu ɟˌuːja pˈaa, nˌaje ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na mˌasurˈia wa bˈaba jˌake mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote.|0
ˌilikˈuwa katˌika sˈiku hˈizo ʃaˈuri lˌililˌotolˈewa na ˌahiθofˈeli lˌilikˈuwa kˌama lˈile ambˈalo lˌimeulˈizwa kwa mˈuŋɡu. ndˈivjo daˈudi na ˌabsalˈomu wˌalivjˌojaheʃˈimu mˌaʃaˈuri jˈote ja ˌahiθofˈeli.|0
ˌahiθofˈeli ˌakamwambˈia ˌabsalˈomu, nˈipe ruhˈusa nˌiwatʃaɡˈue wˈatu kˈumi na mbˈili ˈelfu na waˈanze safˈari usˈiku hˈuu hˈuu kˌumfuatˈia daˈudi.|0
nˌitamʃˌambulˈia wakˈati akˈiwa ˌametʃˈoka na ni ðaˈifu. nˌitampˈiɡa na hˈofu, na kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌatakimbˈia. nˌitampˈiɡa mfˈalme pˈeke jˈake.|0
na kˌuwarudˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote kwˈako. kˈifo tʃa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌunajˌemtafˈuta kˌitamˌaanˈiʃa kurˈudi kwa wˈote, hakˈuna hˌata ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajeumˈizwa.|0
mpˈaŋɡo hˈuu ˌuliˌonekˈana mzˈuri kwa ˌabsalˈomu na kwa wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini ˌabsalˈomu ˌakasˈema, pˈia mwitˈeni huʃˈai, mwarˈiki, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌusikˈia ˌanatʃˌokisˈema.|0
huʃˈai ˌalipokˈuɟa, ˌabsalˈomu ˌakasˈema, ˌahiθofˈeli ˌametˈoa ʃaˈuri hˈili. ɟˈe, tufˈaɲe ˌanavjosˈema? kˌama sˈivjo, tˈupe maˈoni jˈako.|0
huʃˈai ˌakamɟˈibu ˌabsalˈomu, ʃaˈuri la ˌahiθofˈeli ˌalilotˈoa hˌalifˈai kwa wakˈati hˈuu.|0
ˌunamfahˈamu bˈaba jˈako na wˈatu wˈake, ni wˌapiɡanˈaɟi hodˈari, nˌao ni wakˈali kˌama dˈubu mwˈitu ˌalijˌepokˈoɲua watˈoto wˈake. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, bˈaba jˈako ni mpˌiɡanˈaɟi ɟasˈiri, usˈiku hˌatalˈala pamˈoɟa na vikˈosi.|0
hˌata sˈasa, ˌamefˈitʃwa ndˈani ja pˈaŋɡo ˌau mahˈali peŋɡˈine. kˌama ˌatatˌaŋɡulˈia kˌuʃambulˈia vikˈosi vjˈako, jejˈote ˌasikiˈaje habˈari hˌii ˌatasˈema, kˈuna matʃˈiɲɟo makˈubwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa vikˈosi vˌinavjˌomfuˈata ˌabsalˈomu..|0
bˌasi hˌata jˈule askˈari hodˈari kulˈiko weŋɡˈine wˈote, ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake ni kˌama wa sˈimba, ˌatajejˈuka kwa hˈofu, kwa maˈana ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌanaɟˈua kwˌamba bˈaba jˈako ni mpˌiɡanˈaɟi na kwˌamba wˈale walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌaje ni wˈatu hodˈari.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌakuʃaˈuri: ˌisraˈeli wˈote na wˌakusˌaɲikˈie kwˈako, kˌuanzˈia dˈani hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba, katˌika wˈiŋɡi wˌao ɟˈinsi walˈivjo kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari, wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌukiwˌaoŋɡˈoza vitˈani.|0
ndˈipo tˌutakˌapomʃˌambulˈia popˈote ˌatakˌapoˌonekˈana, nˌasi tˌutamwˌaŋɡukˈia kˌama umˈande ˌunavjoʃˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈarði. jˌeje mweɲˈewe wˈala wˈatu wˌake hakˈuna ˌatakˌajeˈatʃwa hˈai.|0
kˌama ˌatakˌimbilˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wowˈote, bˌasi ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌatazˌuŋɡuʃˈia ˈm̩ɟi ˈule kˈamba, nˌasi tˌutaˌuburˈuta ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo mpˈaka bondˈeni hˌadi ˌisiˌonekˈane hˌata tʃˌaŋɡarˈawe ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌabsalˈomu na wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakasˈema, ʃaˈuri la huʃˈai, mwarˈiki, ni ɟˈema zaˈidi kulˈiko lˈile la ˌahiθofˈeli. kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌusudˈia kupˈiŋɡa ʃaˈuri nzˈuri la ˌahiθofˈeli, ˌili kulˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja ˌabsalˈomu.|0
huʃˈai ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌakuhˈani sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari, ˌahiθofˈeli ˌamemʃaˈuri ˌabsalˈomu na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli kufˈaɲa kˈaða wa kˈaða, lakˈini mˌimi nˌimewˌaʃaˈuri wˌao kufˈaɲa kˈaða wa kˈaða.|0
sˈasa tumˈeni uɟˈumbe harˈaka na kˌumwambˈia daˈudi, usˈiku hˈuu ˌusilˈale kwˈeɲe vivˈuko katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa; vˈuka bˌila kukˈosa, la sˈivjo, mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌofuatˈana nˌaje wˌatamˈezwa..|0
jˌonaθˈani na ˌahimaˈasi wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiŋɡˈoɟa hˌuko ˈen roɡˈeli, nˌaje mtumˈiʃi mmˈoɟa wa kˈike akˈawa ˌanakwˈenda kˌuwapˈaʃa habˈari nˌao wakˈawa wˌanakwˈenda kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme daˈudi, kwa maˈana wˌasiŋɡetˈaka kˌuɟihˌatarˈiʃa kˌuonekˈana wˌakiiŋɡˈia mɟˈini.|0
lakˈini kiɟˈana mmˈoɟa mwˌanaˈume ˌakawaˈona, nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia ˌabsalˈomu. bˌasi wˈote wawˈili wˌakaondˈoka harˈaka, wˌakaˈenda mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa hˌuko bˌahurˈimu. ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa na kisˈima katˌika ˈua wa ɲˈumba jˈake, nˌao jˌonaθˈani na ˌahimaˈasi wˌakaterˈemka ndˈani ja kisˈima hˈitʃo.|0
mkˈewe ˌakatʃukˈua kˌifunˈiko, ˌakakiwˈeka kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa kˈile kisˈima na kˌuanˈika nafˈaka ɟˈuu jˈake. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijˌefahˈamu tʃotʃˈote kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
wˈatu wa ˌabsalˈomu wˌalipofˈika kwa hˈujo mwanˈamke, wˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˈako wˈapi ˌahimaˈasi na jˌonaθˈani? hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakawaɟˈibu, wˌalivˈuka kiɟˈito. wˈatu wa ˌabsalˈomu wˌakapekˈua lakˈini hˌawakˌuwaˈona hˌata mmˈoɟa, hˈivjo wˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
baˌada ja wˈatu hˈao kˌuondˈoka, wˈale wˈatu wawˈili jaˈani jˌonaθˈani na ˌahimaˈasi wˌakapˈanda kutˈoka ˈm̩le kˌisimˈani na kwˈenda kumpˈaʃa mfˈalme daˈudi habˈari. wˌakamwambˈia, ondˈoka, uvˈuke hˈaja mˈaɟi harˈaka. ˌahiθofˈeli ˌameʃaˈuri kˈaða wa kˈaða ðˈidi jˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi na wˈatu wˈote ˌaliokˈuwa nˌao wˌaliondˈoka na kuvˈuka jordˈani. kufˈika wakˈati wa mˌapambazˈuko, hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu hˌata mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟavˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
ˌahiθofˈeli ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba ʃaˈuri lˈake hˌalikˌufuˈatwa, ˌakatandˈika pˈunda wˈake, ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈake kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˈake. ˌakaiwˈeka ɲˈumba jˌake katˌika ˌutaratˈibu, kˈiʃa ˌakaɟiɲˈoŋɡa mweɲˈewe. hˈivjo akˈafa na ˌakazˈikwa katˌika kabˈuri la bˈaba jˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakaˈenda mˌahanaˈimu, nˌaje ˌabsalˈomu ˌakavˈuka jordˈani pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌabsalˈomu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈeka amˈasa ɟˌuːja ɟˈeʃi badˈala ja joˈabu. amˈasa ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌalijeˈitwa jeθˈeri, mwˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa ˌabiɡaˈili bˈinti nahˈaʃi, dˈada jˌake serˈuja mamˈaje joˈabu.|0
wˌaisraˈeli na ˌabsalˈomu wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
daˈudi ˌalipofˈika mˌahanaˈimu, ʃˈobi mwˈana wa nahˈaʃi kutˈoka rˈaba ja wˌaamˈoni, makˈiri mwˈana wa ˌamiˈeli kutˈoka lˈo debˈari, na bˌarzilˈai mɡˌileˈadi kutˈoka rˌoɡelˈimu.|0
wˌakalˈeta mˌatandˈiko ja kˌitandˈani, mˌabakˈuli na vjˈombo vja mfiɲˈanzi. wˌalilˈeta pˈia ŋɡˈano na ʃajˈiri, ˈuŋɡa na bˈisi, mˌaharˈaɡwe na kˈunde.|0
asˈali na mazˈiwa jˌalijoɡˈanda, kondˈoo na ɟibˈini kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mazˈiwa ja ŋɡˈombe kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake ˌili wˈale. kwa maˈana wˌalisˈema, wˈatu wˌameˈona ɲɟˈaa, tˈena wˌametʃˈoka na wˌamepˈata kˈiu hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
daˈudi ˌakakusˈaɲa wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa nˌao na kuwˈeka mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈuma vikˈosi vja askˈari: θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ˌilikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˈamri ja joˈabu, θelˈuθi ja pˈili tʃˈini ja ˌabiʃˈai mwˈana wa serˈuja nduɡˈuje joˈabu, na θelˈuθi ja tˈatu tʃˈini ja itˈai, mɡˈiti. mfˈalme ˌakavˌiambˈia vikˈosi, hakˈika mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌakasˈema, hˌaikupˈasi kwˈenda, ikˈiwa sˌisi tˌutalˌazimˈika kˌukimbˈia, wˌao hˌawatˌatuɟˈali. hˌata kˌama nˈusu jˈetu tukˈifa hˌawataɟˈali, lakˈini wˌewe ˈuna θamˈani ja wˈatu kˌama sˌisi kˈumi ˈelfu. ˌiŋɡekˈuwa bˈora zaˈidi kwˈako bˌasi kˌutupatˈia msaˈada kutˈoka mɟˈini.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌitafˈaɲa lolˈote lˌinalˌoonekˈana ɟˈema zaˈidi kwˈenu. kwa hˈijo mfˈalme ˌakasimˈama kˈando ja lˈaŋɡo wakˈati wˈatu wˈote wˌakitˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa makˈundi ja mamˈia na maˈelfu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawˌaamˈuru joˈabu, ˌabiʃˈai na itˈai, kuwˈeni wapˈole kwa kiɟˈana ˌabsalˈomu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu. vikˈosi vjˈote vˌikasikˈia mfˈalme ˌakitˈoa ˈamri kwa kˈila ɟˌemadˈari kumhˈusu ˌabsalˈomu.|0
ɟˈeʃi lˌikatˈoka kwˈenda kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa vˈita kˌupiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli, hˈivjo vˈita vˌikapiɡˈanwa katˌika msˈitu wa ˌefraˈimu.|0
hˌuko ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli lˌikaʃˈindwa na wˈatu wa daˈudi, sˈiku hˈijo mˌaɟerˈuhi wˌalikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kiˈasi tʃa wˈatu ˌiʃirˈini ˈelfu.|0
vˈita vˌikaenˈea ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima, wˈatu wˈeŋɡi zaˈidi wˌakifˈia msitˈuni sˈiku hˈijo kulˈiko wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
bˌasi ikˈawa ˌabsalˈomu ˌalikutˈana na wˈatu wa daˈudi. jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈanda ɲˈumbu wˈake, nˌaje ɲˈumbu ˌalipopˈita tʃˈini ja matˈawi jˌalijˌosoŋɡˈana ja mwalˈoni mkˈubwa, kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌabsalˈomu kˌilinˈaswa kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti. ˌakaˈatʃwa ˌakinˌiŋɡinˈia hewˈani, wakˈati ɲˈumbu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamempˈanda ˌaliˌendelˈea kwˈenda.|0
mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈale wˈatu ˌalipoˈona, ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, nˌimemwˈona ˌabsalˈomu ˌakinˌiŋɡinˈia kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti wa mwalˈoni.|0
joˈabu ˌakamwambˈia hˈujo ˈm̩tu, nˈini! ˌulimwˈona ˌabsalˈomu? kwa nˈini hˌukumpˈiɡa pˈapo hˈapo mpˈaka tʃˈini? ndˈipo nˌiŋɡekˈupa ʃekˈeli kˈumi za fˈeða na mkˈanda wa askˈari ʃuɟˈaa.|0
lakˈini hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌakamɟˈibu joˈabu, hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡepimˈiwa ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌisiŋɡˌeinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja mwˈana wa mfˈalme. tukˈiwa tˌunasikˈia, mfˈalme ˌalikˌuaɡˈiza wˌewe na ˌabiʃˈai pamˈoɟa na itˈai, ˌakisˈema, mlindˈeni kiɟˈana ˌabsalˈomu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu..|0
nˌami kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimemtendˈea kwa hˈila, na hakˈuna lolˈote lˌinalˌofitʃˈika kwa mfˈalme, wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌuŋɡeɟitˈeŋɡa nˈami.|0
joˈabu ˌakasˈema, mˌimi sˌitapotˈeza mˈuda hˈapa pamˈoɟa nˈawe. hˈivjo ˌakatʃukˈua mikˈuki mitˈatu mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌakamtʃˈoma ˌabsalˈomu nˈajo mojˈoni ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali hˈai ˌakinˌiŋɡinˈia katˌika ˈule mwalˈoni.|0
nˌao wabˈeba silˈaha kˈumi wa joˈabu wˌakamzuŋɡˈuka ˌabsalˈomu, wˌakampˈiɡa na kˌumuˈua.|0
kˈiʃa joˈabu ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, nˈavjo vikˈosi vˌikaˈatʃa kˌuwafuˈata ˌisraˈeli, kwa maˈana joˈabu ˌaliwˌasimamˈiʃa.|0
wˌakamtʃukˈua ˌabsalˈomu, wˌakamtˈupa katˌika ʃˈimo kˈubwa hˌuko msitˈuni na kˌulundˈika lˈundo kˈubwa la mˈawe ɟˈuu jˈake. hˌuko ɲˈuma, wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakakˌimbilˈia ɲumbˈani kwˈao.|0
wakˈati wa uhˈai wa ˌabsalˈomu ˌalikˈuwa ˌametʃukˈua ŋɡˈuzo na kˌuisˌimamˈiʃa katˌika bˈonde la mfˈalme, kwa maˈana ˌalifikˈiri, sˈina mwˈana ˌatakˌajeˌendelˈeza kˌumbukˈumbu ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. ˌakaˈita ŋɡˈuzo hˈijo kwa ɟˈina lˈake mweɲˈewe. nˈajo ˌinaˈitwa mnˈara wa ˌukumbˈuʃo wa ˌabsalˈomu mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
bˌasi ˌahimaˈasi mwˈana wa sadˈoki ˌakasˈema, nˌiruhˈusu mˌimi nˌikimbˈie na kˌumpelekˈea mfˈalme habˈari kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamemwokˈoa mfˈalme kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈake.|0
joˈabu ˌakamwambˈia ˌahimaˈasi, lˈeo si wˌewe ˌutakˌajepelˈeka habˈari. ˌunawˈeza kˌupelˈeka habˈari wakˈati mwiŋɡˈine, lakˈini lˈeo hˌaikupˈasi kˌupelˈeka, kwa sabˈabu mwˈana wa mfˈalme ˌamekˈufa.|0
ndˈipo joˈabu ˌakamwambˈia ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa mkˈuʃi, nˈenda, ˌukamwambˈie mfˈalme kˈile ˌulitʃoˈona. mkˈuʃi ˌakasuɟˈudu mbˈele ja joˈabu ˌakaondˈoka m̩bˈio.|0
ˌahimaˈasi mwˈana wa sadˈoki ˌakamwambˈia tˈena joˈabu, liwˈalo na lˈiwe, tˌafaðˈali nˌiruhˈusu nˌikimbˈie ɲˈuma ja hˈujo mkˈuʃi. lakˈini joˈabu ˌakaɟˈibu, mwanˈaŋɡu, mbˈona watˈaka kwˈenda? wˌewe hˈuna habˈari jojˈote ˌitakˌajokˈupa tˈuzo.|0
ˌahimaˈasi ˌakasˈema, liwˈalo na lˈiwe, natˈaka kˌukimbˈia. kwa hˈijo joˈabu ˌakamwambˈia, hˈaja, kimbˈia! ndˈipo ˌahimaˈasi ˌakakimbˈia kˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia ja kˌupitˈia tˌambarˈare, ˌakafˈika kˈabla ja hˈujo mkˈuʃi.|0
wakˈati daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti kˈati ja lˈaŋɡo la ndˈani na la ɲɟˈe, mlˈinzi ˌakapˈanda ɟˌuːja pˈaa la lˈaŋɡo kˌupitˈia ˌukutˈani. ˌalipˌotazˈama ɲɟˈe, ˌakaˈona ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakikimbˈia pˈeke jˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌahimaˈasi ˌakamwˈita mfˈalme, ˌakasˈema, mˈambo jˈote ni mˈema! ˌakasuɟˈudu mbˈele ja mfˈalme ˈuso wˌake mpˈaka arðˈini, ˌakasˈema, ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako! jˌeje ˌalijˌewatˈoa wˈatu wˈale wˌaliˌoinˈua mikˈono jˈao ðˈidi ja mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˈujo kiɟˈana ˌabsalˈomu jˈuko salˈama? ˌahimaˈasi ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌulikˈuwa na mˌatʃafˈuko mˈeŋɡi mˈara tu joˈabu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanatˈaka kumtˈuma mtumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme pamˈoɟa nˌami mtumˈiʃi wˈako, lakˈini siɟˈui ˌilikˈuwa nˈini.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, simˈama kˈando na ˌusubˈiri hˈapa. bˌasi ˌakasoɡˈea kˈando na kˌusimˈama hˈapo.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mkˈuʃi ˌakawasˈili na kusˈema, mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, sikˈia habˈari ɲɟˈema! lˈeo bwˈana ˌamekˌuokˈoa kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌoinˈuka ðˈidi jˈako.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza hˈujo mkˈuʃi, ɟˈe, kiɟˈana ˌabsalˈomu jˈuko salˈama? hˈujo mkˈuʃi ˌakaɟˈibu, adˈui wa mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na wˈote wˈale wˌaliˌoinˈuka kˌukuðˈuru na wˈawe kˌama hˈujo kiɟˈana.|0
mfˈalme ˌakatˌetemˈeka. ˌakapˈanda tʃumbˈani ɟˈuu kˌupitˈia laŋɡˈoni ˌakilˈia. ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈenda, ˌakasˈema, ˈee mwanˈaŋɡu ˌabsalˈomu! mwanˈaŋɡu, mwanˈaŋɡu ˌabsalˈomu! laˈiti nˌiŋɡekˈufa badˈala jˈako: ˈee ˌabsalˈomu, mwanˈaŋɡu, mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
joˈabu ˌakaambˈiwa, mfˈalme ˌanalˈia na kˌumwombˌolezˈea ˌabsalˈomu.|0
kwa ɟˈeʃi lˈote, uʃˈindi wa sˈiku ˈile ˌukaɡeˈuka kˌuwa mˌaombolˈezo, kwa sabˈabu sˈiku ˈile vikˈosi vˌilisikˈia ˌikisˈemwa, mfˈalme ˌanahˌuzunˈika kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈawe.|0
sˈiku ˈile wˈatu wˌakaiŋɡˈia mɟˈini kˈimja kˌama vˈile wˌaiŋɡiˈavjo kwa aˈibu wˈatu wˌaliˌokimbˈia kutˈoka vitˈani.|0
mfˈalme ˌakafunˈika ˈuso wˌake ˌakalˈia kwa saˈuti, ˌakisˈema, ˈee mwanˈaŋɡu ˌabsalˈomu! ˈee ˌabsalˈomu, mwanˈaŋɡu, mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa joˈabu ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja mfˈalme na kusˈema, lˈeo ˌumewˌaaibˈiʃa wˈatu wˈako wˈote, wˌaliˌookˈoa maˈiʃa jˈako, maˈiʃa ja wanˈao na bˈinti zˈako, maˈiʃa ja wˌake zˈako na mˌasurˈia wˈako.|0
ˌunawapˈenda wˈale wˌanaˌokutʃukˈia, na ˌunawˌatʃukˈia wˈale wˌanaˌokupˈenda. lˈeo ˌumeoɲˈeʃa wˈazi kwˌamba mˌaɟemadˈari wˈako na wˈatu wˌao hawˈana maˈana kwˈako. naˈona kwˌamba ˌuŋɡefurˈahi kˌama ˌabsalˈomu ˌaŋɡekˈuwa hˈai lˈeo na sˌisi sˈote tˈuwe tˌumekˈufa.|0
sˈasa utˈoke ɲɟˈe ˌukawatˈie mˈojo wˈatu wˈako. naˈapa kwa bwˈana kwˌamba ikˈiwa hˌutatˈoka ɲɟˈe, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajesalˈia pamˈoɟa nˌawe ˌifikˈapo lˈeo ɟiˈoni. hˌii ˌitakˈuwa m̩bˈaja zaˈidi kwˈako kulˈiko maˈafa jˈote jˌalijˌokupˈata ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈako hˌadi sˈasa.|0
katˌika mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu wˌalikˈuwa wˌanabiʃˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, wˌakisˈema, mfˈalme ˌalitˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈetu; n̩dˈije ˌalitˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafilˈisti. lakˈini sˈasa mfˈalme ˌameˌikimbˈia ˈn̩tʃi kwa sabˈabu ja ˌabsalˈomu.|0
nˌaje ˌabsalˈomu, tˌulijemtˈia mafˈuta ˌatutawˈale, ˌamekˈufa vitˈani. bˌasi mbˈona hamsˈemi lolˈote kuhˈusu kˌumrudˈiʃa mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa mˌakuhˈani sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari, kusˈema: wˌaulizˈeni wazˈee wa jˈuda, kwa nˈini ˈm̩we wa mwˈiʃo kˌumrudˈiʃa mfˈalme katˌika ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme, mˌaadˈamu kˈile kˌinatʃosˈemwa katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote kˌimemfikˈia mfˈalme katˌika makˈao jˈake.|0
nˈiɲi ni ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, ɲˈama jˈaŋɡu na dˈamu jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. kwa hˈijo kwa nˈini ˈm̩we wa mwˈiʃo kˌumrudˈiʃa mfˈalme?.|0
nˌaɲi mwˌambiˈeni amˈasa, ɟˈe, wˌewe si ɲˈama jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe na dˈamu jˈaŋɡu? mˈuŋɡu na ˌaniʃˌuɣulikˈie, tˈena kwa ukˈali, kˌama kˌuanzˈia sˈasa na kˌuendelˈea wˌewe si ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi lˈaŋɡu mahˈali pa joˈabu..|0
ˌaliipˈata miˈojo ja wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda kˌama vˈile wˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa. wˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme, kusˈema, rˈudi, wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako wˈote.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakarˈudi, ˌakaˈenda hˌadi kˌufikˈia ˈm̩to jordˈani. bˌasi wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa mpˈaka ɡilɡˈali ˌili kutˈoka kwˈenda kumlˈaki mfˈalme na kumvˈuʃa ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
ʃimˈei mwˈana wa ɡˈera, wa kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini kutˈoka bˌahurˈimu, ˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kˌuterˈemka pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˈuda ˌili kumlˈaki mfˈalme daˈudi.|0
pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌalikuwˈepo wˌabeɲamˈini ˈelfu mˈoɟa wakˈiwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na sˈiba, msˌimamˈizi wa ɲˈumba ja saˈuli, pˈia wanˈawe kˈumi na watˈano, na wˌatumˈiʃi ˌiʃirˈini. wˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kwˈenda jordˈani, mahˈali mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuwa.|0
wˌakavˈuka kivˈuko ˌili kˌuwatʃukˈua wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa mfˈalme ˌili kˌuwavˈuʃa na kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃotˈaka. ʃimˈei mwˈana wa ɡˈera ˌalipovˈuka jordˈani, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
na kˌumwambˈia, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na ˌasinˌihesabˈie hatˈia. ˌusikumbˈuke ɟˈinsi mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalivjofˈaɲa kˈosa sˈiku ˈile bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌalipˌoondˈoka jˌerusalˈemu. mfˈalme ˌaliondˈoe mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
kwa maˈana mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako naɟˈua nˌimefˈaɲa ðˈambi, lakˈini lˈeo nˌimekˈuɟa hˈapa kˌama wa kwˈanza wa ɲˈumba jˈote ja josˈefu kuʃˈuka na kumlˈaki bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
ndˈipo ˌabiʃˈai mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, ʃimˈei hapˈaswi kˌuuˈawa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili? ˌalimlaˈani mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi nˈina nˈini nˈaɲi, ˈeɲi wˈana wa serˈuja? lˈeo hˌii mmekˈuwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu! ɟˈe, lˈeo kˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajeuˈawa katˌika ˌisraˈeli? ɟˈe, mˌimi siɟˈui kˌuwa lˈeo ndˈimi mfˈalme katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia ʃimˈei, hˌutakˈufa. nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakamwahˈidi kwa kiˈapo.|0
pˈia mˌefiboʃˈeθi mwˈana wa saˈuli ˌakaʃˈuka kwˈenda kumlˈaki mfˈalme. hakˈuwa ˌamenˈawa miɡˈuu wˈala kuɲˈoa ndˈevu zˌake wˈala kufˈua ŋɡˈuo zˌake ʃˈu sˈiku mfˈalme ˌalipˌoondˈoka jˌerusalˈemu mpˈaka sˈiku ˌaliporˈudi ˈile salˈama.|0
wakˈati ˌalipotˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kˈuɟa kumlˈaki mfˈalme, mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, mˌefiboʃˈeθi, kwa nˈini hˌukufˌuatˈana nˈami.|0
ˌakasˈema, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, mˌaadˈamu mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako ni kiwˈete, nˌilisˈema, nˌitandikˈiwe pˈunda wˈaŋɡu, nimpˈande, ˌili niwˈeze kwˈenda pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme. lakˈini sˈiba mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ˌakanˌisalˈiti.|0
nˌaje ˌamemtʃoŋɡˈea mtumˈiʃi wˈako kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme. bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ni kˌama mˌalaˈika wa mˈuŋɡu, kwa hˈijo fˈaɲa lolˈote lˌinalˌokupendˈeza.|0
wazˈao wˈote wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu hˌawastahˈili kˈitu kiŋɡˈine ˌisipokˈuwa kˈifo kutˈoka kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, lakˈini ulˈimpa mtumˈiʃi wˈako nafˈasi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliokˈula mezˈani pˈako. ɟˈe, ninˈajo hˈaki ɡˈani kumwˈomba mfˈalme zaˈidi ja hˈajo.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, kwa nˈini usˈeme zaˈidi? nˌaamˈuru wˌewe na sˈiba mɡawˈaɲe maʃˈamba.|0
mˌefiboʃˈeθi ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, mruhˈusu ˌatʃukˈue kˈila kˈitu, kwa kˌuwa sˈasa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌamerˈudi ɲumbˈani salˈama.|0
bˌarzilˈai, mɡˌileˈadi, pˈia ˌakaʃˈuka kutˈoka rˌoɡelˈimu ˌili kuvˈuka jordˈani pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme na kˌumsindikˈiza kutˈoka hˌuko.|0
bˌasi bˌarzilˈai ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee sˈana mwˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌemanˈini. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamempatˈia mfˈalme mˌahitˈaɟi wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko mˌahanaˈimu, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu taɟˈiri sˈana.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia bˌarzilˈai, vˈuka pamˈoɟa nˌami na ukˈae nˌami hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, nˌami nˌitakˌupatˈia mˌahitˈaɟi jˈako.|0
lakˈini bˌarzilˈai ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, ɟˈe, nˌitaˈiʃi miˈaka miŋɡˈine miŋɡˈapi, hˌata nipˈande kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme.|0
sˈasa nˈina miˈaka θˌemanˈini. ɟˈe, nawˈeza kˌutofˌautˈiʃa kˈati ja lilˈilo ɟˈema na lilˈilo bˈaja? ɟˈe, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanawˈeza kuɟˈua lˈaða ja kˈile ˌanatʃokˈula ˌau ˌanatʃokˈuɲua? ɟˈe, bˈado nawˈeza kˌusikilˈiza saˈuti za wˌaimbˈaɟi wa kiˈume na za wˌanawˈake? kwa nˈini mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌaoŋɡˈeze mzˈiɡo kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatavˈuka jordˈani pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme kwa umbˈali mfˈupi tˈu, lakˈini kwa nˈini mfˈalme ˌanizˌawadˈie kwa nˈamna hˌii.|0
mruhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako arˈudi, ˌili mˌimi nˌikafˈie katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe karˈibu na kabˈuri la bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mˈama jˈaŋɡu. lakˈini jˈupo hˈapa mtumˈiʃi wˈako kimhˈamu. mruhˈusu avˈuke pamˈoɟa na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme. mtendˈee lolˈote lˌinalˌokupendˈeza.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia bˌarzilˈai, kimhˈamu ˌatavˈuka jordˈani pamˈoɟa nˈami, nˌami nˌitamtendˈea lolˈote lˌitakˌalokˌupendˈeza. nˌawe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃotˈaka kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu nˌitakˌutendˈea.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˈote wˌakavˈuka jordˈani, kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakavˈuka. mfˈalme ˌakambˈusu bˌarzilˈai na kˌumbarˈiki; bˌarzilˈai ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
mfˈalme ˌalipovˈuka kwˈenda ɡilɡˈali, kimhˈamu ˌakavˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈaje. vikˈosi vjˈote vja jˈuda na nˈusu ja vikˈosi vja ˌisraˈeli vˌilimvˈuʃa mfˈalme.|0
baˌada ja kitˈambo kidˈoɡo wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wakˈaɟa kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia, kwa nˈini ndˈuɡu zˈetu, wˈatu wa jˈuda, wˌamemrudˈiʃa mfˈalme kwa sˈiri bˌila kˌutuʃˌirikˈiʃa, na kumvˈuʃa ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani, jˌeje na ɲˈumba jˈake, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda wˌakawaɟˈibu wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, tˌulifˈaɲa hˈivi kwa sabˈabu mfˈalme ni ɟamˈaa jˈetu wa karˈibu. kwa nˈini mnˌakasˌirikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili? ɟˈe, tˌumekˈula kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa mfˈalme? ɟˈe, tˌumeɟˌitʃukulˈia kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kwa aɟˈili jˈetu weɲˈewe.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakawaɟˈibu wˈatu wa jˈuda, tunˈajo hˈaki mˈara kˈumi kwa mfˈalme; sˌisi tˌunahusˈika zaˈidi na daˈudi kulˈiko nˈiɲi. kwa nˈini bˌasi mnˌatuðarˈau? ɟˈe, hˌatukˈuwa wa kwˈanza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza kuhˈusu kˌumrudˈiʃa mfˈalme ɲumbˈani? lakˈini wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakaɟˈibu kwa ukˈali hˌata zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˈasi, kˌulikˈuwa na ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja sˈana ˌalijeˈitwa ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri, mbˌeɲamˈini, ˌalijˌekuwˈako hˌuko. ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na kupˈaza saˈuti, hatˈuna fˈuŋɡu katˌika daˈudi, wˈala hatˈuna sehˈemu katˌika mwˈana wa jˈese! kˈila ˈm̩tu aˈende hemˈani mwˈake, ˈeɲi ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakamwˈatʃa daˈudi na kˌumfuˈata ʃˈeba mwˈana bˈikri. lakˈini wˈatu wa jˈuda wakˈawa karˈibu na mfˈalme wˌao katˌika safˈari jˈote kutˈoka jordˈani mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
daˈudi ˌaliporˈudi katˌika ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, ˌaliwˌatʃukˈua wˈale mˌasurˈia kˈumi ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewaˈatʃa ˌili kˌuaŋɡalˈia ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kˌuwawˈeka ndˈani ja ɲˈumba tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi. ˌakawˈapa mˌahitˈaɟi jˈao lakˈini hˌakukutˈana nˌao kimwˈili. wˌaliwˈekwa kˌifuŋɡˈoni wˌakaˈiʃi kˌama waɟˈane mpˈaka kˈifo tʃˈao.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia amˈasa, waˈite wˈatu wa jˈuda wˈaɟe kwˈaŋɡu katˌika mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu, nˌawe mweɲˈewe uwˈepo hˈapa.|0
lakˈini amˈasa ˌalipokwˈenda kˌuwaˈita jˈuda, ˌalitʃukˈua mˈuda mrˈefu zaˈidi ja ˈule mfˈalme ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamemwekˈea.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ˌabiʃˈai, sˈasa ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri ˌatatˌuletˈea maðˈara zaˈidi kulˈiko ˌalivjofˈaɲa ˌabsalˈomu. wˌatʃukˈue wˈatu wa bwˈana wˈako na ˌumfuatˈie, la sˈivjo ˌatapˈata ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na kˌututorˈoka.|0
hˈivjo wˈatu wa joˈabu, na wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi, pamˈoɟa na wˌapiɡanˈaɟi mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈote wˌakaondˈoka tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wa ˌabiʃˈai. wˌakatˈoka jˌerusalˈemu ˌili kˌumfuˈata ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri.|0
wakˈati wˌalikˈuwa kwˈeɲe mwˈamba mkˈubwa hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni, amˈasa ˌalikˈuɟa kˌuwalˈaki. joˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa mavˈazi jˌake ja kiɟˈeʃi; ɟˈuu jˌake ˌalifˈuŋɡa mkˈanda kwˈeɲe kiˈuno wˌeɲe upˈaŋɡa ndˈani ja ˈala. ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈenda mbˈele, ˈule upˈaŋɡa ˌukaaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈala.|0
joˈabu ˌakamwambˈia amˈasa, u hˈali ɡˈani, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu? kˈiʃa joˈabu ˌakamʃˈika amˈasa ndˈevu kwa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˌili ambˈusu.|0
amˈasa hˌakuˈona upˈaŋɡa ˌuliokˈuwa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa joˈabu, nˌaje joˈabu ˌakamtʃˈoma nˌao tumbˈoni, nˈajo matˈumbo jˌake jˌakamwaɡˈika tʃˈini. pasˈipo kutʃˈomwa mˈara ja pˈili, amˈasa akˈafa. bˌasi joˈabu na ˌabiʃˈai nduɡˈuje wˌakamfˌuatˈia ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri.|0
mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu wa joˈabu ˌakasimˈama kˈando ja amˈasa, ˌakasˈema, jejˈote ˌampendˈaje joˈabu na jejˈote alˈije upˈande wa daˈudi, na ˌamfuˈate joˈabu.|0
amˈasa ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiɡˌaaɡˈaa katˌika dˈamu jˌake kˌatikˈati ja bˌarabˈara; ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakaˈona kwˌamba vikˈosi vjˈote vˌilikˈuwa vˌinasimˈama pˈale. hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌotambˈua kwˌamba kˈila ˌalijefˈika pˈale amˈasa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌalisimˈama, ˌalimburˈuta amˈasa kutˈoka bˌarabarˈani mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba na kˌutupˈia ŋɡˈuo ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
baˌada ja amˈasa kˌuondolˈewa kutˈoka bˌarabarˈani, wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˈenda pamˈoɟa na joˈabu kˌumfuatˈia ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri.|0
ʃˈeba ˌakapˈita katˌika mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli hˌadi ˈabel bˈeθ maˈaka na kˌupitˈia enˈeo lˈote la wabˈeri ambˈao wˌaliɟˌikusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa na kˌumfuˈata.|0
vikˈosi vjˈote vja joˈabu vikˈaɟa na kˌumhusˈuru ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri hˌuko ˈabel bˈeθ maˈaka. wˌakaˌuziŋɡˈira ˈm̩ɟi kwa kuwˈeka vikˈosi vja askˈari, ˌili kˌukabˌiliˈana na ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi. wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanaɡˌoŋɡaɡˈoŋɡa ukˈuta ˌili kˌuubomˈoa na kˌuuaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini.|0
mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa mwˌeɲe busˈara ˌakaˈita kutˈoka ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi, ˌakisˈema, sˌikilizˈeni! sˌikilizˈeni! mwˌambiˈeni joˈabu ˈaɟe hˈapa ˌili niwˈeze kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈaje.|0
joˈabu ˌalikwˈenda mbˈele jˈake, ˌakamˌuulˈiza, wˌewe ni joˈabu? ˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈije mˈimi. jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamwambˈia, sˌikilˈiza kˈile mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatakˌatʃokˌuambˈia. ˌakamwambˈia, nˌinasˌikilˈiza.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, zamˈani za kˈale wˌalikˈuwa wˌakisˈema, wˌakaulˈize ˌuʃaˈuri hˌuko abˈeli, hˈivjo kˌulimalˈiza lˈile ʃaˈuri.|0
sˌisi ni wˈatu wa amˈani na wˌaaminˈifu katˌika ˌisraˈeli. wˌewe ˌunaɟarˈibu kˌuharˈibu ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ni mˈama katˌika ˌisraˈeli. kwa nˈini ˌunatˈaka kumˈeza urˈiθi wa bwˈana.|0
joˈabu ˌakaɟˈibu, hˌilo lˈiwe mbˈali nˈami. hˌilo lˈiwe mbˈali nˌami kumˈeza ˌau kˌuharˈibu.|0
hˈivjo sˈivjo ilˈivjo. ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ɟˈina lˈake ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu, ˌameinˈua mkˈono wˌake ðˈidi ja mfˈalme, ðˈidi ja daˈudi. nˌikabiðˈini ˈm̩tu hˈuju mmˈoɟa, nˌami nˌitaɟˌiondˈoa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu. hˈuju mwanˈamke ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mtˌatupˈiwa kˌupitˈia ɟˌuːja ukˈuta.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakaˈenda kwa wˈatu wˈote akˈiwa na ˌuʃaˈuri wˌake wa busˈara, nˌao wˌakakˈata kˈitʃwa tʃa ʃˈeba mwˈana wa bˈikri na kˌumtupˈia joˈabu. kwa hˈijo joˈabu ˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, na wˈatu wˌake wˌakatˌawaɲˈika kutˈoka mɟˈini, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakireɟˈea ɲumbˈani kwˈake. nˌaje joˈabu ˌakarˈudi kwa mfˈalme hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
joˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi lˈote la ˌisraˈeli; benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌuːja wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi.|0
ˌadorˈamu ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi ja kˌulazimˈiʃwa; jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa ˌahilˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
ʃˈeva ˌalikˈuwa mwandˈiʃi; sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani.|0
na ˈira, mjaˈiri, ˌalikˈuwa kuhˈani wa daˈudi.|0
wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa daˈudi kˌulikˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa kwa miˈaka mitˈatu mfˌululˈizo, kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakaˌutafˈuta ˈuso wa bwˈana. bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu ja saˈuli na ɲˈumba jˌake ˌilijotˈiwa madˈoa ja dˈamu, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwaˈua wˌaɡibeˈoni.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawaˈita wˌaɡibeˈoni na kˌuzumɡˈumza nˈao. wˌaɡibeˈoni hˌawakˈuwa wa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli, ˈila wˌalikˈuwa mabˈaki ja wˌaamˈori. wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈapa kˌuwaˈatʃa hˈai, lakˈini saˈuli katˌika wˈivu wˌake kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda, ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟarˈibu kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza..|0
daˈudi ˌakawˌaulˈiza wˌaɡibeˈoni, nˌiwatendˈee nˈini? nˌitawˌariðiʃˈaɟe ˌili mbarˈiki urˈiθi wa bwˈana.|0
wˌaɡibeˈoni wˌakamɟˈibu, hatˈuna hˈaki ja kudˈai fˈeða wˈala ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwa saˈuli ˌau ɟamˈaa jˈake, wˈala hatˈuna hˈaki ja kˌumuˈua ˈm̩tu jejˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli. daˈudi ˌakawˌaulˈiza, mnatˈaka nˌiwafaɲˈie nˈini.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, kwa habˈari ja ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌetuˌaŋɡamˈiza na kufˈaɲa hˈila m̩bˈaja ðˈidi jˈetu ˌili kwˌamba tˌuaŋɡamˈizwe na tusˈiwe na jejˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
tˌupatiˈeni wazˈao wˌake sˈaba wa kiˈume tˌuwaˈue hˌaðarˈani mbˈele za bwˈana hˌuko ɡibˈea ja saˈuli, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametʃˌaɡulˈiwa na bwˈana. bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, nˌitawˌakabˈiði kwˈenu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamhifˈaði mˌefiboʃˈeθi mwˈana wa jˌonaθˈani, mwˈana wa saˈuli, kwa sabˈabu ja kˈile kiˈapo mbˈele za bwˈana kˈati ja daˈudi na jˌonaθˈani.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌakamtʃukˈua armˈoni na mˌefiboʃˈeθi, wˈana wawˈili wa rˈispa bˈinti aˈija, ambˈao ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemzalˈia saˈuli, pamˈoɟa na wˈana watˈano wa merˈabu bˈinti saˈuli, ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamemzalˈia ˌadriˈeli mwˈana wa bˌarzilˈai, mmˌeholˈaθi.|0
ˌakawˌakabˈiði kwa wˌaɡibeˈoni, ambˈao wˌaliwaˈua na kˌuwawˈeka wˈazi ɟˌuːja kilˈima mbˈele za bwˈana. wˈote sˈaba wˌaliaŋɡˈuka kwa pamˈoɟa; wˌaliuˈawa katˌika sˈiku za kwˈanza za mavˈuno, mˈara tu ˌuvunˈaɟi wa ʃajˈiri ˌulipokˈuwa ˌunaˈanza.|0
rˈispa bˈinti aˈija ˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia, ˌakaɟˌitandikˈia ɟˌuːja mwˈamba. kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo wa mavˈuno mpˈaka mvˈua zˌilipoɲˈeʃa ɟˌuːja miˈili ja hˈao wˌaliˌouˈawa, rˈispa hˌakuruhˈusu ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani kˌuwaɡˈusa wakˈati wa mtʃˈana, wˈala waɲˈama wa mwˈitu wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˈile rˈispa bˈinti aˈija, surˈia wa saˈuli, ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamekifˈaɲa.|0
ˌalikwˈenda ˌakatʃukˈua mifˈupa ja saˈuli na mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi. wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌitʃukˈua kwa sˈiri kutˈoka uwˈaɲɟa wa wˈatu wˈote hˌuko bˈeθ ʃˈani, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewˌatundˈika baˌada ja kˌumuˈua saˈuli hˌuko ɡilbˈoa..|0
daˈudi ˌakailˈeta mifˈupa ja saˈuli na ja mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani kutˈoka hˌuko, pˈia mifˈupa ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameuˈawa na kutˈupwa ˌilikusˈaɲua.|0
wˌakazˈika mifˈupa ja saˈuli na ja mwanˈawe jˌonaθˈani katˌika kabˈuri la kˈiʃi, babˈaje saˈuli, hˌuko sˈela katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu mfˈalme ˌalitʃˌoaɡˈiza. baˌada ja hˈajo, mˈuŋɡu ˌakaɟˈibu maˈombi kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja wˌafilˈisti na ˌisraˈeli. daˈudi ˌakaʃˈuka pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake ˌili kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti, nˌaje akˈawa ˌametʃˈoka sˈana.|0
nˌaje ˈiʃbi benˈobu, mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa wˌarefˈai, ambˈaje mkˈuki wˌake ˌulikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiatˈatu za ʃˈaba, ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟifˈuŋɡa upˈaŋɡa ˈm̩pja, nˌaje ˌalisˈema ˌaŋɡemuˈua daˈudi.|0
lakˈini ˌabiʃˈai mwˈana wa serˈuja akˈaɟa kˌumwokˈoa daˈudi; ˌakampˈiɡa hˈujo mfilˈisti, ˌakamwaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini na kˌumuˈua. ndˈipo wˈatu wˌakamwapˈia daˈudi, wˌakisˈema, kˈamwe hˌutakwˈenda tˈena nˌasi vitˈani, ˌili kwˌamba tˈaa ja ˌisraˈeli isˈiɟe ˌikazˈimwa.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, kukˈawa na vˈita ɲiŋɡˈine na wˌafilˈisti, hˌuko ɡˈobu. wakˈati hˈuo sˌibekˈai, mhuʃˈaθi, ˌakamuˈua sˈafu, mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa wˌarefˈai.|0
katˌika vˈita viŋɡˈine na wˌafilˈisti hˌuko ɡˈobu, ˌelhanˈani mwˈana wa jaˈare ˌoreɡˈimu, mbˌeθlehˈemu, ˌalimuˈua nduɡˈuje ɡˌoliˈaθi, mɡˈiti, ambˈaje mkˈuki wˌake ˌulikˈuwa na mpˈini kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mfumˈaɟi.|0
ˌalipˌowaðihˈaki ˌisraˈeli, jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ʃimˈea, nduɡˈuje daˈudi, ˌakamuˈua.|0
hˈawa wˈanne wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa wˌarefˈai hˌuko ɡˈaθi, nˌao wˌaliaŋɡˈuka kwa mikˈono ja daˈudi na wˈatu wˈake.|0
ˌakasˈema: bwˈana ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje kwˈake nˌinakˌimbilˈia, ŋɡˈao jˈaŋɡu na pˈembe ja wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu. jˌeje ni ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu, hˌuniokˈoa kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˌeɲe ɟeˈuri.|0
nˌinamwˈita bwˈana, ˌanajˌestahˈili kˌusifˈiwa, nˌami nˌinaˌokolˈewa kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
mawˈimbi ja maˈuti jˌalinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mˌafurˈiko ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌalinˌilemˈea.|0
kˈamba za kuzˈimu zˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mitˈeɡo ja maˈuti ˌilinˌikabˈili.|0
katˌika ʃˈida jˈaŋɡu nˌalimwˈita bwˈana, nˌilimlilˈia mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. kutˈoka hˌekalˈuni mwˈake ˌalisikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu, kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu kˌikafˈika mˌasikiˈoni mwˈake.|0
dunˈia ˌilitˌetemˈeka na kˌutikisˈika, misˈiŋɡi ja mbˈiŋɡu ˌikatˌikisˈika, vˌilitˌetemˈeka kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌasirˈika.|0
ˌakazˌipasˈua mbˈiŋɡu ˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini, mawˈiŋɡu meˈusi jˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌalipˈanda ɟˌuːja kerˈubi ˌakarˈuka, ˌakapˈaa ɟˈuu kwa mbˈawa za upˈepo.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa ɡˈiza hˈema lˈake la kˌuɟifunˈika: mawˈiŋɡu meˈusi ja mvˈua ja aŋɡˈani.|0
kˌutokˈana na mwˈaŋɡa wa uwˈepo wˌake mawˈiŋɡu jˌalisoɡˈea, ˌikaɲˈeʃa mvˈua ja mˈawe na umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
bwˈana ˌaliŋɡurˈuma kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, saˈuti ja alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌilisikˈika.|0
ˌaliipˈiɡa miʃˈale na kˌutawˈaɲa adˈui, umˈeme wa rˈadi na kˌuwafukˈuza.|0
mabˈonde ja bahˈari jˌalifˌunulˈiwa, na misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia ikˈawa wˈazi kwa kˌukaripˈia kwˈake bwˈana, kwa uvˈumi wa pˈumzi kutˈoka puˈani mwˈake.|0
ˌaliɲoˈoʃa mkˈono kutˈoka ɟˈuu na kˌuniʃˈika; ˌalinitˈoa kutˈoka kilˈindi tʃa mˈaɟi makˈuu.|0
ˌalinˌiokˈoa kutˈoka adˈui wˈaŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi, kutˈoka adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌaliokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi kulˈiko mˈimi.|0
wˌalinˌikabˈili sˈiku ja msˈiba wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌalinilˈeta ɲɟˈe mahˈali pˈeɲe nafˈasi tˈele, ˌakanˌiokˈoa kwa kˌuwa ˌalipendˈezwa nˈami.|0
bwˈana ˌalinˌitendˈea sˌawasˈawa na ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu; sˌawasˈawa na usˈafi wa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌamenilˈipa.|0
kwa maˈana nˌimeziʃˈika ɲɟˈia za bwˈana; sˌiɟatˈenda ubˈaja nˌikamwˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃerˈia zˌake zˈote zi mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, wˈala sˌiɟajaˈatʃa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake.|0
nˌimekˈuwa sˈina hatˈia mbˈele zˈake, nˌami nˌimeɟilˈinda nˌisitˈende ðˈambi.|0
bwˈana ˌamenilˈipa sˌawasˈawa na ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu, sˌawasˈawa na usˈafi wˈaŋɡu matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
kwa jˌeje alˈije mwˌaminˈifu ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mwˌaminˈifu, kwa asˈije na hatˈia ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌutokˈuwa na hatˈia.|0
kwa alˈije mtˌakatˈifu ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu, lakˈini kwa ˌalijˌepotˈoka ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mkaˈidi.|0
wˌewe hˌuwaokˈoa wˌaɲeɲekˈevu, lakˈini mˈatʃo jˈako ni ɟˌuːja wˌeɲe kibˈuri ˌili ˌuwaʃˈuʃe.|0
wˌewe ni tˈaa jˈaŋɡu, ˈee bwˈana. bwˈana hˌulifˈaɲa ɡˈiza lˈaŋɡu kˌuwa mwˈaŋɡa.|0
kwa msaˈada wˈako nawˈeza kuʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi, nikˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu nˌitawˈeza kurˈuka ukˈuta.|0
kuhˈusu mˈuŋɡu, ɲɟˈia jˌake ni kˌamilˈifu; nˈeno la bwˈana halˈina dosˈari. jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao kwa wˈote wˌanaˌokimbilˈia kwˈake.|0
kwa maˈana ni nˈani alˈije mˈuŋɡu zaˈidi ja bwˈana? ni nˈani alˈije mwˈamba ˌisipokˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
mˈuŋɡu n̩dˈije ˌanivikˈaje ŋɡˈuvu na kufˈaɲa ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa kˌamilˈifu.|0
hˌuifˈaɲa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kˌama miɡˈuu ja kulˈuŋɡu, hˌuniwezˈeʃa kˌusimˈama mahˈali palˈipo ɟˈuu.|0
hˌuifundˈiʃa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kˌupiɡˈana vˈita; mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌinawˈeza kupˈinda upˈinde wa ʃˈaba.|0
hunˈipa ŋɡˈao jˈako ja uʃˈindi, ˌunaɟiʃˈuʃa tʃˈini ˌili kˌuniinˈua.|0
nˌiliwˌafuatˈia adˈui zˈaŋɡu na nˌikawasˈeta, sˌikurˈudi ɲˈuma mpˈaka wˌalipˌoaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
nˌiliwasˈeta kabˈisa, nˌao hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuinˈuka tˈena; wˌaliaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌulinivˈika ŋɡˈuvu kwa aɟˈili ja kˌupiɡˈana vˈita; ˌuliwafˈaɲa adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌasuɟˈudu mˌiɡuˈuni pˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuliwafˈaɲa adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌaɡeˈuke na kˌukimbˈia, nˌami nˌikawˌaaŋɡamˈiza adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌalipˈiɡa jˈowe, lakˈini hˌapakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌuwaokˈoa; wˌalimlilˈia bwˈana, lakˈini hˌakuwaɟˈibu.|0
ˌumenˌiokˈoa kˌutokˈana na mˌaʃambulˈizi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu; ˌumenˌihifˈaði mˌimi kˌama kˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌataˈifa. wˈatu ambˈao sˌikuwaɟˈua wˌananˌitumikˈia.|0
nˌao waɡˈeni hˈuɟa wˌakinˌiɲeɲekˈea, mˈara wˌanisˌikiˈapo, hˌunitˈii.|0
bwˈana ju hˈai! sˈifa ni kwa mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu! ˌatukˈuzwe mˈuŋɡu, mwˈamba, mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu ˌanilˌipiziˈaje kisˈasi, ˌajawekˈaje mˌataˈifa tʃˈini jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌaniwekˈaje hˈuru tˌoka kwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu. ˌulinˌiinˈua ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu; ˌulinˌiokˈoa tˌoka kwa wˈatu wˌaɟeˈuri.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitakusˈifu, ˈee bwˈana, kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa; nˌitalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
hˈumpa mfˈalme wˌake uʃˈindi m̩kˈuu; hˌuoɲˈeʃa faðˈili zˌake kwa mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake, kwa daˈudi na wazˈao wˌake milˈele.|0
hˈaja ni manˈeno ja mwˈiʃo ja daˈudi: nˈeno la daˈudi mwˈana wa jˈese, nˈeno la ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeinulˈiwa na alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, ˈm̩tu ˌalijepˈakwa mafˈuta na mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo, mwimbˈaɟi wa ɲˈimbo wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌalinˈena kˌupitˈia kwˈaŋɡu, nˈeno lˈake lˌilikˈuwa ˌulimˈini mwˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalinˈena, mwˈamba wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakanˌiambˈia: ˈm̩tu ˌanatawˈala wˈatu kwa hˈaki, wakˈati ˌanapˌotawˈala akˈiwa na hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
jˌeje ni kˌama mwˈaŋɡa wa ˌasubˈuhi ɟˈua lˌitʃomozˈapo ˌasubˈuhi isˈijo na mawˈiŋɡu, kˌama mwˈaŋɡa baˌada ja mvˈua ˌutʃipuzˈao maɟˈani kutˈoka arðˈini..|0
ɟˈe, si hˈivjo ilˈivjo ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, hˌaɟafˈaɲa aɡˈano la milˈele nˈami, lˌililopˈaŋɡwa na kˌuimarˈiʃwa kˈila sehˈemu? ɟˈe, hˌatanifˈaɲa nˌiufˌurahˈie wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuniɟalˈia matˈakwa jˈaŋɡu jˈote.|0
lakˈini wˈatu waˈovu wˈote wˌatatˈupwa kˈando kˌama miˈiba, ambˈajo hˌaikusˈaɲui kwa mkˈono.|0
jejˈote ˌaɡusˈaje miˈiba hˌutumˈia tʃˈombo tʃa tʃˈuma ˌau mpˈini wa mkˈuki, nˈajo hutʃˈomwa pˈale ilˈipo.|0
