wa pˈili wˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa dodˈai, mwahˈohi. akˈiwa mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈale mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu, ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na daˈudi wakˈati wˌaliwˌaðihˈaki wˌafilˈisti wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˌuko pˈas damˈimu kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita. kˈiʃa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakarˈudi ɲˈuma.|0
lakˈini jˌeje ˌalisimˈama imˈara ˌakawaˈua wˌafilˈisti hˌadi mkˈono wˌake ˌukatʃˈoka na ˌukaɡˌandamˈana na upˈaŋɡa. bwˈana ˌakawˈapa uʃˈindi mkˈubwa sˈiku ˈile. vikˈosi vˌikarˈudi kwa ˌeleazˈari, kutˈeka tu ɲˈara za wˌaliokˈufa.|0
ˌalijˌefuˈata ˌalikˈuwa ʃˈama mwˈana wa aɡˈee, mharˈari. wˌafilˈisti wˌalipˌokusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa mahˈali pˌalipokˈuwa ʃˈamba lˌililoɟˈaa dˈeŋɡu, vikˈosi vja ˌisraˈeli vˌiliwˌakimbˈia.|0
lakˈini ʃˈama ˌakasimˈama imˈara kˌatikˈati ja lˈile ʃˈamba. ˌakalˌitetˈea na kˌuwaˈua wˌafilˈisti, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakawˈapa uʃˈindi mkˈubwa.|0
wakˈati wa mavˈuno, vˌioŋɡˈozi watˈatu kˈati ja vˌioŋɡˈozi θˌelaθˈini wˌaliʃˈuka, wˌakamwendˈea daˈudi katˌika pˈaŋɡo la ˌadulˈamu, wakˈati kikˈundi tʃa wˌafilˈisti kˌilikˈuwa kˌimepˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
daˈudi ˌakatamˈani mˈaɟi, ˌakasˈema, laˈiti ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡenˌipatˈia mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua kutˈoka kisˈima kilˈitʃo karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
bˌasi mˌaʃuɟˈaa hˈao watˈatu wˌakapˈeɲa kˌatikˈati ja wˌafilˈisti, wˌakaˈenda kutʃˈota mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwa kisˈima kilˈitʃo karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la bˌeθlehˈemu, wˌakamletˈea daˈudi. lakˈini daˈudi ˌakakatˈaa kujˈaɲua. badˈala jˈake, ˌalijˌamimˈina mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ˌakasˈema, ˈiwe mbˈali nˈami, ˈee bwˈana, kufˈaɲa kˈitu hˈiki. ɟˈe, hˌii si dˈamu ja wˈatu ambˈao wˌalikwˈenda kwa kˌuhatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈao? nˌaje daˈudi hˌakujˈaɲua. hˈaja jˌalifˈaɲua na hˈao mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu.|0
ˌabiʃˈai ndˈuɡu jˌake joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa hˈao watˈatu. ˌaliinˈua mkˈuki wˌake ðˈidi ja wˈatu mˌiatˈatu ambˈao ˌaliwaˈua, kwa hˈijo nˌaje akˈawa na sˈifa kˌama hˈao watˈatu.|0
ɟˈe, hˌakupˈata heʃˈima kˈubwa zaˈidi kulˈiko hˈao watˈatu? ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wˈao, iŋɡˈawa hˌakuhˌesabˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
pˈia ˌalimuˈua mmˈisri mrˈefu mkˈubwa. iŋɡˈawa mmˈisri ˌalikˈuwa na mkˈuki mkonˈoni mwˈake, benˈaja ˌalimwendˈea akˈiwa na rˈuŋɡu. ˌalipokˈoɲa mkˈuki kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mmˈisri na kˌumuˈua kwa mkˈuki wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa mˈambo ja ˌuʃuɟˈaa ja benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada; nˌaje pˈia ˌalikˈuwa mˌaarˈufu kˌama wˈale mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini wˌalikuwˈepo: ˌasahˈeli ndˈuɡu wa joˈabu; ˌelhanˈani mwˈana wa dˈodo kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
ʃˈama, mharˈodi; elˈika, mharˈodi.|0
helˈesi, mpˈalti; ˈira mwˈana wa ikˈeʃi kutˈoka tekˈoa.|0
ˌabiezˈeri kutˈoka ˌanaθˈoθi; mˌebunˈai, mhuʃˈaθi.|0
salmˈoni, mwahˈohi; mˌaharˈai, mnˌetofˈaθi.|0
helˈedi mwˈana wa baˈana, mnˌetofˈaθi; itˈai mwˈana wa ribˈai kutˈoka ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ˈabi albˈoni, mwˌaribˈaθi; ˌazmawˈeθi, mbarhˈumi.|0
ˌeliˈaba, mʃˌaalbˈoni; wˈana wa jaʃˈeni; jˌonaθˈani.|0
mwˈana wa ʃˈama, mharˈari; ˌahiˈamu mwˈana wa ʃarˈari, mharˈari.|0
ˌelifelˈeti mwˈana wa ˌahasbˈai, mmˌaakˈaθi; ˌeliˈamu mwˈana wa ˌahiθofˈeli, mɡilˈoni.|0
hˈezro, mkarmˈeli; pˌaarˈai, mwˈarbi.|0
selˈeki, mwamˈoni; nˌaharˈai, mbˌeerˈoθi, ˌalijekˈuwa mbˈeba silˈaha za joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja.|0
ˈira, mwiθˈiri; ɡarˈebu, mwiθˈiri.|0
na urˈia, mhˈiti. ɟˈumla jˈao wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu θˌelaθˈini na sˈaba.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka tˈena ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakamtʃotʃˈea daˈudi ðˈidi jˈao, ˌakisˈema, nˈenda ˌukawˌahesˈabu ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu, pamˈoɟa na mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌaliokˈuwa nˈao, nendˈeni kwa mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli kˌuanzˈia dˈani hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba na mwˌandikˈiʃe wˈatu wˌapiɡanˈaɟi, ˌili niwˈeze kuɟˈua idˈadi jˈao.|0
lakˈini joˈabu ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˌazidˈiʃe ɟˈeʃi mˈara mˈia, nˈajo mˈatʃo ja bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme na jaˈone hˈili. lakˈini kwa nˈini bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌanatˈaka kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa nˈamna hˌii.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, nˈeno la mfˈalme likˈawa na ŋɡˈuvu ɟˌuːja joˈabu pamˈoɟa na mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, kwa hˈijo wˌakaondˈoka mbˈele ja mfˈalme kˌuandikˈiʃa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja kuvˈuka jordˈani, wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na ˌaroˈeri, kusˈini ja ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˈoko kwˈeɲe bˈonde ɟembˈamba, ndˈipo wˌakipitˈia ɡˈadi, wˌakaˈenda hˌadi jazˈeri.|0
wˌalikwˈenda hˌadi ɡˌileˈadi na pˈia enˈeo la tahtˈimu hˈodʃi, wˌakaˌendelˈea hˌadi dˈani jaˈani na kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kˌuelekˈea sidˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaˈenda kˌuelekˈea ŋɡˈome ja tˈiro pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈote ja wahˈivi na ja wˌakanaˈani. mwiʃˈoni, wˌalikwˈenda mpˈaka bˈeer ʃˈeba katˌika neɡˈebu ja jˈuda.|0
baˌada ja kupˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima, wˌalirˈudi jˌerusalˈemu baˌada ja miˈezi tˈisa na sˈiku ˌiʃirˈini.|0
joˈabu ˌakatˈoa hesˈabu ja wˌapiɡanˈaɟi kwa mfˈalme: katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌulikuwˈako wˈatu mˌianˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌeɲe uwˈezo wa kˌupiɡˈana, na katˌika jˈuda wˈatu mˌiatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ðamˈiri ja daˈudi ˌiliʃtˈuka baˌada ja kˌuwahesˈabu wˌapiɡanˈaɟi, nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, nˌimefˈaɲa ðˈambi kˈubwa kwa kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili. ˈee bwˈana, sˈasa nˌinakusˈihi, ondˈoa hatˈia ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako. nˌimefˈaɲa ɟˈambo la kˌipumbˈavu sˈana.|0
kˈabla daˈudi hˌaɟaˈamka kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilikˈuwa lˌimemɟˈia ɡˈadi nabˈii, ˌalijekˈuwa mwonˈaɟi wa daˈudi, kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie daˈudi, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌinakˈupa wˌewe ˌutʃaɡˈuzi wa mˈambo matˈatu. nˌitʃaɡulˈie mˌoɟawˈapo nˌitakˌalotˈenda ðˈidi jˈako..|0
bˌasi ɡˈadi ˌakaˈenda kwa daˈudi na kˌumwambˈia, ɟˈe, ˈiɟe ɲɟˈaa ja miˈaka mitˈatu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako? ˌau miˈezi mitˈatu ja kˌukimbˈia adˈui zˈako wˌakikˌufuatˈia? ˌau sˈiku tˈatu za taˈuni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako? bˌasi sˈasa, fikˈiri ɟˌuːja hˌilo na ˌuamˈue ɟˈinsi nˌitakˌavjomɟˈibu hˈujo ˌalijˌenitˈuma.|0
daˈudi ˌakamɟˈibu ɡˈadi, nˌitatˌaabˈika sˈana. ˌafaðˈali tˌuaŋɡukˈie mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kwa maˈana rehˈema zˌake ni kˈuu, lakˈini ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaŋɡˈuke mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakatˈuma taˈuni katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌuanzˈia ˌasubˈuhi mpˈaka mwˈiʃo wa mˈuda ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa, wakˈafa wˈatu sabˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kˌuanzˈia dˈani hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
mˌalaˈika ˌalipˌoɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ˌili kˌuaŋɡamˈiza jˌerusalˈemu, bwˈana ˌakahˌuzunˈika kwa sabˈabu ja maˈafa, ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanawaðˈuru wˈatu, jatˈoʃa! rudˈiʃa mkˈono wˈako. wakˈati hˈuo mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia ja ˌaraˈuna, mjebˈusi.|0
ikˈawa daˈudi ˌalipomwˈona hˈujo mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakiwaˈua wˈatu, ˌakamwambˈia bwˈana, mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijetˈenda ðˈambi na kukˈosa. hˈawa ni kondˈoo tˈu. wˌamefˈaɲa nˈini? mkˈono wˈako ˈuwe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu na ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈiku hˈijo ɡˈadi ˌakamwendˈea daˈudi na kˌumwambˈia, pˈanda ˌukamɟeŋɡˈee bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia ja ˌaraˈuna mjebˈusi.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakakwˈea kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru kwa kˈiɲua tʃa ɡˈadi.|0
ˌaraˈuna ˌakasˈema, mbˈona bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌamekˈuɟa kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈake? daˈudi ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌununˈua sakˈafu jˈako ja kˌupurˈia, ˌili niwˈeze kˌumɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu, ˌili taˈuni ilˈijo katˌika wˈatu ˌiondolˈewe.|0
ˌaraˈuna ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme na ˌatʃukˈue tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃˌompendˈeza na ˌakitˈoe sadˈaka. hˈapa kˈuna maksˈai kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, pˈia kˈuna mˈiti ja kˌupurˈia na nˈira za ŋɡˈombe kwa aɟˈili ja kˈuni.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, ˌaraˈuna ˌanatˈoa vjˈote hˈivi kwa mfˈalme. pˈia ˌaraˈuna ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˌakukubˈali.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌakamɟˈibu ˌaraˈuna, la hˈaʃa, nˌasisitˈiza kˌuvilipˈia. sˌitatˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌisijˌoniɣarˈimu tʃotʃˈote. kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakanunˈua ˈile sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka na maksˈai, ˌakazˌilipˈia ʃekˈeli hamsˈini za fˈeða.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu mahˈali hˈapo, na kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi, nˈajo taˈuni ˌikakˈoma katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa m̩zˈee ˈumri ukˈiwa ˌumesoɡˈea, hˌakuwˈeza kupˈata ɟˈoto hˌata wˌalipˌomfunˈika kwa ŋɡˈuo.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakamwambˈia, tˌuruhˈusu tˌumtafˈute kiɟˈana mwˌanamwˈali bikˈira ˌamhudumˈie mfˈalme na kumtˈunza. ˌanawˈeza kulˈala pembˈeni mwˈake ˌili bwˈana wˈetu mfˈalme apˈate ɟˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatafˈuta katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌili kumpˈata msitʃˈana mzˈuri wa sˈura na wˌakampˈata ˌabiʃˈaɡi, mʃunˈami, wˌakamlˈeta kwa mfˈalme.|0
msitʃˈana hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa mzˈuri sˈana wa sˈura, ˌakamtˈunza mfˈalme na kˌumhudumˈia, lakˈini mfˈalme hˌakufˈaɲa nˌaje tˈendo la n̩dˈoa.|0
bˌasi ˌadonˈija, ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa haɡˈiθi, ˌakaɟiɡˈamba na kusˈema, mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa mfˈalme. hˈivjo ˌakaɟˌiwekˈea tajˈari maɡˈari na wapˈanda farˈasi, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu hamsˈini wa kˌumtaŋɡulˈia wˌakikimbˈia.|0
bˈaba jˌake hakˈuwa ˌameˌiŋɡilˈia na kˌumuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌunafˈaɲa hˈivjo? ˌalikˈuwa pˈia kiɟˈana mzˈuri sˈana wa sˈura, na ˌalizalˈiwa baˌada ja ˌabsalˈomu..|0
ˌadonˈija ˌakaʃˌauriˈana pamˈoɟa na joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja na kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari, nˌao wˌakamsˌaidˈia.|0
lakˈini kuhˈani sadˈoki, benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada, naθˈani nabˈii, ʃimˈei, rˈei na walˈinzi maˈalum wa daˈudi hˌawakˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na ˌadonˈija.|0
ndˈipo ˌadonˈija ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ja kondˈoo, ŋɡˈombe na ndˈama wˌalionˈona kwˈeɲe ɟˈiwe la zˌohelˈeθi karˈibu na ˈen roɡˈeli. ˌakawˌaalˈika ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote, wˈana wa mfˈalme na wˌanaˈume wˈote wa jˈuda wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini hˌakumwalˈika nabˈii naθˈani, benˈaja, walˈinzi maˈalum wa mfˈalme, wˈala ndˈuɡu jˌake sˌolomˈoni.|0
ndˈipo naθˈani ˌakamˌuulˈiza baθʃˈeba, mˈama jˌake sˌolomˈoni, ɟˈe, hˌuɟasikˈia kwˌamba ˌadonˈija, mwˈana wa haɡˈiθi, ˌamekˈuwa mfˈalme pasˈipo bwˈana wˈetu daˈudi kuɟˈua ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, ˈatʃa nˌikuʃaˈuri ɟˈinsi ˌutakˌavjookˈoa uhˈai wˈako mweɲˈewe na uhˈai wa mwanˈao sˌolomˈoni.|0
iŋɡˈia kwa mfˈalme daˈudi na ˌumwambˈie, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, ɟˈe hˌukunˌiapˈia mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako: hakˈika mwanˈao sˌolomˈoni ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme baˌada jˈaŋɡu na n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ufˈalme? kwa nˈini bˌasi ˌadonˈija ˌamekˈuwa mfˈalme?.|0
ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌukizuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme, nˌitaiŋɡˈia na kˌuθibitˈiʃa hˈajo ˌulijˌojasˈema.|0
hˈivjo baθʃˈeba ˌakaˈenda kumwˈona mfˈalme tʃumbˈani mwˈake mahˈali ambˈapo ˌabiʃˈaɡi, mʃunˈami, ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimhˌudumˈia, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee sˈana.|0
baθʃˈeba ˌakasuɟˈudu na kupˈiɡa maɡˈoti mbˈele ja mfˈalme. mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈini hˈiki ˌunatʃotˈaka.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌulinˌiapˈia mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwˌamba: sˌolomˈoni mwanˈao ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme baˌada jˈaŋɡu na n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajekˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ufˈalme..|0
lakˈini sˈasa ˌadonˈija ˌamekˈuwa mfˈalme, nˈawe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme hˈuna habˈari kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
ˌametˈoa ðabˈihu idˈadi kˈubwa ja ŋɡˈombe, ndˈama wˌalionˈona na kondˈoo, nˌaje ˌamewˌaalˈika wˈana wa mfˈalme wˈote, kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari, na joˈabu ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, lakˈini hˌakumwalˈika sˌolomˈoni mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, mˈatʃo ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote jˌanakˌutazˈama wˌewe waɟˈue kutˈoka kwˈako kˌuwa ni nˈani ˌatakˌajekˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
kˌama sˈivjo, mˈara tu bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌatakˌapopumzˈiʃwa pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, mˌimi na mwanˈaŋɡu sˌolomˈoni tˌutatendˈewa kˌama wˌahalˈifu.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali ˌanazuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme, nabˈii naθˈani ˌakafˈika.|0
wˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, nabˈii naθˈani jˈuko hˈapa. kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda mbˈele ja mfˈalme na kˌumsuɟudˈia hˌadi ˈuso wˌake ˌukaɡˈusa ˈarði.|0
naθˈani ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, ˌumetaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa ˌadonˈija ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme baˌada jˈako na kwˌamba ˌatakˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ufˈalme.|0
lˈeo ˌameʃˈuka na kutˈoa ðabˈihu idˈadi kˈubwa ja ŋɡˈombe, ndˈama wˌalionˈona na kondˈoo. ˌamewˌaalˈika wˈana wˈote wa mfˈalme, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi na kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari. sˈasa hˈivi, wˌanakˈula na kˈuɲua pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakisˈema, aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu, mfˈalme ˌadonˈija!.|0
lakˈini mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kuhˈani sadˈoki, benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada na mtumˈiʃi wˈako sˌolomˈoni hˌakutˌualˈika.|0
ɟˈe, hˈili ni ɟˈambo ambˈalo bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌamelifˈaɲa pasˈipo kˌuwaɟulˈiʃa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ˌili wapˈate kuɟˈua ni nˈani ˌatakˌajekˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakasˈema, mwˈite baθʃˈeba, ˌaiŋɡˈie ndˈani. hˈivjo ˌakaiŋɡˈia mbˈele ja mfˈalme na kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈake.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakaˈapa: hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ambˈaje ˌamenˌiokˈoa kutˈoka kˈila taˈabu.|0
hakˈika nˌitatˌekelˈeza lˈeo kˈile nˌilitʃˌokuapˈia kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mwanˈao sˌolomˈoni ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme baˌada jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌatakˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ufˈalme baˌada jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa baθʃˈeba ˌakasuɟˈudu ˌakipˈiɡa maɡˈoti mbˈele ja mfˈalme ˈuso wˌake ˌukiɡˈusa ˈarði ˌakasˈema, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme daˈudi na aˈiʃi milˈele.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakasˈema, mwˈite kuhˈani sadˈoki ndˈani, nabˈii naθˈani na benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada. wˌalipofˈika mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia: wˌatʃukuˈeni wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana wˈenu pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi na mkˌamkalˈiʃe mwanˈaŋɡu sˌolomˈoni ɟˌuːja ɲˈumbu wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe mkˌamterˈemʃe hˌadi ɡihˈoni.|0
hˌuko kuhˈani sadˈoki na nabˈii naθˈani wamtˈie mafˈuta ˈawe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli. piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta na mpˈaze saˈuti, mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu!.|0
kˈiʃa mtapˈanda pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌatakˈuɟa na kukˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ufˈalme na kˌutawˈala badˈala jˈaŋɡu. nˌimemwˈeka ˈawe mtawˈala ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda.|0
benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, ˈamen! bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, na asˈeme vˈivjo hˈivjo.|0
kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, vˈivjo hˈivjo na ˈawe na sˌolomˈoni kˌukifˈaɲa kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˌutawˈala kˌuwa kikˈuu kulˈiko kˈile tʃa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme daˈudi.|0
hˈivjo kuhˈani sadˈoki, nabˈii naθˈani, benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada, wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi wˌakampandˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ɟˌuːja ɲˈumbu wa mfˈalme daˈudi, nˌao wˌakamsˌindikˈiza hˌadi ɡihˈoni.|0
kuhˈani sadˈoki ˌakatʃukˈua pˈembe ja mafˈuta kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈema tˌakatˈifu na kumtˈia sˌolomˈoni mafˈuta. kˈiʃa wˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na wˈatu wˈote wˌakapˈaza saˈuti wˌakisˈema, mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
na wˈatu wˈote wˌakakwˈea wˌakimfuˈata, wˌakipˈiɡa filˈimbi na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia sˈana, hˌata ˈarði ˌikatˌikisˈika kwa ˈile saˈuti.|0
ˌadonˈija pamˈoɟa na waɡˈeni wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakasikˈia saˈuti hˈijo wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakimˌalizˈia karˈamu jˈao. wˌalipˌosikˈia saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta, joˈabu ˌakaulˈiza, nˈini maˈana ja mˌakelˈele jˈote hˈaja katˌika ˈm̩ɟi.|0
hˌata ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanasˈema, jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari ˌakafˈika. ˌadonˈija ˌakasˈema, iŋɡˈia ndˈani. ˈm̩tu mstahˈiki kˌama wˌewe ni lazˈima alˈete habˈari ɲɟˈema.|0
jˌonaθˈani ˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa! mfˈalme daˈudi bwˈana wˈetu ˌamemfˈaɲa sˌolomˈoni kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌamemtˈuma pamˈoɟa nˌaje kuhˈani sadˈoki, nabˈii naθˈani, benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada, wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi, nˌao wˌamempandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja ɲˈumbu wa mfˈalme.|0
nˌao kuhˈani sadˈoki na nabˈii naθˈani wˌamemtˈia mafˈuta kˌuwa mfˈalme hˌuko ɡihˈoni. kˌuanzˈia hˈapo wˌameˌendelˈea kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia na saˈuti zˌimeenˈea pˈote mɟˈini. hˈizo ndˈizo kelˈele ˌunazˌosikˈia.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, sˌolomˈoni ˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme.|0
pˈia, mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wˌamekˈuɟa ˌili kˌumtakˈia hˈeri bwˈana wˈetu mfˈalme daˈudi wˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu wˈako na ˌalifˈaɲe ɟˈina la sˌolomˈoni kˌuwa mˌaʃuhˈuri kulˈiko lˈako na kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme kˈiwe na ukˈuu kulˈiko tʃˈako! nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakasuɟˈudu ˌakiabˈudu kˌitandˈani mwˈake.|0
na kusˈema, ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje ˌameruhˈusu mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kuˈona mrˈiθi ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ufˈalme lˈeo hˌii..|0
katˌika hˈili, waɡˈeni wˈote wa ˌadonˈija wˌakainˈuka kwa mʃtˈuko wa hˈofu na kˌutawaɲˈika.|0
lakˈini ˌadonˈija kwa kˌumwoɡˈopa sˌolomˈoni, ˌakaˈenda na kuʃˈika pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakaambˈiwa, ˌadonˈija ˌanamwoɡˈopa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni na ˌameʃˌikilˈia pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu. ˌanasˈema, mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni na ˌaniapˈie lˈeo kwˌamba hˌatamuˈua mtumˈiʃi wˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa..|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama ˌakiɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa ˈm̩tu mstahˈiki, hakˈuna ˌuɲuˈele wˌake ˌutakˌaoaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈarði, lakˈini kˌama uˈovu ˌukiˌonekˈana ndˈani jˈake, ˌatakˈufa.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakawatˈuma wˈatu, nˌao wˌakamʃˈuʃa kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni. nˌaje ˌadonˈija akˈaɟa ˌakamwˌinamˈia mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni, nˌaje sˌolomˈoni ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda ɲumbˈani kwˈako.|0
sˈiku zˌilipˌokaribˈia za daˈudi kˈufa, akˈampa mwanˈawe sˌolomˈoni aɡˈizo.|0
ˌakasˈema, mˌimi nˌinakˌaribˈia kwˈenda ɲɟˈia ja dunˈia jˈote. hˈivjo ˈuwe hodˈari, ɟˌioɲˈeʃe kˌuwa mwˌanaˈume.|0
ʃˈika lˈile bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌanalˌokuaɡˈiza: enˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, uʃˈike mˌaaɡˈizo na ˈamri zˈake, ʃerˈia zˌake na kanˈuni zˈake, kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose, ˌili upˈate kustˈawi katˌika jˈote ˌufaɲˈajo na popˈote ˌuendˈako.|0
ˌili kwˌamba bwˈana awˈeze kˌunitˌimizˈia ahˈadi jˈake: kˌama wazˈao wˈako wˌakiˌaŋɡalˈia sˈana wˌanavjoˈiʃi, na kˌama wˌakienˈenda kwa ˌuaminˈifu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kwa miˈojo jˈao jˈote na kwa rˈoho zˈao zˈote, kˈamwe hˌutakˈosa kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli..|0
sˈasa wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌunafahˈamu lˈile joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌalilˌonitendˈea, lˈile ˌalilofˈaɲa kwa mˌaɟemadˈari wawˈili wa maɟˈeʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, na amˈasa mwˈana wa jeθˈeri. ˌaliwaˈua, ˌakimwˈaɡa dˈamu jˈao wakˈati wa amˈani kˌama vˈile ni kwˈeɲe vˈita, tˈena ˌakaipˈaka dˈamu ˈile kwˈeɲe mkˈanda ˌuliokˈuwa kˌiunˈoni mwˈake na viˈatu ˌalivjovˈaa mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈake.|0
ʃˌuɣulˈika nˌaje kwa kadˈiri ja hekˈima jˈako, lakˈini ˌusiˈatʃe kˈitʃwa tʃˈake tʃˌeɲe mvˈi kˌiʃukˈie kabˈuri kwa amˈani.|0
lakˈini ˌuwaoɲˈeʃe wˈema wˈana wa bˌarzilˈai wa ɡˌileˈadi na ˌuwaruhˈusu wˈawe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale walˈao mezˈani pˈako. wˌalisimˈama nˌami nˌilipˌomkimbˈia ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌabsalˈomu.|0
ˌukumbˈuke, unˈaje ʃimˈei mwˈana wa ɡˈera, mbˌeɲamˈini kutˈoka bˌahurˈimu, ambˈaje ˌalinˌilaˈani kwa laˈana kˈali sˈiku nˌilijokwˈenda mˌahanaˈimu. ˌalipoʃˈuka kˌunilˈaki hˌuko jordˈani, nˌilimwapˈia kwa bwˈana: sˌitakuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa!.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, ˌusiðˈani kwˌamba hˈana hatˈia. wˌewe ni ˈm̩tu wa hekˈima, ˌutaɟˈua la kˌumtendˈea. ziʃˈuʃe mvˈi zˌake kˌaburˈini kwa dˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakapumzˈika pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
kwa hˈijo sˌolomˈoni ˌakakˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa bˈaba jˌake daˈudi, nˌao ˌutawˈala wˌake ˌukaˌimarˈika sˈana.|0
bˌasi ˌadonˈija, mwˈana wa haɡˈiθi, ˌakaˈenda kwa baθʃˈeba, mˈama jˌake sˌolomˈoni. baθʃˈeba ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌumekˈuɟa kwa amˈani? ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, kwa amˈani.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaoŋɡˈeza, ninˈalo ɟˈambo la kˌukuambˈia. ˌakaɟˈibu, wawˈeza kˌulisˈema.|0
ˌakasˈema, kˌama ˌunavjoɟˈua, ufˈalme ˌulikˈuwa wˈaŋɡu. ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalinˌiaŋɡalˈia mˌimi kˌama mfˈalme wˈao. lakˈini mˈambo jˌalibˌadilˈika, ufˈalme ˌumekwˈenda kwa ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana ˌumemɟˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
sˈasa ninˈalo ˈombi mˈoɟa nˌinalˌokuˈomba. ˌusinˌikatalˈie. baθʃˈeba ˌakasˈema, wawˈeza kˌuliˈomba.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, tˌafaðˈali mwˈombe mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni, ˌanipatˈie ˌabiʃˈaɡi, mʃunˈami, ˈawe ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu; hˌatakˌukatalˈia wˈewe.|0
baθʃˈeba ˌakamɟˈibu, vˈema sˈana, nˌitazuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili jˈako.|0
baθʃˈeba ˌalipokwˈenda kwa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa aɟˈili ja ˌadonˈija, mfˈalme ˌalisimˈama kumlˈaki mˈama jˈake, ˌakamwˌinamˈia na kukˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme. ˌakaamˈuru kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme kulˈetwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˈama jˌake mfˈalme, nˌaje ˌakakˈeti mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
baθʃˈeba ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, ninˈalo ˈombi mˈoɟa dˈoɡo la kˌukuˈomba; ˌusinˌikatalˈie. mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈomba, mˈama jˈaŋɡu; sˌitakˌukatalˈia.|0
ˌakasˈema, mruhˈusu ˌabiʃˈaɡi, mʃunˈami, ˌaolˈewe na ndˈuɡu jˈako ˌadonˈija.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu mˈama jˈake, kwa nˈini uˈombe ˌabiʃˈaɡi, mʃunˈami, kwa aɟˈili ja ˌadonˈija? ˌuŋɡewˈeza pˈia kuˈomba ufˈalme kwa aɟˈili jˈake, kwˈani jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu mkˈubwa: nˈaam, kwa aɟˈili jˈake, na kwa kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari na joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈapa kwa bwˈana, ˌakasˈema: mˈuŋɡu na ˌaniulˈie mbˈali, tˈena bˌila hurˈuma, ikˈiwa ˌadonˈija hˌatalˈipa kwa uhˈai wˌake kwa aɟˈili ja ˈombi hˈili.|0
bˌasi sˈasa, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, jˌeje ambˈaje ˌamenˌiimarˈiʃa salˈama kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌamenˈipa ufˈalme wa kudˈumu kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, ˌadonˈija ˌatauˈawa lˈeo.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kwa benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada, nˌaje ˌakampˈiɡa ˌadonˈija akˈafa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia kuhˈani ˌabiaθˈari, nˈenda hˌuko ˌanaθˈoθi katˌika maʃˈamba jˈako. wˌewe ˌunastahˈili kˈufa, lakˈini sˌitakuˈua sˈasa, kwa sabˈabu ˌulilˌitʃukˈua sandˈuku la bwˈana mweɲˈezi mbˈele ja daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na ˌuliʃirˈiki taˈabu zˈote za bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo sˌolomˈoni ˌakamwondˈoa ˌabiaθˈari kwˈeɲe ˌukuhˈani wa bwˈana, ˌakilˌitimˈiza nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamenˈena hˌuko ʃˈilo kuhˈusu ɲˈumba ja ˈeli.|0
habˈari zˌilipˌomfikˈia joˈabu, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja na ˌadonˈija, lakˈini sˈio na ˌabsalˈomu, ˌalikˌimbilˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la bwˈana na kuʃˈika pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakaambˈiwa kˌuwa joˈabu ˌamekˌimbilˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la bwˈana nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu. bˌasi sˌolomˈoni ˌakamwaɡˈiza benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada: nˈenda ˌukamuˈue.|0
ndˈipo benˈaja ˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hˈema la bwˈana na kˌumwambˈia joˈabu, mfˈalme ˌanasˈema, tˌoka ɲɟˈe!  lakˈini ˌakaɟˈibu, la! nˌitafˈia hˈapa hˈapa. benˈaja ˌakamwarˈifu mfˈalme, hˈivi ndˈivjo joˈabu ˌalivjˌoniɟˈibu.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakamwamˈuru benˈaja, fˈaɲa kˌama ˌasemˈavjo. muˈue na kumzˈika, ˌili ˌuniˌondolˈee mˌimi na ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ðˈambi ja dˈamu ˌisijokˈuwa na hatˈia ˈile joˈabu ˌalijˌoimwˈaɡa.|0
bwˈana ˌatamlipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja dˈamu ˌalijˌoimwˈaɡa, kwa sabˈabu pasˈipo daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kuɟˈua, ˌaliwˌaʃambulˈia wˈatu wawˈili na kˌuwaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa. wˈote wawˈili, abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la ˌisraˈeli, na amˈasa mwˈana wa jeθˈeri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la jˈuda, wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wazˈuri na waɲˈofu kulˈiko jˈeje.|0
hatˈia ja dˈamu jˈao na ˈiwe ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa joˈabu na wazˈao wˌake milˈele. lakˈini kwa daˈudi na uzˈao wˈake, ɲˈumba jˌake na kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme, iwˈepo amˈani ja bwˈana milˈele.|0
bˌasi benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ˌakakwˈea, ˌakampˈiɡa na kˌumuˈua joˈabu, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwˈeka benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ɟˌuːja ɟˈeʃi kwˈeɲe nafˈasi ja joˈabu na kumwˈeka kuhˈani sadˈoki badˈala ja ˌabiaθˈari.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa ʃimˈei na kˌumwambˈia, ˌuɟiɟeŋɡˈee ɲˈumba hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu uˈiʃi hˌuko, lakˈini ˌusiˈende mahˈali peŋɡˈine popˈote.|0
sˈiku ˌutakˌajoondˈoka kuvˈuka bˈonde la kidrˈoni, ˈuwe na hakˈika ˌutakˈufa; dˈamu jˈako ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
ʃimˈei ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, ˌulilˌolisˈema ni ɟˈema. mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatatˈenda kˌama bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme ˌalivjosˈema. nˌaje ʃimˈei ˌakakˈaa jˌerusalˈemu kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
lakˈini baˌada ja miˈaka mitˈatu, watˈumwa wawˈili wa ʃimˈei wˌakatorˈoka kwˈenda kwa akˈiʃi mwˈana wa maˈaka, mfˈalme wa ɡˈaθi, nˌaje ʃimˈei ˌakaambˈiwa, watˈumwa wˈako wˈako ɡˈaθi.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili, ʃimˈei ˌakatandˈika pˈunda wˈake, ˌakaˈenda kwa akˈiʃi hˌuko ɡˈaθi kˌuwatafˈuta watˈumwa wˈake. bˌasi ʃimˈei ˌakaondˈoka na kˌuwarudˈiʃa watˈumwa wˌake kutˈoka ɡˈaθi.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalipˌoambˈiwa kˌuwa ʃimˈei ˌametˈoka jˌerusalˈemu na kwˈenda ɡˈaθi na ˌamekwˈiʃa kurˈudi.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwˈita ʃimˈei na kˌumwambˈia, ɟˈe, sˌikukˌuapˈiza kwa bwˈana na kˌukuˈoɲa kˌuwa, sˈiku ˌutakˌajoondˈoka kwˈenda mahˈali peŋɡˈine popˈote, ˈuwe na hakˈika ˌutakˈufa? wakˈati ˈule ˌulinˌiambˈia, ˌulilˌolisˈema ni ɟˈema. nˌitatˈii!.|0
kwa nˈini bˌasi hˌukutˈunza kiˈapo tʃˈako kwa bwˈana na kutˈii ˈamri nˌilijokˈupa.|0
pˈia mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia ʃimˈei, ˌunaɟˈua katˌika mˈojo wˈako makˈosa ˌulijˌomtendˈea bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi. sˈasa bwˈana ˌatakˌulipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja mabˈaja jˈako ˌulijotˈenda.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌatabˌarikˈiwa, na kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa daˈudi kˌitakˈuwa imˈara mbˈele za bwˈana milˈele.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kwa benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada, nˌaje ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe, ˌakampˈiɡa ʃimˈei na kˌumuˈua. sˈasa ufˈalme ukˈawa ˌumeˌimarˈika kˌikamilˈifu mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa ˌurafˈiki na mfˈalme farˈao wa mˈisri na kumwˈoa bˈinti jˈake. ˌakamlˈeta hˈujo bˈinti katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi mpˈaka ˌalipˌomalˈiza kuɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme na hekˈalu la bwˈana, pamˈoɟa na ukˈuta kˌuzuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˈatu bˈado wˌalikˈuwa wˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu hˌuko kwˈeɲe vilˈima, kwa sabˈabu hekˈalu lˌilikˈuwa bˈado hˌaliɟaɟˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaoɲˈeʃa upˈendo wˌake kwa bwˈana kwa kˌuenˈenda sˌawasˈawa na ˈamri za daˈudi bˈaba jˈake, ˈila jˌeje ˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea sˌolomˈoni hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni wakˈati wa usˈiku katˌika ndˈoto, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, ˈomba lolˈote ˌutakˈalo nikˈupe.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌumemfaɲˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi, faðˈili ɲˈiŋɡi, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu kwˈako na mwˌeɲe hˈaki, tˈena mɲˈofu wa mˈojo. nˌawe ˌumemzˌidiʃˈia faðˈili hˌii kˈuu kwˈani umˈempa mwˈana wa kukˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
sˈasa, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌumemfˈaɲa mtumˈiʃi wˈako mfˈalme badˈala ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi. lakˈini mˌimi ni mtˈoto mdˈoɡo tˈu, wˈala siɟˈui ɟˈinsi ja kˌutekelˈeza waɟˈibu wˈaŋɡu.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈako jˈuko hˈapa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu ˌuliˌowatʃaɡˈua: taˈifa kˈubwa, wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌasiowˈeza kˌuhesabˈika wˈala kutˈoa idˈadi jˈao.|0
hˈivjo ˈm̩pe mtumˈiʃi wˈako mˈojo wa ˌufahˈamu ˌili kˌutawˈala wˈatu wˈako na kˌupambanˈua kˈati ja mˈema na mabˈaja. kwa maˈana, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌutawˈala wˈatu wˈako hˈawa walˈio wˈeŋɡi hˈivi.|0
bwˈana ˌakapendˈezwa kwˌamba sˌolomˈoni ˌameliˈomba ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
bˌasi mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeˈomba nˈeno hˈili na hˌukuˈomba maˈiʃa marˈefu ˌau upˈate ˌutaɟˈiri kwa nˈafsi jˈako, wˈala adˈui zˈako wˈafe, bˌali ˌumeˈomba ˌufahˈamu katˌika kutˈoa hˈaki.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa lˈile ˌuliloˈomba. nˌitakˈupa mˈojo wa hekˈima na wa ˌufahˈamu, kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌaɟakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine kˌama wˈewe, wˈala kˈamwe hˌatakuwˈepo baˌada jˈako.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˌitakˈupa jˈale ambˈajo hˌukuˈomba, jaˈani ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima, ˌili kwˌamba maˈiʃa jˈako jˈote hˌapatakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu kˌama wˌewe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wafˈalme.|0
nˌawe kˌama ˌukienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na kutˈii ʃerˈia na ˈamri zˈaŋɡu kˌama bˈaba jˈako daˈudi ˌalivjofˈaɲa, nˌitakˈupa maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈamka, ˌakatambˈua kˌuwa ˌilikˈuwa ndˈoto. ˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani. kˈiʃa ˌakawˌafaɲˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote karˈamu.|0
bˌasi wˌanawˈake wawˈili mˌakahˈaba wˌalikˈuɟa kwa mfˈalme na kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈake.|0
mmˌoɟawˈapo ˌakasˈema, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi na mwanˈamke hˈuju tˌunaˈiʃi kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba mˈoɟa. nˌilikˈuwa nˌimezˈaa ˌalipokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu baˌada ja mtˈoto wˈaŋɡu kˌuzalˈiwa, mwanˈamke hˈuju pˈia nˌaje ˌakazˈaa mtˈoto. tˌulikˈuwa pˈeke jˈetu, hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote katˌika ɲˈumba ˌisipokˈuwa sˌisi wawˈili.|0
wakˈati wa usˈiku mwˈana wa hˈuju mwanˈamke akˈafa kwa sabˈabu ˌalimlalˈia.|0
hˈivjo ˌakaondˈoka kˌatikˈati ja usˈiku na kˌumtʃukˈua mwanˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ˌubavˈuni pˈaŋɡu wakˈati mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimelˈala. ˌakamwˈeka kˌifuˈani mwˈake na kumwˈeka mwanˈawe ˌalijekˈufa kˌifuˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˈake, nˌikaˈamka ˌili kˌumɲoɲˈeʃa mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈufa! lakˈini nˌilipˌomwaŋɡalˈia sˈana katˌika nˈuru ja ˌasubˈuhi, nˌiliˈona kˌuwa hakˈuwa jˈule mwˈana nˌilijekˈuwa nˌimemzˈaa.|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke mwiŋɡˈine ˌakasˈema, hapˈana! mwˈana alˈije hˈai n̩dˈije wˈaŋɡu, ˌalijekˈufa ni wˈako. lakˈini jˈule wa kwˈanza ˌakasˌisitˈiza, hapˈana! mwˈana ˌalijekˈufa ni wˈako, alˈije hˈai ni wˈaŋɡu. hˈivi ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌobiʃˈana mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, hˈuju ˌanasˈema, mwanˈaŋɡu n̩dˈije alˈije hˈai, na ˌalijekˈufa n̩dˈije mwanˈao, mˌaadˈamu jˈule ˌanasˈema, hapˈana! ˌalijekˈufa ni wˈako, na alˈije hˈai ni wˈaŋɡu..|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, nˌileteˈeni upˈaŋɡa. bˌasi wˌakamletˈea mfˈalme upˈaŋɡa.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa ˈamri: mkˈate mtˈoto alˈije hˈai vipˈande viwˈili; ˈm̩pe hˈuju nˈusu na mwiŋɡˈine nˈusu.|0
mwanˈamke ambˈaje mwanˈawe ˌalikˈuwa hˈai ˌakaɟˈawa na hurˈuma kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈawe na kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme, tˌafaðˈali, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˈm̩pe jˌeje mtˈoto alˈije hˈai! ˌusimuˈue! lakˈini jˈule mwanˈamke mwiŋɡˈine ˌakasˈema, mkˈate vipˈande viwˈili. asˈiwe wˈaŋɡu ˌau wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa ˌuamˈuzi wˈake: mpˈeni mˈama wa kwˈanza mtˈoto alˈije hˈai. msˌimuˈue; n̩dˈije mˈama jˈake.|0
wakˈati ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌilipˌosikˈia hukˈumu ˌalijotˈoa mfˈalme, wˌakamwoɡˈopa mfˈalme, kwa sabˈabu wˌaliˈona kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa na hekˈima kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu kwa kutˈoa hˈaki.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake wakˈuu: kuhˈani: ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa sadˈoki.|0
ˌelihorˈefu na ahˈija, wˈana wa ʃˈiʃa: wˌaandˈiʃi; jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa ˌahilˈudi: karˈani.|0
benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada: ɟˌemadˈari m̩kˈuu wa ɟˈeʃi; sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari: mˌakuhˈani.|0
ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa naθˈani: kˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌaafˈisa wa wilˈaja; zabˈudi mwˈana wa naθˈani: kuhˈani na mʃaˈuri binˈafsi wa mfˈalme.|0
ˌahiʃˈari: msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme; ˌadonirˈamu mwˈana wa ˈabda: msˌimamˈizi wa kˈazi za kˌulazimˈiʃa.|0
pˈia sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na wˌatawˈala kˈumi na wawˈili wa wilˈaja katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote, wˌaliolˈeta mˌahitˈaɟi kwa mfˈalme na kwa wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani kwa mfˈalme. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalitˈoa tʃakˈula kwa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa katˌika mwˈaka.|0
maɟˈina jˈao ni hˈaja: bˈen hˈuri: katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu.|0
bˈen dekˈeri: katˌika makˈasi, ʃˌaalbˈimu, bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi na ˈelon bˌeθhanˈani.|0
bˈen hesˈedi: katˌika ˌarubˈoθi sˈoko na ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja hefˈeri zˌilikˈuwa zˈake.|0
bˈen ˌabinadˈabu: katˌika nˈafoθ dˈori ˌalimwˈoa tafˈaθi bˈinti sˌolomˈoni.|0
baˈana mwˈana wa ˌahilˈudi: katˌika tˌaanˈaki na meɡˈido, na katˌika bˈeθ ʃˈani jˈote karˈibu na sˌareθˈani tʃˈini ja jˌezreˈeli, kˌuanzˈia bˈeθ ʃˈani hˌadi ˈabel mehˈola kupˈita hˌadi jˌokmeˈamu.|0
bˈen ɡebˈeri: katˌika rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi makˈao ja jaˈiri mwˈana wa manˈase katˌika ɡˌileˈadi ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi jˈake, pamˈoɟa na wilˈaja ja arɡˈobu katˌika baʃˈani na mˈiɟi jˌake mikˈubwa sitˈini jˌeɲe kˌuzuŋɡˈukwa na kˈuta zˌeɲe mˌakomˈeo ja ʃˈaba.|0
ˌahinadˈabu mwˈana wa ˈido: katˌika mˌahanaˈimu.|0
ˌahimaˈasi: katˌika naftˈali ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa bˌasemˈaθi bˈinti sˌolomˈoni.|0
baˈana mwˈana wa huʃˈai: katˌika aʃˈeri na katˌika bˌealˈoθi.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa parˈua: katˌika ˌisakˈari.|0
ʃimˈei mwˈana wa ˈela: katˌika bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ɡebˈeri mwˈana wa ˈuri: katˌika ɡˌileˈadi ˈn̩tʃi ja sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani. nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije mtawˈala pekˈee katˌika enˈeo hˈilo.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa pwˈani; wˌalikˈula, wakˈaɲua na kˌufurˈahi.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatawˈala katˌika fˈalme zˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩to frˈati hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti, hˌadi kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa mˈisri. ˈn̩tʃi hˈizi zˌililˈeta uʃˈuru na zˌilikˈuwa tʃˈini ja sˌolomˈoni, sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mˌahitˈaɟi ja sˌolomˈoni ja kˈila sˈiku jˌalikˈuwa kˈori θˌelaθˈini za ˈuŋɡa laˈini, kˈori sitˈini za ˈuŋɡa wa kˌawaˈida.|0
ŋɡˈombe kˈumi wa zizˈini, ŋɡˈombe ˌiʃirˈini wa malˈiʃo, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi mˈia mˈoɟa, pamˈoɟa na ajˈala, pˈaa, kulˈuŋɡu na kˈuku wazˈuri sˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˌolomˈoni ˌalitawˈala fˈalme zˈote mˌaɣarˈibi ja ˈm̩to, kˌuanzˈia tˈifsa hˌadi ɡˈaza, nˌaje akˈawa na amˈani pˈande zˈote.|0
wakˈati wa maˈiʃa ja sˌolomˈoni jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli, kˌuanzˈia dˈani mpˈaka bˈeer ʃˈeba, wˌakaˈiʃi salˈama kˈila ˈm̩tu tʃˈini ja mzabˈibu wˌake na tʃˈini ja mtˈini wˈake.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa enˈeo hˈilo, kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika mwˈezi wˈake, wˌalilˈeta mˌahitˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni na wˈote wˌaliokˈula mezˈani ˌm̩wa mfˈalme. wˌalihˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌopuŋɡˈua.|0
pˈia wˌalilˈeta sehˈemu wˌalizˌopaŋɡˈiwa za ʃajˈiri na maɟˈani kwa aɟˈili ja farˈasi wˌavutˈao maɡˈari na farˈasi weŋɡˈine mahˈali pˌalipˌostahˈili.|0
mˈuŋɡu akˈampa sˌolomˈoni hekˈima na akˈili kˈubwa, pˈia ˌufahˈamu mpˈana ˌusiˌopimˈika kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌuliˈoko pwˈani ja bahˈari.|0
hekˈima ja sˌolomˈoni ˌilikˈuwa kˈubwa kulˈiko hekˈima ja wˈatu wˈote wa mˌaʃarˈiki na kˈubwa kulˈiko hekˈima jˈote ja mˈisri.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na hekˈima kulˈiko kˈila mwandˈiʃi, ˌakiwˈemo eθˈani mwezrˈahi: kulˈiko hemˈani, kalkˈoli na dˈarda, wˈana wa mahˈoli. ˌumaarˈufu wˌake ˌukaenˈea kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌalijˌomzuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌakaˌelezˈea maˈiʃa ja mimˈea kˌuanzˈia mwerˈezi wa lˌebanˈoni hˌadi hisˈopo ˌiotˈajo ˌukutˈani. pˈia ˌakafundˈiʃa kuhˈusu waɲˈama na ndˈeɡe, waɲˈama wˌeɲe dˈamu barˈidi, wˌakiwˈemo samˈaki.|0
wˈatu wa mˌataˈifa jˈote wakˈaɟa kˌusikilˈiza hekˈima ja sˌolomˈoni, wˌaliotˈumwa na wafˈalme wˈote wa ˌulimwˈeŋɡu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesikˈia ɟˌuːja hekˈima jˈake.|0
hirˈamu mfˈalme wa tˈiro ˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa sˌolomˈoni ˌametˈiwa mafˈuta ˈawe mfˈalme mahˈali pa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake, ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa sˌolomˈoni, kwa sabˈabu hirˈamu sˈiku zˈote ˌalikˈuwa na ˌuhusiˈano mzˈuri wa kˌirafˈiki na daˈudi.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa hirˈamu.|0
ˌunaɟˈua kwˌamba kwa sabˈabu ja vˈita vˌilivjˌopiɡˈanwa ðˈidi ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi kutˈoka pˈande zˈote, hˌakuwˈeza kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake, hˌadi bwˈana ˌalipˌowawˈeka adˈui zˌake tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
lakˈini sˈasa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌamenˈipa ˌutulˈivu kˈila upˈande hakˈuna adˈui wˈala maˈafa.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌinakˌusudˈia kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌomwambˈia bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi, wakˈati ˌaliposˈema, mwanˈao nˌitakˌajemwˈeka kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme mahˈali pˈako, n̩dˈije ˌataɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu..|0
hˈivjo tˈoa ˈamri ˌili mˌierˈezi ja lˌebanˈoni ikˈatwe kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu. wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi na wˈatu wˈako, nˌami nˌitawalˈipa wˈatu wˈako kwa uɟˈira wowˈote ˌutakˌaoupˈaŋɡa. ˌunaɟˈua kwˌamba hatˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌeɲe ustˈadi katˌika kukˈata mˈiti kˌama wˌasidˈoni.|0
hirˈamu ˌalipˌosikˈia uɟˈumbe wa sˌolomˈoni, ˌakafˌurahˈiʃwa sˈana ˌakasˈema, ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana lˈeo, kwa kˌuwa amˈempa daˈudi mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima kˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja taˈifa hˈili kˈubwa.|0
hirˈamu ˌakatˈuma nˈeno kwa sˌolomˈoni: nˌimepokˈea uɟˈumbe ˌuliˌonipˌelekˈea na nˌitafˈaɲa jˈote ˌunajˌohitˈaɟi katˌika kˌukupatˈia maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi na mˌisunobˈari.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatajˌakokˈota kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni hˌadi kwˈeɲe bahˈari, nˌami nˌitajafˈuŋɡa mafˈuŋɡu mafˈuŋɡu jˌaelˈee ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi hˌadi ˌutakˌapoˌelekˈeza. hˌuko nˌitajˌateŋɡanˈiʃa, nˌawe ˌutawˈeza kˌujatʃukˈua. wˌewe ˌutakˈiði hˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu kwa kˌunipatˈia tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii hirˈamu akˈampa sˌolomˈoni mˈiti jˈote ja mˌierˈezi na maɡˈoɡo ja mˌisunobˈari kˌama ˌalivjˌohitˈaɟi.|0
nˌaje sˌolomˈoni akˈampa hirˈamu kˈori ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ŋɡˈano kˌama tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake, pamˈoɟa na mafˈuta sˈafi ja zˌeitˈuni jˌalijˌokamulˈiwa bˈaθi ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. sˌolomˈoni ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌumfaɲˈia hirˈamu hˈivjo mwˈaka baˌada ja mwˈaka.|0
bwˈana akˈampa sˌolomˈoni hekˈima, kˌama ˌalivjˌomwahˈidi. pˌalikuwˈepo na ˌuhusiˈano wa amˈani kˈati ja hirˈamu na sˌolomˈoni, na wˈote wawˈili wˌakafˈaɲa mkatˈaba.|0
ˌakawˌapelˈeka lˌebanˈoni kwa zˈamu za wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa mwˈezi, hˈivjo wˌalikˈaa lˌebanˈoni kwa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa na miˈezi miwˈili ɲumbˈani. ˌadonirˈamu n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ʃokˈoa.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na wˌatʃukˈuzi wa mizˈiɡo sabˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na watʃˈoŋɡa mˈawe θˌemanˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri hˌuko vˌilimˈani.|0
pamˈoɟa na wˌasimamˈizi tˈatu,mˌiatˈatu ambˈao wˌalisˌimamˈia kˈazi hˈijo na kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wˌafaɲakˈazi.|0
kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme wˌalitˈoa kwˈeɲe matʃˈimbo ja mˈawe, mˈawe makˈubwa, jalˈijo bˈora kwa kˌuɟeŋɡˈea msˈiŋɡi wa ɲˈumba jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu.|0
mafˈundi wa sˌolomˈoni, wa hirˈamu na wˈatu wa ɡebˈali wˌalikˈata na kˌuandˈaa m̩bˈao na mˈawe kwa aɟˈili ja uɟˈenzi wa hekˈalu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa θemanˈini baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wa sˌolomˈoni katˌika ˌisraˈeli, katˌika mwˈezi wa zˈivu, ambˈao n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa pˈili, ˌaliˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
hekˈalu hˌilo mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌaliloɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa sitˈini, upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini kwˈenda ɟˈuu.|0
barˈaza ja mbˈele ja hekˈalu ˌilienˈea ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini kˌuliŋɡˈana na upˈana wa hekˈalu na kˌuɟitokˈeza ðirˈaa kˈumi mbˈele ja hekˈalu.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌadirˈiʃa membˈamba jˌeɲe vˌidirˈiʃa vidˈoɡo vja ɟˈuu katˌika hekˈalu.|0
ˌakafaɲˈiza vjˈumba vja pembˈeni kˌulizuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu lˈote vˌikiʃˌikamˈana na kˈuta za hekˈalu na za pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ɣorˈofa ja tʃˈini kabˈisa ˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈano, ja kˈati ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa sˈita na ja tˈatu ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa sˈaba. kˌuzuŋɡˈuka ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe wa hekˈalu ˌakapuŋɡˈuza ukˈuta pˈande zˈote ˌili borˈiti zˌisiʃikˈane kwˈeɲe kˈuta za hekˈalu.|0
katˌika kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu, jˌalitumˈika tu mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa hˌuko mˌatʃimbˈoni, wˈala hakˈuna ɲˈundo, patˈasi ˌau tʃˈombo kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote tʃa tʃˈuma kˌilitʃˌosikˈika saˈuti jˌake katˌika enˈeo la uɟˈenzi wa hekˈalu wakˈati lˌilipokˈuwa lˌikiɟˈeŋɡwa.|0
ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɣorˈofa ja tʃˈini kabˈisa lˌilikˈuwa upˈande wa kusˈini wa hekˈalu, ŋɡˈazi ˌiliˌelekˈea ɣorˈofa ja kˈati na kˌutokˈea hˈapo ˌiliˌelekˈea hˌadi ɣorˈofa ja tˈatu.|0
bˌasi sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu na kˌulikˌamilˈiʃa, ˌakiliwˈeka pˈaa za borˈiti na m̩bˈao za mˌierˈezi.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa vjˈumba vja pembˈeni kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu lˈote. kˈimo tʃa kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa tˈano. nˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa vˌimeˌuŋɡanˈiʃwa na hekˈalu kwa borˈiti za mˌierˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia sˌolomˈoni kusˈema.|0
kwa habˈari ja hekˈalu hˈili ˌunaloɟˈeŋɡa, kˌama ˌukifuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, ˌukatˈunza maʃˈarti jˈaŋɡu na kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu jˈote na kˌujatˈii, kwa kˌupitˈia wˌewe nˌitatimˈiza ahˈadi nˌilijˌomwahˈidi daˈudi bˈaba jˈako.|0
nˌami nˌitakˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli, nˌami sˌitawaˈatʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu na kˌulikˌamilˈiʃa.|0
ˌakazˌifunˈika kˈuta zˌake za ndˈani kwa m̩bˈao za mˌierˈezi, ˌakizˌipiɡilˈia ˌukutˈani kˌuanzˈia sˌakafˈuni ˌm̩wa hekˈalu hˌadi kwˈeɲe dˈari na kˌufunˈika sakˈafu ja hekˈalu kwa m̩bˈao za mˌisunobˈari.|0
ˌakaɡˈawa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini sehˈemu ja ɲˈuma ja hekˈalu kwa m̩bˈao za mˌierˈezi kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe sakˈafu hˌadi darˈini ˌili kufˈaɲa sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ndˈani, jaˈani pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ukˈumbi mkˈubwa ˌuliokˈuwa mbˈele ja tʃˈumba hˈiki n̩dˈio ˌulikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌarobaˈini.|0
hekˈalu ndˈani ˌilikˈuwa ja mˌierˈezi ˌilijˌonakʃˈiwa mifˈano ja mabˈoɡa na maˈua jˌalijˌotʃanˈua. kˈila kˈitu kˌilikˈuwa tʃa mwerˈezi, hakˈuna ɟˈiwe ambˈalo lˌiliˌonekˈana.|0
sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ndˈani ˌilikˈuwa na upˈana, urˈefu na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini ndˈani kwa ndˈani. ˌakaˌifunˈika ndˈani kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi, pˈia ˌakaˌifunˈika mˌaðabˈahu ja mˌierˈezi vˈivjo hˈivjo.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˌifunˈika sehˈemu ja ndˈani ja hekˈalu kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi, nˌaje ˌakaˌitandˈaza mikˈufu ja ðahˈabu kutˈoka upˈande mˈoɟa hˌadi ˈule mwiŋɡˈine mbˈele ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, ambˈako pˌalifunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu.|0
bˌasi ˌakafunˈika sehˈemu jˈote ja ndˈani kwa ðahˈabu. pˈia ˌakafunˈika mˌaðabˈahu jˈale jˌalijokˈuwa ndˈani ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu kwa ðahˈabu.|0
katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌakerˈubi wawˈili kwa mzˌeitˈuni, kˈila mˈoɟa likˈiwa na ðirˈaa kˈumi kwˈenda ɟˈuu.|0
bˈawa mˈoɟa la kerˈubi wa kwˈanza lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano na bˈawa ɟiŋɡˈine ðirˈaa tˈano, hˈivjo urˈefu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃa ja bˈawa mˈoɟa hˌadi ˈn̩tʃa ja bˈawa ɟiŋɡˈine ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi.|0
kerˈubi wa pˈili ˌalikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi pˈia, hˈivjo mˌakerˈubi hˈao wawˈili wˌalifanˈana kwa vipˈimo na kwa ˈumbo.|0
kˈimo tʃa kˈila kerˈubi kˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi.|0
ˌaliwawˈeka mˌakerˈubi hˈao ndˈani ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu pa hekˈalu, mabˈawa jˌake jakˈiwa jˌamekˌuɲɟulˈiwa. bˈawa la kerˈubi mmˈoɟa lˌiliɡˈusa ukˈuta mmˈoɟa, wakˈati bˈawa la jˈule mwiŋɡˈine lˌiliɡˈusa ukˈuta mwiŋɡˈine, nˈajo mabˈawa jˈao meŋɡˈine jˌaliɡusˈana kˌatikˈati ja tʃˈumba.|0
ˌakafunˈika wˈale mˌakerˈubi kwa ðahˈabu.|0
ɟˌuːja kˈuta zˈote zˌilizˌozuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu, za vjˈumba vja ndˈani na vja ɲɟˈe, zˌilipˈambwa kwa nˈakʃi zˌilizokˈatwa za mˌakerˈubi, mˈiti ja mitˈende na maˈua jˌalijˌotʃanˈua.|0
pˈia ˌalifunˈika sakˈafu zˈote za vjˈumba vja ndˈani na vja ɲɟˈe vja hekˈalu kwa ðahˈabu.|0
kwa ˌiŋɡilˈio la pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza milˈaŋɡo ja m̩bˈao za mzˌeitˈuni, zikˈiwa na miˈimo na vˌiziŋɡˈiti vjˌeɲe ˈumbo la pˈembe tˈano.|0
ɟˌuːja milˈaŋɡo miwˈili ja m̩bˈao za mzˌeitˈuni ˌalinˈakʃi mˌakerˈubi, mˈiti ja mitˈende pamˈoɟa na maˈua jˌalijˌotʃanˈua na kˌufunˈika mˌakerˈubi na mˈiti ja mitˈende kwa ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia ˈijo hˈijo ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza miˈimo jˌeɲe pˈande ˈn̩ne ja mˈiti ja mˌizeitˈuni, kwa aɟˈili ja ˌiŋɡilˈio la ukˈumbi mkˈubwa.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na milˈaŋɡo miwˈili ˌilijowˈeza kˌukuɲɟˈuka ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa m̩bˈao za msˌunobˈari na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌulikˈuwa na bawˈaba ambˈazo zˌiŋɡeˌuwezˈeʃa kˌuɟikˈuɲɟa kˈila kipˈande ɟˌuːja kiŋɡˈine.|0
ˌakanˈakʃi mˌakerˈubi, mˈiti ja mitˈende na maˈua jˌalijˌotʃanˈua ɟˈuu jˌake na kˌufunˈika kwa ðahˈabu ˌilijˌoɲoˈoʃwa vizˈuri ɟˌuːja mitʃˈoro.|0
tˈena ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈua wa ndˈani sˈafu tˈatu za mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa na sˈafu mˈoɟa ja borˈiti za mˌierˈezi zˌilizorˈembwa.|0
msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌuliwˈekwa katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne, katˌika mwˈezi wa zˈivu, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa tˈano.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, mwˈezi wa bˈuli, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa nˈane, hekˈalu lˌilikˌamilˈika katˌika hatˈua zˌake zˈote kwa kˌufuatˈana na mˌaelekˈezo jˌake sˌolomˈoni. ˌaliliɟˈeŋɡa kwa miˈaka sˈaba.|0
ˌilimtʃukˈua sˌolomˈoni miˈaka kˈumi na mitˈatu kˌukamilˈiʃa uɟˈenzi wa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme.|0
ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la msˈitu wa lˌebanˈoni, urˈefu wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˌiamˈoɟa, upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa hamsˈini na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini, likˈiwa na sˈafu ˈn̩ne za ŋɡˈuzo za mˌierˈezi zˌikiʃˌikilˈia borˈiti za mˌierˈezi zˌilizorˈembwa.|0
ˌilipˌaulˈiwa kwa mˌierˈezi ɟˌuːja borˈiti zˈile zˌilizolˈala ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuzo ˌarobaˈini na tˈano, kˈumi na tˈano kwa kˈila sˈafu.|0
mˌadirˈiʃa jˌake jˌaliwˈekwa ɟˈuu kwa sˈafu tˈatu, jˌakiˌelekeˈana.|0
milˈaŋɡo jˈote ˌilikˈuwa na miˈimo ja mstatˈili, ˌilikˈuwa upˈande wa mbˈele katˌika sˈafu tˈatu, ˌikiˌelekeˈana.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈumbi wa ŋɡˈuzo, ambˈao urˈefu wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini. mbˈele ja ɟˈeŋɡo hˌilo kˌulikuwˈepo barˈaza. mbˈele ja barˈaza kˌulikuwˈepo na ŋɡˈuzo na pˈaa lˌililˌoniŋɡinˈia.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈumbi wa kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi, ukˈumbi wa hukˈumu, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌaŋɡelˌitolˈea hukˈumu, ˌakaˌufunˈika kwa mˌierˈezi kutˈoka sˌakafˈuni hˌadi darˈini.|0
kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ambˈamo ˌaŋɡeliˈiʃi, ˌaliiwˈeka ɲˈuma zaˈidi, ikˈiwa na mɟˈeŋɡo wa aˈina mˈoɟa na hˈijo ɲiŋɡˈine. pˈia sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme lˌinalˌofanˈana na hˈuo ukˈumbi mkˈubwa kwa aɟˈili ja bˈinti farˈao, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa.|0
uɟˈenzi hˈuu wˈote, kˌuanzˈia ɲɟˈe mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈua m̩kˈuu na kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe msˈiŋɡi hˌadi ˌupenˈuni, ˌulifˈaɲua kwa mˈawe ja ubˈora wa hˈali ja ɟˈuu jˌalijokˈuwa jˌametʃˈoŋɡwa kwa vipˈimo na kˌusawazˈiʃwa kwa msumˈeno ɲˈuso zˌake za ndˈani na za ɲɟˈe.|0
misˈiŋɡi ˌiliwˈekwa kwa mˈawe makˈubwa jalˈijo bˈora, jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na meŋɡˈine jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa nˈane.|0
sehˈemu za ɟˈuu kˌulikuwˈepo na mˈawe jˌeɲe ubˈora wa hˈali ja ɟˈuu, jˌalijokˈatwa kwa vipˈimo na borˈiti za mˌierˈezi.|0
ˈule ˈua m̩kˈuu ˌulizuŋɡˈukwa na ukˈuta wa sˈafu tˈatu za mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa na sˈafu mˈoɟa ja borˈiti za mˌierˈezi zˌilizorˈembwa, kˌama ˌulivjokˈuwa ˈua wa ndˈani wa hekˈalu la bwˈana na barˈaza jˈake.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˈuma wˈatu tˈiro kumlˈeta hirˈamu.|0
ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa mɟˈane kutˈoka kabˈila la naftˈali na bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa tˈiro tˈena fˈundi wa ʃˈaba. hirˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na ustˈadi wa hˈali ja ɟˈuu na mzoˈefu katˌika aˈina zˈote za kˈazi ja ʃˈaba. ˌalikˈuɟa kwa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni na kufˈaɲa kˈazi zˌake zˈote ˌalizˌopaŋɡˈiwa.|0
hirˈamu ˌakasˈubu ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili za ʃˈaba, kˈila mˈoɟa ikˈiwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na nˈane, kˈila ŋɡˈuzo ikˈiwa na mzˈiŋɡo wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na mbˈili kwa mstˈari.|0
pˈia ˌalitˌeŋɡenˈeza matˈaɟi mawˈili ja ʃˈaba ja kusˈubu ˌili kˌujawˈeka ɟˌuːja hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo; kˈila tˈaɟi lˌilikˈuwa na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa tˈano kwˈenda ɟˈuu.|0
wˈavu wa mikˈufu ˌilijˌosokotˈewa kwˈeɲe zˈile tˈaɟi ɟˌuːja zˈile ŋɡˈuzo, sˈaba kwa kˈila tˈaɟi.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌakomamˈaŋɡa katˌika sˈafu mbˈili kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kˈila wˈavu kurˈemba matˈaɟi jalˈijo ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuzo. ˌalifˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa kˈila ŋɡˈuzo.|0
matˈaɟi jˌalijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuzo kwˈeɲe barˈaza, jˌalikˈuwa katˌika ˈumbo la jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi, kˈimo tʃˈake ni ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne.|0
ɟˌuːja matˈaɟi ja zˈile ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili, ɟˌuːja ˈile sehˈemu jˌeɲe ˈumbo kˌama bakˈuli, karˈibu na ˈule wˈavu, kˌulikˈuwa na jˈale mˌakomamˈaŋɡa mˌiambˈili katˌika sˈafu kˌuzuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote.|0
hirˈamu ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa ŋɡˈuzo kwˈeɲe barˈaza ja hekˈalu. ŋɡˈuzo ja upˈande wa kusˈini ˌakaiˈita jakˈini, na ˈile ja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini boˈazi.|0
matˈaɟi jˌalijokˈuwa ɟˈuu jˌalikˈuwa na ˈumbo la jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi. hˈivjo kˈazi ja ŋɡˈuzo ˌikakˌamilˈika.|0
hirˈamu ˌakasˈubu bahˈari ja tʃˈuma, jˌeɲe ˈumbo la mvirˈiŋɡo, ja ðirˈaa kˈumi kutˈoka ukˈiŋɡo hˌadi ukˈiŋɡo na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa tˈano. mzuŋɡˈuko wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini.|0
tʃˈini ja ukˈiŋɡo, ˌilizuŋɡˈukwa na mabˈoɡa, kˈumi kwˈeɲe kˈila ðirˈaa mˈoɟa. mabˈoɡa jˌalikˈuwa jˌamesubˈiwa katˌika sˈafu mbˈili ˌili kˌuwa kˈitu kimˈoɟa na hˈijo bahˈari.|0
bahˈari ˌiliwˈekwa ɟˌuːja mˌafahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili, watˈatu wˌakiˌelekˈea kˌaskazˈini, watˈatu wˌakiˌelekˈea mˌaɣarˈibi, watˈatu wˌakiˌelekˈea kusˈini na watˈatu wˌakiˌelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki. bahˈari ˌiliwˈekwa ɟˈuu jˈao na sehˈemu zˈao za ɲˈuma zˌiliˌelekeˈana.|0
ˌilikˈuwa na unˈene wa ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne na ukˈiŋɡo wˌake ˌulifanˈana na ukˈiŋɡo wa kikˈombe, kˌama ˈua la jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi ˌilijˌotʃanˈua. ˌiliwˈeza kˌutʃukˈua bˈaθi mbˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
pˈia ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza vitˈako kˈumi vja ʃˈaba vˌinavjowˈeza kˌuhamiʃˈika, kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne, upˈana ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa tˈatu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vˈile vitˈako vˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa: vˌilikˈuwa na m̩bˈao za pembˈeni zˌilizˌoʃikˌamanˈiʃwa na mˌihimˈili.|0
ɟˌuːja m̩bˈao kˈati ja hˈijo mˌihimˈili kˌulikˈuwa na sˈimba, mˌafahˈali na mˌakerˈubi, pˈia kwˈeɲe mˌihimˈili jˈake. ɟˈuu na tʃˈini ja sˈimba na mˌafahˈali kˌulikˈuwa kˌumesˌokotˈewa tˈaɟi za kˌufulˈiwa.|0
kˈila kitˈako kˌilikˈuwa na mˌaɡurudˈumu mˈanne ja ʃˈaba, na vjˈuma vja kˌatikˈati vja kˌujazuŋɡˈuʃa hˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu na kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa na sinˈia kwˈeɲe vˌiʃikˈizo vˈinne vja tˈaɟi ˌilijˌosubˈiwa kˈila upˈande.|0
ndˈani ja kitˈako kˌulikˈuwa na nafˈasi ja wˈazi ˌilijokˈuwa na umbˈile la mvirˈiŋɡo lˈeɲe kˈina tʃa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa. nafˈasi hˌii ja wˈazi ˌilikˈuwa ja mvirˈiŋɡo, pamˈoɟa na kitˈako tʃˈake ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu. kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hˈuo mdˈomo wˌake kˌulitˈiwa nˈakʃi. pˈapi za vitˈako zˌilikˈuwa mrˈaba na si za mvirˈiŋɡo.|0
mˌaɡurudˈumu mˈanne jˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja pˈapi, na vjˈuma vja kˌatikˈati vja kˌuzuŋɡuʃˈia mˌaɡurudˈumu hˈajo vˌilikˈuwa vˌimeˌuŋɡanˈiʃwa kwˈeɲe kitˈako. kipˈeɲo tʃa kˈila ɡˌurudˈumu kˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu.|0
mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌalitˌeŋɡenˈezwa kˌama ja maɡˈari ja vˈita ja kˌukokˈotwa, vjˈuma vja kˌatikˈati vja mˌaɡurudˈumu, duˈara zˈake, matˈindi jˌake na vikˈombe vjˈake vjˈote vˌilikˈuwa vja kusˈubu.|0
kˈila kitˈako kˌilikˈuwa na mikˈono mˈinne, mˈoɟa kwˈeɲe kˈila pˈembe, ˌukitokˈeza kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kitˈako.|0
ɟˌuːja kitˈako kˌulikuwˈepo na utˈepe wa mvirˈiŋɡo wˌeɲe kˈina tʃa nˈusu ðirˈaa. vˌiʃikˈio na pˈapi vˌiliʃˌikamˈana upˈande wa ɟˈuu wa kitˈako.|0
ˌalitˈia nˈakʃi za mˌakerˈubi, sˈimba na mˈiti ja mitˈende ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa vˌiʃikˈio na ɟˌuːja pˈapi, katˌika kˈila nafˈasi ˌilijˌopatikˈana, pamˈoɟa na matˈaɟi jˌalijˌosokˈotwa kˌuzuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo hirˈamu ˌalivjˌoteŋɡenˈeza vˈile vitˈako kˈumi. vjˈote vˌilikˈuwa vja kusˈubu kwˈeɲe kalˈibu za kˌufanˈana kwa vipˈimo na kwa ˈumbo.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌasinˈia kˈumi ja ʃˈaba, kˈila mˈoɟa likˈiwa na uɟˈazo wa bˈaθi ˌarobaˈini, jakˈiwa na kipˈeɲo tʃa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne kˈila sinˈia mˈoɟa kwa kˈila kimˈoɟa ja vˈile vitˈako kˈumi.|0
ˌaliwˈeka vitˈako vitˈano upˈande wa kusˈini wa hekˈalu na viŋɡˈine vitˈano upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini. ˌakawˈeka ˈile bahˈari upˈande wa kusˈini, katˌika pˈembe ja kusˈini ja hekˈalu.|0
ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili; matˈaɟi mawˈili jˌeɲe ˈumbo la bakˈuli ɟˌuːja hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo; ɲˈavu mbˈili za kupˈamba hˈajo matˈaɟi mawˈili jˌeɲe ˈumbo la bakˈuli ɟˌuːja hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo.|0
mˌakomamˈaŋɡa mˌiaˈn̩ne kwa aɟˈili ja hˈizo ɲˈavu mbˈili sˈafu mbˈili za mˌakomamˈaŋɡa kwa kˈila wˈavu, jˌakipˈamba hˈajo matˈaɟi mawˈili jˌeɲe ˈumbo la bakˈuli ɟˌuːja hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo.|0
vitˈako kˈumi pamˈoɟa na mˌasinˈia jˌake kˈumi.|0
ˈile bahˈari ja tʃˈuma na jˈale mˌafahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili tʃˈini jˈake.|0
mˌasufurˈia, mˌasepˈetu na mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia. vjˈombo hˈivi vjˈote ambˈavjo hurˈamu ˌalimtˌeŋɡenezˈea mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana vˌilikˈuwa vja ʃˈaba ˌilijˌoŋɡarˈiʃwa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaamˈuru wˌavisˈubu katˌika kalˈibu ja udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi katˌika uwˈanda wa jordˈani ulˈio kˈati ja sukˈoθi na sˌareθˈani.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaviˈatʃa vˈitu hˈivi vjˈote bˌila kupˈima uzˈani wˈake, kwa sabˈabu vˌilikˈuwa vˈiŋɡi sˈana hˈivi kwˌamba uzˈito wa ʃˈaba hˌauŋɡˌekadirˈika.|0
vinˈara vja tˈaa vja ðahˈabu sˈafi vitˈano upˈande wa kuˈume na vitˈano upˈande wa kuʃˈoto, mbˈele ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu; kˈazi ja maˈua ja ðahˈabu na tˈaa na mˌakolˈeo.|0
mˌasinˈia ja ðahˈabu sˈafi, mikˈasi ja kˌusawˌaziʃˈia tˈambi, mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, vjˈano na vjetˈezo; na bawˈaba za ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja milˈaŋɡo ja tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani sˈana, jaˈani pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, na pˈia kwa aɟˈili ja milˈaŋɡo ja ukˈumbi m̩kˈuu wa hekˈalu.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakawaˈita mbˈele zˌake hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa mˌakabˈila na wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za wˌaisraˈeli, ˌili wˌalilˈete sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kutˈoka sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakakˌusaɲˈika kwa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni wakˈati wa sˌikukˈuu ja mwˈezi wa ˌeθanˈimu, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa sˈaba.|0
wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipofˈika, mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɟitwˈika sandˈuku la aɡˈano.|0
nˌao wˌakalˌipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana, na hˈema la kˌukutanˈia pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vjˈote vˌitakatˈifu vˌilivjokˈuwa ndˈani jˈake. mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌakavibˈeba.|0
nˌaje mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌokusaɲˈika kˌumzuŋɡˈuka wˌalikˈuwa mbˈele ja hˌilo sandˈuku, nˌao wˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ɲˈiŋɡi za kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe ambˈao idˈadi jˈao hˌaikˌuwezekˈana kˌuandˈikwa ˌau kˌuhesabˈiwa.|0
mˌakerˈubi jˌalitandˈaza mabˈawa jˈao ɟˌuːja mahˈali pa sandˈuku la aɡˈano na kutˈia kivˈuli sandˈuku pamˈoɟa na mipˈiko jˌake ja kˌubebˈea.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌalipˌoondˈoka katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, wˈiŋɡu lˌikaɟˈaza hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
nˌao mˌakuhˈani hˌawakuwˈeza kufˈaɲa hudˈuma jˈao kwa sabˈabu ja lˈile wˈiŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌuliɟˈaza hekˈalu lˈake.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakasˈema, bwˈana ˌalisˈema kwˌamba ˌataˈiʃi katˌika ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
nˈaam, hakˈika nˌimekˌuɟeŋɡˈea hekˈalu zˈuri sˈana, mahˈali pˈako pa kuˈiʃi milˈele.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli lˌilipokˈuwa lˌimesimˈama hˈapo, mfˈalme ˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuwabarˈiki.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakasˈema: ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje kwa mkˈono wˌake mweɲˈewe ˌametimˈiza lˈile ˌalilˌomwahˈidi daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈake mweɲˈewe. kwa kˌuwa ˌalisˈema.|0
ʃˈu sˈiku nˌilijˌowatˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri, sˌikutʃaɡˈua ˈm̩ɟi katˌika kabˈila lolˈote la ˌisraˈeli ˌili hekˈalu liɟˈeŋɡwe hˈumo ˌili ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lipˈate kuwˈamo hˈumo, bˌali nˌimemtʃaɡˈua daˈudi kˌuwatawˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli..|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌilikˈuwa mojˈoni mwˈako kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, ˌulifˈaɲa vjˈema kˌuwa na ɟˈambo hˈili mojˈoni mwˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, sˈio wˌewe ˌutakˌajenˌiɟeŋɡˈea hekˈalu, bˌali mwanˈao, ambˈaje ni ɲˈama jˈako na dˈamu jˈako mweɲˈewe, jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu..|0
bwˈana ˌametimˈiza ahˈadi ˌalijˌoiwˈeka: nˌimeiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na sˈasa nˌinakˌikalˈia kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, nˌami nˌimeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌimetˈeŋɡa nafˈasi hˈumo kwa aɟˈili ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano, ambˈamo ndˈani jˌake kˈuna lˈile aɡˈano la bwˈana ˌalilofˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈetu wakˈati ˌalipˌowatˈoa mˈisri.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana matʃˈoni pa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli, ˌakakuɲɟˈua mikˈono jˌake kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
na kusˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu kˌama wˌewe ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni wˈala tʃˈini dˌuniˈani, wˌewe ˌunajetˈunza aɡˈano lˈako la upˈendo na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌanaodˈumu katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈako kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
ˌumetimˈiza ahˈadi jˈako kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈako ˌuliahˈidi na kwa mkˈono wˈako ˌumetimˈiza, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
sˈasa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, mtˌimizˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ahˈadi zˈako ˌulizˌomwahˈidi ˌuliposˈema, kˈamwe hˌutakˈosa kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajekˈeti mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama wanˈao wˌakiˌaŋɡalˈia jˈote wˌajafaɲˈajo kˌuenˈenda mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kˌama vˈile ˌulivjofˈaɲa..|0
sˈasa, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˈatʃa nˈeno lˈako lˈile ˌulilˌomwahˈidi mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu lˌitimˈie.|0
lakˈini kwˈeli, ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu ˌatafˈaɲa makˈao dˌuniˈani? mbˈiŋɡu, hˌata mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana, hˌaziwˈezi kˌukutˈoʃa wˈewe. sembˈuse hekˈalu hˈili nˌililoɟˈeŋɡa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo sˌikilˈiza dˈua ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako na maˈombi jˌake kwa hurˈuma, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. sikˈia kilˈio na dˈua ambˈajo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanaˈomba mbˈele zˈako sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌafumbˈuke kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu hˈili usˈiku na mtʃˈana, mahˈali hˈapa ambˈapo ˌulisˈema, ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitakuwˈako hˈumo, ˌili kwˌamba upˈate kˌusikˈia maˈombi ambˈajo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌataˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa.|0
ˌusikˈie maˈombi ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ja wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli wakˈati wˌanapoˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa. sikˈia kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako na ˌusikiˈapo, samˈehe.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanapˌomkosˈea ɟirˈani jˌake na ˌakatakˈiwa kuˈapa, akˈiɟa na kuˈapa mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu jˈako ndˈani ja hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˈasi, sikˈia kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌukatˈende. hukˈumu kˈati ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌukimhukˈumu jˈule mwˌeɲe hatˈia na kulˈeta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda. ˌumtaŋɡazˈie mwˌeɲe hˈaki kwˌamba hˈana hatˈia, hˈivjo ˌukaθˌibitˈiʃe kˌuwa hˈaki kwˈake.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌameʃˈindwa na adˈui kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi wˌalizofˈaɲa ðˈidi jˈako, wˌatakˌapokˌuɡeukˈia na kˌulikˈiri ɟˈina lˈako, wˌakiˈomba na kufˈaɲa dˈua kwˈako katˌika hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌukasamˈehe ðˈambi ja wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao.|0
wakˈati mbˈiŋɡu zˌitakˌapokˈuwa zˌimefˈuŋɡwa kusˈiwe na mvˈua kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈako wˌametˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako, wˌatakˌapoˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa na kˌulikˈiri ɟˈina lˈako nˌao wˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈao kwa sabˈabu ˌumewˌaaðˈibu.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌusamˈehe ðˈambi ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli. wˌafundˈiʃe ɲɟˈia sahˈihi ja kuˈiʃi na ˌukaɲˈeʃe mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa wˈatu wˈako kˌuwa urˈiθi.|0
wakˈati ɲɟˈaa ˌau taˈuni vikˈiɟa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, ˌau kˈoɡa ˌau kˈawa, nzˈiɡe ˌau pˈanzi, ˌau wakˈati adˈui ˌatakˌapowˌaziŋɡˈira katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˌao wowˈote, maˈafa ja nˈamna jojˈote ˌau uɡˈoɲɟua wowˈote ˌunaowˈeza kˌuwaɟˈia.|0
wakˈati dˈua ˌau maˈombi jˌatakˌapofˈaɲua na mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakitambˈua taˈabu za mˈojo wˌake mweɲˈewe, nˌaje ˌakaˌiɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˌake kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, katˌika makˈao jˈako. ˌusamˈehe na utˈende, ˈumpe kˈila ˈm̩tu kˌuliŋɡˈana na matˈendo jˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌunauɟˈua mˈojo wˌake kwa kˌuwa ni wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ˌuɟuˈaje miˈojo ja wˈatu wˈote.|0
ˌili wˌakuoɡˈope kwa wakˈati wˈote wˌatakˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈetu.|0
kwa habˈari ja mɡˈeni ambˈaje si mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini ˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
kwa maˈana wˈatu wˌatasikˈia ɟˌuːja ɟˈina lˈako kˈuu na ɟˌuːja mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na mkˈono wˈako ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa, ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa na kuˈomba kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˌasi na ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako, ˌukafˈaɲe lolˈote ambˈalo mɡˈeni hˈujo ˌanakuˈomba, ˌili mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia wapˈate kuɟˈua ɟˈina lˈako na wˌakuoɡˈope kˌama wˌafaɲˈavjo wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli nˌao wapˈate pˈia kuɟˈua kwˌamba ɲˈumba hˌii nˌilijˌoiɟˈeŋɡa ˌimeˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˈako wˌatakˌapokwˈenda vitˈani ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈao, popˈote ˌutakˌapowˌapelˈeka, wakˈati wˌatakˌapoˈomba kwa bwˈana kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ˌumeˌutʃaɡˈua, na hekˈalu nˌililˌoliɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie dˈua na maˈombi jˈao kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌukawˌatetˈee hˈaki jˈao.|0
wˌatakˌapotˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje hatˈendi ðˈambi, nˌawe ˌukatʃukˈizwa nˌao na kˌuwakabˈiði kwa adˈui, ambˈaje ˌatawˌatʃukˈua ˌutumwˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe, mbˈali ˌau karˈibu.|0
na kˌama wˌatabˌadilˈika miˈojo jˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌanakˌoʃikilˈiwa matˈeka, nˌao wˌakatˈubu na kˌukulilˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˈale wˌaliˌowaʃˈinda na kusˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi, tˌumefˈaɲa makˈosa, tˌumetˈenda uˈovu.|0
kˌama wˌakikˌuɡeukˈia kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote na nˈafsi zˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈao ambˈao wˌaliwˌatʃukˈua matˈeka, wˌakakuˈomba kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao, kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌoutʃaɡˈua na hekˈalu nˌililˌoliɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
bˌasi kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako, ˌusikˈie dˈua jˈao na maˈombi jˈao na kˌuitetˈea hˈaki jˈao.|0
ˌuwasamˈehe wˈatu wˈako, wˌaliotˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako; ˌuwasamˈehe makˈosa jˈote wˌalijˌojatˈenda ðˈidi jˈako, ˌukawafˈaɲe wˈale wˌaliˌowaʃˈinda kˌuwaonˈea hurˈuma.|0
kwa maˈana ni wˈatu wˈako na urˈiθi wˈako, ˌuliˌowatˈoa mˈisri, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe lˈile tanˈuru la kˌujejuʃˈia tʃˈuma.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌafumbˈuke ɟˌuːja ˈombi la mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ˈombi la wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, nˌawe ˌuwasˌikilˈize wakˈati wowˈote wˌanapˌokulilˈia.|0
kwa maˈana ˌuliwˌatʃaɡˈua wˌao kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote ja ˌulimwˈeŋɡu kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈako mweɲˈewe, kˌama ˌulivjˌotaŋɡˈaza kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako mˈose wakˈati wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌulipˌowatˈoa bˈaba zˈetu kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
wakˈati sˌolomˈoni ˌalipˌomalˈiza dˈua hˈizi zˈote na maˈombi kwa bwˈana, ˌakainˈuka kutˈoka mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana, mahˈali ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamepˈiɡa maɡˈoti, mikˈono jˌake ikˈawa ˌimekˌuɲɟulˈiwa kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌakasimˈama na kˌubarˈiki kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli kwa saˈuti kˈubwa ˌakisˈema.|0
ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, ˌalijewˈapa pumzˈiko wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameahˈidi. hakˈuna hˌata nˈeno mˈoɟa lˌililˌopuŋɡˈuka kˈati ja ahˈadi zˈote nzˈuri ˌalizˌozitˈoa kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake mˈose.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˌasi kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa na bˈaba zˈetu, kˈamwe ˌasituˈatʃe wˈala kˌutukatˈaa.|0
jˌeje na ˌaiˌelekˈeze miˈojo jˈetu kwˈake, ˌili tˌutembˈee katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo na maʃˈarti ˌalijowˈapa bˈaba zˈetu.|0
nˌami manˈeno jˈaŋɡu hˈaja, ambˈajo nˌimejaˈomba mbˈele za bwˈana, jˈawe karˈibu na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu usˈiku na mtʃˈana, ˌili kwˌamba ˌatetˈee ʃaˈuri la mtumˈiʃi wˌake na la wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli kˌuliŋɡˈana na hitˈaɟi lˈao la kˈila sˈiku.|0
ˌili kwˌamba mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia waɟˈue kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu na kwˌamba hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine.|0
lakˈini ni lazˈima mwiwˈeke miˈojo jˈenu kˌikamilˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kuˈiʃi kwa mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake na kutˈii ˈamri zˈake, kˌama ilˈivjo wakˈati hˈuu.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme na ˌisraˈeli wˈote pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo mfˈalme ˌakawˈeka wˈakfu sehˈemu ja kˌatikˈati ja ˈua ˌuliokˈuwa mbˈele ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na hˈapo ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka na mafˈuta ja sadˈaka za amˈani, kwa sabˈabu mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba ˌilijokˈuwa mbˈele za bwˈana ˌilikˈuwa ndˈoɡo sˈana kuwˈeza kubˈeba sadˈaka hˈizo za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka na mafˈuta ja sadˈaka ja amˈani.|0
hˈivjo sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˌiaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu kwa wakˈati ˈule, na ˌisraˈeli wˈote pamˈoɟa nˈaje. wˌalikˈuwa kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa sˈana, wˈatu kutˈoka lˈebo hamˈaθi hˌadi kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri. wˌakaˌiaðimˈiʃa mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa sˈiku sˈaba na sˈiku sˈaba zaˈidi, jaˈani, ɟˈumla sˈiku kˈumi na ˈn̩ne.|0
sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata, ˌaliwˌaruhˈusu wˈatu wˌaondˈoke. wˌakambarˈiki mfˈalme, kˈiʃa wˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani, wakˈiwa na mˌaʃaŋɡilˈio na furˈaha rohˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja mˈambo jˈote mˈema ambˈajo bwˈana ˌametˈenda kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˌake na wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalipˌomalˈiza kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, ˌalipokwˈiʃa kufˈaɲa jˈote ˌalijotˈaka kufˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea mˈara ja pˈili, kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemtokˈea hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia: nˌimesikˈia dˈua na maˈombi ˌulijofˈaɲa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, nˌimeliwˈeka wˈakfu hekˈalu hˈili ambˈalo ˌumeliɟˈeŋɡa, kwa kuwˈeka ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu hˈumo milˈele. mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu na mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌutakˈuwa hˈumo sˈiku zˈote.|0
kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe, kˌama ˌukienˈenda kwa uɲˈofu wa mˈojo na ˌuadilˈifu, kˌama bˈaba jˈako daˈudi ˌalivjofˈaɲa na kutˈenda jˈote nˌinajˌojaaɡˈiza kwa kutˈunza mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌama nˈiɲi ˌau wˈana wˈenu mkˌiɡeukˈia mbˈali nˌami na kˌuziˈatʃa ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu nˌilijowˈapa na kwˈenda kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuiabˈudu.|0
wˈatu wˌataɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, ˌalijˌewatˈoa bˈaba zˈao mˈisri, nˌao wˌamekˌumbatˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, wˌakaˌiabˈudu na kˌuitˌumikˈia, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamejalˈeta maˈafa hˈaja jˈote ɟˈuu jˈao..|0
miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌilipopˈita, ambˈajo katˌika hˈijo sˌolomˈoni ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa maɟˈeŋɡo hˈaja mawˈili, jaˈani hekˈalu la bwˈana na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni akˈampa hirˈamu mfˈalme wa tˈiro mˈiɟi ˌiʃirˈini katˌika ɡˌalilˈaja, kwa sabˈabu hirˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamempatˈia mˌierˈezi jˈote, mˌisunobˈari na ðahˈabu jˈote ˌalijˌohitˈaɟi.|0
lakˈini hirˈamu ˌalipotˈoka tˈiro kwˈenda kˌuiˈona ˈile mˈiɟi ambˈajo sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa, hˌakupendˈezwa nˈajo.|0
hirˈamu ˌakaulˈiza, hˌii ni mˈiɟi ja nˈamna ɡˈani ˌulijonˈipa, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu? nˌaje ˌakaiˈita ˈn̩tʃi ja kˈabul, ɟˈina lˌililˈoko hˌadi lˈeo.|0
bˌasi hirˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamempˌelekˈea mfˈalme talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini za ðahˈabu.|0
farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌuʃambulˈia na kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi wa ɡezˈeri. ˌalikˈuwa ˌameutʃˈoma mˈoto. ˌakawaˈua wˌakanaˈani wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakikˈaa hˈumo na kˈiʃa kˌuutˈoa kwa bˈinti jˈake, jaˈani mkˈewe sˌolomˈoni, kˌama zawˈadi ja arˈusi.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakauɟˈeŋɡa tˈena ɡezˈeri. ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa bˈeθ horˈoni ja tʃˈini.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa bˌaalˈaθi na tamˈari kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa katˌika enˈeo la ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌosalˈia kutˈoka kwa wˌaamˈori, wahˈiti, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi mˌataˈifa hˈaja hˌajakˈuwa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
jaˈani, wazˈao wˌao wˌaliˌobakˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ambˈao wˌaisraˈeli hˌawaŋɡewˈeza kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa: hˈawa sˌolomˈoni ˌakawˌalazimˈiʃa kˌuwa watˈumwa katˌika ʃokˈoa, kˌama ilˈivjo hˌadi lˈeo.|0
lakˈini sˌolomˈoni hˌakumfˈaɲa jejˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli kˌuwa mtˈumwa; wˌao n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˈake, mˌaafˈisa wˌake wa sˌerikˈali, mˌaafˈisa wˈake, wakˈuu wˈake, mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi wa maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi.|0
pˈia wˌalikˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wakˈuu wˌasimamˈizi wa mirˈadi ja sˌolomˈoni: mˌaafˈisa mˌiatˈanonˌa hamsˈini wˌaliwˌasimamˈia wˈatu wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
baˌada ja bˈinti farˈao kˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi na kˌuiŋɡˈia ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ambˈalo sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemɟeŋɡˈea, ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˈilo.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani mˈara tˈatu kwa mwˈaka, ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameɟeŋɡˈea kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, ˌakifukˈiza uvˈumba mbˈele za bwˈana pamˈoɟa na ðabˈihu hˈizo, hˈivjo kˌutimˈiza kanˈuni za hekˈalu.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni pˈia ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈia mˈeli hˌuko esˈion ɡebˈeri, ambˈajo ˈiko karˈibu na elˈaθi katˌika edˈomu, kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
nˌaje hirˈamu ˌakawatˈuma wˈatu wˈake; mˌabaharˈia wˌaliˌoiɟˈua bahˈari, kˌuhudˈumu katˌika hˈizo mˈeli pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
wˌakasafˈiri kwa bahˈari mpˈaka ofˈiri na kurˈudi na talˈanta mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa iʃirˈini za ðahˈabu, ambˈazo wˌalimkabˈiði mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni.|0
malkˈia wa ʃˈeba ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari za ˌumaarˈufu wa sˌolomˈoni na ˌuhusiˈano wˌake na ɟˈina la bwˈana, akˈaɟa kˌumɟarˈibu kwa maswˈali maɡˈumu.|0
ˌalifˈika jˌerusalˈemu akˈiwa na msafˈara mkˈubwa sˈana: pamˈoɟa na ŋɡamˈia wˌaliobˈeba vˌikolˈezi, kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa ðahˈabu na vˈito vja θamˈani; ˌalikˈuɟa kwa sˌolomˈoni na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kuhˈusu jˈote ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa nˈajo mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu maswˈali jˌake jˈote, hˌakukˈuwa na ɟˈambo lolˈote lˌililokˈuwa ɡˈumu kwa mfˈalme ˌasiwˈeze kˌumwelezˈea.|0
malkˈia wa ʃˈeba ˌalipoˈona hekˈima jˈote ja sˌolomˈoni na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ˌalilokˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa.|0
tʃakˈula kˌilitʃokˈuwa mezˈani pˈake, ɟˈinsi mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌalivjokˈaa, wˌahudˈumu katˌika maɟˈoho jˈao, wˌaɲueʃˈaɟi wˌake na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ˌalizotˈoa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, ˌalipˈatwa na mʃaŋɡˈao.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, tˌaarˈifa nˌilijˌosikˈia kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kuhˈusu mˌafanikˈio na hekˈima jˈako ni kwˈeli.|0
lakˈini sˌikuamˈini mˈambo hˈaja hˌadi nˌilipokˈuɟa na kuˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. nˈaam, sˌikuambˈiwa hˌata nˈusu jˈake; katˌika hekˈima na mˈali ˌumezˈidi sˈana ˈile tˌaarˈifa nˌilijˌoisikˈia.|0
ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ambˈaje ˌamependˈezwa sˈana nˌawe na kˌukuwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli. kwa sabˈabu ja upˈendo wˌake bwˈana wa milˈele aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌamekufˈaɲa mfˈalme, ˌili kˌudumˈiʃa hˈaki na ˌuadilˈifu.|0
nˌaje akˈampa mfˈalme talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini za ðahˈabu, kiˈasi kikˈubwa sˈana tʃa vˌikolˈezi na vˈito vja θamˈani. hˌaikuwˈahi kˈamwe kulˈetwa tˈena vˌikolˈezi vˈiŋɡi hˈivjo kulˈetwa kˌama vˈile malkˈia wa ʃˈeba ˌalivjˈompa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni.|0
mˈeli za hirˈamu zˌililˈeta ðahˈabu kutˈoka ofˈiri; tˈena kutˈoka hˌuko zˌililˈeta ʃehˈena kˈubwa ja mˈiti ja msandˈali na vˈito vja θamˈani.|0
uzˈito wa ðahˈabu ambˈajo sˌolomˈoni ˌalipokˈea kwa mwˈaka ˌulikˈuwa talˈanta mˌiasˈita sitˈininasˈita.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈao kˈubwa mˌiambˈili kwa ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa; kˈila ŋɡˈao ˌilikˈuwa na ðahˈabu jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiasˈita.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈia ŋɡˈao ndˈoɡo mˌiatˈatu za ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa, kˈila ŋɡˈao ikˈiwa na uzˈito wa mˈane tˈatu za ðahˈabu. mfˈalme ˌakaziwˈeka katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la msˈitu wa lˌebanˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza kˈiti kikˈubwa tʃa kifˈalme kwa kˌutumˈia pˈembe za ndˈovu na kˌukifunˈika kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
vikˈombe vjˈote vja mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni vja kˌuɲuˈea vˌilikˈuwa vja ðahˈabu na vjˈombo vjˈote vja ɲumbˈani katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la msˈitu wa lˌebanˈoni vˌilikˈuwa vja ðahˈabu sˈafi. hˌakukˈuwa na kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa fˈeða, kwa sabˈabu fˈeða ˌiliˌonekˈana ja θamˈani ndˈoɡo sˈiku za sˌolomˈoni.|0
mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa na mˈeli ɲˈiŋɡi za bˌiaʃˈara bˌaharˈini zˌilizokˈuwa zˌikiˌandamˈana na mˈeli za hirˈamu. kwa mˈara mˈoɟa kˈila miˈaka mitˈatu zˌilirˈudi, zikˈiwa zˌimebˈeba ðahˈabu, fˈeða, pˈembe za ndˈovu na ɲˈani wakˈubwa na wadˈoɡo.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu zaˈidi kwa ˌutaɟˈiri na hekˈima kulˈiko wafˈalme wˈote wa dunˈia.|0
dunˈia jˈote ˌikatafˈuta kˌukutˈana na sˌolomˈoni ˌili kˌusikˈia hekˈima ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌameiwˈeka katˌika mˈojo wˈake.|0
mwˈaka baˌada ja mwˈaka, kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌalikˈuɟa ˌalilˈeta zawˈadi: vjˈombo vja fˈeða na ðahˈabu, maɟˈoho, silˈaha na vˌikolˈezi, farˈasi na ɲˈumbu.|0
farˈasi wa sˌolomˈoni wˌalilˈetwa kutˈoka mˈisri na kutˈoka kˈue. wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa mfˈalme wˌaliwˌanunˈua kutˈoka kˈue.|0
wˌaliaɡˈiza maɡˈari kutˈoka mˈisri kwa bˈei ja ʃekˈeli mˌiasˈita za fˈeða na farˈasi kwa ʃekˈeli mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini. pˈia wˌaliwaˈuza ɲɟˈe kwa wafˈalme wˈote wa wahˈiti na wa wˌaarˈamu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakawapˈenda wˌanawˈake wˈeŋɡi wa kiɡˈeni zaˈidi, mbˈali na bˈinti farˈao: wˌanawˈake wa wˌamoˈabu, wˌaamˈoni, wˌaedˈomu, wˌasidˈoni na wahˈiti.|0
wˌalitˈoka katˌika mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˌaambˈia wˌaisraˈeli, msˈiɟe mkˌaoˈana nˈao, kwa kˌuwa hakˈika wˌataˌiɡeˈuza miˈojo jˈenu mɡˌeukˈie miˈuŋɡu jˈao. hˌata hˈivjo, sˌolomˈoni ˌakakˈaza kˌuwapˈenda.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakafuˈata ˌaʃtorˈeθi mˈuŋɡu ˈm̩ke wa wˌasidˈoni, na molˈeki mˈuŋɡu ˌalijekˈuwa tʃukˈizo la wˌaamˈoni.|0
kwa hˈijo sˌolomˈoni ˌakafˈaɲa uˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana; hˌakumfuˈata bwˈana kˌikamilˈifu kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake.|0
kwˈeɲe kilˈima mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jˌerusalˈemu, sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu kwa aɟˈili ja kemˈoʃi tʃukˈizo la wˌamoˈabu, na kwa molˈeki mˈuŋɡu tʃukˈizo la wˌaamˈoni.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa wˌake zˌake wˈote wa kiɡˈeni, ambˈao wˌalifukˈiza uvˈumba na kutˈoa ðabˈihu kwa miˈuŋɡu jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamkˌasirikˈia sˌolomˈoni kwa sabˈabu mˈojo wˌake ˌuliɡeˈuka mbˈali na bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtokˈea mˈara mbˈili.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemkatˈaza sˌolomˈoni kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, sˌolomˈoni hˌakutˈii ˈamri ja bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia sˌolomˈoni, kwa kˌuwa hˌii n̩dˈijo hˈali jˈako na hˌukuʃˈika aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu nˌilizˌokuamˈuru, hakˈika nˌitaˌurarˈua ufˈalme kutˈoka kwˈako na kˈumpa mmˈoɟa wa walˈio tʃˈini jˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi bˈaba jˈako, sˌitafˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili wakˈati wa uhˈai wˈako. nˌitaˌurarˈua kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwanˈao.|0
lakˈini pˈia sˌitaˌurarˈua ufˈalme wˈote kutˈoka kwˈake, bˌali nitˈampa kabˈila mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu na kwa aɟˈili ja jˌerusalˈemu, ambˈao nˌimeˌutʃaɡˈua.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwinˈua adˈui ðˈidi ja sˌolomˈoni, hadˈadi, mwedˈomu, kutˈoka ukˈoo wa ufˈalme wa edˈomu.|0
hˌuko ɲˈuma wakˈati daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakipiɡˈana na edˈomu, joˈabu ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda kuzˈika wˌaliˌouˈawa, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaˈua wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈako edˈomu.|0
joˈabu na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈaa hˌuko kwa miˈezi sˈita, mpˈaka wˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌanaˈume wˈote hˌuko edˈomu.|0
lakˈini hadˈadi, akˈiwa bˈado mvulˈana mdˈoɡo, ˌalikˌimbilˈia mˈisri akˈiwa na baˈaði ja mˌaafˈisa wa kˌiedˈomu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimhˌudumˈia bˈaba jˈake.|0
wˌakaondˈoka mˌidiˈani wˌakaˈenda parˈani. bˌasi wˌakitʃukˈua pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌanaˈume kutˈoka parˈani, wˌakaˈenda mˈisri, kwa farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri, ambˈaje alˈimpa hadˈadi ɲˈumba, ˈarði na ˌakampatˈia tʃakˈula.|0
farˈao ˌakapendˈezwa sˈana na hadˈadi hˌata akˈampa ndˈuɡu wa mkˈewe mweɲˈewe, malkˈia tˌapenˈesi, ˌili ˌaolˈewe na hadˈadi.|0
hˈujo ndˈuɡu wa tˌapenˈesi ˌakamzalˈia mwˈana ˌalijeˈitwa ɡˌenubˈaθi, ambˈaje ˌalilelˈewa na tˌapenˈesi katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. hˌuko ɡˌenubˈaθi ˌaliˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wa farˈao mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko mˈisri, hadˈadi ˌalisikˈia kwˌamba daˈudi ˌamepumzˈika na bˈaba zˌake na ja kwˌamba pˈia joˈabu ˌalijekˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌamekˈufa. ndˈipo hadˈadi ˌakamwambˈia farˈao, nˌiruhˈusu niˈende ˌili niwˈeze kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu.|0
farˈao ˌakaulˈiza, ˌumekˈosa nˈini hˈapa, kwˌamba ˌunatˈaka kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako? hadˈadi ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈuna, lakˈini nˌiruhˈusu niˈende.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwinˈua adˈui mwiŋɡˈine ðˈidi ja sˌolomˈoni, rezˈoni mwˈana wa ˌeliˈada, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemkimbˈia bwˈana wˌake hˌadadezˈeri, mfˈalme wa sˈoba.|0
ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wˈatu, nˌaje akˈawa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈundi la waˈasi, wakˈati daˈudi ˌalipˌoaŋɡamˈiza maɟˈeʃi ja sˈoba; waˈasi wˌalikwˈenda damˈeski, mahˈali wˌalipokˈaa na kˌumilˈiki.|0
rezˈoni ˌalikˈuwa adˈui wa ˌisraˈeli kwa mˈuda wˈote ˌalioˈiʃi sˌolomˈoni, ˌukiˌoŋɡezˈea mˌatatˈizo jˌalijˌosababˈiʃwa na hadˈadi. kwa hˈijo rezˈoni ˌakatawˈala katˌika arˈamu na ˌalikˈuwa mkatˈili kwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
pˈia, jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ˌaliˈasi ðˈidi ja mfˈalme. ˌalikˈuwa mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wa sˌolomˈoni, mwˌefraˈimu kutˈoka serˈeda, ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa mɟˈane ˌalijeˈitwa serˈua.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˌaelˈezo ja ɟˈinsi ˌalivjomwˈasi mfˈalme: sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa mˈilo nˌaje akˈawa ˌamezˈiba mwˈaɲa katˌika ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake.|0
bˌasi jˌeroboˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu ʃuɟˈaa na hodˈari, nˌaje sˌolomˈoni ˌalipoˈona ɟˈinsi kiɟˈana ˌalivjofˈaɲa kˈazi jˈake, ˌakamwˈeka kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈazi jˈote ja mikˈono ja ɲˈumba ja josˈefu.|0
karˈibu na wakˈati ˈule jˌeroboˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌanatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja jˌerusalˈemu, ahˈija nabˈii mʃilˈoni ˌakakutˈana nˌaje ɲɟiˈani, akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa ɟˈoho ɟˈipja. hˈawa wawˈili wˌalikˈuwa pˈeke jˈao mˌaʃambˈani.|0
nˌaje ahˈija ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈoho ɟˈipja ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ˌakalˌirarˈua vipˈande kˈumi na viwˈili.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia jˌeroboˈamu, tʃukˈua vipˈande kˈumi kwa aɟˈili jˈako, kwa kˌuwa hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌasemˈavjo: tazˈama, nˌinakwˈenda kˌuutʃˈana ufˈalme kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa sˌolomˈoni na kukˈupa wˌewe mˌakabˈila kˈumi.|0
lakˈini kwa aɟˈili ja mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi na ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu, ambˈao nˌimeˌutʃaɡˈua mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌatakˈuwa na kabˈila mˈoɟa.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa hˈivi kwa sabˈabu wˌameniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌuabˈudu ˌaʃtorˈeθi mˈuŋɡu ˈm̩ke wa wˌasidˈoni, kemˈoʃi mˈuŋɡu wa wˌamoˈabu, na molˈeki mˈuŋɡu wa wˌaamˈoni, nˌao hˌawakwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu ˌili kufˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, wˈala kuʃˈika ˈamri na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu kˌama daˈudi, babˈaje sˌolomˈoni, ˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
lakˈini sˌitaˌuondˈoa ufˈalme wˈote kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa sˌolomˈoni, nˌimemfˈaɲa mtawˈala sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˌake kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, nˌilijˌemtʃaɡˈua na ambˈaje ˌalijatˈunza mˌaaɡˈizo na ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitaˌuondˈoa ufˈalme kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwanˈawe na kukˈupa wˌewe mˌakabˈila kˈumi.|0
nitˈampa mwanˈawe kabˈila mˈoɟa ˌili kwˌamba daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ˈawe na tˈaa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu daˈima katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao nˌimeˌutʃaɡˈua kuwˈeka ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌukuhˈusu wˌewe jˌeroboˈamu, nˌitakutwˈaa, nˌawe ˌutatawˈala ɟˌuːja jˈote jˈale mˈojo wˈako ˌunajˌotamˈani, ˌutakˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ikˈiwa ˌutafˈaɲa kˈila nˌitakˌalokˌuamˈuru, kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa mbˈele za mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe. nˌitakˌuɟeŋɡˈea ufˈalme ˌutakˌaodˈumu kˌama ˈule nˌiliˌomɟeŋɡˈea daˈudi, nˌami nˌitakˈupa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌitawatˈesa wazˈao wa daˈudi kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili, lakˈini sˈijo milˈele..|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟarˈibu kˌumuˈua jˌeroboˈamu, lakˈini jˌeroboˈamu ˌakakˌimbilˈia mˈisri, kwa mfˈalme ʃiʃˈaki, nˌaje ˌakakˈaa hˌuko mpˈaka sˌolomˈoni ˌalipˌofarˈiki.|0
kwa habˈari za mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa sˌolomˈoni, jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na hekˈima ˌalijˌoioɲˈeʃa, ɟˈe hˌajakˌuandˈikwa jˈote katˌika kitˈabu tʃa matˈendo tʃa sˌolomˈoni.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalitawˈala ˌisraˈeli jˈote miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, akˈiwa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. nˌaje rˌehoboˈamu mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaˈenda ʃekˈemu, kwa kˌuwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda hˌuko kumfˈaɲa jˌeje kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili ˌalikˈuwa bˈado jˈuko mˈisri ˌalikokˈuwa ˌamekˌimbilˈia ˈawe mbˈali na mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni, ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakatˈuma wˈatu kumwˈita jˌeroboˈamu, jˌeje na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli wˌakamwendˈea rˌehoboˈamu na kˌumwambˈia.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, nendˈeni kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu na kˈiʃa mnˌirudˈie. bˌasi wˈatu wˌakaˈenda zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa wazˈee ambˈao wˌalimtˌumikˈia sˌolomˈoni bˈaba jˌake wakˈati wa uhˈai wˌake ˌakawˌaulˈiza, mnˌaniʃaˈuri nˈini katˌika kˌuwaɟˈibu wˈatu hˈawa.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama lˈeo ˌutakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wa wˈatu hˈawa na kˌuwahˌudumˈia na kuwˈapa ɟˈibu lˌinalˌoriðˈiʃa, wˌatakˈuwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako daˈima.|0
lakˈini rˌehoboˈamu ˌakakatˈaa ʃaˈuri ˌalilopˈewa na wazˈee na ˌakatˈaka ˌuʃaˈuri kwa viɟˈana wˌanaˈume rˈika lˈake wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimtˌumikˈia.|0
ˌakawˌaulˈiza, nˈiɲi ˌuʃaˈuri wˈenu ni nˈini? tˌutawˌaɟibˈuɟe wˈatu hˈawa wˌanaˌoniambˈia, ifˈaɲe ɲepˈesi nˈira bˈaba jˈako ˌalijowˈeka ɟˈuu jˈetu?.|0
wˈale viɟˈana wa rˈika lˈake wˌakamɟˈibu, wˌaambˈie wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌokuambˈia, bˈaba jˈako ˌaliwˈeka nˈira nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈetu, lakˈini ifˈaɲe nˈira jˈetu ɲepˈesi, kˌuwa, kidˈole tʃˈaŋɡu kidˈoɡo ni kinˈene kulˈiko kiˈuno tʃa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwˈeka nˈira nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈenu, mˌimi nˌitaifˈaɲa hˌata ˈiwe nzˈito zaˈidi. bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwatʃˈapa kwa mˌiɟelˈedi, mˌimi nˌitawatʃˈapa kwa ŋɡˈe..|0
sˈiku tˈatu bˌaadˈaje, jˌeroboˈamu na wˈatu wˈote wˌakamrudˈia rˌehoboˈamu, kˌama mfˈalme ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema, rudˈini kwˈaŋɡu baˌada ja sˈiku tˈatu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawaɟˈibu wˈatu kwa ˌukatˈili. ˌakikatˈaa ʃaˈuri ˌalilopˈewa na wazˈee.|0
ˌakafuˈata ʃaˈuri la viɟˈana wa rˈika lˈake na kusˈema, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalifˈaɲa nˈira jˈenu kˌuwa nzˈito, mˌimi nˌitaifˈaɲa kˌuwa nzˈito zaˈidi. bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwatʃˈapa kwa mˌiɟelˈedi, mˌimi nˌitawatʃˈapa kwa ŋɡˈe.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza wˈatu, kwa kˌuwa ɟˈambo hˈili lˌilitˈoka kwa bwˈana, ˌili kˌutimˈiza nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamenˈena kwa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati kˌupitˈia ahˈija mʃilˈoni.|0
ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa mfˈalme ˌamekatˈaa kˌuwasˌikilˈiza, wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme: tˈuna fˈuŋɡu ɡˈani kwa daˈudi? sˌisi hatˈuna urˈiθi kwa mwˈana wa jˈese. nendˈeni kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈenu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli! ˌaŋɡalˈia ɲˈumba jˈako mweɲˈewe, ˈee daˈudi! hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈao.|0
lakˈini kwa habˈari ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwatawˈala bˈado.|0
mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakamtˈuma ˌadorˈamu, ˌalijekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu kwa kˌulazimˈiʃwa, lakˈini ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe hˌadi akˈafa. hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu, ˌakafˌanikˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake na kˌutorokˈea jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˈasi ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja daˈudi hˌadi lˈeo.|0
