wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba jˌeroboˈamu ˌamerˈudi, wˌakatˈuma wˈatu na kumwˈita kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko na kumfˈaɲa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli jˈote. ni kabˈila la jˈuda pˈeke jˌake lˌililobˈaki kˌuwa tiˈifu kwa ɲˈumba ja daˈudi.|0
ikˈawa rˌehoboˈamu ˌalipofˈika jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakakusˈaɲa ɲˈumba jˈote ja jˈuda na kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini, wˌanaˈume wˌapiɡanˈaɟi mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θemanˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, kufˈaɲa vˈita ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na kˌuurudˈiʃa tˈena ufˈalme kwa rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
lakˈini nˈeno hˈili la mˈuŋɡu lˌikamɟˈia ʃemˈaja ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
mwambˈie rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni mfˈalme wa jˈuda, na ɲˈumba jˈote ja jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini, na wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: msipˈande kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu zˈenu, wˌaisraˈeli. nendˈeni ɲumbˈani, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu, kwa kˌuwa hˈili nˌimelitˈenda mˈimi.  kwa hˈijo wˌakalitˈii nˈeno la bwˈana na kurˈudi ɲumbˈani, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameaɡˈiza.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeroboˈamu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ʃekˈemu ˌakaˌizuŋɡuʃˈia ŋɡˈome katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu na ˌakaˈiʃi hˌuko. ˌakatˈoka hˌuko, ˌakaˈenda ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa pˌenuˈeli.|0
jˌeroboˈamu ˌakawˈaza mojˈoni mwˈake, sˈasa ˌinawˌezekˈana ufˈalme ˌukarˈudi katˌika ɲˈumba ja daˈudi.|0
kˌama wˈatu hˈawa wˌatapˈanda kwˈenda kutˈoa ðabˈihu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, miˈojo jˈao ˌitamrudˈia bwˈana wˈao, rˌehoboˈamu mfˈalme wa jˈuda. wˌataniˈua mˌimi na kurˈudi kwa mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu.|0
baˌada ja kˌutafˈuta ʃaˈuri, mfˈalme ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ndˈama wawˈili wa ðahˈabu. ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu, ni ɣarˈama kˈubwa kwˈenu kukwˈea kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu. hˌii hˈapa miˈuŋɡu jˈenu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ˌilijˌowapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
ndˈama mmˈoɟa ˌakamwˈeka beθˈeli na mwiŋɡˈine dˈani.|0
nˈalo ɟˈambo hˈili likˈawa ðˈambi, wˈatu wakˈawa wˌanaˈenda hˌadi dˈani kˌumwabˈudu hˈujo ˌalijewˈekwa hˌuko.|0
jˌeroboˈamu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu na kˌuwateˈua mˌakuhˈani kutˈoka wˈatu wa aˈina zˈote, ˌiɟapokˈuwa hˌawakˈuwa walˈawi.|0
pˈia jˌeroboˈamu ˌakawˈeka sˌikukˈuu katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa nˈane, kˌama sˌikukˈuu ˌilijokˈuwa ˌikifaɲˈika hˌuko jˈuda, na ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu. ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo hˌuko beθˈeli ˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu kwa ndˈama ˌalizˌoteŋɡenˈeza. hˌuko beθˈeli ˌakawawˈeka mˌakuhˈani, na pˈia katˌika sehˈemu za ɟˈuu za kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu ˌalizˌozitˌeŋɡenˈeza.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa nˈane, mwˈezi ˌaliˌoutʃaɡˈua mweɲˈewe, ˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa hˌuko beθˈeli. kwa hˈijo ˌakawˈeka sˌikukˈuu kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli na ˌakapˈanda mˌaðabahˈuni kutˈoa sadˈaka.|0
kwa nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalifˈika beθˈeli kutˈoka jˈuda wakˈati jˌeroboˈamu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu ˌili kutˈoa sadˈaka.|0
ˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele ðˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu kwa nˈeno la bwˈana: ˈee mˌaðabˈahu, mˌaðabˈahu! hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: mwˈana ˌaitwˈaje josˈia ˌatazalˈiwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja daˈudi. ɟˈuu jˈako ˌatawatˈoa ðabˈihu mˌakuhˈani wa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu wˈale ambˈao wˌanatˈoa sadˈaka hˈapa sˈasa, nˈajo mifˈupa ja wˌanadˈamu ˌitatʃˈomwa ɟˈuu jˈako..|0
sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakatˈoa iʃˈara: hˌii n̩dˈijo iʃˈara bwˈana ˌalijˌotaŋɡˈaza: mˌaðabˈahu hˈaja jˌatapasˈuka na maɟˈivu jalˈijo ɟˈuu jˌake jˌatamwaɡˈika.|0
mfˈalme jˌeroboˈamu ˌalipˌosikˈia kˈile ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalitʃosˈema, ˌalipopˈiɡa kelˈele ðˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu hˌuko beθˈeli, ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni na kusˈema, mkamˈate! lakˈini mkˈono ˌaliokˈuwa ˌameˌuɲoˈoʃa kˌumwelekˈea jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌukasiɲˈaa na kubˈaki hˈapo hˈapo, kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌakuwˈeza kˌuurudˈiʃa.|0
pˈia, mˌaðabˈahu jˌalipasˈuka na maɟˈivu jˌakamwaɡˈika sˌawasˈawa na iʃˈara ˌilijˌotolˈewa na ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu kwa nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌiombˈee kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌili mkˈono wˈaŋɡu upˈate kupˈona. kwa hˈijo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwombˈea kwa bwˈana, nˌao mkˈono wa mfˈalme ˌukapˈona na kˌuwa kˌama ˌulivjokˈuwa hˈapo kwˈanza.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, twˈende ɲumbˈani kwˈaŋɡu upˈate tʃakˈula, nˌami nˌitakˈupa zawˈadi.|0
lakˈini jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, hˌata kˌama ˌuŋɡenˈipa nˈusu ja mˈali zˈako, nˌisiŋɡekwˈenda pamˈoɟa na wˈewe, wˈala nˌisiŋɡekˈula mkˈate ˌau kˈuɲua mˈaɟi hˈapa.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌiliaɡˈizwa kwa nˈeno la bwˈana: kˈamwe usˈile mkˈate wˈala usˈiɲue mˈaɟi ˌau kurˈudi kwa ɲɟˈia ˌulijoɟˈia..|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakafuˈata ɲɟˈia ɲiŋɡˈine na hˌakurˈudi kˌupitˈia ɲɟˈia ˈile ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameiɟˈia beθˈeli.|0
bˌasi kˌulikuwˈepo na nabˈii fulˈani m̩zˈee ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi beθˈeli, ambˈaje wanˈawe wˌalikˈuɟa kˌumwambˈia jˈote ambˈajo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejafˈaɲa pˈale sˈiku ˈile. pˈia wˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈao jˈale ˌalijˌomwambˈia mfˈalme.|0
bˈaba jˈao ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ˌameˌelekˈea ɲɟˈia ɡˈani? nˌao wanˈawe wˌakamwoɲˈeʃa ˈile ɲɟˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka jˈuda ˌalijopˈita.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌaambˈia wanˈawe, nˌitandˌikiˈeni pˈunda. wˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌumtandikˈia pˈunda, ˌakampˈanda.|0
na kˌumfuˌatilˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. ˌakamkˈuta ˌamekˈeti tʃˈini ja mwalˈoni na ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, wˌewe ndˈiwe ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka jˈuda? ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi n̩dˈije.|0
bˌasi nabˈii ˌakamwambˈia, karˈibu ɲumbˈani pamˈoɟa na mˌimi ˈule.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, siwˈezi kurˈudi na kwˈenda nˈawe, wˈala siwˈezi kˈula mkˈate ˌau kˈuɲua mˈaɟi pamˈoɟa nˌawe mahˈali hˈapa.|0
nˌimeambˈiwa kwa nˈeno la bwˈana: kˈamwe usˈile mkˈate ˌau kˈuɲua mˈaɟi hˌuko ˌau kˌurudˈia ɲɟˈia ˌulijoɟˈia..|0
jˈule nabˈii m̩zˈee ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi pˈia ni nabˈii, kˌama wˈewe. nˌaje mˌalaˈika ˌalisˈema nˌami kwa nˈeno la bwˈana: mrudˈiʃe ˈaɟe katˌika ɲˈumba jˈako ˌili apˈate kˈula mkˈate na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi.  lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimwambˈia uˈoŋɡo..|0
hˈivjo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakarˈudi pamˈoɟa nˌaje na akˈala na kˈuɲua katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
wakˈati wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamekˈeti mezˈani, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˈule nabˈii m̩zˈee ˌalijˌemrudˈiʃa hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌakampazˈia saˈuti jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametˈoka jˈuda, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: ˌumeˈasi nˈeno la bwˈana na hˌukuʃˈika ˈamri ˌulijopˈewa na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
bˌali ˌulirˈudi na ukˈala mkˈate na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi mahˈali ambˈapo ˌalikˌuambˈia usˈile wˈala usˈiɲue. kwa hˈijo maˈiti jˈako hˌaitazˈikwa katˌika kabˈuri la bˈaba zˈako..|0
wakˈati hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˈula na kˈuɲua, nabˈii ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemrudˈiʃa ˌakamtˌandikˈia pˈunda wˈake.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈenda ˌakakutˈana na sˈimba ɲɟiˈani, ˌakamuˈua na maˈiti jˌake ˌikabwˈaɡwa bˌarabarˈani, jˈule pˈunda wˌake na sˈimba wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama karˈibu jˈake.|0
baˈaði ja wˈatu wˌaliopˈita pˈale wˌaliˈona maˈiti ˌimebwˈaɡwa pˈale tʃˈini, sˈimba akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja maˈiti, wˌakaˈenda na kutˈoa habˈari katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao nabˈii m̩zˈee ˌaliˈiʃi.|0
jˈule nabˈii ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemrudˈiʃa kutˈoka safˈari jˌake ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari hˌii ˌakasˈema, ni jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje ˌaliˈasi nˈeno la bwˈana. bwˈana ˌamemtˈoa kwa sˈimba, ambˈaje ˌamemrarˈua na kˌumuˈua, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilivjokˈuwa lˌimemwˈoɲa.|0
nabˈii ˌakawˌaambˈia wanˈawe, nˌitandˌikiˈeni pˈunda, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatˈoka ˌakaˈenda ˌakakˈuta maˈiti ˌimebwˈaɡwa tʃˈini bˌarabarˈani, pˈunda na sˈimba wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama kˈando jˈake. sˈimba hakˈuwa ˌamekˈula ˈile maˈiti wˈala kˌumrarˈua pˈunda.|0
bˌasi jˈule nabˈii m̩zˈee ˌakatʃukˈua maˈiti ja ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌakailˈaza ɟˌuːja pˈunda na ˌakaˌirudˈiʃa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈake, ˌili ˌamwombˌolezˈee na kumzˈika.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakailˈaza ˈile maˈiti katˌika kabˈuri lˈake hˈujo nabˈii m̩zˈee, nˌao wˌakaˌombolˈeza ɟˈuu jˌake na kusˈema, ˈee ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja kumzˈika, ˌakawˌaambˈia wanˈawe, wakˈati nˌitakˌapokˈufa, mnizˈike kwˈeɲe kabˈuri ˌalimozˈikwa hˈuju ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu; lazˈeni mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu kˈando ja mifˈupa jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana uɟˈumbe ˌaliˌoutaŋɡˈaza kwa nˈeno la bwˈana ðˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu hˌuko beθˈeli na ðˈidi ja mˌaðabˈahu jˈote katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika mˈiɟi ja sˌamarˈia, hakˈika jˌatatokˈea kwˈeli.|0
hˌata baˌada ja hˈaja, jˌeroboˈamu hˌakubadˈili ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja, lakˈini mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena ˌakawˈeka mˌakuhˈani kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu kutˈoka wˈatu wa aˈina zˈote. jejˈote ˌalijetˈaka kˌuwa kuhˈani ˌalimwˈeka wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ðˈambi ja ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu ambˈajo ˌiliˌisabˌabiʃˈia kˌuaŋɡˈuka na kˌuaŋɡamˈia kwˈake hˌadi kˌutowˈeka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
wakˈati ˈule abˈija mwˈana wa jˌeroboˈamu ˌakauɡˈua.|0
nˌaje jˌeroboˈamu ˌakamwambˈia ˈm̩ke wˈake, nˈenda ˌukaɟˌibadilˈiʃe, ˌili wˈatu wˌasiɟˈue kwˌamba wˌewe ni ˈm̩ke wa jˌeroboˈamu. kˈiʃa uˈende ʃˈilo. nabˈii ahˈija jˈuko hˌuko, jˈule ˌalijˌeniambˈia kˌuwa nˌitakˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja wˈatu hˈawa.|0
tʃukˈua mikˈate kˈumi, mˌaandˈazi kaðˈaa na ɡˌudulˈia la asˈali na ˌumwendˈee. ˌatakˌuambˈia kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea kwa kiɟˈana.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩ke wa jˌeroboˈamu ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama ˌalivjosˈema mumˈewe, ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja ahˈija hˌuko ʃˈilo. wakˈati hˈuu ahˈija ˌalikˈuwa kipˈofu nˌaje ˌaliʃˈindwa kuˈona kwa sabˈabu ja ˈumri wˈake.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia ahˈija, ˈm̩ke wa jˌeroboˈamu ˌanakˈuɟa kˌukuulˈiza kuhˈusu mwanˈawe, kwa kˌuwa ni mɡˈoɲɟua, nˌawe ˌutamɟˈibu hˈivi na hˈivi. ˌatakˌapowasˈili, ˌataɟifˈaɲa kˌuwa ni ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine.|0
hˈivjo ahˈija ˌalipˌosikˈia kiʃˈindo tʃa hatˈua zˌake mlaŋɡˈoni, ˌakasˈema, karˈibu ndˈani, ˈm̩ke wa jˌeroboˈamu. kwa nˈini kˌuɟibˌadilˈiʃa? nˌimetˈumwa kwˈako nikˈiwa na habˈari m̩bˈaja.|0
nˈenda, ˌukamwambˈie jˌeroboˈamu kwˌamba hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌilikˌuinˈua mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu na kˌukufˈaɲa kˌioŋɡˈozi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌikararˈua ufˈalme kutˈoka kwa ɲˈumba ja daˈudi na kukˈupa wˈewe, lakˈini hukˈuwa kˌama mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, ambˈaje ˌalijaʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu na kˌunifuˈata kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote, ˌakifˈaɲa tu lˈile lˌililokˈuwa sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌumefˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi kulˈiko wˈote wˌaliˌokutˌaŋɡulˈia. ˌumeɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, sanˈamu za tʃˈuma, ˌumenˌiɣaðibˈiʃa na kˌunitˈupa ɲˈuma jˈako.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja hˈili, nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu. nˌitakˌatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka kwa jˌeroboˈamu kˈila mzalˈiwa wa mwˈiʃo wa kiˈume katˌika ˌisraˈeli, mtˈumwa ˌau ˈm̩tu hˈuru. nˌitatʃˈoma ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu mpˈaka ˌiteketˈee jˈote kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌatʃomˈaje kiɲˈesi.|0
ˈm̩bwa wˌatawˈala wˈale walˈio wa ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu wˌatakˌaofˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani wˌataɟilˈiʃa kwa wˈale wˌatakˌaofˈia mˌaʃambˈani. bwˈana ˌamesˈema!.|0
kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe, rˈudi ɲumbˈani. wakˈati ˌutakˌapotˈia m̩ɡˈuu katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈako, kiɟˈana ˌatakˈufa.|0
ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌitamwˌombolezˈea na kumzˈika. kwa sabˈabu ni jˌeje pekˈee wa ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu ˌatakˌajezˈikwa, kwa sabˈabu ni jˌeje pˈeke jˌake ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu ambˈaje bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌameˈona kˈitu tʃˈema kwˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌataɟˌiinulˈia mweɲˈewe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli ambˈaje ˌataˌikatilˈia mbˈali ɟamˈaa ja jˌeroboˈamu. sˈiku n̩dˈijo hˌii! nˈini? nˈaam, hˌata sˈasa hˈivi.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌataipˈiɡa ˌisraˈeli, hˌata ˈiwe kˌama uɲˈasi ˌunaˌosukwasˈukwa ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi. ˌataiŋɡˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi hˌii nzˈuri ˌalijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao na kˌuwatawˈaɲa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati, kwa sabˈabu wˌamemɣˌaðibˈiʃa bwˈana kwa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera.|0
nˌaje ˌatawaˈatʃa ˌisraˈeli kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa ja jˌeroboˈamu ˌalijˌojatˈenda na kˌusababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌujatˈenda.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩ke wa jˌeroboˈamu ˌakainˈuka, ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda tˈirsa. mˈara ˌalipˌokaɲˈaɡa kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa mlˈaŋɡo, kiɟˈana akˈafa.|0
wˌakamzˈika na ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌikamwˌombolezˈea, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, nabˈii ahˈija.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu, vˈita vjˈake na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌotawˈala, vˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda. ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na mˈoɟa ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala miˈaka kˈumi na sˈaba hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌutʃaɡˈua kutˈoka mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ˌili apˈate kˌuliwˈeka hˈumo ɟˈina lˈake. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa naˈama, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈoni.|0
jˈuda wˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. kwa ðˈambi wˌalizotˈenda wˌakatʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˌake jˌeɲe wˈivu zaˈidi kulˈiko bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
pˈia wˌakaɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, mˈawe ja kˌuabudˈiwa na ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera ɟˌuːja kˈila kilˈima kˌilitʃˌoinˈuka na kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda.|0
wˌalikuwˈepo hˌata wˌanaˈume mˌahanˈiθi wa mahˈali pa ibˈada za sanˈamu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; wˈatu wˌakaɟˌiiŋɡˈiza katˌika kutˈenda mˌatʃukˈizo ja mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalijˌafukˈuza mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈano wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu, ʃiʃˈaki mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakaʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈila wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipokwˈenda katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, walˈinzi wˌalizˌitʃukˈua hˈizo ŋɡˈao, na bˌaadˈaje wˌalizˌirudˈiʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ulˈinzi.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa rˌehoboˈamu na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita vˌinavjˌoendelˈea kˈati ja rˌehoboˈamu na jˌeroboˈamu.|0
nˌaje rˌehoboˈamu ˌakalˈala na bˈaba zˈake, na ˌakazˈikwa pamˈoɟa nˌao katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa naˈama, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈoni. nˌaje abˈija mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, abˈija akˈawa mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka mitˈatu. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa maˈaka bˈinti ˌabiʃalˈomu.|0
ˌalitˈenda ðˈambi zˈote bˈaba jˌake ˌalizotˈenda kˈabla jˈake; mˈojo wˌake hˌaukˈuwa mkˌamilˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake kˌama mˈojo wa daˈudi bˈaba jˌake ˌulivjokˈuwa.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake akˈampa tˈaa katˌika jˌerusalˈemu kwa kˌumwinˈua mwˈana ˌatawˈale badˈala jˌake na kwa kˌuifˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa imˈara.|0
kwa kˌuwa daˈudi ˌalifˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na hˌakuʃˈindwa kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˈote ja bwˈana sˈiku zˈote za uhˈai wˈake, ˌisipokˈuwa katˌika habˈari ja urˈia, mhˈiti.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja rˌehoboˈamu na jˌeroboˈamu wakˈati wˈote wa maˈiʃa ja abˈija.|0
kwa habˈari ja mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa abˈija na jˈote ˌalijofˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda? kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja abˈija na jˌeroboˈamu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˈasa akˈawa mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
nˌaje ˌakatawˈala katˌika jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na mmˈoɟa. bˈibi jˌake ˌaliˈitwa maˈaka bˈinti ˌabiʃalˈomu.|0
ˈasa ˌakatˈenda jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌametˈenda daˈudi bˈaba jˈake.|0
ˌakawˌafukˈuza mˌahanˈiθi wa mahˈali pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuondˈoa sanˈamu zˈote ambˈazo bˈaba zˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza.|0
hˌata ˌakamwondˈoa bˈibi jˌake maˈaka kwˈeɲe waðˈifa wˌake kˌama mˈama malkˈia, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera ja kˌutʃukˈiza. ˈasa ˌakaikˈata hˈijo ŋɡˈuzo na kˌuitˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto katˌika bˈonde la kidrˈoni.|0
ˌiɟapokˈuwa hˌakuondˈoa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, mˈojo wa ˈasa ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeɟiwˈeka kwa bwˈana kˌikamilˈifu maˈiʃa jˌake jˈote.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja ˈasa na baˈaʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli sˈiku zˈote za ˌutawˈala wˈao.|0
kˈiʃa ˈasa ˌakatʃukˈua fˈeða jˈote na ðahˈabu ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeˈatʃwa katˌika hazˈina za hekˈalu la bwˈana na za ɟˈumba lˈake mweɲˈewe la kifˈalme. ˌakawˌakabˈiði mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kˌuwatˈuma kwa bˈen hadˈadi mwˈana wa tˌabrimˈoni, mwˈana wa hˌeziˈoni, mfˈalme wa arˈamu, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakitawˈala damˈeski.|0
ˌakasˈema na pawˈepo mkatˈaba kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˈewe, kˌama ˌulivjˌokuwˈepo kˈati ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na bˈaba jˈako. tazˈama, nˌimekˌuletˈea zawˈadi ja fˈeða na ðahˈabu. sˈasa vˈuɲɟa mkatˈaba wˈako na baˈaʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌili ˌaniˌondokˈee mˈimi.|0
bˈen hadˈadi ˌakakˌubaliˈana na mfˈalme ˈasa na kutˈuma mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈeʃi jˌake ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi ja ˌisraˈeli. ˌakaiʃˈinda mˈiɟi ja ijˈoni, dˈani, ˈabel bˈeθ maˈaka na kˌinerˈeθi jˈote, pamˈoɟa na naftˈali.|0
wakˈati baˈaʃa ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, ˌakaˈatʃa kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa rˈama na ˌakaˈenda kuˈiʃi tˈirsa.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˈasa ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kwa jˈuda jˈote, pasˈipo kˌumbaɡˈua hˌata mmˈoɟa, kubˈeba mˈawe na m̩bˈao kutˈoka rˈama, ambˈazo baˈaʃa ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitumˈia hˌuko. mfˈalme ˈasa ˌakazˌitumˈia kˌuɟeŋɡˈea ɡˈeba ˌilijˈoko bˌeɲamˈini na mˈispa pˈia.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio jˈote ja ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa, mˌafanikˈio jˌake jˈote, jˈote ˌalijofˈaɲa na mˈiɟi ˌalijˌoiɟˈeŋɡa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda? katˌika uzˈee wˈake, hˌata hˈivjo, ˌalipˈata uɡˈoɲɟua wa miɡˈuu.|0
kˈiʃa ˈasa ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake na kuzˈikwa pamˈoɟa nˌao katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. nˌaje jˌehoʃafˈati mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
nadˈabu mwˈana wa jˌeroboˈamu akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˈasa wa jˈuda, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka miwˈili.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, ˌakienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za bˈaba jˌake na katˌika ðˈambi jˈake, ambˈajo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuifˈaɲa.|0
baˈaʃa mwˈana wa ahˈija wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisakˈari ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˈake, nˌaje ˌakamuˈua hˌuko ɡˌibeθˈoni, ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌafilˈisti, wakˈati nadˈabu na ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌameˌuziŋɡˈira.|0
baˈaʃa ˌakamuˈua nadˈabu katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌaje baˈaʃa ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mˈara tu ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, ˌaliˈua ɟamˈaa jˈote ja jˌeroboˈamu. hˌakumwatʃˈia jˌeroboˈamu jejˈote ˌalijekˈuwa hˈai, bˌali ˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈote, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililˌotolˈewa kˌupitˈia kwa mtumˈiʃi wˌake ahˈija mʃilˈoni.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamezitˈenda jˌeroboˈamu na kˌusababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, tˈena kwa sabˈabu ˌalimkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa nadˈabu na jˈote ˌalijofˈaɲa, ɟˈe hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja ˈasa na baˈaʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli wakˈati wˈote wa ˌutawˈala wˈao.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, baˈaʃa mwˈana wa ahˈija akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli jˈote hˌuko tˈirsa, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mˈinne.|0
ˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, ˌakienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za jˌeroboˈamu na ðˈambi jˈake, ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuitˈenda.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˈehu mwˈana wa hanˈani ðˈidi ja baˈaʃa, kusˈema.|0
nˌilikˌuinˈua kutˈoka mˌavumbˈini na kˌukufˈaɲa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini ˌukaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za jˌeroboˈamu na kˌusababˈiʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli kutˈenda ðˈambi na kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa kwa ðˈambi zˈao.|0
bˌasi nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza baˈaʃa pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba jˈake, nˌami nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba jˈako kˌama ˈile ja jˌeroboˈamu mwanˈawe nebˈati.|0
ˈm̩bwa wˌatawˈala wˈatu wa baˈaʃa wˌatakˌaofˈia mɟˈini na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani wˌataɟilˈiʃa kwa wˈale wˌatakˌaofˈia mˌaʃambˈani.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa baˈaʃa, ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˈake, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia baˈaʃa pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba jˌake kˌupitˈia kwa nabˈii jˈehu mwˈana wa hanˈani, kwa sabˈabu ja maˈovu jˈote ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˈenda matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, ˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa kwa mˈambo ˌalijotˈenda, na kˌuwa kˌama ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu, na pˈia kwa sabˈabu ˌaliˌiaŋɡamˈiza.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na sˈita wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ˈela mwˈana wa baˈaʃa akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko tˈirsa kwa miˈaka miwˈili.|0
zˈimri, mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wˈake, ˌalijekˈuwa na ˈamri ɟˌuːja nˈusu ja maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita, ˌakafˈaɲa hˈila m̩bˈaja ðˈidi ja ˈela. wakˈati hˈuo ˈela ˌalikˈuwa tˈirsa, ˌakilˈewa katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˈarsa, ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme hˌuko tˈirsa.|0
zˈimri ˌakaiŋɡˈia, ˌakampˈiɡa na kˌumuˈua katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda. kˈiʃa zˈimri ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mˈara tu ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala na kukˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme, ˌaliˈua ɟamˈaa jˈote ja baˈaʃa. hˌakumwˈatʃa mwˌanaˈume hˌata mmˈoɟa, akˈiwa ni ndˈuɡu ˌau rafˈiki.|0
hˈivjo zˈimri ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈiza ɟamˈaa jˈote ja baˈaʃa, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililonˈenwa ðˈidi ja baˈaʃa kˌupitˈia nabˈii jˈehu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈote baˈaʃa na mwanˈawe ˈela wˌalizokˈuwa wˌametˈenda na wˌakasˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, bˌasi wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kwa sanˈamu zˈao zˌisizofˈaa.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ˈela, na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, zˈimri ˌakatawˈala hˌuko tˈirsa sˈiku sˈaba. ɟˈeʃi lˌilikˈuwa lˌimepˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na ɡˌibeθˈoni, ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa kambˈini wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa zˈimri ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa hˈila m̩bˈaja ðˈidi ja mfˈalme na kˌumuˈua, wˌakamtaŋɡˈaza ˈomri, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, kˌuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo hˌuko kambˈini.|0
ndˈipo ˈomri na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakaondˈoka ɡˌibeθˈoni na kˌuiziŋɡˈira tˈirsa.|0
wakˈati zˈimri ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa ˈm̩ɟi ˌumetʃˌukulˈiwa, ˌalikwˈenda ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kˌulitʃˈoma mˈoto ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kˌuɟitˌeketˈeza ndˈani jˈake. kwa hˈijo akˈafa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ˌalizofˈaɲa, ˌakitˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za jˌeroboˈamu na katˌika ðˈambi ˌalizofˈaɲa na kˌusababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzifˈaɲa.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa zˈimri, na uˈasi ˌaliˌoutˈenda, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaɡˌawaɲˈika katˌika makˈundi mawˈili, nˈusu wˌakamuˈuŋɡa mkˈono tˈibni mwˈana wa ɡinˈaθi ˌili ˈawe mfˈalme na nˈusu ɲiŋɡˈine wˌakamuˈuŋɡa mkˈono ˈomri.|0
lakˈini wˌafuˈasi wa ˈomri wˌakaɟˌioɲˈeʃa wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko wˈale wa tˈibni mwˈana wa ɡinˈaθi. hˈivjo tˈibni akˈafa na ˈomri akˈawa mfˈalme.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na mˈoɟa wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ˈomri akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala kwa miˈaka kˈumi na miwˈili, sˈita kˈati ja hˈijo katˌika tˈirsa.|0
ˌalinunˈua kilˈima tʃa sˌamarˈia kutˈoka kwa ʃemˈeri kwa talˈanta mbˈili za fˈeða na ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi ɟˌuːja hˈitʃo kilˈima, ˌakiuˈita sˌamarˈia, kˌutokˈana na ʃemˈeri, ɟˈina la mmilˈiki wa kwˈanza wa kilˈima hˈitʃo.|0
lakˈini ˈomri ˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na kutˈenda ðˈambi kulˈiko wˈote wˌaliˌomtaŋɡulˈia.|0
ˌakaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈote za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati na katˌika ðˈambi zˈake, ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kutˈenda, hˈivjo bˌasi wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kwa sanˈamu zˈao zˌisizofˈaa.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ˈomri, jˈale ˌalijofˈaɲa na vˈitu ˌalivjˌovifˌanikˈiʃa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˈomri ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake na ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko sˌamarˈia. ahˈabu mwanˈawe ˌakatawˈala mahˈali pˈake.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ahˈabu mwˈana wa ˈomri akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli akˈiwa sˌamarˈia kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na miwˈili.|0
ahˈabu mwˈana wa ˈomri ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu zaˈidi matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana kulˈiko jejˈote ˌalijˌewatˌaŋɡulˈia.|0
kˌama vˈile hˌaikutˈoʃa kuˈiʃi kˌama jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ˌakamwˈoa jˌezebˈeli bˈinti wa ˌeθbaˈali, mfˈalme wa wˌasidˈoni, nˌaje ˌakaˈanza kˌumtumikˈia baˈali na kˌumwabˈudu.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu kwa aɟˈili ja baˈali katˌika hekˈalu la baˈali lˈile ˌalilˌoliɟˈeŋɡa hˌuko sˌamarˈia.|0
pˈia ahˈabu ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera na kufˈaɲa mˈeŋɡi ˌili kˌumkasirˈiʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kulˈiko wˌalivjofˈaɲa wafˈalme wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌomtaŋɡulˈia.|0
katˌika wakˈati wa ahˈabu, hiˈeli, mbeθˈeli, ˌakaiɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja jerˈiko. ˌaliwˈeka misˈiŋɡi jˌake kwa ɣarˈama ja mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza ˌabirˈamu, na kuwˈeka malˈaŋɡo jˌake kwa ɣarˈama ja mwanˈawe mdˈoɡo seɡˈubu, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilosˈema kˌupitˈia joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni.|0
bˌasi elˈija, mtˈiʃbi kutˈoka tˈiʃbi katˌika ɡˌileˈadi, ˌakamwambˈia ahˈabu, kˌama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌaiʃˈivjo, ambˈaje nˌinamtˌumikˈia, hˌapatakˈuwa na umˈande wˈala mvˈua katˌika miˈaka hˌii, ˌisipokˈuwa kwa nˈeno lˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia elˈija, kusˈema.|0
ondˈoka hˈapa, ˌelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌukaɟifˈitʃe katˌika kiɟˈito tʃa kerˈiθi, mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jordˈani.|0
ˌutakˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kˈile kiɟˈito, nˌami nˌimeaɡˈiza kuŋɡˈuru wˌakulˈiʃe hˌuko.|0
hˈivjo ˌakafˈaɲa kˈile ˌalitʃˌoambˈiwa na bwˈana. ˌakaˈenda katˌika kiɟˈito tʃa kerˈiθi, mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani na ˌakakˈaa hˌuko.|0
kuŋɡˈuru wˌakamletˈea mkˈate na ɲˈama ˌasubˈuhi na mkˈate na ɲˈama ɟiˈoni, nˌaje akˈaɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kˈile kiɟˈito.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, kˈile kiɟˈito kˌikakaˈuka kwa sabˈabu mvˈua hˌaikˈuwa ˌimeɲˈeʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
ondˈoka, uˈende sarˈepta ja sidˈoni na ukˈae hˌuko. nˌimemwaɡˈiza mɟˈane katˌika sehˈemu ˈile ˌakupatˈie tʃakˈula.|0
hˈivjo ˌakaˈenda sarˈepta. ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi, mɟˈane ˌalikˈuwa hˌuko ˌakiokˈota kˈuni. ˌakamwˈita na kˌumwambˈia, naˈomba ˌuniletˈee mˈaɟi kidˈoɡo kwˈeɲe ɡˌudulˈia ˌili niwˈeze kˈuɲua.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanakwˈenda kˌumletˈea, ˌakamwˈita ˌakasˈema, tˌafaðˈali nˌiletˈee pˈia kipˈande tʃa mkˈate.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌaiʃˈivjo, sˈina mkˈate wowˈote, ˌisipokˈuwa kˈonzi ja ˈuŋɡa kwˈeɲe ɡˌudulˈia na mafˈuta kidˈoɡo kwˈeɲe tʃˈupa. nˌinakusˈaɲa kˈuni tʃˈatʃe nˌipelˈeke ɲumbˈani na nˌikapˈike tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu na mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌili kwˌamba tˈule, kiˈiʃe, tukˈafe.|0
elˈija ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusioɡˈope. nˈenda ɲumbˈani ˌukafˈaɲe kˌama ˌulivjosˈema. lakˈini kwˈanza ˌunitˌeŋɡenezˈee mˌimi mkˈate mdˈoɡo kutˈoka vˈile ulˈivjo nˈavjo kˈiʃa ˌuniletˈee na ndˈipo ˌutajarˈiʃe tʃotʃˈote kwa aɟˈili jˈako na mwanˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: lˈile ɡˌudulˈia la ˈuŋɡa hˌalitakwˈiʃa wˈala ˈile tʃˈupa ja mafˈuta hˌaitˌakaˈuka hˌadi sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌatakˌapolˈeta mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi..|0
ˌakaondˈoka na kufˈaɲa kˌama elˈija ˌalivjˌomwambˈia. kwa hˈijo kukˈawa na tʃakˈula kˈila sˈiku kwa aɟˈili ja elˈija, jˈule mwanˈamke na ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa lˈile ɡˌudulˈia la ˈuŋɡa hˌalikwˈiʃa na ˈile tʃˈupa ja mafˈuta hˌaikˌukaˈuka, sˌawasˈawa na lˈile nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilosˈema elˈija.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, mwˈana wa jˈule mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe ɲˈumba ˌakauɡˈua. hˈali jˌake ˌikaˌendelˈea kˌuwa m̩bˈaja sˈana, na hˌatimˈaje ˌakaˈatʃa kˌupumˈua.|0
ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, ˈuna nˈini ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, ˈewe ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu? ˌumekˈuɟa ˌili kˌukumbuʃˈia ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu na kˌusababˈiʃa kˈifo tʃa mwanˈaŋɡu.|0
elˈija ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈipe mwanˈao. elˈija ˌakampokˈea kutˈoka kˌifuˈani mwˈake, ˌakambˈeba mpˈaka tʃˈumba tʃa ɟˈuu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanaˈiʃi, ˌakamlˈaza kˌitandˈani mwˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamlilˈia bwˈana, ˌakasˈema ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ɟˈe, pˈia ˌumelˈeta msˈiba ɟˌuːja mɟˈane hˈuju nˌinajeˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kwa kˌusababˈiʃa mwanˈawe kˈufa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa ɟˌuːja kiɟˈana mˈara tˈatu na kˌumlilˈia bwˈana, ˌakisˈema, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌakuˈomba rˈoho ja hˈuju kiɟˈana ˌimrudˈie.|0
bwˈana ˌakasikˈia kilˈio tʃa elˈija, na rˈoho ja kiɟˈana ˌikamrudˈia, nˌaje ˌakafufˈuka.|0
elˈija ˌakamtwˈaa kiɟˈana na kumbˈeba kutˈoka tʃumbˈani mwˈake ˌakamʃˈuʃa kˌumpelˈeka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba. akˈampa mˈama jˌake na kusˈema, tazˈama, mwanˈao ju hˈai.|0
ndˈipo jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, sˈasa nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba wˌewe ni ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, na kwˌamba nˈeno la bwˈana kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako ni kwˈeli.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda mrˈefu, katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia elˈija kusˈema, nˈenda ˌukaɟˌioɲˈeʃe kwa ahˈabu na mˌimi nˌitaɲˈeʃa mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa hˈijo elˈija ˌakaˈenda kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa kwa ahˈabu. wakˈati hˈuu ɲɟˈaa ˌilikˈuwa kˈali sˈana katˌika sˌamarˈia.|0
nˌaje ahˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈita ˌobadˈia ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme. ˌobadˈia alˈimtʃa bwˈana sˈana.|0
wakˈati jˌezebˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiwaˈua mˌanabˈii wa bwˈana, ˌobadˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua mˌanabˈii mˈia mˈoɟa na kˌuwafˈitʃa katˌika mapˈaŋɡo mawˈili, hamsˈini kwˈeɲe kˈila mˈoɟa na akˈawa ˌakiwˈapa tʃakˈula na mˈaɟi..|0
ahˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia ˌobadˈia, nˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote kwˈeɲe viɟˈito vjˈote na mabˈonde. huˈenda tˌunawˈeza kupˈata maɟˈani ja kˌuwalˈiʃa farˈasi na ɲˈumbu wapˈate kuˈiʃi ˌili tˌusilˌazimˈike kˌuwaˈua hˌata mmˈoɟa wa waɲˈama wˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakaɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi wˌalijˌokusudˈia kˌutafˈuta maɟˈani, ahˈabu ˌakaˈenda upˈande mmˈoɟa na ˌobadˈia upˈande mwiŋɡˈine.|0
wakˈati ˌobadˈia ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitembˈea ɲɟiˈani, elˈija ˌakakutˈana nˈaje. ˌobadˈia ˌakamtambˈua, ˌakamsˌuɟudˈia hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi na kusˈema, ɟˈe, hˈivi kwˈeli ni wˈewe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu elˈija.|0
elˈija ˌakamɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie bwˈana wˈako ahˈabu, elˈija jˈuko hˈapa..|0
ˌobadˈia ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ni kˈosa ɡˈani nˌimefˈaɲa, hˌata ˌukaamˈua kˌumkabˈiði mtumˈiʃi wˈako mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa ahˈabu ˌili ˌaniˈue.|0
hakˈika kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌaiʃˈivjo, hakˈuna taˈifa hˌata mˈoɟa ˌau ufˈalme ambˈapo bwˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌaɟamtˈuma ˈm̩tu kˌukutafˈuta. kˈila wakˈati taˈifa ˌau ufˈalme wˌalipodˈai kwˌamba haˈupo hˌuko, ˌaliwafˈaɲa waˈape kwˌamba hˌawakuwˈeza kˌukupˈata.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ˌunanˌiambˈia niˈende kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na kusˈema, elˈija jˈuko hˈapa..|0
siɟˈui ni wˈapi rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌataamˈua kˌukupelˈeka wakˈati nˌitakˌapokuˈatʃa. kˌama nˌikiˈenda kˌumwambˈia ahˈabu na ˌasikupˈate, ˌataniˈua. hˌata hˈivjo mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako nˌimemwabˈudu bwˈana ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, hˌukusikˈia, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌilifˈaɲa nˈini wakˈati jˌezebˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈua mˌanabˈii wa bwˈana? nˌiliwafˈitʃa mˌanabˈii wa bwˈana mˈia mˈoɟa katˌika mapˈaŋɡo mawˈili, hamsˈini katˌika kˈila mˈoɟa, nˌami nˌikawˌapatˈia tʃakˈula na mˈaɟi.|0
nˌawe sˈasa ˌunanˌiambˈia niˈende kwa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na kˌumwambˈia, elˈija jˈuko hˈapa. jˌeje ˌataniˈua.|0
elˈija ˌakasˈema, kˌama bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌaiʃˈivjo, jˌeje nˌinajˌemtumikˈia, hakˈika nˌitaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kwa ahˈabu lˈeo.|0
bˌasi ˌobadˈia ˌakaˈenda kˌukutˈana na ahˈabu na kˌumwambˈia, nˌaje ahˈabu ˌakaˈenda kˌukutˈana na elˈija.|0
ahˈabu ˌalipomwˈona elˈija, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, ni wˈewe, mtˌaabiʃˈaɟi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
elˈija ˌakamɟˈibu, mˌimi sˌiɟaˌitaabˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli. lakˈini wˌewe na ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈako n̩dˈio mnˌaofˈaɲa hˈivjo. mmˌeziˈatʃa ˈamri za bwˈana na mkˌafuˈata mˌabaˈali.|0
sˈasa waˈite wˈatu kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli jˈote tˌukutˈane nˌao ɟˌuːja mlˈima karmˈeli. nˌawe ˌuwalˈete hˈao mˌanabˈii wa baˈali mˈia ˈn̩ne na hamsˈini na hˈao mˌanabˈii mˈia ˈn̩ne wa aʃˈera, walˈao tʃakˈula mezˈani ˌm̩wa jˌezebˈeli.|0
ndˈipo ahˈabu ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote na kˌuwakusˈaɲa mˌanabˈii hˈao ɟˌuːja mlˈima karmˈeli.|0
elˈija ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja wˈatu na kusˈema, mtˌasitasˈita katˌika mawˈazo mawˈili hˌadi lˈini? ikˈiwa bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu, mfˌuatˈeni jˈeje; lakˈini ikˈiwa baˈali ni mˈuŋɡu, bˌasi mfˌuatˈeni jˈeje. lakˈini wˈatu hˌawakusˈema kˈitu.|0
kˈiʃa elˈija ˌakawˌaambˈia, ni mˌimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nabˈii wa bwˈana ˌalijebˈaki, lakˈini baˈali ˈana mˌanabˈii mˈia ˈn̩ne na hamsˈini.|0
letˈeni mˌafahˈali wawˈili. wˌao na wˌaɟitʃˌaɡulˈie mmˈoɟa, wamkˈate vipˈande vipˈande na wawˈeke ɟˌuːja kˈuni lakˈini wˌasiˌiwaʃˈie mˈoto. nˌitamwandˈaa hˈujo fahˈali mwiŋɡˈine na kumwˈeka ɟˌuːja kˈuni lakˈini sˌitawˈaʃa mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa mlˌiitˈie ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌami nˌitalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu jˈule ambˈaje ˌataɟˈibu kwa mˈoto, hˈujo n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌakasˈema, hˌilo ˌunalosˈema ni ɟˈema.|0
elˈija ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌanabˈii wa baˈali, tʃˌaɡuˈeni mmˈoɟa kˈati ja hˈawa mˌafahˈali na ˈm̩we wa kwˈanza kˌumwandˈaa, kwa kˌuwa nˈiɲi ˈm̩ko wˈeŋɡi sˈana. lˌiitiˈeni ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, lakˈini msiwˈaʃe mˈoto.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamtʃukˈua jˈule fahˈali wˌalijepˈewa, nˌao wˌakamwandˈaa. kˈiʃa wˌakalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la baˈali kutˈoka ˌasubˈuhi hˌadi ˌaðuhˈuri, wˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele, ˈee baˈali, ˌutuɟˈibu! lakˈini hˌapakˈuwa na ɟˈibu; hakˈuna ˌalijeɟˈibu. nˌao wˌakatʃˈeza kˌuizuŋɡˈuka mˌaðabˈahu wˌalijˌoiɟˈeŋɡa.|0
wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri, elˈija ˌakaˈanza kˌuwaðihˈaki, ˌakisˈema, piɡˈeni kelˈele zaˈidi! hakˈika jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu! lˈabda ˌamezˈama katˌika mawˈazo mazˈito, ˌau ˈana ʃuɣˈuli ɲˈiŋɡi, ˌau ˌamesafˈiri. lˈabda ˌamelˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito, nˌaje ni lazˈima aˈamʃwe.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele zaˈidi na kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa destˈuri jˈao wˌakaɟitʃˈaɲɟa weɲˈewe kwa vˈisu na vjˈembe, mpˈaka dˈamu ˌikatʃˌuruzˈika.|0
ˌaðuhˈuri ˌikapˈita, nˌao wˌakaˌendelˈea na ˌutabˈiri wˌao wa kˌiwazˈimu mpˈaka wakˈati wa ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni. lakˈini hˌapakˈuwa na ɟˈibu, hakˈuna ˌalijeɟˈibu, hakˈuna ˌalijˌeaŋɡalˈia.|0
kˈiʃa elˈija ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, sˌoɡeˈeni karˈibu nˈami. wˈatu wˈote wˌakamkˌaribˈia, nˌaje ˌakakˌarabˈati mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana, ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa ˌimevˈuɲɟua.|0
elˈija ˌakatʃukˈua mˈawe kˈumi na mawˈili, mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kabˈila la wˈana wa jakˈobo, ambˈaje nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia, lˌikisˈema, ɟˈina lˈako lˌitakˈuwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa mˈawe hˈajo, ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana, na ˌakatʃˈimba handˈaki kˌuizuŋɡˈuka, ukˈubwa wa kutˈoʃa vipˈimo viwˈili vja mbˈeɡu.|0
ˌakapˈaŋɡa kˈuni, ˌakamkˈata jˈule fahˈali vipˈande vipˈande na kˌuvipˈaŋɡa ɟˌuːja kˈuni. kˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɟazˈeni mapˈipa mˈanne mˈaɟi na kˌujamwˈaɡa ɟˌuːja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na ɟˌuːja kˈuni.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, faɲˈeni hˈivjo tˈena. nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo tˈena. ˌakaaɡˈiza, faɲˈeni kwa mˈara ja tˈatu. nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa mˈara ja tˈatu.|0
mˈaɟi jˌakatˌirirˈika kˌuizuŋɡˈuka mˌaðabˈahu na hˌata kuɟˈaza lˈile handˈaki.|0
wakˈati wa kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni, nabˈii elˈija ˌakasoɡˈea mbˈele na kuˈomba, ˌakisˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, na isˈaki na ˌisraˈeli, ˌiɟulikˈane lˈeo kwˌamba wˌewe n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli na ja kwˌamba mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako na nˌimefˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote kwa nˈeno lˈako.|0
ˌuniɟˈibu mˈimi, ˈee bwˈana, niɟˈibu mˈimi, ˌili wˈatu hˈawa waɟˈue kwˌamba wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu, na kwˌamba ˌunaˌiɡeˈuza miˈojo jˈao ˌikurudˈie tˈena.|0
kˈiʃa mˈoto wa bwˈana ˌukaʃˈuka na kˌuitˌeketˈeza ˈile ðabˈihu, zˈile kˈuni, jˈale mˈawe, ˈule udˈoŋɡo, na pˈia kurˈamba jˈale mˈaɟi jˌalijokˈuwa ndˈani ja handˈaki.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˈote wˌalipoˈona hˈili, wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi na kulˈia, bwˈana: jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu! bwˈana: jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa elˈija ˌakawˌaamˈuru, wˌakamatˈeni hˈao mˌanabˈii wa baˈali. msimwˈatʃe hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatorˈoke! wˌakawˌakamˈata, nˌaje elˈija ˌakawalˈeta mpˈaka bˈonde la kiʃˈoni na kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa hˌuko.|0
elˈija ˌakamwambˈia ahˈabu, nˈenda, ukˈale na kˈuɲua, kwa kˌuwa kˈuna saˈuti ja mvˈua kˈubwa.|0
hˈivjo ahˈabu ˌakaondˈoka ˌili kˈula na kˈuɲua. lakˈini elˈija ˌakapˈanda kˌilelˈeni ˌm̩wa karmˈeli, ˌakasuɟˈudu na ˌakawˈeka kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kˌatikˈati ja maɡˈoti jˈake.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, nˈenda ˌukatazˈame kˌuelekˈea bahˈari. ˌakaˈenda na kˌutazˈama. ˌakasˈema, hakˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote hˌuko. mˈara sˈaba elˈija ˌakasˈema, nˈenda tˈena.|0
mˈara ja sˈaba, mtumˈiʃi ˌakalˈeta tˌaarˈifa, wˈiŋɡu dˈoɡo kˌama mkˈono wa mwˌanadˈamu lˌinainˈuka kutˈoka bˌaharˈini. hˈivjo elˈija ˌakasˈema, nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie ahˈabu, tandˈika ɡˈari lˈako na uʃˈuke kˈabla mvˈua hˌaiɟˌakuzuˈia..|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule ˈaŋɡa likˈawa ɟeˈusi kwa mawˈiŋɡu, upˈepo ˌukainˈuka na mvˈua kˈubwa ˌikaɲˈeʃa, nˌaje ahˈabu ˌakaˈenda zˌake jˌezreˈeli.|0
ŋɡˈuvu za bwˈana zˌikamɟˈia elˈija, nˌaje ˌakaɟikˈaza viˈuno, ˌakakimbˈia mbˈele ja ahˈabu ɲɟˈia jˈote hˌadi mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja jˌezreˈeli.|0
ahˈabu ˌakamwambˈia jˌezebˈeli kˈila kˈitu elˈija ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌowaˈua mˌanabˈii wˈote kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
hˈivjo jˌezebˈeli ˌakamtˈuma mɟˈumbe kwa elˈija, kusˈema, hˈao miˈuŋɡu ˌinitendˈee hˈivjo na kuzˈidi, kˌama kˌufikˈia kˈeʃo wakˈati kˌama hˈuu sˌitaifˈaɲa rˈoho jˈako kˌama mmˌoɟawˈapo wa hˈao mˌanabˈii.|0
elˈija ˌalioɡˈopa, na ˌakakimbˈia kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake. ˌalipofˈika bˈeer ʃˈeba katˌika jˈuda, ˌakamwˈatʃa mtumˈiʃi wˌake hˌuko.|0
lakˈini jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakatembˈea mwˈendo wa kˈutwa nzˈima katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa. ˌakafˈika kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti wa mretˈemu, ˌakakˈaa tʃˈini jˌake na kuˈomba ˌili ˈafe. ˌakasˈema, jatˈoʃa sˈasa, bwˈana, ondˈoa rˈoho jˈaŋɡu, kwˈani mˌimi si bˈora kulˈiko bˈaba zˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti, ˌakalˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi. mˈara mˌalaˈika ˌakamɡˈusa na ˌakamwambˈia, inˈuka na ˈule.|0
ˌakatazˈama pˈande zˈote, nˈapo hˈapo karˈibu na kˈitʃwa tʃˈake pˌalikuwˈepo mkˈate ˌulioˈokwa kwˈeɲe makˈaa ja mˈoto na ɡˌudulˈia la mˈaɟi. akˈala na kˈuɲua, kˈiʃa ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa tˈena.|0
jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana akˈaɟa tˈena mˈara ja pˈili, ˌakamɡˈusa ˌakamwambˈia, inˈuka na ˈule, kwa kˌuwa safˈari ni ndˈefu kwˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakainˈuka, akˈala na kˈuɲua. akˈiwa ˌametˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu na kˈile tʃakˈula, ˌakasafˈiri sˈiku ˌarobaˈini usˈiku na mtʃˈana mpˈaka ˌakafˈika horˈebu, mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimeˈona wˈivu mwˈiŋɡi kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. wˌaisraˈeli wˌamelˌikatˈaa aɡˈano lˈako, wˌamevˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu zˈako na kˌuwaˈua mˌanabˈii wˈako kwa upˈaŋɡa. ni mˈimi, mˌimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu, nˌilijebˈaki, nˌao sˈasa wˌananˌitafˈuta ˌili wˌaniˌaŋɡamˈize.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, tˌoka ɲɟˈe ˌukasimˈame ɟˌuːja mlˈima mbˈele za bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ju karˈibu kupˈita hˈapo. kˈiʃa upˈepo mwˈiŋɡi na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌukapasˈua milˈima ˈile na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟa miˈamba mbˈele za bwˈana, lakˈini bwˈana hˌakuwˈamo katˌika ˈule upˈepo. baˌada ja upˈepo pˌalikˈuwa na tˌetemˈeko la ˈn̩tʃi, lakˈini bwˈana hˌakuwˈamo kwˈeɲe lˈile tˌetemˈeko.|0
baˌada ja tˌetemˈeko la ˈn̩tʃi ukˈaɟa mˈoto, lakˈini bwˈana hˌakuwˈamo katˌika ˈule mˈoto. baˌada ja mˈoto ikˈaɟa saˈuti ja ˌutulˈivu ja kˌunoŋɡˈona.|0
elˈija ˌalipˌoisikˈia, ˌakafunˈika ˈuso kwa vˈazi lˈake, ˌakatˈoka na kˌusimˈama kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa pˈaŋɡo. kˈiʃa ˈile saˈuti ˌikamwambˈia, elˈija, ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini hˈapa.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, rˈudi kwa ɲɟˈia ˌulijˌoiɟˈia, uˈende kwˈeɲe ɟˈaŋɡwa la damˈeski. wakˈati ˌutakˌapofˈika hˌuko, m̩tˈie hˌazaˈeli mafˈuta ˈawe mfˈalme wa arˈamu.|0
pˈia m̩tˈie mafˈuta jˈehu mwˈana wa nˈimʃi ˈawe mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, na umtˈie elˈiʃa mwˈana wa ʃafˈati kutˈoka ˈabel mehˈola mafˈuta ˈawe nabˈii badˈala jˈako.|0
jˈehu ˌatamuˈua jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˌutorˈoka upˈaŋɡa wa hˌazaˈeli, nˌaje elˈiʃa ˌatamuˈua jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˌutorˈoka upˈaŋɡa wa jˈehu.|0
hˌata sˈasa nˌimewˈeka akˈiba wˈatu ˈelfu sˈaba katˌika ˌisraˈeli, wˈote ambˈao hˌawaɟˌampiɡˈia baˈali maɡˈoti, na wˈote ambˈao midˈomo jˈao hˌaiɟambˈusu.|0
hˈivjo elˈija ˌakaondˈoka kutˈoka hˌuko na kumkˈuta elˈiʃa mwˈana wa ʃafˈati. ˌalikˈuwa ˌakilˈima kwa ɟˈozi kˈumi na mbˈili za maksˈai, na jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌalioŋɡˈoza ˈile ɟˈozi ja kˈumi na mbˈili. elˈija ˌakapˈita karˈibu nˈaje, ˌakamruʃˈia vˈazi lˈake.|0
kˈiʃa elˈiʃa ˌakawaˈatʃa maksˈai wˈake, ˌakamkˌimbilˈia elˈija, ˌakamwambˈia, nˌiruhˈusu nˌikawabˈusu bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mˈama jˈaŋɡu, halˈafu nˌitafˌuatˈana nˈawe. elˈija ˌakaɟˈibu, rˈudi zˈako, kwˈani nˌimekˌutendˈea nˈini.|0
bˌasi elˈiʃa ˌakamwˈatʃa elˈija, nˌaje ˌakarˈudi. ˌakatʃukˈua ˈile ɟˈozi jˌake ja maksˈai na kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa. ˌakaipˈika ˈile ɲˈama kwa kˌutumˈia mˈiti ja nˈira kˌama kˈuni na kuwˈapa wˈatu, nˌao wakˈala. kˈiʃa ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakamfuˈata elˈija, ˌakamtˌumikˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakakusˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote. ˌakifˌuatˈana na wafˈalme θˌelaθˈini na wawˈili wakˈiwa na farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita, ˌakakwˈea kˌuuziŋɡˈira kwa ɟˈeʃi sˌamarˈia na kˌuiʃˌambulˈia.|0
ˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe katˌika ˈm̩ɟi kwa ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kusˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bˈen hadˈadi.|0
fˈeða jˈako na ðahˈabu ni jˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌake zˈako walˈio wazˈuri sˈana na watˈoto ni wˈaŋɡu..|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈiwe kˌama ˌusemˈavjo, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme. mˌimi na vjˈote nilˈivjo nˈavjo ni mˈali jˈako.|0
wˈale waɟˈumbe wakˈaɟa tˈena na kusˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bˈen hadˈadi: nˌimetˈuma kutˈaka fˈeða jˈako na ðahˈabu, wˌake zˈako na watˈoto wˈako.|0
lakˈini kˈeʃo wakˈati kˌama hˈuu, nˌitawatˈuma mˌaafˈisa wˈaŋɡu kˌukaɡˈua ɟˈumba lˈako la kifˈalme na ɲˈumba za mˌaafˈisa wˈako. wˌatatwˈaa kˈitu ˌunatʃˌokiθamˈini nˌao wˌatakˌitʃukˈua..|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakawaˈita wazˈee wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi na ˌakawˌaambˈia, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌanavjˌotʃokˈoza! wakˈati ˌalipotˈuma ˌapelekˈewe wˌake zˈaŋɡu na watˈoto wˈaŋɡu, fˈeða zˈaŋɡu na ðahˈabu jˈaŋɡu, sˌikumkˌatalˈia.|0
wazˈee na wˈatu wˈote wˌakaɟˈibu, ˌusimsˌikilˈize, wˈala ˌusijˌakubˈali matˈakwa jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakawaɟˈibu waɟˈumbe wa bˈen hadˈadi, mwˌambiˈeni bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatafˈaɲa jˈote ˌulijˌojadˈai mwanzˈoni, lakˈini dˈai hˈili la sˈasa siwˈezi kˌulitˌekelˈeza.  wˌakaondˈoka na kˌupelˈeka ɟˈibu kwa bˈen hadˈadi.|0
kˈiʃa bˈen hadˈadi ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe mwiŋɡˈine kwa ahˈabu, kusˈema miˈuŋɡu ˌiniletˈee maˈafa, tˈena makˈubwa zaˈidi, ikˈiwa vˈumbi la sˌamarˈia lˌitatˌoʃelˈeza kˈonzi mˈoɟa ja kˈila ˈm̩tu ja wˈale wˌafuˌatanˈao nˈami.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, mwˌambiˈeni, jˈule ˌanajevˈaa mavˈazi ja vˈita asˈiɟe ˌakaɟisˈifu kˌama jˈule ˌanajevˈua..|0
bˈen hadˈadi ˌalisikˈia uɟˈumbe hˈuu wakˈati ambˈapo jˌeje na wafˈalme wˌalikˈuwa wˌanakˈuɲua katˌika mahˈema jˈao, na ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˈatu wˈake, ɟˌiandaˈeni kˌuʃambulˈia. kwa hˈijo wˌakaɟˌiandˈaa kˌuuʃˌambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule nabˈii ˌakamɟˈia ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na kˌutaŋɡˈaza, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: ɟˈe, ˌunaˈona ɟˈeʃi hˈili kˈubwa? nˌitalitˈia mkonˈoni mwˈako lˈeo, nˌawe ndˈipo ˌutaɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
ahˈabu ˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajefˈaɲa hˈili? nabˈii ˌakamɟˈibu, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: mˌaafˈisa viɟˈana mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈimbo wˌatafˈaɲa hˈili.  ˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeanzˈiʃa vˈita? nabˈii ˌakamɟˈibu, ni wˈewe.|0
kwa hˈijo ahˈabu ˌakawaˈita mˌaafˈisa viɟˈana mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈimbo, wˌanaˈume mˌiambˈili θˌeleθˈininambˈili. kˈiʃa ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliobˈaki, ɟˈumla jˈao sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
wˌakaondˈoka wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri, bˈen hadˈadi na wˈale wafˈalme θˌelaθˈini na wawˈili wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˌaje wˌalipokˈuwa katˌika mahˈema jˈao wˌakilˈewa.|0
mˌaafˈisa viɟˈana mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈimbo wˌaliondˈoka kwˈanza. wakˈati hˈuu bˈen hadˈadi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewatˈuma wˌapelelˈezi, ambˈao wˌalilˈeta tˌaarˈifa kusˈema kwˌamba, askˈari wˌanasˈoŋɡa mbˈele kutˈoka sˌamarˈia.|0
ˌakasˈema, ikˈiwa wˌamekˈuɟa kwa amˈani, wˌakamˈate wakˈiwa hˈai; ikˈiwa wˌamekˈuɟa kwa vˈita, wˌakamˈate wakˈiwa hˈai.|0
wˈale mˌaafˈisa viɟˈana mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈimbo wˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi ɟˈeʃi likˈiwa ɲˈuma jˈao.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakamuˈua adˈui jˈake. hˌii ˌilisˌababˈiʃa wˌaarˈamu kˌukimbˈia, hˈuku wˌaisraˈeli wˌakiwˌafuatˈia. lakˈini bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakatorˈoka akˈiwa ˌamepˈanda farˈasi wˌake pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja wapˈanda farˈasi wˈake.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakasˈoŋɡa mbˈele na kuʃˈinda farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita na kˌusababˈiʃa hasˈara kˈubwa kwa wˌaarˈamu.|0
bˌaadˈaje nabˈii akˈaɟa kwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na kusˈema, ɟˌiandˈae vizˈuri ˌufikirˈie la kufˈaɲa, kwa sabˈabu mwakˈani mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌatakˈuɟa kˌukuʃˌambulˈia tˈena.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wa arˈamu wˌakamʃaˈuri, wˌakamwambˈia, miˈuŋɡu jˈao ni miˈuŋɡu ja vˌilimˈani. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu sˈana kˌutuzˈidi. lakˈini kˌama tˌukipiɡˈana nˌao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare, hakˈika tˌutawaʃˈinda.|0
fˈaɲa hˈivi: wˌaondˈoe hˈao wafˈalme wˈote θˌelaθˈini na wawˈili kutˈoka nafˈasi zˈao na uwˈeke mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine mahˈali pˈao.|0
ni lazˈima pˈia ˌuandˈae ɟˈeʃi ɟiŋɡˈine kˌama lˈile ˌulilˌopotˈeza, farˈasi kwa farˈasi, ɡˈari la vˈita kwa ɡˈari la vˈita, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌupiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare. kˈiʃa kwa hakˈika tˌutakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko wˈao. ˌakakˌubaliˈana nˌao nˌaje ˌakaʃˌuɣulˈika ˌipasˈavjo.|0
mwˈaka ˌuliˌofuˈata, maɟˈira kˌama hˈajo, bˈen hadˈadi ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wˌaarˈamu mpˈaka afˈeki kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kˌukusˈaɲua na kupˈewa mˌahitˈaɟi, wˌalikwˈenda kˌukabˌiliˈana nˈao. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakapˈiɡa kˈambi mkabˈala nˌao kˌama makˈundi mawˈili madˈoɡo ja mbˈuzi, wakˈati wˌaarˈamu wˌalienˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu akˈaɟa na kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo: kwa sabˈabu wˌaarˈamu wˌanafikˈiri bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wa vˌilimˈani na sˈio mˈuŋɡu wa mˌabondˈeni, nˌitatˈia ɟˈeʃi hˈili kˈubwa mkonˈoni mwˈako, nˌawe ˌutaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba wˌalipˈiɡa kˈambi wˌakitˌazamˈana na sˈiku ja sˈaba vˈita vˌikaˈanza. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌaɟerˈuhi askˈari wa miɡˈuu wa wˌaarˈamu mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
wˌaliobˈaki wˌakatˌorokˈea katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa afˈeki, mahˈali ambˈapo wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininasˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌaliˌaŋɡukˈiwa na ukˈuta. nˌaje bˈen hadˈadi ˌakakˌimbilˈia mɟˈini na kˌuɟifˈitʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama, tˌumesikˈia kwˌamba wafˈalme wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˈana hurˈuma. twendˈeni kwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli tukˈiwa tˌumevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia vˌiunˈoni mwˈetu na kˈamba kˌuzuŋɡˈuka vˈitʃwa vjˈetu. huˈenda ˌakakuˈatʃa hˈai.|0
wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia vˌiunˈoni m̩wˈao na kˈamba kˌuzuŋɡˈuka vˈitʃwa vjˈao, wˌalikwˈenda kwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na kusˈema, mtumˈiʃi wˈako bˈen hadˈadi ˌanasˈema: tˌafaðˈali, naˈomba ˌuniˈatʃe hˈai.  mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, bˈado jˈuko hˈai? jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌakalˌipokˈea ɟˈambo lˈile kˌama dalˈili nzˈuri nˌao wakˈawa wepˈesi kˌulitʃukˈua nˈeno lˈake wˌakisˈema, n̩dˈijo, jˌeje ni ndˈuɡu jˈako bˈen hadˈadi! mfˈalme ˌakawˌaambˈia, nendˈeni mkamlˈete. ikˈawa bˈen hadˈadi ˌalipokˈuɟa, ahˈabu ˌakampandˈiʃa katˌika ɡˈari lˈake la vˈita. bˈen hadˈadi ˌakaɟˌitolˈea, ˌakisˈema.|0
nˌitaˌirudˈiʃa ˈile mˈiɟi ambˈajo bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliitˈeka kutˈoka kwa bˈaba jˈako. ˌunawˈeza kuwˈeka mˌaenˈeo jˈako ja sˈoko katˌika damˈeski, kˌama bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalivjofˈaɲa hˌuko sˌamarˈia. ahˈabu ˌakasˈema, katˌika misˈiŋɡi ja mkatˈaba, nˌitakˌuatʃilˈia hˈuru. kwa hˈijo ˌakawˈeka mkatˈaba nˈaje, ˌakamruhˈusu aˈende zˈake.|0
kwa nˈeno la bwˈana, mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa mˌanabˈii ˌakamwambˈia mwenzˈake, nipˈiɡe kwa silˈaha jˈako, lakˈini jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakakatˈaa.|0
kwa hˈijo jˈule nabˈii ˌakasˈema, kwa sabˈabu hˌukumtˈii bwˈana, mˈara tu tˌutakˌapoatʃˈana ˌutauˈawa na sˈimba. na baˌada ja jˈule ˈm̩tu kˌuondˈoka, sˈimba ˌakatokˈea na kˌumuˈua.|0
nabˈii ˌakamkˈuta ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine na kˌumwambˈia, nipˈiɡe tˌafaðˈali. kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakampˈiɡa na kˌumɟerˈuhi.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii ˌakaˈenda na kˌusimˈama bˌarabarˈani ˌakimsubˈiri mfˈalme. ˌakaɟˌibadilˈiʃa kwa kuʃˈuʃa kˌitambˈaa tʃa kitʃwˈani mwˈake hˌadi kwˈeɲe mˈatʃo.|0
mfˈalme ˌalipopˈita pˈale, jˈule nabˈii ˌakamwˈita, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalikwˈenda vitˈani wakˈati vˈita vˌilipopˈamba mˈoto, ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakaniɟˈia na matˈeka ˌakasˈema, mlˈinde ˈm̩tu hˈuju. kˌama ˌakitorˈoka ˌitakˈuwa uhˈai wˈako kwa uhˈai wˈake, ˌama vipˈande tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri vja fˈeða..|0
wakˈati mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌalipokˈuwa na ʃuɣˈuli ɲˈiŋɡi hˈapa na pˈale, jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakatowˈeka. mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakasˈema, hˈijo n̩dˈijo hukˈumu jˈako. wˌewe ˌumeitˈaɟa mweɲˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule nabˈii ˌakaɟˌifunˈua mˈatʃo jˌake harˈaka, na mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamtambˈua kˌama mmˈoɟa wa mˌanabˈii.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo: ˌumemwˈatʃa hˈuru ˈm̩tu nˌilijˌekusudˈia ˈafe. kwa hˈijo ni uhˈai wˈako kwa uhˈai wˈake, wˈatu wˈako kwa wˈatu wˈake..|0
kwa utʃˈuŋɡu na hasˈira, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme hˌuko sˌamarˈia.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli, ˌalikˈuwa na ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu ɟirˈani na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la ahˈabu mfˈalme wa sˌamarˈia.|0
ahˈabu ˌakamwambˈia nabˈoθi, nˈipe ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu nˌilitumˈie kwa bustˈani ja mbˈoɡa, kwa kˌuwa lˈiko karˈibu na ɟˈumba lˈaŋɡu la kifˈalme. badˈala jˈake, nˌitakˈupa ʃˈamba ɟiŋɡˈine la mˌizabˈibu zˈuri zaˈidi ˌau, kˌama ˌutapˈenda, nˌitakulˈipa kiˈasi tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃoˈona ni θamˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini nabˈoθi ˌakamɟˈibu, bwˈana na apˈiʃe mbˈali kukˈupa wˌewe urˈiθi wa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi ahˈabu ˌakaˈenda ɲumbˈani, mwˌeɲe huzˈuni na hasˈira kwa sabˈabu ja jˈale ambˈajo nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, sˌitakˈupa urˈiθi wa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu. ˌakaɟˌiɲoˈoʃa ɟˌuːja kitˈanda ˌakisˌononˈeka, na ˌakakatˈaa kˈula.|0
jˌezebˈeli ˈm̩ke wˌake ˌakaiŋɡˈia na ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌunahˌuzunˈika hˈivi? kwa nˈini hˈuli tʃakˈula.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu nˌilimwambˈia nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli, nˌiuzˈie ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu, ˌau kˌama ˌukipˈenda, nˌitakˈupa ʃˈamba ɟiŋɡˈine la mˌizabˈibu badˈala jˈake. lakˈini ˌakasˈema, sˌitakˈupa ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu..|0
jˌezebˈeli ˈm̩ke wˌake ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌunavjofˈaɲa, nˌawe ni mfˈalme katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote? inˈuka na ˈule! tʃaŋɡˈamka. nˌitakˌupatˈia ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaandˈika barˈua kwa ɟˈina la ahˈabu ˌakawˈeka muhˈuri wˌake ɟˌuːja hˈizo barˈua, ˌakazˌipelˈeka kwa wazˈee na kwa wˈatu wˌeɲe tʃˈeo wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi pamˈoɟa na nabˈoθi.|0
katˌika barˈua hˈizo ˌaliandˈika: tˌaŋɡazˈeni sˈiku ja wˈatu kufˈuŋɡa na mkˌamketˈiʃe nabˈoθi mahˈali pa wˈazi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
lakˈini wˌaketiʃˈeni wˈatu wawˈili wabˈaja kabˈisa mkabˈala nˈaje, nˌao wˌaʃuhudˈie kˌuwa jˌeje ˌamemlaˈani mˈuŋɡu na mfˈalme. kˈiʃa mtoˈeni ɲɟˈe na kumpˈiɡa kwa mˈawe hˌadi ˈafe.|0
hˈivjo wazˈee na wˈatu wˌeɲe tʃˈeo wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa nabˈoθi wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama jˌezebˈeli ˌalivjˌoelekˈeza katˌika barˈua ˌalijˌowaˌandikˈia.|0
wˌakataŋɡˈaza mfˈuŋɡo na kˌumketˈiʃa nabˈoθi mahˈali pa wˈazi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wawˈili wabˈaja kabˈisa wakˈaɟa wˌakakˈeti mkabˈala nˈaje, nˌao wˌakalˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja nabˈoθi mbˈele ja wˈatu, wˌakisˈema, nabˈoθi ˌamemlaˈani mˈuŋɡu na mfˈalme. kwa hˈijo wˌakamtˈoa ɲɟˈe na kumpˈiɡa kwa mˈawe hˌadi akˈafa.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa jˌezebˈeli, kusˈema, nabˈoθi ˌamepˈiɡwa mˈawe na ˌamekˈufa.|0
mˈara tu jˌezebˈeli ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba nabˈoθi ˌamepˈiɡwa mˈawe na ˌamekˈufa, ˌakamwambˈia ahˈabu, ˈamka na ˌutʃukˈue lˈile ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli, ambˈalo ˌalikatˈaa kˌukuuzˈia. hajˈuko hˈai tˈena, bˌali ˌamekˈufa.|0
ahˈabu ˌalipˌosikˈia nabˈoθi ˌamekˈufa, ˌakainˈuka na kuʃˈuka ˌili kˌulitʃukˈua ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la nabˈoθi.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia elˈija, mtˈiʃbi.|0
ʃˈuka ˌukakutˈane na ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌanajˌetawˈala sˌamarˈia. sˈasa jˈuko katˌika ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la nabˈoθi, ambˈapo ˌamekwˈenda ˌalimilˈiki.|0
ˌumwambˈie, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo: ɟˈe, hˌuɟamuˈua ˈm̩tu na kˌuitwˈaa mˈali jˈake? kˈiʃa ˌumwambˈie, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: mahˈali ambˈapo ˈm̩bwa wˌalirˈamba dˈamu ja nabˈoθi, ˈm̩bwa wˌatairˈamba dˈamu jˈako, nˈaam, jˈako wˈewe!.|0
ahˈabu ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, kwa hˈijo ˌumenipˈata, wˌewe adˈui jˈaŋɡu! ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, nˌimekupˈata. kwa sabˈabu ˌumeɟiˈuza mweɲˈewe kufˈaɲa uˈovu mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja bwˈana.|0
nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈako. nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza uzˈao wˈako na kˌukatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka kwa ahˈabu kˈila mzalˈiwa wa mwˈiʃo wa kiˈume katˌika ˌisraˈeli, wa mtˈumwa ˌau wa ˈm̩tu hˈuru.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba jˈako kˌama ˈile ja jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati na ˈile ja baˈaʃa mwˈana wa ahˈija, kwa sabˈabu ˌumenˌiɣaðibˈiʃa kwa kˌuwa ˌumesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kutˈenda ðˈambi..|0
pˈia kwa habˈari ja jˌezebˈeli bwˈana ˌanasˈema, ˈm̩bwa watˈamla jˌezebˈeli karˈibu na ukˈuta wa jˌezreˈeli..|0
ˈm̩bwa wˌatawˈala wˈale wa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu wˌatakˌaofˈia mɟˈini, nˌao wˈale wˌatakˌaofˈia mˌaʃambˈani wˌatalˈiwa na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani.|0
hˌapaɟapˈata kˈamwe kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu kˌama ahˈabu, ˌalijˌeɟiˈuza mweɲˈewe kutˈenda uˈovu matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, akˈiwa ˌanatʃotʃˈewa na jˌezebˈeli mkˈewe.|0
ˌalitˈenda kwa uˈovu sˈana katˌika kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu, kˌama wˈale wˌaamˈori ambˈao bwˈana ˌaliˌowafukˈuza mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli..|0
ahˈabu ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno hˈaja, ˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈake, ˌakavˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia na kufˈuŋɡa. ˌakalˈala na kˌuɟifunˈika ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia na kwˈenda kwa ˌuɲeɲekˈevu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilipomɟˈia elˈija mtˈiʃbi kusˈema.|0
ˌumeˈona ɟˈinsi ahˈabu ˌalivjˌoɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza mbˈele zˈaŋɡu? kwa kˌuwa ˌameɟiʃˈuʃa mweɲˈewe, sˌitalˈeta maˈafa hˈaja wakˈati akˈiwa hˈai, lakˈini nˌitajalˈeta ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba jˌake katˌika sˈiku za mwanˈawe.|0
kwa miˈaka mitˈatu hˌapakˈuwa na vˈita kˈati ja arˈamu na ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakaʃˈuka kwˈenda kumwˈona mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia mˌaafˈisa wˈake, ɟˈe, hamɟˈui rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi ni mˈali jˈetu na bˈado hˌatufˈaɲi tʃotʃˈote kˌuirudˈiʃa kwˈetu kutˈoka kwa mfˈalme wa arˈamu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˌehoʃafˈati, ɟˈe, ˌutakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌami kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi? jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, mˌimi ni kˌama wˈewe, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama wˈatu wˈako, farˈasi wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama farˈasi wˈako.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati pˈia ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kwˈanza tafˈuta ʃaˈuri la bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakawalˈeta pamˈoɟa mˌanabˈii wˌanaˈume wˌapatˈao mˈia ˈn̩ne, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, niˈende vitˈani ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi, ˌau niˈatʃe? wˌakaɟˈibu, nˈaam, nˈenda, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌataiwˈeka rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hajˈuko nabˈii wa bwˈana hˈapa ambˈaje tˌunawˈeza kˌumuulˈiza.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu jˌehoʃafˈati, bˈado jˈupo ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ambˈaje kˌupitˈia jˌeje twawˈeza kˌumuulˈiza ʃaˈuri la bwˈana, lakˈini nˌamtʃukˈia kwa sabˈabu hˈuwa hˌatabˈiri ɟˈambo lolˈote ɟˈema kˌunihˈusu mˈimi, lakˈini kˈila mˈara hˌunitˌabirˈia mabˈaja tˈu. jˌeje ni mikˈaja mwˈana wa ˈimla. jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaɟˈibu, mfˈalme hapˈaswi kusˈema hˈivjo.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwˈita mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kusˈema, mlˈete mikˈaja mwˈana wa ˈimla mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
wakˈiwa wˌamevalˈia maɟˈoho jˈao ja kifˈalme, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja vˈiti vjˈao vja kifˈalme katˌika sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la sˌamarˈia, pamˈoɟa na mˌanabˈii wˈote wakˈiwa wˌakitabˈiri mbˈele jˈao.|0
wakˈati hˈuu sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa kˌenaˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈembe za tʃˈuma, ˌakataŋɡˈaza, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo, kwa hˈizi pˈembe ˌutawapˈiɡa na kˌuwarudˈiʃa wˌaarˈamu ɲˈuma mpˈaka wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa..|0
mˌanabˈii weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌanatabˈiri kˈitu hˈitʃo hˈitʃo wˌakisˈema, ˌiʃambulˈie rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi na ˈuwe mʃˈindi. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌataitˈia mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme.|0
mɟˈumbe ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda kumwˈita mikˈaja ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama, mˌanabˈii wˈote kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wˌanatabˈiri uʃˈindi kwa mfˈalme. nˈeno lˈako na lˌikubˌaliˈane na lˈao, nˌawe unˈene mˈema kuhˈusu mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini mikˈaja ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, nˌitamwambˈia kˈile tu bwˈana ˌatakˌatʃonˌiambˈia.|0
ˌalipofˈika, mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, mikˈaja, ɟˈe, twˈende vitˈani ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi ˌau niˈatʃe? ˌakamɟˈibu, ʃˌambulˈia na uʃˈinde, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌatawatˈia mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi nˌitakˌuapˈiʃa ˌili ˌusinˌiambˈie kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˈila kwˈeli tu kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo mikˈaja ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌiliˈona ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌametˌawaɲˈika vˌilimˈani kˌama kondˈoo wasˈio na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, wˈatu hˈawa hawˈana bwˈana. mwˈatʃe kˈila mmˈoɟa aˈende ɲumbˈani kwa amˈani..|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia jˌehoʃafˈati, sˌikukˌuambˈia kwˌamba hˈuwa hˌatabˈiri ɟˈambo lolˈote ɟˈema kˌunihˈusu, bˌali mabˈaja tˈu.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajemʃawˈiʃi ahˈabu ˌili ˌaiʃˌambulˈie rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi na kˌukiendˈea kˈifo tʃˈake hˌuko? mmˈoɟa ˌakapˌendekˈeza hˈili na mwiŋɡˈine lˈile.|0
mwiʃˈoni, pˈepo mtʃˈafu ˌakaɟˌitokˈeza, ˌakasimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana na kusˈema, nˌitamʃawˈiʃi..|0
bwˈana ˌakaulˈiza, kwa ɲɟˈia ɡˈani? ˌakasˈema, nˌitakwˈenda na kˌuwa rˈoho ja uˈoŋɡo katˌika vˈiɲua vja mˌanabˈii wˌake wˈote. bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ˌutafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kˌumʃawˈiʃi. nˈenda ˌukafˈaɲe hˈivjo..|0
kwa hˈijo sˈasa bwˈana ˌamewˈeka rˈoho ja kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa ndˈani ja vˈiɲua vja hˈawa mˌanabˈii wˈako wˈote. bwˈana ˌameamˈuru maˈafa kwa aɟˈili jˈako.|0
kˈiʃa sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa kˌenaˈana ˌakatˈoka na kumpˈiɡa mikˈaja kˈofi usˈoni. ˌakaulˈiza, hˈujo rˈoho kutˈoka kwa bwˈana ˌalipˈita ɲɟˈia ɡˈani ˌalipotˈoka kwˈaŋɡu ˌili kusˈema nˈawe.|0
mikˈaja ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌutaɡundˈua sˈiku hˈijo ˌutakˌapokwˈenda kˌuɟifˈitʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaaɡˈiza, mtʃˌukuˈeni na mkˌamrudˈiʃe kwa amˈoni mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi na kwa joˈaʃi mwˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
mkasˈeme, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo mfˈalme: mwekˈeni ˈm̩tu hˈuju ɡˌerezˈani na ˌasipˈewe tʃotʃˈote ˈila mkˈate na mˈaɟi mpˈaka nˌitakˌaporˈudi salˈama..|0
mikˈaja ˌakasˈema, kˌama ˌutarˈudi salˈama, bˌasi bwˈana hˌaɟanˈena kˌupitˈia kwˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, zˌiŋɡatiˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌakaˈenda rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia jˌehoʃafˈati, nˌitaiŋɡˈia vitˈani nikˈiwa nˌimeɟˌibadilˈiʃa, lakˈini wˌewe uvˈae maɟˈoho jˈako ja kifˈalme. kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˌibadilˈiʃa na kwˈenda vitˈani.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza mˌaɟemadˈari θˌelaθˈini na wawˈili wa maɡˈari ja vˈita, msˌipiɡˈane na jejˈote, mdˈoɡo ˌau mkˈubwa, ˌisipokˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati wˈale mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɡˈari ja vˈita wˌalipomwˈona jˌehoʃafˈati wˌakafikˈiri, hakˈika hˈuju n̩dˈije mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. kwa hˈijo wˌakaɡeˈuka ˌili wˌamʃambulˈie, lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
wˈale mˌaɟemadˈari wˌakaˈona kwˌamba hakˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakaˈatʃa kˌumfuˌatilˈia.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu fulˈani ˌakavˈuta upˈinde pasˈipo lˈeŋɡo na kumpˈiɡa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli kˌatikˈati ja kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃa mavˈazi jˌake ja tʃˈuma. mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia mwendˈeʃa ɡˈari lˈake, ɡeˈuza ɡˈari na ˌuniondˈoe mˌimi katˌika mˌapiɡˈano, nˌimeɟˌeruhˈiwa.|0
vˈita vˌikaˌendelˈea mtʃˈana kˈutwa, nˌaje mfˈalme ahˈabu ˌakatˌeɡemˈezwa ndˈani ja ɡˈari kˌuelekˈea wˌaarˈamu. dˈamu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɟerˈaha lˈake ˌikatʃˌuruzˈika ndˈani ja ɡˈari na ɟiˈoni jˌake akˈafa.|0
ɟˈua lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinazˈama, m̩bˈiu ˌikaenˈea katˌika ɟˈeʃi lˈote: kˈila ˈm̩tu aˈende mɟˈini kwˈake, na kˈila ˈm̩tu ʃambˈani kwˈake.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme akˈafa na ˌakalˈetwa sˌamarˈia, nˌao wˌakamzˈika hˌuko.|0
wˌakasafˈiʃa lˈile ɡˈari la vˈita katˌika bwˈawa la sˌamarˈia mahˈali mˌakahˈaba wˌalipoˈoɡa, na ˈm̩bwa wˌakarˈamba dˈamu jˈake, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilivjokˈuwa lˌimesˈema.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ahˈabu, pamˈoɟa na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ˌaliloɟˈeŋɡa na kupˈambwa kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu, nˈajo mˈiɟi ˌalijˌoiɟeŋɡˈea mabˈoma, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa ˈasa akˈawa mfˈalme wa jˈuda katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa azˈuba bˈinti ʃˈilhi.|0
katˌika kˈila ɟˈambo ˌalitembˈea katˌika ɲɟˈia za ˈasa bˈaba jˌake wˈala hakwˈenda kiɲˈume tʃˈake. ˌalifˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. hˌata hˈivjo mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa. wˈatu wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati pˈia ˌalikˈuwa na amˈani na mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa habˈari ja mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoʃafˈati, mˌafanikˈio ˌalijokˈuwa nˈajo na ˌuhodˈari wˌake katˌika vˈita, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
ʃˈu hˈapo hˌapakuwˈepo na mfˈalme katˌika edˈomu, naˈibu n̩dˈije ˌalitawˈala.|0
wakˈati hˈuu jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaˈunda mˌerikˈebu ɲˈiŋɡi za bˌiaʃˈara ˌili kwˈenda ofˈiri kˌutʃukˈua ðahˈabu, lakˈini kˈamwe hˌazikˌusafˈiri, kwa maˈana zˌilivuɲɟˈika hˌuko esˈion ɡebˈeri.|0
wakˈati ˈule, ˌahazˈia mwˈana wa ahˈabu ˌakamwambˈia jˌehoʃafˈati, waˈatʃe wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌasafˈiri bˌaharˈini pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako, lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakakatˈaa.|0
ˌahazˈia mwˈana wa ahˈabu akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli hˌuko sˌamarˈia katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na sˈaba wa jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌaje ˌalitawˈala katˌika ˌisraˈeli kwa miˈaka miwˈili.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana kwa sabˈabu ˌalienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake na katˌika ɲɟˈia za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈaje ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli itˈende ðˈambi.|0
ˌalimtˌumikˈia na kˌumwabˈudu baˈali na kˌumɣaðibˈiʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama vˈile bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa mfˈalme ahˈabu, ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu ˌiliˈasi ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi ˌahazˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌameaŋɡˈuka hˌuko sˌamarˈia kutˈoka barˈaza ja tʃˈumba tʃˈake tʃa ɟˈuu, ˌakaumˈia. hˈivjo ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe, ˌakiwˌaambˈia, nendˈeni mkˌaulˈize kwa bˈaal zebˈubu, mˈuŋɡu wa ekrˈoni, mkaˈone kˌama nˌitapˈona kˌutokˈana na kˌuumˈia hˈuku.|0
lakˈini mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, mtˈiʃbi, pˈanda ˌukakutˈane na waɟˈumbe wa mfˈalme wa sˌamarˈia, ˌuwaulˈize, ɟˈe, ni kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli n̩dˈijo maˈana mnakwˈenda kˌumuulˈiza bˈaal zebˈubu, mˈuŋɡu wa ekrˈoni?.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, hˌutaondˈoka kwˈeɲe kitˈanda ˌunatʃˌokilalˈia. hakˈika ˌutakˈufa!  hˈivjo elˈija ˌakaˈenda.|0
waɟˈumbe wˌaliporˈudi kwa mfˈalme, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini mmerˈudi.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, ˈm̩tu fulˈani ˌalikˈuɟa kˌukutˈana nˈasi, nˌaje ˌakatˌuambˈia, rudˈini kwa mfˈalme ˌalijˌewatˈuma na mkˌamwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ɟˈe, ni kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli n̩dˈijo maˈana ˌunawatˈuma wˈatu kwˈenda kˌuulˈiza kwa bˈaal zebˈubu, mˈuŋɡu wa ekrˈoni? kwa hˈijo hˌutaondˈoka kwˈeɲe kitˈanda ˌunatʃˌokilalˈia. hakˈika ˌutakˈufa! .|0
mfˈalme ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa nˈamna ɡˈani ambˈaje mlˌikutˈana nˈaje, ˌakawˌaambˈia hˈili.|0
wˌakamɟˈibu, ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa na vˈazi la maɲˈoja na mkˈanda wa ŋɡˈozi kˌiunˈoni mwˈake. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa ni elˈija, mtˈiʃbi.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakamtˈuma m̩kˈuu mmˈoɟa wa kikˈosi pamˈoɟa na kikˈosi tʃˈake tʃa askˈari hamsˈini kwa nabˈii elˈija. jˈule m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi ˌakamwendˈea elˈija, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja kilˈima, na kˌumwambˈia, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, mfˈalme ˌanasˈema, ʃˈuka tʃˈini!.|0
elˈija ˌakamɟˈibu jˈule m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi, ikˈiwa mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, mˈoto na uʃˈuke kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌukutˌeketˈeze wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako hamsˈini! ndˈipo mˈoto ˌukaʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuwatˌeketˈeza jˈule m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake.|0
ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, mfˈalme ˌakatˈuma kwa elˈija m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi mwiŋɡˈine na askˈari wˌake hamsˈini. jˈule m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo mfˈalme, ʃˈuka tʃˈini mˈara mˈoɟa!.|0
elˈija ˌakaɟˈibu, ikˈiwa mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, mˈoto na uʃˈuke kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌukutˌeketˈeze wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako hamsˈini! ndˈipo mˈoto wa mˈuŋɡu ˌukaʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌukamtˌeketˈeza jˌeje na wˈatu wˌake hamsˈini.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme ˌakatˈuma m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi wa tˈatu na wˈatu wˌake hamsˈini. hˈuju m̩kˈuu wa kikˈosi wa tˈatu ˌakapˈanda na kupˈiɡa maɡˈoti mbˈele ja elˈija, ˌakiˈomba, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, tˌafaðˈali nˌiatʃˈie uhˈai wˈaŋɡu na uhˈai wa hˈawa wˈatu hamsˈini, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
tazˈama, mˈoto ˌumeʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuwatˌeketˈeza wˈale wakˈuu wa vikˈosi viwˈili vja kwˈanza pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈao. lakˈini sˈasa nˌiatʃˈie uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia elˈija, ʃˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌusimwoɡˈope. hˈivjo elˈija ˌakainˈuka na kuʃˈuka pamˈoɟa nˌaje kwa mfˈalme.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ɟˈe, ni kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌisraˈeli wa kˌumuulˈiza habˈari, n̩dˈijo maˈana ˌukatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌuulˈiza bˈaal zebˈubu, mˈuŋɡu wa ekrˈoni? kwa sabˈabu ˌumefˈaɲa hˈili, kˈamwe hˌutaondˈoka kwˈeɲe kitˈanda ˌunatʃˌokilalˈia. hakˈika ˌutakˈufa.|0
hˈivjo akˈafa, sˌawasˈawa na lˈile nˈeno la bwˈana ambˈalo elˈija ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema. kwa kˌuwa ˌahazˈia hakˈuwa na mwˈana, jorˈamu akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˌake katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa jˌehorˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ˌahazˈia na jˈale ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipokˈuwa karˈibu kˌumtʃukˈua elˈija mbiŋɡˈuni kwa upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli, elˈija na elˈiʃa wˌalikˈuwa ɲɟiˈani wˌakitˈoka ɡilɡˈali.|0
elˈija ˌakamwambˈia elˈiʃa, kˈaa hˈapa. bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma beθˈeli. lakˈini elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, kwa hakˈika, kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na wˌewe ˌuiʃˈivjo, sˌitakuˈatʃa. kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈenda beθˈeli pamˈoɟa.|0
wˈana wa mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌokuwˈako hˌuko beθˈeli wˌakamɟˈia elˈiʃa na kˌumuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua ja kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatakˌuondolˈea bwˈana wˈako lˈeo? elˈiʃa ˌakawaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, naɟˈua, lakˈini msˌizuŋɡˈumze ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
kˈiʃa elˈija ˌakamwambˈia, bˈaki hˈapa, elˈiʃa. bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma jerˈiko. nˌaje ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na wˌewe ˌuiʃˈivjo, sˌitakuˈatʃa. hˈivjo wˌakaˈenda jerˈiko.|0
wˈana wa mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌokuwˈako hˌuko jerˈiko wˌakamwendˈea elˈiʃa na kˌumuulˈiza, ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua ja kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatakˌuondolˈea bwˈana wˈako lˈeo? ˌakawaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, naɟˈua, lakˈini msˌizuŋɡˈumze ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
kˈiʃa elˈija ˌakamwambˈia, kˈaa hˈapa. bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenda jordˈani. nˌaje ˌakamɟˈibu, kwa hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na wˌewe ˌuiʃˈivjo, sˌitakuˈatʃa. hˈivjo wˈote wawˈili wˌakaˌendelˈea pamˈoɟa.|0
wˈana hamsˈini wa mˌanabˈii wˌakaˈenda na kˌusimˈama kwa mbˈali, kˌuelekˈea mahˈali ambˈapo elˈija na elˈiʃa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama kˈando ja ˈm̩to jordˈani.|0
elˈija ˌakatʃukˈua vˈazi lˈake, ˌakalˌisokˈota na kupˈiɡa nˈalo mˈaɟi. mˈaɟi jˌakaɡˌawaɲˈika upˈande wa kuˈume na upˈande wa kuʃˈoto, nˌao wawˈili wˌakavˈuka pakˈavu.|0
wˌalipokwˈiʃa kuvˈuka, elˈija ˌakamwambˈia elˈiʃa, nˌiambˈie, nˌikufaɲˈie nˈini kˈabla sˌiɟaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kwˈako? elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, naˈomba nirˈiθi sehˈemu mˌaradˈufu ja rˈoho jˈako.|0
elˈija ˌakasˈema, ˌumeˈomba ɟˈambo ɡˈumu. lakˈini kˌama ˌutaniˈona wakˈati nˌinapˌoondolˈewa kutˈoka kwˈako lˌitakˈuwa lˈako. la sˈivjo, hˌautˌalipˈata.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakitembˈea pamˈoɟa na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza, ɣafˈula ɡˈari la mˈoto na farˈasi wa mˈoto vˌilitokˈea na kˌuwatˌeŋɡanˈiʃa wˌao wawˈili, nˌaje elˈija ˌakapˈanda mbiŋɡˈuni katˌika upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli.|0
elˈiʃa ˌaliˈona hˈili, nˌaje ˌakapˈaza saˈuti, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! maɡˈari ja ˌisraˈeli na wapˈanda farˈasi wˈake! nˌaje elˈiʃa hˌakumwˈona tˈena. kˈiʃa ˌakaziʃˈika ŋɡˈuo zˌake mweɲˈewe na kˌuzirarˈua.|0
ˌakalˌiokˈota lˈile vˈazi lˌililˌoaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka kwa elˈija, kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi na kˌusimˈama ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa jordˈani.|0
ndˈipo ˌakalˌitʃukˈua lˈile vˈazi ambˈalo lˌilikˈuwa lˌimeaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka kwa elˈija, nˌaje ˌakajapˈiɡa jˈale mˈaɟi nˈalo. ˌakaulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi sˈasa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa elˈija? elˈiʃa ˌalipˌojapˈiɡa mˈaɟi, jˌakaɡˌawaɲˈika kulˈia na kuʃˈoto, nˌaje ˌakavˈuka.|0
wˈale wˈana wa mˌanabˈii kutˈoka jerˈiko wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakitazˈama wˌakasˈema, rˈoho wa elˈija ˌinamkalˈia elˈiʃa. nˌao wˌakaˈenda kumlˈaki na kˌusuɟˈudu hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi mbˈele jˈake.|0
wˌakasˈema, tazˈama, sˌisi wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako tunˈao wˈatu hamsˈini wˌeɲe uwˈezo. wˌaruhˈusu waˈende kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana wˈako. lˈabda rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌamemtwˈaa na kumwˈeka katˌika mlˈima fulˈani ˌau bˈonde fulˈani. elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, hapˈana, msˌiwatˈume.|0
lakˈini wˌakasˌisitˈiza, mpˈaka ˌakaˈona aˈibu kˌuwakˌatalˈia. hˈivjo ˌakasˈema, wˌatumˈeni. nˌao wˌakawatˈuma wˈatu hamsˈini, wˌakamtafˈuta kwa sˈiku tˈatu, lakˈini hˌawakumpˈata.|0
wˌalipˌomrudˈia elˈiʃa, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiŋɡoɟˈea hˌuko jerˈiko, ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɟˈe, sˌikuwˌaambˈia msiˈende.|0
wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakamwambˈia elˈiʃa, tazˈama, bwˈana wˈetu, mahˈali ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌulipoɟˈeŋɡwa ni pazˈuri, kˌama bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌaonˈavjo, lakˈini mˈaɟi jˌake ni mabˈaja, na ˈn̩tʃi hˌaizˈai.|0
ˌakasˈema, nˌileteˈeni bakˈuli ˈm̩pja, mwˈeke tʃˈumvi ndˈani jˈake. kwa hˈijo wˌakamletˈea.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi na kˌuitˈupa ˈile tʃˈumvi ndˈani jˈake, ˌakisˈema, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌimejapˈoɲa mˈaɟi hˈaja. kˈamwe hˌajatˌasababˈiʃa maˈuti tˈena wˈala kˌutozˈaa..|0
nˈajo jˈale mˈaɟi jˌakapˈoɲua mpˈaka lˈeo, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la elˈiʃa ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
kutˈoka hˌuko elˈiʃa ˌakakwˈea kwˈenda beθˈeli. ikˈawa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitembˈea bˌarabarˈani, baˈaði ja viɟˈana wˌakatˈoka mɟˈini na kˌumfaɲˈia mzˈaha. wˌakasˈema, pˈaa, wˌewe mwˌeɲe upˈaa! pˈaa, wˌewe mwˌeɲe upˈaa.|0
ˌakaɡeˈuka, ˌakawˌatazˈama na kˌuwalaˈani kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana. kˈiʃa dˈubu wawˈili wa kˈike wˌakatokˈea mwitˈuni na kˌuwararˈua viɟˈana ˌarobaˈini na wawˈili mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
nˌaje ˌakaondˈoka hˌuko, ˌakaˈenda mlˈima karmˈeli, na kutˈoka hˌuko ˌakarˈudi sˌamarˈia.|0
jˌehorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli katˌika sˌamarˈia mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala kwa miˈaka kˈumi na miwˈili.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, lakˈini sˈio kˌama bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa. ˌakaondˈoa ŋɡˈuzo ja ibˈada ja baˈali ambˈajo bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌiteŋɡenˈeza.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌakaʃˌikamˈana na ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, wˈala hˌakuziˈatʃa.|0
bˌasi mˈeʃa mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌakafˈuɡa kondˈoo, nˌaje akˈawa ˌampatˈie mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli wˌanakondˈoo mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri pamˈoɟa na sˈufu ja kondˈoo dˈume mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
lakˈini baˌada ja ahˈabu kˈufa, mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌaliˈasi ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌakapelˈeka pˈia uɟˈumbe ˌufuatˈao kwa jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda: mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌameˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu. ɟˈe, ˌutakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌami kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja moˈabu? ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌitakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈawe. mˌimi ni kˌama wˈewe, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama wˈatu wˈako, farˈasi wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama farˈasi wˈako.|0
ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, tˌutaʃˌambulˈia kˌupitˈia ɲɟˈia ɡˈani? ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌupitˈia ɟˈaŋɡwa la edˈomu.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaondˈoka akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wa jˈuda na mfˈalme wa edˈomu. baˌada ja kˌuzuŋɡˈuka kwa sˈiku sˈaba, ɟˈeʃi likˈawa lˌimeiʃˈiwa mˈaɟi kwa mˌatumˈizi jˈao na kwa aɟˈili ja waɲˈama wˌaliokˈuwa nˈao.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamˈaka, nˈini! ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌametuˈita sˌisi wafˈalme watˈatu ˌili tu kˌututˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa moˈabu.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hajˈuko nabˈii wa bwˈana hˈapa, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌumuulˈiza bwˈana kˌupitˈia kwˈake? afˈisa mmˈoɟa wa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, elˈiʃa mwˈana wa ʃafˈati jˈuko hˈapa. n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimimˈina mˈaɟi ɟˌuːja mikˈono ja elˈija.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakasˈema, nˈeno la bwˈana lˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈaje. kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˌehoʃafˈati pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wa edˈomu wˌakamwendˈea.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˈina nˈini mˌimi nˈawe? nˈenda kwa mˌanabˈii wa bˈaba jˈako na mˌanabˈii wa mˈama jˈako. mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa, kwa sabˈabu ni bwˈana ambˈaje ˌametuˈita pamˈoɟa sˌisi wafˈalme watˈatu ˌili ˌatutˈie mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa moˈabu.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, hakˈika, kˌama bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌaiʃˈivjo ambˈaje nˌinamtˌumikˈia, kˌama si kˌuheʃˈimu jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌisiŋɡˌekutazˈama wˈala hˌata kˌukutupˈia ɟˈitʃo.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, nˌileteˈeni mpˈiɡa kinˈubi. mpˈiɡa kinˈubi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakipˈiɡa, mkˈono wa bwˈana ukˈaɟa ɟˌuːja elˈiʃa.|0
nˌaje ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, tʃimbˈeni bˈonde hˈili liɟˈae mˌahandˈaki..|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: hˌamtaˈona upˈepo wˈala mvˈua, lakˈini bˈonde hˈili lˌitaɟˈaa mˈaɟi, nˌaɲi pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈombe wˈenu na waɲˈama wˈenu weŋɡˈine mtakˈuɲua.|0
hˈili ni ɟˈambo rahˈisi matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. pˈia ˌataitˈia moˈabu mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
mtˌauʃˈinda kˈila ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na kˈila ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa. mtakˈata kˈila ˈm̩ti ulˈio mzˈuri, mtazˈiba tʃemtʃˈemi zˈote, na kˌuharˈibu kˈila ʃˈamba zˈuri kwa mˈawe.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi, karˈibu na wakˈati wa kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja ˌasubˈuhi, tazˈama, mˈaɟi jakˈawa jˌanatˌirirˈika kutˈoka upˈande wa edˈomu! nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaɟˈaa mˈaɟi.|0
bˌasi wˌamoˈabu wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesikˈia kˌuwa wˈale wafˈalme wˌamekˈuɟa kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈao. hˈivjo kˈila ˈm̩tu, kiɟˈana na m̩zˈee, ambˈaje ˌaŋɡewˈeza kuʃˈika silˈaha ˌakaˈitwa na kuwˈekwa mpakˈani.|0
wˌalipoˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ɟˈua likˈawa lˌinamulˈika ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi. wˌamoˈabu wˌaliokˈuwa upˈande wa pˈili wˌakaˈona mˈaɟi ni mekˈundu, kˌama dˈamu.|0
wˌamoˈabu wˌakasˈema, ˈile ni dˈamu! lazˈima hˈao wafˈalme wˌamepiɡˈana na kˌutʃiɲɟˈana wˌao kwa wˈao. sˈasa moˈabu, twendˈeni tˌukatˈeke ɲˈara.|0
lakˈini wˌamoˈabu wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja ˌisraˈeli, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakainˈuka na kˌuwapˈiɡa mpˈaka wˌakakimbˈia. nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˌivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa wˌamoˈabu.|0
wˌakaˌiharˈibu mˈiɟi, kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakatˈupa ɟˈiwe ɟˌuːja kˈila ʃˈamba zˈuri mpˈaka lˌikafunˈikwa. wˌakazˈiba tʃemtʃˈemi zˈote na kukˈata kˈila ˈm̩ti mzˈuri. kˈir hˌaresˈeθi pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈio ˌuliobˈaki na mˈawe jˌake jakˈiwa mahˈali pˈake. lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa na mˌakombˈeo wˌakaˌuzuŋɡˈuka na kˌuuʃˌambulˈia vˌilevˈile.|0
mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa vˈita vˌimekˈuwa vikˈali ðˈidi jˈake, ˌakatʃukˈua wˈatu mˌiasˈaba wˌeɲe pˈaŋɡa ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia kwa mfˈalme wa edˈomu, lakˈini wˌakaʃˈindwa.|0
ˈm̩ke wa mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa mˌanabˈii ˌakamlilˈia elˈiʃa, ˌakamwambˈia, mtumˈiʃi wˈako, mˈume wˈaŋɡu, ˌamekˈufa, nˌawe ˌunaɟˈua ˌalikˈuwa anˈamtʃa bwˈana. lakˈini sˈasa jˈule ˌanajemdˈai ˌanakˈuɟa kˌutʃukˈua wanˈaŋɡu wawˈili kˌama watˈumwa wˈake.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamɟˈibu, nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌukusˌaidˈia? nˌiambˈie, ˈuna nˈini ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈako? ˌakasˈema, mtumˈiʃi wˈako hˈana kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kabˈisa, ˌisipokˈuwa mafˈuta kidˈoɡo.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, zuŋɡˈuka kwa mˌaɟirˈani zˈako wˈote ˌukaˈombe vjˈombo vitˈupu. ˌusiˈombe vitʃˈatʃe.|0
kˈiʃa iŋɡˈia ndˈani na ˌuɟifuŋɡˈie mlˈaŋɡo, wˌewe na wanˈao. mimˈina mafˈuta kwˈeɲe vjˈombo vjˈote, na kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌinapoɟˈaa, kiwˈeke kˈando.|0
jˈule mɟˈane ˌakaondˈoka na kˌuɟifuŋɡˈia ndˈani, jˌeje na wanˈawe. wˌao wˌakamletˈea vjˈombo, nˌaje ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌumimˈina mafˈuta.|0
vjˈombo vjˈote vˌilipoɟˈaa, ˌakamwambˈia mwanˈawe, nˌiletˈee tʃˈombo kiŋɡˈine. lakˈini mwanˈawe ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈuna tʃˈombo kiŋɡˈine kˌilitʃobˈaki. bˌasi mafˈuta jˌakakˈoma kˌutirirˈika.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakaˈenda ˌakamwambˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, nˈenda ˌukajaˈuze hˈajo mafˈuta ulˈipe madˈeni jˈako. wˌewe na wanˈao mnawˈeza kuˈiʃi kwa kˈile kˌinatʃˌosalˈia.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa elˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda ʃunˈemu. hˌuko kˌulikˈuwa na mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa mwˌeɲe tʃˈeo, ambˈaje ˌalimsˌisitˈiza elˈiʃa ˈaɟe kˈula tʃakˈula. kwa hˈijo kˈila mˈara ˌalipitˈia pˈale, ˌakaiŋɡˈia hˈumo ˌili ˈale.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mumˈewe, nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba hˈuju ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌanakˈuɟa kwˈetu mˈara kwa mˈara ni ˈm̩tu mtˌakatˈifu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
tˌuteŋɡenˈeze tʃˈumba kidˈoɡo ɟˈuu darˈini na tuwˈeke ndˈani jˌake kitˈanda na mˈeza, kˈiti na tˈaa kwa aɟˈili jˈake. kˈiʃa ˌanawˈeza kukˈaa hˈumo kˈila mˈara akˈiɟa kwˈetu.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa elˈiʃa ˌalipofˈika, ˌakapˈanda tʃumbˈani kwˈake na kulˈala hˈumo.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake ɡehˈazi, mwˈite hˈujo mʃunˈami. hˈivjo ˌakamwˈita, nˌaje akˈaɟa ˌakasimˈama mbˈele jˈake.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, mwambˈie hˈuju mwanˈamke, ˌumetˌaabˈika sˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈetu. sˈasa ˌutendˈewe nˈini? ɟˈe, tˌunawˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme ˌau ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi kwa niˈaba jˈako?  ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi nˌinaˈiʃi kwˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, ɟˈe, ni nˈini kˌinatʃowˈeza kˌufaɲˈika kwa aɟˈili jˈake? ɡehˈazi ˌakasˈema, hakˈika, hˈana mwˈana, na mˈume wˌake ni m̩zˈee.|0
ndˈipo elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, mwˈite hˈujo mwanˈamke. kwa hˈijo ˌakamwˈita, nˌaje akˈaɟa ˌakasimˈama mlaŋɡˈoni.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, mwˈaka uɟˈao, wakˈati kˌama hˈuu ˌutabˈeba mwˈana mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. jˈule mˈama ˌakapˈiŋɡa, ˌakasˈema, la hˈaʃa, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, ˌusimpotˈoʃe mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˈee ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakapˈata mˈimba, na mwˈaka ˌuliˌofuˈata wakˈati kˌama ˈule ˈule ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana, kˌama vˈile elˈiʃa ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia.|0
mtˈoto ˌakakˈua, nˌaje sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌakamwendˈea bˈaba jˈake, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˌavunˈaɟi.|0
ˌakamwambˈia bˈaba jˈake, kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu! kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu! bˈaba jˌake ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi, mtʃukˈue ˌumpelˈeke kwa mˈama jˈake.|0
baˌada ja mtumˈiʃi kumbˈeba na kˌumpelˈeka kwa mˈama jˈake, mtˈoto ˌakakˈeti mˌapaɟˈani ˌm̩wa mˈama jˌake mpˈaka ˌaðuhˈuri, kˈiʃa akˈafa.|0
mˈama ˌakampandˈiʃa na kumlˈaza ɟˌuːja kitˈanda tʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, kˈiʃa ˌakafˈuŋɡa mlˈaŋɡo, ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe.|0
ˌakamwˈita mˈume wˌake na kusˈema, tˌafaðˈali mtˈume mmˈoɟa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mtumˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na pˈunda ˌili niwˈeze kwˈenda kwa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu harˈaka na kurˈudi.|0
mˈume wˌake ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini uˈende kwˈake lˈeo? lˈeo si mwandˈamo wa mwˈezi, wˈala si sabˈato. mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, jˈote ni sˈawa.|0
ˌakatandˈika pˈunda na kˌumwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, mwoŋɡˈoze hˈujo pˈunda. ˌusinˌipuŋɡuzˈie mwˈendo mpˈaka nˌikuambˈie.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaˈenda na kˌumfikˈia hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu katˌika mlˈima karmˈeli. ˌalipomwˈona kwa mbˈali, hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake ɡehˈazi, tazˈama, jˈule mʃunˈami.|0
kimbˈia ˌukamlˈaki, ˌumuulˈize, ɟˈe, wˌewe huɟˈambo? mˈume wˈako haɟˈambo? mtˈoto wˈako ni mzˈima?  ˌakasˈema, kˈila kˈitu ni sˌawasˈawa.|0
ˌalipˌomfikˈia hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu pˈale mlimˈani, ˌakaʃˈika miɡˈuu jˈake. ɡehˈazi akˈaɟa ˌili ˌamwondˈoe, lakˈini jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakasˈema, mwˈatʃe! jˈuko katˌika utʃˈuŋɡu mkˈubwa, lakˈini bwˈana ˌamenifˈitʃa ɟˈambo hˈili na hˌaɟanˌiambˈia kwa nˈini.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi nˌilikuˈomba mwˈana? ɟˈe, sˌikukˌuambˈia, ˌusiˈamʃe mˌatumaˈini jˈaŋɡu.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia ɡehˈazi, ɟikˈaze viˈuno, tʃukˈua fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu mkonˈoni mwˈako na ˌukimbˈie. ikˈiwa ˌutakutˈana na ˈm̩tu jejˈote, ˌusimsˌalimˈie, na ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌakikˌusalˈimu, ˌusimɟˈibu. ilˈaze fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mtˈoto.|0
lakˈini mˈama mtˈoto ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo na wˌewe ˌuiʃˈivjo, sˌitakuˈatʃa. kwa hˈijo elˈiʃa ˌakainˈuka, ˌakafˌuatˈana nˈaje.|0
ɡehˈazi ˌakatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele na kˌuilˈaza fˈimbo ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mtˈoto, lakˈini hˌapakˈuwa na saˈuti wˈala ˌitikˈio. hˈivjo ɡehˈazi ˌakarˈudi kˌukutˈana na elˈiʃa, na kˌumwambˈia, mtˈoto hˌaɟaˈamka.|0
elˈiʃa ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe ˈile ɲˈumba, mtˈoto ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˈala ɟˌuːja kitˈanda tʃˈake aŋɡˈali ˌamekˈufa.|0
ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani, ˌakaɟˌifuŋɡˈia jˌeje na jˈule mtˈoto, ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈanda kˌitandˈani, ˌakalˈala ɟˌuːja jˈule mtˈoto, mdˈomo wˌake ɟˌuːja mdˈomo wa mtˈoto, mˈatʃo jˌake ɟˌuːja mˈatʃo ja mtˈoto, mikˈono jˌake ɟˌuːja mikˈono ja mtˈoto. nˌaje ˌalipˌoɟiɲoˈoʃa ɟˈuu jˈake, mwˈili wa mtˈoto ˌukapˈata ɟˈoto.|0
