elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˌiondˈoa ɟˈuu jˌake na kuˈanza kˌutembˌeatembˈea ndˈani ja tʃˈumba, kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi tˈena kˌitandˈani na kˌuɟiɲoˈoʃa tˈena ɟˌuːja mtˈoto mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine. mtˈoto ˌakapˈiɡa tʃˈafja mˈara sˈaba, ˌakafuŋɡˈua mˈatʃo jˈake.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwˈita ɡehˈazi na kˌumwambˈia, mwˈite hˈujo mʃunˈami. nˌaje ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo. jˈule mʃunˈami ˌalipokˈuɟa, elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, mtʃukˈue mwanˈao.|0
ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani, ˌakaaŋɡˈuka mˌiɡuˈuni pa elˈiʃa na kˌusuɟˈudu hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi. kˈiʃa ˌakamtʃukˈua mwanˈawe na kutˈoka ɲɟˈe.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi ɡilɡˈali, nˈako hˌuko kˌulikˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa katˌika enˈeo lˈile. wakˈati wˈana wa kˈundi la mˌanabˈii wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanakutˈana nˈaje, ˌakamwambˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈake, telˈeka tʃˈuŋɡu kikˈubwa ɟikˈoni ˌuwapikˈie mˌanabˈii.|0
mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakatˈoka kwˈenda mˌaʃambˈani kutʃˈuma mbˈoɡa na ˌakapˈata mtˈaŋɡo mwˈitu. ˌakatʃˈuma matˈaŋɡo na kuɟˈaza ŋɡˈuo jˌake ˌalijˌoikˈuɲɟa ˌili kˌubebˈea. ˌaliporˈudi, ˌakajˌakatakˈata na kˌujatˌumbukˈiza ndˈani ja tʃˈuŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna ˌalijeɟˈua ni nˈini.|0
mtʃˈuzi ˌukaɡawˈiwa wˈatu, lakˈini wˌalipoˈanza kˈula, wˌakalˈia, ˈee ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, kˈuna maˈuti ndˈani ja tʃˈuŋɡu. nˌao hˌawakuwˈeza kˈula.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, letˈeni ˈuŋɡa. ˌakauwˈeka ndˈani ja tʃˈuŋɡu na kusˈema, wˌaɡawˈie wˈatu ˌili wˈale. wˈala hˌapakˈuwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃˌeɲe maðˈara ndˈani ja tʃˈuŋɡu.|0
akˈaɟa ˈm̩tu kutˈoka bˈaal ʃalˈiʃa, ˌakimletˈea ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu mikˈate ˌiʃirˈini ja ʃajˈiri ˌilijoˈokwa kˌutokˈana na nafˈaka ja kwˈanza, pamˈoɟa na masˈuke ja nafˈaka ˈm̩pja. elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, wˈape wˈatu ˌili wˈale.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˌake ˌakamˌuulˈiza, nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuandˈaa hˌii mbˈele ja wˈatu mˈia? lakˈini elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, wˈape wˈatu ˌili wˈale. kwa maˈana hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: wˌatakˈula na kusˈaza..|0
bˌasi ˌakaˌiandˈaa mbˈele jˈao ˈile mikˈate, wakˈala na baˈaði jˌake wˌakasˈaza, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, nˌaamˈani ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa arˈamu. ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu m̩kˈuu mbˈele ja bwˈana wˌake na ˌalijˌeheʃimˈiwa sˈana, kwa sabˈabu kˌupitˈia kwˈake, bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa arˈamu uʃˈindi. ˌalikˈuwa askˈari ʃuɟˈaa, lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa na ukˈoma.|0
sˈiku hˈizo vikˈosi kutˈoka arˈamu vˌilikˈuwa vˌimekwˈenda na vikˈawa vˌimemtˈeka msitʃˈana kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakamtˌumikˈia mkˈewe nˌaamˈani.|0
ˌakamwambˈia bˈibi jˈake, kˌama bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌaŋɡelimwˈona nabˈii ˌalijˈeko sˌamarˈia! ˌaŋɡempˈoɲa ukˈoma wˈake.|0
nˌaamˈani ˌakaˈenda kwa bwˈana wˌake na kˌumwambˈia ˌalitʃosˈema jˈule msitʃˈana kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli.|0
mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakamɟˈibu, hakˈika, nˈenda. nˌitatˈuma barˈua kwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. kwa hˈijo nˌaamˈani ˌakaondˈoka, akˈiwa ˌametʃukˈua talˈanta kˈumi za fˈeða, ʃekˈeli sˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, na mivˈao kˈumi ja mavˈazi.|0
barˈua ˌalijˌopelekˈea mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌiliandˈikwa hˈivi: pamˈoɟa na barˈua hˌii nˌinamtˈuma mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, nˌaamˈani, kwˈako ˌili uwˈeze kumpˈoɲa ukˈoma wˈake.|0
mˈara mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuisˈoma ˈile barˈua, ˌakararˈua mavˈazi jˌake na kusˈema, ɟˈe, mˌimi ni mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, mˌimi nawˈeza kuˈua na kˌufufˈua tˈena? kwa nˈini hˈuju ˈm̩tu ˌanamtˈuma ˈm̩tu ˌili mˌimi nipˈate kumpˈoɲa ukˈoma wˈake? tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌanavjˌotafˈuta kˌuanzˈiʃa uɡˈomvi nˈami.|0
elˈiʃa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamerarˈua mavˈazi jˈake, ˌakamtumˈia uɟˈumbe hˈuu: kwa nˈini ˌumerarˈua mavˈazi jˈako? mwamˈuru ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˈaɟe kwˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌataɟˈua ja kˌuwa jˈuko nabˈii katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌaamˈani ˌakaˈenda, akˈiwa na farˈasi zˌake na maɡˈari jˈake, na kˌusimˈama mlaŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ɲˈumba ja elˈiʃa.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamtˈuma mɟˈumbe kˌumwambˈia, nˈenda uˈoɡe katˌika jordˈani mˈara sˈaba, na ɲˈama ja mwˈili wˈako ˌitapˈona, nˌawe ˌutatˌakasˈika.|0
lakˈini nˌaamˈani ˌakaondˈoka akˈiwa ˌamekˌasirˈika, ˌakasˈema, hakˈika nˌiliðˈani kwˌamba ˌaŋɡetˈoka ɲɟˈe, ˌasimˈame na kˌuliitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake, na kuwˈeka mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja mahˈali paɡˈoɲɟua, ˌanipˈoɲe ukˈoma wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, abˈana na farpˈari, mˈito ja damˈeski, si bˈora zaˈidi kulˈiko mˈito jojˈote ja ˌisraˈeli? ɟˈe, nˌisiŋɡewˈeza kuˈoɡa ndˈani ja hˈijo mˈito na kˌutakasˈika? bˌasi ˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌuondˈoka kwa hasˈira kˈuu.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa nˌaamˈani wˌakamwendˈea na kˌumwambˈia, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kˌama hˈujo nabˈii ˌaŋɡekˌuambˈia kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo lilˈilo kˈubwa, ɟˈe, ˌusiŋɡˌelifˈaɲa? ɟˈe, si zaˈidi sˈana bˈasi, ˌanapˌokuambˈia, ˈoɡa na ˌutakasˈike!.|0
hˈivjo ˌakaʃˈuka na kˌuɟizamˈiʃa ndˈani ja jordˈani mˈara sˈaba, kˌama vˈile hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia, nˈajo ɲˈama ja mwˈili wˌake ˌikapˈona na kˌutakasˈika kˌama ja mwˈili wa mvulˈana mdˈoɡo.|0
kˈiʃa nˌaamˈani na wˌahudˈumu wˌake wˈote wˌakarˈudi kwa jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. ˌakasimˈama mbˈele jˌake na kusˈema, sˈasa naɟˈua kwˌamba hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote ˌisipokˈuwa katˌika ˌisraˈeli. tˌafaðˈali sˈasa ˌupokˈee zawˈadi kutˈoka kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
nabˈii ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ambˈaje nˌinamtˌumikˈia, sˌitapokˈea kˈitu hˌata kimˈoɟa. iŋɡˈawa nˌaamˈani ˌalimsˈihi sˈana, jˌeje ˌalikatˈaa.|0
nˌaamˈani ˌakasˈema, ikˈiwa hˌutapokˈea, tˌafaðˈali mtumˈiʃi wˈako na apˈewe udˈoŋɡo kiˈasi tʃa mzˈiɡo wa kuwˈeza kubˈebwa na pˈunda wawˈili, kwa sabˈabu mtumˈiʃi wˈako hˌatatˈoa tˈena sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu kwa mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˌisipokˈuwa bwˈana.|0
lakˈini bwˈana na ˌamsamˈehe mtumˈiʃi wˌake kwa kˈitu hˈiki kimˈoɟa: wakˈati bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌatakˌapoiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la rimˈoni ˌili kˌusuɟˈudu, nˌaje akˈiwa ˌanaˌueɡemˈea mkˈono wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌikasuɟˈudu hˌuko pˈia, wakˈati nˌitakˌaposuɟˈudu ndˈani ja hekˈalu la rimˈoni, bwˈana na ˌamsamˈehe mtumˈiʃi wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, nˈenda kwa amˈani. baˌada ja nˌaamˈani kˌusafˈiri umbˈali fulˈani.|0
ɡehˈazi, mtumˈiʃi wa elˈiʃa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, ˌakaɟˌiambˈia mweɲˈewe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamemwatʃˈia kˌirahˈisi sˈana nˌaamˈani, hˈuju mwarˈamu, kwa kˌutokˌupokˈea kutˈoka kwˈake vˈile ˌalivjˌovilˈeta. hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, nˌitamkˌimbilˈia na kupˈata kˈitu kutˈoka kwˈake.|0
hˈivjo ɡehˈazi ˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kˌumfuˌatilˈia nˌaamˈani. nˌaamˈani ˌalipomwˈona ˌakikimbˈia kˌumwelekˈea, ˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake na kwˈenda kumlˈaki. ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, mˈambo jˈote ni sˈawa.|0
ɡehˈazi ˌakaɟˈibu, mˈambo jˈote ni sˈawa. bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamenitˈuma nˌikuambˈie, viɟˈana wawˈili kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa mˌanabˈii wˌameniɟˈia kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu. tˌafaðˈali wˈape talˈanta ja fˈeða na mivˈao miwˈili ja mavˈazi..|0
nˌaamˈani ˌakasˈema, hakˈika, tʃukˈua talˈanta mbˈili za fˈeða. ˌakamsˈihi ɡehˈazi ˌazipokˈee, kˈiʃa ˌakafˈuŋɡa talˈanta mbˈili za fˈeða katˌika mifˈuko miwˈili pamˈoɟa na mivˈao miwˈili ja mavˈazi. ˌakawˈapa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wawˈili mizˈiɡo hˈijo, nˌao wˌakaibˈeba wˌakitˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele ja ɡehˈazi.|0
ɡehˈazi ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe kilˈima, ˌakavˌitʃukˈua vˈile vˈitu kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˌatumˈiʃi na kˌuvifˈitʃa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba. ˌakawaˈaɡa wˈale wˈatu, nˌao wˌakaondˈoka.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja elˈiʃa bwˈana wˈake. elˈiʃa ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɡehˈazi, ˌulikˈuwa wˈapi? ɡehˈazi ˌakaɟˈibu, mtumˈiʃi wˈako hakwˈenda popˈote.|0
lakˈini elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, rˈoho jˈaŋɡu hˌaikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe wakˈati jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipoʃˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake ˌili kˌukulˈaki? ɟˈe, hˈuu ni wakˈati wa kˌupokˈea fˈeða ˌau kˌupokˈea ŋɡˈuo, maʃˈamba ja mˌizeitˈuni, maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, makˈundi ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe, ˌau wˌatumˈiʃi wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
ukˈoma wa nˌaamˈani ˌutakuʃˈika wˌewe na wazˈao wˈako milˈele. kˈiʃa ɡehˈazi ˌakaondˈoka mbˈele ja elˈiʃa, mwˌeɲe ukˈoma, mweˈupe kˌama θelˈuɟi.|0
twendˈeni jordˈani, mahˈali ambˈapo kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌanawˈeza kupˈata ŋɡˈuzo mˈoɟa, nˌasi tuɟˈeŋɡe hˌuko mahˈali pˈetu pa kuˈiʃi. nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, nendˈeni.|0
kˈiʃa mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, tˌafaðˈali, huwˈezi kˌufuatˈana na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako? elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌitakˈuɟa.|0
nˌaje ˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈao. bˌasi wˌakaˈenda jordˈani, nˌao wˌakaˈanza kukˈata mˈiti.|0
ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, lˌiliˌaŋɡukˈia wˈapi? ˌalipˌomwoɲˈeʃa mahˈali peɲˈewe, elˈiʃa ˌakakˈata kiɟˈiti na kˌukitˈupa mahˈali pˈale, nˈalo ʃˈoka lˌikaelˈea.|0
ˌakasˈema, lˌitʃukˈue. kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈake, ˌakalˌitʃukˈua.|0
wakˈati hˈuo mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌakipiɡˈana vˈita na ˌisraˈeli. baˌada ja kˌukubˌaliˈana na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, ˌakasˈema, nˌitapˈiɡa kˈambi jˈaŋɡu mahˈali fulˈani na fulˈani.|0
ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli: ɟˌihaðˈari usˈiɟe ˌukapˈita mahˈali pˈale, kwa sabˈabu wˌaarˈamu wˌanaʃˈuka hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakatˈuma nˈeno la tˌahaðˈari mahˈali pˈale ˌalikokˈuwa ˌameˌelekˈezwa na ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. mˈara kwa mˈara elˈiʃa ˌalimwˈoɲa mfˈalme kwˌamba wˈatu wˈawe mˈatʃo kwˈeɲe mˌaenˈeo kˌama hˈajo.|0
hˈili lˌilimfˌaðaˈiʃa sˈana mfˈalme wa arˈamu. ˌakawaˈita mˌaafˈisa wˈake, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˌamtanˌiambˈia ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu alˈije upˈande wa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wˌake ˌakasˈema, mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈetu. lakˈini elˈiʃa, jˈule nabˈii alˈije ˌisraˈeli, hˌumwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli hˌata jˈale manˈeno ˌunajˌozuŋɡˈumza katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈako tʃa kulˈala.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaaɡˈiza ˌakisˈema, nendˈeni, mkˌatafˈute alˈiko, ˌili niwˈeze kutˈuma wˈatu kˌumkamˈata. tˌaarˈifa ˌikarˈudi kwˌamba, jˈuko doθˈani.|0
ndˈipo ˌakatˈuma farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita na ɟˈeʃi lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu hˌuko. wˌalikwˈenda usˈiku na kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, mtumˈiʃi wa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalipoˈamka na kutˈoka ɲɟˈe, ɟˈeʃi, pamˈoɟa na farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita, likˈawa lˌimeˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi. mtumˈiʃi wˌake ˌakasˈema, ˈole wˈetu, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu! tˌutafˈaɲa nˈini.|0
nabˈii ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌusioɡˈope. wˈale walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌasi ni wˈeŋɡi zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈale walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
kˈiʃa elˈiʃa ˌakaˈomba, ˈee bwˈana, mfumbˈue mˈatʃo hˈuju mtumˈiʃi ˌili apˈate kuˈona. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakajˌafumbˈua mˈatʃo ja jˈule mtumˈiʃi, nˌaje ˌakatazˈama na kuˈona vilˈima vˌimeɟˈaa farˈasi na maɡˈari ja mˈoto, jˌamemzuŋɡˈuka elˈiʃa pˈande zˈote.|0
wakˈati adˈui wˌalipoʃˈuka kˌumwelekˈea, elˈiʃa ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana: wapˈiɡe wˈatu hˈawa kwa upˈofu. bˌasi mˈuŋɡu ˌakawapˈiɡa kwa upˈofu, kˌama elˈiʃa ˌalivjoˈomba.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˌii sˈio ɲɟˈia jeɲˈewe, na hˈuu sˈio hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi. nˌifuatˈeni mˈimi, nˌami nˌitawˌapelˈeka kwa hˈujo ˈm̩tu mnˌajemtafˈuta. nˌaje ˌakawˌapelˈeka sˌamarˈia.|0
baˌada ja kˌuiŋɡˈia mɟˈini, elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, bwˈana, jˌafuŋɡˈue mˈatʃo ja wˈatu hˈawa ˌili wapˈate kuˈona. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakajˌafuŋɡˈua mˈatʃo jˈao, na wˌalipˌotazˈama, kˈumbe hˈapo ndˈipo wˌalipˌoɟikˈuta, ndˈani ja sˌamarˈia.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌakamˌuulˈiza elˈiʃa, ɟˈe, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˌiwaˈue.|0
nˌaje ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌusiwaˈue. ɟˈe, ˌutawaˈua wˈatu ˌuliˌowatˈeka kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈako mweɲˈewe na upˈinde wˈako? wˈape tʃakˈula na mˈaɟi ˌili wapˈate kˈula na kˈuɲua, na kˈiʃa wˌamrudˈie bwˈana wˈao.|0
bˌasi ˌakawˌaandalˈia karˈamu kˈubwa, na baˌada ja kˈula na kˈuɲua, ˌakawaˈaɡa nˌao wˌakarˈudi kwa bwˈana wˈao. hˈivjo, vikˈosi kutˈoka arˈamu vˌikakˈoma kˌuvamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakaandˈaa ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote ˌakapˈanda kwˈenda kˌuihusˈuru sˌamarˈia.|0
kukˈawa na ɲɟˈaa kˈuu katˌika ˈm̩ɟi. sˌamarˈia ˌiliziŋɡˈirwa kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, kiˈasi kwˌamba kˈitʃwa tʃa pˈunda kˌiliˈuzwa kwa ʃekˈeli θˌemanˈini za fˈeða, na rˈobo ja kibˈaba tʃa mˈavi ja ɲɟˈiwa kˌiliˈuzwa kwa ʃekˈeli tˈano za fˈeða.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanapˈita ɟˌuːja ukˈuta, mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa ˌakamlilˈia, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, nˌisaidˈie.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, ikˈiwa bwˈana hˌakusˌaidˈii, nˌitakˌutolˈea wˈapi msaˈada? ɟˈe, ni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia? ˌau kwˈeɲe ʃˌinikˈizo la divˈai.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamˌuulˈiza, kwˈani kˈuna nˈini? jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakamɟˈibu, hˈuju mwanˈamke ˌalinˌiambˈia, m̩tˈoe mwanˈao ˌili tupˈate kˈumla lˈeo, na kˈeʃo tutˈamla mwanˈaŋɡu..|0
bˌasi tˌukampˈika mwanˈaŋɡu na kˈumla. sˈiku ˌilijˌofuˈata nˌikamwambˈia, m̩tˈoe mwanˈao ˌili tupˈate kˈumla. lakˈini akˈawa ˌamemfˈitʃa.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno ja jˈule mwanˈamke, ˌalirarˈua mavˈazi jˈake. nˌaje ˌalipˌoendelˈea kˌutembˈea ˌukutˈani, wˈatu wˌakamtazˈama, na ndˈani ja mavˈazi jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia mwilˈini mwˈake.|0
ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu na ˌanitendˈee hˈivjo na kuzˈidi, ikˈiwa kˈitʃwa tʃa elˈiʃa mwˈana wa ʃafˈati kˌitabˈaki ɟˌuːja mabˈeɡa jˌake lˈeo.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, elˈiʃa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈake, akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wazˈee. mfˈalme ˌakatˈuma mɟˈumbe kˌumtaŋɡulˈia, lakˈini kˈabla hˌaɟafˈika, elˈiʃa ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale wazˈee, hammwˈoni hˈuju mˌuuˈaɟi ɟˈinsi ˌanavjotˈuma ˈm̩tu kukˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu? tazˈama, wakˈati mɟˈumbe hˈujo ˌatakˌapofˈika, fuŋɡˈeni mlˈaŋɡo na mzˌuiˈeni ˌasiiŋɡˈie. ɟˈe, viʃˈindo vja ɲˈajo za bwˈana wˌake havˈiko ɲˈuma jˈake.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali bˈado ˌanazuŋɡˈumza nˈao, mɟˈumbe ˌakamfikˈia. nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, maˈafa hˈaja jˌanatˈoka kwa bwˈana. kwa nˈini nˌiendelˈee kumŋɡˈoɟa bwˈana zaˈidi.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, sˌikilˈiza nˈeno la bwˈana. hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: wakˈati kˌama hˈuu kˈeʃo, kipˈimo kimˈoɟa tʃa ˈuŋɡa mzˈuri kˌitaˈuzwa kwa ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa ja fˈeða, na vibˈaba viwˈili vja ʃajˈiri kwa ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa ja fˈeða katˌika lˈaŋɡo la sˌamarˈia.|0
jˈule afˈisa ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˌueɡemˈea mkˈono wˌake ˌakamwambˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, tazˈama, hˌata kˌama bwˈana ˌatafuŋɡˈua mˌadirˈiʃa ja mbiŋɡˈuni, ɟˈe, ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitawˌezekˈana? elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌutaˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe, lakˈini wˌewe hˌutakˈula tʃotʃˈote kˈati ja hˈivjo.|0
bˌasi kˌulikuwˈepo na wˈatu wˈanne wˌeɲe ukˈoma katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi. wˌakaˌambiˈana, kwa nˈini tukˈae hˈapa mpˈaka tˈufe.|0
kˌama tˌukisˈema, tˌutaiŋɡˈia mɟˈini, mɟˈini kˈuna ɲɟˈaa, nˌasi tˌutakˈufa hˈumo. kˌama tˌukikˈaa hˈapa, tˌutakˈufa. kwa hˈijo twˈende kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja wˌaarˈamu na tˌuɟisˌalimˈiʃe. kˌama wˌakituˈatʃa hˈai, tˌutaˈiʃi; kˌama wˌakituˈua, bˌasi na tˈufe.|0
wakˈati wa ɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni, wˌakaondˈoka na kwˈenda kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja wˌaarˈamu. wˌalipofˈika mwˈanzo wa kˈambi, hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalilifˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi la wˌaarˈamu lˌisikˈie saˈuti kˌama ja maɡˈari ja vˈita, farˈasi na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, kiˈasi kwˌamba wˌaliˌambiˈana, tazˈama, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌameaɟˈiri mfˈalme wa wahˈiti na mfˈalme wa wamˈisri kˈuɟa kˌutuʃˌambulˈia sˈisi.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakaondˈoka na kˌukimbˈia wakˈati wa ɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni na kuˈatʃa mahˈema jˈao, farˈasi wˌao na pˈunda wˈao. wˌakakimbˈia kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈao na kuˈatʃa kˈila kˈitu ndˈani ja kˈambi kˌama kˌilivjokˈuwa.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌeɲe ukˈoma wˌalipofˈika mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈambi, wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe mˌoɟawˈapo ja mahˈema. wakˈala na kˈuɲua, na kˌutʃukˈua fˈeða, ðahˈabu na ŋɡˈuo, wˌakaˈenda kˌuvifˈitʃa. wˌakarˈudi na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika hˈema ɟiŋɡˈine, na kˌutʃukˈua baˈaði ja vˈitu kutˈoka ndˈani jˌake na kˌuvifˈitʃa pˈia.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaˌambiˈana, hˈili tˌunalˌolifˈaɲa sˈio ɟˈema. hˌii ni sˈiku ja habˈari ɲɟˈema, nˌasi tˌunakˈaa kˈimja. kˌama tˌukisubˈiri mpˈaka mˌapambazˈuko, maˈafa jˌatatupˈata. twendˈeni mˈara mˈoɟa tˌukatˈoe habˈari hˈizi katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
hˈivjo wˌakaˈenda mɟˈini na kˌuwaˈita walˈinzi wa laŋɡˈoni, wˌakawˌaambˈia, tˌulikwˈenda katˌika kˈambi ja wˌaarˈamu lakˈini hˌapakuwˈepo na ˈm̩tu hˌuko, hˌata saˈuti ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote, ˈila farˈasi na pˈunda wˌaliofˈuŋɡwa na mahˈema jˌalijoˈatʃwa kˌama jˌalivjokˈuwa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaˈamka usˈiku na kˌuwaambˈia mˌaafˈisa wˈake, nˌitawˌaambˈia kˈile wˌaarˈamu wˌalitʃˌotufaɲˈia. wˌanaɟˈua kwˌamba tˈuna ɲɟˈaa, hˈivjo wˌameˈatʃa kˈambi jˈao ˌili kˌuɟifˈitʃa mˌaʃambˈani, wˌakifikˈiri, kwa hakˈika wˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, nˌasi tˌutawˌakamˈata wakˈiwa hˈai na kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi..|0
ndˈipo wˌakatʃaɡˈua maɡˈari mawˈili ja vˈita pamˈoɟa na farˈasi wˈake, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakawatˈuma wˌafuˌatilˈie ɟˈeʃi la wˌaarˈamu. ˌakawˌaamˈuru wˌaendeʃˈaɟi ˌakisˈema, nendˈeni mkaˈone ni nˈini kˌilitʃˌotokˈea.|0
wˌakawˌafuatˈia hˌadi jordˈani, nˌao wˌakakˈuta bˌarabˈara jˈote ikˈiwa ˌimetˌapakˈaa ŋɡˈuo na vjˈombo vja wˌaarˈamu wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamevitˈupa wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanatorˈoka. bˌasi wˈale waɟˈumbe wˌakarˈudi na kutˈoa tˌaarˈifa kwa mfˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌakatˈoka na kutˈeka ɲˈara kˈambi ja wˌaarˈamu. kwa hˈijo kipˈimo tʃa ˈuŋɡa mzˈuri kˌikaˈuzwa kwa ʃekˈeli, na vipˈimo viwˈili vja ʃajˈiri kwa ʃekˈeli, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈeka jˈule afˈisa ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˌueɡemˈea mkˈono wˌake ˈawe msˌimamˈizi wa lˈaŋɡo. nˌao wˈatu wˌakamkaɲˈaɡa wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia laŋɡˈoni, nˌaje akˈafa, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌametˌaŋɡulˈia kusˈema wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipofˈika ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
jˈule afˈisa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, tazˈama, hˌata kˌama bwˈana ˌatafuŋɡˈua mˌadirˈiʃa ja mbiŋɡˈuni, ɟˈe, ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitawˌezekˈana? nˌaje jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemɟˈibu, ˌutaˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe, lakˈini wˌewe hˌutakˈula tʃotʃˈote kˈati ja hˈivjo.|0
ndˈivjo hˈasa ˌilivjˌotokˈea kwˈake, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˌalimkaɲˈaɡa laŋɡˈoni, nˌaje akˈafa.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, elˈiʃa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia jˈule mwanˈamke ambˈaje mwanˈawe ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˌufulˈiwa, ondˈoka wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈako ˌukaˈiʃi mahˈali popˈote ˌunapowˈeza kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌameamˈuru ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ambˈajo ˌitadˈumu kwa miˈaka sˈaba.|0
jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama vˈile jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjosˈema. jˌeje na ɟamˈaa jˌake wˌakaondˈoka na kwˈenda kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti kwa miˈaka sˈaba.|0
mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌanazuŋɡˈumza na ɡehˈazi, mtumˈiʃi wa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, hˈebu nˌiambˈie mˈambo jˈote makˈuu jˌalijofˈaɲua na elˈiʃa.|0
wakˈati ɡehˈazi ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakimwelˈeza mfˈalme ɟˈinsi elˈiʃa ˌalivjˌomfufˈua ˈm̩tu, jˈule mwanˈamke ambˈaje mwanˈawe ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˌufulˈiwa na elˈiʃa akˈaɟa ˌili amsˈihi mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba jˌake na ʃˈamba lˈake. ɡehˈazi ˌakasˈema, hˈuju n̩dˈije hˈujo mwanˈamke, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, na hˈuju n̩dˈije mwanˈawe ambˈaje elˈiʃa ˌalimfufˈua.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈule mwanˈamke kuhˈusu mˈambo hˈajo, nˌaje ˌakamwelˈeza. ndˈipo ˌakaamˈuru afˈisa ˌaʃuɣˌulikˈie ʃaˈuri lˈake na kˌumwambˈia, mrˌudiʃˈie hˈuju mwanˈamke kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa mˈali jˈake, pamˈoɟa na mapˈato jˈote jˌalijˌotokˈana na ʃˈamba lˈake ʃˈu sˈiku ˌalipˌoondˈoka n̩tʃˈini hˌadi sˈasa.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda damˈeski, nˌaje bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalikˈuwa mɡˈoɲɟua. mfˈalme ˌalipˌoambˈiwa, ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌametˈoka mbˈali ˌakapˈanda hˌadi hˈapa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia hˌazaˈeli. tʃukˈua zawˈadi na uˈende kumlˈaki hˈujo ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. mˌuulˈize bwˈana kˌupitˈia jˈeje, kwˌamba, ɟˈe, nˌitapˈona uɡˈoɲɟua hˈuu?.|0
hˌazaˈeli ˌakaˈenda kumlˈaki elˈiʃa, akˈiwa ˌametʃukˈua zawˈadi ja kˈila kˈitu kizˈuri kˌilitʃˌopatikˈana damˈeski, mizˈiɡo ˌilijobˈebwa na ŋɡamˈia ˌarobaˈini. ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈake, ˌakasˈema, mwanˈao bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌamenitˈuma nˌiulˈize, ɟˈe, nˌitapˈona uɡˈoɲɟua hˈuu?.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie, hakˈika ˌutapˈona; lakˈini bwˈana ˌamenˌifunulˈia kwˌamba kwˈeli ˌatakˈufa.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamkazˈia hˌazaˈeli mˈatʃo kwa ŋɡˈuvu mpˈaka ˌakaˈona aˈibu. kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈanza kulˈia.|0
hˌazaˈeli ˌakaulˈiza kwa nˈini bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌanalˈia? elˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu naɟˈua mabˈaja ˌutakˌajowˌatendˈea wˌaisraˈeli. ˌutatʃˈoma mˈoto ŋɡˈome zˈao, ˌutawaˈua viɟˈana wˌao kwa upˈaŋɡa, kˌuwatˈupa tʃˈini kwa ŋɡˈuvu watˈoto watʃˈaŋɡa, na kˌuwatumbˈua wˌanawˈake wˌeɲe mˈimba.|0
hˌazaˈeli ˌakasˈema, ˌitawˌezekanˈaɟe mtumˈiʃi wˈako, alˈije ˈm̩bwa tˈu, kufˈaɲa tˈendo la aɟˈabu nˈamna hˈijo? elˈiʃa ˌakamɟˈibu, bwˈana ˌamenˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa ˌutakˈuwa mfˈalme wa arˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa hˌazaˈeli ˌakamwˈatʃa elˈiʃa na kˌumrudˈia bwˈana wˈake. bˈen hadˈadi ˌakamˌuulˈiza, elˈiʃa ˌalikˌuambˈia nˈini? hˌazaˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌalinˌiambˈia kwˌamba hakˈika ˌutapˈona.|0
lakˈini kˈeʃo jˌake hˌazaˈeli ˌakatʃukˈua ŋɡˈuo nzˈito, ˌakaˌilowˈeka ndˈani ja mˈaɟi, ˌakaˌitandˈaza ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mfˈalme, hˈivjo akˈafa. kˈiʃa hˌazaˈeli ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme wa arˈamu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈano wa jorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, wakˈati hˈuo jˌehoʃafˈati akˈiwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, jˌehorˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaˈanza kˌutawˈala kˌama mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na miwˈili ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka minˈane.|0
ˌakaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu ˌilivjokˈuwa ˌimefˈaɲa, kwa kˌuwa ˌalimwˈoa bˈinti wa ahˈabu. ˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈake, bwˈana hˌakutˈaka kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza jˈuda. ˌalikˈuwa ˌameahˈidi kˌuidumˈiʃa tˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi na wazˈao wˌake milˈele.|0
wakˈati wa jˌehorˈamu, edˈomu wˌaliˈasi ðˈidi ja jˈuda na kˌuɟiwekˈea mfˈalme wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
hˌadi lˈeo edˈomu wˌameˈasi ðˈidi ja jˈuda. lˈibna pˈia wˌakaˈasi wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehorˈamu na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa jorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌahazˈia mwˈana wa jˌehorˈamu mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌakaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu, na kutˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu ˌilivjokˈuwa ˌimefˈaɲa, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈoa kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu.|0
ˌahazˈia ˌakaˈenda vitˈani na jorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu kˌupiɡˈana na hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu hˌuko rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi. wˌaarˈamu wˌakamɟerˈuhi jorˈamu.|0
nabˈii elˈiʃa ˌakamwˈita ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa mˌanabˈii na kˌumwambˈia, ɟikˈaze viˈuno, ˌuitʃukˈue hˌii tʃˈupa ja mafˈuta, na uˈende rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi.|0
ˌukifˈika hˌuko, mtafˈute jˈehu mwˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati, mwˈana wa nˈimʃi. ˈenda kwˈake, umtˈeŋɡe na wenzˈake, na ˌumpelˈeke katˌika tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani.|0
kˈiʃa tʃukˈua hˌii tʃˈupa na ˌumimˈine mafˈuta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, nˌawe ˌutaŋɡˈaze, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌinakutˈia mafˈuta ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli. kˈiʃa ˌufuŋɡˈue mlˈaŋɡo na ˌukimbˈie; ˌusikawˈie.|0
bˌasi jˈule kiɟˈana nabˈii ˌakaˈenda rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi.|0
wakˈati ˌalipofˈika, ˌakawakˈuta mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi wˌamekˈeti pamˈoɟa, ˌakasˈema, nˈina uɟˈumbe wˈako, ˈee ɟˌemadˈari. jˈehu ˌakaulˈiza, kwa jˈupi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu? ˌakamɟˈibu, kwˈako wˈewe, ɟˌemadˈari.|0
jˈehu ˌakainˈuka na kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba. ndˈipo jˈule nabˈii ˌakamimˈina mafˈuta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈehu na kˌutaŋɡˈaza, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌinakutˈia mafˈuta ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa bwˈana, jaˈani ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌinakupˈasa ˌuiˌaŋɡamˈize ɲˈumba ja bwˈana wˈako ahˈabu, nˌami nˌitalipˈiza kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii na dˈamu ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa bwˈana ˌilijomwˈaɡwa na jˌezebˈeli.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu kˌuwa kˌama ˈile ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, na kˌama ˈile ɲˈumba ja baˈaʃa mwˈana wa ahˈija.|0
kuhˈusu jˌezebˈeli, ˈm̩bwa watˈamla kwˈeɲe kiwˈaɲɟa hˌuko jˌezreˈeli, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajemzˈika.  kˈiʃa ˌakafuŋɡˈua mlˈaŋɡo na kˌukimbˈia.|0
jˈehu ˌalipotˈoka ɲɟˈe na kurˈudi kwˈenda kwa mˌaafˈisa wenzˈake, mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, kˈila kˈitu ni salˈama? kwa nˈini hˈuju mwˌeɲe wazˈimu ˌalikˈuɟa kwˈako? jˈehu ˌakaɟˈibu, wˌewe ˌunamfahˈamu hˈujo ˈm̩tu, na aˈina ja mˈambo ambˈajo jˌeje husˈema.|0
wˌakasˈema, hˈijo sˈijo kwˈeli! tˌuambˈie. jˈehu ˌakasˈema, hˈaja n̩dˈijo ˌalijˌoniambˈia: hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌinakutˈia mafˈuta ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli..|0
wˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kuvˈua mavˈazi jˈao, na kˌujatandˈaza tʃˈini ja jˈehu ˌili ˌakaɲˈaɡe ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi ja ɲɟˈe. kˈiʃa wˌakapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na kupˈaza saˈuti wˌakisˈema, jˈehu ni mfˈalme.|0
bˌasi jˈehu mwˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati, mwˈana wa nˈimʃi, ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja jorˈamu. wakˈati hˈuu, jorˈamu na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiilˈinda rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi ðˈidi ja hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme jorˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamerudˈiʃwa jˌezreˈeli ˌili kˌuɟiuɡˈuza kˌutokˈana na mˌaɟerˈaha ambˈajo wˌaarˈamu wˌalimtˈia katˌika vˈita na hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu. jˈehu ˌakasˈema, kˌama hˌii n̩dˈijo nˈia jˈenu, msˌimruhˈusu hˌata mmˈoɟa kˌutorˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi kwˈenda kˌupelˈeka habˈari hˌuko jˌezreˈeli.|0
ndˈipo jˈehu ˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika ɡˈari lˈake la vˈita na kˌuendˈeʃa kwˈenda jˌezreˈeli, kwa sabˈabu jorˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepumzˈika hˌuko, na ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈenda kumwˈona.|0
mlˈinzi ˌalijˌesimˈama ɟˌuːja kinˈara tʃa jˌezreˈeli ˌalipoˈona askˈari wa jˈehu wˌanakˈuɟa, ˌakaˈita ˌakisˈema, naˈona askˈari wˌanakˈuɟa. jorˈamu ˌakaamˈuru, m̩twˈae mpˈanda farˈasi umtˈume ˌakakutˈane nˌao na kˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, mmekˈuɟa kwa amˈani?.|0
mpˈanda farˈasi ˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda kˌukutˈana na jˈehu na kusˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo mfˈalme: ɟˈe, mmekˈuɟa kwa amˈani?  jˈehu ˌakamɟˈibu, ˈuna nˈini na amˈani? ˈuŋɡa msafˈara ɲˈuma jˈaŋɡu. mlˈinzi ˌakatˈoa habˈari, mɟˈumbe ˌamewˌafikˈia lakˈini harˈudi.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakamtˈuma mpˈanda farˈasi wa pˈili. wakˈati ˌalipˌowafikˈia ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo mfˈalme, ɟˈe, mmekˈuɟa kwa amˈani?  jˈehu ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈuna nˈini na amˈani? ˈuŋɡa msafˈara ɲˈuma jˈaŋɡu.|0
jˈule mlˈinzi ˌakatˈoa tˌaarˈifa ˌakasˈema, mɟˈumbe ˌamewˌafikˈia, lakˈini hˌata jˌeje harˈudi. ˌuendeʃˈaɟi ˈule ni kˌama wa jˈehu mwˈana wa nˈimʃi, ˌanaendˈeʃa kˌama mwˌeɲe wazˈimu.|0
jorˈamu ˌakaaɡˈiza, ˌakasˈema, wˈeka tajˈari ɡˈari lˈaŋɡu la vˈita. na baˌada ja ɡˈari kˌuwa tajˈari, jorˈamu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, na ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, wˌakaondˈoka kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake ˌili kˌukutˈana na jˈehu. wˌalikutˈana nˌaje katˌika ʃˈamba lˌililokˈuwa mˈali ja nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli.|0
jorˈamu ˌalipomwˈona jˈehu ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, jˈehu, ˌumekˈuɟa kwa amˈani? jˈehu ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌunawezˈaɟe kˌuwa na amˈani wakˈati ibˈada za sanˈamu na utʃˈawi wa mˈama jˈako jˌezebˈeli ˌuŋɡalˈiko.|0
jorˈamu ˌakaɡeˈuka ɲˈuma na kˌukimbˈia, ˌakimwambˈia ˌahazˈia, hˈuu ni ˌuhaˈini, ˌahazˈia.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakatwˈaa upˈinde wˌake na kumtʃˈoma jorˈamu kˌatikˈati ja mabˈeɡa. mʃˈale ˌukapˈeɲa kwˈeɲe mˈojo wˈake, nˌaje ˌakaaŋɡˈuka ɣafˈula ndˈani ja ɡˈari lˈake.|0
jˈehu ˌakamwambˈia bidkˈari, mwˌendeʃˈaɟi wa ɡˈari lˈake, mwinˈue na umtˈupe katˌika ʃˈamba lˌililokˈuwa mˈali ja nabˈoθi, mjˌezreˈeli. kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi mˌimi na wˌewe tˌulivjokˈuwa tˌukiendˈeʃa pamˈoɟa maɡˈari jˈetu ɲˈuma ja ahˈabu bˈaba jˈake, wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipotˈoa ˌunabˈii hˈuu kumhˈusu.|0
ɟˈana nˌiliˈona dˈamu ja nabˈoθi na dˈamu ja wanˈawe, nˌami kwa hakˈika nˌitakufˈaɲa ˌuilˈipe ɟˌuːja ʃˈamba hˈili, asˈema bwˈana. sˈasa bˈasi, mwinˈue na umtˈupe ɟˌuːja kiwˈaɲɟa, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
wakˈati ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalipoˈona kˌilitʃˌotokˈea, ˌakakimbˈia kˌupitˈia bˌarabˈara ja bˈeθ haɡˈani. jˈehu ˌakamkimbˈiza ˌakipˈaza saˈuti na kusˈema, muˈue nˌaje pˈia! wˌakamɟerˈuhi katˌika ɡˈari lˈake kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ˌielˌekeˈajo ɡˈuri karˈibu na ˌibleˈamu, lakˈini ˌakatˌorokˈea meɡˈido na ˌakafˈia hˌuko.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakambˈeba kwa ɡˈari la vˈita na kˌumpelˈeka jˌerusalˈemu, wˌakamzˈika pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake kwˈeɲe kabˈuri lˈake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa wa jorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu, ˌahazˈia ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala katˌika jˈuda..|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakaˈenda jˌezreˈeli. jˌezebˈeli ˌalipˌosikˈia habˈari hˌii, ˌakajapˈaka mˈatʃo jˌake rˈaŋɡi, ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ɲuˈele zˌake na kˌutazˈama ɲɟˈe dˌiriʃˈani.|0
jˈehu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiiŋɡˈia laŋɡˈoni, jˌezebˈeli ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, ˌumekˈuɟa kwa amˈani, zˈimri, wˌewe mˌuuˈaɟi wa bwˈana wˈako.|0
jˈehu ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia ɟˈuu dˌiriʃˈani na kuˈita, ɟˈe, ni nˈani alˈije upˈande wˈaŋɡu? ni nˈani? mˌatowˈaʃi wawˈili ˌau watˈatu wˌakamtazˈama.|0
jˈehu ˌakasˈema, mtupˈeni hˈujo mwanˈamke tʃˈini! kwa hˈijo wˌakamtˈupa tʃˈini, nˈajo baˈaði ja dˈamu jˌake ˌikatˌapaɲˈika ˌukutˈani na ɲiŋɡˈine ɟˌuːja farˈasi wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakimkaɲˈaɡa kwa miɡˈuu jˈao.|0
jˈehu ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani, akˈala na akˈaɲua. ˌakasˈema, mʃˌuɣulˌikiˈeni hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌalijˌelaanˈiwa. mzikˈeni, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa bˈinti wa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini wˌalipotˈoka kwˈenda kumzˈika, hˌawakukˈuta kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa fˈuvu la kˈitʃwa, miɡˈuu jˌake na mikˈono.|0
wˌakarˈudi na kˌumwambˈia jˈehu, ambˈaje ˌalisˈema, hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilosˈema kˌupitˈia kˈiɲua tʃa mtumˈiʃi wˌake elˈija mtˈiʃbi, kwˌamba: katˌika kiwˈaɲɟa tʃa jˌezreˈeli, ˈm̩bwa wˌataikˈula ɲˈama ja jˌezebˈeli.|0
maˈiti ja jˌezebˈeli ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mˈavi ʃambˈani katˌika uwˈaɲɟa wa jˌezreˈeli, kwˌamba hˌakutˌakuwˈepo ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˈeza kusˈema, hˈuju n̩dˈije jˌezebˈeli..|0
wakˈati hˈuu katˌika sˌamarˈia wˌalikuwˈepo wˈana sabˈini wa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu. kwa hˈijo jˈehu ˌakaandˈika barˈua na kˌuzitˈuma sˌamarˈia: kwa mˌaafˈisa wa jˌezreˈeli, kwa wazˈee, na kwa walˈezi wa watˈoto wa ahˈabu. ˌakasˈema.|0
mˈara tu barˈua hˌii ˌitakˌapokˌufikˈia, kwa kˌuwa wˈana wa bwˈana wˈako wˈapo pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌawe ˈuna maɡˈari ja vˈita na farˈasi, ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na silˈaha.|0
mtʃaɡˈue mwˌeɲe uwˈezo zaˈidi kˈati ja wˈana wa bwˈana wˈako, na umwˈeke ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa bˈaba jˈake. kˈiʃa ˌupiɡˈane kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana wˈako.|0
lakˈini wˌakaoɡˈopa sˈana na kusˈema, ikˈiwa wafˈalme wawˈili hˌawakuwˈeza kˌupambˈana na jˈehu, sˌisi tˌutawezˈaɟe.|0
bˌasi msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi, na wazˈee na walˈezi wˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa jˈehu: sˌisi tu wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, na tˌutafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌutakˌatʃosˈema. hˌatutˌamteˈuwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote kˌuwa mfˈalme. wˌewe fˈaɲa ˌuonˈalo kˌuwa ni bˈora.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakawˌaandikˈia barˈua ja pˈili, ˌakisˈema, ikˈiwa nˈiɲi ˈm̩ko upˈande wˈaŋɡu na mtˌanitˈii mˈimi, twaˈeni vˈitʃwa vja wˈana wa bwˈana wˈenu, na mniɟˈie hˈuku jˌezreˈeli kˈeʃo wakˈati kˌama hˈuu. wakˈati hˈuo wˈana sabˈini wa mfˈalme wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈm̩ɟi wa sˌamarˈia, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiwalˈea.|0
hˈijo barˈua ˌilipˌowafikˈia, wˈatu hˈawa wˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈale wˈana sabˈini wa mfˈalme na kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa wˈote. wˌakawˈeka vˈitʃwa vjˈao ndˈani ja makˈapu na kˌumpelekˈea jˈehu hˌuko jˌezreˈeli.|0
mɟˈumbe ˌalipofˈika, ˌakamwambˈia jˈehu, wˌamelˈeta vˈitʃwa vja wˈana wa mfˈalme. ndˈipo jˈehu ˌakaaɡˈiza, vˌiwekˈeni malˈundo mawˈili katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi.|0
ˌasubˈuhi jˈake, jˈehu ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe. ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈote na ˌakasˈema, hˈamna hatˈia. ni mˌimi nˌilijefˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na kˌumuˈua, lakˈini ni nˈani ˌalijˌewaˈua wˈote hˈawa.|0
fˌahamˈuni bˌasi kwˌamba, hakˈuna nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamesˈema ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu ambˈalo hˌalitˌatimˈia. bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa lˈile ˌalilˌoahˈidi kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake elˈija.|0
hˈivjo jˈehu ˌakaˈua kˈila ˈm̩tu hˌuko jˌezreˈeli ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamebˈaki wa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu, ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wˈake, rafˈiki zˌake wa karˈibu, na mˌakuhˈani wˈake. hˌakuˈatʃa jejˈote ˌanusurˈike.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakaondˈoka kˌuelekˈea sˌamarˈia. ˌalipokˈuwa ɲɟiˈani karˈibu na ɲˈumba ja kˌukatˈia maɲˈoja ja kondˈoo, jaˈani, bˈeθ ekˈedi ja watʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo.|0
jˈehu ˌakakutˈana na wˈatu wa ɟamˈaa ja ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ˌakaulˈiza, nˈiɲi ni nˈani? wˌao wˌakasˈema, sˌisi ni ɟamˈaa ja ˌahazˈia, nˌasi tˌumeʃˈuka kˌuwasalˈimu ɟamˈaa ja mfˈalme na ja mˈama malkˈia.|0
baˌada ja kˌuondˈoka hˈapo, ˌalimkˈuta jˌehonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakiˈenda kumlˈaki. jˈehu ˌakamsalˈimu na kusˈema, ɟˈe, mˈojo wˈako ni mɲˈofu kwˈaŋɡu kˌama mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ulˈivjo kwˈako? jˌehonadˈabu ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo. jˈehu ˌakasˈema, kˌama ndˈivjo, nˈipe mkˈono wˈako. jˌeje akˈampa mkˈono, nˌaje jˈehu ˌakampandˈiʃa kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake la vˈita.|0
jˈehu ˌakasˈema, twˈende pamˈoɟa ˌukaˈone wˈivu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana. hˈivjo wˌakasafˈiri pamˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake.|0
jˈehu ˌalipofˈika sˌamarˈia, ˌakawaˈua wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesalˈia wa ɟamˈaa ja ahˈabu, ˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilosˈema kˌupitˈia elˈija.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakawalˈeta wˈatu wˈote pamˈoɟa na kˌuwaambˈia, ahˈabu ˌalimtˌumikˈia baˈali kidˈoɡo. lakˈini jˈehu ˌatamtˌumikˈia zaˈidi.|0
sˈasa wˌaitˈeni mˌanabˈii wˈote wa baˈali, wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote na mˌakuhˈani wˌake wˈote. hˌakikiʃˈeni kwˌamba hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajekˌosekˈana, kwa sabˈabu nˌinakwˈenda kutˈoa kafˈara kˈubwa sˈana kwa baˈali. jejˈote ˌatakˌajeʃˈindwa kˈuɟa hˌataˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi. lakˈini jˈehu ˌalifˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa hˈila ˌili apˈate kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa baˈali.|0
jˈehu ˌakasˈema, ˌitiʃˈeni kˌusaɲˈiko kwa heʃˈima ja baˈali. bˌasi wˌakataŋɡˈaza ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote, nˌao wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa baˈali wakˈaɟa, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ambˈaje hˌakufˈika. wˌakasoŋɡˈana ndˈani ja hekˈalu la baˈali hˌadi lˌikaɟˈaa ʃˈu mlˈaŋɡo hˌadi mwˈiʃo wˈake.|0
nˌaje jˈehu ˌakamwambˈia jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa mtˈunza tʃˈumba tʃa mavˈazi, lˈeta maɟˈoho kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa baˈali. bˌasi ˌakawˌaletˈea maɟˈoho.|0
kˈiʃa jˈehu na jˌehonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hekˈalu la baˈali. jˈehu ˌakawˌaambˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wa baˈali, tˌazamˈeni kˈila mahˈali mhˌakikˈiʃe kwˌamba hakˈuna hˌata mtumˈiʃi mmˈoɟa wa bwˈana alˈije hˈapa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, ˈila ni wˌatumˈiʃi wa baˈali tˈu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ˌili kutˈoa kafˈara na sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa. wakˈati hˈuu, jˈehu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewawˈeka wˈatu wˌake θˌemanˈini akˈiwa ˌamewˈapa ˈoɲo kwˌamba, ikˈiwa mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatamwatʃˈia ˈm̩tu jejˈote nˌinajemwˈeka mˌikonˈoni mwˈake ˌatorˈoke, ˌitakˈuwa uhˈai wˈako kwa uhˈai wˈake.|0
mˈara baˌada ja jˈehu kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, ˌakawˌaamˈuru walˈinzi na mˌaafˈisa: ˌiŋɡiˈeni ndˈani, wˌauˈeni; ˌasitorˈoke hˌata mmˈoɟa. bˌasi wˌakawˌakatakˈata kwa upˈaŋɡa. walˈinzi na mˌaafˈisa wˌakazitˈupa zˈile maˈiti ɲɟˈe, kˈiʃa wˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa ndˈani pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika hekˈalu la baˈali.|0
wˌakailˈeta ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja kˌuabudˈiwa ɲɟˈe ja hekˈalu la baˈali, na wˌakaitʃˈoma mˈoto.|0
wˌakabomˈoa ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja kˌuabudˈiwa ja baˈali pamˈoɟa na hekˈalu la baˈali, nˌao wˈatu wˌakapafˈaɲa kˌuwa tʃˈoo hˌadi lˈeo.|0
kwa hˈijo jˈehu ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈiza kˌuabudˈiwa kwa baˈali katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, jˈehu hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, jaˈani kˌuabˈudu ndˈama za ðahˈabu hˌuko beθˈeli ja dˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia jˈehu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumefˈaɲa vjˈema kwa kˌutimˈiza jalˈijo sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, na ˌumetˈenda kwa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu jˈale jˈote nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimekˌusudˈia kutˈenda, wazˈao wˈako wˌatakˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ˌisraˈeli hˌadi kizˈazi tʃa ˈn̩ne.|0
lakˈini jˈehu hakˈuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kuʃˈika ʃerˈia za bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote. hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu, ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, bwˈana ˌakaˈanza kˌupuŋɡˈuza ukˈubwa wa ˌisraˈeli. hˌazaˈeli ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌaisraˈeli sehˈemu zˈote za ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
mˌaʃarˈiki ja jordˈani, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja ɡˌileˈadi enˈeo la ɡˈadi, rˌeubˈeni na manˈase, kutˈoka ˌaroˈeri karˈibu na bˈonde la arnˈoni kˌupitˈia ɡˌileˈadi hˌadi baʃˈani.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˈehu, jˈote ˌalijofˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˌake jˈote, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˈehu ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko sˌamarˈia. nˌaje jˌehoahˈazi mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
mˈuda jˈehu ˌaliˌotawˈala ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli hˌuko sˌamarˈia ˌilikˈuwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na minˈane.|0
wakˈati ˌaθalˈia mamˈaje ˌahazˈia ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa mwanˈawe ˌamekˈufa, ˌakainˈuka na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza ɟamˈaa jˈote ja mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃˈeba, bˈinti wa mfˈalme jˌehorˈamu, ˌalijekˈuwa pˈia dˈada jˌake ˌahazˈia, ˌakamtwˈaa joˈaʃi mwˈana wa ˌahazˈia kwa sˈiri kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈana wa mfˈalme wˌaliokˈuwa karˈibu kˌuuˈawa. ˌakamwˈeka joˈaʃi pamˈoɟa na jˈaja wˌake ndˈani ja tʃˈumba tʃa kulˈala na kumfˈitʃa hˈumo ˌili ˌaθalˈia ˌasimwˈone; kwa hˈijo hˌakuuˈawa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba, jˌehojˈada ˌakatˌumanˈia wakˈuu wa vikˈundi vja mamˈia, na wakˈari, na walˈinzi, nˌao wˌakalˈetwa kwˈake katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana. ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano nˌao na kˌuwaapˈiʃa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana. ndˈipo ˌakawˌaoɲˈeʃa mwˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
ˌakawˌaamˈuru ˌakisˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌiwapasˈavjo kufˈaɲa: nˈiɲi ambˈao ˈm̩ko makˈundi matˈatu mnˌaoiŋɡˈia zˈamu sˈiku ja sabˈato, θelˈuθi jˈenu ˌinajolˈinda ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
nˌaɲi ambˈao ˈm̩ko katˌika makˈundi meŋɡˈine mawˈili ambˈao kwa kˌawaˈida hˌupumzˈika sabˈato, wˈote mtalˈinda hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme.|0
ɟˌipaŋɡˈeni kˌumzuŋɡˈuka mfˈalme, kˈila ˈm̩tu akˈiwa na silˈaha jˌake mkonˈoni. jejˈote ˌanajˌesoɡelˈea sˈafu zˈenu lazˈima ˌauˈawe. kaˈeni karˈibu na mfˈalme popˈote ˌaendˈapo.|0
wˈale walˈinzi, kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa na silˈaha jˌake mkonˈoni mwˈake, wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa kˌumzuŋɡˈuka mfˈalme, karˈibu na mˌaðabˈahu na hekˈalu, kˌuanzˈia upˈande wa kusˈini hˌadi upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa hekˈalu.|0
jˌehojˈada ˌakamtˈoa mwˈana wa mfˈalme na kumvˈika tˈaɟi, akˈampa nakˈala ja aɡˈano, na kˌumtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa mfˈalme. wˌakamtˈia mafˈuta, nˌao wˈatu wˌakapˈiɡa makˈofi na kupˈaza saˈuti, wˌakisˈema, mfˈalme aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
ˌaθalˈia ˌalipˌosikˈia kelˈele ˌilijofˈaɲua na walˈinzi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu, ˌakawˌaendˈea wˈatu pˈale pˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia, na tazˈama ˌalikuwˈako mfˈalme, akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡˈuzo, kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa destˈuri. mˌaafˈisa na wapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta wˌalikˈuwa pembˈeni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌalikˈuwa wˌakifurˈahi na kupˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta. ndˈipo ˌaθalˈia ˌakararˈua mavˈazi jˌake na kulˈia, ˌuhaˈini! ˌuhaˈini.|0
bˌasi wˌakamkamˈata ˌaθalˈia, na ˌalipofˈika mahˈali ambˈapo farˈasi hˌuiŋɡilˈia katˌika viwˈaɲɟa vja ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, wˌakamˌuulˈia hˈapo.|0
kˈiʃa jˌehojˈada ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano kˈati ja bwˈana na mfˈalme na wˈatu kwˌamba wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wa bwˈana. ˌakafˈaɲa pˈia aɡˈano kˈati ja mfˈalme na wˈatu.|0
pamˈoɟa nˌaje ˌakawˌatʃukˈua mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, wakˈari, walˈinzi na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao kwa pamˈoɟa wˌakamterˈemʃa mfˈalme kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana na kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, wˌakiˌiŋɡilˈia ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo la walˈinzi. ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakatʃukˈua nafˈasi jˌake kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi.|0
joˈaʃi ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka sˈaba ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa jˈehu, joˈaʃi ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka ˌarobaˈini. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa sibˈia, kutˈoka bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
joˈaʃi ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana miˈaka jˈote ambˈajo jˌehojˈada kuhˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌakimwˌelekˈeza.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa. wˈatu wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko.|0
joˈaʃi ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌakuhˈani, kˌusaɲˈeni fˈeða zˈote ambˈazo zˌitalˈetwa kˌama sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana, jaˈani fˈeða zˌilizˌokusˈaɲua kˌama kˈodi, fˈeða zˌilizˌopokelˈewa kˌutokˈana na naðˈiri za wˈatu binˈafsi, na fˈeða zˌilizolˈetwa kwa hiˈari hˌekalˈuni.|0
kˈila kuhˈani na ˌapokˈee fˈeða kutˈoka kwa mmˈoɟa wa watˈunza hazˈina, nˈazo zˌitumˈike kˌukarabˈati ˌuharibˈifu wowˈote ˌunaˌoonekˈana katˌika hekˈalu.|0
lakˈini ikˈawa kˌufikˈia mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wˌake mfˈalme joˈaʃi, mˌakuhˈani wˌalikˈuwa bˈado hˌawaɟˌalikˌarabˈati hekˈalu.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme joˈaʃi ˌakamwˈita jˌehojˈada kuhˈani na mˌakuhˈani weŋɡˈine, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini hˌamteŋɡenˈezi ˌuharibˈifu ˌuliˌofaɲˈika hˌekalˈuni? msˌitʃukˈue fˈeða zaˈidi kutˈoka kwa watˈunza hazˈina wˈenu kwa aɟˈili ja mˌatumˈizi jˈenu, lakˈini kˌuanzˈia sˈasa ni lazˈima fˈeða jˈote ˌitumˈike kwa aɟˈili ja kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌakakubˈali kˌuwa hˌawatˌakusˈaɲa tˈena fˈeða kutˈoka kwa wˈatu na kwˌamba hˌawatˌakarabˈati hekˈalu weɲˈewe.|0
jˌehojˈada kuhˈani ˌakatʃukˈua kˌisandˈuku na ˌakatobˈoa tˈundu kwˈeɲe kˌifunˈiko tʃˈake. ˌakakiwˈeka kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu upˈande wa kulˈia ˌunapˌoiŋɡˈia hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana. mˌakuhˈani wˌaliolˈinda ˌiŋɡilˈio wˌakawˈeka ndˈani ja kˌisandˈuku fˈeða zˈote ambˈazo zˌililˈetwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kˈila mˈara wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa kˈuna kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa fˈeða ndˈani ja kˌisandˈuku, mwandˈiʃi wa mfˈalme na kuhˈani m̩kˈuu wˌalikˈuɟa, wˌakazˌihesˈabu fˈeða hˈizo zˌilizolˈetwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, na kˌuziwˈeka katˌika mifˈuko.|0
wˌakiˈiʃa kˌuθibitˈiʃa kiˈasi tʃa hˈizo fˈeða, wˌaliwˈapa wˈatu wˌaliˌoteulˈiwa kˌusimamˈia kˈazi katˌika hekˈalu. kwa fˈeða hˈizo, wˌakawalˈipa wˈale wˈatu wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana: jaˈani, mˌaseremˈala na waɟˈenzi.|0
waˈaʃi na wakˈata mˈawe. wˌalinunˈua m̩bˈao na mˈawe ja kutʃˈoŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌukarabˈati wa hekˈalu la bwˈana, na kˌulipˈia ɣarˈama ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote za kˌulitˌeŋɡenˈeza.|0
fˈeða zˌilizolˈetwa kwˈeɲe hekˈalu hˌazikˌutumˈiwa kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌasinˈia ja fˈeða, mikˈasi ja kˌusawˌaziʃˈia tˈambi, mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, tˌarumbˈeta wˈala vjˈombo viŋɡˈine vjovjˈote vja ðahˈabu ˌau fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
zˌililˈipwa kwa wˌafaɲakˈazi, ambˈao wˌalizˌitumˈia kwa kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu.|0
wˌao hˌawakudˈai kupˈewa hesˈabu ja fˈeða kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˌaliowˈapa ˌili kˌuwalˈipa wˌafaɲakˈazi, kwa sabˈabu wˌalifˈaɲa kwa ˌuaminˈifu wˈote.|0
fˈeða zˌilizˌopatikˈana kˌutokˈana na sadˈaka za hatˈia na sadˈaka za ðˈambi hˌazikulˈetwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana; zˌilikˈuwa mˈali ja mˌakuhˈani.|0
wakˈati hˈuu hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakapˈanda kˌuiʃˌambulˈia ɡˈaθi, ˌakaitˈeka. kˈiʃa ˌakaɡeˈuka ˌili kˌuiʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakavˌitʃukˈua vjˈombo vjˈote vˌitakatˈifu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu na bˈaba zˈake, jaˈani jˌehoʃafˈati, jˌehorˈamu na ˌahazˈia, wafˈalme wa jˈuda, zawˈadi ambˈazo jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌalikˈuwa ˌameziwˈeka wˈakfu pamˈoɟa na ðahˈabu jˈote ˌilijokˈutwa katˌika hazˈina za hekˈalu la bwˈana na katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, ˌakazˌipelˈeka kwa hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu, ambˈaje hˌatimˈaje ˌaliondˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌaliˌomuˈua wˌalikˈuwa jˌozabˈadi mwˈana wa ʃˌimeˈaθi, na jˌehozabˈadi mwˈana wa ʃomˈeri. akˈafa na ˌakazˈikwa pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. nˌaje ˌamazˈia mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa joˈaʃi mwˈana wa ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, jˌehoahˈazi mwˈana wa jˈehu ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala ˌisraˈeli katˌika sˌamarˈia, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala miˈaka kˈumi na sˈaba.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana kwa kˌufuˈata ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, na wˈala hˌakuziˈatʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli na kwa mˈuda mrˈefu ˌakawawˈeka tʃˈini ja ˌutawˈala wa hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu, na bˈen hadˈadi mwanˈawe.|0
ndˈipo jˌehoahˈazi ˌakamsˈihi bwˈana rehˈema, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamsˌikilˈiza, kwa maˈana ˌaliˈona ɟˈinsi mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakiwatˈesa ˌisraˈeli vikˈali.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtˈoa mwokˈozi kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wˌakaokˈoka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mamlˈaka ja arˈamu. hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈumba zˈao weɲˈewe kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa hˈapo awˈali.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu, ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, bˌali wˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuzitˈenda. ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera pˈia ˌiliˌendelˈea kˌusimˈama katˌika sˌamarˈia.|0
hˌapakubˈaki kˈitu tʃotʃˈote katˌika ɟˈeʃi la jˌehoahˈazi ˌisipokˈuwa wapˈanda farˈasi hamsˈini, maɡˈari kˈumi ja vˈita na askˈari wa miɡˈuu ˈelfu kˈumi, kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaaŋɡamˈiza hˈao weŋɡˈine na kˌuwafˈaɲa kˌama mavˈumbi wakˈati wa kupˈura nafˈaka.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoahˈazi jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˈake, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda, jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala ˌisraˈeli hˌuko sˌamarˈia, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, na hˌakuˈatʃa ðˈambi jojˈote kˈati ja zˈile za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda, bˌali ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌuzitˈenda.|0
na kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoˈaʃi, jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˈake, pamˈoɟa na vˈita jˌake ðˈidi ja ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, elˈiʃa ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˈumwa na uɡˈoɲɟua ambˈao bˌaadˈaje ˌulimuˈua. jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaʃˈuka kwˈenda kumwˈona na kˌumlilˈia. ˌakalˈia, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! bˈaba jˈaŋɡu! maɡˈari ja vˈita ja ˌisraˈeli na wapˈanda farˈasi wˈake.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, lˈeta upˈinde na baˈaði ja miʃˈale, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ʃˈika upˈinde mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. ˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌuitʃukˈua, elˈiʃa ˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˌake ɟˌuːja mikˈono ja mfˈalme.|0
elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, fuŋɡˈua dirˈiʃa la mˌaʃarˈiki, nˌaje ˌakalˌifuŋɡˈua. elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, pˈiɡa mʃˈale! nˌaje ˌakapˈiɡa mʃˈale. elˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, mʃˈale wa uʃˈindi wa bwˈana, mʃˈale wa uʃˈindi ɟˌuːja arˈamu! ˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌaarˈamu kabˈisa hˌuko afˈeki.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakasˈema, tʃukˈua miʃˈale, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakaˌitʃukˈua. elˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia, pˈiɡa ˈarði kwa hˈijo miʃˈale. ˌakaipˈiɡa mˈara tˈatu, halˈafu ˌakaˈatʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamkˌasirikˈia na ˌakasˈema, ˌuŋɡepˈiɡa tʃˈini mˈara tˈano ˌau sˈita, ndˈipo ˌuŋɡeiʃˈinda arˈamu na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa. lakˈini sˈasa ˌutaiʃˈinda mˈara tˈatu tˈu.|0
elˈiʃa akˈafa, nˌao wˌakamzˈika. vikˈosi vja wˌamoˈabu vˌilikˈuwa vˌinaʃˌambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi kwa vˈita kˈila mwˈaka wakˈati wa vˈuli.|0
ikˈawa wˌaisraˈeli fulˈani wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanamzˈika ˈm̩tu, ɣafˈula wˌakaˈona kikˈosi tʃa wˌaʃambˌuliˈaɟi, bˌasi wˌakaitˈupa ˈile maˈiti ja jˈule ˈm̩tu ndˈani ja kabˈuri la elˈiʃa. wakˈati ˈile maˈiti ˌilipoɡˈusa mifˈupa ja elˈiʃa, jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakafufˈuka na kˌusimˈama kwa miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌaliwatˈesa ˌisraˈeli wakˈati wˈote wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoahˈazi.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakawˌarehˈemu na ˌakawˌahurumˈia, ˌakaoɲˈeʃa kˌuɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃa nˌao kwa sabˈabu ja aɡˈano lˈake na ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo. hˌadi lˈeo, hˌaɟawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈala kˌuwafukˈuza mbˈele zˈake.|0
kˈiʃa jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi ˌakatˈeka tˈena kutˈoka kwa bˈen hadˈadi mwˈana wa hˌazaˈeli ˈile mˈiɟi ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameitwˈaa kwa vˈita kutˈoka kwa bˈaba jˌake jˌehoahˈazi. jˌehoˈaʃi ˌalimʃˈinda mˈara tˈatu, hˈivjo ˌakawˈeza kˌuitˈeka tˈena ˈile mˈiɟi ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌamazˈia mwˈana wa joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌakatˈenda jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, lakˈini sˈio kˌama daˈudi bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa. katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌalifuˈata mfˈano wa joˈaʃi bˈaba jˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa. wˈatu wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hˌakuwaˈua wˈana wa wˈale wˌauˈaɟi, sˌawasˈawa na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈose ambˈako bwˈana ˌaliamˈuru, bˈaba hˌawatˌauˈawa kwa aɟˈili ja watˈoto wˈao, wˈala watˈoto kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba zˈao. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
n̩dˈije ˌaliwaʃˈinda wˌaedˈomu ˈelfu kˈumi katˌika bˈonde la tʃˈumvi, na ˌakautˈeka sˈela katˌika vˈita, nˌaje ˌakauˈita jˌokθeˈeli, ɟˈina ambˈalo ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo unˈalo hˌadi lˈeo.|0
kˈiʃa ˌamazˈia ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi, mwˈana wa jˈehu, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakisˈema, ɲɟˈoo, tˌuonˈane ˈuso kwa ˈuso.|0
lakˈini jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda: mbarˈuti ˌuliokˈuwa lˌebanˈoni ˌulitˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa mwerˈezi ˌuliokˈuwa lˌebanˈoni, m̩tˈoe bˈinti jˈako ˌaolˈewe na mwanˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa mɲˈama wa mwitˈuni ˌalijekˈuwa lˌebanˈoni akˈaɟa na kˌuukaɲˈaɡa ˈule mbarˈuti.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ˌamazˈia hˌakusikˈia, hˈivjo jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaʃˌambulˈia. jˌeje na ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌakakutˈana ˈuso kwa ˈuso hˌuko bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi katˌika jˈuda.|0
jˈuda ˌikaʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakakˌimbilˈia ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamtˈeka ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mwˈana wa joˈaʃi, mwˈana wa ˌahazˈia, hˌuko bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi. kˈiʃa jˌehoˈaʃi ˌakaˈenda jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuubomˈoa ukˈuta wa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuanzˈia lˈaŋɡo la ˌefraˈimu hˌadi lˈaŋɡo la pembˈeni, sehˈemu jˌeɲe urˈefu wa kˌama ðirˈaa mˌiaˈn̩ne.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua ðahˈabu jˈote na fˈeða na vjˈombo vjˈote vˌilivjˌopatikˈana ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na katˌika hazˈina zˈote za ɟˈumba la mfˈalme. ˌakatʃukˈua pˈia matˈeka na ˌakarˈudi sˌamarˈia.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoˈaʃi, ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˈake, pamˈoɟa na vˈita vjˈake ðˈidi ja ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˌehoˈaʃi ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, ˌakazˈikwa sˌamarˈia pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje jˌeroboˈamu mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
ˌamazˈia mwˈana wa joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka kˈumi na mitˈano baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ˌamazˈia, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
wˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja ˌamazˈia hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje ˌakakˌimbilˈia lakˈiʃi, lakˈini wˌakawatˈuma wˈatu wˌamfuˌatilˈie hˌuko lakˈiʃi, nˌao wˌakamˌuulˈia hˌuko.|0
ˌakarudˈiʃwa kwa farˈasi na ˌakazˈikwa hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda wˌakamtʃukˈua ˌazarˈia ˌalijekˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita, na kumfˈaɲa mfˈalme mahˈali pa bˈaba jˌake ˌamazˈia.|0
n̩dˈije ˌaliiɟˈeŋɡa tˈena elˈaθi na kˌuirudˈiʃa kwa jˈuda baˌada ja ˌamazˈia kulˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈano wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌamazˈia mwˈana wa joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda, jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala hˌuko sˌamarˈia, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na mmˈoɟa.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, na hˌakuˈatʃa ðˈambi hˌata mˈoɟa ja jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
n̩dˈije ˌalirˌudiʃˈia mipˈaka ja ˌisraˈeli kˌuanzˈia lˈebo hamˈaθi hˌadi bahˈari ja arˈaba, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, lˌililosˈemwa kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˌake jˈona mwˈana wa ˌamitˈai, nabˈii kutˈoka ɡˈaθ hefˈeri.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˈona ɟˈinsi kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika ˌisraˈeli, ˈawe mtˈumwa ˌau alˈije hˈuru, ˌalivjˌotesˈeka kwa utʃˈuŋɡu; hˌapakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌuwasˌaidˈia.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟasˈema kˌuwa ˌatafˈuta ɟˈina la ˌisraˈeli tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu, ˌakawˌaokˈoa kwa mkˈono wa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoˈaʃi.|0
kwa mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu, jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa na mˌafanikˈio jˌake ja kiɟˈeʃi, ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌorudˈiʃa damˈeski na hamˈaθi kwa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa mˈali ja jˈuda, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka hamsˈini na miwˈili. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jˌekolˈia wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakatˈenda jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama ˌamazˈia bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa. wˈatu wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko.|0
bwˈana ˌakampˈiɡa mfˈalme kwa ukˈoma mpˈaka sˈiku ˌalijokˈufa, nˌaje ˌaliˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈumba ˌilijotˈeŋɡwa pˈeke jˈake. joθˈamu mwˈana wa mfˈalme akˈawa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, na ˌakawˌatawˈala wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ˌazarˈia na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌazarˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa jˌeroboˈamu akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli katˌika sˌamarˈia, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala miˈezi sˈita.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama bˈaba zˌake wˌalivjofˈaɲa. hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa jabˈeʃi ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja zˌekarˈia. ˌakamʃˌambulˈia mbˈele ja wˈatu, ˌakamuˈua na kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa zˌekarˈia jˌameandˈikwa kwˈeɲe kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililonˈenwa kwa jˈehu lˌikatimˈia, kwˌamba, wazˈao wˈako wˌatakˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ˌisraˈeli hˌadi kizˈazi tʃa ˈn̩ne.|0
ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa jabˈeʃi akˈawa mfˈalme katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na tˈisa wa uzˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala katˌika sˌamarˈia kwa mwˈezi mmˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa mˌenahˈemu mwˈana wa ɡˈadi ˌakaˈenda kutˈoka tˈirsa mpˈaka sˌamarˈia. ˌakamʃˌambulˈia ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa jabˈeʃi hˌuko sˌamarˈia, ˌakamuˈua na kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ʃalˈumu, na mˌauˈaɟi ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na tˈisa wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌazarˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mˌenahˈemu mwˈana wa ɡˈadi akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakatawˈala hˌuko sˌamarˈia kwa miˈaka kˈumi.|0
ˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. katˌika wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wˌake wˈote, hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
kˈiʃa pˈulu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakaˌiʃambulˈia ˌisraˈeli. mˌenahˈemu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli akˈampa talˈanta ˈelfu mˈoɟa za fˈeða ˌili ˌamsaidˈie na kˌumwezˈeʃa katˌika ˌutawˈala wˈake.|0
mˌenahˈemu ˌakatˈoza fˈeða hˈizi kwa ŋɡˈuvu kutˈoka kwa ˌisraˈeli. kˈila ˈm̩tu taɟˈiri ˌalilˌazimˈika kutʃˈaŋɡa ʃekˈeli hamsˈini za fˈeða ambˈazo ˌalipˈewa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru. bˌasi mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakaɟˌiondˈoa na hˌakuˌendelˈea kˌuikalˈia ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa mˌenahˈemu na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa hamsˈini wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌazarˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, pˌekahˈia mwˈana wa mˌenahˈemu akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli hˌuko sˌamarˈia, ˌakatawˈala miˈaka miwˈili.|0
pˌekahˈia ˌakafˈaɲa uˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wˌake wakˈuu, pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia, ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˈake. ˌakatʃukˈua wˈatu hamsˈini wa ɡˌileˈadi pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌakamuˈua pˌekahˈia, pamˈoɟa na arɡˈobu na arˈia, katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme hˌuko sˌamarˈia. kwa hˈijo pˈeka ˌakamuˈua pˌekahˈia, nˌaje ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa pˌekahˈia na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa hamsˈini na mbˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌazarˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli hˌuko sˌamarˈia, nˌaje ˌalitawˈala miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana. hˌakuziˈatʃa ðˈambi za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈazo ˌalisˌababˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌuzitˈenda.|0
wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa pˈeka mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌalikˈuɟa na kutˈeka ijˈoni, ˈabel bˈeθ maˈaka, janˈoa, kedˈeʃi na hazˈori. ˌakatˈeka mˈiɟi ja ɡˌileˈadi na ɡˌalilˈaja, pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja naftˈali, na kˌuwahˌamiʃˈia wˈatu wˈote aʃˈuru.|0
kˈiʃa hoʃˈea mwˈana wa ˈela ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia. ˌakamʃˌambulˈia na kˌumuˈua, kˈiʃa ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌuwa mfˈalme katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini wa joθˈamu mwˈana wa uzˈia.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, joθˈamu mwˈana wa uzˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jerˈuʃa bˈinti sadˈoki.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama uzˈia bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa. wˈatu wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba hˌuko. joθˈamu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja lˈaŋɡo la ɟˈuu la hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa joθˈamu na jˈale ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, bwˈana ˌakaˈanza kˌuwatˈuma resˈini mfˈalme wa arˈamu na pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia ðˈidi ja jˈuda..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia, ahˈazi mwˈana wa joθˈamu mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌakaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, na hˌata ˌakamtˈoa mwanˈawe kafˈara katˌika mˈoto, ˌakifuˈata ɲɟˈia za mˌatʃukˈizo za mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejˌafukˈuza mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ˌakatˈoa kafˈara na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, ɟˌuːja vilˈima, na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda.|0
kˈiʃa resˈini mfˈalme wa arˈamu na pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu na kˌumzuŋɡˈuka ahˈazi kwa ɟˈeʃi, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kumʃˈinda.|0
wakˈati ˈule, resˈini mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌakaˌurudˈiʃa elˈaθi kwa arˈamu kwa kˌuwafukˈuza wˈatu wa jˈuda. kˈiʃa wˌaedˈomu wˌakahamˈia elˈaθi, nˌao wˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
ahˈazi ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌumwambˈia tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru kwˌamba, mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi na mtˈumwa wˈako. ɲɟˈoo na ˌuniokˈoe kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa arˈamu na wa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈao wˌananˌiʃambulˈia.|0
nˌaje ahˈazi ˌakatʃukˈua fˈeða na ðahˈabu zˌilizˌopatikˈana ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na katˌika hazˈina ja ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, na kˌuzitˈuma kˌama zawˈadi kwa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakamwˌitikˈia kwa kˌuʃambulˈia damˈeski na kˌuitˈeka. ˌakawˌahamiʃˈia weɲˈeɟi wˌake hˌuko kˈiri, na kˌumuˈua resˈini.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakaˈenda damˈeski kˌukutˈana na tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri wa aʃˈuru. ˌakaˈona mˌaðabˈahu hˌuko damˈeski, nˌaje ˌakamtumˈia urˈia kuhˈani mtʃˈoro wa hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu, pamˈoɟa na mˌaelˈezo ja mpˈaŋɡo kamˈili wa uɟˈenzi wˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo urˈia kuhˈani ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu kˌuliŋɡˈana na mipˈaŋɡo jˈote ambˈajo mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌalikˈuwa ˌameitˈuma kutˈoka damˈeski, na ˌakamalˈiza uɟˈenzi kˈabla ja mfˈalme ahˈazi kurˈudi.|0
mfˈalme ˌaliporˈudi kutˈoka damˈeski na kuˈona hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu, ˌakajˌasoɡelˈea na kutˈoa sadˈaka ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, ˌakamimˈina sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi na kˌuɲuɲizˈia dˈamu ja sadˈaka zˌake za amˈani ɟˌuːja hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu.|0
mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakajˌaondˈoa mˌaðabˈahu ja zamˈani ja ʃˈaba kutˈoka hˈapo mbˈele ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, jˌalijokˈuwa jˌamesimˈama kˈati ja ˌiŋɡilˈio la hekˈalu na hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu mˈapja, nˌaje ˌakajawˈeka upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu mˈapja.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakatˈoa ˈamri zˌifuatˈazo kwa urˈia kuhˈani: ɟˌuːja hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu kˈubwa mˈapja, tˈoa sadˈaka ja ˌasubˈuhi ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka ja ɟiˈoni ja nafˈaka, sadˈaka ja mfˈalme ja kˌuteketˈezwa pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˌake ja nafˈaka, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka jˈao ja nafˈaka na sadˈaka jˈao ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi. ˌuɲuɲˈize ɟˌuːja hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu dˈamu jˈote ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu. lakˈini mˌimi nˌitatumˈia hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu ja zamˈani ja ʃˈaba kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutafˈuta ˌuoŋɡˈozi.|0
nˌaje urˈia kuhˈani ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakaondˈoa m̩bˈao za pembˈeni na kˌuondˈoa mˌasinˈia kwˈeɲe vˈile vˌiʃikilˈio vˌilivjˌohamiʃˈika. ˌakaondˈoa ˈile bahˈari kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌafahˈali wa ʃˈaba wˌaliˌoiʃˌikilˈia, na kˌuiwˈeka kwˈeɲe kitˈako tʃa ɟˈiwe.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa ahˈazi na jˈale ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa ahˈazi mfˈalme wa jˈuda, hoʃˈea mwˈana wa ˈela akˈawa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli katˌika sˌamarˈia, ˌakatawˈala kwa miˈaka tˈisa.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, lakˈini si kˌama wafˈalme weŋɡˈine wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌomtaŋɡulˈia.|0
mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakaˌiʃambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, ˌakapiɡˈana ðˈidi ja sˌamarˈia na kˌuizuŋɡˈuka kwa maɟˈeʃi miˈaka mitˈatu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈisa wa hoʃˈea, mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakaitˈeka sˌamarˈia na kˌuwahˌamiʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko aʃˈuru. ˌakawawˈeka hˌuko hˈala, na ɡozˈani karˈibu na ˈm̩to habˈori, na katˌika mˈiɟi ja wamˈedi.|0
jˈote hˈaja jˌalitokˈea kwa sabˈabu wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri ˌakiwatˈoa tʃˈini ja ˌutawˈala wa ŋɡˈuvu wa farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri. wˌaliabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
na kˌufuˈata destˈuri za mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈao, pamˈoɟa na destˈuri ambˈazo wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalizilˈeta.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakafˈaɲa vˈitu kwa sˈiri ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, ambˈavjo hˌavikˈuwa sˈawa. kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe mnˈara wa ulˈinzi hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe mabˈoma wˌaliɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea weɲˈewe mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao jˈote.|0
wˌakawˈeka mˈawe ja kˌuabudˈiwa na ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera ɟˌuːja kˈila kilˈima kirˈefu na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda.|0
wˌakafukˈiza uvˈumba kˈila mahˈali pˌalipˌoinˈuka, kˌama jˌalivjofˈaɲa jˈale mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈao. wˌakafˈaɲa mˈambo maˈovu ambˈajo jˌalimɣˌaðibˈiʃa bwˈana.|0
wˌakaabˈudu sanˈamu, iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, msifˈaɲe mˈambo hˈaja.|0
bwˈana ˌakawaˈoɲa ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda kˌupitˈia kwa mˌanabˈii na wˌaonˈaɟi wˌake wˈote: atʃˈeni ɲɟˈia zˈenu m̩bˈaja. ʃikˈeni ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu, kˌufuatˈana na ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu jˈote nˌilijˌowaaɡˈiza bˈaba zˈenu kˌuitˈii ambˈajo nˌiliilˈeta kwˈenu kˌupitˈia kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌusikilˈiza, wˌalikˈuwa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu kˌama bˈaba zˈao, ambˈao hˌawakˌumteɡemˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
wˌalizˌikatˈaa ˈamri zˈake, na aɡˈano ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamelifˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈao, na maˈoɲo ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamewˈapa. wˌakafuˈata sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa, nˌao weɲˈewe wakˈawa hˌawafˈai. wˌakajaˈiɡa mˌataˈifa jˌalijˌowazuŋɡˈuka, iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaˈoɲa ˌakiwˌaambˈia, msifˈaɲe kˌama wˌanavjofˈaɲa, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa mˈambo ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌakatˈaza wˌasifˈaɲe.|0
wˌakajaˈatʃa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈote ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao na kˌuɟitˌeŋɡenezˈea sanˈamu mbˈili, wˌalizˌozisˈubu katˌika sˈura ja ndˈama na ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera. wˌakasˌuɟudˈia miˈaŋɡa jˈote ja aŋɡˈani, na wˌakamtˌumikˈia baˈali.|0
wˌakawatˈoa kafˈara wˈana wˌao na mabˈinti zˈao katˌika mˈoto. wˌakafˈaɲa ˌuaɡˈuzi na utʃˈawi, nˌao wˌakaɟiˈuza weɲˈewe katˌika kutˈenda uˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, wˌakamɣˌaðibˈiʃa.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakawˌakasˌirikˈia sˈana ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwaondˈoa kwˈeɲe uwˈepo wˈake. ni kabˈila la jˈuda tu lˌililobˈaki.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌaliwˌakatˈaa wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli; ˌakawatˈesa na kˌuwaatʃˈia katˌika mikˈono ja watˈeka ɲˈara hˌadi ˌalipˌowaondˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe uwˈepo wˈake.|0
ˌalipokwˈiʃa kˌuwatˈeŋɡa ˌisraˈeli mbˈali na ɲˈumba ja daˈudi, wˌakamfˈaɲa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati kˌuwa mfˈalme wˈao. jˌeroboˈamu ˌakawˌaʃawˈiʃi ˌisraˈeli waˈatʃe kˌumfuˈata bwˈana na ˌakawˌasababˈiʃa kutˈenda ðˈambi kˈuu.|0
nˌao ˌisraˈeli wˌakadˈumu katˌika ðˈambi zˈote za jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, nˌao hˌawakˌuziˈatʃa.|0
hˌadi bwˈana ˌalipˌowaondˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe uwˈepo wˈake, kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameˈoɲa kˌupitˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote mˌanabˈii. hˈivjo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈao kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni aʃˈuru, nˌao wˈako hˌuko mpˈaka sˈasa.|0
mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakawalˈeta wˈatu kutˈoka babˈeli, kˈuθa, ˈava, hamˈaθi na sˌefarvaˈimu na kˌuwawˈeka katˌika mˈiɟi ja sˌamarˈia badˈala ja wˌaisraˈeli. wˌakaˌimilˈiki sˌamarˈia na kuˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈake.|0
wakˈati wˌaliˈanza kuˈiʃi hˈumo, hˌawakˌumwabˈudu bwˈana, kwa hˈijo ˌakatˈuma sˈimba mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, wˌakawaˈua baˈaði ja wˈatu.|0
habˈari ˌikapelˈekwa kwa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, kusˈema: wˈatu ˌuliˌowahamˈiʃa na kˌuwawˈeka katˌika mˈiɟi ja sˌamarˈia hˌawaɟˈui kˈile mˈuŋɡu wa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo ˌanatʃˌokitˈaka. ˌametˈuma sˈimba mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, ambˈao wˌanawaˈua, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu hˌawaɟˈui ˌanatʃˌokitˈaka.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakaamˈuru hˈivi: m̩twˈae mmˈoɟa wa mˌakuhˈani ˌuliˌowatʃukˈua matˈeka kutˈoka sˌamarˈia ˌili arˈudi kuˈiʃi hˈumo na ˌawafundˈiʃe wˈatu kˈile ambˈatʃo mˈuŋɡu wa ˈn̩tʃi ˌanatˈaka.|0
bˌasi mmˈoɟa wa mˌakuhˈani ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni kutˈoka sˌamarˈia akˈaɟa kuˈiʃi beθˈeli na kˌuwafundˈiʃa ɟˈinsi ja kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˈila kikˈundi tʃa taˈifa lˌililolˈetwa sˌamarˈia kˌilitˌeŋɡenˈeza miˈuŋɡu jˈao weɲˈewe katˌika mˈiɟi kaðˈaa mahˈali wˌalipoˈiʃi, nˌao wˌakaiwˈeka mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu ambˈapo wˈatu wa sˌamarˈia wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka babˈeli wˌakamtˌeŋɡenˈeza sˈukoθ benˈoθi kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, wˈatu kutˈoka kˈuθa wˌakamtˌeŋɡenˈeza nerɡˈali, na wˈatu kutˈoka hamˈaθi wˌakamtˌeŋɡenˈeza aʃˈima.|0
waˈavi wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza nibhˈazi na tartˈaki, nˌao wˌasefˈarvi wˌakatʃˈoma watˈoto wˌao kˌama kafˈara kwa ˌadramelˈeki na ˌanamelˈeki, miˈuŋɡu ja sˌefarvaˈimu.|0
wˌalimwabˈudu bwˈana, lakˈini pˈia wˌaliˌitumikˈia miˈuŋɡu jˈao kˌuliŋɡˈana na destˈuri za mˌataˈifa wˌalikotˈoka.|0
mpˈaka lˈeo wˌanaʃˌikilˈia destˈuri zˈao za zamˈani. hˌawamwabˈudu bwˈana wˈala kˌuziʃˈika hukˈumu na mˌaaɡˈizo, ʃerˈia na ˈamri ambˈazo bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa uzˈao wa jakˈobo, ambˈaje ˌalimwˈita ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipofˈaɲa aɡˈano na wˌaisraˈeli, ˌaliwˌaamˈuru ˌakisˈema: msˌiiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine jojˈote wˈala kˌuisˌuɟudˈia, wˈala kˌuitˌumikˈia wˈala kˌuitolˈea ðabˈihu.|0
bˌali ˌimewapˈasa kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana ˌalijˌewapandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri kwa uwˈezo wˌake m̩kˈuu na kwa mkˈono wˌake ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa. kwˈake jˌeje mtˌasuɟˈudu na kwˈake jˌeje mtatˈoa ðabˈihu.|0
ˌimewapˈasa daˈima kˌuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈunza hukˈumu na mˌaaɡˈizo, ʃerˈia na ˈamri ˌalizˌowaˌandikˈia. msˌiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
msˌisahˈau aɡˈano nˌililofˈaɲa nˈaɲi, wˈala msˌiabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
bˌali, mtˌamwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kwˈani jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajewˌakombˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈenu wˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo hˌawakˌusikilˈiza, lakˈini wˌaliˌendelˈea na destˈuri zˈao za awˈali.|0
hˌata wakˈati wˈatu hˈawa wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanamwabˈudu bwˈana, wˌalikˈuwa bˈado wˌakitˌumikˈia sanˈamu zˈao. mpˈaka lˈeo watˈoto wˌao na watˈoto wa watˈoto wˌao wˌanaˌendelˈea kufˈaɲa kˌama bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa hoʃˈea mwˈana wa ˈela mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, hˌezekˈia mwˈana wa ahˈazi mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na tˈisa. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa abˈija bˈinti zˌekarˈia.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama daˈudi bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
ˌakapˌaondˈoa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, ˌakazivˈuɲɟa sanˈamu, ˌakakˌatakˈata ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera. ˌakavˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande ˈile ɲˈoka ja ʃˈaba mˈose ˌalijˌoteŋɡenˈeza, kwa kˌuwa hˌadi sˈiku hˈizo wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˌifukizˈia uvˈumba ˌilikˈuwa ˌikiˈitwa nˌehuʃtˈani .|0
hˌezekˈia ˌaliwˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈake kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. hˌapakuwˈepo na mfˈalme mwiŋɡˈine wa kˌufanˈana nˌaje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wafˈalme wa jˈuda, kˈabla jˌake ˌau baˌada jˈake.|0
ˌaliʃˌikamˈana na bwˈana kwa bidˈii wˈala hˌakuˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata; ˌaliʃˈika ˈamri ambˈazo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa mˈose.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, ˌakafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kˈila ˌalitʃˌokifˈaɲa. ˌaliˈasi ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, wˈala hˌakumtˌumikˈia.|0
kˌuanzˈia mnˈara wa ulˈinzi hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, ˌaliwaʃˈinda wˌafilˈisti, hˌadi kˌufikˈia ɡˈaza na himˈaja jˌake jˈote.|0
mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa mfˈalme hˌezekˈia, ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa mwˈaka wa sˈaba wa hoʃˈea mwˈana wa ˈela kˌutawˈala ˌisraˈeli, ʃˌalmanˈesa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌalikwˈenda kˌuiʃˌambulˈia sˌamarˈia na kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka kwa maɟˈeʃi.|0
baˌada ja miˈaka mitˈatu wˌaaʃˈuru wˌakautwˈaa. kwa hˈijo sˌamarˈia ˌulitˈekwa katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈita wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme hˌezekˈia, ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa mwˈaka wa tˈisa wa ˌutawˈala wa hoʃˈea mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakawˌahamiʃˈia wˌaisraˈeli hˌuko aʃˈuru na ˌakawawˈeka hˈala, na ɡozˈani karˈibu na ˈm̩to habˈori, na katˌika mˈiɟi ja wamˈedi.|0
hˈili lˌilitokˈea kwa sabˈabu hˌawakumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, lakˈini wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈake, jˈale jˈote ambˈajo mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌaliwˌaamˈuru. hˌawakˌuzisˌikilˈiza ˈamri wˈala kˌuzitimˈiza.|0
bˌasi hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakamtumˈia uɟˈumbe mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru hˌuko lakˈiʃi ˌakisˈema: nˌimefˈaɲa makˈosa. ondˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakulˈipa tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃˌokitˈaka kwˈaŋɡu. mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakamtˈoza hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda talˈanta mˌiatˈatu za fˈeða, na talˈanta θˌelaθˈini za ðahˈabu.|0
bˌasi hˌezekˈia akˈampa fˈeða jˈote ˌilijˌopatikˈana ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na katˌika hazˈina ja ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
wakˈati hˈuu hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakabandˈua ðahˈabu jˈote ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimefunˈika milˈaŋɡo na miˈimo ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, akˈampa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
nˌawe kˌama ˌukinˌiambˈia, tˌunamtˌumainˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu: ɟˈe, sˈijo jˌeje ambˈaje hˌezekˈia ˌaliondˈoa mahˈali pˈake pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu na mˌaðabˈahu zˈake, ˌakiwˌaambˈia jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu, ni lazˈima mwabˈudu mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu hˈaja katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, ɟˈe, nˌimekˈuɟa kˌuʃambulˈia na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza mahˈali hˈapa pasˈipo nˈeno kutˈoka kwa bwˈana? bwˈana mweɲˈewe n̩dˈije ˌalinˌiambˈia nˌiiʃˌambulˈie ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza..|0
lakˈini jˈule ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌakaɟˈibu, ɟˈe, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌamenitˈuma kutˈoa uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa bwˈana wˈenu na kwˈenu tˈu? ɟˈe, hˌakunitˈuma pˈia kwa wˈatu wˌaliokˈeti ˌukutˈani, ambˈao, kˌama nˈiɲi, ˌitawabˈidi kˈula mˈavi jˈao na kˈuɲua mikˈoɟo jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo mfˈalme: msˌikubˈali hˌezekˈia ˌawadaŋɡˈaɲe. hawˈezi kˌuwaokˈoa mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
msˌikubˈali hˌezekˈia ˌawaʃawˈiʃi kˌumtumaˈini bwˈana kwa kˌuwaambˈia, hakˈika bwˈana ˌatatˌuokˈoa. ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu hˌautˌaaŋɡukˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru..|0
ˈiko wˈapi miˈuŋɡu ja hamˈaθi na ja arpˈadi? ˈiko wˈapi miˈuŋɡu ja sˌefarvaˈimu, hˈena na ˈiva? ɟˈe, ˌimeokˈoa sˌamarˈia kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
mfˈalme hˌezekˈia ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈaja, ˌakararˈua ŋɡˈuo zˌake na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia, nˌaje ˌakaˈenda katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
jamkˈini bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatajˌasikˈia manˈeno ja ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, ambˈaje bwˈana wˈake, mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, ˌamemtˈuma kˌumðihˈaki mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai, tˈena kwˌamba ˌatamkemˈea kwa manˈeno ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamejˌasikˈia. kwa hˈijo ˈomba kwa aɟˈili ja mabˈaki ambˈao bˈado wˈako.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme hˌezekˈia wˌalipofˈika kwa isˈaja.|0
isˈaja ˌakawˌaambˈia, mwˌambiˈeni bwˈana wˈenu, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌusioɡˈope kwa hˈajo ˌulijˌojasikˈia, jˈale manˈeno ambˈajo wˌatumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru wˌamenˌitukˈana nˈajo.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌameondˈoka lakˈiʃi, ˌalirˈudi, ˌakamkˈuta mfˈalme ˌakipiɡˈana na lˈibna.|0
mwˌambiˈeni hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda: ˌusikubˈali hˈujo mˈuŋɡu ˌunajˌemtumˌainˈia ˌakudaŋɡˈaɲe wakˈati ˌanaposˈema, jˌerusalˈemu hˌaitatˈiwa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru..|0
ɟˈe, miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa ambˈajo jˌaliˌaŋɡamˈizwa na bˈaba zˈaŋɡu ˌiliwˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa, hˈijo miˈuŋɡu ja ɡozˈani, harˈani, resˈefu, na ja wˈatu wa edˈeni wˌaliokˈuwa tˌelasˈari.|0
jˈuko wˈapi mfˈalme wa hamˈaθi, mfˈalme wa arpˈadi, mfˈalme wa ˈm̩ɟi wa sˌefarvaˈimu, ˌau wa hˈena ˌau wa ˈiva.|0
nˌaje hˌezekˈia ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana ˌakisˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌuketˈije ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˈati ja mˌakerˈubi, wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu ɟˌuːja fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia. wˌewe ˌumeˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
tˈeɡa sikˈio, ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikˈie; fuŋɡˈua mˈatʃo jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, uˈone; sˌikilˈiza manˈeno ambˈajo sˌenakerˈibu ˌametˈuma kˌumtukˈana mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai.|0
ni kwˈeli, ˈee bwˈana, kwˌamba wafˈalme wa aʃˈuru wˌamejˌaaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa hˈaja na ˈn̩tʃi zˈao.|0
wˌameitˈupa miˈuŋɡu jˈao kwˈeɲe mˈoto na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza, kwa kˌuwa hˌaikˈuwa miˈuŋɡu, bˌali mˈiti na mˈawe tu ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌuokˈoe kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌili fˈalme zˈote dˌuniˈani zipˈate kuɟˈua kwˌamba wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe kwa hˌezekˈia, ˌakasˈema: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌimesikˈia maˈombi jˈako kuhˈusu sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamelisˈema ðˈidi jˈake:  bikˈira bˈinti sajˈuni ˌanakˌuðarˈau na kˌukuðihˈaki. bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu ˌanatikˈisa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ˌunapˌokimbˈia.|0
ni nˈani ˌulijˌemtukˈana na kˌumkufˈuru? ni nˈani ˌulijˌeinˈua saˈuti jˈako ðˈidi jˈake, na kˌumwinulˈia mˈatʃo jˈako kwa kibˈuri? ni ðˈidi ja jˈule alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌupitˈia kwa waɟˈumbe wˈako ˌumelundˈika mˌatukˈano ɟˌuːja bwˈana. nˌawe ˌumesˈema, kwa maɡˈari jˈaŋɡu mˈeŋɡi ja vˈita, nˌimepˈanda ɟˌuːja vilˈele vja milˈima, vilˈele vja ɟˈuu sˈana katˌika lˌebanˈoni. nˌami nˌimeˌiaŋɡˈuʃa mˌierˈezi jˌake mirˈefu, mˌisunobˈari jˌake ilˈijo bˈora sˈana. nˌimefikˈia sehˈemu zˌake zilˈizo mbˈali sˈana, misˈitu jˌake ilˈijo mizˈuri sˈana.|0
nˌimetʃˈimba visˈima katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za kiɡˈeni na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˈake. kwa ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu nˌimekaˈuʃa viɟˈito vjˈote vja mˈisri.|0
ɟˈe, hˌuɟasikˈia? zamˈani sˈana nˌiliamˈuru hˈili. sˈiku za kˈale nˌilipˈaŋɡa hˈili; sˈasa nˌimelifˈaɲa lˌitokˈee, kwˌamba ˌumeɡeˈuza mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome kˌuwa malˈundo ja mˈawe.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌunaɣˌaðibˈika ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na ˌufiðˈuli wˈako ˌumefˈika mˌasikiˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌitawˈeka ndoˈana jˈaŋɡu puˈani mwˈako na hatˈamu jˈaŋɡu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa urˈudi kwa ɲɟˈia ˈile ˌulijˌoiɟˈia..|0
bˌasi sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakavˈuɲɟa kˈambi na kˌuondˈoka. ˌakarˈudi ninˈawi na kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakaˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˌake ˌukutˈani, ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi nˌilivjˌoenˈenda mbˈele zˈako kwa ˌuaminˈifu na kˌuɟitˈoa kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pˈako. nˌaje hˌezekˈia ˌakalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈabla isˈaja hˌaɟaondˈoka katˌika ˈua wa kˈati, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia, ˌakaambˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaja ˌakasˈema, tˌeŋɡenezˈeni dˈawa ja kˌubandˈika ja tˈini. wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo na kˌuiwˈeka kwˈeɲe ɟˈipu, nˌaje ˌakapˈona.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemˌuulˈiza isˈaja, kˌutakˈuwa na iʃˈara ɡˈani kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatanipˈoɲa mˈimi, na kwˌamba nˌitapˈanda kwˈenda hekˈalu la bwˈana sˈiku ja tˈatu ʃˈu lˈeo.|0
isˈaja ˌakaɟˈibu, hˌii n̩dˈijo iʃˈara ja bwˈana kwˈako kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa kˈile ˌalitʃˌoahˈidi: ɟˈe, kivˈuli kiˈende hatˈua kˈumi mbˈele, ˌau kivˈuli kirˈudi ɲˈuma hatˈua kˈumi.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakasˈema, ni ɟˈambo rahˈisi kwa kivˈuli kˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele hatˈua kˈumi, kulˈiko kˌukifˈaɲa kirˈudi ɲˈuma hatˈua kˈumi.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii isˈaja ˌakamwˈita bwˈana, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakakifˈaɲa kivˈuli kurˈudi ɲˈuma hatˈua kˈumi ambˈazo kˌilikˈuwa kˌimeʃˈuka kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi ja ahˈazi.|0
wakˈati hˈuo mˌerodˈaki bˌaladˈani, mwˈana wa bˌaladˈani mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌakamtumˈia hˌezekˈia barˈua na zawˈadi, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesikˈia habˈari za kˌuuɡˈua kwa hˌezekˈia.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakawˌapokˈea wˈale waɟˈumbe na kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa vˈitu vjˈote vˈile vˌilivjokˈuwa katˌika ɣˈala zˈake: jaˈani fˈeða, ðahˈabu, vˌikolˈezo na mafˈuta sˈafi, ɣˈala la silˈaha na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa katˌika hazˈina zˈake. hˌapakˈuwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote katˌika ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme ˌau katˌika ufˈalme wˌake wˈote ambˈatʃo hˌezekˈia hˌakuwˌaoɲˈeʃa.|0
ndˈipo isˈaja ˌakamwambˈia hˌezekˈia, sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hakˈika wakˈati ˌunakˈuɟa ambˈapo vˈitu vjˈote katˌika ɟˈumba lˈako la kifˈalme, na vjˈote ambˈavjo bˈaba zˈako wˌaliwˈeka akˈiba mpˈaka sˈiku hˌii, vˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa kwˈenda babˈeli. hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃosalˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakamɟˈibu isˈaja, nˈeno la bwˈana ˌulilosˈema ni ɟˈema. kwa kˌuwa ˌalifikˈiri, lakˈini si pˌatakˈuwa na amˈani na ˌusalˈama wakˈati wa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa hˌezekˈia, mˌafanikˈio jˌake jˈote, na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌoteŋɡenˈeza bwˈawa na mferˈeɟi ambˈao ˌulilˈeta mˈaɟi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, ˌakafuˈata destˈuri za mˌatʃukˈizo za mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalijˌafukˈuza mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, ambˈamo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, katˌika jˌerusalˈemu nˌitaliwˈeka ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika ɲˈua zˈote mbˈili za hekˈalu la bwˈana, ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈeʃi lˈote la aŋɡˈani.|0
ˌakamtˈoa kafˈara mwanˈawe mweɲˈewe katˌika mˈoto, ˌakafˈaɲa utʃˈawi na ˌuaɡˈuzi, na ˌakatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa wapˈiɡa rˈamli na kwa mizˈimu. ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi sˈana matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana na kˌumɣaðibˈiʃa.|0
sˌitaifˈaɲa tˈena miɡˈuu ja wˌaisraˈeli ˌitaŋɡetˈaŋɡe kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao, ikˈiwa wˌatakˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃˌowaamˈuru, na kˌuiʃˈika ʃerˈia jˈote ambˈajo wˌalipˈewa na mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini hˈawa wˈatu hˌawakˌusikilˈiza. manˈase ˌakawˌapotˈoʃa, hˈivjo kwˌamba wˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi kulˈiko mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌalijˌaaŋɡamˈiza mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema kˌupitˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake mˌanabˈii.|0
manˈase mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌametˈenda ðˈambi hˈizi za kˌutʃukˈiza. ˌamefˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi kulˈiko wˌaamˈori wˌaliˌokuwˈepo kˈabla jˈake, na ˌameˌioŋɡˈoza jˈuda katˌika ðˈambi kwa sanˈamu zˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌitalˈeta maˈafa makˈubwa ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda, kiˈasi kwˌamba mˌasikˈio ja kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajesikˈia habˈari zˌake jˌatawˈaʃa.|0
nˌitaɲoˈoʃa ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia ˌilijˌotumˈika ðˈidi ja sˌamarˈia, na timˈazi ˌilijˌotumˈika ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu. nˌitaˌifutilˈia mbˈali jˌerusalˈemu kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌafutˈaje sahˈani, nˌikiifˈuta na kˌuifˌunikˈiza.|0
nˌitawˌakatˈaa mabˈaki wa urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao. wˌatapokˈoɲua mˈali zˈao na kutˈekwa ɲˈara na adˈui zˈao wˈote.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌametˈenda uˈovu matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu na kˌuniɣˌaðibˈiʃa ʃˈu sˈiku bˈaba zˈao wˌalipotˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka sˈiku ja lˈeo.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, manˈase pˈia ˌalimwˈaɡa dˈamu ɲˈiŋɡi isˈijo na hatˈia, hˈivi kwˌamba ˌaliiɟˈaza jˌerusalˈemu kutˈoka mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, mbˈali na ðˈambi ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌababˈiʃa jˈuda kufˈaɲa, na hˈivjo wˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa manˈase, na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, pamˈoɟa na ðˈambi ˌalizotˈenda, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
ˌakatˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kˌama bˈaba jˌake manˈase ˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
ˌakaenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈote za bˈaba jˈake, ˌakaabˈudu sanˈamu ambˈazo bˈaba jˌake ˌalizˌiabˈudu na kˌuzisˌuɟudˈia.|0
