ˌakamwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈake, wˈala hˌakuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za bwˈana.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa amˈoni na jˈale ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
josˈia ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka minˈane ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mmˈoɟa. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jedˈida bˈinti adˈaja, kutˈoka boskˈaθi.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈote za daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. hˌakuɡeˈuka upˈande wa kuˈume wˈala wa kuʃˈoto.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, mfˈalme josˈia ˌakamtˈuma mwandˈiʃi ʃafˈani mwˈana wa ˌazalˈia, mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, kwˈenda katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana. ˌakasˈema.|0
pˈanda uˈende kwa hilkˈia, kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, ˌumwambˈie ˌahesˈabu zˈile fˈeða ambˈazo zˌimelˈetwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, ambˈazo mˌabawˈabu wˌamekusˈaɲa kutˈoka kwa wˈatu.|0
wˌaambˈie wˌaikabˈiði kwa wˈatu wˌaliˌoteulˈiwa kˌusimamˈia kˈazi ja hekˈalu. wˌaamˈuru wˈatu hˈawa wˌawalˈipe wˌafaɲakˈazi ambˈao wˌanakˌarabˈati hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
lakˈini hˌawahˌitaɟˈiki kutˈoa hesˈabu ja fˈeða wˌalizˌokabiðˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu wˌanafˈaɲa kwa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
hilkˈia kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ˌakamwambˈia ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi, nˌimekipˈata kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana. akˈampa ʃafˈani, ambˈaje ˌalikisˈoma.|0
kˈiʃa ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi ˌakamwendˈea mfˈalme na kˈumpa tˌaarˈifa ˌakisˈema: mˌaafˈisa wˈako wˌametˈoa ˈile fˈeða ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na ˌimekˌabiðˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌasimamˈizi wa mˌarekebˈiʃo ja hekˈalu.|0
ndˈipo ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi ˌakampˈaʃa mfˈalme habˈari kwˌamba: hilkˈia kuhˈani ˌamenˈipa kitˈabu hˈiki. nˌaje ʃafˈani ˌakakisˈoma kˈile kitˈabu mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
nendˈeni mkˌamuulˈize bwˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, na kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu na jˈuda wˈote kuhˈusu jˈale jˌalijˌoandˈikwa ndˈani ja kitˈabu hˈiki ambˈatʃo kˌimepˌatikˈana. hasˈira ja bwˈana ni kˈubwa ˌinajowˈaka ðˈidi jˈetu kwa sabˈabu bˈaba zˈetu hˌawakˌujatˈii manˈeno ja kitˈabu hˈiki. hˌawaɟatˈenda kˌuliŋɡˈana na jˈale jˈote jˌalijˌoandˈikwa hˈumo kˌutuhˈusu sˈisi.|0
hilkˈia kuhˈani, ˌahikˈamu, akbˈori, ʃafˈani na asˈaja wˌakaˈenda kˌuoŋɡˈea na nabˈii ˈm̩ke hˈulda, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩ke wa ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa tˈikwa, mwˈana wa harhˈasi mtunzˈaɟi wa tʃˈumba tʃa mavˈazi. hˈulda ˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu katˌika m̩tˈaa wa pˈili.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mwˌambiˈeni jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌewatˈuma nˈiɲi kwˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja mahˈali hˈapa na wˈatu wˈake, kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈitʃo mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalitʃosˈoma.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌameniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, na kˌuniɣˌaðibˈiʃa kwa sanˈamu zˈote zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono jˈao, hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌitawˈaka ðˈidi ja mahˈali hˈapa, wˈala hˌaitˌatulˈizwa..|0
mwˌambiˈeni mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ambˈaje ˌamewatˈuma kˌumuulˈiza bwˈana, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kuhˈusu manˈeno ˌulijˌojasikˈia.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈojo wˈako ˌulikˈuwa msikˈivu na ˌuliɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana ˌulipˌosikˈia kˈile nˌilitʃosˈema ðˈidi ja mahˈali hˈapa na wˈatu wˈake, kwˌamba wˌaŋɡelˌaanˈiwa na kuˈatʃwa ukˈiwa, bˌasi kwa sabˈabu ˌulijˌararˈua mavˈazi jˈako na kulˈia mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, nˌimekˌusikˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitakˌukusˈaɲa kwa bˈaba zˈako, nˌawe ˌutazˈikwa kwa amˈani. mˈatʃo jˈako hˌajataˈona maˈafa jˈote nˌitakˌajolˈeta ɟˌuːja mahˈali hˈapa.  bˌasi wˌakapelˈeka ɟˈibu lˈake kwa mfˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakawaˈita pamˈoɟa wazˈee wˈote wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡˈuzo, na kufˈaɲa ˈupja aɡˈano mbˈele za bwˈana: jaˈani kˌumfuˈata bwˈana na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈake, mˌaaɡˈizo na ʃerˈia kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˌake jˈote, hˈivjo kˌujaθˌibitˈiʃa manˈeno ja aɡˈano jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌakaɟifˈuŋɡa weɲˈewe kwa kiˈapo katˌika aɡˈano.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwamˈuru hilkˈia kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, mˌakuhˈani wˌaliˌomfuˈata kwa tʃˈeo, na mˌabawˈabu kˌuondˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana vjˈombo vjˈote vˌilivjofˈaɲua kwa aɟˈili ja baˈali na aʃˈera na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la miˈaŋɡa ja aŋɡˈani! ˌakavitʃˈoma ɲɟˈe ja jˌerusalˈemu katˌika maʃˈamba ja bˈonde la kidrˈoni, na kˌujatʃukˈua hˈajo maɟˈivu mpˈaka beθˈeli.|0
ˌakawˌafukˈuza mˌakuhˈani wa kˌipaɡˈani wˌaliokˈuwa wˌametˌeulˈiwa na wafˈalme wa jˈuda kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na ˈile ˌilijˌozuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu, jaˈani wˈale wˌaliˌofukˈiza uvˈumba kwa baˈali, kwa ɟˈua na mwˈezi, kwa makˈundi ja ɲˈota, na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la aŋɡˈani.|0
ˌakaˌiondˈoa ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana, na kˌuipelˈeka kwˈeɲe bˈonde la kidrˈoni ɲɟˈe ja jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakaˌiteketˈeza hˌuko. ˌakaisˈaɡa hˌadi ikˈawa ˈuŋɡa na kˌusambˈaza hˌilo vˈumbi ɟˌuːja mˌakabˈuri ja wˈatu wa kˌawaˈida.|0
ˌakabomˈoa pˈia ɲˈumba za mˌahanˈiθi wa mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu, zˌilizokˈuwa ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na mahˈali wˌanawˈake wˌalipofˈuma kwa aɟˈili ja aʃˈera.|0
josˈia ˌakawalˈeta mˌakuhˈani wˈote wa bwˈana kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda, na kˌunaɟˈisi mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, kˌuanzˈia ɡˈeba hˌadi bˈeer ʃˈeba, mahˈali pˈote ambˈapo hˈao mˌakuhˈani wa miˈuŋɡu wˌalifukˈiza uvˈumba. ˌakabomˈoa mahˈali pa kˌuwekˈea vˈitu vja ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu pˌalipokˈuwa katˌika malˈaŋɡo, kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la joʃˈua, mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi, lˌililˈoko upˈande wa kuʃˈoto wa lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi.|0
iŋɡˈawa mˌakuhˈani wa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu hˌawakˌuhudˈumu katˌika mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, wˌalikˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈao.|0
ˌakaondˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hekˈalu la bwˈana wˈale farˈasi ambˈao wafˈalme wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewawˈeka wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈua. wˌalikˈuwa kwˈeɲe ˈua karˈibu na tʃˈumba tʃa afˈisa ˌalijeˈitwa nˈaθan melˈeki. bˌasi josˈia ˌakajatʃˈoma mˈoto jˈale maɡˈari jˌalijokˈuwa jˌamewˈekwa wˈakfu kwa ɟˈua.|0
ˌalizivˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu ambˈazo wafˈalme wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌameziɟˈeŋɡa kwˈeɲe pˈaa la ɣorˈofa ja ahˈazi, pˈia mˌaðabˈahu ˌalizokˈuwa ˌameziɟˈeŋɡa manˈase katˌika ɲˈua mbˈili za hekˈalu la bwˈana. ˌakazˌiondˈoa hˌuko, ˌakazivˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande, na kutˈupa hˈitʃo kifˈusi katˌika bˈonde la kidrˈoni.|0
mfˈalme pˈia ˌakanaɟˈisi mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, pˌalipokˈuwa mˌaʃarˈiki ja jˌerusalˈemu upˈande wa kusˈini wa kilˈima tʃa ˌuharibˈifu, pˈale ambˈapo sˌolomˈoni mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌaʃtorˈeθi mˈuŋɡu ˈm̩ke tʃukˈizo la wˌasidˈoni, kwa aɟˈili ja kemˈoʃi mˈuŋɡu tʃukˈizo la wˌamoˈabu, na kwa aɟˈili ja molˈeki mˈuŋɡu tʃukˈizo la wˈatu wa amˈoni.|0
josˈia ˌakapasˈua jˈale mˈawe ja kˌuabudˈiwa na kˌuzikˌatakˈata ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera. kˈiʃa ˌakafunˈika hˈajo mˌaenˈeo kwa mifˈupa ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
hˌata mˌaðabˈahu jˌalijokˈuwa hˌuko beθˈeli, mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pˌalipokˈuwa pˌameɟˈeŋɡwa na jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati, ambˈaje ˌaliwafˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli watˈende ðˈambi, ˌalibomˈoa hˌata hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu na mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu. ˌalipˌateketˈeza kwa mˈoto hˈapo mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu na kˌupasˈaɡa hˌadi pakˈawa vˈumbi, na kˌuitʃˈoma hˈijo ŋɡˈuzo ja aʃˈera pˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, lˈile kabˈuri lˈeɲe mnˈara wa ˌukumbˈuʃo nˌinalˌoliˈona ni kwa aɟˈili ɡˈani? wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakasˈema, hˌii ni alˈama ja kabˈuri la ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalijekˈuɟa kutˈoka jˈuda, nˌaje ˌakanˈena ðˈidi ja hˌii mˌaðabˈahu ja beθˈeli mˈambo jˈale jˈale ˌulijˌoifaɲˈia lˈeo.|0
ˌakasˈema, lˌiatʃˈeni, msˌiliɡˈuse. msˌimruhˈusu ˈm̩tu jejˈote kˌuiondˈoa mifˈupa jˈake. bˌasi wˌakaiˈatʃa mifˈupa jˌake pamˈoɟa na ˈile ja jˈule nabˈii ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka sˌamarˈia.|0
josˈia ˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa mˌakuhˈani wˈote wa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika mˌaðabˈahu zˈao weɲˈewe, na kutʃˈoma mifˈupa ja wˌanadˈamu ɟˈuu jˈake. kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa aɡˈizo hˈili kwa wˈatu wˈote: ˌaðimiʃˈeni pasˈaka kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki tʃa aɡˈano.|0
hˌapakuwˈahi kuwˈepo na ˌaðimˈiʃo liŋɡˈine la pasˈaka kˌama hˌilo ʃˈu ɲakˈati za wˌaamˈuzi wˌaliˌooŋɡˈoza ˌisraˈeli, wˈala katˌika ɲakˈati zˈote za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
lakˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme josˈia, pasˈaka hˌii ˌiliˌaðimˈiʃwa kwa bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈabla wˈala baˌada ja mfˈalme josˈia hˌapakuwˈepo na mfˈalme mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ambˈaje ˌalimpˈenda bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote, kwa rˈoho jˌake jˈote, na kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˈote, sˌawasˈawa na ʃerˈia jˈote ja mˈose.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, bwˈana hˌakuˈatʃa ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌilijowˈaka ðˈidi ja jˈuda kwa sabˈabu ja jˈale jˈote ambˈajo manˈase ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa kˌumɣaðibˈiʃa.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakasˈema, nˌitamwondˈoa jˈuda mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kˌama nˌilivjˌomwondˈoa ˌisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitaˌukatˈaa jˌerusalˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi nˌiliˌoutʃaɡˈua, na hekˈalu hˈili, ambˈalo nˌilisˈema, ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitakˈaa hˈumo..|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa josˈia na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
josˈia ˌalipokˈuwa mfˈalme, farˈao nˈeko mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakapˈanda mpˈaka ˈm̩to frˈati kˌumsaidˈia mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru. mfˈalme josˈia ˌakatˈoka kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˈaje, lakˈini nˈeko ˌakamkabˈili na kˌumuˈua hˌuko meɡˈido.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa josˈia wˌakaulˈeta mwˈili wˌake katˌika ɡˈari la vˈita kutˈoka meɡˈido hˌadi jˌerusalˈemu, wˌakamzˈika kwˈeɲe kabˈuri lˈake mweɲˈewe. nˌao wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌakamtʃukˈua jˌehoahˈazi mwˈana wa josˈia, wˌakamtˈia mafˈuta na kumfˈaɲa mfˈalme mahˈali pa bˈaba jˈake.|0
jˌehoahˈazi ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈatu ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈezi mitˈatu. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa hˌamutˈali bˈinti jˌeremˈia kutˈoka lˈibna.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kˌama bˈaba zˌake wˌalivjofˈaɲa.|0
farˈao nˈeko ˌakamfˈaɲa ˌeliakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia kˌuwa mfˈalme mahˈali pa bˈaba jˌake josˈia, na kˌulibˌadilˈiʃa ɟˈina la ˌeliakˈimu kˌuwa jˌehojakˈimu. lakˈini ˌakamtʃukˈua jˌehoahˈazi na kˌumpelˈeka mˈisri, nˌaje ˌakafˈia hˌuko.|0
jˌehojakˈimu ˌakamlˈipa farˈao nˈeko ˈile fˈeða na ðahˈabu ˌalijodˈai. ˌili kuwˈeza kufˈaɲa hˈivjo, jˌehojakˈimu ˌakatˈoza ˈn̩tʃi kˈodi na kˌulipˈiza fˈeða na ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌakadrˈio ja mapˈato jˈao.|0
jˌehojakˈimu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na mmˈoɟa. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa zebˈida bˈinti pedˈaja kutˈoka rˈuma.|0
nˌaje ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kˌama bˈaba zˌake wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa.|0
wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu, nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌaliˌiʃambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi, nˌaje jˌehojakˈimu akˈawa mtˈumwa wˌake kwa miˈaka mitˈatu. lakˈini hˌatimˈaje ˌakabadˈili mawˈazo jˌake na kuˈasi ðˈidi ja nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
hakˈika mˈambo hˈaja jˌalitokˈea jˈuda kˌuliŋɡˈana na aɡˈizo la bwˈana, ˌili kˌuwaondˈoa kutˈoka matʃˈoni pˈake kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi za manˈase na jˈote ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa.|0
ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia. kwa kˌuwa ˌaliiɟˈaza jˌerusalˈemu kwa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia, nˌaje bwˈana hakˈuwa rˈaði kˌusamˈehe.|0
mfˈalme wa mˈisri hˌakutˈoka tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake, kwa sabˈabu mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌameitwˈaa himˈaja jˌake jˈote, kˌuanzˈia kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri hˌadi ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
jˌehojakˈini ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka kˈumi na minˈane ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈezi mitˈatu. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa nehˈuʃta bˈinti ˌelnaθˈani kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama vˈile bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, mˌaafˈisa wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli wˌalikˈuɟa ˌili kˌuiʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu, nˌao wˌakaˌizuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza mweɲˈewe ˌakaˌupandˈia ˈm̩ɟi wakˈati mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌalipokˈuwa wˌameˌuzuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi.|0
jˌehojakˈini mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mˈama jˈake, wˌahudˈumu wˈake, wakˈuu na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote wˌakaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwa nˌebukadnˈeza. katˌika mwˈaka wa nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌakamtʃukˈua jˌehojakˈini kˌuwa mfˈuŋɡwa.|0
kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema, nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakaondˈoa hazˈina jˈote kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana na kutˈoka ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, ˌakavˌitʃukˈua vjˈombo vjˈote vja ðahˈabu ambˈavjo sˌolomˈoni mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˌiteŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˈote kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni: jaˈani mˌaafˈisa wˈote na mˌaʃuɟˈaa, wˈatu wˌeɲe ustˈadi na ufˈundi, ɟˈumla jˈao wˈatu ˈelfu kˈumi. wˈatu maskˈini sˈana n̩dˈio tu wˌaliobˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakamtʃukˈua matˈeka jˌehojakˈini hˌadi babˈeli. pˈia ˌakawˌatʃukˈua ˌutumwˈani kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu hˌadi babˈeli mˈama jˌake mfˈalme, wˌake zˈake, mˌaafˈisa wˈake, na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mfˈalme wa babˈeli pˈia ˌakawˌahamiʃˈia babˈeli mˌaʃuɟˈaa ˈelfu sˈaba, wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na wˌanaofˈaa kˌupiɡˈana vˈita, na wˈatu wˌeɲe ustˈadi na mafˈundi ˈelfu mˈoɟa.|0
ˌakamfˈaɲa mˌatanˈia, ndˈuɡu wa bˈaba jˌake jˌehojakˈini, kˌuwa mfˈalme mahˈali pˈake, na ˌakalˌibadilˈiʃa ɟˈina lˈake kˌuwa sˌedekˈia.|0
sˌedekˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mmˈoɟa ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na mmˈoɟa. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa hˌamutˈali bˈinti jˌeremˈia, kutˈoka lˈibna.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa jˌehojakˈimu.|0
lakˈini ɟˈeʃi la wˌakaldˈajo lˌikamfˌuatˈia mfˈalme na kumpˈata katˌika sehˈemu tˌambarˈare za jerˈiko. askˈari wˌake wˈote wˌakatˈeŋɡwa nˌaje na kˌutawaɲˈika.|0
nˌaje ˌakakamˈatwa. ˌakapelˈekwa kwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli hˌuko rˈibla, mahˈali ambˈapo hukˈumu jˌake ˌilitaŋɡˈazwa.|0
wˌakawaˈua wˈana wa sˌedekˈia mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈake. kˈiʃa wˌakajaŋɡˈoa mˈatʃo jˈake, wˌakamfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba na kˌumpelˈeka babˈeli.|0
mnˈamo sˈiku ja sˈaba ja mwˈezi wa tˈano, katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈisa wa ˌutawˈala wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌebuzˌaradˈani ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme, afˈisa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌalikˈuɟa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ɟˈeʃi lˈote la wˌakaldˈajo, tʃˈini ja ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme, wˌalivˈuɲɟa kˈuta zˌilizˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme ˌakatʃukˈua vˈile vjetˈezo na jˈale mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, vˈitu vjˈote vˈile vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi ˌau fˈeða.|0
ʃˈaba ˌilijˌotokˈana na zˈile ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili, ˈile bahˈari na vˈile vˌiʃikilˈio vˌilivjˌohamiʃˈika, ambˈavjo sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, ˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito ˌusiowˈeza kˌupimˈika.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌakamteˈua ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu, mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, ˈawe msˌimamˈizi wa wˈatu ˌaliˌowaˈatʃa jˈuda.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi na wˈatu wˌao wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌamemteˈua ɡˌedalˈia kˌuwa mtawˈala, wˌakamɟˈia ɡˌedalˈia hˌuko mˈispa. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia, jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, serˈaja mwˈana wa tˌanhumˈeθi mnˌetofˈaθi, na jˌezanˈia mwˈana wa mmaˈaka, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈao.|0
baˌada ja hˈaja, wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia alˈije mdˈoɡo sˈana hˌadi alˈije mkˈubwa kabˈisa, pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi, wˌakakˌimbilˈia mˈisri kwa kˌuwaoɡˈopa wˌakaldˈajo.|0
adˈamu, sˈeθi, enˈoʃi.|0
kenˈani, mˌahalalˈeli, jarˈedi.|0
enˈoki, mˌeθusˈela, lamˈeki, nˈoa.|0
wˈana wa nˈoa wˌalikˈuwa: ʃˈemu, hˈamu na jafˈeθi.|0
wˈana wa jafˈeθi wˌalikˈuwa: ɡomˈeri, maɡˈoɡu, madˈai, javˈani, tubˈali, meʃˈeki na tirˈasi.|0
wˈana wa ɡomˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: ˌaʃkenˈazi, rifˈaθi na toɡˈarma.|0
wˈana wa javˈani wˌalikˈuwa: elˈiʃa, tarʃˈiʃi, kitˈimu na rˌodanˈimu.|0
wˈana wa hˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: kˈuʃi, mˌisraˈimu, pˈutu na kˌanaˈani.|0
wˈana wa kˈuʃi wˌalikˈuwa: sˈeba, havˈila, sˈabta, raˈama na sabtˈeka. wˈana wa raˈama wˌalikˈuwa: ʃˈeba na dedˈani.|0
mˌisraˈimu ˌakawazˈaa: walˈudi, wˌaanˈami, wˌalehˈabi, wˌanaftˈuhi.|0
wˌapaθrˈusi, wˌakaslˈuhi hˈao n̩dˈio asˈili ja wˌafilˈisti na wˌakaftˈori.|0
wˈana wa kˌanaˈani wˌalikˈuwa: sidˈoni, mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, na hˈeθi.|0
wˌajebˈusi, wˌaamˈori, wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi.|0
wahˈivi, wˌaarˈiki, wasˈini.|0
wˌaarvˈadi, wˌasemˈari na wˌahamˈaθi.|0
wˈana wa ʃˈemu wˌalikˈuwa: elˈamu, aʃˈuru, ˌarfaksˈadi, lˈudi na arˈamu. wˈana wa arˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: ˈusi, hˈuli, ɡeθˈeri na meʃˈeki.|0
ˌarfaksˈadi ˌakamzˈaa ʃˈela, ʃˈela ˌakamzˈaa ebˈeri.|0
wˈana wa joktˈani wˌalikˈuwa: ˌalmodˈadi, ʃelˈefu, hˌasarmawˈeθi, jˈera.|0
hˌadorˈamu, uzˈali, dˈikla.|0
obˈali, ˌabimaˈeli, ʃˈeba.|0
ofˈiri, havˈila na jobˈabu. wˈote hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa joktˈani.|0
wˈana wa ʃˈemu wˌalikˈuwa ˌarfaksˈadi, ʃˈela.|0
ebˈeri, pelˈeɡi, rˈeu.|0
serˈuɡi, nahˈori, tˈera.|0
tˈera ˌakamzˈaa abrˈamu jaˈani, ˌabrahˈamu.|0
ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wawˈili: isˈaki na ˌiʃmaˈeli.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa haɡˈari: nˌebajˈoθi mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ˌiʃmaˈeli, kedˈari, ˌadbeˈeli, mibsˈamu.|0
mˈiʃma, dˈuma, mˈasa, hadˈadi, tˈema.|0
jetˈuri, nafˈiʃi na kedˈema. hˈao n̩dˈio wˈana wa ˌiʃmaˈeli.|0
wˈana wˌaliˌozalˈiwa na ketˈura surˈia wa ˌabrahˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: zimrˈani, jokʃˈani, medˈani, mˌidiˈani, iʃbˈaki na ʃˈua. wˈana wa jokʃˈani wˌalikˈuwa: ʃˈeba na dedˈani.|0
wˈana wa mˌidiˈani wˌalikˈuwa: ˈefa, efˈeri, hanˈoki, abˈida na eldˈaa. wˈote hˈao wˌalikˈuwa wa uzˈao wa ketˈura.|0
wˈana wa esˈau wˌalikˈuwa: ˌelifˈazi, rˌeuˈeli, jeˈuʃi, jalˈamu na kˈora.|0
wˈana wa ˌelifˈazi wˌalikˈuwa: temˈani, omˈari, sˈefo, ɡatˈamu na kenˈazi; ˌelifˈazi kwa tˈimna ˌakamzˈaa ˌamalˈeki.|0
wˈana wa rˌeuˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: nahˈaθi, zˈera, ʃˈama na mˈiza.|0
wˈana wa seˈiri wˌalikˈuwa: lotˈani, ʃobˈali, sˌibeˈoni, ˈana, diʃˈoni, esˈeri na diʃˈani.|0
wˈana wa lotˈani wˌalikˈuwa wawˈili: hˈori na homˈamu. lotˈani ˌalikˈuwa na dˈada jˌake ˌalijeˈitwa tˈimna.|0
wˈana wa ʃobˈali wˌalikˈuwa: alvˈani, mˌanahˈaθi, ebˈali, ʃˈefo na onˈamu. wˈana wa sˌibeˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: aˈija na ˈana.|0
mwˈana wa ˈana ˌalikˈuwa: diʃˈoni. nˌao wˈana wa diʃˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: hemdˈani, eʃbˈani, iθrˈani na kerˈani.|0
wˈana wa esˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: bilhˈani, zˌaavˈani na akˈani. wˈana wa diʃˈani wˌalikˈuwa: ˈusi na arˈani.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wafˈalme wˌaliˌotawˈala edˈomu kˈabla hˌaɟatawˈala mfˈalme jejˈote wa wˌaisraˈeli: bˈela mwˈana wa beˈori, ambˈaje ˈm̩ɟi wˌake ni dinhˈaba.|0
nˌaje hadˈadi pˈia akˈafa. wakˈuu wa edˈomu wˌalikˈuwa: tˈimna, ˈalva, jeθˈeθi.|0
ˌoholibˈama, ˈela, pinˈoni.|0
kenˈazi, temˈani, mibsˈari.|0
mˌaɡdiˈeli na irˈamu. hˈao n̩dˈio wakˈuu wa mˌakabˈila ja edˈomu.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli: rˌeubˈeni, sˌimeˈoni, lˈawi, jˈuda, ˌisakˈari, zˌabulˈoni.|0
dˈani, josˈefu, bˌeɲamˈini, naftˈali, ɡˈadi na aʃˈeri.|0
tamˈari, mkwˈewe jˈuda, ˌalimzalˈia wˈana wawˈili: perˈesi na zˈera. jˈuda ˌalikˈuwa na ɟˈumla ja wˈana watˈano.|0
wˈana wa zˈera wˌalikˈuwa: zˈimri, eθˈani, hemˈani, kalkˈoli na dˈara. ɟˈumla ja wˈana wa zˈera wˌalikˈuwa watˈano.|0
mwˈana wa eθˈani ˌalikˈuwa: ˌazarˈija.|0
wˈana wa hesrˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: jˌerameˈeli, rˈamu na kalˈebu.|0
rˈamu ˌalimzˈaa ˌaminadˈabu, na ˌaminadˈabu ˌakamzˈaa naʃˈoni, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la jˈuda.|0
naʃˈoni ˌakamzˈaa salmˈoni, salmˈoni ˌakamzˈaa boˈazi.|0
boˈazi ˌakamzˈaa obˈedi, obˈedi ˌakamzˈaa jˈese.|0
jˈese ˌakawazˈaa ˌeliˈabu mwanˈawe wa kwˈanza; wa pˈili ˌabinadˈabu, wa tˈatu ʃimˈea.|0
wa ˈn̩ne nˌeθanˈeli, wa tˈano radˈai.|0
wa sˈita osˈemu, na wa sˈaba daˈudi.|0
dˈada zˈao wˌalikˈuwa serˈuja na ˌabiɡaˈili. wˈana wa serˈuja wˌalikˈuwa watˈatu: ˌabiʃˈai, joˈabu na ˌasahˈeli.|0
ˌabiɡaˈili ˌalikˈuwa mˈama jˌake amˈasa, ambˈaje bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa jeθˈeri, mwˌiʃmaˈeli.|0
kalˈebu mwˈana wa hesrˈoni ˌakazˈaa wˈana na mkˈewe azˈuba na pˈia na jˌeriˈoθi. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈana azˈuba ˌaliˌomzalˈia kalˈebu: jeʃˈeri, ʃobˈabu na ardˈoni.|0
azˈuba ˌalipˌofarˈiki, kalˈebu ˌakamwˈoa efrˈaθi, ambˈaje ˌalimzalˈia hˈuri.|0
hˈuri ˌakamzˈaa ˈuri, ˈuri ˌakamzˈaa bˌezalˈeli.|0
hˌatimˈaje, hesrˈoni ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na bˈinti wa makˈiri babˈaje ɡˌileˈadi ambˈaje ˌalimwˈoa ˌalipokˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka sitˈini, nˌaje ˌakamzˈaa seɡˈubu.|0
seɡˈubu ˌakamzˈaa jaˈiri, ambˈaje ˌalitawˈala mˈiɟi ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈatu katˌika ɡˌileˈadi.|0
lakˈini ɡeʃˈuri na arˈamu wˌakatˈeka mˈiɟi ja hˈawoθ jaˈiri, pamˈoɟa na kenˈaθi na viˈuŋɡa vjˈake; ɟˈumla ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi sitˈini. wˈote hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa makˈiri babˈaje ɡˌileˈadi.|0
baˌada ja hesrˈoni kˈufa hˌuko efrˈaθi, abˈija mɟˈane wa hesrˈoni ˌakamzalˈia aʃˈuru, alˈije bˈaba wa tekˈoa.|0
wˈana wa jˌerameˈeli mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa hesrˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: rˈamu mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, bˈuna, orˈeni, osˈemu na ahˈija.|0
jˌerameˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩ke mwiŋɡˈine, ˌalijeˈitwa atˈara, ˌalijekˈuwa mˈama jˌake onˈamu.|0
wˈana wa rˈamu mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa jˌerameˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: maˈasi, jamˈini na ekˈeri.|0
wˈana wa onˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: ʃamˈai na jˈada. wˈana wa ʃamˈai wˌalikˈuwa: nadˈabu na ˌabiʃˈuri.|0
ˈm̩ke wa ˌabiʃˈuri ˌaliˈitwa ˌabihaˈili, ambˈaje ˌalimzalˈia abˈani na molˈidi.|0
wˈana wa nadˈabu wˌalikˈuwa selˈedi na ˌapaˈimu, lakˈini selˈedi ˌalikˈufa bˌila kuzˈaa watˈoto.|0
ˌapaˈimu ˌakamzˈaa: ˈiʃi ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ʃeʃˈani. ʃeʃˈani ˌakamzˈaa alˈai.|0
wˈana wa jˈada, nduɡˈuje ʃamˈai wˌalikˈuwa: jeθˈeri na jˌonaθˈani. jeθˈeri ˌalikˈufa bˌila kuzˈaa watˈoto.|0
wˈana wa jˌonaθˈani wˌalikˈuwa: pelˈeθi na zˈaza. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa jˌerameˈeli.|0
ʃeʃˈani hakˈuwa na watˈoto wa kiˈume, ˈila wˌasitʃˈana tˈu. ˌalikˈuwa na mtumˈiʃi mmˈisri ˌalijeˈitwa jˈarha.|0
ʃeʃˈani ˌakamwˈoza hˈuju mtumˈiʃi wˌake jˈarha bˈinti jˈake, ˌakamzalˈia mwˈana ɟˈina lˈake atˈai.|0
atˈai ˌakamzˈaa naθˈani, naθˈani ˌakamzˈaa zabˈadi.|0
zabˈadi ˌakamzˈaa eflˈali, eflˈali ˌakamzˈaa obˈedi.|0
obˈedi ˌakamzˈaa jˈehu, jˈehu ˌakamzˈaa ˌazarˈia.|0
ˌazarˈia ˌakamzˈaa helˈesi, helˈesi ˌakamzˈaa ˌeleˈasa.|0
ˌeleˈasa ˌakamzˈaa sismˈai, sismˈai ˌakamzˈaa ʃalˈumu.|0
ʃalˈumu ˌakamzˈaa jˌekamˈia, nˌaje jˌekamˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌeliʃˈama.|0
wˈana wa kalˈebu nduɡˈuje jˌerameˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: mˈeʃa mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza ˌalimzˈaa zˈifu, nˌaje mwanˈawe marˈeʃa ˌakamzˈaa hebrˈoni.|0
hebrˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˈanne: kˈora, tapˈua, rekˈemu na ʃˈema.|0
ʃˈema ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake rahˈamu na rahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa jˌorkeˈamu na rekˈemu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ʃamˈai.|0
ʃamˈai ˌakamzˈaa maˈoni na maˈoni ˌakamzˈaa bˈeθ sˈuri.|0
ˈefa, surˈia wa kalˈebu ˌalikˈuwa mamˈaje harˈani, mˈosa na ɡazˈezi. harˈani ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ɡazˈezi.|0
wˈana wa jadˈai wˌalikˈuwa: reɡˈemu, joθˈamu, ɡeʃˈani, pelˈeti, ˈefa na ʃaˈafu.|0
maˈaka surˈia wa kalˈebu ˌalikˈuwa mamˈaje ʃebˈeri na tirhˈana.|0
pˈia maˈaka ˌakamzˈaa ʃaˈafu babˈaje madmˈana, na ʃˈeva babˈaje makbˈena na ɡibˈea. kalˈebu ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti ɟˈina lˈake ˈaksa.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa kalˈebu. wˈana wa hˈuri, mzalˈiwa m̩kˈuu wˌao wa efrˈaθi, wˌalikˈuwa: ʃobˈali ˌakamzˈaa kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu.|0
sˈalma ˌakamzˈaa bˌeθlehˈemu, nˌaje harˈefu ˌakamzˈaa bˈeθ ɡadˈeri.|0
wazˈao wa ʃobˈali, bˈaba jˌake kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu, wˌalikˈuwa: harˈoe, nˈusu ja wakˈazi wa ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌenuhˈoθi.|0
pamˈoɟa na kˈoo za kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu ambˈazo nˈi: wˌaiθˈiri, wapˈuθi, wˌaʃumˈaθi na wˌamiʃrˈai. kˌutokˈana na wˈatu hˈawa wˌalizalˈiwa wˌasorˈaθi na wˌaeʃtaˈoli.|0
wazˈao wa sˈalma wˌalikˈuwa: bˌeθlehˈemu, wˌanetofˈaθi, ˈatroθ bˈeθ joˈabu, nˈusu ja wˌamanahˈaθi, wasˈori.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa daˈudi wˌaliˌozalˈiwa hˌuko hebrˈoni: mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa amnˈoni ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa ˌahinoˈamu wa jˌezreˈeli; wa pˈili, dˌaniˈeli ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌabiɡaˈili wa karmˈeli.|0
wa tˈatu ˌalikˈuwa ˌabsalˈomu, ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa maˈaka, bˈinti talmˈai mfˈalme wa ɡeʃˈuri; wa ˈn̩ne, ˌadonˈija, ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa haɡˈiθi.|0
wa tˈano ˌalikˈuwa ʃˌefatˈia ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌabitˈali; wa sˈita ˌalikˈuwa ˌiθreˈamu, ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na ˈm̩ke wˌake ˈeɡla.|0
hˈawa sˈita wˌalizalˈiwa hˌuko hebrˈoni ambˈako daˈudi ˌalitawˈala kwa miˈaka sˈaba na miˈezi sˈita. daˈudi ˌalitawˈala jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mitˈatu.|0
nˌao hˈawa n̩dˈio watˈoto wa daˈudi wˌaliˌozalˈiwa hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu: mkˈewe baθʃˈeba, bˈinti ˌamiˈeli, ˌalimzalˈia ʃamˈua, ʃobˈabu, naθˈani na sˌolomˈoni.|0
pˈia kˌulikˈuwa na wˈana weŋɡˈine: ˌibihˈari, ˌeliʃˈua, ˌelifelˈeti.|0
nˈoɡa, nefˈeɡi, jafˈia.|0
ˌeliʃˈama, ˌeliˈada na ˌelifelˈeti; wˈote wˌalikˈuwa tˈisa.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa daˈudi, mbˈali na wˈale wˈana wˌaliˌozalˈiwa na mˌasurˈia. nˌaje tamˈari ˌalikˈuwa dˈada jˈao.|0
wˈana wa josˈia wˌalikˈuwa: jˌohanˈani mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, jˌehojakˈimu mwanˈawe wa pˈili, wa tˈatu sˌedekˈia, wa ˈn̩ne ʃalˈumu.|0
wˌaliˌoiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa jˌehojakˈimu kˌama wafˈalme nˈi: jˌekonˈia mwanˈawe, na sˌedekˈia.|0
mˌalkirˈamu, pedˈaja, ʃˌenasˈari, jˌekamˈia, hoʃˈama na nˌedabˈia.|0
wˈana wa pedˈaja wˌalikˈuwa: zˌerubabˈeli na ʃimˈei. wˈana wa zˌerubabˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: mˌeʃulˈamu na hˌananˈia. ʃˌelomˈiθi ˌalikˈuwa dˈada jˈao.|0
pˈia wˌalikuwˈepo weŋɡˈine watˈano: haʃˈuba, ohˈeli, bˌerekˈia, hˌasadˈia na jˈuʃab hesˈedi.|0
wazˈao wa hˌananˈia wˌalikˈuwa: pˌelatˈia na jeʃˈaja, na wˈana wa refˈaja, na wˈana wa arnˈani, na wˈana wa ˌobadˈia, na wˈana wa ʃˌekanˈia.|0
wazˈao wa ʃˌekanˈia: ʃemˈaja na wanˈawe: hatˈuʃi, iɡˈali, barˈia, nˌearˈia na ʃafˈati; ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa sˈita.|0
wˈana wa nˌearˈia wˌalikˈuwa: ˌeliˌoenˈai, hizkˈia na ˌazrikˈamu; ɟˈumla jˈao watˈatu.|0
wˈana wa ˌeliˌoenˈai wˌalikˈuwa: hˌodavˈia, ˌeliaʃˈibu, pelˈaja, akˈubu, jˌohanˈani, delˈaja na anˈani; ɟˈumla jˈao wˈote sˈaba.|0
wˈana wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa: perˈesi, hesrˈoni, kˈarmi, hˈuri na ʃobˈali.|0
reˈaja mwˈana wa ʃobˈali ˌakamzˈaa jahˈaθi, jahˈaθi ˌakawazˈaa ˌahumˈai na lahˈadi. hˈizi ndˈizo zˌilizokˈuwa kˈoo za wˌasorˈaθi.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa etˈamu: jˌezreˈeli, ˈiʃma na idbˈaʃi. dˈada jˈao ˌaliˈitwa hˌaselelpˈoni.|0
pˌenuˈeli ˌakamzˈaa ɡedˈori, nˌaje ezˈeri ˌakamzˈaa hˈuʃa. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa hˈuri, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa efrˈaθi, na bˈaba jˌake bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
aʃˈuri bˈaba jˌake tekˈoa ˌalikˈuwa na wˌake wawˈili, hˈela na naˈara.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa naˈara: ˌahuzˈamu, hefˈeri, temˈeni na hˌaahaʃtˈari.|0
wˈana wa hˈela wˌalikˈuwa: serˈeθi, sohˈari, eθnˈani.|0
na kˈosi ambˈaje ˌaliwazˈaa anˈubi, sobˈeba na ɟamˈaa zˈote za ˌaharhˈeli mwˈana wa harˈumu.|0
jabˈesi ˌalihˌeʃimˈiwa kulˈiko ndˈuɡu zˈake. mˈama jˌake ˌalimwˈita jabˈesi, ˌakisˈema, nˌilimzˈaa kwa huzˈuni.|0
jabˈesi ˌakamlilˈia mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakisˈema, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, laˈiti ˌuŋɡenˌibarˈiki kwˈeli kwˈeli na kˌuipanˈua mipˈaka jˈaŋɡu! mkˈono wˈako na ˈuwe pamˈoɟa nˈami, ˌuniepˈuʃe na uˈovu ˌili nˌisiðurˈike! nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟalˈia hˈajo ˌalijˌojaˈomba.|0
kelˈubu, nduɡˈuje ʃˈuha, ˌakamzˈaa mehˈiri, nˌaje mehˈiri ˌakamzˈaa eʃtˈoni.|0
eʃtˈoni ˌakawazˈaa bˈeθ rˈafa, pasˈea na tehˈina. tehˈina ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ˈiri nahˈaʃi. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa rˈeka.|0
wˈana wa kenˈazi wˌalikˈuwa: ˌoθniˈeli na serˈaja. wˈana wa ˌoθniˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: haθˈaθi na mˌeonaθˈai.|0
mˌeonaθˈai ˌakamzˈaa ˈofra. serˈaja ˌakamzˈaa joˈabu, bˈaba wa ɡˈe hˌaraʃˈimu. lˌiliˈitwa hˈivjo kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi hˈumo wˌalikˈuwa mafˈundi.|0
kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana watˈatu: ˈiru, ˈela na naˈamu. nˌaje mwˈana wa ˈela ˌalikˈuwa: kenˈazi.|0
wˈana wa jˌahalelˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: zˈifu, zˈifa, tirˈia na ˌasarˈeli.|0
wˈana wa ˈezra wˌalikˈuwa: jeθˈeri, merˈedi, efˈeri na jalˈoni. mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˌake zˌake merˈedi ˌaliwazˈaa: mˌiriˈamu, ʃamˈai na ˈiʃba ˌalijekˈuwa bˈaba jˌake ˌeʃtemˈoa.|0
merˈedi ˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩ke mwiŋɡˈine mjahˈudi ambˈaje ˌaliwazˈaa: jerˈedi bˈaba wa ɡedˈori, hebˈeri bˈaba wa sˈoko na jˌekuθiˈeli bˈaba wa zanˈoa. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa watˈoto wa biθˈia bˈinti farˈao, ambˈaje merˈedi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa.|0
wˈana wa ˈm̩ke wa hodˈia ˌalijekˈuwa dˈada jˌake nahˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: bˈaba jˌake keˈila, mɡˈarmi na ˌeʃtemˈoa, mmˌaakˈaθi.|0
wˈana wa ʃimˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: amnˈoni, rˈina, bˈen hanˈani na tilˈoni. wazˈao wa ˈiʃi wˌalikˈuwa: zohˈeθi na bˈen zohˈeθi.|0
wˈana wa ʃˈela, mwˈana wa jˈuda, wˌalikˈuwa: ˈeri bˈaba jˌake lˈeka, laˈada bˈaba jˌake marˈeʃa na ɟamˈaa za wˌafumˈaɟi ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani sˈafi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi hˌuko bˈeθ aʃbˈea.|0
jokˈimu, wˈatu wˌalioˈiʃi kozˈeba, joˈaʃi na sarˈafi wˌaliˌotawˈala hˌuko moˈabu na jaʃˈubi lehˈemu. tˌaarˈifa hˈizi ni za zamˈani sˈana..|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˌafiɲˈanzi wˌalioˈiʃi nˌetaˈimu na ɡedˈera; wˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko wˌakimtˌumikˈia mfˈalme.|0
wazˈao wa sˌimeˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: nˌemuˈeli, jamˈini, jarˈibu, zˈera na ʃaˈuli.|0
mwˈana wa ʃaˈuli ˌalikˈuwa ʃalˈumu, ʃalˈumu ˌakamzˈaa mibsˈamu, na mibsˈamu ˌakamzˈaa mˈiʃma.|0
wazˈao wa mˈiʃma wˌalikˈuwa: hˌamuˈeli ˌalijemzˈaa zakˈuri, zakˈuri ˌakamzˈaa ʃimˈei.|0
ʃimˈei ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana kˈumi na sˈita, na bˈinti sˈita, lakˈini ndˈuɡu zˌake hˌawakˈuwa na watˈoto wˈeŋɡi, hˈivjo ukˈoo wˌao wˈote hˌaukˈuwa na wˈatu wˈeŋɡi kˌama ukˈoo wa jˈuda.|0
wˌaliˈiʃi bˈeer ʃˈeba, molˈada, hˈasar ʃuˈali.|0
bˈilha, esˈemu, tolˈadi.|0
bˌeθuˈeli, hˈorma, siklˈaɡi.|0
bˈeθ mˌarkabˈoθi, hˈasar susˈimu, bˈeθ bˈiri na ʃˌaaraˈimu. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi jˈao mpˈaka wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa daˈudi.|0
viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌoizuŋɡˈuka vˌilikˈuwa etˈamu, aˈini, rimˈoni, tokˈeni na aʃˈani; ɟˈumla mˈiɟi mitˈano.|0
pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈote kˌuizuŋɡˈuka hˌii mˈiɟi hˌadi hˌuko baˈali. hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa makˈao jˈao, nˌao wˌaliwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu ja ukˈoo wˈao.|0
mˌeʃobˈabu, jamlˈeki, jˈoʃa mwˈana wa ˌamazˈia.|0
joˈeli, jˈehu mwˈana wa jˌoʃibˈia, mwˈana wa serˈaja, mwˈana wa ˌasiˈeli.|0
pˈia ˌeliˌoenˈai, jˌaakˈoba, jˌeʃohˈaja, asˈaja, ˌadiˈeli, jˌesimiˈeli, benˈaja.|0
zˈiza mwˈana wa ʃˈifi, mwˈana wa alˈoni, mwˈana wa jedˈaja, mwˈana wa ʃˈimri, mwˈana wa ʃemˈaja.|0
wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa hˈapa ɟˈuu kwa maɟˈina wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈoo zˈao. ɟamˈaa zˈao zˌiliˌoŋɡezˈeka sˈana.|0
wˌakaenˈea mpˈaka kwˈeɲe viˈuŋɡa vja ɡedˈori kˌuelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa bˈonde wˌakitafˈuta malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
hˌuko wˌalipˈata malˈiʃo mˈeŋɡi mazˈuri, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌilikˈuwa na nafˈasi kˈubwa, jˌeɲe amˈani na ˌutulˈivu. baˈaði ja wahˈamu wˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko zamˈani.|0
wˈatu wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa maɟˈina wˌalikˈuɟa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo wakˈati wa hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda. ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia wahˈamu katˌika makˈao jˈao pamˈoɟa na wˌameˈuni ambˈao wˌalikuwˈako hˌuko nˌao wˌakawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, kˌama ilˈivjo ðahˈiri hˌadi lˈeo. kˈiʃa wˌakafˈaɲa makˈazi jˈao hˌuko kwa sabˈabu kˌulikˈuwa na malˈiʃo mazˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
wˈatu wa kabˈila la wa sˌimeˈoni wˌapatˈao mˈia tˈano, wˌakioŋɡˈozwa na pˌelatˈia, nˌearˈia, refˈaja na ˌuziˈeli wˈana wa ˈiʃi, wˌakavamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja seˈiri.|0
wˌakawaˈua wˌaamalˈeki wˌaliobˈaki, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamenˌusurˈika, nˌao wˌanaˈiʃi hˌuko hˌadi lˈeo.|0
wˈana wa rˌeubˈeni mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ˌisraˈeli jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, lakˈini kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˌinaɟˈisi kitˈanda tʃa bˈaba jˈake, hˈaki zˌake za mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wˌalipˈewa wˈana wa josˈefu mwˈana wa ˌisraˈeli. hˈivjo hˌakuˌoroðˈeʃwa kwˈeɲe orˈoða ja ukˈoo wˌao kˌuliŋɡˈana na hˈaki jˌake ja kˌuzalˈiwa.|0
na iŋɡˈawa jˈuda ˌalikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi ja ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote, na mtawˈala ˌalitˈoka kwˈake, hˈaki za mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza zˌilikˈuwa za josˈefu..|0
wˈana wa rˌeubˈeni mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: hanˈoki, pˈalu, hesrˈoni na kˈarmi.|0
na beˈera mwanˈawe, ambˈaje tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌalimtʃukˈua kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. beˈera ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌareubˈeni.|0
ɟamˈaa zˈao kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈoo zˈao, wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa kwa kˌufuˈata kˈoo zˈao kˌama ˌifuatˈavjo: jˌeiˈeli ˌalijekˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˈao, zˌekarˈia.|0
bˈela mwˈana wa azˈazi, mwˈana wa ʃˈema, mwˈana wa joˈeli. hˈao wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika enˈeo kˌuanzˈia ˌaroˈeri mpˈaka nˈebo na bˈaal meˈoni.|0
kwa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wˌalienˈea hˌadi pembˈeni ˌm̩wa ɟˈaŋɡwa lˌinalˌoenˈea mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈm̩to frˈati, kwa sabˈabu mifˈuɡo jˈao ˌilikˈuwa ˌimeˌoŋɡezˈeka hˌuko ɡˌileˈadi.|0
wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme saˈuli, wˌalipiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌahaɡˈari, wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kwa mikˈono jˈao, kˈiʃa wˌakaˈiʃi katˌika mahˈema ja wˌahaɡˈari katˌika enˈeo lˈote la mˌaʃarˈiki ja ɡˌileˈadi.|0
waɡˈadi wˌaliˈiʃi ɟirˈani nˌao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja baʃˈani, mpˈaka salˈeka.|0
ndˈuɡu zˈao kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈoo zˈao wˌalikˈuwa sˈaba: mˌikaˈeli, mˌeʃulˈamu, ʃˈeba, jorˈai, jakˈani, zˈia na ebˈeri.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio wˈana wa ˌabihaˈili mwˈana wa hˈuri, mwˈana wa jarˈoa, mwˈana wa ɡˌileˈadi, mwˈana wa mˌikaˈeli, mwˈana wa jˌeʃiʃˈai, mwˈana wa jˈahdo, mwˈana wa bˈuzi.|0
ˈahi mwˈana wa ˌabdiˈeli, mwˈana wa ɡˈuni, ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa jˈao.|0
waɡˈadi wˌaliˈiʃi ɡˌileˈadi, hˌuko baʃˈani pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌoizuŋɡˈuka, pˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja malˈiʃo ja ʃarˈoni kˈote wˌalikˌoenˈea.|0
jˈote hˈaja jˌaliwˈekwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za ukˈoo wˌao wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa joθˈamu, mfˈalme wa jˈuda na jˌeroboˈamu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌalipiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌahaɡˈari, jetˈuri, nafˈiʃi na nodˈabu.|0
wˌalisˌaidˈiwa katˌika kˌupiɡˈana nˈao, mˈuŋɡu ˌakawatˈia wˌahaɡˈari pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˌao mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌalimlilˈia mˈuŋɡu wakˈati wa vˈita. ˌaliɟˈibu maˈombi jˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌalimtˌeɡemˈea.|0
na weŋɡˈine wˈeŋɡi wˌaliuˈawa kwa sabˈabu vˈita vˌilikˈuwa ni vja mˈuŋɡu. nˌao wˌaliˌendelˈea kˌuikalˈia ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo mpˈaka wakˈati wa ˌuhamˈiʃo.|0
idˈadi ja nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase wˌalikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi sˈana, wˌakakˈaa kˌuanzˈia baʃˈani hˌadi bˈaal hermˈoni, jaˈani mpˈaka senˈiri na mlˈima hermˈoni.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za kabˈila hˈilo: efˈeri, ˈiʃi, ˌeliˈeli, ˌazriˈeli, jˌeremˈia, hˌodavˈia na jˌahdiˈeli. wˌalikˈuwa askˈari ʃuɟˈaa wˈatu mˌaarˈufu, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba kwa miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa, ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamejˌaaŋɡamˈiza mbˈele jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaiˈamʃa rˈoho ja pˈulu, mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ambˈaje pˈia ˌaliɟˌulikˈana kˌama tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri, ambˈaje ˌaliwˌatʃukˈua wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. ˌakawˌapelˈeka hˌuko hˈala, habˈori, hˈara na ˈm̩to ɡozˈani, ambˈako wˌamekˈaa mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
wˈana wa lˈawi wˌalikˈuwa: ɡerʃˈoni, kohˈaθi na merˈari.|0
wˈana wa kohˈaθi wˌalikˈuwa: amrˈamu, iʃˈari, hebrˈoni na ˌuziˈeli.|0
amrˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana: arˈoni, mˈose, na mˌiriˈamu. arˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana: nadˈabu, abˈihu, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari.|0
ˌeleazˈari ˌakamzˈaa fˌinehˈasi, fˌinehˈasi ˌakamzˈaa ˌabiʃˈua.|0
ˌabiʃˈua ˌakamzˈaa bˈuki, bˈuki ˌakamzˈaa ˈuzi.|0
ˈuzi ˌakamzˈaa zˌerahˈia, zˌerahˈia ˌakamzˈaa mˌerajˈoθi.|0
mˌerajˈoθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌamarˈia, ˌamarˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌahitˈubu.|0
ˌahitˈubu ˌakamzˈaa sadˈoki, sadˈoki ˌakamzˈaa ˌahimaˈasi.|0
ˌahimaˈasi ˌakamzˈaa ˌazarˈia, ˌazarˈia ˌakamzˈaa jˌohanˈani.|0
jˌohanˈani ˌakamzˈaa ˌazarˈia n̩dˈije ˌalifˈaɲa kˈazi ja ˌukuhˈani katˌika hekˈalu ˌaliloɟˈeŋɡa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌazarˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌamarˈia, ˌamarˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌahitˈubu.|0
ˌahitˈubu ˌakamzˈaa sadˈoki, sadˈoki ˌakamzˈaa ʃalˈumu.|0
ʃalˈumu ˌakamzˈaa hilkˈia, hilkˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌazarˈia.|0
ˌazarˈia ˌakamzˈaa serˈaja, serˈaja ˌakamzˈaa jˌehosadˈaki.|0
jˌehosadˈaki ˌalihamˈiʃwa wakˈati bwˈana ˌaliwˌapelˈeka ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˈatu wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kwa mkˈono wa mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
wˈana wa lˈawi wˌalikˈuwa: ɡerʃˈoni, kohˈaθi na merˈari.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja wˈana wa ɡerʃˈoni: lˈibni na ʃimˈei.|0
wˈana wa kohˈaθi wˌalikˈuwa: amrˈamu, iʃˈari, hebrˈoni na ˌuziˈeli.|0
wˈana wa merˈari wˌalikˈuwa: mˈahli na mˈuʃi. zˌifuatˈazo ni kˈoo za walˈawi zˌilizˌooroðˈeʃwa kˌufuatˈana na bˈaba zˈao.|0
wazˈao wa ɡerʃˈoni: ɡerʃˈoni ˌakamzˈaa lˈibni, lˈibni ˌakamzˈaa jahˈaθi, jahˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa zˈima.|0
zˈima ˌakamzˈaa jˈoa, jˈoa ˌakamzˈaa ˈido, ˈido ˌakamzˈaa zˈera, zˈera ˌakamzˈaa jˌeaθerˈai.|0
wazˈao wa kohˈaθi: kohˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌaminadˈabu, ˌaminadˈabu ˌakamzˈaa kˈora, kˈora ˌakamzˈaa asˈiri.|0
asˈiri ˌakamzˈaa ˌelikˈana, ˌelikˈana ˌakamzˈaa ˌebiasˈafu, ˌebiasˈafu ˌakamzˈaa asˈiri.|0
asˈiri ˌakamzˈaa tahˈaθi, tahˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌuriˈeli, ˌuriˈeli ˌakamzˈaa uzˈia, uzˈia ˌakamzˈaa ʃaˈuli.|0
wazˈao wa ˌelikˈana wˌalikˈuwa: ˌamasˈai na ˌahimˈoθi.|0
ˌahimˈoθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌelikˈana, ˌelikˈana ˌakamzˈaa sofˈai, sofˈai ˌakamzˈaa nahˈaθi.|0
nahˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌeliˈabu, ˌeliˈabu ˌakamzˈaa jˌerohˈamu, jˌerohˈamu ˌakamzˈaa ˌelikˈana, ˌelikˈana ˌakamzˈaa samwˈeli.|0
wˈana wa samwˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: joˈeli mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, na abˈija mwanˈawe wa pˈili.|0
wˌafuatˈao n̩dˈio wazˈao wa merˈari: merˈari ˌakamzˈaa mˈahli, mˈahli ˌakamzˈaa lˈibni, lˈibni ˌakamzˈaa ʃimˈei, ʃimˈei ˌakamzˈaa ˈuza.|0
ˈuza ˌakamzˈaa ʃimˈea, ʃimˈea ˌakamzˈaa haɡˈia, haɡˈia ˌakamzˈaa asˈaja.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu ambˈao daˈudi ˌaliwawˈeka kˌuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌuimbˈaɟi katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, baˌada ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano kulˈetwa ˌili kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
wˌalihudˈumu kwa kuˈimba mbˈele ja maskˈani, hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, mpˈaka hˈapo mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌalipoɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu. wˌalitimˈiza waɟˈibu wˌao kˌuliŋɡˈana na tˌaratˈibu wˌalizokˈuwa wˌamewekˈewa.|0
wˌafuatˈao ni wˈatu wˌaliˌohudˈumu pamˈoɟa na wˈana wˈao: kutˈoka ukˈoo wa kohˈaθi wˌalikˈuwa: hemˈani, mpˈiɡa kinˈanda, ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa joˈeli, mwˈana wa samwˈeli.|0
mwˈana wa ˌelikˈana, mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, mwˈana wa ˌeliˈeli, mwˈana wa tˈoa.|0
mwˈana wa sˈufu, mwˈana wa ˌelikˈana, mwˈana wa mahˈaθi, mwˈana wa ˌamasˈai.|0
mwˈana wa ˌelikˈana, mwˈana wa joˈeli, mwˈana wa ˌazarˈia, mwˈana wa sˌefanˈia.|0
mwˈana wa tahˈaθi, mwˈana wa asˈiri, mwˈana wa ˌebiasˈafu, mwˈana wa kˈora.|0
mwˈana wa iʃˈari, mwˈana wa kohˈaθi, mwˈana wa lˈawi, mwˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
na msˌaidˈizi wa hemˈani ˌalikˈuwa asˈafu, ˌalijˌesimˈama mkˈono wa kuˈume: asˈafu mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia, mwˈana wa ʃimˈea.|0
mwˈana wa mˌikaˈeli, mwˈana wa bˌaasˈeja, mwˈana wa malkˈija.|0
mwˈana wa ˈeθni, mwˈana wa zˈera, mwˈana wa adˈaja.|0
mwˈana wa eθˈani, mwˈana wa zˈima, mwˈana wa ʃimˈei.|0
mwˈana wa jahˈaθi, mwˈana wa ɡerʃˈoni, mwˈana wa lˈawi.|0
na kutˈoka kwa wˌaliˌoʃirˌikiˈana nˈao, wˌamerˈari, mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto: eθˈani mwˈana wa kˈiʃi, mwˈana wa ˈabdi, mwˈana wa malˈuki.|0
mwˈana wa hˌaʃabˈia, mwˈana wa ˌamazˈia, mwˈana wa hilkˈia.|0
mwˈana wa ˈamsi, mwˈana wa bˈani, mwˈana wa ʃemˈeri.|0
mwˈana wa mˈahli, mwˈana wa mˈuʃi, mwˈana wa merˈari, mwˈana wa lˈawi.|0
ndˈuɡu zˈao weŋɡˈine walˈawi wˌalipˈewa hudˈuma ɲiŋɡˈine za kˌuhudumˈia hˈema tˌakatˈifu, ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini arˈoni na uzˈao wˌake n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa na waɟˈibu wa kutˈoa sadˈaka katˌika mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba pamˈoɟa na jˈote jˌalijˌofaɲˈika pa pˌatakatˈifu, wˌakifˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, sˌawasˈawa na jˈale jˈote ˌalijˌoaɡˈiza mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa arˈoni: arˈoni ˌakamzˈaa ˌeleazˈari, ˌeleazˈari ˌakamzˈaa fˌinehˈasi, fˌinehˈasi ˌakamzˈaa ˌabiʃˈua.|0
ˌabiʃˈua ˌakamzˈaa bˈuki, bˈuki ˌakamzˈaa ˈuzi, ˈuzi ˌakamzˈaa zˌerahˈia.|0
zˌerahˈia ˌakamzˈaa mˌerajˈoθi, mˌerajˈoθi ˌakamzˈaa ˌamarˈia, ˌamarˈia ˌakamzˈaa ˌahitˈubu.|0
ˌahitˈubu ˌakamzˈaa sadˈoki, sadˈoki ˌakamzˈaa ˌahimaˈasi.|0
zˌifuatˈazo ni sehˈemu wˌalizopˈewa zˈiwe ˈn̩tʃi jˈao kwa aɟˈili ja makˈazi jˈao wˌalipˈewa wazˈao wa arˈoni wˌaliotˈoka katˌika ukˈoo wa wˌakohˈaθi, kwa sabˈabu kˈura ja kwˈanza ˌiliwˌaaŋɡukˈia.|0
wˌalipˈewa hebrˈoni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu ja malˈiʃo ˌinajˌouzuŋɡˈuka.|0
lakˈini maʃˈamba pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌouzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi ˌalipˈewa kalˈebu mwˈana wa jefˈune.|0
kwa hˈijo wazˈao wa arˈoni wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi ˌifuatˈajo pamˈoɟa na enˈeo la malˈiʃo: hebrˈoni ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio, lˈibna, jatˈiri, ˌeʃtemˈoa.|0
hilˈeni, debˈiri.|0
aʃˈani, jˈuta na bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini wˌalipˈewa ɡˌibeˈoni, ɡˈeba, ˌalemˈeθi na ˌanaθˈoθi, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo. mˈiɟi hˌii kˈumi na mitˈatu ˌiliɡawˈaɲua mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi.|0
wazˈao wˌaliobˈaki wa wˌakohˈaθi wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi kutˈoka kˈoo za nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase.|0
wazˈao wa ɡerʃˈoni, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo, wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi na mitˈatu kutˈoka kwa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisakˈari, aʃˈeri na naftˈali kutˈoka sehˈemu ja kabˈila la manˈase hˌuko baʃˈani.|0
wazˈao wa merˈari, ukˈoo kwa ukˈoo wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi kˈumi na miwˈili kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja rˌeubˈeni, ɡˈadi na zˌabulˈoni.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwˈapa walˈawi mˈiɟi hˌii pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka mˌakabˈila ja jˈuda, sˌimeˈoni na bˌeɲamˈini wˌalipˈewa mˈiɟi ˌilijotˈaɟua hˈapo ɟˈuu.|0
baˈaði ja kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi wˌalipˈewa kˌama ˈn̩tʃi jˈao mˈiɟi kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu wˌalipˈewa ʃekˈemu ˈm̩ɟi wa mˌakimbilˈio na ɡezˈeri.|0
jˌokmeˈamu, bˈeθ horˈoni.|0
ˌaijalˈoni na ɡˈaθ rimˈoni, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase, wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliwˈapa kˈoo za wˌakohˈaθi wˌaliobˈaki mˈiɟi ja anˈeri na bˌileˈamu pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌalipokˈea mˈiɟi ˌifuatˈajo pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo: katˌika nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase: wˌalipˈewa ɡolˈani katˌika baʃˈani na pˈia ˌaʃtarˈoθi.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la ˌisakˈari wˌalipokˈea kedˈeʃi, dˌaberˈaθi.|0
ramˈoθi na anˈemu, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la aʃˈeri wˌalipokˈea maʃˈali, abdˈoni.|0
hukˈoki na rehˈobu, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la naftˈali wˌalipokˈea kedˈeʃi katˌika ɡˌalilˈaja, hamˈoni na kˌiriˌaθaˈimu pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
wˌamerˈari walˈawi wˌaliˌobakˈia wˌalipokˈea mˈiɟi ˌifuatˈajo: kutˈoka kabˈila la zˌabulˈoni wˌalipokˈea jˌokneˈamu, kˈarta, rimˈoni na tabˈori pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
kutˈoka kabˈila la rˌeubˈeni, ŋɡˈambo ja jordˈani mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jerˈiko wˌalipokˈea bezˈeri ˌuliˈoko ɟaŋɡwˈani, jahˈasa.|0
kˌedemˈoθi na mˌefaˈaθi pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
na kutˈoka kabˈila la ɡˈadi wˌalipokˈea ramˈoθi hˌuko ɡˌileˈadi, mˌahanaˈimu.|0
heʃbˈoni na jazˈeri, pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌake ja malˈiʃo.|0
wˈana wa tˈola wˌalikˈuwa: ˈuzi, refˈaja, jˌeriˈeli, jahmˈai, ibsˈamu na ʃˌemuˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao. wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme daˈudi, wazˈao wa tˈola wˌaliˌooroðˈeʃwa kˌama wˌapiɡanˈaɟi katˌika ukˈoo wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininambˈili,mˌiasˈita.|0
mwˈana wa ˈuzi ˌalikˈuwa: ˌizrahˈia. wˈana wa ˌizrahˈia wˌalikˈuwa: mˌikaˈeli, ˌobadˈia, joˈeli na iʃˈia. wˈote hˈawa watˈano wˌalikˈuwa wakˈuu wˈao.|0
kˌuliŋɡˈana na ukˈoo wa ɟamˈaa zˈao, wˌalikˈuwa na wˈatu hodˈari wa vˈita wˌapatˈao θˌeleθˈininasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa na wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˈeŋɡi.|0
wˈana watˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini wˌalikˈuwa: bˈela, bekˈeri na jˌediaˈeli.|0
wˈana wa bekˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: zemˈira, joˈaʃi, ˌeliezˈeri, ˌeliˌoenˈai, ˈomri, jˌeremˈoθi, abˈija, ˌanaθˈoθi na ˌalemˈeθi. hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa bekˈeri.|0
mwˈana wa jˌediaˈeli ˌalikˈuwa: bilhˈani. wˈana wa bilhˈani wˌalikˈuwa: jeˈuʃi, bˌeɲamˈini, ehˈudi, kˌenaˈana, zeθˈani, tarʃˈiʃi na ˌahiʃahˈari.|0
wˈana wa naftˈali wˌalikˈuwa: jˌahziˈeli, ɡˈuni, jesˈeri na ʃalˈumu; hˈao wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa bˈilha.|0
wˈana wa manˈase wˌalikˈuwa: ˌasiriˈeli ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈao wˌake kˌutokˈana na surˈia wˌake wa kˌiarˈamu. hˈuju surˈia ˌakamzˈaa makˈiri bˈaba wa ɡˌileˈadi.|0
makˈiri ˌakatwˈaa ˈm̩ke kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌahupˈimu na wˌaʃupˈimu. ɟˈina la dˈada jˌake ˌaliˈitwa maˈaka. mwˈana wa pˈili wa makˈiri ˌaliˈitwa sˌelofehˈadi, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa na wˌasitʃˈana tˈu.|0
maˈaka mkˈewe makˈiri ˌakamzˈaa mwˈana ˌalijemwˈita perˈeʃi. ɟˈina la nduɡˈuje lˌilikˈuwa ʃerˈeʃi. wˈana wa perˈeʃi wˌalikˈuwa ulˈamu na rakˈemu.|0
mwˈana wa ulˈamu ˌalikˈuwa: bedˈani. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa ɡˌileˈadi mwˈana wa makˈiri, mwˈana wa manˈase.|0
dˈada jˌake ˌalijeˈitwa hˌamolekˈeθi ˌaliwazˈaa ˈiʃ hˈodi, ˌabiezˈeri na mˈahla.|0
wˈana wa ʃemˈida wˌalikˈuwa: ˌahiˈani, ʃekˈemu, lˈiki na ˌaniˈamu.|0
wˈana wa ˌefraˈimu wˌalikˈuwa: ʃuθˈela, ambˈaje ˌalimzˈaa berˈedi, berˈedi ˌakamzˈaa tahˈaθi, tahˈaθi ˌakazˈaa ˌeleˈada, ˌeleˈada ˌakamzˈaa tahˈaθi.|0
tahˈaθi ˌakamzˈaa zabˈadi, na zabˈadi ˌakamzˈaa ʃuθˈela. ezˈeri na ˌeleˈadi wˌaliuˈawa na weɲˈeɟi wa ɡˈaθi wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda hˌuko kˌuwaɲaŋɡˈaɲa mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
bˈaba jˈao ˌefraˈimu ˌakawˌaombˌolezˈea kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi, na ɟamˈaa zˌake wakˈaɟa kˌumfarˈiɟi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakakutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wˌake tˈena, nˌaje ˌakatʃukˈua mˈimba, ˌakamzalˈia mwˈana. ˌakamwˈita berˈia, kwa sabˈabu ja misˈiba ˌilijˌoipˈata ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
berˈia ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti ɟˈina lˈake ʃeˈera. hˈuju n̩dˈije ˌaliiɟˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi ja bˈeθ horˈoni ja ɟˈuu na bˈeθ horˈoni ja tʃˈini, pamˈoɟa na ˈuzen ʃeˈera.|0
tahˈani ˌakamzˈaa ladˈani, ladˈani ˌakamzˈaa ˌamihˈudi, ˌamihˈudi ˌakamzˈaa ˌeliʃˈama.|0
ˌeliʃˈama ˌakamzˈaa nˈuni, nˈuni ˌakamzˈaa joʃˈua.|0
ˈn̩tʃi zˈao na makˈazi jˈao jˌaliɟˌumuˈiʃa beθˈeli na viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌouzuŋɡˈuka, nˌaarˈani ˌilikˈuwa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, ɡezˈeri pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, pˈia ʃekˈemu na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake hˌadi kˌufikˈia ˈaja na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
katˌika mipˈaka ja manˈase wˌalikuwˈepo bˈeθ ʃˈani, tˌaanˈaki, meɡˈido na dˈori pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake. wˈana wa josˈefu mwˈana wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi hˌii.|0
wˈana wa aʃˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: ˈimna, ˈiʃva, ˈiʃvi na berˈia. dˈada jˈao ˌalikˈuwa sˈera.|0
wˈana wa berˈia wˌalikˈuwa: hebˈeri na mˌalkiˈeli, ˌalijekˈuwa bˈaba jˌake bˌirzaˈiθi.|0
hebˈeri ˌakawazˈaa jaflˈeti, ʃomˈeri na hoθˈamu, na ʃˈua dˈada jˈao.|0
wˈana wa jaflˈeti wˌalikˈuwa: pasˈaki, bimhˈali na aʃvˈaθi. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa jaflˈeti.|0
wˈana wa ʃemˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: ˈahi, rˈoɡa, jehˈuba na arˈamu.|0
wˈana wa helˈemu ndˈuɡu jˌake wˌalikˈuwa: sˈofa, ˈimna, ʃelˈeʃi na amˈali.|0
wˈana wa sˈofa wˌalikˈuwa: sˈua, hˌarnefˈeri, ʃuˈali, bˈeri, ˈimra.|0
bezˈeri, hˈodu, ʃˈama, ʃˈilʃa, iθrˈani na beˈera.|0
wˈana wa jeθˈeri wˌalikˈuwa: jefˈune, pˈispa na ˈara.|0
wˈana wa ˈula wˌalikˈuwa: ˈara, hˌaniˈeli na risˈia.|0
hˈawa wˈote n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wazˈao wa aʃˈeri, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao, wˈatu bˈora, mˌaʃuɟˈaa walˈio hodˈari na vˌioŋɡˈozi mˌaarˈufu. idˈadi ja wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa tajˈari kwa vˈita, kˌama ˌilivjˌooroðˈeʃwa katˌika ukˈoo wˈao, wˌalikˈuwa ˌiʃirˈininasˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
bˌeɲamˈini ˌakamzˈaa: bˈela mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza, aʃbˈeli mwanˈawe wa pˈili, ahˈara mwanˈawe wa tˈatu.|0
nˈoha mwanˈawe wa ˈn̩ne na rˈafa mwanˈawe wa tˈano.|0
wˈana wa bˈela wˌalikˈuwa: adˈari, ɡˈera, ˌabihˈudi.|0
ˌabiʃˈua, nˌaamˈani, ahˈoa.|0
ɡˈera, ʃˌefufˈani na hurˈamu.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wazˈao wa ehˈudi, wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi hˌuko ɡˈeba na ambˈao wˌalihˌamiʃˈiwa mˌanahˈaθi.|0
nˌaamˈani, ahˈija na ɡˈera. ɡˈera ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˈao ˈuza na ˌahihˈudi na n̩dˈije ˌaliwˌaoŋɡˈoza kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
ʃˌaharaˈimu ˌaliwazˈaa wˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja moˈabu baˌada ja kuwˈapa talˈaka wˌake zˌake wawˈili jaˈani, huʃˈimu na baˈara.|0
kwa mkˈewe hodˈeʃi, ˌakawazˈaa wˈana sˈaba: jobˈabu, sibˈia, mˈeʃa, malkˈamu.|0
jeˈuzi, sakˈia na mˈirma. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wanˈawe, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
huʃˈimu ˌalimzalˈia: ˌabitˈubu na ˌelpaˈali.|0
wˈana wa ˌelpaˈali wˌalikˈuwa: ebˈeri, miʃˈamu, ʃemˈedi ˌalijˌeiɟˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi ja ˈono na lˈodi, pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vˌilivjˌoizuŋɡˈuka.|0
na berˈia na ʃˈema, wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa zˈile ɟamˈaa zˌilizokˈuwa zˌinaˈiʃi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ˌaijalˈoni, na ambˈao wˌaliwˌafukˈuza weɲˈeɟi wa ɡˈaθi.|0
wˈana wa berˈia wˌalikˈuwa ahˈio, ʃaʃˈaki, jˌeremˈoθi.|0
zˌebadˈia, arˈadi, edˈeri.|0
mˌikaˈeli, ˈiʃpa, na jˈoha.|0
zˌebadˈia, mˌeʃulˈamu, hˈizki, hebˈeri.|0
ˌiʃmerˈai, izlˈia na jobˈabu n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa ˌelpaˈali.|0
jakˈimu, zˈikri, zˈabdi.|0
ˌelienˈai, sˌileθˈai, ˌeliˈeli.|0
wˈana wa ʃaʃˈaki wˌalikˈuwa iʃpˈani, ebˈeri, ˌeliˈeli.|0
abdˈoni, zˈikri, hanˈani.|0
hˌananˈia, elˈamu, ˌanθoθˈija.|0
ifdˈeja na pˌenuˈeli.|0
ʃˌamʃerˈai, ʃˌeharˈia, ˌaθalˈia.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao wakˈuu, kˌama ˌilivjˌooroðˈeʃwa katˌika kˈoo zˈao, nˌao wˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
jˌeiˈeli ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake ɡˌibeˈoni nˌaje ˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni. ˈm̩ke wˌake ˌaliˈitwa maˈaka.|0
ɡedˈori, ahˈio, zekˈeri.|0
na miklˈoθi ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake ʃimˈea. hˈawa pˈia wˌaliˈiʃi karˈibu na ɟamˈaa zˈao hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˈeri ˌakamzˈaa kˈiʃi, kˈiʃi ˌakamzˈaa saˈuli, saˈuli ˌakamzˈaa jˌonaθˈani, mˈalki ʃˈua, ˌabinadˈabu na ˈeʃ baˈali.|0
wˈana wa mˈika wˌalikˈuwa: piθˈoni, melˈeki, tarˈea na ahˈazi.|0
ahˈazi ˌakamzˈaa jˌehoˈada. nˌaje jˌehoˈada ˌakawazˈaa ˌalemˈeθi, ˌazmawˈeθi na zˈimri, nˌaje zˈimri ˌakamzˈaa mˈosa.|0
asˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sˈita; hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina jˈao: ˌazrikˈamu, bokˈeru, ˌiʃmaˈeli, ʃˌearˈia, ˌobadˈia na hanˈani. hˈawa wˈote n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa asˈeli.|0
wˈana wa eʃˈeki, nduɡˈuje asˈeli, wˌalikˈuwa: mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa ulˈamu, wa pˈili jeˈuʃi na wa tˈatu ˌelifelˈeti.|0
wˈana wa ulˈamu wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa hodˈari wˌaliowˈeza kˌutumˈia upˈinde. ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˈeŋɡi na wˌaɟukˈuu, ɟˈumla jˈao mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini. hˈawa wˈote n̩dˈio wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa bˌeɲamˈini.|0
wˈale wˌaliotˈoka jˈuda, bˌeɲamˈini, ˌefraˈimu na manˈase ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu wˌalikˈuwa.|0
uθˈai mwˈana wa ˌamihˈudi, mwˈana wa ˈomri, mwˈana wa ˈimri, mwˈana wa bˈani, wa wˈana wa perˈesi, mwˈana wa jˈuda.|0
wazˈao wa wˌaʃilˈoni wˌaliorˈudi nˈi: asˈaja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza na wanˈawe.|0
kwa bˌeɲamˈini wˌalikˈuwa: sˈalu mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, mwˈana wa hˌodavˈia, mwˈana wa hˌasenˈua.|0
ibnˈeja mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, ˈela mwˈana wa ˈuzi, mwˈana wa mˈikri; na mˌeʃulˈamu mwˈana wa ʃˌefatˈia, mwˈana wa rˌeuˈeli, mwˈana wa ibnˈija.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka bˌeɲamˈini kˌama wˌalivjˌooroðˈeʃwa katˌika kˈoo zˈao ɟˈumla jˈao ni mˌiatˈisa hamsˈininasˈita. wˈatu hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
wa ɟamˈaa za mˌakuhˈani wˌalikˈuwa: jedˈaja, jˌehojarˈibu na jakˈini.|0
ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa hilkˈia, mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, mwˈana wa sadˈoki, mwˈana wa mˌerajˈoθi, mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu ˌalijekˈuwa afˈisa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
adˈaja mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, mwˈana wa paʃˈuri, mwˈana wa malkˈija; mˌaasˈai, mwˈana wa ˌadiˈeli, mwˈana wa jahzˈera, mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, mwˈana wa mˌeʃilemˈiθi, mwˈana wa imˈeri.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa zˈao wˌalikˈuwa mˈoɟa,mˌiasˈabanˌa sitˈini. wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo, wˌaliˌowaɟibˈika kˌuhudˈumu katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ɟamˈaa za walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa: ʃemˈaja, mwˈana wa haʃˈubu, mwˈana wa ˌazrikˈamu, mwˈana wa hˌaʃabˈia, wa wˈana wa merˈari.|0
bˌakbakˈari, herˈeʃi, ɡalˈali na mˌatanˈia mwˈana wa mˈika, mwˈana wa zˈikri, mwˈana wa asˈafu.|0
ˌobadˈia mwˈana wa ʃemˈaja, mwˈana wa ɡalˈali, mwˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni. bˌerekˈia mwˈana wa ˈasa, mwˈana wa ˌelikˈana, ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika viɟˈiɟi vja wˌanetofˈaθi.|0
mˌabawˈabu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana wˌaliorˈudi wˌalikˈuwa: ʃalˈumu, akˈubu, talmˈoni, ˌahimˈani na ndˈuɡu zˈao. ʃalˈumu ˌalikˈuwa mlˈinzi wˌao m̩kˈuu.|0
wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewˈekwa katˌika lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme lˌililokˈuwa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, mpˈaka wakˈati hˈuu. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa mˌabawˈabu wa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈambi ja walˈawi.|0
ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa kˈore, mwˈana wa ˌebiasˈafu, mwˈana wa kˈora, pamˈoɟa na mˌabawˈabu wenzˈake kutˈoka ɟamˈaa jˌake ja kˈora wˌaliwˌaɟibˈika kulˈinda malˈaŋɡo ja hˈema, kˌama vˈile bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamewˌaɟibˈika kulˈinda ˌiŋɡilˈio la maskˈani ja bwˈana.|0
hˈapo zamˈani fˌinehˈasi mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌabawˈabu, nˌaje bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa mˌeʃelemˈia ˌalikˈuwa bawˈabu katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hˈema la kˌukutanˈia.|0
ɟˈumla ja wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa kˌuwa mˌabawˈabu katˌika sakˈafu za kˌupurˈia nafˈaka wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu mˌiambˈili kˈuminambˈili. wˌaliˌandikˈiʃwa kwa kˈoo zˈao kwˈeɲe viɟˈiɟi vjˈao. mˌabawˈabu hˈawa wˌaliwˈekwa katˌika nafˈasi zˈao za kˌuaminˈiwa na daˈudi pamˈoɟa na mwonˈaɟi samwˈeli.|0
wˌao na wazˈao wˌao wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kulˈinda malˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, ɲˈumba ˌilijoˈitwa hˈema.|0
mˌabawˈabu wˌalikˈuwa pˈande zˈote ˈn̩ne: mˌaʃarˈiki, mˌaɣarˈibi, kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini.|0
ndˈuɡu zˈao katˌika viɟˈiɟi vjˈao wˌalikˈuwa wakˈiɟa mˈara kwa mˈara na kˌuwasˌaidˈia katˌika kˈazi zˈao kwa vipˈindi mbˌalimbˈali vja sˈiku sˈaba.|0
lakˈini mˌabawˈabu wˈanne wakˈuu, wˌaliokˈuwa walˈawi, wˌalikˌabiðˈiwa waɟˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja vjˈumba na hazˈina katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌalikˈeʃa mahˈali wˌalipowˈekwa kˌuizuŋɡˈuka ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌiliwapˈasa kˌuilˈinda. pˈia wˌalitˈunza fuŋɡˈuo kwa aɟˈili ja kˌufuŋɡˈua mlˈaŋɡo kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi.|0
baˈaði jˈao wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kutˈunza vifˈaa vˌilivjˌotumˈika katˌika hudˈuma ndˈani ja hekˈalu; wˌalivˌihesˈabu kˈila vˌilipˌoiŋɡˈizwa ndˈani na kˈila vˌilipˌotolˈewa.|0
weŋɡˈine wˌalipaŋɡˈiwa kutˈunza mapˈambo na vifˈaa viŋɡˈine vja pˌatakatˈifu, pamˈoɟa na ˈuŋɡa, divˈai, mafˈuta, uvˈumba na vˌikolˈezo.|0
lakˈini baˈaði ja mˌakuhˈani wˌalifˈaɲa kˈazi ja kˌutʃaŋɡˈaɲa vˌikolˈezo.|0
mlˈawi ˌalijeˈitwa mˌatiθˈia, mwˈana mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa ʃalˈumu, wa ukˈoo wa kˈora, ˌalikˌabiðˈiwa waɟˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja kuˈoka mikˈate ja sadˈaka.|0
wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaimbˈaɟi, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za walˈawi, wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika vjˈumba vja hekˈalu, nˌao hˌawakufˈaɲa ʃuɣˈuli ɲiŋɡˈine jojˈote kwa sabˈabu ˌiliwapˈasa kˌuwaɟibˈika kwa kˈazi hˈijo usˈiku na mtʃˈana.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za walˈawi, wakˈuu kˌama wˌalivjˌooroðˈeʃwa katˌika kˈoo zˈao, nˌao wˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
jˌeiˈeli ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake ɡˌibeˈoni nˌaje ˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni. ˈm̩ke wˌake ˌaliˈitwa maˈaka.|0
mwanˈawe mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa abdˈoni, ˌakafˌuatˈiwa na sˈuri, kˈiʃi, baˈali, nˈeri, nadˈabu.|0
ɡedˈori, ahˈio, zˌekarˈia na miklˈoθi.|0
miklˈoθi ˌakamzˈaa ʃˌimeˈamu. wˌao pˈia wˌaliˈiʃi karˈibu na ɟamˈaa zˈao hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˈeri ˌakamzˈaa kˈiʃi, kˈiʃi ˌakamzˈaa saˈuli. saˈuli ˌakamzˈaa jˌonaθˈani, mˈalki ʃˈua, ˌabinadˈabu na ˈeʃ baˈali.|0
wˈana wa mˈika wˌalikˈuwa: piθˈoni, melˈeki, tarˈea, na ahˈazi.|0
ahˈazi ˌakamzˈaa jˈara, jˈara ˌakawazˈaa ˌalemˈeθi, ˌazmawˈeθi na zˈimri, nˌaje zˈimri ˌakamzˈaa mˈosa.|0
asˈeli ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sˈita, na hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina jˈao: ˌazrikˈamu, bokˈeru, ˌiʃmaˈeli, ʃˌearˈia, ˌobadˈia na hanˈani. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˈana wa asˈeli.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌakapiɡˈana na ˌisraˈeli. wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌakimbˈia, na wˈeŋɡi wˌakauˈawa katˌika mlˈima ɡilbˈoa.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌakawˌafuatˈia kwa bidˈii saˈuli na wanˈawe, wˌakawaˈua jˌonaθˈani, ˌabinadˈabu na mˈalki ʃˈua.|0
mˌapiɡˈano jakˈawa makˈali kˌumzuŋɡˈuka saˈuli na wakˈati wapˈiɡa miʃˈale wˌalipompˈata, wˌakamɟerˈuhi.|0
mbˈeba silˈaha wˌake ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba saˈuli ˌamekˈufa, nˌaje pˈia ˌakaˌuaŋɡukˈia upˈaŋɡa wˌake akˈafa.|0
kwa hˈijo saˈuli na wanˈawe watˈatu wakˈafa, pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba jˌake jˈote.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa bondˈeni wˌalipoˈona kwˌamba ɟˈeʃi lˌimekimbˈia na kwˌamba saˈuli na wanˈawe wˌamekˈufa, wˌaliˈatʃa mˈiɟi jˈao wˌakakimbˈia. nˌao wˌafilˈisti wakˈaɟa na kukˈaa hˈumo.|0
wˌakamvˈua mavˈazi, wˌakatʃukˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈake pamˈoɟa na silˈaha zˈake, wˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja wˌafilˈisti kˌutaŋɡˈaza habˈari hˈizi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa sanˈamu zˈao na wˈatu wˈao.|0
wˌaliwˈeka silˈaha zˌake katˌika hekˈalu la miˈuŋɡu jˈao, wˌakatundˈika kˈitʃwa tʃˈake katˌika hekˈalu la daɡˈoni.|0
wakˈazi wˈote wa jabˈeʃi ɡˌileˈadi wˌalipˌosikˈia jˈote wˌafilˈisti wˌalijˌomtendˈea saˈuli.|0
mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌao wˈote wˌakaondˈoka, wˌakautwˈaa mwˈili wa saˈuli na miˈili ja wanˈawe, wˌakailˈeta jabˈeʃi. wˌakaizˈika mifˈupa jˈao tʃˈini ja ˈm̩ti mkˈubwa hˌuko jabˈeʃi, nˌao wˌakafˈuŋɡa kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
saˈuli ˌalikˈufa kwa sabˈabu hakˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu kwa bwˈana. hˌakuliʃˈika nˈeno la bwˈana, hˌata ˌakatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa mwaɡˈuzi kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi.|0
hˌakumˌuulˈiza bwˈana. kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌalimuˈua, na ufˈalme akˈampa daˈudi mwˈana wa jˈese.|0
ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌalimɟˈia daˈudi kwa pamˈoɟa hˌuko hebrˈoni wˌakamwambˈia, sˌisi ni ɲˈama jˈako na dˈamu jˈako.|0
zamˈani, wakˈati saˈuli ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme, wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌulijˌeioŋɡˈoza ˌisraˈeli vitˈani, nˌaje bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalikˌuambˈia, wˌewe ˌutawatʃˈuŋɡa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, na ˌutakˈuwa mtawˈala wˈao..|0
wazˈee wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamewasˈili kwa mfˈalme daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni, ˌalifˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˌao hˌuko hebrˈoni mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌao wˌakamtˈia daˈudi mafˈuta ˈawe mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, sˌawasˈawa na bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi kˌupitˈia kwa samwˈeli.|0
daˈudi na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌakaˈenda jˌerusalˈemu n̩dˈio jebˈusi. nˌao wˌajebˈusi wˌalioˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
wˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, wˌewe hˌutaiŋɡˈia hˈumu. hˌata hˈivjo, daˈudi ˌakaitˈeka ŋɡˈome ja sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, jejˈote ˌaoŋɡozˈaje mˌaʃambulˈizi ðˈidi ja wˌajebˈusi, ˌatakˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari m̩kˈuu. joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja akˈawa wa kwˈanza kukwˈea, nˌaje akˈawa m̩kˈuu.|0
daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa makˈao jˌake kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome, hˈivjo ˌukaˈitwa ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi pˈande zˈote, kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe mˈito hˌadi kwˈeɲe ukˈuta kˌuzuŋɡˈuka, wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo joˈabu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa sehˈemu ziŋɡˈine zˌilizobˈaki za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
daˈudi ˌakazˈidi kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na zaˈidi, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wakˈuu wa mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa daˈudi: wˌao pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakaˌuimarˈiʃa ufˈalme wˌake ˌili kˌuenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi.|0
hˌii n̩dˈio orˈoða ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa daˈudi: jˌaʃobeˈamu, mhakmˈoni, ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa; jˌeje ˌaliinˈua mkˈuki wˌake ðˈidi ja wˈatu mˌiatˈatu, ambˈao ˌaliwaˈua katˌika pambˈano mˈoɟa.|0
ˌalijˌefuˈata ˌalikˈuwa ˌeleazˈari, mwˈana wa dodˈai, mwahˈohi, mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈale mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu.|0
hˈujo ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na daˈudi hˌuko pˈas damˈimu, wakˈati wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˌusaɲˈika hˌuko kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita. hˌuko ambˈapo kˌulikˈuwa na ʃˈamba lˌililokˈuwa lˌimeɟˈaa ʃajˈiri, vikˈosi vja ˌisraˈeli vˌikawˌakimbˈia wˌafilˈisti.|0
lakˈini ˌeleazˈari na daˈudi wˌakasimˈama imˈara kˌatikˈati ja lˈile ʃˈamba, nˌao wˌakalˌiʃindanˈia na wˌakawaˈua wˌafilˈisti. nˌaje bwˈana ˌakawˈapa uʃˈindi mkˈubwa.|0
wakˈuu watˈatu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini, wˌalimwendˈea daˈudi katˌika mwˈamba hˌuko kwˈeɲe pˈaŋɡo la ˌadulˈamu, wakˈati kikˈundi tʃa wˌafilˈisti kˌilikˈuwa kˌimepˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
daˈudi ˌakatamˈani mˈaɟi, ˌakasˈema, laˈiti ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡenˌipatˈia mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua kutˈoka kisˈima kˌilitʃˈoko karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
kwa hˈivjo wˈale watˈatu, wˌakapˈita kˌatikˈati ja sˈafu za wˌafilˈisti, wˌakatʃˈota mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwa kisˈima kilˈitʃo karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la bˌeθlehˈemu, wˌakamletˈea daˈudi. lakˈini jˌeje ˌakakatˈaa kujˈaɲua. badˈala jˈake, ˌalijˌamimˈina mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ˌakasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌapiʃˈie mbˈali kwˌamba nifˈaɲe hˈivi! ɟˈe kwˈeli, niˈiɲue dˈamu ja wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌohatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈao? kwa sabˈabu wˌalihˌatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈao kˌujalˈeta jˈale mˈaɟi, daˈudi hˌakukubˈali kujˈaɲua. hˈuo n̩dˈio ˌuliokˈuwa ˌuɟasˈiri wa wˈale mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu.|0
ˌalitˌunukˈiwa heʃˈima mˌaradˈufu ja wˈale watˈatu, akˈawa ɟˌemadˈari wˈao, iŋɡˈawa hˌakuhˌesabˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˌalimuˈua mmˈisri ˌalijekˈuwa na urˈefu kˌama ðirˈaa tˈano. iŋɡˈawa mmˈisri ˌalikˈuwa na mkˈuki kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mfumˈaɟi mkonˈoni mwˈake, benˈaja ˌalimwendˈea na rˈuŋɡu. ˌakamɲaŋɡˈaɲa mmˈisri mkˈuki wˌake na kˌumuˈua nˈao.|0
hˈaja jˌalikˈuwa mˈambo ja ˌuʃuɟˈaa ja benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada; nˌaje pˈia ˌalikˈuwa mˌaarˈufu kˌama wˈale mˌaʃuɟˈaa watˈatu.|0
jˌeje ˌalihˌeʃimˈiwa zaˈidi ja wˈale θˌelaθˈini, lakˈini hˌakuɟˌumuˈiʃwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale watˈatu: daˈudi ˌakamwˈeka kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wˈake.|0
wˈale wˈatu mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌalikˈuwa: ˌasahˈeli nduɡˈuje joˈabu, ˌelhanˈani mwˈana wa dˈodo kutˈoka bˌeθlehˈemu.|0
ʃamˈoθi mharˈori, helˈesi mpelˈoni.|0
ˈira mwˈana wa ikˈeʃi kutˈoka tekˈoa, ˌabiezˈeri kutˈoka ˌanaθˈoθi.|0
sˌibekˈai mhuʃˈaθi, ilˈai mwahˈohi.|0
mˌaharˈai mnˌetofˈaθi, helˈedi mwˈana wa baˈana, mnˌetofˈaθi.|0
itˈai mwˈana wa ribˈai kutˈoka ɡibˈea ja bˌeɲamˈini, benˈaja mpˌiraθˈoni.|0
hurˈai kutˈoka mabˈonde ja ɡaˈaʃi, ˌabiˈeli mwˌaribˈaθi.|0
ˌazmawˈeθi mbˌaharˈumi, ˌeliˈaba mʃˌaalbˈoni.|0
wˈana wa haʃˈemu mɡilˈoni, jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ʃaɡˈee mharˈari.|0
ˌahiˈamu mwˈana wa sakˈari mharˈari, ˌelifˈale mwˈana wa ˈuru.|0
hefˈeri mmˌekerˈaθi, ahˈija mpelˈoni.|0
hˈezro mkarmˈeli, nˌaarˈai mwˈana wa ezbˈai.|0
joˈeli nduɡˈuje naθˈani, mibhˈari mwˈana wa hˈaɡri.|0
selˈeki mwamˈoni, nˌaharˈai mbˌeerˈoθi, mbˈeba silˈaha wa joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja.|0
ˈira mwiθˈiri, ɡarˈebu mwiθˈiri.|0
urˈia mhˈiti, zabˈadi mwˈana wa alˈai.|0
adˈina mwˈana wa ʃˈiza mrˌeubˈeni, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa wˌareubˈeni, akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu θˌelaθˈini.|0
hanˈani mwˈana wa maˈaka, jˌoʃafˈati mmˈiθni.|0
uzˈia mwˌaʃterˈaθi, ʃˈama na jˌeiˈeli wˈana wa hoθˈamu mwˌaroˈeri.|0
jˌediaˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˈimri, nduɡˈuje jˈoha mtˈizi.|0
ˌeliˈeli mmahˈawi, jˌeribˈai na jˌoʃavˈia wˈana wa ˌelnaˈamu, ˈiθma mmoˈabu.|0
ˌeliˈeli, na obˈedi na jˌaasiˈeli mmˌesobˈai.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu wˌaliomɟˈia daˈudi hˌuko siklˈaɡi, wakˈati ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefukˈuzwa mbˈele ja saˈuli mwˈana wa kˈiʃi wˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌaliˌomsaidˈia daˈudi vitˈani.|0
wˌalikˈuwa na pˈinde na wˌalikˈuwa na uwˈezo wa kupˈiɡa miʃˈale ˌau kutˈupa mˈawe kwa kombˈeo wˌakitumˈia mkˈono wa kuʃˈoto ˌau wa kulˈia; hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa ndˈuɡu zˌake saˈuli kutˈoka kabˈila la bˌeɲamˈini.|0
m̩kˈuu wˌao ˌalikˈuwa ˌahiezˈeri, na wa pˈili joˈaʃi, wˈote wˈana wa ʃemˈaa mɡˌibeˈaθi; pˈia jˌeziˈeli na pelˈeti wˈana wa ˌazmawˈeθi; berˈaka, jˈehu mwˌanaθˈoθi.|0
na iʃmˈaja mɡˌibeˈoni, ʃuɟˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini; jˌeremˈia, jˌahaziˈeli, jˌohanˈani, jˌozabˈadi, mɡˌederˈaθi.|0
ˌeluzˈai, jˌeremˈoθi, bˌealˈia, ʃˌemarˈia, ʃˌefatˈia, mharˈufi.|0
ˌelikˈana, iʃˈia, ˌazarˈeli, jˌoezˈeri na jˌaʃobeˈamu, wˈana wa kˈora.|0
joˈela na zˌebadˈia, wˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, kutˈoka ɡedˈori.|0
baˈaði ja waɡˈadi wˌakaɟitˈeŋɡa na kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na daˈudi katˌika ŋɡˈome jˌake hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani. wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa hodˈari, wˌaliokˈuwa tajˈari kwa vˈita na wˌeɲe uwˈezo wa kˌutumˈia ŋɡˈao na mkˈuki. ɲˈuso zˈao zˌilikˈuwa ɲˈuso za sˈimba na wˌalikˈuwa na wepˈesi kˌama pˈaa mˌilimˈani.|0
ezˈeri ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˈao, ˌobadˈia ˌalikˈuwa wa pˈili katˌika ˌuoŋɡˈozi, ˌeliˈabu wa tˈatu.|0
miʃmˈana wa ˈn̩ne, jˌeremˈia wa tˈano.|0
atˈai wa sˈita, ˌeliˈeli wa sˈaba.|0
jˌohanˈani wa nˈane, ˌelzabˈadi wa tˈisa.|0
jˌeremˈia wa kˈumi, na mˌakbanˈai wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa.|0
hˈawa waɡˈadi wˌalikˈuwa mˌaɟemadˈari. ˌalijekˈuwa wa mwˈiʃo kulˈiko wˈote ˌaliwˈeza kˌuoŋɡˈoza askˈari mˌiamˈoɟa, na ˌalijekˈuwa na uwˈeza zaˈidi ja wˈote ˌalioŋɡˈoza mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
wˌao n̩dˈio wˌalivˈuka ˈm̩to jordˈani katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza ukˈiwa ˌumefurˈika hˌadi kwˈeɲe kˈiŋɡo zˌake zˈote na kˌusababˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi kwˈeɲe mabˈonde kˌukimbilˈia mˌaʃarˈiki na weŋɡˈine mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
wˌabeɲamˈini weŋɡˈine na baˈaði ja wˈatu kutˈoka jˈuda pˈia wˌalikˈuɟa kwa daˈudi katˌika ŋɡˈome jˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌuwalˈaki na ˌakawˌaambˈia, kˌama mmekˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu kwa amˈani, kˌunisˌaidˈia, mˌimi nˈiko tajˈari kˌuwaruhˈusu nˈiɲi kˌuuŋɡˈana nˈami. lakˈini kˌama mmekˈuɟa ˌili kˌunisalˈiti kwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu wakˈati mˌimi mikˈono jˈaŋɡu haˈina hatˈia, bˌasi mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈetu aˈone na ˌawahukˈumu.|0
kˈiʃa rˈoho akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja ˌamasˈai, m̩kˈuu wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini, nˌaje ˌakasˈema: sˌisi tu wˈatu wˈako, ˈee daˈudi! nˌasi tˈuko pamˈoɟa na wˈewe, ˈee mwˈana wa jˈese! uʃˈindi, nˈaam, uʃˈindi ˈuwe kwˈako, pˈia uʃˈindi kwa wˈale walˈio upˈande wˈako, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌusaidˈia. kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakawˌapokˈea na kˌuwafˈaɲa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa vikˈosi vjˈake vja ˌuvamˈizi.|0
baˈaði ja wˈatu kutˈoka kabˈila la manˈase wˌakaɟiˈuŋɡa na daˈudi wakˈati ˌalikwˈenda pamˈoɟa na wˌafilˈisti, kˌupiɡˈana na saˈuli. daˈudi na wˈatu wˌake hˌawakˌuwasˌaidˈia wˌafilˈisti kwa sabˈabu, baˌada ja ˌuʃaˈuri, wˌatawˈala wˌao wˌalimrudˈiʃa. wˌakasˈema, ˌitatˌuɣarˈimu vˈitʃwa vjˈetu kˌama daˈudi ˌatatuˈasi na kurˈudi kwa saˈuli bwˈana wˈake..|0
daˈudi ˌalipokwˈenda siklˈaɡi, hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu wa kabˈila la manˈase wˌaliˌoɟiˈuŋɡa nˈaje: ˈadna, jˌozabˈadi, jˌediaˈeli, mˌikaˈeli, jˌozabˈadi, elˈihu na sˌileθˈai, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa vikˈosi vja wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika kabˈila la manˈase.|0
wˌalimsˌaidˈia daˈudi ðˈidi ja makˈundi ja ˌuvamˈizi, kwa kˌuwa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa hodˈari na wˌalikˈuwa mˌaɟemadˈari katˌika ɟˈeʃi lˈake.|0
sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku wˈatu wˌalikˈuɟa kˌumsaidˈia daˈudi, mpˈaka akˈawa na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, kˌama ɟˈeʃi la mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟiandˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita wˌaliokˈuɟa kwa daˈudi hˌuko hebrˈoni ˌili kˌumtwalˈia ufˈalme kutˈoka kwa saˈuli, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda, wˌanaˌotʃukˈua ŋɡˈao na mikˈuki wˌalikˈuwa sˈita,mˌianˈane wˈote wakˈiwa tajˈari kwa vˈita.|0
wˈatu wa sˌimeˈoni, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌaliokˈuwa tajˈari kwa vˈita wˌalikˈuwa sˈaba,mˌiamˈoɟa.|0
pamˈoɟa na jˌehojˈada, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja arˈoni, ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu tˈatu,mˌiasˈaba.|0
na sadˈoki, kiɟˈana ʃuɟˈaa na hodˈari, ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa ˌiʃirˈini na wawˈili kutˈoka ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini, ndˈuɡu zˌake saˈuli, wˌalikˈuwa tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri; wˈeŋɡi wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌendelˈea kˌuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa saˈuli mpˈaka wakˈati hˈuo.|0
wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu, mˌaʃuɟˈaa hodˈari ˌiʃirˈini,mˌianˈane, wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaarˈufu katˌika kˈoo zˈao.|0
wˈatu wa nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase, wˌaliotˈaɟua kwa maɟˈina ˌili wˈaɟe kumwˈeka daˈudi kˌuwa mfˈalme, wˈatu kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisakˈari, wˌaliˌofahˈamu maɟˈira na kuɟˈua kˈile ambˈatʃo ˌisraˈeli ˌinapˈasa kufˈaɲa, wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi mˌiambˈili, pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa zˈao wˈote tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
wˈatu wa zˌabulˈoni, askˈari wˌeɲe ˌuzoˈefu mkˈubwa wˌaliˌoandalˈiwa tajˈari kwa vˈita wakˈiwa na silˈaha za kˈila aˈina, ˌili kˌumsaidˈia daˈudi kwa ˌuaminˈifu θabˈiti, wˌalikˈuwa hamsˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
wˈatu wa aʃˈeri, askˈari ˌarobaˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌeɲe ˌuzoˈefu mkˈubwa wˌaliˌondalˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
wˈote hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˌaliˌoɟitolˈea kˌutumˈika katˌika sˈafu zˈao. wˌalikˈuɟa hebrˈoni wakˈiwa wˌameamˈua kˌikamilˈifu kumfˈaɲa daˈudi mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli jˈote. wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌalikˈuwa pˈia na nˈia hˈijo mˈoɟa ja kumfˈaɲa daˈudi kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
wˈatu hˈawa wˌakakˈaa hˌuko na daˈudi sˈiku tˈatu, wakˈila na kˈuɲua, kwa sabˈabu ɟamˈaa zˈao zˌilikˈuwa zˌimewˌapatˈia mˌahitˈaɟi jˈao.|0
pˈia, mˌaɟirˈani zˈao hˌata wˈale walˈio mbˈali hˌadi ˌisakˈari, zˌabulˈoni na naftˈali, wˌalikˈuɟa wˌakiwˌaletˈea vjakˈula wˌalivjˌovibˈeba kwa pˈunda, ŋɡamˈia, ɲˈumbu na maksˈai. kˌulikuwˈepo na wˈiŋɡi wa ˈuŋɡa, mˌaandˈazi ja tˈini, mˌaandˈazi ja zabˈibu kˈavu, divˈai, mafˈuta, ŋɡˈombe na kondˈoo, kwa maˈana kˌulikˈuwa na furˈaha katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌaliʃˌauriˈana na kˈila afˈisa wˈake, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakalˌiambˈia kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli, kˌama mkiˈona ni vjˈema, na kˌama ni mapˈenzi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌupelˈeke uɟˈumbe kwa ndˈuɡu zˈetu weŋɡˈine walˈio mbˈali na walˈio karˈibu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, pˈia kwa mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌao katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao na katˌika sehˈemu zˈao za malˈiʃo jˈao, wˈaɟe wˌauŋɡˈane na sˈisi.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikakˌubaliˈana kufˈaɲa hˈivjo, kwa sabˈabu ˌiliˌonekˈana vjˈema kwa wˈatu wˈote.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩to ʃihˈori ˌuliˈoko mˈisri hˌadi lˈebo hamˈaθi, ˌili kˌulilˈeta sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu.|0
wˌakalˌisafirˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kwa ɡˈari ɟˈipja la kˌukokˈotwa na maksˈai kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ˌabinadˈabu, ˈuza na ahˈio wˌakilˌioŋɡˈoza ɡˈari hˈilo.|0
daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌanasˈifu kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˈote mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu, kwa ɲˈimbo na kwa vinˈubi, zˈeze, matˈari, mˌatoˈazi na tˌarumbˈeta.|0
wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka wa kidˈoni, ˈuza ˌakaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ˌili kˌulizuˈia sandˈuku, kwa sabˈabu maksˈai wˌaliɟikwˈaa.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˈuza, ˌakampˈiɡa kwa sabˈabu ˌaliuwˈeka mkˈono wˌake kwˈeɲe sandˈuku. kwa hˈijo akˈafa pˈale mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakakˌasirˈika kwa sabˈabu ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ˌilifurˈika ðˈidi ja ˈuza, mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa pˈeres ˈuza hˌadi lˈeo.|0
sˈiku ˈile daˈudi ˌakamwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu nˌaje ˌakaulˈiza. nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌulitʃukˈua sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌakulˌitʃukˈua hˌilo sandˈuku akˈae nˈalo katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. badˈala jˈake, ˌakalˌipelˈeka ɲumbˈani kwa ˈobed edˈomu, mɡˈiti.|0
sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu lˌikabˈaki pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa ja ˈobed edˈomu, ɲumbˈani kwˈake kwa miˈezi mitˈatu, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakaˌibarˈiki ɲˈumba jˌake pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃokˈuwa nˈatʃo.|0
bˌasi hirˈamu mfˈalme wa tˈiro ˌakawatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa daˈudi, wakˈiwa na maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi, waˈaʃi na mˌaseremˈala ˌili kˌumɟeŋɡˈea ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu daˈudi ˌakaˈoa wˌake weŋɡˈine zaˈidi na akˈawa bˈaba wa wˈana na mabˈinti wˈeŋɡi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja watˈoto wˌaliˌozalˈiwa kwˈake hˌuko: ʃamˈua, ʃobˈabu, naθˈani, sˌolomˈoni.|0
ˌibihˈari, ˌeliʃˈua, ˌelpelˈeti.|0
nˈoɡa, nefˈeɡi, jafˈia.|0
ˌeliʃˈama, bˌeeliˈada na ˌelifelˈeti.|0
bˌasi wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌameiŋɡˈia na kˌuʃambulˈia bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu: ɟˈe, niˈende kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia hˈao wˌafilˈisti? ɟˈe, ˌutawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu? bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, nˈenda, nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈako.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake wˌakakwˈea mpˈaka bˈaal pˌerasˈimu, ˌakawaʃˈinda hˌuko. ˌakasˈema, kˌama mˈaɟi jˌafurikˈavjo, mˈuŋɡu ˌamewˌafurikˈia adˈui zˈaŋɡu kwa kˌutumˈia mkˈono wˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo mahˈali pˈale pˌakaˈitwa bˈaal pˌerasˈimu.|0
wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈatʃa miˈuŋɡu jˈao hˌuko, daˈudi ˌakaamˈuru ˌiteketˈezwe kwa mˈoto.|0
kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine wˌafilˈisti wˌakavamˈia lˈile bˈonde.|0
hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakamˌuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu tˈena, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌusiwˌapandˈie mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa, bˌali wˌazuŋɡukˈie na ˌuwaʃˌambulˈie kutˈoka mbˈele ja hˈijo mˈiti ja mˌiforosˈadi.|0
mˈara ˌusikiˈapo saˈuti ja kwˈenda ɟˌuːja hˈijo mˈiti ja mˌiforosˈadi, hˈapo ndˈipo utˈoke ˌupiɡˈane vˈita, kwa sabˈabu hˈijo ˌitaoɲˈeʃa kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˌutaŋɡulˈia ˌili kupˈiɡa ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama ˌalivjˌoaɡˈizwa na mˈuŋɡu, wˌakalipˈiɡa ɟˈeʃi la wˌafilˈisti kˌuanzˈia ɡˌibeˈoni hˌadi ɡezˈeri.|0
hˈivjo ˌumaarˈufu wa daˈudi ˌukaenˈea katˌika kˈila ˈn̩tʃi, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakajafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˈote kˌumwoɡˈopa daˈudi.|0
baˌada ja daˈudi kˌuɟiɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba zˌake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza sehˈemu kwa aɟˈili ja sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu, kˈiʃa ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa hˈema kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakasˈema, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kˌulibˈeba sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu ˌisipokˈuwa walˈawi pˈeke jˈao, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌaliwˌatʃaɡˈua kˌulibˈeba sandˈuku la bwˈana na kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele zˌake milˈele.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli wˈote hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌili kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana na kˌulilˈeta hˌadi kwˈeɲe sehˈemu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa wazˈao wa arˈoni na walˈawi.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa kohˈaθi, ˌuriˈeli kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa merˈari, asˈaja kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake mˌiambˈilinˌa iʃirˈini.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa ɡerʃˈoni, joˈeli kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa ˌelisafˈani, ʃemˈaja kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake mˌiambˈili.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa hebrˈoni, ˌeliˈeli kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake θˌemanˈini.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa ˌuziˈeli, ˌaminadˈabu kˌioŋɡˈozi na ndˈuɡu zˌake mˌiamˈoɟa kˈuminambˈili.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakawaˈita mˌakuhˈani sadˈoki na ˌabiaθˈari, pamˈoɟa na walˈawi ˌuriˈeli, asˈaja, joˈeli, ʃemˈaja, ˌeliˈeli na ˌaminadˈabu.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi n̩dˈio vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za walˈawi. nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na walˈawi wenzˈenu ˌinawapˈasa mɟˌitakˈase na kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli hˌadi mahˈali ambˈapo nˌimetˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ˌilikˈuwa ni kwa sabˈabu hˌii, nˈiɲi walˈawi, hˌamkulˌipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana mˈara ja kwˈanza, hˌata ˌikasˌababˈiʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kuwˈaka hasˈira ðˈidi jˈetu. hˌatukˌumuulˈiza ɟˈinsi ja kufˈaɲa ˌili tupˈate kˌulilˈeta ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌakuhˈani pamˈoɟa na walˈawi wˌakaɟˌitakˈasa ˌili kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌao walˈawi wˌakalˌitʃukˈua sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao wˌakitumˈia mipˈiko, kˌama vˈile mˈose ˌalivjˌoamˈuru sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˌaambˈia vˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈawi kˌuwawˈeka ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌaimbˈaɟi ˌili waˈimbe ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe, wakˈiwa na vjˈombo vja ˌuimbˈaɟi: zˈeze, vinˈubi na mˌatoˈazi.|0
bˌasi walˈawi wˌakawawˈeka hemˈani mwˈana wa joˈeli; kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈake, asˈafu mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia; kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌamerˈari, eθˈani mwˈana wa kˌuʃaˈija.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa kˌuwa wˌasaidˈizi wˈao: zˌekarˈia, jˌaaziˈeli, ʃˌemiramˈoθi, jˌehiˈeli, ˈuni, ˌeliˈabu, benˈaja, mˌaasˈeja, mˌatiθˈia, ˌelifelˈehu, miknˈeja, pamˈoɟa na mˌabawˈabu ˈobed edˈomu na jˌehiˈeli.|0
wˌaimbˈaɟi hemˈani, asˈafu na eθˈani wˌalitʃˌaɡulˈiwa kupˈiɡa mˌatoˈazi ja ʃˈaba.|0
zˌekarˈia, ˌaziˈeli, ʃˌemiramˈoθi, jˌehiˈeli, ˈuni, ˌeliˈabu, mˌaasˈeja na benˈaja wˌalikˈuwa wapˈiɡa zˈeze kˌufuatˈana na saˈuti ja ˌalamˈoθi.|0
na mˌatiθˈia, ˌelifelˈehu, miknˈeja, ˈobed edˈomu, jˌehiˈeli na ˌazazˈia wˌalikˈuwa wapˈiɡa vinˈubi, wˌakioŋɡˈozwa kwa kˌufuˈata saˈuti ja ʃˌeminˈiθi.|0
kˌenanˈia kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈawi ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ˌuimbˈaɟi; hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌuliokˈuwa waɟˈibu wˌake kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa stˈadi katˌika hˈilo.|0
bˌerekˈia na ˌelikˈana wˌalikˈuwa mˌabawˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja sandˈuku.|0
ʃˌebanˈia, jˌoʃafˈati, nˌeθanˈeli, ˌamasˈai, zˌekarˈia, benˈaja na ˌeliezˈeri, mˌakuhˈani, wˌalikˈuwa wapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta mbˈele ja sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu. ˈobed edˈomu na jehˈija wˌaliwˈekwa pˈia kˌuwa mˌabawˈabu wa sandˈuku.|0
bˌasi daˈudi pamˈoɟa na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli na mˌaɟemadˈari wa vikˈosi vja ˈelfu wˌakaˈenda ˌili kˌulipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja ˈobed edˈomu kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌasaidˈia walˈawi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanalˌitʃukˈua sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana, mˌafahˈali sˈaba na kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba wˌalitolˈewa ðabˈihu.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ɟˈoho la kitˈani sˈafi, kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamevˈaa walˈawi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanalˌitʃukˈua lˈile sandˈuku, wˌaimbˈaɟi nˌao wˌalivˈaa vˈivjo hˈivjo, pamˈoɟa na kˌenanˈia ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanaoŋɡˈoza ɲˈimbo za wˌaimbˈaɟi. daˈudi ˌalivˈaa pˈia kˌisibˈau tʃa kitˈani sˈafi.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakalˌipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe, wˌakipˈiɡa pˈembe za kondˈoo dˈume, tˌarumbˈeta, mˌatoˈazi, wˌakipˈiɡa zˈeze na vinˈubi.|0
sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana lˌilipokˈuwa lˌinaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, mikˈali bˈinti saˈuli ˌakatʃˌuŋɡulˈia dˌiriʃˈani. nˌaje ˌalipomwˈona mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakitʃˈeza na kˌuʃerˌehekˈea, ˌakamðarˈau mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
wˌakalˈeta sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu na kˌuliwˈeka ndˈani ja hˈema ambˈalo daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˌisimamˈiʃa kwa aɟˈili jˈake, na wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja daˈudi kˌumalˈiza kutˈoa hˈizo sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na hˈizo sadˈaka za amˈani, ˌakawˌabarˈiki wˈatu katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamɡawˈia kˈila mwˌisraˈeli mwˌanaˈume na mwanˈamke mkˈate, andˈazi la tˈende na andˈazi la zabˈibu kˈavu.|0
ˌakawawˈeka pˈia baˈaði ja walˈawi ˌili wˌahudˈumu mbˈele ja sandˈuku la bwˈana kufˈaɲa maˈombi, kˌumʃukˈuru na kumsˈifu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
asˈafu n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˈao, ˌakisˌaidˈiwa na zˌekarˈia, jˌeiˈeli, ʃˌemiramˈoθi, jˌehiˈeli, mˌatiθˈia, ˌeliˈabu, benˈaja, ˈobed edˈomu na jˌeiˈeli. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaŋɡepˈiɡa zˈeze na vinˈubi, asˈafu ˌaŋɡepˈiɡa mˌatoˈazi.|0
nˌao benˈaja na jˌahaziˈeli mˌakuhˈani, n̩dˈio wˌaŋɡepˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta mˈara kwa mˈara mbˈele ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la mˈuŋɡu.|0
sˈiku ˈile, kˈitu tʃa kwˈanza daˈudi ˌalitʃofˈaɲa ni kˌumkabˈiði asˈafu na wenzˈake zabˈuri hˌii ja ʃukrˈani kwa bwˈana.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, lˌiitiˈeni ɟˈina lˈake; wˌaɟuliʃˈeni mˌataˈifa jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni jˈeje, mwˌimbiˈeni jˌeje sˈifa; wˌaambiˈeni matˈendo jˌake jˈote ja aɟˈabu.|0
mtˌafutˈeni bwˈana na ŋɡˈuvu zˈake; ˌutafutˈeni ˈuso wˌake sˈiku zˈote.|0
kumbˈuka matˈendo ja aɟˈabu ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, mˌiuɟˈiza jˌake na hukˈumu ˌalizˌozitˈamka.|0
ˈeɲi wazˈao wa ˌisraˈeli mtumˈiʃi wˈake, ˈeɲi wˈana wa jakˈobo, wˌateˈule wˈake.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu; hukˈumu zˌake zˈimo dˌuniˈani pˈote.|0
hˌulikumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈake milˈele, nˈeno ambˈalo ˌaliamˈuru, kwa vizˈazi ˈelfu.|0
aɡˈano ˌalilˌolifˈaɲa na ˌabrahˈamu, kiˈapo ˌalitʃˌomwapˈia isˈaki.|0
ˌalilˌiθibitˈiʃa kwa jakˈobo kˌuwa ˈamri, kwa ˌisraˈeli lˈiwe aɡˈano la milˈele.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa watʃˈatʃe kwa idˈadi, watʃˈatʃe sˈana na waɡˈeni ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˌalitˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kutˈoka taˈifa mˈoɟa hˌadi ɟiŋɡˈine, kutˈoka ufˈalme mmˈoɟa hˌadi mwiŋɡˈine.|0
hˌakuruhˈusu ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌawaonˈee; kwa aɟˈili jˈao ˌaliwˌakemˈea wafˈalme, ˌakisˈema.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana dunˈia jˈote; tˌaŋɡazˈeni wokˈovu wˌake sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni ˌutukˈufu wˌake kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu, mwˌeɲe kˌustahˈili kˌusifˈiwa kulˈiko wˈote; jˌeje ni wa kˌuoɡˈopwa kulˈiko miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
kwa maˈana miˈuŋɡu jˈote ja mˌataˈifa ni sanˈamu, lakˈini bwˈana ˌaliziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu.|0
fahˈari na ˈenzi vˈiko mbˈele jˈake; ŋɡˈuvu na ˌutukˈufu vˈimo pˌatakatˈifu pˈake.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana, ˈeɲi ɟamˈaa za mˌataˈifa, mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu ˌunaˌostahˈili ɟˈina lˈake. letˈeni sadˈaka na ˈm̩ɟe katˌika ɲˈua zˈake; mwˌabudˈuni bwˈana katˌika uzˈuri wa ˌutakatˈifu wˈake.|0
dunˈia jˈote na ˌitetemˈeke mbˈele zˈake! ˌulimwˈeŋɡu ˌameuwˈeka imˈara; hˌauwˈezi kˌusoɡˈezwa.|0
bahˈari na ivˈume, na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake; maʃˈamba na jˌaʃaŋɡilˈie, na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mˈiti ja msitˈuni ˌitaˈimba, ˌitaˈimba kwa furˈaha mbˈele za bwˈana, kwa maˈana ˌanakˈuɟa kˌuihukˈumu dunˈia.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana kwa kˌuwa ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˌatukˈuzwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ʃˈu milˈele na hˌata milˈele. nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakasˈema, ˈamen, na msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwˈatʃa asˈafu na wenzˈake mbˈele ja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana ˌili wˌahudˈumu hˈumo mˈara kwa mˈara, kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌahitˈaɟi ja kˈila sˈiku.|0
pˈia ˌakamwˈatʃa ˈobed edˈomu pamˈoɟa na wenzˈake sitˈini na wanˈane wˌahudˈumu pamˈoɟa nˈao. ˈobed edˈomu mwˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni na pˈia hˈosa wˌalikˈuwa mˌabawˈabu wa lˈaŋɡo.|0
ˌili kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa mˈara kwa mˈara, ˌasubˈuhi na ɟiˈoni, sˌawasˈawa na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌaliˌohudˈumu pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌalikˈuwa hemˈani, jˌeduθˈuni na wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa na kutˈaɟua kwa ɟˈina kˈumpa bwˈana ʃukrˈani, kwa maˈana faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
hemˈani na jˌeduθˈuni wˌalikˈuwa na waɟˈibu wa kupˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, mˌatoˈazi na kˌutumˈia vjˈombo viŋɡˈine kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈimbo za sˈifa kwa mˈuŋɡu. wˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni wˌaliwˈekwa laŋɡˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌakaondˈoka, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kˌuibarˈiki ɟamˈaa jˈake.|0
