baˌada ja daˈudi kˌuiŋɡˈia rˈasmi katˌika ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme, ˌakamwambˈia nabˈii naθˈani, hˈebu tazˈama, mˌimi nˌinakˈaa kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba nzˈuri ˌilijoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa mˌierˈezi, wakˈati sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana lˈiko ndˈani ja hˈema.|0
naθˈani ˌakamɟˈibu daˈudi, lolˈote ulˈilo nˈalo mojˈoni mwˈako litˈende, kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
usˈiku ˈule nˈeno la mˈuŋɡu lˌikamɟˈia naθˈani, kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: wˌewe hˌutanˌiɟeŋɡˈea mˌimi ɲˈumba ˌili nikˈae hˈumo.|0
mˌimi sˌiɟakˈaa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile nˌilijˌowatˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka lˈeo. nˌimehˈama kutˈoka hˈema mˈoɟa hˌadi ɟiŋɡˈine na kutˈoka mahˈali pamˈoɟa hˌadi peŋɡˈine.|0
ɟˈe, popˈote nˌilipokwˈenda pamˈoɟa na wˌaisraˈeli wˈote, wakˈati wowˈote nˌilimwambˈia kˌioŋɡˈozi jejˈote nˌilijˌemwaɡˈiza kˌuwatʃˈuŋɡa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini hˌuɟanˌiɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba ja mˌierˈezi?.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, mwambˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˌilikˌutʃukˈua mˌatʃuŋɡˈani na kutˈoka kˌuandˈama kondˈoo ˌili ˌuwatawˈale wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌami nˌitawˌapatˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli mahˈali na nˌitawˈapa ˌili wˈawe na mahˈali pˈao weɲˈewe pa kuˈiʃi na wˌasisˌumbulˈiwe tˈena. wˈatu waˈovu hˌawatˌawaonˈea tˈena, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa mwanzˈoni.|0
na ambˈavjo wˌamefˈaɲa sˈiku zˈote ʃˈu nˌilipˌowatʃaɡˈua vˌioŋɡˈozi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli. pˈia nˌitawˌatiˈiʃa adˈui zˈenu wˈote.  pamˈoɟa na hˈajo nˌinakˌuambˈia kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatakˌuɟeŋɡˈea ɲˈumba.|0
wakˈati wˈako ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumekwˈiʃa, nˌawe ukˈawa ˌumekwˈenda kukˈaa na bˈaba zˈako, nˌitamwinˈua m̩zˈao wˈako ˌaiŋɡˈie mahˈali pˈako kˌuwa mfˈalme, mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wˈako mweɲˈewe, nˌami nˌitaufˈaɲa imˈara ufˈalme wˈake.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakifˈaɲa imˈara kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme wˌake milˈele.|0
mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa mwanˈaŋɡu. kˈamwe sˌitaondˈoa upˈendo wˈaŋɡu kwˈake, kˌama nˌilivjˌouondˈoa kwa jˌeje ˌalijˌekutˌaŋɡulˈia.|0
nˌitamwˈeka ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu na ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu milˈele; kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi nˌitakifˈaɲa imˈara milˈele..|0
naθˈani ˌakamwarˈifu daˈudi manˈeno jˈote ja maˈono hˈaja.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani, ˌakakˈeti mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌakasˈema: mˌimi ni nˈani, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, na ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu ni nˈini, hˌata ˌumenilˈeta mpˈaka hˈapa nilˈipo.|0
kˈana kwˌamba hˈili hˌalitˈoʃi matʃˈoni pˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌumenˈena pˈia kuhˈusu sˈiku ziɟˈazo za ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako. ˌumenˌiaŋɡalˈia kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌetukˈuka kulˈiko wˈatu wˈote, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
daˈudi awˈeza kˌukuambˈia nˈini zaˈidi kuhˈusu kˌumheʃˈimu mtumˈiʃi wˈako? kwa maˈana wˌewe ˌunamɟˈua mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu. kwa aɟˈili ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako, tˈena sˌawasˈawa na mapˈenzi jˈako, ˌumefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili kˈubwa sˈana na kˌuɟulˈiʃa ahˈadi hˈizi zˈote zilˈizo kˈubwa sˈana.|0
hakˈuna alˈije kˌama wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, wˈala hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu ˈila wˈewe, kˌama vˈile tˌulivjˌosikˈia kwa mˌasikˈio jˈetu weɲˈewe.|0
nˌaje ni nˈani alˈije kˌama wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli: taˈifa pekˈee dˌuniˈani ambˈalo mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌalitˈoka kwˈenda kˌulikombˈoa kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe na kˌuɟifaɲˈia ɟˈina kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe, kwa kufˈaɲa mˌaaɟˈabu makˈubwa na ja kutˈiʃa kwa kˌuwafukˈuza mˌataˈifa mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈako, ambˈao ˌuliwˌakombˈoa kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
ˌuliwafˈaɲa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa wˈatu wˈako wˌewe mweɲˈewe milˈele, nˈawe, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, ˌumekˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, bwˈana ahˈadi ˌulijowˈeka kuhˈusu mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ɲˈumba jˌake na ˌuiθˌibitˈiʃe milˈele. fˈaɲa kˌama ˌulivjˌoahˈidi.|0
ˌili ˌiθibitˈike na ɟˈina lˈako lˌitakˈuwa kˈuu milˈele. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌatasˈema, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. nˈajo ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi ˌitafˈaɲua imˈara mbˈele zˈako.|0
wˈewe, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌumemfˌunulˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi kwˌamba ˌutamɟeŋɡˈea jˌeje ɲˈumba. hˈivjo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamekˈuwa na ˌuɟasˈiri wa kˌukuˈomba maˈombi hˈaja.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu! ˌumemwahˈidi mtumˈiʃi wˈako mˈambo hˈaja mazˈuri.|0
bˌasi ˌimekˌupendˈeza kˌuibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌili idˈumu milˈele matʃˈoni pˈako; kwa aɟˈili jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumeˌibarˈiki, nˈajo ˌitabˌarikˈiwa milˈele.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, daˈudi ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌafilˈisti na kˌuwatiˈiʃa, nˌaje ˌakautwˈaa ɡˈaθi pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌouzuŋɡˈuka kutˈoka ˌutawˈala wa wˌafilˈisti.|0
pˈia daˈudi ˌakawaʃˈinda wˌamoˈabu, wakˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, nˌao wakˈawa wˌanamletˈea uʃˈuru.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, daˈudi ˌakapiɡˈana na hˌadadezˈeri mfˈalme wa sˈoba, hˌadi hamˈaθi, wakˈati ˌalikwˈenda kˌuimarˈiʃa ˌutawˈala wˌake katˌika ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈeka maɡˈari ja vˈita mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa maɡˈari jˈake, wˌaendˈeʃa hˈajo maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa na farˈasi sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na askˈari wa miɡˈuu ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. daˈudi ˌakakˈata miʃˈipa ja miɡˈuu ja ɲˈuma ja farˈasi wˈote wˌakokotˈao maɡˈari, ˈila ˌakabakˈiza mˌiamˈoɟa.|0
wˌaarˈamu wa damˈeski, wˌalipokˈuɟa kˌumsaidˈia hˌadadezˈeri mfˈalme wa sˈoba, daˈudi ˌakawˌaʃambulˈia na kˌuwaˈua ˌiʃirˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˈeka askˈari walˈinzi katˌika ufˈalme wa wˌaarˈamu hˌuko damˈeski. bˌasi wˌaarˈamu wakˈawa watˈumwa wa daˈudi, na kumlˈipa uʃˈuru. bwˈana akˈampa daˈudi uʃˈindi kˈote ˌalipokwˈenda.|0
kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja tibhˈaθi na kˈuni, ˌilijokˈuwa mˈiɟi ja hˌadadezˈeri, daˈudi ˌakatwˈaa ʃˈaba ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana, ambˈajo sˌolomˈoni ˌaliˌitumˈia kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea ˈile bahˈari ja ʃˈaba, zˈile ŋɡˈuzo na vifˈaa mbˌalimbˈali vja ʃˈaba.|0
tˈou mfˈalme wa hamˈaθi ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba daˈudi ˌameliʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi lˈote la hˌadadezˈeri mfˈalme wa sˈoba.|0
ˌakamtˈuma mwanˈawe, hˌadorˈamu kwa mfˈalme daˈudi ˌili kˌumsalˈimu na kˌumpoŋɡˈeza kwa uʃˈindi wˌake katˌika vˈita ðˈidi ja mfˈalme hˌadadezˈeri, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepiɡˈana vˈita mˈara ɲˈiŋɡi na tˈou. hˌadorˈamu ˌakamletˈea daˈudi vifˈaa mbˌalimbˈali vja ðahˈabu, fˈeða na ʃˈaba.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakaviwˈeka vifˈaa hˈivi wˈakfu kwa bwˈana kˌama vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa kwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameitwˈaa katˌika mˌataˈifa jˈote hˈaja: edˈomu na moˈabu, wˌaamˈoni, wˌafilˈisti na wˌaamalˈeki.|0
ˌakawˈeka kˈambi za askˈari walˈinzi hˌuko edˈomu, nˌao wˌaedˈomu wˈote wakˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wa daˈudi. bwˈana akˈampa daˈudi uʃˈindi kˈila ˌalipokwˈenda.|0
daˈudi ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli jˈote, ˌakitˈenda lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa kwa wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌalikˈuwa ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi; jˌehoʃafˈati mwˈana wa ˌahilˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mwˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
sadˈoki mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu na ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌabiaθˈari wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani; ʃaˈuʃa ˌalikˈuwa mwandˈiʃi.|0
nˌaje benˈaja mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa wˌakerˈeθi na wˌapelˈeθi; nˌao wˈana wa daˈudi wˌalikˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wakˈuu katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, nahˈaʃi mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni akˈafa, mwanˈawe ˌakaiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake.|0
daˈudi ˌakawˈaza, nˌitamtendˈea wˈema hanˈuni mwˈana wa nahˈaʃi, kwa sabˈabu bˈaba jˌake ˌalinˌitendˈea wˈema. hˈivjo daˈudi ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe ˌili kˌumfarˈiɟi hanˈuni kwa aɟˈili ja kˈifo tʃa bˈaba jˈake. wˈatu wa daˈudi wˌalipofˈika kwa hanˈuni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈoni ˌili kˌumfarˈiɟi.|0
wakˈuu wa wˌaamˈoni wˌakamwambˈia hanˈuni, hˈivi ˌunaðˈani daˈudi ˌanamheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈako kwa kˌuwatˈuma waɟˈumbe kˌukufarˈiɟi? ɟˈe, hˈawa wˈatu hˌawakˈuɟa kˌuipˌelelˈeza na kˌuidadˈisi ˈn̩tʃi ˌili wˌaiʃˈinde.|0
kwa hˈijo hanˈuni ˌakawˌakamˈata wˈatu wa daˈudi, ˌakawaɲˈoa ndˈevu ˌakakˈata ŋɡˈuo zˈao kˌatikˈati kwˈeɲe matˈako, ˌakawaˈatʃa waˈende zˈao.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌalipˌotambˈua kˌuwa wˌamekˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo kwa daˈudi, hanˈuni na wˌaamˈoni wˌakatˈuma talˈanta mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða ˌili kˌukodˈiʃa maɡˈari ja vˈita pamˈoɟa na wˌaendeʃˈaɟi wa hˈajo maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈotwa na farˈasi, kutˈoka arˈamu nˌaharaˈimu, arˈamu maˈaka na sˈoba.|0
wˌakakodˈiʃa maɡˈari ja vˈita θˌeleθˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri jakˈiwa na wˌaendeʃˈaɟi wˈake, pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme wa maˈaka na vikˈosi vjˈake, wakˈaɟa na kupˈiɡa kˈambi karˈibu na medˈeba. wˌaamˈoni nˌao wˌakakˌusaɲˈika tˌoka mˈiɟi jˈao, wˌakatˈoka ˌili kˌupiɡˈana vˈita.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakamtˈuma joˈabu na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la wˌapiɡanˈaɟi.|0
joˈabu ˌakaˈona kˌuwa mbˈele jˌake na ɲˈuma jˌake kˌumepˈaŋɡwa vˈita; kwa hˈijo ˌakatʃaɡˈua baˈaði ja vikˈosi vilˈivjo bˈora sˈana katˌika ˌisraˈeli ˌakavipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌaarˈamu.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˈale wˌanaɟˈeʃi weŋɡˈine wˌaliobˈaki tʃˈini ja ˈamri ja ˌabiʃˈai ndˈuɡu jˈake, nˌao wˌakapˈaŋɡwa ˌili wˌakabˌiliˈane na wˌaamˈoni.|0
joˈabu ˌakasˈema, kˌama wˌaarˈamu wˌatanizˈidi ŋɡˈuvu, bˌasi ˌitakupˈasa wˌewe ˌunisˌaidˈie; lakˈini kˌama wˌaamˈoni wˌatakuzˈidi ŋɡˈuvu, bˌasi mˌimi nˌitakˌusaidˈia.|0
ˈuwe hodˈari na tˌupiɡˈane kwa ˌuɟasˈiri kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈetu na mˈiɟi ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌalipoˈona wˌaarˈamu wˌanakimbˈia, nˌao pˈia wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele ja nduɡˈuje ˌabiʃˈai na kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi. bˌasi joˈabu ˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
baˌada ja wˌaarˈamu kuˈona kwˌamba wˌameʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, wˌakapelˈeka waɟˈumbe na kˌuwatˈaka wˌaarˈamu weŋɡˈine kutˈoka ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati, wˌakioŋɡˈozwa na ʃofˈaki, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la hˌadadezˈeri.|0
daˈudi ˌalipˌoambˈiwa hˈaja, ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli wˈote na kuvˈuka jordˈani. ˌakasˈoŋɡa mbˈele ðˈidi jˈao na ˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa kˌuwakabˈili. daˈudi ˌakapˈaŋɡa vˈita ˌili kˌupiɡˈana na wˌaarˈamu, nˌao wˌakapiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈake.|0
lakˈini wˌaarˈamu wˌakakimbˈia mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje daˈudi ˌakawaˈua wˌaendˈeʃa maɡˈari sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na askˈari wˌao wa miɡˈuu ˌarobaˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. pˈia ˌakamuˈua ʃofˈaki, ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi lˈao.|0
raˈija wa hˌadadezˈeri wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa wˌameʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli, wˌakafˈaɲa mˌapatˈano ja amˈani na daˈudi, wakˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake. hˈivjo wˌaarˈamu hˌawakˌukubˈali kˌuwasˌaidˈia wˌaamˈoni tˈena.|0
mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa mwˈaka ˈm̩pja, wakˈati ambˈapo wafˈalme huˈenda vitˈani, joˈabu ˌalilˌioŋɡˈoza ɟˈeʃi. ˌaliˌaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈoni, na ˌakaˈenda rˈaba na kˌuuziŋɡˈira, lakˈini daˈudi ˌalibˈaki jˌerusalˈemu. joˈabu ˌakaʃˌambulˈia rˈaba na kˌuuˈatʃa ukˈiwa maɡˈofu.|0
ˌakawatˈoa wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa hˈumo, ˌakawawˈeka wafˈaɲe kˈazi kwa mˌisumˈeno, sulˈulu za tʃˈuma na maʃˈoka. daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivi kwa mˈiɟi jˈote ja wˌaamˈoni. kˈiʃa daˈudi na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote wˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, kˌulitokˈea vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti, hˌuko ɡezˈeri. wakˈati hˈuo sˌibekˈai, mhuʃˈaθi, ˌakamuˈua sipˈai, ˌalijekˈuwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa wˌarefˈai, nˌao wˌafilˈisti wˌakaʃˈindwa.|0
katˌika vˈita viŋɡˈine tˈena, vˌilivjˌopiɡˈanwa hˌuko ɡˈaθi, kˌulikuwˈako na ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa mkˈubwa mwˌeɲe vidˈole sˈita katˌika kˈila mkˈono na vidˈole sˈita katˌika kˈila m̩ɡˈuu: ɟˈumla vidˈole ˌiʃirˈini na vˈinne. jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa pˈia m̩zˈao wa mrefˈai.|0
ˌalipˌowaðihˈaki ˌisraˈeli, jˌonaθˈani, mwˈana wa ʃimˈea, nduɡˈuje daˈudi, ˌakamuˈua.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio wazˈao wa wˌarefˈai hˌuko ɡˈaθi, nˌao wˌaliaŋɡˈuka kwa mikˈono ja daˈudi na wˈatu wˈake.|0
ʃetˈani ˌakainˈuka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli na kˌumʃawˈiʃi daˈudi ˌahesˈabu wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia joˈabu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, nendˈeni mkˌawahesˈabu wˌaisraˈeli kˌuanzˈia bˈeer ʃˈeba mpˈaka dˈani. kˈiʃa nˌileteˈeni tˌaarˈifa ˌili kwˌamba niwˈeze kˌufahˈamu wˈako waŋɡˈapi.|0
joˈabu ˌakaɟˈibu, bwˈana na ˌaoŋɡˈeze ɟˈeʃi lˈake mˈara mˈia na zaˈidi. mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kwˈani hˈawa wˈote si raˈija wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu? kwa nˈini bwˈana wˈaŋɡu ˌunatˈaka kufˈaɲa hˈivi? kwa nˈini kulˈeta hatˈia ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, nˈeno la mfˈalme likˈawa na ŋɡˈuvu ɟˌuːja joˈabu; kwa hˈijo joˈabu ˌakaondˈoka na kˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˌisraˈeli jˈote kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
joˈabu akˈampa daˈudi ɟˈumla ja idˈadi ja wˈatu wˌanaowˈeza kˌupiɡˈana. katˌika ˌisraˈeli kˌulikˈuwa na wˈatu mˈoɟa,mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌutumˈia upˈaŋɡa na katˌika jˈuda wˈatu mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa sabˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
lakˈini joˈabu hˌakuwˌahesˈabu walˈawi na wˌabeɲamˈini, kwa sabˈabu ˌalitʃukˈizwa sˈana na ˈamri ja mfˈalme.|0
ˈamri hˌii ˌilikˈuwa m̩bˈaja matʃˈoni pa mˈuŋɡu pˈia; hˈivjo ˌakaˌiaðˈibu ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi kˈubwa kwa kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili. sˈasa, nˌinakusˈihi, ondˈoa hatˈia ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako. nˌimefˈaɲa ɟˈambo la kˌipumbˈavu sˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ɡˈadi, mwonˈaɟi wa daˈudi.|0
kwa hˈijo ɡˈadi ˌakamwendˈea daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: tʃaɡˈua.|0
miˈaka mitˈatu ja ɲɟˈaa, ˌau miˈezi mitˈatu ja kuʃˈindwa na adˈui zˈako, ˌukipˈatwa na upˈaŋɡa wˈao, ˌau sˈiku tˈatu za upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana, jaˈani, sˈiku tˈatu za taˈuni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakiˌaŋɡamˈiza kˈila mahˈali katˌika ˌisraˈeli. sˈasa bˈasi, amˈua ɟˈinsi nˌitakˌavjomɟˈibu jˌeje ˌalijˌenitˈuma.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia ɡˈadi, ninˈajo mˌahaŋɡaˈiko makˈubwa. mˌimi na nˌiaŋɡˈuke mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana kwa maˈana rehˈema zˌake ni kˈuu ˈm̩no, lakˈini ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaŋɡukˈie mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakatˈuma taˈuni katˌika ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu sabˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wa ˌisraˈeli wakˈafa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakapelˈeka mˌalaˈika kˌuaŋɡamˈiza jˌerusalˈemu. lakˈini mˌalaˈika ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakifˈaɲa hˈivjo, bwˈana ˌakaˈona na ˌakahˌuzunˈika kwa sabˈabu ja maˈafa, ˌakamwambˈia jˈule mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌanaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu, jatˈoʃa! rudˈiʃa mkˈono wˈako. wakˈati hˈuo mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama katˌika sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka ja ˌaraˈuna mjebˈusi.|0
daˈudi ˌakajˌainˈua mˈatʃo jˌake ˌakamwˈona hˈujo mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama kˌatikˈati ja mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia, nˌaje ˌameˌuɲoˈoʃa upˈaŋɡa wˌake ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu tajˈari kˌuaŋɡamˈiza. kˈiʃa daˈudi na wazˈee, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia, wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, ɟˈe, si mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijˌeamˈuru wˈatu wˌahesabˈiwe? mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijetˈenda ðˈambi na kukˈosa. hˈawa ni kondˈoo tˈu. wˌamefˈaɲa nˈini? ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mkˈono wˈako na ˈuwe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu mˌimi na ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu, lakˈini ˌusiˈatʃe taˈuni hˌii ˌiendelˈee ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈako.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwamˈuru ɡˈadi ˌamwambˈie daˈudi apˈande na kˌumɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka ja ˌaraˈuna mjebˈusi.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakakwˈea, ˌakalitˈii lˈile nˈeno ambˈalo ɡˈadi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelisˈema katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
ˌaraˈuna ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakipˈura ŋɡˈano, ˌakaɡeˈuka ˌakamwˈona jˈule mˌalaˈika. wanˈawe wˈanne wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakaɟifˈitʃa, jˌeje ˌakaˌendelˈea kupˈura ŋɡˈano.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakakˌaribˈia, ˌaraˈuna ˌalipˌotazˈama na kumwˈona, ˌakaondˈoka kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka ˌakamsˌuɟudˈia daˈudi ˌakiˌuinamˈiʃa ˈuso wˌake arðˈini.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia, nˌipatˈie hˈuu uwˈaɲɟa wˈako wa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka ˌili niwˈeze kuɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana taˈuni ipˈate kˌukomˈeʃwa katˌika wˈatu. nˌiuzˈie kwa bˈei jˌake kamˈili.|0
ˌaraˈuna ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi, ˌutʃukˈue hˈuo uwˈaɲɟa. mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na afˈaɲe lolˈote ˌanalopˈenda. tazˈama, nˌitatˈoa maksˈai kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, vifˈaa vja kˌupurˈia kˌuwa kˈuni, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈano kwa aɟˈili ja ðabˈihu ja nafˈaka. natˈoa hˈivi vjˈote.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakamɟˈibu ˌaraˈuna, la hˈaʃa! lakˈini nˌinasˌisitˈiza kwˌamba nˌitalˈipa bˈei jˌake kamˈili. sˌitatʃukˈua kilˈitʃo tʃˈako kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ˌau kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ambˈajo hˌainˌiɣarˈimu tʃotʃˈote.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌakamlˈipa ˌaraˈuna ʃekˈeli za ðahˈabu mˌiasˈita kwa aɟˈili ja ˈule uwˈaɲɟa.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakamɟeŋɡˈea bwˈana mˌaðabˈahu mahˈali hˈapo, na kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani. ˌakamwˈita bwˈana nˌaje bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu maˈombi jˌake kwa mˈoto tˌoka mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˈena na jˈule mˌalaˈika, nˌaje ˌakarudˈiʃa upˈaŋɡa wˌake katˌika ˈala jˈake.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, daˈudi ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamemɟˈibu kˈule kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa wa kˌupurˈia nafˈaka wa ˌaraˈuna mjebˈusi, ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu hˌuko.|0
maskˈani ja bwˈana ambˈajo mˈose ˌaliˌiteŋɡenˈeza kˈule ɟaŋɡwˈani, pamˈoɟa na mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa wakˈati hˈuo vˌilikˈuwa vˈiko mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
lakˈini daˈudi hˌakuθubˈutu kˌuisˌoɡelˈea ˌili kˌumuulˈiza mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliˌuoɡˈopa upˈaŋɡa wa jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakasˈema, ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌitakˈuwa mahˈali hˈapa, pˈia pamˈoɟa na mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo daˈudi ˌakatˈoa ˈamri wˌakusaɲˈike waɡˈeni wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi ˌisraˈeli, na kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌakawˈeka waˈaʃi ˌili kutʃˈoŋɡa mˈawe kwa aɟˈili ja kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
daˈudi ˌakatˈoa tʃˈuma tˈele ˌili kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌisumˈari kwa aɟˈili ja mafˈuŋɡo ja malˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba na ʃˈaba tˈele ˌisijˌopimˈika.|0
pˈia ˌakatˈoa maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi jˌasijˌohesabˈika, kwa kˌuwa wˌasidˈoni na watˈiro wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemletˈea daˈudi idˈadi kˈubwa ja mˌierˈezi.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, mwanˈaŋɡu sˌolomˈoni bˈado ni mdˈoɡo wa ˈumri na hˈana ˌuzoˈefu. ɲˈumba ˌitakˌajoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ˌinatakˈiwa ˈiwe jˌeɲe uzˈuri mwˈiŋɡi na sˈifa na fahˈari mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa jˈote. kwa hˈijo nˌitaˌifaɲˈia mˌatajarˈiʃo. daˈudi ˌakafˈaɲa mˌatajarˈiʃo makˈubwa kˈabla ja kˈifo tʃˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwˈita sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe ˌakamwaɡˈiza kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi ˌakamwambˈia sˌolomˈoni: mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌilikˈuwa na ɟˈambo hˈili ndˈani ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˈeno hˈili la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia, kusˈema: wˌewe ˌumemwˈaɡa dˈamu ɲˈiŋɡi na kˌupiɡˈana vˈita vˈiŋɡi. wˌewe hˌutaɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌumemwˈaɡa dˈamu ɲˈiŋɡi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini ˌutakˈuwa na mwˈana ambˈaje ˌatakˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa amˈani na ˌutulˈivu nˌami nitˈampa ˌutulˈivu mbˈele ja adˈui zˌake wˈote pˈande zˈote. ɟˈina lˈake ˌataˈitwa sˌolomˈoni, nˌami nˌitawˈapa ˌisraˈeli amˈani na ˌutulˈivu wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wˈake.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. jˌeje ˌatakˈuwa mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa bˈaba jˈake. nˌami nˌitakifˈaɲa imˈara kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ˌutawˈala wˌake katˌika ˌisraˈeli milˈele..|0
sˈasa, mwanˈaŋɡu, bwˈana ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌawe ˈuwe na mˌafanikˈio upˈate kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, kˌama ˌalivjosˈema ˌutafˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana na akˈupe hekˈima na ˌufahˈamu wakˈati ˌatakuwˈeka ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, ˌili uwˈeze kˌuiʃˈika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌapofˌanikˈiwa, ikˈiwa ˌutakˈuwa na bidˈii kutˈii ˈamri na ʃerˈia bwˈana ˌalizˈompa mˈose kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli. ˈuwe hodˈari na ˌuʃuɟˈaa. ˌusioɡˈope wˈala ˌusikˈate tamˈaa.|0
nˌimeɟˌitaabˈiʃa sˈana ˌili kupˈata mˌahitˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana: talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, talˈanta mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða na kiˈasi kˌisitʃˌopimˈika tʃa ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma, pˈia m̩bˈao na mˈawe. nˌawe wawˈeza kˌuvioŋɡˈeza.|0
unˈao wˌafaɲakˈazi wˈeŋɡi: watʃˈoŋɡa mˈawe, waˈaʃi na mˌaseremˈala, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu walˈio na ustˈadi katˌika kˈila kˈazi.|0
wa kufˈua ðahˈabu, fˈeða, ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma, mafˈundi wˌasiˌohesabˈika. sˈasa bˌasi ˈanza kˈazi hˌii, nˌaje bwˈana ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
kˈiʃa daˈudi ˌakawˌaamˈuru vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌamsaidˈie sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, ɟˈe, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu si jˈuko pamˈoɟa na nˈiɲi? pˈia si ˌamewˈapa rˈaha pˈande zˈote? kwa maˈana ˌamewatˈia weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˈiko tʃˈini ja bwˈana na wˈatu wˈake.|0
sˈasa ˌitoˈeni miˈojo jˈenu na nˈafsi zˈenu katˌika kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. anzˈeni kuɟˈeŋɡa maskˈani ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, ˌili mwˈeze kˌulilˈeta sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana na vjˈombo vˌitakatˈifu vja mˈuŋɡu katˌika hekˈalu lˌitakˌaloɟˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌalipokˈuwa m̩zˈee ˌalijeʃˈiba sˈiku, ˌakamfˈaɲa sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
pˈia ˌakawˌakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi.|0
walˈawi wˌaliokˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini ˌau zaˈidi wˌalihˌesabˈiwa, nˈajo hesˈabu ja wˌanaˈume ˌilikˈuwa θˌeleθˈininanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈawa, ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatasˌimamˈia kˈazi ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na sˈita,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatakˈuwa mˌaafˈisa na wˌaamˈuzi.|0
na ˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatakˈuwa mˌabawˈabu, na weŋɡˈine ˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatamsˈifu bwˈana kwa ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi nˌilizotˈoa kwa aɟˈili ja kusˈudi hˈilo.|0
daˈudi ˌakawaɡˈawa walˈawi katˌika makˈundi kˌufuatˈana na wˈana wa lˈawi: ɡerʃˈoni, kohˈaθi na merˈari.|0
wˈana wa wˌaɡerʃˈoni wˌalikˈuwa wawˈili: ladˈani na ʃimˈei.|0
wˈana wa ladˈani wˌalikˈuwa watˈatu: jˌehiˈeli wa kwˈanza, zeθˈamu na joˈeli.|0
wˈana wa ʃimˈei wˌalikˈuwa watˈatu: ʃˌelomˈoθi, hˌaziˈeli na harˈani. hˈawa watˈatu wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za ladˈani.|0
nˌao wˈana wa ʃimˈei wˌalikˈuwa wˈanne: jahˈaθi, zˈina, jeˈuʃi na berˈia.|0
jahˈaθi ˌalikˈuwa wa kwˈanza na zˈiza wa pˈili, lakˈini jeˈuʃi na berˈia hˌawakˈuwa na wˈana wˈeŋɡi; kwa hˈijo wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌama ɟamˈaa mˈoɟa, wˌakapˈewa waɟˈibu kwa pamˈoɟa.|0
wˈana wa kohˈaθi wˌalikˈuwa wˈanne: amrˈamu, iʃˈari, hebrˈoni na ˌuziˈeli.|0
wˈana wa amrˈamu wˌalikˈuwa: arˈoni na mˈose. arˈoni wˌaliwˈekwa wˈakfu, jˌeje na wazˈao wˌake milˈele, wˈawe wˌakiwˈeka wˈakfu vˈitu ambˈavjo ni vˌitakatˈifu ˈm̩no, kutˈoa ðabˈihu mbˈele za bwˈana, kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele zˌake na kutˈamka barˈaka katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana milˈele.|0
wˈana wa mˈose ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌama sehˈemu ja kabˈila la lˈawi.|0
wˈana wa mˈose wˌalikˈuwa: ɡerʃˈomu na ˌeliezˈeri.|0
wazˈao wa ɡerʃˈomu: ʃˌebuˈeli ˌalikˈuwa wa kwˈanza.|0
wˈana wa iʃˈari: ʃˌelomˈiθi ˌalikˈuwa wa kwˈanza.|0
wˈana wa hebrˈoni wˌalikˈuwa: jerˈia ˌalikˈuwa wa kwˈanza, wa pˈili ˌamarˈia, wa tˈatu jˌahaziˈeli, na wa ˈn̩ne jˌekameˈamu.|0
wˈana wa ˌuziˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: mˈika wa kwˈanza na iʃˈia wa pˈili.|0
wˈana wa merˈari wˌalikˈuwa: mˈahli na mˈuʃi. wˈana wa mˈahli wˌalikˈuwa: ˌeleazˈari na kˈiʃi.|0
ˌeleazˈari akˈafa bˌila ja kˌuwa na wˈana: ˌalikˈuwa na bˈinti tˈu. binˈamu zˈao, wˈana wa kˈiʃi, wˌakawaˈoa.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa lˈawi kwa ɟamˈaa zˈao. wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa kˌama wˌalivjˌoandˈikwa kwa maɟˈina jˈao na kˌuhesabˈiwa kˈila mmˈoɟa, jaˈani, wˌeɲe uwˈezo wa kufˈaɲa kˈazi kˌuanzˈia miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi, wˌaliˌohudˈumu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kwa maˈana daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, kwa vˈile bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌamewˈapa wˈatu wˌake rˈaha na ˌamekˈuɟa kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu milˈele.|0
walˈawi hˌawahitˈaɟi tˈena kubˈeba maskˈani wˈala tʃˈombo tʃotʃˈote tʃa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌaaɡˈizo ja mwˈiʃo ja daˈudi, walˈawi wˌaliˌohesabˈiwa ni wˈale wa kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi.|0
waɟˈibu wa walˈawi ˌulikˈuwa kˌuwasˌaidˈia wazˈao wa arˈoni kˌuhudˈumu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana: kˌuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa ɲˈua, vjˈumba vja pembˈeni, kˌutakˈasa vjˈombo vˌitakatˈifu na ˌutendˈaɟi mwiŋɡˈine wowˈote katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌalikˈuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa mikˈate ˌilijowˈekwa mezˈani, ˈuŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za nafˈaka, mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, ˌuokˈaɟi na ˌutʃaŋɡaɲˈaɟi, pamˈoɟa na vipˈimo vjˈote vja wˈiŋɡi na ukˈubwa.|0
pˈia ˌulikˈuwa waɟˈibu wˌao kˈila ˌasubˈuhi kˌumʃukˈuru na kumsˈifu bwˈana. ˌiliwapˈasa pˈia kufˈaɲa hˈivjo ɟiˈoni.|0
na wakˈati wowˈote sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa zˌilipˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana sˈiku za sabˈato na kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu za mwˈezi mwandˈamo na katˌika sˌikukˈuu ɲiŋɡˈine zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa. ˌiliwapˈasa kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈara kwa mˈara kwa idˈadi maˈalum na kwa nˈamna wˌalijokˈuwa wˌamepˈewa mˌaelekˈezo.|0
hˈivjo walˈawi wˌakafˈaɲa waɟˈibu wˌao katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wa ndˈuɡu zˈao wazˈao wa arˈoni, kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutumˈiʃi katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja wˈana wa arˈoni: arˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˈanne: nadˈabu, abˈihu, ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari.|0
nadˈabu na abˈihu wˌalikˈufa kˈabla ja bˈaba jˈao, nˌao hˌawakˈuwa na wˈana; kwa hˈijo ndˈuɡu zˈao ˌeleazˈari na ˌiθamˈari wˌakahudˈumu kˌama mˌakuhˈani.|0
ˌakisˌaidˈiwa na sadˈoki mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari na ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌiθamˈari, daˈudi ˌaliwapˈaŋɡa wazˈao wa arˈoni katˌika mˌiɡawˈaɲo kˌufuatˈana na waɟˈibu wa hudˈuma zˈao.|0
idˈadi kˈubwa ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌalipˌatikˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wa ˌeleazˈari, kulˈiko mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wa ˌiθamˈari, nˌao wˌaliɡawˈaɲua kwa ˌuwiˈano: vˌioŋɡˈozi kˈumi na sˈita kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja wazˈao wa ˌeleazˈari na vˌioŋɡˈozi wanˈane kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja wazˈao wa ˌiθamˈari.|0
wˌaliwˌaɡawˈaɲa bˌila ˌupendelˈeo kwa kupˈiɡa kˈura, kwa kˌuwa kˌulikˈuwa na mˌaafˈisa wa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na mˌaafˈisa wa mˈuŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wˈale wa ˌeleazˈari na wˈale wa ˌiθamˈari.|0
mwandˈiʃi ʃemˈaja mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈeli, mlˈawi, ˌaliˌoroðˈeʃa maɟˈina jˈao mbˈele ja mfˈalme daˈudi na mˌaafˈisa: kuhˈani sadˈoki, ˌahimelˈeki mwˈana wa ˌabiaθˈari, na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za mˌakuhˈani na za walˈawi: ɟamˈaa mˈoɟa ˌikitˈoka upˈande wa ˌeleazˈari na ɲiŋɡˈine upˈande wa ˌiθamˈari.|0
kˈura ja kwˈanza ˌilimwˌaŋɡukˈia jˌehojarˈibu, ja pˈili jedˈaja.|0
ja tˈatu harˈimu, ja ˈn̩ne sˌeorˈimu.|0
ja tˈano malkˈija, ja sˈita mˌijamˈini.|0
ja sˈaba hakˈosi, ja nˈane abˈija.|0
ja tˈisa jeʃˈua, ja kˈumi ʃˌekanˈia.|0
ja kˈumi na mˈoɟa ˌeliaʃˈibu, ja kˈumi na mbˈili jakˈimu.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈatu hˈupa, ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne jˌeʃebeˈabu.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈano bˈilɡa, ja kˈumi na sˈita imˈeri.|0
ja kˈumi na sˈaba hezˈiri, ja kˈumi na nˈane hˌapisˈesi.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈisa pˌeθahˈia, ja ˌiʃirˈini jˌehezkˈeli.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na mˈoɟa jakˈini, ja ˌiʃirˈini na mbˈili ɡamˈuli.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu delˈaja, ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne mˌaazˈia.|0
hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa n̩dˈio ˌutaratˈibu wˌao ˌuliˌokubalˈika wa kˌuhudˈumu wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana kˌuliŋɡˈana na maʃˈarti wˌalijˌoelekˈezwa na arˈoni bˈaba jˈao, kˌama bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwamˈuru.|0
kuhˈusu wazˈao wa lˈawi wˌaliobˈaki: kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa amrˈamu: ˌalikˈuwa ʃˌubaˈeli; kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa ʃˌubaˈeli: ˌalikˈuwa jedˈeja.|0
kwa wa rˌehabˈia, kutˈoka kwa wanˈawe: iʃˈia ˌalikˈuwa wa kwˈanza.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˌaiʃˈari: ˌalikˈuwa ʃˌelomˈiθi, kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa ʃˌelomˈiθi: ˌalikˈuwa jahˈaθi.|0
wˈana wa hebrˈoni: jerˈia ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu, ˌamarˈia wa pˈili, jˌahaziˈeli wa tˈatu, na jˌekameˈamu wa ˈn̩ne.|0
mwˈana wa ˌuziˈeli: ˌalikˈuwa mˈika; kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa mˈika: ˌalikˈuwa ʃamˈiri.|0
ndˈuɡu jˌake mˈika: ˌalikˈuwa iʃˈia; na kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa iʃˈia: ˌalikˈuwa zˌekarˈia.|0
wˈana wa merˈari: wˌalikˈuwa mˈahli na mˈuʃi. mwˈana wa jˌaazˈia: ˌalikˈuwa bˈeno.|0
wˈana wa merˈari: kutˈoka kwa jˌaazˈia: ni bˈeno, ʃohˈamu, zakˈuri na ˈibri.|0
kutˈoka kwa mˈahli: ˌalikˈuwa ˌeleazˈari, ambˈaje hakˈuwa na wˈana.|0
kutˈoka kwa kˈiʃi: mwˈana wa kˈiʃi: ˌalikˈuwa jˌerameˈeli.|0
nˌao wˈana wa mˈuʃi: wˌalikˈuwa mˈahli, edˈeri na jˌeremˈoθi. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa walˈawi kˌuliŋɡˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao.|0
pˈia wˌalipˈiɡa kˈura kˌama vˈile ndˈuɡu zˈao wazˈao wa arˈoni wˌalivjofˈaɲa, mbˈele ja mfˈalme daˈudi, sadˈoki, ˌahimelˈeki na mbˈele ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja mˌakuhˈani na ja walˈawi. ɟamˈaa za ndˈuɡu wakˈubwa zˌilitendˈewa sˌawasˈawa na zˈile za ndˈuɡu wadˈoɡo.|0
daˈudi, pamˈoɟa na mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, wˌakawatˈeŋɡa baˈaði ja wˈana wa asˈafu, wˈana wa hemˈani na wˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni, kwa aɟˈili ja hudˈuma ja kutˈoa ˌunabˈii, wˌakitumˈia vinˈubi, zˈeze na mˌatoˈazi. hˌii n̩dˈijo orˈoða ja wˈatu wˌaliofˈaɲa hudˈuma hˌii.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa asˈafu wˌalikˈuwa: zakˈuri, josˈefu, nˌeθanˈia na ˌasarˈela. wˈana wa asˈafu wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa asˈafu, ambˈaje ˌalitˈoa ˌunabˈii tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa mfˈalme.|0
wˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni wˌalikˈuwa sˈita: ɡˌedalˈia, sˈeri, jeʃˈaja, ʃimˈei, hˌaʃabˈia, na mˌatiθˈia, nˌao wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa bˈaba jˈao jˌeduθˈuni, wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakitˈoa ˌunabˈii wˌakitumˈia vinˈubi, wˌakimʃukˈuru na kˌumtukˈuza bwˈana.|0
wˈana wa hemˈani wˌalikˈuwa: bukˈia, mˌatanˈia, ˌuziˈeli, ʃˌebuˈeli na jˌeremˈoθi, hˌananˈia, hanˈani, ˌeliˈaθa, ɡidˈalti na romˈamti ezˈeri, jˌoʃbekˈaʃa, malˈoθi, hoθˈiri na mˌahaziˈoθi.|0
wˈote hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa hemˈani mwonˈaɟi wa mfˈalme. ˌaliwapˈata wˈana hˈawa kˌutokˈana na ahˈadi ja mˈuŋɡu ˌili kˌumwinˈua. mˈuŋɡu alˈimpa hemˈani wˈana kˈumi na wˈanne na bˈinti watˈatu.|0
hˈawa wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa bˈaba jˈao kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuimbˈaɟi katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana wˌakitumˈia mˌatoˈazi, zˈeze na vinˈubi, kwa aɟˈili ja hudˈuma katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu. asˈafu, jˌeduθˈuni na hemˈani wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌusimamˈizi wa mfˈalme.|0
pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈao wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefundˈiʃwa na kˌuwa stˈadi wa ˌuimbˈaɟi kwa bwˈana. idˈadi jˈao wˌalikˈuwa mˌiambˈili θˌemanˈininanˈane.|0
viɟˈana kwa wazˈee, walˈimu kwa wˌanafˈunzi, wˈote wˌalipˈaŋɡa kˈazi zˈao kwa kupˈiɡa kˈura.|0
kˈura ja kwˈanza, ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja asˈafu, ˌilimwˌaŋɡukˈia josˈefu, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili ja pˈili ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ɡˌedalˈia, jˌeje na wanˈawe pamˈoɟa na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja tˈatu ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia zakˈuri, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˈn̩ne ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˈisri, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja tˈano ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia nˌeθanˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja sˈita ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia bukˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja sˈaba ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jˌesarˈela, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja nˈane ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jeʃˈaja, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja tˈisa ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia mˌatanˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ʃimˈei, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na mˈoɟa ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˌazarˈeli, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na mbˈili ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia hˌaʃabˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈatu ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ʃˌubaˈeli, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia mˌatiθˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈano ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jˌeremˈoθi, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na sˈita ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia hˌananˈia, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na sˈaba ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jˌoʃbekˈaʃa, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na nˈane ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia hanˈani, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja kˈumi na tˈisa ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia malˈoθi, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˌeliˈaθa, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na mˈoɟa ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia hoθˈiri, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na mbˈili ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ɡidˈalti, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia mˌahaziˈoθi, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia romˈamti ezˈeri, wanˈawe na ɟamˈaa zˈake, kˈuminambˈili.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja mˌabawˈabu: kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa kˈora ˌalikˈuwa: mˌeʃelemˈia mwˈana wa kˈore, mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa asˈafu.|0
mˌeʃelemˈia ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˌafuatˈao: zˌekarˈia mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, jˌediaˈeli wa pˈili, zˌebadˈia wa tˈatu, jˌaθniˈeli wa ˈn̩ne.|0
elˈamu wa tˈano jˌehohanˈani wa sˈita na ˌeliˌehoenˈai wa sˈaba.|0
ˈobed edˈomu nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˌafuatˈao: ʃemˈaja mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza, jˌehozabˈadi wa pˈili, jˈoa wa tˈatu, sakˈari wa ˈn̩ne, nˌeθanˈeli wa tˈano.|0
ˌamiˈeli wa sˈita, ˌisakˈari wa sˈaba, na pˌeuleθˈai wa nˈane. kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamembarˈiki ˈobed edˈomu..|0
ʃemˈaja mwanˈawe pˈia ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana, wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈao kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo mkˈubwa.|0
wˈana wa ʃemˈaja nˈi: ˈoθni, rˌefaˈeli, obˈedi na ˌelizabˈadi; ɟamˈaa zˌake elˈihu na sˌemakˈia wˌalikˈuwa pˈia wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wazˈao wa ˈobed edˈomu; wˌao na wˈana wˌao na ɟamˈaa zˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈuvu za kufˈaɲa kˈazi. wazˈao wa ˈobed edˈomu ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa sitˈini na wawˈili.|0
mˌeʃelemˈia ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈake, wˌaliokˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo: ɟˈumla jˈao wˈatu kˈumi na wanˈane.|0
hˈosa, mmerˈari, ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana wˌafuatˈao: ʃˈimri ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˌao bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈeka jˌeje kˌuwa m̩kˈuu ˌiɟapokˈuwa hakˈuwa mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
hilkˈia wa pˈili, tˌabalˈia wa tˈatu na zˌekarˈia wa ˈn̩ne. wˈana na ɟamˈaa za hˈosa ɟˈumla jˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu kˈumi na watˈatu.|0
hˌii mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja mˌabawˈabu, kˌupitˈia wakˈuu wˈao, wˌalikˈuwa na zˈamu za kˌuhudˈumu hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana kˌama ɟamˈaa zˈao wˌalivjokˈuwa nˈazo.|0
kˈura zˌilipˈiɡwa kwa kˈila lˈaŋɡo, kˌufuatˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao, wakˈubwa kwa wadˈoɡo.|0
kˈura ja lˈaŋɡo la mˌaʃarˈiki ˌilimwˌaŋɡukˈia ʃˌelemˈia. kˈiʃa wˌakapˈiɡa kˈura kwa zˌekarˈia mwanˈawe, ˌalijekˈuwa mʃaˈuri mwˌeɲe hekˈima, nˈajo kˈura ja lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia.|0
kˈura ja lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˈobed edˈomu, nˈajo kˈura ja maɣˈala ˌikawˌaaŋɡukˈia wanˈawe.|0
kˈura za lˈaŋɡo la mˌaɣarˈibi na lˈaŋɡo la ʃˌalekˈeθi kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara ja ɟˈuu zˌikawˌaaŋɡukˈia ʃupˈimu na hˈosa. zˈamu za walˈinzi zˌiliɡawˈaɲua kwa usˈawa.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na walˈawi sˈita kˈila sˈiku upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, wˈanne upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, wˈanne upˈande wa kusˈini, na wawˈili wawˈili kwa mˈara mˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ɣˈala.|0
kuhˈusu ukˈumbi kˌuelekˈea mˌaɣarˈibi, kˌulikˈuwa na wˈanne bˌarabarˈani na wawˈili kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi weɲˈewe.|0
katˌika walˈawi, ahˈija ˌalikˈuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa hazˈina za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu na mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa hazˈina za vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu.|0
wazˈao wa ladˈani, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaɡerʃˈoni kˌupitˈia ladˈani na wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za ladˈani mɡerʃˈoni, wˌalikˈuwa jˌehiˈeli.|0
wˈana wa jˌehiˈeli, wˈana wa zeθˈamu na wa nduɡˈuje joˈeli. wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈizi wa hazˈina za hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa amrˈamu, wˈana wa iʃˈari, wˈana wa hebrˈoni na wˈana wa ˌuziˈeli.|0
ʃˌebuˈeli, m̩zˈao wa ɡerʃˈomu mwˈana wa mˈose, ˌalikˈuwa afˈisa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa hazˈina.|0
ɟamˈaa zˌake kutˈoka kwa ˌeliezˈeri, wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa: rˌehabˈia, jeʃˈaja, jorˈamu, zˈikri na ʃˌelomˈiθi.|0
ʃˌelomˈiθi na ɟamˈaa zˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈizi wa hazˈina zˈote za vˈitu vˈile vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu na mfˈalme daˈudi, kwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, na kwa mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wa ɟˈeʃi.|0
baˈaði ja ɲˈara zˌilizotˈekwa vitˈani wˌaliziwˈeka wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌukarabˈati wa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌimewˈekwa wˈakfu na samwˈeli mwonˈaɟi, na saˈuli mwˈana wa kˈiʃi, abnˈeri mwˈana wa nˈeri, na joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja, pamˈoɟa na vˈitu viŋɡˈine vjˈote vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌimewˈekwa wˈakfu, vjˈote vˌilikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa ʃˌelomˈiθi na ɟamˈaa zˈake.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa iʃˈari: kˌenanˈia na wanˈawe wˌalipˈewa kˈazi ɲɟˈe ja hekˈalu kˌama mˌaafˈisa na wˌaamˈuzi ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa hebrˈoni: hˌaʃabˈia na ɟamˈaa zˈake, wˈatu mˈoɟa,mˌiasˈaba wˌeɲe uwˈezo, wˌaliwˌaɟibˈika katˌika ˌisraˈeli mˌaɣarˈibi ja jordˈani kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi zˈote za bwˈana na ˌutumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme.|0
kuhˈusu wˈana wa hebrˈoni, jerˈia ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˌao kˌufuatˈana na orˈoða ja ɟamˈaa jˈao. katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌarobaˈini wa ˌutawˈala wa daˈudi ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi ˌulifaɲˈika katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu, nˌao wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈana wa hebrˈoni wˌakapˌatikˈana hˌuko jazˈeri katˌika ɡˌileˈadi.|0
jerˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ɟamˈaa ja wˈatu mbˈili,mˌiasˈaba wˌaliokˈuwa wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa, nˌaje mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakawawˈeka kˌuaŋɡalˈia wˌareubˈeni, waɡˈadi na nˈusu ja kabˈila manˈase kuhˈusu kˈila ɟˈambo lˌililomhˈusu mˈuŋɡu na ʃuɣˈuli za mfˈalme.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo orˈoða ja wˌaisraˈeli: vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu, mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia na mˌaafˈisa wˈao, wˌaliˌomtumikˈia mfˈalme kwa lolˈote lˌililohˈusu vikˈosi vja ɟˈeʃi vˌilivjokˈuwa zˈamu mwˈezi baˌada ja mwˈezi katˌika mwˈaka mzˈima. kˈila kikˈosi kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
msˌimamˈizi wa kikˈosi tʃa kwˈanza kwa mwˈezi wa kwˈanza ˌalikˈuwa jˌaʃobeˈamu mwˈana wa zˌabdiˈeli. kˌulikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika kikˈosi tʃˈake.|0
jˌeje ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈao wa perˈesi, na m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi kwa mwˈezi wa kwˈanza.|0
hˈuju n̩dˈije jˈule benˈaja ˌalijekˈuwa ʃuɟˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale θˌelaθˈini na n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈao hˈao θˌelaθˈini. mwanˈawe ˌamizabˈadi n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu katˌika kikˈosi tʃˈake.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa ˈn̩ne kwa mwˈezi wa ˈn̩ne ˌalikˈuwa ˌasahˈeli nduɡˈuje joˈabu, mwanˈawe zˌebadˈia n̩dˈije ˌaliiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kwˈeɲe ˌuoŋɡˈozi. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa kikˈosi tʃa sˈita kwa mwˈezi wa sˈita ˌalikˈuwa ˈira, mwˈana wa ikˈeʃi mtekˈoa. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa tˈisa kwa mwˈezi wa tˈisa ˌalikˈuwa ˌabiezˈeri mwˌanaθˈoθi wa wˌabeɲamˈini. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa kˈumi kwa mwˈezi wa kˈumi ˌalikˈuwa mˌaharˈai mnˌetofˈaθi wa wazˈera. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa kwa mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa benˈaja mpˌiraθˈoni wa wˌaefraˈimu. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa kˈumi na mbˈili kwa mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili ˌalikˈuwa heldˈai mnˌetofˈaθi kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja ˌoθniˈeli. kikˈosi tʃˈake kˌilikˈuwa na wˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˌooŋɡˈoza mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa: kwa wˌareubˈeni: ˌeliezˈeri mwˈana wa zˈikri; kwa wˌasimeˈoni: ʃˌefatˈia mwˈana wa maˈaka.|0
kwa walˈawi: hˌaʃabˈia mwˈana wa kˌemuˈeli; kwa arˈoni: sadˈoki.|0
kwa jˈuda: elˈihu, nduɡˈuje daˈudi; kwa wˌaisakˈari: ˈomri mwˈana wa mˌikaˈeli.|0
kwa wˌazabulˈoni: iʃmˈaja mwˈana wa ˌobadˈia; kwa wˌanaftˈali: jˌeremˈoθi mwˈana wa ˌazriˈeli.|0
kwa wˌaefraˈimu: hoʃˈea mwˈana wa ˌazazˈia; kwa nˈusu ja kabˈila la manˈase: joˈeli mwˈana wa pedˈaja.|0
kwa nˈusu ɲiŋɡˈine ja kabˈila la manˈase hˌuko ɡˌileˈadi: ˈido mwˈana wa zˌekarˈia; kwa wˌabeɲamˈini: jˌaasiˈeli mwˈana wa abnˈeri.|0
kwa wadˈani: ˌazarˈeli mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu. hˈao n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
daˈudi hˌakuwˌahesˈabu wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa tʃˈini ja miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌameahˈidi kˌuwafˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani.|0
joˈabu mwˈana wa serˈuja ˌaliˈanza kˌuwahesˈabu wˈatu lakˈini hˌakumalˈiza. kwa sabˈabu ja kˌuwahesˈabu wˈatu, hasˈira ja mˈuŋɡu ˌiliwˈaka ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, nˈajo hˈijo hesˈabu jˈao hˌaikˌuiŋɡˈizwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za mfˈalme daˈudi.|0
ˌazmawˈeθi mwˈana wa ˌadiˈeli n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa hazˈina za mfˈalme. msˌimamˈizi wa hazˈina katˌika maʃˈamba, mˈiɟi, viɟˈiɟi na kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome ˌalikˈuwa jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa uzˈia.|0
ˈezri mwˈana wa kelˈubu ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa wˌafaɲakˈazi wˌaliolˈima katˌika maʃˈamba.|0
ʃimˈei mramˈaθi ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu. zˈabdi mʃˈifmi ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa zabˈibu, ˌuteŋɡˌenezˈaɟi na ˌuhifˈaði wa divˈai katˌika mapˈipa makˈubwa.|0
bˈaal hanˈani mɡedˈeri n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa maʃˈamba ja mfˈalme ja mˌizeitˈuni na mikˈuju katˌika tˌambarˈare za vilˈima vja mˌaɣarˈibi. joˈaʃi ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɣˈala za mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni.|0
ʃitrˈai mʃarˈoni ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe wˌaliˌoɟilˈiʃa hˌuko ʃarˈoni. ʃafˈati mwˈana wa adlˈai ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa jˈale makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe jˌalijokˈuwa mˌakondˈeni.|0
obˈili mwˌiʃmaˈeli ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ŋɡamˈia. jedˈeja mmˌeronˈoθi ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa pˈunda.|0
jazˈizi mhˈaɡri ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa makˈundi ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi. hˈawa wˈote n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wˌasimamˈizi wa mˈali ˌalizokˈuwa nˈazo mfˈalme daˈudi.|0
jˌonaθˈani mɟˈomba wa daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa mʃaˈuri, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu mkˈubwa na mwandˈiʃi. jˌehiˈeli mwˈana wa hakmˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiwˌahudumˈia wˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
ˌahiθofˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mʃaˈuri wa mfˈalme. huʃˈai mwarˈiki ˌalikˈuwa rafˈiki wa mfˈalme.|0
baˌada ja ˌahiθofˈeli, jˌehojˈada mwˈana wa benˈaja ˌaliiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˈake kˌama mʃaˈuri wa mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na ˌabiaθˈari. joˈabu ˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈije ɟˌemadˈari wa maɟˈeʃi ja mfˈalme.|0
daˈudi ˌakawaˈita mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli wˌakusaɲˈike hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu: jaˈani, mˌaafˈisa walˈio ɟˌuːja mˌakabˈila, mˌaɟemadˈari wa vikˈosi katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, mˌaafˈisa wˌanaˌosimamˈia mˈali zˈote na mifˈuɡo ja mfˈalme na wanˈawe, wˌakiwˈemo mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, mˌaʃuɟˈaa na askˈari wˈote walˈio hodˈari.|0
mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakainˈuka na kusˈema: nˌisikˌilizˈeni ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu nˌaɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. nˌilikˈuwa na nˈia ja kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ˌili ˈiwe mahˈali pa kukˈaa sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuwa mahˈali pa kˌuwekˈea miɡˈuu ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, nˌami nˌikafˈaɲa mˌaandalˈizi ja kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakanˌiambˈia, wˌewe hˌutaɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ˌumepiɡˈana vˈita na ˌumemwˈaɡa dˈamu..|0
hˌata hˈivjo, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalinˌitʃaɡˈua mˌimi kutˈoka ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu jˈote nˈiwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli milˈele. ˌalimtʃaɡˈua jˈuda kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi na kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja jˈuda ˌakaˌitʃaɡˈua ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu na kutˈoka wˈana wa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌikampendˈeza kˌunifˈaɲa nˈiwe mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wanˈaŋɡu wˈote, nˌaje bwˈana ˌamenˈipa wˈeŋɡi, ˌamemtʃaɡˈua sˌolomˈoni mwanˈaŋɡu ˌili kˌukikalˈia kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ufˈalme wa bwˈana ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌalinˌiambˈia, sˌolomˈoni mwanˈao n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu na ɲˈua zˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana nˌimemtʃaɡˈua jˌeje kˌuwa mwanˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa bˈaba jˈake.|0
nˌitaufˈaɲa imˈara ufˈalme wˌake milˈele kˌama ˌakiˌendelˈea kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌafaɲˈavjo hˈivi lˈeo..|0
hˈivjo bˌasi nˌinawˌaaɡˈiza mbˈele za ˌisraˈeli jˈote na kˌusaɲˈiko hˈili la bwˈana nˌaje mˈuŋɡu wˈetu akˈiwa ˌanasikˈia: kuwˈeni na bidˈii kˌuzifuˈata ˈamri za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˌili mpˈate kˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi hˌii nzˈuri na kˌuwaatʃˈia wˈana wˈenu kˌuwa urˈiθi milˈele.|0
nˌawe sˌolomˈoni mwanˈaŋɡu, m̩ɟˈue mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako, ˌukamtˌumikˈie kwa kˌuɟitˈoa kwa mˈojo wˈote na kwa nˈia ja kˌumkubˈali, kwa maˈana bwˈana hˌuutʃuŋɡˈuza kˈila mˈojo na kuɟˈua kˈila kusˈudi la kˈila fikˈira. ˌukimtafˈuta, ˌataˌonekˈana kwˈako; bˌali kˌama ˌukimwˈatʃa, jˌeje ˌatakˌukatˈaa milˈele.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia bˈasi, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamekˌutʃaɡˈua wˌewe ˌili uɟˈeŋɡe hekˈalu kˌuwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu. ˈuwe hodˈari ˌukafˈaɲe kˈazi hˈijo.|0
akˈampa vˌielelˈezo vja jˈote rˈoho ˌalikˈuwa ˌameviwˈeka mojˈoni mwˈake kwa aɟˈili ja kˈumbi za hekˈalu la bwˈana na vjˈumba vjˈote vˌilivjˌolizuŋɡˈuka, kwa aɟˈili ja hazˈina za hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu na kwa hazˈina za vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu.|0
mfˈalme pˈia akˈampa sˌolomˈoni mˌaelekˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja hudˈuma za mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, pˈia kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi zˈote za hudˈuma katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana. akˈampa pˈia mˌaelˈezo kuhˈusu vifˈaa vjˈote vja kˌutumˈika katˌika hudˈuma ja hekˈalu.|0
ˌakamwˌaɡizˈia uzˈito wa ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja vˈitu vjˈote vja ðahˈabu vja kˌutumˈika katˌika hudˈuma mbˌalimbˈali, uzˈito wa fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja vˈitu vjˈote vja fˈeða vja kˌutumˈika katˌika hudˈuma mbˌalimbˈali.|0
uzˈito wa ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja vinˈara vja ðahˈabu na tˈaa zˈake, kukˈiwa na uzˈito kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kinˈara na tˈaa zˈake, pamˈoɟa na uzˈito wa fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kinˈara tʃa fˈeða na tˈaa zˈake, kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌatumˈizi ja kˈila kinˈara.|0
uzˈito wa ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja mˈeza ja mikˈate ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu, uzˈito wa fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja mˈeza ja fˈeða.|0
uzˈito wa ðahˈabu sˈafi kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈuma, mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia na vikˈombe, mˌasinˈia; uzˈito wa ðahˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila bakˈuli la ðahˈabu; uzˈito wa fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila bakˈuli la fˈeða.|0
na uzˈito wa ðahˈabu sˈafi kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaðabˈahu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba. pˈia alˈimpa kˌielelˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja ɡˈari, jaˈani, wˈale mˌakerˈubi wa ðahˈabu wˌaliˌokuɲɟˈua mbˈawa zˈao na kuwˈeka kivˈuli ɟˌuːja sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakasˈema, hˌii jˈote, ninˈajo kwa mˌaandˈiʃi kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana ulˈio ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌamenˈipa ˌufahˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja habˈari zˈote za kˌielelˈezo hˈiki.|0
daˈudi pˈia ˌakamwambˈia sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe, ˈuwe hodˈari na mˈojo m̩kˈuu, ˌukafˈaɲe kˈazi hˌii. ˌusioɡˈope wˈala ˌusifˌaðaˈike, kwa maˈana bwˈana alˈije mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe. hˌatakuˈatʃa wˈala hˌatakˌupuŋɡukˈia mpˈaka kˈazi hˌii jˈote kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌitakˌapokˌamilˈika.|0
mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi ˈiko tajˈari kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi jˈote katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje kˈila ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˈojo wa kupˈenda mwˌeɲe ustˈadi katˌika aˈina jojˈote ja ufˈundi ˌatakˌusaidˈia katˌika kˈazi jˈote. mˌaafˈisa na wˈatu wˈote wˌatatˈii kˈila aɡˈizo lˈako.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme daˈudi ˌakalˌiambˈia kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote: mwanˈaŋɡu sˌolomˈoni, jˌeje ambˈaje mˈuŋɡu ˌamemtʃaɡˈua, ni kiɟˈana mdˈoɡo na asˈije na ˌuzoˈefu. kˈazi hˌii ni kˈubwa, kwa sabˈabu hekˈalu hˈili la fahˈari si kwa aɟˈili ja mwˌanadˈamu bˌali ni kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana.|0
kwa uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu wˈote nˌimetˈeŋɡa mˈali kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu: ðahˈabu kwa kˈazi za ðahˈabu, fˈeða kwa aɟˈili ja fˈeða, ʃˈaba kwa kˈazi za ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma kwa kˈazi za tʃˈuma na mˈiti kwa kˈazi za mˈiti, vˈivjo hˈivjo vˈito vja ʃohˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja kutˈia kwˈeɲe vˌiɟalˈizo, almˈasi, mˈawe ja rˈaŋɡi mbˌalimbˈali, aˈina zˈote za vˈito vja θamˈani na mˈarmar; jˈote hˈaja kwa wˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no.|0
talˈanta tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu ðahˈabu ja ofˈiri na talˈanta sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða sˈafi ˌilijˌosafˈiʃwa, kwa aɟˈili ja kˌufunˈika kˈuta za hekˈalu.|0
kwa kˈazi ja ðahˈabu na kˈazi ja fˈeða na kwa kˈazi jˈote ˌitakˌajofˈaɲua na mafˈundi. bˈasi, ni nˈani ˌanajepˈenda kˌuɟitˈoa kwa bwˈana lˈeo.|0
ndˈipo vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa, mˌaafˈisa wa kabˈila za ˌisraˈeli, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˌaliokˈuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa kˈazi za mfˈalme wˌakatˈoa kwa hiˈari jˈao.|0
wˌakatˈoa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu talˈanta tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na darkˈoni kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, talˈanta kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða, talˈanta kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ʃˈaba na talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za tʃˈuma.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijekˈuwa na vˈito vja θamˈani ˌakavitˈoa katˌika hazˈina ja hekˈalu la bwˈana tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa jˌehiˈeli mɡerʃˈoni.|0
wˈatu wˌakafurˈahi kwa sabˈabu ja ˌitikˈio la hiˈari la vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˈoa kwa hiˈari na kwa mˈojo wˈote kwa bwˈana. mfˈalme daˈudi pˈia ˌakafurˈahi sˈana.|0
daˈudi ˌakamhimˈidi bwˈana mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote, ˌakisˈema: ˌuhimidˈiwe wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli bˈaba jˈetu, ʃˈu milˈele hˌata milˈele.|0
ukˈuu na uwˈeza, ni vjˈako, ˈee bwˈana, na ˌutukˈufu na ˈenzi na uzˈuri, kwa kˌuwa kˈila kˌilitʃˈoko mbiŋɡˈuni na dˌuniˈani ni tʃˈako wˈewe. ˈee bwˈana, ufˈalme ni wˈako; ˌumetukˈuzwa kˌuwa m̩kˈuu ɟˌuːja jˈote.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima vjatˈoka kwˈako; wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌutawalˈaje vˈitu vjˈote. mˌikonˈoni mwˈako kˈuna ŋɡˈuvu na uwˈeza ˌili kˌuinˈua na kuwˈapa wˈote ŋɡˈuvu.|0
sˈasa, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌunakˌuʃukˈuru na kˌulisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako tukˈufu.|0
lakˈini mˌimi ni nˈani, nˌao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni nˈani, hˌata tuwˈeze kˌukutolˈea kwa ˌukarˈimu nˈamna hˌii? vˈitu vjˈote vjatˈoka kwˈako, nˌasi tˌumekˌutolˈea tu vˈile vˌitokˈavjo mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
sˌisi ni waɡˈeni na wˌapitˈaɟi matʃˈoni pˈako, kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa bˈaba zˈetu wˈote. sˈiku zˈetu dˌuniˈani ni kˌama kivˈuli, bˌila tˌumaˈini.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa wˈiŋɡi wˈote hˈuu ambˈao tˌumekˌutolˈea kwa kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako tˌakatˈifu, vˌimetˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako, nˈavjo vjˈote ni mˈali jˈako.|0
nˌinaɟˈua, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kwˌamba wˌewe hˌuuɟarˈibu mˈojo na ˌunapendˈezwa na uɲˈofu. vˈitu hˈivi vjˈote nˌimetˈoa kwa hiˈari na kwa mˈojo mɲˈofu. nˌami sˈasa nˌimeˈona kwa furˈaha ɟˈinsi wˈatu wˈako wˌaliˈoko hˈapa kwa hiˈari jˈao wˌalivjˌokutolˈea wˈewe.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈetu ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na ˌisraˈeli, wˈeka ʃaˈuku hˌii ndˈani ja miˈojo ja wˈatu wˈako daˈima na ˌuifˈaɲe miˈojo jˈao ˈiwe na ˌuaminˈifu kwˈako.|0
nˌawe ˈumpe mwanˈaŋɡu sˌolomˈoni kˌuɟitolˈea kwˈako kwa mˈojo wˈote ˌili kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈako, maʃˈarti jˈako, mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako na kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌili kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu hˈili la fahˈari ambˈalo kwa aɟˈili jˌake nˌimetˈoa.|0
ndˈipo daˈudi ˌakalˌiambˈia kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote, mhˌimidˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. hˈivjo wˈote wˌakamhimˈidi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao. wˌakasuɟˈudu na kˌuaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele za bwˈana na mfˈalme.|0
sˈiku ja pˈili jˌake wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa: mˌafahˈali mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, kondˈoo dˈume mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi na sadˈaka ɲiŋɡˈine ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈala na kˈuɲua kwa furˈaha kˈubwa mbˈele za bwˈana sˈiku ˈile. wˌakamtawˈaza sˌolomˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi mˈara ja pˈili kˌuwa mfˈalme, wˌakamtˈia mafˈuta kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ˌili ˈawe mfˈalme na sadˈoki kˌuwa kuhˈani.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakakˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa bwˈana kˌuwa mfˈalme mahˈali pa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. ˌakafˌanikˈiwa sˈana na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakamtˈii.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote na mˌaʃuɟˈaa, pamˈoɟa na wˈana wˈote wa daˈudi, wˌakaahˈidi kumtˈii mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtukˈuza sˈana sˌolomˈoni mbˈele ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote na kumvˈika fahˈari ja kifˈalme ambˈajo hakˈuna mfˈalme jejˈote wa ˌisraˈeli kˈabla jˌake ˌaliwˈahi kˌuwa nˈajo.|0
daˈudi mwˈana wa jˈese ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
daˈudi akˈafa akˈiwa m̩zˈee mwˌeɲe ˈumri mwˈema, akˈiwa ˌameʃˈiba sˈiku, ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima. nˌaje sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
pamˈoɟa na habˈari zˈote za ˌutawˈala wˈake, ŋɡˈuvu zˌake na mˌatukˈio jˌalijompˈata jˈeje, na ˌisraˈeli, na fˈalme za ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote.|0
sˌolomˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi ˌaliɟˌiimarˈiʃa kwˈeɲe milˈaŋɡo jˈote! katˌika ufˈalme wˈake, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, nˌaje ˌakamfˈaɲa m̩kˈuu ˈm̩no.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakasˈema na ˌisraˈeli wˈote, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, wˌaamˈuzi na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote katˌika ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa.|0
nˌaje sˌolomˈoni na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote wˌakakwˈea mpˈaka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni, kwa kˌuwa hˌuko ndˈiko hˈema la kˌukutanˈia la mˈuŋɡu lˌilipokˈuwa, ambˈalo mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˌiteŋɡenˈeza hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
bˌasi daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˌipandˈiʃa sandˈuku la mˈuŋɡu kutˈoka kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu mpˈaka mahˈali ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamepˌateŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˌimamˈiʃa hˈema kwa aɟˈili ja hˌilo sandˈuku hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini jˈale mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba ambˈajo bˌezalˈeli mwˈana wa ˈuri, mwˈana wa hˈuri, ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza jˌalikˈuwa hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni mbˈele ja maskˈani ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, hˈivjo sˌolomˈoni na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote wˌalimtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu hˌuko.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakapˈanda hˌuko jˌalikokˈuwa mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba mbˈele za bwˈana katˌika hˈema la kˌukutanˈia, na kutˈoa ðabˈihu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu mˈuŋɡu, ˌumemwoɲˈeʃa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi faðˈili ɲˈiŋɡi, nˌawe ˌumeniwˈeka nˈiwe mfˈalme mahˈali pˈake.|0
sˈasa, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, ahˈadi jˈako kwa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi na ˌiθibitˈike, kwa kˌuwa ˌumenifˈaɲa mˌimi mfˈalme ɟˌuːja wˈatu ambˈao ni wˈeŋɡi kˌama mavˈumbi ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌakuˈomba unˈipe mˌimi hekˈima na mˌaarˈifa, ˌili niwˈeze kˌuoŋɡˈoza wˈatu hˈawa, kwa kˌuwa ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌutawˈala hˈawa wˈatu wˈako walˈio wˈeŋɡi hˈivi.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia sˌolomˈoni, kwa kˌuwa ɟˈambo hˈili ndˈilo ʃaˈuku ja mˈojo wˈako na hˌukuˈomba mˈali, ˌutaɟˈiri ˌau heʃˈima, wˈala kˈifo kwa aɟˈili ja adˈui zˈako, nˌawe kwa kˌuwa hˌukuˈomba maˈiʃa marˈefu, bˌali ˌumeˈomba hekˈima na mˌaarˈifa ˌili kˌuoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ambˈao nˌimekufˈaɲa ˈuwe mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌutapˈewa hekˈima na mˌaarˈifa. tˈena nˌitakˈupa pˈia mˈali, ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima, ambˈavjo hakˈuna mfˈalme jejˈote ˌalijˌekuwˈepo kˈabla jˈako ˌamewˈahi kˌuwa nˈavjo, na hakˈuna jejˈote baˌada jˈako ˌatakˌajekˈuwa nˈavjo.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈenda mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu kutˈoka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni, kutˈoka mbˈele ja hˈema la kˌukutanˈia. nˌaje ˌakatawˈala ˌisraˈeli.|0
farˈasi wa sˌolomˈoni wˌalilˈetwa kutˈoka mˈisri na kutˈoka kˈue. wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa mfˈalme wˌaliwˌanunˈua kutˈoka kˈue.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˈoa ˈamri kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa mfˈalme hirˈamu wa tˈiro: ˌunitumˈie maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi kˌama ˌulivjˌomfaɲˈia bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi wakˈati ˌulipˌompelekˈea mˌierˈezi ja kuɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme la kuˈiʃi.|0
sˈasa nˌinakˌaribˈia kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuliwˈeka wˈakfu kwˈake kwa aɟˈili ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba wˌeɲe harˈufu nzˈuri mbˈele zˈake, mahˈali pa kuwˈeka mikˈate ja woɲˈeʃo kwa kˌufuˈata ˌutaratˈibu na kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pa kˌutolˈea sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi na ɟiˈoni, sˈiku za sabˈato na mwˈezi mwandˈamo pˈia katˌika sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. hˈili ni aɡˈizo la kudˈumu kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
hekˈalu nˌitakˌaloliɟˈeŋɡa lˌitakˈuwa kˈubwa, kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine jˈote.|0
lakˈini ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumɟeŋɡˈea hekˈalu, mˌaadˈamu mbˈiŋɡu, hˌata mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana, hˌaziwˈezi kumtˈoʃa? mˌimi ni nˈani bˌasi hˌata nˌimɟeŋɡˈee hekˈalu, ˌisipokˈuwa lˈiwe tu mahˈali pa kˌutolˈea ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa mbˈele zˈake.|0
hˈivjo bˌasi nˌitumˈie ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ustˈadi wa kufˈaɲa kˈazi ja kˌuteŋɡenˈeza ðahˈabu na fˈeða, ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma, ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja zˌambarˈau, ɲekˈundu na bulˈuu, mwˌeɲe ˌuzoˈefu wa kutˈia nˈakʃi, ˌili afˈaɲe kˈazi jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa na mafˈundi wˈaŋɡu wˌeɲe ustˈadi, ambˈao bˈaba jˈaŋɡu daˈudi ˌaliwawˈeka.|0
pˈia nˌitumˈie maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi, mˌiberˈoʃi na mˌisandˈali kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni kwa maˈana naɟˈua kwˌamba wˈatu wˈako wanˈao uɟˈuzi wa kˌupasˈua m̩bˈao hˌuko. wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈako.|0
ˌili wˌanipatˈie m̩bˈao kwa wˈiŋɡi kwa sabˈabu hekˈalu nˌitakˌaloɟˈeŋɡa lazˈima lˈiwe kˈubwa na zˈuri kabˈisa.|0
nˌitawˈapa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, jaˈani, mˌaseremˈala wˌakatˈao m̩bˈao, kˈori ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ˈuŋɡa wa ŋɡˈano, kˈori ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ʃajˈiri, bˈaθi ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za mvˈiɲo, na bˈaθi ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni.|0
ndˈipo hirˈamu mfˈalme wa tˈiro ˌakamɟˈibu sˌolomˈoni kwa barˈua: kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌanawapˈenda wˈatu wˈake, ˌamekufˈaɲa wˌewe kˌuwa mfˈalme wˈao.|0
nˌaje hirˈamu ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema: ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalijˌezifˈaɲa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi! amˈempa mfˈalme daˈudi mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima, ˌalijˌeɟalˈiwa mˌaarˈifa na ˌufahˈamu, ambˈaje ˌataɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
mˌimi nˌitamtˈuma kwˈako hurˈamu ˈabi, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ustˈadi mwˈiŋɡi.|0
ambˈaje mˈama jˌake ˌalitˈoka dˈani na bˈaba jˌake ˌalitˈoka tˈiro. jˌeje ni stˈadi wa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza vˈitu, kufˈaɲa kˈazi zˈote za ðahˈabu, fˈeða, ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma, mˈawe na m̩bˈao pamˈoɟa na kufˈuma. ni stˈadi katˌika kutˈia rˈaŋɡi ja zˌambarˈau, bulˈuu, ɲekˈundu na ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani sˈafi. jˌeje ˈana uɟˈuzi katˌika aˈina zˈote za kutˈia nˈakʃi na ˌanawˈeza kˌufuˌatilˈiza mtʃˈoro wowˈote wa kˈazi ˌanajopˈewa. ˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi na mafˈundi wˈako na wˈale wa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, daˈudi bˈaba jˈako.|0
sˈasa bˌasi bwˈana wˈaŋɡu na ˌawapˌelekˈee wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ŋɡˈano, ʃajˈiri, mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni na mvˈiɲo kˌama ˌalivjˌoahˈidi.|0
nˌasi tˌutakˈata maɡˈoɡo jˈote jˈale ˌunajˌohitˈaɟi kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni nˌasi tˌutajafˈuŋɡa pamˈoɟa na kˌujawˈeka jˌaelˈee bˌaharˈini mpˈaka jˈafa. kˈiʃa ˌutawˈeza kˌujatʃukˈua mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˈatu sabˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao kˌuwa wˌatʃukˈuzi wa mizˈiɡo, na θˌemanˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kˌuwa watʃˈoŋɡa mˈawe vˌilimˈani, na tˈatu,mˌiasˈita wakˈiwa wˌasimamˈizi ɟˈuu jˈao ˌili wˌawahimˈize wˈatu kufˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana katˌika jˌerusalˈemu ɟˌuːja mlˈima morˈia, pˈale ambˈapo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtokˈea daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. ˌilikˈuwa katˌika kiwˈaɲɟa tʃa kˌupurˈia tʃa ˌaraˈuna, mjebˈusi, mahˈali pˌalipˌotolˈewa na daˈudi.|0
ˌaliˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa sˈiku ja pˈili ja mwˈezi wa pˈili katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wˈake.|0
msˈiŋɡi ˌaliˌouwˈeka sˌolomˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuliɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa urˈefu wa ðirˈaa sitˈini na upˈana ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini.|0
ukˈumbi wa mbˈele wa hekˈalu ˌulikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini, jaˈani, kˌuanzˈia upˈande mmˈoɟa hˌadi upˈande mwiŋɡˈine wa upˈana wa ɲˈumba hˈijo na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini. ˌakaˌufunˈika ndˈani kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
ˌakaˌufunˈika ukˈumbi m̩kˈuu kwa m̩bˈao za mˌiberˈoʃi na kˌufunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi na kˌuupˈamba kwa mˈiti ja mitˈende na kˌuifˌaɲizˈia kwa mˌiɲorˈoro.|0
ˌalilipˈamba hekˈalu kwa vˈito vja θamˈani. hˈijo ðahˈabu ˌalijˌotumˈia ˌilikˈuwa ðahˈabu ja pˌarvaˈimu.|0
ˌakazˌifunˈika borˈiti za dˈari, miˈimo na vˌiziŋɡˈiti vja milˈaŋɡo, kˈuta na milˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu kwa ðahˈabu, nˌaje ˌakatˈia nˈakʃi ja mˌakerˈubi kwˈeɲe kˈuta.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, urˈefu na upˈana wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini, sˌawasˈawa na upˈana wa hekˈalu. ˌalifunˈika ndˈani kwa talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini za ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
mˌisumˈari ja ðahˈabu ˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli hamsˈini. ˌalivˌifunˈika pˈia vjˈumba vja ɟˈuu kwa ðahˈabu.|0
katˌika sehˈemu ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu ˌakafaɲˈiza ɟˈozi mˈoɟa ja mˌakerˈubi ja kutʃˈoŋɡwa na kˌujafunˈika kwa ðahˈabu.|0
urˈefu wa mabˈawa ja hˈao mˌakerˈubi ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈumla ja ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini. bˈawa mˈoɟa la kerˈubi wa kwˈanza lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano, nˈalo lˌiliɡˈusa ukˈuta wa hekˈalu, bˈawa lˈake liŋɡˈine, lˌilikˈuwa pˈia na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano, ambˈalo lˌiliɡˈusa bˈawa la kerˈubi liŋɡˈine.|0
vˈivjo hˈivjo bˈawa mˈoɟa la kerˈubi wa pˈili lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano na lˌiliɡˈusa ukˈuta mwiŋɡˈine wa pˈili wa hekˈalu na bˈawa lˈake liŋɡˈine, lˌilikˈuwa pˈia na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa tˈano nˈalo lˌiliɡˈusa bˈawa la kerˈubi wa kwˈanza.|0
mabˈawa ja mˌakerˈubi hˈawa jˌalitˈanda ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini. wˌalisimˈama kwa miɡˈuu jˈao, ɲˈuso zˈao zˌikiˌelekˈea ukˈumbi mkˈubwa.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pazˈia la ɲˈuzi za rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu, zˌambarˈau na ɲekˈundu, na za kitˈani sˈafi, na kˌutarˈizi mˌakerˈubi ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
mbˈele ja hekˈalu sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili, ambˈazo kwa pamˈoɟa zˌilikˈuwa na ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini na tˈano kwˈenda ɟˈuu kwˈake, na urˈefu wa kˈila mˈoɟa ˌilikˈuwa na tˈaɟi ɟˈuu jˌake jˌeɲe ðirˈaa tˈano.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌiɲorˈoro ˌilijˌosokˈotwa, na kˌuiwˈeka ɟˌuːja zˈile ŋɡˈuzo. pˈia ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌakomamˈaŋɡa mˌiamˈoɟa, na kˌujaʃˌikamanˈiʃa kwˈeɲe mˌiɲorˈoro.|0
ˌakazˌisimamˈiʃa hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo mbˈele ja hekˈalu, mˈoɟa upˈande wa kusˈini na ɲiŋɡˈine upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini. ˈile mˈoɟa ja upˈande wa kusˈini ˌakaiˈita jakˈini, na ja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌakaiˈita boˈazi.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini, upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa kˈumi.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza bahˈari ja kusˈubu, jˌeɲe ˈumbo la mvirˈiŋɡo, ja ðirˈaa kˈumi kutˈoka ukˈiŋɡo hˌadi ukˈiŋɡo na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa tˈano. kˈamba ja urˈefu wa ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini ˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌuizuŋɡˈuka.|0
tʃˈini ja hˈuo ukˈiŋɡo, kˌulikˈuwa na mˌafahˈali kˌuizuŋɡˈuka, jaˈani mˌafahˈali kˈumi katˌika kˈila ðirˈaa mˈoɟa. hˈajo mˌafahˈali wˌalijasˈubu katˌika sˈafu mbˈili jakˈiwa ja kˈitu kimˈoɟa na hˈijo bahˈari.|0
bahˈari hˈijo ˌilikˈaa ɟˌuːja mˌafahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili, mˌafahˈali watˈatu wˌaliˌelekˈeza ɲˈuso zˈao kˌaskazˈini, watˈatu mˌaɣarˈibi, watˈatu kusˈini na watˈatu mˌaʃarˈiki. bahˈari hˈijo ˌilikˈaa ɟˌuːja hˈao mˌafahˈali, nˈazo sehˈemu zˈao za ɲˈuma zˌiliˌelekeˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌasinˈia kˈumi kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuoʃˈea vifˈaa, nˌaje ˌakajawˈeka matˈano upˈande wa kusˈini na matˈano upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini. ndˈani jˌake ndˈimo wˌalioʃˈea vifˈaa vja kˌutumˈika katˌika sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, lakˈini ˈile bahˈari ˌilikˈuwa ni kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani kˌunawˈia.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza vinˈara vja tˈaa kˈumi vja ðahˈabu kˌama ˌilivjˌoainˈiʃwa kwˈao na kˌuviwˈeka hˌekalˈuni, vinˈara vitˈano upˈande wa kusˈini na vitˈano upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˈeza kˈumi na kˌuziwˈeka hˌekalˈuni, tˈano upˈande wa kusˈini na tˈano upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini. pˈia ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌabakˈuli mˌiamˈoɟa ja ðahˈabu ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ukˈumbi wa mˌakuhˈani na ukˈumbi mwiŋɡˈine mkˈubwa na milˈaŋɡo jˈake, nˌaje ˌakaˌifunˈika hˈijo milˈaŋɡo kwa ʃˈaba.|0
ˌakawˈeka ˈile bahˈari upˈande wa kusˈini, kwˈeɲe pˈembe ja kusˈini mˌaʃarˈiki ja ɲˈumba.|0
zˈile ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili; jˈale matˈaɟi mawˈili jˌalijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja hˈizo ŋɡˈuzo, zˈile ɲˈavu mbˈili za kupˈamba hˈajo matˈaɟi mawˈili jˌeɲe ˈumbo la bakˈuli jˌalijowˈekwa ɟˌuːja zˈile ŋɡˈuzo.|0
vˌiʃikˈio pamˈoɟa na mˌasinˈia jˈake.|0
hˈijo bahˈari na hˈao mˌafahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili tʃˈini jˈake.|0
pˈia hˈajo mˌasufurˈia, mˌasepˈetu, ˈuma za ɲˈama na vjˈombo viŋɡˈine vjˈote vˌilivjˌohusiˈana. vˈitu vjˈote ambˈavjo hurˈamu ˈabi ˌalimtˌeŋɡenezˈea mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana vˌilikˈuwa vja ʃˈaba ˌilijˌosuɡulˈiwa.|0
mfˈalme ˌaliaɡˈiza wˌavisˈubu vˈitu hˈivi kwˈeɲe kalˈibu za udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi katˌika uwˈanda wa jordˈani kˈati ja sukˈoθi na serˈeda.|0
maˈua ja ðahˈabu jˌalijˌofaɲˈizwa, tˈaa na mˌakolˈeo vˌilikˈuwa vja ðahˈabu bˈora kabˈisa.|0
mikˈasi ja ðahˈabu sˈafi, mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, mˌasinˈia na vjetˈezo; milˈaŋɡo ja ðahˈabu ja hekˈalu: jaˈani milˈaŋɡo ja ndˈani ja pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu, na milˈaŋɡo ja ukˈumbi m̩kˈuu.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakawaˈita hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa mˌakabˈila na wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za wˌaisraˈeli, ˌili wˌalilˈete sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana kutˈoka sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
nˌao wˌakalˌipandˈiʃa sandˈuku na hˈema la kˌukutanˈia pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vjˈote vˌitakatˈifu vˌilivjokˈuwa ndˈani jˈake. mˌakuhˈani, wˌaliokˈuwa walˈawi, wˌalivibˈeba vˈitu hˈivjo.|0
mˌakerˈubi jˌalitandˈaza mabˈawa jˈao ɟˌuːja mahˈali pa sandˈuku la aɡˈano na kˌufunˈika sandˈuku na mipˈiko jˌake ja kˌubebˈea.|0
ndˈani ja sandˈuku hˌapakuwˈepo kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa zˈile m̩bˈao mbˈili ambˈazo mˈose ˌalikˈuwa ˌameziwˈeka ndˈani jˌake hˌuko horˈebu, mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano na wˌaisraˈeli baˌada ja kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
bˌasi mˌakuhˈani wˌakaondˈoka hˈapo mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu. mˌakuhˈani wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa hˌuko wˌalikˈuwa wˌameɟiwˈeka wˈakfu, bˌila kuɟˈali mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈao.|0
walˈawi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaimbˈaɟi, jaˈani, asˈafu, hemˈani, jˌeduθˈuni, wˈana wa ndˈuɡu zˈao, wˌalisimˈama upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wa mˌaðabˈahu, wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa kitˈani sˈafi hˈuku wˌakipˈiɡa mˌatoˈazi, vinˈubi na zˈeze. wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini wˌakipˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta.|0
wapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌakauŋɡˈana katˌika saˈuti lˌiŋɡanˈifu, ikˈawa kˌama vˈile ni saˈuti mˈoɟa, wˌakimsˈifu na kˌumʃukˈuru bwˈana, nˌao ˌalipˌoinˈua saˈuti zˈao pamˈoɟa na tˌarumbˈeta na mˌatoˈazi na vjˈombo viŋɡˈine vja ˌuimbˈaɟi, wˌakamsˈifu bwˈana wˌakisˈema: jˌeje ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake ˌunadˈumu milˈele. ndˈipo hekˈalu la bwˈana lˌikaɟˈazwa na wˈiŋɡu.|0
nˌimeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu zˈuri kwa aɟˈili jˈako, mahˈali pˈako pa kukˈaa milˈele.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakasˈema: ˌahimidˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje kwa mikˈono jˌake mweɲˈewe ˌametimˈiza lˈile ˌalilˌomwahˈidi daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈake mweɲˈewe. kwa kˌuwa ˌalisˈema.|0
lakˈini sˈasa nˌimeˌutʃaɡˈua jˌerusalˈemu ˌili ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lipˈate kuwˈamo hˈumo, na nˌimemtʃaɡˈua daˈudi kˌuwatawˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli..|0
ˌilikˈuwa mojˈoni ˌm̩wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌilikˈuwa mojˈoni mwˈako kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, ˌulifˈaɲa vjˈema kˌuwa na ɟˈambo hˈili mojˈoni mwˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, sˈio wˌewe ˌutakˌajenˌiɟeŋɡˈea hekˈalu, bˌali mwanˈao, ambˈaje ni ɲˈama jˈako na dˈamu jˈako mweɲˈewe, jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu..|0
bwˈana ˌametimˈiza ahˈadi ˌalijˌoiwˈeka: nˌimeiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na sˈasa nˌinakˌikalˈia kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi, nˌami nˌimeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌimeliwˈeka hˈumo sandˈuku la aɡˈano, ambˈamo ndˈani jˌake kˈuna lˈile aɡˈano la bwˈana ˌalilofˈaɲa na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana matʃˈoni pa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakakuɲɟˈua mikˈono jˈake.|0
bˌasi sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza ɟukwˈaa la ʃˈaba, urˈefu wˌake ðirˈaa tˈano, na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa tˈano na kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa tˈatu, nˌaje ˌakaliwˈeka kˌatikˈati ja ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe. ˌakapˈanda ɟˌuːja hˌilo ɟukwˈaa kˈiʃa ˌakapˈiɡa maɡˈoti mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli, ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˌake kwˌelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌakasˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu kˌama wˌewe ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni wˈala tʃˈini dˌuniˈani, wˌewe ˌunajetˈunza aɡˈano lˈako la upˈendo na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌanaodˈumu katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈako kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
ˌumetimˈiza ahˈadi jˈako kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈako ˌuliahˈidi na kwa mkˈono wˈako ˌumetimˈiza, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
sˈasa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, mtˌimizˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ahˈadi zˈako ˌulizˌomwahˈidi ˌuliposˈema, kˈamwe hˌutakˈosa kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajekˈeti mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme tʃa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama wanˈao wˌakiˌaŋɡalˈia jˈote wˌajafaɲˈajo kˌuenˈenda mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kˌama vˈile ˌulivjofˈaɲa..|0
sˈasa, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˈatʃa nˈeno lˈako lˈile ˌulilˌomwahˈidi mtumˈiʃi wˈako daˈudi bˈaba jˈaŋɡu lˌitimˈie.|0
lakˈini kwˈeli, ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu ˌatafˈaɲa makˈao dˌuniˈani na wˌanadˈamu? mbˈiŋɡu, hˌata mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana, hˌaziwˈezi kˌukutˈoʃa wˈewe. sembˈuse hekˈalu hˈili nˌililoɟˈeŋɡa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo sˌikilˈiza dˈua ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako na maˈombi jˌake kwa hurˈuma, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. sikˈia kilˈio na dˈua ambˈajo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanaˈomba mbˈele zˈako sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌafumbˈuke kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu hˈili usˈiku na mtʃˈana, mahˈali hˈapa ambˈapo ˌulisˈema, ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitakuwˈako hˈumo, ˌili kwˌamba upˈate kˌusikˈia maˈombi ambˈajo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌataˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa.|0
ˌusikˈie maˈombi ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ja wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli wakˈati wˌanapoˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa. sikˈia kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako na ˌusikiˈapo, samˈehe.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanapˌomkosˈea ɟirˈani jˌake na ˌakatakˈiwa kuˈapa, akˈiɟa na kuˈapa mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu jˈako ndˈani ja hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˈasi, sikˈia kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌukatˈende. hukˈumu kˈati ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌukimwaðˈibu jˈule mwˌeɲe hatˈia kwa kulˈeta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda. ˌumtaŋɡazˈie mwˌeɲe hˈaki kwˌamba hˈana hatˈia, hˈivjo ˌukaθˌibitˈiʃe kˌuwa hˈaki kwˈake.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌameʃˈindwa na adˈui kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi wˌalizofˈaɲa ðˈidi jˈako, wˌatakˌapokˌuɡeukˈia na kˌulikˈiri ɟˈina lˈako, wˌakiˈomba na kufˈaɲa dˈua kwˈako katˌika hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌukasamˈehe ðˈambi ja wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao.|0
wakˈati mbˈiŋɡu zˌitakˌapokˈuwa zˌimefˈuŋɡwa kusˈiwe na mvˈua kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈako wˌametˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako, wˌatakˌapoˈomba kˌuelekˈea mahˈali hˈapa na kˌulikˈiri ɟˈina lˈako nˌao wˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈao kwa sabˈabu ˌumewˌaaðˈibu.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na ˌusamˈehe ðˈambi ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli. wˌafundˈiʃe ɲɟˈia sahˈihi ja kuˈiʃi na ˌukaɲˈeʃe mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa wˈatu wˈako kˌuwa urˈiθi.|0
wakˈati ɲɟˈaa ˌau taˈuni vikˈiɟa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, ˌau kˈoɡa ˌau kˈawa, nzˈiɡe ˌau pˈanzi, ˌau wakˈati adˈui ˌatakˌapowˌaziŋɡˈira katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˌao wowˈote, maˈafa ja nˈamna jojˈote ˌau uɡˈoɲɟua wowˈote ˌunaowˈeza kˌuwaɟˈia.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, katˌika makˈao jˈako. ˌusamˈehe na utˈende, ˈumpe kˈila ˈm̩tu kˌuliŋɡˈana na matˈendo jˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌunauɟˈua mˈojo wˌake kwa kˌuwa ni wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ˌuɟuˈaje miˈojo ja wˈatu wˈote.|0
ˌili wˌakuoɡˈope kwa wakˈati wˈote wˌatakˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈetu.|0
kwa habˈari ja mɡˈeni ambˈaje si mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini ˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈina lˈako kˈuu na mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa, ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa kuˈomba kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu hˈili.|0
bˌasi na ˌusikˈie kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako, ˌukafˈaɲe lolˈote ambˈalo mɡˈeni hˈujo ˌanakuˈomba, ˌili mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia wapˈate kuɟˈua ɟˈina lˈako na wˌakuoɡˈope kˌama wˌafaɲˈavjo wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli nˌao wapˈate pˈia kuɟˈua kwˌamba ɲˈumba hˌii nˌilijˌoiɟˈeŋɡa ˌimeˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˈako wˌatakˌapokwˈenda vitˈani ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈao, popˈote ˌutakˌapowˌapelˈeka, wakˈati wˌatakˌapoˈomba kwa bwˈana kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ˌumeˌutʃaɡˈua, na hekˈalu nˌililˌoliɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
bˌasi ˌusikˈie dˈua na maˈombi jˈao kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌukawˌatetˈee hˈaki jˈao.|0
wˌatakˌapotˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje hatˈendi ðˈambi, nˌawe ˌukatʃukˈizwa nˌao na kˌuwakabˈiði kwa adˈui, ambˈaje ˌatawˌatʃukˈua ˌutumwˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ilˈijo mbˈali ˌau karˈibu.|0
na kˌama wˌatabˌadilˈika miˈojo jˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌanakˌoʃikilˈiwa matˈeka, nˌao wˌakatˈubu na kˌukulilˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa na kusˈema, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi, tˌumefˈaɲa makˈosa na tˌumetˈenda uˈovu.|0
kˌama wˌakikˌuɡeukˈia kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote na nˈafsi zˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui zˈao ambˈao wˌaliwˌatʃukˈua matˈeka, wˌakakuˈomba kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao, kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌoutʃaɡˈua na hekˈalu nˌililˌoliɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
bˌasi kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, mahˈali pa makˈao jˈako, ˌusikˈie dˈua jˈao na maˈombi jˈao na kˌuitetˈea hˈaki jˈao. ˌuwasamˈehe wˈatu wˈako, wˌaliotˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako.|0
sˈasa, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌafumbˈuke na mˌasikˈio jˈako jˌasikˈie maˈombi jˌaombwˈajo mahˈali hˈapa.|0
sˈasa inˈuka, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, na ˈuɟe mahˈali pˈako pa kˌupumzikˈia, wˌewe na sandˈuku la ŋɡˈuvu zˈako. mˌakuhˈani wˈako, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, na wavˈikwe wokˈovu, wˌatakatˈifu wˈako na wˌafurˈahi katˌika wˈema wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, ˌusimkatˈae mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈako. kumbˈuka upˈendo m̩kˈuu ˌuliˌomwahidˈia daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
baˌada ja sˌolomˈoni kˌumalˈiza kuˈomba, mˈoto ˌukaʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuteketˈeza sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukaliɟˈaza hekˈalu.|0
mˌakuhˈani hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana kwa sabˈabu ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌuliliɟˈaza.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalipoˈona mˈoto ˌukiʃˈuka na ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ukˈiwa ɟˌuːja hekˈalu, wˌakapˈiɡa maɡˈoti sˌakafˈuni wˌakasuɟˈudu ɲˈuso zˈao mpˈaka tʃˈini, nˌao wˌakamwabˈudu na kˌumʃukˈuru bwˈana wˌakisˈema, jˌeje ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake ˌunadˈumu milˈele.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme na wˈatu wˈote wˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌaje mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ja ŋɡˈombe ˌiʃirˈininambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo na mbˈuzi mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. hˈivjo ndˈivjo mfˈalme na wˈatu wˈote wˌalivjowˈeka wˈakfu hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌakasimˈama kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao, vˈivjo hˈivjo walˈawi wakˈiwa na vjˈombo vja ˌuimbˈaɟi vja bwˈana ambˈavjo mfˈalme daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja kumsˈifu bwˈana, nˈavjo vˌilitumˈika wakˈati ˌalipˌoʃukˈuru, ˌakisˈema, upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele. mkabˈala na walˈawi, mˌakuhˈani wˌalipˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta zˈao, nˌao wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakawˈeka wˈakfu sehˈemu ja kˌatikˈati ja ˈua ˌuliokˈuwa mbˈele ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na hˈapo ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na mafˈuta ja sadˈaka za amˈani, kwa sabˈabu mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza hˌaikutˈoʃa kuwˈeka sadˈaka hˈizo zˈote za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka na za mafˈuta.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja nˈane wˌalifˈaɲa kˌusaɲˈiko, kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˌaðimˈiʃa kuwˈekwa wˈakfu kwa mˌaðabˈahu kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba na sˌikukˈuu kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine sˈaba zaˈidi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba sˌolomˈoni ˌakawaˈaɡa wˈatu waˈende ɲumbˈani m̩wˈao, wˌakiʃˌaŋɡilˈia na kˌufurˈahi mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao, kwa wˈema mwˈiŋɡi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌomtendˈea daˈudi na sˌolomˈoni na kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalipˌomalˈiza kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, nˌaje akˈiwa ˌamefˌanikˈiwa kutˈenda jˈale jˈote ˌalijokˈuwa nˈajo mojˈoni mwˈake kufˈaɲa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana na katˌika ɟˈumba lˈake mweɲˈewe la kifˈalme.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtokˈea sˌolomˈoni usˈiku na kˌumwambˈia: nˌimesikˈia maˈombi jˈako nˌami nˌimetʃaɡˈua mahˈali hˈapa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kˌuwa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja ðabˈihu.|0
wakˈati nˌitakˌapofˈuŋɡa mbˈiŋɡu ˌili ˌisiwˈepo mvˈua, ˌau nˌikiamˈuru nzˈiɡe kˈula mazˈao ja ˈn̩tʃi ˌau nˌikitˈuma taˈuni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˌanaoˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, wˌataɟˌiɲeɲekˈeʃa na kuˈomba na kˌuutafˈuta ˈuso wˈaŋɡu na kuˈatʃa ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja, bˌasi nˌitasikˈia tˌoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuwasamˈehe ðˈambi jˈao na nˌitaipˈoɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
sˈasa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌatafumbˈuka na mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu jˌatasˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini maˈombi jˌaombwˈajo mahˈali hˈapa.|0
kwa maˈana sˈasa nˌimetʃaɡˈua na kˌutakˈasa hekˈalu hˈili ˌili kwˌamba ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lipˈate kˌuwa hˌuko milˈele. mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu na mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌutakuwˈepo hˌuko daˈima.|0
kwa habˈari jˈako wˈewe, kˌama ˌukienˈenda mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kˌama daˈudi bˈaba jˈako ˌalivjˌoenˈenda na kufˈaɲa jˈote nˌikuˌamurˈujo, nˌawe ˌukiziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitakˌiimarˈiʃa kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌama nˌilivjˌoaɡˈana na daˈudi bˈaba jˈako nˌiliposˈema, hˌutakˈosa kˈamwe ˈm̩tu wa kˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli..|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌukiɡeˈuka na kˌujaˈatʃa mˌaaɡˈizo na ˈamri nˌilizowˈapa na kwˈenda kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuiabˈudu.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakˌapoiŋɡˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu nˌilijowˈapa, nˌami nˌitalˌikatˈaa hekˈalu hˈili nˌililˌolitakˈasa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. nˌitalifˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na kˈitu tʃa kˌuðihakˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈote.|0
iŋɡˈawa hekˈalu hˈili lˌinavutˈia sˈana sˈasa, wˈote wˌatakˌaolipˈita wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa na kusˈema, kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa kˈitu kˌama hˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na kwa hekˈalu hˈili?.|0
wˈatu wˌataɟˈibu, ni kwa sabˈabu wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, ˌalijˌewatˈoa mˈisri, nˌao wˌamekˌumbatˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, wˌakaˌiabˈudu na kˌuitˌumikˈia, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ˌamejalˈeta maˈafa hˈaja jˈote ɟˈuu jˈao..|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa tˈena viɟˈiɟi vˈile ambˈavjo hirˈamu ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa, nˌaje ˌakawˈapa wˌaisraˈeli waˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈenda hˈamaθ sˈoba na kˌuutˈeka.|0
pˈia ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi wa tadmˈori katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa na mˈiɟi jˈote ja kˌuhifaðˈia vˈitu katˌika hamˈaθi.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa tˈena bˈeθ horˈoni ja ɟˈuu na bˈeθ horˈoni ja tʃˈini, mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, kˈuta, malˈaŋɡo na mˌakomˈeo.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˌosalˈia kutˈoka kwa wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wahˈivi na wˌajebˈusi hˈaja mˌataˈifa hˌajakˈuwa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini sˌolomˈoni hˌakuwafˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli watˈumwa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi jˈake, bˌali wˌalikˈuwa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi, mˌaɟemadˈari, mˌaafˈisa wˈake, mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita na wˌaendˈeʃa maɡˈari ja vˈita.|0
pˈia wˌalikˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wakˈuu wa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni, jaˈani, mˌaafˈisa wˌakaɡˈuzi mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini wˌaliˌosimamˈia wˈatu.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakampandˈiʃa ˈm̩ke wˌake bˈinti farˈao kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi na kumlˈeta ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamemɟeŋɡˈea, kwa kˌuwa ˌalisˈema, ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu hˌataˈiʃi katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu mahˈali ambˈapo sandˈuku la bwˈana lˌimefˈika ni pˌatakatˈifu.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌameiɟˈeŋɡa mbˈele ja ukˈumbi.|0
kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌahitˈaɟi ja kˈila sˈiku kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa na mˈose kwa aɟˈili ja sabˈato, mwˈezi mwandˈamo na sˌikukˈuu ɲiŋɡˈine tˈatu za mwˈaka, jaˈani, sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu, sˌikukˈuu ja maɟˈuma na sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda.|0
kwa kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo ja daˈudi bˈaba jˈake, ˌaliwˈeka mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja mˌakuhˈani kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi zˈao, nˌao walˈawi kˌuoŋɡˈoza kusˈifu na kˌusaidˈia mˌakuhˈani kˌufuatˈana na mˌahitˈaɟi ja kˈila sˈiku. pˈia ˌakawˈeka mˌabawˈabu katˌika mˌiɡawˈaɲo kwa aɟˈili ja malˈaŋɡo mbˌalimbˈali, kwa sabˈabu hˈili ndˈilo daˈudi ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌalilokˈuwa ˌameaɡˈiza.|0
nˌao hˌawakˌuziˈatʃa ˈamri za mfˈalme ˌalizˌoamˈuru mˌakuhˈani ˌau walˈawi katˌika ɟˈambo lolˈote, ikˈiwa ni pamˈoɟa na zˈile za hazˈina.|0
kˈazi jˈote ja mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌilifaɲˈika kˌuanzˈia sˈiku msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌulipowˈekwa mpˈaka kˌukamilˈika kwˈake. kwa hˈijo hekˈalu la bwˈana lˌikamˌalizˈika kuɟˈeŋɡwa.|0
ndˈipo sˌolomˈoni ˌakaˈenda esˈion ɡebˈeri na elˈaθi katˌika pwˈani ja edˈomu.|0
nˌaje hirˈamu ˌalimpˌelekˈea mˈeli zˌilizˌooŋɡˈozwa na mˌaafˈisa wˌake mweɲˈewe, wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa na uɟˈuzi wa bˌaharˈini. hˈawa wˈatu pamˈoɟa na wˈale wa sˌolomˈoni wˌakasafˈiri kwa bahˈari mpˈaka ofˈiri, wˌakalˈeta kutˈoka hˌuko talˈanta mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa hamsˈini za ðahˈabu, ambˈazo wˌalimkabˈiði mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakamɟˈibu maswˈali jˌake jˈote, wˈala hˌakukˈuwa na ɟˈambo lolˈote lˌililokˈuwa ɡˈumu kwˈake ˌasiwˈeze kˌumwelezˈea.|0
malkˈia wa ʃˈeba ˌalipoˈona hekˈima jˈote ja sˌolomˈoni na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme ˌalilokˈuwa ˌameɟˈeŋɡa.|0
tʃakˈula kˌilitʃokˈuwa mezˈani pˈake, ɟˈinsi mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌalivjokˈaa, wˌahudˈumu katˌika maɟˈoho jˈao, wˌaɲueʃˈaɟi wˌake na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ˌalizotˈoa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌalipˈatwa na mʃaŋɡˈao.|0
ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, tˌaarˈifa nˌilijˌosikˈia kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kuhˈusu mˌafanikˈio na hekˈima jˈako ni kwˈeli.|0
lakˈini sˌikuamˈini jˌalijosˈemwa hˌadi nˌilipokˈuɟa na kuˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe. nˈaam, sˌikuambˈiwa hˌata nˈusu jˈake; katˌika hekˈima na mˈali ˌumezˈidi sˈana kulˈiko ˈile tˌaarˈifa nˌilijˌoisikˈia.|0
hˈeri wˈatu wˈako! hˈeri hˈawa mˌaafˈisa wˈako wˌasimamˈao mbˈele jˈako daˈima na kˌusikˈia hekˈima jˈako.|0
nˌaje akˈampa mfˈalme talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini za ðahˈabu, kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa vˌikolˈezi na vˈito vja θamˈani. hˌaikuwˈahi kˈamwe kulˈetwa vˌikolˈezi vizˈuri kˌama vˈile malkˈia wa ʃˈeba ˌalivjˈompa mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa hirˈamu na wa sˌolomˈoni wˌakalˈeta ðahˈabu kutˈoka ofˈiri, tˈena wˌakalˈeta ʃehˈena kˈubwa ja mˈiti ja msandˈali na vˈito vja θamˈani.|0
