mfˈalme ˌakatumˈia hˈijo mˈiti ja msandˈali kˌuwa ŋɡˈazi kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na kwa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, pˈia kwa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza vinˈubi na zˈeze kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaimbˈaɟi. kiˈasi hˈitʃo kˈiŋɡi tʃa msandˈali hˌakiɟawˈahi kˌuiŋɡˈizwa jˈuda ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile..|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni akˈampa malkˈia wa ʃˈeba kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃˌotamˈani na kˌukiˈomba, zaˈidi ja vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemletˈea mfˈalme. kˈiʃa malkˈia ˌakaondˈoka na kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake, jˌeje na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
uzˈito wa ðahˈabu ambˈajo sˌolomˈoni ˌalipokˈea kwa mwˈaka ˌulikˈuwa talˈanta mˌiasˈita sitˈininasˈita.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈao kˈubwa mˌiambˈili kwa ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa. kˈila ŋɡˈao ˌilikˈuwa na ðahˈabu jˌeɲe uzˈito wa ʃekˈeli mˌiasˈita.|0
ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈia ŋɡˈao ndˈoɡo mˌiatˈatu za ðahˈabu ˌilijˌofulˈiwa, kˈila ŋɡˈao ikˈiwa na uzˈito wa mˈane tˈatu za ðahˈabu. mfˈalme ˌakaziwˈeka katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la msˈitu wa lˌebanˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza kˈiti kikˈubwa tʃa kifˈalme kwa kˌutumˈia pˈembe za ndˈovu na kˌukifunˈika kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
vikˈombe vjˈote vja mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni vja kˌuɲuˈea vˌilikˈuwa vja ðahˈabu na vjˈombo vjˈote vja ɲumbˈani katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la msˈitu wa lˌebanˈoni vˌilikˈuwa vja ðahˈabu sˈafi. hˌakukˈuwa na kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa fˈeða, kwa sabˈabu fˈeða ˌiliˌonekˈana ja θamˈani ndˈoɡo wakˈati wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu zaˈidi kwa ˌutaɟˈiri na hekˈima kulˈiko wafˈalme wˈote wa dunˈia.|0
mwˈaka baˌada ja mwˈaka, kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌalikˈuɟa, ˌalilˈeta zawˈadi, vjˈombo vja fˈeða na ðahˈabu, maɟˈoho, silˈaha na vˌikolˈezi, farˈasi na ɲˈumbu.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈanda ˈn̩ne,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita, farˈasi kˈuminambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao ˌaliwawˈeka katˌika mˈiɟi ja maɡˈari ja vˈita na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌakatawˈala ɟˌuːja wafˈalme wˈote kˌuanzˈia ˈm̩to frˈati mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti na kˌuendelˈea hˌadi mpˈaka wa mˈisri.|0
farˈasi wa sˌolomˈoni wˌalilˈetwa kutˈoka mˈisri na kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote.|0
kwa habˈari za mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa sˌolomˈoni, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za nabˈii naθˈani, katˌika ˌunabˈii wa ahˈija mʃilˈoni na katˌika maˈono ja ˈido mwonˈaɟi kuhˈusu jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati.|0
kˈiʃa sˌolomˈoni ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. nˌaje rˌehoboˈamu mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaˈenda ʃekˈemu, kwa kˌuwa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda hˌuko kumfˈaɲa jˌeje kˌuwa mfˈalme.|0
jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili ˌalikˈuwa bˈado jˈuko mˈisri ˌalikokˈuwa ˌamekˌimbilˈia ˈawe mbˈali na mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni, ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakatˈuma wˈatu kumwˈita jˌeroboˈamu, jˌeje na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la ˌisraˈeli wˌakamwendˈea rˌehoboˈamu na kˌumwambˈia.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaɟˈibu, nendˈeni kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu na kˈiʃa mnˌirudˈie. bˌasi wˈatu wˌakaˈenda zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa wazˈee ambˈao wˌalimtˌumikˈia sˌolomˈoni bˈaba jˌake wakˈati wa uhˈai wˌake ˌakawˌaulˈiza, mnˌaniʃaˈuri nˈini katˌika kˌuwaɟˈibu wˈatu hˈawa.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama lˈeo ˌutakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wa wˈatu hˈawa na kˌuwahˌudumˈia na kuwˈapa ɟˈibu lˌinalˌoriðˈiʃa, wˌatakˈuwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako daˈima.|0
lakˈini rˌehoboˈamu ˌakakatˈaa ʃaˈuri ˌalilopˈewa na wazˈee na ˌakatˈaka ˌuʃaˈuri kwa viɟˈana wˌanaˈume rˈika lˈake wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimtˌumikˈia.|0
ˌakawˌaulˈiza, nˈiɲi ˌuʃaˈuri wˈenu ni nˈini? tˌutawˌaɟibˈuɟe wˈatu hˈawa wˌanaˌoniambˈia, ifˈaɲe ɲepˈesi nˈira bˈaba jˈako ˌalijowˈeka ɟˈuu jˈetu?.|0
wˈale viɟˈana wa rˈika lˈake wˌakamɟˈibu, wˌaambˈie wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌokuambˈia, bˈaba jˈako ˌaliwˈeka nˈira nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈetu, lakˈini ifˈaɲe nˈira jˈetu ɲepˈesi, kˌuwa, kidˈole tʃˈaŋɡu kidˈoɡo ni kinˈene kulˈiko kiˈuno tʃa bˈaba jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwˈeka nˈira nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈenu, mˌimi nˌitaifˈaɲa hˌata ˈiwe nzˈito zaˈidi. bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwatʃˈapa kwa mˌiɟelˈedi; mˌimi nˌitawatʃˈapa kwa ŋɡˈe..|0
sˈiku tˈatu bˌaadˈaje, jˌeroboˈamu na wˈatu wˈote wˌakamrudˈia rˌehoboˈamu, kˌama mfˈalme ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamesˈema, rudˈini kwˈaŋɡu baˌada ja sˈiku tˈatu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawaɟˈibu wˈatu kwa ˌukatˈili. ˌakikatˈaa ʃaˈuri ˌalilopˈewa na wazˈee.|0
ˌakafuˈata ʃaˈuri la viɟˈana wa rˈika lˈake na kusˈema, bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌalifˈaɲa nˈira jˈenu kˌuwa nzˈito, mˌimi nˌitaifˈaɲa kˌuwa nzˈito zaˈidi. bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌaliwatʃˈapa kwa mˌiɟelˈedi, mˌimi nˌitawatʃˈapa kwa ŋɡˈe.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza wˈatu, kwa kˌuwa ɟˈambo hˈili lˌilitˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu ˌili kˌutimˈiza nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamenˈena kwa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa nebˈati kˌupitˈia ahˈija mʃilˈoni.|0
ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalipoˈona kˌuwa mfˈalme ˌamekatˈaa kˌuwasˌikilˈiza, wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme: tˈuna fˈuŋɡu ɡˈani kwa daˈudi? sˌisi hatˈuna urˈiθi kwa mwˈana wa jˈese. nendˈeni kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈenu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ˌaŋɡalˈia ɲˈumba jˈako mweɲˈewe, ˈee daˈudi! hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈao.|0
lakˈini kwa habˈari ja wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwatawˈala bˈado.|0
mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakamtˈuma ˌadonirˈamu ˌalijekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu kwa kˌulazimˈiʃwa, lakˈini ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌakampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe hˌadi akˈafa. hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu, ˌakafˌanikˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake na kˌutorokˈea jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈivjo ˌisraˈeli wˌakaˈasi ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja daˈudi hˌadi lˈeo.|0
ikˈawa rˌehoboˈamu ˌalipofˈika jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakakusˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda na ja bˌeɲamˈini, wˌanaˈume wˌapiɡanˈaɟi mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θemanˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, kufˈaɲa vˈita ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na kˌuurudˈiʃa tˈena ufˈalme kwa rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
lakˈini nˈeno hˈili la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia ʃemˈaja ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
mwambˈie rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni mfˈalme wa jˈuda, na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliˈoko jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome katˌika jˈuda.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa bˌeθlehˈemu, etˈamu, tekˈoa.|0
bˈeθ sˈuri, sˈoko, ˌadulˈamu.|0
ɡˈaθi, marˈeʃa, zˈifu.|0
ˌadoraˈimu, lakˈiʃi, azˈeka.|0
sˈora, ˌaijalˈoni na hebrˈoni. hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilijokˈuwa mˈiɟi ˌilijˌoɟeŋɡˈewa ŋɡˈome katˌika jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ˌakaˌimarˈiʃa ulˈinzi wˌake na kuwˈeka mˌaɟemadˈari ndˈani jˈake, pamˈoɟa na ɣˈala za mˌahitˈaɟi ja vjakˈula, mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni na divˈai.|0
ˌakawˈeka ŋɡˈao na mikˈuki katˌika mˈiɟi na kˌuifˈaɲa ˈiwe imˈara sˈana. kwa hˈijo jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini zikˈawa zˈake.|0
mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi kutˈoka sehˈemu zˈote za ˌisraˈeli wakˈawa upˈande wˈake.|0
pˈia walˈawi wˌakaˈatʃa mˌaenˈeo jˈao ja malˈiʃo na mˈali zˈao, wakˈaɟa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kwa sabˈabu jˌeroboˈamu na wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewˌakatˈaa wasˈiwe mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana.|0
nˌaje akˈawa ˌametʃaɡˈua mˌakuhˈani wˌake mweɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia sanˈamu za mbˈuzi na za ndˈama ambˈazo ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza.|0
wˈale wˌaliotˈoka katˌika kˈila kabˈila la ˌisraˈeli ambˈao wˌaliˌelekˈeza miˈojo jˈao kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, wˌakawˌafuˈata walˈawi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kˌumtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
wˌakaˌimarˈiʃa ufˈalme wa jˈuda na kˌumuˈuŋɡa mkˈono rˌehoboˈamu mwˈana wa sˌolomˈoni miˈaka mitˈatu, wˌakienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za daˈudi na sˌolomˈoni katˌika wakˈati hˈuu.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌalimwˈoa mˌahalˈati ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa bˈinti jˌeremˈoθi mwˈana wa daˈudi, mamˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌabihaˈili bˈinti ˌeliˈabu mwˈana wa jˈese.|0
mˌahalˈati ˌalimzalˈia rˌehoboˈamu wˈana: jeˈuʃi, ʃˌemarˈia na zahˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakamwˈoa maˈaka bˈinti ˌabsalˈomu, ambˈaje ˌalimzalˈia: abˈija, atˈai, zˈiza na ʃˌelomˈiθi.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakampˈenda maˈaka bˈinti ˌabsalˈomu zaˈidi kulˈiko wakˈeze weŋɡˈine na mˌasurˈia wˈake. kwa ɟˈumla ˌalikˈuwa na wˌake kˈumi na wanˈane na mˌasurˈia sitˈini, wˈana ˌiʃirˈini na wanˈane na bˈinti sitˈini.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakamwˈeka abˈija mwˈana wa maˈaka, kˌuwa m̩kˈuu wa wˈana wa mfˈalme mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˌake ˌili amfˈaɲe mfˈalme.|0
ˌakatˈenda kwa busˈara, ˌakiwˌasambˈaza baˈaði ja wanˈawe katˌika wilˈaja zˈote za jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini, pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈote jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome. ˌakawˈapa mˌahitˈaɟi tˈele na kˌuwaˈoza wˌake wˈeŋɡi.|0
baˌada ja nafˈasi ja rˌehoboˈamu kˌuimarˈika na kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu, jˌeje na ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌaliiˈatʃa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa bwˈana, ʃiʃˈaki mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakaʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈano wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu.|0
akˈiwa na maɡˈari ja vˈita mˈoɟa,mˌiambˈili na wapˈanda farˈasi sitˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na idˈadi ˌisijˌohesabˈika ja maɟˈeʃi ja wˌalibˈia, wˌasukˈii na wakˈuʃi jˌalijokˈuɟa pamˈoɟa nˌaje kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
ˌakatˈeka mˈiɟi ja jˈuda jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome ˌakaˌendelˈea mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii ʃemˈaja akˈaɟa kwa rˌehoboˈamu na kwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa aɟˈili ja hˈofu ja ʃiʃˈaki nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana, nˈiɲi mmˌeniˈatʃa mˈimi, kwa hˈijo, mˌimi nˌami sˈasa nˌinawaˈatʃa nˈiɲi mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa ʃiʃˈaki..|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli na mfˈalme wˌakaɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza na kusˈema, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalipoˈona kwˌamba wˌameɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza, nˈeno hˈili la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia ʃemˈaja: mˌaadˈamu wˌameɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza, sˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza bˌali hˈivi kˌaribˈuni nˌitawˌapatˈia wokˈovu. ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu hˌaitamwˈaɡwa ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu kwa kˌupitˈia ʃiʃˈaki.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˌatamtˌumikˈia ʃiʃˈaki ˌili wapˈate kˌuɟifˈunza tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja kˌunitˌumikˈia mˌimi na kˌuwatˌumikˈia wafˈalme wa ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine.|0
ʃiʃˈaki mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌalipˌoiʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu, ˌalitʃukˈua hazˈina za hekˈalu la bwˈana na hazˈina za ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. ˌakatʃukˈua kˈila kˈitu, pamˈoɟa na zˈile ŋɡˈao za ðahˈabu ambˈazo sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌamezˌiteŋɡenˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza ŋɡˈao za ʃˈaba badˈala ja zˈile za ðahˈabu na kˌuzikabˈiði kwa mˌaɟemadˈari wa ulˈinzi wa zˈamu kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
kˈila wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipokwˈenda katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana walˈinzi wˌalikwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌaje wakˈiwa wˌamebˈeba hˈizo ŋɡˈao na bˌaadˈaje wˌalizˌirudˈiʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ulˈinzi.|0
kwa sabˈabu rˌehoboˈamu ˌaliɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza, hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikaɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˈaje, hˌakuˌaŋɡamˈizwa kabˈisa. kukˈawa na hˈali nzˈuri katˌika jˈuda.|0
mfˈalme rˌehoboˈamu ˌakaɟiwˈeka imˈara katˌika jˌerusalˈemu na ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwa mfˈalme. ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini na mmˈoɟa ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na sˈaba, ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌutʃaɡˈua mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ˌili ˌaliwˈeke ɟˈina lˈake hˈumo. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa naˈama, ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈoni.|0
rˌehoboˈamu ˌakatˈenda maˈovu kwa sabˈabu hˌakuˌuelekˈeza mˈojo wˌake katˌika kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa habˈari ja mˌatukˈio katˌika ˌutawˈala wa rˌehoboˈamu, ʃˈu mwˈanzo mpˈaka mwˈiʃo, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za nabˈii ʃemˈaja na mwonˈaɟi ˈido zˌinazˌohusiˈana na vizˈazi? kˌulikuwˈako na vˈita mˈara kwa mˈara kˈati ja rˌehoboˈamu na jˌeroboˈamu.|0
ˈasa ˌakatˈenda jalˈijo mˈema na hˈaki matʃˈoni pa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
ˌakazˌiondˈoa mˌaðabˈahu za kiɡˈeni na mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, ˌakajavˈuɲɟa jˈale mˈawe ja kˌuabudˈiwa na kˌuzikˌatakˈata ŋɡˈuzo za mˌaaʃˈera.|0
ˌakawˌaamˈuru jˈuda kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao na kutˈii ʃerˈia zˌake na ˈamri zˈake.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈia ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa odˈedi.|0
ˌakatˈoka ˌili kumlˈaki ˈasa na kˌumwambˈia, nˌisikˌilizˈeni, ˈasa na jˈuda wˈote na bˌeɲamˈini. bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi mkˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje. kˌama mkˌimtafˈuta, ˌataˌonekˈana kwˈenu, lakˈini kˌama mkimwˈatʃa jˈeje, nˌaje ˌatawaˈatʃa nˈiɲi.|0
kwa mˈuda mrˈefu ˌisraˈeli wˌalikˈuwa hawˈana mˈuŋɡu wa kwˈeli, wˌalikˈuwa hawˈana kuhˈani wa kˌuwafundˈiʃa na wˈala hˌawakˈuwa na ʃerˈia.|0
lakˈini katˌika taˈabu jˈao wˌalimrudˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na kˌumtafˈuta, nˌaje ˌakaˌonekˈana kwˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo hˌapakˈuwa na amˈani kwa jejˈote ˌalijˌesafˈiri, kutˈoka wˈala kˌuiŋɡˈia, kwa kˌuwa wakˈazi wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌalikˈuwa katˌika mˌatʃafˈuko makˈubwa.|0
taˈifa mˈoɟa lˌilipiɡˈana na taˈifa liŋɡˈine na ˈm̩ɟi mmˈoɟa ˌukapiɡˈana na ˈm̩ɟi mwiŋɡˈine, kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌanawˌahaŋɡaˈiʃa kwa taˈabu za kˈila aˈina.|0
lakˈini kwa habˈari jˈenu nˈiɲi, kuwˈeni hodˈari wˈala msikˈate tamˈaa, kwa kˌuwa mtapˈata θawˈabu kwa kˈazi jˈenu.|0
ˈasa ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno hˈaja na ˌunabˈii wa ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa odˈedi nabˈii, ˌakaɟˈipa mˈojo. ˌakazˌiondˈoa sanˈamu zˈote zˌilizokˈuwa mˌatʃukˈizo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ja jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini na kutˈoka mˈiɟi ˌalijˌoitˈeka ja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu. ˌakakˌarabˈati mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana ˌilijokˈuwa mbˈele ja ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakakˌutanˈiʃa jˈuda wˈote, bˌeɲamˈini na wˈatu kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu, wˈatu wa manˈase na sˌimeˈoni wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, kwa maˈana idˈadi kˈubwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemɟˈia kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli wˌalipoˈona kwˌamba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
bˌasi wˌakakˌusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu mwˈezi wa tˈatu katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈano wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu za ŋɡˈombe mˌiasˈaba, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kutˈoka zˈile ɲˈara wˌalizotˈeka.|0
wˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˈao jˈote.|0
wˈale wˈote ambˈao hˌawaŋɡˌemtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaŋɡelˌazimˈika kˌuuˈawa, akˈiwa mdˈoɡo ˌau mkˈubwa, mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke.|0
wˌakamwapˈia bwˈana kwa saˈuti kˈuu, kwa kupˈiɡa kelˈele, tˌarumbˈeta na kwa mˌabaraɡˈumu.|0
jˈuda wˈote wˌakafˌurahˈia kˈile kiˈapo kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈapa kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote. wˌakamtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu kwa bidˈii, nˌaje ˌakaˌonekˈana kwˈao. kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakawˌastarehˈeʃa pˈande zˈote.|0
ˌakalˈeta ndˈani ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu fˈeða na ðahˈabu na vˈile vjˈombo ambˈavjo jˌeje na bˈaba jˌake wˌalikˈuwa wˌameviwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
hˌapakuwˈepo vˈita tˈena mpˈaka mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na tˈano wa ˌutawˈala wˌake ˈasa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na sˈita wa ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa, mfˈalme baˈaʃa wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaʃˌambulˈia jˈuda na kuwˈeka ŋɡˈome ˈm̩ɟi wa rˈama ˌili kˌumzuˈia jejˈote ˌasitˈoke wˈala kˌuiŋɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja mfˈalme ˈasa wa jˈuda.|0
ndˈipo ˈasa ˌakatʃukˈua fˈeða na ðahˈabu kutˈoka hazˈina ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na kutˈoka ɟˈumba lˈake mweɲˈewe la kifˈalme na kˌumpelekˈea bˈen hadˈadi mfˈalme wa arˈamu, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌanatawˈala hˌuko damˈeski.|0
bˈen hadˈadi ˌakakˌubaliˈana na mfˈalme ˈasa na kutˈuma mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɟˈeʃi jˌake ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi ja ˌisraˈeli. wˌakaʃˈinda ijˈoni, dˈani, ˈabel maˈimu na mˈiɟi jˈote ja hazˈina ja naftˈali.|0
baˈaʃa ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa kuɟˈeŋɡa rˈama na kuˈatʃa kˈazi jˈake.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˈasa ˌakawalˈeta wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda, nˌao wˌakatʃukˈua mˈawe na mˈiti ambˈajo baˈaʃa ˌalikˈuwa ˌanavˌitumˈia hˌuko rˈama. kwa vˈitu hˈivjo ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ɡˈeba na mˈispa.|0
ikˈawa wakˈati hˈuo mwonˈaɟi hanˈani ˌakamɟˈia mfˈalme ˈasa wa jˈuda na kˌumwambˈia: kwa sabˈabu ˌulimtˌeɡemˈea mfˈalme wa arˈamu nˌawe hˌukumtˌeɡemˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa arˈamu lˌimepoɲˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
ɟˈe, hˌukumbˈuki lˌililˌotendˈeka kwa wakˈuʃi na wˌalibˈia, hˌawakˈuwa ɟˈeʃi lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na maɡˈari mˈeŋɡi ja vˈita na wapˈanda farˈasi? hˌata hˈivjo, ˌulipˌomteɡemˈea bwˈana jˌeje ˌaliwatˈia mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈatʃo ja bwˈana hˌukimbˌiakimbˈia dˌuniˈani kˈote ˌili kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale ambˈao miˈojo jˈao ˌinamtˌeɡemˈea kwa ˌukamilˈifu. ˌumefˈaɲa ɟˈambo la ˌupumbˈavu na kˌuanzˈia sˈasa na kˌuendelˈea ˌutakˈuwa na vˈita.|0
ˈasa ˌakamkˌasirikˈia mwonˈaɟi kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈambo hˈili. ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɣˌaðibˈika sˈana hˌata ˌakamwˈeka ɡˌerezˈani. wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo ˈasa ˌakaˈanza kˌuwatˈesa na kˌuwaonˈea baˈaði ja wˈatu kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
mˌatukˈio ja ˌutawˈala wa ˈasa, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo mpˈaka mwˈiʃo, jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na tˈisa wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, ˈasa ˌalipˈatwa na uɡˈoɲɟua kwˈeɲe miɡˈuu jˈake. iŋɡˈawa uɡˈoɲɟua wˌake ˌulimzidˈia sˈana, hˌata katˌika kˌuuɡˈua kwˈake hˌakutafˈuta msaˈada kutˈoka kwa bwˈana bˌali kwa mˌatabˈibu tˈu.|0
nˌao wˌakamzˈika katˌika kabˈuri lˈile ˌalilokˈuwa ˌameɟˌitʃoŋɡˈea mweɲˈewe katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. wˌakamzˈika kwa ɟenˈeza lˌililowˈekwa vˌikolˈezi na mtʃˌaŋɡaɲˈiko wa mˌanukˈato ja aˈina mbˌalimbˈali jˌalijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ˌutaalˈamu wa mtˌeŋɡenˈeza marˈaʃi, nˌao wˌakawˈaʃa mˈoto mkˈubwa kwa heʃˈima jˈake.|0
ˌakawˈeka ɟˈeʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na kuwˈeka askˈari walˈinzi katˌika jˈuda na katˌika mˈiɟi ja ˌefraˈimu ˈile ambˈajo bˈaba jˌake ˈasa ˌalikˈuwa ˌameitˈeka.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa na jˌehoʃafˈati kwa sabˈabu katˌika miˈaka jˌake ja mwanzˈoni ˌalienˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. hˌakutafˈuta mˌabaˈali.|0
bˌali ˌalimtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˌake na kˌuzifuˈata ˈamri zˌake badˈala ja kˌufuˈata destˈuri za wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakaˌuimarˈiʃa ufˈalme tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wˈake, nˌao jˈuda wˈote wˌakamletˈea jˌehoʃafˈati zawˈadi, hˈivjo akˈawa na ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi na heʃˈima.|0
mˈojo wˌake ukˈawa hodˈari katˌika ɲɟˈia za bwˈana na zaˈidi ja jˈote, ˌakaondˈoa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu na ŋɡˈuzo za mˌaaʃˈera katˌika jˈuda.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌakatˈuma mˌaafˈisa wˌake ambˈao nˈi: bˈen haˈili, ˌobadˈia, zˌekarˈia, nˌeθanˈeli na mikˈaja ˌili kˌufundˈiʃa katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda.|0
pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌalikuwˈepo walˈawi fulˈani nˌao nˈi: ʃemˈaja, nˌeθanˈia, zˌebadˈia, ˌasahˈeli, ʃˌemiramˈoθi, jˌehonaθˈani, ˌadonˈija, tobˈia, tˈob ˌadonˈia, pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌalikuwˈepo mˌakuhˈani ˌeliʃˈama na jˌehorˈamu.|0
wˌakafundˈiʃa jˈuda jˈote, wakˈiwa wˌametʃukˈua kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana wˌakazuŋɡˈuka mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda na kˌufundˈiʃa wˈatu.|0
hˈofu ja bwˈana ikˈawa ɟˌuːja fˈalme zˈote za ˈn̩tʃi zˌilizˌozuŋɡˈuka jˈuda, hˈivjo hˌawakufˈaɲa vˈita na jˌehoʃafˈati.|0
baˈaði ja wˌafilˈisti wˌakamletˈea jˌehoʃafˈati zawˈadi na fˈeða kˌama uʃˈuru, nˌao wˌaarˈabu wˌakamletˈea mifˈuɡo: kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba,mˌiasˈaba na mbˈuzi sˈaba,mˌiasˈaba.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaˌendelˈea kupˈata ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi na zaˈidi, ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ŋɡˈome na mˈiɟi ja hazˈina katˌika jˈuda.|0
na akˈawa na wˈiŋɡi mkˈubwa wa vˈitu katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda. pˈia ˌaliwˈeka askˈari wa vˈita wˌeɲe ˌuzoˈefu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌakaˌandikˈiʃwa katˌika ɟamˈaa zˈao kˌama ˌifuatˈavjo: kutˈoka jˈuda, mˌaɟemadˈari wa vikˈosi vja ˈelfu: ɟˌemadˈari ˈadna akˈiwa na askˈari wa vˈita mˌiatˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
ˌalijˌefuˈata ni ˌamasˈia mwˈana wa zˈikri, ambˈaje ˌaliɟˌitolˈea kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi ja bwˈana, akˈiwa na askˈari mˌiambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
kutˈoka bˌeɲamˈini: ˌeliˈada, askˈari ʃuɟˈaa akˈiwa na wˈatu mˌiambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌeɲe silˈaha za ɲˈuta na ŋɡˈao.|0
bˈasi, jˌehoʃafˈati ˌalikˈuwa na mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana na heʃˈima. nˌaje ˌakafˈaɲa ˌurafˈiki na ahˈabu kwa mwanˈawe kumwˈoa bˈinti wa ahˈabu.|0
baˌada ja miˈaka kaðˈaa ˌakaʃˈuka kˌumtembelˈea ahˈabu hˌuko sˌamarˈia. ahˈabu ˌakatʃˈiɲɟa ŋɡˈombe na kondˈoo wˈeŋɡi kwa aɟˈili jˌake na wˈatu ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamefˌuatˈana nˈao. kˈiʃa ahˈabu ˌakamʃawˈiʃi jˌehoʃafˈati kukwˈea pamˈoɟa nˌaje ˌili kˌuiʃˌambulˈia rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi.|0
ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ɟˈe, ˌutakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌami kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi? jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, mˌimi ni kˌama wˈewe, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama wˈatu wˈako, farˈasi wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama farˈasi wˈako. tˌutakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe vitˈani.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati pˈia ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kwˈanza tafˈuta ʃaˈuri la bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakawalˈeta pamˈoɟa mˌanabˈii wˌanaˈume wˌapatˈao mˈia ˈn̩ne, ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, twˈende vitˈani ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi, ˌau niˈatʃe? wˌakaɟˈibu, nˈaam, nˈenda kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌataiwˈeka rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, hajˈuko nabˈii wa bwˈana hˈapa ambˈaje tˌunawˈeza kˌumuulˈiza.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu jˌehoʃafˈati, bˈado jˈupo ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ambˈaje kˌupitˈia jˌeje twawˈeza kˌumuulˈiza ʃaˈuri la bwˈana, lakˈini nˌamtʃukˈia kwa sabˈabu hˈuwa hˌatabˈiri ɟˈambo lolˈote ɟˈema kˌunihˈusu mˈimi, lakˈini kˈila mˈara hˌunitˌabirˈia mabˈaja tˈu. jˌeje ni mikˈaja mwˈana wa ˈimla. jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaɟˈibu, mfˈalme hapˈaswi kusˈema hˈivjo.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwˈita mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na kusˈema, mlˈete mikˈaja mwˈana wa ˈimla mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
wakˈiwa wˌamevalˈia maɟˈoho jˈao ja kifˈalme, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja vˈiti vjˈao vja kifˈalme katˌika sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la sˌamarˈia, pamˈoɟa na mˌanabˈii wˈote wakˈiwa wˌakitabˈiri mbˈele jˈao.|0
wakˈati hˈuu sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa kˌenaˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈembe za tʃˈuma, ˌakataŋɡˈaza, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo, kwa hˈizi pˈembe ˌutawapˈiɡa na kˌuwarudˈiʃa wˌaarˈamu ɲˈuma mpˈaka wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa..|0
mˌanabˈii weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌanatabˈiri kˈitu hˈitʃo hˈitʃo, wˌakisˈema, ˌiʃambulˈie rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi na ˈuwe mʃˈindi. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌataitˈia mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme.|0
mɟˈumbe ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda kumwˈita mikˈaja ˌakamwambˈia, tazˈama, mˌanabˈii wˈote kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa wˌanatabˈiri uʃˈindi kwa mfˈalme. nˈeno lˈako na lˌikubˌaliˈane na lˈao, nˌawe unˈene mˈema kuhˈusu mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini mikˈaja ˌakasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, nˌitamwambˈia kˈile tu bwˈana ˌatakˌatʃonˌiambˈia.|0
ˌalipofˈika, mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, mikˈaja, ɟˈe, twˈende vitˈani ðˈidi ja rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi ˌau niˈatʃe? ˌakamɟˈibu, ʃˌambulˈia na uʃˈinde, kwa kˌuwa wˌatatˈiwa mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi nˌitakˌuapˈiʃa ˌili ˌusinˌiambˈie kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˈila kwˈeli tu kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo mikˈaja ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌiliˈona ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌametˌawaɲˈika vˌilimˈani kˌama kondˈoo wasˈio na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˈema, wˈatu hˈawa hawˈana bwˈana. mwˈatʃe kˈila mmˈoɟa aˈende ɲumbˈani kwa amˈani..|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia jˌehoʃafˈati, sˌikukˌuambˈia kwˌamba hˈuwa hˌatabˈiri ɟˈambo lolˈote ɟˈema kˌunihˈusu bˌali mabˈaja tˈu.|0
mikˈaja ˌakaˌendelˈea, kwa hˈijo lˌisikˈie nˈeno la bwˈana: nˌilimwˈona bwˈana ˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la mbiŋɡˈuni likˈiwa lˌimesimˈama upˈande wa kulˈia na wa kuʃˈoto.|0
mwiʃˈoni, rˈoho ˌakaɟˌitokˈeza, ˌakasimˈama mbˈele za bwˈana na kusˈema, nˌitamʃawˈiʃi. bwˈana ˌakaulˈiza, kwa ɲɟˈia ɡˈani?.|0
ˌakasˈema, nˌitakwˈenda na kˌuwa rˈoho ja uˈoŋɡo katˌika vˈiɲua vja mˌanabˈii wˌake wˈote. bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ˌutafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kˌumʃawˈiʃi. nˈenda ˌukafˈaɲe hˈivjo..|0
kwa hˈijo sˈasa bwˈana ˌamewˈeka rˈoho ja kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa ndˈani ja vˈiɲua vja hˈawa mˌanabˈii wˈako wˈote. bwˈana ˌameamˈuru maˈafa kwa aɟˈili jˈako.|0
kˈiʃa sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa kˌenaˈana ˌakatˈoka na kumpˈiɡa mikˈaja kˈofi usˈoni. ˌakaulˈiza, hˈujo rˈoho kutˈoka kwa bwˈana ˌalipˈita ɲɟˈia ɡˈani ˌalipotˈoka kwˈaŋɡu ˌili kusˈema nˈawe.|0
mikˈaja ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌutaɡundˈua sˈiku hˈijo ˌutakˌapokwˈenda kˌuɟifˈitʃa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaaɡˈiza, mtʃˌukuˈeni na mkˌamrudˈiʃe kwa amˈoni mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi na kwa joˈaʃi mwˈana wa mfˈalme.|0
mkasˈeme, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo mfˈalme: mwekˈeni ˈm̩tu hˈuju ɡˌerezˈani na ˌasipˈewe tʃotʃˈote ˈila mkˈate na mˈaɟi mpˈaka nˌitakˌaporˈudi salˈama..|0
mikˈaja ˌakasˈema, kˌama ˌutarˈudi salˈama, bˌasi bwˈana hˌaɟanˈena kˌupitˈia kwˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, zˌiŋɡatiˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌakaˈenda rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi.|0
mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamwambˈia jˌehoʃafˈati, nˌitaiŋɡˈia vitˈani nikˈiwa nˌimeɟˌibadilˈiʃa, lakˈini wˌewe uvˈae maɟˈoho jˈako ja kifˈalme. kwa hˈijo mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaɟˌibadilˈiʃa na kwˈenda vitˈani.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza mˌaɟemadˈari θˌelaθˈini na wawˈili wa maɡˈari ja vˈita, msˌipiɡˈane na jejˈote, mdˈoɡo ˌau mkˈubwa, ˌisipokˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati wˈale mˌaɟemadˈari wa maɡˈari ja vˈita wˌalipomwˈona jˌehoʃafˈati, wˌakafikˈiri, hakˈika hˈuju n̩dˈije mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. kwa hˈijo wˌakaɡeˈuka ˌili wˌamʃambulˈie, lakˈini jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakapˈiɡa kelˈele, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamsˌaidˈia. mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌaondˈoa kwˈake.|0
wˈale mˌaɟemadˈari wˌakaˈona kwˌamba hakˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli nˌao wˌakaˈatʃa kˌumfuˌatilˈia.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu fulˈani ˌakavˈuta upˈinde pasˈipo lˈeŋɡo na kumpˈiɡa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli kˌatikˈati ja kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃa mavˈazi jˌake ja tʃˈuma, mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia mwendˈeʃa ɡˈari lˈake, ɡeˈuza ɡˈari na ˌuniondˈoe mˌimi katˌika mˌapiɡˈano, nˌimeɟˌeruhˈiwa.|0
mfˈalme jˌehoʃafˈati wa jˈuda ˌakarˈudi salˈama kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
jˈehu mwonˈaɟi, mwˈana wa hanˈani, ˌakapˈanda kwˈenda kˌuonˈana nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme jˌehoʃafˈati, ɟˈe, ˌutawˌasaidˈia waˈovu na kˌuwapˈenda wˈale wˌanaˌomtʃukˈia bwˈana? kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈambo hˈili, ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ˈiko ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˈuna mˈema jˌalijˌoonekˈana kwˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeondˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera na ˌumeukˈaza mˈojo wˈako katˌika kˌumtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje ˌakatˈoka ˌakaˈenda tˈena mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu, kˌuanzˈia bˈeer ʃˈeba hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ja ˌefraˈimu na kˌuwaɡeˈuza wˌakamrudˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
ˌakawawˈeka wˌaamˈuzi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda jˌeɲe mabˈoma.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, ˌaŋɡaliˈeni kwa makˈini jˈale mtendˈajo, kwa kˌuwa hˌamkuhukˈumu kwa aɟˈili ja mwˌanadˈamu bˌali kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana ambˈaje ju pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi kˈila mtoˈapo hukˈumu.|0
bˌasi sˈasa hˈofu ja bwˈana na ˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈenu. hˌukumˈuni kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu, kwa kˌuwa kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu hakˈuna ɟˈambo lisˈilo la hˈaki, ˌupendelˈeo, wˈala rˈuʃwa.|0
pˈia hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakawˈeka baˈaði ja walˈawi, mˌakuhˈani na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za wˌaisraˈeli ˌili kutˈoa hukˈumu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana na kˌuamˈua maɡˈomvi. nˌao wˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakawˈapa mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja: ni lazˈima mtumˈike kwa ˌuaminˈifu na kwa mˈojo wˈote katˌika kˈitʃo tʃa bwˈana.|0
katˌika kˈila ʃaˈuri lˌifikˈalo mbˈele jˈenu kutˈoka kwa ndˈuɡu zˈenu wˈale wˌaiʃˈio katˌika mˈiɟi, ikˈiwa ni la ˌumwaɡˈaɟi wa dˈamu ˌau mˈambo meŋɡˈine jˌahusˈujo ʃerˈia, ˈamri, hukˈumu ˌau mˌaaɡˈizo, ˌinawapˈasa nˈiɲi kˌuwaˈoɲa kwˌamba wˌasiiŋɡˈie katˌika hatˈia ðˈidi ja bwˈana, la sˈivjo ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu na ndˈuɡu zˈenu. tendˈeni hˈivjo, nˌaɲi hˌamtatˈenda ðˈambi.|0
ˌamarˈia kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ˌatakˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈenu katˌika ɟˈambo lolˈote lˌinalomhˈusu bwˈana nˌaje zˌebadˈia mwˈana wa ˌiʃmaˈeli, kˌioŋɡˈozi wa kabˈila la jˈuda, ˌatakˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈenu kwa ɟˈambo lolˈote lˌinalomhˈusu mfˈalme, nˌao walˈawi wˌatatumˈika kˌama mˌaafˈisa mbˈele jˈenu. tendˈeni kwa ˌuɟasˈiri, nˌaje bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌatendˈao vjˈema.|0
ikˈawa baˌada ja ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌamoˈabu na wˌaamˈoni, pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja wˌameˈuni wakˈaɟa ˌili wˌapiɡˈane vˈita na jˌehoʃafˈati.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaoɡˈopa, ˌakaazˈimu kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, na ˌakataŋɡˈaza kwa jˈuda wˈote kufˈuŋɡa.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa ˌili kˌutafˈuta msaˈada kutˈoka kwa bwˈana. wakˈaɟa kutˈoka kˈila ˈm̩ɟi wa jˈuda ˌili kˌumtafˈuta.|0
kˈiʃa jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakasimˈama katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, mbˈele ja ˈua ˈm̩pja.|0
ˌakasˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈetu, si wˌewe ndˈiwe ulˈije mˈuŋɡu mbiŋɡˈuni? si wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌutawalˈaje ɟˌuːja fˈalme zˈote za mˌataˈifa? uwˈeza na ŋɡˈuvu vˈiko mkonˈoni mwˈako, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌuʃindˈana nˈawe.|0
ɟˈe, si wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌulijˌewafukˈuza weɲˈeɟi wa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli, ˌukawˈapa wazˈao wa ˌabrahˈamu, rafˈiki jˈako, hˌata milˈele.|0
wˌameˈiʃi ndˈani jˌake na hˈumo wˌamekˌuɟeŋɡˈea mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako, wˌakisˈema.|0
kˌama maˈafa jˌakituɟˈia, ikˈiwa ni upˈaŋɡa, hukˈumu, taˈuni, ˌau ɲɟˈaa, tˌutasimˈama mbˈele zˈako, mbˈele ja hekˈalu hˈili ambˈalo lˌimeˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako na kˌukulilˈia katˌika ʃˈida jˈetu, nˌawe ˌutatˌusikˈia na kˌutuokˈoa..|0
lakˈini sˈasa hˈawa wˈatu wa kutˈoka amˈoni, moˈabu na mlˈima seˈiri, ambˈao hˌukuwˌaruhˈusu ˌisraˈeli wˌazivamˈie ˈn̩tʃi zˈao wakˈati wˌalitˈoka mˈisri, hˈivjo wˌakaɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˌao na hˌawakˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi wˌanavjˌotulˈipa kwa kˈuɟa kˌututˈupa ɲɟˈe ja mˈilki ˌulijotˈupa sˌisi kˌuwa urˈiθi.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌutawˌahukˈumu? kwa kˌuwa sˌisi hatˈuna uwˈezo wa kˌukabˌiliˈana na ɟˈeʃi hˈili kˈubwa lˌinalokˈuɟa kˌutuʃˌambulˈia. sˌisi hˌatuɟˈui la kufˈaɲa, bˌali mˈatʃo jˈetu jˌanakˌutazˈama wˈewe.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ɟˈina lˈake jˌahaziˈeli mwˈana wa zˌekarˈia, mwˈana wa benˈaja, mwˈana wa jˌeiˈeli, mwˈana wa mˌatanˈia, mlˈawi m̩zˈao wa asˈafu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamesimˈama katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
ˌakasˈema: sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi jˈuda wˈote nˌaɲi ɲˈote ˌm̩kaˈao jˌerusalˈemu, nˌawe mfˈalme jˌehoʃafˈati! hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kwˈenu, msˌioɡˈope wˈala msˌifaðaˈike kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈeʃi hˈili kˈubwa. kwa maˈana vˈita hˈivi si vjˈenu, bˌali ni vja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈeʃo ʃukˈeni kˌukabˌiliˈana nˈao. wˌatakwˈea kwa kˌupandˈia ɡˈeŋɡe la sˈisi, nˌaɲi mtˌawakˈuta mwˈiʃo wa bˈonde, kˈabla ja ɟˈaŋɡwa la jˌeruˈeli.|0
hˌamtahitˈaɟi kˌupiɡˈana vˈita hˈivi. kaˈeni kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈenu, sˌimamˈeni imˈara na mkaˈone wokˈovu bwˈana ˌatakˌaowˌapatˈia, ˈeɲi jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu. msˌioɡˈope, wˈala msˌifaðaˈike. kˈeʃo tokˈeni mwˈende mkˌawakabˈili, nˌaje bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi..|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakaˌinamˈiʃa ˈuso wˌake tʃˈini, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu wˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini ˌili kˌuabˈudu mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo baˈaði ja walˈawi kutˈoka kwa wˌakohˈaθi na kwa wˈana wa kˈora wˌakasimˈama na kumsˈifu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa saˈuti kˈuu sˈana.|0
ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema wˌakaondˈoka kˌuelekˈea ɟˈaŋɡwa la tekˈoa. wˌalipoˈanza safˈari, jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakasimˈama ˌakasˈema, nˌisikˌilizˈeni, ˈeɲi jˈuda, na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu! mwˌaminˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, hˈivjo mtˌaθibitˈika, wˌasadikˈini mˌanabˈii wˌake nˌaɲi mtˌafanikˈiwa.|0
ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuʃaˌuriˈana na wˈatu, jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakawawˈeka wˈatu wa kˌumwimbˈia bwˈana na kumsˈifu katˌika ˌutukˈufu wa ˌutakatˈifu wˌake wˌalipokˈuwa wˌametˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele ja ɟˈeʃi, wˌakisˈema: mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana kwa kˌuwa upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
wˌalipoˈanza kuˈimba na kusˈifu, bwˈana ˌakawˈeka wˌaviziˈao ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa amˈoni, moˈabu na wˈale wa mlˈima seˈiri wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa kˌuiʃˌambulˈia jˈuda, nˌao wˌakaʃˈindwa.|0
wˈatu wa amˈoni na moˈabu wˌakawˌainukˈia wˈatu wa mlˈima seˈiri ˌili kˌuwaˈua na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa. baˌada ja kˌumalˈiza kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa wˈatu wa seˈiri, wˌakaˌaŋɡamizˈana wˌao kwa wˈao.|0
jˈuda wˌalipofˈika katˌika mnˈara wa ulˈinzi wa ɟaŋɡwˈani, wˌakalˌiaŋɡalˈia lˈile ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, wˌakaˈona ni maˈiti tˈupu zˌimetˌapakˈaa arðˈini, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌenusurˈika.|0
hˈivjo jˌehoʃafˈati na wˈatu wˌake wˌakaˈenda kˌuɟitwalˈia ɲˈara kutˈoka kwˈao, nˌao wˌakakˈuta hˈumo wˈiŋɡi wa mifˈuɡo, mˈali, ŋɡˈuo na vˈitu vja θamˈani, ambˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa vˈiŋɡi zaˈidi ja vˈile wˌalivjowˈeza kˌutʃukˈua. wˌakakusˈaɲa ɲˈara kwa sˈiku tˈatu kwa sabˈabu zˌilikˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no.|0
sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne wˌakakˌusaɲˈika katˌika bˈonde la berˈaka kwa maˈana hˌuko ndˈiko wˌalikomsˈifu bwˈana. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu lˌinaˈitwa bˈonde la berˈaka mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu, wˌakioŋɡˈozwa na jˌehoʃafˈati, wˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu wakˈiwa na furˈaha kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌasababˈiʃa wˌafurˈahi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈao.|0
wˌakaiŋɡˈia jˌerusalˈemu na kwˈenda hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana wakˈiwa na vinˈubi, zˈeze na tˌarumbˈeta.|0
hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu ˌikazipˈata fˈalme zˈote za ˈn̩tʃi wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamepiɡˈana ðˈidi ja adˈui za ˌisraˈeli.|0
ufˈalme wa jˌehoʃafˈati ukˈawa na amˈani, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemstˌarehˈeʃa pˈande zˈote.|0
hˈivjo jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakatawˈala jˈuda. ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, ˌakatawˈala katˌika jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa azˈuba bˈinti ʃˈilhi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia hˌapakˌuondolˈewa, na wˈatu wakˈawa bˈado hˌawaɟˌaelekˈeza miˈojo jˈao kwa mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa jˌehoʃafˈati, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu tʃa jˈehu mwˈana wa hanˈani, ambˈazo zˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌatimˈaje jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakafˈaɲa ˌurafˈiki na ˌahazˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ambˈaje ˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu sˈana.|0
ˌakauŋɡˈana nˌaje kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˈeli ɲˈiŋɡi za kwˈenda tarʃˈiʃi, nˈazo zˌilitˌeŋɡenˈezwa hˌuko esˈion ɡebˈeri.|0
ndˈipo ˌeliezˈeri mwˈana wa dˌodavˈahu wa marˈeʃa ˌakatˈoa ˌunabˈii ðˈidi ja jˌehoʃafˈati, ˌakasˈema, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeuŋɡˈana na ˌahazˈia, bwˈana ˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza vˈile mlˌivjotˌeŋɡenˈeza. zˈile mˈeli zˌikavuɲɟˈika na hˌazikuwˈeza kuŋɡˈoa nˈaŋɡa ˌili kwˈenda tarʃˈiʃi.|0
jˌehoʃafˈati ˌakalˈala na bˈaba zˈake, ˌakazˈikwa pamˈoɟa nˌao katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. mwanˈawe jˌehorˈamu akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
ndˈuɡu zˌake jˌehorˈamu, wˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati wˌalikˈuwa: ˌazarˈia, jˌehiˈeli, zˌekarˈia, ˌazarˈia, mˌikaˈeli na ʃˌefatˈia. hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˈaba jˈao ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa zawˈadi ɲˈiŋɡi za fˈeða na ðahˈabu na vˈitu vja θamˈani, pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome hˌuko jˈuda, bˌali ufˈalme akˈampa jˌehorˈamu kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa mwanˈawe mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza.|0
baˌada ja jˌehorˈamu kˌuɟiˌimarˈiʃa katˌika ufˈalme wa bˈaba jˈake, ˌakawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja wakˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati wa jˌehorˈamu, edˈomu wˌaliˈasi ðˈidi ja jˈuda na kˌuɟiwekˈea mfˈalme wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
bˌasi jˌehorˈamu ˌakaˈenda hˌuko pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˌake na maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita. wˌaedˈomu wˌakamzuŋɡˈuka jˌeje na mˌaɟemadˈari wˌake wa maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita, lakˈini ˌakaondˈoka, ˌakapˈeɲa usˈiku na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌaedˈomu.|0
ˌalikˈuwa pˈia ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu katˌika vilˈima vja jˈuda na akˈawa ˌamewˌasababˈiʃa wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu kufˈaɲa uzˈinzi na akˈawa ˌamewˌapotˈoʃa wˈatu wa jˈuda.|0
jˌehorˈamu ˌakapokˈea barˈua kutˈoka kwa nabˈii elˈija ˌilijosˈema: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈako, ˌasemˈalo: hˌukuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za jˌehoʃafˈati bˈaba jˈako ˌau za ˈasa mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
lakˈini ˌumeenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌawe ˌumewˌaoŋɡˈoza jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu kuzˈini, kˌama vˈile ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu ˌilivjofˈaɲa. pˈia ˌumewaˈua ndˈuɡu zˈako mweɲˈewe, wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bˈaba jˈako, wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa bˈora kulˈiko wˈewe.|0
hˈivjo bˌasi bwˈana ju karˈibu kˌuwapˈiɡa wˈatu wˈako, wanˈao, wˌake zˈako na kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo tʃˈako, kwa pˈiɡo zˈito.|0
wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌutauɡˈua sˈana kwa uɡˈoɲɟua wa tˈumbo kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, hˌadi uɡˈoɲɟua ˌutakˌaposˌababˈiʃa matˈumbo jˈako kutˈoka ɲɟˈe..|0
bwˈana ˌakaˈamʃa tʃˈuki ja wˌafilˈisti na ja wˌaarˈabu wˌalioˈiʃi karˈibu na wakˈuʃi ðˈidi ja jˌehorˈamu.|0
wˌakaˌiʃambulˈia jˈuda, wˌakaˌivamˈia na kˌutʃukˈua mˈali zˈote zˌilizˌopatikˈana katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na wanˈawe na wˌake zˈake. hˌakubˌakizˈiwa mwˈana jejˈote ˌisipokˈuwa ˌahazˈia ˌalijekˈuwa mdˈoɡo wa wˈote.|0
baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, bwˈana ˌakampˈiɡa jˌehorˈamu kwa uɡˈoɲɟua ˌusiˌopoɲˈeka wa matˈumbo.|0
ikˈawa baˌada ja mˈuda, mwˈiʃo wa mwˈaka wa pˈili, matˈumbo jˌake jˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa sabˈabu ja uɡˈoɲɟua, nˌaje akˈafa katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈali sˈana. wˈatu wˌake hˌawakuwˈaʃa mˈoto kwa heʃˈima jˈake, kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamewˌafaɲˈia bˈaba zˈake.|0
jˌehorˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na miwˈili ˌalipokˈuwa mfˈalme, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka minˈane. akˈafa, bˌila kˌusikˌitikˈiwa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, lakˈini si katˌika mˌakabˈuri ja wafˈalme.|0
wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌakamfˈaɲa ˌahazˈia, mdˈoɡo wa wˈote wa wˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, kˌuwa mfˈalme mahˈali pa bˈaba jˈake, kwa sabˈabu wˌaʃambˌuliˈaɟi wa ɣafˈula wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameiŋɡˈia kambˈini pamˈoɟa na wˌaarˈabu, wˌalikˈuwa wˌamewaˈua wˈana wakˈubwa wˈote wa jˌehorˈamu. kwa hˈijo ˌahazˈia mwˈana wa jˌehorˈamu mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakaˈanza kˌutawˈala.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu, kwa kˌuwa baˌada ja kˈufa kwa bˈaba jˌake ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaʃaˈuri wˈake, kwa ˌuaŋɡamˈivu wˈake.|0
pˈia ˌakafuˈata ʃaˈuri lˈao ˌalipokwˈenda pamˈoɟa na jorˈamu mwˈana wa ahˈabu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli kˌupiɡˈana na hˌazaˈeli mfˈalme wa arˈamu hˌuko rˈamoθ ɡˌileˈadi. wˌaarˈamu wˌakamɟerˈuhi jorˈamu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌameamˈuru kwˌamba kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa ˌahazˈia kˌuŋɡetokˈea ˌatakˌapokwˈenda kumwˈona jorˈamu. ˌahazˈia ˌalipˌowasˈili, wˌakatˈoka pamˈoɟa na jorˈamu ˌili kwˈenda kˌukutˈana na jˈehu mwˈana wa nˈimʃi, ambˈaje bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtˈia mafˈuta kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu.|0
jˈehu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanatˌekelˈeza hukˈumu ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu, ˌakawakˈuta wakˈuu wa jˈuda na wˈana wa ɟamˈaa ja ˌahazˈia wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanamhˌudumˈia ˌahazˈia, nˌaje ˌakawaˈua.|0
ndˈipo ˌakaˈenda kumsˈaka ˌahazˈia, nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˌakamkamˈata ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameɟifˈitʃa hˌuko sˌamarˈia. ˌakalˈetwa kwa jˈehu, nˌaje jˈehu ˌakamuˈua. wˌakamzˈika kwˈani wˌalisˈema, ˌalikˈuwa mwˈana wa jˌehoʃafˈati, ambˈaje ˌalimtafˈuta bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote. hˈivjo hˌapakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe uwˈezo katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌahazˈia ˌalijewˈeza kuʃˈika ufˈalme.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba, jˌehojˈada ˌakaoɲˈeʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake. ˌalifˈaɲa aɡˈano na wakˈuu wa vikˈosi vja mamˈia: jaˈani ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa jˌerohˈamu, ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa jˌehohanˈani, ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa obˈedi, mˌaasˈeja mwˈana wa adˈaja, na ˌeliʃafˈati mwˈana wa zˈikri.|0
wˌakazuŋɡˈuka katˌika jˈuda jˈote na kˌukusˈaɲa walˈawi na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa za ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈote. wˌalipofˈika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikafˈaɲa aɡˈano na mfˈalme katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu. jˌehojˈada ˌakawˌaambˈia, mwˈana wa mfˈalme ˌatatawˈala, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoahˈidi kuhˈusu wazˈao wa daˈudi.|0
walˈawi wˌataɟipˈaŋɡa kˌumzuŋɡˈuka mfˈalme, kˈila ˈm̩tu akˈiwa na silˈaha zˌake mkonˈoni. ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌaiŋɡiˈaje hˌekalˈuni lazˈima ˌauˈawe. kaˈeni karˈibu na mfˈalme popˈote ˌaendˈapo.|0
jˌehojˈada na wanˈawe wˌakamtˈoa joˈaʃi mwˈana wa mfˈalme ɲɟˈe na kumvˈika tˈaɟi. wakˈampa nakˈala ja aɡˈano na kˌumtaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa mfˈalme. wˌakamtˈia mafˈuta na kupˈaza saˈuti, wˌakisˈema, mfˈalme aˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
ˌaθalˈia ˌalipˌosikˈia kelˈele za wˈatu wˌakikimbˈia na kumsˈifu mfˈalme, ˌakawˌaendˈea wˈatu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ˌaθalˈia ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia, tazˈama ˌalikuwˈepo mfˈalme akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡˈuzo jˌake kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio. mˌaafˈisa na wapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta wˌalikˈuwa kˈando ja mfˈalme, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaʃˌaŋɡilˈia na kupˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na wˌaimbˈaɟi wakˈiwa na vjˈombo vja ˌuimbˈaɟi, wˌalikˈuwa wˌakioŋɡˈoza ɲˈimbo za sˈifa. ndˈipo ˌaθalˈia ˌakararˈua mavˈazi jˌake na kupˈiɡa kelˈele, ˌakisˈema, ˌuhaˈini! ˌuhaˈini.|0
kuhˈani jˌehojˈada ˌakawatˈuma mˌaɟemadˈari wa vikˈosi vja mamˈia, wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˈeʃi, na kˌuwaambˈia: mletˈeni ɲɟˈe kˈati ja sˈafu, na mkˌamuˈue kwa upˈaŋɡa jejˈote ˌanajˌemfuˈata. kwa kˌuwa kuhˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema, msˌimuulˈie ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamkamˈata ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la farˈasi katˌika viwˈaɲɟa vja ɟˈumba la mfˈalme wˌakamˌuulˈia hˈapo.|0
kˈiʃa jˌehojˈada ˌakafˈaɲa aɡˈano kwˌamba jˌeje na wˈatu wˈote na mfˈalme wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wa bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la baˈali na kˌulibomˈoa. wˌakavˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu pamˈoɟa na sanˈamu na kˌumuˈua matˈani kuhˈani wa baˈali mbˈele ja hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈiʃa jˌehojˈada ˌakawˈeka ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakuhˈani, wˌaliokˈuwa walˈawi, ambˈao mfˈalme daˈudi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaɡˈawa ˌili wˌahudˈumu hˌekalˈuni kwa aɟˈili ja kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa za bwˈana kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose, kwa kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia na kuˈimba kˌama daˈudi ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameaɡˈiza.|0
pˈia ˌakawawˈeka mˌabawˈabu kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌili kwˌamba kwa vjovjˈote asˈiɟe ˌakaiŋɡˈia ˈm̩tu jejˈote alˈije naɟˈisi.|0
ˌakawˌatʃukˈua mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia, wˈatu wˌaheʃimˈiwa, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi na kˌumterˈemʃa mfˈalme kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana. wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la mfˈalme kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la ɟˈuu na kˌumkalˈiʃa mfˈalme kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi.|0
nˌao wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌakafurˈahi. ˈm̩ɟi ˌukatulˈia kwa sabˈabu ˌaθalˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌameuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
joˈaʃi ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka sˈaba ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa sibˈia ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametˈoka bˈeer ʃˈeba.|0
joˈaʃi ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana miˈaka jˈote ja jˌehojˈada kuhˈani.|0
jˌehojˈada ˌakamwˈoza wˌake wawˈili, ˌakazˈaa watˈoto wa kiˈume na wa kˈike.|0
baˌada ja mˈuda, joˈaʃi ˌakaamˈua kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ˌakawaˈita pamˈoɟa mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi ˌakawˌaambˈia, nendˈeni katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda mkˌakusˈaɲe fˈeða wˌanazopˈaswa kulˈipa kˈila mwˈaka kutˈoka kwa ˌisraˈeli wˈote, ˌili kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. faɲˈeni hˈivjo sˈasa. lakˈini walˈawi hˌawakufˈaɲa upˈesi.|0
kwa hˈijo mfˈalme ˌakamwˈita jˌehojˈada kuhˈani m̩kˈuu na kˌumwambˈia, kwa nˈini hˌukuwˌaambˈia walˈawi walˈete kutˈoka jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kˈodi ˌilijowˈekwa na mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana pamˈoɟa na kˌusaɲˈiko la ˌisraˈeli kwa aɟˈili ja hˈema ja ˌuʃuhˈuda.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈana wa jˈule mwanˈamke mwˈovu ˌaθalˈia, wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevˈuɲɟa na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, nˌao wakˈawa wˌamevˌitumˈia hˌata vˈile vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu kwa bwˈana kwa mˌabaˈali.|0
kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme, lˌikatˌeŋɡenˈezwa kˈaʃa, nˈalo lˌikawˈekwa ɲɟˈe kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
taŋɡˈazo lˌikatolˈewa katˌika jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kwˌamba ˌinapˈasa wˌamletˈee bwˈana kˈodi ˈile ambˈajo mˈose, mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaaɡˈiza ˌisraˈeli hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote na wˈatu wˈote wˌakalˈeta mitʃˈaŋɡo jˈao kwa furˈaha, wˌakawˈeka kwˈeɲe kˈaʃa mpˈaka lˌikaɟˈaa.|0
ikˈawa kˈila wakˈati kˈaʃa lˌilipolˈetwa ndˈani na walˈawi kwa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme na kuˈona kwˌamba kˈuna kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa fˈeða, mwandˈiʃi wa mfˈalme na afˈisa wa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu wˌalikˈuwa wˌanakˈuɟa na kˌumimˈina, kˈiʃa kˌulirudˈiʃa mahˈali pˈake. wˌalifˈaɲa hˈivi mˈara kwa mˈara, nˌao wˌakakusˈaɲa fˈeða ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
mfˈalme na jˌehojˈada wˌakawˈapa wˈale wˈatu wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi ˌilijˌotakˈiwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana. wˌakawˌaaɟˈiri waˈaʃi na mˌaseremˈala ˌili kˌuteŋɡenˈeza hekˈalu la bwˈana, pˈia wˌafaɲakˈazi za tʃˈuma na ʃˈaba ˌili kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
wˈatu wˌaliˌoʃuɣulˈika na kˈazi wˌalikˈuwa wˌeɲe bidˈii, nˈajo kˈazi ja kˌukarabˈati ˌikaˌendelˈea vizˈuri mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. wˌakalˌiteŋɡenˈeza ˈupja hekˈalu la bwˈana lˌikarˈudi katˌika hˈali jˌake ja awˈali na kˌuliˌimarˈiʃa.|0
wˌalipˌokamilˈiʃa kˈazi hˈijo ja kˌukarabˈati, wˌakalˈeta fˈeða zˌilizobˈaki wakˈampa mfˈalme na jˌehojˈada, nˌao kwa hˈizo wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza vjˈombo kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana: vjˈombo kwa aɟˈili ja hudˈuma na kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, pˈia mˌabakˈuli na vˈitu viŋɡˈine vja ðahˈabu na fˈeða. wakˈati wˈote jˌehojˈada ˌalipokˈuwa hˈai, sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa zˌilitolˈewa wakˈati wˈote katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
bˌasi jˌehojˈada ˌalikˈuwa m̩zˈee ˌalijeʃˈiba sˈiku wakˈati ˌalipˌofarˈiki. ˌalikˈufa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θeleθˈini.|0
wˌakamzˈika pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, kwa sabˈabu ja mˈema ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˈenda katˌika ˌisraˈeli kwa aɟˈili ja mˈuŋɡu na hekˈalu lˈake.|0
baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa jˌehojˈada, wakˈuu wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuɟa kˈumpa mfˈalme heʃˈima, nˌaje ˌakawˌasikilˈiza.|0
wˌakaˈatʃa hekˈalu la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, wˌakaabˈudu ŋɡˈuzo za mˌaaʃˈera na sanˈamu. kwa sabˈabu ja hatˈia jˈao, hasˈira ja mˈuŋɡu ˌikawaɟˈia jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌaliwatˈuma mˌanabˈii wˌawarudˈiʃe wˈatu kwˈake na iŋɡˈawa wˌaliwaˈoɲa, hˌawakˌuwasˌikilˈiza.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˌuːja zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa jˌehojˈada kuhˈani. ˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja wˈatu ˌakasˈema, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo mˈuŋɡu, kwa nˈini mnˌakatˈaa kˌuzitˈii ˈamri za bwˈana? hˌamtafˌanikˈiwa kwa kˌuwa mmemwˈatʃa bwˈana, jˌeje nˌaje ˌamewaˈatʃa nˈiɲi..|0
lakˈini wˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ɟˈuu jˌake na kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme wˌakampˈiɡa kwa mˈawe mpˈaka akˈafa katˌika ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
mfˈalme joˈaʃi hˌakukumbˈuka wˈema ˌaliˌotendˈewa na jˌehojˈada bˈaba jˌake zˌekarˈia ˈila ˌalimuˈua mwanˈawe, ambˈaje ˌalisˈema wakˈati akˈiwa ˌamelˈala ˌakiŋɡoɟˈea kˈufa, bwˈana na ˌaliˈone hˈili na ˌalipˈize kisˈasi.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈule mwˈaka, ɟˈeʃi la wˌaarˈamu likˈaɟa ðˈidi ja joˈaʃi, lˌikavamˈia jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuwaˈua vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa wˈatu. wˌakapelˈeka ɲˈara zˈao zˈote kwa mfˈalme wˌao hˌuko damˈeski.|0
iŋɡˈawa ɟˈeʃi la wˌaarˈamu lˌilikˈuwa lˌimekˈuɟa na wˈatu watʃˈatʃe tˈu, bwˈana ˌakatˈia mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa kulˈiko lˈao. kwa sabˈabu jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, hukˈumu ˌilitˌekelˈezwa ɟˌuːja joˈaʃi.|0
wˌaarˈamu wˌalipˌoondˈoka, wˌalimwˈatʃa joˈaʃi akˈiwa mɡˈoɲɟua sˈana. mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌakafˈaɲa hˈila ðˈidi jˌake kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemuˈua mwˈana wa kuhˈani jˌehojˈada, nˌao wˌakamˌuulˈia kˌitandˈani mwˈake. hˈivjo akˈafa na wˌakamzˈika katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, lakˈini si katˌika mˌakabˈuri ja wafˈalme.|0
wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa hˈila m̩bˈaja ðˈidi jˌake wˌalikˈuwa zabˈadi, mwˈana wa ʃˌimeˈaθi mwanˈamke mwamˈoni, jˌehozabˈadi, mwˈana wa ʃimrˈiθi mwanˈamke mmoˈabu.|0
kwa habˈari za wanˈawe, ˌunabˈii mwˈiŋɡi kumhˈusu na kˌumbukˈumbu za kˌuteŋɡenˈezwa ˈupja kwa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, zˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme. ˌamazˈia mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
ˌamazˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na tˈisa. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jˌehoadˈani kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakatˈenda jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, lakˈini sˈio kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo hˌakuwaˈua watˈoto wˈao, lakˈini ˌakafˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia, katˌika kitˈabu tʃa mˈose, ambˈako bwˈana ˌaliamˈuru: bˈaba hˌawatˌauˈawa kwa aɟˈili ja watˈoto wˈao, wˈala watˈoto hˌawatˌauˈawa kwa aɟˈili ja bˈaba zˈao. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌamazˈia ˌakawaˈita wˈatu wa jˈuda pamˈoɟa, ˌakawawˈeka tʃˈini ja mˌaɟemadˈari wa maˈelfu na mˌaɟemadˈari wa mamˈia kˌufuatˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao katˌika jˈuda jˈote na bˌeɲamˈini. kˈiʃa ˌakawˌahesˈabu wˈale wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi na ˌakakˈuta kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈume mˌiatˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˈatu walˈio tajˈari kwa ˌutumˈiʃi wa ɟˈeʃi, walˈio na uwˈezo wa kˌutumˈia mkˈuki na ŋɡˈao.|0
ˌakawˌaaɟˈiri pˈia wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌapiɡanˈaɟi kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli kwa talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakamɟˈia na kˌumwambˈia, ˈee mfˈalme, hˈaja maɟˈeʃi kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli kˈamwe ˌusijˌaruhˈusu jaˈende pamˈoɟa na wˌewe kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hajˈuko pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli, wˈala hajˈupo pamˈoɟa na jejˈote wa wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu.|0
hˌata kˌama ˌukiˈenda na kˌupiɡˈana kwa ˌuɟasˈiri katˌika vˈita, mˈuŋɡu ˌatakufˈaɲa ˌukimbˈie mbˈele ja adˈui, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu anˈao uwˈezo wa kˌusaidˈia ˌau wa kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa.|0
ˌamazˈia ˌakamˌuulˈiza jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu, lakˈini ˌitakuwˈaɟe kwa zˈile talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða nˌilizolˈipa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaja maɟˈeʃi ja ˌisraˈeli? jˈule ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu ˌakaɟˈibu, bwˈana awˈeza kukˈupa zaˈidi sˈana ja hˈizo.|0
hˈivjo ˌamazˈia ˌakajˌaondˈoa jˈale maɟˈeʃi jˌalijokˈuwa jˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu na kˌujarudˈiʃa ɲumbˈani. wˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia sˈana jˈuda, nˌao wˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani wakˈiwa na hasˈira kˈali.|0
ndˈipo ˌamazˈia ˌakaɟitˈia ŋɡˈuvu na kˌulioŋɡˈoza ɟˈeʃi lˈake kwˈeɲe bˈonde la tʃˈumvi, ambˈako ˌaliˈua wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wa seˈiri.|0
ɟˈeʃi la jˈuda pˈia lˌikawatˈeka wˈatu kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wakˈiwa hˈai, lˌikawˌapandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja ɟabˈali na kˌuwatˈupa tʃˈini kwa ŋɡˈuvu hˌata wˈote wˌakavuɲɟˈika vipˈande vipˈande.|0
wakˈati hˈuo jˈale maɟˈeʃi ˌamazˈia ˌalijˌojarudˈiʃa na ambˈajo hˌakujˌaruhˈusu kˌuʃirˈiki katˌika vˈita, jˌalivamˈia mˈiɟi ja jˈuda kˌuanzˈia sˌamarˈia hˌata bˈeθ horˈoni. jˌakawaˈua wˈatu tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na kˌutʃukˈua kiˈasi kikˈubwa sˈana tʃa matˈeka.|0
ˌamazˈia ˌaliporˈudi kutˈoka kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa wˌaedˈomu, ˌalilˈeta pˈia kutˈoka hˌuko miˈuŋɡu ja wˈatu wa seˈiri. ˌakaˌisimamˈiʃa kˌama miˈuŋɡu jˌake mweɲˈewe, ˌakaˌisuɟudˈia na kˌuitolˈea kafˈara za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌamazˈia, nˌaje ˌakamtˈuma nabˈii kwˈake, ambˈaje ˌalisˈema: kwa nˈini ˌunaulˈiza kwa miˈuŋɡu ja hˈawa wˈatu, ambˈajo hˌaikuwˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˌake weɲˈewe kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
wakˈati nabˈii ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali ˌanazuŋɡˈumza, mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, wˌewe tˌumekˌutʃaɡˈua kˌuwa mʃaˈuri wa mfˈalme? ɲamˈaza, ja nˈini ˌuuˈawe? hˈivjo nabˈii ˌakaɲamˈaza lakˈini ˌakasˈema, naɟˈua kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌameˌazimˈia kˌukuˌaŋɡamˈiza kwa sabˈabu ˌumefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili na hˌukusˌikilˈiza ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda kˌuʃaˌuriˈana na wˌaʃaˈuri wˌake ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa jˌehoˈaʃi, mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi mwˈana wa jˈehu, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli kusˈema: ɲɟˈoo tˌukabˌiliˈane ˈuso kwa ˈuso.|0
lakˈini jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mbarˈuti ˌuliokˈuwa lˌebanˈoni ˌulitˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa mwerˈezi ˌuliokˈuwa lˌebanˈoni, m̩tˈoe bˈinti jˈako ˌaolˈewe na mwanˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa mɲˈama wa mwitˈuni ˌalijekˈuwa lˌebanˈoni akˈaɟa na kˌuukaɲˈaɡa ˈule mbarˈuti.|0
wˌewe ˌunasˈema mojˈoni mwˈako kwˌamba ˌumemʃˈinda edˈomu, nˌawe sˈasa ˌunaɟiɡˈamba na kˌuɟivˈuna. lakˈini kˈaa ɲumbˈani kwˈako! kwa nˈini ˌutafˈute mˌatatˈizo na kˌuɟiletˈea aŋɡˈuko lˈako mweɲˈewe na la jˈuda pˈia.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ˌamazˈia hˌakutˈaka kˌusikˈia, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌalifˈaɲa hˈivjo ˌili ˌawatˈie mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa jˌehoˈaʃi, kwa sabˈabu wˌaliˌitafˈuta miˈuŋɡu ja edˈomu.|0
hˈivjo jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakakwˈea kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia. jˌeje na ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌakakˌabiliˈana ˈuso kwa ˈuso hˌuko bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi katˌika jˈuda.|0
jˈuda ˌikaʃˈindwa na ˌisraˈeli na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌakakˌimbilˈia ɲumbˈani kwˈake.|0
jˌehoˈaʃi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌakamtˈeka ˌamazˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mwˈana wa joˈaʃi, mwˈana wa ˌahazˈia, hˌuko bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi. kˈiʃa jˌehoˈaʃi ˌakamlˈeta jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuubomˈoa ukˈuta wa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuanzˈia lˈaŋɡo la ˌefraˈimu hˌadi lˈaŋɡo la pembˈeni, sehˈemu jˌeɲe urˈefu wa kˌama ðirˈaa mˌiaˈn̩ne.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua ðahˈabu jˈote, fˈeða na vjˈombo vjˈote vˌilivjˌopatikˈana katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, ambˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa ˈobed edˈomu, pamˈoɟa na hazˈina za ɟˈumba la mfˈalme na matˈeka, kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi sˌamarˈia.|0
ˌamazˈia mwˈana wa joˈaʃi mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliˈiʃi miˈaka kˈumi na mitˈano baˌada ja kˈifo tʃa jˌehoˈaʃi mwˈana wa jˌehoahˈazi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa habˈari ja mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine katˌika ˌutawˈala wa ˌamazˈia, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa jˈuda na wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌuanzˈia wakˈati ˈule ˌamazˈia ˌalipˌoɡeˈuka na kuˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata bwˈana wˌalifˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˌake hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu nˌaje ˌakakˌimbilˈia lakˈiʃi, lakˈini wˌakawatˈuma wˈatu wˌamfuˌatilˈie hˌuko lakˈiʃi nˌao wˌakamˌuulˈia hˌuko.|0
ˌakarudˈiʃwa kwa farˈasi na ˌakazˈikwa pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˌake katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa jˈuda.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda wˌakamtwˈaa uzˈia, ˌalijekˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita, nˌao wˌakamfˈaɲa mfˈalme mahˈali pa ˌamazˈia bˈaba jˈake.|0
n̩dˈije ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja elˈaθi kˌuirudˈiʃa kwa jˈuda baˌada ja ˌamazˈia kulˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake.|0
uzˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka hamsˈini na miwˈili. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jˌekolˈia wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakamtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu katˌika sˈiku za zˌekarˈia, ˌalijˌemwelekˈeza kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu. wakˈati wˈote ˌalipˌomtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu ˌalimfˌanikˈiʃa.|0
ˌalipiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti na kˌubomˈoa kˈuta za ɡˈaθi, jˈabne na aʃdˈodi. kˈiʃa ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja mˈiɟi karˈibu na aʃdˈodi na mahˈali peŋɡˈine kˌatikˈati ja wˌafilˈisti.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamsˌaidˈia ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti na ðˈidi ja wˌaarˈabu wˌalioˈiʃi ɡˈur baˈali na ðˈidi ja wˌameˈuni.|0
wˌaamˈoni wˌakamletˈea uzˈia uʃˈuru, ˌumaarˈufu wˌake ˌukaenˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa mˈisri, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu sˈana.|0
uzˈia ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa minˈara hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu katˌika lˈaŋɡo la pembˈeni, katˌika lˈaŋɡo la bondˈeni na katˌika pˈembe, mahˈali kˈuta zˌikutanˈapo, kˈiʃa ˌakaˌiɟeŋɡˈea ŋɡˈome.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa pˈia minˈara ɟaŋɡwˈani na kutʃˈimba visˈima vˈiŋɡi vja mˈaɟi, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa na mifˈuɡo mˈiŋɡi tʃˈini ja vˌilimˈani na kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare. ˌalikˈuwa na wˈatu wˌanaofˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika maʃˈamba jˌake na kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba jˌake ja mˌizabˈibu hˌuko vˌilimˈani na katˌika ˈarði zˌeɲe rutˈuba, kwa kˌuwa ˌaliupˈenda udˈoŋɡo.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, uzˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ɟˈeʃi lˌililofˈunzwa vizˈuri, lˌililokˈuwa tajˈari kwˈenda vitˈani kwa vikˈosi kˌufuatˈana na idˈadi jˈao kˌama wˌalivjˌokusˈaɲua na jˌeiˈeli mwandˈiʃi na mˌaasˈeja msˌimamˈizi tʃˈini ja mˌaelekˈezo ja hˌananˈia, mmˌoɟawˈapo wa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme.|0
tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wˌao kˌulikˈuwa na ɟˈeʃi la askˈari mˌiatˈatuna sˈaba,mˌiatˈano wˈatu wˌaliˌofundˈiʃwa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita, ɟˈeʃi lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu la kˌumsaidˈia mfˈalme ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈake.|0
uzˈia ˌakalˌipatˈia ɟˈeʃi lˈote ŋɡˈao, mikˈuki, tʃapˈeo, dirˈii, pˈinde na mˈawe ja kombˈeo.|0
hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu wˈatu wˌeɲe ˌutaalˈamu mkˈubwa wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mitˈambo ˌilijˌotumˈika katˌika minˈara na kwˈeɲe pˈembe za ulˈinzi ˌili kurˈuʃa miʃˈale na kˌuvurumˈiʃa mˈawe makˈubwa. sˈifa zˌake zˌikaenˈea mbˈali sˈana kwa sabˈabu ˌalisˌaidˈiwa ˈm̩no mpˈaka akˈawa na ŋɡˈuvu sˈana.|0
lakˈini baˌada ja uzˈia kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu sˈana, mˌaɟivˈuno jˌake jˌakamsˌababiʃˈia kˌuaŋɡˈuka. ˌalikˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake, nˌaje ˌakaiŋɡˈia hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana ˌili ˌafukˈize uvˈumba kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba.|0
ˌazarˈia kuhˈani akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani weŋɡˈine θˌemanˈini wa bwˈana wˌeɲe ˌuɟasˈiri wˌakamfuˈata hˌuko ndˈani.|0
wˌakamkabˈili na kˌumwambˈia, sˈijo sˈawa kwˈako, uzˈia, kˌumfukizˈia bwˈana uvˈumba. hˈijo ni kˈazi ja mˌakuhˈani, wazˈao wa arˈoni, ambˈao wˌamewˈekwa wˈakfu ˌili kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba. ondˈoka mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu nˌawe hˌutahˌeʃimˈiwa na bwˈana.|0
uzˈia, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa na tʃetˈezo mkonˈoni mwˈake tajˈari kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba, ˌakakˌasirˈika. ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanawˌaɣaðˌibikˈia mˌakuhˈani mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, ukˈoma ˌukamtokˈea pˈeɲe kipˈaɟi tʃˈake tʃa ˈuso.|0
ˌazarˈia kuhˈani m̩kˈuu pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌalipˌomtazˈama wˌakaˈona kwˌamba ˌalikˈuwa na ukˈoma pˈeɲe kipˈaɟi tʃˈake tʃa ˈuso wˌakahˌarakˈiʃa kumtˈoa ɲɟˈe. nˈaam, hˌata jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌalikˈuwa ˌanatamˈani kˌuondˈoka kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamempˈiɡa.|0
mfˈalme uzˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ukˈoma mpˈaka sˈiku ja kˈufa kwˈake. ˌakatˈeŋɡwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja pekˈee akˈiwa mwˌeɲe ukˈoma, nˌaje akˈawa ˌametˈeŋɡwa kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana. joθˈamu mwanˈawe akˈawa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, pˈia ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa uzˈia, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo mpˈaka mwˈiʃo, jˌameandˈikwa na nabˈii isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi.|0
uzˈia ˌakalˈala pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈake, nˌaje ˌakazˈikwa karˈibu nˌao katˌika ʃˈamba la kˌuzikˈia lˌililokˈuwa mˈali ja wafˈalme, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˌalisˈema, ˌalikˈuwa na ukˈoma. joθˈamu mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
joθˈamu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa jerˈuʃa bˈinti sadˈoki.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana kˌama uzˈia bˈaba jˌake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamefˈaɲa, lakˈini tˌofaˈuti na jˈeje, hˌakuˌiŋɡilˈia hudˈuma za hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana. lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, wˈatu wˌakaˌendelˈea na destˈuri zˈao m̩bˈaja.|0
joθˈamu ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja lˈaŋɡo la ɟˈuu la hekˈalu la bwˈana na kufˈaɲa kˈazi kˈubwa kwˈeɲe ukˈuta katˌika kilˈima tʃa ofˈeli.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mˈiɟi katˌika vilˈima vja jˈuda pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈome na minˈara mwitˈuni.|0
joθˈamu ˌakafˈaɲa vˈita na mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni na kumʃˈinda. mwˈaka ˈule wˌaamˈoni wˌakamlˈipa talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða, kˈori kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ŋɡˈano na kˈori kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ʃajˈiri. wˌaamˈoni wˌakamletˈea kiˈasi hˈitʃo hˈitʃo mwˈaka wa pˈili na wa tˈatu.|0
joθˈamu ˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kwa sabˈabu ˌalienˈenda kwa ˌukamilˈifu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa joθˈamu, pamˈoɟa na vˈita vjˈake vjˈote na vˈitu viŋɡˈine ˌalivjofˈaɲa, vˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita.|0
ahˈazi ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala. ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka kˈumi na sˈita. tˌofaˈuti na daˈudi bˈaba jˈake, hˌakufˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa katˌika bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, na kˌuwatˈoa wanˈawe kafˈara kwa kˌuwatˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto, ˌakifuˈata ɲɟˈia za mˌatʃukˈizo za jˈale mˌataˈifa bwˈana ˌalijˌojafukˈuza hˈumo mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ˌakatˈoa sadˈaka na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, ɟˌuːja vilˈima, na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌakamtˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa arˈamu. wˌaarˈamu wˌakamʃˈinda, wˌakatʃukˈua wˈatu wˌake wˈeŋɡi matˈeka na kˌuwalˈeta mpˈaka damˈeski. tˈena ˌalitˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje ˌaliwaˈua wˈatu wˌake wˈeŋɡi.|0
kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia ˌaliwaˈua askˈari mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri katˌika jˈuda, kwa kˌuwa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
zˈikri, askˈari ʃuɟˈaa mwˌefraˈimu, ˌakamuˈua mˌaasˈeja mwˈana wa mfˈalme, ˌazrikˈamu m̩kˈuu wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na ˌelikˈana ˌalijekˈuwa wa pˈili kwa mfˈalme.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌakawˌatʃukˈua matˈeka kutˈoka ndˈuɡu zˈao, wˈatu wˌapatˈao mˌiambˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri hˈawa wakˈiwa ni wˌanawˈake, watˈoto wa kiˈume na wa kˈike. wˌakatʃukˈua pˈia kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa ɲˈara, ambˈazo wˌalirˈudi nˈazo sˌamarˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌulikuwˈako hˌuko nabˈii wa bwˈana ˌalijeˈitwa odˈedi, ˌakaondˈoka ˌili kˌukutˈana na ɟˈeʃi lˌilipˌoreɟˈea sˌamarˈia. ˌakawˌaambˈia, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu, ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia jˈuda, ˌaliwatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. lakˈini mmˌewatʃˈiɲɟa kwa hasˈira ambˈajo ˌimefˈika hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
nˌaɲi sˈasa mnˌakusudˈia kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu watˈumwa wˈenu. lakˈini nˈiɲi ɟˈe, hˈamna pˈia hatˈia ja ðˈambi mlˌijotˈenda ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
bˌasi nˌisikˌilizˈeni! mkˌawarudˈiʃe matˈeka mlˌiowˌatʃukˈua kutˈoka kwa ndˈuɡu zˈenu, kwa kˌuwa hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana ˈiko ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
ndˈipo baˈaði ja vˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika ˌefraˈimu, jaˈani, ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa jˌehohanˈani, bˌerekˈia mwˈana wa mˌeʃilemˈoθi, jˌehizkˈia mwˈana wa ʃalˈumu na amˈasa mwˈana wa hadlˈai, wˌakakˌubaliˈana na hˈujo nabˈii, hˈivjo wˌakawapˈiŋɡa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanawasˈili kutˈoka vitˈani.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, hˈamna ruhˈusa kˌuwalˈeta hˈao wafˈuŋɡwa hˈapa, ˌama sˈivjo tˌutakˈuwa na hatˈia mbˈele za bwˈana. ɟˈe, mnatˈaka kˌuoŋɡezˈea ðˈambi jˈetu na hatˈia jˈetu? kwa sabˈabu hatˈia jˈetu tajˈari ni kˈubwa, nˈajo hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana ˈiko ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo wˈale askˈari wˌakawaˈatʃa wˈale matˈeka pamˈoɟa na ɲˈara mbˈele ja hˈao mˌaafˈisa na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌaliotˈaɟua kwa maɟˈina wˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈale matˈeka na kutˈoka zˈile ɲˈara, wˌakatʃukˈua mavˈazi wˌakawavˈika wˈale wafˈuŋɡwa wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa ˈutʃi. wˌakawˌapatˈia ŋɡˈuo na viˈatu, tʃakˈula na tʃa kˈuɲua, wˌakawˈapa mˌatibˈabu, wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa ðaˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wˌakawˌapandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja pˈunda, wˌakawalˈeta ndˈuɡu zˈao mpˈaka jerˈiko, n̩dˈio ˈm̩ɟi wa mitˈende, kˈiʃa wˌakarˈudi sˌamarˈia.|0
wakˈati ˈule, mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru kuˈomba msaˈada.|0
wˌaedˈomu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa tˈena na kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia jˈuda na kˌutʃukˈua matˈeka.|0
pˈia wˌafilˈisti wˌalikˈuwa wˌameʃˌambulˈia mˈiɟi ˌilijokˈuwa tʃˈini ja vilˈima na katˌika mˈiɟi ja neɡˈebu ja jˈuda. nˌao wakˈawa wˌametwˈaa bˈeθ ʃemˈeʃi, ˌaijalˈoni, ɡˌederˈoθi, sˈoko pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, tˈimna pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, ɡˈimzo pˈia pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake na kuˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
bwˈana ˌaliiʃˈuʃa jˈuda kwa sabˈabu ja ahˈazi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˌameoŋɡˈeza uˈovu katˌika jˈuda na kˌumkosˈea bwˈana ˈm̩no.|0
hˈivjo tˈiɡlaθ pˌilesˈeri mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru akˈaɟa kumtˈesa badˈala ja kˌumsaidˈia.|0
ahˈazi ˌakatʃukˈua baˈaði ja vˈitu kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana, ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kutˈoka kwa wakˈuu wˌake na kˈumpa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru kˌama uʃˈuru, lakˈini hˌilo hˌalikˌumsaidˈia.|0
katˌika wakˈati wˌake wa matˈeso mfˈalme ahˈazi ˌakazˈidi kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa bwˈana.|0
ˌakatˈoa kafˈara kwa miˈuŋɡu ja damˈeski, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamemʃˈinda, kwa kˌuwa ˌaliwˈaza, kwa kˌuwa miˈuŋɡu ja mfˈalme wa arˈamu ˌimewˌasaidˈia wˈao, nˌitaˌitolˈea ðabˈihu ˌili ˌinisˌaidˈie na mˈimi. lakˈini hˈaja n̩dˈijo jˌalijokˈuwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌake na ˌisraˈeli wˈote.|0
ahˈazi ˌakakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa vjˈombo vja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu na kˌuvivˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande. ˌakafˈuŋɡa milˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu la bwˈana na kˌusimamˈiʃa mˌaðabˈahu katˌika kˈila ɲɟˈia pˈanda ja bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
katˌika kˈila ˈm̩ɟi wa jˈuda ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu ˌili kˌutolˈea miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine kafˈara za kˌuteketˈezwa na kˌutʃotʃˈea hasˈira ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈake.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wˌake na ɲɟˈia zˌake ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote, ʃˈu mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, zˌimeandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli.|0
ahˈazi ˌakalˈala na bˈaba zˌake na ˌakazˈikwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu, lakˈini hˌawakumlˈeta kwˈeɲe mˌakabˈuri ja wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. nˌaje hˌezekˈia mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na tˈisa. mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa abˈija bˈinti zˌekarˈia.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wa mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌalifuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, na kˌuikˌarabˈati.|0
ˌakawˌaiŋɡˈiza mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi ndˈani na kˌuwakˌutanˈiʃa katˌika uwˈaɲɟa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
na kusˈema: nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi, ˈeɲi walˈawi! ɟˌitakasˈeni nˈafsi zˈenu sˈasa, mkˌaitakˈase na ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu. ˌondoˈeni utʃˈafu wˈote kutˈoka mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
bˈaba zˈetu hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu, wˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na wˌakamwˈatʃa jˈeje. wˌakaɡeˈuza ɲˈuso zˈao mbˈali na maskˈani ja bwˈana wˌakamɡˌeuzˈia visˈoɡo vjˈao.|0
pˈia wˌalifˈuŋɡa milˈaŋɡo ja ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu na kuzˈima tˈaa zˈake. hˌawakˌufukˈiza uvˈumba wˈala kutˈoa sadˈaka jojˈote ja kˌuteketˈezwa katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo, hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌikaʃˈuka ɟˌuːja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje akˈawa ˌamewafˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kutˈiʃa, tʃa kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza na kˈitu tʃa kˌufaɲˈia mzˈaha kˌama mnˌavjoˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu bˈaba zˈetu wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa na n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˈana wˈetu na bˈinti zˈetu, pˈia wˌake zˈetu wˌamekˈuwa matˈeka.|0
sˈasa nˌinaðˌamirˈia mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kuwˈeka aɡˈano na bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌili hasˈira jˌake kˈali ˌiɡeuzˈiwe mbˈali nˈasi.|0
wanˈaŋɡu, bˌasi msˌipuˈuze ɟˈambo hˈili sˈasa, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewˌatʃaɡˈua nˈiɲi msimˈame mbˈele zˌake na kˌumtumikˈia, mkˈawe wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake na mkˌamfukizˈie uvˈumba.|0
ndˈipo walˈawi wˌafuatˈao wˌakaˈanza kˈazi: kutˈoka kwa wˌakohˈaθi, mahˈaθi mwˈana wa ˌamasˈai na joˈeli mwˈana wa ˌazarˈia; kutˈoka kwa wˌamerˈari, kˈiʃi mwˈana wa ˈabdi na ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa jˌahalelˈeli; kutˈoka kwa wˌaɡerʃˈoni, jˈoa mwˈana wa zˈima na edˈeni mwˈana wa jˈoa.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa ˌelisafˈani, ʃˈimri na jˌeiˈeli; kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa asˈafu, zˌekarˈia na mˌatanˈia.|0
kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa hemˈani, jˌehiˈeli na ʃimˈei; kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni, ʃemˈaja na ˌuziˈeli.|0
wˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuwakusˈaɲa ndˈuɡu zˈao na kˌuɟiwˈeka wˈakfu, wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ˌili kˌutakˈasa hekˈalu la bwˈana, kˌama vˈile mfˈalme ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameaɡˈiza, kwa kˌufuˈata nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌakaiŋɡˈia pˌatakatˈifu pa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌili kˌupatakˈasa. wˌakatˈoa ɲɟˈe pˈeɲe ˈua wa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu kˈila kˈitu kitʃˈafu wˌalitʃˌokikˈuta kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana. walˈawi wˌakavˌitʃukˈua na kˌuvipelˈeka ɲɟˈe katˌika bˈonde la kidrˈoni.|0
wˌaliˈanza kˈazi ja ˌutakˈaso sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza na kˌufikˈia sˈiku ja nˈane ja mwˈezi hˈuo wakˈawa wˌamefikˈia kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa bwˈana. kwa sˈiku ziŋɡˈine nˈane wˌakalˌitakˈasa hekˈalu leɲˈewe la bwˈana wˌakakˌamilˈiʃa katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na sˈita ja mwˈezi hˈuo wa kwˈanza.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani kwa mfˈalme hˌezekˈia kutˈoa habˈari na kusˈema: tˌumelˌitakˈasa hekˈalu lˈote la bwˈana, mˌaðabˈahu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote, mˈeza ja kupˈaŋɡa mikˈate ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu, pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote.|0
tˌumevˌiandˈaa na kˌuvitakˈasa vjˈombo vjˈote vˈile ambˈavjo mfˈalme ahˈazi, kwa kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwˈake, ˌalivˌiondˈoa wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa mfˈalme. sˈasa vˈiko mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme hˌezekˈia ˌakainˈuka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ˌakakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa mˌaafˈisa wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌakakwˈea hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana.|0
wˌakalˈeta mˌafahˈali sˈaba, kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba, wˌanakondˈoo dˈume sˈaba na mˌabebˈeru sˈaba kˌuwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja ufˈalme, kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na kwa aɟˈili ja jˈuda. mfˈalme ˌakawˌaamˈuru mˌakuhˈani, wazˈao wa arˈoni, kˌuvitˈoa vˈitu hˈivjo sadˈaka katˌika mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo wˌakatʃˈiɲɟa wˈale mˌafahˈali, nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌakatʃukˈua ˈile dˈamu na kˌuiɲuɲˈiza kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu, halˈafu wˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa wˈale kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba na kˌuɲuɲˈiza hˈijo dˈamu jˈao kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu, kˈiʃa wˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa wˈale wˌanakondˈoo dˈume na kˌuɲuɲˈiza dˈamu jˈao kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu.|0
wˈale mˌabebˈeru wˌaliokˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi wˌakalˈetwa mbˈele ja mfˈalme na kˌusaɲˈiko nˌao wˌakawˈeka mikˈono jˈao ɟˈuu hˈao mˌabebˈeru.|0
ndˈipo mˌakuhˈani wˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa hˈao mˌabebˈeru na kuwˈeka dˈamu jˈao kwˈeɲe mˌaðabˈahu kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote, kwa sabˈabu mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌameamˈuru hˈijo sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na hˈijo sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote.|0
ˌakawawˈeka walˈawi kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana wakˈiwa na mˌatoˈazi, vinˈubi na zˈeze kˌama ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa na daˈudi na ɡˈadi mwonˈaɟi wa mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na nabˈii naθˈani kwˈani hˈili lˌilikˈuwa lˌimeamrˈiwa na bwˈana kˌupitˈia mˌanabˈii wˈake.|0
hˈivjo walˈawi wˌakasimˈama tajˈari wakˈiwa na ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi za daˈudi na mˌakuhˈani wˌalikˈuwa na tˌarumbˈeta zˈao.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakatˈoa ˈamri ja kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa mˌaðabahˈuni. wˌalipoˈanza kutˈoa sadˈaka, wˌakaˈanza pˈia kˌumwimbˈia bwˈana pamˈoɟa na tˌarumbˈeta na zˈile ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi za daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote wˌakaabˈudu kwa kˌusuɟˈudu, wakˈati wˌaimbˈaɟi wakˈiwa wˌanaˈimba na wˌeɲe tˌarumbˈeta wˌakipˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta zˈao. jˈote hˈaja jˌaliˌendelˈea mpˈaka wˌalipˌomalˈiza kutˈoa ˈile ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
kutˈoa sadˈaka kˌulipˌomalizˈika, mfˈalme na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌekuwˈepo pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakapˈiɡa maɡˈoti na kˌuabˈudu.|0
mfˈalme hˌezekˈia na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌakawˌaamˈuru walˈawi kumsˈifu bwˈana kwa manˈeno ja daˈudi na ja asˈafu mwonˈaɟi. hˈivjo wˌakaˈimba sˈifa kwa furˈaha nˌao wˌakaˌinamˈiʃa vˈitʃwa vjˈao na kˌuabˈudu.|0
kˈiʃa hˌezekˈia ˌakasˈema, sˈasa mmˌeɟiwˈeka wˈakfu kwa bwˈana. ɲɟoˈoni mlˈete ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana. hˈivjo kˌusaɲˈiko lˌikalˈeta ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani, nˌao wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na miˈojo ja hiˈari wˌakalˈeta sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
idˈadi ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa zˌilizolˈetwa na kˌusaɲˈiko zˌilikˈuwa mˌafahˈali sabˈini, kondˈoo dˈume mˌiamˈoɟa na wˌanakondˈoo dˈume mˌiambˈili. wˈote hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana.|0
waɲˈama wˌaliowˈekwa wˈakfu kwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa wˌalikˈuwa mˌafahˈali mˌiasˈita, pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo na mbˈuzi tˈatu,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
lakˈini mˌakuhˈani wˌalikˈuwa watʃˈatʃe sˈana kuwˈeza kutʃˈuna wˈale waɲˈama wˈote wa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, kwa hˈijo ndˈuɡu zˈao walˈawi wˌakawˌasaidˈia mpˈaka kˈazi ˈile ˌikakˌamilˈika na mpˈaka mˌakuhˈani weŋɡˈine wˌalipowˈekwa wˈakfu, kwa kˌuwa walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa makˈini kˌuɟiwˈeka wˈakfu kulˈiko wˌalivjokˈuwa mˌakuhˈani.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na sadˈaka ɲˈiŋɡi za kˌuteketˈezwa, pamˈoɟa na mafˈuta ja waɲˈama ja sadˈaka za amˈani na sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi ambˈazo zˌiliˌambatˈana na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa. kwa hˈijo hudˈuma ja hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌikarudˈiʃwa kwa ˈupja.|0
hˌezekˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote wˌakafurˈahi kwa sabˈabu ja lˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalilˌolifˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈake, kwa kˌuwa lˌilitendˈeka pˈapo hˈapo.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kˌuwaˈita ˌisraˈeli wˈote na jˈuda, pˈia ˌakaandˈika barˈua kwa ˌefraˈimu na manˈase, kˌuwakˌaribˈiʃa ˌili wˈaɟe hˌekalˈuni ˌm̩wa bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mfˈalme na mˌaafˈisa wˌake pamˈoɟa na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote katˌika jˌerusalˈemu wˌaliamˈua kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka katˌika mwˈezi wa pˈili.|0
kwa sabˈabu mˌakuhˈani hˌawakˈuwa wˌameɟˌitakˈasa idˈadi ja kutˈoʃa na wˈatu wakˈawa hˌawaɟˌakusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, hˌawakˈuwa wˌamewˈeza kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka kwa wakˈati wˌake wa kˌawaˈida.|0
mpˈaŋɡo hˈuu ˌukaˌonekˈana wafˈaa kwa mfˈalme na kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
wˌakaamˈua kˌupelˈeka taŋɡˈazo ˌisraˈeli kˈote, kˌuanzˈia bˈeer ʃˈeba hˌadi dˈani, wˌakiwaˈita wˈatu wˈaɟe jˌerusalˈemu kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli. ˌilikˈuwa hˌaiɟˌaaðimˈiʃwa na idˈadi kˈubwa ja wˈatu kˌama hˈijo kˌufuatˈana na jˈale jˌalijokˈuwa jˌameandˈikwa.|0
kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme, mˌatarˈiʃi wˌakapˈita katˌika ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda kˈote wakˈiwa na barˈua kutˈoka kwa mfˈalme na kutˈoka kwa mˌaafˈisa wˌake zˌikisˈema: wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, mrˌudiˈeni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na ˌisraˈeli, ˌili nˌaje ˌawarudˈie nˈiɲi mlˌiosalˈia, mlˌionˌusurˈika kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wafˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
msˈiwe kˌama bˈaba zˈenu na ndˈuɡu zˈenu, ambˈao hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, hˈivjo ˌakawafˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza kˌama mnˌavjoˈona.|0
msˈiwe na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu, kˌama bˈaba zˈenu wˌalivjokˈuwa, bˌali ɲˌeɲekeˈeni kwa bwˈana. ɲɟoˈoni mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, ˌalipˌopatakˈasa milˈele. mtˌumikiˈeni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˌili hasˈira jˌake kˈali ˌiɡeuzˈiwe mbˈali nˈaɲi.|0
kˌama mkˌimrudˈia bwˈana ndˈipo wˈale ndˈuɡu zˈenu wˌaliotˈekwa pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈenu wˌatakˌapoonˈewa hurˈuma na wˈale wˌaliˌowatˈeka na kˌuwaatʃˈia warˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ni mwˌeɲe neˈema na hurˈuma, hˌataɡˌeuzˈia ˈuso wˌake mbˈali nˌaɲi kˌama nˈiɲi mkˌimrudˈia jˈeje.|0
mˌatarˈiʃi wˌakaˈenda ˈm̩ɟi hˌadi ˈm̩ɟi katˌika ˌefraˈimu na manˈase, wˌakafˈika mpˈaka zˌabulˈoni, lakˈini wˈatu wˌakawˌaðarˈau na kˌuwaðihˈaki.|0
lakˈini, baˈaði ja wˈatu wa aʃˈeri, manˈase na zˌabulˈoni, wˌakaɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza wakˈaɟa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
pˈia katˌika jˈuda mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa ɟˌuːja wˈatu kuwˈapa umˈoɟa katˌika kutˈenda jˈale ambˈajo mfˈalme na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌaliwˌaamˈuru, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
bˌasi umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu ˌukakˌusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kˌuaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu katˌika mwˈezi wa pˈili.|0
wˌakaɟitˈia kazˈini kˌujaondˈoa jˈale mˌaðabˈahu jˌalijokˈuwa hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, wˌakajˌaondˈoa pˈia jˈale mˌaðabˈahu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu na kˌujatˈupa bˈonde la kidrˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakamtʃˈiɲɟa mwˌanakondˈoo wa pasˈaka katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa pˈili. mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌaliˈona aˈibu, wˌakaɟˌitakˈasa na kulˈeta sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakatʃukˈua nafˈasi zˈao za kˌawaˈida kˌama ˌilivjˌoelˈezwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɲuɲˈiza ˈile dˈamu wˌalijˌokabiðˈiwa na walˈawi.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika lˈile kˌusaɲˈiko wˌalikˈuwa hˌawaɟˌaɟitakˈasa, ˌiliwapˈasa walˈawi watʃˈiɲɟe wˌanakondˈoo weŋɡˈine wa pasˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˈatu ambˈao hˌawakˈuwa sˈafi, kwa kˌufuˈata tˌaratˈibu za ibˈada ˌili kˌuwatakˈasa kwa bwˈana.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˈatu wˈeŋɡi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliotˈoka ˌefraˈimu, manˈase, ˌisakˈari na zˌabulˈoni wˌalikˈuwa hˌawaɟˌaɟitakˈasa, hˌata hˈivjo wˌalikˈula pasˈaka kiɲˈume na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa. lakˈini hˌezekˈia ˌakawˌaombˈea, ˌakisˈema, bwˈana, ambˈaje ni mwˈema na ˌamsamˈehe kˈila mmˈoɟa.|0
ambˈaje ˌanaˌuelekˈeza mˈojo wˌake kˌumtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈake, hˌata kˌama jˌeje si sˈafi kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia za mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakamsikˈia hˌezekˈia ˌakawapˈoɲa wˈatu.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakazuŋɡˈumza ˌakiwatˈia mˈojo walˈawi wˈote, ambˈao wˌalioɲˈeʃa ustˈadi katˌika kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana. hˈivjo wˈatu wakˈala tʃakˈula tʃa sˌikukˈuu kwa sˈiku sˈaba, wˌakitˈoa sadˈaka za amˈani na kˌumʃukˈuru bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikakubˈali kˌuendelˈea na sˌikukˈuu kwa sˈiku sˈaba zaˈidi, kwa hˈijo kwa sˈiku sˈaba ɲiŋɡˈine wˌakaˌendelˈea kˌuiˌaðimˈiʃa kwa furˈaha.|0
hˌezekˈia, mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌakatˈoa mˌafahˈali mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi sˈaba,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja kˌusaɲˈiko, nˌao mˌaafˈisa wˌakatˈoa mˌafahˈali mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo na mbˈuzi kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. idˈadi kˈubwa ja mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɟiwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la jˈuda, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi na lˈile kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌililotˈoka ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na wˈale waɡˈeni wˌaliotˈoka ˌisraˈeli na wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika jˈuda wˌakafurˈahi.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na furˈaha kˈubwa katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, kwa sabˈabu ʃˈu sˈiku za mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli hˌaliɟˌakuwˈepo ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ndˈipo mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌakasimˈama wˌakawˌabarˈiki wˈatu, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˌasikˈia, kwa sabˈabu maˈombi jˈao jˌalifˈika mbiŋɡˈuni, makˈao jˌake mˌatakatˈifu.|0
baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja jˈote kˌumalizˈika, wˌaisraˈeli ambˈao wˌalikuwˈako hˌuko wˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, wˌakajavˈuɲɟa jˈale mˈawe ja kˌuabudˈia na kˌuzikˌatakˈata zˈile ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera. wˌakabomˈoa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pamˈoɟa na mˌaðabˈahu zˌake kˈila mahˈali katˌika jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini na katˌika ˌefraˈimu na manˈase. baˌada ja kˌuviharˈibu hˈivi vjˈote, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakarˈudi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao weɲˈewe na kwˈeɲe mˈilki zˈao.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakawapˈaŋɡa mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi katˌika mˌiɡawˈaɲo, kˈila mɡawˈaɲo kˌuliŋɡˈana na waɟˈibu wˈao, kˌama ni mˌakuhˈani ˌau walˈawi, ˌili kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani, kˌuhudˈumu, kˌuʃukˈuru na kuˈimba sˈifa katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja makˈao ja bwˈana.|0
mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa mˌatolˈeo kutˈoka mˈali zˌake mweɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa za ˌasubˈuhi na za ɟiˈoni na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa sˈiku za sabˈato, kwa sˌikukˈuu za mwˈezi mwandˈamo na kwa aɟˈili ja sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana.|0
ˌakawˌaaɡˈiza wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu watˈoe sehˈemu ilˈijo hˈaki ja mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi ˌili wawˈeze kˌuɟitˈoa kˌikamilˈifu kˌutimˈiza waɟˈibu wˌao katˌika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana.|0
mˈara tu baˌada ja kˌutolˈewa taŋɡˈazo hˈilo, wˌaisraˈeli wˌakatˈoa kwa ˌukarˈimu mˌalimbˈuko ja nafˈaka zˈao, divˈai ˈm̩pja, mafˈuta na asˈali pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjotˈoka mˌaʃambˈani. wˌakalˈeta kiˈasi kikˈubwa tʃa fˈuŋɡu la kˈumi la kˈila kˈitu.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda wˌakalˈeta pˈia fˈuŋɡu la kˈumi la makˈundi jˈao ja ŋɡˈombe na makˈundi ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi pˈia na fˈuŋɡu la kˈumi la vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao na kˌuvikusˈaɲa katˌika malˈundo.|0
wˌakaˈanza kufˈaɲa hˈaja katˌika mwˈezi wa tˈatu na kˌumalˈiza katˌika mwˈezi wa sˈaba.|0
wakˈati hˌezekˈia na mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌalipokˈuɟa na kuˈona jˈale malˈundo, wˌakamsˈifu bwˈana na kˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakawˌaulˈiza mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi kuhˈusu jˈale malˈundo.|0
nˌaje ˌazarˈia ˌalijekˈuwa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja sadˈoki, ˌakaɟˈibu, ʃˈu wˈatu wˌalipoˈanza kulˈeta sadˈaka zˈao katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana tˌumekˈuwa na tʃakˈula tʃa kutˈoʃa na vˈiŋɡi vja kuwˈeka akˈiba kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamewˌabarˈiki wˈatu wˈake, hˈivjo tˌumekˈuwa na kiˈasi kˈiŋɡi kˌilitʃobˈaki.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakatˈoa aɡˈizo la kˌuteŋɡenˈeza vjˈumba vja ɣˈala katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana nˈalo hˈili lˌikafaɲˈika.|0
kˈiʃa kwa ˌuaminˈifu wˌakalˈeta sadˈaka zˈao, mafˈuŋɡu jˈao ja kˈumi na vˈitu vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu. kˌonanˈia mlˈawi, n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa vˈitu hˈivi na ʃimˈei ndˈuɡu jˌake n̩dˈije ˌalikˈuwa msˌaidˈizi wˈake.|0
jˌehiˈeli, ˌazazˈia, nahˈaθi, ˌasahˈeli, jˌeremˈoθi, jˌozabˈadi, ˌeliˈeli, ˌismakˈia, mahˈaθi na benˈaja wˌalikˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈizi tʃˈini ja kˌonanˈia na ʃimˈei ndˈuɡu jˈake, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewˈekwa na mfˈalme hˌezekˈia na ˌazarˈia, afˈisa msˌimamˈizi wa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈore mwˈana wa ˈimna, mlˈawi, bawˈabu wa lˈaŋɡo la mˌaʃarˈiki, ˌalikˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa sadˈaka za hiˈari zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa mˈuŋɡu, ˌakijˌaɡawˈaɲa hˈajo mˌatolˈeo jˌalijˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana na pˈia zˈile sadˈaka zˌilizowˈekwa wˈakfu.|0
edˈeni, mˌiniamˈini, jeʃˈua, ʃemˈaja, ˌamarˈia na ʃˌekanˈia wˌalimsˌaidˈia kwa ˌuaminˈifu katˌika mˈiɟi ja mˌakuhˈani, wˌakiwˌaɡawˈia mˌakuhˈani wenzˈao kˌufuatˈana na mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈao, wazˈee kwa viɟˈana sˌawasˈawa.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈao wˌakawˌaɡawˈia wˌanaˈume wˌeɲe ˈumri wa miˈaka mitˈatu ˌau zaˈidi ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao jˌalikˈuwa kwˈeɲe orˈoða ja vizˈazi, wˈale wˈote ambˈao wˌaŋɡeiŋɡˈia katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌili kufˈaɲa kˈazi zˈao mbˌalimbˈali za kˈila sˈiku kˌuliŋɡˈana na waɟˈibu katˌika mɡawˈaɲo wˈao.|0
kˌuandikˈiʃwa kwa mˌakuhˈani kˌulikˈuwa kwa kˌufuˈata tʃimbˈuko la ɲˈumba za bˈaba zˈao na walˈawi kˌuanzˈia ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi ˌilikˈuwa kˌufuatˈana na hudˈuma zˈao, kwa mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈao.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌaliˌandikˈiʃwa pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˌao wadˈoɡo, wˌake zˈao, watˈoto wˌao wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, ɟamˈii jˈote ˌiliˌandikˈiʃwa kwa kˌufuˈata orˈoða ja vizˈazi vjˈao. kwa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu katˌika kˌuɟitakˈasa.|0
kuhˈusu mˌakuhˈani, wazˈao wa arˈoni wˌalioˈiʃi kwˈeɲe maʃˈamba jˌalijˌozuŋɡˈuka mˈiɟi jˈao ˌau katˌika mˈiɟi miŋɡˈine jojˈote, wˈatu wˌalitˈaɟua maɟˈina ˌili kˌumɡawˈia kˈila mwˌanaˈume mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao na kwa wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika orˈoða ja vizˈazi vja walˈawi.|0
