hˈivi ndˈivjo hˌezekˈia ˌalivjofˈaɲa katˌika jˈuda jˈote, ˌakifˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema, sˈawa na la ˌuaminˈifu mbˈele za bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
nˌaje katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃofˈaɲa katˌika hudˈuma kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu na katˌika utˈii kwa ʃerˈia na ˈamri, ˌalimtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu wˌake na kufˈaɲa kˈazi kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote. nˌaje hˈivjo ˌakafˌanikˈiwa.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa sˌenakerˈibu ˌamekˈuɟa na kwˌamba ˌalikˌusudˈia kufˈaɲa vˈita ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri na mˌaafˈisa wˌake na mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌake ɟˌuːja kˌuzuˈia mˈaɟi kutˈoka tʃemtʃˈemi zilˈizo ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi, nˌao wˌakamsˌaidˈia.|0
umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu ˌukakˌusaɲˈika na kˌuzuˈia tʃemtʃˈemi zˈote na viɟˈito vˌilivjˌotirirˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, wˌakisˈema: kwa nˈini wafˈalme wa aʃˈuru wˈaɟe na kukˈuta mˈaɟi tˈele.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakafˈaɲa kˈazi kwa bidˈii kˌukarabˈati sehˈemu zˈote zˌilizokˈuwa zˌimebomˈoka za ukˈuta na kuɟˈeŋɡa minˈara ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta mwiŋɡˈine ɲɟˈe ja ˈule ˌuliˌokuwˈepo na kˌuimarˈiʃa mˈilo katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza pˈia silˈaha ɲˈiŋɡi na ŋɡˈao.|0
ˌakawˈeka mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi ɟˌuːja wˈatu, wˌakawˌakutanˈiʃa mbˈele jˌake katˌika uwˈaɲɟa kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi, nˌaje ˌakawatˈia mˈojo kwa manˈeno hˈaja.|0
kuwˈeni hodˈari na wˌeɲe mˈojo m̩kˈuu. msˌioɡˈope, msˌifaðaˈike wˈala msikˈate tamˈaa kwa sabˈabu ja mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru na hˈili ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa lilˈilo pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kwa kˌuwa alˈije pamˈoɟa nˌasi ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko alˈije pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
kwˈake ˈuko mkˈono wa mwˈili tˈu, bˌali kwˈetu jˈuko bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kˌutusˌaidˈia na kˌutupˌiɡanˈia vˈita vjˈetu. nˌao wˈatu wˌakatˈiwa mˈojo kˌutokˈana na manˈeno ˌalijˌowaambˈia hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
hˌatimˈaje sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru na maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌameˌuzuŋɡˈuka lakˈiʃi, ˌakawatˈuma mˌaafˈisa wˌake kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu wakˈiwa na uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, na kwa wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda wˌaliˌokuwˈako hˈumo, kusˈema.|0
ɟˈe, si hˌezekˈia mweɲˈewe ˌalijˌeondˈoa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pamˈoɟa na mˌaðabˈahu zˈake, ˌakiwˌaambˈia jˈuda wa jˌerusalˈemu, ni lazˈima mwabˈudu mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu mˈoɟa na kˌuteketˈeza ðabˈihu ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, hamɟˈui jˈale mˌimi na bˈaba zˈaŋɡu tˌulijˌojafˈaɲa kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi ziŋɡˈine? ɟˈe, miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa hˈajo ˌiliwˈeza kˌuokˈoa ˈn̩tʃi zˈao kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, msˌikubˈali hˌezekˈia ˌawadaŋɡˈaɲe na kˌuwapotˈoʃa nˈamna hˌii. msˌimwamˈini, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu wa taˈifa lolˈote wˈala wa ufˈalme wowˈote ˌalijewˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˌake kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu ˌau mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu. sembˈuse hˈujo mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatawˌaokoˈaɟe kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa sˌenakerˈibu wˌakaˌendelˈea kunˈena ðˈidi ja bwˈana alˈije mˈuŋɡu na ðˈidi ja mtumˈiʃi wˌake hˌezekˈia.|0
mfˈalme pˈia ˌaliandˈika barˈua ˌakimtukˈana bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na kusˈema hˈaja ðˈidi jˈake: kˌama vˈile miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa ja ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine ˌilivjoʃˈindwa kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˌao mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, vˈivjo hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu wa hˌezekˈia hˌatawˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˌake kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakawaˈita kwa kˌiebranˈia wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌaliokˈuwa ɟˌuːja ukˈuta ˌili kˌuwatˈiʃa na kˌuwatˈia hˈofu ˌili wawˈeze kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi.|0
wˌakanˈena ɟˌuːja mˈuŋɡu wa jˌerusalˈemu kˌama vˈile wˌalivjonˈena ɟˌuːja miˈuŋɡu ja mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine ja dunˈia ambˈajo ni kˈazi ja mikˈono ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
mfˈalme hˌezekˈia na nabˈii isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi wˌakalilˈia mbˈiŋɡu katˌika maˈombi kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakamwokˈoa hˌezekˈia na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru na kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa weŋɡˈine wˈote. bwˈana ˌakawˌastarehˈeʃa kˈila upˈande.|0
wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌakalˈeta sadˈaka jˌerusalˈemu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana na zawˈadi za θamˈani kwa aɟˈili ja hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda. ʃˈu hˈapo na kˌuendelˈea, hˌezekˈia ˌalihˌeʃimˈiwa sˈana na mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
lakˈini mˈojo wa hˌezekˈia ˌukaɟˈaa mˌaɟivˈuno na hˌakuoɲˈeʃa ˌitikˈio kwa wˈema ˌaliˌotendˈewa, kwa hˈijo ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ikˈawa ɟˈuu jˌake na ɟˌuːja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ndˈipo hˌezekˈia ˌakatˈubu kwa aɟˈili ja kibˈuri tʃa mˈojo wˈake, kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu, kwa hˈijo ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana hˌaikˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈao katˌika sˈiku za hˌezekˈia.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi sˈana na heʃˈima, nˌaje ˌakaɟˌifaɲˈia hazˈina kwa aɟˈili ja fˈeða jˌake na ðahˈabu na kwa aɟˈili ja vˈito vjˈake vja θamˈani, vˌikolˈezi, ŋɡˈao na aˈina zˈote za vjˈombo vja θamˈani.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa pˈia maɣˈala ja kˌuhifˈaði mavˈuno ja nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta. ˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza mabˈanda kwa aɟˈili ja aˈina mbˌalimbˈali za mifˈuɡo, na mazˈizi kwa aɟˈili ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa viɟˈiɟi na kˌuɟipatˈia idˈadi kˈubwa ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈombe kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
ˌilikˈuwa ni hˌezekˈia ˌalijezˈiba ɲɟˈia za kˌutolˈea mˈaɟi za tʃemtʃˈemi za ɟˈuu za ɡihˈoni na kˌujaˌelekˈeza mˈaɟi kˌutirˌirikˈia upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi wa ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi. ˌakafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃofˈaɲa.|0
lakˈini wakˈati waɟˈumbe wˌalipotˈumwa na wˌatawˈala wa babˈeli kˌumuulˈiza ɟˌuːja iʃˈara ambˈajo ˌilitokˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, mˈuŋɡu ˌalimwˈatʃa ˌili kˌumɟarˈibu na kuɟˈua kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃokˈuwa mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa hˌezekˈia na matˈendo jˌake ja kˌuɟitˈoa kwa mˈojo jˌameandˈikwa katˌika maˈono ja nabˈii isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi kwˈeɲe kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌezekˈia ˌakalˈala na bˈaba zˌake na ˌakazˈikwa kwˈeɲe kilˈima mahˈali jalˈipo mˌakabˈuri ja wazˈao wa daˈudi. jˈuda wˈote na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌakamheʃˈimu ˌalipˌofarˈiki. nˌaje manˈase mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme baˌada jˈake.|0
manˈase ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka kˈumi na miwˈili ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka hamsˈini na mitˈano.|0
ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu ambˈapo hˌezekˈia bˈaba jˈake, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˌabomˈoa, pˈia ˌakasˌimamˈiʃa mˌaðabˈahu za mˌabaˈali na ŋɡˈuzo za mˌaaʃˈera. ˌakalˌisuɟudˈia ɟˈeʃi lˈote la aŋɡˈani na kˌuliabˈudu.|0
ˌakawatˈoa wanˈawe kˌuwa kafˈara kwa kˌuwapitˈiʃa katˌika mˈoto katˌika bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, ˌakafˈaɲa ulˈozi, ˌuaɡˈuzi na utʃˈawi, ˌakatˈaka ˌuʃaˈuri kwa wˌeɲe pˈepo wa ˌutambˈuzi na wˌeɲe kˌuwasˌiliˈana na mizˈimu. ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, ˌakaˌitʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˈake.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua ˈile sanˈamu ˌalijˌoitʃˈoŋɡa na kˌuiwˈeka katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu ambˈalo mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia daˈudi na mwanˈawe sˌolomˈoni, katˌika hekˈalu hˈili na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu nˌiliˌoutʃaɡˈua kutˈoka kabˈila zˈote za ˌisraˈeli, nˌitaliwˈeka ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu milˈele.|0
sˌitaifˈaɲa tˈena miɡˈuu ja wˌaisraˈeli ˌiondˈoke tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈenu, ikˈiwa wˌatakˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃˌowaamˈuru kuhˈusu ʃerˈia zˈote, mˌaaɡˈizo na ˈamri zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa mkˈono wa mˈose.|0
lakˈini manˈase ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu katˌika ˌupotˈovu, kiˈasi kwˌamba wˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu mˈeŋɡi kulˈiko mˌataˈifa ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza mbˈele ja wˌaisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema na manˈase pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈake, lakˈini hˌawakumɟˈali.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌakalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao mˌaɟemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, ambˈao wˌalimtʃukˈua manˈase kwˈenda kˌifuŋɡˈoni, wˌakawˈeka ndoˈana katˌika pˈua jˈake, wˌakamfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba na kˌumpelˈeka babˈeli.|0
katˌika ðˈiki jˌake ˌakamsˈihi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake na kˌuɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza sˈana mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈake.|0
nˌaje ˌalipomwˈomba, bwˈana ˌakaɡˈuswa na kˈule kusˈihi kwˈake na ˌakasˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈake, kwa hˈijo ˌakamrudˈiʃa jˌerusalˈemu na kwˈeɲe ufˈalme wˈake. ndˈipo manˈase ˌakatambˈua kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu.|0
bˌaadˈaje ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe wa ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, mˌaɣarˈibi ˌm̩wa tʃemtʃˈemi ja ɡihˈoni katˌika bˈonde, hˌadi kˌufikˈia ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la samˈaki na ˌakakˌizuŋɡˈuka kilˈima tʃa ofˈeli, pˈia ˌakaufˈaɲa kˌuwa mrˈefu zaˈidi. ˌakawawˈeka mˌaɟemadˈari katˌika mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeɟeŋɡˈewa ŋɡˈome.|0
ˌakaˌondolˈea mbˈali miˈuŋɡu ja kiɡˈeni na kˌuondˈoa sanˈamu kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana pamˈoɟa na mˌaðabˈahu zˈote ˌalizˌoziɟˈeŋɡa katˌika kˈile kilˈima kˌilitʃoɟˈeŋɡwa hekˈalu na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakazitˈupa ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakarudˈiʃa mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana na kˌutolˈea ɟˈuu jˌake ðabˈihu za sadˈaka za amˈani pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani, nˌaje ˌakawˌaamˈuru jˈuda wˌamtumikˈie bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo wˈatu wˌakaˌendelˈea kutˈoa ðabˈihu mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, lakˈini wˌakimtolˈea bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao pˈeke jˈake.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa manˈase, maˈombi jˌake kwa mˈuŋɡu wˌake na manˈeno ˌalijˌoambˈiwa na wˌaonˈaɟi wˌalionˈena nˌaje kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
maˈombi jˈake, pamˈoɟa na ɟˈinsi mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjoɡˈuswa na kusˈihi kwˈake, pˈia ðˈambi zˌake zˈote na kukˈosa kwˈake ˌuaminˈifu pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu ˌalizoɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, kˈule kˌusimamˈiʃa ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera na sanˈamu kˈabla ja kˌuɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza kwˈake, jˈote jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za wˌaonˈaɟi.|0
amˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na miwˈili, ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka miwˈili.|0
lakˈini tˌofaˈuti na manˈase bˈaba jˈake, hˌakuɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza mbˈele za bwˈana, badˈala jˌake amˈoni ˌalioŋɡˈeza hatˈia zaˈidi na zaˈidi.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌakawaˈua wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa hˈila ðˈidi ja mfˈalme amˈoni. wˌakamfˈaɲa josˈia mwanˈawe kˌuwa mfˈalme mahˈali pˈake.|0
josˈia ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka minˈane ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka θˌelaθˈini na mmˈoɟa.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana na kˌuenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia za daˈudi bˈaba jˈake, hˌakuɡeˈuka upˈande wa kuˈume wˈala wa kuʃˈoto.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali bˈado mdˈoɡo, ˌaliˈanza kˌumtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu wa daˈudi bˈaba jˈake. katˌika mwˈaka wˌake wa kˈumi na mbˈili ˌaliˈanza kˌusafˈiʃa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakiondˈoa ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera, sanˈamu za kutʃˈoŋɡa na viɲˈaɡo vja kusˈubu.|0
mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈake, wˌakazˌibomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu za mˌabaˈali, wˌakazivˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba zˌilizokˈuwa zˌimesimˈama ɟˈuu jˈake, wˌakazivˈuɲɟa ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera, sanˈamu na viɲˈaɡo. hˈivi ˌalivivˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande na kˌuvisambˈaza ɟˌuːja mˌakabˈuri ja wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamevˌitolˈea kafˈara.|0
ˌakatʃˈoma mifˈupa ja mˌakuhˈani wˌao ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu zˈao na kwa ɲɟˈia hˈijo ˌakaˌitakˈasa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
katˌika mˈiɟi ja manˈase, ˌefraˈimu na sˌimeˈoni, hˌadi naftˈali na kwˈeɲe maɡˈofu jˌanajˌoizuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌakavˈuɲɟa mˌaðabˈahu na ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera na kˌuzipˌondapˈonda hˈizo sanˈamu hˌadi zikˈawa ˈuŋɡa na kukˈata vipˈande vipˈande mˌaðabˈahu zˈote za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba katˌika ˌisraˈeli jˈote. kˈiʃa ˌakarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa josˈia, ˌili kˌutakˈasa ˈn̩tʃi na hekˈalu, ˌakawatˈuma ʃafˈani, mwˈana wa ˌazalˈia na mˌaasˈeja mtawˈala wa ˈm̩ɟi, pamˈoɟa na jˈoa mwˈana wa jˌoahˈazi, mwandˈiʃi ˌili kˌukarabˈati hekˈalu la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
wˌakamwendˈea hilkˈia kuhˈani m̩kˈuu na kˈumpa fˈeða ambˈazo zˌilikˈuwa zˌimelˈetwa ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana ambˈazo walˈawi wˌaliokˈuwa mˌabawˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezˌikusˈaɲa kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wa manˈase, ˌefraˈimu na mabˈaki wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini na wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakazˌikabˈiði hˈizo fˈeða kwa wˈatu wˌaliowˈekwa ˌili kˌusimamˈia kˈazi ja hekˈalu la bwˈana. hˈawa wˈatu wˌaliwalˈipa wˌafaɲakˈazi wˌaliˌokarabˈati na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza hekˈalu lipˈate kurˈudi katˌika hˈali jˈake.|0
wˌakawˈapa pˈia mafˈundi sˌeremˈala na waˈaʃi fˈeða ˌili kˌununˈua mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa, m̩bˈao kwa aɟˈili ja kˌufuŋɡˈia na borˈiti kwa aɟˈili ja maɟˈeŋɡo ambˈajo wafˈalme wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamejaˈatʃa jakˈawa maɡˈofu.|0
wˈatu wˌakafˈaɲa kˈazi kwa ˌuaminˈifu. wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewˈekwa ɟˈuu jˈao ˌili kˌuwaˌelekˈeza ni jahˈaθi na ˌobadˈia, walˈawi wa uzˈao wa merˈari, zˌekarˈia na mˌeʃulˈamu, wˌaliotˈoka kwˈeɲe uzˈao wa kohˈaθi. walˈawi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na ufˈundi wa kupˈiɡa ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi.|0
wakˈawa wˌasimamˈizi wa vˌibarˈua na kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈila aˈina ja kˈazi. baˈaði ja walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa wˌaandˈiʃi, mˌaafˈisa na mˌabawˈabu.|0
wakˈati wˌalikˈuwa wˌakizitˈoa ɲɟˈe fˈeða zˌilizokˈuwa zˌimetolˈewa kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la bwˈana, kuhˈani hilkˈia ˌakakipˈata kˈile kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana kˌilitʃokˈua kˌimetolˈewa kwa mkˈono wa mˈose.|0
hilkˈia ˌakamwambˈia ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi, nˌimekipˈata kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana. akˈampa ʃafˈani kˈile kitˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa ʃafˈani ˌakakˌipelˈeka kˈile kitˈabu kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia, mˌaafˈisa wˈako wˌanafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu kˌama wˌalivjˌokabiðˈiwa kufˈaɲa.|0
wˌamelˈipa fˈeða zˌilizokˈuwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana na wˌamewˌakabˈiði wˌasimamˈizi na wˌafaɲakˈazi.|0
kˈiʃa ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi ˌakamwarˈifu mfˈalme kˌuwa, kuhˈani hilkˈia ˌamenˈipa kitˈabu. nˌaje ʃafˈani ˌakakisˈoma mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌalipˌosikˈia jˈale manˈeno ja ʃerˈia, ˌakajˌararˈua mavˈazi jˈake.|0
ˌakatˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja kwa hilkˈia, ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, abdˈoni mwˈana wa mˈika, ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi na asˈaja mtumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme.|0
nendˈeni mkˌamuulˈize bwˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu na kwa aɟˈili ja mabˈaki wˌaliˈoko ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda kuhˈusu jˈale jˌalijˌoandˈikwa ndˈani ja kitˈabu hˈiki ambˈatʃo kˌimepˌatikˈana. hasˈira ja bwˈana ni kˈubwa ˈm̩no ambˈajo ˌimemwˈaɡwa ɟˈuu jˈetu kwa sabˈabu bˈaba zˈetu hˌawakˌuliʃˈika nˈeno la bwˈana wˈala hˌawaɟatˈenda kˌuliŋɡˈana na jˈale jˈote jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki.|0
hilkˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈote mfˈalme ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewatˈuma pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakaˈenda kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na nabˈii ˈm̩ke ˌaitwˈaje hˈulda, ˌalijekˈuwa ˈm̩ke wa ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa toxˈaθi, mwˈana wa hˈasra mtunzˈaɟi wa tʃˈumba tʃa mavˈazi. hˈulda ˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu, katˌika m̩tˈaa wa pˈili.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌameniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuniɣˌaðibˈiʃa kwa kˈazi jˈote ja mikˈono jˈao, hˈivjo hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌitamwˈaɡwa ɟˌuːja mahˈali hˈapa, wˈala hˌaitˌatulˈizwa..|0
bˌasi nˌitakˌukusˈaɲa kwa bˈaba zˈako, nˌawe ˌutazˈikwa kwa amˈani. mˈatʃo jˈako hˌajataˈona maˈafa jˈote nˌitakˌajolˈeta ɟˌuːja mahˈali hˈapa na ɟˌuːja wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi hˈapa.  kwa hˈijo wˌakampˌelekˈea mfˈalme ɟˈibu lˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakawaˈita pamˈoɟa wazˈee wˈote wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡˈuzo jˌake na kufˈaɲa ˈupja aɡˈano mbˈele za bwˈana ˌili kˌumfuˈata bwˈana na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈake, mˌaaɡˈizo na ʃerˈia kwa mˈojo wˌake wˈote na kwa rˈoho jˌake jˈote na ˌili kˌujatˈii manˈeno ja aɡˈano jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamtˈaka kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika jˌerusalˈemu na bˌeɲamˈini kuwˈeka ahˈadi zˈao weɲˈewe kwa hˌilo aɡˈano, wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa kˌufuˈata aɡˈano la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
josˈia ˌakaondˈoa mˌatʃukˈizo jˈote ja sanˈamu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌilijokˈuwa mˈali ja wˌaisraˈeli na ˌakawatˈaka wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈako katˌika ˌisraˈeli wˌamtumikˈie bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao. kwa mˈuda wˈote ˌalioˈiʃi, hˌawakuʃˈindwa kˌumfuˈata bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
josˈia ˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka kwa bwˈana katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, mwˌanakondˈoo wa pasˈaka ˌakatʃˈiɲɟua sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza.|0
ˌakawawˈeka mˌakuhˈani kwˈeɲe waɟˈibu wˌao na kˌuwatˈia mˈojo katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia walˈawi, wˌaliˌowafundˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli wˈote na wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameɟiwˈeka wˈakfu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi ja bwˈana, lˌiwekˈeni hˌilo sandˈuku tˌakatˈifu katˌika hekˈalu lˈile ˌaliloɟˈeŋɡa sˌolomˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. hˌalipˈaswi kubˈebwa hˈuku na hˌuko mˌabeɡˈani mwˈenu. sˈasa mtˌumikiˈeni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
ɟˌiandaˈeni kwa kˌufuˈata ɟamˈaa zˈenu katˌika mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈenu, kˌufuatˈana na mˌaelˈezo jˌalijˌoandˈikwa na daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na mwanˈawe sˌolomˈoni.|0
sˌimamˈeni mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwa kˌufuˈata mˌiɡawˈaɲo ja ɟamˈaa za bˈaba zˈenu kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈoo zˈenu na pawˈepo walˈawi kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila mɡawˈaɲo wa ɲˈumba ja bˈaba zˈenu.|0
tʃiɲɟˈeni mwˌanakondˈoo wa pasˈaka, ɟˌitakasˈeni, nˌaɲi kwa niˈaba ja kˈoo zˈenu faɲˈeni mˌaandalˈizi, mkitˈenda sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno la bwˈana kwa mkˈono wa mˈose.|0
ndˈipo josˈia ˌakawˈapa wˈatu wˈote wˌanambˈuzi wˌaliˌokuwˈepo ɟˈumla ja kondˈoo wˌapatˈao θˌeleθˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja pasˈaka, pˈia na ŋɡˈombe kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, vjˈote hˈivi kutˈoka mˈali binˈafsi ja mfˈalme.|0
pˈia mˌaafˈisa wˈake, wˌakatˈoa kwa hiˈari jˈao wˌakawˈapa wˈatu, mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi. hilkˈia, zˌekarˈia na jˌehiˈeli, wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wakˈuu wa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, wˌakawˈapa mˌakuhˈani sadˈaka za pasˈaka wˌanakondˈoo na wˌanambˈuzi mbˈili,mˌiasˈita na mˌafahˈali mˌiatˈatu.|0
kˌonanˈia na nduɡˈuze wawˈili, ʃemˈaja na nˌeθanˈeli, pamˈoɟa na hˌaʃabˈia, jˌeiˈeli na jˌozabˈadi wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈawi, nˌao pˈia wˌakawˈapa walˈawi wˌanakondˈoo na wˌanambˈuzi tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na mˌafahˈali mˌiatˈano, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za pasˈaka.|0
hudˈuma ˌilipˌomalizˈika kˌuandalˈiwa mˌakuhˈani wˌakasimˈama mahˈali pˈao na walˈawi katˌika mˌiɡawˈaɲo jˈao kˌama mfˈalme ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru.|0
wˌanakondˈoo wa pasˈaka wˌakatʃˈiɲɟua, nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɲuɲˈiza ˈile dˈamu wˌalijˌokabiðˈiwa, wakˈati walˈawi wakˈiwa wˌanawatʃˈuna wˈale waɲˈama ŋɡˈozi.|0
wˌakatˈeŋɡa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ˌili wawˈeze kˌuɡawˈia ˌili mˌiɡawˈaɲo kwa kˌufuˈata ɟamˈaa za bˈaba zˈao ˌili watˈoe sadˈaka kwa bwˈana kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa mˈose. wˌakafˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo kwa wˈale mˌafahˈali.|0
wˌakawaˈoka wˈale waɲˈama wa pasˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈoto kˌama ˌilivjˌoamrˈiwa, wˌakatʃˈemʃa zˈile sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu kwˈeɲe vjˈuŋɡu, mˌasufurˈia makˈubwa na vˌikaˈaŋɡo na kˌuwaɡawˈia wˈatu wˈote upˈesi.|0
hˌatimˈaje wˌakafˈaɲa mˌaandalˈizi kwa aɟˈili jˈao weɲˈewe na kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani, kwa sabˈabu wˈale mˌakuhˈani, jaˈani, wazˈao wa arˈoni, wˌalikˈuwa wˌanatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa pamˈoɟa na zˈile sehˈemu zˌilizonˈona mpˈaka usˈiku. hˈivjo walˈawi wˌakafˈaɲa mˌaandalˈizi kwa aɟˈili jˈao weɲˈewe na kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani wa uzˈao wa arˈoni.|0
wˌaimbˈaɟi, wazˈao wa asˈafu, wˌalikˈuwa katˌika nafˈasi zˈao, kˌama ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa na mfˈalme daˈudi, asˈafu, hemˈani na jˌeduθˈuni mwonˈaɟi wa mfˈalme. mˌabawˈabu katˌika kˈila lˈaŋɡo hˌawakˌuhitˈaɟi kuˈatʃa nafˈasi zˈao kwa sabˈabu walˈawi wenzˈao wˌalifˈaɲa mˌaandalˈizi kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo wakˈati ˈule hudˈuma jˈote ja bwˈana ˌilifaɲˈika katˌika kˌuaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka, kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana kˌama ˌalivjˌoamˈuru mfˈalme josˈia.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌokuwˈepo wˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka wakˈati hˈuo na sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kwa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
kˌulikˈuwa hˌakuɟˌafaɲˈika pasˈaka kˌama hˌii katˌika ˌisraˈeli ʃˈu sˈiku za nabˈii samwˈeli wˈala hˌakukˈuwa na mfˈalme jejˈote wa ˌisraˈeli ambˈaje kˈamwe ˌaliʃˌaaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka kˌama ˈile ˌalijofˈaɲa mfˈalme josˈia, akˈiwa na mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi na wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌokuwˈepo hˌuko, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
pasˈaka ˌiliˌaðimˈiʃwa katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme josˈia.|0
baˌada ja hˈaja jˈote, josˈia ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌulitˌeŋɡenˈeza vizˈuri hekˈalu, nˈeko mfˈalme wa mˈisri, ˌakapˈanda ˌili kˌupiɡˈana hˌuko kˌarkemˈiʃi katˌika ˈm̩to frˈati, nˌaje josˈia ˌakatˈoka kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˈaje.|0
lakˈini nˈeko ˌakamtumˈia waɟˈumbe kusˈema, kˈuna uɡˈomvi ɡˈani kˈati jˈaŋɡu mˌimi na wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme wa jˈuda? si wˌewe nˌinajˌekuʃˌambulˈia wakˈati hˈuu, bˌali ˈile ɲˈumba ambˈajo nˈina vˈita nˈajo, mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiambˈia nˌiharakˈiʃe, kwa hˈivjo ˈatʃa kumpˈiŋɡa mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje jˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈami, la sˈivjo ˌatakˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, josˈia hˌakukubˈali kumwˈatʃa, bˌali ˌaliɟˌibadilˈiʃa ˌili kˌupiɡˈana nˌaje vˈita. hˌakusˌikilˈiza jˈale nˈeko ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia kwa aɡˈizo la mˈuŋɡu bˌali ˌalikwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˌaje katˌika tˌambarˈare ja meɡˈido.|0
wapˈiɡa upˈinde wˌakampˈiɡa mfˈalme josˈia, nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌaafˈisa wˈake, nˌiondoˈeni, nˌimeɟˌeruhˈiwa vibˈaja sˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamʃˈuʃa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɡˈari lˈake la farˈasi, wˌakamwˈeka kwˈeɲe ɡˈari liŋɡˈine ˌalilokˈuwa nˈalo na kumlˈeta jˌerusalˈemu, ambˈako ˌalifˈia. ˌakazˈikwa katˌika mˌakabˈuri ja bˈaba zˈake, nˈajo jˈuda jˈote na jˌerusalˈemu wˌakamwˌombolezˈea josˈia.|0
nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakatˈuŋɡa mˌaombolˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja kˈifo tʃˈake, nˌao wˌaimbˈaɟi wˈote, wˌanaˈume kwa wˌanawˈake, hufˈaɲa ˌukumbˈuʃo wa josˈia katˌika mˌaombolˈezo hˌadi lˈeo. hˈaja jˌakafˈaɲua destˈuri katˌika ˌisraˈeli, nˈajo jˌameandˈikwa katˌika mˌaombolˈezo.|0
mˌatukˈio meŋɡˈine ja ˌutawˈala wa josˈia na matˈendo jˌake mˈema, kˌuliŋɡˈana na jˈale jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana.|0
mˌatukˈio jˈote, kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo, jˌameandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda.|0
jˌehoahˈazi ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈatu ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈezi mitˈatu.|0
mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakamwondˈoa mˌadarakˈani hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu na ˌakatˈoza jˈuda kˈodi ja talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða na talˈanta mˈoɟa ja ðahˈabu.|0
mfˈalme wa mˈisri ˌakamwˈeka ˌeliakˈimu, nduɡˈuje jˌehoahˈazi, kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu na kˌubadˈili ɟˈina la ˌeliakˈimu kˌuwa jˌehojakˈimu. lakˈini nˈeko ˌakamtʃukˈua jˌehoahˈazi, nduɡˈuje ˌeliakˈimu ˌakampelˈeka mˈisri.|0
jˌehojakˈimu ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈano ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈaka kˈumi na mmˈoɟa. ˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌakamʃˌambulˈia na kumfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba ˌakampelˈeka babˈeli.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakatʃukˈua pˈia vjˈombo kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana na kˌuviwˈeka katˌika hekˈalu lˈake hˌuko babˈeli.|0
jˌehojakˈini ˌalikˈuwa na miˈaka kˈumi na minˈane ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu miˈezi mitˈatu na sˈiku kˈumi. ˌakafˈaɲa jalˈijo maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
mnˈamo maɟˈira ja vˈuli, mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakatˈuma wˈatu, nˌao wˌakamlˈeta babˈeli, pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo vja θamˈani kutˈoka hekˈalu la bwˈana. nˌaje ˌakamfˈaɲa sˌedekˈia, ndˈuɡu jˌake jˌehojakˈimu kˌuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
sˌedekˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mmˈoɟa ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka kˈumi na mmˈoɟa.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake, wˈala hˌakuɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza mbˈele ja nabˈii jˌeremˈia, ambˈaje ˌalinˈena nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
pˈia ˌalimwˈasi mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwapˈiʃa kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu. ˌakaʃupˈaza ʃˈiŋɡo na ˌakafˈaɲa mˈojo wˌake kˌuwa mɡˈumu wˈala hˌakutˈaka kˌumɡeukˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈote wa mˌakuhˈani pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌakazˈidi kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu zaˈidi na zaˈidi, wˌakafˈaɲa mˌatʃukˈizo jˈote kˌama wˌalivjofˈaɲa mˌataˈifa wˌakinaɟˈisi hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamelˌitakˈasa hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈao, ˌakawˌapelekˈea nˈeno kˌupitˈia waɟˈumbe wˌake tˈena na tˈena, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌanawˌahurumˈia wˈatu wˌake pamˈoɟa na mahˈali pa maskˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini wˌaliwˌaðihˈaki waɟˈumbe wa bwˈana wˌakajˌaðarˈau manˈeno jˌake na kˌuwatʃˈeka mˌanabˈii wˌake mpˈaka ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ikˈawa kˈubwa ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˌake na hˌakukˈuwa na nˈamna ja kˌuitulˈiza.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwinˈua ðˈidi jˈao mfˈalme wa wˌakaldˈajo, ˌalijˌewaˈua viɟˈana wˌao wa kiˈume kwa upˈaŋɡa ndˈani ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, ambˈaje hˌakumbakˈiza kiɟˈana mwˌanaˈume wˈala kiɟˈana mwanˈamke, wazˈee wˈala vikˈoŋɡwe. mˈuŋɡu ˌakawatˈia wˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
ˌakavˌitʃukˈua kwˈenda babˈeli vjˈombo vjˈote kutˈoka hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu, vikˈubwa na vidˈoɡo, hazˈina za hekˈalu la bwˈana pamˈoɟa na hazˈina za mfˈalme na za mˌaafˈisa wˈake.|0
wˌakalitʃˈoma hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu na kˌuzibomˈoa kˈuta za jˌerusalˈemu, wˌakatʃˈoma mˈoto maɟˈumba jˈote ja kifˈalme na kˌuharˈibu kˈila kˈitu tʃˈake tʃa θamˈani.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌaliˌonusurˈika kˌuuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌakatʃˌukulˈiwa kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli. nˌao wakˈawa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake na wa wanˈawe mpˈaka wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa ufˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi ˌulifˈika.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaˌendelˈea kˌufurahˈia pumzˈiko lˈake la sabˈato, wakˈati wˈote wa kufˈaɲua kwˈake ukˈiwa ˌilipumzˈika mpˈaka ˈile miˈaka sabˈini ˌilipˌotimˈia katˌika kˌutimˈiza nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililonˈenwa na jˌeremˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi:  bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌamenˈipa fˈalme zˈote dˌuniˈani, na ˌamenˌiaɡˈiza kˌumɟeŋɡˈea hekˈalu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu katˌika jˈuda.|0
jejˈote wa wˈatu wˌake mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, mˈuŋɡu wˌake na ˈawe pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˈatʃa apˈande kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu katˌika jˈuda na kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˈeko hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌao wˈatu wa mahˈali popˈote wˈale wˌaliˌonusurˈika wˌanapoˈiʃi sˈasa, wˈatu hˈao wˈampe fˈeða na ðahˈabu, pamˈoɟa na vifˈaa na mifˈuɡo, mbˈali na sadˈaka za hiˈari kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu..|0
kˈiʃa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa ja jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake ˌulisukˈumwa na mˈuŋɡu, ˌakaɟˌiandˈaa kupˈanda ˌili kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mˌaɟirˈani zˈao wˈote wˌakawˌasaidˈia vjˈombo vja fˈeða na ðahˈabu, pamˈoɟa na vifˈaa na mifˈuɡo, pˈia na zawˈadi za θamˈani, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka zˈote za hiˈari.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, mfˈalme korˈeʃi ˌakavitˈoa vjˈombo vˌilivjokˈuwa mˈali ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuviwˈeka katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi ˌakavitˈoa kwa mkˈono wa mˌiθredˈaθi mtˈunza hazˈina, ˌalijˌevihesˈabu mbˈele ja ʃeʃbˈaza m̩kˈuu wa jˈuda.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈio orˈoða ja vifˈaa: mˌasinˈia ja ðahˈabu jˌalikˈuwa θˌeleθˈini mˌasinˈia ja fˈeða jˌalikˈuwa mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri vjetˈezo vja fˈeða vˌilikˈuwa ˌiʃirˈininatˈisa.|0
mˌabakˈuli ja ðahˈabu jˌalikˈuwa θˌeleθˈini mˌabakˈuli ja fˈeða jˌanajˌofanˈana jˌalikˈuwa mˌiaˈn̩nena kˈumi vifˈaa viŋɡˈine vˌilikˈuwa mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri.|0
kwa uɟˈumla, kˌulikˈuwa na vjˈombo tˈano,mˌiaˈn̩ne vja ðahˈabu na vja fˈeða. ʃeʃbˈaza ˌakavilˈeta hˈivi vjˈote wakˈati wˈatu wˌalipotˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu.|0
bˌasi hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu wa ɟˈimbo wˌaliotˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni, ambˈao nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua matˈeka hˌadi babˈeli wˌalirˈudi jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi wˈake.|0
wakˈiwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na zˌerubabˈeli, jeʃˈua, nˌehemˈia, serˈaja, rˌeelˈaja, mˌordekˈai, bilʃˈani, mispˈari, biɡwˈai, rehˈumu na baˈana: orˈoða ja wˌanaˈume kˈati ja wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌilikˈuwa.|0
wˈatu wa bˌeθlehˈemu mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininatˈatu.|0
wˈatu wa ˌanaθˈoθi mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
mˌakuhˈani: wazˈao wa jedˈaja kwa ɟamˈaa ja jeʃˈua mˌiatˈisa sabˈininatˈatu.|0
walˈawi: wazˈao wa jeʃˈua na kˌadmiˈeli kˌupitˈia ɟamˈaa ja hˌodavˈia sabˈininaˈn̩ne.|0
wˌaimbˈaɟi: wazˈao wa asˈafu mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu: wazˈao wa sˈiha, hasˈufa, tˌabaˈoθi.|0
wazˈao wa kerˈosi, siˈaha, padˈoni.|0
wazˈao wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa sˌolomˈoni: wazˈao wa sotˈai, hˌasaferˈeθi, perˈuda.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu wˈote na wazˈao wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa sˌolomˈoni mˌiatˈatu tisˈininambˈili.|0
wˌafuatˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja tˈel mˈela, tˈel hˈarʃa, kerˈubu, adˈoni na imˈeri, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuθibitˈiʃa kwˌamba ɟamˈaa zˈao zˌilikˈuwa uzˈao wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wazˈao wa delˈaja, tobˈia na nekˈoda mˌiasˈita hamsˈininambˈili.|0
kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakuhˈani: wazˈao wa hobˈaja, hakˈosi, bˌarzilˈai ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa bˈinti wa bˌarzilˈai, mɡˌileˈadi, nˌaje ˌakaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina hˈilo.|0
hˈawa wˌalitafˈuta orˈoða za ɟamˈaa zˈao, lakˈini hˌawakˌuonekˈana hˈumo, kwa hˈijo wˌaliˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kˈundi la mˌakuhˈani kwa kˌuwa wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa naɟˈisi.|0
mtawˈala ˌaliaɡˈiza kˌuwa wasˈile tʃotʃˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa vjakˈula vˌitakatˈifu hˌadi kˈuwe kuhˈani ˌatakˌajehudˈumu kwa urˈimu na θumˈimu.|0
wˌalikˈuwa na farˈasi mˌiasˈaba θˌeleθˈininasˈita, ɲˈumbu mˌiambˈili ˌarobaˈininatˈano.|0
wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja bwˈana hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, baˈaði ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa wˌalitˈoa sadˈaka za hiˈari kwa aɟˈili ja kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu katˌika enˈeo lˈake.|0
wˌakatˈoa kwa kadˈiri ja uwˈezo wˌao na kutˈia katˌika hazˈina darkˈoni sitˈininamˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, mˈane tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða, na mavˈazi mˌiamˈoɟa ja ˌukuhˈani kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi hˈijo.|0
mwˈezi wa sˈaba ˌulipˌowadˈia baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kukˈaa katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao, wˈatu wˈote wˌalikˌusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa.|0
jeʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌosadˈaki na mˌakuhˈani wenzˈake, zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli pamˈoɟa na wenzˈake wˌaliˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ja mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌili kˌumtolˈea ðabˈihu za sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto ɟˈuu jˈake, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌaliwˌaoɡˈopa wˈatu wˌaliˌowazuŋɡˈuka, wˌaliɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ɟˌuːja ˈule msˈiŋɡi wˈake, wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu za sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto ɟˈuu jˌake za ˌasubˈuhi na za ɟiˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈile kˌilitʃˌoandˈikwa, wˌakaˌiaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda wˌakitˈoa idˈadi ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kˌama ˌilivjˌohitaɟˈika kˈila sˈiku sˌawasˈawa na ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, wˌalitˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa za kˌawaˈida, sadˈaka za mwˈezi mwandˈamo na ðabˈihu zˈote za sˌikukˈuu tˌakatˈifu za bwˈana zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na zˈile sadˈaka za hiˈari zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa bwˈana.|0
iŋɡˈawa bˈado msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa hˌauɟawˈekwa, wˈatu wˌaliˈanza kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kwa bwˈana ʃˈu sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌakawˈapa mafˈundi wa uˈaʃi na ˌuseremˈala fˈeða, wˌakawˈapa wˈatu wa sidˈoni na tˈiro vjakˈula, vˌiɲuˈaɟi na mafˈuta ˌili wawˈeze kulˈeta maɡˈoɡo ja mˌierˈezi kwa ɲɟˈia ja bahˈari kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni hˌadi jˈafa, kˌama ˌalivjˌoaɡˈiza korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa pˈili wa mwˈaka wa pˈili baˌada ja wˌaisraˈeli kufˈika kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, jeʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌosadˈaki na ndˈuɡu zˈao weŋɡˈine mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi na wˈote wˌaliˌoreɟˈea jˌerusalˈemu kutˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˌaliˈanza kˈazi, wˌakiteˈua walˈawi wˌeɲe ˈumri kˌuanzˈia miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini ˌau zaˈidi kˌusimamˈia uɟˈenzi wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
jeʃˈua na wanˈawe, pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈake, kˌadmiˈeli na wanˈawe wazˈao wa hˌodavˈia, wˈana wa hˌenadˈadi na wˈana wˌao na ndˈuɡu zˈao, walˈawi wˈote wˌaliɟiˈuŋɡa pamˈoɟa kˌusimamˈia wˈale wˌaliofˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
waɟˈenzi wˌalipowˈeka msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana, mˌakuhˈani wakˈiwa wˌamevalˈia mavˈazi jˈao wakˈiwa na tˌarumbˈeta na walˈawi wˈana wa asˈafu wakˈiwa na mˌatoˈazi, wˌaliʃˈika nafˈasi zˈao za kˌumtukˈuza bwˈana, kˌama ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa na daˈudi mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌaliˈimba ɲˈimbo za sˈifa na za ʃukrˈani kwa bwˈana hˈivi: jˌeje ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake kwa ˌisraˈeli wadˈumu milˈele. wˈatu wˈote wˌakapˈaza saˈuti kˈubwa za sˈifa kwa bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu msˈiŋɡi wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ˌumewˈekwa.|0
lakˈini wˈeŋɡi wa mˌakuhˈani wazˈee, walˈawi na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˈona hekˈalu la mwanzˈoni, wˌalilˈia kwa saˈuti wˌalipoˈona msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu hˈili ˌukiwˈekwa, hˈuku weŋɡˈine wˈeŋɡi wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌutofˌautˈiʃa saˈuti hˈizo za furˈaha na za kilˈio, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌalipˈiɡa kelˈele sˈana. nˈajo hˈijo saˈuti ˌikasikˈika mbˈali.|0
adˈui za jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba wˈatu wˌaliorˈudi kutˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˌanaɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌakamɟˈia zˌerubabˈeli na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa, nˌao wˌakasˈema, tˌuruhusˈuni tˌuwasˌaidˈie kuɟˈeŋɡa, kwa sabˈabu sˌisi tˌunamtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌama nˈiɲi na tˌumekˈuwa tˌukimtolˈea ðabˈihu ʃˈu wakˈati wa ˈesar hadˈoni mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, ˌalijˌetulˈeta hˈapa.|0
lakˈini zˌerubabˈeli, jeʃˈua na vˌioŋɡˈozi weŋɡˈine wa ɟamˈaa ja ˌisraˈeli wˌakawaɟˈibu, nˈiɲi hˈamna sehˈemu nˌasi katˌika kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. sˌisi pˈeke jˈetu tˌutaɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama mfˈalme korˈeʃi, mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi ˌalivjˌotuaɡˈiza.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˌaliˌowazuŋɡˈuka wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa kˌuwakatˈiʃa tamˈaa wˈatu wa jˈuda na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌaoɡˈope wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˌendelˈea na uɟˈenzi.|0
wˌakaaɟˈiri wˌaʃaˈuri kˌuwapˈiŋɡa katˌika kˈazi jˈao, nˌao wˌakaipˈiŋɡa mipˈaŋɡo jˈao wakˈati wˈote wa ˌutawˈala wa korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi hˌadi wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
mnˈamo mwˈanzo wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌahasuˈero, hˈao adˈui wˌaliandˈika maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
pˈia katˌika sˈiku za ˌutawˈala wa ˌartaʃˈasta mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi, biʃlˈamu, mˌiθredˈaθi, tˌabeˈeli pamˈoɟa na wenzˈao wˌaliandˈika barˈua kwa ˌartaʃˈasta. barˈua hˈijo ˌiliandˈikwa kwa mwandˈiko wa kˌiarˈamu na katˌika lˈuɣa ja kˌiarˈamu.|0
rehˈumu afˈisa msˌimamˈizi na mwandˈiʃi ʃimʃˈai wˌaliandˈika barˈua kwa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu kˌama ˌifuatˈavjo.|0
rehˈumu afˈisa msˌimamˈizi na mwandˈiʃi ʃimʃˈai, pamˈoɟa na wenzˈao, jaˈani mˌahakˈimu na mˌaafˈisa walˈio ɟˌuːja wˈatu kˌuanzˈia tripˈoli, ˌuaɟˈemi, erˈeki na babˈeli, wˌaelˈami wa ʃuʃˈani.|0
na wˈatu weŋɡˈine ambˈao mhˌeʃimˈiwa ˈasur bˌanipˈali ˌaliwˌahamˈiʃa na kˌuwakalˈiʃa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa sˌamarˈia na mahˈali peŋɡˈine ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo nakˈala ja barˈua wˌalijˌompelekˈea. kwa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta, kutˈoka kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, wˈatu wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
japˈasa mfˈalme aɟˈue kˌuwa wˌajahˈudi wˌaliopˈanda kˈuɟa kwˈetu kutˈoka kwˈenu, wˌamekwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu nˌao wˌanauɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ˈule ˈm̩ɟi wa uˈasi na uˈovu. wˌanaɟˈeŋɡa kˈuta ˈupja na kˌukarabˈati misˈiŋɡi jˈake.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, mfˈalme jampˈasa aɟˈue kwˌamba kˌama ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌukiɟˈeŋɡwa na kˈuta zˌake zˌikafˈaɲua ˈupja, hˌakutakˈuwa na ˌulipˈaɟi wa kˈodi wˈala ˈada ˌau uʃˈuru, hˈivjo hazˈina za mfˈalme zˌitaˌaθirˈika.|0
sˌisi sˈasa kwa kˌuwa tˌunawˌaɟibˈika kwa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kwˌamba sˈijo sˌawasˈawa kwˈetu kuˈona mfˈalme ˌakiðˌaraulˈiwa, bˌasi tˌunatˈuma uɟˈumbe hˈuu kˌumtaarˈifu mfˈalme.|0
ˌili kwˌamba ˌufaɲˈike ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi kwˈeɲe kˌumbukˈumbu ja mˌaandˈiʃi ja wˌaliˌokutˌaŋɡulˈia. katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu hˈizi ˌutaɡundˈua kwˌamba ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ni wa maˈasi, ˌunaˌowatˌaabˈiʃa wafˈalme na maɟˈimbo, ni mahˈali pa maˈasi ʃˈu zamˈani. n̩dˈijo maˈana ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌulihˌaribˈiwa.|0
tˌunamɟulˈiʃa mfˈalme kwˌamba kˌama ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌukiɟˈeŋɡwa na kˈuta zˌake zˌikifˈaɲua ˈupja, hˌutabakˈiwa na tʃotʃˈote ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
mfˈalme ˌalirudˈiʃa ɟˈibu hˈili: kwa rehˈumu, afˈisa msˌimamˈizi, mwandˈiʃi ʃimʃˈai na wenzˈenu wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika sˌamarˈia na pˌeŋɡinˈepo ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati: salˈamu.|0
barˈua mlˌijotˌutumˈia ˌimesˈomwa na kˌutafsirˈiwa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilitˈoa ˈamri na ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi ˌukafaɲˈika na ˌimeɡˌundulˈika kwˌamba ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˈuna hˌistorˈia ndˈefu ja maˈasi ðˈidi ja wafˈalme na pˌamekˈuwa mahˈali pa maˈasi na ˌutʃotʃˈezi.|0
jˌerusalˈemu ˌumepˈata kˌuwa na wafˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌakitawˈala ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ilˈijo ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati, wˌakitˈoza kˈodi, ˈada na uʃˈuru hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo toˈeni ˈamri kwa wˈatu hˈawa wˌasimamˈiʃe uɟˈenzi, ˌili kwˌamba ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌusiˌendelˈee kuɟˈeŋɡwa hˌadi nˌitakˌapoaɡˈiza.|0
ˈm̩we wˌaaŋɡalˈifu msˌipuˈuze ɟˈambo hˈili. kwa nˈini kˌuruhˈusu tiʃˈio hˈili kˌuendelˈea na kˌusababˈiʃa hasˈara kwa ufˈalme.|0
mˈara wˌalipˌosomˈewa nakˈala ja barˈua ja mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta, rehˈumu na ʃimʃˈai ˌalijekˈuwa mwandˈiʃi na wenzˈao, wˌalikwˈenda mˈara mˈoɟa kwa wˌajahˈudi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuwalˌazimˈiʃa kwa ŋɡˈuvu kˌusimamˈiʃa uɟˈenzi.|0
hˈivjo kˈazi ja uɟˈenzi wa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌikasˌimamˈiʃwa kabˈisa hˌadi mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii haɡˈai na nabˈii zˌekarˈia m̩zˈao wa ˈido, wˌakawˌatolˈea ˌunabˈii wˌajahˈudi wˌaliokˈuwa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
ndˈipo zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli na jeʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌosadˈaki wˌakaˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa tˈena ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu. nˌao mˌanabˈii wa mˈuŋɡu wˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao, wˌakiwˌasaidˈia.|0
wakˈati ˈule tˌatenˈai mtawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati na ʃˈeθar bˌozenˈai na wenzˈao wˌaliwˌaendˈea, wˌakawˌaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌalijewˈapa ruhˈusa ja kuɟˈeŋɡa tˈena hekˈalu hˈili na kˌurudiʃˈia ˈupja kˌama lˌilivjokˈuwa.|0
pˈia wˌaliwˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, maɟˈina ja wˈatu wˌanaofˈaɲa uɟˈenzi hˈuu ni nˈani.|0
lakˈini ɟˈitʃo la mˈuŋɡu wˌao lˌilikˈuwa lˌikiwˌaaŋɡalˈia wazˈee wa wˌajahˈudi, nˌao hˌawakˌuzuilˈiwa kuɟˈeŋɡa mpˈaka tˌaarˈifa ˌikaandˈikwa kwa darˈio na maɟˈibu jˌake kˌupokelˈewa.|0
hˌii ni nakˈala ja barˈua ˈile tˌatenˈai, mtawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati na ʃˈeθar bˌozenˈai na wenzˈao mˌaafˈisa wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati wˌalijˌompelekˈea mfˈalme darˈio.|0
tˌaarˈifa wˌalijˌompelekˈea ˌilisomˈeka kˌama ˌifuatˈavjo: kwa mfˈalme darˈio: salˈamu kwa mˈojo mkuɲɟˈufu.|0
ˌinampˈasa mfˈalme aɟˈue kwˌamba tˌulikwˈenda katˌika enˈeo la jˈuda, kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu. wˈatu wˌanaliɟˈeŋɡa kwa mˈawe makˈubwa na kuwˈeka m̩bˈao kwˈeɲe kˈuta. kˈazi ˌinafaɲˈika kwa bidˈii na ˌinaˌendelˈea kwa harˈaka tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
tˌuliwˌaulˈiza vˌioŋɡˈozi, ni nˈani ˌalijewˈapa ruhˈusa kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja hekˈalu hˈili na kˌureɟˈeza hˈali ja ɟˈeŋɡo kˌama lˌilivjokˈuwa.|0
pˈia tˌuliwˌaulˈiza maɟˈina jˈao, ˌili tˌukuˌandikˈie kˌukuɟulˈiʃa maɟˈina ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ɟˈibu wˌalilotˈupa: sˌisi ni wˌatumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu wa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi, nˌasi tˌunaliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja hekˈalu ambˈalo lˌiliɟˈeŋɡwa miˈaka mˈiŋɡi ˌilijopˈita, lˈile ambˈalo mfˈalme m̩kˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌaliliɟˈeŋɡa na kˌulikˌamilˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu bˈaba zˈetu wˌalimkˌasirˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, bˌasi ˌaliwatˈia mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza, mkaldˈajo, mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ambˈaje ˌalilˌiharˈibu hekˈalu hˈili na kˌuwaondˈoa wˈatu na kˌuwapelˈeka ˌuhamiʃˈoni hˌuko babˈeli.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa kˌutawˈala korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa babˈeli, mfˈalme korˈeʃi ˌalitˈoa ˈamri ja kuɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja ɲˈumba hˌii ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
jˌeje hˌata ˌalivˌiondˈoa vjˈombo vja ðahˈabu na fˈeða vja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, kutˈoka hekˈalu la babˈeli ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka ndˈani ja hekˈalu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuvilˈeta katˌika hekˈalu la babˈeli. vjˈombo hˈivjo mfˈalme korˈeʃi ˌalimkabˈiði ˈm̩tu ˌalijeˈitwa ʃeʃbˈaza, ambˈaje korˈeʃi ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemteˈua ˈawe mtawˈala.|0
nˌaje ˌakamwambˈia, tʃukˈua vjˈombo hˈivi uˈende ˌukaviwˈeke ndˈani ja hekˈalu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu. nˌawe ˌuiɟˈeŋɡe ˈupja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu mahˈali pˈake..|0
hˈivjo hˈuju ʃeʃbˈaza ˌalikˈuɟa na kuwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu ˌilijˈoko jˌerusalˈemu. ʃˈu sˈiku hˈijo hˌadi sˈasa ˌimekˈuwa ˌikiˌendelˈea kuɟˈeŋɡwa lakˈini bˈado hˌaiɟˌamalizˈika.|0
sˈasa kˌama ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme, ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi na ˌufaɲˈike katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu za mˌaandˈiʃi ja ufˈalme mɟˈini babˈeli, kuˈona kˌama kwˈeli mfˈalme korˈeʃi ˌalitˈoa ˈamri ja kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu katˌika jˌerusalˈemu. kˈiʃa tˌunaˈomba mfˈalme na ˌatutumˈie ˌuamˈuzi wˌake kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme darˈio ˌalitˈoa ˈamri, nˌao wˌakafˈaɲa ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu zˌilizˌohifaðˈiwa katˌika hazˈina hˌuko babˈeli.|0
kˌaratˈasi mˈoɟa ndˈefu ja mˌaandˈiʃi ˌilipˌatikˈana hˌuko ˌekbatˈana katˌika ɟˈimbo la umˈedi. hˈaja n̩dˈijo jˌalijokˈuwa jˌameandˈikwa hˈumo: kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa kˌutawˈala mfˈalme korˈeʃi, mfˈalme ˌalitˈoa ˈamri kuhˈusu hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu katˌika jˌerusalˈemu: hekˈalu na liɟˈeŋɡwe tˈena mahˈali pˌalepˈale wˌajahˈudi wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu, kwˈeɲe msˈiŋɡi ˈule ˈule. ˈiwe na kˈimo tʃa mikˈono sitˈini, upˈana wa mikˈono sitˈini.|0
kˈuta ziɟˈeŋɡwe kwa sˈafu tˈatu za mˈawe makˈubwa kˈiʃa ˌifuˈate sˈafu mˈoɟa ja m̩bˈao. ɣarˈama zˌitalˈipwa kutˈoka hazˈina ja mfˈalme.|0
pˈia, vjˈombo vja ðahˈabu na vja fˈeða vja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalivˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hekˈalu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌakavilˈeta babˈeli, japˈasa vˌirudˈiʃwe mahˈali pˈake ndˈani ja hekˈalu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, japˈasa viwˈekwe ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, tˌatenˈai, mtawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati na ʃˈeθar bˌozenˈai pamˈoɟa na nˈiɲi, mˌaafˈisa wenzˈao wa ɟˈimbo hˌilo kaˈeni mbˈali na mahˈali hˈapo.|0
msˌiiŋɡilˈie kˈazi ja hekˈalu hˈili la mˈuŋɡu. mwatʃˈeni mtawˈala wa wˌajahˈudi na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌajahˈudi waɟˈeŋɡe ˈupja ɲˈumba hˌii ja mˈuŋɡu mahˈali pˈake.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, hˈapa natˈoa ˈamri kuhˈusu mtˌakalofˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja wazˈee wa wˌajahˈudi katˌika uɟˈenzi wa ɲˈumba hˌii ja mˈuŋɡu: ɣarˈama za wˈatu hˈawa zˌitalˈipwa kˌikamilˈifu kutˈoka hazˈina ja mfˈalme, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mapˈato ja ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati, ˌili uɟˈenzi ˌusisimˈame.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃˌohitaɟˈika kˌama mˌafahˈali watʃˈaŋɡa, kondˈoo dˈume, wˌanakondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, ŋɡˈano, tʃˈumvi, divˈai na mafˈuta kˌama vˌitakˌavjohˌitaɟˈika na mˌakuhˈani hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, lazˈima wapˈewe kˈila sˈiku pasˈipo kukˈosa.|0
ˌili wawˈeze kutˈoa ðabˈihu ˌinajˌompendˈeza mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌumwombˈea mfˈalme na wanˈawe hˈali ɲɟˈema.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˌinaamˈuru kwˌamba ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajebˌadilˈiʃa ˈamri hˌii, borˈiti ˌitaŋɡolˈewa kutˈoka ɲˈumba jˈake, itʃˈoŋɡwe upˈande mmˈoɟa na ˌatumbulˈiwe nˈajo. kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa hˈili ɲˈumba jˌake ifˈaɲue lˈundo la tˈaka.|0
nˌaje mˈuŋɡu, ˌalijˌeliwˈeka ɟˈina lˈake hˌuko, ˌamwaŋɡˈuʃe mfˈalme jejˈote ˌau wˈatu wˌatakˌaoinˈua mikˈono kˌubadˈili ˈamri hˌii ˌau kˌuharˈibu hekˈalu hˈili lˌililˈoko jˌerusalˈemu. mˌimi darˈio nˌimetˈoa ˈamri hˌii. nˈajo ˌitekelˈezwe kwa bidˈii na kwa makˈini.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ˈamri ˌalijotˈoa mfˈalme darˈio, tˌatenˈai mtawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati na ʃˈeθar bˌozenˈai na wenzˈao wˌakaˌitekelˈeza kwa bidˈii na kwa makˈini.|0
hˈivjo wazˈee wa wˌajahˈudi wˌaliˌendelˈea kuɟˈeŋɡa na kustˈawi kˌutokˈana na mˌahubˈiri ja mˌanabˈii haɡˈai na zˌekarˈia, mwˈana wa ˈido. wˌakakˌamilˈiʃa uɟˈenzi wa hekˈalu kˌuliŋɡˈana na aɡˈizo la mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli na ˈamri ja korˈeʃi, darˈio na ˌartaʃˈasta wafˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
hekˈalu lˌilikˌamilˈika sˈiku ja kˈumi na mbˈili ja mwˈezi wa adˈari, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa tˈatu, katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈita wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli: mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi na weŋɡˈine wˈote wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa, wˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa kˈule kuwˈekwa wˈakfu ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja kuwˈekwa wˈakfu ɲˈumba hˌii ja mˈuŋɡu wˌalitˈoa mˌafahˈali mˈia mˈoɟa, kondˈoo dˈume mˈia mbˈili, wˌanakondˈoo mˈia ˈn̩ne, sadˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi ja ˌisraˈeli jˈote wˌalitˈoa mbˈuzi dˈume kˈumi na wawˈili, mmˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila kabˈila la ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌakawawˈeka mˌakuhˈani katˌika nafˈasi zˈao na walˈawi wˌakawˈekwa katˌika makˈundi jˈao ja hudˈuma kwa mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa mˈose.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, wˌaliorˈudi kutˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka.|0
mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekwˈiʃa kˌuɟitakˈasa nˌao wˌamekˈuwa sˈafi kwa kˌufuˈata kˌawaˈida za ibˈada. walˈawi wˌakatʃˈiɲɟa kondˈoo wa pasˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈana wa wˌaliorˈudi kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani ˌuhamiʃˈoni, kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈuɡu zˈao mˌakuhˈani na wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamerˈudi kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˌakaˈila pasˈaka, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameɟitˈeŋɡa na matˈendo ja ˌunaɟˈisi wa mˌataˈifa ja ɟirˈani ˌili kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba wˌaliˌiaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kwa furˈaha, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaɟˈaza furˈaha kwa kˌubadilˈiʃa nˈia ja mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru kwˌamba ˌawasˌaidˈie uɟˈenzi wa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja, wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌartaʃˈasta mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi, ˈezra mwˈana wa serˈaja, mwˈana wa ˌazarˈia, mwˈana wa hilkˈia.|0
mwˈana wa ʃalˈumu, mwˈana wa sadˈoki, mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu.|0
mwˈana wa ˌamarˈia, mwˈana wa ˌazarˈia, mwˈana wa mˌerajˈoθi.|0
mwˈana wa zˌerahˈia, mwˈana wa ˈuzi, mwˈana wa bˈuki.|0
mwˈana wa ˌabiʃˈua, mwˈana wa fˌinehˈasi, mwˈana wa ˌeleazˈari, mwˈana wa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu arˈoni.|0
hˈuju ˈezra ˌalipˈanda kutˈoka babˈeli. ˌalikˈuwa mwalˈimu mwˌeɲe uɟˈuzi mzˈuri katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose, ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈoa. mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa ˈezra kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃoˈomba, kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
pˈia baˈaði ja wˌaisraˈeli, wˌakiwˈemo mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi, wˌaimbˈaɟi, mˌabawˈabu na wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu, nˌao wˌalikˈuɟa jˌerusalˈemu mwˈaka wa sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta.|0
ˈezra ˌaliwasˈili jˌerusalˈemu mwˈezi wa tˈano wa mwˈaka wa sˈaba wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta.|0
ˈezra ˌaliˈanza safˈari jˌake kutˈoka babˈeli ʃˈu sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, nˌaje ˌakawasˈili jˌerusalˈemu sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa tˈano, kwa maˈana mkˈono wa neˈema wa mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana ˈezra ˌalikˈuwa ˌameɟitˈoa kwa mˈojo wˈote kˌuɟifˈunza na kuʃˈika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana na kˌuwafundˈiʃa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli ˈamri na ʃerˈia zˈake.|0
hˌii ni nakˈala ja barˈua ambˈajo mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa ˈezra ˌalijekˈuwa kuhˈani na mwalˈimu, ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeelimˈika katˌika mˈambo jˌahusˈujo mˌaaɡˈizo na ˈamri za bwˈana kwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌartaʃˈasta, mfˈalme wa wafˈalme, kwa ˈezra kuhˈani, mwalˈimu wa ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni: salˈamu.|0
sˈasa nˌaamˈuru kwˌamba ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌisraˈeli katˌika ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, ambˈaje ˌanatˈaka kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa nˌawe awˈeza kwˈenda.|0
ˌunatˈumwa na mfˈalme na wˌaʃaˈuri wˌake sˈaba kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza kuhˈusu jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌilijˈoko mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, ˌutʃukˈue pamˈoɟa nˌawe fˈeða na ðahˈabu ambˈazo mfˈalme na wˌaʃaˈuri wˌake wamˈempa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kwa hiˈari, mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje maskˈani jˌake jˈako jˌerusalˈemu.|0
pˈia fˈeða na ðahˈabu zˈote ˌunazowˈeza kupˈata kutˈoka ɟˈimbo la babˈeli, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za hiˈari wˌatakˌazotˈoa wˈatu na mˌakuhˈani kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˌao katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˌakikˈiʃa kwˌamba fˈeða hˈizi zˌimetumˈika kˌununˈua mˌafahˈali, kondˈoo dˈume na wˌanakondˈoo pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, ˌuvitˈoe ðabˈihu ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈenu katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa wˌewe na wˌajahˈudi ndˈuɡu zˈako mnawˈeza kufˈaɲa lolˈote lˌinalˌoonekˈana ɟˈema sˈana kwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu zˌilizˌosalˈia, kˌuliŋɡˈana na mapˈenzi ja mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
ˌuvitˈoe kwa mˈuŋɡu wa jˌerusalˈemu vjˈombo vjˈote ˌulivjˌokabiðˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja ibˈada katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃˌohitaɟˈika kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ambˈatʃo ˌunatakˈiwa kˌukitˈoa, wawˈeza kˌukitˈoa kutˈoka hazˈina ja mfˈalme.|0
mˈimi, mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta, sˈasa nˌaaɡˈiza watˈunza hazˈina wˈote wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati kutˈoa kwa bidˈii tʃotʃˈote kwa ˈezra kuhˈani na mwalˈimu wa ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni ˌatakˌatʃohitˈaɟi kwˈenu.|0
talˈanta mˌiamˈoɟa za fˈeða, ŋɡˈano kˈori mˌiamˈoɟa, divˈai bˈaθi mˌiamˈoɟa, mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni bˈaθi mˌiamˈoɟa, na tʃˈumvi kiˈasi tʃotʃˈote.|0
tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni ˌameaɡˈiza, kˌifaɲˈike kwa ˌukamilˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni. kwa nˈini pawˈepo ɣaðˈabu ðˈidi ja ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme na wanˈawe.|0
pˈia nˈiɲi fˌahamˈuni kˌuwa hˈamna mamlˈaka ja kˌuwatˈoza kˈodi, uʃˈuru ˌau ˈada mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi, wˌaimbˈaɟi, mˌabawˈabu, wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu ˌau wˌafaɲakˈazi weŋɡˈine kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌawe ˈezra, kˌufuatˈana na hekˈima ja mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ulˈijo nˈajo, wˈeka mˌahakˈimu na wˌaamˈuzi wˈote wˌanaˌozifahˈamu ʃerˈia za mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌili watˈoe hˈaki kwa wˈatu wˈote wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati. nˌawe ˌinakupˈasa ˌumfundˈiʃe jejˈote ambˈaje hˌazifahˈamu.|0
jejˈote ambˈaje hˌataitˈii ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈenu pˈia ʃerˈia ja mfˈalme, hakˈika lazˈima ˌaaðibˈiwe kwa kˌuuˈawa, kˌuhamˈiʃwa, kˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲua mˈali ˌau kufˈuŋɡwa ɡˌerezˈani.|0
sˈifa zˈiwe kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈetu, mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌamewˈeka ndˈani ja mˈojo wa mfˈalme kuˈipa heʃˈima ɲˈumba ja bwˈana ˌilijˈoko jˌerusalˈemu, kwa nˈamna hˌii.|0
ambˈaje ˌamenˌioŋɡezˈea kibˈali tʃˈake mbˈele ja mfˈalme, wˌaʃaˈuri wˌake na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa mfˈalme wˌeɲe uwˈezo. kwa kˌuwa mkˈono wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami, nˌiliɟˈipa mˈojo nˌikakusˈaɲa wˈatu walˈio vˌioŋɡˈozi kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli wakwˈee pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌoandˈikwa ambˈao wˌalikˈuɟa pamˈoɟa nˌami kutˈoka babˈeli wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta.|0
wa wazˈao wa fˌinehˈasi, ˌalikˈuwa ɡerʃˈoni; wa wazˈao wa ˌiθamˈari, ˌalikˈuwa dˌaniˈeli; wa wazˈao wa daˈudi, ˌalikˈuwa hatˈuʃi.|0
wa wazˈao wa ʃˌekanˈia; wa wazˈao wa parˈoʃi, ˌalikˈuwa zˌekarˈia, na wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini wˌaliˌoandikˈiʃwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa pˈahaθ moˈabu, ˌalikˈuwa ˌeliˌehoenˈai mwˈana wa zˌerahˈia na wˌanaˈume mˌiambˈili pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa zˈatu, ˌalikˈuwa ʃˌekanˈia mwˈana wa jˌahaziˈeli na wˌanaˈume mˌiatˈatu pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa adˈini, ˌalikˈuwa ebˈedi mwˈana wa jˌonaθˈani na wˌanaˈume hamsˈini pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa elˈamu, ˌalikˈuwa jeʃˈaja mwˈana wa ˌaθalˈia, na wˌanaˈume sabˈini pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa ʃˌefatˈia, ˌalikˈuwa zˌebadˈia mwˈana wa mˌikaˈeli na wˌanaˈume θˌemanˈini pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa joˈabu, ˌalikˈuwa ˌobadˈia mwˈana wa jˌehiˈeli na wˌanaˈume mˌiambˈili kˈuminanˈane pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa bˈani, ˌalikˈuwa ʃˌelomˈiθi mwˈana wa jˌosifˈia na wˌanaˈume mˌiamˈoɟanˌa sitˈini pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa bebˈai, ˌalikˈuwa zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa bebˈai na wˌanaˈume ˌiʃirˈininanˈane pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa azɡˈadi, ˌalikˈuwa jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa hˌakatˈani na wˌanaˈume mˌiamˈoɟana kˈumi pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
wa wazˈao wa ˌadonikˈamu, hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wa mwˈiʃo ambˈao maɟˈina jˈao ni ˌelifelˈeti, jˌeuˈeli, ʃemˈaja na wˌanaˈume sitˈini pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
wa wazˈao wa biɡwˈai, wˌalikˈuwa uθˈai na zakˈuri na wˌanaˈume sabˈini pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
nˌiliwˌakusˈaɲa kwˈeɲe ˈm̩to ˌutirˌirikˈao kˌuelekˈea ahˈava, nˌasi tˌukapˈiɡa kˈambi pˈale sˈiku tˈatu. wakˈati nˌilipˌokaɡˈua kˈati ja wˈatu na mˌakuhˈani, sˌikuwapˈata walˈawi.|0
bˌasi nˌiliwaˈita ˌeliezˈeri, ˌariˈeli, ʃemˈaja, ˌelnaθˈani, jarˈibu, ˌelnaθˈani, naθˈani, zˌekarˈia na mˌeʃulˈamu wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi na jˌojarˈibu na ˌelnaθˈani wˌaliokˈuwa wasˈomi.|0
nˌikawatˈuma kwa ˈido kˌioŋɡˈozi hˌuko kˌasifˈia. nˌiliwˌaambˈia wˌatakˌajomwambˈia ˈido na ndˈuɡu zˈake, wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu hˌuko kˌasifˈia, ˌili wawˈeze kˌutuletˈea wˌahudˈumu kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
kwa sabˈabu mkˈono wa neˈema wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈetu, wˌalitˌuletˈea ʃˌerebˈia, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe uwˈezo kutˈoka wazˈao wa mˈahli mwˈana wa lˈawi, mwˈana wa ˌisraˈeli, na wˈana wa ʃˌerebˈia pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌanaˈume kˈumi na wanˈane.|0
nˌaje hˌaʃabˈia, pamˈoɟa na jeʃˈaja kutˈoka wazˈao wa merˈari na ndˈuɡu zˌake na wˈapwa wˌake wˌanaˈume ˌiʃirˈini.|0
vˌilevˈile wˌalilˈeta wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu mˌiambˈilinˌa iʃirˈini, kikˈundi ambˈatʃo daˈudi na mˌaafˈisa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekiwˈeka kˌusaidˈia walˈawi. wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌoroðˈeʃwa kwa maɟˈina.|0
kˈando ja ˈm̩to ahˈava, hˈapo nˌilitaŋɡˈaza kufˈuŋɡa, ˌili tˌuɟiɲˌeɲekˈeʃe mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na kumwˈomba kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutuɟalˈia safˈari ja amˈani sˌisi na watˈoto wˈetu, pamˈoɟa na mˈali zˈetu zˈote.|0
nˌiliˈona aˈibu kumwˈomba mfˈalme askˈari na wapˈanda farˈasi wa kˌutulˈinda ɲɟiˈani kˌutokˈana na adˈui zˈetu, kwa sabˈabu tˌulikwˈiʃa kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme, mkˈono wa neˈema wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˈuko ɟˌuːja kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌemtafˈuta, lakˈini hasˈira jˌake kˈubwa ni ðˈidi ja wˈote wˌamwatʃˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo tˌulifˈuŋɡa na kumwˈomba mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili, nˌaje ˌakaɟˈibu maˈombi jˈetu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌiliwatˈeŋɡa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakuhˈani kˈumi na wawˈili, pamˈoɟa na ʃˌerebˈia, hˌaʃabˈia na ndˈuɡu zˈao kˈumi.|0
nˌami nˌikawˌapimˈia fˈeða, ðahˈabu na vifˈaa ambˈavjo mfˈalme, wˌaʃaˈuri wˈake, mˌaafˈisa wˌake na ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈepo wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevitˈoa sadˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
nˌiliwˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na vjˈombo hˈivi ni wˈakfu kwa bwˈana. fˈeða na ðahˈabu ni sadˈaka ja hiˈari kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
vˌilindˈeni kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu mpˈaka mtˌakapˌovipˈima ndˈani ja vjˈumba vja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana katˌika jˌerusalˈemu mbˈele ja mˌakuhˈani, vˌioŋɡˈozi na walˈawi pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌakapokˈea fˈeða, ðahˈabu na vjˈombo vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu ambˈavjo vˌilipˈimwa na kˌupelˈekwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu mɟˈini jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tˌuliˈanza safˈari kutˈoka ˈm̩to ahˈava kwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja kˈumi na mbˈili ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza. mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈetu, nˌaje ɲɟiˈani ˌalitulˈinda ðˈidi ja adˈui na wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi.|0
kwa hˈijo tˌuliwasˈili jˌerusalˈemu ambˈapo tˌulipumzˈika kwa sˈiku tˈatu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne, ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌulipˈima fˈeða, ðahˈabu na vjˈombo vˌilivjowˈekwa wˈakfu, tˌukakabˈiði mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa kuhˈani mˌeremˈoθi mwˈana wa urˈia. ˌeleazˈari mwˈana wa fˌinehˈasi ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, pˈia wˌalikuwˈako walˈawi wawˈili, jˌozabˈadi mwˈana wa jeʃˈua na nˌoadˈia mwˈana wa binˈui.|0
kˈila kˈitu kˌilihˌesabˈiwa kwa idˈadi na kupˈimwa kwa uzˈito, nˌao uzˈito wˈote ˌuliandˈikwa wakˈati ˈule.|0
kˈiʃa matˈeka wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamerˈudi kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kwa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mˌafahˈali kˈumi na wawˈili kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote, kondˈoo dˈume tisˈini na sˈita, wˌanakondˈoo sabˈini na sˈaba na mbˈuzi dˈume kˈumi na wawˈili kˌuwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi. hˌii jˈote ˌilikˈuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto kwa bwˈana.|0
pˈia wˌalikabˈiði mˌanaˈibu wa mfˈalme na wˌatawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to frˈati mˌaaɡˈizo ja mfˈalme, ambˈao bˌaadˈaje wˌalitˈoa msaˈada kwa wˈatu na kwa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja mˈambo hˈaja kˌutendˈeka, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌaliniɟˈia na kusˈema, wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, wˌakiwˈemo mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, hˌawakˌuɟitˈeŋɡa na mˌaɟirˈani zˈao katˌika kufˈaɲa mˌatʃukˈizo, kˌama jˈale ja wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaperˈizi, wˌajebˈusi, wˌaamˈoni, wˌamoˈabu, wamˈisri na wˌaamˈori.|0
wˌamewaˈoa baˈaði ja bˈinti zˈao kˌuwa wˌake zˈao na wˌake za wˈana wˈao, nˌao wˌametʃaŋɡˈaɲa taˈifa tˌakatˈifu na wˈatu wˌaliˌowazuŋɡˈuka. nˌao vˌioŋɡˈozi na mˌaafˈisa wˌamekˈuwa mstˈari wa mbˈele katˌika ɲɟˈia hˌii potˈovu.|0
nˌilipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili nˌilirarˈua kˈoti lˈaŋɡu na ɟˈoho lˈaŋɡu, nˌikaziŋɡˈoa ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu na ndˈevu zˈaŋɡu na kukˈeti nˌikiʃaŋɡˈaa.|0
kˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌetetemˈeʃwa na manˈeno ja mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˌusaɲˈika kˌunizuŋɡˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja ˌupotˈovu hˈuu wa hˈao wˈatu wˌaliorˈudi kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani. nˌami nˌilikˈeti pˈale nˌikiʃaŋɡˈaa mpˈaka wakˈati wa ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni.|0
ndˈipo wakˈati wa kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni nˌikainˈuka kutˈoka kˌuɟiðˈili kwˈaŋɡu nikˈiwa na kˈoti na ɟˈoho lˈaŋɡu lˌililˌorarˈuka, nˌikapˈiɡa maɡˈoti mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ikˈiwa ˌimeˌinulˈiwa kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌami nˌikaˈomba: ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌatahajˈari na kuˈona aˈibu kˌukuˌinulˈia ˈuso wˈaŋɡu mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ðˈambi zˈetu zˌimeɟˌikusˈaɲa hˌata kupˈita ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈetu na hatˈia jˈetu ˌimefˈika mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
tokˈea sˈiku za bˈabu zˈetu mpˈaka sˈasa, hatˈia jˈetu ˌimekˈuwa kˈubwa. kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈetu, sˌisi na wafˈalme wˈetu na mˌakuhˈani wˈetu tˌumekˌabilˈiwa na vˈita, utˈumwa, kutˈekwa na kˌuðilˈiwa katˌika mikˈono ja wafˈalme wa kiɡˈeni, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, kwa mˈuda mfˈupi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌamekˈuwa na neˈema kwa kˌutuatʃˈia mabˈaki na kutˈupa mahˈali imˈara katˌika mahˈali pˈake pˌatakatˈifu, hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu wˈetu atˈupa mwˈaŋɡa matʃˈoni pˈetu na ˌunafˈuu katˌika utˈumwa wˈetu.|0
iŋɡˈawa tu watˈumwa, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu hˌaɟatuˈatʃa katˌika kufˈuŋɡwa kwˈetu. ˌametˌuoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma mbˈele ja wafˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi: ˌametˌuɟalˈia maˈiʃa mˈapja kwa kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu na kˌukarabˈati maɡˈofu jˈake, nˌaje ˌametˈupa ukˈuta wa ulˈinzi katˌika jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌunawˈeza kusˈema nˈini baˌada ja hˈili? kwa maˈana tˌumeðarˈau mˌaaɡˈizo.|0
ˌulijˌojatˈoa kˌupitˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako mˌanabˈii ˌuliposˈema: ˈn̩tʃi mnˌajoˌiiŋɡˈia kˌuimilˈiki ni ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijˌotʃafulˈiwa na uˈovu wa wˈatu wˈake. kwa matˈendo jˈao ja mˌatʃukˈizo wˌameiɟˈaza ˈn̩tʃi kwa ˌunaɟˈisi wˌao kutˈoka mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa hˌadi mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kwa hˈijo, msˌiwaˈoze bˈinti zˈenu kwa wˈana wˌao wˈala bˈinti zˈao kwa wˈana wˈenu. msˌitafˈute mkatˈaba wa ˌurafˈiki nˌao kwa wakˈati wowˈote. ndˈipo mtˌakapˌofanikˈiwa na kˈula mˈema ja ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuwaatʃˈia watˈoto wˈenu ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo kˌama urˈiθi wˌao wa milˈele..|0
jˈale jˌalijˌotupˈata ni mˌatokˈeo ja matˈendo jˈetu mabˈaja, pˈia hatˈia jˈetu kˈubwa. hˌata hˈivjo, wˌewe mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌumetˌuaðˈibu kidˈoɡo kulˈiko ðˈambi zˈetu zˌilivjˌostahˈili na ˌumetˈupa mabˈaki kˌama hˈaja.|0
ɟˈe, tˌutavˈuɲɟa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako tˈena na kˌuoˈana na wˈatu ambˈao hufˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo? ɟˈe, hˌutakˈuwa na hasˈira ja kutˈoʃa ɟˈuu jˈetu na kˌutuˌaŋɡamˈiza, bˌila kˌutuatʃˈia mabˈaki wˈala ˌatakˌajenˌusurˈika.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki! lˈeo hˌii tˌumeˈatʃwa kˌama mabˈaki. tˈupo hˈapa mbˈele zˈako na hatˈia jˈetu, iŋɡˈawa katˌika hˈali hˌii hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌanajewˈeza kˌusimˈama mbˈele zˈako.|0
wakˈati ˈezra ˌalipokˈuwa ˌanaˈomba na kˌuuŋɡˈama, hˈuku ˌakilˈia na kˌuɟitˈupa tʃˈini mbˈele ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˌaisraˈeli, wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˌalikˌusaɲˈika kˌumzuŋɡˈuka. nˌao pˈia wˌakalˈia sˈana.|0
kˈiʃa ʃˌekanˈia mwˈana wa jˌehiˈeli, mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa elˈamu, ˌakamwambˈia ˈezra, tˌumekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa kuˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌotuzuŋɡˈuka. lakˈini pamˈoɟa na hˈili, bˈado lˈiko tˌumaˈini kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˈasa na tufˈaɲe aɡˈano mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kˌuwafukˈuza hˈawa wˌanawˈake wˈote pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˈao, kˌuliŋɡˈana na maˈoɲo ja bwˈana wˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na wˈale ambˈao wˌanaoɡˈopa ˈamri za mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. hˈili na lˌifaɲˈike sˌawasˈawa na hˌii ʃerˈia.|0
inˈuka, suˈala hˈili lˈipo mˌikonˈoni mwˈako. sˌisi tˌutauŋɡˈana nˈawe, ˈuwe na ˌuɟasˈiri ˌukatˈende hˈili.|0
bˌasi ˈezra ˌakainˈuka na kˌuwaapˈiʃa mˌakuhˈani vˌioŋɡˈozi, walˈawi na ˌisraˈeli jˈote kufˈaɲa lˈile lˌililokˈuwa lˌimepˌendekˈezwa. nˌao wˌakaˈapa.|0
ndˈipo ˈezra ˌakaondˈoka hˈapo mbˈele ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa jˌehohanˈani mwˈana wa ˌeliaʃˈibu. wakˈati ˌalipokˈuwa hˈapo, hakˈula tʃakˈula wˈala hakˈuɲua mˈaɟi, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌuombolˈeza kuhˈusu kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwa wˈatu wa ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
ndˈipo lˌilipˌotolˈewa taŋɡˈazo jˈuda jˈote na jˌerusalˈemu kwa wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni kˌukusaɲˈika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
jejˈote ambˈaje hˌaŋɡeɟˌitokˈeza kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu ˌaŋɡepotˈeza mˈali jˌake jˈote, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ˌuamˈuzi wa mˌaafˈisa na wazˈee, nˌaje ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌaŋɡefukˈuzwa kutˈoka kˌusaɲˈiko la wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
katˌika mˈuda wa sˈiku tˈatu, wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini wakˈawa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu. kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini ja mwˈezi wa tˈisa, wˈatu wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈeti ndˈani ja uwˈaɲɟa mbˈele ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, wakˈiwa na maɟˈonzi ˈm̩no kwa tukˈio hˌilo na kwa sabˈabu ja mvˈua kˈubwa.|0
ndˈipo kuhˈani ˈezra ˌalipˌosimˈama ˌakawˌaambˈia, mmekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu, ˌm̩meˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni, mkˌaoŋɡezˈea hatˈia ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˈasa tubˈuni kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈenu mkafˈaɲe mapˈenzi jˈake. ɟˌiteŋɡˈeni na mˌataˈifa wˌanaˌowazuŋɡˈuka na wˌake zˈenu wa kiɡˈeni.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote lˌikaɟˈibu kwa saˈuti kˈubwa: ˈuko sˈawa kabˈisa! ni lazˈima tufˈaɲe kˌama ˌunavjosˈema.|0
lakˈini hˈapa pˈana wˈatu wˈeŋɡi na ni wakˈati wa mvˈua, hˈivjo hˌatuwˈezi kˌusimˈama ɲɟˈe. hˌata hˈivjo, ʃaˈuri hˈili hˌaliwˈezi kˌumalizˈika kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌau mbˈili, kwa sabˈabu tˌumefˈaɲa ðˈambi kˈubwa katˌika ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈetu na wafˈaɲe kwa niˈaba ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote. kˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika mˈiɟi jˈetu ambˈaje ˌameˈoa mwanˈamke wa kiɡˈeni ˈaɟe kwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa, akˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wazˈee na wˌaamˈuzi wa kˈila ˈm̩ɟi, hˌadi hasˈira kˈali ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu katˌika ʃaˈuri hˈili ˌitakˌapoˌondolˈewa kwˈetu.|0
jˌonaθˈani mwˈana wa ˌasahˈeli na jazˈeja mwˈana wa tˈikwa pˈeke jˈao, wˌakiˈuŋɡwa mkˈono na mˌeʃulˈamu na ʃˌabeθˈai mlˈawi, n̩dˈio wˌaliopˈiŋɡa ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wa ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa ˌimepˌendekˈezwa. kuhˈani ˈezra ˌakatʃaɡˈua wˌanaˈume wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa, mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˈila mɡawˈaɲo wa ɟamˈaa, nˌao wˈote wˌakatʃˌaɡulˈiwa kwa maɟˈina. katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi wˌalikˈeti kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza mˌaʃaˈuri hˈajo.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wakˈawa wˌamemalˈiza kˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wa mˌakuhˈani, wˌafuatˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni: kutˈoka wazˈao wa jeʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌosadˈaki na ndˈuɡu zˈake: mˌaasˈeja, ˌeliezˈeri, jarˈibu na ɡˌedalˈia.|0
wˈote wˌalitˈoa naðˈiri kwa kˌuandˈika kwa mikˈono jˈao kˌuwafukˈuza wˌake zˈao, kwa hatˈia jˈao, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakatˈoa kondˈoo dˈume kutˈoka kundˈini mwˈake kˌama sadˈaka ja hatˈia..|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa imˈeri: hanˈani na zˌebadˈia.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa harˈimu: mˌaasˈeja, elˈija, ʃemˈaja, jˌehiˈeli na uzˈia.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa paʃˈuri: ˌeliˌoenˈai, mˌaasˈeja, ˌiʃmaˈeli, nˌeθanˈeli, jˌozabˈadi na elˈasa.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa walˈawi: jˌozabˈadi, ʃimˈei, kelˈaja n̩dˈije kelˈita, pˌeθahˈia, jˈuda na ˌeliezˈeri.|0
kutˈoka wˌaimbˈaɟi: ˌeliaʃˈibu. kutˈoka mˌabawˈabu: ʃalˈumu, telˈemu na ˈuri.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli weŋɡˈine: kutˈoka wazˈao wa parˈoʃi: ramˈia, izˈia, malkˈija, mˌijamˈini, ˌeleazˈari, malkˈija na benˈaja.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa elˈamu: mˌatanˈia, zˌekarˈia, jˌehiˈeli, ˈabdi, jˌeremˈoθi na elˈija.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa zˈatu: ˌeliˌoenˈai, ˌeliaʃˈibu, mˌatanˈia, jˌeremˈoθi, zabˈadi na azˈiza.|0
kutˈoka uzˈao wa bebˈai: jˌehohanˈani, hˌananˈia, zabˈai na aθlˈai.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa bˈani: mˌeʃulˈamu, malˈuki, adˈaja, jaʃˈubu, ʃeˈali na jˌeremˈoθi.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa pˈahaθ moˈabu: ˈadna, kelˈali, benˈaja, mˌaasˈeja, mˌatanˈia, bˌezalˈeli, binˈui na manˈase.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa harˈimu: ˌeliezˈeri, iʃˈija, malkˈija, ʃemˈaja, ʃˌimeˈoni.|0
bˌeɲamˈini, malˈuki, na ʃˌemarˈia.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa haʃˈumu: mˌatenˈai, matˈata, zabˈadi, ˌelifelˈeti, jˌeremˈai, manˈase na ʃimˈei.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa bˈani: mˌaadˈai, amrˈamu, uˈeli.|0
benˈaja, bedˈeja, kelˈuhi.|0
vanˈia, mˌeremˈoθi, ˌeliaʃˈibu.|0
mˌatanˈia, mˌatenˈai na jaˈasu.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa binˈui: ʃimˈei.|0
ʃˌelemˈia, naθˈani, adˈaja.|0
mˌaknadebˈai, ʃaʃˈai, ʃarˈai.|0
ˌazarˈeli, ʃˌelemˈia, ʃˌemarˈia.|0
ʃalˈumu, ˌamarˈia na josˈefu.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa nˈebo: jˌeiˈeli, mˌatiθˈia, zabˈadi, zebˈina, jadˈai, joˈeli na benˈaja.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni, na baˈaði jˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezˈaa nˌao watˈoto.|0
manˈeno ja nˌehemˈia mwˈana wa hˌakalˈia: katˌika mwˈezi wa kislˈeu katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini, wakˈati nˌilikˈuwa ŋɡomˈeni katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la ʃuʃˈani.|0
hanˈani, mmˈoɟa wa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, ˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka jˈuda akˈiwa na wˈatu weŋɡˈine, nˌami nˌikawˌaulˈiza kuhˈusu mabˈaki ja wˌajahˈudi wˈale wˌaliˌonusurˈika kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni na pˈia kuhˈusu jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌakanˌiambˈia, wˈale wˌaliˌonusurˈika kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, wˈale ambˈao wˌamerˈudi kwˈeɲe lˈile ɟˈimbo, wˈako katˌika taˈabu kˈubwa na aˈibu. ukˈuta wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌumebomˈoka, na malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌametʃˈomwa mˈoto.|0
nˌilipˌosikˈia mˈambo hˈaja, nˌilikˈeti, nˌikalˈia. kwa sˈiku kaðˈaa nˌiliˌombolˈeza na kufˈuŋɡa na kuˈomba mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikasˈema: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, m̩kˈuu na mwˌeɲe kˌuoɡˈofja, ambˈaje hˌuliʃˈika aɡˈano lˈake la upˈendo na wˈale wˌampendˈao na kutˈii ˈamri zˈake.|0
tˈeɡa mˌasikˈio jˈako, na ˌufuŋɡˈue mˈatʃo jˈako, ˌili ˌusikˈie maˈombi ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanajoˈomba mbˈele jˈako usˈiku na mtʃˈana kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli. nˌinauŋɡˈama ðˈambi zˈetu sˌisi wˌaisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na zˈaŋɡu na za ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, tˌulizotˈenda ðˈidi jˈako.|0
tˌumetˈenda uˈovu sˈana mbˈele zˈako. hˌatukutˈii ˈamri, mˌaaɡˈizo na ʃerˈia ˌulizˈompa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
kumbˈuka aɡˈizo ˌulilˈompa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌukisˈema, kˌama mkikˈosa ˌuaminˈifu, nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
lakˈini mkˌinirudˈia na kutˈii ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, ndˈipo hˌata kˌama wˈatu wˈenu walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni wˈako mbˈali sˈana katˌika miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa kutˈoka hˌuko na kˌuwalˈeta mahˈali ambˈapo nˌimepˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuwa makˈao kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu..|0
hˈawa ni wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako na wˈatu wˈako, ˌuliˌowakombˈoa kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako kˈuu na mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tˈeɡa sikˈio lˈako na ˌusikˈie maˈombi ja hˈuju mtumˈiʃi wˈako, na maˈombi ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌanaˌofurahˈia kˌuliheʃˈimu ɟˈina lˈako. nˈipe lˈeo, mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako, mˌafanikˈio kwa kunˈipa kibˈali mbˈele ja ˈm̩tu hˈuju. kwa maˈana nˌilikˈuwa mɲueʃˈaɟi wa mfˈalme.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa nisˈani mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta, wakˈati divˈai ˌilipolˈetwa kwˈake, nˌiliˌitʃukˈua na kˈumpa mfˈalme. sˌikuwˈahi kˌuonekˈana mwˌeɲe huzˈuni mbˈele jˌake kˈabla ja hˈapo.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakanˌiulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˈuso wˈako ˌunaˌonekˈana ˈuna huzˈuni wakˈati wˌewe si mɡˈoɲɟua? ɟˈambo hˈili si kˈitu kiŋɡˈine bˌali ni huzˈuni ja mˈojo. nˌilioɡˈopa sˈana.|0
lakˈini nˌikamwambˈia mfˈalme, mfˈalme na aˈiʃi milˈele! kwa nˈini ˈuso wˈaŋɡu usˈiwe na huzˈuni wakˈati ˈm̩ɟi wˌalipozˈikwa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu ˌumebˈaki maɡˈofu, na malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌametˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
mfˈalme ˌakanˌiambˈia, ɟˈe, hˈaɟa jˈako ni ɡˈani? ndˈipo nˌikaˈomba kwa mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
na nˌikamɟˈibu mfˈalme, kˌama ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme, na kˌama mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamepˈata kibˈali matʃˈoni pˈake, ˌanitˈume kˈule ˈm̩ɟi wa jˈuda, mahˈali bˈaba zˈaŋɡu wˌalipozˈikwa, ˌili niwˈeze kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme, na malkˈia akˈiwa ˌamekˈeti karˈibu nˈaje, ˌakanˌiulˈiza, safˈari jˈako ˌitatʃukˈua mˈuda ɡˈani, nˌawe ˌutarˈudi lˈini? ˌilimpendˈeza mfˈalme kˌunitˈuma, kwa hˈijo nˌikapˈaŋɡa mˈuda.|0
pˈia nˌikamwambˈia, kˌama ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme, naˈomba nipˈewe barˈua kwa wˌatawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja frˈati, ˌili wanˈipe ulˈinzi mpˈaka nifˈike jˈuda.|0
naˈomba nipˈewe barˈua nˌipelˈeke kwa asˈafu, mtunzˈaɟi wa msˈitu wa mfˈalme, ˌili anˈipe mˈiti ja kˌuteŋɡenˈeza borˈiti kwa aɟˈili ja malˈaŋɡo ja ŋɡˈome ja hekˈalu, na ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi, na makˈao jˈaŋɡu nˌitakˌapoˈiʃi. kwa kˌuwa mkˈono wˌeɲe neˈema wa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, mfˈalme ˌakanˌiɟalˈia ˈombi lˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi nˌiliˈenda kwa wˌatawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja frˈati na kuwˈapa barˈua za mfˈalme. pˈia mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈuma mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi na askˈari wapˈanda farˈasi pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
sˌanbalˈati mhorˈoni na tobˈia afˈisa mwamˈoni wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌaliuðˈika sˈana kwˌamba ˌamekˈuɟa ˈm̩tu kˌuinˈua ustˈawi wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
nˌiliˈenda jˌerusalˈemu, na baˌada ja kukˈaa hˌuko sˈiku tˈatu.|0
nˌikaondˈoka wakˈati wa usˈiku pamˈoɟa na wˈatu watʃˈatʃe. sikˈuwa nˌimemwambˈia ˈm̩tu jejˈote kˈile ambˈatʃo mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈeka mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kufˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja jˌerusalˈemu. hˌapakuwˈepo na mɲˈama jejˈote pamˈoɟa nˌami ˌisipokˈuwa jˈule nˌilijekˈuwa nˌimempˈanda.|0
nˌikatˈoka ɲɟˈe usˈiku kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la bondˈeni, kˌuelekˈea kisˈima tʃa ɟˈoka na lˈaŋɡo la samˈadi, nˌikikaɡˈua kˈuta za jˌerusalˈemu zˌilizokˈuwa zˌimebˌomolˈewa, na malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌalijokˈuwa jˌametˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaˌelekˈea mpˈaka lˈaŋɡo la tʃemtʃˈemi na bwˈawa la mfˈalme, lakˈini hˌapakuwˈepo nafˈasi ja kutˈoʃa kwa aɟˈili ja mɲˈama wˈaŋɡu kupˈita.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikapandˈia bondˈeni usˈiku nˌikikaɡˈua ukˈuta. mwiʃˈoni nˌikarˈudi na kˌuiŋɡˈia tˈena kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la bondˈeni.|0
mˌaafˈisa hˌawakuɟˈua nˌilikokwˈenda wˈala nˌilitʃokˈuwa nˌikifˈaɲa, kwa sabˈabu mpˈaka sˈasa nˌilikˈuwa bˈado sˌiɟasˈema lolˈote kwa wˌajahˈudi, wˈala mˌakuhˈani, wˈala wakˈuu, wˈala mˌaafˈisa, wˈala ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌaŋɡefˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
ndˈipo nˌilipˌowaambˈia, mnaˈona taˈabu tulˈijo nˈajo: jˌerusalˈemu ˌimebˈaki maɡˈofu na malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌametˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. ɲɟoˈoni tuɟˈeŋɡe ˈupja ukˈuta wa jˌerusalˈemu, nˌasi hˌatutakˈuwa tˈena katˌika aˈibu hˌii.|0
pˈia nˌiliwˌaambˈia kuhˈusu mkˈono wˌeɲe neˈema wa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌuliokˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, na kˈile mfˈalme ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamenˌiambˈia. wˌakaɟˈibu, hˈaja! tuˈanze kuɟˈeŋɡa tˈena. kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈanza kˈazi hˌii ɲɟˈema.|0
lakˈini sˌanbalˈati mhorˈoni, tobˈia afˈisa mwamˈoni, na ɡeʃˈemu mwarˈabu wˌalipˌosikˈia kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili, wˌalitˌuðihˈaki na kˌututʃˈeka. wˌakaulˈiza, ni nˈini hˈiki mnˌatʃokifˈaɲa? ɟˈe, mnaˈasi ðˈidi ja mfˈalme.|0
nˌikawaɟˈibu kwa kusˈema, mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni ˌatatˌufanikˈiʃa. sˌisi wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake tˌutaˈanza kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja, lakˈini kwˈenu nˈiɲi, hˈamna sehˈemu wˈala dˈai lolˈote wˈala kˌumbukˈumbu la hˈaki katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌeliaʃˈibu kuhˈani m̩kˈuu na mˌakuhˈani wenzˈake wˌalikwˈenda kufˈaɲa kˈazi na kˌuliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja lˈaŋɡo la kondˈoo. wˌaliliwˈeka wˈakfu na kuwˈeka milˈaŋɡo mahˈali pˈake, wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa hˌadi kˌufikˈia mnˈara wa mˈia, ambˈao wˌaliuwˈeka wˈakfu hˌadi mnˈara wa hˌananˈeli.|0
wˈatu wa jerˈiko wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa sehˈemu zˌilizˌopakˈana nˈao, nˌaje zakˈuri mwˈana wa ˈimri ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa karˈibu nˈao.|0
lˈaŋɡo la samˈaki lˌiliɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja na wˈana wa hˌasenˈaa. wˌaliwˈeka borˈiti zˈake, na wˌakawˈeka milˈaŋɡo jˌake na mˌakomˈeo na nˈondo.|0
mˌeremˈoθi mwˈana wa urˈia, mwˈana wa hakˈosi, ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia. baˌada jˌake mˌeʃulˈamu mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia, mwˈana wa mˌeʃezabˈeli, ˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati na ˌalijˌemfuatˈia ni sadˈoki mwˈana wa baˈana.|0
sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia ˌilikˌarabatˈiwa na wˈatu kutˈoka tekˈoa, lakˈini wakˈuu wˌao wˌalikatˈaa kufˈaɲa kˈazi tʃˈini ja wˌasimamˈizi wˈao.|0
lˈaŋɡo la jeʃˈana lˌilikˌarabatˈiwa na jojˈada mwˈana wa pasˈea, na mˌeʃulˈamu mwˈana wa bˌesodˈeja. wˌaliwˈeka borˈiti zˈake, na wˌakawˈeka milˈaŋɡo, mˌakomˈeo na nˈondo.|0
karˈibu nˌao ˌukarabˈati ˌulifˈaɲua na wˈatu kutˈoka ɡˌibeˈoni na mˈispa, jaˈani melˈati mɡˌibeˈoni, na jadˈoni mmˌeronˈoθi, sehˈemu hˈizi zikˈiwa tʃˈini ja mamlˈaka ja mtawˈala wa ŋɡˈambo ja frˈati.|0
ˌuziˈeli mwˈana wa harhˈaja, mmˈoɟa wa mˌasonˈara, ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia, nˌaje hˌananˈia mmˈoɟa wa wˌateŋɡˌenezˈaɟi marˈaʃi ˌakakˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia. wˌalitˌeŋɡenˈeza jˌerusalˈemu mpˈaka kˌufikˈia ukˈuta mpˈana.|0
refˈaja mwˈana wa hˈuri, mtawˈala wa nˈusu ja wilˈaja ja jˌerusalˈemu, ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia.|0
kˌupakˈana na sehˈemu hˌii, jedˈaja mwˈana wa hˌarumˈafu ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijokˈuwa mkabˈala na ɲˈumba jˈake, nˌaje hatˈuʃi mwˈana wa hˌaʃabnˈea ˌakakˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia.|0
malkˈija mwˈana wa harˈimu, na haʃˈubu mwˈana wa pˈahaθ moˈabu wˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine pamˈoɟa na mnˈara wa mˌatanˈuru.|0
ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa hˌalohˈeʃi, mtawˈala wa nˈusu ja wilˈaja ja jˌerusalˈemu, ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijˌofuatˈia ˌakisˌaidˈiwa na bˈinti zˈake.|0
lˈaŋɡo la bondˈeni lˌilikˌarabatˈiwa na hanˈuni na wakˈazi wa zanˈoa. wˌaliliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja, na kuwˈeka milˈaŋɡo jˌake na mˌakomˈeo na nˈondo mahˈali pˈake. pˈia wˌalikˌarabˈati ukˈuta wˌeɲe urˈefu wa mˈita mˌiaˈn̩nenˌa hamsˈini hˌadi lˈaŋɡo la samˈadi.|0
lˈaŋɡo la samˈadi lˌilikˌarabatˈiwa na malkˈija mwˈana wa rekˈabu, mtawˈala wa wilˈaja ja bˈeθ hˌakerˈemu. ˌaliliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja, na kuwˈeka milˈaŋɡo jˈake, na mˌakomˈeo na nˈondo.|0
lˈaŋɡo la tʃemtʃˈemi lˌilikˌarabatˈiwa na ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa kolhˈoze, mtawˈala wa wilˈaja ja mˈispa. ˌaliliɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja, ˌakalˌiezˈeka na kuwˈeka milˈaŋɡo jˈake, na mˌakomˈeo na nˈondo mahˈali pˈake. pˈia ˌalikˌarabˈati ukˈuta wa bwˈawa la sˌiloˈamu karˈibu na bustˈani ja mfˈalme, hˌadi kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi zˌinazoʃˈuka kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi.|0
baˌada jˈake, nˌehemˈia mwˈana wa azbˈuki, mtawˈala wa nˈusu ja wilˈaja ja bˈeθ sˈuri, ˌalikˌarabˈati kˌufikˈia mkabˈala na mˌakabˈuri ja daˈudi, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe bwˈawa lˌililˌoteŋɡenˈezwa, na kˌufikˈia ɲˈumba ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa.|0
baˌada jˈao, ezˈeri mwˈana wa jeʃˈua, mtawˈala wa mˈispa, ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine, kˌuanzˈia ˈile sehˈemu ˌinajˌotazamˈana na mwinˈuko wa kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe ɣˈala la kˌuhifaðˈia silˈaha, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe pˈembe ja ukˈuta.|0
baˌada jˈake, barˈuku mwˈana wa zakˈai ˌalikˌarabˈati kwa bidˈii sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine kˌuanzˈia ˈile pˈembe, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲˈumba ja ˌeliaʃˈibu kuhˈani m̩kˈuu.|0
baˌada jˈao bˌeɲamˈini na haʃˈubu wˌalikˌarabˈati mbˈele ja ɲˈumba zˈao, na baˌada jˈao ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja, mwˈana wa ˌananˈia ˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati kˈando ja ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
baˌada jˈake, binˈui mwˈana wa hˌenadˈadi ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine, kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja ˌazarˈia mpˈaka kwˈeɲe pˈembe ja ukˈuta.|0
nˌaje palˈali, mwˈana wa uzˈai ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa sehˈemu ˌilijokˈuwa mkabˈala na pˈembe ja ukˈuta, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mnˈara wa ɟˈuu ambˈao ˌunaɟˌitokˈeza kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, kˈando ja ˈua wa walˈinzi. baˌada jˈake, pedˈaja mwˈana wa parˈoʃi.|0
na wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu wˌalioˈiʃi ɟˌuːja kilˈima tʃa ofˈeli wˌalikˌarabˈati hˌadi kˌufikˈia mkabˈala na lˈaŋɡo la mˈaɟi, kˌuelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki na ˈule mnˈara ˌuliˌoɟitokˈeza.|0
baˌada jˈao, wˈatu wa tekˈoa wˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine, kˌuanzˈia mnˈara mkˈubwa ˌutokezˈao hˌadi ukˈuta wa ofˈeli.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati ɟˌuːja lˈaŋɡo la farˈasi, kˈila mmˈoɟa mbˈele ja ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
baˌada jˈao, sadˈoki mwˈana wa imˈeri ˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati mkabˈala na ɲˈumba jˈake. baˌada jˈake, ʃemˈaja mwˈana wa ʃˌekanˈia, mlˈinzi wa lˈaŋɡo la mˌaʃarˈiki, ˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati.|0
baˌada jˈake, hˌananˈia mwˈana wa ʃˌelemˈia, na hanˈuni mwˈana wa sˈita wa salˈafu wˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine. baˌada jˈao, mˌeʃulˈamu mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia ˌalikˌarabˈati sehˈemu ˌilijokˈuwa mkabˈala na ɲˈumba zˌake za kuˈiʃi.|0
mˌasonˈara na wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˌalifˈaɲa ˌukarabˈati kutˈoka tʃˈumba kˌilitʃˈoko ɟˌuːja pˈembe hˌadi lˈaŋɡo la kondˈoo.|0
sˌanbalˈati ˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba tˌulikˈuwa tˌunaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta ˈupja, ˌalikˌasirˈika na akˈawa na utʃˈuŋɡu sˈana. ˌaliwˌaðihˈaki wˌajahˈudi.|0
mbˈele ja rafˈiki zˌake na ɟˈeʃi la sˌamarˈia, ˌakisˈema, hˈawa wˌajahˈudi waɲˈoŋɡe wˌanafˈaɲa nˈini? ɟˈe, wˌatawˈeza kˌuurˌudiʃˈia ukˈuta wˈao? ɟˈe, wˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu? ɟˈe, wˌatawˈeza kˌumalˈiza kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa? ɟˈe, wˌatawˈeza kˌufufˈua mˈawe kutˈoka malˈundo ja vifˈusi jˌalijˌouŋɡˈua hˈivjo.|0
tobˈia mwamˈoni ˌalijekˈuwa upˈande wˌake ˌakasˈema, wˌanatʃˌokiɟˈeŋɡa, hˌata kˌama mbwˈeha ˌaŋɡepˈanda ɟˈuu jˈake, hˈuo ukˈuta wˌao wa mˈawe ˌaŋɡelˌiubomˈoa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌutusikˈie, kwa kˌuwa tˌumeðˌaraulˈiwa. wˌarudiʃˈie mˌatukˈano jˈao kwˈeɲe vˈitʃwa vjˈao weɲˈewe. ˌuwatˈoe ˌili wˈawe ɲˈara katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaliˌowatˈeka.|0
ˌusiˌusitˈiri uˈovu wˈao, wˈala ˌusifˈute ðˈambi zˈao mbˈele zˈako, kwa kˌuwa wˌamewˌatukˈana waɟˈenzi mbˈele.|0
bˌasi tˌuliuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ukˈuta mpˈaka wˈote ˌukafikˈia nˈusu ja kˈimo tʃˈake, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˌalifˈaɲa kˈazi kwa mˈojo wˈote.|0
lakˈini wakˈati sˌanbalˈati, tobˈia, wˌaarˈabu, wˌaamˈoni na wˈatu wa aʃdˈodi wˌalipˌosikˈia kˌuwa ˌukarabˈati wa kˈuta za jˌerusalˈemu ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeˌendelˈea na miˈaɲa ˌilikˈuwa ˌinazˈibwa, wˌalikˌasirˈika sˈana.|0
wˈote wˌalifˈaɲa ʃaˈuri pamˈoɟa kˈuɟa kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu, na kˌutʃotʃˈea mˌatʃafˈuko ðˈidi jˈake.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌakasˈema, ŋɡˈuvu za wˌafaɲakˈazi zˌinapuŋɡˈua, nˈatʃo kifˈusi ni kˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no, kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌatuwˈezi kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja ukˈuta.|0
pˈia adˈui zˈetu wˌalisˈema, kˈabla hˌawaɟaɟˈua ˌau kˌutuˈona, tˌutakˈuwa pˌalepˈale kˌatikˈati jˈao, na tˌutawaˈua na kˌuikomˈeʃa hˈijo kˈazi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌajahˈudi ambˈao wˌaliˈiʃi karˈibu nˌao wˌalikˈuɟa zaˈidi ja mˈara kˈumi na kˌutuambˈia, popˈote mtˌakapˌoelekˈea, wˌatatˌuʃambulˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikawˈeka baˈaði ja wˈatu ɲˈuma ja sehˈemu za tʃˈini za ukˈuta kwˈeɲe sehˈemu zilˈizo wˈazi, nˌikawawˈeka kˌufuatˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao, wakˈiwa na pˈaŋɡa, mikˈuki na pˈinde zˈao.|0
baˌada ja kuˈona hˈali ilˈivjo, nˌikasimˈama na kˌuwaambˈia wakˈuu, mˌaafˈisa na weŋɡˈine wˈote, msˌiwaoɡˈope. mkˌumbukˈeni bwˈana, ambˈaje ni m̩kˈuu mwˌeɲe kˌuoɡˈofja. pˌiɡanˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈuɡu zˈenu, wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu, wˌake zˈenu na ɲˈumba zˈenu.|0
adˈui zˈetu wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba tˌumetambˈua hˈila jˈao, na kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌamevurˈuɡa ʃaˈuri lˈao, sˈote tˌulirˈudi kwˈeɲe ukˈuta, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe kˈazi jˈake.|0
kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ˈile na kˌuendelˈea, nˈusu ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌalifˈaɲa kˈazi ja uɟˈenzi, na nˈusu ɲiŋɡˈine wˌakaʃˈika mikˈuki, ŋɡˈao, pˈinde na dirˈii. mˌaafˈisa wˌaliɟipˈaŋɡa ɲˈuma ja wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda.|0
wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta. wˈale wˌaliobˈeba vifˈaa vja uɟˈenzi wˌalifˈaɲa kˈazi jˈao kwa mkˈono mmˈoɟa, na kuʃˈika silˈaha kwa mkˈono mwiŋɡˈine.|0
na kˈila mɟˈenzi ˌaliɟifˈuŋɡa upˈaŋɡa wˌake upˈande mmˈoɟa akˈiwa ˌanafˈaɲa kˈazi. lakˈini ˈm̩tu wa kupˈiɡa bˌaraɡˈumu ˌalikˈaa pamˈoɟa nˈami.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikawˌaambˈia wakˈuu, mˌaafˈisa na wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote, kˈazi hˌii ni kˈubwa na ˌimeenˈea sehˈemu kˈubwa, nˌasi tˌumetˌawaɲˈika kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa mbˈali na mwenzˈake ɟˌuːja ukˈuta.|0
popˈote mtˌakapˌosikˈia saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu, ɟˌiuŋɡˈeni nˌasi hˌuko. mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌatatˌupiɡanˈia.|0
bˌasi tˌuliˌendelˈea na kˈazi, nˈusu ja wˈatu wˌakiʃˌikilˈia mikˈuki, kˌuanzˈia mawˈio ja ɟˈua hˌadi ɲˈota zˌilipˌoonekˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈuo pˈia nˌiliwˌaambˈia wˈatu, kˈila ˈm̩tu na msˌaidˈizi wˌake wakˈae ndˈani ja jˌerusalˈemu wakˈati wa usˈiku, ˌili wawˈeze kˌutumˈika kˌama walˈinzi wakˈati wa usˈiku, na kufˈaɲa kˈazi wakˈati wa mtʃˈana.|0
mˈimi, wˈala ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, wˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˈala walˈinzi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌami hˌatukuvˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈetu. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na silˈaha jˈake, hˌata ˌalipokwˈenda kutʃˈota mˈaɟi.|0
wakˈati hˈuu wˌanaˈume na wˌake zˈao wˌakalˈia kilˈio kikˈuu ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu zˈao wˌajahˈudi.|0
baˈaði jˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakisˈema, sˌisi na wˈana wˈetu na bˈinti zˈetu tˈuko wˈeŋɡi. ˌili tuwˈeze kˈula na kuˈiʃi, ni lazˈima tupˈate nafˈaka.|0
weŋɡˈine wˌalikˈuwa wˌakisˈema, tˌunawˈeka rehˈani maʃˈamba jˈetu, maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, na ɲˈumba zˈetu ˌili tupˈate nafˈaka wakˈati wa ɲɟˈaa.|0
bˈado kukˈawa na weŋɡˈine wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakisˈema, ˌilitubˈidi tukˈope fˈeða ˌili kulˈipa kˈodi ja mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja maʃˈamba jˈetu na maʃˈamba jˈetu ja mˌizabˈibu.|0
iŋɡˈawa sˌisi ni mwˈili na dˈamu mˈoɟa sˈawa na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu, na iɟˈapo wˈana wˈetu ni wazˈuri kˌama wˈana wˈao, bˈado ˌinatupˈasa kˌuwatˈoa wˈana wˈetu na bˈinti zˈetu kwˈeɲe utˈumwa. baˈaði ja bˈinti zˈetu wˌameʃakˈuwa watˈumwa tajˈari, lakˈini hatˈuna uwˈezo wa kˌuwakombˈoa, kwa sabˈabu maʃˈamba jˈetu na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu jˈetu ni mˈali ja weŋɡˈine.|0
nˌilipˌosikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao na mˌalalamˈiko hˈaja, nˌilikˌasirˈika sˈana.|0
nˌikajˌatafakˈari katˌika akˈili jˈaŋɡu, nˌikiwˌalaˈumu wakˈuu na mˌaafˈisa. nˌikawˌaambˈia, mnˌawaonˈea ndˈuɡu zˈenu kwa kˌuwatˈoza rˈiba! bˌasi nˌikaitˈiʃa mkutˈano mkˈubwa ˌili kˌuwaʃˌuɣulikˈia.|0
