na kusˈema: kˌuliŋɡˈana na uwˈezo wˈetu, tˌumewˌakombˈoa ndˈuɡu zˈetu wˌajahˈudi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˈuzwa kwa wˈatu wˌasiˌoamˈini. sˈasa mnˌawaˈuza ndˈuɡu zˈenu, ˌili waˈuzwe tˈena kwˈetu! wˌaliɲamˈaza kˈimja, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakupˈata tʃotʃˈote tʃa kusˈema.|0
bˌasi nˌikaˌendelˈea kusˈema, mnˌatʃokifˈaɲa si sˈawa. ɟˈe, hˌaikˌuwapˈasa kˌutembˈea katˌika hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌili tˌuepukˈane na ʃutˈuma za adˈui zˈetu wˌasiˌoamˈini.|0
mˌimi na ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu tˌunawˌakopˈeʃa wˈatu fˈeða na nafˈaka. lakˈini ɟˈambo hˈili la kutˈoza rˈiba likˈome.|0
wˌarudˌiʃiˈeni mˈara mˈoɟa maʃˈamba jˈao, maʃˈamba jˈao ja mˌizabˈibu, maʃˈamba jˈao ja mˌizeitˈuni, na ɲˈumba zˈao, pˈia rˈiba jˈao mnˌajowatˈoza na sehˈemu ja fˈuŋɡu la mˈia la fˈeða, nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta.|0
wˌakasˈema, tˌutawˌarudiʃˈia na hˌatutatˈaka kˈitu tʃotʃˈote zaˈidi kutˈoka kwˈao. tˌutafˈaɲa kˌama ˌulivjosˈema. kˈiʃa nˌikawaˈita mˌakuhˈani na kˌuwafˈaɲa wakˈuu na mˌaafˈisa kuˈapa kufˈaɲa kˈile wˌalitʃˌoahˈidi.|0
pˈia nˌikakuŋɡˈuta makˈuɲɟo ja vˈazi lˈaŋɡu na kusˈema, kˈila ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌatatimˈiza ahˈadi hˌii, mˈuŋɡu na ˌamkuŋɡˈute hˈivi kutˈoka ɲˈumba jˌake na katˌika mˈali zˈake. bˌasi ˈm̩tu wa nˈamna hˈijo ˌakuŋɡutˈiwe ɲɟˈe na aˈatʃwe bˌila kˈitu! wˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, mkutˈano wˈote ˌukasˈema, ˈamen, na wˌakamtukˈuza bwˈana. nˌao wˈatu wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌameahˈidi.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, kutˈoka mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini wa mfˈalme ˌartaʃˈasta, wakˈati nˌilipˌoteulˈiwa kˌuwa mtawˈala wˌao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda, mpˈaka mwˈaka wˌake wa θˌelaθˈini na mbˈili, jaˈani miˈaka kˈumi na miwˈili, mˌimi wˈala ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu hˌatukˈula tʃakˈula ambˈatʃo kwa kˌawaˈida hupˈewa wˌatawˈala.|0
lakˈini wˌatawˈala wa mwanzˈoni, wˈale wˌaliˌonitˌaŋɡulˈia, wˌaliwˌalemˈea wˈatu na kˌutʃukˈua kutˈoka kwˈao ʃekˈeli ˌarobaˈini za fˈeða, pamˈoɟa na tʃakˈula na mvˈiɲo. wˌasaidˈizi wˌao pˈia wˌaliɟifˈaɲa wakˈuu ɟˌuːja wˈatu. lakˈini kwa kˌumheʃˈimu mˈuŋɡu sˌikufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
badˈala jˈake, nˌiliɟitˈoa kwa bidˈii katˌika kˈazi ja ukˈuta hˈuu. wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˈote wˌalikˌutanˈika pˈale kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi. hˌatukˌuɟipatˈia ʃˈamba lolˈote.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, wˌajahˈudi na mˌaafˈisa mˌiamˈoɟanˌa hamsˈini wˌalikˈula mezˈani pˈaŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌotuɟˈia kutˈoka mˌataˈifa ɟirˈani.|0
kˈila sˈiku nˌiliˌandalˈiwa maksˈai mmˈoɟa, kondˈoo sˈita wazˈuri, na kˈuku, na mvˈiɲo wa kˈila aˈina kwa wˈiŋɡi kˈila baˌada ja sˈiku kˈumi. lˈitʃa ja mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, sˌikudˈai tʃakˈula kˌilitʃokˈuwa fˈuŋɡu la mtawˈala, kwa sabˈabu madˈai jˌalikˈuwa mazˈito sˈana kwa wˈatu hˈawa.|0
ˌunikumbˈuke kwa faðˈili, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kwa jˈote nˌilijofˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu hˈawa.|0
habˈari zˌilipofˈika kwa sˌanbalˈati, tobˈia, ɡeʃˈemu mwarˈabu, na adˈui zˈetu weŋɡˈine kwˌamba nˌimeɟˈeŋɡa tˈena ukˈuta na hakˈuna nafˈasi ˌilijˌobakˈia ndˈani mwˈake, iŋɡˈawa mpˈaka wakˈati hˈuo sikˈuwa nˌimewˈeka milˈaŋɡo kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo.|0
sˌanbalˈati na ɡeʃˈemu wˌakanˌitumˈia uɟˈumbe hˈuu: ɲɟˈoo, tˌukutˈane katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja viɟˈiɟi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare ja ˈono. lakˈini wˌalikˈuwa wˌakikˌusudˈia kˌuniðˈuru.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliwatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwˈao na maɟˈibu hˈaja: kˈazi nˌinajˌoifˈaɲa ni kˈubwa sˈana, siwˈezi kˈuɟa. kwa nˈini nˌiiˈatʃe kˈazi ˌisimˈame nˈiɟe kwˈenu.|0
mˈara ˈn̩ne wˌalinˌitumˈia uɟˈumbe wa nˈamna ˈijo hˈijo, na kˈila mˈara nˌiliwˈapa ɟˈibu lˈile lˈile.|0
bˈasi, mˈara ja tˈano, sˌanbalˈati ˌakamtˈuma msˌaidˈizi wˌake kwˈaŋɡu akˈiwa na uɟˈumbe wa aˈina ˈile ˈile, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌametʃukˈua mkonˈoni mwˈake barˈua ˌisijofˈuŋɡwa.|0
ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeandˈikwa: habˈari ˌimeenˈezwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˌaje ɡeʃˈemu ˌanasˈema kwˌamba ni kwˈeli, kˌuwa wˌewe na wˌajahˈudi mnafˈaɲa hˈila ja kuˈasi, n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mnaɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, kˌufuatˈana na tˌaarˈifa hˈizi, kˌaribˈuni ˌutakˈuwa mfˈalme wˈao.|0
na hˌata ˌumewˌateˈua mˌanabˈii wafˈaɲe taŋɡˈazo hˈili kˌukuhˈusu wˌewe hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu: jˈuko mfˈalme katˌika jˈuda! sˈasa tˌaarˈifa hˌii ˌitarudˈiʃwa kwa mfˈalme. bˌasi ɲɟˈoo, tufˈaɲe ʃaˈuri pamˈoɟa.|0
nˌilimpˌelekˈea ɟˈibu hˈili: hakˈuna ɟˈambo kˌama hˌilo ˌunalosˈema lˌinalˌofaɲˈika. ˌunalitˈuŋɡa tu kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃˈako.|0
wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiɟarˈibu kˌutuˌoɡopˈeʃa, wˌakifikˈiri hˈivi: mikˈono ja wˈatu ˌitaleɡˈea kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌawatawˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈazi, nˈajo hˌaitˌakamilˈika. lakˈini nˌiliˈomba, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, sˈasa nitˈie mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ŋɡˈuvu.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa nˌilikwˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa ʃemˈaja mwˈana wa delˈaja, mwˈana wa mˌehetabˈeli, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈuŋɡwa ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈake. ˌakasˈema, tˌukutˈane katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, ndˈani ja hekˈalu, na tufˈuŋɡe milˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌanakˈuɟa kˌukuˈua. nˈaam, wˌanakˈuɟa usˈiku kˌukuˈua.|0
lakˈini nˌikasˈema, ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu kˌama mˌimi ˌakimbˈie? ˌau ˈm̩tu kˌama mˌimi aˈende hˌekalˈuni kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake? sˌitakwˈenda.|0
nˌilitambˈua kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu hˌakumtˈuma, bˌali ˌalitabˈiri ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu tobˈia na sˌanbalˈati wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwaɟˈiri.|0
ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌaɟirˈiwa kˌunitˈiʃa ˌili kwa kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili nitˈende ðˈambi, kˈiʃa wawˈeze kˌunihˌaribˈia ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu na kˌuniˌaibˈiʃa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, wˌakumbˈuke tobˈia na sˌanbalˈati kwa sabˈabu ja jˈale wˌalijotˈenda. pˈia kumbˈuka nabˈii ˈm̩ke nˌoadˈia na mˌanabˈii weŋɡˈine ambˈao wˌamekˈuwa wˌakiɟarˈibu kˌunitˈiʃa.|0
bˌasi ukˈuta ˌukakˌamilˈika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano mwˈezi wa elˈuli, kˈazi ambˈajo ˌilitʃukˈua sˈiku hamsˈini na mbˈili.|0
adˈui zˈetu wˈote wˌalipˌosikˈia kuhˈusu hˈili, mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌalijˌotuzuŋɡˈuka jˌakaoɡˈopa na kˌupotˈeza ˌuɟasˈiri, kwa sabˈabu jˌalitambˈua kˌuwa kˈazi hˌii ˌimefaɲˈika kwa msaˈada wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
pˈia katˌika sˈiku hˈizo wakˈuu wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌakitˈuma barˈua ɲˈiŋɡi kwa tobˈia, nˈajo maɟˈibu jˌalijotˈoka kwa tobˈia jˌaliˌendelˈea kˌuwaɟˈia.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˈeŋɡi katˌika jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwapˈia tobˈia, kwˈani ˌalikˈuwa mkwˈewe ʃˌekanˈia mwˈana wa ˈara, na jˌehohanˈani mwanˈawe ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa bˈinti wa mˌeʃulˈamu mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, wˌalikˈuwa wˌakinˌiarˈifu ɟˈinsi tobˈia alˈivjo ˈm̩tu mwˈema, nˌao wˌalimwambˈia kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃosˈema. nˌaje tobˈia ˌalitˈuma barˈua za kˌunitˈiʃa.|0
nˌikamwˈeka hanˈani ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˌerusalˈemu, pamˈoɟa na hˌananˈia ɟˌemadˈari wa ŋɡˈome, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu na mwˌeɲe kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu kulˈiko wˈatu weŋɡˈine.|0
nˌikawˌaambˈia, malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu jˌasifˌuŋɡulˈiwe mpˈaka ɟˈua lˌitakˌapokˈuwa lˌimepˈanda. walˈinzi wa malˈaŋɡo wakˈiwa bˈado kwˈeɲe zˈamu, wˌaamˈuru wafˈuŋɡe milˈaŋɡo na wawˈeke mˌakomˈeo. pˈia wˌateuˈeni weɲˈeɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu wˈawe walˈinzi, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe lˈindo lˈake, na weŋɡˈine karˈibu na ɲˈumba zˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ˈm̩ɟi ˌulikˈuwa mkˈubwa, tˈena wˌeɲe nafˈasi ɲˈiŋɡi, lakˈini wˌalikuwˈepo wˈatu watʃˈatʃe ndˈani jˈake, nˈazo ɲˈumba zˌilikˈuwa bˈado ni maɡˈofu.|0
hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌakawˈeka mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kˌuwakusˈaɲa wakˈuu, mˌaafˈisa na wˈatu wa kˌawaˈida kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuoroðˈeʃwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na ɟamˈaa zˈao. nˌilikˈuta orˈoða ja vizˈazi ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wa kwˈanza kurˈudi tˌoka ˌutumwˈani. hˈaja n̩dˈijo nˌilijokˈuta jˌameandˈikwa hˈumo.|0
wakˈiwa wˌamefˌuatˈana na zˌerubabˈeli, jeʃˈua, nˌehemˈia, ˌazarˈia, rˌaamˈia, nˌahamˈani, mˌordekˈai, bilʃˈani, mˌisperˈeti, biɡwˈai, nehˈumu na baˈana: orˈoða ja wˌanaˈume wa ˌisraˈeli ˌilikˈuwa.|0
wazˈao wa ʃˌefatˈia mˌiatˈatu sabˈininambˈili.|0
wazˈao wa elˈamu mˈoɟa,mˌiambˈili hamsˈininaˈn̩ne.|0
wazˈao wa zˈatu mˌianˈane ˌarobaˈininatˈano.|0
wazˈao wa zakˈai mˌiasˈabanˌa sitˈini.|0
wazˈao wa binˈui mˌiasˈita ˌarobaˈininanˈane.|0
wazˈao wa bebˈai mˌiasˈita ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
wazˈao wa adˈini mˌiasˈita hamsˈininatˈano.|0
wazˈao wa atˈeri kˌupitˈia hˌezekˈia tisˈininanˈane.|0
wazˈao wa haʃˈumu mˌiatˈatu ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
wazˈao wa besˈai mˌiatˈatu ˌiʃirˈininaˈn̩ne.|0
wazˈao wa harˈifu mˌiamˈoɟa kˈuminambˈili.|0
wazˈao wa ɡˌibeˈoni tisˈininatˈano.|0
wˈatu wa bˌeθlehˈemu na netˈofa mˌiamˈoɟa θˌemanˈininanˈane.|0
wˈatu wa ˌanaθˈoθi mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
wˈatu wa kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu, kefˈira na bˌeerˈoθi mˌiasˈaba ˌarobaˈininatˈatu.|0
wˈatu wa rˈama na ɡˈeba mˌiasˈita ˌiʃirˈininamˈoɟa.|0
wˈatu wa beθˈeli na ˈai mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininatˈatu.|0
wazˈao wa harˈimu mˌiatˈatunˌa iʃirˈini.|0
wazˈao wa lˈodi, hadˈidi na ˈono mˌiasˈaba ˌiʃirˈininamˈoɟa.|0
walˈawi: wazˈao wa jeʃˈua kˌupitˈia kˌadmiˈeli kˌupitˈia ɟamˈaa ja hˌodavˈia sabˈininaˈn̩ne.|0
wˌaimbˈaɟi: wazˈao wa asˈafu mˌiamˈoɟa ˌarobaˈininanˈane.|0
mˌabawˈabu wa malˈaŋɡo: wazˈao wa ʃalˈumu, atˈeri, talmˈoni, akˈubu, hatˈita na ʃobˈai mˌiamˈoɟa θˌeleθˈininanˈane.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu: wazˈao wa sˈiha, hasˈufa, tˌabaˈoθi.|0
wazˈao wa besˈai, mˌeunˈimu, nˌefusˈimu.|0
wazˈao wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa sˌolomˈoni: wazˈao wa sotˈai, sˌoferˈeθi, perˈida.|0
wazˈao wa ʃˌefatˈia, hatˈili, pokˈereθ hˌasebaˈimu na amˈoni.|0
wˌafuatˈao wˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja tˈel mˈela, tˈel hˈarʃa, kerˈubu, adˈoni na imˈeri, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuθibitˈiʃa kwˌamba ɟamˈaa zˈao zˌilikˈuwa uzˈao wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
na kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakuhˈani: wazˈao wa hobˈaja, hakˈosi na bˌarzilˈai ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamemwˈoa bˈinti wa bˌarzilˈai, mɡˌileˈadi, nˌaje ˌakaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina hˈilo.|0
wˌalikˈuwa na farˈasi mˌiasˈaba θˌeleθˈininasˈita, ɲˈumbu mˌiambˈili ˌarobaˈininatˈano.|0
ŋɡamˈia mˌiaˈn̩ne θˌeleθˈininatˈano na pˈunda sˈita,mˌiasˈabanˌa iʃirˈini.|0
baˈaði ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa wˌalitʃaŋɡˈia kˈazi ja uɟˈenzi. mtawˈala ˌalikabˈiði kwˈeɲe hazˈina darkˈoni mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, mˌabakˈuli hamsˈini, na mavˈazi mˌiatˈanonˌa θeleθˈini kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani.|0
ɟˈumla ja mˌatolˈeo ja wˈatu weŋɡˈine jˌalikˈuwa ni darkˈoni ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za ðahˈabu, mˈane mbˈili,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða, na mavˈazi sitˈini na sˈaba ja mˌakuhˈani.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌakakˌusaɲˈika kˌama ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa mbˈele ja lˈaŋɡo la mˈaɟi. wˌakamwambˈia ˈezra mwandˈiʃi alˈete kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈose, ambˈatʃo bwˈana ˌaliamˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, kuhˈani ˈezra ˌakalˈeta ʃerˈia mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko, ambˈamo wˌalikuwˈamo wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliowˈeza kˌufahˈamu.|0
ˌakaisˈoma kwa saˈuti kˈubwa ʃˈu mˌapambazˈuko mpˈaka ˌaðuhˈuri, akˈiwa ˌameˌuelekˈea uwˈaɲɟa ˌuliokˈuwa mbˈele ja lˈaŋɡo la mˈaɟi mbˈele ja wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na weŋɡˈine ambˈao wˌaliwˈeza kˌufahˈamu. wˈatu wˈote wˌakasˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini kˈile kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia.|0
mwandˈiʃi ˈezra ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama ɟˌuːja ɟukwˈaa la mˈiti lˌililoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa kusˈudi hˈilo. karˈibu nˌaje upˈande wa kuˈume ˌalisimˈama mˌatiθˈia, ʃˈema, anˈaja, urˈia, hilkˈia na mˌaasˈeja. upˈande wˌake wa kuʃˈoto wˌalikuwˈepo pedˈaja, mˌiʃaˈeli, malkˈija, haʃˈumu, hˌaʃbadˈani, zˌekarˈia na mˌeʃulˈamu.|0
ˈezra ˌakakˌifuŋɡˈua kˈile kitˈabu. wˈatu wˈote wˌaliwˈeza kumwˈona kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama ɟˈuu zaˈidi, nˌaje ˌalipˌokifuŋɡˈua wˈatu wˈote wˌakasimˈama.|0
ˈezra ˌakamsˈifu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu, nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakainˈua mikˈono jˈao na kˌuitikˈia, ˈamen! ˈamen! kˈiʃa wˌakasuɟˈudu na kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana hˈali ɲˈuso zˈao zˌikiɡˈusa ˈarði.|0
wˈatu wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama pˈale, walˈawi wˌafuatˈao wˌaliwafˈunza ˈile ʃerˈia: jeʃˈua, bˈani, ʃˌerebˈia, jamˈini, akˈubu, ʃˌabeθˈai, hodˈia, mˌaasˈeja, kelˈita, ˌazarˈia, jˌozabˈadi, hanˈani na pelˈaja.|0
wˌalisˈoma kutˈoka kˈile kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu, wˌakiˌifafanˈua na kuwˈapa mˌaelˈezo ˌili wˈatu wawˈeze kˌufahˈamu kˈile kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌikisˈomwa.|0
nˌehemˈia ˌakasˈema, nendˈeni mkˌafurahˈie tʃakˈula kizˈuri na vˌiɲuˈaɟi vitˈamu, na mpelˈeke sehˈemu kwa wˈale ambˈao hawˈana tʃotʃˈote tʃa kˈula. sˈiku hˌii ni tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana. msˌihuzunˈike, kwa kˌuwa furˈaha ja bwˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu.|0
walˈawi wˌakawˌatulˈiza wˈatu wˈote wˌakisˈema, kuwˈeni wˌatulˈivu, kwa kˌuwa hˌii ni sˈiku tˌakatˈifu. msˌihuzunˈike.|0
kˈiʃa wˈatu wˈote wˌakaondˈoka kwˈenda kˈula na kˈuɲua, na kˌupeˈana sehˈemu ja tʃakˈula, na wˌakaˌaðimˈiʃa kwa furˈaha kˈubwa, kwa sabˈabu sˈasa wˌalifahˈamu manˈeno jˈale wˌalijokˈuwa wˌameelˈezwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja pˈili ja mwˈezi, wakˈuu wa mbˈari zˈote, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, wˌalikˌusaɲˈika wˌakimzuŋɡˈuka ˈezra mwandˈiʃi ˌili wapˈate kˌusikilˈiza kwa makˈini manˈeno ja ʃerˈia.|0
wˌakakˈuta ˌimeandˈikwa katˌika ˈile ʃerˈia, ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliˌiamˈuru kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose, kwˌamba wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˈaswa kukˈaa katˌika vibˈanda wakˈati wa sˌikukˈuu ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba.|0
na kwˌamba wˌalipˈaswa kˌutaŋɡˈaza nˈeno hˈili na kˌulienˈeza katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu wˌakisˈema: ˌenendˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mlˈima na kulˈeta matˈawi kutˈoka mˈiti ja mˌizeitˈuni, mˌizeitˈuni mwˈitu, mˌihadˈasi, mitˈende na mˈiti ja kivˈuli, ˌili kˌuteŋɡenˈeza vibˈanda, kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa.|0
bˌasi wˈatu wˌakaˈenda na kulˈeta matˈawi, nˌao wˌakaɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea vibˈanda ɟˌuːja pˈaa za ɲˈumba zˈao, katˌika ɲˈua zˈao, katˌika ɲˈua za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, na katˌika uwˈaɲɟa karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la mˈaɟi na uwˈaɲɟa wa lˈaŋɡo la ˌefraˈimu.|0
ɟamˈii jˈote ja wˈatu wˌaliorˈudi kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa vibˈanda na kuˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake. ʃˈu wakˈati wa joʃˈua mwˈana wa nˈuni mpˈaka sˈiku ˈile, wˌaisraˈeli hˌawakuwˈahi kˌuiˌaðimˈiʃa nˈamna hˌii. furˈaha jˈao ˌilikˈuwa kˈubwa sˈana.|0
sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ja kwˈanza hˌadi ja mwˈiʃo, ˈezra ˌalisˈoma kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈile kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu. wˌakaˌiaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ˈile kwa sˈiku sˈaba, nˈajo sˈiku ja nˈane, kˌufuatˈana na mˌaaɡˈizo, kˌulikˈuwa na kˌusaɲˈiko maˈalum.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi ˈule ˈule, wˌaisraˈeli wˌalikˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa, wˌakifˈuŋɡa na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia na kˌuɟitˈia mavˈumbi vitʃwˈani m̩wˈao.|0
wˈale wa uzˈao wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliɟitˈeŋɡa na waɡˈeni wˈote. wˌakasimˈama mahˈali pˈao, na kˌuuŋɡˈama ðˈambi zˈao na uˈovu wa bˈaba zˈao.|0
wˌakasimˈama pˈale wˌalipokˈuwa, wˌakasˈoma kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈile kitˈabu tʃa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao kwa mˈuda wa rˈobo sˈiku, na wˌakatumˈia rˈobo ɲiŋɡˈine kwa kˌuuŋɡˈama ðˈambi na kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
walˈawi wˌafuatˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi: jeʃˈua, bˈani, kˌadmiˈeli, ʃˌebanˈia, bˈuni, ʃˌerebˈia, bˈani na kenˈani. hˈawa wˌalimlilˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao kwa saˈuti kˈubwa.|0
nˌao walˈawi jeʃˈua, kˌadmiˈeli, bˈani, hˌaʃabnˈea, ʃˌerebˈia, hodˈia, ʃˌebanˈia na pˌeθahˈia wˌakasˈema: sˌimamˈeni mkamsˈifu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, jˌeje ambˈaje ni mˈuŋɡu ʃˈu milˈele hˌata milˈele. lˌibarikˈiwe ɟˈina lˈake tukˈufu, lˌitukˈuzwe ɟˌuːja barˈaka zˈote na sˈifa.|0
wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ndˈiwe bwˈana. ˌuliziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu, hˌata mbˈiŋɡu za mbˈiŋɡu na ɟˈeʃi lˈote la mbiŋɡˈuni, dunˈia na vjˈote vilˈivjo ndˈani jˈake, na pˈia bahˈari na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake. huvˈipa vˈitu vjˈote uhˈai, nˈalo ɟˈeʃi la mbiŋɡˈuni lˌinakˌuabˈudu wˈewe.|0
wˌewe ni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌulijˌemtʃaɡˈua abrˈamu na kumtˈoa kutˈoka ˈuru ja wˌakaldˈajo, nˌawe ˌukamwˈita ˌabrahˈamu.|0
ˌuliˈona kˌuwa mˈojo wˌake ni mwˌaminˈifu kwˈako, nˌawe ˌukafˈaɲa aɡˈano nˌaje kuwˈapa wazˈao wˌake ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakanaˈani, wahˈiti, wˌaamˈori, wˌaperˈizi, wˌajebˈusi na wˌaɡirɡˈaʃi. ˌumetimˈiza ahˈadi jˈako kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
ˌuliˈona matˈeso ja bˈaba zˈetu hˌuko mˈisri, ˌukasikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao hˌuko bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
ˌulitˈuma iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu ðˈidi ja farˈao, ðˈidi ja mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈake, kwa kˌuwa ˌulifahˈamu ɟˈinsi wamˈisri wˌalivjˌowafaɲˈia ˌufiðˈuli. ˌukaɟˌifaɲˈia ɟˈina lˌinalodˈumu hˌadi lˈeo.|0
ˌukaɡˈawa bahˈari mbˈele jˈao, ˌili wawˈeze kupˈita kˌatikˈati jˌake pˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu, lakˈini ˌuliwatˈupa wamˈisri wˌaliˌowafˌuatilˈia katˌika vilˈindi, kˌama ɟˈiwe kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi.|0
mtʃˈana ˌuliwˌaoŋɡˈoza kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu, na usˈiku kwa ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto kˌuwamˌulikˈia ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌowapˈasa kˌuiendˈea.|0
ˌuliʃˈuka katˌika mlˈima sinˈai, ˌukanˈena nˌao kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni. ˌuliwˈapa maʃˈarti na ʃerˈia zˈile ambˈazo ni za kwˈeli na hˈaki, pˈia ˈamri na mˌaaɡˈizo mazˈuri.|0
ˌuliwˌafahamˈiʃa sabˈato jˈako tˌakatˈifu na ˌukawˈapa ˈamri, mˌaaɡˈizo na ʃerˈia kˌupitˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako mˈose.|0
katˌika ɲɟˈaa jˈao ˌuliwˈapa mkˈate kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, na katˌika kˈiu jˈao ˌuliwˌatolˈea mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mwˈamba. ˌuliwˌaambˈia wˌaiŋɡˈie na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeˈapa kuwˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa.|0
lakˈini wˈao, bˈaba zˈetu, wakˈawa na kibˈuri na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu, nˌao hˌawakutˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
wˌakakatˈaa kˌusikilˈiza na kuʃˈindwa kˌukumbˈuka mˌiuɟˈiza ˌulijˌoifˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. wakˈawa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu, na katˌika uˈasi wˌao wˌakamtʃaɡˈua kˌioŋɡˈozi ˌili warˈudi kwˈeɲe utˈumwa wˈao. lakˈini wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe kˌusamˈehe, mwˌeɲe neˈema na mwˈiŋɡi wa hurˈuma, si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira, ni mwˈiŋɡi wa upˈendo. kwa hˈijo hˌukuwaˈatʃa.|0
hˌata wakˈati wˌaliɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea sanˈamu ja ndˈama ja kusˈubu na kusˈema, hˈuju ni mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˌalijˌewapandˈiʃa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ˌau wˌalipofˈaɲa mˌakufˈuru makˈubwa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja hurˈuma zˈako kˈuu hˌukuwaˈatʃa ɟaŋɡwˈani. wakˈati wa mtʃˈana ˈile ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu hˌaikukˈoma kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈao, wˈala ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoto hˌaikuˈatʃa kˌuwamˌulikˈia usˈiku ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌowapˈasa kˌuiendˈea.|0
ˌuliwˈapa rˈoho wˈako mwˈema ˌili kˌuwafundˈiʃa. hˌukuwaɲˈima mˈana jˈako vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao, nˌawe ˌukawˈapa mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja kˈiu jˈao.|0
kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini ˌuliwatˈunza ɟaŋɡwˈani. hˌawakukˈosa tʃotʃˈote, na ŋɡˈuo zˈao hˌazikˌutʃakˈaa wˈala miɡˈuu jˈao hˌaikuvˈimba.|0
ˌuliwˈapa fˈalme na mˌataˈifa, ˌukiwˌaɡawˈia hˌata mipˈaka ja mbˈali. wˌakaˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ja sihˈoni mfˈalme wa heʃbˈoni, na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani.|0
ˌuliwafˈaɲa wˈana wˌao kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani, nˌawe ˌukawalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ˌuliwˌaambˈia bˈaba zˈao kˌuiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki.|0
wˈana wˌao wˌakaiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi. ˌuliwˌatiˈiʃa wˌakanaˈani mbˈele jˈao, wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌukawatˈia wˌakanaˈani mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme wˌao na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi, wˌawafaɲˈie kˌama wˌapendˈavjo.|0
wˌakatˈeka mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe rutˈuba, wˌakamilˈiki ɲˈumba zˌilizoɟˈazwa na vˈitu vizˈuri vja kˈila aˈina, visˈima vˌilivjotʃˈimbwa tajˈari, maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, maʃˈamba ja mˌizeitˈuni na mˈiti jˌeɲe matˈunda kwa wˈiŋɡi. wakˈala, wˌakaʃˈiba nˌao wˌakanawˈiri sˈana, wˌakaɟˌifurahˈiʃa katˌika wˈema wˈako mwˈiŋɡi.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌukutˈii nˌao wˌakaˈasi ðˈidi jˈako, wˌakatˈupa ʃerˈia zˈako ɲˈuma jˈao. wˌakawaˈua mˌanabˈii wˈako, wˌaliˌowaˈoɲa ˌili wˌakurudˈie, na wˌakafˈaɲa mˌakufˈuru makˈubwa.|0
hˈivjo ˌukawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao, ambˈao wˌaliwatˈesa. lakˈini wˌalipotˈeswa, wˌakakˌulilˈia wˈewe. kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌuliwˌasikˈia, nˌawe kwa hurˈuma zˈako kˈuu ˌukawˈapa wˌaokˈozi, wˌaliˌowaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao.|0
lakˈini mˈara wˌalipokˈuwa na rˈaha, wˌakafˈaɲa maˈovu tˈena matʃˈoni pˈako. kˈiʃa ˌukawaˈatʃa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao, nˌao wˌakawˌatawˈala. wˌalipˌokulilˈia tˈena, ˌukasikˈia kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, na kwa hurˈuma zˈako ˌukawˌaokˈoa kˈila mˈara.|0
ˌukawaˈoɲa warˈudi katˌika ʃerˈia jˈako, lakˈini wakˈawa na kibˈuri na hˌawakutˈii ˈamri zˈako. wˌakatˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako ambˈajo kwˈajo ˈm̩tu ˌataˈiʃi kˌama ˌakijatˈii. kwa ˌukaˈidi wˌakakˌuɡeuzˈia kisˈoɡo, wakˈawa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu na wˌakakatˈaa kˌusikilˈiza.|0
kwa miˈaka mˈiŋɡi ˌulikˈuwa mvˌumilˈivu kwˈao. kwa ɲɟˈia ja rˈoho wˈako ˌukawaˈoɲa kˌupitˈia mˌanabˈii wˈako. hˌata hˈivjo hˌawakuɟˈali, bˌasi ˌukawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa ɟirˈani.|0
lakˈini kwa rehˈema zˈako kˈuu hˌukuwˌakomˈeʃa wˈala kˌuwaˈatʃa, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe neˈema na rehˈema.|0
bˌasi sˈasa, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ulˈije m̩kˈuu, mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na mˈuŋɡu wa kˌuoɡˈofja, mwˌeɲe kuʃˈika aɡˈano lˈake la upˈendo, ˌusiˈatʃe taˈabu hˈizi zˈote zˌionekˈane kˌuwa kˈitu kidˈoɡo mbˈele za mˈatʃo jˈako, taˈabu hˈizi zˌilizˌotupˈata, ɟˌuːja wafˈalme wˈetu na vˌioŋɡˈozi, ɟˌuːja mˌakuhˈani wˈetu na mˌanabˈii, ɟˌuːja bˈaba zˈetu na wˈatu wˈako wˈote, ʃˈu sˈiku za wafˈalme wa aʃˈuru hˌadi lˈeo.|0
katˌika hˈajo jˈote jˌalijˌotupˈata, ˌumekˈuwa mwˌeɲe hˈaki, na ˌumetˈenda kwa ˌuaminˈifu, wakˈati sˌisi tˌumetˈenda mabˈaja.|0
wafˈalme wˈetu, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈetu, mˌakuhˈani wˈetu na bˈaba zˈetu hˌawakˌufuˈata ʃerˈia jˈako. hˌawakˌuziŋɡatˈia ˈamri zˈako wˈala maˈoɲo ˌulijowˈapa.|0
hˌata wˌalipokˈuwa waŋɡˈali katˌika ufˈalme wˈao, wˌakiˌufurahˈia wˈema wˈako m̩kˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈubwa na jˌeɲe rutˈuba ˌulijowˈapa, hˌawakˌukutˌumikˈia wˈala kˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja.|0
lakˈini tazˈama, sˌisi ni watˈumwa lˈeo, watˈumwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌulijowˈapa bˈaba zˈetu ˌili wapˈate kˈula matˈunda jˌake na vˈitu viŋɡˈine vizˈuri ˌinajˌozalˈiʃa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈetu, mavˈuno jˌake mˈeŋɡi huˈenda kwa wafˈalme ˌuliˌowawˈeka wˌatutawˈale. wˌanatawˈala ɟˌuːja miˈili jˈetu na mifˈuɡo jˈetu kˌama wˌapendˈavjo. tˈuko katˌika ðˈiki kˈuu.|0
wˈale wˌaliotˈia muhˈuri wˌalikˈuwa: nˌehemˈia mtawˈala, mwˈana wa hˌakalˈia. sˌedekˈia.|0
serˈaja, ˌazarˈia, jˌeremˈia.|0
paʃˈuri, ˌamarˈia, malkˈija.|0
hatˈuʃi, ʃˌebanˈia, malˈuki.|0
harˈimu, mˌeremˈoθi, ˌobadˈia.|0
dˌaniˈeli, ɡˌineθˈoni, barˈuku.|0
mˌeʃulˈamu, abˈija, mˌijamˈini.|0
mˌaazˈia, bilɡˈai na ʃemˈaja. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌaliokˈuwa mˌakuhˈani.|0
walˈawi: jeʃˈua mwˈana wa ˌazanˈia, binˈui wa wˈana wa hˌenadˈadi, kˌadmiˈeli.|0
na wenzˈao: ʃˌebanˈia, hodˈia, kelˈita, pelˈaja, hanˈani.|0
mˈika, rehˈobu, hˌaʃabˈia.|0
zakˈuri, ʃˌerebˈia, ʃˌebanˈia.|0
hodˈia, bˈani na benˈinu.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu: parˈoʃi, pˈahaθ moˈabu, elˈamu, zˈatu, bˈani.|0
bˈuni, azɡˈadi, bebˈai.|0
ˌadonˈija, biɡwˈai, adˈini.|0
atˈeri, hˌezekˈia, azˈuri.|0
hodˈia, haʃˈumu, besˈai.|0
harˈifu, ˌanaθˈoθi, nebˈai.|0
mˌaɡpiˈaʃi, mˌeʃulˈamu, hezˈiri.|0
mˌeʃezabˈeli, sadˈoki, jadˈua.|0
pˌelatˈia, hanˈani, anˈaja.|0
hoʃˈea, hˌananˈia, haʃˈubu.|0
hˌalohˈeʃi, pˈilha, ʃobˈeki.|0
rehˈumu, haʃˈabna, mˌaasˈeja.|0
ahˈija, hanˈani, anˈani.|0
malˈuki, harˈimu na baˈana.|0
wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote, wakˈiwa ni mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi, mˌabawˈabu, wˌaimbˈaɟi, wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu, na wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌoɟitˈeŋɡa na mˌataˈifa ɟirˈani kwa aɟˈili ja ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˈao na wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na uwˈezo wa kˌufahˈamu.|0
bˌasi hˈawa wˈote wˌanaɟiˈuŋɡa na ndˈuɡu zˈao na wakˈuu wˈao, na kˌuɟifˈuŋɡa kwa laˈana na kwa kiˈapo kˌufuˈata ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu ˌilijˌotolˈewa kˌupitˈia kwa mˈose mtumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu, na kutˈii kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu ˈamri zˈote, mˌaaɡˈizo na ʃerˈia za bwˈana, bwˈana wˈetu.|0
tˌunaahˈidi kˌutowaˈoza bˈinti zˈetu kwa wˈatu wˌanaˌotuzuŋɡˈuka, wˈala kˌuwaˈoza wˈana wˈetu bˈinti zˈao.|0
wakˈati mˌataˈifa ɟirˈani wˌaletˈapo biðˈaa zˈao ˌau nafˈaka kuˈuza sˈiku ja sabˈato, hˌatutˌazinunˈua kutˈoka kwˈao sˈiku ja sabˈato, wˈala sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine jojˈote tˌakatˈifu. kˈila mwˈaka wa sˈaba, tˌutaˈatʃa kˌuilˈima ˈarði na tˌutafˈuta madˈeni jˈote.|0
tˌunakubˈali waɟˈibu wa kˌutimˈiza ˈamri za kutˈoa θelˈuθi ja ʃekˈeli kˈila mwˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutumˈiʃi wa ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja mikˈate ja woɲˈeʃo, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌawaˈida za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za sˈiku za sabˈato, sˌikukˈuu za mwandˈamo wa mwˈezi na sˌikukˈuu ɲiŋɡˈine zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu, kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za ðˈambi ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, na kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi zˈote za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
sˌisi mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi na wˈatu, tˌumepˈiɡa kˈura kˌuamˈua kˌuwa kˈila mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa zˈetu lazˈima alˈete katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa ɲakˈati maˈalum kˈila mwˈaka mtʃˈaŋɡo wa kˈuni za kˌukokˈea mˈoto katˌika mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kˌama ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia.|0
pˈia tˌunatʃukˈua waɟˈibu wa kulˈeta mˌalimbˈuko ja mazˈao jˈetu na matˈunda ja kwˈanza ja kˈila ˈm̩ti wa matˈunda katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana kˈila mwˈaka.|0
kˌama pˈia ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia, tˌutawalˈeta wˌazalˈiwa wˈetu wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume, na wa mifˈuɡo jˈetu, jaˈani wa ŋɡˈombe wˈetu na wa makˈundi jˈetu ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌohudˈumu hˌuko.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, tˌutalˈeta katˌika ɣˈala za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa mˌakuhˈani, vjakˈula vja kwˈanza vja maʃˈamba jˈetu, sadˈaka zˈetu za nafˈaka, matˈunda ja mˈiti jˈetu jˈote, divˈai jˈetu ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta. nˌasi tˌutalˈeta zˈaka za mazˈao jˈetu kwa walˈawi, kwa kˌuwa walˈawi n̩dˈio ambˈao hˌukusˈaɲa zˈaka katˌika mˈiɟi jˈote tˌunakofˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
kuhˈani ˌatokanˈaje na uzˈao wa arˈoni ˌataʃˌirikiˈana na walˈawi wakˈati wˌanapˌopokˈea zˈaka, nˌao walˈawi ˌitawapˈasa kulˈeta sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja zˈaka katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu katˌika ɣˈala za hazˈina.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na walˈawi ˌitawapˈasa kulˈeta mitʃˈaŋɡo jˈao ja nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta katˌika vjˈumba vja ɣˈala, mahˈali vifˈaa vja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu vˌinapˌohifaðˈiwa, na wˌanapokˈaa mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌohudˈumu, na mˌabawˈabu na wˌaimbˈaɟi. hˌatutaˈatʃa kˌuiɟˈali ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wˈatu wˌaliwasˈifu wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌoɟitolˈea kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈawa n̩dˈio vˌioŋɡˈozi wa maɟˈimbo wˌaliokˈuɟa kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu baˈaði ja wˌaisraˈeli, mˌakuhˈani, walˈawi, wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu, na wazˈao wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa sˌolomˈoni wˌaliˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika mˈilki jˌake mweɲˈewe katˌika mˈiɟi mbˌalimbˈali.|0
ambˈapo wˈatu weŋɡˈine kutˈoka jˈuda na bˌeɲamˈini wˌaliˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu. kutˈoka wazˈao wa jˈuda: aθˈaja mwˈana wa uzˈia, mwˈana wa zˌekarˈia, mwˈana wa ˌamarˈia, mwˈana wa ʃˌefatˈia, mwˈana wa mˌahalalˈeli, m̩zˈao wa perˈesi.|0
nˌaje mˌaasˈeja mwˈana wa barˈuku, mwˈana wa kolhˈoze, mwˈana wa hazˈaja, mwˈana wa adˈaja, mwˈana wa jˌojarˈibu, mwˈana wa zˌekarˈia, m̩zˈao wa mʃilˈoni.|0
wazˈao wa perˈesi wˌalioˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu wˌalikˈuwa mˌiaˈn̩ne sitˈininanˈane, wˈatu wˌeɲe uwˈezo.|0
kutˈoka wazˈao wa bˌeɲamˈini: sˈalu mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, mwˈana wa joˈedi, mwˈana wa pedˈaja, mwˈana wa kolˈaja, mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja, mwˈana wa ˌiθiˈeli, mwˈana wa jeʃˈaja.|0
na wˌafuˈasi wˈake, ɡabˈai na salˈai wˈatu mˌiatˈisa ˌiʃirˈininanˈane.|0
kutˈoka mˌakuhˈani: jedˈaja, mwˈana wa jˌojarˈibu, jakˈini.|0
serˈaja mwˈana wa hilkˈia, mwˈana wa mˌeʃulˈamu, mwˈana wa sadˈoki, mwˈana wa mˌerajˈoθi, mwˈana wa ˌahitˈubu, msˌimamˈizi katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
na wenzˈao, wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟamˈaa: wˈatu mˌiambˈili ˌarobaˈininambˈili. ˌamaʃisˈai mwˈana wa ˌazarˈeli, mwˈana wa azˈai, mwˈana wa mˌeʃilemˈoθi, mwˈana wa imˈeri.|0
na wenzˈao wˌaliokˈuwa wˌeɲe uwˈezo: wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininanˈane. afˈisa wˌao m̩kˈuu ˌalikˈuwa zˌabdiˈeli mwˈana wa hˌaɡedolˈimu.|0
kutˈoka walˈawi: ʃemˈaja mwˈana wa haʃˈubu, mwˈana wa ˌazrikˈamu, mwˈana wa hˌaʃabˈia, mwˈana wa bˈuni.|0
ʃˌabeθˈai na jˌozabˈadi, vˌioŋɡˈozi wawˈili wa walˈawi, ambˈao wˌalisˌimamˈia kˈazi za ɲɟˈe za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌatanˈia mwˈana wa mˈika, mwˈana wa zˈabdi, mwˈana wa asˈafu, kˌioŋɡˈozi ˌalijˌeoŋɡˈoza kutˈoa ʃukrˈani na maˈombi; bˌakbukˈia ˌalijekˈuwa msˌaidˈizi wˌake kˈati ja wenzˈake; na ˈabda mwˈana wa ʃamˈua, mwˈana wa ɡalˈali, mwˈana wa jˌeduθˈuni.|0
ɟˈumla ja walˈawi wˌaliokˈaa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi mtˌakatˈifu wˌalikˈuwa wˈatu mˌiambˈili θˌemanˈininaˈn̩ne.|0
mˌabawˈabu: akˈubu, talmˈoni na wenzˈao, wˌaliolˈinda malˈaŋɡo: wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟa sabˈininambˈili.|0
wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌosalˈia, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, wˌalikˈuwa katˌika mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda, kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika urˈiθi wa bˈaba jˈake.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa hekˈalu wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika kilˈima tʃa ofˈeli. sˈiha na ɡˈiʃpa wˌalikˈuwa wˌasimamˈizi wˈao.|0
afˈisa m̩kˈuu wa walˈawi hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌalikˈuwa ˈuzi mwˈana wa bˈani, mwˈana wa hˌaʃabˈia, mwˈana wa mˌatanˈia, mwˈana wa mˈika. ˈuzi ˌalikˈuwa mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa asˈafu, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌeɲe kˌuwaɟibˈika kwa aɟˈili ja hudˈuma ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja ˈamri za mfˈalme, ambˈazo pˈia zˌiliratˈibu ʃuɣˈuli zˈao za kˈila sˈiku.|0
pˌeθahˈia mwˈana wa mˌeʃezabˈeli, mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wa zˈera mwˈana wa jˈuda, ˌalikˈuwa mwˌakilˈiʃi wa mfˈalme katˌika mˈambo jˈote kuhˈusu mˌahusiˈano na wˈatu.|0
kuhˈusu viɟˈiɟi na maʃˈamba jˈake, baˈaði ja wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌaliˈiʃi kirˈiaθ ˈarba na makˈazi jˌalijˌokizuŋɡˈuka, katˌika dibˈoni na makˈazi jˈake, katˌika jˌekabzeˈeli na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake.|0
zanˈoa, ˌadulˈamu na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake, katˌika lakˈiʃi na maʃˈamba jˈake, na katˌika azˈeka na makˈazi jˈake. hˈivjo wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi kˌuanzˈia bˈeer ʃˈeba mpˈaka bˈonde la hinˈomu.|0
wazˈao wa wˌabeɲamˈini kutˈoka ɡˈeba wˌaliˈiʃi mikmˈaʃi, aˈija, beθˈeli na makˈazi jˈake.|0
katˌika ˌanaθˈoθi, nˈobu na ˌananˈia.|0
katˌika hazˈori, rˈama na ɡˌitaˈimu.|0
katˌika hadˈidi, sˌeboˈimu na nˌebalˈati.|0
katˌika lˈodi na ˈono, na katˌika bˈonde la mafˈundi.|0
baˈaði ja makˈundi ja walˈawi wa jˈuda wˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko bˌeɲamˈini.|0
hˈawa wˌafuatˈao wˌalikˈuwa mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi ambˈao wˌalirˈudi na zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli pamˈoɟa na jeʃˈua: serˈaja, jˌeremˈia, ˈezra.|0
ˌamarˈia, malˈuki, hatˈuʃi.|0
ʃˌekanˈia, rehˈumu, mˌeremˈoθi.|0
ˈido, ɡˌineθˈoni, abˈija.|0
mˌijamˈini, mˌoadˈia, bˈilɡa.|0
ʃemˈaja, jˌojarˈibu, jedˈaja.|0
sˈalu, amˈoki, hilkˈia na jedˈaja. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌakuhˈani na wenzˈao wakˈati wa jeʃˈua.|0
walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa jeʃˈua, binˈui, kˌadmiˈeli, ʃˌerebˈia, jˈuda, na pˈia mˌatanˈia, ambˈaje pamˈoɟa na wenzˈake, ˌalikˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɲˈimbo za ʃukrˈani.|0
bˌakbukˈia na ˈuni, wenzˈao, wˌalisimˈama mkabˈala nˌao wakˈati wa ibˈada.|0
jeʃˈua ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa jˌojakˈimu, jˌojakˈimu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa ˌeliaʃˈibu, ˌeliaʃˈibu ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa jojˈada.|0
jojˈada ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa jˌonaθˈani, na jˌonaθˈani ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba wa jadˈua.|0
katˌika sˈiku za jˌojakˈimu, kˌulikˈuwa na wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za kˌikuhˈani: wa ɟamˈaa ja serˈaja, merˈaja; wa ɟamˈaa ja jˌeremˈia, hˌananˈia.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja ˈezra, mˌeʃulˈamu; wa ɟamˈaa ja ˌamarˈia, jˌehohanˈani.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja malˈuki, jˌonaθˈani; wa ɟamˈaa ja ʃˌebanˈia, josˈefu.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja ˈido, zˌekarˈia; wa ɟamˈaa ja ɡˌineθˈoni, mˌeʃulˈamu.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja abˈija, zˈikri; wa ɟamˈaa ja mˌiniamˈini na ja mˌaazˈia, piltˈai.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja bilɡˈai, ʃamˈua; wa ɟamˈaa ja ʃemˈaja, jˌehonaθˈani.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja jˌojarˈibu, mˌatenˈai; wa ɟamˈaa ja jedˈaja, ˈuzi.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja sˈalu, kalˈai; wa ɟamˈaa ja amˈoki, ebˈeri.|0
wa ɟamˈaa ja hilkˈia, hˌaʃabˈia; wa ɟamˈaa ja jedˈaja, nˌeθanˈeli.|0
wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa za walˈawi katˌika sˈiku za ˌeliaʃˈibu, jojˈada, jˌohanˈani na jadˈua, pˈia wˈale ɟamˈaa za mˌakuhˈani, wˌaliˌandikˈiʃwa wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio, mwaɟˈemi.|0
wakˈuu wa ɟamˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wa lˈawi hˌadi wakˈati wa jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa ˌeliaʃˈibu wˌaliˌandikˈiʃwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈawi wˌalikˈuwa: hˌaʃabˈia, ʃˌerebˈia, jeʃˈua mwˈana wa kˌadmiˈeli na wenzˈao, wˌaliˌosimˈama mkabˈala nˌao kusˈifu na kˌuʃukˈuru, sehˈemu mˈoɟa ˌikipˌokezˈana na ɲiŋɡˈine kˌama ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa na daˈudi ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌabawˈabu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakilˈinda kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ɣˈala nˈi: mˌatanˈia, bˌakbukˈia, ˌobadˈia, mˌeʃulˈamu, talmˈoni na akˈubu.|0
wˌalihudˈumu sˈiku za jˌojakˈimu mwˈana wa jeʃˈua, mwˈana wa jˌosadˈaki, na katˌika sˈiku za mtawˈala nˌehemˈia, na za ˈezra kuhˈani na mwandˈiʃi.|0
wakˈati wa kuwˈekwa wˈakfu ukˈuta wa jˌerusalˈemu, walˈawi wˌalitafˈutwa kˈule wˌalikokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi, nˌao wˌakalˈetwa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuaðimˈiʃa kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe hˌuko kuwˈeka wˈakfu kwa ɲˈimbo za ʃukrˈani na kwa ˌuimbˈaɟi wˌakitumˈia mˌatoˈazi, vinˈubi na zˈeze.|0
pˈia wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌalikusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa kutˈoka mˌaenˈeo jˌalijˌozuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu, kutˈoka viɟˈiɟi vja wˌanetofˈaθi.|0
kutˈoka bˈeθ ɡilɡˈali, na kutˈoka enˈeo la ɡˈeba na ˌazmawˈeθi, kwa kˌuwa wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌalikˈuwa wˌameɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea viɟˈiɟi kˌuzuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wakˈati mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamekwˈiʃa kˌuɟitakˈasa kwa kˌufuatˈana na destˈuri, wˌaliwˌatakˈasa wˈatu, malˈaŋɡo na ukˈuta.|0
nˌiliwˌaaɡˈiza vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda wapˈande ɟˌuːja ukˈuta. pˈia nˌiliaɡˈiza makˈundi mawˈili makˈubwa ja wˌaimbˈaɟi waˈimbe ɲˈimbo za kˌumʃukˈuru mˈuŋɡu. kˈundi mˈoɟa lˌilipˈanda ɟˌuːja ukˈuta upˈande wa kuˈume, kˌuelekˈea lˈaŋɡo la samˈadi.|0
hoʃˈaja na nˈusu ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda wˌakawˌafuˈata.|0
pamˈoɟa na ˌazarˈia, ˈezra, mˌeʃulˈamu.|0
jˈuda, bˌeɲamˈini, ʃemˈaja, jˌeremˈia.|0
pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja mˌakuhˈani wˌeɲe tˌarumbˈeta, na pˈia wˌalikˈuwa na zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa jˌonaθˈani, mwˈana wa ʃemˈaja, mwˈana wa mˌatanˈia, mwˈana wa mikˈaja, mwˈana wa zakˈuri, mwˈana wa asˈafu.|0
pamˈoɟa na wenzˈake, ʃemˈaja, ˌazarˈeli, mˌilalˈai, ɡˌilalˈai, maˈai, nˌeθanˈeli, jˈuda na hanˈani, wakˈiwa na vjˈombo vja ˌuimbˈaɟi, kˌama ˌilivjˌoaɡˈizwa na daˈudi ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. mwandˈiʃi ˈezra ˌalioŋɡˈoza mˌaandamˈano.|0
kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la tʃemtʃˈemi wˌaliˌendelˈea mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi za ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi, kwˈeɲe mwinˈuko wa ukˈuta, na kˌupitˈia ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja daˈudi mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la mˈaɟi upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kˈundi la pˈili la wˌaimbˈaɟi lˌiliˌelekˈea upˈande wa kuʃˈoto. nˌiliwˌafuˈata ɟˌuːja ukˈuta, pamˈoɟa na nˈusu ja wˈatu kˌupitˈia mnˈara wa tanˈuru mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈuta mpˈana.|0
ɟˌuːja lˈaŋɡo la ˌefraˈimu, lˈaŋɡo la jeʃˈana, lˈaŋɡo la samˈaki, mnˈara wa hˌananˈeli, na mnˈara wa mˈia, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la kondˈoo. wˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ulˈinzi wˌakasimˈama.|0
na mˌakuhˈani wˌafuatˈao: ˌeliakˈimu, mˌaasˈeja, mˌiniamˈini, mikˈaja, ˌeliˌoenˈai, zˌekarˈia na hˌananˈia wakˈiwa na tˌarumbˈeta zˈao.|0
na pˈia mˌaasˈeja, ʃemˈaja, ˌeleazˈari, ˈuzi, jˌehohanˈani, malkˈija, elˈamu na ezˈeri. makˈundi hˈaja jˌaliˈimba tʃˈini ja ˌuoŋɡˈozi wa jˌezrahˈia.|0
sˈiku hˈijo wˈatu wˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu ɲˈiŋɡi, wˌakiʃˌaŋɡilˈia kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwˈapa furˈaha kˈuu. wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˌaliʃˌaŋɡilˈia pˈia. saˈuti ja kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌiliwˈeza kˌusikˈika mbˈali sˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈuo wˈatu wˌalitʃˌaɡulˈiwa kˌuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa vjˈumba vja ɣˈala kwa aɟˈili ja mˌatolˈeo, mˌalimbˈuko na zˈaka. kutˈoka kwˈeɲe jˈale maʃˈamba jˌalijˌozuŋɡˈuka mˈiɟi wˌalipˈaswa walˈete kwˈeɲe ɣˈala mafˈuŋɡu kˌama ʃerˈia ˌilivjˌoamˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, kwa kˌuwa jˈuda ˌalifˌurahˈiʃwa na hudˈuma ja mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi.|0
wˌalifˈaɲa ibˈada ja mˈuŋɡu wˌao na ibˈada ja ˌutakˈaso, nˌao wˌaimbˈaɟi na walˈinzi wa lˈaŋɡo wˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo pˈia, kˌufuatˈana na ˈamri za daˈudi na sˌolomˈoni mwanˈawe.|0
mˈuda mrˈefu ˌuliopˈita, katˌika sˈiku za daˈudi na asˈafu, wˌalikuwˈepo vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌaimbˈaɟi na wa ɲˈimbo za sˈifa na za kˌumʃukˈuru mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo katˌika sˈiku za zˌerubabˈeli na za nˌehemˈia, ˌisraˈeli wˈote wˌalitˈoa mafˈuŋɡu kˈila sˈiku kwa aɟˈili ja wˌaimbˈaɟi na mˌabawˈabu. pˈia wˌalitˈeŋɡa fˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja walˈawi weŋɡˈine, nˌao walˈawi wˌalitˈeŋɡa fˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja wazˈao wa arˈoni.|0
sˈiku hˈijo, kitˈabu tʃa mˈose kˌilisˈomwa kwa saˈuti kˈuu, na wˈatu wˈote wˌakasikˈia. hˈumo ˌiliˌonekˈana ˌimeandˈikwa kwˌamba hakˈuna mwamˈoni wˈala mmoˈabu ˌatakˌajerˌuhusˈiwa katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˈatu wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌawakˌuwalˈaki wˌaisraˈeli kwa tʃakˈula na mˈaɟi. badˈala jˌake wˌalimwaɟˈiri bˌalaˈamu kˌuwalaˈani lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌaliɡeˈuza laˈana kˌuwa barˈaka.|0
wˈatu wˌalipˌosikˈia ʃerˈia hˌii, wˌaliwatˈeŋɡa wˈatu wˈote wasˈio wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliokˈuwa wa uzˈao wa kiɡˈeni.|0
kˈabla ja hˈili, kuhˈani ˌeliaʃˈibu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈekwa kˌuwa msˌimamˈizi wa vjˈumba vja ɣˈala ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. ˌalikˈuwa na ˌuhusiˈano wa karˈibu na tobˈia.|0
nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa amˈempa tobˈia tʃˈumba kikˈubwa ambˈatʃo mwˈanzo kˌilikˈuwa kˌikitumˈika kuwˈeka sadˈaka za nafˈaka, uvˈumba na vjˈombo vja hekˈalu, pamˈoɟa na zˈaka za nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta wˌalijˌoaɡˈizwa wˌaisraˈeli kwa aɟˈili ja walˈawi, wˌaimbˈaɟi na mˌabawˈabu wa lˈaŋɡo, pamˈoɟa na mˌatolˈeo kwa mˌakuhˈani.|0
lakˈini wakˈati hˈaja jˈote jˌalipokˈuwa jˌakitendˈeka, sikˈuwa jˌerusalˈemu, kwa kˌuwa katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini na mbˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa ˌartaʃˈasta mfˈalme wa babˈeli nˌilikˈuwa nˌimerˈudi kwa mfˈalme. bˌaadˈaje nˌilimwˈomba ruhˈusa.|0
nˌikarˈudi jˌerusalˈemu. hˈapo nˌiliɡundˈua ɟˈambo la uˈovu ˌalilofˈaɲa ˌeliaʃˈibu kwa kˈumpa tobˈia tʃˈumba katˌika ɲˈua za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌilikˌasirˈika sˈana na nˌikavitˈupa ɲɟˈe vjˈombo vjˈote vja tobˈia.|0
nˌilitˈoa ˈamri kˌutakˈasa vjˈumba, kˈiʃa nˌikavˌirudˈiʃa vifˈaa vja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka na uvˈumba.|0
pˈia nˌiliɡundˈua kˌuwa mafˈuŋɡu jˌalijopˈaŋɡwa kupˈewa walˈawi hˌawakˈuwa wˌamepˈewa, nˌao walˈawi wˈote na wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌaliˌowaɟibˈika kwa hudˈuma wˌalikˈuwa wˌamerˈudi katˌika maʃˈamba jˈao.|0
bˌasi nˌiliwˌakemˈea mˌaafˈisa na kˌuwaulˈiza, kwa nˈini ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu ˌimepuˈuzwa? kˈiʃa nˌiliwaˈita pamˈoɟa na kˌuwawˈeka kwˈeɲe nafˈasi zˈao.|0
jˈuda wˈote wˌalilˈeta zˈaka za nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta kwˈeɲe ɣˈala.|0
nˌikamwˈeka kuhˈani ʃˌelemˈia, mwandˈiʃi sadˈoki, na mlˈawi ˌalijeˈitwa pedˈaja kˌuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa ɣˈala, na kumfˈaɲa hanˈani mwˈana wa zakˈuri, mwˈana wa mˌatanˈia kˌuwa msˌaidˈizi wˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu hˈawa wˌaliˌonekˈana kˌuwa wˌaaminˈifu. wˌalipˈewa waɟˈibu wa kuɡˈawa mˌahitˈaɟi kwa ndˈuɡu zˈao.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌunikumbˈuke kwa hˈili, wˈala ˌusifˈute kˈile nˌilitʃˌokifˈaɲa kwa ˌuaminˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu na kwa aɟˈili ja hudˈuma jˈake.|0
sˈiku hˈizo nˌikaˈona wˈatu katˌika jˈuda wˌakikaɲˈaɡa mˌaʃinikˈizo ja divˈai sˈiku ja sabˈato na kulˈeta nafˈaka wˌakiwˌapakˈiza pˈunda, pamˈoɟa na divˈai, zabˈibu, tˈini na aˈina ɲiŋɡˈine za mizˈiɡo. nˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakilˈeta hˈaja jˈote jˌerusalˈemu sˈiku ja sabˈato. kwa hˈijo nˌiliwaˈoɲa ðˈidi ja kuˈuza vjakˈula sˈiku hˈijo.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka tˈiro wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu wˌalilˈeta samˈaki na aˈina ɲˈiŋɡi za biðˈaa na kˌuziˈuza jˌerusalˈemu sˈiku ja sabˈato kwa wˈatu wa jˈuda.|0
nˌiliwˌakemˈea wakˈuu wa jˈuda na kˌuwaambˈia, ni uˈovu ɡˈani hˈuu mnˌaofˈaɲa wa kˌuinaɟˈisi sˈiku ja sabˈato.|0
ɟˈe, bˈaba zˈenu hˌawakufˈaɲa mˈambo kˌama hˈaja, hˌata wˌakamsˌababˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kulˈeta maˈafa hˈaja jˈote ɟˈuu jˈetu na ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu? sˈasa bˈado mnazˈidi kˌutʃotʃˈea ɣaðˈabu jˌake ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli kwa kˌuinaɟˈisi sabˈato.|0
wakˈati vivˈuli vja ɟiˈoni vˌilipˌoaŋɡukˈia ɟˌuːja malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu kˈabla ja sabˈato, nˌiliamˈuru milˈaŋɡo ifˈuŋɡwe, wˈala ˌisifˌuŋɡulˈiwe mpˈaka sabˈato iˈiʃe. nˌikawawˈeka baˈaði ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ˌili pˌasiwˈepo mzˈiɡo ˌutakˌaoiŋɡˈizwa ndˈani sˈiku ja sabˈato.|0
mˈara mˈoɟa ˌau mbˈili wˌatʃuˈuzi na wˌauzˈaɟi wa biðˈaa za aˈina zˈote wˌalilˈala usˈiku ɲɟˈe ja ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini nˌiliwaˈoɲa na kˌuwaambˈia, kwa nˈini mnalˈala karˈibu na ukˈuta? kˌama mkifˈaɲa hˈivi tˈena, nˌitawˌaaðˈibu. kˌuanzˈia wakˈati ˈule hˌawakˈuɟa tˈena sˈiku ja sabˈato.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikawˌaamˈuru walˈawi kˌuɟitakˈasa na kwˈenda kulˈinda malˈaŋɡo ˌili kutˈunza sabˈato ˈiwe tˌakatˈifu. ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌunikumbˈuke kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili pˈia, nˌawe ˌunioɲˈeʃe wˈema wˈako sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako m̩kˈuu.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, nˌiliˈona wˌajahˈudi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˈoa wˌanawˈake kutˈoka aʃdˈodi, amˈoni na moˈabu.|0
nˈusu ja watˈoto wˌao wˌalizuŋɡˈumza lˈuɣa ja kˌiaʃidˈodi ˌau lˈuɣa ja wˈatu weŋɡˈine, bˌali hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza kˌijahˈudi.|0
nˌiliwˌakemˈea na kˌuwalaˈani. nˌiliwapˈiɡa baˈaði ja wˈatu na kuŋɡˈoa ɲuˈele zˈao. nˌiliwˌaapˈiʃa kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu na kusˈema: msˌiwaˈoze bˈinti zˈenu kwa wˈana wˈao, wˈala bˈinti zˈao wˌasiolˈewe na wˈana wˈenu wˈala nˈiɲi weɲˈewe.|0
ɟˈe, sˌolomˈoni hˌakutˈenda ðˈambi kwa sabˈabu ja wˌanawˈake wa nˈamna hˈijo? mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi hˌapakuwˈepo mfˈalme kˌama jˈeje. ˌalipˈendwa na mˈuŋɡu wˈake. nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌalimwˈeka kˌuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli jˈote, lakˈini hˌata jˈeje, wˌanawˈake wa mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine wˌalimfˈaɲa atˈende ðˈambi.|0
ɟˈe, tˌulazimˈike sˈasa kˌusikˈia kwˌamba nˈiɲi pˈia mmefˈaɲa uˈovu hˈuu mkˈubwa na kˌutokˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa kuˈoa wˌanawˈake wa kiɡˈeni.|0
mmˈoɟa wa wˈana wa jojˈada mwˈana wa ˌeliaʃˈibu kuhˈani m̩kˈuu ˌalikˈuwa mkwˈewe sˌanbalˈati mhorˈoni. nˌami nˌilimfukˈuza mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌuwakumbˈuke, kwa sabˈabu wˌamenaɟˈisi ˌukuhˈani, na aɡˈano la kˌikuhˈani na la walˈawi.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliwˌatakˈasa mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi kˌutokˈana na tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃokˈuwa tʃa kiɡˈeni, na kuwˈapa waɟˈibu, kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika kˈazi jˈake.|0
pˈia nˌilihˌakikˈiʃa kwˌamba mˌatolˈeo ja kˈuni jˌalilˈetwa kwa wakˈati ˌunaopˈaswa, na mˌalimbˈuko kwa wakˈati wˈake. ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌunikumbˈuke, ˌunitendˈee mˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo lˌililˌotokˈea wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, jˈule ˌalijˌetawˈala ɟˌuːja maɟˈimbo mˈia na ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba ʃˈu bˈara hˈindi hˌadi kˈuʃi.|0
wakˈati hˈuo mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌalitawˈala katˌika kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, ˌalifˈaɲa karˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈuu wˌake wˈote pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa. ˌakawˌaalˈika vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɟˈeʃi wa ˌuaɟˈemi na umˈedi, wˈana wa wafˈalme na wakˈuu wa maɟˈimbo.|0
kwa sˈiku zˈote mˌiamˈoɟanˌa θemanˈini mfˈalme ˌalioɲˈeʃa ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi wa ufˈalme wˈake, fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu wa ˈenzi jˈake.|0
sˈiku hˈizo zˌilipopˈita, mfˈalme ˌalifˈaɲa karˈamu kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba, katˌika bustˈani ja ndˈani katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia mdˈoɡo hˌadi mkˈubwa, wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani.|0
bustˈani ˌilikˈuwa na mˌapazˈia ja kitˈani ɲeˈupe na bulˈuu, jˌalijˌofuŋɡˈiwa kˈamba za kitˈani ɲeˈupe na kˌitambˈaa tʃa zˌambarˈau, kwˈeɲe pˈete za fˈeða ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuzo za mˈarmar. kˌulikuwˈepo vˈiti vja ðahˈabu na vja fˈeða vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌimewˈekwa kwˈeɲe ˈile sakˈafu ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mˈawe ja rˈaŋɡi, mˈarmar, lˌulumˈizi na mˈawe meŋɡˈine ja θamˈani.|0
vjˈombo vja ðahˈabu vˌilitumˈika kwa wˈatu kˌuɲuˈea mvˈiɲo, kˈila kimˈoɟa tˌofaˈuti na kiŋɡˈine, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa mvˈiɲo kwa wˈiŋɡi kwa kadˈiri ja ˌukarˈimu wˈake.|0
kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme kˈila mɡˈeni ˌalirˌuhusˈiwa kˈuɲua ˌalitʃotˈaka, kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme ˌalitˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈote wa kˌuhudˈumu mvˈiɲo kˌumhudumˈia kˈila ˈm̩tu kwa ɟˈinsi ˌalivjotˈaka.|0
malkˈia vˈaʃti pˈia ˌakawˌafaɲˈia wˌanawˈake karˈamu katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero.|0
sˈiku ja sˈaba, wakˈati mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesisˈimka rˈoho jˌake kwa mvˈiɲo, ˌaliamˈuru mˌatowˈaʃi sˈaba wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimhˌudumˈia, jaˈani, mˌehumˈani, bˈizθa, harbˈona, bˈiɡθa, abˈaɡθa, zeθˈari na karkˈasi.|0
kumlˈeta malkˈia vˈaʃti mbˈele ja mfˈalme akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa tˈaɟi lˈake la kifˈalme, ˌili ˌaoɲˈeʃe uzˈuri wˌake kwa wˈatu na wakˈuu, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa ni mzˈuri wa kˌupendˈeza.|0
lakˈini wakˈati wˌatumˈiʃi wˌalipotˈoa ˈamri ja mfˈalme, malkˈia vˈaʃti ˌalikatˈaa kˈuɟa. ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌaliɣˌaðibˈika, na hasˈira jˌake ˌikawˈaka.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌilikˈuwa destˈuri ja mfˈalme kupˈata ˌuʃaˈuri kwa wˌataalˈamu katˌika mˈambo ja ʃerˈia na hˈaki, ˌalizuŋɡˈumza na wˈatu wˌeɲe busˈara, ambˈao wˌaliɟˈua ɲakˈati.|0
nˌao wˌaliokˈuwa karˈibu na mfˈalme ni karʃˈena, ʃeθˈari, admˈaθa, tarʃˈiʃi, merˈesi, marsˈena na mˌemukˈani, wakˈuu sˈaba wa ˌuaɟˈemi na umˈedi wˌaliokˈuwa na nafˈasi ja pekˈee kwa mfˈalme nˌao wˌalikˈuwa na vjˈeo vja ɟˈuu kabˈisa katˌika ˌutawˈala wˈake.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia, malkˈia vˈaʃti ˌanapˈaswa kˌutendˈewa nˈini? malkˈia hˌakutˈii ˈamri ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ambˈajo mˌatowˈaʃi wˌalimpˌelekˈea.|0
kˈiʃa mˌemukˈani ˌakaɟˈibu mbˈele ja mfˈalme na wakˈuu, malkˈia vˈaʃti si kwˌamba ˌamemkosˈea mfˈalme tu bˌali pˈia ˌamewˌakosˈea wakˈuu wˈote na wˈatu wa himˈaja jˈote ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero.|0
kwa maˈana tˈendo hˈili la malkˈia lˌitaɟˌulikˈana kwa wˌanawˈake wˈote, kwa hˈijo wˌatawˌaðarˈau waˈume zˈao na kusˈema, mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌaliaɡˈiza malkˈia vˈaʃti alˈetwe mbˈele jˈake, lakˈini ˌalikatˈaa..|0
lˈeo hˌii wˌanawˈake wa wakˈuu wa ˌuaɟˈemi na umˈedi ambˈao wˌamesikˈia ɟˌuːja tabˈia ja malkˈia wˌatawˌatendˈea wakˈuu wˈote wa mfˈalme vˈivjo hˈivjo. hˌapatˌakuwˈepo na mwˈiʃo wa ðarˈau na maɡˈomvi.|0
kwa hˈijo, kˌama ˌitampendˈeza mfˈalme, atˈoe ˈamri ja kifˈalme na ˌiandˈikwe katˌika ʃerˈia ja ˌuaɟˈemi na umˈedi, ambˈajo hˌaitˌabadilˈika, kwˌamba vˈaʃti kˈamwe asˈiɟe tˈena mbˈele ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero. pˈia mfˈalme na atˈoe hˈijo nafˈasi jˌake ja ˌumalkˈia kwa mwanˈamke mwiŋɡˈine alˈije bˈora kumlˈiko jˈeje.|0
kˈiʃa m̩bˈiu hˌii ja mfˈalme ˌitakˌapotaŋɡˈazwa katˌika himˈaja jˌake ilˈijo kˈubwa sˈana, wˌanawˈake wˈote wˌatawˌaheʃˈimu waˈume zˈao, kˌuanzˈia mdˈoɡo hˌadi mkˈubwa.|0
mfˈalme na wakˈuu wˌake wˌalipendˈezwa na ʃaˈuri hˈili, hˈivjo bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakafˈaɲa kˌama mˌemukˈani ˌalivjˌopendekˈeza.|0
ˌalipelˈeka barˈua katˌika sehˈemu zˈote za ufˈalme wˈake, kwa kˈila ɟˈimbo kwa mˌaandˈiʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe na kwa kˈila wˈatu katˌika lˈuɣa jˈao weɲˈewe, ˌakitaŋɡˈaza kwa msˈemo wa kˈila wˈatu kwˌamba ˌinampˈasa kˈila mwˌanaˈume kˌuwa mtawˈala wa ɲˈumba jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
bˌaadˈaje, wakˈati hasˈira ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌilikˈuwa ˌimetulˈia, ˌalimkumbˈuka vˈaʃti na kˈile ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamekifˈaɲa na ˌalilokˈuwa ˌameamˈuru ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌaliˌomhudumˈia mfˈalme wˌalipˌendekˈeza, na ˌufaɲˈike ˌutafˈiti kwa aɟˈili ja wˌanawˈali mˌabikˈira wazˈuri wa sˈura kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme na ˌateˈue mˌaafˈisa katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo la himˈaja jˌake kˌuwalˈeta hˈao wˌanawˈali wˈote wazˈuri wa sˈura katˌika ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani. kˈiʃa wawˈekwe tʃˈini ja ˌutunzˈaɟi wa heɡˈai, towˈaʃi wa mfˈalme, msˌimamˈizi wa wˌanawˈake; na wapˈewe matˈunzo jˈote ja urˈembo.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule ambˈaje ˌatampendˈeza mfˈalme na ˈawe malkˈia badˈala ja vˈaʃti. ʃaˈuri hˈili lˌikampendˈeza mfˈalme, nˌaje ˌakalˌifuˈata.|0
bˌasi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani pˌalikˈuwa na mjahˈudi wa kabˈila ja bˌeɲamˈini, ɟˈina lˈake mˌordekˈai mwˈana wa jaˈiri, mwˈana wa ʃimˈei, mwˈana wa kˈiʃi.|0
ambˈao wˌalitʃˌukulˈiwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu na mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza wa babˈeli, wakˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌotʃukulˈiwa matˈeka pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme jˌekonˈia wa jˈuda.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa na binˈamu jˌake msitʃˈana ˌalijeˈitwa hadˈasa, ambˈaje ˌalimlˈea kwa kˌuwa hakˈuwa na bˈaba wˈala mˈama. msitʃˈana hˈuju, ambˈaje pˈia ˌaliɟˌulikˈana kwa ɟˈina la ˈesta, ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumbo na sˈura ja kˌupendˈeza, nˌaje mˌordekˈai ˌalimtˈunza kˌama bˈinti jˌake mweɲˈewe baˌada ja bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake kˌufarˈiki.|0
wakˈati aɡˈizo na ˈamri ja mfˈalme lˌilitaŋɡˈazwa, wˌanawˈali wˈeŋɡi wˌalilˈetwa kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani na kuwˈekwa tʃˈini ja ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa heɡˈai. pˈia ˈesta ˌalipelˈekwa katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme na ˌakakˌabiðˈiwa heɡˈai, ˌalijekˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake.|0
msitʃˈana hˈuju ˌalimpendˈeza na kupˈata kibˈali mbˈele zˈake. mˈara mˈoɟa ˌakaˈanza kˈumpa matˈunzo ja uzˈuri na tʃakˈula maˈalum. alˈimpa ˈesta vˌiɟakˈazi sˈaba wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa kutˈoka ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, na kˌumhamiʃˈia jˌeje pamˈoɟa na vˌiɟakˈazi wˌake katˌika sehˈemu bˈora zaˈidi katˌika ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake.|0
ˈesta ˌalikˈuwa hˌaɟaðˌihirˈiʃa ˌuraˈia wˈala kabˈila lˈake, kwa sabˈabu mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemkatˈaza.|0
kˈila sˈiku mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitˌembeˌatembˈea karˈibu na ˈua wa ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake kuɟˈua ˈesta ˌalivjˌoendelˈea na kuˈona jˌalijokˈuwa jˌakitendˈeka kwˈake.|0
kˈabla zˈamu ja msitʃˈana hˌaiɟafˈika ja kwˈenda kwa mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, ˌilimbˈidi ˌatimˈize miˈezi kˈumi na miwˈili ja matˈunzo ja urˈembo kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa ˌimepˈaŋɡwa. kwa miˈezi sˈita wˌalikˈuwa wˌaɟipˈake mafˈuta ja mˌanemˈane, na miˈezi sˈita kˌuɟipˈaka mˌanukˈato na vˌipodˈozi.|0
bˌasi hˈivi ndˈivjo ambˈavjo msitʃˈana ˌaŋɡeiŋɡˈia kwa mfˈalme: kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃˌohitˈaɟi ˌalirˌuhusˈiwa kˌutʃukˈua kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake na kwˈenda nˈavjo katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
ɟiˈoni ˌaŋɡekwˈenda pˈale na ˌasubˈuhi kurˈudi sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine ja ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake katˌika ˌutunzˈaɟi wa ʃˌaaʃɡˈazi, towˈaʃi wa mfˈalme ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa mˌasurˈia. hˌaŋɡewˈeza kurˈudi kwa mfˈalme mpˈaka ˌapendˈezwe nˌaje na kˌuaɡˈiza aˈitwe kwa ɟˈina lˈake.|0
zˈamu ja ˈesta ˌilipofˈika kwˈenda kwa mfˈalme msitʃˈana ambˈaje mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemlˈea, bˈinti wa ˌabihaˈili mɟˈomba wˈake, ˈesta hˌakutˈaka vˈitu zaˈidi ja vˈile ambˈavjo heɡˈai, towˈaʃi wa mfˈalme ˌalijekˈuwa m̩kˈuu wa ɲˈumba ja wˌanawˈake ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemʃaˈuri. nˌaje ˈesta ˌalipˈata kibˈali kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijemwˈona.|0
ˈesta ˌalipelˈekwa kwa mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero katˌika makˈao ja mfˈalme mwˈezi wa kˈumi, jaˈani mwˈezi wa tebˈeθi, katˌika mwˈaka wˌake wa sˈaba wa kˌutawˈala.|0
bˌasi ikˈawa mfˈalme ˌalivutˈiwa na ˈesta kulˈiko wˌanawˈake weŋɡˈine wˈote, nˌaje ˌakapˈata ˌupendelˈeo na kibˈali kulˈiko mˌabikˈira weŋɡˈine. kˈiʃa ˌakamvˈika tˈaɟi la kifˈalme kitʃwˈani mwˈake na kumfˈaɲa malkˈia badˈala ja vˈaʃti.|0
mfˈalme ˌakafˈaɲa karˈamu kˈubwa, karˈamu ja ˈesta, kwa wakˈuu wˌake wˈote na mˌaafˈisa. mfˈalme ˌalitaŋɡˈaza mˌapumzˈiko katˌika maɟˈimbo jˌake jˈote na kuɡˈawa zawˈadi kwa ˌukarˈimu wa kifˈalme.|0
wakˈati mˌabikˈira wˌalikˌusaɲˈika mˈara ja pˈili, mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti katˌika lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini ˈesta ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefˈitʃa sˈiri ja kabˈila lˈake na ˌuraˈia wˈake, kˌama mˌordekˈai ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌamemwambˈia, kwa maˈana ˌaliˌendelˈea kˌufuˈata mˌaelekˈezo ja mˌordekˈai kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakifˈaɲa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakimlˈea.|0
wakˈati mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme, biɡθˈana na terˈeʃi, mˌaafˈisa wawˈili wa mfˈalme wˌaliokˈuwa walˈinzi wa lˈaŋɡo, wˌalikˌasirˈika na kupˈaŋɡa ɲɟˈama ja kˌumuˈua mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero.|0
lakˈini mˌordekˈai ˌaliɡundˈua hˈila hˌii na kˌumwambˈia malkˈia ˈesta, ambˈaje bˌaadˈaje ˌalimwarˈifu mfˈalme, hˈuku ˌakimsˈifu mˌordekˈai.|0
tˌaarˈifa hˈijo ˌilipˌotʃuŋɡˈuzwa na kˌuonekˈana kˌuwa kwˈeli, mˌaafˈisa hˈao wawˈili wˌaliaŋɡˈikwa ɟˌuːja mˈiti ja kˌuɲoŋɡˈea. hˈaja jˈote jˌaliandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
baˌada ja mˌatukˈio hˈaja, mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌalimheʃˈimu hamˈani mwˈana wa hˌamedˈaθa, mwaɡˈaɡi, ˌakampandˈiʃa na kˈumpa kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa heʃˈima tʃa ɟˈuu sˈana kulˈiko wakˈuu weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa mfˈalme wˌaliokˈaa laŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wˌalipˈiɡa maɡˈoti na kˈumpa hamˈani heʃˈima, kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌameamˈuru hˈili kuhˈusu hamˈani. lakˈini mˌordekˈai hˌakumpiɡˈia maɡˈoti wˈala kˌumheʃˈimu.|0
kˈiʃa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wˌaliokˈuwa laŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wˌalimˌuulˈiza mˌordekˈai, kwa nˈini hutˈii aɡˈizo la mfˈalme.|0
sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku wˌalizuŋɡˈumza nˌaje lakˈini hˌakukubˈali. kwa hˈijo wˌalimwelˈeza hamˈani kuˈona kˌama tabˈia ja mˌordekˈai ˌitawˈeza kˌuvumilˈiwa, kwa maˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌaambˈia kˌuwa jˌeje ni mjahˈudi.|0
wakˈati hamˈani ˌalipoˈona kˌuwa mˌordekˈai hˌampiɡˈii maɡˈoti wˈala kˈumpa heʃˈima ˌaliɣˌaðibˈika.|0
hˌata hˈivjo baˌada ja kˌuɟulˈiʃwa wˈatu wa mˌordekˈai ni akˈina nˈani, ˌalibadˈili wˈazo la kˌumuˈua mˌordekˈai pˈeke jˈake. badˈala jˌake hamˈani ˌalitafˈuta ɲɟˈia ja kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu wˈote wa mˌordekˈai, jaˈani, wˌajahˈudi, walˈio katˌika ufˈalme wˈote wa ˌahasuˈero.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza ˌuitwˈao nisˈani, wˌalipˈiɡa pˈuri jaˈani kˈura mbˈele ja hamˈani ˌili kˌutʃaɡˈua sˈiku na mwˈezi. kˈura ˌikaˌaŋɡukˈia kwˈeɲe mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili, jaˈani adˈari.|0
kˈiʃa hamˈani ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, wˈako wˈatu fulˈani wˌameenˈea na kˌutawaɲˈika mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu katˌika maɟˈimbo jˈote ja ufˈalme wˈako, ambˈao destˈuri zˈao ni tˌofaˈuti na zˈile za wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote, nˌao hˌawatˈii ʃerˈia za mfˈalme. hˌaifˈai mfˈalme kˌuwavˌumilˈia wˈatu hˈawa.|0
kˌama ˌinampendˈeza mfˈalme, ˌitolˈewe ˈamri kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, nˌami nˌitawˈeka talˈanta kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða katˌika hazˈina ja mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˌatakˌaoʃˌuɣulikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌalitʃukˈua pˈete jˌake ja muhˈuri kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kidˈole tʃˈake na kˈumpa hamˈani mwˈana wa hˌamedˈaθa, mwaɡˈaɡi, adˈui wa wˌajahˈudi.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia hamˈani, bˈaki na fˈeða jˈako na ˌuwatendˈee hˈao wˈatu ˌutakˈavjo.|0
kˈiʃa sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza wˌaandˈiʃi wa mfˈalme wˌaliˈitwa. wˌakaandˈika barˈua kwa kˈila ɟˈimbo na katˌika kˈila lˈuɣa ja wˈatu kˌama aɡˈizo la hamˈani lˌilivjotˈoka kwa mfˈalme, kwa wˌatawˈala wa maɟˈimbo mbˌalimbˈali, na wakˈuu wa wˈatu mbˌalimbˈali. hˈizi zˌiliandˈikwa kwa ɟˈina la mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero mweɲˈewe na kutˈiwa muhˈuri wa pˈete jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
barˈua zˌilipelˈekwa na tarˈiʃi katˌika maɟˈimbo jˈote ja mfˈalme zikˈiwa na ˈamri ja kˌuharˈibu, kuˈua na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌajahˈudi wˈote, wadˈoɡo kwa wakˈubwa, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wadˈoɡo, sˈiku mˈoɟa, jaˈani sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa adˈari, na pˈia kutˈeka ɲˈara vˈitu vjˈao.|0
nakˈala ja andˈiko la ˈamri ˌilipˈaswa kˌutolˈewa kˌama ʃerˈia katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo, na kˌufahamˈiʃwa kwa wˈatu wa kˈila taˈifa ˌili wawˈeze kˌuwa tajˈari kwa sˈiku ˈile.|0
kwa kˌuharakˈiʃwa na ˈamri ja mfˈalme, mˌatarˈiʃi wˌalikwˈenda na andˈiko lˌilitolˈewa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani. mfˈalme na hamˈani wˌalikˈeti na kˈuɲua, lakˈini ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani ˌulifˌaðaˈika.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌalipoɟˈua jˈote jˌalijokwˈiʃa kˌufaɲˈika, ˌalirarˈua mavˈazi jˌake na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia na kˌuɟipˈaka maɟˈivu, ˌakaˈenda mɟˈini, ˌakiˌombolˈeza kwa saˈuti na kwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌalikwˈenda ˌakasimˈama ɲɟˈe ja lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme, kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌeruhusˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia.|0
katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo ambˈapo ˈamri na aɡˈizo la mfˈalme lˌilifˈika, kˌulikˈuwa na mˌaombolˈezo makˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌajahˈudi pamˈoɟa na kufˈuŋɡa, kulˈia na kˌuombolˈeza. wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌakalˈala ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia na maɟˈivu.|0
wˌaɟakˈazi wa ˈesta na mˌatowˈaʃi wˌalipokˈuɟa na kˌumwambˈia kuhˈusu mˌordekˈai, ˌalipˈatwa na huzˈuni kˈuu. ˌalimtumˈia ŋɡˈuo avˈae badˈala ja ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia, lakˈini mˌordekˈai hˌakuzˌikubˈali.|0
ndˈipo ˈesta ˌakamwˈita haθˈaki, mmˌoɟawˈapo wa mˌatowˈaʃi wa mfˈalme ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈekwa kˌumhudumˈia ˈesta, ˌakamwaɡˈiza kˌutafˈuta ni nˈini kˌilikˈuwa kˌikimtˌaabˈiʃa mˌordekˈai na ni kwa nˈini.|0
bˌasi haθˈaki ˌalitˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌumwendˈea mˌordekˈai kwˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa ulˈio wˈazi wa ˈm̩ɟi mbˈele ja lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌakamwambˈia kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo kˌimempˈata, pamˈoɟa na hesˈabu kamˈili ja fˈeða ambˈazo hamˈani ˌaliahˈidi kulˈipa katˌika hazˈina ja mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja wˌajahˈudi.|0
akˈampa nakˈala ja andˈiko la ˈamri kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao, lˌililokˈuwa lˌimetʃapˈiʃwa hˌuko ʃuʃˈani, kˌumwoɲˈeʃa ˈesta na kˌumwelezˈea. mˌordekˈai ˌakamwambˈia towˈaʃi ˌamʃawˈiʃi ˈesta kwˈenda mbˈele ja mfˈalme kuˈomba rehˈema na kumsˈihi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˈesta ˌakamwamˈuru haθˈaki ˌamwelˈeze mˌordekˈai.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa mfˈalme na wˈatu wa maɟˈimbo ja ufˈalme wˌanaɟˈua kˌuwa mwˌanaˈume ˌau mwanˈamke jejˈote ambˈaje ˌataiŋɡˈia kumwˈona mfˈalme katˌika ˈua wa ndˈani bˌila kuˈitwa, mfˈalme ˈana ʃerˈia mˈoɟa tˈu: ˌatauˈawa. ɲɟˈia pekˈee kiɲˈume na hˈili ni mfˈalme kˌumɲooʃˈea fˈimbo ja ðahˈabu ˌili aˈiʃi. lakˈini sˈiku θˌelaθˈini zˌimepˈita ʃˈu nˌilipoˈitwa kwˈenda kwa mfˈalme.|0
wakˈati mˌordekˈai ˌaliˌarifˈiwa manˈeno ja ˈesta.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌalirudˈiʃa ɟˈibu hˈili: ˌusifikˈiri kwˌamba kwa sabˈabu ˈuko katˌika ɲˈumba ja mfˈalme wˌewe pekˈee katˌika wˌajahˈudi wˈote ˌutapˈona.|0
kwa kˌuwa kˌama ˌutakˈaa kˈimja wakˈati hˈuu, msaˈada na ˌukombˈozi kwa wˌajahˈudi ˌutatˈoka mahˈali peŋɡˈine, lakˈini wˌewe na ɟamˈaa ja bˈaba jˈako mtˌaaŋɡamˈia. nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje kwˌamba hukˈuɟa kwˈeɲe nafˈasi ja mamlˈaka kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈati kˌama hˈuu.|0
kˈiʃa ˈesta ˌalitˈuma ɟˈibu hˈili kwa mˌordekˈai.|0
nˈenda, kusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliˈoko ʃuʃˈani, nˌaɲi mfˈuŋɡe kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu. msˈile wˈala kˈuɲua kwa sˈiku tˈatu, usˈiku na mtʃˈana. mˌimi na wˌaɟakˈazi wˈaŋɡu tˌutafˈuŋɡa kˌama mnˌavjofˈaɲa. baˌada ja kˌufaɲˈika hˈili, nˌitakwˈenda kwa mfˈalme, hˌata iŋɡˈawa ni kiɲˈume tʃa ʃerˈia. ikˈiwa ni kˌuaŋɡamˈia na nˌiaŋɡamˈie.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌordekˈai ˌalikwˈenda zˌake na kˌutekelˈeza mˌaaɡˈizo jˈote ja ˈesta.|0
sˈiku ja tˈatu, ˈesta ˌalivˈaa mavˈazi jˌake ja kˌimalkˈia, nˌaje ˌakasimˈama katˌika ˈua wa ndˈani wa ɟˈumba la mfˈalme, mbˈele ja ukˈumbi wa mfˈalme. nˌaje mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌakikˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa kifˈalme katˌika ukˈumbi, ˌakiˌelekˈea laŋɡˈoni.|0
ˌalipomwˈona malkˈia ˈesta ˌamesimˈama uˈani ˌalipendˈezwa nˈaje, ˌakamɲˌooʃˈea fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala ja ðahˈabu ˈile ˌilijokˈuwa mkonˈoni mwˈake. kwa hˈijo ˈesta ˌalikˌaribˈia na kˌuiɡˈusa ˈn̩tʃa ja fˈimbo ja mfˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌaliulˈiza, malkˈia ˈesta, ni nˈini? ˈombi lˈako ni nˈini? hˌata kˌama ni nˈusu ja ufˈalme, ˌutapˈewa.|0
ˈesta ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama ˌitampendˈeza mfˈalme, mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na hamˈani wˈaɟe lˈeo katˌika karˈamu ambˈajo nˌimeˌiandˈaa kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, mletˈeni hamˈani mˈara mˈoɟa, ˌili tupˈate kufˈaɲa lˈile ˈesta ˌanaloˈomba. kwa hˈijo mfˈalme na hamˈani wˌalihˌuðurˈia karˈamu ˌalijˌoiandˈaa ˈesta.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wakˈiɲua mvˈiɲo mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza ˈesta tˈena, sˈasa hˈaɟa jˈako ni nˈini? ˌutapˈewa. ˈombi lˈako ni nˈini? hˌata nˈusu ja ufˈalme, ˌutapˈewa.|0
ˈesta ˌakaɟˈibu, hˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu na ˈombi lˈaŋɡu ni hˈili.|0
kˌama mfˈalme ˌameˈona vjˈema, nˌami nˌimepˈata kibˈali kwˈake na kˌama ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme kunˈipa ˈombi lˈaŋɡu na kˌunitˌimizˈia hˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu, mfˈalme na hamˈani wˈaɟe kwˈaŋɡu kˈeʃo katˌika karˈamu nˌitakˌajowˌaandalˈia. kˈiʃa nˌitaɟˈibu swˈali la mfˈalme.|0
hamˈani ˌalitˈoka sˈiku hˈijo kwa furˈaha na mˈojo mtʃaŋɡˈamfu. lakˈini ˌalipomwˈona mˌordekˈai laŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme na kuˈona kwˌamba hˌakusimˈama wˈala hˌakuoɲˈeʃa hˈofu mbˈele jˈake, ˌaliɟˈawa na ɣaðˈabu ðˈidi ja mˌordekˈai.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hamˈani ˌaliɟˌizuˈia ˌakaˈenda zˌake ɲumbˈani. ˌakawaˈita pamˈoɟa rafˈiki zˌake na zerˈeʃi, mkˈewe.|0
hamˈani ˌakaɟˌisifˈia kwˈao ɟˌuːja ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake mwˈiŋɡi, wanˈawe wˈeŋɡi na kwa ɲɟˈia zˈote ambˈazo mfˈalme ˌamemheʃˈimu kwˈazo na ɟˈinsi ˌalivjomwˈeka ɟˌuːja wakˈuu na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine.|0
hamˈani ˌakaoŋɡˈeza, si hˈajo tˈu. mˌimi n̩dˈije ˈm̩tu pekˈee ambˈaje malkˈia ˈesta ˌamemwalˈika kˌumsindikˈiza mfˈalme kwˈeɲe karˈamu ˌalijˌomwandalˈia. nˌaje ˌamenˌialˈika pamˈoɟa na mfˈalme kˈeʃo.|0
lakˈini hˈaja jˈote hˌajanˈipi kˌuriðˈika iwˈapo nˌinaˌendelˈea kumwˈona jˈule mjahˈudi mˌordekˈai ˌakikˈeti kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme.|0
zerˈeʃi mkˈewe na rafˈiki zˌake wˈote wˌakamwambˈia, tˌeŋɡenˈeza mahˈali pa kˌuaŋɡˈika wˈatu kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa hamsˈini, kˈiʃa kˈeʃo ˌasubˈuhi mwˈombe mfˈalme mˌordekˈai ˌaaŋɡˈikwe ɟˈuu jˈake. ndˈipo uˈende na mfˈalme kwˈeɲe karˈamu kwa furˈaha. ʃaˈuri hˈili lˌilimpendˈeza hamˈani, nˌaje ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa kˌuaŋɡˈika wˈatu.|0
usˈiku ˈule mfˈalme hˌakupˈata ˌusiŋɡˈizi, hˈivjo ˌakaaɡˈiza ˌaletˈewe kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za mˌatukˈio ja ˌutawˈala wˈake, ˌasomˈewe.|0
kitˈabu hˈitʃo kˌilikˈutwa na kˌumbukˈumbu kwˌamba mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˌamefitʃˈua ɟˈinsi biɡθˈana na terˈeʃi, wˌaliokˈuwa mˌaafˈisa wawˈili wa mfˈalme, walˈinzi wa lˈaŋɡo wˌalivjokˈuwa wˌamepˈaŋɡa hˈila ja kˌumuˈua mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza, ɟˈe, ni heʃˈima na ʃukrˈani ɡˈani mˌordekˈai ˌalipokˈea kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈambo hˈili? wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈuna lolˈote ˌalilˌofaɲˈiwa.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, ni nˈani jˈuko uˈani? wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo hamˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌameiŋɡˈia ˈua wa ɲɟˈe wa ɟˈumba la mfˈalme kusˈema na mfˈalme kuhˈusu kˌumwaŋɡˈika mˌordekˈai katˌika mahˈali pa kˌuaŋɡikˈia wˈatu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamepaɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌakamɟˈibu, hamˈani ˌamesimˈama uˈani. mfˈalme ˌakaamˈuru, mletˈeni ndˈani.|0
hamˈani ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia, mfˈalme ˌalimˌuulˈiza, ˌafaɲˈiwe nˈini ˈm̩tu ambˈaje mfˈalme apˈenda kˌumheʃˈimu? bˌasi hamˈani ˌakawˈaza mojˈoni mwˈake, ni nˈani mwiŋɡˈine ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌaŋɡemheʃˈimu kulˈiko mˈimi.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, kwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje mfˈalme apˈenda kˌumheʃˈimu.|0
ˌaletˈewe ɟˈoho la kifˈalme ambˈalo mfˈalme ˌameʃˌalivˈaa na farˈasi ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌaliʃampˈanda, ambˈaje ˌamevˈikwa tˈaɟi ja kifˈalme kitʃwˈani mwˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ɟˈoho na farˈasi vˌikabiðˈiwe kwa mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wakˈuu wa mfˈalme ˌanajˌeheʃimˈika sˈana. nˌao wamvˈike ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌanapˈenda kˌumheʃˈimu, na ˌaoŋɡˈozwe akˈiwa ɟˌuːja farˈasi kˌupitˈia bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi, wˌakitaŋɡˈaza mbˈele jˈake, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌanavjˌofaɲˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje mfˈalme apˈenda kˌumheʃˈimu!.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwamˈuru hamˈani, nˈenda mˈara mˈoɟa, tʃukˈua ɟˈoho na farˈasi na ufˈaɲe kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌopendekˈeza kwa mˌordekˈai mjahˈudi, ˌakaˈaje laŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme. ˌusipuˈuze kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌulitʃˌoʃaˈuri.|0
hˈivjo hamˈani ˌakatʃukˈua ɟˈoho na farˈasi. ˌakamvˈika mˌordekˈai, na kˌumpandˈiʃa ɟˌuːja farˈasi ˌakamtembˈeza katˌika bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi ˌakitaŋɡˈaza mbˈele jˈake, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌanavjˌofaɲˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌanapˈenda kˌumheʃˈimu.|0
bˌaadˈaje mˌordekˈai ˌakarˈudi kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la mfˈalme. lakˈini hamˈani ˌakakimbˈia ɲumbˈani, akˈiwa ˌameɟˈaa huzˈuni.|0
nˌaje ˌakamwelˈeza zerˈeʃi mkˈewe pamˈoɟa na rafˈiki zˌake wˈote kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo kˌimempˈata. wˌaʃaˈuri wˌake pamˈoɟa na zerˈeʃi mkˈewe wˌakamwambˈia, kwa kˌuwa mˌordekˈai, ambˈaje mbˈele jˌake ˌumeˈanza kˌuaŋɡˈuka ni wa asˈili ja kˌijahˈudi, huwˈezi kˌuʃindˈana nˈaje; kwa hakˈika ˌutaaŋɡˈuka.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa bˈado wˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈaje, mˌatowˈaʃi wa mfˈalme wakˈaɟa na kˌumharakˈiʃa hamˈani aˈende katˌika karˈamu ˌalijˌoiandˈaa ˈesta.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme na hamˈani wˌakaˈenda kˈula tʃakˈula pamˈoɟa na malkˈia ˈesta.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wakˈiɲua mvˈiɲo katˌika sˈiku ja pˈili, mfˈalme ˌakaulˈiza tˈena, malkˈia ˈesta, ni nˈini hˈaɟa jˈako? ˌutapˈewa. ˈombi lˈako ni nˈini? hˌata nˈusu ja ufˈalme, ˌutapˈewa.|0
kˈiʃa malkˈia ˈesta ˌakaɟˈibu, kˌama nˌimepˈata kibˈali kwˈako, ˈee mfˈalme, tˈena kˌama ˌinapendˈeza ˌutukˈufu wˈako, nˌiɟalˈie maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, hˌii n̩dˈijo hˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu. pˈia ˌuokˈoe wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, hˈili ndˈilo ˈombi lˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˌimi na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu tˌumeˈuzwa kwa kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa, kutʃˈiɲɟua na kˌuharibˈiwa. kˌama tˌuŋɡalikˈuwa tˌumeˈuzwa tu kˌuwa watˈumwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, nˌiŋɡalˌiɲamˈaza kˈimja, kwa sabˈabu ʃˈida kˌama hˌii ˌisiŋɡˌalitˈoʃa kˌumsumbˈua mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌakamˌuulˈiza malkˈia ˈesta, ni nˈani hˈuju? jˈuko wˈapi ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌalijˌeθubˈutu kufˈaɲa ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili.|0
ˈesta ˌakasˈema, mtˈesi na adˈui ni hˈuju mwˈovu hamˈani. hamˈani ˌalifˌaðaˈika mbˈele ja mfˈalme na malkˈia.|0
mfˈalme ˌakainˈuka kwa ɣaðˈabu, ˌakaˈatʃa mvˈiɲo wˈake, ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe bustˈani ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. lakˈini hamˈani, ˌakitambˈua kwˌamba mfˈalme ˌameʃˌaamˈua hatˈima jˈake, ˌalibˈaki ɲˈuma kumsˈihi malkˈia ˈesta ˌaokˈoe maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mˈara mfˈalme ˌaliporˈudi kutˈoka bustˈani ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kˈuɟa kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa karˈamu, hamˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiɟitˈupa ɟˌuːja kˈiti mahˈali ambˈapo ˈesta ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˌeɡemˈea. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema kwa ŋɡˈuvu, ɟˈe, ˌatamðˌalilˈiʃa malkˈia hˌata hˈuku ɲumbˈani akˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈami! mˈara nˈeno lˌilipotˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa mfˈalme, wˌalifunˈika ˈuso wa hamˈani.|0
kˈiʃa harbˈona, mmˈoɟa wa mˌatowˈaʃi wˌanaˌomtumikˈia mfˈalme, ˌakasˈema, mahˈali pa kˌuaŋɡˈika wˈatu pˈeɲe urˈefu wa mˈita ˌiʃirˈini na mbˈili pˈako ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa hamˈani. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˌateŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja mˌordekˈai, ambˈaje ˌalizuŋɡˈumza ˌili kˌumsaidˈia mfˈalme. mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, mwˌaŋɡikˈeni ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakamtundˈika hamˈani mahˈali ˌalipokˈuwa ˌameandˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja mˌordekˈai. ndˈipo ɣaðˈabu ja mfˈalme ˌikatulˈia.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero akˈampa malkˈia ˈesta ʃˈamba la hamˈani, adˈui wa wˌajahˈudi. nˌaje mˌordekˈai akˈaɟa mbˈele ja mfˈalme, kwa kˌuwa ˈesta ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesˈema ɟˈinsi ˌanavjˌohusiˈana nˈaje.|0
mfˈalme ˌakaivˈua pˈete jˌake ja muhˈuri, ambˈajo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemɲaŋɡˈaɲa hamˈani, akˈampa mˌordekˈai, nˌaje ˈesta ˌakamwˈeka mˌordekˈai ɟˌuːja ʃˈamba la hamˈani.|0
ˈesta ˌalimsˈihi tˈena mfˈalme, ˌakiaŋɡˈuka mˌiɡuˈuni pˈake na kulˈia. ˌakamwˈomba ˌakomˈeʃe mpˈaŋɡo mwˈovu wa hamˈani mwaɡˈaɡi ambˈao ˌalikˈuwa ˌameupˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌajahˈudi.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌalimɲˌooʃˈea ˈesta fˈimbo jˌake ja ˌutawˈala ja ðahˈabu nˌaje ˌaliinˈuka na kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈake.|0
ˈesta ˌakasˈema, kˌama ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme, nˌami kˌama nˌikipˈata kibˈali nˌaje ˌakiˈona ni ɟˈambo lilˈilo sˈawa kˌunitendˈea na kˌama ˌakipendˈezwa nˈami, bˌasi ˌiandˈikwe ˈamri ja kˌuzitaŋɡˈua barˈua zˈile hamˈani mwˈana wa hˌamedˈaθa, mwaɡˈaɡi, ˌalizotˈuŋɡa na kˌuandˈika kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌajahˈudi katˌika maɟˈimbo jˈote ja mfˈalme.|0
kwa maˈana nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuvumilˈia kuˈona maˈafa jˌakiwapˈata wˈatu wˈaŋɡu? nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuvumilˈia kuˈona mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu.|0
mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌakawaɟˈibu malkˈia ˈesta na mˌordekˈai mjahˈudi, kwa sabˈabu hamˈani ˌaliwˌaʃambulˈia wˌajahˈudi, nˌimetˈoa ʃˈamba la hamˈani kwa ˈesta, nˌaje ˌameaŋɡˈikwa kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ti wa kˌuɲoŋɡˈea.|0
bˌasi andˈika ˈamri ɲiŋɡˈine kwa ɟˈina la mfˈalme kwa aɟˈili ja wˌajahˈudi kˌama ˌunavjoˈona vjˈema, kˈiʃa ˌuifˈuŋɡe kwa kutˈia muhˈuri kwa pˈete ja mfˈalme kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna andˈiko lˌililˌoandˈikwa kwa ɟˈina la mfˈalme na kutˈiwa muhˈuri kwa pˈete ja mfˈalme lˌinalowˈeza kˌutaŋɡulˈiwa.|0
mˈara mˈoɟa wˌaandˈiʃi wa mfˈalme wˌakaˈitwa kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu, mwˈezi wa tˈatu, n̩dˈio mwˈezi wa siwˈani. wˌakaandˈika jˈote mˌordekˈai ˌalijˌoamˈuru kwa wˌajahˈudi, kwa mˌaɟemadˈari, wˌatawˈala na wakˈuu wa maɟˈimbo mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininasˈaba kˌuanzˈia bˈara hˈindi mpˈaka kˈuʃi. mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja jˌaliandˈikwa kwa mˌaandˈiʃi ja kˈila ɟˈimbo na kwa lˈuɣa ja kˈila ˈm̩tu pˈia kwa wˌajahˈudi kwa mˌaandˈiʃi jˈao weɲˈewe na lˈuɣa jˈao.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌaliandˈika ɲarˈaka kwa ɟˈina la mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, ˌakazitˈia muhˈuri kwa pˈete ja mfˈalme na kˌuzipelˈeka kwa ɲɟˈia ja mˌatarˈiʃi, ambˈao wˌaliendˈeʃa farˈasi wˌaendˈao kˈasi wˌaliˌozalˈiʃwa maˈalum kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme.|0
warˈaka wa mfˈalme ˌuliwˌaruhˈusu wˌajahˈudi katˌika kˈila ˈm̩ɟi kˌuwa na hˈaki ja kˌukusaɲˈika na kˌuɟilˈinda weɲˈewe; kˌuharˈibu, kuˈua na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ɟˈeʃi lolˈote, taˈifa lolˈote ˌau ɟˈimbo lˈile lˌitakˌalowˌaʃambulˈia wˈao, wˌake zˈao, watˈoto wˌao na kutˈeka mˈali za adˈui zˈao.|0
sˈiku ambˈajo ˌiliwˈekwa kwa wˌajahˈudi kufˈaɲa hˈili katˌika maɟˈimbo jˈote ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌilikˈuwa sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili, jaˈani mwˈezi wa adˈari.|0
nakˈala ja taŋɡˈazo ˌilikˈuwa ˌitolˈewe kˌama ʃerˈia katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo na iwˈeze kˌuɟulikˈana kwa wˈatu wa kˈila taˈifa, ˌili kwˌamba wˌajahˈudi wˈawe tajˈari sˈiku hˈijo kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi kwa adˈui zˈao.|0
mˌatarˈiʃi, wakˈiwa wˌamepˈanda farˈasi wa kifˈalme, wˌalitˈoka m̩bˈio wˌakitʃotʃˈewa na aɡˈizo la mfˈalme. taŋɡˈazo lˌilitolˈewa pˈia katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌakaondˈoka mbˈele ja mfˈalme akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa mavˈazi ja kifˈalme ja bulˈuu na ɲeˈupe, tˈaɟi kˈubwa la ðahˈabu na ɟˈoho la zˌambarˈau la kitˈani sˈafi. na ˈm̩ɟi wa ʃuʃˈani ˌukaʃˌerehekˈea kwa furˈaha.|0
kwa maˈana kwa wˌajahˈudi ˌulikˈuwa wakˈati wa rˈaha na furˈaha, ʃˈaŋɡwe na heʃˈima.|0
katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo na katˌika kˈila ɟˈiɟi, popˈote warˈaka wa mfˈalme ˌulipofˈika, kˌulikuwˈepo furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌajahˈudi, pamˈoɟa na karˈamu na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia. na wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wa mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine wˌakaɟifˈaɲa wˌajahˈudi kwa sabˈabu ja kˌuwahˈofu wˌajahˈudi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili, jaˈani mwˈezi wa adˈari, ˈamri ˌilijˌoaɡˈizwa na mfˈalme ˌilikˈuwa ˌitekelˈezwe. sˈiku hˌii adˈui wa wˌajahˈudi wˌalikˈuwa wˌametˌumaˈini kˌuwaʃˈinda, lakˈini sˈasa mˈambo jˌaliwˌaɡeukˈia na wˌajahˈudi wˌakawaʃˈinda wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanawˌatʃukˈia.|0
wˌajahˈudi wˌalikˌusaɲˈika katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao, katˌika maɟˈimbo ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanatafˈuta kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijewˈeza kˌuʃindˈana nˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wa mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote wˌaliwˌaoɡˈopa.|0
nˌao wakˈuu wˈote wa maɟˈimbo, mˌaɟemadˈari, wˌatawˈala na mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wˌakawˌasaidˈia wˌajahˈudi, kwa sabˈabu wˌalimhˈofu mˌordekˈai.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mˌaʃuhˈuri katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme; sˈifa zˌake zˌilienˈea katˌika maɟˈimbo jˈote nˌaje ˌalipˈata uwˈezo zaˈidi na zaˈidi.|0
wˌajahˈudi wˌaliwˌaaŋɡˈuʃa adˈui zˈao wˈote kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌakiwaˈua na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, nˌao wˌalifˈaɲa kˈile wˌalitʃotˈaka kwa wˈale wˌaliˌowatʃukˈia.|0
katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani wˌajahˈudi wˌaliˈua na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌanaˈume mˌiatˈano.|0
pˈia wˌaliwaˈua pˌarʃendˈaθa, dalfˈoni, aspˈaθa.|0
porˈaθa, ˌadalˈia, ardˈaθa.|0
parmˈaʃta, ˌarisˈai, ˌaridˈai na wˌaizˈaθa.|0
wˈana kˈumi wa hamˈani mwˈana wa hˌamedˈaθa, adˈui wa wˌajahˈudi. lakˈini hˌawakˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara.|0
mfˈalme ˌaliˌarifˈiwa sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo hesˈabu ja wˌaliˌouˈawa katˌika ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia malkˈia ˈesta, wˌajahˈudi wˌamewaˈua wˌanaˈume mˌiatˈano na wˈana kˈumi wa hamˈani ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani. wˌamefaɲˈaɟe katˌika maɟˈimbo meŋɡˈine ja mfˈalme jˌalijobˈaki? ɟˈe, sˈasa hˈaɟa jˈako ni nˈini? nˈajo pˈia ˌutapˈewa. nˈalo ˈombi lˈako ni nˈini? nˈalo ˌutafaɲˈiwa.|0
ˈesta ˌakaɟˈibu, ˌikimpendˈeza mfˈalme, uwˈape ruhˈusa wˌajahˈudi wˌaliˈoko ʃuʃˈani wˌarudˈie ˈamri ja lˈeo kˈeʃo pˈia, na wˈana wa hamˈani kˈumi waɲˈoŋɡwe mahˈali pa kˌuɲoŋɡˈea wˈatu.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakaamˈuru kwˌamba hˈili lˌitendˈeke. ˈamri ˌilitolˈewa hˌuko ʃuʃˈani, nˌao wˌakawaɲˈoŋɡa wˈana kˈumi wa hamˈani.|0
wˌajahˈudi hˌuko ʃuʃˈani wˌakakˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa adˈari, nˌao wˌakawaˈua wˌanaˈume mˌiatˈatu hˌuko ʃuʃˈani, lakˈini hˌawakˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara zˈao.|0
wakˈati ˈule ˈule, wˌajahˈudi weŋɡˈine wˌaliokˈuwa kwˈeɲe maɟˈimbo ja mfˈalme, wˌakakˌusaɲˈika kˌuɟilˈinda nˌao wˌakapˈata nafˈuu kˌutokˈana na adˈui zˈao. wˌaliˈua adˈui zˈao wˌapatˈao sabˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri lakˈini hˌawakuɡˈusa ɲˈara zˈao.|0
hˈili lˌilitendˈeka sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu ja mwˈezi wa adˈari na sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne wˌalipumzˈika na kˌuifˈaɲa sˈiku ja karˈamu na furˈaha.|0
wˌajahˈudi hˌuko ʃuʃˈani, hˌata hˈivjo, wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˌusaɲˈika sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈatu na ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne, pˈia sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano wˌalipumzˈika na kˌuifˈaɲa sˈiku ja karˈamu na furˈaha.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌajahˈudi wˌanaokˈaa vˌiɟiɟˈini na katˌika mˈiɟi midˈoɡo hˌuaðimˈiʃa sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa adˈari kˌama sˈiku ja furˈaha na karˈamu, sˈiku ambˈajo wˌao hˌupeˈana zawˈadi mmˈoɟa kwa mwiŋɡˈine.|0
mˌordekˈai ˌaliandˈika mˌatukˈio hˈaja, nˌaje ˌakapelˈeka barˈua kwa wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliˈoko katˌika maɟˈimbo ja mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, maɟˈimbo jalˈijo mbˈali na karˈibu.|0
ˌakiwatˈaka kˈila mwˈaka wˌaʃerˌehekˈee sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne na ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi wa adˈari.|0
kˌama wakˈati ambˈao wˌajahˈudi wˌalipˈata nafˈuu kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈao na kˌama mwˈezi ambˈao huzˈuni jˈao ˌiliɡeˈuzwa kˌuwa furˈaha na kˌuombolˈeza kwˈao kˌuwa sˈiku ja kˌuʃerˌehekˈea. ˌaliwˌaandikˈia kuʃˈika sˈiku hˈizo kˌama sˈiku za karˈamu na za furˈaha na kˌupeˈana zawˈadi za vjakˈula wˌao kwa wˌao na zawˈadi kwa maskˈini.|0
hˈivjo wˌajahˈudi wˌalikubˈali kˌuendelˈeza ʃerˈehe wˌalizokˈuwa wˌameziˈanza, wˌakifˈaɲa lˈile mˌordekˈai ˌalilokˈuwa ˌamewˌaandikˈia.|0
kwa maˈana hamˈani mwˈana wa hˌamedˈaθa mwaɡˈaɡi, adˈui wa wˌajahˈudi wˈote, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈaŋɡa hˈila ðˈidi ja wˌajahˈudi ˌili kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, na ˌalikˈuwa ˌamepˈiɡa pˈuri jaˈani kˈura kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi na ˌuharibˈifu wˈao.|0
lakˈini wakˈati ʃaˈuri hˌilo bˈaja lˌilipˌoarifˈiwa kwa mfˈalme, ˌalitˈoa ˈamri ˌilijˌoandˈikwa kwˌamba mipˈaŋɡo mibˈaja ambˈajo hamˈani ˌameipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌajahˈudi ˌinapˈasa ˌimrudˈie ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe, na kwˌamba jˌeje na wanˈawe wˌaaŋɡˈikwe mahˈali pa kˌuɲoŋɡˈea wˈatu.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈiku hˈizi zˌiliˈitwa purˈimu, kˌutokˈana na nˈeno pˈuri. kwa sabˈabu ja kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoandˈikwa kwˈeɲe barˈua hˌii na kwa sabˈabu ja jˈale wˌalijˌojaˈona na jˈale jˌalijˌowatokˈea.|0
wˌajahˈudi wˌakatʃukˈua na kˌuifˈaɲa destˈuri kwˌamba wˌao na wazˈao wˌao na wˈote ambˈao wˌaliɟiˈuŋɡa nˌao wˌaŋɡefˈaɲa bˌila kuˈatʃa kuʃˈika sˈiku hˈizi mbˈili kˈila mwˈaka, kwa ɲɟˈia ˌilivjˌoelekˈezwa na kwa wakˈati wˈake.|0
sˈiku hˈizi zˌinapˈasa zˌikumbˈukwe na kˌuaðimˈiʃwa katˌika kˈila kizˈazi, kˈila ɟamˈaa na katˌika kˈila ɟˈimbo na kˈila ɟˈiɟi. nˈazo sˈiku hˈizi za purˈimu kˈamwe zˌisikˈome kˌuʃerˌehekˈewa na wˌajahˈudi, wˈala kˌumbukˈumbu zˌake zˌisipotˈee mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈao wˈake.|0
bˌasi malkˈia ˈesta bˈinti ˌabihaˈili, pamˈoɟa na mˌordekˈai, mjahˈudi, wˌaliandˈika kwa mamlˈaka jˈote kˌuθibitˈiʃa barˈua hˌii ja pˈili kuhˈusu purˈimu.|0
nˌaje mˌordekˈai ˌakatˈuma barˈua kwa wˌajahˈudi wˈote katˌika maɟˈimbo mˌiamˈoɟa ˌiʃirˈininasˈaba ja ufˈalme wa ˌahasuˈero, barˈua zˌeɲe manˈeno ja amˈani na mˌatumaˈini.|0
ˌili kˌuimarˈiʃa sˈiku hˈizi za purˈimu katˌika maɟˈira jˌake jˌalijowˈekwa, kˌama mˌordekˈai, mjahˈudi na malkˈia ˈesta wˌalivjˌowaamˈuru, na wˌalivjˌoɟiˌimarˈiʃa weɲˈewe na wazˈao wˌao kuhˈusu ɲakˈati za kufˈuŋɡa na kˌuombolˈeza.|0
ˈamri ja ˈesta ˌiliθˌibitˈiʃa tˌaratˈibu hˈizi kuhˈusu purˈimu, nˈajo ˌikaandˈikwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero ˌalitˈoza uʃˈuru katˌika ufˈalme wˌake wˈote hˌadi kwˈeɲe mˌiambˈao jˌake ja mbˈali.|0
matˈendo jˌake jˈote ja ŋɡˈuvu na uwˈezo, pamˈoɟa na habˈari zˈote za ukˈuu wa mˌordekˈai ambˈao mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemkˈuza, ɟˈe, hˌajakˌuandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu za wafˈalme wa umˈedi na ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
mˌordekˈai mjahˈudi ˌalikˈuwa wa pˈili kwa tʃˈeo kutˈoka mfˈalme ˌahasuˈero, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa bˈora kabˈisa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌajahˈudi, ˌakipandˈiʃwa katˌika heʃˈima ja ɟˈuu na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˌajahˈudi kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwˌatendˈea mˈema wˈatu wˈake, na ˌalizuŋɡˈumza kwa aɟˈili ja ustˈawi wa wˌajahˈudi wˈote.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈusi pˌaliˈiʃi ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌaliˈitwa ajˈubu. ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌalikˈuwa hˈana hatˈia, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa mkˌamilˈifu; alˈimtʃa mˈuŋɡu na kˌuepukˈana na uˈovu.|0
ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sˈaba na bˈinti watˈatu.|0
nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na kondˈoo ˈelfu sˈaba, ŋɡamˈia ˈelfu tˈatu, ɟˈozi mˈia tˈano za maksˈai, na pˈunda mˈia tˈano, tˈena ˌalikˈuwa na idˈadi kˈubwa ja wˌatumˈiʃi. ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu m̩kˈuu sˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
wanˈawe wˌalikˈuwa na destˈuri ja kufˈaɲa karˈamu katˌika ɲˈumba zˈao kwa zˈamu, nˌao wˌaŋɡewˌaalˈika ˈumbu zˈao watˈatu ˌili kˈula na kˈuɲua pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
wakˈati kipˈindi tʃa karˈamu kˌilimˌalizˈika, ajˈubu ˌaŋɡetˈuma waˈitwe na kˌuwafaɲˈia ˌutakˈaso. ˌaŋɡetˈoa ðabˈihu ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ˌakifikˈiri, peŋɡˈine wanˈaŋɡu wˌametˈenda ðˈambi na kˌumlaˈani mˈuŋɡu mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo destˈuri ja kˌawaˈida ja ajˈubu.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa wˈana wa mˈuŋɡu wˌalikwˈenda kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa mbˈele za bwˈana. ʃetˈani nˌaje akˈaɟa pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ʃetˈani ˌakamɟˈibu bwˈana, natˈoka kˌuzuŋɡˈuka pˈote dˌuniˈani, nˌikitembˈea hˈuku na hˌuko hˈumo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, ɟˈe, ˌumemwˌaŋɡalˈia hˈujo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu? hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine dˌuniˈani alˈije kˌama jˈeje, asˈije na hatˈia, ni mɲˈofu, mwˌeɲe kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu, na kˌuepukˈana na uˈovu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌukumɟeŋɡˈea bˈoma pˈande zˈote jˌeje na wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake pamˈoɟa na kˈila kˈitu alˈitʃo nˈatʃo? kˈazi za mikˈono jˌake ˌumezˌibarˈiki na hˈivjo makˈundi jˌake ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi pamˈoɟa na ja waɲˈama jˌameenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima.|0
lakˈini ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako na kupˈiɡa kˈila kˈitu alˈitʃo nˈatʃo, nˌaje kwa hakˈika ˌatakˌulaˈani mbˈele za ˈuso wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, vˈema sˈana, kwa hˈijo, kˈila kˈitu alˈitʃo nˈatʃo kˈiko mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, lakˈini ɟˌuːja hˈujo ˈm̩tu mweɲˈewe ˌusimɡˈuse hˌata kwa kidˈole. ndˈipo ʃetˈani ˌakatˈoka mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa watˈoto wa ajˈubu wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa karˈamu wakˈila na kˈuɲua divˈai katˌika ɲˈumba ja ndˈuɡu jˈao mkˈubwa.|0
akˈaɟa mɟˈumbe kwa ajˈubu na kusˈema, maksˈai wˌalikˈuwa wˌakilˈima na pˈunda wˌalikˈuwa wˌakilˈiʃa karˈibu nˈao.|0
wasˈeba wˌakawˌaʃambulˈia na kˌutʃukˈua mifˈuɡo. kˈiʃa wˌakawaˈua wˌatumˈiʃi kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌami ndˈimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌenusurˈika kˌukuletˈea habˈari.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado ˌananˈena, mɟˈumbe mwiŋɡˈine akˈaɟa na kusˈema, mˈoto wa mˈuŋɡu ˌuliʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuteketˈeza kondˈoo na wˌatumˈiʃi, nˌami ndˈimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌenusurˈika kˌukuletˈea habˈari.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado ˌananˈena, mɟˈumbe mwiŋɡˈine akˈaɟa na kusˈema, wˌakaldˈajo wˌaliˈunda vikˈosi vitˈatu vja ˌuvamˈizi na kˌuwaˌaŋɡukˈia ŋɡamˈia wˈako na kˌuwatʃukˈua wˌakaondˈoka nˈao. wˌakawaˈua wˌatumˈiʃi kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌami ndˈimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌenusurˈika kˌukuletˈea habˈari.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado ˌananˈena, mɟˈumbe mwiŋɡˈine akˈaɟa na kusˈema, wˈana wˈako na bˈinti zˈako wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa karˈamu, wakˈila na kˈuɲua divˈai katˌika ɲˈumba ja ndˈuɡu jˈao mkˈubwa.|0
ɣafˈula upˈepo wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌukavˈuma kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani, nˌao ˌukaipˈiɡa ɲˈumba hˈijo pˈembe zˌake ˈn̩ne. ˌikawˌaaŋɡukˈia hˈao watˈoto nˌao wˌamekˈufa, nˌami ndˈimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌenusurˈika kˌukuletˈea habˈari.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakasimˈama, ˌakararˈua ɟˈoho lˈake na kuɲˈoa ɲuˈele zˈake. kˈiʃa ˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini katˌika kˌuabˈudu.|0
na kusˈema: nˌilitˈoka tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu ˈutʃi, nˌami nˌitaondˈoka ˈutʃi, bwˈana ˌalinˈipa, nˌaje bwˈana ˌamevˌiondˈoa, ɟˈina la bwˈana lˌitukˈuzwe.|0
katˌika mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, ajˈubu hˌakutˈenda ðˈambi kwa kˌumlaˈumu mˈuŋɡu kwa kufˈaɲa ubˈaja.|0
sˈiku ɲiŋɡˈine wˈana wa mˈuŋɡu wˌalikˈuɟa kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa mbˈele za bwˈana. ʃetˈani nˌaje akˈaɟa pamˈoɟa nˌao kˌuɟioɲˈeʃa mbˈele zˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌakamˌuulˈiza ʃetˈani, ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ʃetˈani ˌakamɟˈibu bwˈana natˈoka kˌuzuŋɡˈuka pˈote dˌuniˈani, nˌikitembˈea hˈuku na hˌuko hˈumo.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, ɟˈe, ˌumemwˌaŋɡalˈia hˈujo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu? hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine dˌuniˈani alˈije kˌama jˈeje, ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia, ni mɲˈofu, mwˌeɲe kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu na kˌuepukˈana na uˈovu. nˌaje bˈado ˌanadumˈiʃa ˌuadilˈifu wˈake, iŋɡˈawa ˌulinˌitʃotʃˈea ðˈidi jˈake, ˌili nˌimwaŋɡamˈize pasˈipo sabˈabu.|0
ʃetˈani ˌakamɟˈibu bwˈana, ŋɡˈozi kwa ŋɡˈozi! mwˌanadˈamu ˌatatˈoa vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo kwa aɟˈili ja uhˈai wˈake.|0
lakˈini ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako na kˌuipˈiɡa ɲˈama jˌake na mifˈupa jˈake, nˌaje kwa hakˈika ˌatakˌulaˈani mbˈele za ˈuso wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, vˈema sˈana, kwa hˈijo, jˌeje jˈumo mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, lakˈini lazˈima ˌumwatʃˈie uhˈai wˈake.|0
bˌasi ʃetˈani ˌakatˈoka mbˈele za bwˈana nˌaje ˌakampˈiɡa ajˈubu kwa maɟˈipu mabˈaja ʃˈu ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˌake hˌadi utˈosi wa kˈitʃwa.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakatʃukˈua kiɡˈae na kˌuɟikˈuna nˈatʃo hˈuku ˌakikˈeti kwˈeɲe maɟˈivu.|0
ˈm̩ke wˌake ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, bˈado ˌunaʃˌikamˈana na ˌuadilˈifu wˈako? mlaˈani mˈuŋɡu nˌawe ukˈafe.|0
ˌakamɟˈibu, ˌunazuŋɡˈumza kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo mwanˈamke mpumbˈavu jejˈote ˌaŋɡenˈena. ɟˈe, tˌupokˈee mˈema mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌasi tˌusipokˈee na uðˈia? katˌika mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, ajˈubu hˌakutˈenda ðˈambi katˌika kusˈema kwˈake.|0
bˌasi mˌarafˈiki watˈatu wa ajˈubu, n̩dˈio ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani, na bildˈadi mʃˈuhi na sofˈari mnˌaamˈaθi, wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja taˈabu jˈote ˌilijompˈata ajˈubu, wˌakaɟipˈaŋɡa tˌoka mˌaɲumbˈani m̩wˈao, nˌao wˌakakutˈana pamˈoɟa kwa mˌakubˌaliˈano kwˈenda kˌumtulˈiza katˌika taˈabu hˈijo na kˌumfarˈiɟi.|0
wˌalipomwˈona kwa mbˈali, ˌilikˈuwa viɡˈumu kˌumtambˈua. wˌakaˈanza kulˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa, wˌakajˌararˈua maɟˈoho jˈao na kˌuɟiruʃˈia mavˈumbi ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakakˈeti tʃˈini kwˈeɲe udˈoŋɡo pamˈoɟa na ajˈubu kwa sˈiku sˈaba usˈiku na mtʃˈana. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijesˈema nˌaje nˈeno, kwa sabˈabu wˌaliˈona ɟˈinsi matˈeso jˌake jˌalivjokˈuwa makˈubwa.|0
baˌada ja ɟˈambo hˈili, ajˈubu ˌakafumbˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kˌuilaˈani sˈiku ja kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈake.|0
sˈiku ja kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈaŋɡu na ˌipotelˈee mbˈali, nˌao usˈiku ˈule ˌilipˌosemekˈana, mtˈoto wa kiˈume ˌamezalˈiwa!.|0
sˈiku ˈile na ˈiwe ɡˈiza; mˈuŋɡu ɟˈuu na ˌasiˌiaŋɡalˈie; nˈajo nˈuru ˌisiˌiaŋɡazˈie.|0
ɡˈiza na kivˈuli kikˈuu kˌiikalˈie tˈena; wˈiŋɡu na likˈae ɟˈuu jˈake; weˈusi na ˌuifunˈike nˈuru jˈake.|0
