usˈiku ˈule na uʃˈikwe na ɡˈiza kˈuu; ˌusihˌesabˈiwe katˌika sˈiku za mwˈaka, wˈala ˌusihˌesabˈiwe katˌika sˈiku za mwˈezi wowˈote.|0
usˈiku ˈule na ˈuwe tˈasa; saˈuti ja furˈaha na ˌisisikˈike ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˈale wˌazilˌaanˈio sˈiku wˌailaˈani hˈijo sˈiku, wˈale walˈio tajˈari kumwˈamʃa lˌewiaθˈani.|0
ɲˈota zˌake za ˌalfaɟˈiri na zˈiwe ɡˈiza; nˌao ˌuŋɡoɟˈee mwˈaŋɡa bˌila mˌafanikˈio, wˈala ˌusiuˈone mwˈonzi wa kwˈanza wa mˌapambazˈuko.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˈuo usˈiku hˌaukˌunifuŋɡˈia mlˈaŋɡo wa tˈumbo la mˈama jˈaŋɡu, ˌili kˌujafˈitʃa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kˌutokˈana na taˈabu.|0
kwa nˈini sˌikuˌaŋɡamˈia wakˈati wa kˌuzalˈiwa? kwa nˈini sikˈufa nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinatˈoka tumbˈoni.|0
kwa nˈini pakˈawa na maɡˈoti ja kˌunipokˈea na matˈiti ˌili nipˈate kˌuɲoɲˈeʃwa.|0
kwa maˈana sˈasa nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimepumzˈika kwa amˈani. nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimelˈala na kˌupumzˈika.|0
pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme na wˌaʃaˈuri wa dunˈia, wˌaliˌoɟiɟeŋɡˈea mahˈali ambˈapo sˈasa ni maɡˈofu.|0
pamˈoɟa na wˌatawˈala wˌaliokˈuwa na ðahˈabu, wˌaliˌoziɟˈaza ɲˈumba zˈao kwa fˈeða.|0
ˌau kwa nˈini sˌikufˈitʃwa arðˈini kˌama mtˈoto ˌalijˌezalˈiwa ˈm̩fu, kˌama mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa ambˈaje kˈamwe hˌakuuˈona mwˈaŋɡa.|0
hˌuko waˈovu huˈatʃa kˌusumbˈua na hˌuko wˌaliotʃˈoka hˌupumzˈika.|0
wafˈuŋɡwa nˌao hˌufurahˈia ˌutulˈivu wˈao, hˌawasikˈii tˈena saˈuti ja kˌukemˈea ja kˌioŋɡˈozi wa watˈumwa.|0
wadˈoɡo na wakˈubwa wˈamo hˈumo, na mtˈumwa ˌameatʃˈiwa hˈuru kutˈoka kwa bwˈana wˈake.|0
mbˈona nˈuru ˌinawˌaaŋɡazˈia wˈale walˈio tˌaabˈuni, na hˈao wˌeɲe utʃˈuŋɡu kupˈewa uhˈai.|0
kwa nˈini uhˈai hupˈewa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ɲɟˈia jˌake ˌimefitʃˈika, ambˈaje mˈuŋɡu ˌamemzˌuŋɡuʃˈia bˈoma.|0
kwa maˈana kulˈia kwˈaŋɡu kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kwˌaniɟˈia badˈala ja tʃakˈula; kˌusononˈeka kwˈaŋɡu kˌunamwaɡˈika kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
lˈile nˌililokˈuwa nˌalioɡˈopa lˌimeniɟˈia; lˈile nˌililokˈuwa nˌinalˌihofˈia lˌimenipˈata.|0
sˈina amˈani, wˈala ˌutulˈivu; sˈina pumzˈiko, bˌali taˈabu tˈu.|0
ndˈipo ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakiθubˈutu kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈawe, kˌutakˌukasirˈiʃa? lakˈini ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuɟizuˈia ˌasisˈeme.|0
fikˈiri ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo ˌumewˌafundˈiʃa wˈatu wˈeŋɡi, ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo ˌumeitˈia ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ˌilijokˈuwa ðaˈifu.|0
manˈeno jˈako jˌamewˌateɡemˈeza wˈale wˌaliˌoɟikwˈaa; ˌumejatˈia ŋɡˈuvu maɡˈoti jˌalijokˈuwa ðaˈifu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa hˌii taˈabu ˌimekuɟˈia wˈewe, nˌawe ˌunaʃˈuka mˈojo; ˌimekupˈiɡa wˈewe, nˌawe ˌunafˌaðaˈika.|0
ɟˈe, kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu kwˈako hˌakupˈaswi kˌuwa n̩dˈijo mˌatumaˈini jˈako na ɲɟˈia zˈako kˌutokˈuwa na lawˈama ndˈilo tarˈaɟa lˈako.|0
fikˈiri sˈasa: ni ˈm̩tu jˈupi asˈije na hatˈia ambˈaje ˌaliwˈahi kˌuaŋɡamˈia? ni wˈapi waɲˈofu wˌaliwˈahi kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
kwa pˈumzi ja mˈuŋɡu hˌuaŋɡamˈizwa; kwa mʃˈindo wa hasˈira zˌake hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
sˈimba ˌanawˈeza kˌuŋɡurˈuma na kˌukorˈoma, lakˈini bˈado mˈeno ja sˈimba mkˈubwa hˌuvuɲɟˈika.|0
sˈimba ˌanawˈeza kˌuaŋɡamˈia kwa kukˈosa mawˈindo, nˌao wˈana wa sˈimba ɟˈike hˌutawaɲˈika.|0
nˈeno lˌililˈetwa kwˈaŋɡu kwa sˈiri, mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu jˌakasikˈia mnoŋɡˈono wˈake.|0
kˌatikˈati ja ndˈoto za kutˈia wˌasiwˈasi wakˈati wa usˈiku, hˈapo ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito ˌuwapatˈapo wˌanadˈamu.|0
hˈofu na kˌutetemˈeka kˌuliniʃˈika na kufˈaɲa mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu jˈote ˌitetemˈeke.|0
kˈuna rˈoho ˌalijepˈita mbˈele ja ˈuso wˈaŋɡu, nˈazo ɲuˈele za mwˈili wˈaŋɡu zˌikasimˈama.|0
jˈule rˈoho ˌakasimˈama, lakˈini sˌikuwˈeza kˌutambˈua kˌilikˈuwa kˈitu ɡˈani. ˈumbo fulˈani lˌilisimˈama mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu, kukˈawa na ukˈimja kˈiʃa nˌikasikˈia saˈuti.|0
ɟˈe, bˌinadˈamu awˈeza kˌuwa mwˌadilˈifu kulˈiko mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu awˈeza kˌuwa sˈafi kulˈiko muˈumba wˈake.|0
kˌama mˈuŋɡu hˌawaamˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, kˌama jˌeje hˌuwalaˈumu mˌalaˈika zˌake kwa kˌukosˈea.|0
ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi zaˈidi wˈale wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ɲˈumba za udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi, ambˈazo misˈiŋɡi jˌake ˈipo mˌavumbˈini, ambˈao wˌamepˈondwa kˌama nˈondo.|0
kˈati ja mawˈio na matʃwˈeo huvˈuɲɟua vipˈande vipˈande; bˌila jejˈote kˌutambˈua, hˌuaŋɡamˈia milˈele.|0
ɟˈe, kˈamba za hˈema jˈao hˌazikˌuŋɡolˈewa, hˈivjo hˈufa bˌila hekˈima?.|0
ˈita kˌama ˌunatˈaka, lakˈini ni nˈani ˌatakˌajekuɟˈibu? ni jˈupi kˈati ja hˈao wˌatakatˈifu ˌutakˌajemɡˌeukˈia.|0
kuwˈeka utʃˈuŋɡu mojˈoni hˌumuˈua mpumbˈavu, nˌao wˈivu humtʃˈiɲɟa mɟˈiŋɡa.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌimemwˈona mpumbˈavu ˌakistˈawi, lakˈini ɣafˈula ɲˈumba jˌake ikˈawa ˌimelˌaanˈiwa.|0
watˈoto wˌake wˈako mbˈali na ˌusalˈama, huʃˈindwa mˌahakamˈani bˌila mtetˈezi.|0
wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa hujˈala mavˈuno jˈake, wˌakijatˈoa hˌata kˌatikˈati ja miˈiba, nˌao wˌeɲe kˈiu hˌuitamˈani sˈana mˈali jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana taˈabu hˌaiˈoti kutˈoka kwˈeɲe udˈoŋɡo, wˈala uðˈia hˌautʃipˈui kutˈoka arðˈini.|0
lakˈini mwˌanadˈamu hˌuzalˈiwa ˌili kˌutaabˈika, kwa hakˈika kˌama tʃˈetʃe za mˈoto zˌirukˈavjo kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu.|0
lakˈini ˌiŋɡekˈuwa ni mˈimi, nˌiŋɡemlˌalamikˈia mˈuŋɡu, nˌiŋɡeliwˈeka ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu mbˈele zˈake.|0
jˌeje hutˈenda mˌaaɟˈabu jˌasijowˈeza kˌutambulˈiwa, mˌiuɟˈiza ˌisijowˈeza kˌuhesabˈika.|0
jˌeje huˈipa ˈn̩tʃi mvˈua, hˌujapelˈeka mˈaɟi kuɲˈeʃa maʃˈamba.|0
hˌuwainˈua ɟˈuu waɲˈoŋɡe, nˌao wˈale wˌaombˌolezˈao hˌuinulˈiwa wakˈawa salˈama.|0
hˌuipˈiŋɡa mipˈaŋɡo ja wˌeɲe hˈila, ˌili mikˈono jˈao ˌisifikˈie ˌufanˈisi.|0
jˌeje hˌuwanˈasa wˌeɲe hekˈima katˌika hˈila jˈao, nˈajo mipˈaŋɡo ja wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu hˌuifˌaɡilˈia mbˈali.|0
ɡˈiza hˌuwapˈata wakˈati wa mtʃˈana; wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri hˌupapˈasa kˌama vˈile usˈiku.|0
hˌumwokˈoa mhitˈaɟi kˌutokˈana na upˈaŋɡa ˌuliˈoko kˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao; hˌuwaokˈoa kˌutokˈana na makˈutʃa ja wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa hˈijo maskˈini anˈalo tˌaraɟˈio, nˌao ˌuðalˈimu hufˈumba kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa hutˈia ɟerˈaha, lakˈini pˈia hˌujafˈuŋɡa; hˌuumˈiza, lakˈini mikˈono jˌake pˈia hupˈoɲa.|0
kutˈoka maɟˈaŋɡa sˈita ˌatakˌuokˈoa; nˈaam, hˌata katˌika sˈaba hakˈuna ðˈara lˌitakˌalokupˈata wˈewe.|0
wakˈati wa ɲɟˈaa ˌatakˌukombˈoa wˌewe na kˈifo, nˌaje katˌika vˈita ˌatakˌukombˈoa na pˈiɡo la upˈaŋɡa.|0
ˌutalˈindwa kˌutokˈana na kitʃˈapo tʃa ulˈimi, wˈala hˌutakˈuwa na sabˈabu ja kˌuoɡˈopa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌatakˌapokuɟˈia.|0
ˌutajatʃˈeka mˌaaŋɡamˈizo na ɲɟˈaa, wˈala hˌutakˈuwa na sabˈabu ja kˌuwaoɡˈopa waɲˈama wakˈali wa mwitˈuni.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌutakˈuwa na aɡˈano na mˈawe ja maʃˈamba, nˌao waɲˈama wa mwˈitu wˌatakˈuwa na amˈani nˈawe.|0
ˌutaɟˈua ja kwˌamba hˈema lˈako li salˈama; ˌutahesˈabu mˈali zˈako wˈala hˌutakˈuta tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌopuŋɡˈua.|0
ˌutaɟˈua ja kˌuwa watˈoto wˈako wˌatakˈuwa wˈeŋɡi, nˌao wazˈao wˈako wˈeŋɡi kˌama maɟˈani ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌutaiŋɡˈia kˌaburˈini ukˈiwa na ˈumri wa uzˈee mtˌimilˈifu, kˌama masˈuke ja ŋɡˈano jˌakusˌaɲuˈapo kwa wakˈati wˈake.|0
tˌumelˌitʃuŋɡˈuza hˈili, nˈalo ni kwˈeli. hˈivjo lˌisikˈie na ˌulitendˈee kˈazi.|0
kˈiʃa ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
laˈiti utʃˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌuŋɡewˈeza kupˈimwa, nˈajo taˈabu jˈaŋɡu jˈote ˌiŋɡewˈekwa kwˈeɲe mizˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa hakˈika ˌiŋɡekˈuwa nzˈito kulˈiko mtʃˈaŋɡa wa bahˈari zˈote, kwa hˈijo si aɟˈabu manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌamekˈuwa ja harˈaka.|0
miʃˈale ja mweɲˈezi ˈiko ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌinakˈuɲua sˈumu jˈake; vitˈiʃo vja mˈuŋɡu vˌimeɟipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, pˌundamwˈitu hulˈia akˈiwa na maɟˈani, ˌau ŋɡˈombe dˈume hulˈia akˈiwa na tʃakˈula.|0
ɟˈe, tʃakˈula kisˈitʃo na lˈaða hulˈiwa bˌila tʃˈumvi, ˌau ˈupo utˈamu katˌika ˈute mweˈupe wa jˈai.|0
nˌinakatˈaa kˌuviɡˈusa; vjakˈula vja aˈina hˌii hˌunitʃukˈiza.|0
laˈiti nˌiŋɡepˈata hˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu, kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌaŋɡenˌiɟalˈia hˌilo nˌililˌotaraɟˈia.|0
kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌaŋɡekˈuwa rˈaði kˌunipˈonda, kˌuuatʃˈia mkˈono wˌake na kˌunikˌatilˈia mbˈali.|0
ndˈipo bˈado nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na hˌii farˈaɟa, furˈaha jˈaŋɡu katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈali: kwˌamba sikˈuwa nˌimejakˈana manˈeno jˌake jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ninˈazo ŋɡˈuvu ɡˈani, hˌata nˌiendelˈee kˌutumaˈini? mˌatazamˈio jˈaŋɡu ja mbˈele ni nˈini, hˌata nˌiendelˈee kˌuwa mvˌumilˈivu.|0
ɟˈe, mˌimi nˈina ŋɡˈuvu za ɟˈiwe? ɟˈe, mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ni ʃˈaba.|0
ɟˈe, ninˈao uwˈezo wowˈote wa kˌuɟisˌaidˈia mˌimi mweɲˈewe, wakˈati ambˈapo mˌafanikˈio jˌamefˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali nˈami.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajekˈata tamˈaa ˌaŋɡetˌazamˈia mˈojo wa kˌuɟitˈoa wa rafˈiki zˈake, hˌata kˌama ˌakiˈatʃa utʃˈaɟi wa mweɲˈezi.|0
lakˈini ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu sˈio wa kˌuteɡemˈewa, ni kˌama viɟˈito vja msˈimu, ni kˌama viɟˈito ambˈavjo hˌufurˈika.|0
wakˈati vˌimefunˈikwa barˈafu ˌijejukˈajo, ambˈavjo huɟˈazwa na θelˈuɟi ˌinajˌojejˈuka.|0
lakˈini hˌukaˈuka maɟˈira ja ukˈame, na wakˈati wa hˈari hˌutowˈeka katˌika mikˈondo jˈake.|0
mˌisafˈara hˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈake; hukwˈea kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja ukˈiwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
mˌisafˈara ja tˈema ˌinatafˈuta mˈaɟi, wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa ʃˈeba wˌanaˌosafˈiri hˌutazˈama kwa mˌataraɟˈio.|0
wˌameðikˈika, kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa na mˌatumaˈini; wˌanafˈika hˌuko, lakˈini wˌanahˌuzunˈika kwa kukˈosa wˌalitʃˌotaraɟˈia.|0
sˈasa nˌaɲi mmˌeθibitˈika kwˌamba hˈamna msaˈada wowˈote; mnaˈona ɟˈambo la kutˈiʃa, nˌaɲi mnˌaoɡˈopa.|0
ɟˈe, nˌimewˈahi kusˈema, toˈeni kˈitu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, ˌau mnˌilipˈie fidˈia kutˈoka mˈali zˈenu.|0
ˌau nˌiokoˈeni mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui, ˌau nˌikomboˈeni kutˈoka makˈutʃa ja wasˈio na hurˈuma.|0
nˌifundiʃˈeni, nˌami nˌitaɲamˈaza kˈimja; nˌioɲeʃˈeni nˌilikˌokosˈea.|0
tazˈama jalˈivjo ja kˌuumˈiza manˈeno ja kwˈeli! lakˈini mˌabiʃˈano jˈenu jˌanaθˌibitˈiʃa nˈini.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩na maˈana ja kˌujasˌahihˈiʃa nˌinajosˈema, na kˌujafˈaɲa manˈeno ja ˈm̩tu ˌanajekˈata tamˈaa kˌama upˈepo.|0
mŋɡewˈeza hˌata kupˈiɡa kˈura kwa aɟˈili ja jatˈima, na kˌubadˌiliʃˈana rafˈiki jˈenu na mˈali.|0
lakˈini sˈasa kuwˈeni na hurˈuma mkˌaniˌaŋɡalˈie mˈimi. ɟˈe, nˌiŋɡewˈeza kusˈema uˈoŋɡo mbˈele zˈenu.|0
tˌulizˈeni hasˈira, msˈiwe wˌaðalˈimu; ˌaŋɡaliˈeni tˈena, kwa maˈana nˌimehˌatarˈiʃa ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, pˈana uˈovu wowˈote mˌidomˈoni mwˈaŋɡu? ɟˈe, kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu hˌakiwˈezi kˌupambanˈua hˈila.|0
ɟˈe, mwˌanadˈamu hˈana kˈazi ŋɡˈumu dˌuniˈani? sˈiku zˌake si kˌama zˈile za ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa.|0
kˌama mtˈumwa ˌanavjˌovionˈea ʃaˈuku vivˈuli vja ɟiˈoni, ˌau ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa ˌanavjˌouŋɡoɟˈea mʃahˈara wˈake.|0
ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌoɡawˈiwa miˈezi ja ˌubatˈili, nˌami nˌimeˌandikˈiwa huzˈuni usˈiku hˌata usˈiku.|0
wakˈati nˌilalˈapo nˌinawˈaza, ˌitatʃukˈua mˈuda ɡˈani kˈabla sˌiɟaˈamka? usˈiku hˈuwa mrˈefu, nˌami nˌaɟiɡˌeuzˌaɡeˈuza hˌadi mˌapambazˈuko.|0
mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌumevˈikwa mabˈuu na utʃˈafu, ŋɡˈozi jˈaŋɡu ˌimetumbˈuka na kutˈuŋɡa usˈaha.|0
sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˌinapˈita upˈesi kulˈiko mtˈande wa kufˈuma, nˈazo zˌinafikˈia mwˈiʃo wˌake bˌila mˌatumaˈini.|0
kumbˈuka, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu ni kˌama pˈumzi; mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kˈamwe hˌajataˈona tˈena rˈaha.|0
lˈile ɟˈitʃo lˌinalˌoniˈona sˈasa hˌalitˌaniˈona tˈena; ˌutanˌitafˈuta, wˈala sˌitakuwˈepo.|0
kˌama vˈile wˈiŋɡu lˌiondokˈavjo na kˌutowˈeka, vˈivjo hˈivjo jˌeje ˌaʃukˈaje kˌaburˈini harˈudi tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo sˌitaɲamˈaza; nˌitanˈena kˌutokˈana na mˌaumˈivu makˈuu ja rˈoho jˈaŋɡu, nˌitalalˈama kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, mˌimi ni bahˈari, ˌau mɲˈama mkˈubwa ˈm̩no ˌakaˈaje vˌilindˈini, hˌata ˌuniwˈeke tʃˈini ja ulˈinzi.|0
nˌinapˌofikˈiri kwˌamba kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitanˌifarˈiɟi, nˈatʃo kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa fahˈari kˌitapuŋɡˈuza mˌalalamˈiko jˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo wˌanitˈiʃa kwa ndˈoto na kˌunitˈia hˈofu kwa maˈono.|0
hˈivjo nˌinatʃaɡˈua kˌuɟiɲˈoŋɡa na kˈufa, kulˈiko hˈuu mwˈili wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinajˌatʃukˈia maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu; nˌisiŋɡˌetamˈani kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi. niˈatʃe; sˈiku zˈaŋɡu ni ˌubatˈili.|0
mwˌanadˈamu ni kˈitu ɡˈani hˌata umɟˈali kiˈasi hˈiki, kwˌamba ˌunamtˈia sˈana mˌaanˈani.|0
kwˌamba ˌunamwˌaŋɡalˈia kˈila ˌasubˈuhi na kˌumɟarˈibu kˈila wakˈati.|0
ɟˈe, hˌutaˈatʃa kˈamwe kˌunitazˈama, ˌau kˌuniˈatʃa ɟˈapo kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo tˈu.|0
ikˈiwa nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi, nˌimekˌufaɲˈia nˈini, ˈewe mlˈinzi wa wˌanadˈamu? kwa nˈini ˌumeniwˈeka nˈiwe ʃabˈaha jˈako? ɟˈe, nˌimekˈuwa mzˈiɡo kwˈako.|0
kwa nˈini hˌusamˈehi makˈosa jˈaŋɡu na kˌuatʃilˈia ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu? kwa kˌuwa hˈivi kˌaribˈuni nˌitalˈala mˌavumbˈini; nˌawe ˌutanˌitafˈuta, wˈala sˌitakuwˈepo.|0
kˈiʃa bildˈadi mʃˈuhi ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
hˌata lˈini wˌewe ˌutasˈema mˈambo kˌama hˈaja? manˈeno jˈako ni kˌama upˈepo m̩kˈuu.|0
ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu hˌupotˈoʃa hukˈumu? ɟˈe, mweɲˈezi hˌupotˈoʃa kˈile kilˈitʃo hˈaki.|0
watˈoto wˈako wˌalipomtˈenda ðˈambi, ˌaliwˈapa aðˈabu ja ðˈambi jˈao.|0
lakˈini ˌukimtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu, nˌawe ˌukamsˈihi mweɲˈezi.|0
ikˈiwa wˌewe ni sˈafi na mɲˈofu, hˌata sˈasa ˌatainˈuka mweɲˈewe kwa niˈaba jˈako, na kˌukurudˈiʃa katˌika mahˈali pˈako pa hˈaki.|0
ˌiɟapokˈuwa mwˈanzo wˈako ˌulikˈuwa mdˈoɡo, lakˈini mwˈiʃo wˈako ˌutakˈuwa wa mˌafanikˈio.|0
ˌukaulˈize vizˈazi vˌilivjˌotaŋɡulˈia na uˈone bˈaba zˈao wˌaliɟifˈunza nˈini.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˌisi tˌumezalˈiwa ɟˈana tu na hˌatuɟˈui lolˈote, nˈazo sˈiku zˈetu dˌuniˈani ni kˌama kivˈuli tˈu.|0
ɟˈe, hˌawatˌakufundˈiʃa na kˌukuelˈeza? ɟˈe, hˌawatalˈeta manˈeno kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˌufahˈamu kwˈao.|0
ɟˈe, mafˈuɲɟo jawˈeza kumˈea mahˈali pasˈipo na matˈope? matˈete jawˈeza kustˈawi bˌila mˈaɟi.|0
wakˈati bˈado jˌanaˌendelˈea kukˈua kˈabla ja kukˈatwa, hˌuɲaˈuka harˈaka kulˈiko maɟˈani meŋɡˈine.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wa wˈatu wˈote wˌanaˌomsahˈau mˈuŋɡu; vˈivjo hˈivjo mˌatumaˈini ja wˌasiomɟˈali mˈuŋɡu hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
lˈile ˌanalˌolitˌumainˈia hˌuvuɲɟˈika upˈesi; lˈile ˌanalˌolitˌeɡemˈea ni utˈando wa bˌuibˈui.|0
hˌuutˌeɡemˈea utˈando wˈake, lakˈini hˌausimˈami; hˌuuŋɡˌaŋɡanˈia, lakˈini hˌaudˈumu.|0
jˌeje ni kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌuliˌoɲeʃˈewa vizˈuri wakˈati wa ɟˈua, ˌukienˈeza mˌatʃipukˈizi jˌake bˌustanˈini.|0
hˌuifˌuŋɡanˈiʃa mizˈizi jˌake kwˈeɲe lˈundo la mˈawe, na kˌutafˈuta nafˈasi kˌatikˈati ja mˈawe.|0
ˌunapˌoŋɡolˈewa kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake, ndˈipo mahˈali pˈale hˌuukˈana na kusˈema, mˌimi kˈamwe sˌikukuˈona..|0
hakˈika uhˈai wˌake hˌuɲaˈuka, na kutˈoka ˌudoŋɡˈoni mimˈea miŋɡˈine huˈota.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu hˌamkatˈai ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia, wˈala kˌuitˈia ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ja mtˈenda mabˈaja.|0
bˈado ˌatakiɟˈaza kˈiɲua tʃˈako na kitʃˈeko, na midˈomo jˈako na kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
adˈui zˈako wˌatavˈikwa aˈibu, nˈazo hˈema za waˈovu hˌazitˌakuwˈepo tˈena.|0
kˈiʃa ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
nˈaam, naɟˈua hˈili ni kwˈeli. lakˈini mwˌanadˈamu ˌawezˈaɟe kˌuwa mwˌadilˈifu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡetˈaka kˌuʃindˈana nˈaje, ˌasiŋɡˌaliwˈeza kumɟˈibu mˈuŋɡu hˌata mˈara mˈoɟa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈelfu mˈoɟa.|0
hekˈima jˌake ni kˈubwa sˈana na ˈana uwˈezo mwˈiŋɡi ˈm̩no. ni nˈani ˌalijempˈiŋɡa nˌaje akˈawa salˈama.|0
ˌaiondˈoa milˈima bˌila jeɲˈewe kuɟˈua na kˌuipindˈua kwa hasˈira jˈake.|0
ˌaitikˈisa dunˈia kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake na kˌuzifˈaɲa ŋɡˈuzo zˌake zˌitetemˈeke.|0
husˈema na ɟˈua, nˈalo lˌikaˈatʃa kˌuaŋɡˈaza; nˌaje hˌuizˈima miˈaŋɡa ja ɲˈota.|0
jˌeje pˈeke jˌake hˌuzitandˈaza mbˈiŋɡu na kˌujakaɲˈaɡa mawˈimbi ja bahˈari.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije muˈumba wa ɲˈota za dˈubu, na ˌoriˈoni, kˌilimˈia, na makˈundi ja ɲˈota za kusˈini.|0
hutˈenda mˌaaɟˈabu jˌasijˌopimˈika, mˌiuɟˈiza ˌisijowˈeza kˌuhesabˈiwa.|0
ˌanapopˈita karˈibu nˈami, siwˈezi kumwˈona; ˌapitˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, sˌimtambˈui.|0
ˌanapˌotʃukˈua kwa ɣafˈula, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumzuˈia? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumwambˈia, ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini?.|0
mˈuŋɡu hˌataˌizuˈia hasˈira jˈake; hˌata ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa la rahˈabu lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu lˌinaɟˌikuɲˈata mˌiɡuˈuni pˈake.|0
ni vˈipi bˌasi mˌimi nˌitawˈeza kˌubiʃˈana nˈaje? nˌawezˈaɟe kupˈata manˈeno ja kˌuhoɟiˈana nˈaje.|0
iŋɡˈawa sikˈuwa na hatˈia, sˌikuwˈeza kumɟˈibu; nˌiŋɡewˈeza tu kumsˈihi mhukˈumu wˈaŋɡu ˌanihˌurumˈie.|0
hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡemwˈita kwˈeɲe ʃaˈuri, nˌaje ˌakakubˈali, sˌiamˈini kˌama ˌaŋɡenˌisikilˈiza.|0
jˌeje ˌaŋɡenˌiaŋɡamˈiza kwa ðorˈuba na kˌuoŋɡˈeza mˌaɟerˈaha jˈaŋɡu pasˈipo na sabˈabu.|0
ˌasiŋɡˌeniˈatʃa nˌipumˈue bˌali ˌaŋɡenˌifunˈika kabˈisa na huzˈuni kˈuu.|0
kˌama ni suˈala la ŋɡˈuvu, jˌeje ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu! kˌama ni suˈala la hˈaki, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumwˈita mˌahakamˈani.|0
hˌata kˌama sikˈuwa na hatˈia, kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌiŋɡenˌihukˈumu; kˌama sikˈuwa na kˈosa, kˌiŋɡenˌitaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa mwˌeɲe hatˈia.|0
iŋɡˈawa mˌimi sˈina kˈosa, hˌailˈeti tˌofaˈuti katˌika nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu; nˌautʃukˈia uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈajo jˈote ni sˈawa; n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nasˈema, jˌeje hˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wasˈio na makˈosa pamˈoɟa na waˈovu..|0
wakˈati pˈiɡo lˌiletˈapo kˈifo tʃa ɣafˈula, jˌeje hˌuðihˈaki kˈule kukˈata tamˈaa kwa jˈule asˈije na kˈosa.|0
wakˈati ˈn̩tʃi ˌinapˌoaŋɡukˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waˈovu, jˌeje hˌuwafˈuŋɡa mˈatʃo mˌahakˈimu wˈake. kˌama si jˈeje, bˌasi ni nˈani.|0
sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zapˈita m̩bˈio kulˈiko mkˌimbiˈaɟi; zˌinapˈita upˈesi bˌila kuˈona furˈaha hˌata kidˈoɡo.|0
zˌinapˈita upˈesi kˌama maʃˈua ja mafˈuɲɟo, mfˈano wa tˈai ˌajaʃˌukiˈaje mawˈindo kwa ɣafˈula.|0
kˌama nˌikisˈema, nˌitajˌasahˈau mˌalalamˈiko jˈaŋɡu, nˌitabadˈili sˈura ja ˈuso wˈaŋɡu na kˌutabasˈamu,.|0
bˈado nˌinahofˈia matˈeso jˈaŋɡu jˈote, kwa kˌuwa nˌinaɟˈua hˌutanˌihesˈabu kˌuwa sˈina hatˈia.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌimeˌonekˈana mwˌeɲe hatˈia, kwa nˈini bˌasi nˌitaabˈiʃwe bˈure.|0
hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡeɟiˈoʃa kwa sabˈuni na kˌutakˈasa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kwa maɡˈadi.|0
wˌewe ˌuŋɡenitˈupa kwˈeɲe ʃˈimo la ˌutelˈezi kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌata ŋɡˈuo zˈaŋɡu zˌiŋɡenˌitʃukˈia sˈana.|0
jˌeje si mwˌanadˈamu kˌama mˌimi ˌili niwˈeze kumɟˈibu, ˌili kwˌamba tuwˈeze kˌuʃindˈana nˌaje mˌahakamˈani.|0
laˈiti ˌaŋɡelˌikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu wa kˌutupˌatanˈiʃa kˈati jˈetu, awˈeke mkˈono wˌake ɟˈuu jˈetu sˈote wawˈili.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡelˌiiondˈoa fˈimbo ja mˈuŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, ˌili utˈiʃo wˌake ˌusiˌendelˈee kˌunitˈia hˈofu.|0
ndˈipo nˌiŋɡenˈena nˈaje, bˌila kˌumwoɡˈopa, lakˈini kˌama ilˈivjo kwˈaŋɡu sˈasa, sˌitawˈeza.|0
nˌajatʃukˈia sˈana hˈaja maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu; kwa hˈijo nˌitatˈoa mˌalalamˈiko jˈaŋɡu kwa wˈazi bˌila kˌuɟizuˈia, nˌami nˌitanˈena kˌutokˈana na utʃˈuŋɡu wa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu: ˌusinˌihukˈumu, bˌali nˌiambˈie ˈuna maʃtˈaka ɡˈani ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌinakˌupendˈeza wˌewe kˌunionˈea, kˌuikatˈaa kwa ðarˈau kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈako, hˈuku wˌewe ˌukitˌabasˈamu ɟˌuːja mipˈaŋɡo ja waˈovu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ˈuna mˈatʃo ja kimwˈili? ɟˈe, wˌewe huˈona kˌama mwˌanadˈamu ˌaonˈavjo.|0
ɟˈe, sˈiku zˈako ni kˌama zˈile za mwˌanadˈamu, ˌau miˈaka jˈako ni kˌama ˈile ja ˈm̩tu.|0
ˌili kwˌamba ˌutafˈute makˈosa jˈaŋɡu na kˌuitʃuŋɡˈuza ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa waɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi sˈina hatˈia, na hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌunitˈoa mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
mikˈono jˈako n̩dˈijo ˌilijˌoniˈumba na kˌunifˈaɲa. ɟˈe, sˈasa ˌutaɡeˈuka na kˌuniˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kumbˈuka kˌuwa ˌulinˌifiɲˈaŋɡa kˌama udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi. ɟˈe, sˈasa ˌutanifˈaɲa kˌuwa mavˈumbi tˈena.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌukunˌimimˈina mˌimi kˌama mazˈiwa, na kˌuniɡandˈiʃa kˌama ɟibˈini.|0
ˌukanivˈika ŋɡˈozi na ɲˈama, na kˌuniˈuŋɡa pamˈoɟa kwa mifˈupa na miʃˈipa.|0
ˌumenˈipa uhˈai na kˌunitendˈea wˈema, katˌika ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wˈako ˌumeilˈinda rˈoho jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo ˌulilˌolifˈitʃa mojˈoni mwˈako, nˌami nˌinaɟˈua kˌuwa hˈili lˌilikˈuwa katˌika nˈia jˈako.|0
kˌama nˌilifˈaɲa ðˈambi, ˌuŋɡekˈuwa ˌumeniˈona, wˈala ˌusiŋɡeˈatʃa kˈosa lˈaŋɡu lipˈite bˌila kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
kˌama nˈina hatˈia, ˈole wˈaŋɡu! hˌata kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa sˈina hatˈia, siwˈezi kˌukiinˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeɟˈawa na aˈibu, na kuzˈama katˌika matˈeso jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama nˌikiinˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu, ˌunanˌiɲatˈia kˌama sˈimba, na kˌuoɲˈeʃa tˈena uwˈezo wa kutˈiʃa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌewe walˈeta mˌaʃahˈidi wˈapja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na kˌuzidˈiʃa hasˈira jˈako ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu; nˈazo ŋɡˈuvu zˈako zˌinaniɟˈia wˈimbi mˈoɟa baˌada ja ɟiŋɡˈine.|0
kwa nˈini bˌasi ˌulinitˈoa tumbˈoni? nˌinatamˈani nˌiŋɡekˈufa kˈabla ɟˈitʃo lolˈote hˌaliɟˌaniˈona.|0
laˈiti nˌisiŋɡˌekuwˈako kˈamwe, ˌau nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimetʃˌukulˈiwa mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa kutˈoka tumbˈoni kwˈenda kˌaburˈini.|0
ɟˈe, sˈiku zˈaŋɡu tʃˈatʃe si zˌimekˌaribˈia kuˈiʃa? nˌiatʃˈie ˌili niwˈeze kupˈata mˈuda mfˈupi wa kˌufurˈahi.|0
kˈabla sˌiɟaˈenda mahˈali ambˈapo hakˈuna kurˈudi tˈena, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈiza na uvˈuli wa maˈuti.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈiza kˈuu sˈana, jˌeɲe uvˈuli wa ɡˈiza na mˌatʃafˈuko, mahˈali ambˈapo hˌata nˈuru ni ɡˈiza.|0
ndˈipo sofˈari mnˌaamˈaθi ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, manˈeno hˈaja jˈote japˈite bˌila kˌuɟibˈiwa? ɟˈe, hˈuju mnenˈaɟi ˌaθibitˈiʃwe kˌuwa na hˈaki.|0
ɟˈe, manˈeno jˈako ja upˈuzi jˌawafˈaɲe wˈatu wˌaɲamˈaze kˈimja? ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu ˌasikˌukemˈee ˌunapofˈaɲa ðihˈaka.|0
ˌunamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, imˈani jˈaŋɡu ni kamˈili nˌami ni sˈafi mbˈele zˈako..|0
ˈaha! laˈiti kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌaŋɡesˈema, kwˌamba ˌaŋɡefuŋɡˈua midˈomo jˌake ðˈidi jˈako.|0
nˌaje ˌakufˌunulˈie sˈiri za hekˈima, kwa kˌuwa hekˈima ja kwˈeli ˈina pˈande mbˈili. uɟˈue hˈili: mˈuŋɡu ˌamesahˈau hˌata baˈaði ja ðˈambi zˈako.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kuɟˈua sˈiri za mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌujatʃuŋɡˈuza mˈambo jˈote kumhˈusu mweɲˈezi.|0
ni ɟˈuu ˈm̩no kulˈiko mbˈiŋɡu: wawˈeza kufˈaɲa nˈini? kˈina tʃˈake ni kirˈefu kulˈiko kuzˈimu: wˌewe wawˈeza kuɟˈua nˈini.|0
kipˈimo tʃˈake ni kirˈefu kulˈiko dunˈia, nˈatʃo ni kipˈana kulˈiko bahˈari.|0
kˌama akˈiɟa na kˌukufˈuŋɡa ɡˌerezˈani, na kˌuitˈiʃa mˌahakˈama, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumpˈiŋɡa.|0
hakˈika ˌanawˌatambˈua wˈatu wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu; nˌaje ˌaonˈapo uˈovu, ɟˈe, hˌaaŋɡalˈii.|0
mpumbˈavu awˈeza kˌuwa mwˌeɲe hekˈima, endˈapo mtˈoto wa pˌundamwˈitu ˌatazalˈiwa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
hˌata sˈasa ˌukiutˈoa mˈojo wˈako kwˈake na kˌumwinulˈia mikˈono jˈako.|0
ˌukiˌiondolˈea mbˈali ˈile ðˈambi ilˈijo mkonˈoni mwˈako wˈala ˌusiˌuruhˈusu uˈovu ukˈae hemˈani mwˈako.|0
ndˈipo ˌutainˈua ˈuso wˈako bˌila aˈibu; ˌutasimˈama imˈara bˌila hˈofu.|0
hakˈika ˌutaˌisahˈau taˈabu jˈako, ˌutaˌikumbˈuka tu kˌama mˈaɟi jˌalijokwˈiʃa kupˈita.|0
maˈiʃa jˈako jˌataŋɡˈaa kulˈiko ˌaðuhˈuri, nˈalo ɡˈiza lˌitakˈuwa kˌama ˌalfaɟˈiri.|0
ˌutakˈuwa salˈama, kwa kˌuwa lˈipo tˌumaˈini; ˌutatazˈama pˈande zˈote na kˌupumzˈika kwa salˈama.|0
ˌutalˈala, wˈala hakˈuna ˌatakˌajekˌuoɡˈofja, nˈaam, wˈeŋɡi wˌataɟˌipendekˈeza kwˈako.|0
bˌali mˈatʃo ja waˈovu hˌajataˈona, wokˈovu ˌutawˌaepˈuka; tˌaraɟˈio lˈao lˌitakˈuwa ni hˌaŋɡaˈiko la ˈm̩tu ˌanajekˈata rˈoho.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
bˌila ʃˈaka nˈiɲi n̩dˈio wˈatu, nˈajo hekˈima ˌitakˈoma mtˌakapokˈufa.|0
lakˈini mˌimi ninˈao ˌufahˈamu kˌama nˈiɲi; mˌimi si dˈuni kwˈenu. ni nˈani ˌasijeɟˈua mˈambo hˈaja jˈote.|0
nˌimekˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa kutʃˈekwa na rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa nˌilimwˈita mˈuŋɡu nˌaje ˌakaniɟˈibu: mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu wa kutʃˈekwa tˈu, iŋɡˈawa ni mwˌadilˈifu na nisˈije na hatˈia.|0
wˌanadˈamu wakˈiwa katˌika ˌutulˈivu hˈuwa na ðarˈau kwa wˈale wˌeɲe msˈiba kˈana kwˌamba n̩dˈijo hˈaki ja wˈale ambˈao miɡˈuu jˈao ˌinatelˈeza.|0
hˈema za wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi hˌazisˌumbulˈiwi, wˈale wˌanaˌomɣaðibˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈako salˈama: wˈale wˌamtʃukuˈao mˈuŋɡu wˌao mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
lakˈini ˌulizˈeni waɲˈama, nˌao wˌatawˌafundˈiʃa, ˌau ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, nˌao wˌatawˌaambˈia.|0
ˌau zˌuŋɡumzˈeni na dunˈia, nˈajo ˌitawˌafundˈiʃa, ˌau atʃˈeni samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini wawˈape tˌaarˈifa.|0
ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈawa wˈote ˌasijeɟˈua kwˌamba mkˈono wa bwˈana n̩dˈio ˌuliofˈaɲa hˈili.|0
mkonˈoni mwˈake kˈuna uhˈai wa kˈila kiˈumbe, na pˈumzi ja wˌanadˈamu wˈote.|0
ɟˈe, sikˈio hˌalijˌaɟarˈibu manˈeno kˌama vˈile ulˈimi ˌuoɲɟˈavjo tʃakˈula.|0
ɟˈe, hekˈima hˌaipˌatikˈani kˌatikˈati ja wazˈee? ɟˈe, maˈiʃa marˈefu hˌajalˈeti ˌufahˈamu.|0
hekˈima na ŋɡˈuvu ni vja mˈuŋɡu; ʃaˈuri na ˌufahˈamu ni vjˈake jˈeje.|0
kˈile ˌanatʃˌokibomˈoa hˌakiwˈezi kˌuɟeŋɡˈeka tˈena; ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌefuŋɡˈiwa nˌaje hawˈezi kˌufuŋɡulˈiwa.|0
ˌakizuˈia mˈaɟi, hˈuwa pˈana ukˈame; ˌakijˌaatʃˈia mˈaɟi, hˌuharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwˈake kˈuna ŋɡˈuvu na uʃˈindi; ˌadaŋɡˌaɲuˈaje na ˌadaŋɡaɲˈaje, wˈote wawˈili ni wˈake.|0
jˌeje hˌuwaondˈoa wˌaʃaˈuri wakˈiwa wˌametˈekwa ɲˈara, nˌaje hˌuwapumbˈaza wˌanaotˈoa mˌaamˈuzi.|0
hˌuondˈoa pˈiŋɡu zˌilizofˈuŋɡwa na wafˈalme, na kˌuwafˈuŋɡa miʃˈipi ja kˌiunˈoni.|0
hˌuwaondˈoa mˌakuhˈani wakˈiwa wˌametˈekwa ɲˈara, na kˌuwaaŋɡˈuʃa wˌaliˌoɟiˌimarˈiʃa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
hˌuɲamazˈiʃa midˈomo ja wˌaʃaˈuri wˌanaˌoaminˈika, na kˌuondˈoa busˈara ja wazˈee.|0
hˌuwamwaɡˈia ðarˈau wˌanaˌoheʃimˈika, na kˌuwavˈua silˈaha wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˌufunˈua mˈambo ja ndˈani ja ɡizˈani, na kˌujalˈeta nurˈuni jˈale jˌalijˌositirˈika sˈana.|0
hˌujafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˌatukˈuke na kˌujaˌaŋɡamˈiza; hufˈaɲa mˌataˈifa kˌuwa makˈubwa, nˌaje hˌujatawˈaɲa.|0
hˌuwaˌondolˈea vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈn̩tʃi akˈili zˈao; hˌuwapelˈeka wˌataŋɡetˈaŋɡe ɲikˈani pasˈipo na ɲɟˈia.|0
hˌupapˈasa ɡizˈani pˌasipokˈuwa na mwˈaŋɡa; hˌuwafˈaɲa wˌapepesˈuke kˌama walˈevi.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌameˈona hˈili lˈote, mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu jˌamesikˈia na kˌulielˈewa.|0
hˈajo mnˌajojaɟˈua mˌimi pˈia nˌinajaɟˈua; mˌimi si ˈm̩tu dˈuni kulˈiko nˈiɲi.|0
lakˈini ninˈajo ʃaˈuku ja kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na mweɲˈezi na kˌuhoɟiˈana ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˈiɲi, hˌata hˈivjo, hˌunipakˈaza uˈoŋɡo; nˈiɲi ni mˌatabˈibu wˌasiofˈaa kˈitu, nˈiɲi ɲˈote.|0
laˈiti wˈote mŋɡˌeɲamˈaza kˈimja! kwa kˌuwa kwˈenu hˌilo lˌiŋɡekˈuwa hekˈima.|0
sˌikiˈeni sˈasa hˈoɟa jˈaŋɡu; sˌikilizˈeni kusˈihi kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, mtˌazuŋɡˈumza kwa uˈovu kwa niˈaba ja mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, mtˌazuŋɡˈumza kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu kwa niˈaba jˈake.|0
mtˌamwoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo? mtˌamtetˈea mˈuŋɡu kwˈeɲe maʃtˈaka jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, ˌiŋɡekˈuwa vjˈema mˈuŋɡu ˌakiwahˈoɟi nˈiɲi? ɟˈe, mŋɡewˈeza kˌumdaŋɡˈaɲa kˌama ambˈavjo mŋɡewˈeza kˌuwadaŋɡˈaɲa wˌanadˈamu.|0
hakˈika ˌaŋɡewˌakemˈea kˌama mkˌiwapˌendelˈea wˈatu kwa sˈiri.|0
ɟˈe, hˈuo ukˈuu wˌake hˌauŋɡˌewatˈiʃa nˈiɲi? ɟˈe, hˈofu jˌake ˌisiŋɡˌewaˌaŋɡukˈia nˈiɲi.|0
manˈeno jˈenu ni miθˈali za maɟˈivu; ˌutetˈezi wˈenu ni ŋɡˈome za udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi.|0
ɲˌamazˈeni kˈimja nipˈate kusˈema; kˈiʃa na jˌanipˈate jˌatakˌajonipˈata.|0
kwa nˈini nˌiɟiwˈeke mweɲˈewe kwˈeɲe hatˈari na kˌujawˈeka maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌataniˈua, bˈado nˌitamtˌumaˈini; hakˈika nˌitazˌitetˈea ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu mbˈele zˈake.|0
nˈaam, hˈili lˌitanˌiɡeukˈia kˌuwa wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌasijˈemtʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˌajeθubˈutu kˈuɟa mbˈele jˈake.|0
sˌikilizˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kwa makˈini; nˈajo mˌasikˈio jˈenu jˌaiŋɡˈize kˈile nˌisemˈatʃo.|0
sˈasa kwˌamba nˌimekwˈiʃa kˌutajarˈiʃa mˈambo jˈaŋɡu, nˌinaɟˈua mˌimi nˌitahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa na hˈaki.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna jejˈote ˌanajewˈeza kulˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu? kˌama ndˈivjo, nˌitaɲamˈaza kˈimja na nˈife.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniɟalˈie tu mˌimi hˈaja mˈambo mawˈili, nˌami sˌitaɟifˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako.|0
ondˈoa mkˈono wˈako ˈuwe mbˈali nˈami, nˌawe uˈatʃe kˌunioɡˈofja kwa hˈofu zˈako kˈuu.|0
niˈite kwˈeɲe ʃaˈuri nˌami nˌitaɟˈibu, ˌau niˈatʃe nisˈeme, nˌawe upˈate kuɟˈibu.|0
ni makˈosa na ðˈambi ŋɡˈapi nˌilizotˈenda? nˌioɲˈeʃe kˈosa lˈaŋɡu na ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa nˈini kˌuufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako na kˌunihesˈabu mˌimi kˌuwa adˈui jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutalˌiaðˈibu ɟˈani lˌipepˌeruʃwˈalo na upˈepo? ɟˈe, ˌutajasˈaka makˈapi makˈavu.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌunaandˈika mˈambo matʃˈuŋɡu ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na kˌunifˈaɲa nˌizirˈiθi ðˈambi za uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌumeifˈuŋɡa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe pˈiŋɡu. ˌunazitʃˈuŋɡa kwa makˈini ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu zˈote kwa kutˈia alˈama kwˈeɲe ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo mwˌanadˈamu hˌuaŋɡamˈia kˌama kˈitu kˌilitʃoˈoza, kˌama vˈazi lˌililolˈiwa na nˈondo.|0
mwˌanadˈamu ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na mwanˈamke sˈiku zˌake ni tʃˈatʃe nˈazo zˌimeɟˈaa taˈabu.|0
hˌutʃanˈua kˌama ˈua kˈiʃa hˌuɲaˈuka; hˈuwa kˌama kivˈuli kˌipitˈatʃo upˈesi, wˈala hadˈumu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunamwekˈea ɟˈitʃo lˈako ˈm̩tu kˌama hˈujo? ɟˈe, ˌutamlˈeta mbˈele jˈako katˌika hukˈumu.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kutˈoa kˈitu sˈafi kutˈoka kˈitu naɟˈisi? hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje.|0
sˈiku za mwˌanadˈamu zˌimewekˈewa mpˈaka; ˌumekwˈiʃa kˌutaŋɡˈaza idˈadi ja miˈezi jˌake na kuwˈeka mpˈaka ambˈao hawˈezi kˌuuvˈuka.|0
hˈivjo ˌaŋɡalˈia mbˈali umwˈatʃe, hˌadi ˈawe ˌamekˌamilˈiʃa mˈuda wˌake kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeaɟirˈiwa.|0
kwa maˈana lˈipo tˌumaˈini kwa ˈm̩ti; kˌama ˌukikˈatwa ˌutatʃipˈuka tˈena, nˈajo mˌatʃipukˈizi jˌake mˈapja hˌajatakˈoma.|0
mizˈizi jˌake jawˈeza kˌutʃakˈaa arðˈini na kisˈiki tʃˈake kˈufa ˌudoŋɡˈoni.|0
lakˈini kwa kupˈata dalˈili ja mˈaɟi ˌutatʃipˈua na kutˈoa mˌatʃipukˈizi kˌama ˈm̩tʃe.|0
lakˈini mwˌanadˈamu hˈufa, na hˈuo n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wˈake; hutˈoa pˈumzi ja mwˈiʃo, nˌaje hajˈuko tˈena.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈaɟi jˌatowekˈavjo katˌika bahˈari, ˌau mkˈondo wa ˈm̩to ˌukauʃwˈavjo na kˌuwa mkˈavu.|0
ndˈivjo mwˌanadˈamu ˌalalˈavjo tʃˈini ˌasiˈamke; hˌadi mbˈiŋɡu zˌitakˌapokˈuwa hazˈipo tˈena, wˌanadˈamu hˌawataˈamka ˌau kuˈamʃwa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˈao.|0
laˈiti kˌama ˌuŋɡenifˈitʃa kˌaburˈini, na kˌunisitˈiri hˌadi hasˈira jˈako ipˈite! laˈiti ˌuŋɡenˌiwekˈea wakˈati, na kˈiʃa ˌukanˌikumbˈuka.|0
ɟˈe, kˌama ˈm̩tu akˈifa, awˈeza kuˈiʃi tˈena? sˈiku zˈote za kˈazi zˈaŋɡu ŋɡˈumu nˌitaŋɡoɟˈea kufˈaɲua ˈupja kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌutaniˈita nˌami nˌitakˌuitˈika; ˌutakˌionˈea ʃaˈuku kiˈumbe ambˈatʃo mikˈono jˈako ˌilikiˈumba.|0
hakˈika ndˈipo ˌutakˌapozˌihesˈabu hatˈua zˈaŋɡu, lakˈini hˌutazˌifuatˈia ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu.|0
makˈosa jˈaŋɡu jˌatafuŋɡˈiwa kwa lakˈiri kwˈeɲe mfˈuko, nˌawe ˌutazˌifunˈika ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kˌama mlˈima ˌumomˌoɲokˈavjo na kˌufikitʃˈika na kˌama vˈile mwˈamba ˌuondˌolewˈavjo mahˈali pˈake.|0
kˌama mˈaɟi jˌamalizˈavjo mˈawe, na mˌafurˈiko jˌatʃukuˈavjo udˈoŋɡo, ndˈivjo ˌunavjˌoharˈibu tˌeɡemˈeo la mwˌanadˈamu.|0
humʃˈinda mˈara mˈoɟa kwa daˈima, nˌaje hˌutowˈeka; wˌaibˌadilˈiʃa sˈura jˌake na kˌumwondˈoa.|0
kˌama wanˈawe wˌakipˈewa heʃˈima, jˌeje hˌafahˈamu; kˌama wˌakiðˌaraulˈiwa, jˌeje haˈoni.|0
jˌeje hˌasikˈii kiŋɡˈine ˌisipokˈuwa mˌaumˈivu ja mwˈili wˌake mweɲˈewe, nˌaje hˌuombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima huɟˈibu kwa mawˈazo matˈupu, ˌau kuɟˈaza tˈumbo lˈake kwa upˈepo wˌeɲe ɟˈoto wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
ɟˈe, awˈeza kˌubiʃˈana ɟˌuːja manˈeno jˌasijofˈaa, kwa hotˈuba zisˈizo na maˈana.|0
lakˈini ˌunaðˌoofˈiʃa hˌata utʃˈaɟi wa mˈuŋɡu na kˌuzuˈia ibˈada mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
ðˈambi jˈako ˌinasukˈuma kˈiɲua tʃˈako, nˌawe ˌumetʃaɡˈua ulˈimi wa hˈila.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈako mweɲˈewe kˌinakˌuhukˈumu, wˈala si tʃˈaŋɡu; midˈomo jˈako mweɲˈewe ˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ni ˈm̩tu wa kwˈanza kˌuzalˈiwa? ˌulizalˈiwa kˈabla ja vilˈima.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌusikilˈiza mˌaʃaˈuri ja sˈiri ja mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌunaˌizuˈia hekˈima ˈiwe jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
wˌewe ˌunaɟˈua kˈitu ɡˈani tˌusitʃˌokiɟˈua sˈisi? ˌunafahˈamu kˈitu ɡˈani tˌusitʃˌokifahˈamu sˈisi.|0
wˈale wˌeɲe mvˈi na wazˈee wˈako upˈande wˈetu, wˈatu ambˈao ni wazˈee hˌata kulˈiko bˈaba jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, farˈaɟa za mˈuŋɡu hˌazikutˈoʃi, ˌau manˈeno jˌalijosˈemwa kwˈako kwa upˈole si kˈitu.|0
kwa nˈini mˈojo wˈako ˌunakˌudaŋɡˈaɲa, na kwa nˈini mˈatʃo jˈako jˌanaŋɡˈaa.|0
ˌili kwˌamba upˈate kutˈoa hasˈira jˈako ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu, na kumwˈaɡa manˈeno kˌama hˈajo kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako.|0
mwˌanadˈamu ni kˈitu ɡˈani, hˌata awˈeze kˌuwa sˈafi, ˌau jˌeje ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na mwanˈamke, hˌata awˈeze kˌuwa mwˌadilˈifu.|0
kˌama mˈuŋɡu hˌawaamˈini wˌatakatˈifu wˈake, kˌama hˌata mbˈiŋɡu zeɲˈewe si sˈafi matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
sembˈuse mwˌanadˈamu ambˈaje ni mwˈovu na mpotˈovu, ambˈaje hˈuɲua uˈovu kˌama ˌaɲuˈavjo mˈaɟi.|0
nˌisikilˈize mˌimi nˌami nˌitakˌuelˈeza, ˈatʃa nˌikuambˈie jˈale nˌilijˌojaˈona.|0
ambˈajo wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌamejanˈena, bˌila kufˈitʃa lolˈote wˌalilˌopokˈea tˌoka kwa bˈaba zˈao.|0
wakˈati ambˈao wˌao pˈeke jˈao n̩dˈio wˌalipˈewa ˈn̩tʃi, hakˈuna mɡˈeni ˌalijepˈita mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu sˈiku zˌake zˈote hupˈata matˈeso, miˈaka jˈote ˌaliwekˈewa mkorˈofi.|0
saˈuti za kutˈiʃa huɟˈaa mˌasikiˈoni mwˈake; katˌika kˌufanikˈiwa kwˈake, wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi hˌumʃambulˈia.|0
hukˈata tamˈaa kˌuokˈoka ɡizˈani; ˌamewˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja upˈaŋɡa.|0
hˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa, ˌakitafˈuta tʃakˈula; ˌanaɟˈua kwˌamba sˈiku ja ɡˈiza ˈiko karˈibu.|0
taˈabu na mˌaumˈivu makˈuu vˌinamtˈia hˈofu; humʃˈinda kˌama mfˈalme alˈije tajˈari kwa vˈita.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌamemkuɲɟˈia mˈuŋɡu ŋɡˈumi jˌake na kˌuɟiɡˈamba ðˈidi ja mweɲˈezi.|0
kwa kibˈuri ˌakiʃˌambulˈia ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu akˈiwa na ŋɡˈao nˈene, ilˈijo imˈara.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˈuso wˌake ˌumefunˈikwa na mafˈuta kwa unˈene na kiˈuno tʃˈake kˌimevˈimba kwa kˌunenˈepa.|0
ˌataˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja maɡˈofu, na katˌika ɲˈumba ambˈazo hˌaziˈiʃi mwˌanadˈamu jejˈote, ɲˈumba zˌinazokˈuwa vifˈusi.|0
hˌatatˌaɟirˈika tˈena, nˌao ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake hˌautadˈumu, wˈala mˈali zˌake hˌazitakˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌatatˈoka ɡizˈani; mwˈali wa mˈoto ˌutaɲaˈuʃa mˌatʃipukˈizi jˈake, nˈajo pˈumzi ja kˈiɲua tʃa mˈuŋɡu ˌitamwˌondolˈea mbˈali.|0
ˌasiɟˌidaŋɡˈaɲe mweɲˈewe kˌutumˌainˈia ˌubatˈili, kwa kˌuwa hˌatapˈata malˈipo jojˈote.|0
ˌatakˈuwa ˌamelˈipwa kˌikamilˈifu kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈake, nˈajo matˈawi jˌake hˌajatastˈawi.|0
ˌatafanˈana na mzabˈibu ˌuliˌopukutˈiʃwa matˈunda jˌake kˈabla hˌajaɟaˈiva, kˌama mzˌeitˈuni ˌunaˌodondˈoʃa maˈua jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa ɟamˈii ja wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu wˌatakˈuwa tˈasa, nˌao mˈoto ˌutatˌeketˈeza hˈema za wˈale wˌanaopˈenda rˈuʃwa.|0
hutˈuŋɡa mˈimba ja maðˈara na kuzˈaa uˈovu; matˈumbo jˈao huˈumba ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
nˌimepˈata kˌusikˈia mˈambo mˈeŋɡi kˌama hˈaja, nˌaɲi ɲˈote ni wˌafarˈiɟi wˌeɲe kˌutaabˈiʃa.|0
ɟˈe, manˈeno jˈenu mˈeŋɡi jasˈijo na maˈana hajˈana mwˈiʃo? ˈm̩na nˈini hˌata mwˌendelˈee kˌuʃindˈana kwa manˈeno.|0
mˌimi pˈia nˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza kˌama nˈiɲi, kˌama mŋɡekˈuwa katˌika hˈali jˈaŋɡu; nˌiŋɡewˈeza kutˈoa hotˈuba nzˈuri ðˈidi jˈenu, na kˌuwatˌikisˈia nˈiɲi kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌiŋɡewatˈia mˈojo; farˈaɟa kutˈoka mˌidomˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, ˌiŋɡewˌaletˈea nafˈuu.|0
lakˈini kˌama nˌikisˈema, mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu bˈado hˌajatulˈizwi; nˌami kˌama nˌikiɟˌizuˈia, wˈala hˌajaondˈoki.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, hakˈika ˌumenˌitʃakˈaza; ˌumewˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
ˌumenˌikuɲɟakˈuɲɟa, nˈalo lˌimekˈuwa ˌuʃahˈidi; nˈako kukˈonda kwˈaŋɡu kˌumeˌoŋɡezˈeka sˈana na kˌuʃuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiʃambulˈia na kˌunirarˈua katˌika hasˈira jˈake, na kˌunisaɡˈia mˈeno jˈake; adˈui jˈaŋɡu hˌunikazˈia mˈatʃo jˌake makˈali.|0
wˈatu wˌamenˌifumbulˈia vˈiɲua vjˈao kˌuniðihˈaki; hˌunipˈiɡa ʃavˈuni mwˈaŋɡu kwa ðarˈau, na kˌuuŋɡˈana pamˈoɟa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌiɡeuzˈia kwa wˈatu wabˈaja, na kˌunitˈupa katˌika makˈutʃa ja waˈovu.|0
mˈambo jˈote jˌalikˈuwa mazˈuri, lakˈini ˌalinˌivuɲɟavˈuɲɟa; ˌamenˌikamˈata ʃˈiŋɡo na kˌunipˈonda. ˌamenifˈaɲa mˌimi kˌuwa ʃabˈaha jˈake.|0
wapˈiɡa upˈinde wˌake wˌananˌizuŋɡˈuka. bˌila hurˈuma, hutʃˈoma fˈiɡo zˈaŋɡu, na kˌuimwˈaɡa ɲˈoŋɡo jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌunipˈonda tˈena na tˈena; hˌuniʃˌambulˈia kˌama ʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita.|0
nˌimeɟˌiʃonˈea ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia ɟˌuːja mwˈili wˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌimekizˈika kipˈaɟi tʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe vˈumbi.|0
ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌumekˈuwa mwekˈundu kwa kulˈia, mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamepˈiɡwa na ɡˈiza kˈuu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo mikˈono jˈaŋɡu hˌaiɟafˈaɲa ɟeˈuri, na maˈombi jˈaŋɡu ni sˈafi.|0
ˈee ˈn̩tʃi, ˌusiˌifunˈike dˈamu jˈaŋɡu, nˈatʃo kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu kˌisiɲˌamazˈiʃwe kˈamwe.|0
hˌata sˈasa ʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu jˈuko mbiŋɡˈuni; wakˈili wˈaŋɡu jˈuko ɟˈuu.|0
mwombˈezi wˈaŋɡu ni rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamwaɡˈapo matʃˈozi kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa niˈaba ja ˈm̩tu ˌanamsˈihi mˈuŋɡu kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanavjosˈihi kwa aɟˈili ja rafˈiki jˈake.|0
ni miˈaka mitʃˈatʃe tu ˌitapˈita kˈabla sˌiɟaˈenda safˈari ambˈajo sˌitarˈudi.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumevuɲɟˈika, sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˌimefupˈiʃwa, kabˈuri lˌinanˌiŋɡoɟˈea.|0
hakˈika wˌeɲe mizˈaha wˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka; mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamebˈaki kˌutazˈama ˌuadˈui wˈao.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˈipe ðamˈana ˌunajodˈai. ni nˈani mwiŋɡˈine ˌatakˌajewˈeka ðamˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌumezifˈuŋɡa akˈili zˈao zˌisipˈate ˌufahˈamu, kwa hˈijo hˌutawaˈatʃa wapˈate uʃˈindi.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakiwˌaʃutˈumu rafˈiki zˌake ˌili apˈate uɟˈira, mˈatʃo ja watˈoto wˌake jˌataʃˈindwa kuˈona.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌamenifˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa ðihˈaka kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu, ˈm̩tu ambˈaje wˈatu hˌumtemˈea mˈate usˈoni.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamefifˈia kwa aɟˈili ja maɟˈonzi; umbˈile lˈaŋɡu lˈote ni kˌama kivˈuli.|0
wˈatu waɲˈofu wˌanatˈiʃwa na hˈili; wˈatu wasˈio na hatˈia wˌanasimˈama ðˈidi ja wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, wˌaadilˈifu wˌataziʃˈika ɲɟˈia zˈao, nˌao wˈale wˌeɲe mikˈono sˈafi wˌataˌendelˈea kupˈata ŋɡˈuvu.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi ɲɟoˈoni, nˈiɲi ɲˈote, ɟˌaribˈuni tˈena! sˌitampˈata ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˌimepˈita, mipˈaŋɡo jˈaŋɡu ˌimevuɲɟˈika, vˈivjo hˈivjo ʃaˈuku za mˈojo wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈatu hˈawa hufˈaɲa usˈiku kˌuwa mtʃˈana, kwˈeɲe ɡˈiza wˌao husˈema, mwˈaŋɡa u karˈibu..|0
kˌama ɲˈumba pekˈee nˌinajˌoitˌaraɟˈia ni kabˈuri, kˌama nˌikikˌitandˈika kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu ɡizˈani.|0
kˌama nˌikiˌuambˈia ˌuharibˈifu, wˌewe u bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, na kˌuliambˈia bˈuu, wˌewe u mˈama jˈaŋɡu ˌau dˈada jˈaŋɡu,.|0
lˈiko wˈapi bˌasi tˌaraɟˈio lˈaŋɡu? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kuˈona tˌaraɟˈio lolˈote kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, lˌitaʃˈuka tʃˈini hˌadi kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja maˈuti? ɟˈe, tˌutaʃˈuka pamˈoɟa mˌavumbˈini.|0
bildˈadi mʃˈuhi ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, ni lˈini ˌutafˈika mwˈiʃo wa manˈeno hˈaja? ˈuwe mwˌeɲe busˈara, nˌasi ndˈipo tˌutakˌapowˈeza kˌuoŋɡˈea.|0
kwa nˈini sˌisi tˌunafˌikirˈiwa kˌama waɲˈama, na kˌuonekˈana waɟˈiŋɡa matʃˈoni pˈako.|0
wˌewe ˌunajˌeɟirarˈua mweɲˈewe vipˈande vipˈande katˌika hasˈira jˈako, ɟˈe, dunˈia iˈatʃwe kwa aɟˈili jˈako wˈewe? ˌau ni lazˈima miˈamba ˌiondolˈewe mahˈali pˈake.|0
tˈaa ja mwˈovu ˌimezˈimwa, nˌao mwˈali wa mˈoto wˌake ˌumezimˈika.|0
mwˈaŋɡa hemˈani mwˈake ˌumekˈuwa ɡˈiza; tˈaa ilˈijo karˈibu nˌaje ˌimezimˈika.|0
ŋɡˈuvu za hatˈua zˌake zˌimeðˌoofˈiʃwa; ʃaˈuri lˈake bˈaja lˌitamwaŋɡˈuʃa.|0
miɡˈuu jˌake ˌimemsˌukumˈia kwˈeɲe wˈavu, nˌaje ˌanatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe matˈundu ja wˈavu.|0
tˈanzi lˌitamkamˈata kwˈeɲe kˌisiɡˈino; mtˈeɡo ˌutamʃˌikilˈia kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kitˈanzi kˌimefˈitʃwa arðˈini kwa aɟˈili jˈake; mtˈeɡo ˈuko kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia jˈake.|0
vitˈiʃo vˌimemtˈia hˈofu kˈila upˈande, na adˈui zˌake hˌumwandˈama kˈila hatˈua.|0
ɟˈaŋɡa lˌinamwonˈea ʃaˈuku; maˈafa jˈako tajˈari kwa aɟˈili jˌake ˌaaŋɡukˈapo.|0
nˈajo jˌatakˈula sehˈemu ja ŋɡˈozi jˈake; mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa maˈuti ˌatakˈula maˈuŋɡo jˈake.|0
ˌataŋɡolˈewa kutˈoka ˌusalˈama wa hˈema lˈake, na kˌupelˈekwa kwa mfˈalme wa vitˈiʃo.|0
mˈoto ˌutakˈaa katˌika hˈema lˈake; mˈoto wa kˌiberˈiti ˌutamwˈaɡwa ɟˌuːja makˈao jˈake.|0
mizˈizi jˌake tʃˈini ˌitakaˈuka na matˈawi jˌake ɟˈuu jˌataɲaˈuka.|0
kˌumbukˈumbu lˈake lˌitatowˈeka katˌika dunˈia, wˈala hˌatakˈuwa na ɟˈina katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌameˌondolˈewa nurˈuni na kˌusukumˈiwa ɡizˈani, nˌaje ˌamefukˈuzwa mbˈali atˈoke dˌuniˈani.|0
hˈana mtˈoto wˈala m̩zˈao mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake, wˈala ˌalijˌenusurˈika mahˈali ˌalipoˈiʃi.|0
wˈatu wa mˌaɣarˈibi wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa jˌalijompˈata; wˈatu wa mˌaʃarˈiki wˌatapˈatwa na hˈofu.|0
hakˈika ndˈivjo jalˈivjo makˈao ja ˈm̩tu mwˈovu; ndˈivjo palˈivjo mahˈali pˈake ˈm̩tu ˌasijemɟˈua mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, mtˌaendelˈea kˌunitˈesa mpˈaka lˈini, na kˌunipˈonda kwa manˈeno jˈenu.|0
mˈara kˈumi hˈizi mmˌeniʃutˈumu; bˌila aˈibu mnˌaniʃˌambulˈia.|0
kˌama ni kwˈeli nˌimepotˈoka, kˈosa lˈaŋɡu nˌinabˈaki kˌuhusˈika nˈalo mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌama kwˈeli mŋɡˌeɟitukˈuza weɲˈewe ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, na kˌutumˈia uɲˈoŋɡe wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi ɟuˈeni kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌitendˈea jalˈijo mabˈaja, nˌaje ˌamekokˈota wˈavu wˌake kˌunizuŋɡˈuka.|0
iŋɡˈawa nˌinalˈia, nˌimetendˈewa mabˈaja! sipˈati ɟˈibu; iŋɡˈawa nˌinaˈomba msaˈada, hakˈuna hˈaki.|0
jˌeje ˌameˌizuˈia ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu hˈivjo siwˈezi kupˈita; ˌamejˌafunˈika mapˈito jˈaŋɡu na ɡˈiza.|0
ˌamenivˈua heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu, na kˌuniˌondolˈea tˈaɟi kitʃwˈani pˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌamenˌibomˈoa kˈila upˈande hˌadi nˌimeˈiʃa; ˌameliŋɡˈoa tˌeɡemˈeo lˈaŋɡu kˌama ˈm̩ti.|0
hasˈira jˌake ˌimewˈaka ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu; ˌamenˌihesˈabu kˌuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈake.|0
maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˌananˌisoɡelˈea kwa ŋɡˈuvu; jˌamenˌiziŋɡˈira, jˌamepˈiɡa kˈambi kˌulizuŋɡˈuka hˈema lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌamewatˈeŋɡa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu mbˈali nˈami; wˈale tˌunaˌoɟuˈana nˌao wˌamefˌarakˈana nˌami kabˈisa.|0
wˈatu wa ɟamˈaa jˈaŋɡu wˌamekwˈenda mbˈali; rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu wˌamenˌisahˈau.|0
waɡˈeni wˈaŋɡu na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wa kˈike wˌananiˈona kˌama mɡˈeni; wˌananˌitazˈama kˌama mɡˈeni.|0
namwˈita mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, wˈala hˌaitˈiki, iŋɡˈawa namwˈomba kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
pˈumzi ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu ni kiɲˈaa kwa ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu; nˌimekˈuwa tʃukˈizo ˈm̩no kwa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
hˌata watˈoto wadˈoɡo hˌuniðihˈaki; nˌinapˌoɟitokˈeza, hˌunifaɲˈia mzˈaha.|0
rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu wa mojˈoni wˈote wˌananˌitʃukˈia kabˈisa; wˈale nˌiwapendˈao wˌamekˈuwa kiɲˈume nˈami.|0
mˌimi nˌimebˈaki mifˈupa na ŋɡˈozi tˈu; nˌimeponˈea nikˈiwa karˈibu kˈufa.|0
nˌihurˌumiˈeni, rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu, kuwˈeni na hurˈuma, kwa kˌuwa mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu ˌumenipˈiɡa.|0
kwa nˈini mnˌanifˌuatˈia kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌafaɲˈavjo? hˌamtoʃˈeki kˈamwe na mwˈili wˈaŋɡu.|0
laˈiti manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌaŋɡewˈekwa kwˈeɲe kˌumbukˈumbu, laˈiti kwˌamba jˌaŋɡeandˈikwa kwˈeɲe kitˈabu.|0
kwˌamba jˌaŋɡetʃˈorwa kwˈeɲe risˈasi kwa kifˈaa tʃa tʃˈuma, ˌau kˌujatʃˈoŋɡa ɟˌuːja mwˈamba milˈele.|0
nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba mkombˈozi wˈaŋɡu ju hˈai, nˌaje kwˌamba mwiʃˈoni ˌatasimˈama ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌami baˌada ja ŋɡˈozi jˈaŋɡu kˌuharibˈiwa, bˈado nikˈiwa na mwˈili hˈuu nˌitamwˈona mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌimi nˌitamwˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe: mˈimi, wˈala si mwiŋɡˈine. tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunavjˌomtamˈani sˈana.|0
kˌama mkisˈema, tazˈama tˌutakˌavjomwˈinda, mˌaadˈamu mzˈizi wa tatˈizo ˈuko ndˈani jˈake,.|0
nˈiɲi weɲˈewe ˌuoɡopˈeni upˈaŋɡa, kwa kˌuwa ɣaðˈabu ˌitalˈeta aðˈabu kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌaɲi ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kwˌamba kˈuna hukˈumu.|0
ndˈipo sofˈari mnˌaamˈaθi ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
mawˈazo jˌanajˌonisumbˈua jˌananˌisukˈuma kuɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu nˌimehˌaŋɡaˈika sˈana.|0
nˌinasikˈia mˌakaripˈio ambˈajo jˌananˌivuɲɟˈia heʃˈima, nˌao ˌufahˈamu wˈaŋɡu ˌunanˌisukˈuma kuɟˈibu.|0
hakˈika ˌunaɟˈua ɟˈinsi ˌilivjokˈuwa ʃˈu zamˈani, ʃˈu zamˈani mwˌanadˈamu ˌalipowˈekwa dˌuniˈani.|0
matʃˈeko ja ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ni ja mˈuda mfˈupi, nˈajo furˈaha ja wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu hudˈumu kwa kitˈambo tˈu.|0
iŋɡˈawa kˌuɟikwˈeza kwˈake hˌufikˈia mbiŋɡˈuni na kˈitʃwa tʃˈake huɡˈusa mawˈiŋɡu.|0
ˌataˌaŋɡamˈia milˈele kˌama mˈavi jˌake mweɲˈewe. wˈale wˌaliomwˈona wˌataulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi?.|0
kˌama ndˈoto hˌutowˈeka, wˈala hˌapatikˈani tˈena, ˌamefˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali kˌama maˈono ja usˈiku.|0
ɟˈitʃo lˌililomwˈona hˌalitamwˈona tˈena; mahˈali pˈake hˌapatamwˈona tˈena.|0
watˈoto wˌake wˌatalˈipa jˈote bˈaba jˈao ˌalijˌowaðulˈumu maskˈini, nˈajo mikˈono jˌake ˌitarudˈiʃa mˈali jˈote ˌalijˌoɲaŋɡˈaɲa wˈatu.|0
ŋɡˈuvu za uɟˈana zˌilizˌoiɟˈaza mifˈupa jˈake, zˌitalˈala nˌaje mˌavumbˈini.|0
iŋɡˈawa uˈovu ni mtˈamu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake nˌaje hˌuufˈitʃa tʃˈini ja ulˈimi wˈake.|0
iŋɡˈawa hawˈezi kˌukubˈali kˌuuatʃˈia uˈende, lakˈini hˌuuwˈeka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo tʃakˈula tʃˈake kˌitakˈuwa kitʃˈuŋɡu tumbˈoni mwˈake, nˈatʃo kˌitakˈuwa sˈumu kˈali ja ɲˈoka ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌatatˈema mˈali ˌalizˌozimˈeza; mˈuŋɡu ˌatalifˈaɲa tˈumbo lˈake kˌuzitapˈika.|0
ˌataɲˈoɲa sˈumu za maɟˈoka; mˈeno ja ɲˈoka mwˌeɲe sˈumu kˈali jˌatamuˈua.|0
hˌatafˌurahˈia viɟˈito, mˈito ˌinajˌotirirˈiʃa asˈali na siˈaɡi.|0
vˈile ˌalivjˌovitˌaabikˈia ˌatavˌirudˈiʃa bˌila kuvˈila; hˌatafˌurahˈia faˈida ˌitokanˈajo na bˌiaʃˈara jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌaliwˌaonˈea maskˈini na kˌuwaˈatʃa pasˈipo kˈitu; ˌameɲaŋɡˈaɲa kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈumba ˌasizˌoziɟˈeŋɡa.|0
hakˈika hˌatakˈuwa na rˈaha katˌika kˌutamˈani kwˈake sˈana; hawˈezi kˌuɟiokˈoa mweɲˈewe kwa hazˈina zˈake.|0
hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃosalˈia kwa aɟˈili jˌake ˌili ˈale; kˌufanikˈiwa kwˈake hˌakutadˈumu.|0
kˌatikˈati ja wˈiŋɡi wa ustˈawi wˈake, ðˈiki ˌitampˈata; taˈabu ˌitamɟˈia kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌameliɟˈaza tˈumbo lˈake, mˈuŋɡu ˌataˌioɲˈeʃa ɣaðˈabu kˈali ðˈidi jˈake, na kˌumɲeʃˈea mapˈiɡo ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌiɟapokˈuwa ˌaikimbˈia silˈaha ja tʃˈuma, mʃˈale wa ʃˈaba ˌutamtʃˈoma.|0
ˌataˌutʃomˈoa katˌika mɡˈoŋɡo wˈake, ˈn̩tʃa ˌiŋɡaˈajo kutˈoka ˈini lˈake. vitˈiʃo vˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɡˈiza nˈene lˌinavizˈia hazˈina zˈake. mˈoto ˌusiˌopepˈewa na ˈm̩tu ˌutamtˌeketˈeza, na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza jˌalijˌosalˈia ɲumbˈani mwˈake.|0
mbˈiŋɡu zˌitawˈeka wˈazi hatˈia jˈake, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitainˈuka kiɲˈume tʃˈake.|0
mˌafurˈiko jˌataˌitʃukˈua ɲˈumba jˈake, mˈaɟi jˌaendˈajo kˈasi katˌika sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu mˈuŋɡu ˌalilˌowaɡawˈia waˈovu, urˈiθi ˌuliowˈekwa kwa aɟˈili jˈao na mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
jˌasikˌilizˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kwa makˈini; hˌii na ˈiwe farˈaɟa mnˌajonˈipa mˈimi.|0
nˌivumˌiliˈeni nˌinapˌozuŋɡˈumza, nˌami nˌikiʃˌazuŋɡˈumza, ˌendeleˈeni kˌuniðihˈaki.|0
ɟˈe, kwˈani mˌalalamˈiko jˈaŋɡu jˌanaˌelekˈezwa kwa mwˌanadˈamu? kwa nˈini nˌisikˈose subˈira.|0
nˌiaŋɡˌaliˈeni mkˌastaaɟˈabu; mkawˈeke mkˈono ɟˌuːja vˈiɲua vjˈenu.|0
nˌinapowˈaza ɟˌuːja hˈili, nˌinaoɡˈopa, nˌao mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌunatˌetemˈeka.|0
kwa nˈini waˈovu wˌanaˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi, wˌakifikˈia ˈumri wa uzˈee na kˌuendelˈea kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˌuwaˈona watˈoto wˌao wˌakiθˌibitˈika wakˈiwa wˌamewˌazuŋɡˈuka, wazˈao wˌao mbˈele za mˈatʃo jˈao.|0
ɲˈumba zˈao zi salˈama wˈala hakˈuna hˈofu; fˈimbo ja mˈuŋɡu haˈiko ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
madˈume jˈao ja ŋɡˈombe huvjˈaza bˌila kuʃˈindwa kˈamwe; ŋɡˈombe wˌao huzˈaa wˈala hˌawaharˈibu mˈimba.|0
huˈimba ɲˈimbo kwa matˈari na kwa kinˈubi, nˌao hˌuifˌurahˈia saˈuti ja filˈimbi.|0
hˌuitumˈia miˈaka jˈao katˌika mˌafanikˈio nˌao huʃˈuka kˌaburˈini kwa amˈani.|0
lakˈini hˌumwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, tuˈatʃe sˈisi! hatˈuna hˈaɟa ja kˌufahˈamu ɲɟˈia zˈako.|0
mweɲˈezi ni nˈani hˌata tˌumtumikˈie? tˌutapˈata faˈida ɡˈani kumwˈomba.|0
lakˈini kˌufanikˈiwa kwˈao hakˈupo mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao weɲˈewe, hˈivjo nˌaɟitˈeŋɡa mbˈali na ʃaˈuri la waˈovu.|0
lakˈini ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi tˈaa ja waˈovu huzˈimwa? ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi maˈafa hˌuwaɟˈia, jˈale jˌawapatˈajo ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu hˌuwapaŋɡˈia katˌika hasˈira jˈake.|0
ni mˈara ŋɡˈapi hˈuwa kˌama maɟˈani makˈavu mbˈele ja upˈepo, kˌama makˈapi jˌatʃukˌuliwˈajo na ðorˈuba.|0
ˌimesˌemekˈana, mˈuŋɡu hˌuiwˈeka akˈiba aðˈabu ja ˈm̩tu kwa aɟˈili ja wanˈawe. mˈuŋɡu na amlˈipe ˈm̩tu mweɲˈewe, ˌili apˈate kˌuliɟˈua.|0
mˈatʃo jˌake mweɲˈewe na jaˈone mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈake; jˌeje na aˈiɲue ɣaðˈabu ja mweɲˈezi.|0
kwˈani ˌanaɟˈali nˈini kuhˈusu ɟamˈaa ˌanajˌoiˈatʃa ɲˈuma, miˈezi jˌake ˌalijˌopaŋɡˈiwa ˌifikˈapo mwˈiʃo.|0
ɟˈe, jˈuko ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌumfundˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu mˌaarˈifa, iwˈapo jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌahukumˈuje hˌata walˈio ɟˌuːja wˈote.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa hˈufa akˈiwa na ŋɡˈuvu zˌake kamˈili, akˈiwa salˈama na mwˌeɲe rˈaha kamˈili.|0
mwˈili wˌake ukˈiwa ˌumenawˈiri, nˈajo mifˈupa jˌake ikˈiwa ˌimeɟˈaa mafˈuta ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine hˈufa katˌika utʃˈuŋɡu wa nˈafsi, akˈiwa hˌaɟafˌurahˈia kˈamwe ɟˈambo lolˈote zˈuri.|0
hˈao wˈote hulˈala mˌavumbˈini, nˌao mabˈuu hˌuwafunˈika wˈote.|0
nˌinajaɟˈua kˌikamilˈifu jˈale mnˌajojˌafikˈiri, mipˈaŋɡo ambˈajo kwˈajo mŋɡˌenitendˈea mabˈaja.|0
mwasˈema, ˈiko wˈapi sˈasa ɲˈumba ja hˈujo ˈm̩tu m̩kˈuu, mahˈema ambˈajo wˈatu waˈovu wˌalikˈaa?.|0
ɟˈe, hˌamkuwˈahi kˌuwaulˈiza hˈao wˌanaˌosafˈiri? ɟˈe, hˌamkutˌafakˈari tˌaarˈifa zˈao.|0
kwˌamba ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌuepˈuʃwa kutˈoka sˈiku ja maˈafa, kwˌamba hˌuokolˈewa kutˈoka sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu.|0
ni nˈani hˌulaˈumu matˈendo jˌake mbˈele ja ˈuso wˈake? ni nˈani ˌampatˌilizˈaje kwa jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
hˌupelˈekwa kˌaburˈini, nˌao ulˈinzi ˌukawˈekwa kwˈeɲe kabˈuri lˈake.|0
udˈoŋɡo ulˈio bondˈeni ni mtˈamu kwˈake; wˈatu wˈote wˌatamfuˈata, nˌao umˈati wa wˈatu ˌusiˌohesabˈika ˌumemtˌaŋɡulˈia.|0
hˈivjo nˈiɲi mnˌawezˈaɟe kˌunifarˈiɟi kwa upˈuzi wˈenu? hakˈuna kˌilitʃˌosalˈia tʃa maɟˈibu jˈenu ˌisipokˈuwa uˈoŋɡo.|0
ndˈipo ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, mwˌanadˈamu awˈeza kˌuwa wa faˈida kwa mˈuŋɡu? ɟˈe, hˌata ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima awˈeza kˌumfaˈidi.|0
ɟˈe, mweɲˈezi ˌaŋɡefˌurahˈia nˈini kˌama ˌuŋɡekˈuwa mwˌadilˈifu? ˌau ɟˈe, jˌeje ˌaŋɡepˈata faˈida ɡˈani kˌama ɲɟˈia zˈako zˌiŋɡekˈuwa kˌamilˈifu.|0
ɟˈe, ni kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutaˈua wˈako n̩dˈijo maˈana ˌanakˌukemˈea na kulˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, uˈovu wˈako si m̩kˈuu? ðˈambi zˈako si hazˈina mwˈiʃo.|0
ˌumedˈai ðamˈana kwa ndˈuɡu zˈako bˌila sabˈabu; ˌumewavˈua wˈatu ŋɡˈuo zˈao, ˌukawaˈatʃa ˈutʃi.|0
hukˈumpa mˈaɟi ˌalijetʃˈoka, nˌawe ˌulimɲˈima tʃakˈula mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe uwˈezo ˌukimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi: ˈm̩tu ˌulijˌeheʃimˈiwa, ˌukiˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌumewˌafukˈuza waɟˈane mikˈono mitˈupu na kˌuzivˈuɲɟa ŋɡˈuvu za jatˈima.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mitˈeɡo ˌimekˌuzuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote, hatˈari ja ɣafˈula ˌinakutˈia hˈofu.|0
n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ni ɡˈiza sˈana huwˈezi kuˈona, tˈena n̩dˈijo sabˈabu mˌafurˈiko ja mˈaɟi jˌamekˌufunˈika.|0
ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu hajˈuko katˌika mbˈiŋɡu za ɟˈuu? ɟˈuu kulˈiko ɲˈota zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
hˈivjo wˌewe wasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌanaɟˈua nˈini? ɟˈe, jˌeje hˌuhukˈumu katˌika ɡˈiza kˌama hˈilo.|0
mawˈiŋɡu mazˈito ni pazˈia lˈake, hˈivjo hˌatuˈoni sˌisi ˌatembeˈapo ɟˌuːja ˈaŋɡa la dunˈia.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutaˌifuˈata ɲɟˈia ja zamˈani, ambˈajo wˈatu waˈovu wˌaliˌikaɲˈaɡa.|0
wˌaliˌondolˈewa kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈao, misˈiŋɡi jˈao ˌikatʃˌukulˈiwa na mˌafurˈiko.|0
wˌalimwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, tuˈatʃe sˈisi! hˈujo mweɲˈezi awˈeza kˌutufaɲˈia nˈini?.|0
lakˈini n̩dˈije ˌaliziɟˈaza ɲˈumba zˈao na vˈitu vizˈuri, hˈivjo nˌinaɟitˈeŋɡa mbˈali na mˌaʃaˈuri ja waˈovu.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌanaˈona mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao na kˌufurˈahi, nˌao wasˈio na hatˈia hˌuwaðihˈaki, wˌakisˈema.|0
hakˈika adˈui zˈetu wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa, nˌao mˈoto ˌumetˌeketˈeza mˈali zˈao..|0
m̩ɟˈue sˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌili ˈuwe na amˈani, ndˈipo mˈema jˌatakˌapokuɟˈia.|0
ˌujapokˈee mˌafundˈiʃo tˌoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake, na manˈeno jˌake ˌujawˈeke mojˈoni mwˈako.|0
kˌama ˌukimrudˈia mweɲˈezi, ˌutarudˈiʃwa ˈupja: kˌama ˌukiˌuondˈoa uˈovu ˈuwe mbˈali na hˈema lˈako.|0
kˌama ðahˈabu jˈako ˌukiˌihesˈabu kˌama mavˈumbi, ðahˈabu jˈako ja ofˈiri kˌama miˈamba ja mˌabondˈeni.|0
ndˈipo mweɲˈezi ˌatakˈuwa ðahˈabu jˈako, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa fˈeða jˈako ilˈijo bˈora.|0
hakˈika ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˌifurahˈiʃa kwa mweɲˈezi, nˌawe ˌutamwˌinulˈia mˈuŋɡu ˈuso wˈako.|0
ˌutamwˈomba jˈeje, nˌaje ˌatakˌusikˈia, nˌawe ˌutazˌitimˈiza naðˈiri zˈako.|0
ˌutakˌusudˈia ɟˈambo nˈalo lˌitatendˈeka, nˌao mwˈaŋɡa ˌutaˌaŋɡazˈia ɲɟˈia zˈako.|0
wˈatu wˌatakˌapoʃˈuʃwa, nˌawe ˌukasˈema, wˌainˈue! ndˈipo ˌatamwokˈoa ˌalijˌevuɲɟˈika mˈojo.|0
ˌatamwokˈoa hˌata jˈule ambˈaje ˈana hatˈia, ˌataˌokolˈewa kwa sabˈabu ja usˈafi wa mikˈono jˈako.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
laˈiti nˌiŋɡefahˈamu mahˈali pa kumwˈona; laˈiti nˌiŋɡewˈeza kwˈenda mahˈali ˌakaˈapo.|0
nˌiŋɡeliwˈeka ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu mbˈele zˈake, na kˌukiɟˈaza kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu na hˈoɟa.|0
nˌiŋɡeɟˈua kwˌamba ˌaŋɡeniɟˈibu nˈini, na kˌuelˈewa lˈile ambˈalo ˌaŋɡelisˈema.|0
ɟˈe, ˌaŋɡenipˈiŋɡa kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi? la, ˌasiŋɡˌeniɡˌandamˈiza.|0
hˈapo ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu ˌaŋɡewˈeka ʃaˈuri lˈake mbˈele zˈake, nˌami nˌiŋɡeˌokolˈewa milˈele na mhukˈumu wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˌikiˈenda mˌaʃarˈiki, hajˈupo; nˌikiˈenda mˌaɣarˈibi, simpˈati.|0
ˌanapokˈuwa kazˈini pˈande za kˌaskazˈini, simwˈoni; ˌakiɡˌeukˈia kusˈini, nˈako simwˈoni hˌata kidˈoɡo.|0
lakˈini ˌanaiɟˈua ɲɟˈia nˌiiˌendeˈajo; ˌakiˈiʃa kˌuniɟarˈibu, nˌitatˈoka kˌama ðahˈabu.|0
ɲˈajo zˈaŋɡu zˌimefuˈata hatˈua zˌake kwa karˈibu; nˌimeiʃˈika ɲɟˈia jˌake bˌila kˌukeŋɡeˈuka.|0
sˌiɟaziˈatʃa ˈamri zˌilizotˈoka mˌidomˈoni mwˈake; nˌimejˌaθamˈini manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake kulˈiko tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa kˈila sˈiku.|0
lakˈini jˌeje hˌusimˈama pˈeke jˈake; ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumpˈiŋɡa? jˌeje hufˈaɲa lolˈote ˌatakˈalo.|0
hˌutimilˈiza mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na bˈado anˈajo mipˈaŋɡo mˈiŋɡi kˌama hˈijo ambˈajo ˌameiwˈeka akˈiba.|0
hˈijo n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌinaiŋɡˈiwa na hˈofu mbˈele zˈake; nˌifikˌiriˈapo hˈaja jˈote nˌinamwoɡˈopa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌameufˈaɲa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kˌuzimˈia; jˌeje mweɲˈezi ˌamenitˈia hˈofu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo sˌiɟaɲˌamazˈiʃwa na ɡˈiza, wˈala kwa ɡˈiza nˈene lˌinalˌofunˈika ˈuso wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa nˈini mweɲˈezi ˌasiwˈeke ɲakˈati kwa aɟˈili ja hukˈumu? kwa nˈini wˈale wˌamɟuˈao wˌazitafˈute sˈiku kˌama hˈizo bˌila mˌafanikˈio.|0
wˈatu hˌusoɡˈeza mˈawe ja mpˈaka; hutʃˈuŋɡa makˈundi ja waɲˈama wˌalijˌoɲaŋɡˈaɲa kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˌuwaɲaŋɡˈaɲa jatˈima pˈunda wˈao, na kˌumtʃukˈua rehˈani fahˈali wa mɟˈane.|0
hˌumsukˈuma mhitˈaɟi kutˈoka ɲɟˈia, na kˌuwafˈaɲa maskˈini wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi kˌulazimˈika kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
hˌukusˈaɲa tʃakˈula mˌaʃambˈani na kˌuokˈota masˈazo katˌika maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu ja waˈovu.|0
kwa kukˈosa ŋɡˈuo, usˈiku kˈutʃa hukˈaa ˈutʃi; hawˈana tʃotʃˈote tʃa kˌuɟifunˈika barˈidi.|0
hutˈota kwa mvˈua za mlimˈani, nˌao hˌuikˌumbatˈia miˈamba kwa aɟˈili ja kukˈosa pa kˌuɟisitˈiri.|0
kwa kukˈosa ŋɡˈuo, hˌutembˈea ˈutʃi; hubˈeba miɡˈanda ja ŋɡˈano, lakˈini hˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa.|0
hˌukamˈua zˌeitˈuni katˌika mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia; hˌukaɲˈaɡa mˌaʃinikˈizo, lakˈini wˌanaˈona kˈiu.|0
kilˈio tʃa huzˈuni tʃa wˌanaokˈufa kˌinapˈaa kutˈoka mɟˈini, nˈazo nˈafsi za wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa zˌinalilˈia msaˈada. lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌamlaˈumu ˈm̩tu jejˈote kwa kutˈenda mabˈaja.|0
wˈako wˈale wˌanaˌoiˈasi nˈuru, wˌasiˌofahˈamu ɲɟˈia zˌake wˈala hˌawakˈai katˌika mapˈito jˈake.|0
wakˈati mwˈaŋɡa wa mtʃˈana ˌunapˌotowˈeka, mˌuuˈaɟi hˌuinˈuka nˌaje hˌuwaˈua maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi; wakˈati wa usˈiku hˌuɲemelˈea kˌama mwˈizi.|0
ɟˈitʃo la mzˈinzi hˌuŋɡoɟˈea wakˈati wa ɡˈiza, nˌaje hˌufikˈiri, hakˈuna ɟˈitʃo lˌitakˌaloniˈona, nˌaje hˌuufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈake.|0
katˌika ɡˈiza, huvˈuɲɟa maɟˈumba, lakˈini wakˈati wa mtʃˈana hˌuɟifuŋɡˈia ndˈani; hˌawatˈaki kufˈaɲa lolˈote nurˈuni.|0
kwa wˈote hˈawa, ɡˈiza nˈene n̩dˈijo ˌasubˈuhi jˈao; hˌuɟifˈaɲa rafˈiki na vitˈiʃo vja ɡizˈani.|0
lakˈini wˌao ni pˈovu ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi; sehˈemu jˈao ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ˌimelˌaanˈiwa, hˈivjo hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌaendˈaje kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu.|0
kˌama vˈile ɟˈoto na hˈari vˌiɲakuˈavjo θelˈuɟi ˌilijˌojejˈuka, ndˈivjo kuzˈimu kˌuwaɲˌakuˈavjo wˌaliotˈenda ðˈambi.|0
tˈumbo lˌililˌowazˈaa hˌuwasahˈau, nˌao hˈuwa karˈamu ja mabˈuu; wˈatu waˈovu hˌawakumbˈukwi tˈena, lakˈini hˌuvuɲɟˈika kˌama ˈm̩ti.|0
hˌuwafˈaɲa mawˈindo wˌanawˈake tˈasa na wasˈio na watˈoto, nˌao hˌawaoɲˈeʃi hurˈuma kwa waɟˈane.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌuwakokˈota wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kwa uwˈezo wˈake; iŋɡˈawa wˌamestˈawi, hawˈana hakˈika ja maˈiʃa.|0
awˈeza ˌakawaˈatʃa wˌakapumzˈika wˌakiɟihˈisi salˈama, lakˈini mˈatʃo jˌake jˌanaˈona ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo hˌutukˈuka, hˌatimˈaje hˌutowˈeka; huʃˈuʃwa na kˌukusˈaɲua kˌama weŋɡˈine wˈote, hukˈatwa kˌama masˈuke ja nafˈaka.|0
kˌama hˈili sˈivjo, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuniθˌibitˈiʃa kˌuwa mwˈoŋɡo, na kˌujafˈaɲa manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa si kˈitu.|0
ndˈipo bildˈadi mʃˈuhi ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
mamlˈaka na kˌuheʃimˈiwa ni vjˈake mˈuŋɡu; jˌeje hˌuθibitˈiʃa amˈani katˌika mbˈiŋɡu ɟˈuu.|0
ɟˈe, maɟˈeʃi jˌake jawˈeza kˌuhesabˈika? ni nˈani ˌasijˌeaŋɡazˈiwa na nˈuru jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌawezˈaɟe kˌuwa mwˌadilˈifu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu? ˌawezˈaɟe ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌezalˈiwa na mwanˈamke kˌuwa sˈafi.|0
ikˈiwa hˌata mwˈezi sˈio mwaŋɡˈavu nˈazo ɲˈota si sˈafi matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
sembˈuse ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ni fˈunza: mwˌanadˈamu ambˈaje ni bˈuu tˈu.|0
kˈiʃa ajˈubu ˌakaɟˈibu.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌomsaidˈia ˈm̩tu asˈije na uwˈezo! ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌouokˈoa mkˈono ulˈio ðaˈifu.|0
ni ʃaˈuri ɡˈani ˌulilˈompa jˌeje asˈije na hekˈima? nˈajo ni busˈara ɡˈani kˈubwa ˌulijˌooɲˈeʃa.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌekusˌaidˈia kutˈamka manˈeno hˈajo? nˈajo ni rˈoho ja nˈani ˌilijosˈema kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako.|0
wˈafu wˈako katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈuu, wˈale walˈio tʃˈini ja mˈaɟi na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake.|0
maˈuti ˈiko wˈazi mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu; ˌuharibˈifu hˌaukˌufunˈikwa.|0
hˌutandˈaza ˈaŋɡa la kˌaskazˈini mahˈali patˈupu; nˌaje hˌuinˌiŋɡinˈiza dunˈia mahˈali pasˈipo na kˈitu.|0
hˌujafuŋɡˈia mˈaɟi kwˈeɲe mawˈiŋɡu jˈake, hˌata hˈivjo mawˈiŋɡu hˌajapasˈuki kwa uzˈito wˈake.|0
hˌuufunˈika ˈuso wa mwˈezi mpˈevu, ˌakitandˈaza mawˈiŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌametʃˈora mstˈari wa upˈeo ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mˈaɟi, ˌamewˈeka mpˈaka wa nˈuru na ɡˈiza.|0
ŋɡˈuzo za mbˈiŋɡu nˈazo zˌatetemˈeka, zˌinatiʃˈika ˌanapˌozikemˈea.|0
kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake ˌaliˌisukasˈuka bahˈari; kwa hekˈima jˌake ˌalimkˈata rahˈabu vipˈande vipˈande.|0
ˌaliˌisafˈiʃa ˈaŋɡa kwa pˈumzi jˈake; kwa mkˈono wˌake ˌalimtʃˈoma ɟˈoka ˌaendˈaje m̩bˈio.|0
hˈaja ni mˈambo madˈoɡo tu katˌika matˈendo jˈake; tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mdˈoɡo mnoŋɡˈono tˌunaˌousikˈia kumhˈusu! ni nˈani bˌasi ˌawezˈaje kˌuelˈewa ŋɡurˈumo za ŋɡˈuvu zˈake.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakaˌendelˈea na hˈoɟa jˈake, ˌakasˈema.|0
hakˈika kˌama mˈuŋɡu ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˌalijˌeniɲˈima hˈaki jˈaŋɡu, mweɲˈezi ambˈaje ˌamenifˈaɲa niˈoɲɟe utʃˈuŋɡu wa nˈafsi.|0
kwa mˈuda wˈote nˌitakˌaokˈuwa na uhˈai ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, nˈajo pˈumzi ja mˈuŋɡu ikˈiwa puˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
midˈomo jˈaŋɡu hˌaitanˈena uˈovu, wˈala ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu hˌautatˈamka ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
sˌitakˌubaliˈana nˌaɲi kabˈisa kˌuwa ˈm̩ko sahˈihi; hˌadi nˈife, sˌitakˈana ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitadumˈiʃa hˈaki jˈaŋɡu wˈala sˌitaiˈatʃa; ðamˈiri jˈaŋɡu hˌaitˌanisˈuta mˈuda wˈote nˌinaoˈiʃi.|0
watˈesi wˈaŋɡu wˈawe kˌama waˈovu, nˌao adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈawe kˌama wasˈio hˈaki.|0
kwa maˈana ˈm̩tu ˌasijˈemtʃa mˈuŋɡu anˈalo tˌeɡemˈeo ɡˈani ˌanapˌokatilˈiwa mbˈali, mˈuŋɡu ˌanapˌouondˈoa uhˈai wˈake.|0
ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu hˌusikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈake, ʃˈida zˌimɟiˈapo.|0
ɟˈe, ˌanawˈeza kˌumfurahˈia mweɲˈezi? ɟˈe, ˌatamwˈita mˈuŋɡu ɲakˈati zˈote.|0
nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa ɟˌuːja uwˈeza wa mˈuŋɡu; ɲɟˈia za mweɲˈezi sˌitazifˈitʃa.|0
nˈiɲi ɲˈote mmeˈona hˈili weɲˈewe. ni ja nˈini bˌasi mˌazuŋɡˈumzo hˈaja jasˈijo na maˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu ambˈalo mˈuŋɡu hˈumpa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, urˈiθi ˈule ˈm̩tu mðalˈimu ˌanapokˈea kutˈoka kwa mweɲˈezi.|0
hˌata kˌama watˈoto wˌake wˌatakˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kiˈasi ɡˈani, fˈuŋɡu lˈao ni kˌuuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa; wazˈao wˌake hˌawatakˈuwa kˈamwe na tʃakˈula tʃa kˌuwatˈoʃa.|0
taˈuni ˌitawazˈika wˈale wˌatakˌaonˌusurˈika mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, nˌao waɟˈane wˌao hˌawatˌawaˌombolezˈea.|0
ˌaɟapˌokusˈaɲa fˈeða ɲˈiŋɡi kˌama mavˈumbi, na mavˈazi kˌama malˈundo ja udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi.|0
jˈale jˈote ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌalijˌoɟiwekˈea akˈiba, mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌatajavˈaa, nˌaje asˈije na hatˈia ˌataˌiɡawˈaɲa fˈeða jˈake.|0
ɲˈumba ˌaiɟeŋɡˈajo ni kˌama utˈando wa bˌuibˈui, kˌama kibˈanda ˌalitʃˌoteŋɡenˈeza mlˈinzi.|0
jˌeje hulˈala akˈiwa taɟˈiri, lakˈini n̩dˈijo mˈara ja mwˈiʃo; ˌafuŋɡuˈapo mˈatʃo jˈake, jˈote jˌametowˈeka.|0
vitˈiʃo humɟˈia kˌama mˌafurˈiko; ðorˈuba humkˈumba ɣafˈula usˈiku.|0
upˈepo mkˈali wa mˌaʃarˈiki hˌumtʃukˈua, nˌaje hˌutowˈeka; humzˈoa kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake.|0
hˌumvurumˈiʃa bˌila hurˈuma, hˈuku ˌakikimbˈia kˈasi kukwˈepa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake.|0
upˈepo hˌumpiɡˈia makˈofi kwa ðarˈau, na kˌumfukˈuza atˈoke mahˈali pˈake.|0
kˈuna matʃˈimbo ja fˈeða, na mahˈali ðahˈabu ˌisafiʃwˈapo.|0
tʃˈuma hˌupatikˈana arðˈini, nˈajo ʃˈaba hˌujejˈuʃwa kutˈoka mˈawe ja madˈini.|0
mwˌanadˈamu hˌukomˈeʃa ɡˈiza; hˌujatafˈuta hˌadi sehˈemu ilˈijo mbˈali, kwa aɟˈili ja kˌutʃimbˈua mˈawe jˌeɲe madˈini katˌika ɡˈiza ɟeˈusi sˈana.|0
hutʃˈimba ʃˈimo ɟembˈamba mbˈali na makˈao ja wˈatu, mahˈali pˌalipˌosahˌaulˈika na ɲˈajo za wˌanadˈamu; mbˈali na wˌanadˈamu hˌuniŋɡinˈia na kˌupembˈea kwa kˈamba.|0
ˈarði, ambˈako tʃakˈula hutˈoka, tʃˈini hˌuɡeˈuzwa kwa mˈoto.|0
jakˈuti samˈawi hutˈoka katˌika miˈamba jˈake, nˈalo vˈumbi lˈake lˈina vipˈande vja ðahˈabu.|0
hakˈuna ndˈeɡe ˌawindˈaje ˌaiɟuˈaje ɲɟˈia ˈile ˌilijˌofitʃˈika, wˈala hakˈuna ɟˈitʃo la mwˈewe lˌililˌoiˈona.|0
waɲˈama wa porˈini wˌanaotˈamba hˌawaɟawˈahi kˌupakaɲˈaɡa, wˈala sˈimba ˌazuŋɡukˈaje hˌuko.|0
mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu hˌuʃambulˈia miˈamba miɡˈumu sˈana, na kˌuiˈatʃa wˈazi mizˈizi ja milˈima.|0
hˌutobˈoa ʃˈimo rˈefu la kupˈeɲa tʃˈini kwa tʃˈini kwˈeɲe miˈamba; mˈatʃo jˌake huˈona hazˈina zˌake zˈote.|0
hˌutafˈuta vjˈanzo vja mˈito na kˌuvilˈeta vˈitu vˌilivjˌofitʃˈika katˌika nˈuru.|0
lakˈini hekˈima ˌinawˈeza kˌupatikˈana wˈapi? ˌufahˈamu ˌunakˈaa wˈapi.|0
mwˌanadˈamu hˌatambˈui θamˈani jˈake; hˌaiwˈezi kˌupatikˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
kilˈindi husˈema, haˈiko ndˈani jˈaŋɡu; bahˈari nˈajo husˈema, haˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈami..|0
hˌaiwˈezi kˌununulˈiwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi kulˈiko zˈote, wˈala θamˈani jˌake hˌaiwˈezi kupˈimwa kwa fˈeða.|0
hˌaiwˈezi kˌununulˈiwa kwa ðahˈabu ja ofˈiri, kwa ʃohˈamu ja θamˈani kˈubwa ˌau jakˈuti samˈawi ja θamˈani kˈubwa.|0
ðahˈabu wˈala mˈawe mˌaaŋɡˈavu hˌaviwˈezi kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa nˈajo, wˈala hˌaiwˈezi hˌubadilˈiʃwa na vˈito vja ðahˈabu.|0
mˌariɟˈani na jˈaspi hˌazistahˈili kutˈaɟua; θamˈani ja hekˈima ni zaˈidi ja akˈiki ɲekˈundu.|0
jakˈuti maɲɟˈano ˌipatˌikanˈajo kˈuʃi hˌaiwˈezi kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa nˈajo, wˈala hˌaiwˈezi kˌununulˈiwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
ni wˈapi bˌasi hekˈima ˌitokˈako? ˌufahˈamu hukˈaa wˈapi.|0
ˌimefitʃˈika matʃˈoni pa kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo hˈai, ˌimesˌitirˈiwa hˌata kwa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani.|0
ˌuharibˈifu na maˈuti husˈema, ni uvˈumi wˌake tu ˌuliˌotufikˈia mˌasikiˈoni mwˈetu..|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌanaˌifahˈamu ɲɟˈia ja kˌuiendˈea hekˈima na n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌanajˌefahˈamu ˌinakokˈaa.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje hˌuitazˈama miˈiʃo ja dunˈia na huˈona kˈila kˈitu tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
ˌalipˌofaɲˈiza ŋɡˈuvu za upˈepo na kˌujapˈima mˈaɟi.|0
ˌalipofˈaɲa mˌaaɡˈizo kwa aɟˈili ja mvˈua na ɲɟˈia kwa aɟˈili ja umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
ndˈipo ˌalipˌoitazˈama hekˈima na kˌuikˌadirˈia θamˈani jˈake, ˌakaˌiθibitˈiʃa na kˌuihˌakikˈiʃa.|0
nˌaje mˈuŋɡu ˌakamwambˈia mwˌanadˈamu, kˈumtʃa bwˈana: hˈijo n̩dˈijo hekˈima, nˈako kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa na uˈovu n̩dˈio ˌufahˈamu..|0
ajˈubu ˌakaˌendelˈea na hˈoɟa jˈake, ˌakasˈema.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi nˌinavjˌoitamˈani miˈezi ˌilijopˈita, zˈile sˈiku ambˈazo mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌakinilˈinda.|0
wakˈati tˈaa jˌake ˌilinˌiaŋɡazˈia kitʃwˈani tʃˈaŋɡu, na kwa mwˈaŋɡa wˌake mˈuŋɡu nˌikapˈita kˌatikˈati ja ɡˈiza.|0
nˌatamˈani sˈiku zˈile nˌilizokˈuwa katˌika ustˈawi wˈaŋɡu, wakˈati ˌurafˈiki wa mˈuŋɡu wa ndˈani ˌulipˌoibarˈiki ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu.|0
wakˈati mweɲˈezi ˌalikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami, nˌao watˈoto wˈaŋɡu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka.|0
wakˈati ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa ˌimeɲueʃˈewa siˈaɡi, nˌao mwˈamba ˌukanˌimiminˈia viɟˈito vja mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni.|0
wakˈati nˌilipokwˈenda kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi na kukˈeti katˌika kiwˈaɲɟa.|0
viɟˈana wˌaliniˈona wˌakakˈaa kˈando, nˌao wazˈee wˌaliokˈeti wˌakasimˈama.|0
wakˈuu wˌakaˈatʃa kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na kuzˈiba vˈiɲua vjˈao kwa mikˈono jˈao.|0
wˌeɲe vjˈeo wˌakaɲˌamazˈiʃwa, nˈazo ndˈimi zˈao zˌikaɡˌandamˈana na mˌakaakˈaa ja vˈiɲua vjˈao.|0
jejˈote ˌalijˌenisikˈia ˌalinˈena mˈema ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌaliˌoniˈona wˌalinisˈifu.|0
kwa sabˈabu nˌilimwokˈoa maskˈini ˌalijeˈomba msaˈada, nˌaje jatˈima ˌalijekˈuwa hˈana wa kˌumsaidˈia.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa karˈibu kˈufa ˌalinˌibarˈiki, nˌami nˌiliufˈaɲa mˈojo wa mɟˈane kuˈimba.|0
nˌiliivˈaa hˈaki kˌama vˈazi lˈaŋɡu; ˌuadilˈifu ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈoho lˈaŋɡu na kilˈemba tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilikˈuwa mˈatʃo ja kipˈofu na miɡˈuu kwa kiwˈete.|0
nˌilikˈuwa bˈaba kwa mhitˈaɟi; nˌilimtetˈea mɡˈeni.|0
nˌilijavˈuɲɟa mˈeno makˈali ja waˈovu, na kˌuwapokˈoɲa wahˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe mˈeno jˈao.|0
nˌikafikˈiri, nˌitafˈia katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, nˈazo sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˌitakˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi kˌama tʃˌembetʃˈembe za mtʃˈaŋɡa.|0
mizˈizi jˈaŋɡu ˌitafˈika mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi, nˌao umˈande ˌutakˈaa ɟˌuːja matˈawi jˈaŋɡu usˈiku kˈutʃa.|0
ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu ˌutabakˈia kˌuwa ˈm̩pja ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, upˈinde wˈaŋɡu daˈima ˌutaˌendelˈea kˌuwa ˈm̩pja mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu..|0
wˈatu wˌalinˌisikilˈiza kwa tˌumaˈini, wˌakiŋɡoɟˈea ˌuʃaˈuri wˈaŋɡu kwa ˌutulˈivu.|0
baˌada ja mˌimi kˌuzuŋɡˈumza, hˌawakusˈema zaˈidi; manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌaliiŋɡˈia mˌasikiˈoni m̩wˈao kwa makˈini.|0
wˌalinˌiŋɡoɟˈea kˌama maɲˈuɲu ja mvˈua na kˌujapokˈea manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kˌama ˈarði ˌiɲoɲˈavjo mvˈua ja vˈuli.|0
wˌalipokˈata tamˈaa nˌiliwˌaoɲˈeʃa ˈuso wa furˈaha; nˈuru ja ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa ja θamˈani kwˈao.|0
nˌiliwˌatʃaɡulˈia ɲɟˈia na kukˈaa kˌama m̩kˈuu wˈao; nˌiliˈiʃi kˌama mfˈalme kˌatikˈati ja maɟˈeʃi jˈake; nikˈawa kˌama jˌeje ˌanajˌewafarˈiɟi wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi.|0
lakˈini sˈasa wˈatu wadˈoɡo kwa ˈumri kˌunilˈiko wˌananˌiðihˈaki, wˈatu ambˈao bˈaba zˈao nˌiŋɡekatˈaa kwa ðarˈau kˌuwawˈeka pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩bwa wˈaŋɡu wa kulˈinda kondˈoo.|0
ŋɡˈuvu za mikˈono jˈao zˌiŋɡekˈuwa na faˈida ɡˈani kwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˌilikˈuwa zˌimewˌaiʃˈia.|0
katˌika vitʃˈaka wˌalikusˈaɲa mimˈea ja tʃˈumvi, nˈatʃo tʃakˈula tʃˈao kˌilikˈuwa mizˈizi ja ˈm̩ti wa mfaɡˈio.|0
wˌalifukˈuzwa mbˈali na wˈatu wˈao, wˌakipiɡˈiwa kelˈele kˌama wˈevi.|0
wˌalilˌazimˈika kuˈiʃi katˌika mikˈondo ja viɟˈito vˌilivjˌokaˈuka, kwˈeɲe mˌaɟabˈali na mˌahandˈaki.|0
kwˈeɲe vitʃˈaka wˌalilˈia kˌama pˈunda, na wˌaliɟˌisoŋɡasˈoŋɡa pamˈoɟa kwˈeɲe vitʃˈaka.|0
wˌao ni watˈoto wa wˌapumbˈavu wˌeɲe asˈili ja ubˈaja, wˌaliˌofukˈuzwa watˈoke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌao sˈasa wˈana wˌao wˌananˌiðihˈaki katˌika ɲˈimbo; nˌimekˈuwa kˈitu tʃa ðihˈaka kwˈao.|0
wˌananˌitʃukˈia sˈana na kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa nˈami, wˈala hˌawasˈiti kˌunitemˈea mˈate usˈoni.|0
sˈasa kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌameˌileɡˈeza kˈamba ja upˈinde wˈaŋɡu na kˌunitˈesa, wˌamekˈuwa hˈuru kˌunitendˈea wˌaonˈavjo.|0
kuˈume kwˈaŋɡu kˈundi lˌinaʃˌambulˈia; wˌao hˌuiteɡˈea miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu tˈanzi, na kˌuniziŋɡˈira.|0
hˌuizuˈia ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu, nˌao hˌufanikˈiwa katˌika kˌuniletˈea maˈafa, nˌami sˈina jejˈote wa kˌunisˌaidˈia.|0
wˌananiɟˈia kˌama wˈatu wˌapitˈao katˌika ˈufa mpˈana; kˌatikˈati ja maɡˈofu hˈuɟa na kˌuniʃˌambulˈia.|0
vitˈiʃo vˌimenˌifunˈika; heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu ˌimetowˈeʃwa kˌama kwa upˈepo, salˈama jˈaŋɡu ˌimetowˈeka kˌama wˈiŋɡu.|0
sˈasa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌamefikˈia mwˈiʃo; sˈiku za matˈeso zˌimenˌikamˈata.|0
usˈiku mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌinatʃˈoma; mˌaumˈivu jˌanajˌonitafˈuna hˌajatulˈii kˈamwe.|0
kwa uwˈezo wˌake m̩kˈuu mˈuŋɡu hˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama ŋɡˈuo; hˌuʃikamˈana nˌami kˌama ukˈosi wa vˈazi lˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌeje ˌamenitˈupa kwˈeɲe matˈope, nˌami nˌimekˈuwa kˌama mavˈumbi na maɟˈivu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakˌulilˈia wˌewe lakˈini hˌuniɟˈibu; nˌinasimˈama, nˌawe ˌunanˌitazˈama tˈu.|0
wˌewe ˌunanˌiɡeukˈia bˌila hurˈuma; ˌunanˌiʃambulˈia kwa ŋɡˈuvu za mkˈono wˈako.|0
ˌunanˌiɲakˈua na kˌunipˌeperˈuʃa kwa upˈepo; ˌumenirˈuʃa hˈuku na hˌuko kwˈeɲe ðorˈuba kˈali.|0
nˌinaɟˈua ˌutanilˈeta mpˈaka kifˈoni, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌeɲe uhˈai wˈote wˌamewekˈewa.|0
hakˈika hakˈuna jejˈote ˌamʃambˌuliˈaje mhitˈaɟi, ˌanapoˈomba msaˈada katˌika ʃˈida jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, sˌikulˈia kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika taˈabu? ɟˈe, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu hˌaikˌusononˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja maskˈini.|0
lakˈini nˌilipˌotazamˈia mˈema, mabˈaja jˌaliniɟˈia; nˌilipˌotafˈuta nˈuru, ndˈipo ɡˈiza lˌilipokˈuɟa.|0
kˌusukwasˈukwa ndˈani jˈaŋɡu kˈamwe hˌakutulˈii; sˈiku za matˈeso zˌinanˌikabˈili.|0
nˌinazuŋɡˈuka nikˈiwa nˌimeuŋɡˈua, lakˈini si kwa ɟˈua; nˌinasimˈama katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko nˌikiˈomba msaˈada.|0
nˌimekˈuwa ndˈuɡu wa mbwˈeha, rafˈiki wa mabˈundi.|0
ŋɡˈozi jˈaŋɡu ˌimekˈuwa ɲeˈusi nˈajo ˌinatʃunˈika; mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌinauŋɡˈua kwa hˈoma.|0
kinˈubi tʃˈaŋɡu kˌimeɡeˈuka kˌuwa mˌaombolˈezo, nˈajo filˈimbi jˈaŋɡu ˌimekˈuwa saˈuti ja kilˈio.|0
nˌimefˈaɲa aɡˈano na mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌasimtazˈame msitʃˈana kwa kˌumtamˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa fˈuŋɡu la mwˌanadˈamu ni ɡˈani kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu ɟˈuu, urˈiθi wˌake kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu alˈije ɟˈuu.|0
ɟˈe, si ˌuharibˈifu kwa wˈatu waˈovu, mˌaaŋɡamˈizi kwa wˈale wˌatendˈao mabˈaja.|0
ɟˈe, jˌeje hˌaziˈoni ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na kˌuihesˈabu kˈila hatˈua jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama nˌimeˈiʃi katˌika uˈoŋɡo ˌau m̩ɡˈuu wˈaŋɡu ˌumekˌimbilˈia ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
mˈuŋɡu na ˌanipˈime katˌika mizˈani za ˌuaminˈifu, nˌaje ˌataɟˈua kwˌamba sˈina hatˈia.|0
kˌama hatˈua zˈaŋɡu zˌimepotˈoka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia, kˌama mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeoŋɡˈozwa na mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu, ˌau kˌama mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
bˌasi weŋɡˈine na wˈale nˌilitʃˌokipˈanda, nˈajo jˈale jˈote nˌilijˌootˈeʃa na jˌaŋɡolˈewe.|0
kˌama mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeʃˌawiʃˈiwa na mwanˈamke, ˌau kˌama nˌimevizˈia mlaŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟirˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu na asˈaɡe nafˈaka ja mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine, nˌao wˌanaˈume weŋɡˈine walˈale nˈaje.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌilo lˌiŋɡekˈuwa aˈibu, nˈaam, ðˈambi ja kˌuhukumˈiwa.|0
ni mˈoto ˌuwakˈao kwa ˌuharibˈifu; ˌuŋɡekˈuwa ˌumeŋɡˈoa mavˈuno jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama nˌiŋɡewaɲˈima hˈaki wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˌanaˈume ˌau vˌiɟakˈazi wˈaŋɡu, wˌalipokˈuwa na mˌanuŋɡunˈiko ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa nˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌatakˌaponˌikabˈili? nˌitamɟˈibu nˈini nˌitakˌapoˈitwa kutˈoa hesˈabu.|0
ɟˈe, jˌeje ˌalijˌeniˈumba tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu, si n̩dˈije ˌaliwaˈumba? ɟˈe, si ni jˌeje hˈujo mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌetuˈumba sˈote ndˈani ja mˈama zˈetu.|0
ikˈiwa nˌimewaɲˈima maskˈini hˈaɟa zˈao, ˌau kˌujaˈatʃa mˈatʃo ja waɟˈane jˌaðoofˈike.|0
kˌama nˌimekˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, bˌila kˌuwaʃˌirikˈiʃa jatˈima.|0
lakˈini ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu nˌimemlˈea jatˈima kˌama ambˈavjo bˈaba ˌaŋɡefˈaɲa, nˌami ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈaŋɡu nˌimewˌaoŋɡˈoza waɟˈane.|0
kˌama nˌilimwˈona jejˈote ˌakitesˈeka kwa kukˈosa ŋɡˈuo, ˌau ˈm̩tu mhitˈaɟi asˈije na mavˈazi.|0
ambˈaje wˈala mˈojo wˌake hˌaukˌunibarˈiki kwa kˌumpatˈia ɟˈoto kwa mavˈazi ja maɲˈoja ja kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu.|0
na kˌama nˌimeinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja jatˈima, nˌikiɟˈua kˌuwa nˈina ˌuʃawˈiʃi mˌahakamˈani.|0
bˌasi mkˈono wˈaŋɡu na ˌuɲofˈoke tˌoka beɡˈani mwˈaŋɡu, nˌao na ˌuvuɲɟˈike kutˈoka kˌiuŋɡˈio tʃˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌilioɡˈopa ˌuharibˈifu kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu, nˌami kwa kˌuuoɡˈopa ˌutukˈufu wˌake sˌikuwˈeza kufˈaɲa mˈambo kˌama hˈajo.|0
kˌama nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe ðahˈabu, ˌau kˌuiambˈia ðahˈabu sˈafi, wˌewe ndˈiwe salˈama jˈaŋɡu,.|0
kˌama nˌimefˌurahˈia wˈiŋɡi wa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈaŋɡu, ustˈawi ambˈao mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa ˌimepˈata.|0
kˌama nˌimelˌitazˈama ɟˈua katˌika kuŋɡˈaa kwˈake ˌau mwˈezi ˌukiˈenda kwa fahˈari jˈake.|0
hˈivjo mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kˌuʃawiʃˈiwa kwa sˈiri, ˌau kubˈusu mkˈono wˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuviheʃˈimu.|0
kˌama nˌimeʃˌaŋɡilˈia msˈiba wa adˈui jˈaŋɡu, ˌau kˌutazˈama kwa furˈaha taˈabu ˌilijomɟˈia.|0
lakˈini sˌikuruhˈusu kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kufˈaɲa ðˈambi kwa kuˈomba laˈana ðˈidi ja maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
kˌama wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu kˈamwe hˌawakusˈema, ni nˈani ambˈaje hˌaɟaʃibˈiʃwa na ɲˈama ja ajˈubu?.|0
lakˈini hakˈuna mɡˈeni ˌalijelˈala ɲɟiˈani, kwa maˈana mlˈaŋɡo wˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa wˈazi kwa msafˈiri.|0
kˌama nˌimeˌifunˈika ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu kˌama wˌanadˈamu weŋɡˈine wˌafaɲˈavjo, kwa kufˈitʃa hatˈia jˈaŋɡu mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja kˌuoɡˈopa umˈati wa wˈatu, na hˈivjo kˌuwa na hˈofu ja kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na ɟamˈaa, nˌikaɲamˈaza kˈimja nˌisitˈoke ɲɟˈe ja mlˈaŋɡo.|0
laˈiti kˌama ˌaŋɡekuwˈepo ˈm̩tu wa kˌunisikˈia! tazˈama sˈasa nˌinatˈia sahˈihi kwˈeɲe ˌutetˈezi wˈaŋɡu: mweɲˈezi na ˌaniɟˈibu; mʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu na awˈeke maʃtˈaka jˌake kwˈeɲe mˌaandˈiʃi.|0
hakˈika nˌiŋɡejavˈaa beɡˈani mwˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡejavˈaa kˌama tˈaɟi.|0
niŋɡˈempa hesˈabu ja kˈila hatˈua jˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡemwendˈea kˌama mwˈana wa mfˈalme..|0
kˌama ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu ˌinalˈia ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na mˌiferˈeɟi jˌake jˈote ˌimelowˈana kwa matʃˈozi.|0
kˌama nˌimekˈula mazˈao jˌake bˌila malˌipo, ˌau kuvˈuɲɟa miˈojo ja wˌapaŋɡˈaɟi wˈake.|0
bˌasi miˈiba na iˈote badˈala ja ŋɡˈano, na maɡˈuɡu badˈala ja ʃajˈiri. mwˈiʃo wa manˈeno ja ajˈubu.|0
bˌasi wˈatu hˈawa watˈatu wˌakaˈatʃa kumɟˈibu ajˈubu, kwa kˌuwa ˌalikˈuwa mwˌadilˈifu matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini elˈihu mwˈana wa bˌarakˈeli, wa kabˈila la bˈuzi wa ɟamˈaa ja rˈamu, ˌakamkˌasirikˈia sˈana ajˈubu, kwa sabˈabu ja kˌuɟihˌesabˈia hˈaki mweɲˈewe badˈala ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
pˈia ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia hˈao rafˈiki watˈatu wa ajˈubu, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakuwˈeza kupˈata ɲɟˈia ja kˌuθibitˈiʃa ja kˌuwa hˈajo manˈeno ja ajˈubu hˌajakˈuwa ja kwˈeli, nˌao bˈado wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemlaˈumu.|0
bˌasi elˈihu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesubˈiri kwˈanza wˌaoŋɡˈee na ajˈubu kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri mkˈubwa kumlˈiko jˈeje.|0
lakˈini ˌalipoˈona wˈatu hˈao watˈatu hˌawakˈuwa na kˈitu zaˈidi tʃa kusˈema, hasˈira jˌake ˌikaˈamka.|0
bˌasi elˈihu mwˈana wa bˌarakˈeli wa kabˈila la bˈuzi ˌakasˈema: mˌimi ni mdˈoɡo kwa ˈumri, nˌaɲi ni wazˈee; n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌilioɡˈopa, sˌikuθubˈutu kˌuwaambˈia kˈile nˌinatʃoɟˈua.|0
nˌilifikˈiri, jafˈaa ˈumri usˈeme, nˌao wˈiŋɡi wa miˈaka ˌuŋɡefundˈiʃa hekˈima..|0
lakˈini ni rˈoho ˌilijˈoko ndˈani ja mwˌanadˈamu, pˈumzi ja mweɲˈezi, n̩dˈijo impˈajo jˌeje ˌufahˈamu.|0
sˈio wazˈee pˈeke jˈao walˈio na hekˈima, sˈio wˌeɲe ˈumri mkˈubwa pˈeke jˈao wˌanaˌofahˈamu lilˈilo sˈawa.|0
kwa hˈijo nasˈema: nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi; mˌimi nˌami nˌitawˌaambˈia lˈile nˌinaloɟˈua.|0
nˌiliŋɡoɟˈea mlˌipokˈuwa mnˌaoŋɡˈea, nˌilizˌisikilˈiza hˈoɟa zˈenu; mlˌipokˈuwa mkˌitafˈuta manˈeno ja kusˈema.|0
nˌiliwˌasikilˈiza kwa makˈini. lakˈini hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌalijˌeθibitˈiʃa kwˌamba ajˈubu ˌamekˈosa; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌalijewˈeza kuɟˈibu hˈoɟa zˈake.|0
msisˈeme, tˌumepˈata hekˈima; mˈuŋɡu na ˌamθibitˈiʃe kˌuwa mwˈoŋɡo, wˈala si mwˌanadˈamu..|0
lakˈini ajˈubu hˌaɟajapˈaŋɡa manˈeno jˌake ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, nˌami sˌitamɟˈibu kwa kˌutumˈia hˈoɟa zˈenu.|0
wˌametˈiwa hˈofu na hawˈana la zaˈidi la kusˈema; manˈeno jˌamewˌaiʃˈia.|0
ɟˈe, niŋɡˈoɟe sˈasa kwa sabˈabu wˌamekˈuwa kˈimja, kwa vˈile sˈasa wˌanasimˈama bˌila kˌuwa na la kuɟˈibu.|0
mˌimi nˌami nˌitakˈuwa na la kusˈema; mˌimi nˌami nˌitasˈema lˈile nˌiliɟuˈalo.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌimeɟˈawa na manˈeno, nˈajo rˈoho ˌilijˈomo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu jˌanisukˈuma.|0
ndˈani jˈaŋɡu nˈiko kˌama tʃˈupa ˌilijoɟˈazwa divˈai, kˌama kirˈiba kˈipja tʃa divˈai kilˈitʃo tajˈari kˌupasˈuka.|0
ni lazˈima nisˈeme ˌili niwˈeze kˌutulˈia; ni lazˈima nˌifumbˈue midˈomo jˈaŋɡu nipˈate kuɟˈibu.|0
sˌitampˌendelˈea ˈm̩tu jejˈote, wˈala sˌitaɟˌipendekˈeza kwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa stˈadi wa kˌuɟipˌendekˈeza, muˈumba wˈaŋɡu ˌaŋɡenˌiondolˈea mbˈali kwa upˈesi.|0
lakˈini ajˈubu, sˈasa, sˌikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu; zˌiŋɡatˈia kˈila kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃosˈema.|0
karˈibu nˌitafuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu; manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˈapo katˌika ˈn̩tʃa ja ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu.|0
manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌanatˈoka katˌika mˈojo mɲˈofu; midˈomo jˈaŋɡu hunˈena kwa ˌuaminˈifu jˈale nˌijaɟuˈajo.|0
rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu ˌameniˈumba; pˈumzi ja mweɲˈezi hunˈipa uhˈai.|0
ˌuniɟˈibu bˈasi, kˌama ˌunawˈeza; ɟˌiandˈae kˌunikabˈili mˈimi.|0
mˌimi ni kˌama wˌewe mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu; mˌimi pˈia nˌimetolˈewa kwˈeɲe udˈoŋɡo.|0
hˈuna sabˈabu ja kˌunioɡˈopa, wˈala mkˈono wˈaŋɡu hˌaupˈaswi kˌukulemˈea.|0
lakˈini ˌumesˈema nikˈiwa nˌinakˌusikˈia, nˌami nˌilisikˈia manˈeno jeɲˈewe.|0
mˌimi ni sˈafi na sˈina ðˈambi; mˌimi ni sˈafi na sˈina hatˈia.|0
lakˈini bˈado mˈuŋɡu ˌamepˈata dosˈari kwˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌananiˈona kˌama adˈui jˈake.|0
ˌananifˈuŋɡa miɡˈuu kwa pˈiŋɡu, tˈena ˌanazˌiaŋɡalˈia ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu zˈote kwa karˈibu..|0
lakˈini mˌimi nˌinakˌuambˈia, katˌika ɟˈambo hˈili wˌewe ˈuna makˈosa, kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunamlˌalamikˈia kwˌamba jˌeje hamɟˈibu mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu husˈema, wakˈati hˈuu kwa ɲɟˈia mˈoɟa, ˌau wakˈati mwiŋɡˈine kwa ɲɟˈia ɲiŋɡˈine, iŋɡˈawa mwˌanadˈamu ˌanawˈeza ˌasielˈewe.|0
mˈuŋɡu husˈema na mwˌanadˈamu katˌika ndˈoto, katˌika maˈono ja usˈiku, wakˈati ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito ˌuwaˌaŋɡukiˈapo wˌanadˈamu wˌasinziˈapo vˌitandˈani m̩wˈao.|0
ˌanawˈeza ˌakasemˈea mˌasikiˈoni m̩wˈao, na kˌuwatˈia hˈofu kwa maˈoɲo.|0
ˌili kˌumɡeˈuza ˈm̩tu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kutˈenda mabˈaja na kˌumwepˈuʃa na kibˈuri.|0
kˌuiokˈoa nˈafsi jˌake na ʃˈimo, uhˈai wˌake ˌusiˌaŋɡamˈizwe kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeza kutˈiwa adˈabu kwa mˌaumˈivu kˌitandˈani mwˈake, kwa ðˈiki za mfˌululˈizo katˌika mifˈupa jˈake.|0
kiˈasi kwˌamba maˈiʃa jˌake jeɲˈewe jˌanakatˈaa tʃakˈula nˈajo nˈafsi jˌake ˌikakˌitʃukˈia kabˈisa hˌata tʃakˈula kizˈuri.|0
ɲˈama ja mwˈili wˌake huˈiʃa kwa kukˈonda, nˈajo mifˈupa jˌake ambˈajo mwanzˈoni ˌilikˈuwa ˌimefitʃˈika, sˈasa ˌinatokˈeza ɲɟˈe.|0
nˈafsi jˌake ˌinakˌaribˈia kabˈuri, nˌao uhˈai wˌake karˈibu na waɟˈumbe wa kˈifo.|0
kˌama bˈado kˈuna mˌalaˈika upˈande wˌake kˌama mtetˈezi, mmˈoɟa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈelfu, wa kˌumwambˈia mwˌanadˈamu lilˈilo ɟˈema kwˈake.|0
kˌumwonˈea hurˈuma na kusˈema, mwokˈoe asˈiɟe ˌakatˌumbukˈia ʃimˈoni; nˌimepˈata ˌukombˈozi kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ndˈipo ɲˈama ja mwˈili wˌake hufˈaɲua ˈm̩pja kˌama ja mtˈoto; hˌurudˈiʃwa ˈupja kˌama sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈake.|0
humwˈomba mˈuŋɡu, ˌakapˈata kibˈali kwˈake, hˌuuˈona ˈuso wa mˈuŋɡu na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia kwa furˈaha; mˈuŋɡu hˌumrudˈiʃa katˌika hˈali jˌake ja ˌuadilˈifu.|0
ndˈipo hˈuɟa mbˈele za wˈatu na kusˈema, nˌilitˈenda ðˈambi na kˌupotˈoʃa kˌilitʃokˈuwa hˈaki, lakˈini sˌikuˌaðibˈiwa kˌama nˌilivjˌostahˈili.|0
ˌalinˌikombˈoa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu nˌisitˌumbukˈie ʃimˈoni, nˌami nˌitaˈiʃi ˌili kˌuufˌurahˈia mwˈaŋɡa..|0
mˈuŋɡu hufˈaɲa hˈaja jˈote kwa mwˌanadˈamu; mˈara mbˈili hˌata mˈara tˈatu.|0
ˌili ˌaiɡeˈuze nˈafsi jˌake tˌoka ʃimˈoni, ˌili nˈuru ja uzˈima ˌimwaŋɡazˈie.|0
ajˈubu, zˌiŋɡatˈia, nˌisikilˈize mˈimi; ɲamˈaza, nˌami nˌitanˈena.|0
kˌama unˈalo lolˈote la kusˈema, ˌuniɟˈibu; sˈema, kwa maˈana nˌinatˈaka ˌuonekˈane hˈuna hatˈia.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˈuna la kusˈema, bˌasi nˌisikilˈize mˈimi; ɲamˈaza, nˌami nˌitakˌufundˈiʃa hekˈima.|0
kˈiʃa elˈihu ˌakasˈema.|0
sˌikiˈeni manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima; nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi, nˈiɲi wˈatu wˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa.|0
kwa kˌuwa sikˈio hˌujaɟarˈibu manˈeno kˌama vˈile ulˈimi ˌuoɲɟˈavjo tʃakˈula.|0
tˌuɟitʃˌaɡulˈie weɲˈewe jalˈijo sˈawa, nˌasi tˌuɟifˈunze pamˈoɟa jalˈijo mˈema.|0
ajˈubu ˌanasˈema, mˌimi sˈina hatˈia, lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌameniɲˈima hˈaki jˈaŋɡu.|0
iŋɡˈawa nˈiko sˈawa, nˌinaˌonekˈana mwˈoŋɡo; nˌami iŋɡˈawa sˈina kˈosa, kidˈonda tʃˈaŋɡu hˌakipˈoni..|0
ni ˈm̩tu ɡˈani alˈije kˌama ajˈubu, ˌaɲuˈaje ðarˈau kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
ˌaʃirˌikianˈaje na watˈenda mabˈaja na kˌutʃaŋɡamˈana na wˈatu waˈovu.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌanasˈema, hˌaimfaˈidi mwˌanadˈamu kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌanapˌoɟitahˈidi kˌumpendˈeza mˈuŋɡu..|0
hˈivjo nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi, nˈiɲi wˈatu wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu. kˈamwe mˈuŋɡu hatˈendi uˈovu, mweɲˈezi hafˈaɲi kˈosa.|0
humlˈipa mwˌanadˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja lˈile ˌalilotˈenda; hulˈeta ɟˈuu jˌake kˈile ambˈatʃo matˈendo jˌake jˌanastahˈili.|0
ni ɟˈambo lˌisilowˈeza kˌufikirˈiwa kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌaŋɡefˈaɲa makˈosa, kwˌamba mweɲˈezi ˌaŋɡepotˈoʃa hukˈumu.|0
ɟˈe, ni nˈani ˌalijˌemtawˈaza ɟˌuːja dunˈia? ni nˈani ˌalijemwˈeka kˌuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈizi wa ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote.|0
kˌama lˌilikˈuwa kusˈudi la mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakaˌiondˈoa rˈoho jˌake na pˈumzi jˈake.|0
wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌaŋɡelˌiaŋɡamˈia kwa pamˈoɟa, na ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡerˈudi mˌavumbˈini.|0
kˌama nˈiɲi mnˌaufahˈamu, sˌikiˈeni hˈili; sˌikilizˈeni hˈili nˌisemˈalo.|0
ɟˈe, jˌeje ˌaitʃˌukiˈaje hˈaki awˈeza kˌutawˈala? ɟˈe, ˌutamhukˈumu mwˌeɲe hˈaki, alˈije na ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ɟˈe, si ni jˌeje ˌawaˌambiˈaje wafˈalme, nˈiɲi hamfˈai kˈitu, nˌao wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri, nˈiɲi ni waˈovu,.|0
jˌeje ˌasijˌependelˈea wakˈuu, wˈala hˌaoɲˈeʃi ˌupendelˈeo kwa mˌataɟˈiri kulˈiko maskˈini, kwa kˌuwa wˈote ni kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈake.|0
wˌanakˈufa ɣafˈula, usˈiku wa manˈane; wˈatu wˌanatikˈiswa nˌao hupˈita; wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu hˌuondolˈewa bˌila mkˈono wa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
mˈatʃo jˌake jˌanazˌitazˈama ɲɟˈia za wˌanadˈamu; ˌanaˈona kˈila hatˈua jˈao.|0
hakˈuna mahˈali pˈeɲe ɡˈiza nˈene, wˈala uvˈuli mkˈubwa, ambˈapo watˈenda mabˈaja wˌanawˈeza kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
mˈuŋɡu hˈana hˈaɟa ja kˌumtʃuŋɡˈuza ˈm̩tu sˈana, ˌili apˈate kˈuɟa mbˈele zˌake kwa hukˈumu.|0
bˌila kˌuulˈiza hˌuwapˌondapˈonda wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi na kˌuwawˈeka weŋɡˈine mahˈali pˈao.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌujaˌaŋɡalˈia matˈendo jˈao jˈote, hˌuwaondˈoa usˈiku, nˌao wˌakaˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
ˌanawˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wˌao mahˈali ambˈapo kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatawˈeza kˌuwaˈona.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌameˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata mˈuŋɡu, nˌao hˌawakˌuiheʃˈimu ɲɟˈia jˌake hˌata mˈoɟa.|0
wˌamesˌababˈiʃa kilˈio tʃa maskˈini kifˈike mbˈele zˈake, hˈivjo ˌakasikˈia kilˈio tʃa wˌahitˈaɟi.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌakiɲamˈaza kˈimja, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumhukˈumu? kˌama ˌakiufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈake, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumwˈona? ikˈiwa ni taˈifa ˌau ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa, kwˈake ni sˈawa.|0
ˌili kˌumzuˈia ˈm̩tu mwˈovu kˌutawˈala, ˌau wˈale ambˈao hˌuwateɡˈea wˈatu mitˈeɡo.|0
kˌama mwˌanadˈamu ˌakimwambˈia mˈuŋɡu, nˌimekˈosa lakˈini sˌitatˈenda ðˈambi tˈena.|0
nˌifundˈiʃe nˌisitʃowˈeza kuˈona; kˌama nˌimekˌukosˈea, sˌitafˈaɲa hˈivjo tˈena..|0
ɟˈe bˈasi, mˈuŋɡu ˌatakulˈipa kwa maʃˈarti jˈako, wakˈati wˌewe ˌumekatˈaa kutˈubu? jˌakupˈasa wˌewe ˌuamˈue, wˈala si mˈimi; sˈasa nˌiambˈie lˈile ˌuliɟuˈalo.|0
wˌanadˈamu wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu husˈema, wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌanaˌonisikˈia hˌuniambˈia.|0
ajˈubu hˌuoŋɡˈea bˌila mˌaarˈifa; manˈeno jˌake hajˈana busˈara..|0
laˈiti ajˈubu ˌaŋɡeɟˌaribˈiwa hˌadi kikˈomo tʃa mwˈiʃo, kwa sabˈabu ˌanaɟˈibu kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˈovu.|0
kwˈeɲe ðˈambi jˌake hˌuoŋɡˈeza uˈasi; kwa ðarˈau hupˈiɡa makˈofi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu, na kˌuzidˈiʃa manˈeno jˌake ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo elˈihu ˌakasˈema.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunaðˈani hˈili ni hˈaki? wˌewe ˌunasˈema, nˈina hˈaki mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu..|0
bˈado ˌunamˌuulˈiza, ni faˈida ɡˈani nˌimepˈata, na ˌimenˌifaˈidi nˈini kwa kˌutokutˈenda ðˈambi?.|0
nˌiŋɡepˈenda nˌikuɟˈibu wˌewe pamˈoɟa na mˌarafˈiki zˈako walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
tazˈama ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni ˌukaˈone; jˌaaŋɡalˈie mawˈiŋɡu jalˈijo ɟˈuu sˈana ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, ˌukitˈenda ðˈambi, ˌinamðurˈuɟe mˈuŋɡu? kˌama ðˈambi zˈako zikˈiwa ɲˈiŋɡi, hˌilo lˌinamfaɲˈia nˈini mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˌama wˌewe ni mwˌadilˈifu, unˈampa nˈini, ˌau jˌeje ˌanapokˈea nˈini mkonˈoni kwˈako.|0
uˈovu wˈako ˌunamðˈuru tu ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine kˌama wˈewe, nˈajo hˈaki jˈako ˌinawafˈaa wˌanadˈamu tˈu.|0
wˌanadˈamu hulˈia kwa kˌulemˈewa na matˈeso; huˈomba msaˈada kutˈoka mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
lakˈini hakˈuna ˌasemˈaje, jˈuko wˈapi mˈuŋɡu muˈumba wˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ˌanifaɲˈaje niˈimbe usˈiku.|0
