jˌeje ˌatufˌundiʃˈaje sˌisi zaˈidi kulˈiko waɲˈama wa dunˈia, na kˌutufˈaɲa wˌeɲe hekˈima kulˈiko ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani?.|0
jˌeje haɟˈibu wakˈati wˈatu wˌaliˈapo kwa sabˈabu ja kibˈuri tʃa wˈatu waˈovu.|0
nˈaam, mˈuŋɡu hˌasikilˈizi maˈombi jˈao ja ˌubatˈili; mweɲˈezi hˌajazˌiŋɡatˈii.|0
si zaˈidi sˈana kwˌamba hˌatakˌusikilˈiza wˌewe ˌusemˈapo humwˈoni, tˈena ja kwˌamba ʃaˈuri lˈako lˈiko mbˈele zˌake na wˌewe lazˈima ˌumŋɡoɟˈee.|0
pˈia zaˈidi, kwˌamba hasˈira jˌake kˈamwe hˌaiaðˈibu wˈala hˌaaŋɡalˈii uˈovu hˌata kidˈoɡo.|0
hˈivjo ajˈubu hˌufumbˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake kwa manˈeno jasˈijo na maˈana; ˌanaoŋɡˈea manˈeno mˈeŋɡi bˌila mˌaarˈifa.|0
elˈihu ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema.|0
nˌivumilˈie kidˈoɡo zaˈidi nˌami nˌitakˌuoɲˈeʃa kwˌamba jˈako mˈeŋɡi zaˈidi ja kusˈemwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌinajapˈata mˌaarˈifa jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mbˈali, nˌami nˌitamhˌesabˈia hˈaki muˈumba wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈuwe na hakˈika kwˌamba manˈeno jˈaŋɡu si ja uˈoŋɡo; mmˈoɟa alˈije mkˌamilˈifu katˌika mˌaarˈifa jˈuko pamˈoɟa na wˈewe.|0
mˈuŋɡu ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, lakˈini hˌamðarˈau mwˌanadˈamu; ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, nˌaje ni θabˈiti katˌika ʃaˈuri lˈake.|0
hˌawaˈatʃi waˈovu wˌaendelˈee kuˈiʃi, bˌali huwˈapa wˌaliotˈeswa hˈaki jˈao.|0
jˌeje hˌaondˈoi mˈatʃo jˌake kwa wˌeɲe hˈaki; hˌuwaketˈiʃa pˈeɲe vˈiti vja ˈenzi pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme na kˌuwatukˈuza milˈele.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa wˈatu wˌamefˈuŋɡwa kwˈeɲe mˌiɲorˈoro, wakˈiwa wˌameʃˌikilˈiwa na kˈamba za matˈeso.|0
hˌuwaoɲˈeʃa jˈale wˌalijˌojatˈenda, kwˌamba wˌametˈenda ðˈambi kwa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
hˌuwafˈaɲa wˌao kˌusikˈia maˈoɲo, na hˌuwaaɡˈiza kutˈubu uˈovu wˈao.|0
kˌama wˌakitˈii na kˌumtumikˈia, wˌataˈiʃi sˈiku zˈao zˌilizobˈaki katˌika mˌafanikˈio, na miˈaka jˈao katˌika ˌutoʃelˈevu.|0
lakˈini wˌasipˌosikilˈiza, wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌatakˈufa pasˈipo mˌaarˈifa.|0
wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu mojˈoni m̩wˈao hufˈitʃa tʃˈuki; hˌata ˌanapˌowafˈuŋɡa, hˌawamwˈombi msaˈada.|0
wˌanakˈufa waŋɡˈali viɟˈana, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanaˈume hanˈiθi wa mahˈali pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu.|0
bˌali wˌao wˌanaˌotesˈeka hˌuwaokˈoa katˌika matˈeso jˈao, na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌao katˌika ðˈiki zˈao.|0
jˌeje ˌanakˌubembelˈeza utˈoke katˌika matˈaja ja ðˈiki, ˌili kˌukuwˈeka mahˈali palˈipo na nafˈasi mbˈali na kˌizuˈizi, hˌadi kwˈeɲe mˈeza jˈako ja farˈaɟa ˌilijoɟˈaa vjakˈula vizˈuri.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ˌumelemˈewa na hukˈumu kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu; hukˈumu na hˈaki vˌimekˌukamˈata.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako hˌata ŋɡˈuvu zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi vˌinawˈeza kˌukusˌaidˈia ˌusiiŋɡˈie kwˈeɲe ðˈiki.|0
ˌusiˌutamˈani usˈiku ˈuɟe, ˌili ˌuwaburˈute wˈatu mbˈali na ɲˈumba zˈao.|0
ɟˌihaðˈari ˌusiɡˌeukˈie uˈovu, ambˈao ˌunaupˈenda zaˈidi kulˈiko matˈeso.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌametukˈuzwa katˌika ŋɡˈuvu zˈake. ni nˈani alˈije mwalˈimu kˌama jˈeje.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌemwelekˈeza katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, ˌau kˌumwambˈia, wˌewe ˌumetˈenda jasˈijo sˈawa.|0
kumbˈuka kˌuzitukˈuza kˈazi zˈake, ambˈazo wˈatu wˌamezisˈifu katˌika wˈimbo.|0
wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌameiˈona; wˈatu wˌanaˌikazˈia mˈatʃo kwa mbˈali.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˈuŋɡu alˈivjo m̩kˈuu, kupˈita ˌufahˈamu wˈetu! hesˈabu ja miˈaka jˌake hˌaitˌafutˈiki.|0
jˌeje huvˈuta ɟˈuu matˈone ja mˈaɟi, ˌajatʃuɟˈajo kˌama mvˈua kutˈoka kwˈeɲe viɟˈito.|0
mawˈiŋɡu hˌuaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini mˈaɟi jˈake, nˈajo mvˈua ɲˈiŋɡi hˌuwaɲeʃˈea wˌanadˈamu.|0
ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje ɟˈinsi ˌajatˌandazˈavjo mawˈiŋɡu, ɟˈinsi ˌaŋɡurumˈavjo kutˈoka hemˈani mwˈake.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌanavjˌotandˈaza umˈeme wa rˈadi kˌumzuŋɡˈuka, nˌaje hˌuvifunˈika vilˈindi vja bahˈari.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌatawalˈavjo mˌataˈifa, na kuwˈapa tʃakˈula kwa wˈiŋɡi.|0
hˌuuɟˈaza mkˈono wˌake kwa umˈeme wa rˈadi, na kˌuuaɡˈiza kulˈeŋɡa ʃabˈaha jˈake.|0
ŋɡurˈumo zˌake hˌutaŋɡˈaza ðorˈuba ˌinajokˈuɟa; hˌata mifˈuɡo hˌuɟulˈiʃa kˌukaribˈia kwˈake.|0
kwa hˈili mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunatˌetemˈeka, nˌao ˌunarˈuka kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake.|0
sˌikilˈiza! sˌikilˈiza ŋɡurˈumo ja saˈuti jˈake, saˈuti ja ŋɡurˈumo ˌitokˈajo kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake.|0
hˌuuˌatʃilˈia umˈeme wˌake wa rˈadi tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu jˈote na kˌuupelˈeka hˌata miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo hˈuɟa saˈuti ja ŋɡurˈumo jˈake; mˈuŋɡu hˌuŋɡurˈuma kwa saˈuti jˌake ja fahˈari. wakˈati saˈuti jˌake ˌiŋɡurumˈapo tˈena, hˌuuˌatʃilˈia umˈeme wˌake wa rˈadi.|0
hˌuiambˈia θelˈuɟi, aŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja dunˈia, nˈajo maɲˈuɲu ja mvˈua, ˈuwe mvˈua ja ŋɡˈuvu..|0
ˌili wˌanadˈamu wˈote ˌaliˌowaˈumba wapˈate kuɟˈua kˈazi zˈake, jˌeje hˌumzuilˈia kˈila ˈm̩tu ʃuɣˈuli zˈake.|0
waɲˈama hˌuɟifˈitʃa; hˌubakˈia kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo jˈao.|0
ðorˈuba hutˈoka katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈake, barˈidi hutˈoka katˌika upˈepo ˌuendˈao kˈasi.|0
pˈumzi ja mˈuŋɡu hutˈoa barˈafu, enˈeo kˈubwa la mˈaɟi huɡˈanda.|0
hˌujaʃˌehenˈeza mawˈiŋɡu kwa mˈaɟi, nˌaje hˌusambˈaza umˈeme wˌake wa rˈadi kˌupitˈia hˈajo.|0
nˈajo mawˈiŋɡu hˌuzuŋɡˌukazuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote kwa ˈamri jˈake, ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia jˈote, kufˈaɲa lolˈote ˌajaˌamurˈujo.|0
hulˈeta mawˈiŋɡu ˌili kˌuaðˈibu wˌanadˈamu, ˌau kˌuiɲeʃˈea dunˈia jˌake na kˌuoɲˈeʃa upˈendo wˈake.|0
ajˈubu, sˌikilˈiza hˈili; ɲamˈaza na ˌujafikˈiri mˌaaɟˈabu ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua ɟˈinsi mˈuŋɡu ˌanavjˌojaoŋɡˈoza mawˈiŋɡu, na kufˈaɲa umˈeme wˌake wa rˈadi utˈoe mwˈaŋɡa.|0
ɟˈe, waɟˈua ɟˈinsi mawˈiŋɡu jˌanavjokˈaa jakˈiwa jˌametulˈia, hˈajo mˌaaɟˈabu jˌake jˌeje alˈije mkˌamilˈifu katˌika mˌaarˈifa.|0
wˌewe ˌunajeʃˈindwa na ɟˈoto katˌika ŋɡˈuo zˈako wakˈati ˈn̩tʃi ˌimeɲˌamazˈiʃwa kˈimja bˌila upˈepo wa kusˈini.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌuuŋɡˈana nˌaje katˌika kˌuzitandˈaza ˈaŋɡa, zilˈizo ŋɡˈumu kˌama kiˈoo tʃa ʃˈaba ja kˌujejˈuʃwa.|0
tˌuambiˈeni jˌatupasˈajo kˌumwambˈia; hˌatuwˈezi kˌutajarˈiʃa ʃaˈuri lˈetu kwa sabˈabu ja uɟˈiŋɡa wˈetu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌaambˈiwe kwˌamba natˈaka kˌuoŋɡˈea? ɟˈe, jˈuko ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌaŋɡeˈomba kumˈezwa.|0
bˌasi hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌulitazˈama ɟˈua, ɟˈinsi lˌinavjoŋɡˈaa aŋɡˈani, upˈepo ˌukiʃˌafaɡˈia mawˈiŋɡu.|0
kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini jˌeje hˈuɟa na fahˈari kˈuu; mˈuŋɡu hˈuɟa katˌika ˌutukˈufu wa kutˈiʃa.|0
jˌeje mweɲˈezi hˌatuwˈezi kˌumfikˈia, nˌaje ˌametukˈuzwa katˌika uwˈeza; katˌika hukˈumu zˌake na hˈaki jˌake kˈuu, hˌataonˈea.|0
kwa hˈijo, wˌanadˈamu mhˌeʃimˈuni, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje hamstˈahi jejˈote ˌanajˌeɟiðanˈia kˌuwa ˈana hekˈima.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu ajˈubu kutˈoka upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli. ˌakasˈema.|0
nˈani hˈuju ˌatiˈaje mˌaʃaˈuri jˈaŋɡu ɡˈiza kwa manˈeno jasˈijo na mˌaarˈifa.|0
ɟikˈaze kˌama mwˌanaˈume; nˌitakˌuulˈiza swˈali, nˌawe ˌuniɟˈibu.|0
ˌulikˈuwa wˈapi nˌilipowˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia? nˌiambˈie, kˌama ˌunafahˈamu.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijewˈeka alˈama vipˈimo vjˈake? hakˈika wˌewe ˌunaɟˈua! ni nˈani ˌalijˌeɲoˈoʃa kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, misˈiŋɡi jˌake ˌiliwˈekwa ɟˌuːja nˈini, ˌau ni nˈani ˌalijewˈeka ɟˈiwe la pembˈeni.|0
wakˈati ɲˈota za ˌasubˈuhi zˌilipoˈimba pamˈoɟa, na mˌalaˈika wˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌeifuŋɡˈia bahˈari milˈaŋɡo ˌilipˌopasˈuka kutˈoka tˈumbo.|0
nˌilipˌojafˈaɲa mawˈiŋɡu kˌuwa vˈazi lˈake, na kˌujafuŋɡˈia katˌika ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
nˌilipˌoamˈuru mipˈaka jˈake, na kˌuiwˈeka milˈaŋɡo jˌake na mˌakomˈeo mahˈali pˈake.|0
nˌiliposˈema, ˌunawˈeza kufˈika mpˈaka hˈapa wˈala si zaˈidi; hˈapa ndˈipo mawˈimbi jˈako jˌeɲe kibˈuri jˌatakˌapokomˈea.|0
ˌumepˈata kˌuiamrˈiʃa ˌasubˈuhi ˌipambazˈuke, ˌau kˌujaoɲˈeʃa mˌapambazˈuko mahˈali pˈake.|0
japˈate kuʃˈika miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, na kˌuwakuŋɡˈuta waˈovu wˌaliˈomo.|0
dunˈia hˌubadilˈika kˌama udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi tʃˈini ja lakˈiri; sˈura jˌake hukˈaa kˌama ˈile ja vˈazi.|0
waˈovu hˌuzuilˈiwa nˈuru jˈao, nˌao mkˈono wˌao ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa huvˈuɲɟua.|0
ɟˈe, ˌumepˈata kufˈika kwˈeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi za bahˈari? ˌau kˌutembˈea mahˈali pa ndˈani pa vilˈindi.|0
ˌumewˈahi kˌuoɲˈeʃwa malˈaŋɡo ja maˈuti? ˌumewˈahi kˌuiˈona milˈaŋɡo ja uvˈuli wa maˈuti.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌunafahˈamu ukˈubwa wa dunˈia? nˌiambˈie kˌama ˌunaɟˈua hˈaja jˈote.|0
ɲɟˈia ja kufˈika kwˈeɲe makˈao ja nˈuru ni ˈipi? nˈako maskˈani ˌm̩wa ɡˈiza ni wˈapi.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunawˈeza kˌuvirudˈiʃa kwˈeɲe makˈao jˈake? ˌunaɟˈua ɲɟˈia za kufˈika maskˈani mwˈake.|0
hakˈika ˌunaɟˈua, kwa kˌuwa ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeʃˌazalˈiwa! kwˈani ˌumeˈiʃi miˈaka mˈiŋɡi.|0
ɟˈe, ˌumeʃawˈahi kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ɣˈala za θelˈuɟi, ˌau kuˈona ɣˈala za mvˈua ja mˈawe.|0
ambˈazo nˌimeziwˈeka akˈiba kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈati wa taˈabu, na kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈati wa vˈita na mˌapiɡˈano.|0
ni ˈipi ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo mahˈali umˈeme wa rˈadi ˌunapˌotawaɲˈiwa, ˌau mahˈali upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌunapˌosambazˈiwa ɟˌuːja dunˈia.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌepasˈua mˌiferˈeɟi kwa aɟˈili ja mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi ja mvˈua jˌaendˈajo kˈasi na ɲɟˈia ja umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
ˌili kˌusababˈiʃa mvˈua kˌuɲeʃˈea mahˈali pˌasipˌokalˈiwa na ˈm̩tu, ɟˈaŋɡwa lisˈilo na jejˈote ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌili kˌuitˌoʃelˈeza ˈn̩tʃi ja ukˈiwa na ɟˈaŋɡwa, na maɟˈani jaˈanze kumˈea ndˈani jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, mvˈua ˈina bˈaba? ni nˈani bˈaba ˌazaˈaje matˈone ja umˈande.|0
wakˈati mˈaɟi jawˈapo maɡˈumu kˌama ɟˈiwe, wakˈati ˈuso wa vilˈindi vja mˈaɟi ˌunapoɡˈanda.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌuufˈuŋɡa mɲorˈoro wa kˌilimˈia? wawˈeza kˌuleɡˈeza kˈamba za ˌoriˈoni.|0
wawˈeza kˌujaoŋɡˈoza makˈundi ja ɲˈota kwa maɟˈira jˈake, ˌau kˌuoŋɡˈoza dˈubu na watˈoto wˈake.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua ʃerˈia zˌinazˌotawˈala mbˈiŋɡu? wawˈeza kuwˈeka ˌutawˈala wa mˈuŋɡu dˌuniˈani.|0
wawˈeza kˌuiinˈua saˈuti jˈako mpˈaka mˌawiŋɡˈuni, na kˌuɟifunˈika mweɲˈewe na ɣarˈika ja mˈaɟi.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hutˈuma umˈeme wa rˈadi kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia zˈake? ɟˈe, hutˈoa tˌaarˈifa kwˈako kˌukuambˈia, sˌisi tˈuko hˈapa.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌeuɟalˈia mˈojo hekˈima ˌau kuzˈipa akˈili ˌufahˈamu.|0
nˈani mwˌeɲe hekˈima ja kˌujahesˈabu mawˈiŋɡu? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuinamˈiʃa mˌaɡudulˈia ja mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
wakˈati mavˈumbi jawˈapo maɡˈumu, na mabˈoŋɡe ja udˈoŋɡo kˌuʃikamˈana pamˈoɟa.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutamwindˈia sˈimba ɟˈike mawˈindo, na kˌuwaʃibˈiʃa sˈimba wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa.|0
wakˈati wˌao wˌameɟˌikuɲˈata mˌapaŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, ˌau wˌakivizˈia kˌitʃakˈani.|0
ni nˈani ampˈaje kuŋɡˈuru tʃakˈula wakˈati makˈinda jˌake jˌanamlilˈia mˈuŋɡu, jˌakizˌuŋɡukˌazuŋɡˈuka kwa aɟˈili ja kukˈosa tʃakˈula.|0
ɟˈe, waɟˈua ni wakˈati ɡˈani mbˈuzi wa mlimˈani wˌanapozˈaa? ɟˈe, wˌatambˈua ni wakˈati ɡˈani kulˈuŋɡu ɟˈike ˌazaˈapo mtˈoto wˈake.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌuhesˈabu miˈezi hˌadi wˌazaˈapo? ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua maɟˈira jˈao ja kuzˈaa.|0
wˌao hˌuɟiˌinamˈiʃa na kuzˈaa watˈoto wˈao; utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa ˌunakˈoma.|0
watˈoto wˌao hustˈawi na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka ŋɡˈuvu ɲikˈani; huˈenda zˈao wˈala hˌawarˈudi tˈena.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌemwatʃˈia pˌundamwˈitu ˈawe hˈuru? ni nˈani ˌalijˌezifuŋɡˈua kˈamba zˈake.|0
nimˈempa ˈn̩tʃi ˌisijˌokalˈiwa na wˈatu kˌuwa mˌasikˈani jˈake, ˈn̩tʃi ja tʃˈumvi kˌuwa makˈao jˈake.|0
hˌuzitʃˈeka ɣasˈia za ˈm̩ɟi, wˈala hˌasikˈii kelˈele za mwendˈeʃa ɡˈari.|0
hˌuzuŋɡˈuka vˌilimˈani kwa aɟˈili ja malˈiʃo na kˌutafˈuta kˈila kˈitu kibˈitʃi.|0
ɟˈe, ɲˈati ˌatakubˈali kˌukutˌumikˈia? ˌatakˈaa karˈibu na hˈori lˈako usˈiku.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌumfuŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe matˈuta kwa kˈamba? ɟˈe, ˌatalˈima mabˈonde ɲˈuma jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutamtˌumainˈia kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡˈuvu zˌake ɲˈiŋɡi? ˌutamwatʃˈia jˌeje kˈazi zˈako nzˈito.|0
ˌutawˈeza kˌumwamˈini ˌakuletˈee nafˈaka jˈako ɲumbˈani kutˈoka ʃambˈani na kˌuikusˈaɲa kwˈeɲe sakˈafu jˈako ja kˌupurˈia.|0
mbˈuni hˌupiɡapˈiɡa mabˈawa jˌake kwa furˈaha, lakˈini hˌajawˈezi kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa na mabˈawa na maɲˈoja ja korˈoŋɡo.|0
hˌujatˈaɡa majˈai jˌake ɟˌuːja ˈarði, na kˌujaˈatʃa japˈate ɟˈoto mtʃaŋɡˈani.|0
bˌila kuɟˈali kˌuwa m̩ɡˈuu wawˈeza kˌujapˈonda, kwˌamba baˈaði ja waɲˈama wa porˈini wˌanawˈeza kˌujakaɲˈaɡa.|0
jˌeje hˌujafaɲˈia makˈinda jˌake ˌukatˈili kˌama vˈile si jˈake; haɟˈali kwˌamba taˈabu jˌake ˌinawˈeza ikˈawa bˈure.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu hˌakumɟalˈia hekˈima, wˈala hakˈumpa fˈuŋɡu la akˈili ɲɟˈema.|0
lakˈini ˌakuɲɟuˈapo mabˈawa jˌake kˌukimbˈia, humtʃˈeka farˈasi pamˈoɟa na jˌeje ˌalijempˈanda.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˈumpa farˈasi ŋɡˈuvu ˌau kˌuivˈika ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake maɲˈoja marˈefu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe humfˈaɲa farˈasi arˈuke kˌama nzˈiɡe, ˌakistˌaaɟabˈiʃa kwa tiʃˈio la m̩lˈio wˌake wa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
hˌuparapˈara bˌila wˈoɡa, ˌakizˌifurahˈia ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, husˈoŋɡa mbˈele kˌukabˌiliˈana na silˈaha.|0
hˌuitʃˈeka hˈofu, hˌaoɡˈopi tʃotʃˈote, wˈala hˌaukimbˈii upˈaŋɡa.|0
pˈodo hutˈoa saˈuti kˈando jˈake, pamˈoɟa na mkˈuki ˌunaoŋɡˈaa na fˈumo.|0
bˌila wˈoɡa na kwa ɣaðˈabu hˌuimˈeza ˈn̩tʃi, wˈala tˌarumbˈeta ˌiliˈapo jˌeje hawˈezi kˌusimˈama.|0
ˌasikiˈapo saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu jˌeje hulˈia, ˈaha! hunˈusa harˈufu ja vˈita tˌoka mbˈali, saˈuti ja m̩tˈoa ˈamri na ˌukelˈele wa vˈita.|0
ɟˈe, mwˈewe hurˈuka kwa hekˈima jˈako na kˌujakuɲɟˈua mabˈawa jˌake kˌuelekˈea kusˈini.|0
ɟˈe, tˈai hupˈaa ɟˈuu kwa ˈamri jˈako na kuɟˈeŋɡa kiˈota tʃˈake mahˈali pa ɟˈuu.|0
huˈiʃi ɟˌuːja miˈamba mirˈefu na kukˈaa hˌuko usˈiku; mˌaɟabˈali jˌeɲe ˈn̩tʃa kˈali n̩dˈijo ŋɡˈome jˈake.|0
kutˈoka hˌuko hˌutafˈuta tʃakˈula tʃˈake; mˈatʃo jˌake hˌukiˈona kutˈoka mbˈali.|0
makˈinda jˌake hˌuɟilˈiʃa dˈamu, na pˈale palˈipo na matʃˈiɲɟo, ndˈipo jˌeje alˈipo.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ajˈubu.|0
ɟˈe, mwˌeɲe kˌuʃindˈana na mweɲˈezi awˈeza kˌumsahihˈiʃa? mwˌeɲe kˌumlaˈumu mˈuŋɡu na aɟˈibu.|0
mˌimi sˌistahˈili kabˈisa: nˌinawezˈaɟe kˌukuɟˈibu wˈewe? nˌauwˈeka mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimesˈema mˈara mˈoɟa, lakˈini sˈina ɟˈibu; nˈaam, nˌimesˈema mˈara mbˈili, lakˈini sˌitasˈema tˈena.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakasˈema na ajˈubu kutˈoka upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli.|0
ɟikˈaze kˌama mwˌanaˈume; nˌitakˌuulˈiza maswˈali, nˌawe jˌakupˈasa ˌuniɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutabˌatilˈiʃa hukˈumu jˈaŋɡu? ˌutanˌilaˈumu mˌimi ˌili kˌuɟihˌesabˈia hˈaki mweɲˈewe.|0
ɟˈe, ˈuna mkˈono kˌama wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌawe wawˈeza kutˈoa saˈuti ja ŋɡurˈumo kˌama jˈake.|0
bˌasi ɟivˈike mweɲˈewe ˌutukˈufu na fahˈari, nˌawe uvˈae heʃˈima na ˈenzi.|0
fˌuŋɡulˈia ukˈali wa ɣaðˈabu jˈako, mtafˈute kˈila mwˌeɲe kibˈuri umʃˈuʃe.|0
mwˌaŋɡalˈie kˈila ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kibˈuri na ˌumɲeɲekˈeze, wapˈonde waˈovu mahˈali wˌasimamˈapo.|0
wazˈike wˈote mˌavumbˈini pamˈoɟa; wafˈuŋɡe ɲˈuso zˈao kˌaburˈini.|0
ndˈipo mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakˌukubalˈia kˌuwa mkˈono wˈako mweɲˈewe wa kuˈume ˌunawˈeza kˌukuokˈoa.|0
tazˈama bˌasi ŋɡˈuvu alˈizo nˈazo kwˈeɲe viˈuno vjˈake, uwˈezo alˈio nˌao kwˈeɲe misˈuli ja tˈumbo lˈake.|0
m̩kˈia wˌake hˌutikisˈika kˌama mwerˈezi; miʃˈipa ja mapˈaɟa jˌake ˌimesˈukwa pamˈoɟa.|0
mifˈupa jˌake ni bˈomba za ʃˈaba, maˈuŋɡo jˌake ni kˌama fˈito za tʃˈuma.|0
jˌeje ni wa kwˈanza mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈazi za mˈuŋɡu, lakˈini muˈumba wˌake ˌanawˈeza kˌumsoɡelˈea kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈake.|0
vilˈima hˌumletˈea jˌeje mazˈao jˈake, nˌao waɲˈama wˈote wa porˈini hutʃˈeza karˈibu nˈaje.|0
hulˈala tʃˈini ja mimˈea ja jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi, katˌika mafˈitʃo ja matˈete kwˈeɲe matˈope.|0
hˈijo mimˈea ja jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi humfˈitʃa kwˈeɲe vivˈuli vjˈake; mˈiti mirˈefu karˈibu na kiɟˈito hˌumzuŋɡˈuka.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩to ˌufurikˈapo, jˌeje hapˈati mʃtˈuko wa hˈofu; jˌeje ju salˈama, hˌata kˌama jordˈani ˌiŋɡefurˈika hˌadi kwˈeɲe kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanawˈeza kˌumkamˈata jˌeje akˈiwa mˈatʃo, ˌau kumnˈasa kwa mtˈeɡo na kˌutobˈoa pˈua jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kumvˈua lˌewiaθˈani kwa ndoˈano ja samˈaki, ˌau kufˈuŋɡa ulˈimi wˌake kwa kˈamba.|0
wawˈeza kˌupitˈiʃa kˈamba puˈani mwˈake, ˌau kˌutobˈoa tˈaja lˈake kwa kulˈabu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌataˌendelˈea kˌukuˈomba ˌumhurumˈie? ˌatasˈema nˌawe manˈeno ja upˈole.|0
ɟˈe, ˌatafˈaɲa aɡˈano nˌawe ˌili umtwˈae ˈawe mtumˈiʃi wˈako maˈiʃa jˌake jˈote.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutamfˈuɡa na kumfˈaɲa rafˈiki kˌama ndˈeɡe, ˌau kumfˈuŋɡa kˈamba kwa aɟˈili ja wˌasitʃˈana wˈako.|0
ɟˈe, wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˌatabˌadiliʃˈana biðˈaa kwa aɟˈili jˈake? wˌatamɡawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafaɲˈao bˌiaʃˈara.|0
ɟˈe, wawˈeza kˌuiɟˈaza ŋɡˈozi jˌake kwa vjˈuma vjˌeɲe ˈn̩tʃa kˈali, ˌau kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kwa mkˈuki wa kˌuvulˈia samˈaki.|0
kˌama ˌukiwˈeka mkˈono wˈako ɟˈuu jˈake, ˌutavˌikumbˈuka hˈivjo vˈita na kˈamwe hˌutarudˈia tˈena.|0
tˌumaˈini lolˈote la kˌumtiˈiʃa ni kˌuɟidaŋɡˈaɲa; kˈule kumwˈona tu kˌunamwaŋɡˈuʃa ˈm̩tu tʃˈini.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote alˈije mkˈali ˌaθubutˈuje kˌumtʃokˈoza. ni nˈani bˌasi ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ni nˈani mwˌeɲe madˈai ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu ˌili nipˈate kumlˈipa? kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌitaʃˈindwa kunˈena ɟˌuːja maˈuŋɡo jˈake, ŋɡˈuvu zˌake na ˈumbo lˈake zˈuri.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumvˈua ɡˈamba lˈake la ɲɟˈe? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumsoɡelˈea na liɟˈamu.|0
nˈani ˌaθubutˈuje kˌuufuŋɡˈua mlˈaŋɡo wa kˈiɲua tʃˈake, kˌilitʃˌozuŋɡˈukwa na mˈeno jˌake ja kutˈiʃa pˈande zˈote.|0
mɡˈoŋɡo wˌake ˈuna sˈafu za ŋɡˈao zˌilizˌoʃikˌamanˈiʃwa imˈara pamˈoɟa.|0
kˈila mˈoɟa ˈiko karˈibu sˈana na mwenzˈake, wˈala hakˈuna hˈewa ˌiwezˈajo kupˈita kˈati jˈake.|0
zˌimeˌuŋɡanˈiʃwa imˈara kˈila mˈoɟa na ɲiŋɡˈine; zˌimeŋɡˌaŋɡaniˈana pamˈoɟa wˈala hˌaziwˈezi kˌuteŋɡanˈiʃwa.|0
ˌakipˈiɡa tʃˈafja mwˈaŋɡa hˌumetamˈeta; mˈatʃo jˌake ni kˌama miˈonzi ja mˌapambazˈuko.|0
miˈeŋɡe ˌiwakˈajo hˌumiminˈika kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake; tʃˈetʃe za mˈoto hurˈuka ɲɟˈe.|0
mˈoʃi hufˈuka kutˈoka puˈani mwˈake, kˌama kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu kˌinatʃˌotokˈota kwa mˈoto wa matˈete.|0
pˈumzi jˌake huwˈaʃa makˈaa ja mˈawe, nˈajo miˈali ja mˈoto hurˈuka kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake.|0
ŋɡˈuvu hukˈaa katˌika ʃˈiŋɡo jˈake; utˈiʃo hˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈake.|0
mikˈuɲɟo ja ɲˈama jˌake ˌimeʃˌikamˈana imˈara pamˈoɟa; ˈiko imˈara na hˌaiwˈezi kˌuondolˈewa.|0
kifˈua tʃˈake ni kiɡˈumu kˌama mwˈamba, kiɡˈumu kˌama ɟˈiwe la tʃˈini la kˌusaɡˈia.|0
upˈaŋɡa ˌunaˌomfikˈia hˌaumðˈuru, wˈala mkˈuki ˌau mʃˈale wˈala fˈumo.|0
tʃˈuma hˌukiˈona kˌama uɲˈasi, na ʃˈaba kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌulioˈoza.|0
miʃˈale hˌaimfˈaɲi jˌeje ˌakimbˈie; mˈawe ja kombˈeo kwˈake ni kˌama makˈapi.|0
rˈuŋɡu kwˈake hˈuwa kˌama kipˈande tʃa ɟˈani kˈavu; hutʃˈeka saˈuti za kˌuɡoŋɡˈana kwa mkˈuki.|0
sehˈemu zˌake za tʃˈini kwˈeɲe tˈumbo zˈina mˌenomˈeno na mapˈeŋɡo kˌama viɡˈae vja tʃˈuŋɡu, zˌikiˈatʃa mburˈuzo kwˈeɲe matˈope kˌama tʃˈombo tʃˌeɲe mˈeno tʃa kˌupurˈia.|0
hˌuvisˌukasˈuka vilˈindi kˌama sˌufurˈia kˈubwa ˌitʃemkˈajo, na kˌukorˈoɡa bahˈari kˌama tʃˈuŋɡu tʃa marhˈamu.|0
ˌanapopˈita ɲˈuma jˌake huˈatʃa mkˈondo ˌunaˌometamˈeta; ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡeðˈani vilˈindi vˌilikˈuwa na mvˈi.|0
hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote dˌuniˈani kˌinatʃˌoliŋɡˈana nˈaje: jˌeje ni kiˈumbe kisˈitʃo na wˈoɡa.|0
jˌeje hˌuwatazˈama tʃˈini wˈale wˈote wˌeɲe kˌuɟivˈuna; jˌeje ni mfˈalme ɟˌuːja wˈote wˌeɲe kibˈuri.|0
ndˈipo ajˈubu ˌakamɟˈibu bwˈana.|0
nˌinaɟˈua ja kˌuwa ˌunawˈeza kufˈaɲa mˈambo jˈote, wˈala hakˈuna mpˈaŋɡo wˈako ˌunaowˈeza kˌuzuilˈika.|0
ˌuliulˈiza, ni nˈani hˈuju ˌafitʃˈaje mˌaʃaˈuri jˈaŋɡu bˌila mˌaarˈifa? hakˈika nˌilisˈema ɟˌuːja mˈambo nˌilijokˈuwa sˌijaelˈewi, mˈambo ja aɟˈabu ˈm̩no kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi kˌujaɟˈua.|0
ˌulisˈema, sˌikilˈiza sˈasa, nˌami nˌitanˈena; nˌitakˌuulˈiza swˈali, nˌawe jˌakupˈasa kˌuniɟˈibu..|0
mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu jˌalikˈuwa jˌamesikˈia habˈari zˈako, lakˈini sˈasa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamekuˈona.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌaɟiðarˈau mweɲˈewe, na kutˈubu katˌika mavˈumbi na maɟˈivu.|0
baˌada ja bwˈana kusˈema mˈambo hˈaja jˈote na ajˈubu, ˌakamwambˈia ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani, nˈina hasˈira ɟˈuu jˈako na ɟˌuːja rafˈiki zˈako wawˈili, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkusˈema jalˈijo sˈawa kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌalivjosˈema mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu.|0
bˌasi sˈasa tʃˌukuˈeni mˌafahˈali sˈaba na kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba mkˌamwendˈee mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu nˌaɲi mkatˈoe sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu weɲˈewe. mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu ˌataˈomba kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, nˌami nˌitajˌakubˈali maˈombi jˌake ˌili nˌisiwˌatendˈee sˌawasˈawa na ˌupumbˈavu wˈenu. nˈiɲi hˌamkusˈema jalˈijo sˈawa kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌalivjosˈema mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ajˈubu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌelifˈazi mtemˈani, bildˈadi mʃˈuhi, na sofˈari mnˌaamˈaθi wˌakafˈaɲa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaambˈia; nˌaje bwˈana ˌakajˌakubˈali maˈombi ja ajˈubu.|0
baˌada ja ajˈubu kˌuwaombˈea rafˈiki zˈake, bwˈana ˌakamwondˈoa kwˈeɲe utˈeka, ˌakamfˌanikˈiʃa tˈena nˌaje akˈampa mˈara mbˈili ja vˈile ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo hˈapo mwanzˈoni.|0
ndˈipo ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote waˈume kwa wˌake na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌemfahˈamu mwanzˈoni, wakˈaɟa wakˈala pamˈoɟa nˌaje katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake. wˌakamfarˈiɟi na kˌumtulˈiza mˈojo ɟˌuːja taˈabu jˈote bwˈana ˌalijˌoilˈeta ɟˈuu jˈake, nˌao kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈampa kipˈande tʃa fˈeða na pˈete ja ðahˈabu.|0
bwˈana ˌakaˌibarˈiki sehˈemu ja mwˈiʃo ja maˈiʃa ja ajˈubu kulˈiko ˈile ja kwˈanza. ˌalikˈuwa na kondˈoo ˈelfu kˈumi na ˈn̩ne, ŋɡamˈia ˈelfu sˈita, ɟˈozi za mˌafahˈali ˈelfu mˈoɟa, na pˈunda wa kˈike ˈelfu mˈoɟa.|0
tˈena ˌalikˈuwa na wˈana sˈaba na bˈinti watˈatu.|0
bˈinti wa kwˈanza ˌaliˈitwa jemˈima, wa pˈili kesˈia na wa tˈatu kˈeren hapˈuki.|0
hˌapakuwˈepo mahˈali popˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile jˈote pˌalipˌopatikˈana wˌanawˈake wazˈuri kˌama bˈinti za ajˈubu; nˌaje bˈaba jˈao ˌakawˈapa urˈiθi pamˈoɟa na ndˈuɡu zˈao.|0
baˌada ja hˈili ajˈubu ˌakaˈiʃi miˈaka mˌiamˈoɟanˌa arˌobaˈini; ˌakawaˈona wanˈawe na wˈana wa wanˈawe hˌata kizˈazi tʃa ˈn̩ne.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje haˈendi katˌika ʃaˈuri la wˈatu waˈovu, wˈala hˌasimˈami katˌika ɲɟˈia ja wˌeɲe ðˈambi, ˌau kukˈeti katˌika barˈaza la wˌeɲe mizˈaha.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo ni kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌuliopˈandwa kˈando ja viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi, ambˈao huzˈaa matˈunda kwa maɟˈira jˌake na maɟˈani jˌake hˌajaɲaˈuki. lolˈote ˌafaɲˈalo hˌufanikˈiwa.|0
sˈivjo walˈivjo waˈovu! wˌao ni kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo na upˈepo.|0
kwa hˈijo waˈovu hˌawatˌastahimˈili hukˈumu, wˈala wˌeɲe ðˈambi katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana hˌuziˌaŋɡalˈia ɲɟˈia za mwˌeɲe hˈaki, bˌali ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu ˌitaˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
wafˈalme wa dunˈia wˌanaɟipˈaŋɡa na wˌatawˈala wˌanaɟˌikusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa ðˈidi ja bwˈana na ðˈidi ja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake.|0
wˌanasˈema, tuvˈuɲɟe mˌiɲorˈoro jˈao na kˌuvitˌupilˈia mbˈali vifˈuŋɡo vjˈao.|0
jˌeje ˌatawalˈaje mbiŋɡˈuni hutʃˈeka, bwˈana hˌuwaðarˈau.|0
kˈiʃa hˌuwakemˈea katˌika hasˈira jˌake na kˌuwaˌoɡopˈeʃa katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈake, ˌakisˈema.|0
nˌimemtawˈaza mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja sajˈuni, mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu.|0
nˌitataŋɡˈaza ˈamri ja bwˈana: jˌeje ˌalinˌiambˈia, wˌewe ni mwanˈaŋɡu, lˈeo mˌimi nˌimekuzˈaa.|0
niˈombe, nˌami nˌitajafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈako, miˈiʃo ja dunˈia kˌuwa mˈilki jˈako.|0
ˌutawˌatawˈala kwa fˈimbo ja tʃˈuma na kˌuwavˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟa kˌama tʃˈombo tʃa mfiɲˈanzi.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˈiɲi wafˈalme, kuwˈeni na hekˈima; mwoɲˈeke, ˈeɲi wˌatawˈala wa dunˈia.|0
mtˌumikiˈeni bwˈana kwa hˈofu na mʃˌaŋɡilˈie kwa kˌutetemˈeka.|0
mbˈusu mwˈana, asˈiɟe ˌakakˌasirˈika nˌawe ˌukaˌaŋɡamˈizwa katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈako, kwa maˈana hasˈira jˌake ˌinawˈeza kuwˈaka ɣafˈula. hˈeri wˈote wˌanaˌomkimbilˈia.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tazˈama adˈui zˈaŋɡu walˈivjo wˈeŋɡi! ni wˈeŋɡi kiˈasi ɡˈani wˌanaˌoinˈuka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈeŋɡi wˌanasˈema ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu hˌatamwokˈoa.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ni ŋɡˈao pˈande zˈote; ˌumenˌiwekˈea ˌutukˈufu na kˌuinˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinamlilˈia bwˈana kwa saˈuti kˈuu, nˌaje ˌananiɟˈibu kutˈoka mlˈima wˌake mtˌakatˈifu.|0
nˌinaɟilˈaza na kupˈata ˌusiŋɡˈizi; naˈamka tˈena, kwa maˈana bwˈana hˌunitˌeɡemˈeza.|0
sˌitaoɡˈopa makˈumi ˈelfu ja adˈui, wˌanaˌoɟipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu kˈila upˈande.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˈamka! nˌiokˈoe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu! wapˈiɡe adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote kwˈeɲe tˈaja, vˈuɲɟa mˈeno ja waˈovu.|0
kwa maˈana wokˈovu watˈoka kwa bwˈana. barˈaka jˈako na ˈiwe ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈako.|0
niɟˈibu nˌikuitˈapo, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu mwˌeɲe hˈaki! nˌipumzˈiʃe katˌika ʃˈida zˈaŋɡu; nˌirehˈemu, ˌusikˈie ˈombi lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu, mtˌabadilˈiʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu kˌuwa aˈibu mpˈaka lˈini? mtapˈenda ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo mpˈaka lˈini.|0
fˌahamˈuni hakˈika kwˌamba bwˈana ˌamewatˈeŋɡa wˈale wamtʃˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈake; bwˈana ˌatanˌisikˈia nˌimwitˈapo.|0
katˌika hasˈira jˈako, ˌusitˈende ðˈambi. mkˈiwa vˌitandˈani mwˈenu, mtulˈie kˈimja mkˌiitʃuŋɡˈuza miˈojo jˈenu.|0
wˈeŋɡi wˌanaulˈiza, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌutuoɲˈeʃa ɟˈema lolˈote? ˈee bwˈana, tˌuaŋɡazˈie nˈuru ja ˈuso wˈako.|0
wˌewe ˌumeɟˈaza mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kwa furˈaha kˈubwa kulˈiko wˈatu wˌaliopˈata nafˈaka na divˈai kwa wˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌitaɟilˈaza tʃˈini na kulˈala kwa amˈani, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, wˌaniwezˈeʃa kukˈaa kwa salˈama.|0
ˈee bwˈana, teɡˈea sikˈio manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, ˌuaŋɡalˈie kupˈiɡa kˈite kwˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌili ˌunisˌaidˈie, mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana kwˈako nˌinaˈomba.|0
ˌasubˈuhi, ˌunasikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu, ˈee bwˈana; ˌasubˈuhi nalˈeta hˈaɟa zˈaŋɡu mbˈele zˈako, na kˌusubˈiri kwa mˌatumaˈini.|0
wˌewe si mˈuŋɡu ˌunajˌefurahˈia uˈovu, kwˈako ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌataˈiʃi.|0
wˌeɲe kibˈuri hˌawawˈezi kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈako, ˌunawˌatʃukˈia wˈote wˌatendˈao mabˈaja.|0
ˌunawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌasemˈao uˈoŋɡo. bwˈana hˌuwatʃukˈia wˌamwaɡˈao dˈamu na wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
lakˈini mˈimi, kwa rehˈema zˈako kˈuu, nˌitakˈuɟa katˌika ɲˈumba jˈako, kwa ˌuɲeɲekˈevu, nˌitasuɟˈudu kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu.|0
nˌioŋɡˈoze katˌika hˈaki jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu, ɲoˈoʃa ɲɟˈia jˈako mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
hakˈuna nˈeno kˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao lˌinalowˈeza kˌuaminˈika, miˈojo jˈao ˌimeɟˈaa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi. kˈoo lˈao ni kabˈuri lilˈilo wˈazi, kwa ndˈimi zˈao, wˌao hunˈena ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ˌuwataŋɡˈaze kˌuwa wˌeɲe hatˈia, ˈee mˈuŋɡu! hˈila zˈao zˈiwe aŋɡˈuko lˈao weɲˈewe. wˌafukuzˈie mbˈali kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈao ɲˈiŋɡi, kwa kˌuwa wˌamekuˈasi wˈewe.|0
lakˈini wˈote wˌakimbˌiliˈao kwˈako na wˌafurˈahi, waˈimbe kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe daˈima. ˌuenˈeze ulˈinzi wˈako ɟˈuu jˈao, ˌili wˈale wˌapendˈao ɟˈina lˈako wapˈate kˌukuʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
kwa hakˈika, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunawˌabarˈiki wˌeɲe hˈaki, ˌunawˌazuŋɡˈuka kwa wˈema wˈako kˌama ŋɡˈao.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusinˌikemˈee katˌika hasˈira jˈako, wˈala ˌusinˌiaðˈibu katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈako.|0
ˌunirehˈemu bwˈana, kwa maˈana nˌimeðˌoofˈika; ˈee bwˈana, ˌunipˈoɲe, kwa maˈana mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˈina mˌaumˈivu makˈali.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˈina utʃˈuŋɡu mwˈiŋɡi. mpˈaka lˈini, ˈee bwˈana, mpˈaka lˈini.|0
ɡeˈuka ˈee bwˈana, ˌunikombˈoe, ˌuniokˈoe kwa sabˈabu ja faðˈili zˈako.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌekukumbˈuka akˈiwa ˌamekˈufa. ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌukusˈifu akˈiwa kuzˈimu.|0
nˌimetʃakˈaa kwa kulˈia kwa huzˈuni; usˈiku kˈutʃa nˌafurikˈiʃa kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu kwa matʃˈozi; nˌimelowˈeʃa vˈiti vjˈaŋɡu vja fahˈari kwa matʃˈozi.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌameðˌoofˈika kwa kˌuhuzunˈika, jˌameðˌoofˈika kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
kaˈeni mbˈali nˈami, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mtendˈao mabˈaja, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamesikˈia kulˈia kwˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌamesikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu kwa hurˈuma, bwˈana ˌamekubˈali sˈala jˈaŋɡu.|0
adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote wˌataˌaibˈika na kˌufaðaˈika, wˌatarˈudi ɲˈuma kwa aˈibu ja ɣafˈula.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌinakˌukimbilˈia wˈewe, ˌuniokˈoe na kˌunikombˈoa na wˈote wˌanaˌonifˌuatˈia.|0
la sˈivjo wˌatanˌirarˈua kˌama sˈimba na kˌunitʃˈana vipˈande vipˈande, ˌasiwˈepo wa kˌuniokˈoa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, kˌama nˌimetˈenda hˈaja na kˈuna hatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌau ikˈiwa nˌimemtˈenda uˈovu alˈije na amˈani nˈami, ˌau nˌimemɲaŋɡˈaɲa adˈui jˈaŋɡu pasˈipo sabˈabu.|0
bˌasi adˈui ˌanifˌuatˈie na kˌunipˈata, ˌaupˈonde uhˈai wˈaŋɡu arðˈini na kˌunilˈaza mˌavumbˈini.|0
ˈamka kwa hasˈira jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, inˈuka ðˈidi ja ɣaðˈabu ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu. ˈamka, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌuamˈue hˈaki.|0
kˌusaɲˈiko la wˈatu na lˌikuzuŋɡˈuke. wˌatawˈale kutˈoka ɟˈuu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe hˈaki, ˌutʃuŋɡuzˈaje mawˈazo na miˈojo, komˈeʃa ɣasˈia za waˈovu na ufˈaɲe wˌeɲe hˈaki waˈiʃi kwa amˈani.|0
ŋɡˈao lˈaŋɡu ni mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, ˌawaˌokoˈaje waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
mˈuŋɡu ni mwamˈuzi mwˌeɲe hˈaki, mˈuŋɡu ˌaɣaðˌibikˈaje kˈila sˈiku.|0
jˌeje alˈije na mˈimba ja uˈovu na ˌatʃukuˈaje mˈimba ja ɣasˈia huzˈaa uˈoŋɡo.|0
jˌeje ˌatʃimbˈaje ʃˈimo na kˌulifukˈua hˌutumbukˈia katˌika ʃˈimo ˌalilotʃˈimba mweɲˈewe.|0
ɣasˈia ˌaziˌanziʃˈazo hˌumrudˈia mweɲˈewe, ˌukatˈili wˌake hˌumrudˈia kitʃwˈani.|0
nˌitamʃukˈuru bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaki jˈake, na nˌitalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina la bwˈana alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, bwˈana wˈetu, tazˈama ɟˈinsi lilˈivjo tukˈufu ɟˈina lˈako dˌuniˈani mwˈote! ˌumeuwˈeka ˌutukˈufu wˈako ɟˌuːja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
mˌidomˈoni ˌm̩wa watˈoto watʃˈaŋɡa na wˌaɲoɲˈao ˌumeamˈuru sˈifa, kwa sabˈabu ja watˈesi wˈako, kˌumɲamazˈiʃa adˈui na mlipˈiza kisˈasi.|0
nˌikizˌiaŋɡalˈia mbˈiŋɡu zˈako, kˈazi ja vidˈole vjˈako, mwˈezi na ɲˈota, ˌulizˌozirˌatibˈiʃa.|0
ˌumemfˈaɲa mtawˈala ɟˌuːja kˈazi za mikˈono jˈako; ˌumewˈeka vˈitu vjˈote tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini, nˈaam, kˈila kˌioɡˌeleˈatʃo katˌika ɲɟˈia za bahˈari.|0
ˈee bwˈana, bwˈana wˈetu, tazˈama ɟˈinsi lilˈivjo tukˈufu ɟˈina lˈako dˌuniˈani mwˈote.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌitakˌutukˈuza kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, nˌitajˌasimulˈia matˈendo jˈako jˈote ja aɟˈabu.|0
nˌitafurˈahi na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia ndˈani jˈako. nˌitalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina lˈako, ˈewe ulˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌamerˈudi ɲˈuma, wˌameɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡamˈia mbˈele zˈako.|0
kwa maˈana ˌumetetˈea hˈaki jˈaŋɡu na msimˈamo wˈaŋɡu; ˌumekˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi, ˌukihukˈumu kwa hˈaki.|0
ˌumekemˈea mˌataˈifa na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza waˈovu; ˌumejafˈuta maɟˈina jˈao milˈele na milˈele.|0
ˌuharibˈifu ˌusiokˈoma ˌumempˈata adˈui, ˌumeiŋɡˈoa mˈiɟi jˈao; hˌata kˌumbukˈumbu lˈao lˌimetowˈeka.|0
bwˈana ˌanatawˈala milˈele, ˌamewˈeka kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi apˈate kˌuhukˈumu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌatahukˈumu ˌulimwˈeŋɡu kwa hˈaki, ˌatatawˈala mˌataˈifa kwa hˈaki.|0
bwˈana ni kˌimbilˈio la wˈatu wˌanaˌoonˈewa, ni ŋɡˈome imˈara wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
wˈote wˌanaˌoliɟˈua ɟˈina lˈako wˌatakˌutumaˈini wˈewe, kwa maˈana wˌewe bwˈana, hˌuɟawaˈatʃa kˈamwe wˌakutˌafutˈao.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana sˈifa, ˌamefˈaɲua mtawˈala sajˈuni, tˌaŋɡazˈeni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje ˌalipizˈaje kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu hˌukumbˈuka, hˌapuˈuzi kilˈio tʃa wˌanaˌoonˈewa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tazˈama ɟˈinsi walˈivjo wˈeŋɡi adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanaˌonitˈesa! nˌihurumˈie, ˌuniinˈue kutˈoka malˈaŋɡo ja maˈuti.|0
ˌili niwˈeze kˌutaŋɡˈaza sˈifa zˈako katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja bˈinti sajˈuni na hˌuko nˌiuʃˌaŋɡilˈie wokˈovu wˈako.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe ʃˈimo wˌalilˌolitʃˈimba, miɡˈuu jˈao ˌimenˈaswa kwˈeɲe wˈavu wˌaliˌoufˈitʃa.|0
bwˈana ˌanaɟˌulikˈana kwa hˈaki jˈake, waˈovu wˌamenˈaswa katˌika kˈazi za mikˈono jˈao.|0
waˈovu wˌataiʃˈia kuzˈimu, nˈaam, mˌataˈifa jˈote wˌanaˌomsahˈau mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini mhitˈaɟi hˌatasˌahaulˈika sˈiku zˈote, wˈala mˌatumaˈini ja wˌaliˌoonˈewa hˌajatˌapotˈea.|0
ˈee bwˈana, inˈuka, ˌusimwˈatʃe bˌinadˈamu aʃˈinde. mˌataˈifa na jˌahukumˈiwe mbˈele zˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wapˈiɡe kwa hˈofu, mˌataˈifa na jaɟˈue kˌuwa wˌao ni wˈatu tˈu.|0
kwa nˈini, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunasimˈama mbˈali? kwa nˈini ˌunaɟifˈitʃa wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
katˌika kibˈuri tʃˈake, mwˈovu humtˈesa maskˈini, waˈovu na wanˈaswe katˌika hˈila wˌanazˌozitˈuŋɡa.|0
hˌuɟivunˈia tamˈaa za mˈojo wˈake; hˌumbarˈiki mlˈafi na kˌumtukˈana bwˈana.|0
katˌika kibˈuri tʃˈake, mwˈovu hˌamtafˈuti mˈuŋɡu, katˌika mawˈazo jˌake jˈote hakˈuna nafˈasi ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ɲɟˈia zˌake daˈima hˌufanikˈiwa; hˌuɟivˈuna na ˈamri zˈako zˈiko mbˈali nˈaje, hˌuwatʃˈeka kwa ðarˈau adˈui zˌake wˈote.|0
ˌanaɟˌisemˈea mweɲˈewe, hakˈuna kˌitakˌatʃonˌitikˈisa, daˈima nˌitakˈuwa na furˈaha, kˈamwe sˌitakˈuwa na ʃˈida.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈake kˌimeɟˈaa laˈana, uˈoŋɡo na vitˈiʃo; ʃˈida na ubˈaja vˈiko tʃˈini ja ulˈimi wˈake.|0
hˌuvizˈia karˈibu na viɟˈiɟi; kutˈoka mˌafitʃˈoni hˌuwanˈasa wasˈio na hatˈia, ˌakivizˈia wˌapitˈaɟi.|0
hˌuvizˈia kˌama sˈimba alˈije mˌawindˈoni; hˌuvizˈia kˌumkamˈata mɲˈoŋɡe, hˌuwakamˈata waɲˈoŋɡe na kˌuwaburˈuza katˌika wˈavu wˈake.|0
matˈeka wˌake hupˈondwa, hˌuzimˈia; wˌanaaŋɡˈuka katˌika ŋɡˈuvu zˈake.|0
ˌanaɟˌisemˈea mweɲˈewe, mˈuŋɡu ˌamesahˈau, hufˈitʃa ˈuso wˌake na haˈoni kabˈisa.|0
inˈuka bwˈana! inˈua mkˈono wˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu. ˌusiwˌasahˈau waɲˈoŋɡe.|0
kwa nˈini ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌanamtukˈana mˈuŋɡu? kwa nˈini ˌanaɟˌiambˈia mweɲˈewe, hˌataniˈita nitˈoe hesˈabu.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌunaˈona ʃˈida na huzˈuni, ˌumekubˈali kˌujapokˈea mkonˈoni mwˈako. mhˈaŋɡa ˌanaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwˈako, wˌewe ni msaˈada wa jatˈima.|0
vˈuɲɟa mkˈono wa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu na m̩bˈaja, mwˈite atˈoe hesˈabu ja maˈovu jˌake ambˈajo jˌasiŋɡˌeɟulikˈana.|0
bwˈana ni mfˈalme milˈele na milˈele, mˌataˈifa wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia watˈoke n̩tʃˈini mwˈake.|0
ˌunasikˈia, ˈee bwˈana, ʃaˈuku ja wˌanaˌoonˈewa, wˌewe hˌuwatˈia mˈojo, na kˌusikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈao.|0
ˌukiwˌatetˈea jatˈima na wˌaliˌoonˈewa, ˌili mwˌanadˈamu, ambˈaje ni udˈoŋɡo, ˌasiˌoɡopˈeʃe tˈena.|0
kwa bwˈana nˌinakˌimbilˈia, ˌunawezˈaɟe bˌasi kˌuniambˈia: rˈuka kˌama ndˈeɡe kwˈeɲe mlˈima wˈako.|0
hˈebu tazˈama, waˈovu wˌanapˈinda pˈinde zˈao, huwˈeka miʃˈale kwˈeɲe ˈuzi wˈake, wakˈiwa ɡizˈani ˌili kˌuwapˈiɡa wˈale waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
wakˈati misˈiŋɡi ˌimehˌaribˈiwa, mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲa nˈini.|0
bwˈana jˈuko ndˈani ja hekˈalu lˈake tˌakatˈifu; bwˈana jˈuko kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi mbiŋɡˈuni. hˌuwaˌaŋɡalˈia wˈana wa wˈatu, mˈatʃo jˌake jˌanawˌaɟarˈibu.|0
bwˈana hˌuwaɟarˈibu wˌeɲe hˈaki, lakˈini waˈovu na wˌanaopˈenda ɟeˈuri, nˈafsi jˌake hˌuwatʃukˈia.|0
ˌatawˌaɲeʃˈea waˈovu makˈaa ja mˈoto mkˈali na kˌiberˈiti kˌinatʃowˈaka, upˈepo wˌeɲe ɟˈoto kˈali n̩dˈio fˈuŋɡu lˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, jˌeje hupˈenda hˈaki. waɲˈofu wˌatauˈona ˈuso wˈake.|0
bwˈana tˌusaidˈie, kwa kˌuwa wˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu wˌametowˈeka; wˌaaminˈifu wˌametowˈeka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa hˌumwambˈia ɟirˈani jˌake uˈoŋɡo; midˈomo jˈao ja hˈila hˌuzuŋɡˈumza kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
bwˈana na ˌakatilˈie mbˈali midˈomo jˈote ja hˈila na kˈila ulˈimi ˌulioɟˈaa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
ˈule ˌunaosˈema, kwa ndˈimi zˈetu tˌutaʃˈinda; midˈomo ni mˈali jˈetu, bwˈana wˈetu ni nˈani.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ˌuonˈevu wa waɲˈoŋɡe na kulˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kwa wˌahitˈaɟi, nˌitainˈuka sˈasa, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawalˈinda kˌutokˈana na wˈale wˌeɲe nˈia m̩bˈaja ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
manˈeno ja bwˈana ni sˈafi, kˌama fˈeða ˌilijˌosafˈiʃwa katˌika tanˈuru, ˌilijˌosafˈiʃwa mˈara sˈaba.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌutatuwˈeka salˈama na kˌutulˈinda na kizˈazi hˈiki milˈele.|0
wˈatu waˈovu huˈenda wˌakirˈiŋɡa kˈila mahˈali wakˈati ambˈapo jˈule alˈije m̩bˈaja sˈana n̩dˈije ˌanajˌeheʃimˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
mpˈaka lˈini, ˈee bwˈana? ɟˈe, ˌutanˌisahˈau milˈele? ˌutanifˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako mpˈaka lˈini.|0
nˌitapambˈana na mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu mpˈaka lˈini, na kˈila sˈiku kˌuwa na maɟˈonzi mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu? adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌataniʃˈinda mpˈaka lˈini.|0
nˌitazˈame, ˌuniɟˈibu, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. jatˈie nˈuru mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu, ˌama sˈivjo nˌitalˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi wa maˈuti.|0
adˈui jˈaŋɡu ˌatasˈema, nˌimemʃˈinda, nˌao adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌataʃˌaŋɡilˈia nˌitakˌapoaŋɡˈuka.|0
lakˈini nˌinatˌeɡemˈea upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma; mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika wokˈovu wˈako.|0
nˌitamwimbˈia bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ˌamekˈuwa mwˈema kwˈaŋɡu.|0
mpumbˈavu ˌanasˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu. wˌamehˌaribˈika, matˈendo jˈao ni maˈovu kabˈisa; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatendˈaje mˈema.|0
ɟˈe, wˌatendˈao mabˈaja kˈamwe hˌawatˌaɟifˈunza: wˈale ambˈao huwˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kˌama wˈatu walˈavjo mkˈate, hˈao ambˈao hˌawamwˈiti bwˈana.|0
wˈako hˈapo, wˌameiŋɡˈiwa na hˈofu kˈuu, maˈana mˈuŋɡu jˈupo pamˈoɟa na wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
nˈiɲi watˈenda mabˈaja mnˌakwamˈiʃa mipˈaŋɡo ja maskˈini, bˌali bwˈana n̩dˈije kˌimbilˈio lˈao.|0
laˈiti wokˈovu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌuŋɡalikˈuɟa kutˈoka sajˈuni! wakˈati bwˈana ˌareɟeʃˈapo wafˈuŋɡwa wa wˈatu wˈake, jakˈobo na ˌaʃaŋɡilˈie, ˌisraˈeli na ˌafurˈahi.|0
bwˈana, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kukˈaa katˌika hekˈalu lˈako? nˈani ˌawezˈaje kuˈiʃi katˌika mlˈima wˈako mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ni jˈule ˌaendˈaje pasˈipo mawˈaa, ˌatendˈaje jalˈijo hˈaki, ˌasemˈaje kwˈeli tˌoka mojˈoni mwˈake.|0
na hˈana mˌasiŋɡizˈio ˌulimˈini mwˈake, ˌasijemtˈenda ɟirˈani jˌake vibˈaja, na ˌasijˌemsiŋɡizˈia mwenzˈake.|0
ambˈaje hˌumðarˈau ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja, lakˈini hˌuwaheʃˈimu wˈale wˌamwoɡopˈao bwˈana, jˈule ˌatunzˈaje kiˈapo tʃˈake hˌata kˌama ˌanaumˈia.|0
jˌeje ˌakopeʃˈaje fˈeða jˌake bˌila rˈiba, na hˌapokˈei rˈuʃwa ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia. ˈm̩tu ˌafaɲˈaje hˈaja kˈamwe hˌatatˌikisˈika.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniwˈeke salˈama, kwa maˈana kwˈako nˌimekˌimbilˈia.|0
nˌilimwambˈia bwˈana, wˌewe ndˈiwe bwˈana wˈaŋɡu; pasˈipo wˌewe sˈina ɟˈambo ɟˈema.|0
kwa habˈari ja wˌatakatˈifu wˌaliˈoko dˌuniˈani, n̩dˈio walˈio wa fahˈari ambˈao nˌinapendˈezwa nˈao.|0
huzˈuni ˌitaˌoŋɡezˈeka kwa wˈale wˌanaˌokimbilˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine. sˌitazˌimimˈina sadˈaka zˈao za dˈamu ˌau kutˈaɟa maɟˈina jˈao mˌidomˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ˌumenˌiwekˈea fˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu na kikˈombe tʃˈaŋɡu; ˌumejafˈaɲa mˈambo jˈaŋɡu jˈote jˈawe salˈama.|0
alˈama za mipˈaka zˌimenˌiaŋɡukˈia mahˈali pazˈuri, hakˈika nˌimepˈata urˈiθi mzˈuri.|0
nˌitamsˈifu bwˈana ambˈaje hˌuniʃaˈuri, hˌata wakˈati wa usˈiku mˈojo wˈaŋɡu hˌunifundˈiʃa.|0
nˌimemwˈeka bwˈana mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima. kwa sabˈabu jˈuko mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume, sˌitatˌikisˈika.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunafˌurahˈia, na ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌunaʃˌaŋɡilˈia; mwˈili wˈaŋɡu nˌao ˌutapumzˈika salˈama.|0
ˌumenˌiɟulˈiʃa ɲɟˈia ja uzˈima; ˌutaniɟˈaza na furˈaha mbˈele zˈako, pamˈoɟa na furˈaha za milˈele katˌika mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume.|0
sikˈia, ˈee bwˈana, kusˈihi kwˈaŋɡu kwa hˈaki, sˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu. tˈeɡa sikˈio kwa ˈombi lˈaŋɡu, hˌalitˈoki kwˈeɲe midˈomo ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
hukˈumu jˈaŋɡu na itˈoke kwˈako, mˈatʃo jˈako na jaˈone jˈale jalˈijo hˈaki.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌunaˌutʃuŋɡˈuza mˈojo wˈaŋɡu na kˌunikaɡˈua usˈiku, iŋɡˈawa ˌumenˌiɟarˈibu, hˌutaˈona tʃotʃˈote. nˌimeamˈua kwˌamba kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu hˌakitatˈenda ðˈambi.|0
kuhˈusu matˈendo ja wˌanadˈamu: kwa nˈeno la midˈomo jˈako, nˌimeɟˌiepˈuʃa na ɲɟˈia za wˌeɲe ɟeˈuri.|0
hatˈua zˈaŋɡu zˌimeʃˌikamˈana na ɲɟˈia zˈako; ɲˈajo zˈaŋɡu hˌazikˌutelˈeza.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌinakuˈita, kwa kˌuwa ˌutaniɟˈibu, nˌiteɡˈee sikˈio lˈako na ˌusikˈie ˈombi lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuoɲˈeʃe aɟˈabu ja upˈendo wˈako m̩kˈuu, wˌewe ˌuokoˈaje kwa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume wˈale wˌanaˌokukˌimbilˈia kˌutokˈana na adˈui zˈao.|0
nilˈinde kˌama mbˈoni ja ɟˈitʃo lˈako, ˌunifˈitʃe tʃˈini ja kivˈuli tʃa mbˈawa zˈako.|0
kˌutokˈana na waˈovu wˌanaˌoniʃˌambulˈia, kˌutokˈana na adˈui wˌauˈaɟi wˌanaˌonizuŋɡˈuka.|0
hˌuifˈuŋɡa miˈojo jˈao ilˈijo miɡˈumu, vˈiɲua vjˈao hunˈena kwa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
wˌamenˌifuatˈia ɲˈajo zˈaŋɡu, sˈasa wˌamenˌiziŋɡˈira, wakˈiwa mˈatʃo, wˌaniaŋɡˈuʃe tʃˈini.|0
wˌamefanˈana na sˈimba mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa ˌawindˈaje, kˌama sˈimba mkˈubwa ˌaɲemˌeleˈaje mˌafitʃˈoni.|0
inˈuka, ˈee bwˈana, pambˈana nˈao, ˌuwaaŋɡˈuʃe, nˌiokˈoe kˌutokˈana na waˈovu kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mkˈono wˈako ˌuniokˈoe na wˈatu wa ɟˈinsi hˌii, kˌutokˈana na wˈatu wa ˌulimwˈeŋɡu hˈuu ambˈao fˈuŋɡu lˈao lˈiko katˌika maˈiʃa hˈaja. na wapˈate aðˈabu ja kˌuwatˈoʃa. watˈoto wˌao na wapˈate zaˈidi ja hˈajo, hukˈumu na ˌiendelˈee kwa watˈoto wa watˈoto wˈao.|0
na mˌimi katˌika hˈaki nˌitauˈona ˈuso wˈako, nˌiamkˈapo, nˌitariðˈika kwa kuˈona sˈura jˈako.|0
nˌakupˈenda wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ni mwˈamba, ambˈaje kwˈake nˌinakˌimbilˈia. jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao jˈaŋɡu na pˈembe ja wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinamwˈita bwˈana ˌanajˌestahˈili kˌusifˈiwa, nˌami nˌinaˌokolˈewa kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈamba za maˈuti zˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mˌafurˈiko ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌalinˌilemˈea.|0
kˈamba za kuzˈimu zˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mitˈeɡo ja maˈuti ˌilinˌikabˈili.|0
katˌika ʃˈida jˈaŋɡu nˌalimwˈita bwˈana, nˌilimlilˈia mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌanisˌaidˈie. kutˈoka hˌekalˈuni mwˈake ˌalisikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu, kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu kˌikafˈika mbˈele zˈake, mˌasikiˈoni mwˈake.|0
dunˈia ˌilitˌetemˈeka na kˌutikisˈika, misˈiŋɡi ja milˈima ˌikatˌikisˈika, vˌilitˌetemˈeka kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˌasirˈika.|0
ˌakazˌipasˈua mbˈiŋɡu ˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini, mawˈiŋɡu meˈusi jˌalikˈuwa tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌalipˈanda ɟˌuːja kerˈubi ˌakarˈuka, ˌakapˈaa ɟˈuu kwa mbˈawa za upˈepo.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa ɡˈiza kˌuwa kˈitu tʃˈake tʃa kˌuɟifunˈika, hˈema lˈake kˌumzuŋɡˈuka, mawˈiŋɡu meˈusi ja mvˈua ja aŋɡˈani.|0
kˌutokˈana na mwˈaŋɡa wa uwˈepo wˌake mawˈiŋɡu jˌalisoɡˈea, ˌikaɲˈeʃa mvˈua ja mˈawe na umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
bwˈana ˌaliŋɡurˈuma kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, saˈuti ja alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌilisikˈika.|0
ˌaliipˈiɡa miʃˈale jˌake na kˌutawˈaɲa adˈui, nˈaam, umˈeme mwˈiŋɡi wa rˈadi na kˌuwafukˈuza.|0
ˌalinˌiokˈoa kutˈoka adˈui wˈaŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi, kutˈoka adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌaliokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi kulˈiko mˈimi.|0
ˌalinilˈeta ɲɟˈe mahˈali pˈeɲe nafˈasi tˈele, ˌakanˌiokˈoa kwa kˌuwa ˌalipendˈezwa nˈami.|0
bwˈana ˌalinˌitendˈea sˌawasˈawa na ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu; sˌawasˈawa na usˈafi wa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌamenilˈipa.|0
kwa maˈana nˌimeziʃˈika ɲɟˈia za bwˈana; sˌiɟatˈenda ubˈaja nˌikamwˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃerˈia zˌake zˈote zi mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, wˈala sˌiɟajaˈatʃa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake.|0
nˌimekˈuwa sˈina hatˈia mbˈele zˈake, nˌami nˌimeɟilˈinda nˌisitˈende ðˈambi.|0
bwˈana ˌamenilˈipa sˌawasˈawa na ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu; sˌawasˈawa na usˈafi wa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
kwa jˌeje alˈije mwˌaminˈifu, ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mwˌaminˈifu, kwa asˈije na hatˈia, ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌutokˈuwa na hatˈia.|0
kwa alˈije mtˌakatˈifu, ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu, lakˈini kwa ˌalijˌepotˈoka, ˌunaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mkaˈidi.|0
wˌewe hˌuwaokˈoa wˌaɲeɲekˈevu, lakˈini hˌuwaʃˈuʃa wˌeɲe kibˈuri.|0
wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunaifˈaɲa tˈaa jˈaŋɡu ˌiendelˈee kuwˈaka; mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu hˌulifˈaɲa ɡˈiza lˈaŋɡu kˌuwa mwˈaŋɡa.|0
kwa msaˈada wˈako nawˈeza kuʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi, nikˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu nˌitawˈeza kurˈuka ukˈuta.|0
kuhˈusu mˈuŋɡu, ɲɟˈia jˌake ni kˌamilˈifu, nˈeno la bwˈana halˈina dosˈari. jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao kwa wˈote wˌanaˌokimbilˈia kwˈake.|0
kwa maˈana ni nˈani alˈije mˈuŋɡu zaˈidi ja bwˈana? ni nˈani alˈije mwˈamba ˌisipokˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
mˈuŋɡu n̩dˈije ˌanivikˈaje ŋɡˈuvu na kufˈaɲa ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa kˌamilˈifu.|0
hˌuifˈaɲa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kˌama miɡˈuu ja kulˈuŋɡu, hˌuniwezˈeʃa kˌusimˈama mahˈali palˈipo ɟˈuu.|0
hˌuifundˈiʃa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kˌupiɡˈana vˈita; mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌinawˈeza kupˈinda upˈinde wa ʃˈaba.|0
hˌujapanˈua mapˈito jˈaŋɡu, ˌili miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌisitelˈeze.|0
nˌiliwˌafuatˈia adˈui zˈaŋɡu na nˌikawapˈata, sˌikurˈudi ɲˈuma mpˈaka wˌalipˌoaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
nˌiliwasˈeta hˌata hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuinˈuka tˈena; wˌaliaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini ja miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuliwafˈaɲa adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌaɡeˈuke na kˌukimbˈia, nˌami nˌikawˌaaŋɡamˈiza adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌalipˈiɡa jˈowe, lakˈini hˌapakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌuwaokˈoa; wˌalimlilˈia bwˈana, lakˈini hˌakuwaɟˈibu.|0
nˌiliwapˈonda kˌama mavˈumbi jˌanajˌopeperˈuʃwa na upˈepo; nˌiliwamwˈaɡa ɲɟˈe kˌama tˈope bˌarabarˈani.|0
ˌumenˌiokˈoa kˌutokˈana na mˌaʃambulˈizi ja wˈatu; ˌumenifˈaɲa kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa mˌataˈifa, wˈatu ambˈao sˌikuwaɟˈua wˌananˌitumikˈia.|0
mˈara wˌanisˌikiˈapo hˌunitˈii, waɡˈeni hˌuɲeɲekˈea mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈote wˌanaleɡˈea, wˌanatˈoka katˌika ŋɡˈome zˈao wˌakitˌetemˈeka.|0
bwˈana ju hˈai! sˈifa ni kwa mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu! ˌatukˈuzwe mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu ˌanilˌipiziˈaje kisˈasi, ˌawatˌiiʃˈaje mˌataˈifa tʃˈini jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌaniˌokoˈaje na adˈui zˈaŋɡu. ˌulinˌiinˈua ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu; ˌulinˌiokˈoa tˌoka kwa wˈatu wˌaɟeˈuri.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitakusˈifu kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, ˈee bwˈana; nˌitalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
hˈumpa mfˈalme wˌake uʃˈindi m̩kˈuu, hˌuoɲˈeʃa faðˈili zˌake kwa mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake, kwa daˈudi na wazˈao wˌake milˈele.|0
mbˈiŋɡu zˌinataŋɡˈaza ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu, ˈaŋɡa zˌahubˈiri kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈake.|0
sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku zˌinatˈoa habˈari, usˈiku baˌada ja usˈiku zˌinataŋɡˈaza mˌaarˈifa.|0
hakˈuna msˈemo wˈala lˈuɣa, ambˈapo saˈuti zˈao hˌazisikˈiki.|0
lˌinafanˈana na bwˈana arˈusi ˌakitˈoka tʃumbˈani mwˈake, kˌama ʃuɟˈaa ˌafurˌahiˈavjo kˌukamilˈiʃa kˌuʃindˈana kwˈake.|0
hˌutʃomˈoza upˈande mmˈoɟa wa mbˈiŋɡu, na kufˈaɲa mzuŋɡˈuko wˌake hˌadi upˈande mwiŋɡˈine. hakˈuna kˌilitʃˌoɟifˈitʃa ɟˈoto lˈake.|0
ʃerˈia ja bwˈana ni kˌamilˈifu, ˌikihuˈiʃa nˈafsi. ʃuhˈuda za bwˈana ni za kˌuaminˈika, zikˈimpa mɟˈiŋɡa hekˈima.|0
mˌaaɡˈizo ja bwˈana ni kamˈili, nˈajo hˌufurahˈiʃa mˈojo. ˈamri za bwˈana hˌuaŋɡˈaza, zatˈia nˈuru matʃˈoni.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana ni ˌutakatˈifu, nˈako kwadˈumu milˈele. ˈamri za bwˈana ni za hakˈika, nˈazo zˈina hˈaki.|0
ni za θamˈani kulˈiko ðahˈabu, kulˈiko ðahˈabu ilˈijo sˈafi sˈana, ni tˈamu kulˈiko asˈali, kulˈiko asˈali kutˈoka kwˈeɲe sˈeɡa.|0
kwa hˈizo mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanaˈoɲua, katˌika kˌuziʃˈika kˈuna θawˈabu kˈubwa.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌutambˈua makˈosa jˈake? nˌisamˈehe makˈosa jˈaŋɡu nˌisijˌojaɟˈua.|0
mlˈinde mtumˈiʃi wˈako na ðˈambi za mˌakusˈudi, nˈazo zˌisinˌitawˈale. ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokˈuwa sˈina lawˈama, wˈala sˌitakˈuwa na hatˈia ja kˈosa kˈubwa.|0
manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu na mawˈazo ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu, japˈate kibˈali mbˈele zˈako, ˈee bwˈana, mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu na mkombˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana na ˌakuɟˈibu ˌunapokˈuwa katˌika ðˈiki, ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo na lˈiwe kˈiŋɡa jˈako.|0
na ˌakutumˈie msaˈada kutˈoka pˌatakatˈifu na ˌakupatˈie msaˈada kutˈoka sajˈuni.|0
na ˌazikumbˈuke ðabˈihu zˈako zˈote, na ˌazikubˈali sadˈaka zˈako za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
na ˌakuɟalˈie hˈaɟa ja mˈojo wˈako, na ˌaifˌanikˈiʃe mipˈaŋɡo jˈako jˈote.|0
tˌutaʃˌaŋɡilˈia kwa furˈaha ˌutakˌapoʃˈinda, tˌutainˈua bendˈera zˈetu kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. bwˈana na akˈupe hˈaɟa zˈako zˈote.|0
sˈasa nˌafahˈamu kˌuwa bwˈana hˌumwokˈoa mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake, humɟˈibu kutˈoka mbˈiŋɡu jˌake tˌakatˈifu kwa ŋɡˈuvu za wokˈovu wa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
weŋɡˈine wˌanatˌumaˈini maɡˈari ja vˈita, na weŋɡˈine farˈasi, bˌali sˌisi tˌutalˌitumˌainˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wˌao wˌameʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini na kˌuaŋɡˈuka, bˌali sˌisi tˌunainˈuka na kˌusimˈama imˈara.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mwokˈoe mfˈalme! tuɟˈibu tˌunapˌokuˈita.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mfˈalme hˌuzifˌurahˈia ŋɡˈuvu zˈako. tazˈama ɟˈinsi ilˈivjo kˈuu furˈaha jˌake kwa uʃˈindi ˌunaˈompa.|0
umˈempa hˈaɟa ja mˈojo wˌake na hˌukumzˌuilˈia maˈombi ja midˈomo jˈake.|0
ˌulimkˌaribˈiʃa kwa barˈaka tˈele na kumvˈika tˈaɟi ja ðahˈabu sˈafi kitʃwˈani pˈake.|0
ˌalikuˈomba maˈiʃa, nˌawe ukˈampa, wˈiŋɡi wa sˈiku milˈele na milˈele.|0
kˌutokˈana na uʃˈindi ˌuliˈompa, ˌutukˈufu wˌake ni mkˈubwa, ˌumewˈeka ɟˈuu jˌake fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu.|0
hakˈika umˈempa barˈaka za milˈele, ˌumemfˈaɲa ˈawe na furˈaha kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe ja uwˈepo wˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme ˌanamtˌumaˈini bwˈana; kwa upˈendo ˌusiokˈoma wa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana hˌatatikˈiswa.|0
mkˈono wˈako ˌutawaʃˈika adˈui zˈako wˈote, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ˌutawˌakamˈata adˈui zˈako.|0
wakˈati ˌutakˌapoɟˌitokˈeza ˌutawafˈaɲa kˌama tanˈuru ja mˈoto. katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˌake bwˈana ˌatawamˈeza, mˈoto wˌake ˌutawˌateketˈeza.|0
ˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wazˈao wˌao kutˈoka dˌuniˈani, uzˈao wˌao kutˈoka wˌanadˈamu.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌatapˈaŋɡa mabˈaja ðˈidi jˈako na kutˈuŋɡa hˈila, hˌawawˈezi kˌufanikˈiwa.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌutawafˈaɲa wˌakimbˈie ˌutakˌapowalˈeŋɡa usˈoni pˈao kwa mʃˈale kutˈoka kwˈeɲe upˈinde wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌutukˈuzwe katˌika ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, tˌutaˈimba na kusˈifu ŋɡˈuvu zˈako.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mbˈona ˌumeniˈatʃa? kwa nˈini ˈuko mbˈali hˈivjo kˌuniokˈoa? mbˈali hˈivjo na manˈeno ja kˌuuɡˈua kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌinalˈia mtʃˈana, lakˈini hˌuniɟˈibu, hˌata usˈiku, sˌiɲamˈazi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌumesimˈikwa katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˌama ulˈije mtˌakatˈifu; wˌewe ni sˈifa ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwˈako wˌewe bˈaba zˈetu wˌaliwˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao, wˌalikˌutumaˈini nˌawe ˌukawˌaokˈoa.|0
wˌalikˌulilˈia wˌewe na ˌukawˌaokˈoa, wˌalikˌuteɡemˈea wˌewe nˌao hˌawakˌuaibˈika.|0
mˌimi ni m̩ɲˈoo wˈala si mwˌanadˈamu, wˌanaˈume wˌamenibˈeza, na wˈatu wˌamenˌiðarˈau.|0
wˈote wˌanionˈao hˌuniðihˈaki, hˌunivˌurumiʃˈia matˈusi, wˌakitikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
husˈema, ˌanamtˌeɡemˈea bwˈana, bˌasi bwˈana na ˌamwokˈoe. ˌamkombˈoe bˈasi, kwa maˈana ˌanapendˈezwa nˈaje.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌulinitˈoa tumbˈoni, ˌukanifˈaɲa nˌikutˌeɡemˈee, hˌata nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinaɲˈoɲa matˈiti ja mˈama jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimekˌabiðˈiwa kwˈako ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa, tˌoka tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu ˌumekˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
usˈiwe mbˈali nˈami, kwa maˈana ʃˈida ˈiko karˈibu na hakˈuna wa kˌunisˌaidˈia.|0
mˌafahˈali wˈeŋɡi wˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka, mˌafahˈali wa baʃˈani wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌamenˌiziŋɡˈira.|0
sˈimba wˌaŋɡurumˈao wˌanaˌorarˈua mawˈindo jˈao hˌupanˈua vˈiɲua vjˈao ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimemimˈinwa kˌama mˈaɟi, mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu jˈote ˌimetˈoka katˌika viˈuŋɡo vjˈake. mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɡeˈuka kˌuwa ˈn̩ta, ˌumejejˈuka ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌimekaˈuka kˌama kiɡˈae, ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɡˌandamˈana na kˌaakˈaa la kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌumenilˈaza katˌika mavˈumbi ja kˈifo.|0
ˈm̩bwa wˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka, kˈundi la wˈatu waˈovu lˌimenˌiziŋɡˈira, wˌametobˈoa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu na miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
nawˈeza kˌuhesˈabu mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu jˈote, wˈatu wˌananˌikodolˈea mˈatʃo na kˌunisimˈaŋɡa.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, usˈiwe mbˈali. ˈee ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu, ˈuɟe harˈaka ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
okˈoa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu na upˈaŋɡa, uhˈai wˈaŋɡu wa θamˈani kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za ˈm̩bwa.|0
nˌiokˈoe kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa sˈimba, nˌiokˈoe kutˈoka pˈembe za mˌafahˈali mwˈitu.|0
nˌitalˌitaŋɡˈaza ɟˈina lˈako kwa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko nˌitakusˈifu wˈewe.|0
nˈiɲi ambˈao mnˈamtʃa bwˈana, msifˈuni! nˈiɲi ɲˈote wazˈao wˈote wa jakˈobo, mhˌeʃimˈuni jˈeje! mtʃˈeni jˈeje, nˈiɲi wazˈao wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa maˈana hˌakupuˈuza wˈala kˌuðarˈau matˈeso ja ˌalijˌeonˈewa; hˌakumfˈitʃa ˈuso wˌake bˌali ˌalisˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈake ˌili ˌamsaidˈie.|0
kwˈako wˌewe hutˈoka kiˈini tʃa sˈifa zˈaŋɡu katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa, nˌitatimˈiza naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu mbˈele ja wˈale wˌakutʃˈao wˈewe.|0
maskˈini wˌatakˈula na kuʃˈiba, wˈale wˌamtafutˈao bwˈana wˌatamsˈifu: miˈojo jˈenu na iˈiʃi milˈele.|0
miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia ˌitakumbˈuka na kˌumɡeukˈia bwˈana, nˈazo ɟamˈaa zˈote za mˌataˈifa wˌatasuɟˈudu mbˈele zˈake.|0
kwa maˈana ufˈalme ni wa bwˈana nˌaje hˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa.|0
mˌataɟˈiri wˈote wa dunˈia wˌataʃˌerehekˈea na kˌuabˈudu. wˈote wˌaendˈao mˌavumbˈini wˌatapˈiɡa maɡˈoti mbˈele jˈake, wˈote ambˈao hˌawawˈezi kˌudumˈiʃa uhˈai wˈao.|0
wazˈao wa bˌaadˈaje wˌatamtˌumikˈia jˈeje; vizˈazi viɟˈavjo vˌitaɟulˈiʃwa habˈari za bwˈana.|0
wˌatataŋɡˈaza hˈaki jˌake kwa wˈatu ambˈao hˌawaɟˌazalˈiwa bˈado, kwa maˈana jˌeje ˌametˈenda hˈili.|0
bwˈana n̩dˈije mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu, sˌitapˌuŋɡukˈiwa na kˈitu.|0
hˌunilˈaza katˌika malˈiʃo ja maɟˈani mabˈitʃi, kˈando ja mˈaɟi mˌatulˈivu hˌunioŋɡˈoza.|0
hˌunihuˈiʃa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu. hˌunioŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia za hˈaki kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake.|0
hˌata kˌama nˌikipˈita kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde la uvˈuli wa maˈuti, sˌitaoɡˈopa mabˈaja, kwa maˈana wˌewe ˈupo pamˈoɟa nˈami; fˈimbo jˈako na mkoŋɡˈoɟo wˈako vjˌanifarˈiɟi.|0
wˌaandˈaa mˈeza mbˈele jˈaŋɡu matʃˈoni pa adˈui zˈaŋɡu. ˌumenipˈaka mafˈuta kitʃwˈani pˈaŋɡu, kikˈombe tʃˈaŋɡu kˌinafurˈika.|0
hakˈika wˈema na upˈendo vˌitanˌifuˈata sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈaa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bwˈana milˈele.|0
dunˈia ni mˈali ja bwˈana, na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake, ˌulimwˈeŋɡu, na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake.|0
maˈana ˌaliˌiwekˈea misˈiŋɡi jˌake bˌaharˈini na kˌuifˈaɲa imˈara ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi.|0
nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuupˈanda mlˈima wa bwˈana? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama pˌatakatˈifu pˈake.|0
ni jˈule mwˌeɲe mikˈono sˈafi na mˈojo mweˈupe, jˈule ambˈaje hˌakuˌinulˈia sanˈamu nˈafsi jˌake ˌau kuˈapa kwa kˈitu tʃa uˈoŋɡo.|0
hˈujo ˌatapokˈea barˈaka kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, na hukˈumu ja hˈaki kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈake.|0
hˈiki ndˈitʃo kizˈazi tʃa wˈale wˌamtafutˈao, wˈale wˌautˌafutˈao ˈuso wˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
ˌinuˈeni vˈitʃwa vjˈenu, ˈeɲi malˈaŋɡo, ˌinukˈeni ˈeɲi milˈaŋɡo ja kˈale, ˌili mfˈalme wa ˌutukˈufu apˈate kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
ni nˈani hˈuju mfˈalme wa ˌutukˈufu? ni bwˈana alˈije na ŋɡˈuvu na uwˈeza, ni bwˈana alˈije hodˈari katˌika vˈita.|0
ˌinuˈeni vˈitʃwa vjˈenu, ˈeɲi malˈaŋɡo, vˌiinuˈeni ɟˈuu ˈeɲi milˈaŋɡo ja kˈale, ˌili mfˈalme wa ˌutukˈufu apˈate kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
ni nˈani jˈeje, hˈuju mfˈalme wa ˌutukˈufu? ni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote; jˌeje n̩dˈije mfˈalme wa ˌutukˈufu.|0
kwˈako wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌainˈua nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ni wˌewe nˌinajˌekutˌumainˈia, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaibˈike, wˈala ˌusiˈatʃe adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌakaniʃˈinda.|0
kˈamwe hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌekutˌeɡemˈea ˌatakˌajeˌaibˈiʃwa, bˌali wˌataˌaibˈiʃwa wˌafaɲˈao hˈila bˌila sabˈabu.|0
nˌioɲˈeʃe ɲɟˈia zˈako, ˈee bwˈana, nˌifundˈiʃe mapˈito jˈako.|0
nˌioŋɡˈoze katˌika kwˈeli jˈako na kˌunifundˈiʃa, kwa maˈana wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu, nˈalo tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu lˈiko kwˈako wakˈati wˈote.|0
kumbˈuka, ˈee bwˈana, rehˈema zˈako kˈuu na upˈendo, kwa maˈana zˌimekuwˈepo ʃˈu zamˈani.|0
ˌusizˌikumbˈuke ðˈambi za uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu wˈala ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu za uˈasi, sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako ˌunikumbˈuke, kwa maˈana wˌewe ni mwˈema, ˈee bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ni mwˈema na mwˌeɲe adˈili, kwa hˈijo hˌuwafundˈiʃa wˌeɲe ðˈambi ɲɟˈia zˈake.|0
hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wˌaɲeɲekˈevu katˌika hˈaki, nˌaje hˌuwafundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia jˈake.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako, ˌunisamˈehe uˈovu wˈaŋɡu, ˌiɟapokˈuwa ni mwˈiŋɡi.|0
ni nˈani bˈasi, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanajˈemtʃa bwˈana? ˌatamfundˈiʃa katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌatakˌajoˌitʃaɡˈua kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatafˌanikˈiwa mˌaiʃˈani mwˈake, nˌao wazˈao wˌake wˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
sˈiri ja bwˈana ˈiko kwa wˈale wamtʃˈao, jˌeje hˌuwaɟulˈiʃa aɡˈano lˈake.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu hˌumwelekˈea bwˈana daˈima, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌataitˈoa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mtˈeɡo.|0
nˌiɡeukˈie na ˌunihˌurumˈie, kwa maˈana mˌimi ni mpwˈeke na mwˌeɲe kˌutesˈeka.|0
ʃˈida za mˈojo wˈaŋɡu zˌimeˌoŋɡezˈeka, nˌiokˈoe katˌika ðˈiki jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuaŋɡalˈie matˈeso na ʃˈida zˈaŋɡu na ˌuniˌondolˈee ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
tazˈama adˈui zˈaŋɡu walˈivjo wˈeŋɡi, pˈia uˈone ɟˈinsi wˌanavjˌonitʃukˈia vikˈali.|0
ˌujalˈinde maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu na ˌuniokˈoe, ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaibˈike, kwa maˈana nˌimekˌukimbilˈia wˈewe.|0
ˌuadilˈifu na ˌuaminˈifu vˌinilˈinde, kwa sabˈabu tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu ni kwˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌakombˈoe ˌisraˈeli, katˌika ʃˈida zˈao zˈote.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌiθibitˈiʃe katˌika hˈaki, maˈana nˌimeˈiʃi maˈiʃa jasˈijo na lawˈama; nˌimemtˌumainˈia bwˈana bˌila kˌusitasˈita.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuniɟarˈibu, ˌunipˈime, ˌuutʃuŋɡˈuze mˈojo wˈaŋɡu na mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana upˈendo wˈako ˈuko mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima, nˌami nˌatembˈea sˈiku zˈote katˌika kwˈeli jˈako.|0
sikˈeti pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu, wˈala sˌiandamˈani na wˌanafˈiki.|0
nˌinatʃukˈia kˌusaɲˈiko la watˈenda mabˈaja na nˌinakatˈaa kukˈeti pamˈoɟa na waˈovu.|0
nˌinanˈawa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuwa sˈina hatˈia, nˌaikˌaribˈia mˌaðabˈahu jˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
nˌikitaŋɡˈaza sˈifa jˈako kwa saˈuti kˈubwa, hˈuku nˌikisˌimulˈia matˈendo jˈako ja aɟˈabu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌaipˈenda ɲˈumba jˈako mahˈali ˌunakoˈiʃi, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌutukˈufu wˈako hukˈaa.|0
ˌusiˌiondˈoe nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na watˈenda ðˈambi, wˈala uhˈai wˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na wˌamwaɡˈao dˈamu.|0
ambˈao mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao kˈuna mipˈaŋɡo miˈovu, ambˈao mikˈono jˈao ja kuˈume ˌimeɟˈaa rˈuʃwa.|0
bˌali mˌimi nˌinaˈiʃi maˈiʃa jasˈijo na lawˈama; nˌikombˈoe na ˌunihˌurumˈie.|0
miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌimesimˈama katˌika uwˈaɲɟa tˌambarˈare; katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko kˈuu nˌitamsˈifu bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ni nˈuru jˈaŋɡu na wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu, nˌimwoɡˈope nˈani? bwˈana ni ŋɡˈome ja uzˈima wˈaŋɡu, nimhˈofu nˈani.|0
waˈovu wˌatakˌaposoɡˈea ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu ˌili wanˈile ɲˈama jˈaŋɡu, adˈui zˈaŋɡu na watˈesi wˈaŋɡu wˌatakˌaponˌiʃambulˈia, wˌataɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka.|0
hˌata ɟˈeʃi lˌinizuŋɡˈuke pˈande zˈote, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu hˌautˌaoɡˈopa; hˌata vˈita vˌitokˈee ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, hˌata hˈapo nˌitakˈuwa na ˌuɟasˈiri.|0
ɟˈambo mˈoɟa nˌinamwˈomba bwˈana, hˈili ndˈilo nˌinalˌolitafˈuta: niwˈeze kukˈaa ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa bwˈana sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, nˌiutazˈame uzˈuri wa bwˈana na kˌumtafˈuta hˌekalˈuni mwˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja ʃˈida, ˌatanˌihifˈaði salˈama katˌika maskˈani jˈake, ˌatanifˈitʃa ˌuvulˈini ˌm̩wa hˈema jˌake na kˌuniwˈeka ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe mwˈamba.|0
kˈiʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitaˌinulˈiwa ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanaˌonizuŋɡˈuka. katˌika maskˈani jˌake nˌitatˈoa ðabˈihu kwa kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe; nˌitamwimbˈia bwˈana na kumsˈifu.|0
ˌisikˈie saˈuti jˈaŋɡu nˌikuitˈapo, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunihˌurumˈie na ˌuniɟˈibu.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunasˈema kuhˈusu wˈewe, ˌutafˈute ˈuso wˈake! ˈuso wˈako, bwˈana nˌitaˌutafˈuta.|0
ˌusinifˈitʃe ˈuso wˈako, ˌusimkatˈae mtumˈiʃi wˈako kwa hasˈira; wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu. ˌusinˌikatˈae wˈala ˌusiniˈatʃe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌata kˌama bˈaba jˈaŋɡu na mˈama wˌakiniˈatʃa, bwˈana ˌatanˌipokˈea.|0
nˌifundˈiʃe ɲɟˈia jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, nˌioŋɡˈoze katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌoɲoˈoka kwa sabˈabu ja watˈesi wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusinˌiatʃilˈie kwa nˈia za adˈui zˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana mˌaʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo wˌameinˈuka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, wˌakipumˈua ˌuɟeˈuri.|0
nˌami bˈado nˈina tˌumaˈini hˈili: nˌitauˈona wˈema wa bwˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
mŋɡoɟˈee bwˈana, ˈuwe hodˈari na mwˌeɲe mˈojo m̩kˈuu, nˈawe, ˌumŋɡoɟˈee bwˈana.|0
nˌinakuˈita wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu; usˈiwe kwˈaŋɡu kˌama kizˈiwi. kwa sabˈabu ˌukiɲamˈaza nˌitafanˈana na wˌalioʃˈuka ʃimˈoni.|0
sikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌunihˌurumˈie nˌinapˌokuˈita kwa aɟˈili ja msaˈada, nˌiinuˈapo mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kˌuelekˈea pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu pˈako.|0
ˌusinˌiburˈute pamˈoɟa na waˈovu, pamˈoɟa na hˈao wˌatendˈao mabˈaja, ambˈao hˌuzuŋɡˈumza na ɟirˈani zˈao manˈeno mazˈuri, lakˈini mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao wˌamefˈitʃa tʃˈuki.|0
walˈipe sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈao, sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈao maˈovu; walˈipe sˌawasˈawa na kˈazi za mikˈono jˈao, ˌuwalˈipe wˌanavjˌostahˈili.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawaheʃˈimu kˈazi za bwˈana, na jˈale ambˈajo mikˈono jˌake ˌimetˈenda, ˌatawˌabomˈoa na kˈamwe hˌatawaɟˈeŋɡa tˈena.|0
bwˈana ˌasifˈiwe, kwa maˈana ˌamesikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu nˌikimwˈomba ˌanihˌurumˈie.|0
bwˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈao jˈaŋɡu, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumemtˌumaˈini jˈeje, nˌami nˌimesˌaidˈiwa. mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunarˌukarˈuka kwa furˈaha nˌami nˌitamʃukˈuru kwa wˈimbo.|0
bwˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu ja wˈatu wˈake, ŋɡˈome ja wokˈovu kwa mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake.|0
wˌaokˈoe wˈatu wˈako na ˌuubarˈiki urˈiθi wˈako; ˈuwe mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌao na ˌuwabˈebe milˈele.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana, ˈeɲi mˌaʃuɟˈaa, mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu ˌunaˌostahˈili ɟˈina lˈake; mwˌabudˈuni bwˈana katˌika uzˈuri wa ˌutakatˈifu wˈake.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana ˈiko ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi; mˈuŋɡu wa ˌutukˈufu hupˈiɡa rˈadi, bwˈana hupˈiɡa rˈadi ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi makˈuu.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana ˈina ŋɡˈuvu; saˈuti ja bwˈana ni tukˈufu.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana huvˈuɲɟa mˌierˈezi; bwˈana huvˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande mˌierˈezi ja lˌebanˈoni.|0
hufˈaɲa lˌebanˈoni ˌirukarˈuke kˌama ndˈama, sˌiriˈoni ˌurukarˈuke kˌama mwˈana ɲˈati.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana hupˈiɡa kwa miˈali ja umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana hˌutikˈisa ɟˈaŋɡwa; bwˈana hˌutikˈisa ɟˈaŋɡwa la kadˈeʃi.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana hˌuzalˈiʃa ajˈala, na hˌuuˈatʃa msˈitu wˈazi. hˌekalˈuni mwˈake wˈote wasˈema, ˌutukˈufu.|0
bwˈana hukˈeti akˈiwa ˌametawˈazwa ɟˌuːja ɣarˈika; bwˈana ˌametawˈazwa kˌuwa mfˈalme milˈele.|0
bwˈana huwˈapa wˈatu wˌake ŋɡˈuvu; bwˈana hˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wˌake kwa kuwˈapa amˈani.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌilikuˈita ˌunisˌaidˈie na wˌewe ˌumenipˈoɲa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenitˈoa kuzˈimu, ˌumenˌiokˈoa nˌisiʃˈuke kwˈeɲe ʃˈimo la maˈuti.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˌatakatˈifu wˈake; lˌisifˈuni ɟˈina lˈake tˌakatˈifu.|0
kwa maˈana hasˈira jˌake ni ja mˈuda mfˈupi, bˌali upˈendo wˌake hudˈumu sˈiku zˈote. ˌinawˌezekˈana kilˈio kiwˈepo usˈiku kˈutʃa, lakˈini ˌasubˈuhi kukˈawa na furˈaha.|0
nˌilipˌofanikˈiwa nˌilisˈema, sˌitatikˈiswa kˈamwe.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌulipˌoniɟalˈia, ˌuliˌuimarˈiʃa mlˈima wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini ˌulipˌoufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako nˌilifˌaðaˈika.|0
kwˈako wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌiliˈita, kwa bwˈana nˌiliˈomba rehˈema.|0
kˈuna faˈida ɡˈani katˌika kˌuaŋɡamˈia kwˈaŋɡu? katˌika kuʃˈuka kwˈaŋɡu ʃimˈoni? ɟˈe, mavˈumbi jˌatakusˈifu? ɟˈe, jˌatataŋɡˈaza ˌuaminˈifu wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌunisikˈie na kˌunihˌurumˈia, ˈee bwˈana, ˈuwe msaˈada wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuliɡeˈuza mˌaombolˈezo jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa kutʃˈeza, ˌulinivˈua ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia ˌukanivˈika ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
ˌili mˈojo wˈaŋɡu uwˈeze kˌukusˈifu na ˌusikˈae kˈimja. ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakˌuʃukˈuru milˈele.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌimekˌukimbilˈia wˈewe, ˌusiˈatʃe nˌikaˌaibˈika kˈamwe, kwa hˈaki jˈako ˌuniokˈoe.|0
nˌiteɡˈee sikˈio lˈako, ˈuɟe ˌuniokˈoe harˈaka; ˈuwe kwˈaŋɡu mwˈamba wa kˌimbilˈio, ŋɡˈome imˈara ja kˌuniokˈoa.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, ˌunioŋɡˈoze na kˌunilˈinda kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˌuniepˈuʃe na mtˈeɡo nˌiliˌoteɡˈewa, maˈana wˌewe ndˈiwe kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinaˌikabˈiði rˈoho jˈaŋɡu mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, ˌunikombˈoe ˈee bwˈana, ulˈije mˈuŋɡu wa kwˈeli.|0
nˌinawˌatʃukˈia wˈale wˌanaˌoŋɡaŋɡanˈia sanˈamu batˈili; mˌimi nˌinamtˌumaˈini bwˈana.|0
nˌitafˌurahˈia na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia upˈendo wˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌuliˈona matˈeso jˈaŋɡu na ˌuliɟˈua mˌaumˈivu ja nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌukunˌikabˈiði kwa adˈui jˈaŋɡu bˌali ˌumeiwˈeka miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu mahˈali pˈeɲe nafˈasi.|0
ˈee bwˈana ˌunihˌurumˈie, kwa kˌuwa nˈiko kwˈeɲe ʃˈida; mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌanafifˈia kwa huzˈuni, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu na mwˈili wˈaŋɡu kwa sˌikitˈiko.|0
maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌameðˌoofˈika kwa maɟˈonzi, nˈaam, miˈaka jˈaŋɡu kwa kulˈia kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali; ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌinaˈiʃa kwa aɟˈili ja matˈeso, na mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌinatʃakˈaa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote, nˌimeðˌaraulˈiwa kabˈisa na ɟirˈani zˈaŋɡu, hˌata kwa rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu nˌimekˈuwa tˈiʃo, wˈale wˌanionˈao bˌarabarˈani hˌunikimbˈia.|0
nˌimesˌahaulˈika mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa, nˌimekˈuwa kˌama tʃˈombo tʃa mfiɲˈanzi kˌilitʃˌovuɲɟˈika.|0
kwa maˈana nˌimesikˈia manˈeno nˌilijˌosiŋɡizˈiwa na wˈeŋɡi; vitˈiʃo vˈiko pˈande zˈote; kwa kˌuwa wˌamefˈaɲa mˌaʃaˈuri ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na kˈula ɲɟˈama kˌuniˈua.|0
lakˈini mˌimi nˌinakˌutumaˈini wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, ˈee bwˈana; nˌimesˈema, wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈiku za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu zˈiko mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, ˌuniokˈoe mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈaŋɡu na wˈale wˌanifˌuatiˈao.|0
mwˌaŋɡazˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˈuso wˈako, ˌuniokˈoe kwa aɟˈili ja upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma.|0
ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaibˈike, ˈee bwˈana, kwa maˈana nˌimekˌulilˈia wˈewe, bˌali waˈovu wˌaaibˈiʃwe na kˌuɲamazˈiʃwa kuzˈimu.|0
midˈomo jˈao ˌisemˈajo uˈoŋɡo na ˌiɲamazˈiʃwe, kwa maˈana kwa kibˈuri na ðarˈau wˌao husˈema kwa mˌaɟivˈuno ðˈidi ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo m̩kˈuu wˈema wˈako, ˌuliˌowawekˈea akˈiba wˌakutʃˈao, ambˈao huwˈapa wˈale wˌakukˌimbiliˈao matʃˈoni pa wˈatu.|0
ˌunawˌahifˈaði katˌika uvˈuli wa uwˈepo wˈako kˌutokˈana na hˈila za wˌanadˈamu; katˌika makˈao jˈako hˌuwawˈeka salˈama kˌutokˈana na ndˈimi za maʃtˈaka.|0
ˌatukˈuzwe bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ˌamenˌioɲˈeʃa upˈendo wˌake wa aɟˈabu nˌilipokˈuwa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌoziŋɡˈirwa.|0
katˌika hˈofu jˈaŋɡu nˌilisˈema, nˌimekˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na mˈatʃo jˈako! hˌata hˈivjo ˌulisikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌukanˌihurumˈia nˌilipˌokuˈita ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
mpendˈeni bwˈana nˈiɲi wˌatakatˈifu wˌake wˈote! bwˈana hˌuwahifˈaði wˌaaminˈifu, lakˈini wˌeɲe kibˈuri hˌuwalipˈiza kˌikamilˈifu.|0
kuwˈeni hodˈari na mɟˈipe mˈojo, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaomtˌumaˈini bwˈana.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje ˌamesˌamehˈewa makˈosa jˈake, ambˈaje ðˈambi zˌake zˌimefunˈikwa.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ambˈaje bwˈana hˌamhesabˈii ðˈambi, na ambˈaje rohˈoni mwˈake hˈamna ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
nˌilipˌoɲamˈaza, mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌilitʃakˈaa kwa kulˈia kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
usˈiku na mtʃˈana mkˈono wˈako ˌulinˌilemˈea, ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌiliɲˈoɲua kˌama vˈile katˌika ɟˈoto la kˌiaŋɡˈazi.|0
kˈiʃa nˌilikˌuɟulˈiʃa ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu wˈala sˌikufˈitʃa uˈovu wˈaŋɡu. nˌilisˈema, nˌitauŋɡˈama makˈosa jˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana. ndˈipo ˌulipˌonisamˈehe hatˈia ja ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌewe ndˈiwe mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa, ˌutanˌiepˈuʃa na taˈabu na kˌunizuŋɡˈuka kwa ɲˈimbo za wokˈovu.|0
nˌitakˌufundˈiʃa na kˌukuoɲˈeʃa ɲɟˈia ˌutakˌajoˌiendˈea; nˌitakˌuʃaˈuri na kˌukuˌaŋɡalˈia.|0
usˈiwe kˌama farˈasi ˌau ɲˈumbu wasˈio na akˈili, ambˈao ni lazˈima wˌaoŋɡˈozwe kwa liɟˈamu na hatˈamu la sˈivjo hˌawatˌakukˌaribˈia.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˈana taˈabu ɲˈiŋɡi, bˌali upˈendo usˈio na kikˈomo wa bwˈana ˌunamzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌemtumaˈini.|0
ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni katˌika bwˈana na mfurˈahi, ˈeɲi wˌeɲe hˈaki! imbˈeni, ɲˈote m̩lˈio waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana kwa furˈaha, ˈeɲi wˌeɲe hˈaki; kusˈifu kˌunawapˈasa waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana kwa kinˈubi, mwˌimbiˈeni sˈifa kwa zˈeze la ɲˈuzi kˈumi.|0
maˈana nˈeno la bwˈana ni hˈaki na kwˈeli, ni mwˌaminˈifu kwa jˈote ˌatendˈajo.|0
bwˈana hupˈenda ˌuadilˈifu na hˈaki; dunˈia ˌimeɟˈaa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma.|0
kwa nˈeno la bwˈana mbˈiŋɡu zˌiliˈumbwa, ɟˈeʃi lˈao la aŋɡˈani kwa pˈumzi ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
ˌamejˌakusˈaɲa mˈaɟi ja bahˈari kˌama kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu; vilˈindi vja bahˈari ˌameviwˈeka katˌika ɣˈala.|0
dunˈia jˈote na ˌimwoɡˈope bwˈana, wˈatu wˈote wa dunˈia wˈamtʃe.|0
kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌalisˈema, na ikˈawa, ˌaliamˈuru na ˌikasimˈama imˈara.|0
bwˈana hˌuzuˈia mipˈaŋɡo ja mˌataˈifa, hupˈiŋɡa mˌakusˈudi ja mˌataˈifa.|0
lakˈini mipˈaŋɡo ja bwˈana ˌinasimˈama imˈara milˈele, mˌakusˈudi ja mˈojo wˌake kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
hˈeri taˈifa ambˈalo bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wˈao, wˈatu ambˈao ˌaliwˌatʃaɡˈua kˌuwa urˈiθi wˈake.|0
kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni bwˈana hˌutazˈama tʃˈini na kˌuwaˈona wˌanadˈamu wˈote.|0
kutˈoka maskˈani mwˈake hˌuwaˌaŋɡalˈia wˈote wˌakaˈao dˌuniˈani.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje huˈumba miˈojo jˈao wˈote, ambˈaje hˌuaŋɡalˈia kˈila kˈitu wˌanatʃˌokitˈenda.|0
hakˈuna mfˈalme ˌaokokˈaje kwa ukˈubwa wa ɟˈeʃi lˈake; hakˈuna ʃuɟˈaa ˌaokokˈaje kwa wˈiŋɡi wa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake.|0
farˈasi ni tˌumaˈini la bˈure kwa wokˈovu, lˈitʃa ja ŋɡˈuvu zˌake ɲˈiŋɡi, hawˈezi kˌuokˈoa.|0
lakˈini mˈatʃo ja bwˈana jˈako kwa wˈale wamtʃˈao, kwa wˈale tˌumaˈini lˈao lˈiko katˌika upˈendo wˌake usˈio na kikˈomo.|0
ˌili ˌawaokˈoe na maˈuti, na kˌuwahifˈaði wakˈati wa ɲɟˈaa.|0
sˌisi tˌunamŋɡoɟˈea bwˈana kwa mˌatumaˈini, jˌeje ni msaˈada wˈetu na ŋɡˈao jˈetu.|0
miˈojo jˈetu hˌumʃaŋɡilˈia, kwa maˈana tˌunalˌitumˌainˈia ɟˈina lˈake tˌakatˈifu.|0
upˈendo wˈako usˈio na mwˈiʃo ukˈae ɟˈuu jˈetu, ˈee bwˈana, tˌunapˌoliwˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈetu kwˈako.|0
nˌitamtukˈuza bwˈana ɲakˈati zˈote, sˈifa zˌake zˌitakˈuwa mˌidomˈoni mwˈaŋɡu sˈiku zˈote.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌitaɟisˈifu katˌika bwˈana, wˌaliˌoonˈewa wˌatasikˈia na wˌafurˈahi.|0
mtˌukuzˈeni bwˈana pamˈoɟa nˈami, nˈaam, na tˌulitukˈuze ɟˈina lˈake pamˈoɟa.|0
nˌilimtafˈuta bwˈana nˌaje ˌakaniɟˈibu, ˌakanˌiokˈoa kwˈeɲe hˈofu zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
wˈale wˌamtazamˈao hutˈiwa nˈuru, ɲˈuso zˈao hˌazifunˈikwi na aˈibu kˈamwe.|0
maskˈini hˈuju ˌalimwˈita bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakamsikˈia, ˌakamwokˈoa katˌika taˈabu zˌake zˈote.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana hufˈaɲa kitˈuo ˌakiwˌazuŋɡˈuka wˈale wamtʃˈao, nˌaje hˌuwaokˈoa.|0
oɲɟˈeni mwˈone kwˌamba bwˈana ni mwˈema, hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanajˌemkimbilˈia.|0
mtʃˈeni bwˈana ˈeɲi wˌatakatˈifu wˈake, kwa maˈana wˈale wamtʃˈao hˌawapˌuŋɡukˈiwi na tʃotʃˈote.|0
wˈana sˈimba wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu hˌutindikˈiwa na kuˈona ɲɟˈaa, bˌali wˈale wˌamtafutˈao bwˈana hˌawatakˈosa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo tʃˈema.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, watˈoto wˈaŋɡu, mnˌisikilˈize, nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa kˈumtʃa bwˈana.|0
jejˈote kˈati jˈenu ˌanajepˈenda uzˈima na kˌutamˈani kˌuziˈona sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi ɲɟˈema.|0
bˌasi ˌauzuˈie ulˈimi wˌake na mabˈaja, na midˈomo jˌake kˌutokˈana na kusˈema uˈoŋɡo.|0
aˈatʃe uˈovu, atˈende mˈema, ˌaitafˈute amˈani na kˌuifˌuatilˈia.|0
mˈatʃo ja bwˈana hˌuwaˌelekˈea wˌeɲe hˈaki, na mˌasikˈio jˌake jˈako makˈini kˌusikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈao.|0
ˈuso wa bwˈana ˈuko kiɲˈume na wˌatendˈao maˈovu, ˌili kufˈuta kˌumbukˈumbu lˈao dˌuniˈani.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki hulˈia, nˌaje bwˈana hˌuwasikˈia, hˌuwaokˈoa katˌika taˈabu zˈao zˈote.|0
bwˈana ju karˈibu na wˌaliˌovuɲɟˈika mˈojo, na hˌuwaokˈoa wˌaliˌopondˈeka rˈoho.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˈana matˈeso mˈeŋɡi, lakˈini bwˈana hˌumwokˈoa nˈajo jˈote.|0
hˌuhifˈaði mifˈupa jˌake jˈote, hˌata mmˈoɟa hˌautˌavuɲɟˈika.|0
ubˈaja ˌutamuˈua ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, nˌao adˈui za mwˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatahˌukumˈiwa.|0
bwˈana hˌuwakombˈoa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, jejˈote ˌanajˌemkimbilˈia jˌeje hˌatahˌukumˈiwa kˈamwe.|0
ˈee bwˈana, piŋɡˈana na wˈale wˌanaˌopiŋɡˈana nˈami, ˌupiɡˈane na hˈao wˌanaˌopiɡˈana nˈami.|0
tʃukˈua ŋɡˈao na kiɡˈao. inˈuka ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
inˈua mkˈuki wˈako na fˈumo lˈako ðˈidi ja hˈao wˌanaˌonifˌuatˈia. ˌiambˈie nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, mˌimi ni wokˈovu wˈako.|0
wˌafeðehˈeʃwe na wˌaaibˈiʃwe wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu. wˌanaofˈaɲa ʃaˈuri kˌuniˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌarudˈiʃwe ɲˈuma kwa hˈofu.|0
wˈawe kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo na upˈepo, mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakiwˌafukˈuza.|0
ɲɟˈia jˈao na ˈiwe ɡˈiza na ja ˌutelˈezi, mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakiwˌafuˌatilˈia.|0
kwa vˈile wˌalinˌifitʃˈia wˈavu wˌao bˌila sabˈabu, na bˌila sabˈabu wˌamenˌitʃimbˈia ʃˈimo.|0
maˈafa na jˌawapˈate ɣafˈula: wˈavu wˌaliˌonifitʃˈia na ˌuwatˈeɡe weɲˈewe, na wˌaaŋɡˈuke katˌika ʃˈimo hˈilo, kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo jˈao.|0
ndˈipo nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika bwˈana na kˌuufˌurahˈia wokˈovu wˈake.|0
mˌaʃahˈidi wˌakatˈili wˌanainˈuka, wˌananˌiulˈiza mˈambo nˌisijˌojaɟˈua.|0
wˌananilˈipa bˈaja kwa ɟˈema na kˌuiˈatʃa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ukˈiwa.|0
lakˈini wˌalipokˈuwa waɡˈoɲɟua, nˌilivˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na nˌikaɟˌiɲeɲekˈeʃa kwa kufˈuŋɡa. maˈombi jˈaŋɡu jˌalipˌonirudˈia bˌila kˌuɟibˈiwa.|0
nˌiliˌendelˈea kˌuombolˈeza kˌama vˈile wˌao ni rafˈiki ˌau ndˈuɡu. nˌiliˌinamˈiʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˈini kwa huzˈuni kˌama nˌinajˌemwombˌolezˈea mˈama jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˌilipˌoɟikwˈaa, wˌalikˌusaɲˈika kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe; wˌaʃambˌuliˈaɟi wˌaliɟˌikusˈaɲa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu bˌila mˌimi kuɟˈua. wˌalinˌisiŋɡizˈia pasˈipo kukˈoma.|0
kˌama wˈatu wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu, wˌamenˌiðihˈaki, wˌamenˌisaɡˈia mˈeno.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌutatazˈama mpˈaka lˈini? nˌiokˈoe maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao, uhˈai wˈaŋɡu wa θamˈani kˌutokˈana na sˈimba hˈawa.|0
nˌami nˌitakˌuʃukˈuru mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa, nˌitakusˈifu kˌatikˈati ja wˈatu wˈeŋɡi.|0
ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˈale wˌanaˌonisimˈaŋɡa, wˈale ambˈao ni adˈui zˈaŋɡu bˌila sabˈabu; ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˈale ambˈao ni adˈui zˈaŋɡu bˌila sabˈabu wˌakoɲˈeze ɟˈitʃo kwa hˈila.|0
hˌawazuŋɡˈumzi kwa amˈani, bˌali wˌanatˈuŋɡa maʃtˈaka ja uˈoŋɡo ðˈidi ja wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi kwa ˌutulˈivu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌunifˌumbulˈia vˈiɲua vjˈao wˌakisˈema, ˈaha! ˈaha! kwa mˈatʃo jˈetu weɲˈewe tˌumeliˈona.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌumeˈona hˈili, usˈiwe kˈimja. usˈiwe mbˈali nˈami, ˈee bwˈana.|0
ˈamka, inˈuka ˌunitetˈee! ˌunipˌiɡanˈie mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu na bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌihukˈumu kwa hˈaki jˈako, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, sˌawasˈawa na hˈaki jˈako; ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˌakusimˈaŋɡe.|0
ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˌafikˈiri, ˈaha, hˈili ndˈilo tˌulilotˈaka! ˌau wasˈeme, tˌumemmˈeza.|0
wˈote wˌanaˌofurahˈia ðˈiki jˈaŋɡu wˌaaibˈiʃwe na wˌatʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈiwe; hˈao wˌanaˌoɟiinˈua ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu wavˈikwe aˈibu na ðarˈau.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌofurahˈia hukˈumu jˈaŋɡu ja hˈaki wapˈiɡe kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha; hˈebu wasˈeme sˈiku zˈote, bwˈana ˌatukˈuzwe, ambˈaje ˌamefˌurahˈia mˌafanikˈio ja mtumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌutanˈena hˈaki jˈako na sˈifa zˈako mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
kˈuna nˈeno mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kuhˈusu hˈali ja ðˈambi ja mwˈovu. hakˈuna hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe hˌuɟisˈifu ˈm̩no hˌata hawˈezi kˌuɡundˈua ˌau kˌuitʃukˈia ðˈambi jˈake.|0
manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake ni maˈovu na ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, ˌameˈatʃa kˌuwa mwˌeɲe hekˈima na kutˈenda mˈema.|0
hˌata kˌitandˈani mwˈake hupˈaŋɡa hˈila m̩bˈaja, hˌuɟitˈia katˌika ɲɟˈia ja ðˈambi na hˌakatˈai lilˈilo bˈaja.|0
upˈendo wˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunafˈika hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌuaminˈifu wˈako hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈaŋɡa.|0
hˈaki jˈako ni kˌama milˈima mikˈubwa, hukˈumu zˈako ni kˌama kilˈindi kikˈuu. ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe hˌuwahifˈaði mwˌanadˈamu na mɲˈama.|0
wˌanaɟˌifurahˈiʃa katˌika wˈiŋɡi ɲumbˈani mwˈako, nˌawe ˌutawˌaɲuˈeʃa katˌika ˈm̩to wa furˈaha zˈako.|0
kˌuwa pamˈoɟa nˌawe ni kiɟˈito tʃa uzˈima, katˌika nˈuru jˈako twaˈona nˈuru.|0
dumˈiʃa upˈendo wˈako kwa wˈale wˌanaˌokuɟˈua wˈewe, hˈaki jˈako kwa wˈale walˈio waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
m̩ɡˈuu wa mwˌeɲe kibˈuri usˈiɟe ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, wˈala mkˈono wa mwˈovu ˌusinˌifukˈuze.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia ɟˈinsi watˈenda mabˈaja wˌalivjˌoaŋɡˈuka: wˌametˈupwa tʃˈini, hˌawawˈezi kˌuinˈuka.|0
ˌusisumbˈuke kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatendˈao maˈovu, wˈala ˌusiwˌaonˈee wˈivu wˌatendˈao mabˈaja.|0
kwa maˈana kˌama maɟˈani wˌataɲaˈuka mˈara, kˌama mimˈea ja kiɟˈani wˌatakˈufa mˈara.|0
mtˌumaˈini bwˈana na utˈende jalˈijo mˈema; kˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌukafˌurahˈie malˈiʃo salˈama.|0
ɟˌifurahˈiʃe katˌika bwˈana nˌaje ˌatakˈupa hˈaɟa za mˈojo wˈako.|0
mkabˈiði bwˈana ɲɟˈia jˈako, mtˌumaˈini jˈeje, nˌaje ˌatatˈenda hˈili.|0
tulˈia mbˈele za bwˈana na ˌumŋɡoɟˈee kwa ˌuvumilˈivu; ˌusisumbˈuke wˈatu wˌanapˌofanikˈiwa katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao, wˌanapˌotekelˈeza mipˈaŋɡo jˈao miˈovu.|0
epˈuka hasˈira na uˈatʃe ɣaðˈabu, ˌusihˌaŋɡaˈike: ˌitakˌuoŋɡˈoza tu kutˈenda uˈovu.|0
kwa maˈana waˈovu wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali, bˌali wˈale wˌanaˌomtumaˈini bwˈana wˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bˈado kitˈambo kidˈoɡo, nˌao waˈovu hˌawatˌaonekˈana, iŋɡˈawa ˌutawˌatafˈuta, hˌawatˌaonekˈana.|0
bˌali wˌaɲeɲekˈevu wˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi na wˌafurahˈie amˈani tˈele.|0
waˈovu hˈula ɲɟˈama ðˈidi ja wˌeɲe hˈaki na kˌuwasaɡˈia mˈeno.|0
bˌali bwˈana hˌuwatʃˈeka waˈovu, kwa sabˈabu ˌanaɟˈua sˈiku jˈao ˌinakˈuɟa.|0
waˈovu hˌutʃomˈoa upˈaŋɡa na kupˈinda upˈinde, ˌili wˌawaaŋɡˈuʃe maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi, kˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa wˈale ambˈao ɲɟˈia zˈao ni ɲˈofu.|0
lakˈini pˈaŋɡa zˈao zˌitatʃˈoma miˈojo jˈao weɲˈewe, na pˈinde zˈao zˌitavˈuɲɟua.|0
bˈora kidˈoɡo walˈitʃo nˈatʃo wˌeɲe hˈaki kulˈiko wˈiŋɡi wa mˈali wa waˈovu wˈeŋɡi.|0
kwa maˈana ŋɡˈuvu za waˈovu zˌitavˈuɲɟua, lakˈini bwˈana hˌumteɡemˈeza mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
bwˈana ˌanazˌifahˈamu sˈiku za waɲˈofu, na urˈiθi wˌao ˌutadˈumu milˈele.|0
sˈiku za maˈafa hˌawatˌaɲaˈuka, sˈiku za ɲɟˈaa wˌatafˌurahˈia wˈiŋɡi wa vˈitu.|0
lakˈini waˈovu wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia: adˈui za bwˈana wˌatakˈuwa kˌama uzˈuri wa maʃˈamba, wˌatatowˈeka, wˌatatowˈeka kˌama mˈoʃi.|0
waˈovu hukˈopa na hˌawalˈipi, bˌali wˌeɲe hˈaki hutˈoa kwa ˌukarˈimu.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌobarikˈiwa na bwˈana wˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi, bˌali wˈale ˌanaˌowalaˈani wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌakipendˈezwa na ɲɟˈia ja ˈm̩tu, jˌeje hˌuimarˈiʃa hatˈua zˈake.|0
ˌaɟapˌoɟikwˈaa, hˌataaŋɡˈuka, kwa maˈana bwˈana hˌumteɡemˈeza kwa mkˈono wˈake.|0
nˌilikˈuwa kiɟˈana na sˈasa ni m̩zˈee, lakˈini sˌiɟaˈona kˈamwe wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌameˈatʃwa ˌau watˈoto wˌao wˌakiˌombaˈomba tʃakˈula.|0
wakˈati wˈote ni wˌakarˈimu na hˌukopˈeʃa bˌila maʃˈarti. watˈoto wˌao wˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
ˈatʃa ubˈaja na utˈende wˈema, nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi milˈele.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hˌuwapˈenda wˌeɲe hˈaki nˌaje hˌatawaˈatʃa wˌaaminˈifu wˈake. wˌatalˈindwa milˈele, lakˈini uzˈao wa waˈovu ˌutakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi, na kuˈiʃi hˈumo milˈele.|0
kˈiɲua tʃa mwˌeɲe hˈaki hutˈamka hekˈima, nˌao ulˈimi wˌake hˌuzuŋɡˈumza lilˈilo hˈaki.|0
ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˌake ˈimo mojˈoni mwˈake; ɲˈajo zˌake hˌazitelˈezi.|0
wˈatu waˈovu hˌuvizˈia wˌeɲe hˈaki, wˌakitafˈuta kˌuwaˈua.|0
lakˈini bwˈana hˌatawaˈatʃa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao wˈala hˌatawaˈatʃa wˌahukumˈiwe kˌuwa wakˈosa wˌanapˌoʃtakˈiwa.|0
mŋɡoɟˈee bwˈana, na ˌuiʃˈike ɲɟˈia jˈake. nˌaje ˌatakˌutukˈuza ˌuirˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi, waˈovu wˌatakˌapokˌatilˈiwa mbˈali, ˌutaliˈona hˈilo.|0
nˌimemwˈona ˈm̩tu mwˈovu na mkatˈili ˌakistˈawi kˌama mwerˈezi wa lˌebanˈoni.|0
lakˈini ˌalitowˈeka mˈara na hˌakuˌonekˈana, iŋɡˈawa nˌilimtafˈuta, hˌakupˌatikˈana.|0
wˌatafakˈari wˈatu wasˈio na hatˈia, wˌatʃuŋɡˈuze wˈatu wˌakamilˈifu, kˈuna mˌafanikˈio kwa ˈm̩tu ˌapendˈaje amˈani.|0
lakˈini watˈenda ðˈambi wˈote wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa, mˌafanikˈio jˈao jˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
wokˈovu wa wˌeɲe hˈaki hutˈoka kwa bwˈana, jˌeje ni ŋɡˈome jˈao wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
bwˈana hˌuwasˌaidˈia na kˌuwaokˈoa, hˌuwaokˈoa kutˈoka kwa waˈovu na kˌuwahifˈaði, kwa maˈana wˌanamkˌimbilˈia.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusinˌikemˈee katˌika hasˈira jˈako, wˈala kˌuniaðˈibu katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa miʃˈale jˈako ˌimenitʃˈoma, na mkˈono wˈako ˌumenˌiʃukˈia.|0
hakˈuna ˈafja mwilˈini mwˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu ja ɣaðˈabu jˈako, mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu haˈina uzˈima kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu.|0
maˈovu jˈaŋɡu jˌamenˌifunˈika kˌama mzˈiɡo ˌusiˌotʃukulˈika.|0
mˌaɟerˈaha jˈaŋɡu jˌameˈoza na jˌananˈuka, kwa sabˈabu ja ˌupumbˈavu wa ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimeˌinamˈiʃwa tʃˈini na kuʃˈuʃwa sˈana, mtʃˈana kˈutwa nˌazuŋɡˈuka nˌikiˌombolˈeza.|0
viˈuno vjˈaŋɡu vˌimeɟˈaa mˌaumˈivu jˌauŋɡuzˈajo, hakˈuna ˈafja mwilˈini mwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimeðˌoofˈika na kupˈondwa kabˈisa, nˌasononˈeka kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈuu ja mojˈoni.|0
ˈee bwˈana, jˈote nˌinajˌojaonˈea ʃaˈuku jˈako wˈazi mbˈele zˈako, kˌutamˈani kwˈaŋɡu sˈana hˌakufitʃˈiki mbˈele zˈako.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunapˌiɡapˈiɡa, ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌimenˌiiʃˈia; hˌata mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌametˈiwa ɡˈiza.|0
rafˈiki na wenzˈaŋɡu wˌananikwˈepa kwa sabˈabu ja mˌaɟerˈaha jˈaŋɡu; mˌaɟirˈani zˈaŋɡu wˌanakˈaa mbˈali nˈami.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu wˌanatˈeɡa mitˈeɡo jˈao, wˈale ambˈao wˌaŋɡetˈaka kˌuniðˈuru hˌuoŋɡˈea ɟˌuːja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈaŋɡu; hufˈaɲa ʃaˈuri la hˈila mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
mˌimi ni kˌama ˈm̩tu kizˈiwi, ˌasijewˈeza kˌusikˈia, ni kˌama bˈubu, ˌasijewˈeza kˌufuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
nˌimekˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌasijˌesikˈia, ambˈaje kˈiɲua tʃˈake hˌakiwˈezi kutˈoa ɟˈibu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakˌuŋɡoɟˈea wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌutaɟˈibu.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌilisˈema, ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˌafurahˈie, wˈala wˌasiɟˌitukˈuze ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu m̩ɡˈuu wˈaŋɡu ˌunapˌotelˈeza.|0
kwa maˈana nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuaŋɡˈuka, na mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu jˌananˌiandˈama sˈiku zˈote.|0
nˌauŋɡˈama uˈovu wˈaŋɡu, nˌinatˌaabˈiʃwa na ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈeŋɡi ni wˈale ambˈao ni adˈui zˈaŋɡu hodˈari, wˈale wˌanaˌonitʃukˈia bˌila sabˈabu ni wˈeŋɡi.|0
wˌanaolˈipa maˈovu kwa wˈema wˈaŋɡu hˌunisˌiŋɡizˈia nˌinapˌofuˈata lilˈilo ɟˈema.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusiniˈatʃe, usˈiwe mbˈali nˈami, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu, ˈuɟe upˈesi kˌunisˌaidˈia.|0
nˌilisˈema, nˌitazˌiaŋɡalˈia ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na kˌuuzuˈia ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu usˈiɟe ˌukatˈenda ðˈambi; nˌitawˈeka liɟˈamu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu wakˈati wˈote waˈovu wˌanapokˈuwa karˈibu nˈami.|0
lakˈini nˌilipˌoɲamˈaza kˈimja na kˌutulˈia, hˌata pasˈipo kusˈema lolˈote ɟˈema, utʃˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˌoŋɡezˈeka.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌulipˈata mˈoto ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, nˌilipˌotafakˈari, mˈoto ˌuliwˈaka, ndˈipo nˌikasˈema kwa ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌiɟulˈiʃe mwˈiʃo wa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu na hesˈabu ja sˈiku zˈaŋɡu; nˌiɟalˈie kuɟˈua ɟˈinsi maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌanavjopˈita upˈesi.|0
ˌumefˈaɲa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu mafˈupi kˌama pˈumzi; mˈuda wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈiʃi ni kˌama haˈuna θamˈani kwˈako. maˈiʃa ja kˈila mwˌanadˈamu ni kˌama pˈumzi.|0
hakˈika kˈila bˌinadˈamu ni kˌama ɲɟˈozi ˌaendˈapo hˈuku na hˌuko: hˌuɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃa na mˈeŋɡi lakˈini ni ˌubatˈili; ˌanakusˈaɲa mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi, wˈala haɟˈui ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeˌifaˈidi.|0
lakˈini sˈasa bwˈana, nˌitafˈute nˈini? tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu ni kwˈako.|0
nˌiokˈoe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe makˈosa jˈaŋɡu jˈote, ˌusinifˈaɲe kˌuwa ðihˈaka ja wˌapumbˈavu.|0
nˌiliɲamˈaza kˈimja, sˌikufumbˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌulijetˈenda hˈili.|0
nˌiondolˈee mɟelˈedi wˈako, nˌimeʃˈindwa kwa mapˈiɡo ja mkˈono wˈako.|0
ˌunakemˈea na kˌuaðˈibu wˌanadˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao; ˌunaharˈibu ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao kˌama nˈondo ˌaharibˈuvjo: kˈila mwˌanadˈamu ni kˌama pˈumzi tˈu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikˈie maˈombi jˈaŋɡu, ˌusikˈie kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌunisˌaidˈie, usˈiwe kizˈiwi kwa kulˈia kwˈaŋɡu. kwˈani mˌimi nˌinaˈiʃi na wˌewe kˌama mɡˈeni, kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
tazˈama mbˈali nˈami, ˌili niwˈeze kˌufurˈahi tˈena kˈabla sˌiɟaondˈoka na nˌisiwˈepo tˈena.|0
nˌilimŋɡˈoɟa bwˈana kwa sabˈuri, nˌaje ˌakanˌiinamˈia, ˌakasikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakanˌipandˈiʃa kutˈoka ʃˈimo la ˌuharibˈifu, kutˈoka matˈope na ˌutelˈezi; ˌakaiwˈeka miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja mwˈamba na kunˈipa mahˈali imˈara pa kˌusimˈama.|0
ˌakawˈeka wˈimbo ˈm̩pja kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu, wˈimbo wa sˈifa kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. wˈeŋɡi wˌataˈona na kˌuoɡˈopa na kuwˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌamfaɲˈaje bwˈana kˌuwa tˌumaˈini lˈake, ˌasijˌewatˌeɡemˈea wˌeɲe kibˈuri, wˈale wˌeɲe kˌuɡeukˈia miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌumefˈaɲa mˈambo mˈeŋɡi ja aɟˈabu. mˈambo ˌulijopˈaŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈetu hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌukuhˌesabˈia; kˌama nˌiŋɡesˈema na kˌujaˌelezˈea, jˌaŋɡekˈuwa mˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no kˌujaˌelezˈea.|0
ðabˈihu na sadˈaka hˌukuvitˈaka, lakˈini ˌumefuŋɡˈua mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu; sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za ðˈambi hˌukuzˌihitˈaɟi.|0
ndˈipo nˌiliposˈema, mˌimi hˈapa, nˌimekˈuɟa: ˌimeandˈikwa kˌunihˈusu katˌika kitˈabu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌatamˈani kˌujafˈaɲa mapˈenzi jˈako; ʃerˈia jˈako ˈiko ndˈani ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimehubˈiri hˈaki katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa, sˌikufˈuŋɡa mdˈomo wˈaŋɡu, ˈee bwˈana, kˌama ˌuɟuˈavjo.|0
sˌikufˈitʃa hˈaki jˈako mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu; nˌinasˈema ɟˌuːja ˌuaminˈifu wˈako na wokˈovu wˈako. sˌikufˈitʃa upˈendo wˈako na kwˈeli jˈako mbˈele ja kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusizˌuilˈie hurˈuma zˈako, upˈendo wˈako na kwˈeli jˈako daˈima vˌinilˈinde.|0
