kwa maˈana taˈabu zisˈizo na hesˈabu zˌimenˌizuŋɡˈuka, ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu zˌimenˌikamˈata, hˌata nˌisiwˈeze kuˈona. zˌimekˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi kulˈiko ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu, nˌao mˈojo ˌunazimˈia ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˈuwe rˈaði kˌuniokˈoa; ˈee bwˈana, ɲɟˈoo hˈima ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
wˈote wˌanaˌotafˈuta kˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu, wˌaaibˈiʃwe na kˌufaðaˈiʃwa; wˈote wˌanaˌotamˈani kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa kwˈaŋɡu, wˌarudˈiʃwe ɲˈuma kwa aˈibu.|0
wˈale wˌaniˌambiˈao, ˈaha! ˈaha! wˌafaðaˈiʃwe na ˈiwe aˈibu jˈao.|0
lakˈini wˈote wˌakutˌafutˈao wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie na kˌukufˌurahˈia, wˈale wˌapendˈao wokˈovu wˈako sˈiku zˈote wasˈeme, bwˈana ˌatukˈuzwe.|0
lakˈini bˈado mˌimi ni maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi; bwˈana na ˌanifˌikirˈie. wˌewe ndˈiwe msaˈada wˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu; ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌusikawˈie.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanajemɟˈali mɲˈoŋɡe, bwˈana ˌatamwokˈoa wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
bwˈana ˌatamlˈinda na kˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈake, ˌatambarˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na hˌatamwˈatʃa katˌika tamˈaa ja adˈui zˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌatamtˌeɡemˈeza awˈapo mɡˈoɲɟua kˌitandˈani, ˌatamwinˈua kutˈoka kˌitandˈani mwˈake.|0
nˌilisˈema, ˈee bwˈana nˌihurumˈie, nipˈoɲe, maˈana nˌimekutˈenda ðˈambi wˈewe.|0
adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanasˈema kwa hˈila, lˈini ˌatakˈufa, na ɟˈina lˈake lˌitokomˈee kabˈisa.|0
kˈila ˌanapokˈuɟa ˈm̩tu kˌunitazˈama, hˌuzuŋɡˈumza uˈoŋɡo, hˈuku mˈojo wˌake hˌukusˈaɲa mˌasiŋɡizˈio; kˈiʃa hˌuondˈoka na kˌujasambˈaza hˈuku na hˌuko.|0
adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote hˌunoŋɡˌonezˈana ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, hˈao hˌuniwazˈia mabˈaja sˈana, wˌakisˈema.|0
uɡˈoɲɟua m̩bˈaja sˈana ˌumempˈata, kˈamwe hˌatainˈuka tˈena kˌitandˈani mwˈake.|0
hˌata rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu wa karˈibu nˌilijˌemwamˈini, jˈule ˌalijekˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu ˌamenˌiinulˈia kˌisiɡˈino tʃˈake.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌihurumˈie, ˌukanˌiinˈue tˈena, ˌili niwˈeze kˌuwalipˈiza kisˈasi.|0
naɟˈua kwˌamba wˌapendˈezwa nˈami, kwa kˌuwa adˈui jˈaŋɡu hˌaniʃˈindi.|0
katˌika ˌuadilˈifu wˈaŋɡu ˌunanˌiteɡemˈeza na kˌuniwˈeka kwˈeɲe uwˈepo wˈako milˈele.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ʃˈu milˈele na hˌata milˈele. ˈamen na ˈamen.|0
kˌama vˈile ajˈala ˌaoneˈavjo ʃaˈuku viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi, ndˈivjo nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌikuˌoneˈavjo ʃaˈuku, ˈee mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinamwonˈea mˈuŋɡu kˈiu, mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai. ni lˈini nˌitawˈeza kwˈenda kˌukutˈana na mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini ˌunasˌononˈeka? kwa nˈini ˌunafˌaðaˈika hˈivjo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu? wˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈako kwa mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu bˈado nˌitamsˈifu, mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu na.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinasˌononˈeka ndˈani jˈaŋɡu; kwa hˈijo nˌitakˌukumbˈuka kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja jordˈani, katˌika vilˈele vja hermˈoni, kutˈoka mlˈima mizˈari.|0
kilˈindi huˈita kilˈindi, katˌika ŋɡurˈumo za mˌaporomˈoko ja mˈaɟi jˈako; mawˈimbi jˈako jˈote pamˈoɟa na viwˈimbi vˌimepˈita ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
mtʃˈana bwˈana hˌuelekˈeza upˈendo wˈake, usˈiku wˈimbo wˌake ˈuko nˈami: maˈombi kwa mˈuŋɡu wa uzˈima wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinamwambˈia mˈuŋɡu mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini ˌumenˌisahˈau? kwa nˈini nˌiendelˈee kˌuombolˈeza, nikˈiwa nˌimeonˈewa na adˈui.|0
mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌinatesˈeka kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanapˌoniðihˈaki, wˌakinˌiambˈia mtʃˈana kˈutwa, jˈuko wˈapi mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini ˌunasˌononˈeka? kwa nˈini ˌunafˌaðaˈika hˈivjo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu? wˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈako kwa mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu bˈado nˌitamsˈifu, mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu ˌunihukˈumu, nˌitetˈee ðˈidi ja taˈifa lˌisilˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu, nˌiokˈoe na wˈatu wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu na waˈovu.|0
wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu. kwa nˈini ˌumenˌikatˈaa? kwa nˈini nˌiendelˈee kˌuombolˈeza, nikˈiwa nˌimeonˈewa na adˈui.|0
tˈuma hˈima nˈuru jˈako na kwˈeli jˈako na vˌinioŋɡˈoze; vˌinilˈete mpˈaka mlˈima wˈako mtˌakatˈifu, mpˈaka mahˈali ˌunapoˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakwˈenda mˌaðabahˈuni pa mˈuŋɡu, kwa mˈuŋɡu, furˈaha jˈaŋɡu na ʃˈaŋɡwe jˈaŋɡu. nˌitakusˈifu kwa kinˈubi, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, kwa nˈini ˌunasˌononˈeka? kwa nˈini ˌunafˌaðaˈika hˈivjo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu? wˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈako kwa mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu bˈado nˌitamsˈifu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, tˌumesikˈia kwa mˌasikˈio jˈetu, bˈaba zˈetu wˌametˌuelˈeza jˈale ˌulijotˈenda katˌika sˈiku zˈao, sˈiku za kˈale.|0
kwa mkˈono wˈako ˌuliwˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa na ˌukawapˈanda bˈaba zˈetu, ˌuliˌaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa na kˌuwastawˈiʃa bˈaba zˈetu.|0
sˈio kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌao wˌaliipˈata ˈn̩tʃi, wˈala si mkˈono wˌao ˌuliwˌapatˈia uʃˈindi; ˌilikˈuwa ni kitˈaŋɡa tʃa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, na nˈuru ja ˈuso wˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌuliwapˈenda.|0
wˌewe ni mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌunajˌeamˈuru uʃˈindi kwa jakˈobo.|0
kwa uwˈezo wˈako tˌunawˌasukˈuma ɲˈuma watˈesi wˈetu; kwa ɟˈina lˈako tˌunawˌakaɲˈaɡa adˈui zˈetu.|0
sˌiutˌumaˈini upˈinde wˈaŋɡu, upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu hˌaunˌiletˈei uʃˈindi.|0
bˌali wˌewe ˌunatˈupa uʃˈindi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈetu, ˌunawˌaaibˈiʃa watˈesi wˈetu.|0
katˌika mˈuŋɡu wˈetu tˌunaɟivˈuna mtʃˈana kˈutwa, nˌasi tˌutalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako milˈele.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ˌumetˌukatˈaa na kˌutuðˈili, wˈala huˈendi tˈena na ɟˈeʃi lˈetu.|0
ˌumetufˈaɲa turˈudi ɲˈuma mbˈele ja adˈui, nˌao watˈesi wˈetu wˌametutˈeka ɲˈara.|0
ˌumetuˈatʃa tˌutafˈunwe kˌama kondˈoo na ˌumetˌutawˈaɲa katˌika mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌumewaˈuza wˈatu wˈako kwa fˈeða kidˈoɡo, wˈala hˌukupˈata faˈida jojˈote kwa maˈuzo jˈao.|0
ˌumetufˈaɲa lawˈama kwa ɟirˈani zˈetu, ðarˈau na ðihˈaka kwa wˈale wˌanaˌotuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌumetufˈaɲa kˌuwa miθˈali mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, mˌataˈifa hˌutikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
feðˈeha jˈaŋɡu ˈiko mbˈele jˈaŋɡu mtʃˈana kˈutwa, na ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɟˈaa aˈibu tˈele.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ðihˈaka ja wˈale wˌanaˌonilaˈumu na kˌunitukˈana, kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui, ambˈaje ˌanatamˈani kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi.|0
hˈajo jˈote jˌametˌutokˈea, iŋɡˈawa tˌulikˈuwa hˌatuɟˌakusahˈau wˈala hˌatuɟaˈenda kiɲˈume na aɡˈano lˈako.|0
miˈojo jˈetu ˌilikˈuwa hˌaiɟarˈudi ɲˈuma; ɲˈajo zˈetu zˌilikˈuwa hˌaziɟˌaiˈatʃa ɲɟˈia jˈako.|0
lakˈini ˌulitupˈonda na kˌutufˈaɲa makˈao ja mbwˈeha, na ˌukatˌufunˈika kwa ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
kˌama tˌuŋɡalikˈuwa tˌumelˌisahˈau ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌau kˌuɲooʃˈea mikˈono jˈetu kwa mˈuŋɡu mɡˈeni.|0
ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu hˌaŋɡalˌiɡundˈua hˈili, kwa kˌuwa ˌanaziɟˈua sˈiri za mˈojo.|0
ˈamka, ˈee bwˈana! kwa nˈini ˌunalˈala? zindˈuka! ˌusitˌukatˈae milˈele.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunaufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako na kˌusahˈau taˈabu na matˈeso jˈetu.|0
tˌumeʃˈuʃwa hˌadi mˌavumbˈini, miˈili jˈetu ˌimeɡˌandamˈana na ˈarði.|0
inˈuka na ˌutusˌaidˈie, ˌutukombˈoe kwa sabˈabu ja upˈendo wˈako usˈio na mwˈiʃo.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumesˌisimulˈiwa na ɟˈambo ɟˈema nˌinapˌomsimulˈia mfˈalme mabˈeti jˈaŋɡu; ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ni kalˈamu ja mwandˈiʃi stˈadi.|0
wˌewe ni bˈora kulˈiko wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote na midˈomo jˈako ˌimepˈakwa neˈema, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˌubarˈiki milˈele.|0
ɟifˈuŋɡe upˈaŋɡa wˈako paɟˈani mwˈako, ˈee mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, ɟivˈike fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu.|0
katˌika fahˈari jˈako, sˈoŋɡa mbˈele kwa uʃˈindi, kwa aɟˈili ja kwˈeli, ˌuɲeɲekˈevu na hˈaki, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume na ˌuoɲˈeʃe matˈendo ja kutˈiʃa.|0
miʃˈale jˈako mikˈali na itʃˈome miˈojo ja adˈui za mfˈalme, mˌataˈifa na jˌaaŋɡˈuke tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo zˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌitadˈumu milˈele na milˈele, fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala wa hˈaki ˌitakˈuwa fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala wa ufˈalme wˈako.|0
ˌunaipˈenda hˈaki na kˌutʃukˈia uˈovu; kwa hˈijo mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌamekuwˈeka ɟˌuːja wenzˈako, kwa kˌukupˈaka mafˈuta ja furˈaha.|0
mavˈazi jˈako jˈote jˈana harˈufu nzˈuri ja mˌanemˈane, ˈudi na mdˌalasˈini; kutˈoka kwˈeɲe maɟˈumba ja kifˈalme jˌalijopˈambwa kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu, saˈuti za vinˈanda vja ɲˈuzi zˌinakufˈaɲa ˌufurˈahi.|0
bˈinti za wafˈalme ni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanawˈake wˈako wˌaheʃimˈiwa; kuˈume kwˈako jˈupo bˈibi arˈusi malkˈia ˌalijevˈaa ðahˈabu ja ofˈiri.|0
sˌikilˈiza, ˈewe bˈinti, fikˈiri na utˈeɡe sikˈio: sahˈau wˈatu wˈako na ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako.|0
mfˈalme ˌameʃaŋɡˈazwa na uzˈuri wˈako; mheʃˈimu, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ni bwˈana wˈako.|0
bˈinti wa tˈiro ˌatakˌuletˈea zawˈadi, wˈatu wˌeɲe ˌutaɟˈiri wˌatatafˈuta ˌupendelˈeo wˈako.|0
ˌutukˈufu wˈote ˈuna bˈinti mfˈalme katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈake; vˈazi lˈake lˌimefˈumwa kwa ɲˈuzi za ðahˈabu.|0
wˌanaiŋɡˈizwa ndˈani kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha, na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ɟˈumba la mfˈalme.|0
nˌitadumˈiʃa kˌumbukˈumbu lˈako katˌika vizˈazi vjˈote, kwa hˈijo mˌataˈifa wˌatakusˈifu milˈele na milˈele.|0
mˈuŋɡu kwˈetu sˌisi ni kˌimbilˈio na ŋɡˈuvu, msaˈada ˌutakˌaoˌonekˈana tˈele wakˈati wa matˈeso.|0
kwa hˈijo hˌatutˌaoɡˈopa, hˌata kˌama dunˈia ˌikiˌondolˈewa nˈajo milˈima ˌikiˌaŋɡukˈia mojˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari.|0
hˌata kˌama mˈaɟi jˌake jˌataŋɡurˈuma na kˌuumˈuka, milˈima nˈajo ˌikitˌetemˈeka kwa mawˈimbi jˈake.|0
kˈuna ˈm̩to ambˈao viɟˈito vjˈake vˌinaˌufurahˈiʃa ˈm̩ɟi wa mˈuŋɡu, mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ambˈako alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌanaˈiʃi.|0
mˈuŋɡu jˈuko kˌatikˈati jˈake, hˌautˌaaŋɡˈuka, mˈuŋɡu ˌataˌusaidˈia ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema.|0
mˌataˈifa jˌanafˈaɲa ɣasˈia, fˈalme zˌinaaŋɡˈuka, jˌeje hˌuinˈua saˈuti jˈake, dunˈia ˌikajejˈuka.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ju pamˈoɟa nˈasi, mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo ni ŋɡˈome jˈetu.|0
ɲɟoˈoni mkaˈone kˈazi za bwˈana ɟˈinsi ˌalivjofˈaɲa ukˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌanakomˈeʃa vˈita hˌata miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, ˌanakˈata upˈinde na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟa mkˈuki, ˌanatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈao kwa mˈoto.|0
tˌuliˈeni, m̩ɟˈue ja kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu; nˌitatukˈuzwa kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, nˌitatukˈuzwa katˌika dunˈia.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ju pamˈoɟa nˈasi; mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo ni ŋɡˈome jˈetu.|0
piɡˈeni makˈofi, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote, mpˌiɡiˈeni mˈuŋɡu kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
ɟˈinsi ɡˈani alˈivjo wa kutˈiʃa, bwˈana alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, mfˈalme m̩kˈuu ɟˌuːja dunˈia jˈote.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni mˈuŋɡu sˈifa, imbˈeni sˈifa, mwˌimbiˈeni sˈifa mfˈalme wˈetu, imbˈeni sˈifa.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ni mfˈalme wa dunˈia jˈote, mwˌimbiˈeni zabˈuri za sˈifa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌanatawˈala ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa, mˈuŋɡu ˌamekˈeti ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌitakatˈifu.|0
wakˈuu wa mˌataˈifa wˌanakˌusaɲˈika kˌama wˈatu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌabrahˈamu, kwa kˌuwa wafˈalme wa dunˈia ni mˈali ja mˈuŋɡu; jˌeje ˌametukˈuka sˈana.|0
bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu, ˌanajˌestahˈili kˌusifˈiwa sˈana, katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, mlˈima wˌake mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ni mzˈuri katˌika kˌuinˈuka kwˈake ɟˈuu sˈana, furˈaha ja dunˈia jˈote. kˌama vilˈele vja ɟˈuu sˈana vja safˈoni ni mlˈima sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa mfˈalme m̩kˈuu.|0
mˈuŋɡu jˈuko katˌika ŋɡˈome zˈake; ˌameɟˌioɲˈeʃa mweɲˈewe kˌuwa ŋɡˈome jˈake.|0
wakˈati wafˈalme wˌalipˌouŋɡanˈiʃa ŋɡˈuvu, wˌaliposˈoŋɡa mbˈele pamˈoɟa.|0
wˌalimwˈona nˌao wˌakaʃaŋɡˈaa, wˌakakimbˈia kwa hˈofu.|0
kˌutetemˈeka kˌuliwaʃˈika hˌuko, mˌaumˈivu kˌama ja mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
ˌuliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kˌama mˈeli za tarʃˈiʃi zˌilizovˈuɲɟua na upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kˌama tˌulivjokˈuwa tˌumesikˈia, ndˈivjo tˌulivjoˈona katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu: mˈuŋɡu ˌataufˈaɲa ˈuwe salˈama milˈele.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, hˌekalˈuni mwˈako tˌunatˌafakˈari upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, kˌama ɟˈina lˈako lilˈivjo, sˈifa zˈako zˌinafˈika hˌadi miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ˌumeɟˈazwa na hˈaki.|0
mlˈima sajˈuni ˌunaʃˌaŋɡilˈia, viɟˈiɟi vja jˈuda vˌinafurˈahi kwa sabˈabu ja hukˈumu zˈako.|0
tˌembeˈeni katˌika sajˈuni, ˌuzuŋɡukˈeni ˈm̩ɟi, hˌesabˈuni minˈara jˈake.|0
jˌatafˌakarˈini vjˈema mabˈoma jˈake, ˌaŋɡaliˈeni ŋɡˈome zˈake, ˌili mpˈate kˌusimulˈia habˈari zˌake kwa kizˈazi kiɟˈatʃo.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈuju mˈuŋɡu ni mˈuŋɡu wˈetu milˈele na milˈele; ˌatakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈetu hˌata mwˈiʃo.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈaja, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote, sˌikilizˈeni, nˈiɲi wˈote ˌm̩kaˈao dunˈia hˌii.|0
wakˈubwa kwa wadˈoɡo, mˌataɟˈiri na maskˈini pamˈoɟa.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitasˈema manˈeno ja hekˈima, usˈemi wa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌutatˈoa ˌufahˈamu.|0
nˌitatˈeɡa sikˈio lˈaŋɡu nˌisikilˈize miθˈali, nˌitafˌafanˈua kˌitendawˈili kwa zˈeze.|0
kwa nˈini nˌioɡˈope sˈiku m̩bˈaja zˌinapokˈuɟa, wakˈati wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu waˈovu wˌanapˌonizuŋɡˈuka.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌoteɡemˈea mˈali zˈao na kˌuɟivunˈia ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao mwˈiŋɡi.|0
hakˈuna mwˌanadˈamu awˈaje jˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌuukombˈoa uhˈai wa mwiŋɡˈine, ˌau kˈumpa mˈuŋɡu fidˈia kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
fidˈia ja uhˈai ni ɣarˈama kˈubwa, hakˈuna malˈipo jojˈote jˌanajotˈoʃa.|0
ˌili kwˌamba aˈiʃi milˈele na ˌasiˈone ˌuharibˈifu.|0
wˈote wˌanaˈona kwˌamba wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima hˈufa; waɟˈiŋɡa na wˌapumbˈavu vˈivjo hˈivjo hˌuaŋɡamˈia na kˌuwaatʃˈia weŋɡˈine mˈali zˈao.|0
mˌakabˈuri jˈao jˌatabˈaki kˌuwa ɲˈumba zˈao za milˈele, makˈao jˈao vizˈazi vjˈote; iŋɡˈawa wˌalikˈuwa na maʃˈamba na kˌujaˈita kwa maɟˈina jˈao.|0
lakˈini mwˌanadˈamu, lˈitʃa ja ˌutaɟˈiri wˈake, hadˈumu; ˌanafanˈana na mɲˈama ˌaaŋɡˌamiˈaje.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo hatˈima ja wˈale wˌanaˌoɟitˌumainˈia weɲˈewe, pˈia ja wˌafuˈasi wˈao, wˌaliˌoθibitˈiʃa misˈemo jˈao.|0
kˌama kondˈoo, wˌamewekˈewa kwˈenda kˌaburˈini, nˈatʃo kˈifo kˌitawˈala. waɲˈofu wˌatawˌatawˈala ˌasubˈuhi, mˌaumbˈile jˈao jˌataozˈea kˌaburˈini, mbˈali na maɟˈumba jˈao makˈubwa ja fahˈari.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌatakombˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu na kabˈuri, hakˈika ˌatanˌitʃukˈua kwˈake.|0
ˌusitˈiʃwe ˈm̩tu ˌanapˌotaɟirˈika, fahˈari ja ɲˈumba jˌake ˌinapˌooŋɡezˈeka.|0
kwa maˈana hˌatatʃukˈua tʃotʃˈote ˌatakˌapokˈufa, fahˈari jˌake hˌaitaʃˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈiʃi ˌaliɟˌihesˈabu kˌuwa hˈeri, na wˌanadˈamu wˌanakusˈifu ˌunapˌofanikˈiwa.|0
ˌataɟiˈuŋɡa na kizˈazi tʃa bˈaba zˈake, ambˈao hˌawataˈona kˈamwe nˈuru ja uzˈima.|0
mwˌanadˈamu mwˌeɲe ˌutaɟˈiri bˌila ˌufahˈamu ni kˌama waɲˈama wˌaaŋɡˌamiˈao.|0
mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, mˈuŋɡu, bwˈana, asˈema na kˌuiˈita dunˈia, ʃˈu mawˈio ja ɟˈua hˌadi mahˈali pˈake lˌiendˈapo kutˈua.|0
kutˈoka sajˈuni, pˈeɲe uzˈuri mkˌamilˈifu, mˈuŋɡu ˌanaaŋɡˈaza.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌanakˈuɟa na hˌatakˈaa kˈimja, mˈoto ˌutekˌetezˈao ˌunamtˌaŋɡulˈia, akˈiwa ˌamezuŋɡˈukwa na tufˈani kˈali.|0
ˌanaziˈita mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu, na ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili awˈeze kˌuwahukˈumu wˈatu wˈake.|0
nˌikusˌaɲiˈeni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaliowˈekwa wˈakfu, wˌaliofˈaɲa aɡˈano nˌami kwa ðabˈihu.|0
nˈazo mbˈiŋɡu zˌinataŋɡˈaza hˈaki jˈake, kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈewe ni hakˈimu.|0
sˌikiˈeni, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitasˈema, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈenu: mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
sˌikukemˈei kwa sabˈabu ja ðabˈihu zˈako, ˌau sadˈaka zˈako za kˌuteketˈezwa, ambˈazo daˈima zˈiko mbˈele zˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈina hˈaɟa ja fahˈali wa bˈanda lˈako, ˌau mbˈuzi wa zˈizi lˈako.|0
kwa maˈana kˈila mɲˈama wa msitˈuni ni wˈaŋɡu, na pˈia makˈundi ja mifˈuɡo ɟˌuːja vilˈima ˈelfu.|0
nˌinamɟˈua kˈila ndˈeɡe mlimˈani, nˌao viˈumbe wa kondˈeni ni wˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa, nˌisiŋɡˌewaambˈia nˈiɲi, kwa maˈana ˌulimwˈeŋɡu ni wˈaŋɡu, pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
ɟˈe, mˌimi hˈula ɲˈama ja mˌafahˈali ˌau kˈuɲua dˈamu ja mbˈuzi.|0
tˈoa sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani kwa mˈuŋɡu, timˈiza naðˈiri zˈako kwˈake jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
na ˌuniˈite sˈiku ja taˈabu; nˌami nˌitakˌuokˈoa, nˌawe ˌutanˌitukˈuza.|0
lakˈini kwˈake ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, mˈuŋɡu asˈema: ˈuna hˈaki ɡˈani kunˈena ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu ˌau kˌutʃukˈua aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu mˌidomˈoni mwˈako.|0
ˌunatʃukˈia mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu na kˌujatˈupa manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ɲˈuma jˈako.|0
ˌunapomwˈona mwˈizi, ˌunauŋɡˈana nˈaje, ˌunapˈiɡa kˈura jˈako pamˈoɟa na wazˈinzi.|0
ˌunakˌitumˈia kˈiɲua tʃˈako kwa mabˈaja na kˌuuoŋɡˈoza ulˈimi wˈako kwa hˈila.|0
wanˈena daˈima ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu jˈako na kˌumsiŋɡizˈia mwˈana wa mˈama jˈako.|0
mˈambo hˈaja ˌunajafˈaɲa, nˌami nˌimekˈaa kˈimja, ˌukafikˈiri mˌimi nˌami ni kˌama wˈewe. lakˈini nˌitakˌukemˈea na kuwˈeka maʃtˈaka mbˈele jˈako.|0
jˌatafˌakarˈini hˈaja, nˈiɲi mnˌaomsahˈau mˈuŋɡu, ˌama sˈivjo nˌitawˌararˈua vipˈande vipˈande, wˈala hˌapatˌakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌunihˌurumˈie, kwa kadˈiri ja upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma, kwa kadˈiri ja hurˈuma jˈako kˈuu, ˌujafˈute makˈosa jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuniˈoʃe na uˈovu wˈaŋɡu wˈote na ˌunitakˈase ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana nˌinaɟˈua makˈosa jˈaŋɡu, na ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu ˈiko mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
ðˈidi jˈako, wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo mabˈaja matʃˈoni pˈako, ˌili ˌuθibitˈike kˌuwa wa kwˈeli ˌunenˈapo, na kˌuwa na hˈaki ˌutoˈapo hukˈumu.|0
hakˈika mˌimi nˌilizalˈiwa mwˌeɲe ðˈambi, mwˌeɲe ðˈambi ʃˈu nˌilipotˈuŋɡwa mˈimba kwa mˈama jˈaŋɡu.|0
hakˈika wˌewe wˌapendˈezwa na kwˈeli ˌitokˈajo mojˈoni, ndˈani sˈana ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˌanifundˈiʃa hekˈima.|0
niˈoʃe kwa hisˈopo, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa sˈafi, ˌunisafˈiʃe, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mweˈupe kulˈiko θelˈuɟi.|0
unˈipe kˌusikˈia furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe, mifˈupa ˌulijˌoipˈonda na ˌifurˈahi.|0
ufˈitʃe ˈuso wˈako ˌusizˌitazˈame ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu, na ˌuufˈute uˈovu wˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniumbˈie mˈojo sˈafi, ˌuifˈaɲe ˈupja rˈoho ja ˌuθabˈiti ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusinitˈupe kutˈoka mbˈele zˈako wˈala kˌuniˌondolˈea rˈoho wˈako mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ˌunirˌudiʃˈie tˈena furˈaha ja wokˈovu wˈako, unˈipe rˈoho ja utˈii, ˌili ˌinitˌeɡemˈeze.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakˌapowˌafundˈiʃa wˌakosˈaɟi ɲɟˈia zˈako, na wˌeɲe ðˈambi wˌatakˌuɡeukˈia wˈewe.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu ˌuniˌokoˈaje, nˌiokˈoe na hatˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, nˌao ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌutaˈimba ɟˌuːja hˈaki jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, fuŋɡˈua midˈomo jˈaŋɡu, na kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitataŋɡˈaza sˈifa zˈako.|0
wˌewe hˌupendˈezwi na ðabˈihu, ˌau nˌiŋɡalˌiilˈeta, hˌufurahˈii sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
bˌali ðabˈihu za mˈuŋɡu ni rˈoho ˌilijˌovuɲɟˈika, mˈojo ˌuliˌovuɲɟˈika wˌeɲe tˈoba, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, hˌutaˌuðarˈau.|0
kwa wˈema wa rˈaði jˈako ˌuifˈaɲe sajˈuni istˈawi, ˌukaziɟˈeŋɡe ˈupja kˈuta za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈapo ndˈipo kˌutakˌapokˈuwa na ðabˈihu za hˈaki, sadˈaka nzˈima za kˌuteketˈezwa za kˌukupendˈeza sˈana, pˈia mˌafahˈali wˌatatolˈewa mˌaðabahˈuni mwˈako.|0
ˈewe ɟˈitu, mbˈona ˌunaɟˌivunˈia ubˈaja? kwa nˈini ˌunaɟivˈuna mtʃˈana kˈutwa, wˌewe ambˈaje ni feðˈeha mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
ulˈimi wˈako hupˈaŋɡa mˌaʃaˈuri mabˈaja ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi. ni kˌama wˈembe mkˈali, nˈiɲi mfaɲˈao hˈila.|0
ˌunapˈenda mabˈaja kulˈiko mˈema, uˈoŋɡo kulˈiko kusˈema kwˈeli.|0
ˌunapˈenda kˈila nˈeno lˈeɲe kuðˈuru, ˈewe ulˈimi wˌeɲe hˈila.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌatakuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja milˈele: ˌatakˌuɲakˈua na kˌukuondˈoa kwa ŋɡˈuvu kutˈoka hˈema jˈako, ˌatakuŋɡˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌataˈona na kˌuoɡˈopa, wˌatamtʃˈeka, wˌakisˈema.|0
hˈuju ni jˈule ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌakumfˈaɲa mˈuŋɡu kˌuwa ŋɡˈome jˈake, bˌali ˌalitˌumainˈia wˈiŋɡi wa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈake, na akˈawa hodˈari kwa kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza weŋɡˈine.|0
lakˈini mˌimi ni kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mzˌeitˈuni ˌunaostˈawi katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu, nˌautˌeɡemˈea upˈendo wa mˈuŋɡu ˌusiokˈoma milˈele na milˈele.|0
nˌitakusˈifu milˈele kwa jˈale ˌulijˌojatˈenda, nˌitatˌumaˈini ɟˈina lˈako, kwa kˌuwa ɟˈina lˈako ni ɟˈema. nˌitakusˈifu mbˈele ja wˌatakatˈifu wˈako.|0
mpumbˈavu ˌanasˈema mojˈoni mwˈake, hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu. wˌamehˌaribˈika, na ɲɟˈia zˈao ni za uˈovu kabˈisa, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatendˈaje mˈema.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌanawˌatʃuŋɡulˈia wˌanadˈamu tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni aˈone kˌama wˈako wˌeɲe akˈili, wowˈote wˌanaˌomtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌameɡˌeukˈia mbˈali, wˌamehˌaribˈika wˈote pamˈoɟa, hakˈuna ˌatendˈaje mˈema. nˈaam, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa.|0
ɟˈe, wˌatendˈao mabˈaja kˈamwe hˌawatˌaɟifˈunza: wˈale ambˈao huwˈala wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kˌama wˈatu walˈavjo mkˈate, hˈao ambˈao hˌawamwˈiti mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈapo wˌaliiŋɡˈiwa na hˈofu kˈuu, ambˈapo hˌapakˈuwa tʃa kˌutetemˈeʃa. mˈuŋɡu ˌalitawˈaɲa mifˈupa ja wˈale wˌaliˌokuʃˌambulˈia; ˌuliwˌaaibˈiʃa, kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwˌaðarˈau.|0
laˈiti wokˈovu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌuŋɡalikˈuɟa kutˈoka sajˈuni! wakˈati mˈuŋɡu ˌareɟeʃˈapo wafˈuŋɡwa wa wˈatu wˈake, jakˈobo na ˌaʃaŋɡilˈie, ˌisraˈeli na ˌafurˈahi.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu ˌuniokˈoe kwa ɟˈina lˈako, ˌunifaɲˈie hukˈumu kwa uwˈezo wˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, sikˈia maˈombi jˈaŋɡu, ˌusikilˈize manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
waɡˈeni wˌananˌiʃambulˈia, wˈatu wˌakatˈili wˌanajˌatafˈuta maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, wˈatu wˌasiomɟˈali mˈuŋɡu.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ni msaˈada wˈaŋɡu, bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌanajˌenitˌeɡemˈeza.|0
mabˈaja na jˌawarudˈie wˈale wˌanaˌonisˌiŋɡizˈia, kwa ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈize.|0
nˌitakˌutolˈea ðabˈihu za hiˈari; ˈee bwˈana, nˌitalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako kwa kˌuwa ni vjˈema.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza maˈombi jˈaŋɡu, wˈala ˌusiðarˈau hˈoɟa jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌisikˈie na ˌuniɟˈibu. mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu jˌananˌisumbˈua na nˌimehˌaŋɡaˈiʃwa.|0
kwa saˈuti ja adˈui, kwa kˌukazˈiwa mˈatʃo na waˈovu, kwa sabˈabu wˌananˌiletˈea matˈeso ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu na kˌunitukˈana kwa hasˈira zˈao.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɟˈaa utʃˈuŋɡu, hˈofu ja kˈifo ˌimenˌiʃambulˈia.|0
wˈoɡa na kˌutetemˈeka vˌimenˌizuŋɡˈuka, hˈofu kˈuu ˌimenˌiɣarikˈiʃa.|0
nˌilisˈema, laˈiti nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na mbˈawa za ɲɟˈiwa! nˌiŋɡerˈuka niˈende mbˈali kˌupumzˈika.|0
nˌiŋɡalˌitorokˈea mbˈali sˈana na kukˈaa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
nˌiŋɡalˌiharakˈiʃa kwˈenda mahˈali pa salˈama, mbˈali na tufˈani kˈali na ðorˈuba.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuwatˌahajarˈiʃe waˈovu na ˌuwatʃˌaŋɡaɲiʃˈie sˈemi zˈao, maˈana nˌimeˈona ɟeˈuri na uɡˈomvi mɟˈini.|0
usˈiku na mtʃˈana wˌanazuŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja kˈuta zˈake, uˈovu na ðulˈuma vˈimo ndˈani jˈake.|0
ŋɡˈuvu za ˌuharibˈifu zˌinatˈenda kˈazi mɟˈini, vitˈiʃo na uˈoŋɡo hˌaviondˈoki mˌitaˈani mwˈake.|0
kˌama ˌalijˌenitukˈana ni adˈui jˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡevˌumilˈia, kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌaŋɡeɟˌiinˈua ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡeɟifˈitʃa ˌasiniˈone.|0
kˈumbe ni wˈewe, mwenzˈaŋɡu, mʃirˈiki na rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu wa karˈibu.|0
kˈifo na kˌiwaɟˈie adˈui zˈaŋɡu ɣafˈula, na waʃˈuke kuzˈimu waŋɡˈali hˈai, kwa maˈana uˈovu ˈupo ndˈani jˈao.|0
lakˈini nˌinamwˈita mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje bwˈana hˌuniokˈoa.|0
ɟiˈoni, ˌasubˈuhi na ˌaðuhˈuri nˌinalˈia kwa huzˈuni, nˌaje hˌusikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌuniokˈoa nikˈawa salˈama katˌika vˈita vˌilivjopˈaŋɡwa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa wˈatu wˈeŋɡi hˌunipˈiŋɡa.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌanajˌemilˈiki milˈele, ˌatawˌasikˈia na kˌuwaaðˈibu, wˈatu ambˈao hˌawabˌadilˈiʃi ɲɟˈia zˈao, wˈala hawˈana hˈofu ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
mwenzˈaŋɡu hˌuʃambulˈia rafˈiki zˈake, nˌaje huvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈake.|0
mˌazuŋɡˈumzo jˌake ni laˈini kˌama siˈaɡi, hˌata hˈivjo vˈita vˈimo mojˈoni mwˈake. manˈeno jˌake ni morˈoro kulˈiko mafˈuta, hˌata hˈivjo ni upˈaŋɡa mkˈali ˌuliofˈutwa.|0
mtwˈike bwˈana faðˈaa zˈako, nˌaje ˌatakˌuteɡemˈeza, hˌatamwˈatʃa kˈamwe mwˌeɲe hˈaki wˌake ˌaaŋɡˈuke.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌutawaʃˈuʃa waˈovu katˌika ʃˈimo la ˌuharibˈifu. wˌeɲe kˈiu ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu na wˌeɲe hˈila, hˌawataˈiʃi nˈusu ja sˈiku zˈao. lakˈini mˌimi nˌinakˌutumaˈini wˈewe.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu ˌunihˌurumˈie, maˈana wˈatu wˌananˌifuatˈia vikˈali; mtʃˈana kˈutwa wˌanazidˈiʃa mˌaʃambulˈizi jˈao.|0
wˌasiŋɡˌiziˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu wˌananˌifuatˈia mtʃˈana kˈutwa, wˈeŋɡi wˌananˌiʃambulˈia kwa kibˈuri tʃˈao.|0
wakˈati nˌinapˌooɡˈopa, nˌitakˌutumaˈini wˈewe.|0
katˌika mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje nˈeno lˈake nˌinalisˈifu, katˌika mˈuŋɡu nˌinatˌumaˈini; sˌitaoɡˈopa. mwˌanadˈamu ˌapatˌikanˈaje na kˈufa, ˌatanitˈenda nˈini.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa wˌanajˌaɡeˈuza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, sˈiku zˈote wˌanapˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri la kˌuniðˈuru.|0
wˌananˌifaɲˈia hˈila, wˌanaɟifˈitʃa, wˌanatazˈama hatˈua zˈaŋɡu, wakˈiwa na ʃaˈuku ja kˌuutˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌasiepˈuke kwa vjovjˈote, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, katˌika hasˈira jˈako jˌaaŋɡˈuʃe mˌataˈifa.|0
andˈika mˌaombolˈezo jˈaŋɡu, ˌoroðˈeʃa matʃˈozi jˈaŋɡu katˌika ɡˈombo lˈako: ɟˈe, hˈaja hajˈapo katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu zˈako.|0
ndˈipo adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌatarˈudi ɲˈuma nˌinapoˈita msaˈada. kwa hˈili nˌitaɟˈua kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu jˈuko upˈande wˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje nˈeno lˈake nˌinalisˈifu, katˌika bwˈana, ambˈaje nˈeno lˈake nˌinalisˈifu.|0
katˌika mˈuŋɡu nˌinatˌumaˈini, sˌitaoɡˈopa. mwˌanadˈamu ˌanawˈeza kˌunitˈenda nˈini.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˈina naðˈiri kwˈako, nˌitakˌutolˈea wˌewe sadˈaka zˈaŋɡu za ʃukrˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˌiokˈoa tˌoka kwˈeɲe maˈuti na miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe kˌuɟikwˈaa, ˌili niwˈeze kˌuenˈenda mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu katˌika nˈuru ja uzˈima.|0
ˌunihˌurumˈie, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌunihˌurumˈie, kwa maˈana nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinakˌukimbilˈia. tʃˈini ja uvˈuli wa mbˈawa zˈako nˌitakˌimbilˈia mpˈaka maˈafa japˈite.|0
nˌamlilˈia mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, mˈuŋɡu ˌatimizˈaje mˌakusˈudi jˌake kwˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌutumˈana kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuniokˈoa, ˌakiwˌakemˈea wˈale wˌanaˌonifˌuatilˈia vikˈali; mˈuŋɡu hˌuutˈuma upˈendo wˌake na ˌuaminˈifu wˈake.|0
nˈiko kˌatikˈati ja sˈimba, nˌimelˈala kˌatikˈati ja waɲˈama wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa kˈuu: wˈatu ambˈao mˈeno jˈao ni mikˈuki na miʃˈale, ambˈao ndˈimi zˈao ni pˈaŋɡa kˈali.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌutukˈuzwe ɟˌuːja mbˈiŋɡu, ˌutukˈufu wˈako na ˌuenˈee dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
wˌaliˌiteɡˈea miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ɲˈavu, nˌikaˌinamˈiʃwa tʃˈini na ðˈiki. wˌametʃˈimba ʃˈimo katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu, lakˈini wˌametˌumbukˈia hˈumo wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
ˈamka, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu! ˈamka, kinˈubi na zˈeze! nˌitajaˈamʃa mˌapambazˈuko.|0
nˌitakusˈifu wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa; nˌitaˈimba habˈari zˈako, kˌatikˈati ja ɟamˈaa za wˈatu.|0
kwa maˈana upˈendo wˈako ni m̩kˈuu, wˌaenˈea hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌunazˌifikˈia ˈaŋɡa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌutukˈuzwe ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌutukˈufu wˈako na ˈuwe dˌuniˈani pˈote.|0
ˈeɲi wˌatawˈala, ɟˈe, kwˈeli mwanˈena kwa hˈaki? ɟˈe, mnˌahukˈumu kwa uɲˈofu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
la, mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu mnatˈuŋɡa ˌuðalˈimu, na mikˈono jˈenu hupˈima ɟeˈuri dˌuniˈani.|0
waˈovu ni wˌapotˈovu ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈao, tˌoka tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama zˈao ni wˌakaˈidi na husˈema uˈoŋɡo.|0
ambˈaje hˌatasikˈia saˈuti ja kˌutumbuˈiza ja mwaɡˈuzi, hˌata kˌama mɡˈaŋɡa ˌaŋɡetʃˈeza kwa ustˈadi kiˈasi ɡˈani.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, javˈuɲɟe mˈeno katˌika vˈiɲua vjˈao; ˈee bwˈana, vˈuɲɟa mˈeno makˈali ja hˈao sˈimba.|0
na wˌatowˈeke kˌama mˈaɟi jˌapitˈajo kwa kˈasi, wˌavutˈapo pˈinde zˈao, miʃˈale jˈao na ˈiwe bˈutu.|0
kˌama kˌonokˈono ˌajejukˈavjo ˌakitembˈea, kˌama mtˈoto ˌalijˌezalˈiwa akˈiwa ˈm̩fu, wˌasiliˈone ɟˈua.|0
kˈabla vjˈuŋɡu vjˈenu hˌaviɟapˈata mˈoto wa kˈuni za miˈiba, zikˈiwa mbˈitʃi ˌau kˈavu, waˈovu wˌatakˈuwa wˌamefˌaɡilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatafurˈahi wˌaonˈapo wˌakilipˈizwa kisˈasi, wˌatakˌapotʃˈovja ɲˈajo zˈao katˌika dˈamu ja waˈovu.|0
ndˈipo wˌanadˈamu wˌatasˈema, hakˈika ˌutulˈivu wa wˌeɲe hˈaki bˈado ˈuna θawˈabu, hakˈika kˈuna mˈuŋɡu ˌahukumˈuje dunˈia.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniokˈoe na adˈui zˈaŋɡu, ˌunilˈinde kˌutokˈana na hˈao wˌanaˌoinˈuka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌunipˈoɲe na wˈatu wˌatendˈao mabˈaja, ˌuniokˈoe kˌutokˈana na wˌamwaɡˈao dˈamu.|0
sˌiɟatˈenda kˈosa; hˌata hˈivjo wˈako tajˈari kˌuniʃˌambulˈia. inˈuka ˌunisˌaidˈie, uˈone hˈali jˈaŋɡu m̩bˈaja.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli! zindˈuka ˌujaaðˈibu mˌataˈifa jˈote, ˌusioɲˈeʃe hurˈuma kwa wˌasalˈiti.|0
hurˈudi wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni, wˌakibwˈeka kˌama ˈm̩bwa, wˌakiˌuzurˈura ˈm̩ɟi.|0
tazˈama jˈale wˌanajotˈema kutˈoka vˈiɲua vjˈao, hutˈema upˈaŋɡa kutˈoka midˈomo jˈao, nˌao husˈema, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajetˌusikˈia.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, bwˈana, ˌuwatʃˈeke; ˌunajˌaðarˈau mˌataˈifa hˈajo jˈote.|0
ˈee ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu, nˌinakˌutazˈama wˈewe, wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ndˈiwe ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini ˌusiwaˈue, ˈee bwˈana, ŋɡˈao jˈetu, ˌau sˈivjo wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatasahˈau. katˌika uwˈezo wˈako wafˈaɲe wˌataŋɡetˈaŋɡe na ˌuwaʃˈuʃe tʃˈini.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za vˈiɲua vjˈao, kwa aɟˈili ja manˈeno ja midˈomo jˈao, waˈatʃe wanˈaswe katˌika kibˈuri tʃˈao. kwa aɟˈili ja laˈana na uˈoŋɡo wˌanaotˈamka.|0
wˌateketˈeze katˌika ɣaðˈabu, wˌateketˈeze hˌadi wˌasiwˈepo tˈena. ndˈipo ˌitakˌapofˌahamˈika katˌika miˈiʃo ja dunˈia kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌanatawˈala ɟˌuːja jakˈobo.|0
hurˈudi ɟiˈoni, wˌakibwˈeka kˌama ˈm̩bwa, wˌakiˌuzurˈura ˈm̩ɟi.|0
wˌanatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa wˌakitafˈuta tʃakˈula, wˌasipˌotoʃˈeka hubwˈeka kˌama ˈm̩bwa.|0
lakˈini mˌimi nˌitaziˈimba ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, ˌasubˈuhi nˌitaˈimba ɟˌuːja upˈendo wˈako; kwa maˈana wˌewe ndˈiwe ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu na kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
ˈee ulˈije ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu, nˌinakˌuimbˈia sˈifa. wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ndˈiwe ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu ˌunipendˈaje.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌumetˌukatˈaa na kˌutokˈea ɣafˈula ɟˈuu jˈetu, ˌumekˌasirˈika: sˈasa tˌureɟˈeʃe ˈupja.|0
ˌumetˌetemˈeʃa ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuipasˈua; ˌuipˈoɲe mˌavuɲɟˈiko jˈake, kwa maˈana ˌinatˌetemˈeka.|0
ˌumewˌaoɲˈeʃa wˈatu wˈako ɲakˈati za kukˈata tamˈaa; ˌumetˌuɲuˈeʃa mvˈiɲo ˌunaˌotujumbˈiʃa.|0
kwa wˈale wˌanaokˈutʃa wˈewe, ˌumewˌainulˈia bendˈera, ˌili iwˈeze kutwˈekwa ðˈidi ja upˈinde.|0
tˌuokˈoe na ˌutusˌaidˈie kwa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, ˌili wˈale ˌuwapendˈao wapˈate kˌuokolˈewa.|0
ɡˌileˈadi ni jˈaŋɡu na manˈase ni jˈaŋɡu; ˌefraˈimu ni kofˈia jˈaŋɡu ja tʃˈuma, nˈajo jˈuda ni fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu ja ˌutawˈala.|0
moˈabu ni sinˈia lˈaŋɡu la kˌunawˈia, ɟˌuːja edˈomu natˈupa kiˈatu tʃˈaŋɡu; nˌaʃaŋɡilˈia kwa kuʃˈindwa kwa ˌufilˈisti.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, si ni wˌewe ˌulijˌetukatˈaa sˈisi, na hutˈoki tˈena na maɟˈeʃi jˈetu.|0
tˌuletˈee msaˈada ðˈidi ja adˈui, kwa maˈana msaˈada wa mwˌanadˈamu hˌaufˈai kˈitu.|0
kwa msaˈada wa mˈuŋɡu tˌutapˈata uʃˈindi, nˌaje ˌatawapˈonda adˈui zˈetu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, sikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu, ˌusikilˈize maˈombi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia nˌinakuˈita, nˌinaˈita hˈuku mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunaðˌoofˈika; ˌunioŋɡˈoze kwˈeɲe mwˈamba ˈule ulˈio ɟˈuu kulˈiko mˈimi.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌumekˈuwa kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈome imˈara ðˈidi ja adˈui.|0
nˌatamˈani kukˈaa hemˈani mwˈako milˈele, na kˌukimbilˈia tʃˈini ja uvˈuli wa mbˈawa zˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumesikˈia naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu, ˌumenˈipa urˈiθi wa wˈale wˌanaˌolioɡˈopa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
mwˌoŋɡezˈee mfˈalme sˈiku za maˈiʃa jˈake, miˈaka jˌake kwa vizˈazi vˈiŋɡi.|0
jˌeje na ˌatawˈazwe kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu milˈele; amˈuru upˈendo wˈako na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako vimlˈinde.|0
ndˈipo daˈima nˌitalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina lˈako na kˌuzitimˈiza naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku.|0
kwa mˈuŋɡu pˈeke jˌake nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinapˈata pumzˈiko; wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu watˈoka kwˈake.|0
jˌeje pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu na wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu; jˌeje ni ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, sˌitatˌikisˈika kˈamwe.|0
mtˌamʃambulˈia ˈm̩tu hˌata lˈini? ɟˈe, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mtamtˈupa tʃˈini, ukˈuta hˈuu ˌuliˌoinˈama na uzˈio hˈuu ˌunaˌotikisˈika.|0
wˌalikˌusudˈia kˌikamilˈifu kˌumwaŋɡˈuʃa tˌoka mahˈali pˈake pa fahˈari; wˌanafˌurahˈia uˈoŋɡo. kwa vˈiɲua vjˈao hˌubarˈiki, lakˈini ndˈani ja miˈojo jˈao hˌulaˈani.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, ˌupumzˈike, kwa mˈuŋɡu pˈeke jˈake, tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu latˈoka kwˈake.|0
jˌeje pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu na wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu; n̩dˈije ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, sˌitatˌikisˈika.|0
wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu na heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu vˈiko kwa mˈuŋɡu, n̩dˈije mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu, mtˌumainˈini jˌeje wakˈati wˈote, mˌiminiˈeni miˈojo jˈenu kwˈake, kwa kˌuwa mˈuŋɡu ni kˌimbilˈio lˈetu.|0
bˌinadˈamu wa ŋɡˈazi ja tʃˈini ni pˈumzi tˈu, nˌao wa ŋɡˈazi ja ɟˈuu ni uˈoŋɡo tˈu; wˌakipˈimwa kwˈeɲe mizˈani, si tʃotʃˈote; wˈote kwa pamˈoɟa ni pˈumzi tˈu.|0
ˌusitˌumainˈie vja ˌuðalˈimu wˈala ˌusiɟivˈune kwa vˈitu vja wˈizi; iŋɡˈawa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako ˌutaˌoŋɡezˈeka, ˌusivˌiwekˈee mˈojo wˈako.|0
ɟˈambo mˈoɟa mˈuŋɡu ˌamelisˈema, mˈambo mawˈili nˌimejˌasikˈia: kwˌamba, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌewe ˈuna ŋɡˈuvu.|0
na kwˌamba, ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe upˈendo. hakˈika utˈampa kˈila ˈm̩tu θawˈabu kwa kadˈiri ja ˌalivjotˈenda.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌakutafˈuta kwa mˈojo wˈote; nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinakˌuonˈea kˈiu, mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌunakˌuonˈea wˌewe ʃaˈuku, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame na ˌilijotʃˈoka mahˈali ambˈapo hapˈana mˈaɟi.|0
nˌimekuˈona katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na kˌuuˈona uwˈezo wˈako na ˌutukˈufu wˈako.|0
kwa sabˈabu upˈendo wˈako ni bˈora kulˈiko uhˈai, midˈomo jˈaŋɡu ˌitakˌuaðimˈiʃa.|0
nˌitakusˈifu sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, na kwa ɟˈina lˈako nˌitainˈua mikˈono jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌitatˌoʃelˈezwa kˌama kwa wˈiŋɡi wa vjakˈula; kwa midˈomo ˌiimbˈajo kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitakusˈifu wˈewe.|0
kˌitandˈani mwˈaŋɡu nˌinakˌukumbˈuka wˈewe, nˌinawˈaza ɟˈuu jˈako makˈeʃa jˈote ja usˈiku.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ndˈiwe msaˈada wˈaŋɡu, tʃˈini ja uvˈuli wa mbˈawa zˈako naˈimba.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinaˌambatˈana nˈawe, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume hˌuniʃˈika.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu wˌatahˌaribˈiwa, wˌatakwˈenda tʃˈini kwˈeɲe vilˈindi vja dunˈia.|0
wˌatatolˈewa wˈafe kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa mbwˈeha.|0
bˌali mfˈalme ˌatafurˈahi katˌika mˈuŋɡu, wˈale wˈote wˌaapˈao kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˌatamsˈifu, bˌali vˈiɲua vja waˈoŋɡo vˌitaɲˌamazˈiʃwa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌunisikˈie nˌinapˌoelˈeza lˌalamˈiko lˈaŋɡu, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu kˌutokˈana na vitˈiʃo vja adˈui.|0
ˌunifˈitʃe kˌutokˈana na ʃaˈuri la sˈiri la waˈovu, kˌutokˈana na zˈile kelˈele za kˈundi la watˈenda mabˈaja.|0
wˌananˈoa ndˈimi zˈao kˌama pˈaŋɡa na kˌuelekˈeza manˈeno jˈao kˌama miʃˈale ja kufˈiʃa.|0
hurˈuʃa miʃˈale kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌavizˈio kwa ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia, hˌumruʃˈia ɣafˈula bˌila wˈoɡa.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa humtˈia mˈojo mwenzˈake katˌika mipˈaŋɡo mibˈaja; hˌuzuŋɡˈumza ɟˌuːja kufˈitʃa mitˈeɡo jˈao, nˌao husˈema, ni nˈani ˌataiˈona.|0
hufˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja la ðulˈuma na kusˈema, tˌumebˈuni mpˈaŋɡo mkˌamilˈifu! hakˈika nˈia na mˈojo wa mwˌanadˈamu vˈina hˈila.|0
ˌataɡeˈuza ndˈimi zˈao weɲˈewe ðˈidi jˈao na kˌuwalˈeta kwˈeɲe mˌaaŋɡamˈizi; wˈote wˌawaonˈao wˌatatikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao kwa ðarˈau.|0
wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌataoɡˈopa, wˌatataŋɡˈaza kˈazi za mˈuŋɡu na kˌutafakˈari jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki na wˌafurˈahi katˌika bwˈana, na wˌakimbilˈie kwˈake; waɲˈofu wˈote wa mˈojo na wamsˈifu jˈeje.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, sˈifa zˌakuŋɡoɟˈea katˌika sajˈuni; kwˈako wˌewe naðˈiri zˈetu zˌitatimˈizwa.|0
ˈewe ˌusikiˈaje maˈombi, kwˈako wˌewe wˈatu wˈote wˌatakˈuɟa.|0
tˌulipokˈuwa tˌumefunˈikwa kabˈisa na ðˈambi, wˌewe ˌulisamˈehe makˈosa jˈetu.|0
hˈeri wˈale ˌuliˌowatʃaɡˈua na kˌuwalˈeta karˈibu ˌili waˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈua zˈako! tˌunaʃibˈiʃwa kwa mˈema ja ɲˈumba jˈako, mˈema ja hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu.|0
ˌunatuɟˈibu kwa matˈendo ja kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza ja hˈaki, ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈetu, tˌumaˈini la miˈiʃo jˈote ja dˌuniˈani na la bahˈari zilˈizo mbˈali sˈana.|0
ˌulijeˈumba milˈima kwa uwˈezo wˈako, ukˈiwa ˌumeɟivˈika ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌulijˌeɲamazˈiʃa ðorˈuba za bahˈari, ŋɡurˈumo za mawˈimbi jˈake, na ɣasˈia za mˌataˈifa.|0
wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi mbˈali sˈana wˌanaoɡˈopa mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako, kˈule ˌasubˈuhi ˌipambˌazukiˈapo na kˈule ɟiˈoni ˌinakˌofifilˈia ˌumeziˈita ɲˈimbo za furˈaha.|0
wˌaitˈunza ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuiɲeʃˈea, wˌaitˌaɟirˈiʃa kwa wˈiŋɡi. viɟˈito vja mˈuŋɡu vˌimeɟˈaa mˈaɟi ˌili kuwˈapa wˈatu nafˈaka, kwa maˈana wˌewe ˌumevˌiamˈuru.|0
ˌumeˌilowˈeʃa mˌiferˈeɟi jˌake na kˌusawazˈiʃa kˈiŋɡo zˈake; ˌumeˌilainˈiʃa kwa maɲˈuɲu na kˌuibarˈiki mimˈea jˈake.|0
ˌumeuvˈika mwˈaka tˈaɟi ja barˈaka, maɡˈari jˈako jˌanafurˈika kwa wˈiŋɡi.|0
mbˈuɡa za maɟˈani za ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌumezˌineemˈeʃa; vilˈima vˌimevˈikwa furˈaha.|0
pˈeɲe ɲˈanda za malˈiʃo pˌameɟˈaa makˈundi ja waɲˈama, na mabˈonde jˌamepˈambwa kwa mavˈuno; vjˈote vˌinaʃˌaŋɡilˈia kwa furˈaha na kuˈimba.|0
mpˌiɡiˈeni mˈuŋɡu kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe, dunˈia jˈote.|0
imbˈeni ˌutukˈufu wa ɟˈina lˈake; mpˈeni sˈifa zˌake kwa ˌutukˈufu.|0
mwˌambiˈeni mˈuŋɡu, ɟˈinsi ɡˈani jalˈivjo ja kutˈiʃa matˈendo jˈako! uwˈezo wˈako ni m̩kˈuu ˈm̩no kiˈasi kwˌamba adˈui wˌanaɲˌeɲekˈea mbˈele zˈako.|0
dunˈia jˈote jˌakusˌuɟudˈia, wˌanakˌuimbˈia wˌewe sˈifa, wˌanalˌiimbˈia sˈifa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ɲɟoˈoni mwˈone jˈale mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌojatˈenda, mˈambo ja kutˈiʃa ˌalijˌojatˈenda mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa bahˈari kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu, wˌakapˈita kˈati ja mˈaɟi kwa miɡˈuu, ɲɟoˈoni, tˌumʃaŋɡilˈie.|0
jˌeje hˌutawˈala kwa uwˈezo wˌake milˈele, mˈatʃo jˌake hˌuaŋɡalˈia mˌataˈifa jˈote: waˈasi wˌasiθubˈutu kˌuɟiinˈua ðˈidi jˈake.|0
ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, msifˈuni mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, saˈuti ja sˈifa jˌake ˌisikˈike.|0
ˌamejˌahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈetu na kˌuizuˈia miɡˈuu jˈetu kˌutelˈeza.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌewe ˌulitˌuɟarˈibu, ˌukatˌusafˈiʃa kˌama fˈeða.|0
ˌumetˌuiŋɡˈiza kwˈeɲe ɲˈavu na ˌumetˌubebˈeʃa mizˈiɡo mizˈito mˌiɡoŋɡˈoni mwˈetu.|0
ˌuliwˌaruhˈusu wˈatu wˌatukalˈie vitʃwˈani, tˌulipˈita kwˈeɲe mˈoto na kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi, lakˈini ˌulitulˈeta kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijoɟˈaa ˌutaɟˈiri tˈele.|0
nˌitakˈuɟa hˌekalˈuni mwˈako na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na kˌukutˌimizˈia naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu.|0
naðˈiri ambˈazo midˈomo jˈaŋɡu ˌiliahˈidi na nˌilizotˈamka kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu nˌilipokˈuwa katˌika ʃˈida.|0
nˌitakˌutolˈea ðabˈihu za waɲˈama wanˈono na sadˈaka za kondˈoo dˈume, nˌitakˌutolˈea mˌafahˈali na mbˈuzi.|0
ɲɟoˈoni msˌikilˈize nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnaˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu, nˌami nˌiwaambˈie ˌalijˌonitendˈea.|0
nˌilimlilˈia kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, sˈifa zˌake zˌilikˈuwa katˌika ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimejafˈitʃa maˈovu mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, bwˈana ˌasiŋɡekˈuwa ˌamenˌisikilˈiza.|0
lakˈini hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌamenˌisikilˈiza na ˌamesikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu katˌika maˈombi.|0
sˈifa apˈewe mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje hˌakulˌikatˈaa ˈombi lˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌunizˌuilˈia upˈendo wˈake.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌaturehˈemu na kˌutubarˈiki, na kˌutuˌaŋɡazˈia nˈuru za ˈuso wˈake.|0
ˌili ɲɟˈia zˈako zˌiɟulikˈane dˌuniˈani, wokˈovu wˈako kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˌataˈifa na wˌakusˈifu, mˌataˈifa jˈote na wˌakusˈifu.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote wˌafurˈahi na kuˈimba kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe, kwa kˌuwa ˌunatawˈala wˈatu kwa hˈaki na kˌuoŋɡˈoza mˌataˈifa ja dunˈia.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˌataˈifa na wˌakusˈifu, mˌataˈifa jˈote na wˌakusˈifu.|0
ndˈipo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitatˈoa mazˈao jˈake, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌatatˌubarˈiki.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌatatˌubarˈiki na miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia itˈamtʃa jˈeje.|0
mˈuŋɡu na ˌainˈuke, watˈesi wˌake wˌatawaɲˈike, adˈui zˌake na wˌakimbˈie mbˈele zˈake.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈoʃi ˌupepˌeruʃwˈavjo na upˈepo, vˈivjo hˈivjo ˌuwapˌeperˈuʃe mbˈali, kˌama vˈile ˈn̩ta ˌijejukˈavjo kwˈeɲe mˈoto, vˈivjo hˈivjo waˈovu na wˌaaŋɡamˈie mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
bˌali wˌeɲe hˈaki na wˌafurˈahi, wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu, wˌafurˈahi na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni mˈuŋɡu, lˌiimbiˈeni sˈifa ɟˈina lˈake, mtˌukuzˈeni jˌeje ˌaendeʃwˈaje ɟˌuːja mawˈiŋɡu: ɟˈina lˈake ni bwˈana, fˌurahˈini mbˈele zˈake.|0
bˈaba wa jatˈima, mtetˈezi wa waɟˈane, ni mˈuŋɡu katˌika makˈao jˌake mˌatakatˈifu.|0
mˈuŋɡu hˌuwawˈeka wapwˈeke katˌika ɟamˈaa, hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wafˈuŋɡwa wˌakiˈimba, bˌali waˈasi huˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌulipˌowatˌaŋɡulˈia wˈatu wˈako, ˌulipopˈita ɲikˈani.|0
dunˈia ˌilitˌikisˈika, mbˈiŋɡu zˌikaɲˈeʃa mvˈua, mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu, jˈule wa sinˈai, mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuliɲˈeʃa mvˈua ɲˈiŋɡi na kˌuibˌurudˈiʃa ˈarði ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimetʃˈoka.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˈatu wˈako wˌaliˈiʃi hˌuko, nˌawe kwa wˈiŋɡi wa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako ˌuliwˈapa maskˈini mˌahitˈaɟi jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌalitaŋɡˈaza nˈeno, wˌaliˌolitaŋɡˈaza nˈeno hˌilo wˌalikˈuwa kˈundi kˈubwa.|0
wafˈalme na maɟˈeʃi wˌalikimbˈia upˈesi, wˈatu wˌaliobˈaki kambˈini wˌaliɡawˈana ɲˈara.|0
hˌata ˌulalˈapo kˌatikˈati ja miˈoto ja kambˈini, mabˈawa ja ɲɟˈiwa wˈaŋɡu jˌamefunˈikwa kwa fˈeða, maɲˈoja jˌake kwa ðahˈabu ˌiŋɡaˈajo.|0
wakˈati mweɲˈezi ˌalipˌowatawˈaɲa wafˈalme katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌilikˈuwa kˌama θelˈuɟi ˌilijˌoaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja salmˈoni.|0
milˈima ja baʃˈani ni milˈima ˌilijˌotukˈuka, milˈima ja baʃˈani ˈina vilˈele vˌilivjˌotʃoŋɡˈoka.|0
ˈeɲi milˈima jˌeɲe vilˈele vˌilivjˌotʃoŋɡˈoka, kwa nˈini mnˌakazˈia mˈatʃo kwa wˈivu, katˌika mlˈima mˈuŋɡu ˌanaˌotʃaɡˈua kˌutawˈala, ambˈako bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌataˈiʃi milˈele.|0
maɡˈari ja mˈuŋɡu ni makˈumi ja maˈelfu, na maˈelfu ja maˈelfu; bwˈana ˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka sinˈai hˌadi katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pˈake.|0
ˌulipopˈanda ɟˈuu, ˌulitˈeka matˈeka, ˌukapokˈea vipˈawa kutˈoka kwa wˌanadˈamu, hˌata kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˌalioˈasi, ˌili wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, upˈate kuˈiʃi hˌuko.|0
sˈifa apˈewe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈetu, ambˈaje sˈiku kwa sˈiku hˌututʃˌukulˈia mizˈiɡo jˈetu.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ni mˈuŋɡu ˌaokoˈaje, bwˈana mweɲˈezi hˌutuokˈoa na kˈifo.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ˌatapˈonda vˈitʃwa vja adˈui zˈake, vˈitʃwa vja hˈao wˌaendˈao katˌika ɲɟˈia za ðˈambi.|0
bwˈana ˌalisˈema, nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa kutˈoka baʃˈani; nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa kutˈoka vilˈindi vja bahˈari.|0
ˌili uwˈeze kutʃˈovja miɡˈuu jˈako katˌika dˈamu ja adˈui zˈako, hˈuku ndˈimi za ˈm̩bwa wˈako zikˈiwa na fˈuŋɡu lˈake.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˌaandamˈano jˈako jˌameˌonekˈana, mˌaandamˈano ja mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu, jˌakiˌelekˈea pˌatakatˈifu pˈake.|0
mbˈele wˈako wˌaimbˈaɟi, baˌada jˈao wapˈiɡa vinˈanda, pamˈoɟa nˌao wˈako wˌanawˈali wˌakipˈiɡa matˈari.|0
msifˈuni mˈuŋɡu katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa, msifˈuni bwˈana katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la ˌisraˈeli.|0
lˈiko kabˈila dˈoɡo la bˌeɲamˈini lˌikiwˌaoŋɡˈoza, wˌakifuˈatwa na kˈundi kˈubwa la wˌatawˈala wa jˈuda, hˌatimˈaje wˌatawˈala wa zˌabulˈoni na naftˈali.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, amˈuru uwˈezo wˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu tˌuoɲˈeʃe ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, kˌama ˌulivjofˈaɲa hˈapo awˈali.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja hekˈalu lˈako jˌerusalˈemu wafˈalme wˌatakˌuletˈea zawˈadi.|0
waɟˈumbe wˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈisri, kˈuʃi ˌataɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni mˈuŋɡu, ˈeɲi fˈalme za dunˈia, mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana sˈifa.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni sˈifa jˌeje ˌapandˈaje mbˈiŋɡu za kˈale zilˈizo ɟˈuu, jˌeje ˌaŋɡurumˈaje kwa saˈuti kˈuu.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni uwˈezo wa mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje fahˈari jˌake ˈiko ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje uwˈezo wˌake ˈuko katˌika ˈaŋɡa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌewe ˌunatˈiʃa katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈako, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli huwˈapa wˈatu wˌake uwˈezo na ŋɡˈuvu. mˈuŋɡu ˌasifˈiwe.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌiokˈoe, kwa maˈana mˈaɟi jˌamenifˈika ʃiŋɡˈoni.|0
nˌinazˈama kwˈeɲe vilˈindi vja matˈope, pasˈipo mahˈali pa kˌukaɲˈaɡa, nˌimefˈika kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu, mˌafurˈiko jˌamenˌiɣarikˈiʃa.|0
nˌimetʃˈoka kwa kuˈomba msaˈada, kˈoo lˈaŋɡu lˌimekaˈuka. mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌanafifˈia, nˌikimtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌonitʃukˈia bˌila sabˈabu ni wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu; wˈeŋɡi ni adˈui kwˈaŋɡu bˌila sabˈabu, wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta kˌuniˌaŋɡamˈiza. nˌinalˌazimˈiʃwa kˌurudˈiʃa kˈitu ambˈatʃo sˌikuˈiba.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌewe ˌunaɟˈua ˌupumbˈavu wˈaŋɡu, wˈala hatˈia jˈaŋɡu hˌaikˌufitʃˈika kwˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˈewe bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, wˌakutˌumainˈio wˌasiˌaibˈiʃwe kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu; wˌakutˌafutˈao wˌasifˌeðehˈeʃwe kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa maˈana nˌimestˌahimˈili ðarˈau kwa aɟˈili jˈako, aˈibu ˌimefunˈika ˈuso wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimekˈuwa mɡˈeni kwa ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu, mɡˈeni kwa wˈana wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈivu wa ɲˈumba jˈako ˌunanˈila, mˌatukˈano ja wˈale wˌanaˌokutukˈana jˌamenˌiaŋɡukˈia.|0
wˈale wˌanaokˈeti mlaŋɡˈoni wˌananˌisimˈaŋɡa, nˌimekˈuwa wˈimbo wa walˈevi.|0
lakˈini ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakuˈomba, kwa wakˈati ˌukupˌendezˈao; katˌika upˈendo wˈako m̩kˈuu, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniɟˈibu kwa wokˈovu wˈako wa hakˈika.|0
ˌuniokˈoe katˌika matˈope, ˌusiniˈatʃe nizˈame; nˌiokˈoe na hˈao wˌanitʃˌukiˈao, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vilˈindi vja mˈaɟi.|0
ˌusiˈatʃe mˌafurˈiko jˌaniɣˌarikˈiʃe ˌau vilˈindi vˌinimˈeze, ˌau ʃˈimo lifˈumbe kˈiɲua tʃˈake ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuniɟˈibu, kwa wˈema wa upˈendo wˈako; kwa hurˈuma zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi ˌuniɡˌeukˈie.|0
ˌusimfˈitʃe mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˈuso wˈako, ˌuharakˈiʃe kˌuniɟˈibu, kwa sabˈabu nˈiko katˌika ʃˈida.|0
ɲɟˈoo karˈibu ˌuniokˈoe, nˌikombˈoe kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌunaɟˈua ɟˈinsi nˌinavjˌoðarˌaulˈiwa, kˌufeðehˈeʃwa na kˌuaibˈiʃwa, adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote ˌunawaɟˈua.|0
ðarˈau zˌimenivˈuɲɟa mˈojo na nˌimekˈata tamˈaa, nˌimetafˈuta wa kˌunihˌurumˈia, lakˈini sˌikumpˈata, wa kˌunitulˈiza, lakˈini sˌikumpˈata.|0
wˌaliwˈeka ɲˈoŋɡo katˌika tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu na wˌalinˈipa sˈiki nˌilipokˈuwa na kˈiu.|0
mˈeza ˌilijˌoandalˈiwa mbˈele jˈao na ˈiwe mtˈeɡo, nˈajo ˈiwe ˌupatilˈizo na tˈanzi.|0
ˌuwamwaɡˈie ɣaðˈabu jˈako, hasˈira jˈako kˈali na ˌiwapˈate.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌanawatˈesa wˈale ˌuliˌowaɟerˈuhi, na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza ɟˌuːja mˌaumˈivu ja wˈale ˌuliˌowaumˈiza.|0
wˌalipˈize uˈovu ɟˌuːja uˈovu, ˌusiwaˈatʃe wˌaʃirˈiki katˌika wokˈovu wˈako.|0
wafˈutwe kutˈoka kitˈabu tʃa uzˈima na wˌasiˌoroðˈeʃwe pamˈoɟa na wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
mˌimi nˈiko katˌika mˌaumˈivu na ðˈiki; ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wokˈovu wˈako na ˌunihifˈaði.|0
nˌitalisˈifu ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu kwa wˈimbo, nˌami nˌitamtukˈuza kwa kˌumtolˈea ʃukrˈani.|0
hˈili lˌitampendˈeza bwˈana kulˈiko ŋɡˈombe dˈume, zaˈidi ja fahˈali akˈiwa na pˈembe na kwˈato zˈake.|0
maskˈini wˌataˈona na kˌufurˈahi: nˈiɲi mnˌaomtafˈuta mˈuŋɡu, miˈojo jˈenu na iˈiʃi.|0
bwˈana hˌuwasikˈia wˌahitˈaɟi wˈala hˌaðarˈau wˈatu wˌake wˌaliotˈekwa.|0
mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia zimsˈifu, bahˈari na vjˈote vˌiendˈavjo ndˈani jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌataˌiokˈoa sajˈuni na kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa tˈena mˈiɟi ja jˈuda. kˈiʃa wˈatu wˌatafˈaɲa makˈao jˈao hˈumo na kˌuimilˈiki.|0
watˈoto wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˌatairˈiθi na wˈale wˈote wˌalipendˈao ɟˈina lˈake wˌataˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ufˈaɲe harˈaka kˌuniokˈoa; ˈee bwˈana, ɲɟˈoo hˈima ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
wˈale wˌaniˌambiˈao, ˈaha! ˈaha! warˈudi ɲˈuma kwa sabˈabu ja aˈibu jˈao.|0
lakˈini wˈote wˌakutˌafutˈao wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie na kˌukufˌurahˈia, wˈale wˌapendˈao wokˈovu wˈako sˈiku zˈote wasˈeme, mˈuŋɡu na ˌatukˈuzwe.|0
lakˈini bˈado mˌimi ni maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi; ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuniɟˈie harˈaka. wˌewe ndˈiwe msaˈada wˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu; ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikawˈie.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌimekˌukimbilˈia wˈewe, ˌusiˈatʃe nˌikaˌaibˈika kˈamwe.|0
kwa hˈaki jˈako ˌunipˈoɲe na kˌuniokˈoa, ˌuniteɡˈee sikˈio lˈako ˌuniokˈoe.|0
ˈuwe kwˈaŋɡu mwˈamba wa kˌimbilˈio, mahˈali nˌitakˌapokˌimbilˈia kˈila wakˈati; tˈoa ˈamri ja kˌuniokˈoa, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌuniokˈoe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa mwˈovu, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe makˈutʃa ja wˈatu wabˈaja na wˌakatˈili.|0
ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa nˌimekˌuteɡemˈea wˈewe, ˌulinitˈoa tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu. nˌitakusˈifu wˌewe daˈima.|0
nˌimekˈuwa kˌama kiˈoɟa kwa wˈeŋɡi, lakˈini wˌewe ni kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu imˈara.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌimeɟˈazwa sˈifa zˈako, nˌikitaŋɡˈaza ˌutukˈufu wˈako mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˌusinitˈupe wakˈati wa uzˈee, wˈala ˌusiniˈatʃe ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌinapˌopuŋɡˈua.|0
kwa maˈana adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌananˌiseŋɡˈeɲa, wˈale wˌanaˌonivizˈia kˌuniˈua wafˈaɲa hˈila.|0
wˌanasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌamemwˈatʃa, mkˌimbiliˈeni mkˌamkamˈate, kwˈani hakˈuna wa kˌumwokˈoa.|0
waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu na wˌaaŋɡamˈie kwa aˈibu, wˈale wˌanaotˈaka kˌuniðˈuru na wˌafunˈikwe kwa ðarˈau na feðˈeha.|0
lakˈini mˈimi, nˌitatˌumaˈini sˈiku zˈote, nˌitakusˈifu zaˈidi na zaˈidi.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitasˌimulˈia hˈaki jˈako, wokˈovu wˈako mtʃˈana kˈutwa, iŋɡˈawa sˌifahˈamu kipˈimo tʃˈake.|0
ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitakˈuɟa na kˌutaŋɡˈaza matˈendo jˈako makˈuu, nˌitataŋɡˈaza hˈaki jˈako, jˈako pˈeke jˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌumenˌifundˈiʃa ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu, hˌadi lˈeo nˌinataŋɡˈaza matˈendo jˈako ja aɟˈabu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌusiniˈatʃe, hˌata niwˈapo m̩zˈee wa mvˈi, mpˈaka nˌitaŋɡˈaze uwˈezo wˈako kwa kizˈazi kiɟˈatʃo, ŋɡˈuvu zˈako kwa wˈote wˌatakˌaokˈuɟa bˌaadˈaje.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, hˈaki jˈako ˌimefˈika ɟˈuu katˌika mbˈiŋɡu, wˌewe ambˈaje ˌumefˈaɲa mˈambo makˈuu. ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ni nˈani alˈije kˌama wˈewe.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌumenifˈaɲa nipˈate taˈabu, ɲˈiŋɡi na tʃˈuŋɡu, ˌutanˌihuˈiʃa tˈena, kutˈoka vilˈindi vja dunˈia ˌutanˌiinˈua tˈena.|0
ˌutaoŋɡˈeza heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu na kˌunifarˈiɟi tˈena.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakusˈifu kwa kinˈubi kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuaminˈifu wˈako; ˈee ulˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌitakˌuimbˈia sˈifa kwa zˈeze.|0
midˈomo jˈaŋɡu ˌitapˈaza saˈuti kwa furˈaha nˌinapˌokuimbˈia sˈifa, mˈimi, ambˈaje ˌumenˌikombˈoa.|0
ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌutasˌimulˈia matˈendo jˈako ja hˈaki mtʃˈana kˈutwa, kwa maˈana wˈale wˌaliotˈaka kˌuniðˈuru, wˌameˌaibˈiʃwa na kˌufaðaˈiʃwa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mɟalˈie mfˈalme ˌaamˈue kwa hˈaki jˈako, mwˈana wa mfˈalme kwa hˈaki jˈako.|0
ˌatawˌaamˈua wˈatu wˈako kwa hˈaki, wˈatu wˈako wˌaliˌoonˈewa kwa hˈaki.|0
milˈima ˌitalˈeta mˌafanikˈio kwa wˈatu, vilˈima tˈunda la hˈaki.|0
ˌatawˌatetˈea wˌaliˌoonˈewa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu na ˌatawˌaokˈoa watˈoto wa wˌahitˈaɟi, ˌatapˈonda mðalˈimu.|0
ˌatakˈuwa kˌama mvˈua ˌiɲeʃˈajo ɟˌuːja ʃˈamba lˌililofjˈekwa, kˌama maɲˈuɲu jˌaɲeʃˈajo ˈarði.|0
katˌika sˈiku zˌake wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatastˈawi; mˌafanikˈio jˌatakuwˈepo mpˈaka mwˈezi ˌutakˌapokˈoma.|0
ˌatatawˈala kutˈoka bahˈari hˌadi bahˈari na kutˈoka ˈm̩to mpˈaka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
mˌakabˈila ja ɟaŋɡwˈani wˌatamsˌuɟudˈia, na adˈui zˌake wˌatarˈamba mavˈumbi.|0
wafˈalme wa tarʃˈiʃi na wa pwˈani za mbˈali wˌatamletˈea kˈodi; wafˈalme wa ʃˈeba na sˈeba watˈampa zawˈadi.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wˌatamsˌuɟudˈia na mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatamtˌumikˈia.|0
kwa maˈana ˌatamwokˈoa mhitˈaɟi ˌanajˌemlilˈia, ˌalijˌeonˈewa asˈije na wa kˌumsaidˈia.|0
ˌatawˌahurumˈia waɲˈoŋɡe na wˌahitˈaɟi na kˌuwaokˈoa wˌahitˈaɟi kutˈoka maˈuti.|0
ˌatawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka ˌuonˈevu na ˌukatˈili, kwˈani dˈamu jˈao ni ja θamˈani matʃˈoni pˈake.|0
nafˈaka iɟˈae tˈele katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, ɟˌuːja vilˈele vja vilˈima na istˈawi. tˈunda lˈake na listˈawi kˌama lˌebanˈoni, listˈawi kˌama maɟˈani ja kondˈeni.|0
ɟˈina lˈake na lidˈumu milˈele, na lidˈumu kˌama ɟˈua. mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatabˌarikˈiwa kˌupitˈia kwˈake, nˌao wˌatamwˈita ˌalijˌebarikˈiwa.|0
ɟˈina lˈake tukˈufu lˌisifˈiwe milˈele, ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote uɟˈae ˌutukˈufu wˈake. ˈamen na ˈamen.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wa maˈombi ja daˈudi mwˈana wa jˈese.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ni mwˈema kwa ˌisraˈeli, kwa wˈale ambˈao miˈojo jˈao ni sˈafi.|0
bˌali kwˈaŋɡu mˈimi, miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa karˈibu kˌutelˈeza; nˌilikˈuwa karˈibu m̩ɡˈuu wˈaŋɡu kˌuatʃˈia ˌulipˌosimˈama.|0
kwa maˈana nˌiliwˌaonˈea wˈivu wˌeɲe kˌuɟivˈuna nˌilipoˈona kˌufanikˈiwa kwa waˈovu.|0
wˌao hawˈana taˈabu, miˈili jˈao ˈina ˈafja na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˌawapˈati ʃˈida zˌinazˌowatˌaabˈiʃa wˈatu weŋɡˈine, wˈala hˌawapˈati mapˈiɡo kˌama wˌanadˈamu weŋɡˈine.|0
kwa hˈijo kibˈuri ni mkˈufu wˈao, wˌameɟivˈika ɟeˈuri.|0
uˈovu hutˈoka katˌika miˈojo jˈao ˌilijokˈufa ɡˈanzi, mˌaɟivˈuno maˈovu kutˈoka mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao haˈuna kikˈomo.|0
hˌuðihˈaki na kusˈema kwa ˌukorˈofi, katˌika mˌaɟivˈuno jˈao wˌanatiʃˈia kutˈesa.|0
vˈiɲua vjˈao huwˈeka madˈai hˌata kwa mbˈiŋɡu, nˈazo ndˈimi zˈao hˌumilˈiki dˌuniˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˌao hˌuwaɡˌeukˈia na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi tˈele.|0
wˌanasˈema, mˈuŋɡu ˌawezˈaɟe kuɟˈua? ɟˈe, jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana anˈajo mˌaarˈifa.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo walˈivjo waˈovu: sˈiku zˈote hˌawaɟˈali, wˌanaˌoŋɡezˈeka katˌika ˌutaɟˈiri.|0
hakˈika nˌimeuwˈeka mˈojo wˈaŋɡu sˈafi bˈure, ni bˈure nˌimenˈawa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu nisˈiwe na hatˈia.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa nˌimetˌaabˈika, nˌimeˌaðibˈiwa kˈila ˌasubˈuhi.|0
kˌama nˌiŋɡesˈema, nˌitasˈema hˈivi, nˌiŋɡelikˈuwa nˌimewˌasalˈiti watˈoto wˈako.|0
nˌilipˌoɟarˈibu kˌuelˈewa hˈaja jˈote, jˌalikˈuwa maɡˈumu kwˈaŋɡu kˌuelˈewa.|0
mpˈaka nˌilipˌoiŋɡˈia pˌatakatˈifu pa mˈuŋɡu, ndˈipo nˌilipˌotambˈua mwˈiʃo wˈao.|0
hakˈika ˌunawawˈeka mahˈali pa ˌutelˈezi, ˌunawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini kwa ˌuharibˈifu.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi wˌanavjˌoaŋɡamˈizwa ɣafˈula, wˌanatowˈeʃwa kabˈisa na vitˈiʃo.|0
kˌama ndˈoto ˈm̩tu ˌaamkˈapo, hˈivjo wakˈati ˌuinukˈapo, ˈee bwˈana, ˌutawˌatowˈeʃa kˌama ndˈoto.|0
wakˈati mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌulipˌohuzunˈiʃwa, na rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌilipotˈiwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌilikˈuwa mpumbˈavu na mɟˈiŋɡa, nˌilikˈuwa mɲˈama mkatˈili mbˈele jˈako.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˌawe sˈiku zˈote, ˌumeniʃˈika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume.|0
ˌunanˌioŋɡˈoza kwa ʃaˈuri lˈako, hˌatimˈaje ˌutanˌiiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˌutukˈufu.|0
nˈani nilˈije nˌaje mbiŋɡˈuni ˈila wˈewe? dunˈia haˈina tʃotʃˈote nˌinatʃˌokitamˈani ˈila wˈewe.|0
mwˈili na mˈojo wˈaŋɡu vjawˈeza kuʃˈindwa, bˌali mˈuŋɡu ni ŋɡˈuvu ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu na fˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu milˈele.|0
wˈale walˈio mbˈali nˌawe wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia, ˌunawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈote wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu kwˈako.|0
lakˈini kwˈaŋɡu mˈimi, ni vjˈema kˌuwa karˈibu na mˈuŋɡu. nˌimemfˈaɲa bwˈana mweɲˈezi kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu; nˌami nˌitajˌasimulˈia matˈendo jˈako jˈote.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mbˈona ˌumetˌukatˈaa milˈele? mbˈona hasˈira jˈako ˌinatˈoka mˈoʃi ɟˌuːja kondˈoo wa malˈiʃo jˈako.|0
kumbˈuka wˈatu ˌuliˌowanunˈua zamˈani, kabˈila la urˈiθi wˈako, ambˈao ˌuliwˌakombˈoa: mlˈima sajˈuni, ambˈamo ˌuliˈiʃi.|0
ɡeˈuza hatˈua zˈako kˌuelekˈea maɡˈofu hˈaja ja kudˈumu, ˌuharibˈifu wˈote hˈuu ambˈao adˈui ˌameulˈeta pˈale pˌatakatˈifu.|0
adˈui zˈako wˌameŋɡurˈuma pˈale ˌulipˌokutˈana nˈasi, wˌanawˈeka bendˈera zˈao kˌama alˈama.|0
wˌalifˈaɲa kˌama wˈatu wˌanaˌotumˈia maʃˈoka kukˈata kitʃˈaka tʃa mˈiti.|0
wˌalivˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟa milˈaŋɡo jˈote ˌilijˌonakʃˈiwa kwa maʃˈoka na viʃˈoka vjˈao.|0
wˌalitˌeketˈeza kabˈisa mahˈali pˈako pˌatakatˈifu, wˌakajˌanaɟˈisi makˈao ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
wˌalisˈema mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao, tˌutawapˈonda kabˈisa! wˌalitʃˈoma kˈila mahˈali ambˈapo mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌabudˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌatukupˈewa iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza; hakˈuna mˌanabˈii wˌaliobˈaki, hakˈuna jejˈote kˈati jˈetu ˌaɟuˈaje hˈali hˌii ˌitatʃukˈua mˈuda ɡˈani.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mtˈesi ˌatakˌuðihˈaki mpˈaka lˈini? ɟˈe, adˈui wˌatalˌitukˈana ɟˈina lˈako milˈele.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunazuˈia mkˈono wˈako, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume? ˌuutˈoe kutˈoka makˈuɲɟo ja vˈazi lˈako na ˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈize.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ni mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu ʃˈu zamˈani, ˌunalˈeta wokˈovu dˌuniˈani.|0
ni wˌewe ˌulijˌeiɡawˈaɲa bahˈari kwa uwˈeza wˈako; ˌulivˈuɲɟa vˈitʃwa vja waɲˈama wakˈubwa wa kutˈiʃa katˌika mˈaɟi.|0
ni wˌewe ˌulijepˈonda vˈitʃwa vja lˌewiaθˈani nˌawe ˌukamtˈoa kˌama tʃakˈula kwa viˈumbe vja ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
ni wˌewe ˌulijˌefuŋɡˈua tʃemtʃˈemi na viɟˈito, ˌulikaˈuʃa mˈito ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa ˌikitˌirirˈika daˈima.|0
mtʃˈana ni wˈako, nˌao usˈiku ni wˈako pˈia, ˌuliziwˈeka ɟˈua na mwˈezi.|0
ni wˌewe ˌulijˌeiwˈeka mipˈaka jˈote ja dunˈia, ˌulifˈaɲa kˌiaŋɡˈazi na masˈika.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi mtˈesi ˌalivjˌokuðihˈaki, ɟˈinsi wˈatu wˌapumbˈavu wˌalivjˌolitukˈana ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˌusiˌukabˈiði uhˈai wa ɲɟˈiwa wˈako kwa waɲˈama wakˈali wa mwˈitu; ˌusisahˈau kabˈisa uhˈai wa wˈatu wˈako wˌanaˌotesˈeka milˈele.|0
lˌikumbˈuke aɡˈano lˈako, maˈana mˈara kwa mˈara mˈambo ja ɟeˈuri jˌameɟˈaa katˌika sehˈemu za ɡˈiza n̩tʃˈini.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu wˌaliˌoonˈewa warˈudi ɲˈuma kwa aˈibu; maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi hˈebu wˌalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako.|0
inˈuka, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuɟitetˈee; kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi wˌapumbˈavu wˌanavjˌokuðihˈaki mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˌusipuˈuze mˌakelˈele ja watˈesi wˈako, ɣasˈia za adˈui zˈako, zˌinazˌoinˈuka mfˌululˈizo.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, tˌunakˌuʃukˈuru, tˌunakˌuʃukˈuru wˈewe, kwa kˌuwa ɟˈina lˈako li karˈibu; wˈatu hˌusimulˈia matˈendo jˈako ja aɟˈabu.|0
ˌunasˈema, nˌinatʃaɡˈua wakˈati maˈalum; ni mˌimi nˌihukumˈuje kwa hˈaki.|0
wakˈati dunˈia na wˈatu wˌake wˈote ˌinapˌotetemˈeka, ni mˌimi nˌinajˌeziʃˌikilˈia ŋɡˈuzo zˌake imˈara.|0
kwa wˈale wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno nˌinasˈema, msˌiɟisˈifu tˈena, kwa wˈale waˈovu, msˌiinˈue pˈembe zˈenu.|0
msˌiinˈue pˈembe zˈenu ðˈidi ja mbˈiŋɡu; msisˈeme kwa ʃˈiŋɡo zˌilizˌoɲoˈoʃwa..|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatokˈaje mˌaʃarˈiki wˈala mˌaɣarˈibi ˌau kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌawezˈaje kumkwˈeza mwˌanadˈamu.|0
bˌali mˈuŋɡu n̩dˈije ˌahukumˈuje: humʃˈuʃa hˈuju na kumkwˈeza mwiŋɡˈine.|0
mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana kˈuna kikˈombe kˌilitʃoɟˈaa mvˈiɲo ˌunaotˈoka pˈovu ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua na vˌikolˈezo; hˌuumimˈina, nˌao waˈovu wˈote wa dunˈia hˈuɲua mpˈaka tˈone la mwˈiʃo.|0
bˌali mˈimi, nˌitataŋɡˈaza hˈili milˈele; nˌitaˈimba sˈifa kwa mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
nˌitazˌikatilˈia mbˈali pˈembe za waˈovu wˈote, bˌali pˈembe za wˌeɲe hˈaki zˌitaˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
katˌika jˈuda, mˈuŋɡu ˌanaɟˌulikˈana, ɟˈina lˈake ni kˈuu katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈema lˈake lˈiko salˈemu, makˈao jˌake katˌika sajˈuni.|0
hˌuko ˌalivˈuɲɟa miʃˈale ˌimetˌametˈajo, ŋɡˈao na pˈaŋɡa, silˈaha za vˈita.|0
wˌewe ˌunaŋɡˈaa kwa mwˈaŋɡa, mwˌeɲe fahˈari zaˈidi ja milˈima jˌeɲe ˌutaɟˈiri wa waɲˈama pˈori.|0
mˌaʃuɟˈaa hulˈala wˌametˈekwa ɲˈara, hulˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˌao wa mwˈiʃo; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu wa vˈita ˌanajewˈeza kˌuinˈua mikˈono jˈake.|0
kwa kˌukemˈea kwˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo, farˈasi na ɡˈari la vˈita vˌilikˈaa kˈimja.|0
wˌewe pˈeke jˈako n̩dˈije wa kˌuoɡˈopwa. ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈako ˌunapˌokasirˈika.|0
kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌulitˈamka hukˈumu, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaoɡˈopa, ikˈawa kˈimja.|0
wakˈati wˈewe, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌulipˌoinˈuka kˌuhukˈumu, kˌuwaokˈoa wˈote wˌaliˌoonˈewa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hakˈika ɣaðˈabu jˈako ðˈidi ja wˌanadˈamu ˌinakˌuletˈea sˈifa, na mˌasalˈia ja ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌunaɟifˈuŋɡa mʃˈipi.|0
wekˈeni naðˈiri kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kˌuzitimˈiza; ˈn̩tʃi zˈote za ɟirˈani na walˈete zawˈadi kwa jˈule ˌastahilˈije kˌuoɡˈopwa.|0
huvˈuɲɟa rˈoho za wˌatawˈala; ˌanaoɡˈopwa na wafˈalme wa dunˈia.|0
nˌilimlilˈia mˈuŋɡu ˌili ˌanisˌaidˈie, nˌilimlilˈia mˈuŋɡu ˌili ˌanisikˈie.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa katˌika taˈabu, nˌilimtafˈuta bwˈana, usˈiku nˌiliɲoˈoʃa mikˈono bˌila kutʃˈoka na nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌilikatˈaa kˌufariɟˈika.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌilikˌukumbˈuka wˈewe, nˌikalˈia kwa huzˈuni; nˌikatˌafakˈari, rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌikaðˌoofˈika.|0
ˌulizuˈia mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kufˈumba; nˌilikˈuwa nˌasumbˈuka, nˌikaʃˈindwa kusˈema.|0
nˌilitˌafakˈari ɟˌuːja sˈiku zˌilizopˈita, miˈaka mˈiŋɡi ˌilijopˈita.|0
ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌatakatˈaa milˈele? ɟˈe, hˌatatˈenda mˈema tˈena.|0
ɟˈe, upˈendo wˌake usˈio na mwˈiʃo ˌumetowˈeka milˈele? ɟˈe, ahˈadi jˌake ˌimekˈoma ɲakˈati zˈote.|0
ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu ˌamesahˈau kˌuwa na hurˈuma? ɟˈe, katˌika hasˈira ˌamezuˈia hurˈuma jˈake.|0
ndˈipo nˌikawˈaza, hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌuðaˈifu wˈaŋɡu: lakˈini nˌitakumbˈuka miˈaka ja mkˈono wa kuˈume wa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
nˌitajˌakumbˈuka matˈendo ja bwˈana; nˈaam, nˌitaˌikumbˈuka mˌiuɟˈiza jˈako ja zamˈani.|0
nˌitazˌitafakˈari kˈazi zˈako zˈote na kˌujawˈaza matˈendo jˈako makˈuu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ɲɟˈia zˈako ni tˌakatˈifu. ni mˈuŋɡu jˈupi alˈije m̩kˈuu kˌama mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu ˌutendˈaje mˌiuɟˈiza, ˌumeoɲˈeʃa uwˈezo wˈako kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa.|0
kwa mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌumewˌakombˈoa wˈatu wˈako, uzˈao wa jakˈobo na josˈefu.|0
mˈaɟi jˌalikuˈona, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˈaɟi jˌalikuˈona jˌakakimbˈia, vilˈindi vˌilitˌetemˈeka.|0
mawˈiŋɡu jˌalimwˈaɡa mˈaɟi, mbˈiŋɡu zˌikatˈoa ŋɡurˈumo kwa rˈadi, miʃˈale jˈako ˌikamˌetamˈeta hˈuku na hˌuko.|0
ŋɡurˈumo jˈako ˌilisikˈika katˌika upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli, umˈeme wˈako wa rˈadi ˌukaaŋɡˈaza dunˈia, ˈn̩tʃi ˌikatˌetemˈeka na kˌutikisˈika.|0
ɲɟˈia jˈako ˌilipˈita bˌaharˈini, mapˈito jˈako kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu, iŋɡˈawa ɲˈajo zˈako hˌazikˌuonekˈana.|0
ˌulioŋɡˈoza wˈatu wˈako kˌama kˈundi kwa mkˈono wa mˈose na arˈoni.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, sˌikiˈeni mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu, sˌikilizˈeni manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitafuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kwa mafˈumbo, nˌitazuŋɡˈumza mˈambo jˌalijˌofitʃˈika, mˈambo ja kˈale.|0
jˈale ambˈajo tˌulijˌasikˈia na kˌujaɟˈua, jˈale ambˈajo bˈaba zˈetu wˌalitˌuambˈia.|0
hˌatutˌajafˈitʃa kwa watˈoto wˈao; tˌutakˌiambˈia kizˈazi kiɟˈatʃo matˈendo jˌastahilˈijo sˈifa ja bwˈana, uwˈeza wˈake, na mˌaaɟˈabu ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa.|0
ˌaliaɡˈiza ˈamri kwa jakˈobo na ˌakawˈeka ʃerˈia katˌika ˌisraˈeli, ambˈazo ˌaliwˌaamˈuru bˈaba zˈetu wˌawafundˈiʃe watˈoto wˈao.|0
ˌili kizˈazi kiɟˈatʃo kˌiziɟˈue, pamˈoɟa na watˈoto ambˈao wˌatazalˈiwa, nˌao pˈia wapˈate kˌuwaelˈeza watˈoto wˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˌaŋɡewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao kwa mˈuŋɡu, nˌao wˌasiŋɡˌesahˈau matˈendo jˈake, bˌali wˌaŋɡalˌiziʃˈika ˈamri zˈake.|0
ˌili wˌasifanˈane na bˈaba zˈao, wˌaliokˈuwa kizˈazi tʃa ˌukaˈidi na uˈasi, ambˈao rˈoho zˈao hˌazikˈuwa na ˌuaminˈifu kwˈake, ambˈao rˈoho zˈao hˌazikˌumwamˈini.|0
wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu, iŋɡˈawa wˌaliɟifˈuŋɡa pˈinde, wˌalikimbˈia sˈiku ja vˈita.|0
hˌawakˌuliʃˈika aɡˈano la mˈuŋɡu na wˌalikatˈaa kuˈiʃi kwa ʃerˈia jˈake.|0
wˌalisahˈau ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamejatˈenda, mˌaaɟˈabu ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamewˌaoɲˈeʃa.|0
ˌalitˈenda mˌiuɟˈiza matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa bˈaba zˈao, hˌuko soˈani, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
ˌaliwˌaoŋɡˈoza kwa wˈiŋɡu mtʃˈana na kwa nˈuru kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto usˈiku kˈutʃa.|0
ˌalipasˈua miˈamba ɟaŋɡwˈani na ˌakawˈapa mˈaɟi tˈele kˌama bahˈari.|0
ˌalitˈoa viɟˈito kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɟabˈali lˌililˌotʃoŋɡˈoka, ˌakajafˈaɲa mˈaɟi jˌatirirˈike kˌama mˈito.|0
lakˈini wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈake, wˌakiˈasi ɟaŋɡwˈani ðˈidi ja alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
kwa mˌakusˈudi wˌalimɟarˈibu mˈuŋɡu, wˌakidˈai vjakˈula wˌalivjˌovitamˈani.|0
wˌalinˈena ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu, wˌakisˈema, ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu awˈeza kˌuandˈaa mˈeza ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
ˌalipopˈiɡa mwˈamba, mˈaɟi jˌalitˈoka kwa ŋɡˈuvu, viɟˈito vˌikatˌirirˈika mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi. lakˈini ɟˈe, awˈeza kutˈupa tʃakˈula pˈia? ɟˈe, ˌanawˈeza kuwˈapa wˈatu wˌake ɲˈama.|0
bwˈana ˌalipˌowasikˈia, ˌalikˌasirˈika sˈana, mˈoto wˌake ukˈawa ðˈidi ja jakˈobo, na ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˌumwamˈini mˈuŋɡu, wˈala kˌuutˌumainˈia ˌukombˈozi wˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌalitˈoa ˈamri kwa ˈaŋɡa zilˈizo ɟˈuu na kˌufuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
ˌakawˌaɲeʃˈea mˈana ˌili wˈatu wˈale; ˌaliwˈapa nafˈaka ja mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
wˈatu wˌalikˈula mkˈate wa mˌalaˈika, ˌakawˌatumˈia tʃakˈula tʃˈote ambˈatʃo wˌaŋɡeliwˈeza kˈula.|0
ˌaliatʃˈia upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mbˈiŋɡu na kˌuuoŋɡˈoza upˈepo wa kusˈini kwa uwˈezo wˈake.|0
ˌaliwˌaɲeʃˈea ɲˈama kˌama mavˈumbi, ndˈeɡe wˌarukˈao kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa pwˈani.|0
ˌaliwafˈaɲa waʃˈuke ndˈani ja kˈambi jˈao, kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mahˈema jˈao jˈote.|0
wˌalikˈula na kusˈaza, kwa maˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈapa kˈile wˌalitʃˌotamˈani.|0
kˈabla hˌawaɟˌamalˈiza kˈula wˌalitʃˌokitamˈani, hˌata kˌilipokˈuwa kiŋɡˈali bˈado vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao.|0
hasˈira ja mˈuŋɡu ˌikawˈaka ɟˈuu jˈao, ˌakawaˈua wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, ˌakiwˌaaŋɡˈuʃa viɟˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lˈitʃa ja hˈaja jˈote, wˌaliˌendelˈea kutˈenda ðˈambi, lˈitʃa ja mˌaaɟˈabu jˈake, hˌawakˌuamˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakamalˈiza sˈiku zˈao katˌika ˌubatˈili na miˈaka jˈao katˌika vitˈiʃo.|0
kˈila mˈara mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌowaˈua baˈaði jˈao, wˌaliˌosalˈia wˌalimtafˈuta, wˌalimɡˌeukˈia tˈena kwa ʃaˈuku.|0
wˌalikumbˈuka kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa mwˈamba wˈao, kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌalikˈuwa mkombˈozi wˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌalimdaŋɡˈaɲa kwa vˈiɲua vjˈao, wˌakisˈema uˈoŋɡo kwa ndˈimi zˈao.|0
miˈojo jˈao hˌaikˈuwa θabˈiti kwˈake, wˈala hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu katˌika aɡˈano lˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌalikˈuwa na hurˈuma, ˌalisamˈehe maˈovu jˈao na hˌakuwˌaaŋɡamˈiza. mˈara kwa mˈara ˌalizuˈia hasˈira jˈake, wˈala hˌakutʃotʃˈea ɣaðˈabu jˌake jˈote.|0
ˌalikumbˈuka kwˌamba wˌao wˌalikˈuwa ɲˈama tˈu, upˈepo ˌupitˈao ambˈao hˌaurˈudi.|0
mˈara ŋɡˈapi wˌalimwˈasi ɟaŋɡwˈani na kˌumhuzunˈiʃa ɲikˈani.|0
wˌalimɟarˈibu mˈuŋɡu mˈara kwa mˈara, wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌawakˌukumbˈuka uwˈezo wˈake, sˈiku ˌalijˌowakombˈoa kutˈoka kwa mtˈesi.|0
sˈiku ˌalijˌooɲˈeʃa iʃˈara zˌake za aɟˈabu hˌuko mˈisri, mˌaaɟˈabu jˌake hˌuko soˈani.|0
ˌaliɡeˈuza mˈito jˈao kˌuwa dˈamu, hˌawakuwˈeza kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka viɟˈito vjˈao.|0
ˌaliwˌapelekˈea makˈundi ja maˈinzi jˌakawˈala, na vjˈura wˌakawˌaharˈibu.|0
ˌaliruhˈusu tunˈutu kˌuharˈibu mimˈea jˈao, mazˈao jˈao kwa nzˈiɡe.|0
ˌaliharˈibu mˌizabˈibu jˈao kwa mvˈua ja mˈawe na mikˈuju jˈao kwa mvˈua ˌilijˌotʃaŋɡamˈana na θelˈuɟi.|0
ˌaliwˌaatʃˈia mifˈuɡo jˈao mvˈua ja mˈawe, ˌakajapˈiɡa makˈundi ja waɲˈama wˌao kwa rˈadi.|0
ˌaliwˌafuŋɡulˈia hasˈira jˌake kˈali, ɣaðˈabu jˈake, hasˈira na ˌuadˈui, na kˈundi la mˌalaˈika wa kˌuharˈibu.|0
ˌaliˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea ɲɟˈia hasˈira jˈake, hˌakuwˌaepˈuʃa na kˈifo, bˌali ˌaliwˌaatʃˈia taˈuni.|0
ˌaliwapˈiɡa wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza wa mˈisri, matˈunda ja kwˈanza ja uɟˈana katˌika mahˈema ja hˈamu.|0
lakˈini ˌaliwatˈoa wˈatu wˌake kˌama kˈundi, ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza kˌama kondˈoo kˌupitˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
ˌaliwˌaoŋɡˈoza salˈama, wˈala hˌawakˌuoɡˈopa, bˌali bahˈari ˌiliwamˈeza adˈui zˈao.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawalˈeta hˌadi kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake tˌakatˈifu, hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima ambˈajo mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeitwˈaa.|0
ˌalijˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa mbˈele jˈao, na kˌuwaɡawˈia ˈn̩tʃi zˈao kˌama urˈiθi, ˌaliwˌakalˈiʃa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli katˌika makˈao jˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌao wˌalimɟarˈibu mˈuŋɡu, na kuˈasi ðˈidi ja jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, wˈala hˌawakˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈake.|0
kˌama bˈaba zˈao, hˌawakˈuwa θabˈiti wˈala wˌaaminˈifu, wakˈawa wˌasiowˈeza kˌuteɡemˈewa kˌama upˈinde wˌeɲe kasˈoro.|0
wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu kwa mahˈali pˈao pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, wˌakatʃotʃˈea wˈivu wˌake kwa sanˈamu zˈao.|0
wakˈati mˈuŋɡu ˌalipˌowasikˈia, ˌalikˌasirˈika sˈana, ˌakamkatˈaa ˌisraˈeli kabˈisa.|0
ˌakaiˈatʃa hˈema ja ʃˈilo, hˈema ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameiwˈeka kˌatikˈati ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
ˌakalˌipelˈeka sandˈuku la ŋɡˈuvu zˌake ˌutumwˈani, ˌutukˈufu wˌake mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui.|0
ˌaliatʃˈia wˈatu wˌake wˌauˈawe kwa upˈaŋɡa, ˌakaˌukasˌirikˈia sˈana urˈiθi wˈake.|0
mˈoto ˌuliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza viɟˈana wˈao, na wˌanawˈali wˌao hˌawakˌuimbˈiwa ɲˈimbo za arˈusi.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌao wˌaliuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈala waɟˈane wˌao hˌawakuwˈeza kulˈia.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌalipoˈamka kˌama vˈile kuˈamka ˌusiŋɡizˈini, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu ˌaamkˈavjo kutˈoka kwˈeɲe bˌumbuˈazi la mvˈiɲo.|0
ˌaliwapˈiɡa na kˌuwaʃˈinda adˈui zˈake, ˌakawatˈia katˌika aˈibu ja milˈele.|0
ndˈipo ˌalipˌozikatˈaa hˈema za josˈefu, hˌakulˌitʃaɡˈua kabˈila la ˌefraˈimu.|0
lakˈini ˌalilˌitʃaɡˈua kabˈila la jˈuda, mlˈima sajˈuni, ambˈao ˌaliupˈenda.|0
ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa pˌatakatˈifu pˈake kˌama vilˈele, kˌama dunˈia ambˈajo ˌaliˌimarˈiʃa milˈele.|0
ˌakamtʃaɡˈua daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˌake na kumtˈoa kwˈeɲe mazˈizi ja kondˈoo.|0
kutˈoka kutʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo ˌalimlˈeta kˌuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa wˈatu wˌake jakˈobo, wa ˌisraˈeli urˈiθi wˈake.|0
nˌaje daˈudi ˌaliwatʃˈuŋɡa kwa ˌuadilˈifu wa mˈojo, kwa mikˈono ja ustˈadi ˌaliwˌaoŋɡˈoza.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˌataˈifa jˌameˌuvamˈia urˈiθi wˈako, wˌamelˌinaɟˈisi hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu, wˌameifˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa maɡˈofu.|0
wˌametˈoa maˈiti za wˌatumˈiʃi kˌuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na ɲˈama ja wˌatakatˈifu wˈako kwa waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˌamemwˈaɡa dˈamu kˌama mˈaɟi kˌuzuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu jˈote, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌuwazˈika.|0
tˌumekˈuwa kˈitu tʃa aˈibu kwa ɟirˈani zˈetu, tʃa ðarˈau na mzˈaha kwa wˈale wˌanaˌotuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
hˌata lˈini, ˈee bwˈana? ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌutakˌasirˈika milˈele? wˈivu wˈako ˌutawˈaka kˌama mˈoto hˌadi lˈini.|0
mwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈako kwa mˌataˈifa jˌasijˌokukubˈali, ɟˌuːja fˈalme za hˈao wˌasiˌoliitˈia ɟˈina lˈako.|0
kwa maˈana wˌamemrarˈua jakˈobo na kˌuharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi ja makˈao jˈake.|0
ˌusitˌuhesabˈie ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈetu, hurˈuma jˈako na ˌituɟˈie hˈima, kwa maˈana tu wˌahitˈaɟi ˈm̩no.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈetu, ˌutusˌaidˈie, kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutukˈufu wa ɟˈina lˈako; tˌuokˈoe na kˌutusamˈehe ðˈambi zˈetu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
kwa nˈini mˌataˈifa wasˈeme, jˈuko wˈapi mˈuŋɡu wˈenu? mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈetu, ðˌihirˈiʃa kˈati ja mˌataˈifa kwˌamba ˌunalipˈiza kisˈasi dˈamu ˌilijomwˈaɡwa ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
kilˈio tʃa huzˈuni tʃa wafˈuŋɡwa kifˈike mbˈele zˈako; kwa ŋɡˈuvu za mkˈono wˈako hifˈaði wˈale wˌaliˌohukumˈiwa kˈufa.|0
wˌalipˈize ɟirˈani zˈetu mˈara sˈaba vˌifuˈani m̩wˈao aˈibu wˌalizˌovurumˈiʃa ɟˈuu jˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo sˌisi wˈatu wˈako, kondˈoo wa malˈiʃo jˈako, tˌutakusˈifu milˈele; tˌoka kizˈazi hˌadi kizˈazi tˌutasˌimulˈia sˈifa zˈako.|0
ˈee mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa ˌisraˈeli tˌusikˈie, wˌewe ˌumwoŋɡozˈaje josˈefu kˌama kˈundi; wˌewe ˌuketˈije katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˌatikˈati ja mˌakerˈubi, aŋɡˈaza.|0
mbˈele ja ˌefraˈimu, bˌeɲamˈini na manˈase. uˈamʃe ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, ˈuɟe ˌutuokˈoe.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌutureɟˈeʃe, ˌutuˌaŋɡazˈie ˈuso wˈako, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuokolˈewa.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, hˌata lˈini hasˈira jˈako ˌitawˈaka na kufˈoka mˈoʃi ðˈidi ja maˈombi ja wˈatu wˈako.|0
ˌumewalˈiʃa kwa mkˈate wa matʃˈozi, ˌumewafˈaɲa wˈaɲue matʃˈozi bakˈuli tˈele.|0
tˌumekˈuwa tʃˈanzo tʃa uɡˈomvi kwa ɟirˈani zˈetu, na adˈui zˈetu wˌanatˌuðihˈaki.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌutureɟˈeʃe; ˌutuˌaŋɡazˈie ˈuso wˈako, nˌasi tuwˈeze kˌuokolˈewa.|0
ˌulilˈeta mzabˈibu kutˈoka mˈisri, ˌukawˌafukˈuza mˌataˈifa, ˌukaupˈanda.|0
ˌuliandˈaa ʃˈamba kwa aɟˈili jˈake, mizˈizi ikˈawa imˈara, ˌukaɟˈaza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
milˈima ˌilifunˈikwa kwa kivˈuli tʃˈake, matˈawi jˌake jˌakafunˈika mˌierˈezi mikˈubwa.|0
matˈawi jˌake jˌalienˈea mpˈaka bˌaharˈini, mˌatʃipukˈizi jˌake mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈm̩to.|0
mbˈona ˌumebomˈoa kˈuta zˌake ˌili wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu wˌazitʃˈume zabˈibu zˈake.|0
ŋɡurˈuwe mwˈitu wˌanaˌuharˈibu na waɲˈama wa kondˈeni hˌuɟilˈiʃa hˈumo.|0
tˌurudˈie, ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote! tazˈama tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na uˈone! lˈinda mzabˈibu hˈuu.|0
ˈm̩tʃe ˌuliˌoupˈanda kwa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, mwˈana ˌulijemlˈea kwa aɟˈili jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
mzabˈibu wˈako ˌumekˈatwa, ˌumetʃˈomwa mˈoto, ˌunapˌowakemˈea, wˈatu wˈako hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
mkˈono wˈako na ˌutulˈie ɟˌuːja ˈm̩tu ˌalijˈeko mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, mwˈana wa ˈm̩tu ˌulijemlˈea kwa aɟˈili jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
ndˈipo hˌatutˌakuˈatʃa tˈena, ˌutuhuˈiʃe, nˌasi tˌutalˌiitˈia ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌutureɟˈeʃe; ˌutuˌaŋɡazˈie ˈuso wˈako, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuokolˈewa.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni kwa furˈaha, mˈuŋɡu alˈije ŋɡˈuvu jˈetu; mpˌiɡiˈeni kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
anzˈeni wˈimbo, piɡˈeni matˈari, piɡˈeni kinˈubi na zˈeze kwa saˈuti nzˈuri.|0
hˌii ni ˈamri kwa ˌisraˈeli, aɡˈizo la mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
ˌaliiwˈeka ˈiwe kˌama ʃerˈia kwa josˈefu ˌalipotˈoka ðˈidi ja mˈisri, hˌuko tˌulikˌosikˈia lˈuɣa ambˈajo hˌatukˌuielˈewa.|0
asˈema, nˌimeondˈoa mzˈiɡo mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao; mikˈono jˈao ˌiliwˈekwa hˈuru kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kikˈapu.|0
katˌika ʃˈida jˈako ˌuliniˈita nˌami nˌikakˌuokˈoa, nˌilikuɟˈibu katˌika mawˈiŋɡu jˌeɲe ŋɡurˈumo; nˌilikˌuɟarˈibu katˌika mˈaɟi ja merˈiba.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, sˌikiˈeni, nˌami nˌitawaˈoɲa: laˈiti kˌama mŋɡˌenisˌikilˈiza, ˈee ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌamtakˈuwa na mˈuŋɡu mɡˈeni mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu; msˌimsuɟudˈie mˈuŋɡu wa kiɡˈeni.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu hˌawakutˈaka kˌunisˌikilˈiza; ˌisraˈeli hˌakutˈaka kˌunitˈii.|0
bˌasi nˌiliwaˈatʃa katˌika ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao wˌafuˈate mˌaʃaˈuri jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
laˈiti kˌama wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaŋɡalˌinisˌikilˈiza, kˌama ˌisraˈeli wˌaŋɡalˌifuˈata ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌiŋɡalˌiwatiˈiʃa adˈui zˈao kwa harˈaka, na kˌuuɡeˈuza mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja watˈesi wˈao.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌomtʃukˈia bwˈana wˌaŋɡalˌiɲeɲekˈea mbˈele zˈake, na aðˈabu jˈao ˌiŋɡedˈumu milˈele.|0
bˌali nˈiɲi mŋɡˌalilˈiʃwa ŋɡˈano ilˈijo bˈora, na kˌuwatˌoʃelˈeza kwa asˈali ˌitokˈajo kwˈeɲe mwˈamba.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌanaoŋɡˈoza kˌusaɲˈiko kˈuu, ˌanatˈoa hukˈumu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa miˈuŋɡu.|0
hˌata lˈini ˌutaˌendelˈea kˌuwatetˈea wasˈio hˈaki na kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo kwa waˈovu.|0
tˌeteˈeni waɲˈoŋɡe na jatˈima, tunzˈeni hˈaki za maskˈini na wˌaliˌoonˈewa.|0
mwˌokoˈeni mɲˈoŋɡe na mhitˈaɟi, wˌakomboˈeni kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwˈovu.|0
hˌawaɟˈui lolˈote, hˌawaelˈewi lolˈote. wˌanatembˈea ɡizˈani; misˈiŋɡi jˈote ja dunˈia ˌimetˌikisˈika.|0
nˌilisˈema, nˈiɲi ni miˈuŋɡu; nˈiɲi ɲˈote ni wˈana wa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana..|0
lakˈini mtakˈufa kˌama wˌanadˈamu wa kˌawaˈida; mtˌaaŋɡˈuka kˌama mtawˈala mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, inˈuka ˌuihukˈumu ˈn̩tʃi, kwa kˌuwa mˌataˈifa jˈote ni urˈiθi wˈako.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌusiɲamˈaze kˈimja, ˌusiɲamˈaze, ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌusitulˈie.|0
tazˈama watˈesi wˈako wˌanafˈaɲa fˈuɟo, ɟˈinsi adˈui zˈako wˌanavjˌoinˈua vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
kwa hˈila, wˌanafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈako, wˌanafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja wˈale ˌunaˌowapˈenda.|0
wˌanasˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, tˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈize kˌama taˈifa, ˌili ɟˈina la ˌisraˈeli lˌisikumbˈukwe tˈena.|0
mahˈema ja edˈomu na wˌaiʃmaˈeli, ja wˌamoˈabu na wˌahaɡˈari.|0
ɡebˈali, amˈoni na ˌamalˈeki, ˌufilˈisti, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa tˈiro.|0
hˌata aʃˈuru wˌameuŋɡˈana nˌao kuwˈapa ŋɡˈuvu wazˈao wa lˈoti.|0
ˌuwatendˈee kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌowatendˈea mˌidiˈani, na kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌowatendˈea sisˈera na jabˈini hˈapo kiɟˈito tʃa kiʃˈoni.|0
ambˈao wˌaliˌaŋɡamˈia hˌuko endˈori na wakˈawa kˌama tˌakatˈaka ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wafˈaɲe wakˈuu wˌao kˌama orˈebu na zeˈebu, wˌatawˈala wˌao kˌama zˈeba na salmˈuna.|0
ambˈao wˌalisˈema, na tˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ja malˈiʃo ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, wˌapeperˈuʃe kˌama mavˈumbi ja kˌisulisˈuli, kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo na upˈepo.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈoto ˌutekˌetezˈavjo msˈitu ˌau mwˈali wa mˈoto ˌunavjˌouŋɡˈuza milˈima.|0
wˌafuˌatilˈie kwa tufˈani jˈako na kˌuwafˌaðaˈiʃa kwa ðorˈuba jˈako.|0
funˈika ɲˈuso zˈao kwa aˈibu ˌili wˈatu wˌalitafˈute ɟˈina lˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
wˌao na wˌaaibˈiʃwe na kˌufaðaˈiʃwa milˈele, na wˌaaŋɡamˈie kwa aˈibu.|0
hˈebu waɟˈue kwˌamba wˈewe, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈako ni bwˈana, kwˌamba wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ndˈiwe ulˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ja dunˈia jˈote.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, makˈao jˈako jˌapendˈeza kˌama nˈini.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinatamˈani sˈana, nˈaam, hˌata kuˈona ʃaˈuku, kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈua za bwˈana; mˈojo wˈaŋɡu na mwˈili wˈaŋɡu vˌinamlilˈia mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai.|0
hˌata ʃomˈoro ˌameɟˌipatˈia makˈao, mbˌajuwˈaju ˌameɟˌipatˈia kiˈota mahˈali ˌawezˈapo kuwˈeka makˈinda jˈake: mahˈali karˈibu na mˌaðabˈahu jˈako, ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mfˈalme wˈaŋɡu na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈeri wˈale wˌanaokˈaa ɲumbˈani mwˈako, wˌanaˌokusˈifu wˌewe daˈima.|0
hˈeri wˈale ambˈao ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˈiko kwˈako, na ɲɟˈia zˌiendˈazo sajˈuni zˈimo mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
wˌanapopˈita katˌika bˈonde la bˈaka, hˌulifˈaɲa mahˈali pa tʃemtʃˈemi, pˈia mvˈua za vˈuli hˌuliɟˈaza kwa madˈimbwi.|0
hˌuendelˈea tˌoka ŋɡˈuvu hˌadi ŋɡˈuvu, hˌadi kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌafikˈapo mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu hˌuko sajˈuni.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, sikˈia maˈombi jˈaŋɡu; nˌisikilˈize, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌuitazˈame ŋɡˈao jˈetu, mtazˈame kwa wˈema mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈako.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa katˌika ɲˈua zˈako ni bˈora kulˈiko sˈiku ˈelfu mahˈali peŋɡˈine; ˌafaðˈali nˌiŋɡekˈuwa bawˈabu katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu kulˈiko kukˈaa katˌika mahˈema ja waˈovu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni ɟˈua na ŋɡˈao, bwˈana hutˈoa wˈema na heʃˈima; hakˈuna kˈitu tʃˈema ˌanatʃˌowaɲˈima wˈale ambˈao hawˈana hatˈia.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, hˈeri ni ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanajˌekutˌumaˈini wˈewe.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌulioɲˈeʃa wˈema kwa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako. ˌulimrˌeɟeʃˈea jakˈobo barˈaka zˈake.|0
ˌulisamˈehe uˈovu wa wˈatu wˈako, na kˌufunˈika ðˈambi zˈao zˈote.|0
ˌuliwˈeka kˈando ɣaðˈabu jˈako jˈote na ˌumeɡeˈuka na kˌuiˈatʃa hasˈira jˈako kˈali.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈetu, ˌutureɟˈeʃe tˈena, nˌawe ˌuiondˈoe tʃˈuki jˈako ɟˈuu jˈetu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutatˌukasˌirikˈia milˈele? ˌutaˌendelˈeza hasˈira jˈako kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
ɟˈe, hˌutatˌuhuˈiʃa tˈena, ˌili wˈatu wˈako wˌakufˌurahˈie.|0
ˌutuoɲˈeʃe upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma, ˈee bwˈana, utˈupe wokˈovu wˈako.|0
nˌitasˌikilˈiza lˈile ˌatakˌalosˈema mˈuŋɡu alˈije bwˈana; ˌanaahˈidi amˈani kwa wˈatu wˈake, wˌatakatˈifu wˈake: lakˈini nˌao wˌasirudˈie ˌupumbˈavu.|0
hakˈika wokˈovu wˌake ˈuko karˈibu na wˈale wamtʃˈao, ˌili ˌutukˈufu wˌake udˈumu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu.|0
upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu hˌukutˈana pamˈoɟa, hˈaki na amˈani hˌubusiˈana.|0
ˌuaminˈifu hˌutʃipˈua kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi, hˈaki hˌutazˈama tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
nˈaam, hakˈika bwˈana ˌatatˈoa kilˈitʃo tʃˈema, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu ˌitazˈaa mavˈuno jˈake.|0
hˈaki ˌitatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˌake na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza ɲɟˈia kwa aɟˈili ja hatˈua zˈake.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia na ˌuniɟˈibu, kwa maˈana mˌimi ni maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi.|0
lˈinda maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana nˌimeɟiwˈeka kwˈako, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mwokˈoe mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanajˌekutˌumaˈini.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌihurumˈie mˈimi, kwa maˈana nˌinakuˈita mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˈm̩pe mtumˈiʃi wˈako furˈaha, kwa kˌuwa kwˈako wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌinainˈua nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni mwˈema na mwˌeɲe kˌusamˈehe, ˌumeɟˈaa upˈendo kwa wˈote wˌakuitˈao.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia maˈombi jˈaŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌunihˌurumˈie.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ʃˈida jˈaŋɡu nˌitakuˈita, kwa maˈana wˌewe ˌutaniɟˈibu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kˌatikˈati ja miˈuŋɡu hakˈuna kˌama wˈewe, hakˈuna matˈendo ja kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa na jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˌataˈifa jˈote ˌulijˌojafˈaɲa jˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuabˈudu mbˈele zˈako; wˌatalˌiletˈea ˌutukˈufu ɟˈina lˈako.|0
kwa maˈana wˌewe ni m̩kˈuu, na ˌunafˈaɲa mˈambo ja aɟˈabu; wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌifundˈiʃe ɲɟˈia jˈako, nˌami nˌitakwˈenda katˌika kwˈeli jˈako; nˈipe mˈojo ˌusiˌositasˈita, ˌili niwˈeze kulˈitʃa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakusˈifu kwa mˈojo wˈote; nˌitalˌiaðimˈiʃa ɟˈina lˈako milˈele.|0
kwa maˈana upˈendo wˈako ni m̩kˈuu kwˈaŋɡu; ˌumenˌiokˈoa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vilˈindi vja kabˈuri.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno wˌananˌiʃambulˈia; kˈundi la wˈatu wˌakatˈili lˌinatafˈuta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu: wˈatu wˌasiˌokuheʃˈimu wˈewe.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ni mˈuŋɡu wa hurˈuma na neˈema, si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira, bˌali ni mwˈiŋɡi wa upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu.|0
nˌiɡeukˈie na ˌunihˌurumˈie; ˈm̩pe mtumˈiʃi wˈako ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, mwokˈoe mwˈana wa mtumˈiʃi wˈako wa kˈike.|0
nˈipe iʃˈara ja wˈema wˈako, ˌili adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌaiˈone nˌao wˌaaibˈiʃwe, kwa kˌuwa wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenˌisaidˈia na kˌunifarˈiɟi.|0
ˌameuwˈeka msˈiŋɡi wˌake katˌika mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu.|0
bwˈana ˌanajapˈenda malˈaŋɡo ja sajˈuni kulˈiko makˈao jˈote ja jakˈobo.|0
mˈambo mˌatukˈufu jˌanasˈemwa ɟˈuu jˈako, ˈee ˈm̩ɟi wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˌitawˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu ja rahˈabu na babˈeli mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌonikubˈali mˈimi: ˌufilˈisti pˈia na tˈiro, pamˈoɟa na kˈuʃi, nˌami nˌitasˈema, hˈuju ˌalizalˈiwa sajˈuni..|0
kuhˈusu sajˈuni ˌitasˈemwa hˈivi, hˈuju na jˈule wˌalizalˈiwa hˈumo, nˌaje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana mweɲˈewe ˌatamwˌimarˈiʃa.|0
bwˈana ˌataandˈika katˌika orˈoða ja mˌataˈifa: hˈuju ˌalizalˈiwa sajˈuni.|0
wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌanapˈiɡa vinˈanda wˌataˈimba, tʃemtʃˈemi zˈaŋɡu zˈote zˈiko kwˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu ˌuniˌokoˈaje, nˌimelˈia mbˈele zˈako usˈiku na mtʃˈana.|0
maˈombi jˈaŋɡu jafˈike mbˈele zˈako, ˌuteɡˈee kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu sikˈio lˈako.|0
kwa maˈana nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌimeɟˈaa taˈabu, na maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌanakˌaribˈia kabˈuri.|0
nˌimehˌesabˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaendˈao ʃimˈoni, nˈiko kˌama ˈm̩tu asˈije na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
nˌimetˈeŋɡwa pamˈoɟa na wˈafu, kˌama wˌaliotʃˈiɲɟua wˌalalˈao kˌaburˈini, ambˈao hˌuwakumbˈuki tˈena, ambˈao wˌamekˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wˈako.|0
ˌumenitˈupa katˌika ʃˈimo lˈeɲe kˈina kirˈefu sˈana, katˌika vˈina vja ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌimekˈuwa nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, ˌumenˌiɣarikˈiʃa kwa mawˈimbi jˈako jˈote.|0
nˈuru ja mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu ˌimefifˈia kwa aɟˈili ja huzˈuni. ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakuˈita kˈila sˈiku, nˌinakˌuɲooʃˈea wˌewe mikˈono jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌuwaoɲˈeʃa wˈafu mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako? ɟˈe, wˈale wˌaliokˈufa hˌuinˈuka na kˌukusˈifu.|0
ɟˈe, upˈendo wˈako hˌutaŋɡˈazwa kˌaburˈini, ˌuaminˈifu wˈako katˌika ˌuharibˈifu.|0
ɟˈe, mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako hˌuɟulikˈana mahˈali pa ɡˈiza, ˌau matˈendo jˈako ja hˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌusahˌaulˈifu.|0
lakˈini nˌinakˌulilˈia wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunisˌaidˈie; ˌasubˈuhi maˈombi jˈaŋɡu hˈuɟa mbˈele zˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kwa nˈini ˌunanˌikatˈaa na kˌunifˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako.|0
ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu nˌimetesˈeka, nˌikakˌaribˈia kˈifo; nˌimepˈatwa na hˈofu zˈako, nˌami nˌimekˈata tamˈaa.|0
ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌimepˈita ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu; hˈofu zˈako zˌimenˌiaŋɡamˈiza.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa zˌinanˌizuŋɡˈuka kˌama mˌafurˈiko; zˌimenimˈeza kabˈisa.|0
ˌumenˌiondolˈea mˌarafˈiki na wapˈendwa wˈaŋɡu; ɡˈiza lˌimekˈuwa ndˈilo rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu wa karˈibu kulˈiko wˈote.|0
nˌitaˈimba ɟˌuːja upˈendo m̩kˈuu wa bwˈana milˈele; kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu nˌitaɟulˈiʃa ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌuɟulikˈane kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
nˌitataŋɡˈaza kˌuwa upˈendo wˈako ˌunasimˈama imˈara milˈele na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌumeˌuθibitˈiʃa mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌulisˈema, nˌimefˈaɲa aɡˈano na mteˈule wˈaŋɡu, nˌimemwapˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi.|0
nˌitaˌimarˈiʃa uzˈao wˈako milˈele na kˌudumˈiʃa ufˈalme wˈako kwa vizˈazi vjˈote..|0
ˈee bwˈana, mbˈiŋɡu zˌinajasˈifu mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako, ˌuaminˈifu wˈako pˈia katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˌatakatˈifu.|0
kwa kˌuwa ni nˈani katˌika mbˈiŋɡu ˌanajewˈeza kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa na bwˈana? ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa viˈumbe vja mbiŋɡˈuni alˈije kˌama bwˈana.|0
katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˌatakatˈifu, mˈuŋɡu hˌuoɡˈopwa sˈana, ˌanahofˈiwa kulˈiko wˈote wˌanaˌomzuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ni nˈani alˈije kˌama wˈewe? ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌunakˌuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
wˌewe ˌunatawˈala bahˈari jˌeɲe msˌukosˈuko; wakˈati mawˈimbi jˌake jˌanapˌoinˈuka, wˌewe ˌunajˌatulˈiza.|0
wˌewe ˌulimpˈonda rahˈabu kˌama mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˌaliotʃˈiɲɟua; kwa mkˈono wˈako wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, ˌuliwˌatawˈaɲa adˈui zˈako.|0
mbˈiŋɡu ni zˈako, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi pˈia ni jˈako, ˌuliˌuwekˈea ˌulimwˈeŋɡu msˈiŋɡi pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo.|0
ˌuliˈumba kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini; tabˈori na hermˈoni wˌanalˌiimbˈia ɟˈina lˈako kwa furˈaha.|0
mkˈono wˈako ˌumeɟˈaa uwˈezo; mkˈono wˈako ˈuna ŋɡˈuvu, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ˌumetukˈuzwa.|0
hˈaki na hukˈumu n̩dˈio msˈiŋɡi wa kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi; upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu vˌinakˌutaŋɡulˈia.|0
hˈeri ni wˈale ambˈao wˌameɟifˈunza kˌukusˈifu kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe, wˌanaˌotembˈea katˌika mwˈaŋɡa wa uwˈepo wˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
wˌanaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika ɟˈina lˈako mtʃˈana kˈutwa, wˌanafurˈahi katˌika hˈaki jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni ˌutukˈufu na ŋɡˈuvu jˈao, kwa wˈema wˈako ˌunatukˈuza pˈembe jˈetu.|0
ˌulizuŋɡˈumza wakˈati fulˈani katˌika maˈono, kwa wˈatu wˈako wˌaaminˈifu, ˌukasˈema: nˌimewˈeka ŋɡˈuvu kwa ʃuɟˈaa, nˌimemwinˈua kiɟˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
nˌimemwˈona daˈudi, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, na nˌimemtˈia mafˈuta jˈaŋɡu mˌatakatˈifu.|0
kitˈaŋɡa tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitamtˌeɡemˈeza, hakˈika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌutamtˈia ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hakˈuna adˈui ˌatakˌajemtˈoza uʃˈuru, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌatakˌajemwonˈea.|0
