nˌitawapˈonda adˈui zˌake mbˈele zˌake na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza watˈesi wˈake.|0
upˈendo wˈaŋɡu mkˌamilˈifu ˌutakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu pˈembe jˌake ˌitatukˈuzwa.|0
nˌitauwˈeka mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja bahˈari, mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ɟˌuːja mˈito.|0
nˌaje ˌataniˈita kwa saˈuti, wˌewe ni bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, mwˈamba na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu..|0
nˌitamteˈua pˈia ˈawe mzalˈiwa wˈaŋɡu wa kwˈanza, ˌalijˌetukˈuka kulˈiko wafˈalme wˈote wa dunˈia.|0
nˌitadumˈiʃa upˈendo wˈaŋɡu kwˈake milˈele, na aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˌaje lˌitakˈuwa imˈara.|0
nˌitaˌudumˈiʃa uzˈao wˌake milˈele, kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌama mbˈiŋɡu zˌinavjodˈumu.|0
kˌama wanˈae wˌataˈatʃa ˈamri jˈaŋɡu na wˌasifuˈate ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama wˌakihalˈifu mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu na kˌutoʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitaaðˈibu ðˈambi jˈao kwa fˈimbo, uˈovu wˌao kwa kˌuwapˈiɡa.|0
lakˈini sˌitaˌuondˈoa upˈendo wˈaŋɡu kwˈake, wˈala sˌitaˌusalˈiti ˌuaminˈifu wˈaŋɡu kˈamwe.|0
mˌimi sˌitavˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu wˈala sˌitabadˈili lˈile ambˈalo midˈomo jˈaŋɡu ˌimelitˈamka.|0
mˈara mˈoɟa na kwa milˈele, nˌimeˈapa kwa ˌutakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami sˌitamdaŋɡˈaɲa daˈudi.|0
kwˌamba uzˈao wˌake ˌutaˌendelˈea milˈele, na kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌitadˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu kˌama ɟˈua.|0
kˌitaˌimarˈiʃwa milˈele kˌama mwˈezi, ʃahˈidi mwˌaminˈifu aŋɡˈani.|0
lakˈini wˌewe ˌumemkatˈaa, ˌumemðarˈau, ˌumemkˌasirikˈia sˈana mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈako.|0
ˌumelikˈana aɡˈano lˈako na mtumˈiʃi wˈako, na ˌumeˌinaɟˈisi tˈaɟi jˌake mˌavumbˈini.|0
ˌumebomˈoa kˈuta zˌake zˈote, na ŋɡˈome zˌake zˈote ˌumezifˈaɲa kˌuwa maɡˈofu.|0
wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu wˌamemɲaŋɡˈaɲa mˈali zˈake; ˌamekˈuwa ðarˈau kwa ɟirˈani zˈake.|0
ˌumeˌutukˈuza mkˈono wa kuˈume wa adˈui zˈake, ˌumewafˈaɲa watˈesi wˌake wˈote wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie.|0
ˌumeɡeˈuza makˈali ja upˈaŋɡa wˈake, na hukˈumpa msaˈada katˌika vˈita.|0
ˌumeˌikomˈeʃa fahˈari jˈake, na kˌukiaŋɡˈuʃa kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi.|0
ˌumezˌifupˈiʃa sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈake, ˌumemfunˈika kwa vˈazi la aˈibu.|0
hˌata lˈini, ˈee bwˈana? ˌutaɟifˈitʃa milˈele? ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌitawˈaka kˌama mˈoto hˌata lˈini.|0
kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌanavjopˈita harˈaka. ni kwa ˌubatˈili kiˈasi ɡˈani ˌumemuˈumba mwˌanadˈamu.|0
ni ˈm̩tu ɡˈani ˌawezˈaje kuˈiʃi na ˌasiˈone kˈifo, ˌau kˌuɟiokˈoa mweɲˈewe kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za kabˈuri.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˈuko wˈapi upˈendo wˈako m̩kˈuu wa mwanzˈoni, ambˈao katˌika ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌulimwapˈia daˈudi.|0
bwˈana kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌamesimˈaŋɡwa, ɟˈinsi nˌinavjˌovumilˈia mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu ðihˈaka za mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
ðihˈaka ambˈazo kwˈazo adˈui zˈako wˌamenˌisimˈaŋɡa, ˈee bwˈana, ambˈazo kwˈazo wˌamesimˈaŋɡa kˈila hatˈua ja mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈako.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana milˈele! ˈamen na ˈamen.|0
bwˈana, wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa makˈao jˈetu katˌika vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
kˈabla ja kˌuzalˈiwa milˈima ˌau hˌuɟaˈumba dunˈia na ˌulimwˈeŋɡu, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu ʃˈu milˈele hˌata milˈele.|0
hˌuwarudˈiʃa wˈatu mˌavumbˈini, ˌukisˈema, rudˈini mˌavumbˈini, ˈeɲi wˌanadˈamu.|0
kwa maˈana kwˈako miˈaka ˈelfu ni kˌama sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌilijokwˈiʃa pˈita, ˌau kˌama kˈeʃa la usˈiku.|0
ˌunawˌatowˈeʃa wˌanadˈamu katˌika ˌusiŋɡˈizi wa kˈifo, nˌao ni kˌama maɟˈani matʃˈaŋɡa ja ˌasubˈuhi.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌasubˈuhi jˌanatʃipˈua, ˌifikˈapo ɟiˈoni hˈuwa jˌameɲaˈuka na kˌukaˈuka.|0
tˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa hasˈira jˈako na tˌumetˈiʃwa kwa ɣaðˈabu jˈako.|0
ˌumejawˈeka maˈovu jˈetu mbˈele jˈako, ðˈambi zˈetu za sˈiri katˌika nˈuru ja uwˈepo wˈako.|0
tˌumeˈiʃi sˈiku zˈetu zˈote tʃˈini ja ɣaðˈabu jˈako, tˌunamalˈiza miˈaka jˈetu kwa kˌuombolˈeza.|0
ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje ŋɡˈuvu za hasˈira jˈako? kwa maˈana ɣaðˈabu jˈako ni kˈubwa kˌama hˈofu tˌunajopˈaswa kˌuwa nˈajo kwˈako.|0
tˌufundˈiʃe kˌuzihesˈabu sˈiku zˈetu vizˈuri, ˌili tˌuɟipatˈie mˈojo wa hekˈima.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˈuwe na hurˈuma! ˌutakawˈia hˌata lˈini? wˌahurumˈie wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
ˌutufˌurahˈiʃe kˌuliŋɡˈana na sˈiku ˌulizˌotuaðˈibu, kˌuliŋɡˈana na miˈaka tˌulijˌotaabˈika.|0
matˈendo jˈako na jˌaonekˈane kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, ˌutukˈufu wˈako kwa watˈoto wˈao.|0
wˈema wa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˈuwe ɟˈuu jˈetu; ˌuziθˌibitˈiʃe kˈazi za mikˈono jˈetu: nˈaam, ˌuziθˌibitˈiʃe kˈazi za mikˈono jˈetu.|0
jˌeje ˌakaˈaje mahˈali pa salˈama pˈake jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, ˌatadˈumu katˌika uvˈuli wˌake mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitasˈema kumhˈusu bwˈana, jˌeje n̩dˈije kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje nˌinamtˌumaˈini.|0
hakˈika jˌeje ˌatanˌiokˈoa na mtˈeɡo wa mwindˈaɟi, na marˈaði ja kˌuambukˈiza ja kuˈua.|0
ˌatakˌufunˈika kwa maɲˈoja jˈake, tʃˈini ja mbˈawa zˌake ˌutapˈata kˌimbilˈio, ˌuaminˈifu wˌake ˌutakˈuwa ŋɡˈao na kˈiŋɡa jˈako.|0
hˌutaoɡˈopa vitˈiʃo vja usˈiku, wˈala mʃˈale ˌurukˈao mtʃˈana.|0
wˈala marˈaði ja kˌuambukˈiza jˌanajˌoɲemelˈea ɡizˈani, wˈala taˈuni ˌiharibˈujo ˌaðuhˈuri.|0
iɟˈapo wˈatu ˈelfu wˌataˌaŋɡukˈia kˈando jˈako, kˈumi ˈelfu mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, lakˈini hˌaitˌakukˌaribˈia wˈewe.|0
ˌutatazˈama tu kwa mˈatʃo jˈako na kuˈona aðˈabu ja waˈovu.|0
kˌama ˌukimfˈaɲa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana kˌuwa makˈao jˈako: nˈaam, bwˈana ambˈaje ni kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi hakˈuna maðˈara jˌatakˌajokupˈata wˈewe, hakˈuna maˈafa jˌataˌikaribˈia hˈema jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌatawˌaaɡˈiza mˌalaˈika zˌake kwa aɟˈili jˈako, wˌakulˈinde katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote.|0
mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao wˌatakˌuinˈua, ˌili ˌusiɟikwˈae m̩ɡˈuu wˈako kwˈeɲe ɟˈiwe.|0
ˌutawˌakaɲˈaɡa sˈimba na ɲˈoka wakˈali, sˈimba mkˈubwa na ɲˈoka ˌutawapˈonda kwa miɡˈuu.|0
bwˈana asˈema, kwa kˌuwa ˌananipˈenda, nˌitamwokˈoa; nˌitamlˈinda, kwa kˌuwa ˌanalikˈiri ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌataniˈita, nˌami nˌitamɟˈibu; nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje katˌika taˈabu, nˌitamwokˈoa na kˌumheʃˈimu.|0
kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi nˌitamʃibˈiʃa na kˌumwoɲˈeʃa wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ni vjˈema kˌumʃukˈuru bwˈana na kˌuliimbˈia ɟˈina lˈako, ˈee ulˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
kˌuutaŋɡˈaza upˈendo wˈako ˌasubˈuhi, na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
kwa zˈeze jˌeɲe ɲˈuzi kˈumi na kwa saˈuti ja kinˈubi.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa matˈendo jˈako jˌamenˌifurahˈiʃa, nˌitaziˈimba kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe kˈazi za mikˈono jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tazˈama ɟˈinsi jalˈivjo makˈuu matˈendo jˈako, tazˈama ɟˈinsi jalˈivjo ja kˈina mawˈazo jˈako.|0
mɟˈiŋɡa hˌafahˈamu, mpumbˈavu hˌaelˈewi.|0
iŋɡˈawa waˈovu hˌutʃipˈua kˌama maɟˈani na wˈote wˌatendˈao mabˈaja wˌanastˈawi, wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa milˈele.|0
bˌali wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌutatukˈuzwa milˈele.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hakˈika adˈui zˈako, hakˈika adˈui zˈako wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia. wˈote wˌatendˈao mabˈaja wˌatatˌawaɲˈika.|0
ˌumeˌitukˈuza pˈembe jˈaŋɡu kˌama ˈile ja ɲˈati dˈume, mafˈuta mazˈuri jˌamemimˈinwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamewaˈona adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌakiʃˈindwa, mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu jˌamesikˈia mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu waˈovu.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatastˈawi kˌama mtˈende, wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mwerˈezi wa lˌebanˈoni.|0
wˌaliopˈandwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, wˌatastˈawi katˌika ɲˈua za mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wakˈati wa uzˈee wˌatakˈuwa bˈado wˌanazˈaa matˈunda, wˌatakˈuwa wabˈitʃi tˈena wˌameɟˈaa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
wˌakitaŋɡˈaza, bwˈana ni mkˌamilˈifu; jˌeje ni mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, na ndˈani jˌake hˈamna uˈovu.|0
bwˈana ˌanatawˈala, ˌameɟivˈika ˌutukˈufu; bwˈana ˌameɟivˈika ˌutukˈufu tˈena ˌameɟivˈika ŋɡˈuvu. dunˈia ˌimewˈekwa imˈara, hˌaitˌaondˈoʃwa.|0
kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌimekˈuwa θabˈiti ʃˈu zamˈani; wˌewe ˌumekuwˈako ʃˈu milˈele.|0
bahˈari zˌimeinˈua, ˈee bwˈana, bahˈari zˌimeinˈua saˈuti zˈake; bahˈari zˌimeinˈua saˈuti za mawˈimbi jˈake.|0
jˌeje ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko ŋɡurˈumo ja mˈaɟi makˈuu, ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko mawˈimbi ja bahˈari: bwˈana ˌaiʃˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ni m̩kˈuu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ʃerˈia zˈako ni imˈara; ˌutakatˈifu ˌumepˈamba ɲˈumba jˈako pasˈipo mwˈiʃo.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌulipizˈaje kisˈasi, ˈee mˈuŋɡu ˌulipizˈaje kisˈasi, ˌuaŋɡˈaze sˈasa.|0
ˈee mhukˈumu wa dunˈia, inˈuka, ˌuwalipˈize wˌeɲe kibˈuri kˌama wˌanavjˌostahˈili.|0
hˌata lˈini, waˈovu, ˈee bwˈana, hˌata lˈini waˈovu wˌataʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
wˌanamimˈina manˈeno ja kibˈuri, watˈenda mabˈaja wˈote wˌameɟˈaa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌanawapˈonda wˈatu wˈako, wˌanawˌaonˈea urˈiθi wˈako.|0
wˌanamtʃˈiɲɟa mɟˈane na mɡˈeni, na kˌuwaˈua jatˈima.|0
nˌao husˈema, bwˈana haˈoni, mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo hˌafahˈamu.|0
sˌikizˈeni, ˈeɲi waɟˈiŋɡa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu; ˈeɲi wˌapumbˈavu, lˈini mtakˈuwa na hekˈima.|0
ɟˈe, ˌalijewˈeka sikˈio ˌasisikˈie? ˌalijeˈumba ɟˈitʃo ˌasiˈone.|0
ɟˈe, ˌanajˌeaðibˈiʃa mˌataˈifa ˌasiaðˈibu? ɟˈe, ˌawafˌundiʃˈaje wˌanadˈamu asˈiwe na mˌaarˈifa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hˈeri ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeaðibˈiʃwa na wˈewe, ˈm̩tu ˌunajˌemfundˈiʃa kwa ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
unˈampa ˌutulˈivu sˈiku za ʃˈida, mpˈaka ʃˈimo lˌitakˌapokˈuwa lˌimetʃˈimbwa kwa aɟˈili ja mwˈovu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hˌatawˌakatˈaa wˈatu wˈake, hˌatauˈatʃa urˈiθi wˈake.|0
hukˈumu ˌitasˌimamˈiʃwa tˈena kwˈeɲe hˈaki, wˈote walˈio na miˈojo miɲˈofu wˌataˌifuˈata.|0
ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeinˈuka ðˈidi ja mwˈovu kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajenikˈiŋɡa ðˈidi ja watˈenda maˈovu.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌasiŋɡˌelinˌisaidˈia upˈesi, nˌiŋɡelikˈuwa nˌinaˈiʃi katˌika ukˈimja wa kˈifo.|0
nˌiliposˈema, m̩ɡˈuu wˈaŋɡu ˌunatelˈeza, ˈee bwˈana, upˈendo wˈako ˌulinˌiʃikilˈia.|0
wakˈati wˌasiwˈasi ˌulipokˈuwa mwˈiŋɡi ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, farˈaɟa jˈako ˌilinˈipa furˈaha nafsˈini mwˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, kˈiti tʃa ˌutawˈala wa ˌuðalˈimu kˌitaɟiˈuŋɡa nˈawe, ˈule ˌutawˈala ˌuletˈao taˈabu kˌutokˈana na ʃerˈia zˈake.|0
hˌuuŋɡˈana kˌuwaʃˌambulˈia wˌeɲe hˈaki, kˌuwahukˈumu kˈufa wasˈio na hatˈia.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌamekˈuwa ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌamekˈuwa mwˈamba nˌinaˌoukˌimbilˈia.|0
jˌeje ˌatawalˈipa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao na ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja maˈovu jˈao; bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, tˌumwimbˈie bwˈana kwa furˈaha; tˌumfaɲˈie kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe mwˈamba wa wokˈovu wˈetu.|0
tˈuɟe mbˈele zˌake kwa ʃukrˈani, tˌumtukˈuze kwa vinˈanda na ɲˈimbo.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu, mfˈalme m̩kˈuu ɟˌuːja miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
mkonˈoni mwˈake ˈm̩na vilˈindi vja dunˈia, na vilˈele vja milˈima ni mˈali jˈake.|0
bahˈari ni jˈake, kwˈani n̩dˈije ˌaliifˈaɲa, na mikˈono jˌake ˌiliˈumba ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, tˌusuɟˈudu, tˌumwabˈudu, tupˈiɡe maɡˈoti mbˈele za bwˈana muˈumba wˈetu.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, na sˌisi ni wˈatu wa malˈiʃo jˈake, kondˈoo tʃˈini ja ˌutunzˈaɟi wˈake. kˌama mkˌiisikˈia saˈuti jˌake lˈeo.|0
ambˈapo bˈaba zˈenu wˌalinˌiɟarˈibu na kˌunipˈima, iŋɡˈawa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamejaˈona matˈendo jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini nˌilikˌasirikˈia kizˈazi kˈile, nˌikasˈema, hˈawa ni taˈifa ambˈalo miˈojo jˈao ˌimepotˈoka, nˌao hˌawaɟˌaziɟˈua ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana wˈimbo ˈm̩pja; mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana dunˈia jˈote.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana, lˌisifˈuni ɟˈina lˈake; tˌaŋɡazˈeni wokˈovu wˌake sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni ˌutukˈufu wˌake kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu mwˌeɲe kˌustahˈili kˌusifˈiwa kulˈiko wˈote; jˌeje ni wa kˌuoɡˈopwa kulˈiko miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
kwa maˈana miˈuŋɡu jˈote ja mˌataˈifa ni sanˈamu, lakˈini bwˈana ˌaliziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu.|0
fahˈari na ˈenzi vˈiko mbˈele jˈake; ŋɡˈuvu na ˌutukˈufu vˈimo pˌatakatˈifu pˈake.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana, ˈeɲi ɟamˈaa za mˌataˈifa, mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu ˌunaˌostahˈili ɟˈina lˈake; letˈeni sadˈaka na ˈm̩ɟe katˌika ɲˈua zˈake.|0
mwˌabudˈuni bwˈana katˌika uzˈuri wa ˌutakatˈifu wˈake; dunˈia jˈote na ˌitetemˈeke mbˈele zˈake.|0
kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa semˈeni, bwˈana ˌanatawˈala. ˌulimwˈeŋɡu ˌameuwˈeka imˈara, hˌauwˈezi kˌusoɡˈezwa; ˌatawˌahukˈumu wˈatu kwa ˌuadilˈifu.|0
mbˈiŋɡu na zˌiʃaŋɡilˈie, ˈn̩tʃi na ˌifurˈahi; bahˈari na ivˈume, na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
maʃˈamba na jˌaʃaŋɡilˈie, pamˈoɟa na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake. kˈiʃa mˈiti jˈote ja msitˈuni ˌitaˈimba kwa furˈaha.|0
ˌitaˈimba mbˈele za bwˈana kwa maˈana ˌanakˈuɟa, ˌanakˈuɟa kˌuihukˈumu dunˈia. ˌataˌihukˈumu dunˈia kwa hˈaki, na mˌataˈifa katˌika kwˈeli jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌanatawˈala, ˈn̩tʃi na ˌifurˈahi, visˈiwa vjˈote vˌiʃaŋɡilˈie.|0
mawˈiŋɡu na ɡˈiza nˈene vˌinamzuŋɡˈuka, hˈaki na hukˈumu n̩dˈio msˈiŋɡi wa kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi.|0
mˈoto hˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele zˌake na hˌuteketˈeza adˈui zˌake pˈande zˈote.|0
umˈeme wˌake wa rˈadi hˌumulˈika dunˈia, ˈn̩tʃi huˈona na kˌutetemˈeka.|0
milˈima hˌujejˈuka kˌama ˈn̩ta mbˈele za bwˈana, mbˈele za bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote.|0
mbˈiŋɡu zˌinataŋɡˈaza hˈaki jˈake, na mˌataˈifa jˈote huˈona ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
wˈote wˌaabudˈuo sanˈamu wˌaaibˈiʃwa, wˈale wˌaɟisˌifiˈao sanˈamu: mwˌabudˈuni jˈeje, ˈeɲi miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
sajˈuni hˌusikˈia na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia, viɟˈiɟi vja jˈuda vˌinafurˈahi kwa sabˈabu ja hukˈumu zˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ndˈiwe ulˈije ɟˈuu sˈana kulˈiko dunˈia jˈote; ˌumetukˈuka sˈana ɟˌuːja miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
wˈale wˌanaompˈenda bwˈana na wˌautʃukˈie uˈovu, kwa maˈana jˌeje hulˈinda maˈiʃa ja wˌaaminˈifu wˌake na kˌuwaokˈoa kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwˈovu.|0
nˈuru hˌuaŋɡˈaza wˌeɲe hˈaki na furˈaha kwa wˈatu waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
fˌurahˈini katˌika bwˈana, nˈiɲi m̩lˈio wˌeɲe hˈaki, lˌisifˈuni ɟˈina lˈake tˌakatˈifu.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana wˈimbo ˈm̩pja, kwa maˈana ˌametˈenda mˈambo ja aɟˈabu; kitˈaŋɡa tʃˈake tʃa kuˈume na mkˈono wˌake mtˌakatˈifu ˌumemfaɲˈia wokˈovu.|0
bwˈana ˌameufˈaɲa wokˈovu wˌake ˌuɟulikˈane na ˌameðˌihirˈiʃa hˈaki jˌake kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌameˌukumbˈuka upˈendo wˌake na ˌuaminˈifu wˌake kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli; miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia ˌimeuˈona wokˈovu wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
mpˌiɡiˈeni bwˈana kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe, dunˈia jˈote, ipˈaze saˈuti kwa ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe na vinˈanda.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana kwa kinˈubi, kwa kinˈubi na saˈuti za kuˈimba.|0
kwa tˌarumbˈeta na mvˈumo wa bˌaraɡˈumu za pˈembe za kondˈoo dˈume: ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni kwa furˈaha mbˈele za bwˈana, alˈije mfˈalme.|0
bahˈari na ivˈume na kˈila kˌiliˈomo ndˈani jˈake, dunˈia na wˈote wˌakaˈao ndˈani jˈake.|0
mˈito na ipˈiɡe makˈofi, milˈima na iˈimbe pamˈoɟa kwa furˈaha.|0
vjˈote na viˈimbe mbˈele za bwˈana, kwa maˈana juˈaɟa kˌuhukˈumu dunˈia. ˌatahukˈumu dunˈia kwa hˈaki na mˌataˈifa kwa hˈaki.|0
bwˈana ˌanatawˈala, mˌataˈifa na jˌatetemˈeke; ˌanakalˈia kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˌatikˈati ja mˌakerˈubi, dunˈia na ˌitikisˈike.|0
bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu katˌika sajˈuni; ˌametukˈuzwa ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
wˌanalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako ambˈalo ni kˈuu na la kˌuoɡˈopwa: jˌeje ni mtˌakatˈifu.|0
mfˈalme ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na hupˈenda hˈaki, wˌewe ˌumeθˌibitˈiʃa adˈili; katˌika jakˈobo ˌumefˈaɲa jalˈijo hˈaki na sˈawa.|0
mtˌukuzˈeni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, na mkˌaabˈudu katˌika mahˈali pa kˌuwekˈea miɡˈuu jˈake; jˌeje ni mtˌakatˈifu.|0
mˈose na arˈoni wˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakuhˈani wˈake, samwˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌoliitˈia ɟˈina lˈake; wˌalimwˈita bwˈana, nˌaje ˌaliwaɟˈibu.|0
ˌalizuŋɡˈumza nˌao kutˈoka ŋɡˈuzo ja wˈiŋɡu; wˌaliziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˌake na ˈamri ˌalizowˈapa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˈetu, ndˈiwe ˌulijˌewaɟˈibu, kwa ˌisraˈeli ˌulikˈuwa mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe kˌusamˈehe, iŋɡˈawa ˌuliaðˈibu matˈendo jˈao mabˈaja.|0
mpˌiɡiˈeni bwˈana kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe, dunˈia jˈote.|0
mwˌabudˈuni bwˈana kwa furˈaha; ɲɟoˈoni mbˈele zˌake kwa ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
ɟuˈeni kwˌamba bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu. jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌalituˈumba, sˌisi tu mˈali jˈake; sˌisi tu wˈatu wˈake, kondˈoo wa malˈiʃo jˈake.|0
ˌiŋɡiˈeni mˌalaŋɡˈoni mwˈake kwa ʃukrˈani na katˌika ɲˈua zˌake kwa kusˈifu, mʃˌukurˈuni jˌeje na kˌulisˈifu ɟˈina lˈake.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ni mwˈema na upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele; ˌuaminˈifu wˌake ˌunadˈumu kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
nˌitaˈimba ɟˌuːja upˈendo wˈako na hˈaki jˈako; kwˈako wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌitaˈimba sˈifa.|0
nˌitazˌiŋɡatˈia kuˈiʃi maˈiʃa jasˈijo na lawˈama: ˌutakˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu lˈini? nˌitatembˈea ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu kwa mˈojo usˈio na lawˈama.|0
sˌitawˈeka mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kˈitu kiˈovu. nˌinajˌatʃukˈia matˈendo ja wˈatu wasˈio na imˈani; hˌawatˌaʃikamˈana nˈami.|0
mˈojo wa ˌukaˈidi ˌutakˈuwa mbˈali nˈami; nˌitaɟitˈeŋɡa na kˈila ubˈaja.|0
kˈila ˌamsiŋɡˌiziˈaje ɟirˈani jˌake kwa sˈiri, hˈujo nˌitamɲˌamazˈiʃa; mwˌeɲe mˈatʃo ja ðarˈau na mˈojo wa kibˈuri hˈujo sˌitamvˌumilˈia.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌatawˌaelekˈea wˌaaminˈifu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili wawˈeze kuˈiʃi pamˈoɟa nˈami; jˌeje ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake haˈuna lawˈama ˌatanˌitumikˈia.|0
mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu hˌatakˈaa ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ˌasemˈaje kwa uˈoŋɡo hˌatasimˈama mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈila ˌasubˈuhi nˌitawˌaɲamazˈiʃa waˈovu wˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; nˌitamkˌatilˈia mbˈali kˈila mtˈenda mabˈaja kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikˈie maˈombi jˈaŋɡu, kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa kuˈomba msaˈada kˌikufikˈie.|0
ˌusinifˈitʃe ˈuso wˈako nˌinapokˈuwa katˌika ʃˈida. ˌuniteɡˈee sikˈio lˈako, nˌinapoˈita, ˌuniɟˈibu kwa upˈesi.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˌinatowˈeka kˌama mˈoʃi, mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu ˌinauŋɡˈua kˌama kˈaa la mˈoto.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumefifˈia na kˌuɲaˈuka kˌama ɟˈani, nˌinasahˈau kˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja kˌusononˈeka kwˈaŋɡu kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, nˌimebakˈia ŋɡˈozi na mifˈupa.|0
nˌimekˈuwa kˌama bˈundi wa ɟaŋɡwˈani, kˌama bˈundi kwˈeɲe maɡˈofu.|0
nˌilalˈapo sipˈati ˌusiŋɡˈizi, nˌimekˈuwa kˌama ndˈeɡe mpwˈeke kwˈeɲe pˈaa la ɲˈumba.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu hˌuniðihˈaki, wˈale wˌanaˌonizuŋɡˈuka hˌutumˈia ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kˌama laˈana.|0
nˌinakˈula maɟˈivu kˌama tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu na nˌimetʃaŋɡˈaɲa kˌiɲuˈaɟi tʃˈaŋɡu na matʃˈozi.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ɣaðˈabu jˈako kˈuu, kwa maˈana ˌumenˌiinˈua na kˌunitˈupa kˈando.|0
sˈiku zˈaŋɡu ni kˌama kivˈuli tʃa ɟiˈoni, nˌinaɲaˈuka kˌama ɟˈani.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumekˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi milˈele, sˈifa zˈako za ukˈuu zˌaendelˈea vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
ˌutainˈuka na kˌuihˌurumˈia sajˈuni, kwa maˈana ni wakˈati wa kˌumwoɲˈeʃa wˈema; wakˈati ˌuliˌokubalˈika ˌumewadˈia.|0
kwa maˈana mˈawe jˌake ni ja θamˈani kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, vˈumbi lˈake leɲˈewe hˌulionˈea hurˈuma.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌataoɡˈopa ɟˈina la bwˈana, wafˈalme wˈote wa dunˈia wˌataˌuheʃˈimu ˌutukˈufu wˈako.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌataiɟˈeŋɡa tˈena sajˈuni na kˌutokˈea katˌika ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
ˌataˌitikˈia maˈombi ja ˈm̩tu mkˈiwa, wˈala hˌataðarˈau hˈoɟa jˈao.|0
hˈili na lˌiandˈikwe kwa aɟˈili ja kizˈazi kiɟˈatʃo, ˌili taˈifa lˌitakˌaloˈumbwa bˌaadˈaje wawˈeze kumsˈifu bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌalitazˈama tʃˈini kutˈoka pˌatakatˈifu pˈake palˈipo ɟˈuu, kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌalitazˈama dunˈia.|0
kˌusikilˈiza vilˈio vja utʃˈuŋɡu vja wafˈuŋɡwa na kˌuwawˈeka hˈuru wˈale wˌaliˌohukumˈiwa kˈufa.|0
kwa hˈijo ɟˈina la bwˈana lˌataŋɡˈazwa hˌuko sajˈuni na sˈifa zˌake katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wakˈati mˌataˈifa na fˈalme zˌitakˌapokˌusaɲˈika ˌili kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
katˌika kuˈiʃi kwˈaŋɡu ˌalivˈuɲɟa ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu, ˌakafupˈiʃa sˈiku zˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˌiliposˈema: ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌusinˌitʃukˈue kˌatikˈati ja sˈiku zˈaŋɡu; miˈaka jˈako ˌinaˌendelˈea vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
hˈapo mwˈanzo ˌuliwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia, nˈazo mbˈiŋɡu ni kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈako.|0
hˈizi zˌitatowˈeka, lakˈini wˌewe ˌutadˈumu, zˈote zˌitatʃakˈaa kˌama vˈazi. ˌutazˌibadilˈiʃa kˌama ŋɡˈuo nˈazo zˌitaondˈoʃwa.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, u jˌeje jˈule, nˈajo miˈaka jˈako hˌaikˈomi kˈamwe.|0
watˈoto wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wˌataˈiʃi mbˈele zˈako; wazˈao wˌao wˌataˌimarˈiʃwa mbˈele zˈako.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, ˌumhimˈidi bwˈana. vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu vˌilihimˈidi ɟˈina lˈake tˌakatˈifu.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, ˌumhimˈidi bwˈana, wˈala ˌusisahˈau wˈema wˌake wˈote.|0
ˌakusamˈehe ðˈambi zˈako zˈote, ˌakupˈoɲa maɡˈoɲɟua jˈako jˈote.|0
ˌaukombˈoa uhˈai wˈako na kabˈuri, ˌakuvˈika tˈaɟi ja upˈendo na hurˈuma.|0
ˌatoʃelˈeza mˌahitˈaɟi jˈako kwa vˈitu vjˈema, ˌili uɟˈana wˈako ˌuhuˈiʃwe kˌama wa tˈai.|0
bwˈana hutˈenda hˈaki, nˌaje huwˈapa hukˈumu ja hˈaki wˈote wˌanaˌoonˈewa.|0
ˌaliɟulˈiʃa mˈose ɲɟˈia zˈake, na wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli matˈendo jˈake.|0
jˌeje hˌatalaˈumu sˈiku zˈote, wˈala hawˈeki hasˈira jˌake milˈele.|0
jˌeje hˌatutendˈei kˌuliŋɡˈana na ðˈambi zˈetu wˈala hˌatupˌatilˈizi kwa kadˈiri ja maˈovu jˈetu.|0
kˌama vˈile mbˈiŋɡu zilˈivjo ɟˌuːja dunˈia sˈana, ndˈivjo wˈema wˌake ulˈivjo mwˈiŋɡi kwa wˌanaˈomtʃa.|0
kˌama mˌaʃarˈiki ilˈivjo mbˈali na mˌaɣarˈibi, ndˈivjo mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌoziwˈeka ðˈambi zˈetu mbˈali nˈasi.|0
kˌama bˈaba alˈivjo na hurˈuma kwa watˈoto wˈake, ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌanavjˌowahˌurumˈia wˈale wˌanaˈomtʃa.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌanaɟˈua tˌulivjoˈumbwa, ˌanakumbˈuka kwˌamba sˌisi tu mavˈumbi.|0
kuhˈusu mwˌanadˈamu, sˈiku zˌake ni kˌama maɟˈani, ˌanatʃanˈua kˌama ˈua la ʃambˈani.|0
upˈepo huvˈuma ɟˈuu jˌake nˈalo hˌutowˈeka, mahˈali pˈake hˌapalˌikumbˈuki tˈena.|0
lakˈini kutˈoka milˈele hˌata milˈele upˈendo wa bwˈana ˈuko kwa wˈale wamtʃˈao, nˈajo hˈaki jˌake kwa watˈoto wa watˈoto wˈao.|0
kwa wˈale wˌaliʃikˈao aɡˈano lˈake na kˌukumbˈuka kˌujatˈii mˌausˈia jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌamewˈeka imˈara kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi mbiŋɡˈuni, ufˈalme wˌake ˌunatawˈala ɟˌuːja vjˈote.|0
mhˌimidˈini bwˈana, ˈeɲi mˌalaˈika zˈake, nˈiɲi m̩lˈio mˌaʃuɟˈaa mnˌaozitˈii ˈamri zˈake, nˈiɲi mnˌaotˈii nˈeno lˈake.|0
mhˌimidˈini bwˈana, nˈiɲi ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote la mbiŋɡˈuni, nˈiɲi wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake mnˌaofˈaɲa mapˈenzi jˈake.|0
mhˌimidˈini bwˈana, kˈazi zˌake zˈote kˈila mahˈali katˌika mˈilki jˈake. ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, ˌumhimˈidi bwˈana.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, ˌumhimˈidi bwˈana. ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, wˌewe ni m̩kˈuu sˈana, ˌumeɟivˈika ˌutukˈufu na ˈenzi.|0
ˌameɟˌifunˈika katˌika nˈuru kˌama vˈile kwa vˈazi, ˌamezˌitandˈaza mbˈiŋɡu kˌama hˈema.|0
na kˌuziwˈeka ŋɡˈuzo za orˈofa jˌake ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi. hˌujafˈaɲa mawˈiŋɡu kˌuwa ɡˈari lˈake, na hupˈanda kwˈeɲe mbˈawa za upˈepo.|0
hˌuzifˈaɲa pˈepo kˌuwa waɟˈumbe wˈake, miˈali ja mˈoto wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ˌameiwˈeka dunˈia kwˈeɲe misˈiŋɡi jˈake, hˌaiwˈezi kˈamwe kˌuondˈoʃwa.|0
ˌuliˌifunˈika kwa kilˈindi kˌama kwa vˈazi, mˈaɟi jˌalisimˈama ɟˌuːja milˈima.|0
lakˈini kwa kˌukemˈea kwˈako mˈaɟi jˌalikimbˈia, kwa saˈuti ja rˈadi jˈako jˌakatorˈoka.|0
jˌakapˈanda milˈima, jˌakaterˈemka mˌabondˈeni, hˌadi mahˈali pˈale ˌulipˌojakˌusudˈia.|0
ˌulijˌawekˈea mpˈaka ambˈao hˌajawˈezi kˌuuvˈuka, kˈamwe hˌajatˌaifunˈika dunˈia tˈena.|0
hˌuzifˈaɲa tʃemtʃˈemi zimwˈaɡe mˈaɟi mˌabondˈeni, hˌutirirˈika kˈati ja milˈima.|0
huwˈapa mˈaɟi waɲˈama wˈote wa kondˈeni, pˌundamwˈitu huzˈima kˈiu jˈao.|0
ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani hufˈaɲa viˈota kˈando ja mˈaɟi, huˈimba kˌatikˈati ja matˈawi.|0
hˌuiɲeʃˈea milˈima kutˈoka orˈofa zˈake, dunˈia ˌinatˌoʃelˈezwa kwa matˈunda ja kˈazi jˈake.|0
hˌujafˈaɲa maɟˈani ja mifˈuɡo jaˈote, na mimˈea kwa wˈatu kulˈima, wˌaɟipatˈie tʃakˈula kutˈoka arðˈini.|0
divˈai ja kˌuufˌurahˈiʃa mˈojo wa mwˌanadˈamu, mafˈuta kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuŋɡarˈiʃa ˈuso wˈake, na mkˈate wa kutˈia mwˈili ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mˈiti ja bwˈana ˌinaɲeʃˈewa vizˈuri, mˌierˈezi ja lˌebanˈoni ˌalijˌoipˈanda.|0
hˈumo ndˈeɡe hufˈaɲa viˈota vjˈao, korˈoŋɡo ˈana ɲˈumba jˌake kwˈeɲe msˌunobˈari.|0
milˈima mirˈefu ni makˈao ja mbˌuzimwˈitu, mˌaɟabˈali ni kˌimbilˈio la pelˈele.|0
mwˈezi hˌuɡawˈaɲa maɟˈira, na ɟˈua hˌutambˈua wakˈati wˌake wa kutˈua.|0
ˌunalˈeta ɡˈiza, kˌunakˈuwa usˈiku, waɲˈama wˈote wa mwitˈuni hˌuzurˈura.|0
sˈimba hˌuŋɡurˈuma kwa mawˈindo jˈao, na kˌutafˈuta tʃakˈula tʃˈao kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
ɟˈua hˌutʃomˈoza, nˌao hˌuondˈoka, hurˈudi na kulˈala katˌika mapˈaŋɡo jˈao.|0
kˈiʃa mwˌanadˈamu huˈenda kazˈini mwˈake, katˌika kˈazi jˌake mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
pˈale kˈuna bahˈari, kˈubwa na jˌeɲe nafˈasi tˈele, ˌimeɟˈaa viˈumbe visˈivjo na idˈadi, vˈitu vjˌeɲe uhˈai vikˈubwa na vidˈoɡo.|0
hˌuko mˈeli huˈenda na kurˈudi, pˈia lˌewiaθˈani, ˌulijˌemuˈumba atʃˈeze ndˈani jˈake.|0
hˈawa wˈote wˌanakˌutazamˈia wˈewe, uwˈape tʃakˈula tʃˈao kwa wakˈati wˈake.|0
wakˈati ˌunapowˈapa, wˌanakˌikusˈaɲa, ˌunapˌofumbˈua mkˈono wˈako, wˌao wˌanaʃibˈiʃwa mˈema.|0
ˌunapofˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako, wˌanapˈata hˈofu, ˌunapˌoondˈoa pˈumzi jˈao, wˌanakˈufa na kurˈudi mˌavumbˈini.|0
ˌunapˌopelˈeka rˈoho wˈako, wˌanaˈumbwa, nˌawe hˌuufˈaɲa ˈupja ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana na udˈumu milˈele, bwˈana na ˌazifˌurahˈie kˈazi zˈake.|0
jˌeje ˌaitˌazamˈaje dunˈia, nˈajo ˌikatˌetemˈeka, ˌaiɡusˈaje milˈima, nˈajo ˌikatˈoa mˈoʃi.|0
nˌitamwimbˈia bwˈana maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈote; nˌitaˈimba sˈifa kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu mˈuda wˈote nˌinaoˈiʃi.|0
kˌutafakˈari kwˈaŋɡu na kˌumpendˈeze jˈeje, nˌinapˌofurˈahi katˌika bwˈana.|0
lakˈini wˌeɲe ðˈambi na wˌatowˈeke katˌika dunˈia na waˈovu wˌasiwˈepo tˈena. ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, msˈifu bwˈana. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, lˌiitiˈeni ɟˈina lˈake, wˌaɟuliʃˈeni mˌataˈifa jˈale ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni jˈeje, mwˌimbiˈeni jˌeje sˈifa, wˌaambiˈeni matˈendo jˌake jˈote ja aɟˈabu.|0
mtˌafutˈeni bwˈana na ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, ˌutafutˈeni ˈuso wˌake sˈiku zˈote.|0
kumbˈuka matˈendo ja aɟˈabu ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, mˌiuɟˈiza jˌake na hukˈumu ˌalizˌozitˈamka.|0
ˈeɲi wazˈao wa ˌabrahˈamu mtumˈiʃi wˈake, ˈeɲi wˈana wa jakˈobo, wˌateˈule wˈake.|0
hˌulikumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈake milˈele, nˈeno ambˈalo ˌaliamˈuru, kwa vizˈazi ˈelfu.|0
aɡˈano ˌalilˌolifˈaɲa na ˌabrahˈamu, kiˈapo ˌalitʃˌomwapˈia isˈaki.|0
ˌalilˌiθibitˈiʃa kwa jakˈobo kˌuwa ˈamri, kwa ˌisraˈeli lˈiwe aɡˈano la milˈele.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa watʃˈatʃe kwa idˈadi, watʃˈatʃe sˈana na waɡˈeni ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˌalitˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kutˈoka taˈifa mˈoɟa hˌadi ɟiŋɡˈine, kutˈoka ufˈalme mmˈoɟa hˌadi mwiŋɡˈine.|0
hˌakuruhˈusu ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌawaonˈee; kwa aɟˈili jˈao ˌaliwˌakemˈea wafˈalme, ˌakisˈema.|0
ˌakaiˈita ɲɟˈaa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuharˈibu tʃakˈula tʃˈao tʃˈote.|0
nˌaje ˌakatˈuma ˈm̩tu mbˈele jˈao, josˈefu, ˌalijeˈuzwa kˌama mtˈumwa.|0
wˌalitʃubˈua miɡˈuu jˌake kwa mˌiɲorˈoro, ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake ˌilifˈuŋɡwa kwa tʃˈuma.|0
mfˈalme ˌalitˈuma wˈatu wˌakamfuŋɡˈua, mtawˈala wa wˈatu ˌalimwatʃˈia hˈuru.|0
ˌalimfˈaɲa m̩kˈuu wa ɲˈumba jˈake, mtawˈala ɟˌuːja vjˈote ˌalivjokˈuwa nˈavjo.|0
kˌuwaˌelekˈeza wakˈuu wa mfˈalme ˌapendˈavjo na kˌuwafundˈiʃa wazˈee wˌake hekˈima.|0
kˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli ˌakaiŋɡˈia mˈisri, jakˈobo ˌakaˈiʃi kˌama mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja hˈamu.|0
bwˈana ˌaliwafˈaɲa wˈatu wˌake kˌuzaˈana sˈana, ˌakawafˈaɲa kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi sˈana kulˈiko adˈui zˈao.|0
n̩dˈije ˌaliˌiɡeˈuza miˈojo jˈao ˌiwatʃukˈie wˈatu wˈake, wˌakatˈenda hˈila ðˈidi ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ˌakamtˈuma mˈose mtumˈiʃi wˈake, pamˈoɟa na arˈoni, ˌalijˌemtʃaɡˈua.|0
wˌalifˈaɲa iʃˈara zˌake za aɟˈabu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, mˌiuɟˈiza jˌake katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja hˈamu.|0
ˌalitˈuma ɡˈiza na ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaɟˈaa ɡˈiza, kwˈani si wˌalikˈuwa wˌamejaˈasi manˈeno jˈake.|0
ˌaliɡeˈuza mˈaɟi jˈao kˌuwa dˈamu, ˌikasˌababˈiʃa samˈaki wˌao kˈufa.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌiliɟˈaa vjˈura tˈele, ambˈao wˌaliiŋɡˈia hˌadi kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vja kulˈala vja wˌatawˈala wˈao.|0
ˌalisˈema, jakˈaɟa makˈundi ja maˈinzi, na vˌirobˈoto katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao jˈote.|0
ˌalibˌadilˈiʃa mvˈua jˈao ikˈawa mvˈua ja mˈawe, jˌeɲe umˈeme wa rˈadi n̩tʃˈini jˈao jˈote.|0
ˌakaharˈibu mˌizabˈibu jˈao na mˈiti ja tˈini, na ˌakaˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈiti ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
ˌalisˈema, nzˈiɡe wakˈaɟa, tunˈutu wasˈio na idˈadi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakawaˈua wˌazalˈiwa wˈote wa kwˈanza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, matˈunda ja kwˈanza ja uɟˈana wˌao wˈote.|0
ˌakawatˈoa ˌisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wakˈiwa na fˈeða na ðahˈabu ɲˈiŋɡi, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kabˈila zˈao ˌalijˌeɟikwˈaa.|0
mˈisri ˌilifurˈahi wˌalipˌoondˈoka, kwa sabˈabu hˈofu ja ˌisraˈeli ˌilikˈuwa ˌimewˌaaŋɡukˈia.|0
ˌalitandˈaza wˈiŋɡu kˌama kˌifunˈiko, na mˈoto kˌuwamˌulikˈia usˈiku.|0
wˌaliˈomba, nˌaje ˌakawˌaletˈea kwˈare, ˌakawˌaʃibˈiʃa kwa mkˈate wa mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌalipasˈua mwˈamba, mˈaɟi jˌakabˌubuɟˈika, jˌakatˌirirˈika ɟaŋɡwˈani kˌama ˈm̩to.|0
kwa maˈana ˌalikumbˈuka ahˈadi jˌake tˌakatˈifu, ˌalijˈompa ˌabrahˈamu mtumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
ˌaliwatˈoa wˈatu wˌake kwa furˈaha, wˌateˈule wˌake kwa kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
ˌakawˈapa ˈn̩tʃi za mˌataˈifa, wakˈawa warˈiθi wa mˈali weŋɡˈine wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌitaˌabikˈia.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa hˈaja ˌili wˌajaʃˈike mˌausˈia jˌake na kˌuzitˈii ʃerˈia zˈake. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimulˈia matˈendo makˈuu ja bwˈana ˌau kˌutaŋɡˈaza kˌikamilˈifu sˈifa zˈake.|0
hˈeri wˈale wˌanaˌodumˈiʃa hˈaki, ambˈao daˈima wˌanafˈaɲa jalˈijo mˈema.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌunikumbˈuke ˌunapˌowatendˈea mˈema wˈatu wˈako, ˈuwe msaˈada wˈaŋɡu ˌunapˌowaokˈoa.|0
ˌili niwˈeze kˌufurahˈia mˌafanikˈio ja wˌateˈule wˈako, niwˈeze kˌuʃirˈiki katˌika furˈaha ja taˈifa lˈako, na kˌuuŋɡˈana na urˈiθi wˈako katˌika kˌukusˈifu.|0
tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi, kˌama vˈile bˈaba zˈetu wˌalivjotˈenda, tˌumekˈosa na tˌumetˈenda uˈovu.|0
wakˈati bˈaba zˈetu wˌalipokˈuwa mˈisri, hˌawakˌuziŋɡatˈia mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako, wˈala hˌawakˌukumbˈuka wˈiŋɡi wa faðˈili zˈako, bˌali wˌaliˈasi kˈando ja bahˈari, bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌaliwˌaokˈoa kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈake, ˌili apˈate kˌuðihirˈiʃa uwˈeza wˌake m̩kˈuu.|0
ˌalikemˈea bahˈari ja ʃˈamu, nˈajo ˌikakaˈuka, ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza katˌika vilˈindi vjˈake kˌama vˈile ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
ˌaliwˌaokˈoa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui; kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui ˌaliwˌakombˈoa.|0
mˈaɟi jˌaliwˌafunˈika adˈui zˈao, hˌakunˌusurˈika hˌata mmˈoɟa.|0
ndˈipo wˌalipˌoamˈini ahˈadi zˈake, nˌao wˌakaˈimba sˈifa zˈake.|0
lakˈini mˈara wˌalisahˈau ˌalijˌowatendˈea, wˈala hˌawakˌuŋɡoɟˈea ʃaˈuri lˈake.|0
ɟaŋɡwˈani wˌalitˌawalˈiwa na tamˈaa zˈao, wˌalimɟarˈibu mˈuŋɡu ɲikˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌaliwˈapa kˈile wˌalitʃoˈomba, lakˈini ˌakatˈuma ɟˈuu jˈao uɡˈoɲɟua wa kˌuðoofˈiʃa.|0
ˈarði ˌilifuŋɡˈuka ˌikawamˈeza daθˈani, ˌikawazˈika ˌabirˈamu na kˈundi lˈake.|0
mˈoto ˌuliwˈaka kˌatikˈati ja wˌafuˈasi wˈao, mwˈali wa mˈoto ˌuliwˌateketˈeza waˈovu.|0
hˌuko horˈebu wˌalitˌeŋɡenˈeza ndˈama, na kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu ja kusˈubu kwa tʃˈuma.|0
wˌaliˌubadilˈiʃa ˌutukˈufu wˌao kwa sanˈamu ja fahˈali, ambˈaje hˈula maɟˈani.|0
wˌalimsahˈau mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌewaokˈoa, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametˈenda mˈambo makˈuu hˌuko mˈisri.|0
mˌiuɟˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja hˈamu na mˈambo ja kutˈiʃa hˌuko bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌalisˈema kwˌamba ˌaŋɡewˌaaŋɡamˈiza: kˌama mˈose mteˈule wˈake, ˌasiŋɡˌesimˈama kˈati jˈao na mˈuŋɡu kˌuizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˌake kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaliˌiðarˈau ˈile ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri, hˌawakˌuiamˈini ahˈadi jˈake.|0
wˌalinˌuŋɡunˈika ndˈani ja mahˈema jˈao, wˈala hˌawakumtˈii bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakaˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kwˌamba ˌatawafˈaɲa wˌaaŋɡˈuke ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
kˌuwatawˈaɲa wazˈao wˌao wˌaaŋɡˈuke mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, na kˌuwatawˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈote.|0
wˌaliɟifˈuŋɡa nˈira na baˈali wa peˈori, wakˈala ðabˈihu zˌilizˌotolˈewa kwa miˈuŋɡu isˈijo na uhˈai.|0
wˌaliˌitʃotʃˈea hasˈira ja bwˈana, wˌakamkˌasirˈiʃa kwa matˈendo jˈao maˈovu, nˈajo taˈuni ˌikazˈuka kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
lakˈini fˌinehˈasi ˌalisimˈama na kˌuiŋɡilˈia kˈati, nˈajo taˈuni ˌikazˌuilˈiwa.|0
hˈili lˌikahˌesabˈiwa kwˈake hˈaki, kwa vizˈazi visˈivjo na mwˈiʃo viɟˈavjo.|0
kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi ja merˈiba, wˌalimkˌasirˈiʃa bwˈana, ɟˈaŋɡa lˌikampˈata mˈose kwa sabˈabu jˈao.|0
hˌawakˌujaˌaŋɡamˈiza jˈale mˌataˈifa kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌowaaɡˈiza.|0
bˌali wˌaliɟˌitʃaŋɡˈaɲa na mˌataˈifa na wˌakazˌikubˈali destˈuri zˈao.|0
wˌaliabˈudu sanˈamu zˈao, zikˈawa mtˈeɡo kwˈao.|0
wˌakawatˈoa wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao ðabˈihu kwa mˌaʃetˈani.|0
wˌalimwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia, dˈamu za wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao, ambˈao wˌaliwatˈoa ðabˈihu kwa sanˈamu za kˌanaˈani, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌikanˌaɟisˈika kwa dˈamu zˈao.|0
wˌakaɟˌinaɟˈisi weɲˈewe kwa jˈale wˌalijotˈenda; kwa matˈendo jˈao weɲˈewe wˌakaɟˌifaɲˈia ˌukahˈaba.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakawˌakasˌirikˈia wˈatu wˌake na ˌakaˌutʃukˈia sˈana urˈiθi wˈake.|0
ˌakawˌakabˈiði kwa mˌataˈifa na adˈui zˈao wˌakawˌatawˈala.|0
adˈui zˈao wˌakawˌaonˈea na kˌuwatˈia tʃˈini ja mamlˈaka jˈao.|0
mˈara ɲˈiŋɡi ˌaliwˌaokˈoa lakˈini wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezˈama kwˈeɲe uˈasi, nˌao wˌakaɟˌiharˈibu katˌika ðˈambi zˈao.|0
lakˈini ˌakaˌaŋɡalˈia matˈeso jˈao wakˈati ˌalipˌosikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao.|0
kwa aɟˈili jˈao ˌakakumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈake, na kˌutokˈana na upˈendo wˌake m̩kˈuu ˌakapoˈoza hasˈira jˈake.|0
ˌakawafˈaɲa wˌahurumˈiwe na wˈote wˌaliˌowaʃˌikilˈia matˈeka.|0
ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌuokˈoe. tˌukusˈaɲe tˈena kutˈoka kwa mˌataˈifa, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuliʃukˈuru ɟˈina lˈako tˌakatˈifu, na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia katˌika sˈifa zˈako.|0
ˌatukˈuzwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ʃˈu milˈele na hˌata milˈele. wˈatu wˈote na wasˈeme, ˈamen! msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ni mwˈema, upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
wˌaliˌokombolˈewa wa bwˈana na wasˈeme hˈivi, wˈale ˌaliˌowaokˈoa kutˈoka mkˈono wa adˈui.|0
wˈale ˌaliˌowakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali, kutˈoka mˌaʃarˈiki na mˌaɣarˈibi, kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini.|0
baˈaði jˈao wˌalitˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa ɟaŋɡwˈani, hˌawakuˈona ɲɟˈia ja kˌuwafikˈiʃa ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao wˌaŋɡewˈeza kuˈiʃi.|0
wˌalikˈuwa na ɲɟˈaa na kˈiu, nˈafsi zˈao zˌikaðˌoofˈika.|0
ndˈipo wˌalipˌomlilˈia bwˈana katˌika ʃˈida jˈao, nˌaje ˌakawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka taˈabu jˈao.|0
ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza kwa ɲɟˈia ilˈijo sˈawa hˌadi ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao wˌaŋɡewˈeza kuˈiʃi.|0
bˌasi na wˌamʃukˈuru bwˈana kwa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma, na kwa matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu kwa wˌanadˈamu.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje hˌumtoʃelˈeza mwˌeɲe kˈiu, na kˌumʃibˈiʃa mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa kwa vˈitu vjˈema.|0
weŋɡˈine wˌalikˈaa ɡizˈani na katˌika huzˈuni kˈuu, wafˈuŋɡwa wˌakitesˈeka katˌika mˌiɲorˈoro.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˈasi ðˈidi ja manˈeno ja mˈuŋɡu na kˌuðarˈau ʃaˈuri la alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
ˌaliwˌatumikˈiʃa kwa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu; wˌaliɟikwˈaa na hˌapakuwˈepo jejˈote wa kˌuwasˌaidˈia.|0
ndˈipo wˌalipˌomlilˈia bwˈana katˌika ʃˈida jˈao, nˌaje ˌakawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka taˈabu jˈao.|0
ˌakawatˈoa katˌika ɡˈiza na huzˈuni kˈuu na ˌakavˈuɲɟa mˌiɲorˈoro jˈao.|0
bˌasi na wˌamʃukˈuru bwˈana kwa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma, na kwa matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu kwa wˌanadˈamu.|0
kwa kˌuwa jˌeje huvˈuɲɟa malˈaŋɡo ja ʃˈaba na kukˈata mapˈiŋɡo ja tʃˈuma.|0
weŋɡˈine wakˈawa wˌapumbˈavu kˌutokˈana na uˈasi wˈao, wˌakapˈata matˈeso kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˈao.|0
wˌakatʃukˈia kabˈisa vjakˈula vjˈote, wˌakakˌaribˈia malˈaŋɡo ja maˈuti.|0
ndˈipo wˌalipˌomlilˈia bwˈana katˌika ʃˈida jˈao, nˌaje ˌakawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka taˈabu jˈao.|0
ˌakalitˈuma nˈeno lˈake na kˌuwapˈoɲa, ˌakawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌaaŋɡamˈizo jˈao.|0
bˌasi na wˌamʃukˈuru bwˈana kwa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma, na kwa matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu kwa wˌanadˈamu.|0
na watˈoe ðabˈihu za kˌuʃukˈuru, na wˌasimulˈie matˈendo jˌake kwa ɲˈimbo za furˈaha.|0
weŋɡˈine wˌalisafˈiri bˌaharˈini kwa mˈeli, wˌalikˈuwa wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu.|0
wˌaliziˈona kˈazi za bwˈana, matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu kˌilindˈini.|0
kwa maˈana ˌalisˈema na kuˈamʃa tufˈani ˌilijˌoinˈua mawˈimbi ɟˈuu.|0
jˌakainˈuka ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni, jˌakaʃˈuka tʃˈini hˌadi vˌilindˈini, katˌika hatˈari hˌii ˌuɟasˈiri wˌao ˌulijejˈuka.|0
wˌalipˌepesˈuka na kˌujumbajˈumba kˌama walˈevi, uɟˈaɲɟa wˌao ˌukafikˈia ukˈomo.|0
ndˈipo wˌalipˌomlilˈia bwˈana katˌika ʃˈida jˈao, nˌaje ˌakawatˈoa kwˈeɲe taˈabu jˈao.|0
ˌakatulˈiza ðorˈuba kwa mnoŋɡˈono, mawˈimbi ja bahˈari jˌakatulˈia.|0
wˌalifurˈahi ˌilipokˈuwa ʃwˈari, nˌaje ˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza hˌadi bandˈari wˌalijˌoitamˈani.|0
bˌasi na wˌamʃukˈuru bwˈana kwa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma, na kwa matˈendo jˌake ja aɟˈabu kwa wˌanadˈamu.|0
na wˌamtukˈuze jˌeje katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˈatu, na wamsˈifu katˌika barˈaza la wazˈee.|0
jˌeje ˌaliɡeˈuza mˈito kˌuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa, tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi zˌitirˌirikˈazo kˌuwa ˈarði jˌeɲe kˈiu.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌizaˈajo ikˈawa ja tʃˈumvi ˌisijofˈaa, kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wa wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
ˌaliɡeˈuza ɟˈaŋɡwa likˈawa madˈimbwi ja mˈaɟi, nˈajo ˈarði kˈame kˌuwa tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi zˌitirˌirikˈazo.|0
wˌalilˈima maʃˈamba na kupˈanda mˌizabˈibu, nˈajo ˌikazˈaa matˈunda mˈeŋɡi.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌaliwˌabarˈiki, hesˈabu jˈao ˌikaˌoŋɡezˈeka sˈana, wˈala hˌakuruhˈusu mifˈuɡo jˈao kˌupuŋɡˈua.|0
kˈiʃa hesˈabu jˈao ˌilipuŋɡˈua, na wˌaliɲˌeɲekˈeʃwa kwa kˌuonˈewa, maˈafa na huzˈuni.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje hˌuwamwaɡˈia ðarˈau wakˈuu, ˌaliwafˈaɲa wˌataŋɡetˈaŋɡe ɲikˈani isˈijo na ɲɟˈia.|0
lakˈini jˌeje ˌaliwˌainˈua wˌahitˈaɟi katˌika taˈabu zˈao, na kˌuoŋɡˈeza ɟamˈaa zˈao kˌama makˈundi ja kondˈoo.|0
waɲˈofu wˌataˈona na kˌufurˈahi, lakˈini waˈovu wˈote wˌatafˈuŋɡa vˈiɲua vjˈao.|0
jejˈote alˈije na hekˈima, ˌajasikˈie mˈambo hˈaja, na ˌatafakˈari upˈendo m̩kˈuu wa bwˈana.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ni θabˈiti; nˌitaˈimba na kusˈifu kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
ˈamka, kinˈubi na zˈeze! nˌitajaˈamʃa mˌapambazˈuko.|0
kwa maˈana upˈendo wˈako ni m̩kˈuu, ni ɟˈuu kulˈiko mbˈiŋɡu; ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌunazˌifikˈia ˈaŋɡa.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ˌutukˈuzwe ɟˌuːja mbˈiŋɡu, ˌutukˈufu wˈako na ˌuenˈee dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
tˌuokˈoe na ˌutusˌaidˈie kwa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, ˌili wˈale ˌuwapendˈao wapˈate kˌuokolˈewa.|0
ɡˌileˈadi ni jˈaŋɡu, manˈase ni jˈaŋɡu, ˌefraˈimu ni kofˈia jˈaŋɡu ja tʃˈuma, nˈajo jˈuda ni fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu ja ˌutawˈala.|0
kwa msaˈada wa mˈuŋɡu tˌutapˈata uʃˈindi, nˌaje ˌatawapˈonda adˈui zˈetu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, ambˈaje nˌinakusˈifu, usˈiwe kˈimja.|0
kwa maˈana wˈatu waˈovu na wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu wˌamefuŋɡˈua vˈiɲua vjˈao ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu; wasˈema ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu kwa ndˈimi za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
wˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka kwa manˈeno ja tʃˈuki, wˌananˌiʃambulˈia bˌila sabˈabu.|0
wˌanatʃˌonilˈipa badˈala ja ˌurafˈiki wˈaŋɡu ni kˌuniʃtˈaki, lakˈini mˌimi nˌinawˌaombˈea.|0
wˌananˌilipˈiza mabˈaja kwa mˈema, tʃˈuki badˈala ja ˌurafˈiki wˈaŋɡu.|0
aɡˈiza ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ampˈiŋɡe, mʃtˈaki ˌasimˈame mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume.|0
ˌanapˌohukumˈiwa, ˌapatikˈane na hatˈia, nˈajo maˈombi jˌake jˌamhukˈumu.|0
watˈoto wˌake na waˈatʃwe jatˈima, ˈm̩ke wˌake na ˈawe mɟˈane.|0
watˈoto wˌake na wˌataŋɡetˈaŋɡe wˌakiˈomba, na wˌafukˈuzwe kwˈeɲe maɡˈofu ja ɲˈumba zˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajemdˈai na atˈeke vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo, matˈunda ja kˈazi jˌake jatˈekwe ɲˈara na waɡˈeni.|0
ˌasiwˈepo ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌumtendˈea mˈema wˈala wa kˌuwahˌurumˈia jatˈima wˈake.|0
uzˈao wˌake na ˌukatilˈiwe mbˈali, maɟˈina jˈao jˌafutˈike katˌika kizˈazi kˌifuatˈatʃo.|0
maˈovu ja bˈaba zˌake na jˌakumbˈukwe mbˈele za bwˈana, ðˈambi ja mˈama jˌake ˌisifˈutwe kˈamwe.|0
ðˈambi zˈao na zibˈaki daˈima mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌili apˈate kˌukatilˈia mbˈali kˌumbukˈumbu lˈao dˌuniˈani.|0
kwa maˈana kˈamwe hˌakuwˈeza kutˈenda wˈema, bˌali ˌalimfukˈuza mɲˈoŋɡe na mhitˈaɟi, ˌaliwˌafaɲˈia ɟeˈuri wˌahitˈaɟi na wˌaliˌovuɲɟˈika mˈojo.|0
ˌalipˈenda kˌulaˈani, nˈajo laˈana ˌikampˈata; hˌakupˈenda kˌubarˈiki, kwa hˈijo barˈaka na ikˈae mbˈali nˈaje.|0
ˌalivˈaa kˌulaˈani kˌama vˈazi lˈake, nˈajo laˈana ˌikamwiŋɡˈia mwilˈini mwˈake kˌama mˈaɟi, kwˈeɲe mifˈupa jˌake kˌama mafˈuta.|0
na ˈiwe kˌama ɟˈoho ˌalilˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa, kˌama mʃˈipi ˌaliˌofuŋɡˈiwa daˈima.|0
hˈaja na jˈawe malˈipo ja bwˈana kwa waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu, kwa wˈale wˌanaˌoninenˈea mabˈaja.|0
maˈana mˌimi ni maskˈini na mhitˈaɟi, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɟˌeruhˈiwa ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinafifˈia kˌama kivˈuli tʃa ɟiˈoni, nˌimerˌuʃwarˈuʃwa kˌama nzˈiɡe.|0
maɡˈoti jˈaŋɡu jˌameleɡˈea kwa kufˈuŋɡa, mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌumeðˌoofˈika na kukˈonda.|0
nˌimekˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa kwa waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu, wˌanionˈapo, hˌutikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu nˌisaidˈie, nˌiokˈoe sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako.|0
wˈatu na wˌafahˈamu kˌuwa ni mkˈono wˈako, kwˌamba wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumetˈenda hˈili.|0
wˌanawˈeza kˌulaˈani, lakˈini wˌewe ˌutabarˈiki, wˌatakˌapoʃˌambulˈia wˌataˌaibˈiʃwa, lakˈini mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌataʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu wˌatavˈikwa feðˈeha, na kˌufunˈikwa na aˈibu kˌama ɟˈoho.|0
kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu nˌitamtukˈuza sˈana bwˈana, katˌika umˈati mkˈubwa nˌitamsˈifu.|0
kwa maˈana hˌusimˈama mkˈono wa kuˈume wa mhitˈaɟi, kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˌake kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˌanaˌomhukˈumu.|0
bwˈana ˌamwambˈia bwˈana wˈaŋɡu: kˈeti mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume, mpˈaka nˌitakˌapowafˈaɲa adˈui zˈako kˌuwa mahˈali pa kuwˈeka miɡˈuu jˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌataenˈeza fˈimbo jˈako ja ˌutawˈala jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kutˈoka sajˈuni; ˌutatawˈala kˌatikˈati ja adˈui zˈako.|0
askˈari wˈako wˌataɟˌitolˈea kwa hiˈari katˌika sˈiku jˈako ja vˈita. ukˈiwa ˌumevˈikwa fahˈari tˌakatˈifu, kutˈoka tˈumbo la mˌapambazˈuko ˌutapokˈea umˈande wa uɟˈana wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌameˈapa, nˌaje hˌatabˌadilˈiʃa mawˈazo jˈake: wˌewe ni kuhˈani milˈele, kwa mfˈano wa mˌelkizedˈeki.|0
bwˈana jˈuko mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume, ˌatawapˈonda wafˈalme sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu jˈake.|0
ˌatawˌahukˈumu mˌataˈifa, ˌakilundˈika mizˈoɡa na kˌuwapˈonda wˌatawˈala wa dunˈia nzˈima.|0
ˌatakˈuɲua mˈaɟi katˌika kiɟˈito kˈando ja ɲɟˈia, kwa hˈijo ˌatainˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ɟˈuu.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. nˌitamtukˈuza bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, katˌika barˈaza la waɲˈofu na katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
kˈazi za bwˈana ni kˈuu, wˈote wˌanaˌopendˈezwa nˈazo hˌuzitˌafakˈari.|0
kˈazi zˌake zˌimeɟˈaa fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu, hˈaki jˌake hudˈumu daˈima.|0
ˌamefˈaɲa mˌaaɟˈabu jˌake jˌakumbˈukwe, bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe neˈema na hurˈuma.|0
huwˈapa tʃakˈula wˈale wˌanaˈomtʃa, hˌulikumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈake milˈele.|0
ˌamewˌaoɲˈeʃa wˈatu wˌake uwˈezo wa kˈazi zˈake, ˌakiwˈapa ˈn̩tʃi za mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine.|0
kˈazi za mikˈono jˌake ni za ˌuaminˈifu na hˈaki, mˌausˈia jˌake jˈote ni ja kˌuaminˈika.|0
zˌinadˈumu milˈele na milˈele, zˌikifaɲˈika kwa ˌuaminˈifu na uɲˈofu.|0
ˌaliwˈapa wˈatu wˌake ˌukombˈozi, ˌaliamˈuru aɡˈano lˈake milˈele: ɟˈina lˈake ni tˌakatˈifu na la kˌuoɡˈopwa.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana ndˈitʃo tʃˈanzo tʃa hekˈima, wˈote wˌanaˌozifuˈata ˈamri zˌake wˈana busˈara. sˈifa zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule amtʃˈaje bwˈana, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌapendezwˈaje sˈana na ˈamri zˈake.|0
watˈoto wˌake wˌatakˈuwa wˌeɲe uwˈezo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, kizˈazi tʃa wˈatu wˌaadilˈifu kˌitabˌarikˈiwa.|0
ɲumbˈani mwˈake kˈuna mˈali na ˌutaɟˈiri, hˈaki jˌake hudˈumu milˈele.|0
hˌata ɡizˈani nˈuru hˌumzukˈia ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu, jˈule mwˌeɲe rehˈema, hurˈuma na hˈaki.|0
mˈema jˌatamɟˈia ˈm̩tu jˈule alˈije mkarˈimu na mwˌeɲe kˌukopˈeʃa bˌila rˈiba, ˌanajefˈaɲa mˈambo jˌake kwa hˈaki.|0
hakˈika hˌatatˌikisˈika kˈamwe, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌatakumbˈukwa milˈele.|0
hˌataoɡˈopa habˈari m̩bˈaja, mˈojo wˌake ni θabˈiti, ˌukimtˌeɡemˈea bwˈana.|0
mˈojo wˌake ni salˈama, hˌatakˈuwa na hˈofu, mwiʃˈoni ˌataˈona uʃˈindi ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈake.|0
ˌametawˈaɲa vipˈawa vjˈake kwa ˌukarˈimu ˌakawˈapa maskˈini; hˈaki jˌake hudˈumu milˈele; pˈembe jˌake ˌitatukˈuzwa kwa heʃˈima.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌataˈona na kˌutʃukˈizwa, ˌatasˈaɡa mˈeno jˌake na kˌutowˈeka, kˌutamˈani kwa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu kˌutaiʃˈia patˈupu.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. ˈeɲi wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana msifˈuni, lˌisifˈuni ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
ɟˈina la bwˈana na lˌisifˈiwe, sˈasa na hˌata milˈele.|0
kˌuanzˈia mawˈio ja ɟˈua hˌadi matʃwˈeo jˈake, ɟˈina la bwˈana lˌinapˈaswa kˌusifˈiwa.|0
bwˈana ˌametukˈuka ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa jˈote, ˌutukˈufu wˌake ɟˌuːja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
ni nˈani alˈije kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, jˌeje ambˈaje ˌamekˈeti ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi.|0
ambˈaje hˌuinˈama ˌatazˈame tʃˈini aˈone mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌuwainˈua maskˈini kutˈoka mˌavumbˈini, na kˌuwaɲaɲˈua wˌahitˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɟalˈala.|0
hˌuwaketˈiʃa pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu, pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
hˌumɟalˈia mwanˈamke tˈasa kˌutulˈia ɲumbˈani mwˈake, akˈiwa mˈama watˈoto mwˌeɲe furˈaha. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
wakˈati ˌisraˈeli wˌalipotˈoka mˈisri, ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wa lˈuɣa ŋɡˈeni.|0
jˈuda ˌalifˈaɲua makˈao mˌatakatˈifu ja mˈuŋɡu, ˌisraˈeli akˈawa mˈilki jˈake.|0
bahˈari ˌilitazˈama ˌikakimbˈia, jordˈani ˌulirˈudi ɲˈuma.|0
milˈima ˌilirˌukarˈuka kˌama kondˈoo dˈume, vilˈima kˌama wˌanakondˈoo.|0
ˈee bahˈari, ni nˈini kˌilitʃˌokufˈaɲa ˌukakimbˈia, nˈawe, ˈee jordˈani, ˌukarˈudi ɲˈuma.|0
ˈeɲi milˈima mkˌarukarˈuka kˌama kondˈoo dˈume, ˈeɲi vilˈima, kˌama wˌanakondˈoo.|0
ˈee dunˈia, tˌetemˈeka mbˈele za bwˈana, mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo.|0
ˌalijˌeɡeˈuza mwˈamba kˌuwa dˈimbwi la mˈaɟi, mwˈamba mɡˈumu kˌuwa tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi.|0
sˈio kwˈetu sˈisi, ˈee bwˈana, sˈio kwˈetu sˈisi, bˌali ˌutukˈufu ni kwa ɟˈina lˈako, kwa sabˈabu ja upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu wˈako.|0
kwa nˈini mˌataˈifa wasˈeme, jˈuko wˈapi mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈetu jˈuko mbiŋɡˈuni, nˌaje hufˈaɲa lolˈote lˌimpendezˈalo.|0
lakˈini sanˈamu zˈao ni za fˈeða na ðahˈabu, zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
zˈina vˈiɲua, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kusˈema, zˈina mˈatʃo, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kuˈona.|0
zˈina mˌasikˈio, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kˌusikˈia, zˈina pˈua, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kunˈusa.|0
zˈina mikˈono, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kˌupapˈasa, zˈina miɡˈuu, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kˌutembˈea; wˈala kˈoo zˈao hˌaziwˈezi kutˈoa saˈuti.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌozitˌeŋɡenˈeza wˌatafanˈana nˈazo, vˈivjo hˈivjo wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌozitˌumainˈia.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, mtˌumainˈini bwˈana, jˌeje ni msaˈada na ŋɡˈao jˈao.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja arˈoni, mtˌumainˈini bwˈana, jˌeje ni msaˈada na ŋɡˈao jˈao.|0
nˈiɲi mnaˈomtʃa, mtˌumainˈini bwˈana, jˌeje ni msaˈada na ŋɡˈao jˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌanatˌukumbˈuka na ˌatatˌubarˈiki: ˌataˌibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌataˌibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja arˈoni.|0
ˌatawˌabarˈiki wˈale wˌanaˈomtʃa bwˈana, wadˈoɡo kwa wakˈubwa.|0
bwˈana na ˌawawezˈeʃe kˌuoŋɡezˈeka, nˈiɲi na watˈoto wˈenu.|0
mbˌarikˈiwe na bwˈana muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana ni mˈali ja bwˈana, lakˈini dunˈia amˈempa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
sˈio wˈafu wˌanaomsˈifu bwˈana, wˈale wˌaʃukˈao mahˈali pa kˈimja.|0
bˌali ni sˌisi tˌunaˌomtukˈuza bwˈana, sˈasa na hˌata milˈele. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
nˌinampˈenda bwˈana kwa maˈana ˌamesikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu; ˌamesikˈia kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌili ˌanihˌurumˈie.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌamenˌiteɡˈea sikˈio lˈake, nˌitamwˈita sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈamba za maˈuti zˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mˌaumˈivu makˈuu ja kuzˈimu jˌalinipˈata, nˌikalemˈewa na taˈabu na huzˈuni.|0
ndˈipo nˌikalˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana: ˈee bwˈana, nˌiokˈoe.|0
bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe neˈema na hˈaki, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ni mwˈiŋɡi wa hurˈuma.|0
bwˈana hˌuwalˈinda wˌaɲeɲekˈevu, nˌilipokˈuwa katˌika ʃˈida kˈubwa, ˌalinˌiokˈoa.|0
ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, tulˈia tˈena, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamekˈuwa mwˈema kwˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenˌiokˈoa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu na maˈuti, mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kˌutokˈana na matʃˈozi, miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kˌutokˈana na kˌuɟikwˈaa.|0
ˌili niwˈeze kˌutembˈea mbˈele za bwˈana, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
nˌiliamˈini, kwa hˈijo nˌilisˈema, mˌimi nˌimetesˈeka sˈana.|0
katˌika taˈabu jˈaŋɡu nˌilisˈema, wˌanadˈamu wˈote ni waˈoŋɡo.|0
nˌimrudiʃˈie bwˈana nˈini kwa wˈema wˌake wˈote ˌaliˌonitendˈea.|0
nˌitakˌiinˈua kikˈombe tʃa wokˈovu na kˌulitaŋɡˈaza ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
nˌitazˌitimˈiza naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana mbˈele za wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
kˈifo tʃa wˌatakatˈifu kˈina θamˈani matʃˈoni pa bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hakˈika mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako, mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako, mwˈana wa mɟakˈazi wˈako; ˌumeniwˈeka hˈuru tˌoka katˌika mˌiɲorˈoro jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitakˌutolˈea ðabˈihu ja kˌukuʃukˈuru na kˌuliˈita ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
nˌitazˌitimˈiza naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana mbˈele za wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
katˌika ɲˈua za ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, kˌatikˈati jˈako, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote; mtˌukuzˈeni jˈeje, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa upˈendo wˌake kwˈetu ni m̩kˈuu, ˌuaminˈifu wa bwˈana ˌunadˈumu milˈele. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˌisraˈeli na asˈeme sˈasa: upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
ɲˈumba ja arˈoni na isˈeme sˈasa: upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
wˈote wamtʃˈao bwˈana na wasˈeme sˈasa: upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
wakˈati wa mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu makˈuu nˌilimlilˈia bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakaniɟˈibu kwa kˌuniwˈeka hˈuru.|0
bwˈana jˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈami, sˌitaoɡˈopa. mwˌanadˈamu ˌanawˈeza kˌunitˈenda nˈini.|0
bwˈana jˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈami, jˌeje ni msˌaidˈizi wˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˌatazˈama adˈui zˈaŋɡu wakˈiwa wˌameʃˈindwa.|0
ni bˈora kˌumkimbilˈia bwˈana kulˈiko kˌumtumˌainˈia mwˌanadˈamu.|0
ni bˈora kˌumkimbilˈia bwˈana kulˈiko kˌuwatˌumainˈia wakˈuu.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌalinˌizuŋɡˈuka, lakˈini kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana nˌaliwˌakatilˈia mbˈali.|0
wˌalinˌizuŋɡˈuka pˈande zˈote, lakˈini kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana nˌaliwˌakatilˈia mbˈali.|0
wˌalinˌizuŋɡˈuka kˌama kˈundi la ɲˈuki, lakˈini wˌalikˈufa harˈaka kˌama miˈiba ˌitekˌeteˈajo; kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana nˌaliwˌakatilˈia mbˈali.|0
nˌilisukˈumwa ɲˈuma karˈibu kˌuaŋɡˈuka, lakˈini bwˈana ˌalinˌisaidˈia.|0
bwˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu na wˈimbo wˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ˌamefaɲˈika wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu.|0
saˈuti za ʃˈaŋɡwe na uʃˈindi zˌinavˈuma hemˈani ˌm̩wa wˌeɲe hˈaki: mkˈono wa kuˈume wa bwˈana ˌumetˈenda mˈambo makˈuu.|0
mkˈono wa kuˈume wa bwˈana ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu, mkˈono wa kuˈume wa bwˈana ˌumetˈenda mˈambo makˈuu.|0
sˌitakˈufa, bˌali nˌitaˈiʃi, nˌami nˌitataŋɡˈaza jˈale bwˈana ˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
bwˈana ˌamenˌiaðˈibu vikˈali, lakˈini hˌakuniˈatʃa nˈife.|0
nˌifuŋɡulˈie malˈaŋɡo ja hˈaki, nˌami nˌitaiŋɡˈia na kˌumʃukˈuru bwˈana.|0
hˈili ni lˈaŋɡo la bwˈana ambˈalo wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌanawˈeza kˌuliiŋɡˈia.|0
nˌitakˌuʃukˈuru, kwa kˌuwa ˌuliniɟˈibu, ˌumekˈuwa wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈiwe wˌalilˌolikatˈaa waˈaʃi, lˌimekˈuwa ɟˈiwe kˈuu la pembˈeni.|0
bwˈana ˌametˈenda hˈili, nˈalo ni la kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza matʃˈoni pˈetu.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sˈiku bwˈana ˌalijˌoifˈaɲa, tˌuʃaŋɡilˈie na kˌufurˈahi ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tˌuokˈoe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌutuɟalˈie mˌafanikˈio.|0
hˈeri jˈule aɟˈaje kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana. kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja bwˈana tˌunakˌubarˈiki.|0
bwˈana n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu, nˌaje ˌametˌuaŋɡazˈia nˈuru jˈake. mkˈiwa na matˈawi mkonˈoni, ˌuŋɡanˈeni kwˈeɲe mˌaandamˈano ja sˌikukˈuu hˌadi kwˈeɲe pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakˌuʃukˈuru, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakˌutukˈuza.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana kwa kˌuwa ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele.|0
hˈeri wˈale walˈio wˌaadilˈifu katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao, wˌanaˌoenˈenda katˌika ʃerˈia ja bwˈana.|0
hˈeri wˈale wˌanaˌoziʃˈika ʃuhˈuda zˈake, wˌamtafutˈao kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote.|0
wˌasiofˈaɲa lolˈote lilˈilo bˈaja, wˌanaˌoenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake.|0
ˌumetˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako ˌili tˌujatˈii kwa ˌukamilˈifu.|0
laˈiti mwenˈendo wˈaŋɡu ˌuŋɡekˈuwa imˈara katˌika kˌujatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
hˈivjo mˌimi sˌitaˌaibˈiʃwa nˌinapˌoziŋɡatˈia ˈamri zˈako zˈote.|0
nˌitakusˈifu kwa mˈojo mɲˈofu nˌinapˌoɟifˈunza ʃerˈia zˈako za hˈaki.|0
nˌitajatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako; ˌusiniˈatʃe kabˈisa.|0
nˌinakˌutafˈuta kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, ˌusiniˈatʃe niˈende mbˈali na ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˌimelifˈitʃa nˈeno lˈako mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu ˌili nˌisikutˈende ðˈambi.|0
sˈifa ni zˈako, ˈee bwˈana, nˌifundˈiʃe mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
kwa midˈomo jˈaŋɡu nˌitasˌimulˈia ʃerˈia zˈote zˌinazotˈoka katˌika kˈiɲua tʃˈako.|0
nˌinafˌurahˈia kˌufuˈata ʃerˈia zˈako kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌafurˌahiˈaje mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌinatˌafakˈari mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako na kˌuziˌaŋɡalˈia ɲɟˈia zˈako.|0
nˌinafˌurahˈia mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako, wˈala sˌitalˌipuˈuza nˈeno lˈako.|0
mtendˈee mˈema mtumˈiʃi wˈako, nˌami nˌitaˈiʃi; nˌitalitˈii nˈeno lˈako.|0
jˌafuŋɡˈue mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu nipˈate kuˈona mˈambo ja aɟˈabu katˌika ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
mˌimi ni mɡˈeni dˌuniˈani, ˌusinifˈitʃe ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinatˌaabˈika kwa ʃaˈuku kˈubwa ɟˌuːja ʃerˈia zˈako wakˈati wˈote.|0
ˌunawˌakemˈea wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno, wˌaliˌolaanˈiwa wˌaendˈao mbˈali na ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˌiondolˈee ðarˈau na ðihˈaka, kwa kˌuwa nˌinaziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌatawˈala hukˈeti pamˈoɟa na kˌunisˌiŋɡizˈia, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌatatˌafakˈari ɟˌuːja mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ʃerˈia zˈako ni furˈaha jˈaŋɡu, nˈazo ni wˌaʃaˈuri wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimelˈazwa tʃˈini mˌavumbˈini, jˌahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
nˌilikˌuelˈeza ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu ˌukaniɟˈibu, nˌifundˈiʃe ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌiɟulˈiʃe mˌafundˈiʃo ja mˌausˈia jˈako, nˌami nˌitatˌafakˈari mˌaaɟˈabu jˈako.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌimetʃakˈazwa kwa huzˈuni, ˌuniˌimarˈiʃe sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
nˌiepˈuʃe na ɲɟˈia za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, kwa neˈema ˌunifundˈiʃe ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌimetʃaɡˈua ɲɟˈia ja kwˈeli, nˌimekˈaza mˈojo wˈaŋɡu katˌika ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌimeŋɡˌaŋɡanˈia ʃerˈia zˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ˌusiniˈatʃe nˌiaibˈiʃwe.|0
nˌakimbilˈia katˌika ɲɟˈia ja mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeuwˈeka mˈojo wˈaŋɡu hˈuru.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌifundˈiʃe kˌujafuˈata mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako, nˌami nˌitajaʃˈika mpˈaka mwˈiʃo.|0
nˈipe ˌufahˈamu, nˌami nˌitaiʃˈika ʃerˈia jˈako na kˌuitˈii kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
nˌioŋɡˈoze kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ja ˈamri zˈako, kwa kˌuwa hˌuko napˈata furˈaha.|0
ˌuɡeˈuze mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kˌuelekˈea ʃerˈia zˈako, na sˈijo kwˈeɲe mˈambo ja ˌubinˈafsi.|0
ɡeˈuza mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈambo jˌasijofˈaa, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
mtˌimizˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako ahˈadi jˈako, ˌili upˈate kˌuoɡˈopwa.|0
nˌiondolˈee aˈibu nˌinajˌoioɡˈopa, kwa kˌuwa ʃerˈia zˈako ni ɲɟˈema.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi nˌinavjˌoonˈea ʃaˈuku mˌausˈia jˈako! hifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu katˌika hˈaki jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma ˌuniɟˈie, wokˈovu wˈako sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakˌapomɟˈibu ˌanajˌeniðihˈaki, kwa kˌuwa nˌinalˌitumˌainˈia nˈeno lˈako.|0
ˌusilˌiɲakˈue nˈeno la kwˈeli kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu katˌika ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˌitatembˈea nikˈiwa hˈuru, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeɟifˈunza mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
nˌitasˈema ʃerˈia zˈako mbˈele za wafˈalme wˈala sˌitaˌaibˈiʃwa.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌinazˌifurahˈia ˈamri zˈako kwa sabˈabu nˌinazipˈenda.|0
kumbˈuka nˈeno lˈako kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kwa sabˈabu ˌumenˈipa tˌumaˈini.|0
farˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu katˌika matˈeso jˈaŋɡu ni hˌii: ahˈadi jˈako ˌinahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno wˌamenˌisimˈaŋɡa bˌila kutʃˈoka, hˌata hˈivjo sˌitaiˈatʃa ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinazˌikumbˈuka ʃerˈia zˈako za zamˈani, nˈazo zˌinanˌifarˈiɟi.|0
nˌimeʃˈikwa sˈana na ɣaðˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja waˈovu, ambˈao wˌameˈatʃa ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako ni kiˈini tʃa ɲˈimbo zˈaŋɡu popˈote nˌinapoˈiʃi.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wakˈati wa usˈiku nˌinalˌikumbˈuka ɟˈina lˈako, nˌami nˌitatˈii ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
hˈili lˌimekˈuwa zoˈezi lˈaŋɡu: nˌami nˌinajatˈii mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni fˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu, nˌimeahˈidi kˌujatˈii manˈeno jˈako.|0
nˌimetafˈuta ˈuso wˈako kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, nˌihurumˈie sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako.|0
nˌimezˌifikˈiri ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na nˌimeˌelekˈeza hatˈua zˈaŋɡu katˌika mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa harˈaka bˌila kˌutʃelˈewa kˌuzitˈii ˈamri zˈako.|0
hˌata waˈovu wˌanifˈuŋɡe kwa kˈamba, sˌitasahˈau ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
usˈiku wa manˈane nˌinaˈamka kˌukuʃukˈuru kwa sabˈabu ja ʃerˈia zˈako za hˈaki.|0
mˌimi ni rafˈiki kwa wˈale wˈote wˌakutʃˈao, kwa wˈote wˌanaˌofuˈata mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, dunˈia ˌimeɟˈaa upˈendo wˈako, nˌifundˈiʃe mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
mtendˈee wˈema mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˈee bwˈana, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
nˌifundˈiʃe mˌaarˈifa na ˌuamˈuzi mzˈuri, kwa kˌuwa nˌinaamˈini ˈamri zˈako.|0
kˈabla sˌiɟapˈata ʃˈida nˌilipotˈea ɲɟˈia, lakˈini sˈasa nˌinalitˈii nˈeno lˈako.|0
wˌewe ni mwˈema, ˌunalotˈenda ni ɟˈema, nˌifundˈiʃe mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno wˌamenˌisiŋɡizˈia uˈoŋɡo, nˌitafuˈata mˌausˈia jˈako kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote.|0
miˈojo jˈao ni katˈili na miɡˈumu, bˌali mˌimi nˌapendˈezwa na ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
ˌilikˈuwa vjˈema mˌimi kupˈata ʃˈida ˌili nipˈate kˌuɟifˈunza mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ʃerˈia ˌinajotˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako ˈina θamˈani kˈubwa kwˈaŋɡu kulˈiko maˈelfu ja vipˈande vja fˈeða na ðahˈabu.|0
mikˈono jˈako ˌilinifˈaɲa na kˌuniˈumba, nˈipe ˌufahˈamu niwˈeze kˌuɟifˈunza ˈamri zˈako.|0
wˌakutʃˈao wˌafurahˈie wˌanapˌoniˈona, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu katˌika nˈeno lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba ʃerˈia zˈako ni za hˈaki, katˌika ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌumenˌiaðˈibu.|0
upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma ˈuwe farˈaɟa jˈaŋɡu, sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako kwa mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
hurˈuma jˈako na ˌiniɟˈie ˌili nipˈate kuˈiʃi, kwa kˌuwa nˌaifˌurahˈia ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno na wˌaaibˈiʃwe kwa kˌunikosˈea mˌimi bˌila sabˈabu, lakˈini mˌimi nˌitatˌafakˈari ɟˌuːja mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
wˈale wˌakutʃˈao na wˌaniɡˌeukˈie mˈimi, hˈao ambˈao wˌanazˌielˈewa ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu usˈiwe na lawˈama katˌika kutˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako, ˌili nˌisiˌaibˈiʃwe.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinazimˈia kwa kˌutamˈani wokˈovu wˈako, lakˈini nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu katˌika nˈeno lˈako.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamefifˈia, nˌikiŋɡˈoɟa ahˈadi jˈako; nˌinasˈema, ˌutanˌifaɟˈiri lˈini.|0
iŋɡˈawa nˌimekˈuwa kˌama kirˈiba kwˈeɲe mˈoʃi, bˈado sˌiɟasahˈau mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌitampˈasa aŋɡˈoɟe mpˈaka lˈini? ni lˈini ˌutawˌaaðˈibu waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno wˌananˌitʃimbˈia maʃˈimo, kiɲˈume na ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
ˈamri zˈako zˈote ni za kˌuaminˈika; ˌunisˌaidˈie, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌananiʃtˈaki bˌila sabˈabu.|0
wˌalikˌaribˈia kabˈisa kˌunifˈuta kutˈoka ˈuso wa dunˈia, lakˈini sˌiɟaˈatʃa mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
jˌahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako, nˌami nˌitatˈii ʃerˈia za kˈiɲua tʃˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˈeno lˈako ni la milˈele, lˌinasimˈama imˈara mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ˌunaˌendelˈea kwa vizˈazi vjˈote, ˌumeiˈumba dunˈia, nˈajo ˌinadˈumu.|0
ʃerˈia zˈako zˌinadˈumu hˌadi lˈeo, kwa kˌuwa vˈitu vjˈote vˌinakˌutumikˈia.|0
kˌama nˌisiŋɡˌefurahˈia ʃerˈia jˈako, nˌiŋɡeˌaŋɡamˈia katˌika taˈabu zˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌitasahˈau mˌausˈia jˈako kˈamwe, kwa maˈana kwˈajo ˌumehifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌuniokˈoe, kwa maˈana mˌimi ni wˈako, kwa kˌuwa nˌimetafˈuta mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
waˈovu wˌanaŋɡoɟˈea kˌuniˌaŋɡamˈiza, bˌali mˌimi nˌinatˌafakˈari ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
katˌika ˌukamilˈifu wˈote nˌinaˈona ˈm̩na kikˈomo, lakˈini ˈamri zˈako hazˈina mpˈaka.|0
ˈaha! tazˈama, ʃerˈia jˈako nˌaipˈenda ˈm̩no aɟˈabu. nˌinaˌitafakˈari mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˈamri zˈako zˌimenˈipa hekˈima zaˈidi kulˈiko adˈui zˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeziʃˈika daˈima.|0
nˈina akˈili zaˈidi kulˈiko walˈimu wˈaŋɡu wˈote, kwa kˌuwa nˌinatˌafakˈari ɟˌuːja ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˈina ˌufahˈamu zaˈidi kulˈiko wazˈee, kwa kˌuwa nˌinajatˈii mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
nˌimezuˈia miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌisiˈende kwˈeɲe kˈila ɲɟˈia m̩bˈaja, ˌili niwˈeze kutˈii nˈeno lˈako.|0
sˌiɟaziˈatʃa ʃerˈia zˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˌifundˈiʃa wˌewe mweɲˈewe.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi manˈeno jˈako jalˈivjo matˈamu kwˈaŋɡu, matˈamu kulˈiko asˈali katˌika kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinapˈata ˌufahˈamu kutˈoka mˌausˈia jˈako, kwa hˈijo nˌinatʃukˈia kˈila ɲɟˈia ja ˌupotˈovu.|0
nˈeno lˈako ni tˈaa ja miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu na mwˈaŋɡa katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimeˈapa na nˌimeθˌibitˈiʃa, kwˌamba nˌitafuˈata ʃerˈia zˈako za hˈaki.|0
nˌimetesˈeka sˈana, ˌuhifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, ˈee bwˈana, sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, pokˈea sˈifa za hiˈari za kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, nˌifundˈiʃe ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
iŋɡˈawa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈako hˌatarˈini sˈiku zˈote, sˌitasahˈau ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
waˈovu wˌamenˌiteɡˈea mtˈeɡo, lakˈini sˌiɟajˌakiˈuka mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ʃerˈia zˈako ni urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu milˈele, nˈaam ni furˈaha ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimekˌusudˈia mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kˌujafuˈata mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako mpˈaka mwˈiʃo.|0
nˌinatʃukˈia wˈatu wa nˈia mbˈili, lakˈini nˌinapˈenda ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
wˌewe ni kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈao jˈaŋɡu, nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu katˌika nˈeno lˈako.|0
ˌondokˈeni kwˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi mtendˈao mabˈaja, ˌili niwˈeze kuʃˈika ˈamri za mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌihifˈaði sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako, nˌami nˌitaˈiʃi; ˌusiˈatʃe mˌatumaˈini jˈaŋɡu jˌakavˈuɲɟua.|0
nˌiteɡemˈeze, nˌami nˌitaˌokolˈewa, nˌami daˈima nˌitajˌaheʃˈimu mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ˌunawˌakatˈaa wˈote wˌanaˌojaˈasi mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako, kwa maˈana ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu wˌao ni bˈure.|0
waˈovu wa ˈn̩tʃi ˌunawatˈupa kˌama tˌakatˈaka, kwa hˈivjo nˌazipˈenda ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌunatˌetemˈeka kwa kˌukuoɡˈopa wˈewe, nˌinazˌioɡˈopa ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌimetˈenda jalˈijo hˈaki na sˈawa, ˌusiniˈatʃe mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa watˈesi wˈaŋɡu.|0
mhˌakikiʃˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌusalˈama, ˌusiˈatʃe wˌeɲe kibˈuri wˌanionˈee.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamefifˈia, jˌakitˌazamˈia wokˈovu wˈako, na kˌuitˌazamˈia ahˈadi jˈako ja kwˈeli.|0
mfaɲˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako kˌuliŋɡˈana na upˈendo wˈako na ˌunifundˈiʃe mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako; nˈipe ˌufahˈamu ˌili niwˈeze kˌuelˈewa ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wakˈati wˈako wa kutˈenda ˌumewadˈia, kwa kˌuwa ʃerˈia jˈako ˌinavˈuɲɟua.|0
kwa sabˈabu nˌazipˈenda ˈamri zˈako zaˈidi ja ðahˈabu, nˈaam, zaˈidi ja ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
na kwa sabˈabu naˈona mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako jˈote ni adˈili, nˌatʃukˈia kˈila ɲɟˈia potˈovu.|0
ʃerˈia zˈako ni za aɟˈabu, hˈivjo nˌinazitˈii.|0
kˌuiŋɡˈia kwa manˈeno jˈako kˌunalˈeta nˈuru, kunˈampa mɟˈiŋɡa ˌufahˈamu.|0
nˌimefuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu na kuhˈema, nˌikitamˈani ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˌiɡeukˈie na ˌunihˌurumˈie, kˌama ˌuwafˌaɲiˈavjo sˈiku zˈote wˈale wˌanaˌolipˈenda ɟˈina lˈako.|0
oŋɡˈoza hatˈua zˈaŋɡu kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno lˈako, ˌusiˈatʃe ðˈambi jojˈote ˌinitawˈale.|0
nˌiokˈoe na ˌuonˈevu wa wˌanadˈamu, ˌili niwˈeze kutˈii mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
mwˌaŋɡazˈie mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˈuso wˈako na ˌunifundˈiʃe ˈamri zˈako.|0
tʃemtʃˈemi za matʃˈozi zˌinatˌirirˈika kutˈoka matʃˈoni jˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ʃerˈia jˈako hˌaifuˈatwi.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, ʃerˈia zˈako ni sahˈihi.|0
ʃerˈia ˌulizˌoziwˈeka ni za hˈaki, ni za kˌuaminˈika kˌikamilˈifu.|0
ɟˌitihˈada jˈaŋɡu ˌimenˌiðoofˈiʃa, kwa kˌuwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanajˌapuˈuza manˈeno jˈako.|0
ahˈadi zˈako zˌimeɟˌaribˈiwa kˌikamilˈifu, mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌanazipˈenda.|0
iŋɡˈawa ni mdˈoɡo na nˌinaðˌaraulˈiwa, sˌisahˈau mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
hˈaki jˈako ni ja milˈele, na ʃerˈia jˈako ni kwˈeli.|0
ʃˈida na ðˈiki zˌimenipˈata, lakˈini ˈamri zˈako ni furˈaha jˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃerˈia zˈako ni sahˈihi milˈele, hunˈipa ˌufahˈamu ˌili nipˈate kuˈiʃi.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakuˈita kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, nˌami nˌitajatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
nˌinakuˈita; nˌiokˈoe nˌami nˌitaziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌinaˈamka ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema na kˌukuˈomba msaˈada; nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu katˌika nˈeno lˈako.|0
sˌikufˈumba mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu usˈiku kˈutʃa, ˌili niwˈeze kˌutafakˈari ɟˌuːja ahˈadi zˈako.|0
ˌusikˈie saˈuti jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, sˌawasˈawa na ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
wˈale wˌanaopˈaŋɡa mipˈaŋɡo miˈovu wˈako karˈibu nˈami, lakˈini wˈako mbˈali na ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hˌata hˈivjo wˌewe u karˈibu, na ˈamri zˈako zˈote ni za kwˈeli.|0
ʃˈu zamˈani nˌimeɟifˈunza kutˈoka ʃuhˈuda zˈako kwˌamba ˌumezˌiθibitˈiʃa ˌili zidˈumu milˈele.|0
jˌaaŋɡalˈie matˈeso jˈaŋɡu, ˌuniokˈoe, kwa kˌuwa sˌiɟasahˈau ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
nˌitetˈee katˌika hˈali hˌii jˈaŋɡu na ˌunikombˈoe, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako.|0
wokˈovu ˈuko mbˈali na waˈovu, kwa kˌuwa hˌawatafˈuti mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hurˈuma zˈako ni kˈuu, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
adˈui wˌanaˌonitˈesa ni wˈeŋɡi, lakˈini mˌimi sˌitaziˈatʃa ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
nˌinawˌatazˈama wˌasiˌoamˈini kwa tʃˈuki, kwa kˌuwa hˌawalitˈii nˈeno lˈako.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi nˌinavjopˈenda mˌausˈia jˈako; ˈee bwˈana, ˌujahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, sˌawasˈawa na upˈendo wˈako.|0
manˈeno jˈako jˈote ni kwˈeli, ʃerˈia zˈako zˈote za hˈaki ni za milˈele.|0
wˌatawˈala wˌamenitˈesa bˌila sabˈabu, lakˈini mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunatˌetemˈeka kwa nˈeno lˈako.|0
nˌafurahˈia ahˈadi zˈako kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijepˈata matˈeka mˈeŋɡi.|0
nˌinatʃukˈia na kˌutʃukˈizwa sˈana na uˈoŋɡo, lakˈini napˈenda ʃerˈia jˈako.|0
nˌinakusˈifu mˈara sˈaba kwa sˈiku, kwa aɟˈili ja ʃerˈia zˈako za hˈaki.|0
wˌanaopˈenda ʃerˈia jˈako wˈana amˈani tˈele, wˈala hakˈuna kˈitu kˌinatʃowˈeza kˌuwakwˈaza.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinaŋɡoɟˈea wokˈovu wˈako, nˌami nˌinafuˈata ˈamri zˈako.|0
nˌinazitˈii ʃerˈia zˈako, kwa sabˈabu nˌinazipˈenda ˈm̩no.|0
nˌimetˈii mˌausˈia jˈako na ʃerˈia zˈako, kwa kˌuwa ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu zˈote zˌinaɟˌulikˈana kwˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu na kifˈike mbˈele zˈako, nˈipe ˌufahˈamu sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno lˈako.|0
maˈombi jˈaŋɡu na jafˈike mbˈele zˈako, nˌiokˈoe sˌawasˈawa na ahˈadi jˈako.|0
midˈomo jˈaŋɡu na ˌibubuɟˈike sˈifa, kwa kˌuwa ˌunanˌifundˈiʃa mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako.|0
ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu na uˈimbe kuhˈusu nˈeno lˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˈamri zˈako zˈote ni za hˈaki.|0
mkˈono wˈako ˈuwe tajˈari kˌunisˌaidˈia, kwa kˌuwa nˌimetʃaɡˈua mˌausˈia jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinatamˈani wokˈovu wˈako, na ʃerˈia jˈako ni furˈaha jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌiɟalˈie kuˈiʃi ˌili nipˈate kˌukusˈifu, na ʃerˈia zˈako zˌinitˌeɡemˈeze.|0
nˌimetˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kˌama kondˈoo ˌalijˌepotˈea. mtafˈute mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kwa kˌuwa sˌiɟasahˈau ˈamri zˈako.|0
katˌika ðˈiki jˈaŋɡu namwˈita bwˈana, nˌaje hˌuniɟˈibu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuniokˈoe kutˈoka midˈomo ja uˈoŋɡo na ndˈimi za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ˌatakˌufaɲˈia nˈini, ˌau ˌakufaɲˈie nˈini zaˈidi, ˈewe ulˈimi mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ˌatakˌuaðˈibu kwa miʃˈale mikˈali ja ʃuɟˈaa, kwa makˈaa jˌanajowˈaka ja ˈm̩ti wa mretˈemu.|0
ˈole wˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuwa naˈiʃi meʃˈeki, kwˌamba naˈiʃi kˌatikˈati ja hˈema za kedˈari.|0
nˌimeˈiʃi mˈuda mrˈefu ˈm̩no mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌotʃukˈia amˈani.|0
mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu wa amˈani; lakˈini nˌinaposˈema, wˌao wˌanatˈaka vˈita.|0
nˌajainˈua mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu nˌitazˈame vilˈima, msaˈada wˈaŋɡu ˌutatˈoka wˈapi.|0
msaˈada wˈaŋɡu hutˈoka kwa bwˈana, muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
hˌatauˈatʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˈako ˌutelˈeze, jˌeje ˌakulindˈaje hˌatasinzˈia.|0
hakˈika, jˌeje ˌalindˈaje ˌisraˈeli hˌatasinzˈia wˈala hˌatalˈala ˌusiŋɡˈizi.|0
bwˈana ˌanakulˈinda, bwˈana ni uvˈuli wˈako mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume.|0
ɟˈua hˌalitˌakuðˈuru mtʃˈana, wˈala mwˈezi wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
bwˈana ˌatakukˈiŋɡa na maðˈara jˈote, ˌatajalˈinda maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌatakulˈinda ˌunapˌoiŋɡˈia na ˌunapotˈoka, ʃˈu sˈasa na hˌata milˈele.|0
nˌiliʃˌaŋɡilˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌoniambˈia, twˈende ɲumbˈani ja bwˈana.|0
ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, miɡˈuu jˈetu ˌimesimˈama mˌalaŋɡˈoni mwˈako.|0
jˌerusalˈemu ˌimeɟˈeŋɡwa vjˈema kˌama ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ˌumeʃˌikamanˈiʃwa pamˈoɟa.|0
hˌuko ndˈiko mˌakabˈila hukwˈea, mˌakabˈila ja bwˈana, kˌulisˈifu ɟˈina la bwˈana kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌaaɡˈizo wˌaliopˈewa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌuko vˈiti vja ˈenzi vja hukˈumu hukˈaa, vˈiti vja ˈenzi vja ɲˈumba ja daˈudi.|0
ˈomba kwa aɟˈili ja amˈani ja jˌerusalˈemu: wˈote wˌakupendˈao na wˈawe salˈama.|0
amˈani na iwˈepo ndˈani ja kˈuta zˈako na ˌusalˈama ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome zˈako.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈuɡu zˈaŋɡu na mˌarafˈiki, nˌitasˈema, amˈani ˈiwe ndˈani jˈako.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, nˌitatafˈuta mˌafanikˈio jˈako.|0
nˌinajˌainˈua mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kwˈako, kwˈako wˌewe ambˈaje kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˈiko mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈatʃo ja watˈumwa jˌatazamˈavjo mkˈono wa bwˈana wˈao, kˌama vˈile mˈatʃo ja mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike jˌatazamˈavjo mkˈono wa bˈibi jˈake, ndˈivjo mˈatʃo jˈetu jˌamtazamˈavjo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, mpˈaka ˌatakˌapotˌuhurumˈia.|0
ˌuturehˈemu, ˈee bwˈana, ˌuturehˈemu, kwa maˈana tˌumevˌumilˈia ðarˈau ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
tˌumevˌumilˈia ðihˈaka ɲˈiŋɡi kutˈoka kwa wˌeɲe kibˈuri, ðarˈau ɲˈiŋɡi kutˈoka kwa wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌasiŋɡˌalikˈuwa upˈande wˈetu; ˌisraˈeli na asˈeme sˈasa.|0
kˌama bwˈana ˌasiŋɡˌalikˈuwa upˈande wˈetu, wakˈati wˈatu wˌalipˌotuʃˌambulˈia.|0
wakˈati hasˈira jˈao ˌilipowˈaka ðˈidi jˈetu, wˌaŋɡalˌitumˈeza tuŋɡˈali hˈai.|0
mˌafurˈiko jˌaŋɡalˌituɣˌarikˈiʃa, mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi jˌaŋɡalˌitufunˈika.|0
mˈaɟi jˌaendˈajo kˈasi jˌaŋɡalˌitutʃukˈua.|0
bwˈana ˌasifˈiwe, jˌeje ambˈaje hˌakuruhˈusu tˌurarulˈiwe kwa mˈeno jˈao.|0
tˌumepoɲˈoka kˌama ndˈeɡe kutˈoka mtˈeɡo wa mwindˈaɟi; mtˈeɡo ˌumevuɲɟˈika, nˌasi tˌukaokˈoka.|0
msaˈada wˈetu ni katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana, muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia.|0
wˈale wˌamtumˌainˈio bwˈana ni kˌama mlˈima sajˈuni, ambˈao hˌauwˈezi kˌutikisˈika, bˌali wadˈumu milˈele.|0
kˌama milˈima ˌinavjˌozuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu, ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌanavjˌowazuŋɡˈuka wˈatu wˌake sˈasa na hˌata milˈele.|0
fˈimbo ja waˈovu hˌaitadˈumu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi wˌaliopˈewa wˌeɲe hˈaki, ˌili wˌeɲe hˈaki wasˈiɟe wˌakatumˈia mikˈono jˈao kutˈenda ubˈaja.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌatendˈee mˈema walˈio wˈema, wˈale walˈio waɲˈofu wa mˈojo.|0
bˌali wˈale wˌanaˌoɡeukˈia ɲɟˈia zˌilizˌopotˈoka, bwˈana ˌatawˌafukˈuza pamˈoɟa na watˈenda mabˈaja. amˈani ˈiwe ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌalipˌowareɟˈeza matˈeka sajˈuni, tˌulikˈuwa kˌama wˈatu wˌalioˈota ndˈoto.|0
vˈiɲua vjˈetu vˌiliɟˈaa kitʃˈeko, ndˈimi zˈetu zˌiliɟˈaa ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe. ndˈipo ˌiliposˈemwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, bwˈana ˌamewˌatendˈea mˈambo makˈuu.|0
bwˈana ˌametˌutendˈea mˈambo makˈuu, nˌasi tˌumeɟˈaa furˈaha.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tˌureɟeʃˈee wˈatu wˈetu wˌaliotˈekwa, kˌama viɟˈito katˌika neɡˈebu.|0
wˌapandˈao kwa matʃˈozi wˌatavˈuna kwa ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
jˌeje ˌazitʃˌukuˈaje mbˈeɡu zˌake kwˈenda kupˈanda, hˈuku ˌakilˈia, ˌatarˈudi kwa ɲˈimbo za ʃˈaŋɡwe, ˌakitʃukˈua miɡˈanda ja mavˈuno jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌasipˌoiɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba, wˌaɟeŋɡˈao hufˈaɲa kˈazi bˈure. bwˈana ˌasipˌoulˈinda ˈm̩ɟi, walˈinzi wakˈeʃa bˈure.|0
mnˌaɟisumbˈua bˈure kuˈamka mapˈema na kˌutʃelˈewa kulˈala, mkˌitaˌabikˈia tʃakˈula: kwa maˈana jˌeje huwˈapa ˌusiŋɡˈizi wapˈenzi wˈake.|0
wˈana ni urˈiθi ˌutokˈao kwa bwˈana, watˈoto ni zawˈadi kutˈoka kwˈake.|0
kˌama miʃˈale mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ʃuɟˈaa ndˈivjo walˈivjo wˈana ˌawazaˈao ˈm̩tu katˌika uɟˈana wˈake.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu ambˈaje pˈodo lˈake lˌimeɟˈazwa nˈao. hˌawatˌaaibˈiʃwa wˌanapˌoʃindˈana na adˈui zˈao laŋɡˈoni.|0
hˈeri ni wˈale wˈote wamtʃˈao bwˈana, wˌaendˈao katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake.|0
ˌutakˈula matˈunda ja kˈazi jˈako; barˈaka na mˌafanikˈio vˌitakˈuwa vjˈako.|0
ˈm̩ke wˈako ˌatakˈuwa kˌama mzabˈibu ˌuzaˈao ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈako; wˈana wˈako wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˌatʃipukˈizi ja mˌizeitˈuni kˌuizuŋɡˈuka mˈeza jˈako.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌatakˌavjobˌarikˈiwa ˈm̩tu amtʃˈaje bwˈana.|0
bwˈana na ˌakubarˈiki kutˈoka sajˈuni sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈako, na uˈone mˌafanikˈio ja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌawe ˌuɟalˈiwe kuˈiʃi uˈone watˈoto wa watˈoto wˈako. amˈani ˈiwe ɟˌuːja ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌamenˌionˈea ˈm̩no ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu; ˌisraˈeli na asˈeme sˈasa.|0
wˌamenˌionˈea ˈm̩no ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini bˈado hˌawaɟˌaniʃˈinda.|0
wˌakulˈima wˌamelˈima mɡˈoŋɡo wˈaŋɡu, na kufˈaɲa mˌiferˈeɟi jˈao mirˈefu.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki; ˌamenˌifuŋɡˈua tˌoka kˈamba za waˈovu.|0
wˈale wˈote wˌaitʃˌukiˈao sajˈuni na wˌarudˈiʃwe ɲˈuma kwa aˈibu.|0
wˈawe kˌama maɟˈani ɟˌuːja pˈaa, ambˈajo hˌuɲaˈuka kˈabla hˌajaɟakˈua.|0
kwa hˈajo mvunˈaɟi hawˈezi kuɟˈaza vitˈaŋɡa vjˈake, wˈala ˌakusaɲˈaje kuɟˈaza mikˈono jˈake.|0
wˈale wˌapitˈao karˈibu na wˌasisˈeme, barˈaka ja bwˈana ˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈako; tˌunakˌubarˈiki katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
kutˈoka vˌilindˈini nˌinakˌulilˈia, ˈee bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu. mˌasikˈio jˈako na jˈawe mˌasikˈivu kwa kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌunihˌurumˈie.|0
kˌama wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌuŋɡewˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu ja ðˈambi, ˈee bwˈana, ni nˈani ˌaŋɡeliwˈeza kˌusimˈama.|0
lakˈini kwˈako kˈuna msamˈaha, kwa hˈijo wˌewe ˌunaoɡˈopwa.|0
nˌamŋɡoɟˈea bwˈana, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinaŋɡoɟˈea, katˌika nˈeno lˈake nawˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinamŋɡoɟˈea bwˈana kulˈiko walˈinzi wˌaiŋɡˌoɟeˈavjo ˌasubˈuhi, nˈaam, kulˈiko walˈinzi wˌaiŋɡˌoɟeˈavjo ˌasubˈuhi.|0
ˈee ˌisraˈeli, mtˌumaˈini bwˈana, maˈana kwa bwˈana kˈuna upˈendo ˌusiokˈoma, na kwˈake kˈuna ˌukombˈozi kamˈili.|0
jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌataˌikombˈoa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈao zˈote.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu haˈuna kibˈuri, ˈee bwˈana, mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu hˌajaɟivˈuni; sˌiɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃi na mˈambo makˈuu kˌunizˈidi wˈala mˈambo ja aɟˈabu ˈm̩no kwˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˌimetulˈiza na kˌuɲamazˈiʃa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu; kˌama mtˈoto ˌalijˌeatʃˈiʃwa kuɲˈoɲa na mˈama jˈake, kˌama mtˈoto ˌalijˌeatʃˈiʃwa kuɲˈoɲa ndˈivjo ilˈivjo nˈafsi ˌilijˈoko ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee ˌisraˈeli, mtˌumaˈini bwˈana ʃˈu sˈasa na hˌata milˈele.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mkumbˈuke daˈudi na taˈabu zˈote ˌalizˌozistˌahimˈili.|0
ˌaliˈapa kiˈapo kwa bwˈana na ˌakawˈeka naðˈiri kwa jˈule mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa jakˈobo.|0
sˌitaiŋɡˈia ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu ˌau kwˈenda kˌitandˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌitaruhˈusu ˌusiŋɡˈizi katˌika mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu, wˈala kˈope zˈaŋɡu kˌusinzˈia.|0
mpˈaka nˌitakˌapompatˈia bwˈana mahˈali, makˈao kwa aɟˈili ja jˈule mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa jakˈobo.|0
tˌulisikˈia habˈari hˌii hˌuko efrˈaθi, tˌulikutˈana nˈajo katˌika maʃˈamba ja jaˈara.|0
twendˈeni kwˈeɲe makˈao jˈake, na tˌuabˈudu kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa kˌuwekˈea miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
inˈuka, ˈee bwˈana, ˈuɟe mahˈali pˈako pa kˌupumzikˈia, wˌewe na sandˈuku la ŋɡˈuvu zˈako.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˈako na wavˈikwe hˈaki, wˌatakatˈifu wˈako na waˈimbe kwa furˈaha.|0
bwˈana ˌalimwapˈia daˈudi kiˈapo, kiˈapo tʃa ˌuhakˈika ambˈatʃo hˌatakˌitaŋɡˈua: nˌitamwˈeka mmˈoɟa wa wazˈao wˈako mweɲˈewe katˌika kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi.|0
kˌama wanˈao wˌataʃˈika aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na ʃerˈia nˌinazˌowafundˈiʃa, ndˈipo wˈana wˌao wˌatarˈiθi kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi milˈele na milˈele.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌameˌitʃaɡˈua sajˈuni, ˌamepˌaonˈea ʃaˈuku pˈawe maskˈani jˈake.|0
hˈapa ni mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pa kˌupumzˈika milˈele na milˈele; hˈapa ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokˈeti nˌikitawˈala, kwa sabˈabu nˌimepˌaonˈea ʃaˈuku.|0
nˌitambarˈiki kwa kˈumpa mˌahitˈaɟi tˈele: nˌitaʃibˈiʃa maskˈini wˌake kwa tʃakˈula.|0
nˌitawavˈika mˌakuhˈani wˌake wokˈovu, nˌao wˌatakatˈifu wˌake wˌatadˈumu wˌakiˈimba kwa furˈaha.|0
hˈapa nˌitamtʃˌipuʃˈia daˈudi pˈembe, na kuwˈeka tˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja masˈija wˈaŋɡu.|0
adˈui zˌake nˌitawavˈika aˈibu, bˌali tˈaɟi kitʃwˈani pˈake ˌitaŋɡˈaa sˈana.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ilˈivjo vjˈema na kˌupendˈeza wakˈati ndˈuɡu wˌanapoˈiʃi pamˈoɟa katˌika umˈoɟa.|0
ni kˌama mafˈuta ja θamˈani jˌalijˌomimˈinwa kitʃwˈani, jˌakitˌirirˈika kwˈeɲe ndˈevu, jˌakitˌirirˈika kwˈeɲe ndˈevu za arˈoni, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe upˈindo wa mavˈazi jˈake.|0
ni kˌama vˈile umˈande wa hermˈoni ˌunavjˌoaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni. kwa maˈana hˌuko ndˈiko bwˈana ˌalikˌoamˈuru barˈaka jˈake, nˈaam, hˌata uzˈima milˈele.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana, nˈiɲi ɲˈote wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana, nˈiɲi mnˌaotumˈika usˈiku ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
ˌinuˈeni mikˈono jˈenu katˌika pˈale pˌatakatˈifu na kumsˈifu bwˈana.|0
nˌaje bwˈana, muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia, ˌawabarˈiki kutˈoka sajˈuni.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. lˌisifˈuni ɟˈina la bwˈana, msifˈuni, ˈeɲi wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana.|0
nˈiɲi ambˈao mnˌatumˈika ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, katˌika ɲˈua za ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mwˈema, lˌiimbiˈeni sˈifa ɟˈina lˈake, kwa maˈana hˌilo lˌapendˈeza.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamemtʃaɡˈua jakˈobo kˌuwa wˌake mweɲˈewe, ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa mˈali jˌake ja θamˈani.|0
nˌinaɟˈua ja kˌuwa bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu, kwˌamba bwˈana wˈetu ni m̩kˈuu kulˈiko miˈuŋɡu jˈote.|0
bwˈana hufˈaɲa lolˈote ˌapendˈalo, mbiŋɡˈuni na dˌuniˈani, katˌika bahˈari na vilˈindi vjˈake vjˈote.|0
hufˈaɲa mawˈiŋɡu kupˈanda kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia; hˌupelˈeka umˈeme wa rˈadi pamˈoɟa na mvˈua na hulˈeta upˈepo kutˈoka ɣˈala zˈake.|0
ˌalimuˈua mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mˈisri, mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa wˌanadˈamu na waɲˈama.|0
ˌalipelˈeka iʃˈara zˌake na mˌaaɟˈabu kˌatikˈati jˈako, ˈee mˈisri, ðˈidi ja farˈao na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote.|0
ˌalijapˈiɡa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, na ˌakaˈua wafˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
mfˈalme sihˈoni na wˌaamˈori, ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani na wafˈalme wˈote wa kˌanaˈani.|0
ˌakatˈoa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao kˌuwa urˈiθi, urˈiθi kwa wˈatu wˌake ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈina lˈako ladˈumu milˈele, kˌumbukˈumbu za fahˈari zˈako, ˈee bwˈana, kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
maˈana bwˈana ˌatawˌaθibitˈiʃa wˈatu wˈake, na kˌuwahˌurumˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake.|0
sanˈamu za mˌataˈifa ni fˈeða na ðahˈabu, zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
zˈina vˈiɲua, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kusˈema, zˈina mˈatʃo, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kuˈona.|0
zˈina mˌasikˈio, lakˈini hˌaziwˈezi kˌusikˈia, wˈala hakˈuna pˈumzi katˌika vˈiɲua vjˈao.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌozitˌeŋɡenˈeza wˌatafanˈana nˈazo, vˈivjo hˈivjo wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌozitˌumainˈia.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, msifˈuni bwˈana; ˈee ɲˈumba ja arˈoni, msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja lˈawi, msifˈuni bwˈana; nˈiɲi mnaˈomtʃa, msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana kutˈoka sajˈuni, msifˈuni jˌeje ˌaiʃˈije jˌerusalˈemu. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ni mwˈema. faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni mˈuŋɡu wa miˈuŋɡu. faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana wa mabwˈana: faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kwˈake jˌeje pekˈee ˌatendˈaje mˌaaɟˈabu makˈuu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ambˈaje kwa ˌufahˈamu wˌake ˌaliziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ambˈaje ˌaliˌitandˈaza dunˈia ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ambˈaje ˌaliˈumba miˈaŋɡa mikˈubwa, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ɟˈua lˌitawˈale mtʃˈana, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
mwˈezi na ɲˈota vˌitawˈale usˈiku, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kwˈake jˌeje ˌalijˌemuˈua mzalˈiwa wa kwˈanza wa mˈisri, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
na kˌuwatˈoa ˌisraˈeli kˌatikˈati jˈao, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kwˈake jˌeje ˌalijˌeiɡˈawa bahˈari ja ʃˈamu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
na kˌuwapitˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌatikˈati jˈake, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
lakˈini ˌalimfaɡˈia farˈao na ɟˈeʃi lˈake katˌika bahˈari ja ʃˈamu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kwˈake jˌeje ˌalijˌewaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wˌake katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ambˈaje ˌaliwapˈiɡa wafˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
nˌaje ˌaliwaˈua wafˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
sihˈoni mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈori, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˈoɡu mfˈalme wa baʃˈani, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˌakatˈoa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao kˌuwa urˈiθi, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
urˈiθi kwa ˌisraˈeli mtumˈiʃi wˈake, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˌalijˌetukumbˈuka katˌika uɲˈoŋɡe wˈetu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ˌalituwˈeka hˈuru tˌoka adˈui zˈetu, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
ambˈaje hˈumpa tʃakˈula kˈila kiˈumbe. faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
mʃˌukurˈuni mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, faðˈili zˌake zadˈumu milˈele.|0
kˈando ja mˈito ja babˈeli tˌulikˈeti, tˌukaˌombolˈeza tˌulipˌokumbˈuka sajˈuni.|0
kwˈeɲe mˈiti ja hˌuko tˌulitundˈika vinˈubi vjˈetu.|0
kwa maˈana hˌuko hˈao wˌaliˌotutˈeka wˌalitˈaka tˌuwaimbˈie ɲˈimbo, watˈesi wˈetu wˌalidˈai ɲˈimbo za furˈaha; wˌalisˈema, tˌuimbiˈeni wˈimbo mmˈoɟa kˈati ja ɲˈimbo za sajˈuni.|0
tˌutaimbˈaɟe ɲˈimbo za bwˈana, tukˈiwa ˈn̩tʃi ja kiɡˈeni.|0
nˌikikˌusahˈau wˈewe, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, bˌasi mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume na ˌusahˈau uɟˈuzi wˈake.|0
ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu ˌuʃikamˈane na kˌaakˈaa la kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌama sˌitakˌukumbˈuka wˈewe, kˌama nˌisipˌokufikˈiri jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa furˈaha jˈaŋɡu kˈubwa.|0
kumbˈuka, ˈee bwˈana, wˌalitʃˌokifˈaɲa wˌaedˈomu, sˈiku ˈile jˌerusalˈemu ˌilipˌoaŋɡˈuka. wˌalisˈema, bomˈoa, bomˈoa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe misˈiŋɡi jˈake.|0
ˈee bˈinti babˈeli, ˌulijˌehukumˈiwa kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa, hˈeri jˌeje ˌatakˌajekˌulipˈiza wˌewe kwa jˈale ˌulijˌotutˈenda sˈisi.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje ˌatawˌakamˈata watˈoto wˈako watʃˈaŋɡa na kˌuwapˈonda ɟˌuːja miˈamba.|0
nˌitakusˈifu wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote, mbˈele ja miˈuŋɡu nˌitaˈimba sˈifa zˈako.|0
nˌitasuɟˈudu nˌikiˌelekˈea hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu, nˌami nˌitalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako kwa aɟˈili ja upˈendo wˈako na ˌuaminˈifu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumelikˈuza ɟˈina lˈako na nˈeno lˈako ɟˌuːja vˈitu vjˈote.|0
nˌilipoˈita, ˌuliniɟˈibu; ˌulinifˈaɲa ɟasˈiri na mwˌeɲe mˈojo hodˈari.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wa dunˈia wˌakusˈifu wˌewe ˈee bwˈana, wakˈati wˌanapˌosikˈia manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈako.|0
wˌao na waˈimbe kuhˈusu ɲɟˈia za bwˈana, kwa maˈana ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu.|0
iŋɡˈawa bwˈana jˈuko ɟˈuu, hˌumwaŋɡalˈia mɲˈoŋɡe, bˌali mwˌeɲe kibˈuri jˌeje ˌanamɟˈua kˌutokˈea mbˈali.|0
nˌiɟapopˈita kˌatikˈati ja ʃˈida, wˌewe ˌunajˌahifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, ˌunaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako ðˈidi ja hasˈira ja adˈui zˈaŋɡu, kwa mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ˌunanˌiokˈoa.|0
bwˈana ˌatatimˈiza kusˈudi lˈake kwˈaŋɡu, ˈee bwˈana, upˈendo wˈako wadˈumu milˈele: ˌusiziˈatʃe kˈazi za mikˈono jˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenˌitʃuŋɡˈuza na kˌuniɟˈua.|0
ˌunaɟˈua nˌinapokˈeti na nˌinapˌoinˈuka; ˌunatambˈua mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu tokˈea mbˈali.|0
ˌunafahˈamu kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu na kulˈala kwˈaŋɡu; ˌunaelˈewa ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
kˈabla nˈeno hˌaliɟafˈika katˌika ulˈimi wˈaŋɡu, wˌewe wˌaliɟˈua kˌikamilˈifu, ˈee bwˈana.|0
ˌumenˌizuŋɡˈuka ɲˈuma na mbˈele; ˌumewˈeka mkˈono wˈako ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌaarˈifa hˈaja ni ja aɟˈabu ˈm̩no kwˈaŋɡu, ni ja ɟˈuu sˈana kwˈaŋɡu kˌujafikˈia.|0
niˈende wˈapi nˌiɟiepˈuʃe na rˈoho jˈako? niˈende wˈapi nˌiukimbˈie ˈuso wˈako.|0
kˌama nˌikiˈenda ɟˈuu mbiŋɡˈuni, wˌewe ˈuko hˌuko; nˌikifˈaɲa vilˈindi kˌuwa kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu, wˌewe ˈuko hˌuko.|0
kˌama nˌikipˈanda ɟˌuːja mbˈawa za mˌapambazˈuko, kˌama nˌikikˈaa pˈande za mbˈali za bahˈari.|0
hˌata hˌuko mkˈono wˈako ˌutanˌioŋɡˈoza, mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume ˌutaniʃˈika kwa ˌuθabˈiti.|0
kˌama nˌikisˈema, hakˈika ɡˈiza lˌitanifˈitʃa na nˈuru ˌinajˌonizuŋɡˈuka ˈiwe usˈiku.|0
hˌata ɡˈiza hˌalitakˈuwa ɡˈiza kwˈako, usˈiku ˌutaŋɡˈaa kˌama mtʃˈana, kwa kˌuwa ɡˈiza ni kˌama nˈuru kwˈako.|0
kwa maˈana wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌulijeˈumba ˈutu wˈaŋɡu wa ndˈani; ˌuliniˈuŋɡa pamˈoɟa tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinakusˈifu kwa sabˈabu nˌimeˈumbwa kwa nˈamna ja aɟˈabu na ja kutˈiʃa; kˈazi zˈako ni za aɟˈabu, nˌinaɟˈua hˈajo kˌikamilˈifu.|0
umbˈile lˈaŋɡu hˌalikˌufitʃˈika kwˈako, nˌilipoˈumbwa mahˈali pa sˈiri. nˌilipoˈuŋɡwa pamˈoɟa kwa ustˈadi katˌika vilˈindi vja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako jˌaliniˈona kˈabla mwˈili wˈaŋɡu hˌauɟˌakamilˈika. sˈiku zˈaŋɡu zˈote ˌulizˌonipaŋɡˈia zˌiliandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃˈako kˈabla hˌaiɟˌakuwˈepo hˌata mˈoɟa.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi jalˈivjo ja θamˈani mawˈazo jˈako kwˈaŋɡu, ˈee mˈuŋɡu! ɟˈinsi ɟˈumla jˌake ilˈivjo kˈubwa.|0
