kˌama nˌiŋɡezˌihesˈabu, zˌiŋɡekˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi kulˈiko mtʃˈaŋɡa. nˌiamkˈapo, bˈado nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
laˈiti ˌuŋɡewatʃˈiɲɟa waˈovu, ˈee mˈuŋɡu! ˌondokˈeni kwˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi wamwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
wˌanazuŋɡˈumza ɟˈuu jˈako wakˈiwa na kusˈudi bˈaja, adˈui zˈako wˌanatumˈia vibˈaja ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈe, nˌisiwˌatʃukˈie wˌanaˌokutʃukˈia? nˌisiwˌatʃukˈie sˈana wˌanaˌoinˈuka ðˈidi jˈako.|0
sˈina kˈitu zaˈidi ja tʃˈuki ðˈidi jˈao, nˌinawˌahesˈabu ni adˈui zˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌitʃuŋɡˈuze, ˌuuɟˈue mˈojo wˈaŋɡu, nˌiɟarˈibu na uɟˈue mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu.|0
uˈone kˌama kˈuna ɲɟˈia ˌiletˈajo mˌatʃukˈizo ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, ˌunioŋɡˈoze katˌika ɲɟˈia ja milˈele.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌiokˈoe, kutˈoka kwa wˈatu waˈovu; nilˈinde na wˈatu wˌeɲe ɟeˈuri.|0
ambˈao hupˈaŋɡa mipˈaŋɡo mibˈaja mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao, na kˌutʃotʃˈea vˈita sˈiku zˈote.|0
wˌao hufˈaɲa ndˈimi zˈao kˈali kˌama za ɲˈoka, sˈumu ja ɲˈoka ˈiko mˌidomˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌiepˈuʃe na mikˈono ja waˈovu; nilˈinde na wˈatu wˌeɲe ɟeˈuri wˌanaopˈaŋɡa kˌunikwˈaza miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌeɲe kibˈuri wˌamefˈitʃa mtˈeɡo wa kˌuninˈasa, wˌametandˈaza kˈamba za wˈavu wˈao, wˌametˈeɡa mitˈeɡo kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakˌuambˈia, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikˈie kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu na kˌunihˌurumˈia.|0
ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, ˌunikiŋɡˈaje kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu sˈiku ja vˈita.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusiwˈape waˈovu matˈakwa jˈao, ˌusiˈatʃe mipˈaŋɡo jˈao ˌikafˌanikˈiwa, wasˈiɟe wˌakaɟisˈifu.|0
vˈitʃwa vja wˌanaˌonizuŋɡˈuka vˌifunˈikwe na ʃˈida zˌinazˌosababˈiʃwa na midˈomo jˈao.|0
makˈaa ja mˈawe ja mˈoto na jˌawaˌaŋɡukˈie! na watˈupwe motˈoni, katˌika maʃˈimo ja matˈope, wˌasiinˈuke tˈena kˈamwe.|0
wˌasiŋɡˌiziˈaɟi wˌasifˌanikˈiwe katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; maˈafa na jˌawawˈinde wˈatu wˌeɲe ɟeˈuri.|0
naɟˈua kwˌamba bwˈana hˌuwapatˈia maskˈini hˈaki, na kˌuitˌeɡemˈeza ɲɟˈia ja mhitˈaɟi.|0
hakˈika wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako, na wˌaadilˈifu wˌataˈiʃi mbˈele zˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌinakuˈita wˈewe, ˈuɟe kwˈaŋɡu hˈima. sikˈia saˈuti jˈaŋɡu nˌinapˌokuˈita.|0
maˈombi jˈaŋɡu na jafˈike mbˈele zˈako kˌama uvˈumba; kˌuinˈua mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu na kˈuwe kˌama ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˈeka mlˈinzi kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu, wˈeka ulˈinzi mlaŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa midˈomo jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusiuˈatʃe mˈojo wˈaŋɡu uvˈutwe katˌika ɟˈambo bˈaja, nisˈiɟe nˌikaʃirˈiki katˌika matˈendo maˈovu pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌatendˈao mabˈaja, wˈala nisˈiɟe nikˈala vjakˈula vjˈao vja anˈasa.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki na ˌanipˈiɡe: ni ɟˈambo la hurˈuma; na ˌanikemˈee: ni mafˈuta kitʃwˈani mwˈaŋɡu. kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu hˌakitˌalikatˈaa. hˌata hˈivjo, maˈombi jˈaŋɡu daˈima ni kiɲˈume tʃa watˈenda mabˈaja.|0
wˌatawˈala wˌao wˌatatˈupwa tʃˈini kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌaɟabˈali, waˈovu wˌataɟifˈunza kwˌamba manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌalikˈuwa kwˈeli.|0
wˌatasˈema, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanavjolˈima na kuvˈuɲɟa ˈarði, ndˈivjo mifˈupa jˈetu ˌimetawˈaɲua kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa kabˈuri.|0
lakˈini nˌimekˈaza mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kwˈako, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ndˈani jˈako nˌimekˌimbilˈia, ˌusiniˈatʃe nˈife.|0
nˌiepˈuʃe na mitˈeɡo wˌalijˌoniteɡˈea, kˌutokˈana na mitˈeɡo ˌilijotˈeɡwa na watˈenda mabˈaja.|0
waˈovu na wˌaaŋɡˈuke kwˈeɲe ɲˈavu zˈao weɲˈewe, wakˈati mˌimi nˌinapˈita salˈama.|0
nˌamlilˈia bwˈana kwa saˈuti, nˌainˈua saˈuti jˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana ˌanihˌurumˈie.|0
nˌamimˈina mˌalalamˈiko jˈaŋɡu mbˈele zˈake, mbˈele zˌake nˌaelˈeza ʃˈida zˈaŋɡu.|0
wakˈati rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌinapˌozimˈia ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌunaɟˈua ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu. katˌika ɲɟˈia nˌinajopˈita wˈatu wˌamenˌiwekˈea mtˈeɡo.|0
tazˈama kuˈume kwˈaŋɡu na uˈone, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌeɟihusˈiʃa nˈami. sˈina kˌimbilˈio, hakˈuna ˌanajeɟˈali maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, nˌakulilˈia wˈewe, nasˈema, wˌewe ni kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu, fˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
sˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ni mhitˈaɟi sˈana; nˌiokˈoe na wˈale wˌanaˌonifˌuatilˈia, kwa kˌuwa wˌamenizˈidi ŋɡˈuvu.|0
nˌifuŋɡˈue kutˈoka kifˈuŋɡo tʃˈaŋɡu, ˌili niwˈeze kˌulisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako. ndˈipo wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatanˌizuŋɡˈuka, kwa sabˈabu ja wˈema wˈako kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia sˈala jˈaŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu ˌunihˌurumˈie; katˌika ˌuaminˈifu na hˈaki jˈako ɲɟˈoo ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
ˌusimhukˈumu mtumˈiʃi wˈako, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌanajeˈiʃi alˈije mwˌeɲe hˈaki mbˈele zˈako.|0
adˈui hˌunifˌuatilˈia, hˌunipˌondapˈonda tʃˈini; hˌunifˈaɲa niˈiʃi ɡizˈani kˌama wˈale wˌaliokˈufa zamˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌinazimˈia ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ndˈani jˈaŋɡu ˌunakˈata tamˈaa.|0
nˌakumbˈuka sˈiku za zamˈani; nˌatafakˈari ɟˌuːja kˈazi zˈako zˈote, nˌaaŋɡalˈia ɟˌuːja kˈazi ambˈazo mikˈono jˈako ˌimezifˈaɲa.|0
nˌaɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kwˈako, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinakˌuonˈea kˈiu kˌama ˈarði kˈame.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuniɟˈibu harˈaka, rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ˌinazimˈia. ˌusinifˈitʃe ˈuso wˈako, ˌama sˈivjo nˌitafanˈana na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni.|0
ˌasubˈuhi ˌuniletˈee nˈeno la upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu kwˈako. nˌioɲˈeʃe ɲɟˈia nˌitakˌajoˌiendˈea, kwa kˌuwa kwˈako nˌainˈua nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuniokˈoe na adˈui zˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeɟifˈitʃa kwˈako.|0
nˌifundˈiʃe kufˈaɲa mapˈenzi jˈako, kwa maˈana wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, rˈoho wˈako mwˈema na ˌanioŋɡˈoze katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌambarˈare.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako, hifˈaði maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, kwa hˈaki jˈako nitˈoe katˌika taˈabu.|0
kwa upˈendo wˈako ˌusiokˈoma, ɲˌamazˈiʃa adˈui zˈaŋɡu; wˌaaŋɡamˈize watˈesi wˈaŋɡu wˈote, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni mtumˈiʃi wˈako.|0
sˈifa ni kwa bwˈana mwˈamba wˈaŋɡu, ˌaifˌundiʃˈaje mikˈono jˈaŋɡu vˈita, na vidˈole vjˈaŋɡu kˌupiɡˈana.|0
jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu wa upˈendo na bˈoma lˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu na mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu, ŋɡˈao jˈaŋɡu nˌinajˌemkimbilˈia, ambˈaje hˌuwatiˈiʃa mˌataˈifa tʃˈini jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mwˌanadˈamu ni nˈini hˌata umɟˈali, bˌinadˈamu ni nˈini hˌata ˌumfikirˈie.|0
mwˌanadˈamu ni kˌama pˈumzi, sˈiku zˌake ni kˌama kivˈuli kˌinatʃopˈita.|0
ˈee bwˈana, pasˈua mbˈiŋɡu zˈako, uʃˈuke, ɡˈusa milˈima ˌili itˈoe mˈoʃi.|0
pelˈeka umˈeme ˌuwatawˈaɲe adˈui, lˈeŋɡa miʃˈale jˈako ˌuwaʃˈinde.|0
ɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈako kutˈoka ɟˈuu, nˌikombˈoe na kˌuniokˈoa kutˈoka mˈaɟi makˈuu, kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waɡˈeni.|0
ambˈao vˈiɲua vjˈao vˌimeɟˈaa uˈoŋɡo, na mikˈono jˈao ja kuˈume ni mˌidaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, nˌitakˌuimbˈia wˈimbo ˈm̩pja, kwa zˈeze jˌeɲe ɲˈuzi kˈumi nˌitakˌuimbˈia.|0
nˌikombˈoe na ˌuniokˈoe kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waɡˈeni ambˈao vˈiɲua vjˈao vˌimeɟˈaa uˈoŋɡo, na mikˈono jˈao ja kuˈume ni mˌidaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa wˈana wˈetu wakˈati wa uɟˈana wˌao wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mimˈea ˌilijotˈunzwa vizˈuri, bˈinti zˈetu wˌatakˈuwa kˌama ŋɡˈuzo zˌilizˌovirˈiŋɡwa kˌurembˈeʃa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
ɣˈala zˈetu zˌitaɟˈazwa aˈina zˈote za mˌahitˈaɟi. kondˈoo zˈetu wˌatazˈaa kwa maˈelfu, kwa makˈumi ja maˈelfu katˌika maʃˈamba jˈetu.|0
maksˈai wˈetu wˌatakokˈota mizˈiɡo mizˈito. hˌakutakˈuwa na kˌubomˈoka kˈuta, hakˈuna kˌutʃukulˈiwa matˈeka, wˈala kilˈio tʃa taˈabu katˌika bˌarabˈara zˈetu.|0
hˈeri wˈatu ambˈao hˈili ni kwˈeli; hˈeri wˈale ambˈao bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
nˌitakˌutukˈuza wˈewe, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, nˌitalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako milˈele na milˈele.|0
kˈila sˈiku nˌitakusˈifu na kˌulitukˈuza ɟˈina lˈako milˈele na milˈele.|0
bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu, ˌanajˌestahˈili kˌusifˈiwa sˈana, ukˈuu wˌake hˌaupimˈiki.|0
kizˈazi kimˈoɟa kˌitasifˈia kˈazi zˈako kwa kizˈazi kiŋɡˈine, wˌatasˌimulˈia matˈendo jˈako makˈuu.|0
wˌatasˈema ɟˌuːja ˌutukˈufu wa fahˈari ja ukˈuu wˈako, nˌami nˌitatˌafakˈari ɟˌuːja kˈazi zˈako za aɟˈabu.|0
wˌatasˌimulˈia uwˈezo wa kˈazi zˈako za kutˈiʃa, nˌami nˌitataŋɡˈaza matˈendo jˈako makˈuu.|0
wˌataˌaðimˈiʃa wˈema wˈako mwˈiŋɡi, na wˌataˈimba kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe ɟˌuːja hˈaki jˈako.|0
bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe neˈema na mwˈiŋɡi wa hurˈuma, si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira, bˌali ni mwˈiŋɡi wa upˈendo.|0
bwˈana ni mwˈema kwa wˈote, ˈana hurˈuma kwa vjˈote ˌalivjˌovifˈaɲa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, vjˈote ˌulivjˌovifˈaɲa vˌitakusˈifu, wˌatakatˈifu wˈako wˌatakˌutukˈuza.|0
wˌatasˌimulˈia ˌutukˈufu wa ufˈalme wˈako na kusˈema ɟˌuːja ukˈuu wˈako.|0
ˌili wˈatu wˈote waɟˈue matˈendo jˈako makˈuu na ˌutukˈufu wa fahˈari ja ufˈalme wˈako.|0
ufˈalme wˈako ni ufˈalme wa milˈele, mamlˈaka jˈako hudˈumu vizˈazi vjˈote. bwˈana ni mwˌaminˈifu kwa ahˈadi zˌake zˈote na mwˌeɲe upˈendo kwa vjˈote ˌalivjˌovifˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana hˌuwatˌeɡemˈeza wˈote wˌaaŋɡukˈao, na hˌuwainˈua wˈote wˌaliˌolemˈewa na mizˈiɡo jˈao.|0
mˈatʃo jˈao wˈote jˌanakˌutazˈama wˈewe, nˌawe huwˈapa tʃakˈula tʃˈao wakˈati wˈake.|0
wˌaufumbˈua mkˈono wˈako, wˌatoʃelˈeza hˈaɟa ja kˈila kˈitu kilˈitʃo hˈai.|0
bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote, na mwˌeɲe upˈendo kwa vjˈote ˌalivjˌovifˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana ju karˈibu na wˈote wˌamwitˈao, karˈibu na wˈote wˌamwitˈao kwa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
hˌuwatˌimizˈia wamtʃˈao matˈakwa jˈao, hˌusikˈia kilˈio tʃˈao na kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
bwˈana hˌuwalˈinda wˈote wˌampendˈao, bˌali waˈovu wˈote ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitazinˈena sˈifa za bwˈana. kˈila kiˈumbe na kˌilisˈifu ɟˈina lˈake tˌakatˈifu milˈele na milˈele.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana! ˈee nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, umsˈifu bwˈana.|0
nˌitamsˈifu bwˈana maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˈote; nˌitamwimbˈia mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu sˈifa wakˈati wˈote nˌiiʃˈipo.|0
ˌusiwˈeke tˌumaˈini lˈako kwa wakˈuu, kwa wˌanadˈamu ambˈao hˈufa, ambˈao hˌawawˈezi kˌuokˈoa.|0
rˈoho jˈao ˌitokˈapo hurˈudi mˌavumbˈini, sˈiku hˈijo hˈijo mipˈaŋɡo jˈao jˈote hukˈoma.|0
hˈeri jˌeje ambˈaje mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo ni msaˈada wˈake, ambˈaje tˌumaˈini lˈake ni katˌika bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
muˈumba wa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi, na bahˈari na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake: bwˈana ˌanajedˈumu kˌuwa mwˌaminˈifu milˈele na milˈele.|0
nˌaje hˌuwapatˈia hˈaki wˌaliˌoonˈewa na kuwˈapa wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa tʃakˈula. bwˈana hˌuwawˈeka wafˈuŋɡwa hˈuru.|0
bwˈana hˌuwafumbˈua vipˈofu mˈatʃo, bwˈana hˌuwainˈua wˌaliˌolemˈewa na mizˈiɡo jˈao, bwˈana hˌuwapˈenda wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
bwˈana hˌuwalˈinda waɡˈeni na kˌuwatˌeɡemˈeza jatˈima na waɟˈane, lakˈini hupˈiŋɡa ɲɟˈia za waˈovu.|0
bwˈana ˌatamilˈiki milˈele, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˈee sajˈuni, kwa vizˈazi vjˈote. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. tazˈama ɟˈinsi ilˈivjo vjˈema kˌumwimbˈia mˈuŋɡu wˈetu sˈifa, ɟˈinsi ˌinavjˌopendˈeza na kˌustahˈili kumsˈifu jˈeje.|0
bwˈana huɟˈeŋɡa jˌerusalˈemu, hˌuwakusˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
ˌanawapˈoɲa wˌaliˌovuɲɟˈika miˈojo na kˌuvifˈuŋɡa vidˈonda vjˈao.|0
hˌuzihesˈabu ɲˈota na huˈipa kˈila mˈoɟa ɟˈina lˈake.|0
bwˈana wˈetu ni m̩kˈuu na mwˌeɲe uwˈezo mwˈiŋɡi, ˌufahˈamu wˌake haˈuna kikˈomo.|0
bwˈana hˌuwahifˈaði wˌaɲeɲekˈevu lakˈini hˌuwaʃˈuʃa waˈovu mpˈaka mˌavumbˈini.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana kwa ʃukrˈani, mpˌiɡiˈeni mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kinˈubi.|0
jˌeje hˌuzifunˈika ˈaŋɡa kwa mawˈiŋɡu, hˌuiɲeʃˈea ˈarði mvˈua, na kˌuzifˈaɲa ɲˈasi kuˈota ɟˌuːja vilˈima.|0
furˈaha jˌake haˈipo katˌika ŋɡˈuvu za farˈasi, wˈala furˈaha jˌake kwˈeɲe miɡˈuu ja mwˌanadˈamu.|0
bwˈana hˌupendˈezwa na wˈale wamtʃˈao, wˈale wˌanaowˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao katˌika upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma.|0
mtukˈuze bwˈana, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, msˈifu mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˈee sajˈuni.|0
kwa maˈana hˌuimarˈiʃa mˌakomˈeo ja malˈaŋɡo jˈako na hˌuwabarˈiki wˈatu wˈako walˈio ndˈani jˈako.|0
huwˈapa amˈani mˌipakˈani mwˈenu na kˌukuʃibˈiʃa kwa ŋɡˈano sˈafi kabˈisa.|0
hutˈuma ˈamri jˌake dˌuniˈani, nˈeno lˈake hˌukimbˈia kˈasi.|0
ˌanatandˈaza θelˈuɟi kˌama sˈufu na kˌutawˈaɲa umˈande kˌama maɟˈivu.|0
hˌuvurumˈiʃa mvˈua jˌake ja mˈawe kˌama tʃˌaŋɡarˈawe. ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌustahimˈili ukˈali wa barˈidi jˈake.|0
hutˈuma nˈeno lˈake na kˌuvijejˈuʃa, hˌuvumˈiʃa upˈepo wˈake, nˈajo mˈaɟi hˌutirirˈika.|0
ˌamemfˌunulˈia jakˈobo nˈeno lˈake, ʃerˈia zˌake na mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake kwa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌaɟafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa taˈifa liŋɡˈine lolˈote, hˌawaziɟˈui ʃerˈia zˈake. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. msifˈuni bwˈana kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, msifˈuni ɟˈuu vˌilelˈeni.|0
msifˈuni, ˈeɲi mˌalaˈika wˌake wˈote, msifˈuni jˈeje, ˈeɲi ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote la mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
msifˈuni jˈeje, ˈeɲi ɟˈua na mwˈezi, msifˈuni jˈeje, ˈeɲi ɲˈota zˈote zˌiŋɡaˈazo.|0
msifˈuni jˈeje, ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu sˈana, na nˈiɲi mˈaɟi ɟˌuːja ˈaŋɡa.|0
vˌilisˈifu ɟˈina la bwˈana kwa maˈana ˌaliamˈuru nˈavjo vˌikaˈumbwa.|0
ˌaliviwˈeka mahˈali pˈake milˈele na milˈele, ˌalitˈoa ˈamri ambˈajo hˌaibˌadilˈiki milˈele.|0
mtˌukuzˈeni bwˈana kutˈoka dˌuniˈani, nˈiɲi viˈumbe vikˈubwa vja bˌaharˈini na vilˈindi vjˈote vja bahˈari.|0
umˈeme wa rˈadi na mvˈua ja mˈawe, θelˈuɟi na mawˈiŋɡu, pˈepo za ðorˈuba zˌinazofˈaɲa ˈamri zˈake.|0
nˈiɲi milˈima na vilˈima vjˈote, mˈiti ja matˈunda na mˌierˈezi jˈote.|0
waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni na mifˈuɡo jˈote, viˈumbe vidˈoɡo na ndˈeɡe wˌarukˈao.|0
wafˈalme wa dunˈia na mˌataˈifa jˈote, nˈiɲi wakˈuu na wˌatawˈala wˈote wa dunˈia.|0
wˌanaˈume viɟˈana na wˌanawˈali, wazˈee na watˈoto.|0
wˈote na wˌalisˈifu ɟˈina la bwˈana, kwa maˈana ɟˈina lˈake pekˈee lˌimetukˈuka, ˌutukˈufu wˌake ˈuko ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi na mbˈiŋɡu.|0
ˌamewˌainulˈia wˈatu wˌake pˈembe, sˈifa ja wˌatakatˈifu wˌake wˈote, ja ˌisraˈeli, wˈatu walˈio karˈibu na mˈojo wˈake. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana wˈimbo ˈm̩pja, sˈifa zˌake katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la wˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˌisraˈeli na wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie katˌika muˈumba wˈao, wˈatu wa sajˈuni na wˌafurˈahi katˌika mfˈalme wˈao.|0
na wˌalisˈifu ɟˈina lˈake kwa kutʃˈeza na wˌampiɡˈie muzˈiki kwa matˈari na kinˈubi.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌanapendˈezwa na wˈatu wˈake, ˌanawavˈika wˌaɲeɲekˈevu tˈaɟi ja wokˈovu.|0
wˌatakatˈifu wˌaʃaŋɡilˈie katˌika heʃˈima hˌii, na waˈimbe kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe vˌitandˈani m̩wˈao.|0
sˈifa za mˈuŋɡu na zˈiwe vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao na upˈaŋɡa ˌukatˈao kuwˈili mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ˌili wˌalipˈize mˌataˈifa kisˈasi na aðˈabu ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa.|0
wˌawafˈuŋɡe wafˈalme wˌao kwa mˌiɲorˈoro, wakˈuu wˌao kwa pˈiŋɡu za tʃˈuma.|0
ˌili kˌuwafaɲˈia hukˈumu ˌilijˌoandˈikwa ðˈidi jˈao. hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌutukˈufu wa wˌatakatˈifu wˌake wˈote. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
msifˈuni bwˈana. msifˈuni mˈuŋɡu katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pˈake, msifˈuni katˌika mbˈiŋɡu zˌake kˈuu.|0
msifˈuni kwa matˈendo jˌake makˈuu, msifˈuni kwa kadˈiri ja wˈiŋɡi wa ukˈuu wˈake.|0
msifˈuni kwa mvˈumo wa tˌarumbˈeta, msifˈuni kwa kinˈubi na zˈeze.|0
msifˈuni kwa matˈari na kutʃˈeza, msifˈuni kwa kinˈanda tʃa ɲˈuzi na filˈimbi.|0
msifˈuni kwa mˌatoˈazi jˌaliˈajo, msifˈuni kwa mˌatoˈazi jˌavumˈajo sˈana.|0
kˈila tʃˌeɲe pˈumzi na kimsˈifu bwˈana. msifˈuni bwˈana.|0
miθˈali za sˌolomˈoni mwˈana wa daˈudi, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa kupˈata hekˈima na niðˈamu; kwa kˌufahˈamu manˈeno ja busˈara.|0
kwa kˌuɟipatˈia niðˈamu na busˈara, kufˈaɲa lilˈilo sˈawa, hˈaki na bˌila kˌupendelˈea.|0
huwˈapa busˈara waɟˈiŋɡa, mˌaarˈifa na akˈili kwa viɟˈana.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima na wˌasikilˈize nˌao wˌaoŋɡˈeze elˈimu jˈao, wˌeɲe kˌupambanˈua na wapˈate mwoŋɡˈozo.|0
kwa kˌufahˈamu miθˈali na mifˈano, misˈemo na vˌitendawˈili vja wˌeɲe hekˈima.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana ndˈitʃo tʃˈanzo tʃa mˌaarˈifa, lakˈini wˌapumbˈavu hˌuðarˈau hekˈima na adˈabu.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza mwoŋɡˈozo wa bˈaba jˈako, wˈala ˌusijaˈatʃe mˌafundˈiʃo ja mˈama jˈako.|0
hˈajo jˌatakˈuwa tˈaɟi la maˈua la neˈema kitʃwˈani pˈako, na mkˈufu wa kˌuipˈamba ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, kˌama wˌeɲe ðˈambi wˌakikˌuʃawˈiʃi, ˌusikˌubaliˈane nˈao.|0
kˌama wˌakisˈema, twˈende tˌufuatˈane; tˌukamvizˈie ˈm̩tu na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, ɲɟˈoo tˌukavizˈie nˈafsi isˈijo na hatˈia.|0
tˌuwamˈeze wakˈiwa hˈai kˌama kabˈuri, wakˈiwa wazˈima kˌama wˈale wˌanaˌotumbukˈia ʃimˈoni.|0
tˌutapˈata aˈina zˈote za vˈitu vja θamˈani na kuɟˈaza ɲˈumba zˈetu kwa ɲˈara.|0
ɲɟˈoo ˌuʃirˌikiˈane nˈasi, vˈitu vjˈote tˌutakˌavjopˈata tˌutaɡawˈana.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌusiˌandamˈane nˈao. ˌusiwˈeke m̩ɡˈuu wˈako katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa miɡˈuu jˈao hˌukimbilˈia kwˈeɲe ðˈambi, ni wepˈesi kumwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
tazˈama ni ɟˈinsi ɡˈani ilˈivjo kˈazi bˈure kˌutandˈaza wˈavu wakˈati ndˈeɡe wˈote wˌanakuˈona.|0
wˈatu hˈawa hˌuvizˈia kumwˈaɡa dˈamu jˈao weɲˈewe; hˌuɟivizˈia tu weɲˈewe.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wa wˈote ambˈao wˌanaɟˌipatˈia mˈali kwa hˈila; hˌuuondˈoa uhˈai wa wˈale wˌeɲe mˈali.|0
hekˈima huˈita kwa saˈuti kˈuu bˌarabarˈani, hupˈaza saˈuti jˌake kwˈeɲe viwˈaɲɟa vikˈubwa.|0
kwˈeɲe mˌakutˈano ja bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi zˌeɲe mˌakelˈele mˈeŋɡi hupˈaza saˈuti, kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi hutˈoa hotˈuba jˈake.|0
ˈeɲi waɟˈiŋɡa, mtˌaŋɡaŋɡanˈia uɟˈiŋɡa wˈenu hˌadi lˈini? mpˈaka lˈini wˌeɲe mizˈaha wˌatafˌurahˈia mizˈaha, na wˌapumbˈavu kˌutʃukˈia mˌaarˈifa.|0
kˌama mŋɡekˈuwa mmˌeitikˈia kˌaripˈio lˈaŋɡu, nˌiŋɡekˈuwa nˌimemimˈina rˈoho jˈaŋɡu kwˈenu na kˌuwafˌahamˈiʃa manˈeno jˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kwa kˌuwa mlˌinikatˈaa nˌilipˌowaˈita na hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌekubˈali nˌilipˌoɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa kˌuwa mlˌijapuˈuza mˌaʃaˈuri jˈaŋɡu jˈote na hˌamkukubˈali kˌaripˈio lˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌimi nˌami nˌitawatʃˈeka katˌika maˈafa jˈenu, nˌitawˌaðihˈaki wakˈati ɟˈaŋɡa lˌitawapˈata.|0
wakˈati ɟˈaŋɡa lˌitawapˈata kˌama tufˈani, wakˈati maˈafa jˌatawazˈoa kˌama upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli, wakˈati ðˈiki na taˈabu zˌitawˌalemˈea.|0
ndˈipo wˌatakˌaponiˈita lakˈini sˌitawaɟˈibu; wˌatanˌitafˈuta lakˈini hˌawatˌanipˈata.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌalitʃukˈia mˌaarˈifa, wˈala hˌawakˌutʃaɡˈua kˈumtʃa bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˌukubˈali mˌaʃaˈuri jˈaŋɡu, na kˌukatˈaa maˈoɲo jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌatakˈula matˈunda ja ɲɟˈia zˈao, na wˌataʃibˈiʃwa matˈunda ja hˈila zˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌukaˈidi wa waɟˈiŋɡa ˌutawaˈua, nˈako kˌuriðˈika kwa waɟˈiŋɡa kˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza.|0
lakˈini jejˈote ˌanisˌikilizˈaje ˌataˈiʃi kwa ˌusalˈama, ˌatatulˈia, bˌila kˌuwa na hˈofu ja maðˈara.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌutajˌakubˈali manˈeno jˈaŋɡu na kˌujawˈeka akˈiba mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu ndˈani mwˈako.|0
kutˈeɡa sikˈio lˈako kwˈeɲe hekˈima na kuwˈeka mˈojo wˈako katˌika ˌufahˈamu.|0
na kˌama ˌukiˈita busˈara na kuˈita kwa saˈuti ˌufahˈamu.|0
na kˌama ˌutaˌitafˈuta kˌama fˈeða na kˌuitafˈuta sˈana kˌama hazˈina ˌilijofˈitʃwa.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoelˈewa kˈumtʃa bwˈana na kupˈata mˌaarˈifa ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana bwˈana hutˈoa hekˈima, na kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake hutˈoka mˌaarˈifa na ˌufahˈamu.|0
ˌanahifˈaði uʃˈindi kwa aɟˈili ja mwˌadilˈifu, jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao kwa wˈale wasˈio na lawˈama.|0
kwa kˌuwa hulˈinda mwenˈendo wa mwˌeɲe hˈaki na kˌuhifˈaði ɲɟˈia ja wˌaaminˈifu wˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌutafahˈamu lˈipi lilˈilo kwˈeli na hˈaki na sˈawa: jaˈani kˈila ɲɟˈia nzˈuri.|0
kwa maˈana hekˈima ˌitaiŋɡˈia mojˈoni mwˈako, nˈajo mˌaarˈifa jˌataˌifurahˈiʃa nˈafsi jˈako.|0
busˈara ˌitakˌuhifˈaði na ˌufahˈamu ˌutakulˈinda.|0
hekˈima ˌitakˌuokˈoa kutˈoka ɲɟˈia za waˈovu, kutˈoka kwa wˈatu ambˈao manˈeno jˈao jˌamepotˈoka.|0
wˈale wˌaatʃˈao mapˈito jˌalijˌoɲoˈoka wˌakatembˈea katˌika ɲɟˈia za ɡˈiza.|0
wˈale wˌapendˈao kutˈenda mabˈaja na kˌufurahˈia ˌupotˈovu wa ubˈaja.|0
ambˈao mapˈito jˈao jˌamepotˈoka na ambˈao ni wˌapotˈovu katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
ˌitakˌuokˈoa pˈia kˌutokˈana na mwanˈamke kahˈaba, kˌutokˈana na ˈm̩ke ˌalijˌepotˈoka mwˌeɲe manˈeno ja kˌuʃawˈiʃi kutˈenda ubˈaja.|0
ˌalijemwˈatʃa mwˈenzi wa uɟˈana wˌake na kˌupuˈuza aɡˈano ˌalilofˈaɲa mbˈele ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana ɲˈumba jˌake hˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe kˈifo na mapˈito jˌake kwˈeɲe rˈoho za wˌaliokˈufa.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌaendˈaje kwˈake ˌakarˈudi, ˌau kˌufikˈia mapˈito ja uzˈima.|0
hˈivjo ˌutatembˈea katˌika ɲɟˈia za wˈatu wˈema na kˌuʃikamˈana na mapˈito ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
kwa maˈana waɲˈofu wˌataˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wasˈio na lawˈama wˌatabakˈia ndˈani jˈake.|0
bˌali waˈovu wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu wˌataŋɡolˈewa kutˈoka hˈumo.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌusisahˈau mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu, bˌali zitˈunze ˈamri zˈaŋɡu mojˈoni mwˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa zˌitakˌuoŋɡezˈea miˈaka mˈiŋɡi ja maˈiʃa jˈako na kˌukuletˈea mˌafanikˈio.|0
ˌusiˈatʃe kˈamwe upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu vˌiteŋɡˈane nˈawe; vifˈuŋɡe ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako, vˌiandˈike katˌika ubˈao wa mˈojo wˈako.|0
ndˈipo ˌutapˈata kibˈali na ɟˈina zˈuri mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu na mwˌanadˈamu.|0
mtˌumaˈini bwˈana kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote wˈala ˌusizˌiteɡemˈee akˈili zˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote mkˈiri jˈeje, nˌaje ˌatajˌaɲoˈoʃa mapˈito jˈako.|0
usˈiwe mwˌeɲe hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈako mweɲˈewe; ˈm̩tʃe bwˈana ˌukaɟˌiepˈuʃe na uˈovu.|0
hˌii ˌitakˌuletˈea ˈafja mwilˈini mwˈako, na mafˈuta kwˈeɲe mifˈupa jˈako.|0
mheʃˈimu bwˈana kwa mˈali zˈako na kwa mˌalimbˈuko ja mazˈao jˈako jˈote.|0
ndˈipo ɣˈala zˈako zˌitakˌapoɟˈaa hˌadi kˌufurˈika, virˈiba vjˈako vˌitafurˈika kwa mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌusiˌiðarˈau aðˈabu ja bwˈana na ˌusitʃukˈie kˌukaripˈiwa nˈaje.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana hˌuwaˌadibˈiʃa wˈale ˌawapendˈao, kˌama vˈile bˈaba ˌafaɲˈavjo kwa mwˈana ˌapendezwˈaje nˈaje.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌaonˈaje hekˈima, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌapatˈaje ˌufahˈamu.|0
kwa maˈana hekˈima ˈana faˈida kulˈiko fˈeða na mapˈato jˌake ni bˈora kulˈiko ja ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
hekˈima ˈana θamˈani kulˈiko mˌariɟˈani; hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃˌokitamˈani kˌinatʃowˈeza kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa nˈaje.|0
maˈiʃa marˈefu jˈako katˌika mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume; katˌika mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto kˈuna ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima.|0
ɲɟˈia zˌake zˌinapendˈeza, mapˈito jˌake jˈote ni amˈani.|0
jˌeje ni ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima kwa wˈale wˌanaˌomkumbatˈia; wˈale wˌamʃikˈao wˌatabˌarikˈiwa.|0
kwa hekˈima bwˈana ˌaliiwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia, kwa ˌufahˈamu ˌaliziwˈeka mbˈiŋɡu mahˈali pˈake.|0
kwa mˌaarˈifa jˌake vilˈindi vˌiliɡawˈaɲua, nˈajo mawˈiŋɡu jˌanadondˈoʃa umˈande.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, hifˈaði mˌaamˈuzi mˈema na busˈara, ˌusiˈatʃe vitˈoke matʃˈoni pˈako.|0
ndˈipo vˌitakˌapokˈuwa uzˈima nafsˈini mwˈako na pˈambo la neˈema ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako.|0
kˈiʃa ˌutaˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia jˈako salˈama, wˈala m̩ɡˈuu wˈako hˌautˌaɟikwˈaa.|0
ˌulalˈapo, hˌautˌaoɡˈopa; ˌulalˈapo ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˈako ˌutakˈuwa mtˈamu.|0
ˌusioɡˈope maˈafa ja ɣafˈula ˌau mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌanajˌowapˈata waˈovu.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa tˌumaˈini lˈako na kˌuepˈuʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˈako kunˈaswa katˌika mtˈeɡo.|0
ˌusizuˈie wˈema kwa wˈale wˌanaˌostahˈili ikˈiwa katˌika uwˈezo wˈako kutˈenda.|0
ˌusimwambˈie ɟirˈani jˈako, ɲɟˈoo bˌaadˈaje, nˌitakˈupa kˈeʃo: wakˈati wˌewe unˈatʃo kˈitu kˈile karˈibu nˈawe.|0
ˌusifˈaɲe hˈila ja kumðˈuru ɟirˈani jˈako, ambˈaje ˌanaˈiʃi karˈibu na wˌewe ˌakikˌuamˈini.|0
ˌusimʃtˈaki ˈm̩tu bˌila sabˈabu, wakˈati hˌaɟakutˈenda ðˈara lolˈote.|0
ˌusimwonˈee wˈivu ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ɟeˈuri wˈala kˌutʃaɡˈua ɲɟˈia jˌake iwˈajo jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana hˌumtʃukˈia ˈm̩tu mpotˈovu, lakˈini sˈiri jˌake ˈiko kwa mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
laˈana ja bwˈana ˈi ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja mwˈovu, lakˈini jˌeje hˌuibarˈiki ɲˈumba ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima hurˈiθi heʃˈima, bˌali hˌuwaˌaibˈiʃa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
sˌikilizˈeni wanˈaŋɡu, mˌafundˈiʃo ja bˈaba jˈenu; sˌikilizˈeni kwa makˈini na mpˈate ˌufahˈamu.|0
nˌinawˈapa mˌafundˈiʃo ja maˈana, kwa hˈijo msˌijaˈatʃe mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa mvulˈana mdˈoɡo katˌika ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, niŋɡˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa na mtˈoto pekˈee kwa mˈama jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈaba ˌalinˌifundˈiʃa ˌakisˈema, jaʃˈike manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˈote kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote; jaʃˈike mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu na wˌewe ˌutaˈiʃi.|0
pˈata hekˈima, pˈata ˌufahˈamu; ˌusijˌasahˈau manˈeno jˈaŋɡu wˈala ˌusijaˈatʃe.|0
ˌusimwˈatʃe hekˈima nˌaje ˌatakuwˈeka salˈama; mpˈende, nˌaje ˌatakulˈinda.|0
hekˈima ni bˈora kulˈiko vˈitu vjˈote; kwa hˈijo ɟˈipe hekˈima. hˌata ˌikikˌuɣarˈimu vjˈote ulˈivjo nˈavjo, pˈata ˌufahˈamu.|0
mstˈahi, nˌaje ˌatakukwˈeza; mkˌumbatˈie, nˌaje ˌatakˌuheʃˈimu.|0
ˌatakuvˈika ʃˈada la neˈema kitʃwˈani mwˈako na kukˈupa tˈaɟi ja ˌutukˈufu.|0
sˌikilˈiza mwanˈaŋɡu, kubˈali nˌinatʃˌokuambˈia, nˈajo miˈaka ja maˈiʃa jˈako ˌitakˈuwa mˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌinakˌuoŋɡˈoza katˌika ɲɟˈia ja hekˈima na kˌukuoŋɡˈoza katˌika mapˈito jˌalijˌoɲoˈoka.|0
ˌutembeˈapo, hatˈua zˈako hˌazitˌazuilˈiwa; ˌukimbiˈapo, hˌutaɟikwˈaa.|0
mkamˈate sˈana elˈimu, ˌusimwˈatʃe aˈende zˈake; mʃˈike, maˈana jˌeje ni uzˈima wˈako.|0
ˌusiuwˈeke m̩ɡˈuu wˈako katˌika ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu wˈala ˌusitembˈee katˌika ɲɟˈia ja wˈatu wabˈaja.|0
ˌepukˈana nˈajo, ˌusisafˈiri katˌika ɲɟˈia hˈijo; atʃˈana nˈajo, na ˌuelekˈee ɲɟˈia jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawawˈezi kulˈala mpˈaka watˈende uˈovu; wˌanaʃˈindwa hˌata kˌusinzˈia mpˈaka wˌamwaŋɡˈuʃe ˈm̩tu.|0
wˌanakˈula mkˈate wa uˈovu, na kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo wa ɟeˈuri.|0
ɲɟˈia ja wˌeɲe hˈaki ni kˌama nˈuru ja kwˈanza ja mˌapambazˈuko, ambˈajo huŋɡˈaa zaˈidi na zaˈidi mpˈaka mtʃˈana mkˌamilˈifu.|0
lakˈini ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu ni kˌama ɡˈiza nˈene; hˌawaɟˈui kˌinatʃˌowafˈaɲa wˌaɟikwˈae.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, jˌasikilˈize kwa makˈini jˈale nˌinajˌokuambˈia; sˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini manˈeno jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu jˌaondˈoke matʃˈoni pˈako, jˌahifˈaði ndˈani ja mˈojo wˈako.|0
kwa sabˈabu ni uzˈima kwa wˈale wˌanaˌojapˈata na ˈafja kwa mwˈili wˈote wa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
zaˈidi ja jˈote, lˈinda mˈojo wˈako, kulˈiko jˈote ˌujalindˈajo, maˈana ndˈiko zˌitokˈako tʃemtʃˈemi za uzˈima.|0
epˈuʃa kˈiɲua tʃˈako na ˌukaˈidi; wˈeka mˌazuŋɡˈumzo matʃˈafu mbˈali na midˈomo jˈako.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌatazˈame mbˈele, kˈaza mˈatʃo jˈako mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa mbˈele jˈako.|0
sˌawazˈiʃa mapˈito ja miɡˈuu jˈako na ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote zˈiwe zˌimeθˌibitˈika.|0
ˌusiɡeˈuke kulˈia wˈala kuʃˈoto; epˈuʃa m̩ɡˈuu wˈako na ubˈaja.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini hekˈima jˈaŋɡu, sˌikilˈiza vizˈuri manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ja busˈara.|0
ˌili uwˈeze kutˈunza busˈara na midˈomo jˈako ˌihifˈaði mˌaarˈifa.|0
kwa maˈana midˈomo ja mwanˈamke kahˈaba hˌudondˈoza asˈali, na manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake ni laˈini kulˈiko mafˈuta.|0
lakˈini mwˈiʃo wˌake ni mtʃˈuŋɡu kˌama ɲˈoŋɡo, mkˈali kˌama upˈaŋɡa ˌukatˈao kuwˈili.|0
miɡˈuu jˌake huʃˈuka kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe kˈifo; hatˈua zˌake hˌuelekˈea mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa kˌaburˈini.|0
jˌeje hˌafikˈiri ɟˌuːja ɲɟˈia ja uzˈima; ɲɟˈia zˌake zˌimepotˈoka, lakˈini jˌeje haɟˈui.|0
sˈasa bˌasi wanˈaŋɡu, nˌisikˌilizˈeni; msiˈatʃe nˌinalˌowaambˈia.|0
ɲɟˈia zˈenu zˈiwe mbˈali nˈaje, msiˈende karˈibu na mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
usˈiɟe ˌukatˈoa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako nzˈuri kwa weŋɡˈine na miˈaka jˈako kwa alˈije mkatˈili.|0
waɡˈeni wasˈiɟe wˌakaʃˌerehekˈea ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na ɟˌitihˈada jˈako ˌikatˌaɟirˈiʃa ɲˈumba ja mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa maˈiʃa jˈako ˌutalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, wakˈati ɲˈama na mwˈili wˈako vˌimetʃakˈaa.|0
ˌutasˈema, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ɡˈani nˌilivjˌotʃukˈia aðˈabu! tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌulivjˌoðarˈau maˈoɲo.|0
sˌikuwatˈii walˈimu wˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌuwasˌikilˈiza wˌakufˈunzi wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimefˈika ˌukiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi kabˈisa kˌatikˈati ja kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote.|0
kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kisˈima tʃˈako mweɲˈewe, mˈaɟi jˌanajˌotirirˈika kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kisˈima tʃˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
ɟˈe, tʃemtʃˈemi zˈako zˌifurˈike katˌika bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi na viɟˈito vjˈako vja mˈaɟi vˌiwaɲɟˈani.|0
na vˈiwe vjˈako mweɲˈewe, kˈamwe vˌisiʃˌirikˈiʃwe waɡˈeni.|0
tʃemtʃˈemi jˈako na ˌibarikˈiwe na ˌumfurahˈie ˈm̩ke wa uɟˈana wˈako.|0
kulˈuŋɡu ɟˈike ˌapendˈaje, kulˈuŋɡu mzˈuri: matˈiti jˌake na jˌakutˌoʃelˈeze sˈiku zˈote, nˌawe utˈekwe daˈima na upˈendo wˈake.|0
kwa nˈini mwanˈaŋɡu, utˈekwe na mwanˈamke kahˈaba? kwa nˈini ˌukumbatˈie kifˈua tʃa ˈm̩ke wa mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kwa maˈana ɲɟˈia za ˈm̩tu ni wˈazi kabˈisa mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌaje hˌujapˈima mapˈito jˌake jˈote.|0
matˈendo mabˈaja ja ˈm̩tu mwˈovu humnˈasa jˌeje mweɲˈewe; kˈamba za ðˈambi jˌake hˌumkamˈata kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌatakˈufa kwa kukˈosa niðˈamu, ˌakipotˈoʃwa kwa ˌupumbˈavu wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, kˌama ˌumekˈuwa mðamˈini wa ɟirˈani jˈako, ikˈiwa ˌumeʃˈika mikˈono kwa kuwˈeka ahˈadi kwa aɟˈili ja mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kˌama ˌumetˈeɡwa na ˌulitʃosˈema, ˌumenˈaswa kwa manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈako.|0
bˌasi fˈaɲa hˈivi mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌili ˌuɟiwˈeke hˈuru, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeaŋɡˈuka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟirˈani jˈako: nˈenda ˌukaɟˌiɲeɲekˈeʃe kwˈake; msˈihi ɟirˈani jˈako.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu ˌusiŋɡˈizi matʃˈoni pˈako, ˌusiruhˈusu kˈope zˈako zˌisinzˈie.|0
ɟiwˈeke hˈuru, kˌama swˈala mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mwindˈaɟi, kˌama ndˈeɡe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo wa mwindˈaɟi.|0
ˈewe mvˈivu, mwendˈee ˈm̩tʃwa; zˌitafakˈari ɲɟˈia zˌake ˌukapˈate hekˈima.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje hˈana msˌimamˈizi, wˈala mwˌaŋɡalˈizi, ˌau mtawˈala.|0
lakˈini hˌuɟiwekˈea akˈiba wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi na hˌukusˈaɲa tʃakˈula tʃˈake wakˈati wa mavˈuno.|0
ˈewe mvˈivu, ˌutalˈala hˌata lˈini? ˌutaˈamka lˈini kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˈako.|0
bˈado kulˈala kidˈoɡo, kˌusinzˈia kidˈoɡo, bˈado kukˈuɲɟa mikˈono kidˈoɡo upˈate kˌupumzˈika.|0
ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja sˈana na mlaɣˈai, ambˈaje hˌuzuŋɡˌukazuŋɡˈuka na manˈeno ja ˌupotˈovu.|0
ambˈaje ˌanakoɲˈeza kwa ɟˈitʃo lˈake, ˌanajetˈoa iʃˈara kwa miɡˈuu jˌake na kˌuaʃirˈia kwa vidˈole vjˈake.|0
ambˈaje hupˈaŋɡa ubˈaja kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu mojˈoni mwˈake: daˈima hˌutʃotʃˈea fitˈina.|0
kwa hˈijo maˈafa jˌatamkˈumba ɣafˈula; ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa mˈara, pasˈipo msaˈada.|0
kˈuna vˈitu sˈita ˌanavjˌovitʃukˈia bwˈana, nˈaam, vˈiko sˈaba vilˈivjo tʃukˈizo kwˈake.|0
mˈatʃo ja kibˈuri, ulˈimi ˌudaŋɡaɲˈao, mikˈono ˌimwaɡˈajo dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia.|0
mˈojo ˌuwazˈao mipˈaŋɡo miˈovu, miɡˈuu ilˈijo mjepˈesi kˌukimbilˈia uˈovu.|0
ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo ambˈaje humwˈaɡa uˈoŋɡo, na ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌutʃotʃˈea fitˈina kˈati ja ndˈuɡu.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ziʃˈike ˈamri za bˈaba jˈako, wˈala ˌusijaˈatʃe mˌafundˈiʃo ja mˈama jˈako.|0
jafˈuŋɡe katˌika mˈojo wˈako daˈima, jakˈaze kˌuizuŋɡˈuka ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako.|0
wakˈati ˌutembeˈapo, jˌatakˌuoŋɡˈoza; wakˈati ˌulalˈapo, jˌatakulˈinda; wakˈati ˌuamkˈapo, jˌatazuŋɡˈumza nˈawe.|0
kwa maˈana ˈamri hˈizi ni tˈaa, mˌafundˈiʃo hˈaja ni mwˈaŋɡa na maˈoɲo ja mˌaadˈili ni ɲɟˈia ja uzˈima.|0
jˌakikulˈinda na mwanˈamke ˌalijˌepotˈoka, kˌutokˈana na manˈeno laˈini ja mwanˈamke ˌalijˌepotˈoka.|0
mˈojo wˈako ˌusitamˈani uzˈuri wˌake wˈala mˈatʃo jˌake jˌasikutˈeke.|0
kwa maˈana kahˈaba ˌatakufˈaɲa ˈuwe maskˈini, hˌata ukˈose kipˈande tʃa mkˈate, nˌaje mwanˈamke mzˈinzi huwˈinda maˈiʃa jˈako hˈasa.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu awˈeza kˌutʃotˈea mˈoto kwˈeɲe pˈaɟa lˈake bˌila ŋɡˈuo zˌake kˌuuŋɡˈua.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu awˈeza kˌutembˈea ɟˌuːja makˈaa ja mˈoto jˌanajowˈaka bˌila miɡˈuu jˌake kˌuuŋɡˈua.|0
ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌalalˈaje na ˈm̩ke wa mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine; hakˈuna jejˈote ˌamɡusˈaje hˈujo mwanˈamke ambˈaje hˌataˌaðibˈiwa.|0
wˈatu hˌawamðarˈau mwˈizi kˌama ˌakiˈiba kukˈiði ɲɟˈaa jˌake wakˈati ˈana ɲɟˈaa.|0
pamˈoɟa na hˈajo, kˌama ˌakikamˈatwa, lazˈima alˈipe mˈara sˈaba, iŋɡˈawa ˌinamɣarˈimu ˌutaɟˈiri wˈote wa ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
lakˈini mwˌanaˈume ˌazinˈije na mwanˈamke hˈana akˈili kabˈisa; jejˈote ˌafaɲˈaje hˈivjo hˌuɟiˌaŋɡamˈiza mweɲˈewe.|0
mapˈiɡo na aˈibu ni fˈuŋɡu lˈake na aˈibu jˌake hˌaitˌafutˈika kˈamwe.|0
kwa maˈana wˈivu huˈamʃa ɣaðˈabu ja mˈume, nˌaje hˌataoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma ˌalipizˈapo kisˈasi.|0
hˌatakubˈali fidˈia jojˈote; ˌatakatˈaa malˌipo, hˌata jakˈiwa makˈubwa kiˈasi ɡˈani.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ʃˈika manˈeno jˈaŋɡu na kˌuzihifˈaði ˈamri zˈaŋɡu ndˈani jˈako.|0
ʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi; lˈinda mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu kˌama mbˈoni ja ɟˈitʃo lˈako.|0
jafˈuŋɡe katˌika vidˈole vjˈako; jˌaandˈike katˌika kibˈao tʃa mˈojo wˈako.|0
mwambˈie hekˈima, wˌewe ni dˈada jˈaŋɡu, uˈite ˌufahˈamu ɟamˈaa jˈako.|0
wˌatakˌuepˈuʃa na mwanˈamke mzˈinzi, kˌutokˈana na mwanˈamke mpotˈovu na manˈeno jˌake ja kˌubembelˈeza.|0
kwˈeɲe dirˈiʃa la ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu nˌilitazˈama ɲɟˈe kˌupitˈia upˈeɲo kwˈeɲe mwˈimo wa dirˈiʃa.|0
nˌiliˈona mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa waɟˈiŋɡa, nˌikaɡundˈua mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanaˈume viɟˈana, kiɟˈana asˈije na akˈili.|0
wakˈati wa matʃwˈeo, ɟˈua lˌikipuŋɡˈua nˈuru jˈake, ɡˈiza la usˈiku lˌilipokˈuwa lˌikiiŋɡˈia.|0
ndˈipo hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌakatˈoka kumlˈaki, hˈali ˌamevˈaa kˌama kahˈaba akˈiwa na nˈia ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ni mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe mˌakelˈele na mkaˈidi, miɡˈuu jˌake hˌaitulˈii ɲumbˈani.|0
mˈara kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi, mˈara kwˈeɲe viwˈaɲɟa vikˈubwa, kwˈeɲe kˈila pˈembe hˌuvizˈia..|0
hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌalimkˌumbatˈia kiɟˈana na kumbˈusu, na kwa ˈuso usˈio na hˈaja ˌakamwambˈia.|0
nˈina sadˈaka za amˈani ɲumbˈani; lˈeo nˌimetimˈiza naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌimetˈoka ɲɟˈe kˌukulˈaki; nˌimekˌutafˈuta na nˌimekupˈata.|0
nˌimetandˈika kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu kwa kitˈani za rˈaŋɡi kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
nˌimetˈia mˌanukˈato kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu kwa mˌanemˈane, ˈudi na mdˌalasˈini.|0
ɲɟˈoo, tuzˈame katˌika mapˈenzi mpˈaka ˌasubˈuhi; tˌuɟifˌurahˈiʃe weɲˈewe kwa mapˈenzi.|0
mˈume wˈaŋɡu hajˈupo ɲumbˈani; ˌamekwˈenda safˈari ja mbˈali.|0
ˌametʃukˈua mkˈoba ˌulioɟˈazwa fˈeða na hˌatakuwˈepo ɲumbˈani kˌaribˈuni.|0
kwa manˈeno laˈini jˈule mwanˈamke ˌakampotˈoʃa; ˌalimʃawˈiʃi kwa manˈeno jˌake laˈini.|0
mˈara hˈujo kiɟˈana ˌalimfuˈata jˈule mwanˈamke kˌama fahˈali ˌaendˈaje mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni, kˌama kulˈuŋɡu ˌaiŋɡiˈaje kwˈeɲe kitˈanzi.|0
mpˈaka mʃˈale umtʃˈome ˈini lˈake, kˌama ndˈeɡe ˌanajenˈaswa kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo, bˌila kuɟˈua ˌitamɣarˈimu maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
sˈasa bˌasi wanˈaŋɡu, nˌisikˌilizˈeni; sˌikilizˈeni kwa makˈini nˌisemˈalo.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu mˈojo wˈako ˌuɡeukˈie ɲɟˈia za hˈujo mwanˈamke, wˈala ˌusitˌaŋɡetˈaŋɡe katˌika mapˈito jˈake.|0
ˌaliˌowaaŋɡˈuʃa ni wˈeŋɡi; ˌaliˌowatʃˈiɲɟa ni kˈundi kˈubwa.|0
ɲˈumba jˌake ni ɲɟˈia kˈuu ˌiendˈajo kˌaburˈini, ˌielˌekeˈajo tʃˈini kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vja maˈuti.|0
ɟˈe, hekˈima hˌaitˈani? ɟˈe, ˌufahˈamu hapˈazi saˈuti.|0
ɟˌuːja mˌiinˈuko karˈibu na ɲɟˈia, pˈeɲe ɲɟˈia pˈanda, ndˈipo ˌasimamˈapo.|0
kˈando ja malˈaŋɡo jˌaelˌekeˈajo mɟˈini, kwˈeɲe mˌaiŋɡilˈio, hulˈia kwa saˈuti kˈubwa, ˌakisˈema.|0
ni nˈiɲi wˌanaˈume, nˌinaˌowaˈita; nˌinapˈaza saˈuti jˈaŋɡu kwa wˌanadˈamu wˈote.|0
nˈiɲi ambˈao ni waɟˈiŋɡa, patˈeni akˈili; nˈiɲi m̩lˈio wˌapumbˈavu, patˈeni ˌufahˈamu.|0
sˌikilizˈeni, kwa maˈana nˈina mˈambo muhˈimu ja kusˈema; nˌinafuŋɡˈua midˈomo jˈaŋɡu kusˈema lilˈilo sˈawa.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu husˈema lilˈilo kwˈeli, kwa maˈana midˈomo jˈaŋɡu hˌutʃukˈia uˈovu.|0
manˈeno jˈote ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu ni hˈaki; hakˈuna mˌoɟawˈapo lˌililˌopotˈoka wˈala ˌukaˈidi.|0
kwa wˌeɲe kˌupambanˈua jˈote ni sahˈihi; hajˈana kasˈoro kwa wˈale wˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa.|0
tʃaɡˈua mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu badˈala ja fˈeða, mˌaarˈifa badˈala ja ðahˈabu sˈafi.|0
kwa maˈana hekˈima ˈina θamˈani kulˈiko mˌariɟˈani na hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote ˌunatʃˌohitˈaɟi kˌinatʃˌoliŋɡˈana nˈaje.|0
mˌimi hekˈima, nakˈaa pamˈoɟa na busˈara; nˌinamilˈiki mˌaarˈifa na busˈara.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana ni kˌutʃukˈia uˈovu; nˌinatʃukˈia kibˈuri na mˌaɟivˈuno, tabˈia m̩bˈaja na mˌazuŋɡˈumzo potˈovu.|0
ˌuʃaˈuri na hukˈumu sahˈihi ni vjˈaŋɡu; nˈina ˌufahˈamu na nˈina ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu wafˈalme hˌutawˈala na wˌatawˈala hutˈuŋɡa ʃerˈia zilˈizo za hˈaki.|0
kwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu wakˈuu hˌutawˈala, na wˌeɲe vjˈeo wˈote wˌatawalˈao dunˈia.|0
nˌawapˈenda wˈale wˌanipendˈao, na wˈale wˌanitˌafutˈao kwa bidˈii wˌataniˈona.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri na heʃˈima vˈiko kwˈaŋɡu, ˌutaɟˈiri ˌudumˈuo na mˌafanikˈio.|0
tˈunda lˈaŋɡu ni bˈora kulˈiko ðahˈabu sˈafi; kˈile nˌitoˈatʃo hupˈita fˈeða ilˈijo bˈora.|0
nˌatembˈea katˌika ɲɟˈia ja uɲˈofu katˌika mapˈito ja hˈaki.|0
nawˈapa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈale wˌanipendˈao na kˌuziɟˈaza hazˈina zˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌaliniˈumba mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈazi jˈake, kˈabla ja matˈendo jˌake ja zamˈani.|0
nˌilitˌeulˈiwa ʃˈu milˈele, ʃˈu mwanzˈoni, kˈabla ja dunˈia kuˈumbwa.|0
wakˈati hˌaziɟˌakuwˈepo bahˈari, nˌilikwˌiʃazalˈiwa, wakˈati hˌaziɟˌakuwˈepo tʃemtʃˈemi zˌilizoɟˈaa mˈaɟi.|0
kˈabla milˈima hˌaiɟawˈekwa mahˈali pˈake, kˈabla vilˈima hˌaviɟˌakuwˈepo, nˌilikwˌiʃazalˈiwa.|0
kˈabla hˌaɟaˈumba dunˈia wˈala maʃˈamba jˌake ˌau vˈumbi lolˈote la dunˈia.|0
nˌilikuwˈepo ˌalipˌoziwˈeka mbˈiŋɡu mahˈali pˈake, wakˈati ˌalitʃˈora mstˈari wa upˈeo wa mˈatʃo ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa kilˈindi.|0
wakˈati ˌaliwˈeka mawˈiŋɡu ɟˈuu na kˌuziwˈeka imˈara tʃemtʃˈemi za bahˈari.|0
wakˈati ˌaliˌiwekˈea bahˈari mpˈaka wˌake ˌili mˈaɟi jˌasivˈuɲɟe aɡˈizo lˈake, na wakˈati ˌaliwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌilikˈuwa fˈundi stˈadi kˈando jˈake. nˌiliɟˈazwa na furˈaha sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, nˌikifurˈahi daˈima mbˈele zˈake.|0
nˌikifurˈahi katˌika dunˈia jˌake jˈote nˌami nˌikiwˌafurahˈia wˌanadˈamu.|0
bˌasi sˈasa wanˈaŋɡu, nˌisikˌilizˈeni; hˈeri wˈale wˌanaˌoziʃˈika ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌikilizˈeni mˌafundˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu ˈm̩we na hekˈima; msˌijapuˈuze.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanisˌikilizˈaje mˈimi, ˌakisubˈiri sˈiku zˈote mˌalaŋɡˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, ˌakiŋɡˈoɟa kwˈeɲe vˌiziŋɡˈiti vja mlˈaŋɡo wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana jejˈote ˌanipatˈaje mˌimi ˌamepˈata uzˈima na kˌuɟipatˈia kibˈali kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
lakˈini jejˈote ˌaʃindwˈaje kˌunipˈata hˌuɟiumˈiza mweɲˈewe; na wˈote wˌanitʃˌukiˈao mˌimi hupˈenda maˈuti.|0
hekˈima ˌameɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba jˈake; ˌametʃˈoŋɡa ŋɡˈuzo zˌake sˈaba.|0
ˌameandˈaa ɲˈama na kˌutʃaŋɡˈaɲa divˈai jˈake; pˈia ˌameandˈaa mˈeza jˈake.|0
ˌamewatˈuma wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike, nˌaje huˈita kutˈoka mahˈali pa ɟˈuu sˈana pa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌanawˌaambˈia wˈale wasˈio na akˈili, wˈote ambˈao ni waɟˈiŋɡa na wˈaɟe hˈapa.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, ˈm̩le tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu na mɲuˈe divˈai nˌilijˌoitʃaŋɡˈaɲa.|0
atʃˈeni ɲɟˈia zˈenu za uɟˈiŋɡa nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi; tˌembeˈeni katˌika ɲɟˈia ja ˌufahˈamu.|0
jejˈote ˌanajˌemkosˈoa mwˌeɲe mzˈaha hˌukaribˈiʃa mˌatukˈano; jejˈote ˌanajˌekemˈea ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hupˈatwa na matˈusi.|0
ˌusimkemˈee mwˌeɲe mzˈaha la sˈivjo ˌatakˌutʃukˈia; mkemˈee mwˌeɲe hekˈima nˌaje ˌatakupˈenda.|0
mfundˈiʃe ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa na hekˈima zaˈidi; mfundˈiʃe ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu nˌaje ˌatazˈidi kˌufundiʃˈika.|0
kwa maˈana kwa msaˈada wˈaŋɡu sˈiku zˈako zˌitakˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi, na miˈaka ˌitaoŋɡˈezwa katˌika maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
kˌama wˌewe ˈuna hekˈima, hekˈima jˈako ˌitakˈupa tˈuzo; kˌama wˌewe ni ˈm̩tu wa mzˈaha, wˌewe mweɲˈewe ndˈiwe ˌutatesˈeka.|0
mwanˈamke ˌaitwˈaje mpumbˈavu ˈana kelˈele; hˈana adˈabu na hˈana mˌaarˈifa.|0
hukˈeti kwˈeɲe mlˈaŋɡo wa ɲˈumba jˈake, ɟˌuːja kˈiti katˌika mahˈali pa ɟˈuu sˈana pa ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌakiˈita wˈale wˌapitˈao karˈibu, wˌaendˈao mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia jˈao.|0
ˌanawˌaambˈia wˈale wasˈio na akˈili, wˈote ambˈao ni waɟˈiŋɡa na wˈaɟe hˈapa ndˈani.|0
mˈaɟi jˌalijˌoibˈiwa ni matˈamu; tʃakˈula kˌinatʃolˈiwa sirˈini ni kitˈamu.|0
lakˈini hˌawaɟˈui hˌata kidˈoɡo kˌuwa wˈafu wˈako hˈumo, kwˌamba waɡˈeni wˌake hˈujo mwanˈamke wˈako katˌika vilˈindi vja kuzˈimu.|0
miθˈali za sˌolomˈoni: mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima hulˈeta furˈaha kwa bˈaba jˈake, lakˈini mwˈana mpumbˈavu hulˈeta huzˈuni kwa mˈama jˈake.|0
hazˈina zˌilizˌopatikˈana kwa ɲɟˈia m̩bˈaja hˌazifˈai, lakˈini ˌuadilˈifu hˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌautˈini.|0
bwˈana hˌawaˈatʃi wˌaadilˈifu kukˈaa ɲɟˈaa, lakˈini hupˈiŋɡa tamˈaa ja ˈm̩tu mwˈovu.|0
mikˈono mivˈivu hufˈaɲa ˈm̩tu kˌuwa maskˈini lakˈini mikˈono jˌeɲe bidˈii hulˈeta ˌutaɟˈiri.|0
jˌeje ˌakusaɲˈaje mazˈao wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi ni mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima, lakˈini jˌeje ˌalalˈaje wakˈati wa mavˈuno ni mwˈana mwˌeɲe kˌuaibˈiʃa.|0
barˈaka hˈuwa tˈaɟi kitʃwˈani ˌm̩wa mwˌeɲe hˈaki, lakˈini ɟeˈuri hˌufunˈika kˈiɲua tʃa mwˈovu.|0
kˌumbukˈumbu ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌitakˈuwa barˈaka, lakˈini ɟˈina la mwˈovu lˌitaˈoza.|0
mwˌeɲe hekˈima mojˈoni hˌupokˈea mˌaaɡˈizo, lakˈini mpumbˈavu ˌapajukˈaje hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu hˌutembˈea salˈama, lakˈini ˈm̩tu ˌaendˈaje katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌilizˌopotˈoka ˌataɡˌundulˈiwa.|0
jˌeje ˌakoɲezˈaje kwa nˈia m̩bˈaja hˌusababˈiʃa huzˈuni, nˌaje mpumbˈavu ˌapajukˈaje hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
kˈiɲua tʃa mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni tʃemtʃˈemi ja uzˈima, lakˈini ɟeˈuri hˌufunˈika kˈiɲua tʃa mwˈovu.|0
tʃˈuki hˌutʃotʃˈea farˈaka, lakˈini upˈendo hˌusitˈiri mabˈaja jˈote.|0
hekˈima hˌupatikˈana katˌika midˈomo ja wˌeɲe kˌupambanˈua, lakˈini fˈimbo ni kwa aɟˈili ja mɡˈoŋɡo wˌake asˈije na ˌufahˈamu.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuhifˈaði mˌaarˈifa, bˌali kˈiɲua tʃa mpumbˈavu hˌualˈika mˌaaŋɡamˈizi.|0
mˈali ja taɟˈiri ni ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, bˌali ˌufukˈara ni mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja maskˈini.|0
uɟˈira wa wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuwaletˈea uzˈima, lakˈini mapˈato ja waˈovu hˌuwaletˈea aðˈabu.|0
ˌanajˌekubˈali kˌuadibˈiʃwa jˈuko katˌika ɲɟˈia ja uzˈima, lakˈini jejˈote ˌanajˌepuˈuza maˈoɲo hˌupotˈoʃa weŋɡˈine.|0
jˌeje ˌafitʃˈaje tʃˈuki jˌake ˈana midˈomo ja uˈoŋɡo, na jejˈote ˌanajˌeenˈeza ˌutʃoŋɡanˈiʃi ni mpumbˈavu.|0
wakˈati manˈeno ni mˈeŋɡi, ðˈambi hˌaikˌosekˈani, lakˈini jˌeje ambˈaje hˌuzuˈia ulˈimi wˌake ni mwˌeɲe busˈara.|0
ulˈimi wa mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni fˈeða ilˈijo bˈora, bˌali mˈojo wa mwˈovu ˈuna θamˈani ndˈoɡo.|0
midˈomo ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki hulˈiʃa wˈeŋɡi, lakˈini wˌapumbˈavu hˈufa kwa kukˈosa ˌufahˈamu.|0
barˈaka ja bwˈana hˌutaɟirˈiʃa, wˈala hˌaitʃaŋɡˈaɲi huzˈuni.|0
mpumbˈavu hˌufurahˈia tabˈia m̩bˈaja, lakˈini ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu hˌupendˈezwa na hekˈima.|0
kˈile ˌanatʃˌooɡˈopa mwˈovu ndˈitʃo kˌitakˌatʃompˈata; kˈile ˌanatʃˌoonˈea ʃaˈuku mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌatapˈewa.|0
tufˈani ˌinapopˈita, waˈovu hˌutowˈeka, lakˈini wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌusimˈama imˈara milˈele.|0
kˌama sˈiki ilˈivjo kwa mˈeno na mˈoʃi kwa mˈatʃo, ndˈivjo alˈivjo mvˈivu kwa wˈale wˌaliomtˈuma.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana hˌuoŋɡˈeza urˈefu wa maˈiʃa, lakˈini miˈaka ja mwˈovu ˌinafupˈiʃwa.|0
tˌaraɟˈio la mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni furˈaha, bˌali mˌatumaˈini ja mwˈovu hˈuwa si kˈitu.|0
ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana ni kˌimbilˈio kwa wˌeɲe hˈaki, lakˈini ni mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja wˈale wˌatendˈao mabˈaja.|0
kˈamwe wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌawatˌaondolˈewa, bˌali waˈovu hˌawatˌasalˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈiɲua tʃa mwˌeɲe hˈaki hutˈoa hekˈima, bˌali ulˈimi wa ˌupotˈovu ˌutakˈatwa.|0
midˈomo ja wˌeɲe hˈaki ˌinaɟˈua kˈile kˌinatʃofˈaa, bˌali kˈiɲua tʃa mwˈovu huɟˈua kˈile kˌilitʃˌopotˈoka tˈu.|0
bwˈana hˌutʃukˈia sˈana mizˈani za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, bˌali vipˈimo sahˈihi ni furˈaha jˈake.|0
kibˈuri kˌinapokˈuɟa, ndˈipo hˈuɟa aˈibu, bˌali ˌuɲeɲekˈevu hˈuɟa na hekˈima.|0
ˌuadilˈifu wa wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza, bˌali wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu hˌuharibˈiwa na hˈila jˈao.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri hˌaufaˈidi kˈitu katˌika sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu, bˌali hˈaki hˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mˌautˈini.|0
hˈaki ja wasˈio na lawˈama, hˌuwatˌeŋɡenezˈea ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌoɲoˈoka, bˌali waˈovu hˌuaŋɡˈuʃwa kwa uˈovu wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
hˈaki ja waɲˈofu hˌuwaokˈoa, bˌali wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu hunˈaswa na tamˈaa m̩bˈaja.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌanapokˈufa, mˌatumaˈini jˌake hˌutowˈeka; jˈote ˌalijˌojatˌazamˈia kˌutokˈana na ŋɡˈuvu zˌake hˈuwa si kˈitu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuokolˈewa kutˈoka taˈabu, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌuiŋɡˈia hˈumo badˈala jˈake.|0
kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈake ˈm̩tu ˌasijˌemwamˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌumwaŋɡamˈiza ɟirˈani jˈake, bˌali kwa mˌaarˈifa mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuokolˈewa.|0
wakˈati mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌanapˌofanikˈiwa, ˈm̩ɟi hˌufurˈahi; mwˈovu ˌatowekˈapo, kˈuna kelˈele za furˈaha.|0
kˌutokˈana na barˈaka ja ˈm̩tu mɲˈofu ˈm̩ɟi hukwˈezwa, bˌali kwa kˈiɲua tʃa mwˈovu ˈm̩ɟi hˌuharibˈiwa.|0
ˈm̩tu asˈije na akˈili hˌumðarˈau ɟirˈani jˈake, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu hˌuuzuˈia ulˈimi wˈake.|0
mˌaseŋɡˈeɲo hˌusalˈiti tˌumaˈini, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌaminˈifu hutˈunza sˈiri.|0
pasˈipo ˌuʃaˈuri wa hekˈima taˈifa hˌuaŋɡˈuka, bˌali wˌaʃaˈuri wˈeŋɡi hufˈaɲa uʃˈindi ˈuwe wa hakˈika.|0
jˌeje ˌamðaminˈije mɡˈeni hakˈika ˌatatesˈeka, bˌali jejˈote ˌakataˈaje kuˈuŋɡa mkˈono ðamˈana ni salˈama.|0
mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe mˈojo wa hurˈuma hupˈata heʃˈima, bˌali wˌanaˈume wˌakorˈofi hupˈata mˈali tˈu.|0
mwˌeɲe hurˈuma hˌuɟinˌufaˈiʃa mweɲˈewe, bˌali mkatˈili hˌuɟiletˈea taˈabu mweɲˈewe.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hupˈata uɟˈira wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, bˌali jˌeje ˌapandˈaje hˈaki huvˈuna tˈuzo ja ˌuhakˈika.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki kwˈeli kwˈeli hupˈata uzˈima, bˌali jˌeje ˌafuˌatiliˈaje ubˈaja hˌuendˈea kˈifo tʃˈake.|0
bwˈana hˌuwatʃukˈia sˈana wˈatu wˌeɲe mˈojo wa ˌupotˈovu, bˌali hˌupendˈezwa na wˈale ambˈao ɲɟˈia zˈao hazˈina lawˈama.|0
ˈuwe na hakˈika na hˈili: waˈovu hˌawatˌaepˈuka kˌuaðibˈiwa, bˌali wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌatakˈuwa hˈuru.|0
kˌama pˈete ja ðahˈabu katˌika pˈua ja ŋɡurˈuwe ndˈivjo alˈivjo mwanˈamke mzˈuri ambˈaje hˈana busˈara.|0
ʃaˈuku ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuiʃˈia tu kwˈeɲe mˈema, bˌali tˌumaˈini la mwˈovu hˌuiʃˈia tu kwˈeɲe ɣaðˈabu.|0
kˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatoˈaje kwa ˌukarˈimu, hˌata hˈivjo hupˈata zaˈidi, mwiŋɡˈine hˌuzuˈia, lakˈini hˈuwa maskˈini.|0
ˈm̩tu mkarˈimu ˌatastˈawi; jˌeje ˌawabˌurudiʃˈaje weŋɡˈine ˌatabˌurudˈiʃwa mweɲˈewe.|0
wˈatu hˌumlaˈani ˈm̩tu ˌawaɲimˈae wˈatu nafˈaka, bˌali barˈaka ˌitamkalˈia kitʃwˈani kˌama tˈaɟi jˌeje alˈije rˈaði kˌuiˈuza.|0
jˌeje ˌatafutˈaje mˈema hupˈata ˌukarˈimu, bˌali ubˈaja hˈuɟa kwˈake jˌeje ˌautˌafutˈaje.|0
jejˈote ˌateɡˌemeˈaje ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake ˌataaŋɡˈuka, bˌali mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌatastˈawi kˌama ɟˈani bˈitʃi.|0
jˌeje ˌaletˈaje taˈabu kwa ɟamˈaa jˌake ˌatarˈiθi tu upˈepo, nˌaje mpumbˈavu ˌatakˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wa wˌeɲe hekˈima.|0
tˈunda la mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima, nˌaje mwˌeɲe hekˈima huvˈuta rˈoho za wˈatu.|0
jejˈote ˌapendˈaje kˌuadibˈiʃwa hupˈenda mˌaarˈifa, bˌali jˌeje ˌatʃukiˈaje kuˈoɲua ni mpumbˈavu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈema hupˈata kibˈali kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, bˌali bwˈana hˌumhukˈumu mwˌeɲe hˈila.|0
ˈm̩tu hˌaθibitˈiki kˌutokˈana na uˈovu, bˌali mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌataˌondolˈewa.|0
ˈm̩ke mwˌeɲe tabˈia nzˈuri ni tˈaɟi ja mumˈewe, bˌali ˌaaˌibiʃˈaje ni kˌama uˈozo katˌika mifˈupa ja mumˈewe.|0
mipˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu ni ja hˈaki, bˌali ˌuʃaˈuri wa mwˈovu ni ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
manˈeno ja waˈovu hˌuotˈea kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, bˌali manˈeno ja wˌaadilˈifu hˌuwaokˈoa.|0
wˈatu waˈovu hˌuondolˈewa na kˌutowˈeka, bˌali ɲˈumba ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌusimˈama imˈara.|0
ˈm̩tu hˌusifˈiwa kˌuliŋɡˈana na hekˈima jˈake, bˌali wˈatu wˌeɲe akˈili zˌilizˌopotˈoka hˌuðarˌaulˈiwa.|0
hˈeri ˈm̩tu wa hˈali ja tʃˈini mwˌeɲe mtumˈiʃi, kulˈiko kˌuɟifˈaɲa ˈm̩tu wa hˈali ja ɟˈuu nˌawe hˈuna tʃakˈula.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki huɟˈali mˌahitˈaɟi ja mɲˈama wˈake, bˌali matˈendo ja hurˈuma ja mwˈovu ni ˌukatˈili.|0
jˌeje ˌalimˈaje ʃˈamba lˈake ˌatakˈuwa na tʃakˈula tˈele, bˌali jˌeje ˌafuatˈaje mˈambo ja upˈuzi hˈana akˈili.|0
waˈovu hˌutamˈani matˈeka ja wˈatu wabˈaja, bˌali ʃˈina la mwˌeɲe hˈaki hustˈawi.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hunˈaswa kwa mˌazuŋɡˈumzo jˌake ja ðˈambi, bˌali mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuepˈuka taˈabu.|0
kˌutokˈana na tˈunda la midˈomo jˌake ˈm̩tu huɟˈazwa na mˈambo mˈema, hakˈika kˌama ilˈivjo kˈazi ja mikˈono jˌake humtˈunza.|0
ɲɟˈia ja mpumbˈavu hˌuonekˈana sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌusikilˈiza ˌuʃaˈuri.|0
mpumbˈavu hˌuoɲˈeʃa kˌuuðˈika kwˈake mˈara mˈoɟa, bˌali ˈm̩tu wa busˈara hˌupuˈuza mˌatukˈano.|0
ʃahˈidi wa kwˈeli hutˈoa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa kˌuaminˈika, bˌali ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo husˈema uˈoŋɡo.|0
manˈeno ja kˌipumbˈavu hutʃˈoma kˌama upˈaŋɡa, bˌali ulˈimi wa mwˌeɲe hekˈima hulˈeta ˌupoɲˈaɟi.|0
midˈomo ˌisemˈajo kwˈeli hudˈumu milˈele, bˌali ulˈimi wa uˈoŋɡo hudˈumu kwa mˈuda mfˈupi tˈu.|0
ˈupo ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu katˌika miˈojo ja wˈale ambˈao hupˈaŋɡa mabˈaja, bˌali kˈuna furˈaha kwa wˈale wˌanaolˈeta amˈani.|0
hakˈuna ðˈara lˌinalompˈata mwˌeɲe hˈaki, bˌali waˈovu wˈana taˈabu ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
bwˈana ˌanatʃukˈia sˈana midˈomo ˌidaŋɡaɲˈajo, bˌali hˌufurahˈia wˈatu ambˈao ni wa kwˈeli.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe busˈara hˌuɟihˌifaðˈia mˌaarˈifa jˌeje mweɲˈewe, bˌali mˈojo wa wˌapumbˈavu hˌububuɟˈika ˌupumbˈavu.|0
mikˈono jˌeɲe bidˈii ˌitatawˈala, bˌali uvˈivu hˌuiʃˈia katˌika kˈazi za utˈumwa.|0
mˈojo wa wˌasiwˈasi hˌumlemˈea ˈm̩tu, bˌali nˈeno la hurˈuma hˌumfurahˈiʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni mwˌaŋɡalˈifu katˌika ˌurafˈiki, bˌali ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu hˌuwapotˈoʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu mvˈivu haˈoki mawˈindo jˈake, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe bidˈii ˈana mˈali za θamˈani.|0
katˌika ɲɟˈia ja hˈaki kˈuna uzˈima; katˌika mapˈito hˈajo kˈuna maˈiʃa ja milˈele.|0
mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌusikˈia mˌafundˈiʃo ja babˈaje, bˌali mwˌeɲe ðarˈau hˌasikilˈizi maˈoɲo.|0
kutˈoka tˈunda la midˈomo jˌake ˈm̩tu hˌufurahˈia mˈambo mˈema, bˌali wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu wˌanatamˈani sˈana ɟeˈuri.|0
jˌeje ˌalindˈaje midˈomo jˌake hulˈinda nˈafsi jˈake, bˌali jˌeje ˌasemˈaje kwa harˈaka ˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
mvˈivu hˌutamˈani sˈana na hapˈati kˈitu, bˌali nˈafsi ja mwˌeɲe bidˈii hˌutoʃelˈezwa kˌikamilˈifu.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌutʃukˈia uˈoŋɡo, bˌali waˈovu hulˈeta aˈibu na feðˈeha.|0
hˈaki humlˈinda ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu, bˌali uˈovu hˌumwaŋɡˈuʃa mwˌeɲe ðˈambi.|0
ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa hˌuɟifˈaɲa taɟˈiri, kˈumbe hˈana tʃotʃˈote; mwiŋɡˈine hˌuɟifˈaɲa maskˈini, kˈumbe ˈana ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri wa ˈm̩tu wawˈeza kˌukombˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake, bˌali ˈm̩tu maskˈini hˌasikˈii kitˈiʃo.|0
nˈuru ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki huŋɡˈaa sˈana, bˌali tˈaa ja mwˈovu ˌitazˈimwa.|0
kibˈuri hˌuzalˈiʃa maɡˈomvi tˈu, bˌali hekˈima hˌupatikˈana kwa wˈale wˌanaˌoziŋɡatˈia ˌuʃaˈuri.|0
fˈeða isˈijo ja halˈali hˌupuŋɡˈua, bˌali jˌeje ˌakusaɲˈaje fˈeða kidˈoɡo kidˈoɡo hˌuoŋɡezˈeka.|0
kˌilitʃˌotaraɟˈiwa kˌikikawˈia kˈuɟa mˈojo hˌuuɡˈua, bˌali tˌumaˈini lˌililˌotimˈizwa ni ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima.|0
jˌeje ˌanajˌeðarˈau mˌafundˈiʃo ˌanaɟˌiletˈea mˌaaŋɡamˈizi, bˌali jˌeje ˌanajˌeheʃˈimu aɡˈizo hupˈewa tˈuzo.|0
ˌufahˈamu mzˈuri hupˈata ˌupendelˈeo, bˌali ɲɟˈia ja asˈije mwˌaminˈifu ni ŋɡˈumu.|0
kˈila mwˌeɲe busˈara hutˈenda kwa mˌaarˈifa, bˌali mpumbˈavu hˌuðihirˈiʃa ˌupumbˈavu wˈake.|0
mɟˈumbe mwˈovu hˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe taˈabu, bˌali mɟˈumbe mwˌaminˈifu hulˈeta ˌupoɲˈaɟi.|0
jˌeje ˌanajˌeðarˈau maˈoɲo hupˈata ˌumaskˈini na aˈibu, bˌali jˌeje ˌanajˌekubˈali maˈoɲo hˌuheʃimˈiwa.|0
tˌaraɟˈio lˌililˌotimˈizwa ni tˈamu kwa nˈafsi, bˌali wˌapumbˈavu hˌutʃukˈia sˈana kuˈatʃa ubˈaja.|0
jˌeje ˌatembeˈaje na mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌatapˈata hekˈima, bˌali rafˈiki wa mpumbˈavu hupˈata maðˈara.|0
balˈaa hˌumwandˈama mtˈenda ðˈambi, bˌali mˌafanikˈio ni θawˈabu kwa mwˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈema hˌuwaatʃˈia wˈana wa wanˈawe urˈiθi, bˌali mˈali ja wˌeɲe ðˈambi ˌimehˌifaðˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
ʃˈamba la ˈm̩tu maskˈini lawˈeza kˌuzalˈiʃa tʃakˈula kˈiŋɡi, bˌali ðulˈuma hˌukifˌutilˈia mbˈali.|0
jˌeje ˌaizˌuiˈaje fˈimbo jˌake hampˈendi mwanˈawe, bˌali jˌeje ˌampendˈaje hˈuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kˌumwadibˈiʃa.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˈula mpˈaka ˌakariðˈiʃa mˈojo wˈake, bˌali tˈumbo la mwˈovu hˌutaabˈika kwa ɲɟˈaa.|0
mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuiɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba jˈake, bˌali mpumbˈavu hˌuibomˈoa ɲˈumba jˌake kwa mikˈono jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje ɲɟˈia zˌake ni ɲˈofu hˈumtʃa bwˈana, bˌali jˌeje ambˈaje ɲɟˈia zˌake zˌimepotˈoka hˌumðarˈau mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌazuŋɡˈumzo ja mpumbˈavu hulˈeta fˈimbo mɡoŋɡˈoni mwˈake, bˌali mwˌeɲe hekˈima hulˈindwa na manˈeno ja midˈomo jˈake.|0
pˈale ambˈapo hakˈuna mˌafahˈali, hˈori ni tˈupu, bˌali kˌutokˈana na ŋɡˈuvu za fahˈali hˈuɟa mavˈuno mˈeŋɡi.|0
mwˌeɲe mzˈaha hˌuitafˈuta hekˈima na hˌaipˈati, bˌali mˌaarˈifa hˈuɟa kwa ˌurahˈisi kwa ˌanajˌepambanˈua.|0
kˈaa mbˈali na ˈm̩tu mpumbˈavu, kwa maˈana hˌutapˈata mˌaarˈifa katˌika midˈomo jˈake.|0
hekˈima ja mwˌeɲe busˈara ni kˌufikirˈia ɲɟˈia zˈake, bˌali ˌupumbˈavu wa wˌapumbˈavu ni ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
wˌapumbˈavu hˌuðihˈaki kˌuɟirˌekebˈiʃa kutˈoka ðˈambi, bˌali wˈema hˌupatikˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa waɲˈofu.|0
kˈila mˈojo huɟˈua utʃˈuŋɡu wˌake weɲˈewe, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌuʃirˈiki furˈaha jˈake.|0
ɲˈumba ja mwˈovu ˌitaˌaŋɡamˈizwa, bˌali hˈema la mɲˈofu lˌitastˈawi.|0
hˌata katˌika kitʃˈeko mˈojo wawˈeza kuˈuma, nˈajo furˈaha jawˈeza kˌuiʃˈia katˌika maɟˈonzi.|0
wasˈio na imˈani wˌatapˌatilˈizwa kˌikamilˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja ɲɟˈia zˈao, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˈema ˌatapˈewa θawˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja ɲɟˈia jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu mɟˈiŋɡa hˌuamˈini kˈila kˈitu, bˌali mwˌeɲe busˈara hˌufikirˈia hatˈua zˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˈumtʃa bwˈana na kˌuepˈuka mabˈaja, bˌali mpumbˈavu hˌukasirˈika kwa hamˈaki na uzˈembe.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌekasirˈika kwa harˈaka hufˈaɲa mˈambo ja ˌupumbˈavu, nˌaje ˈm̩tu wa hˈila hˌutʃukˈiwa.|0
mɟˈiŋɡa hurˈiθi ˌupumbˈavu, bˌali wˌeɲe busˈara huvˈikwa mˌaarˈifa kitʃwˈani kˌama tˈaɟi.|0
wˈatu wabˈaja wˌatasuɟˈudu mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈema, nˌao waˈovu kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
maskˈini hˌuepˈukwa hˌata na mˌaɟirˈani zˈao, bˌali mˌataɟˈiri wˈana mˌarafˈiki wˈeŋɡi.|0
jˌeje ˌanajˌemðarˈau ɟirˈani jˌake hutˈenda ðˈambi, bˌali ˌamebˌarikˈiwa jˌeje alˈije na hurˈuma kwa mhitˈaɟi.|0
ɟˈe, wˈale wˌanaopˈaŋɡa ubˈaja hˌawapotˈoki? bˌali wˈale wˌanaopˈaŋɡa kilˈitʃo tʃˈema hupˈata upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu.|0
kˈazi zˈote zˌinazofˈaɲua kwa bidˈii hulˈeta faˈida, bˌali mˌazuŋɡˈumzo matˈupu hˌuelekˈea ˌumaskˈini tˈu.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri wa wˌeɲe hekˈima ni tˈaɟi jˈao, bˌali ˌupumbˈavu wa wˌapumbˈavu huzˈaa ˌupumbˈavu.|0
ʃahˈidi wa kwˈeli hˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa, bˌali ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo ni mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
jˌeje amtʃˈaje bwˈana ˈana ŋɡˈome salˈama, na kwa watˈoto wˌake ˌitakˈuwa kˌimbilˈio.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana ni tʃemtʃˈemi ja uzˈima, ˌili kˌumwepˈuʃa ˈm̩tu na mitˈeɡo ja maˈuti.|0
wˈiŋɡi wa wˈatu ni ˌutukˈufu wa mfˈalme, bˌali pasˈipo wˈatu m̩kˈuu hˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe subˈira ˈana ˌufahˈamu mwˈiŋɡi, bˌali ˌanajˌekasirˈika harˈaka hˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌupumbˈavu.|0
mˈojo wˌeɲe amˈani huˈupa mwˈili uzˈima, bˌali wˈivu hˌuozˈeʃa mifˈupa.|0
jˌeje ˌamwoneˈaje maskˈini hˌuoɲˈeʃa ðarˈau kwa muˈumba wˈao, bˌali jejˈote ˌanajˌemhurumˈia mhitˈaɟi hˌumheʃˈimu mˈuŋɡu.|0
waˈovu hˌuaŋɡamˈizwa kwa matˈendo jˈao maˈovu, bˌali hˌata katˌika kˈifo wˌeɲe hˈaki hupˈata kˌimbilˈio.|0
hekˈima hukˈaa katˌika mˈojo wa mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu bˌali hˌaiɟˌulikˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
hˈaki hˌuinˈua taˈifa, bˌali ðˈambi ni aˈibu kwa wˈatu wˈote.|0
mfˈalme hˌupendˈezwa na mtumˈiʃi mwˌeɲe hekˈima, bˌali ɣaðˈabu jˌake hˌumwaŋɡukˈia mtumˈiʃi mwˌeɲe kˌuaibˈiʃa.|0
ɟawˈabu la upˈole hˌuɡeˈuza ɣaðˈabu, bˌali nˈeno lˌiumizˈalo hˌutʃotʃˈea hasˈira.|0
ulˈimi wa mwˌeɲe hekˈima husˈifu mˌaarˈifa, bˌali kˈiɲua tʃa mpumbˈavu hufˈoka ˌupumbˈavu.|0
mˈatʃo ja bwˈana jˈako kˈila mahˈali, jˌakiwˌaaŋɡalˈia waˈovu na wˈema.|0
ulˈimi ˌuletˈao ˌupoɲˈaɟi ni ˈm̩ti wa uzˈima, bˌali ulˈimi ˌudaŋɡaɲˈao hupˈonda rˈoho.|0
mpumbˈavu hubˈeza maˈoɲo ja bˈaba jˈake, bˌali jejˈote ˌakubalˈije maˈoɲo hˌuoɲˈeʃa busˈara.|0
ɲˈumba ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˈina hazˈina kˈubwa, bˌali mapˈato ja waˈovu hˌuwaletˈea taˈabu.|0
midˈomo ja mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuenˈeza mˌaarˈifa, bˌali sˈivjo ilˈivjo miˈojo ja wˌapumbˈavu.|0
bwˈana hˌutʃukˈia sˈana ðabˈihu za waˈovu, bˌali maˈombi ja waɲˈofu hˌumfurahˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu.|0
bwˈana hˌutʃukˈia sˈana ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu, bˌali hˌuwapˈenda wˈale wˌafuatˈao hˈaki.|0
aðˈabu kˈali humŋɡˈoɟa jˌeje ˌaatʃˈaje ɲɟˈia; jˌeje ˌatʃukiˈaje maˈoɲo ˌatakˈufa.|0
maˈuti na ˌuharibˈifu vˈiko wˈazi mbˈele za bwˈana: ɟˈe, si zaˈidi sˈana miˈojo ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
mwˌeɲe mzˈaha hˌutʃukˈia maˈoɲo; hˌatatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa mwˌeɲe hekˈima.|0
mˈojo wˌeɲe furˈaha hufˈaɲa ˈuso ˌutʃaŋɡˈamke, bˌali mˌaumˈivu ja mojˈoni hupˈonda rˈoho.|0
mˈojo wa mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu hˌutafˈuta mˌaarˈifa, bˌali kˈiɲua tʃa mpumbˈavu hˌuɟilˈiʃa ˌupumbˈavu.|0
sˈiku zˈote za wˌanaˌoonˈewa ni za taˈabu, bˌali mˈojo mtʃaŋɡˈamfu ˈuna karˈamu ja kudˈumu.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˌuwa na kidˈoɡo pamˈoɟa na kˈumtʃa bwˈana, kulˈiko mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi pamˈoɟa na ɣasˈia.|0
ˌafaðˈali tʃakˈula tʃa mbˈoɡa mahˈali palˈipo na upˈendo kulˈiko ɲˈama ja ndˈama ˌilijonˈona pamˈoɟa na tʃˈuki.|0
ˈm̩tu mwepˈesi wa hasˈira hˌutʃotʃˈea uɡˈomvi, bˌali ˈm̩tu mvˌumilˈivu hˌutulˈiza uɡˈomvi.|0
ɲɟˈia ja mvˈivu ˌimezˈibwa na miˈiba, bˌali ɲɟˈia ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki ni bˌarabˈara kˈuu.|0
mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima hulˈeta furˈaha kwa bˈaba jˈake, bˌali ˈm̩tu mpumbˈavu hˌumðarˈau mˈama jˈake.|0
ˌupumbˈavu hˌumfurahˈiʃa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˈana akˈili, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu huʃˈika ɲɟˈia ˌilijˌoɲoˈoka.|0
mipˈaŋɡo huʃˈindwa kˌufanikˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja kukˈosa ˌuʃaˈuri, bˌali kukˈiwa na wˌaʃaˈuri wˈeŋɡi hˌufanikˈiwa.|0
ˈm̩tu hupˈata furˈaha katˌika kutˈoa ɟˈibu lˌinalofˈaa: ɟˈe, ni zˈuri nˈamna ɡˈani nˈeno lˌililotˈoka kwa wakˈati wˈake.|0
mapˈito ja uzˈima hˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu kwa aɟˈili ja wˌeɲe hekˈima kˌumwepˈuʃa ˌasiˈende tʃˈini kˌaburˈini.|0
bwˈana hˌubomˈoa ɲˈumba ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kibˈuri, bˌali hˌuilˈinda mipˈaka ja mɟˈane ˌisiɡˈuswe.|0
bwˈana hˌutʃukˈia sˈana mawˈazo ja mwˈovu, bˌali mawˈazo ja wˈale walˈio sˈafi hˌumfurahˈiʃa jˈeje.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe tamˈaa hˌuletˈea ɟamˈaa jˌake taˈabu, bˌali jˌeje ˌatʃukiˈaje rˈuʃwa ˌataˈiʃi.|0
mˈojo wa mwˌeɲe hˈaki hupˈima maɟˈibu jˈake, bˌali kˈiɲua tʃa mwˈovu hufˈoka ubˈaja.|0
bwˈana jˈuko mbˈali na waˈovu, bˌali hˌusikˈia maˈombi ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
mtazˈamo wa tˌabasˈamu hulˈeta furˈaha mojˈoni, nˈazo habˈari ɲɟˈema huˈipa mifˈupa ˈafja.|0
jˌeje ˌasikˌilizˈaje maˈoɲo jˌatoˈajo uzˈima ˌatakˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌeɲe hekˈima.|0
jˌeje ˌanajˌeðarˈau maˈoɲo hˌuɟiðarˈau mweɲˈewe, bˌali jejˈote ˌanajˌekubˈali maˈoɲo hupˈata ˌufahˈamu.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana hˌumfundˈiʃa ˈm̩tu hekˈima, nˌao ˌuɲeɲekˈevu hˈuɟa kˈabla ja heʃˈima.|0
mipˈaŋɡo ja mojˈoni ni ja mwˌanadˈamu, bˌali ɟˈibu la ulˈimi hutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
ɲɟˈia zˈote za ˈm̩tu hˌuonekˈana sˈafi matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe, bˌali mˌakusˈudi hupˈimwa na bwˈana.|0
mkabˈiði bwˈana lolˈote ˌufaɲˈalo, nˈajo mipˈaŋɡo jˈako ˌitafˌanikˈiwa.|0
bwˈana hufˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu kwa kusˈudi lˈake mweɲˈewe; hˌata waˈovu kwa sˈiku ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi.|0
bwˈana hˌuwatʃukˈia sˈana wˈote wˌeɲe kibˈuri tʃa mˈojo. ˈuwe na hakˈika kwa hˈili: hˌawatˌaepˈuka kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
kwa upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu uˈovu hˌuondolˈewa; kwa kˈumtʃa bwˈana ˈm̩tu hˌuɟiepˈuʃa na ubˈaja.|0
ɲɟˈia za ˈm̩tu zˌinapˌompendˈeza bwˈana, hˌuwafˈaɲa hˌata adˈui zˌake waˈiʃi nˌaje kwa amˈani.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˈitu kidˈoɡo pamˈoɟa na hˈaki kulˈiko mapˈato mˈeŋɡi pamˈoɟa na ˌuðalˈimu.|0
mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu hˌuifikˈiri ɲɟˈia jˈake, bˌali bwˈana hˌuelekˈeza hatˈua zˈake.|0
midˈomo ja mfˈalme hˌuzuŋɡˈumza kwa hekˈima ja kiˈuŋɡu, wˈala kˈiɲua tʃˈake hˌakipotˈoʃi hˈaki.|0
vipˈimo na mizˈani za halˈali hutˈoka kwa bwˈana; mˈawe jˈote ja kˌupimˈia jalˈijo katˌika mfˈuko ˌamejafˈaɲa jˈeje.|0
wafˈalme hˌutʃukˈia sˈana kutˈenda maˈovu, kwa maˈana kˈiti tʃa ufˈalme hufˈaɲua imˈara kwa ɲɟˈia ja hˈaki.|0
wafˈalme hˌufurahˈia midˈomo ja ˌuaminˈifu; hˌumθamˈini ˈm̩tu ˌasemˈaje kwˈeli.|0
ɣaðˈabu ja mfˈalme ni mɟˈumbe wa maˈuti, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌataˌitulˈiza.|0
ˈuso wa mfˈalme ˌuŋɡaˈapo, ˌinamˌaanˈiʃa uhˈai; ˌupendelˈeo wˌake ni kˌama wˈiŋɡu la mvˈua wakˈati wa vˈuli.|0
ni bˈora kiˈasi ɡˈani kupˈata hekˈima kulˈiko ðahˈabu, kˌutʃaɡˈua ˌufahˈamu kulˈiko fˈeða.|0
ɲɟˈia kˈuu ja waɲˈofu hˌuepˈuka ubˈaja; jˌeje ˌaitʃuŋɡˈaje ɲɟˈia jˈake, hutʃˈuŋɡa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
kibˈuri hˌutaŋɡulˈia mˌaaŋɡamˈizi, rˈoho ja mˌaɟivˈuno hˌutaŋɡulˈia mˌaaŋɡˈuko.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali kˌuwa mɲˌeɲekˈevu katˌika rˈoho mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌoonˈewa kulˈiko kˌuɡawˈana ɲˈara pamˈoɟa na wˌeɲe kibˈuri.|0
jejˈote ˌanajˌekubˈali mˌafundˈiʃo hustˈawi, tˈena ˌamebˌarikˈiwa jˌeje ˌanajˌemtumaˈini bwˈana.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima mojˈoni huˈitwa wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu, na manˈeno ja kˌupendˈeza hˌutʃotʃˈea mˌafundˈiʃo.|0
ˌufahˈamu ni tʃemtʃˈemi ja uzˈima kwa wˈale walˈio nˈao, bˌali ˌupumbˈavu hulˈeta aðˈabu kwa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuoŋɡˈoza kˈiɲua tʃˈake, na midˈomo jˌake hˌutʃotʃˈea mˌafundˈiʃo.|0
manˈeno ja kˌupendˈeza ni kˌama sˈeɡa la asˈali, ni matˈamu kwa nˈafsi na ˌupoɲˈaɟi kwˈeɲe mifˈupa.|0
ˈiko ɲɟˈia ˌionˌekanˈajo kˌuwa sˈawa kwa ˈm̩tu, bˌali mwˈiʃo wˌake hˌuelekˈeza mˌautˈini.|0
ʃaˈuku ja mfˌaɲakˈazi hˌumhimˈiza kufˈaɲa kˈazi; ɲɟˈaa jˌake hˌumsukˈuma ˌaendelˈee.|0
ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja kabˈisa hupˈaŋɡa mabˈaja, manˈeno jˌake ni kˌama mˈoto ˌuuŋɡuzˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu mpotˈovu hˌutʃotʃˈea uɡˈomvi, nˈajo mˌaoŋɡˈezi ja upˈuzi hˌuteŋɡanˈiʃa mˌarafˈiki wa karˈibu.|0
ˈm̩tu mkˈali humvˈuta ɟirˈani jˌake na kˌumwoŋɡˈoza katˌika mapˈito jˈale mabˈaja.|0
jˌeje ˌakoɲezˈaje kwa ɟˈitʃo lˈake ˌanapˈaŋɡa ˌupotˈovu; nˌaje ˌakazˈaje midˈomo jˌake ˌamenuˈia mabˈaja.|0
mvˈi ni tˈaɟi ja ˌutukˈufu; hˌupatikˈana kwa maˈiʃa ja ˌuadilˈifu.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali ˈm̩tu mstˌahimilˈivu kulˈiko ʃuɟˈaa, ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeitawˈala hasˈira jˌake kulˈiko jˈule ˌautekˈaje ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˈura hupˈiɡwa kwa sˈiri, lakˈini kˈila ˌuamˈuzi wˌake hutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˈula ukˈoko mkˈavu ukˈiwa na amˈani na ˌutulˈivu kulˈiko kukˈaa kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja karˈamu kukˈiwa na maɡˈomvi.|0
mtumˈiʃi mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌatatawˈala ɟˌuːja mwˈana ˌaaˌibiʃˈaje, nˌaje ˌataʃˌirikiˈana katˌika urˈiθi kˌama mmˈoɟa wa hˈao ndˈuɡu.|0
kalˈibu ni kwa aɟˈili ja fˈeða na tanˈuru ni kwa aɟˈili ja ðahˈabu, bˌali bwˈana hˌuuɟarˈibu mˈojo.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌusikilˈiza midˈomo mibˈaja; mwˈoŋɡo hˌusikilˈiza kwa makˈini ulˈimi wa maðˈara.|0
jˌeje anˈaje mðihˈaki maskˈini hˌuoɲˈeʃa ðarˈau kwa muˈumba wˈake; jejˈote ˌafurˌahiˈaje maˈafa hˌataepˈuka kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
wˈana wa wˈana ni tˈaɟi la wazˈee, nˌao wazˈazi ni fahˈari ja watˈoto wˈao.|0
midˈomo jˌeɲe uwˈezo wa ˌuʃawˈiʃi hˌaimfˈai mpumbˈavu: ɟˈe, ni mibˈaja kiˈasi ɡˈani zaˈidi midˈomo ja uˈoŋɡo kwa mtawˈala.|0
kipˈawa ni kˌama kˈito tʃa θamˈani matʃˈoni pˈake jˌeje alˈije nˈatʃo; kokˈote kˌiɡeˌukiˈapo, hˌufanikˈiwa.|0
jˌeje ˌanajˌesamˈehe kˈosa hˌudumˈiʃa upˈendo, bˌali jejˈote ˌarudiˈaje ɟˈambo hˌuteŋɡanˈiʃa mˌarafˈiki wa karˈibu.|0
kˌaripˈio hˌumwiŋɡˈia sˈana ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kˌutambˈua kulˈiko mapˈiɡo mˈia kwa mpumbˈavu.|0
ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja hupˈenda kuˈasi tˈu; mɟˈumbe asˈije na hurˈuma ˌatatˈumwa ðˈidi jˈake.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali ˌukutˈane na dˈubu ˌalijˌeɲaŋɡˈaɲua watˈoto wˈake, kulˈiko mpumbˈavu katˌika ˌupumbˈavu wˈake.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatalˈipa bˈaja kwa ɟˈema, kˈamwe ubˈaja hˌautˌaondˈoka katˌika ɲˈumba jˈake.|0
kˌuanzˈiʃa uɡˈomvi ni kˌama kˌutobˈoa bwˈawa la mˈaɟi; kwa hˈijo ˈatʃa ɟˈambo hˌilo kˈabla mˌabiʃˈano hˌajaɟaˈanza.|0
jˌeje ˌasemˈaje kˌuwa asˈije na hˈaki ˈana hˈaki, nˌaje ˌasemˈaje kˌuwa mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˈana hˈaki: bwˈana hˌuwatʃukˈia sˈana wˈote wawˈili.|0
fˈeða ˈina faˈida ɡˈani mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mpumbˈavu, wakˈati jˌeje hˈana hˈaɟa ja kupˈata hekˈima.|0
rafˈiki hupˈenda wakˈati wˈote nˌaje ndˈuɡu ˌamezalˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
ˈm̩tu mɟˈiŋɡa hupˈana mkˈono ˌili kuwˈeka rehˈani, nˌaje huwˈeka ðamˈana kwa ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
jˌeje ˌapendˈaje uɡˈomvi apˈenda ðˈambi; nˌaje ˌainuˈaje sˈana lˈaŋɡo lˈake hˌutafˈuta ˌuharibˈifu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˈojo mpotˈovu hawˈezi kˌufanikˈiwa; nˌaje ambˈaje ulˈimi wˌake ni mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu hˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe taˈabu.|0
kˌuwa na mwˈana mpumbˈavu hulˈeta huzˈuni; hakˈuna furˈaha kwa bˈaba wa mpumbˈavu.|0
mˈojo wˌeɲe furˈaha ni dˈawa nzˈuri, bˌali rˈoho ˌilijˌopondˈeka hˌukaˈuʃa mifˈupa.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌukubˈali rˈuʃwa kwa sˈiri ˌili kˌupotˈoʃa ɲɟˈia ja hˈaki.|0
ˈm̩tu wa ˌufahˈamu hˌuitazˈama hekˈima, lakˈini mˈatʃo ja mpumbˈavu hˌuhaŋɡaˈika hˌadi kwˈeɲe miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
mwˈana mpumbˈavu hulˈeta huzˈuni kwa bˈaba jˌake na utʃˈuŋɡu kwa jˌeje ˌalijemzˈaa.|0
si vizˈuri kˌumwaðˈibu ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia, ˌau kˌuwapˈiɡa sˈana mˌaafˈisa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuadilˈifu wˈao.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa hˌutumˈia manˈeno kwa kˌuɟizuˈia, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu ˈana mˈojo wa ˌutulˈivu.|0
hˌata ˈm̩tu mpumbˈavu hˌuðanˈiwa kˌuwa na hekˈima kˌama ˌakiɲamˈaza, na mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu kˌama ˌakiˌuzuˈia ulˈimi wˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌaɟiteŋɡˈaje na weŋɡˈine hˌufuˈata matˈakwa jˌake mweɲˈewe; hupˈiɡa vˈita kˈila ʃaˈuri ɟˈema.|0
mpumbˈavu hˌafurahˈii ˌufahˈamu, bˌali hˌufurahˈia kˌutaŋɡˈaza maˈoni jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
wakˈati uˈovu ˌunapokˈuɟa, ðarˈau hˈuɟa pˈia, pamˈoɟa na aˈibu hˈuɟa lawˈama.|0
manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃa mwˌanadˈamu ni kˈina tʃa mˈaɟi, bˌali tʃemtʃˈemi ja hekˈima ni kiɟˈito kˌinatʃˌobubuɟˈika.|0
sˈio vizˈuri kˌumpendelˈea ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, ˌau kumɲˈima hˈaki asˈije na hatˈia.|0
midˈomo ja mpumbˈavu hˌumletˈea uɡˈomvi na kˈiɲua tʃˈake hˌualˈika kipˈiɡo.|0
kˈiɲua tʃa mpumbˈavu ni ˌuharibˈifu wˌake na midˈomo jˌake ni mtˈeɡo kwa nˈafsi jˈake.|0
manˈeno ja mtʃoŋɡˈezi ni kˌama tʃakˈula kitˈamu; hˌuiŋɡˈia sehˈemu za ndˈani sˈana za ˈm̩tu.|0
ˈm̩tu alˈije mleɡˈevu katˌika kˈazi jˌake ni ndˈuɡu na jˈule ˌanajˌeharˈibu.|0
ɟˈina la bwˈana ni ŋɡˈome imˈara, wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuikˌimbilˈia na kˌuwa salˈama.|0
mˈali ja taɟˈiri ni ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, wˌanaˌuðanˈia kˌuwa ukˈuta ˌusiowˈeza kurˈukwa.|0
kˈabla ja aŋɡˈuko mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu huɟˈaa kibˈuri, bˌali ˌuɲeɲekˈevu hˌutaŋɡulˈia heʃˈima.|0
jˌeje ˌaɟibˈuje kˈabla ja kˌusikilˈiza, hˈuo ni ˌupumbˈavu wˌake na aˈibu jˈake.|0
rˈoho ja ˈm̩tu ˌitastˌahimˈili katˌika uɡˈoɲɟua bˌali rˈoho ˌilijˌovuɲɟˈika ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuistˌahimˈili.|0
mˈojo wa mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu hˌuɟipatˈia mˌaarˈifa, mˌasikˈio ja mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌujatafˈuta mˌaarˈifa.|0
zawˈadi hˌumfuŋɡulˈia ɲɟˈia mtoˈaɟi, nˈajo humlˈeta mbˈele ja wakˈuu.|0
jˌeje alˈije wa kwˈanza kulˈeta maʃtˈaka hˌuonekˈana sahˈihi, hˌadi mwiŋɡˈine ˌaɟitˌokezˈapo na kˌumuulˈiza maswˈali.|0
kupˈiɡa kˈura hˌukomˈeʃa mˌaʃindˈano na kˌuteŋɡanˈiʃa wˌapinzˈani wakˈuu wˌanaˌopiŋɡˈana.|0
ndˈuɡu ˌalijˌetʃukˈizwa ni mɡˈumu kˌuriðˈika kulˈiko ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa ŋɡˈome, nˈajo mˌabiʃˈano ni kˌama malˈaŋɡo ja ŋɡˈome jˌeɲe mˌakomˈeo.|0
tˈumbo la ˈm̩tu lˌitaɟˈaa kˌutokˈana na tˈunda la kˈiɲua tʃˈake, ˌataʃibˈiʃwa mavˈuno jˌanajˌotokˈana na midˈomo jˈake.|0
maˈuti na uzˈima vˈiko katˌika uwˈezo wa ulˈimi, nˌao wˌaupendˈao wˌatakˈula matˈunda jˈake.|0
ˌapatˈaje ˈm̩ke apˈata kˈitu tʃˈema nˌaje ˌaɟipatˈia kibˈali kwa bwˈana.|0
ˈm̩tu maskˈini huˈomba kˌuhurumˈiwa bˌali taɟˈiri huɟˈibu kwa ukˈali.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˌarafˈiki wˈeŋɡi wˌanawˈeza kˌumharˈibu, bˌali jˈuko rafˈiki ˌaambˌatanˈaje na ˈm̩tu kwa karˈibu kulˈiko ndˈuɡu.|0
ˌafaðˈali ˈm̩tu maskˈini ambˈaje mwenˈendo wˌake haˈuna lawˈama, kulˈiko mpumbˈavu ambˈaje midˈomo jˌake ˌimepotˈoka.|0
sˈio vizˈuri kˌuwa na ɟuhˈudi bˌila mˌaarˈifa, wˈala kufˈaɲa harˈaka na kˌuikˈosa ɲɟˈia.|0
ˌupumbˈavu wa ˈm̩tu mweɲˈewe hˌuharˈibu maˈiʃa jˌake hˌata hˈivjo mˈojo wˌake hˌumkasˌirikˈia bwˈana.|0
mˈali hulˈeta mˌarafˈiki wˈeŋɡi, bˌali rafˈiki wa ˈm̩tu maskˈini humwˈatʃa.|0
ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo hˌataˈatʃa kˌuaðibˈiwa, nˌaje ˌamwaɡˈaje uˈoŋɡo hˌataˈatʃwa hˈuru.|0
wˈeŋɡi hˌuɟipˌendekˈeza kwa mtawˈala na kˈila mmˈoɟa ni rafˈiki wa ˈm̩tu ˌatoˈaje zawˈadi.|0
ˈm̩tu maskˈini hˌuepˈukwa na ndˈuɡu zˌake wˈote: ɟˈe, mˌarafˈiki zˌake wˌatamkwˈepa kiˈasi ɡˈani! iŋɡˈawa hˌuwafuˈata kwa kˌuwasˈihi, hˌawapˌatikˈani popˈote.|0
jˌeje ˌapatˈaje hekˈima hˌuipˈenda nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe, jˌeje ˌahifaðˈije ˌufahˈamu hustˈawi.|0
ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo hˌataˈatʃa kˌuaðibˈiwa, nˌaje ˌamwaɡˈaje uˈoŋɡo ˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
hˌaistahˈili mpumbˈavu kuˈiʃi katˌika anˈasa, ˌitakˈuwa vibˈaja kiˈasi ɡˈani kwa mtˈumwa kˌuwatawˈala wakˈuu.|0
hekˈima ja ˈm̩tu hˈumpa ˌuvumilˈivu, ni kwa ˌutukˈufu wˌake kˌusamˈehe makˈosa.|0
ɣaðˈabu ja mfˈalme ni kˌama mŋɡurˈumo wa sˈimba, bˌali wˈema wˌake ni kˌama umˈande ɟˌuːja ɲˈasi.|0
mwˈana mpumbˈavu ni mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja babˈaje, nˌaje ˈm̩ke mɡˈomvi ni kˌama kˌutonatˈona kˌusikoˈiʃa.|0
ɲˈumba na mˈali hˌuriθˈiwa kutˈoka kwa wazˈazi, bˌali ˈm̩ke mwˌeɲe busˈara hutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
uvˈivu hulˈeta ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mzˈembe huˈona ɲɟˈaa.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje hutˈii mˌafundˈiʃo hˌuulˈinda uhˈai wˈake, bˌali jˌeje ˌanajˌeziðarˈau ɲɟˈia zˌake ˌatakˈufa.|0
jˌeje ˌamhurˌumiˈaje maskˈini hˌumkopˈeʃa bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatamtˈuza kwa ˌalijotˈenda.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kˌukasirˈika harˈaka ni lazˈima ˌatapˈata aðˈabu jˈake, kˌama ˌutamwokˈoa, ˌitakubˈidi kufˈaɲa hˈivjo tˈena.|0
sˌikilˈiza mˌaʃaˈuri na ˌukubˈali mˌafundˈiʃo, nˌawe mwiʃˈoni ˌutakˈuwa na hekˈima.|0
kˈuna mipˈaŋɡo mˈiŋɡi ndˈani ja mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu, lakˈini kusˈudi la bwˈana ndˈilo lˌitakˌalosimˈama.|0
lˈile ˈm̩tu ˌaliˌoneˈalo ʃaˈuku ni upˈendo usˈio na mwˈiʃo, ˌafaðˈali kˌuwa maskˈini kulˈiko kˌuwa mwˈoŋɡo.|0
kˈumtʃa bwˈana hˌuoŋɡˈoza kwˈeɲe uzˈima, kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu hˌupumzˈika akˈiwa ˌameriðˈika, bˌila kuɡˈuswa na ʃˈida.|0
mpˈiɡe mwˌeɲe mzˈaha, nˌaje mɟˈiŋɡa ˌataɟifˈunza busˈara, mkemˈee mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu nˌaje ˌatapˈata mˌaarˈifa.|0
jˌeje ˌamwibiˈaje bˈaba jˌake na kˌumfukˈuza mˈama jˌake ni mwˈana ˌaletˈaje aˈibu na feðˈeha.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˌukiˈatʃa kˌusikilˈiza mˌafundˈiʃo, ˌutatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa mbˈali na manˈeno ja mˌaarˈifa.|0
ʃahˈidi ˈm̩la rˈuʃwa hˌuðihˈaki hukˈumu na kˈiɲua tʃa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu humˈeza ubˈaja kwa upˈesi.|0
aðˈabu zˌimeˌandalˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˌeɲe ðihˈaka na mapˈiɡo kwa aɟˈili ja miɡˈoŋɡo ja wˌapumbˈavu.|0
mvˈiɲo ni mðihˈaki na kilˈeo ni mɡˈomvi; jejˈote ˌapotoʃwˈaje nˈavjo hˈana hekˈima.|0
ɣaðˈabu ja mfˈalme ni kˌama ŋɡurˈumo ja sˈimba; jˌeje ˌamkasˌiriʃˈaje hˌupotˈeza uhˈai wˈake.|0
ni kwa heʃˈima ja ˈm̩tu kˌuɟitˈeŋɡa uɡˈomvi, bˌali kˈila mpumbˈavu ni mwepˈesi kˌuɡombˈana.|0
mvˈivu halˈimi kwa maɟˈira; kwa hˈijo wakˈati wa mavˈuno hˌutazˈama lakˈini hapˈati tʃotʃˈote.|0
mˌakusˈudi ja mˈojo wa mwˌanadˈamu ni mˈaɟi jˌeɲe kˈina, lakˈini ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu hˌujatʃˈota.|0
wˈatu wˈeŋɡi hˌuɟidˈai kˌuwa na upˈendo ˌusiokˈoma, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌaminˈifu ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumpˈata.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki huˈiʃi maˈiʃa jasˈijo na lawˈama, wˌamebˌarikˈiwa watˈoto wˌake baˌada jˈake.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme ˌaketˈipo katˌika kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌuhukˈumu, hˌupepˈeta ubˈaja wˈote kwa mˈatʃo jˈake.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kusˈema, nˌimeuwˈeka mˈojo wˈaŋɡu sˈafi; mˌimi ni sˈafi na sˈina ðˈambi.|0
mˈawe ja kˌupimˈia jalˈijo tˌofaˈuti na vipˈimo tˌofaˈuti, bwˈana hˌutʃukˈia vjˈote viwˈili.|0
hˌata mtˈoto hˌuɟulikˈana kwa matˈendo jˈake, kˌama tabˈia jˌake ni sˈafi na adˈili.|0
mˌasikˈio jˌasikiˈajo na mˈatʃo jˌaonˈajo, bwˈana n̩dˈije ˌalivifˈaɲa vjˈote viwˈili.|0
ˌusiupˈende ˌusiŋɡˈizi la sˈivjo ˌutakˈuwa maskˈini, ˈuwe mˈatʃo nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa na tʃakˈula tʃa akˈiba.|0
hˌaifˈai, hˌaifˈai! asˈema mnunˈuzi, kˈiʃa hˌuondˈoka ˌakiɟˌisifˈia ˌununˈuzi wˈake.|0
ðahˈabu kunˈajo, na mˌariɟˈani kwa wˈiŋɡi, lakˈini midˈomo ˌinenˈajo mˌaarˈifa ni kˈito tʃa θamˈani kilˈitʃo adˈimu.|0
tʃakˈula kˌilitʃˌopatikˈana kwa hˈila ni kitˈamu kwa mwˌanadˈamu, bˌali hˌuiʃˈia na kˈiɲua kˌilitʃoɟˈaa tʃˌaŋɡarˈawe.|0
fˈaɲa mipˈaŋɡo kwa kˌutafˈuta mˌaʃaˈuri, ˌukipiɡˈana vˈita, tafˈuta mˌaelekˈezo.|0
manˈeno ja kˌuseŋɡˈeɲa hˌusababˈiʃa kˌutokˌuaminˈika, kwa hˈijo mwepˈuke ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌezuŋɡˈumza kupˈita kiˈasi.|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatamlaˈani bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˈake, tˈaa jˌake ˌitazˈimwa katˌika ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
urˈiθi ˌupatˌikanˈao harˈaka mwanzˈoni, hˌautˌabarikˈiwa mwiʃˈoni.|0
ˌusisˈeme, nˌitakˌulipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa hˈili! mŋɡoɟˈee bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatakˌuokˈoa.|0
bwˈana ˌanatʃukˈia sˈana mˈawe ja kˌupimˈia ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, nˈazo mizˈani zisˈizo halˈali hˌazimpendˈezi.|0
hatˈua za ˈm̩tu hˌuoŋɡˈozwa na bwˈana. ˌanawezˈaɟe bˌasi ˈm̩tu jejˈote kˌuelˈewa ɲɟˈia jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ni mtˈeɡo kwa ˈm̩tu kuwˈeka wˈakfu kˈitu kwa harˈaka na baˌada ja kitˈambo kidˈoɡo kˌufikirˈia tˈena naðˈiri zˈake.|0
mfˈalme mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌupepˈeta waˈovu, hˌulipitˈiʃa ɡˌurudˈumu la kˌupurˈia ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
tˈaa ja bwˈana hˌutʃuŋɡˈuza rˈoho ja mwˌanadˈamu, hˌutʃuŋɡˈuza ˈutu wˌake wa ndˈani.|0
upˈendo na ˌuaminˈifu humwˈeka mfˈalme salˈama, kwa ɲɟˈia ja upˈendo, kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi hˈuwa salˈama.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa viɟˈana ni ŋɡˈuvu zˈao, mvˈi ni fahˈari ja uzˈee.|0
mapˈiɡo na mˌaɟerˈaha hˌuusafˈiʃa ubˈaja, nˈajo mitʃˈapo hˌutakˈasa ˈutu wa ndˈani.|0
mˈojo wa mfˈalme ˈuko katˌika mkˈono wa bwˈana; hˌuuoŋɡˈoza kˌama mkˈondo wa mˈaɟi, popˈote ˌapendˈapo.|0
ɲɟˈia zˈote za mwˌanadˈamu hˌuonekˈana sˈawa kwˈake, bˌali bwˈana hˌuupˈima mˈojo.|0
kufˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa na hˈaki ˌinakˌubalˈika zaˈidi kwa bwˈana kulˈiko ðabˈihu.|0
mˈatʃo ja kˌuðarˈau na mˈojo wa kibˈuri, ambˈavjo ni tˈaa ja waˈovu, vjˈote ni ðˈambi.|0
mipˈaŋɡo ja mwˌeɲe bidˈii hˌuelekˈeza kwˈeɲe faˈida, kˌama vˈile kwa hakˈika pˈupa hˌuelekˈeza kwˈeɲe ˌumaskˈini.|0
mˈali ˌilijˌopatikˈana kwa ulˈimi wa uˈoŋɡo ni mvˈuke ˌupitˈao upˈesi na mtˈeɡo wa kufˈiʃa.|0
ɟeˈuri ja waˈovu ˌitawˌaburˈuta mbˈali, kwa kˌuwa wˌanakatˈaa kufˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa.|0
ɲɟˈia ja mwˌeɲe hatˈia ni ja ˌupotˈovu, bˌali tabˈia ja ˈm̩tu asˈije na hatˈia ni ɲˈofu.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali kuˈiʃi pembˈeni ˌm̩wa pˈaa la ɲˈumba, kulˈiko kuˈiʃi ɲˈumba mˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke mɡˈomvi.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌutamˈani sˈana ubˈaja, ɟirˈani jˌake hapˈati hurˈuma kutˈoka kwˈake.|0
wakˈati mwˌeɲe mzˈaha ˌameˌaðibˈiwa, mɟˈiŋɡa hupˈata hekˈima; wakˈati ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌafundiʃwˈapo, hupˈata mˌaarˈifa.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌujaɟˈua jˌanajˌotendˈeka katˌika ɲˈumba za waˈovu, nˌaje ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza waˈovu.|0
zawˈadi ˌitolewˈajo kwa sˈiri hˌutulˈiza hasˈira na rˈuʃwa ˌilijofˈitʃwa kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuo hˌutulˈiza ɣaðˈabu kˈali.|0
wakˈati hˈaki ˌimetendˈeka, hulˈeta furˈaha kwa wˌeɲe hˈaki, bˌali kitˈiʃo kwa watˈenda mabˈaja.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌepotˈea kutˈoka mapˈito ja ˌufahˈamu, hˌupumzˈika katˌika kˈundi la wˌaliokˈufa.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌapendˈaje anˈasa ˌatakˈuwa maskˈini, jejˈote ˌapendˈaje mvˈiɲo na mafˈuta kˈamwe hˌatakˈuwa taɟˈiri.|0
waˈovu hˈuwa fidˈia kwa aɟˈili ja wˌeɲe hˈaki, nˌao wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja waɲˈofu.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali kuˈiʃi ɟaŋɡwˈani kulˈiko kuˈiʃi na ˈm̩ke mɡˈomvi na mkorˈofi.|0
katˌika ɲˈumba ja mwˌeɲe hekˈima kˈuna akˈiba ja vjakˈula vizˈuri na mafˈuta, lakˈini ˈm̩tu mpumbˈavu hˌutafˈuna vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo.|0
jˌeje ˌafuˌatiˈaje hˈaki na upˈendo hupˈata uzˈima, mˌafanikˈio na heʃˈima.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuuʃˌambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, na kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa ŋɡˈome wˌanazˌozitˌeɡemˈea.|0
jˌeje ˌalindˈaje kˈiɲua tʃˈake na ulˈimi wˌake hˌuɟilˈinda na maˈafa.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kibˈuri na mˌaɟivˈuno, mðihˈaki ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake; hutˈenda mˈambo kwa kibˈuri kˌilitʃozˈidi.|0
kˌutamˈani sˈana kwa mvˈivu kˌutakˈuwa kˈifo tʃˈake, kwa sabˈabu mikˈono jˌake hˌaitˈaki kufˈaɲa kˈazi.|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa hˌutamˈani zaˈidi, lakˈini mɲˈofu hutˈoa pasˈipo kˌuzuˈia.|0
ðabˈihu ja ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ni tʃukˈizo, si zaˈidi sˈana ˌitolewˈapo kwa nˈia m̩bˈaja.|0
ʃahˈidi wa uˈoŋɡo ˌataˌaŋɡamˈia, bˌali manˈeno ja mwˌeɲe kˌusikˈia jˌatadˈumu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˈana ˈuso wa ˌuʃupˈavu, bˌali ˈm̩tu mɲˈofu hˌuzifˌikirˈia ɲɟˈia zˈake.|0
hakˈuna hekˈima, wˈala akˈili, wˈala mpˈaŋɡo ˌunaowˈeza kˌufaˈulu ðˈidi ja bwˈana.|0
farˈasi hˌuandalˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja sˈiku ja vˈita, bˌali uʃˈindi hˈuwa kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈeri kˌutʃaɡˈua ɟˈina ɟˈema kulˈiko ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi, kˌuheʃimˈiwa ni bˈora kulˈiko fˈeða ˌau ðahˈabu.|0
taɟˈiri na maskˈini wˌanafanˈana kwa hˈili: bwˈana ni muˈumba wˌao wˈote.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe busˈara huˈona hatˈari na kˌuɟifˈitʃa, bˌali mɟˈiŋɡa hˌuendelˈea mbˈele kˌama kipˈofu nˈajo ˌikamtˈesa.|0
ˌuɲeɲekˈevu na kˈumtʃa bwˈana hulˈeta ˌutaɟˈiri, heʃˈima na uzˈima.|0
katˌika mapˈito ja waˈovu kˈuna miˈiba na mitˈeɡo, bˌali jˌeje ˌailindˈaje nˈafsi jˌake hukˈaa mbˈali nˈajo.|0
mfundˈiʃe mtˈoto ɲɟˈia ˌimpasˈajo kˌuiendˈea, nˌaje hˌataiˈatʃa hˌata akˈiwa m̩zˈee.|0
mˌataɟˈiri hˌuwatawˈala maskˈini nˌaje ˌakopˈaje ni mtˈumwa wa ˌakopeʃˈaje.|0
jˌeje ˌaupandˈaje uˈovu huvˈuna taˈabu, nˈajo fˈimbo ja ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌitaˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
ˈm̩tu mkarˈimu jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌatabˌarikˈiwa kwa kˌuwa hˌuʃirˈiki tʃakˈula tʃˈake na maskˈini.|0
mfukˈuze mwˌeɲe ðihˈaka, na mvutˈano ˌutatowˈeka; uɡˈomvi na mˌatukˈano vˌitakˈoma.|0
jˌeje ˌapendˈaje mˈojo sˈafi na jˌeje ambˈaje manˈeno jˌake ni ja neˈema, mfˈalme ˌatakˈuwa rafˈiki jˈake.|0
mˈatʃo ja bwˈana hulˈinda mˌaarˈifa, bˌali hˌujapˈiŋɡa manˈeno ja asˈije mwˌaminˈifu.|0
kˈiɲua tʃa mwanˈamke kahˈaba ni ʃˈimo rˈefu; jˌeje alˈije tʃˈini ja ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana ˌatatˌumbukˈia ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌupumbˈavu ˌumefˈuŋɡwa ndˈani ja mˈojo wa mtˈoto, bˌali fˈimbo ja aðˈabu ˌitaˌufukuzˈia mbˈali nˈaje.|0
jˌeje ˌamwoneˈaje maskˈini ˌili kˌuɟiˌoŋɡezˈea mˈali, nˌaje ampˈaje taɟˈiri zawˈadi, wˈote hˈuwa maskˈini.|0
tˈeɡa sikˈio na ˌusikˈie misˈemo ja wˌeɲe hekˈima, ˌelekˈeza mˈojo wˈako kwˈeɲe jˈale nˌifundiʃˈajo.|0
kwa maˈana ˌinapendˈeza ˌunapˌojahifˈaði mojˈoni mwˈako na kˌuwa nˈajo jˈote tajˈari mˌidomˈoni mwˈako.|0
ˌili tˌumaˈini lˈako lˈiwe katˌika bwˈana, hˌata wˈewe, nˌinakˌufundˈiʃa lˈeo.|0
ɟˈe, sˌiɟakˌuandikˈia misˈemo θˌelaθˈini, misˈemo ja mˌaʃaˈuri na mˌaarˈifa.|0
kˌukufundˈiʃa manˈeno ja kwˈeli na ja kˌuaminˈika, ˌili uwˈeze kutˈoa maɟˈibu sahˈihi kwˈake jˌeje ˌalijˌekutˈuma.|0
ˌusiwˌaðulˈumu maskˈini kwa sabˈabu ni maskˈini, wˈala kˌumðulˈumu mhitˈaɟi mˌahakamˈani.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌatalˌitʃukˈua ʃaˈuri lˈao nˌaje ˌatawatˈeka wˌao wˌaliˌowatˈeka.|0
ˌusifˈaɲe ˌurafˈiki na ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hasˈira ja harˈaka, ˌusiʃˌirikiˈane na jˈule alˈije mwepˈesi kˌukasirˈika.|0
la sˈivjo ˌutaɟifˈunza ɲɟˈia zˌake na kˌuɟiiŋɡˈiza mweɲˈewe kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo.|0
usˈiwe mwˌeɲe kupˈana mikˈono katˌika rehˈani, ˌau kuwˈeka ðamˈana kwa aɟˈili ja madˈeni.|0
kˌama ˌukikˈosa ɲɟˈia ja kulˈipa, kitˈanda tʃˈako kˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa ukˈiwa ˌumekˌilalˈia.|0
ˌusisoɡˈeze ɟˈiwe la mpˈaka wa zamˈani lˌililowˈekwa na bˈaba zˈako.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunamwˈona ˈm̩tu stˈadi katˌika kˈazi jˈake? ˌatahudˈumu mbˈele ja wafˈalme; hˌatahudˈumu mbˈele ja wˈatu dˈuni.|0
ˌuketˈipo kˈula tʃakˈula na mtawˈala, ˌaŋɡalˈia vjˈema kˈile kilˈitʃo mbˈele jˈako.|0
na utˈie kˈisu koˈoni mwˈako kˌama ukˈiwa mlˈafi.|0
ˌusitamˈani vjakˈula vjˈake vitˈamu kwa kˌuwa tʃakˈula hˈitʃo ni tʃa hˈila.|0
ˌusiɟˌitaabˈiʃe ˌili kˌuupˈata ˌutaɟˈiri, ˈuwe na hekˈima kˌuoɲˈeʃa kˌuɟizuˈia.|0
kufˈumba na kˌufumbˈua ˌutaɟˈiri hˌutowˈeka, hˈuwa kˌama ˌumepˈata mabˈawa ɣafˈula, ˌukarˈuka na kˌutowˈeka aŋɡˈani kˌama tˈai.|0
usˈile tʃakˈula tʃa ˈm̩tu m̩tʃˈojo, ˌusitamˈani vjakˈula vjˈake vitˈamu.|0
kwa maˈana jˌeje ni aˈina ja ˈm̩tu ambˈaje kˈila mˈara ˌanafikˈiri ɟˌuːja ɣarˈama. ˌanakˌuambˈia, kˈula na kˈuɲua, lakˈini mˈojo wˌake haˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
ˌutatapˈika kˈile kidˈoɡo ˌulitʃokˈula, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa ˌumepotˈeza bˈure manˈeno jˈako ja kumsˈifu.|0
ˌusizuŋɡˈumze na mpumbˈavu, kwa maˈana ˌataðihˈaki hekˈima ja manˈeno jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa mtetˈezi wˌao ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, ˌatalˌitʃukˈua ʃaˈuri lˈao ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ˌelekˈeza mˈojo wˈako kwˈeɲe mˌafundˈiʃo na mˌasikˈio jˈako kwˈeɲe manˈeno ja mˌaarˈifa.|0
ˌusimɲˈime mtˈoto aðˈabu, ˌukimwaðˈibu kwa fˈimbo, hˌatakˈufa.|0
mwaðˈibu kwa fˈimbo na kˌuiokˈoa nˈafsi jˌake kutˈoka mˌautˈini.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, kˌama mˈojo wˈako ˈuna hekˈima, bˌasi mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌutafurˈahi.|0
ˈutu wˈaŋɡu wa ndˈani ˌutafurˈahi, wakˈati midˈomo jˈako ˌitakˌapozuŋɡˈumza lilˈilo sˈawa.|0
ˌusiˌuruhˈusu mˈojo wˈako kˌuwaonˈea wˈivu wˌeɲe ðˈambi, bˌali kˈila mˈara ˈuwe na bidˈii katˌika kˈumtʃa bwˈana.|0
hakˈika kˈuna tˌumaˈini la bˌaadˈaje kwa aɟˈili jˈako, nˈalo tˌaraɟˈio lˈako hˌalitˌakatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
sˌikilˈiza, mwanˈaŋɡu na ˈuwe na hekˈima, wˈeka mˈojo wˈako kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ilˈijo sˈawa.|0
usˈiwe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaɲuˈao mvˈiɲo, ˌau wˈale walˈao ɲˈama kwa pˈupa.|0
kwa maˈana walˈevi na walˈafi hˈuwa maskˈini, nˈako kˌusinzˈia hˌuwavˈika mˌatambˈara.|0
msˌikilˈize bˈaba jˈako, ˌalijˌekuzˈaa, wˈala ˌusimðarˈau mˈama jˈako ˌatakˌapokˈuwa m̩zˈee.|0
nunˈua kwˈeli wˈala ˌusiiˈuze, pˈata hekˈima, adˈabu na ˌufahˈamu.|0
bˈaba wa mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˈana furˈaha kˈubwa, nˌaje alˈije na mwˈana mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌumfurahˈia.|0
bˈaba jˈako na mˈama jˈako na wˌafurˈahi, mˈama ˌalijˌekuzˈaa na ˌaʃaŋɡilˈie.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, nˈipe mˈojo wˈako, mˈatʃo jˈako na jˌafuˈate ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana kahˈaba ni ʃˈimo rˈefu na mwanˈamke mpotˈovu ni kisˈima tʃembˈamba.|0
kˌama mɲaŋɡˈaɲi, hˌuŋɡoɟˈea ˌakivizˈia, nˌaje hˌuzidˈiʃa wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanaˈume.|0
ni nˈani mwˌeɲe ˈole? ni nˈani mwˌeɲe huzˈuni? ni nˈani mwˌeɲe uɡˈomvi? ni nˈani mwˌeɲe mˌalalamˈiko? ni nˈani alˈije na mˌaɟerˈaha jasˈijo na sabˈabu? ni nˈani mwˌeɲe mˈatʃo mekˈundu.|0
ni hˈao wˌakaˈao sˈana kwˈeɲe mvˈiɲo, hˈao wˌaendˈao kuˈoɲɟa mˌabakˈuli ja mvˈiɲo ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua.|0
ˌusiˌukodolˈee mˈatʃo mvˈiɲo wakˈati ukˈiwa mwekˈundu, wakˈati ˌunapˌometamˈeta kwˈeɲe bˌilaˈuri, wakˈati ˌuʃukˈapo tˌaratˈibu.|0
mwiʃˈowe huˈuma kˌama ɲˈoka na kutˈia sˈumu jˌake kˌama ɲˈoka mwˌeɲe sˈumu.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako jˌataˈona mˈambo maɡˈeni na mˈojo wˈako kˌuwazˈia mˈambo jˌalijˌopotˈoka.|0
ˌutakˈuwa kˌama ˌalalˈaje kˌatikˈati ja bahˈari, ˌalalˈaje ɟˌuːja kˈamba ja mˌerikˈebu.|0
ˌutasˈema, wˌamenipˈiɡa lakˈini sˌikuumˈia! wˌamenitʃˈapa, lakˈini sˌisikˈii! nˌitaˈamka lˈini ˌili nikˈaɲue tˈena.|0
ˌusiwˌaonˈee wˈivu wˈatu waˈovu, ˌusitamˈani ˌuʃirˈika nˈao.|0
kwa maˈana miˈojo jˈao hupˈaŋɡa mˈambo ja ɟeˈuri, nˈajo midˈomo jˈao husˈema ɟˌuːja kulˈeta maðˈara.|0
kwa hekˈima ɲˈumba huɟˈeŋɡwa, nˈajo kwa ɲɟˈia ja ˌufahˈamu hˌuimarˈiʃwa.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia ja mˌaarˈifa vjˈumba vjˈake huɟˈazwa vˈitu vja θamˈani na vja kˌupendˈeza.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˈana uwˈezo mkˈubwa, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa hˌuoŋɡˈeza ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa kufˈaɲa vˈita ˌunahitˈaɟi ˌuoŋɡˈozi na kwa uʃˈindi wˌaʃaˈuri wˈeŋɡi.|0
hekˈima ˈi ɟˈuu ˈm̩no kwa mpumbˈavu, katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko laŋɡˈoni hˈana lolˈote la kusˈema.|0
jˌeje ˌapaŋɡˈaje mabˈaja ˌataɟˌulikˈana kˌama ˈm̩tu wa hˈila.|0
ˌukikˈata tamˈaa wakˈati wa taˈabu, ɟˈinsi ɡˈani ŋɡˈuvu zˈako ni kidˈoɡo.|0
okˈoa wˈale wˌanaˌooŋɡˈozwa kwˈeɲe kˈifo; wˌazuˈie wˈote wˌanaˌoɟikokˈota kˌuelekˈea mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni.|0
kˌama mkisˈema, lakˈini hˌatukuɟˈua lolˈote kuhˈusu hˈili, ɟˈe, jˈule ˌapimˈaje miˈojo hˌalitambˈui hˈili? ɟˈe, jˈule ˌawalindˈaje maˈiʃa jˈenu hˌaliɟˈui hˈili? ɟˈe, hˌatamlˈipa kˈila ˈm̩tu kˌuliŋɡˈana na ˌalijotˈenda.|0
ˈule asˈali mwanˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ni nzˈuri; asˈali kutˈoka kwˈeɲe sˈeɡa ni tˈamu kwa kuˈoɲɟa.|0
uɟˈue pˈia kwˌamba hekˈima ni tˈamu kwa nˈafsi jˈako, kˌama ˌukiipˈata, kˈuna mˌatumaˈini kwˈako ja sˈiku ziɟˈazo, nˈalo tˌumaˈini lˈako hˌalitˌakatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
ˌusivizˈie kˌama hˌaramˈia ˌafaɲˈavjo ˌili kˌujaʃˌambulˈia makˈao ja mwˌeɲe hˈaki, wˈala ˌusijˌavamˈie makˈazi jˈake.|0
kwa maˈana iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuaŋɡˈuka mˈara sˈaba, hˌuinˈuka tˈena, lakˈini waˈovu hˌuaŋɡˈuʃwa tʃˈini na maˈafa.|0
ˌusitazˈame kwa kˌufurahˈia adˈui jˈako ˌaaŋɡukˈapo; wakˈati ˌaɟikwaˈapo, ˌusiruhˈusu mˈojo wˈako ˌuʃaŋɡilˈie.|0
bwˈana asˈiɟe ˌakaˈona na kˌutʃukˈia ˌakaˌiondˈoa ɣaðˈabu jˌake mbˈali nˈaje.|0
ˌusikˌasirˈike kwa sabˈabu ja wˈatu wabˈaja wˈala ˌusiwˌaonˈee wˈivu waˈovu.|0
kwa maˈana ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja hˈana tˌumaˈini la sˈiku ziɟˈazo, nˈajo tˈaa ja waˈovu ˌitazˈimwa.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˈm̩tʃe bwˈana na mfˈalme, wˈala ˌusiɟiˈuŋɡe na waˈasi.|0
kwa maˈana hˈao wawˈili wˌatatˈuma mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja ɣafˈula ɟˈuu jˈao, nˌaje ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje maˈafa wˌawezˈajo kulˈeta.|0
hˌii pˈia ni misˈemo ja wˌeɲe hekˈima: kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo katˌika hukˈumu si vjˈema.|0
