jejˈote ˌamwambiˈaje mwˌeɲe hatˈia, wˌewe hˈuna hatˈia, kabˈila zˌitamlaˈani na mˌataˈifa jˌatamkˈana.|0
bˌali ˌitakˈuwa vjˈema kwa wˈale wˌatakˌaowatˈia hˌatiˈani wˌeɲe hatˈia, nˈazo barˈaka tˈele zˌitawˌaɟilˈia ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
ɟawˈabu la ˌuaminˈifu ni kˌama bˈusu la mˌidomˈoni.|0
malˈiza kˈazi zˈako za ɲɟˈe, nˌawe uwˈeke maʃˈamba jˈako tajˈari, baˌada ja hˈajo, ɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba jˈako.|0
ˌusiʃˌuhudˈie ðˈidi ja ɟirˈani jˈako bˌila sabˈabu, ˌau kˌutumˈia midˈomo jˈako kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa.|0
ˌusisˈeme, nˌitamtˈenda kˌama ˌalivjˌonitˈenda mˈimi; nˌitamlipˈiza ˈm̩tu jˈule kwa kˈile ˌalitʃˌonitendˈea.|0
nˌilipˈita karˈibu na ʃˈamba la mvˈivu, karˈibu na ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la ˈm̩tu asˈije na akˈili.|0
miˈiba ˌilikˈuwa ˌimeˈota kˈila mahˈali, ˈarði ˌilikˈuwa ˌimefunˈikwa na maɡˈuɡu, na ukˈuta wa mˈawe ˌulikˈuwa ˌumebomˈoka.|0
nˌikatˌafakˈari mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu lˈile nˌililˌoliˈona, nˌami nˌikaɟifˈunza sˈomo kˌutokˈana na nˌilijˌojaˈona.|0
bˈado kulˈala kidˈoɡo, kˌusinzˈia kidˈoɡo, bˈado kukˈuɲɟa mikˈono kidˈoɡo upˈate kˌupumzˈika.|0
hˈivjo ˌumaskˈini ˌutakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈako kˌama mɲaŋɡˈaɲi, na kˌupuŋɡukˈiwa kˌutakuɟˈia kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe silˈaha.|0
hˈizi ni miθˈali zaˈidi za sˌolomˈoni, zˌilizˌonakilˈiwa na wˈatu wa hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
ni ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu kufˈitʃa ɟˈambo, bˌali ni ˌutukˈufu wa wafˈalme kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza ɟˈambo.|0
kˌama mbˈiŋɡu zilˈivjo ɟˈuu na ˈn̩tʃi ilˈivjo tʃˈini, ndˈivjo ambˈavjo miˈojo ja wafˈalme hˌaitʃˌuŋɡuzˈiki.|0
ondˈoa waˈovu mbˈele ja mfˈalme, nˈatʃo kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌitaˌimarˈiʃwa kwa ɲɟˈia ja hˈaki.|0
ˌusiɟikwˈeze mweɲˈewe mbˈele ja mfˈalme, wˈala ˌusidˈai nafˈasi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wakˈuu.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali jˌeje ˌakuambˈie, ɲɟˈoo hˈuku ɟˈuu, kulˈiko jˌeje kˌukuˌaibˈiʃa mbˈele ja m̩kˈuu. kˈile ˌulitʃˌokiˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈako.|0
ˌusihˌarakˈiʃe kˌukipelˈeka mˌahakamˈani, maˈana ˌutafˈaɲa nˈini mwiʃˈoni kˌama ɟirˈani jˈako ˌatakˌuaibˈiʃa.|0
kˌama ˌukifˈaɲa ʃaˈuri na ɟirˈani jˈako, ˌusisalˈiti sˈiri ja ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ˌama jˌeje ˌaisˌikiˈaje awˈeza kˌukuˌaibˈiʃa na kˈamwe sˈifa jˈako m̩bˈaja hˌaitˌaondˈoka.|0
nˈeno lˌisemwˈalo kwa wakˈati ˌufaˈao ni kˌama matˈunda ja mtofˈaa ja ðahˈabu jˌalijowˈekwa kwˈeɲe vˌiɟalˈizo vja fˈeða.|0
kˌama vˈile kipˈuli tʃa ðahˈabu ˌau pˈambo la ðahˈabu sˈafi, ndˈivjo lilˈivjo kˌaripˈio la ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima kwa sikˈio lˌisikˌilizˈalo.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌubarˈidi wa θelˈuɟi wakˈati wa mavˈuno ndˈivjo alˈivjo mɟˈumbe mwˌaminˈifu kwa wˈale wˌamtumˈao, hˌuburudˈiʃa rˈoho za bwˈana zˈake.|0
kˌama vˈile mawˈiŋɡu na upˈepo pasˈipo mvˈua ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌaɟisifˈuje kwa zawˈadi ambˈazo hatˈoi.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia ja ˌuvumilˈivu mtawˈala awˈeza kˌuʃawiʃˈiwa, nˌao ulˈimi laˈini wawˈeza kuvˈuɲɟa mfˈupa.|0
ˌukipˈata asˈali, kˈula kiˈasi tu tʃa kˌukutˈoʃa, ukˈila zaˈidi, ˌutatapˈika.|0
iŋɡˈiza m̩ɡˈuu wˈako ɲumbˈani kwa ɟirˈani jˈako mˈara tʃˈatʃe, ˌukizidˈiʃa, ˌatakˌukinˈai na ˌatakˌutʃukˈia.|0
kˌama vˈile rˈuŋɡu ˌau upˈaŋɡa ˌau mʃˈale mkˈali ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌatoˈaje ˌuʃuhˈuda wa uˈoŋɡo ðˈidi ja ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
kˌama vˈile ɟˈino bˈovu ˌau m̩ɡˈuu ˌuliˌolemˈaa, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo kˌumteɡemˈea ˈm̩tu asˈije mwˌaminˈifu wakˈati wa ʃˈida.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌavuˈaje mavˈazi sˈiku ja barˈidi, ˌau kˌama sˈiki ˌilijomwˈaɡwa ɟˌuːja maɡˈadi, ndˈivjo alˈivjo jˌeje ˌamuˌimbiˈaje ɲˈimbo ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˈojo mzˈito.|0
kˌama adˈui jˈako ˈana ɲɟˈaa, ˈm̩pe tʃakˈula ˈale; kˌama ˈana kˈiu, ˈm̩pe mˈaɟi ˈaɲue.|0
kˌama vˈile upˈepo wa kˌaskazˈini ˌuletˈavjo mvˈua, ndˈivjo ulˈimi ˌusiŋɡˌiziˈao ˌuletˈavjo ˈuso wa hasˈira.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali kuˈiʃi pembˈeni ˌm̩wa pˈaa la ɲˈumba, kulˈiko kuˈiʃi ɲˈumba mˈoɟa na ˈm̩ke mɡˈomvi.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈaɟi barˈidi kwa nˈafsi ˌilijotʃˈoka ndˈivjo zilˈivjo habˈari ɲɟˈema kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali.|0
kˌama vˈile tʃemtʃˈemi ˌilijˌotibulˈiwa matˈope ˌau kisˈima kˌilitʃotˈiwa tˈaka ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌakiʃirˈiki na waˈovu.|0
si vjˈema kˈula asˈali ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana, wˈala si heʃˈima kˌuɟitˌafutˈia heʃˈima jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌama vˈile ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao kˈuta zˌake zˌimebomˈoka ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hawˈezi kˌuɟitawˈala mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌama θelˈuɟi wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi ˌau mvˈua wakˈati wa mavˈuno, ndˈivjo ˌasivjˌostahˈili heʃˈima mpumbˈavu.|0
kˌama ʃomˈoro ˌapiɡˌapiɡˈavjo mabˈawa jˌake ˌau mbˌajuwˈaju katˌika kurˈuka kwˈake kˈasi, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo laˈana isˈijo na sabˈabu hˌaimpˈati ˈm̩tu.|0
mɟelˈedi kwa farˈasi, liɟˈamu kwa pˈunda, nˈajo fˈimbo kwa miɡˈoŋɡo ja wˌapumbˈavu.|0
ˌusimɟˈibu mpumbˈavu sˌawasˈawa na ˌupumbˈavu wˈake, ˌama wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌutakˈuwa kˌama jˈeje.|0
mɟˈibu mpumbˈavu sˌawasˈawa na ˌupumbˈavu wˈake, ˌama ˌatakˈuwa mwˌeɲe hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
kˌama vˈile ilˈivjo kˌuɟikˈata miɡˈuu ˌau kˈuɲua hasˈara, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo kutˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa mkˈono wa mpumbˈavu.|0
kˌama miɡˈuu ja kiwˈete ˌinavjˌoniŋɡinˈia ndˈivjo ilˈivjo miθˈali katˌika kˈiɲua tʃa mpumbˈavu.|0
kˌama kufˈuŋɡa ɟˈiwe kwˈeɲe kombˈeo, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo kˈumpa mpumbˈavu heʃˈima.|0
kˌama mwˈiba kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa mlˈevi ndˈivjo ilˈivjo miθˈali kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa mpumbˈavu.|0
kˌama mpˈiɡa upˈinde ambˈaje hˌuɟerˈuhi ˈovjo, ndˈivjo alˈivjo jˌeje ˌaaɟirˈije mpumbˈavu ˌau jejˈote ˌapitˈaje ɲɟiˈani.|0
kˌama ˈm̩bwa ˌajarˌudiˈavjo mˌatapˈiko jˈake, ndˈivjo mpumbˈavu ˌarudiˈavjo ˌupumbˈavu wˈake.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunamwˈona ˈm̩tu ˌaɟionˈaje mwˌeɲe hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe? lˈiko tˌumaˈini zaˈidi kwa mpumbˈavu kulˈiko kwˈake.|0
mvˈivu husˈema, jˈuko sˈimba bˌarabarˈani, sˈimba mkˈali ˌanazuŋɡˈuka mitˈaa.|0
kˌama vˈile mlˈaŋɡo ˌuɡeukˈavjo kwˈeɲe bawˈaba zˈake, ndˈivjo mvˈivu ˌaɟiɡˌeuzˈavjo kˌitandˈani mwˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu mvˈivu ni mwˌeɲe hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe, kulˈiko wˈatu sˈaba wˌawezˈao kuɟˈibu kwa busˈara.|0
kˌama jˌeje ˌamkamatˈaje ˈm̩bwa kwa mˌasikˈio, ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌapitˈaje ɲɟiˈani na kˌuɟiiŋɡˈiza kwˈeɲe uɡˈomvi ˌusiomhˈusu.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌendawazˈimu ˌatupˈaje viɟˈiŋɡa vja mˈoto ˌau miʃˈale ja kufˈiʃa.|0
ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌamdaŋɡaɲˈaje ɟirˈani jˌake na kusˈema, nˌilikˈuwa nˌikifˈaɲa mzˈaha tˈu.|0
bˌila kˈuni mˈoto hˌuzimˈika; pasˈipo ˌutʃoŋɡˈezi uɡˈomvi hˌumalizˈika.|0
kˌama makˈaa ɟˌuːja makˈaa jˌanajowˈaka, na kˌama kˈuni kwˈeɲe mˈoto, ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu mɡˈomvi kwa kˌutʃotʃˈea uɡˈomvi.|0
manˈeno ja mtʃoŋɡˈezi ni kˌama tʃakˈula kitˈamu; hˌuiŋɡˈia sehˈemu za ndˈani sˈana za ˈm̩tu.|0
kˌama rˈaŋɡi ˌiŋɡaˈajo ˌilijopˈakwa kwˈeɲe vjˈombo vja udˈoŋɡo ndˈivjo ilˈivjo midˈomo laˈini pamˈoɟa na mˈojo m̩bˈaja.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe nˈia ja kuðˈuru weŋɡˈine hˌuɟifˈitʃa kwa manˈeno ja midˈomo jˈake, lakˈini mojˈoni mwˈake hufˈitʃa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
iŋɡˈawa manˈeno jˌake hˌuvutˈia, ˌusimwamˈini, kwa maˈana mˌatʃukˈizo sˈaba huɟˈaza mˈojo wˈake.|0
nˈia jˌake ja kuðˈuru weŋɡˈine ˌinawˈeza kufˈitʃwa na ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, lakˈini uˈovu wˌake ˌutafˌitʃulˈiwa kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakitʃˈimba ʃˈimo, ˌatatˌumbukˈia ndˈani jˈake, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakivˌiŋɡirˈiʃa ɟˈiwe, lˌitamrudˈia.|0
ulˈimi wa uˈoŋɡo, hˌuwatʃukˈia wˈale ˌunaˌowaumˈiza, nˈatʃo kˈiɲua tʃa kˌuɟipˌendekˈeza hutˈenda ˌuharibˈifu.|0
ˌusiɟisˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈeʃo, kwa kˌuwa huɟˈui ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃozalˈiwa kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
mwˈatʃe mwiŋɡˈine ˌakusˈifu, wˈala si kˈiɲua tʃˈako mweɲˈewe; ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine afˈaɲe hˈivjo na si midˈomo jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
ɟˈiwe ni zˈito na mtʃˈaŋɡa ni mzˈiɡo, lakˈini kˌukasirˈiʃwa na mpumbˈavu ni kuzˈito kulˈiko vjˈote viwˈili.|0
hasˈira ni ˌukatˈili na ɣaðˈabu kˈali ni ɣarˈika, lakˈini ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja wˈivu.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˌaripˈio la wˈazi kulˈiko upˈendo ˌuliˌofitʃˈika.|0
mˌaɟerˈaha kutˈoka kwa rafˈiki jˌaoɲˈeʃa ˌuaminˈifu, bˌali kubˈusu kwa adˈui ni kwˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
jˌeje ˌalijeʃˈiba hˌutʃukˈia kabˈisa asˈali, bˌali kwa mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa hˌata kˈile kilˈitʃo kitʃˈuŋɡu kwˈake ni kitˈamu.|0
kˌama ndˈeɡe ˌataŋɡˌataŋɡˈavjo mbˈali na kiˈota tʃˈake, ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌataŋɡˌataŋɡˈaje mbˈali na ɲumbˈani mwˈake.|0
mˌanukˈato na uvˈumba hulˈeta furˈaha mojˈoni, nˌao uzˈuri wa rafˈiki hˌutʃipˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˌuʃaˈuri wˌake wa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
ˌusimwˈatʃe rafˈiki jˈako wˈala rafˈiki wa bˈaba jˈako, tˈena ˌusiˈende ɲumbˈani ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu jˈako wakˈati ˌumepˈatwa na maˈafa. bˈora ɟirˈani wa karˈibu kulˈiko ndˈuɡu alˈije mbˈali.|0
mwanˈaŋɡu, ˈuwe na hekˈima, nˌawe ulˈete furˈaha mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, ndˈipo nˌitakˌapowˈeza kumɟˈibu jejˈote ˌanitendˈaje kwa ðarˈau.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe busˈara huˈona hatˈari na kˌuɟifˈitʃa, bˌali mɟˈiŋɡa hˌuendelˈea mbˈele nˈajo ˌikamtˈesa.|0
tʃukˈua vˈazi la jˈule ˌawekˈaje ðamˈana kwa aɟˈili ja mɡˈeni; lˌiʃikilˈie ˈiwe ðamˈana kˌama ˌanafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa aɟˈili ja mwanˈamke mpotˈovu.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimbarˈiki ɟirˈani jˌake kwa saˈuti kˈuu ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema, ˌitahˌesabˈiwa kˌama ni laˈana.|0
ˈm̩ke mɡˈomvi ni kˌama matˈone jˌasijokˈoma ja sˈiku ja mvˈua.|0
kˌumzuˈia jˌeje ni kˌama kˌuuzuˈia upˈepo ˌau kˌukamˈata mafˈuta kwa kiɡˈaɲɟa tʃa mkˈono.|0
kˌama vˈile tʃˈuma kˌinoˈavjo tʃˈuma, ndˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌamnoˈavjo mwenzˈake.|0
jˌeje ˌautunzˈaje mtˈini ˌatakˈula tˈunda lˈake, nˌaje ˌamtunzˈaje bwˈana wˌake ˌatahˌeʃimˈiwa.|0
kˌama ˈuso ˌuonˌekanˈavjo kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi, ndˈivjo hˈivjo mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu hˌumwoɲˈeʃa alˈivjo.|0
kuzˈimu na ˌuharibˈifu hˌaviʃˈibi kˌaðalˈika mˈatʃo ja mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kalˈibu ni kwa aɟˈili ja fˈeða na tanˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja ðahˈabu, bˌali ˈm̩tu hupˈimwa kwa sˈifa ˌazipˌokeˈazo.|0
hˌata ˌukimtwˈaŋɡa mpumbˈavu kwˈeɲe kˈinu, ˌukimtwˈaŋɡa kˌama nafˈaka kwa ˈm̩tʃi, hˌutaˌuondˈoa ˌupumbˈavu wˈake.|0
hˌakikˈiʃa kˌuwa ˌunaɟˈua hˈali ja makˈundi jˈako ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, ˌaŋɡalˈia kwa bidˈii ŋɡˈombe zˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌutaɟˈiri hˌaudˈumu milˈele, nˈajo tˈaɟi hˌaidˈumu vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
wakˈati maɟˈani makˈavu jˌameˌondolˈewa na mˈapja jˌametʃipˈua, nˈajo maɟˈani tˌoka mˌilimˈani jˌamekusˈaɲua.|0
wˌanakondˈoo wˌatakˌupatˈia mavˈazi na mbˈuzi θamˈani ja ʃˈamba.|0
ˌutakˈuwa na mazˈiwa mˈeŋɡi ja mbˈuzi kˌukulˈiʃa wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈako, na kˌuwalˈiʃa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako wa kˈike.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌukimbˈia iŋɡˈawa hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajˌemfukˈuza, bˌali wˌeɲe hˈaki ni wˌaɟasˈiri kˌama sˈimba.|0
wakˈati ˈn̩tʃi ˌinapokˈuwa na uˈasi, ˌinakˈuwa na vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈeŋɡi, bˌali mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu na mˌaarˈifa hˌudumˈiʃa ˌutaratˈibu.|0
ˈm̩tu maskˈini ˌamwoneˈaje jˌeje alˈije maskˈini zaˈidi ni kˌama mvˈua ja ðorˈuba ˌisijosˈaza mazˈao.|0
wˈale wˌaiatʃˈao ʃerˈia hˌuwasˈifu waˈovu, bˌali wˈale wˌaiʃikˈao ʃerˈia hˌuwapˈiŋɡa.|0
wˈatu wabˈaja hˌawaelˈewi hˈaki, bˌali wˈale wˌamtafutˈao bwˈana wˌanaˌielˈewa kˌikamilˈifu.|0
ˌafaðˈali maskˈini ambˈaje mwenˈendo wˌake haˈuna lawˈama kulˈiko taɟˈiri ambˈaje ɲɟˈia zˌake ni potˈovu.|0
jˌeje ˌaʃikˈaje ʃerˈia ni mwˈana mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu, bˌali rafˈiki wa walˈafi hˌumwaibˈiʃa bˈaba jˈake.|0
jˌeje ˌaoŋɡezˈaje ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake kwa rˈiba kˈubwa ˈm̩no hˌukusˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja mwiŋɡˈine, ambˈaje ˌatawˌahurumˈia maskˈini.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌakikatˈaa kˌusikˈia ʃerˈia, hˌata maˈombi jˌake ni tʃukˈizo.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje hˌumwoŋɡˈoza mwˌeɲe hˈaki kwˈeɲe mapˈito mabˈaja, ˌataaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo wˌake mweɲˈewe, bˌali wasˈio na lawˈama wˌatapokˈea urˈiθi mwˈema.|0
ˈm̩tu taɟˈiri ˌanawˈeza kˌuwa na hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈake mweɲˈewe, bˌali ˈm̩tu maskˈini mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu ˌatamfitʃˈua.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌaʃindˈapo, kˈuna furˈaha kˈubwa, bˌali waˈovu wˌatawalˈapo, wˈatu hˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
jˌeje ˌafitʃˈaje ðˈambi zˌake hˌatafˌanikˈiwa, bˌali jejˈote ˌaziˌuŋɡamˈaje na kˌuziˈatʃa hupˈata rehˈema.|0
ˌamebˌarikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje sˈiku zˈote hˈumtʃa bwˈana, bˌali jˌeje ˌafaɲˈaje mˈojo wˌake kˌuwa mɡˈumu hˌuaŋɡukˈia kwˈeɲe taˈabu.|0
kˌama sˈimba ˌaŋɡurumˈaje ˌau dˈubu ˌaʃambˌuliˈaje, ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌatawalˈaje waɲˈoŋɡe.|0
mtawˈala ðalˈimu hˈana akˈili, bˌali jˌeje ˌatʃukiˈaje mapˈato ja ˌuðalˈimu ˌatafˌurahˈia maˈiʃa marˈefu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kˌusumbulˈiwa na hatˈia ja kuˈua ˌatakˈuwa mtˈoro mpˈaka kˈufa; ˈm̩tu jejˈote na ˌasimsˌaidˈie.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje mwenˈendo wˌake haˈuna lawˈama hulˈindwa salˈama, bˌali jˌeje ambˈaje ɲɟˈia zˌake ni potˈovu ˌataaŋɡˈuka ɣafˈula.|0
jˌeje ˌalimˈaje ʃˈamba lˈake ˌatakˈuwa na tʃakˈula tˈele, bˌali jˈule ˌafuatˈaje mˈambo ja upˈuzi ˌatakˈuwa na ˌumaskˈini wa kumtˈoʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌaminˈifu ˌatabˌarikˈiwa sˈana, bˌali jˌeje ˌatamanˈije kupˈata ˌutaɟˈiri kwa harˈaka hˌataˈatʃa kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo si vizˈuri, hˌata hˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌatafˈaɲa kˈosa kwa kipˈande tʃa mkˈate.|0
ˈm̩tu m̩tʃˈojo ˈana tamˈaa ja kupˈata ˌutaɟˈiri, nˌaje hˈana habˈari kˌuwa ˌumaskˈini ˌunamŋɡoɟˈea.|0
jˌeje ˌamkemeˈaje ˈm̩tu mwiʃˈoni hupˈata kibˈali zaˈidi, kulˈiko mwˌeɲe manˈeno ja kusˈifu ˌisivjˌostahˈili.|0
jˌeje ˌamwibiˈaje babˈaje ˌau mamˈaje na kusˈema, si kˈosa, jˌeje ni mwˈenzi wa jˈule ˌaharibˈuje.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe tamˈaa hˌutʃotʃˈea fitˈina, bˌali jˈule ˌamteɡˌemeˈaje bwˈana ˌatafˌanikˈiwa.|0
jˌeje ˌaɟitˌumaˌiniˈaje mweɲˈewe ni mpumbˈavu, bˌali jˌeje ˌatembeˈaje katˌika hekˈima hulˈindwa salˈama.|0
jˌeje ampˈaje maskˈini hˌatapˌuŋɡukˈiwa na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, bˌali jˌeje ˌawafˌumbiˈaje maskˈini mˈatʃo hupˈata laˈana ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
wakˈati waˈovu wˌatawalˈapo, wˈatu huˈenda mˌafitʃˈoni, bˌali waˈovu wˌanapˌoaŋɡamˈia, wˌeɲe hˈaki hˌufanikˈiwa.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeendelˈea kˌuwa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu baˌada ja maˈoɲo mˈeŋɡi, ˌataˌaŋɡamˈia ɣafˈula, wˈala hapˈati dˈawa.|0
wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌanapostˈawi, wˈatu hˌufurˈahi; waˈovu wˌatawalˈapo, wˈatu hulˈia kwa huzˈuni.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌapendˈaje hekˈima hulˈeta furˈaha kwa bˈaba jˈake, bˌali ˌaambˌatanˈaje na mˌakahˈaba hˌutapˈaɲa mˈali jˈake.|0
kwa hˈaki mfˈalme huˈipa ˈn̩tʃi ˌuθabˈiti, bˌali mfˈalme alˈije na tamˈaa ja rˈuʃwa hˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza.|0
jejˈote ˌamsifˈuje ɟirˈani jˌake ˌisivjˌostahˈili, ˌanaˌutandˈaza wˈavu kˌuitˈeɡa miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja hutˈeɡwa na ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe bˌali mwˌeɲe hˈaki huwˈeza kuˈimba na kˌufurˈahi.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki huɟˈali hˈaki kwa aɟˈili ja maskˈini, bˌali mwˈovu hˌaɟiʃˌuɣulˈiʃi na hˈilo.|0
wˌeɲe mzˈaha hˌuutʃotʃˈea ˈm̩ɟi, bˌali wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuɡeuzˈia mbˈali hasˈira.|0
kˌama mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌakiˈenda mˌahakamˈani na mpumbˈavu, mpumbˈavu hˌukasirˈika na kˌuðihˈaki, wˈala hakˈuna amˈani.|0
wˈatu wˌamwaɡˈao dˈamu hˌumtʃukˈia ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu na hˌutafˈuta kˌumuˈua ˈm̩tu mɲˈofu.|0
mpumbˈavu hˌuoɲˈeʃa hasˈira jˌake jˈote, bˌali mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuɟizuˈia.|0
kˌama mtawˈala ˌakisˌikilˈiza uˈoŋɡo, mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote hˈuwa waˈovu.|0
ˈm̩tu maskˈini na ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeonˈea wˌanafanˈana kwa ɟˈambo hˈili: bwˈana hutˈia nˈuru mˈatʃo jˈao wˈote wawˈili.|0
kˌama mfˈalme ˌakiwˌaamˈua maskˈini kwa hˈaki, kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌitakˈuwa θabˈiti sˈiku zˈote.|0
fˈimbo ja maˈoɲo hutˈia hekˈima, bˌali mtˈoto ˌalijˌeatʃˈiwa bˌila maˈoɲo hˌumwaibˈiʃa mˈama jˈake.|0
wakˈati waˈovu wˌanapostˈawi, pˈia ðˈambi vˈivjo hˈivjo, lakˈini wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌataliˈona aŋɡˈuko lˈao.|0
mrˈudi mwanˈao, nˌaje ˌatakˈupa amˈani, ˌatakˌufurahˈiʃa nˈafsi jˈako.|0
mahˈali pasˈipo na ˌufunˈuo, wˈatu kˌuɟizuˈia, bˌali ˈana hˈeri ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌaiʃikˈaje ʃerˈia.|0
mtumˈiʃi hawˈezi kuˈoɲua kwa manˈeno matˈupu, ˌaɟapˌoelˈewa, hˌataˌitikˈia.|0
ɟˈe, ˌunamwˈona ˈm̩tu ˌazuŋɡumzˈaje kwa harˈaka? kˈuna mˌatumaˈini zaˈidi kwa mpumbˈavu kulˈiko jˈeje.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakimdekˈeza mtumˈiʃi wˌake ʃˈu ˌuɟanˈani, ˌatamletˈea sˌikitˈiko mwiʃˈoni.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hasˈira hˌutʃotʃˈea uɡˈomvi, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hasˈira ja harˈaka hutˈenda ðˈambi ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
kibˈuri tʃa ˈm̩tu humʃˈuʃa, bˌali ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe rˈoho ja ˌuɲeɲekˈevu hupˈata heʃˈima.|0
ˌanajˌekubˌaliˈana na mwˈizi ni adˈui wa nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe; hˌuapˈiʃwa lakˈini hˌaθubˈutu kˌuʃuhudˈia.|0
kˌuwaoɡˈopa wˈatu hˈuwa ni mtˈeɡo, bˌali jejˈote ˌamtumˌainiˈaje bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa salˈama.|0
wˈeŋɡi hˌutafˈuta kˌusikilˈizwa na mtawˈala, bˌali ˈm̩tu hupˈata hˈaki kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌuwatʃukˈia sˈana wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu; waˈovu hˌuwatʃukˈia sˈana wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
mˌimi ni mɟˈiŋɡa kulˈiko wˌanadˈamu wˈote; sˈina ˌufahˈamu wa kˌibinadˈamu.|0
sˌiɟaɟifˈunza hekˈima, wˈala sˈina mˌaarˈifa ja kumɟˈua jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ni nˈani ˌameʃapˈanda mbiŋɡˈuni na kuʃˈuka? ni nˈani ˌameʃˌakusˈaɲa upˈepo kwˈeɲe vitˈaŋɡa vja mikˈono jˈake? ni nˈani ˌameʃˌafuŋɡˈia mˈaɟi kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈuo jˈake? ni nˈani ˌameˌimarˈiʃa miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia? ɟˈina lˈake ni nˈani, na mwanˈawe ˌanaˈitwa nˈani? nˌiambˈie kˌama ˌunaɟˈua.|0
kˈila nˈeno la mˈuŋɡu ni kˌamilˈifu; jˌeje ni ŋɡˈao kwa wˈale wˌanaˌomkimbilˈia.|0
ˌusioŋɡˈeze kwˈeɲe manˈeno jˈake, ˌama ˌatakˌukemˈea na kˌukuθˌibitˈiʃa kˌuwa mwˈoŋɡo.|0
nˌinakuˈomba vˈitu viwˈili, ˈee bwˈana; ˌusiniɲˈime kˈabla siɟˈafa.|0
ˌuutˈeŋɡe mbˈali nˌami ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na uˈoŋɡo; ˌusinˈipe ˌumaskˈini wˈala ˌutaɟˈiri, bˌali unˈipe tʃakˈula tʃa kˌunitˈoʃa kˈila sˈiku.|0
nisˈiɟe nikˈawa na vˈiŋɡi vja kuzˈidi nˌikakukˈana na kusˈema, bwˈana ni nˈani? ˌau nisˈiɟe nikˈawa maskˈini nˌikaˈiba, nˌami nˌikalˌiaibˈiʃa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusimtʃoŋɡˈee mtumˈiʃi kwa bwˈana wˈake, asˈiɟe ˌakakˌulaˈani, ˌukapˌatilˈizwa kwˈalo.|0
wˈako wˈatu wˈale ambˈao hˌuwalaˈani bˈaba zˈao na wˈala hˌawawˌabarˈiki mˈama zˈao.|0
wˈale ambˈao ni sˈafi matʃˈoni pˈao weɲˈewe kˈumbe hˌawakuˈoʃwa utʃˈafu wˈao.|0
wˈale ambˈao daˈima mˈatʃo jˈao ni ja kibˈuri, ambˈao kˌutazˈama kwˈao ni kwa ðarˈau.|0
wˈale ambˈao mˈeno jˈao ni pˈaŋɡa na ambˈao matˈaja jˈao jˌamewˈekwa vˈisu kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza maskˈini katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, na wˌahitˈaɟi kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
mrˈuba anˈao bˈinti wawˈili wˌaliˈao, nˈipe! nˈipe! kˈuna vˈitu vitˈatu vˌisivjˌotoʃˈeka kˈamwe, nˈaam, vˈiko vˈinne vˌisivjosˈema, jatˈoʃa!.|0
ni kabˈuri, tˈumbo lˌisilozˈaa, ˈn̩tʃi ˌisijoʃˈiba mˈaɟi kˈamwe, na mˈoto, ˌusiosˈema kˈamwe, jatˈoʃa!.|0
ɟˈitʃo lˈile lˌimðihakˈilo bˈaba, lˈile lˌinalˌoðarˈau kumtˈii mˈama, lˌitaŋɡolˈewa na kuŋɡˈuru wa bondˈeni, lˌitalˈiwa na tˈai.|0
kˈuna vˈitu vitˈatu vˌinavjˌoniʃaŋɡˈaza sˈana, nˈaam, vˈinne nˌisivjˌovielˈewa.|0
ni mwˈendo wa tˈai katˌika ˈaŋɡa, mwˈendo wa ɲˈoka ɟˌuːja mwˈamba, mwˈendo wa mˈeli katˌika mˈaɟi makˈuu ja bahˈari, nˌao mwˈendo wa ˈm̩tu pamˈoɟa na msitʃˈana.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈendo wa mwanˈamke mzˈinzi, hˈula ˌakapaŋɡˈusa kˈiɲua tʃˈake na kusˈema, sˌikufˈaɲa tʃotʃˈote kibˈaja..|0
kwa mˈambo matˈatu ˈn̩tʃi hˌutetemˈeka, nˈaam, kwa mˈambo mˈanne hˌaiwˈezi kˌuvumilˈia.|0
mtˈumwa awˈapo mfˈalme, mpumbˈavu ˌaʃibˈapo tʃakˈula.|0
mwanˈamke ˌasijepˈendwa ˌaolewˈapo, nˌaje mtumˈiʃi wa kˈike ˌatʃukuˈapo nafˈasi ja bˈibi jˈake.|0
vˈitu vˈinne dˌuniˈani vilˈivjo vidˈoɡo, lakˈini vˈina akˈili ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
ˈm̩tʃwa ni viˈumbe wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ndˈoɡo, hˌata hˈivjo hˌuɟiwekˈea akˈiba ja tʃakˈula tʃˈao wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi.|0
pelˈele ni viˈumbe vjˌeɲe uwˈezo mdˈoɡo hˌata hˈivjo hˌuɟitˌeŋɡenezˈea ɲˈumba zˈao kwˈeɲe miˈamba.|0
nzˈiɡe hawˈana mfˈalme, hˌata hˈivjo huˈenda pamˈoɟa vikˈosi vikˈosi.|0
mɟˈusi ˌanawˈeza kuʃˈikwa kwa mkˈono, hˌata hˈivjo hˌuonekˈana katˌika maɟˈumba ja kifˈalme.|0
vˈiko vˈitu vitˈatu ambˈavjo vˌinapendˈeza katˌika mwˈendo wˈao, nˈaam, vˈinne ambˈavjo hˌutembˈea kwa mwˈendo wa madˈaha.|0
sˈimba, mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa waɲˈama, ˌasijerˈudi ɲˈuma kwa tʃotʃˈote.|0
ɟoɡˈoo ˌatembeˈaje kwa marˈiŋɡo, pˈia bebˈeru, nˌaje mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˌililˌomzuŋɡˈuka.|0
kwa maˈana kˌama vˈile kˌusukasˈuka mazˈiwa hutˈoa siˈaɡi, na pˈia kˈule kufˈiɲa pˈua hutˈoa dˈamu, kˌaðalˈika kˌutʃotʃˈea hasˈira hˌutokˈeza uɡˈomvi.|0
ˈee mwanˈaŋɡu, ˈee mwˈana wa tˈumbo lˈaŋɡu, ˈee mwˈana wa naðˈiri zˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌusitumˈie ŋɡˈuvu zˈako kwa wˌanawˈake, ˌuhodˈari wˈako kwa wˈale wˌanaˌowaharˈibu wafˈalme.|0
ˈee lˌemuˈeli, hˌaifˈai wafˈalme, hˌaifˈai wafˈalme kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo, hˌaifˈai wˌatawˈala kˌutamˈani sˈana kilˈeo.|0
wasˈiɟe wakˈaɲua na kˌusahˈau vˈile ʃerˈia ˌinavjˌoamˈuru na kˌuwaɲˈima hˈaki zˈao wˈote wˌaliˌoonˈewa.|0
wˈape kilˈeo wˈale wˌanaˌoaŋɡamˈia, mvˈiɲo wˈale walˈio na utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
wˈaɲue na kˌusahˈau ˌumaskˈini wˌao na wˌasikumbˈuke taˈabu jˈao tˈena.|0
sˈema kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌasiowˈeza kˌuɟisemˈea, kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaki za wˈote wˌalioˈatʃwa ukˈiwa.|0
sˈema na ˌuamˈue kwa hˈaki, tetˈea hˈaki za maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi.|0
ˈm̩ke mwˌeɲe sˈifa nzˈuri, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kumpˈata? jˌeje ni wa θamˈani sˈana kulˈiko mˌariɟˈani.|0
mˈume wˌake ˌanamwamˈini kˌikamilˈifu wˈala hakˈosi kˈitu tʃotʃˈote tʃa θamˈani.|0
hˌumtendˈea mumˈewe mˈema, wˈala si mabˈaja, sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
hˌutʃaɡˈua sˈufu na kitˈani nˌaje hufˈaɲa kˈazi kwa mikˈono jˌeɲe bidˈii.|0
jˌeje ni kˌama mˈeli za bˌiaʃˈara ˌakilˈeta tʃakˈula tʃˈake kutˈoka mbˈali.|0
jˌeje huˈamka kuŋɡˈali bˈado ɡˈiza huwˈapa ɟamˈaa jˌake tʃakˈula na mafˈuŋɡu kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike.|0
hˌuaŋɡalˈia ʃˈamba na kˌulinunˈua, kˌutokˈana na mapˈato jˌake hupˈanda ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu.|0
hufˈaɲa kˈazi zˌake kwa ŋɡˈuvu, mikˈono jˌake ˈina ŋɡˈuvu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi zˈake.|0
huˈona kwˌamba bˌiaʃˈara jˌake ˈina faˈida, wˈala tˈaa jˌake hˌaizimˈiki usˈiku.|0
huwˈeka mikˈono jˌake kwˈeɲe pˈia, nˈavjo vidˈole vjˈake hˌuʃikilˈia kiɟˈiti tʃˌeɲe ˈuzi.|0
hˌuwaɲˌooʃˈea maskˈini mikˈono jˌake na kˌuwakˌuɲɟulˈia wˌahitˈaɟi vitˈaŋɡa vjˈake.|0
θelˈuɟi ˌiʃukˈapo, hˈana hˈofu kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake, kwa maˈana wˈote wˌamevˈikwa ŋɡˈuo za kutˈia ɟˈoto.|0
hˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˌazulˈia ja urˈembo ja kˌufunˈika kitˈanda tʃˈake, jˌeje huvˈaa kitˈani sˈafi na ˌuruɟuˈani.|0
mˈume wˌake ˌanahˌeʃimˈiwa kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi, ˌaketˈipo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wazˈee wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
hˌuteŋɡenˈeza mavˈazi ja kitˈani na kˌujaˈuza, nˌaje hˌuwauzˈia wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara miʃˈipi.|0
ˌamevˈikwa ŋɡˈuvu na heʃˈima, ˌanawˈeza kutʃˈeka bˌila kˌuwa na hˈofu kwa sˈiku ziɟˈazo.|0
hˌuzuŋɡˈumza kwa hekˈima na mˌafundˈiʃo ja kˌuaminˈika jˈapo ˌulimˈini mwˈake.|0
hˌuaŋɡalˈia mˈambo ja ɲumbˈani mwˈake wˈala hˈali tʃakˈula tʃa uvˈivu.|0
wˌanawˈake wˈeŋɡi hufˈaɲa vˈitu vjˌeɲe sˈifa nzˈuri, lakˈini wˌewe ˌumewapˈita wˈote.|0
kˌuɟipˈamba ˌili kˌuvutˈia ni ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na uzˈuri ˌunapˈita upˈesi, bˌali mwanˈamke ˌanajˈemtʃa bwˈana ˌatasifˈiwa.|0
ˈm̩pe θawˈabu ˌanajˌostahˈili, nˈazo kˈazi zˌake na zˌimletˈee sˈifa kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ˈm̩ɟi.|0
manˈeno ja mhubˈiri, mwˈana wa daˈudi, mfˈalme hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌubatˈili mtˈupu! ˌubatˈili mtˈupu! mhubˈiri ˌanasˈema. ˌubatˈili mtˈupu! kˈila kˈitu ni ˌubatˈili.|0
mwˌanadˈamu ˌanafaˈidi nˈini kˌutokˈana na kˈazi jˌake jˈote ˌanajˌotaˌabikˈia tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
vizˈazi hˈuɟa na vizˈazi hupˈita, lakˈini dunˈia ˌinadˈumu milˈele.|0
ɟˈua hˌutʃomˈoza na ɟˈua huzˈama, nˈalo hˌuharakˈiʃa kurˈudi mˌawiˈoni.|0
upˈepo huvˈuma kˌuelekˈea kusˈini na kˌuɡeukˈia kˌaskazˈini, hˌurudˈia mzuŋɡˈuko hˈuo hˈuo, daˈima ˌukirudˈia ɲɟˈia jˈake.|0
mˈito jˈote hˌutirirˈika bˌaharˈini, hˌata hˈivjo bahˈari kˈamwe hˌaiɟˈai. mahˈali mˈito ˌinapotˈoka, hˌuko hurˈudi tˈena.|0
vˈitu vjˈote vˌinatʃˈoʃa, zaˈidi kulˈiko ˈm̩tu ˌanavjowˈeza kusˈema. ɟˈitʃo kˈamwe hˌalitoʃˈeki kˌutazˈama, wˈala sikˈio hˌaliʃˈibi kˌusikˈia.|0
kˈile kˌilitʃˌokuwˈepo kˌitakuwˈepo tˈena, kˈile kˌilitʃˌofaɲˈika kˌitafaɲˈika tˈena, hakˈuna kilˈitʃo kˈipja tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
kˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeza kusˈema, tazˈama! kˈitu hˈiki ni kˈipja? kˌilikuwˈepo ʃˈu zamˈani za kˈale, kˌilikuwˈepo kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈetu.|0
hakˈuna kˌumbukˈumbu ja wˈatu wa zamˈani, hˌata na wˈale ambˈao hˌawaɟˈaɟa bˈado hˌawatˌakumbˈukwa na wˈale wˌatakˌaofuˈata bˌaadˈaje.|0
nˌilitumˈia mˈuda wˈaŋɡu wˈote kˌuɟifˈunza na kˌuvumbˈua kwa hekˈima jˈote jˌanajˌofaɲˈika tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu. ɟˈinsi ɡˈani mˈuŋɡu ˌamewˈeka mzˈiɡo mzˈito ɟˌuːja wˌanadˈamu.|0
nˌimeʃaˈona mˈambo jˈote jˌanajˌotendˈeka tʃˈini ja ɟˈua, hˈajo jˈote ni ˌubatˈili, hˌii ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
kˌilitʃˌopindˈika hˌakiwˈezi kˌuɲoˈoʃwa, kˈile ambˈatʃo hakˈipo hˌaiwˌezekˈani kˌukihesˈabu.|0
nˌiliwˈaza mweɲˈewe, tazˈama, nˌimekˈua na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka katˌika hekˈima kulˈiko jejˈote ˌalijewˈahi kˌutawˈala jˌerusalˈemu kˈabla jˈaŋɡu. nˌimekˈuwa na ˌuzoˈefu mkˈubwa wa hekˈima na mˌaarˈifa.|0
ndˈipo nˌilipˌoɟitahˈidi kˌufahˈamu kˌutofˌautˈiʃa hekˈima, wazˈimu na ˌupumbˈavu, lakˈini nˌikatambˈua hˌata hˈili nˈalo ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
kwa kˌuwa hekˈima ɲˈiŋɡi hulˈeta huzˈuni kˈubwa; mˌaarˈifa jˌanapˌooŋɡezˈeka, mˌasikitˈiko jˌanaˌoŋɡezˈeka.|0
nˌikafikˈiri mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, hˈaja bˈasi, nˌitakˌuɟarˈibu kwa anˈasa niˈone ni lˈipi lilˈilo ɟˈema. lakˈini hˌilo nˈalo lˌikaˌonekˈana ni ˌubatˈili.|0
nˌikasˈema, kitʃˈeko nˈatʃo ni ˌupumbˈavu. nˈajo mˌatokˈeo ja anˈasa ni nˈini.|0
nˌikaɟarˈibu kˌuɟifˌurahˈiʃa kwa mvˈiɲo na kˌukumbatˈia ˌupumbˈavu, hˈuku bˈado akˈili jˈaŋɡu ˌinanˌioŋɡˈoza kwa hekˈima. nˌilitˈaka kuˈona ni lˈipi bˈora wˈatu wafˈaɲe kwa sˈiku tʃˈatʃe wˌanazoˈiʃi tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
nˌikafˈaɲa mirˈadi mikˈubwa: nˌikaɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea maɟˈumba na kulˈima maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu.|0
nˌikatˌeŋɡenˈeza bustˈani na viwˈaɲɟa vja starˈehe nˌikaotˈeʃa hˌuko kˈila aˈina ja mˈiti ja matˈunda.|0
nˌikaɟˈeŋɡa mabwˈawa ja kˌukusˈaɲa mˈaɟi ja kˌuɲueʃˈea hˌii mˈiti ˌilijokˈuwa ˌinastˈawi vizˈuri.|0
nˌikanunˈua watˈumwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike na watˈumwa weŋɡˈine wˌalizalˈiwa ɲumbˈani mwˈaŋɡu. pˈia nˌilikˈuwa na makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe, kondˈoo na mbˈuzi kulˈiko ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌalijewˈahi kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu kˈabla jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌikaɟˌikusaɲˈia fˈeða na ðahˈabu, hazˈina za wafˈalme na za maɟˈimbo. nˌikaɟˌipatˈia wˌaimbˈaɟi wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake, nˈazo ɲˈumba za mˌasurˈia: vˈitu ambˈavjo mˈojo wa mwˌanadˈamu hˌufurahˈia.|0
nikˈawa mˌaarˈufu sˈana kulˈiko ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌalijepˈata kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu kˈabla jˈaŋɡu. katˌika hˈaja jˈote bˈado nikˈawa nˈina hekˈima.|0
sˌikuɟiɲˈima kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ambˈatʃo mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌalikˌitamˈani, hakˈuna anˈasa ambˈajo nˌiliuɲˈima mˈojo wˈaŋɡu. mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌulifˌurahˈia kˈazi zˈaŋɡu zˈote, hˌii ˌilikˈuwa θawˈabu ja kˈazi zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˌilipokˈuɟa kˌuaŋɡalˈia jˈote ambˈajo mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa ˌimefˈaɲa na jˈale nˌilijˌotaabˈika kˌukamilˈiʃa, kˈila kˈitu kˌilikˈuwa ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo; hˌapakˈuwa na faˈida jojˈote tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaɡeˈuza mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu kˌufikirˈia hekˈima, wazˈimu na ˌupumbˈavu. ni nˈini zaˈidi ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌetawˈala baˌada ja mfˈalme ˌanatʃowˈeza kufˈaɲa ambˈatʃo hˌakiɟafˈaɲua.|0
nˌikaˈona kˌuwa hekˈima ni bˈora kulˈiko ˌupumbˈavu, kˌama vˈile nˈuru ilˈivjo bˈora kulˈiko ɡˈiza.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˈana mˈatʃo katˌika kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, lakˈini mpumbˈavu ˌanatembˈea ɡizˈani; lakˈini nikˈaɟa kuˈona kwˌamba wˈote wawˈili hatˈima jˈao ˌinafanˈana.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikafikˈiri mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, hatˈima ja mpumbˈavu ˌitanipˈata mˌimi pˈia. nˌitafaˈidi nˈini bˌasi kwa kˌuwa na hekˈima? nˌikasˈema mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, hˈili nˈalo ni ˌubatˈili.|0
kwa maˈana kwa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima, kˌama ilˈivjo kwa mpumbˈavu, hˌatakumbˈukwa kwa mˈuda mrˈefu, katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo wˈote wˌatasˌahaulˈika. kˌama vˈile ilˈivjo kwa mpumbˈavu, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima pˈia lazˈima ˌatakˈufa.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikatʃukˈia maˈiʃa, kwa sabˈabu kˈazi ˌinajˌofaɲˈika tʃˈini ja ɟˈua ˌilikˈuwa mˌasikitˈiko kwˈaŋɡu. jˈote hˈajo ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
nˌikatʃukˈia kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃokˈuwa nˌimetˌaabikˈia tʃˈini ja ɟˈua, kwa sabˈabu ni lazˈima nˌimwatʃˈie jˈule aɟˈaje baˌada jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje kˌama ˌatakˈuwa ni ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌau mpumbˈavu? lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetawˈala kˈazi zˈote ambˈazo nˌimemˌiminˈia ɟuhˈudi na ustˈadi tʃˈini ja ɟˈua. hˈili nˈalo ni ˌubatˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌukaˈanza kukˈata tamˈaa ɟˌuːja kˈazi jˈaŋɡu jˈote nˌilijˌoifˈaɲa kwa taˈabu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲa kˈazi jˌake kwa hekˈima, mˌaarˈifa na ustˈadi, kˈiʃa ˌanalˌazimˈika kuˈatʃa vjˈote alˈivjo nˈavjo kwa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ambˈaje hˌaɟavˌifaɲˈia kˈazi. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili tˈena ni balˈaa kˈubwa.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌatapˈata nˈini kwa taˈabu jˈote na kˌuhaŋɡaˈika kwa bidˈii katˌika kˈazi ˌanajˌotaˌabikˈia tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
sˈiku zˌake zˈote kˈazi jˌake ni mˌaumˈivu na mˌasikitˈiko, hˌata usˈiku akˈili jˌake hˌaipˈati mˌapumzˈiko. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili.|0
hakˈuna kˈitu bˈora ˌanatʃowˈeza kufˈaɲa ˈm̩tu zaˈidi ja kˈula na kˈuɲua na kˌuriðˈika katˌika kˈazi jˈake. hˈili nˈalo pˈia, nˌinaˈona, lˌatokˈana na mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu pasˈipo jˈeje, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˈula na kˌufurˈahi.|0
kwa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌempendˈeza mˈuŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu hˈumpa hekˈima, mˌaarˈifa na furˈaha, bˌali kwa mwˌeɲe ðˈambi mˈuŋɡu hˈumpa kˈazi ja kˌukusˈaɲa na kˌuhifˈaði ˌutaɟˈiri ˌili mˈuŋɡu ˈampe jˈule ˌanajempˈenda. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
kˈuna wakˈati kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila ɟˈambo, nˈajo maɟˈira kwa kˈila tˈendo tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu.|0
wakˈati wa kˌuzalˈiwa na wakˈati wa kˈufa, wakˈati wa kupˈanda na wakˈati wa kuŋɡˈoa jˌalijopˈandwa.|0
wakˈati wa kuˈua na wakˈati wa kupˈoɲa, wakˈati wa kˌubomˈoa, na wakˈati wa kuɟˈeŋɡa.|0
wakˈati wa kulˈia na wakˈati wa kutʃˈeka, wakˈati wa kˌuombolˈeza na wakˈati wa kutʃˈeza.|0
wakˈati wa kˌutawˈaɲa mˈawe na wakˈati wa kˌukusˈaɲa mˈawe, wakˈati wa kˌukumbatˈia na wakˈati wa kˌutokˌumbatˈia.|0
wakˈati wa kˌutafˈuta na wakˈati wa kˌupotˈeza, wakˈati wa kuwˈeka na wakˈati wa kutˈupa.|0
wakˈati wa kˌurarˈua na wakˈati wa kuʃˈona, wakˈati wa kˌuɲamˈaza na wakˈati wa kˌuzuŋɡˈumza.|0
wakˈati wa kupˈenda na wakˈati wa kˌutʃukˈia, wakˈati wa vˈita na wakˈati wa amˈani.|0
mfˌaɲakˈazi ˌanapˈata faˈida ɡˈani kˌutokˈana na taˈabu jˈake.|0
nˌimeˈona mzˈiɡo mˈuŋɡu ˌaliowˈeka ɟˌuːja wˌanadˈamu.|0
ˌamefˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu kˈiwe kizˈuri kwa wakˈati wˈake. pˈia ˌameiwˈeka hˈijo milˈele katˌika miˈojo ja wˌanadˈamu, wˈala hˌawawˈezi kˌutambˈua kwa kˈina jˈale ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu ˌamefˈaɲa ʃˈu mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo.|0
nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba hakˈuna kˈitu bˈora kwa wˌanadˈamu kulˈiko kˌuwa na furˈaha na kutˈenda mˈema wakˈati wˌanapoˈiʃi.|0
tˈena ni karˈama ja mˈuŋɡu kˈila ˈm̩tu apˈate kˈula na kˈuɲua na kˌuɟibˌurudˈiʃa kwa mˈema katˌika kˈazi jˌake jˈote.|0
nˌinaɟˈua kwˌamba kˈila kˈitu ˌanatʃˌokifˈaɲa mˈuŋɡu kˌitadˈumu milˈele, hakˈuna kˌinatʃowˈeza kˌuoŋɡˈezwa ˌau kˌupuŋɡˈuzwa. mˈuŋɡu hufˈaɲa hˈivjo ˌili wˈatu wˈamtʃe jˈeje.|0
tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˈopo kˌiliʃˌakuwˈepo, na kˌitakˌatʃokuwˈepo kˌimekwˌiʃakuwˈepo kˈabla; nˌaje mˈuŋɡu hˌujaˈita jˈale jˌalijopˈita jarˈudi tˈena.|0
pˈia nˌikaˈona kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tˈena tʃˈini ja ɟˈua: mahˈali pa kˌutolˈea hukˈumu, uˈovu ˌulikuwˈepo, mahˈali pa kˌupatˈia hˈaki, uˈovu ˌulikuwˈepo.|0
nˌikafikˈiri mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, mˈuŋɡu ˌatawalˈeta hˌukumˈuni wˈote wawˈili wˌeɲe hˈaki na waˈovu, kwa maˈana kˌutakuwˈako na wakˈati kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila ɟˈambo, wakˈati kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila tˈendo.|0
pˈia nˌikafikˈiri, kuhˈusu wˌanadˈamu, mˈuŋɡu hˌuwaɟarˈibu ˌili wˌaɟiˈone kwˌamba wˌao ni kˌama waɲˈama.|0
hatˈima ja mwˌanadˈamu ni kˌama ˈile ja waɲˈama; wˈote wˈana mwˈiʃo ˌunaˌofanˈana: ɟˈinsi ˌanavjokˈufa mɲˈama, ndˈivjo ˌanavjokˈufa mwˌanadˈamu. wˈote wˈana pˈumzi ˌinajˌofanˈana; mwˌanadˈamu hˈana tʃa zaˈidi kulˈiko mɲˈama. kˈila kˈitu ni ˌubatˈili.|0
wˈote huˈenda mahˈali pˌanapˌofanˈana; wˈote hutˈoka mˌavumbˈini, mˌavumbˈini wˈote hurˈudi.|0
ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje kˌama rˈoho ja ˈm̩tu huˈenda ɟˈuu na rˈoho ja mɲˈama huʃˈuka tʃˈini arðˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikaˈona kwˌamba hakˈuna kˈitu kilˈitʃo bˈora zaˈidi kwa mwˌanadˈamu kulˈiko kˌuifˌurahˈia kˈazi jˈake, kwa sabˈabu hˌilo ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu lˈake. kwa maˈana ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumrudˈiʃa ˌili ˈaɟe kuˈona kˈile kˌitakˌatʃotendˈeka baˌada jˈake.|0
nˌikatazˈama tˈena nˌikaˈona ˌuonˈevu wˈote ˌuliokˈuwa ˌunafaɲˈika tʃˈini ja ɟˈua: nˌikaˈona matʃˈozi ja wˌaliˌoonˈewa, wˈala hawˈana wa kˌuwafarˈiɟi; uwˈezo ˌulikˈuwa upˈande wa wˈale wˌanaˌowaonˈea, wˈala hawˈana wa kˌuwafarˈiɟi.|0
nˌami nˌikasˈema kwˌamba wˈafu, wˌaliokwˈiʃa kˈufa, wˈana furˈaha kulˈiko wˈatu walˈio hˈai, ambˈao bˈado wˌanaˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini alˈije bˈora kulˈiko hˈao wawˈili ni jˈule ambˈaje hˌaɟazalˈiwa bˈado, ambˈaje hˌaɟaˈona ˈule uˈovu ˌunaˌofaɲˈika tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
tˈena nˌikaˈona kˌuwa kˈazi zˈote na mˌafanikˈio jˈote hˌutʃipˈuka kˌutokˈana na wˈivu wa ˈm̩tu kwa ɟirˈani jˈake. hˈili nˈalo ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
mpumbˈavu hukˈuɲɟa mikˈono jˌake na kˌuɟiˌaŋɡamˈiza mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˈonzi mˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na ˌutulˈivu kulˈiko kˈonzi mbˈili pamˈoɟa na taˈabu na kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
tˈena nˌikaˈona kˈitu kiŋɡˈine kilˈitʃo ˌubatˈili tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
kˌulikuwˈepo mwˌanadˈamu alˈije pˈeke jˈake, hakˈuwa na mwˈana wˈala ndˈuɡu. hˌapakˈuwa na mwˈiʃo wa kˈazi jˈake, hˌata hˈivjo mˈatʃo jˌake hˌajakˌutoʃˈeka na ˌutaɟˈiri wˈake. ˌaliulˈiza, nˌinaɟˌitaabˈiʃa hˈivi kwa aɟˈili ja nˈani, nˌami kwa nˈini nˌinaɟiɲˈima kˌufurahˈia? hˈili pˈia ni ˌubatˈili, ni ʃuɣˈuli jˌeɲe taˈabu.|0
wawˈili ni ˌafaðˈali kulˈiko mmˈoɟa, kwa sabˈabu wˈana malˈipo mazˈuri kwa kˈazi jˈao.|0
kˌama mmˈoɟa ˌakiaŋɡˈuka, mwenzˈake ˌatamwinˈua. lakˈini ni ɟˈambo la kˌuhuzunˈiʃa kwa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌaaŋɡukˈaje nˌaje hˈana wa kˌumwinˈua.|0
pˈia, kˌama wawˈili wˌakilˈala pamˈoɟa wˌatapaʃˈana ɟˈoto. lakˈini ni vˈipi ˈm̩tu awˈeza kˌuɟipˈaʃa ɟˈoto mweɲˈewe.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa awˈeza kuʃˈindwa, wˈatu wawˈili wˌanawˈeza kˌumkabˈili adˈui na kumʃˈinda. kˈamba ja ɲˈuzi tˈatu hˌaikatˈiki kwa ˌurahˈisi.|0
ˌafaðˈali kiɟˈana maskˈini mwˌeɲe hekˈima kulˈiko mfˈalme m̩zˈee mpumbˈavu ambˈaje haɟˈui tˈena kˌupokˈea maˈoɲo.|0
kiɟˈana hˈujo ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌutokˈea ɡˌerezˈani ˌakapˈata ufˈalme, ˌau ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuwa ˌamezalˈiwa katˌika ˌumaskˈini kwˈeɲe hˈuo ufˈalme.|0
nˌikaˈona kwˌamba wˈote wˌalioˈiʃi na kˌutembˈea tʃˈini ja ɟˈua wˌalimfuˈata kiɟˈana, ˌalijˌepokˈea ufˈalme.|0
hˌapakˈuwa na kikˈomo tʃa wˈatu wˈote ˌaliˌowatawˈala. lakˈini wˈale wˌaliokˈuɟa bˌaadˈaje hˌawakˌufurahˈia kˈazi ja jˈule ˌalijˌepokˈea ufˈalme. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
lˈinda hatˈua zˈako ˌuendˈapo katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu. kˌaribˈia ˌusikilˈize kulˈiko kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja wˌapumbˈavu, ambˈao hˌawaɟˈui kˌuwa wˌanafˈaɲa kˈosa.|0
usˈiwe mwepˈesi kˌuzuŋɡˈumza, usˈiwe na harˈaka katˌika mˈojo wˈako kˌuzuŋɡˈumza lolˈote mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu. mˈuŋɡu jˈuko mbiŋɡˈuni nˌawe ˈuko dˌuniˈani, kwa hˈijo manˈeno jˈako na jˈawe matʃˈatʃe.|0
kˌama vˈile ndˈoto hˈuɟa wakˈati kˈuna ʃuɣˈuli ɲˈiŋɡi, ndˈivjo jalˈivjo mˌazuŋɡˈumzo ja mpumbˈavu wakˈati kˈuna manˈeno mˈeŋɡi.|0
wakˈati ˌunapˌomwekˈea mˈuŋɡu naðˈiri, ˌusikawˈie kˌuitimˈiza. jˌeje hˌafurahˈii wˌapumbˈavu; timˈiza naðˈiri jˈako.|0
ni ˌafaðˈali ˌusiwˈeke naðˈiri kulˈiko kˌuiwˈeka na ˌusiˌitimˈize.|0
ˌusiruhˈusu kˈiɲua tʃˈako kˌukuiŋɡˈiza ðambˈini. tˈena ˌusiɟˌitetˈee mbˈele ja hˈujo mɟˈumbe wa hˌekalˈuni, ˌukisˈema, nˌiliwˈeka naðˈiri kwa makˈosa. kwa nˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌakasirˈike kwa aɟˈili ja jˈale ˌunajosˈema na kˌuiharˈibu kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈako.|0
kuˈota ndˈoto kwˈiŋɡi na manˈeno mˈeŋɡi ni ˌubatˈili. kwa hˈijo simˈama katˌika kˈitʃo tʃa mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˌama ˌukiˈona maskˈini wˌanaonˈewa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, hukˈumu na hˈaki vˌikipotˈoʃwa, ˌusiʃaŋɡˈazwe na mˈambo hˈajo, kwa maˈana afˈisa mmˈoɟa ˌanaˌaŋɡalˈiwa na alˈije ɟˈuu jˌake zaˈidi na ɟˌuːja hˈao wawˈili kˈuna weŋɡˈine walˈio ɟˈuu zaˈidi jˈao.|0
mˌafanikˈio ja ˈn̩tʃi ni kwa aɟˈili ja wˈote, hˌata mfˈalme mweɲˈewe hˌufaˈidi kutˈoka mˌaʃambˈani.|0
jejˈote ˌapendˈaje fˈeða kˈamwe hˌatoʃˈeki na fˈeða; jejˈote ˌapendˈaje ˌutaɟˈiri kˈamwe hˌatoʃˈeki na kipˈato tʃˈake. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili.|0
mˈali ˌikiˌoŋɡezˈeka, ndˈivjo walˈaɟi wˌanavjˌooŋɡezˈeka. hˌii nˈajo ˌinamfˌaidˈia nˈini mwˌeɲe mˈali ˌisipokˈuwa ni kˌuʃibˈiʃa mˈatʃo jˈake.|0
ˌusiŋɡˈizi wa kˌibarˈua ni mtˈamu, ˈawe ˌamekˈula kidˈoɡo ˌau kˈiŋɡi, lakˈini wˈiŋɡi wa mˈali humɲˈima taɟˈiri ˌusiŋɡˈizi.|0
nˌimeʃaˈona uˈovu mzˈito tʃˈini ja ɟˈua: ˌutaɟˈiri ˌuliˌolimbikˈizwa kwa kˌuɟiɲˈima na kulˈeta maðˈara kwa mwˌeɲe mˈali.|0
ˌau ˌutaɟˈiri ˌuliˌopotˈea kwa bahˈati m̩bˈaja, hˈivjo kwˌamba wakˈati akˈiwa na mwˈana hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃobˈaki kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu hutˈoka tumbˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama jˌake ˈutʃi, nˌaje ɟˈinsi ˌalivjokˈuɟa vˈivjo hˈivjo hˌuondˈoka. hˌatʃukˈui tʃotʃˈote kˌutokˈana na kˈazi jˌake ambˈatʃo ˌanawˈeza kˌukibˈeba mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
hˈili nˈalo ni bˈaja la kˌusikitˈiʃa: kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu aɟˈavjo, vˈivjo hˈivjo hˌuondˈoka, nˌaje ˌanapˈata faˈida ɡˈani, mˌaadˈamu hˌutaabˈika kwa aɟˈili ja upˈepo.|0
sˈiku zˌake zˈote hˈula ɡizˈani, pamˈoɟa na faðˈaa kˈubwa, matˈeso na hasˈira.|0
ndˈipo nˌikatambˈua kwˌamba ni vjˈema na sahˈihi kwa ˈm̩tu kˈula na kˈuɲua na kˌutoʃˈeka katˌika kˈazi jˌake ŋɡˈumu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua katˌika sˈiku tʃˈatʃe za maˈiʃa jˌake mˈuŋɡu ˌalizˈompa, kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu lˈake.|0
zaˈidi ja jˈote, mˈuŋɡu ˌanapˈompa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌutaɟˈiri na mˈilki, hˌumwezˈeʃa kˌuvifˌurahˈia, kˌukubˈali fˈuŋɡu lˈake na kˌuwa na furˈaha katˌika kˈazi jˈake, hˌii ni karˈama ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˈara tʃˈatʃe ˈm̩tu hˌuzifikˈiri sˈiku za maˈiʃa jˈake, kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu humfˈaɲa aʃˈikwe na furˈaha ja mojˈoni.|0
nˌimeˈona ubˈaja mwiŋɡˈine tʃˈini ja ɟˈua, nˌao ˌunalemˈea sˈana wˌanadˈamu.|0
mˈuŋɡu hˈumpa mwˌanadˈamu ˌutaɟˈiri, mˈali na heʃˈima, hˈivjo hˌakukˈosa tʃotʃˈote mˈojo wˌake ˌunatʃˌokitamˈani. lakˈini mˈuŋɡu hˌamwezˈeʃi kˌuvifˌurahˈia, badˈala jˌake mɡˈeni n̩dˈije ˌanajˌevifˌurahˈia. hˈili ni ˌubatˈili, ni ubˈaja ˌunaˌosikitˈiʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌanawˈeza kˌuwa na watˈoto mˈia mˈoɟa nˌaje ˌakaˈiʃi miˈaka mˈiŋɡi, lakˈini hˌaiðˈuru kˌuwa ˌataˈiʃi mˈuda mrˈefu kiˈasi ɡˈani, kˌama hawˈezi kˌufurahˈia mˌafanikˈio jˌake na kwˌamba hapˈati mazˈiʃi ja heʃˈima, nˌinasˈema ˌafaðˈali mtˈoto ˌalijˌezalˈiwa akˈiwa ˌamekˈufa kulˈiko jˈeje.|0
kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈake hakˈuna maˈana, hˌuondokˈea ɡizˈani na ɡizˈani ɟˈina lˈake hˌufunˈikwa.|0
iŋɡˈawa hˌakuwˈahi kˌuliˈona ɟˈua wˈala kuɟˈua kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, jˌeje ˈana pumzˈiko zaˈidi kulˈiko ˈm̩tu hˈujo.|0
hˌata kˌama hˈujo ˈm̩tu ˌataˈiʃi miˈaka ˈelfu mˈara mbˈili na zaˈidi, lakˈini ˌakaʃˈindwa kˌufurahˈia mˌafanikˈio jˈake, ɟˈe, wˈote hˌawaˈendi sehˈemu mˈoɟa.|0
ɟuhˈudi zˈote za bˌinadˈamu ni kwa aɟˈili ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake, hˌata hˈivjo hˈamu jˌake kˈamwe hˌaitˌoʃelˈezwi.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˈana faˈida ɡˈani zaˈidi ja mpumbˈavu? ˈm̩tu maskˈini ˌanapˈata faˈida ɡˈani kwa kuɟˈua ɟˈinsi ja kˌuɟistˈahi mbˈele ja wˈatu weŋɡˈine.|0
ni bˈora kˈile ambˈatʃo ɟˈitʃo lˌinakiˈona kulˈiko hˈamu ˌisijˌotoʃelˈezwa. hˈili nˈalo ni ˌubatˈili, ni kˌukimbˈiza upˈepo.|0
lolˈote lˌililˈopo lˌimekwˈiʃa kupˈewa ɟˈina, nˌaje mwˌanadˈamu alˈivjo ˌameʃˌaɟulikˈana; hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌawezˈaje kˌuʃindˈana na mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko jˈeje.|0
manˈeno jˌanavjokˈuwa mˈeŋɡi, ndˈivjo jˌanavjokˈosa maˈana, ɟˈe, hˌilo lˌinamfˌaidˈia vˈipi jejˈote.|0
kwa maˈana ni nˈani ˌanajeɟˈua lilˈilo ɟˈema kwa aɟˈili ja maˈiʃa ja mwˌanadˈamu, katˌika sˈiku tʃˈatʃe na za ˌubatˈili ˌanazopˈita kˌama kivˈuli? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumwambˈia jˌatakˌajotokˈea tʃˈini ja ɟˈua baˌada ja jˌeje kˌuondˈoka.|0
ˌafaðˈali sˈifa nzˈuri kulˈiko mˌanukˈato sˈafi, nˈajo sˈiku ja kˈufa kulˈiko ja kˌuzalˈiwa.|0
ˌafaðˈali kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja msˈiba kulˈiko kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja karˈamu, kwa kˌuwa kˈifo ni hatˈima ja kˈila mwˌanadˈamu, ˌimewapˈasa walˈio hˈai kˌuliwˈeka hˈili mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
huzˈuni ni ˌafaðˈali kulˈiko kitʃˈeko, kwa sabˈabu ˈuso wˌeɲe huzˈuni wafˈaa kwa mˈojo.|0
mˈojo wa wˌeɲe hekˈima ˈuko katˌika ɲˈumba ja msˈiba, lakˈini mˈojo wa wˌapumbˈavu ˈuko katˌika ɲˈumba ja anˈasa.|0
ˌafaðˈali kˌusikˈia kˌaripˈio la ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima, kulˈiko kˌusikilˈiza wˈimbo wa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
kˌama ilˈivjo kˌuvuɲɟˈika kwa miˈiba tʃˈini ja sˌufurˈia, ndˈivjo kilˈivjo kitʃˈeko tʃa wˌapumbˈavu. hˈili nˈalo pˈia ni ˌubatˈili.|0
ðulˈuma humfˈaɲa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima kˌuwa mpumbˈavu, nˈajo rˈuʃwa hˌuuharˈibu mˈojo.|0
mwˈiʃo wa ɟˈambo ni bˈora kulˈiko mwˈanzo wˈake, ˌuvumilˈivu ni bˈora kulˈiko kibˈuri.|0
usˈiwe mwepˈesi kˌukasirˈika rohˈoni mwˈako, kwa kˌuwa hasˈira hukˈaa kˌifuˈani ˌm̩wa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
ˌusisˈeme, kwa nˈini sˈiku za kˈale zˌilikˈuwa bˈora kulˈiko sˈiku hˈizi? kwa maˈana si hekˈima kˌuulˈiza maswˈali kˌama hˈajo.|0
hekˈima, kˌama ulˈivjo urˈiθi, ni kˈitu tʃˈema na hˌuwafˌaidˈia wˈale wˌalionˈalo ɟˈua.|0
hekˈima ni ulˈinzi kˌama fˈeða ilˈivjo ulˈinzi, lakˈini faˈida ja mˌaarˈifa ni hˌii: kwˌamba hekˈima hˌuhifˈaði maˈiʃa ja alˈije nˈajo.|0
tˌafakˈari kˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalitʃˌokitˈenda: nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuɲoˈoʃa kˈile ambˈatʃo jˌeje ˌamekipˈinda.|0
ɲakˈati zikˈiwa nzˈuri, ˌufurˈahi, lakˈini ɲakˈati zikˈiwa m̩bˈaja, tˌafakˈari: mˈuŋɡu ˌamefˈaɲa hˈijo mˈoɟa, nˈaam, saɲɟˈari na hˈijo ɲiŋɡˈine. kwa hˈijo, mwˌanadˈamu hawˈezi kˌuɡundˈua kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kuhˈusu maˈiʃa jˌake ja bˌaadˈaje.|0
katˌika maˈiʃa hˈaja jˈaŋɡu ja ˌubatˈili nˌimeʃaˈona hˈaja mawˈili: ˈm̩tu mwˌadilˈifu ˌakiˌaŋɡamˈia katˌika ˌuadilˈifu wˈake, nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌakiˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu katˌika uˈovu wˈake.|0
usˈiwe mwˌeɲe hˈaki kupˈita kiˈasi, wˈala usˈiwe na hekˈima kupˈita kiˈasi: kwa nˈini kˌuɟiˌaŋɡamˈiza mweɲˈewe.|0
usˈiwe mwˈovu kupˈita kiˈasi, wˈala usˈiwe mpumbˈavu: kwa nˈini kˈufa kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈako.|0
ni vjˈema kuʃˈika hˌilo mˈoɟa na wˈala ˌusiˈatʃe hˌilo ɟiŋɡˈine lˌikupˈite. ˈm̩tu amtʃˈaje mˈuŋɡu ˌataepˈuka hˌuko kupˈita kiˈasi.|0
hekˈima humfˈaɲa jˌeje alˈije nˈajo kˌuwa na uwˈezo zaˈidi kulˈiko wˌatawˈala kˈumi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi.|0
hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki dˌuniˈani ambˈaje hufˈaɲa mˈambo ja hˈaki na kˈamwe ˌasitˈende ðˈambi.|0
ˌusitˈie mˌaanˈani kˈila nˈeno lˌinalosˈemwa na wˈatu, la sˈivjo, wawˈeza kˌumsikˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈako ˌakikˌulaˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌunafahˈamu mojˈoni mwˈako kwˌamba wˌewe mweɲˈewe mˈara ɲˈiŋɡi ˌumewˌalaˈani weŋɡˈine.|0
jˈote hˈaja nˌilijˌaɟarˈibu kwa hekˈima, nˌikasˈema, nˌimeamˈua kˌuwa na hekˈima: lakˈini hˌii ˌilikˈuwa ɲɟˈe ja uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu.|0
vjovjˈote hekˈima ilˈivjo, hekˈima ˈiko mbˈali sˈana na ˌimeɟifˈitʃa, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuiɡundˈua.|0
nˌikaɡeˈuza fikˈira zˈaŋɡu ˌili kˌuelˈewa, kˌutʃuŋɡˈuza na kˌuitafˈuta hekˈima na kusˈudi la mˈambo, na ˌili kˌuelˈewa uɟˈiŋɡa wa uˈovu, na wazˈimu wa ˌupumbˈavu.|0
nˌimeˈona ɟˈambo lilˈilo tʃˈuŋɡu kulˈiko maˈuti, mwanˈamke ambˈaje ni mtˈeɡo, ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake ni wˈavu wa kˌuteɡˈea na mikˈono jˌake ni mˌiɲorˈoro. ˈm̩tu ˌampendezˈaje mˈuŋɡu ˌatamkwˈepa, bˌali mwˌeɲe ðˈambi ˌatanˈaswa nˈaje.|0
mhubˈiri ˌanasˈema, tazˈama, hˈili ndˈilo nˌililˌoɡundˈua: nˌimeɡundˈua kˈitu kimˈoɟa baˌada ja kiŋɡˈine nˌilipokˈuwa katˌika kusˈudi la mˈambo.|0
niŋɡˈali nˌatafˈiti lakˈini sipˈati: nˌilimpˈata mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa mɲˈofu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈelfu, lakˈini hakˈuna mwanˈamke mmˈoɟa mɲˈofu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo pˈeke jˌake nˌililˌolipˈata: mˈuŋɡu ˌamemuˈumba mwˌanadˈamu mɲˈofu, lakˈini mwˌanadˈamu ˌamebˈuni mˈambo mˈeŋɡi.|0
ni nˈani alˈije kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima? ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje mˌaelˈezo ja mˈambo? hekˈima hˌuŋɡarˈiʃa ˈuso wa ˈm̩tu na kˌubadˈili uɡˈumu wa ˈuso wˈake.|0
nˌawaambˈia, tˈii ˈamri ja mfˈalme, kwa sabˈabu ˌuliˈapa mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌusihˌarakˈiʃe kˌuondˈoka mbˈele ja mfˈalme. ˌusiˌendelˈee kutˈenda lilˈilo bˈaja, kwa maˈana mfˈalme ˌatafˈaɲa lolˈote ˌapendˈalo.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˈeno la mfˈalme ndˈilo lˈeɲe mamlˈaka ja mwˈiʃo, nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumwambˈia, ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini.|0
jejˈote ˌanajetˈii aɡˈizo lˈake hˌataðurˈika, mˈojo wa hekˈima ˌutaɟˈua wakˈati mˌuafˈaka na ɟˈinsi ja kutˈenda.|0
kwa maˈana kˈuna wakˈati mˌuafˈaka na ˌutaratˈibu wa kˈila ɟˈambo, iŋɡˈawa huzˈuni ja mwˌanadˈamu hˈuwa nzˈito ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa vˈile hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌaɟuˈaje sˈiku ziɟˈazo, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumwambˈia lˌinalokˈuɟa.|0
hakˈuna mwˌanadˈamu ˌawezˈaje kˌuʃikilˈia rˈoho jˌake asˈife, wˈala hakˈuna mwˌeɲe uwˈezo ɟˌuːja sˈiku ja kˈufa kwˈake. kˌama vˈile hakˈuna jejˈote ˌarudiʃwˈaje ɲˈuma wakˈati wa vˈita, kˌaðalˈika uˈovu hˌautˌawawˈeka hˈuru wˈale wˌautendˈao.|0
jˈote hˈaja nˌilijaˈona, nˌilipokˈuwa nˌatafakˈari kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌotendˈeka tʃˈini ja ɟˈua. kˈuna wakˈati ambˈapo ˈm̩tu hˌuɟifˈaɲa bwˈana ɟˌuːja weŋɡˈine kwa maðˈara jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ndˈipo pˈia, nˌikaˈona waˈovu wˌakizˈikwa, wˈale ambˈao wˌalizoˈea kˌuiŋɡˈia na kutˈoka mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na kupˈewa sˈifa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ambˈapo wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa hˈaja. hˈili nˈalo ni ˌubatˈili.|0
wakˈati hukˈumu ɟˌuːja tˈendo ˈovu hˌaitˌekelˈezwi upˈesi, miˈojo ja wˈatu huɟˈaa mipˈaŋɡo ja kutˈenda maˈovu.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hufˈaɲa maˈovu mˈia mˈoɟa na ˌakaˌendelˈea kuˈiʃi maˈiʃa marˈefu, naɟˈua kwˌamba ˌitakˈuwa bˈora zaˈidi kwa wˈatu wˌanaˌomwoɡˈopa mˈuŋɡu, wamtʃˈao mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu waˈovu hˌawamwoɡˈopi mˈuŋɡu, hˌawatˌafanikˈiwa, maˈiʃa jˈao hˌajatˌarefˈuka kˌama kivˈuli.|0
kˈuna kˈitu kiŋɡˈine ambˈatʃo ni ˌubatˈili kˌinatʃˌotokˈea dˌuniˈani: wˈatu wˌaadilˈifu kupˈata jˈale jˌanajˌowastahˈili waˈovu, nˌao waˈovu kupˈata jˈale jˌanajˌowastahˈili wˌaadilˈifu. hˈili nˈalo pˈia, nasˈema ni ˌubatˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌimi nˌinasˈifu kˌufurahˈia maˈiʃa, kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna kˈitu bˈora zaˈidi kwa mwˌanadˈamu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua kulˈiko kˈula, kˈuɲua na kˌufurˈahi. kˈiʃa furˈaha ˌitafˌuatˈana nˌaje kazˈini mwˈake sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˌake ambˈazo ˌamepˈewa na mˈuŋɡu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
nˌilipˌotafakˈari ˌakilˈini mwˈaŋɡu ˌili niɟˈue hekˈima na kˌuaŋɡalˈia kˈazi ja mwˌanadˈamu dˌuniˈani, ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo mˈatʃo jˌake hˌajapˈati ˌusiŋɡˈizi mtʃˈana wˈala usˈiku.|0
ndˈipo nˌikaˈona jˈale jˈote ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu ˌamejafˈaɲa. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌuelˈewa jˈale jˌanajˌotendˈeka tʃˈini ja ɟˈua. lˈitʃa ja ɟuhˈudi zˌake zˈote za kˌutafˈuta, ˈm̩tu hawˈezi kˌuɡundˈua maˈana jˈake. hˌata iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌanadˈai kˌuwa ˌanafahˈamu, kwa hakˈika hawˈezi kˌutambˈua.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌilijˌatafakˈari jˈote hˈaja nˌikafikˈia ˌuamˈuzi kwˌamba wˌaadilˈifu na wˌeɲe hekˈima na jˈale wˌanajˌojafˈaɲa jˈako mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈuŋɡu, lakˈini hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌaɟuˈaje kˌama ˌanaŋɡoɟˈewa na upˈendo ˌau tʃˈuki.|0
wˈote wanˈajo hatˈima ˌinajˌofanˈana, mwˌadilˈifu na mwˈovu, mwˈema na m̩bˈaja, alˈije sˈafi na alˈije naɟˈisi, wˈale wˌanaotˈoa ðabˈihu na wˈale wˌasiotˈoa. kˌama ilˈivjo kwa ˈm̩tu mwˈema, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo kwa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ðˈambi; kˌama ilˈivjo kwa wˈale wˌanaoˈapa, ndˈivjo ilˈivjo kwa wˈale wˌasioˈapa.|0
hˈuu ni ubˈaja ulˈio katˌika kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌotendˈeka tʃˈini ja ɟˈua: mwˈiʃo ˌunaˌofanˈana hˌuwapˈata wˈote. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, miˈojo ja wˈatu, ˌimeɟˈaa ubˈaja na kˈuna wazˈimu mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao waŋɡˈali hˈai, hˌatimˈaje hˌuuŋɡˈana na wˌaliokˈufa.|0
jejˈote alˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa walˈio hˈai anˈalo tˌumaˈini, hˌata ˈm̩bwa hˈai ni bˈora kulˈiko sˈimba ˌalijekˈufa.|0
kwa maˈana walˈio hˈai wˌanaɟˈua kwˌamba wˌatakˈufa, lakˈini wˈafu hˌawaɟˈui tʃotʃˈote, hawˈana tˈuzo zaˈidi, hˌata kˌumbukˈumbu jˈao ˌimesˌahaulˈika.|0
upˈendo wˈao, tʃˈuki jˈao na wˈivu wˌao vˌimetowˈeka ʃˈu kitˈambo, kˈamwe hˌawatakˈuwa tˈena na sehˈemu katˌika lolˈote lˌinalˌotendˈeka tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
nˈenda, kˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈako kwa furˈaha, ˈuɲue divˈai jˈako kwa mˈojo wa ʃˈaŋɡwe, kwa maˈana sˈasa mˈuŋɡu ˌanakubˈali ˌunatʃofˈaɲa.|0
daˈima uvˈae ŋɡˈuo ɲeˈupe na daˈima upˈake kˈitʃwa tʃˈako mafˈuta.|0
fˌurahˈia maˈiʃa na ˈm̩ke wˈako, ˌumpendˈaje, sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa ja ˌubatˈili ˌulijopˈewa na mˈuŋɡu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua, sˈiku zˈote za ˌubatˈili. kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu lˈako katˌika maˈiʃa na katˌika kˈazi jˈako ja taˈabu tʃˈini ja ɟˈua.|0
lolˈote mkˈono wˈako ˌupatˈalo kufˈaɲa, fˈaɲa kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako zˈote, kwa kˌuwa hˌuko kuzˈimu, ˌunakokwˈenda, hakˈuna kufˈaɲa kˈazi wˈala mipˈaŋɡo wˈala mˌaarˈifa wˈala hekˈima.|0
nˌimeˈona kˈitu kiŋɡˈine tˈena tʃˈini ja ɟˈua: si wˌeɲe m̩bˈio wˌaʃindˈao mˌaʃindˈano ˌau wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌaʃindˈao vˈita, wˈala si wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌapatˈao tʃakˈula ˌau wˌeɲe akˈili ɲˈiŋɡi wˌapatˈao mˈali, wˈala wˌeɲe elˈimu wˌapatˈao ˌupendelˈeo, lakˈini fˈursa hˌuwapˈata wˈote.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, hakˈuna mwˌanadˈamu ˌaɟuˈaje wakˈati sˈaa jˌake ˌitakˌapokˈuɟa: kˌama vˈile samˈaki wˌavuliwˈavjo katˌika wˈavu mkatˈili, ˌau ndˈeɡe wˌanaswˈavjo kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo, vˈivjo hˈivjo wˌanadˈamu hunˈaswa na ɲakˈati m̩bˈaja zˌinazˌowaˌaŋɡukˈia bˌila kˌutazamˈia.|0
pˈia nˌiliˈona tʃˈini ja ɟˈua mfˈano hˈuu wa hekˈima ambˈao ˌulinˌivutˈia sˈana.|0
pˌalikˈuwa na ˈm̩ɟi mdˈoɡo ˌuliokˈuwa na wˈatu watʃˈatʃe ndˈani jˈake. mfˈalme mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌakainˈuka ðˈidi jˈake, ˌakaˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˌakawˈeka ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa ðˈidi jˈake.|0
katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo kˌulikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa maskˈini lakˈini mwˌeɲe hekˈima, nˌaje ˌakaˌuokˈoa ˈule ˈm̩ɟi kwa hekˈima jˈake. lakˈini hakˈuna ˌalijˌemkumbˈuka jˈule maskˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌikasˈema, hekˈima ni bˈora kulˈiko ŋɡˈuvu. lakˈini hekˈima ja maskˈini ˌimeðˌaraulˈiwa, wˈala hakˈuna ˌanajˌesikilˈiza manˈeno jˈake.|0
manˈeno ja ˌutulˈivu ja mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌusikˈiwa kulˈiko mˌakelˈele ja mtawˈala wa wˌapumbˈavu.|0
hekˈima ni bˈora kulˈiko silˈaha za vˈita, lakˈini mwˌeɲe ðˈambi mmˈoɟa hˌuharˈibu mˈema mˈeŋɡi.|0
kˌama vˈile ˈn̩zi wˌaliokˈufa huˈatʃa harˈufu m̩bˈaja kwˈeɲe mˌanukˈato, ndˈivjo ˌupumbˈavu kidˈoɡo huzˈidi ŋɡˈuvu hekˈima na heʃˈima.|0
mˈojo wa mwˌeɲe hekˈima hˌuelekˈea kuˈume, lakˈini mˈojo wa mpumbˈavu hˌuelekˈea kuʃˈoto.|0
hˌata ˌanapˌotembˈea bˌarabarˈani, mpumbˈavu hukˈosa ˌufahˈamu na kˌuðihirˈiʃa kwa kˈila mmˈoɟa ɟˈinsi alˈivjo mpumbˈavu.|0
kˌama hasˈira ja mtawˈala ˌikiwˈaka ðˈidi jˈako, ˌusiˈatʃe mahˈali pˈako, ˌutulˈivu huwˈeza kˌuzuˈia makˈosa mˈeŋɡi.|0
kˈuna ubˈaja nˌiliˌouˈona tʃˈini ja ɟˈua, aˈina ja kˈosa lˌitokˈalo kwa mtawˈala.|0
wˌapumbˈavu kuwˈekwa kwˈeɲe nafˈasi ɲˈiŋɡi za ɟˈuu, wakˈati mˌataɟˈiri huʃˈika nafˈasi za tʃˈini.|0
mˌimi nˌimeˈona watˈumwa wˌamepˈanda farˈasi, wakˈati wakˈuu wˌakitembˈea kwa miɡˈuu kˌama watˈumwa.|0
jˌeje ˌatʃimbˈaje ʃˈimo awˈeza kˌutumbukˈia ndˈani jˈake, jejˈote ˌabomoˈaje ukˈuta ˌanawˈeza kuˈumwa na ɲˈoka.|0
jejˈote ˌapasuˈaje mˈawe ˌinawˌezekˈana jˌakamˌuumˈiza, jejˈote ˌapasuˈaje maɡˈoɡo ˌinawˌezekˈana jˌakamˌuumˈiza.|0
kˌama ʃˈoka ni bˈutu na hˌalikˌunolˈewa, ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi zˌinahˌitaɟˈika, lakˈini ustˈadi ˌutalˈeta mˌafanikˈio.|0
kˌama ɲˈoka ˌakiˈuma kˈabla ja kˌufaɲˈiwa ˌuaɡˈuzi, mwaɡˈuzi hˌatahˌitaɟˈika tˈena.|0
manˈeno jˌatokˈajo kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hekˈima jˈana neˈema, bˌali mpumbˈavu hˌuaŋɡamˈizwa na midˈomo jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
mwanzˈoni manˈeno jˌake ni ˌupumbˈavu, mwiʃˈoni ni wazˈimu m̩bˈaja.|0
nˌaje mpumbˈavu hˌuzidˈiʃa manˈeno. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌaɟuˈaje lˌinalokˈuɟa, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuelˈeza ni ɟˈambo ɡˈani lˌitakˌalotokˈea baˌada jˈake.|0
kˈazi ja mpumbˈavu humtʃˈoʃa mweɲˈewe, haɟˈui ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo mɟˈini.|0
ˈole wˈako, ˈee ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo mfˈalme wˈako ˌalikˈuwa mtˈumwa na ambˈajo wakˈuu wˈako hufˈaɲa karˈamu ˌasubˈuhi.|0
hˈeri wˈewe, ˈee ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo mfˈalme wˈako ni wa uzˈao wˌeɲe kˌuheʃimˈika na ambˈajo wakˈuu wˈako hˈula tʃakˈula kwa wakˈati ˌunaofˈaa: ˌili kupˈata ŋɡˈuvu na si kwa aɟˈili ja ulˈevi.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ni mvˈivu pˈaa la ɲˈumba hˌuinˈama, kˌutokˈana na mikˈono mˌileɡˈevu, ɲˈumba huvˈuɟa.|0
karˈamu hufˈaɲua kwa aɟˈili ja kitʃˈeko, nˌao mvˈiɲo hˌufurahˈiʃa maˈiʃa, lakˈini fˈeða ni ɟawˈabu la mˈambo jˈote.|0
ˌusimʃutˈumu mfˈalme hˌata ikˈiwa ni katˌika mawˈazo jˈako, ˌau kˌumlaˈani taɟˈiri katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈako tʃa kulˈala, kwa sabˈabu ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani wˌanawˈeza kˌutʃukˈua manˈeno jˈako, nˌaje ndˈeɡe ˌanajerˈuka ˌanawˈeza kutˈoa tˌaarˈifa ja jˈale ˌulijosˈema.|0
tˈupa mkˈate wˈako ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi, kwa maˈana baˌada ja sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi ˌutaupˈata tˈena.|0
wˈape sehˈemu wˈatu sˈaba, nˈaam hˌata wanˈane, kwa maˈana huɟˈui ni bˈaa ɡˈani lˌitakˌalokˈuwa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˌama mawˈiŋɡu jˌameɟˈaa mˈaɟi, huɲˈeʃa mvˈua ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi. kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌukiaŋɡˈuka kˌuelekˈea kusˈini ˌau kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini, mahˈali ˌulipˌoaŋɡukˈia, hˈapo ndˈipo ˌutakˌapolˈala.|0
jejˈote ˌatazamˈaje upˈepo hˌatapˈanda, jejˈote ˌaaŋɡˌaliˈaje mawˈiŋɡu hˌatavˈuna.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌusivjˌofahˈamu ɲɟˈia ja upˈepo, ˌau ɟˈinsi mwˈili ˌuumbwˈavjo ndˈani ja tˈumbo la mˈama, vˈivjo hˈivjo huwˈezi kˌufahˈamu kˈazi ja mˈuŋɡu, muˈumba wa vˈitu vjˈote.|0
pˈanda mbˈeɡu jˈako ˌasubˈuhi, nˈako ɟiˈoni ˌusiruhˈusu mikˈono jˈako ˌileɡˈee, kwa maˈana huɟˈui ni ˈipi ˌitakˌajofˌanikˈiwa, kwˌamba ni hˌii ˌau ni ˈile, ˌau kwˌamba zˈote zˌitafˌanikˈiwa sˌawasˈawa.|0
nˈuru ni tˈamu, tˈena ˌinafˌurahˈiʃa mˈatʃo kuˈona ɟˈua.|0
hˌata kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌataˈiʃi miˈaka mˈiŋɡi kiˈasi ɡˈani, na ˌaifˌurahˈie jˈote. lakˈini na ˌakumbˈuke sˈiku za ɡˈiza, kwa maˈana zˌitakˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi. kˈila kˈitu kˌitakˌatʃokˈuɟa ni ˌubatˈili.|0
furˈahi ˈewe kiɟˈana, wakˈati uŋɡˈali kiɟˈana, mˈojo wˈako na ukˈupe furˈaha katˌika sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈako. fuˈata ɲɟˈia za mˈojo wˈako na tʃotʃˈote mˈatʃo jˈako jˌaonˈajo, lakˈini uɟˈue kwˌamba kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaja jˈote mˈuŋɡu ˌatakulˈeta hˌukumˈuni.|0
kwa hˈijo bˈasi, ondˈoa wˌasiwˈasi mojˈoni mwˈako na ˌutupilˈie mbˈali mˌasumbˈufu ja mwˈili wˈako, kwa kˌuwa uɟˈana na ŋɡˈuvu ni ˌubatˈili.|0
mkumbˈuke muˈumba wˈako sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈako, kˈabla hˌaziɟˈaɟa sˈiku za taˈabu, wˈala hˌaiɟˌakaribˈia miˈaka ˌutakˌaposˈema, mˌimi sˌifurahˈii hˈijo.|0
kˈabla ɟˈua na nˈuru, nˌao mwˈezi na ɲˈota hˌaviɟatˈiwa ɡˈiza, kˈabla ja kurˈudi mawˈiŋɡu baˌada ja mvˈua.|0
sˈiku ˈile walˈinzi wa ɲˈumba wˌatakˌapotˌetemˈeka, nˌao wˈatu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌatakˌapoɟˌiinamˈiʃa, wakˈati wˌasaɡˈao wˌatakˌapokˈoma kwa sabˈabu ja utʃˈatʃe, nˌao wˌatʃuŋɡˌuliˈao mˌadiriʃˈani kutˈiwa ɡˈiza.|0
wakˈati milˈaŋɡo ja kˌuiŋɡˈia bˌarabarˈani ˌitakˌapofˈuŋɡwa na saˈuti ja kusˈaɡa kˌufifˈia; wakˈati wˈatu wˌataˈamʃwa kwa saˈuti ja ndˈeɡe, lakˈini ɲˈimbo zˈao zˈote zˌikififˈia.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˌatakˌapooɡˈopa kˌilitʃˌoinˈuka ɟˈuu na hatˈari zˌitakˌazokuwˈepo bˌarabarˈani; wakˈati mlˈozi ˌutakˌapotʃanˈua maˈua na pˈanzi kˌuɟikokˈota nˌawe usˈiwe na ʃaˈuku ja kˈitu tʃotʃˈote. ndˈipo mwˌanadˈamu ˌaiendˈea ɲˈumba jˌake ja milˈele nˌao wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi wˌakizuŋɡˈuka bˌarabarˈani.|0
mkumbˈuke muˈumba wˈako: kˈabla hˌaiɟˌakatˈika kˈamba ja fˈeða, ˌau bakˈuli la ðahˈabu hˌaliɟˌavuɲɟˈika; kˈabla mtˈuŋɡi kˌuvuɲɟˈika kwˈeɲe tʃemtʃˈemi, ˌau ɡˌurudˈumu kˌuvuɲɟˈika kˌisimˈani.|0
nˈajo mavˈumbi kurˈudi arðˈini jˌalikotˈoka, na rˈoho kurˈudi kwa mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌeitˈoa.|0
mhubˈiri asˈema, ˌubatˈili! ˌubatˈili! kˈila kˈitu ni ˌubatˈili.|0
mhubˈiri hakˈuwa tu na hekˈima, bˌali ˌaliwˌaɡawˈia wˈatu mˌaarˈifa pˈia. ˌalitˌafakˈari na kˌutafˈiti na ˌakawˈeka katˌika ˌutaratˈibu miθˈali ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
mhubˈiri ˌalitafˈiti ˌili kupˈata manˈeno sahˈihi na kˈila ˌalitʃˌoandˈika kˌilikˈuwa sˈawa na kwˈeli.|0
manˈeno ja wˌeɲe hekˈima ni kˌama mtʃokˈoro, miθˈali zˈao zˌilizˌokusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa ni kˌama mˌisumˈari ˌilijˌoɡoŋɡomˈewa ikˈawa imˈara, jˌalijˌotolˈewa na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi mmˈoɟa.|0
tˈena zaˈidi ja hˈajo, mwanˈaŋɡu, kubˈali maˈoɲo, hakˈuna mwˈiʃo wa kutˈuŋɡa vitˈabu vˈiŋɡi, nˈako kusˈoma sˈana hˌuutʃˈoʃa mwˈili.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ɟˈumla ja manˈeno; jˈote jˌamekwˈiʃa sikˈiwa: ˈm̩tʃe mˈuŋɡu, nˌawe ˌuziʃˈike ˈamri zˈake, maˈana kwa ɟˈumla n̩dˈijo ˌimpasˈajo ˈm̩tu.|0
kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌatalˈeta hˌukumˈuni kˈila kˈazi, pamˈoɟa na kˈila nˈeno la sˈiri, likˈiwa ɟˈema ˌau bˈaja.|0
wˈimbo ulˈio bˈora wa sˌolomˈoni.|0
ˌunibˈusu kwa bˈusu la kˈiɲua tʃˈako, kwa maˈana upˈendo wˈako ˌunafˌurahˈiʃa kulˈiko divˈai.|0
mˌanukˈato jˈako jˌananukˈia vizˈuri, ɟˈina lˈako ni kˌama mˌanukˈato jˌalijˌomimˈinwa. n̩dˈijo sabˈabu wˌanawˈali wˌanakupˈenda.|0
mˌimi ni mweˈusi, lakˈini nˌapendˈeza, ˈeɲi bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu, mweˈusi kˌama mahˈema ja kedˈari, kˌama mˌapazˈia ja hˈema la sˌolomˈoni.|0
ˌusinˌikazˈie mˈatʃo kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ni mweˈusi, kwa sabˈabu nˌimefˈaɲua mweˈusi na ɟˈua. wˈana wa mˈama jˈaŋɡu wˌalinˌikasˌirikˈia na kˌunifˈaɲa nˈiwe mtˈunza maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu. ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe la mˌizabˈibu nˌimeliˈatʃa.|0
nˌiambˈie, wˌewe ambˈaje nˌinakupˈenda, ˌunalˈiʃa wˈapi kˈundi lˈako la kondˈoo na ni wˈapi ˌunapˌowapumzˈiʃa kondˈoo wˈako ˌaðuhˈuri. kwa nˈini nˈiwe kˌama mwanˈamke ˌalijˌefunˈikwa ʃˈela karˈibu na makˈundi ja rafˈiki zˈako.|0
kˌama huɟˈui, ˈewe mwanˈamke mzˈuri kulˈiko wˈote, fuˈata ɲˈajo za kondˈoo, na kulˈiʃa wˌanambˈuzi wˈako karˈibu na hˈema za wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, nˌinakˌufananˈiʃa na farˈasi ɟˈike ˌalijefˈuŋɡwa katˌika mˌoɟawˈapo ja maɡˈari ja vˈita ja farˈao.|0
maʃˈavu jˈako jˌanapendˈeza jakˈiwa na vipˈuli, ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako ikˈiwa na mikˈufu ja vˈito.|0
tˌutakˌufaɲˈia vipˈuli vja ðahˈabu, vjˌeɲe kupˈambwa kwa fˈeða.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuwa mezˈani pˈake, mˌanukˈato jˈaŋɡu jˌalisambˈaza harˈufu jˌake nzˈuri.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi ni kifˈuko tʃa mˌanemˈane kˈati ja matˈiti jˈaŋɡu.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi ni kˌama kiʃˈada tʃa maˈua ja mhˈina kutˈoka maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu ja ˈen ɡˈedi.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu! tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri! mˈatʃo jˈako ni kˌama ja hˈua.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu! ˈee, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌunavjˌopendˈeza! na kitˈanda tʃˈetu ni tʃa maɟˈani mazˈuri.|0
ŋɡˈuzo za ɲˈumba jˈetu ni mˌierˈezi, na mapˈao jˈetu ni mˌiberˈoʃi.|0
mˌimi ni ˈua la ʃarˈoni, jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi ja bondˈeni.|0
kˌama jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi kˌatikˈati ja miˈiba ndˈivjo alˈivjo mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu kˌatikˈati ja wˌanawˈali.|0
kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mtofˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiti ja msitˈuni ndˈivjo alˈivjo mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanaˈume viɟˈana. nˌinafˌurahˈia kukˈeti kˌivulˈini ˌm̩wa mwˌanaˈume hˈuju, na tˈunda lˈake ni tˈamu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌamenˌitʃukˈua mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa karˈamu, na bendˈera ja hˈuju mwˌanaˈume ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu ni upˈendo.|0
nitˈie ŋɡˈuvu kwa zabˈibu kˈavu, nˌiburudˈiʃe kwa mˌatofˈaa, kwa maˈana nˌinazimˈia kwa mapˈenzi.|0
mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto ˈuko tʃˈini ja kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu, na mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˌunanˌikumbatˈia.|0
bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu, nˌinawˌaaɡˈiza kwa pˈaa na kwa ajˈala wa ʃambˈani: msˌitʃotʃˈee wˈala kuˈamʃa mapˈenzi hˌata jˌatakˌapotˈaka jeɲˈewe.|0
sˌikilˈiza! mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu! tazˈama! hˈuju hˈapa ˌanakˈuɟa, ˌakirˌukarˈuka ɟˈuu mˌilimˈani ˌakizuŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja vilˈima.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ni kˌama pˈaa ˌau ajˈala kiɟˈana. tazˈama! ˌanasimˈama ɲˈuma ja ukˈuta wˈetu, ˌakitazˈama kˌupitˈia mˌadiriʃˈani, ˌakitʃˌuŋɡulˈia kˌimiˈani.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌalizuŋɡˈumza na kˌuniambˈia, inˈuka, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, mrˈembo wˈaŋɡu, tˌufuatˈane.|0
tazˈama! wakˈati wa masˈika ˌumepˈita, mvˈua ˌimekwˈiʃa na ˌikapˈita.|0
maˈua jˌanatokˈea ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi; maɟˈira ja kuˈimba jˌamewadˈia, saˈuti za ɲɟˈiwa zˌinasikˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu.|0
mtˈini ˌunatˈuŋɡa matˈunda jˌake ja mwanzˈoni, zabˈibu zˌinazˌotʃanˈua zˌaenˈeza harˈufu nzˈuri. inˈuka, ɲɟˈoo mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu. mrˈembo wˈaŋɡu, tˌufuatˈane.|0
hˈua wˈaŋɡu pˈeɲe ɲˈufa za mˌaɟabˈali, mˌafitʃˈoni pˌembezˈoni ˌm̩wa mlˈima, nˌioɲˈeʃe ˈuso wˈako, na nˌiisikˈie saˈuti jˈako, kwa maˈana saˈuti jˈako ni tˈamu, na ˈuso wˈako ˌunapendˈeza.|0
tˌukamatˈie mbwˈeha, mbwˈeha wˈale wadˈoɡo wˌanaˌoharˈibu maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, maʃˈamba jˈetu ja mˌizabˈibu jˌalijˌotʃanˈua.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ni wˈaŋɡu, nˌami ni wˈake, jˌeje hˌuɟilˈiʃa kˌatikˈati ja jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi.|0
mpˈaka ɟˈua lˌinapˌotʃomˈoza, na vivˈuli vˌikimbˈie, rˈudi, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, na ˈuwe kˌama pˈaa, ˌau kˌama ajˈala kiɟˈana ɟˌuːja vilˈima vja beθˈeri.|0
usˈiku kˈutʃa kwˈeɲe kitˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu nˌilimtafˈuta jˈule mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumpendˈaje; nˌilimtafˈuta, lakˈini sˌikumpˈata.|0
sˈasa nˌitaondˈoka na kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mɟˈini, katˌika bˌarabˈara zˌake na viwˈaɲɟa; nˌitamtafˈuta jˈule mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumpendˈaje. kwa hˈijo nˌilimtafˈuta lakˈini sˌikumpˈata.|0
walˈinzi wˌalinikˈuta wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakizuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi. nˌikawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, mmemwˈona jˈule mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumpendˈaje.|0
kitˈambo kidˈoɡo tu baˌada ja kˌuwapˈita nˌilimpˈata jˈule mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumpendˈaje. nˌilimʃˈika na sˌikumwatʃˈia aˈende mpˈaka nˌilipomlˈeta katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈama jˈaŋɡu, katˌika tʃˈumba tʃa jˈule ˌalijˌenitʃukˈua mˈimba.|0
bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu, nˌinawˌaaɡˈiza kwa pˈaa na kwa ajˈala wa ʃambˈani: msˌitʃotʃˈee wˈala kuˈamʃa mapˈenzi hˌata jˌatakˌapotˈaka jeɲˈewe.|0
ni nˈani hˈuju ˌanajekˈuɟa kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani kˌama ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoʃi, ˌanajˌenukˈia mˌanemˈane na uvˈumba ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa vˌikolˈezo vjˈote vja mfˌaɲabˌiaʃˈara.|0
tazˈama! ni ɡˈari la sˌolomˈoni lˌisindˌikizwˈalo na mˌaʃuɟˈaa sitˈini, walˈio wakˈuu sˈana wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈote wˌamevˈaa pˈaŋɡa, wˈote wˌazoˈefu katˌika vˈita, kˈila mmˈoɟa na upˈaŋɡa wˌake paɟˈani, wˌameɟˌiandˈaa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈofu za usˈiku.|0
mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌaliɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea ɡˈari; ˌalilˌiteŋɡenˈeza kwa m̩bˈao kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni.|0
ŋɡˈuzo zˌake ˌalizˌiteŋɡenˈeza kwa fˈeða, kitˈako tʃˈake kwa ðahˈabu. kˈiti tʃˈake kˌilipˈambwa kwa zˌambarˈau, ɡˈari lˈake lˌikanakʃˈiwa ɲɟˈumu kwa upˈendo na bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tokˈeni ɲɟˈe, nˈiɲi bˈinti za sajˈuni, mkˌamtazˈame mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni akˈiwa ˌamevˈaa tˈaɟi, tˈaɟi ambˈalo mˈama jˌake ˌalimvˈika sˈiku ja arˈusi jˈake, sˈiku ambˈajo mˈojo wˌake ˌuliʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu! ˈee, ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri! mˈatʃo jˈako ɲˈuma ja ʃˈela jˈako ni kˌama ja hˈua. ɲuˈele zˈako ni kˌama kˈundi la mbˈuzi zˌikiʃˈuka kutˈoka mlˈima ɡˌileˈadi.|0
mˈeno jˈako ni kˌama kˈundi la kondˈoo wˌaliokˈatwa maɲˈoja sˈasa hˈivi, wˌatokˈao kˌuoɡˈeʃwa. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˈana pˈatʃa lˈake, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa alˈije pˈeke jˈake.|0
midˈomo jˈako ni kˌama ˈuzi mwekˈundu, kˈiɲua tʃˈako kˌinapendˈeza. maʃˈavu jˈako ɲˈuma ja ʃˈela jˈako ni kˌama vipˈande viwˈili vja kˌomamˈaŋɡa.|0
ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako ni kˌama mnˈara wa daˈudi, ˌulioɟˈeŋɡwa kwa madˈaha, ɟˈuu jˌake zˌimetundˈikwa ŋɡˈao ˈelfu, zˈote ni ŋɡˈao za mˌaʃuɟˈaa.|0
matˈiti jˈako mawˈili ni kˌama wˌanapˈaa wawˈili, kˌama wˌanapˈaa mapˈatʃa wˌaɟiliʃˈao kˌatikˈati ja jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi.|0
hˌata kˌupambazˈuke na vivˈuli vˌikimbˈie, nˌitakwˈenda kwˈeɲe mlˈima wa mˌanemˈane na kwˈeɲe kilˈima tʃa uvˈumba.|0
wˌewe ni mzˈuri kˈote, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, hakˈuna hˌitilˈafu ndˈani jˈako.|0
ˈenda nˌami kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu, ˈenda nˌami kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni. ʃˈuka kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃa ja amˈana, kutˈoka ɟˌuːja senˈiri, kilˈele tʃa hermˈoni, kutˈoka mapˈaŋɡo ja sˈimba na kutˈoka mlˈima wˌapendˈapo kukˈaa tʃˈui.|0
ˌumeˈiba mˈojo wˈaŋɡu, dˈada jˈaŋɡu, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu; ˌumeˈiba mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kwa mtazˈamo mmˈoɟa wa mˈatʃo jˈako, kwa kˈito kimˈoɟa tʃa mkˈufu wˈako.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi pˈendo lˈako lˌinavjˌofurahˈiʃa, dˈada jˈaŋɡu, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu! pˈendo lˈako lˌinafˌurahˈiʃa ˈaɟe zaˈidi ja divˈai, na harˈufu ja mˌanukˈato jˈako zaˈidi ja kˌikolˈezo tʃotʃˈote.|0
midˈomo jˈako ˌinadondˈoʃa utˈamu kˌama sˈeɡa la asˈali, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu; mazˈiwa na asˈali vˈiko tʃˈini ja ulˈimi wˈako. harˈufu nzˈuri ja mavˈazi jˈako ni kˌama ˈile ja lˌebanˈoni.|0
wˌewe ni bustˈani ˌilijofˈuŋɡwa, dˈada jˈaŋɡu, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu; wˌewe ni tʃˈanzo tʃa mˈaɟi kˌilitʃˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa kabˈisa, tʃemtʃˈemi jˈaŋɡu pˈeke jˈaŋɡu.|0
mimˈea jˈako ni bustˈani ja mˌikomamˈaŋɡa jˌeɲe matˈunda mazˈuri sˈana, jˌeɲe hˈina na nˈardo.|0
nˈardo na zˌafarˈani, m̩tʃˈai na mdˌalasˈini, pamˈoɟa na kˈila aˈina ja ˈm̩ti wa uvˈumba, mˌanemˈane na ˈudi, na aˈina zˈote za vˌikolˈezo bˈora kulˈiko vjˈote.|0
wˌewe ni tʃemtʃˈemi ja bustˈani, kisˈima tʃa mˈaɟi jˌatirˌirikˈajo, jˌakitˌirirˈika kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni.|0
ˈamka, upˈepo wa kˌaskazˈini, na ˈuɟe, upˈepo wa kusˈini! vˈuma ɟˌuːja bustˈani jˈaŋɡu, ˌili harˈufu jˌake nzˈuri iwˈeze kˌuenˈea mpˈaka ŋɡˈambo. mpˈendwa wˈaŋɡu na ˈaɟe bˌustanˈini mwˈake na kuˈoɲɟa matˈunda mazˈuri sˈana.|0
nˌimekˈuɟa kwˈeɲe bustˈani jˈaŋɡu, dˈada jˈaŋɡu, bˈibi arˈusi wˈaŋɡu; nˌimekusˈaɲa mˌanemˈane jˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na kˌikolˈezo tʃˈaŋɡu. nˌimekˈula sˈeɡa lˈaŋɡu la asˈali na asˈali jˈaŋɡu; nˌimekˈuɲua divˈai jˈaŋɡu na mazˈiwa jˈaŋɡu. mˌarafˈiki kulˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌarafˈiki, mɲuˈe; kˌuɲuˈeni ja kutˈoʃa, ˈee wapˈenzi.|0
nˌililˈala lakˈini mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa mˈatʃo. sˌikilˈiza! mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌanabˈiʃa: nˌifuŋɡulˈie, dˈada jˈaŋɡu, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, hˈua wˈaŋɡu, asˈije na hˌitilˈafu. kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu kˌimelˈoa umˈande, na ɲuˈele zˈaŋɡu maɲˈuɲu ja usˈiku.|0
nˌimevˈua ɟˈoho lˈaŋɡu: ɟˈe, ni lazˈima nivˈae tˈena? nˌimenˈawa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu: ɟˈe, ni lazˈima nˌiitʃafˈue tˈena.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌaliwˈeka mkˈono wˌake kwˈeɲe tˈundu la komˈeo; mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˈanza kuɡˈoŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
nˌiliinˈuka kˌumfuŋɡulˈia mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, mikˈono jˈaŋɡu ˌikidondˈoʃa mˌanemˈane, vidˈole vjˈaŋɡu vˌikitˌirirˈika mˌanemˈane, pˈeɲe vipˈini vja komˈeo.|0
nˌilimfˌuŋɡulˈia mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌaliʃˌaondˈoka; ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda zˈake. mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌuliʃˈuka kwa kˌuondˈoka kwˈake. nˌilimtafˈuta lakˈini sˌikumpˈata. nˌilimwˈita lakˈini hˌakuniɟˈibu.|0
walˈinzi wˌalinikˈuta wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa zˈamu za ulˈinzi mɟˈini. wˌalinipˈiɡa, wˌakanˌiɟerˈuhi, wˌakanˌiɲaŋɡˈaɲa ɟˈoho lˈaŋɡu, hˈao walˈinzi wa kˈuta.|0
ˈeɲi bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu, nˌinawˌaaɡˈiza: kˌama mkimpˈata mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, mtˌamwambˈia nˈini? mwˌambiˈeni nˌinazimˈia kwa mapˈenzi.|0
ɟˈe, mpˈendwa wˈako ni bˈora kulˈiko weŋɡˈine nˈamna ɡˈani, wˌewe ulˈije mzˈuri kupˈita wˌanawˈake wˈote? ɟˈe, mpˈendwa wˈako ni mzˈuri kulˈiko weŋɡˈine, nˈamna ɡˈani, hˌata ˌunatˌuaɡˈiza hˈivjo.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌanaŋɡˈaa, tˈena ni mwekˈundu, wa kˌuvutˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanaˈume kˈumi ˈelfu.|0
kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ni ðahˈabu sˈafi kulˈiko zˈote, ɲuˈele zˌake ni za mawˈimbi na ni ɲeˈusi kˌama kuŋɡˈuru.|0
mˈatʃo jˌake ni kˌama ja hˈua kˌandokˈando ja viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi, ˌalijˌeoɡˈeʃwa kwˈeɲe mazˈiwa, jˌalijopˈaŋɡwa kˌama vˈito vja θamˈani.|0
maʃˈavu jˌake ni kˌama matˈuta ja vˌikolˈezo jˌakitˈoa mˌanukˈato. midˈomo jˌake ni kˌama jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi ˌinajˌodondˈoʃa mˌanemˈane.|0
mikˈono jˌake ni fˈimbo za ðahˈabu ˌilijopˈambwa kwa krˌisolˈiθo. mwˈili wˌake ni kˌama pˈembe ja ndˈovu ˌilijˌoŋɡarˈiʃwa ˌilijopˈambwa na jakˈuti samˈawi.|0
miɡˈuu jˌake ni ŋɡˈuzo za mˈarmar zˌilizˌosimˈikwa katˌika vitˈako vja ðahˈabu sˈafi. sˈura jˌake ni kˌama lˌebanˈoni, bˈora kˌama mˈiti jˌake ja mˌierˈezi.|0
kˈiɲua tʃˈake tʃeɲˈewe ni utˈamu, kwa uɟˈumla jˌeje ni wa kˌupendˈeza. hˈuju n̩dˈije mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, hˈuju n̩dˈije rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu, ˈee bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mpˈenzi wˈako ˌamekwˈenda wˈapi, ˈewe mzˈuri kupˈita wˌanawˈake wˈote? mpˈenzi wˈako ˌameɡˌeukˈia ɲɟˈia ˈipi, tupˈate kˌumtafˈuta pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌamekwˈenda bˌustanˈini mwˈake, kwˈeɲe vitˈalu vja vˌikolˈezo, kˌuɟilˈiʃa bˌustanˈini na kˌukusˈaɲa jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi.|0
mˌimi ni wˌake mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, na mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ni wˈaŋɡu; jˌeje hˌuɟilˈiʃa kˌatikˈati ja jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi.|0
wˌewe ni mzˈuri, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, kˌama tˈirsa, ˌupendezˈaje kˌama jˌerusalˈemu, ˌumetukˈuka kˌama ɟˈeʃi lˈeɲe bendˈera.|0
ˌujaɡeˈuze mˈatʃo jˈako mbˈali nˈami, jˌananˌiɣarikˈiʃa. ɲuˈele zˈako ni kˌama kˈundi la mbˈuzi wˌanaˌoterˈemka kutˈoka ɡˌileˈadi.|0
mˈeno jˈako ni kˌama kˈundi la kondˈoo wˌatokˈao kˌuoɡˈeʃwa. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˈana pˈatʃa lˈake, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa alˈije pˈeke jˈake.|0
maʃˈavu jˈako ɲˈuma ja ʃˈela jˈako ni kˌama vipˈande viwˈili vja kˌomamˈaŋɡa.|0
pˌanawˈeza kuwˈepo malkˈia sitˈini, mˌasurˈia θˌemanˈini na mˌabikˈira wˌasiˌohesabˈika.|0
lakˈini hˈua wˈaŋɡu, mkˌamilˈifu wˈaŋɡu, ni wa nˈamna ja pekˈee, bˈinti pekˈee kwa mˈama jˈake, kipˈenzi tʃa jˌeje ˌalijemzˈaa. wˌanawˈali wˌalimwˈona na kumwˈita ˌalijˌebarikˈiwa; malkˈia na mˌasurˈia wˌalimsˈifu.|0
nˌiliterˈemka kwˈeɲe bustˈani ja mˈiti ja milˈozi ˌili kˌutazˈama mˌatʃipˈuko ja bondˈeni, kuˈona kˌama mˌizabˈibu ˌimetʃipˈua ˌau kˌama mˌikomamˈaŋɡa ˌimetʃanˈua maˈua.|0
kˈabla sˌiɟaŋɡamˈua, ʃaˈuku jˈaŋɡu ˌiliniwˈeka kˌatikˈati ja maɡˈari ja kifˈalme ja kˌukokˈotwa na farˈasi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
rˈudi, rˈudi, ˈee mʃulˈami; rˈudi, rˈudi ˌili tupˈate kˌukutazˈama! mpˈenzi kwa nˈini kˌumtazˈama mʃulˈami, kˌama kˌutazˈama ŋɡˈoma ja mˌahanaˈimu.|0
ˈee bˈinti wa mwˈana wa mfˈalme, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌinavjˌopendˈeza miɡˈuu jˈako katˌika viˈatu! miɡˈuu jˈako jˌeɲe madˈaha ni kˌama vˈito vja θamˈani, kˈazi ja mikˈono ja fˈundi stˈadi.|0
kitˈovu tʃˈako ni kˌama bˌilaˈuri ja mvirˈiŋɡo ambˈajo kˈamwe hˌaikˈosi divˈai ˌilijˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua. kiˈuno tʃˈako ni kˌitʃuɡˈuu tʃa ŋɡˈano kˌilitʃˌozuŋɡˈukwa kwa jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi.|0
matˈiti jˈako ni kˌama wˌanapˈaa wawˈili, mapˈatʃa wa pˈaa.|0
ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako ni kˌama mnˈara wa pˈembe ja ndˈovu. mˈatʃo jˈako ni vidˈimbwi vja heʃbˈoni karˈibu na lˈaŋɡo la bˈeθ rˈabi. pˈua lˈako ni kˌama mnˈara wa lˌebanˈoni ˌukitazˈama kˌuelekˈea damˈeski.|0
kˈitʃwa tʃˈako kˌinakuvˈika tˈaɟi kˌama mlˈima karmˈeli. ɲuˈele zˈako ni kˌama zulˈia la ˌuruɟuˈani; mfˈalme ˌametˈekwa na maʃˈuŋɡi jˈake.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mzˈuri na ˌunavjˌopendˈeza, ˈee pˈendo, kwa uzˈuri wˈako.|0
ˈumbo lˈako ni kˌama la mtˈende, nˈajo matˈiti jˈako kˌama viʃˈada vja matˈunda.|0
nˌilisˈema, nˌitakwˈea mtˈende, nˌami nˌitajaʃˈika matˈunda jˈake. matˈiti jˈako na jˈawe kˌama viʃˈada vja mzabˈibu, harˈufu nzˈuri ja pˈumzi jˈako kˌama mˌatofˈaa.|0
na kˈiɲua tʃˈako kˌama divˈai bˈora kulˈiko zˈote. mpˈendwa divˈai na iˈende mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa hˌadi kwa mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, ˌikitˌirirˈika pˌolepˈole ɟˌuːja midˈomo na mˈeno.|0
mˌimi ni mˈali ja mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, nˈajo ʃaˈuku jˌake ni ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
ɲɟˈoo, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, twˈende mˌaʃambˈani, twˈende tˌukalˈale hˌuko vˌiɟiɟˈini.|0
hˈebu na twˈende mapˈema katˌika maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu tuˈone kˌama mˌizabˈibu ˌimetʃipˈua, kˌama maˈua jˌake jˌamefuŋɡˈuka, na kˌama mˌikomamˈaŋɡa ˌimetˈoa maˈua: hˌuko nˌitakˈupa pˈenzi lˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌituŋɡˈuɟa hutˈoa harˈufu zˌake nzˈuri, kwˈeɲe milˈaŋɡo jˈetu kˈuna matˈunda mazˈuri, mˈapja na ja zamˈani, ambˈajo nˌimekˌuhifaðˈia wˈewe, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu.|0
laˈiti ˌuŋɡelikˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama ndˈuɡu wa kiˈume, ambˈaje ˌalijaɲˈoɲa matˈiti ja mˈama jˈaŋɡu! kˈiʃa, kˌama nˌiŋɡekukˈuta hˌuko ɲɟˈe, nˌiŋɡelˌikubˈusu, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌaŋɡelˌiniðarˈau.|0
nˌiŋɡelˌikuoŋɡˈoza na kˌukulˈeta katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈama jˈaŋɡu, jˌeje ambˈaje ˌamenˌifundˈiʃa. nˌiŋɡelikˈupa divˈai ˌilijˌokolˈezwa ˈuɲue, asˈali ja maˈua ja mˌikomamˈaŋɡa jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˈinti za jˌerusalˈemu, nˌinawˌaaɡˈiza: msˌitʃotʃˈee wˈala kuˈamʃa mapˈenzi hˌata jˌatakˌapotˈaka jeɲˈewe.|0
ni nˈani hˈuju ˌanajekˈuɟa kutˈoka ɲikˈani ˌakimwˌeɡemˈea mpˈenzi wˈake? mpˈendwa nˌilikuˈamʃa tʃˈini ja mtofˈaa, hˌuko mˈama jˈako ˌalipotˈuŋɡa mˈimba jˈako, hˌuko jˌeje ˌalipˈata utˈuŋɡu ˌakakuzˈaa.|0
nitˈie kˌama muhˈuri mojˈoni mwˈako, kˌama muhˈuri kwˈeɲe mkˈono wˈako; kwa maˈana upˈendo ˈuna ŋɡˈuvu kˌama maˈuti, wˈivu wˌake ni mkatˈili kˌama kuzˈimu. ˌunatʃˈoma kˌama mwˈali wa mˈoto, kˌama mwˈali mkˈubwa wa mˈoto wa bwˈana hˈasa.|0
mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi hˌajawˈezi kˌuuzimˈiʃa upˈendo, mˈito hˌaiwˈezi kˌuuɣˌarikˈiʃa. kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌaŋɡelitˈoa mˈali jˈote ja ɲumbˈani mwˈake kwa aɟˈili ja upˈendo, ˌaŋɡelˌiðarˌaulˈiwa kabˈisa.|0
tunˈaje dˈada mdˈoɡo, matˈiti jˌake hˌajaɟakˈua bˈado. tˌutafˈaɲa nˈini kwa aɟˈili ja dˈada jˈetu wakˈati ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa kupˈoswa.|0
kˌama jˌeje ni ukˈuta, tˌutaɟˈeŋɡa minˈara ja fˈeða ɟˈuu jˈake. na kˌama jˌeje ni mlˈaŋɡo, tˌutamzˌuŋɡuʃˈia m̩bˈao za mˌierˈezi.|0
mˌimi ni ukˈuta, nˈajo matˈiti jˈaŋɡu ni kˌama minˈara. ndˈivjo ambˈavjo nˌimekˈuwa matʃˈoni pˈake kˌama jˈule ˌanajelˈeta ˌutoʃelˈevu.|0
sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa na ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu hˌuko bˈaal hamˈoni; ˌalikodˈiʃa ʃˈamba lˈake la mˌizabˈibu kwa wˌapaŋɡˈaɟi. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaŋɡelˈeta kwa aɟˈili ja matˈunda jˌake ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða.|0
lakˈini ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu ambˈalo ni lˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe ni lˈaŋɡu kutˈoa; hˈizo ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ni kwa aɟˈili jˈako, ˈee sˌolomˈoni, na ʃekˈeli mˈia mbˈili ni kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌanaotˈunza matˈunda jˈake.|0
wˌewe ˌukaˈaje bˌustanˈini pamˈoɟa na mˌarafˈiki mlˌiohˌuðurˈia, hˈebu nˌisikˈie saˈuti jˈako.|0
ɲɟˈoo, mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, ˈuwe kˌama swˈala ˌau kˌama ajˈala kiɟˈana ɟˌuːja milˈima ˌilijoɟˈaa vˌikolˈezo.|0
maˈono kuhˈusu jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu ambˈajo isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi ˌalijaˈona wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa uzˈia, joθˈamu, ahˈazi na hˌezekˈia, wafˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
sˌikiˈeni, ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu! sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi dunˈia! kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamesˈema: nˌimewalˈiʃa watˈoto na kˌuwalˈea, lakˈini wˌameniˈasi mˈimi.|0
ŋɡˈombe ˌanamɟˈua bwˈana wˈake, nˌaje pˈunda ˌanaɟˈua hˈori la mmilˈiki wˈake, lakˈini ˌisraˈeli haɟˈui, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu hˌawaelˈewi.|0
lˈo! taˈifa lˈeɲe ðˈambi, wˈatu wˌaliˌolemˈewa na uˈovu, uzˈao wa watˈenda mabˈaja, watˈoto wˌaliˌozoelˈea ˌupotˈovu! wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana, wˌamemkatˈaa kwa ðarˈau jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli na kˌumɡeuzˈia kisˈoɡo.|0
kwa nˈini mzˈidi kupˈiɡwa? kwa nˈini kudˈumu katˌika uˈasi? kˈitʃwa tʃˈako tʃˈote kˌimeɟˌeruhˈiwa, mˈojo wˈako wˈote ni mɡˈoɲɟua.|0
kutˈoka wˈajo wˈako wa m̩ɡˈuu hˌadi kwˈeɲe utˈosi wa kˈitʃwa tʃˈako hakˈuna uzˈima: ni mˌaɟerˈaha matˈupu na makˈovu na vidˈonda vˌitokˈavjo dˈamu, hˌavikˌusafˈiʃwa ˌau kufˈuŋɡwa wˈala kˌulainˈiʃwa kwa mafˈuta.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌimekˈuwa ukˈiwa, mˈiɟi jˈenu ˌimetˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto; ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌimeˈatʃwa tˈupu na waɡˈeni mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu, ˌimehˌaribˈiwa kˌama vˈile ˌimepˌindulˈiwa na waɡˈeni.|0
bˈinti sajˈuni ˌameˈatʃwa kˌama kipˈenu katˌika ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu, kˌama kibˈanda katˌika ʃˈamba la mˌatikˌitimˈaɟi, kˌama ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌohusurˈiwa.|0
kˌama bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasiŋɡˌelitˌuatʃˈia wˌaliˌonusurˈika, tˌuŋɡelikˈuwa kˌama sodˈoma, tˌuŋɡelˌifanˈana na ɡomˈora.|0
sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, nˈiɲi wˌatawˈala wa sodˈoma; sˌikilizˈeni ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa ɡomˈora.|0
bwˈana ˌanasˈema, wˈiŋɡi wa sadˈaka zˈenu, ni kˈitu ɡˈani kwˈaŋɡu? ninˈazo sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ɲˈiŋɡi kupˈita kiˈasi, za kondˈoo dˈume na mafˈuta ja waɲˈama wˌalionˈona. sˌipendˈezwi na dˈamu za mˌafahˈali wˈala za wˌanakondˈoo na mbˈuzi.|0
mnˌapokˈuɟa kˌuɟihˌuðurˈiʃa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, ni nˈani ˌalijˌewatˈaka nˈiɲi mfˈaɲe hˈivjo, hˈuku kˌuzikaɲˈaɡa ɲˈua zˈaŋɡu.|0
atʃˈeni kˌuniletˈea sadˈaka zˌisizokˈuwa na maˈana! uvˈumba wˈenu ni tʃukˈizo kwˈaŋɡu. mˌiandˈamo ja mwˈezi, sabˈato na mˌakusaɲˈiko ja ibˈada: siwˈezi kˌuvumilˈia mˌakusaɲˈiko jˈenu maˈovu.|0
sˌikukˈuu zˈenu za mˌiandˈamo ja mwˈezi, na sˌikukˈuu zˈenu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa: mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunazˌitʃukˈia. zˌimekˈuwa mzˈiɡo kwˈaŋɡu, nˌimetʃˈoka kˌuzivˌumilˈia.|0
mnˌapoɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˈenu katˌika maˈombi, nˌitafˈitʃa mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu nˌisiwaˈone; hˌata mkiˈomba maˈombi mˈeŋɡi sˌitasˌikilˈiza. mikˈono jˈenu ˌimeɟˈaa dˈamu.|0
ɟˌioʃˈeni na mkˌaɟitakˈase. jˌaondoˈeni matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu! atʃˈeni kutˈenda mabˈaja.|0
ɟˌifunzˈeni kutˈenda mˈema! tˌafutˈeni hˈaki, wˌatiˈeni mˈojo wˌaliˌoonˈewa. tˌeteˈeni ʃaˈuri la jatˈima, wˌateteˈeni waɟˈane.|0
ɲɟoˈoni bˌasi tˌuhoɟiˈane, asˈema bwˈana. iŋɡˈawa ðˈambi zˈenu ni kˌama rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu, zˌitakˈuwa ɲeˈupe kˌama θelˈuɟi; iŋɡˈawa ni ɲekˈundu sˈana kˌama dˈamu, zˌitakˈuwa ɲeˈupe kˌama sˈufu.|0
kˌama mkˌikubˈali na kutˈii, mtakˈula mˈema ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
lakˈini kˌama mkˌikatˈaa na kuˈasi, mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa kwa upˈaŋɡa. kwa kˌuwa kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana kˌimenˈena.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliokˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu ˌumekˈuwa kahˈaba! mwanzˈoni ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeɟˈaa uɲˈofu, hˈaki ˌilikˈuwa ˌinakˈaa ndˈani jˈake, lakˈini sˈasa ni wˌauˈaɟi.|0
fˈeða jˈenu ˌimekˈuwa tˌakatˈaka, divˈai jˈenu nzˈuri ˌimetʃaŋɡˈaɲua na mˈaɟi.|0
wˌatawˈala wˈenu ni waˈasi, rafˈiki wa wˈevi, wˈote wˌanapˈenda rˈuʃwa na kˌukimbilˈia hˈoŋɡo. hˌawatetˈei jatˈima, ʃaˈuri la mɟˈane hˌalilˈetwi mbˈele jˈao lˌisikilˈizwe.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa ˌisraˈeli, asˈema hˈivi: lˈo, nˌitapˈata farˈaɟa kutˈoka kwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu na kˌuɟilˌipizˈia kisˈasi ɟˌuːja watˈesi wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitaˌuelekˈeza mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌitawˌasafˈiʃa tˌakatˈaka zˈenu zˈote na kˌuwaˌondolˈea ˌunaɟˈisi wˈenu wˈote.|0
nˌitawˌarudiʃˈia wˌaamˈuzi wˈenu kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa sˈiku za zamˈani, nˌao wˌaʃaˈuri wˈenu kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa mwanzˈoni. bˌaadˈaje ˌutaˈitwa, ˈm̩ɟi wa hˈaki, ˈm̩ɟi mwˌaminˈifu.|0
sajˈuni ˌitakˌombolˈewa kwa hˈaki, wˈale wˌaliˈomo ndˈani jˌake wˌaliotˈubu kwa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
lakˈini waˈasi na wˌeɲe ðˈambi wˈote wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa, nˌao wˌanaomwˈatʃa bwˈana wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
mtakˈuwa kˌama mwalˈoni wˌeɲe maɟˈani jˌanajˌoɲaˈuka, kˌama bustˈani ˌisijokˈuwa na mˈaɟi.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌatatowˈeka kˌama maɟˈani makˈavu jˌawakˈajo mˈoto, na kˈazi jˌake kˌama tʃˈetʃe ja mˈoto; vjˈote vˌitauŋɡˈua pamˈoɟa, wˈala hakˈuna wa kˌuuzˈima hˈuo mˈoto.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌalilˌoliˈona isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi kuhˈusu jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
katˌika sˈiku za mwˈiʃo mlˈima wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌutaˌimarˈiʃwa kˌama mlˈima m̩kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa milˈima jˈote, ˌutaˌinulˈiwa ɟˌuːja vilˈima, na mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatamˌiminˈika hˌuko.|0
mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jˌatakˈuɟa na kusˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, twendˈeni mlimˈani ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo. ˌatatˌufundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia zˈake, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuenˈenda katˌika mapˈito jˈake. ʃerˈia ˌitatˈoka sajˈuni, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌitatˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌatahukˈumu kˈati ja mˌataˈifa na ˌataamˈua mˌiɡoɡˈoro ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi. wˌatafˈua pˈaŋɡa zˈao zˈiwe maɟˈembe, na mikˈuki jˈao kˌuwa miˈundu ja kukˈata matˈawi. taˈifa hˌalitˌainˈua upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja taˈifa ɟiŋɡˈine, wˈala hˌawatˌaɟifˈunza vˈita tˈena.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, ˈeɲi ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, tˌutembeˈeni katˌika nˈuru ja bwˈana.|0
ˌumewˌatelekˈeza wˈatu wˈako, ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo. wˌameɟˈaa ˌuʃirikˈina ˌutokˈao mˌaʃarˈiki, wˌanapˈiɡa rˈamli kˌama wˌafilˈisti na wˌanaʃikˈana mikˈono na wˌapaɡˈani.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɟˈaa fˈeða na ðahˈabu, hakˈuna mwˈiʃo wa hazˈina zˈao. ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɟˈaa farˈasi, hakˈuna mwˈiʃo wa maɡˈari jˈao.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɟˈaa sanˈamu, wˌanasˌuɟudˈia kˈazi za mikˈono jˈao, vˈitu vˈile vidˈole vjˈao vˌimevˌiteŋɡenˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo mwˌanadˈamu ˌataʃˈuʃwa na bˌinadˈamu ˌataɲˌeɲekˈezwa: ˌusiwˌasamˈehe.|0
ˌiŋɡiˈeni kwˈeɲe miˈamba, ɟˌifitʃˈeni arðˈini kˌutokˈana na utˈiʃo wa bwˈana na ˌutukˈufu wa ˈenzi jˈake.|0
mˈatʃo ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno jˌataɲˌeɲekˈezwa na kibˈuri tʃa wˌanadˈamu kˌitaʃˈuʃwa, bwˈana pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetukˈuzwa sˈiku hˈijo.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote anˈajo sˈiku ˌalijˌoiwˈeka akˈiba kwa wˈote wˌeɲe kˌuɟivˈuna na wˌeɲe kibˈuri, kwa wˈote wˌanaˌoɟikwˈeza nˌao wˌataɲˌeɲekˈezwa.|0
kwa mˌierˈezi jˈote ja lˌebanˈoni ilˈijo mirˈefu sˈana, na mˌialˈoni jˈote ja baʃˈani.|0
kwa milˈima jˈote mirˈefu na vilˈima vjˈote vˌilivjˌoinˈuka.|0
kwa kˈila mnˈara ulˈio mrˈefu sˈana na kˈila ukˈuta wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome.|0
kwa kˈila mˈeli ja bˌiaʃˈara, na kˈila tʃˈombo tʃa bˌaharˈini tʃa fahˈari.|0
mˌaɟivˈuno ja mwˌanadˈamu jˌataʃˈuʃwa, na kibˈuri tʃa wˌanadˈamu kˌitaɲˌeɲekˈezwa, bwˈana pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌatatukˈuzwa sˈiku hˈijo.|0
nˈazo sanˈamu zˌitatowˈeka kabˈisa.|0
wˈatu wˌatakˌimbilˈia kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo ndˈani ja miˈamba, na kwˈeɲe mˌahandˈaki arðˈini kˌutokˈana na utˈiʃo wa bwˈana na ˌutukˈufu wa ˈenzi jˈake, ˌainukˈapo kˌuitikˈisa dunˈia.|0
wˌatakˌimbilˈia kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo mˌiambˈani na kwˈeɲe ɲˈufa za miˈamba kˌutokˈana na utˈiʃo wa bwˈana na ˌutukˈufu wa ˈenzi jˈake, ˌainukˈapo kˌuitikˈisa dunˈia.|0
atʃˈeni kˌumtumˌainˈia mwˌanadˈamu, ambˈaje hˈana kˈitu ˈila pˈumzi katˌika pˈua zˈake. jˌeje ˈana θamˈani ɡˈani.|0
ʃuɟˈaa na ˈm̩tu wa vˈita, mwamˈuzi na nabˈii, mwaɡˈuzi na m̩zˈee.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa kikˈosi tʃa wˈatu hamsˈini na ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe tʃˈeo, mʃaˈuri, fˈundi stˈadi na mlˈozi mɟˈaɲɟa.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌavulˈana wˈawe mˌaafˈisa wˈao, watˈoto n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaowˌatawˈala.|0
wˈatu wˌataˌoneˈana wˌao kwa wˈao: ˈm̩tu ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu, na ɟirˈani ðˈidi ja ɟirˈani jˈake. kiɟˈana ˌatainˈuka ðˈidi ja m̩zˈee, ˈm̩tu mɲˈoŋɡe ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe heʃˈima.|0
ˈm̩tu ˌatamkamˈata mmˈoɟa wa ndˈuɡu zˌake katˌika ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˌake na kusˈema, unˈalo ɟˈoho, sˈasa ˈuwe kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈetu, tawˈala lˈundo hˈili la maɡˈofu.|0
lakˈini sˈiku hˈijo ˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele ˌakisˈema, sˈina ˌupoɲˈaɟi. sˈina tʃakˈula wˈala mavˈazi katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu, msˌinifˈaɲe nˈiwe kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu.|0
jˌerusalˈemu ˌinapˌepesˈuka, jˈuda ˌinaaŋɡˈuka; manˈeno jˈao na matˈendo jˈao ni kiɲˈume na bwˈana, wˌakiˌuðarˈau uwˈepo wˌake ˌuliˌotukˈuka.|0
ɲˈuso zˈao zˌinavjˌoonekˈana zˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈao, hˌuɟivunˈia ðˈambi jˈao kˌama sodˈoma, wˈala hˌawaifˈitʃi. ˈole wˈao! wˌameɟˌiletˈea maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
wˌaambˈie waɲˈofu ˌitakˈuwa hˈeri kwˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˌatafˌurahˈia tˈunda la matˈendo jˈao.|0
ˈole kwa wˈatu waˈovu! maˈafa jˈapo ɟˈuu jˈao! wˌatalˈipwa kwa aɟˈili ja jˈale mikˈono jˈao ˌilijotˈenda.|0
viɟˈana wˌanawatˈesa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˌanawˈake wˌanawˌatawˈala. ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈenu wˌanawˌapotˈoʃa, wˌanawˌapotˈeza ɲɟˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌanatʃukˈua nafˈasi jˌake mˌahakamˈani, ˌanasimˈama kˌuhukˈumu wˈatu.|0
bwˈana ˌanaiŋɡˈia katˌika hukˈumu ðˈidi ja wazˈee na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu wˈake: nˈiɲi n̩dˈio mlˌioharˈibu ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu, mˈali zˌilizˌoɲaŋɡˈaɲua maskˈini zˈimo ɲumbˈani mwˈenu.|0
mnˌamaanˈiʃa nˈini kˌuwapˈonda wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuzisˈaɡa ɲˈuso za maskˈini? asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
bwˈana asˈema, wˌanawˈake wa sajˈuni wˈana kibˈuri, wˌanatembˈea na ʃˈiŋɡo ndˈefu, wˌakikoɲˈeza kwa mˈatʃo jˈao, wˌanatembˈea kwa hatˈua za madˈaha, wakˈiwa na mapˈambo ja ɲɟˈuɡa kwˈeɲe vifˈundo vja miɡˈuu jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌatalˈeta maɟˈipu kwˈeɲe vˈitʃwa vja wˌanawˈake wa sajˈuni; bwˈana ˌatazifˈaɲa ŋɡˈozi za vˈitʃwa vjˈao kˌuwa vipˈara.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌatawˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲa uzˈuri wˈao: baŋɡˈili, tˈepe za kitʃwˈani, mikˈufu jˌeɲe alˈama za mwˈezi mwandˈamo.|0
vipˈuli, vikˈuku, ʃˈela.|0
vilˈemba, mikˈufu ja vifˈundo vja miɡˈuu, mʃˈipi, tʃˈupa za mˌanukˈato na hirˈizi.|0
pˈete zˌeɲe muhˈuri, pˈete za puˈani.|0
maɟˈoho mazˈuri, mˌitandˈio, mavˈazi, kifˈuko tʃa kˌutilˈia fˈeða.|0
viˈoo, mavˈazi ja kitˈani, tˈaɟi na ʃˈali.|0
