badˈala ja harˈufu ja mˌanukˈato kˌutakˈuwa na uvˈundo; badˈala ja miʃˈipi, ni kˈamba; badˈala ja ɲuˈele zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa vizˈuri, ni upˈara; badˈala ja mavˈazi mazˈuri, ni ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia; badˈala ja uzˈuri, ni alˈama ja aˈibu kwa tʃˈuma tʃa mˈoto.|0
wˌanaˈume wˈako wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈako wˌatauˈawa vitˈani.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˌanawˈake sˈaba wˌatamʃˈika mwˌanaˈume mmˈoɟa wˌakisˈema, tˌutakˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈetu weɲˈewe na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo zˈetu weɲˈewe, ˈila wˌewe ˌuturuhˈusu tu tuˈitwe kwa ɟˈina lˈako. ˌutuˌondolˈee aˈibu jˈetu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile tˈawi la bwˈana lˌitakˈuwa zˈuri na lˈeɲe ˌutukˈufu, nˈalo tˈunda la ˈn̩tʃi lˌitakˈuwa fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu wa wˈale wˌaisraˈeli wˌatakˌaonˌusurˈika.|0
wˈale wˌatakˌaoˈatʃwa sajˈuni, wˌatakˌaobˈaki jˌerusalˈemu, wˌataˈitwa wˌatakatˈifu, wˈale wˈote ambˈao wˌameˌoroðˈeʃwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa walˈio hˈai hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
bwˈana ˌataˌusafˈiʃa utʃˈafu wa wˌanawˈake wa sajˈuni, ˌatatakˈasa madˈoa ja dˈamu kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kwa rˈoho ja hukˈumu na rˈoho ja mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌataˈumba ɟˌuːja mlˈima wˈote wa sajˈuni, na ɟˌuːja wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌokusaɲˈika hˈapo, wˈiŋɡu la mˈoʃi wakˈati wa mtʃˈana, na kuŋɡˈaa kwa miˈali ja mˈoto wakˈati wa usˈiku, nˈako ɟˌuːja hˈuo ˌutukˈufu wˈote kˌutatˈanda kˌifunˈiko tʃa ulˈinzi.|0
ˌutakˈuwa sitˈara na kivˈuli kˌutokˈana na ɟˈoto la mtʃˈana, na kˌuwa mahˈali pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa kˌutokˈana na ðorˈuba na mvˈua.|0
nˌitaˈimba wˈimbo kwa aɟˈili ja mmˈoɟa nˌimpendˈaje, kuhˈusu ʃˈamba lˈake la mˌizabˈibu: mpˈendwa wˈaŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa na ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu kwˈeɲe kilˈima tʃˌeɲe rutˈuba.|0
ˌalililˈima na kˌuondˈoa mˈawe na ˌakalˌiotˈeʃa mˌizabˈibu bˈora sˈana. ˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mnˈara wa ulˈinzi ndˈani jˈake, na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamulˈia divˈai pˈia. kˈiʃa ˌakatˌazamˈia kupˈata mazˈao ja zabˈibu nzˈuri, lakˈini lˌilizˈaa matˈunda mabˈaja tˈu.|0
bˌasi ˈeɲi wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu na wˈatu wa jˈuda, hˌukumˈuni kˈati jˈaŋɡu na ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu.|0
ni nˈini zaˈidi ambˈatʃo kˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌufaɲˈika kwa ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu kulˈiko jˈale nˌilijofˈaɲa? nˌilipˌotazamˈia kupˈata zabˈibu nzˈuri, kwa nˈini lˌilizˈaa zabˈibu m̩bˈaja tˈu.|0
sˈasa nˌitawˌaambˈia lˈile nˌitakˌalolˌitendˈea ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu: nˌitaondˈoa uzˈio wˈake, nˈalo lˌitahˌaribˈiwa, nˌitabomˈoa ukˈuta wˈake, nˈalo lˌitakaɲˈaɡwa.|0
nˌitalifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi ja ukˈiwa ˌisijˌokalˈiwa na wˈatu, hˌalitˌakatˈiwa matˈawi wˈala kulˈimwa, nˈajo mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba ˌitamˈea hˌuko, nˌitaamˈuru mawˈiŋɡu jˌasiɲˈeʃe mvˈua ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ʃˈamba la mzabˈibu la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ni ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, na wˈatu wa jˈuda ni bustˈani jˌake ja kˌumpendˈeza. ˌalitˌazamˈia hˈaki, lakˈini ˌakaˈona ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu, ˌalitˌazamˈia ˌuadilˈifu, lakˈini ˌakasikˈia vilˈio vja taˈabu.|0
ˈole wˈenu mnˌaooŋɡˈeza ɲˈumba baˌada ja ɲˈumba na kˌuuŋɡanˈiʃa maʃˈamba baˌada ja maʃˈamba hˌadi hakˈuna nafˈasi ˌilijobˈaki, nˌaɲi mnaˈiʃi pˈeke jˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamesˈema nˌikisikˈia: hakˈika ɲˈumba kˈubwa zˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa, nˈajo maɟˈumba ja fahˈari jˌatabˈaki bˌila kˌukalˈiwa.|0
ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu la ˈeka kˈumi lˌitatˈoa bˈaθi mˈoɟa ja divˈai, na homˈeri ja mbˈeɡu zˌilizopˈandwa ˌitatˈoa ˈefa mˈoɟa tu ja nafˈaka.|0
ˈole wˌao wˈale wˌaamkˈao ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema wˌakikˌimbilˈia kˈuɲua vilˈeo, wˈale wˌakawiˈao sˈana mpˈaka usˈiku, mpˈaka wˌamewˈaka kwa mvˈiɲo.|0
wˈana vinˈubi na zˈeze kwˈeɲe karˈamu zˈao, matˈari, filˈimbi na mvˈiɲo, lakˈini hˌawajaɟˈali matˈendo ja bwˈana, wˈala hawˈana heʃˈima kwa aɟˈili ja kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni kwa sabˈabu ja kukˈosa ˌufahˈamu, wˈatu wˌao wˌeɲe vjˈeo wˌatakˈufa kwa ɲɟˈaa na wˈatu wˌao wˈeŋɡi wˌatakaˈuka kwa kˈiu.|0
hˈivjo mwˌanadˈamu ˌataʃˈuʃwa, na bˌinadˈamu kˌuɲeɲekˈezwa, mˈatʃo ja wˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno jˌataɲˌeɲekˈezwa.|0
lakˈini bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatatukˈuzwa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaki jˈake, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu ˌataɟˌioɲˈeʃa mweɲˈewe kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa hˈaki jˈake.|0
kondˈoo wˌataɟilˈiʃa kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo jˈao weɲˈewe, wˌanakondˈoo wˌataɟilˈiʃa katˌika maɡˈofu ja mˌataɟˈiri.|0
ˈole wˌao wˌanaovˈuta ðˈambi kwa kˈamba za ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na uˈovu kˌama kwa kˈamba za mkˌokotˈeni.|0
kwa wˈale wˌanaosˈema, mˈuŋɡu na afˈaɲe harˈaka, ˌaharakˈiʃe kˈazi jˌake ˌili tupˈate kˌuiˈona. hˈuo mpˈaŋɡo wa alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli na ˌukamilˈike, tˈena ˌuðihirˈike ˌili tupˈate kˌuuɟˈua.|0
ˈole wˌao wˌanaoˈita ubˈaja ni wˈema, na wˈema ni ubˈaja, wˌawekˈao ɡˈiza badˈala ja nˈuru, na nˈuru badˈala ja ɡˈiza, wˌawekˈao utʃˈuŋɡu badˈala ja utˈamu, na utˈamu badˈala ja utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
ˈole wˌao walˈio na hekˈima matʃˈoni pˈao weɲˈewe, na kˌuɟiˈona wˌeɲe akˈili matʃˈoni pˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ˈole wˌao walˈio mˌaʃuɟˈaa kwa kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo, nˌao walˈio hodˈari katˌika kˌutʃaŋɡˈaɲa vilˈeo.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌoatʃilˈia wˌeɲe hatˈia kwa kˌupokˈea hˈoŋɡo, lakˈini hˌuwaɲˈima hˈaki wasˈio na hatˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo, kˌama ndˈimi za mˈoto zˌirambˈavjo ɲˈasi, na kˌama vˈile maɟˈani makˈavu jˌazamˈavjo katˌika miˈali ja mˈoto, ndˈivjo mizˈizi jˈao ˌitakˌavjoˈoza na maˈua jˈao jˌatakˌavjopˌeperˈuʃwa kˌama mavˈumbi; kwa kˌuwa wˌameˌikatˈaa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote na kˌulisˌukumˈia mbˈali nˈeno la alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo hasˈira ja bwˈana ˌinawˈaka ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈake, mkˈono wˌake ˌumeˌinulˈiwa na ˌanawapˈiɡa. milˈima ˌinatˌetemˈeka, maˈiti ni kˌama tˌakatˈaka kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara. hˌata kwa hˈaja jˈote, hasˈira jˌake hˌaiɟˌaɡeukˈia mbˈali, mkˈono wˌake bˈado ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
jˌeje ˌanainˈua bendˈera kwa aɟˈili ja mˌataˈifa jalˈijo mbˈali, ˌanapˈiɡa filˈimbi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale walˈio kwˈeɲe miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. tazˈama wˌamekˈuɟa, kwa kˈasi na kwa harˈaka.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌanajetʃˈoka wˈala kˌuɟikwˈaa, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌesinzˈia wˈala kulˈala, hakˈuna mkˈanda ˌuliˌoleɡˈezwa kˌiunˈoni, hakˈuna ɡidˈamu ja kiˈatu ˌilijˌokatˈika.|0
miʃˈale jˈao ni mikˈali, pˈinde zˈao zˈote zˌimevˈutwa, kwˈato za farˈasi wˌao zˈiko kˌama ɟˈiwe la ɡˌumeɡˈume, mˌaɡurudˈumu ja maɡˈari jˈao ja vˈita ni kˌama upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli.|0
ŋɡurˈumo jˈao ni kˌama ˈile ja sˈimba, wˌanaŋɡurˈuma kˌama wˈana sˈimba, wˌanakorˈoma wˌanapˌokamˈata mawˈindo jˈao, na kˌuondˈoka nˈajo pasˈipo jejˈote wa kˌuokˈoa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˌataŋɡurˈuma ɟˈuu jˌake kˌama ŋɡurˈumo za bahˈari. kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakiˌitazˈama ˈn̩tʃi, ˌataˈona ɡˈiza na ðˈiki; hˌata nˈuru ˌitatˈiwa ɡˈiza kwa mawˈiŋɡu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka ˈule mfˈalme uzˈia ˌalikˈufa, nˌilimwˈona bwˈana ˌamekˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi, kilˈitʃo ɟˈuu na kˌilitʃˌotukˈuzwa sˈana, nˈalo pˈindo la ɟˈoho lˈake lˌikaɟˈaza hekˈalu.|0
ɟˈuu jˌake wˌalikuwˈepo mˌaserˈafi, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa sˈita: kwa mabˈawa mawˈili wˌalifunˈika ɲˈuso zˈao, kwa meŋɡˈine mawˈili wˌalifunˈika miɡˈuu jˈao, na kwa mawˈili wˌalikˈuwa wˌakirˈuka.|0
nˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiitˈana kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake: mtˌakatˈifu, mtˌakatˈifu, mtˌakatˈifu ni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote; dunˈia jˈote ˌimeɟˈaa ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
kwa saˈuti zˈao, miˈimo ja milˈaŋɡo na vˌiziŋɡˈiti vˌilitˌikisˈika, nˈalo hekˈalu lˌikaɟˈaa mˈoʃi.|0
ndˈipo nˌikalˈia, ˈole wˈaŋɡu! nˌimeˌaŋɡamˈia! kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe midˈomo mitʃˈafu, nˌami nˌinaˈiʃi kˌatikˈati ja wˈatu wˌeɲe midˈomo mitʃˈafu, nˈajo mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌamemwˈona mfˈalme, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ndˈipo mmˈoɟa wa wˈale mˌaserˈafi ˌakarˈuka kˌuniɟˈia akˈiwa na kˈaa la mˈoto lˌinalowˈaka mkonˈoni mwˈake, ambˈalo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamelˌitʃukˈua kwa kolˈeo kutˈoka mˌaðabahˈuni.|0
ˌakaniɡˈusa nˈalo kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu na kusˈema, tazˈama, hˈili lˌimeɡˈusa midˈomo jˈako, uˈovu wˈako ˌumeˌondolˈewa, nˈajo ðˈambi jˈako ˌimesˌamehˈewa.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikasikˈia saˈuti ja bwˈana ˌikisˈema, nimtˈume nˈani? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajekwˈenda kwa aɟˈili jˈetu? nˌami nˌikasˈema, mˌimi hˈapa. nitˈume mˈimi.|0
ˌakasˈema, nˈenda ˌukawˌaambˈie wˈatu hˈawa:  mtˌaendelˈea daˈima kˌusikilˈiza, lakˈini kˈamwe hˌamtaelˈewa; mtˌaendelˈea daˈima kˌutazˈama, lakˈini kˈamwe hˌamtatambˈua..|0
ndˈipo nˌikasˈema, hˌadi lˈini, ˈee bwˈana? nˌaje ˌakaniɟˈibu: hˌadi mˈiɟi ˈiwe ˌimeˈatʃwa maɡˈofu na bˌila wakˈazi, hˌadi ɲˈumba zˌitakˌapobˈaki bˌila wˈatu, na maʃˈamba jˌatakˌapohˌaribˈiwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
hˌadi bwˈana ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamekwˈiʃa kˌumpelˈeka kˈila mmˈoɟa mbˈali sˈana, na ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˌapokˈuwa ˌimeˈatʃwa kabˈisa.|0
hˌata kˌama sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja wˈatu wˌatabˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌitahˌaribˈiwa tˈena. lakˈini kˌama vˈile mvˈiɲɟe na mwalˈoni ˌibakizˈavjo visˈiki ˌinapokˈatwa, ndˈivjo mbˈeɡu tˌakatˈifu ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa kisˈiki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wakˈati ahˈazi mwˈana wa joθˈamu, mwˈana wa uzˈia, ˌalipokˈuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mfˈalme resˈini wa arˈamu, na pˈeka mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipˈanda kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌuuʃˈinda.|0
wakˈati hˈuu ɲˈumba ja daˈudi ˌiliambˈiwa, arˈamu wˌameuŋɡˈana na ˌefraˈimu. kwa hˈijo miˈojo ja ahˈazi na wˈatu wˌake ˌilitikˈiswa, kˌama mˈiti ja msitˈuni ˌinavjˌotikˈiswa na upˈepo.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia isˈaja, tˌoka uˈende, wˌewe na mwanˈao ʃˈear jaʃˈubu, mkutˈane na ahˈazi hˌuko mwˈiʃo wa mferˈeɟi wa bwˈawa la ɟˈuu, kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara ˌiendˈajo ʃˈamba la dˈobi.|0
mwambˈie, ˈuwe mwˌaŋɡalˈifu, ˌutulˈie na ˌusioɡˈope. usˈife mˈojo kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu hˈawa wawˈili walˈio kˌama visˈiki vja kˈuni vˌifukˈavjo mˈoʃi, kwa aɟˈili ja hasˈira kˈali ja resˈini na arˈamu na ja mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia.|0
arˈamu, ˌefraˈimu na mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia wˌamepˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ˌili wˌakuˌaŋɡamˈize, wˌakisˈema.|0
tˌuiʃˌambulˈie jˈuda, nˈaam, tˌuirarˈue vipˈande vipˈande na kˌuiɡˈawa mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu, na kˌumtawˈaza mwˈana wa tˌabeˈeli ˈawe mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
lakˈini bwˈana mweɲˈezi asˈema hˈivi:  ɟˈambo hˈili hˌalitˌatendˈeka, hˌalitˌatokˈea.|0
kwa kˌuwa kˈitʃwa tʃa arˈamu ni damˈeski, na kˈitʃwa tʃa damˈeski ni resˈini pˈeke jˈake. katˌika mˈuda wa miˈaka sitˈini na mitˈano, ˌefraˈimu ˌatakˈuwa ˌamehˌaribˈiwa kiˈasi kwˌamba hˌatawˈeza tˈena kˌuwa taˈifa.|0
kˈitʃwa tʃa ˌefraˈimu ni sˌamarˈia, na kˈitʃwa tʃa sˌamarˈia ni mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia pˈeke jˈake. kˌama hˌamtasimˈama θabˈiti katˌika imˈani jˈenu, hˌamtaˌimarˈika kˈamwe..|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema na ahˈazi tˈena.|0
mwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako iʃˈara, ˈiwe kwˈeɲe vˈina virˈefu sˈana, ˌau kwˈeɲe vˈimo virˈefu sˈana.|0
lakˈini ahˈazi ˌakasˈema, sˌitaˈomba; sˌitamɟarˈibu bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo isˈaja ˌakasˈema, sikˈia sˈasa, ˈewe ɲˈumba ja daˈudi! ɟˈe, hˌaitˈoʃi kˌuɟarˈibu ˌuvumilˈivu wa wˌanadˈamu? ɟˈe, mtˌauɟarˈibu ˌuvumilˈivu wa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu pˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌatawˈapa iʃˈara: bikˈira ˌatatʃukˈua mˈimba, nˌaje ˌatamzˈaa mwˈana, na ˌataˈitwa ˌimanuˈeli.|0
ˌatakˈula ɟibˈini na asˈali ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamewˈeza kˌukatˈaa mabˈaja na kˌutʃaɡˈua mˈema.|0
lakˈini kˈabla mtˈoto hˌaɟaɟˈua kˌukatˈaa mabˈaja na kˌutʃaɡˈua mˈema, ˈn̩tʃi ja wafˈalme hˈao wawˈili ˌunaˌowaoɡˈopa ˌitafˈaɲua ukˈiwa.|0
bwˈana ˌatalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈako, ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈako, na ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈako wakˈati ambˈao hˌauɟawˈahi kuwˈako ʃˈu ˌefraˈimu ˌalipˌoɟitˈeŋɡa na jˈuda: jˌeje ˌatawˌaleteˈeni mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌatawˌapiɡˈia filˈimbi maˈinzi kutˈoka viɟˈito vja mbˈali vja mˈisri, na ɲˈuki kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja aʃˈuru.|0
wˈote wˌatakˈuɟa na kukˈaa kwˈeɲe mabˈonde jˌeɲe mˌiterˈemko, na kwˈeɲe ɲˈufa za miˈamba, kwˈeɲe vitʃˈaka vjˈote vjˌeɲe miˈiba, na kwˈeɲe maʃˈimo jˈote ja mˈaɟi.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌatatumˈia wˈembe ˌuliˌoaɟirˈiwa kutˈoka ŋɡˈambo ja ˈm̩to, jaˈani mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, kuɲˈoa ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈako na mˌalaˈika ja miɡˈuu jˈako, na kˌuziondˈoa ndˈevu zˈako pˈia.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, ˈm̩tu ˌatahifˈaði hˈai ndˈama mmˈoɟa na kondˈoo wawˈili.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja wˈiŋɡi wa mazˈiwa wˌatakˌajotˈoa, ˌatapˈata ɟibˈini ja kˈula. wˈote wˌatakˌaobakˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌatakˈula ɟibˈini na asˈali.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, kˈila mahˈali pˌalipokˈuwa na mˌizabˈibu ˈelfu mˈoɟa jˌeɲe θamˈani ja ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za fˈeða, pˌatakˈuwa na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba tˈu.|0
wˈatu wˌatakwˈenda hˌuko wakˈiwa na upˈinde na mʃˈale, kwa maˈana ˈn̩tʃi ˌitafunˈikwa na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba.|0
kuhˈusu vilˈima vjˈote vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌikilˈimwa kwa ɟˈembe, hˌamtakwˈenda hˌuko tˈena kwa aɟˈili ja hˈofu ja mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba. pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali ambˈapo ŋɡˈombe wˌataatʃˈiwa hˈuru, na kondˈoo kˌukimbˈia kimbˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, tʃukˈua ɡˈombo kˈubwa, ˌuandˈike ɟˈuu jˌake kwa kalˈamu ja kˌawaˈida ɟˈina: mˈaher ʃˈalal hˈaʃ bˈazi.|0
nˌami nˌitawaˈita kuhˈani urˈia, na zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa jˌeberekˈia kˌama mˌaʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu wˌaaminˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaˈenda kwa nabˈii ˈm̩ke, nˌaje ˌakapˈata mˈimba, ˌakazˈaa mwˈana. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˈite hˈujo mtˈoto mˈaher ʃˈalal hˈaʃ bˈazi.|0
kˈabla mtˈoto hˌaɟawˈeza kusˈema bˈaba jˈaŋɡu ˌau mˈama jˈaŋɡu, ˌutaɟˈiri wa damˈeski na ɲˈara za sˌamarˈia zˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa na mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema nˌami tˈena.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˈatu hˈawa wˌamekatˈaa mˈaɟi ja ʃˈilo jˌatirˌirikˈajo tˌaratˈibu wˌakamfˌurahˈia resˈini na mwˈana wa rˌemalˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ju karˈibu kulˈeta ðˈidi jˈao mˌafurˈiko makˈubwa ja ˈm̩to: jaˈani mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru na fahˈari jˌake jˈote. jˌatafurˈika ɟˌuːja mˌiferˈeɟi jˌake jˈote, jˌatamwˌaɡikˈia ɟˌuːja kˈiŋɡo zˌake zˈote.|0
na kufˈika hˌadi jˈuda, jˌakizuŋɡˈuka kwa kˈasi ɟˈuu jˈake, jˌakipˈita kˌatikˈati na jˌakifˈika hˌadi ʃiŋɡˈoni. mabˈawa jˌake jˌalijˌokuɲɟulˈiwa jˌatafunˈika upˈana wa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, ˈee ˌimanuˈeli.|0
ˌinuˈeni kilˈio tʃa vˈita, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, na mkˌavuɲɟuevˈuɲɟue! sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi ɲˈote ˈn̩tʃi za mbˈali. ɟˌiandaˈeni kwa vˈita, nˌaɲi mkˌavuɲɟuevˈuɲɟue! ɟˌiandaˈeni kwa vˈita, nˌaɲi mkˌavuɲɟuevˈuɲɟue.|0
wekˈeni mˌikakˈati jˈenu, lakˈini ˌitaʃˈindwa; faɲˈeni mipˈaŋɡo jˈenu, lakˈini hˌaitˌafanikˈiwa, kwa maˈana mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈasi.|0
bwˈana ˌalisˈema nˌami mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ukˈiwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, ˌakiniˈoɲa nˌisifuˈate ɲɟˈia za taˈifa hˈili. ˌakasˈema.|0
ˌusiˈite fitˈina kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo wˈatu hˈawa hˌukiˈita fitˈina, ˌusioɡˈope kˈile wˌanatʃˌokioɡˈopa, wˈala ˌusikihˈofu.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌikupasˈaje kˌumheʃˈimu kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu, n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌutakˌajemwoɡˈopa, n̩dˈije pˈeke jˌake ˌutakˌajemhˈofu.|0
nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu; lakˈini kwa ɲˈumba zˈote mbˈili za ˌisraˈeli ˌatakˈuwa ɟˈiwe lˈile lˌinalˌosababˈiʃa wˈatu kˌuɟikwˈaa na mwˈamba wa kˌuwaaŋɡˈuʃa. kwa wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu, ˌatakˈuwa mtˈeɡo na tˈanzi.|0
wˈeŋɡi wˌao wˌataɟikwˈaa; wˌataaŋɡˈuka na kˌuvuɲɟˈika, wˌatatˈeɡwa na kunˈaswa.|0
fˈuŋɡa ˌuʃuhˈuda na kutˈia muhˈuri ʃerˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanafˈunzi wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitamŋɡoɟˈea bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌameifˈitʃa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo ˈuso wˈake. nˌitaliwˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈaŋɡu kwˈake.|0
nˈiko hˈapa, pamˈoɟa na watˈoto ambˈao bwˈana ˌamenˈipa. sˌisi ni iʃˈara na mfˈano wˌake katˌika ˌisraˈeli, kutˈoka kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌanajeˈiʃi ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wˌanapˌowaambˈia nˈiɲi kˌutafˈuta ˌuʃaˈuri kwa wˌaaɡˈuzi na wˌeɲe kˌuoŋɡˈea na mizˈimu, ambˈao hˌunoŋɡˈona na kˌunuŋɡunˈika, ɟˈe, wˈatu wˌasiŋɡˌeulˈiza kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao? kwa nˈini watˈake ʃaˈuri kwa wˈafu kwa aɟˈili ja walˈio hˈai.|0
kwa ʃerˈia na kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda! kˌama hˌawatasˈema sˌawasˈawa na nˈeno hˈili, hawˈana mwˈaŋɡa wa mˌapambazˈuko.|0
kˈiʃa wˌataˌaŋɡalˈia dˌuniˈani na kuˈona tu ðˈiki na ɡˈiza, hˈofu na huzˈuni tˈupu, nˌao wˌatasˌukumˈiwa kwˈeɲe ɡˈiza nˈene kabˈisa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, hˌapatˌakuwˈepo huzˈuni tˈena kwa wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika ðˈiki. wakˈati ˌuliopˈita ˌaliiðˈili ˈn̩tʃi ja zˌabulˈoni na ˈn̩tʃi ja naftˈali, lakˈini katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo ˌataˌiheʃˈimu ɡˌalilˈaja ja mˌataˈifa, karˈibu na ɲɟˈia ja bahˈari, kˈando ja jordˈani.|0
wˈatu wˌanaˌotembˈea katˌika ɡˈiza wˌameˈona nˈuru kˈuu, wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja uvˈuli wa maˈuti, nˈuru ˌimewˌazukˈia.|0
ˌumelikˈuza taˈifa, na kˌuzidˈiʃa furˈaha jˈao, wˌanafˌurahˈia mbˈele zˈako, kˌama wˈatu wˌanavjˌofurahˈia wakˈati wa mavˈuno, kˌama wˈatu wˌafurahˈivjo wˌaɡawaɲˈapo ɲˈara.|0
kˌama vˈile sˈiku ja kuʃˈindwa kwa wˌamidiˈani, ˌumevˈuɲɟa nˈira ˌilijˌowalemˈea, ˈile ɡˈoŋɡo mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao na fˈimbo jˌake jˌeje ˌalijˌewaonˈea.|0
kˈila kiˈatu tʃa askˈari kˌilitʃˌotumˈiwa vitˈani, na kˈila vˈazi lˌililˌoviŋɡirˈiʃwa katˌika dˈamu vˌitawˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja kutʃˈomwa, vˌitakˈuwa kˈuni za kuwˈaʃa mˈoto.|0
kwa maˈana, kwa aɟˈili jˈetu mtˈoto ˌamezalˈiwa, tˌumepˈewa mtˈoto mwˌanaˈume, nˌao ˌutawˈala ˌutakˈuwa mˌabeɡˈani mwˈake. nˌaje ˌataˈitwa mʃaˈuri wa aɟˈabu, mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, bˈaba wa milˈele, mfˈalme wa amˈani.|0
kˌuoŋɡezˈeka kwa ˌutawˈala wˌake na amˈani hˌakutakˈuwa na mwˈiʃo. ˌatatawˈala katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi na ɟˌuːja ufˈalme wˈake, ˌakiˌuθibitˈiʃa na kˌuutˌeɡemˈeza kwa hˈaki na kwa adˈili, ʃˈu wakˈati hˈuo na hˌata milˈele. wˈivu wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌutatimˈiza hˈaja.|0
bwˈana ˌametˈuma uɟˈumbe ðˈidi ja jakˈobo, ˌutamwˌaŋɡukˈia ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌataɟˈua hˈili: ˌefraˈimu na wakˈazi wa sˌamarˈia, wˌanaosˈema kwa kibˈuri na mˌaɟivˈuno ja miˈojo.|0
mˌatofˈali jˌameaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini, lakˈini tˌutaɟˈeŋɡa tˈena kwa mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa, mitˈini ˌimeaŋɡˈuʃwa, lakˈini tˌutapˈanda mˌierˈezi badˈala jˈake.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌamemtˈia ŋɡˈuvu adˈui wa resˈini ðˈidi jˈao na kˌutʃotʃˈea watˈesi wˈao.|0
wˌaaʃˈuru kutˈoka upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na wˌafilˈisti kutˈoka upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi wˌameˈila ˌisraˈeli kwa kˈiɲua kˌilitʃˌopanulˈiwa. hˌata kwa hˈaja jˈote, hasˈira jˌake hˌaiɟˌaɡeukˈia mbˈali, mkˈono wˌake bˈado ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu hˌawaɟˌamrudˈia jˌeje ˌalijˌewapˈiɡa, wˈala hˌawaɟˌamtafˈuta bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌatakˌatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka ˌisraˈeli kˈitʃwa na m̩kˈia, tˈawi la mtˈende na tˈete katˌika sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
wazˈee na wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri n̩dˈio vˈitʃwa, nˌao mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌofundˈiʃa uˈoŋɡo n̩dˈio m̩kˈia.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌowaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu hˈawa wˌanawˌapotˈoʃa, nˌao wˈale wˌanaˌooŋɡˈozwa wˌamepotˈoka.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana hˌatawˌafurahˈia viɟˈana, wˈala hˌatawˌahurumˈia jatˈima na waɟˈane, kwa kˌuwa kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao hˈamtʃi mˈuŋɡu, nˌao ni waˈovu, na kˈila kˈiɲua kˌinanˈena ˌupotˈovu. hˌata kwa hˈaja jˈote, hasˈira jˌake hˌaiɟˌaɡeukˈia mbˈali, mkˈono wˌake bˈado ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
hakˈika uˈovu huwˈaka kˌama mˈoto; hˌuteketˈeza mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba, huwˈaʃa mˈoto vitʃˈaka vja msitˈuni, hˌuɟivˌiriŋɡˈiʃa kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu kˌama ŋɡˈuzo ja mˈoʃi.|0
kwa hasˈira ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˈn̩tʃi ˌitatʃˈomwa kwa mˈoto, nˌao wˈatu wˌatakˈuwa kˈuni za kˌutʃotʃˈea mˈoto. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajemhˌurumˈia ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
upˈande wa kuˈume wˌatakˈuwa wˌakitafˈuna, lakˈini bˈado wˌataˈona ɲɟˈaa; upˈande wa kuʃˈoto wˌatakˈuwa wakˈila, lakˈini hˌawataʃˈiba. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌataɟilˈiʃa kwa ɲˈama ja mtˈoto wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
manˈase atˈamla ˌefraˈimu, nˌaje ˌefraˈimu atˈamla manˈase; nˌao pamˈoɟa wˌatakˈuwa kiɲˈume na jˈuda. hˌata kwa hˈaja jˈote, hasˈira jˌake hˌaiɟˌaɡeukˈia mbˈali, mkˈono wˌake bˈado ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
ˈole wˌao wˌawekˈao ʃerˈia zisˈizo za hˈaki, kwa wˈale wˌatoˈao ˈamri za kˌuonˈea.|0
kˌuwaɲˈima maskˈini hˈaki zˈao na kˌuzuilˈia hˈaki za wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaliˌoonˈewa, kˌuwafˈaɲa waɟˈane mawˈindo jˈao na kˌuwaɲaŋɡˈaɲa jatˈima.|0
mtafˈaɲa nˈini sˈiku ja kutˈoa hesˈabu, wakˈati maˈafa jˌatakˌapokˈuɟa kutˈoka mbˈali? mtˌamkimbilˈia nˈani awˈape msaˈada? mtaˈatʃa wˈapi mˈali zˈenu.|0
hˌakutˌasalˈia kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, ˌisipokˈuwa kˌuɟikuɲˈata mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa matˈeka, ˌau kˌuaŋɡˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌouˈawa. hˌata kwa hˈaja jˈote, hasˈira jˌake hˌaiɟˌaɡeukˈia mbˈali, mkˈono wˌake bˈado ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
ˈole kwa aʃˈuru, fˈimbo ja hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje mkonˈoni mwˈake ˈana rˈuŋɡu ja ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌinamtˈuma ðˈidi ja taˈifa lˌisilomɟˈua mˈuŋɡu, nˌinamtˈuma ðˈidi ja taˈifa lˌinalˌonikˌasirˈiʃa, kˌukamˈata matˈeka na kˌuɲakˈua ɲˈara, pˈia kˌuwakaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini kˌama matˈope ja bˌarabarˈani.|0
lakˈini hˈili sˈilo ˌanalˌokusudˈia, hˈili sˈilo alˈilo nˈalo ˌakilˈini; kusˈudi lˈake ni kˌuaŋɡamˈiza, kˌujakomˈeʃa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi.|0
maˈana asˈema, ɟˈe, wafˈalme wˈote si mˌaɟemadˈari wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, kˈalno hˌakutˈendwa kˌama kˌarkemˈiʃi? hamˈaθi si kˌama arpˈadi, nˈajo sˌamarˈia si kˌama damˈeski.|0
kˌama vˈile mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌulivjotwˈaa fˈalme za sanˈamu, fˈalme ambˈazo viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vˌilizˈidi vˈile vja jˌerusalˈemu na sˌamarˈia.|0
ɟˈe, nˌisiˌiʃuɣˌulikˈie jˌerusalˈemu na sanˈamu zˌake kˌama nˌilivjˌoʃuɣˌulikˈia sˌamarˈia na viɲˈaɡo vjˈake?.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamemalˈiza kˈazi jˌake jˈote ðˈidi ja mlˈima sajˈuni na jˌerusalˈemu, ˌatasˈema, nˌitamwaðˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaɟivˈuno ja ˌukaˈidi wa mˈojo wˌake na kˌutazˈama kwa mˈatʃo jˌeɲe ðarˈau.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌanasˈema:  kwa ŋɡˈuvu za mkˈono wˈaŋɡu nˌimefˈaɲa hˈili, kwa hekˈima jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu nˈina ˌufahˈamu. nˌiliondˈoa mipˈaka ja mˌataˈifa, nˌilitˈeka ɲˈara hazˈina zˈao, kˌama jˌeje alˈije ʃuɟˈaa nˌiliwˌatiˈiʃa wafˈalme wˈao.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌatiˈavjo mkˈono kwˈeɲe kiˈota, ndˈivjo mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌulivjˌotʃukˈua ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa; kˌama wˈatu wˌakusaɲˈavjo majˈai jˌalijoˈatʃwa, ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌokusˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi zˈote; wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijepˈiɡa bˈawa ˌau kˌufuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake kutˈoa m̩lˈio..|0
ɟˈe, ʃˈoka lawˈeza kˌuɟiɡˈamba kˌuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi kulˈiko jˈule ˌanajˌelitumˈia, ˌau msumˈeno kˌuɟisˈifu ðˈidi ja jˈule ˌanajˌeutumˈia? ni kˈana kwˌamba fˈimbo ˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌumwinˈua jˌeje ˌaitʃˌukuˈaje, ˌau mkoŋɡˈoɟo ˌuŋɡemwinˈua mwˌeɲe kˌuutumˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌatatˈuma uɡˈoɲɟua wa kˌuðoofˈiʃa kwa askˈari wˌake walˈio hodˈari, katˌika fahˈari jˌake mˈoto ˌutawˈaka kˌama mwˈali wa mˈoto.|0
nˈuru ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitakˈuwa mˈoto, alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wˌao mwˈali wa mˈoto; katˌika sˈiku mˈoɟa ˌutauŋɡˈuza na kˌuteketˈeza miˈiba na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma jˈake.|0
fahˈari ja misˈitu jˌake na maʃˈamba jˌeɲe rutˈuba ˌutatˌeketˈeza kabˈisa, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu mɡˈoɲɟua ˌaðoˌofikˈavjo.|0
nˈajo mˈiti ˌinajobˈaki katˌika misˈitu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa mitʃˈatʃe sˈana hˌata mtˈoto mdˈoɡo ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuihesˈabu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli, wˌaliˌonusurˈika wa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, hˌawatˌamteɡemˈea tˈena jˌeje ˌalijˌewapˈiɡa, lakˈini wˌatamtˌeɡemˈea kwa kwˈeli bwˈana alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
mabˈaki wˌatarˈudi, mabˈaki wa jakˈobo wˌatamrudˈia mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˈatu wˈako, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ni wˈeŋɡi kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa pwˈani, ni mabˈaki jˈao tu wˌatakˌaorˈudi. mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌamekwˈiʃa amrˈiwa, ni mˈeŋɡi tˈena ni hˈaki.|0
bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌatatˌekelˈeza mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌalijˌoamrˈiwa ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌm̩kaˈao sajˈuni, msˌiwaoɡˈope wˌaaʃˈuru, wˌanaˌowapˈiɡa nˈiɲi kwa fˈimbo na kˌuinˈua rˈuŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu, kˌama mˈisri ˌilivjofˈaɲa.|0
bˈado kitˈambo kidˈoɡo sˈana hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu ˌitakˈoma, na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitaˌelekˈezwa kwˈeɲe mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatawatʃˈapa kwa mɟelˈedi, kˌama ˌalivjˌowapˈiɡa wˌamidiˈani katˌika mwˈamba wa orˈebu, nˌaje ˌatainˈua fˈimbo jˌake ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa hˌuko mˈisri.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo mzˈiɡo wˌao ˌutaˌinulˈiwa kutˈoka mˌabeɡˈani mwˈenu, na nˈira jˈao kutˈoka ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈenu; nˈira ˌitavˈuɲɟua kwa sabˈabu ja kutˈiwa mafˈuta.|0
wˌanaiŋɡˈia ajˈaθi, wˌanapˈita kˌatikˈati ja miɡrˈoni, wˌanahifˈaði mˌahitˈaɟi hˌuko mikmˈaʃi.|0
wˌanavˈuka kˌivukˈoni, nˌao wˌanasˈema, tˌutapˈiɡa kˈambi hˌuko ɡˈeba usˈiku kˈutʃa. rˈama ˌinatˌetemˈeka; ɡibˈea ja saˈuli ˌinakimbˈia.|0
pˈiɡa kelˈele, ˈee bˈinti ɡalˈimu! sˌikilˈiza, ˈee laˈiʃa! maskˈini ˌanaθˈoθi.|0
madmˈena ˌinakimbˈia; wˈatu wa ɡebˈimu wˌanaɟifˈitʃa.|0
sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo wˌatasimˈama nˈobu; wˌatatikˈisa ŋɡˈumi zˈao kwa mlˈima wa bˈinti sajˈuni, kwa kilˈima tʃa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌatajakˈata matˈawi kwa ŋɡˈuvu kˈuu. mˈiti mirˈefu sˈana ˌitaaŋɡˈuʃwa, ˈile mirˈefu ˌitaʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini.|0
ˌatakˈata vitʃˈaka vja msˈitu kwa ʃˈoka; lˌebanˈoni ˌitaaŋɡˈuka mbˈele zˌake jˌeje mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
tʃˌipukˈizi lˌitatokˈea kutˈoka ʃˈina la jˈese, kutˈoka mizˈizi jˌake tˈawi lˌitazˈaa tˈunda.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌatakˈaa ɟˈuu jˈake, rˈoho wa hekˈima na wa ˌufahˈamu, rˈoho wa ʃaˈuri na wa uwˈeza, rˈoho wa mˌaarˈifa na wa kˈumtʃa bwˈana.|0
nˌaje ˌatafˌurahˈia kˈumtʃa bwˈana. hˌatahukˈumu kwa jˈale ˌajaonˈajo kwa mˈatʃo jˈake, wˈala kˌuamˈua kwa jˈale ˌajasˌikiˈajo kwa mˌasikˈio jˈake.|0
bˌali kwa ˌuadilˈifu ˌatahukˈumu wˌahitˈaɟi, kwa hˈaki ˌataamˈua wˌaɲeɲekˈevu wa dunˈia. ˌataipˈiɡa dunˈia kwa fˈimbo ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake, kwa pˈumzi ja midˈomo jˌake ˌatawaˈua waˈovu.|0
hˈaki ˌitakˈuwa mkˈanda wˌake na ˌuaminˈifu ˌutakˈuwa mʃˈipi kˌiunˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu ˌataˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na mwˌanakondˈoo, nˌaje tʃˈui ˌatalˈala pamˈoɟa na mbˈuzi, ndˈama, mwˈana sˈimba na ŋɡˈombe wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa wˌatakˈaa pamˈoɟa, nˌaje mtˈoto mdˈoɡo ˌatawˌaoŋɡˈoza.|0
ŋɡˈombe na dˈubu wˌatalˈiʃa pamˈoɟa, watˈoto wˌao wˌatalˈala pamˈoɟa, na sˈimba ˌatakˈula maɟˈani makˈavu kˌama maksˈai.|0
mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌatatʃˈeza karˈibu na ʃˈimo la ɲˈoka, nˌaje mtˈoto mdˈoɡo ˌatawˈeka mkˈono wˌake kwˈeɲe kiˈota tʃa fˈira.|0
hˌawataðˈuru wˈala kˌuharˈibu ɟˌuːja mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu wˈote, kwa kˌuwa dunˈia ˌitaɟˈawa na kumɟˈua bwˈana kˌama mˈaɟi jˌaɟazˈavjo bahˈari.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo bwˈana ˌataɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake mˈara ja pˈili kˌurudˈiʃa mabˈaki ja wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌosalˈia kutˈoka aʃˈuru, mˈisri, paθrˈosi, kˈuʃi, elˈamu, babˈeli, hamˈaθi na kutˈoka visˈiwa vja bˌaharˈini.|0
ˌatainˈua bendˈera kwa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwakusˈaɲa wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˈoko ˌuhamiʃˈoni; ˌatawˌakusˈaɲa wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌaliˌotawaɲˈika kutˈoka pˈembe ˈn̩ne za dunˈia.|0
wˈivu wa ˌefraˈimu ˌutatowˈeka, na adˈui wa jˈuda wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali; ˌefraˈimu hˌatamwonˈea jˈuda wˈivu, wˈala jˈuda hˌatakˈuwa na ˌuadˈui na ˌefraˈimu.|0
wˌatawˌaʃukˈia katˌika mˌiterˈemko ja wˌafilˈisti hˌadi upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, kwa pamˈoɟa wˌatawatˈeka wˈatu ɲˈara hˌadi upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. wˌatawapˈiɡa edˈomu na moˈabu, na wˌaamˈoni wˌatatˌawalˈiwa nˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌatakaˈuʃa ɣˈuba ja bahˈari ja mˈisri; kwa upˈepo mkˈavu ˌataˌupelˈeka mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja ˈm̩to frˈati. ˌataˌuɡawˈaɲa katˌika viɟˈito sˈaba ˌili wˈatu wawˈeze kˌuuvˈuka wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa viˈatu.|0
ˌitakuwˈepo ɲɟˈia kˈuu kwa mabˈaki ja wˈatu wˌake wˈale wˌaliˌosalˈia kutˈoka aʃˈuru, kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa kwa ˌisraˈeli wˌalipopˈanda kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile ˌutasˈema: nˌitakusˈifu wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana. iŋɡˈawa ˌulinˌikasˌirikˈia, hasˈira jˈako ˌimeɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˌawe ˌumenˌifarˈiɟi.|0
hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ni wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu; nˌitamtˌumaˈini wˈala sˌitaoɡˈopa. bwˈana, bwˈana, ni ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu na wˈimbo wˈaŋɡu; ˌamekˈuwa wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa furˈaha mtatʃˈota mˈaɟi kutˈoka visˈima vja wokˈovu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo mtasˈema: mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana, mlˌiitˈie ɟˈina lˈake; ɟˌuliʃˈeni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈale ˌalijˌojafˈaɲa, tˌaŋɡazˈeni kˌuwa ɟˈina lˈake lˌimetukˈuka.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa ˌametˈenda mˈambo makˈuu, hˈili na lˌiɟulikˈane dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
pazˈeni saˈuti mwˈimbe kwa furˈaha, wˈatu wa sajˈuni, kwa maˈana m̩kˈuu ni jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu babˈeli ambˈalo isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi ˌaliliˈona.|0
twekˈeni bendˈera ɟˌuːja mlˈima usˈio na kˈitu, wˌapaziˈeni saˈuti, wˌapuŋɡiˈeni mkˈono wˌaiŋɡˈie katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja wˌeɲe heʃˈima.|0
nˌimewˌaamˈuru wˌatakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu; nˌimewaˈita mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈaŋɡu wˌaitimˈize hasˈira jˈaŋɡu: wˈale wˌanaˌoʃaŋɡilˈia uʃˈindi wˈaŋɡu.|0
sˌikilizˈeni kelˈele ɟˌuːja milˈima, kˌama ˈile ja umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu! sˌikilizˈeni, mˌakelˈele kˌatikˈati ja fˈalme, kˌama mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌokusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa! bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌanakusˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
wˌanakˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi za mbˈali sˈana, kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja mbˈiŋɡu, bwˈana na silˈaha za ɣaðˈabu jˈake, kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
ˌombolezˈeni, kwa maˈana sˈiku ja bwˈana ˈi karˈibu, ˌitakˈuɟa kˌama ˌuharibˈifu kutˈoka kwa mweɲˈezi.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja hˈili, mikˈono jˈote ˌitaleɡˈea, mˈojo wa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌutajejˈuka.|0
hˈofu ˌitawˌakamˈata, utʃˈuŋɡu na mˌaumˈivu makˈali jˌatawaʃˈika, wˌataɡˌaaɡˈaa kˌama mwanˈamke alˈije na utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa. wˌatatˌazamˈana kwa hˈofu kˈila ˈm̩tu na mwenzˈake, ɲˈuso zˈao zˌikiwˈaka kˌama mˈoto.|0
tˌazamˈeni, sˈiku ja bwˈana ˌinakˈuɟa, sˈiku katˈili, jˌeɲe ɣaðˈabu na hasˈira kˈali, kˌuifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa ukˈiwa na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌeɲe ðˈambi wˌaliˈomo ndˈani jˈake.|0
ɲˈota za mbiŋɡˈuni na makˈundi ja ɲˈota hˌavitatˈoa mwˈaŋɡa wˈake. ɟˈua lˌinalˌotʃomˈoza lˌitatˈiwa ɡˈiza na mwˈezi hˌautatˈoa nˈuru jˈake.|0
nˌitaˌuaðˈibu ˌulimwˈeŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wˈake, waˈovu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao. nˌitakomˈeʃa mˌaɟivˈuno ja wˌeɲe kibˈuri, na nˌitakiʃˈuʃa kibˈuri tʃa wˈatu wˌakatˈili.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌanadˈamu kˌuwa adˈimu kulˈiko ðahˈabu sˈafi, wˌatakˈuwa watʃˈatʃe sˈana kulˈiko ðahˈabu ja ofˈiri.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitazifˈaɲa mbˈiŋɡu zˌitetemˈeke, nˈajo dunˈia ˌitatˌikisˈika kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake katˌika ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, katˌika sˈiku ja hasˈira jˌake ˌiwakˈajo.|0
kˌama swˈala ˌawindwˈaje, kˌama kondˈoo wasˈio na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatarˈudi kwa wˈatu wˌake mweɲˈewe, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌimbilˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ja kˌuzalˈiwa.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈekwa ˌatapˌasulˈiwa tˈumbo, wˈote wˌatakˌaokamˈatwa wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
tazˈama, nˌitawˌatʃotʃˈea wamˈedi ðˈidi jˈao, ambˈao hˌawaɟˈali fˈeða wˈala hˌawafˌurahˈii ðahˈabu.|0
miʃˈale jˈao ˌitawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa viɟˈana, hˌawatakˈuwa na hurˈuma kwa watˈoto watʃˈaŋɡa wˈala hˌawatˌaaŋɡalˈia watˈoto kwa hurˈuma.|0
babˈeli, ɟohˈari ja fˈalme, ˌutukˈufu wa kibˈuri tʃa wˌababˈeli, ˌitaaŋɡˈuʃwa na mˈuŋɡu kˌama sodˈoma na ɡomˈora.|0
hˌautˌakalˈiwa na wˈatu kˈamwe wˈala wˈatu hˌawataˈiʃi hˈumo kwa vizˈazi vjˈote. hakˈuna mwarˈabu ˌatakˌajepˈiɡa hˈema lˈake hˌuko, hakˈuna mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ˌatakˌajepumzˈiʃa makˈundi jˌake hˌuko.|0
lakˈini viˈumbe wa ɟaŋɡwˈani wˌatalˈala hˌuko, mbwˈeha wˌataɟˈaza ɲˈumba zˈake, bˈundi wˌataˈiʃi hˈumo nˌao mbˌuzimwˈitu wˌatarˌukarˈuka hˈumo.|0
fˈisi wˌatalˈia ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome zˈake, mbwˈeha ndˈani ja maɟˈumba jˌake ja kˌifahˈari. wakˈati wˌake ˌumewadˈia, na sˈiku zˌake hˌazitˌaoŋɡˈezwa.|0
bwˈana ˌatamhˌurumˈia jakˈobo, ˌatamtʃaɡˈua ˌisraˈeli tˈena, na kˌuwakalˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe. waɡˈeni wˌatauŋɡˈana nˌao na kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌatawˌatʃukˈua na kˌuwalˈeta mahˈali pˈao weɲˈewe. nˈajo ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitamilˈiki mˌataˈifa kˌama wˌatumˈiʃi na wˌaɟakˈazi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bwˈana. wˌatawafˈaɲa wˌatekˈaɟi wˌao kˌuwa matˈeka, na kˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja wˈale wˌaliˌowaonˈea.|0
katˌika sˈiku bwˈana ˌatakˌapokˌuondolˈea matˈeso, uðˈia na utˈumwa wa kˌikatˈili.|0
ˌutaˌitʃukˈua ðihˈaka hˌii ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli: tazˈama ɟˈinsi mtˈesi ˌalivjˌofikˈia mwˈiʃo! tazˈama ɟˈinsi ɣaðˈabu jˌake kˈali ˌilivjokˈoma.|0
bwˈana ˌamevˈuɲɟa fˈimbo ja mwˈovu, fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala ja wˌatawˈala.|0
ambˈajo kwa hasˈira wˌalijapˈiɡa mˌataˈifa kwa mapˈiɡo jasˈijo na kikˈomo, nˌao kwa ɣaðˈabu kˈali wˌaliwˌatiˈiʃa mˌataˈifa kwa ɟeˈuri pasˈipo hurˈuma.|0
ˈn̩tʃi zˈote zˈiko kwˈeɲe mˌapumzˈiko na kwˈeɲe amˈani, wˌanabˌubuɟˈika kwa kuˈimba.|0
hˌata mˌisunobˈari na mˌierˈezi ja lˌebanˈoni ˌinaʃˌaŋɡilˈia mbˈele jˈako na kusˈema, bˌasi kwa sabˈabu ˌumeaŋɡˈuʃwa tʃˈini, hakˈuna mkˈata mˈiti ˌatakˌajekˈuɟa kˌutukˈata.|0
kuzˈimu kˈote kˌumetˌaharˈuki kˌukulˈaki ˌunapokˈuɟa, kˌunaˈamʃa rˈoho za wˌaliokˈufa ˌili kˌukupokˈea, wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika ˌulimwˈeŋɡu, kˌunawafˈaɲa wˌainˈuke kwˈeɲe vˈiti vjˈao vja kifˈalme: wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wafˈalme ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa.|0
wˈote wˌataˌitikˈia, wˌatakˌuambˈia, wˌewe pˈia ˌumekˈuwa ðaˈifu, kˌama sˌisi tulˈivjo; wˌewe ˌumekˈuwa kˌama sˈisi.|0
mˌaɟivˈuno jˈako jˈote jˌameʃˈuʃwa mpˈaka kuzˈimu, pamˈoɟa na kelˈele ja vinˈubi vjˈako, mafˈunza jˌametˈanda tʃˈini jˈako, na miɲˈoo ˌimekˌufunˈika.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌoaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˈewe ɲˈota ja ˌasubˈuhi, mwˈana wa mˌapambazˈuko! ˌumetˈupwa tʃˈini dˌuniˈani, wˌewe ˌulijepˈata kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌulisˈema mojˈoni mwˈako, nˌitapˈanda ɟˈuu hˌadi mbiŋɡˈuni, nˌitakˌiinˈua kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ˈenzi ɟˌuːja ɲˈota za mˈuŋɡu, nˌitakˈeti nˌimetawˈazwa ɟˌuːja mlˈima wa kˌusaɲˈiko, kwˈeɲe vˈimo vja ɟˈuu sˈana vja mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu.|0
nˌitapˈaa ɟˈuu kupˈita mawˈiŋɡu, nˌitaɟifˈaɲa kˌama jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
lakˈini ˌumeʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini hˌadi kuzˈimu, hˌadi kwˈeɲe vˈina vja ʃˈimo.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌokuˈona wˌanakˌukazˈia mˈatʃo, wˌanatˌafakˈari hatˈima jˈako: ɟˈe, hˈuju n̩dˈije jˈule ˌalijˌetikˈisa dunˈia na kufˈaɲa fˈalme zˌitetemˈeke.|0
jˈule ˌalijˌeifˈaɲa dunˈia kˌuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa, ˌalijˌeipindˈua mˈiɟi jˈake, na ambˈaje hˌakuwˌaatʃˈia matˈeka wˌake waˈende ɲumbˈani.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wa mˌataˈifa wˌamelˈala kwa heʃˈima kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika kabˈuri lˈake.|0
lakˈini wˌewe ˌumetˈupwa ɲɟˈe ja kabˈuri lˈako kˌama tˈawi lˌililˌokatalˈiwa, ˌumefunˈikwa na wˌaliˌouˈawa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliotʃˈomwa kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈale wˌaʃukˈao mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈawe ja ʃˈimo. kˌama mzˈoɡa ˌuliˌokaɲˈaɡwa tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo.|0
hˌutaɟˌumuˈika nˌao kwˈeɲe mazˈiʃi, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi jˈako na kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wˈako. m̩zˈao wa mwˈovu hˌatatˈaɟua tˈena kˈamwe.|0
andˈaa mahˈali pa kˌuwatʃiɲɟˈia wanˈawe kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao, wasˈiɟe wˌakainˈuka ˌili kˌuirˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuiɟˈaza dunˈia kwa mˈiɟi jˈao.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote asˈema, nˌitainˈuka ðˈidi jˈao, nˌitalˌikatilˈia mbˈali ɟˈina lˈake kutˈoka babˈeli pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌonusurˈika, watˈoto wˌake na wazˈao wˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa kˌuwa mahˈali pa bˈundi, na kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi ja matˈope; nˌitaˌifaɡˈia kwa ˌufaɡˈio wa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌameˈapa, hakˈika, kˌama vˈile nˌilivjopˈaŋɡa, ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa, nˌami kˌama nˌilivjˌokusudˈia, ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjosimˈama.|0
nˌitampˈonda mwaʃˈuru katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu, ɟˌuːja milˈima jˈaŋɡu nˌitawˌakaɲaɡˈia tʃˈini. nˈira jˌake ˌitaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌao mzˈiɡo wˌake ˌutaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka mˌabeɡˈani m̩wˈao.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mpˈaŋɡo ˌuliˌokusudˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote, hˈuu ni mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamekˌusudˈia, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumzuˈia? mkˈono wˌake ˌumeɲoˈoʃwa, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuurudˈiʃa.|0
msˌifurˈahi, ˈeɲi wˌafilˈisti wˈote, kwˌamba fˈimbo ˌilijˌowapˈiɡa ˌimevuɲɟˈika; kutˈoka mzˈizi wa hˈujo ɲˈoka ˌatatʃipˈuka ɲˈoka mwˌeɲe sˈumu kˈali, uzˈao wˌake ˌutakˈuwa ɟˈoka lˌirukˈalo, lˈeɲe sˈumu kˈali.|0
maskˈini kulˈiko maskˈini wˈote wˌatapˈata malˈiʃo, nˌao wˌahitˈaɟi wˌatalˈala salˈama. lakˈini mzˈizi wˈako nˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza kwa ɲɟˈaa, nˈajo ɲɟˈaa ˌitawaˈua wˌaliˌonusurˈika.|0
pˈiɡa jˈowe, ˈee lˈaŋɡo! bwˈeka, ˈee ˈm̩ɟi! jˌejukˈeni, ˈeɲi wˌafilˈisti wˈote! wˈiŋɡu la mˈoʃi lˌinakˈuɟa tˌoka kˌaskazˈini, wˈala hakˈuna ˌatakˌajetʃelˈewa katˌika sˈafu zˈake.|0
ni ɟˈibu ɡˈani lˌitakˌalotolˈewa kwa waɟˈumbe wa taˈifa hˈilo? bwˈana ˌameifˈaɲa imˈara sajˈuni, nˈako ndˈani jˌake wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌoonˈewa wˌatapˈata kˌimbilˈio.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu moˈabu: ˈari ilˈijo moˈabu ˌimeˌaŋɡamˈizwa: ˌimehˌaribˈiwa kwa usˈiku mmˈoɟa! kˈiri ilˈijo moˈabu ˌimeˌaŋɡamˈizwa, ˌimehˌaribˈiwa kwa usˈiku mmˈoɟa.|0
dibˈoni ˌanakwˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe hekˈalu lˈake, mpˈaka mahˈali pˈake pa ɟˈuu ˌili walˈie, moˈabu ˌanaˌombolezˈea nˈebo na medˈeba. kˈila kˈitʃwa kˌimeɲolˈewa na kˈila ndˈevu lˌimeˌondolˈewa.|0
wˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia bˌarabarˈani, ɟˌuːja mapˈaa na kwˈeɲe viwˈaɲɟa wˈote wˌanaˌombolˈeza, wˌamelˈala kˌifudifˈudi kwa kulˈia.|0
heʃbˈoni na ˌeleˈale wˌanalˈia, saˈuti zˈao zˌinasikˈika hˌadi jahˈazi. kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˌeɲe silˈaha wa moˈabu wˌanapˈiɡa kelˈele, nˈajo miˈojo jˈao ˌimezimˈia.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunamlilˈia moˈabu; wˌakimbˈizi wˌake wˌanakˌimbilˈia soˈari, hˌadi ˈeɡlaθ ʃˌeliʃˈija. wˌanapˈanda ɲɟˈia ja kwˈenda luhˈiθi, wˌanakwˈenda hˈuku wˌanalˈia; bˌarabarˈani ˌiendˈajo hˌoronaˈimu wˌanaˌombolezˈea mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao.|0
mˈaɟi ja nimrˈimu jˌamekaˈuka na maɟˈani jˌameɲaˈuka; mimˈea ˌimekaˈuka wˈala hakˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kibˈitʃi kˌilitʃobˈaki.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈali wˌalijˌoipˈata na kˌuɟiwekˈea akˈiba wˌamezˌitʃukˈua na kuvˈuka bˈonde la mˌierˈebi.|0
mwˈaŋɡwi wa kilˈio tʃˈao ˌumefˈika hˌadi mpakˈani ˌm̩wa moˈabu, kilˈio tʃˈao tʃa huzˈuni kˌimefˈika hˌadi ˌeɡlaˈimu, mˌaombolˈezo jˈao hˌadi bˈeer elˈimu.|0
mˈaɟi ja dimˈoni jˌameɟˈaa dˈamu, lakˈini bˈado nˌitalˈeta pˈiɡo ɟiŋɡˈine ɟˌuːja dimˈoni: sˈimba ɟˌuːja wˌakimbˈizi wa moˈabu na ɟˌuːja wˈale wˌanaobˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
pˌelekˈeni wˌanakondˈoo kˌama uʃˈuru kwa mtawˈala wa ˈn̩tʃi, kutˈoka sˈela, kˌupitˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani, hˌadi mlˈima wa bˈinti sajˈuni.|0
kˌama ndˈeɡe wˌanaˌopapatˈika wˌaliˌofukˈuzwa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kiˈota, ndˈivjo walˈivjo wˌanawˈake wa moˈabu kwˈeɲe vivˈuko vja arnˈoni.|0
tupˈeni ʃaˈuri, toˈeni ˌuamˈuzi. wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri, faɲˈeni kivˈuli tʃˈenu kˌama usˈiku. wˌafitʃˈeni watˈoro, msˌisalˈiti wˌakimbˈizi.|0
wˌaatʃˈeni watˈoro wa moˈabu wakˈae pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi; kuwˈeni mahˈali pˈao pa salˈama ˌili kˌuepˈuka mharˈabu. mtˈesi ˌatafikˈia mwˈiʃo na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌatakˈoma, ˌaletˈaje vˈita ˌatatowˈeka kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa upˈendo kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˌitaˌimarˈiʃwa, kwa ˌuaminˈifu ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈeti ɟˈuu jˈake, jˌeje ˌatokˈaje ɲˈumba ja daˈudi: jˌeje ambˈaje katˌika kˌuhukˈumu hˌutafˈuta hˈaki, na hˌuhimˈiza ɲɟˈia ja hˈaki.|0
tˌumesikˈia ɟˌuːja kibˈuri tʃa moˈabu: kibˈuri tʃˈake tʃa kˌuɟivˈuna na ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, kibˈuri tʃˈake na ˌufiðˈuli wˈake, lakˈini mˌaɟivˈuno jˌake si kˈitu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌamoˈabu wˌanaˌombolˈeza, wˌanaˌiombˌolezˈea moˈabu kwa pamˈoɟa. wˌanaˌombolˈeza na kˌuhuzunˈika kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa kˈir hˌaresˈeθi.|0
maʃˈamba ja heʃbˈoni jˌanaɲaˈuka, pˈia na mˌizabˈibu ja sˈibma. wˌatawˈala wa mˌataˈifa wˌamekaɲˈaɡa mˌizabˈibu ilˈijo mizˈuri sˈana, ambˈajo ˌilipˈata kufˈika jazˈeri na kˌuenˈea kˌuelekˈea ɟaŋɡwˈani. mˌatʃipukˈizi jˌake jˌalienˈea jˌakafˈika hˌadi bˌaharˈini.|0
hˈivjo nˌinalˈia kˌama jazˈeri ˌaliˈavjo, kwa aɟˈili ja mˌizabˈibu ja sˈibma. ˈee heʃbˈoni, ˈee ˌeleˈale, nˌinakˌulowˈeʃa kwa matʃˈozi! kelˈele za furˈaha kwa aɟˈili ja tˈunda lˈako lˌililoˈiva na kwa aɟˈili ja mavˈuno zˌimekomˈeʃwa.|0
furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe zˌimeˌondolˈewa kutˈoka maʃˈamba ja matˈunda; hakˈuna jejˈote ˌaimbˈaje wˈala ˌapazˈaje saˈuti katˌika maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu; hakˈuna jejˈote ˌakaɲaɡˈaje zabˈibu ʃˌinikizˈoni, kwa kˌuwa nˌimekomˈeʃa mˌakelˈele.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja moˈabu kˌama kinˈubi, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu jˈote kwa aɟˈili ja kˈir hˌaresˈeθi.|0
wakˈati moˈabu ˌanapˌoɟitokˈeza mahˈali pˈake pa ɟˈuu, ˌanaɟitʃˈoʃa mweɲˈewe tˈu; ˌanapokwˈenda mahˈali pˈake pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu ˌili kuˈomba, hˌaitˌamfaˈidi lolˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌameʃasˈema kuhˈusu moˈabu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa bwˈana ˌanasˈema: katˌika miˈaka mitˈatu, kˌama vˈile mtumˈiʃi ˌalijefˈuŋɡwa na mkatˈaba ˌaŋɡeˌihesˈabu, fahˈari ja moˈabu na wˈatu wˌake wˈeŋɡi wˌataðˌaraulˈiwa, nˌao wˌaliˌonusurˈika wˌatakˈuwa watʃˈatʃe sˈana, tˈena waɲˈoŋɡe.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu damˈeski: tazˈama, damˈeski hˌaitakˈuwa tˈena ˈm̩ɟi bˌali ˌitakˈuwa lˈundo la maɡˈofu.|0
ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome ˌutatowˈeka kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu, nˌao uwˈeza wa ufˈalme kutˈoka damˈeski; mabˈaki ja arˈamu jˌatakˈuwa kˌama ˌutukˈufu wa wˌaisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile ˌutukˈufu wa jakˈobo ˌutafifˈia, unˈono wa mwˈili wˌake ˌutaðˌoofˈika.|0
ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mvunˈaɟi ˌakusaɲˈavjo nafˈaka na kuvˈuna nafˈaka kwa mikˈono jˈake, kˌama wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌaokotˈapo masˈazo ja masˈuke katˌika bˈonde la wˌarefˈai.|0
hˌata hˈivjo baˈaði ja masˈazo jˌatabˈaki, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩ti wa mzˌeitˈuni ˌunavjopˈiɡwa, kˌukiˈatʃwa zˌeitˈuni mbˈili ˌau tˈatu ɟˌuːja matˈawi kˌilelˈeni, ˈn̩ne ˌau tˈano katˌika matˈawi jˌazaˈajo sˈana, asˈema bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˈatu wˌatamwˌaŋɡalˈia muˈumba wˈao, na kˌuelekˈeza mˈatʃo jˈao kwa jˈule alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌawatˌaziˌaŋɡalˈia tˈena mˌaðabˈahu, kˈazi za mikˈono jˈao, nˌao hˌawatˌaheʃˈimu ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera, na mˌaðabˈahu za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba zˌilizofˈaɲua kwa mikˈono jˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile mˈiɟi jˈao ilˈijo imˈara, ambˈajo wˌaliihˈama kwa sabˈabu ja wˌaisraˈeli, ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mahˈali pˌalipoˈatʃwa pa vitʃˈaka na maɡˈuɡu. nˈajo jˈote ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa.|0
mmˌemsahˈau mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈenu, hˌamkumkumbˈuka mwˈamba alˈije ŋɡˈome jˈenu. kwa hˈijo, hˌata iŋɡˈawa mlˌipandikˈiza mimˈea ilˈijo mizˈuri sˈana na kˌuotˈeʃa mˌizabˈibu ja kiɡˈeni.|0
hˌata kˌama sˈiku ˈile ˌunapˌoipˌandikˈiza, ˌunaifˈaɲa iˈote na ˌasubˈuhi ˈile ˈile ˌunajˌoipˈanda, ˌunaifˈaɲa ˌitʃipˈue, hˌata hˈivjo mavˈuno jˌatakˈuwa kˌama si kˈitu katˌika sˈiku ˈile ja uɡˈoɲɟua na mˌaumˈivu jˌasijˌopoɲˈeka.|0
lˈo! ɣaðˈabu ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, wˌanaɣˌaðibˈika kˌama bahˈari ˌilijˌotʃafˈuka! lˈo! mˌakelˈele ja mˌataˈifa wˌanavˈuma kˌama ŋɡurˈumo za mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi.|0
iŋɡˈawa mˌataˈifa jˌanavˈuma kˌama ŋɡurˈumo za mˈaɟi jˌanajofˈaɲa mawˈimbi, wakˈati ˌanapˌojakemˈea jˌanakimbˈia mbˈali, jˌanafukˈuzwa mbˈele ja upˈepo kˌama makˈapi ɟˌuːja milˈima, kˌama ɟˈani lˌiviŋɡˌiriʃwˈapo na ðorˈuba.|0
wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni, hˈofu ja ɣafˈula! kˈabla ja ˌasubˈuhi, wˌametowˈeka! hˈili ndˈilo fˈuŋɡu la wˈale wˌanaˌotupˈora, fˈuŋɡu la wˈale wˌanaˌotuɲaŋɡˈaɲa mˈali zˈetu.|0
ˌiwapˌelekˈajo waɟˈumbe wˌake kwa ɲɟˈia ja bahˈari kwa maʃˈua za mafˈuɲɟo ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi. nendˈeni, waɟˈumbe wepˈesi, kwa taˈifa la wˈatu warˈefu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈozi ɲorˈoro, kwa taˈifa lˌinalˌooɡˈopwa mbˈali na karˈibu, taˈifa ɡˈomvi lˈeɲe lˈuɣa ŋɡˈeni, ambˈalo ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɡawˈaɲua kwa mˈito.|0
ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote ja ˌulimwˈeŋɡu, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi dˌuniˈani wakˈati bendˈera ˌitakˌapoˌinulˈiwa mˌilimˈani, mtˌaiˈona, nˈajo tˌarumbˈeta ˌitakˌapolˈia, mtˌaisikˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌoniambˈia: nˌitatulˈia kˈimja na kˌutazˈama kutˈoka maskˈani jˈaŋɡu, kˌama ɟˈoto lˌinalˌometamˈeta katˌika mwˈaŋɡa wa ɟˈua, kˌama wˈiŋɡu la umˈande katˌika ɟˈoto la wakˈati wa mavˈuno.|0
kwa maˈana, kˈabla ja mavˈuno, wakˈati wa kˌutʃanˈua ˌukiʃapˈita na maˈua jakˈawa zabˈibu zˌinazoˈiva, ˌatajakˈata mˌatʃipukˈizi kwa mˈundu wa kˌupoɡolˈea matˈawi, nˌaje ˌatakˈata na kˌujaondˈoa matˈawi jˌalijˌopanˈuka.|0
jˈote jˌataˈatʃwa kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈeɡe wˌawindˈao wa mlimˈani na waɲˈama pˈori, ndˈeɡe wˌataɟilˈiʃa ɟˈuu jˌake wakˈati wˈote wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi, nˌao waɲˈama pˈori wakˈati wˈote wa masˈika.|0
wakˈati hˈuo mˌatolˈeo jˌatalˈetwa kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote kutˈoka kwa taˈifa la wˈatu warˈefu wˌeɲe ŋɡˈozi ɲorˈoro, kutˈoka kwa taˈifa lˌinalˌooɡˈopwa mbˈali na karˈibu, kutˈoka taˈifa ɡˈomvi lˈeɲe lˈuɣa ŋɡˈeni, ambˈalo ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɡawˈaɲua kwa mˈito, mˌatolˈeo jˌatalˈetwa katˌika mlˈima sajˈuni, mahˈali pa ɟˈina la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu mˈisri: tazˈama, bwˈana ˌamepˈanda ɟˌuːja wˈiŋɡu lˌiendˈalo kwa harˈaka nˌaje ˌanakˈuɟa mˈisri. sanˈamu za mˈisri zˌinatˌetemˈeka mbˈele jˈake, nˈajo miˈojo ja wamˈisri ˌinajejˈuka ndˈani jˈao.|0
nˌitamtʃotʃˈea mmˈisri ðˈidi ja mmˈisri, ndˈuɡu ˌatapiɡˈana ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu, ɟirˈani ðˈidi ja ɟirˈani, ˈm̩ɟi ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi, ufˈalme ðˈidi ja ufˈalme.|0
wamˈisri wˌatakˈufa mˈojo, na nˌitaˌibatilˈiʃa mipˈaŋɡo jˈao. wˌatatafˈuta ˌuʃaˈuri kwa sanˈamu na kwa rˈoho za wˌaliokˈufa, kwa wˌaaɡˈuzi na kwa wˈale wˌaoŋɡeˈao na mizˈimu.|0
nˌitawatˈia wamˈisri mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana mkatˈili na mfˈalme mkˈali ˌatatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈao, asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
mˈaɟi ja mˈito jˌatakaˈuka, tʃˈini ja ˈm̩to kˌutakaˈuka kwa ɟˈua.|0
mˌiferˈeɟi ˌitanˈuka; viɟˈito vja mˈisri vˌitapuŋɡˈua na kˌukaˈuka. mafˈuɲɟo na ɲˈasi vˌitaɲaˈuka.|0
pˈia mimˈea ˌilijˈoko kˈando ja ˈm̩to naˈili, pˈale ˈm̩to ˌunapomwˈaɡa mˈaɟi bˌaharˈini. kˈila ʃˈamba lˌililopˈandwa kˈando ja ˈm̩to naˈili lˌitakaˈuka, lˌitapˌeperˈuʃwa na kˌutowˈeka kabˈisa.|0
wavˈuvi wˌatalˈia na kˌuombolˈeza, wˈale wˈote wˌatupˈao ndoˈano katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili, wˌataðˌoofˈika kwa maɟˈonzi.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌafaɲˈao kˈazi ja kitˈani kˌilitʃˌotʃambulˈiwa wˌatakˈata tamˈaa, wˌafumˈaɟi wa kitˈani sˈafi wˌatavuɲɟˈika mˈojo.|0
wˌafaɲˈao kˈazi ja kufˈuma ŋɡˈuo wˌatahˌuzunˈiʃwa, nˌao vˌibarˈua wˌatauɡˈua mojˈoni.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa soˈani ni wˌapumbˈavu kabˈisa, wˌaʃaˈuri wa farˈao wˌeɲe busˈara wˌanatˈoa ˌuʃaˈuri wa kiɟˈiŋɡa. ˌunawezˈaɟe kˌumwambˈia farˈao, mˌimi ni mmˌoɟawˈapo wa wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima, mwˌanafˈunzi wa wafˈalme wa zamˈani.|0
wˈako wˈapi sˈasa wˈatu wˈako wˌeɲe hekˈima? wˌao wˌakuoɲˈeʃe na kˌukufˌahamˈiʃa ni nˈini bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamepˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja mˈisri.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa soˈani wˌamekˈuwa wˌapumbˈavu, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa memfˈisi wˌamedˌaŋɡaɲˈika, walˈio mˈawe ja pˈembe ja taˈifa lˈake wˌameˌipotˈoʃa mˈisri.|0
bwˈana ˌamewˌamwaɡˈia rˈoho ja kˌizuŋɡuzˈuŋɡu; wˌanaifˈaɲa mˈisri ˌijumbajˈumbe katˌika jˈale jˈote ˌinajˌojafˈaɲa, kˌama vˈile mlˈevi ˌajumbˌajumbˈavjo katˌika kˌutapˈika kwˈake.|0
mˈisri hˌaiwˈezi kufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, tʃa kˈitʃwa wˈala tʃa m̩kˈia, tʃa tˈawi la mtˈende wˈala tʃa tˈete.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wamˈisri wˌatakˈuwa kˌama wˌanawˈake. wˌatatˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu mbˈele ja mkˈono wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌanaˌoinˈua ðˈidi jˈao.|0
nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda ˌitawatˈia hˈofu wamˈisri, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajetaɟˈiwa jˈuda ˌataiŋɡˈiwa na hˈofu, kwa sabˈabu ja kˈile ambˈatʃo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌanapˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo mˈiɟi mitˈano ja mˈisri, ˌitazuŋɡˈumza lˈuɣa ja kˌanaˈani, na kuˈapa kumtˈii bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. ˈm̩ɟi mmˌoɟawˈapo ˌutaˈitwa ˈm̩ɟi wa ˌuharibˈifu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo pˌatakuwˈepo mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana kˌatikˈati ja mˈisri na mnˈara wa kˌumbukˈumbu kwa bwˈana kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa mˈisri.|0
ˌitakˈuwa alˈama na ˌuʃahˈidi kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. wˌatakˌapomlilˈia bwˈana kwa sabˈabu ja watˈesi wˈao, mˈuŋɡu ˌatawˌapelekˈea mwokˈozi na mtetˈezi, nˌaje ˌatawˌaokˈoa.|0
hˈivjo bwˈana ˌataɟˌiɟulˈiʃa mweɲˈewe kwa wamˈisri, nˌao katˌika sˈiku hˈijo wˌatamkubˈali bwˈana. wˌataabˈudu kwa kˌumtolˈea ðabˈihu na sadˈaka za nafˈaka, wˌatamwekˈea bwˈana naðˈiri na kˌuzitimˈiza.|0
bwˈana ˌataipˈiɡa mˈisri kwa taˈuni; ˌatawapˈiɡa na kˌuwapˈoɲa. wˌatamɡˌeukˈia bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatajˌasikˈia maˈombi jˈao na kˌuwapˈoɲa.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo kˌutakuwˈepo na ɲɟˈia kˈuu kutˈoka mˈisri hˌadi aʃˈuru. wˌaaʃˈuru wˌatakwˈenda mˈisri, na wamˈisri wˌatakwˈenda aʃˈuru. wamˈisri na wˌaaʃˈuru wˌataabˈudu pamˈoɟa.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ˌisraˈeli ˌitakˈuwa ja tˈatu, pamˈoɟa na mˈisri na aʃˈuru, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa barˈaka kwa dunˈia.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatawˌabarˈiki, ˌakisˈema, barˈaka ˈiwe kwa mˈisri wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, kwa aʃˈuru kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈaŋɡu, na kwa ˌisraˈeli urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka ˈule ambˈao ɟˌemadˈari m̩kˈuu ˌalitˈumwa na mfˈalme sarɡˈoni wa aʃˈuru, nˌaje akˈaɟa mpˈaka aʃdˈodi, ˌakaˌuʃambulˈia na kˌuutˈeka.|0
wakˈati ˈule bwˈana ˌalisˈema kwa kˈiɲua tʃa isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi. ˌakamwambˈia, vˈua ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia kutˈoka mwilˈini mwˈako na viˈatu kutˈoka mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈako. nˌaje ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo, ˌakatembˈea hˈuku na hˌuko ˈutʃi, bˌila viˈatu.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, kˌama vˈile mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu isˈaja ˌalivjˌotembˈea ˈutʃi na bˌila viˈatu kwa miˈaka mitˈatu, kˌama iʃˈara na dalˈili m̩bˈaja ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na kˈuʃi.|0
vˈivjo hˈivjo mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌatawˌaoŋɡˈoza matˈeka wa wamˈisri, na wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo wa kˈuʃi, ˈutʃi na bˌila viˈatu, viɟˈana hˌata wazˈee, wakˈiwa matˈako wˈazi, kwa aˈibu ja wamˈisri.|0
wˈale wˌaliˌoteɡemˈea kˈuʃi na kˌuɟivunˈia mˈisri wˌataoɡˈopa na kˌuaibˈika.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika pwˈani hˌii wˌatasˈema, tazˈama lˌililˌowapˈata wˈale tˌuliˌowatˌeɡemˈea, wˈale tˌuliˌowakˌimbilˈia kwa msaˈada na wokˈovu kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru! tˌutawezˈaɟe bˌasi kupˈona?.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu ɟˈaŋɡwa kˈando ja bahˈari: kˌama upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli ˌunaopˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌadi kusˈini, mʃˌambuliˈaɟi ˌanakˈuɟa kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajotˈiʃa.|0
nˌimeoɲˈeʃwa maˈono ja kutˈiʃa: msalˈiti ˌanasalˈiti, mtˈeka ɲˈara ˌanatˈeka ɲˈara. elˈamu, ʃˌambulˈia! umˈedi, ˌizuŋɡˈuke kwa ɟˈeʃi! nˌitakomˈeʃa huzˈuni zˈote ˌalizˌosababˈiʃa.|0
katˌika hˈili mwˈili wˈaŋɡu ˌumetˈeswa na mˌaumˈivu, mˌaumˈivu makˈali ja ɣafˈula jˌameniʃˈika, kˌama jˈale ja mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa. nˌimeduwˈazwa na lˈile nˌinalˌolisikˈia, nˌimeʃaŋɡˈazwa na lˈile nˌinalˌoliˈona.|0
mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunabˌabaˈika, wˈoɡa ˌunanifˈaɲa nˌitetemˈeke, ɡˌizaɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni nˌililˌolitamˈani sˈana, lˌimekˈuwa hˈofu kˈuu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌanaandˈaa mˈeza, wˌanatandˈaza mˌazulˈia, wˌanakˈula, wˌanakˈuɲua! amkˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌaafˈisa, zˌitiˈeni ŋɡˈao mafˈuta.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌanalˌoniambˈia: nˈenda, wˈeka mlˈinzi, na atˈoe tˌaarˈifa ja kˈile ˌanatʃˌokiˈona.|0
ˌanapoˈona maɡˈari ja vˈita pamˈoɟa na kˈundi la farˈasi, wapˈanda pˈunda ˌau wapˈanda ŋɡamˈia, na ˈawe mˈatʃo, ˈawe mˈatʃo kˌikamilˈifu.|0
nˌaje mlˈinzi ˌalipˈaza saˈuti, mtʃˈana baˌada ja mtʃˈana, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌinasimˈama katˌika mnˈara wa ulˈinzi, kˈila usˈiku nˌinakˈaa mahˈali pˈaŋɡu nˌilipˌoamrˈiwa.|0
tazˈama, juˈaɟa ˈm̩tu ˌanajepˈanda ɡˈari la vˈita pamˈoɟa na kˈundi la farˈasi. nˌaje ˌanaɟˈibu: babˈeli ˌumeaŋɡˈuka, ˌumeaŋɡˈuka! viɲˈaɡo vjˈote vja miˈuŋɡu jˌake vˌimelˈala tʃˈini vikˈiwa vˌimevˈuɲɟua!.|0
ˈee wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, mlˌiopˈondwa kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia, nˌinawˌaambˈia kˈile nˌilitʃˌokisikˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu dˈuma: ˈm̩tu fulˈani ˌananiˈita kutˈoka seˈiri, mlˈinzi, usˈiku ˌutaˈiʃa lˈini? mlˈinzi, usˈiku ˌutaˈiʃa lˈini.|0
mlˈinzi ˌanaɟˈibu, ˌasubˈuhi ˌinakˈuɟa, lakˈini pˈia usˈiku. kˌama ˌuŋɡelˌiulˈiza, bˌasi ulˈiza; bˈado na urˈudi tˈena.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu ˌarabˈia: ˈeɲi mˌisafˈara ja wˌadedˈani, mnˌaopˈiɡa kˈambi katˌika vitʃˈaka vja ˌarabˈia.|0
letˈeni mˈaɟi kwa wˌeɲe kˈiu, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi tˈema, letˈeni tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja wˌakimbˈizi.|0
wˌanaˌukimbˈia upˈaŋɡa, kutˈoka upˈaŋɡa ˌuliˌotʃomolˈewa alˈani, kutˈoka upˈinde ˌuliopˈindwa, na kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɟˈoto la vˈita.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌanalˌoniambˈia: katˌika mˈuda wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, kˌama vˈile mtumˈiʃi ˌalijefˈuŋɡwa na mkatˈaba ˌaŋɡeˌihesˈabu, mˌaɟivˈuno jˈote ja kedˈari jˌatafikˈia mwˈiʃo.|0
wˌanaˈume wˌavutˈao pˈinde wˌaliˌonusurˈika, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa kedˈari, wˌatakˈuwa watʃˈatʃe. bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌamesˈema.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu bˈonde la maˈono: nˈini kˌinatʃˌokutˌaabˈiʃa sˈasa, kwˌamba nˈiɲi ɲˈote mmepˈanda ɟˌuːja mapˈaa.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wˈako wˈote wˌamekimbˈia pamˈoɟa, wˌamekamˈatwa bˌila kˌutumˈia upˈinde. nˈiɲi ɲˈote mlˌiokamˈatwa mlˌitʃukulˈiwa wafˈuŋɡwa pamˈoɟa, mlˌikimbˈia wakˈati adˈui ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado mbˈali.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌilisˈema, ɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˈami, niˈatʃe nilˈie kwa utʃˈuŋɡu. ˌusiɟarˈibu kˌunifarˈiɟi ɟˌuːja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, anˈajo sˈiku ja ɣasˈia, ja kˌukaɲˈaɡa, na ja kˌuoɡˈofja katˌika bˈonde la maˈono, sˈiku ja kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa kˈuta na ja kupˈiɡa kelˈele mpˈaka mˌilimˈani.|0
elˈamu ˌanalˌitʃukˈua pˈodo, pamˈoɟa na wˌaendˈeʃa maɡˈari ja vˈita na farˈasi. kˈiri ˌanaˌifuŋɡˈua ŋɡˈao.|0
mabˈonde jˈako jalˈijo mazˈuri sˈana jˌameɟˈaa maɡˈari ja vˈita, nˌao wapˈanda farˈasi wˌamewˈekwa kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ulˈinzi wa jˈuda ˌumeˌondolˈewa. nˌawe ˌulitazˈama sˈiku ˈile silˈaha katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mwitˈuni.|0
mkaˈona kˌuwa ˈm̩ɟi wa daˈudi ˈuna matˈundu mˈeŋɡi katˌika ulˈinzi wˈake, mkawˈeka akˈiba ja mˈaɟi kwˈeɲe bwˈawa la tʃˈini.|0
mlˌihesˈabu maɟˈeŋɡo katˌika jˌerusalˈemu nˌaɲi mkˌabomˈoa ɲˈumba ˌili kˌuimarˈiʃa ukˈuta.|0
mliɟˈeŋɡa bwˈawa la mˈaɟi kˌatikˈati ja kˈuta mbˈili kwa aɟˈili ja mˈaɟi ja bwˈawa la zamˈani, lakˈini hˌamkumtazˈama jˈule ˌalijˌelitˌeŋɡenˈeza, ˌau kˌuwa na heʃˈima kwa jˈule ˌalijˌeubˈuni ʃˈu zamˈani za kˈale.|0
bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌaliwaˈita sˈiku ˈile ˌili kulˈia na kˌuombolˈeza, kuŋɡˈoa ɲuˈele zˈenu na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamelˌifunˈua hˈili nikˈiwa nˌinasikˈia: bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, asˈema: mpˈaka sˈiku ja kˈufa kwˈenu, ðˈambi hˌii hˌaitˌafaɲˈiwa ˌupatanˈiʃo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌasemˈalo: nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie hˈuju wakˈili ʃˈebna, ambˈaje ni msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme.|0
ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini hˈapa, na ni nˈani ˌalijekˈupa ruhˈusa kˌuɟikatˈia kabˈuri lˈako mweɲˈewe, ˌukitʃˈoŋɡa kabˈuri lˈako mahˈali palˈipo ɟˈuu, na kˌutobˈoa kwa patˈasi mahˈali pˈako pa kˌupumzikˈia katˌika mwˈamba.|0
ɟˌihaðˈari, bwˈana ju karˈibu kˌukukamˈata θabˈiti, na kˌukutˈupa mbˈali, ˈewe ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌatakˌuviŋɡirˈiʃa ˈuwe kˌama mpˈira na kˌukutˈupa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈubwa. hˌuko ndˈiko ˌutakˌakofˈia, na hˌuko ndˈiko maɡˈari jˈako ja vˈita ja fahˈari jˌatabakˈia, wˌewe ˌunajˌeifˌeðehˈeʃa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana wˈako.|0
nˌitakˌuondˈoa kutˈoka kˈazi jˈako, nˌawe ˌutaondˈoʃwa kutˈoka nafˈasi jˈako.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, nˌitamwˈita mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌeliakˈimu mwˈana wa hilkˈia.|0
nˌitamvˈika ɟˈoho lˈako, nˌami nˌitamfˈuŋɡa mʃˈipi wˈako kˌiunˈoni mwˈake, na kˌumkabˈiði mamlˈaka jˈako. jˌeje ˌatakˈuwa bˈaba kwa wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu na kwa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda.|0
nˌitawˈeka mˌabeɡˈani mwˈake ˌufuŋɡˈuo wa ɲˈumba ja daˈudi. kˈile ˌafuŋɡuˈatʃo hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kufˈuŋɡa, na kˈile ˌafuŋɡˈatʃo hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌufuŋɡˈua.|0
nˌitamɡˌoŋɡomˈea kˌama kiɡˈiŋɡi kilˈitʃo mahˈali palˈipo imˈara, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa heʃˈima kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja bˈaba jˈake.|0
ˌutukˈufu wˈote wa ɟamˈaa jˌake ˌutakˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈake: watˈoto wa ɟamˈaa hˈijo na mˌatʃipukˈizi jˈake, vjˈombo vjˈake vjˈote vidˈoɡo, ʃˈu bakˈuli hˌadi mˌaɡudulˈia jˈote.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote asˈema, katˌika sˈiku ˈile, kiɡˈiŋɡi kˌilitʃˌoɡoŋɡomˈewa mahˈali imˈara kˌitaatʃˈia ɲɟˈia. kˌitakˈatwa, nˈatʃo kˌitaaŋɡˈuka na mzˈiɡo ˌuliˌoniŋɡinˈia ɟˈuu jˌake ˌutaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini. bwˈana ˌamesˈema.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu tˈiro: ˌombolezˈeni, ˈeɲi mˈeli za tarʃˈiʃi! kwa kˌuwa tˈiro ˌimeˌaŋɡamˈizwa, ˌimeˈatʃwa bˌila ɲˈumba wˈala bandˈari. kˌuanzˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja kitˈimu nˈeno lˌimewaɟˈia.|0
ɲˌamazˈeni kˈimja, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa kˌisiwˈani, pˈia nˈiɲi wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa sidˈoni, ambˈao mˌabaharˈia wˌamewˌataɟirˈiʃa.|0
kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu nafˈaka za ʃihˈori zˌilikˈuɟa; mavˈuno ja naˈili jˌalikˈuwa mapˈato ja tˈiro, nˌaje akˈawa sˈoko la mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌuaibˈiʃwe ˈee sidˈoni, nˌawe ˈee ŋɡˈome la bahˈari, kwa kˌuwa bahˈari ˌimesˈema: sˌiɟapˈata kˌuwa na utʃˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa wˈala sˌiɟapˈata kuzˈaa, wˈala sˌiɟapˈata kulˈea wˈana wˈala kutˈunza mabˈinti.|0
habˈari ˌifikˈapo mˈisri, wˌatakˈuwa katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈuu kwa aɟˈili ja tˌaarˈifa kutˈoka tˈiro.|0
vukˈeni mpˈaka tarʃˈiʃi, ˌombolezˈeni, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa kˌisiwˈani.|0
ni nˈani ˌamepˈaŋɡa hˈili ðˈidi ja tˈiro, ˈm̩ɟi ˌutoˈao matˈaɟi, ambˈao wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˌake ni wˈana wa mfˈalme na wˌatʃuˈuzi wˌake ni wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wa dunˈia.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote n̩dˈije ˌalipˈaŋɡa ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌili kˌukiʃˈuʃa kibˈuri tʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈote na kˌuwaɲˌeɲekˈeʃa wˈale wˈote ambˈao ni mˌaʃuhˈuri dˌuniˈani.|0
ˈee bˈinti tarʃˈiʃi, pˈita katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kˌama vˈile ˈm̩to naˈili kwa kˌuwa hˈuna tˈena bandˈari.|0
bwˈana ˌameɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ɟˌuːja bahˈari na kˌuzifˈaɲa fˈalme zˌake zˌitetemˈeke. ˌametˈoa ˈamri kuhˈusu kˌanaˈani kwˌamba ŋɡˈome zˌake zˌiaŋɡamˈizwe.|0
ˌalisˈema, ˌusizˈidi kˌufurˈahi, ˈee bikˈira bˈinti sidˈoni, sˈasa ˌumepˈondwa! simˈama, vˈuka uˈende kitˈimu; hˌata hˌuko hˌutapˈata pumzˈiko.|0
tazˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo, wˈatu hˈawa ambˈao sˈasa hˌawaˌonekˈani kˌama wˈapo! wˌaaʃˈuru wˌameifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo kˌuwa mahˈali pa viˈumbe wa ɟaŋɡwˈani. wˌamesˌimamˈiʃa minˈara jˈao ja vˈita kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka, wˌamezitˈeka ŋɡˈome zˌake na kˌuziˈatʃa tˈupu na kˌuufˈaɲa kˌuwa maɡˈofu.|0
ˌombolezˈeni, ˈeɲi mˈeli za tarʃˈiʃi; ŋɡˈome jˈenu ˌimeˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo tˈiro ˌutasˌahaulˈiwa kwa miˈaka sabˈini, mˈuda wa maˈiʃa ja mfˈalme. lakˈini mwˈiʃo wa miˈaka hˈijo sabˈini, ˌitakˈuwa kwa tˈiro kˌama ilˈivjo katˌika wˈimbo wa kahˈaba.|0
twˈaa kinˈubi, tembˈea mɟˈini kˈote, ˈewe kahˈaba ˌulijˌesahˌaulˈiwa; pˈiɡa kinˈubi vizˈuri, ˈimba ɲˈimbo ɲˈiŋɡi, ˌili upˈate kˌukumbˈukwa.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa miˈaka sabˈini, bwˈana ˌataʃˌuɣulˈika na tˈiro. nˌaje ˌatarudˈia aɟˈira jˌake ja ˌukahˈaba, na ˌatafˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara jˌake na fˈalme zˈote ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
lakˈini faˈida na mapˈato jˌake jˌatawˈekwa wˈakfu kwa bwˈana; hˌajatˌahifaðˈiwa wˈala kufˈitʃwa. faˈida zˌake zˌitakwˈenda kwa wˈale wˌakaˈao mbˈele za bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja tʃakˈula tˈele na mavˈazi mazˈuri.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana ˌataifˈaɲa dunˈia kˌuwa ukˈiwa na kˌuiharˈibu, nˌaje ˌataˌuharˈibu ˈuso wˌake na kˌutawˈaɲa wˌakaˈao ndˈani jˈake.|0
ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa kwa mˌakuhˈani na kwa wˈatu, kwa bwˈana na kwa mtumˈiʃi, kwa bˈibi na kwa mtumˈiʃi wˌake wa kˈike, kwa mˌuuzˈaɟi na kwa mnunˈuzi, kwa mkopˈaɟi na kwa mkˌopeʃˈaɟi, kwa mdaˈiwa na kwa m̩dˈai.|0
dunˈia ˌitahˌaribˈiwa kabˈisa na kutˈekwa ɲˈara kabˈisa. bwˈana ˌamesˈema nˈeno hˈili.|0
dunˈia ˌinakaˈuka na kˌuɲaˈuka, dunˈia ˌinaɲˌoŋɡoɲˈea na kˌuɲaˈuka, wˌaliˌotukˈuzwa wa dunˈia wˌanaɲˌoŋɡoɲˈea.|0
dunˈia ˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi na wˈatu wˈake; wˌameˈatʃa kutˈii ʃerˈia, wˌamevˈuɲɟa ˈamri na kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano la milˈele.|0
kwa hˈijo laˈana ˌinaˌiteketˈeza dunˈia, wˈatu wˌake lazˈima wˌaitʃukˈue hatˈia jˈao. kwa hˈijo wakˈazi wa dunˈia wˌametˌeketˈezwa, nˌao wˌaliˌosalˈia ni watʃˈatʃe sˈana.|0
divˈai ˈm̩pja ˌinakaˈuka na mzabˈibu ˌunaɲaˈuka, wˈatu wˈote wˌafurˌahiʃˈao wˌanalˈia kwa huzˈuni.|0
furˈaha ja mˌatoˈazi ˌimekˈoma, kelˈele za wˌeɲe furˈaha zˌimekˈoma, ʃˈaŋɡwe za kinˈubi zˌimeɲamˈaza.|0
hawˈaɲui tˈena mvˈiɲo pamˈoɟa na wˈimbo, kilˈeo ni kitʃˈuŋɡu kwa wˌaɲuˈaɟi wˈake.|0
ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌoharibˈiwa ˌumekˈuwa ukˈiwa, mlˈaŋɡo wa kˈila ɲˈumba ˌumefˈuŋɡwa.|0
bˌarabarˈani wˌanalilˈia kupˈata mvˈiɲo, furˈaha jˈote ˌimeɡeˈuka kˌuwa maɟˈonzi, furˈaha jˈote ˌimefˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali na dunˈia.|0
ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa dˌuniˈani na mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, kˌama vˈile wakˈati mzˌeitˈuni ˌupiɡwˈavjo, ˌau kˌama vˈile wakˈati masˈazo jˌabakiˈavjo baˌada ja zabˈibu kuvˈunwa.|0
wˌanainˈua saˈuti zˈao, wˌanapˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha, kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi wˌanasˈifu kwa ˌukelˈele ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki mpˈeni bwˈana ˌutukˈufu, lˌiaðˌimiʃˈeni ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, katˌika visˈiwa vja bahˈari.|0
kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia tˌunasikˈia ˌuimbˈaɟi: ˌutukˈufu kwa jˈule mwˌeɲe hˈaki. lakˈini nˌilisˈema, nˌinaðˌoofˈika, nˌinaðˌoofˈika! ˈole wˈaŋɡu! watˈenda hˈila wˌanasalˈiti! kwa hˈila watˈenda hˈila wˌanasalˈiti.|0
hˈofu, ʃˈimo na mtˈeɡo vˌinakˌuŋɡoɟˈea, ˈewe ˈm̩tu ˌukaˈaje dˌuniˈani.|0
kˈila ˌakimbiˈaje ˌasikiˈapo saˈuti ja hˈofu ˌatatˌumbukˈia ʃimˈoni, nˌaje jejˈote ˌapandˈaje kutˈoka ʃimˈoni, ˌatanˈaswa kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo. malˈaŋɡo ja ɣarˈika ja mbiŋɡˈuni jˌamefˌuŋɡulˈiwa, misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia ˌinatˌikisˈika.|0
dunˈia ˌimepasˈuka, dunˈia ˌimetʃanˈika, dunˈia ˌimetikˈiswa kabˈisa.|0
dunˈia ˌinapˌepesˈuka kˌama mlˈevi, ˌinajˌumbajˈumba kˌama kibˈanda kwˈeɲe upˈepo; ˌimelemˈewa sˈana na mzˈiɡo wa hatˈia ja uˈasi wˌake na ˌikiaŋɡˈuka kˈamwe hˌaitˌainˈuka tˈena.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌataaðˈibu ŋɡˈuvu zˌilizˈoko mbiŋɡˈuni ɟˈuu, na wafˈalme wˌaliˈoko dˌuniˈani tʃˈini.|0
wˌatakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa kˌama wafˈuŋɡwa wˌaliofˈuŋɡwa ɡˌerezˈani, wˌatafuŋɡˈiwa ɡˌerezˈani na kˌuaðibˈiwa baˌada ja sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
mwˈezi ˌutatˈiwa hˈaja, nˈalo ɟˈua lˌitaˌaibˈiʃwa; kwa maˈana bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatawˈala ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu, tˈena mbˈele ja wazˈee wˌake kwa ˌutukˈufu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitakˌutukˈuza na kˌulisˈifu ɟˈina lˈako, kwa maˈana katˌika ˌukamilˈifu wa ˌuaminˈifu ˌumetˈenda mˈambo ja aɟˈabu, mˈambo jˌalijˌokusudˈiwa ʃˈu zamˈani.|0
ˌumeufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi kˌuwa lˈundo la kifˈusi, ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome kˌuwa maɡˈofu, ŋɡˈome imˈara ja waɡˈeni kˌuwa si ˈm̩ɟi tˈena, wˈala hˌautaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena kˈamwe.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌataˈifa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu jˌatakˌuheʃˈimu, mˈiɟi ja mˌataˈifa katˈili ˌitakˌuheʃˈimu wˈewe.|0
ˌumekˈuwa kˌimbilˈio la wˈatu maskˈini, kˌimbilˈio la mhitˈaɟi katˌika taˈabu jˈake, hifˈaði wakˈati wa ðorˈuba na kivˈuli wakˈati wa hˈari. kwa maˈana pˈumzi ja wˌakatˈili ni kˌama ðorˈuba ˌipiɡˈajo ukˈuta.|0
na kˌama ɟˈoto la ɟaŋɡwˈani. wˌewe wˌaɲamazˈiʃa mˌakelˈele ja waɡˈeni; kˌama vˈile hˈari ˌipuŋɡuzwˈavjo na kivˈuli tʃa wˈiŋɡu, ndˈivjo wˈimbo wa wˌakatˈili ˌuɲamˌaziʃwˈavjo.|0
ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈuu bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌataandˈaa karˈamu ja vinˈono kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote, karˈamu ja mvˈiɲo wa zamˈani, ɲˈama nzˈuri sˈana na divˈai zilˈizo bˈora sˈana.|0
ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈuu ˌataharˈibu sitˈara ˌihifaðˈijo mˌataˈifa jˈote, kˈile kˌifunˈiko kˌifunikˈatʃo mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
jˌeje ˌatamˈeza maˈuti milˈele. bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌatafˈuta matʃˈozi katˌika ɲˈuso zˈote; ˌataondˈoa aˈibu ja wˈatu wˌake dˌuniˈani kˈote. bwˈana ˌamesˈema hˈili.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˌatasˈema, hakˈika hˈuju n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu wˈetu; tˌulimtˌumaˈini, nˌaje ˌakatˌuokˈoa. hˈuju n̩dˈije bwˈana, tˌulijˌemtumaˈini; sˌisi tˌuʃaŋɡilˈie na kˌufurahˈia katˌika wokˈovu wˈake.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌutatulˈia ɟˌuːja mlˈima hˈuu, bˌali moˈabu ˌatakaɲˈaɡwa tʃˈini kˌama maɟˈani makˈavu jˌakaɲaɡwˈavjo kwˈeɲe ʃˈimo la mbolˈea.|0
wˌatakuɲɟˈua mikˈono jˈao kˌatikˈati jˈake, kˌama vˈile mwˌoɡeleˈaɟi ˌakuɲɟuˈavjo mikˈono jˌake ˌili ˌaoɡelˈee. mˈuŋɡu ˌataʃˈuʃa kibˈuri tʃˈao lˈitʃa ja uɟˈaɲɟa wa mikˈono jˈao.|0
ˌatabomˈoa kˈuta ndˈefu za mabˈoma jˈako na kˌuziaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini, ˌataziʃˈuʃa tʃˈini arðˈini, mpˈaka mˌavumbˈini kabˈisa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, wˈimbo hˈuu ˌutaˈimbwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda: tˈuna ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio na ŋɡˈuvu, mˈuŋɡu hˌuufˈaɲa wokˈovu kˌuwa kˈuta zˌake na mabˈoma jˈake.|0
fuŋɡˈua malˈaŋɡo ˌili taˈifa lˈeɲe hˈaki lipˈate kˌuiŋɡˈia, taˈifa lˈile lˌidumiʃˈalo imˈani.|0
ˌutamlˈinda katˌika amˈani kˌamilˈifu jˌeje ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake ni θabˈiti kwa sabˈabu ˌanakˌutumaˈini wˈewe.|0
mtˌumaˈini bwˈana milˈele, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana, bwˈana, ni mwˈamba wa milˈele.|0
hˌuwaʃˈuʃa wˈale wˌaɟikwezˈao, hˌuuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe kibˈuri, hˌuuʃˈuʃa hˌadi arðˈini na kˌuutˈupa tʃˈini mˌavumbˈini.|0
miɡˈuu hˌuukaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini, miɡˈuu ja hˈao wˌaliˌoonˈewa, hatˈua za hˈao maskˈini.|0
mapˈito ja wˌeɲe hˈaki jˌameɲoˈoka. ˈewe ulˈije mwˌeɲe hˈaki, wˌaisˌawazˈiʃa ɲɟˈia ja ˈm̩tu mɲˈofu.|0
nˈaam, bwˈana, tˌukienˈenda katˌika ʃerˈia zˈako, twˌakuŋɡoɟˈea wˈewe, ɟˈina lˈako na sˈifa zˈako ndˈizo ʃaˈuku za miˈojo jˈetu.|0
nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu jˌakutamˈani wakˈati wa usˈiku, wakˈati wa ˌasubˈuhi rˈoho jˈaŋɡu jˌakuonˈea ʃaˈuku. wakˈati hukˈumu zˈako zˌinapokˈuɟa ɟˌuːja dunˈia, wˈatu wa ˌulimwˈeŋɡu hˌuɟifˈunza hˈaki.|0
iŋɡˈawa neˈema jˌaoɲˈeʃwa kwa waˈovu, hˌawaɟifˈunzi hˈaki, hˌata katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja uɲˈofu hˌuendelˈea kutˈenda mabˈaja wˈala hˌawazˌiŋɡatˈii ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mkˈono wˈako ˌumeˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu, lakˈini hˌawauˈoni. wˌao na waˈone wˈivu wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈako tˈena wˌaaibˈiʃwe, mˈoto ˌuliowˈekwa akˈiba kwa aɟˈili ja adˈui zˈako na ˌuwatˌeketˈeze.|0
bwˈana, ˌunaamˈuru amˈani kwa aɟˈili jˈetu, jˈale jˈote tˌulijowˈeza kˌujakˌamilˈiʃa ni wˌewe ˌulijetˈenda kwa aɟˈili jˈetu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, mabwˈana weŋɡˈine zaˈidi ja wˌewe wˌametˌutawˈala, lakˈini ɟˈina lˈako pekˈee ndˈilo tˌunalˌoliheʃˈimu.|0
wˌao sˈasa wˌamekˈufa, wˈala hawˈako tˈena hˈai, rˈoho za wˌaliokˈufa hˌazitarˈudi tˈena. ˌuliwˌaaðˈibu na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza, ˌumefˈuta kˌumbukˈumbu lˈao lˈote.|0
ˌumelˌioŋɡˈeza hˌilo taˈifa, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumelˌioŋɡˈeza hˌilo taˈifa. ˌumeɟˌipatˈia ˌutukˈufu kwa aɟˈili jˈako mweɲˈewe, ˌumepanˈua mipˈaka jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bwˈana, wˌalikuɟˈia katˌika taˈabu jˈao, wˌewe ˌulipˌowarˈudi, wˌaliwˈeza kuˈomba kwa kˌunoŋɡˈona tˈu.|0
kˌama mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe mˈimba ˌalijˌekaribˈia kuzˈaa ˌanavjˌoɡaaɡˈaa na kulˈia kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaumˈivu jˈake, ndˈivjo tˌulivjokˈuwa mbˈele zˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
tˌulikˈuwa na mˈimba, tˌuliɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa mˌaumˈivu, lakˈini tˌulizˈaa upˈepo. hˌatukulˈeta wokˈovu dˌuniˈani, hˌatuɟazˈaa wˈatu katˌika ˌulimwˈeŋɡu hˈuu.|0
lakˈini wˈafu wˈenu wˌataˈiʃi, nˈajo miˈili jˈao ˌitafufˈuka. nˈiɲi mnˌaokˈaa katˌika mavˈumbi, amkˈeni mkapˈiɡe kelˈele kwa furˈaha. umˈande wˈenu ni kˌama umˈande wa ˌasubˈuhi, dunˈia ˌitawazˈaa wˈafu wˈake.|0
nendˈeni, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, ˌiŋɡiˈeni vjumbˈani mwˈenu na mfˈuŋɡe milˈaŋɡo ɲˈuma jˈenu, ɟˌifitʃˈeni kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo mpˈaka ɣaðˈabu jˌake ipˈite.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana ˌanakˈuɟa kutˈoka makˈao jˌake ˌili kˌuwaaðˈibu wˈatu wa dunˈia kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao. dunˈia ˌitaðˌihirˈiʃa ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu ɟˈuu jˈake, wˈala hˌaitˌaendelˈea kˌuwafˈitʃa wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌouˈawa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile: imbˈeni kuhˈusu ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu lˌililozˈaa.|0
mˌimi sˌiɟakˌasirˈika. lˈitʃa pˌaŋɡekuwˈepo mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba kˌunikabˈili! nˌiŋɡepambˈana ðˈidi jˌake katˌika vˈita, nˌiŋɡelˌiitʃˈoma mˈoto jˈote.|0
ˌau nˌiwaˈatʃe wˈaɟe kwˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja kupˈata kˌimbilˈio, wˌao na wafˈaɲe amˈani nˈami, nˈaam, wafˈaɲe amˈani nˈami.|0
katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, jakˈobo ˌatatˈia mizˈizi, ˌisraˈeli ˌatatˈoa tʃˌipukˈizi na kˌutʃanˈua maˈua, nˌaje ˌataɟˈaza ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote kwa matˈunda.|0
kwa vˈita na kwa kˌumfukˈuza ˌunapiŋɡˈana nˈaje: kwa mʃˈindo wˌake mkˈali ˌanamfukˈuza, kˌama sˈiku ˈile ˌuvumˈapo upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kwa hˈili, bˈasi, hatˈia ja jakˈobo ˌitafaɲˈiwa ˌupatanˈiʃo, nˈalo hˈili lˌitakˈuwa matˈunda ja ˌutimilˈizo wa kˌuondolˈewa kwa ðˈambi jˈake: wakˈati ˌatakˌapojafˈaɲa mˈawe jˈote ja mˌaðabˈahu kˌuwa kˌama mˈawe ja tʃokˈaa jˌalijopˈondwa vipˈande vipˈande, hakˈuna ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera ˌau mˌaðabˈahu za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba zˌitakˌazobˈaki zˌimesimˈama.|0
ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio na bˈoma ˌumebˈaki ukˈiwa, makˈao jˌalijˌotelekˈezwa, jˌalijoˈatʃwa kˌama ɟˈaŋɡwa. hˌuko ndˈama hulˈiʃa, hˌuko hˌuɟilˈaza, wˌanakwaɲˈua matˈawi jˈake.|0
wakˈati viɟˈiti vjˈake vˌimekaˈuka, huvˈuɲɟua nˌao wˌanawˈake hˈuɟa na kuwˈaʃa nˈavjo mˈoto. kwa kˌuwa hˈili ni taˈifa lisˈilo na ˌufahˈamu, kwa hˈijo jˌeje ˌalijˌewafˈaɲa hˈana hurˈuma ɟˈuu jˈao, muˈumba wˌao hˌawaoɲˈeʃi faðˈili.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile bwˈana ˌatapˈura kutˈoka mˌatirirˈiko ja ˈm̩to frˈati hˌadi kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri, nˌaɲi ˈee wˌaisraˈeli, mtˌakusˈaɲua mmˈoɟa mmˈoɟa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile tˌarumbˈeta kˈubwa ˌitalˈia. wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakiˌaŋɡamˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja aʃˈuru, nˌao wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana katˌika mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˈole kwa lˈile tˈaɟi la maˈua, kibˈuri tʃa walˈevi wa ˌefraˈimu, kwa ˈua lˌinalˌosiɲˈaa, uzˈuri wa ˌutukˈufu wˈake, ˌuliowˈekwa kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃa bˈonde lˈeɲe rutˈuba: kwa ˈule ˈm̩ɟi, kibˈuri tʃa wˈale wˌalioʃˈuʃwa na mvˈiɲo.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana anˈaje mmˈoɟa alˈije na uwˈezo na ŋɡˈuvu. kˌama ðorˈuba ja mvˈua ja mˈawe na upˈepo ˌuharibˈuo, kˌama mvˈua ˌiɲeʃˈajo kwa ŋɡˈuvu na mˌafurˈiko jˌaʃukˈajo, ˌatakˌiaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
lˈile tˈaɟi la maˈua, kibˈuri tʃa walˈevi tʃa ˌefraˈimu, kˌitakaɲˈaɡwa tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo.|0
lˈile ˈua lˌinalˌosiɲˈaa, uzˈuri wa ˌutukˈufu wˈake, ˌuliowˈekwa kwˈeɲe kˈitʃwa tʃa bˈonde lˈeɲe rutˈuba, lˌitakˈuwa kˌama tˈini ˌilijoˈiva kˈabla ja mavˈuno: mˈara ˈm̩tu ˌaionˈapo, hˌuitʃˈuma na kuˈila.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatakˈuwa tˈaɟi la ˌutukˈufu, tˈaɟi zˈuri la maˈua kwa mabˈaki ja wˈatu wˈake.|0
ˌatakˈuwa rˈoho ja hˈaki kwa jˌeje ˌaketˈije katˌika kˈiti tʃa hukˈumu, tʃˈanzo tʃa ŋɡˈuvu kwa wˈale wˌazuiˈao vˈita laŋɡˈoni.|0
hˈawa pˈia wˌanapˌepesˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja mvˈiɲo, wˌanajˌumbajˈumba kwa sabˈabu ja kilˈeo: mˌakuhˈani na mˌanabˈii wˌanapˌepesˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja kilˈeo, wˌanatʃˌaŋɡaɲikˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja mvˈiɲo; wˌanapˌepesˈuka wˌanapoˈona maˈono, wˌanaɟikwˈaa wˌanapotˈoa mˌaamˈuzi.|0
mˈeza zˈote zˌimeɟˈawa na mˌatapˈiʃi wˈala hakˈuna sehˈemu hˌata ndˈoɡo ˌisijokˈuwa na utʃˈafu.|0
jˌeje ˌanaɟarˈibu kˌumfundˈiʃa nˈani? jˌeje ˌanamwˌelezˈea nˈani uɟˈumbe wˈake? ɟˈe, ni kwa watˈoto wˌaliˌoatʃˈiʃwa kuɲˈoɲa? ɟˈe, ni wˈale ambˈao ndˈipo tu wˌametolˈewa mˌatitˈini.|0
kwa maˈana nˈi: ˈamri ɟˌuːja ˈamri, ˈamri ɟˌuːja ˈamri, kanˈuni ɟˌuːja kanˈuni, kanˈuni ɟˌuːja kanˈuni; hˈapa kidˈoɡo, kˈule kidˈoɡo.|0
sˈawa kabˈisa, kwa midˈomo miɡˈeni na kwa lˈuɣa ŋɡˈeni, mˈuŋɡu ˌatasˈema na wˈatu hˈawa.|0
wˈale ambˈao ˌaliwˌaambˈia, hˈapa ni mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika, wˌaliotʃˈoka na wˌapumzˈike, na, hˈapa ni mahˈali pa mˌapumzˈiko, lakˈini hˌawakutˈaka kˌusikilˈiza.|0
hˈivjo bˈasi, nˈeno la bwˈana kwˈao lˌitakˈuwa: ˈamri ɟˌuːja ˈamri, ˈamri ɟˌuːja ˈamri, kanˈuni ɟˌuːja kanˈuni, kanˈuni ɟˌuːja kanˈuni, hˈapa kidˈoɡo, kˈule kidˈoɡo: ˌili waˈende na kˌuaŋɡˈuka tʃˈali, wˌakiɟˌeruhˈiwa, wˌakinˈaswa na kˌukamˈatwa.|0
kwa hˈijo sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˌeɲe ðarˈau mnˌaotawˈala wˈatu hˈawa wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˈiɲi mnˌaɟisˈifu, tˌumefˈaɲa aɡˈano na maˈuti, tˌumefˈaɲa mˌapatˈano na kuzˈimu. wakˈati pˈiɡo lˌifurikˈalo lˌitakˌapopˈita, hˌaliwˈezi kˌutuɡˈusa sˈisi, kwa kˌuwa tˌumefˈaɲa uˈoŋɡo kˌuwa kˌimbilˈio lˈetu na miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo kˌuwa mahˈali pˈetu pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈavjo: tazˈama, nˌinawˈeka ɟˈiwe katˌika sajˈuni, ɟˈiwe lˌililˌoɟaribˈiwa, ɟˈiwe la pembˈeni la θamˈani kwa aɟˈili ja msˈiŋɡi θabˈiti. jˌeje ˌatumˌainˈije kˈamwe hˌatatˈiwa hˈofu.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa hˈaki kˌuwa kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia na ˌuadilˈifu kˌuwa timˈazi; mvˈua ja mˈawe ˌitafaɡˈia kˌimbilˈio lˈenu, hˈuo uˈoŋɡo, nˈajo mˈaɟi jˌatafˌurikˈia mahˈali pˈenu pa kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
aɡˈano lˈenu na kˈifo lˌitabˌatilˈiʃwa, patˈano lˈenu na kuzˈimu hˌalitˌasimˈama. wakˈati pˈiɡo lˌifurikˈalo lˌitakˌapowakˈumba, lˌitawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini.|0
kˈila mˈara liɟˈapo lˌitawˌatʃukˈua, ˌasubˈuhi baˌada ja ˌasubˈuhi, wakˈati wa mtʃˈana na wakˈati wa usˈiku, lˌitawakˈumba ʃˈu mwˈanzo hˌadi mwˈiʃo. kˌuuelˈewa uɟˈumbe hˈuu ˌutalˈeta hˈofu tˈupu.|0
kitˈanda ni kifˈupi ˈm̩no kˌuɟiɲoˈoʃa ɟˈuu jˈake, ŋɡˈuo ja kˌuɟifˌunikˈia ni ɲembˈamba ˈm̩no ˈm̩tu hawˈezi kˌuɟifˌunikˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌatainˈuka kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa kwˈeɲe mlˈima pˌerasˈimu, ˌataɣˌaðibˈika kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa katˌika bˈonde la ɡˌibeˈoni: ˌili kufˈaɲa kˈazi jˈake, kˈazi jˌake ja aɟˈabu, ˌili kˌutimˈiza kˈazi jˈake, kˈazi jˌake ŋɡˈeni.|0
sˈasa atʃˈeni ðarˈau zˈenu, la sˈivjo mˌiɲorˈoro jˈenu ˌitakˈuwa mizˈito zaˈidi. bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌamenˌiambˈia habˈari za mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌalijˌoamrˈiwa ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
sˌikilizˈeni msikˈie saˈuti jˈaŋɡu, teɡˈeni mˌasikˈio na msikˈie nˌijasemˈajo.|0
wakˈati mkulˈima ˌalimˈapo ˌili apˈande, ɟˈe, hulˈima sˈiku zˈote? ɟˈe, hˌuendelˈea kˌubomˈoa ˈarði na kˌusawazˈiʃa udˈoŋɡo.|0
ˌakiˈiʃa kˌusawazˈiʃa ʃˈamba, ɟˈe, hˌatapˈaɲi mbˈeɡu za bizˈari na kˌutawˈaɲa ɟˈira? ɟˈe, hapˈandi ŋɡˈano katˌika sehˈemu jˈake, ʃajˈiri katˌika enˈeo lˈake, na nafˈaka ɲiŋɡˈine katˌika ʃˈamba lˈake.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˌake hˌumwelekˈeza na kˌumfundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia ilˈijo sahˈihi.|0
nafˈaka lazˈima isˈaɡwe ˌili kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mkˈate, kwa hˈijo ˈm̩tu hˌaendelˈei kˌuipˈura daˈima. iŋɡˈawa hˌuendˈeʃa mˌaɡurudˈumu ja ɡˈari lˈake la kˌupurˈia ɟˈuu jˈake, farˈasi wˌake hˌawasˈaɡi.|0
hˈaja jˈote pˈia hutˈoka kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mwˌeɲe mˌaʃaˈuri ja aɟˈabu, na ˌanajepˈita wˈote kwa hekˈima.|0
ˈole wˈako, wˌewe ˌariˈeli, ˌariˈeli, ˈm̩ɟi ˌalimokˈaa daˈudi! ˌoŋɡezˈeni mwˈaka kwa mwˈaka, na mzuŋɡˈuko wa sˌikukˈuu zˈenu ˌuendelˈee.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˌitaˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˌariˈeli kwa ɟˈeʃi, ˌutalˈia na kˌuombolˈeza, ˌutakˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama mahˈali pa kˌuwaʃˈia mˈoto mˌaðabahˈuni.|0
nˌitapˈiɡa kˈambi pˈande zˈote ðˈidi jˈako, nˌitakˌuzuŋɡˈuka kwa minˈara na kupˈaŋɡa mˌaziŋɡˈirwa jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ˌutakˌapoʃˈuʃwa, ˌutanˈena kutˈoka arðˈini, ˌutamumˈuɲa manˈeno jˈako kutˈoka mˌavumbˈini. saˈuti jˈako ˌitatˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˌama vˈile ja mzˈimu, ˌutanoŋɡˈona manˈeno jˈako tˌoka mˌavumbˈini.|0
lakˈini adˈui zˈako wˈeŋɡi wˌatakˈuwa kˌama vˈumbi laˈini, kˈundi la wˌakatˈili wˌatakˈuwa kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo. nˈaam, ɣafˈula, mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatakˈuɟa na ŋɡurˈumo, tˌetemˈeko la ˈarði, na kwa saˈuti kˈuu, ˌatakˈuɟa na ðorˈuba, tufˈani na miˈali ja mˈoto ˌitekˌetezˈajo.|0
kˈiʃa makˈundi ja mˌataˈifa jˈote jˈale jˌapiɡanˈajo ðˈidi ja ˌariˈeli, jˈale jˌanajˌomʃambulˈia jˌeje na ŋɡˈome zˈake, na kˌumzuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi, wˌatakˈuwa kˌama ilˈivjo ndˈoto, kˌama maˈono wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu alˈije na ɲɟˈaa ˌaotˈavjo kˌuwa ˌanakˈula, lakˈini huˈamka, bˈado ɲɟˈaa jˌake ˌiŋɡalˈipo, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kˈiu ˌaotˈavjo kˌuwa ˌanakˈuɲua mˈaɟi, lakˈini huˈamka akˈiwa ˌanazimˈia, akˈiwa bˈado aŋɡˈali ˈana kˈiu. hˈivjo ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa kwa makˈundi jˈote ja mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌopiɡˈana ðˈidi ja mlˈima sajˈuni.|0
dˌuwaˈeni na kˌuʃaŋɡˈaa, ɟˌifaɲˈeni vipˈofu weɲˈewe na msiˈone, lewˈeni, lakˈini si kwa mvˈiɲo, pˌepesukˈeni lakˈini si kwa kilˈeo.|0
bwˈana ˌamewˌaleteˈeni ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito: ˌamezˈiba mˈatʃo jˈenu nˈiɲi mˌanabˈii; ˌamefunˈika vˈitʃwa vjˈenu nˈiɲi wˌaonˈaɟi.|0
kwa maˈana kwˈenu nˈiɲi, maˈono hˈaja jˈote si kˈitu ˈila manˈeno jˌalijotˈiwa lakˈiri katˌika kitˈabu. kˌama mkˈimpa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kusˈoma kitˈabu hˈiki, nˌaɲi mkˌamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali kisˈome, jˌeje ˌataɟˈibu, mˌimi siwˈezi, kwa kˌuwa kˌimetˈiwa lakˈiri.|0
ˌau kˌama mkˈimpa ˈm̩tu jejˈote kitˈabu hˈiki ˌasijewˈeza kusˈoma na kˌumwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali kisˈome, ˌataɟˈibu, mˌimi siɟˈui kusˈoma.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena nˌitawˌaʃaŋɡˈaza wˈatu hˈawa, kwa aɟˈabu ɟˌuːja aɟˈabu. hekˈima ja wˌeɲe hekˈima ˌitapotˈea, nˈajo akˈili ja wˌeɲe akˈili ˌitatowˈeka.|0
ˈole kwa wˈale wˌanaokwˈenda kwˈeɲe vilˈindi virˈefu kumfˈitʃa bwˈana mipˈaŋɡo jˈao, wˌafaɲˈao kˈazi zˈao ɡizˈani na kˌufikˈiri, ni nˈani ˌanajˌetuˈona? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeɟˈua.|0
mnˌapindˈua mˈambo ɟˈuu tʃˈini, kˈana kwˌamba mfiɲˈanzi awˈeza kˌufikirˈiwa kˌuwa kˌama udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi! ɟˈe, kˈile kˌilitʃˌofiɲˈaŋɡwa tʃawˈeza kˌumwambˈia jˈule ˌalijˌekifiɲˈaŋɡa, wˌewe hˌukunˌifiɲˈaŋɡa mˈimi? ɟˈe, tʃˈuŋɡu kˌinawˈeza kˌumwambˈia mfiɲˈanzi, wˌewe huɟˈui tʃotʃˈote.|0
kwa mˈuda mfˈupi sˈana, ɟˈe, lˌebanˈoni hˌaitˌaɡeˈuzwa kˌuwa ʃˈamba lˈeɲe rutˈuba, na ʃˈamba lˈeɲe rutˈuba lˈiwe kˌama msˈitu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile vizˈiwi wˌatasikˈia manˈeno ja kitˈabu, na katˌika ˌutusitˈusi na ɡˈiza mˈatʃo ja kipˈofu jˌataˈona.|0
mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena wˌaɲeɲekˈevu wˌatafurˈahi katˌika bwˈana, wˌahitˈaɟi wˌatafurˈahi katˌika jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌakatˈili wˌatatowˈeka na wˌeɲe kˌuðihˈaki wˌatatˌokomˈea, nˌao wˈote wˌeɲe ɟˈitʃo la uˈovu wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
wˈale ambˈao kwa nˈeno humfˈaɲa ˈm̩tu kˌuwa mwˌeɲe hatˈia, wˌamteɡeˈao mtˈeɡo mtetˈezi katˌika mˌahakˈama, na kwa ˌuʃuhˈuda wa uˈoŋɡo humɲˈima hˈaki jˌeje asˈije na hatˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, ˌalijˌemkombˈoa ˌabrahˈamu, ˌanalosˈema kwa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo: jakˈobo hˌataˌaibˈiʃwa tˈena, wˈala ɲˈuso zˈao hˌazitˌabadilˈika sˈura tˈena.|0
wˈale wˌanaˌopotˈoka rohˈoni wˌatapˈata ˌufahˈamu, nˌao wˈale wˌanaˌolalamˈika wˌatajˌakubˈali mˌafundˈiʃo.|0
bwˈana asˈema, ˈole kwa watˈoto wˌakaˈidi, kwa wˈale wˌanaˌotimˈiza mipˈaŋɡo ambˈajo si jˈaŋɡu, wˌakifˈaɲa mˌakubˌaliˈano, lakˈini si kwa rˈoho wˈaŋɡu, wˌakilundˈika ðˈambi ɟˌuːja ðˈambi.|0
wˈale wˌaʃukˈao kwˈenda mˈisri bˌila kutˈaka ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu, wˌanaˌotafˈuta msaˈada wa ulˈinzi wa farˈao, wˌatafutˈao kivˈuli tʃa mˈisri kwa aɟˈili ja kˌimbilˈio.|0
lakˈini ulˈinzi wa farˈao ˌutakˈuwa kwa aˈibu jˈenu, kivˈuli tʃa mˈisri kˌitawˌaletˈea feðˈeha.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˈana mˌaafˈisa katˌika soˈani na waɟˈumbe wˌamewasˈili katˌika hanˈesi.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌataˌaibˈiʃwa kwa sabˈabu ja taˈifa lˌisilˌowafˈaa kˈitu, ambˈalo hˌaliwˌaletˈei msaˈada wˈala faˈida, bˌali aˈibu tu na feðˈeha.|0
nˈeno kuhˈusu waɲˈama wa neɡˈebu: katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja taˈabu na ʃˈida, ja sˈimba za dˈume na ɟˈike, ja ɲˈoka mwˌeɲe sˈumu kˈali na ɲˈoka wˌarukˈao, waɟˈumbe hˌutʃukˈua ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao ɟˌuːja miɡˈoŋɡo ja pˈunda, hazˈina zˈao ɟˌuːja nˈundu za ŋɡamˈia, kwa lˈile taˈifa lˌisilokˈuwa na faˈida.|0
nˈenda sˈasa, lˌiandˈike nˈeno hˈili ɟˌuːja kibˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈao, lˌiandˈike kwˈeɲe kitˈabu, ˌili liwˈeze kˌuwa ʃahˈidi milˈele kwa aɟˈili ja sˈiku ziɟˈazo.|0
hˈawa ni wˈatu waˈasi, watˈoto wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu, watˈoto ambˈao hˌawatˈaki kˌusikilˈiza mˌafundˈiʃo ja bwˈana.|0
wˌanawˌaambˈia wˌaonˈaɟi, msiˈone maˈono tˈena! nˈako kwa mˌanabˈii wˌanasˈema, msˌiendelˈee kˌutupatˈia maˈono ambˈajo ni ja kwˈeli! tˌuambiˈeni mˈambo ja kˌupendˈeza, tˌabirˈini mˈambo ja uˈoŋɡo.|0
atʃˈeni ɲɟˈia hˌii, ˌondokˈeni katˌika mapˈito hˈaja, nˌaɲi atʃˈeni kˌutukabˈili pamˈoɟa na jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli: kwa sabˈabu mmˌekatˈaa uɟˈumbe hˈuu, mkˌateɡemˈea ˌuonˈevu na kˌutumˌainˈia ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
ðˈambi hˌii ˌitakˈuwa kwˈenu kˌama ukˈuta mrˈefu, wˌeɲe ˈufa na wˌeɲe kˌubetˈuka, ambˈao ˌunaaŋɡˈuka ɣafˈula, mˈara mˈoɟa.|0
ˌutavuɲɟˈika vipˈande vipˈande kˌama tʃˈombo tʃa udˈoŋɡo ˌukipasˈuka pasˈipo hurˈuma ambˈapo katˌika vipˈande vjˈake hakˈuna kipˈande kˌitakˌatʃopˌatikˈana kwa kˌuukulˈia makˈaa kutˈoka ɟikˈoni ˌau kˌutʃotˈea mˈaɟi kˌisimˈani.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: katˌika kutˈubu na kˌupumzˈika n̩dˈio wokˈovu wˈenu, katˌika kˌutulˈia na kˌutumaˈini ndˈizo ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu, lakˈini hˌamkutˈaka.|0
mlisˈema, hapˈana, tˌutakimbˈia kwa farˈasi. kwa hˈijo mtˌakimbˈia! mlisˈema, tˌutakimbˈia kwa farˈasi wˌaendˈao kˈasi. kwa hˈijo wˌanaˌowafukˈuza wˌatakwˈenda kˈasi.|0
wˈatu mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri wˌatakimbˈia kwa aɟˈili ja kitˈiʃo tʃa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa, kwa vˌitiʃˈio vja wˈatu watˈano wˈote mtˌakimbˈia, hˌadi mtˌakapoˈatʃwa kˌama mliŋɡˈoti wa bendˈera ɟˌuːja kilˈele tʃa mlˈima, kˌama bendˈera ɟˌuːja kilˈima.|0
hˌata hˈivjo bwˈana ˌanatamˈani kˌutupatˈia neˈema, ˌanainˈuka ˌili kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wa hˈaki. wˌamebˌarikˈiwa wˈote wˌanaˌomŋɡoɟˈea jˈeje.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu wa sajˈuni, mnˌaoˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu, hˌamtalˈia tˈena. tˌazamˈeni ɟˈinsi ˌatakˌavjokˈuwa na hurˈuma mtˌakapolˈia kwa kumwˈomba msaˈada! mˈara ˌasikiˈapo, ˌatawaɟˈibu.|0
iŋɡˈawa bwˈana huwˈapa tʃakˈula tʃa ʃˈida na mˈaɟi ja taˈabu, walˈimu wˈenu hˌawatafˈitʃwa tˈena, kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe mtˌawaˈona.|0
mkˌiɡeˈuka kuˈume ˌau kuʃˈoto, mˌasikˈio jˈenu jˌatasikˈia saˈuti ɲˈuma jˈenu ˌikisˈema, hˌii n̩dˈijo ɲɟˈia, ˌifuatˈeni.|0
kˈiʃa mtˌanaɟˈisi sanˈamu zˈenu zˌilizˌofunˈikwa kwa fˈeða, na viɲˈaɡo vjˈenu vˌilivjˌofunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu. mtˌazitˌupilˈia mbˈali kˌama vˌitambˈaa vja wakˈati wa hˈeði na kˌuziambˈia, hˈaja, tokˈeni hˈapa.|0
pˈia ˌatawˈapa mvˈua kwa aɟˈili ja mbˈeɡu mnˌazootˈeʃa arðˈini, tʃakˈula kˌinatʃotˈoka arðˈini kˌitakˈuwa kizˈuri sˈana, tˈena tˈele. katˌika sˈiku ˈile, ŋɡˈombe wˈenu wˌatalˈiʃa katˌika ʃˈamba pˈana la maɟˈani.|0
maksˈai na pˈunda wˌalimˈao wˌatakˈula maɟˈani makˈavu na vjakˈula vˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa, vˌinavjˌotandˈazwa kwa ˈuma na sepˈeto.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile ja mˌauˈaɟi makˈuu, wakˈati minˈara ˌitakˌapoaŋɡˈuka, viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi vˌitatˌirirˈika ɟˌuːja kˈila mlˈima mrˈefu na kˈila kilˈima kˌilitʃˌoinˈuka sˈana.|0
mwˈezi ˌutaaŋɡˈaza kˌama ɟˈua, nˌao mwˈaŋɡa wa ɟˈua ˌutaŋɡˈaa mˈara sˈaba zaˈidi, kˌama nˈuru ja sˈiku sˈaba, wakˈati bwˈana ˌatakˌapojafˈuŋɡa mˌaɟerˈaha ja wˈatu wˌake na kˌuwapˈoɲa vidˈonda ˌalivjˌowatˈia.|0
tazˈama, ɟˈina la bwˈana lˌinakˈuɟa kutˈoka mbˈali, likˈiwa na hasˈira kˈali ˌinajowˈaka pamˈoɟa na wˈiŋɡu zˈito la mˈoʃi, midˈomo jˌake ˌimeɟˈaa ɣaðˈabu na ulˈimi wˌake ni mˈoto ulˈao.|0
pˈumzi jˌake ni kˌama mkˈondo wa mˈaɟi jˌaendˈajo kˈasi, jˌakipˈanda hˌadi ʃiŋɡˈoni. hˌutikˈisa mˌataˈifa katˌika tʃˌeketʃˈeke ja ˌuharibˈifu, huwˈeka liɟˈamu katˌika matˈaja ja mˌataˈifa ambˈajo hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza ˌupotevˈuni.|0
nˌaɲi mtaˈimba kˌama usˈiku ˈule mnˌaaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu tˌakatˈifu. miˈojo jˈenu ˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia kˌama vˈile wˈatu wˌanapokwˈea na filˈimbi kwˈeɲe mlˈima wa bwˈana, kwa mwˈamba wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
bwˈana ˌatawˌasababˈiʃa wˈatu wˌaisikˈie saˈuti jˌake ja ˌutukˈufu, nˌaje ˌatawafˈaɲa wˌauˈone mkˈono wˌake ˌukiʃˈuka pamˈoɟa na hasˈira jˌake kˈali na mˈoto ulˈao, kukˈiwa na tufˈani ja mvˈua, ŋɡurˈumo za rˈadi na mvˈua ja mˈawe.|0
saˈuti ja bwˈana ˌitaˌivuɲɟavˈuɲɟa aʃˈuru, kwa fˈimbo jˌake ja ˌutawˈala ˌatawapˈiɡa.|0
kˈila pˈiɡo bwˈana ˌatakˌaloliwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈao kwa fˈimbo jˌake ja kˌuaðˈibu, lˌitakˈuwa kwa wˈimbo wa matˈari na vinˈubi, ˌanapˌopiɡˈana nˌao katˌika vˈita kwa mapˈiɡo ja mkˈono wˈake.|0
