tofˈeθi ˌimeˌandalˈiwa tˌoka zamˈani, ˌimewˈekwa tajˈari kwa aɟˈili ja mfˈalme. ʃˈimo lˈake la mˈoto lˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa kˈina kirˈefu na kwa upˈana mkˈubwa, likˈiwa na mˈoto na kˈuni tˈele; pˈumzi ja bwˈana, kˌama kiɟˈito tʃa kˌiberˈiti, hˌuuwˈaʃa mˈoto.|0
ˈole wˌao wˈale wˌaʃukˈao mˈisri kwa aɟˈili ja msaˈada, wˈale wˌateɡˌemeˈao farˈasi, wˌanaowˈeka tˌumaˈini katˌika wˈiŋɡi wa maɡˈari jˈao ja vˈita, na katˌika ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi za wapˈanda farˈasi, lakˈini hˌawamwˌaŋɡalˈii jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, wˈala hˌawatafˈuti msaˈada kwa bwˈana.|0
hˌata hˈivjo jˌeje pˈia ˈana hekˈima na ˌanawˈeza kulˈeta maˈafa, wˈala hˌajataŋɡˈui manˈeno jˈake. jˌeje ˌatainˈuka ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja mwˈovu, ðˈidi ja wˈale ambˈao hˌuwasˌaidˈia watˈenda mabˈaja.|0
lakˈini wamˈisri ni wˌanadˈamu, wˈala si mˈuŋɡu, farˈasi wˌao ni ɲˈama, wˈala si rˈoho. wakˈati bwˈana ˌatakˌapoɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈake, jˌeje ˌanajˌesaidˈia ˌataɟikwˈaa, nˌaje ˌanajˌesaidˈiwa ˌataaŋɡˈuka, wˈote wawˈili wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia pamˈoɟa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌanalˌoniambˈia: kˌama vˈile sˈimba ˌaŋɡurumˈavjo, sˈimba mkˈubwa ɟˌuːja mawˈindo jˈake: hˌata iŋɡˈawa kˈundi lˈote la watʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo huˈitwa pamˈoɟa ðˈidi jˈake, hatˈiwi hˈofu na kelˈele zˈao wˈala kˌusumbulˈiwa na ɣasˈia zˈao; ndˈivjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatakˌavjoʃˈuka kufˈaɲa vˈita ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni na ɟˌuːja vilˈele vjˈake.|0
kˌama ndˈeɡe wˌarukˈao, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌataukˈiŋɡa jˌerusalˈemu; ˌataukˈiŋɡa na kˌuuokˈoa, ˌatapˈita ɟˈuu jˌake na kˌuufˈaɲa salˈama.|0
mrˌudiˈeni jˌeje ambˈaje ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌimemwˈasi sˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa katˌika sˈiku ˈile kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatazˌikatˈaa sanˈamu za fˈeða na za ðahˈabu zˌilizˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono jˈenu jˌeɲe ðˈambi.|0
aʃˈuru ˌitaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa ambˈao si wa mwˌanadˈamu; upˈaŋɡa usˈio wa kˌibinadˈamu ˌutawˌaaŋɡamˈiza. wˌatakimbˈia mbˈele ja upˈaŋɡa na viɟˈana wˌao wa kiˈume wˌatafaɲˈizwa kˈazi kwa lazˈima.|0
ŋɡˈome zˈao zˌitaaŋɡˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja hˈofu; kwa kuˈona bendˈera ja vˈita, mˌaɟemadˈari wˌao wˌataʃˈikwa na hˈofu ja ɣafˈula, asˈema bwˈana, ambˈaje mˈoto wˌake ˈuko sajˈuni, nˈajo tanˈuru jˌake ˈiko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tazˈama, mfˈalme ˌatatawˈala kwa ˌuadilˈifu na wˌatawˈala wˌatatawˈala kwa hˈaki.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈuwa kˌama kivˈuli tʃa kˌuɟifˈitʃa kˌutokˈana na upˈepo na kˌimbilˈio kˌutokˈana na ðorˈuba, kˌama viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi ɟaŋɡwˈani na kivˈuli tʃa mwˈamba mkˈubwa katˌika ˈarði jˌeɲe kˈiu.|0
ndˈipo mˈatʃo ja wˈale wˌanaoˈona hˌajatafˈumbwa tˈena, nˈajo mˌasikˈio ja wˈale wˌanaˌosikˈia jˌatasˌikilˈiza.|0
mˈojo wa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hamˈaki ˌutafahˈamu na kˌuelˈewa, nˌao ulˈimi wˌeɲe kˌiɡuɡumˈizi ˌutanˈena kwa ˌufasˈaha.|0
mpumbˈavu hˌataˈitwa tˈena mˌuuŋɡwˈana, wˈala ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja kabˈisa kupˈewa heʃˈima ja ɟˈuu.|0
kwa kˌuwa mpumbˈavu hunˈena ˌupumbˈavu, mˈojo wˌake hˌuʃuɣulˈika na uˈovu: hutˈenda mˈambo jasˈijo ja kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu, na hˌuenˈeza habˈari za makˈosa kuhˈusu bwˈana; jˌeje hˌuwaˈatʃa wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa bˌila kˈitu, na wˌeɲe kˈiu hˌuwaɲˈima mˈaɟi.|0
tˌaratˈibu za ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja kabˈisa ni ˈovu, hufˈaɲa mipˈaŋɡo miˈovu ˌili kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza maskˈini kwa uˈoŋɡo, hˌata wakˈati ambˈapo hˈoɟa za mhitˈaɟi ni za hˈaki.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu mˌuuŋɡwˈana hufˈaɲa mipˈaŋɡo ja kˌiuŋɡwˈana, na kwa matˈendo ja kˌiuŋɡwˈana jˌeje hˌufanikˈiwa.|0
ˈeɲi wˌanawˈake wˌeɲe kˌuriðˈika sˈana, amkˈeni na mnˌisikilˈize. ˈeɲi bˈinti mnˌaoɟˌisikˈia kˌuwa salˈama, sˌikiˈeni lˈile nˌinalotˈaka kˌuwaambˈia.|0
mˈuda zaˈidi kidˈoɡo ja mwˈaka mmˈoɟa, nˈiɲi mnˌaoɟˌisikˈia salˈama mtˌatetemˈeka, mavˈuno ja zabˈibu jˌatakˈoma na mavˈuno ja matˈunda hˌajatˌakuwˈepo.|0
tˌetemekˈeni, ˈeɲi wˌanawˈake wˌeɲe kˌuriðˈika, tˌetemekˈeni kwa hˈofu, ˈeɲi bˈinti mnˌaoɟˌisikˈia salˈama! vuˈeni ŋɡˈuo zˈenu, vaˈeni ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia vˌiunˈoni mwˈenu.|0
piɡˈeni matˈiti jˈenu kwa aɟˈili ja maʃˈamba mazˈuri, kwa aɟˈili ja mˌizabˈibu ˌilijozˈaa vizˈuri.|0
na kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo miˈiba na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma ˌimemˈea: nˈaam, ˌombolezˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba zˈote za furˈaha na kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wˌeɲe kufˈaɲa ʃerˈehe.|0
ŋɡˈome ˌitaˈatʃwa, ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe kelˈele ɲˈiŋɡi ˌutahˈamwa, ŋɡˈome ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi na mnˈara wa ulˈinzi vˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa milˈele, mahˈali pazˈuri pa pˈunda na malˈiʃo ja makˈundi ja kondˈoo.|0
mpˈaka rˈoho amwˈaɡwe ɟˈuu jˈetu kutˈoka ɟˈuu, nˈalo ɟˈaŋɡwa kˌuwa ʃˈamba lˈeɲe rutˈuba, na ʃˈamba lˈeɲe rutˈuba kˌuwa kˌama msˈitu.|0
hˈaki ˌitakˈaa katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa, na ˌuadilˈifu ˌutakˈaa katˌika ʃˈamba lˈeɲe rutˈuba.|0
matˈunda ja hˈaki jˌatakˈuwa amˈani, mˌatokˈeo ja hˈaki jˌatakˈuwa ˌutulˈivu na mˌatumaˈini milˈele.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌataˈiʃi katˌika makˈao ja mahˈali pa amˈani, katˌika ɲˈumba zilˈizo salˈama, katˌika mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika pasˈipo na ˌusumbˈufu.|0
hˌata kˌama mvˈua ja mˈawe ˌiaŋɡˈuʃe msˈitu na ˈm̩ɟi ˌubomolˈewe kabˈisa.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌutakˌavjobˌarikˈiwa, ˌukipˈanda mbˈeɡu jˈako katˌika kˈila kiɟˈito, na kˌuwaˈatʃa ŋɡˈombe wˈako na pˈunda wˌaɟilˈiʃe kwa uhˈuru.|0
ˈole wˈako wˈewe, ˈee mharˈabu, wˌewe ambˈaje hˌukuhˌaribˈiwa! ˈole wˈako, ˈee msalˈiti, wˌewe ambˈaje hˌukusˌalitˈiwa! ˌutakˌapokwˈiʃa kˌuharˈibu, ˌutahˌaribˈiwa; ˌutakˌapokwˈiʃa kˌusalˈiti, ˌutasˌalitˈiwa.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuturehˈemu, tˌunakˌutamˈani. ˈuwe ŋɡˈuvu jˈetu kˈila ˌasubˈuhi na wokˈovu wˈetu wakˈati wa taˈabu.|0
kwa ŋɡurˈumo ja saˈuti jˈako, mˌataˈifa jˌanakimbˈia; ˌunapˌoinˈuka, mˌataˈifa hˌutawaɲˈika.|0
matˈeka jˈenu, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, jˌamevˈunwa kˌama vˈile wˌafaɲˈavjo mˌadumˈadu, kˌama kˈundi la nzˈiɡe wˈatu hˌuvamˈia ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌametukˈuka, kwa kˌuwa ˌanakˈaa mahˈali pˌalipˌoinˈuka, ˌataiɟˈaza sajˈuni kwa hˈaki na ˌuadilˈifu.|0
ˌatakˈuwa msˈiŋɡi ulˈio imˈara kwa wakˈati wˈenu, ɣˈala za wokˈovu tˈele, hekˈima na mˌaarˈifa; kˈumtʃa bwˈana ni ˌufuŋɡˈuo wa hazˈina hˌii.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia, wˈatu wˌake mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌanapˈiɡa kelˈele kwa ŋɡˈuvu bˌarabarˈani, waɟˈumbe wa amˈani wˌanalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
ɲɟˈia kˈuu zˌimeˈatʃwa, hakˈuna wˌasafˈiri bˌarabarˈani. mkatˈaba ˌumevuɲɟˈika, mˌaʃahˈidi wˌake wˌameðˌaraulˈiwa, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajˌeheʃimˈiwa.|0
ˈarði ˌinaˌombolˈeza na kˌutʃakˈaa, lˌebanˈoni ˌimeˌaibˈika na kˌuɲaˈuka, ʃarˈoni ni kˌama arˈaba, nˈajo baʃˈani na karmˈeli wˌanapˌukutˈiʃa maɟˈani jˈao.|0
sˈasa nˌitainˈuka, asˈema bwˈana. sˈasa nˌitatukˈuzwa; sˈasa nˌitaˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu.|0
mlˌitʃukˈua mˈimba ja makˈapi, mkazˈaa mabˈua, pˈumzi jˈenu ni mˈoto ˌuwatˌeketezˈao.|0
mˌataˈifa jˌatatʃˈomwa kˌama ˌitʃomwˈavjo tʃokˈaa, kˌama vitʃˈaka vja miˈiba vˌilivjokˈatwa ndˈivjo wˌatakˌavjotʃˈomwa.|0
nˈiɲi m̩lˈio mbˈali sˈana, sˌikiˈeni lˈile nˌililofˈaɲa; nˈiɲi m̩lˈio karˈibu, tˌambuˈeni uwˈeza wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌeɲe ðˈambi katˌika sajˈuni wˌametˈiwa hˈofu, kˌutetemˈeka kˌumewakˈumba wˌasiˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu: ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu ˌawezˈaje kuˈiʃi na mˈoto ulˈao? ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu ˌawezˈaje kuˈiʃi na mˈoto ˌunaowˈaka milˈele.|0
jˌeje ˌaendˈaje kwa ˌuadilˈifu na kusˈema lilˈilo hˈaki, jˌeje ˌanajˌekatˈaa faˈida ˌipatˌikanˈajo kwa ðulˈuma na kˌuizuˈia mikˈono jˌake ˌisipokˈee rˈuʃwa, jˌeje ˌazuiˈaje mˌasikˈio jˌake ðˈidi ja mˌaʃaˈuri ja mˌauˈaɟi, na jˌeje ˌafumbˈaje mˈatʃo jˌake jˌasitazˈame sˈana uˈovu.|0
hˈuju n̩dˈije ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi mahˈali pa ɟˈuu, ambˈaje kˌimbilˈio lˈake lˌitakˈuwa ŋɡˈome ja mlimˈani. ˌatapˈewa mkˈate wˈake, na mˈaɟi jˌake hˌajatakˈoma.|0
mˈatʃo jˈenu jˌatamwˈona mfˈalme katˌika uzˈuri wˌake na kˌuiˈona ˈn̩tʃi ˌinajˌoenˈea mbˈali.|0
katˌika mawˈazo jˈenu mtˌaifˌikirˈia hˈofu ˌilijopˈita: jˈuko wˈapi jˈule afˈisa m̩kˈuu? jˈuko wˈapi jˈule ˌalijˌetʃukˈua uʃˈuru? jˈuko wˈapi afˈisa msˌimamˈizi wa minˈara.|0
hˌutawaˈona tˈena wˈale wˈatu wˌeɲe kibˈuri, wˈale wˈatu wˌeɲe usˈemi wa mafˈumbo, wˌeɲe lˈuɣa ŋɡˈeni, ˌisijˌoelewˈeka.|0
mtazˈame sajˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi wa sˌikukˈuu zˈetu; mˈatʃo jˈenu jˌatauˈona jˌerusalˈemu, mahˈali pa amˈani pa kuˈiʃi, hˈema ambˈalo hˌalitˌaondolˈewa, ŋɡˈuzo zˌake hˌazitˌaŋɡolˈewa kˈamwe, wˈala hakˈuna kˈamba jˌake jojˈote ˌitakˌajokatˈika.|0
hˌuko bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˈetu. pˌatakˈuwa kˌama mahˈali pa mˈito mipˈana na viɟˈito. hakˈuna ɟahˈazi lˈeɲe mˌakasˈia lˌitakˌalopˈita hˌuko, wˈala hakˈuna mˈeli jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌitakˌajopˈita hˌuko.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mwamˈuzi wˈetu, bwˈana n̩dˈije m̩tˈoa ʃerˈia wˈetu, bwˈana ni mfˈalme wˈetu, jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌatakˌajetˌuokˈoa.|0
kˈamba zˈenu za mˌerikˈebu zˌimeleɡˈea: mliŋɡˈoti hˌaukˌusimˈama imˈara, nˈalo tˈaŋɡa hˌalikˌukuɲɟulˈiwa. wˈiŋɡi wa matˈeka jˌataɡawˈaɲua, hˌata jˌeje alˈije mlemˈavu ˌatatʃukˈua ɲˈara.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌaiʃˈije sajˈuni ˌatakˌajesˈema, mˌimi ni mɡˈoɲɟua; nˈazo ðˈambi za wˈale wˌaiʃˈio hˈumo zˌitasˌamehˈewa.|0
ɲɟoˈoni karˈibu, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, nˌaɲi msˌikilˈize; sˌikilizˈeni kwa makˈini, ˈeɲi kabˈila za wˈatu! dunˈia na ˌisikˈie, nˈavjo vjˈote vilˈivjo ndˈani jˈake, ˌulimwˈeŋɡu na vjˈote vˌitokˈavjo ndˈani jˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌamejˌakasˌirikˈia mˌataˈifa jˈote; ɣaðˈabu jˌake ni ɟˌuːja maɟˈeʃi jˈao jˈote. ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, ˌatawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌatʃiɲɟˈaɟi.|0
wˌaliˌouˈawa wˌatatˈupwa ɲɟˈe, maˈiti zˈao zˌitatˈoa uvˈundo, milˈima ˌitatˈota kwa dˈamu zˈao.|0
ɲˈota zˈote za mbiŋɡˈuni zˌitajejˈuka na ˈaŋɡa lˌitasokˈotwa kˌama kitˈabu, ɟˈeʃi lˈote la aŋɡˈani lˌitaaŋɡˈuka kˌama maɟˈani jˌalijˌoɲaˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mzabˈibu, kˌama tˈini ˌilijˌoɲaˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mtˈini.|0
upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu ˌumekˈuɲua na kuʃˈiba hˌuko mbiŋɡˈuni, tazˈama, ˌunaʃˈuka katˌika hukˈumu ɟˌuːja edˈomu, wˈale wˈatu ambˈao nˌimeʃˌawahukˈumu, kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa.|0
upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana ˌumeˈoɡa katˌika dˈamu, ˌumefunˈikwa na mafˈuta ja ɲˈama: dˈamu ja kondˈoo na mbˈuzi, mafˈuta kutˈoka fˈiɡo za kondˈoo dˈume. kwa maˈana bwˈana ˈana ðabˈihu hˌuko bˈosra, na matʃˈiɲɟo makˈuu hˌuko edˈomu.|0
ɲˈati wˌataaŋɡˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈao, ndˈama waˈume na mˌafahˈali wakˈubwa. ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌitalowˈana kwa dˈamu, nˈajo mavˈumbi jˌatalˈoa mafˈuta ja ɲˈama.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana anˈajo sˈiku ja kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi, mwˈaka wa malˌipo, sˈiku ja kˌuʃindanˈia ʃaˈuri la sajˈuni.|0
viɟˈito vja edˈomu vˌitaɡeˈuka kˌuwa lˈami, mavˈumbi jˌake jˌatakˈuwa kˌiberˈiti kˌiuŋɡuzˈatʃo, ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ˌitakˈuwa lˈami ˌiwakˈajo.|0
hˌaitˌazimˈiʃwa usˈiku wˈala mtʃˈana, mˈoʃi wˌake ˌutapˈaa ɟˈuu milˈele. kutˈoka kizˈazi hˌadi kizˈazi ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajepˈita hˌuko tˈena.|0
bˈundi wa ɟaŋɡwˈani na bˈundi mwˌeɲe saˈuti ɲembˈamba wˌataˌimilˈiki, bˈundi wakˈubwa na kuŋɡˈuru wˌatawˈeka viˈota hˈumo. mˈuŋɡu ˌataɲoˈoʃa ɟˌuːja edˈomu kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia ja mˌatʃafˈuko matˈupu, na timˈazi ja ukˈiwa.|0
miˈiba ˌitaenˈea katˌika ŋɡˈome za ndˈani, viwˈawi na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma ˌitaˈota kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome zˈake. ˌitakˈuwa maskˈani ja mbwˈeha, makˈao ja bˈundi.|0
viˈumbe vja ɟaŋɡwˈani vˌitakutˈana na fˈisi, nˌao mbˌuzimwˈitu wˌatalˈia wˌakiitˈana; hˌuko viˈumbe vja usˈiku vˌitastarˈehe pˈia na kˌuɟitˌafutˈia mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika.|0
bˈundi wˌatawˈeka viˈota hˌuko na kutˈaɡa majˈai, ˌatajˌaaŋɡˈua na kutˈunza makˈinda jˌake tʃˈini ja uvˈuli wa mabˈawa jˈake; pˈia hˌuko vipˈaŋɡa wˌatakˌusaɲˈika, kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwˈenzi wˈake.|0
ˌaŋɡaliˈeni katˌika ɡˈombo la bwˈana na msˈome: hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa katˌika hˈawa ˌatakˌajekˌosekˈana, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajemkˈosa mwˈenzi wˈake. kwa kˌuwa ni kˈiɲua tʃˈake mˈuŋɡu kˌimeaɡˈiza, na rˈoho wˌake ˌatawˌakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa.|0
hˌuwaɡawˈia sehˈemu zˈao, mkˈono wˌake hˌuwaɡˌawaɲˈia kwa kipˈimo. wˌataˌimilˈiki hˌata milˈele na kuˈiʃi hˈumo kutˈoka kizˈazi hˌadi kizˈazi.|0
ɟˈaŋɡwa na ˈn̩tʃi kˈame vˌitafurˈahi; ɲˈika ˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia na kˌutʃanˈua maˈua. kˌama warˈidi.|0
lˌitatʃanˈua maˈua, lˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia sˈana na kupˈaza saˈuti kwa furˈaha. lˌitapˈewa ˌutukˈufu wa lˌebanˈoni, fahˈari ja karmˈeli na ʃarˈoni; wˌataˈona ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana, fahˈari ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
ˌitiˈeni ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ilˈijo ðaˈifu, jˌafaɲˈeni imˈara maɡˈoti jˌalijˌoleɡˈea.|0
wˌaambiˈeni wˈale wˌeɲe miˈojo ja hˈofu, kuwˈeni hodˈari, msˌioɡˈope; tazˈama, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu ˌatakˈuɟa, pamˈoɟa na malˈipo ja mˈuŋɡu, ˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuwaokˈoa nˈiɲi.|0
ndˈipo mˈatʃo ja vipˈofu jˌatafˌumbulˈiwa na mˌasikˈio ja vizˈiwi jˌatazˌibulˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo kilˈema ˌatarˌukarˈuka kˌama kulˈuŋɡu, nˌao ulˈimi wa alˈije bˈubu ˌutapˈaza saˈuti kwa ʃˈaŋɡwe. mˈaɟi jˌatatˌirirˈika kwa kˈasi katˌika ɲˈika, na viɟˈito katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
mtʃˈaŋɡa wa mˈoto ˌutakˈuwa bwˈawa la mˈaɟi, ˈarði jˌeɲe kˈiu ˌitabˌubuɟˈika tʃemtʃˈemi. maskˈani ja mbwˈeha wˌalikolˈala hˈapo awˈali pˌatamˈea maɟˈani, matˈete na mafˈuɲɟo.|0
nˈako kˌutakˈuwa na ɲɟˈia kˈuu, nˈajo ˌitaˈitwa ɲɟˈia ja ˌutakatˈifu. wasˈio sˈafi hˌawatapˈita ɟˈuu jˈake; ˌitakˈuwa ja wˈale wˌatembeˈao katˌika ɲɟˈia ˈile; jˌeje ˌasafirˈije ɟˈuu jˈake, ˌaɟapokˈuwa mɟˈiŋɡa, hˌatapotˈea.|0
hˌuko hˌakutˌakuwˈepo na sˈimba, wˈala mɲˈama mkˈali hˌatapˈita ɲɟˈia hˈijo, wˈala hˌawatˌapatikˈana hˈumo. ˈila wˌaliˌokombolˈewa tu n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaopˈita hˌuko.|0
wˌaliˌokombolˈewa na bwˈana wˌatarˈudi. wˌataiŋɡˈia sajˈuni wˌakiˈimba; furˈaha ja milˈele ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao. wˌatapˈata furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe; huzˈuni na maɟˈonzi vˌitakimbˈia.|0
ˌeliakˈimu mwˈana wa hilkˈia ˌalijekˈuwa msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, ʃˈebna ˌalijekˈuwa katˈibu, na jˈoa mwˈana wa asˈafu mwandˈiʃi wˌakamwendˈea.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌakawˌaambˈia, mwˌambiˈeni hˌezekˈia,  hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo mfˈalme m̩kˈuu, mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru: ni wˈapi ˌunapowˈeka hˈili tˌumaˈini lˈako.|0
ˌunasˈema m̩nˈajo mˌikakˈati na ŋɡˈuvu za kiɟˈeʃi, lakˈini ˌunasˈema manˈeno matˈupu tˈu. ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌunamtˌeɡemˈea nˈani, hˌata ˌukaniˈasi mˈimi.|0
tazˈama sˈasa, ˌunaˌiteɡemˈea mˈisri, fˈimbo ˈile ja mwˈanzi ˌuliˌopasˈuka, ambˈajo hˌuutʃˈoma na kˌuuɟerˈuhi mkˈono wa ˈm̩tu ˌakiˌieɡemˈea! hˈivjo ndˈivjo alˈivjo farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri, kwa wˈote wˌanaˌomteɡemˈea.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, ɟˈe, nˌimekˈuɟa kˌuʃambulˈia na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi hˌii bˌila bwˈana? bwˈana mweɲˈewe n̩dˈije ˌalinˌiambˈia nˌiiʃˌambulˈie ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza..|0
ndˈipo ˌeliakˈimu, ʃˈebna na jˈoa wˌakamwambˈia jˈule ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, tˌafaðˈali zuŋɡˈumza na wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako kwa lˈuɣa ja kˌiarˈamu, kwa kˌuwa tˌunaˌifahˈamu. ˌusisˈeme nˌasi kwa kˌiebranˈia wˈatu wˌaliˈoko ɟˌuːja ukˈuta wakˈiwa wˌanasikˈia.|0
msˌimsikilˈize hˌezekˈia. hˈili ndˈilo mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌasemˈalo: faɲˈeni amˈani nˌami na ˈm̩ɟe kwˈaŋɡu. kˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatakˈula kutˈoka kwa mzabˈibu wˌake na mtˈini wˌake mweɲˈewe, na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi kutˈoka kisˈima tʃˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˈiko wˈapi miˈuŋɡu ja hamˈaθi na ja arpˈadi? ˈiko wˈapi miˈuŋɡu ja sˌefarvaˈimu? ɟˈe, ˌimeokˈoa sˌamarˈia kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌeliakˈimu mwˈana wa hilkˈia msˌimamˈizi wa ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, ʃˈebna katˈibu, na jˈoa mwˈana wa asˈafu, mwandˈiʃi wˌakamwendˈea hˌezekˈia, ŋɡˈuo zˈao zikˈiwa zˌimerˌarulˈiwa, na kˌumwambˈia jˈale ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi ˌalijˌojasˈema.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo hˌezekˈia: sˈiku hˌii ni sˈiku ja ðˈiki, ja kˌukaripˈiwa na ja aˈibu, kˌama wakˈati watˈoto wˌanapˌofikˈia karˈibu kˌuzalˈiwa na kˈumbe hakˈuna ŋɡˈuvu ja kˌuwazˈaa.|0
jamkˈini bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatajˌasikˈia manˈeno ja ɟˌemadˈari wa ɟˈeʃi, ambˈaje bwˈana wˈake, mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, ˌamemtˈuma kˌumðihˈaki mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai, tˈena kwˌamba ˌatamkemˈea kwa manˈeno ambˈajo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌamejˌasikˈia. kwa hˈijo ˈomba kwa aɟˈili ja mabˈaki ambˈao bˈado wˈako.|0
isˈaja ˌakawˌaambˈia, mwˌambiˈeni bwˈana wˈenu, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌusioɡˈope kwa hˈajo ˌulijˌojasikˈia, jˈale manˈeno ambˈajo wˌatumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru wˌamenˌitukˈana nˈajo.|0
sˌikilˈiza! nˌitatˈia rˈoho fulˈani ndˈani jˌake ˌili kwˌamba ˌatakˌaposikˈia tˌaarˈifa fulˈani, ˌatarˈudi ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe, nˌami hˌuko nˌitafˈaɲa ˌauˈawe kwa upˈaŋɡa..|0
bˌasi sˌenakerˈibu ˌakapˈata tˌaarˈifa kwˌamba tirhˈaka, mkˈuʃi mfˈalme wa mˈisri, ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaˈenda kˌupiɡˈana nˈaje. ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwa hˌezekˈia na nˈeno hˈili.|0
mwˌambiˈeni hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda: ˌusikubˈali hˈujo mˈuŋɡu ˌunajˌemtumˌainˈia ˌakudaŋɡˈaɲe wakˈati ˌanaposˈema, jˌerusalˈemu hˌaitatˈiwa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru..|0
hakˈika ˌumesikˈia jˈale ambˈajo wafˈalme wa aʃˈuru wˌametˈenda kwa ˈn̩tʃi zˈote, wˌakiwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa. ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌutaˌokolˈewa.|0
jˈuko wˈapi mfˈalme wa hamˈaθi, mfˈalme wa arpˈadi, mfˈalme wa ˈm̩ɟi wa sˌefarvaˈimu, ˌau wa hˈena ˌau wa ˈiva.|0
nˌaje hˌezekˈia ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana ˌakisˈema.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌuketˈije ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˈati ja mˌakerˈubi, wˌewe pˈeke jˈako ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu ɟˌuːja fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia. wˌewe ˌumeˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˌameitˈupa miˈuŋɡu jˈao kwˈeɲe mˈoto na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza, kwa kˌuwa hˌaikˈuwa miˈuŋɡu, bˌali mˈiti na mˈawe tˈu, ˌilijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa mikˈono ja wˌanadˈamu.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌuokˈoe kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌili kwˌamba fˈalme zˈote dˌuniˈani zipˈate kuɟˈua kwˌamba wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi ˌakapelˈeka uɟˈumbe kwa hˌezekˈia, ˌakasˈema: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: kwa sabˈabu ˌumeniˈomba kuhˈusu sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamelisˈema ðˈidi jˈake: bikˈira bˈinti sajˈuni ˌanakˌuðarˈau na kˌukuðihˈaki. bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu ˌanatikˈisa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake ˌunapˌokimbˈia.|0
nˌimetʃˈimba visˈima katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za kiɡˈeni na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˈake. kwa ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu nˌimekaˈuʃa viɟˈito vjˈote vja mˈisri..|0
wˈatu wa mˈiɟi hˈijo wˌameiʃˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu, wˌanavuɲɟˈika miˈojo na kˌuaibˈiʃwa. wˌao ni kˌama mimˈea katˌika ʃˈamba, kˌama mˌatʃipukˈizi morˈoro ja kiɟˈani, kˌama maɟˈani jˌatʃipuˈajo ɟˌuːja pˈaa la ɲˈumba, ambˈajo hˌukaˈuka kˈabla ja kukˈua.|0
lakˈini nˌinaɟˈua mahˈali ˌukaˈapo, kutˈoka kwˈako na kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈako, na ɟˈinsi ˌunavjˌoɣaðibˈika ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌunaɣˌaðibˈika na ˌufiðˈuli ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na kwa sabˈabu ˌufiðˈuli wˈako ˌumefˈika mˌasikiˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌitawˈeka ndoˈana jˈaŋɡu puˈani mwˈako na hatˈamu jˈaŋɡu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa urˈudi kwa ɲɟˈia ˈile ˌulijˌoiɟˈia.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara kwˈako, ˈee hˌezekˈia: mwˈaka hˈuu ˌutakˈula kˈile kˌiotˈatʃo tʃeɲˈewe, na mwˈaka wa pˈili ˌutakˈula kutˈoka mˌatʃipukˈizi jˈake. lakˈini katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu pˈanda na uvˈune, pˈanda maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na ˈule matˈunda jˈake.|0
mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena mabˈaki ja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda wˌataenˈeza mizˈizi tʃˈini na kuzˈaa matˈunda ɟˈuu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru: hˌataiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wˈala hˌatapˈiɡa mʃˈale hˈapa. hˌatakˈuɟa mbˈele jˌake na ŋɡˈao wˈala kupˈaŋɡa maɟˈeʃi kˌuuziŋɡˈira.|0
kwa ɲɟˈia ˈile ˌalijˌoiɟˈia n̩dˈijo ˌatakˌajorˈudi; hˌataiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitaulˈinda ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na kˌuuokˈoa, kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, na kwa aɟˈili ja daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi sˌenakerˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru ˌakavˈuɲɟa kˈambi na kˌuondˈoka. ˌakarˈudi ninˈawi na kukˈaa hˌuko.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa, ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiabˈudu katˌika hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˌake nisrˈoki, wanˈawe ˌadramelˈeki na ʃarˈeza wˌakamuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌakakˌimbilˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌararˈati. nˌaje ˈesar hadˈoni mwanˈawe akˈawa mfˈalme badˈala jˈake.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo hˌezekˈia ˌakauɡˈua, nˌaje akˈawa karˈibu kˈufa. nabˈii isˈaja mwˈana wa amˈozi ˌakaˈenda kwˈake na kˌumwambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tˌeŋɡenˈeza mˈambo ja ɲˈumba jˈako, kwa sabˈabu ˌutakˈufa, hˌutapˈona.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia isˈaja, kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie hˌezekˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba jˈako daˈudi: nˌimejˌasikˈia maˈombi jˈako na nˌimeˈona matʃˈozi jˈako. nˌitakˌuoŋɡezˈea miˈaka kˈumi na mitˈano katˌika maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
nˌami nˌitakˌuokˈoa wˌewe pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru. nˌitaulˈinda ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo iʃˈara ja bwˈana kwˈako ja kwˌamba bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa kˈile ˌalitʃˌoahˈidi.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa kivˈuli tʃa ɟˈua kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈazi ˌilijoɟˈeŋɡwa na ahˈazi kirˈudi ɲˈuma mˌadarˈaɟa kˈumi.  hˈivjo ɟˈua lˌikarˈudi ɲˈuma mˌadarˈaɟa kˈumi ambˈajo lˌilikˈuwa lˌimeʃˈuka.|0
mˌaandˈiko ja hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda baˌada ja kˌuuɡˈua kwˈake na kupˈona.|0
nˌilisˈema, katˌika ustˈawi wa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, ɟˈe, ni lazˈima nipˈite katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja maˈuti, na kˌupokˈoɲua miˈaka jˈaŋɡu ˌilijobˈaki.|0
nˌilisˈema, sˌitamwˈona tˈena bwˈana, bwˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai, wˈala sˌitamtazˈama tˈena mwˌanadˈamu, wˈala kˌuwa na wˈale ambˈao sˈasa wˌanakˈaa katˌika ˌulimwˈeŋɡu hˈuu.|0
kˌama hˈema la mtʃˈuŋɡa mifˈuɡo, ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ˌimebˌomolˈewa na kˌutwalˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu. kˌama mfumˈaɟi nˌimevˌiŋɡirˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌamenˌikatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka kitˈanda tʃa mfˈumi. mtʃˈana na usˈiku ˌulijˌakomˈeʃa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌililˈia kˌama mbˌajuwˈaju ˌau korˈoŋɡo, nˌiliˌombolˈeza kˌama hˈua ˌaombˌolezˈaje. mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌalififˈia nˌilipˌotazˈama mbiŋɡˈuni. ˈee bwˈana, nˌinatˌaabˈika, ɲɟˈoo ˌunisˌaidˈie.|0
lakˈini nisˈeme nˈini? ˌamesˈema nˈami, nˌaje jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌamelitˈenda hˈili. nˌitatembˈea kwa ˌuɲeɲekˈevu katˌika miˈaka jˈaŋɡu jˈote kwa sabˈabu ja hˈaja mˌaumˈivu makˈali ja nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana, kwa mˈambo kˌama hˈaja wˈatu huˈiʃi, nˈajo rˈoho jˈaŋɡu hupˈata uzˈima katˌika hˈajo pˈia. ˌulinipˈoɲa na kˌuniˈatʃa niˈiʃi.|0
hakˈika ˌilikˈuwa ja faˈida jˈaŋɡu n̩dˈijo maˈana nˌikapˈata mˌaumˈivu makˈali. katˌika upˈendo wˈako ˌukanˌiokˈoa kutˈoka ʃˈimo la ˌuharibˈifu; ˌumeziwˈeka ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu zˈote ɲˈuma jˈako.|0
kwa maˈana kabˈuri hˌaliwˈezi kˌukusˈifu, maˈuti hˌaiwˈezi kuˈimba sˈifa zˈako; wˈale wˌaʃukˈao tʃˈini ʃimˈoni hˌawawˈezi kˌuutˌaraɟˈia ˌuaminˈifu wˈako.|0
walˈio hˈai, walˈio hˈai: hˈao wˌanakusˈifu, kˌama nˌinavjofˈaɲa lˈeo. bˈaba hˌuwaambˈia watˈoto wˌao habˈari za ˌuaminˈifu wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌatanˌiokˈoa, nˌasi tˌutaˈimba kwa vjˈombo vja ɲˈuzi sˈiku zˈote za maˈiʃa jˈetu katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
wakˈati hˈuo mˌerodˈaki bˌaladˈani, mwˈana wa bˌaladˈani mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌakamtumˈia hˌezekˈia barˈua na zawˈadi, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesikˈia habˈari za kˌuuɡˈua na kupˈona kwˈake.|0
ndˈipo nabˈii isˈaja ˌakaˈenda kwa mfˈalme hˌezekˈia na kˌumuulˈiza, wˈatu hˈao wˌalisˈema nˈini, na wˌametˈoka wˈapi? hˌezekˈia ˌakamɟˈibu, wˌametˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali. wˌalikˈuɟa kwˈaŋɡu kutˈoka babˈeli.|0
nabˈii ˌakaulˈiza, wˌaliˈona nˈini katˌika ɟˈumba lˈako la kifˈalme? hˌezekˈia ˌakaɟˈibu, wˌaliˈona kˈila kˈitu katˌika ɟˈumba lˈaŋɡu la kifˈalme. hakˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote katˌika hazˈina jˈaŋɡu ambˈatʃo sˌikuwˌaoɲˈeʃa.|0
hakˈika wakˈati ˌunakˈuɟa ambˈapo vˈitu vjˈote katˌika ɟˈumba lˈako la kifˈalme, na vjˈote ambˈavjo bˈaba zˈako wˌaliwˈeka akˈiba mpˈaka sˈiku hˌii, vˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa kwˈenda babˈeli. hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃosalˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˌafariɟˈini, wˌafariɟˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
sˈema na jˌerusalˈemu kwa upˈole, ˌumtaŋɡazˈie kwˌamba kˈazi jˌake ŋɡˈumu ˌimekˌamilˈika, kwˌamba ðˈambi jˌake ˌimefaɲˈiwa fidˈia, kwˌamba ˌamepokˈea kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana mˌaradˈufu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˌake zˈote.|0
saˈuti ja ˈm̩tu ˌaliˈaje: ˌiteŋɡˌenezˈeni ɟaŋɡwˈani ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana, ɲˌooʃˈeni ɲɟˈia kˈuu ɲikˈani kwa aɟˈili ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌutafˌunulˈiwa, nˌao wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌatauˈona pamˈoɟa. kwa maˈana kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana kˌimenˈena.|0
saˈuti husˈema, pˈiɡa kelˈele. nˌami nˌikasˈema, nipˈiɡe kelˈele ɡˈani? wˌanadˈamu wˈote ni kˌama maɟˈani, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wˌao wˈote ni kˌama maˈua ja kondˈeni.|0
maɟˈani hˌuɲaˈuka na maˈua hˌuaŋɡˈuka, kwa sabˈabu pˈumzi ja bwˈana hˌujapulˈiza. hakˈika wˌanadˈamu ni maɟˈani.|0
maɟˈani hˌuɲaˈuka na maˈua hˌuaŋɡˈuka, lakˈini nˈeno la mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ladˈumu milˈele.|0
wˌewe ˌuletˈaje habˈari ɲɟˈema sajˈuni, pˈanda ɟˌuːja mlˈima mrˈefu. wˌewe ˌuletˈaje habˈari ɲɟˈema jˌerusalˈemu, inˈua saˈuti jˈako kwa kupˈiɡa kelˈele, inˈua saˈuti, ˌusioɡˈope; ˌiambˈie mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, jˈuko hˈapa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
tˌazamˈeni, bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌanakˈuɟa na ŋɡˈuvu, nˌao mkˈono wˌake n̩dˈio ˌutawalˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈake. tˌazamˈeni, uɟˈira wˌake u pamˈoɟa nˈaje, nˈajo malˈipo jˌake jˌanafˌuatˈana nˈaje.|0
hutʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈake kˌama mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa mifˈuɡo: hˌukusˈaɲa wˌanakondˈoo katˌika mikˈono jˌake na kˌuwatʃukˈua karˈibu na mˈojo wˈake, hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza tˌaratˈibu wˈale wˌaɲoɲeʃˈao.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijepˈima mˈaɟi ja bahˈari kwˈeɲe kˈonzi ja mkˈono wˈake, ˌau kˌuzipˈima mbˈiŋɡu kwa ʃibˈiri jˈake? ni nˈani ˌalijˌejaʃˈika mavˈumbi ja dunˈia katˌika kikˈapu, ˌau kupˈima milˈima kwˈeɲe kˌipimˈio na vilˈima kwˈeɲe mizˈani.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌejafahˈamu mawˈazo ja bwˈana, ˌau kˌumfundˈiʃa akˈiwa kˌama mʃaˈuri wˈake.|0
ni nˈani ambˈaje bwˈana ˌametˈaka ʃaˈuri kwˈake ˌili kˌumwelimˈiʃa, nˌaje ni nˈani ˌalijˌemfundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia ilˈijo sˈawa? ni nˈani ˌalijˌemfundˈiʃa mˌaarˈifa ˌau kˌumwoɲˈeʃa mapˈito ja ˌufahˈamu.|0
hakˈika mˌataˈifa ni kˌama tˈone ndˈani ja n̩dˈoo, ni kˌama vˈumbi ɟembˈamba ɟˌuːja mizˈani, hˌuvipˈima visˈiwa kˈana kwˌamba vˌilikˈuwa vˈumbi laˈini.|0
lˌebanˈoni hˌautˈoʃi kwa mˈoto wa mˌaðabahˈuni, wˈala waɲˈama wˌake hˌawatˈoʃi kwa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
mbˈele jˌake mˌataˈifa jˈote ni kˌama si kˈitu, jˌanaˌonekˈana jasˈio na θamˈani na zaˈidi ja bˈure kabˈisa.|0
bˈasi, ˌutamlˌiŋɡanˈiʃa mˈuŋɡu na nˈani? ˌutamlˌiŋɡanˈiʃa na kˈitu ɡˈani.|0
kwa habˈari ja sanˈamu, fˈundi hˌuisˈubu, nˌaje m̩fˈua ðahˈabu hˌuifunˈika kwa ðahˈabu na kˌuitˌeŋɡenezˈea mikˈufu ja fˈeða.|0
ˈm̩tu alˈije maskˈini sˈana ˌasijewˈeza kulˈeta sadˈaka kˌama hˌii hˌuutʃaɡˈua ˈm̩ti ˌusioˈoza. hˌumtafˈuta fˈundi stˈadi wa kˌusimamˈiʃa sanˈamu ambˈajo hˌaitˌatikisˈika.|0
ɟˈe, huɟˈui? ɟˈe, hˌuɟasikˈia? ɟˈe, hˌuɟaambˈiwa ʃˈu mwˈanzo? ɟˈe, hˌuɟafahˈamu ʃˈu kuˈumbwa kwa dunˈia.|0
ˌanakˈaa kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi ɟˌuːja duˈara ja dunˈia, nˌao wˈatu wˌakaˈao ndˈani jˌake ni kˌama pˈanzi. hˌuzitandˈaza mbˈiŋɡu kˌama tʃˌandarˈua, na kˌuzitandˈaza kˌama hˈema la kuˈiʃi.|0
hˌuwafˈaɲa wakˈuu kˌuwa si kˈitu, na kˌuwaʃˈuʃa wˌatawˈala wa dunˈia hˌii kˌuwa kˈitu bˈure.|0
mˈara baˌada ja kupˈandwa, mˈara baˌada ja kutˈiwa arðˈini, mˈara baˌada ja kutˈoa mizˈizi jˈao arðˈini, ndˈipo hˌuwapˌulizˈia nˌao wˌakaɲaˈuka, nˌao upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli hˌuwapˌeperˈuʃa kˌama makˈapi.|0
ˌutanˌiliŋɡanˈiʃa mˌimi na nˈani? ˌau ni nˈani ˌanajˌeliŋɡˈana nˈami? asˈema jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ˌinuˈeni mˈatʃo jˈenu mtazˈame mbiŋɡˈuni: ni nˈani ˌalijeˈumba hˈivi vjˈote? ni jˌeje ˌaletˈaje ɲɟˈe ɟˈeʃi la ɲˈota mˈoɟa baˌada ja ɲiŋɡˈine na kˌuziˈita kˈila mˈoɟa kwa ɟˈina lˈake. kwa sabˈabu ja uwˈeza wˌake m̩kˈuu na ŋɡˈuvu zˌake kˈuu, hakˈuna hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo ˌinajˌokosekˈana.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunasˈema, ˈee jakˈobo, nˌaɲi ˈee ˌisraˈeli, kˌulalamˈika, ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu ˌimefˈitʃwa bwˈana ˌasiiˈone, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu haɟˈali ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe wˈewe, hˌufahˈamu? ɟˈe wˈewe, hˌuɟasikˈia? bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wa milˈele, muˈumba wa miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. hˌatatʃˈoka wˈala kˌuleɡˈea, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌawezˈaje kˌuupˈima ˌufahˈamu wˈake.|0
huwˈapa ŋɡˈuvu wˌaliˌoleɡˈea na hˌuoŋɡˈeza ŋɡˈuvu za wˌaðaˈifu.|0
hˌata viɟˈana hutʃˈoka na kˌuleɡˈea, nˌao viɟˈana wˌanaˈume hˌuɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka.|0
bˌali wˈale wˌamtumˌainˈio bwˈana ˌatafˈaɲa ˈupja ŋɡˈuvu zˈao. wˌatapˈaa ɟˈuu kwa mbˈawa kˌama tˈai; wˌatapˈiɡa m̩bˈio wˈala hˌawatatʃˈoka, wˌatatembˈea kwa miɡˈuu wˈala hˌawatˌazimˈia.|0
ɲˌamazˈeni kˈimja mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, ˈeɲi visˈiwa! mˌataˈifa na wafˈaɲe ˈupja ŋɡˈuvu zˈao! wˌao na wˌaɟitokˈeze, kˈiʃa wasˈeme, tˌukutˈane pamˈoɟa mahˈali pa hukˈumu.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌemtʃotʃˈea mmˈoɟa kutˈoka mˌaʃarˈiki, ˌakimwˈita katˌika hˈaki kwa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈake? hˌujatˈia mˌataˈifa mˌikonˈoni mwˈake, na kˌuwatiˈiʃa wafˈalme mbˈele zˈake. hˌuwafˈaɲa kˌuwa mavˈumbi kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈake, hˌuwafˈaɲa makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo na upˈepo kwa upˈinde wˈake.|0
hˌuwafˌuatˈia na kˌuendelˈea salˈama, katˌika ɲɟˈia ambˈajo miɡˈuu jˌake hˌaiɟawˈahi kupˈita.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili na kˌulitˌimilˈiza, ˌakiˈita vizˈazi ʃˈu mwˈanzo? mˈimi, bwˈana, ni wa kwˈanza nˌami nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa na wa mwˈiʃo: mˌimi bwˈana n̩dˈije.|0
visˈiwa vˌimeliˈona na kˌuoɡˈopa, miˈiʃo ja dunˈia ˌinatˌetemˈeka. wˌanakˌaribˈia na kˈuɟa mbˈele.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa hˌumsaidˈia mwiŋɡˈine na kusˈema kwa ndˈuɡu jˈake, ˈuwe hodˈari.|0
fˈundi humtˈia mˈojo sonˈara, jˌeje ˌalaˌiniʃˈaje kwa ɲˈundo hˌumhimˈiza jˌeje ˌaɡoŋɡeˈaje kwˈeɲe fuˈawe, hˌumwambˈia jˌeje ˌauŋɡˌaniʃˈaje, ni kˈazi ɲɟˈema. nˌaje hˌuikˈaza sanˈamu kwa mˌisumˈari ˌili ˌisitˌikisˈike.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, jakˈobo, nˌilijˌemtʃaɡˈua, nˈiɲi wazˈao wa ˌabrahˈamu rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilikˌutʃukˈua tˌoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, nˌilikuˈita kutˈoka pˈembe zˌake za mbˈali. nˌilisˈema, wˌewe ni mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu; nˌimekˌutʃaɡˈua, wˈala sˌikukˌukatˈaa.|0
hˈivjo ˌusioɡˈope, kwa maˈana nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe; ˌusifˌaðaˈike, kwa maˈana mˌimi ni mˈuŋɡu wˈako. nˌitakutˈia ŋɡˈuvu na kˌukusˌaidˈia; nˌitakˌuteɡemˈeza kwa mkˈono wa kuˈume wa hˈaki jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈote wˌalioˈona hasˈira ðˈidi jˈako hakˈika wˌataˌaibˈika na kˌutahˌajarˈika, wˈale wˌakupiŋɡˈao wˌatakˈuwa kˌama vˈile si kˈitu, na kˌuaŋɡamˈia.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌutawˌatafˈuta adˈui zˈako, hˌutawaˈona. wˈale wˌanaˌopiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi jˈako wˌatakˈuwa kˌama vˈile si kˈitu kabˈisa.|0
kwa maˈana mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, nˌikuʃikˈaje mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume na kˌukuambˈia, usˈiwe na hˈofu, nˌitakˌusaidˈia.|0
ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee jakˈobo ulˈije mdˈudu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli ulˈije mdˈoɡo, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakˌusaidˈia, asˈema bwˈana, mkombˈozi wˈako, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
tazˈama, nˌitakufˈaɲa tʃˈombo tʃa kˌupurˈia, kˈipja na tʃˌeɲe makˈali, tʃˌeɲe mˈeno mˈeŋɡi. ˌutaipˈura milˈima na kˌuipˈonda na kˌuvifˈaɲa vilˈima kˌuwa kˌama makˈapi.|0
ˌutaˌipepˈeta, nˌao upˈepo ˌutaˌitʃukˈua, ðorˈuba ˌitaˌipepˌeruʃˈia mbˈali. bˌali wˌewe ˌutaɟˌifurahˈiʃa katˌika bwˈana na katˌika ˌutukˈufu wa jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi wˌanatafˈuta mˈaɟi, lakˈini hajˈapo, ndˈimi zˈao zˌimekaˈuka kwa kˈiu. lakˈini mˌimi bwˈana nˌitawaɟˈibu, mˈimi, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, sˌitawaˈatʃa.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa mˈito ˌitirirˈike ɟˌuːja vilˈima vilˈivjo kˈame, nˈazo tʃemtʃˈemi ndˈani ja mabˈonde. nˌitalˌiɡeˈuza ɟˈaŋɡwa lˈiwe mabwˈawa ja mˈaɟi, nˈajo ˈarði ˌilijˌokaˈuka kˌuwa tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi.|0
katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa nˌitaotˈeʃa mwerˈezi, mʃˈita, mhadˈasi na mzˌeitˈuni. nˌitawˈeka mˌisunobˈari, mivˈiɲɟe na mˌisandˈuku pamˈoɟa hˌuko ɲikˈani.|0
ˌili kwˌamba wˈatu wapˈate kuˈona na kuɟˈua, wapˈate kˌufikˈiri na kˌuelˈewa, kwˌamba mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌumetˈenda hˈili, kwˌamba jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli n̩dˈije ˌalilifˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana asˈema, lˈeta ʃaˈuri lˈako. tˈoa hˈoɟa jˈako, asˈema mfˈalme wa jakˈobo.|0
letˈeni sanˈamu zˈenu zˌituambˈie ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea. tˌuambiˈeni mˈambo ja zamˈani jˌalikˈuwa nˈini, ˌili tupˈate kˌujatˌafakˈari na kuɟˈua mˌatokˈeo jˌake ja mwˈiʃo. ˌau tˌutaŋɡˌaziˈeni mˈambo jˌatakˌajokˈuɟa.|0
tˌuambiˈeni ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea bˌaadˈaje, ˌili tupˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa nˈiɲi ni miˈuŋɡu. faɲˈeni ɟˈambo lolˈote zˈuri ˌau bˈaja, ˌili tupˈate kˌutiʃˈika na kuɟˈazwa na hˈofu.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi ni zaˈidi ja bˈure kabˈisa, na kˈazi zˈenu hˌazifˈai kˈitu kabˈisa; jˌeje ˌawatʃˌaɡuˈaje ni tʃukˈizo sˈana.|0
nˌimemtʃotʃˈea ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini, nˌaje juˈaɟa, mmˈoɟa tˌoka mawˈio ja ɟˈua ˌaliitˈaje ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. hˌuwakaɲˈaɡa wˌatawˈala kˈana kwˌamba ni matˈope, kˌama mfiɲˈanzi ˌakaɲaɡˈavjo udˈoŋɡo wa kˌufiɲaŋɡˈia.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijenˈena hˈili tokˈea mwanzˈoni, ˌili tupˈate kuɟˈua, ˌau kˈabla, ˌili tuwˈeze kusˈema, ˌalikˈuwa sˈawa? hakˈuna ˌalijenˈena hˈili, hakˈuna ˌalijˌetaŋɡulˈia kusˈema hˈili, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌesikˈia manˈeno kutˈoka kwˈenu.|0
nˌilikˈuwa wa kwˈanza kˌumwambˈia sajˈuni, tazˈama, wˈako hˈapa! nilˈimpa jˌerusalˈemu mɟˈumbe wa habˈari ɲɟˈema.|0
nˌinatazˈama, lakˈini hakˈuna jejˈote: hakˈuna jejˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌawezˈaje kutˈoa ʃaˈuri, hakˈuna jejˈote wa kutˈoa ɟˈibu wakˈati nˌinapˌowaulˈiza.|0
tazˈama, wˈote ni ˌubatˈili! matˈendo jˈao ni bˈure; viɲˈaɡo vjˈao ni upˈepo mtˈupu na mˌatʃafˈuko.|0
hˈuju hˈapa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, nˌinajˌemteɡemˈeza, mteˈule wˈaŋɡu, ambˈaje nˌinapendˈezwa nˈaje; nˌitawˈeka rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈake, nˌaje ˌatalˈeta hˈaki kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
hˌatapˈaza saˈuti wˈala kupˈiɡa kelˈele, wˈala hˌataˌiinˈua saˈuti jˌake bˌarabarˈani.|0
mwˈanzi ˌuliˌopondˈeka hˌatauvˈuɲɟa, na utˈambi ˌunaofˈuka mˈoʃi hˌatauzˈima. kwa ˌuaminˈifu ˌatalˈeta hˈaki.|0
hˌatazimˈia rˈoho wˈala kukˈata tamˈaa, mpˈaka ˌatakˌaposˌimamˈiʃa hˈaki ɟˌuːja dunˈia. visˈiwa vˌitawˈeka tˌumaˈini lˈao katˌika ʃerˈia jˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo mˈuŋɡu, bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijˌeziˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na kˌuzitˈanda, ˌalijˌeitandˈaza dunˈia na vjˈote vˌitokˈavjo hˈumo, ˌawapˈaje wˈatu wˌake pˈumzi, na uzˈima kwa wˈale wˌaendˈao hˈumo.|0
mˈimi, bwˈana, nˌimekuˈita katˌika hˈaki; nˌitakuʃˈika mkˈono wˈako. nˌitakulˈinda na kˌukufˈaɲa kˌuwa aɡˈano kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu na nˈuru kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
kˌuwafuŋɡˈua mˈatʃo wˈale wˌasioˈona, kˌuwaˈatʃa hˈuru kutˈoka kˌifuŋɡˈoni wˌaliofˈuŋɡwa ɟˈela, na kˌuwafuŋɡˈua kutˈoka ɡˌerezˈani wˈale wˌanaokˈaa ɡizˈani.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana; hˌilo ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu! sitˈampa mwiŋɡˈine ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu wˈala sanˈamu sˈifa zˈaŋɡu.|0
tazˈama, mˈambo ja kwˈanza jˌametokˈea, nˌami nˌataŋɡˈaza mˈambo mˈapja; kˈabla hˌajaɟˌatokˈea nˌawatˌaŋɡazˈia habˈari zˈake.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana wˈimbo ˈm̩pja, sˈifa zˌake tˌoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, nˈiɲi mʃukˈao tʃˈini bˌaharˈini, na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake, ˈeɲi visˈiwa na wˈote wˌakaˈao ndˈani jˈake.|0
ɟˈaŋɡwa na mˈiɟi jˌake na vipˈaze saˈuti zˈao; makˈao ˌanamoˈiʃi kedˈari na jˌaʃaŋɡilˈie. wˈatu wa sˈela waˈimbe kwa furˈaha, na wapˈiɡe kelˈele kutˈoka vilˈele vja milˈima.|0
wˈampe bwˈana ˌutukˈufu, na kˌutaŋɡˈaza sˈifa zˌake katˌika visˈiwa.|0
bwˈana ˌataˈenda kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, kˌama ʃuɟˈaa ˌatatʃotʃˈea ʃaˈuku jˈake, kwa kelˈele ˌataˈamʃa kilˈio tʃa vˈita, nˌaje ˌataʃˈinda adˈui zˈake.|0
kwa mˈuda mrˈefu nˌimeɲamˈaza kˈimja, nˌimekˈaa kˈimja na kˌuɟizuˈia. lakˈini sˈasa, kˌama mwanˈamke wakˈati wa kˌuɟifuŋɡˈua, nˌinapˈiɡa kelˈele, nˌinatwˈeta na kuʃˈuʃa pˈumzi.|0
nˌitaharˈibu milˈima na vilˈima na kˌukaˈuʃa mimˈea jˈako jˈote; nˌitafˈaɲa mˈito kˌuwa visˈiwa na kˌukaˈuʃa mabwˈawa.|0
nˌitawˌaoŋɡˈoza vipˈofu kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ambˈajo hˌawaɟˌaiɟˈua, kwˈeɲe mapˈito wˌasijˌojazoˈea nˌitawˌaoŋɡˈoza; nˌitafˈaɲa ɡˈiza kˌuwa nˈuru mbˈele jˈao, na kufˈaɲa mahˈali pˌalipˌoparˈuza kˌuwa laˈini. hˈaja n̩dˈijo mˈambo nˌitakˌajofˈaɲa; mˌimi sˌitawaˈatʃa.|0
lakˈini wˈale wˌanaˌotumaˈini sanˈamu, wˌanaˌoviambˈia viɲˈaɡo, nˈiɲi n̩dˈio miˈuŋɡu jˈetu, wˌatarudˈiʃwa ɲˈuma kwa aˈibu kˈubwa.|0
sˌikiˈeni, ˈeɲi vizˈiwi; tˌazamˈeni, ˈeɲi vipˈofu, mpˈate kuˈona.|0
ni nˈani alˈije kipˈofu ˌisipokˈuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, na kizˈiwi kˌama mɟˈumbe nˌinajemtˈuma? ni nˈani alˈije kipˈofu kˌama jˌeje ˌalijˌeɟitˈoa kwˈaŋɡu, alˈije kipˈofu kˌama mtumˈiʃi wa bwˈana.|0
mmeˈona vˈitu vˈiŋɡi, lakˈini hˌamkuzˌiŋɡatˈia; mˌasikˈio jˈenu jˈako wˈazi, lakˈini hˌamsikˈii tʃotʃˈote.|0
ˌilimpendˈeza bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja hˈaki jˌake kufˈaɲa ʃerˈia jˌake kˌuwa kˈuu na tukˈufu.|0
lakˈini hˈili ni taˈifa lˌililoˈibwa na kutˈekwa ɲˈara, wˈote wˌamenˈaswa katˌika maʃˈimo, ˌau wˌamefˈitʃwa katˌika mˌaɡerˈeza. wˌamekˈuwa ɲˈara, wˈala hapˈana jejˈote ˌawaˌokoˈaje. wˌamefˈaɲua matˈeka, wˈala hapˈana jejˈote ˌasemˈaje, wˌarudˈiʃe.|0
ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌatakˌajesˌikilˈiza hˈili, ˌau ˌatakˌajezˌiŋɡatˈia kwa makˈini katˌika wakˈati uɟˈao.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijemtˈoa jakˈobo kˌuwa matˈeka, na ˌisraˈeli kwa watˈeka ɲˈara? ɟˈe, hakˈuwa jˈeje, bwˈana, ambˈaje tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈake? kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia zˈake, hˌawakutˈii ʃerˈia zˈake.|0
hˈivjo ˌakawˌamwaɡˈia hasˈira jˌake ˌinajowˈaka, ukˈali wa vˈita. ˌiliwˌazuŋɡˈuka kwa miˈali ja mˈoto, lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo hˌawakˌuelˈewa; ˌiliwˌateketˈeza, lakˈini hˌawakˌujatˈia mojˈoni.|0
lakˈini sˈasa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijˌekuˈumba, ˈee jakˈobo, jˌeje ˌalijˌekuhulˈuku, ˈee ˌisraˈeli: ˌusioɡˈope kwa maˈana nˌimekˌukombˈoa, nˌimekuˈita wˌewe kwa ɟˈina lˈako, wˌewe u wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌunapopˈita kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈuu, nˌitakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe, ˌunapopˈita katˌika mˈito ja mˈaɟi, hˌajatˌakuɣˌarikˈiʃa. ˌutakˌapopˈita katˌika mˈoto, hˌutauŋɡˈua, miˈali ja mˈoto hˌaitˌakuuŋɡˈuza.|0
kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, mwokˈozi wˈako. nˌinaitˈoa mˈisri kˌuwa fidˈia jˈako, kˈuʃi na sˈeba badˈala jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni wa θamˈani na wa kˌuheʃimˈiwa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, nˌami kwa kˌuwa nˌinakupˈenda, nˌitatˈoa wˈatu badˈala jˈako na mˌataˈifa badˈala ja maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
ˌusioɡˈope, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi nˈipo pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌitawalˈeta watˈoto wˈako kutˈoka mˌaʃarˈiki, na kˌukukusˈaɲa kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
nˌitaˌiambˈia kˌaskazˈini, watˈoe! nˈajo kusˈini, ˌusiwˌazuˈie. walˈete wˈana wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mbˈali, na bˈinti zˈaŋɡu kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ˌameˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, nˌilijˌemuˈumba kwa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu, nˌilijˌemhulˈuku na kumfˈaɲa.|0
ˌuwaoŋɡˈoze wˈale wˌeɲe mˈatʃo lakˈini hˌawaˈoni, wˌeɲe mˌasikˈio lakˈini hˌawasikˈii.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanakˌutanˈika pamˈoɟa, na mˌakabˈila jˌanakˌusaɲˈika. ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌalijˌetaŋɡulˈia kˌutuambˈia hˈaja, na kˌututˌaŋɡazˈia mˈambo jˌalijopˈita? walˈete mˌaʃahˈidi wˌao ˌili kˌuwaθˌibitˈiʃa kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa sahˈihi, ˌili weŋɡˈine wawˈeze kˌusikˈia, wasˈeme, ni kwˈeli.|0
nˈiɲi ni mˌaʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, na mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌilijˌemtʃaɡˈua, ˌili mpˈate kˌuniɟˈua na kˌuniamˈini, na kˌutambˈua kwˌamba mˌimi n̩dˈije. kˈabla jˈaŋɡu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌefaɲˈizwa, wˈala hˌatakuwˈepo mwiŋɡˈine baˌada jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈimi, nˈaam mˈimi, ndˈimi bwˈana, zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu hakˈuna mwokˈozi.|0
nˌimeðˌihirˈiʃa, kˌuokˈoa na kˌutaŋɡˈaza: mˈimi, wˈala si mˈuŋɡu mɡˈeni kˌatikˈati jˈenu. nˈiɲi ni mˌaʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu.|0
nˈaam, ʃˈu sˈiku za kˈale, mˌimi n̩dˈije. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌawezˈaje kˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mkonˈoni wˈaŋɡu. mˌimi nˌinapotˈenda, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌutaŋɡˈua.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo, mkombˈozi wˈako, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli: kwa aɟˈili jˈenu nˌitatumˈana babˈeli na kˌuwalˈeta wˌakaldˈajo wˈote kˌama wˌakimbˈizi, katˌika mˈeli wˌalizˌozionˈea fahˈari.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wˈako, muˈumba wa ˌisraˈeli, mfˈalme wˈako.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijefˈaɲa ɲɟˈia bˌaharˈini, mahˈali pa kupˈita kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi.|0
ˌalijˌejakokˈota maɡˈari ja vˈita na farˈasi, ɟˈeʃi pamˈoɟa na askˈari wa msaˈada, nˌao wˌakalˈala hˌuko, wˈala hˌawatˌainˈuka tˈena kˈamwe, wˌakakomˈeʃwa, na wˌakazimˈika kˌama utˈambi.|0
msˌijakumbˈuke mˈambo jˌalijopˈita, wˈala msˌijatˌafakˈari mˈambo ja zamˈani.|0
tazˈama, nˌitafˈaɲa ɟˈambo ɟˈipja! sˈasa lˌitatʃipˈuka, ɟˈe, hˌamtalˌitambˈua? nˌitafˈaɲa ɲɟˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani na viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame.|0
waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni wˌatanˌiheʃˈimu, mbwˈeha na bˈundi, kwa sabˈabu nˌinawˌapatˈia mˈaɟi ɟaŋɡwˈani, na viɟˈito katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame, ˌili kuwˈapa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mˈaɟi, wˈale nˌiliˌowatʃaɡˈua.|0
wˈatu wˈale nˌiliˌowaˈumba kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, ˌili wapˈate kˌutaŋɡˈaza sˈifa zˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo hˌukuniˈita mˈimi, ˈee jakˈobo, hˌuɟaɟˌitaabˈiʃa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˌuɟanˌiletˈea kondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, wˈala kˌuniheʃˈimu kwa ðabˈihu zˈako. sˌikukˌulemˈea kwa sadˈaka za nafˈaka wˈala kˌukutʃˈoʃa kwa kˌuhitˈaɟi uvˈumba.|0
hˌukunˌinunulˈia uvˈumba wowˈote wˌeɲe mˌanukˈato, wˈala hˌukunˈipa kwa ˌukarˈimu mafˈuta ja waɲˈama wa ðabˈihu zˈako. lakˈini ˌumenˌilemˈea kwa ðˈambi zˈako, na kˌunitˌaabˈiʃa kwa makˈosa jˈako.|0
mˈimi, nˈaam mˈimi, ndˈimi nˌizifutˈaje ðˈambi zˈako, kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, wˈala sˌizikumbˈuki ðˈambi zˈako tˈena.|0
tˌafakˈari mˈambo jˌalijopˈita, ɲɟˈoo na tˌuhoɟiˈane, lˈeta ʃaˈuri lˈako uwˈeze kupˈewa hˈaki jˈako.|0
bˈaba jˈako wa kwˈanza ˌalitˈenda ðˈambi, wˌasemˈaɟi wˈako wˌameˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawˌaaibˈiʃa wakˈuu wa hekˈalu lˈako, nˌami nˌitamtˈoa jakˈobo ˌaaŋɡamˈizwe, na ˌisraˈeli ˌaðihakˈiwe.|0
lakˈini sˈasa sˌikilˈiza, ˈee jakˈobo, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌisraˈeli, nˌilijˌemtʃaɡˈua.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijˌekuhulˈuku, ˌalijˌekuˈumba tumbˈoni, jˌeje ˌatakˌajekˌusaidˈia: ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee jakˈobo, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, jˌeʃurˈuni, nˌilijˌekutʃaɡˈua.|0
kwa maˈana nˌitamimˈina mˈaɟi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe kˈiu, na viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi ɟˌuːja ˈarði ˌilijˌokaˈuka; nˌitamimˈina rˈoho wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja watˈoto wˈako, nˈajo barˈaka jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja wazˈao wˈako.|0
nˌao wˌatatʃipˈua kˌama maɲˈasi katˌika ʃˈamba la maɟˈani, kˌama mˌierˈezi kˈando ja viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi jˌatirˌirikˈajo.|0
mmˈoɟa ˌatasˈema, mˌimi ni wa bwˈana; mwiŋɡˈine ˌataɟiˈita kwa ɟˈina la jakˈobo; vˌilevˈile mwiŋɡˈine ˌataandˈika ɟˌuːja mkˈono wˈake, wa bwˈana, na kˌuɟiˈita kwa ɟˈina la ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli na mkombˈozi, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: mˌimi ni wa kwˈanza na mˌimi ni wa mwˈiʃo; zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu.|0
ni nˈani bˌasi alˈije kˌama mˈimi? jˌeje na ˌataŋɡˈaze. jˌeje ˌataŋɡˈaze na kuwˈeka mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ni kˈitu ɡˈani kˌilitʃˌotokˈea ʃˈu nˌilipoˈumba wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wa kˈale, tˈena ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea: nˈaam, jˌeje na atˈoe ˌunabˈii ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃokˈuɟa.|0
msˌitetemˈeke, msˌioɡˈope. ɟˈe, sˌikutaŋɡˈaza hˈili, na kutˈoa ˌunabˈii ʃˈu zamˈani? nˈiɲi ni mˌaʃahˈidi wˈaŋɡu. ɟˈe, jˈuko mˈuŋɡu zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu mˈimi? hˈaʃa, hakˈuna mwˈamba mwiŋɡˈine; mˌimi simɟˈui mwiŋɡˈine.|0
wˈote wˌatʃoŋɡˈao sanˈamu ni ˌubatˈili, nˈavjo vˈitu wˌanavjˌoviθamˈini hˌavifˈai kˈitu. wˈale ambˈao wˌanazˌitetˈea ni vipˈofu, ni waɟˈiŋɡa, nˌao wˌaaibˈika.|0
ni nˈani ˌateŋɡˌenezˈaje mˈuŋɡu na kusˈubu sanˈamu, ambˈajo hˌaiwˈezi kˌumfaidˈia kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
jˌeje pamˈoɟa na wenzˈiwe wa aˈina jˌake wˌataˌaibˈiʃwa, mafˈundi wˌao si kˈitu ˈila ni wˌanadˈamu tˈu. wˈote wˌakusaɲˈike pamˈoɟa na kˌuwa na msimˈamo wˈao, wˌataʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini kwa hˈofu na kwa feðˈeha.|0
muhˈunzi hˌutʃukˈua kifˈaa na kˌukifaɲˈia kˈazi kwˈeɲe makˈaa ja mˈoto, hˌuteŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu kwa ɲˈundo, hˌuifaɲˈiza kwa ŋɡˈuvu za mkˈono wˈake. huˈona ɲɟˈaa na kˌupotˈeza ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, ˌasipokˈuɲua mˈaɟi hˌuzimˈia.|0
sˌeremˈala hupˈima kwa kˌutumˈia kˈamba na hˌuutʃˈora mstˈari kwa kalˈamu; hutʃˈoŋɡa kwa patˈasi na kutˈia alˈama kwa bikˈari. hˌuifaɲˈiza katˌika ˈumbo la bˌinadˈamu, la mwˌanadˈamu katˌika ˌutukˈufu wˌake wˈote, ˌili iwˈeze kukˈaa katˌika sehˈemu jˌake ja ibˈada ja miˈuŋɡu.|0
hukˈata mˈiti ja mˌierˈezi, hˌutʃukˈua mtirˈiza ˌau mwalˈoni. hˌuuˈatʃa ukˈue mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiti ja msitˈuni, ˌau hupˈanda msˌunobˈari, nˈajo mvˈua hˌuufˈaɲa ukˈue.|0
ni kˈuni ja bˌinadˈamu: jˌeje hˌutʃukˈua baˈaði jˌake na kuˈota mˈoto, huwˈaʃa mˈoto na kuˈoka mkˈate. lakˈini pˈia hˌuutumˈia kˌumteŋɡenˈeza mˈuŋɡu na ˌakamwabˈudu, hˌuitˌeŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu na kˌuisˌuɟudˈia.|0
sehˈemu ja kˈuni hˌuziwˈeka motˈoni, ˌakapikˈia tʃakˈula tʃˈake, hˌubanˈika ɲˈama na kˈula hˌadi aʃˈibe. huˈota mˈoto na kusˈema, ˈaha! nˌinahˈisi ɟˈoto, nˌinaˈona mˈoto.|0
mabˈaki jˌake hˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˈuŋɡu, sanˈamu jˈake; jˌeje hˌuisˌuɟudˈia na kˌuiabˈudu. hˌuiˈomba na kusˈema, nˌiokˈoe; wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌawaɟˈui tʃotʃˈote, hˌawaelˈewi tʃotʃˈote, mˈatʃo jˈao jˌamefˈuŋɡwa hˌata hˌawawˈezi kuˈona, akˈili zˈao zˌimefˈuŋɡwa hˌata hˌawawˈezi kˌufahˈamu.|0
hakˈuna ˌanajˌefikˈiri, hakˈuna mwˌeɲe mˌaarˈifa wˈala ˌufahˈamu wa kusˈema, sehˈemu jˌake nˌilitumˈia kwa kˈuni; hˌata pˈia nˌiliˈoka mkˈate ɟˌuːja makˈaa jˈake, nˌikabanˈika ɲˈama na kuˈila. ɟˈe, nifˈaɲe mˌatʃukˈizo kwa kˈile kˌilitʃobˈaki? ɟˈe, nˌisuɟudˈie ɡˈoɡo la ˈm̩ti.|0
hˌuɟilˈiʃa kwa maɟˈivu, mˈojo ˌuliˌodaŋɡaɲˈika hˌumpotˈoʃa; hawˈezi kˌuɟiokˈoa mweɲˈewe, ˌau kusˈema, ɟˈe, kˈitu hˈiki kˌilitʃˈoko katˌika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume si ni uˈoŋɡo.|0
ˈee jakˈobo, kumbˈuka mˈambo hˈaja, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ni mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu. nˌimekuˈumba wˈewe, wˌewe ni mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu. ˈee ˌisraˈeli, sˌitakˌusahˈau.|0
nˌimejafˈuta makˈosa jˈako kˌama wˈiŋɡu, ðˈambi zˈako kˌama ukˈuŋɡu wa ˌasubˈuhi. nˌirudˈie mˈimi, kwa kˌuwa nˌimekˌukombˈoa wˈewe.|0
ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu, imbˈeni kwa furˈaha, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili. ˈee vilˈindi vja dunˈia, pˈiɡa kelˈele. ˈeɲi milˈima, pazˈeni saˈuti kwa ɲˈimbo, ˈeɲi misˈitu na mˈiti jˈenu jˈote, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamemkombˈoa jakˈobo, ˌameˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu wˌake katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˌimi hˌuzipˈiŋɡa iʃˈara za mˌanabˈii wa uˈoŋɡo, na kˌuwatˈia ˌupumbˈavu wˌaaɡˈuzi, nˌijapˌinduˈaje mˌaarˈifa ja wˌeɲe hekˈima, na kˌujafˈaɲa kˌuwa upˈuzi.|0
nˌijaθˌibitiʃˈaje manˈeno ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, na kˌutimˈiza ˌutabˈiri wa waɟˈumbe wˈake, nˌiambiˈaje jˌerusalˈemu, ˌitakalˈiwa na wˈatu, nˌiambiˈaje mˈiɟi ja jˈuda kˌuwa, ˌitaɟˈeŋɡwa, na kuhˈusu maɡˈofu jˈake, mˌimi nˌitajˌateŋɡenˈeza,.|0
nˌiambiˈaje kilˈindi tʃa mˈaɟi, kaˈuka, nˌami nˌitakaˈuʃa viɟˈito vjˈako,.|0
nˌisemˈaje kuhˈusu korˈeʃi, jˌeje ni mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌatatimˈiza jˈote jˌanipˌendezˈajo; ˌataˌuambˈia jˌerusalˈemu, ˌukaɟˈeŋɡwe tˈena, na kuhˈusu hekˈalu, misˈiŋɡi jˌake na iwˈekwe. .|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kwa mpˈakwa mafˈuta wˈake, korˈeʃi, ambˈaje nˌimemʃˈika mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume kˌutiˈiʃa mˌataˈifa mbˈele jˌake na kˌuwavˈua wafˈalme silˈaha zˈao, kˌufuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo mbˈele jˌake ˌili malˈaŋɡo jasˈiɟe jˌakafˈuŋɡwa.|0
nˌitakwˈenda mbˈele jˈako na kˌusawazˈiʃa milˈima; nˌitavˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟa malˈaŋɡo ja ʃˈaba na kˌukatakˈata mapˈiŋɡo ja tʃˈuma.|0
nˌitakˈupa hazˈina za ɡizˈani, mˈali zˌilizofˈitʃwa mahˈali pa sˈiri, ˌili upˈate kuɟˈua ja kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakuitˈaje kwa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja jakˈobo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌisraˈeli nˌilijˌemtʃaɡˈua, nˌimekuˈita wˌewe kwa ɟˈina lˈako, na kukˈupa ɟˈina la heʃˈima, iŋɡˈawa wˌewe hˌunitambˈui.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine, zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu. nˌitakutˈia ŋɡˈuvu, iŋɡˈawa wˌewe hˌuɟanˌitambˈua.|0
ˌili kutˈoka mawˈio ja ɟˈua mpˈaka matʃwˈeo jˈake, wˈatu wapˈate kuɟˈua kwˌamba hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine.|0
mˌimi nˌinaˈumba nˈuru na kˌuhulˈuku ɡˈiza, nˌinalˈeta mˌafanikˈio na kˌusababˈiʃa maˈafa. mˈimi, bwˈana, hˌujatˈenda hˈaja jˈote.|0
ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu ɟˈuu, ɲeʃˈeni hˈaki, mawˈiŋɡu na jˌaidondˈoʃe. dunˈia na ˌifuŋɡˈuke sˈana, wokˈovu na ˌutʃipˈuke, hˈaki na ikˈue pamˈoɟa nˈao. mˈimi, bwˈana, n̩dˈije nˌilijˌeiˈumba.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌaʃindanˈaje na muˈumba wˈake, jˌeje ambˈaje ni kiɡˈae tu kˈati ja viɡˈae ɟˌuːja ˈarði. ɟˈe, udˈoŋɡo wa kˌufiɲaŋɡˈia hˌumwambˈia mfiɲˈanzi, ˌunatˌeŋɡenˈeza nˈini wˈewe? ɟˈe, kˈazi jˈako husˈema, hˈana mikˈono.|0
ˈole wˌake ˌamwambiˈaje bˈaba jˈake, ˌumezˈaa nˈini? ˌau kˌumwambˈia mˈama jˈake, ˌumezˈaa kˈitu ɡˈani?.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli na muˈumba wˈake: kuhˈusu mˈambo jˌatakˌajokˈuɟa, ɟˈe, ˌunanˌiulˈiza habˈari za watˈoto wˈaŋɡu, ˌau kunˈipa ˈamri kuhˈusu kˈazi za mikˈono jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijeˈumba dunˈia na kˌumuˈumba mwˌanadˈamu ɟˈuu jˈake. mikˈono jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe n̩dˈijo ˌilijˌozitˈanda mbˈiŋɡu, nˌikajapˈaŋɡa maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˈote ja aŋɡˈani.|0
mˌimi nˌitamwinˈua korˈeʃi katˌika hˈaki jˈaŋɡu: nˌitazˌiɲoˈoʃa ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote. jˌeje ˌataɟˈeŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi wˈaŋɡu ˈupja, na kˌuwawˈeka hˈuru wˈatu wˈaŋɡu walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni, lakˈini si kwa kˌulipˈiwa fˈeða wˈala kupˈewa zawˈadi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: mazˈao ja mˈisri na biðˈaa za kˈuʃi, nˌao wˈale wasˈeba warˈefu, wˌatakuɟˈia na kˌuwa wˈako, wˌatakuɟˈia wˌakiɟˌikokˈota ɲˈuma jˈako, wˌatakuɟˈia wˌamefˈuŋɡwa mˌiɲorˈoro. wˌatasuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈako wˌakikusˈihi na kusˈema, hakˈika mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine; hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine..|0
hakˈika wˌewe u mˈuŋɡu ˌunajˌeɟifˈitʃa, ˈee mˈuŋɡu na mwokˈozi wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini ˌisraˈeli ˌataˌokolˈewa na bwˈana kwa wokˈovu wa milˈele; kˈamwe hˌutaˌaibˈika wˈala kˌutatˌahajarˈika, milˈele jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijeˈumba mbˈiŋɡu, n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu; jˌeje ˌalijˌeifˈaɲa dunˈia na kˌuiˈumba, jˌeje n̩dˈije ˌaliˌiwekˈea misˈiŋɡi imˈara, hˌakuiˈumba ˌili ˈiwe tˈupu, bˌali ˌaliiˈumba ˌikalˈiwe na viˈumbe vjˈake. ˌanasˈema: mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine.|0
sˌiɟasˈema sirˈini, kutˈoka mahˈali fulˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈiza; sˌiɟawˌaambˈia wazˈao wa jakˈobo, nˌitafutˈeni bˈure. mˈimi, bwˈana, nasˈema kwˈeli; nˌinataŋɡˈaza lilˈilo sahˈihi.|0
kˌusaɲikˈeni pamˈoɟa ˈm̩ɟe, ˈeɲi wˌakimbˈizi kutˈoka mˌataˈifa. wˈale wˌabebˈao sanˈamu za ˈm̩ti ni wˈatu wasˈio na akˈili, wˈale wˌaombˈao miˈuŋɡu ˌisijowˈeza kˌuokˈoa.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni lˌitakˌalokuwˈepo, lˌisemˈeni hˈilo, wˌao na wafˈaɲe ʃaˈuri pamˈoɟa. ni nˈani ˌalijˌetaŋɡulˈia kusˈema hˈili ʃˈu zamˈani, ˌalijˌetaŋɡˈaza ʃˈu zamˈani za kˈale? ɟˈe, hˌaikˈuwa mˈimi, bwˈana? wˈala hapˈana mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu mˈimi, mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe hˈaki na mwokˈozi; hapˈana mwiŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi.|0
nˌiɡeˌukiˈeni mˈimi, nˌaɲi mkˌaokolˈewe, ˈeɲi miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia; kwa maˈana mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu, wˈala hapˈana mwiŋɡˈine.|0
nˌimeˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌimenˈena katˌika ˌuadilˈifu wˈote nˈeno ambˈalo hˌalitˌataŋɡˈuka: kˈila ɡˈoti lˌitapˈiɡwa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi kˈila ulˈimi ˌutaˈapa.|0
wˌatasˈema kuhˈusu mˈimi, katˌika bwˈana pˈeke jˌake ndˈiko kˈuna hˈaki na ŋɡˈuvu.  wˈote ambˈao wˌamemkˌasirikˈia mˈuŋɡu wˌatamɟˈia jˈeje, nˌao wˌatatˌahajarˈika.|0
bˈeli ˌanasuɟˈudu hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi, nˈebo ˌanainˈama; sanˈamu zˈao zabˈebwa na waɲˈama wa mizˈiɡo. viɲˈaɡo hˈivi mnˌavjobˈeba kˈila mahˈali ni mzˈiɡo wa kˌulemˈea, mzˈiɡo kwa wˌaliotʃˈoka.|0
viɲˈaɡo pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌanaˌovibˈeba wˌanainˈama tʃˈini; hˈijo miˈuŋɡu hˌaiwˈezi kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu, wˈote wˌanakwˈenda ˌutumwˈani pamˈoɟa.|0
nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˈimi, ˈee ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mlˌiobˈaki wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, nˈiɲi ambˈao nˌimewˌateɡemˈeza ʃˈu mlˌipotˈuŋɡwa mˈimba, nˌami nˌimewabˈeba ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈenu.|0
hˌata mpˈaka wakˈati wa uzˈee wˈenu na mvˈi, mˌimi n̩dˈije, mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌitakˌajewˌasaidˈia nˈiɲi. nˌimewˌahulˈuku, nˌami nˌitawabˈeba, nˌitawˌasaidˈia nˈiɲi na kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
mtˌanilˌiŋɡanˈiʃa na nˈani, ˌau mtˌanihesˈabu kˌuwa sˈawa na nˈani? ni nˈani mtˌakajˌenifˌananˈiʃa nˌaje ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa.|0
weŋɡˈine humwˈaɡa ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mifˈuko jˈao, na kupˈima fˈeða kwˈeɲe mizˈani; hˌuaɟˈiri m̩fˈua ðahˈabu kˌuteŋɡenˈeza mˈuŋɡu, kˈiʃa hˌuisˌuɟudˈia na kˌuiabˈudu.|0
hˌuiinˈua mˌabeɡˈani na kˌuitʃukˈua; hˌuiwˈeka mahˈali pˈake, pˈapo hˈapo ndˈipo ˌisimamˈapo. wˈala hˌaiwˈezi kˌusoɡˈea kutˈoka mahˈali pˈale. iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu hˌuililˈia, hˌaimɟˈibu; hˌaiwˈezi kˌumwokˈoa kwˈeɲe taˈabu zˈake.|0
kˌumbukˈeni mˈambo jˌalijopˈita, jˈale ja zamˈani za kˈale; mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine; mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine alˈije kˌama mˈimi.|0
ni mˌimi nˌitaŋɡazˈaje mwˈiʃo ʃˈu mwˈanzo, nˈaam, ʃˈu zamˈani za kˈale, mˈambo ambˈajo hˌajaɟˌatendˈeka. nˌinasˈema: kusˈudi lˈaŋɡu ndˈilo lˌitakˌalosimˈama, nˌami nˌitatˈenda mapˈenzi jˈaŋɡu jˈote.|0
kutˈoka mˌaʃarˈiki nˌinaˈita ndˈeɡe ˌawindˈaje; kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali, ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajetimˈiza kusˈudi lˈaŋɡu. lˈile ambˈalo nˌimelisˈema, ndˈilo nˌitakˌalolˌitimˈiza; lˈile nˌililˌolipˈaŋɡa, ndˈilo nˌitakˌalolitˈenda.|0
nˌisikˌilizˈeni, nˈiɲi wˌeɲe miˈojo miɡˈumu, nˈiɲi m̩lˈio mbˈali na hˈaki.|0
nˌinalˈeta hˈaki jˈaŋɡu karˈibu, haˈiko mbˈali; wˈala wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu hˌautˌatʃelˈewa. nˌitawˈapa sajˈuni wokˈovu, ˌisraˈeli ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃˈuka ukˈeti mˌavumbˈini, ˈee bikˈira bˈinti babˈeli; kˈeti tʃˈini pasˈipo na kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi, ˈee bˈinti wa wˌakaldˈajo. hˌutaˈitwa tˈena mworˈoro wˈala wa kˌupendˈeza.|0
tʃukˈua mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia, usˈaɡe ˈuŋɡa, vˈua ʃˈela jˈako. pandˈiʃa mavˈazi jˈako, ondˈoa viˈatu vjˈako, vˈuka viɟˈito kwa ʃˈida.|0
ˈutʃi wˈako ˌutafˌunulˈiwa na aˈibu jˈako ˌitaˌonekˈana. nˌitalˈipa kisˈasi; sˌitamhˌurumˈia hˌata mmˈoɟa.|0
mkombˈozi wˈetu: bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake; n̩dˈije jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈeti kˈimja, iŋɡˈia ɡizˈani, bˈinti wa wˌakaldˈajo, hˌutaˈitwa tˈena malkˈia wa fˈalme.|0
nˌiliwˌakasˌirikˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuaibˈiʃa urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu; nˌiliwatˈia mˌikonˈoni mwˈako, nˌawe hˌukuwˌaonˈea hurˈuma. hˌata ɟˌuːja wazˈee ˌuliwˈeka nˈira nzˈito sˈana.|0
ˌukasˈema, nˌitaˌendelˈea kˌuwa malkˈia milˈele! lakˈini hˌukutˌafakˈari mˈambo hˈaja wˈala hˌukuwˈaza ɟˌuːja kˈile kˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌutokˈea.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, sˌikilˈiza, ˈewe kiˈumbe mpˈenda anˈasa, ˌukaˈaje mahˈali pˈako pa salˈama, na kˌuɟiambˈia mweɲˈewe, mˌimi n̩dˈije, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu. kˈamwe sˌitakˈuwa mɟˈane, wˈala sˌitafˈiwa na watˈoto..|0
hˈaja mawˈili jˌatakupˈata, kufˈumba na kˌufumbˈua, katˌika sˈiku mˈoɟa: kufˈiwa na watˈoto, na uɟˈane. jˈote jˌatakupˈata kwa kipˈimo kˌikamilˈifu, ˌiɟapokˈuwa utʃˈawi wˈako ni mwˈiŋɡi, na ˌuaɡˈuzi wˈako ni mwˈiŋɡi.|0
ˌumeˌuteɡemˈea uˈovu wˈako, nˌawe ˌumesˈema, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanionˈaje. hekˈima jˈako na mˌaarˈifa jˈako vˌinakˌupotˈeza ˌunapˌoɟiambˈia mweɲˈewe, mˌimi n̩dˈije, wˈala hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine zaˈidi jˈaŋɡu..|0
maˈafa jˌatakuɟˈia, nˌawe hˌutawˈeza kˌujaondˈoa kwa ˌuaɡˈuzi. ɟˈaŋɡa lˌitakˌuaŋɡukˈia, wˈala hˌutawˈeza kˌulikˈiŋɡa kwa fidˈia; msˈiba m̩kˈuu ˌusiowˈeza kˌuutabˈiri ˌutakuɟˈia ɣafˈula.|0
ˌendelˈea bˌasi na ˌuaɡˈuzi wˈako, na wˈiŋɡi wa utʃˈawi wˈako, ambˈao ˌumeˌutumikˈia ʃˈu utˈoto wˈako. lˈabda ˌutafˌanikˈiwa, lˈabda ˌunawˈeza ˌukasˌababˈiʃa hˈofu kˈuu.|0
ˌuʃaˈuri wˈote ˌuliˌopokˈea ˌumekutʃˈoʃa bˈure! wˌanaɟˈimu wˈako na wˈaɟe mbˈele, wˈale wˌatazˈama ɲˈota wˌatabˌiriˈao mwˈezi baˌada ja mwˈezi, wˌao na wˌawaokˈoe na lˈile lˌinalokˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
hakˈika wˈako kˌama mabˈua makˈavu; mˈoto ˌutawˌateketˈeza. hˌawawˈezi hˌata kˌuɟiokˈoa wˌao weɲˈewe kˌutokˈana na ŋɡˈuvu za mwˈali wa mˈoto. hˈapa hakˈuna makˈaa ja kumtˈia ˈm̩tu jejˈote ɟˈoto; hˈapa hakˈuna mˈoto wa kuˈota.|0
hˈajo n̩dˈijo jˈote wˌanajowˈeza kˌuwatendˈea nˈiɲi, hˈawa ambˈao ˌumetˌaabˈika nˌao na kufˈaɲa nˌao bˌiaʃˈara ʃˈu utˈoto. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatatorˈoka; hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌukuokˈoa.|0
sˌikilizˈeni hˈili, ˈee ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈitwa kwa ɟˈina la ˌisraˈeli, na mnˌaotˈoka katˌika ukˈoo wa jˈuda, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈapa kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, mnˌaomwˈomba mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini si katˌika kwˈeli ˌau kwa hˈaki.|0
nˈiɲi mnˌaoɟiˈita raˈija wa ˈm̩ɟi mtˌakatˈifu, na kˌumteɡemˈea mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
nˌilitˈoa ˌunabˈii mˈambo ja kwˈanza ʃˈu zamˈani, kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌilijˌataŋɡˈaza na kˌujafˈaɲa jˌaɟulikˈane; kˈiʃa ɣafˈula nˌikajatˈenda, nˈajo jˌakatokˈea.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌaliɟˈua ɟˈinsi ˌulivjokˈuwa mkaˈidi; miʃˈipa ja ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako ˌilikˈuwa tʃˈuma, kipˈaɟi tʃˈako tʃa ˈuso kˌilikˈuwa ʃˈaba.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌilikˌuambˈia mˈambo hˈaja ʃˈu zamˈani, kˈabla hˌajaɟˌatokˈea nˌilikˌutaŋɡazˈia ˌili usˈiɟe ˌukasˈema, sanˈamu zˈaŋɡu zˌilifˈaɲa hˈajo; kiɲˈaɡo tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ˈm̩ti na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu wa tʃˈuma ˌalijˌaamˈuru..|0
ˌumesikˈia mˈambo hˈaja; jˌaaŋɡalˈie hˈajo jˈote. ɟˈe, hˌutajˌakubˈali? kˌuanzˈia sˈasa na kˌuendelˈea nˌitakˌuelˈeza mˈambo mˈapja, ɟˌuːja mˈambo jˌalijˌofitʃˈika ˌusijˌojaɟˈua.|0
jˌameˈumbwa sˈasa, wˈala si ʃˈu zamˈani; hˌukupˈata kˌujasikˈia kˈabla ja sˈiku ja lˈeo. hˈivjo huwˈezi kusˈema, nˈaam, nˌilijaɟˈua hˈajo..|0
hˌuɟajˌasikˈia wˈala kˌujaelˈewa, ʃˈu zamˈani sikˈio lˈako hˌalikˌufuŋɡˈuka. nˌinafahˈamu vjˈema ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu, ˌuliˈitwa mwˈasi ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈako.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe nˌinaˌitʃelewˈeʃa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu, kwa aɟˈili ja sˈifa zˈaŋɡu nˌimeˌizuˈia ˌisikupˈate, ˌili nisˈiɟe nˌikakˌukatilˈia mbˈali.|0
tazˈama, nˌimekˌusafˈiʃa, iŋɡˈawa si kˌama fˈeða, nˌimekˌuɟarˈibu katˌika tanˈuru ja matˈeso.|0
kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe, nafˈaɲa hˈili. ɟˈinsi ɡˈani nˌiliˈatʃe ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitʃafulˈiwe? sˌitautˈoa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu kwa mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ˈee jakˈobo, nˌisikilˈize mˈimi, ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje nˌimekuˈita: mˌimi n̩dˈije; mˌimi ndˈimi mwˈanzo na mwˈiʃo.|0
mkˈono wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe ˌuliwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia, nˌao mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume ˌumezitˈanda mbˈiŋɡu; nˌiziitˈapo, zˈote hˌusimˈama pamˈoɟa.|0
kˌusaɲikˈeni, nˈiɲi ɲˈote, msˌikilˈize: ni ˈipi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈizo sanˈamu ambˈajo ˌimetabˈiri vˈitu hˈivi? wˈatu wa bwˈana wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa na kˌuuŋɡˈana wˌatatimˈiza kusˈudi lˈake ðˈidi ja babˈeli; mkˈono wa mˈuŋɡu ˌutakˈuwa ðˈidi ja wˌakaldˈajo.|0
mˈimi, nˈaam, mˈimi, nˌimenˈena; nˈaam, nˌimemwˈita jˈeje. nˌitamlˈeta, nˌaje ˌatafˌanikˈiwa katˌika lˈile nˌililomtˈuma.|0
nˌikarˌibiˈeni na msˌikilˈize hˈili: ʃˈu taŋɡˈazo la kwˈanza sˌikusˈema kwa sˈiri; wakˈati lˌitokeˈapo, nˌitakuwˈako hˈapo. sˈasa bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌamenitˈuma, kwa rˈoho wˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mkombˈozi wˈako, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli: mˌimi ni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, nˌikufˌundiʃˈaje ˌili upˈate faˈida, nˌikuˌoŋɡozˈaje katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌikupasˈajo kˌuiendˈea.|0
laˈiti ˌuŋɡesˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu, amˈani jˈako ˌiŋɡekˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩to, hˈaki jˈako kˌama mawˈimbi ja bahˈari.|0
wazˈao wˈako wˌaŋɡekˈuwa kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa, watˈoto wˈako kˌama tʃˈembe zˌake zˌisizˌohesabˈika; kˈamwe ɟˈina lˈao lˌisiŋɡˌefutilˈiwa mbˈali, wˈala kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa kutˈoka mbˈele zˈaŋɡu.|0
tokˈeni hˌuko babˈeli, kˌimbiˈeni kutˈoka kwa wˌakaldˈajo! tˌaŋɡazˈeni hˈili kwa kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe na kˌulihubˈiri. lˌipelekˈeni mpˈaka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia; semˈeni, bwˈana ˌamemkombˈoa mtumˈiʃi wˌake jakˈobo.|0
hˌawakuˈona kˈiu ˌalipˌowaoŋɡˈoza kupˈita ɟaŋɡwˈani; ˌalifˈaɲa mˈaɟi jˌatirirˈike kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mwˈamba kwa aɟˈili jˈao; ˌakapasˈua mwˈamba na mˈaɟi jˌakatˈoka kwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hakˈuna amˈani kwa waˈovu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌisikˌilizˈeni, ˈeɲi visˈiwa, sˌikiˈeni hˈili, nˈiɲi mˌataˈifa m̩lˈio mbˈali: kˈabla sˌiɟazalˈiwa, bwˈana ˌaliniˈita, ʃˈu kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈaŋɡu, ˌamelitˈaɟa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌuwa kˌama upˈaŋɡa ˌuliˌonolˈewa, katˌika uvˈuli wa mkˈono wˌake ˌakanifˈitʃa; ˌakanifˈaɲa kˌuwa mʃˈale ˌuliˌosuɡulˈiwa, na kˌunifˈitʃa katˌika pˈodo lˈake.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, wˌewe u mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje katˌika jˌeje nˌitaoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini nˌilisˈema, nˌimetumˈika bˈure, nˌimetumˈia ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu bˈure bˌila faˈida. hˌata hˈivjo lˌinalˌonistahˈili lˈiko mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, nˌao uɟˈira wˈaŋɡu ˈuko kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈasa bwˈana asˈema: jˌeje ˌalijˌeniˈumba tumbˈoni kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈake, kˌumrudˈiʃa tˈena jakˈobo kwˈake na kˌumkusaɲˈia ˌisraˈeli, kwa maˈana nˌimepˈata heʃˈima matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌamekˈuwa ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu.|0
jˌeje asˈema: ɟˈe, ni ɟˈambo dˈoɡo sˈana wˌewe kˌuwa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ˌili kˌureɟˈeza mˌakabˈila ja jakˈobo, na kˌuwarudˈiʃa wˈale wˌaisraˈeli nˌiliˌowahifˈaði? pˈia nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe nˈuru kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa mˌataˈifa, ˌili upˈate kulˈeta wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu hˌata miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje mkombˈozi na alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwˈake jˌeje ˌalijˌeðarˌaulˈiwa na kˌutʃukˈiwa na taˈifa, kwa mtumˈiʃi wa wˌatawˈala: wafˈalme wˌatakuˈona na kˌusimˈama, wakˈuu wˌataˈona na kˌuaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, kwa sabˈabu ja bwˈana, alˈije mwˌaminˈifu, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalijˌekutʃaɡˈua wˈewe.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: wakˈati wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˌokubalˈika nˌitakuɟˈibu, nˌami katˌika sˈiku ja wokˈovu nˌitakˌusaidˈia; nˌitakˌuhifˈaði, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌuwa aɡˈano kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, ˌili kˌurudˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuɡawaɲˈia urˈiθi tˈena wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa ukˈiwa.|0
kˌuwaambˈia matˈeka, tokˈeni ɲɟˈe, nˌao wˈale walˈio ɡizˈani, kuwˈeni hˈuru! wˌataɟilˈiʃa kˈando ja bˌarabˈara na kupˈata malˈiʃo jˈao ɟˌuːja kˈila kilˈima kilˈitʃo kitˈupu.|0
hˌawataˈona ɲɟˈaa wˈala kuˈona kˈiu, wˈala hˈari ja ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌau ɟˈua hˌalitˌawapˈiɡa. jˌeje mwˌeɲe hurˈuma ɟˈuu jˈao ˌatawˌaoɲˈeʃa ɲɟˈia, na kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza kˈando ja tʃemtʃˈemi za mˈaɟi.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa milˈima jˈaŋɡu jˈote kˌuwa bˌarabˈara, na ɲɟˈia kˈuu zˈaŋɡu zˌitaˌinulˈiwa.|0
tazˈama, wˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka mbˈali: weŋɡˈine kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini, weŋɡˈine kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi, weŋɡˈine kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja sinˈimu.|0
piɡˈeni kelˈele kwa furˈaha, ˈeɲi mbˈiŋɡu; furˈahi, ˈee dunˈia; pazˈeni saˈuti kwa kuˈimba, ˈeɲi milˈima! kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌanawˌafarˈiɟi wˈatu wˈake, nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa na hurˈuma kwa wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌoumˈizwa.|0
lakˈini sajˈuni ˌalisˈema, bwˈana ˌameniˈatʃa, bwˈana ˌamenˌisahˈau.|0
ɟˈe, mˈama awˈeza kˌumsahˈau mtˈoto ˌalijˈeko mˌatitˈini mwˈake ˌakiɲˈoɲa, wˈala asˈiwe na hurˈuma ɟˌuːja mtˈoto ˌalijemzˈaa? iŋɡˈawa ˌanawˈeza kˌusahˈau, mˌimi sˌitakˌusahˈau wˈewe.|0
tazˈama, nˌimekutʃˈora kˌama muhˈuri katˌika vitˈaŋɡa vja mikˈono jˈaŋɡu, kˈuta zˈako zi mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
wˈana wˈako wˌanahˌarakˈiʃa kurˈudi, nˌao wˈale wˌaliˌokutˈeka wˌanaondˈoka kwˈako.|0
inˈua mˈatʃo jˈako ˌukatazˈame pˈande zˈote: wˈana wˈako wˈote wˌanakˌusaɲˈika na kˌukuɟˈia. kwa hakˈika kˌama vˈile nˌiiʃˈivjo, ˌutawavˈaa wˈote kˌama mapˈambo, na kˌuɟifˈuŋɡa nˌao kˌama bˈibi arˈusi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌuliˌaŋɡamˈizwa na kufˈaɲua ukˈiwa, na ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌikahˌaribˈiwa, sˈasa nafˈasi ˌitakˈuwa fˈiɲu kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈako, nˌao wˈale wˌaliˌokuˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌatakˈuwa mbˈali sˈana.|0
watˈoto wˌaliˌozalˈiwa wakˈati wa msˈiba wˈako bˈado wˌatakˌuambˈia, mahˈali hˈapa ni fˈiɲu sˈana kwˈetu, tˈupe enˈeo kˈubwa zaˈidi la kuˈiʃi..|0
ndˈipo ˌutasˈema mojˈoni mwˈako, ni nˈani ˌalijˌenizalˈia hˈawa? nˌilikˈuwa nˌimefˈiwa, tˈena tˈasa; nˌilikˈuwa nˌimehamˈiʃwa na kˌukatalˈiwa. ni nˈani ˌalijˌewalˈea hˈawa? nˌiliˈatʃwa pˈeke jˈaŋɡu, lakˈini hˈawa wˌametˈoka wˈapi?.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: tazˈama, nˌitawˌaaʃirˈia wˈatu wa mˌataˈifa, nˌitainˈua bendˈera jˈaŋɡu kwa mˌataˈifa; wˌatawalˈeta wˈana wˈako mˌikonˈoni jˈao, na kˌuwabˈeba bˈinti zˈenu ɟˌuːja mabˈeɡa jˈao.|0
wafˈalme wˌatakˈuwa bˈaba zˈenu wa kˌuwalˈea, na malkˈia wˌao wˌatakˈuwa mˈama zˈenu wa kˌuwalˈea. wˌatasuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈako ɲˈuso zˈao zˌikiɡˈusa ˈarði; wˌatarˈamba mavˈumbi jalˈijo mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈako. ndˈipo ˌutaɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana; wˈale wˌanaˌonitˌumaˈini mˌimi hˌawatˌaaibˈika.|0
ɟˈe, ɲˈara zawˈeza kˌutʃukulˈiwa kutˈoka kwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita, ˌau matˈeka kˌuokolˈewa kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wakˈali.|0
lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˈaam, matˈeka wˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa kutˈoka kwa mˌaʃuɟˈaa, na ɲˈara zˌitapokˈoɲua kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wakˈali. nˌitaʃindˈana na wˈale wˌanaˌoʃindˈana nˈawe, nˌami nˌitawˌaokˈoa watˈoto wˈako.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈale wˌanaˌokuonˈea kˈula ɲˈama jˈao weɲˈewe, wˌatalˈewa kwa dˈamu jˈao weɲˈewe, kˌama vˈile kwa mvˈiɲo. ndˈipo wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌataɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˈimi, bwˈana, ni mwokˈozi wˈako, mkombˈozi wˈako, nilˈije mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa jakˈobo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˈiko wˈapi hˈati ja talˈaka ja mˈama jˈako ambˈajo kwˈajo nˌiliatʃˈana nˈaje? ˌau nˌimewaˈuza nˈiɲi kwa nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌanaˌonidˈai? kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu mliˈuzwa, kwa sabˈabu ja makˈosa, mˈama jˈenu ˌaliˈatʃwa.|0
nˌilipokˈuɟa, kwa nˈini hˌakuwˈepo hˌata mmˈoɟa? nˌilipoˈita, kwa nˈini hˌakuwˈepo hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kuɟˈibu? ɟˈe, mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ni mfˈupi ˈm̩no hˌata nˌisiwˈeze kˌuwakombˈoa? ɟˈe, mˌimi sˈina ŋɡˈuvu za kˌukuokˈoa? kwa kˌukemˈea tu nˌaikaˈuʃa bahˈari, nˌaiɡeˈuza mˈito ja mˈaɟi kˌuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa; samˈaki wˌake wˌanaˈoza kwa kukˈosa mˈaɟi na kˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈiu.|0
nˌinalivˈika ˈaŋɡa weˈusi na kufˈaɲa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia kˌuwa kˌifunˈiko tʃˈake.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌamenˈipa ulˈimi ˌuliˌofundˈiʃwa, ˌili kuɟˈua nˈeno lˌimteɡˌemezˈalo ˌalijetʃˈoka. hˌuniˈamʃa ˌasubˈuhi kwa ˌasubˈuhi, huˈamʃa sikˈio lˈaŋɡu lˌisikˈie kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌafundiʃwˈaje.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌamezibˈua mˌasikˈio jˈaŋɡu, nˌami sikˈuwa mwˈasi, wˈala sˌikurˈudi ɲˈuma.|0
nˌiliwˈapa mɡˈoŋɡo wˈaŋɡu wˈale wˌanipiɡˈao, maʃˈavu jˈaŋɡu wˈale wˌaŋɡoˈao ndˈevu zˈaŋɡu; sˌikuufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kˌutokˈana na feðˈeha na kˌutemˈewa mˈate.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌananˌisaidˈia, sˌitatˌahajarˈika. kwa hˈijo nˌimekˈaza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kˌama ɟˈiwe la ɡˌumeɡˈume, nˌami nˌinaɟˈua sˌitaˌaibˈika.|0
jˌeje ˌanipˌatiˈaje hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ju karˈibu. ni nˈani bˌasi ˌatakˌajelˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu? tˌukabˌiliˈane ˈuso kwa ˈuso! mʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu ni nˈani? ni nˈani alˈije mʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu.|0
ni bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌanisˌaidiˈaje mˈimi. ni nˈani hˈujo ˌatakˌajenˌihukˈumu? wˈote wˌatatʃakˈaa kˌama vˈazi, nˈondo wˌatawˈala wˌawamalˈize.|0
ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu amtʃˈaje bwˈana, na kˌulitˈii nˈeno la mtumˈiʃi wˈake? jˌeje ˌatembeˈaje ɡizˈani, jˌeje asˈije na nˈuru, na ˌalitˌumainˈie ɟˈina la bwˈana, na ˌamteɡemˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaowˈaʃa miˈoto, na kˌupeˈana miˈeŋɡe ˌiwakˈajo nˈiɲi kwa nˈiɲi, nendˈeni, tˌembeˈeni katˌika nˈuru ja mˈoto wˈenu na ja miˈeŋɡe mlˌijoiwˈaʃa. hˈili ndˈilo mtˌakalˌolipokˈea kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu: mtalˈala tʃˈini kwa matˈeso makˈali.|0
mwˌaŋɡaliˈeni ˌabrahˈamu, bˈaba jˈenu, na sˈara, ambˈaje ˌaliwazˈaa. wakˈati nˌilipomwˈita ˌalikˈuwa mmˈoɟa tˈu, nˌami nˌikambarˈiki na kumfˈaɲa kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi.|0
hakˈika bwˈana ˌataˌifarˈiɟi sajˈuni, nˌaje ˌatajˌaaŋɡalˈia kwa hurˈuma maɡˈofu jˌake jˈote; ˌatajafˈaɲa maɟˈaŋɡwa jˌake jˈawe kˌama edˈeni, nˈazo sehˈemu zˌake zˌisizˌolimˈika zˈiwe kˌama bustˈani ja bwˈana. ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha zˌitakuwˈako ndˈani jˈake, ʃukrˈani na saˈuti za kuˈimba.|0
nˌisikˌilizˈeni, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu; nˌisikiˈeni, taˈifa lˈaŋɡu: ʃerˈia ˌitatˈoka kwˈaŋɡu; hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ˌitakˈuwa nˈuru kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ˌinakˌaribˈia m̩bˈio, wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu ˌunakˈuɟa, nˌao mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌutalˈeta hukˈumu kwa mˌataˈifa. visˈiwa vˌitanˌiteɡemˈea na kˌuŋɡoɟˈea mkˈono wˈaŋɡu kwa mˌatumaˈini.|0
ˌinuˈeni mˈatʃo jˈenu mbiŋɡˈuni, mkˌaitazˈame dunˈia tʃˈini; mbˈiŋɡu zˌitatowˈeka kˌama mˈoʃi, dunˈia ˌitatʃakˈaa kˌama vˈazi, na wakˈazi wˌake kˈufa kˌama maˈinzi. bˌali wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu ˌutadˈumu milˈele, hˈaki jˈaŋɡu hˌaitakˈoma kˈamwe.|0
nˌisikiˈeni, nˈiɲi mnˌaoɟˈua lilˈilo sˈawa, nˈiɲi wˈatu ambˈao ˈm̩na ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu: msˌioɡˈope mˌaʃutˈumu ja wˌanadˈamu wˈala msitˈiwe hˈofu na mˌatukˈano jˈao.|0
kwa maˈana nˈondo ˌatawˈala kˌama vˈazi, nˌao fˈunza ˌatawˌatafˈuna kˌama sˈufu. lakˈini hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ˌitadˈumu milˈele, wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu kwa vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
ˈamka, ˈamka! ɟivˈike ŋɡˈuvu, ˈewe mkˈono wa bwˈana, ˈamka, kˌama sˈiku zˌilizopˈita, kˌama vˈile vizˈazi vja zamˈani. si ni wˌewe ˌulijemkˈata rahˈabu vipˈande vipˈande, ˌulijemtʃˈoma jˈule ɟˈoka.|0
si ni wˌewe ˌulijˌekaˈuʃa bahˈari, mˈaɟi ja kilˈindi kikˈuu, ˌulijefˈaɲa bˌarabˈara katˌika vilˈindi vja bahˈari ˌili wˌaliˌokombolˈewa wapˈate kuvˈuka.|0
wˈale wˌaliˌolipˈiwa fidˈia na bwˈana wˌatarˈudi. wˌataiŋɡˈia sajˈuni wˌakiˈimba; furˈaha ja milˈele ˌitakˈuwa tˈaɟi ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao. furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe zˌitawapˈata, huzˈuni na kulˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kˌutatowˈeka.|0
mˈimi, nˈaam mˈimi, ndˈimi nˌiwafˌariɟˈie nˈiɲi. nˈiɲi ni nˈani hˌata kˌuwaoɡˈopa wˌanadˈamu wˌanaokˈufa, wˌanadˈamu ambˈao ni maɟˈani tˈu.|0
kwˌamba mnˌamsahˈau bwˈana muˈumba wˈenu, ˌalijˌezitˈanda mbˈiŋɡu na kˌuiwˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia, kwˌamba mnaˈiʃi katˌika hˈofu sˈiku zˈote kwa sabˈabu ja ɣaðˈabu ja mðalˈimu, ambˈaje nˈia jˌake ni kˌuaŋɡamˈiza? ˈiko wˈapi bˌasi ɣaðˈabu ja mðalˈimu.|0
wafˈuŋɡwa wˌaliˌoɟikuɲˈata kwa hˈofu wˌatawˈekwa hˈuru kˌaribˈuni; hˌawatafˈia kwˈeɲe ɡerˈeza lˈao, wˈala hˌawatakˈosa tʃakˈula.|0
kwa maˈana mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ambˈaje hˌuisˌukasˈuka bahˈari ˌili mawˈimbi jˌake jˌaŋɡurˈume: bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
nˌimewˈeka manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako na kˌukufunˈika kwa uvˈuli wa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu: mˌimi nˌilijewˈeka mbˈiŋɡu mahˈali pˈake, nˌilijewˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia, nˌiwaˌambiˈaje sajˈuni, nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu..|0
ˈamka, ˈamka! simˈama, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, wˌewe ˌulijekˈuɲua kutˈoka mkˈono wa bwˈana kikˈombe tʃa ɣaðˈabu jˈake, wˌewe ˌulijekˈuɲua mpˈaka kˌufikˈia matʃˈuɟo jˈake, kikˈombe kˈile tʃa kˌuɲuˈea kˌiwafaɲˈatʃo wˈatu kˌujumbajˈumba.|0
kˈati ja wˈana wˈote ˌaliˌowazˈaa hˌakuwˈepo hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kˌumwoŋɡˈoza, kˈati ja wˈana wˈote ˌaliˌowalˈea hˌakuwˈepo hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kumʃˈika mkˈono.|0
maɟˈaŋɡa hˈaja mawˈili jˌamekˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈako: ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌukufarˈiɟi? mˌaaŋɡamˈizi, ˌuharibˈifu, ɲɟˈaa na upˈaŋɡa: ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌukutulˈiza.|0
wˈana wˈako wˌamezimˈia, wˌamelˈala kwˈeɲe mwˈanzo wa kˈila bˌarabˈara, kˌama swˈala ˌalijenˈaswa kwˈeɲe wˈavu. wˌameɟˈazwa na ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana na mˌakaripˈio ja mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo sˌikilˈiza hˈili, wˌewe ˌulijetˈeswa, ˌulijelˈewa, lakˈini si kwa mvˈiɲo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi wˈako, mˈuŋɡu wˈako, jˌeje ambˈaje hˌuwatetˈea wˈatu wˈake: tazˈama, nˌimeondˈoa mkonˈoni mwˈako kikˈombe kˌilitʃˌokufˈaɲa ˌujumbajˈumbe; kutˈoka kikˈombe hˈitʃo, kikˈombe tʃa kˈuɲua tʃa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu, kˈamwe hˌutakˈuɲua tˈena.|0
nˌitakiwˈeka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa watˈesi wˈako, wˈale wˌaliˌokuambˈia, aŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi ˌili tuwˈeze kˌutembˈea ɟˈuu jˈako. ˌukaufˈaɲa mɡˈoŋɡo wˈako kˌama ˈarði, kˌama ɲɟˈia jˈao ja kupˈita.|0
ˈamka, ˈamka, ˈee sajˈuni, ɟivˈike ŋɡˈuvu. vˈaa mavˈazi jˈako ja fahˈari, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi mtˌakatˈifu. ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa na alˈije naɟˈisi hˌataiŋɡˈia kwˈako tˈena.|0
ɟˌikuŋɡˈute mavˈumbi jˈako, inˈuka, ukˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu. ɟˌifuŋɡˈue mˌiɲorˈoro ilˈijo ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni ulˈije matˈeka.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: mliˈuzwa pasˈipo malˌipo, nˌaɲi mtˌakombolˈewa bˌila fˈeða.|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: hˈapo kwˈanza wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaliʃˈuka mˈisri kuˈiʃi, hˌatimˈaje, aʃˈuru wˌakawˌaonˈea.|0
bˌasi sˈasa nˈina nˈini hˈapa? asˈema bwˈana. kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌametʃˌukulˈiwa pasˈipo malˌipo, nˌao wˈale wˌanaˌowatawˈala wˌanawˌaðihˈaki, asˈema bwˈana. mtʃˈana kˈutwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌimetukˈanwa bˌila kikˈomo.|0
kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌataliɟˈua ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu; kwa hˈijo katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba ndˈimi nˌilijˌetaŋɡulˈia kˌulisˈema. nˈaam, ni mˈimi.|0
sˌikilˈiza! walˈinzi wˈako wˌanapˈaza saˈuti zˈao, pamˈoɟa wˌanapˈaza saˈuti zˈao kwa furˈaha. wakˈati bwˈana ˌatakˌaporeɟˈea sajˈuni, wˌataliˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
pazˈeni saˈuti ja ɲˈimbo za furˈaha pamˈoɟa, ˈeɲi maɡˈofu ja jˌerusalˈemu, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌamewˌafarˈiɟi wˈatu wˈake, ˌameˌikombˈoa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mkˈono mtˌakatˈifu wa bwˈana ˌumefˌunulˈiwa matʃˈoni pa mˌataˈifa jˈote, nˈajo miˈiʃo jˈote ja dunˈia ˌitaˈona wokˈovu wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
ˌondokˈeni, ˌondokˈeni, tokˈeni hˌuko! msiɡˈuse kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi! tokˈeni kˈati jˌake ˈm̩we sˈafi, nˈiɲi mtʃˌukuˈao vjˈombo vja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini hˌamtaondˈoka kwa harˈaka, wˈala hˌamtakwˈenda kwa kˌukimbˈia; kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌatatˌaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈenu, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌatakˈuwa mlˈinzi ɲˈuma jˈenu.|0
tazˈama, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ˌatatˈenda kwa hekˈima; ˌatatukˈuzwa, na kˌuinulˈiwa ɟˈuu, na kukwˈezwa sˈana.|0
kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa wˈeŋɡi wˌaliˌoʃaŋɡˈazwa nˈaje, kwˈani ˈuso wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ˌumehˌaribˈiwa sˈana zaˈidi ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote na ˈumbo lˈake kˌuharibˈiwa zaˈidi ja mfˈano wa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
hˈivjo ˌatajˌaʃaŋɡˈaza mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, nˌao wafˈalme wˌatafˈuŋɡa vˈiɲua vjˈao kwa sabˈabu jˈake. kwa kˌuwa jˈale ambˈajo hˌawakˌuambˈiwa, wˌatajaˈona, nˈajo jˈale wˌasijˌojasikˈia, wˌatajˌafahˈamu.|0
ni nˈani ˌalijˌeamˈini uɟˈumbe wˈetu, na mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌumefˌunulˈiwa kwa nˈani.|0
ˌalikˈua mbˈele jˌake kˌama ˈm̩tʃe mworˈoro na kˌama mzˈizi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu. hakˈuwa na uzˈuri wˈala ˌutukˈufu wa kˌutuvutˈia kwˈake, hakˈuwa na tʃotʃˈote katˌika sˈura jˌake tʃa kˌutufˈaɲa tˌumtamˈani.|0
ˌaliðˌaraulˈiwa na kˌukatalˈiwa na wˌanadˈamu, ˈm̩tu wa huzˈuni ɲˈiŋɡi, ˌaɟuˈaje matˈeso. kˌama ˈm̩tu ambˈaje wˈatu humfˈitʃa ɲˈuso zˈao, ˌaliðˌaraulˈiwa, wˈala hˌatukˌumhesˈabu kˌuwa kˈitu.|0
hakˈika ˌalitʃukˈua ˌuðaˈifu wˈetu na ˌakaɟitwˈika huzˈuni zˈetu, hˌata hˈivjo tˌuliðanˈia kˌuwa ˌamepˈiɡwa na mˈuŋɡu, ˌakapˈiɡwa sˈana nˈaje, na kutˈeswa.|0
lakˈini ˌalitˌobolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa jˈetu, ˌalitʃˌubulˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja maˈovu jˈetu; aðˈabu ˌilijˌotuletˈea sˌisi amˈani ˌilikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈake, na kwa mˌaɟerˈaha jˌake sˌisi tˌumepˈona.|0
sˌisi sˈote, kˌama kondˈoo, tˌumepotˈea, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌameɡˌeukˈia ɲɟˈia jˌake mweɲˈewe, nˌaje bwˈana ˌaliwˈeka ɟˈuu jˌake maˈovu jˈetu sˌisi sˈote.|0
ˌalionˈewa na kutˈeswa, hˌata hˈivjo hˌakufuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake; ˌalioŋɡˈozwa kˌama mwˌanakondˈoo ˌapelekwˈaje mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni, kˌama vˈile kondˈoo ˌaɲamazˈavjo mbˈele ja wˌao wˌamkatˈaje maɲˈoja, hˈivjo hˌakufuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈake.|0
kwa kˌuonˈewa na kˌuhukumˈiwa ˌaliˌondolˈewa. nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuelˈeza kuhˈusu kizˈazi tʃˈake? kwa maˈana ˌalikˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai, ˌalipˈiɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌakamfaɲˈia kabˈuri pamˈoɟa na waˈovu, pamˈoɟa na mˌataɟˈiri katˌika kˈifo tʃˈake, iŋɡˈawa hˌakutˈenda ɟeˈuri, wˈala hˌapakˈuwa na hˈila kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake.|0
lakˈini jˌalikˈuwa ni mapˈenzi ja bwˈana kˌumtʃubˈua na kˌumsababˈiʃa ˌatesˈeke. iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa maˈiʃa jˌake kˌuwa sadˈaka ja hatˈia, ˌataˈona uzˈao wˌake na kuˈiʃi sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi, nˈajo mapˈenzi ja bwˈana jˌatafˌanikˈiwa mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
baˌada ja mˌaumˈivu ja nˈafsi jˈake, ˌataˈona nˈuru ja uzˈima na kˌuriðˈika; kwa mˌaarˈifa jˈake, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌatawafˈaɲa wˈeŋɡi kˌuwa wˌeɲe hˈaki, nˌaje ˌatajˌatʃukˈua maˈovu jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitamɡawˈia sehˈemu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wakˈuu, nˌaje ˌataɡawˈana ɲˈara pamˈoɟa na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, kwa sabˈabu ˌalijˌamimˈina maˈiʃa jˌake hˌadi maˈuti, nˌaje ˌalihˌesabˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˌakosˈaɟi. kwa kˌuwa ˌalitʃukˈua ðˈambi za wˈeŋɡi, na kˌuwaombˈea wˌakosˈaɟi.|0
ˈimba, ˈewe mwanˈamke tˈasa, wˌewe ambˈaje kˈamwe hˌukuzˈaa mtˈoto; pˈaza saˈuti kwa kuˈimba, pˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha, wˌewe ambˈaje kˈamwe hˌukupˈata utˈuŋɡu; kwa sabˈabu watˈoto wa mwanˈamke ˌalijeˈatʃwa ukˈiwa ni wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko wa mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe mˈume, asˈema bwˈana.|0
panˈua mahˈali pa hˈema lˈako, tandˈaza mˌapazˈia ja hˈema lˈako ˌujaenˈeze mbˈali, wˈala ˌusijˌazuˈie; oŋɡˈeza urˈefu wa kˈamba zˈako, ˌimarˈiʃa viɡˈiŋɡi vjˈako.|0
kwa maˈana ˌutaenˈea upˈande wa kuˈume na upˈande wa kuʃˈoto; wazˈao wˈako wˌatajˌamilˈiki mˌataˈifa na kukˈaa katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao ˌilijoˈatʃwa ukˈiwa.|0
kwa maˈana muˈumba wˈako n̩dˈije mˈume wˈako, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli ni mkombˈozi wˈako, jˌeje ˌanaˈitwa mˈuŋɡu wa dunˈia jˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌatakuˈita urˈudi kˈana kwˌamba ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩ke ˌalijeˈatʃwa na kˌuhuzunˈiʃwa rohˈoni; kˌama ˈm̩ke ˌalijˌeolˈewa bˈado aŋɡˈali kiɟˈana na kˌukatalˈiwa, asˈema mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo nˌilikuˈatʃa, lakˈini kwa hurˈuma ɲˈiŋɡi nˌitakˌurudˈiʃa.|0
katˌika ukˈali wa hasˈira nˌilikufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kwa kitˈambo, lakˈini kwa faðˈili za milˈele nˌitakˈuwa na hurˈuma ɟˈuu jˈako, asˈema bwˈana mkombˈozi wˈako.|0
kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi ɟˈambo hˈili ni kˌama sˈiku za nˈoa, nˌilipoˈapa kˌuwa mˈaɟi ja nˈoa kˈamwe hˌajatˌafunˈika tˈena dunˈia. hˈivjo sˈasa nˌimeˈapa sˌitawˌakasˌirikˈia nˈiɲi, kˈamwe sˌitawˌakemˈea tˈena.|0
ˌiɟapˌotikisˈika milˈima, na vilˈima vˌiondolˈewe, hˌata hˈivjo upˈendo wˈaŋɡu ˌusiokˈoma kwˈenu hˌautˌatikisˈika, wˈala aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu la amˈani hˌalitˌaondolˈewa, asˈema bwˈana, mwˌeɲe hurˈuma ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
ˈewe ˈm̩ɟi ˌulijetˈeswa, ˌulijepˈiɡwa kwa ðorˈuba na ˌusijˌetulˈizwa, nˌitakuɟˈeŋɡa kwa almˈasi, nˌitawˈeka misˈiŋɡi jˈako kwa jakˈuti samˈawi.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa minˈara jˈako ja akˈiki, malˈaŋɡo jˈako kwa vˈito vˌiŋɡaˈavjo, nˈazo kˈuta zˈako zˈote za vˈito vja θamˈani.|0
watˈoto wˈako wˈote wˌatafundˈiʃwa na bwˈana, nˈajo amˈani ja watˈoto wˈako ˌitakˈuwa kˈuu.|0
kwa hˈaki ˌutaθˌibitˈika: kˌuonˈewa kˌutakˈuwa mbˈali nˈawe; hˌutaoɡˈopa tʃotʃˈote. hˈofu ˌitakˈuwa mbˈali nˈawe; hˌaitˌakukˌaribˈia wˈewe.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌakikˌuʃambulˈia, hˌaitakˈuwa kwa ruhˈusa jˈaŋɡu; jejˈote ˌakuʃˌambuliˈaje ˌataɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwˈako.|0
tazˈama, ni mˌimi nˌilijˌemuˈumba mhˈunzi, jˌeje ˌafukutˈaje makˈaa kˌuwa mˈoto, na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza silˈaha ˌinajofˈaa kwa kˈazi jˈake. tˈena ni mˌimi nˌilijˌemwambˈia mharˈabu kufˈaɲa ˌuharibˈifu mwˈiŋɡi.|0
hakˈuna silˈaha ˌitakˌajofaɲˈizwa ðˈidi jˈako ˌitakˌajofˌanikˈiwa, nˌawe ˌutaˌuθibitˈiʃa kˌuwa mwˈoŋɡo kˈila ulˈimi ˌutakˌaokuʃtˈaki. hˈuu n̩dˈio urˈiθi wa wˌatumˈiʃi wa bwˈana na hˌii n̩dˈijo hˈaki jˈao ˌitokˈajo kwˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, nˈiɲi ɲˈote wˌeɲe kˈiu, ɲɟoˈoni kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi; nˌaɲi ambˈao hˈamna fˈeða, ɲɟoˈoni, nˌunuˈeni na ˈm̩le! ɲɟoˈoni, nˌunuˈeni divˈai na mazˈiwa bˌila fˈeða na bˌila ɣarˈama.|0
kwa nˈini kˌutumˈia fˈeða kwa kˈitu ambˈatʃo si tʃakˈula, na kˌutaˌabikˈia kˈitu kˌisitʃˌoʃibˈiʃa? sˌikilizˈeni, nˌisikˌilizˈeni mˌimi na ˈm̩le kilˈitʃo kizˈuri, nˈazo nˈafsi zˈenu zˌitafˌurahˈia ˌutaɟˈiri wa unˈono.|0
teɡˈeni sikˈio ˈm̩ɟe kwˈaŋɡu, nˌisikiˈeni mˈimi, ˌili nˈafsi zˈenu zipˈate kuˈiʃi. nˌitafˈaɲa aɡˈano la milˈele nˈaɲi, pˈendo la ˌuaminˈifu nˌililˌomwahˈidi daˈudi.|0
tazˈama, nˌimemfˈaɲa kˌuwa ʃahˈidi wa mˌataˈifa, kˌioŋɡˈozi na ɟˌemadˈari wa mˌataˈifa.|0
hakˈika ˌutaˈita mˌataˈifa ˌusijˌojaɟˈua, nˈajo mˌataˈifa jˈale jˌasijˌokuɟˈua jˌatahˌarakˈiʃa kˌukuɟˈia, kwa sabˈabu ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa maˈana ˌamekˌutukˈuza.|0
mtˌafutˈeni bwˈana mˌaadˈamu ˌanapˌatikˈana; mwitˈeni mˌaadˈamu ju karˈibu.|0
ˈm̩tu mwˈovu na ˌaiˈatʃe ɲɟˈia jˈake, na ˈm̩tu m̩bˈaja na ˌajaˈatʃe mawˈazo jˈake. jˌeje na ˌamrudˈie bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatamrehˈemu, arˈudi kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kwa kˌuwa ˌatamsamˈehe bˈure kabˈisa.|0
kwa kˌuwa mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu si mawˈazo jˈenu, wˈala ɲɟˈia zˈenu si ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kˌama vˈile mbˈiŋɡu zilˈivjo ɟˈuu kulˈiko dunˈia, ndˈivjo ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu zilˈivjo ɟˈuu kulˈiko ɲɟˈia zˈenu na mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu kulˈiko mawˈazo jˈenu.|0
kˌama vˈile mvˈua na θelˈuɟi ˌiʃukˈavjo kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, nˈajo hˌairˈudi tˈena hˌuko bˌila kˌuɲuˈeʃa dunˈia na kˌuitʃipˈuʃa na kˌuistawˈiʃa, hˈivjo hutˈoa mbˈeɡu kwa mpˈanzi na mkˈate kwa mlˈaɟi.|0
ndˈivjo lilˈivjo nˈeno lˈaŋɡu lˈile lˌitokˈalo kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu: hˌalitˌanirudˈia tˈupu, bˌali lˌitatˌimilˈiza lˈile nˌililˌokusudˈia na lˌitafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kusˈudi lˈile nˌililˌolitˈuma.|0
mtatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa furˈaha na kˌuoŋɡˈozwa kwa amˈani; milˈima na vilˈima vˌitapˈaza saˈuti kwa ɲˈimbo mbˈele jˈenu, nˈajo mˈiti jˈote ja ʃambˈani ˌitapˈiɡa makˈofi.|0
badˈala ja kitʃˈaka tʃa miˈiba ˌitaˈota mˈiti ja mˌisunobˈari, na badˈala ja mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma ˌutaˈota mhadˈasi. hˈili lˌitakˈuwa ɟˈambo la kˌumpatˈia bwˈana ɟˈina, kwa aɟˈili ja iʃˈara ja milˈele, ambˈajo hˌaitˌaharibˈiwa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: dˌumiʃˈeni hˈaki na mkatˈende lˈile lilˈilo sˈawa, kwa maˈana wokˈovu wˈaŋɡu u karˈibu na hˈaki jˈaŋɡu ˌitafˌunulˈiwa upˈesi.|0
ˌamebˌarikˈiwa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌatendˈaje hˈili, ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌaliʃikˈaje kwa ˌuθabˈiti, jˌeje ˌaʃikˈaje sabˈato bˌila kˌuinaɟˈisi, ˌauzˌuiˈaje mkˈono wˌake ˌusifˈaɲe uˈovu wowˈote.|0
ˌusimwˈatʃe mɡˈeni ˌaambˌatanˈaje na bwˈana asˈeme, hakˈika bwˈana ˌatanitˈeŋɡa na wˈatu wˈake. ˌusimwˈatʃe towˈaʃi jejˈote ˌalalamˈike ˌakisˈema, mˌimi ni ˈm̩ti mkˈavu tˈu.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa mˌatowˈaʃi wˌaʃikˈao sabˈato zˈaŋɡu, ambˈao hˌutʃaɡˈua kˈile kˌinatʃˌonipendˈeza na kˌuliʃˈika sˈana aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈao nˌitawˈapa ndˈani ja hekˈalu lˈaŋɡu na kˈuta zˌake kˌumbukˈumbu na ɟˈina bˈora kulˈiko kˌuwa na watˈoto wa kiˈume na wa kˈike: nˌitawˈapa ɟˈina lˌidumˈulo milˈele, ambˈalo hˌalitˌakatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
waɡˈeni wˌanaˌoambatˈana na bwˈana ˌili kˌumtumikˈia, kˌulipˈenda ɟˈina la bwˈana, na kˌumwabˈudu jˈeje, wˈote wˌaʃikˈao sabˈato bˌila kˌuinaɟˈisi na ambˈao huʃˈika sˈana aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈawa nˌitawalˈeta kwˈeɲe mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu na kuwˈapa furˈaha ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ja sˈala. sadˈaka zˈao za kˌuteketˈeza na ðabˈihu zˈao zˌitakˌubalˈika ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu; kwa maˈana ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ˌitaˈitwa ɲˈumba ja sˈala kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi asˈema, jˌeje ˌawakˌusaɲˈaje wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa: bˈado nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa weŋɡˈine kwˈao zaˈidi ja hˈao ambˈao wˌamekusˈaɲua tajˈari.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, ˈeɲi waɲˈama wˈote wa kondˈeni, ɲɟoˈoni ˈm̩le, nˈiɲi waɲˈama wˈote wa mwitˈuni.|0
walˈinzi wa ˌisraˈeli ni vipˈofu, wˈote wˌamepˌuŋɡukˈiwa na mˌaarˈifa; wˈote ni ˈm̩bwa walˈio bˈubu, hˌawawˈezi kubwˈeka; hulˈala na kuˈota ndˈoto, hupˈenda kulˈala.|0
ni ˈm̩bwa wˌeɲe tamˈaa kˈubwa, kˈamwe hˌawatoʃˈeki. wˌao ni wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌaliˌopuŋɡukˈiwa na ˌufahˈamu; wˈote wˌameɡˌeukˈia ɲɟˈia jˈao weɲˈewe, kˈila mmˈoɟa hˌutafˈuta faˈida jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa hulˈia, ɲɟoˈoni, tupˈate mvˈiɲo! tˈuɲue kilˈeo sˈana! kˈeʃo ˌitakˈuwa kˌama lˈeo, ˌau hˌata bˈora zaˈidi.|0
mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌupotˈea, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌawazˈaje hˌilo mojˈoni mwˈake; wˈatu wˌanaˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu hˌuondolˈewa, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌeelˈewa kˌuwa wˌeɲe hˈaki wˌameˌondolˈewa ˌili wˌasipˌatikˈane na maˈovu.|0
