wˈale wˌaendˈao kwa uɲˈofu hˈuwa na amˈani; hupˈata pumzˈiko wˌalalˈapo mˌautˈini.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi: ɲɟoˈoni hˈapa, nˈiɲi wˈana wa watʃˈawi, nˈiɲi wazˈao wa wazˈinzi na mˌakahˈaba.|0
mnˌamðihˈaki nˈani? ni nˈani mnˌajemtʃˈeka kwa ðarˈau, na kˌumtolˈea ndˈimi zˈenu? ɟˈe, nˈiɲi si watˈoto wa waˈasi, uzˈao wa waˈoŋɡo.|0
mnawˈaka tamˈaa kˌatikˈati ja mˌialˈoni na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda matˈawi; mnˌawatˈoa kafˈara watˈoto wˈenu kwˈeɲe mabˈonde na tʃˈini ja mˌaɟabˈali jˌeɲe miˈaɲa.|0
sanˈamu zilˈizo kˌatikˈati ja mˈawe laˈini ja mˌabondˈeni ndˈizo fˈuŋɡu lˈenu; hˈizo ndˈizo sehˈemu jˈenu. nˈaam, kwa hˈizo mmˌemimˈina sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, na kutˈoa sadˈaka za nafˈaka. katˌika hˈaja jˈote, nˌiendelˈee kuˈona hurˈuma.|0
ˌumewˈeka kitˈanda tʃˈako ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe kilˈima kirˈefu kˌilitʃˌoinˈuka, hˌuko ˌulikwˈenda kutˈoa ðabˈihu zˈako.|0
ɲˈuma ja milˈaŋɡo jˈako na miˈimo jˈako ˌumewˈeka alˈama zˈako za kˌipaɡˈani. kwa kˌuniˈatʃa mˈimi, ˌulifunˈua kitˈanda tʃˈako, ˌumepˈanda ɟˈuu jˌake na kˌukipanˈua sˈana; ˌulifˈaɲa patˈano na wˈale ambˈao ˌunapˈenda vitˈanda vjˈao, nˌawe ˌuliˌaŋɡalˈia ˈutʃi wˈao.|0
ˌulikwˈenda kwa molˈeki ukˈiwa na mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni, na ˌukaoŋɡˈeza mˌanukˈato jˈako. ˌukawatˈuma waɟˈumbe wˈako mbˈali sˈana, ˌukaʃˈuka kwˈeɲe kabˈuri leɲˈewe.|0
ˌulikˈuwa ˌumetʃˈoʃwa na ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote, lakˈini hˌukusˈema, hakˈuna tˌumaˈini. ˌulipˈata ˌuhuˈiʃo wa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako, kwa sabˈabu hˈijo hˌukuzimˈia.|0
nˌitaˌifunˈua hˈaki jˈako na matˈendo jˈako, nˈajo hˌajatˌakufaˈidi.|0
ˌutakˌapolˈia kwa kˌuhitˈaɟi msaˈada, sanˈamu zˈako ˌulizˌoɟikˌusaɲˈia na zˌikuokˈoe! upˈepo ˌutazˌipeperˈuʃa zˈote, pˈumzi pˈeke jˌake ˌitazˌipeperˈuʃa, lakˈini ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajenifˈaɲa kˌimbilˈio lˈake, ˌatairˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuumilˈiki mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu.|0
tˈena ˌitasˈemwa: ɟeŋɡˈeni, ɟeŋɡˈeni, ˌiteŋɡˌenezˈeni ɲɟˈia! ˌondoˈeni vikwˈazo katˌika ɲɟˈia ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo alˈije ɟˈuu, jˌeje ˌalijˌeinulˈiwa sˈana, jˌeje ˌaiʃˈije milˈele, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni mtˌakatˈifu: nˌinaˈiʃi mˌimi mahˈali pˌalipˌoinˈuka na pˌatakatˈifu, lakˈini pˈia pamˈoɟa na jˌeje alˈije na rˈoho ˌilijotˈubu na mwˌeɲe rˈoho ja ˌuɲeɲekˈevu, ˌili kˌuzihuˈiʃa rˈoho za wˌaɲeɲekˈevu na kˌuihuˈiʃa miˈojo jˈao wˌaliotˈubu.|0
sˌitaˌendelˈea kˌulaˈumu milˈele, wˈala sˌitakˌasirˈika sˈiku zˈote, kwa kˌuwa rˈoho ja mwˌanadˈamu ˌiŋɡezimˈia mbˈele zˈaŋɡu: jaˈani pˈumzi ja mwˌanadˈamu nˌilijˌemuˈumba.|0
nˌiliɣˌaðibˈika na tamˈaa jˌake ja ðˈambi; nˌilimwaðˈibu, nˌikaufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kwa hasˈira, na bˈado ˌaliˌendelˈea katˌika ɲɟˈia zˌake za tamˈaa.|0
nˌimeziˈona ɲɟˈia zˈake, lakˈini nˌitampˈoɲa, nˌitamwoŋɡˈoza na kˌumrudiʃˈia ˈupja farˈaɟa.|0
nˌikiˈumba sˈifa mˌidomˈoni ja wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi katˌika ˌisraˈeli. amˈani, amˈani, kwa wˈale walˈio mbˈali na kwa wˈale walˈio karˈibu, asˈema bwˈana. nˌami nˌitawapˈoɲa.|0
bˌali waˈovu ni kˌama bahˈari ˌitʃafukˈajo, ambˈajo hˌaiwˈezi kˌutulˈia, mawˈimbi jˌake hutˈupa tˌakatˈaka na matˈope.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu asˈema, hakˈuna amˈani kwa waˈovu.|0
pˈiɡa kelˈele, ˌusizuˈie. pˈaza saˈuti jˈako kˌama tˌarumbˈeta. wˌataŋɡˌaziˈeni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu uˈasi wˈao, na kwa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo ðˈambi zˈao.|0
kwa maˈana kˈila sˈiku hˌunitafˈuta, wˌanaˌonekˈana kutˈaka kuɟˈua ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu, kˈana kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa taˈifa lˌinalotˈenda lilˈilo sˈawa, na ambˈalo hˌaliɟˌaziˈatʃa ˈamri za mˈuŋɡu wˈake. hutˈaka kwˈaŋɡu mˌaamˈuzi ja hˈaki, nˌao hˌutamˈani mˈuŋɡu ˌawakˌaribˈie.|0
wˌao husˈema, mbˈona tˌumefˈuŋɡa, nˌawe hˌuɟaˈona? mbˈona tˌumeɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza, nˌawe hˌuaŋɡalˈii? lakˈini katˌika sˈiku ja kufˈuŋɡa kwˈenu, mnafˈaɲa mnˌavjotˈaka na kˌuwaðulˈumu wˌafaɲakˈazi wˈenu wˈote.|0
kufˈuŋɡa kwˈenu hˌuiʃˈia kwˈeɲe maɡˈomvi na mˌapiɡˈano, na kˌupiɡˈana nˈiɲi kwa nˈiɲi kwa ŋɡˈumi za uˈovu. hamwˈezi kufˈuŋɡa kˌama mnˌavjofˈaɲa lˈeo na kˌutazamˈia saˈuti zˈenu kˌusikˈiwa hˌuko ɟˈuu.|0
ɟˈe, hˌii n̩dˈijo aˈina ja mfˈuŋɡo nˌiliˌoutʃaɡˈua, sˈiku mˈoɟa tu ja ˈm̩tu kˌuɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza? ɟˈe, ni kwa kˌuinamˈiʃa kˈitʃwa tʃˈini kˌama tˈete, na kwa kˌuɟilˈaza ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na maɟˈivu? ɟˈe, hˈuo n̩dˈio mnˌaouˈita mfˈuŋɡo, sˈiku ˌilijˌokubalˈika kwa bwˈana.|0
ɟˈe, hˌii si n̩dˈijo aˈina ja mfˈuŋɡo nˌilijˌoitʃaɡˈua: kˌufuŋɡˈua mˌiɲorˈoro ja ˌuðalˈimu, na kˌufuŋɡˈua kˈamba za nˈira, kˌuwawˈeka hˈuru wˌaliˌoonˈewa, na kuvˈuɲɟa kˈila nˈira.|0
ɟˈe, sˈio kˌuʃirˌikiˈana tʃakˈula tʃˈako na wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa na kˌuwapatˈia maskˈini wˌasiokˈuwa na makˈao hifˈaði, ˌunapomwˈona alˈije ˈutʃi, umvˈike, wˈala si kˌumkimbˈia ˈm̩tu wa ɲˈama na dˈamu jˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
ndˈipo nˈuru jˈako ˌitaɟˌitokˈeza kˌama mˌapambazˈuko na ˌupoɲˈaɟi wˈako ˌutatokˈea upˈesi; ndˈipo hˈaki jˈako ˌitakˌapokˌutaŋɡulˈia mbˈele jˈako, na ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌutakˈuwa mlˈinzi ɲˈuma jˈako.|0
ndˈipo ˌutaˈita, nˌaje bwˈana ˌataɟˈibu, ˌutalˈia kuˈomba msaˈada, nˌaje ˌatasˈema: mˌimi hˈapa. kˌama ˌukiˌiondˈoa nˈira ja ˌuðalˈimu, na kˌuɲoˈoʃa kidˈole na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza maˈovu.|0
nˌaɲi kˌama mkˌimkuɲɟulˈia ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa nˈafsi zˈenu na kˌutoʃelˈeza mˌahitˈaɟi ja wˌaliˌoonˈewa, ndˈipo nˈuru jˈenu ˌitakˌapoŋɡˈaa ɡizˈani, nˌao usˈiku wˈenu ˌutakˈuwa kˌama ˌaðuhˈuri.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˌuoŋɡˈoza sˈiku zˈote, ˌatajˌatoʃelˈeza mˌahitˈaɟi jˈako katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame, nˌaje ˌataitˈia ŋɡˈuvu mifˈupa jˈako. ˌutakˈuwa kˌama bustˈani ˌilijˌoɲuˈeʃwa vizˈuri, kˌama tʃemtʃˈemi ambˈajo mˈaɟi jˌake hˌajakaˈuki kˈamwe.|0
wˈatu wˈako wˌataɟˈeŋɡa tˈena maɡˈofu ja zamˈani na kˌuinˈua misˈiŋɡi ja kˈale; ˌutaˈitwa mwˌeɲe kˌukarabˈati kˈuta zˌilizˌobomˈoka, mwˌeɲe kˌureɟˈeza bˌarabˈara za makˈao.|0
kˌama ˌukitˈunza miɡˈuu jˈako ˌisivˈuɲɟe sabˈato, na kˌutokufˈaɲa kˌama vˈile ˌupendˈavjo katˌika sˈiku jˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, kˌama ˌukiˈita sabˈato sˈiku ja furˈaha na sˈiku tˌakatˈifu ja bwˈana ja kˌuheʃimˈiwa, kˌama ˌutaˌiheʃˈimu kwa kˌutoenˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako mweɲˈewe, na kˌutokufˈaɲa jˌakupˌendezˈajo ˌau kusˈema manˈeno ja upˈuzi.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˌipatˈia furˈaha jˈako katˌika bwˈana, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa upˈande ɟˌuːja mˌiinˈuko ja ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuʃerˌehekˈea urˈiθi wa jakˈobo bˈaba jˈako. kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana kˌimenˈena hˈaja.|0
hakˈika mkˈono wa bwˈana si mfˈupi hˌata ˌusiwˈeze kˌuokˈoa, wˈala sikˈio lˈake si zˈito hˌata lˌisiwˈeze kˌusikˈia.|0
lakˈini maˈovu jˈenu jˌamewatˈeŋɡa nˈiɲi na mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ðˈambi zˈenu zˌimewafˈitʃa nˈiɲi ˈuso wˈake, ˌili ˌasisikˈie.|0
kwa maˈana mikˈono jˈenu ˌimetˈiwa mawˈaa kwa dˈamu na vidˈole vjˈenu kwa hatˈia. midˈomo jˈenu ˌimenˈena uˈoŋɡo, nˈazo ndˈimi zˈenu zˌimenoŋɡˈona mˈambo maˈovu.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajedˈai kwa hˈaki; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌetetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈake kwa hˈaki. wˌanatˌeɡemˈea mˌabiʃˈano matˈupu na kusˈema uˈoŋɡo, hˌutʃukˈua mˈimba ja maɡˈomvi na kuzˈaa uˈovu.|0
hˌuaŋɡˈua majˈai ja ɲˈoka wˌeɲe sˈumu kˈali na kutˈanda wˈavu wa bˌuibˈui. jejˈote alˈaje majˈai jˈao ˌatakˈufa, na wakˈati mˈoɟa lˌiaŋɡˌuliwˈapo, ɲˈoka hutˈoka hˈumo.|0
utˈando wˌao wa bˌuibˈui hˌaufˈai kwa ŋɡˈuo; hˌawawˈezi kˌuɟifunˈika kwa kˈile wˌalitʃˌokitˌeŋɡenˈeza. matˈendo jˈao ni matˈendo maˈovu, vitˈendo vja ɟeˈuri vˈipo mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
miɡˈuu jˈao hˌukimbilˈia kwˈeɲe ðˈambi, ni mjepˈesi kumwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia. mawˈazo jˈao ni mawˈazo maˈovu; ˌuharibˈifu na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi hˌuonekˈana katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
hˌawaɟˈui ɲɟˈia ja amˈani, hakˈuna hˈaki katˌika mapˈito jˈao. wˌamejˌaɡeˈuza kˌuwa ɲɟˈia za ˌupotˈovu, hakˈuna ˌapitˈaje ɲɟˈia hˈizo ˌatakˌajeˌifahˈamu amˈani.|0
hˈivjo ˌuadilˈifu ˈuko mbˈali nˈasi, nˈajo hˈaki hˌaitˌufikˈii. tˌunatˌazamˈia nˈuru, kˈumbe! jˈote ni ɡˈiza, tˌunatˌazamˈia mwˈaŋɡa, lakˈini tˌunatembˈea katˌika ɡˈiza kˈuu.|0
tˌunapapˈasa ukˈuta kˌama kipˈofu, tˌunapapˈasa katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈetu kˌama wˈatu wasˈio na mˈatʃo. ˌaðuhˈuri tˌunaɟikwˈaa kˌama wakˈati wa ɡˌizaɡˈiza; kˌatikˈati ja wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, tˈuko kˌama wˈafu.|0
wˈote tˌunaŋɡurˈuma kˌama dˈubu; tˌunalˈia kwa mˌaombolˈezo kˌama hˈua. tˌunatafˈuta hˈaki, kˈumbe hakˈuna kabˈisa; tˌunatafˈuta wokˈovu, lakˈini ˈuko mbˈali.|0
kwa sabˈabu makˈosa jˈetu ni mˈeŋɡi matʃˈoni pˈako, na ðˈambi zˈetu zˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈetu. makˈosa jˈetu jˈako pamˈoɟa nˌasi daˈima, nˌasi tˌunajˌatambˈua maˈovu jˈetu.|0
uˈasi na ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu ðˈidi ja bwˈana, kˌumɡeuzˈia mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kisˈoɡo, tˌukitʃotʃˈea ˌuðalˈimu na maˈasi, tˌukinˈena uˈoŋɡo ambˈao miˈojo jˈetu ˌimeˌuhifˈaði.|0
hˈivjo ˌuadilˈifu ˌumerudˈiʃwa ɲˈuma, nˈajo hˈaki ˌinasimˈama mbˈali, kwˈeli ˌimeɟikwˈaa ɲɟiˈani, ˌuaminˈifu hˌauwˈezi kˌuiŋɡˈia.|0
kwˈeli hˌaipˌatikˈani popˈote, na jejˈote ˌaepukˈaje uˈovu hˈuwa mawˈindo. bwˈana ˌalitazˈama nˌaje ˌakatʃukˈizwa kwˌamba hˌapakuwˈepo hˈaki.|0
ˌaliˈona kˌuwa hˌakuwˈepo hˌata ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa, ˌakaʃaŋɡˈaa kwˌamba hˌakuwˈepo hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kˌuiŋɡilˈia kˈati; hˈivjo mkˈono wˌake mweɲˈewe n̩dˈio ˌuliˌomfaɲˈia wokˈovu, nˈajo hˈaki jˌake mweɲˈewe n̩dˈijo ˌilijˌomteɡemˈeza.|0
ˌalivˈaa hˈaki kˌama dirˈii kˌifuˈani mwˈake, na tʃapˈeo ja wokˈovu kitʃwˈani mwˈake, ˌalivˈaa mavˈazi ja kisˈasi nˌaje ˌakaɟifˈuŋɡa wˈivu kˌama ɟˈoho.|0
kˌuliŋɡˈana na kˈile wˌalitʃokˈuwa wˌametˈenda, ndˈivjo ˌatakˌavjolˈipa ɣaðˈabu kwa watˈesi wˌake na kisˈasi kwa adˈui zˈake, ˌatavilˈipa visˈiwa sˈawa na wˌanavjˌostahˈili.|0
kˌuanzˈia mˌaɣarˈibi, wˈatu wˌatalˌioɡˈopa ɟˈina la bwˈana na kˌuanzˈia mawˈio ja ɟˈua, wˌataˌuheʃˈimu ˌutukˈufu wˈake. wakˈati adˈui ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa kˌama mˌafurˈiko, rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌatainˈua kiwˈaŋɡo ðˈidi jˌake na kumʃˈinda.|0
mkombˈozi ˌatakˈuɟa sajˈuni, kwa wˈale wa jakˈobo wˌanaˌozitˈubu ðˈambi zˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu mˈimi, hˈili ndˈilo aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˈao, asˈema bwˈana. rˈoho wˈaŋɡu, alˈije ɟˈuu jˈenu, na manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ambˈajo nˌimejawˈeka katˌika vˈiɲua vjˈenu, hˌavitˌaondˈoka vˌiɲuˈani mwˈenu, wˈala kutˈoka vˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa watˈoto wˈenu, wˈala kutˈoka vˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa wazˈao wˈao, kˌuanzˈia sˈasa na hˌata milˈele, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ondˈoka, aŋɡˈaza, kwa kˌuwa nˈuru jˈako ˌimekˈuɟa na ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌumezˈuka ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
tazˈama, ɡˈiza lˌitaˌifunˈika dunˈia na ɡˈiza kˈuu lˌitajˌafunˈika mˌataˈifa, lakˈini bwˈana ˌatazˈuka ɟˈuu jˈako na ˌutukˈufu wˌake ˌutaˌonekˈana ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
inˈua mˈatʃo jˈako na ˌutazˈame pˈande zˈote: wˈote wˌanakˌusaɲˈika na kˌukuɟˈia, wˈana wˈako wˌanakˈuɟa tˌoka mbˈali, nˌao bˈinti zˈako wˌanabˈebwa mˌikonˈoni.|0
ndˈipo ˌutatazˈama na kutˈiwa nˈuru, mˈojo wˈako ˌutasisˈimka na kuɟˈaa furˈaha, mˈali zilˈizo bˌaharˈini zˌitalˈetwa kwˈako, ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa ˌutakˌuɟilˈia.|0
makˈundi ja ŋɡamˈia jˌataɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, ŋɡamˈia viɟˈana wa mˌidiˈani na ˈefa. nˌao wˈote wˌatokˈao ʃˈeba wˌatakˈuɟa, wˌakitʃukˈua ðahˈabu na uvˈumba na kˌutaŋɡˈaza sˈifa za bwˈana.|0
makˈundi jˈote ja kedˈari jˌatakˌusaɲˈika kwˈako, kondˈoo dˈume wa nˌebajˈoθi wˌatakˌutumikˈia, wˌatakˌubalˈika kˌama sadˈaka ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitalipˈamba hekˈalu lˈaŋɡu tukˈufu.|0
ni nˈani hˈawa wˌarukˈao kˌama mawˈiŋɡu, kˌama hˈua kˌuelekˈea kwˈeɲe viˈota vjˈao.|0
hakˈika visˈiwa vˌinanˌitazˈama, mˌerikˈebu za tarʃˈiʃi ndˈizo zˌinazˌotaŋɡulˈia, zˌikiwalˈeta wˈana wˈenu kutˈoka mbˈali, wakˈiwa na fˈeða na ðahˈabu zˈao, kwa heʃˈima ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa maˈana ˌamekˌuɟalˈia ˌutukˈufu.|0
waɡˈeni wˌataziɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja kˈuta zˈako, na wafˈalme wˌao wˌatakˌutumikˈia. iŋɡˈawa katˌika hasˈira nˌilikupˈiɡa, lakˈini katˌika ˌupendelˈeo wˈaŋɡu nˌitakˌuoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma.|0
malˈaŋɡo jˈako jˌatakˈuwa wˈazi sˈiku zˈote, kˈamwe hˌajatafˈuŋɡwa, mtʃˈana wˈala usˈiku, ˌili wˈatu wapˈate kˌukuletˈea ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa: wafˈalme wˌao wˌakioŋɡˈoza mˌaandamˈano ja uʃˈindi.|0
kwa maˈana taˈifa ˌau ufˈalme ˈule ambˈao hˌautˌakutˌumikˈia ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈia; ˌutahˌaribˈiwa kabˈisa.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa lˌebanˈoni ˌutakˌuɟilˈia, msˌunobˈari, mvˈiɲɟe pamˈoɟa na mtˌeaʃˈuri, ˌili kˌupapˈamba mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu, nˌami nˌitapˌatukˈuza mahˈali pa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈana wa wˈale wˌaliˌokuonˈea wˌatakˈuɟa wˌakisuɟˈudu mbˈele jˈako, wˈote wˌanaˌokuðarˈau wˌatasuɟˈudu kwˈeɲe miɡˈuu jˈako, nˌao wˌatakuˈita ˈm̩ɟi wa bwˈana, sajˈuni ja alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌumeˈatʃwa na kˌutʃukˈiwa, bˌila jejˈote ˌanajˌesafˈiri ndˈani jˈako, nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌuwa fahˈari ja milˈele, na furˈaha ja vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
ˌutaɲˈoɲa mazˈiwa ja mˌataˈifa, na kˌuɲoɲˈeʃwa matˈiti ja wafˈalme. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˈimi, bwˈana, ni mwokˈozi wˈako, mkombˈozi wˈako, nilˈije mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa jakˈobo.|0
badˈala ja ʃˈaba nˌitakˌuletˈea ðahˈabu, na fˈeða badˈala ja tʃˈuma. badˈala ja ˈm̩ti nˌitakˌuletˈea ʃˈaba, na tʃˈuma badˈala ja mˈawe. nˌitafˈaɲa amˈani kˌuwa mtawˈala wˈako, na hˈaki kˌuwa mfˈalme wˈako.|0
ɟeˈuri hˌazitˌasikˈika tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, wˈala mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ˌau ˌuharibˈifu ndˈani ja mipˈaka jˈako, lakˈini ˌutaˈita kˈuta zˈako wokˈovu, na malˈaŋɡo jˈako sˈifa.|0
ɟˈua hˌalitakˈuwa tˈena nˈuru jˈako mtʃˈana, wˈala mwaŋɡˈaza wa mwˈezi hˌautˌakuˌaŋɡazˈia, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa nˈuru jˈako ja milˈele, nˌaje mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˈuwa ˌutukˈufu wˈako.|0
ɟˈua lˈako hˌalitazˈama tˈena, nˌao mwˈezi wˈako hˌautˌafifˈia tˈena; bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa nˈuru jˈako milˈele, nˈazo sˈiku zˈako za huzˈuni zˌitakˈoma.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˈako wˈote wˌatakˈuwa wˌaadilˈifu, nˌao wˌataˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi milˈele. wˌao ni tʃˌipukˈizi nˌililˌolipˈanda, kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈaŋɡu, ˌili kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu.|0
alˈije mdˈoɡo kwˈenu ˌatakˈuwa ˈelfu, mdˈoɡo kulˈiko wˈote ˌatakˈuwa taˈifa lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana; katˌika wakˈati wˌake nˌitajˌatimˈiza hˈaja upˈesi.|0
rˈoho wa bwˈana mweɲˈezi ju ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamenitˈia mafˈuta kˌuwahˌubirˈia maskˈini habˈari ɲɟˈema. ˌamenitˈuma kˌuwaɡˈaŋɡa wˌaliˌovuɲɟˈika mˈojo, kˌuwatˌaŋɡazˈia matˈeka uhˈuru wˈao, na hˈao wˌaliofˈuŋɡwa habˈari za kˌufuŋɡulˈiwa kwˈao.|0
kˌutaŋɡˈaza mwˈaka wa bwˈana ˌuliˌokubalˈiwa, na sˈiku ja kisˈasi ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, kˌuwafarˈiɟi wˈote wˌaombˌolezˈao.|0
na kuwˈapa mˌahitˈaɟi wˈale wˌanaˌohuzunˈika katˌika sajˈuni, ˌili kuwˈapa tˈaɟi ja uzˈuri badˈala ja maɟˈivu, mafˈuta ja furˈaha badˈala ja mˌaombolˈezo, vˈazi la sˈifa badˈala ja rˈoho ja kukˈata tamˈaa. nˌao wˌataˈitwa mˌialˈoni ja hˈaki, pˈando la bwˈana, ˌili kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
wˌataɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja maɡˈofu ja zamˈani na kˌupatˌeŋɡenˈeza mahˈali pˌalipoˈatʃwa ukˈiwa zamˈani; wˌatafˈaɲa ˈupja mˈiɟi ˌilijˌoharibˈiwa, ˌilijoˈatʃwa ukˈiwa kwa vizˈazi vˈiŋɡi.|0
waɡˈeni wˌatajatʃˈuŋɡa makˈundi jˈenu, waɡˈeni wˌatafˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika maʃˈamba jˈenu, na kutˈunza maʃˈamba jˈenu ja mˌizabˈibu.|0
nˌaɲi mtaˈitwa mˌakuhˈani wa bwˈana, mtaˈitwa wˌatumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. mtakˈula ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa, nˌaɲi katˌika ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao mtˌaɟisˈifu.|0
badˈala ja aˈibu jˈao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatapokˈea sehˈemu mˌaradˈufu, na badˈala ja feðˈeha wˌatafˌurahˈia katˌika urˈiθi wˈao; hˈivjo wˌatarˈiθi sehˈemu mˌaradˈufu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, nˈajo furˈaha ja milˈele ˌitakˈuwa jˈao.|0
kwa maˈana mˈimi, bwˈana, napˈenda hˈaki, na nˌinatʃukˈia ˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲi na uˈovu. katˌika ˌuaminˈifu wˈaŋɡu nˌitawˈapa malˈipo jˈao na kufˈaɲa aɡˈano la milˈele nˈao.|0
wazˈao wˌao wˌataɟˌulikˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, na uzˈao wˌao mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kabˈila za wˈatu. wˈale wˈote wˌatakˌaowaˈona wˌatatambˈua kˌuwa ni taˈifa ambˈalo bwˈana ˌamelˌibarˈiki.|0
nˌinafˌurahˈia sˈana katˌika bwˈana, nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌinaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu. kwa maˈana ˌamenivˈika mavˈazi ja wokˈovu, na kˌunipˈamba kwa ɟˈoho la hˈaki, kˌama vˈile bwˈana arˈusi ˌapambˈavjo kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kˌama kuhˈani, na kˌama bˈibi arˈusi ˌaɟipambˈavjo kwa vˈito vjˈake vja θamˈani.|0
kwa maˈana kˌama vˈile ˈarði ˌifaɲˈavjo tʃˌipukˈizi kuˈota, na bustˈani ˌisabˌabiʃˈavjo mbˈeɡu kuˈota, ndˈivjo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌatafˈaɲa hˈaki na sˈifa zˌitʃipˈuke mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja sajˈuni sˌitaɲamˈaza, kwa aɟˈili ja jˌerusalˈemu sˌitatulˈia, mpˈaka hˈaki jˌake ˌitakˌapoaŋɡˈaza kˌama mˌapambazˈuko, wokˈovu wˌake kˌama mwˈaŋɡa wa mˈoto.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌataˈona hˈaki jˈako, nˌao wafˈalme wˈote wˌataˈona ˌutukˈufu wˈako; wˌewe ˌutaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina ɟˈipja lˈile ambˈalo kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana kˌitatˈamka.|0
ˌutakˈuwa tˈaɟi ja fahˈari mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, tˈaɟi ja kifˈalme mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
hˌawatˌakuˈita tˈena ˌalijeˈatʃwa, wˈala ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kˌuiˈita ukˈiwa. bˌali ˌutaˈitwa hefsˈiba, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌitaˈitwa beˈula, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌatakˌufurahˈia, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ˌitaolˈewa.|0
kˌama vˈile kiɟˈana ˌaoˈavjo mwˌanamwˈali, ndˈivjo wanˈao wˌatakˌavjokuˈoa wˈewe; kˌama bwˈana arˈusi ˌamfurˌahiˈavjo bˈibi arˈusi wˈake, ndˈivjo mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌavjokˌufurahˈia wˈewe.|0
nˌimewˈeka walˈinzi ɟˌuːja kˈuta zˈako, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, hˌawatˌaɲamˈaza mtʃˈana wˈala usˈiku. nˈiɲi wˌeɲe kumwˈita bwˈana, msˌitulˈie.|0
msimwˈatʃe ˌapumzˈike hˌadi ˌatakˌapoufˈaɲa imˈara jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuufˈaɲa ˈuwe sˈifa ja dunˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌameˈapa kwa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume na kwa mkˈono wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu: kˈamwe sˌitawˈapa tˈena adˈui zˈenu nafˈaka zˈenu kˌama tʃakˈula tʃˈao; kˈamwe waɡˈeni hˌawatakˈuɲua tˈena divˈai ˈm̩pja ambˈajo mmˌeitˌaabikˈia.|0
lakˈini wˈale wˌaivunˈao nafˈaka wˌataˈila na kumsˈifu bwˈana, nˌao wˈale wˌakusaɲˈao zabˈibu wˌataˈiɲua divˈai jˌake katˌika ɲˈua za pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu.|0
pitˈeni, pitˈeni katˌika malˈaŋɡo! tˌeŋɡenezˈeni ɲɟˈia kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu. ɟeŋɡˈeni, ɟeŋɡˈeni ɲɟˈia kˈuu! ˌondoˈeni mˈawe. ˌinuˈeni bendˈera kwa aɟˈili ja mˌataˈifa.|0
bwˈana ˌametˈoa taŋɡˈazo mpˈaka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia: mwambˈie bˈinti sajˈuni, tazˈama, mwokˈozi wˈako ˌanakˈuɟa! tazˈama uɟˈira wˌake ˈuko pamˈoɟa nˈaje, na malˈipo jˌake jˌanafˌuatˈana nˈaje!.|0
wˌataˈitwa wˈatu wˌatakatˈifu, wˌaliˌokombolˈewa na bwˈana; nˌawe ˌutaˈitwa ˌalijˌetafˈutwa, ˈm̩ɟi ˌusioˈatʃwa tˈena.|0
ni nˈani hˈuju ˌanajekˈuɟa kutˈoka edˈomu, kutˈoka bˈosra, mwˌeɲe mavˈazi jˌalijotˈiwa madˈoa mekˈundu? ni nˈani hˈuju, ˌalijevˈikwa ɟˈoho la kˌifahˈari, ˌanajˌetembˈea kwa ukˈuu wa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake? mˌimi ndˈimi, nˌisemˈaje katˌika hˈaki, mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wa kˌuokˈoa.|0
kwa nˈini mavˈazi jˈako ni mekˈundu, kˌama ja jˈule ˌakaɲaɡˈaje ʃˌinikˈizo la zabˈibu.|0
nˌimekaɲˈaɡa ʃˌinikˈizo la zabˈibu pˈeke jˈaŋɡu; kutˈoka mˌataˈifa hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈami. nˌimewapˈonda kwa miɡˈuu katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na kˌuwakaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu; dˈamu jˈao ˌilitˈia matˈone kwˈeɲe mavˈazi jˈaŋɡu, na kutˈia madˈoa ŋɡˈuo zˈaŋɡu zˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja kisˈasi ˌilikˈuwa mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, mwˈaka wa ˌukombˈozi wˈaŋɡu ˌumefˈika.|0
nˌilitazˈama, lakˈini hˌakuwˈepo jejˈote wa kˌunisˌaidˈia, nˌiliʃaŋɡˈaa kwa kˌuwa hˌakuwˈepo jejˈote ˌalijetˈoa msaˈada; hˈivjo mkˈono wˈaŋɡu weɲˈewe n̩dˈio ˌuliˌonifaɲˈia wokˈovu, na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe n̩dˈijo ˌilijˌonitˌeɡemˈeza.|0
nˌilikaɲˈaɡa mˌataˈifa kwa miɡˈuu katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu nˌiliwˌalewˈeʃa, na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu jˈao ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
nˌitasˌimulˈia ɟˌuːja wˈema wa bwˈana, kwa matˈendo ambˈajo apˈaswa kˌusifˈiwa, sˌawasˈawa na jˈote ambˈajo bwˈana ˌametˈenda kwa aɟˈili jˈetu: nˈaam, mˈambo mˈeŋɡi mˈema ˌalijˌojatˈenda kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, sˌawasˈawa na hurˈuma zˌake na wˈema wˌake mwˈiŋɡi.|0
ˌalisˈema, hakˈika wˌao ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˈana ambˈao hˌawatˌanidaŋɡˈaɲa; hˈivjo akˈawa mwokˈozi wˈao.|0
katˌika taˈabu zˈao zˈote nˌaje ˌalitˌaabˈika, na mˌalaˈika wa ˈuso wˌake ˌakawˌaokˈoa. katˌika upˈendo wˌake na rehˈema zˌake ˌaliwˌakombˈoa, ˌakawˌainˈua na kˌuwatʃukˈua sˈiku zˈote zˌilizopˈita.|0
lakˈini wˌaliˈasi, na kˌumhuzunˈiʃa rˈoho mtˌakatˈifu wˈake. hˈivjo ˌaliɡeˈuka na kˌuwa adˈui jˈao, na jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌakapiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈao.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˌake wˌakazˌikumbˈuka sˈiku zˌilizopˈita, sˈiku za mˈose na wˈatu wˈake: jˈuko wˈapi jˌeje ˌalijˌewalˈeta kˌupitˈia kˌatikˈati ja bahˈari, pamˈoɟa na wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa kˈundi lˈake? jˈuko wˈapi jˈule ˌalijewˈeka rˈoho wˌake mtˌakatˈifu kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
ˌalijetˈuma mkˈono wˌake ˌuliˌotukˈuka wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌuwa katˌika mkˈono wa kuˈume wa mˈose, ˌalijeɡˈawa mˈaɟi ja bahˈari mbˈele jˈao, ˌili kˌuɟipatˈia ɟˈina milˈele.|0
ˌalijˌewaoŋɡˈoza kˌupitˈia kwˈeɲe vilˈindi? kˌama farˈasi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ilˈijo wˈazi, wˌao hˌawakˌuɟikwˈaa.|0
kˌama ŋɡˈombe wˌaʃukˈao bondˈeni kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo, wˌalipˈewa pumzˈiko na rˈoho wa bwˈana. hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌulivjˌowaoŋɡˈoza wˈatu wˈako ˌili kˌuɟipatˈia mweɲˈewe ɟˈina tukˈufu.|0
tazˈama tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni ˌukaˈone kutˈoka kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa ɟˈuu, kˌitakatˈifu na kˌitukˈufu. ˈuko wˈapi wˈivu wˈako na uwˈeza wˈako? ˌumetˌuzuilˈia wˈema wˈako na hurˈuma zˈako.|0
lakˈini wˌewe ni bˈaba jˈetu, iŋɡˈawa ˌabrahˈamu hˌatufahˈamu sˌisi wˈala ˌisraˈeli hˌatutambˈui; wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ndˈiwe bˈaba jˈetu, mkombˈozi wˈetu ʃˈu zamˈani za kˈale ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, kwa nˈini ˌunatuˈatʃa twˈende mbˈali na ɲɟˈia zˈako, na kˌuifˈaɲa miˈojo jˈetu miɡˈumu hˌata hˌatukˌukuheʃˈimu? rˈudi kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako, jˈale mˌakabˈila ambˈajo ni urˈiθi wˈako.|0
kwa maˈana kwa mˈuda mfˈupi wˈatu wˈako wˌalimilˈiki mahˈali pˈako pˌatakatˈifu, lakˈini sˈasa adˈui zˈetu wˌamepˌakaɲˈaɡa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈako.|0
sˌisi tˌumekˈuwa kˌama wˈale ambˈao hˌuɟawˌatawˈala kˈamwe, kˌama wˈale ambˈao hˌawaɟaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
laˈiti ˌuŋɡelˌipasˈua mbˈiŋɡu na kuʃˈuka tʃˈini, ˌili milˈima ˌiŋɡelˌitetemˈeka mbˈele zˈako.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈoto ˌutekˌetezˈavjo viɟˈiti na kˌusababˈiʃa mˈaɟi kutʃˈemka, ʃˈuka ˌukafˈaɲe ɟˈina lˈako lˌiɟulikˈane kwa adˈui zˈako, na kˌusababˈiʃa mˌataˈifa jˌatetemˈeke mbˈele zˈako.|0
kwa maˈana ˌulipofˈaɲa mˈambo ja kutˈiʃa ambˈajo hˌatukˌujatˌazamˈia, ˌuliʃˈuka, nˈajo milˈima ˌikatˌetemˈeka mbˈele zˈako.|0
ʃˈu ɲakˈati za zamˈani hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌesikˈia, hakˈuna sikˈio lˌililˌotambˈua, hakˈuna ɟˈitʃo lˌililomwˈona mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˈila wˈewe, ˌanajetˈenda mˈambo kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌamŋɡoɟeˈao.|0
ˌuliwˌasaidˈia wˈatu wˈale wˌatendˈao jalˈijo hˈaki kwa furˈaha, wˈale wˌazikˌumbukˈao ɲɟˈia zˈako. lakˈini wakˈati tˌulipˌoendelˈea kutˈenda ðˈambi kiɲˈume na ɲɟˈia zˈako, ˌulikˌasirˈika. tˌutawezˈaɟe bˌasi kˌuokolˈewa.|0
sˌisi sˈote tˌumekˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩tu alˈije naɟˈisi, nˈajo matˈendo jˈetu jˈote ja ˌuadilˈifu ni kˌama mˌatambˈaa matʃˈafu; sˌisi sˈote tˌunasiɲˈaa kˌama ɟˈani, na kˌama upˈepo maˈovu jˈetu hˌutupˌeperˈuʃa.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajˌeliitˈia ɟˈina lˈako wˈala ˌanajˌeɟitahˈidi kˌukuʃˈika, kwa kˌuwa ˌumetufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈako na kˌutuˈatʃa tˌuðoofˈike kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈetu.|0
lakˈini, ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe ndˈiwe bˈaba jˈetu. sˌisi ni udˈoŋɡo, wˌewe n̩dˈije mfiɲˈanzi; sˌisi sˈote tu kˈazi ja mkˈono wˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌusikˌasirˈike kupˈita kiˈasi, ˌusizˌikumbˈuke ðˈambi zˈetu milˈele. ˈee bwˈana, ˌutuˌaŋɡalˈie, twˌakuˈomba, kwa kˌuwa sˌisi sˈote tu wˈatu wˈako.|0
mˈiɟi jˈako mˌitakatˈifu ˌimekˈuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa; hˌata sajˈuni ni ɟˈaŋɡwa, jˌerusalˈemu ni ukˈiwa.|0
hekˈalu lˈetu tˌakatˈifu na tukˈufu, mahˈali ambˈapo bˈaba zˈetu wˌalikusˈifu wˈewe, lˌimetʃˈomwa kwa mˈoto, nˈavjo vˈitu vjˈote tˌulivjˌoviθamˈini vˌimehˌaribˈika.|0
ˈee bwˈana, baˌada ja hˈaja jˈote, ˌutaɟˌizuˈia? ɟˈe, ˌutaɲamˈaza kˈimja na kˌutuaðˈibu kupˈita kiˈasi.|0
nˌiliɟˌifunˈua kwa wˈatu wˈale ambˈao hˌawakˌuniˌulizˈia. nˌimeˌonekˈana na wˈatu wˈale ambˈao hˌawakˌunitafˈuta. kwa taˈifa lˈile ambˈalo hˌalikˌuliˈita ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, nˌilisˈema, nˈiko hˈapa, nˈiko hˈapa..|0
mtʃˈana kˈutwa nˌimeˌiɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu kwa wˈatu wˌakaˈidi, wˌanaokwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia ambˈazo si nzˈuri, wˌafuatˈao mawˈazo jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
taˈifa ambˈalo daˈima hˌunikˌasirˈiʃa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, wˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu katˌika bustˈani na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu za mˌatofˈali.|0
wˈatu wˌaketˈio kˌatikˈati ja mˌakabˈuri na kukˈeʃa mahˈali pa sˈiri, walˈao ɲˈama za ŋɡurˈuwe, nˈazo sˌufurˈia zˈao zˈina mtʃˈuzi wa ɲˈama zilˈizo naɟˈisi.|0
wˌasemˈao, kˈaa mbˈali; ˌusinˌikaribˈie, kwa maˈana mˌimi ni mtˌakatˈifu ˈm̩no kwˈako! wˈatu wa aˈina hˈijo ni mˈoʃi katˌika pˈua zˈaŋɡu, ni mˈoto ˌuwakˈao mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
tazˈama, ɟˈambo hˈili hˌubakˈia lˌimeandˈikwa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu: sˌitaɲamˈaza, bˌali nˌitalipˈiza kwa ˌukamilˈifu; nˌitalipˈiza mˌapaɟˈani m̩wˈao.|0
ðˈambi zˈenu na ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈenu, asˈema bwˈana. kwa sabˈabu wˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja milˈima na kˌunitʃokˈoza mˌimi ɟˌuːja vilˈima, nˌitawˌapimˈia mˌapaɟˈani m̩wˈao malˈipo mˌakamilˈifu kwa matˈendo jˈao ja zamˈani.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kˌama vˈile divˈai ˈm̩pja iŋɡˈali bˈado ˌinapˌatikˈana katˌika kiʃˈada tʃa zabˈibu, nˌao wˈatu husˈema, ˌusikˌiharˈibu, kwa kˌuwa bˈado kˈuna kˈitu kizˈuri ndˈani jˈake, hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjofˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu; sˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈote.|0
nˌitawalˈeta wazˈao kutˈoka kwa jakˈobo, na kutˈoka kwa jˈuda wˈale wˌatakˌaomilˈiki milˈima jˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌateˈule wˌatairˈiθi, nˈako hˌuko wˌataˈiʃi wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃarˈoni ˌitakˈuwa malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi ja kondˈoo, na bˈonde la akˈori mahˈali pa kˌupumzikˈia kwa makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe, kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanaˌonitafˈuta.|0
bˌali kwˈenu nˈiɲi mnˌaomwˈatʃa bwˈana na kˌuusahˈau mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu, nˈiɲi mnˌaoandˈaa mˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja bahˈati, na kuɟˈaza mˌabakˈuli ja mvˈiɲo ˌuliˌotʃaŋɡˈaɲua kwa aɟˈili ja aɟˈali.|0
nˌitawˌaaɡˈiza ˈm̩fe kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌaɲi ɲˈote mtˌainˈama tʃˈini ˌili kutʃˈiɲɟua; kwa kˌuwa nˌiliwaˈita lakˈini hˌamkuitˈika, nˌilisˈema lakˈini hˌamkusˌikilˈiza. mlitˈenda maˈovu matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, nˌaɲi mkˌatʃaɡˈua mˈambo jˈale jˌanajˌonitʃukˈiza.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˌatakˈula, lakˈini nˈiɲi mtaˈona ɲɟˈaa; wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˌatakˈuɲua lakˈini nˈiɲi mtaˈona kˈiu; wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˌatafurˈahi, lakˈini nˈiɲi mtaˈona hˈaja.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˌataˈimba kwa furˈaha ja miˈojo jˈao, lakˈini nˈiɲi mtalˈia kˌutokˈana na utʃˈuŋɡu wa mojˈoni, na kupˈiɡa jˈowe kwa sabˈabu ja utʃˈuŋɡu wa rˈoho zˈenu.|0
mtˌaliˈatʃa ɟˈina lˈenu kˌuwa laˈana kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaliˌotʃaɡulˈiwa; bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌatawaˈua nˈiɲi, lakˈini wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ˌatawˈapa ɟˈina ɟiŋɡˈine.|0
jˌeje ˌaombˈaje barˈaka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌatafˈaɲa hˈivjo kwa mˈuŋɡu wa kwˈeli; jˌeje ˌaapˈaje katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌataˈapa kwa mˈuŋɡu wa kwˈeli. kwa kˌuwa taˈabu za zamˈani zˌitasˌahaulˈika na kufˈitʃwa kutˈoka matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu.|0
tazˈama, nˌitaˈumba mbˈiŋɡu ˈm̩pja na dunˈia ˈm̩pja. mˈambo ja zamˈani hˌajatˌakumbˈukwa, wˈala hˌajatakˈuɟa ˌakilˈini.|0
lakˈini fˌurahˈini na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia daˈima katˌika hˈivi nˌitakˌavjoˈumba, kwa kˌuwa nˌitaˈumba jˌerusalˈemu ˈuwe wa kˌupendˈeza, nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˈawe furˈaha.|0
nˌami nˌitaˌifurahˈia jˌerusalˈemu na kˌuwafˌurahˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu; saˈuti ja mˌaombolˈezo na ja kilˈio hˌaitˌasikˈika hˈumo tˈena.|0
kˈamwe hˌatakuwˈepo tˈena ndˈani jˌake mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi sˈiku tʃˈatʃe tˈu, ˌau m̩zˈee ambˈaje hˌataˈiʃi ˌakatimˈiza miˈaka jˈake. jˌeje ˌatakˌajekˈufa akˈiwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa ˌatahˌesabˈiwa kwˌamba ni kiɟˈana tˈu, jˌeje ambˈaje hˌatafˈika miˈaka mˈia mˈoɟa, ˌatahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa ˌamelˌaanˈiwa.|0
wˌataɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba na kuˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake; wˌatapˈanda maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na kˈula matˈunda jˈake.|0
hˌawataɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba, nˌao wˈatu weŋɡˈine waˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, ˌau kupˈanda mazˈao na weŋɡˈine wˈale. kwa kˌuwa kˌama zilˈivjo sˈiku za ˈm̩ti, ndˈivjo zˌitakˌavjokˈuwa sˈiku za wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˌateˈule wˈaŋɡu wˌatafˌurahˈia kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi kˈazi za mikˈono jˈao.|0
hˌawatˌaɟitˌaabˈiʃa kwa kˈazi bˈure, wˈala hˌawatazˈaa watˈoto ˌili wapˈatwe na maɟˈaŋɡa, kwa kˌuwa wˌatakˈuwa taˈifa lˌililˌobarikˈiwa na bwˈana, wˌao na wazˈao wˌao pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
kˈabla hˌawaɟaˈita, nˌitaɟˈibu, nˌao wakˈiwa katˌika kunˈena, nˌitasikˈia.|0
ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu na mwˌanakondˈoo wˌatalˈiʃa pamˈoɟa, nˌaje sˈimba ˌatakˈula ɲˈasi kˌama maksˈai, lakˈini mavˈumbi jˌatakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ɲˈoka. hˌawataðˈuru wˈala kˌuharˈibu katˌika mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu wˈote, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mbˈiŋɡu ni kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ˈenzi, nˈajo dunˈia ni mahˈali pa kuwˈeka miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu. ˈiko wˈapi ɲˈumba mtˌakajˌoiɟˈeŋɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu? mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pa kˌupumzikˈia pˌatakˈuwa wˈapi.|0
ɟˈe, mkˈono wˈaŋɡu hˌaukufˈaɲa vˈitu hˈivi vjˈote, hˈivjo vˌikapˈata kuwˈepo? asˈema bwˈana. ˈm̩tu hˈuju n̩dˈije nˌinajˌemθamˈini: jˌeje ambˈaje ni mɲˌeɲekˈevu na mwˌeɲe rˈoho jˌeɲe tˈoba, ˌatetˌemekˈaje ˌasikiˈapo nˈeno lˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini jejˈote ˌatoˈaje ðabˈihu ja fahˈali ni kˌama jˌeje ˌauˈaje ˈm̩tu, na jejˈote ˌatoˈaje sadˈaka ja mwˌanakondˈoo, ni kˌama jˈule ˌavuɲɟˈaje ʃˈiŋɡo ja ˈm̩bwa. jejˈote ˌatoˈaje sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, ni kˌama jˈule ˌaletˈaje dˈamu ja ŋɡurˈuwe, na jejˈote ˌafukizˈaje uvˈumba wa kˌumbukˈumbu, ni kˌama jˈule ˌaabudˈuje sanˈamu. wˌameɟˌitʃaɡulˈia ɲɟˈia zˈao weɲˈewe, nˈazo nˈafsi zˈao zˌinafˌurahˈia mˌatʃukˈizo jˈao.|0
hˈivjo, mˌimi pˈia nˌitawˌatʃaɡulˈia mapˈiɡo makˈali, nˌami nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao kˈile wˌanatʃˌokioɡˈopa. kwa maˈana nˌilipoˈita, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijeɟˈibu, nˌiliposˈema, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌesikilˈiza. wˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu na kˌutʃaɡˈua lˈile lˌinalˌonitʃukˈiza.|0
sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, nˈiɲi mtˌetemekˈao kwa nˈeno lˈake: ndˈuɡu zˈenu wˌanaˌowatʃukˈia nˈiɲi na kˌuwatˈeŋɡa nˈiɲi kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, wˌamesˈema, bwˈana na ˌatukˈuzwe, ˌili tupˈate kuˈona furˈaha jˈenu! hˌata sˈasa wˌataˌaibˈika.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈizo ɣasˈia kutˈoka mɟˈini, sˌikiˈeni hˈizo kelˈele kutˈoka hˌekalˈuni! ni saˈuti ja bwˈana ˌikiwalˈipa adˈui zˌake jˈote wˌanajˌostahˈili.|0
kˈabla hˌaɟasikˈia utˈuŋɡu, ˌalizˈaa; kˈabla hˌaɟapˈata mˌaumˈivu, ˌalizˈaa mtˈoto mwˌanaˈume.|0
ni nˈani ˌamepˈata kˌusikˈia ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili? ni nˈani ˌamepˈata kuˈona mˈambo kˌama hˈaja? ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi jawˈeza kˌuzalˈiwa kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa, ˌau taˈifa lawˈeza kˌutokˈea mˈara? mˈara sajˈuni ˌalipoˈona utˈuŋɡu, ˌalizˈaa watˈoto wˈake.|0
ɟˈe, nilˈete mwˈana hˌadi wakˈati wa kˌuzalˈiwa na nˌisizalˈiʃe? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, nifˈuŋɡe tˈumbo la uzˈazi wakˈati mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌizaliʃˈaje? asˈema mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni pamˈoɟa na jˌerusalˈemu na mfurˈahi kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaompˈenda, ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni kwa ŋɡˈuvu pamˈoɟa nˈaje, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaoˌombolˈeza ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa mtaɲˈoɲa na kˌutoʃˈeka katˌika farˈaɟa ja matˈiti jˈake; mtakˈuɲua sˈana, na kˌuufˌurahˈia wˈiŋɡi wa mˌafurˈiko ja ustˈawi wˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitamwˌoŋɡezˈea amˈani kˌama ˈm̩to, nˌao ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa kˌama kiɟˈito kˌifurikˈatʃo; ˌutaɲˈoɲa na kˌutʃukulˈiwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈake na kˌubembelˈezwa mˌaɡotˈini pˈake.|0
kˌama mˈama ˌanavjˌomfarˈiɟi mtˈoto wˈake, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokˌufarˈiɟi wˈewe, nˌawe ˌutafˌariɟˈiwa hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wakˈati mtˌakapoˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, miˈojo jˈenu ˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia, nˌaɲi mtastˈawi kˌama maɟˈani; mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌutaɟˌulikˈana kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, bˌali ɣaðˈabu jˌake kˈali ˌitaoɲˈeʃwa kwa adˈui zˈake.|0
tazˈama, bwˈana ˌanakˈuɟa na mˈoto, maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita ni kˌama upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli, ˌataterˈemʃa hasˈira jˌake kwa ɣaðˈabu kˈali, na kˌaripˈio lˈake pamˈoɟa na miˈali ja mˈoto.|0
kwa maˈana kwa mˈoto na kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌake bwˈana ˌatatˌekelˈeza hukˈumu ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈote, nˌao wˈeŋɡi wˌatakˈuwa ni wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa na bwˈana.|0
wˈatu wˈote wˌanaˌoɟiwˈeka wˈakfu na kˌuɟitakˈasa weɲˈewe ˌili kwˈenda bˌustanˈini, wˌakimfuˈata alˈije kˌatikˈati ja wˈale ambˈao hˈula ɲˈama za ŋɡurˈuwe na pˈaɲa pamˈoɟa na vˈitu viŋɡˈine vilˈivjo mˌatʃukˈizo, wˌatafikˈia mwˈiʃo wˌao pamˈoɟa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˈami, kwa sabˈabu ja matˈendo jˈao na mawˈazo jˈao, nˈiko karˈibu kˈuɟa na kˌukusˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˈote na lˈuɣa zˈote, nˌao wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuuˈona ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitawˈeka iʃˈara kˌatikˈati jˈao, nˌami nˌitapelˈeka baˈaði ja hˈao wˌaliˌonusurˈika kwa mˌataˈifa, hˌadi tarʃˈiʃi, kwa pˈuli na walˈudi wˌanaˌoɟulikˈana kˌama wapˈiɡa upˈinde, kwa tubˈali na ˌujunˈani, hˌadi visˈiwa vja mbˈali ambˈavjo hˌaviɟˌasikˈia ɟˌuːja sˈifa zˈaŋɡu ˌau kˌuuˈona ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu. wˌatataŋɡˈaza ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
nˌao wˌatawalˈeta ndˈuɡu zˈenu wˈote, kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu katˌika jˌerusalˈemu kˌama sadˈaka kwa bwˈana, ɟˌuːja farˈasi, katˌika maɡˈari ja vˈita na maɡˈari makˈubwa, ɟˌuːja ɲˈumbu na ŋɡamˈia, asˈema bwˈana. wˌatawalˈeta, kˌama wˌaisraˈeli wˌaletˈavjo sadˈaka zˈao za nafˈaka, katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana, katˌika vjˈombo sˈafi kwa kˌufuˈata destˈuri za ibˈada.|0
nˌami nˌitatʃaɡˈua baˈaði jˈao pˈia wˈawe mˌakuhˈani na walˈawi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kˌama vˈile mbˈiŋɡu ˈm̩pja na ˈn̩tʃi ˈm̩pja nˌinazˌozifˈaɲa zˌitakˌavjodˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, ndˈivjo ɟˈina lˈenu na wazˈao wˈenu wˌatakˌavjodˈumu.|0
kutˈoka mwˈezi ˈm̩pja hˌata mwiŋɡˈine, na kutˈoka sabˈato hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine, wˌanadˈamu wˈote wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌao wˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe na kuˈona maˈiti za wˈale wˌaliˌoniˈasi mˈimi. fˈunza wˌao hˌawatakˈufa, wˈala mˈoto wˌao hˌautˌazimˈika, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza sˈana kwa wˌanadˈamu wˈote.|0
manˈeno ja jˌeremˈia mwˈana wa hilkˈia, mmˈoɟa wa mˌakuhˈani katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa ˌanaθˈoθi, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa josˈia mwˈana wa amˈoni mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
na pˈia wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mpˈaka mwˈezi wa tˈano wa mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa wa ˌutawˈala wa sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, wakˈati wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌalipˌopelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌiliniɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
kˈabla sˌiɟakuˈumba ndˈani ja tˈumbo la mˈama jˈako, nˌilikuɟˈua; kˈabla hˌuɟazalˈiwa nˌilikutˈeŋɡa kwa kˈazi maˈalum; nˌilikuwˈeka ˈuwe nabˈii kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
nˌami nˌikasˈema, ˈaa, bwˈana mweɲˈezi, siɟˈui kusˈema, kwˈani mˌimi ni mtˈoto mdˈoɡo tˈu.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌusisˈeme, mˌimi ni mtˈoto mdˈoɡo tˈu. ˌutaˈenda popˈote nˌitakˌapokutˈuma na kunˈena lolˈote nˌitakˌalokˌuaɡˈiza.|0
ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope, kwa maˈana nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˌawe nˌikuokˈoe, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake na kuɡˈusa kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, ˌakanˌiambˈia, sˈasa nˌimejawˈeka manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kˌiɲuˈani mwˈako.|0
tazˈama, lˈeo nˌimekuwˈeka ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa na fˈalme ˌili kuŋɡˈoa na kˌubomˈoa, kˌuharˈibu na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza, kuɟˈeŋɡa na kupˈanda.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema, ɟˈe, jˌeremˈia ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌami nˌikaɟˈibu, naˈona tˈawi la ˈm̩ti wa mlˈozi.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌumeˈona vjˈema kwa maˈana nˌinalˌiaŋɡalˈia nˈeno lˈaŋɡu ˌili kuˈona kwˌamba lˌimetimˈizwa.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia tˈena, ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikaɟˈibu, naˈona tʃˈuŋɡu kˌinatʃotʃˈemka, kikˈiwa kˌimeinˈama kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini maˈafa jˌatamwˈaɡwa kwa wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitawaˈita wˈatu wˈote wa fˈalme za kˌaskazˈini, asˈema bwˈana. wafˈalme wˌao wˌatakˈuɟa na kuwˈeka vˈiti vjˈao vja ˈenzi katˌika mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu, wˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja kˈuta zˌake zˈote zˌinazˌouzuŋɡˈuka, na ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda.|0
nˌitatˈoa hukˈumu zˈaŋɡu kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˌao wa kˌuniˈatʃa mˈimi, kwa kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kˌuabˈudu kˈile ambˈatʃo mikˈono jˈao ˌimekˌiteŋɡenˈeza.|0
ɟˌiandˈae! simˈama usˈeme tʃotʃˈote nˌitakˌatʃokˌuamˈuru. ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope, la sˈivjo nˌitakufˈaɲa ˌuwaoɡˈope wˈao.|0
lˈeo nˌimekufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈome, ŋɡˈuzo ja tʃˈuma, na ukˈuta wa ʃˈaba ˌili kˌusimˈama ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote: ðˈidi ja wafˈalme wa jˈuda, mˌaafˈisa wˈake, mˌakuhˈani wˌake na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
wˌatapiɡˈana nˌawe lakˈini hˌawatˌakuʃˈinda, kwa kˌuwa nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌami nˌitakˌuokˈoa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌiliniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukahubˈiri mˌasikiˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu:  nˌakumbˈuka mˈojo wˈako wa utʃˈaɟi katˌika uɟˈana wˈako, ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌonipˈenda kˌama bˈibi arˈusi na kˌunifuˈata katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa lˈile lˈote, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌisijopˈandwa mbˈeɡu.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana, kˌama mˌalimbˈuko ja kwˈanza ja mavˈuno jˈake; wˈote wˌaliˌowaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌalihˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa na hatˈia, nˈajo maˈafa jˌaliwakˈumba,  asˈema bwˈana.|0
sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈee ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, nˌaɲi ɲˈote ɟamˈaa za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: ɟˈe, bˈaba zˈenu wˌaliˈona kˈosa ɡˈani kwˈaŋɡu, hˌata wˌakatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa mbˈali nˌami hˈivjo? wˌalifuˈata sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa, nˌao weɲˈewe wakˈawa hˌawafˈai.|0
hˌawakˌuulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi bwˈana, ˌalijˌetupandˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌutuoŋɡˈoza kˌupitˈia ɲˈika kˈame, kˌupitˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja maɟˈaŋɡwa na mabˈonde, ˈn̩tʃi ja ukˈame na ɡˈiza, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌasafirˈije ndˈani jˌake wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌaiʃˈije hˈumo?.|0
nˌiliwalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe wˈiŋɡi wa vˈitu ˌili mpˈate kˈula matˈunda jˌake na ˌutaɟˈiri wa mazˈao jˈake. lakˈini mkˈaɟa na kˌuinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu, na kˌuufˈaɲa urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu tʃukˈizo.|0
mˌakuhˈani hˌawakˌuulˈiza, jˈuko wˈapi bwˈana? wˈale wˌanaˌoʃuɣˌulikˈia ʃerˈia hˌawakˌuniɟˈua mˈimi; vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌaliˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu. mˌanabˈii wˌalitabˈiri kwa ɟˈina la baˈali, wˌakifuˈata sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa.|0
kwa hˈijo nalˈeta tˈena maʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈako, asˈema bwˈana. nˌami nˌitalˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja watˈoto wa watˈoto wˈako.|0
vˈuka, nˈenda ŋɡˈambo mpˈaka pwˈani ja kitˈimu nˌawe ˌuaŋɡalˈie, tˈuma wˈatu waˈende kedˈari, wˌatʃuŋɡˈuze kwa makˈini, uˈone kˌama kˌumekuwˈepo kˈitu kˌama hˈiki.|0
ɟˈe, taˈifa lˌimebadˈili miˈuŋɡu jˌake wakˈati wowˈote? hˌata iŋɡˈawa hˈao si miˈuŋɡu kˈamwe. lakˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌamebadˈili ˌutukˈufu wˌao kwa sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa kˈitu.|0
ʃˌaŋɡaˈeni katˌika hˈili, ˈee mbˈiŋɡu, nˌaɲi tˌetemekˈeni kwa hˈofu kˈuu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌametˈenda ðˈambi mbˈili: wˌameniˈatʃa mˈimi, nilˈije tʃemtʃˈemi ja mˈaɟi jalˈijo hˈai, nˌao wˌameɟˌitʃimbˈia visˈima vjˈao weɲˈewe, visˈima vˌilivjˌobomˈoka, vˌisivjowˈeza kˌuhifˈaði mˈaɟi.|0
ɟˈe, ˌisraˈeli ni mtumˈiʃi, jaˈani mtˈumwa kwa kˌuzalˈiwa? kwa nˈini bˌasi ˌamekˈuwa matˈeka.|0
sˈimba wˌameŋɡurˈuma; wˌamemŋɡˌurumˈia. wˌameifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kˌuwa ukˈiwa; mˈiɟi jˌake ˌimetˌeketˈezwa, nˈajo ˌimeˈatʃwa haˈina wˈatu.|0
pˈia wˈatu wa memfˈisi na tˌahpanhˈesi wˌamevˈuɲɟa tˈaɟi ja kˈitʃwa tʃˈako.|0
ɟˈe, hˌukuɟˌiletˈea hˈili wˌewe mweɲˈewe kwa kumwˈatʃa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌalipˌowaoŋɡˈoza ɲɟiˈani.|0
uˈovu wˈako ˌutakˌuaðˈibu; kurˈudi ɲˈuma kwˈako kˌutakˌukemˈea. bˌasi kumbˈuka, ˌutambˈue ɟˈinsi lilˈivjo ˈovu na tʃˈuŋɡu kwˈako ˌunapomwˈatʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako na kˌutokˈuwa na hˈofu jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
zamˈani nˌilivˈuɲɟa nˈira jˈako na kˌukatilˈia mbˈali vifˈuŋɡo vjˈako; ˌukasˈema, sˌitakˌutumikˈia! nˈaam kwˈeli, kwˈeɲe kˈila kilˈima kirˈefu na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda matˈawi jˌake ˌuliɟilˈaza kˌama kahˈaba.|0
nˌilikupˈanda ukˈiwa mzabˈibu ulˈio bˈora sˈana, mkˌamilˈifu na wa mbˈeɡu nzˈuri. ˌilikuwˈaɟe bˌasi ukˈawa kiɲˈume nˈami, ˌukahˌaribˈika na kˌuwa mzabˈibu mwˈitu.|0
hˌata ˌuɟisafˈiʃe kwa maɡˈadi na kˌutumˈia sabˈuni ɲˈiŋɡi, bˈado dˈoa la hatˈia jˈako lˈiko mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
wˌawezˈaɟe kusˈema, mˌimi si naɟˈisi, sˌiɟawˌafuˈata mˌabaˈali? kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi ˌulivjotˈenda kˈule bondˈeni; fikˈiri ˌulijˌojafˈaɲa. wˌewe ni ŋɡamˈia ɟˈike mwˌeɲe m̩bˈio ˌukikimbˈia hˈapa na pˈale.|0
pˌundamwˈitu ˌalijˌezoˈea ɟˈaŋɡwa, ˌanajenˈusa upˈepo katˌika tamˈaa jˌake kˈubwa: katˌika wakˈati wˌake wa kˌuhitˈaɟi mbˈeɡu ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌumzuˈia? madˈume jojˈote jˌanajˌomfuˌatilˈia hajˈana hˈaɟa ja kˌuɟitʃˈoʃa; wakˈati wa kupˈandwa kwˈake wˌatampˈata tˈu.|0
ˌusikimbˈie hˌadi miɡˈuu jˈako ˈiwe haˈina viˈatu, na kˈoo lˈako lˈiwe lˌimekaˈuka. lakˈini ˌulisˈema, haˈina maˈana! nˌinaipˈenda miˈuŋɡu ja kiɡˈeni, nˌami lazˈima nˌiifˌuatˈie..|0
kˌama vˈile mwˈizi ˌaaˌibikˈavjo wakˈati ˌamekamˈatwa, hˈivjo ndˈivjo ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌinavjˌoaibˈiʃwa: wˌao weɲˈewe, wafˈalme wˌao na mˌaafˈisa wˈao, mˌakuhˈani wˌao na mˌanabˈii wˈao.|0
wˌanaˌiambˈia mˈiti, wˌewe ndˈiwe bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, nˈalo ɟˈiwe, wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌulijˌenizˈaa. wˌamenˈipa visˈoɡo vjˈao wˈala hˌawakˌuniɡˌeuzˈia ɲˈuso zˈao; lakˈini wakˈiwa katˌika taˈabu, wˌanasˈema, ɲɟˈoo ˌutuokˈoe!.|0
ˈiko wˈapi bˌasi ˈile miˈuŋɡu mlˌijoɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea? jeɲˈewe na ˈiɟe kˌama ˌinawˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa wakˈati ˈm̩ko katˌika taˈabu! kwa maˈana ˈm̩na miˈuŋɡu mˈiŋɡi kˌama mlˈivjo na mˈiɟi, ˈee jˈuda.|0
kwa nˈini mnalˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu? nˈiɲi ɲˈote mmˌeniˈasi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌimeaðˈibu wˈatu wˈako bˈure tˈu, hˌawakˌuɟirˌekebˈiʃa. upˈaŋɡa wˈako ˌumewˈala mˌanabˈii wˈako kˌama sˈimba mwˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa.|0
ˈeɲi wa kizˈazi hˈiki, tˌafakarˈini nˈeno la bwˈana: ɟˈe, nˌimekˈuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa kwa ˌisraˈeli ˌau ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˈiza kˈuu? kwa nˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanasˈema, sˌisi tˈuko hˈuru kˌuzurˈura, hˌatutarˈudi kwˈako tˈena.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ˈuna ustˈadi kiˈasi ɡˈani katˌika kˌufuatˈia mapˈenzi! hˌata wˈale wˌanawˈake wabˈaja kulˈiko wˈote wˌanawˈeza kˌuɟifˈunza kˌutokˈana na ɲɟˈia zˈako.|0
katˌika ŋɡˈuo zˈako wˈatu huˈona dˈamu ja uhˈai ja maskˈini wasˈio na hatˈia, iŋɡˈawa hˌukuwˌakamˈata wˌakivˈuɲɟa ɲˈumba. lakˈini katˌika hˈaja jˈote.|0
ˌunasˈema, sˈina hatˈia; mˈuŋɡu hˌaɟanˌikasˌirikˈia. lakˈini nˌitakˌuhukˈumu kwa sabˈabu ˌunasˈema, mˌimi sˌiɟatˈenda ðˈambi..|0
kwa nˈini ˌunatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa sˈana, kˌubadˈili ɲɟˈia zˈako? ˌutakatˈiʃwa tamˈaa na mˈisri kˌama ˌulivjˌokatˈiʃwa na aʃˈuru.|0
pˈia ˌutaondˈoka mahˈali hˈapo ukˈiwa ˌumewˈeka mikˈono kitʃwˈani, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamewˌakatˈaa wˈale ˌunaˌowatˌumainˈia; hˌutasˌaidˈiwa nˈao.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu akˈimpa talˈaka mkˈewe, nˌaje ˌakamwˈatʃa na ˌakaolˈewa na ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine, ɟˈe, hˈujo mˈume awˈeza kˌumrudˈia tˈena? ɟˈe, hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi hˌaitˌanaɟisˈika kabˈisa? lakˈini ˌumeˈiʃi kˌama kahˈaba na wapˈenzi wˈeŋɡi: ɟˈe, sˈasa ˌutanˌirudˈia tˈena? asˈema bwˈana.|0
inˈua mˈatʃo ˌutazˈame mˌiinˈuko ilˈijo kˈame na uˈone. ɟˈe, pˈana mahˈali ambˈapo hˌawaɟalˈala nˈawe? ˌulikˈeti kˈando ja bˌarabˈara ˌukiwˌasubˈiri wapˈenzi, ˌukakˈaa kˌama jˌeje ˌahamˌahamˈaje ɟaŋɡwˈani. ˌumeˌinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi kwa ˌukahˈaba wˈako na uˈovu wˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo mvˈua ˌimezˌuilˈiwa, nˈazo mvˈua za vˈuli hˌazikuɲˈeʃa. hˌata hˈivjo, ˈuna ˈuso usˈio na hˈaja kˌama wa kahˈaba; ˌunakatˈaa kˌutahajˈari kwa aˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe hˌuɟaniˈita hˈivi pˈunde tˈu: bˈaba jˈaŋɡu, rafˈiki jˈaŋɡu ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutakˌasirˈika sˈiku zˈote? ɟˈe, ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌitaˌendelˈea milˈele? hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌunavjˌozuŋɡˈumza, lakˈini ˌunafˈaɲa maˈovu jˈote ˌuwezˈajo.|0
wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme josˈia, bwˈana ˌalinˌiambˈia, ˌumeˈona kˈile ˌisraˈeli asˈije mwˌaminˈifu ˌamekifˈaɲa? ˌamepˈanda ɟˌuːja kˈila kilˈima kirˈefu, na tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda na ˌamefˈaɲa uzˈinzi hˌuko.|0
mˌimi nˌilifikˈiri kˌuwa baˌada ja kˌujafˈaɲa jˈote hˈaja ˌaŋɡelˌinirudˈia, lakˈini hˌakurˈudi, nˌaje dˈada jˌake jˈuda mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu ˌaliˈona hˈili.|0
nilˈimpa ˌisraˈeli asˈije mwˌaminˈifu hˈati jˌake ja talˈaka, na kˌumfukˈuza kwa aɟˈili ja uzˈinzi wˌake wˈote. hˌata hˈivjo nˌikaˈona kˌuwa jˈuda dˈada jˌake mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu hˌakuoɡˈopa. jˌeje pˈia ˌalitˈoka na kufˈaɲa uzˈinzi.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌisraˈeli asˈije mwˌaminˈifu ˈana hˈaki kulˈiko jˈuda mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
nˈenda, ˌukataŋɡˈaze uɟˈumbe hˈuu kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini:  rˈudi, ˌisraˈeli usˈije mwˌaminˈifu, asˈema bwˈana, sˌitakˌutazˈama tˈena kwa ˈuso ˌuliˌokuɲɟamˈana, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni mwˌeɲe hurˈuma, asˈema bwˈana, sˌitaʃˈika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu milˈele.|0
uŋɡˈama ðˈambi zˈako tˈu: kwˌamba ˌumemwˈasi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako, ˌumetapˈaɲa wˈema wˈako kwa miˈuŋɡu ja kiɡˈeni tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌunaotˈanda, nˌawe hˌukunitˈii mˈimi,  asˈema bwˈana.|0
rudˈini, ˈeɲi wˈatu m̩sˈio wˌaaminˈifu, kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni mˈume wˈenu, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawˌatʃaɡˈua nˈiɲi, mmˈoɟa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi, na wawˈili kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ukˈoo, nˌami nˌitawalˈeta sajˈuni.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitawapˈeni wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌanipˌendezˈao mˈojo wˈaŋɡu, ambˈao wˌatawˌaoŋɡˈoza kwa mˌaarˈifa na ˌufahˈamu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, idˈadi jˈenu ˌitakˌapokˈuwa ˌimeˌoŋɡezˈeka sˈana katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, wˈatu hˌawatasˈema tˈena, sandˈuku la aɡˈano la bwˈana,  asˈema bwˈana. hˌalitˌaiŋɡˈia tˈena kwˈeɲe mawˈazo jˈao wˈala kˌukumbˈukwa, hˌawatˌalihitˈaɟi wˈala hˌalitˌateŋɡenˈezwa ɟiŋɡˈine.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, wˌataˈita jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa bwˈana, nˈajo mˌataˈifa jˈote wˌatakˌusaɲˈika jˌerusalˈemu kˌuliheʃˈimu ɟˈina la bwˈana. hˌawatˌafuˈata tˈena ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao miˈovu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, ɲˈumba ja jˈuda ˌitauŋɡˈana na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, wˌao kwa pamˈoɟa wˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini hˌadi ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈenu kˌama urˈiθi.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌilisˈema,  tazˈama ɟˈinsi nˌitakˌavjowatˈunza kwa furˈaha kˌama wˈana na kuwˈapa ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri, urˈiθi ulˈio mzˈuri kulˈiko wa taˈifa ɟiŋɡˈine lolˈote. nˌiliðˈani mŋɡˌeniˈita bˈaba, na msˌiŋɡeɡeˈuka, mkaˈatʃa kˌunifuˈata.|0
lakˈini kˌama mwanˈamke asˈije mwˌaminˈifu kwa mumˈewe, vˈivjo hˈivjo mmekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu pˈia, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kilˈio kˌinasikˈika ɟˌuːja mˌiinˈuko ilˈijo kˈame, kulˈia na kˌuombolˈeza kwa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu wˌamepotˈoka katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao na wˌamemsahˈau bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
rudˈini, ˈeɲi wˈatu m̩sˈio wˌaaminˈifu, nˌami nˌitawapˈoɲa ˌukeŋɡeˈufu wˈenu. nˈaam, tˌutakˈuɟa kwˈako, kwa maˈana wˌewe ni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
hakˈika zˈile ɣasˈia za kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu kwˈeɲe vilˈima na mˌilimˈani ni ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu; hakˈika katˌika bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˈuko wokˈovu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈetu miˈuŋɡu ja aˈibu ˌimejˈala matˈunda ja kˈazi za bˈaba zˈetu: makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe, wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao.|0
sˌisi na tulˈale tʃˈini katˌika aˈibu jˈetu, na feðˈeha jˈetu ˌitufunˈike. tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, sˌisi na mabˈaba zˈetu; ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈetu hˌadi lˈeo hˌatukumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
ikˈiwa kwa kwˈeli, kwa hˈaki na kwa uɲˈofu ˌutaˈapa, kwa hakˈika kˌama vˈile bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ndˈipo mˌataˈifa jˌatakˌapobˌarikˈiwa nˌaje na katˌika jˌeje wˌataɟˌitukˈuza.|0
ɟˌitahirˈini katˌika bwˈana, tˌahirˈini miˈojo jˈenu, ˈeɲi wˌanaˈume wa jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu, la sˈivjo ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitatˈoka kwa ŋɡˈuvu na kuwˈaka kˌama mˈoto kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu mlˌiotˈenda, ˌikiwˈaka pasˈipo wa kˌuizˈima.|0
taŋɡˈaza katˌika jˈuda na upˈiɡe m̩bˈiu katˌika jˌerusalˈemu na kusˈema: pˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote! pˈiɡa kelˈele na kusˈema: kˌusaɲikˈeni pamˈoɟa! tˌukimbilˈie katˌika mˈiɟi jˌeɲe mabˈoma!.|0
ˌoɲeʃˈeni iʃˈara ˌili kwˈenda sajˈuni! kˌimbiliˈeni ˌusalˈama pasˈipo kˌutʃelˈewa! kwa kˌuwa nˌinalˈeta maˈafa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini, mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja kutˈiʃa.|0
sˈimba ˌametˈoka ɲɟˈe ja pˈaŋɡo lˈake, mharˈabu wa mˌataˈifa ˌameɟipˈaŋɡa. ˌametˈoka mahˈali pˈake ˌili ˌaaŋɡamˈize ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu. mˈiɟi jˈenu ˌitakˈuwa maɡˈofu pasˈipo ˈm̩tu wa kuˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
hˈivjo vaˈeni ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia, ˌombolezˈeni na kulˈia kwa huzˈuni, kwa kˌuwa hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana hˌaiɟˌaondolˈewa kwˈetu.|0
ndˈipo nˌiliposˈema, ˈaa, bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌumewˌadaŋɡaɲˈaɟe kabˈisa wˈatu hˈawa na jˌerusalˈemu kwa kusˈema, mtakˈuwa na amˈani, wakˈati upˈaŋɡa ˈuko kwˈeɲe kˈoo zˈetu.|0
wakˈati hˈuo wˈatu hˈawa na jˌerusalˈemu wˌataambˈiwa, upˈepo wa mˈoto kutˈoka mˌiinˈuko ilˈijo kˈame katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa ˌunavˈuma kˌuelekˈea wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, lakˈini sˈio kˌupepˈeta ˌau kˌutakˈasa.|0
upˈepo wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu sˈana kulˈiko wa kˌupepˈeta na kˌutakˈasa ˌutakˈuɟa kwa ˈamri jˈaŋɡu. sˈasa nˌataŋɡˈaza hukˈumu zˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao.|0
tazˈama! ˌanakˈuɟa kˌama mawˈiŋɡu, maɡˈari jˌake jˌanakˈuɟa kˌama upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli, farˈasi wˌake wˈana m̩bˈio kulˈiko tˈai. ˈole wˈetu! tˌunaˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, ˌusafˈiʃe uˈovu kutˈoka mojˈoni mwˈako na ˌuokolˈewe. ˌutaˌendelˈea kufˈitʃa mawˈazo mˌapotˈovu mpˈaka lˈini.|0
saˈuti ˌinataŋɡˈaza kutˈoka dˈani, ˌikipˈiɡa m̩bˈiu ja maˈafa kutˈoka vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu.|0
wˌaambˈie mˌataˈifa ɟˈambo hˈili, pˈiɡa m̩bˈiu hˌii ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu: ɟˈeʃi la kˌuziŋɡˈira lˌinakˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali, lˌikipˈiɡa kelˈele ja vˈita ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi ja jˈuda.|0
wˌamemzuŋɡˈuka kˌama wˈatu wˌalindˈao ʃˈamba, kwa sabˈabu ˌamefˈaɲa uˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu,  asˈema bwˈana.|0
mwenˈendo wˈako na matˈendo jˈako mweɲˈewe jˌamelˈeta hˈaja ɟˈuu jˈako. hˌii n̩dˈijo aðˈabu jˈako. tazˈama ɟˈinsi ilˈivjo tʃˈuŋɡu! tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌinavjotʃˈoma mˈojo.|0
ˈee mtˈima wˈaŋɡu, mtˈima wˈaŋɡu! nˌinaɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa mˌaumˈivu. ˈee mˌaumˈivu makˈuu ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu! mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumefˌaðaˈika ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, siwˈezi kˌuɲamˈaza. kwa sabˈabu nˌimesikˈia saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta, nˌimesikˈia kelˈele ja vˈita.|0
maˈafa baˌada ja maˈafa, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌimekˈuwa maɡˈofu. kwa ɣafˈula mahˈema jˈaŋɡu jˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa, makˈazi jˈaŋɡu kwa mˈuda mfˈupi.|0
hˌata lˈini nˌitaˌendelˈea kuˈona bendˈera ja vˈita na kˌusikˈia saˈuti za tˌarumbˈeta.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni wˌapumbˈavu, hˌawaniɟˈui mˈimi. ni watˈoto wasˈio na akˈili, hawˈana ˌufahˈamu. ni hodˈari kutˈenda mabˈaja, hˌawaɟˈui kutˈenda jalˈijo mˈema.|0
nˌiliˌitazˈama dunˈia, nˈajo hˌaikˈuwa na ˈumbo tˈena ni tˈupu; nˌilizˌiaŋɡalˈia mbˈiŋɡu, miˈaŋɡa ˌilikˈuwa ˌimetowˈeka.|0
nˌiliˌitazˈama milˈima, nˈajo ˌilikˈuwa ˌikitˌetemˈeka, vilˈima vjˈote vˌilikˈuwa vˌikijˌumbajˈumba.|0
nˌilitazˈama, wˈala wˈatu hˌawakuwˈepo; kˈila ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌamerˈuka zˈake.|0
nˌilitazˈama, hˌata ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimestˈawi vizˈuri ˌimekˈuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa, mˈiɟi jˌake jˈote ˌilikˈuwa maɡˈofu mbˈele za bwˈana, mbˈele ja hasˈira jˌake kˈali.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana ˌasemˈavjo: ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌitahˌaribˈiwa, iŋɡˈawa sˌitaˌiaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa.|0
kwa hˈijo dunˈia ˌitaˌombolˈeza na mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu zˌitakˈuwa ɡˈiza, kwa sabˈabu nˌimesˈema nˌami sˌitarˈudi ɲˈuma, nˌimeamˈua na wˈala sˌitaɡeˈuka.|0
kwa saˈuti ja wapˈanda farˈasi na wapˈiɡa upˈinde kˈila ˈm̩ɟi ˌunakimbˈia. baˈaði wˌanakˌimbilˈia vˌitʃakˈani, baˈaði wˌanapˈanda ɟˌuːja miˈamba. mˈiɟi jˈote ˌimeˈatʃwa, hakˈuna ˌaiʃˈije ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini, ˈewe ˌulijˌeharibˈiwa? kwa nˈini ˌunaɟivˈika vˈazi ɟekˈundu na kuvˈaa vˈito vja ðahˈabu? kwa nˈini ˌunapˈaka mˈatʃo jˈako rˈaŋɡi? ˌunaɟipˈamba bˈure. wapˈenzi wˈako wˌanakˌuðarˈau, wˌanaˌutafˈuta uhˈai wˈako.|0
nˌasikˈia kilˈio kˌama tʃa mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa, kilˈio tʃa utʃˈuŋɡu kˌama tʃa ˌanajemzˈaa mtˈoto wˌake wa kwˈanza: kilˈio tʃa bˈinti sajˈuni ˌakitwˈeta ˌili awˈeze kˌupumˈua, ˌakiinˈua mikˈono jˈake, ˌakisˈema, ˈole wˈaŋɡu! nˌinazimˈia; maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu jˌamekˌabiðˈiwa kwa wˌauˈaɟi.|0
pandˈeni na kuʃˈuka katˌika mitˈaa ja jˌerusalˈemu, tˌazamˈeni pˈande zˈote na mtˌafakˈari, tˌafutˈeni katˌika viwˈaɲɟa vjˈake. kˌama mtawˈeza kumpˈata hˌata ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa tu ˌatendˈaje kwa ˌuaminˈifu na kˌutafˈuta kwˈeli, nˌitaˌusamˈehe ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌanasˈema, kwa hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, bˈado wˌanaˈapa kwa uˈoŋɡo.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈe, mˈatʃo jˈako hˌajaˌitafˈuti kwˈeli? ˌuliwapˈiɡa, lakˈini hˌawakˌusikˈia mˌaumˈivu, ˌuliwˌapondapˈonda, lakˈini wˌalikatˈaa maˈoɲo. wˌalifˈaɲa ɲˈuso zˈao kˌuwa ŋɡˈumu kulˈiko ɟˈiwe nˌao wˌalikatˈaa kutˈubu.|0
ndˈipo nˌikasˈema, hˈawa ni maskˈini tˈu; wˌao ni wˌapumbˈavu, kwa maˈana hˌawaiɟˈui ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana, ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitakwˈenda kwa vˌioŋɡˈozi na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˈao, hakˈika wˌao wˌanaiɟˈua ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana, ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈao. lakˈini kwa nˈia mˈoɟa nˌao pˈia wˌalikˈuwa wˌameivˈuɲɟa nˈira na kˌuvivˈuɲɟa vifˈuŋɡo.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈimba kutˈoka mwitˈuni ˌatawˌaʃambulˈia, ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza, tʃˈui ˌatawˌavizˈia karˈibu na mˈiɟi jˈao, ˌili kˌumrarˈua vipˈande vipˈande jejˈote ˌatakˌajeθubˈutu kutˈoka ɲɟˈe, kwa maˈana maˈasi jˈao ni makˈubwa, na kˌukeŋɡeˈuka kwˈao kˌumekˈuwa ni kwˈiŋɡi.|0
kwa nˈini nˌiwasamˈehe? watˈoto wˈenu wˌameniˈatʃa na kuˈapa kwa miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo si miˈuŋɡu. nˌiliwˌapatˈia mˌahitˈaɟi jˈao jˈote, lakˈini bˈado wˌamefˈaɲa uzˈinzi na kˌusoŋɡˈana katˌika ɲˈumba za mˌakahˈaba.|0
wˌamelˈiʃwa vizˈuri, kˌama farˈasi waˈume wˌeɲe tamˈaa ɲˈiŋɡi, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakimlilˈia ˈm̩ke wa mwˌanaˈume mwiŋɡˈine.|0
ɟˈe, nˌisiwˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, nˌisiɟˌilipizˈie kisˈasi ɟˌuːja taˈifa kˌama hˈili.|0
pitˈeni katˌika maʃˈamba jˌake ja mˌizabˈibu na kˌujaharˈibu, lakˈini msˌiaŋɡamˈize kabˈisa. pˌoɡoˈeni matˈawi jˈake, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu hˈawa sˈio wa bwˈana.|0
ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba ja jˈuda wˌamekˈuwa si wˌaaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu kˈamwe, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˌamedaŋɡˈaɲa kuhˈusu bwˈana. wˌamesˈema, jˌeje hˌatafˈaɲa ɟˈambo lolˈote! hakˈuna ðˈara lˌitakˌalotupˈata; kˈamwe hˌatutaˈona upˈaŋɡa wˈala ɲɟˈaa.|0
mˌanabˈii ni upˈepo tˈu, wˈala nˈeno halˈimo ndˈani jˈao, kwa hˈijo hˈajo wˌajasemˈajo na jˌatendˈeke kwˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: kwa sabˈabu wˈatu hˈawa wˌamesˈema manˈeno hˈaja, nˌitajafˈaɲa manˈeno jˈaŋɡu vˌiɲuˈani mwˈenu kˌuwa mˈoto, na wˈatu hˈawa wˈawe kˈuni zˌinazolˈiwa na hˈuo mˈoto.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana, nˌinalˈeta taˈifa tˌoka mbˈali ðˈidi jˈako, taˈifa la kˈale na lˌinalˌoendelˈea kudˈumu, taˈifa ambˈalo lˈuɣa jˈao hˌuiɟˈui, wˈala msˈemo wˌao huwˈezi kˌuuelˈewa.|0
pˈodo zˈao ni kˌama kabˈuri lilˈilo wˈazi, wˈote ni mˌaʃuɟˈaa hodˈari wa vˈita.|0
wˌatajˌaaŋɡamˈiza mazˈao jˈenu na tʃakˈula tʃˈenu, wˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈana wˈenu na mabˈinti zˈenu; wˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza makˈundi jˈenu ja kondˈoo na ja ŋɡˈombe, wˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza mˌizabˈibu jˈenu na mitˈini jˈenu. kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi jˌeɲe mabˈoma mlˌijoˌitumˌainˈia.|0
hˌata hˈivjo katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, sˌitakˌuaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌao wˈatu wˌatakˌapoulˈiza, kwa nˈini bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌametˌufaɲˈia mˈambo hˈaja jˈote? ˌutawˌaambˈia, kˌama vˈile mlˌivjoniˈatʃa mˌimi na kˌutumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu weɲˈewe, ndˈivjo sˈasa mtˌakavjˌowatˌumikˈia waɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo si jˈenu..|0
ˌitaŋɡazˈie ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo hˈili na ˌulipiɡˈie m̩bˈiu katˌika jˈuda.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈili, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˌapumbˈavu, m̩sˈio na akˈili, m̩lˈio na mˈatʃo lakˈini hamwˈoni, m̩lˈio na mˌasikˈio lakˈini hˌamsikˈii.|0
ɟˈe, hˌaiwapˈasi kˌunioɡˈopa mˈimi? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, hˌaiwapˈasi kˌutetemˈeka mbˈele zˈaŋɡu? nˌiliufˈaɲa mtʃˈaŋɡa kˌuwa mpˈaka wa bahˈari, kˌizuˈizi tʃa milˈele ambˈatʃo hˌaiwˈezi kupˈita. mawˈimbi jˌanawˈeza kˌuumˈuka, lakˈini hˌajawˈezi kˌuupˈita; jˌanawˈeza kˌuŋɡurˈuma, lakˈini hˌajawˈezi kˌuuvˈuka.|0
lakˈini wˈatu hˈawa wˈana miˈojo ja ˌukaˈidi na ja uˈasi, wˌameɡˌeukˈia mbˈali na kwˈenda zˈao.|0
wˌao hˌawaˌambiˈani weɲˈewe, sˌisi na tˌumwoɡˈope bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ˌanajˌetupatˈia mvˈua za masˈika na za vˈuli kwa maɟˈira jˈake, ˌanajˌetuhˌakikiʃˈia maɟˈuma ja mavˈuno kwa ˌutaratˈibu..|0
matˈendo jˈenu mabˈaja jˌamezuˈia hˈaja jˈote, ðˈambi zˈenu zˌimewˌazuˈia msipˈate mˈema.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˈamo walˈio waˈovu wˌanaˌovizˈia kˌama wˈatu wˌanaotˈeɡa ndˈeɡe, na kˌama wˈale wˌanaowˈeka mitˈeɡo kˌuwakamˈata wˈatu.|0
kˌama vitˈundu vˌilivjoɟˈaa ndˈeɡe, ɲˈumba zˈao zˌimeɟˈaa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu; wˌamekˈuwa mˌataɟˈiri na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
wˌamenenˈepa na kˌunawˈiri. matˈendo jˈao maˈovu hajˈana kikˈomo; hˌawatetˈei mˌaʃaˈuri ja jatˈima wapˈate kuʃˈinda, hˌawatetˈei hˈaki za maskˈini.|0
ɟˈe, nˌisiwˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, nˌisiɟˌilipizˈie kisˈasi ɟˌuːja taˈifa kˌama hˈili.|0
ɟˈambo la kutˈiʃa na kuʃtˈuʃa lˌimetokˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii.|0
mˌanabˈii wˌanatabˈiri uˈoŋɡo, mˌakuhˈani wˌanatawˈala kwa mamlˈaka jˈao weɲˈewe, nˌao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanapˈenda hˈivjo. lakˈini mtafˈaɲa nˈini mwˈiʃo wˈake.|0
kˌimbiˈeni kwa ˌusalˈama wˈenu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa bˌeɲamˈini! kˌimbiˈeni kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu! piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta katˌika tekˈoa! ˌinuˈeni iʃˈara ɟˌuːja bˈeθ hˌakerˈemu! kwa kˌuwa maˈafa jˌanaˌonekˈana jˌakitˈoka kˌaskazˈini, na ˌuharibˈifu wa kutˈiʃa.|0
nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza bˈinti sajˈuni, alˈije mzˈuri sˈana na mworˈoro.|0
wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˈao wˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˈake; wˌatapˈiɡa mahˈema jˈao kˌumzuŋɡˈuka, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakitʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
ɟˌiandaˈeni kwa vˈita ðˈidi jˈake! ˌinukˈeni tˌumʃambulˈie mtʃˈana! lakˈini, ˈole wˈetu, mtʃˈana ˌunaˈiʃa, na vivˈuli vja ɟiˈoni vˌinazˈidi kˌuwa virˈefu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌinukˈeni, tufˈaɲe mˌaʃambulˈizi usˈiku, na kˌuharˈibu ŋɡˈome zˈake.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: katˈeni mˈiti mɟˈeŋɡe bˈoma kˌuzuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu. ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ni lazˈima ˌuaðibˈiwe, ˌumeɟˈazwa na ˌuonˈevu.|0
kˌama vˈile kisˈima kˌinavjomwˈaɡa mˈaɟi jˈake, ndˈivjo ˌanavjomwˈaɡa uˈovu wˈake. ˌukatˈili na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌasikˈika ndˈani jˈake, uɡˈoɲɟua wˌake na mˌaɟerˈaha jˌake vˈiko mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
pokˈea ˈoɲo, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, la sˈivjo nˌitaɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˌawe na kˌuifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˈako kˌuwa ukˈiwa, ˌasiwˈeze ˈm̩tu kuˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: wˌao na wˌajakusˈaɲe mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu kˌama kwˈeɲe mzabˈibu; pitˈiʃa mkˈono wˈako kwˈeɲe matˈawi tˈena, kˌama jˌeje ˌavunˈaje zabˈibu.|0
nisˈeme na nˈani na kˈumpa ˈoɲo? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajenˌisikilˈiza mˈimi? mˌasikˈio jˈao jˌamezˈiba, kwa hˈijo hˌawawˈezi kˌusikˈia. nˈeno la bwˈana ni tʃukˈizo kwˈao, hˌawalˌifurahˈii.|0
lakˈini nˌimeɟˈaa ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana, nˌami siwˈezi kˌuizuˈia. wˌamwaɡˈie watˈoto wˌaliˈoko bˌarabarˈani, na ɟˌuːja viɟˈana waˈume wˌaliˌokusaɲˈika; mˈume na ˈm̩ke wˌatakˈumbwa pamˈoɟa ndˈani jˈake, hˌata nˌao wazˈee wˌaliˌolemˈewa na miˈaka.|0
ɲˈumba zˈao zˌitapˈewa wˈatu weŋɡˈine, pamˈoɟa na maʃˈamba jˈao na wˌake zˈao, nˌitakˌapoˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja wˈale wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ɟˈe, wˌanaˈona aˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja tabˈia jˈao ˌinajˌotʃukˈiza ˈm̩no? hapˈana, hawˈana aˈibu hˌata kidˈoɡo; hˌawaɟˈui hˌata kuˈona hˈaja. kwa hˈijo wˌataaŋɡˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌaliˌoaŋɡˈuka, wˌataʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini nˌitakˌapowˌaaðˈibu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: simˈama kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia pˈanda ˌutazˈame, ˌulizˈia mapˈito ja zamˈani, ˌulizˈia wˈapi ilˈipo ɲɟˈia nzˈuri, ˌuifuˈate hˈijo, nˌaɲi mtapˈata rˈaha nafsˈini mwˈenu. lakˈini nˈiɲi mlisˈema, hˌatutˌaipˈita hˈijo..|0
nˌiliwˈeka walˈinzi ɟˈuu jˈenu na kusˈema, sˌikiˈeni saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta! lakˈini mkasˈema, hˌatutˌasikilˈiza..|0
kwa hˈijo sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, ˌaŋɡaliˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌaʃahˈidi, lˈile lˌitakˌalowˌatokˈea.|0
sikˈia, ˈee ˈn̩tʃi: nˌinalˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja wˈatu hˈawa, matˈunda ja mipˈaŋɡo jˈao, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakˌusikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu na wˌameˌikatˈaa ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌunanifˈaa nˈini uvˈumba kutˈoka ʃˈeba, ˌau ˈudi wa harˈufu nzˈuri kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali? sadˈaka zˈako za kˌuteketˈezwa hˌazikˌubalˈiki, ðabˈihu zˈako hˌazinˌifurahˈiʃi mˈimi.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌitawˈeka vikwˈazo mbˈele ja wˈatu hˈawa. bˈaba na wˈana wˌao wˌataɟikwˈaa ɟˈuu jˈake, mˌaɟirˈani na mˌarafˈiki wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: tazˈama, ɟˈeʃi lˌinakˈuɟa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini, taˈifa kˈubwa lˌinaˈamʃwa kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
wˌameɟifˈuŋɡa pˈinde na mkˈuki, ni wˌakatˈili na hawˈana hurˈuma. wˌanatˈoa saˈuti kˌama bahˈari ˌinajˌoŋɡurˈuma wˌanapˌoendˈeʃa farˈasi zˈao. wˌanakˈuɟa kˌama wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟipˈaŋɡa tajˈari kwa vˈita ˌili kˌukuʃˌambulˈia, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni.|0
tˌumesikˈia tˌaarˈifa zˈao, nˈajo mikˈono jˈetu ˌimeleɡˈea. utʃˈuŋɡu ˌumetuʃˈika, mˌaumˈivu kˌama ja mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
ˌusitˈoke kwˈenda mˌaʃambˈani ˌau kˌutembˈea bˌarabarˈani, kwa kˌuwa adˈui ˈana upˈaŋɡa, na kˈuna vitˈiʃo kˈila upˈande.|0
ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, vaˈeni mˌaɡunˈia mɟˌiviŋɡirˈiʃe kwˈeɲe maɟˈivu, ˌombolezˈeni kwa kilˈio tʃa utʃˈuŋɡu kˌama ˌamliliˈaje mwˈana pekˈee, kwa maˈana ɣafˈula mharˈabu ˌatatuɟˈia.|0
nˌimekufˈaɲa wˌewe kˌuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuɟarˈibu tʃˈuma, nˌao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kˌama mˈawe jˌeɲe madˈini, ˌili upˈate kˌuziɟˈua na kˌuziɟarˈibu ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
wˈote ni waˈasi sˈuɡu, wˌakiˈenda hˈuku na hˌuko kˌuseŋɡˈeɲa. wˌao ni ʃˈaba na tʃˈuma, wˈote wˌanatˈenda ˌupotˈovu.|0
mivˈuo ˌinavˈuma kwa ŋɡˈuvu, kˌinatʃˌouŋɡˈua kwa hˈuo mˈoto ni risˈasi, lakˈini pamˈoɟa na kˌusafˈiʃa kˈote hˈuku ni bˈure; waˈovu hˌawaˌondolˈewi.|0
wˌanaˈitwa fˈeða ˌilijˌokatalˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamewˌakatˈaa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
simˈama kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, na hˌuko upˈiɡe m̩bˈiu ja uɟˈumbe hˈuu:  sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda mlˌiokˈuɟa kˌupitˈia malˈaŋɡo hˈaja ˌili kˌumwabˈudu bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: tˌeŋɡenezˈeni ɲɟˈia zˈenu na matˈendo jˈenu, nˌami nˌitawaˈatʃa m̩kˈae mahˈali hˈapa.|0
msˌitumˌainˈie manˈeno ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na kusˈema, hˈili ni hekˈalu la bwˈana, hekˈalu la bwˈana, hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kˌama kwˈeli mkˌibadˈili ɲɟˈia zˈenu na matˈendo jˈenu, mkˌatendeˈana hˈaki kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake.|0
kˌama msˌipomwonˈea mɡˈeni, jatˈima wˈala mɟˈane, na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia mahˈali hˈapa, nˌaɲi kˌama msˌipofuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine kwa maðˈara jˈenu weɲˈewe.|0
ndˈipo nˌitawaˈatʃa m̩kˈae mahˈali hˈapa, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈenu milˈele na milˈele.|0
lakˈini tazˈama, mnˌatumˌainˈia manˈeno ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu jasˈijo na maˈana.|0
ɟˈe, mtaˈiba na kuˈua, mtazˈini na kuˈapa kwa uˈoŋɡo, na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa baˈali, na kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ambˈajo hˌamkuiɟˈua.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩ɟe na kˌusimˈama mbˈele jˈaŋɡu katˌika ɲˈumba hˌii ˌinajoˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, mkisˈema, tˈuko salˈama. salˈama kwa kufˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote ja kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
ɟˈe, ɲˈumba hˌii, ˌiitwˈajo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, ˌimekˈuwa pˈaŋɡo la wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi kwˈenu? lakˈini nˌimekˈuwa nˌikiˈona jˌanajˌotendˈeka! asˈema bwˈana.|0
nendˈeni sˈasa mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌalipokˈuwa hˌuko ʃˈilo, mahˈali ambˈapo nˌilipafˈaɲa pa kwˈanza kˌuwa makˈao ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, nˌaɲi mwˈone lˈile nˌililˌopafaɲˈia kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
mlˌipokˈuwa mnafˈaɲa jˈote hˈaja, asˈema bwˈana, nˌilisˈema nˌaɲi tˈena na tˈena, lakˈini hˌamkusˌikilˈiza; nˌiliwaˈita, lakˈini hˌamkuɟˈibu.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌililˌolifaɲˈia ʃˈilo, nˌitalifˈaɲa sˈasa kwa ɲˈumba hˌii ˌiitwˈajo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, hekˈalu mnˌalolˌitumˌainˈia, mahˈali nˌilipowˈapa nˈiɲi na bˈaba zˈenu.|0
nˌitawˌafukˈuza mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, kˌama nˌilivjˌowafaɲˈia ndˈuɡu zˈenu, wˈatu wa ˌefraˈimu..|0
kwa hˈijo ˌusiˈombe kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu hˈawa, wˈala ˌusinˌililˈie, na ˌusifˈaɲe maˈombi kwa aɟˈili jˈao; ˌusinisˈihi, kwa sabˈabu sˌitakˌusikilˈiza.|0
ɟˈe, hˌujaˈoni hˈajo wˌanajˌojatˈenda katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na katˌika bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
watˈoto wˌanakusˈaɲa kˈuni, bˈaba zˈao wˌanawˈaʃa mˈoto, na wˌanawˈake wˌanakˈanda ˈuŋɡa na kuˈoka mikˈate kwa aɟˈili ja malkˈia wa mbiŋɡˈuni. wˌanamimˈina sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˌili kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini ɟˈe, mˌimi n̩dˈije wˌanajˌenikˌasirˈiʃa? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, hˌawaɟˌiumˈizi weɲˈewe na kˌuɟiˌaibˈiʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitamwˈaɡwa mahˈali hˈapa, ɟˌuːja mwˌanadˈamu na mɲˈama, ɟˌuːja mˈiti ja ʃambˈani na ɟˌuːja matˈunda ja arðˈini, nˈajo ˌitauŋɡˈua pasˈipo kuzˈimwa.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: ˌendeleˈeni, ˌoŋɡezˈeni sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja ðabˈihu zˈenu ɲiŋɡˈine, ˈm̩le ɲˈama hˈijo weɲˈewe.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌilipˌowalˈeta bˈaba zˈenu kutˈoka mˈisri na kusˈema nˈao, sˌikuwˈapa ˈamri kuhˈusu sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu tˈu.|0
lakˈini nˌiliwˈapa ˈamri hˌii nˌikisˈema: nˌitiˈini mˈimi, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. ˌenendˈeni katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈote nˌinazˌowaamˈuru ˌili mpˈate kˌufanikˈiwa.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌusikilˈiza wˈala kuɟˈali. badˈala jˈake, wˌalifuˈata ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao miˈovu. wˌalirˈudi ɲˈuma badˈala ja kusˈoŋɡa mbˈele.|0
ʃˈu wakˈati ˈule bˈaba zˈenu wˌalipotˈoka mˈisri hˌadi sˈasa, sˈiku baˌada ja sˈiku, tˈena na tˈena nˌimewˌatumˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌunisˌikilˈiza wˈala hˌawakuɟˈali. wˌalikˈuwa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu na kufˈaɲa maˈovu kulˈiko bˈaba zˈao..|0
ˌutakˌapowˌaambˈia hˈaja jˈote, hˌawatˌakusˌikilˈiza; ˌutakˌapowaˈita, hˌawataɟˈibu.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaambˈie, hˈili ni taˈifa ambˈalo hˌalimtˈii bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao, wˈala kˌukubˈali maˈoɲo. kwˈeli ˌimekˈufa, ˌimetowˈeka mˌidomˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ɲoˈeni ɲuˈele zˈenu na kˌuzitˈupa, ˌombolezˈeni katˌika mˌiinˈuko ilˈijo kˈame, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamekˌikatˈaa na kˌukiˈatʃa kizˈazi hˈiki kˌilitʃˌomkasirˈiʃa.|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌamefˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana. wˌameziwˈeka sanˈamu zˈao za mˌatʃukˈizo ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ˌiitwˈajo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, na wˌameitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
wˌameɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia sanˈamu pa tofˈeθi kwˈeɲe bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu ˌili kˌuwatˌeketˈeza wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao kwˈeɲe mˈoto, kˈitu ambˈatʃo sˌikuamˈuru, wˈala hˌakikˌuiŋɡˈia ˌakilˈini mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo mɟˌihaðˈari, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati wˈatu wˌatakˌapokˈuwa hˌawapaˈiti tofˈeθi ˌau bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, lakˈini wˌatapaˈita bˈonde la matʃˈiɲɟo, kwa sabˈabu wˌatawazˈika wˈafu hˌuko tofˈeθi mpˈaka pasˈiwe tˈena nafˈasi.|0
ndˈipo mizˈoɡa ja wˈatu hˈawa ˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi, wˈala hˌapatˌakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌuwafukˈuza.|0
nˌitazˌikomˈeʃa saˈuti za ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha, na saˈuti za bwˈana arˈusi na bˈibi arˈusi kˌatikˈati ja mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu, kwa sabˈabu ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, asˈema bwˈana, mifˈupa ja wafˈalme na mˌaafˈisa wa jˈuda, mifˈupa ja mˌakuhˈani na mˌanabˈii, na mifˈupa ja wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌitaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka mˌakabˈuri jˈao.|0
ˌitawˈekwa wˈazi kwa ɟˈua, na mwˈezi, na ɲˈota zˈote za mbˈiŋɡu, ambˈazo wˌalizipˈenda na kˌuzitˌumikˈia, na ambˈazo wˌamezˌifuˈata kˌutafˈuta ˌuʃaˈuri na kˌuziabˈudu. hˌawatˌakusˈaɲua pamˈoɟa ˌau kuzˈikwa, lakˈini wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˈavi jˌalijˌotapakˈaa ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
popˈote nˌitakˌapowˌafukuzˈia, mabˈaki wˈote wa kizˈazi hˈiki kiˈovu wˌatatamˈani kˈufa kulˈiko kuˈiʃi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote..|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana:  ɟˈe, wˈatu wˌanapˌoaŋɡˈuka hˌawainˈuki? ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu ˌanapˌopotˈea harˈudi.|0
kwa nˈini bˌasi wˈatu hˈawa wˌalipotˈea? kwa nˈini jˌerusalˈemu ˌinapotˈea kˈila mˈara? wˌanaŋɡˌaŋɡanˈia ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na wˌanakatˈaa kurˈudi.|0
nˌimewˌasikilˈiza kwa makˈini, lakˈini hˌawatˈaki kusˈema lilˈilo sˈawa. hakˈuna ˌanajˌetubˈia makˈosa jˌake ˌakisˈema, nˌimefˈaɲa nˈini? kˈila mmˈoɟa hˌufuˈata ɲɟˈia jˌake mweɲˈewe kˌama farˈasi ˌanajekwˈenda vitˈani.|0
hˌata korˈoŋɡo ˌalijˈeko aŋɡˈani ˌanajaɟˈua maɟˈira jˌake jˌalijˌoamrˈiwa, nˌao ɲɟˈiwa, mbˌajuwˈaju na kˌoikˈoi hˌufuˈata maɟˈira jˈao ja kurˈudi. lakˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu hˌawaɟˈui bwˈana ˌanatʃotˈaka kwˈao.|0
mwˌawezˈaɟe kusˈema, sˌisi tˈuna busˈara kwa sabˈabu tunˈajo ʃerˈia ja bwˈana, wakˈati ambˈapo kwa hakˈika kalˈamu ja uˈoŋɡo ja wˌaandˈiʃi ˌimeandˈika kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌataˌaibˈika, wˌatafˌaðaˈika na kunˈaswa. kwa kˌuwa wˌamelˌikatˈaa nˈeno la bwˈana, hˈijo hekˈima walˈijo nˈajo ni ja nˈamna ɡˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawˈapa wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˌake zˈao, na maʃˈamba jˈao kwa wˌamilˈiki weŋɡˈine. kˌuanzˈia alˈije mdˈoɡo kabˈisa hˌadi alˈije mkˈubwa kabˈisa, wˈote wˈana tamˈaa ja kupˈata zaˈidi; mˌanabˈii na mˌakuhˈani wˌanafanˈana, wˈote wˌanafˈaɲa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
wˌanafˈuŋɡa mˌaɟerˈaha ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu bˌila ˌuaŋɡalˈifu. wˌanasˈema, amˈani, amˈani, wakˈati hakˈuna amˈani.|0
ɟˈe, wˌanaˈona aˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja tabˈia jˈao ˌinajˌotʃukˈiza ˈm̩no? hapˈana, hawˈana aˈibu hˌata kidˈoɡo, hˌawaɟˈui hˌata kuˈona hˈaja. kwa hˈijo wˌataaŋɡˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌaliˌoaŋɡˈuka, wˌataʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini wˌatakˌapoˌaðibˈiwa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitajˌaondˈoa mavˈuno jˈao, asˈema bwˈana. hˌapatˌakuwˈepo zabˈibu kwˈeɲe mzabˈibu. hˌapatˌakuwˈepo na tˈini kwˈeɲe mtˈini, maɟˈani jˌake jˌataɲaˈuka. kˈile nˌilitʃowˈapa wˌataɲaŋɡˈaɲua..|0
kwa nˈini tˌunakˈeti hˈapa? kˌusaɲikˈeni pamˈoɟa! tˌukimbilˈie kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˌeɲe mabˈoma, tˌukaˌaŋɡamˈie hˌuko! kwa kˌuwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌametˌuhukˈumu kˌuaŋɡamˈia, na kutˈupa mˈaɟi jˌeɲe sˈumu tˈuɲue, kwa sabˈabu tˌumemtˈenda ðˈambi.|0
tˌulitˌeɡemˈea amˈani, lakˈini hakˈuna ɟˈema lˌililokˈuɟa, tˌulitˌeɡemˈea wakˈati wa kupˈona, lakˈini kˌulikˈuwa hˈofu tˈu.|0
mkorˈomo wa farˈasi za adˈui ˌumesikˈika kˌuanzˈia dˈani, kwa m̩lˈio wa madˈume jˈao ja farˈasi, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌinatˌetemˈeka. wˌamekˈuɟa kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo, ˈm̩ɟi na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake.|0
tazˈama, nˌitatˈuma ɲˈoka wˌeɲe sˈumu kˈali kˌatikˈati jˈenu, fˈira ambˈao hˌawawˈezi kulˈoɡwa, nˌao wˌatawaˈuma, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˈee mfarˈiɟi wˈaŋɡu katˌika huzˈuni, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumezimˈia ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
sikˈia kilˈio tʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali: ɟˈe, bwˈana hajˈuko sajˈuni? ɟˈe, mfˈalme wˌake hajˈuko tˈena hˌuko? kwa nˈini wˌamenˌikasirˈiʃa kwa viɲˈaɡo vjˈao, kwa sanˈamu zˈao za kiɡˈeni zˌisizofˈaa.|0
mavˈuno jˌamepˈita, kˌiaŋɡˈazi kˌimekwˈiʃa, nˌasi hˌatuɟˌaokolˈewa.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌamepˈondwa, nˌami nˌimepondˈeka pˈia; nˌinaˌombolˈeza, nˈajo hˈofu kˈuu ˌimeniʃˈika.|0
ɟˈe, hakˈuna zˈeri ja kupˈoɲa katˌika ɡˌileˈadi? ɟˈe, hakˈuna tabˈibu hˌuko? kwa nˈini bˌasi hakˈuna ˌupoɲˈaɟi wa mˌaɟerˈaha ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
laˈiti nˌiŋɡekˈuwa na ɲˈumba ja kukˈaa wˌasafˈiri ɟaŋɡwˈani, nˌiŋɡewaˈatʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kwˈenda mbˈali nˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˈote ni wazˈinzi, kˈundi la wˈatu wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
huwˈeka tajˈari ndˈimi zˈao kˌama upˈinde, ˌili kurˈuʃa uˈoŋɡo; wˌamekˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi lakˈini si katˌika ukwˈeli. wˌanatˈoka ðˈambi mˈoɟa hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine, hˌawanˌitambˈui mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ɟˌihaðˈari na rafˈiki zˈako; ˌusiwˌaamˈini ndˈuɡu zˈako. kwa kˌuwa kˈila ndˈuɡu ni mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu, na kˈila rafˈiki ni msˌiŋɡiziˈaɟi.|0
rafˈiki hˌumdaŋɡˈaɲa rafˈiki, hakˈuna jejˈote ˌasemˈaje kwˈeli. wˌamefundˈiʃa ndˈimi zˈao kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa, wˌanaɟitʃˈoʃa weɲˈewe katˌika kutˈenda ðˈambi.|0
ˌunakˈaa kˌatikˈati ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu; katˌika ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu wˌao wˌanakatˈaa kˌunitambˈua mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: tazˈama, nˌitawˌasafˈiʃa na kˌuwaɟarˈibu, kwˈani ni nˈini kiŋɡˈine nˌiwezˈatʃo kufˈaɲa kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈimi zˈao ni mʃˈale wˌeɲe sˈumu, hunˈena kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. kwa kˈiɲua tʃˈake kˈila mmˈoɟa hˌuzuŋɡˈumza manˈeno mazˈuri na ɟirˈani jˈake, lakˈini mojˈoni mwˈake hˌumteɡˈea mtˈeɡo.|0
ɟˈe, nˌisiwˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈambo hˈili? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, nˌisiɟˌilipizˈie kisˈasi kwa taˈifa kˌama hˈili.|0
nˌitalˈia na kˌuombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja milˈima na kˌuombolˈeza kuhˈusu malˈiʃo ja ɟaŋɡwˈani. jˌamekˈuwa ukˈiwa, wˈala hakˈuna ˌapitˈaje hˈumo, milˈio ja ŋɡˈombe hˌaisikˈiki. ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani wˌametorˈoka na waɲˈama wˌamekimbˈia.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu lˈundo la maɡˈofu, makˈao ja mbwˈeha; nˌami nˌitaifˈaɲa mˈiɟi ja jˈuda kˌuwa ukˈiwa ˌili ˌasiwˈepo ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
ni ˈm̩tu jˈupi alˈije na hekˈima ja kutˈoʃa ˌajaelˈewe hˈaja? ni nˈani ˌalijˌefundˈiʃwa na bwˈana ˌawezˈaje kˌujaelˈeza hˈaja? kwa nˈini ˈn̩tʃi ˌimehˌaribˈiwa na kufˈaɲua ukˈiwa kˌama ɟˈaŋɡwa ambˈapo hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kupˈita.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, ni kwa sabˈabu wˌameiˈatʃa ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu, nˌilijˌoiwˈeka mbˈele jˈao: hˌawaɟˌaniheʃˈimu mˌimi wˈala kˌufuˈata ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu.|0
badˈala jˌake wˌamefuˈata ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao, wˌamefuˈata mˌabaˈali, kˌama vˈile bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjˌowafundˈiʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: tazˈama, nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈatu hˈawa wˈale tʃakˈula kitʃˈuŋɡu na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˌeɲe sˈumu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: fikˈiri sˈasa! waˈite wˌanawˈake wˌaombˌolezˈao wˈaɟe, waˈite wˈale walˈio na ustˈadi kulˈiko wˈote.|0
nˌao wˈaɟe upˈesi na kˌutuˌombolezˈea, mpˈaka mˈatʃo jˈetu jˌafurˈike matʃˈozi na viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi vitˈoke kwˈeɲe kˈope zˈetu.|0
saˈuti ja kˌuombolˈeza ˌimesikˈika kutˈoka sajˈuni: tazˈama ɟˈinsi tˌulivjˌoaŋɡamˈizwa! tazˈama ɟˈinsi aˈibu jˈetu ilˈivjo kˈubwa! ni lazˈima tˌuihˈame ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu kwa sabˈabu ɲˈumba zˈetu zˌimekˈuwa maɡˈofu..|0
bˈasi, ˈeɲi wˌanawˈake, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana; fˌuŋɡuˈeni mˌasikˈio jˈenu msikˈie manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈake. wˌafundiʃˈeni bˈinti zˈenu kˌuombolˈeza; fˌundiʃanˈeni kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake mˌaombolˈezo.|0
maˈuti ˌimeiŋɡˈia ndˈani kˌupitˈia mˌadiriʃˈani, ˌimeiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe maɟˈumba jˈetu ja fahˈari; ˌimewˌakatilˈia mbˈali watˈoto katˌika bˌarabˈara na viɟˈana waˈume kutˈoka viwˈaɲɟa vja mˈiɟi.|0
sˈema, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana:  maˈiti za wˌanaˈume zˌitalˈala kˌama mˈavi katˌika maʃˈamba, kˌama malˈundo ja nafˈaka ɲˈuma ja mvunˈaɟi, wˈala hakˈuna ˌanajˌekusˈaɲa..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: mwˌeɲe hekˈima ˌasiɟisˈifu katˌika hekˈima jˈake, ˌau mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌaɟisˈifu katˌika ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, wˈala taɟˈiri ˌaɟisˈifu katˌika ˌutaɟˈiri wˈake.|0
lakˈini jˌeje ˌaɟisifˈuje, na ˌaɟisˈifu kwa sabˈabu hˈili: kwˌamba ˌananˌifahˈamu na kˌuniɟˈua mˈimi, kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitendˈaje wˈema, hukˈumu na hˈaki dˌuniˈani, kwa kˌuwa nˌapendˈezwa na hˈaja, asˈema bwˈana.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, nˌitakˌapowˌaaðˈibu wˈale wˈote ambˈao wˌametˌahirˈiwa kimwˈili tˈu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
jaˈani mˈisri, jˈuda, edˈomu, amˈoni, moˈabu na wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi ɟaŋɡwˈani sehˈemu za mbˈali. kwa maˈana mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˈote hˌajakˌutahirˈiwa miˈojo jˈao, nˈajo ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli hˌaikˌutahirˈiwa.|0
sˌikiˈeni lˈile ambˈalo bwˈana, anˈena nˌaɲi ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌusiɟifˈunze ɲɟˈia za mˌataˈifa wˈala ˌusitˈiʃwe na iʃˈara katˌika ˈaŋɡa, iŋɡˈawa mˌataˈifa jˌanatˈiʃwa nˈazo.|0
kwa maˈana destˈuri za mˌataˈifa hazˈina maˈana, wˌanakˈata ˈm̩ti msitˈuni, na fˈundi ˌanautʃˈoŋɡa kwa patˈasi.|0
wˌanaparˈemba kwa fˈeða na ðahˈabu, wˌanakikˈaza kwa ɲˈundo na mˌisumˈari ˌili kˌisitˌikisˈike.|0
hakˈuna alˈije kˌama wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana; wˌewe ni m̩kˈuu, ɟˈina lˈako ni lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu katˌika uwˈeza.|0
ni nˈani ambˈaje hˌaimpˈasi kˌukuheʃˈimu wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme wa mˌataˈifa? hˌii ni stahˈili jˈako. mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈote wˌeɲe hekˈima katˌika mˌataˈifa na katˌika fˈalme zˈao zˈote, hakˈuna alˈije kˌama wˈewe.|0
wˈote hawˈana akˈili, tˈena ni wˌapumbˈavu, wˌanafundˈiʃwa na sanˈamu za mˈiti zˌisizofˈaa lolˈote.|0
hulˈeta fˈeða ˌilijˌofulˈiwa kutˈoka tarʃˈiʃi na ðahˈabu kutˈoka ufˈazi. kˈile ambˈatʃo fˈundi na sonˈara wˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza huvˈikwa mavˈazi ja rˈaŋɡi ja samˈawi na ˌuruɟuˈani: vjˈote vikˈiwa vˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa na mafˈundi stˈadi.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wa kwˈeli, jˌeje n̩dˈije mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai, mfˈalme wa milˈele. ˌanapˌokasirˈika, dunˈia hˌutetemˈeka, mˌataˈifa hˌajawˈezi kˌustahimˈili hasˈira jˈake.|0
wˌaambˈie hˈivi: miˈuŋɡu hˌii, ambˈajo hˌaikuˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia, ˌitaˌaŋɡamˈia kutˈoka dunˈia na kutˈoka tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu..|0
ˌatoˈapo saˈuti jˈake, mˈaɟi jalˈijo katˌika mbˈiŋɡu hˌuŋɡurˈuma; hˌujafˈaɲa mawˈiŋɡu jˌainˈuke kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. hˌupelˈeka umˈeme wa rˈadi pamˈoɟa na mvˈua, nˌaje hˌuulˈeta upˈepo kutˈoka ɣˈala zˈake.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ni mɟˈiŋɡa na hˈana mˌaarˈifa, kˈila sonˈara ˌameˌaibˈiʃwa na sanˈamu zˈake. viɲˈaɡo vjˈake ni vja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, havˈina pˈumzi ndˈani jˈavjo.|0
jˌeje alˈije fˈuŋɡu la jakˈobo sˈivjo alˈivjo, kwˈani n̩dˈije muˈumba wa vˈitu vjˈote, pamˈoɟa na ˌisraˈeli, kabˈila la urˈiθi wˈake: bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
kˌusaɲˈeni mˈali na vˈitu vjˈenu mwondˈoke ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, ˈeɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika hˈali ja kˌuziŋɡˈirwa na ɟˈeʃi.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: wakˈati hˈuu, nˌitawatˈupa ɲɟˈe kwa ŋɡˈuvu wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii; nˌitawˌataabˈiʃa ˌili wawˈeze kutˈekwa.|0
ˈole wˈaŋɡu mˌimi kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuumˈia kwˈaŋɡu! ɟerˈaha lˈaŋɡu ni kˈubwa! lakˈini nˌilisˈema, kwˈeli hˌii ni aðˈabu jˈaŋɡu, nˌami ʃˈarti nˌiistˌahimˈili.|0
hˈema lˈaŋɡu lˌimeˌaŋɡamˈizwa; kˈamba zˌake zˈote zˌimekˈatwa. wˈana wˈaŋɡu wˌametˈekwa na hawˈapo tˈena; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijebˈaki wa kˌusimamˈiʃa hˈema lˈaŋɡu wˈala wa kˌusimamˈiʃa kibˈanda tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi hawˈana akˈili wˈala hˌawamˌuulˈizi bwˈana, hˈivjo hˌawastˈawi na kˈundi lˈao lˈote la kondˈoo lˌimetˌawaɲˈika.|0
sˌikilizˈeni! tˌaarˈifa ˌinakˈuɟa: ɣasˈia kˈubwa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini! hˌii ˌitafˈaɲa mˈiɟi ja jˈuda ukˈiwa, makˈao ja mbwˈeha.|0
nˌinaɟˈua, ˈee bwˈana, kwˌamba maˈiʃa ja mwˌanadˈamu si jˌake mweɲˈewe; hawˈezi kˌuzioŋɡˈoza hatˈua zˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌunirˈudi, ˈee bwˈana, lakˈini kwa kipˈimo tʃa hˈaki: si katˌika hasˈira jˈako, usˈiɟe ˌukanˌiaŋɡamˈiza.|0
umwˈaɡe ɣaðˈabu jˈako ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa wˌasiˌokuɟˈua wˈewe, ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa wˌasiˌoliitˈia ɟˈina lˈako. kwa kˌuwa wˌamemwˌaŋɡamˈiza jakˈobo; wˌamemwˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa na kˌuiharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
sikˈia manˈeno ja aɡˈano hˈili, nˌawe ˌuwaambˈie wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌaambˈie kwˌamba hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: ˌamelˌaanˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌatajatˈii manˈeno ja aɡˈano hˈili.|0
manˈeno nˌilijˌowaamˈuru bˈaba zˈenu nˌilipˌowatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, kutˈoka tanˈuru la kˌujejuʃˈia vjˈuma. nˌilisˈema, nˌitiˈini mˌimi na mfˈaɲe kˈila kˈitu nˌinatʃˌowaamˈuru, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitatimˈiza kiˈapo nˌilitʃˌowaapˈia bˈaba zˈenu, kuwˈapa ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo mnˌaimilˈiki lˈeo. nˌikaɟˈibu, ˈamen, bwˈana.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, taŋɡˈaza manˈeno hˈaja jˈote katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na katˌika bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu: sˌikilizˈeni manˈeno ja aɡˈano hˈili na kˌujafuˈata.|0
ʃˈu wakˈati ˈule nˌiliwˌapandˈiʃa bˈaba zˈenu kutˈoka mˈisri mpˈaka lˈeo, nˌiliwaˈoɲa tˈena na tˈena, nˌikisˈema nˌitiˈini mˈimi.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌusikilˈiza wˈala kuɟˈali. badˈala jˈake, wˌalifuˈata ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao miˈovu. hˈivjo nˌikalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao laˈana zˈote za aɡˈano nˌililokˈuwa nˌimewˌaamˈuru wˌao kˌulifuˈata, lakˈini wˌao hˌawakˌuliʃˈika..|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, kˈuna ʃaˈuri bˈaja lˌinalˌoendelˈea mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌamerudˈia ðˈambi za bˈaba zˈao, wˌaliˌokatˈaa kˌusikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu. wˌameˌifuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine kˌuitˌumikˈia. ɲˈumba zˈote mbˈili za ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda zˌimelivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano nˌililofˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈao.|0
kwa hˈivjo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao maˈafa ambˈajo hˌawawˈezi kˌujakimbˈia. hˌata kˌama wˌakinˌililˈia, sˌitawˌasikilˈiza.|0
mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌatakwˈenda kˌuililˈia miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo wˌameˌifukizˈia uvˈumba, lakˈini hˌaitˌawasˌaidˈia kˈamwe wakˈati maˈafa jˌatakˌapowapˈiɡa.|0
m̩nˈajo miˈuŋɡu mˈiŋɡi kˌama mˈiɟi m̩lˈijo nˈajo, ˈee jˈuda, nˈazo mˌaðabˈahu mlˌizoziɟˈeŋɡa za kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba hˈujo mˈuŋɡu wa aˈibu baˈali ni ɲˈiŋɡi kˌama bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu..|0
wˌewe ˌusiwˌaombˈee wˈatu hˈawa wˈala kufˈaɲa mˌaombˈezi jojˈote ˌau kˌunisˈihi kwa aɟˈili jˈao, kwa sabˈabu sˌitawˌasikilˈiza wˌatakˌaponiˈita wakˈati wa taˈabu jˈao.|0
mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu ˌanafˈaɲa nˈini hˌekalˈuni mwˈaŋɡu, ˌanapofˈaɲa mˌaʃaˈuri jˌake maˈovu na wˈeŋɡi? ɟˈe, ɲˈama ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu jawˈeza kˌuondolˈea mbˈali aðˈabu jˈako? ˌunapˌoɟiiŋɡˈiza katˌika ubˈaja wˈako, ndˈipo ˌunaʃˌaŋɡilˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌalikuˈita ˈm̩ti wa mzˌeitˈuni ˌuliostˈawi ulˈio na matˈunda mazˈuri kwa sˈura. lakˈini kwa ŋɡurˈumo ja mawˈimbi makˈuu ˌatautˈia mˈoto, nˈajo matˈawi jˌake jˌatavuɲɟˈika.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌalijˌekupˈanda, ˌametˈamka maˈafa kwa aɟˈili jˈako, kwa sabˈabu ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba ja jˈuda mmefˈaɲa maˈovu na kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa kwa kˌumfukizˈia baˈali uvˈumba.|0
kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌalinˌifunulˈia hˈila zˈao m̩bˈaja, nˌilizˌifahˈamu, kwa kˌuwa wakˈati ˈule ˌalinˌioɲˈeʃa jˈale wˌalijokˈuwa wˌanajafˈaɲa.|0
nˌilikˈuwa kˌama mwˌanakondˈoo mpˈole ˌalijˌeoŋɡˈozwa mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni; mˌimi sˌikutambˈua kwˌamba wˌalikˈuwa wˌamefˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, wˌakisˈema, sˌisi na tˌuuˌaŋɡamˈize ˈm̩ti na matˈunda jˈake; nˌasi tˌumkatilˈie mbˈali kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai, ˌili ɟˈina lˈake lˌisikumbˈukwe tˈena.|0
lakˈini, ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, wˌewe ˌuhukumˈuje kwa hˈaki, nˌawe ˌutʃuŋɡuzˈaje mˈojo na akˈili, wˈatʃa niˈone ˌukiwˌalipˈiza wˌao kisˈasi, kwa maˈana kwˈako nˌimewˈeka ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu wˈatu wa ˌanaθˈoθi wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈako wˌakisˈema, ˌusitˈoe ˌunabˈii kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana, la sˈivjo ˌutakˈufa kwa mikˈono jˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: nˌitawˌaaðˈibu. viɟˈana wˌao waˈume wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao kwa ɲɟˈaa.|0
hˌawatˌasazˈiwa hˌata mabˈaki kwˈao, kwa sabˈabu nˌitalˈeta maˈafa kwa wˈatu wa ˌanaθˈoθi katˌika mwˈaka wa aðˈabu jˈao..|0
