wˌewe daˈima u mwˌeɲe hˈaki, ˈee bwˈana, nˌiletˈapo maʃtˈaka mbˈele jˈako. hˌata hˈivjo nˌitazuŋɡˈumza nˌawe kuhˈusu hukˈumu jˈako: kwa nˈini ɲɟˈia ja waˈovu ˌinafˌanikˈiwa? kwa nˈini wasˈio wˌaaminˈifu wˈote wˌanaˈiʃi kwa rˈaha.|0
ˌumewapˈanda, nˌao wˌameˈota, wˌanakˈua na kuzˈaa matˈunda. daˈima u mˌidomˈoni m̩wˈao, lakˈini mbˈali na miˈojo jˈao.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌunaniɟˈua mˈimi, ˈee bwˈana; ˌunaniˈona na kˌujatʃuŋɡˈuza mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe. wˌakokˈote kˌama kondˈoo wˌanaokwˈenda kutʃˈiɲɟua! watˈeŋɡe kwa aɟˈili ja sˈiku ja kutʃˈiɲɟua.|0
ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˈaa katˌika hˈali ja kˌuombolˈeza mpˈaka lˈini, na maɟˈani katˌika kˈila ʃˈamba kˌuɲaˈuka? kwa sabˈabu wˈale wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˌake ni waˈovu, waɲˈama na ndˈeɡe wˌameˌaŋɡamˈia. zaˈidi ja hˈajo, wˈatu wˌanasˈema, bwˈana hˌataˈona jˌatakˌajotupˈata sˈisi.|0
ikˈiwa ˌumeʃindˈana m̩bˈio na wˈatu kwa m̩ɡˈuu na wˌakakuʃˈinda, ˌunawezˈaɟe kˌuʃindˈana na farˈasi? ikˈiwa ˌunaɟikwˈaa kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo ni salˈama, ˌutawezˈaɟe kwˈeɲe vitʃˈaka kˈando ja jordˈani.|0
ndˈuɡu zˈako, wˈatu wa ɟamˈaa jˈako mweɲˈewe: hˌata wˌao wˌamekˌusalˈiti; wˌameinˈua kilˈio kikˈubwa ðˈidi jˈako. ˌusiwˌaamˈini, iŋɡˈawa wˌanazuŋɡˈumza mˈema ɟˈuu jˈako.|0
urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu ˌumekˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama sˈimba wa msitˈuni. hˌuniŋɡˌurumˈia mˈimi, kwa hˈijo nˌinamtʃukˈia.|0
ɟˈe, urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu hˌaukˈuwa kˌama ndˈeɡe wa mawˈindo wa mˌadoadˈoa ambˈaje ndˈeɡe weŋɡˈine wˌawindˈao hˌumzuŋɡˈuka na kˌumʃambulˈia? nˈenda ˌukawˌakusˈaɲe pamˈoɟa waɲˈama wˈote wa mwitˈuni; walˈete ˌili wˈale.|0
wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈeŋɡi wˌatalˌiharˈibu ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu la mˌizabˈibu na kˌulikaɲˈaɡa ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu; wˌatalifˈaɲa ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu zˈuri kˌuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa la ukˈiwa.|0
lˌitafˈaɲua kˌuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa, lˌililˌokaˈuka na kuˈatʃwa ukˈiwa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu; ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌitafˈaɲua ɟˈaŋɡwa kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajeɟˈali.|0
ɟˌuːja mˌiinˈuko jˈote ilˈivjo kˌama ɟaŋɡwˈani mharˈabu ˌataɟˈaa, kwa maˈana upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana ˌutawˈala, kˌuanzˈia ˈn̩tʃa mˈoɟa ja ˈn̩tʃi hˌadi ɲiŋɡˈine; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajekˈuwa salˈama.|0
wˌatapˈanda ŋɡˈano lakˈini wˌatavˈuna miˈiba; wˌataɟˌitaabˈiʃa lakˈini hˌawatˌafaˈidi tʃotʃˈote. kwa hˈijo bˈeba aˈibu ja mavˈuno jˈako kwa sabˈabu ja hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa habˈari ja mˌaɟirˈani zˈaŋɡu wˈote wabˈaja wˌanaˌoɲaŋɡˈaɲa urˈiθi ambˈao nˌinawˈapa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, nˌitawaŋɡˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi zˈao, nˌami nˌitaiŋɡˈoa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda kutˈoka kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
lakˈini baˌada ja kˌuwaŋɡˈoa, nˌitawˌahurumˈia tˈena na kˌumrudˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao kwˈeɲe urˈiθi wˌake mweɲˈewe na kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ikˈiwa wˌataɟifˈunza vjˈema ɲɟˈia za wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kuˈapa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, wˌakisˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, hˌata kˌama wakˈati fulˈani wˌalifundˈiʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kuˈapa kwa baˈali, ndˈipo wˌatakˌapofˈaɲua imˈara kˌatikˈati ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kˌama taˈifa lolˈote hˌalitˌasikilˈiza na kutˈii, nˌitaliŋɡˈoa kabˈisa na kˌuliˌaŋɡamˈiza, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌoniambˈia: nˈenda ˌununˈue mkˈanda wa kitˈani, ˌuɟivˈike kˌiunˈoni mwˈako, lakˈini ˌusiuˈatʃe uɡˈuse mˈaɟi.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikanunˈua mkˈanda, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoniaɡˈiza, nˌikaɟivˈika kˌiunˈoni.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kwa mˈara ja pˈili.|0
tʃukˈua mkˈanda ˌuliˌonunˈua ambˈao ˌumeuvˈaa kˌiunˈoni mwˈako, uˈende sˈasa frˈati ˌuufˈitʃe ndˈani ja ˈufa mdˈoɡo kwˈeɲe mwˈamba.|0
ndˈipo nˌikaˈenda na kˌuufˈitʃa ˈule mkˈanda hˌuko frˈati, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjˌoniamˈuru.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˈenda sˈasa frˈati ˌukaˌutʃukˈue ˈule mkˈanda nˌiliˌokuambˈia ˌuufˈitʃe hˌuko.|0
hˈivjo nˌikaˈenda frˈati na kˌuutʃimbˈua ˈule mkˈanda kutˈoka pˈale nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimeufˈitʃa, lakˈini sˈasa ˌulikˈuwa ˌumehˌaribˈika na hˌaufˈai tˈena kabˈisa.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: vˈivjo hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokˌiharˈibu kibˈuri tʃa jˈuda na kibˈuri kikˈuu tʃa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˈatu hˈawa waˈovu, wˌanaˌokatˈaa kˌusikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, wˌafuatˈao ˌukaˈidi wa miˈojo jˈao na kˌufuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine kˌuitˌumikˈia na kˌuiabˈudu, wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mkˈanda hˈuu ambˈao hˌaufˈai kabˈisa.|0
kwa maˈana kˌama vˈile mkˈanda ˌufuŋɡwˈavjo kˌiunˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈm̩tu, ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌoɟifˈuŋɡa ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba jˈote ja jˈuda, asˈema bwˈana, ˌili wˈawe wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu, sˈifa na heʃˈima jˈaŋɡu. lakˈini hˌawaɟˌasikilˈiza..|0
wˌaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: kˈila kirˈiba ˌinapˈasa kiɟˈazwe mvˈiɲo. kˌama wˌao wˌakikˌuambˈia, kwˈani hˌatuɟˈui kwˌamba kˈila kirˈiba ˌinapˈasa kiɟˈazwe mvˈiɲo?.|0
kˈiʃa ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitawaɟˈaza ulˈevi wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, pamˈoɟa na wafˈalme wˌaketˈio ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi, mˌakuhˈani, mˌanabˈii na wˈale wˈote wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌitawˌaɡoŋɡanˈiʃa kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake, bˈaba na wˈana wˈao, asˈema bwˈana. sˌitawˌarehˈemu wˈala kˌuwahˌurumˈia ˌili niˈatʃe kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza..|0
sˌikiˈeni na mzˌiŋɡatˈie, msˈiwe na kibˈuri, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌamenˈena.|0
mpˈeni ˌutukˈufu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kˈabla hˌaɟalˈeta ɡˈiza, kˈabla miɡˈuu jˈenu hˌaiɟˌaɟikwˈaa ɟˌuːja vilˈima vˌitakˌavjotˈiwa ɡˈiza. mlˌitaraɟˈia nˈuru, lakˈini ˌataifˈaɲa kˌuwa ɡˈiza nˈene na kˌuibadˈili kˌuwa huzˈuni kˈubwa.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌamtasˌikilˈiza, nˌitalˈia sirˈini kwa aɟˈili ja kibˈuri tʃˈenu; mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌatalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, jˌakitˌirirˈika matʃˈozi, kwa sabˈabu kˈundi la kondˈoo la bwˈana lˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka.|0
mwambˈie mfˈalme na mamˈaje, ʃukˈeni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vˈiti vjˈenu vja ˈenzi, kwa kˌuwa tˈaɟi zˈenu za ˌutukˈufu zˌitaaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka vitʃwˈani mwˈenu.|0
mˈiɟi ˌilijˈoko neɡˈebu ˌitafˈuŋɡwa, wˈala hˌapatakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu wa kˌuifuŋɡˈua. wˈatu wa jˈuda wˈote wˌatapelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni, wˌakitʃˌukulˈiwa kabˈisa waˈende mbˈali.|0
inˈua mˈatʃo jˈako uˈone wˈale wˌanaokˈuɟa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini. lˈiko wˈapi lˈile kˈundi ˌulilˌokabiðˈiwa, kondˈoo wˈale ˌuliˌoɟivunˈia.|0
nˌawe kˌama ˌukiɟˌiulˈiza, kwa nˈini hˈaja jˌamenˌitokˈea? ni kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi ndˈipo marˈinda jˈako jˌamerˌarulˈiwa na mwˈili wˈako ˌumetendˈewa vibˈaja.|0
ɟˈe, mkˈuʃi awˈeza kˌubadˈili ŋɡˈozi jˌake ˌau tʃˈui kˌubadˈili mˌadoadˈoa jˈake? vˈivjo hˈivjo nˌawe huwˈezi kufˈaɲa mˈema wˌewe ˌulijˌezoˈea kutˈenda mabˈaja.|0
nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo na upˈepo wa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo kˈura jˈako, fˈuŋɡu nˌililˌokuˌamurˈia, asˈema bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ˌumenˌisahˈau mˌimi na kˌuamˈini miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo.|0
nˌitajˌafunˈua marˈinda jˈako mpˈaka ɟˌuːja ˈuso wˈako ˌili aˈibu jˈako ˌionekˈane.|0
uzˈinzi wˈako na kulˈia kwˈako kˌama farˈasi kˌulikoɟˈaa tamˈaa, ˌukahˈaba wˈako usˈio na aˈibu! nˌimejaˈona matˈendo jˈako ja mˌatʃukˈizo ɟˌuːja vilˈima na mˌaʃambˈani. ˈole wˈako, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu! ˌutaˌendelˈea kˌuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka lˈini.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno la bwˈana kwa jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu ukˈame.|0
jˈuda ˌanaˌombolˈeza, mˈiɟi jˌake ˌinajˌoðoofˈika; wˌanaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi, nˈatʃo kilˈio kˌinapˈanda kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wakˈuu wˌanawatˈuma wˌatumˈiʃi wˌao mˈaɟi; wˌanakwˈenda vˌisimˈani lakˈini hˈumo hakˈuna mˈaɟi. wˌanarˈudi na vjˈombo bˌila mˈaɟi; wakˈiwa na hˈofu na kukˈata tamˈaa, wˌanafunˈika vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
ˈarði ˌimepasˈuka ɲˈufa kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna mvˈua katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; wˌakulˈima wˈana hˈofu na wˌanafunˈika vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
hˌata kulˈuŋɡu mˌaʃambˈani ˌanamwˈatʃa mtˈoto wˌake ˌalijˌezalˈiwa wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna maɟˈani.|0
pˌundamwˈitu wˌanasimˈama ɟˌuːja mˌiinˈuko ilˈijo kˈame na kutwˈeta kˌama mbwˈeha; mˈatʃo jˈao jˌanakˈosa ŋɡˈuvu za kuˈona kwa aɟˈili ja kukˈosa malˈiʃo.|0
iŋɡˈawa ðˈambi zˈetu zˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ɟˈuu jˈetu, ˈee bwˈana, tˈenda ɟˈambo kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako. kwa kˌuwa kˌukeŋɡeˈuka kwˈetu ni kukˈubwa, nˌasi tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ˈee tˌumaˈini la ˌisraˈeli, mwokˈozi wˌake wakˈati wa taˈabu, kwa nˈini ˌunakˈuwa kˌama mɡˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, kˌama msafˈiri ˌanajekˈaa kwa usˈiku mmˈoɟa tˈu.|0
mbˈona ˌunakˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeʃtukˈizwa, kˌama ʃuɟˈaa asˈije na uwˈezo wa kˌuokˈoa? wˌewe ˈuko kˌatikˈati jˈetu, ˈee bwˈana, nˌasi tˌunaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako; ˌusituˈatʃe.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu wˈatu hˈawa: wˌanapˈenda sˈana kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa, hˌawaˌizuˈii miɡˈuu jˈao. hˈivjo bwˈana hˌawakubˈali; sˈasa ˌataˌukumbˈuka uˈovu wˌao na kˌuwaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌusiˈombe kwa aɟˈili ja mˌafanikˈio ja wˈatu hˈawa.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌanafˈuŋɡa, sˌitasˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈao; hˌata wˌakitˈoa ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu za nafˈaka, sˌitazˌikubˈali. badˈala jˈake, nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni.|0
lakˈini nˌikasˈema, ˈaa, bwˈana mweɲˈezi, mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌendelˈea kˌuwaambˈia, hˌamtaˈona upˈaŋɡa wˈala kˌukabilˈiwa na ɲɟˈaa. nˈaam, nˌitawˈapa amˈani ja kudˈumu mahˈali hˈapa..|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mˌanabˈii wˌanatabˈiri uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. sˌikuwatˈuma, wˈala sˌikuwawˈeka, wˈala sˌikusˈema nˈao. wˌanawˌatabirˈia maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo, mˌaaɡˈuzi, maˈono ja sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa kˈitu, na mˌadaŋɡˈaɲo ja mawˈazo jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌotabˈiri kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu: mˌimi sˌikuwatˈuma, lakˈini wˌanasˈema, hakˈuna upˈaŋɡa wˈala ɲɟˈaa ˌitakˌajoiɡˈusa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. mˌanabˈii hˈao hˈao wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa na ɲɟˈaa.|0
nˌao wˈatu hˈao wˌanaˌowatˌabirˈia wˌatatˈupwa ɲɟˈe katˌika bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu kwa sabˈabu ja ɲɟˈaa na upˈaŋɡa. hˌapatˌakuwˈepo jejˈote wa kˌuwazˈika wˌao ˌau wˌake zˈao, wˈana wˌao ˌau bˈinti zˈao. nˌitawˌamwaɡˈia maˈafa wˌanajˌostahˈili.|0
nˈena nˌao nˈeno hˈili:  mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu na jˌatirirˈikwe na matʃˈozi usˈiku na mtʃˈana bˌila kukˈoma; kwa kˌuwa bˈinti jˈaŋɡu alˈije bikˈira, jaˈani wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, ˌamepˈata ɟerˈaha bˈaja, pˈiɡo la kˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
kˌama nˌikiˈenda mˌaʃambˈani, nˌinaˈona wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa; kˌama nˌikiˈenda mɟˈini, nˌinaˈona mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja ɲɟˈaa. nabˈii na kuhˈani kwa pamˈoɟa wˌamekwˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌasijˌoiɟˈua..|0
ɟˈe, ˌumemkatˈaa jˈuda kabˈisa? ˌumemtʃukˈia sajˈuni kabˈisa? kwa nˈini ˌumetˌuumˈiza hˌata hˌatuwˈezi kˌupoɲˈeka? tˌulitˌaraɟˈia amˈani, lakˈini hakˈuna ɟˈema lˌililˌotuɟˈia; tˌulitˌaraɟˈia wakˈati wa kupˈona lakˈini kˈuna hˈofu kˈuu tˈu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, tˌunatambˈua uˈovu wˈetu na kˈosa la bˈaba zˈetu; kwˈeli tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈako ˌusitˌutʃukˈie kabˈisa; ˌusikˌiðarˈau kˈiti tʃˈako tʃa ˈenzi kˌilitʃˌotukˈuka. kumbˈuka aɡˈano lˈako nˌasi na ˌusilivˈuɲɟe.|0
ɟˈe, kˈuna sanˈamu jojˈote ˌisijofˈaa kˈitu ja mˌataˈifa ˌiwezˈajo kulˈeta mvˈua? ɟˈe, ˈaŋɡa pˈeke jˌake zawˈeza kutˈoa mvˈua? la hˈaʃa, ni wˌewe pˈeke jˈako, ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu. kwa hˈijo tˌumaˈini lˈetu lˈiko kwˈako, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ndˈiwe ˌufaɲˈaje hˈaja jˈote.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia: hˌata kˌama mˈose na samwˈeli wˌaŋɡesimˈama mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌusiŋɡˌewaˌelekˈea wˈatu hˈawa. wˌaondˈoe mbˈele za mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu! waˈatʃe waˈende.|0
nˌao kˌama wˌakikˌuulˈiza, twˈende wˈapi? wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo:  wˈale wˌaliowˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja kˈufa, wakˈafe; wˌaliowˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja upˈaŋɡa, kwa upˈaŋɡa; wˌaliowˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja ɲɟˈaa, kwa ɲɟˈaa: wˌaliowˈekwa kwa aɟˈili ja kutˈekwa, watˈekwe..|0
bwˈana asˈema, nˌitatˈuma aˈina ˈn̩ne za wˌaharˈabu ðˈidi jˈao: nˈazo ni upˈaŋɡa ˌili kuˈua na ˈm̩bwa ˌili wˌakokˈote mbˈali, ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi ˌili kˈula na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈawe mˌatʃukˈizo kwa fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia kwa sabˈabu ja kˈile ˌalitʃofˈaɲa manˈase mwˈana wa hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ni nˈani ˌatakˌajekˌuhurumˈia, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˈako? ni nˈani ˌatakˌajesimˈama ˌili kˌuulˈiza kuhˈusu hˈali jˈako.|0
ˌumenˌikatˈaa mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana. ˌunazˈidi kˌukeŋɡeˈuka. hˈivjo nˌitaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌukuˌaŋɡamˈiza, siwˈezi kˌuendelˈea kˌukuonˈea hurˈuma.|0
nˌitawˌapepˈeta kwa ˈuma wa kˌupepetˈea kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja mˈiɟi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. nˌitalˈeta msˈiba na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana hˌawaɟˌabadˈili ɲɟˈia zˈao.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa waɟˈane wˌao kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko mtʃˈaŋɡa wa bahˈari. wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri nˌitamlˈeta mharˈabu ðˈidi ja mˈama wa viɟˈana wˌao waˈume; kwa ɣafˈula nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao mˌaumˈivu makˈuu na hˈofu kˈuu.|0
mˈama mwˌeɲe watˈoto sˈaba ˌatazimˈia na kˌupumˈua pˈumzi jˌake ja mwˈiʃo. ɟˈua lˈake lˌitatˈua kuŋɡˈali bˈado mtʃˈana, ˌatatˌahajarˈika na kˌufeðehˈeka. wˈale wˈote wˌaliobˈaki nˌitawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa mbˈele ja adˈui zˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˈole wˈaŋɡu, mˈama jˈaŋɡu, kwˌamba ˌulinizˈaa, ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote ˌunaʃindˈana na kˌuɡombˈana nˈaje! sˌikukˈopa wˈala sˌikukopˈeʃa, lakˈini kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌananˌilaˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, hakˈika nˌitakˌuokˈoa kwa kusˈudi ɟˈema, hakˈika nˌitawafˈaɲa adˈui zˈako wˌakuˈombe msaˈada ɲakˈati za maˈafa na ɲakˈati za ðˈiki.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu awˈeza kuvˈuɲɟa tʃˈuma, tʃˈuma kˌitokˈatʃo kˌaskazˈini, ˌau ʃˈaba.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na hazˈina zˈako nˌitavitˈoa kˌuwa ɲˈara, bˌila ɣarˈama, kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈako zˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˈote.|0
nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe mtˈumwa wa adˈui zˈako katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌusijˌoiɟˈua, kwa kˌuwa katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu mˈoto ˌumewˈaʃwa ˌutakˌaowˈaka ɟˈuu jˈako daˈima.|0
wˌewe ˌunafahˈamu, ˈee bwˈana, ˌunikumbˈuke na ˌunitˈunze mˈimi. lipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja watˈesi wˈaŋɡu. kwa ˌuvumilˈivu wˈako ˌusinˌiondolˈee mbˈali; kumbˈuka ɟˈinsi nˌinavjˌoʃutumˈiwa.|0
manˈeno jˈako jˌalipokˈuɟa, nˌilijˈala; jakˈawa ʃˈaŋɡwe jˈaŋɡu na furˈaha ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimeˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kˈamwe sˌikukˈeti katˌika kˈundi la wˌafaɲˈao ʃerˈehe, wˈala kˈamwe sˌikuɟˌifurahˈiʃa pamˈoɟa nˈao; nˌilikˈeti pˈeke jˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu mkˈono wˈako ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, na wˌewe ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeniɟˈaza hasˈira.|0
kwa nˈini mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu hˌajakˈomi, na ɟerˈaha lˈaŋɡu ni la kˌuhuzunˈiʃa, wˈala hˌalipoɲˈeki? ɟˈe, ˌutakˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama kiɟˈito tʃa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, kˌama tʃemtʃˈemi ˌilijˌokaˈuka.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kˌama ˌukitˈubu, nˌitakˌureɟˈeza ˌili uwˈeze kˌunitˌumikˈia; kˌama ˌukinˈena manˈeno jˌeɲe maˈana, wˈala si ja upˈuzi, ˌutakˈuwa mnenˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu. wˈatu hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaokˌuɡeukˈia, wˈala si wˌewe ˌutakˌajewˌaɡeukˈia wˈao.|0
nˌitakufˈaɲa wˌewe ˈuwe ukˈuta kwa wˈatu hˈawa, ŋɡˈome ja ukˈuta wa ʃˈaba; wˌatapiɡˈana nˌawe lakˈini hˌawatˌakuʃˈinda, kwa maˈana mˌimi nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˌawe kˌukupˈoɲa na kˌukuokˈoa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitakˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mikˈono ja waˈovu, na kˌukukombˈoa kutˈoka makˈutʃa ja wˈatu wˌakatˈili.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia.|0
kˈamwe ˌusiˈoe na kˌuwa na wˈana wˈala bˈinti mahˈali hˈapa.|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu wˈana na bˈinti wˌazaliwˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, na kuhˈusu wˈale wˌanawˈake ambˈao ni mˈama zˈao, na wˈale wˌanaˈume ambˈao ni bˈaba zˈao.|0
wˌatakˈufa kwa maɡˈoɲɟua ja kufˈiʃa. hˌawatˌaombˌolezˈewa wˈala kuzˈikwa, lakˈini wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˈavi jˌalijˌosambˈaa ɟˌuːja ˈarði. wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa na kwa ɲɟˈaa, nˈazo maˈiti zˈao zˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, na tʃa waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌusiiŋɡˈie katˌika ɲˈumba ambˈajo kˈuna tʃakˈula tʃa matˈaŋɡa, ˌusiˈende kˌuwaˌombolezˈea wˈala kˌuwahˌurumˈia, kwa sabˈabu nˌimezˌiondˈoa barˈaka zˈaŋɡu, upˈendo wˈaŋɡu na hurˈuma zˈaŋɡu kutˈoka kwa wˈatu hˈawa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wakˈubwa na wadˈoɡo wˌatakˈufa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. hˌawatazˈikwa wˈala kˌuombˌolezˈewa, na hakˈuna ˌatakˌajeɟˌikatakˈata ˌau kuɲˈoa ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈapa tʃakˈula ˌili kˌuwafarˈiɟi wˈale wˌaombˌolezˈao kwa aɟˈili ja wˈale wˌaliokˈufa, hˌata akˈiwa ˌamefˈiwa na bˈaba ˌau mˈama, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈapa kˌiɲuˈaɟi ˌili kˌuwafarˈiɟi.|0
ˌusiiŋɡˈie katˌika ɲˈumba ambˈajo kˈuna karˈamu, na kukˈeti hˈumo ˌili kˈula na kˈuɲua.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, alˈije mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako na katˌika sˈiku zˈako, nˌitakomˈeʃa saˈuti zˈote za ʃˈaŋɡwe na za furˈaha, na pˈia saˈuti za bˈibi arˈusi na bwˈana arˈusi mahˈali hˈapa..|0
ˌutakˌapowˌaambˈia wˈatu hˈawa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote na wˌakakˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌameamˈuru maˈafa makˈubwa kˌama hˈaja ðˈidi jˈetu? tˌumefˈaɲa kˈosa ɡˈani? tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi ɡˈani ðˈidi ja bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu?.|0
bˌasi wˌaambˈie, ni kwa sabˈabu bˈaba zˈenu wˌaliniˈatʃa mˈimi, wˌakafuˈata miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˌili kˌuitˌumikˈia na kˌuiabˈudu. wˌaliniˈatʃa mˌimi na hˌawakˌuiʃˈika ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi mmetˈenda uˈovu zaˈidi kulˈiko bˈaba zˈenu. tazˈama ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanafuˈata ˌukaˈidi wa mˈojo wˌake m̩bˈaja, badˈala ja kˌunitˈii mˈimi.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawˌaondˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na kˌuwatˈupa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˈiɲi wˈala bˈaba zˈenu hˌamkuiɟˈua, nˈako hˌuko mtˌaitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine usˈiku na mtʃˈana, kwa maˈana sˌitawˈapa faðˈili zˈaŋɡu hˌuko..|0
hˌata hˈivjo, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati ambˈapo wˈatu hˌawatasˈema tˈena, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˌalijˌewapandˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri,.|0
bˌali wˌatasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˌalijˌewatˈoa wˈana wa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini na ˈn̩tʃi zˈote ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamewˌafukuzˈia. maˈana nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao.|0
lakˈini sˈasa nˌitawˌaaɡˈiza wavˈuvi wˈeŋɡi, asˈema bwˈana, nˌao wˌatawavˈua. baˌada ja hˈilo, nˌitawˌaaɡizˈia wˌawindˈaɟi wˈeŋɡi, nˌao wˌatawawˈinda kwˈeɲe kˈila mlˈima na kilˈima, na katˌika ɲˈufa za miˈamba.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌanaziˈona ɲɟˈia zˈao zˈote, hˌazikˌufitʃˈika kwˈaŋɡu, wˈala ðˈambi jˈao hˌaikˌusitirˈika.|0
nˌitawˌalipˈiza mˌaradˈufu kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wˌao na ðˈambi jˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌameˌinaɟˈisi ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu kwa maˈumbo jasˈijo na uhˈai ja viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vibˈaja, na kˌuuɟˈaza urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu na sanˈamu za kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu na ŋɡˈome jˈaŋɡu, kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu wakˈati wa taˈabu, kwˈako mˌataˈifa jˌatakuɟˈia kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia na kusˈema, bˈaba zˈetu hˌawakˈuwa na tʃotʃˈote zaˈidi ja miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo, sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa kˈitu ambˈazo hˌazikˌuwafˌaidˈia lolˈote.|0
ɟˈe, wˈatu hˌuɟitˌeŋɡenezˈea miˈuŋɡu jˈao weɲˈewe? nˈaam, lakˈini hˈao si miˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa: wakˈati hˈuu nˌitawˌafundˈiʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu na uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ðˈambi ja jˈuda ˌimetʃˈorwa kwa kalˈamu ja tʃˈuma, ˌimeandˈikwa kwa ˈn̩tʃa ja almˈasi, kwˈeɲe vibˈao vja miˈojo jˈao na kwˈeɲe pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu zˈao.|0
hˌata watˈoto wˌao wˌanakumbˈuka mˌaðabˈahu zˈao na ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera, kˌandokˈando ja mˈiti ˌilijotˈanda na ɟˌuːja vilˈima virˈefu.|0
mlˈima wˈaŋɡu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi pamˈoɟa na ˌutaɟˈiri na hazˈina zˈako zˈote nˌitazitˈoa zˈiwe ɲˈara, pamˈoɟa na mahˈali pˈako pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˈote.|0
kwa kˈosa lˈako mweɲˈewe ˌutaˌupotˈeza urˈiθi nˌiliokˈupa. nˌitakufˈaɲa mtˈumwa wa adˈui zˈako katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˌusijˌoiɟˈua, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeiwˈaʃa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, nˈajo ˌitawˈaka milˈele.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌamelˌaanˈiwa jˌeje ˌamteɡˌemeˈaje mwˌanadˈamu, ˌateɡˌemeˈaje mwˌeɲe mwˈili kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, ambˈaje mˈojo wˌake ˌumemwˈatʃa bwˈana.|0
ˌatakˈuwa kˌama kitʃˈaka tʃa ɟaŋɡwˈani; hˌataˈona mˌafanikˈio jˌatakˌapokˈuɟa. ˌataˈiʃi katˌika sehˈemu zisˈizo na mˈaɟi, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja tʃˈumvi ambˈapo hakˈuna jejˈote ˌaiʃˈije hˈumo.|0
lakˈini ˌamebˌarikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ambˈaje tˌumaˈini lˈake ni katˌika bwˈana, ambˈaje mˌatumaˈini jˌake ni katˌika bwˈana.|0
ˌatakˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌuliopˈandwa kˈando ja mˈaɟi ˌuenezˈao mizˈizi jˌake karˈibu na kiɟˈito tʃa mˈaɟi. hˌauoɡˈopi wakˈati wa ɟˈoto uɟˈapo; maɟˈani jˌake ni mabˈitʃi daˈima. haˈuna hˈofu katˌika mwˈaka wa ukˈame na hˌautaˈatʃa kuzˈaa matˈunda.|0
mˈojo ni mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu kulˈiko vˈitu vjˈote, ni mwˈovu kupˈita kiˈasi. ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuuɟˈua.|0
mˌimi bwˈana hˌutʃuŋɡˈuza mˈojo na kˌuziɟarˈibu nˈia, ˌili kumlˈipa ˈm̩tu kwa kadˈiri ja mwenˈendo wˈake, kwa kadˈiri ja matˈendo jˌake jˌanavjˌostahˈili.|0
kˌama kwˈare ˌaaŋɡuˈaje majˈai ˌasijˌojatˈaɡa, ndˈivjo alˈivjo ˈm̩tu ˌapatˈaje mˈali kwa ɲɟˈia zisˈizo za hˈaki. maˈiʃa jˌake jˌafikˈapo kˌatikˈati, sˈiku zˌitamwˈatʃa, na mwiʃˈoni ˌatabˌainˈika kˌuwa mpumbˈavu.|0
kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi kˌilitʃˌotukˈuzwa, kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa ʃˈu mwˈanzo, n̩dˈijo sehˈemu jˈetu ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ulˈije tˌumaˈini la ˌisraˈeli, wˈote wˌakuatʃˈao wˌataˌaibˈika. wˈale wˌanaˌoɡeukˈia mbˈali nˌawe wˌataandˈikwa mˌavumbˈini kwa sabˈabu wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana, tʃemtʃˈemi ja mˈaɟi jalˈijo hˈai.|0
ˌunipˈoɲe, ˈee bwˈana, nˌami nˌitapoɲˈeka; ˌuniokˈoe nˌami nˌitaokˈoka, kwa maˈana wˌewe ndˈiwe nˌinajˌekusˈifu.|0
wˌao hˌuendelˈea kˌuniambˈia, lˈiko wˈapi nˈeno la bwˈana? sˈasa na lˌitimˈie.|0
sˌiɟakˌukimbˈia na kuˈatʃa kˌuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈako; ˌunaɟˈua sˌiɟaˌitamˈani sˈiku ja kukˈata tamˈaa. kˈile kˌipitˈatʃo mˌidomˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kˈi wˈazi mbˈele jˈako.|0
usˈiwe kwˈaŋɡu kˈitu tʃa kˌunitˈia hˈofu kˈuu; wˌewe ndˈiwe kˌimbilˈio lˈaŋɡu katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa.|0
watˈesi wˈaŋɡu na wˌaaibˈiʃwe, lakˈini nilˈinde mˌimi nˌisiˌaibˈike; wˌao na watˈiwe hˈofu kˈuu, lakˈini ˌunilˈinde mˌimi na hˈofu kˈuu. wˌaletˈee sˈiku ja maˈafa; wˌaaŋɡamˈize kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi mˌaradˈufu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌoniambˈia: nˈenda ˌukasimˈame kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la wˈatu, mahˈali ambˈako wafˈalme wa jˈuda hˌuiŋɡilˈia na kˌutokˈea, simˈama pˈia kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo meŋɡˈine jˈote ja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌaambˈie, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wafˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌaɲi wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda, na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaiʃˈije jˌerusalˈemu ˌapitˈaje katˌika malˈaŋɡo hˈaja.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ɟˌihaðarˈini msˈiɟe mkabˈeba mzˈiɡo sˈiku ja sabˈato, wˈala kˌuiŋɡˈiza mzˈiɡo kˌupitˈia malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
msitˈoe mizˈiɡo ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba zˈenu wˈala kufˈaɲa kˈazi jojˈote wakˈati wa sabˈato, lakˈini ˌitakasˈeni sˈiku ja sabˈato, kˌama nˌilivjˌowaamˈuru bˈaba zˈenu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo hˌawakˌusikilˈiza wˈala kuɟˈali, wˌaliʃupˈaza ʃˈiŋɡo zˈao, na hˌawakutˈaka kˌusikˈia wˈala kˌukubˈali aðˈabu.|0
lakˈini mkˈiwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌunitˈii, asˈema bwˈana, nˌaɲi msˌipolˈeta mzˈiɡo wowˈote kˌupitˈia malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wakˈati wa sabˈato, lakˈini mkˌaitakˈasa sˈiku ja sabˈato kwa kˌutofˈaɲa kˈazi sˈiku hˈijo.|0
ndˈipo wafˈalme wˌakaˈao ɟˌuːja kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi wˌataiŋɡˈia kˌupitˈia malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˈao. wˌao na mˌaafˈisa wˌao wˌatakˈuɟa wakˈiwa wˌamepˈanda maɡˈari na farˈasi, wˌakiˌandamˈana na wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu, nˌao ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutakalˈiwa na wˈatu daˈima.|0
wˈatu wˌatakˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini na tʃˈini ja vilˈima vja mˌaɣarˈibi, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima na neɡˈebu, wˌakilˈeta sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu, sadˈaka za nafˈaka, uvˈumba na sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa hˌamtanitˈii mˌimi kwa kˌuitakˈasa sabˈato na kwa kˌutotʃukˈua mzˈiɡo wowˈote mnˌapoiŋɡˈia katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu wakˈati wa sabˈato, bˌasi nˌitawˈaʃa mˈoto ˌusiˌozimˈika katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu ˌutakˌaotˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome zˈake..|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
ʃˈuka uˈende mpˈaka ɲˈumba ja mfiɲˈanzi, nˌami hˌuko nˌitakˈupa uɟˈumbe wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikaʃˈuka mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mfiɲˈanzi, nˌikamkˈuta ˌakifiɲˈaŋɡa kwa ɡˌurudˈumu lˈake.|0
lakˈini tʃˈombo ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌakikˌifiɲˈaŋɡa kˌutokˈana na udˈoŋɡo kˌilivuɲɟˈika mˌikonˈoni mwˈake, hˈivjo mfiɲˈanzi ˌakakifˈaɲa kˌuwa tʃˈombo kiŋɡˈine, ˈumbo ɟiŋɡˈine kˌama vˈile ˌilivjˌoonekˈana vjˈema kwˈake jˈeje.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ɟˈe, siwˈezi kˌuwafaɲˈia kˌama hˈuju mfiɲˈanzi ˌafaɲˈavjo? asˈema bwˈana. kˌama vˈile udˈoŋɡo ulˈivjo katˌika mikˈono ja mfiɲˈanzi, ndˈivjo mlˈivjo katˌika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ikˈiwa wakˈati wowˈote nˌikitaŋɡˈaza kˌuwa taˈifa ˌau ufˈalme ˌutaŋɡolˈewa, ˌutaaŋɡˈuʃwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
ikˈiwa lˈile taˈifa nˌililˌoliˈoɲa lˌitatubˈia uˈovu wˈake, ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokˈuwa na hurˈuma, wˈala sˌitawapˈiɡa kwa maˈafa nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimewˌakusudˈia.|0
ikˈiwa ˌutafˈaɲa maˈovu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu na hˌukunitˈii, ndˈipo nˌitakˌapoɣaˈiri mˌakusudˈio jˈaŋɡu mˈema nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimejˌakusudˈia.|0
bˌasi kwa hˈijo wˌaambˈie wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tazˈama! nˌinaandˈaa maˈafa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, nˌami nˌinabˈuni mabˈaja ðˈidi jˈenu. kwa hˈijo ɡˌeukˈeni kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈenu m̩bˈaja, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu, tˌeŋɡenezˈeni ɲɟˈia zˈenu na matˈendo jˈenu..|0
lakˈini wˌao wˌataɟˈibu, hakˈuna faˈida. tˌutaˌendelˈea na mipˈaŋɡo jˈetu weɲˈewe, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu ˌatafuˈata ˌukaˈidi wa mˈojo wˌake m̩bˈaja..|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌulizˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa: ni nˈani ˌaliʃˌasikˈia ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili? ɟˈambo la kutˈiʃa sˈana lˌimefˈaɲua na bikˈira ˌisraˈeli.|0
ɟˈe, barˈafu ja lˌebanˈoni ˌiliwˈahi kˌutowˈeka kwˈeɲe mˌiterˈemko jˌake ja mˈawe wakˈati wowˈote? ɟˈe, mˈaɟi jˌake barˈidi jˌatokˈajo katˌika vjˈanzo vilˈivjo mbˈali jˌaliwˈahi kukˈoma kˌutirirˈika wakˈati wowˈote.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌamenˌisahˈau mˈimi, wˌanafˌukizˈia uvˈumba sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa kˈitu, zˌilizˌowafˈaɲa wˌaɟikwˈae katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈao na katˌika mapˈito ja zamˈani. zˌimewafˈaɲa wapˈite kwˈeɲe vˌitʃotʃˈoro na kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara ambˈazo hˌazikuɟˈeŋɡwa.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌitahˌaribˈiwa, ˌitakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa daˈima; wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu nˈajo wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa na kˌutikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
kˌama upˈepo ˌutokˈao mˌaʃarˈiki, nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa mbˈele ja adˈui zˈao; nˌitawˈapa kisˈoɡo wˈala sˈio ˈuso, katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa jˈao.|0
wˌakasˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, tutˈuŋɡe hˈila ðˈidi ja jˌeremˈia; kwa kˌuwa kˌufundˈiʃa ʃerˈia kwa kuhˈani hˌakutˌapotˈea, wˈala ʃaˈuri lˌitokˈalo kwa mwˌeɲe hekˈima, wˈala nˈeno la mˌanabˈii. hˈivjo ɲɟoˈoni, tˌumʃambulˈie kwa ndˈimi zˈetu na tˌusiɟˈali tʃotʃˈote ˌasemˈatʃo.|0
nˌisikilˈize, ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia wˌanajosˈema waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, mˈema jalˈipwe kwa mabˈaja? lakˈini wˌao wˌamenˌitʃimbˈia ʃˈimo. kumbˈuka kwˌamba nˌilisimˈama mbˈele jˈako na kunˈena mˈema kwa aɟˈili jˈao, ˌili wˌewe ˌuɡeˈuze hasˈira jˈako kˈali mbˈali nˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌuwaˈatʃe watˈoto wˌao waˈone ɲɟˈaa; ˌuwaˈatʃe wˌauˈawe kwa makˈali ja upˈaŋɡa. wˌake zˈao wasˈiwe na watˈoto, na wˈawe waɟˈane; waˈume wˌao wˌauˈawe, nˌao viɟˈana wˌao waˈume watʃˈiɲɟue kwa upˈaŋɡa vitˈani.|0
kilˈio na kˌisikˈike kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba zˈao ɣafˈula ˌuwaletˈapo adˈui ðˈidi jˈao, kwa kˌuwa wˌametʃˈimba ʃˈimo ˌili kˌunikamˈata na wˌameˌiteɡˈea miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu mitˈeɡo.|0
lakˈini ˌunaɟˈua, ˈee bwˈana, hˈila zˈao zˈote za kˌuniˈua. ˌusijˌasamˈehe makˈosa jˈao wˈala ˌusifˈute ðˈambi zˈao mbˈele za mˈatʃo jˈako. wˌao na wˌaaŋɡamˈizwe mbˈele zˈako; ˌuwaʃˌuɣulikˈie wakˈati wa hasˈira jˈako.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˈenda ˌukanunˈue ɡˌudulˈia la udˈoŋɡo kutˈoka kwa mfiɲˈanzi. wˌatʃukˈue baˈaði ja wazˈee wa wˈatu na wa mˌakuhˈani.|0
na mtˈoke mwˈende mpˈaka kwˈeɲe bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, karˈibu na ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la viɡˈae. hˌuko taŋɡˈaza manˈeno nˌinajˌokuambˈia.|0
nˌawe usˈeme, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wafˈalme wa jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: sˌikilizˈeni! nˌitalˈeta maˈafa mahˈali hˈapa, ambˈajo jˌatafˈaɲa mˌasikˈio ja kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajesikˈia habˈari zˌake jawˈaʃe.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌameniˈatʃa na kˌupafˈaɲa mahˈali hˈapa kˌuwa pa miˈuŋɡu ja kiɡˈeni. wˌameˌitekˌetezˈea sadˈaka miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo wˌao wˈala bˈaba zˈao wˈala wafˈalme wa jˈuda kˈamwe hˌawakˌuiɟˈua, nˌao wˌameliɟˈaza enˈeo hˈili kwa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia.|0
wˌameɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pa baˈali ˌili kˌuteketˈeza wˈana wˌao katˌika mˈoto kˌama sadˈaka kwa baˈali, kˈitu ambˈatʃo sˌikukˌiamˈuru wˈala kˌukitˈaɟa, wˈala hˌakikˌuiŋɡˈia ˌakilˈini mwˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈivjo ɟˌihaðarˈini, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati wˈatu hˌawatˌapaˈita tˈena mahˈali hˈapa tofˈeθi ˌama bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, bˌali bˈonde la matʃˈiɲɟo.|0
nˌitaˌiharˈibu mipˈaŋɡo ja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu mahˈali hˈapa. nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌaaŋɡˈuke kwa upˈaŋɡa mbˈele ja adˈui zˈao, katˌika mikˈono ja wˈale wˌatafutˈao uhˈai wˈao, nˌami nˌitaitˈoa mizˈoɡa jˈao kˌuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitaˌuharˈibu ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na kˌuufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa. wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa na kˌuuðihˈaki kwa sabˈabu ja mˌaɟerˈaha jˌake jˈote.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌao kˈula ɲˈama ja wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao; kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈula ɲˈama ja mwenzˈake wakˈati wa ðˈiki ja kˌuzuŋɡˈukwa na ɟˈeʃi lˌililowˈekwa ɟˈuu jˈao na adˈui wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao..|0
kˈiʃa livˈuɲɟe lˈile ɡˌudulˈia wˈale walˈio pamˈoɟa nˌawe wakˈiwa wˌanaˌaŋɡalˈia.|0
ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: nˌitalivˈuɲɟa taˈifa hˈili na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kˌama ɡˌudulˈia hˈili la mfiɲˈanzi lˌilivjovˈuɲɟua, nˈalo hˌaliwˈezi kˌuteŋɡˌenezˈeka tˈena. wˌatawazˈika wˌaliokˈufa hˌuko tofˈeθi hˌata ˌisiwˈepo nafˈasi zaˈidi.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjopafˈaɲa mahˈali hˈapa na kwa wˈale wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitaufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kˌama tofˈeθi.|0
ɲˈumba zˌilizˈoko jˌerusalˈemu na zˈile za wafˈalme wa jˈuda zˌitatˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi kˌama mahˈali hˈapa, tofˈeθi: jaˈani ɲˈumba zˈote ambˈazo wˌalifukˈiza uvˈumba ɟˌuːja mapˈaa jˌake kwa ɟˈeʃi lˈote la aŋɡˈani, na kˌumimˈina ðabˈihu za vˌiɲuˈaɟi kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine..|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakarˈudi kutˈoka tofˈeθi, mahˈali ambˈapo bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtˈuma kutˈoa ˌunabˈii, ˌakasimˈama katˌika ˈua wa hekˈalu la bwˈana na kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu wˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: sˌikilizˈeni! nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu pamˈoɟa na viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌouzuŋɡˈuka kˈila maˈafa nˌilijosˈema ðˈidi jˈake, kwa sabˈabu wˌamekˈuwa na ʃˈiŋɡo ŋɡˈumu, na hˌawakˌujasˌikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu..|0
ikˈawa kuhˈani paʃˈuri mwˈana wa imˈeri, m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa wa hekˈalu la bwˈana, ˌalipˌomsikˈia jˌeremˈia ˌakitˈoa ˌunabˈii ɟˌuːja mˈambo hˈaja.|0
sˈiku ja pˈili paʃˈuri ˌalipˌomwatʃˈia kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mkatˈale, jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana hˌakukuˈita ɟˈina lˈako kˌuwa paʃˈuri bˌali mˈaɡor mˌisabˈibu.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌuwa hˈofu kˈuu kwˈako wˌewe mweɲˈewe na rafˈiki zˈako wˈote, na kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe ˌutawaˈona wˌakiaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa wa adˈui zˈao. nˌitawatˈia jˈuda wˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ambˈaje ˌatawˌatʃukˈua na kˌuwapelˈeka babˈeli, ˌama ˌawaˈue kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
nˌitatˈia ˌutaɟˈiri wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kwa adˈui zˈao: jaˈani mazˈao jˈao jˈote, vˈitu vjˈao vjˈote vja θamˈani, na hazˈina zˈote za wafˈalme wa jˈuda. wˌatavitwˈaa kwa ɲˈara na kˌuvipelˈeka babˈeli.|0
nˌawe paʃˈuri pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ɲˈumba jˈako mtakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli. mtafˈia hˈumo na kuzˈikwa, wˌewe na rafˈiki zˈako wˈote ambˈao ˌumewˌatabirˈia uˈoŋɡo..|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌumenˌidaŋɡˈaɲa, nˌami nˌikadˌaŋɡaɲˈika; wˌewe ˈuna ŋɡˈuvu kˌunilˈiko, nˌawe ˌumeniʃˈinda. nˌinaðˌaraulˈiwa mtʃˈana kˈutwa, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌananˌiðihˈaki.|0
kˈila nˌinenˈapo, nˌinapˈiɡa kelˈele nˌikitaŋɡˈaza ˌukatˈili na ˌuharibˈifu. kwa hˈijo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌimenˌiletˈea mˌatukˈano na mˌaʃutˈumu mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
lakˈini kˌama nˌikisˈema, sˌitamtˈaɟa wˈala kusˈema tˈena kwa ɟˈina lˈake, nˈeno lˈake lˌinawˈaka ndˈani ja mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kˌama mˈoto, mˈoto ˌuliofˈuŋɡwa ndˈani ja mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu. nˌimetʃˈoka sˈana kwa kˌulizuˈia ndˈani mwˈaŋɡu; kwˈeli, siwˈezi kˌuɟizuˈia.|0
nˌinasikˈia mˌinoŋɡˈono mˈiŋɡi, hˈofu ˈiko pˈande zˈote! mʃtakˈini! twendˈeni tumʃtˈaki! rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu wˈote wˌananˌisubˈiri nˌitelˈeze, wˌakisˈema, lˈabda ˌatadˌaŋɡaɲˈika; kˈiʃa tˌutamʃˈinda na kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˌami kˌama ʃuɟˈaa mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu; hˈivjo waʃtˈaki wˈaŋɡu wˌataɟikwˈaa na kˈamwe hˌawataʃˈinda. wˌataʃˈindwa, nˌao wˌataˌaibˈika kabˈisa; kukˈosa adˈabu kwˈao hˌakutˌasahˌaulˈiwa.|0
ˈee bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, wˌewe ˌumɟaribˈuje mwˌeɲe hˈaki na kupˈima mˈojo na nˈia, hˈebu niˈone ˌukilipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˈuu jˈao, kwa maˈana kwˈako nˌimeliwˈeka ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu.|0
mwˌimbiˈeni bwˈana! mpˈeni bwˈana sˈifa! jˌeje hˌuokˈoa uhˈai wa mhitˈaɟi kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waˈovu.|0
ˌilaanˈiwe sˈiku nˌilijˌozalˈiwa! nˈajo ˌisibˌarikˈiwe ˈile sˈiku mˈama jˈaŋɡu ˌalijˌonizˈaa.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijˌemletˈea bˈaba jˈaŋɡu habˈari, jˈule ˌalijemfˈaɲa ˌafurˈahi sˈana, ˌakisˈema, mtˈoto ˌamezalˈiwa kwˈako, tˈena mtˈoto wa kiˈume.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo na ˈawe kˌama mˈiɟi ˈile ambˈajo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu ˌaliˌiaŋɡamˈiza bˌila hurˈuma. jˌeje na ˌasikˈie mˌaombolˈezo ˌasubˈuhi na kilˈio tʃa vˈita ˌaðuhˈuri.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌakuniˈua nikˈiwa tumbˈoni, hˈivjo mˈama jˈaŋɡu ˌaŋɡekˈuwa kabˈuri lˈaŋɡu, nˈalo tˈumbo lˈake la uzˈazi lˌiŋɡebˈaki kˌuwa kˈubwa daˈima.|0
kwa nˈini bˌasi nˌilitˈoka tumbˈoni ˌili kuˈona taˈabu na huzˈuni, na kˌuzimalˈiza sˈiku zˈaŋɡu katˌika aˈibu.|0
nˈeno lˌilimɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana wakˈati mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌalipˌowatˈuma paʃˈuri mwˈana wa malkˈija, na kuhˈani sˌefanˈia mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja kwˈake, kusˈema.|0
tˌuulizˈie sˈasa kwa bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌanatˌuʃambulˈia. lˈabda bwˈana ˌatatˈenda mˌaaɟˈabu kwa aɟˈili jˈetu kˌama ɲakˈati zˌilizopˈita, ˌili nˌebukadnˈeza ˌatuˌondokˈee.|0
lakˈini jˌeremˈia ˌakawaɟˈibu, mwˌambiˈeni sˌedekˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuwaɡˌeuzˈia silˈaha za vˈita zilˈizo mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, ambˈazo mnˌatumˈia kˌupiɡˈana na mfˈalme wa babˈeli na wˌakaldˈajo ambˈao wˈako ɲɟˈe ja ukˈuta wˌakiwˌazuŋɡˈuka kwa ɟˈeʃi. nˌami nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitapiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈenu kwa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa na mkˈono wa ŋɡˈuvu, kwa hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu kˈali na ukˈali mwˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, wˈatu na waɲˈama, nˌao wˌatauˈawa kwa taˈuni ja kutˈiʃa.|0
baˌada ja hˈajo, nˌitamtˈia sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mˌaafˈisa wˌake na wˈatu wa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ambˈao wˌalinˌusurˈika taˈuni, upˈaŋɡa na ɲɟˈaa, mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, na kwa adˈui zˈao wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao. ˌatawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa; hˌatakˈuwa na rehˈema ɟˈuu jˈao ˌau hurˈuma wˈala kˌuwasˌikitikˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, wˌaambˈie wˈatu hˈawa, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tazˈama, nawˈeka mbˈele jˈenu ɲɟˈia ja uzˈima, na ɲɟˈia ja maˈuti.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈaa katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa ˌau taˈuni. lakˈini jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈoka na kˌuɟisˌalimˈiʃa kwa wˌakaldˈajo ambˈao wˌameˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kwa ɟˈeʃi, ˌatanˌusurˈika, nˌaje ˌataˈiʃi.|0
nˌimekˌusudˈia kˌuufaɲˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ɟˈambo bˈaja, wˈala si ɟˈema. ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌataˌuteketˈeza kwa mˈoto, asˈema bwˈana..|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, ambˈia ɲˈumba ja mfˈalme ja jˈuda, sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
ˈewe ɲˈumba ja daˈudi, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo:  hˌukumˈuni kwa hˈaki kˈila ˌasubˈuhi, mwˌokoˈeni mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mðalˈimu jˌeje ˌalijetˈekwa ɲˈara, la sˈivjo ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitalipˈuka na kuwˈaka kˌama mˈoto kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu mlˌioufˈaɲa: ˌitawˈaka na hakˈuna wa kˌuizˈima.|0
nˈiko kiɲˈume nˈawe, ˈee jˌerusalˈemu, wˌewe ˌuiʃˈije ɟˌuːja bˈonde hˈili kwˈeɲe uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu wa miˈamba, asˈema bwˈana, wˌewe ˌusemˈaje, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˈuɟa kiɲˈume tʃˈetu? nˈani ˌataiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa kˌimbilˈio lˈetu.|0
nˌitawˌaaðˈibu kˌama ˌistahilˈivjo matˈendo jˈenu, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawˈaʃa mˈoto katˌika misˈitu jˈenu ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌowazuŋɡˈuka..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ʃˈuka kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ˌutaŋɡˈaze uɟˈumbe hˈuu hˌuko.|0
sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈee mfˈalme wa jˈuda, wˌewe ˌuketˈije kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi: wˈewe, mˌaafˈisa wˈako na wˈatu wˈako mnˌaopitˈia malˈaŋɡo hˈaja.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: tˈenda hˈaki na adˈili. mwokˈoe mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mðalˈimu jˌeje ˌalijetˈekwa ɲˈara. ˌusimtendˈee mabˈaja wˈala ˌukatˈili mɡˈeni, jatˈima ˌau mɟˈane, wˈala ˌusimwˈaɡe dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia mahˈali hˈapa.|0
kwa kˌuwa ukˈiwa mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja, ndˈipo wafˈalme wˌatakˌaokalˈia kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi wˌatakˌapoiŋɡˈia kˌupitˈia malˈaŋɡo ja ɟˈumba hˈili la kifˈalme, wakˈiwa wˌamepˈanda maɡˈari na farˈasi, hˈuku wˌakifˌuatˈana na mˌaafˈisa wˌao na wˈatu wˈao.|0
lakˈini kˌama hˌutajatˈii mˌaaɡˈizo hˈaja, asˈema bwˈana, nˌinaˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu kwˌamba ɟˈumba hˈili lˌitakˈuwa ɡˈofu..|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme wa jˈuda: iŋɡˈawa ˈuko kˌama ɡˌileˈadi kwˈaŋɡu, kˌama kilˈele tʃa lˌebanˈoni, hakˈika nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe kˌama ɟˈaŋɡwa, kˌama mˈiɟi ambˈajo hˌaiɟˌakalˈiwa na wˈatu.|0
nˌitawatˈuma wˌaharˈabu ðˈidi jˈako, kˈila ˈm̩tu akˈiwa na silˈaha zˈake, nˌao wˌatazikˈata borˈiti zˈako nzˈuri za mˌierˈezi na kˌuzitˈupa motˈoni.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi wˌatapitˈia karˈibu na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na kˌuulizˈana, kwa nˈini bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa ɟˈambo la nˈamna hˌii ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mkˈubwa?.|0
nˈalo ɟˈibu lˌitakˈuwa: kwa sabˈabu wˌameliˈatʃa aɡˈano la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao, na wˌameabˈudu na kˌuitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine..|0
ˌusimlilˈie jˌeje ˌalijekˈufa, wˈala ˌusimwˌombolezˈee; badˈala jˈake, ˌafaðˈali ˌumlilˈie kwa utʃˈuŋɡu jˈule ˌalijˌepelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni, kwa sabˈabu kˈamwe hˌataˌirudˈia wˈala kˌuiˈona tˈena ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ˌalikˌozalˈiwa.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu ʃalˈumu mwˈana wa josˈia, ˌalijˌeiŋɡˈia mahˈali pa bˈaba jˌake kˌuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, lakˈini ˌameondˈoka mahˈali hˈapa: jˌeje kˈamwe hˌatarˈudi tˈena.|0
ˌatafˈia hˌuko mahˈali wˌalipˌompelˈeka kˌuwa matˈeka; hˌataiˈona tˈena ˈn̩tʃi hˌii.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌaɟeŋɡˈaje ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme kwa ɲɟˈia ja ðulˈuma, vjˈumba vjˈake vja ɟˈuu kwa ˌuðalˈimu, ˌakiwˌatumikˈiʃa wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake pasˈipo malˌipo, bˌila kˌuwalˈipa kwa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈao.|0
asˈema, nˌitaɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea ɟˈumba kˈuu la kifˈalme, na vjˈumba vja ɟˈuu vjˌeɲe nafˈasi kˈubwa. hˈivjo ˌanawˈeka ndˈani jˌake mˌadirˈiʃa makˈubwa, huwˈeka kˈuta za m̩bˈao za mˌierˈezi, na kˌuipˈamba kwa rˈaŋɡi ɲekˈundu.|0
ɟˈe, ˌinakufˈaɲa kˌuwa mfˈalme hˌuko kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja mˌierˈezi? ɟˈe, bˈaba jˈako hakˈuwa na tʃakˈula na kˌiɲuˈaɟi? ˌalifˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa na hˈaki, hˈivjo jˌeje ˌakafˌanikˈiwa katˌika jˈote.|0
ˌaliwˌatetˈea maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi, hˈivjo jˌeje ˌakafˌanikˈiwa katˌika jˈote. ɟˈe, hˈijo si n̩dˈijo maˈana ja kˌuniɟˈua mˈimi? asˈema bwˈana.|0
lakˈini mˈatʃo jˈako na mˈojo wˈako vˌimeˌelekˈezwa tu katˌika mapˈato ja ˌuðalˈimu, kwa kumwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia, kwa ˌuonˈevu na ˌukatˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda: hˌawatˌamwombˌolezˈea wˌakisˈema: ˈole, ndˈuɡu jˈaŋɡu! ˈole, ˈumbu lˈaŋɡu! hˌawatˌamwombˌolezˈea wˌakisˈema: ˈole, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu! ˈole, fahˈari jˈake!.|0
ˌatazˈikwa mazˈiko ja pˈunda: ˌataburˈutwa na kutˈupwa ɲɟˈe ja malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
pˈanda lˌebanˈoni ˌukapˈiɡe kelˈele, saˈuti jˈako na ˌisikˈike hˌuko baʃˈani, pˈiɡa kelˈele tˌoka ˌabarˈimu, kwa kˌuwa wˈote wˌaliˌoɟiˈuŋɡa nˌawe wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
nˌilikuˈoɲa wakˈati ˌulipˌoɟisikˈia kwˌamba ˈuko salˈama, lakˈini ˌulisˈema, mˌimi sˌitasˌikilˈiza! hˌii ˌimekˈuwa kˌawaˈida jˈako ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈako; hˌuɟanitˈii mˈimi.|0
upˈepo ˌutawˌaondˈoa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈako wˈote, na wˈale ˌuliˌouŋɡˈana nˌao wˌataˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. kˈiʃa ˌutaˌaibˈika na kˌufeðehˈeka kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˈako wˈote.|0
wˌewe ˌuiʃˈije lˌebanˈoni, wˌewe ˌulijˌetulˈia kwˈeɲe maɟˈeŋɡo ja mˌierˈezi, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌutakˌavjoˌombolˈeza mˌaumˈivu makˈali jˌatakˌapokupˈata, mˌaumˈivu kˌama jˈale ja mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana, hˌata kˌama wˈewe, jˌekonˈia mwˈana wa jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ˌuŋɡekˈuwa pˈete jˈaŋɡu ja muhˈuri katˌika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu wa kuˈume, bˈado nˌiŋɡekuŋɡˈoa hˈapo.|0
nˌitakutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈako, wˈale ˌunaˌowaoɡˈopa, jaˈani nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli na kwa wˌakaldˈajo.|0
nˌitakutˈupa mbˈali wˌewe na mˈama ˌalijˌekuzˈaa mwˈende katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine, ambˈajo hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌalijˌezalˈiwa hˌuko, nˌaɲi mtafˈia hˌuko.|0
kˈamwe hˌamtarˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mlˌijotamˈani kˌuirudˈia.|0
ˈee ˈn̩tʃi, ˈn̩tʃi, ˈn̩tʃi, sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: mwandˈike hˈuju ˈm̩tu kˌama asˈije na mtˈoto, ˈm̩tu ambˈaje hˌatafˌanikˈiwa maˈiʃa jˌake jˈote, kwa maˈana hakˈuna mtˈoto wˌake ˌatakˌajefˌanikˈiwa, wˈala kukˈaa kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi wˈala kˌuendelˈea kˌutawˈala katˌika jˈuda.|0
ˈole wˌao wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌanaˌoharˈibu na kˌutawˈaɲa kondˈoo wa malˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu! asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌanalˌowaambˈia wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌanaˌowatʃˈuŋɡa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu: kwa sabˈabu mmˌelitawˈaɲa kˈundi lˈaŋɡu na kˌuwafˌukuzˈia mbˈali, wˈala hˌamkuwatˈunza, bˌasi mˌimi nˌitawˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu mlˌiofˈaɲa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitajˌakusˈaɲa mabˈaki ja kˈundi lˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi zˈote ambˈazo nˌimewˌafukuzˈia, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa katˌika malˈiʃo jˈao, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌatazˈaa na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka idˈadi jˈao.|0
nˌitawˈeka wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi ɟˈuu jˈao ambˈao wˌatawatʃˈuŋɡa, nˌao hˌawatˌaoɡˈopa tˈena ˌau kutˈiʃwa, wˈala hˌatapotˈea hˌata mmˈoɟa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
bwˈana asˈema, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, nˌitakˌapomwˌinulˈia daˈudi tˈawi lˈeɲe hˈaki, mfˈalme ˌatakˌajetawˈala kwa hekˈima, na kutˈenda lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
katˌika sˈiku zˈake, jˈuda ˌataˌokolˈewa na ˌisraˈeli ˌataˈiʃi salˈama. hˈili ndˈilo ɟˈina ˌatakˌaloˈitwa: bwˈana hˈaki jˈetu.|0
hˈivjo bˈasi, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, wakˈati ambˈapo wˈatu hˌawatasˈema tˈena, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˌalijˌewapandˈiʃa wˌaisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri,.|0
bˌali wˌatasˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo, ˌalijˌewatˈoa wazˈao wa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini na ˈn̩tʃi zˈote ˌalizokˈuwa ˌamewˌafukuzˈia, asˈema bwˈana. ndˈipo wˌataˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
kuhˈusu mˌanabˈii: mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumevuɲɟˈika ndˈani jˈaŋɡu; mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu jˈote ˌinatˌetemˈeka. nˌimekˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijelˈewa, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌelemˈewa na divˈai, kwa sabˈabu ja bwˈana na manˈeno jˌake mˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌimeɟˈaa wazˈinzi; kwa sabˈabu ja laˈana, ˈn̩tʃi ˌimekaˈuka na malˈiʃo jˌalijˈoko ɲikˈani jˌamekaˈuka. mwenˈendo wa mˌanabˈii ni m̩bˈaja na mamlˈaka jˈao si ja hˈaki.|0
nabˈii na kuhˈani wˈote si wˈatʃa mˈuŋɡu; hˌata hˌekalˈuni mwˈaŋɡu nˌinaˈona uˈovu wˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo mapˈito jˈao jˌatakˈuwa ˌutelˈezi, wˌatafˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali ɡizˈani na hˌuko wˌataaŋɡˈuka. nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈao katˌika mwˈaka wa kˌuaðibˈiwa kwˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌanabˈii wa sˌamarˈia nˌililiˈona ɟˈambo la kˌutʃukˈiza: wˌalitabˈiri kwa baˈali na kˌuwapotˈoʃa ˌisraˈeli wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˈako mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌanabˈii wa jˌerusalˈemu nˌimeˈona ɟˈambo bˈaja sˈana: wˌanafˈaɲa uzˈinzi na kˌuenˈenda katˌika uˈoŋɡo. wˌanatˈia ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ja watˈenda mabˈaja, kwa aɟˈili hˈijo hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajˌeatʃˈana na uˈovu wˈake. wˈote wˈako kˌama sodˈoma kwˈaŋɡu; wˈatu na jˌerusalˈemu wˈako kˌama ɡomˈora.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu mˌanabˈii: nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈale tʃakˈula kitʃˈuŋɡu na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˌalijotˈiwa sˈumu, kwa sabˈabu kˌutokˈana na mˌanabˈii wa jˌerusalˈemu kˌutokˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu kˌumeenˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: msˌisikilˈize wˌanatʃˌowatˌabirˈia mˌanabˈii, wˌanawaɟˈaza mˌatumaˈini ja uˈoŋɡo. wˌanasˈema maˈono kutˈoka akˈili zˈao weɲˈewe, hˌajatˈoki katˌika kˈiɲua tʃa bwˈana.|0
hˌuendelˈea kˌuwaambˈia wˈale wˌanaˌoniðarˈau mˈimi, bwˈana asˈema: mtakˈuwa na amˈani. kwa wˈale wˈote wˌafuatˈao uɡˈumu wa miˈojo jˈao, wˌao husˈema, hakˈuna ðˈara lˌitakˌalowapˈata..|0
lakˈini ni jˈupi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌalijˌesimˈama katˌika barˈaza la bwˈana ˌili kuˈona ˌau kˌusikˈia nˈeno lˈake? ni nˈani ˌalijˌesikilˈiza na kˌusikˈia nˈeno lˈake.|0
hasˈira ja bwˈana hˌaitˌaɡeˈuka mpˈaka ˌamelˌitimˈiza kusˈudi la mˈojo wˈake. sˈiku ziɟˈazo mtˌalifahˈamu kwa wˈazi.|0
mˌimi sˌikuwatˈuma mˌanabˈii hˈawa, lakˈini bˈado wˌamekimbˈia wˌakitaŋɡˈaza uɟˈumbe wˈao. mˌimi sˌikusˈema nˈao, lakˈini wˌametabˈiri.|0
lakˈini kˌama wˌaŋɡesimˈama bˌarazˈani mwˈaŋɡu, wˌaŋɡetaŋɡˈaza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌaŋɡewˌaɡeˈuza kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja na kutˈoka matˈendo jˈao maˈovu.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu jejˈote awˈeza kˌuɟifˈitʃa mahˈali pa sˈiri ˌili nˌisiwˈeze kumwˈona? bwˈana asˈema. ɟˈe, mˌimi sˌikuiɟˈaza mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi? bwˈana asˈema.|0
nˌimesikˈia wˌanajˌojasˈema mˌanabˈii, hˈao wˌanaˌotabˈiri uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. wˌanasˈema, nˌimeˈota ndˈoto! nˌimeˈota ndˈoto!.|0
mˈambo hˈaja jˌataˌendelˈea mpˈaka lˈini ndˈani ja miˈojo ja hˈawa mˌanabˈii wa uˈoŋɡo, ambˈao hˌutabˈiri maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo ja akˈili zˈao weɲˈewe.|0
wˌanaðˈani ndˈoto wˌanazˌoambiˈana wˌao kwa wˌao zˌitawafˈaɲa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌalisahˈau ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, kˌama bˈaba zˈao wˌalivjˌolisahˈau ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kwa kˌumwabˈudu baˈali.|0
mwˈatʃe nabˈii alˈije na ndˈoto asˈeme ndˈoto jˈake, lakˈini jˈule alˈije na nˈeno lˈaŋɡu na ˌalisˈeme kwa ˌuaminˈifu. kwa maˈana ɟˈani kˈavu lˈina ˌuhusiˈano ɡˈani na ŋɡˈano? asˈema bwˈana.|0
ɟˈe, nˈeno lˈaŋɡu si kˌama mˈoto, asˈema bwˈana, na kˌama ɲˈundo ˌivuɲɟˈajo mwˈamba vipˈande vipˈande.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˈiko kiɲˈume na mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌoibiˈana manˈeno kˈana kwˌamba ni jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˈaam, mˌimi nˈiko kiɲˈume na mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌotikˈisa ndˈimi zˈao weɲˈewe na kusˈema, bwˈana asˈema..|0
kwˈeli, nˈiko kiɲˈume na hˈao wˌanaˌotabˈiri ndˈoto za uˈoŋɡo, asˈema bwˈana. wˌanazˌisimulˈia na kˌuwapotˈoʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kwa uˈoŋɡo wˌao bˌila kuɟˈali, lakˈini sˌikuwatˈuma wˈala sˌikuwˌaamˈuru. hˌawawˌafaˈidi wˈatu hˈawa hˌata kidˈoɡo, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wakˈati wˈatu hˈawa, ˌau nabˈii, ˌau kuhˈani wˌatakˌapokˌuulˈiza, mzˈiɡo wa bwˈana ni nˈini? wˌewe ˌutawˌaambˈia, nˈiɲi n̩dˈio mzˈiɡo. nˌami nˌitawavˈua kˌama vˈazi, asˈema bwˈana..|0
lakˈini kˈamwe msisˈeme tˈena, nˈina mzˈiɡo wa bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu kˈila nˈeno la ˈm̩tu binˈafsi lˌinakˈuwa mzˈiɡo wˌake mweɲˈewe, na hˈivjo kˌupotˈoʃa manˈeno ja mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌutakˌavjoˌendelˈea kˌumuulˈiza nabˈii: bwˈana ˌamekuɟˈibu nˈini? ˌau ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌamesˈema nˈini?.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌunadˈai, hˈuu n̩dˈio mzˈiɡo wa bwˈana, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: ˌulitumˈia manˈeno, hˈuu n̩dˈio mzˈiɡo wa bwˈana, hˌata iŋɡˈawa nˌilikˌuambˈia kˌuwa kˈamwe ˌusisˈeme, hˈuu ni mzˈiɡo wa bwˈana..|0
kwa hˈijo, hakˈika nˌitakˌusahˈau na kˌukutˈupa mbˈali na ˈuso wˈaŋɡu pamˈoɟa na ˈm̩ɟi nˌiliowˈapa nˈiɲi na bˈaba zˈenu.|0
nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈako feðˈeha ja kudˈumu: jaˈani aˈibu ja kudˈumu ambˈajo hˌaitˌasahˌaulˈika.|0
baˌada ja jˌekonˈia mwˈana wa jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda, pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa, mafˈundi stˈadi na wahˈunzi wa jˈuda, kˌutʃukulˈiwa kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kwˈenda babˈeli na nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni hˌuko babˈeli, bwˈana ˌakanˌioɲˈeʃa vikˈapu viwˈili vja tˈini vˌilivjowˈekwa mbˈele ja hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
kikˈapu kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa na tˈini nzˈuri sˈana, kˌama zˈile za mavˈuno ja kwˈanza. kikˈapu tʃa pˈili kˌilikˈuwa na tˈini ðaˈifu sˈana, mbˈovu ˈm̩no zˌisizofˈaa kulˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiulˈiza, ɟˈe, jˌeremˈia, ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikamɟˈibu, nˌinaˈona tˈini zˈile zilˈizo nzˈuri ni nzˈuri sˈana, lakˈini zilˈizo ðaˈifu ni mbˈovu ˈm̩no zˌisizofˈaa kulˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: kˌama zilˈivjo hˈizi tˈini nzˈuri, ndˈivjo nˌinavjˌowaˈona kˌuwa bˈora wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo kutˈoka jˈuda, nˌiliˌowaondˈoa kutˈoka mahˈali hˈapa kwˈenda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌatakˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈao kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuwapatˈia mˈema, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii. nˌitawaɟˈeŋɡa wˈala sˌitawˌabomˈoa, nˌitawapˈanda wˈala sˌitawaŋɡˈoa.|0
nˌitawˈapa mˈojo wa kˌunifahˈamu mˈimi, kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana. wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, kwa maˈana wˌatanˌirudˈia kwa mˈojo wˌao wˈote.|0
lakˈini kˌama zilˈivjo zˈile tˈini ðaˈifu, ambˈazo ni mbˈovu ˈm̩no zˌisizofˈaa kulˈiwa, asˈema bwˈana, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjomtendˈea sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, mˌaafˈisa wˌake na mabˈaki weŋɡˈine kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu, wˈawe wˌamebˈaki katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, ˌau wˌanaˈiʃi mˈisri.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa kˌuwa tʃukˈizo kabˈisa na kˈitu tʃa kˌulaumˈiwa katˌika mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia, wˌatakˈuwa aˈibu na kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa, tʃˈombo tʃa ðihˈaka na kˌulaanˈiwa, popˈote nˌitakˌapowˌafukuzˈia.|0
nˌitautˈuma upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni ðˈidi jˈao hˌadi wˈawe wˌameˌaŋɡamˈia kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa wˌao na bˈaba zˈao..|0
nˈeno lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda, katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
hˈivjo nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda na wˈale wˈote wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kwa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mitˈatu, kˌuanzˈia mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa josˈia mwˈana wa amˈoni mfˈalme wa jˈuda, hˌadi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌimekˈuwa lˌikiniɟˈia, nˌami nˌimesˈema nˌaɲi mˈara kwa mˈara, lakˈini hˌamkusˌikilˈiza.|0
iŋɡˈawa bwˈana ˌamewatˈuma wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote hˈao mˌanabˈii kwˈenu mˈara kwa mˈara, hˌamkusˌikilˈiza wˈala hˌamkuɟˈali.|0
wˌalisˈema, ɡˌeukˈeni sˈasa, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu kutˈoka ɲɟˈia jˌake m̩bˈaja na matˈendo jˌake maˈovu, ndˈipo mtawˈeza kukˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo bwˈana ˌaliwˈapa nˈiɲi na bˈaba zˈenu milˈele.|0
msˌiifuˈate miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˌili kˌuitˌumikˈia na kˌuiabˈudu. msˌinikˌasirˈiʃe kwa vˈitu ambˈavjo mmˌevitˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa mikˈono jˈenu.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi hˌamkunˌisikilˈiza mˈimi, tˈena mkˌanikˌasirˈiʃa kwa vˈitu mlˌivjovˌiteŋɡenˈeza kwa mikˈono jˈenu, nˌaɲi mmˌeɟiletˈea maðˈara ɟˈuu jˈenu weɲˈewe, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitajaˈita mˌataˈifa jˈote ja kˌaskazˈini na mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawalˈeta wˌaiʃˌambulˈie ˈn̩tʃi hˌii na wakˈazi wˌake wˈote, na ðˈidi ja mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka. nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa na kˌuwafˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiwa na kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa, na kˌuwa maɡˈofu daˈima.|0
nˌitawˌaondolˈea saˈuti ja ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha, saˈuti ja bˈibi na bwˈana arˈusi, saˈuti ja mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia, na mwˈaŋɡa wa tˈaa.|0
ˈn̩tʃi hˌii jˈote ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa na ˌisijofˈaa kˈitu, nˈajo mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˌatamtˌumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli kwa miˈaka sabˈini.|0
lakˈini miˈaka sabˈini ˌitakˌapotimˈia, nˌitamwaðˈibu mfˈalme wa babˈeli na taˈifa lˈake na ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo kwa aɟˈili ja hatˈia jˈao, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitaifˈaɲa kˌuwa ukˈiwa milˈele.|0
nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo mˈambo jˈote nˌilijosˈema ðˈidi jˈake, jˈote jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu hˈiki, na kˌutolˈewa ˌunabˈii na jˌeremˈia ðˈidi ja mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
wˌao weɲˈewe wˌatakˈuwa watˈumwa wa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi na wafˈalme wakˈuu. nˌitawˌalipizˈia sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈao na kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌalilˌoniambˈia: tʃukˈua kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu kikˈombe hˈiki kˌilitʃoɟˈaa divˈai ja ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu, na kˌujaɲuˈeʃa mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo nˌinakutˈuma kwˈao.|0
wˌatakˌapoˈiɲua, wˌatapˌepesˈuka na kˌukasirˈika sˈana kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa nˌitakˌaoˌupelˈeka kˌatikˈati jˈao.|0
hˈivjo nˌikakˌitʃukˈua kikˈombe kutˈoka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa bwˈana, na kˌujafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˈote ˌalijˌonitˈuma kwˈao kukˈiɲua.|0
jaˈani jˌerusalˈemu na mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, wafˈalme wˌake na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, kˌuwafˈaɲa maɡˈofu na kˌuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza, tʃa ðihˈaka na laˈana, kˌama walˈivjo lˈeo.|0
pˈia farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri, wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, mˌaafˈisa wˌake na wˈatu wˌake wˈote.|0
pˈia waɡˈeni wˈote wˌaliˈoko hˌuko; wafˈalme wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈusi; wafˈalme wˈote wa wˌafilˈisti wˈale wa ˌaʃkelˈoni, ɡˈaza, ekrˈoni na wˈatu wˌalioˈatʃwa hˌuko aʃdˈodi.|0
edˈomu, moˈabu na amˈoni.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wa tˈiro na sidˈoni; wafˈalme wa ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani ŋɡˈambo ja bahˈari.|0
dedˈani, tˈema, bˈuzi na wˈote walˈio mˌaenˈeo ja mbˈali.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wa ˌarabˈuni na wafˈalme wˈote wa wˈatu waɡˈeni wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
wafˈalme wˈote wa zˈimri, elˈamu na umˈedi.|0
na wafˈalme wˈote wa pˈande za kˌaskazˈini, wa karˈibu na wa mbˈali, mmˈoɟa baˌada ja mwiŋɡˈine; jaˈani fˈalme zˈote ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia. baˌada ja hˈao wˈote, mfˈalme wa ʃeʃˈaki ˌatakˈuɲua pˈia.|0
kˈiʃa ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: kˌuɲuˈeni, mlˈewe na mtapˈike; ˌaŋɡukˈeni, wˈala msˌiinˈuke tˈena kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa nˌitakˌaotˈuma mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu..|0
lakˈini kˌama wˌakikatˈaa kˌupokˈea kikˈombe kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈako na kˈuɲua, wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: ni lazˈima mɲuˈe.|0
tazˈama, nˌimeˈanza kulˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi ulˈio na ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, na ɟˈe, kwˈeli nˈiɲi mtˌaepˈuka kˌuaðibˈiwa? hamwˈezi kˌuepˈuka kˌuaðibˈiwa, kwa maˈana nˌitalˈeta vˈita ɟˌuːja wˈote wˌaiʃˈio dˌuniˈani, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote..|0
bˌasi sˈasa tˈoa ˌunabˈii kwa manˈeno hˈaja jˈote ðˈidi jˈao, ˌuwaambˈie:  bwˈana ˌataŋɡurˈuma kutˈoka ɟˈuu; ˌatatˈoa saˈuti ja ŋɡurˈumo kutˈoka makˈao jˌake mˌatakatˈifu na kˌuŋɡurˈuma kwa ŋɡˈuvu sˈana ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈake. ˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele kˌama wˌao wˌakaɲaɡˈao zabˈibu, ˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele ðˈidi ja wˈote wˌaiʃˈio dˌuniˈani.|0
ɣasˈia zˌitasikˈika hˌadi miˈiʃo ja dunˈia, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌatalˈeta maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja mˌataˈifa; ˌatalˈeta hukˈumu ɟˌuːja wˌanadˈamu wˈote na kˌuwaˈua waˈovu wˈote,  asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: tazˈama! maˈafa jˌanaenˈea kutˈoka taˈifa mˈoɟa hˌadi ɟiŋɡˈine; tufˈani kˈubwa ˌinainˈuka kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, hˈao wˌaliˌouˈawa na bwˈana wˌatatˌapakˈaa kˈila mahˈali, kˌuanzˈia mwˈiʃo mmˈoɟa wa dunˈia hˌadi mwˈiʃo mwiŋɡˈine. hˌawatˌaombˌolezˈewa wˈala kˌukusˈaɲua ˌau kuzˈikwa, lakˈini wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˈavi jˌalijˌoenˈea ɟˌuːja ˈarði.|0
liˈeni na kˌuombolˈeza, ˈeɲi wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, mɡˌaaɡˈae mˌavumbˈini, nˈiɲi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈundi. kwa maˈana wakˈati wˈenu wa kutʃˈiɲɟua ˌumewadˈia; mtˌaaŋɡˈuka na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟua kˌama vjˈombo vizˈuri vja udˈoŋɡo.|0
wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi hˌawatakˈuwa na mahˈali pa kˌukimbilˈia, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈundi hˌawatapˈata mahˈali pa kˌutorokˈea.|0
sikˈia kilˈio tʃa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, mˌaombolˈezo ja vˌioŋɡˈozi wa kˈundi, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌanajˌaharˈibu malˈiʃo jˈao.|0
makˈao jˈao ja amˈani jˌatahˌaribˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana.|0
kˌama sˈimba ˌataˈatʃa pˈaŋɡo lˈake, ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa wa mðalˈimu, na kwa sabˈabu ja hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˈeno hˈili lˌilikˈuɟa kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: simˈama katˌika ˈua wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana na usˈeme na wˈatu wˈote wa mˈiɟi ja jˈuda wˌanaokˈuɟa kˌuabˈudu katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana. wˌaambˈie kˈila kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃokˌuamˈuru, ˌusipuŋɡˈuze nˈeno.|0
huˈenda wˌatasˌikilˈiza, na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia jˌake m̩bˈaja. kˈiʃa nˌitawˌahurumˈia na kuˈatʃa kˌuwaletˈea maˈafa nˌilijokˈuwa nˌinapˈaŋɡa kwa sabˈabu ja maˈovu wˌalijofˈaɲa.|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ikˈiwa hˌamtanˌisikilˈiza na kˌuifuˈata ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu ambˈajo nˌimeiwˈeka mbˈele jˈenu.|0
nˌaɲi ikˈiwa hˌamtajˌasikilˈiza manˈeno ja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii, ambˈao nˌimewatˈuma kwˈenu tˈena na tˈena ˌiɟapokˈuwa hˌamkuwˌasikilˈiza.|0
ndˈipo nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba hˌii kˌama ʃˈilo na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kˌuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌulaanˈiwa na mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia..|0
mˌakuhˈani, mˌanabˈii na wˈatu wˈote wˌakamsikˈia jˌeremˈia ˌakijasˈema manˈeno hˈaja ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini mˈara tu jˌeremˈia ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃˌomwamˈuru kˌukisˈema, bˌasi mˌakuhˈani, mˌanabˈii na wˈatu wˈote wˌalimkamˈata wˌakisˈema, ni lazˈima ˈufe.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunatˈoa ˌunabˈii katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana kwˌamba ɲˈumba hˌii ˌitakˈuwa kˌama ʃˈilo na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa ukˈiwa na kuˈatʃwa tˈupu? nˌao wˈatu wˈote wˌakamkˌusaɲikˈia na kˌumzuŋɡˈuka jˌeremˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
mˌaafˈisa wa jˈuda wˌalipˌosikˈia kuhˈusu mˈambo hˈaja, wˌakapˈanda kutˈoka ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, wˌakaˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana na kuʃˈika nafˈasi zˈao kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo ɟˈipja la ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa mˌakuhˈani na mˌanabˈii wˌakawˌaambˈia mˌaafˈisa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote, ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌanastahˈili ˌahukumˈiwe kˈifo kwa sabˈabu ˌametˈoa ˌunabˈii m̩bˈaja ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu. mmˌesikˈia kwa mˌasikˈio jˈenu weɲˈewe.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakawˌaambˈia mˌaafˈisa wˈote na wˈatu wˈote: bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma kutˈoa ˌunabˈii ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba hˌii na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mˈambo jˈote mlˌijojˌasikˈia.|0
sˈasa tˌeŋɡenezˈeni ɲɟˈia zˈenu na matˈendo jˈenu, na kumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌatawˌahurumˈia na kuˈatʃa kulˈeta maˈafa ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamejatˈamka ðˈidi jˈenu.|0
lakˈini kwa habˈari jˈaŋɡu mˈimi, nˈiko mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌifaɲiˈeni lolˈote mnˌaloˈona kˌuwa ni ɟˈema na la hˈaki.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, ɟuˈeni kwa hakˈika, ikˈiwa mtˌaniˈua, mtakˈuwa mmˌeɟipatˈia ðˈambi kwa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia ɟˈuu jˈenu weɲˈewe, na ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, kwa maˈana ni kwˈeli bwˈana ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu ˌili nisˈeme manˈeno hˈaja jˈote mˌasikiˈoni mwˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa mˌaafˈisa na wˈatu wˈote wˌakawˌaambˈia mˌakuhˈani na mˌanabˈii, ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌasihˌukumˈiwe kˈifo! ˌamesˈema nˌasi katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
baˈaði ja wazˈee wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌakasoɡˈea mbˈele, wˌakalˌiambˈia kˌusaɲˈiko lˈote la wˈatu.|0
ɟˈe, hˌezekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌau ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote katˌika jˈuda ˌalimhukˈumu mˈika kˈufa? ɟˈe, hˌezekˈia hakˈumtʃa bwˈana na kˌuhitˈaɟi msaˈada wˈake? ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakuwˌahurumˈia na ˌakaˈatʃa kulˈeta maˈafa ˌalijokˈuwa ˌametˈamka ðˈidi jˈao? tˌunakˌaribˈia sˈana kˌuɟiletˈea mˌaaŋɡamˈizo ja kutˈiʃa sˌisi weɲˈewe.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, urˈia mwˈana wa ʃemˈaja kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi wa kirˈiaθ jˌearˈimu ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine ˌalijetˈoa ˌunabˈii kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana. ˌalitˈoa ˌunabˈii ɟˌuːja mˈambo jˌalijˌofanˈana na hˈaja ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa jˌeremˈia.|0
mfˈalme jˌehojakˈimu na wakˈuu wˌake wˈote na mˌaafˈisa wˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno jˈake, mfˈalme ˌalitafˈuta kˌumuˈua. lakˈini urˈia ˌalipˈata habˈari, na kwa kˌuoɡˈopa ˌakakˌimbilˈia mˈisri.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme jˌehojakˈimu ˌalimtˈuma ˌelnaθˈani mwˈana wa akbˈori hˌuko mˈisri, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu weŋɡˈine ˌili kwˈenda kˌumkamˈata urˈia.|0
wˌakamrudˈiʃa urˈia kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌumpelˈeka kwa mfˈalme jˌehojakˈimu, ambˈaje ˌalimuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa, na mwˈili wˌake kutˈupwa kwˈeɲe enˈeo la mˌakabˈuri ja wˈatu wasˈio na tʃˈeo..|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani ˌakamuˈuŋɡa mkˈono jˌeremˈia, kwa hˈijo hˌakutˈiwa tˈena mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu ˌili ˌauˈawe.|0
mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˈeno hˈili lˌilimɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌoniambˈia: tˌeŋɡenˈeza nˈira, ˌuɟivˈike ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako, ˌuifˈuŋɡe kwa kˈamba za ŋɡˈozi.|0
kˈiʃa utˈume uɟˈumbe kwa wafˈalme wa edˈomu, moˈabu, amˈoni, tˈiro na sidˈoni kˌupitˈia waɟˈumbe ambˈao wˌamekˈuɟa jˌerusalˈemu kwa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
wˈape uɟˈumbe kwa aɟˈili ja mabwˈana zˈao na ˌuwaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: wˌaambiˈeni hˈivi mabwˈana zˈenu.|0
kwa uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu m̩kˈuu na kwa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa nˌimeˈumba dunˈia na wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˌaliˈoko ndˈani jˈake, nˌami hˈumpa jejˈote ˌinipˌendezˈavjo.|0
sˈasa nˌitazitˈia ˈn̩tʃi zˈenu zˈote mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, na nˌitawafˈaɲa hˌata waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni wˌamtumikˈie.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatamtˌumikˈia jˈeje, pamˈoɟa na mwanˈawe na mwˈana wa mwanˈawe, hˌadi wakˈati wa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ˌutakˌapowadˈia, kˈiʃa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi na wafˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi wˌatamʃˈinda.|0
lakˈini kˌama kukˈiwa na taˈifa lolˈote ˌau ufˈalme ambˈao hˌautˌamtumikˈia nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌama kˌuinamˈiʃa ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake tʃˈini ja nˈira jˈake, nˌitalˌiaðˈibu taˈifa hˌilo kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni, asˈema bwˈana, mpˈaka nˌitakˌapolˌiaŋɡamˈiza taˈifa hˌilo kwa mkˈono wˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo msˌiwasˌikilˈize mˌanabˈii wˈenu, wˌaaɡˈuzi wˈenu, waˈota ndˈoto wˈenu, wˌatabˈiri na watʃˈawi wˌanaˌowaambˈia nˈiɲi: hˌamtamtˌumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
wˌanawˌatabirˈia uˈoŋɡo ambˈao ˌutawafˈaɲa nˈiɲi mhamˈiʃwe mbˈali kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu. nˌitawˌafukuzˈia mbˈali, nˌaɲi mtˌaaŋɡamˈia.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa taˈifa lolˈote lˌitainˈama na kuwˈeka ʃˈiŋɡo lˈake katˌika nˈira ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli na kˌumtumikˈia, nˌitaliˈatʃa taˈifa hˌilo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jeɲˈewe ˌili wˌailˈime na kuˈiʃi hˈumo, asˈema bwˈana. .|0
nˌilitˈoa uɟˈumbe hˈuo hˈuo kwa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda. nˌilisˈema, iŋɡˈiza ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako katˌika nˈira ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌumtumikˈie jˌeje na wˈatu wˈake, nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi.|0
kwa nˈini wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako ˈm̩fe kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni, ambˈazo bwˈana ˌameˈoɲa ɟˌuːja taˈifa lolˈote ambˈalo hˌalitˌamtumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
msˌijasˌikilˈize manˈeno ja mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌowaambˈia kwˌamba, hˌamtamtˌumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli, kwa sabˈabu wˌanawˌatabirˈia uˈoŋɡo.|0
sˌikuwatˈuma hˈao, asˈema bwˈana. wˌanatabˈiri uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo, nˌitawˌafukuzˈia mbˈali, nˌaɲi mtˌaaŋɡamˈia, nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌowatˌabirˈia..|0
kˈiʃa nˌikawˌaambˈia mˌakuhˈani na wˈatu hˈawa wˈote, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: msˌiwasˌikilˈize mˌanabˈii wˌanaosˈema, hˈivi kˌaribˈuni sˈana vjˈombo vja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana vˌitarudˈiʃwa kutˈoka babˈeli. wˌanawˌatabirˈia nˈiɲi uˈoŋɡo.|0
msˌiwasˌikilˈize. mtˌumikiˈeni mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi. kwa nˈini ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˈuwe maɡˈofu.|0
kˌama wˌao ni mˌanabˈii na wanˈalo nˈeno la bwˈana, bˌasi na wamsˈihi bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌili vjˈombo vˌilivjobˈaki katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana na katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme wa jˈuda na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu vˌisipelˈekwe babˈeli.|0
ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli hˌakuvˌitʃukˈua wakˈati ˌalipˌomtʃukˈua jˌekonˈia mwˈana wa jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni hˌuko babˈeli kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu, pamˈoɟa na wakˈuu wˈote wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˈaam, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu vˈitu ambˈavjo vˌimebˈaki ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, na ndˈani ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme wa jˈuda, na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu.|0
vˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa kˌupelˈekwa babˈeli, nˈako hˌuko vˌitabˈaki mpˈaka sˈiku nˌitakˌajovˌiɟilˈia, asˈema bwˈana. kˈiʃa nˌitavˌirudˈiʃa na kˌuvireɟˈeʃa mahˈali hˈapa..|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa tˈano wa mwˈaka ˈule ˈule, jaˈani mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne, mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌutawˈala wa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nabˈii hˌananˈia mwˈana wa azˈuri, ambˈaje ˌalitˈoka ɡˌibeˈoni, ˌakanˌiambˈia katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mbˈele ja mˌakuhˈani na wˈatu wˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌasemˈalo: nˌitaivˈuɲɟa nˈira ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
katˌika mˈuda wa miˈaka miwˈili nˌitavˌirudˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa vjˈombo vjˈote vja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalivˌiondˈoa kutˈoka hˈapa na kˌuvipelˈeka babˈeli.|0
pˈia nˌitamrudˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa jˌekonˈia mwˈana wa jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda, pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa kutˈoka jˈuda ambˈao wˌalikwˈenda babˈeli, asˈema bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa nˌitaivˈuɲɟa nˈira ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli..|0
ndˈipo nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakamɟˈibu nabˈii hˌananˈia mbˈele ja mˌakuhˈani na wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesimˈama ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
ˌakasˈema, ˈamen! bwˈana na afˈaɲe hˈivjo! bwˈana na ˌajatimˈize manˈeno ˌulijotˈoa ˌunabˈii kwa kˌuvirudˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa kutˈoka babˈeli vjˈombo vja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana pamˈoɟa na wˈote wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, nˌisikilˈize nˌikuambˈie jˈale nˌitakˌajojasˈema mˌasikiˈoni mwˈako na mˌasikiˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu hˈawa wˈote.|0
ʃˈu mwˈanzo, mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌokutˌaŋɡulˈia wˌewe na mˌimi wˌalitabˈiri vˈita, maˈafa na taˈuni ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi ɲˈiŋɡi na fˈalme kˈubwa.|0
lakˈini nabˈii ˌatakˌajetabˈiri amˈani ˌatatˌambulˈiwa kˌuwa kwˈeli ˌametˈumwa na bwˈana ikˈiwa ˌunabˈii wˌake ˌutatimˈia.|0
kˈiʃa nabˈii hˌananˈia ˌakaˌiondˈoa nˈira ˌilijokˈuwa ʃiŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa jˌeremˈia na kˌuivˈuɲɟa.|0
nˌaje ˌakasˈema mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈote, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: vˈivi hˈivi ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjoivˈuɲɟa nˈira ja nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo za mˌataˈifa katˌika mˈuda hˈuu wa miˈaka miwˈili.  ˌalipofˈaɲa hˈivi, nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakaondˈoka zˈake.|0
kitˈambo kidˈoɡo baˌada ja nabˈii hˌananˈia kˌuivˈuɲɟa nˈira kutˈoka ʃˈiŋɡo ja nabˈii jˌeremˈia, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie hˌananˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌumevˈuɲɟa nˈira ja ˈm̩ti, lakˈini badˈala jˌake ˌutapˈata nˈira ja tʃˈuma.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌitawˈeka nˈira ja tʃˈuma kwˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo za mˌataˈifa hˈaja jˈote ˌili kufˈaɲa jˌamtumikˈie nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌao wˌatamtˌumikˈia. nitˈampa kˌutawˈala hˌata waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni..|0
kˈiʃa nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia nabˈii hˌananˈia, sˌikilˈiza hˌananˈia! bwˈana hˌaɟakutˈuma, lakˈini wˌewe ˌumelˌiʃawˈiʃi taˈifa hˈili kˌuamˈini uˈoŋɡo.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: hˈivi kˌaribˈuni nˌitakˌuondˈoa kutˈoka ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia. mwˈaka hˈuu ˌutakˈufa, kwa sabˈabu ˌumetaŋɡˈaza uˈasi ðˈidi ja bwˈana..|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa sˈaba wa mwˈaka ˈule ˈule, nabˈii hˌananˈia akˈafa.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo manˈeno ja ˈile barˈua ambˈajo nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌaliitˈuma kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kwˈenda kwa wazˈee wˌaliobˈaki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa, na kwa mˌakuhˈani, mˌanabˈii na wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˈote ambˈao nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˌii ˌilikˈuwa ni baˌada ja mfˈalme jˌekonˈia na malkˈia mamˈaje, mˌaafˈisa wa mˌahakˈama, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda na wa jˌerusalˈemu, mafˈundi na wahˈunzi kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu..|0
barˈua ˌilikˌabiðˈiwa kwa elˈasa mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, na kwa ɡˌemarˈia mwˈana wa hilkˈia, ambˈao sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌaliwatˈuma kwa mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza hˌuko babˈeli. barˈua jeɲˈewe ˌilisˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌawaˌambiˈalo wˈale wˈote nˌiliˌowapelˈeka kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli.|0
ɟeŋɡˈeni ɲˈumba na mstarˈehe, pandˈeni bustˈani na ˈm̩le mazˈao jˈake.|0
oˈeni wˌake na m̩zˈae wˈana na bˈinti, wˌaozˈeni wˈana wˈenu wˈake, nˌaɲi wˌatoˈeni bˈinti zˈenu wˌaolˈewe, ˌili nˌao pˈia wazˈae wˈana na bˈinti. ˌoŋɡezekˈeni idˈadi jˈenu hˌuko, wˈala msˌipuŋɡˈue.|0
pˈia tˌafutˈeni amˈani na mˌafanikˈio ja ˈm̩ɟi ambˈamo nˌimewˌapelˈeka ˌuhamiʃˈoni. mwombˈeni bwˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo, kwa sabˈabu ˌukistˈawi, nˈiɲi pˈia mtastˈawi.|0
nˈaam, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: msˌikubˈali mˌanabˈii na wˌabaʃˈiri wˌaliˈoko mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu wˌawadaŋɡˈaɲe. msˌisikilˈize ndˈoto ambˈazo mmˌewatˈia mˈojo kuˈota.|0
wˌanawˌatabirˈia nˈiɲi uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. sˌikuwatˈuma, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: miˈaka sabˈini ˌitakˌapotimˈia kwa aɟˈili ja babˈeli, nˌitakˈuɟa kwˈenu na kˌutimˈiza ahˈadi jˈaŋɡu ja rehˈema ja kˌuwarudˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa.|0
kwa maˈana nˌinaɟˈua mipˈaŋɡo nilˈijo nˈajo kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, asˈema bwˈana, ni mipˈaŋɡo ja kˌuwafˌanikˈiʃa na wˈala si ja kˌuwaðˈuru, ni mipˈaŋɡo ja kuwˈapa tˌumaˈini katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo.|0
kˈiʃa mtˌaniˈita, na mtakˈuɟa na kˌuniˈomba, nˌami nˌitawˌasikilˈiza.|0
mtˌanitafˈuta na kˌuniˈona, mtˌakapˌonitafˈuta kwa mˈojo wˈenu wˈote.|0
nˌitaˌonekˈana kwˈenu, asˈema bwˈana, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa wˈatu wˈenu wˌaliotˈekwa. nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote na mahˈali pˈote nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimewˌafukuzˈia, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa mahˈali ambˈapo nˌilikˈuwa nˌimewatˈoa wˌalipˌotʃukulˈiwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mnawˈeza mkasˈema, bwˈana ˌameinˈua mˌanabˈii kwa aɟˈili jˈetu hˈuku babˈeli.|0
lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu mfˈalme ˌaketiˈaje kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi, na wˈatu wa kwˈenu wˈote wˌanaobˈaki katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, ndˈuɡu zˈenu ambˈao hˌawakwˈenda pamˈoɟa nˌaɲi ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
nˈaam, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˌitatˈuma upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni ðˈidi jˈao, nˌami nˌitawafˈaɲa kˌuwa kˌama tˈini ðaˈifu zˈile ambˈazo ni mbˈovu sˈana zˌisizofˈaa kulˈiwa.|0
nˌitawˌafukˈuza kwa upˈaŋɡa, kwa ɲɟˈaa na kwa taˈuni, nˌami nˌitawafˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌutʃukˈiza sˈana kwa fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia, na kˌuwa kˈitu tʃa laˈana na tʃa kˌuoɡˈofja, tʃa ðarˈau na kˌukemˈewa, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote nˌitakˌakowˌafukuzˈia.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˌawakˌujasˌikilˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, manˈeno ambˈajo nˌiliwˌatumˈia tˈena na tˈena kˌupitˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii. wˈala nˈiɲi wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo hˌamkusˌikilˈiza pˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi ɲˈote m̩lˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni, nˌiliˌowapelˈeka babˈeli kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu ahˈabu mwˈana wa kolˈaja, na sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja, wˌanaˌowatˌabirˈia uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu: nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌatawaˈua mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu hˈasa.|0
kwa aɟˈili jˈao, wˈatu wˈote wa ˌuhamˈiʃo kutˈoka jˈuda wˌaliˈoko babˈeli wˌatatumˈia laˈana hˌii: bwˈana na ˌakutendˈee kˌama sˌedekˈia na ahˈabu, ambˈao mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌaliwatʃˈoma kwa mˈoto..|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌamefˈaɲa mˈambo maˈovu kabˈisa katˌika ˌisraˈeli, wˌamezˈini na wˌake za mˌaɟirˈani zˈao, tˈena kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu wˌamesˈema uˈoŋɡo, mˈambo ambˈajo sˌikuwˌaambˈia kˌujafˈaɲa. nˌami nˌajaɟˈua hˈaja, na ni ʃahˈidi wa ɟˈambo hˈilo, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mwambˈie ʃemˈaja mnˌehelˈami.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: ˌulitˈuma barˈua kwa ɟˈina lˈako mweɲˈewe kwa wˈatu wˈote wa jˌerusalˈemu, kwa sˌefanˈia mwˈana wa kuhˈani mˌaasˈeja na kwa mˌakuhˈani weŋɡˈine wˈote. ˌulimwambˈia sˌefanˈia.|0
bwˈana ˌamekuwˈeka wˌewe ˈuwe kuhˈani badˈala ja jˌehojˈada ˌili ˈuwe msˌimamˈizi wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana. ˌunapˈaswa kufˈuŋɡa kwa mˌikatˈale na mɲorˈoro wa ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˌendawazˈimu jejˈote ˌanajˌeɟifˈaɲa nabˈii.|0
kwa nˈini bˌasi hˌukumkemˈea jˌeremˈia mwˌanaθˈoθi, ˌalijˌeɟifˈaɲa kˌama nabˈii mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
ˌametˌutumˈia uɟˈumbe hˈuu hˈuku babˈeli: mtˌakuwˈako hˌuko mˈuda mrˈefu. kwa hˈijo ɟeŋɡˈeni ɲˈumba mkakˈae; pandˈeni maʃˈamba na ˈm̩le mazˈao jˈake..|0
kuhˈani sˌefanˈia, hˌata hˈivjo, ˌakamsomˈea nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˈile barˈua.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
tˈuma uɟˈumbe hˈuu kwa wˈatu wˈote walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu ʃemˈaja mnˌehelˈami: kwa sabˈabu ʃemˈaja ˌamewˌatabirˈia nˈiɲi, hˌata iŋɡˈawa sˌikumtˈuma, nˌaje ˌamewafˈaɲa kˌuamˈini uˈoŋɡo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: hakˈika nˌitamwaðˈibu ʃemˈaja mnˌehelˈami pamˈoɟa na uzˈao wˈake. hˌapatakˈuwa na jejˈote ˌatakˌajebˈaki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu hˈawa, wˈala hˌataˈona mˈema nˌitakˌajowˌatendˈea wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ˌametaŋɡˈaza uˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: andˈika katˌika kitˈabu manˈeno jˈote nˌilijonˈena na wˈewe.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitakˌapowalˈeta wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda kutˈoka ˌuhamiʃˈoni, na kˌuwarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈao ˌili kˌuimilˈiki, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo manˈeno bwˈana ˌalijˌojanˈena kuhˈusu ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana:  vilˈio vja wˈoɡa vˌinasikˈika: hˈofu kˈuu, wˈala si amˈani.|0
ˌulizˈeni na mkaˈone: ɟˈe, mwˌanaˈume awˈeza kuzˈaa watˈoto? kwa nˈini bˌasi nˌinaˈona kˈila mwˌanaˈume mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌamewˈeka mikˈono jˌake tumbˈoni kˌama mwanˈamke alˈije na utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa, kˈila ˈuso ˌukiɡeˈuka rˈaŋɡi kabˈisa.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˈile sˈiku ˌitakˌavjokˈuwa ja kutˈiʃa! hˌakutakˈuwa na ɲiŋɡˈine mfˈano wˈake. ˌutakˈuwa wakˈati wa ðˈiki kwa jakˈobo, lakˈini ˌataˌokolˈewa kutˈoka hˈijo.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌitaivˈuɲɟa nˈira kutˈoka ʃiŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao na kˌuvipasˈua vifˈuŋɡo vjˈao; waɡˈeni hˌawatˌawafˈaɲa tˈena watˈumwa.|0
badˈala jˈake, wˌatamtˌumikˈia bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˌao na daˈudi mfˈalme wˈao, nˌitakˌajemwinˈua kwa aɟˈili jˈao.|0
hˈivjo ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee jakˈobo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌusifˌaðaˈike, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana. hakˈika, nˌitakˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mbˈali, wazˈao wˈako kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌuhamˈiʃo wˈao. jakˈobo ˌatakˈuwa tˈena na amˈani na ˌusalˈama, wˈala hakˈuna ˌatakˌajemtˈia hˈofu.|0
mˌimi nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌami nˌitakˌuokˈoa, asˈema bwˈana. iŋɡˈawa nˌitajˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈamo mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao nˌimewˌatawˈaɲa, sˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza nˈiɲi kabˈisa. nˌitawˌaaðˈibu, lakˈini kwa hˈaki. sˌitawaˈatʃa kabˈisa bˌila aðˈabu..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana:  kidˈonda tʃˈako hakˈina dˈawa, ɟerˈaha lˈako hˌalipoɲˈeki.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌukutetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈako, hakˈuna dˈawa ja kidˈonda tʃˈako, wˌewe hˌutapˈona.|0
wˈale wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˌawe wˈote wˌamekˌusahˈau, hˌawaɟˈali tʃotʃˈote kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe. nˌimekupˈiɡa kˌama vˈile adˈui ˌaŋɡelifˈaɲa, na kˌukuaðˈibu kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu mkatˈili ˌaŋɡelifˈaɲa, kwa sabˈabu hatˈia jˈako ni kˈubwa ˈm̩no na ðˈambi zˈako ni ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunalˈia kwa aɟˈili ja ɟerˈaha lˈako, jˈale mˌaumˈivu jˈako jˌasijˌopoɲˈeka? kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˈako mkˈubwa na ðˈambi zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi nˌimekˌufaɲˈia mˈambo hˈaja.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈote wˌakuˌaŋɡamizˈao wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa; adˈui zˈako wˈote wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. wˈale wˈote wˌakutekˈao ɲˈara wˌatatˈekwa ɲˈara; wˈote wˌakufaɲˈao matˈeka nˌitawafˈaɲa matˈeka.|0
lakˈini nˌitakˌurudiʃˈia ˈafja jˈako na kˌujapˈoɲa mˌaɟerˈaha jˈako, asˈema bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ˌumeˈitwa mwˌeɲe kutˈupwa, sajˈuni ambˈaje hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajˌekuɟˈali..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana:  nˌitarudˈiʃa barˈaka za mahˈema ja jakˈobo, na kˌuhurumˈia maskˈani jˈake. ˈm̩ɟi ˌutaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena ɟˌuːja maɡˈofu jˈake, nˈalo ɟˈumba la kifˈalme lˌitasimˈama mahˈali pˈake halˈisi.|0
ɲˈimbo za kˌuʃukˈuru zˌitatˈoka kwˈao na saˈuti ja furˈaha. nˌitaˌioŋɡˈeza idˈadi jˈao wˈala hˌawatˌapuŋɡˈua, nˌitawˈapa heʃˈima na hˌawatˌaðarˌaulˈiwa.|0
watˈoto wˌao wˌatakˈuwa kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa sˈiku za zamˈani, nˈajo ɟˌumuˈija jˈao ˌitaˌimarˈiʃwa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu; nˌitawˌaaðˈibu wˈale wˈote wˌawaˌoneˈao.|0
mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌatakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wˈao; mtawˈala wˌao ˌatainˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. nˌitamlˈeta karˈibu nˈami, nˌaje ˌatanˌikaribˈia mˈimi, kwa maˈana ni nˈani jˈule ˌatakˌajeɟˌitolˈea kˌuwa karˈibu nˈami? asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu..|0
tazˈama, tufˈani ja bwˈana ˌitalipˈuka kwa ɣaðˈabu, upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli ˌuendˈao kˈasi ˌutaʃˈuka ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja waˈovu.|0
hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana hˌaitarˈudi ɲˈuma mpˈaka ˌatakˌapotimˈiza mˌakusˈudi jˈote ja mˈojo wˈake. sˈiku ziɟˈazo mtˌajaelˈewa hˈaja.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wa kˈoo zˈote za ˌisraˈeli nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: wˈatu wˌatakˌaopˈona upˈaŋɡa wˌatapˈata ˌupendelˈeo ɟaŋɡwˈani; nˌitakˈuɟa niwˈape ˌisraˈeli pumzˈiko.|0
bwˈana ˌalitˌutokˈea wakˈati ˌuliopˈita, ˌakisˈema: nˌimekupˈenda kwa upˈendo wa milˈele, nˌimekuvˈuta kwa wˈema.|0
nˌitakuɟˈeŋɡa tˈena nˌawe ˌutaɟeŋɡˈeka ˈupja, ˈewe bikˈira ˌisraˈeli. ˌutatʃukˈua tˈena matˈari jˈako na kwˈenda kutʃˈeza na wˌeɲe furˈaha.|0
ˌutapˈanda tˈena ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu ɟˌuːja vilˈima vja sˌamarˈia, wˌakulˈima wˌatapˈanda na kˌufurahˈia matˈunda jˈake.|0
ˌitakˈuɟa sˈiku wakˈati walˈinzi wˌatakˌapowˌapiɡˈia kelˈele ɟˌuːja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu wˌakisˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, twendˈeni ɟˈuu sajˈuni, kwˈake bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: mwˌimbiˈeni jakˈobo kwa furˈaha, mpˌiɡiˈeni kelˈele alˈije m̩kˈuu wa mˌataˈifa. zˌifaɲˈeni sˈifa zˈenu zˌisikˈike, nˌaɲi msˈeme, ˈee bwˈana, okˈoa wˈatu wˈako, mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli..|0
tazˈama, nˌitawalˈeta kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini na kˌuwakusˈaɲa kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia. mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wˌatakuwˈepo vipˈofu na viwˈete, mˈama wˌaɟawazˈito na wˌeɲe utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa. umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu ˌutarˈudi.|0
wˌatakˈuɟa wˌakilˈia; wˌataˈomba wakˈati nˌinawˌarudˈiʃa. nˌitawˌaoŋɡˈoza kˈando ja viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi katˌika mapˈito jalˈijo tˌambarˈare ambˈapo hˌawatˌaɟikwˈaa, kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ndˈimi bˈaba wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌefraˈimu ni mzalˈiwa wˈaŋɡu wa kwˈanza.|0
sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, lˌitaŋɡazˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani ja mbˈali: jˌeje ˌalijˌewatawˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli ˌatawˌakusˈaɲa na ˌatalitʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈake la kondˈoo kˌama mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi..|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌatamlipˈia fidˈia jakˈobo na kˌuwakombˈoa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa walˈio na ŋɡˈuvu kulˈiko wˈao.|0
wˌatakˈuɟa na kupˈiɡa kelˈele kwa furˈaha katˌika mˌiinˈuko ja sajˈuni; wˌataʃˌaŋɡilˈia ˌukarˈimu wa bwˈana: nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta, wˌanakondˈoo watʃˈaŋɡa na ndˈama wa makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe nˌitakˌaowˈapa. wˌatakˈuwa kˌama bustˈani ˌilijˌoɲeʃˈewa vizˈuri, wˈala hˌawatˌahuzunˈika tˈena.|0
kˈiʃa wˌanawˈali wˌatatʃˈeza na kˌufurˈahi, viɟˈana waˈume na wazˈee pˈia. nˌitaɡeˈuza mˌaombolˈezo jˈao kˌuwa furˈaha, nˌitawˈapa farˈaɟa na furˈaha badˈala ja huzˈuni.|0
nˌitawˌaʃibˈiʃa mˌakuhˈani kwa wˈiŋɡi, nˌao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌataɟˈazwa kwa ˌukarˈimu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: saˈuti ˌimesikˈika hˌuko rˈama, mˌaombolˈezo na kilˈio kikˈubwa, rahˈeli ˌakiwˌalilˈia watˈoto wˌake na ˌanakatˈaa kˌufariɟˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu watˈoto wˌake hawˈako tˈena.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌizuˈie saˈuti jˈako kulˈia, na mˈatʃo jˈako jˌasitˈoe matʃˈozi, kwa kˌuwa kˈazi jˈako ˌitapˈata θawˈabu, asˈema bwˈana. wˌatarˈudi kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja adˈui.|0
hakˈika nˌimejˌasikˈia mˌaombolˈezo ja ˌefraˈimu: ˌulinirˈudi kˌama ndˈama mkaˈidi, nˌami nˌimekubˈali kutˈii. ˌunirudˈiʃe, nˌami nˌitarˈudi, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe ndˈiwe bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
baˌada ja kˌupotˈea, nˌilitˈubu; baˌada ja kˌuelˈewa, nˌiliɟipˈiɡa kifˈua. nˌiliˌaibˈika na kuˈona hˈaja kwa sabˈabu nˌiliibˈeba aˈibu ja uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu..|0
ɟˈe, ˌefraˈimu si mwanˈaŋɡu mpˈendwa, mtˈoto nˌinajˌependˈezwa nˈaje? iŋɡˈawa mˈara kwa mˈara nˌinanˈena ðˈidi jˈake, bˈado nˌinamkumbˈuka. kwa hˈijo mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunamwonˈea ʃaˈuku, nˈina hurˈuma kˈubwa kwa aɟˈili jˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˈeka alˈama za bˌarabˈara, wˈeka vibˈao vja kˌuelekˈeza. zˌiŋɡatˈia vjˈema ɲɟˈia kˈuu, bˌarabˈara ˈile ˌunajˌoipˈita. rˈudi, ˈee bikˈira ˌisraˈeli, rˈudi kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈako.|0
ˌutatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa hˌata lˈini, ˈee bˈinti usˈije mwˌaminˈifu? bwˈana ˌameˈumba kˈitu kˈipja dˌuniˈani: mwanˈamke ˌatamlˈinda mwˌanaˈume.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo, nˌitakˌapowˌarudˈiʃa tˌoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kutˈekwa kwˈenu, wˈatu walˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda na mˈiɟi jˌake kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena wˌatatumˈia manˈeno hˈaja: bwˈana ˌakubarˈiki, ˈee makˈao ja hˈaki, ˈee mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu..|0
wˈatu wˌataˈiʃi pamˈoɟa katˌika jˈuda na mˈiɟi jˌake jˈote, wˌakulˈima na wˈote wˌanaˌohamahˈama na mifˈuɡo jˈao.|0
nˌitawˌaburudˈiʃa wˌaliotʃˈoka na kˌuwatulˈiza walˈio na huzˈuni.|0
kwa ɟˈambo hˈili nˌiliˈamka na kˌuaŋɡalˈia pˈande zˈote. ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa mtˈamu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana asˈema, sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, nˌitakˌapooŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja wˈatu, na kˌuzidˈiʃa hesˈabu ja mifˈuɡo katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba ja jˈuda.|0
kˌama vˈile nˌilivjˌowaˌaŋɡalˈia ˌili kuŋɡˈoa na kˌubomˈoa, kˌuharˈibu, kˌuaŋɡamˈiza na kulˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈao, vˈivjo hˈivjo nˌitawˌaaŋɡalˈia ˌili kuɟˈeŋɡa na kupˈanda, asˈema bwˈana.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, wˈatu hˌawatasˈema tˈena,  bˈaba wˌamekˈula zabˈibu tʃˈatʃu, nˈajo mˈeno ja watˈoto jˌakatˈiwa ɡˈanzi..|0
badˈala jˈake, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˌake mweɲˈewe; jejˈote alˈaje zabˈibu tʃˈatʃu, mˈeno jˌake mweɲˈewe jˌatatˈiwa ɡˈanzi.|0
