sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitakˌapofˈaɲa aɡˈano ɟˈipja na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na ɲˈumba ja jˈuda.|0
hˌalitˌafanˈana na aɡˈano nˌililofˈaɲa na bˈaba zˈao wakˈati nˌilipˌowaʃˈika mkˈono kˌuwaoŋɡˈoza watˈoke mˈisri, kwa sabˈabu wˌalivˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu, ˌiɟapokˈuwa nˌilikˈuwa mˈume kwˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˈm̩tu hˌatamfundˈiʃa tˈena ɟirˈani jˈake, wˈala ˈm̩tu kˌumfundˈiʃa ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌakisˈema, m̩ɟˈue bwˈana mˈuŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu wˈote wˌataniɟˈua mˈimi, ʃˈu alˈije mdˈoɡo kabˈisa kwˈao, hˌadi alˈije m̩kˈuu sˈana, asˈema bwˈana. kwa sabˈabu nˌitasamˈehe uˈovu wˈao, wˈala sˌitazˌikumbˈuka ðˈambi zˈao tˈena.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, jˌeje ˌalijewˈeka ɟˈua liwˈake mtʃˈana, jˌeje ˌanajˌeamˈuru mwˈezi na ɲˈota kuŋɡˈaa usˈiku, jˌeje ˌaitʃˌafuˈaje bahˈari ˌili mawˈimbi jˌake jˌaŋɡurˈume; bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
ikˈiwa ˈamri hˈizi zˌitaondˈoka matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, ndˈipo wazˈao wa ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˈoma kˌuwa taˈifa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu daˈima.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ikˈiwa mbˈiŋɡu zilˈizo ɟˈuu zˌitawˈeza kˌupimˈika na misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia tʃˈini ˌikawˈeza kˌutʃuŋɡˈuzwa, ndˈipo nˌitakˌapowˌakatˈaa wazˈao wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli kwa sabˈabu ja jˈote wˌalijˌojatˈenda, asˈema bwˈana.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutaɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, kˌuanzˈia mnˈara wa hˌananˈeli hˌadi lˈaŋɡo la pembˈeni.|0
kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia ˌitaanzˈia hˈapo kˌuendelˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe kilˈima tʃa ɡarˈebu, na kˈiʃa kˌuɡeˈuka kˌuelekˈea ɡˈoa.|0
bˈonde lˈote wˌatupwˈapo maˈiti na maɟˈivu pˈia na matˈuta jˈote kutˈoka bˈonde la kidrˈoni upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi pˈembe ja lˈaŋɡo la farˈasi, ˌitakˈuwa tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana. kˈamwe ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu hˌautˌaŋɡolˈewa tˈena wˈala kˌubomolˈewa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi wa ˌutawˈala wa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
wakˈati hˈuo ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa babˈeli lˌilikˈuwa lˌimeˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌamezˌuilˈiwa katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la jˈuda.|0
bˌasi sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemfˈuŋɡa hˌuko ˌakisˈema, kwa nˈini ˌunatabˈiri hˈivjo? wˌewe ˌunasˈema, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuutˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌatautˈeka.|0
sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda hˌatawˈeza kˌupoɲˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo, lakˈini kwa hakˈika ˌatatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌatazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje ˈana kwa ˈana na kumwˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌatamtʃukˈua sˌedekˈia hˌadi babˈeli, mahˈali ˌatakˌapoˈiʃi mpˈaka nˌitakˌapomʃˌuɣulikˈia, asˈema bwˈana. kˌama ˌutapiɡˈana ðˈidi ja wˌakaldˈajo, hˌutaʃˈinda..|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakasˈema, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌiliniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
hˌanamˈeli mwˈana wa ʃalˈumu mɟˈomba wˈako ˌatakˈuɟa kwˈako na kusˈema, nunˈua ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu hˌuko ˌanaθˈoθi, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe kˌama ɟamˈaa ja karˈibu ni hˈaki na waɟˈibu wˈako kˌulinunˈua..|0
kˈiʃa, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjosˈema, binˈamu jˈaŋɡu hˌanamˈeli ˌaliniɟˈia katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi na kusˈema: nunˈua ʃˈamba lˈaŋɡu lˌililˈoko ˌanaθˈoθi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini. kwa kˌuwa ni hˈaki jˈako kˌulikombˈoa na kˌulimilˈiki, ɟˌinunulˈie. nˌiliɟˈua kwˌamba hˈili lˌilikˈuwa nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo nˌikalˌinunˈua ʃˈamba hˌilo lˌililˈoko ˌanaθˈoθi kutˈoka kwa binˈamu jˈaŋɡu hˌanamˈeli, nˌami nˌikampimˈia ʃekˈeli kˈumi na sˈaba za fˈeða.|0
nˌikatˈia sahˈihi na kuwˈeka muhˈuri hˈati ja kˌumilˈiki, nˌikawˈeka mˌaʃahˈidi, na kupˈima ˈile fˈeða kwˈeɲe mizˈani.|0
nˌikatʃukˈua ˈile hˈati ja kˌununulˈia, nakˈala ˌilijotˈiwa muhˈuri jˌeɲe mˌakubˌaliˈano na maʃˈarti, pˈia pamˈoɟa na ˈile nakˈala isˈijo na muhˈuri.|0
nˌami nikˈampa barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia, mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja, hˈati hˌii mbˈele ja binˈamu jˈaŋɡu hˌanamˈeli, na mbˈele ja mˌaʃahˈidi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewˈeka sahˈihi kwˈeɲe hˈati hˌii na mbˈele ja wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈeti katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: tʃukˈua hˈati hˈizi, jaˈani nakˈala zˈote zˌeɲe muhˈuri na zisˈizo na muhˈuri za hˈati ja kˌununulˈia, na ˌuziwˈeke kwˈeɲe ɡˌudulˈia la udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi ˌili zidˈumu kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: ɲˈumba, maʃˈamba na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu jˌatanˌunulˈiwa tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii..|0
baˌada ja kˌumkabˈiði barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia hˌii hˈati ja kˌununulˈia, nˌilimwˈomba bwˈana.|0
ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌumeˈumba mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi kwa uwˈezo wˈako m̩kˈuu na kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa. hakˈuna ɟˈambo lilˈilo ɡˈumu ˌusilˌoliwˈeza.|0
wˌewe hˌuoɲˈeʃa upˈendo kwa maˈelfu, lakˈini hulˈeta aðˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za bˈaba mˌapaɟˈani ˌm̩wa watˈoto wˌao baˌada jˈao. ˈee mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu na mwˌeɲe uwˈeza, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈako ni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
mˌakusˈudi jˈako ni makˈuu, na matˈendo jˈako ni jˌeɲe uwˈezo. mˈatʃo jˈako jˌanaˈona ɲɟˈia zˈote za wˌanadˈamu, nˌawe humlˈipa kˈila mmˈoɟa kˌuliŋɡˈana na mwenˈendo wˈake, na kˌama jˌanavjˌostahˈili matˈendo jˈake.|0
ˌulitˈenda iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu hˌuko mˈisri, na ˌumejˌaendelˈeza mpˈaka lˈeo, katˌika ˌisraˈeli na mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu wˈote, nˌawe ˌumeɟˌulikˈana na kˌufahamˈika hˈivjo mpˈaka lˈeo.|0
ˌuliwatˈoa wˈatu wˈako ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri kwa iʃˈara na mˌaaɟˈabu, kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa na kwa matˈiʃo makˈuu.|0
wˌaliiŋɡˈia na kˌuimilˈiki, lakˈini hˌawakˌukutˈii wˈala kˌuifuˈata ʃerˈia jˈako. hˌawakufˈaɲa kˈile ˌulitʃˌowaamˈuru kufˈaɲa. hˈivjo ˌukalˈeta maˈafa hˈaja jˈote ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi tˌumezuŋɡˈukwa na ɟˈeʃi ˌili kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu. kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo ambˈao wˌanaˌuʃambulˈia. ˌulilosˈema lˌimetokˈea kˌama vˈile ˌunavjoˈona sˈasa.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩ɟi ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo, wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌulinˌiambˈia, nunˈua ʃˈamba kwa fˈeða, na ɟˈambo hˌilo lˌiʃuhudˈiwe..|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa wˈote wˌeɲe mwˈili. ɟˈe, kˈuna ɟˈambo lolˈote lilˈilo ɡˈumu nˌisilˌoliwˈeza.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuutˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo, na ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ambˈaje ˌatautˈeka.|0
wˌakaldˈajo ambˈao wˌanaˌuʃambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuutʃˈoma mˈoto na kˌuutˌeketˈeza, pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba ambˈamo wˈatu wˌamenˌikasirˈiʃa kwa kˌumfukizˈia baˈali uvˈumba katˌika mapˈaa na kˌumimˈina sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli na wa jˈuda hˌawakufˈaɲa kˈitu kiŋɡˈine ˈila uˈovu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈao. nˈaam, wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli hˌawakufˈaɲa kˈitu kiŋɡˈine ˈila kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa kwa kˈazi ambˈazo mikˈono jˈao ˌimetˌeŋɡenˈeza, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli na wa jˈuda wˌamenˌikasirˈiʃa kwa uˈovu wˈote wˌaliofˈaɲa: wˈao, wafˈalme wˌao na mˌaafˈisa wˈao, mˌakuhˈani wˌao na mˌanabˈii wˈao, wˈatu wa jˈuda na wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wˌalinˌiɡeuzˈia visˈoɡo vjˈao, wˈala si ɲˈuso zˈao. iŋɡˈawa nˌiliwˌafundˈiʃa tˈena na tˈena, hˌawakupˈenda kˌusikilˈiza wˈala kˌuitikˈia aðˈabu.|0
wˌaliwˈeka miˈuŋɡu jˈao ja kˌutʃukˈiza sˈana katˌika ɲˈumba ˌiitwˈajo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu na kˌuinaɟˈisi.|0
wˌakaɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja baˈali katˌika bˈonde la bˈen hinˈomu, ambˈapo wˌalitˈoa wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao kafˈara kwa molˈeki, iŋɡˈawa kˈamwe sˌikuamˈuru, wˈala hˌalikˌuiŋɡˈia ˌakilˈini mwˈaŋɡu, kwˌamba wˌatafˈaɲa tʃukˈizo kˌama hˌilo na kumfˈaɲa jˈuda atˈende ðˈambi.|0
mnasˈema kuhˈusu ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni, ˈm̩ɟi ˌutatˈiwa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌasemˈalo.|0
hakˈika nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi zˈote nˌilizˌowafˌukuzˈia katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu kˈuu, nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa mahˈali hˈapa na kˌuwaruhˈusu waˈiʃi kwa salˈama.|0
wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
nˌitawˈapa mˈojo mmˈoɟa na kutˈenda pamˈoɟa, ˌili kwˌamba wanˈitʃe daˈima kwa mˈema jˈao weɲˈewe na kwa mˈema ja watˈoto wˌao baˌada jˈao.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa nˌao aɡˈano la milˈele: kˈamwe sˌitaˈatʃa kˌuwatendˈea mˈema, nˌami nˌitawˌavuvˈia kunˈitʃa mˈimi, ˌili kˈamwe wˌasiɡˌeukˈie mbˈali nˈami.|0
nˌitafˌurahˈia kˌuwatendˈea mˈema, na kwa hakˈika nˌitawapˈanda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kwa mˈojo wˈaŋɡu wˈote na rˈoho jˈaŋɡu jˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kˌama nˌilivjolˈeta maˈafa hˈaja makˈubwa kwa wˈatu hˈawa, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˈapa mˌafanikˈio nˌilijˌowaahˈidi.|0
kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena maʃˈamba jˌatanˌunulˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ambˈajo mlisˈema, ˌimekˈuwa ukˈiwa, ˌisijofˈaa, isˈijo na wˈatu wˈala waɲˈama, kwa sabˈabu ˌimetˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo..|0
maʃˈamba jˌatanˌunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða, na hˈati zˌitatˈiwa sahˈihi, zˌitatˈiwa muhˈuri na kˌuʃuhudˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini, katˌika viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu, katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na katˌika mˈiɟi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, sehˈemu za mˌaɣarˈibi katˌika mˈiɟi ja tˌambarˈare na katˌika neɡˈebu, kwa sabˈabu nˌitarudˈiʃa tˈena mˌafanikˈio jˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wakˈati jˌeremˈia ˌalipokˈuwa aŋɡˈali ˌamefˈuŋɡwa kwˈeɲe ˈua wa walˈinzi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia mˈara ja pˈili kusˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo, jˌeje ˌalijeˈumba dunˈia, bwˈana ˌalijˌeifˈaɲa na kˌuiθˌibitˈiʃa, bwˈana ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
niˈite nˌami nˌitakˌuitˈika na kˌukuambˈia mˈambo makˈuu na jˌasijˌotʃuŋɡuzˈika, ˌusijˌojaɟˈua..|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu ɲˈumba katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na maɟˈumba ja kifˈalme ja jˈuda jˌalijˌobomolˈewa ˌili jˌatumˈiwe ðˈidi ja kˈule kˌuzuŋɡˈukwa na ɟˈeʃi na upˈaŋɡa.|0
katˌika kˌupiɡˈana na wˌakaldˈajo: zˌitaɟˈazwa na maˈiti za wˈatu nˌitakˌaowatʃˈiɲɟa katˌika hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. nˌitaufˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu ja maˈovu jˌake jˈote.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, nˌitaˌuletˈea ˈafja na ˌupoɲˈaɟi, nˌitawapˈoɲa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌafurahˈie amˈani tˈele na salˈama.|0
nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kutˈekwa kwˈao, na kˌuwaɟˈeŋɡa tˈena kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa hˈapo awˈali.|0
nˌitawˌatakˈasa ðˈambi zˈote wˌalizofˈaɲa ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, na nˌitawˌasamˈehe ðˈambi zˈote za uˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutanˌiletˈea ˌutukˈufu, furˈaha, sˈifa na heʃˈima mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia jˌatakˌajosikˈia mˈambo jˈote mazˈuri nˌinajˌoufaɲˈia. nˌao wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa na kˌutetemˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈiŋɡi wa mˌafanikˈio na amˈani nˌitakˌajoˌupatˈia..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: mnasˈema kuhˈusu mahˈali hˈapa kwˌamba, ni mahˈali pˌalipoˈatʃwa ukˈiwa, pasˈipo na wˌanadˈamu wˈala waɲˈama. lakˈini katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu ambˈazo zˌimeˈatʃwa, ambˈazo hˌazikalˈiwi na wˌanadˈamu wˈala waɲˈama, hˌuko kˌutasikˈika kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine.|0
saˈuti za ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha, saˈuti za bˈibi na bwˈana arˈusi, na saˈuti za wˈale wˌaletˈao sadˈaka za ʃukrˈani katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, wˌakisˈema,   mʃˌukurˈuni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, kwa maˈana bwˈana ni mwˈema; upˈendo wˌake wadˈumu milˈele. kwa kˌuwa nˌitaˌirudiʃˈia ˈn̩tʃi barˈaka kˌama zˌilivjokˈuwa hˈapo awˈali, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: mahˈali hˈapa, ambˈapo ni ukˈiwa, pasˈipo na wˌanadˈamu wˈala waɲˈama: katˌika mˈiɟi jˈake, pˌatakuwˈepo tˈena malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi kˌupumzˈiʃa makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo.|0
katˌika mˈiɟi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja vilˈima, ja vilˈima vja mˌaɣarˈibi na ja neɡˈebu, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini, katˌika viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu na katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, makˈundi ja kondˈoo jˌatapˈita tˈena tʃˈini ja mkˈono wa jˌeje ˌajahˌesabˈuje, asˈema bwˈana.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati nˌitakˌapotimˈiza ahˈadi jˈaŋɡu ja rehˈema nˌilijˌoifˈaɲa kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na kwa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo na wakˈati hˈuo nˌitalifˈaɲa tˈawi la hˈaki lˌitʃipˈuke kutˈoka ukˈoo wa daˈudi, nˌaje ˌatafˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, jˈuda ˌataˌokolˈewa na jˌerusalˈemu ˌataˈiʃi salˈama. hˈili ndˈilo ɟˈina ˌatakˌaloˈitwa: bwˈana hˈaki jˈetu..|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: daˈudi kˈamwe hˌatakˈosa ˈm̩tu wa kˌukalˈia kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈala hˌata mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi, kˈamwe hˌawatakˈosa ˈm̩tu wa kˌusimˈama mbˈele zˈaŋɡu daˈima ˌili kutˈoa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, ˌili kˌuteketˈeza sadˈaka ja nafˈaka na kutˈoa ðabˈihu..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
bˌasi aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, na aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na walˈawi ambˈao ni mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌohudˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, lˌinawˈeza kuvˈuɲɟua, na daˈudi hˌatakˈuwa tˈena na m̩zˈao wa kˌutawˈala katˌika kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wazˈao wa daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu na walˈawi wˌanaˌohudˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu wˈeŋɡi, wˌasiowˈeza kˌuhesabˈika kˌama ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani, tˈena wˌasiˌopimˈika kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa wa ˌufuˈoni ˌm̩wa bahˈari..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
ɟˈe, hˌuɟasikˈia kwˌamba wˈatu hˈawa wˌanasˈema, bwˈana ˌamezˌikatˈaa zˈile fˈalme mbˈili ˌalizˌozitʃaɡˈua? kwa hˈijo wˌamewˌaðarˈau wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, na hˌawawaˈoni tˈena kˌama taˈifa.|0
bˌasi nˌitawˌakatˈaa wazˈao wa jakˈobo na daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, na sˌitatʃaɡˈua mmˈoɟa wa wanˈawe kˌutawˈala ɟˌuːja wazˈao wa ˌabrahˈamu, isˈaki na jakˈobo. kwa maˈana nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kutˈekwa kwˈao na kˌuwaonˈea hurˈuma..|0
wakˈati nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, pamˈoɟa na fˈalme zˈote na mˌataˈifa katˌika himˈaja ˌalijˌotawˈala wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakipiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi jˈote ˌinajˌoizuŋɡˈuka, nˈeno hˈili lˌilimɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kusˈema: nˈenda kwa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌumwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuutˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌataˌuteketˈeza kwa mˈoto.|0
hˌutawˈeza kˌuepˈuka mkˈono wˈake, bˌali hakˈika ˌutatˈekwa na kˌukabiðˈiwa kwˈake. ˌutamwˈona mfˈalme wa babˈeli kwa mˈatʃo jˈako mweɲˈewe, nˌaje ˌatazuŋɡˈumza nˌawe ˈana kwa ˈana. nˌawe ˌutakwˈenda babˈeli.|0
lakˈini sikˈia ahˈadi ja bwˈana, ˈee sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda. hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kˌukuhˈusu: hˌutakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
ˌutakˈufa kwa amˈani. kˌama vˈile wˈatu wˌalivjowˈaʃa mˈoto wa mazˈiko kwa heʃˈima ja bˈaba zˈako, wafˈalme wˌaliˌokutˌaŋɡulˈia, ndˈivjo wˈatu wˌatakˌavjowˈaʃa mˈoto kwa heʃˈima jˈako na kˌuombolˈeza, wˌakisˈema: ˈole, ˈee bwˈana! mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌinawˈeka ahˈadi hˌii, asˈema bwˈana..|0
ndˈipo nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda mˈambo hˈaja jˈote hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu.|0
wakˈati ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa babˈeli lˌilipokˈuwa lˌikipiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu na mˈiɟi miŋɡˈine ja jˈuda ambˈajo bˈado ˌilikˈuwa imˈara, jaˈani lakˈiʃi na azˈeka. hˌii ˌilikˈuwa mˈiɟi pekˈee jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome ˌilijobˈaki katˌika jˈuda.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, baˌada ja mfˈalme sˌedekˈia kufˈaɲa aɡˈano na wˈatu wˈote hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu ˌili kˌutaŋɡˈaza uhˈuru kwa watˈumwa.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalipˈaswa kˌuwaˈatʃa hˈuru watˈumwa wˌake wa kˌiebranˈia, wˌanawˈake na wˌanaˈume. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌeruhusˈiwa kˌumʃikilˈia mjahˈudi mwenzˈake kˌama mtˈumwa.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌaafˈisa wˈote na wˈatu wˌaliˌoiŋɡˈia katˌika aɡˈano hˈili wˌakakubˈali kwˌamba wˌatawaˈatʃa hˈuru watˈumwa wˌao wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, na hˌawatˌawaʃˌikilˈia tˈena kˌama watˈumwa. wˌakakubˈali na wˌakawaˈatʃa hˈuru.|0
lakˈini bˌaadˈaje wˌakabadˈili mawˈazo jˈao, na kˌuwarudˈiʃa wˈale watˈumwa wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamewaˈatʃa hˈuru, wˌakawafˈaɲa tˈena watˈumwa.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˌilifˈaɲa aɡˈano na bˈaba zˈenu nˌilipˌowatˈoa mˈisri, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa. nˌilisˈema.|0
kˈila mwˈaka wa sˈaba, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ni lazˈima amwˈatʃe hˈuru mtˈumwa ambˈaje ni mwˌebranˈia mwenzˈenu ˌalijˌeɟiˈuza kwˈenu. baˌada ja kˌukutˌumikˈia kwa miˈaka sˈita, ni lazˈima umwˈatʃe hˈuru aˈende zˈake. hˌata hˈivjo bˈaba zˈenu hˌawakˌunisˌikilˈiza wˈala kˌuniɟˈali.|0
hˈivi kˌaribˈuni tu mlitˈubu na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo sˈawa matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu: kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌaliwˌataŋɡazˈia uhˈuru wˌaebranˈia wˈake. hˌata mlifˈaɲa aɡˈano mbˈele zˈaŋɡu ndˈani ja ɲˈumba ˌiitwˈajo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa mmˌeɡeˈuka na kˌulinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌamemrudˈiʃa mtˈumwa wa kiˈume na wa kˈike ambˈao mlikˈuwa mmˌewaˈatʃa hˈuru waˈende zˈao wˌalikotˈaka. mmˌewalˌazimˈiʃa kˌuwa watˈumwa wˈenu tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: hˌamkunitˈii mˈimi. hˌamkutaŋɡˈaza uhˈuru kwa ndˈuɡu zˈenu. hˈivjo sˈasa, nˌinawˌataŋɡazˈia nˈiɲi uhˈuru, asˈema bwˈana: uhˈuru ˌili kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, taˈuni na ɲɟˈaa. nˌitawafˈaɲa ˈm̩we tʃukˈizo kwa fˈalme zˈote za dunˈia.|0
wˈatu wˌaliovˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu, na ambˈao hˌawakutˈunza maʃˈarti ja aɡˈano wˌalilofˈaɲa mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, nˌitawafˈaɲa kˌama ndˈama wˌalijemkˈata vipˈande viwˈili, kˈiʃa wˌakatembˈea kˈati ja vˈile vipˈande vja hˈujo ndˈama.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu, mˌaafˈisa wa mˌahakˈama, mˌakuhˈani na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌaliopˈita kˈati ja vˈile vipˈande vja ndˈama.|0
nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao. maˈiti zˈao zˌitakˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitamtˈia sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda na mˌaafˈisa wˌake mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao, kwa ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa babˈeli, lˌililokˈuwa lˌimeondˈoka kwˈenu.|0
nˌitatˈoa ˈamri, asˈema bwˈana, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa tˈena katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu. wˌatapiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈake, wˌautwˈae na kˌuutˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto. nˌami nˌitaˌiaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi ja jˈuda hˈivjo pasˈiwe na jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˈeza kuˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno lˌililomɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
nˈenda kwa ɟamˈaa ja wˌarekˈabi, ˌuwaalˈike wˈaɟe kwˈeɲe mˈoɟa ja vjˈumba vja pembˈeni vja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, na uwˈape divˈai wˈaɲue.|0
bˌasi nˌikaˈenda kumwˈita jˌaazanˈia mwˈana wa jˌeremˈia, mwˈana wa hˌabazinˈia, na ndˈuɡu zˌake na wanˈawe wˈote, jaˈani ɟamˈaa nzˈima ja wˌarekˈabi.|0
nˌikawalˈeta katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, ndˈani ja tʃˈumba tʃa wˈana wa hanˈani mwˈana wa ˌiɡdalˈia ˈm̩tu wa mˈuŋɡu. kˌilikˈuwa karˈibu na tʃˈumba tʃa mˌaafˈisa, ambˈatʃo kˌilikˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈile tʃa mˌaasˈeja mwˈana wa ʃalˈumu, ˌalijekˈuwa bawˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikawˈeka mˌabakˈuli jˌalijoɟˈaa divˈai na baˈaði ja vikˈombe mbˈele ja wˈatu wa ɟamˈaa ja wˌarekˈabi na kˌuwaambˈia, kˌuɲuˈeni divˈai.|0
lakˈini wˌao wˌakaɟˈibu, sˌisi hatˈuɲui divˈai, kwa sabˈabu bˈaba jˈetu jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu, ˌalitˈupa aɡˈizo hˈili: nˈiɲi wˈala wazˈao wˈenu kˈamwe msˈiɲue divˈai.|0
pˈia msiɟˈeŋɡe ɲˈumba kˈamwe, wˈala kˌuotˈeʃa mbˈeɡu ˌau kupˈanda maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu. kˈamwe msˈiwe na kˈitu tʃotʃˈote katˌika hˈivi, lakˈini sˈiku zˈote lazˈima muˈiʃi kwˈeɲe mahˈema. ndˈipo mtˌakapoˈiʃi kwa mˈuda mrˈefu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˈiɲi ni wˌahamiˈaɟi..|0
tˌumetˈii kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo bˈaba jˈetu jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu ˌalitˌuamˈuru. sˌisi weɲˈewe wˈala wˌake zˈetu wˈala wˈana wˈetu na bˈinti zˈetu kˈamwe hˌatuɟˈaɲua divˈai.|0
wˈala kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba za kuˈiʃi ˌau kˌuwa na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, maʃˈamba ˌau mazˈao.|0
tˌumeˈiʃi katˌika mahˈema na tˌumetˈii kˌikamilˈifu kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃˌotuamˈuru bˈaba jˈetu jˌonadˈabu.|0
lakˈini wakˈati nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalipˌoivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, tˌulisˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, lazˈima twˈende jˌerusalˈemu ˌili kˌukimbˈia maɟˈeʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo na ja waʃˈamu. kwa hˈijo tˌumeˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, alˈije mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˈenda ˌukawˌaambˈie wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu, ɟˈe, hamwˈezi kˌuɟifˈunza kutˈoka kwa wˈana wa rekˈabu, na kˌujatˈii manˈeno jˈaŋɡu? asˈema bwˈana.|0
jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu ˌaliwˌaaɡˈiza wanˈawe wasˈiɲue divˈai, na aɡˈizo hˌilo wˌameliʃˈika mpˈaka lˈeo hawˈaɲui divˈai, kwa sabˈabu wˌanatˈii ˈamri ja bˈaba jˈao. lakˈini nˌimenˈena nˌaɲi tˈena na tˈena, lakˈini hˌamkunitˈii mˈimi.|0
tˈena na tˈena nˌimewatˈuma wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu wˈote mˌanabˈii kwˈenu. wˌakasˈema, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ni lazˈima ˌaɡeˈuke na kuˈatʃa ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja, na kˌujatˌeŋɡenˈeza matˈendo jˈake. msˌifuˈate miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ˌili kˌuitˌumikˈia. ndˈipo mtˌakapoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa nˈiɲi na bˈaba zˈenu. lakˈini hˌamkuɟˈali wˈala kˌunisˌikilˈiza.|0
wazˈao wa jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu wˌalitimˈiza ˈamri ambˈajo bˈaba jˈao ˌaliwˈapa, lakˈini wˈatu hˈawa hˌawakˌunitˈii mˈimi..|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: sˌikilizˈeni! nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja jˈuda na ɟˌuːja kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌaiʃˈije jˌerusalˈemu kˈila aˈina ja maˈafa nˌilijotˈamka ðˈidi jˈao. nˌilinˈena nˈao, lakˈini hˌawakˌusikilˈiza. nˌiliwaˈita, lakˈini hˌawakuɟˈibu..|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakaˌiambˈia ɟamˈaa ja wˌarekˈabi, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mmetˈii ˈamri ja bˈaba jˈenu jˌonadˈabu, na mmˌefuˈata mˌafundˈiʃo jˌake jˈote na mmefˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌalitʃˌowaamˈuru..|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: jˌonadˈabu mwˈana wa rekˈabu hˌatakˈosa kˈamwe kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu wa kˌunitˌumikˈia mˈimi..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˈeno hˈili lˌilimɟˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, kusˈema.|0
tʃukˈua kitˈabu ˌuandˈike ndˈani jˌake manˈeno jˈote nˌilijonˈena nˌawe kuhˈusu ˌisraˈeli, jˈuda na mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote, ʃˈu nˌilipoˈanza kunˈena nˌawe wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa josˈia hˌadi sˈasa.|0
lˈabda wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌatakˌaposikˈia ɟˌuːja kˈila maˈafa nˌinajˌokusudˈia kˌuwapˈiɡa nˈajo, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌataɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja, kˈiʃa nˌitasamˈehe uˈovu wˌao na ðˈambi jˈao.|0
hˈivjo jˌeremˈia ˌakamwˈita barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia, nˌaje jˌeremˈia ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakijˌakarˈiri manˈeno jˈote ˌalijˌojasˈema bwˈana, barˈuku ˌakajˌaandˈika katˌika kitˈabu.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia barˈuku, nˌimezˌuilˈiwa, mˌimi siwˈezi kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
bˌasi wˌewe nˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana sˈiku ja kufˈuŋɡa, ˌuwasomˈee wˈatu manˈeno ja bwˈana kutˈoka kitˈabu hˈiki jˈale ˌulijˌojaandˈika kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu. wˌasomˈee wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda wˌaliofˈika kutˈoka mˈiɟi jˈao.|0
lˈabda wˌataˈomba na kusˈihi mbˈele za bwˈana na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja, kwa sabˈabu hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu zˌilizotˈamkwa ðˈidi ja wˈatu hˈawa na bwˈana ni kˈubwa.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa tˈisa, mnˈamo mwˈaka wa tˈano wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, wakˈati wa kufˈuŋɡa mbˈele za bwˈana, ˌilitaŋɡˈazwa kwa wˈatu wˈote wˌaliˈoko jˌerusalˈemu, na wˈale wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka mˈiɟi ja jˈuda.|0
kutˈoka tʃˈumba tʃa ɡˌemarˈia mwˈana wa ʃafˈani mwandˈiʃi, kˌilitʃokˈuwa katˌika ˈua wa ɟˈuu kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo ɟˈipja la hekˈalu, barˈuku ˌakawˌasomˈea wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana manˈeno ja jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈile kitˈabu.|0
bˌasi mikˈaja mwˈana wa ɡˌemarˈia, mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, ˌalipˌosikˈia manˈeno jˈote ja bwˈana kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈile kitˈabu.|0
ˌaliʃˈuka hˌadi kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa mwandˈiʃi kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, mahˈali wˌalipokˈuwa wˌamekˈeti mˌaafˈisa wˈote: jaˈani ˌeliʃˈama mwandˈiʃi, delˈaja mwˈana wa ʃemˈaja, ˌelnaθˈani mwˈana wa akbˈori, ɡˌemarˈia mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa hˌananˈia, na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wˈote.|0
baˌada ja mikˈaja kˌuwaambˈia kˈila kˈitu ambˈatʃo ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesikˈia barˈuku ˌakiwˌasomˈea wˈatu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈile kitˈabu.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wˌakamtˈuma jehˈudi mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia, mwˈana wa ʃˌelemˈia, mwˈana wa kˈuʃi, kˌumwambˈia barˈuku, lˈeta hˈitʃo kitˈabu ambˈatʃo ˌumewˌasomˈea wˈatu, nˌawe mweɲˈewe ˈuɟe. ndˈipo barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia ˌakawˌaendˈea akˈiwa na hˈitʃo kitˈabu mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
wˌakamwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali, kˈeti na ˌutusomˈee hˈitʃo kitˈabu. ndˈipo barˈuku ˌakawˌasomˈea kˈile kitˈabu.|0
wˌalipˌojasikˈia manˈeno hˈajo jˈote, wˌakatˌazamˈana wˌao kwa wˌao kwa wˈoɡa na kˌumwambˈia barˈuku, lazˈima tutˈoe tˌaarˈifa ja manˈeno hˈaja jˈote kwa mfˈalme.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakamˌuulˈiza barˈuku, tˌuambˈie, ˌuliˌandikˈaɟe hˈaja jˈote? ɟˈe, jˌalitˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa jˌeremˈia.|0
barˈuku ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, manˈeno hˈaja jˈote jˌalitˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa jˌeremˈia, nˌami nˌikajˌaandˈika kwa wˈino katˌika hˈiki kitˈabu.|0
ndˈipo wˈale mˌaafˈisa wˌakamwambˈia barˈuku, wˌewe na jˌeremˈia nendˈeni mkˌaɟifˈitʃe. ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasiɟˈue mahˈali mlˈipo.|0
baˌada ja kˌuhifˈaði kˈile kitˈabu ndˈani ja tʃˈumba tʃa ˌeliʃˈama mwandˈiʃi, wˌakamwendˈea mfˈalme katˌika ˈua wa ɲɟˈe na kˌumwarˈifu kˈila kˈitu.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamtˈuma jehˈudi ˌakatʃukˈue kˈile kitˈabu. jehˈudi ˌakakilˈeta hˈitʃo kitˈabu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba tʃa ˌeliʃˈama mwandˈiʃi, na ˌakakisˈoma mbˈele ja mfˈalme na mˌaafˈisa wakˈiwa wˌamesimˈama kˈando ja mfˈalme.|0
ˌulikˈuwa mwˈezi wa tˈisa, na mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekˈeti tʃˈumba tʃa wakˈati wa barˈidi ˌakiˈota mˈoto.|0
hˌata ikˈawa kˈila wakˈati jehˈudi ˌalipˌomalˈiza kusˈoma kurˈasa tˈatu ˌau ˈn̩ne za hˈitʃo kitˈabu, mfˈalme ˌalizikˈata kwa kˈisu tʃa mwandˈiʃi na kˌuzitupˈia motˈoni, hˌadi kitˈabu tʃˈote kˌikatˌeketˈea.|0
mfˈalme na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake wˈote wˌaliˌosikˈia jˈote jˌalijosˈomwa hˌawakˌuoɲˈeʃa hˈofu jojˈote, wˈala hˌawakˌujararˈua mavˈazi jˈao.|0
hˌata iŋɡˈawa ˌelnaθˈani, delˈaja na ɡˌemarˈia wˌalimsˈihi mfˈalme ˌasikitʃˈome kˈile kitˈabu, jˌeje hˌakuwˌasikilˈiza.|0
badˈala jˈake, mfˈalme ˌakamwamˈuru jˌerameˈeli, mwˈana wa mfˈalme, serˈaja mwˈana wa ˌazriˈeli, na ʃˌelemˈia mwˈana wa ˌabdeˈeli kˌuwakamˈata mwandˈiʃi barˈuku na nabˈii jˌeremˈia. lakˈini bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewafˈitʃa.|0
baˌada ja mfˈalme kutʃˈoma kˈile kitˈabu kˌilitʃokˈuwa na jˈale manˈeno barˈuku ˌalijokˈuwa ˌamejˌaandˈika kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa jˌeremˈia, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia jˌeremˈia lˌikisˈema.|0
tʃukˈua kitˈabu kiŋɡˈine na ˌuandˈike ɟˈuu jˌake manˈeno jˈote jˌalijokˈuwa katˌika kˈile kitˈabu tʃa kwˈanza, ambˈatʃo jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌamekˌiteketˈeza kwa mˈoto.|0
mwambˈie pˈia jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˌulikˌiteketˈeza kˈile kitˈabu ˌukasˈema, kwa nˈini ˌuliandˈika kwˈeɲe kitˈabu kwˌamba kwa hakˈika mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌaŋɡekˈuɟa na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, na kˌuwakˌatilˈia mbˈali wˈatu na waɲˈama kutˈoka hˈumo.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana kuhˈusu jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda: hˌatakˈuwa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajekalˈia kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa daˈudi; maˈiti jˌake ˌitatˈupwa ɲɟˈe kwˈeɲe ɟˈoto wakˈati wa mtʃˈana na kupˈiɡwa na barˈidi wakˈati wa usˈiku.|0
nˌitamwaðˈibu jˈeje, watˈoto wˌake na wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wˈao. nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu na wˈatu wa jˈuda kˈila maˈafa nˌilijˌojasˈema ðˈidi jˈao, kwa sabˈabu hˌawaɟˌasikilˈiza..|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakatʃukˈua kitˈabu kiŋɡˈine na kˈumpa mwandˈiʃi barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia, nˌaje kˌama jˌeremˈia ˌalivjosˈema, barˈuku ˌakaandˈika ɟˈuu jˌake manˈeno jˈote ja kˈile kitˈabu ambˈatʃo jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekitʃˈoma mˈoto, na manˈeno meŋɡˈine mˈeŋɡi jˌalijˌofanˈana na hˈajo jˌalijˌooŋɡezˈewa hˈumo.|0
sˌedekˈia mwˈana wa josˈia ˌakafˈaɲua kˌuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda na nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala mahˈali pa jˌehojakˈini mwˈana wa jˌehojakˈimu.|0
lakˈini sˈio sˌedekˈia, wˈala wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, wˈala wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌalisˌikilˈiza manˈeno ja bwˈana ˌalijonˈena kˌupitˈia kwa nabˈii jˌeremˈia.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakamtˈuma jˌehukˈali mwˈana wa ʃˌelemˈia, pamˈoɟa na kuhˈani sˌefanˈia mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja kwa nabˈii jˌeremˈia na uɟˈumbe hˈuu: tˌafaðˈali ˌutuombˈee kwa bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
wakˈati hˈuu jˌeremˈia ˌalikˈuwa hˈuru kˌuiŋɡˈia na kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja wˈatu, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa bˈado hˌaɟatˈiwa ɡˌerezˈani.|0
ɟˈeʃi la farˈao lˌilikˈuwa lˌimetˈoka mˈisri, nˌao wˌakaldˈajo wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameˌuzuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu kwa maɟˈeʃi wˌalipˌosikˈia tˌaarˈifa kuhˈusu ɟˈeʃi hˌilo wˌaliɟˌiondˈoa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mwambˈie mfˈalme wa jˈuda ˌalijˌekutˈuma ˌuniulˈize mˈimi, ɟˈeʃi la farˈao lˌililotˈoka kˈuɟa kˌukusˌaidˈia lˌitarˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jeɲˈewe, jaˈani mˈisri.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaldˈajo wˌatarˈudi na kˌuʃambulˈia ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, wˌatautˈeka na kˌuutʃˈoma mˈoto..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: msˌiɟidaŋɡˈaɲe weɲˈewe mkˌifikˈiri, hakˈika wˌakaldˈajo wˌatatuˈatʃa na kwˈenda zˈao. hakˈika hˌawatˌawaˈatʃa.|0
hˌata kˌama mŋɡˌeliʃˈinda ɟˈeʃi lˈote la wˌakaldˈajo lˌinalˌowaʃˌambulˈia nˈiɲi, na wakˈawa ni wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa tu wˌaliobˈaki kwˈeɲe mahˈema jˈao, wˌaŋɡetˈoka na kˌuutʃˈoma ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu mˈoto.|0
baˌada ja ɟˈeʃi la wˌakaldˈajo kˌuɟiondˈoa kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu kwa sabˈabu ja ɟˈeʃi la farˈao.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakaˈanza kˌuondˈoka mɟˈini ˌili kwˈenda ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini ˌili ˌakapˈate sehˈemu jˌake ja mˈilki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu hˌuko.|0
lakˈini ˌalipofˈika kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la bˌeɲamˈini, m̩kˈuu wa walˈinzi, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake lˌilikˈuwa irˈija mwˈana wa ʃˌelemˈia mwˈana wa hˌananˈia, ˌakamkamˈata jˌeremˈia na kusˈema, wˌewe ˌunakwˈenda kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na wˌakaldˈajo.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakasˈema, hˈijo si kwˈeli, mˌimi sˌiɟiˈuŋɡi na wˌakaldˈajo. lakˈini irˈija hˌakumsˌikilˈiza; badˈala jˈake, ˌakamkamˈata jˌeremˈia na kˌumpelˈeka kwa mˌaafˈisa.|0
wˌakamkˌasirikˈia jˌeremˈia, wˌakaamˈuru apˈiɡwe, na ˌakafˈuŋɡwa katˌika ɲˈumba ja jˌonaθˈani mwandˈiʃi wˌalijokˈuwa wˌameifˈaɲa ɡerˈeza.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakawˈekwa kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba kˌilitʃˌofukulˈiwa tʃˈini, kˌilitʃoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa zˈeɡe ndˈani ja ɡerˈeza tʃˈini ja ŋɡˈome, ˌakakˈaa hˌuko kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakatumˈana alˈetwe katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, mahˈali ˌalipˌomuulˈiza kwa sˈiri, ɟˈe, kˈuna nˈeno lolˈote kutˈoka kwa bwˈana? jˌeremˈia ˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme sˌedekˈia, nˌimefˈaɲa kˈosa ɡˈani ðˈidi jˈako na mˌaafˈisa wˈako ˌau wˈatu hˈawa, hˌata ˌukanitˈia ɡˌerezˈani.|0
wˈako wˈapi mˌanabˈii wˈako wˌaliˌokutˌabirˈia wˌakisˈema, mfˈalme wa babˈeli hˌatakˌuʃambulˈia wˌewe wˈala ˈn̩tʃi hˌii?.|0
lakˈini sˈasa, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, tˌafaðˈali sˌikilˈiza. nˌiruhˈusu nilˈete maˈombi jˈaŋɡu mbˈele jˈako, ˌusinˌirudˈiʃe kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja jˌonaθˈani mwandˈiʃi, nisˈiɟe nˌikafˈia hˈumo.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakatˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo jˌeremˈia awˈekwe katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi, na apˈewe mkˈate kutˈoka mitˈaa ja wˌaokˈaɟi kˈila sˈiku mpˈaka mikˈate jˈote katˌika ˈm̩ɟi ˌitakˌapokwˈiʃa. kwa hˈijo jˌeremˈia ˌakabˈaki katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi.|0
ʃˌefatˈia mwˈana wa matˈani, na ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa paʃˈuri, na jˌehukˈali mwˈana wa ʃˌelemˈia, na paʃˈuri mwˈana wa malkˈija wˌakasikˈia kˈile jˌeremˈia ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌakiwˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote wakˈati ˌaliposˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: jejˈote ˌakaˈaje ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa ˌau taˈuni, lakˈini jejˈote ˌatakˌajeɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwa wˌakaldˈajo ˌataˈiʃi. ˌatakˌajejatˈoa maˈiʃa jˌake kˌama ɲˈara, ˌataˈiʃi..|0
tˈena hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kwa hakˈika ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟˈeʃi la mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ambˈaje ˌatautˈeka..|0
ndˈipo mˌaafˈisa wˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, ˈm̩tu hˈuju ˌimempˈasa kˌuuˈawa. ˌanawˌakatˈiʃa tamˈaa askˈari wˌaliobˈaki katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu, vˈivjo hˈivjo na wˈatu wˈote pˈia, kwa aɟˈili ja mˈambo ˌanajˌowaambˈia. ˈm̩tu hˈuju hˌawatakˈii mˈema wˈatu hˈawa, bˌali mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao.|0
mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakaɟˈibu, jˌeje jˈuko mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu! mfˈalme hawˈezi kufˈaɲa lolˈote kˌuwapˈiŋɡa nˈiɲi.|0
bˌasi wˌakamtʃukˈua jˌeremˈia na kumtˈia kwˈeɲe kisˈima tʃa malkˈija, mwˈana wa mfˈalme, kˌilitʃokˈuwa katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi. wˌakamterˈemʃa jˌeremˈia kwa kˈamba ndˈani ja kisˈima. hˌakikˈuwa na mˈaɟi ndˈani jˈake, ˈila tˈope tˈu, nˌaje jˌeremˈia ˌakazˈama ndˈani ja matˈope.|0
lakˈini ˈebed melˈeki mkˈuʃi, ˌalijekˈuwa afˈisa katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, ˌakasikˈia kˌuwa wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemtˈia jˌeremˈia ndˈani ja kisˈima. wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamekˈeti katˌika lˈaŋɡo la bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ˈebed melˈeki ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na kˌumwambˈia.|0
mfˈalme bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, wˈatu hˈawa wˌamefˈaɲa uˈovu kwa jˈote wˌaliˌomtendˈea nabˈii jˌeremˈia. wˌamemtˈupa ndˈani ja kisˈima, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌatakˈufa kwa ɲɟˈaa wakˈati ambˈapo hakˈuna tʃakˈula popˈote katˌika ˈm̩ɟi.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakamwamˈuru ˈebed melˈeki mkˈuʃi, ˌakisˈema, tʃukˈua wˈatu θˌelaθˈini kutˈoka hˈapa pamˈoɟa nˈawe, mkamtˈoe nabˈii jˌeremˈia hˌuko kwˈeɲe kisˈima kˈabla haɟˈafa.|0
bˌasi ˈebed melˈeki ˌakawˌatʃukˈua wˈatu pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˌakaˈenda mpˈaka kwˈeɲe tʃˈumba kˌilitʃˈoko tʃˈini ja hazˈina ndˈani ja ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. ˌakatʃukˈua mˌatambˈaa mˌakuukˈuu pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈuo zˌilizˌotʃakˈaa kutˈoka hˌuko, na kˌumʃuʃˈia jˌeremˈia kwa kˈamba ndˈani ja kisˈima.|0
ˈebed melˈeki mkˈuʃi ˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia, wˈeka hˈaja mˌatambˈaa mˌakuukˈuu na hˈizo ŋɡˈuo zˌilizˌotʃakˈaa mˌakwapˈani ˌili kˌuzuˈia kˈamba. jˌeremˈia ˌakafˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
nˌao wˌakamvˈuta ɟˈuu kwa kˈamba na kumtˈoa katˌika kisˈima. jˌeremˈia ˌakakˈaa katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakatˈuma wˈatu wˌamwitˈie nabˈii jˌeremˈia wamlˈete kwˈake kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la tˈatu la hekˈalu la bwˈana. mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia, nˌinatˈaka kˌukuulˈiza ɟˈambo fulˈani, ˌusinifˈitʃe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia sˌedekˈia, nˌikikˈupa ɟˈibu, ɟˈe, hˌutaniˈua? hˌata kˌama nˌikikˈupa ʃaˈuri, wˌewe hˌutanˌisikilˈiza.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakamwapˈia jˌeremˈia kiˈapo hˈiki kwa sˈiri, ˌakisˈema, hakˈika kˌama ˌaiʃˈivjo bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌametˈupa pˈumzi, sˌitakuˈua wˈala sˌitakutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈako.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakamwambˈia sˌedekˈia, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: ikˈiwa ˌutaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, maˈiʃa jˈako jˌatasˌalimˈika, na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu hˌautˌateketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. pˈia wˌewe na ɟamˈaa jˈako mtaˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini ikˈiwa hˌutaɟˌisalimˈiʃa kwa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo na wˌataˌuteketˈeza kwa mˈoto, nˌawe mweɲˈewe hˌutawˈeza kˌuɟiokˈoa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao..|0
mfˈalme sˌedekˈia ˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia, nˌinawˌaoɡˈopa wˌajahˈudi ambˈao wˌamekˌimbilˈia kwa wˌakaldˈajo, kwa kˌuwa wˌakaldˈajo wˌanawˈeza kˌunitˈia mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao, nˌao wˌakanitˈenda vibˈaja.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌakaɟˈibu, hˌawatˌakutˈia mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. m̩tˈii bwˈana kwa kufˈaɲa kˈile nˌinatʃˌokuambˈia. kˈiʃa ˌutafˌanikˈiwa na maˈiʃa jˈako jˌatakˈuwa salˈama.|0
lakˈini ˌukikatˈaa kˌuɟisˌalimˈiʃa, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌalilˌonifˌunulˈia.|0
wˌanawˈake wˈote wˌalioˈatʃwa katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la mfˈalme wa jˈuda wˌatalˈetwa mbˈele ja mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli. wˌanawˈake hˈao wˌatakˌuambˈia:  wˌalikˌupotˈoʃa na kˌukuʃˈinda, wˈale rafˈiki zˈako ˌuliˌowaamˈini. miɡˈuu jˈako ˌimezˈama mˌatopˈeni; rafˈiki zˈako wˌamekuˈatʃa..|0
wˌake zˈako wˈote na watˈoto wˌatalˈetwa na kutˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo. wˌewe mweɲˈewe hˌutawˈeza kˌuɟiokˈoa mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. lakˈini ˌutatˈekwa na mfˈalme wa babˈeli, na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ˌutatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌakisikˈia kwˌamba nˌimezuŋɡˈumza nˈawe, nˌao wˌakakuɟˈia na kusˈema, tˌuambˈie kˈile ˌulitʃˌozuŋɡˈumza na mfˈalme na kˈile mfˈalme ˌalitʃˌokuambˈia, ˌusitufˈitʃe ˌau sˈivjo tˌutakuˈua,.|0
bˌasi wˌaambˈie, nˌilikˈuwa nˌinamsˈihi mfˈalme ˌasinˌirudˈiʃe kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja jˌonaθˈani nisˈiɟe nˌikafˈia hˈumo..|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wˌakamɟˈia jˌeremˈia na kˌumuulˈiza, nˌaje jˌeremˈia ˌakawˌaambˈia kˈila kˈitu mfˈalme ˌalitʃˌomwaɡˈiza kusˈema. kˈiʃa hˌawakusˈema lolˈote zaˈidi na jˌeremˈia kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌesikˈia mˌazuŋɡˈumzo jˌake na mfˈalme.|0
nˌaje jˌeremˈia ˌakabˈaki katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi hˌadi sˈiku jˌerusalˈemu ˌilipotˈekwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja tˈisa ja mwˈezi wa ˈn̩ne wa mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa wa ˌutawˈala wa sˌedekˈia, ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌulibˌomolˈewa.|0
kˈiʃa mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli wakˈaɟa na kukˈeti kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la kˈati, nˌao nˈi: nˈerɡal ʃarˈeza wa samɡˈari, nˈebo sˌarsekˈimu afˈisa m̩kˈuu, nˈerɡal ʃarˈeza afˈisa mwˌeɲe tʃˈeo tʃa ɟˈuu, na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wˈote wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
mfˈalme sˌedekˈia wa jˈuda na askˈari wˈote wˌalipˌowaˈona, wˌakakimbˈia na kˌuondˈoka mɟˈini usˈiku kwa ɲɟˈia ja bustˈani ja mfˈalme, kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo lˌililokˈuwa kˈati ja kˈuta mbˈili, wˌakaˌelekˈea arˈaba.|0
hˌuko rˈibla, mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌaliwatʃˈiɲɟa wˈana wa sˌedekˈia mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈake, na pˈia ˌakawaˈua wakˈuu wˈote wa jˈuda.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakajaŋɡˈoa mˈatʃo ja sˌedekˈia na kumfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba na kˌumpelˈeka babˈeli.|0
ɟˈeʃi la wˌakaldˈajo lˌikatʃˈoma mˈoto ɟˈumba la kifˈalme na ɲˈumba za wˈatu, na kˌuzibomˈoa kˈuta za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi ˌaliwˌabakˈiza baˈaði ja wˈatu maskˈini katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda, ambˈao hˌawakˈuwa na kˈitu. nˌaje wakˈati hˈuo ˌakawˈapa maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu na maʃˈamba meŋɡˈine.|0
bˈasi, nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈoa mˌaaɡˈizo kuhˈusu jˌeremˈia kˌupitˈia nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wa mfˈalme ˌakisˈema.|0
mtʃukˈue umtˈunze. ˌusimðˈuru, lakˈini ˌumfaɲˈie tʃotʃˈote ˌanatʃotˈaka.|0
bˌasi nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi, nˌebuʃazbˈani afˈisa m̩kˈuu, nˈerɡal ʃarˈeza afˈisa wa tʃˈeo tʃa ɟˈuu, na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wˈote wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
wˌakatˈuma wˈatu kˌumwondˈoa jˌeremˈia kutˈoka ˈua wa walˈinzi. wˌakamkabˈiði kwa ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, ˌili ˌamrudˈiʃe ɲumbˈani kwˈake. kwa hˈijo ˌakabˈaki mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
wakˈati jˌeremˈia ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamezˌuilˈiwa katˌika ˈua wa walˈinzi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia kusˈema.|0
nˈenda ˌukamwambˈie ˈebed melˈeki mkˈuʃi, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌutimˈiza manˈeno jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu kwa ɲɟˈia ja maˈafa, wˈala si kwa kˌuwafˌanikˈiʃa. wakˈati hˈuo hˈajo jˌatatimˈizwa mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako.|0
lakˈini sˈiku hˈijo nˌitakˌuokˈoa, asˈema bwˈana; hˌutatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale ˌunaˌowaoɡˈopa.|0
nˌitakˌuokˈoa; hˌutaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, lakˈini maˈiʃa jˈako jˌatakˈuwa salˈama, kwa sabˈabu ˌunanˌitumaˈini, asˈema bwˈana..|0
nˈeno lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana baˌada ja nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wa mfˈalme kˌumfuŋɡˈua hˌuko rˈama. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemkˈuta jˌeremˈia akˈiwa ˌamefˈuŋɡwa kwa mˌiɲorˈoro mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa matˈeka wˈote kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakipelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli.|0
kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi ˌalipomwˈona jˌeremˈia, ˌakamwambˈia, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌaliamˈuru maˈafa hˈaja kwa mahˈali hˈapa.|0
sˈasa bwˈana ˌamejalˈeta hˈaja, ˌamefˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa na vˈile ˌalivjosˈema ˌaŋɡefˈaɲa. jˈote hˈaja jˌametokˈea kwa sabˈabu nˈiɲi mlifˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana na hˌamkumtˈii.|0
lakˈini lˈeo nˌinakˌufuŋɡˈua mˌiɲorˈoro ilˈijo kwˈeɲe viwˈiko vja mikˈono jˈako. twˈende pamˈoɟa mpˈaka babˈeli ikˈiwa ˌunatˈaka, nˌami nˌitakutˈunza. lakˈini kˌama hutˈaki, bˌasi usˈiɟe. tazˈama, ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˈiko mbˈele jˈako, nˈenda kokˈote ˌunakotˈaka.|0
lakˈini kˈabla jˌeremˈia hˌaɟaɡeˈuka kˌuondˈoka, nˌebuzˌaradˈani ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, rˈudi kwa ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, ambˈaje mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌamemtʃaɡˈua ˈawe ɟˌuːja mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, ˌukaˈiʃi nˌaje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu, ˌau uˈende popˈote pˌanapˌokupendˈeza. kˈiʃa hˈujo kˌioŋɡˈozi akˈampa pˈoʃo jˌake na zawˈadi, ˌakamwˈatʃa aˈende zˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo jˌeremˈia ˌakaˈenda kwa ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu hˌuko mˈispa, na kuˈiʃi nˌaje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌalioˈatʃwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi na wˈatu wˌao wˌaliokˈuwa bˈado wˈapo kwˈeɲe enˈeo la wˈazi wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌamemteˈua ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu kˌuwa mtawˈala wa ˈn̩tʃi, na ˌamemwˈeka kˌuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˌanaˈume, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto wˌaliokˈuwa maskˈini zaˈidi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ambˈao hˌawakˌutʃukulˈiwa kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli.|0
wˌakamɟˈia ɡˌedalˈia hˌuko mˈispa. hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia, jˌohanˈani na jˌonaθˈani wˈana wa karˈea, serˈaja mwˈana wa tˌanhumˈeθi, wˈana wa efˈai mnˌetofˈaθi, na jˌezanˈia mwˈana wa mmaˈaka, pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈao.|0
ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani ˌakaˈapa ˌili kˌuwatˈia mˈojo wˌao na wˈatu wˈao. ˌakasˈema: msˌioɡˈope kˌuwatˌumikˈia wˌakaldˈajo. kaˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na kˌumtumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli, na ˌitakˈuwa vjˈema kwˈenu.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakˈaa mˈispa ˌili kˌuwawˌakilˈiʃa mbˈele ja wˌakaldˈajo wˌanaˌotuɟˈia, lakˈini nˈiɲi mtavˈuna divˈai, matˈunda ja kˌiaŋɡˈazi na mafˈuta, nˌaɲi mtawˈeka katˌika vjˈombo vjˈenu vja kˌuhifaðˈia, na kuˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi mlˌijoɟˌitwalˈia.|0
wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa moˈabu, amˈoni, edˈomu na ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote wˌalipˌosikˈia kwˌamba mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌameˈatʃa mabˈaki ja wˈatu katˌika jˈuda na ˌamemwˈeka ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani kˌuwa mtawˈala wˈao.|0
wˌakarˈudi wˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda kwa ɡˌedalˈia hˌuko mˈispa, kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi zˈote ambˈazo wˌalikˈuwa wˌametawˈaɲua. nˌao wˌakavˈuna divˈai na matˈunda tˈele wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi.|0
jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi wˌaliokˈuwa bˈado wˈapo kwˈeɲe enˈeo la wˈazi wˌakamɟˈia ɡˌedalˈia hˌuko mˈispa.|0
na kˌumwambˈia, ɟˈe, huɟˈui kwˌamba bˌaalˈisi mfˈalme wa wˌaamˈoni ˌamemtˈuma ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌakuˈue? lakˈini ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu hˌakuwˌaamˈini.|0
kˈiʃa jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea ˌakamwambˈia ɡˌedalˈia kwa sˈiri hˌuko mˈispa, ˈatʃa niˈende nˌikamuˈue ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia, wˈala hakˈuna ˌatakˌajeɟˈua. kwa nˈini ˌakuˈue na kˌusababˈiʃa wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliˌokuzuŋɡˈuka wˌatawaɲˈike, na mabˈaki wa jˈuda wˌaaŋɡamˈie.|0
lakˈini ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu ˌakamwambˈia jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, ˌusifˈaɲe ɟˈambo kˌama hˈilo! ˌunalosˈema kuhˈusu ˌiʃmaˈeli si kwˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa sˈaba ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia mwˈana wa ˌeliʃˈama, ˌalijekˈuwa wa uzˈao wa mfˈalme na pˈia ˌalikˈuwa mmˈoɟa wa mˌaafˈisa wa mfˈalme, akˈaɟa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu kˈumi kwa ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu hˌuko mˈispa. wˌalipokˈuwa wakˈila pamˈoɟa hˌuko.|0
ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˈatu kˈumi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌaliinˈuka na kˌumuˈua ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˌakamuˈua jˈule ambˈaje mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemteˈua ˈawe mtawˈala wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌiʃmaˈeli ˌakawaˈua pˈia wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na ɡˌedalˈia hˌuko mˈispa, pamˈoɟa na askˈari wa kˌikaldˈajo wˌaliokˈuwa hˌuko.|0
sˈiku mˈoɟa baˌada ja kˌuuˈawa kwa sˈiri kwa ɡˌedalˈia, kˈabla ˈm̩tu jejˈote hˌaɟafahˈamu ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
wˈatu θˌemanˈini wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameɲˈoa ndˈevu zˈao, wˌaliˌorarˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao na kˌuɟikˌatakˈata wˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka ʃekˈemu, ʃˈilo na sˌamarˈia wˌakilˈeta sadˈaka za nafˈaka na uvˈumba katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌakaondˈoka mˈispa ˌili kwˈenda kˌuwalˈaki, hˈuku ˌakilˈia ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakiˈenda. ˌalipˌokutˈana nˈao, ˌakasˈema, kˌaribˈuni kwa ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu.|0
wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia mɟˈini, ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia na wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakawatʃˈiɲɟa na kˌuwatˈupa ndˈani ja kisˈima.|0
lakˈini wˈatu kˈumi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wˌakamwambˈia ˌiʃmaˈeli, sˌisi ˌusituˈue! tˈuna ŋɡˈano na ʃajˈiri, mafˈuta na asˈali, vˌilivjofˈitʃwa katˌika ʃˈamba. kwa hˈijo ˌakawaˈatʃa na hˌakuwaˈua pamˈoɟa na wˈale weŋɡˈine.|0
bˌasi kˈile kisˈima ambˈatʃo ˌalitˈupa zˈile maˈiti za wˈatu ˌaliˌowaˈua pamˈoɟa na ɡˌedalˈia kˌilikˈuwa ni kˈile kisˈima ambˈatʃo mfˈalme ˈasa ˌalikifˈaɲa sehˈemu ja ulˈinzi wˌake ðˈidi ja baˈaʃa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli. ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌakakiɟˈaza kisˈima hˈitʃo kwa maˈiti.|0
ˌiʃmaˈeli ˌakawafˈaɲa matˈeka wˈatu wˈote ambˈao nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wa mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaˈatʃa hˌuko mˈispa na kumwˈeka ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu ɟˈuu jˈao: wˌalikˈuwa bˈinti za mfˈalme pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈote ˌaliokˈuwa ˌamewaˈatʃa hˌuko. ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌakawˌatʃukˈua matˈeka na kˌuondˈoka nˈao, ˌakavˈuka kwˈenda kwa wˌaamˈoni.|0
jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˌuːja ˌuhalˈifu wˈote ambˈao ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌameufˈaɲa.|0
wˌaliwˌatʃukˈua wˈatu wˌao wˈote kwˈenda kˌupiɡˈana na ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia. wˌakakutˈana nˌaje karˈibu na bwˈawa kˈubwa hˌuko ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
ikˈawa wˈatu wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa na ˌiʃmaˈeli wˌalipomwˈona jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wa ɟˈeʃi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˌakafurˈahi.|0
wˈatu wˈote ambˈao ˌiʃmaˈeli ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˌatʃukˈua matˈeka hˌuko mˈispa wˌakaɡeˈuka na kˌumfuˈata jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea.|0
lakˈini ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˌake wanˈane wˌakamtorˈoka jˌohanˈani na kˌukimbilˈia kwa wˌaamˈoni.|0
ndˈipo jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje wˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˈote wˌaliˌonusurˈika kutˈoka mˈispa, ambˈao wˌalipˈona kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia baˌada jˌake kˌumuˈua ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu: wˌalikˈuwa askˈari, wˌanawˈake, watˈoto na mˌatowˈaʃi ˌaliˌowalˈeta kutˈoka ɡˌibeˈoni.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakaˈenda mbˈele na kutˈua ɡˈeruθ kimhˈamu karˈibu na bˌeθlehˈemu wakˈiwa ɲɟiˈani kwˈenda mˈisri.|0
ˌili kˌuwatorˈoka wˌakaldˈajo. wˌaliwˌaoɡˈopa kwa sabˈabu ˌiʃmaˈeli mwˈana wa nˌeθanˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemuˈua ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewˈekwa na mfˈalme wa babˈeli kˌuwa mtawˈala wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ndˈipo mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi, pamˈoɟa na jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, na jˌezanˈia mwˈana wa hoʃˈaja, na wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia alˈije mdˈoɡo kabˈisa hˌadi alˈije m̩kˈuu sˈana wˌakamɟˈia.|0
jˌeremˈia nabˈii na kˌumwambˈia, tˌafaðˈali sikˈia maˈombi jˈetu na umwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu hˈawa wˈote wˌaliˌosalˈia. kwa kˌuwa kˌama ˌunavjoˈona sˈasa, iŋɡˈawa wakˈati fulˈani tˌulikˈuwa wˈeŋɡi, sˈasa tˌumesalˈia watʃˈatʃe tˈu.|0
ˈomba ˌili bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatuambˈie twˈende wˈapi na tufˈaɲe nˈini.|0
nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌakaɟˈibu, nˌimewˌasikˈia. kwa hakˈika nˌitamwˈomba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kˌama mlˌivjoˈomba. nˌitawˌaambˈia kˈila kˈitu ˌasemˈatʃo bwˈana, wˈala sˌitawafˈitʃa tʃotʃˈote.|0
kˈiʃa wˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia, bwˈana na ˈawe ʃahˈidi wa kwˈeli na mwˌaminˈifu kˈati jˈetu kˌama hˌatutafˈaɲa sˌawasˈawa na kˈila kˈitu bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌatakˌatʃokutˈuma ˌutuambˈie.|0
likˈiwa ɟˈema ˌau likˈiwa bˈaja, tˌutamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ambˈaje tˌunakutˈuma kwˈake, ˌili mˈambo jˈote jˈawe mˈema kwˈetu, kwa maˈana tˌutamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku kˈumi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakawaˈita pamˈoɟa jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌaje na wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia mdˈoɡo kabˈisa hˌadi alˈije m̩kˈuu sˈana.|0
kˌama mkikˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, nˌitawaɟˈeŋɡa wˈala sˌitawˌabomˈoa, nˌitawapˈanda wˈala sˌitawaŋɡˈoa, kwˈani nˌinahˌuzunˈiʃwa na maˈafa nˌilijˌowapˈiɡa nˈajo.|0
msˌimwoɡˈope mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ambˈaje sˈasa mnˌamwoɡˈopa. msˌimwoɡˈope, asˈema bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, nˌami nˌitawˌaokˈoa na kˌuwapˈoɲa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈake.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama mkisˈema, hˌatutakˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˌii, hˈivjo mkaˈatʃa kumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
nˌaɲi kˌama mkisˈema, hapˈana, tˌutakwˈenda kuˈiʃi mˈisri, mahˈali ambˈapo hˌatutaˈona vˈita ˌau kˌusikˈia saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta ˌau kˌuwa na ɲɟˈaa ja tʃakˈula,.|0
bˌasi sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi mabˈaki ja jˈuda. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: ikˈiwa mmˌekusudˈia kwˈenda mˈisri na kufˈaɲa makˈazi hˌuko.|0
bˌasi ˈule upˈaŋɡa mnˌaoˌuoɡˈopa ˌutawapˈata hˌuko, na ɲɟˈaa mnˌajoˌihofˈia ˌitawˌafuˈata hˌuko mˈisri, nˌaɲi mtafˈia hˌuko.|0
nˈaam, wˈote wˌaliˌokusudˈia kwˈenda kuˈiʃi mˈisri wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌatakˌajenˌusurˈika ˌau kˌuokˈoka maˈafa nˌitakˌajojalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: kˌama vˈile hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌilivjomwˈaɡwa ɟˌuːja wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu, ndˈivjo ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitakˌavjomwˈaɡwa ɟˈuu jˈenu mtˌakapokwˈenda mˈisri. mtakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌulaanˈia na tʃa kutˈiʃa, tʃa kˌulaumˈia na tʃa kˌuʃutumˈia, nˌaɲi kˈamwe hˌamtaˈona mahˈali hˈapa tˈena..|0
ˈeɲi mabˈaki ja jˈuda, bwˈana ˌamewˌaambˈia, msiˈende mˈisri. hˌakikiʃˈeni ɟˈambo hˈili: nˌinawaˈoɲa lˈeo.|0
kwˌamba mmefˈaɲa kˈosa kˈubwa mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu mlˌiponitˈuma kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu na kusˈema, mwˈombe bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa aɟˈili jˈetu, nˌawe ˌutuambˈie kˈila kˈitu ˌatakˌatʃosˈema, nˌasi tˌutafˈaɲa..|0
nˌimewˌaambiˈeni lˈeo, lakˈini bˈado nˈiɲi hamtˈaki kumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu katˌika jˈote ˌalijˌonitˈuma nˌiwaambˈie.|0
bˌasi sˈasa, hˌakikiʃˈeni ɟˈambo hˈili: mtakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni mahˈali ambˈapo mnatˈaka kwˈenda kuˈiʃi.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌalipˌomalˈiza kˌuwaambˈia wˈatu manˈeno jˈote ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, jaˈani kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamemtˈuma kˌuwaambˈia.|0
ˌazarˈia mwˈana wa hoʃˈaja, na jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, na wˈatu wˈote wˌeɲe kibˈuri wˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia, wˌewe ˌunasˈema uˈoŋɡo! bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu hˌaɟakutˈuma kusˈema, kˈamwe msiˈende mˈisri kukˈaa hˌuko..|0
lakˈini barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia ˌanakˌutʃotʃˈea ðˈidi jˈetu ˌili ˌututˈie mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌakaldˈajo, ˌili wˌatuˈue ˌau wˌatutʃukˈue ˌuhamiʃˈoni babˈeli.|0
bˌasi jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea, na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi, na wˈatu wˈote wˌakakatˈaa kutˈii ˈamri ja bwˈana ja kukˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda.|0
badˈala jˈake, jˌohanˈani mwˈana wa karˈea na mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa ɟˈeʃi wˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza mabˈaki jˈote ja jˈuda wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamerˈudi kuˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda kutˈoka mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo wˌalikˈuwa wˌametawˈaɲua.|0
pˈia wˌakawˌaoŋɡˈoza wˌanaˈume wˈote, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto, na bˈinti za mfˈalme ambˈao nˌebuzˌaradˈani kˌioŋɡˈozi wa walˈinzi wa mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamewaˈatʃa na ɡˌedalˈia mwˈana wa ˌahikˈamu mwˈana wa ʃafˈani, na nabˈii jˌeremˈia, na barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakaiŋɡˈia mˈisri kwa kˌutokumtˈii bwˈana, wˌakaˈenda mpˈaka tˌahpanhˈesi.|0
hˌuko tˌahpanhˈesi nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˌeremˈia kusˈema.|0
wˌajahˈudi wakˈiwa wˌanaˈona, tʃukˈua baˈaði ja mˈawe makˈubwa na kˌujazˈika katˌika udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi katˌika ɲɟˈia ˌilijoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa mˌatofˈali katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la farˈao hˌuko tˌahpanhˈesi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˌitamtˌumanˈia mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌami nˌitakiwˈeka kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi ɟˌuːja hˈaja mˈawe nˌilijˌojazˈika hˈapa, nˌaje ˌatatandˈaza hˈema jˌake ja ufˈalme ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuiʃˌambulˈia mˈisri, ˌakiwaˈua wˈale wˌaliˌokusudˈiwa kˌuuˈawa, ˌawatˈeke matˈeka wˈale wˌaliˌokusudˈiwa kutˈekwa, na upˈaŋɡa kwa wˈale wˌaliˌokusudˈiwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
ˌatatʃˈoma mˈoto mˌahekˈalu jˈao ja miˈuŋɡu ja mˈisri, ˌatatʃˈoma mˌahekˈalu jˈao na kutˈeka miˈuŋɡu jˈao. kˌama vˈile mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ˌaɟizˌuŋɡuʃiˈavjo vˈazi lˈake ndˈivjo ˌatakˌavjoɟˌizuŋɡuʃˈia mˈisri na kˌuondˈoka mahˈali hˈapo bˌila kˌuðurˈika.|0
hˈumo ndˈani ja hekˈalu la ɟˈua n̩tʃˈini ja mˈisri ˌatabomˈoa ŋɡˈuzo za ibˈada, na kˌuteketˈeza kwa mˈoto mˌahekˈalu ja miˈuŋɡu wa mˈisri..|0
nˈeno hˈili lˌilimɟˈia jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu wˌajahˈudi wˈote wˌaiʃˈio mˈisri, hˌuko miɡdˈoli, tˌahpanhˈesi na memfˈisi, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja paθrˈosi kusˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: mliˈona mˌaaŋɡamˈizi makˈubwa nˌilijˌojalˈeta ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu na ɟˌuːja mˈiɟi jˈote ja jˈuda. lˈeo ˌimeˈatʃwa ukˈiwa na maɡˈofu.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameufˈaɲa. wˌalinˌikasirˈiʃa kwa kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba na kwa kˌuabˈudu miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine ambˈajo kˈamwe wˈao, wˈala nˈiɲi, wˈala bˈaba zˈenu hˌawakˌuifahˈamu.|0
tˈena na tˈena, nˌiliwatˈuma wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii ambˈao wˌalisˈema, msifˈaɲe ɟˈambo hˈili la kˌutʃukˈiza ambˈalo nˌalitʃukˈia!.|0
lakˈini hˌawakˌusikilˈiza wˈala hˌawakuɟˈali, hˌawakˌuɡeˈuka ˌili kˌuuˈatʃa uˈovu wˈao, wˈala hˌawakuˈatʃa kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine.|0
kwa hˈijo hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali ˌilimwaɡˈika, ˌikawˈaka ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu, na kˌuifˈaɲa ukˈiwa na maɡˈofu kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
bˌasi hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: kwa nˈini kˌuɟiletˈea maˈafa makˈubwa kˌama hˈaja ɟˈuu jˈenu kwa kˌuɟikˌatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka jˈuda wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake, watˈoto na wˌaɲoɲˈao, hˌata kˌuɟiˈatʃa bˌila mabˈaki.|0
kwa nˈini kˌuitʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kwa kˈile ambˈatʃo mikˈono jˈenu ˌimekˌiteŋɡenˈeza, mkˌaifˌukizˈia uvˈumba miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine hˌuko mˈisri, mahˈali mlˌipokˈuɟa kuˈiʃi? mtˌaɟiˌaŋɡamˈiza weɲˈewe na kˌuɟifˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌulaanˈia na ʃutˈumu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote dˌuniˈani.|0
ɟˈe, mmˌesahˈau uˈovu ˌuliotˈendwa na bˈaba zˈenu, na wafˈalme na malkˈia wa jˈuda, na uˈovu ˌuliofˈaɲua na nˈiɲi na wˌake zˈenu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda na bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
mpˈaka lˈeo hˌawaɟˌaɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza ˌau kˌuoɲˈeʃa heʃˈima, wˈala hˌawaɟˌafuˈata ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu na ˈamri nˌilizowˈeka mbˈele jˈenu na bˈaba zˈenu.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi nˌimekˌusudˈia kulˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈenu, na kˌuiˌaŋɡamˈiza jˈuda jˈote.|0
nˌitawˌaondˈoa mabˈaki ja jˈuda wˌaliˌokusudˈia kwˈenda mˈisri kukˈaa hˈumo. wˈote wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia hˌuko mˈisri, wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌau kˈufa kwa ɲɟˈaa. kˌuanzˈia alˈije mdˈoɡo kabˈisa hˌadi alˈije m̩kˈuu sˈana, wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌau ɲɟˈaa. wˌatakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌulaanˈia na tʃa kutˈiʃa, tʃa laˈumu na ʃutˈumu.|0
nˌitawˌaaðˈibu wˈale wˌaiʃˈio mˈisri kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni kˌama nˌilivjˌoiaðˈibu jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa mabˈaki ja jˈuda ambˈaje ˌamekwˈenda kuˈiʃi mˈisri ˌatakˌajeepˈuka ˌau kˌunusurˈika ˌili kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda, ambˈajo wˌanaˌitamˈani sˈana kurˈudi na kuˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajerˈudi ˌisipokˈuwa wˌakimbˈizi watʃˈatʃe.|0
kˈiʃa wˌanaˈume wˈote ambˈao wˌaliɟˈua kwˌamba wˌake zˈao wˌalikˈuwa wˌakifukˈiza uvˈumba kwa miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine, pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake wˈote wˌaliˌokuwˈako, jaˈani, kˌusaɲˈiko kˈubwa na wˈatu wˈote wˌalioˈiʃi ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na paθrˈosi, wˌakamwambˈia jˌeremˈia.|0
hˌatutˌausˌikilˈiza uɟˈumbe ˌuliˌotuambˈia katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
hakˈika tˌutafˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu tˌulitʃosˈema tˌutakifˈaɲa: tˌutafukˈiza uvˈumba kwa malkˈia wa mbiŋɡˈuni na tˌutammˌiminˈia sadˈaka zˈetu za kˌiɲuˈaɟi kˌama vˈile sˌisi na bˈaba zˈetu, wafˈalme wˈetu na mˌaafˈisa wˈetu tˌulivjofˈaɲa katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na katˌika bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu. wakˈati ˈule tˌulikˈuwa na tʃakˈula tˈele, tˌulikˈuwa mˌataɟˈiri wˈala hˌatukupˈata ðˈara lolˈote.|0
lakˈini ʃˈu tˌulipoˈatʃa kˌumfukizˈia uvˈumba malkˈia wa mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌummiminˈia sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi, hˌatupˈati tʃotʃˈote, na tˌumekˈuwa tˌukiˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa upˈaŋɡa na ɲɟˈaa.|0
wˌanawˈake wˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, wakˈati tˌulipˌomfukizˈia uvˈumba malkˈia wa mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌummiminˈia sadˈaka zˈetu za kˌiɲuˈaɟi, ɟˈe, waˈume zˈetu hˌawakuɟˈua kwˌamba tˌulikˈuwa tˌukitˌeŋɡenˈeza mˌaandˈazi kwa mfˈano wˈake, na kˌummiminˈia jˌeje sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
ndˈipo jˌeremˈia ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, wˌanaˈume na wˌanawˈake wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakimɟˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakukumbˈuka na kˌufikˈiri ɟˌuːja uvˈumba ˌuliˌofukˈizwa katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda na bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu na nˈiɲi pamˈoɟa na bˈaba zˈenu, wafˈalme wˈenu, mˌaafˈisa wˈenu na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bwˈana ˌalipokˈuwa hawˈezi kˌuendelˈea kˌuvumilˈia matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu na mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo mlˌijojafˈaɲa, ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌilikˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌulaanˈia na kuˈatʃwa ukˈiwa pasˈipo wakˈazi, kˌama ilˈivjo lˈeo.|0
kwa sabˈabu mmˌefukˈiza uvˈumba na kufˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana, nˌaɲi hˌamkumtˈii wˈala kˌufuˈata ʃerˈia jˌake ˌau ˈamri zˌake ˌau mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake, maˈafa hˈaja jˌamekˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu, kˌama mnˌavjoˈona sˈasa.|0
kˈiʃa jˌeremˈia ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈatu wˈote, pamˈoɟa na wˌanawˈake, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote wa jˈuda mliˈoko mˈisri.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli: nˈiɲi na wˌake zˈenu mmˌeoɲˈeʃa kwa matˈendo jˈenu kˈile mlˌitʃoahˈidi mlˌiposˈema, hakˈika tˌutatimˈiza naðˈiri tˌulizˌoziwˈeka za kˌumfukizˈia uvˈumba na kˌummiminˈia sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi malkˈia wa mbiŋɡˈuni. ˌendeleˈeni bˈasi, faɲˈeni jˈale mlˌijoahˈidi! tˌimizˈeni naðˈiri zˈenu.|0
lakˈini sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˌajahˈudi wˈote mnˌaoˈiʃi mˈisri: nˌinaˈapa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lilˈilo kˈuu, asˈema bwˈana, kwˌamba hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatokˈaje jˈuda ˌanajeˈiʃi popˈote mˈisri ambˈaje kˈamwe ˌataˈomba tˈena kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu ˌau kuˈapa, ˌakisˈema, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌaiʃˈivjo.|0
kwa maˈana nˌinawˌaaŋɡalˈia kwa aɟˈili ja maðˈara, wˈala sˈio kwa mˈema. wˌajahˈudi wˌaliˈoko mˈisri wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa na ɲɟˈaa, hˌadi wˈote wˌatakˌapoˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
wˈale wˌatakˌaonˌusurˈika upˈaŋɡa na kurˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda kutˈoka mˈisri wˌatakˈuwa watʃˈatʃe sˈana. ndˈipo mabˈaki wˈote wa jˈuda wˌaliokˈuɟa kuˈiʃi mˈisri wˌatakˌapoɟˈua ni nˈeno la nˈani lˌitakˌalosimˈama, kwˌamba ni lˈaŋɡu ˌau lˈao.|0
hˌii ˌitakˈuwa n̩dˈijo iʃˈara kwˈenu kwˌamba nˌitawˌaaðˈibu mahˈali hˈapa, asˈema bwˈana, ˌili mpˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa ˈoɲo lˈaŋɡu la maðˈara ðˈidi jˈenu hakˈika lˌitatimˈizwa..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitamtˈia farˈao hˈofra mfˈalme wa mˈisri mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˌake wˌanaˌoutafˈuta uhˈai wˈake, kˌama vˈile nˌilivjomtˈia sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, adˈui ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakiˌutafˈuta uhˈai wˈake..|0
hˈili ndˈilo nabˈii jˌeremˈia ˌalilˌomwambˈia barˈuku mwˈana wa nerˈia katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, baˌada ja barˈuku kˌuandˈika katˌika kitˈabu manˈeno ambˈajo jˌalitˈoka kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa jˌeremˈia wakˈati ˈule.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakuˌambiˈalo wˌewe barˈuku.|0
ˌulisˈema, ˈole wˈaŋɡu! bwˈana ˌameoŋɡˈeza huzˈuni ɟˌuːja mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu, nˌimetʃˈoka kwa kulˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wˈala sipˈati pumzˈiko..|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, mwambˈie hˈivi: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitakˌibomˈoa kˈile nˌilitʃˌokiɟˈeŋɡa, na kuŋɡˈoa kˈile nˌilitʃˌokipˈanda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote.|0
ɟˈe, ˌutaɟˌitafutˈia mˈambo makˈubwa kwa aɟˈili jˈako mweɲˈewe? ˌusijˌatafˈute hˈajo. kwa kˌuwa nˌitalˈeta mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈote, asˈema bwˈana, lakˈini popˈote ˌutakˌapokwˈenda, nˌitajˌaokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈako..|0
hˈili ni nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililomɟˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu mˌataˈifa.|0
kuhˈusu mˈisri: hˈuu ni uɟˈumbe ðˈidi ja ɟˈeʃi la farˈao nˈeko mfˈalme wa mˈisri, lˌililoʃˈindwa hˌuko kˌarkemˈiʃi kwˈeɲe ˈm̩to frˈati na nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mwˈana wa josˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
wekˈeni tajˈari ŋɡˈao zˈenu, kˈubwa na ndˈoɡo, mtˈoke kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
fˌuŋɡiˈeni farˈasi liɟˈamu, pandˈeni farˈasi! ʃikˈeni nafˈasi zˈenu mkˈiwa mmevˈaa tʃapˈeo! ˌisuɡuˈeni mikˈuki jˈenu, vaˈeni dirˈii vˌifuˈani.|0
ɟˈe, nˌinaˈona nˈini? wˌametˈiwa hˈofu, wˌanarˈudi ɲˈuma, askˈari wˌao wˌameʃˈindwa. wˌanakimbˈia kwa harˈaka pasˈipo kˌutazˈama ɲˈuma, tˈena kˈuna hˈofu kˈuu kˈila upˈande, asˈema bwˈana.|0
walˈio wepˈesi na wˌeɲe m̩bˈio hˌawawˈezi kˌukimbˈia, wˈala wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu hˌawawˈezi kˌutorˈoka. kˌaskazˈini, kˈando ja ˈm̩to frˈati, wˌanaɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka.|0
ni nˈani hˈuju ˌaɟiˌinuˈaje kˌama ˈm̩to naˈili, kˌama mˈito jˌeɲe mˈaɟi jˌanajofˈaɲa mawˈimbi.|0
mˈisri hˌuɟiinˈua kˌama ˈm̩to naˈili, kˌama mˈito jˌeɲe mˈaɟi jˌanajofˈaɲa mawˈimbi. husˈema, nˌitainˈuka na kˌufunˈika dunˈia, nˌitaˌiaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi na wˈatu wˈake..|0
soŋɡˈeni mbˈele, ˈeɲi farˈasi! ˌendeʃˈeni kwa ukˈali, ˈeɲi maɡˈari ja farˈasi, ˌendeleˈeni mbˈele, ˈeɲi mˌaʃuɟˈaa: wˈatu wa kˈuʃi na pˈutu wˌatʃukuˈao ŋɡˈao, wˈatu wa lˈudi wˌavutˈao upˈinde.|0
lakˈini ˈile sˈiku ni ja bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, sˈiku ja kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi, kisˈasi ɟˌuːja adˈui zˈake. upˈaŋɡa ˌutakˈula hˌata ˌutakˌapotoʃˈeka, hˌadi ˌutakˌapozˈima kˈiu jˌake kwa dˈamu. kwa maˈana bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌatatˈoa ðabˈihu kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini, kˈando ja ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
pˈanda hˌadi ɡˌileˈadi ˌukapˈate zˈeri, ˈee bikˈira bˈinti wa mˈisri. lakˈini ˌumetumˈia dˈawa ɲˈiŋɡi bˌila mˌafanikˈio; huwˈezi kupˈona.|0
mˌataˈifa jˌatasikˈia ɟˌuːja aˈibu jˈako, kilˈio tʃˈako kˌitaiɟˈaza dunˈia. ʃuɟˈaa mmˈoɟa ˌataɟikwˈaa ɟˌuːja mwiŋɡˈine, nˌao wˌataaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini pamˈoɟa.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio uɟˈumbe bwˈana ˌaliˌomwambˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu kˈuɟa kwa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌili kˌuiʃˌambulˈia mˈisri.|0
taŋɡˈaza hˈili katˌika mˈisri, nˌawe ˌulihubˈiri katˌika miɡdˈoli, hubˈiri pˈia katˌika memfˈisi na tˌahpanhˈesi: ʃikˈeni nafˈasi zˈenu na ˈm̩we tajˈari, kwa kˌuwa upˈaŋɡa ˌunawˈala wˈale wˌanaˌokuzuŋɡˈuka..|0
kwa nˈini mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈako wˌamesˈombwa na kˌupelˈekwa mbˈali? hˌawawˈezi kˌusimˈama, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌatawˌasukˈuma ˌawaaŋɡˈuʃe tʃˈini.|0
wˌataɟikwˈaa mˈara kwa mˈara, wˌataˌaŋɡukiˈana wˌao kwa wˈao. wˌatasˈema, ˈamka, turˈudi kwa wˈatu wˈetu na ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu, mbˈali na upˈaŋɡa wa mtˈesi..|0
hˌuko wˌatataŋɡˈaza, farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri ni mˌakelˈele tˈu, ˌamekˈosa wasˈaa wˈake..|0
kwa hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema mfˈalme, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mmˈoɟa ˌatakˈuɟa ambˈaje ni kˌama tabˈori mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa milˈima, kˌama karmˈeli kˈando ja bahˈari.|0
fˈuŋɡa mizˈiɡo jˈako kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, wˌewe ˌukaˈaje mˈisri, kwa kˌuwa memfˈisi ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa na kˌuwa maɡˈofu pasˈipo mkˈazi.|0
mˈisri ni mtˈamba mzˈuri, lakˈini kipˈaŋɡa ˌanakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˌake kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini.|0
askˈari wˌake wˌaliˌokodˈiwa katˌika sˈafu zˌake wˈako kˌama ndˈama wˌaliˌonenepˈeʃwa. wˌao pˈia wˌataɡeˈuka na kˌukimbˈia pamˈoɟa, hˌawatawˈeza kˌuhimˈili vˈita, kwa maˈana sˈiku ja msˈiba ˌinakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈao, wakˈati wˌao wa kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
mˈisri ˌatatˈoa saˈuti kˌama ja ɲˈoka ˌanajˌekimbˈia kadˈiri adˈui ˌanavjˌowasˌoɡelˈea na maɟˈeʃi, wˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˌake wakˈiwa na maʃˈoka, kˌama wˈatu wˌakatˈao mˈiti.|0
wˌataufjˈeka msˈitu wˈake, asˈema bwˈana, hˌata kˌama ˌumesˌoŋɡamˈana kiˈasi ɡˈani. ni wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko nzˈiɡe, hˌawawˈezi kˌuhesabˈika.|0
bˈinti wa mˈisri ˌataˌaibˈiʃwa, ˌatatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao, jaˈani nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli na mˌaafˈisa wˈake. hˌatimˈaje, hˌata hˈivjo, mˈisri ˌitakalˈiwa kˌama ɲakˈati zˌilizopˈita, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee jakˈobo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, ˌusifˌaðaˈike, ˈee ˌisraˈeli. hakˈika nˌitakˌuokˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi za mbˈali, uzˈao wˈako kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌuhamˈiʃo wˈao. jakˈobo ˌatakˈuwa tˈena na amˈani na salˈama, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajewatˈia hˈofu.|0
ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee jakˈobo mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana mˌimi nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈawe, asˈema bwˈana. iŋɡˈawa nˌitajˌaaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈake nˌimekˌutawˈaɲa, sˌitakˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌewe kabˈisa. nˌitakurˈudi, lakˈini kwa hˈaki tˈu, wˈala sˌitakuˈatʃa kabˈisa bˌila kˌukuaðˈibu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililomɟˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu wˌafilˈisti, kˈabla farˈao hˌaɟaˌiʃambulˈia ɡˈaza.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tazˈama ɟˈinsi mˈaɟi jˌanavjˌoinˈuka hˌuko kˌaskazˈini, jˌatakˈuwa mˌafurˈiko jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu sˈana. jˌataˌifurikˈia ˈn̩tʃi na vˈitu vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˈake, mˈiɟi na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake. wˈatu wˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele; wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌataˌombolˈeza.|0
kwa saˈuti ja kwˈato za farˈasi wˌaendˈao m̩bˈio, kwa saˈuti ja maɡˈari ja adˈui na mŋɡurˈumo wa mˌaɡurudˈumu jˈake. bˈaba hˌawatˌaɡeˈuka kˌuwasˌaidˈia watˈoto wˈao, mikˈono jˈao ˌitaleɡˈea.|0
kwa maˈana sˈiku ˌimewadˈia kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌafilˈisti wˈote na kˌuwakˌatilˈia mbˈali wˌaliˌonusurˈika wˈote ambˈao wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌusaidˈia tˈiro na sidˈoni. bwˈana ˌanakˌaribˈia kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˌafilˈisti, mabˈaki tˌoka pwˈani za kaftˈori.|0
ɡˈaza ˌataɲˈoa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake katˌika kˌuombolˈeza, ˌaʃkelˈoni ˌataɲˌamazˈiʃwa. ˈeɲi mabˈaki kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare, mtˌaɟikˌatakˈata weɲˈewe mpˈaka lˈini.|0
mnalˈia, ˈaa, upˈaŋɡa wa bwˈana, ˌutaˌendelˈea mpˈaka lˈini ndˈipo ˌupumzˈike? rˈudi ndˈani ja ˈala jˈako; ˈatʃa na ˌutulˈie..|0
lakˈini upˈaŋɡa ˌutatˌuliˈaɟe wakˈati bwˈana ˌameˌuamˈuru, wakˈati ˌameˌuaɡˈiza kˌuiʃˌambulˈia ˌaʃkelˈoni pamˈoɟa na pwˈani jˈake.|0
kuhˈusu moˈabu: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: ˈole wˌake nˈebo, kwa maˈana ˌutahˌaribˈiwa. kˌiriˌaθaˈimu ˌutaˌaibˈiʃwa na kutˈekwa; misɡˈabu ˌitaˌaibˈiʃwa na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟua.|0
moˈabu hˌaitˌasifˈiwa tˈena; hˌuko heʃbˈoni wˈatu wˌatafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja la aŋɡˈuko lˈake: ɲɟoˈoni na tˌuaŋɡamˈize taˈifa lˈile. wˌewe nˈawe, ˈee madmˈena, ˌutaɲˌamazˈiʃwa; upˈaŋɡa ˌutakˌufuatˈia.|0
sˌikilˈiza kilˈio kutˈoka hˌoronaˈimu, kilˈio tʃa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi makˈuu na ˌuharibˈifu.|0
moˈabu ˌutavˈuɲɟua, wadˈoɡo wˌake wˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
wˌanapˈanda kwˈenda ɲɟˈia ja kˌuelekˈea luhˈiθi, wˌakilˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wˌanapˌotembˈea, kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ˌinajoʃˈuka kwˈenda hˌoronaˈimu, kilˈio tʃa utʃˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuharibˈifu kˌinasikˈika.|0
kˌimbiˈeni! ˌokoˈeni maˈiʃa jˈenu, kuwˈeni kˌama kitʃˈaka ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa mmˌetumˌainˈia matˈendo jˈenu na mˈali zˈenu, nˈiɲi pˈia mtˌatʃukulˈiwa matˈeka, nˌaje kemˈoʃi ˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani wˌake na mˌaafˈisa wˈake.|0
mharˈabu ˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja kˈila ˈm̩ɟi, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˌaookˈoka. bˈonde lˌitaˌaŋɡamˈizwa na uwˈanda ˌutahˌaribˈiwa, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ˌamesˈema.|0
wekˈeni tʃˈumvi kwa aɟˈili ja moˈabu, kwa kˌuwa ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa; mˈiɟi jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa, pasˈipo kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˌalaanˈiwe jˌeje ˌafaɲˈaje kˈazi ja bwˈana kwa hˈila! ˌalaanˈiwe jˌeje ˌauzˌuiˈaje upˈaŋɡa wˌake ˌusimwˈaɡe dˈamu.|0
moˈabu ˌamestarˈehe ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈake, kˌama divˈai ˌilijoˈatʃwa kwˈeɲe matʃˈuɟo jˈake, hˌaikˌumimˈinwa kutˈoka tʃˈombo kimˈoɟa hˌadi kiŋɡˈine, hˌaɟaˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. kwa hˈijo ˈana lˈaða ˈile ˈile kˌama ˌalijokˈuwa nˈajo, nˈajo harˈufu jˌake hˌaiɟˌabadilˈika.|0
lakˈini sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitakˌapotˈuma wˈatu wˌamiminˈao kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌaɡudulˈia, nˌao wˌatamimˈina; wˌataˈatʃa mˌaɡudulˈia jˌake jakˈiwa matˈupu na kuvˈuɲɟa mitˈuŋɡi jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa moˈabu ˌatamwonˈea aˈibu mˈuŋɡu wˌao kemˈoʃi, kˌama vˈile ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalivjoˈona aˈibu wˌalipˌoteɡemˈea mˈuŋɡu wa beθˈeli.|0
mwˌawezˈaɟe kusˈema, sˌisi ni mˌaʃuɟˈaa, wˈatu ɟasˈiri katˌika vˈita.|0
moˈabu ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa na mˈiɟi jˌake ˌitavamˈiwa, viɟˈana wˌake waˈume walˈio bˈora sˈana wˌatatʃˈiɲɟua, asˈema mfˈalme, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa moˈabu kˌumekˌaribˈia, ɟˈaŋɡa kˈubwa lˌitamɟˈia kwa harˈaka.|0
ˌombolezˈeni kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaomzuŋɡˈuka, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaoɟˈua sˈifa zˈake, semˈeni, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌilivjˌovuɲɟˈika fˈimbo ja kifˈalme jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌilivjˌovuɲɟˈika fˈimbo ˌilijˌotukˈuka!.|0
ʃˈuka kutˈoka fahˈari jˈako na ukˈeti katˌika ˈarði ˌilijˌokaˈuka, ˈeɲi weɲˈeɟi wa bˈinti wa dibˈoni, kwa maˈana jˌeje ˌaaŋɡˌamizˈaje moˈabu ˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˈako, na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi jˈako ˌilijˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa mabˈoma.|0
simˈama kˈando ja bˌarabˈara na ˌutazˈame, wˌewe ˌunajeˈiʃi ˌaroˈeri. mˌuulˈize mwˌanaˈume ˌanajˌekimbˈia na mwanˈamke ˌanajˌetorˈoka, wˌaulˈize, kˌumetokˈea nˈini?.|0
moˈabu ˌamefˌeðehˈeʃwa, kwa kˌuwa ˌamevˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟua. liˈeni kwa huzˈuni na kupˈiɡa kelˈele! tˌaŋɡazˈeni kˈando ja arnˈoni kwˌamba moˈabu ˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
hukˈumu ˌimefˈika kwˈeɲe uwˈanda wa ɟˈuu: katˌika holˈoni, jahˈasa na mˌefaˈaθi.|0
katˌika dibˈoni, nˈebo na bˈeθ dˌiblaθaˈimu.|0
katˌika kˌiriˌaθaˈimu, bˈeθ ɡamˈuli na bˈeθ meˈoni.|0
katˌika kˌeriˈoθi na bˈosra; kwa mˈiɟi jˈote ja moˈabu, ˌilijˈoko mbˈali na karˈibu.|0
pˈembe ja moˈabu ˌimekˈatwa, mkˈono wˌake ˌumevˈuɲɟua, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mlˈevje, kwa kˌuwa ˌamemðarˈau bwˈana. moˈabu na ˌaɡaeɡˈae katˌika mˌatapˈiʃi jˈake, jˌeje na ˈawe kˈitu tʃa ðihˈaka.|0
ɟˈe, ˌisraˈeli hakˈuwa kˈitu tʃˈako tʃa kˌuðihakˈiwa? ɟˈe, ˌalikamˈatwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈezi, kiˈasi tʃa kˌutikˈisa kˈitʃwa tʃˈako kwa ðarˈau kˈila mˈara ˌunapˌozuŋɡˈumza ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌondokˈeni kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈenu, mkaˈiʃi kˌatikˈati ja miˈamba, ˈeɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi moˈabu. kuwˈeni kˌama hˈuwa ambˈaje hˌuteŋɡenˈeza kiˈota tʃˈake kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa pˈaŋɡo.|0
tˌumesikˈia ɟˌuːja kibˈuri tʃa moˈabu: kˌutakabˈari kwˈake kwa kibˈuri na mˌaɟivˈuno, kibˈuri tʃˈake na ˌufiðˈuli wˈake, na kˌuɟivˈuna kwa mˈojo wˈake.|0
nˌinauɟˈua ˌuɟeˈuri wˈake, lakˈini ni bˈure, asˈema bwˈana, nˈako kˌuɟisˈifu kwˈake hˌakumsˌaidˈii tʃotʃˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌamlilˈia moˈabu, kwa aɟˈili ja moˈabu jˈote nˌinalˈia, nˌinaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa kˈir hˌaresˈeθi.|0
nˌinalˈia matʃˈozi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, kˌama jazˈeri ˌaliˈavjo, ˈeɲi mˌizabˈibu ja sˈibma. matˈawi jˈako jˌameenˈea hˌadi bˌaharˈini; jˌamefˈika hˌadi bahˈari ja jazˈeri. mharˈabu ˌamejˌaaŋɡukˈia matˈunda jˈako jˌalijoˈiva na mˌizabˈibu jˈako ˌilijoˈiva.|0
ʃˈaŋɡwe na furˈaha vˌimetowˈeka kutˈoka bustˈani na maʃˈamba ja moˈabu. nˌimekomˈeʃa kˌutirirˈika kwa divˈai kutˈoka mˌaʃinikˈizo; hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌajakˌaɲaɡˈaje kwa kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe. iŋɡˈawa kˈuna kelˈele, sˈio kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe.|0
saˈuti ja kilˈio tʃˈao ˌinapˈanda kutˈoka heʃbˈoni hˌadi ˌeleˈale na jahˈazi, kutˈoka soˈari hˌadi hˌoronaˈimu na ˈeɡlaθ ʃˌeliʃˈija, kwa kˌuwa hˌata mˈaɟi ja nimrˈimu jˌamekaˈuka.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌunaˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja moˈabu kˌama filˈimbi; ˌunaˌombolˈeza kˌama filˈimbi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa kˈir hˌaresˈeθi. ˌutaɟˈiri wˌaliˌoɟipatˈia ˌumetowˈeka.|0
kˈila kˈitʃwa kˌimeɲolˈewa na kˈila mwˌeɲe ndˈevu zˌimekˈatwa; kˈila mkˈono ˌumekˈatwa na kˈila kiˈuno kˌimefunˈikwa kwa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia.|0
ɟˌuːja mapˈaa jˈote katˌika moˈabu na katˌika viwˈaɲɟa hakˈuna kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌisipokˈuwa mˌaombolˈezo, kwa kˌuwa nˌimemvˈuɲɟa moˈabu kˌama ɡˌudulˈia ambˈalo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanajˌelitˈaka, asˈema bwˈana.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌalivjˌovuɲɟˌikavuɲɟˈika! ɟˈinsi wˌanavjolˈia kwa huzˈuni! tazˈama ɟˈinsi moˈabu ˌanavjˌoɡeˈuka kwa aˈibu! moˈabu ˌamekˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðihakˈiwa, kˈitu tʃa kutˈiʃa kwa wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌomzuŋɡˈuka.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tazˈama! tˈai ˌanaʃˈuka tʃˈini, ˌakitˈanda mabˈawa jˌake ɟˌuːja moˈabu.|0
mˈiɟi ˌitatˈekwa na ŋɡˈome zˌake zˌitatwalˈiwa. katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, miˈojo ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa moˈabu ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mˈojo wa mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
moˈabu ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa kˌama taˈifa kwa sabˈabu ˌamemðarˈau bwˈana.|0
hˈofu kˈuu, ʃˈimo na mtˈeɡo vˌinawˌaŋɡoɟˈea, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa moˈabu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˌikimbˈia hˈijo hˈofu kˈuu ˌataaŋɡˈuka ndˈani ja ʃˈimo, jejˈote ˌatakˌajepˈanda kutˈoka ʃimˈoni, ˌatanˈaswa katˌika mtˈeɡo, kwa sabˈabu nˌitaletˈea moˈabu mwˈaka wa aðˈabu jˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
katˌika kivˈuli tʃa heʃbˈoni, wˌakimbˈizi wˌamesimˈama pasˈipo msaˈada, kwa kˌuwa mˈoto ˌumezimˈika hˌuko heʃbˈoni, mwˈali wa mˈoto kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja sihˈoni; ˌunauŋɡˈuza vipˈaɟi vja ɲˈuso za moˈabu, mafˈuvu jˈao wˌeɲe kˌuɟivˈuna kwa kelˈele.|0
ˈole wˈako, ˈee moˈabu! wˈatu wa kemˈoʃi wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa; wˈana wˈako wˌamepelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni na bˈinti zˈako wˌametʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka.|0
lakˈini nˌitarudˈiʃa matˈeka wa moˈabu, katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, asˈema bwˈana. hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wa hukˈumu ɟˌuːja moˈabu.|0
kuhˈusu wˌaamˈoni: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: ɟˈe, ˌisraˈeli hˈana wˈana? ɟˈe, hˈana warˈiθi? kwa nˈini bˌasi molˈeki ˌametʃukˈua mˈilki ja ɡˈadi? kwa nˈini wˈatu wˌake wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈake.|0
lakˈini sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitakˌapopˈiɡa kelˈele ja vˈita ðˈidi ja rˈaba ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌaamˈoni; ˌutakˈuwa kilˈima tʃa maɡˈofu, nˈavjo viɟˈiɟi vˌinavjˌouzuŋɡˈuka vˌitatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto. kˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli ˌatawˌafukˈuza wˈale wˌaliˌomfukˈuza, asˈema bwˈana.|0
lˈia kwa huzˈuni, ˈee heʃbˈoni, kwa kˌuwa ˈai ˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa! piɡˈeni kelˈele, ˈeɲi wakˈazi wa rˈaba! vaˈeni ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia na kˌuombolˈeza, kˌimbiˈeni hˈapa na pˈale ndˈani ja kˈuta, kwa kˌuwa molˈeki ˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, jˌeje pamˈoɟa na mˌakuhˈani na mˌaafˈisa wˈake.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunaɟˌivunˈia mabˈonde jˈako, kˌuɟivunˈia mabˈonde jˈako jˌalijozˈaa sˈana? ˈee bˈinti usˈije mwˌaminˈifu, ˌunajˌeutˌumainˈia ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na kusˈema, ni nˈani ˌatakˌajenˌiʃambulˈia?.|0
nˌitalˈeta hˈofu kˈuu ɟˈuu jˈako kutˈoka kwa wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌokuzuŋɡˈuka, asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌataˌondolˈewa, wˈala hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajekusˈaɲa wˌakimbˈizi.|0
lakˈini hˌatimˈaje, nˌitarudˈiʃa matˈeka wa wˌaamˈoni, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kuhˈusu edˈomu: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: ɟˈe, hakˈuna tˈena hekˈima katˌika temˈani? ɟˈe, ʃaˈuri lˌimewˌapotˈea wˌeɲe busˈara? ɟˈe, hekˈima jˈao ˌimetʃakˈaa.|0
ɡeˈuka na ˌukimbˈie, ɟifˈitʃe katˌika mapˈaŋɡo marˈefu kabˈisa, wˌewe ˌuiʃˈije dedˈani, kwa kˌuwa nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˌuːja esˈau wakˈati nˌitakˌapomwaðˈibu.|0
ɟˈe, kˌama watʃˈuma zabˈibu wˌaŋɡekˈuɟa kwˈako, wˌasiŋɡˌebakˈiza zabˈibu tʃˈatʃe? kˌama wˈezi wˌaŋɡekuɟˈia usˈiku, ɟˈe, si wˌaŋɡeˈiba tu kiˈasi ambˈatʃo wˌaŋɡehitˈaɟi.|0
lakˈini nˌitamvˈua esˈau ŋɡˈuo abˈaki ˈutʃi, nˌitajˌafunˈua mafˈitʃo jˈake, ˌili ˌasiwˈeze kˌuɟifˈitʃa. watˈoto wˈake, ɟamˈaa na mˌaɟirˈani wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia, nˌaje hˌatakuwˈepo tˈena.|0
waˈatʃe jatˈima wˈako; nˌitajalˈinda maˈiʃa jˈao. waɟˈane wˈako pˈia wˌanawˈeza kˌunitˌumaˈini mˈimi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kˌama wˈale wˌasiˌostahˈili kˌukiɲuˈea kikˈombe ni lazˈima wakˈiɲue, kwa nˈini wˌewe ˌusiˌaðibˈiwe? hˌutakwˈepa kˌuaðibˈiwa, ni lazˈima ukˈiɲue.|0
nˌinaˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana, kwˌamba bˈosra ˌutakˈuwa maɡˈofu na kˈitu tʃa kutˈiʃa, tʃa aˈibu na tʃa kˌulaanˈia; mˈiɟi jˌake jˈote ˌitakˈuwa maɡˈofu milˈele.|0
nˌimesikˈia uɟˈumbe kutˈoka kwa bwˈana: mɟˈumbe ˌalitˈumwa kwa mˌataˈifa kusˈema, ɟˌikusaɲˈeni ˌili kˌuuʃˌambulˈia! ˌinukˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
sˈasa nˌitakufˈaɲa ˈuwe mdˈoɡo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, ˌalijˌeðarˌaulˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
vitˈiʃo vjˈako na kibˈuri tʃa mˈojo wˈako vˌimekˌudaŋɡˈaɲa, wˌewe ˌunajeˈiʃi katˌika mˌaɟabˈali ja miˈamba, wˌewe ˌunajedˈumu katˌika mˌiinˈuko ja kilˈima. ˌuɟapoɟˈeŋɡa kiˈota tʃˈako ɟˈuu sˈana kˌama tʃa tˈai, nˌitakuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini kutˈoka hˌuko, asˈema bwˈana.|0
edˈomu ˌatakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuoɡˈofja; wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu wˌataʃaŋɡˈaa na kˌuzomˈea kwa sabˈabu ja mˌaɟerˈaha jˌake jˈote.|0
kˌama sˈimba ˌanajepˈanda kutˈoka vitʃˈaka vja jordˈani kˈuɟa kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja malˈiʃo mˈeŋɡi, ndˈivjo nˌitamfukˈuza edˈomu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ɣafˈula. ni nˈani alˈije mteˈule nˌitakˌajemwˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈambo hˈili? ni nˈani alˈije kˌama mˈimi, na ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌunipˈiŋɡa? tˈena ni mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi jˈupi ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama kiɲˈume nˈami.|0
kwa hˈijo, sikˈia kˈile bwˈana ˌalitʃˌokipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja edˈomu, kˈile ˌalitʃˌokusudˈia ðˈidi ja wˈale wˌaiʃˈio temˈani: alˈije mtʃˈaŋɡa katˌika kˈundi ˌataburˈutwa mbˈali; jˌeje ˌataharˈibu kabˈisa malˈiʃo jˈao kwa sabˈabu jˈao.|0
kwa saˈuti ja aŋɡˈuko lˈao, dunˈia ˌitatˌetemˈeka. kilˈio tʃˈao kˌitasikˈika hˌadi bahˈari ja ʃˈamu.|0
tazˈama! tˈai ˌatapˈaa ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani na kurˈuka tʃˈini kwa ɣafˈula, ˌakitandˈaza mabˈawa jˌake ɟˌuːja bˈosra. katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, miˈojo ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa edˈomu ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mˈojo wa mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
kuhˈusu damˈeski: hamˈaθi na arpˈadi ˌimetˌahajarˈika, kwa kˌuwa wˌamesikˈia habˈari m̩bˈaja. wˌamevuɲɟˈika mˈojo na wˌametˌaabˈika kˌama bahˈari ˌilijˌotʃafˈuka.|0
damˈeski ˌameðˌoofˈika, ˌameɡeˈuka na kˌukimbˈia, hˈofu ja ɣafˈula ˌimemkamˈata sˈana; ˌamepˈatwa na utʃˈuŋɡu na mˌaumˈivu, mˌaumˈivu kˌama ja mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
kwa nˈini ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao ˌunaɟˌulikˈana hˌauɟaˈatʃwa, ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao nˌinaupˈenda.|0
hakˈika, viɟˈana wˌake wˌanaˈume wˌataaŋɡˈuka bˌarabarˈani; askˈari wˌake wˈote wˌataɲˌamazˈiʃwa sˈiku hˈijo, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
nˌitatˈia mˈoto kˈuta za damˈeski; ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈiza ŋɡˈome za bˈen hadˈadi.|0
kuhˈusu kedˈari na fˈalme za hazˈori, ambˈazo nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalizˌiʃambulˈia: hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: inˈuka, ˌuʃambulˈie kedˈari na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
hˈema zˈao na makˈundi jˈao ja kondˈoo jˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa; vibˈanda vjˈao vˌitatwalˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˈali zˈao zˈote na ŋɡamˈia zˈao. wˈatu wˌatawˌapiɡˈia kelˈele, hˈofu kˈuu ˈiko kˈila upˈande!.|0
kˌimbiˈeni harˈaka! kaˈeni kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo marˈefu sˈana, nˈiɲi ˌm̩kaˈao hazˈori, asˈema bwˈana. nˌebukadnˈeza, mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌamepˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi jˈenu; ˌamebˈuni hˈila ðˈidi jˈenu.|0
inˈuka na ˌuliʃˌambulˈie taˈifa lilˈilo starˈehe, lˌinaloˈiʃi kwa kˌuɟiamˈini, asˈema bwˈana, taˈifa lisˈilo na malˈaŋɡo wˈala mˌakomˈeo; wˈatu wˌake huˈiʃi pˈeke jˈao.|0
ŋɡamˈia wˌao wˌatakˈuwa ɲˈara, nˈajo makˈundi jˈao makˈubwa ja ŋɡˈombe jˌatatˈekwa. wˈale walˈio mˌaenˈeo ja mbˈali nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa pˈande zˈote, nˌami nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈao kutˈoka kˈila upˈande, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hazˈori ˌitakˈuwa makˈao ja mbwˈeha, mahˈali pa ukˈiwa milˈele. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˈumo; hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajekˈaa ndˈani jˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililomɟˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu elˈamu, mapˈema katˌika ˌutawˈala wa sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: tazˈama, nˌitavˈuɲɟa upˈinde wa elˈamu, ulˈio tˌeɡemˈeo la ŋɡˈuvu zˈao.|0
nˌitalˈeta pˈepo ˈn̩ne ðˈidi ja elˈamu tˌoka pˈande ˈn̩ne za mbˈiŋɡu, nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa katˌika hˈizo pˈande ˈn̩ne, wˈala hˌapatakˈuwa na taˈifa ambˈalo wˈatu wa elˈamu wˌaliˌofukˈuzwa hˌawatakwˈenda.|0
nˌitamfˌaðaˈiʃa elˈamu mbˈele ja adˈui zˈao, mbˈele jˈao wˈale wˌanaˌotafˈuta uhˈai wˈao; nˌitalˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈao, nˈaam, hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawˌafuatˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa mpˈaka nˌitakˌapowˌamalˈiza.|0
nˌitawˈeka kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ˈenzi hˌuko elˈamu na kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza mfˈalme wˌake na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
lakˈini nˌitarudˈiʃa matˈeka wa elˈamu katˌika sˈiku ziɟˈazo, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˈeno ˌalilosˈema bwˈana kˌupitˈia nabˈii jˌeremˈia kuhˈusu babˈeli na ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni na mhubˈiri kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, twekˈeni bendˈera na mkˌahubˈiri; msiˈatʃe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, bˌali semˈeni, babˈeli ˌutatˈekwa; bˈeli ˌataˌaibˈiʃwa, mˌerodˈaki ˌataɟˈazwa na hˈofu kˈuu. sanˈamu zˌake zˌitaˌaibˈiʃwa na viɲˈaɡo vjˈake vˌitaɟˈazwa hˈofu kˈuu..|0
taˈifa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini lˌitamʃˌambulˈia, na kˌuifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ukˈiwa. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, wˈatu na waɲˈama wˌataˌikimbˈia.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, wakˈati hˈuo, asˈema bwˈana, wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌataˈenda wˌakilˈia ˌili kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
wˌataˌiulˈiza ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo sajˈuni na kˌuelekˈeza ɲˈuso zˈao hˌuko. wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuambatˈana na bwˈana katˌika aɡˈano la milˈele ambˈalo hˌalitˌasahˌaulˈika.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌamekˈuwa kondˈoo wˌaliˌopotˈea; wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌao wˌamewˌapotˈoʃa na kˌuwasˌababˈiʃa kˌuzurˈura ɟˌuːja milˈima. wˌalitˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa ɟˌuːja mlˈima na kilˈima, na kˌusahˈau mahˈali pˈao weɲˈewe pa kˌupumzikˈia.|0
jejˈote ˌalijˌewakˈuta ˌaliwˈala; adˈui zˈao wˌalisˈema, sˌisi hatˈuna hatˈia, kwa kˌuwa wˌao wˌalitˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana, malˈiʃo jˈao halˈisi, bwˈana, alˈije tˌumaˈini la bˈaba zˈao..|0
kˌimbiˈeni kutˈoka babˈeli; ˌondokˈeni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo tˈena kuwˈeni kˌama mbˈuzi wˈale wˌaoŋɡozˈao kˈundi.|0
