kwa maˈana nˌitaˈamʃa na kulˈeta ðˈidi ja babˈeli mˌuuŋɡˈano wa mˌataˈifa makˈubwa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini. wˌataʃˈika nafˈasi zˈao ðˈidi jˈake, nˌaje kˌutokˈea kˌaskazˈini ˌatatˈekwa. miʃˈale jˈao ˌitakˈuwa kˌama miʃˈale ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa walˈio hodˈari, ambˈao hˌawawˈezi kurˈudi mikˈono mitˈupu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌukaldˈajo ˌutatˈekwa ɲˈara; wˈote wˌamtekˈao ɲˈara wˌatapˈata za kutˈoʃa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌuʃaŋɡilˈia na kˌufurˈahi, wˌewe ˌutekˈaje urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ˌunatʃˌezatʃˈeza kˌama mtˈamba ˌanajepˈura nafˈaka, na kulˈia kˌama farˈasi dˈume.|0
mˈama jˈako ˌataˌaibˈika ˈm̩no, jˌeje ˌalijˌekuzˈaa ˌatatˌahajˈari. ˌatakˈuwa mdˈoɡo kulˈiko mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote, ˌatakˈuwa ɲˈika, ˈn̩tʃi kˈame na ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja hasˈira ja bwˈana hˌatakalˈiwa na ˈm̩tu, lakˈini ˌataˈatʃwa ukˈiwa kabˈisa. wˈote wˌatakˌaopˈita babˈeli wˌatatˈiwa hˈofu na kˌuðihˈaki kwa sabˈabu ja mˌaɟerˈaha jˌake jˈote.|0
ʃikˈeni nafˈasi zˈenu kˌuzuŋɡˈuka babˈeli, ˈeɲi ɲˈote mvutˈao upˈinde. mpiɡˈeni! msˌibakˈize mʃˈale wowˈote, kwa kˌuwa ˌametˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana.|0
pˈiɡa kelˈele ðˈidi jˌake kˈila upˈande! ˌanaɟˌisalimˈiʃa, minˈara jˌake ˌinaaŋɡˈuka, kˈuta zˌake zˌimebomˈoka. kwa kˌuwa hˈiki ni kisˈasi tʃa bwˈana, mlˌipizˈeni kisˈasi; mtˌendeˈeni kˌama ˌalivjˌowatendˈea weŋɡˈine.|0
kˌatiliˈeni mbˈali mpˈanzi kutˈoka babˈeli, pamˈoɟa na mvunˈaɟi na mˈundu wˌake ˌakivˈuna. kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa wa mðalˈimu kˈila mmˈoɟa na ˌareɟˈee kwa wˈatu wˌake mweɲˈewe, kˈila mmˈoɟa na ˌakimbilˈie kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
ˌisraˈeli ni kˈundi lˌililˌotawaɲˈika ambˈalo sˈimba wˌamelˌifukuzˈia mbˈali. wa kwˈanza kˈumla ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, wa mwˈiʃo kupˈonda mifˈupa jˌake ˌalikˈuwa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: nˌitamwaðˈibu mfˈalme wa babˈeli na ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kˌama nˌilivjˌomwaðˈibu mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru.|0
lakˈini nˌitamrudˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli katˌika malˈiʃo jˌake mweɲˈewe nˌaje ˌatalˈiʃa hˌuko karmˈeli na baʃˈani; ɲɟˈaa jˌake ˌitaʃibˈiʃwa ɟˌuːja vilˈima vja ˌefraˈimu na ɡˌileˈadi.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo, wakˈati hˈuo, asˈema bwˈana, ˌutʃuŋɡˈuzi ˌutafaɲˈika kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa la ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini hˌalitˌakuwˈepo, kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za jˈuda, lakˈini hˌaitˌapatikˈana hˌata mˈoɟa, kwa kˌuwa nˌitawˌasamˈehe mabˈaki nˌitakˌaowaˈatʃa.|0
ʃˌambuliˈeni ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌeraθaˈimu na wˈale wˌaiʃˈio hˌuko pekˈodi. wˌafuˌatiˈeni, wˌauˈeni na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa, asˈema bwˈana. faɲˈeni kˈila kˈitu nˌilitʃˌowaamˈuru.|0
kelˈele ja vˈita ˈiko ndˈani ja ˈn̩tʃi, kelˈele ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi makˈuu.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ɲˈundo ja dunˈia jˈote ˌilivjˌovuɲɟˈika na kˌuharibˈika! tazˈama ɟˈinsi babˈeli ˌilivjokˈuwa ukˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
nˌimetˈeɡa mtˈeɡo kwa aɟˈili jˈako, ˈee babˈeli, nˌawe ˌukakamˈatwa kˈabla hˌauɟˌafahˈamu; ˌulipˌatikˈana na ˌukakamˈatwa kwa sabˈabu ˌulimpˈiŋɡa bwˈana.|0
ɲɟoˈoni ðˈidi jˌake kutˈoka mbˈali. zˌifuŋɡuˈeni ɣˈala zˌake za nafˈaka; mlˌundikˈeni kˌama lˈundo la nafˈaka. mwˌaŋɡamizˈeni kabˈisa na msˌimwatʃˈie mabˈaki jojˈote.|0
wˌauˈeni mˌafahˈali wˌake watʃˈaŋɡa wˈote; wˌaatʃˈeni waʃˈuke mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni! ˈole wˈao! kwa kˌuwa sˈiku jˈao ˌimewadˈia, wakˈati wˌao wa kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
wˌasikˌilizˈeni watˈoro na wˌakimbˈizi kutˈoka babˈeli wˌakitaŋɡˈaza katˌika sajˈuni ɟˈinsi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌalivjˌolipˈiza kisˈasi, kisˈasi kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu lˈake.|0
wˌaitˈeni wapˈiɡa miʃˈale ðˈidi ja babˈeli, wˈote wˈale wˌavutˈao upˈinde. piɡˈeni kˈambi kˌumzuŋɡˈuka kabˈisa, ˌasitorˈoke ˈm̩tu jejˈote. mlˌipizˈeni kwa matˈendo jˈake; mtˌendeˈeni kˌama ˌalivjotˈenda. kwa kˌuwa ˌalimðarˈau bwˈana, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa hˈijo, viɟˈana wˌake wˌanaˈume wˌataaŋɡˈuka bˌarabarˈani; askˈari wˌake wˈote wˌataɲˌamazˈiʃwa sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana.|0
tazˈama, nˈiko kiɲˈume nˈawe, ˈewe mwˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno, asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, kwa kˌuwa sˈiku jˈako ˌimewadˈia, jaˈani, wakˈati wˈako wa kˌuaðibˈiwa.|0
mwˌeɲe mˌaɟivˈuno ˌataɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajemˌuinˈua; nˌitawˈaʃa mˈoto katˌika mˈiɟi jˈake, ˌutakˌaowˌateketˈeza wˈote wˌanaˌomzuŋɡˈuka.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌameonˈewa, nˌao wˈatu wa jˈuda pˈia. wˈote wˌaliˌowatˈeka wˌamewˌaʃikilˈia sˈana, wˌanakatˈaa kˌuwaatʃˈia waˈende.|0
lakˈini mkombˈozi wˌao ˈana ŋɡˈuvu; bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake. ˌatatetˈea kwa ŋɡˈuvu ʃaˈuri lˈao ˌili alˈete rˈaha katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, lakˈini ˌatalˈeta msˌukosˈuko kwa wˈale wˌaiʃˈio babˈeli.|0
upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja wˌakaldˈajo! asˈema bwˈana, ðˈidi ja wˈale wˌaiʃˈio babˈeli na ðˈidi ja mˌaafˈisa wˌake na wˈatu wˌeɲe busˈara.|0
upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja mˌanabˈii wˌake wa uˈoŋɡo! wˌatakˈuwa wˌapumbˈavu. upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈake! wˌataɟˈazwa na hˈofu kˈuu.|0
upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja farˈasi na maɡˈari jˌake ja vˈita pamˈoɟa na askˈari wˌake wˈote wa kiɡˈeni katˌika sˈafu zˈake! wˌao wˌatakˈuwa kˌama wˌanawˈake. upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja hazˈina zˈake! hˈizo zˌitatˈekwa ɲˈara.|0
kwa hˈijo, viˈumbe vja ɟaŋɡwˈani na fˈisi wˌataˈiʃi hˈumo, nˌao bˈundi wˌatakˈaa hˈumo. kˈamwe hˌaitˌakalˈiwa tˈena wˈala wˈatu hˌawataˈiʃi hˈumo kutˈoka kizˈazi hˌadi kizˈazi.|0
kˌama vˈile mˈuŋɡu ˌalivjˌoaŋɡamˈiza sodˈoma na ɡomˈora pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi ˌilijokˈuwa ɟirˈani nˈajo, asˈema bwˈana, vˈivjo hˈivjo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˈumo. nˈaam, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajekˈaa hˈumo.|0
tazˈama! ɟˈeʃi lˌinakˈuɟa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini; taˈifa kˈubwa na wafˈalme wˈeŋɡi wˌanaˈamʃwa kutˈoka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
wˌameɟifˈuŋɡa pˈinde na mikˈuki; ni wˌakatˈili na wasˈio na hurˈuma. wˌanatˈoa saˈuti kˌama bahˈari ˌinajˌoŋɡurˈuma wˌanapˌoendˈeʃa farˈasi zˈao; wˌanakˈuɟa kˌama wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟipˈaŋɡa tajˈari kwa vˈita ˌili kˌukuʃˌambulˈia, ˈee bˈinti babˈeli.|0
mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌamesikˈia habˈari kˌuwahˈusu, nˈajo mikˈono jˌake ˌimeleɡˈea. utʃˈuŋɡu ˌumemʃˈika, mˌaumˈivu kˌama ja mwanˈamke katˌika utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
kwa hˈijo, sikˈia kˈile bwˈana ˌalitʃˌokipˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja babˈeli, kˈile ˌalitʃˌokusudˈia ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo: alˈije mtʃˈaŋɡa katˌika kˈundi ˌataburˈutwa mbˈali. jˌeje ˌataharˈibu kabˈisa malˈiʃo jˈao kwa sabˈabu jˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: tazˈama nˌitaˈamʃa rˈoho ja mwˌaŋɡamˈizi ðˈidi ja babˈeli na wˈatu wˌakaˈao lˈeb kamˈai.|0
nˌitawatˈuma waɡˈeni babˈeli kˌumpepˈeta na kˌuiharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi jˈake; wˌatampˈiŋɡa kˈila upˈande katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa jˈake.|0
ˌusimwˈatʃe mpˈiɡa upˈinde afˈuŋɡe kˈamba upˈinde wˈake, wˈala ˌusimwˈatʃe avˈae silˈaha zˈake. ˌusiwˌaonˈee hurˈuma viɟˈana wˈake; ˌaŋɡamˈiza ɟˈeʃi lˈake kabˈisa.|0
wˌataaŋɡˈuka wˌaliˌouˈawa katˌika babˈeli, wakˈiwa na mˌaɟerˈaha ja kutˈiʃa bˌarabarˈani zˈake.|0
kwa maˈana ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda hˌawaɟaˈatʃwa na mˈuŋɡu wˈao, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, iŋɡˈawa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌimeɟˈaa uˈovu mbˈele zˌake jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˌimbiˈeni kutˈoka babˈeli! ˌokoˈeni maˈiʃa jˈenu! msˌiaŋɡamˈizwe kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈake. ni wakˈati wa kisˈasi tʃa bwˈana, ˌatamlˈipa kˈile ˌanatʃˌostahˈili.|0
babˈeli ˌalikˈuwa kikˈombe tʃa ðahˈabu katˌika mkˈono wa bwˈana; ˌaliufˈaɲa ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote ulˈewe. mˌataˈifa wˌalikˈuɲua mvˈiɲo wˈake; kwa hˈijo sˈasa wˌameiŋɡˈiwa na wazˈimu.|0
babˈeli ˌataaŋɡˈuka ɣafˈula na kˌuvuɲɟˈika. mwˌombolezˈeni! tˌafutˈeni zˈeri ja kˌutulˈiza mˌaumˈivu jˈake, lˈabda ˌanawˈeza kupˈona.|0
tˌuŋɡempˈoɲa babˈeli, lakˈini hawˈezi kˌupoɲˈeka; tˌumwatʃˈeni, na kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈetu aˈende ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe, kwa kˌuwa hukˈumu jˌake ˌinafˈika aŋɡˈani, ˌinapˈanda ɟˈuu hˌadi mˌawiŋɡˈuni..|0
bwˈana ˌameθˌibitˈiʃa hˈaki jˈetu; ɲɟoˈoni, tˌutaŋɡˈaze katˌika sajˈuni kˈitu ambˈatʃo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ˌamefˈaɲa..|0
noˈeni miʃˈale, tʃˌukuˈeni ŋɡˈao! bwˈana ˌamewaˈamʃa wafˈalme wa wamˈedi, kwa sabˈabu nˈia jˌake ni kˌuaŋɡamˈiza babˈeli. bwˈana ˌatalipˈiza kisˈasi, kisˈasi kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu lˈake.|0
twekˈeni bendˈera ɟˌuːja kˈuta za babˈeli! ˌimariʃˈeni ulˈinzi, wekˈeni walˈinzi, ˌandaˈeni wˌaviziˈao! bwˈana ˌatatimˈiza kusˈudi lˈake, ˈamri jˌake ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa babˈeli.|0
wˌewe ˌuiʃˈije kˈando ja mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi na ulˈije na wˈiŋɡi wa hazˈina, mwˈiʃo wˈako ˌumekˈuɟa, wakˈati wˈako wa kˌukatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌameˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe: hakˈika nˌitakuɟˈaza na wˈatu, kˌama kˈundi la nzˈiɡe, nˌao wˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele za uʃˈindi ɟˈuu jˈako..|0
ˌaliiˈumba dunˈia kwa uwˈeza wˈake; ˌakawˈeka misˈiŋɡi ja ˌulimwˈeŋɡu kwa hekˈima jˌake na ˌakazˌitandˈaza mbˈiŋɡu kwa ˌufahˈamu wˈake.|0
wˌewe ndˈiwe rˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu la vˈita, silˈaha jˈaŋɡu ja vˈita: kwa wˌewe nˌavuɲɟavˈuɲɟa mˌataˈifa, kwa wˌewe nˌaaŋɡamˈiza fˈalme.|0
kwa wˌewe nˌavuɲɟavˈuɲɟa farˈasi na mpˈanda farˈasi, kwa wˌewe nˌavuɲɟavˈuɲɟa ɡˈari la vˈita na mwˌendeʃˈaɟi wˈake.|0
kwa wˌewe nˌapondapˈonda mwˌanaˈume na mwanˈamke, kwa wˌewe nˌapondapˈonda m̩zˈee na kiɟˈana, kwa wˌewe nˌapondapˈonda kiɟˈana wa kiˈume na mwˌanamwˈali.|0
kwa wˌewe nˌampondapˈonda mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi na kˈundi, kwa wˌewe nˌampondapˈonda mkulˈima na maksˈai, kwa wˌewe nˌawapˌondapˈonda wˌatawˈala na mˌaafˈisa.|0
mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈako nˌitamlipˈiza babˈeli na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ˌukaldˈajo kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa jˈote wˌalijofˈaɲa katˌika sajˈuni, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mˌimi nˈiko kiɲˈume nˈawe, ˈee mlˈima ˌunaˌoharˈibu, wˌewe ˌuaŋɡˌamizˈaje dunˈia jˈote, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako, nˌikuvˌiŋɡirˈiʃe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kilˈele tʃa mwˈamba, na kˌukufˈaɲa mlˈima ˌuliˌoteketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
hakˈuna ɟˈiwe lˌitakˌalotʃˌukulˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈako kwa aɟˈili ja kufˈaɲua ɟˈiwe la pembˈeni, wˈala ɟˈiwe lolˈote kwa aɟˈili ja msˈiŋɡi, kwa maˈana ˌutakˈuwa ukˈiwa milˈele, asˈema bwˈana.|0
twekˈeni bendˈera katˌika ˈn̩tʃi! piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa! ˌandaˈeni mˌataˈifa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita ðˈidi jˈake, itˈeni fˈalme hˈizi ðˈidi jˈake: ˌararˈati, mˈini na ˌaʃkenˈazi. wekˈeni ɟˌemadˈari ðˈidi jˈake, pˌelekˈeni farˈasi wˈeŋɡi kˌama kˈundi la nzˈiɡe.|0
ˌandaˈeni mˌataˈifa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita ðˈidi jˈake, wafˈalme wa wamˈedi, wˌatawˈala wˌao na mˌaafˈisa wˌao wˈote, pamˈoɟa na ˈn̩tʃi zˈote wˌanazˌotawˈala.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌinatˌetemˈeka na kˌuɡaaɡˈaa, kwa kˌuwa mˌakusˈudi ja bwˈana ðˈidi ja babˈeli jˌanasimˈama: jaˈani, kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi ja babˈeli ˌili pasˈiwe na jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
mˌaʃuɟˈaa wa babˈeli wˌameˈatʃa kˌupiɡˈana, wˌamebˈaki katˌika ŋɡˈome zˈao. ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˌimekwˈiʃa, wˌamekˈuwa kˌama wˌanawˈake. makˈazi jˌake jˌametˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto, mˌakomˈeo ja malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌamevuɲɟˈika.|0
tarˈiʃi mmˈoɟa hˌumfuˈata mwiŋɡˈine, na mɟˈumbe hˌumfuˈata mɟˈumbe, kˌumtaŋɡazˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli kwˌamba ˈm̩ɟi wˌake wˈote ˌumetˈekwa.|0
vivˈuko vja mˈito vˌimekamˈatwa, mabwˈawa jˌeɲe mafˈuɲɟo jˌametˈiwa mˈoto, nˌao askˈari wˌameiŋɡˈiwa na hˈofu kˈuu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌasemˈalo: bˈinti babˈeli ni kˌama sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia wakˈati ˌinapˌokaɲˈaɡwa; wakˈati wa kumvˈuna ˌutakˈuɟa upˈesi.|0
nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌametˈula, ˌametufˈaɲa tˌutʃaŋɡˌajikˈiwe, ˌametufˈaɲa tˈuwe ɡˌudulˈia tˈupu. kˌama ɲˈoka ˌametumˈeza na kuɟˈaza tˈumbo lˈake kwa vjakˈula vjˈetu vizˈuri, kˈiʃa ˌakatˌutapˈika.|0
ɟeˈuri ˌilijˌofaɲˈiwa miˈili jˈetu na ˈiwe ɟˌuːja babˈeli, ndˈivjo wˌasemˈavjo wˌakaˈao sajˈuni. dˈamu jˈetu na ˈiwe ɟˌuːja wˈale wˌaiʃˈio babˈeli, asˈema jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: tazˈama, nˌitatetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈako na kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi kwa aɟˈili jˈako; nˌitaˌikaˈuʃa bahˈari jˌake na kˌuzikaˈuʃa tʃemtʃˈemi zˈake.|0
babˈeli ˌutakˈuwa lˈundo la maɡˈofu na makˈao ja mbwˈeha, kˈitu tʃa kutˈiʃa na kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa, mahˈali ˌasipoˈiʃi ˈm̩tu.|0
wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌanaŋɡurˈuma kˌama sˈimba wadˈoɡo, wˌanakorˈoma kˌama wˈana sˈimba.|0
lakˈini wakˈati wakˈiwa wˌameˈamʃwa, nˌitawˌaandalˈia karˈamu na kˌuwafˈaɲa walˈewe, ˌili wapˈiɡe kelˈele kwa kitʃˈeko, kˈiʃa walˈale milˈele na wˌasiˈamke, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitawˌaterˈemʃa kˌama wˌanakondˈoo wˌaendˈao mˌatʃiɲɟˈoni, kˌama kondˈoo dˈume na mbˈuzi.|0
bahˈari ˌitainˈuka ɟˌuːja babˈeli; mawˈimbi jˌake jˌeɲe kˌuŋɡurˈuma jˌatamfunˈika.|0
mˈiɟi jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa, kˈame na ɟˈaŋɡwa, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, ambˈajo hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌanajepˈita hˈumo.|0
nˌitamwaðˈibu bˈeli katˌika babˈeli, na kumfˈaɲa ˌatapˈike kˈile ˌalitʃˌokimˈeza. mˌataˈifa hˌajatˌamiminˈika tˈena kwˈake. nˌao ukˈuta wa babˈeli ˌutaaŋɡˈuka.|0
tokˈeni ndˈani jˈake, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu! ˌokoˈeni maˈiʃa jˈenu! ˌikimbiˈeni hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana.|0
msikˈate tamˈaa wˈala msˌioɡˈope tetˈesi zˌitakˌaposikˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi; tetˈesi mˈoɟa ˌinasikˈika mwˈaka hˈuu, ɲiŋɡˈine mwˈaka ˌunaˌofuˈata; tetˈesi ɟˌuːja ɟeˈuri katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, na ja mtawˈala ðˈidi ja mtawˈala.|0
kwa kˌuwa hakˈika wakˈati ˌutawadˈia nˌitakˌapozˌiaðˈibu sanˈamu za babˈeli; ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jˈote ˌitatˈiwa aˈibu, na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌaliˌouˈawa wˌataˌaŋɡukˈia ndˈani jˈake.|0
ndˈipo mbˈiŋɡu na dunˈia na vjˈote vˌilivjˈomo ndˈani jˌake vˌitapˈiɡa kelˈele za ʃˈaŋɡwe ɟˌuːja babˈeli, kwa kˌuwa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini wˌaharˈabu wˌatamʃˌambulˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
babˈeli ni lazˈima ˌaaŋɡˈuke kwa sabˈabu ja kˌuwaˈua wˌaisraˈeli, kˌama vˈile wˌaliˌouˈawa dˌuniˈani kˈote wˌalivjˌoaŋɡˈuka kwa sabˈabu ja babˈeli.|0
wˌewe ˌulijepˈona upˈaŋɡa, ondˈoka wˈala ˌusikawˈie! mkumbˈuke bwˈana ukˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mbˈali, na ˌutafakˈari ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tˌumetˌahajˈari, kwa maˈana tˌumetukˈanwa na aˈibu ˌimefunˈika ɲˈuso zˈetu, kwa sabˈabu waɡˈeni wˌameiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
lakˈini sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitakˌapoaðˈibu sanˈamu zˈake, na katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake jˈote wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa wˌatalˈia kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali.|0
hˌata kˌama babˈeli ˌikifˈika aŋɡˈani na kˌuziˌimarˈiʃa ŋɡˈome zˌake ndˈefu, nˌitatˈuma wˌaharˈabu ðˈidi jˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
saˈuti ja kilˈio ˌinasikˈika kutˈoka babˈeli, saˈuti ja ˌuharibˈifu m̩kˈuu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo.|0
bwˈana ˌataˌiaŋɡamˈiza babˈeli, ˌataɲˌamazˈiʃa mˌakelˈele ja kiʃˈindo tʃˈake. mawˈimbi ja adˈui jˌataŋɡurˈuma kˌama mˈaɟi makˈuu, ŋɡurˈumo ja saˈuti zˈao ˌitavˈuma.|0
mharˈabu ˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja babˈeli, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌake wˌatakamˈatwa, nˈazo pˈinde zˈao zˌitavˈuɲɟua. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wa kisˈasi, jˌeje ˌatalipˈiza kˌikamilˈifu.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa mˌaafˈisa wˌake na wˌeɲe busˈara walˈewe, wˌatawˈala wˈao, mˌaafˈisa, pamˈoɟa na wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˈao; wˌatalˈala milˈele na hˌawataˈamka, asˈema mfˈalme, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: ukˈuta mnˈene wa babˈeli ˌutasˌawazˈiʃwa, na malˈaŋɡo jˌalijˌoinˈuka jˌatatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto; mˌataˈifa jˌanaɟitʃˈoʃa bˈure, taˈabu ja mˌataˈifa ni niʃˈati tu ja miˈali ja mˈoto.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio uɟˈumbe jˌeremˈia ˌaliˈompa afˈisa serˈaja mwˈana wa nerˈia mwˈana wa mˌaasˈeja, ˌalipokwˈenda babˈeli pamˈoɟa na sˌedekˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda, katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wˈake.|0
jˌeremˈia ˌalikˈuwa ˌameandˈika ndˈani ja kitˈabu kuhˈusu maˈafa jˈote jˌatakˌajoipˈata babˈeli, jaˈani jˈote jˌalijokˈuwa jˌameandˈikwa kuhˈusu babˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa sˈema, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumesˈema ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈiza mahˈali hˈapa ˌili ˈm̩tu wˈala mɲˈama ˌasiˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake, nˈapo pˌatakˈuwa ukˈiwa milˈele..|0
ˌutakˌapomalˈiza kusˈoma hˈiki kitˈabu, kˌifuŋɡˈie ɟˈiwe kˈiʃa ˌukitˈupe ndˈani ja ˈm̩to frˈati.|0
kˈiʃa sˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo babˈeli ˌutakˌavjozˈama na ˌusiinˈuke tˈena, kwa sabˈabu ja maˈafa nˌitakˌajolˈeta ɟˈuu jˈake. nˌao wˈatu wˌake wˌataaŋɡˈuka.  manˈeno ja jˌeremˈia jˌanaiʃˈia hˈapa.|0
sˌedekˈia ˌalikˈuwa na ˈumri wa miˈaka ˌiʃirˈini na mmˈoɟa ˌalipoˈanza kˌutawˈala, nˌaje ˌakatawˈala hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kwa miˈaka kˈumi na mmˈoɟa. ɟˈina la mˈama jˌake ˌaliˈitwa hˌamutˈali bˈinti jˌeremˈia, kutˈoka lˈibna.|0
ˌalifˈaɲa maˈovu matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa jˌehojakˈimu.|0
ˌilikˈuwa ni kwa sabˈabu ja hasˈira ja bwˈana hˈaja jˈote jˌalitokˈea jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda, nˌaje mwiʃˈoni ˌakawˌaondˈoa mbˈele zˈake. bˈasi, sˌedekˈia ˌakaˈasi ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
ˈm̩ɟi ˌulizuŋɡˈukwa na ɟˈeʃi mpˈaka mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme sˌedekˈia.|0
kˈiʃa ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌukavˈuɲɟua na ɟˈeʃi lˈote lˌikakimbˈia. wˌakaondˈoka mɟˈini usˈiku kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo lˌililokˈuwa kˈati ja kˈuta mbˈili karˈibu na bustˈani ja mfˈalme, iŋɡˈawa wˌakaldˈajo wˌalikˈuwa wˌameˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi. wˌakakimbˈia kˌuelekˈea arˈaba.|0
lakˈini ɟˈeʃi la wˌakaldˈajo lˌikamfˌuatˈia mfˈalme sˌedekˈia na kumpˈata katˌika sehˈemu tˌambarˈare za jerˈiko. askˈari wˌake wˈote wˌakatˈeŋɡwa nˌaje na kˌutawaɲˈika.|0
nˌaje ˌakakamˈatwa. ˌakapelˈekwa kwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli hˌuko rˈibla, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja hamˈaθi, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌalimtˌaŋɡazˈia hukˈumu.|0
hˌuko rˈibla mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌaliwatʃˈiɲɟa wˈana wa sˌedekˈia mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈake. pˈia ˌakawaˈua mˌaafˈisa wˈote wa jˈuda.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakajaŋɡˈoa mˈatʃo ja sˌedekˈia, ˌakamfˈuŋɡa kwa pˈiŋɡu za ʃˈaba na kˌumpelˈeka babˈeli, ˌalipomwˈeka ɡˌerezˈani mpˈaka sˈiku ja kˈifo tʃˈake.|0
mnˈamo sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi wa tˈano, katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na tˈisa wa ˌutawˈala wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌebuzˌaradˈani ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme, ˌalijˌemtumikˈia mfˈalme wa babˈeli, ˌalikˈuɟa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌalitʃˈoma mˈoto hekˈalu la bwˈana, ɟˈumba la kifˈalme, na ɲˈumba zˈote za jˌerusalˈemu. ˌalitˌeketˈeza kˈila ɟˈeŋɡo muhˈimu.|0
ɟˈeʃi lˈote la wˌakaldˈajo tʃˈini ja ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme wˌalivˈuɲɟa kˈuta zˈote zˌilizˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme ˌakatʃukˈua jˈale mˌasinˈia, vˈile vjetˈezo, jˈale mˌabakˈuli ja kˌuɲuɲizˈia, zˈile sˌufurˈia, vˈile vinˈara vja tˈaa, zˈile sahˈani na jˈale mˌabakˈuli jˌalijˌotumˈika kwa sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi, vˈitu vjˈote vˈile vˌilivjokˈuwa vˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi ˌau fˈeða.|0
ʃˈaba ˌilijˌotokˈana na zˈile ŋɡˈuzo mbˈili, ˈile bahˈari na wˈale mˌafahˈali kˈumi na mawˈili wa ʃˈaba wˌaliokˈuwa tʃˈini jˈake, pamˈoɟa na vˈile vˌiʃikilˈio vˌilivjˌohamiʃˈika, ambˈavjo mfˈalme sˌolomˈoni ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeŋɡenˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu la bwˈana, ˌilikˈuwa na uzˈito ˌusiowˈeza kˌupimˈika.|0
kˈila ŋɡˈuzo ˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na nˈane, kˈimo tʃˈake na mzuŋɡˈuko ðirˈaa kˈumi na mbˈili, na unˈene wa ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne, na zˈote zˌilikˈuwa wˈazi ndˈani.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na mˌakomamˈaŋɡa tisˈini na sˈita pembˈeni; ɟˈumla ja mˌakomamˈaŋɡa ɟˌuːja wˈavu ˌuliokˈuwa ˌumezuŋɡˈuka jˌalikˈuwa mˈia mˈoɟa.|0
nˌebuzˌaradˈani ɟˌemadˈari ˌakawˌatʃukˈua hˈao wˈote na kˌuwapelˈeka kwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli hˌuko rˈibla.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo hesˈabu ja wˈatu ambˈao nˌebukadnˈeza ˌaliwˌatʃukˈua kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni: katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba, wˌajahˈudi tˈatu,sifˈuri ˌiʃirˈininatˈatu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na nˈane wa ˌutawˈala wa nˌebukadnˈeza, wˈatu mˌianˈane θˌeleθˈininambˈili kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, wˌajahˈudi mˌiasˈaba ˌarobaˈininatˈano wˌalitʃˌukulˈiwa kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni na nˌebuzˌaradˈani ɟˌemadˈari wa askˈari walˈinzi wa mfˈalme. ɟˈumla ja wˈatu wˈote wˌalikˈuwa ˈn̩ne,mˌiasˈita.|0
ˌalizuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa upˈole na kˈumpa kˈiti tʃa heʃˈima zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈale wafˈalme weŋɡˈine ˌaliokˈuwa nˌao hˌuko babˈeli.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˈm̩ɟi ˌulivjoˈatʃwa ukˈiwa, ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao zamˈani ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeɟˈaa wˈatu! ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo ˌumekˈuwa kˌama mˈama mɟˈane, ambˈaje wakˈati fulˈani ˌalikˈuwa mˌaarˈufu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa! jˈule ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa malkˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa maɟˈimbo sˈasa ˌamekˈuwa mtˈumwa.|0
kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, hulˈia sˈana usˈiku, matʃˈozi jˈapo kwˈeɲe maʃˈavu jˈake. mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wapˈenzi wˌake wˈote hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌumfarˈiɟi. rafˈiki zˌake wˈote wˌamemsalˈiti, wˌamekˈuwa adˈui zˈake.|0
baˌada ja matˈeso na kˌufaɲˈiʃwa kˈazi kˌikatˈili, jˈuda ˌamekwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. ˌanakˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, hapˈati mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika. wˈote ambˈao wˌanamsˈaka wˌamemkamˈata kˌatikˈati ja ðˈiki jˈake.|0
bˌarabˈara zˌielˌekeˈazo sajˈuni zˌaombolˈeza, kwa kˌuwa hakˈuna jejˈote ˌanajekˈuɟa kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu zˌake zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa. malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˈote jˌamekˈuwa ukˈiwa, mˌakuhˈani wˌake wˌanalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, wˌanawˈali wˌake wˌanahˌuzunˈika, nˌaje jˈuko katˌika utʃˈuŋɡu wa mˌaumˈivu makˈuu.|0
adˈui zˌake wˌamekˈuwa mabwˈana zˈake, watˈesi wˌake wˈana rˈaha. bwˈana ˌamemletˈea huzˈuni kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˌake ɲˈiŋɡi. watˈoto wˌake wˌamekwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, matˈeka mbˈele ja adˈui.|0
fahˈari jˈote ˌimeondˈoka kutˈoka kwa bˈinti sajˈuni. wakˈuu wˌake wˈako kˌama ajˈala ambˈaje hapˈati malˈiʃo, katˌika ˌuðaˈifu wˌamekimbˈia mbˈele ja ˌanajˌewasˈaka.|0
katˌika sˈiku za matˈeso jˌake na kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa, jˌerusalˈemu hˌukumbˈuka hazˈina zˈote ambˈazo zˌilikˈuwa zˌake sˈiku za kˈale. wakˈati wˈatu wˌake wˌalipˌoaŋɡˈuka katˌika mikˈono ja adˈui, hˌapakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌumsaidˈia. watˈesi wˌake wˌalimtazˈama na kumtʃˈeka katˌika mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈake.|0
jˌerusalˈemu ˌametˈenda ðˈambi sˈana kwa hˈijo ˌamekˈuwa naɟˈisi. wˈote wˌaliˌomheʃˈimu wˌanamðarˈau, kwa maˈana wˌameuˈona ˈutʃi wˈake. jˌeje mweɲˈewe ˌanapˈiɡa kˈite na kˌuɡeukˈia mbˈali.|0
utʃˈafu wˌake ˌumeɡˌandamˈana na ŋɡˈuo zˈake; hˌakuwˈaza ɟˌuːja maˈiʃa jˌake ja bˌaadˈaje. aŋɡˈuko lˈake lˌilikˈuwa la kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza, hˌapakuwˈepo na jejˈote wa kˌumfarˈiɟi. tazˈama, ˈee bwˈana, tˈeso lˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana adˈui ˌameʃˈinda.|0
adˈui ˌametˈia mikˈono ɟˌuːja hazˈina zˌake zˈote, ˌaliˈona mˌataˈifa ja kˌipaɡˈani wˌakiiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈake, wˈale ˌuliˌowakatˈaza kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe kˌusaɲˈiko lˈako.|0
wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌanalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wˌatafutˈapo tʃakˈula; wˌanabˌadilˈiʃa hazˈina zˈao kwa tʃakˈula ˌili wawˈeze kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi. tazˈama, ˈee bwˈana, ˌufikˈiri, kwa maˈana nˌimeðˌaraulˈiwa.|0
ɟˈe, si kˈitu kwˈenu, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mpitˈao kˈando? ˌaŋɡaliˈeni kˈote mwˈone. ɟˈe, kˈuna mˌaumˈivu kˌama mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu jˈale jˌalijotˈiwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, jˈale bwˈana ˌalijˌojalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu katˌika sˈiku ja hasˈira jˌake kˈali.|0
kutˈoka ɟˈuu ˌalipelˈeka mˈoto, ˌakauʃˈuʃa katˌika mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu. ˌaliˌitandˈia wˈavu miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu na ˌakanˌirudˈiʃa ɲˈuma. ˌakanifˈaɲa mkˈiwa, na mðaˈifu mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu zˌimefˈuŋɡwa kwˈeɲe nˈira, kwa mikˈono jˌake zˌilifˈumwa pamˈoɟa. zˌimefˈika ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈaŋɡu na bwˈana ˌamezˌiondˈoa ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu. ˌamenitˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale ambˈao siwˈezi kˌuʃindˈana nˈao.|0
bwˈana ˌamewˌakatˈaa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wa vˈita wˈote walˈio kˈati jˈaŋɡu, ˌameaɡˈiza ɟˈeʃi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu kˌuwapˈonda viɟˈana wˈaŋɡu wa kiˈume. katˌika ʃˌinikˈizo lˈake la divˈai bwˈana ˌamemkaɲˈaɡa bikˈira bˈinti jˈuda.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌinalˈia na mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌanafurˈika matʃˈozi. hakˈuna jejˈote alˈije karˈibu kˌunifarˈiɟi, hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌuhuˈiʃa rˈoho jˈaŋɡu. watˈoto wˈaŋɡu ni wakˈiwa kwa sabˈabu adˈui ˌameʃˈinda.|0
sajˈuni ˌanaɲoˈoʃa mikˈono jˈake, lakˈini hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌumfarˈiɟi. bwˈana ˌametˈoa ˈamri kwa aɟˈili ja jakˈobo kwˌamba mˌaɟirˈani zˌake wˈawe adˈui zˈake; jˌerusalˈemu ˌumekˈuwa kˈitu naɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, hˌata hˈivjo nˌiliˈasi ðˈidi ja ˈamri jˈake. sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote, tˌazamˈeni mˌaumˈivu jˈaŋɡu. wˌavulˈana wˈaŋɡu na wˌasitʃˈana wˈaŋɡu wˌamekwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
nˌiliˈita wˌaʃirˈika wˈaŋɡu lakˈini wˌalinˌisalˈiti. mˌakuhˈani wˈaŋɡu na wazˈee wˈaŋɡu wˌaliˌaŋɡamˈia mɟˈini wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakitafˈuta tʃakˈula ˌili wawˈeze kuˈiʃi.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia, ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈinsi nilˈivjo katˌika ðˈiki! nˈina mˌaumˈivu makˈali ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌinahˌaŋɡaˈika mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa nˌimekˈuwa mwˈasi sˈana. hˌuko ɲɟˈe, upˈaŋɡa ˌunaˈua wˈatu, ndˈani, kˈipo kˈifo tˈu.|0
wˈatu wˌamesikˈia nˌinavjolˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, lakˈini hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌunifarˈiɟi. adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˈote wˌamesikˈia ɟˌuːja ðˈiki jˈaŋɡu, wˌanafˌurahˈia lˈile ˌulilˌolitˈenda. naˈomba ˌuilˈete sˈiku ˌulijˌoitaŋɡˈaza ˌili wˈawe kˌama mˈimi.|0
uˈovu wˌao wˈote na ˈuɟe mbˈele zˈako; ˌuwaʃˌuɣulikˈie wˌao kˌama vˈile ˌulivjˌoniʃˌuɣulikˈia mˌimi kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈaŋɡu zˈote. kulˈia kwˈaŋɡu kwa utʃˈuŋɡu ni kwˈiŋɡi na mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeðˌoofˈika.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi bwˈana ˌalivjˌomfunˈika bˈinti sajˈuni kwa wˈiŋɡu la hasˈira jˈake! ˌameitˈupa tʃˈini fahˈari ja ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni mpˈaka dˌuniˈani, hˌakukumbˈuka kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa kˌuwekˈea miɡˈuu katˌika sˈiku ja hasˈira jˈake.|0
bˌila hurˈuma bwˈana ˌamejamˈeza makˈao jˈote ja jakˈobo; katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌamebomˈoa ŋɡˈome za bˈinti jˈuda. ˌameˌuaŋɡˈuʃa ufˈalme wˌake na wakˈuu wˌake tʃˈini kwa aˈibu.|0
katˌika hasˈira kˈali ˌamevˈuɲɟa kˈila pˈembe ja ˌisraˈeli. ˌameˌuondˈoa mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˌalipˌokaribˈia adˈui. ˌamemtˌeketˈeza jakˈobo kˌama mˈoto ˌuwakˈao ˈule ˌutekˌetezˈao kˈila kˈitu kˌinatʃˌouzuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌameupˈinda upˈinde wˌake kˌama adˈui, mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume ˈuko tajˈari. kˌama vˈile adˈui ˌamewatʃˈiɲɟa wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌanapendˈeza ɟˈitʃo, ˌamemwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˌake kˌama mˈoto ɟˌuːja hˈema la bˈinti sajˈuni.|0
bwˈana ni kˌama adˈui; ˌamemmˈeza ˌisraˈeli. ˌamemˈeza maɟˈumba jˌake jˈote ja kifˈalme na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ŋɡˈome zˈake. ˌameoŋɡˈeza huzˈuni na mˌaombolˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja bˈinti jˈuda.|0
ˌameharˈibu maskˈani jˌake kˌama bustˈani, ˌameharˈibu mahˈali pˈake pa mkutˈano. bwˈana ˌamemfˈaɲa sajˈuni kˌusahˈau sˌikukˈuu zˌake zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa na sabˈato zˈake; katˌika hasˈira jˌake kˈali ˌamewˌaðarˈau mfˈalme na kuhˈani.|0
bwˈana ˌamekatˈaa mˌaðabˈahu jˌake na kuˈatʃa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈake. ˌamemkabˈiði adˈui kˈuta za maɟˈumba jˌake ja kifˈalme; wˌamepˈiɡa kelˈele katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana kˌama katˌika sˈiku ja sˌikukˈuu ˌilijˌoamrˈiwa.|0
bwˈana ˌalikˌusudˈia kˌuaŋɡˈuʃa ukˈuta ˌuliˌomzuŋɡˈuka bˈinti sajˈuni. ˌameˌiɲoˈoʃa kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia na hˌakuˌuzuˈia mkˈono wˌake ˌusiˌaŋɡamˈize. ˌalifˈaɲa mabˈoma na kˈuta zˌiombolˈeze, vjˈote vˌikahˌaribˈika pamˈoɟa.|0
malˈaŋɡo jˌake jˌamezˈama arðˈini, mˌakomˈeo jˌake ˌamejavˈuɲɟa na kˌujaharˈibu. mfˈalme wˌake na wakˈuu wˌake wˌamepelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, ʃerˈia haˈipo tˈena, na mˌanabˈii wˌake hˌawapˈati tˈena maˈono kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
wazˈee wa bˈinti sajˈuni wˌanakˈeti tʃˈini kˈimja, wˌameɲuɲˈiza mavˈumbi kwˈeɲe vˈitʃwa vjˈao na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia. wˌanawˈali wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌamesuɟˈudu hˌadi arðˈini.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌameðˌoofˈika kwa kulˈia, nˈina mˌaumˈivu makˈali ndˈani, mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumemimˈinwa arðˈini kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa, kwa sabˈabu watˈoto na wˌaɲoɲˈao wˌanazimˈia kwˈeɲe bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi.|0
wˌanawˌaambˈia mˈama zˈao, wˈapi mkˈate na divˈai? wˌazimiˈapo kˌama wˈatu wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa katˌika bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi, maˈiʃa jˈao jˌaðoˌofikˈavjo mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈama zˈao.|0
nˌinawˈeza kusˈema nˈini kwa aɟˈili jˈako? nˌikulˌiŋɡanˈiʃe na nˈini, ˈee bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu? nˌitakˌufananˈiʃa na nˈini, ˌili nipˈate kˌukufarˈiɟi, ˈee bikˈira bˈinti sajˈuni? ɟerˈaha lˈako lˈina kˈina kˌama bahˈari. ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌukupˈoɲa.|0
maˈono ja mˌanabˈii wˈako jˌalikˈuwa ja uˈoŋɡo na jˌasijofˈaa kˈitu, hˌawakˌuifunˈua ðˈambi jˈako ˌili kˌukuzˌuilˈia kwˈenda ˌutumwˈani. manˈeno wˌalijokˈupa jˌalikˈuwa ja uˈoŋɡo na ja kˌupotˈoʃa.|0
wˈote wˌapitiˈao ɲɟˈia jˈako wˌanakˌupiɡˈia makˈofi, wˌanakˌuðihˈaki na kˌutikˈisa vˈitʃwa vjˈao kwa bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu: hˈuu n̩dˈio ˈule ˈm̩ɟi ˌulioˈitwa mkˌamilˈifu wa uzˈuri, furˈaha ja dunˈia jˈote.|0
adˈui zˈako wˈote wˌanapanˈua vˈiɲua vjˈao ðˈidi jˈako, wˌanaðihˈaki na kusˈaɡa mˈeno jˈao na kusˈema, tˌumemmˈeza. hˌii n̩dˈijo sˈiku tˌulijˌoiŋɡoɟˈea, tˌumeˈiʃi na kˌuiˈona.|0
bwˈana ˌamefˈaɲa lˈile ˌalilˌolipˈaŋɡa; ˌametimˈiza nˈeno lˈake ˌalilˌoliamˈuru sˈiku za kˈale. ˌamekˌuaŋɡˈuʃa bˌila hurˈuma, ˌamewaˈatʃa adˈui wˌakusimˈaŋɡe, ˌametukˈuza pˈembe ja adˈui jˈako.|0
miˈojo ja wˈatu ˌinamlilˈia bwˈana. ˈee ukˈuta wa bˈinti sajˈuni, matʃˈozi jˈako na jˌatirirˈike kˌama ˈm̩to usˈiku na mtʃˈana; ˌusiɟˈipe nafˈuu, mˈatʃo jˈako jˌasipumzˈike.|0
inˈuka, lˈia usˈiku, zˈamu za usˈiku zˌianzˈapo; mimˈina mˈojo wˈako kˌama mˈaɟi mbˈele za bwˈana. mwˌinulˈie jˌeje mikˈono jˈako kwa aɟˈili ja maˈiʃa ja watˈoto wˈako, ambˈao wˌanazimˈia kwa ɲɟˈaa kwˈeɲe kˈila mwˈanzo wa bˌarabˈara.|0
tazˈama, ˈee bwˈana, ˌufikirˈie: ni nˈani ambˈaje ˌumepˈata kˌumtendˈea nˈamna hˌii? ɟˈe, wˌanawˈake wakˈule wazˈao wˈao, watˈoto wˌaliˌowalˈea? ɟˈe, kuhˈani na nabˈii ˌauˈawe mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa bwˈana.|0
viɟˈana na wazˈee hˌuɟilˈaza pamˈoɟa katˌika mavˈumbi ja bˌarabarˈani, wˌavulˈana wˈaŋɡu na wˌasitʃˈana wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa. ˌumewaˈua katˌika sˈiku ja hasˈira jˈako, ˌumewatʃˈiɲɟa bˌila hurˈuma.|0
kˌama ˌulivjoˈita sˈiku ja karˈamu, ndˈivjo ˌulivjˌoaɡˈiza hˈofu kˈuu ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu kˈila upˈande. katˌika sˈiku ja hasˈira ja bwˈana hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijekwˈepa ˌau kupˈona; wˈale nˌiliˌowatˈunza na kˌuwalˈea, adˈui jˈaŋɡu ˌamewˌaaŋɡamˈiza.|0
mˌimi n̩dˈije ˈm̩tu ˌalijeˈona matˈeso kwa fˈimbo ja ɣaðˈabu jˈake.|0
ˌamenˌifukuzˈia mbˈali na kˌunifˈaɲa nˌitembˈee ɡizˈani wˈala si katˌika nˈuru.|0
hakˈika, ˌameɡeˈuza mkˈono wˌake ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu tˈena na tˈena, mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˌamefˈaɲa ŋɡˈozi jˈaŋɡu na ɲˈama jˈaŋɡu kˌutʃakˈaa na ˌameivˈuɲɟa mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌamenˌiziŋɡˈira na kˌunizuŋɡˈuka kwa utʃˈuŋɡu na taˈabu.|0
ˌamenifˈaɲa niˈiʃi ɡizˈani kˌama wˈale wˌaliokˈufa.|0
ˌamenˌizuŋɡuʃˈia ukˈuta ˌili nˌisiwˈeze kˌutorˈoka, ˌamenifˈuŋɡa kwa mˌiɲorˈoro mizˈito.|0
hˌata nˌinapoˈita ˌau kulˈia ˌili kuˈomba msaˈada, ˌanakatˈaa kˌupokˈea maˈombi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌameˌizuˈia ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu kwa mapˈande ja mˈawe, ˌamepotˈoʃa ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
kˌama dˈubu ˌaviziˈaje, kˌama sˈimba mˌafitʃˈoni.|0
ˌamenˌiburˈuta kutˈoka ɲɟˈia, ˌakanˌirarˈua na kˌuniˈatʃa bˌila msaˈada.|0
ˌamevˈuta upˈinde wˌake na kˌunifˈaɲa mˌimi nˈiwe lˈeŋɡo kwa aɟˈili ja miʃˈale jˈake.|0
ˌalinitʃˈoma mˈojo wˈaŋɡu kwa miʃˈale ˌilijotˈoka kwˈeɲe pˈodo lˈake.|0
nˌimekˈuwa kˌitʃekˈeʃo kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˈote, wˌananˌiðihˈaki kwa wˈimbo mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
ˌameniɟˈaza kwa maɟˈani matʃˈuŋɡu na kˌuniʃibˈiʃa kwa ɲˈoŋɡo.|0
ˌamevˈuɲɟa mˈeno jˈaŋɡu kwa tʃˌaŋɡarˈawe, ˌamenˌikaɲaɡˈia mˌavumbˈini.|0
amˈani jˈaŋɡu ˌimeˌondolˈewa, nˌimesahˈau kˌufanikˈiwa ni nˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo nasˈema, fahˈari jˈaŋɡu ˌimeondˈoka na jˈale jˈote nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimetˌaraɟˈia kutˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
nˌajakumbˈuka matˈeso jˈaŋɡu na kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kwˈaŋɡu, utʃˈuŋɡu na ɲˈoŋɡo.|0
nˌinajˌakumbˈuka vjˈema, nˈajo nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu ˌimezimˈia ndˈani jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˌaɟikumbˈuʃa nˈeno hˈili na kwa hˈijo ninˈalo tˌumaˈini.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja upˈendo m̩kˈuu wa bwˈana, hˌatuˌaŋɡamˈii, kwa kˌuwa hurˈuma zˌake hˌazikˈomi kˈamwe.|0
ni ˈm̩pja kˈila ˌasubˈuhi, ˌuaminˈifu wˈako ni m̩kˈuu.|0
nˌimeˌiambˈia nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu, bwˈana ni fˈuŋɡu lˈaŋɡu, kwa hˈijo nˌitamŋɡoɟˈea.|0
bwˈana ni mwˈema kwa wˈale ambˈao tˌumaˈini lˈao ni kwˈake, kwa jˈule ambˈaje hˌumtafˈuta.|0
ni vjˈema kˌuŋɡoɟˈea kwa ˌutulˈivu kwa aɟˈili ja wokˈovu wa bwˈana.|0
ni vjˈema ˈm̩tu kˌutʃukˈua nˈira bˈado aŋɡˈali kiɟˈana.|0
na akˈae pˈeke jˌake ˈawe kˈimja, kwa maˈana bwˈana ˌameiwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
na azˈike ˈuso wˌake mˌavumbˈini bˈado pˌanawˌezekˈana kˌuwa na mˌatumaˈini.|0
na atˈoe ʃˈavu lˈake kwa jˈule ˌampiɡˈaje, na aɟˈazwe na aˈibu.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˈatu hˌawakˌatilˈiwi mbˈali na bwˈana milˈele.|0
iŋɡˈawa hulˈeta huzˈuni, ˌataoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma, kwa kˌuwa upˈendo wˌake ˌusiokˈoma ni m̩kˈuu.|0
kwa maˈana hapˈendi kˌuwaletˈea matˈeso ˌau huzˈuni watˈoto wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
kˌuwapˈonda tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo wafˈuŋɡwa wˈote katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kumɲˈima ˈm̩tu hˈaki zˌake mbˈele za alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana.|0
kumɲˈima ˈm̩tu hˈaki: ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌasiˈone mˈambo kˌama hˈaja.|0
nˈani ˌawezˈaje kusˈema nˈalo lˌikatendˈeka kˌama bwˈana hˌaɟaamˈuru.|0
ɟˈe, si ni kwˈeɲe kˈiɲua tʃa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ndˈiko jˌatokˈako maˈafa na mˈambo mˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu jejˈote alˈije hˈai awˈeza kˌulalamˈika wakˈati ˌanapˌoaðibˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈake.|0
tˌuzitʃuŋɡˈuze ɲɟˈia zˈetu na kˌuziɟarˈibu, na tˌumrudˈie bwˈana mˈuŋɡu.|0
tˌuinˈue miˈojo jˈetu pamˈoɟa na mikˈono jˈetu kwa mˈuŋɡu mbiŋɡˈuni, na tusˈeme.|0
tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi na kuˈasi nˌawe hˌuɟasamˈehe.|0
ˌumeɟˌifunˈika mweɲˈewe kwa hasˈira na kˌutufˌuatilˈia; ˌumetutʃˈiɲɟa bˌila hurˈuma.|0
ˌunaɟˌifunˈika mweɲˈewe kwa wˈiŋɡu, ˌili pasˈiwe na ˈombi lˌitakˌalowˈeza kupˈeɲa.|0
ˌumetufˈaɲa tˌakatˈaka na utʃˈafu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
adˈui zˈetu wˈote wˌamefumbˈua vˈiɲua vjˈao wˈazi ðˈidi jˈetu.|0
tˌumetesˈeka kwa hˈofu kˈuu na ʃˈida ja ɣafˈula, ˌuharibˈifu na mˌaaŋɡamˈizi.|0
viɟˈito vja matʃˈozi vˌinatˌirirˈika kutˈoka matʃˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌatatˌirirˈika matʃˈozi bˌila kukˈoma, bˌila kupˈata nafˈuu.|0
hˌadi bwˈana ˌatazˈame tʃˈini kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kuˈona.|0
lˈile nˌinalˌoliˈona hˌuniletˈea huzˈuni nafsˈini kwa sabˈabu ja wˌanawˈake wˈote wa ˈm̩ɟi wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa adˈui zˈaŋɡu bˌila sabˈabu wˌameniwˈinda kˌama ndˈeɡe.|0
wˌaliɟarˈibu kˌukomˈeʃa maˈiʃa jˈaŋɡu ndˈani ja ʃˈimo na kˌunitupˈia mˈawe.|0
mˈaɟi jˌalifunˈika ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌikafikˈiri nˌilikˈuwa karˈibu kˌukatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
nˌililˌiitˈia ɟˈina lˈako, ˈee bwˈana, kutˈoka vˈina vja ʃˈimo.|0
ˌulisikˈia ˈombi lˈaŋɡu: ˌusikˌizibˈie mˌasikˈio jˈako kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu nˌikuombˈapo msaˈada.|0
ˌulikˈuɟa karˈibu nˌilipˌokuˈita, nˌawe ˌukasˈema, ˌusioɡˈope.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌulitʃukˈua ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu, ˌukaˌukombˈoa uhˈai wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌumeˈona, ˈee bwˈana, ubˈaja nˌiliˌotendˈewa. tetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌumeˈona kˈina tʃa kisˈasi tʃˈao, mˌaʃaˈuri jˈao jˈote mabˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌumesikˈia mˌatukˈano jˈao, mˌaʃaˈuri jˈao jˈote mabˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈile adˈui zˈaŋɡu wˌanatʃˌonoŋɡˈona na kˌunuŋɡˌunikˈia ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu mtʃˈana kˈutwa.|0
wˌatazˈame! wakˈiwa wˌamekˈeti ˌau wˌamesimˈama, wˌananˌiðihˈaki katˌika ɲˈimbo zˈao.|0
ˌuwalˈipe kˈile wˌanatʃˌostahˈili, ˈee bwˈana, kwa jˈale ambˈajo mikˈono jˈao ˌimetˈenda.|0
wˈeka pazˈia ɟˌuːja miˈojo jˈao, laˈana jˈako na ˈiwe ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
wˌafuˌatilˈie katˌika hasˈira na ˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈize kutˈoka tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu za bwˈana.|0
ɟˈinsi ðahˈabu ˌilivjˌopotˈeza m̩ŋɡˈao wˈake, ðahˈabu ilˈijo sˈafi hˌaiŋɡˈai! vˈito vja θamˈani vˌimetawˈaɲua kwˈeɲe mwˈanzo wa kˈila bˌarabˈara.|0
wˈana wa sajˈuni wˌeɲe θamˈani, ambˈao mwˈanzo uzˈito wa θamˈani jˈao ˌulikˈuwa wa ðahˈabu, sˈasa wˌanaˌaŋɡalˈiwa kˌama vjˈuŋɡu vja udˈoŋɡo, kˈazi ja mikˈono ja mfiɲˈanzi.|0
hˌata mbwˈeha hutˈoa matˈiti jˈao kˌuɲoɲˈeʃa watˈoto wˈao, lakˈini wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌamekˈuwa wasˈio na hurˈuma kˌama mbˈuni ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja kˈiu ulˈimi wa mtˈoto mtʃˈaŋɡa ˌumeɡˌandamˈana na kˌaakˈaa la kˈiɲua tʃˈake, watˈoto huˈomba mkˈate, lakˈini hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawapˈaje.|0
wˈale wˌaliokˈula vjakˈula vja kˌifahˈari ni maskˈini bˌarabarˈani. wˈale wˌaliokˈuzwa wˌakivˈaa ŋɡˈuo za zˌambarˈau sˈasa wˌanalalˈia maɟˈivu.|0
aðˈabu ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ni kˈubwa kulˈiko ˈile ja sodˈoma, ambˈajo ˌilipˌindulˈiwa ɣafˈula bˌila kuwˈepo mkˈono wa msaˈada.|0
wakˈuu wˌao wˌalikˈuwa wˌameŋɡˈaa kulˈiko θelˈuɟi na weˈupe kulˈiko mazˈiwa, miˈili jˈao ˌilikˈuwa mjekˈundu kulˈiko mˌariɟˈani, kˌuonekˈana kwˈao kˌama jakˈuti samˈawi.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ni weˈusi kulˈiko masˈizi; hˌawatˌambulikˈani bˌarabarˈani. ŋɡˈozi jˈao ˌimeʃˌikamˈana ɟˌuːja mifˈupa jˈao, ˌimekˈuwa mikˈavu kˌama fˈimbo.|0
wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa ni bˈora kulˈiko wˈale wˌanaokˈufa ɲɟˈaa; wˌanatesˈeka kwa ɲɟˈaa, wˌanatˌokomˈea kwa kukˈosa tʃakˈula kutˈoka ʃambˈani.|0
kwa mikˈono jˈao weɲˈewe wˌanawˈake wˌeɲe hurˈuma wˌanapˈika watˈoto wˌao weɲˈewe, wˌaliokˈuwa tʃakˈula tʃˈao wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌalipˌoaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
bwˈana ˌametˈoa nafˈasi kˌamilˈifu ja ɣaðˈabu jˈake; ˌameimwˈaɡa hasˈira jˌake kˈali. ˌamewˈaʃa mˈoto katˌika sajˈuni ambˈao ˌumetˌeketˈeza misˈiŋɡi jˈake.|0
wafˈalme wa dunˈia hˌawakˌuamˈini, wˈala ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa dˌuniˈani, kwˌamba adˈui na watˈesi wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
lakˈini hˈili lˌilitokˈea kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi za mˌanabˈii wˈake, na maˈovu ja mˌakuhˈani wˈake, wˌaliomwˈaɡa ndˈani jˌake dˈamu ja wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
sˈasa wˌanapapˈasa papˈasa bˌarabarˈani kˌama wˈatu ambˈao ni vipˈofu. wˌamenˌaɟisˈiwa kabˈisa kwa dˈamu, hˌata hakˈuna ˌanajˌeθubˈutu kuɡˈusa mavˈazi jˈao.|0
wˈatu wˌanawˌapiɡˈia kelˈele, ˌondokˈeni! nˈiɲi ni naɟˈisi! ˌondokˈeni! ˌondokˈeni! msˌituɡˈuse! wˌanapˌokimbˈia na kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa hˈuku na hˌuko, wˈatu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa wˌanasˈema, hˌawawˈezi kukˈaa hˈapa zaˈidi.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈewe ˌamewˌatawˈaɲa; hˌawaˌaŋɡalˈii tˈena. mˌakuhˈani hˌawaoɲˈeʃwi heʃˈima, wazˈee hˌawakˌubalˈiki.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, mˈatʃo jˈetu jˌalitʃˈoka, kwa kˌutazamˈia bˈure msaˈada; tˌuliˌaŋɡalˈia kutˈoka minˈara jˈetu kwa taˈifa lˌisilowˈeza kˌutuokˈoa.|0
wˈatu wˌalitˌuvizˈia katˌika kˈila hatˈua hˌata hˌatukuwˈeza kˌutembˈea katˌika bˌarabˈara zˈetu. mwˈiʃo wˈetu ˌulikˈuwa karˈibu, sˈiku zˈetu zˌilikˈuwa zˌimetimˈia, kwa maˈana mwˈiʃo wˈetu ˌulikˈuwa ˌumefˈika.|0
wˌaliˌotufˌuatˈia wˌalikˈuwa wepˈesi kulˈiko tˈai aŋɡˈani; wˌalitusˈaka ɟˈuu mˌilimˈani na kˌutuvizˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
mpˈakwa mafˈuta wa bwˈana, pˈumzi ja uhˈai wˈetu hˈasa, ˌalinˈaswa katˌika mitˈeɡo jˈao. tˌulifikˈiri kwˌamba tʃˈini ja kivˈuli tʃˈake tˌuŋɡeliwˈeza kuˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
ʃˌaŋɡilˈia na ˌufurˈahi, ˈee bˈinti edˈomu, wˌewe ˌunajeˈiʃi ˈn̩tʃi ja ˈusi. lakˈini kwˈako pˈia kikˈombe kˌitapitˈiʃwa, ˌutalˈewa na kˌuvulˈiwa ŋɡˈuo ubˈaki ˈutʃi.|0
ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni, aðˈabu jˈako ˌitaˈiʃa, hˌatarefˈuʃa mˈuda wˈako wa kukˈaa ˌuhamiʃˈoni. lakˈini, ˈee bˈinti edˈomu, ˌataaðˈibu ðˈambi jˈako, na ˌatafunˈua uˈovu wˈako.|0
kumbˈuka, ˈee bwˈana, jˌalijˌotupˈata, tazˈama, nˌawe ˌuiˈone aˈibu jˈetu.|0
urˈiθi wˈetu ˌumeɡˌeuzˈiwa kwa waɡˈeni, na ɲˈumba zˈetu kwa waɡˈeni.|0
tˌumekˈuwa jatˈima wasˈio na bˈaba, mˈama zˈetu wˌamekˈuwa kˌama waɟˈane.|0
ni lazˈima tˌununˈue mˈaɟi tˌunajokˈuɲua, kˈuni zˈetu zˌapatikˈana tu kwa kˌununˈua.|0
wˌanaˌotufˌuatilˈia wˈapo kwˈeɲe vˌisiɡˈino vjˈetu, tˌumetʃˈoka na hakˈuna pumzˈiko.|0
tˌumeɟˌitolˈea kwa mˈisri na aʃˈuru tupˈate tʃakˈula tʃa kutˈoʃa.|0
bˈaba zˈetu wˌalitˈenda ðˈambi na hawˈapo tˈena, na sˌisi tˌunatʃukˈua aðˈabu jˈao.|0
watˈumwa wˌanatˌutawˈala na hakˈuna wa kˌutuokˈoa mˌikonˈoni jˈao.|0
tˌunapˈata tʃakˈula tʃˈetu kwa kˌuhatarˈiʃa maˈiʃa jˈetu kwa sabˈabu ja upˈaŋɡa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
ŋɡˈozi jˈetu ˈina ɟˈoto kˌama tanˈuru, kwa sabˈabu ja faðˈaa ˌitokanˈajo na ɲɟˈaa.|0
wˌanawˈake wˌametˈendwa ɟeˈuri katˌika sajˈuni, na mˌabikˈira katˌika mˈiɟi ja jˈuda.|0
wakˈuu wˌametuŋɡˈikwa ɟˈuu kwa mikˈono jˈao, wazˈee hˌawapˈewi heʃˈima.|0
viɟˈana wˌanatˌaabˈika kwˈeɲe mˈawe ja kˌusaɡˈia, wˌavulˈana wˌanajˌumbajˈumba tʃˈini ja mizˈiɡo ja kˈuni.|0
tˈaɟi ˌimeaŋɡˈuka kutˈoka kitʃwˈani pˈetu. ˈole wˈetu, kwa maˈana tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˈijo, miˈojo jˈetu ˌinazimˈia, kwa sabˈabu ja hˈajo, mˈatʃo jˈetu jˌamefifˈia.|0
kwa nˈini wˌatusahˈau sˈiku zˈote? kwa nˈini ˌumetuˈatʃa kwa mˈuda mrˈefu.|0
tˌurudˈiʃe kwˈako mweɲˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌili tupˈate kurˈudi. zifˈaɲe ˈm̩pja sˈiku zˈetu kˌama sˈiku za kˈale.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa θˌelaθˈini, mwˈezi wa ˈn̩ne, sˈiku ja tˈano ja mwˈezi, wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌaliokˈuwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari, mbˈiŋɡu zˌilifuŋɡˈuka nˌami nˌikaˈona maˈono ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja tˈano ja mwˈezi, ˌilikˈuwa mwˈaka wa tˈano wa kˌuhamˈiʃwa kwa mfˈalme jˌehajakˈini.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia ˌezekiˈeli kuhˈani, mwˈana wa bˈuzi, kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo. hˌuko mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
nˌilitazˈama, nˌikaˈona ðorˈuba kˈubwa ˌikitˈoka kˌaskazˈini, wˈiŋɡu kˈubwa sˈana pamˈoɟa likˈiwa na umˈeme wa rˈadi likˈiwa lˌimezuŋɡˈukwa na mwˈaŋɡa mkˈali. kˌatikˈati ja hˈuo mˈoto kˌulikˈuwa kˌama rˈaŋɡi ja maɲɟˈano ja tʃˈuma kˌinapokˈuwa ndˈani ja mˈoto.|0
katˌika ˈule mˈoto kˌulikˈuwa na kˈitu kˌinatʃˌofanˈana na viˈumbe vˈinne vjˌeɲe uhˈai. katˌika kˌuonekˈana kwˈake vˌilikˈuwa na ˈumbo mfˈano wa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
lakˈini kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌilikˈuwa na ɲˈuso ˈn̩ne na mabˈawa mˈanne.|0
miɡˈuu jˈao ˌilikˈuwa ˌimeɲoˈoka, ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈao zˌilikˈuwa kˌama kwˈato za miɡˈuu ja ndˈama, nˈazo zˌilimˌetamˈeta kˌama ʃˈaba ˌilijˌosuɡulˈiwa.|0
tʃˈini ja mabˈawa jˈao katˌika pˈande zˈao ˈn̩ne wˌalikˈuwa na mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu. wˈote wˈanne wˌalikˈuwa na ɲˈuso na mabˈawa.|0
nˈajo mabˈawa jˈao jˌaliɡusˈana. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikwˈenda kˌuelekˈea mbˈele mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa, hˌawakˌuɡeˈuka wˌalipokˈuwa wˌanatembˈea.|0
kˌuonekˈana kwa ɲˈuso zˈao kˌulikˈuwa hˈivi: kˈila mmˈoɟa wa wˈale wˈanne ˌalikˈuwa na ˈuso wa mwˌanadˈamu na kwa upˈande wa kulˈia kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na ˈuso wa sˈimba, upˈande wa kuʃˈoto ˌalikˈuwa na ˈuso wa ŋɡˈombe pˈia kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na ˈuso wa tˈai.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo zˌilivjokˈuwa ɲˈuso zˈao. mabˈawa jˈao jˌalikˌuɲɟulˈiwa kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa mawˈili ambˈajo kˈila mˈoɟa lˌiliɡˈusa bˈawa la mwenzˈake kˈila upˈande na mabˈawa meŋɡˈine mawˈili jˌakifunˈika mwˈili wˈake.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikwˈenda kˌuelekˈea mbˈele mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa. popˈote rˈoho ˌalipotˈaka kwˈenda, ndˈipo wˌalipokwˈenda pasˈipo kˌuɡeˈuka.|0
kˌuonekˈana kwa vˈile viˈumbe hˈai kˌatikˈati kˌulikˈuwa kˌama makˈaa ja mˈawe jˌanajowˈaka ˌau kˌama miˈeŋɡe. mˈoto ˈule ˌulikˈuwa ˌukiˈenda mbˈele na ɲˈuma kˌatikˈati ja vˈile viˈumbe, ˌulikˈuwa na mwaŋɡˈaza mkˈali na kˌatikˈati ja ˈule mˈoto kˌulitˈoka kˌimulimˈuli kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
vˈile viˈumbe vˌilipˈiɡa m̩bˈio kwˈenda na kurˈudi, kˌama vˌimulimˈuli vja umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa nˌikitazˈama vˈile viˈumbe hˈai, nˌiliˈona ɡˌurudˈumu mˈoɟa ɟˌuːja ˈarði kˈando ja kˈila kiˈumbe kikˈiwa na ɲˈuso zˌake ˈn̩ne.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌilivjokˈuwa kˌuonekˈana kwa hˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu na muˈundo wˈake: jˌaliŋɡˈaa kˌama zˌabaraɟˈadi, nˈajo jˈote mˈanne jˌalifanˈana. kˈila ɡˌurudˈumu lˌilikˈuwa na ɡˌurudˈumu ɟiŋɡˈine ndˈani jˈake.|0
jˌalipokwˈenda jˌaliˌelekˈea upˈande wowˈote wa pˈande ˈn̩ne wˌalipˌoelekˈea wˈale viˈumbe, mˌaɡurudˈumu hˌajakˌuzuŋɡˈuka wakˈati viˈumbe vˈile vˌilipokwˈenda.|0
kˈiŋɡo zˌake zˌilikˈuwa ndˈefu kwˈenda ɟˈuu na za kutˈiʃa, nˈazo zˈote ˈn̩ne zˌiliɟˈawa na mˈatʃo pˈande zˈote.|0
vˈile viˈumbe hˈai vˌilipokwˈenda, mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌalijokˈuwa kˈando jˈao jˌalisoɡˈea na wakˈati hˈivjo viˈumbe hˈai vˌilipˌoinˈuka kutˈoka arðˈini mˌaɡurudˈumu nˈajo jˌaliinˈuka.|0
mahˈali popˈote rˈoho ˌalipokwˈenda wˈale viˈumbe nˌao wˌalikwˈenda, nˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌaliinˈuka pamˈoɟa nˈavjo, kwa sabˈabu rˈoho ja vˈile viˈumbe hˈai ˌalikˈuwa ndˈani ja hˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu.|0
wakˈati viˈumbe vˈile vˌilipˌosoɡˈea, nˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌalisoɡˈea, viˈumbe vˌilipˌosimˈama kˈimja, nˈajo pˈia jˌalisimˈama kˈimja, viˈumbe vˌilipˌoinˈuka ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌaliˌinulˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈavjo kwa kˌuwa rˈoho ja hˈivjo viˈumbe hˈai ˌalikˈuwa ndˈani ja hˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu.|0
ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja hˈao viˈumbe hˈai pˌalikˈuwa na kˈitu mfˈano wa enˈeo lˌililokˈuwa wˈazi, lˌililokˈuwa aŋɡˈavu kabˈisa na lˈeɲe kutˈiʃa.|0
tʃˈini ja hˈijo nafˈasi mabˈawa jˈao jˌalitˈanda mˈoɟa kˌuelekˈea ɟiŋɡˈine, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa meŋɡˈine mawˈili jˌalijˌofunˈika mwˈili wˈake.|0
viˈumbe wˈale wˌalipˌosoɡˈea nˌilisikˈia saˈuti ja mabˈawa jˈao, kˌama ŋɡurˈumo ja mˈaɟi jˌaendˈajo kˈasi, kˌama saˈuti ja mweɲˈezi, kˌama mˌakelˈele ja ɟˈeʃi. wˌalipˌosimˈama kˈimja wˌaliʃˈuʃa mabˈawa jˈao.|0
ndˈipo ikˈaɟa saˈuti tˌoka ɟˌuːja ˈile nafˈasi ja wˈazi ˌilijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao, wˌalipˌosimˈama mabˈawa jˈao jakˈiwa jˌameʃˈuʃwa.|0
nˌikaˈona kwˌamba kˌutokˈana na kˈile nˌilitʃoˈona kˌama kiˈuno tʃˈake kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu ˌaliˌonekˈana kˌama tʃˈuma ˌinajowˈaka kˈana kwˌamba ˌimeɟˈaa mˈoto na kˌuanzˈia kiˈuno kwˈenda tʃˈini ˌaliˌonekˈana kˌama mˈoto na mwˈaŋɡa mkˈali ˌulimzuŋɡˈuka.|0
kˌama vˈile kˌuonekˈana kwa upˈinde wa mvˈua mˌawiŋɡˈuni sˈiku ja mvˈua, ndˈivjo ˌulivjokˈuwa ˈule m̩ŋɡˈao ˌuliˌomzuŋɡˈuka. hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌilivjokˈuwa kˌuonekˈana kwa ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana. nˌilipˌouˈona, nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, nˌikasikˈia saˈuti ja ˈm̩tu ˌanaoŋɡˈea.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, simˈama kwa miɡˈuu jˈako nˌami nˌitasˈema nˈawe.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakioŋɡˈea nˈami, rˈoho ˌakaniɟˈia na kˌunisˌimamˈiʃa wˈima, nˌikamsikˈia ˌakisˈema nˈami.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia: mwˌanadˈamu, nˌinakutˈuma kwa wˌaisraˈeli, kwa taˈifa ˈasi ambˈalo lˌimeniˈasi mˈimi, wˌao na bˈaba zˈao wˌananˌikosˈea mˌimi hˌadi lˈeo.|0
wˈatu ambˈao nˌinakutˈuma kwˈao ni wˌapotˈovu na wˌakaˈidi. wˌaambˈie, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌanavjosˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
kˌama wˌatasˌikilˈiza ˌau hˌawatˌasikilˈiza, kwa kˌuwa wˌao ni ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi, wˌataɟˈua nabˈii ˌamekˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
nˌawe mwˌanadˈamu, ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope wˌao wˈala manˈeno jˈao, ˌusioɡˈope, iŋɡˈawa mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba vˌinakˌuzuŋɡˈuka na ˌunaˈiʃi kˌatikˈati ja ŋɡˈe. ˌusioɡˈope jˈale wˌasemˈajo wˈala ˌusitˈiʃwe nˈao, iŋɡˈawa wˌao ni ɲˈumba ja uˈasi.|0
wˌewe lazˈima ˌuwaambˈie manˈeno jˈaŋɡu, ikˈiwa wˌanasˌikilˈiza ˌau hˌawasˌikilˈizi, kwa kˌuwa wˌao ni wˈatu waˈasi.|0
lakˈini wˌewe mwˌanadˈamu, sˌikilˈiza nˌinalˌokuambˈia. usˈiwe mwˌeɲe kuˈasi kˌama hˈijo ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi. fuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈako na ˈule nˌikupˈatʃo.|0
ndˈipo nˌikatazˈama, nˌami nˌikaˈona mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa kˌuniˌelekˈea. nˌao ˌulikˈuwa na ˌukurˈasa wa kitˈabu.|0
ambˈao ˌaliˌukuɲɟˈua mbˈele jˈaŋɡu. pˈande zˈote mbˈili ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeandˈikwa manˈeno ja mˌaombolˈezo, vilˈio na ˈole.|0
nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, kˈula kˈile kˌilitʃˈoko mbˈele jˈako, kˈula hˈuu ˌukurˈasa wa kitˈabu, kˈiʃa uˈende ˌukasˈeme na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo nˌikafuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakanilˈiʃa ˈule ˌukurˈasa wa kitˈabu.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, kˈula ˌukurˈasa hˈuu wa kitˈabu nˌinaokˈupa uɟˈaze tˈumbo lˈako. kwa hˈijo nˌikaˈula, ˌulikˈuwa mtˈamu kˌama asˈali kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, sˈasa nˈenda katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌukasˈeme nˌao manˈeno jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌukutˈumwa kwa taˈifa lˈeɲe manˈeno ja kˌutatˈiza na lˈuɣa ŋɡˈumu, bˌali kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
sˌikukutˈuma kwa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jˌeɲe manˈeno ja kˌutatˈiza na lˈuɣa ŋɡˈumu ambˈao manˈeno jˈao hˌutajˌaelˈewa. hakˈika nˌiŋɡekutˈuma kwa wˈatu hˈao, wˌaŋɡekˌusikilˈiza.|0
lakˈini ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli hˌaitˌakusˌikilˈiza kwa kˌuwa hawˈako rˈaði kˌunisˌikilˈiza mˈimi, kwa kˌuwa ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ni wˌeɲe vipˈaɟi vja ɲˈuso viɡˈumu na miˈojo ja ˌukaˈidi.|0
tazˈama nˌimefˈaɲa ˈuso wˈako mɡˈumu ðˈidi ja ɲˈuso zˈao na kipˈaɟi tʃa ˈuso wˈako kiɡˈumu ðˈidi ja vipˈaɟi vja ɲˈuso zˈao.|0
kˌama vˈile almˈasi ilˈivjo ŋɡˈumu kulˈiko ɡˌumeɡˈume, ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌokifˈaɲa kipˈaɟi tʃa ˈuso wˈako. ˌusiwˌaoɡˈope wˈala ˌusiwahˈofu, ˌiɟapokˈuwa ni ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi.|0
nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, sˌikilˈiza kwa makˈini na ˌujatˈie mojˈoni mwˈako manˈeno jˈote nˌitakˌajosˈema nˈawe.|0
kˈiʃa nˈenda kwa wˈatu wa taˈifa lˈako walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni, ˌukasˈeme nˈao. wˌaambˈie, hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈavjo, kwˌamba wˌatasˌikilˈiza ˌau hˌawatˌasikilˈiza.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho ˌakanˌiinˈua, nˌikasikˈia saˈuti kˈubwa ɲˈuma jˈaŋɡu ja ŋɡurˈumo. ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana na ˌutukˈuzwe katˌika mahˈali pa makˈao jˈake!.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho ˌalipˌoniinˈua na kˌunipelˈeka mbˈali. nˌikaˈenda nikˈiwa na utʃˈuŋɡu na hasˈira mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, nˌao mkˈono wa bwˈana ukˈiwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌikafˈika kwa wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni hˌuko tˈel abˈibu karˈibu na ˈm̩to kebˈari. nˌikakˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba, nikˈiwa nˌimeɟˈawa na mʃaŋɡˈao.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈizo sˈiku sˈaba nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, nˌimekufˈaɲa ˈuwe mlˈinzi wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwa hˈijo sikˈia nˈeno nˌisemˈalo, ˌukawˈape ˈoɲo lˌitokˈalo kwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimwambiˈapo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, hakˈika ˌutakˈufa, na wˌewe ˌusipomwˈoɲa ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌau kˌumʃaˈuri aˈatʃe ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja ˌili kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake, hˈujo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌatakˈufa katˌika ðˈambi jˌake na dˈamu jˌake nˌitaidˈai mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
lakˈini ˌukimwˈoɲa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu nˌaje ˌakakatˈaa kuˈatʃa uˈovu wˌake na ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja, ˌatakˈufa katˌika ðˈambi jˈake, lakˈini wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa ˌumeɟˌiokˈoa nˈafsi jˈako.|0
tˈena, ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌakiˈatʃa hˈaki jˌake na kutˈenda maˈovu, nˌami nˌikawˈeka kikwˈazo mbˈele jˌake ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌatakˈufa. kwa kˌuwa hˌukumwˈoɲa, ˌatakˈufa katˌika ðˈambi jˈake. mˈambo ja hˈaki ˌalijotˈenda, hˌajatˌakumbˈukwa, dˈamu jˌake nˌitaidˈai mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
lakˈini ˌukimwˈoɲa mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌasitˈende ðˈambi na ˌakaˈatʃa kutˈenda ðˈambi, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi kwa sabˈabu ˌalipokˈea maˈoɲo na ˌutakˈuwa ˌumeɟˌiokˈoa nˈafsi jˈako.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu hˌuko, nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia, simˈama uˈende mpˈaka sehˈemu tˌambarˈare, nˌami nˌitasˈema nˌawe hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliinˈuka nˌikaˈenda mpˈaka mahˈali pa tˌambarˈare. ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ˌumesimˈama hˌuko, kˌama ˌutukˈufu ˈule nˌiliˌouˈona kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari, nˌami nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho akˈaɟa ndˈani jˈaŋɡu ˌakanˌisimamˈiʃa kwa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu. ˌakasˈema nˌami ˌakanˌiambˈia: nˈenda ˌukaɟˌifuŋɡˈie ndˈani ja ɲˈumba jˈako.|0
nˈawe, ˈee mwˌanadˈamu, wˌatakufˈuŋɡa kwa kˈamba, wˌatakufˈuŋɡa ˌili ˌusiwˈeze kutˈoka na kˌuwaendˈea wˈatu.|0
nˌitaufˈaɲa ulˈimi wˈako ˌuʃikamˈane kwˈeɲe kˈaa la kˈiɲua tʃˈako, ˌili ˈuwe kˈimja ˌusiwˈeze kˌuwakemˈea, wˌaɟapokˈuwa ni ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi.|0
lakˈini nˌitakˌaposˈema nˈawe, nˌitafuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈako nˌawe ˌutawˌaambˈia, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo. jejˈote ˌatakˌajesˌikilˈiza na ˌasikilˈize, na jejˈote ˌatakˌajekatˈaa na ˌakatˈae; kwa kˌuwa wˌao ni ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, sˈasa tʃukˈua tofˈali, ˌuliwˈeke mbˈele jˈako na utʃˈore ɟˈuu jˌake ramˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌuuziŋɡˈire: sˌimamˈiʃa askˈari ðˈidi jˌake kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka, ˌuzuŋɡˈuke kwa maɟˈeʃi, wˈeka kˈambi ðˈidi jˌake pˈande zˈote pamˈoɟa na maɡˈoɡo ja kˌubomolˈea bˈoma vitˈani.|0
kˈiʃa tʃukˈua bˈamba la tʃˈuma, ˌukalˌisimamˈiʃe lˈiwe kˌama ukˈuta wa tʃˈuma kˈati jˈako na hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, nˌawe ˌuuˌelekˈeze ˈuso wˈako. hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˈuwa katˌika hˈali ja kˌuziŋɡˈirwa, nˌawe ˌutaˌuziŋɡˈira. hˌii ˌitakˈuwa iʃˈara kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa ulˈale kwa upˈande wˈako wa kuʃˈoto na uwˈeke ðˈambi za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌutazibˈeba ðˈambi zˈao kwa idˈadi ja sˈiku ˌutakˌazolˈala kwa hˈuo upˈande mmˈoɟa.|0
nˌimekˌupaŋɡˈia idˈadi ja sˈiku kˌama miˈaka ja ðˈambi jˈao. kwa hˈijo kwa sˈiku mˌiatˈatunˌa tisˈini ˌutabˈeba ðˈambi za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
baˌada ja kˌumalˈiza hˈili, lˈala tʃˈini tˈena, wakˈati hˈuu ulˈale tʃˈini kwa upˈande wa kuˈume, ˌutʃukˈue ðˈambi za ɲˈumba ja jˈuda. nˌimekˌupaŋɡˈia sˈiku ˌarobaˈini, sˈiku mˈoɟa kwa kˈila mwˈaka mmˈoɟa.|0
ɡeˈuza ˈuso wˈako ˌuelekˈeze kwˈeɲe kˌuziŋɡˈirwa kwa jˌerusalˈemu na mkˈono wˈako ambˈao hˌaukuvˈikwa ŋɡˈuo tabˈiri ðˈidi jˈake.|0
nˌitakufˈuŋɡa kwa kˈamba ˌili ˌusiwˈeze kˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka upˈande mmˈoɟa hˌadi upˈande mwiŋɡˈine, mpˈaka hˈapo ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumetimˈiza sˈiku za kˌuziŋɡˈirwa kwˈako.|0
tʃukˈua ŋɡˈano na ʃajˈiri, mˌaharˈaɡwe na dˈeŋɡu, mtˈama na mawˈele, ˌuviwˈeke na kˌuvihifˈaði vjˈote kwˈeɲe ɡˌudulˈia la kˌuhifaðˈia, na ˌuvitumˈie kˌuɟitˌeŋɡenezˈea mkˈate. ˌutaˈula mkˈate hˈuo kwa hˈizo sˈiku mˌiatˈatunˌa tisˈini ˌutakˌazokˈuwa ˌumelˈala kwa upˈande mmˈoɟa.|0
pˈima ʃekˈeli ˌiʃirˈini za tʃakˈula ˌutakˌatʃokˈula kwa kˈila sˈiku, nˌawe ˌutakˈula kwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa.|0
pˈia pˈima mˈaɟi mˈoɟa ja sˈita ja hˈini, nˌawe ˌutakˈuɲua kwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈaŋɡwa.|0
nˌawe ˌutakˈula tʃakˈula kˌama vˈile ambˈavjo ˌuŋɡekˈula mkˈate wa ʃajˈiri, uˈoke mkˈate mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja wˈatu, ˌukitumˈia kiɲˈesi tʃa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
bwˈana ˌakasˈema, hˈivi ndˈivjo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌavjokˈula tʃakˈula kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa nˌinakˌowapelˈeka.|0
ndˈipo nˌikasˈema, sˈivjo bwˈana mweɲˈezi! kˈamwe mˌimi sˌiɟaɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi. ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu hˌadi sˈasa siɟˈala kˈamwe kˈitu tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃokˈufa ˌau kˌilitʃˌorarulˈiwa na waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni. hakˈuna ɲˈama jejˈote naɟˈisi ˌilijˌoiŋɡˈia kˌiɲuˈani mwˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakasˈema, vˈema sˈana, bˌasi nˌitakˌuruhˈusu uˈoke mkˈate wˈako kwa kˌutumˈia kiɲˈesi tʃa ŋɡˈombe badˈala ja kiɲˈesi tʃa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
ndˈipo mˈuŋɡu ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, mˌimi nˌitakˌatilˈia mbˈali ˌupatˌikanˈaɟi wa tʃakˈula katˌika jˌerusalˈemu. wˈatu wˌatakˈula tʃakˈula tʃa kupˈimwa kwa wˌasiwˈasi pamˈoɟa na mˈaɟi ja kˌupimˈiwa kwa kukˈata tamˈaa.|0
kwa kˌuwa tʃakˈula na mˈaɟi vˌitakˈuwa adˈimu. wˌatastˌaɟabiˈana kˈila mmˈoɟa, nˌao wˌataðˌoofˈika kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi jˈao.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, sˈasa tʃukˈua upˈaŋɡa mkˈali na ˌuutumˈie kˌama wˈembe wa kiɲˈozi ˌili kˌuɲolˈea ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈako na ndˈevu zˈako. kˈiʃa ˌutʃukˈue mizˈani ja kˌupimˈia ˌukazˌiɡawˈaɲe ɲuˈele hˈizo.|0
wakˈati sˈiku zˈako za kˌuziŋɡˈirwa zˌitakˌapokwˈiʃa, tʃˈoma θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja hˈizo ɲuˈele zˈako kwa mˈoto ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi. tʃukˈua θelˈuθi ɲiŋɡˈine ja hˈizo ɲuˈele ˌuzipˈiɡe kwa upˈaŋɡa kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi wˈote na θelˈuθi ɲiŋɡˈine ja mwˈiʃo ˌutaˌitawˈaɲa kwa upˈepo. kwa kˌuwa nˌitawˌafuatˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌuliofˈutwa.|0
lakˈini tʃukˈua ɲuˈele tʃˈatʃe ˌuzifuŋɡˈie ndˈani ja pˈindo la vˈazi lˈako.|0
tˈena tʃukˈua ɲuˈele ɲiŋɡˈine tʃˈatʃe ˌuzitˈupe motˈoni ˌuzitˌeketˈeze. mˈoto ˌutaenˈea kutˈoka hˈumo na kufˈika katˌika ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hˈuu n̩dˈio jˌerusalˈemu ambˈao nˌimeuwˈeka kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa ukˈiwa ˌumezuŋɡˈukwa na ˈn̩tʃi pˈande zˈote.|0
lakˈini katˌika uˈovu wˌake ˌumeˈasi ʃerˈia na ˈamri zˈaŋɡu kulˈiko mˌataˈifa na ˈn̩tʃi zˌinazˌouzuŋɡˈuka. ˌumeˈasi ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu wˈala hˌaukˌufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˈiɲi mmekˈuwa wˌakaˈidi kulˈiko mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka na hˌamkufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu. wˈala hˌamkuwˈeza hˌata kˌuzifuˈata kˌawaˈida za mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo, mˌimi mweɲˈewe, nˈiko kiɲˈume nˌaɲi jˌerusalˈemu, nˌitawapˈiɡa kwa aðˈabu jˈaŋɡu mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja sanˈamu zˈenu zˈote za mˌatʃukˈizo, nˌitawˌafaɲˈia kˈile ambˈatʃo kˈamwe sˌiɟawˌafaɲˈia kˈabla wˈala kˈamwe sˌitawˌafaɲˈia tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo kˌatikˈati jˈenu bˈaba wˌatakˈula watˈoto wˌao na watˈoto wˌatakˈula bˈaba zˈao. nˌitawapˈiɡa kwa aðˈabu, nˌami nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa wˈatu wˈenu wˌaliˌonusurˈika pˈande zˈote za dunˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, kwa kˌuwa mmˌenaɟˈisi mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu kwa sanˈamu zˈenu m̩bˈaja sˈana na destˈuri zˈenu za mˌatʃukˈizo, mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitaondˈoa faðˈili zˈaŋɡu kwˈenu.|0
θelˈuθi ja wˈatu wˈako wˌatakˈufa kwa taˈuni ˌau kwa ɲɟˈaa hˈumu ndˈani jˈako, θelˈuθi ɲiŋɡˈine ˌitaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa ɲɟˈe ja kˈuta zˈako, nˈajo θelˈuθi ɲiŋɡˈine nˌitaˌitawˈaɲa kwˈeɲe pˈande ˈn̩ne kˌuwafˌuatˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌuliofˈutwa.|0
ndˈipo hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌitakˌapokˈoma na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao ˌitatulˈia, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa nˌimelipˈiza kisˈasi. baˌada ja kˌuimalˈiza ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao, wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena katˌika wˈivu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitakˌuaŋɡamˈiza na kˌukufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌokuzuŋɡˈuka, matʃˈoni pa wˈatu wˈote wˌapitˈao karˈibu nˈawe.|0
ˌutakˈuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na tʃa aˈibu, tʃa ðihˈaka, ˈovjo na kˈitu tʃa kutˈiʃa kwa mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌokuzuŋɡˈuka, nˌitakˌapokupˈiɡa kwa aðˈabu jˈaŋɡu katˌika hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu kwa kˌukukemˈea kwa ukˈali. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema.|0
nˌitakˌapokupˈiɡa kwa miʃˈale jˈaŋɡu ja kufˈiʃa na jˌeɲe kˌuharˈibu ja ɲɟˈaa, nˌitaipˈiɡa ˌili kˌukuˌaŋɡamˈiza. nˌitalˈeta ɲɟˈaa zaˈidi na zaˈidi ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌukomˈeʃa ˌupatˌikanˈaɟi wa tʃakˈula kwˈako.|0
nˌitapelˈeka ɲɟˈaa na waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni ðˈidi jˈenu, nˈavjo vˌitawaˈatʃa bˌila watˈoto. taˈuni na ˌumwaɡˈaɟi wa dˈamu ˌutapˈita kˌatikˈati jˈenu, nˌami nˌitalˈeta upˈaŋɡa ɟˈuu jˈenu. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena hˈaja.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˈako kˌukabˈili milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌutabˈiri ðˈidi jˈake.|0
na usˈeme: ˈee milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana mweɲˈezi. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌaliˌambiˈajo milˈima na vilˈima, maɡˈeŋɡe na mabˈonde: nˌinakˌaribˈia kulˈeta upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌami nˌitapˌaharˈibu mahˈali pˈenu pˈote pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌaðabˈahu jˈenu jˌatabˌomolˈewa na mˌaðabˈahu jˈenu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba jˌatavˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟua, nˌami nˌitawatʃˈiɲɟa wˈatu wˈenu mbˈele ja sanˈamu zˈenu.|0
nˌitazilˈaza maˈiti za wˌaisraˈeli mbˈele ja sanˈamu zˈao, nˌami nˌitatawˈaɲa mifˈupa jˈenu kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mˌaðabˈahu jˈenu.|0
popˈote mnˌapoˈiʃi, mˈiɟi hˈijo ˌitafˈaɲua ukˈiwa na mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pˌatabˌomolˈewa, ˌili mˌaðabˈahu jˈenu ifˈaɲue ukˈiwa na kˌuharibˈiwa, sanˈamu zˈenu zˌitavˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟua na kˌuharibˈiwa, mˌaðabˈahu jˈenu ja kˌufukizˈia uvˈumba jˌatabˌomolˈewa na kˈila mlˌitʃokifˈaɲa kˌitakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali.|0
wˈatu wˈenu wˌatatʃˈiɲɟua kˌatikˈati jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtˌatambˈua mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
lakˈini nˌitawˌabakˈiza hˈai baˈaði jˈenu, kwa kˌuwa baˈaði jˈenu wˌatanˌusurˈika kˌuuˈawa wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌametˌawaɲˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na mˌataˈifa.|0
ndˈipo katˌika mˌataˈifa ambˈamo wˌatakˈuwa wˌametʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka, wˈale ambˈao wˌatanˌusurˈika wˌatanˌikumbˈuka, ɟˈinsi ambˈavjo nˌimehˌuzunˈiʃwa na miˈojo jˈao ja uzˈinzi, ambˈajo ˌimeɡˌeukˈia mbˈali nˌami na mˈatʃo jˈao ambˈajo jˌametamˈani sanˈamu zˈao. wˌataɟˌitʃukˈia weɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu wˌaliˌoutˈenda na kwa aɟˈili ja destˈuri zˈao za kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
nˌao wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, sˌikuwaˈoɲa bˈure kˌuwa nˌitalˈeta maˈafa hˈajo jˈote ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: pˈiɡa makˈofi, kaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini kwa m̩ɡˈuu na upˈiɡe kelˈele, ˈole! kwa sabˈabu ja maˈovu jˈote na mˌatʃukˈizo jˈote jˌanajofˈaɲua na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni.|0
jˌeje alˈije mbˈali sˈana ˌatakˈufa kwa taˈuni, nˌaje alˈije karˈibu ˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌaje jˈule ˌatakˌajenˌusurˈika na kubˈaki ˌatakˈufa kwa ɲɟˈaa. hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjotimˈiza ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao.|0
nˌao wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, wakˈati maˈiti za wˈatu wˌao zˌitakˌapokˈuwa zˌimelˈala kˌatikˈati ja sanˈamu zˈao kˌuzuŋɡˈuka mˌaðabˈahu jˈao, ɟˌuːja kˈila kilˈima kˌilitʃˌoinˈuka na ɟˌuːja vilˈele vjˈote vja milˈima, tʃˈini ja kˈila ˈm̩ti ˌuliotˈanda na kˈila mwalˈoni wˌeɲe maɟˈani, jaˈani, sehˈemu wˌalizˌofukizˈia uvˈumba kwa sanˈamu zˈao zˈote.|0
nˌami nˌitaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao na kˌuifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ukˈiwa, kˌuanzˈia ɟaŋɡwˈani hˌadi dˈibla, kˈila mahˈali wˌanapoˈiʃi. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua ja kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kwa ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli: mwˈiʃo! mwˈiʃo ˌumekˈuɟa ɟˌuːja pˈembe ˈn̩ne za ˈn̩tʃi.|0
sˈasa mwˈiʃo ˌumekˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu nˌami nˌitamwˈaɡa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu. nˌitawˌahukˈumu sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈenu na kˌuwalipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja destˈuri zˈenu zˈote za kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
sˌitawˌaonˈea hurˈuma wˈala sˌitawˌarehˈemu, hakˈika nˌitalipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja matˈendo jˈenu na destˈuri zˈenu za mˌatʃukˈizo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: maˈafa! maˈafa ambˈajo hˌajaɟˌasikˈiwa jˌanakˈuɟa.|0
mwˈiʃo ˌumewadˈia! mwˈiʃo ˌumewadˈia! ˌumeɟˌiinˈua weɲˈewe ðˈidi jˈenu. ˌumewadˈia.|0
mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌamekˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. wakˈati ˌumewadˈia, sˈiku ˌimekˌaribˈia, kˈuna hˈofu kˈuu ja ɣafˈula, wˈala si furˈaha, ɟˌuːja milˈima.|0
nˌinakˌaribˈia kumwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈenu na kˌumalˈiza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈenu, nˌitawˌahukˈumu sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈenu na kˌuwalipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja destˈuri zˈenu zˈote za mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
sˌitawˌaonˈea hurˈuma wˈala sˌitawˌarehˈemu; nˌitawˌalipˈiza sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈenu na destˈuri zˈenu za mˌatʃukˈizo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu. ndˈipo mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana ambˈaje hˌuwapˈiɡa kwa mapˈiɡo.|0
sˈiku ˌimefˈika! ˌimewadˈia! mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌamezˈuka ɣafˈula, fˈimbo ˌimetʃanˈua mˌaɟivˈuno jˌametʃipˈua.|0
ɟeˈuri ˌimeinˈuka kˌuwa fˈimbo ja kˌuaðˈibu uˈovu, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa hˈao wˈatu ˌatakˌajeˈatʃwa, hˌata mmˈoɟa wa kˈundi lˈile, hakˈuna ˌutaɟˈiri, hakˈuna tʃˌeɲe θamˈani.|0
wakˈati ˌumewadˈia, sˈiku ˌimefˈika. mnunˈuzi na ˌasifurˈahi wˈala mˌuuzˈaɟi ˌasihˌuzunˈike, kwa maˈana ɣaðˈabu ˈiko ɟˌuːja kˈundi lˈote.|0
mˌuuzˈaɟi hˌataɟˌipatˈia tˈena ˈarði ˌalijˌoiˈuza wakˈati wˈote wawˈili waŋɡˈali hˈai, kwa kˌuwa maˈono kuhˈusu kˈundi lˈote hˌajatˌataŋɡˈuka. kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈao, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajeokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
wˌaɟapopˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta na kuwˈeka kˈila kˈitu tajˈari, hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajekwˈenda vitˈani, kwa maˈana ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˈiko ɟˌuːja kˈundi lˈote.|0
ɲɟˈe ni upˈaŋɡa, ndˈani ni taˈuni na ɲɟˈaa, wˈale wˌaliˈoko ʃambˈani wˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˈale wˌaliˈomo mɟˈini ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni vˌitawˈala.|0
wˈale wˈote wˌatakˌaopˈona na kˌutorˈoka wˌatakˈuwa mˌilimˈani, wˌakiˌombolˈeza kˌama hˈua wa mˌabondˈeni, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈake.|0
kˈila mkˈono ˌutaleɡˈea na kˈila ɡˈoti lˌitakˈuwa ðaˈifu kˌama mˈaɟi.|0
wˌatavˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na kˌufunˈikwa na hˈofu. ɲˈuso zˈao zˌitafunˈikwa na aˈibu na ɲuˈele za vˈitʃwa vjˈao zˌitaɲolˈewa.|0
wˌatatˈupa fˈeða jˈao bˌarabarˈani, nˈajo ðahˈabu jˈao ˌitakˈuwa naɟˈisi. fˈeða jˈao na ðahˈabu jˈao hˌavitawˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ja ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana. hˌawatˌaʃibˈiʃa ɲɟˈaa jˈao ˌau kuɟˈaza matˈumbo jˈao kwa hˈijo fˈeða wˈala ðahˈabu, kwa sabˈabu ˌimewapˈonza wˌaɟikwˈae ðambˈini.|0
wˌaliɟˌivunˈia vˈito vjˈao vizˈuri na kˌuvitumˈia kufˈaɲa sanˈamu za mˌatʃukˈizo na viɲˈaɡo vja ˌupotˈovu. kwa hˈijo nˌitavifˈaɲa vˈitu hˈivjo kˌuwa naɟˈisi kwˈao.|0
nˌitavitˈia vjˈote mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waɡˈeni kˌuwa ɲˈara na kˌuwa vˈitu vˌilivjotˈekwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu waˈovu wa dunˈia, nˌao wˌatavˌinaɟˈisi.|0
nˌitaɡeˈuza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu mbˈali nˈao, nˌao waˈovu wa dunˈia wˌatapˌanaɟˈisi mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pa θamˈani, wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi wˌatapˌaiŋɡˈia na kˌupanaɟˈisi.|0
andˈaa mˌiɲorˈoro, kwa sabˈabu ˈn̩tʃi ˌimeɟˈaa ˌumwaɡˈaɟi wa dˈamu na ˈm̩ɟi ˌumeɟˈaa ˌuðalˈimu.|0
nˌitalˈeta taˈifa ˈovu kulˈiko jˈote ˌili kˌumilˈiki ɲˈumba zˈao, nˌitakomˈeʃa kibˈuri tʃa wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na mahˈali pˈao pˌatakatˈifu pˌatatˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
hˈofu ja ɣafˈula ˌitakˌapokˈuɟa, wˌatatafˈuta amˈani, lakˈini hˌaitˌakuwˈepo.|0
maˈafa ɟˌuːja maˈafa jˌatakˈuɟa, tetˈesi ja mabˈaja ɟˌuːja tetˈesi ja mabˈaja. wˌataɟˌitahˈidi kupˈata maˈono kutˈoka kwa nabˈii, mˌafundˈiʃo ja ʃerˈia tˌoka kwa kuhˈani jˌatapotˈea, vˈivjo hˈivjo ʃaˈuri kutˈoka kwa wazˈee.|0
mfˈalme ˌataˌombolˈeza, mwˈana wa mfˈalme ˌatavˈikwa kukˈata tamˈaa, nˈajo mikˈono ja wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi ˌitatˌetemˈeka. nˌitawˌaʃuɣˌulikˈia sˌawasˈawa na matˈendo jˈao na kwa kanˈuni zˈao weɲˈewe nˌitawˌahukˈumu. ndˈipo wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja tˈano ja mwˈezi wa sˈita mwˈaka wa sˈita, baˌada ja kˌupelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimekˈeti katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu na wazˈee wa jˈuda wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈeti mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, mkˈono wa bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌulikˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌikatazˈama, nˌikaˈona ˈumbo mfˈano wa mwˌanadˈamu. kˌutokˈana na kˈile kˌilitʃˌoonekˈana kˌuwa kiˈuno tʃˈake kˌuelekˈea tʃˈini ˌalifanˈana na mˈoto. kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe kiˈuno kˌuelekˈea ɟˈuu sˈura jˌake kˌama tʃˈuma kˌiŋɡaˈavjo kikˈiwa ndˈani ja mˈoto.|0
ˌakaɲoˈoʃa kˈitu kˌilitʃˌoonekˈana kˌama mkˈono, ˌakanˌiinˈua kwa kuʃˈika ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu. rˈoho ˌakanˌiinˈua ɟˈuu kˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi na mbˈiŋɡu nikˈiwa katˌika maˈono ja mˈuŋɡu ˌakanˌitʃukˈua mpˈaka jˌerusalˈemu, kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ja ukˈumbi wa ndˈani, mahˈali ˌilipˌosimˈama ˈile sanˈamu ˌitʃotʃeˈajo wˈivu.|0
hˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu pˌalikˈuwa na ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, kˌama ˌutukˈufu ˈule nˌiliˌouˈona katˌika maˈono kˈule ˈua wa ndˈani.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, tazˈama kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini. hˈivjo nˌikatazˈama na kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini wa lˈaŋɡo la mˌaðabˈahu, nˌikaˈona sanˈamu hˌii ja wˈivu.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, ɟˈe, ˌunaˈona jˈale wˌanajofˈaɲa, hˈaja mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo kabˈisa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˌanajotˈenda hˈapa, ambˈajo jˌatanifˈaɲa niˈende mbˈali na mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu? lakˈini ˌutaˈona vˈitu ambˈavjo vˌinatʃukˈiza zaˈidi hˌata kulˈiko hˈivi.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka ˌiŋɡilˈio la ukˈumbi. nˌikatazˈama, nˌami nˌikaˈona tˈundu ˌukutˈani.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, sˈasa tobˈoa kwˈeɲe ukˈuta hˈuu. ndˈipo nˌikatobˈoa ˈule ukˈuta, nˌikaˈona hˈapo pˈana mlˈaŋɡo.|0
nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia, iŋɡˈia ndˈani, ˌukaˈone maˈovu na mˌatʃukˈizo wˌanajofˈaɲa hˈumu.|0
hˈivjo nˌikaiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌutazˈama, nˌikaˈona kˈuta zˈote zˌimetʃˈorwa kˈila aˈina ja vˈitu vˌitambaˈavjo na ja waɲˈama wˌatʃukizˈao wa kˈila aˈina na sanˈamu zˈote za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
mbˈele jˈao wˌalisimˈama wazˈee sabˈini wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje jˌaazanˈia mwˈana wa ʃafˈani ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na tʃetˈezo mkonˈoni na mˈoʃi wa harˈufu nzˈuri ja uvˈumba ˌulikˈuwa ˌunapˈanda ɟˈuu.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, ˌumeˈona wˌanajˌojafˈaɲa wazˈee wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ɡizˈani, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwˈeɲe sehˈemu jˌake mweɲˈewe ja kˌufaɲˈia ibˈada za sanˈamu jˈake? wˌao husˈema, bwˈana hˌatuˈoni, bwˈana ˌameiˈatʃa ˈn̩tʃi..|0
ˌakasˈema tˈena, bˈado ˌutaˈona mˌatʃukˈizo wˌanajofˈaɲa ambˈajo ni makˈubwa kulˈiko hˈaja.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini la ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, nˌami nˌikaˈona wˌanawˈake wˌamekˈeti hˈapo, wˌakimwˌombolezˈea tamˈuzi.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌunaliˈona hˈili, mwˌanadˈamu? ˌutaˈona vˈitu ambˈavjo ni mˌatʃukˈizo kulˈiko hˈili.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ndˈani wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, nˈako hˌuko katˌika ˌiŋɡilˈio la hekˈalu, kˈati ja barˈaza na mˌaðabˈahu, wˌalikuwˈepo wˌanaˈume wˌapatˈao ˌiʃirˈini na watˈano. wakˈiwa wˌamelˈipa kisˈoɡo hekˈalu la bwˈana na kˌuelekˈeza ɲˈuso zˈao upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, wˌakilˌisuɟudˈia ɟˈua hˌuko mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, ɟˈe, ˌumeˈona hˈili mwˌanadˈamu? ɟˈe, ni ɟˈambo dˈoɡo sˈana kwa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda kufˈaɲa mˌatʃukˈizo wˌanajˌojafˈaɲa hˈapa? ɟˈe, ni lazˈima pˈia wˌaiɟˈaze ˈn̩tʃi ðulˈuma na kˌuendelˈea sˈiku zˈote kˌunikˌasirˈiʃa? wˌatazˈame wˌanavjˌonibanˈia pˈua kˈana kwˌamba nˌinanˈuka.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitaʃˌuɣulˈika nˌao kwa hasˈira, sˌitawˌaonˈea hurˈuma wˈala kˌuwaˌatʃilˈia. wˌaɟapopˈiɡa mˌakelˈele mˌasikiˈoni mwˈaŋɡu, sˌitawˌasikilˈiza.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikamsikˈia ˌakiˈita kwa saˈuti kˈubwa ˌakisˈema, walˈete wˌasimamˈizi wa ˈm̩ɟi hˈapa, kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa na silˈaha mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
nˌami nˌikaˈona wˈatu sˈita wakˈiɟa tˌoka upˈande wa lˈaŋɡo la ɟˈuu, lˌinalˌotazˈama kˌaskazˈini kˈila mmˈoɟa na silˈaha za kˌuaŋɡamˈiza mkonˈoni mwˈake. pamˈoɟa nˌao ˌalikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamevˈaa mavˈazi ja kitˈani sˈafi, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na vifˈaa vja mwandˈiʃi akˈiwa ˌamevˌiʃikilˈia upˈande mmˈoɟa. wˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja hekˈalu wˌakasimˈama pembˈeni ˌm̩wa mˌaðabˈahu ja ʃˈaba.|0
bˌasi ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌukaondˈoka hˈapo ɟˌuːja mˌakerˈubi, ˌulikokˈuwa ˌumekˈaa, ˌukaˈenda kwˈeɲe kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa hekˈalu. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakamwˈita jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa kitˈani sˈafi ˌalijekˈuwa na vifˈaa vja mwandˈiʃi akˈiwa ˌamevˌiʃikilˈia upˈande wˌake mmˈoɟa.|0
ˌakamwambˈia, pˈita katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈote wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌukawˈeke alˈama ɟˌuːja vipˈaɟi vja ɲˈuso za wˈale wˈatu wˌanaˌohuzunˈika na kˌuombolˈeza kwa sabˈabu ja mˌatʃukˈizo jˈote jˌanajˌotendˈeka katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
nikˈiwa nˌinasikˈia, ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale weŋɡˈine, mfˌuatˈeni ˌanapopˈita katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wˈote ˌm̩kiˈua, pasˈipo hurˈuma wˈala mˌasikitˈiko.|0
wˌauˈeni wazˈee, viɟˈana wa kiˈume na wa kˈike, wˌanawˈake na watˈoto, lakˈini msimɡˈuse ˈm̩tu jejˈote mwˌeɲe alˈama. ˌanziˈeni katˌika mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu. kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈanza na wˈale wazˈee wˌaliokˈuwa mbˈele ja hekˈalu.|0
ndˈipo ˌakawˌaambˈia, lˌinaɟisˈini hekˈalu na mkˌaziɟˈaze kˈumbi zˌake maˈiti za wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa. nendˈeni! kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈenda wˌakaˈanza kuˈua wˈatu mɟˈini kˈote.|0
wakˈati wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiwaˈua wˈatu, nˌami nˌilikˈuwa nˌimeˈatʃwa pˈeke jˈaŋɡu, nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, nˌikapˈiɡa kelˈele nˌikisˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi! ɟˈe, ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈiza mabˈaki jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, katˌika kumwˈaɡwa hˈuku kwa ɣaðˈabu jˈako ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu.|0
bwˈana ˌakaniɟˈibu, ðˈambi ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na jˈuda ˌimekˈuwa kˈubwa ˈm̩no kupˈita kiˈasi, ˈn̩tʃi ˌimeɟˈaa ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu na mɟˈini kˌumeɟˈaa ˌuðalˈimu. kwˈani wˌamesˈema, bwˈana ˌameiˈatʃa ˈn̩tʃi, bwˈana hˌauˈoni..|0
kwa hˈijo sˌitawˌahurumˈia wˈala kˌuwaˌatʃilˈia lakˈini nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao, jˈale wˌalijˌojatˈenda.|0
ndˈipo ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja kitˈani sˈafi na vifˈaa vja mwandˈiʃi akˈiwa ˌamevˌiʃikilˈia upˈande wˌake mmˈoɟa, ˌakarˈudi na kutˈoa tˌaarˈifa ˌakisˈema, nˌimefˈaɲa kˌama ˌulivjˌoniaɡˈiza.|0
nˌikatazˈama, nˌikaˈona ɟˌuːja ˈile nafˈasi ˌilijokˈuwa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja wˈale mˌakerˈubi kˌulikˈuwa na kˈitu mfˈano wa kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa jakˈuti samˈawi.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja kitˈani, iŋɡˈia kˌatikˈati ja jˈale mˌaɡurudˈumu jalˈijo tʃˈini ja mˌakerˈubi. ˌukaiɟˈaze mikˈono jˈako makˈaa ja mˈawe ja mˈoto kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja mˌakerˈubi na ˌujatawˈaɲe ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi. nˌilipokˈuwa nˌikiˌaŋɡalˈia, ˌakaiŋɡˈia ndˈani.|0
bˌasi wˈale mˌakerˈubi wˌalikˈuwa wˌamesimˈama upˈande wa kusˈini wa hekˈalu wakˈati jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia ndˈani, wˈiŋɡu lˌikauɟˈaza ˈule ukˈumbi wa ndˈani.|0
kˈiʃa ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukainˈuka kutˈoka ɟˌuːja wˈale mˌakerˈubi ˌukaˈenda kwˈeɲe kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa hekˈalu. wˈiŋɡu lˌikaɟˈaza hekˈalu, nˌao ukˈumbi ˌukaɟˈawa na m̩ŋɡˈao wa ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana.|0
saˈuti ja mabˈawa ja wˈale mˌakerˈubi ˌiŋɡewˈeza kˌusikˈika mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, kˌama saˈuti ja mˈuŋɡu mweɲˈezi wakˈati ˌanapˌooŋɡˈea.|0
bwˈana ˌalipˌomwamˈuru jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani ˌakisˈema, tʃukˈua mˈoto tˌoka kˌatikˈati ja mˌaɡurudˈumu, kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja mˌakerˈubi, jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌaliiŋɡˈia ndˈani ˌakasimˈama pembˈeni ˌm̩wa ɡˌurudˈumu.|0
ndˈipo mmˈoɟa wa wˈale mˌakerˈubi ˌakaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake kwˈeɲe mˈoto ˌuliokˈuwa kˌatikˈati jˈao. ˌakatʃukˈua baˈaði ja mˈoto na kˌuutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa mavˈazi ja kitˈani, nˌaje ˌakaˌupokˈea ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe.|0
tʃˈini ja mabˈawa ja mˌakerˈubi pˌaliwˈeza kˌuonekˈana kˈitu kˌilitʃˌofanˈana na mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu..|0
kˈule kˌuonekˈana kwˈake, jˈote mˈanne jˌalifanˈana kˈila ɡˌurudˈumu lˌilikˈuwa kˌama lˌinazuŋɡˈuka ndˈani ja liŋɡˈine.|0
jˌalipˌozuŋɡˈuka, jˌalikwˈenda kokˈote katˌika pˈande ˈn̩ne wˌalikˌoelekˈea wˈale mˌakerˈubi. mˌaɡurudˈumu hˌajakˌuɡeˈuka wakˈati mˌakerˈubi jˌalipokwˈenda. mˌakerˈubi wˌalikwˈenda upˈande wowˈote kˈitʃwa kˌilikˌoelekˈea pasˈipo kˌuɡeˈuka wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˈenda.|0
miˈili jˈao jˈote, pamˈoɟa na miɡˈoŋɡo jˈao, mikˈono na mabˈawa jˈao jˈote jˌalikˈuwa jˌameɟˈaa mˈatʃo kabˈisa kˌama jˌalivjokˈuwa jˈale mˌaɡurudˈumu jˈao mˈanne.|0
nˌikasikˈia mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌakiˈitwa, mˌaɡurudˈumu ja kˌisulisˈuli.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa wa wˈale mˌakerˈubi ˌalikˈuwa na ɲˈuso ˈn̩ne: ˈuso mmˈoɟa ˌulikˈuwa kˌama vˈile wa kerˈubi, ˈuso wa pˈili ˌulikˈuwa wa mwˌanadˈamu, ˈuso wa tˈatu ˌulikˈuwa wa sˈimba na ˈuso wa ˈn̩ne ˌulikˈuwa wa tˈai.|0
kˈiʃa mˌakerˈubi wˌakapˈaa ɟˈuu. hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈale viˈumbe walˈio hˈai nˌiliˌowaˈona kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari.|0
wakˈati mˌakerˈubi wˌalipokwˈenda, mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌalijˈoko kˈando jˈao jˌalikwˈenda na wakˈati mˌakerˈubi wˌalipotˈanda mabˈawa jˈao wapˈate kupˈaa ɟˈuu kutˈoka ˈarði, mˌaɡurudˈumu jˈale hˌajakˌuondˈoka pembˈeni m̩wˈao.|0
mˌakerˈubi jˌalipˌosimˈama kˈimja, nˈajo pˈia jˌalitulˈia kˈimja, nˌao mˌakerˈubi jˌalipˌoinˈuka ɟˈuu, mˌaɡurudˈumu nˈajo jˌaliinˈuka ɟˈuu pamˈoɟa nˈao, kwa sabˈabu rˈoho ja vˈile viˈumbe hˈai ˌilikˈuwa ndˈani jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukaondˈoka pˈale kwˈeɲe kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa hekˈalu na kˌusimˈama ɟˌuːja wˈale mˌakerˈubi.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa nˌikitazˈama, mˌakerˈubi jˌakatˈanda mabˈawa jˈao na kˌuinˈuka kutˈoka arðˈini, nˌao wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˈenda, jˈale mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌakaˈenda pamˈoɟa nˈao. wˌakasimˈama kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo la mˌaʃarˈiki la ɲˈumba ja bwˈana, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ukˈawa ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
hˈawa wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio viˈumbe hˈai nˌiliokˈuwa nˌimewaˈona tʃˈini ja mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari, nˌami nˌikatambˈua ja kˌuwa hˈao wˌalikˈuwa mˌakerˈubi.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikˈuwa na ɲˈuso ˈn̩ne, mabˈawa mˈanne, tʃˈini ja mabˈawa jˈao kˌulikˈuwa na kˈile kˌilitʃˌoonekˈana kˌama mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu.|0
ɲˈuso zˈao zˌilifanˈana kˌama zˈile nˌilizokˈuwa nˌimeziˈona kˈando ja ˈm̩to kebˈari. kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalikwˈenda mbˈele mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa.|0
ndˈipo rˈoho ˌakanˌiinˈua na kˌunilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲˈumba ja bwˈana lˌinalˌotazˈama upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. pˈale kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo kˌulikuwˈepo wˌanaˈume ˌiʃirˈini na watˈano, nˌami nˌikaˈona mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao jˌaazanˈia mwˈana wa azˈuri na pˌelatˈia mwˈana wa benˈaja, vˌioŋɡˈozi wa wˈatu.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, hˈawa n̩dˈio wˌafaɲˈao hˈila na kutˈoa mˌaʃaˈuri potˈovu katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu.|0
wˌao husˈema, ɟˈe, hˈivi kˌaribˈuni hˌautakˈuwa wakˈati wa kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba? ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ni tʃˈuŋɡu tʃa kˌupikˈia, nˌasi n̩dˈio ɲˈama..|0
kwa hˈijo tˈoa ˌunabˈii ðˈidi jˈao, tabˈiri, ˈewe mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa rˈoho wa bwˈana akˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakanˌiambˈia nisˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: hˈili ndˈilo nˈiɲi mnˌalosˈema, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, lakˈini nˌinaɟˈua mnˌalowˈaza mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu.|0
mmˌewaˈua wˈatu wˈeŋɡi katˌika ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu na kuɟˈaza bˌarabˈara zˌake maˈiti.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: maˈiti ˌulizˌozitˈupa hˌuko ni ɲˈama na ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu ni tʃˈuŋɡu, lakˈini nˌitawˌaondˈoa mtˈoke hˌuko.|0
mnˌaoɡˈopa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao upˈaŋɡa hˈuo n̩dˈio nˌitakˌaoulˈeta ɟˈuu jˈenu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitawˌaondˈoa mtˈoke katˌika ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuwatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa waɡˈeni nˌami nˌitawˌaaðˈibu.|0
mtˌaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌami nˌitatimˈiza hukˈumu ðˈidi jˈenu katˌika mipˈaka ja ˌisraˈeli. ndˈipo mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu hˌautakˈuwa tʃˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, wˈala hˌamtakˈuwa ɲˈama ndˈani jˈake. nˌitatˈoa hukˈumu ðˈidi jˈenu katˌika mipˈaka ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa hˌamkufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, bˌali mmˌefuˈata mwenˈendo wa mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka.|0
bˌasi nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinatˈoa ˌunabˈii, pˌelatˈia mwˈana wa benˈaja akˈafa. ndˈipo nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi, nˌikalˈia kwa saˈuti kˈuu nˌikasˈema, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi! ɟˈe ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ndˈuɡu zˈako, ndˈuɡu zˈako ambˈao ni wa ˌuhusiˈano wa dˈamu na ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli, n̩dˈio wˈale ambˈao wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˌamesˈema, wˈako mbˈali na bwˈana; ˈn̩tʃi hˌii tˌulipˈewa sˌisi kˌuwa mˈilki jˈetu..|0
kwa hˈijo sˈema, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: iŋɡˈawa nˌiliwˌapelˈeka mbˈali mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwatawˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali, lakˈini kwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo mˌimi nˌimekˈuwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kwˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌalizokwˈenda..|0
kwa hˈijo sˈema: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitawˌakusaɲˈeni kutˈoka mˌataˈifa na kˌuwarudˈiʃa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ambˈazo mmˌetawˈaɲua, nˌami nˌitawˌarudiʃˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli..|0
wˌataˌirudˈia ˈn̩tʃi na kˌuondˈoa viɲˈaɡo vjˈote vja ˌupotˈovu na sanˈamu zˈote za mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
nˌitawˈapa mˈojo mmˈoɟa na kuwˈeka rˈoho ˈm̩pja ndˈani jˈao, nˌitaondˈoa kutˈoka ndˈani jˈao mˈojo wa ɟˈiwe na kuwˈapa mˈojo wa ɲˈama.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatafuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kutˈii ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu. wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
lakˈini kwa wˈale ambˈao miˈojo jˈao ˌimeˌambatˈana na viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vja ˌupotˈovu na sanˈamu zˈao za mˌatʃukˈizo, nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao jˈale wˌalijotˈenda asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
ndˈipo wˈale mˌakerˈubi, wˌeɲe mˌaɡurudˈumu pembˈeni m̩wˈao, wˌakakuɲɟˈua mabˈawa jˈao, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
bˌasi ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukapˈaa ɟˈuu kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi, ˌukatˈua ɟˌuːja mlˈima ulˈio upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
rˈoho ˌakanˌiinˈua na kˌunilˈeta mpˈaka kwa wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo hˌuko ˌukaldˈajo nikˈiwa katˌika jˈale maˈono nˌilijopˈewa na rˈoho wa mˈuŋɡu. ndˈipo maˈono nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimejaˈona jˌakanitˈoka.|0
nˌami nˌikawˌaelˈeza wˈale wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo kˈila kˈitu bwˈana ˌalitʃokˈuwa ˌamenˌioɲˈeʃa.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌunaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu waˈasi. wˈana mˈatʃo ja kuˈona, lakˈini hˌawaˈoni na mˌasikˈio ja kˌusikˈia lakˈini hˌawasikˈii, kwa kˌuwa ni wˈatu waˈasi.|0
kwa hˈijo, mwˌanadˈamu, fˈuŋɡa mizˈiɡo jˈako kwa kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni tˈena wakˈati wa mtʃˈana, wakˈiwa wˌanakˌutazˈama, tˌoka ɲɟˈe na uˈende mahˈali peŋɡˈine kutˈoka hˈapo ulˈipo. lˈabda wˌataelˈewa, iŋɡˈawa wˌao ni ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi.|0
wakˈati wa mtʃˈana, wakˈiwa wˌanakˌutazˈama, tˈoa ɲɟˈe mizˈiɡo jˈako ˌilijofˈuŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. kˈiʃa wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni, wakˈiwa wˌanakˌutazˈama tˌoka ɲɟˈe kˌama wˈale wˌaendˈao ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
wakˈiwa wˌanakˌutazˈama, tobˈoa ukˈuta ˌutolˈee mizˈiɡo jˈako hˈapo.|0
bˈeba mizˈiɡo hˈijo beɡˈani mwˈako wˌakikˌuaŋɡalˈia ˌuitʃukˈue ɲɟˈe wakˈati wa ɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni. funˈika ˈuso wˈako ˌili ˌusiˈone ˈn̩tʃi, kwa maˈana nˌimekufˈaɲa iʃˈara kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
bˌasi nˌikafˈaɲa kˌama nˌilivjˌoamrˈiwa. wakˈati wa mtʃˈana nˌilitˈoa vˈitu vjˈaŋɡu ɲɟˈe vˌilivjofˈuŋɡwa tajˈari kwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni. kˈiʃa wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni nˌikatobˈoa ukˈuta kwa mikˈono jˈaŋɡu. nˌikatʃukˈua mizˈiɡo jˈaŋɡu ɲɟˈe wakˈati wa ɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni, nikˈiwa nˌimeibˈeba mˌabeɡˈani mwˈaŋɡu hˈuku wˌakinˌitazˈama.|0
ˌasubˈuhi nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ɟˈe, ɲˈumba ˈile ja kuˈasi ja ˌisraˈeli hˌaikˌukuulˈiza, ˌunafˈaɲa nˈini?.|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˈeno hˈili lˌinamhˈusu m̩kˈuu alˈije katˌika jˌerusalˈemu na ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ambˈao wˈako hˌuko..|0
wˌaambˈie, mˌimi n̩dˈije iʃˈara kwˈenu. kˌama vˈile nˌilivjotˈenda, bˌasi lˌitatendˈeka vˈivjo hˈivjo kwˈao. wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni kˌama matˈeka.|0
nˌaje m̩kˈuu alˈije mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˌatabˈeba mizˈiɡo jˌake beɡˈani mwˈake kwˈeɲe ɡˈiza la ɟiˈoni na kˌuondˈoka na tˈundu lˌitatˌobolˈewa ˌukutˈani kwa aɟˈili jˌake ˌili kˌupitˈia hˈapo. ˌatafunˈika ˈuso wˌake ˌili kwˌamba ˌasiwˈeze kˌuiˈona ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitatandˈaza wˈavu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˌaje ˌatanˈaswa kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo wˈaŋɡu, nˌitamlˈeta mpˈaka babˈeli, ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌakaldˈajo, lakˈini hˌataiˈona, nˌaje ˌatafˈia hˌuko.|0
wˈote wˌanaˌomzuŋɡˈuka nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa pˈande zˈote, wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake na maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˈote, nˌami nˌitawˌafuˌatilˈia kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌuliofˈutwa.|0
wˌao wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapowˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwafukˈuza hˈuku na hˌuko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈote.|0
lakˈini nˌitawaˈatʃa watʃˈatʃe wˌao wˌaokˈoke na upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa na taˈuni, ˌili kwˌamba katˌika mˌataˈifa wˌatakˌakokwˈenda wawˈeze kˌutambˈua matˈendo ja mˌatʃukˈizo wˌaliotˈenda. ndˈipo wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tˌetemˈeka wakˈati ulˈapo tʃakˈula tʃˈako, tˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu wakˈati ˌuɲuˈapo mˈaɟi jˈako.|0
wˌaambˈie wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu hˈao wˌanaoˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu na katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli: wˌatakˈula tʃakˈula tʃˈao kwa wˌasiwˈasi na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi jˈao kwa kˌufaðaˈika, kwa kˌuwa ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌitaɲaŋɡˈaɲua kˈila kˈitu tʃˈake kwa sabˈabu ja ˌuðalˈimu wa wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi hˈumo.|0
mˈiɟi ˌinajˌokalˈiwa na wˈatu ˌitahˌaribˈiwa na ˈn̩tʃi ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ni nˈini hˌii miθˈali m̩lˈio nˈajo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli: sˈiku zˌinapˈita na hakˈuna maˈono jojˈote jˌanajˌotimˈia?.|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitaˌikomˈeʃa miθˈali hˌii, nˌao hˌawatˌaitumˈia tˈena katˌika ˌisraˈeli. wˌaambˈie, sˈiku zˌimekˌaribˈia wakˈati kˈila maˈono jˌatakˌapotimˈizwa.|0
kwa maˈana hˌapatˌakuwˈepo tˈena na maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo wˈala ˌubaʃˈiri wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
lakˈini mˌimi bwˈana nˌitasˈema nˈeno nˌitakˈalo, nˈalo lˌitatimˈizwa bˌila kˌutʃelˈewa. kwa maˈana katˌika sˈiku zˈako, wˌewe ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi, nˌitatimˈiza kˈila nˌisemˈalo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
