mwˌanadˈamu, ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌinasˈema, maˈono jˈale ˌanajˌojaˈona ni kwa aɟˈili ja miˈaka mˈiŋɡi iɟˈajo, nˌaje hˌutabˈiri kuhˈusu sˈiku ziɟˈazo zilˈizo mbˈali..|0
kwa hˈijo, wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hakˈuna manˈeno jˈaŋɡu jˌatakˌajotʃˌelewˈeʃwa tˈena zaˈidi, lolˈote nˌisemˈalo lˌitatimˈizwa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri ðˈidi ja mˌanabˈii wa ˌisraˈeli wˌanaˌotabˈiri sˈasa. wˌaambˈie hˈao ambˈao hˌutabˈiri kˌutokˈana na mawˈazo jˈao weɲˈewe: sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈole wˌao mˌanabˈii wˌapumbˈavu wˌafuatˈao rˈoho jˈao weɲˈewe na wˈala hˌawaɟaˈona tʃotʃˈote.|0
mˌanabˈii wˈako, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ni kˌama mbwˈeha kˌatikˈati ja maɡˈofu.|0
hˌamɟakwˈea kwˈenda kuzˈiba mahˈali pˌalipˌobomˈoka katˌika ukˈuta ˌili kˌuukˌarabˈati kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌili kwˌamba ˌisimˈame imˈara kwˈeɲe vˈita katˌika sˈiku ja bwˈana.|0
maˈono jˈao ni ja uˈoŋɡo na ˌubaʃˈiri wˌao ni wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. wˌao husˈema, bwˈana ˌamesˈema, wakˈati bwˈana hˌakuwatˈuma, bˈado wˌakitˌaraɟˈia manˈeno jˈao kˌutimˈizwa.|0
ɟˈe, hˌamɟaˈona maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo na kusˈema ˌubaʃˈiri wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu hˈapo msemˈapo, bwˈana asˈema, lakˈini mˌimi sˌiɟasˈema.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu ja uˈoŋɡo wa manˈeno jˈenu na kwa mˌadaŋɡˈaɲo ja maˈono jˈenu, mˌimi ni kiɲˈume na nˈiɲi, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌutakˈuwa ðˈidi ja mˌanabˈii ambˈao huˈona maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo na kusˈema ˌubaʃˈiri wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. hˌawatakˈuwa katˌika barˈaza la wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌau kˌuandˈikwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˈala hˌawatˌaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli. ndˈipo mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
kwa sabˈabu ni kwˈeli wˌanapotˈoʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˌakisˈema, amˈani, wakˈati ambˈapo hakˈuna amˈani, pˈia kwa sabˈabu, wakˈati ukˈuta ðaˈifu ˌunapoɟˈeŋɡwa, wˌanaˌufunˈika kwa kupˈaka tʃokˈaa.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaambˈie hˈao wˌanaˌoupˈaka tʃokˈaa ˌisijˌokorˈoɡwa vjˈema kwˌamba ukˈuta hˈuo ˌutaaŋɡˈuka. mvˈua kˈubwa ja mˌafurˈiko ˌitaɲˈeʃa, nˌami nˌitalˈeta mvˈua ja mˈawe iɲˈeʃe kwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌao upˈepo wa ðorˈuba ˌutavˈuma ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
wakˈati ukˈuta ˌutakˌapoaŋɡˈuka, ɟˈe, wˈatu hˌawatˌawaulˈiza, ˈiko wˈapi tʃokˈaa mlˌijopˈaka ukˈuta.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu nˌitaˌuatʃˈia upˈepo wa ðorˈuba, pˈia katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu mvˈua ja mˈawe na mvˈua ja mˌafurˈiko ˌitaɲˈeʃa ikˈiwa na ɣaðˈabu ja kˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
nˌitaˌubomˈoa ukˈuta mlˌioupˈaka tʃokˈaa na kˌuuaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini ˌili msˈiŋɡi wˌake uˈatʃwe wˈazi. ˌutakˌapoaŋɡˈuka, mtˌaaŋɡamˈizwa ndˈani jˈake, nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjoˌitimˈiza ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja hˈuo ukˈuta na ðˈidi jˈao wˌaliˌoupˈaka tʃokˈaa. nˌitawˌaambˈia nˈiɲi, ukˈuta ˌumebomˈoka na vˈivjo hˈivjo wˈale wˌaliˌoupˈaka tʃokˈaa.|0
wˈale mˌanabˈii wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌotabˈiri ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu na kuˈona maˈono ja amˈani kwa aɟˈili jˌake wakˈati kˌulipokˈuwa hakˈuna amˈani, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. .|0
sˈasa, mwˌanadˈamu, kˈaza ˈuso wˈako ðˈidi ja bˈinti za wˈatu wˈako wˌanaˌotabˈiri mˈambo kutˈoka mawˈazo jˈao weɲˈewe. tabˈiri ðˈidi jˈao.|0
na usˈeme, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈole wˌao wˌanawˈake wˌaʃonˈao hirˈizi za utʃˈawi ɟˌuːja viwˈiko vjˈao vjˈote na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza ʃˈela za urˈefu wa aˈina mbˌalimbˈali kwa aɟˈili ja kˌufunˈika vˈitʃwa vjˈao kwa mˌakusˈudi ja kˌuwanˈasa wˈatu. ɟˈe, mtatˈeɡa uhˈai wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu lakˈini nˈiɲi mpˈoɲe wa kwˈenu.|0
nˈiɲi mmˌeninaɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja kˈonzi tʃˈatʃe za ʃajˈiri na tʃˈembe za mkˈate. kwa kˌuwaambˈia uˈoŋɡo wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˈale ambˈao hˌusikilˈiza uˈoŋɡo, mmˌewaˈua wˈale wˈatu ambˈao wˌasiŋɡekˈufa na kˌuwaˈatʃa hˈai wˈale ambˈao wˌasiŋɡeˈiʃi.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi nˈiko kiɲˈume na hˈizo hirˈizi zˈenu za utʃˈawi ambˈazo kwa hˈizo mnˌawatˈeɡa wˈatu kˌama ndˈeɡe, nˌami nˌitazˌirarˈua kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌitawawˈeka hˈuru wˈatu wˈale mlˌiowatˈeɡa kˌama ndˈeɡe.|0
nˌitazˌirarˈua ʃˈela zˈenu na kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, nˌao hˌawatakˈuwa tˈena mawˈindo ja ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa sabˈabu mlˌiwavˈuɲɟa mˈojo wˌeɲe hˈaki kwa uˈoŋɡo wˈenu, wakˈati mˌimi sˌikuwˌaletˈea huzˈuni na kwa kˌuwa mlˌiwatˈia mˈojo waˈovu ˌili wˌasiziˈatʃe ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja na hˈivjo kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo hˌamtaˈona tˈena maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo wˈala kufˈaɲa ˌubaʃˈiri. nˌitawˌaokˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu. nˌaɲi ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
baˈaði ja wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliniɟˈia na kukˈeti mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, wˈatu hˈawa wˌamewˈeka sanˈamu katˌika miˈojo jˈao na kuwˈeka vˈitu viˈovu vja kukwˈaza mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao. ɟˈe, kwˈeli nˌiwaruhˈusu wˌaniulˈize ɟˈambo lolˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈema nˌao ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: wakˈati mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌanapowˈeka sanˈamu mojˈoni mwˈake na kuwˈeka kˈitu kiˈovu tʃa kukwˈaza mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˌake na kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda kwa nabˈii, mˌimi bwˈana nˌitamɟˈibu pˈeke jˈaŋɡu sˌawasˈawa na ukˈubwa wa ibˈada jˌake ja sanˈamu.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili ˌili kˌukamˈata tˈena miˈojo ja wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈao wˈote wˌameniˈatʃa kwa aɟˈili ja sanˈamu zˈao..|0
kwa hˈijo ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: tubˈuni! ɡˌeukˈeni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe sanˈamu zˈenu na mkatˈae matˈendo jˈenu jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
mwˌisraˈeli jejˈote ˌau mɡˈeni jejˈote ˌanajeˈiʃi katˌika ˌisraˈeli ˌanapˌoɟitˈeŋɡa nˌami na kˌuɟiwekˈea sanˈamu katˌika mˈojo wˌake na kwa hˈivjo kuwˈeka kˈitu kiˈovu tʃa kukwˈaza mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˌake na kˈiʃa ˌakamwendˈea nabˈii kˌuulˈiza ʃaˈuri kwˈaŋɡu, mˌimi bwˈana nˌitamɟˈibu mweɲˈewe.|0
nˌaje nabˈii kˌama ˌatakˈuwa ˌameʃˌawiʃˈika kutˈoa ˌunabˈii, mˌimi bwˈana nˌitakˈuwa nˌimemʃawˈiʃi nabˈii hˈujo, nˌami nˌitaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˌake na kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌatatʃukˈua hatˈia jˈao, nabˈii ˌatakˈuwa na hatˈia sˈawa na jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuɟa kˌuulˈiza nˈeno kwˈake.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli hˌawatˌaniˈatʃa tˈena, wˈala kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi tˈena kwa ðˈambi zˈao zˈote. ndˈipo wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, kˌama ˈn̩tʃi ˌitanitˈenda ðˈambi kwa kˌutokˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu nˌami nˌikiɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˌake kˌukatilˈia mbˈali ˌupatˌikanˈaɟi wˌake wa tʃakˈula na kˌuipˌelekˈea ɲɟˈaa na kuˈua wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˈao.|0
hˌata kˌama wˈatu hˈawa watˈatu: nˈoa, dˌaniˈeli na ajˈubu wˌaŋɡekˈuwa ndˈani ja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo, n̩dˈio hˈao tu wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuɟiokˈoa weɲˈewe kwa ˌuadilˈifu wˈao, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
ˌau kˌama nˌikipelˈeka waɲˈama pˈori katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo jˈote na kˌuifˈaɲa isˈiwe na watˈoto, nˈajo ikˈawa ukˈiwa kwˌamba hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌapitˈaje katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo kwa sabˈabu ja waɲˈama pˈori.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, hˌata kˌama wˈatu hˈawa watˈatu wˌaŋɡekˈuwa hˈumo ndˈani jˈake, wˌasiŋɡewˈeza kˌuokˈoa wˈana wˌao wˈala bˈinti zˈao. wˌao pˈeke jˈao wˌaŋɡeˌokolˈewa, lakˈini ˈn̩tʃi ˌiŋɡekˈuwa ukˈiwa.|0
ˌau kˌama nˌikilˈeta upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo na kusˈema, upˈaŋɡa na upˈite katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, nˌami nˌikiˈua wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˈao.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, hˌata kˌama wˈatu hˈawa watˈatu wˌaŋɡekˈuwa hˈumo ndˈani jˈake, wˌasiŋɡewˈeza kˌuokˈoa wˈana wˌao wˈala bˈinti zˈao. wˌao weɲˈewe tu wˌaŋɡeˌokolˈewa.|0
ˌau kˌama nˌikipelˈeka taˈuni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo na kumwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˌake kwa ɲɟˈia ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, kuˈua wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˈao.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, hˌata kˌama nˈoa, dˌaniˈeli na ajˈubu wˌaŋɡekˈuwa hˈumo ndˈani jˈake, wˌasiŋɡewˈeza kˌumwokˈoa mwˈana wˈala bˈinti. wˌao wˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌuɟiokˈoa weɲˈewe tu kwa ˌuadilˈifu wˈao.|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˌitakˈuwa vibˈaja kiˈasi ɡˈani nˌitakˌapopelˈeka ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu hukˈumu zˈaŋɡu ˈn̩ne za kutˈiʃa, jaˈani, upˈaŋɡa, ɲɟˈaa, waɲˈama pˈori na taˈuni, ˌili kuˈua wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˈao.|0
lakˈini wˌatakuwˈepo wˌeɲe kˌuokˈoka, wˈana na bˈinti wˌatalˈetwa kutˈoka ɲɟˈe ja ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo. wˌatawaɟˈia nˈiɲi, nˌaɲi mtˌakapoˈona mwenˈendo wˌao na matˈendo jˈao, mtˌafariɟˈika kuhˈusu maˈafa nˌilijolˈeta ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu, kwa aɟˈili ja jˈale jˈote nˌilijolˈeta ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
mtˌafariɟˈika wakˈati mtˌakapoˈona mwenˈendo wˌao na matˈendo jˈao, kwa kˌuwa mtaɟˈua kwˌamba sˌikufˈaɲa lolˈote ndˈani jˌake bˌila sabˈabu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ɟˈe, ni vˈipi ˈm̩ti wa mzabˈibu ˌunawˈeza kˌuwa bˈora zaˈidi kulˈiko tˈawi la ˈm̩ti mwiŋɡˈine wowˈote ndˈani ja msˈitu.|0
ɟˈe, ˈm̩ti wˌake kˈamwe hˌutʃukulˈiwa na kˌuteŋɡenˈeza tʃotʃˈote tʃa mˌanufˈaa? ɟˈe, wˈatu hˌuteŋɡenˈeza viɡˈiŋɡi vja kˌuniŋɡˌinizˈia vˈitu kˌutokˈana na hˈuo ˈm̩ti wˈake.|0
nˌao baˌada ja kutˈiwa motˈoni kˌama niʃˈati na mˈoto ˌukatˌeketˈeza ˈn̩tʃa zˈote mbˈili na kˌuuŋɡˈuza sehˈemu ja kˈati, ɟˈe, ˌunafˈaa kwa lolˈote.|0
kˌama hˌaukufˈaa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ˌulipokˈuwa mzˈima, ɟˈe, si zaˈidi sˈana sˈasa ambˈapo hˌauwˌezekˈani kˌufaɲˈiʃwa tʃotʃˈote tʃa kufˈaa baˌada ja mˈoto kˌuutʃˈoma na kˌuuuŋɡˈuza.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kˌama nˌilivjˌoutˈoa ˈm̩ti wa mzabˈibu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiti ja msitˈuni kˌuwa niʃˈati kwa aɟˈili ja mˈoto, hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˌatendˈea wˈatu wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌitaukˈaza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao. iŋɡˈawa wˌatakˈuwa wˌameokˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈoto, bˈado mˈoto ˌutawˌateketˈeza. nˌami nˌitakˌapoukˈaza ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao, nˈiɲi mtaɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa ukˈiwa kwa sabˈabu wˌamekˈuwa si wˌaaminˈifu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌiɟulˈiʃe jˌerusalˈemu kuhˈusu mwenˈendo wˌake wa mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
na usˈeme, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌanalˌomwambˈia jˌerusalˈemu: wˌewe asˈili jˈako na kˌuzalˈiwa kwˈako ni katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌanaˈani, bˈaba jˈako ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈori, nˌaje mˈama jˈako ˌalikˈuwa mhˈiti.|0
sˈiku ˌulijˌozalˈiwa kitˈovu tʃˈako hˌakikukˈatwa, wˈala hˌukuoɡˈeʃwa kwa mˈaɟi ˌili kˌukufˈaɲa sˈafi, wˈala hˌukusˌuɡulˈiwa kwa tʃˈumvi wˈala kˌufunˈikwa kwa ŋɡˈuo.|0
hakˈuna jejˈote ˌalijˌekuonˈea hurˈuma ˌau kˌukusˌikitikˈia kiˈasi tʃa kˌukutendˈea mˌoɟawˈapo ja mˈambo hˈaja. badˈala jˈake, ˌulipˌozalˈiwa ˌulitˈupwa ɲɟˈe pˈeɲe uwˈaɲɟa, kwa kˌuwa katˌika sˈiku ˌulijˌozalˈiwa ˌuliðˌaraulˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo nˌilipopˈita karˈibu nˌawe nˌikakuˈona ˌukiɡˌaaɡˈaa kwˈeɲe dˈamu jˈako, nˌawe ˌulipokˈuwa ˌumelˈala hˈapo pˈeɲe hˈijo dˈamu nˌikakˌuambˈia, ˈiʃi.|0
nˌilikufˈaɲa uˈote kˌama m̩mˈea wa ʃambˈani. ˌukakˈua na kˌuoŋɡezˈeka sˈana, ukˈawa kˈito tʃa θamˈani kulˈiko vjˈote. matˈiti jˈako jˌakatokˈeza na ɲuˈele zˈako zˌikaˈota, wˌewe ˌulijekˈuwa ˈutʃi na bˌila kˈitu tʃotʃˈote.|0
bˌaadˈaje nˌikapˈita karˈibu nˈawe, nˌilipˌokutazˈama na kˌukuˈona kˌuwa ˌumefikˈia ˈumri wa kupˈendwa, nˌililˌitandˈaza vˈazi lˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌuufunˈika ˈutʃi wˈako. nˌikakˌuapˈia na kˌuiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe aɡˈano na wˈewe, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌawe ukˈawa wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilikˌuoɡˈeʃa kwa mˈaɟi, nˌikakuˈoʃa ˈile dˈamu na kˌukupˈaka mafˈuta.|0
nˌikakuvˈika vˈazi lˌililˌotarizˈiwa na kˌukuvalˈiʃa viˈatu vja kˈamba vja ŋɡˈozi. nˌikakuvˈika ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani sˈafi na kˌukufunˈika kwa mavˈazi ja θamˈani kˈubwa.|0
nˌikakupˈamba kwa vˈito: nˌikakuvˈika baŋɡˈili mˌikonˈoni mwˈako na mkˈufu ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako.|0
nˌikawˈeka hazˈama puˈani mwˈako, vipˈuli mˌasikiˈoni mwˈako na tˈaɟi nzˈuri sˈana kitʃwˈani mwˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌulipˈambwa kwa ðahˈabu na fˈeða, ŋɡˈuo zˈako zˌilikˈuwa za kitˈani sˈafi, harˈiri na ŋɡˈuo ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimetˌarizˈiwa. tʃakˈula tʃˈako kˌilikˈuwa ˈuŋɡa laˈini, asˈali na mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni. ukˈawa mzˈuri sˈana ˌukainˈuka kˌuwa malkˈia.|0
ˌumaarˈufu wˈako ˌulifˌahamˈika mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa kwa aɟˈili ja uzˈuri wˈako, kwˈani ˌulikˈuwa mkˌamilˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu nˌiliokˈuwa nˌimeuwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈako, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
lakˈini ˌulitˌumainˈia uzˈuri wˈako na kˌutumˈia ˌumaarˈufu wˈako kˌuwa kahˈaba. ˌulifˈaɲa uzˈinzi kwa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌalijepˈita, uzˈuri wˈako ukˈawa kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ˌulitʃukˈua baˈaði ja mavˈazi jˈako ˌukajˌatumˈia kupˈamba mahˈali pˈako pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌulifaɲˈia ˌukahˈaba wˈako. mˈambo ja nˈamna hˈijo hˌajastahˈili kˌutendˈeka wˈala kˈamwe kˌutokˈea.|0
pˈia ˌulitʃukˈua vˈito vizˈuri nˌilivjokˈupa, vˈito vˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu jˈaŋɡu na fˈeða jˈaŋɡu, ˌukaɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea nˈavjo sanˈamu za kiˈume na ˌukafˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba nˈazo.|0
ˌukajˌatʃukˈua mavˈazi jˈako nˌilijokˈupa jˌalijˌotarizˈiwa na ˌukazˌivalˈiʃa hˈizo sanˈamu, ˌukatˈoa mbˈele ja hˈizo sanˈamu mafˈuta jˈaŋɡu na uvˈumba wˈaŋɡu.|0
pˈia tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu nˌilitʃokˈupa ˌili ˈule: ˈuŋɡa laˈini, mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni na asˈali, ˌulivitˈoa mbˈele jˈao kˌuwa uvˈumba wa harˈufu nzˈuri. hˈajo n̩dˈijo jˌalijˌotokˈea, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌawe ˌuliwˌatʃukˈua wanˈao na bˈinti zˈako ˌuliˌonizalˈia mˌimi na kˌuwatˈoa kafˈara kˌuwa tʃakˈula kwa sanˈamu. ɟˈe, ˌukahˈaba wˈako hˌaukˌukutˈoʃa.|0
ˌuliwatʃˈiɲɟa watˈoto wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwatˈoa kafˈara kwa sanˈamu.|0
katˌika matˈendo jˈako jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo, pamˈoɟa na ˌukahˈaba wˈako hˌukukumbˈuka sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈako, wakˈati ˌulipokˈuwa ˈutʃi kabˈisa bˌila kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, ˌulipokˈuwa ˌukiɡˌaaɡˈaa kwˈeɲe dˈamu jˈako.|0
ˈole! ˈole wˈako! asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. pamˈoɟa na maˈovu jˈako jˈote meŋɡˈine.|0
katˌika kˈila mwˈanzo wa bˌarabˈara ˌuliɟˈeŋɡa mahˈali pa fahˈari pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu na kˌuaibˈiʃa uzˈuri wˈako, ˌukiutˈoa mwˈili wˈako kwa kˌuzidˈiʃa uzˈinzi kwa kˈila ˌapitˈaje.|0
ˌulifˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba wˈako na wamˈisri, ɟirˈani zˈako wˌalioɟˈaa tamˈaa, ˌukaˌitʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuoŋɡezˈeka kwa uzˈinzi wˈako.|0
hˈivjo nˌiliɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako na kˌuipuŋɡˈuza ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, nˌikakutˈia kwˈeɲe ulˈafi wa adˈui zˈako, bˈinti za wˌafilˈisti, wˌalioʃtˈuʃwa na tabˈia jˈako ja ˌuaʃerˈati.|0
ˌulifˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba na wˌaaʃˈuru pˈia, kwa kˌuwa hˌukuriðˈika, hˌata baˌada ja hˈajo, ukˈawa bˈado hˌukutˌoʃelˈeka.|0
ndˈipo ˌukaoŋɡˈeza uzˈinzi wˈako kwa wˌakaldˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara, hˌata katˌika hˈili hˌukutoʃˈeka.|0
tazˈama ɟˈinsi ulˈivjo na ðamˈiri ðaˈifu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌunapofˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, ˌukifˈaɲa kˌama kahˈaba ˌasijekˈuwa na aˈibu.|0
ˌunapoɟˈeŋɡa ɟukwˈaa lˈako kˈila mwˈanzo wa bˌarabˈara na kˌufaɲˈiza mahˈali pa fahˈari pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu katˌika kˈila kiwˈaɲɟa tʃa wˈazi, lakˈini hukˈuwa kˌama kahˈaba, kwa sabˈabu ˌuliðarˈau malˌipo.|0
wˌewe ˈm̩ke mzˈinzi! ˌunapˈenda waɡˈeni, kulˈiko mˈume wˈako mweɲˈewe.|0
kˈila kahˈaba hˌupokˈea malˌipo, lakˈini wˌewe hutˈoa zawˈadi kwa wapˈenzi wˈako wˈote, ˌukiwahˈoŋɡa ˌili wˈaɟe kwˈako kutˈoka kˈila mahˈali kwa aɟˈili ja ˌukahˈaba wˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌewe ˌulikˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na wˌanawˈake weŋɡˈine kwˈeɲe ˌukahˈaba wˈako, hakˈuna ˌalijˌekutoŋɡˈoza ˌili kuzˈini nˈaje, wˌewe n̩dˈije ˌulijelˈipa wakˈati hakˈuna malˈipo ˌulijolˈipwa wˈewe. wˌewe ˌulikˈuwa tˌofaˈuti.|0
kwa hˈijo, wˌewe kahˈaba, sikˈia nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa kˌuwa ˌumemwˈaɡa tamˈaa zˈako na kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˈutʃi wˈako katˌika uzˈinzi wˈako kwa wapˈenzi wˈako na kwa sabˈabu ja sanˈamu zˈako zˈote za mˌatʃukˈizo na kwa sabˈabu ˌuliwˈapa dˈamu ja watˈoto wˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa wapˈenzi wˈako wˈote, wˈale ambˈao ˌuliɟˌifurahˈiʃa nˈao, wˈale ˌuliˌowapˈenda na wˈale ˌuliˌowatʃukˈia pˈia. nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa wˈote ðˈidi jˈako kutˈoka pˈande zˈote na nˌitakuvˈua ŋɡˈuo mbˈele jˈao, nˌao wˌataˈona ˈutʃi wˈako wˈote.|0
nˌitakˌuhukumˈia aðˈabu wˌanajopˈewa wˌanawˈake wˌafaɲˈao ˌuaʃerˈati na hˈao wˌamwaɡˈao dˈamu, nˌitalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈenu kisˈasi tʃa dˈamu tʃa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu na wˈivu wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitakutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wapˈenzi wˈako, nˌao wˌatabomˈoa mˌaɟukwˈaa jˈako na kˌuharˈibu mahˈali pˈako pa fahˈari pa ibˈada ja miˈuŋɡu. wˌatakuvˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈako na kˌutʃukˈua vˈito vjˈako vja θamˈani na kˌukuˈatʃa ˈutʃi na bˌila kˈitu.|0
wˌatalˈeta kˈundi la wˈatu ðˈidi jˈako, wˌatakˌaokupˈiɡa kwa mˈawe na kˌukukˌatakˈata vipˈande vipˈande kwa pˈaŋɡa zˈao.|0
wˌatatʃˈoma ɲˈumba zˈako na kˌutekelˈeza aðˈabu ɟˈuu jˈako matʃˈoni pa wˌanawˈake wˈeŋɡi. nˌitakomˈeʃa ˌukahˈaba wˈako, nˌawe hˌutawalˈipa tˈena wapˈenzi wˈako.|0
ndˈipo ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako ˌitakˌapopuŋɡˈua na wˈivu wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌutaondˈoka kwˈako. nˌitatulˈia wˈala sˌitakˌasirˈika tˈena.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌukuzˌikumbˈuka sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈako, lakˈini ˌulinˌikasirˈiʃa kwa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, hakˈika nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈako jˈale ˌulijotˈenda, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. ɟˈe hˌukuoŋɡˈeza ˌuaʃerˈati ɟˌuːja matˈendo jˈako jˈote ja kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatumiˈaje manˈeno ja miθˈali hˌii, ˌatajˌatumˈia ɟˈuu jˈako: alˈivjo mˈama, ndˈivjo alˈivjo bintˈije.|0
wˌewe ni bˈinti halˈisi wa mˈama jˈako, ambˈaje ˌalimtʃukˈia kabˈisa mˈume wˌake na watˈoto wˈake, tˈena wˌewe ni dˈada halˈisi wa dˈada zˈako, wˌaliˌowatʃukˈia kabˈisa waˈume zˈao na watˈoto wˈao. mˈama jˈako ˌalikˈuwa mhˈiti na bˈaba jˈako ˌalikˈuwa mwamˈori.|0
dˈada jˈako mkˈubwa ˌalikˈuwa sˌamarˈia, ˌalijeˈiʃi upˈande wˈako wa kˌaskazˈini na bˈinti zˈake, pamˈoɟa na dˈada jˈake, nˌaje dˈada jˈako mdˈoɡo, ˌalijeˈiʃi kusˈini jˈako pamˈoɟa na bˈinti zˈake, ˌalikˈuwa sodˈoma.|0
hˌukuzˌiendˈea ɲɟˈia zˈao tu na kuˈiɡa matˈendo jˈao ja kˌutʃukˈiza, bˌali kwa mˈuda mfˈupi katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote ˌulihˌaribˈika tabˈia zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈao.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, dˈada jˈako sodˈoma pamˈoɟa na bˈinti zˈake, kˈamwe hˌawakufˈaɲa jˈale ambˈajo wˌewe na bˈinti zˈako mmefˈaɲa.|0
sˈasa hˌii ˌilikˈuwa n̩dˈijo ðˈambi ja dˈada jˈako sodˈoma: jˌeje na bˈinti zˌake wˌalikˈuwa na mˌaɟivˈuno, walˈafi na wazˈembe, hˌawakˌuwasˌaidˈia maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi.|0
wˌaliɟivˈuna na kufˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo sˈana mbˈele zˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo nˌiliwˌakatilˈia mbˈali nˌami kˌama mlˌivjoˈona.|0
sˌamarˈia hˌakufˈaɲa hˌata nˈusu ja ðˈambi ˌulizofˈaɲa. wˌewe ˌumefˈaɲa mˈambo mˈeŋɡi sˈana ja kˌutʃukˈiza kˌuwalˈiko wˈao, nˌawe ˌumewafˈaɲa dˈada zˈako wˌaonekˈane kˌama wˌeɲe hˈaki kwa aɟˈili ja mˈambo hˈaja jˈote ˌulijˌojafˈaɲa.|0
tʃukˈua aˈibu jˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumefˈaɲa uˈovu wa dˈada zˈako ˈuwe si kˈitu, nˌao wˌaonekˈane kˌama wˌeɲe hˈaki. kwa kˌuwa ðˈambi zˈako zˌilikˈuwa m̩bˈaja zaˈidi kulˈiko zˈao, wˌameˌonekˈana wˌeɲe hˈaki zaˈidi kulˈiko wˈewe. kwa hˈijo bˈasi, tʃukˈua aˈibu jˈako, kwa kˌuwa ˌumewafˈaɲa dˈada zˈako wˌaonekˈane wˌeɲe hˈaki.|0
lakˈini nˌitarudˈiʃa barˈaka za sodˈoma na bˈinti zˌake na za sˌamarˈia na bˈinti zˈake, nˌami nˌitarudˈiʃa barˈaka zˈako pamˈoɟa na zˈao.|0
ˌili upˈate kˌutʃukˈua aˈibu jˈako na kˌufeðehˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja jˈote ˌulijotˈenda ambˈajo jˌamekˈuwa farˈaɟa kwˈao wˌakiɟˌiliŋɡanˈiʃa na wˈewe.|0
nˌao dˈada zˈako, sodˈoma na bˈinti zˌake na sˌamarˈia na bˈinti zˈake, wˌatarudˈiʃwa kˌama vˈile wˌalivjokˈuwa mwanzˈoni, nˌawe pamˈoɟa na bˈinti zˈako mtˌarudˈiʃwa kˌama mlˌivjokˈuwa hˈapo awˈali.|0
hˌukuwˈeza hˌata kumtˈaɟa dˈada jˈako sodˈoma kwa sabˈabu ja ðarˈau jˈako katˌika sˈiku za kibˈuri tʃˈako.|0
kˈabla uˈovu wˈako hˌauɟˌafunulˈiwa. hˌata hˈivjo, sˈasa ˌunaðˌihakˈiwa na bˈinti za edˈomu na ɟirˈani zˌake wˈote, na bˈinti za wˌafilˈisti, wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌokuzuŋɡˈuka wˌanakˌuðarˈau.|0
ˌutatʃukˈua mˌatokˈeo ja ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako na matˈendo jˈako ja kˌutʃukˈiza, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitakˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia kˌama ˌunavjˌostahˈili, kwa kˌuwa ˌumeðarˈau kiˈapo tʃˈaŋɡu kwa kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano.|0
lakˈini nˌitakumbˈuka aɡˈano nˌililˌolifˈaɲa nˌawe wakˈati wa uɟˈana wˈako, nˌami nˌitawˈeka nˌawe aɡˈano imˈara la milˈele.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌapozˌikumbˈuka ɲɟˈia zˈako na kuˈona aˈibu ˌutakˌapowˌapokˈea dˈada zˈako, wˈale walˈio wakˈubwa wˈako na wadˈoɡo wˈako. nˌitakˈupa hˈao wˈawe bˈinti zˈako, lakˈini si katˌika msˈiŋɡi wa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na wˈewe.|0
hˈivjo nˌitalifˈaɲa imˈara aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na wˈewe, nˌawe ˌutaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
bˈasi, nˌitakˌapofˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈako, kwa jˈale jˈote ˌulijˌojatˈenda, ˌutakumbˈuka na kˌuaibˈika, nˌawe kˈamwe hˌutafumbˈua tˈena kˈiɲua tʃˈako kwa sabˈabu ja aˈibu jˈako, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tˈeɡa kˌitendawˈili, ˌukawˌaambˈie ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli fˈumbo.|0
wˌaambˈie hˈivi, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: tˈai mkˈubwa mwˌeɲe mabˈawa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, jˌalijoɟˈaa maɲˈoja marˈefu ja rˈaŋɡi mbˌalimbˈali, ˌalikˈuɟa lˌebanˈoni. ˌakatˈua kwˈeɲe kilˈele tʃa mwerˈezi.|0
ˌakakwaɲˈua ˈn̩tʃa jˌake na kˌuitʃukˈua mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara, ˌakaipˈanda hˌuko katˌika ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌatʃuˈuzi.|0
ˌakatʃukˈua baˈaði ja mbˈeɡu za ˈn̩tʃi jˈako na kˌuziwˈeka katˌika udˈoŋɡo wˌeɲe rutˈuba. ˌakazipˈanda kˌama ˈm̩ti ˌumeˈao kˈando ja mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi.|0
nˈazo zˌikaˈota na kˌuwa mzabˈibu mfˈupi, ˌunaˌoenˈeza matˈawi jˈake. matˈawi jˌake jˌakamwˌelekˈea hˈujo tˈai, mizˈizi jˌake ˌikabˈaki tʃˈini ja hˈuo mzabˈibu. kwa hˈijo ukˈawa mzabˈibu na kutˈoa matˈawi na vitˈawi vjˌeɲe maɟˈani mˈeŋɡi.|0
lakˈini kˌulikˈuwa na tˈai mwiŋɡˈine mkˈubwa, mwˌeɲe mabˈawa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu jˌalijoɟˈaa maɲˈoja. tazˈama! hˈuu mzabˈibu ˌukatˈoa mizˈizi jˌake kˌumwelekˈea hˈujo tˈai kutˈoka ˈm̩le kwˈeɲe ʃˈamba lˈile ˌulikopˈandwa na kutˈanda matˈawi jˌake kˌumwelekˈea kwa aɟˈili ja kupˈata mˈaɟi.|0
ˌulikˈuwa ˌumepˈandwa katˌika udˈoŋɡo mzˈuri wˌeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi ˌili uwˈeze kutˈoa matˈawi, kuzˈaa matˈunda na uwˈeze kˌuwa mzabˈibu mzˈuri sˈana..|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ɟˈe, ˌutastˈawi? ɟˈe, hˌautˌaŋɡolˈewa na kˌuondolˈewa matˈunda jˈake, ˌili uwˈeze kˌuɲaˈuka? maɟˈani jˌake mˈapja jˌanajˌotʃipˈua jˈote jˌataɲaˈuka. hˌautˌahitˈaɟi mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌau wˈatu wˈeŋɡi kˌuuŋɡˈoa na mizˈizi jˈake.|0
hˌata kˌama ˌutapˈandwa peŋɡˈine, ɟˈe, ˌutastˈawi? ɟˈe, hˌautˌaɲaˈuka kabˈisa wakˈati upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌutakˌapoupˈiɡa, jaˈani, hˌautˌaɲaˈuka kabˈisa katˌika udˈoŋɡo mzˈuri ambˈamo ˌulikˈuwa ˌumestˈawi vizˈuri?.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
wˌaambˈie ɲˈumba hˌii ja kuˈasi, ɟˈe, mnaɟˈua hˌii ˈina maˈana ɡˈani? wˌaambˈie: mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu na kˌumtʃukˈua mfˈalme na wˈatu mˌaarˈufu, ˌakarˈudi nˌao na kˌuwalˈeta mpˈaka babˈeli.|0
ndˈipo ˌakamtʃukˈua mmˈoɟa wa ɟamˈaa ja mfˈalme na kufˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˈaje, ˌakamfˈaɲa aˈape. ˌakawˌatʃukˈua pˈia vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ˌili kˌuuðˌoofˈiʃa ufˈalme hˈuo, ˌusiwˈeze kˌuinˈuka tˈena, ˈila uwˈeze kˌuendelˈea tu tʃˈini ja mˌapatˈano jˈake.|0
lakˈini mfˈalme ˌaliˈasi ðˈidi jˌake kwa kutˈuma waɟˈumbe wˌake kwˈenda mˈisri ˌili kˌupatˈiwa farˈasi na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa. ɟˈe, ˌataʃˈinda? ɟˈe, ˌatafˌanikˈiwa? ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu ˌafaɲˈaje mˈambo kˌama hˈajo ˌataokˈoka? ɟˈe, ˌatavˈuɲɟa mˌapatˈano na bˈado ˌaokˈoke.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, ˌatafˈia hˌuko babˈeli, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mfˈalme ˌalijˌemketˈiʃa katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi, ambˈaje ˌaliðarˈau kiˈapo tʃˈake na kuvˈuɲɟa mˌapatˈano jˈake.|0
farˈao na ɟˈeʃi lˈake kˈubwa, na wˈiŋɡi wˌake wa wˈatu hˌawatawˈeza kˌusaidˈia tʃotʃˈote katˌika vˈita, wakˈati wˌatakˌapozuŋɡˈukwa na ɟˈeʃi ˌili kˌukatilˈia mbˈali maˈiʃa ja wˈatu wˈeŋɡi.|0
ˌaliðarˈau kiˈapo kwa kuvˈuɲɟa aɡˈano. kwa sabˈabu ˌaliahˈidi kwa mkˈono wˌake mweɲˈewe na bˈado ˌakafˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote, hˌataokˈoka.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, nˌitalˈeta ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake kiˈapo tʃˈaŋɡu, ˌalitʃˌokiðarˈau na aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu lˈile ˌalilˌolivˈuɲɟa.|0
nˌitaˌutandˈaza wˈavu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˌaje ˌatanˈaswa katˌika mtˈeɡo wˈaŋɡu. nˌitamlˈeta mpˈaka babˈeli na kˌutekelˈeza hukˈumu ɟˈuu jˌake hˌuko kwa kˌuwa hakˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
askˈari wˌake wˈote wˌanaˌotorˈoka wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌao wˌatakˌaonˌusurˈika wˌatatˌawaɲˈika katˌika pˈande zˈote za dunˈia. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitatʃukˈua tʃˌipukˈizi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kilˈele tʃa ɟˈuu sˈana tʃa mwerˈezi na kˌukipˈanda, nˌitavˈuɲɟa kitˈawi kitʃˈaŋɡa kutˈoka matˈawi jˌake ja ɟˈuu kabˈisa na kˌukipˈanda ɟˌuːja mlˈima mrˈefu ˌuliˌoinˈuka sˈana.|0
katˌika vilˈele vja mlˈima mrˈefu wa ˌisraˈeli nˌitakipˈanda, kˌitatˈoa matˈawi na kuzˈaa matˈunda na kˌuwa mwerˈezi mzˈuri sˈana. ndˈeɡe wa kˈila aˈina wˌatawˈeka viˈota vjˈao ndˈani jˈake, nˌao wˌatapˈata makˈazi katˌika kivˈuli tʃa matˈawi jˈake.|0
mˈiti jˈote ja kondˈeni ˌitaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌinaiʃˈuʃa mˈiti mirˈefu na kˌuikˈuza mˈiti mifˈupi kˌuwa mˈiti mirˈefu. mˌimi nˌaikaˈuʃa mˈiti mibˈitʃi na kˌuifˈaɲa mˈiti mikˈavu istˈawi.  mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema, nˌami nˌitatˈenda..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
ɟˈe, nˈiɲi wˈatu ˈm̩na maˈana ɡˈani kˌutumˈia miθˈali hˌii ˌinajohˈusu ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli:  bˈaba wˌamekˈula zabˈibu zˌeɲe tʃˈatʃu, nˈajo mˈeno ja watˈoto jˌametˈiwa ɡˈanzi.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, hˌamtatumˈia tˈena miθˈali hˌii katˌika ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa kˌuwa kˈila rˈoho ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu, kˌama vˈile ilˈivjo rˈoho ja bˈaba, vˈivjo hˈivjo rˈoho ja mtˈoto ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu. rˈoho ˌitendˈajo ðˈambi n̩dˈijo ˌitakˌajokˈufa.|0
hakˈula katˌika mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu kwˈeɲe milˈima wˈala hˌakuzˌiinulˈia mˈatʃo sanˈamu za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. hˌakumtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake, wˈala hˌakukutˈana kimwˈili na mwanˈamke wakˈati wa sˈiku zˌake za hˈeði.|0
hˌamwonˈei ˈm̩tu jejˈote, bˌali hˌurudˈiʃa kˌilitʃowˈekwa rehˈani kwˈake. hˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi, bˌali huwˈapa wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa tʃakˈula tʃˈake na huwˈapa ŋɡˈuo walˈio ˈutʃi.|0
hˌakopˈeʃi kwa rˈiba wˈala hˌaɟipatˈii faˈida ja ziˈada. hˌuuzuˈia mkˈono wˌake ˌusifˈaɲe mabˈaja, nˌaje hˌuhukˈumu kwa hˈaki kˈati ja ˈm̩tu na ˈm̩tu.|0
hˌuzifuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu kwa ˌuaminˈifu. hˈujo ˈm̩tu ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki; hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
iŋɡˈawa bˈaba jˌake hˌakufˈaɲa mˌoɟawˈapo ja hˈaja: hˈula katˌika mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu kwˈeɲe milˈima. humtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
hˌuwaonˈea maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi. hˌuɲaŋɡaɲˈana. hˌarudˈiʃi kˈile kˌilitʃowˈekwa rehˈani kwˈake. hˌuziˌinulˈia sanˈamu mˈatʃo. hufˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
hˌukopˈeʃa kwa rˈiba na kˌutafˈuta faˈida ja ziˈada. ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu wa nˈamna hˌii ˌataˈiʃi? hapˈana, hˌataˈiʃi! kwa sabˈabu ˌamefˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo, hakˈika ˌatauˈawa na dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini jˌawezekˈana mwˈana hˈujo ˈana mwˈana ˌaonˈaje ðˈambi hˈizi zˈote ˌanazofˈaɲa bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje iŋɡˈawa ˌanaziˈona, jˌeje hafˈaɲi mabˈaja kˌama hˈaja.|0
hakˈula katˌika mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu kwˈeɲe milˈima, wˈala hˌainulˈii mˈatʃo sanˈamu za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. hˌakumtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
hˌakumwonˈea ˈm̩tu jejˈote wˈala hˌakutˈaka rehˈani kwa aɟˈili ja mkˈopo. hˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi, bˌali huwˈapa wˌeɲe ɲɟˈaa tʃakˈula tʃˈake na huwˈapa ŋɡˈuo walˈio ˈutʃi.|0
hˌuuzuˈia mkˈono wˌake ˌusitˈende ðˈambi, hˌakopˈeʃi kwa rˈiba wˈala hˌaɟipatˈii faˈida ja ziˈada. hˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuzifuˈata ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu. hˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi za bˈaba jˈake; hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini bˈaba jˌake ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˌake mweɲˈewe, kwa sabˈabu ˌalitˈoza bˈei isˈijo halˈali kwa ŋɡˈuvu, ˌakamɲaŋɡˈaɲa ndˈuɡu jˌake na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo mabˈaja mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
lakˈini mnˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini mwˈana ˌasiˌaðibˈiwe kwa uˈovu wa bˈaba jˈake? kwa vˈile mwˈana ˌametˈenda jalˈijo hˈaki na sˈawa na ˌamekˈuwa mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zˈote, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi.|0
rˈoho ˌitendˈajo ðˈambi n̩dˈijo ˌitakˌajokˈufa. mwˈana hˌataˌaðibˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa ja bˈaba jˈake, wˈala bˈaba hˌataˌaðibˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa ja mwanˈawe. hˈaki ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌitahˌesabˈiwa ɟˈuu jˌake na uˈovu wa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌutalipˈizwa ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌakiˈatʃa ðˈambi zˌake zˈote ˌalizˌozitˈenda na kuʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu zˈote na kufˈaɲa lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi, hˌatakˈufa.|0
hakˈuna kˈosa lolˈote ˌalilotˈenda lˌitakˌalokumbˈukwa ɟˈuu jˈake. kwa aɟˈili ja mˈambo ja hˈaki ˌalijˌojatˈenda, ˌataˈiʃi.|0
ɟˈe, mˌimi nˌinafˌurahˈia kˈifo tʃa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu? asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. ɟˈe, si mˌimi nˌinafurˈahi wˌanapˌoɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja na kuˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌakiˈatʃa hˈaki jˌake na kutˈenda ðˈambi na kufˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo ambˈajo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hufˈaɲa, ɟˈe, ˌataˈiʃi? hakˈuna hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo ja matˈendo ja hˈaki ˌalijotˈenda lˌitakˌalokumbˈukwa. kwa sabˈabu ja kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwˈake anˈajo hatˈia na kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ˌalizˌozitˈenda, ˌatakˈufa.|0
lakˈini mnasˈema, ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana si ja hˈaki. sikˈia, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli: ɲɟˈia jˈaŋɡu sˈijo ilˈijo ja hˈaki? ɟˈe, si ɲɟˈia zˈenu ndˈizo ambˈazo si za hˈaki.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌakiˈatʃa hˈaki jˌake na kutˈenda ðˈambi, ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˈake, kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi ˌalizotˈenda, ˌatakˈufa.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌakiɡeˈuka kutˈoka maˈovu ˌalijˌojatˈenda na kufˈaɲa jalˈijo hˈaki na sˈawa, ˌataokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌanajˌafikirˈia na kˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka makˈosa jˌake jˈote ˌalijˌojatˈenda na kˌujaˈatʃa, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi, hˌatakˈufa.|0
lakˈini ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌinasˈema, ɲɟˈia za bwˈana si hˈaki. ɟˈe, ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu si za hˈaki, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli? ɟˈe, si ɲɟˈia zˈenu ndˈizo ambˈazo si za hˈaki.|0
kwa hˈijo, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌitawˌahukˈumu, kˈila mmˈoɟa sˌawasˈawa na ɲɟˈia zˈake, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. tubˈuni! ɡˌeukˈeni kutˈoka makˈosa jˈenu jˈote, ndˈipo ðˈambi hˌaitakˈuwa aŋɡˈuko lˈenu.|0
tˌupiliˈeni mbˈali makˈosa jˈenu jˈote mlˌijojatˈenda, nˌaɲi mpˈate mˈojo ˈm̩pja na rˈoho ˈm̩pja. kwa nˈini ˈm̩fe, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kwa maˈana sˌifurahˈii kˈifo tʃa ˈm̩tu awˈaje jˈote afˈaje katˌika uˈovu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. tubˈuni bˈasi, mkaˈiʃi.|0
wˌewe fˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo kuhˈusu wakˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
na usˈeme:  tazˈama ɟˈinsi ɡˈani mˈama jˈako ˌalivjokˈuwa sˈimba ɟˈike mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa sˈimba! ˌalilˈala kˌatikˈati ja wˈana sˈimba na kulˈiʃa watˈoto wˈake.|0
ˌalimlˈea mmˈoɟa wa watˈoto wˈake, nˌaje akˈawa sˈimba mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu. ˌakaɟifˈunza kˌurarˈua mawˈindo nˌaje akˈala wˈatu.|0
mˌataˈifa wˌakasikˈia habˈari zˈake, nˌaje ˌakanˈaswa katˌika ʃˈimo lˈao. wˌakamwoŋɡˈoza kwa ndoˈana mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
mˈama jˌake ˌalipoŋɡˈoɟa na kuˈona tˌumaˈini lˈake hˌalitˌimizˈiki, nˈajo mˌataraɟˈio jˌake jˌametowˈeka, ˌakamtʃukˈua mwanˈawe mwiŋɡˈine na kumfˈaɲa sˈimba mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌalizˌuŋɡukˌazuŋɡˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa sˈimba, kwa kˌuwa sˈasa ˌalikˈuwa sˈimba mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu. ˌakaɟifˈunza kˌurarˈua mawˈindo nˌaje akˈala wˈatu.|0
ˌakabomˈoa ŋɡˈome zˈao na kˌuiharˈibu mˈiɟi jˈao. ˈn̩tʃi na wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa ndˈani jˌake wˌakatˈiwa hˈofu kwa kˌuŋɡurˈuma kwˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mˌataˈifa wakˈaɟa ðˈidi jˌake kutˈoka sehˈemu zˌilizˌomzuŋɡˈuka. wˌakatˈanda ɲˈavu zˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈake, nˌaje ˌakanˈaswa katˌika ʃˈimo lˈao.|0
kwa kˌutumˈia ndoˈana wˌakamvutˈia kwˈeɲe tˈundu na kumlˈeta mpˈaka kwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli. wˌakamtˈia ɡˌerezˈani, hˈivjo kˌuŋɡurˈuma kwˈake hˌakukˌusikˈika tˈena katˌika milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˈama jˈako ˌalikˈuwa kˌama mzabˈibu katˌika ʃˈamba lˈako la mˌizabˈibu ˌuliopˈandwa kˈando ja mˈaɟi, ukˈiwa ˌunazˈaa sˈana na wˌeɲe matˈawi mˈeŋɡi kwa sabˈabu ja wˈiŋɡi wa mˈaɟi.|0
matˈawi jˌake jˌalikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu, jˌalijofˈaa kˌuwa fˈimbo ja ˈenzi ja mtawˈala. ˌulikˈuwa mrˈefu kupˈita mˈiti miŋɡˈine kˌatikˈati ja matˈawi manˈene; ˌuliˌonekˈana kwa ˌurahˈisi kwa aɟˈili ja urˈefu wˌake na wˈiŋɡi wa matˈawi jˈake.|0
lakˈini ˌuliŋɡolˈewa kwa hasˈira kˈali na kutˈupwa tʃˈini. upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌuliufˈaɲa ˌusiɲˈae, matˈunda jˌake jˌakapˌukutˈika, matˈawi jˌake jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu jˌakaɲaˈuka na mˈoto ˌukajˌateketˈeza.|0
sˈasa ˌumepˈandwa ɟaŋɡwˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈame na ja kˈiu.|0
mˈoto ˌulienˈea kˌuanzˈia katˌika mmˌoɟawˈapo ja matˈawi jˌake makˈubwa na kˌuteketˈeza matˈunda jˈake. hakˈuna tˈawi lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu lˌililobˈaki ɟˈuu jˌake lˌifaˈalo kˌuwa fˈimbo ja ˈenzi ja mtawˈala. hˈili ndˈilo ˌombolˈezo, na lˌitumˈike kˌama ˌombolˈezo.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa sˈaba, mwˈezi wa tˈano sˈiku ja kˈumi, baˈaði ja wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli wakˈaɟa ˌili kutˈaka ˌuʃaˈuri kwa bwˈana, wˌakakˈeti mbˈele jˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, sˈema na wazˈee wa ˌisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa nˈini mmekˈuɟa? ɟˈe, ni kutˈaka ˌuʃaˈuri kwˈaŋɡu? hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, sˌitawˌaruhˈusu mtˈake ˌuʃaˈuri tˌoka kwˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
ɟˈe, ˌutawˌahukˈumu? ɟˈe, mwˌanadˈamu, ˌutawˌahukˈumu? bˌasi ˌuwakabˈili kwa aɟˈili ja mˌatʃukˈizo ja bˈaba zˈao.|0
na ˌuwaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: sˈiku ˈile nˌilipˌotʃaɡˈua ˌisraˈeli, nˌiliwˌaapˈia wazˈao wa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa nˌami nˌikaɟˌiðihirˈiʃa kwˈao hˌuko mˈisri. kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa nˌiliwˌaambˈia, mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
sˈiku ˈile nˌiliwˌaapˈia wˌao kwˌamba nˌitawatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri na kˌuwalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˌowatʃˌaɡulˈia, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri kupˈita zˈote.|0
nˌami nˌikawˌaambˈia, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌaondolˈee mbˈali sanˈamu za tʃukˈizo ambˈazo mmˌekazˈia mˈatʃo, nˌaɲi msˌiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu za mˈisri. mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
lakˈini wˌaliniˈasi na hˌawakˌunisˌikilˈiza, hˌawakˌuondolˈea mbˈali sanˈamu za mˌatʃukˈizo ambˈazo wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezˌikazˈia mˈatʃo, wˈala kˌuondolˈea mbˈali sanˈamu za mˈisri. ndˈipo nˌikasˈema, nˌitawˌamwaɡˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu na kˌutimˈiza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao hˌuko mˈisri.|0
lakˈini kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu nˌilifˈaɲa kˈile ambˈatʃo kˌiŋɡelifˈaɲa lˌisitˈiwe ˌunaɟˈisi matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa wˌalijoˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao na ambˈao matʃˈoni pˈao nˌilikˈuwa nˌimeɟˌifunˈua kwa wˌaisraˈeli kwa kˌuwatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikawˌaoŋɡˈoza watˈoke mˈisri na kˌuwalˈeta ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
nˌikawˈapa ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwaɟulˈiʃa ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌezitˈii ˌataˈiʃi kwa hˈizo.|0
pˈia nˌiliwˈapa sabˈato zˈaŋɡu kˌama iʃˈara kˈati jˈaŋɡu nˈao, ˌili wapˈate kuɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌiliwafˈaɲa kˌuwa wˌatakatˈifu.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌaliniˈasi mˌimi ɟaŋɡwˈani. hˌawakˌufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, bˌali wˌalikatˈaa ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌanajˌezitˈii ˌataˈiʃi kwa hˈizo ʃerˈia, nˌao wˌalizˌinaɟˈisi sabˈato zˈaŋɡu kabˈisa. hˈivjo nˌilisˈema nˌiŋɡemwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
lakˈini kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu nˌikafˈaɲa kˈile ambˈatʃo kˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌisitˈiwe ˌunaɟˈisi matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa ambˈao mbˈele jˈao nˌilikˈuwa nˌimewatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
tˈena kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa nˌikawˌaapˈia hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani kwˌamba nˌisiŋɡˌewaiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimewˈapa, jaˈani, ˈn̩tʃi ˌitirˌirikˈajo mazˈiwa na asˈali, ˈn̩tʃi nzˈuri kulˈiko zˈote.|0
kwa sabˈabu wˌalikatˈaa ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu na hˌawakˌufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na wˌakazˌinaɟˈisi sabˈato zˈaŋɡu. kwa kˌuwa miˈojo jˈao ˌiliandˈama sanˈamu zˈao.|0
lakˈini nˌiliwˌahurumˈia wˈala sˌikuwˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈala hˌakuwafˈuta kabˈisa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
nˌiliwˌaambˈia watˈoto wˌao kˈule ɟaŋɡwˈani, msˌifuˈate ˈamri za bˈaba zˈenu wˈala kuʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈao ˌau kˌuɟinaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu zˈao.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, fˌuatˈeni ˈamri zˈaŋɡu tˈena kuwˈeni wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kuʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
zˌitakasˈeni sabˈato zˈaŋɡu ˌili zˈiwe iʃˈara kˈati jˈaŋɡu nˈaɲi. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
lakˈini watˈoto hˈao wˌakaniˈasi: hˌawakˌufuˈata ˈamri zˈaŋɡu, wˈala hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kuʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌezitˈii ˌanaˈiʃi kwa hˈizo ʃerˈia, nˌao wˌakazˌinaɟˈisi sabˈato zˈaŋɡu. hˈivjo nˌikasˈema nˌiŋɡemwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌutimˈiza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
lakˈini nˌikaˌuzuˈia mkˈono wˈaŋɡu na kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu nˌikafˈaɲa kˈile ambˈatʃo kˌiŋɡelifˈaɲa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌisitˈiwe ˌunaɟˈisi matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa ambˈao mbˈele jˈao nˌilikˈuwa nˌimewatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
tˈena kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa nˌikawˌaapˈia hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani kwˌamba nˌiŋɡewˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwatawˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌawakutˈii ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu lakˈini wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekatˈaa ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuzinaɟˈisi sabˈato zˈaŋɡu, nˈajo mˈatʃo jˈao jˌakatamˈani sanˈamu za bˈaba zˈao.|0
pˈia nˌiliwaˈatʃa wˌafuˈate ˈamri ambˈazo hˌazikˈuwa nzˈuri na ʃerˈia ambˈazo ˈm̩tu hawˈezi kuˈiʃi kwa hˈizo ʃerˈia.|0
nˌikawaˈatʃa wˌanaɟisˈiwe kwa mˌatolˈeo jˈao, kˌuwatˈoa wˌazalˈiwa wˌao wa kwˈanza kafˈara kwa sanˈamu, jaˈani, kˈule kˌuwapitˈiʃa wˌazalˈiwa wˌao wa kwˈanza kwˈeɲe mˈoto, nipˈate kˌuwaɟˈaza na hˈofu ˌili waɟˈue kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
kwa hˈijo, mwˌanadˈamu, sˈema na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli na ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika hˈili pˈia, bˈaba zˈenu wˌalinˌikufˈuru kwa kˌuniˈatʃa mˈimi.|0
nˌilipˌowalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo nˌilikˈuwa nˌimeˈapa kuwˈapa na kuˈona kilˈima tʃotʃˈote kirˈefu ˌau ˈm̩ti wowˈote wˌeɲe maɟˈani mˈeŋɡi, hˌuko wˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu zˈao, wˌakatˈoa sadˈaka ambˈazo zˌilitʃotʃˈea hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, wˌakafukˈiza uvˈumba wˌeɲe harˈufu nzˈuri na kˌumimˈina sadˈaka zˈao za kˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
ndˈipo nˌikawˌaambˈia: ni nˈini maˈana jˌake hˈapa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu mnˌapopˌaendˈea?  bˌasi ɟˈina la mahˈali pˈale pˌanaˈitwa bˈama hˌata hˈivi lˈeo..|0
kwa hˈijo ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ɟˈe, mtˌaɟinaɟˈisi kˌama vˈile bˈaba zˈenu wˌalivjofˈaɲa na kˌutamˈani viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vja mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
mnˌapotˈoa mˌatolˈeo jˈenu, jaˈani, wˈana wˈenu kafˈara katˌika mˈoto, mnˌaendelˈea kˌuɟinaɟˈisi na sanˈamu zˈenu zˈote hˌadi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo. ɟˈe, nˌiulˈizwe nˈeno na nˈiɲi, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli? hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, mˌimi sˌitaulˈizwa nˈeno na nˈiɲi.|0
lˈile lˌililˈoko mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu kˈamwe hˌalitˌatokˈea, mnˌaposˈema, tˌunatˈaka tˈuwe kˌama mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine, kˌama wˈatu weŋɡˈine wa dunˈia, wˌanaˌotumikˈia mˈiti na mˈawe.|0
hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈenu kwa mkˈono wa ŋɡˈuvu na kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa na kwa ɣaðˈabu ˌilijomwˈaɡwa.|0
nˌitawatˈoa tˌoka katˌika mˌataˈifa na kˌuwakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi mlˌikotawˈaɲua, kwa mkˈono wa ŋɡˈuvu na kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoɲoˈoʃwa na kwa ɣaðˈabu ˌilijomwˈaɡwa.|0
nˌitawalˈeta katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la mˌataˈifa na hˌuko nˌitatˌekelˈeza hukˈumu ɟˈuu jˈenu ˈuso kwa ˈuso.|0
kˌama nˌilivjˌowahukˈumu bˈaba zˈenu katˌika ɟˈaŋɡwa la ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˌahukˈumu nˈiɲi, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa mpˈite tʃˈini ja fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitawalˈeta katˌika mkatˈaba wa aɡˈano.|0
nˌitawˌaondˈoa mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu wˈale wˌanaˌohalˈifu na wˈale wˌanaoˈasi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu. iŋɡˈawa nˌitawatˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi wˌanazoˈiʃi, hˌawatˌaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa habˈari zˈenu nˈiɲi, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nendˈeni mkˌatumikˈie sanˈamu zˈenu, kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu! lakˈini bˌaadˈaje hakˈika mtˌanisˌikilˈiza mˌimi nˌaɲi hˌamtalˌinaɟˈisi tˈena ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, kwa mˌatolˈeo jˈenu na sanˈamu zˈenu.|0
kwa kˌuwa katˌika mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu, mlˈima mrˈefu wa ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, hˈapo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitanˌitumikˈia mˈimi, nˌami hˌuko nˌitawˌakubˈali. hˌuko nˌitatˈaka sadˈaka zˈenu na mˌatolˈeo ja mˌalimbˈuko jˈenu, pamˈoɟa na ðabˈihu zˈenu tˌakatˈifu zˈote.|0
nˌitawˌakubˈali nˈiɲi kˌama uvˈumba wˌeɲe harˈufu nzˈuri wakˈati nˌitakˌapowatˈoa katˌika mˌataˈifa na kˌuwakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi mlˌipokˈuwa mmˌetawaɲˈika, nˌami nˌitaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu na matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapowalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimeˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu.|0
hˈapo ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokumbˈuka mwenˈendo wˈenu na matˈendo jˈenu jˈote ambˈajo kwˈajo mlˌiɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi, nˌaɲi mtˌaɟitʃukˈia weɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja maˈovu jˈote mlˌijokˈuwa mmetˈenda.|0
nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapoʃˌuɣulˈika nˌaɲi kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu na wˈala si sˌawasˈawa na ɲɟˈia zˈenu m̩bˈaja na matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌuelekˈeze ˈuso wˈako upˈande wa kusˈini, hubˈiri ɟˌuːja upˈande wa kusˈini na utˈoe ˌunabˈii ɟˌuːja msˈitu wa neɡˈebu.|0
wˌaambˈie wˈatu wa neɡˈebu: sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌukutˈia mˈoto, nˌao ˌutatˌeketˈeza mˈiti jˈako jˈote, mibˈitʃi na ˌilijˌokaˈuka. miˈali ja mˈoto hˌaitawˈeza kuzˈimwa na kˈila ˈuso kutˈoka kusˈini mpˈaka kˌaskazˈini ˌutakaˈuʃwa kwa mˈoto hˈuo.|0
kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌataˈona kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana n̩dˈije nˌilijˌeuwˈaʃa hˈuo mˈoto, nˌao hˌautazˈimwa..|0
ndˈipo nˌiliposˈema, ˈaa, bwˈana mweɲˈezi! wˌao hˌunisˈema, hˈuju si hˌuzuŋɡˈumza mafˈumbo tˈu?.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌuelekˈeze ˈuso wˈako ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu na ˌuhubˈiri ðˈidi ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu. tabˈiri ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌuiambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi nˈiko kiɲˈume nˈawe. nˌitautˈoa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe ˈala jˌake na kˌumkatilˈia mbˈali mwˌeɲe hˈaki na mwˈovu.|0
kwa sabˈabu nˌitamkˌatilˈia mbˈali mwˌeɲe hˈaki na mwˈovu, upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu ˌutakˈuwa wˈazi ðˈidi ja kˈila mmˈoɟa kˌuanzˈia kusˈini mpˈaka kˌaskazˈini.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˈote wˌataɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimeutˈoa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu kwˈeɲe ˈala jˈake, nˌao hˌautarˈudi hˈumo tˈena..|0
kwa hˈijo lˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu, mwˌanadˈamu! lˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu mbˈele jˈao kwa mˈojo ˌuliˌopondˈeka na kwa huzˈuni ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌao wˌatakˌapokˌuulˈiza, kwa nˈini ˌunalˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu? ˌutasˈema hˈivi, kwa sabˈabu ja habˈari zˌinazokˈuɟa. kˈila mˈojo ˌutajejˈuka na kˈila mkˈono ˌutaleɡˈea, kˈila rˈoho ˌitazimˈia na kˈila ɡˈoti lˌitaleɡˈea kˌama mˈaɟi. habˈari hˈizo zˌinakˈuɟa! hakˈika zˌitatokˈea, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri na usˈeme, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo:  upˈaŋɡa, upˈaŋɡa, ˌuliˌonolˈewa na kˌusuɡulˈiwa.|0
ˌumenolˈewa kwa aɟˈili ja mˌauˈaɟi, ˌumesˌuɡulˈiwa ˌili uŋɡˈae kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi!  ɟˈe, tˌuifˌurahˈie fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala ja mwanˈaŋɡu jˈuda? upˈaŋɡa ˌunaˌiðarˈau kˈila fˈimbo ja nˈamna hˈijo.|0
upˈaŋɡa ˌumewˈekwa tajˈari ˌili kˌusuɡulˈiwa, ˌili upˈate kuʃˈikwa mkonˈoni, ˌumenolˈewa na kˌusuɡulˈiwa, ˌumewˈekwa tajˈari kwa mkˈono wa mˌuuˈaɟi.|0
pˈiɡa kelˈele na ˌuombolˈeze, ˈee mwˌanadˈamu, kwa kˌuwa upˈaŋɡa u ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu; u ðˈidi ja wakˈuu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli. wˌametolˈewa wˌauˈawe kwa upˈaŋɡa pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. kwa hˈijo pˌiɡapˈiɡa kifˈua tʃˈako.|0
kwa maˈana upˈaŋɡa hˈuu ˌumeɟˌaribˈiwa na kˌuhakikˈiʃwa, ˌitakuwˈaɟe bˌasi fˈimbo ja ufˈalme ja jˈuda ˌinajˌouðarˈau kˌama hˌaitˌakuwˈepo tˈena, bˌali ˌitakˈuwa ˌimeˌondolˈewa kabˈisa? asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
hˈivjo bˈasi, mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri na ˌukapˈiɡe makˈofi. upˈaŋɡa wˈako na upˈiɡe mˈara mbˈili, nˈaam, hˌata mˈara tˈatu. ni upˈaŋɡa wa kutʃˈiɲɟa, upˈaŋɡa wa mˌauˈaɟi makˈuu, ˌukiwˌaʃambulˈia kutˈoka kˈila upˈande.|0
ˌili miˈojo ipˈate kˌujejˈuka na wˌanaˌouˈawa wˈawe wˈeŋɡi, nˌimewˈeka upˈaŋɡa wa kutʃˈiɲɟa kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo jˈao jˈote. lˈo! ˌumetˌeŋɡenˈezwa ˌumetemˈete kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi, ˌumeʃˈikwa kwa aɟˈili ja kuˈua.|0
ˈee upˈaŋɡa, kˈata upˈande wa kuˈume, kˈiʃa upˈande wa kuʃˈoto, mahˈali popˈote makˈali jˈako jˌatakˌapoˌelekˈezwa.|0
mˌimi nˌami nˌitapˈiɡa makˈofi, nˈajo ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ˌitapuŋɡˈua. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, wˈeka alˈama ɲɟˈia mbˈili ambˈazo upˈaŋɡa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌutapitˈia, ɲɟˈia hˈizo zˌikianzˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo hˈijo. wˈeka kibˈao pˈale ambˈapo ɲɟˈia zˌinaɡˌawaɲˈika kˌuelekˈea mɟˈini.|0
wˈeka alˈama ɲɟˈia mˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja upˈaŋɡa upˈate kˈuɟa ðˈidi ja rˈaba ja wˌaamˈoni na ɲiŋɡˈine upˈate kˈuɟa ðˈidi ja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu ˌilijˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa ŋɡˈome.|0
kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli sˈasa ˌamesimˈama katˌika ɲɟˈia pˈanda, katˌika mˌakutˈano ja ɲɟˈia mbˈili, ˌakipˈiɡa rˈamli: ˌanapˈiɡa kˈura kwa kˌutumˈia miʃˈale, ˌanatˈaka ʃaˈuri kwa sanˈamu zˈake, ˌanatʃuŋɡˈuza maˈini ja waɲˈama.|0
upˈande wˌake wa kuˈume ˌinakˈuɟa kˈura ja jˌerusalˈemu, ambˈapo ˌatawˈeka vjˈombo vja kˌuvuɲɟˈia bˈoma, ˌili kˌuamrˈiʃa mˌauˈaɟi, kupˈiɡa ˌukelˈele wa vˈita, kuwˈeka vjˈombo vja kˌuvuɲɟˈia bˈoma kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo, kuwˈeka ɟˈeʃi kˌuzuŋɡˈuka na kufˈaɲa ˌuziŋɡirˈaɟi.|0
ˌitakˈuwa kˌama kupˈiɡa rˈamli kwa uˈoŋɡo kwa wˈale wˈatu ambˈao wˌameˈapa kumtˈii jˈeje. lakˈini mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌatawˌakumbˈuʃa ɟˌuːja uˈovu wˌao na kˌuwatʃukˈua matˈeka.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu ˈeɲi wˈatu mmˌekumbˈuʃa uˈovu wˈenu kwa kuˈasi wˌaziwˈazi, mkˌiðihirˈiʃa ðˈambi zˈenu katˌika jˈale jˈote mfaɲˈajo, kwa kˌuwa mmefˈaɲa ɟˈambo hˈili, mtˌatʃukulˈiwa matˈeka.|0
ˈee mtawˈala kafˈiri na mwˈovu wa ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje sˈiku jˈako ˌimewadˈia, ambˈaje wakˈati wˈako wa aðˈabu ˌumefikˈia kilˈele tʃˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: vˈua kilˈemba, ondˈoa tˈaɟi. kwa kˌuwa mˈambo hˌajatakˈuwa kˌama jˌalivjokˈuwa. alˈije mɲˈoŋɡe ˌatakwˈezwa na ˌalijekwˈezwa ˌataʃˈuʃwa.|0
mahˈame! mahˈame! nˌitaufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi kˌuwa mahˈame! hˌautaɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja mpˈaka ˈaɟe jˈule ambˈaje n̩dˈije mwˌeɲe hˈaki nˈao; jˌeje n̩dˈije nˌitakajˈempa..|0
nˈawe, mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri na usˈeme, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kuhˈusu wˌaamˈoni na mˌatukˈano jˈao.  upˈaŋɡa, upˈaŋɡa, ˌumefˈutwa kwa aɟˈili ja kuˈua, ˌumesˌuɡulˈiwa ˌili kˌuaŋɡamˈiza na ˌunamˌetamˈeta kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi.|0
wakˈati wˌakitˈoa maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo kwa aɟˈili jˈako, wˌanapˌobaʃˈiri uˈoŋɡo kwa aɟˈili jˈako, wˌanakuwˈeka wˌewe kwˈeɲe ʃˈiŋɡo za wˈatu wˌapotˈovu, wˈale walˈio waˈovu, wˈale ambˈao sˈiku jˈao ˌimewadˈia, wakˈati wa aðˈabu jˈao ja mwˈiʃo.|0
ˌurudˈiʃe upˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe ˈala jˈake! katˌika mahˈali ˌulipˌoumbˈiwa, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bˈaba zˈako, hˌuko nˌitakˌuhukˈumu.|0
nˌitamwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈako na kˌupulˈiza mˈoto wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako; nˌitakutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˌakatˈili, wˈatu stˈadi katˌika kˌuaŋɡamˈiza.|0
mtakˈuwa kˈuni za kˌuwaʃˈia mˈoto, dˈamu jˈenu ˌitamwˈaɡwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu, wˈala hˌamtakumbˈukwa tˈena; kwa maˈana mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ɟˈe, wˌewe ˌutaˌuhukˈumu? ɟˈe, ˌutaˌuhukˈumu hˈuu ˈm̩ɟi ˌumwaɡˈao dˈamu? bˌasi ˌuuɟulˈiʃe ɟˌuːja matˈendo jˌake jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
ˌuuambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈee ˈm̩ɟi ˈule ˌuɟilˌeteˈao mˌaaŋɡamˈizi weɲˈewe kwa kumwˈaɡa dˈamu ndˈani jˌake na kˌuɟinaɟˈisi weɲˈewe kwa kˌuteŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu.|0
ˌumekˈuwa na hatˈia kwa sabˈabu ja dˈamu ˌulijomwˈaɡa na ˌumetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu ˌulizˌoteŋɡenˈeza. ˌumeɟˌiletˈea mwˈiʃo wa sˈiku zˈako na mwˈiʃo wa miˈaka jˈako ˌumewadˈia. kwa hˈijo nˌitakufˈaɲa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa kwa mˌataˈifa na kˈitu tʃa mzˈaha kwa ˈn̩tʃi zˈote.|0
wˈale walˈio karˈibu na wˈale walˈio mbˈali wˌatakˌuðihˈaki, ˈewe ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe sˈifa m̩bˈaja, ˌulijeɟˈaa ɣasˈia.|0
ˈona ɟˈinsi kˈila m̩kˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌalijˈeko ndˈani jˈako ˌanavjˌotumˈia ŋɡˈuvu zˌake kumwˈaɡa dˈamu.|0
ndˈani jˈako wˌamewˌaðarˈau bˈaba na mˈama, ndˈani jˈako wˌamewˌatendˈea waɡˈeni ˌuðalˈimu na kˌuwaonˈea jatˈima na waɟˈane.|0
mmˌeðarˈau vˈitu vjˈaŋɡu vˌitakatˈifu na kˌuzinaɟˈisi sabˈato zˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈani jˈako wˈako wˈatu wˌasiŋɡˌiziˈaɟi, wˈatu walˈio tajˈari kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, ndˈani jˈako wˈako wˈale wˌanaokˈula vjakˈula vˌilivjˌotolˈewa mahˈali pa ibˈada za miˈuŋɡu kwˈeɲe milˈima, na kutˈenda matˈendo ja ˌuaʃerˈati.|0
ndˈani jˈako wˈako wˈale wˌanaˌovuɲɟˈia heʃˈima vitˈanda vja bˈaba zˈao, ndˈani jˈako wˈamo wˈale wˌanaˌowatendˈea wˌanawˈake ɟeˈuri wakˈiwa katˌika hˈeði, wakˈati wakˈiwa si sˈafi.|0
ndˈani jˈako ˈm̩tu hufˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo na ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake, mwiŋɡˈine kwa aˈibu kˈubwa hˌukutˈana kimwˈili na ˈm̩ke wa mwanˈawe, mwiŋɡˈine humtˈenda ɟeˈuri dˈada jˈake, bˈinti wa bˈaba jˌake hˈasa.|0
ndˈani jˈako wˈatu hˌupokˈea rˈuʃwa ˌili kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, mnˌapokˈea rˈiba na faˈida ja ziˈada na kupˈata faˈida ˌisijokˈuwa halˈali kutˈoka kwa ɟirˈani ˌili kupˈata faˈida kˈubwa kupˈita kiˈasi. nˌawe ˌumenˌisahˈau mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hakˈika nˌitapˈiɡa makˈofi kwa aɟˈili ja faˈida isˈijo halˈali ˌulijˌoɟipatˈia na kwa dˈamu ˌulijˌoimwˈaɡa ndˈani jˈako.|0
ɟˈe, ˌuɟasˈiri wˈako ˌutadˈumu ˌau mikˈono jˈako ˌitakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu sˈiku hˈijo nˌitakˌapokˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia? mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema na nˌitalifˈaɲa.|0
nˌitakˌutawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌukutapˈaɲa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali nˌami nˌitakomˈeʃa ˌunaɟˈisi wˈako.|0
ˌukiˈiʃa kˌunaɟisˈika mbˈele ja mˌataˈifa, ˌutaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌimekˈuwa kwˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈaka ja tʃˈuma, wˈote kwˈaŋɡu wˌamekˈuwa ʃˈaba, bˈati, tʃˈuma na risˈasi ˌilijoˈatʃwa kˌalibˈuni. wˌao ni tˈaka ja madˈini ja fˈeða tˈu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa kˌuwa wˈote mmekˈuwa tˌakatˈaka ja tʃˈuma, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˌama vˈile wˈatu wˌakusaɲˈavjo fˈeða, ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma, risˈasi na bˈati kˌalibˈuni ˌili kˌujejˈuʃa kwa mˈoto mkˈali, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˌakusˈaɲa katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu kˌuwawˈeka ndˈani ja ˈm̩ɟi na kˌuwajejˈuʃa.|0
nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa na kˌupulˈiza ɟˈuu jˈenu mˈoto wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu nˌaɲi mtˌajejˈuʃwa ndˈani ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi.|0
kˌama fˈeða ˌijejukˈavjo kˌalibˈuni, ndˈivjo mtˌakavjˌojejˈuka ndˈani ja hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimemwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈenu..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia tˈena kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌiambˈie ˈn̩tʃi, wˌewe ni ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo hˌaiɟapˈata mvˈua wˈala maɲˈuɲu katˌika sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu..|0
kˈuna hˈila m̩bˈaja ja wakˈuu ndˈani jˌake kˌama sˈimba ˌaŋɡurumˈaje ˌakirarˈua mawˈindo jˈake, wˌanakˈula wˈatu, wˌanatʃukˈua hazˈina na vˈitu vja θamˈani na kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja waɟˈane ndˈani jˈake.|0
mˌakuhˈani wˌake wˌameˌihalˈifu ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu na kˌunaɟˈisi vˈitu vjˈaŋɡu vˌitakatˈifu, hˌawatˌofautˈiʃi kˈati ja vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu na vˈitu vja kˌawaˈida. wˌanafundˈiʃa kˌuwa hakˈuna tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja vˈitu vilˈivjo naɟˈisi na visˈivjo naɟˈisi, nˌao wˌanafˈumba mˈatʃo jˈao katˌika kutˈunza sabˈato zˈaŋɡu, hˈivjo kˌatikˈati jˈao nˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˌaliˈoko ndˈani jˌake ni kˌama ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu wˌararuˈao mawˈindo jˈao, wˌanamwˈaɡa dˈamu na kuˈua wˈatu ˌili kupˈata faˈida ja ˌuðalˈimu.|0
mˌanabˈii wˌake wˌanapˈaka tʃokˈaa matˈendo hˈaja kwa maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo na ˌutabˈiri wa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. wˌanasˈema, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo, wakˈati bwˈana hˌaɟasˈema.|0
wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌanatˈoza kwa ŋɡˈuvu na kufˈaɲa ˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲi, wˌanawatˈenda ɟeˈuri maskˈini na wˌahitˈaɟi na kˌuwaonˈea waɡˈeni, wˌakiwaɲˈima hˈaki.|0
nˌami nˌikatafˈuta ˈm̩tu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, ambˈaje ˌaŋɡeɟˈeŋɡa ukˈuta na kˌusimˈama mbˈele zˈaŋɡu mahˈali pˌalipˌobomˈoka kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi ˌili nisˈiɟe nˌikaˌiaŋɡamˈiza, lakˈini sˌikumwˈona ˈm̩tu jejˈote.|0
hˈivjo nˌitaimwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌuwatˌeketˈeza kwa mˈoto wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, nˌikijalˈeta ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao jˈale jˈote wˌalijotˈenda, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, wˌalikuwˈepo wˌanawˈake wawˈili, bˈinti wa mˈama mmˈoɟa.|0
wakˈawa mˌakahˈaba hˌuko mˈisri, wˌakaɟitˈia kwˈeɲe ˌukahˈaba ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈao. katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ˈile vifˈua vjˈao vja ˌubikˈira vˌikakˌumbatˈiwa hˌuko na wˌakapotˈeza ˌubikˈira wˈao.|0
mkˈubwa ˌaliˈitwa ohˈola na mdˈoɡo wˌake ˌoholˈiba. wˌalikˈuwa wˈaŋɡu nˌao wˌakazˈaa wˌavulˈana na msitʃˈana. ohˈola ni sˌamarˈia, ˌoholˈiba ni jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ohˈola ˌakaɟitˈia kwˈeɲe ˌukahˈaba ˌalipokˈuwa bˈado ni wˈaŋɡu, ˌakatamˈani sˈana wapˈenzi wˈake, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌaaʃˈuru.|0
wˌaliovˈaa ŋɡˈuo za bulˈuu, wˌatawˈala na mˌaɟemadˈari, wˈote wˌalikˈuwa wˌanaˈume viɟˈana wa kˌuvutˈia, wˌapandˈao farˈasi.|0
ˌakafˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba na wasˈomi wˈote wa aʃˈuru, na kˌuɟinaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu zˈote za kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌalijˌemtamˈani.|0
hˌakuˈatʃa ˌukahˈaba wˌake ˌaliˌouˈanza hˌuko mˈisri, wakˈati ambˈapo ʃˈu uɟˈana wˌake wˌanaˈume wˌalilˈala nˈaje, wˌakikˌumbatˈia kifˈua tʃa ˌubikˈira wˌake na kumwˈaɡa tamˈaa zˈao ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌilimtˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wapˈenzi wˈake, wˌaaʃˈuru, kwa kˌuwa n̩dˈio ˌaliˌowatamˈani.|0
wˌakamvˈua ŋɡˈuo zˌake wˌakamwˈatʃa ˈutʃi, wˌakawˌatʃukˈua wanˈawe na bˈinti zˈake, nˌaje wˌakamuˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa. akˈawa kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanawˈake na aðˈabu ˌikatolˈewa ðˈidi jˈake.|0
ˌoholˈiba dˈada jˌake ˌaliliˈona ɟˈambo hˈili, lakˈini kwa tamˈaa zˌake na ˌukahˈaba wˈake, ˌakaharˈibu tabˈia zˌake kulˈiko ohˈola dˈada jˈake.|0
jˌeje nˌaje ˌaliwˌatamˈani wˌaaʃˈuru, wˌatawˈala na mˌaɟemadˈari, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌaliˌovalˈia sˈare, wˌapandˈao farˈasi, wˌanaˈume viɟˈana wˈote wˌaliˌovutˈia.|0
nˌikaˈona kˌuwa jˌeje pˈia ˌaliɟˌinaɟˈisi, wˈote wawˈili wˌakaˌelekˈea ɲɟˈia mˈoɟa.|0
lakˈini jˌeje ˌakazidˈiʃa ˌukahˈaba wˈake. ˌakaˈona wˌanaˈume wˌaliotʃˈorwa ˌukutˈani, pˈitʃa za wˌakaldˈajo wˌaliˌovalˈia ŋɡˈuo ɲekˈundu.|0
wakˈiwa na mikˈanda vˌiunˈoni m̩wˈao na vilˈemba vitʃwˈani m̩wˈao, wˈote wˌalifanˈana na mˌaafˈisa wa babˈeli wˌapandˈao maɡˈari ja vˈita, weɲˈeɟi wa ˌukaldˈajo.|0
mˈara tu ˌalipˌowaˈona, ˌaliwˌatamˈani, ˌakatˈuma waɟˈumbe kwˈao hˌuko ˌukaldˈajo.|0
ndˈipo hˈao wˌababˈeli wakˈaɟa kwˈake kwˈeɲe kitˈanda tʃa mapˈenzi, nˌao katˌika tamˈaa zˈao wˌakamtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi. baˌada ja kutˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi, ˌakawaˈatʃa kwa kˌuwatʃukˈia.|0
ˌalipofˈaɲa ˌukahˈaba wˌake wˌaziwˈazi na kˌuoɲˈeʃa hˌaðarˈani ˈutʃi wˈake, nˌilimwˈatʃa kwa kˌumtʃukˈia, kˌama vˈile nˌilivjokˈuwa nˌimemwˈatʃa dˈada jˈake.|0
lakˈini ˌakazidˈiʃa zaˈidi ˌukahˈaba wˌake ˌalipˌozikumbˈuka sˈiku zˌake za uɟˈana, ˌalipokˈuwa kahˈaba hˌuko mˈisri.|0
hˌuko ˌaliwˌatamˈani wapˈenzi wˈake, ambˈao viˈuŋɡo vjˈao vja uzˈazi ni kˌama vja pˈunda, na kˈile kˌiwatokˈatʃo ni kˌama kˌiwatokˈatʃo farˈasi.|0
hˈivjo ˌulitamˈani ˌuaʃerˈati wa uɟˈana wˈako wakˈati ˌulipokˈuwa mˈisri, kifˈua tʃˈako kˌilipˌokumbatˈiwa, na wˌalipˌokutomˈasa kwa sabˈabu ja matˈiti jˈako matʃˈaŋɡa.|0
kwa hˈijo, ˌoholˈiba, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitawˌatʃotʃˈea wapˈenzi wˈako wˈawe kiɲˈume na wˈewe, wˈale ˌuliˌowaˈatʃa kwa kˌutʃukˈia, nˌitawalˈeta ðˈidi jˈako kutˈoka kˈila upˈande.|0
wˌababˈeli na wˌakaldˈajo wˈote, wˈatu kutˈoka pekˈodi, na ʃˈoa na kˈoa, wakˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˌaaʃˈuru wˈote, viɟˈana wazˈuri, wˈote wakˈiwa wˌatawˈala na mˌaɟemadˈari, mˌaafˈisa wa maɡˈari ja vˈita na wˈatu wa vjˈeo vja ɟˈuu, wˈote wakˈiwa wˌamepˈanda farˈasi.|0
wˌatakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˈako wakˈiwa na silˈaha, maɡˈari ja vˈita, maɡˈari ja kˌukokˈota, pamˈoɟa na umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu. wˌatakˌuziŋɡˈira pˈande zˈote kwa ŋɡˈao na viɡˈao na kofˈia za tʃˈuma. nˌitakutˈia mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao ˌili wˌakuaðˈibu, nˌao wˌatakˌuaðˈibu sˌawasˈawa na ʃerˈia zˈao.|0
nˌitaˌelekˈeza wˈivu wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako, nˌao wˌatakˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia kwa hasˈira kˈali. wˌatakˌatilˈia mbˈali pˈua jˈako na mˌasikˈio jˈako, na wˈale wˌatakˌaosalˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈako wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa. wˌatatʃukˈua wˈana wˈako na bˈinti zˈako, na wˈale wˌatakˌaosalˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu wˌatatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
wˌatakuvˈua pˈia ŋɡˈuo zˈako na kˌutʃukˈua mapˈambo jˈako jˌalijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa vˈito na ðahˈabu.|0
hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokomˈeʃa ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako na ˌukahˈaba wˈako ˌuliˌouˈanza hˌuko mˈisri. hˌutatazˈama vˈitu hˈivi kwa kˌuvitamˈani tˈena, wˈala kˌukumbˈuka mˈisri tˈena.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌukutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale ˌunaˌowatʃukˈia, kwa wˈale ˌuliˌoɟitˈeŋɡa nˌao kwa kˌuwatʃukˈia.|0
wˌatakˌuʃuɣˌulikˈia kwa tʃˈuki na kˌukuɲaŋɡˈaɲa kˈila kˈitu ˌulitʃˌokifaɲˈia kˈazi. wˌatakuˈatʃa ˈutʃi na mtˈupu na aˈibu ja ˌukahˈaba wˈako ˌitafˌunulˈiwa. ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako na uzˈinzi wˈako.|0
ˌumekˌuletˈea hˈaja jˈote, kwa sabˈabu ˌulitamˈani mˌataˈifa na kˌuɟinaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu zˈao.|0
ˌumeˌiendˈea ɲɟˈia ja dˈada jˈako, hˈivjo nˌitakitˈia kikˈombe tʃˈake mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˌutakˌiɲuˈea kikˈombe tʃa dˈada jˈako, kikˈombe kikˈubwa na tʃˌeɲe kˈina kirˈefu; nˌitaletˈea ɟˈuu jˈako ðarˈau na ðihˈaka, kwa kˌuwa kˌimeɟˈaa sˈana.|0
ˌutalˈewa ulˈevi na kuɟˈawa huzˈuni, kikˈombe tʃa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo na ukˈiwa, kikˈombe tʃa dˈada jˈako sˌamarˈia.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa kˌuwa ʃˈu ˌulipˌonisahˈau mˌimi na kˌunitˈupa ɲˈuma jˈako, lazˈima ubˈebe mˌatokˈeo ja ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako na ˌukahˈaba wˈako.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, ɟˈe, ˌutawˌahukˈumu ohˈola na ˌoholˈiba? bˌasi wˌakabˈili kwa aɟˈili ja matˈendo jˈao ja mˌatʃukˈizo.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌamefˈaɲa uzˈinzi na dˈamu ˈimo mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. wˌamefˈaɲa uzˈinzi na sanˈamu zˈao, hˌata wˌamewatˈoa watˈoto wˌao wˌaliˌonizalˈia kˌuwa kafˈara, kˌuwa tʃakˈula kwˈao.|0
pˈia wˌamenˌifaɲˈia hˈili: wakˈati hˈuo hˈuo wˌamenaɟˈisi pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu na kˌuzitaŋɡˈua sabˈato zˈaŋɡu.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˈile wˌalitˈoa watˈoto wˌao kˌuwa kafˈara kwa sanˈamu zˈao, wˌaliiŋɡˈia pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu na kˌupatˈia ˌunaɟˈisi. hˌilo ndˈilo wˌalilˌolifˈaɲa katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌalitˈuma hˌata waɟˈumbe kˌuwaˈita wˈatu kutˈoka mbˈali, nˌao wˌalipˌowasˈili ˌuliˈoɡa kwa aɟˈili jˈao, ˌukapˈaka mˈatʃo jˈako rˈaŋɡi na ˌukavˈaa mapˈambo jˈako jˌalijˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa vˈito vja ðahˈabu.|0
ˌukakˈeti kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃa anˈasa, kukˈiwa na mˈeza ˌilijˌoandalˈiwa mbˈele jˌake ambˈajo ɟˈuu jˌake ˌulikˈuwa ˌumewˈeka uvˈumba na mafˈuta ambˈajo jˌalikˈuwa jˈaŋɡu.|0
kelˈele za umˈati wa wˈatu wˌasioɟˈali zˌilikˈuwa zˌimemzuŋɡˈuka, wˌakalˈeta wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakifˈaɲa mˌakelˈele na walˈevi kutˈoka ɲikˈani, ambˈao wˌalitˈia baŋɡˈili kwˈeɲe mikˈono ja jˈule mwanˈamke na dˈada jˌake na pˈia tˈaɟi nzˈuri za kˌupendˈeza kwˈeɲe vˈitʃwa vjˈao.|0
ndˈipo nˌikasˈema kuhˈusu jˈule ˌalijˌetʃakˈazwa na uzˈinzi, bˌasi wˌamtumˈie kˌama kahˈaba, kwa kˌuwa ndˈivjo alˈivjo..|0
nˌao wˌakazˈini nˈaje. kˌama vˈile wˈatu wˌazinˈivjo na kahˈaba, n̩dˈijo hˈivjo wˌalivjozˈini na hˈao wˌanawˈake wˌaaʃerˈati, ohˈola na ˌoholˈiba.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˌeɲe hˈaki, wˌatawˌahukumˈia aðˈabu wˌanawˈake wˌafaɲˈao uzˈinzi na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, kwa kˌuwa ni wazˈinzi na dˈamu ˈiko mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo, letˈeni wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌeɲe mˌakelˈele ðˈidi jˈao na ˌuwaˈatʃe wapˈate hˈofu na watˈekwe ɲˈara.|0
hˈao wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wˌatawapˈiɡa kwa mˈawe na kˌuwaˈua kwa pˈaŋɡa zˈao, wˌatawaˈua wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao na kˌuzitʃˈoma ɲˈumba zˈao.|0
hˈivjo nˌitaˌukomˈeʃa ˌuaʃerˈati katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili wˌanawˈake wˈote wapˈate ˈoɲo nˌao wasˈiɟe wˌakafˈaɲa ˌuaʃerˈati kˌama nˈiɲi mlˌivjofˈaɲa.|0
ˌutapˈata aðˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako na kˌutʃukˈua mˌatokˈeo ja ðˈambi zˈako za ˌuaʃerˈati. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈisa, mwˈezi wa kˈumi, sˈiku ja kˈumi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, wˈeka kˌumbukˈumbu ja tarˈehe hˌii, tarˈehe hˌii hˈasa, kwa kˌuwa mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌameˌuziŋɡˈira ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu kwa ɟˈeʃi sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo.|0
ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba hˌii ja kuˈasi fˈumbo, na ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  telˈeka sˌufurˈia ɟikˈoni; ˌitelˈeke na ˌumimˈine mˈaɟi ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˈeka vipˈande vja ɲˈama ndˈani jˈake, vipˈande vjˈote vizˈuri, vja pˈaɟa na vja bˈeɡa. iɟˈaze hˈijo sˌufurˈia kwa mifˈupa hˌii mizˈuri.|0
tʃaɡˈua jˈule alˈije bˈora wa kˈundi la kondˈoo. pˈaŋɡa kˈuni tʃˈini ja sˌufurˈia kwa aɟˈili ja mifˈupa; tʃotʃˈea mpˈaka itʃˈemke na ˌuitokˈose hˈijo mifˈupa ndˈani jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  ˈole wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌumwaɡˈao dˈamu, ˈole wa sˌufurˈia ambˈajo sˈasa ˈina ukˈoko ndˈani jˈake, ambˈajo ukˈoko wˌake hˌautˈoki. kˌipakˈue kipˈande baˌada ja kipˈande, bˌila kˌuvipiɡˈia kˈura.|0
kwa kˌuwa dˈamu ˌalijˌoimwˈaɡa ˈipo kˌatikˈati jˈake: hˈujo mwanˈamke ˌaliimwˈaɡa ɟˌuːja mwˈamba ulˈio wˈazi; hˌakuimwˈaɡa kwˈeɲe ˈarði, ambˈako vˈumbi lˌiŋɡeˌifunˈika.|0
kˌutʃotʃˈea ɣaðˈabu na kˌulipˈiza kisˈasi, nˌimemwˈaɡa dˈamu jˌake ɟˌuːja mwˈamba ulˈio wˈazi, ˌili ˌisifunˈikwe.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  ˈole wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌumwaɡˈao dˈamu! mˌimi nˌami nˌitalˌundikˈia kˈuni ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
kwa hˈijo lundˈika kˈuni na uwˈaʃe mˈoto. pˈika hˈijo ɲˈama vizˈuri, tʃaŋɡˈaɲa viˈuŋɡo ndˈani jˈake, na ˌuiˈatʃe mifˈupa ˌiuŋɡˈue kwˈeɲe mˈoto.|0
kˈiʃa telˈeka sˌufurˈia tˈupu kwˈeɲe makˈaa mpˈaka ˈiwe na mˈoto sˈana na ʃˈaba jˌake iŋɡˈae, ˌili utʃˈafu wˌake upˈate kˌujejˈuka na ukˈoko wˌake upˈate kˌuuŋɡˈua na kˌuondˈoka.|0
ˌimezuˈia ɟuhˈudi zˈote, ukˈoko wˌake mwˈiŋɡi hˌauɟˌaondˈoka, hˌata ikˈiwa ni kwa mˈoto.|0
sˈasa utʃˈafu wˈako ni ˌuaʃerˈati wˈako. kwa sabˈabu nˌiliɟarˈibu kˌukutakˈasa lakˈini hˌaikˌuwezekˈana kˌutakˈaswa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe hˈuo utʃˈafu wˈako, hˌutatˌakasˈika tˈena mpˈaka ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako ˈiwe ˌimepuŋɡˈua.|0
mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesˈema, wakˈati ˌumewadˈia wa mˌimi kutˈenda. mˌimi sˌitazuˈia, mˌimi sˌitaˈona hurˈuma wˈala sˌitapuŋɡˈuza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu, ˌutahˌukumˈiwa sˌawasˈawa na mwenˈendo na matˈendo jˈako, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, kwa pˈiɡo mˈoɟa nˌakaribˈia kˌukuˌondolˈea kˈile kilˈitʃo furˈaha ja mˈatʃo jˈako. lakˈini ˌusiˌombolˈeze ˌau kulˈia wˈala kˌudondˈoʃa matʃˈozi jojˈote.|0
lˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kˈimja kˈimja ˌusimwˌombolezˈee ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa. ɟifˈuŋɡe kilˈemba tʃˈako na uvˈae viˈatu vjˈako mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈako, ˌusifunˈike sehˈemu ja tʃˈini ja ˈuso wˈako, wˈala usˈile vjakˈula vja kˌawaˈida vja wakˈati wa matˈaŋɡa.|0
hˈivjo nˌikanˈena na wˈatu ˌasubˈuhi na ɟiˈoni ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu akˈafa. ˌasubˈuhi jˌake nˌilifˈaɲa kˌama nˌilivjˌoamrˈiwa.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˌakanˌiulˈiza, ɟˈe, ɟˈambo hˈili ˌunalofˈaɲa lˌinamˌaanˈiʃa nˈini kwˈetu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikawˌaambˈia, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌiliniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
sˈema na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌupatˈia ˌunaɟˈisi mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu, ŋɡˈome ambˈajo ndˈani jˌake mnaˈona fahˈari, furˈaha ja mˈatʃo jˈenu, kˈitu mnˌatʃokipˈenda. wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu mlˌiowaˈatʃa ɲˈuma wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
nˌaɲi mtafˈaɲa kˌama nˌilivjofˈaɲa. hˌamtafunˈika sehˈemu ja tʃˈini ja ɲˈuso zˈenu wˈala hˌamtakˈula vjakˈula vja kˌawaˈida vja wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi.|0
mtˌaɟifˈuŋɡa vilˈemba vitʃwˈani mwˈenu na kuvˈaa viˈatu vjˈenu mˌiɡuˈuni mwˈenu. hˌamtaˌombolˈeza ˌau kulˈia, lakˈini mtˌaðoofˈika kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈenu na kulˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kˈila ˈm̩tu na mwenzˈake.|0
ˌezekiˈeli ˌatakˈuwa iʃˈara kwˈenu, mtafˈaɲa kˌama jˌeje ˌalivjofˈaɲa. wakˈati ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitakˌapotokˈea, mtaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈawe, mwˌanadˈamu, sˈiku ˈile nˌitakˌapoondˈoa ŋɡˈome jˈao ilˈijo furˈaha jˈao na ˌutukˈufu wˈao, kˈitu tʃa kˌupendˈeza mˈatʃo jˈao, kˈile kilˈitʃo ʃaˈuku ja miˈojo jˈao, wˈana wˌao na bˈinti zˈao vˌilevˈile.|0
sˈiku hˈijo ˌatakˌajetorˈoka ˌatakˈuɟa kˌuwapˈaʃa habˈari.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile kˈiɲua tʃˈako kˌitamfˌumbukˈia jˌeje ˌalijˌenusurˈika, nˌawe ˌutaoŋɡˈea wˈala hˌutaɲamˈaza tˈena. hˈivjo wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa iʃˈara kwˈao, nˌao wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˈako ɟˌuːja wˌaamˈoni ˌutabˈiri ðˈidi jˈao.|0
wˌaambˈie, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana mweɲˈezi. hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu ˌulisˈema, ˈaha! ɟˌuːja mahˈali pˈaŋɡu pˌatakatˈifu pˌalipotˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi, na ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli ˌilipˌoaŋɡamˈizwa, na ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa jˈuda wˌalipokwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitawatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa mˌaʃarˈiki mkˈawe mˈali jˈao. wˌatapˈiɡa kˈambi zˈao kˌatikˈati jˈenu na kufˈaɲa makˈazi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, wˌatakˈula matˈunda jˈenu na kˈuɲua mazˈiwa jˈenu.|0
nˌitaufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi wa rˈaba kˌuwa malˈiʃo ja ŋɡamˈia na amˈoni kˌuwa mahˈali pa kondˈoo pa kˌupumzikˈia. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa kˌuwa ˌumepˈiɡa makˈofi jˈako na kufˈaɲa kiʃˈindo kwa miɡˈuu, mkˌifurahˈia kwa miˈojo jˈenu miˈovu ɟˌuːja jˈale mabˈaja jˌalijˌoipˈata ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈivjo nˌitaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako na kˌukutˈoa kˌuwa ɲˈara kwa mˌataˈifa. nˌitakˌukatilˈia mbˈali kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˌataˈifa na kˌukuŋɡˈoa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. nˌitakˌuaŋɡamˈiza, nˌawe ˌutaɟˈua ja kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu moˈabu na seˈiri wˌamesˈema, tazˈama, ɲˈumba ja jˈuda ˌimekˈuwa kˌama mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitaˌiondˈoa ˈile mˈiɟi ilˈijo kˈando ja moˈabu, kˌuanzˈia mˈiɟi ˌilijˈoko mˌipakˈani, jaˈani: bˈeθ jˌeʃimˈoθi, bˈaal meˈoni na kˌiriˌaθaˈimu, ilˈijo ˌutukˈufu wa ˈn̩tʃi hˈijo.|0
nˌitaitˈia moˈabu pamˈoɟa na wˌaamˈoni mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuwa mˈilki jˈao, ˌili kwˌamba wˌaamˈoni wˌasikumbˈukwe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
nˌami nˌitatˈoa aðˈabu kwa moˈabu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu edˈomu ˌulilipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda na kukˈosa sˈana kwa kufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitaˌuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja edˈomu na kuˈua wˈatu wˌake na waɲˈama wˈao. nˌitaufˈaɲa ukˈiwa, kˌuanzˈia temˈani hˌadi dedˈani wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
nˌitalipˈiza edˈomu kisˈasi kwa mkˈono wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, nˌao wˌatawˌatendˈea edˈomu sˌawasˈawa na hasˈira jˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌatakiɟˈua kisˈasi tʃˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu wˌafilˈisti wˌamewˌalipˈiza kisˈasi kwa uˈovu wa miˈojo jˈao na kwa ˌuadˈui wa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi wˌakatˈaka kˌuaŋɡamˈiza jˈuda.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi nˌinakˌaribˈia kˌuuɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja wˌafilˈisti, nˌami nˌitawˌakatilˈia mbˈali wˌakerˈeθi na kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈale wˌaliˌosalˈia katˌika pwˈani.|0
nˌitalipˈiza kisˈasi kikˈubwa ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌuwaaðˈibu katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapolipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˈuu jˈao..|0
mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, kwa sabˈabu tˈiro ˌamesˈema kuhˈusu jˌerusalˈemu, ˈaha! lˈaŋɡo la kwˈenda kwa mˌataˈifa lˌimevuɲɟˈika, nˈajo milˈaŋɡo jˌake ˈiko wˈazi mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, sˈasa kwa kˌuwa ˌamekˈuwa maɡˈofu nˌitastˈawi..|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi nˈiko kiɲˈume na wˈewe, ˈee tˈiro, nˌami nˌitalˈeta mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi ðˈidi jˈako, kˌama bahˈari ˌinajˌovurumˈiʃa mawˈimbi jˈake.|0
wˌatavˈuɲɟa kˈuta za tˈiro na kˌuibomˈoa minˈara jˈake, nˌitakwaŋɡˈua udˈoŋɡo wˌake na kˌuufˈaɲa mwˈamba mtˈupu.|0
ˌitakˈuwa hˌuko kˌatikˈati ja bahˈari pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pa kˌutandˈaza ɲˈavu za kˌuvulˈia samˈaki, kwa maˈana nˌimenˈena, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. ˌatakˈuwa ɲˈara kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
nˈajo makˈao jˌake hˌuko bˈara jˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa upˈaŋɡa. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa maˈana hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini nˌitamlˈeta ðˈidi ja tˈiro mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza wa babˈeli, mfˈalme wa wafˈalme, akˈiwa na farˈasi na maɡˈari ja vˈita, wapˈanda farˈasi na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa.|0
ˌatajˌaharˈibu makˈao jˈako hˌuko bˈara kwa upˈaŋɡa, ˌatawˈeka ɟˈeʃi kˌukuziŋɡˈira, ˌatakˌuziŋɡˈira mpˈaka kwˈeɲe kˈuta za ŋɡˈome zˈako na kˌuinˈua ŋɡˈao zˌake ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ˌataˌelekˈeza mapˈiɡo ja vjˈombo vjˈake vja kˌubomolˈea ðˈidi ja kˈuta zˈako na kˌubomˈoa minˈara jˈako kwa silˈaha zˈake.|0
farˈasi zˌake zˌitakˈuwa ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba ˌutafunˈikwa na mavˈumbi wˌatakˌajotimˈua. kˈuta zˈako zˌitatˌikisˈika kwa mʃˈindo wa farˈasi wa vˈita, maɡˈari makˈubwa na maɡˈari ja vˈita wakˈati ˌaiŋɡiˈapo malˈaŋɡo jˈako kˌama wˈatu wˌaiŋɡiˈao ˈm̩ɟi ambˈao kˈuta zˌake zˌimebˌomolˈewa kˈote.|0
kwˈato za farˈasi zˌake zˌitakaɲˈaɡa bˌarabˈara zˈako zˈote, ˌatawaˈua wˈatu wˈako kwa upˈaŋɡa na ŋɡˈuzo zˈako zilˈizo imˈara zˌitaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini.|0
wˌatatˈeka ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na kˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara biðˈaa zˈako, wˌatazivˈuɲɟa kˈuta zˈako na kˌuzibomˈoa ɲˈumba zˈako nzˈuri, wˌatatˈupa bˌaharˈini mˈawe jˈako, m̩bˈao zˈako na kifˈusi tʃˈako.|0
nˌitakomˈeʃa kelˈele za ɲˈimbo zˈako, na ˌuimbˈaɟi wˈako wa kinˈubi kˈamwe hˌautˌasikˈika tˈena.|0
nˌitakufˈaɲa mwˈamba mtˈupu, nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa mahˈali pa kˌutandazˈia ɲˈavu za kˌuvulˈia samˈaki. kˈamwe hˌutaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena, kwa maˈana mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kwa tˈiro: ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani hˌazitˌatetemˈeka kwa kiʃˈindo tʃa aŋɡˈuko lˈako, wakˈati mˌaɟerˈuhi wˌanapolˈia kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali na wakˈati mˌauˈaɟi jˌanaˌendelˈea ndˈani jˈako.|0
ndˈipo wakˈuu wˈote wa mˌataˈifa ja pwˈani wˌataʃˈuka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vˈiti vjˈao vja ˈenzi na kuwˈeka kˈando maɟˈoho jˈao na kuvˈua ŋɡˈuo zˈao zˌilizˌotarizˈiwa. wakˈiwa wˌamevˈikwa hˈofu kˈuu, wˌatakˈeti tʃˈini arðˈini, wakˈiwa wˌanatˌetemˈeka kˈila dakˈika na wˌakikˌustaɟabˈia.|0
ndˈipo wˌao wˌatakˌuombˌolezˈea na kˌukuambˈia:  tazˈama ɟˈinsi ˌulivjˌoharibˈiwa, ˈee ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliokˈuwa na sˈifa, wˌewe ˌulijˌekalˈiwa na mˌabaharˈia! ˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kwˈeɲe bahˈari, wˌewe na wˈatu wˈako; wˈote wˌalioˈiʃi hˌuko, ˌuliwatˈia hˈofu kˈuu.|0
sˈasa ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani zˌinatˌetemˈeka katˌika sˈiku ja aŋɡˈuko lˈako; visˈiwa vˌilivjˈomo bˌaharˈini vˌinaoɡˈopa kwa kˌuporomˈoka kwˈako..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitakˌapokufˈaɲa ˈuwe ˈm̩ɟi wa ukˈiwa, kˌama mˈiɟi ˌisijˌokalˈiwa tˈena na wˈatu, nˌitakˌapolˈeta vilˈindi vja bahˈari ɟˈuu jˈako na mˈaɟi jˌake makˈuu jˌatakˌapokˌufunˈika.|0
ndˈipo nˌitakˌapokuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni, kwa wˈatu wa kˈale, nˌami nˌitakufˈaɲa uˈiʃi katˌika pˈande za tʃˈini za ˈn̩tʃi kˌama katˌika maɡˈofu ja kˈale, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni, nˌawe hˌutarˈudi ˌau kˌureɟˈea kwˈeɲe makˈao jˈako katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
nˌitakˌufikˈiʃa mwˈiʃo wa kutˈiʃa wˈala hˌutakuwˈepo tˈena. wˈatu wˌatakˌutafˈuta, lakˈini kˈamwe hˌutaˌonekˈana tˈena, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, fˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja tˈiro.|0
ˌumwambˈie tˈiro, ˌuliˈoko kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la bahˈari, ˌufaɲˈao bˌiaʃˈara na mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi ja pwˈani, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  ˈee tˈiro, wˌewe ˌumesˈema, mˌimi ni mkˌamilˈifu katˌika uzˈuri.|0
mipˈaka jˈako ˌilikˈuwa katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari, waɟˈenzi wˈako wˌalikˌamilˈiʃa uzˈuri wˈako.|0
wˌalizifˈaɲa m̩bˈao zˈako zˈote kwa mˌisunobˈari ˌitokˈajo senˈiri; wˌalitʃukˈua mˌierˈezi kutˈoka lˌebanˈoni kˌukutˌeŋɡenezˈea mliŋɡˈoti.|0
wˌalitʃukˈua mˌialˈoni tˌoka baʃˈani wˌakakˌuteŋɡˌenezˈea mˌakasˈia jˈako; kwa mˈiti ja msandˈuku kutˈoka pwˈani ja kitˈimu wˌakatˌeŋɡenˈeza sitˈaha jˈako na kˌuipˈamba kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu.|0
kitˈani sˈafi kˌilitʃˌotarizˈiwa kutˈoka mˈisri kˌilikˈuwa tˈaŋɡa lˈako, nˈatʃo kˌilikˈuwa bendˈera jˈako; tʃˌandarˈua tʃˈako kˌilikˈuwa tʃa rˈaŋɡi ja bulˈuu na ja zˌambarˈau kutˈoka visˈiwa vja elˈiʃa.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka sidˈoni na arvˈadi wˌalikˈuwa wapˈiɡa mˌakasˈia jˈako; wˈatu wˈako wˌeɲe ustˈadi, ˈee tˈiro, wˌalikˈuwa n̩dˈio mˌabaharˈia wˈako.|0
wazˈee wa ɡebˈali pamˈoɟa na mafˈundi stˈadi wˌalikˈuwa mafˈundi wˈako melˈini. mˈeli zˈote za bˌaharˈini na mˌabaharˈia wˌao wˌalikˈuɟa kwˈako ˌili kˌubadˌiliʃˈana biðˈaa zˈako.|0
wˈatu wa ˌuaɟˈemi, lˈudi na pˈutu wˌalikˈuwa askˈari katˌika ɟˈeʃi lˈako. wˌalitundˈika ŋɡˈao zˈao na tʃapˈeo zˈao kwˈeɲe kˈuta zˈako, wˌakilˈeta fahˈari jˈako.|0
wˈatu wa arvˈadi na wa helˈeki wˌalikˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈuta zˈako pˈande zˈote; wˈatu wa ɡamˈadi wˌalikˈuwa kwˈeɲe minˈara jˈako. wˌalitundˈika ŋɡˈao zˈao kˌuzizuŋɡˈuka kˈuta zˈako; wˌakaˌukamilˈiʃa uzˈuri wˈako.|0
tarʃˈiʃi wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˌawe kwa sabˈabu ja ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako mkˈubwa wa biðˈaa, wˌalibˌadilˈiʃa fˈeða, tʃˈuma, bˈati na risˈasi kwa mˈali zˈako.|0
ˌujunˈani, tubˈali na meʃˈeki, wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˈawe, wˌalibˌadilˈiʃa watˈumwa na vjˈombo vja ʃˈaba kwa biðˈaa zˈako.|0
wˈatu wa bˈeθ toɡˈarma wˌalibˌadilˈiʃa farˈasi wa mizˈiɡo, farˈasi wa vˈita na ɲˈumbu kwa mˈali zˈako.|0
wˈatu wa dedˈani wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˈawe, wˈatu wˈeŋɡi wa ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani wˌalikˈuwa wˌatʃuˈuzi wˈako, wˌalikulˈipa kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu na mpˈiŋɡo.|0
wˈatu wa arˈamu wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˌawe kwa aɟˈili ja wˈiŋɡi wa kˈazi za mikˈono jˈako, wˌakibˌadiliʃˈana kwa almˈasi, vˌitambˈaa vja rˈaŋɡi ja zˌambarˈau, vˌitambˈaa vˌilivjˌotarizˈiwa, kitˈani sˈafi, mˌatumbˈawe na akˈiki ɲekˈundu.|0
jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˈawe, wˌalibˌadiliʃˈana kwa ŋɡˈano kutˈoka minˈiθi, mtˈama, asˈali, mafˈuta na zˈeri ja kˌupoɲeʃˈea.|0
damˈeski, kwa sabˈabu ja wˈiŋɡi wa kˈazi za mikˈono jˈako na ukˈuu wa ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˈali, wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˌawe wˌakibˌadiliʃˈana mvˈiɲo kutˈoka helbˈoni na sˈufu kutˈoka zahˈari.|0
wadˈani na wˌajunˈani kutˈoka uzˈali, wˌalikˌuletˈea mˈali za bˌiaʃˈara, nˌao wˌakabˌadiliʃˈana nˌawe tʃˈuma kˌilitʃˌofulˈiwa, mdˌalasˈini na mtʃˌaitʃˈai.|0
dedˈani ˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˌawe kwa mˌatandˈiko ja farˈasi.|0
ˌarabˈuni na wakˈuu wˈote wa kedˈari wˌalikˈuwa wˌanunˈuzi wˈako wˌaliˌobadˌiliʃˈana biðˈaa zˈako na wˌanakondˈoo, kondˈoo dˈume na mbˈuzi.|0
wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa ʃˈeba na wa raˈama wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˈawe, wˌakabˌadiliʃˈana biðˈaa zˈako na aˈina zˈote za vˌikolˈezi, vˈito vja θamˈani na ðahˈabu.|0
harˈani, kˈane na edˈeni na wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa ʃˈeba, aʃˈuru na kilmˈadi wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˈawe.|0
kwˈeɲe sˈoko lˈako, wˌalifˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara nˌawe kwa mavˈazi mazˈuri, vˌitambˈaa vja bulˈuu, ŋɡˈuo za kˌutarizˈiwa na mˌazulˈia ja rˈaŋɡi mbˌalimbˈali jˌeɲe kˈamba zˌilizˌosokˈotwa na kuwˈekwa mafˈundo imˈara.|0
mˌerikˈebu za tarʃˈiʃi ndˈizo zˌinazˌokusˌafiriʃˈia biðˈaa zˈako. ˌumeɟˈazwa ʃehˈena kˈubwa katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari.|0
wapˈiɡa mˌakasˈia wˈako wˌanakˌupelˈeka mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi makˈavu. lakˈini upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌumekuvˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari.|0
ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako, biðˈaa zˈako na mˈali zˈako, mˌabaharˈia wˈako, mˌanahˈoða wˈako, mafˈundi wˈako wa mˈeli, wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˈako na askˈari wˈako wˈote, na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijˈeko melˈini ˌatazˈama kwˈeɲe mˈojo wa bahˈari sˈiku ˈile ja kˌuvuɲɟˈika kwa mˈeli jˈako.|0
ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani zˌitatˌetemˈeka wakˈati mˌabaharˈia wˈako wˌatakˌapopˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
wˈote wˌapiɡˈao mˌakasˈia wˌataˈatʃa mˈeli zˈao, mˌabaharˈia wˈote na wˌanamˈaɟi wˈote wˌatasimˈama pwˈani.|0
wˌatapˈaza saˈuti zˈao na kulˈia sˈana kwa aɟˈili jˈako; wˌataɟˌitupˈia mavˈumbi ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈao na kˌuɟivˌiŋɡirˈiʃa kwˈeɲe maɟˈivu.|0
wˌataɲˈoa ɲuˈele zˈao kwa aɟˈili jˈako, nˌao wˌatavˈaa ŋɡˈuo za mˌaɡunˈia. wˌatakˌulilˈia kwa utʃˈuŋɡu wa mˈojo na kwa mˌaombolˈezo makˈuu.|0
wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌanalˈia na kˌuombolˈeza ɟˈuu jˈako, wˌatafˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo kˌukuhˈusu wˌakisˈema: ni nˈani ˌalijepˈata kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa kˌama tˈiro, katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari.|0
wakˈati biðˈaa zˈako zˌilipotˈoka bˌaharˈini, ˌulitˌoʃelˈeza mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi; kwa wˈiŋɡi wa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na biðˈaa zˈako ˌulitˌaɟirˈiʃa wafˈalme wa dunˈia.|0
sˈasa ˌumevˌuɲɟavˈuɲɟua na bahˈari, katˌika vilˈindi vja mˈaɟi, biðˈaa zˈako na kˈundi lˈako lˈote vˌimezˈama pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za pwˈani wˌanakˌustaˌaɟabˈia; wafˈalme wˌao wˌanatˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu kˈuu, nˈazo ɲˈuso zˈao zˌimekˌuɲɟamˈana kwa wˈoɡa.|0
wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa wˌanakutʃˈeka; ˌumefikˈia mwˈiʃo wa kutˈiʃa nˌawe hˌutakuwˈepo tˈena..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, mwambˈie mfˈalme wa tˈiro, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  kwa sabˈabu mˈojo wˈako ˌumeɟivˈuna na ˌumesˈema, mˌimi ni mˈuŋɡu; nˌami nˌinakˈeti katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi tʃa mˈuŋɡu katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari. lakˈini wˌewe ni mwˌanadˈamu, wˈala si mˈuŋɡu, iŋɡˈawa ˌunafikˈiri kˌuwa ˈuna hekˈima kˌama mˈuŋɡu.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ˈuna hekˈima kulˈiko dˌaniˈeli? ɟˈe, hakˈuna sˈiri ˌilijˌofitʃˈika kwˈako.|0
kwa hekˈima jˈako na ˌufahˈamu wˈako, ˌumeɟˌipatˈia ˌutaɟˈiri, nˌawe ˌumeɟˌikusaɲˈia ðahˈabu na fˈeða katˌika hazˈina zˈako.|0
kwa werˈevu wˈako mwˈiŋɡi katˌika bˌiaʃˈara, ˌumeoŋɡˈeza ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako na kwa sabˈabu ja ˌutaɟˈiri wˈako mˈojo wˈako ˌumekˈuwa na kibˈuri.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  kwa sabˈabu ˌunafikˈiri ˈuna hekˈima, mwˌeɲe hekˈima kˌama mˈuŋɡu.|0
mˌimi nˌitawalˈeta waɡˈeni ðˈidi jˈako, taˈifa katˈili kulˈiko jˈote; wˌatafˈuta pˈaŋɡa zˈao ðˈidi ja uzˈuri wa hekˈima jˈako, na kˌutʃafˈua fahˈari jˈako ˌinajoŋɡˈaa.|0
wˌatakuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini ʃimˈoni, nˌawe ˌutakˈufa kˈifo tʃa kˌikatˈili katˌika mˈojo wa bahˈari.|0
ɟˈe, wakˈati hˈuo ˌutasˈema, mˌimi ni mˈuŋɡu, mbˈele ja wˈale wˌanaˌokuˈua? ˌutakˈuwa mwˌanadˈamu tˈu, wˈala si mˈuŋɡu, mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈao wˌanaˌokuˈua.|0
ˌutakˈufa kˈifo tʃa wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa kwa mkˈono wa waɡˈeni. kwa kˌuwa mˌimi nˌimenˈena, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, mfaɲˈie mˌaombolˈezo mfˈalme wa tˈiro, nˌawe ˌumwambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  ˌulikˈuwa kipˈeo tʃa ˌukamilˈifu, ukˈiwa ˌumeɟˈaa hekˈima na mkˌamilˈifu katˌika uzˈuri.|0
ˌulikˈuwa ndˈani ja edˈeni, bustˈani ja mˈuŋɡu; kˈila kˈito tʃa θamˈani kˌilikupˈamba: akˈiki ɲekˈundu, jakˈuti maɲɟˈano na zˌumarˈidi, krˌisolˈiθo, ʃohˈamu na jˈaspi, jakˈuti samˈawi, almˈasi na zˌabaraɟˈadi. kuwˈekwa kwa hˈajo mapˈambo na kˌuʃikˈizwa kwˈake kˌulifˈaɲua kwa ðahˈabu; sˈiku ˈile ˌulipoˈumbwa jˌaliˌandalˈiwa tajˈari.|0
ˌulitˈiwa mafˈuta kˌuwa kerˈubi mlˈinzi, kwa kˌuwa hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌilivjˌokuwˈeka wˈakfu. ˌulikˈuwa kwˈeɲe mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu wa mˈuŋɡu; ˌulitembˈea kˌatikˈati ja vˈito vja mˈoto.|0
ˌulikˈuwa mɲˈofu katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈako ʃˈu sˈiku ˈile ja kuˈumbwa kwˈako, hˌadi uˈovu ˌulipˌoonekˈana ndˈani jˈako.|0
kˌutokˈana na bˌiaʃˈara jˈako ˌilijˌoenˈea, ˌuliɟˈazwa na ðulˈuma, nˌawe ˌukatˈenda ðˈambi. hˈivjo nˌilikˌuondˈoa kwa aˈibu kutˈoka mlˈima wa mˈuŋɡu, nˌami nˌikakˌufukˈuza, ˈee kerˈubi mlˈinzi, kutˈoka kˌatikˈati ja vˈito vja mˈoto.|0
mˈojo wˈako ukˈawa na kibˈuri kwa aɟˈili ja uzˈuri wˈako, nˌawe ˌukaˌiharˈibu hekˈima jˈako kwa sabˈabu ja fahˈari jˈako. kwa hˈijo nˌikakutˈupa tʃˈini; nˌimekufˈaɲa kiˈoɟa mbˈele ja wafˈalme.|0
kwa ðˈambi zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi na bˌiaʃˈara jˈako ja ðulˈuma, ˌumenaɟˈisi mahˈali pˈako pˌatakatˈifu. kwa hˈijo nˌilifˈaɲa mˈoto utˈoke ndˈani jˈako, nˌao ˌukakˌuteketˈeza, nˌami nˌikakufˈaɲa maɟˈivu ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi, matʃˈoni pa wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakitazˈama.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌalijˌokuɟˈua jˌanakˌustaɟabˈia; ˌumefikˈia mwˈiʃo wa kutˈiʃa na hˌutakuwˈepo tˈena milˈele..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˈako ɟˌuːja sidˈoni, ˌukatabˈiri ðˈidi jˈake.|0
nˌawe usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  mˌimi ni kiɲˈume tʃˈako, ˈee sidˈoni, nˌami nˌitapˈata ˌutukˈufu ndˈani jˈako. nˌao wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapotˌekelˈeza hukˈumu zˈaŋɡu na kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu ndˈani jˈake.|0
nˌitapelˈeka taˈuni ndˈani jˌake na kufˈaɲa dˈamu ˌitirirˈike katˌika bˌarabˈara zˈake. wˌaliotʃˈiɲɟua wˌataaŋɡˈuka ndˈani jˈake, kwa upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi jˌake kˈila upˈande. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli hˌawatakˈuwa tˈena na mˌaɟirˈani wˌeɲe nˈia ja kˌuwaðˈuru wˌanaˌoumˈiza kˌama mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma na miˈiba mikˈali. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitakˌapoˌikusˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˌataˈifa ambˈako wˌametˌawaɲˈika, nˌitaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao matʃˈoni pa mˌataˈifa. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe, nˌilijˈompa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu jakˈobo.|0
wˌataˈiʃi hˈumo kwa salˈama na wˌataɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba na kupˈanda maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, wˌataˈiʃi kwa salˈama nˌitakˌapowˌaaðˈibu mˌaɟirˈani zˈao wˈote ambˈao wˌaliwˌafaɲˈia uˈovu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi, mwˈezi wa kˈumi, sˈiku ja kˈumi na mbˈili, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
