mwˌanadˈamu, ˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˈako ɟˌuːja farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri na ˌutabˈiri ðˈidi jˌake na ðˈidi ja mˈisri jˈote.|0
nˈena, nˌawe usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  mˌimi ni kiɲˈume nˈawe, farˈao, mfˈalme wa mˈisri, ɟˈoka kˈubwa ˌulalˈaje kˌatikˈati ja viɟˈito vjˈako. ˌunasˈema, ˈm̩to naˈili ni wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe; nˌiliufˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini nˌitatˈia ndoˈana katˌika matˈaja jˈako nˌami nˌitawafˈaɲa samˈaki wa viɟˈito vjˈako wˌaʃikamˈane na maɡˈamba jˈako. nˌitakutˈoa kˌatikˈati ja viɟˈito vjˈako, pamˈoɟa na samˈaki wˈote wˌaliˌoʃikamˈana na maɡˈamba jˈako.|0
nˌitakutˈupa ɟaŋɡwˈani, wˌewe pamˈoɟa na samˈaki wˈote wa viɟˈito vjˈako. ˌutaaŋɡˈuka ˌuwaɲɟˈani, nˌawe hˌutakusˈaɲua ˌau kˌutʃukulˈiwa. nˌitakutˈoa ˈuwe tʃakˈula kwa waɲˈama wa ˈn̩tʃi na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani.|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˈote wˌaiʃˈio mˈisri wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.  ˌumekˈuwa fˈimbo ja tˈete kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˌalipˌokuʃˈika kwa mikˈono jˈao, ˌulivuɲɟˈika na kutʃˈana mabˈeɡa jˈao; wˌalipˌokuˌeɡemˈea, ˌulivuɲɟˈika na miɡˈoŋɡo jˈao ˌikateɡˈuka.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitalˈeta upˈaŋɡa ɟˈuu jˈako na kuˈua wˈatu wˈako na waɲˈama wˈao.|0
mˈisri ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa na ˌisijolˈimwa wˈala kˌukalˈiwa na wˈatu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.  kwa sabˈabu ˌulisˈema, ˈm̩to naˈili ni wˈaŋɡu; mˌimi nˌiliufˈaɲa.|0
kwa hˈijo mˌimi ni kiɲˈume nˌawe na kiɲˈume na viɟˈito vjˈako, nˌami nˌitaifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kˌuwa maɡˈofu na ukˈiwa ˌisijolˈimwa wˈala kˌukalˈiwa na wˈatu kˌuanzˈia miɡdˈoli hˌadi aswˈani, hˌata kˌufikˈia mpakˈani wa ˌeθiopˈia.|0
hakˈuna uɲˈajo wa ˈm̩tu ˌau mɲˈama ˌutakˌaopˈita ndˈani jˈake, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˈiʃi hˈumo kwa mˈuda wa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri ukˈiwa, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi zilˈizo ukˈiwa, nˈajo mˈiɟi jˌake ˌitabˈaki ukˈiwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiɟi ilˈijo maɡˈofu. nˌami nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa wamˈisri mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwafukˈuza hˈuku na hˌuko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine.|0
lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈijo miˈaka ˌarobaˈini, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa wamˈisri kutˈoka mˌataˈifa wˌalikˌotawˈaɲua.|0
nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa hˈao wamˈisri kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kutˈekwa kwˈao na kˌuwawˈeka katˌika paθrˈosi, ˈn̩tʃi ja bˈaba zˈao. hˌuko wˌatakˈuwa na ufˈalme ˌusiokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌutakˈuwa ufˈalme ðaˈifu kulˈiko zˈote na kˈamwe mˈisri hˌaitˌaɟikwˈeza tˈena ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine. nˌitaufˈaɲa ufˈalme wˌake ðaˈifu sˈana kiˈasi kwˌamba kˈamwe hˌautˌatawˈala tˈena ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine.|0
mˈisri hˌaitakˈuwa tˈena tˌumaˈini la wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli bˌali ˌitakˈuwa kˌumbukˈumbu ja ðˈambi jˈao kwa kˌuiɡˌeukˈia kuˈomba msaˈada. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na sˈaba, mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, sˈiku ja kwˈanza, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalioŋɡˈoza ɟˈeʃi lˈake kufˈaɲa kˈazi ŋɡˈumu ðˈidi ja tˈiro; kˈila kˈitʃwa kˌilipˈata upˈaa na kˈila bˈeɡa lˌikatʃunˈika. lakˈini jˌeje na ɟˈeʃi lˈake hˌawakupˈata malˈipo jojˈote kˌutokˈana na mˈuda wˈote ˌalioŋɡˈoza hˈijo vˈita ðˈidi ja tˈiro.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitaitˈia mˈisri mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌatatʃukˈua ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˈisri. ˌatatˈeka matˈeka na kˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara mˈali za mˈisri kˌama uɟˈira kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈeʃi lˈake.|0
nimˈempa mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri kˌuwa uɟˈira kwa ɟuhˈudi zˌake kwa sabˈabu jˌeje na ɟˈeʃi lˈake wˌalifˈaɲa kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˈiwe na ŋɡˈuvu nˌami nˌitakˌifuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈako mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tˈoa ˌunabˈii na usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  ˌombolezˈeni nˈiɲi na msˈeme, ˈole wa sˈiku ˈile.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ˈile ˌimekˌaribˈia, sˈiku ja bwˈana ˌimekˌaribˈia, sˈiku ja mawˈiŋɡu, sˈiku ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi kwa mˌataˈifa.|0
upˈaŋɡa ˌutakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja mˈisri, nˈajo mˌaumˈivu makˈuu jˌataiɟˈia ˌeθiopˈia. mˌauˈaɟi jˌatakˌapoˌaŋɡukˈia mˈisri, ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake ˌutatʃˌukulˈiwa na misˈiŋɡi jˌake ˌitabˌomolˈewa.|0
kˈuʃi na pˈutu, lˈudi na ˌarabˈia jˈote, lˈibja na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi ja aɡˈano wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa pamˈoɟa na mˈisri.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo:  wˈale wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana na mˈisri wˌataaŋɡˈuka na kibˈuri tʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake kˌitaʃˈindwa. kutˈoka miɡdˈoli hˌadi aswˈani, wˌatauˈawa ndˈani jˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈizo ˈn̩tʃi zˌitakˈua ukˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi zilˈizo ukˈiwa, nˈajo mˈiɟi jˈao ˌitakˈuwa maɡˈofu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˈiɟi ilˈijo maɡˈofu.|0
ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapoiwˈaʃa mˈisri mˈoto na wˈote wˌamsaˌidiˈao wˌatapˈondwa.|0
sˈiku hˈijo waɟˈumbe wˌatatˈoka kwˈaŋɡu kwa mˌerikˈebu, ˌili kˌuwatˈia hˈofu ˌeθiopˈia, wakˈiwa katˌika hˈali jˈao ja kˌuriðˈika. mˌaumˈivu makˈali jˌatawapˈata sˈiku ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja mˈisri, kwa kˌuwa hakˈika ˌitakˈuɟa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  nˌitakomˈeʃa makˈundi ja wˌaɟeˈuri ja mˈisri kwa mkˈono wa nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
jˌeje na ɟˈeʃi lˈake, taˈifa lilˈilo katˈili kulˈiko mˌataˈifa jˈote, lˌitalˈetwa ˌili kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈn̩tʃi. wˌatafˈuta pˈaŋɡa zˈao ðˈidi ja mˈisri na kˌuiɟˈaza ˈn̩tʃi kwa wˌaliˌouˈawa.|0
nˌitakaˈuʃa viɟˈito vja naˈili na nˌitaiˈuza ˈn̩tʃi kwa wˈatu waˈovu, kwa mkˈono wa waɡˈeni, nˌitaifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi ukˈiwa na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani jˈake. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena hˈaja.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza sanˈamu na kˌukomˈeʃa viɲˈaɡo katˌika memfˈisi hˌapatˌakuwˈepo tˈena na m̩kˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri, nˌami nˌitaenˈeza hˈofu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa paθrˈosi kˌuwa ukˈiwa na kˌuitˈia mˈoto soˈani, nˌami nˌitaipˈiɡa kwa aðˈabu θebˈesi.|0
nˌitaimwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja pˌelusiˈumu, ŋɡˈome ja mˈisri, nˌami nˌitakˌatilˈia mbˈali makˈundi ja wˌaɟeˈuri wa θebˈesi.|0
nˌitaitˈia mˈoto ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri; pˌelusiˈumu ˌitaɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈuu. θebˈesi ˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa na tufˈani, memfˈisi ˌitakˈuwa katˌika taˈabu daˈima.|0
wˌanaˈume viɟˈana wa ˈoni na wa pˈi besˈeθi wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa nˈajo hˈijo mˈiɟi ˌitatˈekwa.|0
hˌuko tˌahpanhˈesi mtʃˈana ˌutatˈiwa ɡˈiza nˌitakˌapovˈuɲɟa kˈoŋɡwa la mˈisri; hˈapo kibˈuri tʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake kˌitakˈoma. ˌatafunˈikwa na mawˈiŋɡu na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake vˌitatˈekwa.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitaipˈiɡa mˈisri kwa aðˈabu, nˌao wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, sˈiku ja sˈaba, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, nˌimevˈuɲɟa mkˈono wa farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri. hˌaukufˈuŋɡwa ˌili upˈone ˌau kˌuwekˈewa kipˈande tʃa ubˈao ˌili upˈate ŋɡˈuvu za kuwˈeza kˌutʃukˈua upˈaŋɡa.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi ni kiɲˈume na farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri. nˌitavˈuɲɟa mikˈono jˌake jˈote miwˈili, ˈule mkˈono ulˈio mzˈima pˈia na ˈule ˌuliˌovuɲɟˈika na kˌuufˈaɲa upˈaŋɡa ˌuaŋɡˈuke tˌoka mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa wamˈisri mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwafukˈuza hˈuku na hˌuko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈote.|0
nˌitaitˈia ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli na kˌuutˈia upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu mkonˈoni mwˈake, lakˈini nˌitavˈuɲɟa mikˈono ja farˈao, nˌaje ˌatalˈia kwa huzˈuni mbˈele jˌake kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijetˈiwa ɟerˈaha la kumfˈiʃa.|0
nˌitaitˈia ŋɡˈuvu mikˈono ja mfˈalme wa babˈeli, lakˈini mikˈono ja farˈao ˌitaleɡˈea. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapoutˈia upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli, nˌaje ˌataˌuɲoˈoʃa ðˈidi ja mˈisri.|0
nˌitawˌatawˈaɲa wamˈisri mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuwafukˈuza hˈuku na hˌuko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, mwˈezi wa tˈatu, sˈiku ja kwˈanza, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, mwambˈie farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri na makˈundi jˌake ja wˌaɟeˈuri:  ɟˈe, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa na wˌewe katˌika fahˈari.|0
ˌaŋɡalˈia aʃˈuru, wakˈati fulˈani ˌilikˈuwa mwerˈezi hˌuko lˌebanˈoni, ukˈiwa na matˈawi mazˈuri ˌukitˈia msˈitu kivˈuli; ˌulikˈuwa mrˈefu sˈana, kilˈele tʃˈake kˌilipˈita maɟˈani ja mˈiti jˈote.|0
mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi jˌaliˌustawˈiʃa, tʃemtʃˈemi zˌeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi zˌiliufˈaɲa ˌurefˈuke; viɟˈito vjˈake vˌilitˌirirˈika pˈale ˌulipoˈota pˈande zˈote na kˌupelˈeka mˌiferˈeɟi jˌake kwˈeɲe mˈiti jˈote ja ʃambˈani.|0
hˈivjo ˌukarefˈuka kupˈita mˈiti jˈote ja ʃambˈani; vitˈawi vjˈake vˌiliˌoŋɡezˈeka na matˈawi jˌake jakˈawa marˈefu, jˌakitˈanda kwa sabˈabu ja wˈiŋɡi wa mˈaɟi.|0
ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani wˌakawˈeka viˈota kwˈeɲe vitˈawi vjˈake, waɲˈama wˈote wa ʃambˈani wˌakazaˈana tʃˈini ja matˈawi jˈake, mˌataˈifa makˈubwa jˈote jˌaliˈiʃi tʃˈini ja kivˈuli tʃˈake.|0
ˌulikˈuwa na fahˈari katˌika uzˈuri, ukˈiwa na matˈawi jˌalijotˈanda, kwa kˌuwa mizˈizi jˌake ˌilikwˈenda tʃˈini mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi.|0
mˌierˈezi katˌika bustˈani ja mˈuŋɡu hˌaikuwˈeza kˌuʃindˈana nˈao, wˈala mˌisunobˈari hˌaikuwˈeza kˌuliŋɡˈana na vitˈawi vjˈake, wˈala mˌiaramˈoni hˌaikˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa na matˈawi jˈake, wˈala hˌakukˈuwa na ˈm̩ti katˌika bustˈani ja mˈuŋɡu wa kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃa na uzˈuri wˈake.|0
nˌiliufˈaɲa kˌuwa mzˈuri ukˈiwa na matˈawi mˈeŋɡi, ˌulionˈewa wˈivu na mˈiti jˈote ja edˈeni katˌika bustˈani ja mˈuŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu ˌulikˈuwa mrˈefu sˈana, kilˈele tʃˈake kikˈiwa ɟˌuːja maɟˈani manˈene ja mˈiti na kwa sabˈabu ˌulikˈuwa na kibˈuri tʃa urˈefu wˈake.|0
nˌiliutˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa mtawˈala wa mˌataˈifa, ˌili jˌeje ˌauʃˌuɣulikˈie sˌawasˈawa na uˈovu wˈake. nˌikaˌukatilˈia mbˈali.|0
nˈajo mˌataˈifa maɡˈeni jalˈijo mˌakatˈili sˈana jˌaliukˈata hˈuo ˈm̩ti na kˌuuˈatʃa. matˈawi jˌake jˌaliaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja milˈima na kwˈeɲe mabˈonde jˈote, vitˈawi vjˈake vˌikavuɲɟˈika na kˌusambˈaa katˌika mˌakorˈoŋɡo jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi. mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dˌuniˈani jˌakaondˈoka kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kivˈuli tʃˈake na kˌuuˈatʃa.|0
ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani wˌakakˈaa kwˈeɲe ˈule ˈm̩ti ˌuliˌoaŋɡˈuka na waɲˈama pˈori wˈote wˌakakˈaa kˌatikˈati ja vitˈawi vjˈake.|0
kˈamwe hˌakutakˈuwa na mˈiti miŋɡˈine kˈando ja hˈajo mˈaɟi ˌitakˌajorefˈuka zaˈidi ja hˈuo, vilˈele vjˈake vikˈiwa ɟˌuːja maɟˈani jˈote ja mˈiti. hakˈuna mˈiti miŋɡˈine, hˌata kˌama ˌimekˈuɲua mˈaɟi vizˈuri nˈamna ɡˈani, ˌitakˌajofikˈia urˈefu hˈuo. jˈote mwˈiʃo wˌake ni kˈifo, na kˌuiŋɡˈia arðˈini, kˌama vˈile ilˈivjo kwa wˌanadˈamu, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaendˈao ʃimˈoni.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika sˈiku ˈile mwerˈezi ˌulipoʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini kˌaburˈini nˌilizˌifunˈika tʃemtʃˈemi zˌeɲe mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi kwa mˌaombolˈezo: nˌilivˌizuˈia viɟˈito vjˈake na wˈiŋɡi wa mˈaɟi jˌake nˌikaˌuzuˈia. kwa sabˈabu jˌake nˌiliivˈika lˌebanˈoni huzˈuni, nˈajo mˈiti jˈote ja ʃambˈani ˌikaɲaˈuka.|0
nˌilijafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˌatetemˈeke kwa kiʃˈindo tʃa kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈake wakˈati nˌilipˌouʃˈuʃa tʃˈini kˌaburˈini pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni. ndˈipo mˈiti jˈote ja edˈeni, mˈiti ilˈijo bˈora kulˈiko jˈote na ilˈijo mizˈuri sˈana ja lˌebanˈoni, mˈiti jˈote ˈile ˌilijokˈuɲua mˈaɟi vizˈuri, ˌilifˌariɟˈika hˈapa dˌuniˈani.|0
wˈale wˌalioˈiʃi katˌika kivˈuli tʃˈake, wˈale wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˌaje mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˌao pˈia wˌalikˈuwa wˌamezˈikwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, wˌakiuŋɡˈana na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
ni mˈiti ˈipi ja edˈeni ˌinajowˈeza kˌuliŋɡanˈiʃwa nˌawe kwa fahˈari na ˌutukˈufu? hˌata hˈivjo, wˌewe pˈia, ˌutaʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini pamˈoɟa na mˈiti ja edˈeni mpˈaka kuzˈimu, ˌutalˈala mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.  hˈuju ni farˈao pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili, mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mbˈili, sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia, kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, fˈaɲa mˌaombolˈezo kwa aɟˈili ja farˈao mfˈalme wa mˈisri na ˌumwambˈie:  wˌewe ni kˌama sˈimba mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, wˌewe ni kˌama ɟˈoka kˈubwa bˌaharˈini, ˌunajˌevurˈuɡa mˈaɟi kwa miɡˈuu jˈako na kˌutʃafˈua viɟˈito.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  nikˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˈiŋɡi mkˈubwa wa wˈatu nˌitautˈupa wˈavu wˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈako, nˌao wˌatakˌukokˈota katˌika wˈavu wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitakutˈupa ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu na kˌukuvˌurumˈiʃa ˌuwaɲɟˈani. nˌitawafˈaɲa ndˈeɡe wˈote wa aŋɡˈani watˈue ɟˈuu jˈako na waɲˈama wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌataɟˌiʃibˈiʃa ɲˈama jˈako.|0
nˌitatawˈaɲa ɲˈama jˈako ɟˌuːja milˈima na kuɟˈaza mabˈonde kwa mabˈaki jˈako.|0
nˌitaˌilowanˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi kwa dˈamu jˈako ˌinajˌotirirˈika ɲɟˈia jˈote hˌadi mˌilimˈani, nˈajo mabˈonde jˌataɟˈazwa na ɲˈama jˈako.|0
nˌitakˌapokˌuzimˈiʃa, nˌitafunˈika mbˈiŋɡu na kˌuzitˈia ɲˈota zˌake ɡˈiza; nˌitalˌifunˈika ɟˈua kwa wˈiŋɡu, nˌao mwˈezi hˌautatˈoa nˈuru jˈake.|0
miˈaŋɡa jˈote ˌitoˈajo nˈuru aŋɡˈani nˌitaitˈia ɡˈiza ɟˈuu jˈako; nˌitalˈeta ɡˈiza ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitaˌifaðaˈiʃa miˈojo ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi nˌitakˌapokˌuaŋɡamˈiza mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˌikikulˈeta ˌuhamiʃˈoni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ˈn̩tʃi ambˈazo hˌauɟapˈata kˌuziɟˈua.|0
nˌitajafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi wˌakustˌaaɟabˈie, wafˈalme wˌao wˌatatˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu kwa aɟˈili jˈako nˌitakˌapotikˈisa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu mbˈele jˈao. sˈiku ja aŋɡˈuko lˈako kˈila mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌatatˌetemˈeka kˈila dakˈika kwa aɟˈili ja maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo:  upˈaŋɡa wa mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌutakˈuɟa ðˈidi jˈako.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa makˈundi jˈako ja wˌaɟeˈuri kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa pˈaŋɡa za wˈatu mˌaʃuɟˈaa, taˈifa katˈili kulˈiko mˌataˈifa jˈote. wˌatakˌivuɲɟavˈuɲɟa kibˈuri tʃa mˈisri, nˈajo makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri jˌataʃˈindwa.|0
nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza mifˈuɡo jˌake jˈote wˌanaˌoɟilˈiʃa kˈando ja mˈaɟi mˈeŋɡi, hˌajatˌavurˈuɡwa tˈena kwa m̩ɡˈuu wa mwˌanadˈamu wˈala kwˈato za mɲˈama hˌazitˌajatʃafˈua tˈena.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitafˈaɲa mˈaɟi jˌake jˌatulˈie na kufˈaɲa viɟˈito vjˈake vˌitirirˈike kˌama mafˈuta, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitakˌapoifˈaɲa mˈisri kˌuwa ukˈiwa na kˌuiˌondolˈea ˈn̩tʃi kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani jˈake, nˌitakˌapowapˈiɡa wˈote wˌaiʃˈio hˈumo, ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌombolˈezo wˌatakˌalomwimbˈia. bˈinti za mˌataˈifa wˌataliˈimba, kwa kˌuwa mˈisri na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri wˌataliˈimba, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili, mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano ja mwˈezi, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi ja wˌaɟeˈuri wa mˈisri na ˌuwatˈupe kuzˈimu jˌeje na bˈinti za mˌataˈifa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, waˈende hˌuko pamˈoɟa nˌao wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni.|0
ɟˈe, nˈiɲi mnamzˈidi nˈani kwa uzˈuri? ʃukˈeni tʃˈini! nˌaɲi mkalˈazwe pamˈoɟa na hˈao wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa.|0
wˌataaŋɡˈuka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa. upˈaŋɡa ˌumefˈutwa, mwˈatʃe ˌaburˈutwe mbˈali pamˈoɟa na hˈao wˌaɟeˈuri wˌake wˈote.|0
kutˈoka kuzˈimu vˌioŋɡˈozi hodˈari wˌatanˈena kuhˈusu mˈisri pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˈao, wˌameʃˈuka tʃˈini, nˌao wˌamelˈala kˈimja pamˈoɟa na hˈao wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa..|0
aʃˈuru jˈuko hˌuko pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, ˌamezuŋɡˈukwa na mˌakabˈuri ja wˈatu wˌake wˈote wˌaliˌouˈawa, wˈale wˈote wˌaliˌoaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
mˌakabˈuri jˈao jˈako kwˈeɲe kˈina tʃa tʃˈini tʃa ʃˈimo na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˌimelˈala kˌulizuŋɡˈuka kabˈuri lˈake. wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameenˈeza hˈofu kˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai wˌameuˈawa, wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
elˈamu jˈuko hˌuko, pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri wakˈiwa wˌamelˌizuŋɡˈuka kabˈuri lˈake. wˈote wˌameuˈawa, wˌameaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa. wˈote wˌaliokˈuwa wˌameenˈeza hˈofu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai wˌaliʃˈuka kuzˈimu bˌila kˌutahirˈiwa. wˌanaˌitʃukˈua aˈibu jˈao pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni.|0
kitˈanda kˌimetandˈikwa kwa aɟˈili jˌake mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌouˈawa, pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri wakˈiwa wˌamelˌizuŋɡˈuka kabˈuri lˈake. wˈote ni wˈatu wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, wˌameuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa. kwa sabˈabu vitˈiʃo vjˈao vˌilienˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai, wˌameˌitʃukˈua aˈibu jˈao pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni, nˌao wˌamewˈekwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌouˈawa.|0
meʃˈeki na tubˈali wˈako hˈumo, pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˈao ja wˌaɟeˈuri wakˈiwa wˌamejˌazuŋɡˈuka mˌakabˈuri jˈao. wˈote hˌawakˌutahirˈiwa, wˌameuˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa kwa sabˈabu wˌalienˈeza vitˈiʃo vjˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
ɟˈe, hˌawakulˈala na mˌaʃuɟˈaa weŋɡˈine wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa wˌaliˌouˈawa, ambˈao wˌameʃˈuka kˌaburˈini wakˈiwa na silˈaha zˈao za vˈita, ambˈao pˈaŋɡa zˈao zˌiliwˈekwa tʃˈini ja vˈitʃwa vjˈao na uˈovu wˌao ɟˌuːja mifˈupa jˈao? aðˈabu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao ˌilikˈuwa ɟˌuːja mifˈupa jˈao, iŋɡˈawa vitˈiʃo vja mˌaʃuɟˈaa hˈawa vˌilikˈuwa vˌimeenˈea hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai.|0
wˌewe pˈia, ˈee farˈao, ˌutavˈuɲɟua nˌawe ˌutalˈala mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
edˈomu jˈuko hˈumo, wafˈalme wˌake wˈote na wakˈuu wˌake wˈote, ambˈao ˌiɟapokˈuwa wˈana ŋɡˈuvu, wˌamelˈazwa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa. wˌamelˈala pamˈoɟa na wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao ʃimˈoni.|0
wakˈuu wˈote wa kˌaskazˈini na wˌasidˈoni wˈote wˈako hˌuko, wˌameʃˈuka tʃˈini pamˈoɟa na wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa aˈibu ˌiɟapokˈuwa kˈuna vitˈiʃo vˌilivjˌosababˈiʃwa na ŋɡˈuvu zˈao. wˌamelˈala bˌila kˌutahirˈiwa pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa na kˌutʃukˈua aˈibu jˈao pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaʃukˈao tʃˈini ʃimˈoni.|0
farˈao, jˌeje pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˈote, ˌatakˌapowaˈona ˌatafˌariɟˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri, wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
iŋɡˈawa nˌilimfˈaɲa farˈao ˌaenˈeze vitˈiʃo vjˈake katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈio hˈai, farˈao pamˈoɟa na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri wˌatalˈazwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa, pamˈoɟa na wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, sˈema na wˈatu wˈako ˌuwaambˈie, nˌitakˌapolˈeta upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi, nˌao wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌakamtʃaɡˈua mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu wˌao na kumfˈaɲa ˈawe mlˈinzi wˈao.|0
nˌaje ˌauonˈapo upˈaŋɡa ˌunakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi na kupˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta kuˈoɲa wˈatu.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasikiˈapo saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta hˌakukubˈali kuˈoɲua, bˌasi upˈaŋɡa uɟˈapo na kˌuutˈoa uhˈai wˈake, dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌalisikˈia saˈuti ja tˌarumbˈeta lakˈini hˌakukubˈali maˈoɲo, dˈamu jˌake ˌitakˈuwa ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake mweɲˈewe. kˌama ˌaŋɡekubˈali maˈoɲo, ˌaŋɡelˌiɟiokˈoa mweɲˈewe.|0
lakˈini kˌama mlˈinzi ˌakiˈona upˈaŋɡa ˌunakˈuɟa na ˌasipˈiɡe tˌarumbˈeta kuˈoɲa wˈatu na upˈaŋɡa ukˈiɟa na kutˈoa uhˈai wa mmˈoɟa wˈao, jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌataˌondolˈewa kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi jˈake, lakˈini dˈamu jˌake nˌitaitˈaka mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa mlˈinzi hˈujo..|0
mwˌanadˈamu, nˌimekufˈaɲa wˌewe kˌuwa mlˈinzi kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwa hˈijo sikˈia nˈeno nˌisemˈalo na uwˈape maˈoɲo kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌimwambiˈapo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, ˈewe ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, hakˈika ˌutakˈufa, nˌawe hˌukusˈema nˈeno la kumwˈoɲa ˌili atˈoke katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈake, jˈule ˈm̩tu mwˈovu ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˈake, mˌimi nˌitaitˈaka dˈamu jˌake mkonˈoni mwˈako.|0
lakˈini kˌama ˌutamwˈoɲa hˈujo ˈm̩tu mwˈovu aˈatʃe ɲɟˈia zˌake m̩bˈaja nˌaje hafˈaɲi hˈivjo, ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˈake, lakˈini ˌutakˈuwa ˌumeɟˌiokˈoa mweɲˈewe.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, sˈema na ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌuwaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo mnˌalosˈema: makˈosa jˈetu na ðˈambi zˈetu zˌimetˌulemˈea, nˌasi tˌunaðˌoofˈika kwa sabˈabu ja hˈajo. tˌutawezˈaɟe bˌasi kuˈiʃi? .|0
wˌaambˈie, hakˈika kˌama mˌimi nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, sˌifurahˈii kˈifo tʃa wˈatu waˈovu, bˌali kwˌamba wˌaɡeˈuke kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja wapˈate kuˈiʃi. ɡˌeukˈeni! ɡˌeukˈeni kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈenu m̩bˈaja! kwa nˈini mkˈafe, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli?.|0
kwa hˈijo, mwˌanadˈamu, wˌaambˈie wˈatu wˈako, hˈaki ja ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki hˌaitˌamwokˈoa wakˈati ˌanapoˈatʃa kutˈii, wˈala uˈovu wa ˈm̩tu mwˈovu hˌautˌamsababˈiʃa jˌeje kˌuaŋɡˈuka ˌanapotˈubu na kuˈatʃa uˈovu. ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki, kˌama ˌakitˈenda ðˈambi, hˌataˈiʃi kwa sabˈabu ja ˌuadilˈifu wˌake wa awˈali..|0
kˌama nˌikimwambˈia ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki kwˌamba hakˈika ˌutaˈiʃi, lakˈini ˌakatˌeɡemˈea hˈijo hˈaki jˌake na kutˈenda uˈovu, hakˈuna tˈendo lolˈote la hˈaki ˌalilotˈenda lˌitakˌalokumbˈukwa, ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu ˌaliˌoutˈenda.|0
nˌami kˌama nˌikimwambˈia ˈm̩tu mwˈovu, hakˈika ˌutakˈufa, kˈiʃa ˌakaɡeˈuka kutˈoka ðˈambi jˌake na kufˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa.|0
kˌama ˌakirudˈiʃa kˈile ˌalitʃˌotʃukˈua rehˈani kwa aɟˈili ja dˈeni, ˌakarudˈiʃa ˌalitʃoˈiba na kˌufuˈata ˈamri zˈile zˌiletˈazo uzˈima, wˈala hafˈaɲi uˈovu, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi, hˌatakˈufa.|0
hakˈuna ðˈambi jojˈote ˌalijˌoitˈenda ˌitakˌajokumbˈukwa ɟˈuu jˈake. ˌametˈenda lˈile lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa, hakˈika ˌataˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini wˈatu wˈako wˌanasˈema, ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana si sˈawa. lakˈini ni ɲɟˈia zˈao ambˈazo si sˈawa.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌakiɡeˈuka kutˈoka ˌuadilˈifu wˌake na kufˈaɲa uˈovu, ˌatakˈufa kwa aɟˈili ja hˈuo uˈovu.|0
nˌaje ˈm̩tu mwˈovu kˌama ˌakiɡeˈuka kutˈoka uˈovu wˌake na kufˈaɲa lˈile lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa, kwa kufˈaɲa hˈivjo ˌataˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌunasˈema, ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana si sˈawa. lakˈini nˌitamhukˈumu kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu sˌawasˈawa na ɲɟˈia zˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
mwˈaka wa kˈumi na mbˈili wa ˌuhamˈiʃo wˈetu, mwˈezi wa kˈumi, sˈiku ja tˈano, ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈuwa ˌametorˈoka kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu ˌakaniɟˈia na kusˈema, ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌumeaŋɡˈuka.|0
bˌasi ɟiˈoni kˈabla ˈm̩tu hˈujo haɟˈaɟa, mkˈono wa bwˈana, ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌalifuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˈabla ja ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijˌeniɟˈia ˌasubˈuhi hˌaɟafˈika. bˌasi kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu kˌilifˌuŋɡulˈiwa na sˌikuwˈeza tˈena kˌuɲamˈaza.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika maɡˈofu hˈajo katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli wˌanasˈema hˈivi, ˌabrahˈamu ˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa tˈu, hˌata hˈivjo ˌakaˌimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi. lakˈini sˌisi ni wˈeŋɡi, hakˈika tˌumepˈewa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa mˈilki jˈetu..|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa kˌuwa mnakˈula ɲˈama pamˈoɟa na dˈamu na kˌuinulˈia sanˈamu zˈenu mˈatʃo na kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, ɟˈe, mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mnˌateɡemˈea pˈaŋɡa zˈenu, mnafˈaɲa mˈambo ja mˌatʃukˈizo na kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu humtˈia ˌunaɟˈisi ˈm̩ke wa ɟirˈani jˈake. ɟˈe, mtˌaimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi?.|0
wˌaambˈie hˈivi: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, wˈale wˌaliobˈaki katˌika maɡˈofu wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈale walˈio ɲɟˈe mˌaʃambˈani nˌitawatˈoa wˌararulˈiwe na waɲˈama pˈori, nˌao wˈale walˈio katˌika ŋɡˈome na kwˈeɲe mapˈaŋɡo wˌatakˈufa kwa taˈuni.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa ukˈiwa na utˈupu na kibˈuri tʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˌitafikˈia mwˈiʃo, nˈajo milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa ˌili ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌasipˈite hˌuko.|0
kˈiʃa wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapokˈuwa nˌimeifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa ukˈiwa na utˈupu kwa sabˈabu ja mˈambo jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo wˌalijotˈenda..|0
kwa habˈari jˈako wˈewe, mwˌanadˈamu, wˈatu wˈako wˌanaoŋɡˈea habˈari zˈako wakˈiwa karˈibu na kˈuta na kwˈeɲe milˈaŋɡo ja ɲˈumba, wˌakiˌambiˈana kˈila mmˈoɟa na mwenzˈake, ɲɟoˈoni msikˈie uɟˈumbe ˈule ˌutokˈao kwa bwˈana..|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanakuɟˈia, kˌama wˌafaɲˈavjo, nˌao wˌanakˈeti mbˈele jˈako kˌama wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌusikilˈiza manˈeno jˈako, lakˈini hˌawajatˈendi. kwa maˈana ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu u katˌika midˈomo jˈao, lakˈini miˈojo jˈao ˈina tamˈaa ja faˈida isˈijo halˈali.|0
nˈaam, mbˈele jˈao ˌumekˈuwa tu kˌama jˌeje ˌaimbˈaje ɲˈimbo za mapˈenzi kwa saˈuti nzˈuri za kˌuvutˈia na kupˈiɡa vjˈombo kwa ustˈadi, kwa kˌuwa wˌanasikˈia manˈeno jˈako lakˈini hˌawajatˈendi.|0
wakˈati mˈambo hˈaja jˈote jˌatakˌapotimˈia, kwa kˌuwa hakˈika jˌatatokˈea, ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba nabˈii ˌamekuwˈepo mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri ɟˌuːja wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa ˌisraˈeli, tabˈiri na ˌuwaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈole wa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa ˌisraˈeli ambˈao hˌuɟitˈunza weɲˈewe tˈu! ɟˈe, hˌaiwapˈasi wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi kutˈunza kˈundi la kondˈoo.|0
mnakˈula mafˈuta ja waɲˈama, mnavˈaa mavˈazi ja sˈufu na kutʃˈiɲɟa kondˈoo wˌalionˈona, lakˈini hˌamlitˈunzi kˈundi.|0
hˌamkuwatˈia ŋɡˈuvu walˈio ðaˈifu wˈala hˌamkuwaɡˈaŋɡa wˌeɲe marˈaði wˈala kˌuwafˈuŋɡa wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa. hˌamkuwˌarudˈiʃa wˌaliˌotaŋɡatˈaŋɡa wˈala kˌuwatafˈuta wˈale wˌaliˌopotˈea. badˈala jˌake mmˌewatawˈala kwa ukˈali na kwa ˌukatˈili.|0
hˈivjo wˌalitˌawaɲˈika kwa sabˈabu hˌapakuwˈepo mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, nˌao wˌalipˌotawaɲˈika, wakˈawa tʃakˈula tʃa waɲˈama wa mwˈitu wˈote.|0
kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu wˌalitˌawaɲˈika, wˌakatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kwˈeɲe milˈima jˈote na kwˈeɲe kˈila kilˈima kirˈefu. kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu wˌalitˌawaɲˈika ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa dunˈia jˈote bˌila kˌuwa na jejˈote wa kˌuwaˌulizˈia wˈala wa kˌuwatafˈuta.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˈiɲi wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, lˌisikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
kwa hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, kwa sabˈabu kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu wˌamekˈosa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi na hˈivjo wˌametˈekwa ɲˈara na kˌuwa tʃakˈula tʃa waɲˈama wˈote wa mwitˈuni na kwa sabˈabu wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu, hˌawakˌuwatafˈuta kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu, bˌali wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌameɟitˈunza weɲˈewe, nˌao hˌawakˌuwalˈiʃa kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˈeɲi wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi ni kiɲˈume na wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi nˌami nˌitawadˈai kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao. nˌitawˌafukˈuza kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kutʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈaŋɡu, ˌili wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌasiˌendelˈee kˌuɟitˈunza weɲˈewe. nˌitaokˈoa kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe vˈiɲua vjˈao, nˌao kondˈoo hˌawatakˈuwa tˈena tʃakˈula tʃˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitawˌaulizˈia kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwatafˈuta.|0
kˌama vˈile mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ˌatafutˈavjo kˈundi lˈake lˌililˌotawaɲˈika wakˈati akˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈalo, hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˌatafˈuta kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mahˈali pˈote wˌalipokˈuwa wˌametˌawaɲikˈia katˌika sˈiku ja mawˈiŋɡu na ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
nˌitawatˈoa katˌika mˌataˈifa na kˌuwakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali, nˌami nˌitawalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe. nˌitawalˈiʃa kwˈeɲe milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, katˌika mabˈonde na mahˈali pˈote pˌanapˌokalˈika katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitawatʃˈuŋɡa kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo mazˈuri na mˌiinˈuko ja mlˈima wa ˌisraˈeli pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pˈao pa malˈiʃo. hˌuko wˌataɟˌipumzˈiʃa kwa amˈani katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja malˈiʃo mazˈuri, nˌao wˌataɟilˈiʃa hˌuko katˌika malˈiʃo tˈele katˌika milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitawatʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwafˈaɲa wˌapumzˈike, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitawˌaulizˈia kondˈoo wˌaliˌopotˈea na kˌuwalˈeta wˌaliˌotaŋɡatˈaŋɡa. nˌitawafˈuŋɡa wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa na kˌuwatˈia ŋɡˈuvu walˈio ðaˈifu lakˈini wˈale wˌaliˌoɟikinˈai na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza. nˌitalitʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi kwa hˈaki.|0
kwa habˈari jˈenu, ˈeɲi kˈundi lˈaŋɡu, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitahukˈumu kˈati ja kondˈoo na kondˈoo, kˈati ja kondˈoo dˈume na mbˈuzi.|0
ɟˈe, hˌaiwatˈoʃi nˈiɲi kˌuɟilˈiʃa kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo mazˈuri? ɟˈe, ni lazˈima nˈiɲi kˌujakaɲˈaɡa pˈia malˈiʃo jˈenu jˌalijobˈaki kwa miɡˈuu jˈenu? ɟˈe, hˌaiwatˈoʃi nˈiɲi kˈuɲua mˈaɟi sˈafi? ɟˈe, ni lazˈima kˌujatʃafˈua mˈaɟi meŋɡˈine kwa miɡˈuu jˈenu.|0
ɟˈe, ni lazˈima kˈundi lˈaŋɡu wˌaɟilˈiʃe kwa jˈale mlˌijojˌakaɲˈaɡa na kˈuɲua mˈaɟi mlˌijojˌatʃafˈua kwa miɡˈuu jˈenu.|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌawaˌambiˈalo: tazˈama, mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitahukˈumu kˈati ja kondˈoo wanˈono na wˌaliokˈonda.|0
kwa sabˈabu mmˌewapˈiɡa kikˈumbo na kˌuwapˈiɡa kwa pˈembe zˈenu kondˈoo wˈote walˈio ðaˈifu mpˈaka wˌakawˌafukˈuza.|0
nˌitalˌiokˈoa kˈundi lˈaŋɡu na hˌawatatˈekwa ɲˈara tˈena. nˌitahukˈumu kˈati ja kondˈoo na kondˈoo.|0
nˌitawˈeka ɟˈuu jˈao mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi mmˈoɟa, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi, nˌaje ˌatawatʃˈuŋɡa, ˌatawatʃˈuŋɡa na kˌuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈao.|0
mˌimi bwˈana nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, nˌaje mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi ˌatakˈuwa m̩kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa nˌao aɡˈano la amˈani na kˌuwaondˈoa waɲˈama wa mwˈitu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ˌili kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu wawˈeze kˌupumzˈika ɲikˈani na msitˈuni kwa salˈama.|0
nˌitawˌabarˈiki wˌao pamˈoɟa na mˌaenˈeo jˌanajˌozuŋɡˈuka kilˈima tʃˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˌaɲeʃˈea mvˈua kwa maɟˈira jˈake, kˌutakuwˈepo mvˈua za barˈaka.|0
mˈiti ja ʃambˈani ˌitatˈoa matˈunda jˌake na ˈarði ˌitatˈoa mazˈao jˈake, wˈatu wˌatakˈaa salˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao. wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapovˈuɲɟa vifˈuŋɡo vja nˈira zˈao na kˌuwaokˈoa kutˈoka mikˈono ja wˈale wˌaliˌowafˈaɲa watˈumwa.|0
hˌawatatˈekwa tˈena ɲˈara na mˌataˈifa, wˈala waɲˈama pˈori hˌawatawˈala tˈena. wˌataˈiʃi kwa salˈama, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewatˈia hˈofu.|0
nˌitawˈapa ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe sˈifa kˌutokˈana na mazˈao jˈake, hˌawatapˈatwa na ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˈena wˈala hˌawatˌaðarˌaulˈiwa na mˌataˈifa.|0
ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˈimi, bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao, nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈao, na kwˌamba wˈao, ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˈiɲi ni kondˈoo wˈaŋɡu, kondˈoo wa malˈiʃo jˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami ni mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌelekˈeza ˈuso wˈako ɟˌuːja mlˈima seˈiri, ˌutabˈiri ðˈidi jˈake.|0
na usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˌimi ni kiɲˈume nˈawe, ˈee mlˈima seˈiri, nˌami nˌitaɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈako na kˌukufˈaɲa ukˈiwa na ˌusijˌekalˈiwa na wˈatu wˈala kˌulimˈika.|0
nˌitaifˈaɲa mˈiɟi jˈako kˌuwa maɡˈofu nˌawe ˌutakˈuwa ukˈiwa. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌulifˈitʃa mojˈoni ˌuadˈui wa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi nˌawe ˌukawatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli wˌauˈawe kwa upˈaŋɡa wakˈati wa maˈafa jˈao, wakˈati aðˈabu jˌake ˌilipˌofikˈia kilˈele tʃˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitakutˈia katˌika ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu nˌao ˌutakˌufuatˈia. kwa kˌuwa hˌakutʃukˈia kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, kumwˈaɡa dˈamu kˌutakˌufuatˈia.|0
nˌitaufˈaɲa mlˈima seˈiri ukˈiwa na ˌusiˌokalˈiwa na wˈatu wˈala kˌulimˈika na kˌuukˌatilˈia mbˈali na wˈote wˌanaokˈuɟa na wˌanaokwˈenda.|0
nˌitaiɟˈaza milˈima jˈenu kwa wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌouˈawa, wˈale wˌaliˌouˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa wˌataaŋɡˈuka ɟˌuːja vilˈima vjˈako na katˌika mabˈonde jˈako na katˌika mˌakorˈoŋɡo jˈako jˈote.|0
nˌitakufˈaɲa ukˈiwa milˈele, wˈatu hˌawataˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈako. ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌumesˈema, mˌataˈifa hˈaja mawˈili na ˈn̩tʃi hˈizi zˌitakˈuwa zˈetu nˌasi tˌutazˌimilˈiki, iŋɡˈawa hˌata mˌimi bwˈana nˌilikˈuwa hˌuko.|0
kwa hˈijo hakˈika kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitakutˈenda kwa kadˈiri ja hasˈira na wˈivu ˌuliˌouoɲˈeʃa katˌika tʃˈuki jˈako ɟˈuu jˈao nˌami nˌitafˈaɲa nˌiɟulikˈane mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao wakˈati nˌitakˌapokˌuhukˈumu.|0
ndˈipo ˌutakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimesikˈia mˈambo jˈote ja ðarˈau ˌulijosˈema ðˈidi ja milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli. ˌulisˈema, wˌamefaɲˈika ukˈiwa na kutˈiwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈetu tˌuwararˈue.|0
ˌuliɟiɡˈamba ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu na kusˈema manˈeno ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu bˌila kˌuɟizuˈia, nˌami nˌikajˌasikˈia.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: wakˈati dunˈia jˈote ˌinaʃˌaŋɡilˈia nˌitakufˈaɲa ukˈiwa.|0
kwa sabˈabu ˌuliʃˌaŋɡilˈia wakˈati urˈiθi wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌulipˌofaɲˈika ukˈiwa, hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjokˌutendˈea. ˌutakˈuwa ukˈiwa, ˈee mlˈima seˈiri, wˌewe na edˈomu jˈote. kˈiʃa ndˈipo wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ˌitabirˈie milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli na usˈeme, ˈee milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu adˈui wˌanasˈema ɟˈuu jˈako, ˈaha! mahˈali pˌalipˌoinˈuka pa zamˈani pˌamekˈuwa mˈilki jˈetu. .|0
kwa hˈijo tabˈiri na usˈeme, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu wˌamewafˈaɲa ukˈiwa na kˌuwaɡˌandamˈiza kˈila upˈande ˌili mpˈate kˌuwa mˈilki ja mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine na kˌuwa kˈitu tʃa kˌusimˈaŋɡwa na kˌuðihakˈiwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu.|0
kwa hˈijo, ˈee milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana mweɲˈezi: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kwa milˈima na vilˈima, kwa mˌakorˈoŋɡo na mabˈonde, kwa mahˈame jalˈijo ukˈiwa, mˈiɟi ˌilijoˈatʃwa ambˈajo ˌimetˈekwa ɲˈara na kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika wˈivu wˈaŋɡu ˌuwakˈao nˌimenˈena ðˈidi ja mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine na ðˈidi ja edˈomu jˈote, kwa maˈana kwa furˈaha na hˈila katˌika miˈojo jˈao wˌaliifˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu kˌuwa mˈilki jˈao ˌili wapˈate kutˈeka ɲˈara sehˈemu jˌake ja malˈiʃo..|0
kwa hˈijo tabˈiri kuhˈusu ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli na ˌuiambˈie milˈima na vilˈima, mˌakorˈoŋɡo na viɟˈito na mabˈonde: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌinanˈena katˌika wˈivu wa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu mmˌeðarˌaulˈiwa na mˌataˈifa.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌinaˈapa kwa mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kwˌamba mˌataˈifa wˌanaˌowazuŋɡˈuka nˌao pˈia wˌataðˌaraulˈiwa.|0
lakˈini nˈiɲi, ˈee milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, mtatˈoa matˈawi na matˈunda kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu hˈivi kˌaribˈuni wˌatakˈuɟa ɲumbˈani.|0
mˌimi nˌinawˌaɟibˈika nˌaɲi na nˌitawˌaaŋɡalˈia kwa ˌupendelˈeo, mtalˈimwa na kupˈandwa mbˈeɡu.|0
nˌami nˌitaˌizidˈiʃa idˈadi ja wˈatu kwˈenu, nˈaam, ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli. mˈiɟi ˌitakalˈiwa na wˈatu na maɡˈofu jˌataɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja.|0
nˌitaoŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja wˈatu na waɲˈama ɟˈuu jˈenu, nˌao wˌatazaˈana sˈana na kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no. nˌitawˌakalˈiʃa wˈatu ndˈani jˈenu kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa wakˈati ˌuliopˈita, nˌami nˌitawafˈaɲa mfˌanikˈiwe kulˈiko hˈapo kwˈanza. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈatu, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, kˌutembˈea ɟˈuu jˈenu. wˌatawˌamilˈiki nˈiɲi, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa urˈiθi wˈao, kˈamwe hˌamtawˌaondolˈea tˈena watˈoto wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌanakˌuambˈia, ˌunawˈala wˈatu na kˌuliˌondolˈea taˈifa lˈako watˈoto wˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo hˌutakˈula tˈena wˈatu wˈala kˌulifˈaɲa tˈena taˈifa lˈako lisˈiwe na watˈoto, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
sˌitakufˈaɲa tˈena ˌusikˈie ðihˈaka za mˌataˈifa, wˈala kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na kabˈila za wˈatu, wˈala kˌulifˈaɲa taˈifa lˈako lˌiaŋɡˈuke, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia tˈena, kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakiˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe, wˌaliˌinaɟˈisi kwa mwenˈendo wˌao na matˈendo jˈao. mwenˈendo wˌao mbˈele zˈaŋɡu ˌulikˈuwa kˌama mwanˈamke alˈije katˌika hˈeði.|0
hˈivjo nˌilimwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemwˈaɡa dˈamu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na kwa sabˈabu wˌalikˈuwa wˌameitˈia ˈn̩tʃi ˌunaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu zˈao.|0
nˌikawˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˌao wˌakaˈenda hˈuku na hˌuko katˌika ˈn̩tʃi mbˌalimbˈali, nˌikawˌahukˈumu sˌawasˈawa na mwenˈendo wˌao na matˈendo jˈao.|0
tˈena popˈote wˌalipokwˈenda mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa wˌalilitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, kwa kˌuwa wˈatu wˌalisˈema kˌuwahˈusu, hˈawa n̩dˈio wˈatu wa bwˈana, lakˈini ˌimewapˈasa kˌuondˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake..|0
lakˈini nˌiliwˌahurumˈia kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, ambˈalo ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌimelitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa hˌuko wˌalikokwˈenda.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: si kwa aɟˈili jˈako, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwˌamba nˌinafˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja, bˌali ni kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, ambˈalo mmˌelitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa mlˌijojˌaendˈea.|0
nˌitaˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutakatˈifu wa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kˈuu, ambˈalo lˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, ɟˈina ambˈalo lˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. ndˈipo mˌataˈifa wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitakˌapoɟˌioɲˈeʃa mweɲˈewe kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa kˌuwapitˈia nˈiɲi mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌitawˌaondˈoa nˈiɲi tˌoka mˌataˈifa, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi zˈote na kˌuwarudˈiʃa kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu weɲˈewe.|0
nˌitawˌaɲuɲizˈia mˈaɟi sˈafi, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa sˈafi, nˌitawˌatakˈasa kutˈoka utʃˈafu wˈenu wˈote na kutˈoka sanˈamu zˈenu zˈote.|0
nˌitawˈapa mˈojo ˈm̩pja na kuwˈeka rˈoho ˈm̩pja ndˈani jˈenu, nˌitaondˈoa ndˈani jˈenu mˈojo wˈenu wa ɟˈiwe na kuwˈapa mˈojo wa ɲˈama.|0
nˌami nˌitawˈeka rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ndˈani jˈenu na kˌuwafˈaɲa nˈiɲi mfuˈate ˈamri zˈaŋɡu na kˌuwafˈaɲa kˌuwa wˌaaŋɡalˈifu kˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu.|0
mtaˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijowˈapa bˈaba zˈenu, nˈiɲi mtakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
nˌitawˌaokˈoa nˈiɲi kutˈoka ˌunaɟˈisi wˈenu wˈote. nˌitaiˈita nafˈaka na kˌuioŋɡˈeza ˈiwe ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana nˌami sˌitalˈeta ɲɟˈaa ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
nˌitaoŋɡˈeza matˈunda ja mˈiti na mazˈao ja maʃˈamba, ˌili kwˌamba msipˈate tˈena aˈibu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa kwa aɟˈili ja ɲɟˈaa.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakapˌozikumbˈuka ɲɟˈia zˈenu za uˈovu na matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu, nˌaɲi mtˌaɟitʃukˈia weɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈote na matˈendo jˈenu ja kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
nˌinatˈaka nˈiɲi m̩ɟˈue kwˌamba sifˈaɲi hˈili kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. onˈeni aˈibu na mkˌatahajˈari kwa aɟˈili ja mwenˈendo wˈenu, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: sˈiku ˈile nˌitakˌapowˌasafˈiʃa kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈenu zˈote, nˌitarudˈiʃa wˈatu waˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi jˈenu na maɡˈofu jˌataɟˈeŋɡwa ˈupja.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijokˈuwa ukˈiwa ˌitalˈimwa badˈala ja kukˈaa ukˈiwa matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˈote wˌanaopˈita ndˈani jˈake.|0
wˌatasˈema, hˌii ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeˈatʃwa ukˈiwa sˈasa ˌimekˈuwa kˌama bustˈani ja edˈeni, mˈiɟi ˈile ˌilijokˈuwa maɡˈofu, ukˈiwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa, sˈasa ˌimeɟeŋɡˈewa ŋɡˈome na kˌukalˈiwa na wˈatu.|0
ndˈipo mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka jˌalijˌobakˈia wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana nˌimeɟˈeŋɡa tˈena kˈile kˌilitʃˌoharibˈiwa na nˌimepˈanda tˈena kˈile kˌilitʃokˈuwa ukˈiwa. mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena, nˌami nˌitalifˈaɲa..|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena nˌitasikˈia maˈombi ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli na kˌuwatendˈea ɟˈambo hˈili: nˌitawafˈaɲa wˈatu wˌake kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama kondˈoo.|0
kˌuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama kˈundi la kondˈoo kwa aɟˈili ja ðabˈihu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu wakˈati wa sˌikukˈuu zˈao za wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa. hˈivjo ndˈivjo mˈiɟi ˌilijokˈuwa maɡˈofu ˌitaɟˈazwa na makˈundi ja wˈatu. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakanitˈoa ɲɟˈe kwa rˈoho wa bwˈana na kˌuniwˈeka kˌatikˈati ja bˈonde lˌililokˈuwa lˌimeɟˈaa mifˈupa tˈele.|0
ˌakanˌipitˈiʃa pˈande zˈote kwˈeɲe hˈijo mifˈupa, nˌami nˌikaˈona mifˈupa mˈiŋɡi sˈana ndˈani ja lˈile bˈonde, mifˈupa ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimekaˈuka sˈana.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, mwˌanadˈamu, mifˈupa hˌii jawˈeza kuˈiʃi? nˌikaɟˈibu, ˈee bwˈana mweɲˈezi, wˌewe pˈeke jˈako waɟˈua.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanˌiambˈia, ˌitabirˈie mifˈupa hˌii na ˌuiambˈie, ˈeɲi mifˈupa mikˈavu, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo kwa hˌii mifˈupa: nˌitatˈia pˈumzi ndˈani jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi.|0
nˌitawˌawekˈea miʃˈipa, nˌami nˌitaifˈaɲa ɲˈama ˈiɟe ɟˈuu jˈenu na kˌuwafunˈika kwa ŋɡˈozi. nˌitatˈia pˈumzi ndˈani jˈenu, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa hˈai. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
bˌasi nˌikatabˈiri kˌama nˌilivjˌoamrˈiwa. wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinatabˈiri, kukˈawa na saˈuti, saˈuti ja kˌuɡoŋɡˈana, nˈajo mifˈupa ˌikasˌoɡeleˈana, mfˈupa kwa mfˈupa mwenzˈiwe.|0
nˌikatazˈama, miʃˈipa na ɲˈama vˌikatokˈea ɟˌuːja mifˈupa na ŋɡˈozi ˌikaˌifunˈika, lakˈini hˌapakuwˈepo pˈumzi ndˈani jˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌalipˌoniambˈia, ˌutabirˈie upˈepo, tabˈiri, mwˌanadˈamu na ˌuuambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ɲɟˈoo kutˈoka pˈande ˈn̩ne, ˈee pˈumzi, nˌawe ˌupulizˈie pˈumzi ndˈani ja hˈawa wˌaliˌouˈawa, ˌili wapˈate kuˈiʃi..|0
hˈivjo nˌikatabˈiri kˌama ˌalivjˌoniamˈuru, nˈajo pˈumzi ˌikawˌaiŋɡˈia, wakˈawa hˈai na wˌakasimˈama kwa miɡˈuu jˈao, ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa ˈm̩no.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanˌiambˈia: mwˌanadˈamu, mifˈupa hˌii ni ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli. nˌao wˌanasˈema, mifˈupa jˈetu ˌimekaˈuka na tˌumaˈini lˈetu lˌimetowˈeka, tˌumekˌatilˈiwa mbˈali..|0
hˈivjo wˌatabirˈie na ˌuwaambˈie: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌitajˌafunˈua mˌakabˈuri jˈenu na kˌuwatˈoa ndˈani jˈake, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo nˈiɲi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, mtˌakapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, nˌitakˌapojˌafunˈua mˌakabˈuri jˈenu na kˌuwatˈoa hˈumo.|0
nˌitatˈia rˈoho jˈaŋɡu ndˈani jˈenu nˌaɲi mtaˈiʃi, nˌami nˌitawˌakalˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu weɲˈewe. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi bwˈana nˌimenˈena, nˌami nˌitalitˈenda, asˈema bwˈana!.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tʃukˈua fˈimbo na ˌuandˈike ɟˈuu jˈake, hˌii ni kwa aɟˈili ja jˈuda na wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˌofuŋɡamˈana nˈaje. kˈiʃa tʃukˈua fˈimbo ɲiŋɡˈine, ˌuandˈike ɟˈuu jˈake, fˈimbo ja ˌefraˈimu, ni kwa aɟˈili ja josˈefu na ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli wˌanaˌofuŋɡamˈana nˈaje..|0
zˌiuŋɡanˈiʃe pamˈoɟa kˌuwa fˈimbo mˈoɟa ˌili kwˌamba zˈiwe fˈimbo mˈoɟa katˌika mkˈono wˈako.|0
wˈatu wˈako wˌatakˌapokˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, hˌutatˌuambˈia ni nˈini maˈana ja ɟˈambo hˈili?.|0
wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitaˌitʃukˈua fˈimbo ja josˈefu, ˌilijˈoko mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa ˌefraˈimu na ja mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli jˌanajˌofuŋɡamˈana nˌaje na kˌuiˌuŋɡanˈiʃa na fˈimbo ja jˈuda, nˌikizifˈaɲa kˌuwa fˈimbo mˈoɟa, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wamˈoɟa katˌika mkˈono wˈaŋɡu..|0
inˈua mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao zˈile fˈimbo ˌulizˌoziandˈika.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: nˌitawatˈoa wˌaisraˈeli katˌika mˌataˈifa wˌalikokˈuwa wˌamekwˈenda. nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa popˈote walˈipo na kˌuwarudˈiʃa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa kˌuwa taˈifa mˈoɟa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, katˌika milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli. pˌatakˈuwa na mfˈalme mmˈoɟa ɟˈuu jˈao wˈote na kˈamwe hˌawatˌaɡawaɲˈika tˈena kˌuwa mˌataˈifa mawˈili ˌau kˌuɡawaɲˈika katˌika fˈalme mbˈili.|0
hˌawatˌaɟitˈia tˈena ˌunaɟˈisi kwa sanˈamu zˈao na viɲˈaɡo vjˈao visˈivjo na maˈana wˈala kwa makˈosa jˈao jojˈote, kwa maˈana nˌitawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈao zˈote zˌilizˌowarudˈiʃa ɲˈuma, nˌami nˌitawˌatakˈasa. wˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu daˈudi ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˈuu jˈao, nˌao wˈote wˌatakˈuwa na mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi mmˈoɟa. wˌatafuˈata ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu na kˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈaŋɡu kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu.|0
wˌataˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nˌilijˈompa mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu jakˈobo, ˈn̩tʃi ambˈamo bˈaba zˈenu wˌaliˈiʃi. wˌao na watˈoto wˌao na watˈoto wa watˈoto wˌao wˌataˈiʃi hˈumo milˈele, nˌaje daˈudi mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu ˌatakˈuwa m̩kˈuu wˌao milˈele.|0
nˌitafˈaɲa nˌao aɡˈano la amˈani, lˌitakˈuwa aɡˈano la milˈele. nˌitawafˈaɲa imˈara na kˌuoŋɡˈeza idˈadi jˈao, nˌami nˌitawˈeka mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao milˈele.|0
maskˈani jˈaŋɡu jˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao, nˌitakˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo mˌataˈifa wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi bwˈana n̩dˈije nˌinajˌeifˈaɲa ˌisraˈeli kˌuwa tˌakatˈifu, wakˈati mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu pˌatakˌapokˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao milˈele..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
mwˌanadˈamu, kˈaza ˈuso wˈako ðˈidi ja ɡˈoɡu, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja maɡˈoɡu, m̩kˈuu wa rˈoʃi, meʃˈeki na tubˈali, tabˈiri ðˈidi jˈake.|0
na usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈee ɡˈoɡu, mˌimi ni kiɲˈume nˈawe, mtawˈala m̩kˈuu wa rˈoʃi, meʃˈeki na tubˈali.|0
nˌitakˌuɡeˈuza kˌuelekˈea ˌulikotˈoka na kˌukutˈia ndoˈana kwˈeɲe matˈaja jˈako na kˌukutˈoa ɲɟˈe wˌewe pamˈoɟa na ɟˈeʃi lˈako lˈote, jaˈani, farˈasi wˈako, wapˈanda farˈasi wˈako wˌaliˌoɟiandˈaa tajˈari kwa vˈita, pamˈoɟa na kˈundi kˈubwa la wˌaɟeˈuri wakˈiwa na ŋɡˈao na viɡˈao, wˈote wˌakipˈuŋɡa pˈaŋɡa zˈao.|0
ˌuaɟˈemi, kˈuʃi na pˈutu wˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈao, wˈote wakˈiwa na ŋɡˈao na kofˈia za tʃˈuma.|0
pˈia ɡomˈeri pamˈoɟa na vikˈosi vjˈake vjˈote, na bˈeθ toɡˈarma kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini ja mbˈali pamˈoɟa na vikˈosi vjˈake vjˈote, mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi wakˈiwa pamˈoɟa nˈawe.|0
ɟˌiandˈae, ˈuwe tajˈari, wˌewe na makˈundi jˈako jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri jˌalijˌokusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa nˈawe, nˌawe wˌaamrˈiʃe.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi ˌutaˈitwa vitˈani. katˌika miˈaka iɟˈajo, ˌutaˌivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ˈile ambˈajo ˌimepˈona kutˈoka vˈita, ambˈajo wˈatu wˌake wˌalikusˈaɲua kutˈoka mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi kˈuɟa katˌika milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, ambˈajo kwa mˈuda mrˈefu ˌilikˈuwa ˌimeˈatʃwa ukˈiwa. wˌamelˈetwa kutˈoka mˌataˈifa na sˈasa wˈote wˌanaˈiʃi katˌika hˈali ja salˈama.|0
wˌewe na vikˈosi vjˈako vjˈote na mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jalˈijo pamˈoɟa nˌawe mtapˈanda ɟˈuu, mtˌawazˈoa kˌama tufˈani na kˌuifunˈika ˈn̩tʃi kˌama wˈiŋɡu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika sˈiku ˈile mawˈazo jˌataiŋɡˈia mojˈoni mwˈako nˌawe ˌutapˈaŋɡa mipˈaŋɡo mibˈaja.|0
ˌutasˈema, nˌitapiɡˈana vˈita na ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo viɟˈiɟi vjˈake havˈina mabˈoma. nˌitawˌaʃambulˈia wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi kwa amˈani na wˌasiˌotaraɟˈia vˈita: wˈote wˌanaˈiʃi bˌila mabˈoma na bˌila malˈaŋɡo na mˌakomˈeo.|0
nˌitatˈeka matˈeka na kˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara mˈali za wˈale wˌaliorˈudi kuˈiʃi katˌika mahˈame na wˈale wˈatu wˌaliˌokusˈaɲua kutˈoka kwa mˌataˈifa, ambˈao sˈasa wˈana mifˈuɡo na mˈali ɲˈiŋɡi, wˌanaoˈiʃi kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ʃˈeba na dedˈani pamˈoɟa na wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wa tarʃˈiʃi na viɟˈiɟi vjˈake vjˈote wˌatakˌuambˈia, ɟˈe, ˌumekˈuɟa kutˈeka matˈeka? ɟˈe, ˌumekusˈaɲa makˈundi jˈako ja wˌaɟeˈuri ˌili kˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara mˈali, kutwˈaa fˈeða na ðahˈabu, kˌutuɲaŋɡˈaɲa mifˈuɡo na mˈali na kutˈeka ɲˈara ɲˈiŋɡi zaˈidi? .|0
kwa hˈijo, mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri na ˌumwambˈie ɡˈoɡu: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika sˈiku ˈile, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌapokˈuwa wˌanaˈiʃi salˈama, ɟˈe, wˌewe mweɲˈewe hˌutaliɟˈua hˈilo.|0
ˌutakˈuɟa kutˈoka kwˈako hˌuko kˌaskazˈini ja mbˈali, ukˈiwa pamˈoɟa na mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, wˈote wakˈiwa wˌamepˈanda farˈasi, kˈundi kˈubwa, ɟˈeʃi kˈuu.|0
ˌutakˈuɟa ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli kˌama wˈiŋɡu lˌifunikˈavjo ˈn̩tʃi. sˈiku ziɟˈazo, ˈee ɡˈoɡu, nˌitakulˈeta wˌewe ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu, ˌili kwˌamba mˌataˈifa wapˈate kˌuniɟˈua mˌimi nˌitakˌapoɟˌioɲˈeʃa mtˌakatˈifu kwa kˌukupitˈia wˌewe mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ɟˈe, wˌewe si jˈule nˌilijenˈena ɟˈuu jˈako katˌika sˈiku za zamˈani kwa kˌupitˈia kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˌanabˈii wa ˌisraˈeli? wakˈati ˈule wˌalitabˈiri kwa miˈaka mˈiŋɡi kwˌamba nˌiŋɡekulˈeta ˌupiɡˈane nˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo lˌitakˌalotokˈea katˌika sˈiku ˈile: ɡˈoɡu ˌatakˌapoʃˌambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali ˌitaˈamka, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
katˌika wˈivu wˈaŋɡu na ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu kˈali nˌinasˈema kˌuwa wakˈati ˈule pˌatakuwˈepo tˌetemˈeko kˈuu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini, ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, waɲˈama wa kondˈeni, kˈila kiˈumbe kˌitambaˈatʃo arðˈini, na wˈatu wˈote walˈio ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌatatˌetemˈeka mbˈele zˈaŋɡu. milˈima ˌitapindˈuka, mˌaɟabˈali jˌatapasˈuka na kˈila ukˈuta ˌutaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini.|0
nˌitaˈita upˈaŋɡa vˈita ðˈidi ja ɡˈoɡu ɟˌuːja milˈima jˈaŋɡu jˈote, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. upˈaŋɡa wa kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌutakˈuwa ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
nˌitatˌekelˈeza hukˈumu ɟˈuu jˌake kwa taˈuni na kwa ˌumwaɡˈaɟi wa dˈamu. nˌitaifˈaɲa mvˈua ja mˌafurˈiko kuɲˈeʃa, mvˈua ja mˈawe na mˈoto wa kˌiberˈiti ɟˈuu jˌake na ɟˌuːja vikˈosi vjˈake na ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi walˈio pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
nˌami hˈivjo ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjooɲˈeʃa ukˈuu wˈaŋɡu na ˌutakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitaɟˌiɟulˈiʃa mbˈele ja mˈatʃo ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi. ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana..|0
mwˌanadˈamu, tabˈiri ðˈidi ja ɡˈoɡu usˈeme: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈee ɡˈoɡu mˌimi ni kiɲˈume nˈawe, mtawˈala m̩kˈuu wa rˈoʃi, meʃˈeki na tubˈali.|0
nˌitakˌuɡeˈuza kˌuelekˈea ˌulikotˈoka na kˌukuburˈuta. nˌitakulˈeta kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini ja mbˈali na kˌukupelˈeka wˌewe ðˈidi ja milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitaupˈiɡa upˈinde wˈako kutˈoka mkˈono wˈako wa kuʃˈoto na kˌuifˈaɲa miʃˈale ˌiaŋɡˈuke kutˈoka mkˈono wˈako wa kuˈume.|0
ˌutaaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli, wˌewe pamˈoɟa na vikˈosi vjˈako vjˈote na jˈale mˌataˈifa jalˈijo pamˈoɟa nˈawe. nˌitakutˈoa ˈuwe tʃakˈula tʃa ndˈeɡe wa aˈina zˈote walˈao ɲˈama na tʃa waɲˈama wa mwitˈuni.|0
ˌutaaŋɡˈuka katˌika uwˈaɲɟa, kwa kˌuwa nˌimenˈena, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja maɡˈoɡu na kwa wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi kwa salˈama hˌuko pwˈani, nˌao wˌataɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana.|0
nˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu lˌiɟulikˈane mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli. sˌitaliˈatʃa tˈena ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu litˈiwe ˌunaɟˈisi, nˈajo mˌataˈifa wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi bwˈana ndˈimi alˈije mtˌakatˈifu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ɟˈambo lˌinakˈuɟa! hakˈika lˌitatokˈea, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi. hˌii n̩dˈijo sˈiku ˈile nˌilijosˈema habˈari zˈake.|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika mˈiɟi ja ˌisraˈeli wˌatakˌapotˈoka na kˌutumˈia hˈizo silˈaha kˌuwaʃˈia mˈoto na kˌuzitˌeketˈeza, jaˈani, kiɡˈao na ŋɡˈao, pˈinde na miʃˈale, rˈuŋɡu za vˈita na mikˈuki. kwa miˈaka sˈaba wˌatavˌitumˈia kˌama kˈuni.|0
hˌawatˌahitˈaɟi kˌukusˈaɲa kˈuni kutˈoka mˌaʃambˈani wˈala kukˈata kˈuni kutˈoka kwˈeɲe misˈitu, kwa sabˈabu wˌatatumˈia silˈaha kˌuwa kˈuni. nˌao wˌatawatˈeka matˈeka wˈale wˌaliˌowatˈeka na kˌutʃukˈua ɲˈara mˈali za wˈale wˌaliˌotʃukˈua mˈali zˈao ɲˈara, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
sˈiku ˈile nitˈampa ɡˈoɡu mahˈali pa kˌuzikˈia katˌika ˌisraˈeli, katˌika bˈonde la wˈale wˌasafirˈio upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuelekˈea bˌaharˈini. ɟˈambo hˈili lˌitazuˈia ɲɟˈia ja wˌasafˈiri kwa sabˈabu ɡˈoɡu na makˈundi jˌake jˈote ja wˌaɟeˈuri wˌatazˈikwa hˌuko. kwa hˈijo lˌitaˈitwa bˈonde la hˈamon ɡˈoɡu.|0
kwa miˈezi sˈaba ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitakˈuwa ˌikiwazˈika ˌili kˌuisafˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌatawazˈika, nˈajo sˈiku nˌitakˌajotukˈuzwa ˌitakˈuwa sˈiku ja kˌumbukˈumbu kwa aɟˈili jˈao, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
wˈatu wˌataˌaɟirˈiwa mˈara kwa mˈara kˌuisafˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi. baˈaði jˈao wˌatapˈita n̩tʃˈini kˈote na zaˈidi jˈao hˈao weŋɡˈine, wˌatawazˈika wˈale wˌaliˌosalˈia ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi. mwˈiʃo wa hˈijo miˈezi sˈaba wˌataˈanza ˌupekˈuzi wˈao.|0
wakˈati wˌanapopˈita n̩tʃˈini kˈote na mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakaˈona mfˈupa wa mwˌanadˈamu, ˌatawˈeka alˈama kˈando jˌake mpˈaka watʃˈimba kabˈuri wˈawe wˌameuzˈika katˌika bˈonde la hˈamon ɡˈoɡu.|0
pˈia ˈm̩ɟi ˌuitwˈao hamˈona ˌutakˈuwa hˈumo. hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌatakˌavjoˌisafˈiʃa ˈn̩tʃi..|0
mwˌanadˈamu, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ˈita kˈila aˈina ja ndˈeɡe na waɲˈama wˈote wa mwitˈuni, wˌaambˈie: kˌusaɲikˈeni ˈm̩ɟe pamˈoɟa kutˈoka pˈande zˈote kwa aɟˈili ja ðabˈihu nˌinajˌowaˌandalˈia, ðabˈihu kˈuu katˌika milˈima ja ˌisraˈeli. hˌuko mtakˈula ɲˈama na kˈuɲua dˈamu.|0
mtakˈula ɲˈama za wˈatu mˌaʃuɟˈaa na kˈuɲua dˈamu za wakˈuu wa dunˈia kˈana kwˌamba ni za kondˈoo dˈume na kondˈoo wˈake, mbˈuzi na mˌafahˈali, wˈote wˌalionˈona kutˈoka baʃˈani.|0
katˌika ðabˈihu nˌinajˌoandˈaa kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, mtakˈula mafˈuta mpˈaka mkinˈai na kˈuɲua dˈamu mpˈaka mlˈewe.|0
kwˈeɲe mˈeza jˈaŋɡu wˌataɟˌiʃibˈiʃa kwa farˈasi na wapˈanda farˈasi, wˈatu mˌaʃuɟˈaa na askˈari wa kˈila aˈina, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌitaˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌutukˈufu wˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˈajo mˌataˈifa jˈote wˌataiˈona aðˈabu nˌitakˌajotˈoa na mkˈono wˈaŋɡu nˌitakˌaouwˈeka ɟˈuu jˈao.|0
kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ˈile na kˌuendelˈea ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌitaɟˈua kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
na mˌataˈifa wˌataɟˈua kˌuwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli wˌalikwˈenda ˌutumwˈani kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi jˈao, kwa sabˈabu hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu. hˈivjo nˌiliwafˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwatˈia mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈao, nˌao wˈote wˌakaaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
nˌiliwˌatendˈea sˌawasˈawa na utʃˈafu wˌao na makˈosa jˈao, nˌami nˌikawafˈitʃa ˈuso wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: sˈasa nˌitamrudˈiʃa jakˈobo kutˈoka ˌutumwˈani, nˌami nˌitawˌahurumˈia wˈatu wˈote wa ˌisraˈeli, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa na wˈivu kwa aɟˈili ja ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu.|0
wˌataˌisahˈau aˈibu jˈao na ɟˈinsi wˌalivjˌooɲˈeʃa kˌutokˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu mˌimi wakˈati wˌaliˈiʃi salˈama katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao, bˌila kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌuwatˈia hˈofu.|0
nˌitakˌapokˈuwa nˌimewˌarudˈiʃa kutˈoka mˌataˈifa na kˌuwakusˈaɲa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi za adˈui zˈao, mˌimi nˌitaɟˌioɲˈeʃa kˌuwa mtˌakatˈifu kwa kˌupitˈia kwˈao matʃˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi.|0
ndˈipo wˌatakˌapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈao, iŋɡˈawa nˌiliwˌapelˈeka ˌuhamiʃˈoni mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa tˈena katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe, bˌila kumwˈatʃa jejˈote ɲˈuma.|0
sˌitawafˈitʃa tˈena ˈuso wˈaŋɡu, kwa maˈana nˌitamimˈina rˈoho wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano wa ˌuhamˈiʃo wˈetu, mwanzˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈuo mwˈaka, sˈiku ja kˈumi ja mwˈezi, katˌika mwˈaka wa kˈumi na ˈn̩ne baˌada ja kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwa ˈm̩ɟi, sˈiku hˈijo hˈijo mkˈono wa bwˈana ˌulikˈuwa ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu, nˌaje ˌakanˌipelˈeka hˌuko.|0
nikˈiwa katˌika maˈono ja mˈuŋɡu ˌalinˌitʃukˈua mpˈaka ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, nˌaje ˌakaniwˈeka kwˈeɲe mlˈima mrˈefu sˈana, ambˈako upˈande wa kusˈini kˌulikuwˈepo baˈaði ja maɟˈeŋɡo ambˈajo jˌaliˌonekˈana kˌama ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ˌakanˌipelˈeka hˌuko, nˌami nˌikamwˈona ˈm̩tu ambˈaje kˌuonekˈana kwˈake kˌulikˈuwa kˌama kˌuonekˈana kwa ʃˈaba. ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo akˈiwa na kˈamba ja kitˈani na ufˈito wa kˌupimˈia mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, ˌaŋɡalˈia kwa mˈatʃo jˈako na ˌusikˈie kwa mˌasikˈio jˈako nˌawe ˌuziŋɡatˈie kˈitu nˌitakˌatʃokˌuoɲˈeʃa, kwa kˌuwa n̩dˈijo sabˈabu ˌumelˈetwa hˈapa. ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli kˈila kˈitu ˌutakˌatʃoˈona.|0
nˌikaˈona ukˈuta ˌuliˌozuŋɡˈuka enˈeo lˈote la hekˈalu. ˈule ufˈito wa kˌupimˈia ˌuliokˈuwa mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌulikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ndˈefu sˈita, jaˈani, ðirˈaa ndˈefu ni sˈawa na ðirˈaa na ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne, ˌakapˈima ˈule ukˈuta. ukˈuta hˈuo ˌulikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa ndˈefu sˈita na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa ndˈefu sˈita.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaˈenda kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki. ˌakapˈanda ŋɡˈazi zˌake ˌakapˈima kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa lˈaŋɡo, nˈatʃo kˌilikˈuwa na kˈina tʃa hˈuo ufˈito.|0
vjˈumba vja kˌupumzikˈia vja walˈinzi vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa hˈuo ufˈito mmˈoɟa na upˈana wa hˈuo ufˈito, kˈuta zˌilizoɡˈawa vjˈumba hˈivjo vja mˌapumzˈiko zˌilikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa tˈano. nˈatʃo kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa lˈaŋɡo lˌililokˈuwa karˈibu na ukˈumbi ˌunaˌoelekˈea hˌekalˈuni ˌulikˈuwa na kˈina tʃa hˈuo ufˈito.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima barˈaza ja ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo.|0
ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa na kˈina tʃa ðirˈaa nˈane na miˈimo jˌake ˌilikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa mbˈili. barˈaza ja lˈaŋɡo ˌiliˌelekˈea hekˈalu.|0
ndˈani ja lˈaŋɡo la mˌaʃarˈiki kˌulikuwˈepo vjˈumba vitˈatu vja kˌupumzikˈia kˈila upˈande, vjˈote vitˈatu vˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo vilˈivjo sˈawa, nˈazo ɲˈuso za kˈuta zˌilizˌoteŋɡanˈiʃa kˈila upˈande zˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo vilˈivjo sˈawa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima upˈana wa ˌiŋɡilˈio la lˈaŋɡo, ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi na urˈefu wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi na tˈatu.|0
mbˈele ja kˈila tʃˈumba tʃa kˌupumzikˈia kˌulikuwˈepo ukˈuta ˌuliokˈuwa na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa kwˈenda ɟˈuu, nˈavjo hˈivjo vjˈumba vˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa sˈita mrˈaba.|0
ˌakapˈima pˈia ukˈumbi, urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌofuatˈia hˈijo ŋɡˈuzo kˈila upˈande wa hˈuo ukˈumbi.|0
umbˈali kˌuanzˈia ˌiŋɡilˈio la ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo hˌadi mwˈiʃo kabˈisa wa barˈaza jˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa hamsˈini.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na vˌidirˈiʃa kwˈeɲe hˈivjo vjˈumba vja walˈinzi na ŋɡˈuzo za hˈivjo vjˈumba zˌilikˈuwa kwˈeɲe mzuŋɡˈuko wa hˌilo lˈaŋɡo, vˈivjo hˈivjo kˌulikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa jˌalijˌozuŋɡˈuka kˌuelˌekeˈana na ˈua na ɟˌuːja kˈila ŋɡˈuzo kˌulikˈuwa na mapˈambo ja mˈiti ja mitˈende.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanilˈeta katˌika ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe. hˌuko nˌikaˈona vjˈumba viŋɡˈine pamˈoɟa na ɲɟˈia ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimeɟˈeŋɡwa kˌuzuŋɡˈuka ukˈumbi wˈote, kˌulikˈuwa na vjˈumba θˌelaθˈini vˌimepaŋɡˈana kˈando ja hˈijo ɲɟˈia.|0
ɲɟˈia hˌii ˌilijoɟˈeŋɡwa ˌiliambˈaa na lˈaŋɡo, ikˈiwa na urˈefu sˈawa na lˈaŋɡo, hˌii ˌilikˈuwa ni ɲɟˈia ja tʃˈini.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima umbˈali kutˈoka ndˈani ja lˈaŋɡo la tʃˈini mpˈaka ɲɟˈe ja ukˈumbi wa ndˈani, nˌao ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima urˈefu na upˈana wa lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea kˌaskazˈini, kˌukabˈili ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe.|0
vjˈumba vjˈake vˌilikˈuwa vitˈatu kˈila upˈande, kˈuta zˌilizˌoɡawˈaɲa vjˈumba na barˈaza ˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˈawa na zˈile kˈuta za lˈaŋɡo la kwˈanza. zˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano.|0
mˌadirˈiʃa jˈake, barˈaza jˌake na nˈakʃi jˌake ja mˈiti ja mitˈende vˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˌawasˈawa na vˈile vja lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki. kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi sˈaba za kˌupandˈia hˌuko, pamˈoɟa na barˈaza jˌake mkabˈala nˈazo.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na lˈaŋɡo kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ndˈani lˌililˌoelekˈea lˈile lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini, kˌama vˈile ˌilivjokˈuwa ˈule upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. ˌakapˈima kutˈoka lˈaŋɡo mˈoɟa hˌadi lˈile lilˈilo mkabˈala nˈalo, lˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanˌioŋɡˈoza mpˈaka upˈande wa kusˈini, nˌami nˌikaˈona lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea kusˈini. ˌakaipˈima miˈimo jˌake na barˈaza jˈake, nˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˈawa kˌama hˈivjo viŋɡˈine.|0
lˈaŋɡo na barˈaza jˌake vˌilikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa membˈamba pˈande zˈote, kˌama mˌadirˈiʃa ja hˌuko kwiŋɡˈine. ˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi sˈaba za kˌupandˈia hˌuko, pamˈoɟa na barˈaza jˌake mkabˈala nˈazo. ˌilikˈuwa na nˈakʃi za mˈiti ja mitˈende kwˈeɲe kˈuta zˌilizˌoɡawˈaɲa vjˈumba kˈila upˈande.|0
ukˈumbi wa ndˈani pˈia ˌulikˈuwa na lˈaŋɡo lˌililˌoelekˈea kusˈini. nˌaje ˌakapˈima kutˈoka lˈaŋɡo hˈili mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲɟˈe upˈande wa kusˈini; ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka ukˈumbi wa ndˈani kwa kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini, nˌaje ˌakapˈima lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini, ambˈalo lˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˈawa na jˈale meŋɡˈine.|0
vjˈumba vjˈake, kˈuta zˌilizˌoɡawˈaɲa vjˈumba na ukˈumbi wˌake zˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˌawasˈawa na zˈile ɲiŋɡˈine. hˌilo lˈaŋɡo na barˈaza jˌake vˌilikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa pˈande zˈote. nˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano.|0
barˈaza za malˈaŋɡo zˌilizˌozuŋɡˈuka ukˈumbi wa ndˈani zˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano na kˈina tʃa ðirˈaa tˈano..|0
barˈaza jˌake ˌiliˌelekeˈana na ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, miˈimo jˌake ˌilinakʃˈiwa mˈiti ja mitˈende, kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi nˈane za kˌupandˈia hˌuko.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ndˈani ˌuliˈoko upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, nˌaje ˌakalipˈima lˈaŋɡo hˈilo, lˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo vilˈivjo sˌawasˈawa na jˈale meŋɡˈine.|0
vjˈumba vjˈake, kˈuta zˌake na barˈaza jˌake vˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo vilˈivjo sˈawa na vˈile viŋɡˈine. lˈile lˈaŋɡo pamˈoɟa na barˈaza jˌake vˌilikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa pˈande zˈote. urˈefu wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano.|0
barˈaza jˌake ˌiliˌelekˈea ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, miˈimo jˌake ˌilinakʃˈiwa mˈiti ja mitˈende pˈande zˈote. kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi nˈane za kˌupandˈia hˌuko.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini na kˌulipˈima. lˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo sˈawa na jˈale meŋɡˈine.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌilivjokˈuwa kwa vjˈumba, kˈuta zˌake na barˈaza jˈake, tˈena kˌulikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa pˈande zˈote. ˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano.|0
barˈaza jˌake ˌiliˌelekeˈana na ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, miˈimo jˌake ˌilinakʃˈiwa mˈiti ja mitˈende pˈande zˈote, kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi nˈane za kˌupandˈia hˌuko.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na tʃˈumba na mlˈaŋɡo karˈibu na barˈaza katˌika kˈila ɲɟˈia ja ndˈani ja lˈaŋɡo ambˈamo sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa zˌiliˈoʃwa.|0
kwˈeɲe barˈaza ja lˈile lˈaŋɡo kˌulikuwˈepo mˈeza mbˈili kˈila upˈande, ambˈako sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za ðˈambi na sadˈaka za hatˈia zˌilitʃiɲɟˈiwa.|0
karˈibu na ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe wa barˈaza ja lˈile lˈaŋɡo karˈibu na ŋɡˈazi kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini kˌulikˈuwa na mˈeza mbˈili, nˈako upˈande mwiŋɡˈine wa ŋɡˈazi kˌulikuwˈepo na mˈeza mbˈili.|0
kwa hˈijo kˌulikˈuwa na mˈeza ˈn̩ne upˈande mmˈoɟa wa lˈaŋɡo na ɲiŋɡˈine ˈn̩ne upˈande mwiŋɡˈine, zˈote zˌilikˈuwa mˈeza nˈane, ambˈapo ðabˈihu zˌilitʃiɲɟˈiwa.|0
pˈia kˌulikˈuwa na mˈeza ˈn̩ne za mˈawe jˌalijotʃˈoŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, kˈila mˈeza ˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu, upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na nˈusu na kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa mˈoɟa. ɟˌuːja mˈeza hˈizo vˌiliwˈekwa vjˈombo vja kˌutʃiɲɟˈia sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu ɲiŋɡˈine mbˌalimbˈali.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na kulˈabu, urˈefu wˌake ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne, zˌilikˈuwa zˌimeʃikˈizwa ˌukutˈani pˈande zˈote. mˈeza zˌilikˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈama za sadˈaka.|0
ɲɟˈe ja lˈaŋɡo la ndˈani, kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ndˈani, kˌulikˈuwa na vjˈumba viwˈili, kimˈoɟa upˈande wa lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini nˈatʃo kˌiliˌelekˈea kusˈini, kiŋɡˈine upˈande wa lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini nˈatʃo kˌiliˌelekˈea kˌaskazˈini.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, tʃˈumba kˌinatʃˌoelekˈea upˈande wa kusˈini ni kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani ambˈao wˈana ˌusimamˈizi wa hˌekalˈuni.|0
nˈatʃo tʃˈumba kˌinatʃˌoelekˈea upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ni kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani wˌeɲe ˌusimamˈizi wa mˌaðabahˈuni. hˈawa ni wˈana wa sadˈoki, ambˈao n̩dˈio walˈawi pekˈee wˌanaowˈeza kˌumkaribˈia bwˈana ˌili kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele zˈake.|0
ndˈipo ˌalipopˈima ukˈumbi: nˌao ˌulikˈuwa mrˈaba wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa urˈefu na upˈana. mˌaðabˈahu jˌalikˈuwa mbˈele ja hekˈalu.|0
ˌakanilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe barˈaza ja hekˈalu nˌaje ˌakaipˈima miˈimo ja hˈijo barˈaza, nˈajo ˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈatu kˈila upˈande. upˈana wa ˌiŋɡilˈio ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi na ˈn̩ne na kˈuta zˌake zˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈatu kˈila upˈande.|0
barˈaza ˌilikˈuwa na ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini kwˈenda ɟˈuu na ðirˈaa kˈumi na mbˈili kˌuanzˈia mbˈele hˌadi ɲˈuma. kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈazi kˈumi za kˌupandˈia hˌuko, pˈia kˌulikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuzo kwa kˈila upˈande wa miˈimo.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanilˈeta katˌika sehˈemu ja ɲɟˈe ja pˌatakatˈifu, nˌaje ˌakaipˈima miˈimo; upˈana wˌake ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa sˈita kˈila upˈande.|0
ˌiŋɡilˈio lˌilikˈuwa la upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na kˈuta zˌilizˌoɟitokˈeza kˈila upˈande zˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈano. pˈia ˌakapˈima sehˈemu ja ɲɟˈe ja pˌatakatˈifu, nˈajo ˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌarobaˈini na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaiŋɡˈia sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ndˈani ja hekˈalu na kupˈima miˈimo ja ˌiŋɡilˈio, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌulikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa mbˈili. ˌiŋɡilˈio lˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa sˈita, na kˈuta zˌilizˌotokˈeza kˈila upˈande zˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa sˈaba.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima ukˈuta wa hekˈalu, nˌao ˌulikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa sˈita, na kˈila tʃˈumba tʃa pembˈeni kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu kˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne.|0
vjˈumba vja pembˈeni vˌilikˈuwa na ɣorˈofa tˈatu, kimˈoɟa ɟˌuːja kiŋɡˈine, kˈila ɣorˈofa ˌilikˈuwa na vjˈumba θˌelaθˈini. kˌulikˈuwa na borˈiti katˌika ukˈuta wˈote wa hekˈalu ˌili kˌuimarˈiʃa vjˈumba vja pembˈeni, kwa hˈijo borˈiti hˈizo hˌazikˌuʃikˌamanˈiʃwa kwˈeɲe ukˈuta wa hekˈalu.|0
vjˈumba vja pembˈeni vˌilivjˌozuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu vˌilizˈidi kˌupanˈuka kˌuliŋɡˈana na sakˈafu zˌilivjokwˈenda ɟˈuu. uɟˈenzi ˌuliˌozuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu ˌuliɟˈeŋɡwa kukwˈea ɟˈuu, kwa hˈijo vjˈumba vˌilipanˈuka kwa kadˈiri ja kˈila kimˈoɟa kˌilivjokwˈenda ɟˈuu. ŋɡˈazi za kˌupandˈia zˌilianzˈia sakˈafu ja tʃˈini hˌadi sakˈafu ja ɟˈuu kabˈisa kwa kˌupitˈia sakˈafu ja kˈati.|0
nˌikaˈona pˈia kˌuwa hekˈalu lˌilikˈuwa na kitˈako kˌilitʃˌoinulˈiwa pˈande zˈote, hˈuu ˌulikˈuwa n̩dˈio msˈiŋɡi wa vˈile vjˈumba vja pembˈeni ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ˈule ufˈito mmˈoɟa wa kˌupimˈia, jaˈani, ðirˈaa ndˈefu sˈita.|0
ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe wa vjˈumba vja pembˈeni ˌulikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa tˈano. enˈeo la wˈazi kˌatikˈati ja vjˈumba vja pembˈeni vja hekˈalu.|0
na vjˈumba vja mˌakuhˈani lˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu pˈande zˈote.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na mˌaiŋɡilˈio kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vja pembˈeni kˌutokˈea enˈeo lilˈilo wˈazi, mˈoɟa upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini na liŋɡˈine upˈande wa kusˈini, nˌao msˈiŋɡi ˌuliˌouŋɡanˈiʃa lˈile enˈeo la wˈazi ˌulikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈano ˌukilˌizuŋɡˈuka lˈote.|0
ɟˈeŋɡo lˌililˌoelˌekeˈana na ˈua wa hekˈalu upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi lˌilikˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa sabˈini. ukˈuta wa ɟˈeŋɡo hˌilo ˌulikˈuwa na unˈene wa ðirˈaa tˈano, kˌulizuŋɡˈuka lˈote, urˈefu ˌulikˈuwa wa ðirˈaa tisˈini.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima hekˈalu, lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa na ˈua wa hekˈalu na ɟˈeŋɡo pamˈoɟa na kˈuta zˌake vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa pˈia.|0
upˈana wa ˈua wa hekˈalu upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, pamˈoɟa na upˈande wa mbˈele wa hekˈalu ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakapˈima urˈefu wa ɟˈeŋɡo lˌinalˌoelˌekeˈana na ˈua upˈande wa ɲˈuma wa hekˈalu, pamˈoɟa na vjˈumba vjˈake kˈila upˈande, ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa. sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ɲɟˈe, sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ndˈani, pamˈoɟa na barˈaza ˌinajˌoelˌekeˈana na ukˈumbi.|0
pamˈoɟa na vˌiziŋɡˈiti, mˌadirˈiʃa membˈamba na vjˈumba vjˈote vitˈatu, kˈila kimˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na kˌiziŋɡˈiti vˌilifunˈikwa kwa m̩bˈao. sakˈafu, ukˈuta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mˌadirˈiʃa na mˌadirˈiʃa jeɲˈewe vˌilifunˈikwa kwa m̩bˈao.|0
kˌulinakʃˈiwa mˌakerˈubi na mˈiti ja mitˈende. mˈiti ja mitˈende ˌilikˈuwa kˈati ja kerˈubi na kerˈubi. kˈila kerˈubi ˌalikˈuwa na ɲˈuso mbˈili.|0
upˈande mmˈoɟa ˈuso wa mwˌanadˈamu kˌuelekˈea ˈm̩ti wa mtˈende na upˈande mwiŋɡˈine ˈuso wa sˈimba ˌukiˌelekˈea ˈm̩ti mwiŋɡˈine wa mtˈende. ˌilinakʃˈiwa kˌuzuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu lˈote.|0
kˌuanzˈia sakˈafu mpˈaka enˈeo lilˈilo ɟˌuːja ˌiŋɡilˈio, pˌalinakʃˈiwa mˌakerˈubi na mˈiti ja mitˈende pamˈoɟa na kwˈeɲe ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe wa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa ɲɟˈe pˌalikˈuwa na miˈimo ja mlˈaŋɡo ˌuliokˈuwa mrˈaba na ˈule ˌuliokˈuwa katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu ˌulikˈuwa ˌunafanˈana na hˈuo mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na mˌaðabˈahu ja m̩bˈao kˈimo tʃˈake ðirˈaa tˈatu na ˌilikˈuwa ðirˈaa mbˈili mrˈaba pˈande zˈote, tˈako lˈake na pˈande zˌake zˌilikˈuwa za m̩bˈao. jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanˌiambˈia, hˌii ni mˈeza ambˈajo ˈiko mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa ɲɟˈe na pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu zˌilikˈuwa na milˈaŋɡo miwˈili.|0
kˈila mlˈaŋɡo ˌulikˈuwa na vipˈande viwˈili, vipˈande viwˈili vˌilivjoʃˈikwa na bawˈaba vjˌeɲe kˌufuŋɡˈuka kwa kˈila mlˈaŋɡo.|0
ɟˌuːja hˈijo milˈaŋɡo ja pˌatakatˈifu pˌalinakʃˈiwa mˌakerˈubi na mˈiti ja mitˈende kˌama jˈale jˌalijˌonakʃˈiwa kwˈeɲe kˈuta, na kˌulikˈuwa na ubˈao ˌuliˌoniŋɡinˈia mbˈele ja barˈaza kwa ɲɟˈe.|0
katˌika kˈuta za pembˈeni za ukˈumbi kˌulikˈuwa na mˌadirˈiʃa membˈamba jˌalijˌonakʃˈiwa mˈiti ja mitˈende kˈila upˈande. vjˈumba vja pembˈeni vja hekˈalu pˈia vˌilikˈuwa vˌimefunˈikwa kwa m̩bˈao.|0
ndˈipo jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanˌioŋɡˈoza kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˈua wa ɲɟˈe na kˌunilˈeta mpˈaka kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vˌinavjˌoelˌekeˈana na ˈua wa hekˈalu na kˌuelˌekeˈana na ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
ɟˈeŋɡo ambˈalo mlˈaŋɡo wˌake ˌuliˌelekˈea kˌaskazˈini lˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini.|0
mbˈele ja zˈile ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini za ˈule ˈua wa ndˈani ˌunaˌoelˌekeˈana na ˈile ɲɟˈia ja ˈua wa ɲɟˈe, kˌuliinˈuka vjˈumba virˈefu kimˈoɟa baˌada ja kiŋɡˈine vja ɣorˈofa tˈatu.|0
mbˈele ja hˈivi vjˈumba kˌulikˈuwa na ɲɟˈia ja ndˈani jˌeɲe upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa. milˈaŋɡo jˌake ˌilikˈuwa upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
bˌasi vjˈumba vja ɟˈuu vˌilikˈuwa vjembˈamba zaˈidi, kwa kˌuwa uɟˈia ˌulitʃukˈua nafˈasi zaˈidi ndˈani jˌake kulˈiko katˌika vjˈumba vja sakˈafu ja tʃˈini na vja kˌatikˈati ja ɟˈeŋɡo.|0
vjˈumba katˌika ɣorˈofa ja tˈatu hˌavikˈuwa na ŋɡˈuzo, kˌama kˈumbi zˌilivjokˈuwa nˈazo, kwa hˈijo enˈeo la sakˈafu ja vjˈumba vja ɟˈuu lˌilikˈuwa ni dˈoɡo kulˈiko la sakˈafu ja tʃˈini na ja kˈati.|0
kˌulikˈuwa na ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe ˌuliokˈuwa sambˈamba na vˈile vjˈumba na ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, ˌulitokˈeza urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini.|0
wakˈati sˈafu ja vjˈumba katˌika ˈua wa ɲɟˈe vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini, vˈile vjˈumba vˌilivjokˈuwa karˈibu zaˈidi na hekˈalu vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˈia mˈoɟa.|0
vjˈumba vja tʃˈini vˌilikˈuwa na ˌiŋɡilˈio upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ˌunapˌoiŋɡˈia kutˈoka ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe.|0
upˈande wa kusˈini kˌufuˈata urˈefu wa ukˈuta wa ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe, ˌunaˌopakˈana na ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu na kˌuelˌekeˈana na ukˈuta wa ɲɟˈe, kˌulikˈuwa na vjˈumba.|0
vjˌeɲe uɟˈia ˌunajopˈita mbˈele jˈake. hˈivi vˌilifanˈana na vˈile vjˈumba vja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, vˌilikˈuwa na urˈefu na upˈana ulˈio sˈawa, mahˈali pa kˌutokˈea na vipˈimo vjˈake vˌilikˈuwa sˈawa. kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa milˈaŋɡo ja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
ndˈivjo ˌilivjokˈuwa milˈaŋɡo ja vjˈumba vja upˈande wa kusˈini. kˌulikˈuwa na ˌiŋɡilˈio kˌuanzˈia mwˈanzo wa ɲɟˈia ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa sambˈamba na ukˈuta wa pˈili ˌuliokˈuwa upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, ambˈako ndˈiko kwa kˌuiŋɡˈia vjumbˈani.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, vjˈumba vja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini na vja upˈande wa kusˈini ambˈavjo vˌinaˌelekeˈana na ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu ni vjˈumba vja mˌakuhˈani, mahˈali ambˈapo wˈale mˌakuhˈani ambˈao hˌumkaribˈia bwˈana wˌatakˈula zˈile sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu sˈana. hˌuko ndˈiko wˌatakˌakowˈeka zˈile sadˈaka tˌakatˈifu sˈana, jaˈani, sadˈaka za nafˈaka, sadˈaka za ðˈambi na sadˈaka za hatˈia, kwa kˌuwa mahˈali ni pˌatakatˈifu.|0
mˈara mˌakuhˈani wˌaiŋɡiˈapo mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, hˌawarˌuhusˈiwi kwˈenda kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe mpˈaka wˌajaˈatʃe mavˈazi ambˈajo wˌalivˈaa wakˈiwa wˌanahudˈumu, kwa kˌuwa hˈajo mavˈazi ni mˌatakatˈifu. ˌinawapˈasa kuvˈaa mavˈazi meŋɡˈine kˈabla hˌawaɟˌakaribˈia enˈeo lilˈilo wˈazi kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu.|0
ˌalipˌomalˈiza kupˈima vˈile vˌilivjokˈuwa katˌika enˈeo la ndˈani la hekˈalu, ˌakanitˈoa ɲɟˈe kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na kupˈima enˈeo lˈote lˌinalˌozuŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌakapˈima upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kwa ˈule ufˈito wa kˌupimˈia, nˌao ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano.|0
ˌakapˈima upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, nˌao ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano kwa ufˈito ˈule wa kˌupimˈia.|0
tˈena ˌakapˈima upˈande wa kusˈini, nˌao ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano kwa ufˈito ˈule wa kˌupimˈia.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaɡˌeukˈia upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi na kˌuupˈima, ˌulikˈuwa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano kwa ufˈito ˈule wa kˌupimˈia.|0
hˈivjo ˌakapˈima enˈeo katˌika pˈande zˈote ˈn̩ne. lˌilikˈuwa na ukˈuta kˌulizuŋɡˈuka wˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano na upˈana wa ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano, ˌuliˌoteŋɡanˈiʃa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na enˈeo la wˈatu wˈote.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanilˈeta kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
nˌami nˌikaˈona ˌutukˈufu wa mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli ukˈiɟa kutˈoka upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki. saˈuti jˌake ˌilikˈuwa kˌama ja ŋɡurˈumo ja mˈaɟi jˌaendˈajo kˈasi, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaŋɡˈaa kwa ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
maˈono nˌilijˌojaˈona jˌalikˈuwa kˌama maˈono jˈale nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimejaˈona wakˈati mˈuŋɡu ˌalipokˈuɟa kˌuaŋɡamˈiza ˈm̩ɟi na kˌama maˈono nˌilijokˈuwa nˌimejaˈona kˈando ja ˈm̩to wa kebˈari, nˌami nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukaiŋɡˈia hˌekalˈuni kwa kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kˈiʃa rˈoho ˌakanˌitʃukˈua na kˌunilˈeta katˌika ˈule ˈua wa ndˈani, nˌao ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌuliliɟˈaza hekˈalu.|0
wakˈati jˈule ˈm̩tu akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando jˈaŋɡu, nˌilisikˈia ˈm̩tu mmˈoɟa ˌakisˈema nˌami kutˈoka ndˈani ja hekˈalu.|0
ˌakasˈema, mwˌanadˈamu, hˈapa ni mahˈali pa kˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu tʃa ˈenzi na mahˈali pa kuwˈeka ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu. hˈapa ndˈipo nˌitakˌapoˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli milˈele. kˈamwe ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli hˌawatˌalinaɟˈisi tˈena ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu, jaˈani, wˌao wˈala wafˈalme wˈao, kwa ˌukahˈaba wˌao na kwa sanˈamu zˈao zˌisizokˈuwa na uhˈai za wafˈalme wˌao katˌika mahˈali pˈao pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu.|0
wˌalipowˈeka kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃˈao karˈibu na kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃˈaŋɡu na miˈimo jˈao ja milˈaŋɡo karˈibu na miˈimo jˈaŋɡu, pakˈiwa na ukˈuta tu kˈati jˈaŋɡu na wˈao, wˌalilˌinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu kwa matˈendo jˈao ja mˌatʃukˈizo. kwa sabˈabu hˈijo nˌiliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza kwa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu.|0
bˌasi sˈasa na wawˈeke mbˈali nˌami ˌukahˈaba wˌao na sanˈamu za wafˈalme wˌao zisˈizo na uhˈai, nˌami nˌitakˈaa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao milˈele.|0
wˌakiʃaˈona aˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja jˈale jˈote wˌalijotˈenda, wˌafahamˈiʃe kˌielelˈezo tʃa hˌilo hekˈalu, jaˈani mpˌaŋɡilˈio wˈake, mˌaiŋɡilˈio jˌake ja kutˈoka na kˌuiŋɡˈia, kˌielelˈezo tʃˈake tʃˈote, na maʃˈarti jˌake jˈote na ʃerˈia zˌake zˈote. jˌaandˈike hˈaja mbˈele jˈao ˌili wapˈate kˌuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwa hˈitʃo kˌielelˈezo tʃˈake na kˌufuˈata maʃˈarti jˌake jˈote.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia ja hekˈalu: enˈeo lˈote lˌinalˌozuŋɡˈuka hekˈalu ɟˌuːja mlˈima lˌitakˈuwa tˌakatˈifu kulˈiko jˈote. hˌii n̩dˈijo ʃerˈia ja hekˈalu.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo vipˈimo vja mˌaðabˈahu kwa ðirˈaa ndˈefu, jaˈani, ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na ɲˈanda ˈn̩ne: tˈako lˈake lˈiwe na kˈina tʃa hˈijo ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na upˈana wa hˈijo ðirˈaa mˈoɟa, ikˈiwa na ukˈiŋɡo wa ʃibˈiri mˈoɟa kˌuizuŋɡˈuka pembˈeni. hˈiki kˌitakˈuwa ndˈitʃo kˈimo tʃa mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈimo tʃa msˈiŋɡi kˌuanzˈia usˈawa wa ˈarði mpˈaka kwˈeɲe mferˈeɟi sehˈemu ja tʃˈini kˈimo tʃˈake ni ðirˈaa mbˈili na upˈana wˌake ni ðirˈaa mˈoɟa na kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo mdˈoɡo hˌadi kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo mpˈana kˈimo tʃˈake ni ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne na upˈana wˌake ni ðirˈaa mˈoɟa.|0
pˈale pˌawaʃwˈapo mˈoto mˌaðabahˈuni kˈimo tʃˈake kˌitakˈuwa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne, na pˈembe ˈn̩ne zˌinazˌoelekˈeza ɟˈuu kutˈoka pˈale pˌawaʃwˈapo mˈoto.|0
pˈale pˌawaʃwˈapo mˈoto pa mˌaðabˈahu ni mrˈaba, urˈefu wˌake ni ðirˈaa kˈumi na mbˈili na upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na mbˈili.|0
pˈia sehˈemu ja ɟˈuu ni mrˈaba, urˈefu wˌake ðirˈaa kˈumi na ˈn̩ne na upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi na ˈn̩ne, ikˈiwa na ukˈiŋɡo wa nˈusu ðirˈaa na mferˈeɟi kˌuizuŋɡˈuka mˌaðabˈahu. ŋɡˈazi za kˌupandˈia mˌaðabahˈuni zˌitaˌelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hˈaja n̩dˈijo jˌatakˌajokˈuwa maʃˈarti ja kutˈoa ðabˈihu za kˌuteketˈezwa na kˌuɲuɲˈiza dˈamu ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu ˌitakˌapokˈuwa ˌimeɟˈeŋɡwa.|0
ˌutatˈoa fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi, wa ɟamˈaa ja sadˈoki, n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaonˌikaribˈia kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
ˌitakupˈasa kˌutʃukˈua baˈaði ja hˈijo dˈamu ja mɲˈama hˈujo na kˌuiwˈeka ɟˌuːja hˈizo pˈembe ˈn̩ne za mˌaðabˈahu na ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃa zˌake ˈn̩ne za sehˈemu ja ɟˈuu kˌuzuŋɡˈuka ukˈiŋɡo wˈote, ˌili kˌuitakˈasa mˌaðabˈahu na kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
ˌitakupˈasa kˌumtʃukˈua hˈujo fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na kˌumteketˈeza mahˈali pˌalipˌoaɡˈizwa katˌika enˈeo la hekˈalu ɲɟˈe ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
sˈiku ja pˈili jˌake ˌutamtˈoa bebˈeru asˈije na dosˈari kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, nˈajo mˌaðabˈahu ˌitatakˈaswa kˌama ˌilivjˌotakˈaswa kwa jˈule fahˈali.|0
ˌutakˌapokˈuwa ˌumemalˈiza kˈazi ja kˌuitakˈasa, ˌutamtˈoa fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume tˌoka kwˈeɲe kˈundi, wˈote wˈawe hawˈana dosˈari.|0
ˌutawatˈoa mbˈele za bwˈana, nˌao mˌakuhˈani wˌataɲˌuɲizˈia tʃˈumvi ɟˈuu jˈao na kˌuwatˈoa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba ˌitakupˈasa kutˈoa bebˈeru kˈila sˈiku kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi, pˈia ˌitakupˈasa kutˈoa fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa na kondˈoo dˈume kutˈoka zizˈini, wˈote wˈawe hawˈana dosˈari.|0
kwa sˈiku sˈaba ˌitawapˈasa kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaðabˈahu na kˌuitakˈasa na hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌatakˌavjoiwˈeka wˈakfu.|0
mwiʃˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈizi sˈiku sˈaba, kˌuanzˈia sˈiku ja nˈane na kˌuendelˈea, ˌitawapˈasa mˌakuhˈani kutˈoa sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu. kˈiʃa nˌitawˌakubˈali nˈiɲi, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
ndˈipo jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanˌirudˈiʃa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲɟˈe la mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, lˈile lˌinalˌoelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, nˈalo lˌilikˈuwa lˌimefˈuŋɡwa.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, lˈaŋɡo hˈili lˌitabˈaki lˌimefˈuŋɡwa. hˌalirˌuhusˈiwi kˌufuŋɡulˈiwa, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kˌuiŋɡilˈia kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo hˈili. lˌitabˈaki lˌimefˈuŋɡwa kwa sabˈabu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌameiŋɡˈia kwa kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo hˈili.|0
jˌeje alˈije m̩kˈuu pˈeke jˌake n̩dˈije ˌanajewˈeza kukˈaa pˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ja hˌilo lˈaŋɡo na kˈula tʃakˈula mbˈele za bwˈana. ˌitampˈasa ˌaiŋɡˈie kwa ɲɟˈia hˈijo ja lˈaŋɡo la ˌukumbˈini na kˌutokˈea ɲɟˈia ˈijo hˈijo.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanilˈeta kwa ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini mpˈaka mbˈele ja hekˈalu. nˌikatazˈama nˌami nˌikauˈona ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana ˌukiliɟˈaza hekˈalu la bwˈana, nˌami nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi.|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˌanadˈamu, ˌaŋɡalˈia kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu, ˌusikilˈize kwa bidˈii na ˌuziŋɡatˈie kˈila kˈitu nˌinatʃˌokuambˈia kuhˈusu maʃˈarti jˈote jˌanajohˈusu hekˈalu la bwˈana. ˈuwe mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kuhˈusu wˈale wˌanaˌoruhusˈiwa hˌekalˈuni na wˈale wˌasiˌoruhusˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˌiambˈie ɲˈumba ja kuˈasi ja ˌisraˈeli, hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: matˈendo jˈenu ja mˌatʃukˈizo jatˈoʃa, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
zaˈidi ja matˈendo jˈenu jˈote ja mˌatʃukˈizo, mmˌewalˈeta waɡˈeni wˌasiˌotahirˈiwa miˈojo na miˈili katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu, mkˌilinaɟˈisi hekˈalu lˈaŋɡu, hˈuku mkˌinitolˈea tʃakˈula, mafˈuta ja waɲˈama na dˈamu, nˌaɲi mmevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu.|0
badˈala ja kˌutimˈiza waɟˈibu wˈenu kˌuhusiˈana na vˈitu vjˈaŋɡu vˌitakatˈifu, mmewˈeka wˈatu weŋɡˈine kˌuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hakˈuna mɡˈeni ˌasijˌetahirˈiwa mˈojo na mwilˈini ˌanajˌeruhusˈiwa kˌuiŋɡˈia pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu, wˈala hˌata waɡˈeni wˌanaoˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaisraˈeli.|0
walˈawi wˌaliˌoniˈatʃa wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˌopotˈoka wˌakatˈoka kwˈaŋɡu na kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kwa kˌufuˈata sanˈamu zˈao, wˌatatʃukˈua aðˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈao.|0
wˌanawˈeza wˌakatumˈika katˌika mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu, wakˈiwa na ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa malˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu, nˌao wˌatatʃˈiɲɟa sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na ðabˈihu kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja wˈatu ˌili kˌuwahˌudumˈia.|0
lakˈini kwa sabˈabu wˌaliwˌatumikˈia wˈatu mbˈele ja sanˈamu zˈao na kˌuifˈaɲa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli ˌiaŋɡˈuke kwˈeɲe ðˈambi, kwa hˈijo nˌimeˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kwˌamba ni lazˈima wˌatʃukˈue mˌatokˈeo ja ðˈambi jˈao, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˌawarˌuhusˈiwi kˌukaribˈia ˌili kˌunitˌumikˈia kˌama mˌakuhˈani wˈala kˌukaribˈia tʃotʃˈote tʃˈaŋɡu kilˈitʃo kˌitakatˈifu ˌau sadˈaka ilˈijo tˌakatˈifu kupˈita zˈote, bˌali wˌatatʃukˈua aˈibu ja matˈendo jˈao ja kˌutʃukˈiza.|0
lakˈini nˌitawawˈeka katˌika ˌuaŋɡalˈizi wa hekˈalu na kˈazi zˈote zˈile zˌinazˌotakˈiwa kˌufaɲˈika ndˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao ni walˈawi na wazˈao wa sadˈoki, ambˈao wˌalitimˈiza waɟˈibu wˌao kwa ˌuaminˈifu katˌika pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˌopotˈoka, wˌatakˌaribˈia ˌili kˌutumˈika mbˈele zˈaŋɡu. ˌitawapˈasa wˌasimˈame mbˈele zˈaŋɡu ˌili kutˈoa ðabˈihu za mafˈuta ja waɲˈama na dˈamu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
wˌao pˈeke jˈao n̩dˈio wˌeɲe ruhˈusa ja kˌuiŋɡˈia mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˈaŋɡu. wˌao pˈeke jˈao n̩dˈio wˌatakˌaokˌaribˈia mˈeza jˈaŋɡu ˌili kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu na kufˈaɲa ˌutumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌatakˌapoiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ukˈumbi wa ndˈani, wˌatavˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani sˈafi, hˌawarˌuhusˈiwi kˈamwe kuvˈaa mavˈazi ja sˈufu wakˈati wˌanapokˈuwa wˌakihudˈumu kwˈeɲe malˈaŋɡo ja ukˈumbi wa ndˈani wˈala ndˈani ja hekˈalu.|0
wˌatavˈaa vilˈemba vja kitˈani sˈafi vitʃwˈani m̩wˈao na ŋɡˈuo za ndˈani za kitˈani sˈafi vˌiunˈoni m̩wˈao. hˌawatavˈaa tʃotʃˈote kˌitakˌatʃowafˈaɲa kutˈoa ɟˈaʃo.|0
wˌatakˌapotˈoka ˌili kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe mahˈali wˈatu walˈipo, wˌatavˈua ŋɡˈuo wˌalizokˈuwa wˌakihudˈumu nˈazo na wˌataziˈatʃa katˌika vjˈumba vˌitakatˈifu nˌao wˌatavˈaa ŋɡˈuo ɲiŋɡˈine, ˌili kwˌamba wasˈiɟe wˌakaˌambukˈiza wˈatu ˌutakatˈifu kwa ɲɟˈia ja mavˈazi jˈao.|0
hˌawataɲˈoa ɲuˈele za vˈitʃwa vjˈao wˈala kˌuziˈatʃa zˈiwe ndˈefu, bˌali wˌatazˌipuŋɡˈuza.|0
kuhˈani jejˈote asˈiɲue mvˈiɲo ˌaiŋɡiˈapo katˌika ukˈumbi wa ndˈani.|0
wˌasiˈoe wˌanawˈake waɟˈane wˈala wˌaliˌoatʃˈika, ˌinawapˈasa kuˈoa wˌanawˈake bikˈira wˌeɲe heʃˈima wa ˌisraˈeli ˌau waɟˈane wa mˌakuhˈani.|0
wˌatawˌafundˈiʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja vˈitu vˌitakatˈifu na vˈitu vja kˌawaˈida na kˌuwaoɲˈeʃa ɟˈinsi ja kˌupambanˈua kˈati ja vˈitu naɟˈisi na vˈitu sˈafi.|0
