katˌika mˌaɡombˈano jojˈote, mˌakuhˈani wˌatatumˈika kˌama mˌahakˈimu na kˌuamˈua hˌilo ɟˈambo kˌufuatˈana na ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu. wˌataziʃˈika ʃerˈia zˈaŋɡu na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈaŋɡu katˌika sˌikukˈuu zˈaŋɡu zˈote zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, nˌao wˌatatakˈasa sabˈato zˈaŋɡu.|0
kuhˈani ˌasiɟitˈie ˌunaɟˈisi kwa kˌukaribˈia maˈiti, lakˈini, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijekˈufa ˌalikˈuwa bˈaba jˌake ˌau mˈama jˈake, mwˈana ˌau bˈinti jˈake, ndˈuɡu jˌake ˌau dˈada ambˈaje hˌaɟaolˈewa, bˌasi awˈeza kˌuɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwa hˈao.|0
baˌada ja kˌuɟitakˈasa, ˌatakˈaa hˈali hˈijo kwa mˈuda wa sˈiku sˈaba.|0
sˈiku ˌatakˌapoiŋɡˈia katˌika ukˈumbi wa ndˈani wa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ˌili kˌuhudˈumu, ˌatatˈoa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa n̩dˈio urˈiθi pekˈee walˈio nˌao mˌakuhˈani katˌika ˌisraˈeli. msiwˈape wˌao mˈilki, mˌimi nˌitakˈuwa mˈilki jˈao.|0
jˈote jalˈijo bˈora ja mˌalimbˈuko ja vˈitu vjˈote na mˌatolˈeo jˈenu maˈalum vˌitakˈuwa vja mˌakuhˈani. ˌinawapˈasa kuwˈapa mˌalimbˈuko ja kwˈanza ja ˈuŋɡa wˈenu ˌili kwˌamba barˈaka ipˈate kˌuwa katˌika ɲˈumba zˈenu.|0
mˌakuhˈani hˌawarˌuhusˈiwi kˈula tʃotʃˈote, ikˈiwa ni ndˈeɡe ˌau mɲˈama, ˌalijekˈutwa akˈiwa ˌamekˈufa ˌau ˌalijˌerarulˈiwa na waɲˈama pˈori.|0
mtˌakapoɡˈawa ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa urˈiθi, mtˌaitˈoa sehˈemu ja ˈn̩tʃi kwa bwˈana kˌuwa enˈeo tˌakatˈifu, urˈefu wˌake ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri enˈeo hˈili lˈote lˌitakˈuwa tˌakatˈifu.|0
katˌika hˈijo, ˌitakuwˈepo sehˈemu mrˈaba ambˈajo ni mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu kˈila upˈande ðirˈaa mˌiatˈano ikˈiwa ˌimezuŋɡˈukwa na enˈeo la wˈazi lˈeɲe upˈana wa ðirˈaa hamsˈini.|0
katˌika enˈeo tˌakatˈifu, pˈima sehˈemu jˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. ndˈani ja hˌilo enˈeo kˌutakˈuwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, pˌatakatˈifu pa pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˌitakˈuwa sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ˈn̩tʃi kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani, wˈale wˌanaˌohudˈumu ndˈani ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu na ambˈao hˌukaribˈia ˌili kˌuhudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana. pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pa ɲˈumba zˈao pamˈoɟa na sehˈemu kwa aɟˈili ja mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
enˈeo la urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri lˌitakˈuwa la walˈawi wˈale wˌanaˌotumˈika hˌekalˈuni, kˌama mˈilki jˈao kwa aɟˈili ja mˈiɟi ja kuˈiʃi.|0
ˌutatˈoa ˈm̩ɟi kˌama mˈali jˈao wˌeɲe upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, karˈibu na sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu, ˌitakˈuwa mˈali ja ɲˈumba jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌatakˈuwa na lˈile enˈeo lˌinalˌopakˈana na lˈile enˈeo lˌililowˈekwa wˈakfu upˈande hˈuu na upˈande hˈuu na enˈeo la ˈm̩ɟi. enˈeo la ˈm̩ɟi lˌitaenˈea upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi kˌuanzˈia upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi na upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuanzˈia upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, lˌikiˌendelˈea kwa urˈefu kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi hˌadi mpˈaka wa mˌaʃarˈiki sambˈamba na mˌoɟawˈapo ja sehˈemu za mˌakabˈila.|0
ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌitakˈuwa mˈilki jˌake katˌika ˌisraˈeli. nˌao wakˈuu wˈaŋɡu hˌawatˌaonˈea tˈena wˈatu wˈaŋɡu bˌali wˌataˌiruhˈusu ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli kˌuimilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi kˌuliŋɡˈana na mˌakabˈila jˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: jatˈoʃa, ˈeɲi wakˈuu wa ˌisraˈeli! atʃˈeni mbˈali ˌukatˈili wˈenu na ˌuonˈevu wˈenu mkafˈaɲe lˈile lilˈilo hˈaki na sˈawa. atʃˈeni kˌuwatˈoza wˈatu wˈaŋɡu isˈivjo hˈaki, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
tˌumiˈeni mizˈani sahˈihi na vipˈimo sahˈihi vja ˈefa na bˈaθi.|0
ˈefa na bˈaθi vˈiwe sˈawa, bˈaθi ˈiwe sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja homˈeri na ˈefa ˈiwe sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja homˈeri, homˈeri ˌitakˈuwa ndˈitʃo kiwˈaŋɡo tʃa kˌukubalˈika kwa vjˈote viwˈili.|0
ʃekˈeli mˈoɟa ˌitakˈuwa ɡˈera ˌiʃirˈini. ʃekˈeli ˌiʃirˈini, ɟumlˈiʃa na ʃekˈeli ˌiʃirˈini na tˈano, ɟumlˈiʃa na ʃekˈeli kˈumi na tˈano zˌitakˈuwa mˈina mˈoɟa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo tolˈeo maˈalum mtˌakalotˈoa: mˈoɟa ja sˈita ja ˈefa kutˈoka kˈila homˈeri ja ŋɡˈano na mˈoɟa ja sˈita ja ˈefa kutˈoka kˈila homˈeri ja ʃajˈiri.|0
sehˈemu ja mafˈuta ˌilijˌoamrˈiwa, jˌalijopˈimwa kwa bˈaθi, ni sehˈemu ja kˈumi ja bˈaθi kutˈoka kˈila kˈori mˈoɟa ambˈajo ˈina bˈaθi kˈumi ˌau homˈeri mˈoɟa..|0
pˈia kondˈoo mmˈoɟa ˌatatʃˌukulˈiwa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈila kˈundi la kondˈoo mˈia mbˈili kutˈoka kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo jˌalijˌoɲeʃˈewa vizˈuri ja ˌisraˈeli. hˈivi vˌitatumˈika kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌatauŋɡˈana pamˈoɟa na m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌisraˈeli ˌili kutˈoa hˌii sadˈaka maˈalum.|0
hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa n̩dˈio waɟˈibu wa m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala kutˈoa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka ja nafˈaka na sadˈaka ja kˌiɲuˈaɟi kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu, mwˈezi mwandˈamo na sabˈato, kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu zˈote zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. ˌatatˈoa sadˈaka za ðˈambi, sadˈaka za nafˈaka, sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani ˌili kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja hˈuo mwˈezi ˌutamtʃukˈua fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa asˈije na dosˈari na kˌutakˈasa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu.|0
kuhˈani ˌitampˈasa ˌatʃukˈue sehˈemu ja hˈijo dˈamu ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na kˌuipˈaka kwˈeɲe miˈimo ja hekˈalu, kwˈeɲe pˈembe ˈn̩ne za ɟˈuu za ukˈiŋɡo wa hˈajo mˌaðabˈahu na ɟˌuːja miˈimo ja lˈaŋɡo la ukˈumbi wa ndˈani.|0
ˌitakupˈasa kufˈaɲa vˈivjo hˈivjo katˌika sˈiku ja sˈaba ja mwˈezi hˈuo kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje hutˈenda ðˈambi bˌila kˌukusudˈia ˌau bˌila kuɟˈua, hˈivjo ˌutafˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja hekˈalu.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa kwˈanza sˈiku ja kˈumi na ˈn̩ne ˌutaˌaðimˈiʃa pasˈaka. sˌikukˈuu ˌitaˌendelˈea kwa sˈiku sˈaba, wakˈati hˈuo wa hˈizo sˈiku sˈaba mtakˈula mikˈate ˌisijotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌatatˈoa fahˈali kˌuwa sadˈaka ja ðˈambi kwa aɟˈili jˌake mweɲˈewe na kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈila sˈiku wakˈati wa hˈizo sˈiku sˈaba za sˌikukˈuu ˌatatˈoa mˌafahˈali sˈaba na kondˈoo dˈume sˈaba wasˈio na dosˈari kˌuwa sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana na bebˈeru kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja ðˈambi.|0
pˈia ˌatatˈoa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˈefa mˈoɟa kwa kˈila fahˈali na ˈefa mˈoɟa kwa kˈila kondˈoo dˈume, pamˈoɟa na hˈini mˈoɟa ja mafˈuta kwa kˈila ˈefa.|0
wakˈati wa hˈizo sˈiku sˈaba za sˌikukˈuu, ambˈajo huˈanza katˌika mwˈezi wa sˈaba kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja kˈumi na tˈano, m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌatatˈoa mˌahitˈaɟi jˈale jˈale kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za ðˈambi, sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, sadˈaka za nafˈaka na mafˈuta.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: lˈaŋɡo la ukˈumbi wa ndˈani lˌinalˌoelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki lˌitakˈuwa lˌinafˈuŋɡwa kwa sˈiku sˈita za ɟˈuma, ˈila sˈiku ja sabˈato na sˈiku ja mwˈezi mwandˈamo lˌitafˌuŋɡulˈiwa.|0
m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌataiŋɡˈia kˌupitˈia barˈaza ja ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo la ukˈumbi na kˌusimˈama karˈibu na ŋɡˈuzo ja lˈaŋɡo. mˌakuhˈani wˌatatˈoa sadˈaka za m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za amˈani. m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌatasuɟˈudu kwˈeɲe kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo, kˈiʃa ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe, lakˈini lˈaŋɡo hˌalitafˈuŋɡwa mpˈaka ɟiˈoni.|0
sˈiku za sabˈato na za mwˈezi mwandˈamo wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌataabˈudu mbˈele za bwˈana pˈeɲe lˈile ˌiŋɡilˈio la ˈile ɲɟˈia.|0
sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌaletˈazo m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala kwa bwˈana sˈiku ja sabˈato ˌitakˈuwa ni wˌanakondˈoo sˈita na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, wˈote wasˈiwe na dosˈari.|0
sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌinajˌotolˈewa pamˈoɟa na hˈujo kondˈoo dˈume ˌitakˈuwa ˈefa mˈoɟa na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌinajˌotolˈewa na hˈao wˌanakondˈoo ˌitakˈuwa kiˈasi ˌapendˈatʃo ˈm̩tu pamˈoɟa na hˈini ja mafˈuta kwa kˈila ˈefa.|0
sˈiku ja mwˈezi mwandˈamo ˌatatˈoa fahˈali mtʃˈaŋɡa, wˌanakondˈoo sˈita na kondˈoo dˈume, wˈote wasˈiwe na dosˈari.|0
ˌatatˈoa kˌuwa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˈefa mˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na fahˈali mmˈoɟa, ˈefa mˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa na pamˈoɟa na wˌanakondˈoo kˌama ˌatakˈavjo kutˈoa, pamˈoɟa na hˈini ja mafˈuta kwa kˈila ˈefa.|0
wakˈati m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌaiŋɡiˈapo, ˌatapitˈia kwˈeɲe barˈaza ja ɲɟˈia ja lˈaŋɡo, nˌaje ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa ɲɟˈia hˈijo hˈijo.|0
wakˈati wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi wˌanapokˈuɟa mbˈele za bwˈana katˌika sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, jejˈote ˌaiŋɡiˈaje kwa lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini kˌuabˈudu ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini na jejˈote ˌaiŋɡiˈaje kwa lˈaŋɡo la kusˈini ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatakˌajerˈudi kwa kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo lˈile ˌalilˌoiŋɡilˈia, lakˈini kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe kwa lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌokabˈili lˈile ˌalilˌoiŋɡilˈia.|0
m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌatakˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, ˌakiiŋɡˈia nˌao ndˈani wˌanapˌoiŋɡˈia, nˌaje ˌatatˈoka nˌao ɲɟˈe wˌanapotˈoka.|0
kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu na kwˈeɲe sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, sadˈaka ja nafˈaka ˌitakˈuwa ˈefa mˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na fahˈali mmˈoɟa, ˈefa mˈoɟa pamˈoɟa na kondˈoo dˈume mmˈoɟa, pamˈoɟa na idˈadi ja wˌanakondˈoo kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌapendˈavjo kutˈoa, pamˈoɟa na hˈini ja mafˈuta kwa kˈila ˈefa.|0
m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala ˌanapotˈoa sadˈaka ja hiˈari kwa bwˈana, ikˈiwa ni sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau sadˈaka ja amˈani, lˈaŋɡo lˌinalˌoelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki lˌitafˌuŋɡulˈiwa kwa aɟˈili jˈake. ˌatatˈoa sadˈaka jˌake ja kˌuteketˈezwa ˌau sadˈaka jˌake ja amˈani kˌama ˌafaɲˈavjo katˌika sˈiku ja sabˈato. kˈiʃa ˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe, nˌaje ˌakiˈiʃa kutˈoka ɲɟˈe, lˈaŋɡo lˌitafˈuŋɡwa.|0
kˈila sˈiku ˌutamtˈoa mwˌanakondˈoo wa mwˈaka mmˈoɟa ˌasijekˈuwa na dosˈari kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa kwa bwˈana, ˌutaitˈoa kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi.|0
pˈia kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi pamˈoɟa na hˈijo sadˈaka ˌutatˈoa sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, ikˈiwa na sehˈemu ja sˈita ja ˈefa pamˈoɟa na θelˈuθi mˈoɟa ja hˈini ja mafˈuta ja kˌutʃaŋɡˈaɲa na ˈule ˈuŋɡa. ˌutoˈaɟi wa sadˈaka hˌii ja nafˈaka kwa bwˈana ni ˈamri ja daˈima.|0
kwa hˈijo mwˌanakondˈoo na sadˈaka ja nafˈaka na mafˈuta vˌitatolˈewa kˈila sˈiku ˌasubˈuhi kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka ja daˈima ja kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: ikˈiwa m̩kˈuu ˌatawalˈaje ˌatatˈoa zawˈadi kutˈoka kwˈeɲe urˈiθi wˌake na kˈumpa mmˈoɟa wa wanˈawe, hˈijo zawˈadi ˌitakˈuwa pˈia kwa wazˈao wˈake, ˌitakˈuwa mˈali jˈao kwa urˈiθi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo, kˌama ˌatatˈoa zawˈadi kutˈoka urˈiθi wˌake na kˈumpa mmˈoɟa wa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake, mtumˈiʃi ˌanawˈeza kˌuiwˈeka mpˈaka mwˈaka wa uhˈuru, kˈiʃa ˌitarudˈiʃwa kwa m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala. urˈiθi wˌake ni wa wanˈawe pˈeke jˈao, ni mˈali jˈao.|0
m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala hˈana ruhˈusa kˌutʃukˈua urˈiθi wowˈote wa wˈatu na kˌuwaondˈoa kwˈeɲe mˈali zˈao. m̩kˈuu ˌatawalˈaje ˌatawˈapa wanˈawe urˈiθi wˈao, kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mˈali zˌake mweɲˈewe, ˌili kwˌamba pasˈiwe na ˈm̩tu wˈaŋɡu jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈeŋɡwa na urˈiθi wˈake..|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌakanilˈeta kwa kˌupitˈia kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio lˌililokˈuwa kˈando ja lˈaŋɡo mpˈaka kwˈeɲe vjˈumba vˌitakatˈifu vˌinavjˌoelekˈea kˌaskazˈini, ambˈavjo ni vja mˌakuhˈani, nˌaje ˌakanˌioɲˈeʃa mahˈali fulˈani upˈande wa mwˈiʃo wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, mahˈali hˈapa ndˈipo mˌakuhˈani wˌatakˌapotˌokosˈea sadˈaka ja hatˈia na sadˈaka ja ðˈambi na kuˈoka sadˈaka ja nafˈaka, kˌuepˈuka kˌuzilˈeta katˌika ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe na kˌuʃirikˈiʃa ˌutakatˈifu kwa wˈatu.|0
baˌada ja hˈapo ˌakanilˈeta kwˈeɲe ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe na kˌunizuŋɡˈuʃa kwˈeɲe pˈembe zˌake ˈn̩ne, nˌami nˌikaˈona katˌika kˈila pˈembe ja hˈuo ukˈumbi kˌulikˈuwa na ukˈumbi mwiŋɡˈine.|0
katˌika pˈembe ˈn̩ne za hˈuo ukˈumbi wa ɲɟˈe kˌulikˈuwa na kˈumbi ɲiŋɡˈine, zˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌarobaˈini na upˈana wˌake ðirˈaa θˌelaθˈini, ambˈapo hˈizo kˈumbi kwˈeɲe hˈizo pˈembe ˈn̩ne zˌilikˈuwa na vipˈimo vilˈivjo sˈawa.|0
mzuŋɡˈuko wa ndˈani wa hˈizo kˈumbi ˈn̩ne ˌulikˈuwa na ukˈiŋɡo wa ɟˈiwe, zikˈiwa na sehˈemu zˌilizoɟˈeŋɡwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˈoto kˌuzuŋɡˈuka tʃˈini ja hˈuo ukˈiŋɡo.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, hˈizi ndˈizo sehˈemu za kˌupikˈia ambˈazo wˈale wˌanaˌohudˈumu kwˈeɲe hekˈalu wˌatatˌokosˈea ðabˈihu za wˈatu.|0
jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌakanˌirudˈiʃa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ˌiŋɡilˈio la hekˈalu, nˌami nˌikaˈona mˈaɟi jˌakitˈoka tʃˈini ja kˌiziŋɡˈiti tʃa hekˈalu jˌakitˌiririkˈia upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kwa maˈana upˈande wa mbˈele wa hekˈalu ˌuliˌelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki. mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa jˌakitˈoka tʃˈini upˈande wa kusˈini wa hekˈalu, kusˈini ˌm̩wa mˌaðabˈahu.|0
ndˈipo ˌakanitˈoa ɲɟˈe kˌupitˈia lˈaŋɡo la kˌaskazˈini na kˌunizuŋɡˈuʃa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la ɲɟˈe lˌinalˌoelekˈea mˌaʃarˈiki, nˈajo mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa jˌakitˌirirˈika kutˈoka upˈande wa kusˈini.|0
ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalipokwˈenda upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki akˈiwa na kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia mkonˈoni mwˈake, ˌakapˈima ðirˈaa mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kˈiʃa ˌakanˌipitˈiʃa kwˈeɲe hˈajo mˈaɟi ambˈajo jˌalifˈika kwˈeɲe vifˈundo vja miɡˈuu.|0
ˌakapˈima ðirˈaa mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ɲiŋɡˈine na kˌunipitˈiʃa kwˈeɲe hˈajo mˈaɟi ambˈajo jˌalifˈika mˌaɡotˈini. ˌakapˈima ðirˈaa ɲiŋɡˈine mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na kˌunipitˈiʃa kwˈeɲe hˈajo mˈaɟi ambˈajo jˌalifˈika kˌiunˈoni.|0
ˌakapˈima tˈena ðirˈaa mˈoɟa,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ɲiŋɡˈine, lakˈini wakˈati hˈuu jˌalikˈuwa ˈm̩to ambˈao sˌikuwˈeza kuvˈuka, kwa kˌuwa mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa na kˈina kirˈefu ambˈatʃo ni tʃa kˌuoɡelˈea, ˈm̩to ambˈao hakˈuna ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌaŋɡewˈeza kuvˈuka.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, ɟˈe, mwˌanadˈamu, ˌunaˈona hˈili? kˈiʃa ˌakanˌirudˈiʃa mpˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa hˈuo ˈm̩to.|0
nˌilipofˈika pˈale, nˌikaˈona idˈadi kˈubwa ja mˈiti kˈila upˈande wa ˈule ˈm̩to.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, hˈaja mˈaɟi jˌanatˌirirˈika kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja mˌaʃarˈiki na kuʃˈuka mpˈaka arˈaba, ambˈapo hˌuiŋɡˈia bˌaharˈini. jˌanapˌomwaɡikˈia kwˈeɲe hˈijo bahˈari, mˈaɟi jˌalijˈoko hˈumo hupˈoɲua na kˌuwa sˈafi.|0
popˈote ˈm̩to hˈuu ˌuendˈapo kˈila kiˈumbe hˈai kˌinatʃˌojapˌaramˈia hˈajo mˈaɟi kˌitaˈiʃi, nˈako kˌutakˈuwa na samˈaki wˈeŋɡi ˈm̩no, mˈara mˈaɟi hˈaja jˌafikˈapo hˌuko. mˈaɟi hˈajo jˌatakˈuwa hˈai na kˈila kˈitu kˌitakˌatʃoˈiʃi kˈule ˈm̩to ˌuendˈako.|0
wavˈuvi wˌatasimˈama kˈando ja bahˈari, kˌuanzˈia ˈen ɡˈedi hˌadi ˈen ˌeɡlaˈimu hˌuko pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pa kˌutandˈaza ɲˈavu za kˌuvulˈia samˈaki. samˈaki wˌatakˈuwa wa aˈina ɲˈiŋɡi, kˌama samˈaki wa bahˈari kˈuu.|0
lakˈini madˈimbwi jˌake na mabwˈawa jˌake hˌajatakˈuwa na mˈaɟi jˌanajofˈaa kˈuɲua, bˌali jˌatabakˈia kˌuwa mˈaɟi ja tʃˈumvi.|0
mˈiti ja matˈunda ja kˈila aˈina ˌitaˈota kwˈeɲe kˈiŋɡo zˈote mbˈili za ˈm̩to hˈuu. maɟˈani jˌake hˌajatˌaɲaˈuka wˈala hˌaitaˈatʃa kˌuwa na matˈunda katˌika matˈawi jˈake. kˈila mwˈezi kˌutakˈuwa na matˈunda, kwa sabˈabu mˈaɟi jˌatokˈajo pˌatakatˈifu jˌanaˌitirˌirikˈia. matˈunda jˌake jˌatakˈuwa tʃakˈula na maɟˈani jˌake jˌatakˈuwa dˈawa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: hˌii n̩dˈijo mipˈaka ambˈajo kwˈajo mtˌaɡawˈaɲa hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi kˌuwa urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈajo mˌakabˈila kˈumi na mawˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na mafˈuŋɡu mawˈili ja josˈefu.|0
mtaɡˈawa kwa usˈawa mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao. kwa sabˈabu nˌiliˈapa kwa mkˈono ˌuliˌoinulˈiwa kuwˈapa bˈaba zˈenu, ˈn̩tʃi hˌii ˌitakˈuwa urˈiθi wˈenu.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio ˌutakˈuwa mpˈaka wa hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi: upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ˌutaanzˈia bahˈari kˈuu kwa ɲɟˈia ja heθlˈoni kˌupitˈia lˈebo hamˈaθi hˌadi mˌaiŋɡilˈio ja sedˈadi.|0
berˈoθa na sˌibraˈimu ambˈao ˈuko kwˈeɲe mpˈaka kˈati ja damˈeski na hamˈaθi, hˌadi kˌufikˈia hˈaser hˌatikˈoni, ambˈao ˈuko katˌika mpˈaka wa hˌaurˈani.|0
hˈivjo mpˈaka ˌutaˌendelˈea kˌuanzˈia bˌaharˈini hˌadi hˈasar enˈoni, ˌukiambˈaa na mpˈaka wa kˌaskazˈini wa damˈeski, pamˈoɟa na mpˈaka wa hamˈaθi upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa kˌaskazˈini.|0
upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki mpˈaka ˌutapˈita kˈati ja hˌaurˈani na damˈeski, kˌuambˈaa jordˈani na kˈati ja ɡˌileˈadi na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisraˈeli, hˌadi bahˈari ja mˌaʃarˈiki na kufˈika tamˈari. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa mˌaʃarˈiki.|0
upˈande wa kusˈini ˌutaanzˈia tamˈari hˌadi kˌufikˈia mˈaɟi ja merˈiba kadˈeʃi, kˈiʃa ˌutaambˈaa na kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri hˌadi bahˈari kˈuu. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa kusˈini.|0
upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, bahˈari kˈuu ˌitakˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka hˌadi kwˈeɲe sehˈemu mkabˈala na lˈebo hamˈaθi. hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa n̩dˈio mpˈaka wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
mtˌaɡawˈaɲa ˈn̩tʃi hˌii mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kˌufuatˈana na mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
mtˌaiɡawˈaɲa kˌuwa urˈiθi kwa aɟˈili jˈenu na kwa aɟˈili ja waɡˈeni wˌanaoˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu na ambˈao wˈana watˈoto. wˌao wˌatakˈuwa kwˈenu kˌama weɲˈeɟi wazˈawa wa ˌisraˈeli, pamˈoɟa na nˈiɲi wˌataɡawˈiwa urˈiθi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika kabˈila lolˈote mɡˈeni ˌatakˌapoˈiʃi hˈapo ndˈipo mtˌakapˌompatˈia urˈiθi wˈake, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maɟˈina ja mˌakabˈila na sehˈemu zˈao: kwˈeɲe mpˈaka wa kˌaskazˈini, dˈani ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, mpˈaka hˈuo ˌutafuˈata bˌarabˈara ja heθlˈoni hˌadi lˈebo hamˈaθi, hˈasar enˈani hˌata mpˈaka wa kˌaskazˈini wa damˈeski karˈibu na hamˈaθi ˌutakˈuwa sehˈemu ja hˈuo mpˈaka wˌake kˌuanzˈia upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
aʃˈeri ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja dˈani kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
naftˈali ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja aʃˈeri kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
manˈase ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja naftˈali kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja manˈase kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
rˌeubˈeni ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌefraˈimu kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
jˈuda ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitapakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja rˌeubˈeni kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
kˌupakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki mpˈaka mˌaɣarˈibi ˌitakˈuwa n̩dˈijo sehˈemu ˌutakˌajoitˈoa ˌili kˌuwa tolˈeo maˈalum. ˌitakˈuwa na upˈana wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na urˈefu wˌake kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki mpˈaka mˌaɣarˈibi ˌutakˈuwa ˈule ˈule wa sehˈemu mˈoɟa ja kabˈila, mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pˌatakˈuwa kˌatikˈati ja enˈeo hˈilo.|0
hˌii ˌitakˈuwa ni sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani. ˌitakˈuwa na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa kusˈini. kˌatikˈati jˌake pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa bwˈana.|0
hˌii ˌitakˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˌakuhˈani wˌaliowˈekwa wˈakfu, wˌasadˈoki, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu katˌika kˌunitˌumikˈia nˌao hˌawakˌupotˈoka kˌama walˈawi wˌalivjofˈaɲa wakˈati wˌaisraˈeli wˌalipˌopotˈoka.|0
ˌitakˈuwa tolˈeo maˈalum kwˈao kutˈoka sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu ja ˈn̩tʃi, jaˈani, sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu sˈana, ˌinajˌopakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja walˈawi.|0
hˌawatˌaruhusˈiwa kuˈuza wˈala kˌuibˌadilˈiʃa hˌata mˌoɟawˈapo. hˌii n̩dˈijo sehˈemu nzˈuri ja ˈn̩tʃi kulˈiko ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote, hˈivjo hˌaitakˈuwa mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu weŋɡˈine, kwa sabˈabu ni tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana.|0
enˈeo lˌinalobˈaki lˈeɲe upˈana wa ðirˈaa tˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri na urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri, lˌitakˈuwa kwa aɟˈili ja mˌatumˈizi ja kˌawaˈida ja ˈm̩ɟi, kwa aɟˈili ja uɟˈenzi wa ɲˈumba na malˈiʃo. ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˈuwa kˌatikˈati jˈake.|0
nˌao ˌutakˈuwa na vipˈimo hˈivi: upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, upˈande wa kusˈini ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano na upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano.|0
sehˈemu ja malˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩ɟi ˌitakˈuwa na enˈeo la ðirˈaa mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, ðirˈaa mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini upˈande wa kusˈini, ðirˈaa mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na ðirˈaa mˌiambˈilinˌa hamsˈini upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
enˈeo lˌinalobˈaki, lˌinalˌopakˈana na sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu likˈiwa na urˈefu sˈawa nˈalo, lˌitakˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki na ðirˈaa kˈumi,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi. mazˈao jˌake jˌatawˈapa wˌatumˈiʃi wa ˈm̩ɟi tʃakˈula.|0
wˌatumˈiʃi wa ˈm̩ɟi wˌanaolˈima ʃˈamba hˈili wˌatatˈoka katˌika mˌakabˈila jˈote ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
enˈeo lˈote la hˈijo sehˈemu lˌitakˈuwa mrˈaba, jaˈani, ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri kˈila upˈande. kˌama tolˈeo maˈalum mtatˈeŋɡa sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu, pamˈoɟa na mˈilki ja ˈm̩ɟi.|0
enˈeo lˌinalobˈaki pˈande zˈote za enˈeo lˌinalofˈaɲa sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu na mˈilki ja ˈm̩ɟi lˌitakˈuwa mˈali ja m̩kˈuu ˌatawalˈaje. enˈeo hˈili lˌitaenˈea upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri za sehˈemu tˌakatˈifu hˌadi mpˈaka wa mˌaʃarˈiki na kˌuelekˈea upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi kˌuanzˈia kwˈeɲe ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈininatˈano,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri hˌadi mpˈaka wa mˌaɣarˈibi. mˌaenˈeo jˈote hˈaja mawˈili jˌanajoˈenda sambˈamba na urˈefu wa sehˈemu za mˌakabˈila jˌatakˈuwa ja m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala, na sehˈemu ˈile tˌakatˈifu pamˈoɟa na mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa hekˈalu ˌitakˈuwa kˌatikˈati jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo mˈilki ja walˈawi na mˈilki ja ˈm̩ɟi vˌitakˈuwa kˌatikˈati ja enˈeo lˈile ambˈalo ni mˈali ja m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala. enˈeo la m̩kˈuu ˌanajˌetawˈala lˌitakˈuwa kˈati ja mpˈaka wa jˈuda na mpˈaka wa bˌeɲamˈini.|0
kuhˈusu mˌakabˈila jˌalijobˈaki: bˌeɲamˈini ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitakˌajoanzˈia upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
sˌimeˈoni ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitakˌajopakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja bˌeɲamˈini kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
ˌisakˈari ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitakˌajopakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja sˌimeˈoni kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
zˌabulˈoni ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitakˌajopakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja ˌisakˈari kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
ɡˈadi ˌatakˈuwa na sehˈemu mˈoɟa, ˌitakˌajopakˈana na ˈn̩tʃi ja zˌabulˈoni kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
mpˈaka wa kusˈini wa ɡˈadi ˌutapˈita kusˈini kˌuanzˈia tamˈari hˌadi mˈaɟi ja merˈiba kadˈeʃi, kˈiʃa kˌupitˈia upˈande wa kiɟˈito tʃa mˈisri hˌadi bahˈari kˈuu.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ˈn̩tʃi mtˌakajˌoɡawˈaɲa kˌuwa urˈiθi kwa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli, nˈazo zˌitakˈuwa sehˈemu zˈao, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈaja jˌatakˈuwa n̩dˈijo malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩ɟi ja kˌutokˈea: kˌuanzˈia upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini, ambˈajo urˈefu wˌake ni ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, ˌutakˈuwa na malˈaŋɡo matˈatu.|0
malˈaŋɡo hˈajo ja ˈm̩ɟi jˌatapˈewa maɟˈina ja mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli. malˈaŋɡo hˈajo matˈatu ja upˈande wa kˌaskazˈini mˈoɟa lˌitakˈuwa lˈaŋɡo la rˌeubˈeni, lˈaŋɡo la jˈuda na lˈaŋɡo la lˈawi.|0
upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki, wˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, ˌutakˈuwa na malˈaŋɡo matˈatu: lˈaŋɡo la josˈefu, lˈaŋɡo la bˌeɲamˈini na lˈaŋɡo la dˈani.|0
upˈande wa kusˈini, wˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, ˌutakˈuwa na malˈaŋɡo matˈatu: lˈaŋɡo la sˌimeˈoni, lˈaŋɡo la ˌisakˈari na lˈaŋɡo la zˌabulˈoni.|0
upˈande wa mˌaɣarˈibi, wˌeɲe urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˈn̩ne,mˌiatˈano, ˌutakˈuwa na malˈaŋɡo matˈatu: lˈaŋɡo la ɡˈadi, lˈaŋɡo la aʃˈeri na lˈaŋɡo la naftˈali.|0
urˈefu wˈote kˌuzuŋɡˈuka ˌutakˈuwa ðirˈaa kˈuminanˈane,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri. nˈalo ɟˈina la ˈm̩ɟi hˈuo kˌuanzˈia wakˈati hˈuo na kˌuendelˈea lˌitakˈuwa: bwˈana jˈupo hˈapa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda, nˌebukadnˈeza mfˈalme wa babˈeli ˌalikˈuɟa ˌakaziŋɡˈira jˌerusalˈemu kwa ɟˈeʃi.|0
bwˈana ˌakamtˈia jˌehojakˈimu mfˈalme wa jˈuda mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa nˌebukadnˈeza, pamˈoɟa na baˈaði ja vjˈombo kutˈoka hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu. hˈivi ˌakavˌitʃukˈua hˌadi kwˈeɲe hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu wˌake hˌuko ʃinˈari, nˌaje ˌakaviwˈeka ɲumbˈani ja hazˈina ja mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
viɟˈana wˌanaˈume wasˈio na dosˈari mwilˈini, wˌeɲe sˈura nzˈuri, wˌanaˌooɲˈeʃa kipˈaɟi katˌika kˈila aˈina ja elˈimu, wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu mzˈuri, wepˈesi kˌuelˈewa, na wˌaliofˈuzu kˌuhudˈumu katˌika ɟˈumba la kifˈalme. ˌalikˈuwa ˌawafundˈiʃe lˈuɣa na mˌaandˈiko ja wˌakaldˈajo.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawˌaaɡizˈia kiˈasi tʃa tʃakˈula na divˈai ja kˈila sˈiku kutˈoka mˈeza ja mfˈalme. wˌalikˈuwa wˌafundˈiʃwe kwa miˈaka mitˈatu, na hˌatimˈaje wˌaiŋɡˈie kwˈeɲe ˌutumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme.|0
m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa ˌakawˈapa maɟˈina mˈapja: dˌaniˈeli ˌakamwˈita bˌelteʃˈaza, hˌananˈia ˌakamwˈita ʃadrˈaki, mˌiʃaˈeli ˌakamwˈita meʃˈaki, na ˌazarˈia ˌakamwˈita ˌabednˈeɡo.|0
lakˈini dˌaniˈeli ˌalikˌusudˈia kˌuwa hˌataɟitˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwa tʃakˈula tʃa mfˈalme na divˈai, nˌaje ˌakamwˈomba m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa ruhˈusa ˌili ˌasiɟˌinaɟˈisi kwa ɲɟˈia hˌii.|0
bˌasi mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemfˈaɲa hˈujo m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa kˌuoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo na hurˈuma kwa dˌaniˈeli.|0
lakˈini hˈujo m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa ˌakamwambˈia dˌaniˈeli, nˌinamwoɡˈopa bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme, ˌalijˌeaɡizˈia tʃakˈula na kˌiɲuˈaɟi tʃˈenu. kwa nˈini aˈone ɲˈuso zˈenu zikˈiwa m̩bˈaja kulˈiko za viɟˈana weŋɡˈine wa rˈika lˈenu? mfˈalme ˌatakˈata kˈitʃwa tʃˈaŋɡu kwa sabˈabu jˈenu.|0
ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌakamwambˈia mlˈinzi ˌalijˌeteulˈiwa na hˈujo m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa kˌuwasˌimamˈia dˌaniˈeli, hˌananˈia, mˌiʃaˈeli na ˌazarˈia.|0
tˌafaðˈali wˌaɟarˈibu wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako kwa sˈiku kˈumi. ˌusitˈupe tʃotʃˈote ˈila nafˈaka na mbˈoɡa za maɟˈani tˈule, na mˈaɟi ja kˈuɲua.|0
bˌasi ˌakakubˈali ɟˈambo hˈili, ˌakawˌaɟarˈibu kwa sˈiku kˈumi.|0
mwˈiʃo wa zˈile sˈiku kˈumi, wˌaliˌonekˈana kˌuwa na ˈafja na kˌunawˈiri zaˈidi kulˈiko jejˈote kˈati ja wˈale viɟˈana wˌaliokˈula tʃakˈula tʃa mfˈalme.|0
hˈivjo mlˈinzi wˌao ˌakaondˈoa tʃakˈula tʃˈao na divˈai jˈao wˌaliˌopaŋɡˈiwa kˈula na kˈuɲua, ˌakawˈapa nafˈaka na mbˈoɡa za maɟˈani badˈala jˈake.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˈapa hˈawa viɟˈana wˈanne mˌaarˈifa na ˌufahˈamu wa kˈila aˈina ja mˌaandˈiko na elˈimu. nˌaje dˌaniˈeli ˌaliwˈeza kˌufahˈamu maˈono na aˈina zˈote za ndˈoto.|0
mwˈiʃo wa mˈuda ˌuliowˈekwa na mfˈalme kˌuwaiŋɡˈiza kwˈake, m̩kˈuu wa mˌaafˈisa ˌakawalˈeta mbˈele ja mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
mfˈalme ˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˈao, ˌakaˈona hakˈuna ˌalijˌeliŋɡˈana na dˌaniˈeli, hˌananˈia, mˌiʃaˈeli na ˌazarˈia. hˈivjo wˌakaiŋɡˈia katˌika ˌutumˈiʃi wa mfˈalme.|0
katˌika kˈila ɟˈambo la hekˈima na ˌufahˈamu kuhˈusu kˈile mfˈalme ˌalitʃˌowaulˈiza, ˌaliwaˈona bˈora mˈara kˈumi zaˈidi kulˈiko waɡˈaŋɡa na wˌasihˈiri wˈote katˌika ufˈalme wˌake wˈote.|0
nˌaje dˌaniˈeli ˌakabˈaki hˌuko mpˈaka mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme korˈeʃi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, nˌebukadnˈeza ˌaliˈota ndˈoto. mawˈazo jˌake jˌakasumbˈuka na hˌakuwˈeza kulˈala.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme ˌakawaˈita waɡˈaŋɡa, wˌasihˈiri, watʃˈawi na wˌanaɟˈimu ˌili wˌamwambˈie ndˈoto jˌake ˌalijokˈuwa ˌameˈota. wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia ndˈani na kˌusimˈama mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
ˌakawˌaambˈia, nˌiliˈota ndˈoto ˌinajˌonisumbˈua, nˌami natˈaka niɟˈue maˈana jˈake.|0
ndˈipo wˌanaɟˈimu wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme kwa lˈuɣa ja kˌiarˈamu, ˈee mfˈalme, uˈiʃi milˈele! wˌaambˈie wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako hˈijo ndˈoto, nˌasi tˌutaˌifasˈiri.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawaɟˈibu wˌanaɟˈimu, nˌimeamˈua hˈivi kwa ˌuθabˈiti: ikˈiwa hˌamtanˌiambˈia ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu ˌilikˈuwa ˈipi na kˌuifasˈiri, mtakˈatwa vipˈande vipˈande na ɲˈumba zˈenu zˌitafˈaɲua kˌuwa vifˈusi.|0
lakˈini mkˌiniambˈia ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu na kˌuiˌelezˈea, mtˌapokˈea kwˈaŋɡu zawˈadi, tˈuzo na heʃˈima kˈubwa. bˌasi nˌiambiˈeni ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu na mnˌifasirˈie.|0
wˌakaɟˈibu kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine, mfˈalme na ˌawaambˈie wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake ndˈoto jˈake, nˌasi tˌutaˌifasˈiri.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, nˈina hakˈika kˌuwa mnˌaɟarˈibu kupˈata mˈuda zaˈidi, kwa sabˈabu mnˌatambˈua kˌuwa nˌimeamˈua hˈivi kwa ˌuθabˈiti.|0
ikˈiwa hˌamtanˌiambˈia ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu, ˈipo aðˈabu mˈoɟa tu kwˈenu. mmefˈaɲa ʃaˈuri kˌuniambˈia habˈari za kˌunipotˈoʃa na mˈambo maˈovu, mkˌitumaˈini kwˌamba hˈali ˌitabˌadilˈika. hˈivjo bˈasi, nˌiambiˈeni hˈijo ndˈoto, nˌami nˌitaɟˈua kˌuwa mwawˈeza kˌunifˌasirˈia.|0
wˌanaɟˈimu wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, hakˈuna ˈm̩tu dˌuniˈani ambˈaje ˌanawˈeza kufˈaɲa ˌanalotˈaka mfˈalme! vˌilevˈile hakˈuna mfˈalme hˌata ˈawe m̩kˈuu na mwˌeɲe uwˈeza nˈamna ɡˈani, ˌalijˌeulˈiza kˈitu kˌama hˈitʃo kwa mɡˈaŋɡa ˌau kwa msihˈiri, wˈala kwa mnaɟˈimu jejˈote.|0
ˌanatʃˌoulˈiza mfˈalme ni kiɡˈumu ˈm̩no. hakˈuna jejˈote ˌawezˈaje kˌumfunulˈia mfˈalme ˌisipokˈuwa miˈuŋɡu, nˌao hˌawaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu.|0
ɟˈambo hˈili lˌilimkˌasirˈiʃa na kˌumɣaðibˈiʃa mfˈalme ˈm̩no hˌata kˌuaɡˈiza kˌuuˈawa kwa wˌeɲe hekˈima wˈote wa babˈeli.|0
hˈivjo ˈamri ˌikatolˈewa ja kˌuwaˈua wˌeɲe hekˈima, nˌao wˈatu wˌakatˈumwa kˌuwatafˈuta dˌaniˈeli na rafˈiki zˌake ˌili wˌawaˈue.|0
wakˈati ˌariˈoko, m̩kˈuu wa askˈari wa walˈinzi wa mfˈalme, ˌalikˈuwa ˌamekwˈenda kˌuwaˈua wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima wa babˈeli, dˌaniˈeli ˌakazuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa hekˈima na busˈara.|0
ˌakamˌuulˈiza hˈujo afˈisa wa mfˈalme, kwa nˈini mfˈalme ˌametˈoa ˈamri kˈali hˈivjo? ndˈipo ˌariˈoko ˌakamwelˈeza dˌaniˈeli ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
ˌalipˌosikˈia ɟˈambo hˈili, dˌaniˈeli ˌakamwendˈea mfˈalme, ˌakamwˈomba ˈampe mˈuda ˌili awˈeze kˌumfasirˈia ˈile ndˈoto.|0
ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌakarˈudi ɲumbˈani kwˈake na kˌuwaelˈeza rafˈiki zˌake hˌananˈia, mˌiʃaˈeli na ˌazarˈia ɟˈambo hˈilo.|0
ˌaliwasˈihi waˈombe rehˈema kutˈoka kwa mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni kuhˈusu sˈiri hˌii, ˌili jˌeje na rafˈiki zˌake wasˈiɟe wˌakauˈawa pamˈoɟa na wˌeɲe hekˈima weŋɡˈine wa babˈeli.|0
wakˈati wa usˈiku lˈile fˈumbo lˌilifˌunulˈiwa kwa dˌaniˈeli katˌika maˈono. ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌakamhimˈidi mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
na ˌakasˈema: lˌihimidˈiwe ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu milˈele na milˈele; hekˈima na uwˈeza ni vjˈake.|0
jˌeje hˌubadˈili ɲakˈati na maɟˈira; hˌuwawˈeka wafˈalme na kˌuwaondˈoa. huwˈapa hekˈima wˌeɲe hekˈima, na mˌaarˈifa wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu.|0
hˌufunˈua sˈiri na mˈambo jˌalijˌofitʃˈika; ˌanaɟˈua jˈale jalˈijo ɡizˈani, nˈajo nˈuru hukˈaa kwˈake.|0
nˌinakˌuʃukˈuru na kˌukuhimˈidi, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wa bˈaba zˈaŋɡu: ˌumenˈipa hekˈima na uwˈezo, ˌumenˌiɟulˈiʃa kˈile tˌulitʃˌokuˈomba, ˌumetˌuɟulˈiʃa ndˈoto ja mfˈalme.|0
ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌakamwendˈea ˌariˈoko, ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemteˈua kˌuwaˈua wˌeɲe hekˈima wa babˈeli, ˌakamwambˈia, ˌusiwaˈue wˌeɲe hekˈima wa babˈeli. nˌipelˈeke kwa mfˈalme, nˌami nˌitamfˌasirˈia ndˈoto jˈake.|0
ˌariˈoko ˌakampelˈeka dˌaniˈeli kwa mfˈalme mˈara mˈoɟa na kˌumwambˈia, nˌimempˈata ˈm̩tu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo kutˈoka jˈuda ambˈaje ˌanawˈeza kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme maˈana ja ndˈoto jˈake.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza dˌaniˈeli ˌalijeˈitwa pˈia bˌelteʃˈaza, ɟˈe, ˌunawˈeza kˌuniambˈia nˌilitʃoˈona katˌika ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu na kˌuifasˈiri.|0
dˌaniˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈuna mwˌeɲe hekˈima, msihˈiri, mɡˈaŋɡa ˌau mwaɡˈuzi ˌanajewˈeza kˌumwelˈeza mfˈalme sˈiri ˌalijˌoulˈiza.|0
lakˈini jˈuko mˈuŋɡu mbiŋɡˈuni ˌafunuˈaje sˈiri. ˌamemwoɲˈeʃa mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea sˈiku ziɟˈazo. ndˈoto jˈako na maˈono jˌalijopˈita mˌawazˈoni mwˈako ˌulipokˈuwa ˌumelˈala kˌitandˈani mwˈako ni hˈaja.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, ˌulipokˈuwa ˌumelˈala kˌitandˈani, jˌalikuɟˈia mawˈazo kuhˈusu mˈambo jˌatakˌajotokˈea bˌaadˈaje, nˌaje mfˌunuˈaɟi wa sˈiri ˌakakˌuoɲˈeʃa ni kˈitu ɡˈani kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea.|0
kwˈaŋɡu mˈimi, nˌimefˌunulˈiwa sˈiri hˌii, si kwa sabˈabu nˈina hekˈima kˈubwa kulˈiko wˈatu weŋɡˈine wˌanaoˈiʃi, bˌali ni ˌili wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme, upˈate kuɟˈua tafsˈiri, na ˌili uwˈeze kˌuelˈewa kˈile kˌilitʃopˈita mˌawazˈoni mwˈako.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, ˌulitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈako ˌilisimˈama sanˈamu kˈubwa, kˈubwa ˈm̩no kupˈita kiˈasi, sanˈamu ˌilijoŋɡˈaa na kutˈiʃa kwa kˌuonekˈana kwˈake.|0
kˈitʃwa tʃa ˈile sanˈamu kˌilikˈuwa kˌimetˌeŋɡenˈezwa kwa ðahˈabu sˈafi, kifˈua tʃˈake na mikˈono jˌake vˌilikˈuwa vja fˈeða, tˈumbo lˈake na mapˈaɟa jˌake vˌilikˈuwa vja ʃˈaba.|0
miɡˈuu jˌake ˌilikˈuwa ja tʃˈuma, na ɲˈajo zˌake zˌilikˈuwa tʃˈuma nˈazo sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine zˌilikˈuwa udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi ˌuliotʃˈomwa.|0
ˌulipokˈuwa ˌunaˌaŋɡalˈia, ɟˈiwe lˌilikˈatwa, lakˈini si kwa mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu. lˈile ɟˈiwe lˌiliipˈiɡa ˈile sanˈamu kwˈeɲe ɲˈajo zˌake za tʃˈuma na udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi, na kˌuivˈuɲɟa.|0
ndˈipo ˈile tʃˈuma, ˈule udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi, ˈile ʃˈaba, ˈile fˈeða na ˈile ðahˈabu vˌikavuɲɟˈika vipˈande vipˈande kwa wakˈati mmˈoɟa, na vikˈawa kˌama makˈapi katˌika sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi. upˈepo ˌukavˌipeperˈuʃa bˌila kuˈatʃa hˌata alˈama. lakˈini lˈile ɟˈiwe lˌililˌoipˈiɡa ˈile sanˈamu likˈawa mlˈima mkˈubwa ˈm̩no na kˌuiɟˈaza dunˈia jˈote.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ˌilijokˈuwa ndˈoto, nˌasi sˈasa tˌutamfˌasirˈia mfˈalme.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, wˌewe ni mfˈalme wa wafˈalme. mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni ˌamekˈupa wˌewe ˌutawˈala, uwˈeza, ŋɡˈuvu na ˌutukˈufu.|0
mˌikonˈoni mwˈako ˌamewawˈeka wˌanadˈamu, waɲˈama wa kondˈeni, na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani. popˈote wˌaiʃˈipo ˌamekufˈaɲa wˌewe kˌuwa mtawˈala ɟˈuu jˈao wˈote. wˌewe n̩dˈije kˈile kˈitʃwa tʃa ðahˈabu.|0
baˌada jˈako, ufˈalme mwiŋɡˈine ˌutainˈuka, ulˈio ðaˈifu kulˈiko wˈako. bˌaadˈaje ˌutafuˈata ufˈalme wa tˈatu, ˈule wa ʃˈaba, nˌao ˌutatawˈala ɟˌuːja dunˈia jˈote.|0
hˌatimˈaje, kˌutakuwˈako na ufˈalme wa ˈn̩ne, wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌama tʃˈuma, kwa maˈana tʃˈuma huvˈuɲɟa na kˌupondapˈonda kˈila kˈitu; kˌama vˈile tʃˈuma ˌivuɲɟˈavjo vˈitu vipˈande vipˈande, ndˈivjo ufˈalme hˈuo ˌutakˌavjopˌondapˈonda na kˌuvuɲɟavˈuɲɟa ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌulivjoˈona kˌuwa kwa sehˈemu ɲˈajo na vidˈole vˌilikˈuwa vja udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi ˌuliotʃˈomwa na kwa sehˈemu ɲiŋɡˈine tʃˈuma, hˈivjo hˈuu ˌutakˈuwa ufˈalme ˌuliˌoɡawaɲˈika; hˌata hˈivjo ˌutakˈuwa na sehˈemu zˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu za tʃˈuma ndˈani jˈake, kˌama vˈile ˌulivjoˈona tʃˈuma ˌimetʃaŋɡˈaɲua na udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi.|0
kˌama vˈile vidˈole vjˈake vja miɡˈuu vˌilikˈuwa kwa sehˈemu tʃˈuma na sehˈemu udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi, hˈivjo ufˈalme hˈuo kwa sehˈemu ˌutakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu na kwa sehˈemu ˌuðaˈifu.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌulivjoˈona tʃˈuma kikˈiwa kˌimetʃˌaŋɡaɲikˈana na udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi ˌuliotʃˈomwa, ndˈivjo wˈatu wˌatakˌavjokˈuwa mtʃˌaŋɡaɲˈiko, wˈala hˌawatabˈaki wˌameuŋɡˈana tˈena, kˌama vˈile tʃˈuma kˌisivjowˈeza kˌutʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈana na udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi.|0
katˌika sˈiku za wafˈalme hˈao, mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni ˌatauwˈeka ufˈalme ambˈao kˈamwe hˌautˌaaŋɡamˈizwa, wˈala hˌautˌaatʃˈiwa taˈifa ɟiŋɡˈine. ˌutazipˈonda zˈile fˈalme zˈote na kˌuzikomˈeʃa, bˌali weɲˈewe ˌutadˈumu milˈele.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo maˈana ja maˈono ja ɟˈiwe lˌililotʃˈoŋɡwa kutˈoka mlimˈani, lakˈini si kwa mikˈono ja mwˌanadˈamu, lˈile ɟˈiwe ambˈalo lˌilivˈuɲɟa tʃˈuma, ʃˈaba, udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi, fˈeða na ðahˈabu vipˈande vipˈande. mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu ˌamemwoɲˈeʃa mfˈalme kˈile kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea wakˈati uɟˈao. ndˈoto hˌii ni ja kwˈeli na tafsˈiri jˌake ni ja kˌuaminˈika.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi mbˈele ja dˌaniˈeli kˈumpa heʃˈima, ˌakaaɡˈiza wˌamtolˈee dˌaniˈeli sadˈaka na uvˈumba.|0
mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia dˌaniˈeli, hakˈika mˈuŋɡu wˈako ni mˈuŋɡu wa miˈuŋɡu, na bwˈana wa wafˈalme, na mfˌunuˈaɟi wa sˈiri zˈote, kwa maˈana ˌumewˈeza kˌufunˈua sˈiri hˌii.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme ˌakamwˈeka dˌaniˈeli nafˈasi ja ɟˈuu, na kˈumpa zawˈadi ɲˈiŋɡi tˈele. ˌakamfˈaɲa kˌuwa mtawˈala wa ɟˈimbo lˈote la babˈeli, na kumwˈeka kˌuwa m̩kˈuu wa wˌeɲe hekˈima wˈote.|0
zaˈidi ja hˈajo, kwa ˈombi la dˌaniˈeli, mfˈalme ˌakawˌateˈua ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo kˌuwa wˌasimamˈizi wa ɟˈimbo la babˈeli, hˈuku dˌaniˈeli ˌakibˈaki katˌika ukˈumbi wa mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalitˌeŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu, jˌeɲe kˈimo tʃa ðirˈaa sitˈini, na upˈana wa ðirˈaa sˈita, ˌakaˌisimamˈiʃa kwˈeɲe tˌambarˈare ja dˈura katˌika ɟˈimbo la ˈn̩tʃi ja babˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakaˈita wakˈuu, wˌasimamˈizi, wˌatawˈala, wˌaʃaˈuri, watˈunza hazˈina, wˌaamˈuzi, mˌahakˈimu na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wˈote wa ɟˈimbo kˈuɟa kˌuizindˈua sanˈamu ambˈajo mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌisimamˈiʃa.|0
bˌasi wakˈuu, wˌasimamˈizi, wˌatawˈala, wˌaʃaˈuri, watˈunza hazˈina, wˌaamˈuzi, mˌahakˈimu na mˌaafˈisa weŋɡˈine wa ɟˈimbo wˌalikˌusaɲˈika ˌili kˌuizindˈua sanˈamu ˈile mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌisimamˈiʃa, nˌao wˌakasimˈama mbˈele ja hˈijo sanˈamu.|0
ndˈipo mpˈiɡa m̩bˈiu ˌakataŋɡˈaza kwa saˈuti kˈubwa, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa kabˈila zˈote, mˌataˈifa na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa, hˈili ndˈilo mnˌaloamrˈiwa kˌulifˈaɲa.|0
mˈara mtˌakapˌosikˈia saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu, filˈimbi, marˈimba, zˈeze, kinˈubi, zumˈari na aˈina zˈote za saˈuti za ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi, lazˈima mwaŋɡˈuke tʃˈini na kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu ambˈajo mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌameˌisimamˈiʃa.|0
ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje hˌataaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini na kˌuiabˈudu sanˈamu hˈijo, ˌatatˈupwa sˈaa ˈijo hˈijo ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto.|0
kwa hˈijo, mˈara wˌalipˌosikˈia saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu, filˈimbi, kinˈubi, zˈeze, kinˈanda na aˈina zˈote za ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi, wˈatu wa kabˈila zˈote, mˌataˈifa na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa wˌakaaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini na kˌuiabˈudu ˈile sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu ambˈajo mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌalikˈuwa ˌameˌisimamˈiʃa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo baˈaði ja wˌakaldˈajo wˌaliɟˌitokˈeza na kˌuwaʃtˈaki wˌajahˈudi.|0
wˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza, ˈee mfˈalme, uˈiʃi milˈele.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, ˌumetˈoa ˈamri kwˌamba kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajesikˈia saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu, filˈimbi, kinˈubi, zˈeze, kinˈanda, zumˈari na aˈina zˈote za ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi lazˈima ˌaaŋɡˈuke tʃˈini na kˌuiabˈudu ˈile sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu.|0
na kwˌamba jejˈote ambˈaje hˌataaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini na kˌuiabˈudu ˌatatˈupwa sˈaa ˈijo hˈijo ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto.|0
lakˈini wˈako baˈaði ja wˌajahˈudi ambˈao ˌumewawˈeka ɟˌuːja mˈambo ja ɟˈimbo la babˈeli: jaˈani, ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo, ambˈao hˌawakuɟˈali wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme. hˌawaˌitumikˈii miˈuŋɡu jˈako wˈala kˌuiabˈudu ˈile sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu ˌulijˌoisˌimamˈiʃa.|0
mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza, akˈiwa ˌamekˌasirˈika na mwˌeɲe ɣaðˈabu kˈali, ˌakawaˈita ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo. hˈivjo wˈatu hˈawa wˌakalˈetwa mbˈele ja mfˈalme.|0
nˌaje nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakawˌaulˈiza, ɟˈe, ni kwˈeli kwˌamba nˈiɲi ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo hˌamuˌitumikˈii miˈuŋɡu jˈaŋɡu wˈala kˌuiabˈudu sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu nˌilijˌoisˌimamˈiʃa.|0
bˌasi wakˈati mtˌakapˌosikˈia saˈuti ja bˌaraɡˈumu, filˈimbi, marˈimba, zˈeze, kinˈubi, zumˈari na aˈina zˈote za ˈala za ˌuimbˈaɟi, kˌama mtakˈuwa tajˈari kˌusuɟˈudu na kˌuiabˈudu hˈijo sanˈamu nˌilijˌoitˌeŋɡenˈeza, vjˈema sˈana. lakˈini kˌama hˌamtaˌiabˈudu, mtatˈupwa sˈaa ˈijo hˈijo ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto. nˌaje ni mˈuŋɡu jˈupi ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa nˈiɲi, kutˈoka mkˈono wˈaŋɡu.|0
ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo wˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, ˈee nˌebukadnˈeza, hˌatuhitˈaɟi kˌuɟitetˈea mbˈele zˈako kuhˈusu ɟˈambo hˈili.|0
ikˈiwa tˌutatˈupwa ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto, mˈuŋɡu tˌunajˌemtumikˈia ˌanawˈeza kˌutuokˈoa na mˈoto, nˌaje ˌatatˌuokˈoa kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈako, ˈee mfˈalme.|0
lakˈini hˌata ikˈiwa hˌatatˌuokˈoa, ˈee mfˈalme, tˌunatˈaka ˌufahˈamu kwˌamba, hˌatutˌaitˌumikˈia miˈuŋɡu jˈako wˈala kˌuiabˈudu sanˈamu ja ðahˈabu ˌulijˌoisˌimamˈiʃa.|0
ndˈipo nˌebukadnˈeza akˈawa na ɣaðˈabu kˈali sˈana kwa ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo, nˈajo nˈia jˌake ˌikabˌadilˈika kwˈao. ˌakaaɡˈiza tanˈuru ˌitʃotʃˈewe mˈoto mˈara sˈaba kulˈiko kˌawaˈida jˈake.|0
na kˌuwaamˈuru baˈaði ja askˈari wˌake wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi katˌika ɟˈeʃi lˈake kˌuwafˈuŋɡa ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo na kˌuwatˈupa ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto.|0
hˈivjo wˈatu hˈawa, wˌalifˈuŋɡwa na kutˈupwa ndˈani ja tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto wakˈiwa wˌamevˈaa maɟˈoho jˈao, sˌuruˈali, vilˈemba na ŋɡˈuo zˈao ɲiŋɡˈine.|0
ˈamri ja mfˈalme ˌilikˈuwa ja harˈaka sˈana na tanˈuru ˌilikˈuwa na mˈoto mkˈali kiˈasi kwˌamba miˈali ja mˈoto ˌiliwaˈua wˈale askˈari wˌaliˌowapelˈeka ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakaʃaŋɡˈaa, ˌakainˈuka kwa harˈaka na kˌuwaulˈiza wˌaʃaˈuri wˈake, ɟˈe, hˌawakˈuwa wˈatu watˈatu ambˈao tˌuliwafˈuŋɡa na kˌuwatˈupa ndˈani ja mˈoto? wˌaʃaˈuri wˌakaɟˈibu, hakˈika, ˈee mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, tazˈama! naˈona wˈatu wˈanne wˌakitˌembeˌatembˈea ndˈani ja mˈoto, hˌawaɟafˈuŋɡwa wˈala kˌuðurˈika, nˌaje ˈm̩tu jˈule wa ˈn̩ne ˌanaˌonekˈana kˌama mwˈana wa miˈuŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakaˌukaribˈia mdˈomo wa ˈile tanˈuru ˌiwakˈajo mˈoto na kupˈaza saˈuti, ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo, wˌatumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, tokˈeni! ɲɟoˈoni hˈapa! ndˈipo ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo wˌakatˈoka ndˈani ja mˈoto.|0
nˌao mˌaliwˈali, wˌasimamˈizi, wˌatawˈala na wˌaʃaˈuri wa mfˈalme wˌakakˌusaɲˈika kˌuwazuŋɡˈuka. wˌaliˈona kwˌamba mˈoto hˌaukuðˈuru miˈili jˈao, wˈala ˌuɲuˈele wa vˈitʃwa vjˈao hˌaukˌuuŋɡˈua, maɟˈoho jˈao hˌajakˌuuŋɡˈua, wˈala hˌapakuwˈepo na harˈufu ja mˈoto kwˈeɲe miˈili jˈao.|0
ndˈipo nˌebukadnˈeza ˌakasˈema, ˌahimidˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wa ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo, ambˈaje ˌamemtˈuma mˌalaˈika wˌake na kˌuwaokˈoa wˌatumˈiʃi wˈake. wˌalimtˌumaˈini na kˌukaˈidi ˈamri ja mfˈalme, nˌao wakˈawa tajˈari kˈufa kulˈiko kˌutumikˈia ˌau kˌuabˈudu mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine jejˈote ˌisipokˈuwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌinaamˈuru kwˌamba wˈatu wa taˈifa lolˈote ˌau lˈuɣa jojˈote wˌatakˌaosˈema kˈitu tʃotʃˈote ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu wa ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo wakˈatwe vipˈande vipˈande na ɲˈumba zˈao zifˈaɲue kˌuwa malˈundo ja kokˈoto, kwa maˈana hakˈuna mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˌawezˈaje kˌuokˈoa nˈamna hˌii.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakawˌapandˈiʃa vjˈeo ʃadrˈaki, meʃˈaki na ˌabednˈeɡo katˌika ɟˈimbo la babˈeli.|0
mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza, kwa kabˈila za wˈatu, mˌataˈifa na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa, wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote: mˌafanikˈio jˈawe kwˈenu sˈana.|0
ni furˈaha jˈaŋɡu kˌuwaambˈia kuhˈusu iʃˈara za mˌiuɟˈiza na mˌaaɟˈabu ambˈajo mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌamenˌifaɲˈia.|0
mˈimi, nˌebukadnˈeza, nˌilikˈuwa ɲumbˈani katˌika ɟˈumba lˈaŋɡu la kifˈalme, nikˈiwa nˌinaˈiʃi kwa rˈaha na hˈali ja kˌufanikˈiwa.|0
nˌiliˈota ndˈoto ˌilijˌoniˌoɡopˈeʃa. nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimelˈala kˌitandˈani mwˈaŋɡu, ɲɟˈozi na maˈono jˌalijopˈita mˌawazˈoni mwˈaŋɡu vˌilinitˈiʃa.|0
hˈivjo nˌikaaɡˈiza kwˌamba wˈatu wˈote wˌeɲe hekˈima wa babˈeli walˈetwe mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌunifˌasirˈia ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌalipokˈuɟa waɡˈaŋɡa, wˌasihˈiri, wˌanaɟˈimu na wˌaaɡˈuzi, nˌiliwˌaambˈia ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌunifˌasirˈia.|0
mwiʃˈoni, dˌaniˈeli ˌalikˈuɟa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu nˌikamwelˈeza hˈijo ndˈoto. dˌaniˈeli ˌanaˈitwa bˌelteʃˈaza, kwa ɟˈina la mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, nˈajo rˈoho ja miˈuŋɡu mˌitakatˈifu ˌinakˈaa ndˈani jˈake..|0
nˌilisˈema, bˌelteʃˈaza, m̩kˈuu wa waɡˈaŋɡa, nˌinaɟˈua kˌuwa rˈoho ja miˈuŋɡu mˌitakatˈifu ˈiko ndˈani jˈako, wˈala hakˈuna sˈiri ilˈijo ŋɡˈumu kwˈako. hˌii n̩dˈijo ndˈoto jˈaŋɡu, nˌifasirˈie.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo maˈono nˌilijoˈona nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimelˈala kˌitandˈani mwˈaŋɡu: nˌilitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌulisimˈama ˈm̩ti kˌatikˈati ja ˈn̩tʃi. ˌulikˈuwa mrˈefu sˈana.|0
ˈm̩ti ˈule ˌulikˈua, ukˈawa mkˈubwa na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃa jˌake ˌikaɡˈusa ˈaŋɡa; ˌuliˌonekˈana mpˈaka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
maɟˈani jˌake jˌalikˈuwa ja kˌupendˈeza, matˈunda jˌake jˌalikˈuwa mˈeŋɡi, na ɟˈuu jˌake kˌulikˈuwa na tʃakˈula kwa aɟˈili ja wˈote. tʃˈini ja kivˈuli tʃˈake waɲˈama wa kondˈeni wˌalipˈata hifˈaði, na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani wˌaliˈiʃi katˌika matˈawi jˈake. kˈila kiˈumbe kˌililˈiʃwa kˌutokˈana na ˈm̩ti hˈuo.|0
katˌika maˈono nˌilijˌojaˈona nikˈiwa nˌimelˈala kˌitandˈani mwˈaŋɡu, nˌilitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌalikuwˈepo mlˈinzi, alˈije mtˌakatˈifu, ˌakiʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni.|0
ˌakaˈita kwa saˈuti kˈubwa: katˈeni ˈm̩ti hˈuu, mjafjˈeke matˈawi jˈake; jˌaondoˈeni maɟˈani jˌake na kˌujatawˈaɲa matˈunda jˈake. waɲˈama na wˌakimbˈie kutˈoka tʃˈini jˌake na ndˈeɡe wˌaondˈoke kutˈoka matˈawi jˈake.|0
lakˈini atʃˈeni kisˈiki tʃˈake na mizˈizi, kikˈiwa kˌimefˈuŋɡwa kwa tʃˈuma na ʃˈaba, kibˈaki arðˈini, kwˈeɲe maɟˈani ja kondˈeni.  mwatʃˈeni ˌalowˈeʃwe na umˈande wa mbiŋɡˈuni, nˌaje aˈatʃwe aˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na waɲˈama mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mimˈea ja dunˈia.|0
akˈili jˌake na ˌibadilˈiʃwe kutˈoka ˈile ja mwˌanadˈamu na apˈewe akˈili ja mɲˈama, mpˈaka ɲakˈati sˈaba zipˈite ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌuamˈuzi hˈuu ˌumetaŋɡˈazwa na walˈinzi, hukˈumu ˌimetaŋɡˈazwa na wˌatakatˈifu, ˌili walˈio hˈai waɟˈue kˌuwa alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana n̩dˈije ˌanajˌetawˈala ɟˌuːja fˈalme zˈote za wˌanadˈamu, nˌaje hˈumpa jejˈote ˌamtakˈaje na kˌumtawˈaza ɟˈuu jˌake hˌata jˌeje alˈije mɲˈoŋɡe sˈana mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌanadˈamu..|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ndˈoto nˌilijˌoipˈata mˈimi, mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza. sˈasa bˌelteʃˈaza, nˌiambˈie maˈana jˈake, kwa maˈana hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa wa wˌeɲe hekˈima katˌika ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu ˌanajewˈeza kˌunifˌasirˈia. bˌali wˌewe wawˈeza, kwa sabˈabu rˈoho ja miˈuŋɡu mˌitakatˈifu ˈimo ndˈani jˈako.|0
ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌalijeˈitwa pˈia bˌelteʃˈaza ˌalipˌofaðaˈika sˈana kwa mˈuda, nˈajo mawˈazo jˌake jˌakamtˈia hˈofu. bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakasˈema, bˌelteʃˈaza, ˌusiruhˈusu ndˈoto wˈala maˈana jˌake kˌukutˈia hˈofu. bˌelteʃˈaza ˌakamɟˈibu, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, laˈiti ndˈoto hˌii ˌiŋɡehˈusu adˈui zˈako, na maˈana jˌake ˌiwahˈusu watˈesi wˈako.|0
ˈm̩ti ˌuliˌouˈona, ˌuliokˈua ukˈawa mkˈubwa na wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, nˈajo ˈn̩tʃa jˌake ˌikaɡˈusa ˈaŋɡa na kˌuonekˈana dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
ukˈiwa na maɟˈani ja kˌupendˈeza na matˈunda mˈeŋɡi, ˌukitˈoa tʃakˈula kwa wˈote, na ˌukiwˈapa hifˈaði waɲˈama wa kondˈeni na kˌuwa mahˈali pa viˈota katˌika matˈawi jˌake kwa aɟˈili ja ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, wˌewe ndˈiwe ˈule ˈm̩ti! ˌumekˈuwa mkˈubwa na mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, nˌao ukˈuu wˈako ˌumekˈua mpˈaka kufˈika ɟˈuu aŋɡˈani, nˈajo mamlˈaka jˈako jˌameenˈea mpˈaka miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, wˌewe ˌulimwˈona mlˈinzi, alˈije mtˌakatˈifu, ˌakiʃˈuka kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni na kusˈema, ˌukatˈeni ˈm̩ti na kˌuuˌaŋɡamˈiza, lakˈini kˌiatʃˈeni kisˈiki kikˈiwa kˌimefˈuŋɡwa kwa tʃˈuma na kwa ʃˈaba, kwˈeɲe maɟˈani ja kondˈeni, wakˈati mizˈizi jˌake ˌinabˈaki arðˈini. mwatʃˈeni ˌalowˈeʃwe na umˈande wa mbiŋɡˈuni, mwatʃˈeni aˈiʃi kˌama waɲˈama pˈori mpˈaka ɲakˈati sˈaba zipˈite ɟˈuu jˈake..|0
ˈee mfˈalme, hˌii n̩dˈijo tafsˈiri, na hˌii ni ˈamri ja alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana ˌalijˌoitˈoa ðˈidi ja bwˈana wˈaŋɡu mfˈalme.|0
wˌewe ˌutafukˈuzwa mbˈali na wˌanadˈamu, nˌawe ˌutaˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na waɲˈama pˈori; ˌutakˈula maɲˈasi kˌama ŋɡˈombe, na kˌuloˈana kwa umˈande wa mbiŋɡˈuni. ɲakˈati sˈaba zˌitapˈita ɟˈuu jˈako, mpˈaka ˌutakˌapokubˈali kˌuwa jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana n̩dˈije ˌanajˌetawˈala ɟˌuːja fˈalme za wˌanadˈamu, nˌaje hˌumtawˈaza jejˈote ˌamtakˈaje.|0
ˈamri ja kuˈatʃa kisˈiki pamˈoɟa na mizˈizi jˌake ˌinamˌaanˈiʃa kwˌamba ufˈalme wˈako ˌutareɟˈezwa kwˈako ˌutakˌapokubˈali kwˌamba mbˈiŋɡu ndˈizo zˌitawalˈazo.|0
kwa hˈijo, ˈee mfˈalme, ˈuwe rˈaði kˌupokˈea ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu: ˈatʃa ðˈambi zˈako kwa kutˈenda jalˈijo hˈaki, ˌukaˈatʃe uˈovu wˈako, na ˈuwe na hurˈuma kwa wˌaliˌoonˈewa. hˈivjo ˌitawˌezekˈana baˌada ja hˈajo, mˌafanikˈio jˈako jˌakaˌendelˈea.|0
hˈaja jˈote jˌalimpˈata mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza.|0
miˈezi kˈumi na miwˈili bˌaadˈaje, mfˈalme ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakitembˈea ɟˌuːja pˈaa la ɟˈumba la kifˈalme la babˈeli.|0
ˌalisˈema, ɟˈe, hˈuu si babˈeli ˈm̩ɟi m̩kˈuu nˌiliˌouɟˈeŋɡa kˌama makˈao ja kifˈalme, kwa uwˈezo wˈaŋɡu mkˈubwa, na kwa aɟˈili ja ˌutukˈufu wa ˈenzi jˈaŋɡu.|0
manˈeno hˈajo jˌalikˈuwa bˈado katˌika midˈomo jˌake wakˈati saˈuti ˌilipokˈuɟa kutˈoka mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌikisˈema, mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza, hˈiki ndˈitʃo kˌilitʃˌoamrˈiwa kwa aɟˈili jˈako: mamlˈaka jˈako ja ufˈalme jˌameˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kwˈako.|0
ˌutafukˈuzwa mbˈali na wˌanadˈamu, ˌukaˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na waɲˈama pˈori, na ˌutakˈula maɲˈasi kˌama ŋɡˈombe. ɲakˈati sˈaba zˌitapˈita ɟˈuu jˈako, mpˈaka ˌutakˌapokubˈali kˌuwa jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana n̩dˈije ˌanajˌetawˈala ɟˌuːja fˈalme za wˌanadˈamu, nˌaje hˌumtawˈaza jejˈote ˌamtakˈaje.|0
pˈapo hˈapo jˈale jˌalijokˈuwa jˌamesˈemwa kuhˈusu nˌebukadnˈeza jˌakatimˈia. ˌalifukˈuzwa mbˈali na wˌanadˈamu, akˈala maɟˈani kˌama ŋɡˈombe. mwˈili wˌake ˌulilowˈeʃwa kwa umˈande wa mbiŋɡˈuni mpˈaka ɲuˈele zˌake zˌikakˈua kˌama maɲˈoja ja tˈai na kˈutʃa zˌake kˌama makˈutʃa ja ndˈeɡe.|0
mwˈiʃo wa hˈuo wakˈati, mˌimi nˌebukadnˈeza, nˌiliinˈua mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni, nˈazo fahˈamu zˈaŋɡu zˌikanˌirudˈia. ndˈipo nˌikamsˈifu jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, nˌikamheʃˈimu na kˌumhimˈidi jˌeje ˌaiʃˈije milˈele. ˌutawˈala wˌake ni ˌutawˈala wa milˈele; ufˈalme wˌake hudˈumu kutˈoka kizˈazi na kizˈazi.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia jˌanahˌesabˈiwa kˌuwa si kˈitu. hufˈaɲa kˌama ˌatakˈavjo kwa maɟˈeʃi ja mbiŋɡˈuni, na kwa mˌataˈifa ja dunˈia. hakˈuna ˌanajewˈeza kˌuuzuˈia mkˈono wˌake ˌau kˌumwambˈia, ˌumefˈaɲa nˈini wˈewe.|0
bˌasi mˈimi, nˌebukadnˈeza, hˌumhimˈidi, na hˌumtukˈuza na kumsˈifu mfˈalme wa mbiŋɡˈuni, kwa sabˈabu kˈila kˈitu ˌafaɲˈatʃo ni hˈaki, na ɲɟˈia zˌake zˈote ni adˈili. nˌao wˌaendˈao kwa kibˈuri ˌanawˈeza kˌuwaʃˈuʃa.|0
mfˈalme belʃˈaza ˌalifˈaɲa karˈamu kˈubwa kwa aɟˈili ja maˈelfu ja wakˈuu wˌake na akˈaɲua mvˈiɲo pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
wakˈati belʃˈaza ˌalipokˈuwa akˈiɲua mvˈiɲo wˈake, ˌaliamˈuru vilˈetwe vˈile vikˈombe vja ðahˈabu na fˈeða ambˈavjo nˌebukadnˈeza bˈaba jˌake ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˌitʃukˈua kutˈoka hˌekalˈuni hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, ˌili mfˈalme na wakˈuu wˈake, wˌake zˌake na mˌasurˈia wˌake wawˈeze kˌuviɲuˈea.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌakavilˈeta vˈile vikˈombe vja ðahˈabu ambˈavjo vˌilikˈuwa vˌimetʃˌukulˈiwa kutˈoka hekˈalu la mˈuŋɡu hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu, nˌaje mfˈalme na wakˈuu wˈake, wˌake zˌake na mˌasurˈia wˌake wˌakavˌiɲuˈea.|0
wˌalipokˈuwa wakˈiɲua mvˈiɲo, wˌakaisˈifu miˈuŋɡu ja ðahˈabu na fˈeða, ja ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma, mˈiti na mˈawe.|0
ɣafˈula vidˈole vja mkˈono wa mwˌanadˈamu vˌilitokˈea na kˌuandˈika ɟˌuːja ukˈuta, karˈibu na kinˈara tʃa tˈaa ndˈani ja ɟˈumba la mfˈalme. mfˈalme ˌakatazˈama kitˈaŋɡa kˌilivjokˈuwa kˌikiandˈika.|0
ˈuso wa mfˈalme ˌukaɡeˈuka rˈaŋɡi, nˌaje ˌakaoɡˈopa sˈana, kiˈasi kwˌamba maɡˈoti jˌake jˌaliɡoŋɡˈana na miɡˈuu jˌake ˌikaleɡˈea.|0
mfˈalme ˌakawaˈita wˌasihˈiri, wˌanaɟˈimu na waɡˈaŋɡa walˈetwe, nˌaje ˌakawˌaambˈia hˈawa wˌeɲe hekˈima wa babˈeli, jejˈote ˌasomˈaje mˌaandˈiʃi hˈaja na kˌuniambˈia maˈana jˌake ˌatavˈikwa ŋɡˈuo za zˌambarˈau, na kuvˈikwa mkˈufu wa ðahˈabu ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈake, nˌaje ˌatafˈaɲua mtawˈala wa tʃˈeo tʃa tˈatu katˌika ufˈalme.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu wˈote wa mfˈalme wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌakaiŋɡˈia, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kusˈoma jˈale mˌaandˈiʃi wˈala kˌumwambˈia mfˈalme maˈana jˈake.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme belʃˈaza ˌakazˈidi kuɟˈawa na hˈofu, na ˈuso wˌake ˌukaɡeˈuka rˈaŋɡi zaˈidi. wakˈuu wˌake wˌakapˈiɡwa na bˌumbuˈazi.|0
malkˈia ˌalipˌosikˈia saˈuti za mfˈalme na wakˈuu wˈake, ˌalikˈuɟa katˌika ukˈumbi wa karˈamu. ˌakasˈema, ˈee mfˈalme, uˈiʃi milˈele! ˌusiʃtˈuke! ˌusibˌadilˈike rˈaŋɡi kiˈasi hˈitʃo.|0
jˈuko ˈm̩tu katˌika ufˈalme wˈako ambˈaje ˈana rˈoho ja miˈuŋɡu mˌitakatˈifu ndˈani jˈake. wakˈati wa bˈaba jˈako, ˈm̩tu hˈujo ˌaliˌonekˈana kˌuwa na ˌufahˈamu, akˈili na hekˈima kˌama ˈile ja miˈuŋɡu. mfˈalme nˌebukadnˈeza bˈaba jˈako, jaˈani nasˈema mfˈalme bˈaba jˈako, ˌalimwˈeka kˌuwa m̩kˈuu wa waɡˈaŋɡa, wˌasihˈiri, wˌanaɟˈimu na wˌaaɡˈuzi.|0
ˈm̩tu hˈuju dˌaniˈeli, ambˈaje mfˈalme ˌalimwˈita bˌelteʃˈaza, ˌaliˌonekˈana kˌuwa na akˈili ɲepˈesi, mˌaarˈifa na ˌufahˈamu, pˈia uwˈezo wa kˌufasˈiri ndˈoto, kˌuelˈeza mafˈumbo na kˌutatˈua mˌatatˈizo maɡˈumu. mwˈite dˌaniˈeli, nˌaje ˌatakˌuambˈia maˈana ja hˈaja mˌaandˈiʃi.|0
hˈivjo dˌaniˈeli ˌakalˈetwa mbˈele ja mfˈalme, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakamˌuulˈiza, ɟˈe, wˌewe ndˈiwe dˌaniˈeli, mmˈoɟa wa wˈatu wa ˌuhamˈiʃo wˌaliolˈetwa na mfˈalme bˈaba jˈaŋɡu kutˈoka jˈuda.|0
nˌimesikˈia kwˌamba rˈoho ja miˈuŋɡu ˈiko ndˈani jˈako, na kwˌamba ˈuna ˌufahˈamu, akˈili na hekˈima ja pekˈee.|0
wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima na wˌasihˈiri wˌalilˈetwa mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌili kusˈoma mˌaandˈiʃi hˈaja na kˌuniambˈia maˈana jˈake, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌunifˌafanulˈia.|0
bˌasi nˌimesikˈia kwˌamba ˌunawˈeza kutˈoa tafsˈiri na kˌutatˈua mˌatatˈizo maɡˈumu. ikˈiwa ˌunawˈeza kusˈoma mˌaandˈiʃi hˈaja na kˌuniambˈia maˈana jˈake, ˌutavˈikwa ŋɡˈuo za zˌambarˈau na mkˈufu wa ðahˈabu ʃiŋɡˈoni mwˈako, nˌawe ˌutafˈaɲua mtawˈala wa tˈatu katˌika ufˈalme.|0
ndˈipo dˌaniˈeli ˌakamɟˈibu mfˈalme, wawˈeza kubˈaki na zawˈadi zˈako mweɲˈewe na kˈumpa ˈm̩tu mwiŋɡˈine zawˈadi zˈako. hˌata hˈivjo, nˌitasˈoma mˌaandˈiʃi kwa mfˈalme na kˌumwambˈia maˈana jˈake.|0
ˈee mfˈalme, mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana alˈimpa bˈaba jˈako nˌebukadnˈeza ˌutawˈala, ukˈuu, ˌutukˈufu na fahˈari.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja nafˈasi ja ɟˈuu ˌalijˈompa bˈaba jˈako, kabˈila zˈote za wˈatu, mˌataˈifa na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa wˌalimhˈofu na kˌumwoɡˈopa. wˈale ambˈao mfˈalme ˌalitˈaka kˌuwaˈua, ˌaliwaˈua; wˈale ˌaliotˈaka kˌuwaˈatʃa hˈai, ˌaliwaˈatʃa hˈai; wˈale ˌaliotˈaka kˌuwapandˈiʃa tʃˈeo, ˌaliwˌapandˈiʃa; ˌaliotˈaka kˌuwaʃˈuʃa, ˌaliwaʃˈuʃa.|0
lakˈini mˈojo wˌake ˌulipokˈuwa na mˌaɟivˈuno na kˌuwa mɡˈumu kwa kibˈuri, ˌaliˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kwa kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ufˈalme na kˌuvulˈiwa ˌutukˈufu wˈake.|0
ˌakafukˈuzwa mbˈali na wˌanadˈamu na kupˈewa akˈili ja mɲˈama, ˌakaˈiʃi pamˈoɟa na pˌundamwˈitu, akˈala maɟˈani kˌama ŋɡˈombe, nˌao mwˈili wˌake ˌukalowˈeʃwa kwa umˈande wa mbˈiŋɡu, mpˈaka ˌalipˌotambˈua kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana n̩dˈije mtawˈala ɟˌuːja fˈalme za wˌanadˈamu na kwˌamba hˌumtawˈaza ɟˈuu jˈao jejˈote ˌamtakˈaje.|0
lakˈini wˌewe mwanˈawe, ˈee belʃˈaza, hˌukuɟˌiɲeɲekˈeza, iŋɡˈawa ˌulifahˈamu hˈaja jˈote.|0
badˈala jˈake, ˌumeɟˌiinˈua ðˈidi ja bwˈana wa mbˈiŋɡu. ˌuliletˈewa vikˈombe vja hekˈalu lˈake, nˌawe na wakˈuu wˈako, wˌake zˈako na mˌasurˈia wˈako mlˌivitumˈia kwa kˌuɲuˈea mvˈiɲo. ˌukaisˈifu miˈuŋɡu ja fˈeða na ðahˈabu, ja ʃˈaba, tʃˈuma, mˈiti na mˈawe, miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo hˌaiwˈezi kuˈona, ˌau kˌusikˈia wˈala kˌufahˈamu. lakˈini hˌukumheʃˈimu mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje ˌanaˌuʃikilˈia uhˈai wˈako na ɲɟˈia zˈako zˈote mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌameutˈuma mkˈono ˈule ˌuliˌoandˈika manˈeno.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo manˈeno jˌalijˌoandˈikwa: mˈene, mˈene, tekˈeli na perˈesi.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo maˈana ja manˈeno hˈaja: mˈene: mˈuŋɡu ˌamezˌihesˈabu sˈiku za ˌutawˈala wˈako na kˌuukomˈeʃa.|0
tekˈeli: wˌewe ˌumepˈimwa katˌika mizˈani na ˌumeˌonekˈana ˌumepuŋɡˈua.|0
perˈesi: ufˈalme wˈako ˌumeɡawˈaɲua na kupˈewa wamˈedi na wˌaaɟˈemi.|0
ndˈipo kwa ˈamri ja belʃˈaza, dˌaniˈeli ˌakavˈikwa ŋɡˈuo za zˌambarˈau na mkˈufu wa ðahˈabu ʃiŋɡˈoni, tˈena ˌakataŋɡˈazwa kˌuwa mtawˈala wa tˈatu katˌika ufˈalme.|0
usˈiku ˈule ˈule, belʃˈaza mfˈalme wa wˌakaldˈajo ˌakauˈawa.|0
nˌaje darˈio mmˈedi ˌakaʃˈika ufˈalme akˈiwa na miˈaka sitˈini na miwˈili.|0
ˌilimpendˈeza darˈio kˌuteˈua wakˈuu mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini kˌutawˈala katˌika ufˈalme wˌake wˈote.|0
pamˈoɟa na wˌasimamˈizi watˈatu ɟˈuu jˈao, ambˈao mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌalikˈuwa dˌaniˈeli. wakˈuu wˌalitˈoa hesˈabu kwa hˈao wˌasimamˈizi ˌili mfˈalme ˌasipˈate hasˈara.|0
bˌasi dˌaniˈeli ˌaliɟˌiðihirˈiʃa, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌasimamˈizi na wakˈuu kwa sˈifa zˌake za kˌipekˈee hˌata mfˈalme ˌakapˈaŋɡa kumwˈeka ɟˌuːja ufˈalme wˈote.|0
wˌalipˌofahˈamu hˈilo, wakˈuu na wˌasimamˈizi wˌakaɟarˈibu kˌutafˈuta sabˈabu za kumʃtˈaki dˌaniˈeli kuhˈusu ˌusimamˈizi wˌake wa ʃuɣˈuli za sˌerikˈali, lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza kˌufanikˈiwa. hˌawakuwˈeza kupˈata kˈosa kwˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu, wˈala hˌakupˌatikˈana na ˌupotˈovu ˌau uzˈembe.|0
bˌasi wˌasimamˈizi na wakˈuu wˌakaiŋɡˈia kwa mfˈalme kˌama kikˈundi wˌakasˈema, ˈee mfˈalme darˈio, uˈiʃi milˈele.|0
wˌasimamˈizi wa ufˈalme, wˌasaidˈizi, wakˈuu, wˌaʃaˈuri na wˌatawˈala wˈote wˌamekˌubaliˈana kwˌamba mfˈalme atˈoe ʃerˈia na kˌukazˈia ˈamri kˌuwa jejˈote ˌatakˌajetˈoa dˈua kwa mˈuŋɡu ˌau mwˌanadˈamu jejˈote katˌika mˈuda hˈuu wa sˈiku θˌelaθˈini ziɟˈazo, ˌisipokˈuwa kwˈako wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme, atˈupwe ndˈani ja tˈundu la sˈimba.|0
sˈasa, ˈee mfˈalme, tˈoa ˈamri na ˌuiandˈike ˌili ˌisiwˈeze kˌubadilˈiʃwa: kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia za wamˈedi na wˌaaɟˈemi, ambˈazo hˌaziwˈezi kˌubatilˈiʃwa.|0
hˈivjo mfˈalme darˈio ˌakaiwˈeka ˈamri hˈijo katˌika mˌaandˈiʃi.|0
ndˈipo wˈatu hˈawa wˌakaˈenda kˌama kikˈundi na kumkˈuta dˌaniˈeli ˌakiˈomba na kumsˈihi mˈuŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja msaˈada.|0
bˌasi wˌakaˈenda kwa mfˈalme na kusˈema nˌaje kuhˈusu ˈamri ja mfˈalme: ɟˈe, hˌukutaŋɡˈaza ˈamri kwˌamba kwa mˈuda hˈuu wa sˈiku θˌelaθˈini ziɟˈazo ˈm̩tu jejˈote ambˈaje ˌatamwˈomba mˈuŋɡu ˌau mwˌanadˈamu jejˈote ˌisipokˈuwa wˈewe, ˈee mfˈalme, ˌaŋɡetˈupwa ndˈani ja tˈundu la sˈimba? mfˈalme ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈamri ndˈivjo ilˈivjo, kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia za wamˈedi na wˌaaɟˈemi, ambˈazo hˌaziwˈezi kˌubatilˈiʃwa.|0
ndˈipo wˌakamwambˈia mfˈalme, dˌaniˈeli, ambˈaje ni mmˈoɟa wa mˌahamˈiʃo kutˈoka jˈuda, hˌakuheʃˈimu, ˈee mfˈalme, wˈala haɟˈali ˈamri ˌulijˌoiwˈeka kwa mˌaandˈiʃi. bˈado ˌanaˈomba mˈara tˈatu kwa sˈiku.|0
wakˈati mfˈalme ˌalipˌosikˈia hˈili, ˌakahˌuzunˈika ˈm̩no. ˌakakˌusudˈia kˌumwokˈoa dˌaniˈeli, hˈivjo ˌakafˈaɲa kˈila ɟˌitihˈada ja kˌumwokˈoa hˌadi ɟˈua lˌikatˈua.|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˈatu wˌakamwendˈea mfˈalme kˌama kikˈundi na kˌumwambˈia, ˈee mfˈalme, kumbˈuka kwˌamba kˌuliŋɡˈana na ʃerˈia ja wamˈedi na wˌaaɟˈemi, hakˈuna ˈamri wˈala ʃerˈia ambˈajo mfˈalme ˌameitˈoa ˌinajowˈeza kˌubadilˈiʃwa.|0
bˌasi mfˈalme ˌakatˈoa ˈamri, nˌao wˌakamlˈeta dˌaniˈeli, na wˌakamtˈupa ndˈani ja tˈundu la sˈimba. mfˈalme ˌakamwambˈia dˌaniˈeli, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌunajˌemtumikˈia daˈima na ˌakuokˈoe.|0
ɟˈiwe lˌikalˈetwa na kuwˈekwa kwˈeɲe mdˈomo wa tˈundu, nˌaje mfˈalme ˌakalitˈia muhˈuri kwa pˈete jˌake mweɲˈewe pamˈoɟa na kwa pˈete za wakˈuu wˈake, ˌili hˈali ja dˌaniˈeli ˌisiwˈeze kˌubadilˈiʃwa.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme ˌakarˈudi kwˈeɲe ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme, nˌaje usˈiku kˈutʃa hakˈula tʃakˈula wˈala kˌutumˈia vˌiburudˈiʃo ˌalivjˌoletˈewa. lakˈini hˌakuwˈeza kulˈala.|0
wakˈati ˌalipˌokaribˈia lˈile tˈundu, ˌakamwˈita dˌaniˈeli kwa saˈuti ja utʃˈuŋɡu, dˌaniˈeli, mtumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai! ɟˈe, mˈuŋɡu wˈako ˌunajˌemtumikˈia daˈima, ˌamewˈeza kˌukuokˈoa kwa sˈimba.|0
dˌaniˈeli ˌakaɟˈibu, ˈee mfˈalme, uˈiʃi milˈele.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌalimtˈuma mˌalaˈika wˈake, nˌaje ˌakafˈuŋɡa vˈiɲua vja hˈawa sˈimba. hˌawaɟˌaniðˈuru, kwa sabˈabu nˌiliˌonekˈana sˈina hatˈia mbˈele zˈake. wˈala kˈamwe sˌiɟafˈaɲa ɟˈambo lolˈote bˈaja mbˈele jˈako, ˈee mfˈalme.|0
mfˈalme ˌakafurˈahi ˈm̩no, nˌaje ˌakatˈoa ˈamri dˌaniˈeli ˌatolˈewe kutˈoka kwa lˈile tˈundu. dˌaniˈeli ˌalipˌotolˈewa kutˈoka kwa lˈile tˈundu, hˌakukˈutwa na ɟerˈaha lolˈote, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌamemtˌumaˈini mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme, wˈale wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamemʃtˈaki dˌaniˈeli kwa uˈoŋɡo wˌalilˈetwa na kutˈupwa ndˈani ja lˈile tˈundu la sˈimba, pamˈoɟa na wˌake zˈao na watˈoto wˈao. nˌao kˈabla hˌawaɟafˈika tʃˈini kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja lˈile tˈundu, sˈimba wˌakawˌakamˈata na kusˈaɡa mifˈupa jˈao jˈote.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme darˈio ˌakawˌaandikˈia kabˈila zˈote za wˈatu, mˌataˈifa, na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote: nˈiɲi na mstˈawi sˈana.|0
natˈoa ˈamri hˌii, kwˌamba katˌika kˈila sehˈemu ja ufˈalme wˈaŋɡu, lazˈima wˈatu wˌamwoɡˈope na kˌumheʃˈimu mˈuŋɡu wa dˌaniˈeli. kwa maˈana jˌeje ni mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai, nˌaje hudˈumu milˈele, ufˈalme wˌake hˌautˌaaŋɡamˈizwa, nˌao ˌutawˈala wˌake haˈuna mwˈiʃo.|0
hupˈoɲa na kˌuokˈoa; hufˈaɲa iʃˈara na mˌaaɟˈabu mbiŋɡˈuni na dˌuniˈani. ˌamemwokˈoa dˌaniˈeli kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za sˈimba.|0
hˈivjo dˌaniˈeli ˌakastˈawi wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio, na ˌutawˈala wa korˈeʃi mwaɟˈemi.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa belʃˈaza mfˈalme wa babˈeli, dˌaniˈeli ˌaliˈota ndˈoto, nˈajo maˈono jˌakapˈita mˌawazˈoni jˌake ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamelˈala kˌitandˈani mwˈake. ˌakajˌaandˈika mˈambo ˌalijˌojaˈona katˌika ndˈoto jˈake.|0
dˌaniˈeli ˌakasˈema: katˌika maˈono jˈaŋɡu usˈiku nˌilitazˈama, na hˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikuwˈepo na upˈepo kutˈoka pˈande ˈn̩ne za mbˈiŋɡu, ˌukivurˈuɡa bahˈari kˈuu.|0
mɲˈama wa kwˈanza ˌalifanˈana na sˈimba, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa kˌama ja tˈai. nˌikatazˈama mpˈaka mabˈawa jˌake jˌalipˌoŋɡolˈewa, nˌaje ˌakaˌinulˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌakasimˈama kwa miɡˈuu miwˈili kˌama mwˌanadˈamu, nˌaje ˌakapˈewa mˈojo wa bˌinadˈamu.|0
hˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na mɲˈama wa pˈili, ambˈaje ˌaliˌonekˈana kˌama dˈubu. upˈande wˌake mmˈoɟa ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeinˈuka, na ˌalikˈuwa na mbˈavu tˈatu katˌika kˈiɲua tʃˈake kˈati ja mˈeno jˈake. ˌakaambˈiwa, ˈamka, ˈule ɲˈama mpˈaka uʃˈibe!.|0
baˌada ja hˈujo, nˌilitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na mɲˈama mwiŋɡˈine, ˌalijˌefanˈana na tʃˈui. ɟˌuːja mɡˈoŋɡo wˌake ˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa mˈanne kˌama ja ndˈeɡe. mɲˈama hˈuju ˌalikˈuwa na vˈitʃwa vˈinne, nˌaje ˌakapˈewa mamlˈaka ja kˌutawˈala.|0
baˌada ja hˈujo, katˌika maˈono jˈaŋɡu usˈiku nˌilitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na mɲˈama wa ˈn̩ne, mwˌeɲe kutˈiʃa na kˌuoɡˈofja, tˈena mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi. ˌalikˈuwa na mˈeno makˈubwa ja tʃˈuma; ˌakapˌondapˈonda na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wahˈaŋɡa wˈake, na kˌukaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo zˌake tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌosalˈia. ˌalikˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na waɲˈama wˈote wˌaliˌotaŋɡulˈia, nˌaje ˌalikˈuwa na pˈembe kˈumi.|0
wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinafikˈiri kuhˈusu pˈembe hˈizo, mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na pˈembe ɲiŋɡˈine, ambˈajo ni ndˈoɡo, ˌilijˌoɟitokˈeza mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa zˈile kˈumi; pˈembe tˈatu za mwanzˈoni zˌiliŋɡolˈewa ˌili kuˈipa nafˈasi hˈijo ndˈoɡo. pˈembe hˌii ˌilikˈuwa na mˈatʃo kˌama ja mwˌanadˈamu, na mdˈomo ˌulionˈena kwa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
nˌilipˌoendelˈea kˌutazˈama, vˈiti vja ˈenzi vˌikawˈekwa, nˌaje m̩zˈee wa sˈiku ˌakakˈeti. mavˈazi jˌake jˌalikˈuwa meˈupe kˌama θelˈuɟi; ɲuˈele za kˈitʃwa tʃˈake zˌilikˈuwa ɲeˈupe kˌama sˈufu. kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi kˌilikˈuwa kˌinawˈaka kwa miˈali ja mˈoto, nˈajo mˌaɡurudˈumu jˌake jˈote jˌalikˈuwa jˌanawˈaka mˈoto.|0
ˈm̩to wa mˈoto ˌulikˈuwa ˌunatˌirirˈika, ˌukipˈita mbˈele jˈake. maˈelfu ˈelfu wˌakamhˌudumˈia; kˈumi ˈelfu mˈara kˈumi ˈelfu wˌakasimˈama mbˈele zˈake. mˌahakˈama ˌikakˈaa kˌuhukˈumu, na vitˈabu vˌikafˌuŋɡulˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaˌendelˈea kˌutazˈama kwa sabˈabu ja jˈale manˈeno ja mˌaɟivˈuno jˌalijosˈemwa na ˈile pˈembe. nˌikaˌendelˈea kˌuaŋɡalˈia mpˈaka jˈule mɲˈama ˌalipˌouˈawa, na mwˈili wˌake ˌukahˌaribˈiwa na kutˈupwa katˌika ˈule mˈoto ˌuliowˈaka.|0
waɲˈama weŋɡˈine wˌalikˈuwa wˌamevulˈiwa mamlˈaka jˈao, lakˈini wˌalirˌuhusˈiwa kuˈiʃi kwa mˈuda fulˈani..|0
katˌika maˈono jˈaŋɡu ja usˈiku nˌilitazˈama, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu nˌikamwˈona ˌanajˌefanˈana na mwˌanadˈamu, akˈiɟa pamˈoɟa na mawˈiŋɡu ja mbiŋɡˈuni. ˌakamkˌaribˈia hˈujo m̩zˈee wa sˈiku, na ˌakaoŋɡˈozwa mbˈele zˈake.|0
ˌakapˈewa mamlˈaka, ˌutukˈufu na ufˈalme wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu; nˌao wˈatu wa kabˈila zˈote, mˌataˈifa, na wˈatu wa kˈila lˈuɣa wˌakamwabˈudu. ˌutawˈala wˌake ni ˌutawˈala wa milˈele ambˈao hˌautapˈita, nˌao ufˈalme wˌake ni ˈule ambˈao kˈamwe hˌautˌaaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
mˈimi, dˌaniˈeli, nˌilipˈata mˌahaŋɡaˈiko rohˈoni, nˈajo maˈono jˈale jˌalijopˈita ndˈani ja mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu jˌalinˌisumbˈua.|0
nˌikamkˌaribˈia mmˈoɟa wa wˈale wˌaliˌosimˈama pˈale na kˌumuulˈiza maˈana halˈisi ja hˈaja jˈote. bˌasi ˌakanˌiambˈia na kunˈipa tafsˈiri ja vˈitu hˈivi.|0
lakˈini wˌatakatˈifu wa jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana wˌatapokˈea ufˈalme na kˌuumilˈiki milˈele: nˈaam, milˈele na milˈele..|0
kˈiʃa nˌilitˈaka kˌufahˈamu maˈana ja kwˈeli ja mɲˈama jˈule wa ˈn̩ne, ambˈaje ˌalikˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na wˈale weŋɡˈine wˈote, tˈena wa kutˈiʃa sˈana, na mˈeno jˌake ja tʃˈuma na makˈutʃa ja ʃˈaba: mɲˈama ambˈaje ˌalipˌondapˈonda na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wahˈaŋɡa wˈake, na kˌukaɲˈaɡa tʃotʃˈote kˌilitʃˌosalˈia.|0
pˈia mˌimi nˌilitˈaka kuɟˈua kuhˈusu zˈile pˈembe kˈumi ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, na pˈia kuhˈusu ˈile pˈembe ɲiŋɡˈine ˌilijˌoɟitokˈeza, ambˈajo mbˈele jˌake zˈile tˈatu za mwanzˈoni zˌiliaŋɡˈuka, ˈile pˈembe ambˈajo ˌiliˌonekˈana kˌuvutˈia mˈatʃo zaˈidi kulˈiko zˈile ɲiŋɡˈine, na ambˈajo ˌilikˈuwa na mˈatʃo na kˈiɲua kˌilitʃonˈena kwa mˌaɟivˈuno.|0
nˌilipˌoendelˈea kˌutazˈama, pˈembe hˌii ˌilikˈuwa ˌinapiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi ja wˌatakatˈifu na kˌuwaʃˈinda.|0
mpˈaka hˈujo m̩zˈee wa sˈiku ˌalipokˈuɟa na kutˈamka hukˈumu kwa kuwˈapa uʃˈindi wˌatakatˈifu wa jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, na wakˈati ˌukawadˈia wˌalipˌoumilˈiki ufˈalme.|0
ˌalinˈipa mˌaelˈezo hˈaja: mɲˈama wa ˈn̩ne ni ufˈalme wa ˈn̩ne ambˈao ˌutatokˈea dˌuniˈani. ˌutakˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na fˈalme ɲiŋɡˈine zˈote, nˌao ˌutaharˈibu dunˈia nzˈima, ˌukiˌikaɲˈaɡa tʃˈini na kˌuipˌondapˈonda.|0
zˈile pˈembe kˈumi ni wafˈalme kˈumi wˌatakˌaotokˈana na ufˈalme hˈuu. baˌada jˈao mfˈalme mwiŋɡˈine ˌatainˈuka, ambˈaje ˌatakˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na wˈale wˌaliˌotaŋɡulˈia, nˌaje ˌatawˌaaŋɡˈuʃa wafˈalme watˈatu.|0
lakˈini mˌahakˈama ˌitakˈaa kˌuhukˈumu, nˈajo mamlˈaka jˌake jˌataˌondolˈewa na kˌuaŋɡamˈizwa kabˈisa milˈele.|0
ndˈipo ufˈalme, mamlˈaka na ukˈuu wa fˈalme tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu jˈote ˌutakˌabiðˈiwa kwa wˌatakatˈifu, wˈatu wa jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana. ufˈalme wˌake ˌutakˈuwa ufˈalme wa milˈele, nˌao wˌatawˈala wˈote wˌatamwabˈudu na kumtˈii jˈeje..|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio mwˈiʃo wa ɟˈambo lˈile. mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌilitˌaabˈika sˈana katˌika mawˈazo jˈaŋɡu, nˌao ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌukabˌadilˈika, lakˈini nˌililiwˈeka ɟˈambo hˌilo mojˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme belʃˈaza, mˌimi dˌaniˈeli, nˌilipˈata maˈono, baˌada ja maˈono ambˈajo jˌalikˈuwa jˌamenˌitokˈea mbelˈeni.|0
katˌika maˈono jˈaŋɡu, nˌiliɟiˈona nikˈiwa ndˈani ja ŋɡˈome ja ʃuʃˈani katˌika ɟˈimbo la elˈamu. katˌika maˈono nˌilikˈuwa kˈando ja ˈm̩to ulˈai.|0
nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu, na hˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na kondˈoo dˈume mwˌeɲe pˈembe mbˈili, akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja ˈm̩to, nˈazo pˈembe zˌake zˌilikˈuwa ndˈefu. pˈembe mˈoɟa ˌilikˈuwa ndˈefu kulˈiko hˈijo ɲiŋɡˈine, lakˈini ˌiliˌendelˈea kukˈua bˌaadˈaje.|0
nˌikamtazˈama jˈule kondˈoo dˈume ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌakiʃˌambulˈia kˌuelekˈea mˌaɣarˈibi, kˌaskazˈini na kusˈini. hakˈuna mɲˈama jejˈote ˌalijewˈeza kˌusimˈama ðˈidi jˈake, wˈala hakˈuna ˌalijewˈeza kˌuokˈoa kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu zˈake. ˌalifˈaɲa kˌama ˌatakˈavjo, nˌaje akˈawa m̩kˈuu.|0
nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinatˌafakˈari hˈili, ɣafˈula bebˈeru mwˌeɲe pˈembe mˈoɟa kˈubwa sˈana kˌatikˈati ja mˈatʃo jˌake ˌalikˈuɟa kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi, ˌakirˈuka kˈasi ɟˌuːja dunˈia jˈote bˌila kuɡˈusa ˈarði.|0
ˌalikˈuɟa ˌakimwˌelekˈea jˈule kondˈoo dˈume mwˌeɲe pˈembe mbˈili nˌilijemwˈona ˌakisimˈama kˈando ja ˈm̩to, ˌakamʃˌambulˈia kwa hasˈira ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
nˌikamwˈona ˌakimʃˌambulˈia jˈule kondˈoo dˈume kwa hasˈira ɲˈiŋɡi, ˌakimpˈiɡa jˈule kondˈoo dˈume na kuvˈuɲɟa pˈembe zˌake mbˈili. jˈule kondˈoo dˈume hakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu za kˌumzuˈia jˈule bebˈeru, hˈivjo ˌakamwaŋɡˈuʃa jˈule kondˈoo dˈume tʃˈini na kˌumkaɲˈaɡa, wˈala hakˈuna ˌalijewˈeza kˌumwokˈoa jˈule kondˈoo dˈume kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za hˈujo bebˈeru.|0
jˈule bebˈeru akˈawa mkˈubwa sˈana, lakˈini katˌika kilˈele tʃa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake ˈile pˈembe jˌake ndˈefu ˌilivuɲɟˈika, na mahˈali pˈake pˌakaˈota pˈembe ˈn̩ne kˈubwa kˌuelekˈea pˈande ˈn̩ne za dunˈia.|0
pˈembe hˈijo ˌikaˌendelˈea kukˈua hˌadi kˌufikˈia ɟˈeʃi la mbiŋɡˈuni, nˈajo ˌikalitˈupa baˈaði ja ɟˈeʃi la vˈitu vja aŋɡˈani hˈapa tʃˈini dˌuniˈani, na kˌulikaɲˈaɡa.|0
pˈembe hˈijo ˌikaɟikwˈeza ˌili ˈiwe kˌama m̩kˈuu wa hˌilo ɟˈeʃi; ˌikamwˌondolˈea ðabˈihu ja kˈila sˈiku, nˈapo mahˈali pˈake pˌatakatˈifu pˌakaʃˈuʃwa tʃˈini.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja uˈasi, ɟˈeʃi la wˌatakatˈifu na ðabˈihu za kˈila sˈiku vˌikatˈiwa mˌikonˈoni mwˈake. ˌikafˌanikˈiwa katˌika kˈila kˈitu ˌilitʃofˈaɲa, nˈajo kwˈeli ˌikatˈupwa tʃˈini.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikamsikˈia mtˌakatˈifu mmˈoɟa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza na mtˌakatˈifu mwiŋɡˈine, ˌakamwambˈia, ɟˈe, ˌitatʃukˈua mˈuda ɡˈani maˈono hˈaja jˌatimˈie: maˈono kuhˈusu ðabˈihu ja kˈila sˈiku, uˈasi ˌunaˌosababˈiʃa ukˈiwa, kˌutwalˈiwa kwa mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu, na ɟˈeʃi lˌitakˌalokaɲˈaɡwa tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo.|0
mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌilipokˈuwa nˌinaˌaŋɡalˈia maˈono na kˌuɟarˈibu kˌuelˈewa, mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌalisimˈama mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌefanˈana na mwˌanadˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikasikˈia saˈuti ja mwˌanadˈamu kutˈoka ˈm̩to ulˈai ˌikiˈita, ɡˌabriˈeli, mwambˈie ˈm̩tu hˈuju maˈana ja maˈono hˈaja.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakikˌaribˈia pˈale nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimesimˈama, nˌilioɡˈopa, nˌikaaŋɡˈuka kˌifudifˈudi. ˌakanˌiambˈia, mwˈana wa mwˌanadˈamu, fahˈamu kˌuwa maˈono hˈaja jˌanahˈusu sˈiku za mwˈiʃo.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakinˈena nˈami, nˌilikˈuwa katˌika ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito, hˈuku nˌimelˈala kˌifudifˈudi. ndˈipo ˌalipˌoniɡˈusa na kˌunisˌimamˈiʃa wˈima.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˌitakˌuambˈia jˈale jˌatakˌajotokˈea bˌaadˈaje wakˈati wa ɣaðˈabu, kwa sabˈabu maˈono hˈaja jˌanahˈusu wakˈati wa mwˈiʃo ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa.|0
kondˈoo dˈume mwˌeɲe pˈembe mbˈili ambˈaje ˌulimwˈona ˌanawˌakilˈiʃa wafˈalme wa umˈedi na ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
jˈule bebˈeru mwˌeɲe ɲuˈele ɲˈiŋɡi ni mfˈalme wa ˌujunˈani, nˈajo ˈile pˈembe ndˈefu kˌatikˈati ja mˈatʃo jˌake ni mfˈalme wa kwˈanza.|0
zˈile pˈembe ˈn̩ne zˌilizoˈota badˈala ja ˈile pˈembe ˌilijˌovuɲɟˈika zˌinawˌakilˈiʃa fˈalme ˈn̩ne ambˈazo zˌitatokˈea kutˈoka taˈifa lˈake, lakˈini hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌutakˌaokˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu kˌama ˈule ˌuliˌovuɲɟˈika.|0
katˌika sehˈemu ja mwˈiʃo ja ˌutawˈala wˈao, wakˈati waˈasi wˌatakˌapokˈuwa waˈovu kabˈisa, ˌatainˈuka mfˈalme mwˌeɲe ˈuso mkˈali, alˈije stˈadi wa hˈila.|0
ˌatakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi, lakˈini si kwa uwˈezo wˌake mweɲˈewe. ˌatasˌababˈiʃa ˌuharibˈifu wa kutˈiʃa, na ˌatafˌanikˈiwa kwa tʃotʃˈote ˌanatʃofˈaɲa. ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu mˌaarˈufu na wˈatu wˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˌatasˌababˈiʃa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu ustˈawi, nˌaje ˌataɟˌihesˈabu mweɲˈewe kˌuwa bˈora. wakˈati wˌaɟisˌikiˈapo kˌuwa wˈako salˈama, ˌatawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˈeŋɡi, na kˌuʃindˈana na m̩kˈuu wa wakˈuu. lakˈini ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa, ˌisipokˈuwa si kwa uwˈezo wa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
maˈono kuhˈusu ɟiˈoni na ˌasubˈuhi ambˈajo ˌumepˈewa ni kwˈeli, lakˈini jatˈie muhˈuri maˈono hˈaja, kwa maˈana jˌanahˈusu wakˈati mrˈefu uɟˈao.|0
mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌilikˈuwa nˌimetʃˈoka sˈana, na nˌikalˈala nikˈiwa mɡˈoɲɟua kwa sˈiku kaðˈaa. ndˈipo nˌikaˈamka, nˌikaˈenda kwˈeɲe ʃuɣˈuli za mfˈalme. nˌilifˌaðaˈiʃwa na maˈono hˈajo, nˌami sˌikuwˈeza kˌujaelˈewa.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio mwˈana wa ˌahasuˈero mzalˈiwa wa umˈedi, ambˈaje ˌalifˈaɲua mtawˈala ɟˌuːja ufˈalme wa babˈeli.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wˈake, mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌilielˈewa kˌutokˈana na mˌaandˈiko, kˌuliŋɡˈana na nˈeno la bwˈana ˌalilopˈewa nabˈii jˌeremˈia, kwˌamba ukˈiwa wa jˌerusalˈemu ˌuŋɡetimˈizwa kwa miˈaka sabˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikamɡˌeukˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu na kumsˈihi katˌika maˈombi na dˈua, katˌika kufˈuŋɡa, na kuvˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na kˌuɟipˈaka maɟˈivu.|0
nˌikamwˈomba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu na kutˈubu: ˈee bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu m̩kˈuu na ˌunajetˈiʃa, ˌanajeʃˈika aɡˈano lˈake la upˈendo kwˈao wˌanaompˈenda na kutˈii mˌaaɡˈizo jˈake.|0
tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi na kufˈaɲa mabˈaja. tˌumekˈuwa waˈovu na tˌumeˈasi; tˌumeɡeˈuka mbˈali na mˌaaɡˈizo jˈako na ʃerˈia zˈako.|0
hˌatukˌuwasˌikilˈiza wˌatumˈiʃi wˈako mˌanabˈii, ambˈao kwa ɟˈina lˈako wˌalisˈema na wafˈalme wˈetu, wakˈuu wˈetu, bˈaba zˈetu, na wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
bwˈana, wˌewe ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, lakˈini sˈiku hˌii ja lˈeo tˌumefunˈikwa na aˈibu: tukˈiwa wˌanaˈume wa jˈuda, na wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu, na ˌisraˈeli jˈote, wˈote walˈio karˈibu na walˈio mbˈali, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi zˈote ˌulikˌotutawˈaɲa kwa sabˈabu ja kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kwˈako.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sˌisi na wafˈalme wˈetu, wakˈuu wˈetu na bˈaba zˈetu tˌumefunˈikwa na aˈibu kwa sabˈabu tˌumefˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ni mwˌeɲe rehˈema na ˌanajˌesamˈehe, hˌata iŋɡˈawa tˌumefˈaɲa uˈasi ðˈidi jˈake.|0
hˌatukumtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu wˈala kˌuziʃˈika ʃerˈia ˌalizotˈupa kˌupitˈia kwa wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake mˌanabˈii.|0
ˌisraˈeli jˈote ˌimekosˈea ʃerˈia jˈako na kˌuɡeˈuka mbˈali, nˌao wˌamekatˈaa kˌukutˈii. kwa hˈijo laˈana na viˈapo vja hukˈumu vˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose, mtumˈiʃi wa mˈuŋɡu, vˌimemimˈinwa ɟˈuu jˈetu, kwa sabˈabu tˌumefˈaɲa ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈako.|0
ˌumetimˈiza manˈeno ˌulijosˈema ðˈidi jˈetu na ðˈidi ja wˌatawˈala wˈetu, kwa kulˈeta maˈafa makˈubwa ɟˈuu jˈetu. tʃˈini ja mbˈiŋɡu jˈote kˈamwe hˌapaɟˌatendˈeka kˈitu kˌama kˈile kˌilitʃˌotendˈeka kwa jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌilivjˌoandˈikwa katˌika ʃerˈia ja mˈose, misˈiba hˌii jˈote ˌimekˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈetu, lakˈini hˌatuɟaˈomba faðˈili kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa kˌuɡeˈuka kutˈoka ðˈambi zˈetu na kˌuwa wˌasikˈivu katˌika kwˈeli jˈake.|0
bwˈana hˌakusˈita kulˈeta maˈafa ɟˈuu jˈetu, kwa maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki katˌika kˈila ˌafaɲˈalo; lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo hˌatuɟamtˈii.|0
sˈasa, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, ambˈaje ˌuliwatˈoa wˈatu wˈako mˈisri kwa mkˈono wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, na ambˈaje ˌumeɟˌifaɲˈia ɟˈina lˌinalodˈumu mpˈaka lˈeo, tˌumetˈenda ðˈambi, tˌumefˈaɲa mabˈaja.|0
ˈee bwˈana, wˌewe kwa kadˈiri ja matˈendo jˈako ja hˈaki, ondˈoa hasˈira jˈako na ɣaðˈabu jˈako ɟˌuːja jˌerusalˈemu, ˈm̩ɟi wˈako, mlˈima wˈako mtˌakatˈifu. ðˈambi zˈetu na maˈovu ja bˈaba zˈetu jˌameifˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu na wˈatu wˈako kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa kwa wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌotuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
bˌasi mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, sˈasa sikˈia maˈombi na dˈua ja mtumˈiʃi wˈako. ˈee bwˈana, kwa aɟˈili jˈako ˌaŋɡalˈia kwa hurˈuma ukˈiwa wa mahˈali pˈako pˌatakatˈifu.|0
ˈee mˈuŋɡu, tˈeɡa sikˈio na ˌukasikˈie; fumbˈua mˈatʃo jˈako ˌukaˈone ukˈiwa wa ˈm̩ɟi ˈule wˌeɲe ɟˈina lˈako. hˌatukˌutolˈei maˈombi jˈetu kwa sabˈabu sˌisi tˈuna hˈaki, bˌali kwa sabˈabu ja rehˈema zˈako ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
ˈee bwˈana, sˌikilˈiza! ˈee bwˈana, samˈehe! ˈee bwˈana, sikˈia na ˌukatˈende! kwa aɟˈili jˈako, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ˌusikawˈie, kwa sabˈabu ˈm̩ɟi wˈako na wˈatu wˈako wˌanaˈitwa kwa ɟˈina lˈako.|0
bˈasi, nˌilipokˈuwa bˈado nˌikinˈena na kuˈomba, nˌikiuŋɡˈama ðˈambi jˈaŋɡu na ðˈambi ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, na nˌikifˈaɲa maˈombi jˈaŋɡu kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu kwa aɟˈili ja mlˈima wˌake mtˌakatˈifu.|0
wakˈati nˌilipokˈuwa bˈado katˌika maˈombi, ɡˌabriˈeli, jˈule ˈm̩tu nˌilijekˈuwa nˌimemwˈona katˌika maˈono hˈapo awˈali, ˌaliniɟˈia kwa kˈasi karˈibu wakˈati wa kutˈoa ðabˈihu ja ɟiˈoni.|0
ˌakanˌielimˈiʃa na kˌuniambˈia, dˌaniˈeli, sˈasa nˌimekˈuɟa kukˈupa akˈili na ˌufahˈamu.|0
mˈara ˌulipoˈanza kuˈomba, ɟˈibu lˌilitolˈewa, ambˈalo nˌimekˈuɟa kˌukupˈaʃa habˈari, kwa maˈana wˌewe ˌunapˈendwa sˈana. kwa hˈijo, tˌafakˈari uɟˈumbe hˈuu na ˌuelˈewe maˈono hˈaja.|0
maɟˈuma sabˈini jˌameamrˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wˈako na kwa aɟˈili ja ˈm̩ɟi wˈako mtˌakatˈifu, ˌili kˌumalˈiza makˈosa, kˌukomˈeʃa ðˈambi, kufˈaɲa ˌupatanˈiʃo kwa aɟˈili ja uˈovu, kulˈeta hˈaki ja milˈele, kutˈia muhˈuri maˈono na ˌunabˈii, na pˈia kumtˈia mafˈuta jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu sˈana.|0
uɟˈue na kˌuelˈewa hˈili: ʃˈu kˌutolˈewa kwa ˈamri ja kˌuutˌeŋɡenˈeza na kˌuuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja jˌerusalˈemu mpˈaka kˈuɟa kwa mpˈakwa mafˈuta, alˈije mtawˈala, kˌutakuwˈako maɟˈuma sˈaba na maɟˈuma sitˈini na mawˈili. bˌarabˈara zˌitaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena pamˈoɟa na mˌahandˈaki, lakˈini katˌika wakˈati wa taˈabu.|0
baˌada ja maɟˈuma sitˈini na mawˈili, mpˈakwa mafˈuta ˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali, wˈala hˌatabˈaki na kˈitu. wˈatu wa mtawˈala ˌatakˌajekˈuɟa wˌataˌuharˈibu ˈm̩ɟi pamˈoɟa na mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu. mwˈiʃo ˌutakˈuɟa kˌama mˌafurˈiko: vˈita vˌitaˌendelˈea mpˈaka mwˈiʃo, nˌao ukˈiwa ˌumeamrˈiwa.|0
mtawˈala hˈujo ˌataθˌibitˈiʃa aɡˈano na wˈatu wˈeŋɡi kwa ɟˈuma mˈoɟa. kˌatikˈati ja ɟˈuma hˌilo ˌatakomˈeʃa ðabˈihu na sadˈaka. mahˈali pa ðabˈihu katˌika hekˈalu ˌatasˌimamˈiʃa tʃukˈizo la ˌuharibˈifu, hˌadi mwˈiʃo ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa ˌutakˌapomimˈinwa ɟˈuu jˌake jˌeje ˌaletˈaje ˌuharibˈifu.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa tˈatu wa ˌutawˈala wa korˈeʃi mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi, dˌaniˈeli ambˈaje ˌaliˈitwa bˌelteʃˈaza ˌalipˈewa ˌufunˈuo. uɟˈumbe wˌake ˌulikˈuwa kwˈeli, nˌao ˌulihˈusu vˈita vikˈubwa. ˌufahˈamu wa uɟˈumbe ˌulimɟˈia katˌika maˈono.|0
wakˈati hˈuo, mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌikaˌombolˈeza kwa maɟˈuma matˈatu.|0
sikˈula tʃakˈula kizˈuri; ɲˈama wˈala divˈai hˌavikuɡˈusa midˈomo jˈaŋɡu; nˌami sˌikuɟipˈaka mafˈuta kˈamwe mpˈaka maɟˈuma matˈatu jˌalipˌotimˈia.|0
kwˈeɲe sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kwˈanza, nˌilipokˈuwa nˌimesimˈama kwˈeɲe ukˈiŋɡo wa ˈm̩to mkˈubwa hˌidekˈeli.|0
nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu, na mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌalikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa mavˈazi ja kitˈani na mʃˈipi wa ðahˈabu sˈafi kutˈoka ufˈazi kˌiunˈoni mwˈake.|0
mwˈili wˌake ˌulikˈuwa kˌama kˈito tʃa zˌabaraɟˈadi sˈafi, ˈuso wˌake kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi, mˈatʃo jˌake kˌama mwˈali wa mˈoto, mikˈono jˌake na miɡˈuu jˌake kˌama m̩ŋɡˈao wa ʃˈaba ˌilijˌosuɡulˈiwa sˈana, nˈajo saˈuti jˌake kˌama ja umˈati mkˈubwa wa wˈatu.|0
mˌimi dˌaniˈeli, ni mˌimi pˈeke jˈaŋɡu nˌilijeˈona hˈajo maˈono; wˈatu wˌaliokˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˌami hˌawakˌujaˈona, lakˈini wˌaliɡubˈikwa na hˈofu kˈuu, hˌata wˌakakimbˈia na kˌuɟifˈitʃa.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌiliˈatʃwa pˈeke jˈaŋɡu, nˌikikˌodolˈea mˈatʃo maˈono hˈajo makˈubwa; sˌikubakˈiwa na ŋɡˈuvu, na rˈaŋɡi ja ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ˌikabˌadilˈika kˌama ˌalijekˈufa, nˌikakˈosa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikamsikˈia ˌakisˈema, nˌami nˌilipokˈuwa nˌikimsˌikilˈiza, nˌikalˈala kˌifudifˈudi, nˌikapˈatwa na ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito.|0
ˌakasˈema, dˌaniˈeli, wˌewe ˈm̩tu ˌupendwˈaje sˈana, fikˈiri kwa makˈini manˈeno nˌinajokwˈenda kunˈena nˌawe sˈasa; simˈama wˈima, kwa maˈana sˈasa nˌimetˈumwa kwˈako. nˌaje ˌalipˌoniambˈia hˈaja, nˌikasimˈama nˌikitˌetemˈeka.|0
ndˈipo ˌakaˌendelˈea kusˈema, dˌaniˈeli, ˌusioɡˈope. ʃˈu sˈiku ja kwˈanza ˌulipotˈia mˈojo wˈako ˌili kupˈata ˌufahˈamu na kˌuɟiɲˌeɲekˈeza mbˈele ja mˈuŋɡu wˈako, manˈeno jˈako jˌalisikˈiwa, nˌami nˌimekˈuɟa ˌili kuɟˈibu manˈeno jˈako.|0
lakˈini m̩kˈuu wa ufˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi ˌalinipˈiŋɡa kwa sˈiku ˌiʃirˈini na mˈoɟa. ndˈipo mˌikaˈeli, mmˈoɟa wa mˌalaˈika wakˈuu, ˌalikˈuɟa kˌunisˌaidˈia, kwa sabˈabu nˌilikˈuwa nˌimezˌuilˈiwa hˌuko na mfˈalme wa ˌuaɟˈemi.|0
sˈasa nˌimekˈuɟa kˌukuˌelezˈea mˈambo jˌatakˌajowˌatokˈea wˈatu wˈako wakˈati uɟˈao, kwa maˈana maˈono hˈajo jˌanahˈusu wakˈati ambˈao hˌauɟˈaɟa bˈado.|0
ˌalipokˈuwa ˌakinˌielezˈea hˈaja, nˌilisuɟˈudu ˈuso wˈaŋɡu ukˈiwa ˌumeˌelekˈea tʃˈini, nikˈawa bˈubu.|0
ndˈipo mmˈoɟa ˌalijˌeonekˈana kˌama mwˌanadˈamu ˌakaniɡˈusa midˈomo jˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌikafuŋɡˈua kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, nˌikaˈanza kunˈena. nˌikamwambˈia jˈule ˌalijˌesimˈama mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, nˌimepˈatwa na huzˈuni kˈubwa kwa sabˈabu ja maˈono hˈaja, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌimeiʃˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌimi mtumˈiʃi wˈako nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌuzuŋɡˈumza na wˈewe? ŋɡˈuvu zˈaŋɡu zˌimenˌiiʃˈia hˌata nˌinaʃˈindwa kˌupumˈua.|0
tˈena jˈule ˌalijˌeonekˈana kˌama mwˌanadˈamu ˌakaniɡˈusa na kˌunitˈia ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ˌakasˈema, ˈee ˈm̩tu ˌupendwˈaje sˈana, ˌusioɡˈope. amˈani ˈiwe kwˈako! ˈuwe na ŋɡˈuvu sˈasa; ɟˈipe ŋɡˈuvu. ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza nˈami, nˌilipˈata ŋɡˈuvu, nˌikasˈema, nˈena, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ˌumenˈipa ŋɡˈuvu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, ˌunaɟˈua kwa nˈini nˌimekuɟˈia? sˈasa hˈivi nˌitarˈudi kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja m̩kˈuu wa ˌuaɟˈemi, nˌami nˌikiˈenda, m̩kˈuu wa ˌujunˈani ˌatakˈuɟa.|0
lakˈini kwˈanza nˌitakˌuambˈia kˈile kˌilitʃˌoandˈikwa katˌika kitˈabu tʃa kwˈeli. hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌanajˌenisˌaidˈia ðˈidi jˈao ˌisipokˈuwa mˌikaˈeli, m̩kˈuu wˈenu.|0
nˌami katˌika mwˈaka wa kwˈanza wa ˌutawˈala wa darˈio mmˈedi, nˌilisimˈama kˌumsaidˈia na kumlˈinda..|0
sˈasa bˈasi, nˌinakˌuambˈia kwˈeli: wafˈalme watˈatu zaˈidi wˌatatokˈea ˌuaɟˈemi, kˈiʃa ˌatatokˈea mfˈalme wa ˈn̩ne, ambˈaje ˌatakˈuwa taɟˈiri sˈana kulˈiko weŋɡˈine wˈote. wakˈati ˌatakˌapokˈuwa ˌamekwˈiʃa kˌuɟipatˈia ŋɡˈuvu kwa ˌutaɟˈiri wˈake, ˌatamtʃotʃˈea kˈila mmˈoɟa ðˈidi ja ufˈalme wa ˌujunˈani.|0
ndˈipo mfˈalme mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˌatatokˈea, ambˈaje ˌatatawˈala kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi na kufˈaɲa ˌanavjopˈenda.|0
baˌada ja kˌuɟitokˈeza, mˈilki jˌake ˌitavˈuɲɟua na kˌuɡawaɲˈika katˌika pˈande ˈn̩ne za mbiŋɡˈuni. hˌautakwˈenda kwa wazˈao wˈake, wˈala hˌautakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu ˌalizˌotumˈia, kwa sabˈabu mˈilki jˌake ˌitaŋɡolˈewa na kupˈewa weŋɡˈine.|0
mfˈalme wa kusˈini ˌatakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu, lakˈini mmˈoɟa wa mˌaɟemadˈari wˌake ˌatakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu zaˈidi kulˈiko mfˈalme, nˌaje ˌatatawˈala ufˈalme wˌake mweɲˈewe kwa ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi.|0
mmˈoɟa kutˈoka ɟamˈaa ja hˈujo bˈinti ˌatainˈuka na kˌutʃukˈua nafˈasi jˈake. ˌataʃˌambulˈia maɟˈeʃi ja mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika ŋɡˈome jˈake; ˌatapiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈao nˌaje ˌataʃˈinda.|0
tˈena ˌataitwˈaa miˈuŋɡu jˈao, viɲˈaɡo vjˈao vja tʃˈuma, na vˈitu vjˈao vja θamˈani vja fˈeða na ðahˈabu, na kˌuvitʃukˈua hˌadi mˈisri. kwa miˈaka kˈaða ˌatamwˈatʃa mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini bˌila kˌumsumbˈua.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini ˌataʃˌambulˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja mfˈalme wa kusˈini, lakˈini ˌatarˈudi ɲˈuma hˌadi kwˈeɲe ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
wˈana wa mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini wˌataɟˌiandˈaa kwa vˈita na kˌukusˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, ambˈalo lˌitafaɡˈia ˈn̩tʃi kˌama mˌafurˈiko jˌasijˌozuilˈika na kˌuendelˈea na vˈita hˌadi kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome ja mfˈalme wa kusˈini.|0
kˈiʃa mfˈalme wa kusˈini ˌatatˈoka kwa ɣaðˈabu na kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini, ambˈaje ˌataˈunda ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa, lakˈini lˌitaʃˈindwa.|0
wakˈati ɟˈeʃi lˌitakˌapokˈuwa lˌimetʃˌukulˈiwa, mfˈalme wa kusˈini ˌataɟˈawa na kibˈuri na ˌatatʃˈiɲɟa maˈelfu mˈeŋɡi, hˌata hˈivjo hˌatabˈaki na uʃˈindi.|0
kwa maˈana mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini ˌatakusˈaɲa ɟˈeʃi ɟiŋɡˈine kˈubwa kulˈiko lˈile la kwˈanza; na baˌada ja miˈaka kˈaða, ˌatasˈoŋɡa mbˈele na ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa ˈm̩no lˌililˌoandalˈiwa vizˈuri.|0
katˌika ɲakˈati hˈizo wˈeŋɡi wˌatainˈuka ðˈidi ja mfˈalme wa kusˈini. wˈatu wˌeɲe ɣasˈia mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈako mweɲˈewe wˌataˈasi ˌili kˌutimˈiza maˈono, lakˈini bˌila mˌafanikˈio.|0
