ndˈipo mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini ˌatakˈuɟa na kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka ˈm̩ɟi kwa maɟˈeʃi, na kˌuutˈeka ˈm̩ɟi wa ŋɡˈome. maɟˈeʃi ja kusˈini jˌatakˈosa ŋɡˈuvu za kˌujazuˈia; nˈaam, hˌata vikˈosi vjˈao vja askˈari vilˈivjo bˈora zaˈidi, hˌavitakˈuwa na ŋɡˈuvu ja kˌuwakabˈili.|0
baˌada ja hˈili ˌatazˌiɡeukˈia ŋɡˈome za ˈn̩tʃi jˌake mweɲˈewe, lakˈini ˌataɟikwˈaa na kˌuaŋɡˈuka, wˈala hˌataˌonekˈana tˈena.|0
ˌatakˌajetawˈala baˌada jˌake ˌatamtˈuma mtˈoza uʃˈuru ˌili kˌudumˈiʃa fahˈari ja kifˈalme. hˌata hˈivjo, baˌada ja miˈaka mitʃˈatʃe ˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa, lakˈini si katˌika hasˈira wˈala katˌika vˈita.|0
ˌatakˌajetawˈala baˌada jˌake ˌatakˈuwa ˈm̩tu wa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa ambˈaje hˌaɟapˈewa heʃˈima ja kifˈalme. ˌataˌuvamˈia ufˈalme wakˈati wˈatu wˌake wˌanapˌoɟiˈona wˈako salˈama, nˌaje ˌatautwˈaa kwa hˈila.|0
ndˈipo ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa lˌitafˌaɡilˈiwa mbˈele jˈake; ɟˈeʃi pamˈoɟa na m̩kˈuu mmˈoɟa wa aɡˈano wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
baˌada ja kufˈaɲa mˌapatˈano nˈaje, ˌatatˈenda kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, na ˌakitumˈia wˈatu watʃˈatʃe tu ˌataiŋɡˈia mˌadarakˈani.|0
wakˈati maɟˈimbo jalˈijo taɟˈiri sˈana jˌanaɟiˈona salˈama, ˌatajˌavamˈia, nˌaje ˌatafˌanikˈiʃa kˈile ambˈatʃo bˈaba zˌake wˈala bˈabu zˌake hˌawakuwˈeza. ˌataɡˈawa ɲˈara, matˈeka na ˌutaɟˈiri mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌafuˈasi wˈake. ˌatafˈaɲa hˈila ja kˌupindˈua mˈiɟi jˌeɲe mabˈoma, lakˈini kwa mˈuda mfˈupi tˈu.|0
wˈale wˌanaokˈula kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ruzˈuku za mfˈalme wˌataɟarˈibu kˌumwaŋɡamˈiza; ɟˈeʃi lˈake lˌitafˌaɡilˈiwa mbˈali, nˌao wˈeŋɡi wˌatakˈufa vitˈani.|0
wafˈalme hˈawa wawˈili, miˈojo jˈao ikˈiwa ˌimekˌusudˈia mabˈaja, wˌatakˈeti kwˈeɲe mˈeza mˈoɟa na kˌudaŋɡaɲˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, lakˈini pasˈipo faˈida, kwa sabˈabu bˈado mwˈiʃo ˌutakˈuɟa katˌika wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa.|0
mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini ˌatarˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake na ˌutaɟˈiri mwˈiŋɡi, lakˈini ˌatakˈuwa ˌameukˈaza mˈojo wˌake kiɲˈume na aɡˈano tˌakatˈifu. ˌatatʃukˈua hatˈua ðˈidi ja hˌilo aɡˈano, kˈiʃa ˌatarˈudi ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa, ˌatavamˈia tˈena kusˈini, lakˈini wakˈati hˈuu mˌatokˈeo jˌake jˌatakˈuwa tˌofaˈuti na jˈale ja wakˈati wa kwˈanza.|0
mˈeli za ˈn̩tʃi ja kitˈimu zˌitampˈiŋɡa, nˌaje ˌatavuɲɟˈika mˈojo. ndˈipo ˌatarˈudi ɲˈuma na kutˈoa wˈazi hasˈira jˌake ðˈidi ja aɡˈano tˌakatˈifu. ˌatarˈudi na kˌuoɲˈeʃa faðˈili kwa wˈale wˌaliatʃˈao aɡˈano tˌakatˈifu.|0
maɟˈeʃi jˌake jˌeɲe silˈaha jˌatainˈuka ˌili kˌunaɟˈisi ŋɡˈome ja hekˈalu, na kˌuondolˈea mbˈali sadˈaka ja kˌuteketˈezwa ja kˈila sˈiku. ndˈipo wˌatalˌisimamˈiʃa tʃukˈizo la ˌuharibˈifu lˌisabˌabiʃˈalo ukˈiwa.|0
kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu ˌatapotˈoʃa wˈale wˌaliˌonaɟˈisi aɡˈano, lakˈini wˈatu wˌanaomɟˈua mˈuŋɡu wˌao wˌatampˈiŋɡa kwa ˌuθabˈiti.|0
wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌatawˌafundˈiʃa wˈeŋɡi, iŋɡˈawa kwa kitˈambo wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa ˌau kutʃˈomwa mˈoto, ˌau kˌukamˈatwa ˌau kufˈaɲua matˈeka.|0
wˌatakˌapoaŋɡˈuka, wˌatapokˈea msaˈada kidˈoɡo, nˌao wˈeŋɡi ambˈao si wˌaaminˈifu wˌatauŋɡˈana nˈao.|0
baˈaði ja wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌataɟikwˈaa, ˌili wawˈeze kˌusafˈiʃwa, kˌutakˈaswa na kufˈaɲua wasˈio na wˈaa mpˈaka wakˈati wa mwˈiʃo, kwa maˈana bˈado lˌitakˈuɟa kwa wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa.|0
hˌataoɲˈeʃa heʃˈima kwa miˈuŋɡu ja bˈaba zˌake ˌau kwa jˈule ˌalijˌetamanˈiwa na wˌanawˈake, wˈala hˌataɟˈali mˈuŋɡu jejˈote, bˌali ˌataɟikwˈeza mweɲˈewe ɟˈuu jˈao wˈote.|0
badˈala ja kˌuwaɟˈali miˈuŋɡu, ˌataheʃˈimu mˈuŋɡu wa ŋɡˈome; mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje hˌakuɟˌulikˈana na bˈaba zˌake n̩dˈije ˌatamheʃˈimu kwa ðahˈabu na fˈeða, kwa vˈito vja θamˈani na zawˈadi za θamˈani kˈubwa.|0
ˌataʃˌambulˈia ŋɡˈome zˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ˈm̩no kwa msaˈada wa mˈuŋɡu wa kiɡˈeni nˌaje ˌatawˌaheʃˈimu sˈana wˈale wˌatakˌaomkubˈali jˈeje. ˌatawafˈaɲa wˌatawˈala ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈeŋɡi, na ˌataɡˈawa ˈn̩tʃi kwa ɣarˈama.|0
katˌika wakˈati wa mwˈiʃo, mfˈalme wa kusˈini ˌatapiɡˈana nˌaje vˈita, nˌaje mfˈalme wa kˌaskazˈini ˌatamʃˌambulˈia kwa maɡˈari ja vˈita, askˈari wapˈanda farˈasi, na idˈadi kˈubwa ja mˈeli. ˌatavamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ɲˈiŋɡi na kˌuzikˈumba ˈn̩tʃi hˈizo kˌama mˌafurˈiko.|0
pˈia ˌataˌivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌupendˈeza. ˈn̩tʃi ɲˈiŋɡi zˌitapˌindulˈiwa, bˌali edˈomu, moˈabu na vˌioŋɡˈozi wa amˈoni wˌataˌokolˈewa kutˈoka mkˈono wˈake.|0
ˌatapanˈua mamlˈaka jˌake ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ɲˈiŋɡi; hˌata mˈisri hˌaitˌaepˈuka.|0
ˌatamilˈiki hazˈina za ðahˈabu, fˈeða na ˌutaɟˈiri wˈote wa mˈisri, pamˈoɟa na wˌalibˈia na wakˈuʃi kwa kˌuɟisˌalimˈiʃa.|0
lakˈini tˌaarˈifa kutˈoka mˌaʃarˈiki na kˌaskazˈini zˌitamʃtˈua, nˌaje ˌataondˈoka kwa ɣaðˈabu ɲˈiŋɡi ˌili kˌuaŋɡamˈiza na kˌuharˈibu kabˈisa wˈeŋɡi.|0
ˌatasimˈika hˈema zˌake za ufˈalme kˈati ja bahˈari na mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu wa kˌupendˈeza. hˌata hˈivjo, ˌatafikˈia mwˈiʃo wˈake, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajemsˌaidˈia.|0
katˌika wakˈati hˈuo mˌikaˈeli, mtawˈala m̩kˈuu ambˈaje hˌuwalˈinda wˈatu wˈako, ˌatainˈuka. kˌutakuwˈako wakˈati wa taˈabu ambˈao hˌauɟˌatokˈea ʃˈu mwˈanzo wa mˌataˈifa hˌadi wakˈati hˈuo. lakˈini wakˈati hˈuo, wˈatu wˈako, kˈila mmˈoɟa ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake lˌitakˈutwa lˌimeandˈikwa kwˈeɲe kitˈabu, ˌataˌokolˈewa.|0
wˈeŋɡi ambˈao wˌamelˈala kwˈeɲe mavˈumbi wˌataˈamka, baˈaði jˈao kwa uzˈima wa milˈele, weŋɡˈine kwa aˈibu na kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa milˈele.|0
wˈale wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌataŋɡˈaa kˌama mwˈaŋɡa wa mbˈiŋɡu, nˌao wˈale ambˈao hˌuwaoŋɡˈoza wˈeŋɡi kutˈenda hˈaki, wˌataŋɡˈaa kˌama ɲˈota milˈele na milˈele.|0
lakˈini wˌewe dˌaniˈeli, jafˈuŋɡe na kˌujatˈia muhˈuri manˈeno ja kitˈabu hˈiki mpˈaka wakˈati wa mwˈiʃo. wˈeŋɡi wˌatakwˈenda hˈuku na hˌuko, na mˌaarˈifa jˌataˌoŋɡezˈeka.|0
ndˈipo mˌimi dˌaniˈeli nˌikaˌaŋɡalˈia, nˈako mbˈele jˈaŋɡu wˌalisimˈama weŋɡˈine wawˈili, mmˈoɟa katˌika ukˈiŋɡo hˈuu wa ˈm̩to, na mwiŋɡˈine ukˈiŋɡo wa pˈili wa ˈm̩to.|0
mmˈoɟa wˌao ˌakasˈema na jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani, ˌalijekˈuwa ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to, ɟˈe, ˌitatʃukˈua mˈuda ɡˈani kˈabla mˈambo hˈaja ja kˌuʃaŋɡˈaza hˌajaɟˌatimˈizwa.|0
kˈiʃa ˈm̩tu jˈule ˌalijevˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kitˈani, ˌalijekˈuwa ɟˌuːja mˈaɟi ja ˈm̩to, ˌakainˈua mkˈono wˌake wa kuˈume na mkˈono wˌake wa kuʃˈoto kˌuelekˈea mbiŋɡˈuni, nˌami nˌikamsikˈia ˌakiˈapa kwa ɟˈina lˈake jˌeje ˌaiʃˈije milˈele, ˌakisˈema, ˌitakˈuwa wakˈati, ɲakˈati mbˈili, na nˈusu wakˈati. ŋɡˈuvu za wˈatu wˌatakatˈifu zˌitakˌapokˈuwa zˌimevˈuɲɟua kabˈisa, ndˈipo mˈambo hˈaja jˈote jˌatakˌapotimˈizwa.|0
nˌilisikˈia, lakˈini sˌikuelˈewa. kwa hˈijo nˌikaulˈiza, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu, mˌatokˈeo ja hˈaja jˈote jˌatakˈuwa nˈini.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, dˌaniˈeli, enˈenda zˈako, kwa sabˈabu manˈeno hˈaja jˌamefˈuŋɡwa na kutˈiwa muhˈuri mpˈaka wakˈati wa mwˈiʃo.|0
wˈeŋɡi wˌatatakˈaswa, na kˌuondolˈewa mawˈaa na kufˈaɲua sˈafi, lakˈini waˈovu wˌataˌendelˈea kˌuwa waˈovu. hakˈuna mmˈoɟa wa waˈovu ˌatakˌajefahˈamu, lakˈini wˈale wˌeɲe hekˈima wˌatafahˈamu.|0
ʃˈu wakˈati ˈule wa kˌukomˈeʃwa ðabˈihu ja kˈila sˈiku na kˌusimamˈiʃwa kwa tʃukˈizo la ˌuharibˈifu, kˌutakuwˈako sˈiku mˈoɟa,mˌiambˈilinˌa tisˈini.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, enˈenda zˈako mpˈaka mwˈiʃo. ˌutapumzˈika, nˌawe ndˈipo mwˈiʃo wa hˈizo sˈiku ˌutafufˈuka ˌili kˌuupokˈea urˈiθi ˌuliˌowekˈewa.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililomɟˈia hosˈea mwˈana wa beˈeri wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa uzˈia, joθˈamu, ahˈazi na hˌezekˈia, wafˈalme wa jˈuda, na wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoˈaʃi, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
wakˈati bwˈana ˌalipoˈanza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza kˌupitˈia hosˈea, bwˈana ˌalimwambˈia, nˈenda ˌukaɟˌitwalˈie mwanˈamke wa uzˈinzi na watˈoto wa uzˈinzi, kwa sabˈabu ˈn̩tʃi ˈina hatˈia ja uzˈinzi wa kˌupindukˈia kwa kumwˈatʃa bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌalimwˈoa ɡomˈeri bˈinti dˌiblaˈimu, nˌaje ˌakatʃukˈua mˈimba na kˌumzalˈia hosˈea mwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia hosˈea, mwˈite jˌezreˈeli, kwa kˌuwa kitˈambo kidˈoɡo nˌitaˌiaðˈibu ɲˈumba ja jˈehu kwa aɟˈili ja mˌauˈaɟi ja kˈule jˌezreˈeli, nˌami nˌitaˌukomˈeʃa ufˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile nˌitavˈuɲɟa upˈinde wa ˌisraˈeli katˌika bˈonde la jˌezreˈeli.|0
ɡomˈeri ˌakatʃukˈua tˈena mˈimba ˌakamzˈaa bˈinti. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia hosˈea, mwˈite lˈo ruhˈama, kwa maˈana sˌitaoɲˈeʃa tˈena upˈendo kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, kwˌamba nisˈiɟe kabˈisa nˌikawˌasamˈehe.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˌitaoɲˈeʃa upˈendo kwa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda, nˌami nˌitawˌaokˈoa si kwa upˈinde, upˈaŋɡa ˌau vˈita, wˈala kwa farˈasi na wapˈanda farˈasi, bˌali kwa ɲɟˈia ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
baˌada ja ɡomˈeri kˌumwatʃˈiʃa lˈo ruhˈama kuɲˈoɲa, ɡomˈeri ˌalipˈata mwˈana mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, mwˈite lˈo ˈami kwa maˈana nˈiɲi si wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌami si mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
hˌata hˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mtʃˈaŋɡa kˈando ja bahˈari, ambˈao hˌauwˈezi kˌupimˈika wˈala kˌuhesabˈiwa. mahˈali pˈale wˌalipˌoambˈiwa, nˈiɲi si wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, wˌao wˌataˈitwa wˈana wa mˈuŋɡu alˈije hˈai..|0
wˈatu wa jˈuda na wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌataˌuŋɡanˈiʃwa tˈena, nˌao wˌatamtʃaɡˈua kˌioŋɡˈozi mmˈoɟa nˌao wˌatakwˈea watˈoke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja jˌezreˈeli ˌitakˈuwa kˈuu sˈana.|0
wˌaambˈie ndˈuɡu zˈako, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, na pˈia wˌaambˈie dˈada zˈako, wapˈendwa wˈaŋɡu..|0
mkˌemeˈeni mˈama jˈenu, mkˌemeˈeni, kwa maˈana jˌeje si ˈm̩ke wˈaŋɡu, nˌami si mˈume wˈake. ˌaondˈoe sˈura ja uzˈinzi katˌika ˈuso wˌake na uzˈinzi kˈati ja matˈiti jˈake.|0
kˌama sˈivjo nˌitamvˈua ŋɡˈuo zˌake ˈawe ˈutʃi na kumwˈatʃa ˈutʃi kˌama sˈiku ˈile ˌalijˌozalˈiwa. nˌitamfˈaɲa kˌama ɟˈaŋɡwa, nˌitamɡeˈuza ˈawe ˈn̩tʃi ja kˈiu, nˌami nˌitamuˈua kwa kˈiu.|0
sˌitaoɲˈeʃa upˈendo wˈaŋɡu kwa watˈoto wˈake, kwa sabˈabu ni watˈoto wa uzˈinzi.|0
mˈama jˈao ˌamekˈosa ˌuaminˈifu na ˌamewˌatʃukˈua mˈimba katˌika aˈibu. ɡomˈeri ˌalisˈema, nˌitawˌaendˈea wapˈenzi wˈaŋɡu, ambˈao hunˈipa tʃakˈula tʃˈaŋɡu na mˈaɟi jˈaŋɡu, sˈufu jˈaŋɡu na kitˈani jˈaŋɡu, mafˈuta jˈaŋɡu na kˌiɲuˈaɟi tʃˈaŋɡu..|0
kwa hˈijo mˌimi mˈuŋɡu nˌitaˌizuˈia ɲɟˈia jˌake kwa vitʃˈaka vja miˈiba, nˌitamɟeŋɡˈea ukˈuta ˌili kwˌamba ˌasiwˈeze kutˈoka.|0
ɡomˈeri ˌatawˌafuatˈia wapˈenzi wˌake lakˈini hˌatawapˈata; ˌatawˌatafˈuta lakˈini hˌatawapˈata. kˈiʃa ˌatasˈema, nˌitarˈudi kwa mˈume wˈaŋɡu kˌama kwˈanza, kwa maˈana nˌilikˈuwa na hˈali ɲɟˈema zaˈidi kulˈiko sˈasa..|0
ɡomˈeri hˌaɟakubˈali kˌuwa mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijˈempa nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta, nˌilijˌemwoŋɡezˈea fˈeða na ðahˈabu wˌalijˌoitumˈia kwa kˌumtumikˈia baˈali.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitatʃukˈua nafˈaka jˈaŋɡu wakˈati ˌitakˌapokomˈaa na divˈai jˈaŋɡu ˈm̩pja wakˈati ˌitakˌapokˈuwa tajˈari. nˌitamɲaŋɡˈaɲa sˈufu jˈaŋɡu na kitˈani jˈaŋɡu ˌilijˌokusudˈiwa kˌufunˈika ˈutʃi wˈake.|0
bˌasi sˈasa nˌitaˌufunˈua ˌufisˈadi wˌake mbˈele ja wapˈenzi wˈake; hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajemtˈoa mˌikonˈoni mwˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌitakomˈeʃa furˈaha na matʃˈeko jˌake jˈote: sˌikukˈuu zˌake za mwˈaka, sˌikukˈuu za mˌiandˈamo ja mwˈezi, sˈiku zˌake za sabˈato, sˌikukˈuu zˌake zˈote zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa.|0
nˌitaˌiharˈibu mˌizabˈibu jˌake na mitˈini jˈake, ambˈajo ˌalisˈema jˌalikˈuwa malˈipo jˌake kutˈoka kwa wapˈenzi wˈake; nˌitaifˈaɲa kˌuwa kitʃˈaka, nˌao waɲˈama pˈori wˌataˈila.|0
nˌitamwaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja sˈiku ˌalizˌowafˌukizˈia uvˈumba mˌabaˈali; ˌalipˌoɟipˈamba kwa pˈete na kwa vˈito vja θamˈani, na kˌuwaendˈea wapˈenzi wˈake, lakˈini mˌimi ˌalinˌisahˈau, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo sˈasa nˌitamʃawˈiʃi; nˌitamwoŋɡˈoza hˌadi ɟaŋɡwˈani na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje kwa upˈole.|0
hˌuko nˌitamrˌudiʃˈia maʃˈamba jˌake ja mˌizabˈibu, nˌami nˌitalifˈaɲa bˈonde la akˈori mlˈaŋɡo wa mˌatumaˈini. hˌuko ˌataˈimba kˌama ˌalivjofˈaɲa katˌika sˈiku za uɟˈana wˈake, kˌama sˈiku zˈile ˌalizotˈoka mˈisri.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana, ˌutaniˈita mˌimi mˈume wˈaŋɡu; hˌutaniˈita tˈena mˌimi bwˈana wˈaŋɡu..|0
nˌitaondˈoa maɟˈina ja mˌabaˈali kutˈoka mˌidomˈoni mwˈake, wˈala hˌataˈomba tˈena kwa maɟˈina jˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile nˌitafˈaɲa aɡˈano kwa aɟˈili jˈao na waɲˈama wa kondˈeni, na ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani, na viˈumbe vˈile vˌitambaˈavjo arðˈini. upˈinde, upˈaŋɡa na vˈita, nˌitaˌondolˈea mbˈali katˌika ˈn̩tʃi, ˌili kwˌamba wˈote wawˈeze kukˈaa salˈama.|0
nˌitakupˈosa ˈuwe wˈaŋɡu milˈele; nˌitakupˈosa kwa ˌuadilˈifu na hˈaki, kwa upˈendo na hurˈuma.|0
nˌitakupˈosa kwa ˌuaminˈifu, nˌawe ˌutamkubˈali bwˈana.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile nˌitaɟˈibu, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitaɟˈibu kwa ˈaŋɡa, nˈazo ˈaŋɡa zˌitaɟˈibu kwa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi ˌitaɟˈibu kwa nafˈaka, divˈai ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta, nˈavjo vˌitaɟˈibu kwa jˌezreˈeli.|0
nˌitampˈanda katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe; nˌami nˌitaoɲˈeʃa pˈendo lˈaŋɡu kwˈake jˈule ambˈaje nˌilimwˈita, si mpˈenzi wˈaŋɡu.  nˌitawˌaambˈia wˈale wˌalioˈitwa, sˈio wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˈiɲi ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu; nˌao wˌatasˈema, wˌewe ndˈiwe mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu..|0
bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, nˈenda, ˌukaoɲˈeʃe upˈendo wˈako kwa ˈm̩ke wˈako tˈena, iŋɡˈawa ˌamepˈendwa na mwiŋɡˈine nˌaje ni mzˈinzi. mpˈende kˌama bwˈana ˌapendˈavjo wˌaisraˈeli, iŋɡˈawa wˌanaɡˌeukˈia miˈuŋɡu miŋɡˈine na kupˈenda mikˈate mitˈamu ja zabˈibu kˈavu ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu.|0
bˌasi nˌilimnunˈua hˈujo mwanˈamke kwa ʃekˈeli kˈumi na tˈano za fˈeða, pˈia kwa kiˈasi kˌama tʃa homˈeri mˈoɟa na nˈusu ja ʃajˈiri.|0
kˈiʃa nˌilimwambˈia, ˌutaˈiʃi nˌami kwa sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi, hupˈaswi kˌuwa kahˈaba ˌau kˌuwa na ˌuhusiˈano wa karˈibu na ˈm̩tu jejˈote, nˌami nˌitaˈiʃi na wˈewe.|0
kwa maˈana wˌaisraˈeli wˌataˈiʃi sˈiku ɲˈiŋɡi bˌila kˌuwa na mfˈalme wˈala m̩kˈuu, bˌila kˌuwa na ðabˈihu wˈala mˈawe mˌatakatˈifu, bˌila kˌisibˈau wˈala sanˈamu.|0
bˌaadˈaje wˌaisraˈeli wˌatarˈudi na kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao na daˈudi mfˈalme wˈao. wˌatakˈuɟa wˌakitˌetemˈeka kwa bwˈana na kwa barˈaka zˌake katˌika sˈiku za mwˈiʃo.|0
sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˌaisraˈeli, kwa sabˈabu bwˈana anˈalo ʃtˈaka ðˈidi jˈenu nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi: hakˈuna ˌuaminˈifu, hakˈuna upˈendo, hakˈuna kumɟˈua mˈuŋɡu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
kˈuna kˌulaˈani tˈu, uˈoŋɡo na ˌuuˈaɟi, wˈizi na uzˈinzi, bˌila kˌuwa na mipˈaka, nˌao ˌumwaɡˈaɟi dˈamu mmˈoɟa baˌada ja mwiŋɡˈine.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˌii ˈn̩tʃi hˌuombolˈeza, wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani mwˈake wˌanaðˌoofˈika, waɲˈama wa kondˈeni, ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini wˌanakˈufa.|0
lakˈini ˈm̩tu awˈaje jˈote na ˌasilˈete ʃtˈaka, ˈm̩tu jejˈote na ˌasimlaˈumu mwenzˈake, kwa maˈana wˈatu wˈako ni kˌama wˈale wˌaletˈao maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja kuhˈani.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanaˌaŋɡamˈizwa kwa kukˈosa mˌaarˈifa, kwa kˌuwa wˌewe ˌumejˌakatˈaa mˌaarˈifa, mˌimi nˌami nˌitakˌukatˈaa wˌewe usˈiwe kuhˈani kwˈaŋɡu mˈimi; kwa kˌuwa ˌumeˈatʃa kˌuiɟˈali ʃerˈia ja mˈuŋɡu wˈako mˌimi nˌami sˌitawaɟˈali watˈoto wˈako.|0
kadˈiri mˌakuhˈani wˌalivjˌooŋɡezˈeka, ndˈivjo wˌalivjozˈidi kutˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, wˌalibˌadilˈiʃa ˌutukˈufu wˌao kwa kˈitu tʃa aˈibu.|0
hˌuɟilˈiʃa ðˈambi za wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌupendˈezwa na uˈovu wˈao.|0
hˌata ˌitakˈuwa: kˌama walˈivjo wˈatu, ndˈivjo walˈivjo mˌakuhˈani. nˌitawˌaaðˈibu wˈote wawˈili kwa aɟˈili ja ɲɟˈia zˈao na kˌuwalˈipa kwa matˈendo jˈao.|0
wˌatakˈula lakˈini hˌawataʃˈiba; wˌataɟˌiiŋɡˈiza katˌika ˌukahˈaba lakˈini hˌawatˌaoŋɡezˈeka, kwa sabˈabu wˌamemwˈatʃa bwˈana na kˌuɟiiŋɡˈiza weɲˈewe.|0
katˌika ˌukahˈaba, divˈai ja zamˈani na divˈai ˈm̩pja, ambˈavjo hˌuondˈoa ˌufahˈamu.|0
wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. hutˈaka ʃaˈuri kutˈoka kwa sanˈamu ja ˈm̩ti nˌao hˌuɟibˈiwa na fˈimbo ja ˈm̩ti. rˈoho ja ˌukahˈaba ˌimewˌapotˈoʃa, hawˈana ˌuaminˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
wˌanatˈoa ðabˈihu ɟˌuːja vilˈele vja milˈima na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa ɟˌuːja vilˈima, tʃˈini ja mˌialˈoni, mˌilibˈua na miˈela, ambˈako kˈuna vivˈuli vizˈuri. kwa hˈijo bˈinti zˈenu wˌameɡˌeukˈia ˌukahˈaba na wˌake za wˈana wˈenu uzˈinzi.|0
sˌitawˌaaðˈibu bˈinti zˈenu wakˈati wˌanapˌoɡeukˈia ˌukahˈaba, wˈala wˌake za wˈana wˈenu wˌanapofˈaɲa uzˈinzi, kwa sabˈabu wˌanaˈume weɲˈewe hˌuandamˈana na malˈaja na kˌutambikˈia pamˈoɟa na mˌakahˈaba wa mahˈali pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu: wˈatu wˌasiokˈuwa na ˌufahˈamu wˌataˌaŋɡamˈia.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌumefˈaɲa uzˈinzi, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, jˈuda nˌaje asˈiɟe akˈawa na hatˈia. ˌusiˈende ɡilɡˈali, ˌusipˈande kwˈenda bˈeθ avˈeni wˈala ˌusiˈape, hakˈika kˌama bwˈana ˌaiʃˈivjo!.|0
wˌaisraˈeli ni wˌakaˈidi, kˌama mtˈamba wa ŋɡˈombe ambˈaje ni mkaˈidi. ni ɟˈinsi ɡˈani bˌasi bwˈana ˌanawˈeza kˌuwatʃˈuŋɡa kˌama wˌanakondˈoo katˌika ʃˈamba la maɟˈani.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌameɟiˈuŋɡa na sanˈamu, ˌondokˈana nˈaje.|0
hˌata wakˈati wˌamemalˈiza vilˈeo vjˈao wˌanaˌendelˈea na ˌukahˈaba wˈao, wˌatawˈala wˌao hupˈenda sˈana ɲɟˈia za aˈibu.|0
kˌisulisˈuli kˌitawˌafaɡilˈia mbˈali na ðabˈihu zˈao zˌitawˌaletˈea aˈibu.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈili, ˈeɲi mˌakuhˈani! kuwˈeni wˌasikˈivu, ˈeɲi wˌaisraˈeli! sˌikiˈeni, ˈee ɲˈumba ja mfˈalme! hukˈumu hˌii ni ðˈidi jˈenu: mmekˈuwa mtˈeɡo hˌuko mˈispa, wˈavu ˌuliotˈandwa ɟˌuːja tabˈori.|0
waˈasi wˌamezidˈiʃa sˈana mˌauˈaɟi. mˌimi nˌitawˌatiˈiʃa wˈote.|0
nˌinaɟˈua jˈote kuhˈusu ˌefraˈimu, ˌisraˈeli hˌukufitʃˈika kwˈaŋɡu. ˌefraˈimu, sˈasa ˌumeɡˌeukˈia ˌukahˈaba, ˌisraˈeli ˌamenˌaɟisˈika.|0
matˈendo jˈao hˌajawˌaatʃˈii kurˈudi kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈao. rˈoho ja ˌukahˈaba ˈimo ndˈani ja miˈojo jˈao, hˌawamkubˈali bwˈana.|0
kibˈuri tʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈao; wˌaisraˈeli, hˌata ˌefraˈimu, wˌanaɟikwˈaa katˌika ðˈambi zˈao; pˈia jˈuda ˌataɟikwˈaa pamˈoɟa nˈao.|0
wˌao si wˌaaminˈifu kwa bwˈana; wˌamezˈaa watˈoto harˈamu. sˈasa sˌikukˈuu zˈao za mwandˈamo wa mwˈezi zˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌao pamˈoɟa na maʃˈamba jˈao.|0
piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta hˌuko ɡibˈea, bˌaraɡˈumu hˌuko rˈama. pˈaza kilˈio tʃa vˈita hˌuko bˈeθ avˈeni, oŋɡˈoza, ˈee bˌeɲamˈini.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌataˈatʃwa ukˈiwa katˌika sˈiku ja kˌuaðibˈiwa. mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌakabˈila ja ˌisraˈeli nˌinataŋɡˈaza lˈile ambˈalo halˈina bˈudi kˌutukˈia.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda ni kˌama wˈale wˌanaˌosoɡˈeza mˈawe ja mpˈaka. nˌitamwˈaɡa ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao kˌama mˌafurˈiko ja mˈaɟi.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌameonˈewa, ˌamekaɲˈaɡwa katˌika hukˈumu kwa kˌuwa ˌamekˌusudˈia kˌufuatˈia sanˈamu.|0
mˌimi ni kˌama nˈondo kwa ˌefraˈimu, na kˌama uˈozo kwa wˈatu wa jˈuda.|0
wakˈati ˌefraˈimu ˌalipoˈona uɡˈoɲɟua wˈake, nˌaje jˈuda vidˈonda vjˈake, ndˈipo ˌefraˈimu ˌalipˌoɡeukˈia aʃˈuru, na kuˈomba msaˈada kwa mfˈalme m̩kˈuu. lakˈini hawˈezi kˌukupˈoɲa, wˈala hawˈezi kˌukupˈoɲa vidˈonda vjˈako.|0
kwa maˈana nˌitakˈuwa kˌama sˈimba kwa ˌefraˈimu, kˌama sˈimba mkˈubwa kwa jˈuda. nˌitawˌararˈua vipˈande vipˈande na kˌuondˈoka; nˌitawˌatʃukˈua mbˈali, na hakˈuna wa kˌuwaokˈoa.|0
kˈiʃa nˌitarˈudi mahˈali pˈaŋɡu mpˈaka wˌatakˌapokubˈali kˈosa lˈao. nˌao wˌataˌutafˈuta ˈuso wˈaŋɡu; katˌika taˈabu jˈao wˌatanˌitafˈuta kwa bidˈii.|0
ɲɟoˈoni, tˌumrudˈie bwˈana. ˌametˌurarˈua vipˈande vipˈande lakˈini ˌatatupˈoɲa; ˌametˌuɟerˈuhi lakˈini ˌatatufˈuŋɡa mˌaɟerˈaha jˈetu.|0
baˌada ja sˈiku mbˈili ˌatatˌufufˈua; katˌika sˈiku ja tˈatu ˌatatˌuinˈua, ˌili tuwˈeze kuˈiʃi mbˈele zˈake.|0
tˌumkubˈali bwˈana, tukˈaze kˌumkubˈali jˈeje. kˌutokˈea kwˈake ni hakˈika kˌama vˈile kˌutʃomˈoza kwa ɟˈua; ˌatatuɟˈia kˌama mvˈua za masˈika, kˌama vˈile mvˈua za vˈuli zˌiiɲueʃˈavjo ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nifˈaɲe nˈini nˈawe, ˌefraˈimu? nifˈaɲe nˈini nˈawe, jˈuda? upˈendo wˈako ni kˌama ukˈuŋɡu wa ˌasubˈuhi, kˌama umˈande wa ˌalfaɟˈiri ˌutowekˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌinawakˈata nˈiɲi vipˈande vipˈande kwa kˌutumˈia mˌanabˈii wˈaŋɡu; nˌimewaˈua nˈiɲi kwa manˈeno ja kˈiɲua tʃˈaŋɡu, hukˈumu zˈaŋɡu zˌinawˈaka kˌama umˈeme ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
kwa maˈana natˈaka rehˈema, wˈala si ðabˈihu, kˌumkubˈali mˈuŋɡu zaˈidi kulˈiko sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa.|0
wˌamevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano kˌama adˈamu: hˌuko hˌawakˈuwa wˌaaminˈifu kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ɡˌileˈadi ni ˈm̩ɟi wˌeɲe wˈatu waˈovu, ˌumetˈiwa madˈoa kwa ɲˈajo za dˈamu.|0
kˌama wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi wˌamviziˈavjo ˈm̩tu, ndˈivjo maɡˈeŋɡe ja mˌakuhˈani wˌafaɲˈavjo; wˌanaulˈia wˈatu kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia ˌiendˈajo ʃekˈemu, wˌakifˈaɲa ˌuhalˈifu wa aˈibu.|0
nˌimeˈona ɟˈambo la kutˈiʃa katˌika ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. hˌuko ˌefraˈimu ˌameɟˌitolˈea kwa ˌukahˈaba na ˌisraˈeli ˌamenˌaɟisˈika.|0
pˈia kwa aɟˈili jˈako, jˈuda, mavˈuno jˌameamrˈiwa. wakˈati wowˈote nˌiŋɡereɟˈeʃa neˈema ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈila mˈara nˌilipotˈaka kumpˈoɲa ˌisraˈeli, ðˈambi za ˌefraˈimu zˌinafˌitʃulˈiwa na maˈovu ja sˌamarˈia jˌanafˌunulˈiwa. wˌanafˈaɲa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, wˈevi huvˈuɲɟa ɲˈumba, mˌaharamˈia hˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲa bˌarabarˈani.|0
lakˈini hˌawafahˈamu kwˌamba nˌinakumbˈuka matˈendo jˈao jˈote mabˈaja. ðˈambi zˈao zˌimewamˈeza, zˈiko mbˈele zˈaŋɡu sˈiku zˈote.|0
wˌanamfˌurahˈiʃa sˈana mfˈalme kwa maˈovu jˈao, wakˈuu wˌao kwa uˈoŋɡo wˈao.|0
wˈote ni wazˈinzi, wˌanawˈaka kˌama tanˈuru ambˈajo mˈoto wˌake mwokˈaɟi hˈana hˈaɟa ja kˌuutʃotʃˈea kˌuanzˈia kukˈanda ˈuŋɡa hˌadi ˌumekwˈiʃa kˌuumˈuka.|0
katˌika sˌikukˈuu ja mfˈalme wˈetu wakˈuu wˌanawˈaka kwa mvˈiɲo, nˌaje ˌanawaˈuŋɡa mkˈono wˌeɲe mizˈaha.|0
miˈojo jˈao ni kˌama tanˈuru, wˌanamwendˈea kwa hˈila. hasˈira jˈao ˌinafˈoka mˈoʃi usˈiku kˈutʃa, wakˈati wa ˌasubˈuhi ˌinalipˈuka kˌama miˈali ja mˈoto.|0
wˈote ni mˈoto kˌama tanˈuru; wˌanawˌaaŋɡamˈiza wˌatawˈala wˈao. wafˈalme wˌake wˈote wˌanaaŋɡˈuka, wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote kˈati jˈao ˌaniitˈaje mˈimi.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌanaɟˌitʃaŋɡˈaɲa na mˌataˈifa; ˌefraˈimu ni mkˈate ambˈao hˌaukuˈiva.|0
waɡˈeni wˌanaɲˈoɲa ŋɡˈuvu zˈake, lakˈini hˌafahˈamu hˈilo. ɲuˈele zˌake zˈina mvˈi hˈapa na pˈale, lakˈini hˈana habˈari.|0
kibˈuri tʃa ˌisraˈeli kˌinaʃˌuhudˈia ðˈidi jˈake, lakˈini pamˈoɟa na hˈaja jˈote harˈudi kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌake wˈala kˌumtafˈuta.|0
ˌefraˈimu ni kˌama hˈua, hˌudaŋɡˈaɲua kwa ˌurahˈisi na hˈana akˈili: mˈara ˌanaˈita mˈisri, mˈara ˌanaɡˌeukˈia aʃˈuru.|0
wakˈati wˌatakˌapokwˈenda, nˌitatˈupa wˈavu wˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao; nˌitawavˈuta tʃˈini wˌaaŋɡˈuke kˌama ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani. nˌitakˌaposikˈia wˌakikˌusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa, nˌitawanˈasa.|0
ˈole wˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌamepotˈoka kutˈoka kwˈaŋɡu! mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ni jˈao kwa sabˈabu wˌameniˈasi! nˌinatamˈani kˌuwakombˈoa, lakˈini wˌanasˈema uˈoŋɡo ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌawanˌililˈii mˌimi kutˈoka mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao, bˌali wˌanaˌombolˈeza vˌitandˈani m̩wˈao. hˌukusaɲˈika pamˈoɟa kwa aɟˈili ja nafˈaka na divˈai ˈm̩pja, lakˈini hˌuɡeukˈia mbˈali nˈami.|0
nˌiliwˌafundˈiʃa na kˌuwatˈia ŋɡˈuvu, lakˈini wˌanapˈaŋɡa mabˈaja ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu.|0
hˌawamɡˌeukˈii jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, wˈako kˌama upˈinde wˌeɲe kasˈoro. vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌao wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa kwa sabˈabu ja manˈeno jˈao ja ɟeˈuri. kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili wˌataðˌihakˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri.|0
wekˈeni tˌarumbˈeta mˌidomˈoni mwˈenu! tˈai jˈuko ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja bwˈana kwa sabˈabu wˈatu wˌamevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu, wˌameˈasi ðˈidi ja ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌananˌililˈia, ˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, tˌunakˌukubˈali!.|0
lakˈini ˌisraˈeli ˌamekatˈaa lˈile lilˈilo ɟˈema, adˈui ˌatamfˌuatˈia.|0
wˌanawˈeka wafˈalme bˌila iðˈini jˈaŋɡu, wˌametʃaɡˈua wakˈuu bˌila kibˈali tʃˈaŋɡu. kwa fˈeða zˈao na ðahˈabu wˌameɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea sanˈamu kwa aɟˈili ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ˈee sˌamarˈia, tˌupiliˈeni mbˈali sanˈamu jˈenu ja ndˈama! hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌinawˈaka ðˈidi jˈao. wˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi mpˈaka lˈini.|0
zˌimetˈoka katˌika ˌisraˈeli! ndˈama hˈuju: ˌametˌeŋɡenˈezwa na fˈundi, si mˈuŋɡu. ˌatavˈuɲɟua vipˈande vipˈande, jˈule ndˈama wa sˌamarˈia.|0
wˌanapˈanda upˈepo na kuvˈuna upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli. bˈua halˈina sˈuke, hˌalitatˈoa ˈuŋɡa. kˌama lˌiŋɡetˈoa nafˈaka, waɡˈeni wˌaŋɡeˈila jˈote.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌamemˈezwa; sˈasa jˈupo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa kˌama kˈitu kisˈitʃo na θamˈani.|0
kwa kˌuwa wˌamepˈanda kwˈenda aʃˈuru kˌama pˌundamwˈitu ˌanajˌetaŋɡatˈaŋɡa pˈeke jˈake. ˌefraˈimu ˌameɟiˈuza mweɲˈewe kwa wapˈenzi.|0
iŋɡˈawa wˌameɟiˈuza weɲˈewe mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, sˈasa nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa pamˈoɟa. wˌataˈanza kˌuðoofˈika tʃˈini ja ˌuonˈevu wa mfˈalme mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌefraˈimu ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu ɲˈiŋɡi kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka za ðˈambi, hˈizi zˌimekˈuwa mˌaðabˈahu za kˌufaɲˈia ðˈambi.|0
nˌimeandˈika kwa aɟˈili jˈao mˈambo mˈeŋɡi kuhˈusu ʃerˈia jˈaŋɡu, lakˈini wˌamezˌiaŋɡalˈia kˌama kˈitu tʃa kiɡˈeni.|0
wˌanatˈoa ðabˈihu nˌilizopˈewa mˌimi nˌao wˌanakˈula hˈijo ɲˈama, lakˈini bwˈana hˌapendˈezwi nˈao. sˈasa ˌataˌukumbˈuka uˈovu wˌao na kˌuaðˈibu ðˈambi zˈao: wˌatarˈudi mˈisri.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌamemsahˈau muˈumba wˌake na kuɟˈeŋɡa maɟˈumba ja kifˈalme, jˈuda ˌameɟeŋɡˈea mˈiɟi mˈiŋɡi ŋɡˈome. lakˈini nˌitatˈuma mˈoto kwˈeɲe mˈiɟi jˈao ˌutakˌaotˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome zˈao.|0
ˌusifˌurahˈie, ˈee ˌisraˈeli; ˌusiʃˌaŋɡilˈie kˌama mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine. kwa kˌuwa hukˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈako; ˌumepˈenda uɟˈira wa kahˈaba kwˈeɲe kˈila sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka.|0
sakˈafu za kˌupurˈia nafˈaka na mˌaʃinikˈizo ja kˌukamulˈia divˈai hˌavitalˈiʃa wˈatu, divˈai ˈm̩pja ˌitawˌapuŋɡukˈia.|0
hˌawataˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja bwˈana, ˌefraˈimu ˌatarˈudi mˈisri na ˌatakˈula tʃakˈula kilˈitʃo naɟˈisi hˌuko aʃˈuru.|0
hˌawatˌammiminˈia bwˈana sadˈaka ja divˈai wˈala ðabˈihu zˈao hˌazitˌampendˈeza. ðabˈihu kˌama hˈizo zˌitakˈuwa kwˈao kˌama mkˈate wa wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi; nˌao wˈote wˌazilˈao wˌatakˈuwa naɟˈisi. tʃakˈula hˈiki kˌitakˈuwa kwa aɟˈili jˈao weɲˈewe; kisˈiɟe katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
mtafˈaɲa nˈini katˌika sˈiku ja sˌikukˈuu zˈenu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa, katˌika sˈiku za sˌikukˈuu za bwˈana.|0
hˌata ikˈiwa wˌataokˈoka mˌaaŋɡamˈizi, mˈisri ˌatawˌakusˈaɲa, nˈajo memfˈisi ˌitawazˈika. hazˈina zˈao za fˈeða zˌitasˈoŋɡwa na mˌitʃoŋɡˈoma, nˈajo miˈiba ˌitafunˈika mahˈema jˈao.|0
sˈiku za aðˈabu zˌinakˈuɟa, sˈiku za malˈipo zˌimewadˈia. ˌisraˈeli na ˌafahˈamu hˈili. kwa sabˈabu ðˈambi zˈenu ni ɲˈiŋɡi sˈana na ˌuadˈui wˈenu ni mkˈubwa sˈana, nabˈii ˌanaðanˈiwa ni mpumbˈavu, ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeoŋɡˈozwa na mˈuŋɡu ˌanaˌonekˈana mwˌendawazˈimu.|0
nabˈii, pamˈoɟa na mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, n̩dˈije mlˈinzi ɟˌuːja ˌefraˈimu, hˌata hˈivjo mitˈeɡo ˌinamŋɡoɟˈea katˌika mapˈito jˌake jˈote, na ˌuadˈui katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
wˌamezˈama sˈana katˌika rˈuʃwa, kˌama katˌika sˈiku za ɡibˈea. mˈuŋɡu ˌatakumbˈuka uˈovu wˌao na kˌuwaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao.|0
nˌilipompˈata ˌisraˈeli, ˌilikˈuwa kˌama kupˈata zabˈibu ɟaŋɡwˈani; nˌilipˌowaˈona bˈaba zˈenu, ˌilikˈuwa kˌama kuˈona matˈunda ja kwˈanza katˌika mtˈini. lakˈini wˌalipofˈika bˈaal peˈori, wˌaliɟiwˈeka wˈakfu kwa ˈile sanˈamu ja aˈibu, nˌao wakˈawa naɟˈisi kˌama kˈitu kˈile wˌalitʃˌokipˈenda.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa ˌefraˈimu ˌutarˈuka kˌama ndˈeɡe: hakˈuna kuzˈaa, hakˈuna kˌutʃukˈua mˈimba, hakˈuna kutˈuŋɡa mˈimba.|0
hˌata wˌakilˈea watˈoto, nˌitamuˈua kˈila mmˈoɟa. ˈole wˌao nˌitakˌapowapˈiɡa kisˈoɡo.|0
nˌimemwˈona ˌefraˈimu, kˌama tˈiro, ˌalijˌeotˈeʃwa mahˈali pazˈuri. lakˈini ˌefraˈimu wˌatalˈeta watˈoto wˌao kwa mtʃiɲɟˈaɟi.|0
wˈape, ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈe, ˌutawˈapa nˈini? wˈape matˈumbo ja kˌuharˈibu mˈimba na matˈiti jˌalijˌokaˈuka.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˌao wˈote hˌuko ɡilɡˈali, nˌiliwˌatʃukˈia hˌuko. kwa sabˈabu ja matˈendo jˈao ja ðˈambi, nˌitawˌafukˈuza katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu. sˌitawapˈenda tˈena, vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌao wˈote ni waˈasi.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌamehˌaribˈiwa, mzˈizi wˌao ˌumeɲaˈuka, hˌawazˈai tˈunda. hˌata kˌama wˌatazˈaa watˈoto, nˌitawatʃˈiɲɟa watˈoto wˌao wˌaliotˈunzwa vizˈuri.|0
mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌatawˌakatˈaa kwa sabˈabu hˌawakumtˈii; wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wa kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌisraˈeli ˌalikˈuwa mzabˈibu ˌuliostˈawi sˈana, ˌaliɟˌizalˈia matˈunda mweɲˈewe. kadˈiri matˈunda jˌake jˌalivjˌooŋɡezˈeka, ˌaliɟˈeŋɡa mˌaðabˈahu zaˈidi; kadˈiri ˈn̩tʃi jˌake ˌilivjostˈawi, ˌalipˈamba mˈawe jˌake ja ibˈada.|0
mˈojo wˌao ni mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu, nˌao sˈasa lazˈima wˌatʃukˈue hatˈia jˈao. bwˈana ˌatabomˈoa mˌaðabˈahu zˈao na kˌuharˈibu mˈawe jˈao ja ibˈada.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatasˈema, hatˈuna mfˈalme kwa sabˈabu hˌatukˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana. lakˈini hˌata kˌama tˌuŋɡelikˈuwa na mfˈalme, ˌaŋɡewˈeza kˌutufaɲˈia nˈini.|0
wˌanawˈeka ahˈadi ɲˈiŋɡi, huˈapa viˈapo vja uˈoŋɡo wˌanapofˈaɲa mˌapatˈano; kwa hˈijo maʃtˈaka hˌutʃipˈuka kˌama maɡˈuɡu ja sˈumu katˌika ʃˈamba lˌililolˈimwa.|0
wˈatu wˌanaoˈiʃi sˌamarˈia hˌuoɡˈopa kwa aɟˈili ja sanˈamu ja ndˈama ja bˈeθ avˈeni. wˈatu wˌake wˌataˌiombˌolezˈea, vˈivjo hˈivjo kuhˈani wˌake wa kˌuabˈudu sanˈamu, wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamefˌurahˈia fahˈari jˈake, kwa sabˈabu ˌitaˌondolˈewa kutˈoka kwˈao kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
ˌitatʃˌukulˈiwa kwˈenda aʃˈuru kˌama uʃˈuru kwa mfˈalme m̩kˈuu. ˌefraˈimu ˌatafˌeðehˈeʃwa; ˌisraˈeli ˌataˌaibˈika kwa aɟˈili ja sanˈamu zˌake za ˈm̩ti.|0
sˌamarˈia na mfˈalme wˌake wˌataelˈea kˌama kiɟˈiti ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa mˈaɟi.|0
mahˈali pa kˌuabudˈia sanˈamu pa uˈovu pˌatahˌaribˈiwa: n̩dˈijo ðˈambi ja ˌisraˈeli. miˈiba na mˌibarˈuti ˌitaˈota na kˌufunˈika mˌaðabˈahu zˈao. kˈiʃa wˌataˌiambˈia milˈima, tˌufunikˈeni! na vilˈima, tˌuaŋɡˌukiˈeni.|0
ʃˈu sˈiku za ɡibˈea, mmetˈenda ðˈambi, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, hˌuko ndˈiko mlˌikobˈaki. ɟˈe, vˈita hˌavikˌuwapˈata watˈenda mabˈaja hˌuko ɡibˈea.|0
wakˈati nˌitakˌapopˈenda, nˌitawˌaaðˈibu; mˌataˈifa jˌatakusˈaɲua ðˈidi jˈao ˌili kˌuwawˈeka katˌika vifˈuŋɡo kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈao mbˈili.|0
ˌefraˈimu ni mtˈamba wa ŋɡˈombe ˌalijˌefundˈiʃwa ambˈaje hupˈenda kupˈura, hˈivjo nˌitamfˈuŋɡa nˈira ɟˌuːja ʃˈiŋɡo jˌake nzˈuri. nˌitamwendˈeʃa ˌefraˈimu, jˈuda lazˈima alˈime, nˌaje jakˈobo lazˈima ˌavuɲɟavˈuɲɟe mabˈoŋɡe ja udˈoŋɡo.|0
ɟˌipandiˈeni weɲˈewe hˈaki, vunˈeni matˈunda ja upˈendo usˈio na kikˈomo, vuɲɟˈeni ˈarði jˈenu ˌisijolˈimwa; kwa kˌuwa ni wakˈati wa kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana, mpˈaka ˌatakˌapokˈuɟa na kˌuwaɲeʃˈea ɟˈuu jˈenu hˈaki.|0
lakˈini mmepˈanda uˈovu, mkavˈuna ubˈaja, mmekˈula tˈunda la ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. kwa sabˈabu mmˌeteɡemˈea ŋɡˈuvu zˈenu weɲˈewe na wˈiŋɡi wa mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈenu.|0
mŋɡurˈumo wa vˈita ˌutainˈuka ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈako, ˌili kwˌamba ŋɡˈome zˈako zˈote zˌitahˌaribˈiwa: kˌama ʃalmˈani ˌalivjˌoharˈibu bˈeθ arbˈeli katˌika sˈiku ˈile ja vˈita, wakˈati mˈama pamˈoɟa na watˈoto wˌao wˌalipotˈupwa kwa ŋɡˈuvu arðˈini.|0
ndˈivjo ˌitakˌavjotokˈea kwˈako, ˈee beθˈeli, kwa sabˈabu uˈovu wˈako ni m̩kˈuu. sˈiku ˈile ˌitakˌapopˌambazˈuka, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli ˌatahˌaribˈiwa kabˈisa.|0
wakˈati ˌisraˈeli ˌalipokˈuwa mtˈoto, nˌilimpˈenda, nˌilimwˈita mwanˈaŋɡu kutˈoka mˈisri.|0
lakˈini kadˈiri nˌilivjomwˈita ˌisraˈeli, ndˈivjo wˌalivjokwˈenda mbˈali nˈami. wˌalitˈoa ðabˈihu kwa mˌabaˈali na kˌufukˈiza uvˈumba kwa viɲˈaɡo.|0
mˌimi n̩dˈije nˌilijˌemfundˈiʃa ˌefraˈimu kˌutembˈea, nˌikiwaʃˈika mikˈono; lakˈini hˌawakˌutambˈua kˌuwa ni mˌimi nˌilijˌewapˈoɲa.|0
nˌiliwˌaoŋɡˈoza kwa kˈamba za hurˈuma ja kˌibinadˈamu, kwa vifˈuŋɡo vja upˈendo; nˌiliondˈoa nˈira ʃiŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao nˌami nˌikainˈama kˌuwalˈiʃa.|0
ɟˈe, hˌawatarˈudi mˈisri, nˈajo aʃˈuru hˌaitˌawatawˈala kwa sabˈabu wˌamekatˈaa kutˈubu.|0
pˈaŋɡa zˌitamˌetamˈeta katˌika mˈiɟi jˈao, zˌitaharˈibu mˌakomˈeo ja malˈaŋɡo jˈao na kˌukomˈeʃa mipˈaŋɡo jˈao.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌameðˌamirˈia kˌuniˈatʃa. hˌata kˌama wˌakimwˈita jˌeje alˈije ɟˈuu sˈana, kwa vjovjˈote hˌatawˌainˈua.|0
ˌefraˈimu, nˌinawezˈaɟe kˌukuˈatʃa? ˈee ˌisraˈeli, nˌinawezˈaɟe kˌukutˈoa? nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌukutendˈea kˌama ˈadma? nˌitawezˈaɟe kˌukufˈaɲa kˌama sˌeboˈimu? mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌumeɡeˈuka ndˈani jˈaŋɡu, hurˈuma zˈaŋɡu zˈote zˌimeˈamʃwa.|0
sˌitatimˈiza hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali, wˈala sˌitaɡeˈuka na kˌumharˈibu ˌefraˈimu. kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ndˈimi mˈuŋɡu, wˈala si mwˌanadˈamu, alˈije mtˌakatˈifu mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu. sˌitakˈuɟa kwa ɣaðˈabu.|0
wˌatamfuˈata bwˈana; ˌataŋɡurˈuma kˌama sˈimba. wakˈati ˌaŋɡurumˈapo, watˈoto wˌake wˌatakˈuɟa wˌakitˌetemˈeka kutˈoka mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
wˌatakˈuɟa wˌakitˌetemˈeka kˌama ndˈeɡe wˌakitˈoka mˈisri, kˌama hˈua wˌakitˈoka aʃˈuru. nˌitawˌakalˈiʃa katˌika ɲˈumba zˈao, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌamenˌizuŋɡˈuka kwa uˈoŋɡo, ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu. nˌaje jˈuda ni mkaˈidi ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu, hˌata kiɲˈume tʃa jˈule mwˌaminˈifu alˈije mtˌakatˈifu.|0
ˌefraˈimu ˌanaɟilˈiʃa upˈepo; hˌufukuzˈia upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki kˈutwa nzˈima na kˌuzidˈiʃa uˈoŋɡo na ɟeˈuri. ˌanafˈaɲa mkatˈaba na aʃˈuru na kutˈuma mafˈuta ja zˌeitˈuni mˈisri.|0
bwˈana anˈalo ʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja jˈuda, ˌatamwaðˈibu jakˈobo kwa kadˈiri ja ɲɟˈia zˌake na kumlˈipa kwa kadˈiri ja matˈendo jˈake.|0
jakˈobo akˈiwa tumbˈoni ˌaliʃˈika kˌisiɡˈino tʃa kˈaka jˈake; kˌama mwˌanadˈamu, ˌaliʃindˈana na mˈuŋɡu.|0
ˌaliʃindˈana na mˌalaˈika na kumʃˈinda; ˌalilˈia na kuˈomba ˌupendelˈeo wˈake. ˌalimkˈuta hˌuko beθˈeli na kˌuzuŋɡˈumza nˌaje hˌuko.|0
lakˈini ni lazˈima urˈudi kwa mˈuŋɡu wˈako; dumˈiʃa upˈendo na hˈaki, nˌawe ˌumŋɡoɟˈee mˈuŋɡu wˈako sˈiku zˈote.|0
mfˌaɲabˌiaʃˈara hˌutumˈia vipˈimo vja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu; hupˈenda kupˈuɲɟa.|0
ˌefraˈimu hˌuɟisˈifu ˌakisˈema, mˌimi ni taɟˈiri sˈana; nˌimetˌaɟirˈika. pamˈoɟa na ˌutaɟˈiri wˈaŋɡu wˈote hˌawatakˈuta ndˈani jˈaŋɡu uˈovu wowˈote ˌau ðˈambi.|0
mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu nˌilijˌewalˈeta kutˈoka mˈisri; nˌitawafˈaɲa m̩kˈae tˈena kwˈeɲe mahˈema, kˌama vˈile katˌika sˈiku za sˌikukˈuu zˈenu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa.|0
nˌilioŋɡˈea na mˌanabˈii, nˌikawˈapa maˈono mˈeŋɡi na kusˈema mifˈano kˌupitˈia wˈao.|0
ɟˈe, ɡˌileˈadi si mwˈovu? wˈatu wˌake hˌawafˈai kˈitu! ɟˈe, hˌawatˈoi ðabˈihu za mˌafahˈali hˌuko ɡilɡˈali? mˌaðabˈahu zˈao zˌitakˈuwa kˌama malˈundo ja mˈawe katˌika ʃˈamba lˌililolˈimwa.|0
jakˈobo ˌalikˌimbilˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja arˈamu; ˌisraˈeli ˌalitumˈika ˌili apˈate ˈm̩ke, ˌili awˈeze kulˈipa kwa aɟˈili jˌake ˌalitʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo.|0
bwˈana ˌalimtumˈia nabˈii kˌumpandˈiʃa ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri, kwa ɲɟˈia ja nabˈii ˌalimtˈunza.|0
lakˈini ˌefraˈimu ˌamemtʃotʃˈea sˈana hasˈira; bwˈana wˌake ˌatalˈeta ɟˈuu jˌake hatˈia jˌake ja kumwˈaɡa dˈamu nˌaje ˌatamlipˈiza kwa aɟˈili ja ðarˈau jˈake.|0
wakˈati ˌefraˈimu ˌalipˌozuŋɡˈumza, wˈatu wˌalitˌetemˈeka, ˌalikˈuwa ˌametukˈuzwa katˌika ˌisraˈeli. lakˈini ˌalikˈuwa na hatˈia ja kˌumwabˈudu baˈali nˌaje akˈafa.|0
sˈasa wˌanatˈenda ðˈambi zaˈidi na zaˈidi; wˌanaɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea sanˈamu kˌutokˈana na fˈeða jˈao, viɲˈaɡo vˌilivjˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa ˌuhodˈari, vjˈote kˈazi ja fˈundi stˈadi. ˌinasˌemekˈana kuhˈusu hˈawa wˈatu, hutˈoa ðabˈihu za bˌinadˈamu na kubˈusu sanˈamu za ndˈama.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌatakˈuwa kˌama ukˈuŋɡu wa ˌasubˈuhi, kˌama umˈande wa ˌalfaɟˈiri ˌutowekˈao, kˌama makˈapi jˌapepˌeruʃwˈajo kutˈoka sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia nafˈaka, kˌama mˈoʃi ˌutorokˈao kˌupitˈia dˌiriʃˈani.|0
bˌali mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nˌilijˌewalˈeta nˈiɲi tˌoka mˈisri. msˌimkubˈali mˈuŋɡu mwiŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi, hakˈuna mwokˈozi ˌisipokˈuwa mˈimi.|0
nˌiliwatˈunza hˌuko ɟaŋɡwˈani, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌeɲe ɟˈoto lˌiuŋɡuzˈalo.|0
nˌilipˌowalˈiʃa, wˌaliʃˈiba, wˌalipoʃˈiba, wˌakaɟivˈuna, kˈiʃa wˌakanˌisahˈau mˈimi.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈao kˌama sˈimba, kˌama tʃˈui nˌitawˌavizˈia kˈando ja ɲɟˈia.|0
kˌama dˈubu ˌalijˌeɲaŋɡˈaɲua watˈoto wˈake, nˌitawˌaʃambulˈia na kˌurarˈua vifˈua vjˈenu. kˌama sˈimba nˌitawˈala; mɲˈama pˈori ˌatawˌararˈua vipˈande vipˈande.|0
ˈee ˌisraˈeli, ˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa, kwa sabˈabu wˌewe u kiɲˈume nˈami, kiɲˈume na msˌaidˈizi wˈako.|0
jˈuko wˈapi mfˈalme wˈako, ˌili apˈate kˌukuokˈoa? wˈako wˈapi wˌatawˈala wˈako katˌika mˈiɟi jˈako jˈote ambˈao ˌulisˈema kˌuwahˈusu, nˈipe mfˈalme na wakˈuu.|0
hˈivjo katˌika hasˈira jˈaŋɡu nˌilikˈupa mfˈalme na katˌika ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu nˌilimwondˈoa.|0
kˈosa la ˌefraˈimu lˌimehˌifaðˈiwa, ðˈambi zˌake zˌimewˈekwa katˌika kˌumbukˈumbu.|0
utˈuŋɡu kˌama wa mwanˈamke ˌanajˌeɟifuŋɡˈua mtˈoto humɟˈia, lakˈini jˌeje ni mtˈoto ˌasijekˈuwa na hekˈima; wakˈati ˌutakˌapowadˈia hˌatatˈoka katˌika tˈumbo la mˈama jˈake.|0
nˌitawˌakombˈoa wˈatu hˈawa kutˈoka ŋɡˈuvu za kabˈuri, nˌitawˌakombˈoa kutˈoka mˌautˈini. jˈako wˈapi, ˈee maˈuti, matˈeso jˈako? ˈuko wˈapi, ˈee kuzˈimu, ˌuharibˈifu wˈako? sˌitakˈuwa na hurˈuma.|0
hˌata iŋɡˈawa ˌefraˈimu ˌatastˈawi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa ndˈuɡu zˈake. upˈepo wa mˌaʃarˈiki kutˈoka kwa bwˈana ˌutakˈuɟa, ˌukivˈuma kutˈoka ɟaŋɡwˈani, tʃemtʃˈemi jˌake hˌaitatˈoa mˈaɟi na kisˈima tʃˈake kˌitakaˈuka. ɣˈala lˈake lˌitatˈekwa hazˈina zˌake zˈote.|0
wˈatu wa sˌamarˈia ni lazˈima wabˈebe hatˈia jˈao, kwa sabˈabu wˌameˈasi ðˈidi ja mˈuŋɡu wˈao. wˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa upˈaŋɡa; watˈoto wˌao wadˈoɡo wˌatatˈupwa kwa ŋɡˈuvu arðˈini, wˌanawˈake wˌao walˈio na mˈimba wˌatatˌumbulˈiwa.|0
rˈudi, ˈee ˌisraˈeli, kwa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako. ðˈambi zˈako zˌimekˈuwa ndˈilo aŋɡˈuko lˈako.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni manˈeno pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, mkˌamrudˈie bwˈana. mwˌambiˈeni: samˈehe ðˈambi zˈetu zˈote na ˌutupokˈee kwa neˈema, ˌili tuwˈeze kutˈoa matˈunda jˈetu kˌama sadˈaka za mˌafahˈali.|0
aʃˈuru hawˈezi kˌutuokˈoa, hˌatutapˈanda farˈasi wa vˈita. kˈamwe hˌatutasˈema tˈena miˈuŋɡu jˈetu kwa kˈile ambˈatʃo mikˈono jˈetu weɲˈewe ˌimetˌeŋɡenˈeza, kwa kˌuwa kwˈako wˌewe jatˈima hupˈata hurˈuma.|0
nˌitapˈoɲa ˌukaˈidi wˌao na kˌuwapˈenda kwa hiˈari jˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌimeondˈoka kwˈao.|0
nˌitakˈuwa kˌama umˈande kwa ˌisraˈeli; ˌatatʃanˈua kˌama jˌuŋɡijˈuŋɡi. kˌama mwerˈezi wa lˌebanˈoni ˌataʃˈuʃa mizˈizi jˌake tʃˈini.|0
matˈawi jˌake jˌatatˈanda. fahˈari jˌake ˌitakˈuwa kˌama ˈm̩ti wa mzˌeitˈuni, harˈufu jˌake nzˈuri kˌama mwerˈezi wa lˌebanˈoni.|0
wˈatu wˌataˈiʃi tˈena kwˈeɲe kivˈuli tʃˈake. ˌatastˈawi kˌama nafˈaka. ˌatatʃanˈua kˌama mzabˈibu, nˌao ˌumaarˈufu wˌake ˌutakˈuwa kˌama divˈai ˌitokˈajo lˌebanˈoni.|0
ˈee ˌefraˈimu, nˈina ʃuɣˈuli ɡˈani tˈena na sanˈamu? nˌitamɟˈibu na kumtˈunza. mˌimi ni kˌama msˌunobˈari wˌeɲe maɟˈani mabˈitʃi; kuzˈaa kwˈako matˈunda kˌunatˈoka kwˈaŋɡu.|0
ni nˈani mwˌeɲe hekˈima? ˌatajˌatambˈua mˈambo hˈaja. ni nˈani mwˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu? hˈuju ˌatajˌaelˈewa. ɲɟˈia za bwˈana ni adˈili; wˌeɲe hˈaki huˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia hˈizo, lakˈini waˈasi wˌataɟikwˈaa ndˈani jˈake.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana ambˈalo lˌilimɟˈia joˈeli mwˈana wa pˌeθuˈeli.|0
sˌikilizˈeni hˈili, ˈeɲi wazˈee; sˌikilizˈeni, nˈiɲi ɲˈote mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi. ɟˈe, ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili lˌiliʃawˈahi kˌutokˈea katˌika sˈiku zˈenu ˌau katˌika sˈiku za bˈabu zˈenu.|0
wˌaelezˈeni watˈoto wˈenu, na watˈoto wˈenu wˌawaambˈie watˈoto wˈao, na watˈoto wˌao kwa kizˈazi kˌitakˌatʃofuˈata.|0
kˌilitʃosˈazwa na kˈundi la tunˈutu nzˈiɡe wakˈubwa wˌamekˈula, kˌilitʃosˈazwa na nzˈiɡe wakˈubwa parˈare wˌamekˈula, kˌilitʃosˈazwa na parˈare mˌadumˈadu wˌamekˈula.|0
amkˈeni, ˈeɲi walˈevi, m̩lˈie! piɡˈeni jˈowe ˈeɲi wˌaɲuˈaɟi wˈote wa mvˈiɲo, piɡˈeni jˈowe kwa sabˈabu ja mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja, kwa kˌuwa mmˌeɲaŋɡˈaɲua kutˈoka mˌidomˈoni mwˈenu.|0
taˈifa lˌimevamˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu, lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu tˈena lisˈilo na idˈadi; lˈina mˈeno ja sˈimba, maɡˈeɡo ja sˈimba ɟˈike.|0
ˌombolˈeza kˌama bikˈira ˌalijevˈaa ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia ˌanajˌehuzunˈika kwa aɟˈili ja mˈume wa uɟˈana wˈake.|0
sadˈaka za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi zˌimekˌatilˈiwa mbˈali kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja bwˈana. mˌakuhˈani wˌanaˌombolˈeza, wˈale wˌanaˌohudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana.|0
maʃˈamba jˌamehˌaribˈiwa, ˈarði ˌimekaˈuka; nafˈaka ˌimehˌaribˈiwa, mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja ˌumekaˈuka, mafˈuta jˌamekˈoma.|0
katˈeni tamˈaa, ˈeɲi wˌakulˈima, liˈeni, ˈeɲi mlimˈao mˌizabˈibu; hˌuzunikˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja ŋɡˈano na ʃajˈiri, kwa sabˈabu mavˈuno ja ʃambˈani jˌamehˌaribˈiwa.|0
mzabˈibu ˌumekaˈuka na mtˈini ˌumeɲaˈuka; mkˌomamˈaŋɡa, mtˈende na mtofˈaa, mˈiti jˈote ʃambˈani, ˌimekaˈuka. hakˈika furˈaha jˈote ja mwˌanadˈamu ˌimeondˈoka.|0
vaˈeni ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia, ˈeɲi mˌakuhˈani, mˌuombolˈeze; piɡˈeni jˈowe, ˈeɲi mnˌaohudˈumu mˌaðabahˈuni. ɲɟoˈoni, vaˈeni ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia usˈiku kˈutʃa, ˈeɲi mnˌaohudˈumu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu; kwa kˌuwa sadˈaka za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za kˌiɲuˈaɟi zˌimezˌuilˈiwa kufˈika katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni saˈumu tˌakatˈifu; lˌiitˈeni kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu. itˈeni wazˈee na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi waˈende katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, wˌakamlilˈie bwˈana.|0
ˈole kwa sˈiku hˈijo! kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja bwˈana ˈiko karˈibu; ˌitakˈuɟa kˌama ˌuharibˈifu kutˈoka kwa mweɲˈezi.|0
ɟˈe, tʃakˈula hˌakikˌukatilˈiwa mbˈali mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈetu: furˈaha na ʃˈaŋɡwe kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu.|0
mbˈeɡu zˌinakaˈuka tʃˈini ja mabˈoŋɡe ja udˈoŋɡo. ɣˈala zˌimeˈatʃwa katˌika ˌuharibˈifu, ɣˈala za nafˈaka zˌimebˌomolˈewa, kwa maˈana hakˈuna nafˈaka.|0
ɟˈinsi ɡˈani ŋɡˈombe wˌanavjolˈia! makˈundi ja mifˈuɡo jˌanahˌaŋɡaˈika kwa sabˈabu hawˈana malˈiʃo; hˌata makˈundi ja kondˈoo jˌanatesˈeka.|0
kwˈako, ˈee bwˈana, naˈita, kwa kˌuwa mˈoto ˌumetˌeketˈeza malˈiʃo ja mbuɡˈani na miˈali ja mˈoto ˌimeuŋɡˈuza mˈiti jˈote ʃambˈani.|0
hˌata waɲˈama wa porˈini wˌanakˌuonˈea ʃaˈuku; viɟˈito vja mˈaɟi vˌimekaˈuka, na mˈoto ˌumetˌeketˈeza malˈiʃo jˈote ja mbuɡˈani.|0
piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta katˌika sajˈuni; piɡˈeni m̩bˈiu katˌika mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu. wˈote wˌaiʃˈio katˌika ˈn̩tʃi na wˌatetemˈeke, kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja bwˈana ˌinakˈuɟa. ˈiko karˈibu.|0
sˈiku ja ɡˈiza na huzˈuni, sˈiku ja mawˈiŋɡu na ˌutusitˈusi. kˌama mˌapambazˈuko jˌasambaˈavjo tˌoka upˈande hˈuu wa milˈima hˌata upˈande mwiŋɡˈine ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa na lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu lˌinakˈuɟa. ɟˈambo kˌama hˈili hˌaliɟˌakuwˈepo ʃˈu zamˈani wˈala hˌalitˌakuwˈepo tˈena kˈamwe kwa vizˈazi viɟˈavjo.|0
mbˈele jˈao mˈoto ˌunatˌeketˈeza, ɲˈuma jˈao miˈali ja mˈoto ˌinawˈaka kwa ŋɡˈuvu. mbˈele jˈao ˈn̩tʃi ˈiko kˌama bustˈani ja edˈeni, ɲˈuma jˈao ni ɟˈaŋɡwa lˌisilofˈaa: hakˈuna kˈitu kˌinatʃˌowaepˈuka.|0
wˌanaˌonekˈana kˌama farˈasi; wˌanakwˈenda m̩bˈio kˌama askˈari wapˈanda farˈasi.|0
wˌanatˈoa saˈuti kˌama maɡˈari ja vˈita, wˌanapˌorukarˈuka ɟˌuːja vilˈele vja milˈima, kˌama m̩lˈio wa miˈali ja mˈoto ilˈajo mabˈua, kˌama ɟˈeʃi kˈubwa lˌililˌoɟipˈaŋɡa kwa aɟˈili ja vˈita.|0
wˌanapˌoonekˈana, mˌataˈifa jˌanakˈuwa katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈuu; kˈila ˈuso ˌunabˌadilˈika rˈaŋɡi.|0
wˌanaʃˌambulˈia kˌama wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wa vˈita; wˌanapˈanda kˈuta kˌama askˈari. wˈote wˌanatembˈea katˌika sˈafu, hˌawapotˈoʃi sˈafu zˈao.|0
hakˈuna ˌanajˌemsukˈuma mwenzˈake; kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌanakwˈenda mbˈele mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa. wˌanapˈita katˌika vˌizuˈizi bˌila kˌuharˈibu sˈafu zˈao.|0
wˌanaˈenda kˈasi kˌuiŋɡˈia mɟˈini; wˌanakimbˈia ˌukutˈani. wˌanaiŋɡˈia ndˈani ja ɲˈumba; kwa kˌuiŋɡilˈia mˌadiriʃˈani kˌama wˈevi.|0
mbˈele jˈao dunˈia ˌinatˌikisˈika, ˈaŋɡa lˌinatˌetemˈeka, ɟˈua na mwˈezi vˌinatˈiwa ɡˈiza, na ɲˈota hˌazitˈoi mwˈaŋɡa wˌake tˈena.|0
bwˈana ˌanatˈoa mʃˈindo wa ŋɡurˈumo mbˈele ja ɟˈeʃi lˈake; maɟˈeʃi jˌake hajˈana idˈadi, ni wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu ɲˈiŋɡi wˈale ambˈao hutˈii aɡˈizo lˈake. sˈiku ja bwˈana ni kˈuu, ni ja kutˈiʃa. ni nˈani ˌanajewˈeza kˌuistˌahimˈili.|0
hˌata sˈasa, asˈema bwˈana, nˌirudiˈeni kwa miˈojo jˈenu jˈote, kwa kufˈuŋɡa, kwa kulˈia na kˌuombolˈeza.|0
rˌaruˈeni miˈojo jˈenu na sˈijo mavˈazi jˈenu. mrˌudiˈeni bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kwa maˈana jˌeje n̩dˈije mwˌeɲe neˈema na mwˈiŋɡi wa hurˈuma, si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira, ni mwˈiŋɡi wa upˈendo, huˈona hurˈuma, hˌuɟizuˈia kulˈeta maˈafa.|0
ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje? jˌeje awˈeza kˌuɡeˈuka na kˌuwa na hurˈuma na kuˈatʃa barˈaka ɲˈuma jˈake: sadˈaka za nafˈaka na sadˈaka za vˌiɲuˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
piɡˈeni tˌarumbˈeta katˌika sajˈuni, tˌaŋɡazˈeni saˈumu tˌakatˈifu, lˌiitˈeni kˌusaɲˈiko tˌakatˈifu.|0
wˌakusaɲˈeni wˈatu, wekˈeni wˈakfu kˌusaɲˈiko; wˌaletˈeni pamˈoɟa wazˈee, wˌakusaɲˈeni watˈoto, wˈale wˌaɲoɲˈao mazˈiwa. bwˈana arˈusi na atˈoke tʃumbˈani mwˈake na bˈibi arˈusi nˌaje atˈoke katˌika tʃˈumba tʃˈake.|0
mˌakuhˈani, ambˈao wˌanahudˈumu mbˈele za bwˈana, na walˈie kˌatikˈati ja ukˈumbi wa hekˈalu na mˌaðabˈahu. wasˈeme, wˌahurumˈie wˈatu wˈako, ˈee bwˈana. ˌusifˈaɲe urˈiθi wˈako kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa, nˈeno la ðihˈaka kˈati ja mˌataˈifa. kwa nˈini wˌasemezˈane mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao, jˈuko wˈapi mˈuŋɡu wˈao?.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa na wˈivu kwa aɟˈili ja ˈn̩tʃi jˌake na kˌuwa na hurˈuma ɟˌuːja wˈatu wˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌatawaɟˈibu: nˌinawˌapelekˈea nafˈaka, mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta, vja kˌuwatˈoʃa nˈiɲi hˌadi mriðˈike kabˈisa; kˈamwe sˌitawafˈaɲa tˈena kˈitu tʃa kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na mˌataˈifa.|0
nˌitafukˈuza ɟˈeʃi la kˌaskazˈini likˈae mbˈali nˈaɲi, nˌikilˌisukˈuma ndˈani ja ɟˈaŋɡwa, askˈari wa sˈafu za mbˈele wˌakiˈenda ndˈani ja bahˈari ja mˌaʃarˈiki na wˈale wa sˈafu za ɲˈuma katˌika bahˈari ja mˌaɣarˈibi. uvˈundo wˌake ˌutapˈaa ɟˈuu; harˈufu jˌake ˌitapˈanda ɟˈuu. hakˈika ˌametˈenda mˈambo makˈubwa.|0
ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee ˈn̩tʃi; furˈahi na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia. hakˈika bwˈana ˌametˈenda mˈambo makˈubwa.|0
fˌurahˈini, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa sajˈuni, ʃˌaŋɡiliˈeni katˌika bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, kwa kˌuwa ˌamewˈapa mvˈua za vˈuli kwa kipˈimo tʃa hˈaki. ˌanawˌapelekˈea mvˈua ɲˈiŋɡi, mvˈua ja vˈuli na ja masˈika, kˌama mwanzˈoni.|0
sakˈafu za kˌupurˈia zˌitaɟˈaa nafˈaka, mapˈipa jˌatafurˈika mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja na mafˈuta.|0
nˌitawalˈipa kwa aɟˈili ja miˈaka ˈile ˌilijolˈiwa na nzˈiɡe: parˈare, mˌadumˈadu na tunˈutu, ɟˈeʃi lˈaŋɡu kˈubwa ambˈalo nˌililitˈuma kˌatikˈati jˈenu.|0
mtakˈuwa na wˈiŋɡi wa vjakˈula mpˈaka mʃˈibe, na mtˌalisˈifu ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ambˈaje ˌamefˈaɲa mˌaaɟˈabu kwa aɟˈili jˈenu; kˈamwe wˈatu wˈaŋɡu hˌawatˌaaibˈiʃwa tˈena.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˌimi nˈiko katˌika ˌisraˈeli kwˌamba mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, na kwˌamba hakˈuna mwiŋɡˈine; kˈamwe wˈatu wˈaŋɡu hˌawatˌaaibˈika tˈena.|0
hˌata ˌitakˈuwa, baˌada ja hˈajo, nˌitamimˈina rˈoho wˈaŋɡu ɟˌuːja wˈote wˌeɲe mwˈili. wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu wˌatatabˈiri, wazˈee wˈenu wˌataˈota ndˈoto, na viɟˈana wˈenu wˌataˈona maˈono.|0
hˌata ɟˌuːja wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, wˌanaˈume kwa wˌanawˈake, katˌika sˈiku zˈile nˌitamimˈina rˈoho wˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌami nˌitaoɲˈeʃa mˌaaɟˈabu katˌika mbˈiŋɡu na dˌuniˈani: dˈamu, mˈoto na mawˈimbi ja mˈoʃi.|0
na kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajelˌiitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana ˌataˌokolˈewa. kwa maˈana ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu kˌutakuwˈepo wokˈovu, kˌama bwˈana ˌalivjosˈema, mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˌaliˌonusurˈika ambˈao bwˈana ˌawaˈita.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈizo na wakˈati hˈuo, nˌitakˌaporeɟˈeʃa neˈema ja jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌitajˌakusˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˈote na kˌujalˈeta katˌika bˈonde la jˌehoʃafˈati hˈapo nˌitaiŋɡˈia kwˈeɲe hukˈumu ðˈidi jˈao kuhˈusu urˈiθi wˈaŋɡu, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa wˌaliwˌatawˈaɲa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa na kˌuiɡˈawa ˈn̩tʃi jˈaŋɡu.|0
wˌanawˌapiɡˈia kˈura wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kˌuwaˈuza wˌavulˈana ˌili kupˈata mˌakahˈaba; wˌaliwaˈuza wˌasitʃˈana ˌili wapˈate kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo.|0
sˈasa ˈuna nˈini ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, ˈee tˈiro na sidˈoni, nˌaɲi ˈn̩tʃi zˈote za ˌufilˈisti? ɟˈe, mnˌanilipˈiza kwa jˈale nˌilijˌojafˈaɲa? kˌama mnalˈipa, mˌimi nˌitalipˈiza ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈenu kwa kˈasi na kwa harˈaka jˈale mlˌijojatˈenda.|0
kwa kˌuwa mlˌitʃukˈua fˈeða na ðahˈabu jˈaŋɡu pˈia mkabˈeba hazˈina zˈaŋɡu nzˈuri sˈana mkˌapelˈeka kwˈeɲe mˌahekˈalu jˈenu.|0
mlˌiwaˈuza wˈatu wa jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu kwa wˌajunˈani, ˌili kwˌamba mpˈate kˌuwapelˈeka mbˈali na ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
tazˈama nˌitawaˈamʃa kutˈoka zˈile sehˈemu mlˌizowaˈuza, nˌami nˌitawˌalipˈiza ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vjˈenu kˈile mlˌitʃofˈaɲa.|0
nˌitawaˈuza wˈana wˈenu na bˈinti zˈenu kwa wˈatu wa jˈuda, nˌao wˌatawaˈuza kwa wasˈeba, taˈifa lilˈilo mbˈali. bwˈana ˌamesˈema.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni hˈili mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa: ɟˌiandaˈeni kwa vˈita! ˈamʃa askˈari! wˌanaˈume wˈote wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˌasoɡˈee karˈibu na kˌuʃambulˈia.|0
maɟˈembe jˈenu jˌafuˈeni jˈawe pˈaŋɡa na miˈundu jˈenu ja kˌukatˈia ˈiwe mikˈuki. alˈije ðaˈifu na asˈeme, mˌimi nˈina ŋɡˈuvu.|0
ɲɟoˈoni harˈaka, nˈiɲi mˌataˈifa jˈote kutˈoka pˈande zˈote, kˌusaɲikˈeni hˌuko. ʃˈuʃa wˌapiɡanˈaɟi wˈako, ˈee bwˈana.|0
mˌataˈifa na jaˈamʃwe; na jasˈoŋɡe mbˈele kˌuelekˈea bˈonde la jˌehoʃafˈati, kwa kˌuwa nˌitakˈeti mahˈali pˈale kˌuhukˈumu mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌalijˈoko kˈila upˈande.|0
tˈia mˈundu, kwa kˌuwa mavˈuno jˌamekomˈaa. ɲɟoˈoni, mkaɲˈaɡe zabˈibu, kwa kˌuwa ʃˌinikˈizo la kˌukamˈua zabˈibu lˌimeɟˈaa na mapˈipa jˌanafurˈika: kwa kˌuwa uˈovu wˌao ni mkˈubwa.|0
umˈati mkˈubwa, umˈati mkˈubwa katˌika bˈonde la ˌuamˈuzi! kwa kˌuwa sˈiku ja bwˈana ni karˈibu katˌika bˈonde la ˌuamˈuzi.|0
ɟˈua na mwˈezi vˌitatˈiwa ɡˈiza, na ɲˈota hˌazitatˈoa mwˈaŋɡa wˌake tˈena.|0
bwˈana ˌataŋɡurˈuma kutˈoka sajˈuni na mʃˈindo wa ŋɡurˈumo kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu; dunˈia na mbˈiŋɡu vˌitatˌikisˈika. lakˈini bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa kˌimbilˈio la wˈatu wˈake, ŋɡˈome imˈara kwa aɟˈili ja wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua kwˌamba mˈimi, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, nakˈaa sajˈuni, mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu. jˌerusalˈemu ˌutakˈuwa mtˌakatˈifu; kˈamwe waɡˈeni hˌawatˌavamˈia tˈena.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo milˈima ˌitadondˈoʃa divˈai ˈm̩pja, na vilˈima vˌitatˌirirˈika mazˈiwa; mabˈonde jˈote ja jˈuda jˌatatˌirirˈika mˈaɟi. tʃemtʃˈemi ˌitatˌirirˈika kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja bwˈana na kˌuɲuˈeʃa bˈonde la ʃitˈimu.|0
lakˈini mˈisri ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa, edˈomu ˌitakˈuwa ɟˈaŋɡwa tˈupu, kwa sabˈabu ja ɟeˈuri wˌaliofˈaɲa kwa wˈatu wa jˈuda, ambˈao katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao wˌalimwˈaɡa dˈamu isˈijo na hatˈia.|0
jˈuda ˌitakalˈiwa na wˈatu milˈele na jˌerusalˈemu ˌitadˈumu vizˈazi vjˈote.|0
hatˈia jˈao ja dˈamu, ambˈajo sˌiɟasamˈehe, nˌitasamˈehe. bwˈana ˌanakˈaa sajˈuni.|0
manˈeno ja amˈosi, mmˈoɟa wa watʃˈuŋɡa waɲˈama wa tekˈoa: jˈale ˌalijˌojaˈona kuhˈusu ˌisraˈeli miˈaka miwˈili kˈabla ja tˌetemˈeko la ˈarði, wakˈati uzˈia ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa jˈuda, na jˌeroboˈamu mwˈana wa jˌehoˈaʃi ˌalikˈuwa mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
ˌalisˈema: bwˈana ˌanaŋɡurˈuma tˌoka sajˈuni, pˈia ˌanaŋɡurˈuma kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu; malˈiʃo ja watʃˈuŋɡa waɲˈama jˌanakaˈuka, kilˈele tʃa karmˈeli kˌinaɲaˈuka.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za damˈeski, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu ˌaliipˈura ɡˌileˈadi kwa vjˈombo vja tʃˈuma vjˌeɲe mˈeno.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja hˌazaˈeli ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome za bˈen hadˈadi.|0
nˌitalivˈuɲɟa lˈaŋɡo la damˈeski; nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza mfˈalme ˌalijˈeko katˌika bˈonde la avˈeni, na jˌeje ambˈaje ˌanaiʃˈika fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala katˌika bˈeθ edˈeni. wˈatu wˈote wa arˈamu wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni hˌuko kˈiri, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za ɡˈaza, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu wˌalitʃukˈua matˈeka ɟˌumuˈija nzˈima na kˌuwaˈuza kwa edˈomu.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja kˈuta za ɡˈaza ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome zˈake.|0
nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza mfˈalme wa aʃdˈodi na jˌeje ˌaiʃikˈaje fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala katˌika ˌaʃkelˈoni. nˌitaˌuɡeˈuza mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja ekrˈoni, hˌadi mfilˈisti wa mwˈiʃo ˌatakˌapokˈufa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za tˈiro, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu ˌameˈuza ɟˌumuˈija nzˈima ja matˈeka kwa edˈomu, na kˌutokuɟˈali mˌapatˈano ja undˈuɡu.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto kwˈeɲe kˈuta za tˈiro ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome zˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za edˈomu, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu ˌalimfˌuatˈia ndˈuɡu jˌake kwa upˈaŋɡa, ˌalikatˈaa kˌuoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma jojˈote, kwa sabˈabu hasˈira jˌake kˈali ˌiliˌendelˈea kupˈanda wakˈati wˈote na ɣaðˈabu ˌiliwˈaka bˌila kˌuzuilˈiwa.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja temˈani ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome za bˈosra.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za amˈoni, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu ˌaliwˌatumbˈua wˌanawˈake wˌaɟawazˈito wa ɡˌileˈadi ˌili kˌuoŋɡˈeza mipˈaka jˈake.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto kwˈeɲe kˈuta za rˈaba ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome zˌake kˌatikˈati ja vilˈio vja vˈita katˌika sˈiku ja mˌapiɡˈano, kˌatikˈati ja upˈepo mkˈali katˌika sˈiku ja ðorˈuba.|0
mfˈalme wˌake ˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, jˌeje pamˈoɟa na mˌaafˈisa wˈake, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za moˈabu, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu ˌalitʃˈoma mifˈupa ja mfˈalme wa edˈomu, ikˈawa kˌama tʃokˈaa.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja moˈabu ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome za kˌeriˈoθi. moˈabu ˌataaŋɡˈuka kwa ɣasˈia kˈubwa kˌatikˈati ja vilˈio vja vˈita na m̩lˈio wa tˌarumbˈeta.|0
nˌitamwˌaŋɡamˈiza mtawˈala wˌake na kˌuwaˈua mˌaafˈisa wˌake wˈote pamˈoɟa nˈaje, asˈema bwˈana.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za jˈuda, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. kwa sabˈabu wˌameˌikatˈaa ʃerˈia ja bwˈana na hˌawakˌuziʃˈika ˈamri zˈake, kwa sabˈabu wˌamepotˈoʃwa na miˈuŋɡu ja uˈoŋɡo, miˈuŋɡu ambˈajo bˈabu zˈao wˌaliˌifuˈata.|0
nˌitatˈuma mˈoto ɟˌuːja jˈuda ambˈao ˌutatˌeketˈeza ŋɡˈome za jˌerusalˈemu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kwa ðˈambi tˈatu za ˌisraˈeli, hˌata kwa ðˈambi ˈn̩ne, sˌitaˌizuˈia ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu. wˌanawaˈuza wˌeɲe hˈaki kwa fˈeða, na maskˈini kwa ɟˈozi ja viˈatu.|0
wˌanakaɲˈaɡa ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja maskˈini, kˌama vˈile ɟˌuːja mavˈumbi ja ˈn̩tʃi, na kˌukatˈaa hˈaki kwa wˌaliˌoonˈewa. bˈaba na mwanˈawe hˌuʃirˈiki msitʃˈana mmˈoɟa, kwa hˈivjo hˌulinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu tˌakatˈifu.|0
wˈatu hulˈala kˈando ja kˈila mˌaðabˈahu ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuo zˌilizowˈekwa rehˈani. katˌika ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wˌao hˈuɲua mvˈiɲo ˌuliˌonunulˈiwa kwa fˈeða wˌalizotˈozwa wˈatu.|0
nˌilimwˌaŋɡamˈiza mwamˈori mbˈele jˈao, iŋɡˈawa ˌalikˈuwa mrˈefu kˌama mˌierˈezi, na mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌama mˌialˈoni. nˌilijˌaaŋɡamˈiza matˈunda jˌake ɟˈuu na mizˈizi jˌake tʃˈini.|0
nˌiliwˌapandˈiʃa tˌoka mˈisri, na nˌikawˌaoŋɡˈoza miˈaka ˌarobaˈini ɟaŋɡwˈani niwˈape ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌaamˈori.|0
pˈia nˌiliinˈua mˌanabˈii kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈana wˈenu na wˌanaðˈiri kutˈoka mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa viɟˈana wˈenu. ɟˈe, hˌii si kwˈeli, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli? asˈema bwˈana.|0
lakˈini mlˌiwafˈaɲa wˌanaðˈiri kˈuɲua mvˈiɲo na kˌuwaamˈuru mˌanabˈii wˌasitˈoe ˌunabˈii.|0
sˈasa bˈasi, nˌitawapˈonda kˌama ɡˈari lˌipondˈavjo wakˈati lˌimeɟˈazwa nafˈaka.|0
mkˌimbiˈaɟi hodˈari hˌatanˌusurˈika, wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌataiʃˈiwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao, na ʃuɟˈaa hˌatawˈeza kˌuokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
mpˈiɡa upˈinde ˌatakimbˈia, askˈari wapˈiɡa m̩bˈio hˌawatawˈeza kˌutorˈoka, na mpˈanda farˈasi hˌataokˈoa maˈiʃa jˈake.|0
hˌata askˈari walˈio mˌaʃuɟˈaa sˈana sˈiku hˈijo wˌatakimbˈia ˈutʃi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
sˌikilizˈeni nˈeno hˈili ˌalilosˈema bwˈana ðˈidi jˈenu, ˈeɲi wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli, ðˈidi ja ɟamˈaa nzˈima nˌiliˌowapandˈiʃa tˌoka mˈisri.|0
ni nˈiɲi tu nˌiliˌowatʃaɡˈua kˈati ja ɟamˈaa zˈote za dunˈia; kwa hˈijo nˌitawˌaaðˈibu kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi zˈenu zˈote.|0
ɟˈe, wˈatu wawˈili hˌutembˈea pamˈoɟa wˌasipˌokubˌaliˈana kufˈaɲa hˈivjo.|0
ɟˈe, sˈimba hˌuŋɡurˈuma katˌika kitʃˈaka wakˈati hˈana mawˈindo? awˈeza kuvˈuma katˌika pˈaŋɡo wakˈati ambˈao hˌaɟakamˈata tʃotʃˈote.|0
ɟˈe, ndˈeɡe awˈeza kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe mtˈeɡo ulˈio arðˈini ambˈapo hˌaɟateɡˈewa tʃˈambo? ɟˈe, mtˈeɡo ˌunawˈeza kˌufjatˈuka tˌoka arðˈini wakˈati ambˈapo hakˈuna tʃotʃˈote tʃa kunˈasa.|0
ɟˈe, tˌarumbˈeta ˌinapopˈiɡwa mɟˈini kˌuɟulˈiʃa hatˈari, wˈatu hˌawatˌetemˈeki? ˈm̩ɟi ˌupatwˈapo na maˈafa, ɟˈe, si bwˈana ˌamesˌababˈiʃa.|0
hakˈika bwˈana mweɲˈezi hˌatafˈaɲa nˈeno lolˈote bˌila kˌuwafˌunulˈia wˌatumˈiʃi wˌake mˌanabˈii sˈiri jˈake.|0
sˈimba ˌameŋɡurˈuma: ɟˈe, ni nˈani ambˈaje hˌataoɡˈopa? bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌametˈamka: ɟˈe, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kukˈosa kutˈoa ˌunabˈii.|0
tˌaŋɡazˈeni katˌika ŋɡˈome za aʃdˈodi na katˌika ŋɡˈome za mˈisri: kˌusaɲikˈeni ɟˌuːja milˈima ja sˌamarˈia; ˌaŋɡaliˈeni wˈiŋɡi wa wˌasiwˈasi ulˈio ndˈani jˈake, na ˌuonˈevu ulˈio mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈake.|0
bwˈana asˈema: hˌawaɟˈui kutˈenda lilˈilo ɟˈema, wˈale ambˈao hˌuɟilˌundikˈia ɲˈara na vˈitu vˌilivjotˈekwa katˌika ŋɡˈome zˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi: adˈui ˌataˌiziŋɡˈira ˈn̩tʃi; ˌataaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini ŋɡˈome zˈenu na kutˈeka ɲˈara mabˈoma jˈenu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kˌama vˈile mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ˌaokoˈavjo kˌiɲuˈani ˌm̩wa sˈimba vipˈande viwˈili tu vja mfˈupa wa m̩ɡˈuu ˌau kipˈande tʃa sikˈio, hˈivjo ndˈivjo wˌaisraˈeli wˌatakˌavjoˌokolˈewa, wˈale wˌakaˈao sˌamarˈia kwˈeɲe kˈiŋɡo za vitˈanda vjˈao, na katˌika damˈeski kwˈeɲe vˈiti vjˈao vja fahˈari.|0
sikˈia hˈili na ˌuʃuhudˈie ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, asˈema bwˈana, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
sˈiku nˌitakˌapomwaðˈibu ˌisraˈeli kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈake, nˌitaharˈibu mˌaðabˈahu za beθˈeli; pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu zˌitakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na kˌuaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini.|0
nˌitabomˈoa ɲˈumba ja wakˈati wa masˈika, pamˈoɟa na ɲˈumba ja wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi; ɲˈumba zˌilizˌonakʃˈiwa kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu na maɟˈumba makˈubwa ja fahˈari jˌatabˌomolˈewa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
sˌikilizˈeni nˈeno hˈili, nˈiɲi ŋɡˈombe wa baʃˈani mliˈoko ɟˌuːja mlˈima sˌamarˈia, nˈiɲi wˌanawˈake mnˌaowˌaonˈea maskˈini, na kˌuwaɡˌandamˈiza wˌahitˈaɟi, na kˌuwaambˈia wˌanaˈume wˈenu, tˌuleteˈeni vˌiɲuˈaɟi.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌameˈapa kwa ˌutakatˈifu wˈake: hakˈika wakˈati ˌutakˈuɟa mtˌakapˌotʃukulˈiwa na kulˈabu, na wˌanaˌosalˈia kwa ndoˈana za samˈaki.|0
nˌaɲi mtakwˈenda mˈoɟa kwa mˈoɟa kˌupitˈia mahˈali pˌalipˌobomolˈewa kwˈeɲe ukˈuta, nˌaɲi mtatˈupwa ɲɟˈe kˌuelekˈea harmˈoni, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nendˈeni beθˈeli mkatˈende ðˈambi; nendˈeni ɡilɡˈali mkazˈidi kutˈenda ðˈambi. letˈeni ðabˈihu zˈenu kˈila ˌasubˈuhi, zˈaka zˈenu kˈila mwˈaka wa tˈatu.|0
mtʃˈome mkˈate ˌuliotˈiwa tʃˈatʃu kˌama sadˈaka ja ʃukrˈani, ɟˌisifˈuni kuhˈusu sadˈaka zˈenu za hiˈari: ɟˌiɡambˈeni kwa aɟˈili ja sadˈaka hˈizo, ˈeɲi wˌaisraˈeli, kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo mnˌalopˈenda kˌulitˈenda, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi.|0
nˌiliwˈapa ɲɟˈaa kwˈeɲe kˈila ˈm̩ɟi, na ˌukosˈefu wa tʃakˈula katˌika kˈila ˈm̩ɟi, hˌata hˈivjo bˈado hˌamɟanˌirudˈia mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
pˈia nˌiliwˌazuilˈia nˈiɲi mvˈua miˈezi mitˈatu kˈabla ja kˌufikˈia mavˈuno. nˌiliɲˈeʃa mvˈua kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi mmˈoɟa, lakˈini nˌiliˌizuˈia mvˈua ˌisiɲˈeʃe ˈm̩ɟi mwiŋɡˈine. ʃˈamba mˈoɟa lˌilipˈata mvˈua, na liŋɡˈine hˌalikupˈata, nˈalo lˌikakaˈuka.|0
wˈatu wˌalitˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa ˈm̩ɟi hˌata ˈm̩ɟi kˌutafˈuta mˈaɟi, lakˈini hˌawakupˈata ja kˌuwatˈoʃa kˈuɲua, hˌata hˈivjo hˌamɟanˌirudˈia mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mˈara ɲˈiŋɡi nˌilizipˈiɡa bustˈani zˈenu na maʃˈamba ja mˌizabˈibu, nˌilijapˈiɡa kwa kˈutu na ukˈuŋɡu. nzˈiɡe wˌalitafˈuna tˈini zˈenu na mˈiti ja mˌizeitˈuni, hˌata hˈivjo hˌamɟanˌirudˈia mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌiliwˌapelekˈea taˈuni mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu kˌama nˌilivjofˈaɲa kˈule mˈisri. nˌiliwaˈua viɟˈana wˈenu wa kiˈume kwa upˈaŋɡa, nˌiliwˌatʃukˈua farˈasi wˈenu. nˌiliɟˈaza pˈua zˈenu kwa uvˈundo kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈambi zˈenu, hˌata hˈivjo hˌamɟanˌirudˈia mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌiliwˌaaŋɡamˈiza baˈaði jˈenu kˌama nˌilivjˌoaŋɡamˈiza sodˈoma na ɡomˈora. mlikˈuwa kˌama kiɟˈiti kˌiwakˈatʃo kˌilitʃˌoɲakulˈiwa motˈoni, hˌata hˈivjo hˌamɟanˌirudˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo nˌitakˌalowˌafaɲˈia, ˌisraˈeli, na kwa sabˈabu nˌitawˌafaɲˈia hˈili, ɟˌiandaˈeni kˌukutˈana na mˈuŋɡu wˈenu, ˈee ˌisraˈeli.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje hufˈaɲa milˈima, ˌanaˈumba upˈepo, na kˌufunˈua mawˈazo jˌake kwa mwˌanadˈamu, jˌeje ˌaɡeuzˈaje ˌasubˈuhi kˌuwa ɡˈiza, na kˌukaɲˈaɡa mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa ˈn̩tʃi: bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
sikˈia nˈeno hˈili, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, ˌombolˈezo hˈili nˌinalifˈaɲa kˌuwahˈusu nˈiɲi.|0
bikˈira ˌisraˈeli ˌameaŋɡˈuka, kˈamwe hˌatainˈuka tˈena, ˌameˈatʃwa pwˈeke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake, hakˈuna jejˈote wa kˌumwinˈua.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌasemˈalo: wakˈati mmˈoɟa wa mˈiɟi jˈako ˌutakˌapopelˈeka wˈatu ˈelfu mˈoɟa vitˈani kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli, mˈia mˈoɟa tu wˌatarˈudi; wakˈati ˈm̩ɟi ˌutakˌapopelˈeka mˈia mˈoɟa, kˈumi tu n̩dˈio wˌatarˈudi hˈai.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana ˌasemˈalo kwa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli: nˌitafutˈeni mpˈate kuˈiʃi.|0
msˌitafˈute beθˈeli, msiˈende ɡilɡˈali, msˌisafˈiri kwˈenda bˈeer ʃˈeba. kwa maˈana kwa hakˈika ɡilɡˈali ˌitakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, na beθˈeli ˌitafˈaɲua kˌuwa si kˈitu.|0
mtˌafutˈeni bwˈana mpˈate kuˈiʃi, ˌau ˌatafaɡˈia ɲˈumba ja josˈefu kˌama mˈoto; ˌutawˌateketˈeza, nˈajo beθˈeli hˌaitakˈuwa na jejˈote wa kˌuuzˈima.|0
nˈiɲi ambˈao mnˌaɡeˈuza hˈaki kˌuwa utʃˈuŋɡu na kˌuiaŋɡˈuʃa hˈaki tʃˈini.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje ˌalifˈaɲa kˌilimˈia na ˌoriˈoni, ambˈaje hˌuɡeˈuza ɡˈiza kˌuwa mˌapambazˈuko na mtʃˈana kˌuwa usˈiku, ambˈaje hˌujaˈita mˈaɟi ja bahˈari na kˌujamwˈaɡa ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi: bwˈana ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
jˌeje hufˈaɲa mˌaaŋɡamˈizo kwˈeɲe ŋɡˈome na kufˈaɲa ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa ŋɡˈome kˌuwa ukˈiwa.|0
mnˌamtʃukˈia jˈule ˌakemeˈaje mˌahakamˈani, na kˌumðarˈau jˈule ambˈaje husˈema kwˈeli.|0
mnˌamɡandamˈiza maskˈini na kˌumlazimˈiʃa awˈape nafˈaka. kwa hˈijo, iŋɡˈawa mmeɟˈeŋɡa maɟˈumba ja mˈawe ja fahˈari, hˌamtaˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake; iŋɡˈawa mmepˈanda maʃˈamba mazˈuri ja mˌizabˈibu, hˌamtakˈuɲua divˈai jˈake.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌinaɟˈua hesˈabu ja makˈosa jˈenu na ukˈubwa wa ðˈambi zˈenu. mmˌewaonˈea wˌeɲe hˈaki na kˌupokˈea rˈuʃwa na kˌuzuˈia hˈaki ja maskˈini mˌahakamˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe busˈara hˌuɲamˈaza kˈimja ɲakˈati kˌama hˈizo, kwa kˌuwa ɲakˈati ni m̩bˈaja.|0
tˌafutˈeni mˈema, wˈala si mabˈaja, ˌili mpˈate kuˈiʃi. ndˈipo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatakˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, kˌama msemˈavjo jˈupo nˈaɲi.|0
jˌatʃukiˈeni maˈovu, jˌapendˈeni mˈema; dˌumiʃˈeni hˈaki mˌahakamˈani. jamkˈini bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatawˌahurumˈia mabˈaki ja josˈefu.|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana, bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌasemˈalo: kˌutakuwˈepo mˌaombolˈezo katˌika bˌarabˈara zˈote na vilˈio vja utʃˈuŋɡu katˌika ɲɟˈia kˈuu zˈote. wˌakulˈima wˌataˈitwa kˈuɟa kulˈia, na wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi wˈaɟe kˌuombolˈeza.|0
kˌutakuwˈepo kˌuombolˈeza katˌika maʃˈamba jˈote ja mˌizabˈibu, kwa kˌuwa nˌitapˈita kˌatikˈati jˈenu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˈole wˈenu nˈiɲi mnˌaoˌitamˈani sˈiku ja bwˈana! kwa nˈini mnˌaitamˈani sˈiku ja bwˈana? sˈiku hˈijo ˌitakˈuwa ɡˈiza, si nˈuru.|0
ˌitakˈuwa kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌemkimbˈia sˈimba kˈumbe ˌakakutˈana na dˈubu, kˌama vˈile ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌeiŋɡˈia ɲumbˈani mwˈake na kˌuupumzˈiʃa mkˈono wˌake kwˈeɲe ukˈuta, kˈumbe ˌakaˈumwa na ɲˈoka.|0
ɟˈe, sˈiku ja bwˈana hˌaitakˈuwa ɡˈiza, na si nˈuru: ɡˈiza nˈene, bˌila mwˈonzi wa mwˈaŋɡa.|0
nˌinatʃukˈia, nˌinazˌiðarˈau sˌikukˈuu zˈenu za dˈini; siwˈezi kˌuvumilˈia mˌakusaɲˈiko jˈenu.|0
hˌata iŋɡˈawa mnˌaniletˈea sadˈaka zˈenu za kˌuteketˈezwa na sadˈaka za nafˈaka, sˌitazˌikubˈali. iŋɡˈawa mnˌaniletˈea sadˈaka nzˈuri za amˈani, sˌitazˌitambˈua.|0
nˌiondˌoleˈeni kelˈele za ɲˈimbo zˈenu! sˌitasˌikilˈiza saˈuti za vinˈubi vjˈenu.|0
lakˈini atʃˈeni hˈaki ˌitirirˈike kˌama ˈm̩to, na ˌuadilˈifu ˈuwe kˌama kiɟˈito kˌisitʃˌokaˈuka.|0
ɟˈe, mlˌiniletˈea ðabˈihu na sadˈaka kwa miˈaka ˌarobaˈini kˈule ɟaŋɡwˈani, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
mmˌejainˈua mˌaðabˈahu ja mfˈalme wˈenu, sikˈuθi mˈuŋɡu wˈenu mtawˈala, na kiˈuni mˈuŋɡu wˈenu wa ɲˈota, ambˈao mlˌiwatˌeŋɡenˈeza weɲˈewe.|0
kwa sabˈabu hˈijo nˌitawˌapelˈeka ˌuhamiʃˈoni mbˈali kupˈita damˈeski, asˈema bwˈana, ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ˈole wˈenu nˈiɲi mnˌaostarˈehe na kˌuriðˈika katˌika sajˈuni, na nˈiɲi mnˌaoɟˌisikˈia salˈama ɟˌuːja mlˈima sˌamarˈia, nˈiɲi wˈatu mˌaʃuhˈuri wa taˈifa lˌililˌoendelˈea kulˈiko mˌataˈifa meŋɡˈine, ambˈao wˈatu wa ˌisraˈeli wˌanawˌateɡemˈea.|0
nendˈeni kˈalne mkaˈone kutˈoka hˌuko; mwˈende hˌadi hamˈaθi ilˈijo kˈuu, kˈiʃa mʃˈuke hˌadi ɡˈaθi ja wˌafilˈisti. ɟˈe, wˌao ni bˈora kulˈiko fˈalme zˈenu mbˈili? ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi jˈao ni kˈubwa kulˈiko jˈenu.|0
mnˌaiwˈeka mbˈali sˈiku ilˈijo m̩bˈaja na kulˈeta karˈibu ˌutawˈala wa kˌuoɡˈofja.|0
nˈiɲi mnalˈala ɟˌuːja vitˈanda vˌilivjˌofunˈikwa kwa pˈembe za ndˈovu, na kˌuɟiɲoˈoʃa ɟˌuːja vˈiti vja fahˈari. mnˌaɟilˈiʃa kwa wˌanakondˈoo wazˈuri na ndˈama wˌaliˌonenepˈeʃwa.|0
mnakˈuɲua mvˈiɲo kwa bakˈuli zˌilizoɟˈazwa, na mnˌaɟipˈaka mafˈuta mazˈuri, lakˈini hˌamhuzunˈiki kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja josˈefu.|0
kwa hˈijo mtakˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wa kwˈanza kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni; karˈamu zˈenu na kˌustarˈehe kˌutakˈoma.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌameˈapa kwa nˈafsi jˌake mweɲˈewe: bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote asˈema: nˌatʃukˈia kibˈuri tʃa jakˈobo, nˌatʃukˈia ŋɡˈome zˈake; nˌitautˈoa ˈm̩ɟi wˌao na kˈila kˈitu kˌilitʃˈomo ndˈani mwˈake.|0
kˌama wˈatu kˈumi wˌatabˈaki katˌika ɲˈumba mˈoɟa, wˌao pˈia wˌatakˈufa.|0
kˌama ɟamˈaa ambˈaje ˌatatʃˈoma miˈili akˈiɟa ˌili kˌuitˈoa ɲɟˈe ja ɲˈumba, na kˌumuulˈiza jejˈote ambˈaje bˈado ˌanaɟifˈitʃa hˈumo, ɟˈe, jˈuko ˈm̩tu jejˈote pamˈoɟa nˈawe? nˌaje ˌakisˈema, hapˈana, ndˈipo ˌatakˌaposˈema, ɲamˈaza kˈimja! hˌaturˌuhusˈiwi kutˈaɟa ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˌameamˈuru, nˌaje ˌatabomˈoa ɟˈumba kˈubwa vipˈande vipˈande na ɲˈumba ndˈoɡo vipˈande vidˈoɡo vidˈoɡo.|0
ɟˈe, farˈasi wawˈeza kˌukimbˈia kwˈeɲe miˈamba mikˈali? ɟˈe, awˈeza ˈm̩tu kulˈima hˌuko kwa maksˈai? lakˈini mmˌeɡeˈuza hˈaki kˌuwa sˈumu na matˈunda ja ˌuadilˈifu kˌuwa utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
nˈiɲi mnˌaoʃˌaŋɡilˈia kuʃˈindwa kwa lˈo debˈari na kusˈema, ɟˈe, hˌatukutˈeka kˌarnaˈimu kwa ŋɡˈuvu zˈetu weɲˈewe.|0
maˈana bwˈana mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote asˈema, nˌitainˈua taˈifa ðˈidi jˈenu, ˈee ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, nˈalo lˌitawatˈesa kˌuanzˈia lˈebo hamˈaθi hˌadi bˈonde la arˈaba.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌalilˌonioɲˈeʃa bwˈana mweɲˈezi katˌika maˈono: ˌalikˈuwa ˌanaandˈaa makˈundi ja nzˈiɡe baˌada ja kuvˈunwa fˈuŋɡu la mfˈalme na wakˈati ˈule tu mimˈea ja pˈili ˌilipokˈuwa ˌikitʃipˈua.|0
wakˈati nzˈiɡe wˌalikˈuwa wˌamekˈula mimˈea jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi, nˌililˈia kwa saˈuti kˈuu, bwˈana mweɲˈezi, samˈehe! ɟˈe, jakˈobo ˌatawezˈaɟe kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi? jˌeje ni mdˈoɡo sˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakaɣaˈiri. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, hˈili hˌalitˌatokˈea.|0
hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌalilˌonioɲˈeʃa katˌika maˈono: bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌalikˈuwa ˌakiˈita hukˈumu ja mˈoto; nˌao ˌulikaˈuʃa vilˈindi vikˈuu, ˌukatˌeketˈeza ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ndˈipo nˌikalˈia, bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌakusˈihi, zuˈia! ɟˈe, jakˈobo ˌatawezˈaɟe kˌuendelˈea kuˈiʃi? jˌeje ni mdˈoɡo sˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakaɣaˈiri. bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌakasˈema, hˈili nˈalo hˌalitˌatokˈea.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌalilˌonioɲˈeʃa katˌika maˈono: bwˈana ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama karˈibu na ukˈuta ambˈao ˌulikˈuwa ˌumeɟˈeŋɡwa kwa timˈazi, akˈiwa na ˈuzi wa timˈazi mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakanˌiulˈiza, ɟˈe, amˈosi ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikamɟˈibu, ˈuzi wa timˈazi. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, tazˈama, nˌinawˈeka ˈuzi wa timˈazi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli; sˌitawˌahurumˈia tˈena.|0
mahˈali pa isˈaki pa ɟˈuu pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu pˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa, na mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu pa ˌisraˈeli pa kˌuabudˈia pˌatahˌaribˈiwa; kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu nˌitainˈuka ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja jˌeroboˈamu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌamazˈia kuhˈani wa beθˈeli ˌakatˈuma uɟˈumbe kwa jˌeroboˈamu mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ˌakisˈema: amˈosi ˌanalˈeta fitˈina ɟˈuu jˈako kˌatikˈati ja ˌisraˈeli. ˈn̩tʃi hˌaiwˈezi kˌuvumilˈia manˈeno jˌake jˈote.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈili ndˈilo amˈosi ˌanalosˈema:  jˌeroboˈamu ˌatakˈufa kwa upˈaŋɡa, na kwa hakˈika ˌisraˈeli wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, mbˈali na ˈn̩tʃi jˈao..|0
kˈiʃa ˌamazˈia ˌakamwambˈia amˈosi, nˈenda zˈako, ˈewe mwonˈaɟi! urˈudi katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda. ˌuɟipatˈie rizˈiki jˈako hˌuko na kutˈoa ˌunabˈii wˈako.|0
ˌusiˌendelˈee kutˈoa ˌunabˈii katˌika beθˈeli, kwa sabˈabu hˈapa ni mahˈali pa mfˈalme pa kˌuabudˈia na hekˈalu la ufˈalme hˈuu.|0
amˈosi ˌakamɟˈibu ˌamazˈia, mˌimi sikˈuwa nabˈii wˈala mwˈana wa nabˈii, lakˈini nˌilikˈuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wa kondˈoo na mtˈunza mikˈuju.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakanitˈoa kutˈoka kutʃˈuŋɡa kondˈoo na kˌuniambˈia, nˈenda, ˌukawˌatabirˈie wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli..|0
sˈasa bˈasi, sˌikiˈeni nˈeno la bwˈana. nˈiɲi mnasˈema,  ˌusitabˈiri ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli, na uˈatʃe kˌuhubˈiri ðˈidi ja ɲˈumba ja isˈaki..|0
kwa hˈijo hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana:  ˈm̩ke wˈako ˌatakˈuwa kahˈaba mɟˈini, nˌao wˈana wˈako na bˈinti zˈako wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa. ʃˈamba lˈako lˌitapˈimwa na kˌuɡawˈaɲua, na wˌewe mweɲˈewe ˌutafˈia katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌipaɡˈani. nˈajo ˌisraˈeli kwa hakˈika ˌitakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, mbˈali na ˈn̩tʃi jˈao..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌalilˌonioɲˈeʃa bwˈana mweɲˈezi katˌika maˈono: kikˈapu tʃa matˈunda jˌalijoˈiva.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, amˈosi, ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikaɟˈibu, kikˈapu tʃˌeɲe matˈunda jˌalijoˈiva. ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, wakˈati ˌumewadˈia kwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli; sˌitawˌahurumˈia zaˈidi.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi asˈema, katˌika sˈiku ˈile, ɲˈimbo katˌika hekˈalu zˌitaɡeˈuka kˌuwa mˌaombolˈezo. miˈili mˈiŋɡi, mˈiŋɡi sˈana: ˌitatˈupwa kˈila mahˈali! kˈimja.|0
lˌisikiˈeni hˈili, nˈiɲi ambˈao mnˌawaɡˌandamˈiza wˌahitˈaɟi, na kˌuwaonˈea maskˈini wa ˈn̩tʃi.|0
mkisˈema, ni lˈini mwˈezi mwandˈamo ˌutakˌapopˈita ˌili tupˈate kuˈuza nafˈaka, na sabˈato ˌitakwˈiʃa lˈini ˌili tuwˈeze kuˈuza ŋɡˈano? mkˌipuŋɡˈuza vipˈimo, na kˌuoŋɡˈeza bˈei, na kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa kwa mizˈani zisˈizo sˈawa.|0
mkˌiwanunˈua maskˈini kwa fˈeða, na wˌahitˈaɟi kwa ɟˈozi ja viˈatu, na mkiˈuza hˌata tˌakatˈaka za ŋɡˈano pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈano.|0
ɟˈe, ˈn̩tʃi hˌaitˌatetemˈeka kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili, nˌao wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani mwˈake hˌawatˌaombolˈeza? ˈn̩tʃi jˈote ˌitainˈuka kˌama naˈili; ˌitapˈanda na kuʃˈuka kˌama ˈm̩to wa mˈisri.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, nˌitalifˈaɲa ɟˈua litˈue ˌalasˈiri na kˌuifˈaɲa dunˈia ˈiwe ɡˈiza wakˈati wa mtʃˈana mwaŋɡˈavu.|0
nˌitaɡeˈuza sˌikukˈuu zˈenu za kidˈini kˌuwa mˌaombolˈezo, na kuˈimba kwˈenu kˈote kˈuwe kilˈio. nˌitawafˈaɲa nˈiɲi ɲˈote mvˈae ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia na kuɲˈoa ɲuˈele zˈenu. nˌitaufˈaɲa wakˈati ˈule ˈuwe kˌama wa kˌuombˌolezˈea mwˈana wa pekˈee, na mwˈiʃo wˌake kˌama sˈiku ja utʃˈuŋɡu.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana mweɲˈezi, wakˈati nˌitakˌapotˈuma ɲɟˈaa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote: si ɲɟˈaa ja tʃakˈula wˈala kˈiu ja mˈaɟi, lakˈini ɲɟˈaa ja kˌusikˈia manˈeno ja bwˈana.|0
wˌanaˈume wˌatajˌumbajˈumba kutˈoka bahˈari hˌadi bahˈari na kˌutaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kutˈoka kˌaskazˈini mpˈaka mˌaʃarˈiki, wˌakitafˈuta nˈeno la bwˈana, lakˈini hˌawatˌalipˈata.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile wˌasitʃˈana wazˈuri na viɟˈana wˌanaˈume wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌatazimˈia kwa sabˈabu ja kˈiu.|0
wˈale wˌaapˈao kwa aˈibu ja sˌamarˈia, ˌau kusˈema, hakˈika kˌama miˈuŋɡu jˈenu ˌiiʃˈivjo, ˈee dˈani, ˌau hakˈika kˌama mˈuŋɡu wa bˈeer ʃˈeba ˌaiʃˈivjo: wˌataaŋɡˈuka, wˈala hˌawatˌasimˈama tˈena.|0
nˌilimwˈona bwˈana akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama kˈando ja mˌaðabˈahu, nˌaje ˌakasˈema: pˈiɡa vˈitʃwa vja ŋɡˈuzo ˌili vˌiziŋɡˈiti vˌitikisˈike. vˌiaŋɡˈuʃe ɟˌuːja vˈitʃwa vja wˈatu wˈote; na wˈale wˌatakˌaosalˈia nˌitawaˈua kwa upˈaŋɡa. hakˈuna awˈaje jˈote ˌatakˌajekimbˈia, hakˈuna ˌatakˌajetorˈoka.|0
wˌaɟapˌoɟitʃimbˈia tʃˈini mpˈaka kwˈeɲe vˈina vja kuzˈimu, kutˈoka hˌuko mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ˌutawatˈoa. wˌaɟapopˈanda ɟˈuu hˌadi kwˈeɲe mbˈiŋɡu, kutˈoka hˌuko nˌitawaʃˈuʃa.|0
wˌaɟapˌoɟifˈitʃa ɟˌuːja kilˈele tʃa karmˈeli, hˌuko nˌitawawˈinda na kˌuwakamˈata. wˌaɟapˌoɟifˈitʃa kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wˈaŋɡu katˌika vilˈindi vja bahˈari, hˌuko nˈako nˌitaamˈuru ɟˈoka kˌuwaˈuma.|0
wˌaɟapˌopelˈekwa ˌuhamiʃˈoni na adˈui zˈao, hˌuko nˈako nˌitaamˈuru upˈaŋɡa ˌuwaˈue. nˌitawˌakazˈia mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu kwa mabˈaja wˈala si kwa mazˈuri.|0
bwˈana, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, jˌeje ˌaɡusˈaje dunˈia nˈajo ˌikajejˈuka, na wˈote wˌakaˈao ndˈani mwˈake wˌakaˌombolˈeza: nˈajo ˈn̩tʃi jˈote hˌuinˈuka kˌama naˈili, kˈiʃa huʃˈuka kˌama ˈm̩to wa mˈisri.|0
jˌeje ambˈaje huɟˈeŋɡa ɟˈumba lˈake la kifˈalme katˌika mbˈiŋɡu na kˌuisimˈika misˈiŋɡi jˌake ɟˌuːja dunˈia, jˌeje ˌaitˈaje mˈaɟi ja bahˈari na kˌujamwˈaɡa ɟˌuːja ˈuso wa ˈn̩tʃi: bwˈana ndˈilo ɟˈina lˈake.|0
ɟˈe, wˌaisraˈeli, nˈiɲi si sˈawa kwˈaŋɡu kˌama wakˈuʃi? asˈema bwˈana. ɟˈe, sˌikulˈeta ˌisraˈeli kutˈoka mˈisri, wˌafilˈisti kutˈoka kaftˈori, na waʃˈamu kutˈoka kˈiri.|0
hakˈika mˈatʃo ja bwˈana mweɲˈezi jˈako ɟˌuːja ufˈalme wˌeɲe ðˈambi. nˌami nˌitaˌuaŋɡamˈiza kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa dunˈia: hˌata hˈivjo sˌitaˌiaŋɡamˈiza kabˈisa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwa nˌitatˈoa ˈamri, na nˌitaˌipepˈeta ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote, kˌama vˈile nafˈaka ˌipepetwˈavjo katˌika ˈuŋɡo, na hakˈuna hˌata pˈuɲɟe mˈoɟa ˌitakˌajoaŋɡˈuka tʃˈini.|0
watˈenda ðˈambi wˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa, wˈale wˈote wˌasemˈao, maˈafa hˌajatˌatupˈata wˈala kˌutukˈuta..|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile nˌitaˌisimamˈiʃa hˈema ja daˈudi ˌilijˌoaŋɡˈuka. nˌitakˌarabˈati mahˈali pˌalipˌobomˈoka na kuɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja maɡˈofu jˈake, na kˌuiɟˈeŋɡa kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa awˈali.|0
ˌili wapˈate kˌujamilˈiki mabˈaki ja edˈomu, na mˌataˈifa jˈote jˈale jˌanajobˈeba ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana ambˈaje ˌatafˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja.|0
sˈiku zˌinakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana, wakˈati mvunˈaɟi ˌatatˌaŋɡulˈiwa na mkulˈima, nˌaje mpˈanzi ˌatatˌaŋɡulˈiwa na jˌeje ˌakamuˈaje zabˈibu. divˈai ˈm̩pja ˌitadondˈoka kutˈoka mˌilimˈani, na kˌutirirˈika kutˈoka vilˈima vjˈote.|0
nˌitawˌareɟˈeʃa tˈena wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌisraˈeli wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa; wˌataiɟˈeŋɡa tˈena mˈiɟi ˌilijoˈatʃwa maɡˈofu, nˌao wˌataˈiʃi ndˈani mwˈake. wˌatapˈanda mˌizabˈibu na kˈuɲua divˈai jˈake; wˌatalˈima bustˈani na kˈula matˈunda jˈake.|0
nˌitaipˈanda ˌisraˈeli katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈao weɲˈewe, hˌawatˌaŋɡolˈewa tˈena kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo nˌimewˈapa, asˈema bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu.|0
maˈono ja ˌobadˈia. hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mweɲˈezi kuhˈusu edˈomu: tˌumesikˈia uɟˈumbe kutˈoka kwa bwˈana: mɟˈumbe ˌalitˈumwa kwa mˌataˈifa kusˈema, ˌinukˈeni, twendˈeni tˌukapiɡˈane vˈita ðˈidi jˈake.|0
ˌaŋɡaliˈeni, nˌitawafˈaɲa wadˈoɡo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, mtˌaðarˌaulˈiwa kabˈisa.|0
kibˈuri tʃa mˈojo wˈako kˌimekˌudaŋɡˈaɲa, wˌewe ˌunajeˈiʃi katˌika mˌaɟabˈali ja miˈamba na kufˈaɲa makˈao jˈako ɟˈuu, wˌewe ˌunajˌeɟiambˈia mweɲˈewe, ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuniʃˈuʃa tʃˈini?.|0
iŋɡˈawa ˌunapˈaa ɟˈuu kˌama tˈai na kufˈaɲa kiˈota tʃˈako kˈati ja ɲˈota, nˌitakuʃˈuʃa tʃˈini kutˈoka hˌuko, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ikˈiwa wˈevi wˌaŋɡekˈuɟa kwˈako, ikˈiwa wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi wˌaŋɡekuɟˈia usˈiku: lˈo! tazˈama ni maˈafa kiˈasi ɡˈani jˌaŋɡekˈuwa jˌanakˌuŋɡoɟˈea: ɟˈe, si wˌaŋɡeˈiba tu kiˈasi ambˈatʃo wˌaŋɡehitˈaɟi? kˌama watʃˈuma zabˈibu wˌaŋɡekˈuɟa kwˈako, ɟˈe, wˌasiŋɡˌebakˈiza zabˈibu tʃˈatʃe.|0
wˈote ˌuliˌouŋɡˈana nˌao wˌatakˌufukˈuza hˌadi mpakˈani, rafˈiki zˈako wˌatakˌudaŋɡˈaɲa na kˌukuʃˈinda, wˈale wˌanaokˈula mkˈate wˈako wˌatakˌuteɡˈea mtˈeɡo, lakˈini hˌutawˈeza kˌuuɡundˈua.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, asˈema bwˈana, ɟˈe, sˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza wˈatu wˌeɲe hekˈima wa edˈomu, wˈatu wˌeɲe ˌufahˈamu katˌika milˈima ja esˈau.|0
ˈee temˈani, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˈako wˌatatˈiwa hˈofu, kˈila mmˈoɟa katˌika milˈima ja esˈau ˌataaŋɡˈuʃwa tʃˈini kwa kutʃˈiɲɟua.|0
kwa sabˈabu ja ɟeˈuri ˌulijofˈaɲa ðˈidi ja ndˈuɡu jˈako jakˈobo, aˈibu ˌitakˌufunˈika; ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa milˈele.|0
sˈiku ˈile ˌulisimˈama mbˈali ˌukiˌaŋɡalˈia wakˈati waɡˈeni wˌalipˌoɟitʃˌukulˈia ˌutaɟˈiri wˌake na wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi ɲiŋɡˈine wˌalipˌoiŋɡˈia malˈaŋɡo jˌake wˌakipˈiɡa kˈura kwa aɟˈili ja jˌerusalˈemu, ˌulikˈuwa kˌama mmˈoɟa wˈao.|0
ˌusiŋɡˌemðarˈau ndˈuɡu jˈako katˌika sˈiku ja msˈiba wˈake, wˈala kˌufurahˈia ɟˌuːja wˈatu wa jˈuda katˌika sˈiku ja mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˈao, wˈala kˌuɟiɡˈamba sˈana katˌika sˈiku ja taˈabu jˈao.|0
ˌusiŋɡˌeiŋɡˈia katˌika malˈaŋɡo ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa jˈao, wˈala kˌuwaðarˈau katˌika ɟˈaŋɡa lˈao katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa jˈao, wˈala kˌuɲaŋɡˈaɲa mˈali zˈao katˌika sˈiku ja maˈafa jˈao.|0
ˌusiŋɡeŋɡˈoɟa kwˈeɲe ɲɟˈia pˈanda na kˌuwaˈua wˌakimbˈizi wˈao, wˈala kˌuwatˈoa wˈatu wˌake wˌaliˌosalˈia katˌika sˈiku ja ʃˈida jˈao.|0
sˈiku ja bwˈana ˈiko karˈibu kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote. kˌama ˌulivjofˈaɲa, nˌawe ˌutafaɲˈiwa vˈivjo hˈivjo, matˈendo jˈako jˌatakˌurudˈia ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃˈako.|0
kˌama vˈile ˌulivjokˈuɲua ɟˌuːja mlˈima wˈaŋɡu mtˌakatˈifu, vˈivjo hˈivjo mˌataˈifa jˈote wˌatakˈuɲua mfˌululˈizo, wˌatakˈuɲua na kˈuɲua, nˌao wˌatatowˈeka kˈana kwˌamba hˌawaɟawˈahi kuwˈepo.|0
lakˈini katˌika mlˈima sajˈuni kˌutakuwˈepo na wˈale wˌatakˌaookˈoka; nˌao ˌutakˈuwa mtˌakatˈifu, nˈajo ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo ˌitamilˈiki urˈiθi wˈake.|0
ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo ˌitakˈuwa mˈoto, na ɲˈumba ja josˈefu ˌitakˈuwa mwˈali wa mˈoto; nˈajo ɲˈumba ja esˈau ˌitakˈuwa bˈua kˈavu, nˌao wˌataiwˈaʃa mˈoto na kˌuitˌeketˈeza. hˌakutakˈuwa na wˌatakˌaosˌalimˈika kutˈoka ɲˈumba ja esˈau. bwˈana ˌamesˈema.|0
wˈatu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja neɡˈebu wˌataˌikalˈia milˈima ja esˈau, na wˈatu kutˈoka mˌiterˈemko ja vilˈima wˌatamilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti. wˌatajˌakalˈia maʃˈamba ja ˌefraˈimu na sˌamarˈia, nˌaje bˌeɲamˈini ˌatamilˈiki ɡˌileˈadi.|0
kˈundi la wˌaisraˈeli wˌaliˈoko ˌuhamiʃˈoni kˌanaˈani wˌatarˈudi na kˌumilˈiki ˈn̩tʃi mpˈaka sarˈepta. wˌaliˈoko ˌuhamiʃˈoni sˌefarˈadi kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu wˌatamilˈiki mˈiɟi ja neɡˈebu.|0
wˌaokoˈaɟi wˌatakwˈea ɟˌuːja mlˈima sajˈuni kˌutawˈala milˈima ja esˈau. nˌao ufˈalme ˌutakˈuwa wa bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia jˈona mwˈana wa ˌamitˈai.|0
nˈenda katˌika ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa wa ninˈawi ˌukahubˈiri ɟˈuu jˈake, kwa sabˈabu uˈovu wˌake ˌumekˈuɟa ɟˈuu mbˈele zˈaŋɡu.|0
lakˈini jˈona ˌalimkimbˈia bwˈana na kˌuelekˈea tarʃˈiʃi. ˌaliʃˈuka mpˈaka jˈafa, ambˈapo ˌalikˈuta mˈeli ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimepˈaŋɡwa kˌuelekˈea bandˈari ˈile. baˌada ja kulˈipa naˈuli, ˌakapˈanda melˈini na kˌuelekˈea tarʃˈiʃi ˌili kˌumkimbˈia bwˈana.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana ˌakatˈuma upˈepo mkˈali bˌaharˈini, nˈajo ðorˈuba kˈali sˈana ˌikavˈuma hˌata mˈeli ikˈawa hˌatarˈini kˌuvuɲɟˈika.|0
mˌabaharˈia wˈote wˌalioɡˈopa na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌakamlilˈia mˈuŋɡu wˌake mweɲˈewe. nˌao wˌakatˈupa mizˈiɡo bˌaharˈini ˌili mˈeli ˌipuŋɡˈue uzˈito. lakˈini jˈona ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˌeremkˈia tʃˈumba tʃa ndˈani ja mˈeli, mahˈali ambˈapo ˌalilˈala na kupˈatwa na ˌusiŋɡˈizi mzˈito.|0
nahˈoða ˌakamwendˈea na kusˈema, wˌewe ˌunawezˈaɟe kulˈala? ˈamka ˌukamwˈite mˈuŋɡu wˈako! huˈenda ˌakatˌuaŋɡalˈia, tˌusiˌaŋɡamˈie.|0
kˈiʃa mˌabaharˈia wˌakasˌemezˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, ɲɟoˈoni, tupˈiɡe kˈura tˌumtafˈute ˌanajˌehusˈika na maˈafa hˈaja. wˌakapˈiɡa kˈura, kˈura ˌikamwˌaŋɡukˈia jˈona.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌalimˌuulˈiza, tˌuambˈie, ni nˈani ˌanajˌehusˈika kwa kˌutuletˈea tatˈizo hˈili lˈote? ˌunafˈaɲa kˈazi ɡˈani? ˌumetˈoka wˈapi? ˈn̩tʃi jˈako ni ˈipi? wˌewe ni kutˈoka taˈifa lˈipi.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, mˌimi ni mwˌebranˈia, nˌami nˌamwabˈudu bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa mbiŋɡˈuni, ˌalijeˈumba bahˈari na ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu.|0
hˈili lˌiliwˌaoɡopˈeʃa nˌao wˌakamˌuulˈiza, ˌumefˈaɲa nˈini? wˌaliɟˈua ˌalikˈuwa ˌanamkimbˈia bwˈana, kwa sabˈabu ˌaliʃˌawaambˈia hˈivjo..|0
bahˈari ˌilikˈuwa ˌinazˈidi kˌutʃafˈuka. kwa hˈijo wˌalimˌuulˈiza, tˌukutendˈee nˈini ˌili kufˈaɲa bahˈari ˌitulˈie kwa aɟˈili jˈetu.|0
ˌakawaɟˈibu, nˌiinuˈeni mnitˈupe bˌaharˈini, nˈajo ˌitakˈuwa ʃwˈari. nˌinaɟˈua mawˈimbi hˈaja makˈubwa jˌamewˌatokˈea kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa lˈaŋɡu.|0
badˈala jˈake, wˈale wˈatu wˌaliɟˌitahˈidi kupˈiɡa mˌakasˈia wˌawezˈavjo ˌili wapˈate kurˈudi pwˈani. lakˈini hˌawakuwˈeza, kwa kˌuwa bahˈari ˌilizˈidi kˌutʃafˈuka kulˈiko mwˈanzo.|0
ndˈipo wˌakamlilˈia bwˈana, ˈee bwˈana, tˌafaðˈali ˌusituˈue kwa kˌuondˈoa uhˈai wa ˈm̩tu hˈuju. ˌusitˌuhesabˈie hatˈia kwa kˌuutˈoa uhˈai wa ˈm̩tu ˌasijekˈuwa na hatˈia, kwa kˌuwa wˈewe, ˈee bwˈana, ˌumefˈaɲa kˌama ˌilivjˌokupendˈeza.|0
kˈiʃa wˌalimtʃukˈua jˈona, wˌakamtˈupa bˌaharˈini nˈajo bahˈari ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimetʃafˈuka ˌikatulˈia.|0
katˌika ɟˈambo hˈili wˈatu wˌakamwoɡˈopa bwˈana sˈana, wˌakamtolˈea bwˈana ðabˈihu na kˌumwekˈea naðˈiri.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwandˈaa ɲaŋɡˈumi kummˈeza jˈona, nˌaje jˈona ˌalikˈuwa ndˈani ja tˈumbo la ɲaŋɡˈumi kwa sˈiku tˈatu, usˈiku na mtʃˈana.|0
akˈiwa ndˈani ja tˈumbo la ɲaŋɡˈumi, jˈona ˌalimwˈomba bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
ˌakasˈema: katˌika ʃˈida jˈaŋɡu nˌalimwˈita bwˈana, nˌaje ˌakaniɟˈibu. kutˈoka kˈina tʃa kabˈuri nˌiliˈomba msaˈada, nˌawe ˌukasˌikilˈiza kilˈio tʃˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌulinitˈupa kwˈeɲe kilˈindi, ndˈani kabˈisa ja mˈojo wa bahˈari, mikˈondo ja mˈaɟi ˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka, mawˈimbi jˈako jˈote na viwˈimbi vˌilipˈita ɟˈuu jˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌikasˈema, nˌimefˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali na ˈuso wˈako, hˌata hˈivjo nˌitatazˈama tˈena kˌuelekˈea hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu..|0
mˈaɟi jˌalijˌonimˈeza jˌalinitˈiʃa, kilˈindi kˌilinˌizuŋɡˈuka; mwˈani ˌuliɟˌisokˈota kitʃwˈani pˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌilizˈama tʃˈini sˈana mpˈaka pˈande za mwˈiʃo za milˈima, mˌakomˈeo ja hˈijo ˈn̩tʃi jˌalinˌifuŋɡˈia hˌata milˈele. lakˈini ˌuliulˈeta uhˈai wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ʃimˈoni, ˈee bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu.|0
wakˈati uhˈai wˈaŋɡu ˌulipokˈuwa ˌunatˈoka, nˌilikˌukumbˈuka wˈewe, bwˈana, nˈajo maˈombi jˈaŋɡu jˌalikˌufikˈia wˈewe, katˌika hekˈalu lˈako tˌakatˈifu.|0
wˈale wˈatu wˌanaˌoŋɡaŋɡˈana na sanˈamu zˌisizofˈaa hˌupotˈeza neˈema ˈile ambˈajo ˌiŋɡekˈuwa jˈao.|0
lakˈini mˈimi, kwa wˈimbo wa ʃukrˈani, nˌitakˌutolˈea ðabˈihu. lˈile nˌililˌowekˈea naðˈiri nˌitalˌitimˈiza. wokˈovu watˈoka kwa bwˈana.|0
bˌasi bwˈana ˌakamwamˈuru jˈule ɲaŋɡˈumi, nˌaje ˌakamtapˈika jˈona katˌika ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu.|0
ndˈipo nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia jˈona mˈara ja pˈili.|0
ondˈoka uˈende katˌika ˈm̩ɟi mkˈubwa wa ninˈawi, ˌukaˌutaŋɡazˈie uɟˈumbe nˌinaokˈupa.|0
jˈona ˌakalitˈii nˈeno la bwˈana nˌaje ˌakaˈenda ninˈawi. bˌasi ninˈawi ˌulikˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi mˌaarˈufu sˈana, ˌilitʃukˈua sˈiku tˈatu kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka.|0
sˈiku ja kwˈanza, jˈona ˌaliiŋɡˈia mɟˈini. ˌakataŋɡˈaza: baˌada ja sˈiku ˌarobaˈini ninˈawi ˌutaˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
wˈatu wa ninˈawi wˌakamwamˈini mˈuŋɡu, wˌakataŋɡˈaza kufˈuŋɡa, wˈatu wˈote kˌuanzˈia mkˈubwa sˈana hˌadi jˈule mdˈoɡo kabˈisa, wˌakavˈaa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia.|0
habˈari zˌilipˌomfikˈia mfˈalme wa ninˈawi, ˌaliondˈoka kwˈeɲe kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi, ˌakavˈua maɟˈoho jˌake ja kifˈalme, ˌakaɟˌifunˈika ŋɡˈuo ja ɡunˈia kˈiʃa ˌakakˈeti tʃˈini mˌavumbˈini.|0
ndˈipo ˌakatˈoa taŋɡˈazo katˌika ninˈawi jˈote: kwa ˈamri ja mfˈalme na wakˈuu wˈake: msˌiruhˈusu ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌau mɲˈama, makˈundi ja ŋɡˈombe ˌau waɲˈama weŋɡˈine wˌafuɡwˈao, kuˈoɲɟa kˈitu tʃotʃˈote, msˌiwaruhˈusu kˈula wˈala kˈuɲua.|0
bˌali wˌanadˈamu na waɲˈama wˌafunˈikwe kwa ŋɡˈuo za ɡunˈia. kˈila mmˈoɟa afˈaɲe hˈima kumwˈomba mˈuŋɡu. wˌaziˈatʃe ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja na ˌuðalˈimu ulˈio mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
ni nˈani ˌaɟuˈaje? huˈenda mˈuŋɡu ˌakaɣaˈiri kwa hurˈuma jˌake ˌakaˈatʃa hasˈira jˌake kˈali ˌili tˌusiˌaŋɡamˈie.|0
