mˈuŋɡu ˌalipoˈona wˌalivjofˈaɲa na ɟˈinsi wˌalivjˌoɡeˈuka kutˈoka ɲɟˈia zˈao m̩bˈaja, akˈawa na hurˈuma wˈala hˌakulˈeta mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ɟˈuu jˈao kˌama ˌalivjokˈuwa ˌameˈoɲa.|0
lakˈini jˈona ˌalitʃukˈizwa sˈana ˌakakˌasirˈika.|0
ˌakamwˈomba bwˈana, ˈee bwˈana, hˈili si lˈile nˌililˌolisˈema nˌilipokˈuwa niŋɡˈali ɲumbˈani? hˌii n̩dˈijo sabˈabu nˌilihˌarikˈiʃa kˌukimbilˈia tarʃˈiʃi. nˌikifahˈamu kˌuwa wˌewe ni mˈuŋɡu mwˌeɲe neˈema na hurˈuma, si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira na ˌumeɟˈaa upˈendo, ni mˈuŋɡu ambˈaje hˌuɣaˈiri katˌika kˌupelˈeka maˈafa.|0
sˈasa, ˈee bwˈana, nˌiondolˈee uhˈai wˈaŋɡu, kwa kˌuwa ni ˌafaðˈali mˌimi nˈife kulˈiko kuˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamɟˈibu, ɟˈe unˈajo hˈaki jojˈote kˌukasirˈika.|0
jˈona ˌakatˈoka ɲɟˈe ˌakakˈeti mahˈali upˈande wa mˌaʃarˈiki wa ˈm̩ɟi. hˈapo ˌakaɟˌiteŋɡˌenezˈea kibˈanda, ˌakakˈeti kwˈeɲe kivˈuli tʃˈake na kˌuŋɡoɟˈea ni nˈini kˌitakˌatʃotokˈea katˌika ˈm̩ɟi.|0
ndˈipo bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu ˌakawˈeka tajˈari mzabˈibu na kˌuufˈaɲa uˈote, kˈumpa jˈona kivˈuli kˌilitʃˌomfunˈika kˈitʃwa ˌili kˌuondˈoa taˈabu jˈake, nˌaje jˈona ˌakafurˈahi sˈana kwa aɟˈili ja ˈule mzabˈibu.|0
lakˈini kˈeʃo jˌake ˌasubˈuhi na mapˈema mˈuŋɡu ˌakaamˈuru bˈuu, ˌautafˈune mzabˈibu hˈuo nˌao ˌukaɲaˈuka.|0
wakˈati ɟˈua lˌilipˌotʃomˈoza, mˈuŋɡu ˌakautˈuma upˈepo wa hˈari wa mˌaʃarˈiki, nˈalo ɟˈua lˌikawˈaka ɟˌuːja kˈitʃwa tʃa jˈona mpˈaka ˌakazimˈia. ˌakatamˈani kˈufa, nˌaje ˌakasˈema, ni ˌafaðˈali mˌimi nˈife kulˈiko kuˈiʃi.|0
lakˈini mˈuŋɡu ˌalimwambˈia jˈona, ɟˈe, unˈajo hˈaki kˌukasirˈika kuhˈusu mzabˈibu hˈuo? ˌakasˈema, n̩dˈijo, ninˈajo hˈaki. nˌimekˌasirˈika kiˈasi tʃa kˈufa.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia, wˌewe ˌunakˌasirˈika kwa aɟˈili ja mzabˈibu hˈuu, nˌawe hˌukuˌusababˈiʃa kuˈota wˈala kˌuutˈunza. ˌuliˈota usˈiku mmˈoɟa, nˌao ukˈafa usˈiku mmˈoɟa.|0
lakˈini ninˈawi ˈina zaˈidi ja wˈatu mˌiamˈoɟanˌa iʃirˈini,sifˈurisifˈuri sifˈuri ambˈao hˌawawˈezi kˌupambanˈua kulˈia ˌau kuʃˈoto, pamˈoɟa na ŋɡˈombe wˈeŋɡi. ɟˈe, hˌainipˈasi kˌufikˈiri ɟˌuːja ˈm̩ɟi ˈule mkˈubwa.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia mˈika, mmˌoreʃˈeθi, wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa joθˈamu, ahˈazi na hˌezekˈia, wafˈalme wa jˈuda; ˌufunˈuo ˌaliˌouˈona kuhˈusu sˌamarˈia na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
sˌikiˈeni, ˈeɲi mˌataˈifa, ˈeɲi ɲˈote, sˌikilizˈeni, ˈee dunˈia na wˈote mliˈomo ndˈani jˈake, ˌili bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌaʃuhudˈie ðˈidi jˈenu, bwˈana kutˈoka hekˈalu lˈake tˌakatˈifu.|0
milˈima ˌinajejˈuka tʃˈini jˌake na mabˈonde jˌanaɡˌawaɲˈika kˌama ˈn̩ta mbˈele ja mˈoto, kˌama mˈaɟi jˌatirˌirikˈajo kˈasi kwˈeɲe mterˈemko.|0
jˈote hˈaja ni kwa sabˈabu ja kˈosa la jakˈobo, ni kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi za ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. kˈosa la jakˈobo ni lˈipi? ɟˈe, sˈio sˌamarˈia? ɟˈe, mahˈali pa ɟˈuu pa jˈuda pa kˌuabudˈia miˈuŋɡu ni nˈini? ɟˈe, sˈio jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌitaufˈaɲa sˌamarˈia kˌuwa lˈundo la kokˈoto, mahˈali pa kˌuotˈeʃa mˌizabˈibu. nˌitajamwˈaɡa mˈawe jˌake katˌika bˈonde na kuˈatʃa wˈazi misˈiŋɡi jˈake.|0
sanˈamu zˌake zˈote zˌitavˈuɲɟua vipˈande vipˈande; zawˈadi zˌake zˈote za hekˈalu zˌitatʃˈomwa kwa mˈoto; nˌitaharˈibu viɲˈaɡo vjˈake vjˈote. kwa kˌuwa ˌalikusˈaɲa zawˈadi zˌake kˌutokˈana na uɟˈira wa kahˈaba, nˈazo zˌitatumˈika tˈena kulˈipa mˌiʃahˈara ja kahˈaba.|0
kwa aɟˈili ja hˈili nˌitalˈia na kˌuombolˈeza; nˌitatembˈea bˌila viˈatu na tˈena ˈutʃi. nˌitabwˈeka kˌama mbwˈeha na kˌuombolˈeza kˌama bˈundi.|0
kwa sabˈabu ɟerˈaha lˈake hˌalitibˈiki; lˌimekˈuɟa jˈuda. lˌimefˈika hˈasa kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, hˌata jˌerusalˈemu kweɲˈewe.|0
ˌusilisˈeme hˈili hˌuko ɡˈaθi; ˌusilˈie hˌata kidˈoɡo. hˌuko bˈeθle ˈafra ɡˌaaɡˈaa mˌavumbˈini.|0
pitˈeni mkˈiwa ˈutʃi na wˌeɲe aˈibu, nˈiɲi ˌm̩kaˈao ʃafˈiri. wˈale wˌaiʃˈio sˌaanˈani hˌawatatˈoka ɲɟˈe. bˈeθ esˈeli ˈiko katˌika mˌaombolˈezo; kˈiŋɡa jˌake ˌimeˌondolˈewa kwˈako.|0
wˈale wˌaiʃˈio marˈoθi wˌanaɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa mˌaumˈivu wˌakiŋɡˈoɟa msaˈada, kwa sabˈabu mˌaaŋɡamˈizi jˌamekˈuɟa kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, hˌata katˌika lˈaŋɡo la jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˈeɲi ˌm̩kaˈao lakˈiʃi, fuŋɡˈeni farˈasi kwˈeɲe maɡˈari ja vˈita. mlikˈuwa tʃˈanzo tʃa ðˈambi kwa bˈinti sajˈuni, kwa kˌuwa makˈosa ja ˌisraˈeli jˌalikˈutwa kwˈako.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌutaˈipa morˈeʃeθ ɡˈaθi zawˈadi za kˌuaɡˈana. ˈm̩ɟi wa akzˈibu ˌutaoɲˈeʃa wˈazi ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu kwa wafˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli.|0
nˌitawˌaleteˈeni ˌatakˌajewaʃˈinda nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi marˈeʃa. jˌeje alˈije ˌutukˈufu wa ˌisraˈeli ˌatakˈuɟa ˌadulˈamu.|0
ɲoˈeni ɲuˈele zˈenu katˌika kˌuombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili ja watˈoto wˈenu mnˌaowˌafurahˈia; ɟˌifaɲiˈeni upˈara kˌama tˈai, kwa kˌuwa wˌatawaˈatʃa na kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni.|0
ˈole kwa wˈale wˌapaŋɡˈao uˈovu, kwa wˈale wˌafaɲˈao ʃaˈuri la hˈila vˌitandˈani m̩wˈao! kˌunapˌopambazˈuka wˌanalˌitimˈiza kwa sabˈabu ˈuko katˌika uwˈezo wˌao kˌutekelˈeza.|0
wˌanatamˈani maʃˈamba na kˌujakamˈata, pˈia ɲˈumba na kˌuzitʃukˈua. wˌanamlaɣˈai mwˌanaˈume ɲˈumba jˈake, mwˌanadˈamu mwenzˈake urˈiθi wˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo, bwˈana asˈema: nˌinapˈaŋɡa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ðˈidi ja wˈatu hˈawa, ambˈajo hamwˈezi kˌuɟiokˈoa weɲˈewe. hˌamtatembˈea tˈena kwa mˌaɟivˈuno, kwa kˌuwa ˌutakˈuwa ni wakˈati wa maˈafa.|0
sˈiku hˈijo wˈatu wˌatawˌaðihˈaki, wˌatawˌafaɲˈia mzˈaha kwa wˈimbo hˈuu wa mˌaombolˈezo: tˌumeˌaŋɡamˈizwa kabˈisa; mˈali ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ˌimeɡawˈaɲua. ˌamenˌiɲaŋɡˈaɲa! ˌametˈoa maʃˈamba jˈetu kwa wˌasalˈiti..|0
kwa hˈijo hˌutakˈuwa na jejˈote katˌika kˌusaɲˈiko la bwˈana wa kˌuɡawˈaɲa maʃˈamba kwa kˈura.|0
mˌanabˈii wˌao husˈema, ˌusitabˈiri. ˌusitabˈiri kuhˈusu vˈitu hˈivi; aˈibu hˌaitˌatupˈata.|0
ɟˈe, ˌiŋɡesˈemwa, ˈee ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo: ɟˈe, rˈoho wa bwˈana ˌamekˌasirˈika? ɟˈe, jˌeje hufˈaɲa vˈitu kˌama hˈivjo? ɟˈe, manˈeno jˈaŋɡu hˌajamfaɲˈii mˈema jˌeje ambˈaje ɲɟˈia zˌake ni ɲˈofu.|0
sˈiku hˈizi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌameinˈuka kˌama adˈui. ˌunawavˈua ɟˈoho la kˌitaɟˈiri wˈale wˌanaopˈita pasˈipo kuɟˈali, kˌama wˈatu wˌarudˈio kutˈoka vitˈani.|0
ˌunawˌahamˈiʃa wˌanawˈake wa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba zˈao za kˌupendˈeza. ˌunaondˈoa barˈaka jˈaŋɡu kwa watˈoto wˌao milˈele.|0
inˈuka, nˈenda zˈako! kwa maˈana hˈapa sˈio mahˈali pˈako pa kˌupumzikˈia, kwa sabˈabu pˌametˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi, pˌamehˌaribˈiwa, wˈala hˌapatˌeŋɡenezˈeki tˈena.|0
ikˈiwa mwˈoŋɡo na mdˌaŋɡaɲˈifu ˌatakˈuɟa na kusˈema, nˌitawˌatabirˈia divˈai na pˈombe kwa wˈiŋɡi, ˌaŋɡekˈuwa n̩dˈije nabˈii ˌanajˌekubalˈika na wˈatu hˈawa.|0
hakˈika nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa nˈiɲi ɲˈote, ˈee jakˈobo, hakˈika nˌitawalˈeta pamˈoɟa mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli. nˌitawalˈeta pamˈoɟa kˌama kondˈoo ndˈani ja zˈizi, kˌama kˈundi kwˈeɲe malˈiʃo jˈake, mahˈali hˈapa pˌatakˈuwa na msˌoŋɡamˈano wa wˈatu.|0
jˌeje ˌafuŋɡuˈaje ɲɟˈia ˌatawˌataŋɡulˈia; wˌatapˈita kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo na kutˈoka ɲɟˈe. mfˈalme wˌao ˌatawˌataŋɡulˈia, bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa kˌioŋɡˈozi.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikasˈema, sˌikilizˈeni ˈeɲi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jakˈobo, ˈeɲi wˌatawˈala wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli. ɟˈe, hampˈaswi kuɟˈua hukˈumu.|0
nˈiɲi mnˌaotʃukˈia mˈema na kupˈenda maˈovu; nˈiɲi mnˌaowatʃˈuna wˈatu wˈaŋɡu ŋɡˈozi na kˌuondˈoa ɲˈama kwˈeɲe mifˈupa jˈao.|0
nˈiɲi mnˌaokˈula ɲˈama ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, mnˌaowatʃˈuna ŋɡˈozi na kuvˈuɲɟa mifˈupa jˈao vipˈande vipˈande; mnˌaowˌakatakˈata kˌama ɲˈama ja kuwˈekwa kwˈeɲe sˌufurˈia na kˌama ɲˈama ja kuwˈekwa kwˈeɲe tʃˈuŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa wˌatamlilˈia bwˈana, lakˈini hˌatawaɟˈibu. wakˈati hˈuo ˌatawafˈitʃa ˈuso wˌake kwa sabˈabu ja uˈovu wˌaliotˈenda.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: kuhˈusu mˌanabˈii wˌanaˌowapotˈoʃa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, ˈm̩tu ˌakiwalˈiʃa, wˌanataŋɡˈaza amˈani; kˌama hˌakufˈaɲa hˈivjo, wˌanaandˈaa kˌupiɡˈana vˈita ðˈidi jˈake.|0
kwa hˈijo usˈiku ˌutawˌaɟiˈeni, msiwˈeze kˌuwa na maˈono, na ɡˈiza, msiwˈeze kˌubaʃˈiri. ɟˈua lˌitawatʃwˈea mˌanabˈii hˈao, nˌao mtʃˈana ˌutakˈuwa ɡˈiza kwˈao.|0
wˌaonˈaɟi wˌataˌaibˈika na wˌaaɡˈuzi wˌatafˌeðehˈeka. wˈote wˌatafunˈika ɲˈuso zˈao kwa sabˈabu hakˈuna ɟˈibu lˌitokˈalo kwa mˈuŋɡu.|0
lakˈini kuhˈusu mˈimi, nˌimeɟˈazwa ŋɡˈuvu, nˌimeɟˈazwa rˈoho wa bwˈana, hˈaki na uwˈeza, kˌumtaŋɡazˈia jakˈobo kˈosa lˈake, na ˌisraˈeli ðˈambi jˈake.|0
sˌikiˈeni hˈili, ˈeɲi vˌioŋɡˈozi wa ɲˈumba ja jakˈobo, ˈeɲi wˌatawˈala wa ɲˈumba ja ˌisraˈeli, mnˌaoðarˈau hˈaki na kˌupotˈoʃa kˈila lilˈilo sˈawa.|0
mnˌaoɟˈeŋɡa sajˈuni kwa kumwˈaɡa dˈamu na jˌerusalˈemu kwa uˈovu.|0
vˌioŋɡˈozi wˌake wˌanahukˈumu kwa rˈuʃwa, na mˌakuhˈani wˌake wˌanafundˈiʃa kwa malˌipo, nˌao mˌanabˈii wˌake wˌanatabˈiri kwa fˈeða. hˌata hˈivjo wˌanamwˌeɡemˈea bwˈana na kusˈema, ɟˈe, bwˈana si jˈumo mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈetu? hakˈuna maˈafa jˌatakˌajotupˈata.|0
kwa hˈijo kwa sabˈabu jˈenu, sajˈuni ˌitalˈimwa kˌama ʃˈamba, jˌerusalˈemu ˌitakˈuwa lˈundo la kokˈoto, na kilˈima tʃa hekˈalu kˌitakˈuwa kˌitʃuɡˈuu kˌilitʃˌofunˈikwa na vitʃˈaka.|0
katˌika sˈiku za mwˈiʃo mlˈima wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌutaˌimarˈiʃwa kˌama mlˈima m̩kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa milˈima jˈote; ˌutaˌinulˈiwa ɟˌuːja vilˈima, na wˈatu wa mˌataˈifa wˌatamˌiminˈika hˈumo.|0
mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jˌatakˈuɟa na kusˈema, ɲɟoˈoni, twendˈeni mlimˈani ˌm̩wa bwˈana, kwˈeɲe ɲˈumba ja mˈuŋɡu wa jakˈobo. ˌatatˌufundˈiʃa ɲɟˈia zˈake, ˌili tuwˈeze kˌuenˈenda katˌika mapˈito jˈake. ʃerˈia ˌitatˈoka sajˈuni, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌitatˈoka jˌerusalˈemu.|0
ˌatahukˈumu kˈati ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, na ˌataamˈua mˌiɡoɡˈoro ja mˌataˈifa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu na jalˈijo mbˈali. wˌatafˈua pˈaŋɡa zˈao zˈiwe maɟˈembe, na mikˈuki jˈao kˌuwa miˈundu ja kukˈata matˈawi. taˈifa hˌalitˌainˈua upˈaŋɡa ðˈidi ja taˈifa ɟiŋɡˈine, wˈala hˌawatˌaɟifˈunza vˈita tˈena.|0
kˈila ˈm̩tu ˌatakˈeti tʃˈini ja mzabˈibu wˌake na tʃˈini ja mtˈini wˈake, wˈala hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌatakˌajewˌaoɡopˈeʃa, kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamesˈema.|0
mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanawˈeza kˌutembˈea katˌika ɟˈina la miˈuŋɡu jˈao; sˌisi tˌutatembˈea katˌika ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu milˈele na milˈele.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa wˌalemˈavu; nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa walˈio ˌuhamiʃˈoni na wˈale nˌiliˌowahˌuzunˈiʃa.|0
nˌitawafˈaɲa wˌalemˈavu kˌuwa mabˈaki, wˈale wˌaliˌofukˈuzwa kˌuwa taˈifa lˈeɲe ŋɡˈuvu. bwˈana ˌatatawˈala ɟˈuu jˈao katˌika mlˈima sajˈuni kˌuanzˈia sˈiku hˈijo na hˌata milˈele.|0
lakˈini kuhˈusu wˈewe, ˈee mnˈara wa ulˈinzi wa kˈundi, ˈee ŋɡˈome ja bˈinti sajˈuni, mˈilki ja awˈali ˌitarudˈiʃwa kwˈako, ufˈalme ˌutakˈuɟa kwa bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kwa nˈini sˈasa ˌunalˈia kwa ŋɡˈuvu: kwˈani hˈuna mfˈalme? ɟˈe, mʃaˈuri wˈako ˌamekˈufa, hˌata mˌaumˈivu jˌakukamˈate kˌama ja mwanˈamke alˈije na utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa.|0
ɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa utˈuŋɡu, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni, kˌama mwanˈamke mwˌeɲe utˈuŋɡu wa kuzˈaa, kwa kˌuwa sˈasa ni lazˈima ˌuuˈatʃe ˈm̩ɟi ˌukapˈiɡe kˈambi ˌuwaɲɟˈani. ˌutakwˈenda babˈeli; hˌuko ˌutaˌokolˈewa. hˌuko bwˈana ˌatakˌukombˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni ˌm̩wa adˈui zˈako.|0
lakˈini sˈasa mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jˌamekˌusaɲˈika ðˈidi jˈako. wˌanasˈema, mwˈatʃe ˌanaɟisˈiwe, mˈatʃo jˈetu na jˌatazˈame sajˈuni kwa furˈaha.|0
lakˈini hˌawajaɟˈui mawˈazo ja bwˈana; hˌawaˌuelˈewi mpˈaŋɡo wˈake, jˌeje ˌawakˌusaɲˈaje kˌama miɡˈanda kwˈeɲe sakˈafu ja kˌupurˈia.|0
inˈuka upˈure, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni, kwa kˌuwa nˌitakˈupa pˈembe za tʃˈuma; nˌitakˈupa kwˈato za ʃˈaba na ˌutavˈuɲɟa vipˈande vipˈande mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi. ˌutatˈoa mapˈato jˈao wˌaliopˈata kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu kwa bwˈana, ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao kwa bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote.|0
pˈaŋɡa maɟˈeʃi jˈako, ˈee ˈm̩ɟi wa maɟˈeʃi, kwa kˌuwa kˌuziŋɡˈirwa kˌumepˈaŋɡwa ðˈidi jˈetu. wˌatampˈiɡa mtawˈala wa ˌisraˈeli ʃavˈuni kwa fˈimbo.|0
lakˈini wˈewe, bˌeθlehˈemu efrˈaθi, iŋɡˈawa u mdˈoɡo mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa kˈoo za jˈuda, kutˈoka kwˈako ˌatatokˈea kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu jˌeje ˌatakˌajekˈuwa mtawˈala katˌika ˌisraˈeli, ambˈaje asˈili jˌake ni kutˈoka zamˈani, kutˈoka milˈele.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌisraˈeli ˌutaˈatʃwa mpˈaka wakˈati mwanˈamke alˈije na utˈuŋɡu ˌatakˌapozˈaa na ndˈuɡu zˌake weŋɡˈine warˈudi kˌuɟiˈuŋɡa na wˌaisraˈeli.|0
ˌatasimˈama na kˌulitʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈake katˌika ŋɡˈuvu ja bwˈana, katˌika ˌutukˈufu wa ɟˈina la bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈake. nˌao wˌataˈiʃi kwa ˌusalˈama, kwa kˌuwa wakˈati hˈuo ukˈuu wˌake ˌutaenˈea hˌadi miˈiʃo ja dunˈia.|0
wˌataˌitawˈala ˈn̩tʃi ja aʃˈuru kwa upˈaŋɡa, ˈn̩tʃi ja nimrˈodi kwa upˈaŋɡa. ˌatatˌuokˈoa kutˈoka kwa mwaʃˈuru ˌatakˌapoˌivamˈia ˈn̩tʃi jˈetu na kˌuiŋɡˈia katˌika mipˈaka jˈetu.|0
mabˈaki ja jakˈobo jˌatakˈuwa kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi kˌama umˈande kutˈoka kwa bwˈana, kˌama maɲˈuɲu ɟˌuːja maɟˈani, ambˈajo hˌajamŋɡˈoɟi ˈm̩tu wˈala kˌukawˈia kwa mwˌanadˈamu.|0
mabˈaki ja jakˈobo jˌatakˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, kˌama sˈimba mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa waɲˈama wa msitˈuni, kˌama mwˈana sˈimba mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa makˈundi ja kondˈoo, ambˈaje ˌanaumˈiza vibˈaja na kˌuwararˈua kˈila ˌanapopˈita kˌatikˈati jˈao, wˈala hakˈuna ˌawezˈaje kˌuokˈoa.|0
mkˈono wˈako ˌutaˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu kwa uʃˈindi ɟˌuːja watˈesi wˈako, nˌao adˈui zˈako wˈote wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana, nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza farˈasi zˈenu kˌatikˈati jˈenu na kˌubomˈoa maɡˈari jˈenu ja vˈita.|0
nˌitaˌiaŋɡamˈiza mˈiɟi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu na kˌuziaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini ŋɡˈome zˈenu zˈote.|0
nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza utʃˈawi wˈenu na hˌamtapˈiɡa tˈena rˈamli.|0
nˌitaˌaŋɡamˈiza viɲˈaɡo vjˈenu vja kutʃˈoŋɡa na mˈawe jˈenu ja ibˈada jatˈoke kˌatikˈati jˈenu; hˌamtasˌuɟudˈia tˈena kˈazi ja mikˈono jˈenu.|0
nˌitaŋɡˈoa ŋɡˈuzo za aʃˈera kˌatikˈati jˈenu na kˌubomˈoa mˈiɟi jˈenu.|0
nˌitalipˈiza kisˈasi kwa hasˈira na ɣaðˈabu ɟˌuːja mˌataˈifa ambˈajo hˌajaɟˌanitˈii.|0
sˌikilˈiza ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: simˈama, tetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈako mbˈele ja milˈima; vilˈima na vˌisikˈie lˈile ˌunalotˈaka kusˈema.|0
sˌikilizˈeni, ˈee milˈima, maʃtˈaka ja bwˈana, sˌikilizˈeni, ˈeɲi misˈiŋɡi ja milˈele ja dunˈia. kwa kˌuwa bwˈana ˈana ʃaˈuri ðˈidi ja wˈatu wˈake; ˌanatˈoa maʃtˈaka ðˈidi ja ˌisraˈeli.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌimewˌatendˈea nˈini? nˌimewˌalemˈea kwa ɟˈinsi ɡˈani? mniɟˈibu.|0
nˌimewatˈoa kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌuwakombˈoa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi ja utˈumwa. nˌilimtˈuma mˈose ˌawaoŋɡˈoze, pˈia arˈoni na mˌiriˈamu.|0
wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, kˌumbukˈeni ɟˈinsi balˈaki mfˈalme wa moˈabu ˌalivjofˈaɲa ʃaˈuri na kˈile bˌalaˈamu mwˈana wa beˈori ˌalitʃoɟˈibu. kˌumbukˈeni safˈari jˈenu kutˈoka ʃitˈimu mpˈaka ɡilɡˈali, ˌili mfahˈamu matˈendo ja hˈaki ja bwˈana.|0
nimɟˈie bwˈana na kˈitu ɡˈani na kˌusuɟˈudu mbˈele za mˈuŋɡu ˌalijˌetukˈuka? ɟˈe, nˈiɟe mbˈele zˌake na sadˈaka za kˌuteketˈezwa, nˈiɟe na ndˈama za mwˈaka mmˈoɟa.|0
ɟˈe, bwˈana ˌatafˌurahˈiʃwa na kondˈoo dˈume ˈelfu, ˌau mˈito ˈelfu kˈumi ja mafˈuta? ɟˈe, nimtˈoe mzalˈiwa wˈaŋɡu wa kwˈanza kwa aɟˈili ja kˈosa lˈaŋɡu, mtˈoto wˈaŋɡu mweɲˈewe kwa aɟˈili ja ðˈambi ja nˈafsi jˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌamekˌuoɲˈeʃa jalˈijo mˈema, ˈee mwˌanadˈamu. bwˈana ˌanatˈaka nˈini kwˈako? ˈila kutˈenda kwa hˈaki na kupˈenda rehˈema, na kwˈenda kwa ˌuɲeɲekˈevu na mˈuŋɡu wˈako.|0
sˌikilˈiza! bwˈana ˌanauˈita ˈm̩ɟi: kulˈitʃa ɟˈina lˈako ni hekˈima: tˈii hˈijo fˈimbo na jˌeje ˌalijˌeiamˈuru.|0
ɟˈe, bˈado nˌisahˈau, ˈee ɲˈumba ja uˈovu, hazˈina jˈako ˌulijopˈata kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu na vipˈimo vˌilivjˌopuŋɡˈuka, ambˈavjo vˌimelˌaanˈiwa.|0
ɟˈe, nawˈeza kˌuhukˈumu kˌuwa ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe mizˈani ja ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu hˈana hatˈia, alˈije na mfˈuko wa mˈawe ja kˌupimˈia ja uˈoŋɡo.|0
mˌataɟˈiri wˌake ni wˌaɟeˈuri; wˈatu wˌake ni waˈoŋɡo na ndˈimi zˈao zˌinazuŋɡˈumza kwa ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
kwa hˈijo, nˌimeˈanza kˌukuharˈibu, kˌuwaˌaŋɡamˈiza kwa sabˈabu ja ðˈambi zˈenu.|0
mtakˈula lakˈini hˌamtaʃˈiba; matˈumbo jˈenu bˈado jˌatakˈuwa matˈupu. mtawˈeka akˈiba lakˈini hˌamtaokˈoa tʃotʃˈote, kwa sabˈabu mtˌakatʃowˈeka akˈiba nˌitatˈoa kwa upˈaŋɡa.|0
mtapˈanda lakˈini hˌamtavˈuna; mtˌakamˈua zˌeitˈuni lakˈini hˌamtatumˈia mafˈuta jˈake. mtˌakamˈua zabˈibu lakˈini hˌamtakˈuɲua hˈijo divˈai.|0
mmˌeziʃˈika ʃerˈia za ˈomri na matˈendo jˈote ja ɲˈumba ja ahˈabu, tˈena ˌumefuˈata destˈuri zˈao. kwa hˈijo nˌitakutˈoa kwa mˌaaŋɡamˈizi na wˈatu wˈako kˌuwa ðihˈaka; mtˌatʃukˈua ðarˈau za mˌataˈifa.|0
taˈabu ɡˈani hˌii nilˈijo nˈajo! nˌimefanˈana na jˈule ˌakusaɲˈaje matˈunda ja kˌiaŋɡˈazi, ˌaokotˈaje masˈazo baˌada ja kuvˈunwa ʃˈamba la mˌizabˈibu; hakˈuna kiʃˈada tʃˌeɲe matˈunda ja kˈula, hakˈuna hˌata ˈile tˈini ja mwanzˈoni nˌinajˌoitamˈani.|0
wˌanaˈomtʃa mˈuŋɡu wˌameˌondolˈewa kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi; hakˈuna ˈm̩tu mɲˈofu hˌata mmˈoɟa ˌalijebˈaki. wˈatu wˈote wˌanavizˈia kumwˈaɡa dˈamu, kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌanamwˈinda ndˈuɡu jˌake kwa wˈavu.|0
mikˈono jˈote miwˈili ni hodˈari katˌika kufˈaɲa ubˈaja, mtawˈala ˌanadˈai zawˈadi, hakˈimu ˌanapokˈea rˈuʃwa, wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌanaamˈuru wˌanatʃotˈaka: wˈote wˌanafˈaɲa ʃaˈuri bˈaja pamˈoɟa.|0
alˈije mwˈema kupˈita wˈote kˈati jˈao ni kˌama mtʃoŋɡˈoma, ˌanajˌeonekˈana mɲˈofu zaˈidi mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ni m̩bˈaja kulˈiko uzˈio wa miˈiba. sˈiku ja walˈinzi wˈako ˌimewadˈia, sˈiku ˌatakˌajokˌutembelˈea mˈuŋɡu. sˈasa ni wakˈati wˌao wa kˌutʃaŋɡˌaɲikˈiwa.|0
ˌusimtˌumaˈini ɟirˈani; ˌusiwˈeke mˌatumaˈini kwa rafˈiki. hˌata kwa jˈule ˌalalˈaje kˌifuˈani mwˈako ˈuwe mwˌaŋɡalˈifu kwa manˈeno jˈako.|0
kwa kˌuwa mwˈana hˌumðarˈau bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje bˈinti hˌuinˈuka ðˈidi ja mˈama jˈake, ˈm̩kwe kˌuwa kiɲˈume na mˈama ˈm̩kwe wˈake: adˈui wa ˈm̩tu ni wˈale wa ɲumbˈani mwˈake hˈasa.|0
lakˈini mˈimi, nˌamtazˈama bwˈana kwa mˌatumaˈini, namŋɡˈoɟa mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu; mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌatanˌisikˈia mˈimi.|0
ˌusifˌurahˈie msˈiba wˈaŋɡu, ˈee adˈui jˈaŋɡu! iŋɡˈawa nˌimeaŋɡˈuka, nˌitainˈuka. ɟˈapo nˌinakˈeti ɡizˈani, bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa nˈuru jˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa sabˈabu nˌimetˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi jˈake, nˌitabˈeba ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana, mpˈaka ˌatakˌaponˌitetˈea ʃaˈuri lˈaŋɡu na kˌuiθˌibitˈiʃa hˈaki jˈaŋɡu. ˌatanilˈeta ɲɟˈe kwˈeɲe mwˈaŋɡa, nˌami nˌitaiˈona hˈaki jˈake.|0
kˈiʃa adˈui jˈaŋɡu ˌataliˈona nˌaje ˌatafunˈikwa na aˈibu, jˈule ˌalijˌeniambˈia, ju wˈapi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako? mˈatʃo jˈaŋɡu jˌataˈona kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈake, hˌata sˈasa ˌatakaɲˈaɡwa tʃˈini ja m̩ɡˈuu kˌama tˈope bˌarabarˈani.|0
sˈiku ja kuɟˈeŋɡa kˈuta zˈako ˌitawadˈia, sˈiku ja kˌupanˈua mipˈaka jˈako.|0
sˈiku hˈijo wˈatu wˌatakˈuɟa kwˈako kutˈoka aʃˈuru na mˈiɟi ja mˈisri, hˌata kutˈoka mˈisri hˌadi frˈati na kutˈoka bahˈari hˌadi bahˈari na kutˈoka mlˈima hˌadi mlˈima.|0
dunˈia ˌitakˈuwa ukˈiwa kwa sabˈabu ja wakˈazi wˈake, kwa sabˈabu ja matˈunda ja matˈendo jˈao.|0
watʃˈuŋɡe wˈatu wˈako kwa fˈimbo jˈako, kˈundi la urˈiθi wˈako, ambˈalo lˌinaˈiʃi pˈeke jˌake msitˈuni, katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja malˈiʃo jˌeɲe rutˈuba. waˈatʃe walˈiʃe katˌika baʃˈani na ɡˌileˈadi kˌama ˌilivjokˈuwa sˈiku za kˈale.|0
kˌama sˈiku zˈile mlˌipotˈoka mˈisri, nˌitawˌaoɲˈeʃa mˌaaɟˈabu jˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌataˈifa jˌataˈona na kˌuaibˈika, wˌaliˌondolˈewa ŋɡˈuvu zˈao zˈote. wˌatawˈeka mikˈono jˈao kwˈeɲe vˈiɲua vjˈao na mˌasikˈio jˈao jˌatakˈuwa na uzˈiwi.|0
wˌatarˈamba mavˈumbi kˌama ɲˈoka, kˌama viˈumbe vˌitambaˈavjo ɟˌuːja ˈarði. wˌatatˈoka ɲɟˈe ja mapˈaŋɡo jˈao wˌakitˌetemˈeka; wˌatamɡˌeukˈia bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈetu kwa hˈofu nˌao wˌatakˌuoɡˈopa.|0
ni nˈani mˈuŋɡu kˌama wˈewe, ambˈaje ˌanaˌatʃilˈia ðˈambi na kˌusamˈehe makˈosa ja mabˈaki ja urˈiθi wˈake? wˌewe hˈuwi na hasˈira milˈele, bˌali ˌunafˌurahˈia kˌuoɲˈeʃa rehˈema.|0
ˌutatˌuhurumˈia tˈena, ˌutazˌikaɲˈaɡa ðˈambi zˈetu tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo zˈako, na kutˈupa maˈovu jˈetu jˈote katˌika vilˈindi vja bahˈari.|0
ˌutakˈuwa wa kwˈeli kwa jakˈobo, nˌawe ˌutamwoɲˈeʃa ˌabrahˈamu rehˈema, kˌama ˌulivjˌowaahˈidi kwa kiˈapo bˈaba zˈetu sˈiku za kˈale.|0
nˈeno ˌalilosˈema mˈuŋɡu kuhˈusu ninˈawi. kitˈabu tʃa maˈono tʃa nahˈumu, mwelkˈoʃi.|0
bwˈana ni mwˌeɲe wˈivu na mˈuŋɡu mlipˈiza kisˈasi; bwˈana hˌulipˈiza kisˈasi na ˌameɟˈaa ɣaðˈabu. bwˈana hˌulipˈiza kisˈasi ɟˌuːja watˈesi wˈake, nˌaje ˌanadumˈiʃa ɣaðˈabu jˌake ðˈidi ja adˈui zˈake.|0
bwˈana si mwepˈesi wa hasˈira nˌaje ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu, bwˈana hˌataˈatʃa kˌuaðˈibu wˌeɲe hatˈia. ɲɟˈia jˌake ˈipo katˌika kˌisulisˈuli na tufˈani, na mawˈiŋɡu ni vˈumbi la miɡˈuu jˈake.|0
ˌanakemˈea bahˈari na kˌuikaˈuʃa, ˌanafˈaɲa mˈito jˈote kˌukaˈuka. baʃˈani na karmˈeli zˌinaɲaˈuka na maˈua ja lˌebanˈoni hˌukaˈuka.|0
milˈima hˌutikisˈika mbˈele jˌake na vilˈima hˌujejˈuka. ˈn̩tʃi hˌutetemˈeka mbˈele jˈake, dunˈia na wˈote wˌaiʃˈio ndˈani jˈake.|0
ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuzuˈia hasˈira jˌake jˌeɲe utʃˈuŋɡu? nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌuvumilˈia hasˈira jˌake kˈali? ɣaðˈabu jˌake ˌimemimˈinwa kˌama mˈoto, na miˈamba ˌinapasˈuka mbˈele zˈake.|0
bwˈana ni mwˈema, kˌimbilˈio wakˈati wa taˈabu. hˌuwatˈunza wˈale wˌanaˌomteɡemˈea.|0
lakˈini kwa mˌafurˈiko makˈubwa, ˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza ninˈawi; ˌatafˌuatilˈia adˈui zˌake hˌadi ɡizˈani.|0
ʃaˈuri bˈaja lolˈote wˌapaŋɡˈalo ðˈidi ja bwˈana jˌeje ˌatalˌikomˈeʃa; taˈabu hˌaitˌatokˈea mˈara ja pˈili.|0
wˌatasˈoŋɡwa kˌatikˈati ja miˈiba na kulˈewa kwa mvˈiɲo wˈao. wˌatatˌeketˈezwa kˌama mabˈua makˈavu.|0
ˈee ninˈawi, kutˈoka kwˈako ˌameɟˌitokˈeza mmˈoɟa, ambˈaje ˌanapˈaŋɡa ʃaˈuri bˈaja ðˈidi ja bwˈana na kˌuʃaˈuri uˈovu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: iŋɡˈawa wˈana mˌuuŋɡˈano nˌao ni wˈeŋɡi sˈana, wˌatakˌatilˈiwa mbˈali na kˌuaŋɡamˈia. iŋɡˈawa nˌimekutˈesa wˈewe, ˈee jˈuda, sˌitakutˈesa tˈena.|0
sˈasa nˌitavˈuɲɟa nˈira zˈao kutˈoka ʃˈiŋɡo jˈako, nˌami nˌitazˌivuɲɟilˈia mbˈali pˈiŋɡu zˈako.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo ˈamri bwˈana ˌalijˌoitˈoa kˌukuhˈusu wˈewe, ninˈawi: hˌutakˈuwa na wazˈao wˌatakˌaoˌendelˈeza ɟˈina lˈako. nˌitaharˈibu sanˈamu za kutʃˈoŋɡa na sanˈamu za kˌujejˈuʃa ambˈazo zˈipo katˌika hekˈalu la miˈuŋɡu jˈenu. nˌitaandˈaa kabˈuri lˈako, kwa maˈana wˌewe ni mwˈovu kabˈisa.|0
tazˈama, hˌuko ɟˈuu mˌilimˈani, miɡˈuu ja hˈujo mmˈoɟa ˌaletˈaje habˈari ɲɟˈema, ambˈaje ˌanataŋɡˈaza amˈani! ˈee jˈuda, ʃˌerehekˈea sˌikukˈuu zˈako, nˌawe ˌutimˈize naðˈiri zˈako. waˈovu hˌawatˌakuvamˈia tˈena; wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa kabˈisa.|0
mʃˌambuliˈaɟi ˌanasoɡˈea ðˈidi jˈako, ninˈawi. lˈinda ŋɡˈome, tʃˈuŋɡa bˌarabˈara, ɟˌitiˈeni ŋɡˈuvu weɲˈewe, kusˈaɲa ŋɡˈuvu zˈako zˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌatarudˈiʃa fahˈari ja jakˈobo, kˌama fahˈari ja ˌisraˈeli, iŋɡˈawa wˌaaŋɡamˈizi wˌamewaˈatʃa ukˈiwa na wˌameharˈibu mˌizabˈibu jˈao.|0
ŋɡˈao za askˈari wˌake ni ɲekˈundu, mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo ɲekˈundu. tʃˈuma kwˈeɲe maɡˈari ja vˈita tʃˌametamˈeta, katˌika sˈiku ˌalijˌojawˈeka tajˈari, mikˈuki ja mˌierˈezi ˌinamˌetamˈeta.|0
maɡˈari ja vˈita jˌanafˈaɲa msˌukosˈuko bˌarabarˈani, jˌakikimbˈia ɲˈuma na mbˈele ˌuwaɲɟˈani. jˌanaˌonekˈana kˌama miˈeŋɡe ja mˈoto; jˌanakwˈenda kˈasi kˌama umˈeme.|0
ˌanaˈita vikˈosi vˌilivjˌotʃaɡulˈiwa, lakˈini bˈado wˌanaɟikwˈaa ɲɟiˈani. wˌanakˌimbilˈia harˈaka kwˈeɲe ukˈuta wa ˈm̩ɟi, ˈile ŋɡˈao ja kˌuwakˈiŋɡa ˌimetˌajarˈiʃwa.|0
malˈaŋɡo ja ˈm̩to jˌamefˌuŋɡulˈiwa wˈazi, na ɟˈumba la kifˈalme lˌimeaŋɡˈuka.|0
ˌimeaɡˈizwa kwˌamba ˈm̩ɟi ˌutʃukulˈiwe na ˌupelˈekwe ˌuhamiʃˈoni. vˌiɟakˈazi wˌake wˌanaˌombolˈeza kˌama hˈua na kˌupiɡapˈiɡa vifˈua vjˈao.|0
ninˈawi ni kˌama dˈimbwi, nˈajo mˈaɟi jˌake jˌanakaˈuka. wˌanalˈia, simˈama! simˈama! lakˈini hakˈuna ˌanajˌeɡeˈuka ɲˈuma.|0
tʃˌukuˈeni ɲˈara za fˈeða! tʃˌukuˈeni ɲˈara za ðahˈabu! wˈiŋɡi wˌake haˈuna mwˈiʃo, ˌutaɟˈiri kutˈoka hazˈina zˌake zˈote.|0
ˌamehˌaribˈiwa, ˌametˈekwa ɲˈara, ˌameˈatʃwa ˈutʃi! miˈojo ˌinajejˈuka, maɡˈoti jˌanaleɡˈea, miˈili ˌinatˌetemˈeka, na kˈila ˈuso ˌumebˌadilˈika rˈaŋɡi.|0
lˈiko wˈapi sˈasa pˈaŋɡo la sˈimba, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌaliwalˈiʃa watˈoto wˈao, ambˈapo sˈimba dˈume na sˈimba ɟˈike wˌalikwˈenda na ambˈapo wˈana sˈimba wˌalikwˈenda bˌila kˌuoɡˈopa tʃotʃˈote.|0
sˈimba ˌaliˈua mawˈindo ja kutˈoʃa watˈoto wˈake, ˌaliɲˈoŋɡa mawˈindo kwa aɟˈili ja mwˈenzi wˈake, ˌakiɟˈaza makˈao jˌake kwa ˌalivjoˈua na mapˈaŋɡo jˌake kwa mawˈindo.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌanataŋɡˈaza, mˌimi ni kiɲˈume na nˈiɲi. maɡˈari jˈenu ja vˈita nˌitajˌateketˈeza kwa mˈoto, na upˈaŋɡa ˌutakˈula wˈana sˈimba wˈako. sˌitawˌaatʃˈia mawˈindo ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi. saˈuti za waɟˈumbe wˈako hˌazitˌasikˈika tˈena.|0
ˈole wa ˈm̩ɟi ˌumwaɡˈao dˈamu, ˌulioɟˈaa uˈoŋɡo, ˌumeɟˈaa ɲˈara, ˌusiokˈosa kˌuwa na vˈitu vja kutˈeka ɲˈara.|0
kelˈele za mˌiɟelˈedi, viʃˈindo vja mˌaɡurudˈumu, farˈasi wˌaendˈao m̩bˈio na m̩ʃtˈuo wa maɡˈari ja vˈita.|0
wapˈanda farˈasi wˌanaˈenda m̩bˈio, pˈaŋɡa zˌinamˌeremˈeta, na mikˈuki ˌinaŋɡˈaa! mˌaɟerˈuhi wˈeŋɡi, malˈundo ja maˈiti, idˈadi kˈubwa ja miˈili ˌisijˌohesabˈika, wˈatu wˌanaɟikwˈaa ɟˌuːja mizˈoɡa.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌanasˈema, mˌimi ni kiɲˈume na nˈiɲi. nˌitafunˈika ˈuso wˈako kwa ɡaˈuni lˈako. nˌitaoɲˈeʃa mˌataˈifa ˈutʃi wˈako na fˈalme aˈibu jˈako.|0
nˌitakˌutupˈia utʃˈafu, nˌitakˌufaɲˈia ðarˈau na kˌukufˈaɲa kiˈoɟa.|0
wˈote wˌanaˌokuˈona wˌatakˌukimbˈia na kusˈema, ninˈawi ˈipo katˌika kˌuaŋɡamˈia: ni nˈani ˌatakˌajeˌombolˈeza kwa aɟˈili jˈake? nˌitampˈata wˈapi jejˈote wa kˌukufarˈiɟi.|0
ɟˈe, wˌewe ni bˈora kulˈiko nˈo amˈoni, ˌuliˈopo katˌika ˈm̩to naˈili, ˌuliˌozuŋɡˈukwa na mˈaɟi? ˈm̩to ˌulikˈuwa kˈiŋɡa jˈake, nˈajo mˈaɟi jˌalikˈuwa ukˈuta wˈake.|0
kˈuʃi na mˈisri wˌalikˈuwa ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zisˈizo na mpˈaka; pˈutu na libˈia wˌalikˈuwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa wˈale wˌaliˌouŋɡˈana nˈaje.|0
hˌata hˈivjo ˌalitʃˌukulˈiwa matˈeka na kwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni. watˈoto wˌake watʃˈaŋɡa wˌalivˈuɲɟua vˈuɲɟua vipˈande kwˈeɲe mwˈanzo wa kˈila bˌarabˈara. kˈura zˌilipˈiɡwa kwa wˈatu wˌake wˌeɲe heʃˈima, na wˈatu wˌake wˈote wakˈuu wˌalifˈuŋɡwa kwa mˌiɲorˈoro.|0
wˌewe pˈia ˌutalˈewa; ˌutakwˈenda mˌafitʃˈoni na kˌutafˈuta kˌimbilˈio kutˈoka kwa adˈui.|0
ŋɡˈome zˈako zˈote ni kˌama mitˈini jˌeɲe matˈunda jˌake ja kwˈanza jˌalijoˈiva; wakˈati ˌinapˌotikˈiswa, tˈini hˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈeɲe kˈiɲua tʃˈake alˈaje.|0
tazˈama vikˈosi vjˈako: wˈote ni wˌanawˈake! malˈaŋɡo ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈako jˌamekˈuwa wˈazi kwa adˈui zˈako; mˈoto ˌumetˌeketˈeza mapˈiŋɡo jˈake.|0
tˈeka mˈaɟi kwa aɟˈili ja kˌuziŋɡˈirwa kwˈako, ˌimarˈiʃa ulˈinzi wˈako, ˌufaɲˈie udˈoŋɡo wa mfiɲˈanzi kˈazi, jˌakaɲˈaɡe matˈope, kˌarabˈati tanˈuru la kˌutʃomˈea mˌatofˈali.|0
hˌuko mˈoto ˌutakˌuteketˈeza, hˌuko upˈaŋɡa ˌutakˌuaŋɡˈuʃa tʃˈini na kˌama vˈile pˈanzi, wˌatakˌumalˈiza. ˌoŋɡezˈeka kˌama pˈanzi, ˌoŋɡezˈeka kˌama nzˈiɡe.|0
ˌumeoŋɡˈeza idˈadi ja wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˈako mpˈaka wˌamekˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kulˈiko ɲˈota za aŋɡˈani, lakˈini kˌama nzˈiɡe wˌanaˈatʃa ˈn̩tʃi tˈupu kˈiʃa hurˈuka na kwˈenda zˈake.|0
walˈinzi wˈako ni kˌama nzˈiɡe, mˌaafˈisa wˈako ni kˌama makˈundi ja nzˈiɡe wˌatuˈao kwˈeɲe kˈuta wakˈati wa sˈiku ja barˈidi: lakˈini wakˈati ɟˈua lˌinapˌotokˈea wˌanarˈuka kwˈenda zˈao, na hakˈuna ˌaɟuˈaje wˌaendˈako.|0
ˈee mfˈalme wa aʃˈuru, wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈako wˌanasinzˈia; wakˈuu wˈako wˌanalˈala tʃˈini mˌavumbˈini kˌupumzˈika. wˈatu wˈako wˌametˌawaɲˈika ɟˌuːja milˈima bˌila kˌuwa na ˈm̩tu jejˈote wa kˌuwakusˈaɲa.|0
hakˈuna kˈitu kˌinatʃowˈeza kupˈoɲa ɟerˈaha lˈako; ɟerˈaha lˈako ni la kˌukuˈua. kˈila ˌanajˌesikˈia habˈari zˈako, hupˈiɡa makˈofi kwa kˌuaŋɡˈuka kwˈako, kwa kˌuwa ni nˈani ambˈaje hˌaɟaɡˈuswa na ˌukatˈili wˈako usˈio na mwˈiʃo.|0
nˈeno ˌalilˌopokˈea nabˈii hˌabakˈuki.|0
ˈee bwˈana, hˌata lˈini nˌitakuˈomba msaˈada, lakˈini wˌewe hˌusikilˈizi? ˌau kˌukulilˈia, ˌuðalˈimu! lakˈini hutˈaki kˌuokˈoa.|0
kwa nˈini ˌunanifˈaɲa nˌitazˈame ðulˈuma? kwa nˈini ˌunavˌumilˈia makˈosa? ˌuharibˈifu na ˌuðalˈimu vˈiko mbˈele jˈaŋɡu; kˈuna mˌabiʃˈano na mˌapambˈano kwa wˈiŋɡi.|0
kwa hˈijo ʃerˈia ˌimepotˈoʃwa, nˈajo hˈaki haˈipo kabˈisa. waˈovu wˌanawˌazuŋɡˈuka wˌeɲe hˈaki, kwa hˈijo hˈaki ˌimepotˈoʃwa.|0
jˌatazˈame mˌataˈifa, ˌuaŋɡalˈie na ˌuʃaŋɡˈae kabˈisa. kwa sabˈabu katˌika sˈiku zˈako nˌitafˈaɲa kˈitu ambˈatʃo hˌuŋɡeamˈini, hˌata kˌama ˌuŋɡeambˈiwa.|0
nˌitawˌainˈua wˌakaldˈajo, wˈatu hˈao wˌakatˈili na wˌeɲe harˈaka, ambˈao hupˈita dunˈia jˈote kutˈeka mahˈali pa kuˈiʃi pasˈipo pˈao weɲˈewe.|0
ni wˈatu wˌanooɡˈopwa na wˌanaotˈiʃa; weɲˈewe n̩dˈio ʃerˈia jˈao, na hˌuinˈua heʃˈima jˈao weɲˈewe.|0
farˈasi wˌao ni wepˈesi kulˈiko tʃˈui, na wakˈali kulˈiko ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu wakˈati wa matʃwˈeo. askˈari wapˈanda farˈasi wˌao huˈenda m̩bˈio; wˌaendˈeʃa farˈasi wˌao wˌanatˈoka mbˈali. wˌanarˈuka kˈasi kˌama tˈai ˌili kˌurarˈua.|0
wˌanawabˈeza wafˈalme, na kˌuwaðihˈaki wˌatawˈala. wˌanaitʃˈeka mˈiɟi jˈote ˌilijˌozuŋɡuʃˈiwa mabˈoma; wˌanafˈaɲa malˈundo ja udˈoŋɡo na kˌuitˈeka hˈijo mˈiɟi.|0
kˈiʃa wˌanapˈita kˈasi kˌama upˈepo na kusˈoŋɡa mbˈele: wˈatu wˌeɲe hatˈia, ambˈao ŋɡˈuvu zˈao n̩dˈio mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ɟˈe, wˌewe sˈio wa ʃˈu milˈele? mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu, ulˈije mtˌakatˈifu wˈaŋɡu, hˌatutakˈufa. ˈee bwˈana, ˌumewˌatʃaɡˈua wˌao ˌili wˌatekelˈeze hukˈumu; ˈee mwˈamba, ˌumewˌaamˈuru wˌatuaðˈibu.|0
mˈatʃo jˈako ni sˈafi ˈm̩no hˌata jˌasiwˈeze kˌuutazˈama uˈovu, wˈala huwˈezi kˌuvumilˈia makˈosa. kwa nˈini bˌasi ˌunawˌavumilˈia wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu? kwa nˈini ˌunakˈuwa kˈimja wakˈati waˈovu wˌanawamˈeza wˈale wˌeɲe hˈaki kulˈiko wˌao weɲˈewe.|0
ˌumewafˈaɲa wˈatu kˌama samˈaki bˌaharˈini, kˌama viˈumbe wa bahˈari wasˈio na mtawˈala.|0
adˈui mwˈovu ˌanawavˈuta wˈote kwa ndoˈana, ˌanawˌakamˈata katˌika wˈavu wˈake, ˌanawˌakusˈaɲa katˌika ɟˈuja lˈake; kwa hˈijo ˌanaʃˌaŋɡilˈia na ˌanafurˈahi.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌanatˈoa kafˈara kwa wˈavu wˈake, na kutʃˈoma uvˈumba kwa ɟˈuja lˈake, kwa kˌuwa kwa wˈavu wˌake ˌanaˈiʃi kwa starˈehe, na ˌanafˌurahˈia tʃakˈula kizˈuri.|0
ɟˈe, ˌaendelˈee kˌuwatˈoa walˈio katˌika wˈavu wˈake, ˌakiˌaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa bˌila hurˈuma.|0
nˌitasimˈama katˌika zˈamu jˈaŋɡu, na kˌuɟiwˈeka mweɲˈewe ɟˌuːja mabˈoma; nˌitatazˈama niˈone ˌatakˌalonˌiambˈia, na ni ɟˈibu ɡˈani nˌitakˌalotˈoa kuhˈusu lˌalamˈiko hˈili.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakaɟˈibu: andˈika ˌufunˈuo hˈuu, na ˌukaufˈaɲe wˈazi ɟˌuːja vibˈao, ˌili mpˈiɡa m̩bˈiu ˌakimbˈie nˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌufunˈuo hˈuu ˌunasubˈiri wakˈati ˌuliˌokubalˈika; ˌunazˌuŋɡumzˈia mˈambo ja mwˈiʃo, na kˈamwe hˌautˌakosˈea. iwˈapo ˌutakawˈia, wˌewe ˌusubˈiri; kwa hakˈika ˌutakˈuɟa na hˌautˌatʃelˈewa.|0
tazˈama, ˌameɟˈaa mˌaɟivˈuno; ˌanavjˌovitamˈani si vja uɲˈofu: lakˈini mwˌeɲe hˈaki ˌataˈiʃi kwa imˈani jˈake.|0
hakˈika mvˈiɲo hˌumsalˈiti; ni mwˌeɲe kibˈuri na hˈana amˈani. kwa sabˈabu ni mlˈafi kˌama kuzˈimu na kˌama kˈifo kˈamwe hˌatoʃˈeki; ˌanaɟˌikusaɲˈia mˌataˈifa jˈote na kˌutʃukˈua wˈatu wˈote matˈeka.|0
ɟˈe, wˈatu wˈote hˌawatamsˈuta kwa ðihˈaka na kumbˈeza, wˌakisˈema,  ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌakusaɲˈaje biðˈaa zˌilizoˈibwa na kˌuɟifaɲˈia ˌutaɟˈiri kwa kutˈoza kwa ŋɡˈuvu! ˌataˌendelˈea hˈivi kwa mˈuda ɡˈani?.|0
ɟˈe, wadˈai wˈako hˌawatˌainˈuka ɣafˈula? ɟˈe, hˌawataˈamka na kˌukufˈaɲa ˌutetemˈeke? kˈiʃa ˌutakˈuwa mhˈaŋɡa kwˈao.|0
kwa kˌuwa ˌumetˈeka ɲˈara mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi, wˈatu wˌaliobˈaki wˌatakutˈeka ɲˈara wˈewe. kwa kˌuwa ˌumemwˈaɡa dˈamu ja ˈm̩tu; ˌumeharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi na mˈiɟi, na kˈila mmˈoɟa ndˈani jˈake.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌaɟeŋɡˈaje mˈilki jˌake kwa mapˈato ja ˌuðalˈimu, ˌawekˈaje kiˈota tʃˈake ɟˈuu, ˌili kˌukimbˈia makˈutʃa ja ˌuharibˈifu.|0
ˌumefˈaɲa ʃaˈuri la mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ja wˈatu wˈeŋɡi, ˌukiˌaibˈiʃa ɲˈumba jˈako mweɲˈewe, na kˌupotˈewa na maˈiʃa jˈako.|0
mˈawe ja kˈuta jˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele, na mˌihimˈili ja kˈazi ja m̩bˈao ˌitarudˈiʃa mwˈaŋɡwi wˈake.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌaɟeŋɡˈaje ˈm̩ɟi kwa kumwˈaɡa dˈamu na kˌuusˌimamˈiʃa ˈm̩ɟi kwa ˌuhalˈifu.|0
ɟˈe, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote hˌakuoɲˈeʃa kwˌamba kˈazi ja wˌanadˈamu ni mafˈuta tu kwa aɟˈili ja mˈoto, na kwˌamba mˌataˈifa jˌanaɟitʃˈoʃa bˈure.|0
kwa kˌuwa dunˈia ˌitaɟˈazwa na mˌaarˈifa ja ˌutukˈufu wa bwˈana, kˌama mˈaɟi jˌaifˌunikˈavjo bahˈari.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌawapˈaje ɟirˈani zˌake kilˈeo, ˌakiˌimimˈina kutˈoka kwˈeɲe kirˈiba tʃa mvˈiɲo mpˈaka wˌamelˈewa, ˌili apˈate kˌutazˈama miˈili jˈao ilˈijo ˈutʃi.|0
ˌutaɟˈazwa na aˈibu badˈala ja ˌutukˈufu. sˈasa ni zˈamu jˈako! kˈuɲua na ˌuɟifunˈue! kikˈombe kutˈoka kwˈeɲe mkˈono wa kuˈume wa bwˈana kˌinakuɟˈia, na aˈibu ˌitafunˈika ˌutukˈufu wˈako.|0
ˌukatˈili ˌuliˌoifaɲˈia lˌebanˈoni ˌutakˌufunˈika, na ˌuharibˈifu ˌuliˌowafaɲˈia waɲˈama ˌutakutˈiʃa. kwa sabˈabu ˌumemwˈaɡa dˈamu ja ˈm̩tu; ˌumeharˈibu ˈn̩tʃi na mˈiɟi na kˈila mmˈoɟa ˌalijˈeko ndˈani jˈake.|0
sanˈamu ˈina θamˈani ɡˈani, kwˈani mwˌanadˈamu n̩dˈije ˌalitʃˈoŋɡa? ˌama kiɲˈaɡo kˌinatʃˌofundˈiʃa uˈoŋɡo? kwa kˌuwa jˌeje ˌalijˌekitˌeŋɡenˈeza hˌuteɡemˈea kˈazi ja mikˈono jˌake mweɲˈewe; hˌuteŋɡenˈeza sanˈamu zˌisizowˈeza kˌuzuŋɡˈumza.|0
ˈole wˌake jˌeje ˌauˌambiˈaje ˈm̩ti, ˈuwe hˈai! ˌama ˌasemˈaje na ɟˈiwe lisˈilo na uhˈai, ˈamka! ɟˈe, lˌinawˈeza kˌuoŋɡˈoza? lˌimefunˈikwa kwa ðahˈabu na fˈeða; hakˈuna pˈumzi ndˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini bwˈana jˈuko katˌika hekˈalu lˈake tˌakatˈifu; dunˈia jˈote na ˌiɲamˈaze mbˈele jˈake.|0
sˈala ja nabˈii hˌabakˈuki ˌilijoˈimbwa kwa ʃˌiɡionˈoθi.|0
bwˈana, nˌimezˌisikˈia sˈifa zˈako; nˌami nˌaoɡˈopa kwa matˈendo jˈako, ˈee bwˈana. fufˈua kˈazi jˈako kˌatikˈati ja miˈaka, kˌatikˈati ja miˈaka taŋɡˈaza habˈari jˈako; katˌika ɣaðˈabu kumbˈuka rehˈema.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌalitˈoka temˈani, jˌeje alˈije mtˌakatˈifu kutˈoka mlˈima parˈani. ˌutukˈufu wˌake ˌulifunˈika mbˈiŋɡu, na sˈifa zˌake zˌikaˌifunˈika dunˈia.|0
m̩ŋɡˈao wˌake ˌulikˈuwa kˌama ɟˈua lˌitʃomozˈalo; miˈonzi ˌilimulˈika kutˈoka mkonˈoni mwˈake, ambˈako ŋɡˈuvu zˌake zˌilifˈitʃwa.|0
taˈuni ˌilimtˌaŋɡulˈia; marˈaði ja kˌuambukˈiza jˌalifuˈata ɲˈajo zˈake.|0
ˌalisimˈama, ˌakaˌitikˈisa dunˈia; ˌalitazˈama, na kˌujafˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˌatetemˈeke. milˈima ja zamˈani ˌiliɡeˈuka mavˈumbi na vilˈima vˌilivjˌozeˈeka vˌikaaŋɡˈuka. ɲɟˈia zˌake ni za milˈele.|0
nˌiliˈona wˈatu wa kuʃˈani katˌika ðˈiki, na makˈazi ja mˌidiˈani katˌika mˌaumˈivu makˈali.|0
ˈee bwˈana, ˌuliˌikasˌirikˈia mˈito? ɟˈe, ɣaðˈabu jˈako ˌilikˈuwa ðˈidi ja viɟˈito? ɟˈe, ˌuliɣˌaðibikˈia bahˈari ˌulipˌoendˈeʃa farˈasi wˈako na maɡˈari jˈako ja uʃˈindi.|0
ˌuliˌufunˈua upˈinde wˈako na kuˈita miʃˈale mˈiŋɡi. ˌuliiɡˈawa dunˈia kwa mˈito.|0
milˈima ˌilikuˈona ˌikatˌetemˈeka. mˌafurˈiko ja mˈaɟi jˌakapˈita hˌuko; vilˈindi vˌiliŋɡurˈuma na kˌuinˈua mawˈimbi jˌake ɟˈuu.|0
ɟˈua na mwˈezi vˌilisimˈama kˈimja mbiŋɡˈuni katˌika m̩ŋɡˈao wa miʃˈale jˈako ˌinajorˈuka, na katˌika m̩ŋɡˈao wa mkˈuki wˈako ˌumerˌemetˈao.|0
kwa ɣaðˈabu ˌulipˈita ɟˌuːja dunˈia, na katˌika hasˈira ˌulikaɲˈaɡa mˌataˈifa.|0
ˌulikˈuɟa kˌuwaokˈoa wˈatu wˈako, kˌumwokˈoa ˌulijemtˈia mafˈuta. ˌulimpˈonda kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˈn̩tʃi ja uˈovu, ˌukamvˈua tˌoka kitʃwˈani hˌadi wˈajo.|0
kwa mkˈuki wˌake mweɲˈewe ˌulitobˈoa kˈitʃwa tʃˈake wakˈati mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌake wˌalifurˈika ɲɟˈe kwa kiʃˈindo kˌututawˈaɲa, wˌakifurˈahi kˌama walˈio karˈibu kˌutafˈuna wˈale waɲˈoŋɡe wˌaliokˈuwa mˌafitʃˈoni.|0
ˌulikaɲˈaɡa bahˈari kwa farˈasi wˈako, ˌukisˌukasˈuka mˈaɟi makˈuu.|0
nˌilisikˈia na mˈojo wˈaŋɡu ˌukaɡˈoŋɡa kwa ŋɡˈuvu, midˈomo jˈaŋɡu ˌikatˌetemˈeka kwa hˈofu nˌilipˌosikˈia saˈuti; ˌutʃakˈavu ˌukaɲˌemelˈea mifˈupa jˈaŋɡu, na miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu ˌikatˌetemˈeka. hˌata hˈivjo nˌitasubˈiri kwa ˌuvumilˈivu sˈiku ja maˈafa kˌujaɟilˈia mˌataˈifa jˌalijˌotuvamˈia.|0
iŋɡˈawa mtˈini hˌautʃanˈui maˈua na hakˈuna zabˈibu ɟˌuːja mˌizabˈibu, ˌiŋɡawˈaɟe mzˌeitˈuni hˌauzˈai, na hˌata maʃˈamba hˌajatˈoi tʃakˈula, iwˈapo hakˈuna kondˈoo katˌika bˈanda, wˈala ŋɡˈombe katˌika zˈizi.|0
hˌata hˈivjo nˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika bwˈana, nˌitamfˌurahˈia mˈuŋɡu mwokˈozi wˈaŋɡu.|0
bwˈana mweɲˈezi ni ŋɡˈuvu jˈaŋɡu; hˌuifˈaɲa miɡˈuu jˈaŋɡu kˌama miɡˈuu ja ajˈala, hˌuniwezˈeʃa kupˈita ɟˌuːja vilˈima. kwa kˌioŋɡˈozi wa ˌuimbˈaɟi. kwa vinˈanda vjˈaŋɡu vja ɲˈuzi.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌililomɟˈia sˌefanˈia mwˈana wa kˈuʃi, mwˈana wa ɡˌedalˈia, mwˈana wa ˌamarˈia, mwˈana wa hˌezekˈia, wakˈati wa ˌutawˈala wa josˈia mwˈana wa amˈoni mfˈalme wa jˈuda.|0
bwˈana asˈema, nˌitafaɡˈia kˈila kˈitu kutˈoka kwˈeɲe ˈuso wa dunˈia.|0
nˌitafˌaɡilˈia mbˈali wˈatu na waɲˈama; nˌitafˌaɡilˈia mbˈali ndˈeɡe wa aŋɡˈani na samˈaki wa bˌaharˈini. wˌafaɲˈao maˈovu wˌatapˈata tu kokˈoto, nˌami nˌitamkˌatilˈia mbˈali mwˌanadˈamu atˈoke katˌika dunˈia, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˌitaˌiaðˈibu jˈuda na wˈote wˌakaˈao jˌerusalˈemu. kutˈoka mahˈali hˈapa nˌitakˌatilˈia mbˈali kˈila mabˈaki ja baˈali, maɟˈina ja wˌapaɡˈani na mˌakuhˈani wˌaabudˈuo sanˈamu.|0
wˈale ambˈao hˌusuɟˈudu ɟˌuːja mapˈaa kˌuabˈudu ɟˈeʃi la vˈitu vja aŋɡˈani, wˈale ambˈao hˌusuɟˈudu na kuˈapa kwa bwˈana na ambˈao pˈia huˈapa kwa malkˈamu.|0
wˈale wˌanaoˈatʃa kˌumfuˈata bwˈana, wˈala hˌawamtafˈuti bwˈana wˈala kutˈaka ʃaˈuri lˈake.|0
ɲˌamazˈeni mbˈele za bwˈana mweɲˈezi, kwa maˈana sˈiku ja bwˈana ˈiko karˈibu. bwˈana ˌameandˈaa ðabˈihu, ˌamewawˈeka wˈakfu wˈale ˌaliˌowaalˈika.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ðabˈihu ja bwˈana nˌitawˌaaðˈibu wakˈuu na wˈana wa mfˈalme na wˈale wˈote wˌanaovˈaa ŋɡˈuo za kiɡˈeni.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo nˌitaaðˈibu wˈote ambˈao hukwˈepa kˌukaɲˈaɡa kˌiziŋɡˈiti, ambˈao huɟˈaza hekˈalu la miˈuŋɡu jˈao kwa ðulˈuma na ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu.|0
bwˈana asˈema, katˌika sˈiku hˈijo kilˈio kˌitapˈanda ɟˈuu kutˈoka lˈaŋɡo la samˈaki, mˌaombolˈezo kutˈoka m̩tˈaa wa pˈili, na mʃˈindo mkˈubwa kutˈoka vˌilimˈani.|0
ˌombolezˈeni, nˈiɲi mnˌaoˈiʃi katˌika enˈeo la sokˈoni; wˌafaɲˌabiaʃˈara wˈenu wˈote wˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa, wˈote ambˈao wˌanafˈaɲa bˌiaʃˈara ja fˈeða wˌataˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌitasˈaka ˈm̩ɟi wa jˌerusalˈemu kwa tˈaa, na kˌuwaaðˈibu wˈale ambˈao wˌanakˈaa katˌika hˈali ja kˌuriðˈika, ambˈao ni kˌama divˈai ˌilijobˈaki kwˈeɲe matʃˈitʃa, ambˈao huðˈani, bwˈana hˌatafˈaɲa lolˈote, ɟˈema ˌau bˈaja..|0
ˌutaɟˈiri wˌao ˌutatˈekwa ɲˈara, ɲˈumba zˈao zˌitabˌomolˈewa. wˌataɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba, lakˈini hˌawataˈiʃi ndˈani jˈake; wˌatapˈanda mˌizabˈibu lakˈini hˌawatakˈuɲua divˈai jˈake.|0
sˈiku kˈubwa ja bwˈana ˈiko karˈibu: ˈiko karˈibu na ˌinakˈuɟa harˈaka. sˌikilizˈeni! kilˈio katˌika sˈiku ja bwˈana kˌitakˈuwa kitʃˈuŋɡu, hˌata ʃuɟˈaa ˌatapˈiɡa kelˈele.|0
sˈiku ˈile ni sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu, sˈiku ja faðˈaa na ðˈiki, sˈiku ja ˌuharibˈifu na ukˈiwa, sˈiku ja ɡˈiza na ˌutusitˈusi, sˈiku ja mawˈiŋɡu na ɡˈiza nˈene.|0
sˈiku ja tˌarumbˈeta na m̩lˈio wa vˈita ðˈidi ja mˈiɟi jˌeɲe ŋɡˈome na ðˈidi ja minˈara mirˈefu.|0
nˌitawˌaletˈea wˈatu ðˈiki, nˌao wˌatatembˈea kˌama vipˈofu, kwa sabˈabu wˌametˈenda ðˈambi ðˈidi ja bwˈana. dˈamu jˈao ˌitamwˈaɡwa kˌama vˈumbi na matˈumbo jˈao kˌama tˈaka.|0
fˈeða jˈao wˈala ðahˈabu jˈao hˌazitawˈeza kˌuwaokˈoa katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ja ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana. katˌika mˈoto wa wˈivu wˌake dunˈia jˈote ˌitatˌeketˈezwa, kwa maˈana ˌatalˈeta mwˈiʃo wa wˈote wˌanaoˈiʃi katˌika dunˈia ɣafˈula.|0
kˌusaɲikˈeni pamˈoɟa, kˌusaɲikˈeni pamˈoɟa, ˈeɲi taˈifa lisˈilo na aˈibu.|0
kˈabla ja wakˈati ˌuliˌoamrˈiwa hˌauɟafˈika na sˈiku ˈile ˌinajˌopeperˈuʃa kˌama makˈapi, kˈabla hasˈira kˈali ja bwˈana hˌaiɟˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu, kˈabla sˈiku ja ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana hˌaiɟˈaɟa ɟˈuu jˈenu.|0
mtˌafutˈeni bwˈana, ˈeɲi ɲˈote wˌaɲeɲekˈevu wa ˈn̩tʃi, nˈiɲi ambˈao hufˈaɲa lˈile ˌanalˌoamˈuru. tˌafutˈeni hˈaki, tˌafutˈeni ˌuɲeɲekˈevu; lˈabda mtˌahifaðˈiwa sˈiku ja hasˈira ja bwˈana.|0
ɡˈaza ˌutaˈatʃwa na ˌaʃkelˈoni ˌutaˈatʃwa maɡˈofu. wakˈati wa ˌaðuhˈuri aʃdˈodi ˌutaˈatʃwa mtˈupu na ekrˈoni ˌutaŋɡolˈewa.|0
ˈole wˈenu nˈiɲi ambˈao mnaˈiʃi kˈando ja bahˈari, ˈeɲi wˌakerˈeθi; nˈeno la bwˈana lˈiko ðˈidi jˈenu, ˈee kˌanaˈani, ˈn̩tʃi ja wˌafilˈisti. mˌimi nˌitawˌaaŋɡamˈiza, na hakˈuna ˌatakˌajebˈaki.|0
ˈn̩tʃi kˈando ja bahˈari, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌanaˈiʃi wˌakerˈeθi, pˌatakˈuwa mahˈali pa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi na mazˈizi ja kondˈoo.|0
ˌitakˈuwa mˈali ja mabˈaki ja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda, hˈapo wˌatapˈata malˈiʃo. wakˈati wa ɟiˈoni wˌataɟilˈaza tʃˈini katˌika ɲˈumba za ˌaʃkelˈoni. bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao ˌatawatˈunza, nˌaje ˌatawˌarudiʃˈia wafˈuŋɡwa wˈao.|0
nˌimejˌasikˈia mˌatukˈano ja moˈabu nˈazo ðihˈaka za wˌaamˈoni, ambˈao wˌaliwˌatukˈana wˈatu wˈaŋɡu na kutˈoa vitˈiʃo ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
hakˈika, kˌama nˌiiʃˈivjo, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, hakˈika moˈabu ˌitakˈuwa kˌama sodˈoma, wˌaamˈoni kˌama ɡomˈora: mahˈali pa maɡˈuɡu na maʃˈimo ja tʃˈumvi, ˈn̩tʃi ja ukˈiwa milˈele. mabˈaki ja wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌatawatˈeka ɲˈara; mabˈaki ja taˈifa lˈaŋɡu wˌatarˈiθi ˈn̩tʃi jˈao.|0
hˈiki ndˈitʃo wˌatarˌudiʃˈiwa kwa aɟˈili ja kibˈuri tʃˈao, kwa kˌutukˈana na kˌuðihˈaki wˈatu wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa wa kˌuhofˈiʃa kwˈao ˌatakˌapoˌaŋɡamˈiza miˈuŋɡu jˈote ja ˈn̩tʃi. mˌataˈifa katˌika kˈila pwˈani jˌatamwabˈudu, kˈila mˈoɟa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈake.|0
nˈiɲi pˈia, ˈee wakˈuʃi, mtˌauˈawa kwa upˈaŋɡa wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˈuŋɡu ˌataɲoˈoʃa mkˈono wˌake ðˈidi ja kˌaskazˈini na kˌuaŋɡamˈiza wˌaaʃˈuru, ˌakiiˈatʃa ninˈawi ukˈiwa na pakˈame kˌama ɟˈaŋɡwa.|0
makˈundi ja kondˈoo na ŋɡˈombe jˌataɟilˈaza pˈale, viˈumbe vja kˈila aˈina. bˈundi wa ɟaŋɡwˈani na bˈundi wˌaliˈao kwa saˈuti ɲembˈamba wˌataˈiʃi ɟˌuːja ŋɡˈuzo zˈake. mwˈaŋɡwi wa kuˈita kwˈao ˌutapˈita mˌadiriʃˈani, kifˈusi kˌitakˈuwa mˌilaŋɡˈoni, borˈiti za mˌierˈezi zˌitaˈatʃwa wˈazi.|0
hˈuu n̩dˈio ˈm̩ɟi ˌuliˌotukˈuka na kuˈiʃi kwa furˈaha wˌakiɟˌisikˈia salˈama. ˌulisˈema mojˈoni mwˈako, mˌimi ndˈimi, na wˈala hapˈana mwiŋɡˈine ˈila mˈimi. ɟˈinsi ɡˈani ˌumekˈuwa ɡˈofu, mahˈali pa kulˈala waɲˈama pˈori! wˈote wˌanaopˈita kˈando jˌake wˌanaˌuzomˈea na kˌutikˈisa mkˈono kwa ðarˈau.|0
ˈole ˈm̩ɟi wa wˌaðalˈimu, waˈasi na wˌaliotˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
hˌautˈii ˈm̩tu jejˈote, hˌaukubˈali maˈoɲo. hˌaumtˌumaˈini bwˈana, hˌaukˌaribˈii karˈibu na mˈuŋɡu wˈake.|0
mˌaafˈisa wˌake ni sˈimba wˌaŋɡurumˈao, wˌatawˈala wˌake ni ˈm̩bwa mwˈitu wa ɟiˈoni, ambˈao hˌawabakˈizi tʃotʃˈote kwa aɟˈili ja ˌasubˈuhi.|0
mˌanabˈii wˌake ni wˌeɲe kibˈuri, ni wˌadaŋɡaɲˈifu. mˌakuhˈani wˌake hˌunaɟˈisi pˌatakatˈifu na kˌuihalˈifu ʃerˈia.|0
bwˈana alˈije ndˈani jˌake ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, hafˈaɲi kˈosa. ˌasubˈuhi kwa ˌasubˈuhi hutˈoa hˈaki jˈake, kˈila kˌukipˌambazˈuka hˌuitimˈiza, bˌali ˈm̩tu ðalˈimu hˈana aˈibu.|0
nˌimejˌafutilˈia mbˈali mˌataˈifa, ŋɡˈome zˈao zˌimebˌomolˈewa. nˌimeziˈatʃa bˌarabˈara ukˈiwa, hakˈuna ˌanajepˈita hˈumo. mˈiɟi jˈao ˌimehˌaribˈiwa; hakˈuna mmˈoɟa ˌatakˌajeˈatʃwa: hakˈuna hˌata mmˈoɟa.|0
nˌiliˌuambˈia hˈuo ˈm̩ɟi, hakˈika ˌutanˌioɡˈopa na kˌukubˈali maˈoɲo! ndˈipo makˈao jˌake hˌajatˌafutilˈiwa mbˈali, wˈala aðˈabu zˈaŋɡu zˈote hˌazitakˈuɟa ɟˈuu jˈake. lakˈini wˌalikˈuwa bˈado na ʃaˈuku kutˈenda kwa ˌupotˈovu katˌika jˈote wˌalijofˈaɲa.|0
bwˈana ˌanasˈema, kwa hˈijo nˌiŋɡoɟˈee mˈimi, sˈiku nˌitakˌajosimˈama kutˈeka ɲˈara. nˌimeamˈua kˌukusˈaɲa mˌataˈifa, kˌukusˈaɲa fˈalme na kˌumimˈina ɣaðˈabu jˈaŋɡu ɟˈuu jˈao, hasˈira jˈaŋɡu kˈali jˈote. dunˈia jˈote ˌitatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto wa wˈivu wa hasˈira jˈaŋɡu.|0
ndˈipo nˌitatakˈasa midˈomo ja mˌataˈifa, kwˌamba wˈote wawˈeze kˌuliitˈia ɟˈina la bwˈana na kˌumtumikˈia kwa pamˈoɟa.|0
kutˈoka ŋɡˈambo ja mˈito ja kˈuʃi wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌanaˌoniabˈudu, wˈatu wˈaŋɡu wˌaliˌotawaɲˈika, wˌatanˌiletˈea sadˈaka.|0
sˈiku hˈijo hˌutaˌaibˈiʃwa kwa aɟˈili ja makˈosa jˈote ˌuliˌonitendˈea, kwa sabˈabu nˌitawˌaondˈoa kutˈoka ˈm̩ɟi hˈuu wˈale wˈote wˌanaˌoʃaŋɡilˈia katˌika kibˈuri tʃˈao. kˈamwe hˌutaɟivˈuna tˈena katˌika kilˈima tʃˈaŋɡu kˌitakatˈifu.|0
lakˈini nˌitakˌuatʃˈia ndˈani jˈako wapˈole na wˌaɲeɲekˈevu, ambˈao wˌanatˌumaˈini ɟˈina la bwˈana.|0
mabˈaki ja ˌisraˈeli hˌajatafˈaɲa kˈosa; hˌawatasˈema uˈoŋɡo, wˈala ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu hˌautakˈuwa katˌika vˈiɲua vjˈao. wˌatakˈula na kulˈala wˈala hakˈuna jejˈote ˌatakˌajewˌaoɡopˈeʃa.|0
ˈimba, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni; pˈaza saˈuti, ˈee ˌisraˈeli! furˈahi na kˌuʃaŋɡilˈia kwa mˈojo wˈako wˈote, ˈee bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu.|0
bwˈana ˌamekˌuondolˈea aðˈabu jˈako, ˌamewˌarudˈiʃa ɲˈuma adˈui zˈako. bwˈana, mfˈalme wa ˌisraˈeli, ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe; kˈamwe hˌutaoɡˈopa tˈena maðˈara jojˈote.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo wˌataˌuambˈia jˌerusalˈemu, ˌusioɡˈope, ˈee sajˈuni; ˌusiiˈatʃe mikˈono jˈako ˌileɡˈee.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈako ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe, jˌeje ni mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu kˌuokˈoa. ˌatakˌufurahˈia kwa furˈaha kˈubwa, ˌatakˌutulˈiza kwa pˈendo lˈake, ˌatakˌufurahˈia kwa kuˈimba.|0
huzˈuni katˌika sˌikukˈuu zˌilizˌoamrˈiwa nˌitazˌiondˈoa kwˈenu; hˈizo ni mzˈiɡo na feðˈeha kwˈenu.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌitawˌaʃuɣˌulikˈia wˈote wˌaliˌokuðulˈumu; nˌitaokˈoa vilˈema na kˌukusˈaɲa wˈale ambˈao wˌametawˈaɲua. nˌitawˈapa sˈifa na heʃˈima katˌika kˈila ˈn̩tʃi ambˈajo wˌaliˌaibˈiʃwa.|0
wakˈati hˈuo nˌitawˌakusˈaɲa; wakˈati hˈuo nˌitawalˈeta ɲumbˈani. nˌitawˈapa sˈifa na heʃˈima mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia wakˈati nˌitakˌapowˌarudiʃˈia matˈeka jˈenu mbˈele ja mˈatʃo jˈenu hˈasa, asˈema bwˈana.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio wa ˌuaɟˈemi, katˌika sˈiku ja kwˈanza ja mwˈezi wa sˈita, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilikˈuɟa kˌupitˈia kwa nabˈii haɡˈai kwˈenda kwa zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, mtawˈala wa jˈuda na kwa joʃˈua mwˈana wa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu jˌehosadˈaki.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana likˈaɟa kˌupitˈia kwa nabˈii haɡˈai.|0
ɟˈe, ni wakˈati wˈenu nˈiɲi wa kuˈiʃi katˌika ɲˈumba zˈenu zˌilizoɟˈeŋɡwa vizˈuri, wakˈati hˌii ɲˈumba ˌikibˈaki, ɡˈofu.|0
sˈasa hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: zˌitafˌakarˈini vjˈema ɲɟˈia zˈenu.|0
mmepˈanda vˈiŋɡi, lakˈini mmevˈuna hˈaba. mnakˈula lakˈini hamʃˈibi, mnakˈuɲua, lakˈini hˌamtoʃˈeki. mnavˈaa ŋɡˈuo, lakˈini hˌamsikˈii ɟˈoto. mnapˈata mˌiʃahˈara, lakˈini ˌinatowˈeka kˌama ˌimewˈekwa kwˈeɲe mfˈuko ˌuliˌotobˌokatobˈoka.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: zˌitafˌakarˈini vjˈema ɲɟˈia zˈenu.|0
pandˈeni mˌilimˈani mkalˈete mˈiti na kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba, ˌili nipˈate kˌuifˌurahˈia, na nˌitukˈuzwe, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mlˌitaraɟˈia mˈeŋɡi, kˈumbe, jˌametokˈea kidˈoɡo. ˌulitʃˌokilˈeta ɲumbˈani nˌilikˌipeperˈuʃa. kwa nˈini? asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. ni kwa sabˈabu ja ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu, ˌinajobˈaki katˌika hˈali ja maɡˈofu, wakˈati kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌanaɟˌiʃuɣulˈiʃa na ɲˈumba jˌake mweɲˈewe.|0
kwa hˈijo, kwa sabˈabu jˈenu mbˈiŋɡu zˌimezuˈia umˈande wˌake na ˈarði mavˈuno jˈake.|0
nˌiliˈita ukˈame mˌaʃambˈani na mˌilimˈani, kwˈeɲe nafˈaka, mvˈiɲo ˈm̩pja, mafˈuta pamˈoɟa na tʃotʃˈote kˌinatʃˌozalˈiʃwa na ˈarði, ɟˌuːja wˈatu na ŋɡˈombe, pamˈoɟa na kˈazi za mikˈono jˈenu.|0
kˈiʃa zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, joʃˈua kuhˈani m̩kˈuu mwˈana wa jˌehosadˈaki, pamˈoɟa na mabˈaki jˈote ja wˈatu wˌakaitˈii saˈuti ja bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao pamˈoɟa na uɟˈumbe wa nabˈii haɡˈai, kwa sabˈabu ˌalikˈuwa ˌametˈumwa na bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao. wˈatu wˌalimwoɡˈopa bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa haɡˈai, mɟˈumbe wa bwˈana, ˌakawˈapa wˈatu uɟˈumbe hˈuu wa bwˈana: mˌimi nˈiko pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakatʃotʃˈea rˈoho ja zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, mtawˈala wa jˈuda, na rˈoho ja kuhˈani m̩kˈuu joʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌehosadˈaki, pamˈoɟa na rˈoho za mabˈaki jˈote ja wˈatu. wˌalikˈuɟa wˌakaˈanza kufˈaɲa kˈazi katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne mwˈezi wa sˈita, katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na mˈoɟa ja mwˈezi wa sˈaba, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilikˈuɟa kˌupitˈia nabˈii haɡˈai, kusˈema.|0
sˈema na zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, mtawˈala wa jˈuda, kuhˈani m̩kˈuu joʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌehosadˈaki, na mabˈaki ja wˈatu. ˌuwaulˈize.|0
ni nˈani mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu ˌalijebˈaki ambˈaje ˌaliiˈona hˌii ɲˈumba katˌika ˌutukˈufu wˌake wa mwˈanzo? sˈasa ˌinaˌonekanˈaɟe kwˈenu? ɟˈe, hˌaiˌonekˈani kwˈenu kˌama si kˈitu.|0
lakˈini sˈasa ˈuwe imˈara, ˈee zˌerubabˈeli, asˈema bwˈana. kˌuwa imˈara, ˈee kuhˈani m̩kˈuu joʃˈua mwˈana wa jˌehosadˈaki. ˈm̩we imˈara, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi, asˈema bwˈana, na mfˈaɲe kˈazi. kwa kˌuwa mˌimi nˈipo pamˈoɟa nˈaɲi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo nˌililˌoaɡˈana nˌaɲi mlˌipotˈoka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja mˈisri. pˈia rˈoho wˈaŋɡu ˌanadˈumu kˌatikˈati jˈenu. msˌioɡˈope..|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: baˌada ja mˈuda kidˈoɡo kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine nˌitazˌitikˈisa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi, bahˈari na ˈn̩tʃi kˈavu.|0
nˌitatikˈisa mˌataˈifa jˈote, nˈatʃo kˈile kˌinatʃˌotamanˈiwa na mˌataˈifa jˈote kˌitakˈuɟa, nˌami nˌitauɟˈaza ˌutukˈufu katˌika ɲˈumba hˌii, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
fˈeða ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu na ðahˈabu ni mˈali jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ˌutukˈufu wa ɲˈumba hˌii ja sˈasa ˌutakˈuwa mkˈubwa kulˈiko ˌutukˈufu wa ˈile ɲˈumba ja mwanzˈoni, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. na mahˈali hˈapa nˌitawˈapa amˈani, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa tˈisa, katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilikˈuɟa kwa nabˈii haɡˈai.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: ˌulizˈeni mˌakuhˈani ɟˈinsi ʃerˈia ˌinavjosˈema.|0
kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌakibˈeba ɲˈama ˌilijowˈekwa wˈakfu katˌika pˈindo la vˈazi lˈake, kˈiʃa lˈile pˈindo lˌikaɡˈusa mkˈate ˌau mtʃˈuzi, divˈai, mafˈuta ˌau tʃakˈula kiŋɡˈine, ɟˈe, kˈitu hˈitʃo kˌitakˈuwa kˌimewˈekwa wˈakfu?  mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɟˈibu, la hˈaʃa.|0
kˈiʃa haɡˈai ˌakasˈema, ɟˈe, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌalijetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi kwa kuɡˈusa maˈiti ˌakiɡˈusa mˌoɟawˈapo ja vˈitu hˈivi, kˈitu hˈitʃo kˌitakˈuwa kˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi? mˌakuhˈani wˌakaɟˈibu, n̩dˈijo, hˈuwa kˌimenˌaɟisˈiwa.|0
kˈiʃa haɡˈai ˌakasˈema,  bˌasi ndˈivjo walˈivjo matʃˈoni pˈaŋɡu hˈawa wˈatu na taˈifa hˈili, asˈema bwˈana. lolˈote wˌafaɲˈalo na tʃotʃˈote wˌatoˈatʃo hˈapo ni naɟˈisi.|0
sˈasa fˌikirˈini kwa ˌuaŋɡalˈifu kˌuanzˈia lˈeo na kˌuendelˈea: tˌafakarˈini ɟˈinsi mˈambo jˌalivjokˈuwa kˈabla hˌaliɟawˈekwa ɟˈiwe mˈoɟa ɟˌuːja liŋɡˈine katˌika hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌoendˈea lˈundo la nafˈaka la vipˈimo ˌiʃirˈini, kˌulikˈuwa na vipˈimo kˈumi tˈu. wakˈati ˈm̩tu ˌalipˌoendˈea pˈipa la mvˈiɲo ˌili kutʃˈota vipˈimo hamsˈini, kˌulikˈuwa na vipˈimo ˌiʃirˈini tˈu.|0
kˈazi zˈenu zˈote za mikˈono nˌilizipˈiɡa kwa ukˈame, ukˈuŋɡu na mvˈua ja mˈawe, lakˈini hˌata hˈivjo, hˌamkunˌiɡeukˈia mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ʃˈu lˈeo na kˌuendelˈea, kˌuanzˈia sˈiku hˌii ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa tˈisa, tˌafakarˈini sˈiku ambˈajo msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu la bwˈana ˌuliwˈekwa. tˌafakarˈini.|0
ɟˈe, bˈado kˈuna mbˈeɡu ˌilijˌobakˈia ɣalˈani? mpˈaka sˈasa, hakˈuna mzabˈibu ˌau mtˈini, mkˌomamˈaŋɡa wˈala mzˌeitˈuni ˌuliozˈaa tˈunda.  kˌuanzˈia lˈeo na kˌuendelˈea, nˌitawˌabarˈiki..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia haɡˈai kwa mˈara ja pˈili katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi kusˈema.|0
mwambˈie zˌerubabˈeli mtawˈala wa jˈuda kwˌamba nˌitazˌitikˈisa mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌitapindˈua vˈiti vja ˈenzi vja fˈalme, na kˌuziharˈibu kabˈisa ŋɡˈuvu za fˈalme za kiɡˈeni. nˌitapindˈua maɡˈari ja vˈita pamˈoɟa na wˌaendeʃˈaɟi wˈake; farˈasi na wapˈanda farˈasi wˌataaŋɡˈuka, kˈila mmˈoɟa kwa upˈaŋɡa wa ndˈuɡu jˈake.|0
katˌika sˈiku ˈile, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌitakˌutʃukˈua wˈewe, mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu zˌerubabˈeli mwˈana wa ʃˌealtiˈeli, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitakufˈaɲa kˌama pˈete jˈaŋɡu ja muhˈuri, kwa kˌuwa nˌimekˌutʃaɡˈua, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
katˌika mwˈezi wa nˈane wa mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia nabˈii zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia, mwˈana wa ˈido, kusˈema.|0
bwˈana ˌaliwˌakasˌirikˈia sˈana bˈaba zˈako wa zamˈani.|0
kwa hˈijo wˌaambˈie wˈatu: hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈavjo: nˌirudiˈeni mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈia nˈiɲi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
msˈiwe kˌama bˈaba zˈenu, ambˈao mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌotaŋɡulˈia wˌaliwˌataŋɡazˈia: hˈivi ndˈivjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈavjo: ɡˌeukˈeni, mziˈatʃe ɲɟˈia zˈenu m̩bˈaja na matˈendo jˈenu maˈovu. lakˈini hˌawakˌunisˌikilˈiza wˈala kˌufuˈata mˌaelekˈezo jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
wˈako wˈapi bˈaba zˈako sˈasa? nˌao mˌanabˈii, ɟˈe, wˌanaˈiʃi milˈele.|0
ɟˈe, manˈeno jˈaŋɡu na ˈamri zˈaŋɡu nˌilizˌowaaɡˈiza mˌanabˈii wˌatumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, hˌajakˌuwapˈata bˈaba zˈenu? kˈiʃa wˌalitˈubu na kusˈema, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌametutˈenda sˌawasˈawa na ɲɟˈia zˈetu na matˈendo jˈetu jˌalivjˌostahˈili, kˌama ˌalivjˌokusudˈia kufˈaɲa..|0
katˌika sˈiku ja ˌiʃirˈini na ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa kˈumi na mˈoɟa, jaˈani mwˈezi ˌuitwˈao ʃebˈati, katˌika mwˈaka wa pˈili wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia nabˈii zˌekarˈia mwˈana wa bˌerekˈia mwˈana wa ˈido.|0
wakˈati wa usˈiku nˌilipˈata maˈono, mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌalikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu ˌakiendˈeʃa farˈasi mwekˈundu! ˌalikˈuwa ˌamesimˈama kˌatikˈati ja mˈiti ja mˌihadˈasi kwˈeɲe bˈonde. ɲˈuma jˌake wˌalikuwˈepo farˈasi wekˈundu, wa kˌikahawˈia na weˈupe.|0
nˌikaulˈiza, hˈivi ni vˈitu ɡˈani bwˈana wˈaŋɡu? mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza na mˌimi ˌakaniɟˈibu, nˌitakˌuoɲˈeʃa kˌuwa ni nˈini.|0
kˈiʃa jˈule ˈm̩tu ˌalijˌesimˈama kˌatikˈati ja mˈiti ja mˌihadˈasi ˌakaelˈeza, ni wˈale ambˈao bwˈana ˌamewatˈuma waˈende dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
nˌao wˌakatˈoa tˌaarˈifa kwa jˈule mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, ˌalijekˈuwa ˌamesimˈama kˌatikˈati ja mˈiti ja mˌihadˈasi, tˌumepˈita dˌuniˈani kˈote na kukˈuta ˌulimwˈeŋɡu wˈote ˌumepumzˈika kwa amˈani.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakasˈema, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, ˌutazuˈia mpˈaka lˈini rehˈema kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu na mˈiɟi ja jˈuda, ambˈajo ˌumeˌikasˌirikˈia kwa miˈaka hˌii sabˈini.|0
kwa hˈijo bwˈana ˌakazuŋɡˈumza manˈeno ja upˈole na ja kˌufarˈiɟi kwa mˌalaˈika ˌalijˌezuŋɡˈumza nˈami.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika jˈule ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˌami ˌakasˈema, taŋɡˈaza nˈeno hˈili: hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: nˈina wˈivu sˈana kwa aɟˈili ja jˌerusalˈemu na sajˈuni.|0
lakˈini nˌimejˌakasˌirikˈia sˈana mˌataˈifa jˌanajˌoɟisikˈia kˌuwa jˈako salˈama. nˌilikˈuwa nˌimewˌakasˌirikˈia ˌisraˈeli kidˈoɡo tˈu, lakˈini mˌataˈifa hˈajo jˌaliwˌazidiʃˈia maˈafa..|0
kwa hˈijo, hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana: nˌitaˌirudˈia jˌerusalˈemu kwa rehˈema na hˌuko ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ˌitaɟˈeŋɡwa tˈena. nˈajo kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia ˌitaɲoˈoʃwa jˌerusalˈemu, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ˌendelˈea kˌutaŋɡˈaza zaˈidi kwˌamba: hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: mˈiɟi jˈaŋɡu ˌitafurˈika tˈena ustˈawi na bwˈana ˌatamfarˈiɟi tˈena sajˈuni na kˌumtʃaɡˈua jˌerusalˈemu..|0
kˈiʃa nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu, na pˈale mbˈele jˈaŋɡu nˌikaˈona pˈembe ˈn̩ne.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza jˈule mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈami, ni nˈini hˈivi? ˌakaniɟˈibu, hˈizi ni zˈile pˈembe zˌilizˌowatawˈaɲa jˈuda, ˌisraˈeli na jˌerusalˈemu.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌioɲˈeʃa mafˈundi wˈanne.|0
nˌikaulˈiza, hˈawa wˌanakˈuɟa kufˈaɲa nˈini? ˌakaniɟˈibu, hˈizi ndˈizo pˈembe zˌilizˌowatawˈaɲa jˈuda ˌili ˌasiwˈepo ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌuinˈua kˈitʃwa tʃˈake, lakˈini mafˈundi wˌamekˈuɟa kˌuzitˈia hˈofu na kˌuzitˈupa tʃˈini hˈizi pˈembe za mˌataˈifa ambˈajo jˌaliinˈua pˈembe zˈao ðˈidi ja ˈn̩tʃi ja jˈuda na kˌuwatawˈaɲa wˈatu wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu: pˈale mbˈele jˈaŋɡu ˌalikuwˈepo ˈm̩tu mwˌeɲe kˈamba ja kˌupimˈia mkonˈoni mwˈake.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza, ˌunakwˈenda wˈapi? ˌakaniɟˈibu, kupˈima jˌerusalˈemu, kupˈata urˈefu na upˈana wˈake.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˌami ˌakaondˈoka, mˌalaˈika mwiŋɡˈine akˈaɟa kˌukutˈana nˈaje.|0
na kˌumwambˈia: kimbˈia, ˌumwambˈie jˈule kiɟˈana, jˌerusalˈemu ˌutakˈuwa ˈm̩ɟi usˈio na kˈuta kwa sabˈabu ja wˈiŋɡi wa wˈatu na mifˈuɡo ˌilijˈomo.|0
mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌitakˈuwa ukˈuta wa mˈoto kˌuuzuŋɡˈuka, asˈema bwˈana, nˌami nˌitakˈuwa ˌutukˈufu wˌake ndˈani jˈake..|0
ɲɟoˈoni! ɲɟoˈoni! kˌimbiˈeni mtˈoke katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini, asˈema bwˈana, kwa kˌuwa nˌimewˌatawˈaɲa kwˈeɲe pˈande ˈn̩ne za mbˈiŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
ɲɟˈoo, ˈee sajˈuni! kimbˈia, wˌewe ˌukaˈaje ndˈani ja bˈinti babˈeli.|0
kwa kˌuwa hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: baˌada ja jˌeje kˌuniheʃˈimu na kˌunitˈuma mˌimi ðˈidi ja mˌataˈifa jˌalijˌokutˈeka ɲˈara, kwa kˌuwa jejˈote ˌawaɡusˈaje nˈiɲi, ˌanaiɡˈusa mbˈoni ja ɟˈitʃo lˈake.|0
hakˈika nˌitaˌuinˈua mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi jˈao ˌili watˈumwa wˌao wˌawatˈeke ɲˈara. ndˈipo mtˌakapoɟˈua ja kwˌamba bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamenitˈuma.|0
pˈiɡa kelˈele na ˌufurahˈie, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni, kwa maˈana nˌinakˈuɟa, nˌami nˌitaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu, asˈema bwˈana.|0
mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi jˌataˌuŋɡanˈiʃwa na bwˈana sˈiku hˈijo, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu. nˌitaˈiʃi mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua kwˌamba bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu.|0
bwˈana ˌatairˈiθi jˈuda kˌama fˈuŋɡu lˈake katˌika ˈn̩tʃi tˌakatˈifu na ˌatatʃaɡˈua tˈena jˌerusalˈemu.|0
tˌuliˈeni mbˈele za bwˈana, ˈeɲi wˈatu wˈote, kwa sabˈabu ˌameinˈuka kutˈoka makˈao jˌake mˌatakatˈifu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌioɲˈeʃa joʃˈua, kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama mbˈele ja mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana, nˌaje ʃetˈani ˌamesimˈama upˈande wˌake wa kuˈume ˌili amʃtˈaki.|0
bwˈana ˌakamwambˈia ʃetˈani, bwˈana ˌakukemˈee ʃetˈani! bwˈana, ambˈaje ˌameˌitʃaɡˈua jˌerusalˈemu, ˌakukemˈee! ɟˈe, ˈm̩tu hˈuju sˈijo kiɟˈiŋɡa kˌinatʃowˈaka kˌilitʃˌoɲakulˈiwa kwˈeɲe mˈoto.|0
wakˈati hˈuu, joʃˈua ˌalikˈuwa ˌamevˈaa ŋɡˈuo tʃˈafu ˌalipokˈuwa ˌamesimˈama mbˈele ja mˌalaˈika.|0
mˌalaˈika ˌakawˌaambˈia wˈale wˌaliokˈuwa wˌamesimˈama mbˈele jˈake, mvuˈeni hˈizo ŋɡˈuo zˌake tʃˈafu. kˈiʃa ˌakamwambˈia joʃˈua, tazˈama, nˌimeˌiondˈoa ðˈambi jˈako, nˌami nˌitakuvˈika mavˈazi ja kˌitaɟˈiri.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikasˈema, mvˈike kilˈemba kilˈitʃo sˈafi kitʃwˈani mwˈake. kwa hˈijo wˌakamvˈika kilˈemba sˈafi kitʃwˈani na kumvˈika jˈale mavˈazi meŋɡˈine, wakˈati mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana akˈiwa ˌamesimˈama karˈibu.|0
mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakamwamˈuru joʃˈua.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: ikˈiwa ˌutakwˈenda katˌika ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu na kuʃˈika maʃˈarti jˈaŋɡu, bˌasi ˌutaˌitawˈala ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu na kˌuwa na ˈamri ɟˌuːja ɲˈua zˈaŋɡu, nˌami nˌitakˈupa nafˈasi mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa hˈawa wˌasimamˈao hˈapa.|0
sˌikilˈiza, ˈee joʃˈua kuhˈani m̩kˈuu, pamˈoɟa na wenzˈako wˌaliokˈeti mbˈele jˈako, ambˈao ni wˈatu walˈio iʃˈara ja mˈambo jˌatakˌajokˈuɟa: nˌinakwˈenda kumlˈeta mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu, tˈawi.|0
tazˈama, ɟˈiwe nˌililˌoliwˈeka mbˈele ja joʃˈua! kˈuna mˈatʃo sˈaba ɟˌuːja ɟˈiwe lˈile mˈoɟa, nˌami nˌitatʃˈora mˌaandˈiʃi ɟˈuu jˈake, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌami nˌitaˌiondˈoa ðˈambi ja ˈn̩tʃi hˌii kwa sˈiku mˈoɟa.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo kˈila mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌatamwalˈika ɟirˈani jˌake akˈae tʃˈini ja mzabˈibu wˌake na mtˈini wˈake, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kˈiʃa mˌalaˈika ˌalijˌezuŋɡˈumza nˌami ˌakarˈudi na kˌuniˈamʃa, kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌaamʃwˈavjo kutˈoka ˌusiŋɡˈizi wˈake.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikaɟˈibu, nˌinaˈona kinˈara tʃa tˈaa tʃa ðahˈabu tˈupu, nˈatʃo kˈina bakˈuli ɟˈuu jˌake na tˈaa zˌake sˈaba ɟˈuu jˈake, tˈena ˈiko mirˈiɟa sˈaba ja kulˈeta mafˈuta, kwˈeɲe tˈaa zˈote zilˈizo ɟˈuu jˈake.|0
pˈia kˈuna mˌizeitˈuni miwˈili karˈibu jˈake, mmˈoɟa upˈande wa kuˈume wa bakˈuli na mwiŋɡˈine upˈande wa kuʃˈoto.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza mˌalaˈika ˌalijˌezuŋɡˈumza nˈami, hˈivi ni vˈitu ɡˈani, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
ˌakaniɟˈibu, huɟˈui kˌuwa hˈivi ni vˈitu ɡˈani? nˌikaɟˈibu, hapˈana, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakanˌiambˈia, hˈili ni nˈeno la bwˈana kwa zˌerubabˈeli: si kwa uwˈezo, wˈala si kwa ŋɡˈuvu, bˌali ni kwa rˈoho jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
wˌewe ni kˈitu ɡˈani, ˈee mlˈima mkˈubwa sˈana? mbˈele ja zˌerubabˈeli wˌewe ˌutakˈuwa ˈarði tˌambarˈare. kˈiʃa ˌatawˈeka ɟˈiwe la ɟˈuu kabˈisa la mwˈiʃo na wˈatu wˌakipˈiɡa kelˈele wˌakisˈema, mˈuŋɡu lˌibarˈiki! mˈuŋɡu lˌibarˈiki!.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia.|0
mikˈono ja zˌerubabˈeli ˌiliwˈeka msˈiŋɡi wa hekˈalu hˈili, mikˈono jˌake pˈia ˌitalˌimalizˈia. kˈiʃa mtaɟˈua ja kˌuwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamenitˈuma mˌimi kwˈenu.|0
ni nˈani ˌanajˌeiðarˈau sˈiku ja mˈambo madˈoɡo? wˈatu wˌataʃˌaŋɡilˈia wˌatakˌapoˈona timˈazi mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa zˌerubabˈeli. hˈizi sˈaba ni mˈatʃo ja bwˈana ambˈajo hˌuzuŋɡˈuka dˌuniˈani kˈote..|0
kˈiʃa nˌikamˌuulˈiza jˈule mˌalaˈika, hˌii mˌizeitˈuni miwˈili ˌilijˈoko upˈande wa kuˈume na wa kuʃˈoto wa kinˈara tʃa tˈaa ni nˈini.|0
tˈena nˌikamˌuulˈiza, hˈaja matˈawi mawˈili ja mˌizeitˈuni karˈibu na hˈijo mirˈiɟa miwˈili ja ðahˈabu ˌinajˌomimˈina mafˈuta ja ðahˈabu ni nˈini.|0
ˌakaɟˈibu, huɟˈui kˌuwa hˈaja ni nˈini? nˌikamɟˈibu, hapˈana, bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
kwa hˈijo ˌakasˈema, hˈawa ni wawˈili ambˈao wˌamepˈakwa mafˈuta ˌili kˌumtumikˈia bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote.|0
nˌikatazˈama tˈena: na hˈapo mbˈele jˈaŋɡu kˌulikˈuwa na kitˈabu kˌilitʃorˈuka.|0
ˌakanˌiulˈiza, ˌunaˈona nˈini? nˌikamɟˈibu, naˈona kitˈabu kˌinatʃorˈuka tʃˌeɲe, urˈefu wa ðirˈaa ˌiʃirˈini na upˈana wa ðirˈaa kˈumi.|0
ˌakanˌiambˈia, hˌii ni laˈana ˌinajotˈoka kwˈenda ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, kwa kˌuwa kˌufuatˈana na jˈale jˌalijˌoandˈikwa katˌika upˈande mmˈoɟa, kˈila mwˈizi ˌatafˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali, pˈia kˌufuatˈana na jalˈijo upˈande wa pˈili, kˈila ˌaapˈaje kwa uˈoŋɡo ˌatafˌukuzˈiwa mbˈali.|0
bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote asˈema, nˌitaitˈuma hˈijo laˈana, nˈajo ˌitaiŋɡˈia katˌika ɲˈumba ja mwˈizi na ɲˈumba ja hˈujo ˌaapˈaje kwa uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. ˌitabˈaki katˌika ɲˈumba jˌake na kˌuiharˈibu, pamˈoɟa na m̩bˈao zˌake na mˈawe jˈake..|0
kˈiʃa jˈule mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˌami ˌakaniɟˈia na kˌuniambˈia, tazˈama ɟˈuu uˈone ni nˈini kˈile kˌinatʃˌoɟitokˈeza.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza, ni kˈitu ɡˈani? ˌakaniɟˈibu, ni kikˈapu tʃa kˌupimˈia. kˈiʃa ˌakaoŋɡˈeza kusˈema, hˈuu ni uˈovu wa wˈatu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi nzˈima.|0
kˈiʃa kˌifunˈiko kˌilitʃˌoteŋɡenˈezwa kwa madˈini ja risˈasi kˌilitʃokˈuwa kˌimefunˈika kˈile kikˈapu, kˌiliˌinulˈiwa na ndˈani ja kˈile kikˈapu ˌalikuwˈako mwanˈamke ˌamekˈeti.|0
ˌakasˈema, hˈuu ni uˈovu, tˈena ˌakamsˌukumˈia ndˈani ja kikˈapu na kˌuʃindilˈia kˌifunˈiko ɟˌuːja mdˈomo wa kikˈapu.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu: na pˈale mbˈele jˈaŋɡu, wˌalikuwˈepo wˌanawˈake wawˈili, wakˈiwa na upˈepo katˌika mabˈawa jˈao! wˌalikˈuwa na mabˈawa kˌama ja korˈoŋɡo, nˌao wˌakainˈua kˈile kikˈapu na kurˈuka nˈatʃo kˈati ja mbˈiŋɡu na ˈn̩tʃi.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza jˈule mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈami, wˌanakˌipelˈeka wˈapi hˈitʃo kikˈapu.|0
ˌakaniɟˈibu, wˌanakˌipelˈeka katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja babˈeli na kuɟˈeŋɡa ɲˈumba kwa aɟˈili jˈake. ˌitakˌapokˈuwa tajˈari, kikˈapu kˌitawˈekwa pˈale mahˈali pˈake.|0
nˌikatazˈama ɟˈuu tˈena: nˌikaˈona mbˈele jˈaŋɡu maɡˈari mˈanne ja vˈita jakˈiɟa kutˈoka kˈati ja milˈima miwˈili, milˈima ja ʃˈaba.|0
ɡˈari la kwˈanza lˌilivˈutwa na farˈasi wekˈundu, la pˈili lˌilivˈutwa na farˈasi weˈusi.|0
la tˈatu lˌilivˈutwa na farˈasi weˈupe na ɡˈari la ˈn̩ne lˌilivˈutwa na farˈasi wa mˌadoadˈoa ja kiɟˈivu, wˈote wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu.|0
nˌikamˌuulˈiza mˌalaˈika ˌalijekˈuwa ˌakizuŋɡˈumza nˈami, hˈawa ni nˈani bwˈana wˈaŋɡu.|0
mˌalaˈika ˌakaniɟˈibu, hˈizi ni rˈoho ˈn̩ne za mbiŋɡˈuni zˌisimamˈazo mbˈele ja uwˈepo wa bwˈana wa dunˈia jˈote, zˌinatˈoka kwˈenda kufˈaɲa kˈazi jˈake.|0
ɡˈari lˌinalovˈutwa na farˈasi weˈusi lˌinaˌelekˈea katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini, la farˈasi weˈupe lˌinaˌelekˈea mˌaɣarˈibi na la farˈasi wa mˌadoadˈoa ja kiɟˈivu lˌinaˌelekˈea kusˈini.|0
wakˈati hˈao farˈasi wˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu wˌalipokˈuwa wˌakitˈoka, wˌalikˈuwa wˌakiɟˌitahˈidi kwˈenda dˌuniˈani kˈote. ˌakasˈema, nˈenda dˌuniˈani kˈote! kwa hˈijo wˌakaˈenda dˌuniˈani kˈote.|0
kˈiʃa ˌakaniˈita, tazˈama, wˈale wˌanaokwˈenda kˌuelekˈea ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini wˌamepumzˈiʃa rˈoho jˈaŋɡu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja kˌaskazˈini.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
tʃukˈua fˈeða na ðahˈabu kutˈoka kwa wˈatu wˌaliˌohamˈiʃwa, jaˈani heldˈai, tobˈia na jedˈaja ambˈao wˌamefˈika kutˈoka babˈeli. sˈiku ˈijo hˈijo nˈenda ɲumbˈani kwa josˈia mwˈana wa sˌefanˈia.|0
tʃukˈua fˈeða na ðahˈabu ˌuteŋɡenˈeze tˈaɟi, nˌawe ˌuiwˈeke kitʃwˈani ˌm̩wa kuhˈani m̩kˈuu joʃˈua, mwˈana wa jˌehosadˈaki.|0
ˌumwambˈie, hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: hˈuju n̩dˈije ˈm̩tu ambˈaje ɟˈina lˈake ni tˈawi, nˌaje ˌatatʃipˈua kutˈoka mahˈali pˈake na kuɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
ni jˌeje ˌatakˌajeɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana, nˌaje ˌatavˈikwa ˌutukˈufu na ˌatakˈeti kˌumilˈiki katˌika kˈiti tʃa ˈenzi nˌaje ˌatakˈuwa kuhˈani katˌika kˈiti tʃˈake tʃa ˈenzi. hˈapo pˌatakˈuwa amˈani kˈati ja hˈao wawˈili..|0
tˈaɟi ˌitatolˈewa kwa heldˈai, tobˈia, jedˈaja na hˈeni mwˈana wa sˌefanˈia kˌama kˌumbukˈumbu ndˈani ja hekˈalu la bwˈana.|0
wˈale walˈio mbˈali sˈana wˌatakˈuɟa na kˌusaidˈia kˌuliɟˈeŋɡa hekˈalu la bwˈana, nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua ja kwˌamba bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌamenitˈuma kwˈenu. hˈili lˌitatokˈea ikˈiwa mtamtˈii bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈenu kwa bidˈii.|0
katˌika mwˈaka wa ˈn̩ne wa ˌutawˈala wa mfˈalme darˈio, nˈeno la bwˈana lˌilimɟˈia zˌekarˈia sˈiku ja ˈn̩ne ja mwˈezi wa tˈisa, mwˈezi wa kislˈeu.|0
wˈatu wa beθˈeli wˌalikˈuwa wˌamemtˈuma ʃarˈeza na rˈeɡem melˈeki pamˈoɟa na wˈatu wˈao, kumsˈihi bwˈana.|0
kwa kˌuwaulˈiza mˌakuhˈani wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote na mˌanabˈii, ɟˈe, ˌimempˈasa kˌuombolˈeza na kufˈuŋɡa katˌika mwˈezi wa tˈano, kˌama ambˈavjo nˌimekˈuwa nˌikifˈaɲa kwa miˈaka mˈiŋɡi.|0
kˈiʃa nˈeno la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote lˌikaniɟˈia kusˈema.|0
wˌaulˈize wˈatu wˈote wa ˈn̩tʃi na mˌakuhˈani, ɟˈe, mlˌipofˈuŋɡa na kˌuombolˈeza katˌika mwˈezi wa tˈano na wa sˈaba kwa miˈaka sabˈini ˌilijopˈita, mlifˈuŋɡa kwˈeli kwa aɟˈili jˈaŋɡu.|0
na mlˌipokˈuwa mkˈila na kˈuɲua, ɟˈe, hamkˈuwa mnˌaʃerˌehekˈea kwa aɟˈili ja nˈafsi zˈenu.|0
ɟˈe, hˈaja sˈio manˈeno ja bwˈana ˌalijosˈema kˌupitˈia mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌotaŋɡulˈia, wakˈati jˌerusalˈemu pamˈoɟa na mˈiɟi ˌinajˌoizuŋɡˈuka ˌilipokˈuwa katˌika hˈali ja ˌutulˈivu na ja mˌafanikˈio, wakˈati neɡˈebu na ʃefˈala zikˈiwa zˌimekalˈiwa na wˈatu?.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana lˌikamɟˈia tˈena zˌekarˈia.|0
hˈivi ndˈivjo ˌasemˈavjo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: faɲˈeni hukˈumu za hˈaki, ˌoɲeʃˈeni rehˈema na hurˈuma nˈiɲi kwa nˈiɲi.|0
msˌimwonˈee mɟˈane wˈala jatˈima, mɡˈeni wˈala maskˈini. msˌiwaziˈane mabˈaja mˌiojˈoni mwˈenu nˈiɲi kwa nˈiɲi..|0
lakˈini wˌakakatˈaa kˌusikilˈiza, wˌakanˈipa kisˈoɡo kwa ˌukaˈidi na kuzˈiba mˌasikˈio jˈao.|0
wˌakaifˈaɲa miˈojo jˈao miɡˈumu kˌama ɟˈiwe ɡˈumu na hˌawakˌuisˌikilˈiza ʃerˈia ˌau manˈeno ambˈajo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌalijatˈuma kwa ɲɟˈia ja rˈoho wˌake kˌupitˈia mˌanabˈii wˌaliˌotaŋɡulˈia. kwa hˈijo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌalikˌasirˈika sˈana.|0
wakˈati nˌilipoˈita, hˌawakˌusikilˈiza, kwa hˈijo wˌalipoˈita, sˌikusˌikilˈiza, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
nˌiliwˌatawˈaɲa kwa upˈepo wa kˌisulisˈuli mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa jˈote, mahˈali ambˈapo wˌalikˈuwa waɡˈeni. ˈn̩tʃi ˌikaˈatʃwa ukˈiwa ɲˈuma jˈao kiˈasi kwˌamba hakˈuna ˌalijewˈeza kˌuiŋɡˈia ˌau kutˈoka. hˈivi ndˈivjo wˌalivjˌoifˈaɲa ˈile ˈn̩tʃi ˌilijokˈuwa ˌimependˈeza kˌuwa ukˈiwa..|0
nˈeno la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote lˌikaniɟˈia tˈena.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˈina wˈivu sˈana kwa aɟˈili ja sajˈuni, nˌinawˈaka wˈivu kwa aɟˈili jˈake.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana: nˌitarˈudi sajˈuni na kufˈaɲa makˈao jˌerusalˈemu. kˈiʃa jˌerusalˈemu ˌutaˈitwa ˈm̩ɟi wa kwˈeli, mlˈima wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌutaˈitwa mlˈima mtˌakatˈifu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena wazˈee wˌanaˈume kwa wˌanawˈake wˌalioʃˈiba ˈumri wˌatakˈeti katˌika bˌarabˈara za jˌerusalˈemu, kˈila mmˈoɟa akˈiwa na mkoŋɡˈoɟo wˌake mkonˈoni kwa sabˈabu ja ˈumri wˈake.|0
bˌarabˈara za ˈm̩ɟi zˌitaɟˈaa wˌavulˈana na wˌasitʃˈana wˌanaotʃˈeza hˈumo.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: mˈambo hˈaja jˌanawˈeza kˌuonekˈana ja aɟˈabu kwa mabˈaki ja wˈatu wakˈati hˈuo, lakˈini jawˈeza kˌuwa ja aɟˈabu kwˈaŋɡu? asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˌitawˌaokˈoa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi za mˌaʃarˈiki na mˌaɣarˈibi.|0
nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa wˈaɟe kuˈiʃi jˌerusalˈemu, wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mwˌaminˈifu na wa hˈaki kwˈao kˌama mˈuŋɡu wˈao.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: nˈiɲi ambˈao sˈasa mnˌasikˈia manˈeno hˈaja jˌanajˌozuŋɡˈumzwa na mˌanabˈii ambˈao wˌalikuwˈepo wakˈati wa kuwˈekwa kwa msˈiŋɡi wa ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mikˈono jˈenu na ˈiwe na ŋɡˈuvu ˌili hekˈalu liwˈeze kuɟˈeŋɡwa.|0
kˈabla ja wakˈati hˈuo, hˌapakuwˈepo na uɟˈira kwa ˈm̩tu wˈala mɲˈama. hakˈuna ˈm̩tu ˌalijewˈeza kufˈaɲa ʃuɣˈuli jˌake kwa ˌusalˈama kwa sabˈabu ja adˈui jˈake, kwa kˌuwa nˌilikˈuwa nˌimemfˈaɲa kˈila ˈm̩tu adˈui wa ɟirˈani jˈake.|0
lakˈini sˈasa sˌitawˌatendˈea mabˈaki ja wˈatu hˈawa kˌama nˌilivjˌowatˈenda zamˈani, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
mbˈeɡu ˌitakˈua vizˈuri, mzabˈibu ˌutazˈaa matˈunda jˈake, ˈarði ˌitatˈoa mazˈao jˈake, na mbˈiŋɡu zˌitadondˈoʃa umˈande wˈake. vˈitu hˈivi vjˈote nˌitawˈapa mabˈaki ja wˈatu kˌama urˈiθi wˈao.|0
ɟˈinsi mlˌivjokˈuwa kˈitu tʃa laˈana kˌatikˈati ja mˌataˈifa, ˈee jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli, ndˈivjo nˌitakˌavjowˌaokˈoa, nˌaɲi mtakˈuwa barˈaka. msˌioɡˈope, bˌali ˌiatʃˈeni mikˈono jˈenu ˈiwe na ŋɡˈuvu.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: kˌama nˌilivjokˈuwa nˌimekˌusudˈia kulˈeta mˌaaŋɡamˈizi ɟˈuu jˈenu, wakˈati bˈaba zˈenu wˌalipˌonikˌasirˈiʃa na sˌikuoɲˈeʃa hurˈuma, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
hˈivjo sˈasa nˌimeˌazimˈia kufˈaɲa mˈema tˈena kwa jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda. msˌioɡˈope.|0
hˈaja n̩dˈijo mtˌakajˌojafˈaɲa: semˈeni kwˈeli kˈila ˈm̩tu kwa mwenzˈake, na m̩tˈoe hukˈumu ja kwˈeli na hˈaki kwˈeɲe mˌahakˈama zˈenu.|0
ˌusipˈaŋɡe mabˈaja ðˈidi ja ɟirˈani jˈako, wˈala msipˈende kuˈapa kwa uˈoŋɡo. nˌajatʃukˈia jˈote hˈaja, asˈema bwˈana.|0
nˈeno la bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote lˌikaniɟˈia tˈena.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: saˈumu za miˈezi ja ˈn̩ne, tˈano, sˈaba na kˈumi ˌitakˈuwa sˌikukˈuu za furˈaha na za ʃˈaŋɡwe kwa jˈuda. kwa hˈijo ˌuipˈende kwˈeli na amˈani.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: mˌataˈifa mˈeŋɡi na wakˈazi wa mˈiɟi mˈiŋɡi wˌatakˈuɟa.|0
na weɲˈeɟi wa ˈm̩ɟi mmˈoɟa wˌatakwˈenda kwˈeɲe ˈm̩ɟi mwiŋɡˈine na kusˈema, twˈende mˈara mˈoɟa na tˌukamsˈihi bwˈana, na kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. mˌimi mweɲˈewe nˌinakwˈenda..|0
pˈia wˈatu wa kabˈila ɲˈiŋɡi na mˌataˈifa jˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu jˌatakˈuɟa jˌerusalˈemu kˌumtafˈuta bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote na kumsˈihi.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote: katˌika sˈiku hˈizo wˈatu kˈumi kutˈoka lˈuɣa zˈote na mˌataˈifa, wˌataŋɡˌaŋɡanˈia upˈindo wa ɟˈoho la mjahˈudi mmˈoɟa na kusˈema, twˈende pamˈoɟa nˌawe kwa sabˈabu tˌumesikˈia kwˌamba mˈuŋɡu ju pamˈoɟa nˈawe..|0
nˈeno: nˈeno la bwˈana lˈiko kiɲˈume na ˈn̩tʃi ja hadrˈaki na damˈeski ˌitakˈuwa mahˈali pa kˌupumzˈika, kwa kˌuwa mˈatʃo ja wˈatu na ja kabˈila zˈote za ˌisraˈeli jˈako kwa bwˈana.|0
pˈia ɟˌuːja hamˈaθi ˌinajˌopakˈana nˈajo, ɟˌuːja tˈiro na sidˈoni, iŋɡˈawa wˈana uɟˈuzi mwˈiŋɡi sˈana.|0
tˈiro ˌameɟˌiɟeŋɡˈea ŋɡˈome imˈara, ˌamelundˈika fˈeða kˌama mavˈumbi na ðahˈabu kˌama tˈaka za mˌitaˈani.|0
lakˈini bwˈana ˌatamwˌondolˈea mˈali zˌake na kˌuuˌaŋɡamˈiza uwˈezo wˌake wa bˌaharˈini, nˌaje ˌatatˌeketˈezwa kwa mˈoto.|0
ˌaʃkelˈoni ˌataˈona hˈili na kˌuoɡˈopa; ɡˈaza ˌataɡˌaaɡˈaa kwa mˌaumˈivu makˈali, pˈia ekrˈoni, kwa sabˈabu mˌatumaˈini jˌake jˌataɲaˈuka. ɡˈaza ˌatampotˈeza mfˈalme wˌake na ˌaʃkelˈoni ˌataˈatʃwa pwˈeke.|0
waɡˈeni wˌatakalˈia ˈm̩ɟi wa aʃdˈodi, nˌami nˌitakˌatilˈia mbˈali kibˈuri tʃa wˌafilˈisti.|0
nˌitaondˈoa dˈamu vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao, tʃakˈula kˈile wˌalitʃˌokatˈazwa kˈati ja mˈeno jˈao. mabˈaki jˈao jˌatakˈuwa mˈali ja mˈuŋɡu wˈetu, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa vˌioŋɡˈozi katˌika jˈuda, nˌaje ekrˈoni ˌatakˈuwa kˌama wˌajebˈusi.|0
lakˈini nˌitailˈinda ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja maɟˈeʃi ja wˌaɲaŋɡˈaɲi. kˈamwe mðalˈimu hˌataʃˌambulˈia wˈatu wˈaŋɡu tˈena, kwa maˈana sˈasa nˌinawatʃˈuŋɡa.|0
ʃˌaŋɡilˈia sˈana, ˈee bˈinti sajˈuni! pˈiɡa kelˈele, bˈinti jˌerusalˈemu! tazˈama, mfˈalme wˈako ˌanakˈuɟa kwˈako, ni mwˌeɲe hˈaki, nˌaje ˈana wokˈovu, ni mpˈole, nˌaje ˌamepˈanda pˈunda, mwˌanapˈunda, mtˈoto wa pˈunda.|0
nˌitaondˈoa maɡˈari ja vˈita kutˈoka ˌefraˈimu na farˈasi wa vˈita kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu, nˌao upˈinde wa vˈita ˌutavˈuɲɟua. ˌatataŋɡˈaza amˈani kwa mˌataˈifa. ˌutawˈala wˌake ˌutaenˈea kutˈoka bahˈari hˌadi bahˈari, na kutˈoka ˈm̩to frˈati hˌadi mwˈiʃo wa dunˈia.|0
kwˈako wˈewe, kwa sabˈabu ja dˈamu ja aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu nˈawe, nˌitawaˈatʃa hˈuru wafˈuŋɡwa wˈako watˈoke kwˈeɲe ʃˈimo lisˈilo na mˈaɟi.|0
rˌudiˈeni ŋɡˈome jˈenu, ˈeɲi wafˈuŋɡwa wa tˌumaˈini; hˌata sˈasa nˌinataŋɡˈaza kwˌamba nˌitawˌareɟˌeʃeˈeni mˌaradˈufu.|0
nˌitampˈinda jˈuda kˌama nˌipindˈavjo upˈinde wˈaŋɡu, nˌitamfˈaɲa ˌefraˈimu mʃˈale wˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˌainˈua wˈana wˈako, ˈee sajˈuni, ðˈidi ja wˈana wˈako, ˈee ˌujunˈani, na kˌukufˈaɲa kˌama upˈaŋɡa wa ʃuɟˈaa wa vˈita.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌatawˌatokˈea; mʃˈale wˌake ˌutamulˈika kˌama umˈeme wa rˈadi. bwˈana mweɲˈezi ˌatapˈiɡa tˌarumbˈeta, nˌaje ˌatatembˈea katˌika tufˈani za kusˈini.|0
na bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatawalˈinda. wˌataˌaŋɡamˈiza na kuʃˈinda kwa mˈawe ja kutˈupa kwa kombˈeo. wˌatakˈuɲua na kˌuŋɡurˈuma kˌama wˌaliolˈewa mvˈiɲo; wˌataɟˈaa kˌama bakˈuli lˌinalˌotumˈika kˌuɲuɲizˈia kwˈeɲe pˈembe za mˌaðabˈahu.|0
bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˌao ˌatawˌaokˈoa sˈiku hˈijo kˌama kˈundi la wˈatu wˈake. wˌataŋɡˈara katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˌake kˌama vˈito vja θamˈani kwˈeɲe tˈaɟi.|0
ɟˈinsi ɡˈani wˌatavutˈia na kˌuwa wazˈuri! nafˈaka ˌitawˌastawˈiʃa viɟˈana wˌanaˈume, nˈajo divˈai ˈm̩pja viɟˈana wˌanawˈake.|0
mwombˈeni bwˈana mvˈua wakˈati wa vˈuli; n̩dˈije bwˈana ˌateŋɡˌenezˈaje mawˈiŋɡu ja tufˈani. huwˈapa wˈatu maɲˈuɲu ja mvˈua, pˈia mimˈea ja ʃambˈani kwa aɟˈili ja kˈila ˈm̩tu.|0
sanˈamu hˌuzuŋɡˈumza ˌudaŋɡaɲˈifu, wˌaaɡˈuzi huˈona maˈono ja uˈoŋɡo; hˌusimulˈia ndˈoto ambˈazo si za kwˈeli, wˌanatˈoa farˈaɟa batˈili. kwa hˈijo wˈatu wˌanatˌaŋɡatˈaŋɡa kˌama kondˈoo wˌaliˌoonˈewa kwa kukˈosa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi.|0
hasˈira jˈaŋɡu ˌinawˈaka ðˈidi ja wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi, nˌami nˌitawˌaaðˈibu vˌioŋɡˈozi; kwa kˌuwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌatalitʃˈuŋɡa kˈundi lˈake, ɲˈumba ja jˈuda, nˌaje ˌatawafˈaɲa kˌuwa kˌama farˈasi mwˌeɲe kibˈuri akˈiwa vitˈani.|0
kutˈoka jˈuda lˌitatokˈea ɟˈiwe la pembˈeni, kutˈoka kwˈake vˌitatˈoka viɡˈiŋɡi vja hˈema, kutˈoka kwˈake ˌutatˈoka upˈinde wa vˈita, kutˈoka kwˈake ˌatatˈoka kˈila mtawˈala.|0
kwa pamˈoɟa wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˌaʃuɟˈaa wˌanaˌokaɲˈaɡa bˌarabˈara za matˈope wakˈati wa vˈita. kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ju pamˈoɟa nˈao, wˌatapiɡˈana na kˌuwaʃˈinda wapˈanda farˈasi.|0
nˌitaˌiimarˈiʃa ɲˈumba ja jˈuda na kˌuiokˈoa ɲˈumba ja josˈefu. nˌitawˌareɟˈeʃa kwa sabˈabu nˈina hurˈuma ɟˈuu jˈao. wˌatakˈuwa kˌama wˈatu ambˈao sˌiɟawˈahi kˌuwakatˈaa kwa sabˈabu mˌimi ndˈimi bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈao, nˌami nˌitawaɟˈibu.|0
wˌaefraˈimu wˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˌaʃuɟˈaa, miˈojo jˈao ˌitafurˈahi kˈana kwˌamba ni kwa divˈai. watˈoto wˌao wˌataˈona na kˌufurˈahi, miˈojo jˈao ˌitaʃˌaŋɡilˈia katˌika bwˈana.|0
nˌitawˌaaʃirˈia na kˌuwakusˈaɲa ndˈani. hakˈika nˌitawˌakombˈoa, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈeŋɡi kˌama wˌalivjokˈuwa mwanzˈoni.|0
ˌiɟapokˈuwa nˌiliwˌatawˈaɲa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, hˌata hˈivjo wakˈiwa katˌika ˈn̩tʃi za mbˈali wˌatanˌikumbˈuka mˈimi. wˌao na watˈoto wˌao wˌatanˌusurˈika katˌika hatˈari nˌao wˌatarˈudi.|0
nˌitawˌarudˈiʃa kutˈoka mˈisri na kˌuwakusˈaɲa tˌoka aʃˈuru. nˌitawalˈeta katˌika ˈn̩tʃi ja ɡˌileˈadi na lˌebanˈoni, na hˈapo hˌapatakˈuwa na nafˈasi ja kˌuwatˈoʃa.|0
wˌatapˈita katˌika bahˈari ja matˈeso; bahˈari ˌilijˌotʃafˈuka ˌitatulˈizwa na vilˈindi vjˈote vja ˈm̩to naˈili vˌitakaˈuka. kibˈuri tʃa aʃˈuru kˌitaʃˈuʃwa, nˈajo fˈimbo ja ˌutawˈala ja mˈisri ˌitatowˈeka.|0
nˌitawˌaimarˈiʃa katˌika bwˈana, na katˌika ɟˈina lˈake wˌatatembˈea, asˈema bwˈana.|0
fuŋɡˈua milˈaŋɡo jˈako, ˈee lˌebanˈoni, ˌili mˈoto ˌuteketˈeze mˌierˈezi jˈako.|0
pˈiɡa jˈowe, ˈee ˈm̩ti wa msˌunobˈari, kwa kˌuwa mwerˈezi ˌumeaŋɡˈuka; mˈiti ja fahˈari ˌimehˌaribˈiwa! pˈiɡa jˈowe, ˈeɲi mˌialˈoni ja baʃˈani, msˈitu mnˈene ˌumefjˈekwa.|0
sˌikilˈiza jˈowe la wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi; malˈiʃo jˈao manˈono jˌameˌaŋɡamˈizwa! sikˈia ŋɡurˈumo za sˈimba; kitʃˈaka kˌilitʃostˈawi sˈana tʃa jordˈani kˌimehˌaribˈiwa.|0
hˈili ndˈilo ˌasemˈalo bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu: lilˈiʃe kˈundi lˌililˌokusudˈiwa kutʃˈiɲɟua.|0
wˌanunˈuzi wˌake hˌuwatʃˈiɲɟa na kˌuondˈoka pasˈipo kˌuaðibˈiwa. wˈale wˌanaˌowaˈuza husˈema, bwˈana ˌasifˈiwe, mˌimi ni taɟˈiri! wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˌao weɲˈewe hˌawawˌahurumˈii.|0
kwa kˌuwa sˌitawˌahurumˈia tˈena wˈatu wa ˈn̩tʃi, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitawˌakabˈiði kˈila ˈm̩tu mkonˈoni ˌm̩wa ɟirˈani jˌake na mfˈalme wˈake. wˌataitˈenda ɟeˈuri ˈn̩tʃi, nˌami sˌitawˌaokˈoa kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni m̩wˈao.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌikalilˈiʃa kˈundi lˌililotˈiwa alˈama kwa kutʃˈiɲɟua, hˈasa kˈundi lˌililˌoonˈewa sˈana. kˈiʃa nˌikatʃukˈua fˈimbo mbˈili, mˈoɟa nˌikaiˈita faðˈili na ɲiŋɡˈine umˈoɟa, nˌami nˌikalilˈiʃa kˈundi.|0
katˌika mwˈezi mmˈoɟa nˌikawˌaondˈoa wˌatʃuŋɡˈaɟi watˈatu. kˈundi la kondˈoo lˌikanˌitʃukˈia, nˌami nˌikatʃˈoʃwa nˈao.|0
nˌikasˈema, sˌitakˈuwa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈenu. waˈatʃe wˌanaokˈufa wˈafe na wˌanaˌoaŋɡamˈia wˌaaŋɡamˈie. wˈale wˌaliˌobakˈia kˈila mmˈoɟa na ˈale ɲˈama ja mwenzˈake.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikatʃukˈua fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu ˌinajoˈitwa faðˈili nˌikaivˈuɲɟa, kˌutaŋɡˈua aɡˈano nˌililofˈaɲa na mˌataˈifa jˈote.|0
lˌikataŋɡˈuka sˈiku hˈijo, kwa hˈijo wˈale wˌaliˌoðurˈika katˌika kˈundi, wˌaliokˈuwa wˌakinˌiaŋɡalˈia wˌakaɟˈua kˌuwa hˌilo lˌilikˈuwa nˈeno la bwˈana.|0
nˌikawˌaambˈia, mkiˈona kˌuwa ni vjˈema, nipˈeni uɟˈira wˈaŋɡu, la sˈivjo, bˌasi msinˈipe. kwa hˈijo wˌakanilˈipa vipˈande θˌelaθˈini vja fˈeða.|0
nˌaje bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, mtupˈie mfiɲˈanzi, hˈijo bˈei nzˈuri wˌalijˌoniθˌaminˈia! kwa hˈijo nˌikatʃukˈua hˈivjo vipˈande θˌelaθˈini vja fˈeða na kˌumtupˈia hˈujo mfiɲˈanzi katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana.|0
kˈiʃa nˌikaivˈuɲɟa fˈimbo jˈaŋɡu ja pˈili ˌiitwˈajo umˈoɟa, kuvˈuɲɟa undˈuɡu kˈati ja jˈuda na ˌisraˈeli.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌakanˌiambˈia, vitwˈae tˈena vifˈaa vja mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi mpumbˈavu.|0
kwa maˈana nˌinakwˈenda kˌumwinˈua mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ɟˌuːja ˈn̩tʃi ambˈaje hˌatamɟˈali ˌalijˌepotˈea, wˈala kˌuwatafˈuta wˈale watʃˈaŋɡa ˌau kˌuwapˈoɲa wˌaliˌoɟeruhˈiwa, wˈala kˌuwalˈiʃa wˌeɲe ˈafja, lakˈini ˌatakˈula ɲˈama ja kondˈoo wanˈono na kˌuzirarˈua kwˈato zˈao.|0
ˈole wa mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi ˌasijefˈaa, ˌanajˌeliˈatʃa kˈundi! upˈaŋɡa na ˌuupˈiɡe mkˈono wˌake na ɟˈitʃo lˈake la kuˈume! mkˈono wˌake na ˌuɲaˈuke kabˈisa, ɟˈitʃo lˈake la kuˈume lˌipofˈuke kabˈisa.|0
hˈili ni nˈeno la bwˈana kuhˈusu ˌisraˈeli. bwˈana, jˌeje ˌazitandˈaje mbˈiŋɡu, ˌawekˈaje misˈiŋɡi ja dunˈia na ˌaiumbˈaje rˈoho ja mwˌanadˈamu ndˈani jˈake, asˈema.|0
nˌitakwˈenda kufˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa kikˈombe tʃa kˌujumbˈiʃa mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanajˌoizuŋɡˈuka. jˈuda ˌutaziŋɡˈirwa kwa vˈita na jˌerusalˈemu pˈia.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, wakˈati mˌataˈifa jˈote ja dunˈia jˌatakˌapokˌusaɲˈika ðˈidi jˈake, nˌitaufˈaɲa jˌerusalˈemu kˌuwa ɟabˈali lˌisilˌosoɡˈezwa kwa mˌataˈifa jˈote. wˈote wˌatakˌaoɟarˈibu kˌulisoɡˈeza wˌataɟˌiumˈiza weɲˈewe.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo nˌitampˈiɡa kˈila farˈasi kwa hˈofu ja ɣafˈula, nˌaje ˌampandˈaje nˌitampˈiɡa kwa ˌuwazˈimu, asˈema bwˈana. nˌitalˌielekˈeza ɟˈitʃo lˈaŋɡu la ulˈinzi ɟˌuːja ɲˈumba ja jˈuda, nˌami nˌitawˌapofˈuʃa farˈasi wˈote wa mˌataˈifa.|0
kˈiʃa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda wˌatasˈema mˌiojˈoni m̩wˈao, wˈatu wa jˌerusalˈemu wˈana ŋɡˈuvu kwa sabˈabu bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ni mˈuŋɡu wˈao..|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo nˌitawafˈaɲa vˌioŋɡˈozi wa jˈuda kˌuwa kˌama kiɡˈae tʃa mˈoto ndˈani ja lˈundo la kˈuni, kˌama mwˈeŋɡe ˌuwakˈao kˈati ja miɡˈanda. wˌatatˌeketˈeza kulˈia na kuʃˈoto mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanajˌowazuŋɡˈuka, lakˈini jˌerusalˈemu ˌutabˈaki salˈama mahˈali pˈake.|0
bwˈana ˌatajˌaokˈoa makˈao ja jˈuda kwˈanza, ˌili heʃˈima ja ɲˈumba ja daˈudi na wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu isˈiwe kˈubwa zaˈidi kulˈiko ˈile ja jˈuda.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, bwˈana ˌatawakˈiŋɡa wˈale wˌaiʃˈio jˌerusalˈemu, ˌili kwˌamba alˈije ðaˈifu kupˈita wˈote mˌioŋɡˈoni m̩wˈao ˈawe kˌama daˈudi, nˈajo ɲˈumba ja daˈudi ˌitakˈuwa kˌama mˈuŋɡu, kˌama mˌalaˈika wa bwˈana ˌakiwˌataŋɡulˈia.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo nˌitatˈoka kˌuaŋɡamˈiza mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatakˌajoʃˌambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu.|0
nˌami nˌitamˌiminˈia ɲˈumba ja daˈudi na wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu rˈoho ja neˈema na maˈombi. wˌatanˌitazˈama mˈimi, jˈule wˌalijemtʃˈoma. nˌao wˌatamwˌombolezˈea kˌama ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌemwombˌolezˈea mwanˈawe wa pekˈee na kˌusikitˈika kwa utʃˈuŋɡu kˌama ˌanajˌemsikˌitikˈia mzalˈiwa wˌake wa kwˈanza wa kiˈume.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo kilˈio kˌitakˈuwa kikˈubwa jˌerusalˈemu, kˌama kilˈio tʃa hˈadad rimˈoni katˌika tˌambarˈare ja meɡˈido.|0
ˈn̩tʃi ˌitaˌombolˈeza, kˈila ukˈoo pˈeke jˈake, nˌao wˌake zˈao pˈeke jˈao. ukˈoo wa ɲˈumba ja daˈudi na wˌake zˈao, ukˈoo wa ɲˈumba ja naθˈani na wˌake zˈao.|0
ukˈoo wa ɲˈumba ja lˈawi na wˌake zˈao, ukˈoo wa ʃimˈei na wˌake zˈao.|0
na kˈoo zˈote zˌilizobˈaki na wˌake zˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, tʃemtʃˈemi ˌitafˌuŋɡulˈiwa kwa ɲˈumba ja daˈudi na wakˈazi wa jˌerusalˈemu, kˌuwatakˈasa ðˈambi na ˌunaɟˈisi.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, nˌitajˌakatilˈia mbˈali maɟˈina ja sanˈamu kutˈoka ˈn̩tʃi, nˈajo hˌajatˌakumbˈukwa tˈena, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. nˌitaondˈoa mˌanabˈii wˌao pamˈoɟa na rˈoho ja utʃˈafu katˌika ˈn̩tʃi.|0
ikˈiwa jˈupo jejˈote ˌatakˌajeˌendelˈea kˌutabˈiri, bˈaba jˌake na mˈama jˌake wˌaliomzˈaa wˌatamwambˈia, ni lazˈima ˈufe, kwa sabˈabu ˌumesˈema uˈoŋɡo kwa ɟˈina la bwˈana. ˌatakˌapotabˈiri, wazˈazi wˌake mweɲˈewe wˌatampasˈua tˈumbo.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, kˈila nabˈii ˌataˌaibˈika kwa maˈono ja ˌunabˈii wˈake. hˌatavˈaa vˈazi la kˌinabˈii la ɲuˈele ˌili apˈate kˌudaŋɡˈaɲa wˈatu.|0
ˌatasˈema, mˌimi sˈio nabˈii. mˌimi ni mkulˈima; ˈarði ˌimekˈuwa kˈazi jˈaŋɡu ʃˈu uɟˈana wˈaŋɡu..|0
ikˈiwa ˈm̩tu ˌatamˌuulˈiza, mˌaɟerˈaha hˈaja jalˈijo mwilˈini mwˈako ni ja nˈini? ˌataɟˈibu, ni mˌaɟerˈaha nˌilijˌojapˈata katˌika ɲˈumba ja rafˈiki zˈaŋɡu..|0
ˈamka, ˈee upˈaŋɡa, ðˈidi ja mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi wˈaŋɡu, ðˈidi ja ˈm̩tu alˈije karˈibu nˈami! asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. mpˈiɡe mtʃuŋɡˈaɟi, nˌao kondˈoo wˌatatˌawaɲˈika, nˌami nˌitaɡeˈuza mkˈono wˈaŋɡu ðˈidi ja walˈio wadˈoɡo.|0
katˌika ˈn̩tʃi jˈote, asˈema bwˈana, θelˈuθi mbˈili wˌatapˈiɡwa na kˌuaŋɡamˈia; hˌata hˈivjo θelˈuθi mˈoɟa wˌatabˈaki ndˈani jˈake.|0
