hˌii θelˈuθi mˈoɟa nˌitailˈeta katˌika mˈoto; nˌitawˌasafˈiʃa kˌama fˈeða ˌisafiʃwˈavjo na kˌuwaɟarˈibu kˌama ðahˈabu. wˌatalˌiitˈia ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu nˌami nˌitawaɟˈibu; nˌitasˈema, hˈawa ni wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, nˌao wˌatasˈema, bwˈana ni mˈuŋɡu wˈetu..|0
sˈiku ja bwˈana ˌinakˈuɟa ambˈajo ɲˈara zˌilizotˈekwa kwˈenu zˌitaɡawˈaɲua mˌioŋɡˈoni mwˈenu.|0
nˌitajˌakusˈaɲa mˌataˈifa jˈote hˌuko jˌerusalˈemu kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi jˈake, ˈm̩ɟi ˌutatˈekwa, ɲˈumba zˌitavamˈiwa na kupˈorwa na wˌanawˈake wˌatanˌaɟisˈiwa. nˈusu ja ˈm̩ɟi wˌatakwˈenda ˌuhamiʃˈoni, lakˈini wˌatakˌaobˈaki hˌawatˌaondolˈewa kutˈoka mɟˈini.|0
kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌatatˈoka na kˌupiɡˈana ðˈidi ja wˈatu wa jˈale mˌataˈifa, kˌama ˌapiɡanˈavjo sˈiku ja vˈita.|0
sˈiku hˈijo miɡˈuu jˌake ˌitasimˈama ɟˌuːja mlˈima wa mˌizeitˈuni, mˌaʃarˈiki ˌm̩wa jˌerusalˈemu, nˌao mlˈima wa mˌizeitˈuni ˌutaɡˌawaɲˈika mˈara mbˈili kˌuanzˈia mˌaʃarˈiki hˌadi mˌaɣarˈibi, ˌukifˈaɲa bˈonde kˈubwa, nˈusu ja mlˈima ˌukisoɡˈea kˌuelekˈea kˌaskazˈini na nˈusu kˌuelekˈea kusˈini.|0
nˌaɲi mtˌakimbˈia kˌupitˈia katˌika bˈonde hˌilo la mlˈima wˈaŋɡu kwa kˌuwa lˌitaenˈea hˌadi asˈeli. mtˌakimbˈia kˌama mlˌivjokimbˈia tˌetemˈeko la ˈarði katˌika sˈiku za uzˈia mfˈalme wa jˈuda. kˈiʃa bwˈana mˈuŋɡu wˈaŋɡu ˌatakˈuɟa na wˌatakatˈifu wˈote pamˈoɟa nˈaje.|0
sˈiku hˈijo hˌakutˌakuwˈepo nˈuru, barˈidi wˈala θelˈuɟi.|0
ˌitakˈuwa sˈiku ja kˌipekˈee, isˈijo na mtʃˈana wˈala usˈiku, sˈiku ˌiɟulˌikanˈajo na bwˈana. ɟiˈoni ˌinapofˈika nˈuru ˌitakuwˈepo.|0
sˈiku hˈijo, mˈaɟi jalˈijo hˈai jˌatatˌirirˈika kutˈoka jˌerusalˈemu, nˈusu kwˈenda kwˈeɲe bahˈari ja mˌaʃarˈiki, na nˈusu kwˈenda kwˈeɲe bahˈari ja mˌaɣarˈibi wakˈati wa kˌiaŋɡˈazi na wakˈati wa masˈika.|0
bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa mfˈalme ɟˌuːja dunˈia jˈote. katˌika sˈiku hˈijo ˌatakuwˈepo bwˈana mmˈoɟa na ɟˈina lˈake lˌitakˈuwa ɟˈina pekˈee.|0
ˈn̩tʃi jˈote kˌuanzˈia ɡˈeba, kˌaskazˈini ˌm̩wa jˈuda, hˌadi rimˈoni, kusˈini ˌm̩wa jˌerusalˈemu, ˌitakˈuwa kˌama arˈaba. lakˈini jˌerusalˈemu ˌutaˌinulˈiwa ɟˈuu na kubˈaki mahˈali pˈake, tˌoka lˈaŋɡo la bˌeɲamˈini hˌadi mahˈali pa lˈaŋɡo la kwˈanza, mpˈaka kwˈeɲe lˈaŋɡo la pembˈeni na kutˈoka mnˈara wa hˌananˈeli hˌadi kwˈeɲe mˌaʃinikˈizo ja divˈai ja mfˈalme.|0
ˌutakalˈiwa na wˈatu, kˈamwe hˌautˌaharibˈiwa tˈena, jˌerusalˈemu ˌutakˈaa salˈama.|0
hˌii n̩dˈijo taˈuni ambˈajo bwˈana ˌatapˈiɡa nˈajo mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo jˌalipiɡˈana ðˈidi ja jˌerusalˈemu: ɲˈama ja miˈili jˈao ˌitaˈoza waŋɡˈali wˌamesimˈama kwa miɡˈuu jˈao, mˈatʃo jˈao jˌataˈoza kwˈeɲe matˈundu jˌake na ndˈimi zˈao zˌitaˈoza vˌiɲuˈani m̩wˈao.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo bwˈana ˌatawatˈia wˌanaˈume hˈofu kˈuu. kˈila mwˌanaˈume ˌatakamˈata mkˈono wa mwenzˈake nˌao wˌataʃˌambuliˈana.|0
jˈuda pˈia ˌatapiɡˈana katˌika jˌerusalˈemu. ˌutaɟˈiri wa mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌanajˌoizuŋɡˈuka jˌerusalˈemu ˌutakusˈaɲua, wˈiŋɡi wa ðahˈabu, fˈeða na ŋɡˈuo.|0
taˈuni ja aˈina ˈijo hˈijo ˌitapˈiɡa farˈasi na ɲˈumbu, ŋɡamˈia na pˈunda, nˌao waɲˈama wˈote wˌaliˈoko kwˈeɲe kˈambi za adˈui.|0
kˈiʃa wˌaliˌonusurˈika katˌika mˌataˈifa jˈote ambˈajo jˌaliˌuʃambulˈia jˌerusalˈemu wˌatakˈuwa wˌakipˈanda jˌerusalˈemu kˈila mwˈaka kˌumwabˈudu mfˈalme, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote na kˌuaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda.|0
ikˈiwa taˈifa lolˈote la dunˈia hˌawatakwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu kˌumwabˈudu mfˈalme, bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, mvˈua hˌaitaɲˈeʃa kwˈao.|0
ikˈiwa wˈatu wa mˈisri nˌao hˌawatakwˈenda kˌuʃirˈiki, hˌawatapˈata mvˈua. bwˈana ˌatalˈeta ɟˈuu jˈao taˈuni ˈile ambˈajo ˌitawapˈiɡa mˌataˈifa jˈale ambˈajo hˌajatakwˈenda kˌuaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda.|0
hˌii ˌitakˈuwa aðˈabu ja mˈisri na aðˈabu ja mˌataˈifa jˈote jˈale ambˈajo hˌajatakwˈenda jˌerusalˈemu kˌuaðimˈiʃa sˌikukˈuu ja vibˈanda.|0
katˌika sˈiku hˈijo, keŋɡˈele zˌilizofˈuŋɡwa kwˈeɲe farˈasi zˌitaandˈikwa manˈeno hˈaja: tˌakatˈifu kwa bwˈana, nˈavjo vjˈuŋɡu vja kˌupikˈia katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana vˌitakˈuwa kˌama bakˈuli tˌakatˈifu mbˈele ja mˌaðabˈahu.|0
kˈila tʃˈuŋɡu kˌilitʃˈoko jˌerusalˈemu na jˈuda kˌitakˈuwa kˌitakatˈifu kwa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote na wˈote wˌanaokˈuɟa kutˈoa ðabˈihu wˌatatʃukˈua baˈaði ja vjˈuŋɡu hˈivjo na kˌupikˈia. katˌika sˈiku hˈijo hˌatakuwˈepo tˈena mfˌaɲabˌiaʃˈara katˌika ɲˈumba ja bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
uɟˈumbe: nˈeno la bwˈana kwa ˌisraˈeli kˌupitˈia kwa malˈaki.|0
bwˈana asˈema, nˌimewapˈenda nˈiɲi. lakˈini nˈiɲi mnˌaulˈiza, wˌewe ˌumetˌupendˈaɟe?  bwˈana asˈema, ɟˈe, esˈau hakˈuwa ndˈuɡu jˌake jakˈobo? hˌata hˈivjo nˌimempˈenda jakˈobo.|0
lakˈini nˌikamtʃukˈia esˈau, nˌami nˌimeifˈaɲa milˈima jˌake kˌuwa ukˈiwa, na urˈiθi wˌake nˌimewˈapa mbwˈeha wa ɟaŋɡwˈani.|0
edˈomu ˌanawˈeza kusˈema, iŋɡˈawa tˌumepˌondapˈondwa, tˌutaɟˈeŋɡa ˈupja maɡˈofu. lakˈini hˈili ndˈilo bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote ˌasemˈalo: wˌanawˈeza kuɟˈeŋɡa, lakˈini nˌitabomˈoa. wˌataˈitwa ˈn̩tʃi ˈovu, wˈatu ambˈao sˈiku zˈote wˈapo tʃˈini ja ɣaðˈabu ja bwˈana.|0
mtˌajaˈona kwa mˈatʃo jˈenu weɲˈewe na kusˈema, bwˈana ni m̩kˈuu, hˌata ɲɟˈe ja mipˈaka ja ˌisraˈeli!.|0
mwˈana hˌumheʃˈimu bˈaba jˈake, nˌaje mtumˈiʃi hˌumheʃˈimu bwˈana wˈake. kˌama mˌimi ni bˈaba, ˈiko wˈapi heʃˈima nˌinajˌostahˈili? kˌama mˌimi ni bwˈana, ˈiko wˈapi heʃˈima nˌinajˌostahˈili? asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. ni nˈiɲi, ˈeɲi mˌakuhˈani, mnˌaolˌiðarˈau ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu. lakˈini mnˌaulˈiza, tˌumelˌiðarˈau ɟˈina lˈako kwa nˈamna ɡˈani?.|0
mnatˈoa sadˈaka tʃakˈula kˌilitʃotˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu. lakˈini nˈiɲi mnˌaulˈiza, tˌumekutˈia ˌunaɟˈisi kwa nˈamna ɡˈani? kwa kusˈema kˌuwa mˈeza ja bwˈana ni ja kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa.|0
wakˈati mletˈapo ðabˈihu za waɲˈama walˈio vipˈofu, ɟˈe, hˌilo si kˈosa? mnˌapolˈeta ðabˈihu zilˈizo vilˈema ˌau waɲˈama waɡˈoɲɟua, ɟˈe, hˌilo si kˈosa? ɟˌaribˈuni kˌuvitˈoa kwa mtawˈala wˈenu! ɟˈe, ˌaŋɡefˌurahˈiʃwa nˈaɲi? ɟˈe, ˌatawˌakubalˈia? asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
bˌasi mwombˈeni mˈuŋɡu ˈawe na neˈema kwˈetu. ɟˈe, kwa sadˈaka kˌama hˈizo kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu, ˌatawˌapokˈea? asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
laˈiti mmˈoɟa wˈenu ˌaŋɡalifˈuŋɡa milˈaŋɡo ja hekˈalu, ˌili msˈiɟe mkawˈaʃa mˈoto ˌusiokˈuwa na faˈida ɟˌuːja mˌaðabˈahu jˈaŋɡu! sˈina furˈaha nˈaɲi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌami sˌitaˌikubˈali sadˈaka tˌoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitakˈuwa kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, kˌuanzˈia mawˈio ja ɟˈua hˌata matʃwˈeo jˈake. kˈila mahˈali uvˈumba na sadˈaka sˈafi zˌitalˈetwa kwa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, kwa sabˈabu ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌitakˈuwa kˈuu mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
lakˈini mnˌalinaɟˈisi ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu kwa kusˈema kuhˈusu mˈeza ja bwˈana, ˌimetˈiwa ˌunaɟˈisi pamˈoɟa na tʃakˈula tʃˈake. ni ja kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa..|0
nˌaɲi mnasˈema, mzˈiɡo ɡˈani hˈuu! nˌaɲi mnˌaiðarˈau kwa kibˈuri, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. wakˈati mnˌapowalˈeta waɲˈama mlˌiopokˈoɲa kwa ŋɡˈuvu, walˈio vilˈema ˌau walˈio waɡˈoɲɟua na kˌuwatˈoa kˌama ðabˈihu, ɟˈe, nˌiwakubˈali kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu? asˈema bwˈana.|0
ˌamelˌaanˈiwa jˌeje ˌadaŋɡaɲˈaje, alˈije na mɲˈama wa kiˈume ˌanajˌekubalˈika katˌika kˈundi lˈake na kuwˈeka naðˈiri ja kumtˈoa, lakˈini ˌakatˈoa ðabˈihu ja mɲˈama alˈije na dosˈari kwa bwˈana. kwa kˌuwa mˌimi ni mfˈalme m̩kˈuu, nˈalo ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu lˌinapˈaswa kˌuoɡˈopwa mˌioŋɡˈoni ˌm̩wa mˌataˈifa, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
sˈasa ˈoɲo hˈili ni kwa aɟˈili jˈenu, ˈeɲi mˌakuhˈani.|0
kˌama hˌamtasˌikilˈiza, na kˌama hamtˈaki kˌuiˌelekˈeza miˈojo jˈenu kˌuheʃˈimu ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, nˌitatˈuma laˈana ɟˈuu jˈenu, nˌami nˌitalaˈani barˈaka zˈenu. nˈaam, nˌimekwˈiʃa kˌuzilaˈani, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkuˌielekˈeza miˈojo jˈenu kˌuniheʃˈimu mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kwa sabˈabu jˈenu nˌitawˌakatilˈia mbˈali wazˈao wˈenu. nˌitazipˈaka ɲˈuso zˈenu mˈavi, mˈavi ja ðabˈihu zˈenu. nˌaɲi mtˌafukˈuzwa pamˈoɟa nˈazo mtˈoke mbˈele zˈaŋɡu.|0
nˌaɲi mtaɟˈua kˌuwa nˌimewˌapelekˈea ˈoɲo hˈili ˌili kwˌamba aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu na lˈawi lipˈate kˌuendelˈea, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
aɡˈano lˈaŋɡu lˌilikˈuwa pamˈoɟa nˈaje, aɡˈano la uhˈai na amˈani, nˌami nilˈimpa jˈote, ˌili anˈitʃe na kˌuniheʃˈimu, nˌaje ˌakanˌiheʃˈimu na kˌusimˈama ˌakilˈitʃa ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu.|0
fundˈiʃo la kwˈeli lˌilikˈuwa kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake, wˈala hakˈuna uˈoŋɡo wowˈote ˌuliˌopatikˈana katˌika midˈomo jˈake. ˌalitembˈea nˌami katˌika amˈani na uɲˈofu, nˌaje ˌakawˌaɡeˈuza wˈeŋɡi kutˈoka ðambˈini.|0
kwa maˈana japˈasa midˈomo ja kuhˈani kˌuhifˈaði mˌaarˈifa. tˈena kutˈoka kˌiɲuˈani mwˈake wˈatu wˌaŋɡepˈaswa kˌutafˈuta mˌafundˈiʃo, kwa sabˈabu jˌeje ni mɟˈumbe wa bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
lakˈini mmˌeɡeˈuka mkˌaiˈatʃa ɲɟˈia, na kwa mˌafundˈiʃo jˈenu mmˌesababˈiʃa wˈeŋɡi kˌuɟikwˈaa. mmevˈuɲɟa aɡˈano na lˈawi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kwa hˈijo nˌimewˌasababˈiʃa nˈiɲi kˌuðarˌaulˈiwa na kˌufeðehˈeʃwa mbˈele ja wˈatu wˈote, kwa sabˈabu hˌamkufuˈata ɲɟˈia zˈaŋɡu, bˌali mmˌeoɲˈeʃa ˌupendelˈeo katˌika mˈambo ja ʃerˈia.|0
ɟˈe, sˈote hatˈuna bˈaba mmˈoɟa? hˌatukuˈumbwa na mˈuŋɡu mmˈoɟa? kwa nˈini bˌasi tˌunalˌinaɟˈisi aɡˈano la bˈaba zˈetu kwa kukˈosa ˌuaminˈifu kˈila mmˈoɟa kwa mwenzˈake.|0
jˈuda ˌamevˈuɲɟa ˌuaminˈifu. ɟˈambo la kˌutʃukˈiza lˌimetendˈeka katˌika ˌisraˈeli na katˌika jˌerusalˈemu: jˈuda ˌamepˌanaɟˈisi mahˈali pˌatakatˈifu ˌapendˈapo bwˈana, kwa kuˈoa bˈinti wa mˈuŋɡu mɡˈeni.|0
kwa maˈana kwa ˈm̩tu jejˈote ˌatendˈaje ɟˈambo hˈili, bwˈana na ˌamkatilˈie mbˈali kutˈoka hˈema za jakˈobo, hˌata kˌama hˈuwa ˌanamletˈea bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote sadˈaka.|0
kˈitu kiŋɡˈine mnˌatʃokifˈaɲa: mnˌaifˌurikˈiʃa mˌaðabˈahu ja bwˈana kwa matʃˈozi. mnalˈia na kˌuuɡˈua kwa sabˈabu jˌeje hˌaziˌaŋɡalˈii tˈena sadˈaka zˈenu wˈala hˌazikubˈali kwa furˈaha kutˈoka mˌikonˈoni mwˈenu.|0
mnˌaulˈiza, kwa nˈini? ni kwa sabˈabu bwˈana ni ʃahˈidi kˈati jˈako na ˈm̩ke wa uɟˈana wˈako, kwa sabˈabu ˌumevˈuɲɟa ˌuaminˈifu nˈaje, iŋɡˈawa jˌeje ni mwenzˈako, ˈm̩ke wa aɡˈano lˈako la n̩dˈoa.|0
ɟˈe, bwˈana hˌakuwafˈaɲa wˌao kˌuwa mmˈoɟa? katˌika mwˈili na katˌika rˈoho wˌao ni wa mˈuŋɡu. kwa nˈini wˈawe mmˈoɟa? kwa sabˈabu mˈuŋɡu ˌalikˈuwa ˌakitafˈuta m̩zˈao mwˌeɲe kˈumtʃa mˈuŋɡu. kwa hˈijo ɟˌihaðarˈini weɲˈewe katˌika rˈoho zˈenu, ˈm̩tu ˌasivˈuɲɟe ˌuaminˈifu kwa ˈm̩ke wa uɟˈana wˈake.|0
nˌinatʃukˈia kˌuatʃˈana, asˈema bwˈana, mˈuŋɡu wa ˌisraˈeli, pˈia nˌatʃukˈia ˈm̩tu ˌanajˌeɟivˈika ɟeˈuri kˌama vˈazi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. kwa hˈijo ɟˌihaðarˈini weɲˈewe katˌika rˈoho zˈenu, wˈala msˈiɟe mkavˈuɲɟa ˌuaminˈifu.|0
mmemtʃˈoʃa bwˈana kwa manˈeno jˈenu. nˌaɲi mnˌaulˈiza, tˌumemtʃˈoʃa kwa nˈamna ɡˈani? mmemtʃˈoʃa kwa kusˈema, wˈote wˌatendˈao mabˈaja ni wˈema matʃˈoni pa bwˈana, nˌaje ˌanapendˈezwa nˌao ˌau mˈuŋɡu wa hˈaki jˈuko wˈapi.|0
ˌaŋɡaliˈeni, nˌitamtˈuma mɟˈumbe wˈaŋɡu, ˌatakˌajeˌiandˈaa ɲɟˈia mbˈele jˈaŋɡu. ndˈipo ɣafˈula bwˈana mnˌajemtafˈuta ˌatakˈuɟa hˌekalˈuni mwˈake. mɟˈumbe wa aɡˈano, ambˈaje mnˌamwonˈea ʃaˈuku, ˌatakˈuɟa, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
lakˈini ni nˈani ˌatakˌajewˈeza kˌustahimˈili hˈijo sˈiku ja kˈuɟa kwˈake? ni nˈani ˌawezˈaje kˌusimˈama ˌatakˌapotokˈea? kwa kˌuwa ˌatakˈuwa kˌama mˈoto wa m̩fˈua fˈeða ˌau kˌama sabˈuni ja ˌafuˈaje ŋɡˈuo.|0
ˌatakˈeti kˌama mfuˈaɟi na ˌasafiʃˈaje fˈeða. ˌatawˌatakˈasa walˈawi, nˌaje ˌatawˌasafˈiʃa kˌama ðahˈabu na fˈeða. kˈiʃa bwˈana ˌatakˈuwa na wˈatu wˌatakˌaolˈeta sadˈaka katˌika hˈaki.|0
nˈazo sadˈaka za jˈuda na jˌerusalˈemu zˌitakˌubalˈika kwa bwˈana, kˌama katˌika sˈiku zˌilizopˈita, kˌama katˌika miˈaka ja zamˈani.|0
bˌasi nˌitakˈuɟa karˈibu nˌaɲi ˌili kˌuhukˈumu. nˌami nˌitakˈuwa mwepˈesi kˌuʃuhudˈia ðˈidi ja watʃˈawi, wazˈinzi, wˌaapˈao kwa uˈoŋɡo, wˌanaopˈuɲɟa vˌibarˈua malˈipo jˈao, wˌanaˌowaonˈea waɟˈane na jatˈima, na wˌanaˌowaɲˈima waɡˈeni hˈaki, lakˈini hˌawanˌioɡˈopi mˈimi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
mˌimi bwˈana sˌibadilˈiki. kwa hˈijo nˈiɲi, ˈeɲi uzˈao wa jakˈobo, hˌamɟaˌaŋɡamˈizwa.|0
ʃˈu wakˈati wa bˈaba zˈenu mmˌeɡeukˈia mbˈali na ˈamri zˈaŋɡu nˌaɲi hˌamkuziʃˈika. nˌirudiˈeni mˈimi, nˌami nˌitawˌarudˈia nˈiɲi, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. lakˈini mnˌaulˈiza, tˌutarˈudi kwa nˈamna ɡˈani?.|0
ɟˈe, mwˌanadˈamu ˌatamwibˈia mˈuŋɡu? hˌata hˈivjo mnˌaniibˈia mˈimi. lakˈini mnˌaulˈiza, tˌunakˌuibˈia kwa nˈamna ɡˈani? mnˌaniibˈia zˈaka na ðabˈihu.|0
ˈm̩ko tʃˈini ja laˈana, nˈiɲi taˈifa lˈote, kwa sabˈabu mnˌaniibˈia mˈimi.|0
letˈeni zˈaka kamˈili ɣalˈani, ˌili kˈuwe na tʃakˈula katˌika ɲˈumba jˈaŋɡu. nˌiɟaribˈuni katˌika hˈili, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, nˌaɲi mwˈone kˌama sˌitawˌafuŋɡulˈia mˌadirˈiʃa ja mbiŋɡˈuni na kˌuwamwˌaɡiˈeni barˈaka ɲˈiŋɡi mpˈaka mkˈose nafˈasi ja kutˈoʃa.|0
nˌami kwa aɟˈili jˈenu nˌitamkemˈea jˌeje alˈaje, wˈala hˌataharˈibu mazˈao ja ˈarði jˈenu, wˈala mzabˈibu wˈenu hˌautˌapukutˈiʃa matˈunda jˌake kˈabla ja wakˈati wˈake, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
ndˈipo mˌataˈifa jˈote jˌatawaˈita mlˌiobˌarikˈiwa, kwa maˈana ˈn̩tʃi jˈenu ˌitakˈuwa ja kˌupendˈeza sˈana, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
mmesˈema vˈitu viɡˈumu ðˈidi jˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana. hˌata hˈivjo mnˌaulˈiza, tˌumesˈema nˈini ðˈidi jˈako?.|0
mmesˈema, ni bˈure kˌumtumikˈia mˈuŋɡu. tˌumepˈata faˈida ɡˈani kwa kuʃˈika mˌaaɡˈizo jˌake na kwˈenda kˌama wˌaombˌolezˈaɟi mbˈele za bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
lakˈini sˈasa wˌeɲe kibˈuri wˌanabˌarikˈiwa. hakˈika watˈenda mabˈaja wˌanastˈawi, pˈia hˌata wˈale wˌanaˌoʃindˈana na mˈuŋɡu n̩dˈio wˌanaˌosalimˈika..|0
ndˈipo wˈale wˌaliˈomtʃa bwˈana wˌakasˌemezˈana wˌao kwa wˈao, nˌaje bwˈana ˌakasˌikilˈiza na ˌakasikˈia. kitˈabu tʃa kˌumbukˈumbu kˌikaandˈikwa mbˈele jˌake kuhˈusu wˈale ambˈao walˈimtʃa bwˈana na kˌuliheʃˈimu ɟˈina lˈake.|0
nˌao wˌatakˈuwa wˈatu wˈaŋɡu, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote, katˌika sˈiku ˈile nˌitakˌapowafˈaɲa wˈatu kˌuwa hazˈina jˈaŋɡu. nˌitawˌahurumˈia, kˌama vˈile kwa hurˈuma ˈm̩tu ˌamhurˌumiˈavjo mwanˈawe ˌanajˌemtumikˈia.|0
kwa mˈara ɲiŋɡˈine tˈena ˌutaˈona tˌofaˈuti kˈati ja wˌeɲe hˈaki na waˈovu, kˈati ja wˈale wˌanaˌomtumikˈia mˈuŋɡu na wˈale wˌasiˌomtumikˈia.|0
hakˈika sˈiku ˌinakˈuɟa, ˌitawˈaka kˌama tanˈuru. wˈote wˌeɲe kibˈuri na kˈila mtˈenda mabˈaja wˌatakˈuwa mabˈua makˈavu, na sˈiku ˈile ˌinajokˈuɟa ˌitawawˈaʃa mˈoto, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote. hakˈuna mzˈizi wˈala tˈawi lˌitakˌalosalˈia kwˈao.|0
bˌali kwˈenu nˈiɲi mnˌaolˌiheʃˈimu ɟˈina lˈaŋɡu, ɟˈua la hˈaki lˌitawˌazukˈia, lˈeɲe kupˈoɲa katˌika mabˈawa jˈake. nˌaɲi mtatˈoka ɲɟˈe na kˌurukarˈuka kˌama ndˈama ˌalijˌeatʃˈiwa kutˈoka zizˈini.|0
kˈiʃa nˈiɲi mtˌawakaɲˈaɡa waˈovu, nˌao wˌatakˈuwa maɟˈivu tʃˈini ja ɲˈajo za miɡˈuu jˈenu sˈiku ˈile nˌitakˌajofˈaɲa mˈambo hˈaja, asˈema bwˈana mwˌeɲe ŋɡˈuvu zˈote.|0
kˌumbukˈeni ʃerˈia ja mtumˈiʃi wˈaŋɡu mˈose, ˈamri na ʃerˈia nˌilizˈompa hˌuko horˈebu kwa aɟˈili ja ˌisraˈeli wˈote.|0
tazˈama, nˌitawˌapelekˈea nabˈii elˈija kˈabla ja kˈuɟa sˈiku ˈile ilˈijo kˈuu na ja kutˈiʃa ja bwˈana.|0
ˌataˌiɡeˈuza miˈojo ja bˈaba ˌiwaˌelekˈee watˈoto wˈao, na miˈojo ja watˈoto ˌiwaˌelekˈee bˈaba zˈao, la sˈivjo nˌitakˈuɟa na kˌuipˈiɡa ˈn̩tʃi kwa laˈana.|0
